column2: Ido ajai akwap atai, komam etiakak; kojai amuton kokuju kaidules; kintkum emoyo loka Edeke kuju akipi.
Koany Edeke aica ebe ejokuna; kotiak Edeke aica ka amuton.
Komaik Edeke aica Apaaran, ka amuton da komaik Akuar. Kojau atiboŋ kojau da atupuruc, ŋin ŋes apaaran nasodit.
Kosub Edeke apak, kotiak akipi nuajaas kwap kapak, ka akipi nuajaas kuju kapak: kojau kwaŋin.
Komaik Edeke apak Akuj. Kojau atiboŋ kojau da atupuruc, ŋin ŋes apaaran nakiareit.
Komaik Edeke neeonit Akwap: ka atukon nuka akipi da komaik Aŋololin: koany Edeke ebe ejokuka.
Kobala Edeke ebe, “Kobwaŋ akwap anya, koraata ikui icok, kora ekitoi loka araito araito koponeke, nuejaas icokokec, kotoma akwap.” Kojaas kwaŋin.
Kobwaŋ akwap anya, koraata ikui icok koponekec, ka ekitoi da loerai araito nuejaas icokokec, kotoma oponeke. Koany Edeke ebe ejokuka.
Kojau atiboŋ kojau da atupuruc, ŋin ŋes apaaran nakiwuniet.
Kojaas kesi kanuka aica toma apak naka akuj, acaanakin akwap.” Kojau kwaŋin.
Kosub Edeke luecaete iarei luepolok; aica naepol adepar ayait apaaran, ka aica naepol ayait akuar; kosub aacer da.
Kibwaik Edeke kes apak naka akuj acaanakin akwap,
ayait da apaaran ka akuar, ido aitiak aica ka amuton: koany Edeke ebe ejokuka.
Kojau atiboŋ kojau da atupuruc, ŋin ŋes apaaran nakiwoŋonet.
Kosub Edeke itiaŋ lueiliilete luka aŋololin, ka iboro kere lukajarak luelosete, lukilwekete akip, koponesiokec, ka ŋinibore kere yeneporitoi yeneja abebenoka koponeke; koany Edeke ebe ejokuka.
Kisirereŋ Edeke kes, kotema atiar, “Kouriaros, kipuaros, kilelebunos akipi nuejaas toma aŋololin, kipuaros da lueporitos kakwap.”
Kojau atiboŋ kojau da atupuruc, ŋin ŋes apaaran nakikanyet.
Kosub Edeke etiaŋ loka akwap koponeke, ka ibaren koponekec, ka ŋinibore yeneliat kakwap koponeke: koany Edeke ebe ejokuka.
Kosub Edeke ituŋanan kaputoke, kaputo naka Edeke ŋes asubunia; kosub kes yenikiliokit ka yeniberu.
Kisirereŋ Edeke kes: kotema Edeke kes atiar, “Kouriaros kipuaros, kilelebunos akwap, kiruma; koyaitos lukecor, ka akweny nuka apak, ka ŋinibore kere yenejari yeneliat kakwap.”
Kobala Edeke ebe, “Koany, kainakis ikui kere lueraete icok luejaas akwap kere, ka ŋolikitoi loejaas araito nuka ekitoi loerai icok, araun inyamat kamakus:
Ka ŋolitiaŋ kere loka akwap, ka akweny kere nuka apak, ka yeneliat kere kotoma akwap yenejai apuru naka aijar, ainakinit kes ikui kere luelibete araun inyamat.” Kojau kwaŋin.
Koany Edeke ŋinibore kere yenikesubi, ido koany, ejokuna noi. Kojau atiboŋ kojau da atupuruc, ŋin ŋes apaaran nakikanyetekape.
Kodaun aisub akuj ka akwap, ka ajoresiokec kere.
Kapaaran nakikanyetekaarei kodaunite Edeke aisubuke nakesubi.
Kisirereŋ Edeke apaaran nakikanyetekaarei, kitalau; naarai ŋipeŋin ŋes ebworaria kaisubuke kere nakesubi Edeke, nakiswamai.
Ŋol ŋes esube loka akuj, ido loka akwap naasubere.
Kapaaran nakesubia EJAKAIT Edeke akwap ka akuj,
ido koriŋa ejauna luebwanete luka ais kakwap, koroko da ebwanuna ikui luka ais; naarai mam EJAKAIT Edeke kitetepit akiru kakwap, komamei ituŋanan yenekoriei akwap.
Konye kopurionori elisina kokwap, kitapapalenenei akwap kere.
Kosub EJAKAIT Edeke etuŋanan kapua naka akwap, kokutak eiyeŋane loka aijar okumesike; koraun etuŋanan etau lokajaran.
Kiraik EJAKAIT Edeke emanikor ari nakokide, toma Eden; kibwaik nen etuŋanan lokesubi ŋesi.
Kitabwan EJAKAIT Edeke kakwap ŋolikitoi loisiyalamikinit akonyen, loejok ainyam; ekitoi loka aijar da kokidiŋ omanikor, ka ekitoi da loka ajenun nuejok ka nueroko.
Losodit ekekiror Pison; ŋol ŋes loirimorit akwap kere naka Kabila, naejai esabu.
Esabu da loka akwap kaŋin ejokuna; ejai nen ebedelium
Ecor lokiareit da ekekiror Gikon: ŋol ŋes loirimorit akwap kere naka Kus.
Ecor lokiwuniet da ekekiror Kidekel, ŋol ŋes loelosi kari nakokide naka Asuria; ka ecor lokiwoŋonet ŋes Eupurat.
Koyaŋa EJAKAIT Edeke etuŋanan, kibwaik ŋes toma omanikor loka Eden, akorienen ka aidar ŋes.
Kicorak EJAKAIT Edeke etuŋanan ebe, “Inyamenenei kwape ikotor araito nuka ŋolikitoi lokomanikor:
dimarai mam inyami nuka ekitoi loka ajenun nuejok ka nueroko: naarai kapaaran nainyamia ŋun itwani cut.”
Kobala EJAKAIT Edeke ebe, “Mam ejok etuŋanan ajakut bon; asubakini eoŋ ŋes ikenarakinan yenibusakinit.”

Kosodi kosubak EJAKAIT Edeke toma akwap ŋolitiaŋ loka ais, ka lueporitos kotoma apak; koyau kes neejai etuŋanan aanyun kwape emaanakinia ikecekiroriajido ŋolikiror kere lokemaikin etuŋanan ŋinibore yenikajaran, koraun ŋol ekekiror.
Komaanak etuŋanan ibaren kere ikiroria, ka lueporitos kapak, ka itiaŋ kere luka ais. Konye komam etuŋanan edumakina ikenarakinan yenibusakinit.
Kitojoto EJAKAIT Edeke etuŋanan ajo nuipu, kojotoor; koditu amaran adiopet, kinyakak akiriŋ toma aiboisike.
Kosub EJAKAIT Edeke aberu kamaran kaŋin naadituni kotuŋanan, koyau ŋes neejai etuŋanan.
Kobala etuŋanan ebe,
“Na ŋes akoit naka akojoka,
Ido ŋes akiriŋ naka akiriŋika: enyarao ŋes Aberu,
naarai aditunio kotuŋanan.”
Emujalalas kesi kere, etuŋanan ka akeberu, komam ileicikinito.
Kotema aberu emun atiar, “Kisiikinitai ainyam araito nuka ikito lukomanikor;
dimarai araito nuka ekitoi loejai kidiŋ omanikor, ŋun abala Edeke ebe, ‘Mam inyamenenete, karaida atiror, kinyeis atwakare.’ ”
Kotema emun aberu atiar, “Mam cut itwakete.
Naarai ejeni Edeke ebe apaaran napinyamiata ŋun, ŋes ekwenyuniata akusikonye, iraunos yesi da bala Edeke, ajenenen nuejok ka nueroko.”
Nakeanyunia aberu ekitoi ebe ejok ainyam, isiyalamikinit da akonye, ekitoi da erai loisiŋobelei ayaun acoa, kodeŋ araitoke, konyam; koinak okilenike da, konyam.
Kitekwenyunai iarei kere akecekonye, kojenut ebe kimujalalas, kodonyut akui nuka etini,
Kiworo EJAKAIT Edeke etuŋanan kotema ŋes ariar, “Ai bo ijai ijo?”
Kotema ŋesi atiar, “Abu keira ekoniporoto komanikor, kakurianar, naarai amujalal: kanop.”
Kotema atiar, “Iŋai bo kilimokini jo ebe imujalal? Inyama ca ijo araito nuka ekitoi loabu kecorak jo ebe mam inyami?”
Kobala etuŋanan ebe, “Aberu nakiinakin ajaenena keoŋ, ŋes kainakini araito nuka ekitoi, kanyam.”
Kotema aberu atiar, “Emun kejodijodi, tape anyami.”
Kotema EJAKAIT Edeke emun atiar.
“Kanu iswamaa ŋin,
kikenokinitoi jo aitelekarit ibaren kere,
ido aitelekarit ŋolitiaŋ kere loka ais:
iliaenenei kakonikoik,
inyamenenei apua
apaarasia kere nuka aijarakon.
ido kidiŋ aurikon ka aurike da;
idecidecenenei akonikou
ka jo da idecidecenenei aketitibat.”
“Eyatakini noi ikonican ka akonipotuunun,
Kotoma ocan ŋes idoununio idwe,
akoniimuit kojai neejai okilenikon,
ido ŋes kiyait jo.”
“Naarai ibu ijo kiira eporoto loka aberukon,
ainyam araito nuka ekitoi
lokecorakin jo ebe
‘Mam inyami’,
ekeni alup kanukon;
kotoma ailolitoikon ŋes idumunia luinyami
apaarasia kere nuka aijarakon.
Kibwanakinete ikukwa ka isukukur:
inyamenenei ikui luka ais.
aitodol neibonoria alup,
naarai nen ŋes kolo kilemunere; naarai irai ijo apua,
iboŋori da apua.”
Komaik etuŋanan akeberu ekekiror Keba; naarai arai ŋesi toto naka luejarete kere.
Kiswamak EJAKAIT Edeke Adam ka akeberu inapen luka imukulen, kitanap kes.
Ŋes ejukaria EJAKAIT Edeke ŋes kiŋa kemanikor loka Eden, akorienen alup nukelemunere ŋes.
Kwaŋin kireŋea ŋesi etuŋanan: kosodi kari nakokide naka emanikor loka Eden kibwaik Ikerubin, ka ekileŋ loimilia loibelonokin iwaitin kere, aidar erot loka ekitoi loka aijar.
Kojenu Adam akeberu Keba; kopotuu, kouru Kain, kotema atiar, “Kainakin eoŋ ekes kama ejai EJAKAIT.”
Kouruunai bobo onaceke Abel. Ido koraun Abel ekecokon amerekekin, konye Kain koraun ekakorion alup.
Kosodi kanen ketuboros apaarasia koyau Kain amio naka alup ainakin EJAKAIT asubanit.
Koyau Abel da lukiyaik ice lukosipanike, kasiepaikec da. Kocam EJAKAIT Abel ka akesubanit.
Konye mam abu kocam Kain ka akesubanit. Konyunyurikin noi Kain, konyorididoto akekonyen.
Kotema EJAKAIT Kain atiar, “Inyo bo kitunyunyurik jo? Ido kanukinyo anyorididioto akonikonyen?
Arai iswamaenenei nuejok, mam kereka kicamunio? Arai mam iswamai ejok iboienenei aronis kokirigi; aiŋobeleke da ejaununei mamakon, koyaite ijo da ŋin.”
Kotema EJAKAIT Kain atiar, “Ali bo onacekon Abel?” Kotema atiar, “Mam eoŋ aleni: arai do eoŋ ekedaran loka onaceka?”
Kotema ŋes atiar, “Iswama anyoika? Kamonyia eporoto loka aokot nuka onacekon kakwap.
Natikwana kikenokin ijo kotoma alup, nuapotu koonata amatar aokot nuka onacekon kakanikon.
Naikorienenoo ijo alup, mam kiinanakinete akecegogoŋ; iraun ekasian epasoit da kakwap.”
Kotema Kain EJAKAIT atiar, “Akaiticanet mam epedor atitiŋikinio.
Koany, kireŋe lolo eoŋ kotoma akwap, ido anopikini akonikonyen; araun eoŋ ekasian epasoit da kakwap; ido yenikadumuni eoŋ kaari.”
Kotema EJAKAIT ŋes atiar, “Kanuka ŋun enyaŋi eoŋ Kain irwan akanykaarei kaneejai yeneari ŋes.” Kibwaik EJAKAIT Kain aanyunet, ŋinituŋanan yeneanyuni ŋes kinye aiar.
Kojenu Kain akeberu; kopotuu, kouru Enok: koduk ere, komaik ekiror loka okokuke Enok.
Kouru Enok Irad: Irad kouru Mekuyael: Mekuyael kouru Metusael; Metusaelkouru Lamek.
Komany Lamek aŋor aarei, nasodit ekekiror Ada, nakiareit ekekiror Sila.
Kouru Ada Yabal: ŋol ŋes papakec kaŋul kalueboienenete koweman, kojaas kibaren.
Ekiror loka onaceke ŋes Yubal: ŋolŋes papakec kaŋul kalueramete adeudeun ka ŋul luekusete alamarun.
Sila da, abu kouru Tubal-kain, ekatatan loka ibore kere yenetubi yenikaisinit ka yenikasuat: kinacike ka Tubal-kain ŋes Naama.
Kotema Lamek akeŋor atiar, “Ada ka Sila kiirasi ekaporoto;
Yes aŋor nuka Lamek, kopuputu akakirot.
Naarai abu kaar etuŋanan kanuka aimusuŋ eoŋ,
Ekatumunan da kanuka aisen eoŋ:
Arai inyanio Kain irwan akanykaarei,
Inyanio do Lamek irwan akaisakanykaarei ka nukanykaarei.”
Kojenu bobo Adam akeberu; kouru ikoku yenitelepat, komaik ekekiror Set; kotema atiar, “Naarai abu Edeke kainak eoŋ auruun ice aibois naka Abel; naarai abu Kain koar ŋes.”
Ka Set da, kouru okokuke; komaik ekekiror Enos. Kapaarasia kaŋun ŋes ageuniata ituŋa aiwonet ekiror loka EJAKAIT.
Kosub yenikiliokit ka yeniberu: kisirereŋ kes, komaik ekecekiror Adam,
Kodau Adam ikar akwatat ka akaisauni, kouru okokuke kasimake, kotoma aputoke; komaik ekekiror Set.
Apaarasia nuka Adam kedau aur Set kes ikar akwat akanykauni: kouri idwe lusap ka lupesur.
Apaarasia kere nukaibut naka Adam kes ikar akwat akanykaoŋon ka akaisauni; kotwani.
Kodau Set ikar akwatat ka ikany, kouru Enos.
Kodau Set ikar akwat akanykauni ka ikanykaarei kedau aur Enos, kouri da idwe lusap ka lupesur.
Apaarasia kere nuka Set kes ikar akwat akanykaoŋon ka itomon ka luarei: kotwani.
Kodau Enos ikar akaisakanykaoŋon kouru Kenan.
Kodau Enos ikar akwat akanykauni ka itomon ka lukany kedau aur Kenan: kouri idwe lusap ka lupesur.
Apaarasia kere nuka Enos kes ikar akwat akanykaoŋon ka ikany: kotwani.
Kodau Kenan ikar akaisakanykaarei kouru Makalalel.
Kodau Kenan ikar akwat akanykauni ka akaisaoŋon kedau aur Makalalel, kouri idwe lusap ka lupesur.
Apaarasia kere nuka Kenan kes ikar akwat akanykaoŋon ka iromon: kotwani.
Kodau Makalalel ikar akaisakanykape ka lukany, kouru Yared.
Kodau Makalalel ikar akwat akanykauni ka akaisauni kedau aur Yared, kouri idwe lusap ka lupesur.
Apaarasia kere nuka Makalalel kes ikar akwat akanykauni ka akaisaoŋon ka lukany: kotwani.
Kodau Yared ikar akwat akanykauni kedau aur Enok, kouri idwe lusap ka lupesur.
Apaarasia kere nuka Yared kes ikar akwat akanykaoŋon ka akaisakanykape ka luarei: kotwani.
Kodau Enok ikar akaisakanykape ka lukany, kouru Metusela.
Kolosenenei Enok nepepe ka Edeke, kedau aur Metusela, ikar akwat auni: kouri idwe lusap ka lupesur.
Apaarasia kere nuka Enok kes ikar akwat auni ka akaisakanykape ka lukany.
Kolosenenei Enok nepepe ka Edeke: komameun; naarai abu Edeke koyaŋa ŋes.
Kodau Metusela ikar akwatat ka akaisakanykauni ka lukanykaarei, kouru Lamek.
Kodau Metusela ikar akwat akanykaarei ka akaisakanykauni ka luarei kedau aur Lamek, kouri idwe lusap ka lupesur.
Apaarasia kere nuka Metusela kes ikar akwat akanykaoŋon ka akaisakanykape ka lukanykaoŋon: kotwani.
Kodau Lamek ikar akwatat ka akaisakanykauni ka luarei, kouru ikoku yenisapat.
Komaik ekekiror Noa, kobala ebe, “Lo ŋes lokitalakari oni kaswamuwok, ka aitaaritoi naka akaniniwok, kanuka alup nukolo ekenokin EJAKAIT.”
Kodau Lamek ikar akwat akany ka akaisakanykaoŋon ka lukany kedau aur Noa, kouri idwe lusap ka lupesur.
Apaarasia kere nuka Lamek kes ikar akwat akanykaarei ka akaisakanykaarei ka lukanykaarei: kotwani.
Kodau Noa ikar akwat akany: kouri Sem, ka Kam, ka Yapet.
Koanyut odwe luka Edeke adwe nuka ituŋa ebe ejokuka; komanyata aŋor kotoma kaŋun kere nuaseununete kesi.
Kotema EJAKAIT atiar, “Mam ekatau epegenenas ketuŋanan ikar ka ikar, naarai erai ŋesi da akuan: konye eraunos akepaarasia ikar akwatat ka akaisaarei.”
Kapaarasia kaŋun kojaas Inepilin roma akwap: ido kokau kaŋun, nakelomanariata odwe luka Edeke mama ejaas adwe nuka ituŋa, kourianakis kes: nulkes ituŋa lukagogoŋ lukolo sek, ituŋa luajenas.
Kiitu EJAKAIT naarai abu kosub etuŋanan kotoma akwap, kokadak kotauke.
Kobala EJAKAIT ebe, “Amwatari eoŋ ituŋanan yenabu kasub kakwap; ageun kotuŋanan, ka etiaŋ, ka lueliatos, ka lueporitos kapak; naarai eitu eoŋ kanuabu kasubunia kes.”
Konye kodum Noa asianut kakonye nuka EJAKAIT.
Kouri Noa isap iuni Sem, ka Kam, ka Yapet.
Komunaun akwap kakonyen nuka Edeke, kikerepik akwap.
Koany Edeke akwap, ido koany, kemunaun; naarai ŋinibore kere yenejai akuan abu komunau ekerot kotoma akwap.
Kikeu ataker naka ekitoi loka goper; kitemok agolai toma ataker, kilada kemina toma kokiŋa da.
Lo ŋes epone loitemokinio ŋes: aojau naka ataker ikubitin
Kopedok adirisa ataker, ekubit ediopet kuju; kibwaik ekekosiep loka ataker; kiswama ataker kicul itogoi, lokokwap, ka lokiareit, ka lokiwuniet.
Koany, ayauni eoŋ da akalele naka akipi toma akwap, amudiar akuan kere naejai eiyeŋane loka aijar toma, kwap kakuj; etwani ŋinibore kere yenejai toma akwap.
Konye etogogoŋi eoŋ akaitutuket kajo; ilomari ijo ataker, ijo, ka odwekon, ka akoniberu, ka aŋor nuka odwekon, nepepe kajo.
Ido imeikini toma ataker epone loka ŋinibore kere yenejai aijar naka akuan, iareiarei luka ŋolipone, imeikini toma ataker tetere ejarete nepepe kajo; ido koraas yenikiliokit ka yeniberu.
Lueporitos toma oponekec, ka ibaren toma oponekec, ka ŋinibore kere yeneliat kokwap toma oponeke, iareiarei luka ŋolipone epote neijai, tetere ejarete.
Koyaŋa inyamat kere luenyamio, kotukonok neijai; tetere inyami ijo, ka kes da.”
Kiswama Noa kwaŋin; kwape kicorakinia ŋes Edeke, kiswama kwaŋin.
Ka ŋolitiaŋ loelai ilemari ijo ikanykaarei ka ikanykaarei, ikiliokit ka ikeberu; ka itiaŋ lumam elaete iareiarei, ikiliokit ka ikeberu;
ka lueporitos luka apak, ikanykaarei ka ikanykaarei, yenikiliokit ka yeniberu: tetere ejari aurikec kotoma akwap kere.
Naarai akaulo kapaarasia akanykaarei, etetepi eoŋ akiru kakwap apaarasia akaisaoŋon apaaran ka akuare; ido amwatari kotoma akwap ŋinibore kere yenejari yenabu kasub.”
Kiswama Noa kere kwape kicorakinia ŋes EJAKAIT.
Kedaunit Noa ikar akwat akanykape nakejaunor akalele naka akipi toma akwap.
Koloma Noa, ka odweke, ka akeberu, ka aŋor nuka odweke nepepe kaŋes toma ataker, kanuka akipi nuka akalele.
Ka itiaŋ luelaete, ka itiaŋ lumam elaete, ka lueporitos, ka ŋinibore kere yeneliat kokwap.
Kolomasi iareiarei neejai Noa toma ataker, yenikiliokit ka yeniberu, kwape kicorakinia Edeke Noa.
Kosodi ketuboros apaarasia akanykaarei, kojaas akipi nuka akalele toma akwap.
Kotep akiru akwap apaarasia akaisaoŋon paaran ka kuare.
Kapaaran kaŋin kolomasi Noa, ka Sem, ka Kam ka Yapet, odwe luka Noa, ka aberu naka Noa, ka aŋor auni nuka odweke nepepe kakes, toma ataker;
kes, ka ŋolitiaŋ koponeke, ka ibaren kere kotoma oponekec, ka ŋinibore kere yeneliat kokwap toma oponeke, ka ŋinibore yeneporitoi toma oponeke, ka ŋinikweny yenikejaas abebenoka.
Kolomasi neejai Noa toma ataker, ŋinikuan kere naajai eiyeŋane loka aijar iareiarei.
Lualomarete da, kolomasi yenikiliokit ka yeniberu yenika ŋinikuan kere, kwape kicorakinia ŋes Edeke: kogolok EJAKAIT ŋes toma.
Kojai akalele toma akwap apaarasia akaisaoŋon, kiyatakinos akip, kileput ataker, kikalelo kokuju akwap.
Kipikosi akip, kiyatakinos noi kakwap, kijelelitoi ataker kokuju akipi.
Kiyatakinos akip noi airap akwap, iroŋan da luaojak kere luajaas kwap kakuj kere, koraparos.
Kiyatakinos akip ikubitin itomon ka lukany kuju; koraparos iroŋan.
Kotwana akuan kere nakelosi kotoma akwap, lueporitos, ka ibaren, ka itiaŋ, ka ŋinibore kere yeneliat kokwap, ka ŋinituŋanan;
kotwakata kere lukejaas eiyeŋane loka etau loka aijar toma okumesikec, kere lukejaas toma akwap nakeonit.
Komwatarai ŋinibore kere yenajari yenajai toma akwap, ituŋanan, ka ibaren, ka ibore yeneliat, ka lueporitos kokuju, komwatarai kakwap; kosalak Noa bon, ka kes lukejaas nepepe kaŋes toma ataker.
Kirumata akip akwap adaun apaarasia akwatat ka akaisakany.
Kogolokinoi akonyen nuka ataroi, ka apedon nuka akuj, kitikokinai da akiru nakokuju.
Koboŋonorete akip ducuduc anyoun kokwap. Kedaunos apaarasia akwatat ka akaisakany kiŋoŋaros akip.
Kolap lokikanyetekaarei, kapaaran nakitomonet kakanykaarei naka elap, kidokokin ataker oroŋan luka Ararat.
Kiŋoŋaros akip aitodol olap lokitomonet: kotoma olap lokitomonet kapaaran nasodit naka elap, kotakanut aidiasia nuka iroŋan.
Kijuka ekuruk, kirim aitodol nekeonikinioto akip kakwap.
Kijuka ajele aanyun arai eŋoŋaros akip kokwap;
konye mam ajele kedumuna neisibworaria akekeje, koboŋo neejai ŋesi toma ataker, naarai ajaas akip akwap kere; korio ŋesi akekan kitiŋ ŋes kitolom toma ataker.
Kidarek apaarasia ace akanykaarei; kijuka bobo ajele alomar kataker;
koboŋo ajele neejai ŋesi eboŋ; ido koany, etodit akiot naka eseitun nakedenuni: kosodi kojen Noa ebe eŋoŋaros akip kakwap.
Kidarek bobo apaarasia akanykaarei; kijuka ajele; mam bobo abu koboŋu neejai.
Kosodi kokaru lokakwat akanykape ka lodiopet, toma olap losodit, kapaaran nasodit naka elap, koonikis akip kakwap. Kopuko Noa arapetait naka ataker kite, ido koany, eonit akwap.
Kotoma olap lokiareit, kapaaran nakakaisaarei kanukanykaarei naka elap, koono akwap.
Kotema Edeke Noa atiar,
“Kolom kataker, ijo ka akoniberu, ka odwekon, ka aŋor nuka odwekon nepepe kajo.

Kitoloma nepepe kajo ŋinibore kere yenejari yenejai nepepe kajo, yenika ŋinikuan kere, ka lueporitos, ka ibaren, ka ŋinibore kere yeneliat kokwap; kouriata noi kesi kakwap, konyaaros, kipuaros kakwap.”
Kolom Noa ka odweke, ka akeberu, ka aŋor da nuka odweke nepepe kaŋes.
Ŋolitiaŋ, ka ŋinibore yeneliat, ka ŋinibore yeneporitoi kere, yenelosi kere kakwap, kwape ejaatar atekerinikec, kolomut kataker.

Kiŋu EJAKAIT asakat naeur saa; kiner EJAKAIT kotauke atiar, “Mam bobo ekenokini alup kanuka ituŋanan, naarai aitetemonori nakotau loka ituŋanan erono ameuni koiditeuke; ido mam bobo adanyi ŋinibore kere yenejari kwape abu keswamaa.
Eriŋa akwap ejai, mam edaununos apakio nuka aiye, ka aisak, aterot ka aibuse, akamu ka aiporo, apaaran ka akuare.”
Ŋolitiaŋ kere loka akwap, ka ŋinibore kere yeneporitoi kapak kokuriana yes ka etasuro; ka lueliatos kere luka akwap ka lukecor kere ainak akaninikus.
Ŋinibore kere yenelosi yenejari kere eraun inyamatakus; kwape ikui kainakis yes kere.
Konye akiriŋ naejai aijar tomake, kes akeokot, mam inyamenenete.
Mam kakurwokin aibura akusiwokot, aokot nuka aijarakus, eburai kes kakan naka ŋolitiaŋ; kakan da naka ituŋanan, karaida kakan naka onace loka ŋinituŋanan, eburai eoŋ aijar naka ituŋanan,
ŋinituŋanan yenebukori aokot nuka ituŋanan, akeokot da ebukorio, kanuka ituŋanan kaŋin: naarai abu Edeke kosub ituŋanan toma aputoke.
Yes da, kouriata, kipuaros; kilelebata akwap, kiyatanakinos noi kanen.”
Kotema Edeke Noa ka odweke atiar,
“Koany, eoŋ da, etogogoŋi akaitutuket kajo, nepepe ka akusiwur da nakitupanakini yes.
Nepepe ka isubat kere yenejari yenejai nepepe kayes, lueporitos, ka ibaren, ka ŋolitiaŋ loka akwap nepepe kayes; kere luelomunete kataker, ŋolitiaŋ loka akwap.
Etogogoŋi eoŋ akaitutuket nepepe kayes, mam bobo amudiari akuan kere kakip nuka akalele; ido mam ejaun bobo akalele amudiar akwap.”
Kotema Edeke atiar, “Na ŋes aanyunet naka aitutuket naetutuki eoŋ kayes, ka ŋinisubat kere yenejari yenejai nepepe kayes aitodol aturio numam edaunos.
Asipokini ekataluka odou, ido eraunun ŋesi aanyunet naka aitutuket kokidiŋikaŋ ka akwap.
Kosodi naayaununia eoŋ edou kokuju kakwap etakanununei etaluka kodou.
Eitununei eoŋ da akaitutuket naabu ketutuk eoŋ nepepe kayes, ka ŋinisubat yenejari yenikakuan kere, ido mam bobo akipi eraunos akalele amudiar akuan naka ŋinibore kere.
Ejaununei etaluka odou, anolekini eoŋ ŋes, kasodi akiitun aitutuket namam edaun naabu Edeke kitutuk kaninisubat kere yenejari yenikakuan yenejai kakwap.”
Kotema Edeke Noa atiar, “Ŋin ŋes aanyunet naka aitutuket naabu eoŋ ketogogoŋ kokidiŋikon ka ŋinikuan kere naejai kakwap.”
Ŋul luuni kes odwe luka Noa: ido ipapaikec kaŋul kes luesiarakinos akwap kere.
Komat ajon, komerikin, kojai titai kotoma owemake.
Koany Kam, papa loka Kanaan, ŋes imujalal, kolimok ikekinacan iarei luajaas kiŋa.
Kolemut Sem ka Yapet elou, kibwaikis okeperinikec kere, koboŋoboŋoto ekaukau, kimukosi papakec kinye amujalal; ido kanueteoto kiŋaren, mam apotu koanyut papakec imujalal.
Kikua emeret loka Noa, kojenu nuabu okokuke lodidi kiswamak ŋes.
Kotema atiar,
“Kikenokinoi Kanaan;
Korau ebulesit loka ibulesin kama ejaas ikekinacan.”
“Kituritete EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Sem;
Korau Kanaan ekebulesit.
Kiboienenei kotoma oweman luka Sem;
Korau Kanaan ekebulesit.”
Kodau Noa ikar akwat auni ka akaisakany akaulo kakalele.
Apaarasia kere nuka Noa kes ikar akwat akanykaoŋon ka akaisakany: kotwani.
Na ŋes aur naka odwe luka Noa; Sem, ka Kam ka Yapet: luauriete kesi kedaun akalele.
Odwe luka Gomer; Asukenas, ka Ripat, ka Togaruma.
Odwe luka Yaban; Elisa, ka Tarusis, Kitim, ka Dodanim.
Ŋul kes luaponi kokorakinai apujana nuka atekerin kotoma akwapukec, ŋinituŋanan kwape ajaar aŋajepeke, kwape ajaar ajenakec, kotoma atekerinikec.
Odwe luka Kam; Kus, ka Misuraim, ka Put, ka Kanaan.
Odwe luka Kus; Seba, ka Kabila, ka Sabuta, ka Raama, ka Sabuteka: odwe luka Raama, Seba, ka Dedan.
Kouri Kus Nimurod: kogeu araun lokagogoŋ kotoma akwap.
Kerai ekamejan lokagogoŋ kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT: ŋes enerare ebe, “Kwape ka Nimurod ekamejan lokagogoŋ kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT.”
Ageunet naka ajakanutuke arai Babel, ka Erec, ka Akad, ka Kalune, toma akwap Sinar.
Konyou kakwap kaŋin kolot Asuria, koduk Niaebe, ka Rekobos-Ir, ka Kala.
Ka Resen loejai kidiŋ ka Ninebe ka Kala (gopegolges ere lokapolon).
Misuraim kouri Ludim, ka Anamim, ka Lekabim, ka Naputukim,
ka Paturusim, ka Kasulukim (nealomuniata Ipilisitian), ka Kaputorim.
Kanaan kouri ekekiyai Sidon, ka Ket;
Eyebusit, ka Emorait, ka Egirugasit;
ka Ekibit, ka Erukait, ka Esinit;
ka Erubadait, ka Esemarit, ka Ekamatit: akaulo kaŋun kisiarakinos ikalia luka Ekanaanit.
Eikor da loka Ekanaanit enyounit koSidon, kolosi Gerar, kodolite Gasa; bala ilosi Sodom ka Gomora ka Aduma ka Seboiim, kiton Lasa.
Ŋul kes odwe luka Kam, kwape ejaatar ikaliakec, kwape ejaatar aŋajepakec, kotoma akwapinikec, kotoma ateketinikec.
Ido ka Sem, papaakec loka idwe kere luka Eber, onace loka Yapet lokapolon, ŋes da kouri idwe.
Odwe luka Sem, Elam, ka Asur, ka Arupakusad, ka Lud, ka Aram.
Odwe luka Aram, Us, ka Kul, ka Geter, ka Mas.
Arupakusad kouri Sela; Sela kouri Eber.
Kouri Eber idwe iarei lusap: ekiror loka ediopet Peleg;
Yokutan kouri Alumodad, ka Selep, ka Kasarumabet, ka Yera;
Ka Kadoram, ka Usal, ka Dikula;
ka Obal, ka Abimael, ka Seba;
ka Opir, ka Kabila, ka Yobab: ŋul kere kes odwe luka Yokutan.
Akwap da naeboioto anyounit koMesa bala ilosi Separ, eroŋat lokokide.
Ŋul kes odwe luka Sem, kwape ejaatar ikaliakec, kwape ejaatar aŋajepakec, kotoma akwapinikec, kotoma atekerinikec.
Kosodete kobwota kesi kide, kodumut apuuton kakwap naka Sinar; kiboioto kanen.
Kotemanaros atiar, “Tkatuna, keswamata amatapalin, kecweata cut.” Kojaas kamatapalin aibois naka amor; alupot da aibois naka elupe.
Kinerasi atiar, “Ikatuŋa, kadukoto ere ka etogo loeoja noi, loedoli aidike toma akuj, kadumuniata ekiror; kenyeis aisiarakin akwap kere.”
Kodoku EJAKAIT kwap aanyun ere ka etogo loeoja noi loadukete idwe luka ituŋa.
Kotema EJAKAIT atiar, “Koany, eraas ŋulluka adiopeteker, ido eraas kesi kere luka aŋajep adiopet, ido napena ŋes egeunito kesi aswam; emamei do ibore yenekurwokini kes, yenekotosi aswam.
Aso, kadokasi kwap, kenyalinyalatakanen aŋajepakec, kinye ŋinituŋanan ajenun einer loka yenice.”
Kwaŋin kisiarak EJAKAIT kes cut anyoun kaŋina kikaaros akwap kere: kinyeis kesi aiduk ere.
Ŋes kemaikinere ekekiror Babel, naarai kanen ŋes enyalinyalia EJAKAIT aŋajep naka akwap kere; ido kaŋina kisiarak kes EJAKAIT akwap kere.
Kodau Sem ikar akwat akany kedau aur Arupakusad, kouri idwe lusap ka lupesur.
Kodau Arupakusad ikar akwat aoŋon ka iuni, kedau aur Sela, kouri idwe lusap ka lupesur.
Kodau Sela ikar akaisauni, kouru Eber:
Kodau Sela ikar akwat aoŋon ka iuni kedau aur Eber, kouri idwe lusap ka lupesur.
Kodau Eber ikar akwat aoŋon ka akaisauni kedau aur Peleg, kouri idwe lusap ka lupesur.
Kodau Peleg ikar akaisauni, kouru Reu;
Kodau Peleg ikar akwat aarei ka ikanykaoŋon kedau aur Reu, kouri idwe lusap ka lupesur.
Kodau Reu ikar akaisauni ka luarei, kouru Serug;
Kodau Reu ikar akwat aarei ka ikanykaarei kedau aur Serug; kouri idwe lusap ka lupesur.
Kodau Serug ikar akaisauni, kouru Nakor;
Kodau Serug ikar akwat aarei kedau aur Nakor, kouri idwe lusap ka lupesur.
Kodau Nakor ikar akaisaarei ka lukanykaoŋon, kouru Tera:
Kodau Nakor ikar akwatat ka itomon ka lukanykaoŋon kedau aur Tera, kouri idwe lusap ka lupesur.
Na ŋes aur naka Tera. Tera kouri Aburam, ka Nakor, ka Karan; Karan kouru Lot.
Kotwanik Karan neejai papake Tera toma akwap naaurikinio ŋes, toma Ur akwap naka Ikaludean.
Komanyata Aburam ka Nakor aŋor, ekiror loka aberu naka Aburam ŋes Sarai; ka ekiror loka aberu naka Nakor, Miluka, akokuke ka Karan, papake ka Miluka, ido papa loka Isika.
Kerai Sarai arakan; komamei ŋes ikoku.
Apaarasia nuka Tera kes ikar akwat aarei ka ikany: kotwanik Tera Karan.
Ketuluori moolo areker napeti, kesirereŋenenei, etopoloori ekonikiror; korau ijo arereŋ.
Esirereŋi kes lukisirerenete jo, ido ŋin yenikikenokini jo ekeni eoŋ da ŋes: kotomakon ŋes erereneorotor ikalia kere luka akwap.”
Kwaŋin kolot Aburam, kwape kelimokinia ŋes EJAKAIT: kolot Lot nepepe kaŋes: kedaunit Aburam ikar akaisakanykaarei ka lukany nakenyounio koKaran.
Koyaŋa Aburam akeberu Sarai, ka Lot okoku loka onaceke, ka ikeceboro kere luatukokinitos, ka ituŋa luapotu kodumut koKaran; konyout alosit akwap naka Kanaan; kodolot akwap naka Kanaan.
Kitor Aburam akwap kodol aibois naka Sekem, neejai elua loka More. Kojai Ekanaanit akwap kapaarasia kaŋun.
Kitaanyikin EJAKAIT Aburam, kotema atiar, “Ainakini rwaru akoniwur akwap na.” Kodukok etem nen neejai EJAKAIT, lokitaanyikin ŋes.
Konyou kolot oroŋat kari nakokide naka Bet-el, kibubuk ekewema, kojai Bet-el to, Ai da kide: kodukok etem nen neejai EJAKAIT, kiwone ekiror loka EJAKAIT.
Konyou Aburam kiyatak akelosit kari naka Eŋalakimak.
Kosodi eapie ŋes alomari Misiri, kotema akeberu Sarai atiar, “Koany, ajeni jo irai aberu naatemel:
Aso kiianyut jo Imisirian etemarete kesi atiar, ‘Na ŋes akeberu’: ido kaarete eoŋ, konye kinyekinete jo ijari.
Keŋaiŋait jo, kotema ebe irai ijo kinacika: tetere adumun ajokis kanukon, kajara da kanukon.”
Kosodi kedol Aburam Misiri, koanyut Imisirian aberu itemelel noi.
Koanyut ŋes ijaka luka Parao: kituro ŋes kaneejai Parao; koyaŋaarai aberu togo loka Parao.
Kikonak ŋesi Aburam ejok kanuke: kojaas ŋes amerekekin, ka imoŋin, ka isigirian, ka ibulesin, ka abulesin, ka asigirian, ka akaalai.
Konyarau Parao Aburam kotema atiar, “Anyoika nu nukiswamak eoŋ? Inyo bo mam kilimokinia eoŋ kwape eraar ŋesi akoniberu?
Kanukinyo itemaria ebe, ‘Erai ŋesi inacika,’ tapi eoŋ ayaŋaari aituluor ŋes akaberu? Aso do akoniberu ŋin, koyaŋa, kolot.”
Kicorak Parao ituŋake: kinyamakis ŋes orot, ka akeberu, ka iboro kere lukejaas kaŋes.
Konyou Aburam koMisiri, ŋes nepepe kakeberu ka lukejaas kaŋes kere: Lot da nepepe kaŋes, koloto ari naka Eŋalakimak.
Abarit Aburam noi ibaren ka epuesa, ka esabu da.
Kolot idiai konyou kari naka Eŋalakimak kodol Bet-el toma aibois nakolo ajai ewemake sek, kidiŋ Bet-el ka Ai;
Toma aibois naka etem lokolo esiauni ŋesi aiduk kiwone Aburam kaŋina ekiror loka EJAKAIT.
Lot da loaupas nepepe ks Aburam, ajaas isipanin luka amerekekin ka luka ibaren ka iweman da.
Kodidiŋik kes akwap, mam epedoro aiboi nepepe: naarai epu iborokec mam apotu kopedosi aiboi nepepe.
Kojau eŋuŋet mama ejaas ikecokol luka Aburam ka ikecokok luka Lot. Ido eboiete Ekanaanit ka Eperisi kakwap kaŋin kapaarasia kaŋun.
Mam akwap kere ejai akonyenekon? Keŋaiŋait, kogitar ijo kama ajai arai kinere ijo akan nakokediany, eoŋ da alosi nakoteten; arai kinere ijo akar nakoteten, eoŋ da alosi nakokediany.”

Kiteluo Lot akekonye, koanapuuton naka Yorodan kere, ajaas akip nuipu ŋiniibois. Koroko be EJAKAIT kemudiara Sodom ka Gomora, kosubite bala emanikor loka EJAKAIT ido kwape akwap nako Misiri ilosi Soar.
Kosodi koŋer Lot apuuror naka Yorodan kere; kidiar Lot kide: kotiakas kesi bonik.
Kiboikir Aburam akwap naka Kanaan, ka Lot da kiboikin oreria luka apuuton kibubuk ewemake Sodom.
Konye keroko ituŋa luko Sodom koraa ikediakanarak noi kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT.
Naarai akwap kere naitei, kainakini jo, k: akoniwur aitodol ikar kere.
Ido etuluori aurikon kwape kapua nak: akwap; ido arai epedori ituŋanan aimar apua naka akwap, akoniwur da imarun.
Konyou, kirimo akwap aojauke ka alalauke da; naarai kaina kini jo.”
Kitobwot Aburam ewemake, kobu kiboikin oluan luk Mamure, luejaas toma Keburon, kodukok etem loka EJAKAIT ŋina.
Kojioto ka Bera ekabaka loka Sodom, ka Birusa ekabaka lok Gomora, ka Sinab ekabaka loka Aduma, ka Semeber ekabaka loka Seboiim ka ekabaka loka Bela (ŋes Soar).
Kimorikikinos ŋul kere aditot nak Sidim (ŋin ŋes Aŋolol naka Abalaŋ).
Apotu kijaanakis Kedolaomer ika itomon ka luarei, kokaru lokitomonet kauni kipaliikis.
Kokaru lokito monet kaoŋon kobu Kedolaomer ka ikabakan lukejaas nepepe kaŋes, kitijiot Irepain kotoma Asuteros-karunaim, ka Isusin kotoma Kam, ka Iyemii kotoma Sabe-kiriataim.
Ka Ikorin toma omorukec Seir, aitodol El-parar naapie kamodiŋ.
Koboŋosi, kodoloto En-misupat (ŋes Kades), kitijiot akwap kere naka Imalekain ka naka Imorain da lueboienenete Kasason tamar.
Koloma ekabaka loka Sodom, ka ekabaka loka Gomora, ka ekabaka loka Aduma, ka ekabaka loka Seboiim, ka ekabaka loka Bela (ŋes Soar) kiderakinos ejie kakes kaditot naka Sidim;
ejie ka Kedolaomer ekabak loka Elam, ka Tidal ekabaka loka Goim, ka Amurapel ekabaka loka Sinai ka Ariok ekabaka loka Elasar; ikabakan iwoŋon kojioto ka ikabakan ikanj
Ido aditot naka Sidim eleleba apanya nuka erit; kokerata ikabakan luk Sodom ka Gomora, kibironokinos nen, ka luakuete kokereasi oroŋai
Koŋatasi iboro kere lukotoma Sodom ka Gomora, ka inyamatakec kere kolototo.
Koŋatasi Lot, okoku loka onaceke ka Aburam, loeboienene koSodom, ka iboroke, kolototo.
Kepupu Aburam ebe anata onaceke, kolot ka ituŋake luetuutooritai ejie, akwat auni ka itomon k lukanykauni, luaurikinio togoke, kotupasi aitodol Dan.
Kotiakas asurc kin kes kuare, ŋes ka ikekejaanakinak kitijioto, kotupasi aitodol Koba, loejai akan nakokediany nakoDamasek.
Kinyaku iboro kere, kinyaku onaceke da Lot ka iboroke, aŋor da, ka ituŋa.
Melukisedek da, ekabaka loka Salem koyaŋau inyamat ka ajon: ido kerai esasedoti loka Edeke Loejai kuju kakuj.
Kilipak ŋes arereŋ, kotema atiar,
“Edeke Loejai kuju kakuj,
Elopet akuj ka akwap kisirereŋ Aburam.
Lokikorak lukasurupokon akanikon!”
Koinak Aburam ŋes idiopet kotomon yenika kere.
Ekabaka loka Sodom kotema Aburam atiar, “Koinakinai eoŋ ituŋa, koyaŋa ijo iboro.”
Kotema Aburam ekabaka loka Sodom atiar, “Ario akakan mama ejai EJAKAIT, Edeke Loejai kuju kakuj, elopet akuj ka akwap,
ebe, Mam ayaŋaari auno karaida irukan yenikamuk, karaida ŋinibore kere yenijaatar, kinyek einer ebe, ‘Etabar Aburam’.
Dimarai ŋulluanyamata ikatumunak, ka akorakinet naka ituŋa lukilosi keoŋ, Aner, ka Esukol, ka Mamure, koyaŋaasi ŋul akorakinetakec.”
Kobala Aburam ebe, “Wu EJAKAIT Edeke, kiinakini inyo naarai alosi komamei ikoku, konye loirumi ekatogo ŋes ca Damasek Elieser?”
Kobala Aburam ebe, “Koany, mam kiinakinit eoŋ aur: ido koany, loaurikinio togoka ŋes ekerumanika,”
Ido koany, kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ejai ŋesi ebe, “Etuŋanan ŋol mam erauni ekerumanikon, konye loebuni kopikisikon ŋes eraun ekerumanikon.”
Kitolom kiŋa, kolimok ebe, “Kosesen natikwana akuj, kimar aacer, arai kipedo aimar.” Kotema atiar, “Aurikon da ikwaikini nen.”
Kiyu ŋesi EJAKAIT; kimarakinai ŋes adolit.
Kobala ebe, “Wu EJAKAIT Edeke, inyo bo ketejenikini ebe erumi?”
Kotema atiar, “Kolemikinai akiten naedaunit ikar iuni, ka akinei naedaunit ikar iuni, ka emerekek loedaunit ikar iuni, ka eluke, ka ajele naedit.”
Koyaŋa ŋul kere, kotiaka kokidiŋ, kibwaik atutubeta aareiarei kiteteonok; konye mam abu kotiak ikweny.
Kodooto atarukon toma awat nuka lukatwak, kireŋea Aburam.
Kotema EJAKAIT Aburam atiar, “Kojenu cut ebe erauni aurikon apejonon kakwap namere nakec, ido epote aijaanakin, eponio areit kes ikar akwat aoŋon;
ateker ŋin da naepote kesi aijaanakin, atubokini akiro; kosodete anyoun kojaas kiboro luipu.
Konye ijo da ilosi neejaas lukapapaakon kainapakina; kidaio kidau aibut ejok.
Ido kotoma aturi nakiwoŋonet eboŋunete bobo nee; naarai numam adolit nuka Emorait eroko edolo.”
Kosodi kedau akoloŋ alomar, komutonor akwap, koany eupa loepurie ka akalas naesarani kitoroto kidiŋ neajaas iboro ŋul.
Ekenit, ka Ekenisit, ka Ekadumonit,
ka Ekitit, ka Eperisit, ka Erepait,
ka Emorait, ka Ekanaanit, ka Egirugasit, ka Eyebusit.”
Kotema Sarai Aburam atiar, “Koany, abu EJAKAIT kesimik eoŋ aur, keŋaiŋait, koloma ijo neejai akabulesit; elemuni kadum idwe kama ejai.” Kiira Aburam eporoto loka Sarai.
Kedaunit Aburam ikar itomon iboie kakwap naka Kanaan, abu Sarai aberu naka Aburam koyaŋa Kagar, Amisiriat, akebulesit, koinak ŋes Aburam okilenike araun akeberu.
Koloma ŋesi neejai Kagar, kopotuu; keanyu ŋin ebe apotuu, komen do tataake kakonyeke.
Kotema Sarai Aburam atiar, “Akamenio kojai neijai ijo; abu kainak akabulesit atorobukon, ido nakeanyunia ŋesi ebe apotuu, kamen eoŋ kakonyeke. Kotub EJAKAIT akiro eoŋ ka jo.”
Konye Aburam kotema Sarai atiar, “Koany, ejai akonibulesit akanikon; kiswamak ŋes nuedolito kakonyekon.” Kisiejanakini Sarai ŋes kagogoŋ, kosi kakonyeneke.
Kotema atiar, “Kagar, abulesit naka Sarai, kibuni kai? Ido ilosi ai?” Kotema atiar, “Asii eoŋ kakonyen nuka tataaka Sarai.”
Kotema emalaika loka EJAKAIT ŋes atiar, “Koboŋo neejai tataakon, kononokikinite ŋes.”
Kotema emalaika loka EJAKAIT ŋes atiar, “Esupui noi akoniwur, komam imarunos kanuka aipues.”
Kotema emalaika loka EJAKAIT ŋes atiar, “Koany, ipotuu ijo, idouni rwaru ikoku yenitelepat, imaikini ekekiror Isimael,
Eraun ŋesi bala etuko kotuŋa, esurokini akekan ŋinituŋanan, ido akan naka ŋinituŋanan esurokini ŋes; iboienenei ŋesi kaneejaas ikekinacan kere.”
Komaik ekiror loka EJAKAIT lokineras kaŋes ebe, “Irai ijo Edeke loitei”: ebe da, “Aseseni kereka eoŋ ŋol loketei kane da?”
Ŋes kemaikinere ekicoi Beer-lakai-roi;
Kodaunite Aburam ikar akaisakany kauni ka lukanykape naaurikinia Kagar Aburam Isimael.
Etutuki eoŋ akaitutuket kajo, kesupui da noi adepar.”
Kibiror Aburam ebuburia: kinera Edeke kaŋes atiar,
“Eoŋ da, koany, ejai aitutuketeka kajo, iraun ijo da papa loka atekerin nuipu.
Mam bobo kinyaritai ekonikiror Aburam, konye eraun do ekonikiror Aburaam; naarai ketuluo jo papa loka atekerin nuipu.
Kesupui da noi adepar, ketuluori jo atekerin, elomunete da ikabakan kotomakon.
Etogogoŋi da akaitutuket eoŋ ka jo ka akoniwur naetupanakini, anatar aturioke kere, araun aitutuket namam enaŋi, araun Edeke kaneijai ijo ka akoniwur da naetupanakini.
Ido kainakin jo ka akoniwur naetupanakini akwap nakiloseneneo, akwap kere naka Kanaan, airum ikar kere; Eoŋ da araun Edekekec.”
Na ŋes akaitutuket, nairicenenete, kidiŋ eoŋ ka jo ka akoniwur naetupanakini; Ekepeneneo ŋolikiliokit kotomakus.
Ido kikepeneneo amuny naka ekiliokanekus; eraun da ŋin aanyunet naka aitutuket kidiŋ eoŋ ka yes.
Ekepeneneo kotomakus yenedaunit apaarasia akanykauni; ŋolikiliokit kotoma aturiokus, loewurikinio okal, ka ŋol da lokitwegelete imo kapesan, lomere loka aurikon.
Loeurio kokalekon, ka ŋol da loegweleneneo kapesanakon, ibusakinit akepio. Ejaununei da akaitutuket toma awatekus araun aitutuket namam edaun.
Ekiliokit da lomam ekepep amuny naka ekiliokaneke, abil ŋol aitutuketeka, egelario etuŋanan ŋol kotuŋake.”
Kotema Edeke Aburaam atiar, “Akoniberu Sarai, mam bobo inyarit ekekiror Sarai, konye Sara
Eoŋ da esirereŋi ŋes, ido kainakini jo ikoku kamake: eebo, esirereŋi ŋes: eraun da toto naka atekerin; elomunete ikabakan luka ituŋa kotomake.”
Kopaari Aburaam aibirokin ebuburia, kokieni, kinera kotauke ebe, “Euruuni ŋopeŋol ikoku loadau ikar akwatat? Ido ka Sara da naadau ikar akaisakanykaoŋon, eurie?”
Kotema Aburaam Edeke atiar, “Arai gwai Isimael eraun lokajaran kakonyenekon!”
Kotema Edeke atiar, “Mam, konye kiwurikin Sara aberukon ikoku; imaikini ijo da ekekiror Isaak;
Kanuka Isimael keira jo; koany, esireren ŋes, ido esupui, ido eyatakin noi; euriei ijaka itomon ka luarei, ido etuluori ateker naepol.
Konye etogogoŋi akaitutuket kama ejai Isaak, lokiwurikini Sara kapak kanapekana kokaru kaloebunit.”

Koya Aburaam ikekoku Isimael, ka ŋul kere luaurikinio okaleke, ka ŋul kere luagwelio kikeboro, ŋolikiliokit kotoma otuŋa lukokal loka Aburaam, kokep kes kapaaran kaŋin amuny naka ekiliokanekec, kwape ketemaria ŋes Edeke.
Kodaunite Aburaam ikar akaisakanykaoŋon ka lukanykaoŋon, nakekepere amuny naka ekiliokaneke.
Adaunit okokuke da Isimael ikar itomon ka luuni, nakekepere amuny naka ekiliokaneke.
Kapaaran kaŋin kokepai Aburaam ka okokuke Isimael.
Ikiliok kere lukokaleke ka luaurikinio okal, ka ŋul lukitwegelenenete imo kiboro, kokepai nepepe kaŋes,
Kiteluo akekonye kite, ido koany, ebwoete ituŋa iuni kakonyeneke. Nakeanyunia kes, koker kokek loka ewema airiamun kakes; kisudedikin kwap.
Kotema atiar, “Wu EkaJAKAIT, arai adumunit asianut kakonyenekon, keŋaiŋait, sirikitubor ainac ekonibulesit.
Aso cabo koinun adisikipi, kilotasi akusikeje, kiyenut kotolim loka ekitoi.
Ayauni eoŋ idionyamat, kolakaros itauonokus: kosodete konyet kotuboros. Naarai idolut neejai ekusibulesit.” Kotemasi atiar, “Kiswama kwaŋin kwape ibalar.”
Kisunya Aburaam alomar owema neejai Sara, kotema atiar, “Kisunyak kitemok aitemisio auni nuka akiria nuidicic, kigurunio atap.”
Koker Aburaam osipan, koyau itaok yenejok yenirosok, koinak ekejaanakinan; kisunyak aipoore.
Koyaŋa akinyet ka akile, ka itaok yenetemokinit, kibwaik akonyenekec; kobwo koapie kakes kotolim loka ekitoi, konyama.
Kotema atiar, “Abeit aboŋuni eoŋ neijai kedol apak; ido koany, euruuni akoniberu Sara ikoku yenitelepat.” Kiira Sara kokek loka ewema lokejai kauken.
Ido kemojoŋito noi Aburaam ka Sara, kokokosanito ikar luipu noi: mam bobo Sara ajai kwape ejaar eipone loka aŋor.
Kokieni Sara kotauke atiar, “Kadau amojoŋ kwana, ekajakait da emojoŋit, eyalamikin kereka eoŋ?”
Kotema EJAKAIT Aburaam atiar, “Inyo bo etekien Sara, ebe, ‘Auruuni kereka eoŋ ikoku amojoŋit?’
Ejai ibore yenikaruni EJAKAIT? Aboŋuni eoŋ neijai kapaarasia kaŋun, kedolo apak, ido euruuni Sara esapat.”
Kosodi Sara aipeg ebe, “Mam akienit”; naarai akuriana. Kotema ŋes atiar, “Mam; konye ikienit.”
Konyout ituŋa kanen, kiteluosi Sodom; kinyamak Aburaam kes orot.
Kotema EJAKAIT atiar, “Emunonikini kereka eoŋ Aburaam ŋin naeswamai?
Naarai abeit eraun Aburaam ateker naepol nakagogoŋ, isirereŋio da atekerin kere nuka akwap kotomakeŋ.
Naarai ajenu ŋes kanuka nu, tetere icorakini ikedwe ka lukokaleke luetupakinete, tetere ericito erot loka EJAKAIT, aswam abeit ka etube; tetere einuni EJAKAIT Aburaam ŋun nuabu kinerak ŋes.”
Kotema EJAKAIT atiar, “Naarai epol noi aimony naka Sodom ka Gomora, ido naarai eroko noi adiakanaretakec;
Mere ber kejesar kaany arai eswamaata cut kwape ejaar aimony naabu kodol neajai; arai mere kwaŋin, ajenuni.”
Kikunyak Aburaam kotema atiar, “Imudiari kereka ijo ikadolitok nepepe kikaronok?
Elemuni ejaas ikadolitok akaisakany toma ore: imudiari komam itimi aibois kanuka ikadolitok akaisakany luejaas toma?
Tiesil ijo aswam kwaŋin, aiar ikadolitok nepepe kikaronok; tiesilok ŋun; mam Ekatubon loka akwap kere iswamai nuka adolit?”
Kotema EJAKAIT atiar, “Arai kadum koSodom ikadolitok akaisakany kotoma ore, etimi aibois kere kanukec.”
Koboŋok Aburaam kotema atiar, “Koany, atamak eoŋ einer ka EJAKAIT, karaida karai eoŋ apua ka ekurwon:
Elemuni emamuunete ikany kotoma ikadolitok akaisakany; imudiari ere kere naarai amamuut ikany?” Kotema atiar, “Mam amudiari, arai kadum kanen akaisaoŋon ka lukany.”
Kinera kaŋes bobo atiar, “Elemuni etakanunete akaisaoŋon.” Kotema atiar, “Mam eswamai kwaŋin kanuka ŋul akaisaoŋon.”
Kotema atiar, “Keŋaiŋait, wu EJAKAIT, sirikinyunyurikin, mere kener bobo: elemuni kotakanut akaisauni kanen.” Kotema atiar, “Mam eswamai kwaŋin arai kadum akaisauni.”
Kotema atiar, “Koany, atamak eoŋ einer ka EJAKAIT: elemuni kotakanut akaisaarei kanen.” Kotema atiar, “Mam amudiari kanuka ŋul akaisaarei.”
Kotema atiar, “Keŋaiŋait, EJAKAIT, sirikinyunyurikin, mere kener bobo irwan na bon: elemuni kotakanut itomon.” Kotema atiar, “Mam amudiari kanuka ŋul itomon.”
Kolot EJAKAIT, napekedaunia ŋesi einer ka Aburaam: koboŋo Aburaam aiboisike.

Kotema atiar, “Koany, ikajaka, keŋaiŋaito, kopautu togo loka ebulesitikus, koperoto aitiwalar akwap, kilotata akusikejen, kodilokis anyoun tupuruc, koloto.” Kotemasi atiar, “Mam, konye kiperi isio orot aitiwalar akwap.”
Kimaumau kes noi: kopaut oreke, kolomasi togoke; kipejo kes, kopeik imugatin lumam etubuunitoi, konyamata.
Konye eroko kepero, ituŋa lukore loko Sodom, idwe ka lukapolok, ituŋa kere luapote kaiboisio kere, kolukut etogo:
Kiworoto Lot kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Alubo ituŋa lualomut orekon kakuare kana? Kitolom kes nekija isio kajena kes.”
Koloma Lot kiŋa neejaas kesi, kogolok ekek ekaukau.
Kotema atiar, “Keŋaiŋaitos, ikakinacan, sirikiswamata aronis naetia nen.

Koany, kija eoŋ kadweka aarei numam ejenete ekiliokit, keŋaiŋaito, mere ketolom ŋun neijaas yesi, kiswamakis yesi kes kwape itojokitotor kakonyekus; konye ituŋa kwi mam iswamakinete akirot; naarai apotu kesi otolim loka eswika.”
Kotemasi atiar, “Irwa.” Kotemasi atiar, “Ekesa lo loabwotuni, ŋes do ekoto araun ekatubon; aso do kiswamakini jo nueroko aitelekarit ŋul.” Koridakis noi etuŋanan, ŋes Lot, kikunyakis apakar ekirigi.
Konye ituŋa kwi koriosi akaninikec, kitolomut Lot togo neajaas kesi, kogolokis ekirigi.
Kitumudukata akonye nuka ituŋa kaluajaas okek, ludidik ka lukapolok kere; kopasa kes amoot ekek.
Naarai kimudiari aibois na, naarai eyatakin noi aimonyokec kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, ido EJAKAIT ŋes kijuku sio amudiar.”
Koloma Lot kinerata kimurakake, luakotosi aimany adweke, kotema atiar, “Konyout, kolomasi kaibois kana, naarai emudiari EJAKAIT ere lo.” Kosubite ŋes bala emoc kama ejaas ikamurakake.
Kiwala akwap kisuburikis imalaikan Lot, kobalas atiar, “Konyou, koyaŋa akoniberu, ka adwekon kere nuejaas ne; kinyek amudiario kotoma aiticanet naka ere.”
Konye kiyap; kitiŋata ituŋa akanike, ka akan naka aberuke, ka akan naka adweke aarei; kitimit EJAKAIT ŋes; kitolomut kibwaikis ŋes kiŋa naka ere.
Kosodi kedaun aitolomun cut, kotema atiar, “Koker kinye atwanare; mam inoliari kaukon ido mam iyapi kotoma apuuton kere; kokeria oroŋat kinye amudiario.”
Kotema Lot atiar, “Okwe ekajakait, mere kwaŋin.
Koany adum ekonibulesit asianut kakonyenekon, ido itopolo akoniitim nakitodik eoŋ, kitajar kenye atwanare; mam apedori akeriar oroŋat ŋol, kenyek aronis adolokin kasodi atwanare.
Koany, ere ŋol ŋes loeapie akeriar, ido ŋes ere loedit; okwe kakeria nen, (mam edit?) ido eŋaleun akaijar.”
Kotema atiar, “Koany, kacamak kotoma akirot ŋin da, mam amudiari ere loibala ijo.
Kisunyite, kokeria nen; naarai mam apedori aisub akirot aitodol neidolio nen.” Ŋes enyaritere ere ŋol ekekiror Soar.
Keniunit akoloŋ nakedolio Lot Soar.
Komudia ireria ŋul, ka Apuuton kere, ka ŋul kere lueboienenete koreria, ka iboro kere luabwanete kakwap.
Konye koŋolia aberuke kau, etupit ŋes, koluor epir loka abalaŋ.
Kodil Aburaam tupuruc kolot aibois neabwoia ŋesi kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT:
Kosesen Sodom ka Gomora, ka akwap kere naka Apuuton, kireik, ido koany, kopuriei apuru naka akwap bala apuru naka eupa.
Kotema nakiyai nadidi atiar, “Amojoŋ papawok, emamei da etuŋanan kotoma akwap loelomari mama kija oni kwape ejaar eipone loka akwap kere.
Aso ketamatata papawok ajon, kaperoto kaŋes, kedara aur naka papawok.”
Kitamatata papakec ajon akuare ŋin; koloma nakiyai kopero kapapake: mam abu kojen kwape aperio, karaida kwape anyounio.
Kosodi kapaaran kanaatupakini kotema nakiyai nadidi atiar, “Koany, kwape abu kaperio bian kapapawok, ketamatata bobo ajon akuare na da; ko loma ijo da koperoto kaŋes, kedara aur naka papawok.”
Kitamatata bobo papakec ajon akuare ŋin, konyou nadidi, kopero kaŋes; mam abu kojen kwape aperio, karaida kwape anyounio.
Kwaŋin abu Lot kourik adweke kere.
Kouru nakiyai ikoku yenitelepat, komaik ekekiror Moab, ŋol ŋes papakec loka Imoabin kiton lolo.
Kouru nadidi da ikoku yenitelepat komaik ekekiror Ben-ami; ŋol ŋes papa loka idwe luka Amon kiton lolo.
Kinera Aburaam nuka Sara aberuke ebe, “ŋes kinacika.” Ido kiyakia Abimelek ekabaka loka Gerar, koyaŋa Sara.
Kobu Edeke mama ejai Abimelek kotoma airuja naka akuare, kolimok ebe, “Koany, irai ijo bala ekatwan, kanuka aberu naibu koyaŋa, naarai ejai ŋes okilenike.”
Ido eroko Abimelek ikunyakina neejai ŋesi; kotema atiar, “EJAKAIT, ibuni aiar ateker karaida kedolit?
Mam abu elopet kotema atiar, ‘Ŋes kinacika’? Aberu da alopet kotema atiar, ‘Ŋes onaceka.’ Eswamai eoŋ ŋin ketau loedolit, ka akanin nuemameete aronis.”
Kolimok Edeke ŋes kairujasit ebe, “Eebo, ajeni ebe iswamai ŋun ketau loedojit, ŋes ketikokinia kinye amunaun kaneajai eoŋ: ŋes da kesimikia atiror ŋes.
Aso kinyaka aberu naka etuŋanan, naarai erai ŋesi enabi, ŋes da kilipakini, ijo da ijari; konye arai mam inyakarit, kojen ebe mam iswaki atwanare, ijo ka luijaatar kere.”
Konyou Abimelek tupuruc sek, konyarau ikekejaanakinak kere, kolimok ŋun kere akikec: kokuriakaros ituŋa noi.
Konyarau Abimelek Aburaam, kiŋit ebe, “Kiswamak anyoika? Adiaka anyoika kamakon, tape kiinuni eoŋ ka akajakanut da adiakaret naepol? Kiswamak numam ibusakinit aiswamakinio.”
Kotema Abimelek Aburaam atiar, “Ibu koany anyoika, nukiinakinete aswam kwaŋin?”
Kotema Aburaam atiar, “Naarai abu kaomite ebe, emamei cut aiyoŋ Edeke kaibois kana; ido da kapedorete aiar eoŋ kanuka akaberu.
Abeit erai kinacika, akoku naka papaka, konye mere akoku naka totoka; koraun do akaberu.
Kosodi ketolot Edeke anyoun kotogo loka papaka, kasodi alimokin ŋes ebe, ‘Na ŋes arerenukon nakitodianakini eoŋ: kotoma ŋiniibois nakidolenenei kinerenena mama ajai eoŋ ebe erai onaceka.’ ”
Koyaŋa Abimelek amerekekin ka aituk ka ibulesin ka abulesin, koinak Aburaam, kinyakak ŋes akeberu Sara.
Kotema Abimelek atiar, “Koany, akwapuka ejai akonyenekon; kiboikin neikoto ijo kere.”
Kolimok Sara da atiar, “Koany, ainak onacekon iboro elukumit luka epuesa: koany, ŋes yenirapakina akonyenekon kama ejaas ŋul kere luejaas kajo; ido toma akiro kere kigeli.”
Kilip Aburaam Edeke; kitaŋaleu Edeke Abimelek ka aberuke, ka abulesinike; kouriata idwe.
Naarai kegolokinit EJAKAIT akoikes kere nukokalloka Abimelek, kanuka Sara aberu naka Aburaam.
Kopotuu Sara, kourik Aburaam ikoku yenitelepat, kemojoŋ, toma apak ŋin nakelimokinit ŋes Edeke.
Komaik Aburaam ikoku yenaurikini Sara ekekiror Isaak.
Kokep Aburaam okokuke Isaak kedau apaarasia akanykauni, kwape ecorakinitor ŋes Edeke.
Ido adaunit Aburaam ikar akwatat eurikinio ŋes ikokuke Isaak.
Kotema Sara atiar, “Ketekien Edeke, ŋinituŋanan yeniirari kikienenei keoŋ.”
Kotema atiar, “Iŋai ŋol lo tiketema Aburaam ebe, ‘Ebuni Sara aitanak ikedwe’? Naarai aurik ŋes ikoku yenitelepat kamoionuke.”
Kopoloor ikoku, kojaka: kipo Aburaam epucit loepol kapaaran kanaajakaria Isaak.
Koany Sara ikoku yenika Kagar Amisiriat yenaurikini Aburaam, isekelo.
Ŋes ketemaria Sara Aburaam atiar, “Kireŋea abulesit na ka ikekoku, naarai ikoku yenika abulesit kana mam epedori araun ekeruman nepepe kikakoku, ŋes Isaak.”
Korau akirot ŋin naapagal noi kakonyen nuka Aburaam kanuka ikekoku.
Kotema Edeke Aburaam atiar, “Kinye araut naepagal kakonyenekon kanuka ikoku, ido kanuka abulesitikon; kere nukilimokini Sara, kopupununei eporotoke; naarai kotoma Isaak ŋes enyaraununere akoniwur;
Ido kotoma okoku loka abulesit elomuni ateker, naarai ŋes aurikon.”
Konyou Aburaam tupuruc sek, kolem aimuj ka eriagi loka emukule loka akipi, koinak Kagar, kibwaik okeperike, ka ikoku da, kotwar: kolot ipasitoi toma amodiŋ naka Beer-seba.
Kikunyak, kiboikin kwap kobwatara bala apak naegumario ekojo: naarai abu kobala ebe, “Sirikete ikoku etwani.” Kiboikin kobwatara, kodelo, komony.
Kiira Edeke eporoto loka etelepat, kiworo emalaika loka Edeke Kagar ebuni kokuju, kotema atiar, “Inyo bo itururwoo ijo? Sirikikurianar; naarai eira Edeke eporoto loka etelepat kaneejai.
Konyou, kitonyou etelepat, kitiŋ kakonikan; naarai abuni aituluor ŋes ateker naepol.”
Kitekweny Edeke akekonye, koany atan naka akipi; kolot kileleb akipi toma oriagi, kitamat etelepat.
Kojai Edeke nepepe ketelepat, kopoloor; kiboienenei kamodiŋ, koluor ekaguman imalia.
Kiboienenei kamodiŋ naka Paran; komanyak totoke ŋes aberu kotoma akwap nako Misiri.

Aso kiyapoikinoi kane kokiror loka Edeke ebe, Mam kimodakin eoŋ, karaida okokuka, karaida okoku loka okokuka; konye kwape ejaar asianut naabu keswamak, ijo da kiswamakinai eoŋ kwaŋin, ka akwap da nakiboieneneo.”
Kotema Aburaam atiar, “Eyapoi.”
Kotema Abimelek atiar, “Mam ajeni yenikiswamai kwaŋin; ido mam lem jo kisiiranari eoŋ, ido mam apupununei, dimarai akiirar ŋes lolo.”
Koyaŋa Aburaam amerekekin ka imoŋin koinak Abimelek; kitutukoto aitutuket kes iarei.
Kibwaik Aburaam amerekekin akanykaarei nukotoma osipan owaikec bonik.
Kotema Abimelek Aburaam atiar, “Amerekekin ŋun akanykaarei nuigitaa apoloukec inyo?”
Kotema atiar, “Iyaŋaari amerekekin ŋun akanykaarei kakanika, tetere eraun aanyunet kama ajai aitejenun ebe eoŋ aboki atan ŋin.”
Ŋes amaikinia aibois ŋin Beer-seba; naarai nen ŋes etutukioto kesi kere.
Kwaŋin kitutukoto aitutuket koBeer-seba: konyou Abimelek ka Pikol ekapolon loka ajoreke, koboŋosi akwap naka Ipilisitian.
Kiraik Aburaam epeduru toma Beer-seba, kiwonei kanen ekiror loka EJAKAIT, Edeke lomam edaun.
Kodau Aburaam apaarasia nuipu kakwap naka Ipilisitian.
Kotema atiar, “Koya kwape kwana ikokukon, ikonikoku iteluna yenimina, ŋes Isaak, kolot akwap nako Moria; koinak kaŋina araun ainakinet naicweio kotoma ediopet koroŋan lokalimokini.”
Konyou Aburaam tupuruc sek, kopetanak lupetan asigiriake, koyaŋa iarei kotoma ikatumunakake, ka Isaak da ikekoku; kibet akito nuka ainakinet naicweio, konyou, kolot aibois naabala ŋes Edeke.
Kapaaran kanakiwuniet kiteluo Aburaam akekonye, koany aibois.
Kolimok Aburaam ikekatumunak ebe, “Kosala yesi ne nepepe kasigiria, kilosi eoŋ da ka itelepat laije; kamaata kaboŋutu neijaas.”
Koyaŋa Aburaam akito nuka ainakinet naicweio, kisibwok Isaak ikekoku; koyaŋa akim ka ekileŋ kakaninike; koloto kesi luarei nepepe.
Kotema Isaak papake Aburaam atiar, “Ipapa.” Kotema atiar, “Eoŋ lo, ikakoku.” Kotema atiar, “Akim ka akito enu; konye anibo imerekek yenikainakinet naicweio?”
Kotema Aburaam atiar, “Kadumakini eoŋ Edeke imerekek yenikainakinet naicweio, ikakoku.” Koloto do kesi luarei nepepe.
Korio Aburaam akekan, kolem ekileŋ aaria ikekoku.
Kiworo emalaika loka EJAKAIT ebwoi kokuju, kobala ebe, “Aburaam, Aburaam.” Kotema atiar, “Eoŋ lo.”
Kotema atiar, “Sirikidokok akan otelepat, kwabo sirikisubak idiobore: naarai ajeni kwana kwape iyonitor Edeke, naarai mam kimikit ikokukon, ikonikoku iteluna.”
Kitonyou Aburaam akekonyen, kosesen, ido koany, kojai emerekek kauken, ikamunit amoni amumwarake: kolot Aburaam koyaŋa emerekek, koinak araun ainakinet naicweio aibois naka ikekoku.
Komaik Aburaam aibois ŋin Yawe-yire: kwape inerare aitodol lolo ebe, “Komoru loka EJAKAIT edumunere.”
Kiworo emalaika loka EJAKAIT Aburaam irwan nakiareit kokuju.
Kobala ebe, “Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Esumun kanukaŋ, naarai iswama kwaŋin, kwabo mam kimikit ikokukon, ikonikoku iteluna:
Kotoma arereŋ kesirereŋenenei jo, ka aiyat keyatanakinenei akoniwur kwape kaacer nukotoma akuj, ido kwape kasiŋe naejai ariri naka aŋolol; irumi da aurikon erute loka lukasurupokec;
Ido toma aurikon isirerenere atekerin kere nuka akwapisinei; naarai irima ekaporoto.”
Kosodi koboŋo Aburaam mama ajaas ikatumunakake, konyout kolot nepepe Beer-seba; kiboienenei Aburaam koBeer-seba.
Us ekiyaike, ka Bus onaceke; ka Kemuel papa loka Aram;
Ka Kesed, ka Kaso, ka Pilidas, ka Yidulap; ka Betuel.”
Betuel kouri Rebeka; ŋullukanykauni kes luaurikini Milika Nakor, onaceke ka Aburaam.
Abulesitike da ekekiror Reuma, ŋes da kouri Teba, ka Gakam, ka Takas, ka Maaka.
Kobut Sara ikar akwatat ka akaisaarei ka lukanykaarei; ŋul kes ikar luabu Sara kodau.
Kotwanik Sara Kiriat-aruba (ŋes Keburon) kakwap naka Kanaan; kobu Aburaam akuudian ka eibworo Sara.
Konyou Aburaam kaneejai nakatwanike, kotema idwe luka Ket atiar,
“Arai eoŋ epejonon ido ekaloton kama ijaas; koinakinai aibois nakidaanakina, koraun nakaŋ kotoma akwapukus kedaik nakatwanika, kenyek aanyunun bobo.”
Koboŋokis idwe luka Ket Aburaam kotemasi atiar,
“Kopupokinai ejakaitikos; irai ijo ejakait lokapolon kama kijaa isio: kidaik nakatwanikon toma atesinakosi naiseuni ijo kere; emamei kasio yenikimiki aijaikin aketes, aidaikin nakatwanikon.”
Konyou Aburaam, kokukokin ituŋa luka akwap kaŋin, kes idwe luka Ket.
Kinera kakes kobala ebe, “Arai ikotosi eoŋ aidaikin nakatwanika kenyek aanyunun bobo, kopupokinai, kiŋaiŋaikinai Epuron okoku loka Sokar.
Kainak abua naka Makupela, naejai ŋes, naenesit kotoma omanikorike; ketwegel etiaike kere kokidiŋikus koraun akates cut.”
Eboie Epuron kokidiŋ kidwe luka Ket, koboŋok Epuron Ekitit Aburaam, kopupete idwe luka Ket, kes kere luapotu kolomasi orute loka ere, kobala ebe,
“Mam, ejakaitika, kiirarai, kainak emanikor, ka abua da naejai toma kainak; kakonyen nuka idwe luka ikatuŋa kainak jo; kidaik nakatwanikon.”
Kokukokin Aburaam kakonyen nuka ituŋa luka akwap kaŋin.
Kotema ŋesi Epuron kopupete ituŋa luka akwap atiar, “Konye arai ikoto, keŋaiŋait, kiirarai; atacakini etiai loka emanikor; kiyu kainak, edaikini eoŋ da nakatwanika nen.”
Koboŋok Epuron Aburaam kolimok ebe,
“Ekajakait, kiirarai; emanikor etiaike isekelin
Kiira Aburaam Epuron; kitem Aburaam epuesa loalimokinit ŋes Epuron kopupete idwe luka Ket, isekelin luka epuesa akwat aoŋon, luka epuesa loetwasamaenenete ikagwelanarak kapakio kaŋun.
Araun luke kakonyen nuka idwe luka Ket, kakonyen nuka ŋul kere luapotu kolomut korute loka ereke.
Kokau kaŋun, kidaik Aburaam aberuke Sara toma abua nakotoma omanikor loka Makupela loitei Mamure (ŋes Keburon), toma akwap naka Kanaan.
Emanikor ka abua naajai toma kitebeai Aburaam kakonyen nuka idwe luka Ket araun luke cut, araun aibois nakidaanakina.
Kolimok Aburaam ekebulesit, ekapolon loka etogoke, loayanaarit kere luajaas kaŋes ebe, “Keŋaiŋait, kibwaik akonikan kwap kamurwoka.
Eoŋ da kesiyapoikini jo kama ejai EJAKAIT, Edeke loka akuj ido Edeke loka akwapisinei, ebe mam imanyakini ikakoku aberu naelomuni kotoma apesur nuko Kanaan, nukaneeboio eoŋ.
Konye ilosi akwapuka, neejaas iinacanaka, komanyak okokuka Isaak aberu kaŋina.”
Kotema ebulesit atiar, “Elemuni mam aberu iyuuni abunore keoŋ adolun akwap na; ebusakinit kereka eoŋ ainyakar okokukon akwap nakolo kibunio?”
Kotema Aburaam atiar, “Mam inyakari okokuka nepepec da.

EJAKAIT, Edeke loka akuj lokalemuni kotogo loka papaka, kakwap da nakaurikinio, ido loabu kinera keoŋ, keyapoik da kobala ebe, ‘Ainakini akoniwur akwap na’; ijukuni ŋol ekemalaika aiŋarenikin jo, imanyakini okokuka aberu naka ŋina.
Arai mam aberu iyuuni abunore kajo, emameete nukibeikinete jo kotoma aiyaposit kana, konye sirikinyaka okokuka ŋina.”
Kibwaik ebulesit akekan kwap kamurwo naka papake Aburaam, kiyapoik kanuka akirot kaŋin.
Kitukukok ikaalai kiŋa naka ere neejai atan naka akipi, napejosi, apak naeponiata aŋor aiwok akipi.
Kotema atiar, “Wu EJAKAIT, Edeke loka ejakaitika Aburaam, keŋaiŋait, koinakinai arereŋ lolo, kitodik ejakaitika Aburaam asianut.
Koany, abwoi kariri naka atan naka akipi, ido epote apesur nuka ituŋa lukore aiwok akipi;

Aso kojau kwana, apese naatemari eoŋ ebe, ‘Kooku amotikon, keŋaiŋait kamat’; kosodi ŋesi da ebe, ‘Komat, eruanakini da ikonikaalai’; koraun ŋin naiseikinit ekonibulesit Isaak; nen do ajenunia ebe itodik ekajakait asianut.”
Etemelel da apese noi, abekot namam ejeni ekiliokit; kijesar atan, kileleb amotike, kodok.
Koker ebulesit airiamun kaŋes kotema atiar, “Keŋaiŋait, ae adisikipi nuka amotikon, kamat.”
Kotema atiar, “Komat, ekajakait.” Kisunya awoun amoti, kibwaik akanike kitamat ŋes.
Kedau aitamat ŋes kotema atiar, “Aokokini ikonikaalai da, komata kimonikinos.”
Kisunya abukokin akipi nuka amotike atuba, koker bobo atan aiwok, kowokok ikekaalai kere.
Kite ŋes etuŋanan, kopala ajenun arai abu EJAKAIT kisirereŋ akelosit, arai bo mam.
Kotema atiar, “Iŋai papakon? Keŋaiŋait kolimokinai. Ejai apak ore loka papakon kapero isio?”
Kotema atiar, “Arai eoŋ apese naka Betuel okoku loka Milika, lokeurikini ŋesi Nakor.”
Kotema da atiar, “Kija kanya ka inyamat lukidaunete, ka apak da naperot.”
Kitulur etuŋanan akekou, koma EJAKAIT.
Kotema atiar, “Kituritete EJAKAIT, Edeke loka ejakaitika Aburaam, lomam eswaki aitodikin ekajakait akeitim ka akebeit; ka eoŋ da, abu EJAKAIT keŋarenik korot kiton togo loka iinacan luka ejakaitika.”
Koker apese, kolimok lukotogo loka totoke kwape ejaatar akiro ŋun.
Ido ajai Rebeka onaceke, ekekiror Laban; koker neejai etuŋanan, aisiriama ŋes katan.

Kosodi nakeanyunia ŋesi egilut, ka aikomon kakanin nuka inacike, kiira da akiro nuka Rebeka inacike ebe, “Kalimoki etuŋanan kwaŋin”; kodol ŋesi neejai etuŋanan; ido koany, ebwoi kidunyasi kikaalai kaneajai atan.
Kotema atiar, “Kolom ijo lokisirereŋit EJAKAIT; inyo bo ibwoia kokiŋa? Naarai etemonok eoŋ etogo, ka apak da naka ikaalai.”
Koloma etuŋanan togo, kolac ikaalai; koinak anya ka inyamat kanuka ikaalai, ka akipi ailosia akekejen ka akejen nuka ituŋa kaluajaas nepepe kaŋes.
Kibwaikinai aimuj akonyeneke ebe, “Kimuj.” Konye kotema atiar, “Mam eoŋ emuji, eriŋa kelimuno nukejukunitere.” Kotema atiar, “Kolim.”
Kotema atiar, “Arai eoŋ ebulesit loka Aburaam.
Abu EJAKAIT kisirereŋ noi ejakaitika, ido araun lokapolon; abu koinak da ŋes isipanin luka amerekekin ka aituk, ka epuesa, ka esabu, ka ibulesin ka abulesin, ka ikaalai ka asigirian.
Abu Sara aberu naka ejakaitika kourik ŋes ikoku kemojoŋ: abu koinak ŋol kere lukejaatar.
Kesiyapoik eoŋ ejakaitika ebe, Mam imanyakini okokuka apese naka apesur nuka Ikanaanin lueboie eoŋ kakwapukec.
Konye ilosi togo loka papaka, neejai atekerika komanyak okokuka aberu.
Abu katema ejakaitika atiar, ‘Elemuni bo aberu kogir aupun keoŋ.’
Kalimok eoŋ ebe, ‘EJAKAIT, Ioalosenenei eoŋ kakonyeneke, iyakiari ekemalaika nepepe kajo, isirereŋi akonilosit, imanyakini da okokuka aberu naelomuni koinacanaka kotogo loka papaka.
Kwaŋin mam nukibeete jo kanuka akaiyaposit, arai kidol oinacanaka; ido arai mam kes kiinakinete aberu, emameete nukibeikinete jo kanuka aiyapositika.’
Koany, abwoi eoŋ kariri naka atan naka akipi; aso kojaut kwana, ebe, apese naelomuni aiwok, naabala eoŋ ebe, “Koinakinai akipi kamotikon kamat, keŋaiŋait”;
Kosodi ŋesi da ebe, “Komat ijo, ido awokokini eoŋ ikonikaalai da”: koraun ŋin aberu naeseikinit EJAKAIT okoku loka ejakaitika.’
Kisunya ŋesi awoun amotike kokeperike, kotema atiar, ‘Komat, eruanakini ikonikaalai da’; kasodi aimat, kiruanak ikaalai da.
Abu keŋit ŋes ebe, ‘Irai ijo akoku naka iŋai?’ Kotema atiar, ‘Akoku naka Betuel, okoku loka Nakor, loaurikini ŋes Milika’; kebwaik egilut okumesike, ka aikomon da akaninike.
Ketulur akouka kwap, kama EJAKAIT, ketur EJAKAIT, Edeke loka ejakaitika Aburaam; loabu keteten eoŋ korot ayaŋaar apese naka onaceke loka ejakaitika kanuka okokuke.
Natikwana da arai iyuunitos asubakin ejakaitika asianut ka abeit, kolimokinai; arai mam, kolimokinai; kebelokin teten, arai kediany.”
Koany, ejai Rebeka akonyenekon, koyaŋa ŋes, kolot, koraun ŋesi aberu naka okoku loka ejakaitikon kwape atemaria EJAKAIT.”
Kosodi kiira ebulesit loka Aburaam akecekiro, kokukokin kwap mama ejai EJAKAIT.
Koyau ebulesit inapen luka epuesa, ka luka esabu, ka igoen, koinak Rebeka; koinak da onaceke ka totoke iboro luka akais nuipu.
Konyamata, komatata, ŋesi ka ituŋa luajaatar, kiwalakis; konyout tupuruc, kotema atiar, “Kotwarai eoŋ, kalot neejai ejakaitika.”
Kotema onace loka apese ka totoke atiar, “Kosal ber apese kasio adaun apaarasia adis, arai atomon: kosodi konyet alosit.”
Kotema atiar, “Sirikiisibo eoŋ, naarai abu EJAKAIT kisirereŋ akalosit; kotwarai eoŋ kalot neejai ejakaitika.”
Kotemasi atiar, “Kinyarauni apese, keŋitata nuelomunete kaitukuke.”
Konyaraut Rebeka, kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Ikoto alosit nepepe ketuŋanan kalo?” Kotema atiar, “Alosi.”
Kotwarata Rebeka kinacikec, ka akasaanike, ka ebulesit loka Aburaam, ka iketuŋa.
Kilipakis Rebeka arereŋ, kotemasi atiar, “Inacikosi, korau ijo toto naka ilukumin luka ilukumin itomon, akoniwur da kirumia erute loka ŋul kaluelaete kes.”
Konyou Rebeka, kapesuruke, kibwanenoto ikaalai, kotupasi etuŋanan; koyaŋa ebulesit Rebeka, kolot.
Koloma Isaak omanikor eboŋ aomoom; kiteluo akekonye, kite, ido koany, eponitos ikaalai.
Kiteluo Rebeka akekonye: keanyu Isaak kodok kokaalai.
Kotema ŋesi ebulesit atiar, “Iŋai bo etuŋanan ŋol loitorunit omanikor airiamun kaoni?” Kotema ebulesit atiar, “Ŋes ejakaitika.” Kitiŋ ekegoe lokimukos, kimuko akekonyen.
Kolimok ebulesit Isaak akiro kere nuabu kiswama.
Kitoloma Isaak Rebeka owema loka Sara totoke, koyaŋa ŋes, korau akeberu; komina ŋes; kitalakarite Isaak nakedaunia totoke atwanare.
Kosodi Aburaam aimany aceberu, ekekiror Ketura.
Kouri ŋin Simuran ka Yokusan, ka Medan, ka Midian, ka Isibak ka Sua.
Yokusan kouri Seba ka Dedan. Idwe luka Dedan kes Asurim ka Letusim ka Leumin.
Bwe luka Midian; Epa ka Eper, ka Kanok, ka Abida, ka Eludaa. Ŋul kere kes idwe luka Ketura.
Koinak Aburaam Isaak kere luajaatar.
Konye idwe luka abulesin, luajaatar Aburaam, koinak Aburaam kes ainakineta: kitonyou kes kama ejai Isaak okokuke, eroko ŋesi ejari, kolototo kide akwap nakokide.
Nu kes apaarasia nuka ikar luka aijar naka Aburaam nuabu kobut, ikar akwatat ka akaisakanykaarei ka lukany.
Kojal Aburaam aijar, kotwana kodaunite akokosan ejok, komoionite noi, kodoloto ikekar; koyaŋaarai mama ejaas iketuŋa.
Ikedwe Isaak ka Isimael kidaikis ŋes toma abua naka Makupela, toma omanikor loka Epuron okoku loka Sokar Ekitit, loitei Mamure;
Emanikor loetwegelete idwe luka Ket Aburaam; kidaikinai nen Aburaam ka aberuke Sara.
Kosodi kedau Aburaam atwanare kisirereŋ Edeke Isaak okokuke; kiboienenei Isaak koBeer-lakai-roi.
Lu kes ikiroria luka odwe luka Isimael, kwape ejaatar ikiroriakec, kwape ejaatar aturiokec: ekiyai loka Isimael ŋes Nebaiot; ka Kedar, ka Adubeel ka Mibusam.
Ka Misima, ka Duma, ka Masa;
Kadad, ka Tema, jetur, ka Napis, ka Kedema;
ŋul kes idwe lutelepai luka Isimael ido ŋul kes ikiroriakec kwape ejaatar ireriakec, ido kwape edukuroto iwemaikec, ijaka itomon ka luarei kwape ajaatar akecetekerin.
Ikar da luka Isimael luabu kobut, ikar akwatat ka akaisauni ka lukanykaarei; kojal aijar, kotwana; koyaŋaarai mama ejaas iketuŋa.
Kiboioto anyoun koKabila aitodol Sur naitei Misiri; bala ilosi Asuria; eboienenei kaneajaas ikeinacan kere.
Ido abu Isaak kodaunite ikar akaisaoŋon komanya Rebeka, akoku naka Betuel, Esuriat loka Padan-aram, inacike ka Laban Esuriat, araun akeberu.
Kiŋaiŋa Isaak EJAKAIT kanuka akeberu, naarai arai arakan; kiira EJAKAIT aiŋainaitoike, kopotuu akeberu Rebeka.
Kopegasi idwe kotoma akoikike; kotema atiar, “Arai ikote nen, kanukinyo apotio eoŋ?” Kolot ŋesi aiŋit EJAKAIT.
Kolimok EJAKAIT ŋes atiar,
“Ejaas atekerin aarei toma akoikikon.
Ido atekerin aarei epote atiak napeelomunete kaliligetekon;
Ateker adiopet da itelekari ateker ace kagogoŋ;
Ido lokapolon ijaanakini lodidi.”
Kedoloto apaarasia nuka aidounike, koany, ajaas imwatok akoikike.
Kolom yenisodit erai yeneren akuanake kere, koeekite bala anapito naka ajul; komaikis ekekiror Esau.
Kokau kolom onaceke, itiŋit akekan atitibat naka Esau; komaikinai ekekiror Yakob;
Komina do Isaak Esau naarai anyamenenei lumejanake; Rebeka da komina Yakob.
Kipo Yakob emanor; kolom Esau kais, ilworuna noi:
Kotema Esau Yakob atiar, “Keŋaiŋait, kitanyamai emanor ŋol loereŋ, naarai elworuna cut.” Ŋes enyaritere ekekiror Edom.
Kotema Yakob atiar, “Kitwegelai lolo akonipolou.”
Kotema Esau atiar, “Koany, eapie eoŋ atwanare, ido keŋarakini eoŋ apolou biai?”
Kotema Yakob atiar, “Kiyapoikinoi lolo.” Kiyapoik: kitwegel Yakob akepolou.
Koinak Yakob Esau atap ka emanor loka imare; konyam, komat, konyou, kolot; kwaŋin amwania Esau akepolou.
Kitaanyikin EJAKAIT ŋes, kotema atiar, “Mam ilosi Misiri; kiboikin toma akwap nakalimokin:
Kiboienenei kakwap kana, eboienenei eoŋ da kajo, ido kesirereŋenenei, naarai kainakini jo ka aurikon akwapin nu kere; etogogoŋi da aiyaposit naabu keyapoik Aburaam papakon;
Ido esupui akoniwur kwape kaacer nuka akuj, ainakini da akoniwur akwapin nu kere; toma akoniwur da ŋes esirerenio atekerin kere nuka akwapisinei.
Naarai arimarit Aburaam ekaporoto, aricenenei nualimonokin, aicorakinetaka, akiroka, ka ikakisila da.”
Kiboienenei Isaak kotoma Gerar.
Kiŋitata ŋes ituŋa luka nen nuka akeberu; kotema atiar, “Ŋes kinacika”; naarai akuriana einer ebe, “Akaberu”; “elemuni ituŋa luka nen kaara eoŋ kanuka Rebeka; naarai etemelel.”
Kosodi kedau apak naepol, kosesen Abimelek, ekabaka loka Ipilisitian kotoma adirisa, kite, ido koany Isaak ebolias kakeberu Rebeka.
Konyarau Abimelek Isaak kotema atiar, “Koany, abeit erai akoniberu; kanukinyo ibalar ebe, ‘Erai kinacika?’ ” Kotema Isaak atiar, “Naarai aomit ebe, ‘Elemuni katwana kanukeŋ.’ ”
Kotema Abimelek atiar, “Anyoika nu nukiswamak sio? Tikeperoto ediopet kotuŋa kaberukon, komam ejeni, ti ijo kitagwaik sio akirot.”
Kicorak Abimelek ituŋa kere kinera atiar, “Ŋol loetirori etuŋanan lo arai akeberu eario do.”
Koraun etuŋanan loepol, kiyatanakin aitodol nearaunor ŋesi loepol noi.
Ajaas ŋes isipanin luka amerekekin ka luka aituk, ka ibulesin luipu; koliliata Ipilisitian.
Apotu Ipilisitian konwokanasi atanin kere nuapotu ibulesin luka papake kobokata, kapaarasia nuka Aburaam papake, kilelebata alup.
Kotema Abimelek Isaak atiar, “Konyou kanekija isio; naarai igogoŋ ijo aitelekarit sio.”
Konyou Isaak kibubuk ewemake toma aditot naka Gerar, kiboikin nen.
Kowad Isaak atanin nuabokitai kotoma apaarasia nuka Aburaam papake; naarai apotu Ipilisitian konwokanasi ketwana Aburaam; komaanak ikecekiroria kwape kemaanakinitor papake.
Kobokata ibulesin luka Isaak toma aditot ŋin, koanyut kanen atan naka akipi nuibulubulas.
Kopegata ikecokok luka Gerar ka ikecokok luka Isaak, kobalas ebe, “Akosikipi nu.” Komaik atan ekekiror Esek
Kobokata atan ace; ŋin da kopegatatar. Komaik ekekiror Situna.
Konyou kanen, kobok atan ace; mam ŋin aponi kopegare, komaik ekirorike Rekobot,
Konyou kanen kolot Beer-seba.
Kitaanyikin EJAKAIT kakuare kaŋin, kotema atiar, “Eoŋ Edeke leka Aburaam papakon; sirikikurianar, naarai ajai eoŋ nepepe kajo, kesirereŋi, eyatanakini da akoniwur kanuka Aburaam ekabulesit.”
Kodukok nen etem, kiwone ekiror loka EJAKAIT, kibubuk nen ekewema; nepenen da ŋes abokikinete ibulesin luka Isaak atan.
Kotema Isaak atiar, “Kanukinyo iponitotor neajai, naarai kilaitos? Ido ipotu kireŋeata kamakus?”
Kotemasi atiar, “Kipou kaanyutu cut ebe ejai EJAKAIT kajo, kasodete atemar ebe, ‘Kojau ca do aiyaposit nekija oni kidiŋikosi kajo,’ ketutukoto kajo.
Kinyek ijo aitican sio, kwape mam sio kitiroritor jo, kwape da mam sio kikonakinitor jo amodiokirot nabarai ajokis bon, ido kipou katwarata jo kainapakina; irai do ijo lokisirereŋit EJAKAIT.”
Kipoik epucit, konyamata, komatata.
Kodilokis anyoun tupuruc sek, kiyaponokinos. Kotwar Isaak kes, koloto kainapakina.
Kosodi kapaaran kaŋin, kopotu ibulesin luka Isaak kolimokis nuka atan naabokitos kesi, kolimokis ebe, “Kiany akipi.”
Komaik Siba: ŋes enyaritere ekiror loka ere Beer-seba aitodol lolo.
Kitakadikis itauon luka Isaak ka Rebeka.
Kotema atiar, “Koany, amojoŋ eoŋ, mam ajeni apaaran naatwania.
Aso kwana keŋaiŋait, kitiŋ lumeias, ekonieoe, ka akonikabwa, kolot ais, komejak imejauna;
Kitemok akiriŋ naejijim, kwape akotor, koinu, kanyam; kasodi kelipak jo arereŋ eroko eoŋ ketwana.”
Kiira Rebeka nueneras Isaak kaEsau ikekoku. Kolot Esau ais amejaun imejauna, ka ayaun da.
Kolimok Rebeka Yakob ikekoku ebe, “Koany, apup papakon elimokini onacekon Esau ebe,
‘Koinunai imejauna kitemok akiriŋ naejijim, kanyam, kelipak jo arereŋ kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT eroko eoŋ ketwana.’
Aso ikakoku, kiira ekaporoto kwape ejaatar ŋun nukecorakini.
Kolot kwana osipan loka akinei, koinu ikaalei iarei luejok; etemokini eoŋ da kes araun akiriŋ naejijimikini papakon, kwape ekotor:
Iinari ijo papakon, konyam, kosodi kilipak jo arereŋ eroko ketwana.”
Kotema Yakob totoke Rebeka atiar, “Koany, erai onaceka Esau etuŋanan loecekit, konye arurut eoŋ.
Elemuni papaka kararapana, araun eoŋ da ekeŋalan kamake; kasodi ailamakinio kwabo mere aisirereŋio.”
Kotema totoke atiar, “Kabeik eoŋ akoniilamakinio, ikakoku; na bon, kiira ekaporoto, ape koomikinai.”
Kolot, koom, koinu totoke: kitemok totoke akiriŋ naejijim, kwape akotor papake.
Kolem Rebeka inapen luejok luka Esau ekiyaike, luajaas kaŋes togo, kitanap ŋul Yakob okokuke lodidi:
Kitanapanak imukulen luka ikaalei akaninike, omurisiŋike da nearurut.
Koinak okokuke Yakob akiriŋ naejijim ka inyamat luetemokinit akaninike.
Kobu neejai papake, kotema atiar, “Ipapa.” Kobala ebe, “Eoŋ lo; iŋai bo ijo, ikakoku?”
Kotema Yakob papake atiar, “Eoŋ Esau ekiyaikon; ido eswama kwape ibu kicorakinia; keŋaiŋait, konyou, kiboikin, konyam imejaunaka, kosodi kilipak eoŋ arereŋ.”
Kotema Isaak okokuke atiar, “Ikonakini ai isunyari adumun kwaŋin, ikakoku?” Kobala ebe, “Naarai EJAKAIT Ekonideke ŋes ketusunyaari.”
Kobala Isaak Yakob ebe, “Keŋaiŋait kikunyu, kararapana, ikakoku, arai kito ijo ikakoku Esau cut cut, arai mere.”
Kikunyak Yakob neejai Isaak papake; korarapana, kiner ebe, “Eporoto erai eporoto loka Yakob, konye do akanin eraas akanin nuka Esau.”
Mam abu komisiik, naarai acekitos akaninike, kwape kakanin nuka onaceke Esau: kosodi ailipakin arereŋ.
Kotema atiar, “Ijoŋ ikokuka Esau cut?” Kosodi ebe, “Eoŋ lopelo.”
Kotema atiar, “Kisukunyikinai, kanyam imejauna yenika ikokuka, kasodi kelipak arereŋ.” Kisukunyik neejai, konyam: koinu ajon da, komat.
Kosodi Isaak papake kotema ŋes atiar, “Ikakoku, kikunyu do, konu eoŋ.”
Kikunyak konu: kiŋu elos loka anapitoke, kilipak arereŋ, kotema atiar,
“Koany, elos loka ikokuka
Esubit bala aures naka emanikor Ioisirerenit EJAKAIT:
Ka amio naka akwap,
Akima ka ajon nuipu:
Kokukonokinos jo atekerin:
Koyaite ikoniinacan,
Kokukonokinos jo odwe luka totokon:
Kilamanakinete yenikilami jo,
Ido kisirereŋenenete yenikilipakini jo arereŋ.”
Kosodi kanen, nepedauni Isaak ailipakin Yakob arereŋ, korai Yakob da anyoun ŋipeŋin kaneejai papake Isaak, kobonuni do Esau onaceke kotoma amej.
Kipo ŋesi da akiriŋ naejijim koinu papake; kotema papake atiar, “Ipapa konyou ca bo, konyam imejauna yenika okokukon, kosodi kilipak arereŋ.”
Isaak papake kotema ŋes atiar, “Iŋai bo ijo?” Kotema atiar, “Eoŋ ikonikoku yenikiyai, Esau.”
Komaran Isaak noi noi, kotema atiar, “Aso iŋai bo ŋol lokemejauni imejauna kainu: anyam eoŋ kere eroko ijo kebuno, kasodi ailipakin arereŋ? Eebo, isirereŋio ŋes da.”
Kiira Esau akiro nuka papake, kikiliar aimony noi, kiutie, kobala papake ebe, “Okwe ipapa, kilipakinai eoŋ da arereŋ, eoŋ da, ba.”
Kotema atiar, “Abu onacekon kobu iŋalai, ido kidemak arerenukon.”

Kotema atiar, “Mam aponi komaikinai ejok ekekiror Yakob? Naarai alomaki nukaŋ irwan nu kere aarei; abukadema apolouka; ido koany, natikwana da kadema akareren.” Kotema atiar, “Mam kideikinit eoŋ da adiorerene”
Koboŋok Isaak kotema Esau atiar, “Koany, adakak ŋes ayait jo, ainak da iinacanake kere mama ejai aijaanakin; ido esimii ŋes akima ka ajon, aso anyoika nukasubakini jo ikakoku?”
Kotema Esau papake atiar, “Ejai jo arereŋ adiopet bon ipapa? Okwe ipapa, kilipakinai eoŋ da arereŋ, eoŋ da ba.” Kodelo Esau, komony.
“Koany, eraun etogokon loka amio naka akwap,
ido loka akopyo nuepote kotoma akuj kokuju;
Ijaanakini da onacekon;
Kosodi ejaun nailakakinor,
Ilakilakaari ajookot komurisiŋikon.”
Kolimokinai Rebeka akiro nuka Esau okokuke lokapolon; kijuka, konyarau Yakob okokuke lodidi, kotema atiar, “Koany, onacekon Esau, toma akirokon, italakaara naarai inerunit aiar jo.
Aso kwana, okokuka, kiira ekaporoto; konyou, koker Karan mama ejai Laban onaceka;
Kiboioror kaŋes apaarasia adis aitodol neiŋoŋaror adedeŋ naka onacekon;
Aitodol neiŋoŋaror anyunyura naka onacekon, kimurwokis da nuiswamak ŋes; ŋes ejukunia anyaraun jo kaŋina; kanukinyo tikademarere eoŋ yes kere kotoma apaaran adiopet?”
Konyou, kolot Padan-Aram, togo loka Betuel papa loka totokon, komanya kaŋina aberu kapesur nuka Laban onace loka totokon.
Edeke da Lokapedor kere kisirereŋ jo, kitupu, kiyatanak, koraun erioŋet loka atekerin;
Koinak jo arereŋ naka Aburaam, ijo nepepe kakoniwur, tetere irumi akwap nakolo kitorit nakeinakini Edeke Aburaam.”
Kiyakia Isaak Yakob: kolot Padan-Aram, mama ejai Laban okoku loka Betuel Esuriat onaceke loka Rebeka toto naka Yakob ka Esau.
Koany Esau ebe elipaki Isaak Yakob arereŋ, kijuka da ŋes alosit Padan-Aram aimany kaŋina aberu; ido ilipakini arereŋ abu kicorak ebe, “Sirikimany aberu naka apesur nukoKanaan”;
Korimak Yakob papake ka totoke, kolot Padan-Aram:
Koany Esau ebe mam apesur nukoKanaan isiyalamikinito papake ka totoke;
Kolot Esau mama ejai Isimael, komany Makalat akoku naka Isimael okoku loka Aburaam, kinac naka Nebaiot araun akeberu, nepepe kaŋor nukejaas kaŋes.
Kodol aceibois korotoke, koper aitiwalar akwap, naarai alomarit akoloŋ; koyaŋa amoru adiopet naka aibois kaŋin, kicolonik akekou, kojotoor kaibois kaŋin.
Kiruja airujasit, ido koany, adoket naesipokinitai kwap, kodolite aidike kuju; ido koany, imalaikan luka Edeke kodokanarete, kodokununete da kanen.
Ido koany, ebwoi EJAKAIT kokujuke, kobala ebe, “Eoŋ EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Aburaam papaakon, ido Edeke loka Isaak: akwap naiperio, kainakini jo, nepepe kakoniwur;
Akoniwur da eluori kwape kapua naka akwap, ido isiarakin ari nakoto ka nakokide, agolitomei, ka eŋalakimak; tomakon, toma aurikon da, ŋes edumuniata atekerin kere nuka akwapisinei arereŋ.
Ido koany, ajai eoŋ kajo, kedarenenei kaneilosi kere, kenyakuni akwap na; naarai mam kenyeini aitodol neeswamaa nukalimok jo.”
Kokweny Yakob kajo, kotema atiar, “Abeit ejai EJAKAIT aibois na; mam eoŋ da ajeni.”
Koyoŋ, kotema atiar, “Esogim noi aibois na! Abeit ŋes etogo loka Edeke, ŋes erute loka akuj.”
Konyou Yakob tupuruc sek, kolem amoru naecolonit kakouke, kosipok araun epir, kobukok akinyet kuiuken.
Komaik aibois ŋin ekekiror Bet-el:
Kiyapoik Yakob aiyaposit, kobala ebe, “Arai ejaenena Edeke keoŋ, arai da kedarenenei kotoma orotoka loalosi, kainanakini da inyamat lunyaman, ka igoen lunapan.
Tetere aboŋuni togo loka papaka kainapakina, ŋes do eraunor EJAKAIT Ekadeke.
Amoru na da, naasipok araun epir, eraun etogo loka Edeke; ido kakere lukiinanakinenei mam aswaki ainanakin jo idiopet kotomon.”
Kosesen, ido koany, ajai atan mana, ido koany, koperete kanen isipanin iuni luka amerekekin koapiete katan; naarai toma atan ŋin ŋes eruenenere isipanin: amoru da naajai aituk naka atan apol noi.
Kotukonokinos isipanin kere ŋina; kikokorioroi amoru alemar kaituk naka atan, kiruata amerekekin, kinyakakis amoru aituk naka atan toma aiboisike.
Kotema Yakob atiar, “Ikainacan, lukai bo yesi?” Kotemasi atiar, “Kirai isio Ikaranin.”
Kotema kes atiar, “Ijenete Laban okoku loka Nakor?” Koboŋokis ebe, “Kijeni.”
Kotema kes atiar, “Eŋalei?” Kobalas ebe, “Eŋalei, ido koany, ebunit apeseke Rakel nepepe kamerekekin.”
Kotema atiar, “Koany, eroko erai kidiŋ paaran, eroko da apak edolo naetukonokinere ibaren; kiruata amerekekin, kolot aitadak.”
Kotemasi atiar, “Mam kipedori, aitodol neetukonokinotor isipanin kere, kikokoriosi amoru kaituk naka atan, kasodete airu amerekekin.”

Kosodi nakeanyunia Yakob Rakel akoku naka Laban onace loka totoke, ka amerekekin nuka Laban onace loka totoke, kikuny Yakob, kikokorio amoru kolema kaituk naka atan, kiruanak esipan loka Laban onace loka totoke.
Konu Yakob Rakel, kodelo.
Kolimok Yakob Rakel kwape eraar ŋesi onace loka papake, ido kwape eraar okoku loka Rebeka; koker kolimok papake.
Kotema Laban ŋes atiar, “Abeit irai ijo akoitika ido akuanaka.” Kiboikin nepepe kaŋes elap ediopet.
Kotema Laban Yakob atiar, “Naarai irai onaceka ŋes ibusakinitor ijo aijaanakin eoŋ tai? Kolimokinai, enyoin ekoniropit?”
Ajaas Laban adwe aarei, ekiror loka nakapolon Lea, ekiror da loka nadidi Rakel.
Ido anonok akonye nuka Lea, konye arai Rakel naetemelel, akonyeneke da nuisiyalamikinete.
Kominakite Yakob Rakel, kotema atiar, “Kejaanakini ikar ikanykaarei tetere kiinakini Rakel akokukon nadidi.”
Kotema Laban atiar, “Ejok ainakin jo, aitelekarit ainakin ecetuŋanan: kiboikin keoŋ.”
Kijaanak Yakob ikar ikanykaarei tetere einakinio Rakel; kosubata apaarasia bala ikidioko, kanuaminar ŋes.
Kotukonok Laban ituŋa kere luka aibois kaŋin, kipo epucit.
Kosodi kedol atiboŋ, koyaŋau Lea akokuke, koinu ŋes; koloma mamake.
Koinak Laban Silupa akebulesit mama ejai akokuke Lea araun akebulesit.
Kosodi kiwala akwap, koany ŋesi erai Lea, kotema Laban atiar, “Anyoika bo nu nukiswamak? Mam abu kejaanak jo kanuka Rakel? Aso kanukinyo kinalakinia eoŋ?”
Kotema Laban atiar, “Mam ikonio kwaŋin kotoma akwapukosi aikor nadidi ageikin nakapolon.
Kodau ber apaarasia akanykaarei nuka ŋin, kasodete konyet akorakin jo ace kanuka aijaanakin nakijaanakini eoŋ bobo, adaun ikar ice ikanykaarei.”
Kiswama Yakob kwaŋin, kodau apaarasia akanykaarei, kokorak ŋes Rakel akokuke aimany.
Koinak Laban akokuke Rakel Bilika akebulesit araun akebulesit.
Koloma neejai Rakel da, komina Rakel aitelekarit Lea, kijaanak bobo ikar ice ikanykaarei.
Kopotuu Lea, kouru ikoku yenitelepat, komaik ekekiror Reuben; kotema atiar, “Naarai abu EJAKAIT koany ikacan; kwana kaminuni do okilenika.”
Kopotuu bobo, kouru ikoku yenitelepat; kotema atiar, “Naarai abu EJAKAIT kiira kwape kalaitere, ŋes kainakinia bobo ikoku yen.” Komaik ekekiror Simeon.
Kopotuu bobo, kouru ikoku yenitelepat; kotema atiar, “Aso irwan na imorikikin do okilenika keoŋ, naarai kauriki idwe lutelepai iuni.” Ŋes kemaikinere ekekiror Lebi.
Kopotuu bobo, kouru ikoku yenitelepat; kotema atiar, “Irwan na eturi EJAKAIT.” Ŋes kemaikinere ekekiror Yuda; kinye kwaŋin aur.
Kinep anyunyura naka Yakob, kotema Rakel atiar, “Ajai eoŋ aibois naka Edeke, loimikit akonikoik aur?”
Kotema atiar, “Koany abulesitika Bilika, koloma neejai; tetere idoikini akuninika, kadum eoŋ da idwe kamake.”
Koinak Bilika abulesitike araun akeberu; koloma Yakob neejai.
Kopotuu Bilika, kourik Yakob ikoku yenitelepat.
Kotema Rakel atiar, “Katuboki Edeke akirot, eira eporotoka, kainaki da eoŋ ikoku yenitelepat.” Ŋes kemaikinere ekekiror Dan.
Kopotuu bobo Bilika abulesit naka Rakel, kourik Yakob ikoku yenitelepat yenikiareit.
Kotema Rakel atiar, “Kiwuta kinacika, auta nakagogoŋ, ido epiko.” Komaik ekekiror Naputali.
Keanyu Lea ebe enyeki kwaŋin aur, koyaŋau abulesitike Silupa koinak Yakob araun akeberu.
Kourik Silupa abulesit naka Lea Yakob ikoku yenitelepat.
Kotema Lea atiar, “Kekemer!” Komaik ekekiror Gad.
Kourik Silupa abulesit naka Lea Yakob ikoku yenitelepat yenikiareit.
Kotema Lea atiar, “Alakara! Naarai kanyaraenenete apesur nalakara.” Komaik ekekiror Aser.
Kolimok ŋes ebe, “Erai akirot naedit jo ademar eoŋ okilenika, ikoto da ademar eoŋ aiduduma nuka ikakoku?” Kotema Rakel atiar, “Ŋes eperio kajo akuare na kanuka aiduduma nuka okokukon.”
Kobu Yakob kotoma omanikor eboŋ, koloma Lea aisiriam, kobala ebe, “Kibusakinit alomun mama ajai; naarai abeit kagwelit jo kaiduduina nuka ikakoku.” Kopero kaŋes kakuare kaŋin.
Kiira Edeke Lea, kopotuu, kourik Yakob ikoku yenikikanyet yenitelepat.
Kotema Lea atiar, “Kainaki Edeke eropitika, naarai abu kainak okilenika abulesitika.” Komaik ekekiror Isakar.
Kopotuu bobo Lea, kourik Yakob ikoku yenitelepar yenikikanyetekape.
Kiner Lea ebe, “Kainakinit Edeke ainakinet naejok naka adukokinika; natikwana iboienenei do okilenika keoŋ, naarai aurik ŋes idwe lutelepai ikanykape.” Komaik ekekiror Sebulun.
Kokau kouru ikoku yenipese, komaik ekekiror Dina.
