Kiitu Edeke Rakel, kiira ŋes Edeke kopuko akoikike.
Kopotuu, kouru ikoku yenitelepat: kobala ebe, “Kalema Edeke amorositika.”
Komaik ekekiror Yosep, kobala ebe, “Keyatak Edeke ikoku ice yenitelepat.”
Koinakinai akaŋor ka ikadwe, luabu kejaanakinia jo, kalot; naarai ijeni aijaanakin naabu kejaanak jo.”
Kotema Laban ŋes atiar, “Arai ca adumunit asianut kakonyenekon, kopaik ber; naarai aomoom eoŋ ebe abu EJAKAIT kesireren kanukon.”
Kotema ŋes atiar, “Kolimokinai ekoniropit, kainak.”
Kotema atiar, “Tieni kwape kejaanakinia jo, kwape ajaatar da ikonibaren keoŋ.
Naarai ekidioko luajaas kajo eroko eoŋ kebuno, kwana eyatakinos epuaros; abu EJAKAIT kisirereŋ jo kama ameanari eoŋ kere: aso wori bo adumunia eoŋ da lukokaleka?”
Kotema atiar, “Kainak inyo?” Kotema Yakob atiar, “Sirikiinak imodiobore; konye arai kiisubak na, ecokienenei bobo ekonisipan ka aidar da.
Etori eoŋ lolo osipanikon kere, kalemanari kanen numerieik kere ka nukomolik, ka nukirionok kere kotoma amerekekin, ka nukomolik, ka numerieik kotoma akinei: ŋun eraunos ekaropit.

Kwaŋin itejenun akadolit kanukaŋ kokau, kibu ijo kanuka eropitika loejai kakonyenekon; ŋin kere yenimere yenimeri ka yenikomol yenikotoma akinei, ka lukirionok lukotoma omerekekin, arai kidum kamaka imari ŋin araun ikokwara.”
Kotema Laban atiar, “Koany, akoto kwape ejaar akonikirot.”
Kapaaran kaŋin kogelana ikorwa lupusieik ka lukomolik, ka akinei kere numerieik ka nukomolik; ŋinidiopet kere yenikapel, ka lukirionok lukotoma omerekekin, koinak kes akanin nuka ikedwe;
Kitooto kes aleŋitoit naka apaarasia auni kidiŋike ka Yakob: kicokienenei Yakob luedeunos kosipanin luka Laban.
Kosipok akito nuabu koliŋilig akonyen nuka isipanin toma alelesia nuka ataparin neamasenenete isipanin; kiwacunete kesi kepotu aimat.
Kiwacanakis isipanin akonyen nuka akito, kouriata isipanin ŋul ipusieik, imerieik, ka ikomolik.
Kotiak Yakob komerekekin ludidik, kitesesen isipanin mama ejaas ipusieik, ka lukiriokok kere lukotoma osipan loka Laban; kogela isipaninike awai, mam abu kimorikik osipan leka Laban.
Kosodi naewacununiata nukatumak kosipan, kibwaik Yakob akito akonyen nuka esipan kotoma alelesia, tetere iwacunete kaneajaas akito;
Konye arai esenyit esipan, mam ebwaanakini: kwaŋin luasenyito araas luka Laban, luatumito da araas luka Yakob.
Konyanyaar etuŋanan noi noi, kojaas kisipanin luepolok, ka abulesin ka ibulesin, ka akaalai ka asigiria.
Koany Yakob akonyen nuka Laban, ido koany, itegelikina kamakeŋ.
Kotema EJAKAIT Yakob atiar, “Koboŋo akwap naka lukapapaakon, mama ejaas iinacanakon, ajaenena eoŋ kajo.”
Kiyakia Yakob konyarau Rakel ka Lea kopotu orony neejai esipan.
Kotema atiar, “Aany akonyen nuka papakus itegelikina kamaka; konye Edeke loka papaka ejaenena keoŋ.
Ido ijenete cut ebe abu kejaanak papakus kakagogoŋ kere.
Ido papakus abu keŋala, kilocenenei ekaropit irwan atomon; konye mam Edeke abu kocamak aiswamakin eoŋ aronis.
Naetemaria kwana ebe, ‘Numerieik, kes eraunos ekoniropit’; kouri esipan kere numerieik: ido naetemaria ebe, ‘Nupusieik kes eraunos ekoniropit’; kouri esipan kere nupusieik.
Kwaŋin abu Edeke kodema papakus ikebaren, kainak eoŋ.
Kosodi kapaarasia kaŋun, kiwacu esipan, keteluo akakonye, kaany kotoma airuja, ido koany, ikorwa luakwarete esipan araas lupusieik, ka lumerieik, ka lueŋirooko.
Emalaika da loka Edeke kalimok kotoma airuja ebe, ‘Yakob’; katema atiar, ‘Eoŋ lo.’
Kotema atiar, ‘Kiteluo kwana akonikonye, koany ikorwa kere luekwarete esipan lupusieik ka lumerieik ka lueŋirooko; naarai aany kere nukiswamanakini Laban.
Arai Eoŋ Edeke loka Bet-el, nekolo ibukokinia akinyet opir, nekiyapoikinio eoŋ aiyaposit; aso do konyou, kolot kakwap kana, koboŋo akwap nakolo kiwurikinio.’ ”
Koboŋokis ŋes Rakel ka Lea kotemasi atiar, “Eroko bobo isio kija kakorakinet arai airumet kotogo loka papakosi?
Mam kimarakinit ŋesi sio olonwao? Naarai abu kogwela sio, anyamar da cut ikosiboro.
Naarai abara kere naademaa Edeke papakosi ŋes nawok, ka naka idwewok: aso do nuadau Edeke alimokin jo, kiswama.”
Konyou Yakob, kisibwanenik ikedwe ka akeŋor kuju akaalai;
Koyaŋa ibaren kere, ka iboro kere luatukonokinit, ibaren luabu kodumunite, luatukokinit koPadan-Aram, alosit mama ejai Isaak papake akwap naka Kanaan.
Alosit Laban aitub ajul nuka amerekekinike; kokokwa Rakel aputosia nuka idekesio nuka papake.
Kidadaar Yakob komam Laban Esuriat Ejeni, naarai mam abu kolimok elosi.
Kwaŋin koker kiboro kere luajaatar; konyou, kikwaŋar kocor, kobea oroŋat loka Gilead.
Aponi kolimokinai Laban kapaaran kanakiwuniet ebe asi Yakob.
Kouparos kikeinacan, kibwapak ŋes apaarasia akanykaarei; kodumak oroŋat loka Gilead.
Kobu Edeke mama ejai Laban Esuriat kotoma airuja kuare, kotema atiar, “Kocoite, sirikiner kaYakob nuejok karaida nuereko.”
Kodolok Laban Yakob. Ebubukinit Yakob ekewema oroŋat; Laban da ka ikeinacan kibubukis oroŋat loka Gilead.
Kotema Laban Yakob atiar, “Ibu kiswama nyo, aisi komam eoŋ ajeni, kosodi ayaŋaar cut adweka kwape nuunatan kekileŋ?
Kanukinyo kisia, aidadaar kamaka; komam kilimokinit, tikatwarit kaboliasia ka ikososio ka isiman ka adeudeu?
Kwabo mam ibu kisunup eoŋ ainu ikadwe lusap ka lupesur? Iswama do nuka abaŋaanut.
Ejai eoŋ apedor aiswamakin jo erono: konye Edeke loka papakon ŋes kinera keoŋ kuare ebe, ‘Kocoite, sirikiner kaYakob nuejok karaida nueroko.’
Natikwana da karaida kikoto alosit, naarai kimuit ijo ere loka papakon itia bo inyo kikokwaria ikadekesio?”
Koboŋok Yakob kotema Laban atiar, “Naarai abu-kakurianar, ebe elemuni jo kodema eoŋ adwekon kagogoŋ.
Ŋin yenidumuni ijo ejaas kikonidekesio, mam ejari; kotiaka ijo yenikon yenejai keoŋ kakonyen nuka iwokoinacan, koyaŋa.” Naarai mam Yakob kejeni ebe kekokounit Rakel kes.
Kwabo kelemarit Rakel aputosia nuka idekesio, kibwaik kes oboro luka akaalai, kiboikin kes, kinanyinany Laban ewema kere, konye mam edumuna kesi.
Kotema papake atiar, “Sirikinyunyurikin ejakaitika kanu mam apedoro anyoun kakonyenekon, naarai ebami eoŋ.” Komo, konye mam edumuna aputosia nuka idekesio.
Naarai inanyinany ikaboro kere, inyo bo idum ijo koboro lukotogokon kere? Kibwaik ne akonyen nuka ikainacan, ka ikoniinacan, kotubokis oni luarei.
Ikar ŋul akaisaarei kija kajo; amerekekinikon, ka akineikon mam eiecununete ikalei, imaseniko da luka esipan mam eoŋ elilanari.
Yenapoopooenenei etiaŋ mam kainununei jo, eoŋ katwanianari ŋin, ibu kitepesenenei eoŋ arai kekokwar paaran, arai kekokwar kuare.
Kajai kwaŋin; paaran kaarite akure noi, ka aterot kuare; kikolerito akakonye.
Ikar ŋul akaisaarei ajai togokon; abu kejaanak ikar itomon ka luoŋon kanuka adwekon, ikar ikanykape da kanuka esipanikon; ibu kilocenenei ekaropit irwan atomon.

Kedim Edeke loka papaka, Edeke loka Aburaam, ka Aiyoŋ naka Isaak ajaut keoŋ, timam kikurwok aijukar eoŋ kwana titai. Abu Edeke koany akaiticanitoi, ka aitaaritoi naka akaninika, kiretak jo bian kuare.”
Koboŋok Laban kotema Yakob atiar, “Apesur eraas akapesur, idwe eraas ikadwe, isipanin da ikasipanin, kere luiseseni eraas luka; eswamakini nyo lolo akapesur nu, arai ikecedwe luapotu kouriata?
Aso do, ketutukot aitutuket, eoŋ ka jo, korai akajenan neajai eoŋ ka jo.”
Koyaŋa Yakob amoru, kosipok araut epir.
Kotema Yakob ikeinacan atiar, “Kotukokisi amoru.” Koyaata amoru, kotukokisi atukot; konyamata kidunyasi katukot.
Komaik Laban ŋin Yegar-sakaduta;
Kotema Laban atiar, “Atukot na ŋes akajenan neajai eoŋ ka jo lolo.” Ŋes kemaikinere ekekiror Galeed.
Ka Misupa,
Arai kiŋaru ijo akapesur, arai kimany ijo aceŋor kinye apesuruka, emamei ecetuŋanan kaoni; koany, Edeke ŋes ekajenan neajai eoŋ ka jo.”
Kotema Laban Yakob atiar, “Koany atukot na, ido koany epir, luasipok eoŋ kidiŋika ka jo.
Korau atukot na akajenan, ido epir korau ekajenan, ebe mam atubi eoŋ atukot na abunore mama ijai, ijo da mam itubi atukot na ka epir lo abunore mama ajai, kanuka aronis.
Edeke loka Aburaam, ido Edeke loka Nakor, Edeke loka papakec, kotub kokidiniwok.” Kiyapo Yakob kolimite Aiyoŋ naka papake Isaak.
Koinak Yakob asubanit koroŋat, konyarau ikeinacan ainyam atap; konyamata atap, kiboioto akuare kiya koroŋat.
Keany Yakob kes kobala ebe, “Na ŋes ajore naka Edeke.” Komaik aibois ŋin Makanaim.
Kicorak kes, kobala ebe, “Kolimokis ejakaitika Esau kwanata ebe; ‘Ebala kwanata ebulesitikon Yakob ebe, Abu keboienenei ka Laban, kajaenenei ŋina aitodol kwana:
Ido ajai kimoŋin ka isigirian, ka isipanin, ka ibulesin, ka abulesin da: ido eyakunit alimokin ekajakait, kadum asianut kakonyenekon.’ ”
Kwaŋin kokurianar Yakob noi, kiyaloŋoŋ; kotiak ituŋa luajaas kaŋes, ka isipanin, ka aituk, ka akaalai araun atukon aarei.
Kobala ebe, “Arai kedolok Esau atukot adiopet kitiji, ekui atukot naesali.”
Mam kebusakinit nepetai da aitimesia kere, ka nuka abeit da kere, nuibu kitodianak ekonibulesit; naarai abu katub Yorodan lo, kajai kebela bon; kwape kwana da aluor atukon aarei.
Keŋaiŋait, koyuunai kakan naka onaceka, kakan naka Esau; naarai akuriana ŋes, kinye abunore aitiji eoŋ, toto ka idwe da.
Ka jo da ibu kobala ebe, ‘Abeit kasubanakini jo ejok; ido etuluori akoniwur kwape kasiŋe naka aŋolol namam imarun.’ ”
Akinei akwat aarei, ka ikorwa akaisaarei, amerekekin akwat aarei ka imerekekin akaisaarei;
Akaalai nuicirio akaisauni ka idwekec, aituk akaisaoŋon, ka lumaseniko itomon, asigiria akaisaarei ka idwekec itomon.
Kititiŋ akanin nuka ibulesinike, nolisipan owaike bon; kotema ibulesinike atiar, “Kinarenikinai kotuboros, kojai apak kidiŋ kesipan ka esipan.”
Kicorak Ioenarenikinit kobala ebe, “Nairiamunotor ijo konaceka Esau, kiiŋit jo ebe, ‘Lokaŋai bo ijo? Ilosi bo ai? Lukaŋai da ŋul luejaas kakonyenekon?’
Kolimok ŋes ebe, ‘Luka ebulesitikon Yakob; ŋes ainakinet naeinunitai ejakaitika Esau: ido koany, ejai ŋesi da kaukosi.’ ”
Kicorak lokiareit, ka lokiwuniet da, ka ŋul kere luameetos isipanin, kobala ebe, “Ilimokinete Esau kwaŋin kianyutu ŋes.
Ido kineras ebe, ‘Koany ebulesitikon Yakob ejai kaukosi.’ ” Naarai abala ebe, “Esinapikini ŋes kainakinet naegei, kasodi konyet kaany akekonyen; diat kacamuni kanuka ŋun.”
Kwaŋin kotubor ainakinet kiŋarenike: ŋes da elopet koper akuare ŋin nepepe kipaupake.
Koya kes, kitutub ecor, kitutub kere luajaatar.
Kosalak Yakob bon; koutata etuŋanan kaŋes aitodol neacilar kide.
Keany ebe mam epedori aibirokin, kotiro etul; kinunyakin etul loka Yakob eutas kaŋes.
Kotema atiar, “Koosikinai, naarai acila kide.” Kotema atiar, “Mam kaosikin, dimikiinak arereŋ.”
Kotema ŋes atiar, “Ekonikiror iŋai?” Kobala ebe, “Eoŋ Yakob.”
Kotema atiar, “Ekonikiror mam bobo enyaritai Yakob, dimarai Isirael:
Kiŋit Yakob ŋes kobala ebe, “Keŋaiŋait kolimokinai ekonikiror.” Kobala ebe, “Inyo iŋisitor ekakiror?” Kisirereŋ ŋes kanen.
Komaik Yakob aibois ŋin ekekiror Penuel;
Kolomak ŋes akoloŋ ketub Penuel, kicodokin amurwo.
Ŋes mam idwe luka Isirael enyamiata akiriŋ nakotul aitodol lolo, naarai abu kotiro etul loka Yakob, toma akiriŋ nakotul.
Kisinaren abulesin ka ikecedwe, kitutupik Lea ka ikedwe, kinyek Rakel ka Yosep kokau.
Kotubor ŋesi da elopet kiŋarenikec, Kokukokin kwap irwan akanykaarei, aitodol naekunyakinia die mama ejai onaceke.
Kiteluo akekonye, koany aŋor ka idwe; kobala ebe, “Lukaŋai lu luejaas kajo?” Koboŋok ebe, “Lu kes idwe luabu Edeke koinak ekonibulesit kanuka asianut.”
Kosodete kikunyut abulesin, kes nepepe kikecedwe, kokukokinos.
Kikuny Lea da ka ikedwe, kokukokinos: kokau kikuny Yosep ka Rakel, kokukekinos.
Kobala ebe, “Ekodet ŋol kere lokiriamun keoŋ apolouke inyo?” Koboŋok ebe, “Adumunia asianut kakonyen nuka ejakaitika.”
Kobala Esau ebe, “Onac, luejaas keoŋ kadaunito; luejaas kajo koraunos lukon.”

Kobala Yakob ebe, “Mam, keŋaiŋait, arai kwana adumunit asianut kakonyenekon, kocam akainakinet naka akaninika; naarai aany akonyenekon, kwape eanyunia etuŋanan akonyen nuka Edeke, ijo da kisiyalamik eoŋ.
Keŋaiŋait, kocam akainakinet nakiinun; naarai keswamak Edeke nukasianut, ido naarai lukijaa keoŋ kadaunito.” Kisidik, kocam.
Kobala ebe, “Kageut erot, kaloto, eoŋ da keŋarenikini jo.”
Kotema atiar, “Ekajakait, ijeni ebe emameete idwe agogoŋ, ido kwape kamerekekin ka aituk nukiiaa keoŋ itanakete: ido arai kemeata noi apaarit adiopet, etwakete isipanin kere.
Keŋaiŋait, kiŋarenik ejakaitika ekebulesit, eoŋ da alosi motimot, kwape kalosit naka ibaren luejaas kakonyeneka, ido kwape ejaar alosit naka idwe, aitodol neadolunio eoŋ Seir mama ejai ejakaitika.”
Kosodi Esau aboŋor kapaarit kaŋin kobea Seir.
Kolot Yakob Sukot, koduk eketogo, kobwaik ibarenike aujoi: ŋes keraunor ekiror loka aibois Sukot.
Kogwel alup nuabu kibubuk ekewema, katutubeta akwatat nuka epuesa kakanin nuka idwe luka Kamor, papa loka Sekem.
Kodukok ŋina etem, komaik ekekiror El-eloke-Isirael.
Koanyu Sekem ŋes, okoku loka Kamor Ekibit, ejakait loka akwap; kikam ŋes, koperoto kaŋes, kitisil.
Kiketakin eketau mama ejai Dina akoku naka Yakob, komina apese, kinera kapese kasianut.
Kinera Sekem kapapake Kamor atiar, “Komanyakinai apese ŋin.”
Kiira Yakob ebe abu ŋesi komunau Dina akokuke; kojaas odweke kikebaren orony; kililiŋ Yakob aitodol nakebonunioto.
Koloma Kamor, papake loka Sekem neejai Yakob ainerun kaŋes.
Kiirasi odwe luka Yakob ŋun koboŋut korony; kokadakis ikesa, konyunyurikinos noi, naarai abu ŋesi kiswama nuka abaŋaanut koIsirael apero kakoku naka Yakob; akirot ŋin namam ibusakinit aswam.
Kineru Kamor kakes ebe, “Etau loka okokuka Sekem ipuda akonipese: keŋaiŋait koinak ŋes komany.
Ido kamanyanakinos yes kasio; koinanakis sio da akusipesur, yes da komanyete nukosi.
Kiboienenete kasio; ejai akwap akonyenekus; kiboienenete, kogwelanarete kotoma, kodumut iborokus.”
Abu Sekem kotema papa loka apese ka ikeinacan atiar, “Kadum asianut kakonyenekus, lukibilakinete, kes kainakinete.
Etiai kere loka iboro luka emanyit lukitemarete kainakinete kwape ikototor: konye koinakinai apese kamany.”
Kotemasi atiar, “Mam sio kipedori akirot na, akorakin kinacikosi ŋol lomam ekepep: naarai ŋes akirot naka ileic kamakosi.
Kopone kala bon, kicamu isio yes: koraut kwape kasio, ebe ŋolikiliokit kayesi akepeneneo;
Kasodete akorakin yes akosipesur, ka sio da kamanyenenete nukus, ido keboienenete kayes, karautu ateker adiopet.
Konye arai mam icamunito akepio; kiyaŋaari akosipese, kaloto.”
Kisiyalamikis akecekiro Kamor, ka Sekem okoku loka Kamor.
Mam abu ekatumunan kiyap aswam akirot, naarai aminarit apese naka Yakob. Kitopolooritete aitelekarit kere kotogo leka papake.
Kopotu Kamor ka Sekem okokuke orute loka ekecere, kinerut kituŋa luka erekec atiar.
“Inapakina ituŋa ŋul, aso kacamakisi kes aiboienen kakwap ka agwelanar; naarai koany, elalakinit kes akwap; kamanyenenete akecepesur, ka oni da kakoranakinete kes nuwok.
Kopone kalo bon ŋes iyuuniata ituŋa ŋul aiboienen kaoni, araun adiopeteker, arai ekepio ŋolikiliokit kaoni, kwape ekepere kes.
Mam ti ikecebaren, ka ikeceboro, ka ikecetian kere keraunos luwok? Konye kacamutu kes, tetere iboienenete kaoni.”
Apotu kere lukelomarete korute loka erekec kiirasi Kamor ka Sekem okokuke; kokepai ŋolikiliokit kere lokelomanari korute loka erekec.
Koarata Kamor ka Sekem kakwanis naka ekileŋ, kitolomut Dina kotogo loka Sekem, koloto.
Kopotu odwe luka Yakob mama ejaas luearar, koŋata ere, naarai apotu komunaut kinacikec.
Koyaŋaasi ikecesipanin ka ikecebaren ka asigiriakec, ka luajaas ore, ka luajaas omanikor;
Koŋatasi abarakec kere, ka idwekec ludidik, ka aŋorokec, kere luajaas togo.

Kotema Yakob Simeon ka Lebi atiar, “Kisiyaloŋoŋoto eoŋ, aituwur eoŋ kotoma kaluiboienenete kakwap, kotoma oKanaanin, ka oPerisin: ido eoŋ, naarai ikidioko ikatuŋa, etukonokinos rwaru aitusurup eoŋ, ka aitoji eoŋ, kamudiario, eoŋ ka ekakal.”
Kotemasi atiar, “Kejokuna kereka ŋes aikonakin kinacikos bala nadote?”
Kosodi kotema Yakob lukokaleke, ka ŋul kere lukejaas kaŋes atiar, “Kolemasi idekesio lukacekwapin luijaatatar, kitalaunos, kiloco ikusinapen;
Kanyoutu, kaloto Bet-el; adukokini eoŋ da ŋina etem loka Edeke, loabu kaboŋok kapaaran naka icanika, loajaenena keoŋ korot loetorenenei.”
Koinakis Yakob idekesio lukacekwapin kere lukejaas akaninikec, ka itetio lukejaas akikec; kibwa Yakob kes kokwap kelua lokeapie koSekem.
Kwaŋin kodolo Yakob Lus, naejai akwap naka Kanaan (ŋin ŋes Bet-el), ŋes ka ituŋa kere lukejaatar.
Kodukok nen etem, komaik aibois El-bet-el:
Kotwana Debora akasaan naka Rebeka, kidaikinai kwap naka Bet-el kwap kelua: komaikinai ekiror Alon-bakut.
Kotema Edeke ŋes atiar, “Ekonikiror Yakob: mam bobo kinyaritai Yakob, konye do Isirael ŋes ekonikiror.” Komaik ekekiror Isirael.
Kotema Edeke ŋes atiar, “Eoŋ Edeke Lokapedor kere: kouriar kiyatakin; ateker ka atukot naka atekerin epote kamakon, elomunete da ikabakan kakuanakon.
Ido akwap naabu kainak Aburaam ka Isaak, kainakini jo, ka akoniwur naetupanakini ainakini akwap ŋin.”
Konyou Edeke kama ejai kaibois kanaeneratatar kaŋes kolot.
Kosipok Yakob epir kaibois kanaeneratatar kaŋes, epir loka amoru: kobukok ainakinet namatat, kobukok da akinyet.
Komaik Yakob aibois naeneratatar Edeke kaŋes ekiror Bet-el.
Kobwota koBet-el; eroko ideuna apak edit adolore Epurat: korieb Rakel aidoun naa ti ono noi.
Kosodi erieba ŋesi kanuationor aidoun, kotema akesidon ŋes atiar, “Sirildkurianar; naarai idumuni nat icekoku yenitelepat.”
Kosodi kanen, keapu akeijar adaun (naarai abu kotwana), komaik ikoku ekekiror Ben-oni;
Kotwana Rakel, konukai korot loalosi Epurat (ŋes Bet-lekem).
Kitemok Yakob epir kuju kaketes: ŋes Epir loka ates naka Rakel aitodollolo.
Kobwot Isirael, kibubuk ewemake juwai loka etogo loeoja noi loka Eder.
Odwe luka Lea; Reuben, ekiyai loka Yakob, ka Simeon, ka Lebi, ka Yuda, ka Isakar, ka Sebulun;
Odwe luka Rakel; Yosep ka Benyamin.
Odwe luka Bilika, abulesit naka Rakel; Dan ka Naputali:
Odwe luka Silupa, abulesit naka Lea:
Gad ka Aser: ŋul kes odwe luka Yakob, lukeurio koPadan-Aram.
Kodol Yakob mama ejai Isaak papake Mamure, Kiriat-araba (ŋes Keburon), nekiboieneneoto Aburaam ka Isaak.
Kobut Isaak ikar akwatat ka akaisakanykauni.
Kojal Isaak aijar, kotwana, koyaŋaarai mama ejaas iketuŋa, komojon kodaunite ikar luipu: kidaata ŋes odweke Esau ka Yakob.
Komany Esau akeŋor kotoma apesur nuka Kanaan; Ada akoku naka Elon Ekitit, ka Okolibama akoku naka Ana, akoku naka Sibeon Ekibit.
Ka Basemat akoku naka Isimael, kinac naka Nebaiot.
Ada da kourik Esau Elipas; ka Basemat kourik Reuel;
Okolibama kouri Yeus, ka Yalem, ka Kora: ŋul kes odwe luka Esau lukeurikinio ŋes kakwap naka Kanaan.
Naarai epu ikeceboro mam apotu kopedosi aiboi nepepe; akwap da nakiboiororotor abu kodidiijiar kanuka ikecebaren.
Kiboienenei Esau komoru Seir: Esau ŋes Edom.
Na ŋes aur naka Esau papakec loka Iyedomin komoru Seir.
Lu kes ikiroria luka odwe luka Esau; Elipas okoku loka Ada aberu naka Esau, ka Reuel okoku loka Basemat aberu naka Esau.
Odwe luka Elipas kes Teman, ka Omar, ka Sepo, ka Gatam, ka Kenas.
Timuna ŋes aberu naka Elipas okoku loka Esau; kourik Elipas Amalek; ŋul kes odwe luka Ada aberu naka Esau.
Lu kes odwe luka Reuel, Nakat, ka Sera, ka Sama, ka Misa: ŋul kes odwe luka Basemat aberu naka Esau.
Lu kes odwe luka Okolibama akoku naka Ana, akoku naka Sibeon, aberu naka Esau; kourik ŋin Esau Yeus, ka Yalam, ka Kora.
Lu kes ijaka luka odwe luka Esau: odwe luka Elipasekiyai loka Esau; ejakait Teman, ejakait Omar, ejakait Sepo, ejakait Kenas.
Ejakait Kora, ejakait Gatam, ejakait Amalek: ŋul kes ijaka lualomunete kama ka Elipas kakwap naka Edom: ŋul kes odwe luka Ada.
Lu kes odwe luka Reuel okoku loka Esau; ejakait Nakat, ejakait Sera, ejakait Sama, ejakait Misa; ŋul kes ijaka lualomunete kama ka Reuel kakwap naka Edom; ŋul kes odwe luka Basemat aberu naka Esau.
Lu kes odwe luka Okolibama aberu naka Esau; ejakait Yeus, ejakait Yalam, ejakait Kora: ŋol kes ijaka lualomunete kama ka Okolibama akoku naka Ana, aberu naka Esau.
Ŋul kes odwe luka Esau, ŋul da kes ijakakec: ŋol ŋes Edom.
Ka Dison ka Eser ka Disan, ŋul kes ijaka lualomunete kama ka Ikorin, idwe luka Seir kakwap naka Edom.
Idwe luka Lotan kes Kori, ka Kemam; kinac naka Lotan ŋes Timuna.
Lu kes idwe luka Sobal; Aliban, ka Manakat ka Ebal, ka Sepo ka Onamo
Lu kes idwe luka Sibeon; Aia ka Ana: ŋol ŋes Ana loadumuni atanin nuibulubulete akipi nuemwaka komodin, icokie isigirian luka Sibeon papake.
Lu kes idwe luka Ana; Dison ka Okolibama akoku naka Ana.
Lu kes idwe luka Dison; Kemudan ka Esaban ka Itiran ka Ceran.
Lu kes idwe luka Eser; Bilukan ka Saaban ka Akan.
Lu kes idwe luka Disan; Us ka Aran.
Lu kes ijaka luelomunete kama ka Ikorin; ejakait Lotan, ejakait Sobal, ejakait Sibeon, ejakait Ana.
Ejakait Dison, ejakait Eser, ejakait Disan: ŋul kes ijaka lualomunete kama ka Ikorin, kwape ejaatar ikeceiake kakwap naka Seir.
Bela okoku loka Beor kirum Edom; ekiror loka ereke ŋes Dinakaba.
Kotwana Bela, kirum Yobab okoku loka Sera loka Bosura aiboisike.
Kotwana Yobab, kirum Kusam loka akwap naka Itemanin aiboisike.
Kotwana Kusam, kirum Kadad okoku loka Bedad aiboisike; lokitojie Midian komanikor loka Moab: ekiror loka ereke ŋes Abit.
Kotwana Kadad, kirum Samula loka Masereka aiboisike.
Kotwana Samula, kirum Saul loka Rekobot loedunyas ka Ecor aiboisike.
Kotwana Saul, kirum Baal-Kanan okoku loka Acabor aiboisike.
Kotwana Baal-Kanan okoku loka Acabor, kirum Kadar aiboisike: ekiror loka ereke ŋes Pau; ekiror loka aberuke ŋes Meketabel, akoku naka Matured akoku naka Me-sakab.
Ejakait Okolibama, ejakait Ela, ejakait Pinon;
Ejakait Kenas, ejakait Teman, ejakait Mibisar;
Ejakait Magudiel, ejakait Iram: ŋul kes ijaka luka Edom; kwape ejaatar akeceiboisio kakwap naka airumetekec. Ŋol ŋes Esau papakec loka Iyedomin,

Na ŋes aur naka Yakob. Nakeraar Yosep loka ikar itomon ka lukanykaarei, ecokienenei esipan nepepe kikeinacan; kojaenena etelepat nepepe kodwe luka Bilika, ka odwe luka Silupa, aŋor nuka papake; kideideonokini Yosep papakec akirokec nueroko.
Ido amina Isirael Yosep aitelekarit idweke kere, naarai ŋes loaurie kamoionuke; kodonyok ekooti loka acerieik nuipu.
Koanyut ikeinacan ebe amina papakec ŋes aitelekarit ikeinacan kere; apotu kolaata, komam bobo ineras kaŋes ejok, dimarai nupeken Uŋet bon.
Abu Yosep kiruja airujasit, kolimok ikeinacan: kiyatakis bobo aila ŋes.
Kobala kes ebe, “Keŋaiŋaitos, kopupokisi airujasit na naabu keruja:
Naarai, koany, bala kieni oni ikes komana, ido koany, konyou ekesitika, kosipokin; ido koany, kopotu ikesikus kirimosi, kokukonokinos ekakesit.”
Kobalas ikeinacan ŋes ebe, “Ipedori kereka ijo airum sio? arai ipedori teni ijo ayait sio?” Kiyatakis bobo aila ŋes kanuka airujasiake ka akekiro da.
Kiruja bobo aceirujasit, kolimok ikeinacan kobala ebe, “Koany, eruja aceirujasit; ido koany, bala akoloŋ ka elap ka aacer atomon kanadiop kakukonokinos eoŋ.”
Kolimok ŋesi papake ka ikeinacan; kitoron papake ŋes, kobala ebe, “Nanyoin bo airujasit na nairujat ijo? Eoŋ ka totokon ka ikoniinacan kiponi aisudedeonokin jo?”
Kirum ikeinacan ekokote kanukeŋ; konye koric papake akirot ŋin kotauke.
Koloto ikeinacan acok esipan loka papakec Sekem.
Kobala Isirael Yosep ebe, “Mere icokiete ikoniinacan esipan Sekem? Bia keyakia mama ejaas.” Kobala ŋesi ebe, “Eoŋ lo.”
Kobala ŋesi ebe, “Aso kolot, koany ikoniinacan, arai ejaas ejok, ka esipan da arai ejai ejok; kinyak akiro.” Kwaŋin kiyakia ŋes anyoun kaditot naka Keburon, kodol Sekem.
Kodum etuŋanan ŋes, ido koany, etubitoi kokitwi; kiŋit etuŋanan ŋol ŋes ebe, “Imoot bo inyo?”
Kotema atiar, “Amoot ikainacan; kolimokinai, keŋaiŋait, neicokiorito esipan.”
Kolimok etuŋanan ŋes ebe, “Anyout kesi kane; naarai abu kapup ebalas ebe, ‘Kaloto Dotan.’ ” Kibwapa Yosep ikeinacan, kodumak kes Dotan.
Kiteluosi ŋes eroko elwana, ido eroko keekuna die kinerut aiar ŋes.
Kotemanaros atiar, “Koany, abu ca etikerujat je.
Aso do kopotu kaarata, kacakakisi toma adiopet kapanya, kitemari oni da ebe, ‘Etiaŋ lokadedeŋan ŋes kenyami’; kasodete kaanyutu kwape ejauniata rwaru airujasiake.”
Kopup Reuben akirot ŋin kitajar kakanikec; kobala ebe, “Kenyekisi aiar.”
Kotema Reuben kes atiar, “Sirikibukosi aokot; kocakakisi aipany na naejai modiŋ, konye sirikidokokis akan,” tetere itajari ŋes kakanikec, ainyakakin papake.
Kosodi kanen, kedolu Yosep mama ejaas ikeinacan, kolacut ekootike loka acerieik nuipu loanapit;
Koyaŋaasi ŋes, kocakakis aipany: aonit da aipany komameete akip.
Kotema Yuda ikeinacan ebe, “Ajokis anyoin nakidumuni oni aiar onacewok ka aimunonoor akeokot?
Aso, ketwegelata Isimaelin, kwabo kenyekisi aidokokin awokokan mamakeŋ; naarai ŋes onacewok, ŋes awokokuan.” Kopuput ikeinacan ŋes.
Kitorut nen Imidianin, ikagwelanarak; kibwosut ikeinacan Yosep alemun kaipany, kitwegelata Isimaelin atutubeta akaisaarei nuka epuesa. Koyaŋaasi Yosep Misiri.
Koboŋo mama ejaas ikeinacan kobala ebe, “Emamei ikoku; okwe, abei eoŋ ai?”
Kolemut ekooti loka Yosep, koarata ekoroi lomasenik, kidomakis ekooti aokot;
Koyaŋaasi ekooti loka acerieik nuipu, koinut papakec; kobalas ebe, “Kipou kadumutu lo: aso kojen arai ŋes eko oti loka ikokukon arai mere ŋes.”
Kojen, kobala ebe, “Ŋes ekooti loka ikakoku; kenyam ŋes etiaŋ loerono: komamei abuonokin keponi Yosep kopoopoai.”
Kocil Yakob ikenapen, kenap epuko kaŋabet, kokuudian ikekoku apaarasia nuipu.
Konyout ikedwe kere lusap ka lupesur aitalakar ŋes; konye kogir aitalakario; kobala ebe, “Alomari okatwak mama ejai ikakoku aroko amonyi.” Komony papake akiyo kanukeŋ.
Kitwegelata ŋes Imidianin Potipar koMisiri, ŋes ejakait loka Parao, ekapolon loka iserikalen.
Koany Yuda kanen apese naka Ekanaanit ekekiror Sua; koyaŋa ŋes, koloma mama ejai.
Kopotuu, kidou ikoku yenitelepat; komaik ekekiror Er.
Kopotuu bobo, kidou ikoku yenitelepat; komaik ekekiror Onan.
Kidou bobo da ikoku yenitelepat, komaik ekekiror Sela; ajai Cesib, nakidounio ŋes.
Komanyak Yuda Er ekekiyai aberu, ekekiror Tamar.
Arono Er, ekiyai loka Yuda, kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT; koar EJAKAIT ŋes.
Kotema Yuda Onan atiar, “Koloma mama ejai aberu naka onacekon, kikonak ŋes kwape kibusakinitor onace loka lokatwan, kodumak onacekon aur.”
Kojen Onan ebe mam aur emaikinio nake; kosodi nakelomaria mama ejai aberu naka onaceke, kobukonori kwap, kinyek ainakin onaceke aur.
Akirot ŋin nakiswamai arono kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT: koar ŋes da.

Kosodi kotema Yuda Tamar aberu naka okokuke atiar, “Kosal irai apuserut kotogo loka papakon, aitodol neepolooror Sela okokuka”; naarai kotema atiar, “Kinye ŋes da atwanare, kwape kikeinacan.” Kolot Tamar kiboienenei kotogo loka papake.
Kolimokinai Tamar atiar, “Koany, papaakon elosi Timuna aitub ajulo nuka amerekekin.”
Kolaca inapen luka eipuseruneke, kimuko ekereet, kimukor kegoe kiboikin orute loka Enaim, loejai orot loelosi Timuna; naarai abu koany ebe apoloor Sela, komam einakina airumakin kaŋes.
Keanyu Yuda ŋes, koomite ebe nadote; naarai kimukorit akekonyen.
Kopaa korot neejai, kotema atiar, “Ikatuan, keŋaiŋait, kiyu kaloma mama ijai.” Naarai mam ajeni ebe ŋes aberu naka okokuke, Kotema atiar, “Kiinakini con inyo, arai kilom mama ajai?”
Kotema atiar, “Kejukakini ikalol yenika akinei kosipan.” Kotema atiar, “Kititini eoŋ inyo aitodol neijukunia?”
Kotema atiar, “Aititiŋet anyoin kainakini?” Kotema atiar, “Egilutukon ka aunokon, ka ebela loejai akanikon.” Koinak ŋes, koloma mama ejai, kopotik ŋes.
Konyou kolot, kolaca ekegoe lokimukos, konap inapen luka eipuserune.
Kijuka Yuda ikalol yenika akinei kakan naka epaperoke Edulamit, ainyakunia aititiŋet kakan naka aberu: konye mam abu kodum ŋes.
Kiŋit tuna luka aibois naka aberu atiar, “Anibo nadote nalem ejai Enaim ariri naka erot?” Kotemasi atiar, “Emamei lem nadote kane.”
Koboŋo mama ejai Yuda, kotema atiar, “Mam abu kadum ŋes, ido ebalasi ituŋa luka aibois ebe, ‘Emamei lem nadote kane.’ ”
Kotema Yuda atiar, “Kenyeisi koyaŋaa, kinyein aisurum oni ileic; koany, ejuka ikalol yen, mam jo idumunit ŋes.”
Nakitolomasi ŋes, kiyakik papaake atiar, “Ekiliokit elopet iboro lu, ŋes kapotikini.” Kotema atiar, “Keŋaiŋait, kojen lukaŋai lu, egilut, ka auno, ka ebela.”
Kocam Yuda kes, kotema atiar, “Ketelekaa eoŋ karaut naedolit, naarai mam abu kainak ŋes Sela okokuka.” Mam bobo abu kojenu ŋes.
Kosodi, kedol apak naka aidoun, koany, kojaas imwatok kakoikike.
Kosodi keapu aidoun kitolom idiope akan; kitiŋ akesidon koenik eusi lokareŋan akan, kinera atiar, “Yen ŋes esiau alomun.”
Kosodi nakinyaka akan, koany, kolomu onaceke; kotema atiar, “Kanukinyo icilunori ijo kanukon?” Ŋes kemaikinere ekekiror Peres.
Kokau kolom onaceke, loejai eusi lokareŋan akanike; komaik ekekiror Sera.
Kojai EJAKAIT ka Yosep, kokerianar, kiboie kotogo loka ekapolonike Emisiriat.
Koany ekapolonike kwape ejaar EJAKAIT kaŋes, ido kwape abu EJAKAIT kitekeriana ŋinibore kere yenikiswamai.
Kodum Yosep asianut kakonyeneke, kijaanak; kodakak ŋes araut ekaanyanaran kotogoke, kititiŋ lukejaas kaŋes kere.

Kosodi ageun kapak naadakakinia araun ekaanyanaran kotogoke, ayait ŋinibore kere yenajaatatar, kisirereŋ EJAKAIT etogo loka Emisiriat kanuka Yosep; arereŋ da naka EJAKAIT kojai kaŋinibore yenajaatatar ŋesi, lukotogo ka lukomana da.
Kinyekik kere luajaatatar ŋesi kakan naka Yosep, komam ejeni ibore yenejai kaŋes nabarai inyamat lukenyamenenei. Ido arai Yosep lotemel, akekonyen da nuisiyalamikinete.
Konye kogiri ŋesi, kolimok aberu naka ekapolonike ebe, “Koany, mam ekapolonika ejeni lueja keoŋ kotogo, ido abu ketitiŋ kere;

Emamei loketelekarit eoŋ kapolou kotogo kalo; emamei da imodiobore yenimam kainakinit nabarai ijo bon, naarai irai ijo akeberu: aso ekoni apedori ai aswam aronis naetia nen, adiakar da kama ejai Edeke?”
Kosodi kinerenena kaYosep ŋinipaaran, komam enupakini apero kaŋes karaida aiboi kaŋes.
Kosodi kapakio kaŋun koloma togo aswam akeswamisio; komameete ituŋa lukotogo kanen.
Kitiŋ akenapito, kobala ebe, “Kapero.” Kinyek Yosep akenapito kakanike koburucar koker kiŋa.
Kosodi kanen keanyu ebe enyek Yosep akenapito kakanike aker da.
Konyarau ituŋa luajaas togoke, kobala kes ebe, “Koany, kiinu Eburaniat aboliar oni; alom ŋesi mama ajai ebe tikiipere keoŋ, keluluk eoŋ keporoto loepol:
Kosodi kiira ebe eluluk eoŋ keworoi, kinyekini do akenapito kama ajai con, kopaar akerit.”
Kiŋadak anapitoke aitodol nakeboŋunio l ekapolonike ore.
Kolimonok kwape kejaatatar akiro nu ebe, “Ekonibulesit Eburaniat lukiinuni, abu kolom mama ajai aboliar eoŋ;
Kosodi kanen keluluk eoŋ keworotoi, kinyek akenapito kama ajai, koker.”
Kosodi ekapolonike ayaŋaar Yosep, kibwaik aidaris.
Konye kojai EJAKAIT ka Yosep kitodik nukasianut, koinak arereŋ kakonyen nuka ekedaran loka aidaris.
Kititiŋ ekedaran loka aidaris ienan kere lukejaas aidaris akanin nuka Yosep; ŋes da etetemenenei kere nukiswamaenenete kanen.
Mam ekedaran loka aidaris apodo imodiobore kere yenabu kititiŋ ŋes; naarai ajai EJAKAIT kaŋes; kitekerianite EJAKAIT nukiswamaenenei ŋesi kere.
Konyunyurik Parao ikekeswamak kere, ekapolon loka ikawokok, ka ekapolon loka ikepook da.
Koenik kes togo loka ekapolon loka iserikalen, toma aidaris, aibois naeenitere Yosep.
Abu ekapolon loka iserikalen kititiŋ kes Yosep, kijaanak kes. Kodaut kanen apak.
Kirujata luarei, ŋinituŋanan akeirujasit, kotoma akuare adiopet, ŋinituŋanan kwape ejaar apolou naka airujasitike, ekawokon ka ekepoon loka ekabaka loka Misiri, luaenitai kotoma aidaris.
Koloma Yosep neajaas kesi tupuruc, koanyu kes, ido koany, akadakinito.
Kiŋit ikeswamak luka Parao luaenitai nenipe kaŋes kotoma togo loka ejakaitike, ebe, “Inyo itakaniata ikadakinito lolo?”
Kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Kiruja isio airujasit; konye emamei yenepedori aitejenun apolouke.” Kotema kes Yosep atiar, “Mam kereka aitejenun apolou erai naka Edeke? Kolimokinai cani, keŋaiŋaitos.”
Kolimok ekawokon lokapolon Yosep akeirujasit, kotema ŋes atiar, “Toma airujasitika, koany, bala ajai emusabibu akonyeneka;
Omusabibu da ajaas atenuna auni: kosubite bala elibi, kituro atur; aibunetake da koraata araito nuekokito.
Kojai da aikopo naka Parao akanika; kalem araito, kacuanak toma aikopo naka Parao, kainak aikopo akan naka Parao.”
Kotema Yosep ŋes atiar, “Na ŋes akepolou: atenuna auni kes apaarasia auni:
Akaulo kapaarasia auni itonyouni Parao akonikou, kosodi ainyakar toma aswamukon: ido ijaanakini aikopo akan naka Parao, kwape ajaar lem epone iriŋa irai ekawokonike.
Konye kiitununei eoŋ da naidumunia ajokis, kitodik eoŋ asianut, keŋaiŋait, kolimonori eoŋ kama ka Parao, kolem eoŋ kotogo kalo.
Naarai abeit kakokounio kakwap naka Iburanian; kane da mam eswamat adiokirot natikebwaikiniata eoŋ aidaris.”
Keanyu ekepoon lokapolon ebe ejok apolou naka akiro, kotema ŋesi Yosep atiar, “Eoŋ da ajai akairujasit, ido koany, bala ebwokit ibukito iuni luajaas imugatin luekwanak;
Obukit da lokokuju ajaas iponesio kere luka inyamat luepee luka Parao; konyamakis akweny obukit kokuju akouka.”
Koboŋok Yosep atiar, “Na ŋes akepolou, ibukito iuni kes apaarasia auni;
Akaulo kapaarasia auni itonyouni Parao akonikou anyoun kama ijai, kikajakini jo okitoi; akweny da enyamete akonikiriŋ alemunun kamakon.”
Kinyaku bobo ekawokon lokapolon toma aiwokoke; kijaanak aikopo akan naka Parao;
Konye kikajak ekepoon lokapolon: kwape etejenunitor kes Yosep apolou.
Konye mam ekawokon lokapolon abu kiitu Yosep, konye abu kimurwok.
Kosodi akaulo kikar iarei, kiruja Parao: ido koany, bala ebwoi kariri naka ecor.
Ido koany, bala apotu kolomut kocor aituk akanykaarei nuejok nuetumito, kodakasi toma osege.
Ido koany, aituk ace akanykaarei kotupakis kwa, kolomut kocor, irikorodas kosenyito; kobwaata kariri naka ecor kama ejaas aituk nuce.
Aituk nuerikorodas nuasenyito konyama aituk akanykaarei nuajok nuatumito. Kokweny Parao.
Kojotoor kiruja irwan nakiareit, ido koany, bala kosuroto kakimait adiopet aluŋuren nuka akima akanykaarei, iturananas kojokuka.
Ido koany, aluŋuren akanykaarei nutinoi nuesirinyorit ekwam lokokide kotupakis kobwaŋut.
Aluŋuren nutinoi kilikos aluŋuren akanykaarei nuturaŋ nukapolok. Kokweny Parao, ido koany, erai airujasit.
Kosodi kiwala akwap kiyaloŋoŋ eketau; kiyakia anyaraun imurwok kere luka Misiri, ka lukacoa kere: kolimok Parao airujasitike; konye komamu yenabu kopedo aitejenikin Parao apolouke.
Kosodi ekawokon lokapolon alimokin Parao ebe, “Eitu lolo akaibucareta:
Abu Parao konyunyurik ikebulesin, koen kotogo loka ekapolon loka iserikalen: eoŋ ka ekepoon lokapolon da;
Kerujata airujasit kakuare adiopet, eoŋ ka ŋes; kipou kerujata ŋinituŋanan kwape ajaar apolou naka airujasitike;
Ido kojai nepepe kasio etelepat Eburaniat, ebulesit loka ekapolon loka iserikalen; kalimonokisi ŋes; kitejenik apolou naka airujasiakosi; kitejenik ŋinituŋanan kwape kejaar akeirujasit.
Kosodi kanen, kwape kitejenikinia ŋesi sio, kikonakis kwape kwaŋin; kenyakak eoŋ aswamuka, ka ŋol da kikajak.”
Kobala Parao Yosep atiar, “Erujat eoŋ airujasit, konye emamei yenepedori aitejenun apolouke: ido eira kilimitoi ebe naipupunio ijo airujasit ipedori aitejenun apolouke.”
Koboŋok Yosep Parao atiar, “Mere nukaŋ: Edeke ŋes einakini Parao abonokinio naka ainapakin.”
Kotema Parao Yosep atiar, “Toma airujasitika, koany, bala abwoi eoŋ kariri naka ecor.
Ido koany, bala apotu kolomut kocor aituk akanykaarei, nuetumito nukajokak; kodakasi toma osege.
Ido koany, aituk akanykaarei ace kotupakis kwa kolomut kocor, nudokor nuerikorodas noi, nukasenyak, numam aanyunit apeŋo nukitetemet akeceronis kakwap nako Misiri kere.
Aituk nukasenyak nurikoda konyamata aituk akanykaarei nukatumak nuageete;
Aso kedaut ainyam, mam ipedori ajenun ebe kenyamito; naarai aroko edokororos kwape ajaatar sek. Kasodi akwenyun.
Kaanyu kotoma airujaka, ido koany, bala kosuroto kakimait adiopet aluŋuren akanykaarei nuturaŋ nukajokak;
Ido koany, bala aluŋuren akanykaarei nuawokito, nutinoi, nuesirinyorit ekwam lokokide, kotupakis kobwaŋut.
Apotu aluŋuren nutinoi kilikosi aluŋuren nuturaŋ akanykaarei, Kalimok imurwok; konye komamu yenepedori aitejenikin eoŋ apolouke.”
Aituk akanykaarei nukajokak kes ikar ikanykaarei, ka aluŋuren akanykaarei nuturaŋ kes ikar ikanykaarei; airujasit erai adiopet.
Aituk da akanykaarei nukasenyak nurikoda nuatupakinete, kes ikar ikanykaarei, ido aluŋuren akanykaarei nuesirinyorit ekwam lokokide; eraunos ŋun ikar ikanykaarei luka ebeli.
Ŋin ŋes akirot naalimok eoŋ Parao; nuelosi Edeke aisub, etodiki ŋesi Parao.
Koany, epote ikar ikanykaarei luka amio naepol noi anatar akwap kere nako Misiri.
Kokau kaŋul ejaunete ikar ikanykaarei luka ebeli; kisimurwokinete amio kere naka akwap nako Misiri; emudiari da ebeli akwap.
Amio da mam ejenunio kakwap kanuka ebeli loetupakini; naarai ededeneari noi jokan.
Aponi kirucakinai Parao airujasit, naarai itogogoŋit Edeke akirot, itodolikini da Edeke ŋun atipet.
Aso do komou Parao etuŋanan loemisiana lokacoa, kodakak ayait akwap nako Misiri.
Kiswama Parao kwaŋin, ido kibwaik ikaanyanarak kakwap, kiŋadak idiopet kokany yenika akwap nako Misiri kokar ikanykaarei luka amio.
Kotukonokinai inyamat kere luka ikar kalu kaluejok lueponito, kinadai akima akan naka Pamo oreria lukapolok, kidarai.
Inyamat ŋul da eraunete imono luka akwap kanuka ikar ikanykaarei luka ebeli, luejaunete akwap nako Misiri; kinye akwap atwanare ebeli.”
Akirot ŋin ajokuna kakonye nuka Parao, kakonye da nuka ikekejaanakinako
Kotema Parao ikekejaanakinak atiar, “Kipedori adumun etuŋanan loeputos kalo, etuŋanan loejai emoyo loka Edeke?”
Kotema Parao Yosep atiar, “Naarai kitodik Edeke jo ŋun kere, emamei loemisiana lokacoa da kwape kajo.
Iyai ijo ekatogo, ido kwape ejaar akonikirot kirimarete ikatuŋa kere; dimarai ajakanutuka bon ketelekaria jo kapolou.”
Kotema Parao Yosep atiar, “Koany, kadakak jo ayait akwap kere nako Misiri.”
Kolaca Parao ekegilut lokaanyunet kobokoritike, kitanapik obokorit loka Yosep, kitanap inapen luka abaputa naejok, kitanapik irikot yenika esabu omurisiŋike.
Kitolot kagali kanakiareit naajai ŋesi. Kolimoroi kakonyeneke ebe, “Kokukokinos.” Kodakak ayait akwap kere nako Misiri.
Kobala Parao Yosep ebe, “Eoŋ Parao, emamei bobo ituŋanan yenitonyouni akekan karaida akekeju kakwap kere nako Misiri, dimarai kisiik ijo.”
Komaik Parao Yosep ekekiror Sapenat-panea; koinak Asenat akoku naka Poti-pera esasedoti loka On aimany. Kolot Yosep kirimo akwap kere nako Misiri.
Kokar ikanykaarei luka amio, kobwaŋ akwap inyamat luipu noi.
Kotukonokinenei inyamat kere luka ikar ikanykaarei luajaunete akwap nako Misiri, kiijadanakinenei inyamat oreria; inyamat luka amanan nuerimorito ŋolire, eŋadanakinenei ore ŋol.
Kinada Yosep akima nuipu noi kwape kasiŋe naka aŋolol, aitodol neenyeinia aimar; naarai mam emarunos.
Komaik Yosep ekiyai ekekiror Manase
Lokiareit da komaik ekekiror Epuraim
Kodaunos do ikar ikanykaarei luka amio luajaas akwap nako Misiri.
Kogeunos ikar ikanykaarei luka ebeli, kwape kebalar Yosep: kojaun ebeli akwapin kere, konye kojaas inyamat akwap kere nako Misiri.
Naariebia eteŋei akwap kere nako Misiri, komonyatar ituŋa Parao kanuka inyamat. Kotema Parao Imisirian kere atiar, “Kolosenenete neejai Yosep; nukitemanari ŋesi yes, kiswamanakinete kwaŋin.”
Koŋata ebeli akwapin kere; koŋaa Yosep imono kere kitwegelenenei Imisirian; kodedenear ebeli kakwap nako Misiri.
Lukakwapin kere koponenakinete Yosep koMisiri agwel akima; naarai kodedenear ebeli kakwapin kere.
Kotema atiar, “Koany, apup ebe ejaas akima Misiri: aso kijesaros kogwelut kaŋina; kajarata, kenyeis atwakare.”
Kijesaros iinacan lutomon luka Yosep agwel akima Misiri.
Konye mam Yakob abu kiyakia Benyamin onace loka Yosep, nepepe kikeinacan; naarai abala ebe, “Elemuni kodoik aronis.”
Kopotu odwe luka Isirael egwelet nepepe kaŋul kaluaponenenete: naarai ajai ebeli akwap naka Kanaan.
Koany Yosep ikeinacan kojen kes, konye kituluor bala lokaceteker kamakec, kisiejanak, kobala kes ebe, “Kipote kai?” Kotemasi ŋes ebe, “Akwap naka Kanaan agwel inyamat.”
Kojen Yosep ikeinacan, konye mam kes apotu kojenutu ŋes.
Kiitu Yosep airujasia nuerujai kanukec, kotema kes atiar, “Iraas ikarotak: iponito aanyun akwap kwape ilarononor.”
Kobalas ebe, “Mam, papa, konye eponitos ikonibulesin egwelet inyamat.
Isio kere kirai idwe luka ediopetuŋanan; kirai da lukabeit, ikonibulesin mam eraas ikaretak nepetai da.”
Kobala kes ebe, “Mam, konye iponitos aanyun akwap kwape ilarononor.”
Kobalas ebe, “Mam. Isio ikonibulesin kirai iinacan lutomon kaarei, idwe luka ediopetuŋanan kakwap naka Kanaan; ido koany, ikosiŋoorit ejai nepepe kapapakosi kiton lolo, idiopet da emamei.”
Kobala Yosep kes ebe, “Ŋes ŋipeŋin nakabalar eoŋ yes ebe ‘Iraas ikarotak’;
Mere ber kigimoroi akusikirot. Madi Parao, mam inyounete kane dimikito kebu ikusinoorit da nepene.
Kiyakiasi aupakus ediopet, koom onacekus, ka yes da kienio, tetere igimorio akusikiro, arai ejai abeit mamakus; arai mere kwaŋin, madi Parao, abeit iraas ikarotak.”
Kibwaik kes kere nepepe aidaris apaarasia auni.
Arai teni iraas lukabeit, koenai cani ediopet koinacanakus kaidarisikus; konye kolototo luce, koyaŋaasi akima nuka eteŋei lokokalekus;
ido koinuniata inooritikus; kosodete akirokus aitogogoŋio, yes da mam itwakete.” Kiswamata kwaŋin.
Kotemanaros bonik ebe, “Abeit kidiakarit kanuka onacewok, naarai kipou kaanyutu eketau kwape eticanitor, kwape kinainaitor, oni da kipou kagiro apupun; ŋes kidoikinioto ican lu.”
Koboŋok Reuben kes ebe, “Mam eoŋ abu kalimok yes ebe, ‘Sirikidiakata nuka ikoku’; kosodete yes aigir apupun? Ŋes kitepesenitotor oni akeokot.”
Mam apotu kojenut ebe ejeni Yosep akecekiro; naarai ajai ekejulan kidiŋike kakes.
Kiboŋok kes epur, komony akiyo; koboŋo bobo mama ejaas, kiner kakes, kocupo Simeon kokidiŋikec, koen kakonyekec.
Kosodi Yosep aicorakin ailelebanar iborokec akima, ainyakakin da ŋolituŋanan akepesan opukoke, ainanakin da inyamat luka erot: kiswamanakinai kwaŋin.
Kisibwoka asigiriakec akima, kolototo.
Naalaearia aupakec ediopet epukoke aitanyam akesigiria kaibois naaperete, koturiaikin akepesan; ido koany, kejaas aituk naka epukoke.
Kotema ikeinacan atiar, “Kenyakakin akapesan; ido koany, ejaas opukoka.” Kodusaununos itauonokec, kibelonokinos komaranete, kobalas ebe, “Inyo bo lolo yenikisubak oni Edeke?”
Kopotu neejai papakec Yakob akwap naka Kanaan, kolimonokis kere nuapotu kodoikis kes; ebe,
“Etuŋanan, ekapolon loka akwap, abu kisiejanak sio, koomite ebe kirai isio ikarotak akwap.
Katemasi atiar, ‘Kirai lukabeit; mam kirai ikarotak;
Kirai iinacan lutomon ka luarei, odwe luka papakosi; idiopet emamei, ikosiŋoorit da ejai kapapakosi kiton lolo kakwap naka Kanaan.’
Etuŋanan, ekapolon loka akwap, kotema sio atiar, ‘Kwanata ŋes ajenunia ebe iraas lukabeit; kinyeinere ediopet koinacanakus, koyaŋaasi akima kanuka eteŋei lokokaliakus, koloto.
Koinut ikusinoorit; kasodi kajen ebe mam cut iraas ikarotak, konye iraas lukabeit; kalaeakinete do onacekus, yes da igwelenenete do kakwap kana.’ ”
Kobala papakec Yakob kes ebe, “Kidemasi eoŋ ikadwe: Yosep emamei, Simeon da emamei, ido bobo kikotos ademar Benyamin da; ŋun kere kalanirikinitos.”
Kotema Reuben papake ebe, “Iari ijo odweka luarei, arai mam enyakunit mamakon; koinakinai akanika, enyakuni eoŋ ŋes bobo mamakon.”
Kobala ebe, “Mam ikakoku elosi nepepe kayes; naarai abu onaceke kotwana, ŋes da asalaki bon; kedoiki aronis korot kaloitorete, itolomarete akakorwo toma okatwak kanuka aiturur.”
Kosodi kanen, kedaut ainyam akima kere nuaomete koMisiri, kotema kes papakec atiar, “Koloto bobo, kogwelut idisinyamat.”
Kobala Yuda ŋes ebe, “Abu etuŋanan kiyapoik sio cut, kobala ebe, ‘Mam ianyunete akakonyen dimikito ejai onacekus kayes.’
Arai ijukari onacekos kasio, kilosi agwelakin jo inyamat;
Konye arai mam ijukari, mam kilosi: naarai abu etuŋanan kobala sio ebe, ‘Mam ianyunete akakonyen, dimikito ejai onacekus kayes.’ ”
Kobala Isirael ebe, “Kanukinyo kiswamakiniata eoŋ erono kwaŋin, alimokin etuŋanan ebe ejai onacekus ece?”

Kobalas ebe, “Abu etuŋanan je kiŋitiŋit sio kwape kijaar, ido kwape ejaar cwokokek, kobala ebe, ‘Eroko papakus ejari? Ejai yes onacekus ece?’ Kalimokis ŋes kwape ejaatar akiro ŋun; tikipedo biai ajenun ebe etemari atiar, ‘Koyaut onacekus da’?”
Kotema Yuda Isirael papake atiar, “Kijuka esapat keoŋ, kinyouni isio da kaloto: tetere kijari, kenyeisi atwakare, isio ka jo, ka idwekosi ludidik.
Araun eoŋ ekabwoiaranike: kitepeseni eoŋ kanukeŋ; arai mam enyakunit mamakon, kebwaik kakonyenekon, kabeik eoŋ akirot apaarasia kere:
Naarai kedim isio aitumor, abeit tikiibonu sek irwan nakiareit.”
Koyaata da apesan aitemisio aarei kotoma akaninikus; koyaata bobo kakaninikus apesan nuenyakunio kaituke nuka ipukoikus; diat kinyakunio kanuka abuikin:
Koyaata onacekus da, konyout, koboŋosi mama ejai etuŋanan.
Edeke Lokapedor koinak aitimio kakonyen nuka etuŋanan, kolacak onacekus je ka Benyamin. Eoŋ da arai katwania idweka, atwaniari.”
Koyaata ituŋa ainakinet ŋin, koyaata apesan aitemisio aarei kakaninikec, ka Benyamin; konyout koloto Misiri, kobwaata kakonyen nuka Yosep.
Keanyu Yosep Benyamin ejai kakes, kotema ekeŋadan loka etogoke atiar, “Kitoloma ituŋa togo, kopuik, kitemonok; naarai kimori ituŋa ŋul keoŋ luka paaran.”
Kiswama etuŋanan kwape kicorakinia Yosep; kitoloma etuŋanan ituŋa togo loka Yosep.

Koyoŋa ituŋa, naarai etolomar kes togo loka Yosep; kobalas ebe, “Kanuka apesan nukinyakanakinio opukoiwok ŋes kitolomunere nee; akodokod, kosodi akakakin oni, anatar araun ibulesinike, ka awokosigirian da.”
Kikunyakis neejai ekeŋadan loka etogo loka Yosep, kinerata kaŋes kokek loka etogo.
Kobalas ebe, “Okwe ejakait, abeit kipou kapotu nasodit agwel inyamat:
Kosodi kanen, kiidol aibois naperot, kalacasi ikosipukoi, ido koany, apesan nuka ŋolituŋanan kojaas aituk naka epukoke, akosipesan da koriana ekecetiai; kinyakunit bobo kakaninikosi.
Ido kiyau acepesan kakaninikosi agwelia inyamat: mam sio kijeni yenikibwaikini apesanakosi opukoikosi.”
Kobala kes ebe, “Ainapakin kojai mama ijaas, sirikiyoŋa, Edekekus ido Edeke loka papakus, ŋes kiinakini abara kotoma opukoikus: aponi kainakin akusipesan.” Kitolomik kes Simeon.
Kitoloma etuŋanan ituŋa togo loka Yosep, koinak kes akipi, kilotata akecekeje: koinak akecesigirian da inyamat.
Kitemonokis ainakinet tetere kebu Yosep paaran; naarai apuput ebe enyamete atap kanen.
Kiŋit kes kwape ejaatar, kobala ebe, “Enale papakus, emojoŋ loibalasi? Eroko ejari?”
Kobalas ebe, “Eŋalei ebulesitikon papakosi, eroko ejari.” Kituluroto akecekwes, kokukumoto.
Kiteluo Yosep akekonye, koany onaceke Benyamin, okoku loka totoke, kobala ebe, “Lo ŋes enooritikus loibalasi yesi?” Kobala ebe, “Edeke kosianik jo, ikakoku.”
Kiburak Yosep; naarai arieba noi eketau onaceke; komo neemonyia; koloma agolake komony kanen.
Kilot akonyen, kolom; kotik etau kobala ebe, “Kodutata inyamat.”
Kodutakinai ŋes bon, kes da bonik, ka Imisirian da luanyamenenete kaŋes, bonik: naarai mam Imisirian apedorete ainyam nepepe kIburanian; naarai arai ŋin naketal kama ejaas Imisirian.
Kiboikinos kakonyeneke, ekiyai kwape ejaar akepolou, ka eŋoorit da kwape ejaar eiditeuke: koumokis ituŋa noi.
Koodonok kes inyamat luajaas akonyeneke; konye aodokinet naka Benyamin kitelekarite nukec irwan akany. Komatata, kiyalamikinos kaŋes.
Kicorak ekeŋadan loka etogoke ebe, “Kilelebana ipukoi luka ituŋa inyamat kwape epedoriata kes aibwok, ido kibwaik apesan nuka ŋolituŋanan aituk naka epukoke.
Ido kibwaik aikopoka, aikopo naka epuesa aituk naka epuko loka eŋoorit, akepesan da nuka akima.” Kiswama kwape ajaar akirot naenera Yosep.
Nakiwala akwap kotwarai ituŋa, kes ka asigirianakec.
Kedautu kes anyoun kore, eriŋa ejaas die, kotema Yosep ekeŋadanike atiar, “Konyou, kotupa ituŋa; kidolok ijo kes, kolimok kes ebe, ‘Kanukinyo itacakiniata aronis itia ajokis?
Mere na ŋes naemasenena ejakaitika, ŋipeŋin da naedwarenenea? Ipotu kiswamata aronis aswam kwaŋin.’ ”
Kodolok, kolimonok kes akiro ŋun.
Kotemasi kesi atiar, “Inyo ainaki ejakaitika ener akiro nuikote kwaka ŋun? Madi akuj arai esubito ibulesinikon akirot naetia nen!
Koany, apesan nukipou isio kaanyutu kaituke nuka ipukoikosi, kipou kenyakutu mama ijai anyoun kakwap naka Kanaan: okwe tikikwaik ai kikokoi epuesa arai esabu kotoma togo loka ejakaitikon?
Ŋinituŋanan kotoma obulesinikon yenetakanuni ejai kaŋes, kotwana, isio da kiraun ibulesin luka ejakaitika.”
Kinera ebe, “Aso do koraunos kwape ejaatar akusikiro: loetakanuni ejai kaŋes, koraun do ebulesitika; yes da emamuun akirot.”
Kosodete kisunyasi kesi awounun ŋolituŋanan epukoke kwap, kolac ŋolituŋanan ekepuko.
Konie, ageun kama ejai ekiyai, kirikak kaneejai eŋoorit: kotakanu do aikopo kopuko loka Benyamin.
Kosodete kesi acilicil inapenekec, kibwaanakis iboro ŋolituŋanan asigiriake, kosodete aboŋor ore.
Kotema Yosep kes atiar, “Akirot anyoin na nakiswamakis? Mam ijenete ebe etuŋanan kwape keoŋ epedori cut aidwar?”

Kinera Yuda atiar, “Kitemari bo isio ai ekajakait? Kinera biai? Arai kikwaikini ai kitojokaar? Arou Edeke numam edolito kobulesinikon; koany kirai ibulesin luka ejakaitika, isio ka ŋol da loatakanu ejai aikopo akanike.”
Kinera ŋesi ebe, “Madi akuj mam eoŋ eswamai kwaŋin: etuŋanan loatakanu ejai aikopo akanike, ŋes eraun ebulesitika: konye yes, konyout koloto mama ejai papakus kainapakin.”
Abu ejakaitika kiŋit ikebulesin ebe, “Ejai yes papakus, arai onacekus?”
Kasodete isio da alimokin ejakaitika ebe, “ ‘Ejai sio papakosi, emojoŋit, ka ikoku da yenaurie ŋesi kemojoŋ, edit ikoku; onaceke da atwana, ŋes esalit bon kodwe luka totoke, emina da papake ŋes.’
Ijo da kotema ikonibulesin atiar, ‘Koinunai, kaany.’
Katemasi isio ejakaitika atiar, ‘Mam epedori etelepat ainyein papake: naarai arai kinyei papake, etwani papake.’
Kotema ijo ikonibulesin atiar, ‘Mam bobo ianyunete akakonyen dimikito kiupunos kenooritikus.’
Kasodete kiidol neejai ebulesitikon papaka, kalimonokis ŋes akiro nuka ejakaitika.
Kosodi papakosi atemar ebe, ‘Koboŋosi bobo, kogwelakis sio idisinyamat.’
Kenerata isio da ebe, ‘Mam kipedori alosit. Arai kiupar kenooritikosi, kilosi: naarai mam kianyuni akonyen nuka etuŋanan dimarai kiupara kenooritikosi.’
Ekonibulesit papaka kotema sio atiar, ‘Ijenete ebe abu akaberu kaurik eoŋ idwe iarei lutelepai:
Konyou idiopet kaneajai, kenera ebe, “Abeit aponi kopoopoai”; eoŋ da ageuni kaŋin mam bobo aanyunit:
Ido arai kiidemasi ŋin da, kosodi kodoik aronis, itolomarete ca akakorwo toma okatwak kanuka aiturur.’
Aso do arai kalot mama ejai ebulesitikon papaka, komamei etelepat kasio: naarai akeijar imorikikina kaijar naka etelepat:
Kosodi arai keanyu etelepat emamei, etwani: ikonibulesin da itolomarete akorwo nuka ebulesitikon papakosi toma okatwak kanuka aiturur.
Naarai ekonibulesit ŋes abwouni etelepat kama ejai papaka, kobala ebe, ‘Arai mam ayauni mama ijai, kabei eoŋ akirot kama ejai papaka apaarasia kere.’
Okwe, keŋaiŋait, kosal do ekonibulesit ne aibois naka etelepat araun ebulesit loka ejakaitika; kouparos etelepat kiinacanake.
Naarai ekwaikini ai alosi mama ejai papaka, komamei etelepat keoŋ? Kenyek aanyun aronis naedolokini papaka.”
Kodelo noi; kiirasi Imisirian, kiira da etogo loka Parao.
Kotema Yosep ikeinacan atiar, “Eoŋ Yosep; eriŋa papaka ejari?” Mam iinacanake apotu koboŋokis ŋes: naarai eyaloŋoŋoete kakonyeneke.
Kotema Yosep ikeinacan atiar, “Kikunyutu neajai, keŋaiŋaito.” Kikunyakis. Kotema atiar, “Eoŋ Yosep onacekus, Loipotu kogwelasi tape kayaunio Misiri.
Natikwana sirikiikadakis, karaida anyunyurikin kotauonokus, kanukigwelariata tape kayaunio ne: naarai abu Edeke ketiliŋ eoŋ aitajar yes.
Adau ebeli kotoma akwap ikar iarei: ido eriŋa esalito ikar ikany lumam ekoriere karaida asakia.
Ido Edeke ŋes ketilini aitajarikin yes ipapai kotoma akwap, aitajar da yes koraut erioŋet loepol loedeun.
Aso mere yes kiyaunete eoŋ ne, nabarai Edeke; ketuluo da papa neejai Parao, ido ejakait loka etogoke kere, ekayaiton akwap kere nako Misiri.
Kisunyito, koboŋosi neejai papaka, kotemasi ŋes atiar, ‘Okokukon Yosep atema kwanata ebe, “Abu Edeke ketuluo ejakait loka Misiri kere: kobwot neajai, sirikiyap.
Ido iboienenei kakwap nako Gosen, kidunyakin keen, ijo ka ikonidwe, ka idwe luka idwekon, ka akonimerekekin, ka akoniituk, ka luijaatar kere.
Ketanenenei da kanen: naarai eriŋa esalito ikar ikany luka ebeli: kinye aiyarorotoi, ijo ka ekalekon ka luijaatar.” ’
Ido koany, esesenete akusikonye, akonye da nuka onaceka Benyamin, aitukuka ŋipeŋin inera kayes.
Ilimokinete papaka aibusesuka kere kotoma Misiri kwape ejaar, ka nuianyut kere: kiwonyakisi kitwobotut papaka ne.”
Kosodi kibirokin omurisiŋ loka onaceke Benyamin, komony akiyo: Benyamin da komony komurisinlke.
Konuana ikeinacan kere, komony kamakec: kokau kaŋun kiyalata ikeinacan kaŋes.
Kopupunos akiro ŋun kotogo loka Parao, ebe, “Apotu iinacan luka Yosep.” Kisiyalamikis ŋun Parao, ka ikekejaanakinak da.
Kotema Parao Yosep atiar, “Kolimok iinacanakon ebe, ‘Kikwaikis neta: kisibwoka itiaŋikus iboro, koloto kakwap nako Kanaan;
Kooma papakus ka ikaliakus, kopotu mamakaŋ: eoŋ da kainakinete luejok luka akwap nako Misiri, ido inyamenenete lukajokak luka akwap.’
Natikwana kecorakinit jo, kikwaikis neta: koyaŋaasi agalin kakwap nako Misiri kanuka idwekus ludidik, ka aŋorokus da, koyaut papakus, kopotu.
Sirikipodokinos da iborokus luinyeinete: naarai ajokis naka akwap nako Misiri nakus.”
Kiswamata odwe luka Isirael kwaŋin: abu Yosep koinak kes agalin, kwape kicorakinia Parao, koinak da inyamat luka erot.
Abu koinak ŋolituŋanan kere inapen luibusak, konye abu koinak Benyamin atutubeta nuka epuesa akwat auni ka inapen ikany luibusak.
Kijukak papake kwanata; isigirian itomon luebwokitos lukajokak luko Misiri, ka asigirian nuunor atomon nuebwokitos akima ka inyamat ido luunyaman luenyami papake korot.
Kotwara do ikeinacan, koloto: kotema kes atiar, “Kocoito kinyeis aijolopikin korot.”
Konyout kakwap nako Misiri, kopotu akwap nako Kanaan mama ejai Yakob papakec.
Kotemasi atiar, “Eriŋa Yosep ejari, ido ŋes ekayaiton akwap kere nako Misiri.” Kodusaun etauke, naarai mam abu kiyu.
Kolimokis ŋes akiro kere nuka Yosep, nuabu kolimok kes: nakeanyunia agalin nuabu Yosep kijuka aomia ŋes, kikwar etau loka Yakob papakec.
Kotema Isirael atiar, “Edolit do: eriŋa okokuka Yosep ejari: alosi aanyun ŋes eriŋa eoŋ ketwana.”
Kiner Edeke ka Isirael kotapo loka akuare ebe, “Yakob, Yakob.” Kotema atiar, “Eoŋ lo.”
Kobala ebe, “Eoŋ Edeke, Edeke loka papakon: sirikikurianar alosit Misiri, naarai ketuluori jo kaŋina ateker naepol.
Alosi nepepe kajo Misiri; abeit da kenyakuni jo bobo; Yosep da ŋes itemokini akonikonye naitwania ijo.”
Konyou Yakob anyoun koBeer-seba: apotu odwe luka Isirael kodakasi Yakob papakec, ka ikecedwe ludidik ka akeceŋor da, kagalin nuejukari Parao adakunia ŋes.
Koyaata ikecebaren, ka ikeceboro luadumunete kakwap nako Kanaan, kopotu Misiri, Yakob ka aurike kere.
Odweke, ka odwe luka odweke nepepe kaŋes, adweke, ka adwe nuka odweke, ka aurike kere koyau kes Misiri.
Odwe luka Reuben; Kanok, ka Palu, ka Kesuron, ka Karami.
Odwe luka Simeon; Yemuel, ka Yamin, ka Okad, ka Yakin, ka Sokar, ka Saul okoku loka aberu Akanaanit.
Odwe luka Lebi; Gereson, ka Kokat, ka Merari.
Odwe luka Yuda; Er, ka Onan, ka Sela, ka Peres, ka Sera; konye kotwaka Er ka Onan kakwap naka Kanaan. Odwe luka Peres, Kesuron ka Kamul.
Odwe luka Isakar; Tola, ka Puba, ka Iob, ka Simuron.
Odwe luka Sebulun; Sered, ka Elon, ka Yakalecl.
Ŋul kes odwe luka Lea, lukeurikini Yakob koPadan-Aram, nepepe kakokuke Dina: ituŋa kere luka ikedwe lusap ka lupesur emwaasi akaisauni ka luuni.
Odwe luka Gad; Sipion, ka Kagi, ka Suni, ka Esebon, ka Eri, ka Arodi, ka Areli.
Odwe luka Aser; Imina, ka Isiba, ka Isibi, ka Beria, ka Sera kinacikec; odwe luka Beria, Keber, ka Malakiel.
Ŋul kes odwe luka Silupa, naabu Laban koinak akokuke Lea, lukeurikini Yakob, ituŋa itomon ka lukanykape.
Odwe luka Rakel aberu naka Yakob; Yosep ka Benyamin.
Ido kakwap nako Misiri kouri Yosep Manase ka Epuraim, luaurikini ŋes Asenas akoku naka Potipera esasedoti loka On.
Odwe luka Benyamin; Bela ka Beker, ka Asabel, ka Gera, ka Naaman, ka Eki, ka Ros, ka Mupim, ka Kupim, ka Arad.
Ŋul kes odwe luka Rakel, lukeurikini Yakob; ituŋa kere emwaasi itomon ka luoŋon.
Odwe luka Dan; Kusim.
Odwe luka Naputali; Yakaseel, ka Guni, ka Yeser, ka Silem.
Ŋul kes odwe luka Bilika, naabu Laban koinak Rakel akokuke, ŋul lukeurikini Yakob; ituŋa kere emwaasi ikanykaarei.
Ituŋa kere luapote nepepe ka Yakob Misiri, lualomunete kakuanake, komam imarakinitai aŋor nuka odwe luka Yakob, ituŋa kere emwaasi akaisakanykape ka lukanykape.
Odwe luka Yosep, lukeurikinio ŋes koMisiri, emwaasi ituŋa iarei: ituŋa kere lukokek loka Yakob, lukelomarete Misiri, emwaasi akaisakanykaarei.
Kitemonok Yosep agalike, kolot airiamakin ka Isirael papake, toma Gosen; kitodikin mama ejai, kibirokin omurisiŋike, komony akiyo komurisiŋike apak naepol.
Kotema Isirael Yosep atiar, “Mere do katwana, naarai aany akonikonye iroko ijari.”
Kotema Yosep ikeinacan ka ekalloka papake atiar, “Alosi alimokin Parao ebe, ‘Apotu mama ajai ikainacan ka ekalloka papaka luajaas akwap nako Kanaan.
Ido eraas kesi ikecokok, naarai icokienenete ibaren; ayaut da isipaninikec luka amerekekin ka aituk, ka iboro kere luejaatar.’
Kosodi arai kiinyara Parao, kiin it ebe, ‘Anyoin bo akusiswam?’

Iboŋokinete ebe, ‘Icokienenete ikonibulesin ibaren ageun koiditeukosi aitodol lolo, isio ka lukapapaakosi da’: tetere iboikinos roma akwap nako Gosen; naarai nolikecokon erai loketal mama ejaas Imisirian.”
Koseu koinacanake ituŋa ikany, koinu Parao.
Kobala Parao iinacanake ebe, “Anyoin bo akusiswam?” Kotemasi Parao atiar, “Eraas ibulesinikon ikecokok, isio ka lukapapaakosi da.”

Kotemasi Parao atiar, “Kiponit aiboi akwap na; naarai emameete inya kanuka ikosisipanin; naarai ededeŋ noi ebeli kakwap nako Kanaan: natikwana, kiŋaiŋait, kisiik ikonibulesin aiboikin akwap nako Gosen.”
Kobala Parao Yosep ebe, “Apotu papakon ka ikoniinacan mama ijai:

Akwap nako Misiri ejai akonyenekon; kisiboik papakon ka iinacanakon neitelekarit ajokis kotoma akwap; aso kiboikinos akwap nako Gosen: ido arai ijeni kakesi luekukuraka kitarau kes lukapolok luka ibareneka.”
Kotema Parao Yakob atiar, “Imwaasi ai apaarasia nuka ikar luka aijarakon?”

Kobala Yakob Parao ebe, “Apaarasia nuka ikar luka alositeka eraas ikar akwatat ka akaisauni: apaarasia nuka ikar luka aijaraka eraas luikidioko ido lueroko, ido mam edolokinete apaarasia nuka ikar luka aijar naka lukapapaaka kapaarasia nuka alositekec.”
Kilipak Yakob Parao asuliany, koloma kakonyen nuka Parao.
Kisiboik Yosep papake ka ikeinacan, koinak aibois kakwap nako Misiri, neetelekarit ajokis kotoma akwap, akwap naka Ramases, kwape kicorakinia Parao.
Kitanenenei Yosep papake ka ikeinacan ka ekal kere loka papake, kinyamat, kwape ajaatar ikecedwe.
Kotukonok Yosep apesan kere nuajaas kakwap nako Misiri, kakwap nako Kanaan, naetwegelenenea akima. Koyau Yosep apesan togo loka Parao.

Kedaut apesan kere nuka akwap nako Misiri ka nuka akwap nako Kanaan atukonokinio, kopotu Imisirian kere mama ejai Yosep, kobalas ebe, “Koinakinai sio inyamat: kanukinyo kitwakikinia akonyenekon? Naarai kiwolikis sio apesan.”
Kobala Yosep ebe, “Koinakinai ibarenekus; eoŋ da kainanakini itia ibarenekus, arai kiwolikinitos apesan.”
Koinutu Yosep ibarenekec: koinak Yosep kes inyamat aisieca ibalasin, ka isipanin luka amerekekin, ka aituk, ka asigirian: kitanyam kes inyamat ekaru ŋol isiecanarete ibarenekec kere.

Kedaun ekaru ŋol, kopotu bobo neejai kokaru kalokiareit, kobalas ŋes ebe, “Mam kimunonikini ejakaitikosi kwape adaunotor apesanakosi kere; isipanin da luka ibaren araunos luka ejakaitikosi; mam yenesalit kakonyen nuka ejakaitikosi, dimarai awatekosi ka akwapukosi:

Kanukinyo kitwakikinia akonyenekon, isio ka akwapukosi da? kogwelai sio ka akwapukosi kinyamat, kiraun do isio ka akosikwap ibulesin luka Parao; koinakinai sio ikinyom, kajarata kenyeis atwakare, kinyek akwap asilior.”
Kogwelak kwaŋin Yosep Parao akwap kere nako Misiri; naarai apotu Imisirian kogwelanasi ŋinituŋanan ekemanikor, naarai abu ebeli kodedeijik kes: koraun akwap naka Parao.
Kitubulesenei da ituŋa kwape ajaatar oreriakec ageun koikor loka Misiri neesanit aitodol awasiake ace.
Konye mam abu kogwel akwap naka isasedotin; naarai ajaas isasedotin ewai loainanakini Parao, konyamenenete ewaikec loainanakini Parao kes: ŋes mam agwelariata akecekwap.
Kosodi kotema Yosep ituŋa atiar, “Koany, agwelak lolo Parao yes ka akusikwap: koany, ikinyomokus lu, koyeata.
Kosodete naisakeneniata, iinanakinete Parao idiopet kokany, eraunos iwaitin iwoŋon lukus, araun luyean, araun da ikusinyamat, ido luka ikaliakus, inyamat da luka idwekus ludidik.”
Kobalas ebe, “Ibu ijo kitajar sio kotoma atwanare: kadumutu asianut kakonyen nuka ejakaitikosi, ido kiraun ibulesin luka Parao.”
Kisilak Yosep ekisil ŋol akwap nako Misiri aitodol lolo, ainanakin Parao idiopet kokany; nabarai akwap naka isasedotin bon ŋes mam abu koluor naka Parao.
Kiboikin Yakob kakwap nako Misiri ikar itomon ka lukanykaarei: kwaŋin apaarasia nuka Yakob, ikar luka aijarake, imwaasi ikar akwatat ka akaisaoŋon ka lukanykaarei.
Konye kajotoor nepepe kalukapapaaka, kidakari eoŋ koMisiri, kidaik aibois nakidaanakinakec.” Kotema atiar, “Eswamai kwape kitemaria.”
Kotema atiar, “Kiyapoikinoi.” Kiyapoik ŋes, Kitulur Isirael akekou koitadake.
Kosodi kokau kaŋun, kolimokinai Yosep ebe, “Koany, edek papakon.” Koyaŋa ŋesi odweke luarei, Manase ka Epuraim.
Kolimokinai Yakob ebe, “Koany, ebunit okokukon Yosep mama ijai.” Kiriun Isirael, koboikin oitada.
Kobala Yakob Yosep ebe, “Edeke Lokapedor kere abu ketaanyikin koLus kakwap nako Kanaan, kesireren.
Kabala ŋesi eoŋ ebe, ‘Koany, kesuuri, kesupui, ketuluori da atukot naka atekerin: ido ainakini aurikon naetupakini akwap na araun airumet naka ikar ka ikar.’
Kwana da odwekon luarei, luiwurie ijo koMisiri koroko eoŋ kebuno neijai koMisiri eraas lukaŋ; eraunos Epuraim ka Manase idweka kwape ka Reuben ka Simeon.
Aurikon da naiwurienenei kokau kaŋul, eraun nakon, emaanakinio ikiroria luka iinacanakec kotoma airumukec.
Ka eoŋ da, naanyounio koPadan, nukican kotwana Rakel kakwap nako Kanaan korot, koroko apak es alit epol adolore Epurat, kedaik ŋina orot loebei Epurat (ŋes Bet-lekem).”
Koany Isirael odwe luka Yosep, kobala ebe, “Lukaŋai bo lu?”
Kotema Yosep papake atiar, “Kes odweka lukainakini Edeke kane.” Kobala ebe, “Kisukuny kes, keŋaiŋait, eoŋ da elipakini kes arereŋ.”
Ido kowariwarete akonye nuka Isirael kanuka amojoŋ, komam epedori asesen. Kisukunyik, kotun, konu.
Kobala Isirael Yosep ebe, “Mam abu kaomite ebe aanyuni akonikonyen; ido koany, ketaany da Edeke aurikon.”
Kitonyou Yosep kes kokidiŋ kakuninike; kitulur akekonyen kwap.
Koyaŋau Yosep kes luarei, Epuraim kakanike nakoteten mama ejai akan nakokediany naka Isirael, ka Manese da kakanike nakokediany, mama ejai akan nakoteten naka Isirael, kisukunyik mama ejai.
Korio Isirael akekan nakoteten, kidokok akou naka Epuraim, ŋes lodidi, ka akekan nakokediany akou naka Manase, kepelet ailokonyikin akekanin; naarai kerai Manase ekiyai.
Kilipak Yosep arereŋ, kobala ebe,
“Edeke loalosenenete lukapapaaka Aburaam ka Isaak kakonyeneke,
Edeke loketanyamenenei apaarasiaka kere aitodol lolo.
ekakiror da kolimitere kes, ka ikiroria luka lukapapaaka Aburaam ka Isaak;
ido koluoros etuŋat loepol kokidiŋ akwap.”
Kotema Yosep papake atiar, “Mam, papa; naarai ŋol ŋes ekiyai, kidokok akanikon nakoteten akouke.”
Kogiri papake kobala ebe, “Ajeni, oko kuka, ajeni: ŋes da eluori ateker, eluori ŋesi da lokapolon; konye onaceke lodidi ŋes itelekari kapolou, eraun da aurike atekerin nuipu.”
Kilipak arereŋ kapaaran kaŋin, kobala ebe,
“Kamakon ŋes ilipenena Isirael arereŋ;
ebe, ‘Edeke kituluo kwape Epuraim ka Manase.’ ”
Kibwaik Epuraim ageikin Manase.
Kotema Isirael Yosep atiar, “Koany, atwani; konye ejaenena Edeke kayes, kinyakari bobo akwap naka lukapapaakus.
Ido kainak ewai
Kopupokisi Isirael papakus.
Loitelekarit kapolou, ido loitelekarit kagogoŋ.
Naarai ibu kodoka oitada loka papakon:
Kosodi komunau; abu kolot aperitika.
Lujiis luka adedeŋ kes ikecekileŋa.
Akaibuses, mam imorikikin mama ejai atukokinikec;
Naarai kanuka anyunyurakec apotu koarata etuŋanan,
Kanuka elepakec da apotu kojepata emoŋ.
Ka aisiopokec, naarai kerai naka ameŋeranut:
Atiakari kes kotoma Yakob, Ido esiarakini kes koIsirael.
Yuda, kiturenenete jo ikoniinacan:
Akonikan ejaun omurisiŋa luka lukasurupokon:
Ekukonokinos odwe luka papakon kakonyenekon.
Okokuka, idoka anyoun kama kalumeian;
Abu kokukum, kidipidipakin bala eŋatuny,
Ido bala aŋatuny: iŋai itonyouni ŋes?
Karaida ebela loka ekayaiton kokidiŋ kakejeneke,
Aitodol neebunio Silo.
Ido erimarete ŋes ituŋa.
Eenikini ikoku yenika ebalasitike omusabibu,
Ikoku yenika asigiriake omusabibu loejok;
Abu kilosia ebino ikegoen,
Ka aokot da nuka emusabibu abu kilosia anapitoke:
Ereneunete akonyeneke kanuka ebino,
Ekwanunete ikekela da kanuka akile.
Korai edoket kanuka imerin;
Eikoruke da ŋes Sidon.
Isakar ŋes asigma nakagogoŋ;
Naidipidipitoi kokidiŋ kaujoi nuka amerekekin;
Koany ŋesi aibois naka aibworar ebe ejok,
Ka akwap da ebe erai naisiyalamikinit;
Kokukum aidak kokeperike,
Korau ebulesit lokeswaman nukailolitoi.
Kwape ediopet loka atekerin nuka Isirael.
Asigirikoloŋ kotoma osokot,
Naekonyi atitiban nuka ebalasit,
Kolatun loibwanenit kau.
Konye ŋes da icikakini akecetitibat.
Aser, eburior akeimuj kotomake,
Einakini idiasio luibusakinito ekabaka.
Naputali ŋes amori naelapadai;
Einakini akiro nukajijimak.
Yosep ŋes atenu naerai,
Atenu naerai eapie kaleles;
Ilanyito atenunake arwatat.
Egumete ŋes, imanito ŋes:
Kitogogoŋai akekanin,
Kakanin nuka Ekagogoŋon loka Yakob.
(Kanen ŋes Ekecokon, amoru naka Isirael,)
Ido kanuka Lokapedor kere, lokisirereŋi,
Arereŋesio nuepote kakuj nakokuju,
Arereŋesio da nuepote kaidules naka akwap,
Arereŋesio da nukokisin, ka nuka akoik.
Arereŋesio da nuka papakon
Etelekasi cut arereŋesio nuka lukapapaaka
Anatar eikoru lokosaŋe loka iukon lumam edaunos:
Ebeete akou naka Yosep,
Ido osiaduk loka akou naka ŋol kaloetiakunitai koinacanake.
Tupuruc enyamenenei lumejauna,
Eboŋ da ekorenenei luŋatuna.”
Ŋun kere kes atekerin atomon ka nuarei nuka Isirael: ŋun da kes nuabu papakec kolimonok kes ilipakini arereŋ; abu kilipak ŋolituŋanan kwape ajaar akerereŋ.
Kicorak kes kotema atiar, “Kayaŋaario neejaas ikatuŋa: kidaikis eoŋ neidaikinitai lukapapaaka toma abua naejai omanikor loka Epuron Ekitit.
Toma abua naejai omanikor loka Makupela, loitei Mamure kakwap nako Kanaan, naabu Aburaam kogwel ka emanikor da kaneejai Epuron Ekitit araun airumet nakidaanakina:
Ŋes neaponi kidaikinai Aburaam ka Sara akeberu; ŋina da edaikinio Isaak ka Rebeka akeberu; ŋipoŋina da abu kedaik Lea:
Emanikor ka abua naejai toma, loagwelio kaneejaas idwe luka Ket.”
Kedau Yakob aicor odweke, kosukok akekejen koitada, kojal aijar, koyaŋaarai mama ejaas iketuŋa.
Kicorak Yosep ikebulesin luaraas imurwok aitoono papake: kitoonoto imurwok Isirael.
Kodautu apaarasia akaisaoŋon itoonete; naarai kwape kwaŋin apaarasia nuka aitoon etia nepenen: kibworoto Imisirian ŋes adaun apaarasia akais akanykaarei.
Abu papaka kesiyap eoŋ ebe, ‘Koany, atwani: toma ates naabu eoŋ elopet kabok toma akwap nako Kanaan ŋes kidaikini.’ Aso, keŋaiŋait, kalot keda papaka ido aboŋuni.”
Kobala Parao ebe, “Kolot kida papakon kwape kisiyapoo kolo.”
Kolot Yosep aida papake: koloto ikejaanakinak da kere luka Parao nepepe kaŋes, imakio lukotogoke, ka imakio da luka akwap nako Misiri.
Ekal da kere loka Yosep, iinacanake da, ka ekal da loka papake: nabarai ikecedwe ludidik, ka isipaninikec luka amerekekin ka luka aituk, ŋul bonik apotu kesi kinyeis kotoma akwap nako Gosen.
Kolot ŋesi nepepe kagalin ka luebwanenito ibalasin: koraun erioŋet loepol noi.
Kodoloto opejal loka Atad, loejai okekwa loka Yorodan, kokuudianata kaŋina akuudian naepol noi: kodau apaarasia akanykaarei ibworo papake.

Nakiirasi ŋul lueboienenete kotoma akwap, kes Ikanaanin, aibworo kopejal loka Atad, kobalas ebe, “Epol ca ma aibworo na kama ejaas Imisirian.” Ŋes emaikinere ekekiror Abel-Misiraim, naejai okekwa loka Yorodan.
Kosubakis ŋes odweke kwape kolo ecorakinia kes:

Naarai apotu odweke kodakasi ŋes toma akwap nako Kanaan, kidaikis toma abua nakotoma emanikor loka Makupela, loitei Mamure, naagweli Aburaam nepepe kemanikor da, araun airumet nakidaanakina, kama ejai Epuron Ekitit.
Koboŋo Yosep Misiri, ŋes ka ikeinacan, kere da lualosito kaŋes aida papake; kedau ŋesi aida papake.
Kiyakikis Yosep, kobalas ebe, “Abu papakon kicorak eroko ketwana ebe,

‘Ilimokinete do Yosep ebe, Keŋaiŋait, kitim adiakaret naka ikoniinacan, ka aronisikec da, naarai apotu kesi kiswamakis jo nueroko.’ Natikwana da, kiŋaiŋait isio jo, kitim adiakaret naka ibulesin luka Edeke loka papakon.” Komony Yosep naeneratatar kaŋes.
Apotu ikeinacan koloto kokukonokinos kakonyeneke; kobalas ebe, “Koany, kirai isio ikonibulesin.”
Kotema Yosep kes atiar, “Sirikikuriakata: ajai do eoŋ toma aibois naka Edeke?
Ipeleikinito yesi aiswamakin eoŋ aronis; konye Edeke epeleikinit aiswamakinia eoŋ ajokis, ka aitodol, kwape ejaar lolo, aitajar ituŋa luipu kinyeis atwakare.
Aso natikwana sirikikuriakaros; ketanenenei yes ka ikusidwe da ludidik.” Kitalaka kes, kolimonok nuka asianut.
Kiboikin Yosep Misiri, ŋes ka ekal da loka papake; kobut Yosep ikar akwatat ka itomon.
Koany Yosep idwe luka Epuraim ka ipapai da; ido aurio idwe luka Makir okoku loka Manase kakuŋin nuka Yosep.
Kolimok Yosep ikeinacan ebe, “Atwani: konye mam ekurwokini Edeke aanyanar yes, alemar yes kakwap kana, kinyakari da akwap naeyapoikinit ŋesi Aburaam, ka Isaak, ka Yakob.”
Kisiyapo Yosep idwe luka Isirael kobala ebe, “Mam ekurwokini Edeke aanyanar yes, iyaŋaarete da akakojo alemar kakwap kana.”
Kotwana do Yosep, kodaunite ikar akwatat ka itomon: kitoonoi, kosodete aibwaikin toma asaduku nakidais koMisiri.
Reuben, ka Simeon, ka Lebi, ka Yuda;
Isakar, ka Sebulun, ka Benyamin;
Dan ka Naputali, ka Gad ka Aser.
Ituŋa kere lualomunete kakuan naka Yakob emwaasi ituŋa akaisakanykaarei; konye kojai Yosep Misiri sek.
Kotwana Yosep, ka ikeinacan kere, ka atur ŋin kere.
Kouriaros idwe luka Isirael, kiyatakinos noi, kipuaros, koraunos lukagogoŋok noi; kilelebunos akwap.
Kotema iketuŋa atiar, “Koany, ipuituŋa luka idwe luka Isirael luegogoŋ aitelekarit oni;
Aso katubokisi acoa; kinyeis aipuar, tetere arai kebu ejie, kinyeis aimorikikin kalukasurupowok aitiji oni, kosodete anyoun kakwap.”
Kanuka ŋun kibwaikinai iketwasamak aitican kes kabwokonikec. Kodukokis Parao ireria luka aiŋadisia, Pitom ka Raamuses.
Konye kwape eyatakiniata aitican, kiyatas kesi da kwape kwaŋin aipuar kaisiarakin. Kokadakis kes kanuka idwe luka Isirael.
Kitwasamata Imisirian idwe luka Isirael kagogoŋ;
Koroikis aijarakec kotoma obulesene loetiono, aitaaritoi naka elupe ka amatapalin, ka ebulesene kere loka amanat, ebulesene kere loetwasamata kagogoŋ.
Kotema ekabaka loka Misiri akesidok Nuburanian, ekiror loka adiopet Sipira, ekiror loka nakiareit Pua:
Kotema atiar, “Naisidoenenoto aŋor Nuburanian, kianyutu idounete; arai erai ikoku yenitelepat, iarete; konye arai erai yenipese, ejari.”
Konye koyoŋa akesidok Edeke, mam apotu kiswamata kwape kicorakinitor kes ekabaka loka Misiri, konye apotu kesi kinyaanakis idwe lutelepai ejarete.
Konyarau ekabaka loka Misiri akesidok, kobala kes atiar, “Kanukinyo iswamaata akirot ŋin, ainyein idwe lutelepai ejarete?”
Kobalas akesidok Parao atiar, “Naarai aŋor Nuburanian mam esubito bala aŋor Numisirian; naarai eŋaleete, idounete eroko akesidok kepona mamakec.”
Kosubak Edeke akesidok ejok; kiyatakinos ituŋa aipuar, koraut lukagogoŋok noi.
Kosodi naarai ayoŋito akesidok Edeke, abu koinak kes ikalia.
Kicorak Parao ituŋake kere kobala atiar, “Ŋolitelepat loeurunio icakakinete ocor, konye napese, inyeinete ejari.”
Kopotuu aberu, kouru ikoku yenitelepat: konye keanyu ebe ejokuna, kibwa ber ŋes ilapio iuni.
Kosodi keanyu ebe mam epedori aibwait bobo, koyaŋa eijaŋ loka aladoi, kinyonyo erit ka emina, kibwaik ikoku toma, kibwaik okido ariri naka ecor.
Kobwoi kinacike kaneelwana, ajenun nuedoikinete ŋes.
Kolot akoku naka Parao ailoŋ ocor; koloto apesuruke ariri naka ecor; koany eijaŋ kokido, kijukak akebulesit alemun.
Kopuko, koany ikoku; ido koany, komony ikoku. Kitim, kobala ebe, “Yen ŋes idiopet kodwe luka Iburanian.”
Kosodi kinacike kotema akoku naka Parao ebe, “Alosi ca kanyarak jo aketanakan kaŋor nuka Iburanian kitanakik ikoku?”
Kotema akoku naka Parao atiar, “Kolot.” Kolot apese konyarau toto naka ikoku alopet.
Kotema akoku naka Parao atiar, “Koyaŋa ikoku yen kitanakik, eoŋ da kainakini jo eropitikon.” Koyaŋa aberu ikoku, kitanak.
Kopoloor ikoku, koinu akoku naka Parao, koluor ikekoku. Komaik ekekiror Musa, kobala ebe, “Naarai alemuni kakipi.”
Koŋoleŋol epuwai ka epuwai, koany ebe emamei icliotuŋanan, kosen Emisiriat, konukak asiŋe.
Kosodi kolot kapaaran nakiareit, ido koany, ajios ituŋa iarei luka Iburanian: kotema ŋesi je loasubit erono ebe, “Kanukinyo isenio yenicekon?”
Kobala ebe, “Iŋai bo kitarauni jo ekosikapolon ekatubonikosi da? Ikoto kereka aiar eoŋ da kwape iaria Emisiriat?” Koyoŋ Musa, kobala ebe, “Abeit ajenun akirot ŋin.”
Kosodi kiira Parao akiro ŋun, kokoto aiar Musa.
Konye koker Musa kakonyen nuka Parao, kiboikin akwap naka Midian: kiboikin eiduny katan.
Ajaas esasedoti loka Midian adweke akanykaarei; kopotu aiwok akipi, kilelebata atuba, kiruata amerekekin nuka papakec.
Kopotu ikecokok kireŋeasi: konye konyou Musa kiŋarak, kiru esipanikec.
Kepotu mama ejai papakec Reuel, kobala ebe, “Ipotu ca yesi lolo atipet?”
Kobalas ebe, “Emisiriat ŋes kiyuuni sio kakanin nuka ikecokok, bobo da abu kowokok sio akipi, kiru esipan.”
Kotema adweke ebe, “Ejai bai? Kanukinyo kinyeiniata etuŋanan uŋol? Konyarautu konyam inyamat.”
Kiyu Musa aiboi ketuŋanan kaŋol: kokorak Musa akokuke Sipora.
Kouru ikoku yenitelepat, komaik ekekiror Geresom: naarai kobala ebe, “Arai epejonon kakwap naka imo.”
Kopup Edeke eidinyakec, kiitu Edeke aitutuketeke naetutukit kAburaam, ka Isaak, ka Yakob.
Koany Edeke idwe luka Isirael, kojen Edeke nukec.
Kitaanyikin emalaika loka EJAKAIT Uŋes, kotoma aŋajep naka akim kokidiŋ kekiot: kosesen, ido koany, anoki akim kokiot, komam ekiot idopori.
Kobala Musa ebe, “Kamana ber, kaany akirot na naepol, namam ekiot idoporia.”
Keanyu EJAKAIT ŋes emanuni aanyun, konyarau Edeke Uŋes kokidiŋ okiot kiner ebe, “Musa, Musa.” Kii ebe, “Eoŋ lo.”
Kobala ebe, “Sirikikuny ne: kolaca akonimuk kakejenekon, naarai aibois naibwoia erai akwap nakalaunan.”
Kiner bobo ebe, “Eoŋ Edeke loka papakon, Edeke loka Aburaam, Edeke loka Isaak, Edeke loka Yakob da.” Kibwa Musa akekonyen; naarai abu koyoŋ asesen Edeke.

Adokunit ayuun kes kakan naka Imisirian, aitonyoun kes kakwap kaŋin aitolomar akwap naejok, naelal, akwap naeleleete akile ka esik; aibois naka Ekanaanit, ka Ekitit, ka Emorait, ka Eperisit, ka Ekibit, ka Eyebusit.
Aso koany, kadoloki aimony naka idwe luka Isirael: bobo da aany aroikinit naeroikinitotor Imisirian kes.
Bia do, keyakia neejai Parao, kitolom ikatuŋa idwe luka Isirael koMisiri.”
Kobala Musa Edeke ebe, “Iŋai bo eoŋ, loalosi neejai Parao? aitolomun idwe luka Isirael koMisiri?”
Kotema atiar, “Abeit ajaenena Eoŋ kajo; ido na ŋes aanyunet nakitejenuni jo ebe Eoŋ keyakiarit: naidaunia aitolomun ituŋa ŋul koMisiri, ijaanakinete Edeke komoru kalo.”
Kobala Edeke Musa ebe, “AJAI KWAPE AJAAR.” Kobala ebe, “Ilimokini idwe luka Isirael ebe, ‘AJAI ŋes keyakunit mama ijaas.’ ”

Kobala Edeke Musa ebe, “Ilimokini idwe luka Isirael ebe, ‘EJAKAIT, Edeke loka lukapapaakus, Edeke loka Aburaam, Edeke loka Isaak, Edeke loka Yakob da, ŋes keyakunit mamakus’: ŋol ŋes ekakiror ikar kere, ŋin da ŋes aiituneteka anatar aturio kere.

Kolot, kotukonok imakio luka Isirael nepepe, kolimok kes ebe, ‘EJAKAIT, Edeke loka lukapapaakus, Edeke loka Aburaam, loka Isaak, loka Yakob da, ŋes abu ketaanyikinkobala ebe, “Abeit kaanyana yes, aany nukiswamanakinio koMisiri:
ŋes abalar atiar, Ketolomuni yes kaiticanio naka Misiri alomar akwap naka Ekanaanit, ka Ekitit, ka Emorait, ka Eperisit, ka Ekibit, ka Eyebusit, akwap naeleleete akile ka esik.” ’

Iirarete ekoniporoto: ibuni ijo ka imakio luka Isirael, mama ejai ekabaka loka Misiri ilimokinete ebe, ‘Abu EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Iburanian keriamunos kasio; aso keŋaiŋait, kisiikinai kaloto alosit naka apaarasia auni toma amodiŋ; ainakin asuban neejai EJAKAIT Ekosideke.’
Ajeni kojokan ebe, mam ekabaka loka Misiri kisiikini yes alosit, eebo, karaida kakan nakagogoŋ.
Ariori eoŋ da akakan, kasodi aidany Misiri kere kaumokinetaka kere nueswamai kokidiŋikec: kokau kaŋun kisiikini yes alosit.
Ido ainilini ituŋa ŋul aminunio kakonyen nuka Imisirian: aso nainyounioto, mam inyounete atitai:
Konye ilipi ŋiniberu akeidunyet, ka ŋin da naiboie kotogoke, iboro luka epuesa ka iboro luka esabu, ka igoen: isirete ikusidwe lusap ka lupesur; ido iŋasete Imisirian.”
Koboŋok Musa atiar, “Konye, koany, mam keyuunete eoŋ karaida akiirar ekaporoto: naarai etemarete atiar, ‘Mam EJAKAIT kitaanyikina jo.’ ”
Kotema EJAKAIT atiar, “Inyo bo ŋin ejai akanikon?” Kotema atiar, “Ebela.”
Kotema atiar, “Kocakak kwap.” Kocakak kwap, koluor ebela emun; koker Musa kamake.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar, “Korio akonikan, kitiŋ ekekori”: (korio akekan, kitiŋ, koraun emun ebela kakanike:)
“Tetere iyuunete ebe, abu EJAKAIT, Edeke loka lukapapaakec, Edeke loka Aburaam, Edeke loka Isaak, Edeke loka Yakob, kitaanyikin jo.”
Kotema EJAKAIT bobo atiar, “Kipiik akonikan atorobukon.” Kipiik akekan atorobuke: konye elemari, koany, ebokoror akekan atapon.
Kobala ebe, “Kinyakak akonikan atorobukon.” (Kinyakak akekan atorobuke; konye elemari katorobuke, koputokinos kakuanake kere.)
“Kosodi kanen, arai mam kes kiyuunete jo karaida akiirar eporoto loka aanyunet nasodit, iyuunete kesi eporoto loka aanyunet nakiareit.
Kosodi arai mam iyuunete aanyuneta ŋun nuarei, karaida akiirar eporotokon, iwokuni akipi nukocor kobukok neeonit: akipi nuiwokuni kocor eluoros aokot kaneeoŋit.”
Kotema EJAKAIT atiar, “Iŋai kesubi aituk naka ituŋanan? arai iŋai itababaŋi ituŋanan, arai aisikimiŋ, arai aitwekenyun arai aitumudak? mere Eoŋ EJAKAIT?
Aso do kolot, ajaenena eoŋ kakoniituk, kesisianakini nuinera.”
Kotema atiar, “Wu EJAKAIT, keŋaiŋait, kijuka ŋol loikoto aijukar.”
Kinep anyunyura naka Edeke aluikin Musa, kiner atiar, “Emamei Aaron onacekon Elebit? Ajeni ebe epedori ener ejok. Ido koany, ebunit airiamun kajo; kiiany jo iyalamikin kotauke.
Ineri ijo kaŋes, ipiikini da akiro aitukuke: eoŋ da ajaenena kakoniituk, ka akeituk, kesisianakinete nuiswamaete.
Eraun ŋesi ekeneranikon kama ejaas ituŋa; kosodi eraun ŋesi akoniituk, iraun ijo da kamake kwape Edeke.
Itiŋi ijo ebela lo kakanikon, aiswamaa aanyuneta.”

Kolot Musa koboŋo mama ejai Yetero ekamuranike, kotema atiar, “Keŋaiŋait, kisiikinai kalot, kaboŋo mama ejaas ikainacan luejaas Misiri, kaany arai eriŋa ejarete.” Kotema Yetero Musa atiar, “Kolot kainapakin.”
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa koMidian atiar, “Kolot, koboŋo Misiri: naarai atwaka ituŋa kere luakotosi aiar jo.”
Koya Musa akeberu ka odweke, kisibwanen kes asigiria, koboŋo akwap nako Misiri: koya Musa ebela loka Edeke kakanike.
Ilimokini Parao atiar, ‘Inera EJAKAIT kwanata ebe, Isirael ŋes okokuka, ekiyaika.
Katema eoŋ jo atiar, “Kisiik okokuka alosit kejaanak eoŋ.” Igir ijo aisiikin ŋes alosit; koany, aari okokukon, ekiyaikon.’ ”
Kosodi Sipora alemun amoru naekwana kotubunio amuny naka ekiliokane loka okokuke, kocakak akejen nuka Musa; kotema atiar, “Abeit irai ijo eteran loka aokot kamakaŋ.”
Kinyek do ŋes. Kosodi ŋin atemar ebe, “Irai eteran loka aokot,” kanuka akepio.
Kolimok Musa Aaron akiro kere nuka EJAKAIT nuejukaritor, ka aanyuneta kere nuecorakinit.
Koloto Musa ka Aaron kotukonokisi imakio kere luka idwe luka Isirael;
Kiner Aaron akiro kere nualimokinit Edeke Musa, kiswama aanyuneta kakonyen nuka ituŋa.
Kiyuut ituŋa: kiirasi ebe aanyana EJAKAIT idwe luka Isirael, aanyu da aiticaniokec, kituluro akwesikec, komaata.
Kiner Parao ebe, “Iŋai bo EJAKAIT? Tape eoŋ apupuni ekeporoto, kasodi aisiikin Isirael alosit? Mam eoŋ ajeni EJAKAIT, ido bobo mam esiikini Isirael alosit.”

Kotemasi ebe, “Abu Edeke loka Iburanian kiriamun kasio: kiŋaiŋait, kisiik sio kaloto alosit naka apaarasia auni toma amodiŋ, kainakisi asuban mama ejai EJAKAIT Ekosideke; kinyek aidany sio katular, arai kekileŋ.”
Kotema ekabaka loka Misiri kes atiar, “Ijo Musa, ka Aaron kanukinyo isinyeiniata ituŋa aswamisiokec? koloto neejai abwokonikus.”
Kiner Parao ebe, “Koany, epuata kwana ituŋa lukotoma akwap, yes da isiyenut kes kotoma abwokonikec.”
Kapaaran kaŋin abu Parao kicorak iketwasamak ituŋa ka ijakakec da ebe,
“Mam bobo iinanakinete ituŋa anya nusubet amatapalin kwape lem sek; koloto kesi kotukonokis anya kanukec.

Etiai da loka amatapalin, lopelem iswamaenenete kesi, ŋopeŋol ŋes itubokinete; sirikitidisiasi nepetai da: naarai elonwaaka; ŋes einakinit kes aimony ebe, ‘Kisiikinai kaloto kainakisi asuban mama ejai Ekosideke.’
Kijaikisi do ituŋa aswam naetiono noi, kitaaritotor; kinyeis aipup akiro nuka aiŋal.”
Kolototo yesi ikulepek kotukonokis anya kaneidumakinete kere: naarai mam itidisiario akusiswam.’ ”
