Kanuka ŋun kisiarakinos ituŋa toma akwap kere nako Misiri atukonokin akasirim aitaraun anya.
Kisinyikokis luketwasamakakec ebe, “Kitodoloto aswamisiokus, ipelueik luka ŋinipaaran, kwape lem iswamaenenaata ejaas anya.”
Koleata iketwasamak luka Parao ijaka luka idwe luka Isiraelluaseunito kesi, kobalas ebe, “Kanukinyo mam yes itodolitotor akusiswam bian ka lolo da, kotoma aisub amatapalin kwape lem sek?”
Kosodi kopotu ijaka luka idwe luka Isirael, emonyete mama ejai Parao ebe, “Kanukinyo ikonakinia ikonibulesin kwaŋin?
Mam einanakinio ikonibulesin anya, konye kibalai sio ebe, ‘Kosubata amatapalin’: ido koany, eleio ikonibulesin; kwabo erai aibucaret naka ikonituŋa obe.”
Konye kotema ebe, “Iloŋwaaka, iloŋwaaka yesi: ŋes ineratar yesi ebe, ‘Kisiikinai kaloto ainakin asuban mama ejai EJAKAIT.’
Koloto do aswam; naarai mam kiinakinio anya, konye isubete etiai loka amatapalin lopelem.”
Koanyut ijaka luka idwe luka Isirael ebe ejaas kesi ocan naalimunenere ebe, “Mam inonooretc amatapalinikus, karaida ipelueikikus luka ŋinipaaran.”
Kiriamunos kesi ka Musa ka Aaron, luabwoete korot, eboŋunete kesi kama ejai Parao.
Kolimokis kes ebe, “Kitei EJAKAIT yes, kotub da; naarai kisilaata yesi sio kakonyen nuka Parao, kakonyen da nuka ibulesinike, aibwaikin ekileŋ akaninikec aaria sio.”
Naarai ageun naabunio eoŋ neejai Parao einer kokirorikon, ekonaki ŋesi ituŋa lu erono; kwabo mam ibu koyuu ikonituŋa nepetai da.”
Abu ketaanyikin Aburaam, ka Isaak, ka Yakob, kwape Edeke Lokapedor kere, konye toma okirorika YAWE mam apotu kajenut eoŋ.
Etogogoŋ da akaitutuket kakes, ainakin kes akwap naka Kanaan, akwap naka alositekec, naalosenenoto.
Ido eira eidiny loka idwe luka Isirael, luitubulesenito Imisirian; eitu akaitutuket.
Ŋes ilimokinia idwe luka Isirael ebe, ‘Eoŋ Yawe, ketolomunete kabwokon naka Imisirian kalemarete kobulesenekec, kalakunete kakan naerioro, ka itubesia luepolok:
Ido kaseuni yes araun ateker mama ajai, eoŋ da araun Edeke kamakus: ijenunete yesi da ebe Eoŋ Yawe Ekusideke, loketolomuni yes kotoma abwokon naka Imisirian.
Ido ketolomarete toma akwap naabu kario akakan ainakin Aburaam, ka Isaak, ka Yakob; kainakinete yes airum: Eoŋ Yawe.’ ”
Kolimok Musa idwe luka Isirael kwaŋin; konye mam apotu kiirasi Musa kanuka ican luka itauon, ido kanuka ebulesene loededeŋ.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Koloma, kolimok Parao ekabaka loka Misiri kisiik idwe luka Isirael anyoun kakwapuke.”
Kiner Musa kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kotema atiar, “Koany, mam idwe luka Isirael keirarito eoŋ; ikoni Parao keirari eoŋ ai, eoŋ lomam kakepitai aituk?”
Kiner EJAKAIT ka Musa ka Aaron, kolimok akiro nuyaŋaara mama ejaas idwe luka Isirael, ido mama ejai Parao ekabaka loka Misiri, aitolomar idwe luka Isirael kakwap nako Misiri.
Idwe luka Simeon: Yemuel, ka Yamin, ka Okad, ka Yakin, ka Sokar, ka Saul okoku loka aberu Akanaanit: ŋul kes ikekia luka Simeon.
Lu kes ikiroria luka idwe luka Lebi kwape ejaar aurikec; Gereson, ka Kokat, ka Merari; ikar da luka aijar naka Lebi emwaasi akwatat ka akaisauni ka lukanykaarei.
Idwe luka Gereson; Libuni ka Simei, kwape ejaatar ikekiakec.
Idwe luka Kokat; Amuram, ka Isikar, ka Keburon, ka Usiel; ikar da luka aijar naka Kokat emwaasi akwatat ka akaisauni ka luuni.
Idwe luka Merari; Mali, ka Musi: ŋul kes ikekia luka Ilebin kwape ejaar aurikec.
Komany Amuram Yokebed kinac naka papake; kourik ŋes Aaron ka Musa; ikar luka aijar naka Amuram emwaasi ikar akwatat ka akaisauni ka lukanykaarei.
Idwe luka Isikar; Kora ka Nepeg, ka Sikiri.
Idwe luka Usiel; Misael, ka Elasapan, ka Sitiri.
Komany Aaron Eliseba, akoku naka Aminadab, inac naka Nason; kowurik ŋes Nadab ka Abiku, ka Eleasar ka Itamar.
Idwe luka Kora; Asir ka Elukana, ka Abiasap; ŋul kes ikekia luka Ikorakin.
Komany Eleasar okoku loka Aaron adiopet kadwe nuka Putiel; kowurik ŋes Pinekas. Ŋul kes lukapolok luka ikalia luka lukapapaa luka Ilebin kwape ejaatar ikekiakec.
Ŋul kes lualimokinete Parao ekabaka loka Misiri, aitolomar idwe luka Isirael koMisiri: ŋul kes Musa ka Aaron.
Kosodi kapaaran naeneratar EJAKAIT ka Musa kakwap nako Misiri.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar, “Eoŋ EJAKAIT: kolimok Parao ekabaka loka Misiri kere nukalimokini jo.”
Kotema Musa kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT atiar, “Koany, arai eoŋ loka aituk namam ekepitai, keirari Parao eoŋ biai?”
Ineri ijo kere nukecorakini: elimokini onacekon Aaron Parao, tetere isiikini idwe luka Isirael anyoun kakwapuke.
Etogogoŋi eoŋ da etau loka Parao, eyatakini aanyunetaka ka nukaumokinika kakwap nako Misiri.
Konye mam Parao kiirari jo, ebwaikini eoŋ akakan Misiri, aitolomar akajoresio, ikatuŋa idwe luka Isirael, kakwap nako Misiri, aitolomar idwe luka Isirael kamakec.
Ejenunete Imisirian ebe Eoŋ EJAKAIT, naarioria akakan Misiri, aitolomar idwe luka Isirael kamakec.”
Kiswamata Musa ka Aaron kwaŋin; kwape kicorakinia kes EJAKAIT, kiswamata kwaŋin.
Korai Musa loka ikar akaisakanykauni, korai Aaron loka ikar akaisakanykauni ka luuni, inerasi kaParao.
Kobala EJAKAIT Musa ka Aaron ebe,
“Kiilimok Parao yes ebe, ‘Kitodikinai nakaumokin’: ŋes konyet ilimokinia Aaron ebe, ‘Koyaŋa ebelakon, kocakak akonyen nuka Parao, tetere eraun emun.’ ”
Kolomasi Musa ka Aaron mama ejai Parao, kiswamata kwaŋin kwape kicorakinia EJAKAIT: kocakak Aaron ekebela akonyen nuka Parao, akonyen da nuka ikekejaanakinak, koluor emun.
Kosodi Parao da anyaraun lukacoa ka ikacudak; kes imurwok luka Misiri, kiswamata kesi da kwaŋin kakececoa nakaiyeiyea.
Naarai kocakak ŋinituŋanan ekebela koluonoros imunwo: konye kilikono ebela loka Aaron ibelaikec.
Kogogoŋior etau loka Parao, komam iirari kes; kwape abalar EJAKAIT.
Kolot ijo mama ejai Parao tupuruc; koany, elomuni alosit ocor; ibwoi ijo da kariri naka ecor airiamakin kaŋes; kitiŋite kakanikon ebela loaluoro emun.
Ilimokini ŋes ebe, ‘EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Iburanian, ŋes keyakunit mama ijai, ebe, “Kisiik ikatuŋa alosit, tetere kejaanakinete eoŋ kamodiŋ: ido koany, aitodol lolo mam ipupunit.”
Ebala EJAKAIT kwanata ebe, “Na ŋes ijenunia ebe Eoŋ EJAKAIT: koany, enomi kebelaka loetiŋit kakanika akipi nuejaas ocor, eluoros aokot.
Etwakete lukecor luejaas ocor, ebosuuni ecor; egirete Imisirian aimat akipi ŋun.” ’ ”

Kobala EJAKAIT Musa ebe, “Kolimok Aaron ebe, ‘Koyaŋa ebelakon, korio akonikan akipi nuka Misiri, ocorinikec, ka alelesiakec, ka ataparinikec, ka abwalinikec kere nuka akipi, koluoros aokot; ejaunos aokot akwap kere nako Misiri, toma oborokec luka akito ka amotiikec nuka amor.’ ”
Kotwakata lukecor; kobosuut akip, komam Imisirian apedorete aimat akipi nuka ecor; kojaut aokot akwap kere nako Misiri.
Kiswamata kwaŋin imurwok luka Misiri kotoma acoakec nakaiyeiyea; kogogoŋior etau loka Parao komam iirari kes; kwape abalar EJAKAIT.
Kibelokin Parao koloma togoke, komam ibwaikinit ŋun etau.
Kobokata Imisirian kere ariri naka ecor kanuka akipi numatan naarai mam apedorete aimat akipi nuka ecor.
Kotuboros apaarasia akanykaarei, kedau EJAKAIT ainom ecor.
Arai kigir ijo aisiikin kes alosit, koany, enomi iikorunokon kere kaidodokai:
Ilweki ecor aidodokai, edokunete elomarete togokon, agolakon naiperi, aperitikon, otogoi da luka ikejaanakinakakon, otuŋakon, okialakon, amotiikon nukinyonis:
Edokunete aidodokai mamakon, ido otuŋakon, kiton ikejaanakinakakon kere.”’ ”
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar, “Kolimok Aaron ebe, ‘Korio akonikan ka ekonibela ocorin, ka alelesia, ka ataparin da, kitodok aidodokai akwap nako Misiri.’ ”
Korio Aaron akekan akipi nuko Misiri; kodokut aidodokai korapata akwap nako Misiri.
Kiswamata imurwok da kwaŋin kotoma acoakec nakaiyeiyea, kitodokut aidodokai akwap nako Misiri.
Kobala Musa Parao ebe, “Ituror ijo eoŋ: wori bo kelipakinia jo ka ikonikejaanakinak kosodete aidodokai amudiario kamakon kotogoikon da, kosalakis ocor bon?”
Kobala ebe, “Moi.” Kobala Musa ŋes ebe, “Kojau kwape ejaar akonikirot, tetere ijenuni ebe emamei yeneputosi ka EJAKAIT Edekekosi.
Enyounete aidodokai kamakon ka otogoikon, ka mama kaikonikejaanakinak ka ikonituŋa; esalakinete ocor bon.”
Konyout Musa ka Aaron kama ka Parao: komony Musa mama ejai EJAKAIT kanuka aidodokai nuainunit Parao.
Kosub EJAKAIT kwape ajaar akirot naka Musa; kotwakikis aidodokai otogoi, alaroi, ka amanat.
Kotukonoroi atukon: kouru akwap.
Konye keanyu Parao ebe ejai apak nakibworaret, kitogogoŋ eketau, komam iirari kes; kwape abalar EJAKAIT.
Kobala EJAKAIT Musa ebe, “Kolimok Aaron ebe, ‘Korio ekonibela kinom apua naka akwap, koluor ilac kakwap kere nako Misiri.’ ”
Kiswamata kwaŋin; korio Aaron akekan kekebela, kinom apua naka akwap, kojaut ilac otuŋa kotiaŋ da; apua kere naka akwap koluor ijae kakwap kere nako Misiri.
Kiswamata imurwok da kwaŋin kacoakec nakaiyeiyea tetere eyaunete ilac, konye mam apotu kopedosi; kojaut ilac otuŋanan kotiaŋ da.
Kosodi kolimokis imurwok Parao ebe, “Lo ŋes ebokorit loka Edeke.” Kitogogoŋ Parao eketau, komam iirari kes; kwape abalar EJAKAIT.

Konye arai mam isiikini ikatuŋa alosit, koany, ejukuni icuc luipu noi mamakon, ka neejaas ikonikejaanakinak, ka neejaas ikonituŋa, toma otogoikon da: ilelebunos icuc luipu noi otogoi luka Imisirian, akwap da naejaas.
Atiakuni da kapaaran kaŋin akwap nako Gosen, naiboioto ikatuŋa, kinyeis icuc luipu noi ajaut ŋina; tetere ijenuni ebe Eoŋ EJAKAIT loajai kidiŋ kakwap.
Ebwaikini atiaket kidiŋ otuŋaka ka ituŋakon: ejaun aanyunet na moi.” ’ ”
Kiswama EJAKAIT kwaŋin; kopotu atukon nuka icuc luipu noi toma togo loka Parao, otogoi luka ikekejaanakinak da; kobosu akwap kere nako Misiri kanuka icuc luepu noi.
Kosodi Parao anyaraun Musa ka Aaron, kobala ebe, “Koloto yesi, koinakis Ekusideke asuban kotoma akwap.”

Kotema Musa atiar, “Mam ibusakinit aswam kwaŋin; naarai kijaikini luitaleete Imisirian mama ejai EJAKAIT Ekosideke: koany, kiinakini kereka luitaleete Imisirian kakonyenekec, komam kibiribirete sio kamor?
Kilosi alosit naka apaarasia auni modiŋ, ainakin asuban mama ejai EJAKAIT Ekosideke, kwape kicorakinia ŋesi sio.”
Kotema Parao ebe, “Kesiikini yes alosit, ainakin EJAKAIT Ekusideke asuban kamodiŋ; konye mam ilosete neelwana: kilipakinai eoŋ.”

Kotema Musa atiar, “Koany, alomari kaneijai, elipi EJAKAIT konyout icuc moi kaneejai Parao, ka ikejaanakinakake, ka iketuŋa: konye kinyek Parao aiŋal bobo aiŋer aisiikin ituŋa alosit ainakin EJAKAIT asuban.”
Konyou Musa kaneajai Parao, kilip EJAKAIT.
Kiswama EJAKAIT kwape ajaar akirot naka Musa; kolema atukon nuka icuc kaneejai Parao, ka ikekejaanakinak, ka iketuŋa da; mam abu kosal ediopet da.
Kitogogoŋ Parao eketau irwan ŋin da, mam abu kisiik ituŋa alosit.
Naarai arai kiner aisiikin kes alosit, kigirunio kes bobo.
Koany, ejai akan naka EJAKAIT obarenekon luejaas orony, obalasin, ka asigirian, ka akaalai, osipanin da luka aituk ka luka amerekekin: ejaun emelekede loepol noi.
Etiakari EJAKAIT ibaren luka Isirael kobaren luka Misiri: emamei yenetwani koboro kere lueraas luka idwe luka Isirael.” ’ ”
Koseu EJAKAIT apak kobala ebe, “Iswamai moi EJAKAIT akirot ŋin kakwap.”
Kiswama EJAKAIT akirot ŋin tupuruc, kotwaka ibaren kere luko Misiri: konye emamei yenabu kotwana kobaren luka idwe luka Isirael.
Abu Parao kijuka, ido koany, komamei idioda yenatwanit kobaren luka Isiraelin. Konye koninikiar etau loka Parao, mam abu kisiik ituŋa alosit.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa ka Aaron atiar, “Komukutu ekurwon koupa aileleb akusikanin, kosodi Musa aiwelar kuju kakonyen nuka Parao.
Eraun apua kakwap kere nako Misiri, edekakinos ituŋa ka itiaŋ abusion nuebulonoros araun ajimii, anatar akwap kere nako Misiri.”
Komukut ekurwon koupa, kobwaata kakonyen nuka Parao; kiwela Musa ekurwon kuju; koraun adek naka abusion nuebulonoros araun ajimii kotuŋa ka itiaŋ da.
Kokurwokis imurwok aibwo kakonyen nuka Musa kanuka abusion: naarai adekas imurwok da abusi on, ka Imisirian kere.
Kitogogoŋ EJAKAIT etau loka Parao, mam abu kiira kes; kwape abalar EJAKAIT Musa.
Naarai irwan na ejukuni akatular kere otaukon, neejaas ikonikejaanakinak kotuŋakon da; tetere ijenuni ebe emamei yenikiputor eoŋ kakwap kere.
Naarai tiariorit akakan, aidany jo ka ikonituŋa katular, ti jo kimudiar kakwap:
Konye abeit kanuka akirot kana, ŋes ketajaria eoŋ jo, tetere ketodikini jo akapedor, kosodi ekakiror alimorio kakwap kere.
Aitodol kwana da ituro kereka ijo kotuŋaka ebe, mam isiikini kes alosit?
Koany, moi kapak kana, etetepi akako naededeŋ noi, namam apeŋo ejauna Misiri ageun kapaaran naasubunere aitodol lolo.
Aso do kijuka, kisunya aitolomun ibarenekon ka lukon kere luijaas orony; naarai ŋinituŋanan ka ŋolitiaŋ loedumakinio orony, mam eyaunitai ore, elei kes akako, etwakete.” ’ ”
Ŋin yen abu koyoŋ akirot naka EJAKAIT kokejaanakinak luka Parao abu kitoloma ikekejaanakinak ka ibareneke otogoi.
Konye yenimam abu kopodokin akirot naka EJAKAIT abu kinyeik ikekejaanakinak ka ibareneke korony.
Kosodi Musa arior ekebela akuj: kijuk EJAKAIT eires ka akako, kijesun akim akwap; kitetep EJAKAIT akako akwap nako Misiri.
Kojaun akako, kinyalakina akim kakako, kopol noi, namam apeŋo ejauna akwap nako Misiri kere ageun naaraunor ateker.
Koŋata akaka akwap nako Misiri elei ŋinibore kere yenajai orony, ituŋa ka itiaŋ da; kole akaka ŋolikiot lokorony, kobilibil ŋolikiroi lokorony.
Dimarai akwap nako Gosen bon, naajaas idwe luka Isirael, ŋes amamei akako.
Kilipa EJAKAIT: naarai apoloor eires ka akako, kesiikini eoŋ da yes alosit, mam bobo isalete.”
Kotema Musa ŋes atiar, “Kadau eoŋ alomar kore, ariori akakanin atipet mama ejai EJAKAIT: enaŋi eires, emameun bobo akako, tetere ijenuni ebe EJAKAIT ŋes elopet akwap.
Konye ijo ka ikonikejaanakinak, ajeni ebe mam iyonete EJAKAIT Edeke.”
Koleai abira ka esairi:
Konye mam akima ka ekusemet
Koloma Musa kaneajai Parao, kiŋa naka ere, korio akekanin mama ejai EJAKAIT: konaŋ eires ka akako, mam akiru abu kotep akwap.
Keanyu Parao ebe anaŋ akiru ka akaka ka eires, kodiaka bobo, kitininik eketau, ŋes ka ikekejaanakinako
Kogogoŋior etau loka Parao, mam abu kisiik idwe luka Isirael alosit: kwape abalar EJAKAIT Musa.
Tetere ilimokini aki nuka okokukon, ka ikoku yenika ikokukon, akiro nueswamak eoŋ Misiri, ka aanyunetaka nueswama kamakec; tetere ijenunete ebe Eoŋ EJAKAIT.”

Kolomasi Musa ka Aaron mama ejai Parao, kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Inera EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Iburanian, kwanata ebe, ‘Itodoli ijo ai iŋerit anonokiar kakonyeneka? kisiik ikatuŋa alosit, tetere kejaanakinete eoŋ.
Konye arai kiŋer aisiikin ikatuŋa alosit, koany, ayauni moi emaase oikorunokon:
Erapiari akwap kere, komam yenepedori aanyun alup: enyamari luedeuna kotoma kaŋul kaluamudiario, lukideikinit jo akako, enyamari da ŋolikitoikon kere loepoloi korony.

Ilelebunos itogoikon, ka itogoi luka ikonikejaanakinak, ka itogoi luka Imisirian kere; namam lukapapakon karaida lukapapaakon aanyunito, ageun kapaaran naajaatar akwap aitodollolo.’ ” Kibelokin koloma kaneajai Parao.
Koyaunai bobo Musa ka Aaron mama ejai Parao. Kotema kes atiar, “Koloto, kijaanakis EJAKAIT Ekusideke: konye lukaŋai luelosete?”
Kotema Musa atiar, “Kilosi kaludidikikosi ka imakiokosi, ka idwekosi lusap ka lupesur, ka isipaninikosi luka amerekekin ka luka aituk kilosi isio; naarai kibusakinit aipoikin EJAKAIT epucit.”
Kotema kes atiar, “Kojaun EJAKAIT kayes, kwape kesiikinia yes alosit, ka idwekus: kocoito; naarai ejai aronis akonyenekus.
Mere kwaŋin: koloto do yesi luiraasi ikiliok, kijaanakis EJAKAIT: naarai ŋun kes nuimielasi.” Kireŋearai kes kakonyen nuka Parao.
Korio Musa ekebela akwap nako Misiri, kitukut EJAKAIT ekwam lokokide toma akwap apaaran ŋin kere, ka akuare kere; kiwala akwap koyau ekwam lokokide emaase.
Koŋata emaase akwap kere nako Misiri elosi, kodoo oikoruno kere luko Misiri; apolo noi emaase; mam apeŋo ejauna emaase loetia nen, karaida akauloke mam ejaun loetia nen.

Naarai abu korapia akwap kere, komusimusior akwap; kikoco ŋolikiot loka akwap ka araito kere naka ikito naedeunit akaka: komam itasali idiokiot kere, yenika ekitoi, arai yenika ikui lukorony, anatar akwap kere nako Misiri.
Konyara Parao Musa ka Aaron atipet; kotema atiar, “Adiaka kama ejai EJAKAIT Ekusideke, kamakus da.
Aso do keŋaiŋait, kisionioi akadiaket irwan na bon, kilipata EJAKAIT Ekusideke, tetere elemari atwanare na bon kamakaŋ.”
Koloma kaneajai Parao, kilip EJAKAIT.
Kitukut EJAKAIT ekwam loegogoŋ noi lokoto, loabu kokuta emaase, kirenek Aŋolol Nakareŋan: mam abu kosal karaida ediopet koikorun kere luko Misiri.
Konye kitogogoŋ EJAKAIT etau loka Parao, mam abu kisiik idwe luka Isirael alosit.
Korio Musa akekan akuj; kojaun amuton naejesi cucucuc akwap kere nako Misiri apaarasia auni;
Mam apotu koanyununos, karaida ituŋanan anyoun kaiboisike adaun apaarasia auni: konye ajai aica aiboisio kere nueboiononoto idwe luka Isirael.
Konyarau Parao Musa, kotema atiar, “Koloto yesi, kijaanakis EJAKAIT: konye kitasalata ikusisipanin luka amerekekin ka luka aituk: koloto ka ikusidwe da.”
Kotema Musa atiar, “Ibusakinit ijo ainakin isio asuban ka ainakineta nuicweio, tetere kiinakini EJAKAIT Ekosideke asuban.
Kiupari kaikosibaren da; mam kitasali ediomagegeret; naarai kiyaŋaari kes aijaanakinia EJAKAIT Ekosideke; ido mam kijeni luibusakinitor aijaanakinia EJAKAIT aitodol nakidolio ŋina.”
Konye kitogogoŋ EJAKAIT etau loka Parao, mam abu kisiik kes alosit.
Kotema Parao ŋes atiar, “Irwa kaneajai, kocoite, sirikiany bobo akonyeneka; naarai apaaran naianyunia akakonyen itwani.”
Kotema Musa atiar, “Iner ijo ejok; mam bobo aanyuni akonikonyen.”
Aso do kinere kaki nuka ituŋa ebe, ‘Kilip ŋolituŋanan eidunyeteke, ka ŋiniberu da aidunyeteke iboro luka epuesa, ka iboro luka esabu.’ ”
Koinak EJAKAIT ituŋa aminunio kakonyen nuka Imisirian. Bobo da kitopolooroi Musa kakwap nako Misiri, kakonyen nuka ikejaanakinak luka Parao, kakonyen da nuka ituŋa.
Etwakete ikiyaik kere luko Misiri, ageun ka ekiyai loka Parao loiboie kajakanutuke, kiton ekiyai loka abulesit naejai kau kairieis; ka ikiyaik kere luka ibaren.
Ejaun aimony naepol anatar akwap kere nako Misiri, namam apeŋo ejauna naeriakatatar, mam da ejaun bobo naeriakakinotor.
Konye mam ekiŋok ipeni akeŋajep aluikin idwe luka Isirael, aluikin ituŋanan arai itiaŋ: tetere ijenunete kwape etiakitor EJAKAIT Imisirian ka Isirael.
Ido epote ikejaanakinakakon lu kere mamaka, ekukumete kaneajai, kobalas ebe, ‘Konyou ijo, ka ituŋa kere lukitupito jo’: akaulo kaŋun alomari.” Koloma kaneajai Parao kanyunyura naepol.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar, “Mam Parao kiirari jo; tetere etupui nukaumokinika kakwap nako Misiri.”
“Eraun elap lo logeet kolapio mama ijaas: eraun elap losodit loka ekaru mama ijaas.
Kolimokis ekodet kere loka Isirael ebe, Kapaaran nakitomonet naka elap lo elemunete kesi ŋinituŋanan imerekek, kwape ejaatar itogoi luka lukapapakec, imerekek kaŋolitogo.
Arai ikidioko lukotogo komam edaunete imerekek, komorata ka ekeidunyet loidunyatar eketogo; koyaata kwape ejaar etiai loka ituŋa; kwape enyamia ŋinituŋanan, kimarakinio omcrekek.
Sirienwalit imerekekikus, ikiliokit yenika ekaru ediopet: ilemunete kotoma amerekekin arai toma akinei.
Inadaete ŋes aitodol apaaran nakitomonet kaoŋon naka elap kaŋol. Atukot kere naka ekodet loka Isirael eari napeboŋ.
Eyaŋaarete da aokot, kipikakis ategerio aarei nuka ekek ka acunet da, kotogoi luenyamiata.
Ido enyamete akiriŋ akuare ŋin, kopeet kakim, ka emugati lomam itubuunitoi; enyamete da kedia kaloedwar.
Sirikinyamata eionit, karaida ipoitoi, nabarai apcot kakim; akekou ka akekeje ka iboro da luka akoik.
Sirikideut idiobore aitodol tupuruc; konye yenideun aitodol tupuruc kicweata kakim.
Inyamete da kwanata; koenito akusiŋabes, kojaas amuk akejekus, ebela akanikus: kisunyito inyamete: erai ŋin aleleŋ naka EJAKAIT.
Naarai akuare ŋin etori eoŋ akwap nako Misiri, adanyi da ikiyaik kere kakwap nako Misiri, ituŋanan ka itiaŋ da; ido etodoli ikatubesia kodekesio kere luko Misiri: Arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.
Koraas aokot aanyunet mama ijaas kotogoi luijaas; kaany eoŋ da aokot aleleni yes, kwabo mam ejaun atular amudiar yes, naadanyia akwap nako Misiri.

Inyamenenete imugatin lumam itubuunitoi apaarasia akanykaarei; ageun kapaaran nasodit ilemarete yenikitubuunet kotogoikus: naarai ŋinituŋanan yenenyami imugatin luitubuunitoi ageun kapaaran nasodit aitodol apaaran nakikanyetekaarei, egelario ituŋanan ŋin koIsirael.
Kapaaran nasodit ejaun atukonokin nakalaunan; mam iswamao adioswam kere kapaarasia kaŋun, dimarai luenyami ŋinituŋanan, ŋul bon iswamaete.
Idarenenete epucit loka imugatin lumam itubuunitoi; naarai kapaaran kaŋin ŋes etolomunia ajorekus kakwap nako Misiri: ŋes idareneniata apaaran ŋin anatar aturiokus, araun ekisil loka ikar kere.
Kolap losodit kapaaran nakitomonet kaoŋon naka elap eboŋ, inyamete imugatin lumam itubuunitoi, aitodol apaaran naka akaisaarei kanadiop naka elap eboŋ.
Apaarasia akanykaarei mam etakanuni yenikitubuunet kotogoikus; naarai ŋinituŋanan yenenyami yenikitubuunitoi, egelario ituŋanan ŋin kokodet loka Isirael, arai erai emoit, karaida iwuriat.
Sirikinyama yenikitubuunitoi; konyamete imugatin lumam itubuunitoi kotoma aiboisiokus kere.”
Kolemutu da itenun luka esop,
Naarai etubori EJAKAIT aidany Imisirian; aso naeanyunia aokot kacuneta ka ategerio aarei nuka ekek, cleleni EJAKAIT ekek, komam ecamakini ekamudiaran alomar otogoikus aidany yes.
Ido idarenenete akirot ŋin araun ekisil mamakon kodwekon da, ikar kere.
Kosodete kidoloto akwap nakiinakini EJAKAIT, kwape kolo kisumunio, idarenenete aijaanakin ŋin.
Kosodi nakiŋisiata idwekus ebe, ‘Aijaanakinikus na, apolouke inyo?’
Itemanarete ebe, ‘Ŋes asubanit naka aleleŋ naka EJAKAIT, loalelenikini idwe luka Isirael koMisiri, naadanyia Imisirian koyuu ikaliawok.’ ” Kituluroto ituŋa akecekwes, komaata.
Koloto idwe luka Isirael kiswamata kwaŋin; kwape ecorakinia EJAKAIT Musa ka Aaron, kiswamata kwaŋin.
Konyou Parao kuare, ŋes ka ikekejaanakinak kere ka Imisirian kere; kojau aimony naepol akwap nako Misiri; naarai amamei etogo lomam atwanitor ituŋanan.
Konyarau ŋesi Musa ka Aaron kuare, kobala ebe, “Konyoutu, koloto kotuŋaka, yes ka idwe luka Isirael; koloto kijaanakis EJAKAIT, kwape ibalatar.
Koyaata isipaninikus luka amerekekin ka luka aituk, kwape ibalatar, koloto; kilipakis eoŋ da arereŋ.”
Koyaata ituŋa atapiokec koroko kitubuuno, koenanakina amoti nukinyonis ogoenekec kokeperinikec.
Kiswamata idwe luka Isirael kwape ajaar akirot naka Musa; kilipata kesi Imisirian iboro luka epuesa, ka iboro luka esabu, ka igoen.
Koinak EJAKAIT ituŋa aminunio kakonyen nuka Imisirian, koinanakinai luelipito. Koŋatata Imisirian.
Ido koupar erioŋet luka imo kakes; ka isipanin luka amerekekin ka luka aituk, ibaren luipu noi.
Kopeoto imugatin lumam itubuunitoi luka atap naayaunete kakwap nako Misiri, naarai mam etubuunitoi; naarai aponi kireijeunai koMisiri kisuouriknitete, kwabo mam epoito idisinyamat kere.
Kosodi ketuboros ikar akwat aoŋon ka akaisauni, konyou ajore kere naka EJAKAIT kapaaran kaya koMisiri.
Ŋes akuare naibusakinit aidario noi kama ejai EJAKAIT kanuka aitolomun kes kakwap nako Misiri: ŋin ŋes akuare ya naka EJAKAIT naibusakinit idwe luka Isirael aricenen noi anatar aturiokec kere.
Konye nolibulesit loegwelitai kapesan, kedau akepio, ŋes konyet enyamia.
Mam emoit ka ekejaanakinan loiwotei enyamenenete.
Togo ediopet enyamenenere; sirikiyaŋaasi akiriŋike kiŋa ketogo; karaida aibil akoitike.
Erici ekodet kere loka Isirael,
ido arai iboienenei emoit kajo, kokoto aidar aleleŋ kama ejai EJAKAIT, kokepenenete ikiliokoke kere, ŋes konyet ikunyakinia aidar; eraun bala iwuriat akwap: konye lomam ekepep kere mam enyamenenei.
Eraun ekisil ediopet mama ejai iwuriat ka emoit loiboie kayes.”
Kiswamata kwaŋin idwe luka Isirael kere; kwape ecorakinia EJAKAIT Musa ka Aaron, kiswamata kwaŋin.
Kosodi kapaaran kaya kitolom EJAKAIT idwe luka Isirael kakwap nako Misiri kajorekec.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Kitalaikinai eoŋ ikiyaik kere luepukorete aliligeta kodwe luka Isirael, yenika ituŋanan ka yenika itiaŋ: erai yenikaŋ.”
Kapaaran kana inyounete kolap loka Abib.

Kosodi nakitodolio EJAKAIT jo akwap naka Ekanaanit, ka Ekitit, ka Emorait, ka Ekibit, ka Eyebusit, naeyapoikinit lukapapaakus ainakin jo, akwap naeleleete akile ka esik, idarenenei aijaanakin na kolap kalo.
Konyamenenei imugatin lumam itubuunitoi apaarasia akanykaarei, apaaran nakikanyetekaarei da ŋes apaaran naka epucit loka EJAKAIT.
Konyamenenei imugatin lumam itubuunitoi adaun apaarasia nukanykaarei; komam etakanete kamakon imugatin luitubuunitoi, karaida yenikitubuunet atakan kamakon, koikorunokon kere.
Ilimonokini okokukon kapaaran kaŋin, ebe, ‘Erai kanuka ŋun nuabu EJAKAIT keswamak naanyounio koMisiri.’
Eluor aanyunet kakanikon, aisiitunet da kokidiŋ kakonyekon, tetere ejaun ekisil loka EJAKAIT aitukukon: naarai abu EJAKAIT kitolom jo koMisiri kakan nakagogoŋ,
ŋes ibusakinitor aricenen ekisil ŋol kapakike ŋolikaru.
Igitakini EJAKAIT ŋin yenepukori aliliget, ka yenikiyai yenijaatar yenelomuni kotiaŋ; eraunos lukiliok luka EJAKAIT.
Ido imerekek ilakununia ŋinikiyal yenika asigiria; arai mam ipuda alakun, ibili do emurisiŋike: ilakununei ikiyaik kere luka ituŋa kodwekon.
Kosodi nakiŋisia okokukon jo kapaarasia nuepote ebe, ‘Inyo bo yen?’ ilimokini ŋes ebe, ‘Abu EJAKAIT kitolom oni koMisiri, kotogo loka ebulesene kagogoŋ naka akan.

Kosodi naaneritor Parao aisiikin sio anyoun, abu EJAKAIT koar ikiyaik kere luka akwap nako Misiri, ikiyaik luka ituŋa, ka ikiyaik luka itiaŋ: kanuka ŋun ŋes ainakinia eoŋ EJAKAIT kere yenepukori aliliget, lueraas ikiliok; konye alakuni ikiyaik kere luka odweka.’
Eraun aanyunet kakanikon, ka nakoreet kokidiŋ kakonyekon: naarai abu EJAKAIT kitolom oni koMisiri kagogoŋ naka akan.”
Konye abu Edeke kitotor ituŋa erot loka amodiŋ ariri naka Aŋolol Nakareŋan: konyout idwe luka Isirael kakwap nako Misiri ekapito lujiis.
Koyanaaria Musa akojo nuka Yosep: naarai abu Yosep kisiyapoikinite cut idwe luka Isirael ebe, “Abeit kianyanari Edeke yes; iyanaariata akakojo anyoun kane.”
Kosodete konyout koSukot, kidukuroto Etam, ariri naka amodiŋ.
Kiŋarenik EJAKAIT kes kepir loka edou paaran ainarenikinit korot: ido kepir loka akim kuare, acaikinit kes; tetere elosete paaran ka kuare.
Epir loka edou paaran, ka epir loka akim kuare, kojaenena kakonyen nuka ituŋa.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Kolimok idwe luka Isirael koboŋosi kau, kidukuroto kiŋaren ka Pi-kakirot, kidiŋ ka Migidol ka aŋolol, kiŋaren ka Baal-sepon; idukurete ariri naka aŋolol.
Etemari Parao nuka idwe luka Isirael ebe, ‘Etotoliki kes akwap, agoloo amodiŋ.’
Etogogoŋi eoŋ etau loka Parao, etupuni kes; adumuni eoŋ aibuses kaneejai Parao ka ajoreke kere; ejenunete da Imisirian ebe arai Eoŋ EJAKAIT.” Kiswamata kwaŋin.

Aponi kolimokinai ekabaka loka Misiri ebe, “Akerata ituŋa.” Kibelokin etau loka Parao ka loka ikekejaanakinak mama ejaas ituŋa; kobalas ebe, “Inyo bo yen yenikisub, aisiikin Isirael anyoun kaijaanakin oni?”
Kitemok agalike, kouparos ka iketuŋa:
Koyaŋa agalin akwat akanykape nuseuna, ka agalin kere nuko Misiri, ka ijaka ayait kes kere.
Kitogogoŋ EJAKAIT etau loka Parao ekabaka loka Misiri, kibwapak idwe luka Isirael: naarai alomarete idwe luka Isirael kakan naarioro.
Kibwapakis Imisirian kes, ibalasin kere ka agalin nuka Parao, ka ikebwanenokoke ka akejore, kodolokis kes idukurete ariri naka aŋolol, owai loka Pi-kakirot, kiŋaren ka Baal-sepon.
Kobalas Musa ebe, “Kanu emameatar atesin koMisiri, ŋes kiyaunia sio atwakikin modiŋ? Kanukinyo kiswamakinia sio kwana, aitolomun sio koMisiri?
Mere na ŋes akirot nakibala isio jo koMisiri ebe, ‘Kinyeinai sio kejaanakis Imisirian?’ Naarai ejok aijaanakin Imisirian itia atwakikin modiŋ.”
Kobala Musa ituŋa ebe, “Sirikikuriakaros, kobwaata kopalarito, koanyutu aitajar naka EJAKAIT, nakiswamakini yes lolo: naarai Imisirian luianyunete lolo, mam bobo ianyunete kes ikar kere.
Kijiikini EJAKAIT yes, kililiŋete yesi da.”
Kobala EJAKAIT Musa ebe, “Kanukinyo imonyia mama ajai? Kolimok idwe luka Isirael kolototo kiŋaren.
Kitonyou ijo ebelakon, korio akanikon aŋolol, kotiak ŋes; itorete idwe luka Isirael kidiŋ kaŋolol neeonit.
Ka eoŋ da, koany, etogogoŋi itauon luka Imisirian, edoete atupite kes; adumuni eoŋ aibuses kaneejai Parao, ka ajoreke kere, kagalinike, kokebwanenokoke da.
Ejenunete Imisirian ebe arai Eoŋ EJAKAIT, naadumunia aibuses kaneejai Parao, kagalinike, kokebwanenokoke da.”
Kobu kosipokin kidiŋ ajore naka Imisirian ka ajore naka Isirael; kojai edou ka amuton, konye kocaik kuare: mam kwi apotu kodolokis ŋul akuare kere.
Kolomasi idwe luka Isirael kidiŋ aŋolol neeonit: kosubito akip kamakec bala arwatat kakan nakoreten, kakan da nakokediany.
Kotupasi Imisirian, kolomasi akaulokec kidiŋ aŋolol, ibalasin kere luka Parao, ka agalinike, ka ikebwanenokoke.
Kosodi kanen kotoma akwenyunet naka tupuruc, kosesen EJAKAIT ajore naka Imisirian kotoma opir loka akim ka edou, kisiyaloŋoŋ ajore naka Imisirian.
Kisipok akokoron nuka agalinikec, kireŋeata kolanirikinito; tape ebalas Imisirian ebe, “Kakerata kakonyen nuka Isirael; naarai itijie EJAKAIT Imisirian kanukec.”
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar, “Korio akanikon aŋolol, tetere eboŋokinete akip oMisirian, agalinikec, ka ikebwanenokokec.”
Korio Musa akekan aŋolol, Koboŋok aŋolol kagogoŋuke napiwalari; kokerata Imisirian; kilakilakak EJAKAIT Imisirian kidiŋ aŋolol.
Koboŋut akip, korapasi agalin ka ikebwanenok, ajore kere naka Parao naabu koloma aŋolol kokaukec; mam abu kosalak ediopet kakesi.
Konye kitcro idwe luka Isirael neeonit kokidiŋ aŋolol; kosubito akip kamakec bala arwatat kakan nakoteten ka nakokediany da.
Koany Isirael aswam naepol naeswamakini EJAKAIT Imisirian, koyoŋata ituŋa EJAKAIT: kiyuut EJAKAIT ka Musa ekejaanakinanike.
“Ayeikini EJAKAIT, naarai epiko cut:
Abu kocakak ebalasi ka ekebwanenonike toma aŋolol.
Aluor ŋesi aitajarioka:
Lo ŋes Ekadeke, eturenenei ŋes;
Edeke loka papaka, etopolonori ŋes.
EJAKAIT ŋes ekekiror.
Acakaki agalin ka ajore naka Parao toma aŋolol;
Alumosi lukapolokoke luseuna Aŋolol Nakaren an.
Arapa kes aidules:
Ejesaros neidul kwape amoru.
Wu EJAKAIT, idecideci akonikan nakoteten lokasurup.
Kotoma apolou naka aibusesukon:
Iyakuuni anyunyurakon, kicwe kes kwape agugu.
Kobwaata akalel atukon;
Korurwak aidules otau loka aŋolol.
‘Atupakini, adolokini, akori luŋatan;
Isimonikinio akainobel kamakec;
Autuni ekakileŋ, emudiari akakan kes.’
Ibu kitukut ekwamukon, korapa aŋolol kes:
Kolumosi kwape asasit toma akipi nukagogonok.
Iŋai eputosi bala jo, loibus kotoma alaunit,
Lokiyonitai kotoma aiturio, loiswamai nukaumokin?
Ibu korio akonikan nakoteten,
Kiliko kes akwap.
Ibu kiteten kes kagogoŋukon kiton aiboisikon nakalaunan.
Abu ariebo kikam iuibciete koPilisitia.
Kikam amaran imaseniko luka Moab;
Elicaros luiboiete kere koKanaan.
Kanuka apolou naka akonikan epalarito kwape amoru;
Aitodol neilamarotor ikonituŋa, wu EJAKAIT,
Aitodol neilamarotor ikonituŋa luibu kodum.
Aibois naitemonok ijo aiboi kotoma, wu EJAKAIT,
Aibois nakalaunan, naetogogonoete akaninikon, wu EJAKAIT.
Irumi EJAKAIT ikar kere.”
Naarai apotu ibalasin luka Parao nepepe kagalinikec ka ikebwanenok kolomasi aŋolol, kinyakak EJAKAIT akipi nuka aŋolol mamakec; konye koloto idwe luka Isirael kaneeoŋit kidiŋ aŋolol.
Koyaŋa Miriam anabi, kinaci naka Aaron, isiman kakanike; kolomasi aŋor kere kotupasi ŋes kojaas kisiman kikosiete.
Koboŋok Miriam kes atiar,
“Koyeikisi EJAKAIT, naarai epiko kapolou;
Abu kocakak ebalasi ka lokebwanenonike aŋolol.”
Kiŋarenik Musa Isirael anyoun kAŋolol Nakareŋan, kolomasi kodoloto amodiŋ naka Sur; koloto apaarasia auni komodin, komam edumunete akipi.
Kedoloto Mara, mam apotu kopedosi aimat akipi nuka Mara, naarai adwarak: ŋes amaikinere ekiror ŋol Mara.
Kirurumakis ituŋa Musa, kobalas atiar, “Inyo bo do kimasi?”
Komony ŋesi mama ejai EJAKAIT: kitodik EJAKAIT ŋes ekitoi, kocakak akipi, koluoros akip nukajijimak.
Nen ŋes esilakinia kes ekisil ka aicorakinet, kitem kes kanen.

Kobala ebe, “Arai kidunyak ijo arimar eporoto loka EJAKAIT Ekonideke, kiswama naedolit kakonyeke, kitoik akit aicorakinetake, koric ikekisila kere, mam kebwaikini jo adekesia kere, nuebwaik Imisirian; naarai arai Eoŋ EJAKAIT loketaŋaleuni jo.”
Kirurumak ekodet kere loka idwe luka Isirael Musa ka Aaron komodin.

Kobalas idwe luka Isirael kes ebe, “Ti gwai kiitwakiki akwap nako Misiri kanuka akan naka EJAKAIT, nakiboio kama ejaas amoti nuka akiriŋ, nakinyamia atap kemonikinos; naarai kibuaut isio amodiŋ na, aiar ekodet lo kere keteŋai.”
Kosodi kanen, kedolu apaaran nakikanyetekape, itemonokinete kesi lueyaunete, koraut do irwan atipet adepar lulem etukonokinete ŋinipaaran.”
Apotu Musa ka Aaron kotemasi idwe luka Isirael kere atiar, “Nat eboŋ, ŋes ijenuniata ebe abu EJAKAIT kitolom yes kakwap nako Misiri.
Ido tupuruc ŋes ianyuniata yesi aibuses naka EJAKAIT; naarai eira airurumakus mama ejai EJAKAIT: lukaŋai bo isio, luirurumakinito?”

Kotema Musa atiar, “Ejaun na, nakiinak EJAKAIT yes akiriŋ ainyam eboŋ, tupuruc da aimonikin atap; naarai eira EJAKAIT airurumakus nairurumakis ŋes: ido lukaŋai bo isio? Mam kirurumakinito sio, dimarai EJAKAIT.”
Kobala Musa Aaron ebe, “Kolimok ekodet kere loka idwe luka Isirael atiar, ‘Kikunyutu akonyen nuka EJAKAIT: naarai eira ŋesi akusiirurum.’ ”
Kosodi kanen, napineras Aaron ka ekodet kere loka idwe luka Isirael, kosesenata modiŋ, ido koany, kotakan kodou aibuses naka EJAKAIT.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Eira eoŋ airurum naka idwe luka Isirael: kolimok kes ebe, ‘Eboŋ inyamete akiriŋ, tupuruc da imonikinos atap; ijenunete do ebe arai Eoŋ EJAKAIT Ekusideke.’ ”
Keokoto akopyo, koany, kuju kamodiŋ kojau ibore yenedit kilunurur, kodit kwape kakako kokwap.
Keanyut idwe luka Isirael, kotemanaros atiar, “Inyo bo ŋin?” naarai mam kejenete kwape kejaar. Kobala Musa kes ebe, “Ŋin ŋes atap nakiinakinit EJAKAIT yes ainyam.
Ŋin ŋes akirot naicorakinit EJAKAIT ebe, ‘Kotukonok ŋinituŋanan kayesi kwape enyamia; ŋinituŋanan omer
Kiswamata idwe luka Isirael kwaŋin, kotukonokis ice epol, ice edit.
Kosodete kitemoto kotoma omer, yeniketukonokin loepol mam edeuni, yeniketukonokin loedit, mam epuda bobo; atukonokinete ŋinituŋanan kwape anyamia.
Kotema Musa kes atiar, “Kinyek ituŋanan aiteperor.”
Mam apotu kopuput Musa; konye ice kakesi kiteperosi, kouri ikur, kobosiar; konyunyurik Musa kes.
Kotukonokis ŋinitupuruc, ŋinituŋanan kwape enyamia: ido kemwaniar akoloŋ, kocalar.
Kosodi kedol apaaran nakikanyetekape kotukonokis inyamat irwan aarei, ŋinituŋanan ikomerin

Kotema kes atiar, “Ŋin ŋes naabu EJAKAIT kobala ebe, ‘Erai moi aibworar naicorakinitai, nakasabato nakalaunan kaneejai EJAKAIT: kopeoto luikotos aipe, kipooto da luikotos aipoore; luideunos kere kiteperosi kinadakis aitodol moi.’ ”
Kiteperosi kwape kicorakinia kes Musa: mam ebosa, komameunos da ikur kotomakec.
Kotema Musa atiar, “Konyama lu lolo; naarai lolo ŋes apaaran naka asabato kaneejai EJAKAIT: mam lolo idumunete komagoro.
Kotukonokinete kotoma apaarasia akanykape; konye apaaran nakikanyetekaarei ŋes apaaran naka asabato: kapaaran kaŋin mam ejaunun.”
Kosodete kapaaran nakikanyetekaarei apotu ice kakesi koloto atukonokin, komam edumunete.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar, “Itodolete yesi ai aigir apupun akaicorakineta ka ikakisila da?

Koanyutu, naarai kiinak EJAKAIT yes aiyeŋunet, ŋes kiinakinia yes kapaaran nakikanyetekape inyamat luka apaarasia aarei; kiboikin ŋinituŋanan kayesi aiboisike, kinyek ituŋanan anyounun kaiboisike kapaaran nakikanyetekaarei.”
Kiyenununete ituŋa kapaaran nakikanyetekaarei.

Kobala Musa ebe, “Ŋin ŋes akirot naabu EJAKAIT kicorak, ebe, ‘Kinadakisi omer Ioilcleba kanuka aturiokus kere; tetere eanyunete kesi inyamat luabu eoŋ ketanyam yes kamodiŋ, naketolomunia kakwap nako Misiri.’ ”
Kotema Musa Aaron atiar, “Kolem atido, kipiik tomake omer loileleba emanu, kibwaik kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kinadakis aturiokus.”
Kwape kicorakinia EJAKAIT Musa, kwaŋin kibwaik Aaron akonyen nuka Aitejenunet, araun nakinada.
Konyamata idwe luka Isirael emanu ikar akaisaoŋon, kiton neadolioto akwap naeboioto ituŋa; konyamata emanu kiton neadolioto oikoruno luka akwap nako Kanaan.
Ido omer ŋes idiopet kotomon yenika epa.
Ŋes etoŋolopiata ituŋa Musa, kobalas ebe, “Koinakinai sio akipi kamata.” Kotema Musa kes atiar, “Kanukinyo kitonolopiata eoŋ? Kanukinyo ikoduniata EJAKAIT?”
Kojak ituŋa akure naka akipi kanen; kirurumakisi ituŋa Musa, kotemasi atiar, “Kanukinyo kitolemunia sio koMisiri, aiar sio ka ikosidwe ka ikosibaren kakure?”
Komony Musa neejai EJAKAIT kotema atiar, “Ekonakini ai ituŋa lu? ekapakina kesi aibiribir eoŋ kamor.”
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar, “Kitor akonyen nuka ituŋa, koyaŋa nepepe kajo ice komakio luka Isirael; kitiŋ ebelakon kakanikon, loinomia kole ijo ecor, kolot.
Koany, abwoi eoŋ kakonyenekon komoru Koreb; inomi ijo atiiba, elomunete akip, komata ituŋa.” Kiswama Musa kwaŋin kakonyen nuka imakio luka Isirael.
Komaik ŋesi aibois ekekiror Masa,
Kotema Musa Yosua atiar, “Koseikinai ituŋa, kolot, kitiji Amalek: abwoi eoŋ moi koukot, ketinitc ebela loka Edeke.”
Kiswama Yosua kwape kicorakinia Musa, kitiji Amalek: kodokasi Musa ka Aaron ka Kur oukot.
Kosodi kanen, kerio Musa akanike, kipiko Isirael: konye kinyakaki akanike kwap, kipiko Amalek.
Konye kitega akanin nuka Musa; koyaŋaasi amoru kibwaikis kwapuke, kiboikin; kigagata Aaron ka Kur akaninike, ediopet epuai, ediopet da epuai; kicatata akekanin aitodol nealomaria akoloŋ.
Abu Yosua kitononok Amalek ka iketuŋa kakwanis naka ekileŋ.
Koduk Musa etem, komaik ekekiror Yawe-nisi:
Kotema atiar, “Eyapo EJAKAIT: Ejienenei EJAKAIT kAmalek anatar aturio kere.”
Kopup do Yetero, esasedoti loka Midian, ekamuran loka Musa, nukiswamakini Edeke Musa, ka Isirael iketuŋa, ebe, abu EJAKAIT kitonyou Isirael koMisiri.
Abu Yetero, ekamuran loka Musa, koya Sipora aberu naka Musa, naabu kinyakarite.
Ka ikedwe iarei; ekiror loka ediopet ŋes Geresom; naarai abala ebe, “Arai epejonon kakwap namere nakaŋ.”
Ekiror loka ece ŋes Elieser;
Kobu Yetero, ekamuran loka Musa, ka odweke ka akeberu neejai Musa amodiŋ naedukurito, moru loka Edeke;
Kotema ŋesi Musa atiar, “Abunit eoŋ Yetero ekamuranikon mamakon, ka akoniberu, ka odweke iarei kaŋes.”
Koloma Musa airiamun kekamuranike, kisudede, konu; kiŋitanaros ebe, “Anyoika?” Kolomasi owema.
Kolimenok Musa ekamuranike akiro nueswamakini EJAKAIT Parao ka Imisirian kanuka Isirael, aitaaritoi kere naadoikini kes korot, ido kwape keyuunia EJAKAIT kes.
Kiyalamikin Yetero kanuka nukajokak kere nukesubakini EJAKAIT Isirael, naarai abu koyuu kes kakan naka Imisirian.
Kotema Yetero atiar, “Kituritete EJAKAIT, lokiyuuni yes kakan naka Imisirian, kakan naka Parao da; loabu koyuu ituŋa kakan naka Imisirian.
Ajen do kwana ebe epol EJAKAIT aitelekar idekesinei kere: eebo, kotoma akirot naiturotor kamakec.”
Abu Yetero ekamuran loka Musa koinak ainakinet naicweio ka asuban mama ejai Edeke: kobu Aaron ka imakio kere luka Isirael, konyamata atap nepepe kekamuran loka Musa, kakonyen nuka Edeke.
Kosodi kiwala akwap, kiboikin Musa atubokin ituŋa: kobwaata ituŋa kirimoritos Musa ageun tupuruc aitodol eboŋ.
Keanyu ekamuran loka Musa kere nueswamanakini ŋesi ituŋa, kotema atiar, “Inyo bo yeniswamanakini ijo ituŋa? Kanukinyo iboio ijo bon, kobwoete da ituŋa kirimoritos jo ageun tupuruc aitodol eboŋ?”
Koboŋok Musa ekamuranike ebe, “Naarai eponenenete ituŋa neajai aiŋit Edeke.
Keiaut kakirot, epote kamakaŋ; atubokini eoŋ akirot ituŋanan ka yeniceke, etejenikini kes aicorakineta nuka Edeke, ka ikekisila.”
Kobala ekamuran loka Musa ebe, “Akirot naiswamai mam ejok.
Kilolonyi cut, ijo ka ituŋa lu luejaas kajo: naarai kilanirikinit ijo akirot; mam jo bon ipedori aswam.
Aso do kiira ekaporoto, ketetemik akiro, kojai Edeke kajo: kojai ijo kanuka ituŋa mama ejai Edeke, koyaŋa akiro mama ejai Edeke.
Isisianakini ijo kes aicorakineta ka ikisila; itodikini kes erot loibusakinit kes aloseneneo, ka aswam naibusakinit kes aswam.

Ido kirereu kotuŋa kere ikiliok luibusakinito, lueyoŋito Edeke, ituŋa luka abeit, luelaito ameda namam edolit; kodakanak kes, koraut ikapolok luka ilukumin, ka ikapolok luka akwat, ka ikapolok luka akaisakany, ka ikapolok luka itomon.
Kotubokis kesi ituŋa apakio kere; kosodete kesi ainunun jo ŋinikirot naepol, konye ŋinikirot naedit etubenenete bonik: kwaŋin kibenenikini ijo, ibwokenenete kesi alaŋir nepepe kajo.
Arai kiswama ijo akirot ŋin, kiicorak Edeke jo kwaŋin, ipedori do ijo atitiŋikin, elosenenete ituŋa lu kere aiboisiokec inapakina.”
Kiira Musa eporoto loka ekamuranike, kiswama kere kwape abalar nesl.
Koseu Musa ikiliok luibusakinito koIsirael kere, kituluo kes lukapolok kotuŋa, ikapolok luka ilukumin, ka ikapolok luka akwat, ka ikapolok luka akaisakany, ka ikapolok luka itomon.
Ketubonokinete ituŋa apakio kere: koinanarete Musa akiro nuetioko, konye ŋinikirot naedit kotubenenete bonik.
Kotwara Musa ekamuranike; kolot bukec.
Kolap kalokiwuniet kedaut idwe luka Isirael anyoun kakwap nako Misiri, kodoloto kapaaran kaŋin amodiŋ naka Sinai.
Kenyout koRepidim, kedoloto da amodiŋ naka Sinai, kibubukis iweman modiŋ; kidukuru Isirael kiŋaren kemoru.
Kodoka Musa mama ejai Edeke, konyara EJAKAIT ŋes moru, kobala ebe, “Itemari kwanata ekek loka Yakob, kolimok idwe luka Isirael ebe;
‘Ipotu koanyutu nuabu keswamak Imisirian, ido kwape kadakuniata yes kabebenoka nuka emorukaalet, ido kwape kayauniata mama ajai.
Aso do, arai irimarete cut ekaporoto, koricito aitutuketeka, iluoros do iboreka yeniminat noi kotuŋa kere: naarai akwap kere nakaŋ.
Iraunos yesi kamakaŋ ajakanut naka isasedotin, ateker da nakalaunan.’ Ŋun kes akiro nuilimokini idwe luka Isirael.”
Kobu Musa konyarau imakio luka ituŋa, kibwaik akiro ŋun kere nukicorakini EJAKAIT ŋes akonyenekec.
Koracaut ituŋa kere ebe, “Kere nuebala EJAKAIT kiswamai.” Koya babo Musa akiro nuka ituŋa mama ejai EJAKAIT.
Kobala EJAKAIT Musa ebe, “Koany, abuni mamakon kodou loepol, tetere epupunete ituŋa kiinerakin eoŋ kajo, kiyuunete da jo apaarasia kere.”
Kolimok Musa EJAKAIT akiro nuka ituŋa.
Kobala EJAKAIT Musa ebe, “Kolot mama ejaas ituŋa, kitalau kes lolo ka moi, kilotata igoenekec.
Tetere itemonokino kapaaran kanakiwuniet: naarai kapaaran kanakiwunier edokuni EJAKAIT moru Sinai kakonyen nuka ituŋa kere.
Ibwaikini ituŋa eikor kowaitin kere, kobala ebe, ‘Kocoito, kinyeis adokar moru karaida atiror eikoruke: abeit ŋin yenetirori emoru eario.
Mam adiokan etirori ŋes, konye abeit ibiribirio kamor arai icumio; arai itiaŋ arai ituŋanan, mam ejari’: nairododikinio arupepe aruo, ikunyakinete kesi moru.”
Kodoku Musa komoru kobu mama ejaas ituŋa, kitalau ituŋa; kilotata igoenekec.
Kobala ituŋa ebe, “Kitemonokinos kapaaran kanakiwuniet: mam ikunyakinete aberu.”
Kitolom Musa ituŋa koidukurun airiamun ka Edeke, kobwaata kokwap kemoru.
Kopuriei emoru Sinai kere, naarai adokuni EJAKAIT nen kakim: kopuriei apuruke kwape apuru naka eupa, komaran noi emoru kere.
Kiyataki eporoto loka arupepe airu noi, kiner Musa, Koboŋok Edeke ŋes keporoto.
Kodok EJAKAIT moru Sinai, aidi naka emoru; konyara EJAKAIT Musa adokar aidi naka emoru; kodoka Musa.
Kobala EJAKAIT Musa ebe, “Kijesar, kicorak ituŋa, kinyeis ailamar mama ejai EJAKAIT aiteere, kosodete luipu kakesi aolior.
Kitalaunos isasedotin da luikunyakinete EJAKAIT, kinyek EJAKAIT ailamar neejaas kesi.”
Kobala Musa EJAKAIT ebe, “Mam epedorete ituŋa adokun moru Sinai: naarai ibu kicorak sio ebe, ‘Kibwaik eikor airimor emoru, kitalau da.’ ”
Kobala EJAKAIT ebe, “Kolot, kijesar; idokuni, ijo ka Aaron da: konye kinyeis isasedotin ka ituŋa ailamun adokuni mama ejai EJAKAIT, kinyek ŋesi ailamar mamakec.”
Kosodi Musa aijesar mama ejaas ituŋa, kolimok kes.

Sirikikukonokin kes, karaida aijaanakin kes: naarai Eoŋ EJAKAIT Ekonideke arai Edeke lokekolo, edopet kodwe numam adolit nuka lukapapaakec, kiton atur nakiwuniet ka nakiwoŋonet naka ŋul kalukalaito eoŋ;
Ido etimi ilukumin luka ituŋa lukaminas eoŋ koricito akaicorakineta.
Kitaaritoi kapaarasia akanykape, kiswama akoniswamisio kere.

Konye do apaaran nakikanyetekaarei ŋes asabato naka EJAKAIT Ekonideke: apaaran ŋin sirikiswama adioswam kere, ijo, ka okokukon, ka akokukon, ka ekonikejaanakinan, ka akonikejaanakinan, ka ikonibaren, ka imoitikon da yenejai orekon;
Naarai kapaarasia akanykape ŋes asubia EJAKAIT akuj ka akwap, ka aŋolol, ka luejaas tomakec kere, kiyeŋu kapaaran nakikanyetekaarei: tape isirereŋi EJAKAIT apaaran nakasabato, kitalau da.
Kotemasi Musa atiar, “Kiner ijo kasio, ŋes kipupunio: konye kinyek Edeke einer kasio, kenyeis atwakare.”
Kotema Musa ituŋa atiar, “Sirikikuriakaros: naarai abu Edeke aigimor yes, tetere iyonete ŋes, kinyeis adiakanar.”
Kobwaata ituŋa kama elwana, kikunyak Musa neejai amuton nairiono cucucuc neajai Edeke.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar, “Ilimokini idwe luka Isirael ebe, ‘Ipotu yesi ikulepek koanyut eoŋ enera kayes kotoma akuj.
Sirisubenenete idekesio ice kajai eoŋ: idekesio luka epuesa, karaida idekesio luka esabu, sirisubenenete kes.

Kosubakinai eoŋ etem loka alupot, koinakis asuban kanen, ainakinetakon nuicweio, ainakinetakon da nuka ainapakin, akonimerekekin, ka ikonimonin da: ŋiniibois naiitununere ekakiror abuni mamakon, kesirereŋi eoŋ jo.
Ido arai kiiswamak etem loka amoru, sirikiduk kamoru nuikec: naarai arai kidak ecuumakon aikeo, itisiliani ŋes.
Siridokanari otemuka kadoketa, kinyek amujalalakon atakanun.’
Arai kolo ebunit bon, eboŋori bon: arai emanyit, euparos kakeberu.
Arai kemanyaki ejakaitike ŋes aberu kourik da ŋes idwe lusap arai lupesur; eraunos aberu ka ikedwe luka ejakaitike, eboŋori ŋesi bon.
Konye arai ketema ebulesit ebe, ‘Amina ejakaitika, akaberu ka ikadwe da; mam akoto aosikinio’:
Eyauni do ejakaitike ŋes neejai Edeke, eyauni ŋes okek, arai acunetait; epedi ejakaitike ŋes akit kemutu; ijaanakini ŋes apaarasia kere.
Arai mam ŋes isiyalamikinit ejakaitike, loemanyit ŋes, ecamakini ŋes alakunio: emamei ŋes apedor aitwegel ŋes imo, naarai amodo ŋes.
Arai kemanyaki ŋesi ŋin okokuke, iswamanakinenei kwape adweke.
Arai kemany ace; mam inonari inyamatake ka inapeneke, ka akekiro da nuka adukono.
Ido arai mam iswamanakinenei ŋun nuuni, elosi ŋin taai, etwaniari je luagwelitor.
Ido arai mam etuŋanan eperunenei, konye ijaikini Edeke je akanike; ecorakini eoŋ jo aibois naekeriari.
Arai kepeleiki ituŋanan aiar eidunyeteke kebotet; ilemari kotemuka, tetere etwani.
“Yeninomi papake, arai totoke, abeit eario.
“Arai kejioto ituŋa, kibir idiopet yenice kamoru, arai aidip kakan, komam etwani, konye kiteperikinai oitada:
Arai kenyou, kolem ekebela alosio, emameun yenenomi ŋes akirot: konye etaci kanuka akeiboi, etaci da kanuka aitanaleunioke.
Konye arai kiriar adaun apaarasia kwape aarei, mam iticanio: naarai erai iboreke.
Konye arai kejaun akaŋas, iinakini aijar ma aijar.
Akoŋu itia akoŋu, ekelai itia ekelai, akan itia akan, akeju itia akeju.
Aicweio itia aicweio, amusuŋut itia amusuŋut, aromait itia aromait.
Arai keloko etuŋanan ekelai loka ebulesitike, arai loka abulesitike; ejalakini ŋes alosit kanuka ekelaike.
Konye arai ededeŋ emoŋ lem sek, kitejenunai papake, komam ekoto ajen ŋes, kosodi emoŋ aiar ekiliokit arai aberu; ibiribirio emoŋ ŋol kamor, elopet da eario.
Arai ketubokin lugelis, einakini iboro kere luatubokinio alakunia aijarake.
Arai kerem ikoku yenisapat, arai yenipese, etubokinio kwape ejaar etube ŋol.
Arai kerem emoŋ ebulesit arai abulesit; einakinio ejakaitike isekelin akaisauni luka epuesa, emoŋ da ibiribirio kamor.
“Arai kepuko etuŋanan aipany, arai kebok aipany komam enuki, kibirokin emoŋ arai esigiria.
Itegelio elopet aipany; einakini elopet-ibarasit apesan, etiaŋ da loatwana eraun loke.
Arai kerem emoŋ loka etuŋanan emoŋ loka yenice, ajar; egwelario emoŋ loejari, etiakete etiaike; etiakete da ibarasit yenikatwan.
Arai kejenun ebe abu emoŋ konaikinite sek aremerem luce, komam elopet ekoto ajen ŋes; ibusakinit ŋes alemun cut emoŋ itia emoŋ, ibarasit yenikatwan eraun yenike.
Arai kedumun ekokolan epakapakai etogo, kosodete aibuŋ ŋes kotwana, mam ejaun akirot kanuka akeokot.
Arai kiwalaki akwap, ejaun akirot kanuka akeokot: ibusakinit ŋes aigel; arai emamei ŋes ibore, egwelario ŋes kanuka akokoke.
Arai kedumun ibore yenikekokouni ŋesi ejari kakanike, emoŋ arai esigiria arai emerekek; egeli irwan aarei.

“Arai kitadak etuŋanan emanikor arai amana naka emusabibu, kojalak ikebaasit ainyam emanikor loka ecetuŋanan; egeli kanuitelekarito ajokis komanikorike, ka nuitelekarito ajokis kamanake naka emusabibu.
“Arai kenoku akim, kiniepakin okukwa, kosodete atukon nuka akima, arai akima nuebwanete, arai emanikor, aidopor; abeit egeli yenikinokokin akim.
“Arai kisinadiki etuŋanan ekeidunyet apesan arai iboro, kokokwarai kotogoke; ketakanu ekokolan, etaci irwan aarei.
Arai mam ekokolan etakanuni, ikunyakini elopet etogo neejai Edeke, aanyun arai diat mam abu kibwaik akekan oboro luka eidunyeteke.
“Arai kijokoki ituŋanan ikeidunyet asigiria, arai emoŋ, arai amerekek arai etiaŋ kere: kosodi atwanare, arai aimusuŋio, arai aireŋeario komam idiotuŋanan eanyunit:
Aiyaposit naka Edeke ejai kidiŋikec, arai mam ibwaikinit akekan oboro luka ikeidunyet; iyuuni ilopet, kwabo mam ii etaci.
Konye arai kekokwari kaneejai ŋesi, etacakini ilopet-ibore.
Arai ekwaeakwacatai, eyauni koluor aanyunet, mam etacakini yenekwacakwacatai.
“Arai kilipa ituŋanan iidunyeteke ibore, kicanicanun, arai kotwana, komamei ilopet, abeit etacakini.
Arai ejai ilopet mam etacakini; arai erai yeneropitai, elomari oropitike.
Arai kegiri papake cut akorakin ŋes, etaci etiai kwape ejaar aimany abekon.
Siritieanete apuserun ka ikokiok.
Arai iticanenete kes kemonyata neajai, abeit apupuni akeceimony;
Eresiar anyunyuraka noi, kaarete kekileŋ; akusiŋor da eraunos apuserun, ka ikusidwe da eraunos ikokiok.
Arai kiititini ijo egoe loka eidunyetekon, kinyakanakinenei ŋes eroko akoloŋ elomara.
Naarai ŋol ŋes eimuketeke bon, ŋes anapito naka akuanake; imukor kinyo? kosodi naemonyia mamaka apupununei ŋes; naarai asiana eoŋ.
Sirikiyap ainakin amio naka araitokon, ka akonijon da. Kiinakini eoŋ ekiyai kodwekon.
Kikonenenei nen kimoijinikon ka amerekekinikon da; kojaenena katotoke apaarasia akanykaarei; kiinakini eoŋ kapaaran nakikanyetekauni.
Siritupanari ekodet aswam aronis; kwabo sirikitejen akirot kopaarite mama ejai ekodet aibelokin etube:
Kwabo sirikimin yenikican naitubokinia akekiro.
Arai kianyu asigiria naka lokilait ijo icikakinit abwokonike, komam ipuda aiŋarakin ŋes, kibusakinit ijo aiŋarakin ŋes cut.
Kinacenenei akirot naka aisab; siriari yenimam aronis ka ikadoliton: naarai mam eoŋ etoioki ikaronon.
Sirikijau ainakinet: naarai itumudaki ainakinet akonye nuka kaluesesenete, ibelokini da akiro nuka ikadolitok.
Konye kisiyenuni alup kokaru lokikanyetekaarei, kiukasi; kosodete lukican luka ikonituŋa ainyam: luedepanaros konyam etiaŋ loka ais. Kikonenenei nen kamanakon naka emusabibu, ka naka eseituni.
Kocoito akiro kere nukalimok yes: kwabo sirilimito ekiror loka idekesio ice, karaida apupunio kaitukukon.

Kidarenenei epucit loka imugatin lumam itubuunitoi: inyamenenei imugatin lumam itubuunitoi apaarasia akanykaarei, kwape kecorakinia jo, kapak naeseunitai kolap loka Abib (naarai kaŋol ŋes kinyounio koMisiri); kwabo mam etakanuni idiopet kakonyeneka komamei ibore.
Ido epucit loka aide araito nusodit nuka aitaaritoikon, nuibu koyeik mana: ido epucit loka aisak, kosaŋe loka ekaru, naisakenenaa aitaaritoikon komana.
Etakanunete ikiliokokon kere kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT Edeke irwan auni ŋolikaru.
“Siriinakinenei aokot nuka asubanitika kimugatin luitubuunitoi; mam iteperonori da asiepai naka epucitika.
“Siripoenenei ikalol kakile nuka totoke.
“Koany, ejukuni emalaika kiŋarenekon, aidar jo korot, ka ayaŋaar da jo aibois naetemokinit.
Kocoito ŋes, kiirasi eporotoke; sirikitunyunyurikis: naarai mam itimi aibucarikus; naarai ejai ekakiror tomakeŋ.
Naarai iŋarenikini ekamalaika jo, kitolomari jo neejai Emorait, ka Ekitit, ka Eperisit, ka Ekanaanit, ka Ekibit, ka Eyebusit: amudiari eoŋ kes.
Sirikikukonokin idekesiokec, karaida aijaanakin, ido siriswamaenenei kwape ejaatar aswamisiokec: konye icakari kes cut, ibilibilei ipirinokec cut.
Ijaanakinete yesi EJAKAIT Ekusideke, ŋes da isirereŋi inyamatakon ka akonikipi da; alemari eoŋ adekesia kokidiŋikon.
Emameun yenikijecuna, arai yenirakan, kotoma akwapukon: etodoli etiai leka apaarasiakon.
Ejukuni asogimuka akonyenekon, eticani ituŋa kere luidolokini ijo, etobonori lukasurupokon kere kau.
Ejukuni ekaturuturut kakonyenekon, loireŋeari Ekibit, ka Ekanaanit, ka Ekitit, kakonyenekon.
Mam ereŋeari kes kakonyenekon kokaru ediopet; tetere mam akwap iswapi, tetere mam itiaŋ da luka ais ipuaros kamakon.
Ereneanari kes motimot kakonyenekon, aitodol neiyatakinor ijo, kirum akwap.
Ebwaikini eikorukon anyoun kAŋolol Nakareŋan kiton aŋolol naka Ipilisitian, anyoun da kamodiŋ kiton ocor: naarai ejaikini luiboiete kakwap akanikon; ireŋeari ijo kes kakonyenekono
Siritutukenenete kakes, karaida kikecedekesio.
Siriboienenete kesi kakwapukon, kinyeis aitidiakar jo kaneajai: naarai arai kijaanak idekesiokec, abeit eraun akuluma kamakon.”
Ikunyakini Musa bon mama ejai EJAKAIT; konye kes mam ikunyakinete; karaida ituŋa adokar nepepe kaŋes.”
Kobu Musa kolimok ituŋa akiro kere nuka EJAKAIT, ka itubesia kere; koboŋokis ituŋa kere keporoto ediopet, kobalas ebe, “Akiro kere nuener EJAKAIT kiswamai isio.”
Kiwadik Musa akiro kere nuka EJAKAIT: konyou tupuruc sek, kodukok etem kwap kemoru, ka ipirin itomon ka luarei, kwape ejaatar atekerin atomon ka nuarei nuka Isirael.
Kijuka ikatumunak luka idwe luka Isirael, luapotu koinakis ainakineta nuicweio, koinakis ainakineta nuka ainapakin nuka imoŋin mama ejai EJAKAIT.
Koyaŋa Musa atutubet naka aokot, kobukok atiboi; atutubet ace da naka aokot kobwatanak otem.
Kolem eitabo loka aitutuket, kosiomak ituŋa: kobalas kesi ebe, “Nuener EJAKAIT kere, kiswamai isio, kirimari da.”
Kolem Musa aokot kobwatanak otuŋa, kobala ebe, “Koanyutu aokot nuka aitutuket, naetutuk EJAKAIT kayes kotoma akiro nu kere.”
Kosodete Musa ka Aaron, ka Nadab, ka Abiku adokar, ka akaisakanykaarei komakio luka Isirael:
Koanyut kesi Edeke loka Isirael; kwap kakejeke kosubite bala aswam naka amor nuepesitai nuka asapiro, nueputos aipioror naka akuj alopet.
Kwabo mam ibwaikina akekan mama kalukapolok luka idwe luka Isirael; koanyut Edeke, konyama komata.
Konyou Musa ka Yosua ekekejaanakinan: kodoka Musa moru loka Edeke.
Kotema ŋesi imakio atiar, “Kidareunai sio kane, aitodol nekibonunio mama ijaas; ido koany, Aaron ka Kur ejaas nepepe kayes; ŋinituŋanan yenejai akirot, kolot mama ejaas.”
Kojai aibuses naka Edeke moru Sinai, korapia edou emoru apaarasia akanykape: kapaaran nakikanyetekaarei konyara ŋesi Musa kokidiŋ odou.
Aputo naka aibuses naka EJAKAIT kosubite kakonyen nuka idwe luka Isirael bala akim naesarani noi kokuju moru.
Koloma Musa kidiŋ odou, kodoka moru: kodau Musa komoru apaarasia akaisaoŋon paaran ka kuare.
“Kolimok idwe luka Isirael ebe, kainut eoŋ ainakinet: ijaunete ainakineteka ŋinituŋanan yenitokotori eketau ainakin.
Na ŋes ainakinet naijaunete; esabu, epuesa, aisinit;
Ka egoe lobululu, ka lomuge, ka Lokareŋan, ka ebaputa loejok, ka ajulo nuka akinei;
Ka imukulen luka imerekekin Luitereŋitai, ka imukulen luka etakas,
Akinyet naka atala, ka lueuru maa luka akinyet nakinyonyoanakina, ka luka lukisupurununo;
Amor nuemelomeloto, ka amor nuipiripiranara, aibwaikin opod,
Keswamakis eoŋ aiba is nakalaunan; tetere eboie kokidiŋikec.
Nuketodianakini jo kere, epone loka ewema, ka epone loka iboroke kere, iswamaete yesi kwaŋin.
Ido iladaari ŋes kesabu loelai, iladaari kujuke kotomake da, isubakini ŋes atorosit naka esabu airimor.
Itataikini ŋes igilun iwoŋon luka esabu, kibwaik kes toma akejeke aoŋon; ejaunete igilun iarei kosiepike ediopet, iarei da osiepike ece.
Iswamauni adaketa nuka akito nuka sita, iladaari kes kesabu.
Itolomikini adaketa toma ogilun lukosiepion luka asaduku, adakia ŋes.
Esalanakinete adaketa ogilun luka asaduku: mam elemanario.
Ibwaikini aitejenunet nakainakini jo toma asaduku.
Iswamauni da eicoloŋ-lokaitim loka esabu loelai: aojauke ikubitin iarei ka atutubet, alalauke da ekubit ediopet ka atutubet.
Iswamauni da ikerubin iarei luka esabu; iswamauni kes kaswam naerukuk, kosaŋeta iarei luka eicoloŋ-lokaitim.
Iswamakini da ekerubi ediopet osaŋe ediopet, ka ekerubi ece osaŋe ece: iswamakini kwaŋin eicoloŋ-lokaitim ka ikerubin osanetake iarei kobore idiopet.
Igarararete ikerubin abebenokakec kuju, korapito eicoloŋ-lokaitim kakecebebenoka, kiteos da ireetakec; kosesenete ireeta luka ikerubin eicoloŋ-lokaitim.
Ido ibwaikini eicoloŋ-lokaitim kuju asaduku; ibwaikini aitejenunet nakainakini jo toma asaduku.
Nen kiriamunun kajo, enerakin kajo koicoloŋ-lokaitim, kokidiŋ kikerubin iarei luejaas kuju asaduku naka aitejenunet, akiro kere nukainakini kotoma aicorakineta mama ejaas idwe luka Isirael.
Iladaari ŋes kesabu loelai, isubakini atorosit naka esabu airimor.
Iswamakini ŋes atokitoit alalau naka akan airimor, iswamakini atorosit naka esabu airimor atokitoit.
Iswamakini ŋes igilun iwoŋon luka esabu, ibwaikini igilun agoria aoŋon nuejaas akejeke aoŋon.
Idunyakinos igilun katokitoit, araut aiboisio nuka adaketa adakia emesa.
Iswamauni adaketa nuka akito nuka sita, iladaari kes kesabu, adakia emesa.
Iswamauni atubaake, ka akaaleike, ka amotiike, ka atanyake, abukununio; iswamauni kes kesabu loelai.
Ibwaanakini tiritir imugatin luka aitodikin omesa kakonyeneka.
Elomunete da icogen ikanykape kowaitinike; icogen iuni kowai ediopet loka epir loka atala, icogen da iuni kowai loce loka epir loka atala.

Akolin auni nuiswamatai aputorit atur kocoget ediopet, akouke ka aturot; ka akolin auni nuiswamatai aputorit atur kocoget ece, akouke ka aturot: kwaŋin kotoma ocogen ikanykape luelomunito kopir loka atala.
Ejaunete akolin aoŋon kotoma opir loka atala nuiswamatai aputorit atur, ka akwesikec ka aturokec.

Ejaun da akou kwap kicogen iarei luka ibore idiopet, ka akou kwap kicogen iarei luka ibore idiopet, ka akou kwap kicogen iarei luka ibore idiopet, kwape ejaatar icogen ikanykape luelomunito kopir loka atala.
Akwesikec ka icogenekec koraas luka ibore idiopet: korai kere aswam naerukuk naka esabu loelai.
Iswamauni atalaike akanykaarei: isipokinete da atalaike tetere ccaikinetc.
Eraunos aitudeŋetake ka asaninike nuka ekurwon, nuka esabu loelai.
Iswamauni iboro lu kere kalaniru naka atalata
Koany ebe iswamauni ijo kes kwape ejaar akeceput, nakitodikinitai jo komoru.
Aojau naka ninigalisit korai ikubitin akaisaarei ka lukanykauni, alalau naka ŋiniigalisit ikubitin iwoŋon: aigalisio kere koraas nuka aitemis adiopet.
Iropikini aigalisio akany; iropikini da aigalisio ace akany.
Iswamakini da akodeta nubululu oreret loka aigalisit nakawasia kotoma kanueropikinitai: iswamakini da kwaŋin oreret loka aigalisit nakawasia kotoma kanuce nueropikinitai.
Iswamakini akodeta akaisakany toma aigalisit adiopet, iswamakini da akodeta akaisakany oreret loka aigalisit nakiareit naeropikinitai; kiteosi da akedeta ŋun.
Iswamauni aruceta akaisakany nuka esabu, imorikikini aigalisio ŋun karuceta kaŋun: koraun ediopewema.
Aojau naka ŋiniigalisit korai ikubitin akaisauni, alalau da naka ŋiniigalisit korai ikubitin iwoŋon: aigalisio ŋun atomon ka nadiopet koraas kere nuka aitemis adiopet.
Iropikini aigalisio akany kowaikec bonik, ka aigalisio akanykape kowaikec, ikudokini aigalisit nakikanyetekape koiŋaren kewema.
Iswamauni akodeta akaisakany koreret loka aigalisit nakawasia kaŋun kanueropikinitai, ka akodeta akaisakany koreret loka aigalisit nakawasia kanuce kanueropikinitai.
Iswamauni aruceta akaisakany nuka aisinit, ibwaikini aruceta ŋun toma akodeta, imorikikini ewema nepepe, tetere eraun ediopet.
Ka atutubet ŋin naesalakini naekudokina naka aigalisio nuka ewema, atutubet ŋin naka aigalisit naesalakini ijeko kokau kewema.
Ekubit ediopet owai ediopet, ka ekubit ediopet owai loce, loesali kaojau naka aigalisio nuka ewema ijeko kosiepion luka ewema, owai lo kowai je da, arapit.
“Iswamauni abaoi nuka ewema nuka akito nuka sita, nuesipos.
Aojau naka ŋinibao ikubitin itomon, alalau da naka ŋinibao ekubit ediopet ka atutubet.
Ejaun ŋinibao karucetake aarei, nuerucokinito adiopet mama ejai nace: iswamauni kwaŋin abaoi kere nuka ewema.
Iswamauni abaoi nuka ewema, abaoi akaisaarei kowai loka eŋalakimak kari naka eŋalakimak.
Iswamauni aigaŋeta akaisaoŋon nuka epuesa kwap kabaoi ŋun akaisaarei; aigaŋeta aarei kwap kabao adiopet neelomarete arucetake aarei ka aigaŋeta aarei kwap kabao ace neelomarete arucetake aarei.
Kowai lokiareit loka ewema kari naka agolitomei, abaoi akaisaarei;
Aigaŋetakec nuka epuesa akaisaoŋon; aigaŋeta aarei kwap kabao adiopet, ka aigaŋeta aarei kwap kabao nace.
Iswamauni da abaoi akanykape kowai lokokau loka ewema ari nakoto.
Iswamauni da abaoi aarei nuka agoria nuejaas to kewema.
Koraas aareiarei kokwap, kwaŋin irotakina abaoi nepepe anyoun kokwap aitodol kuju ogilut ediopet: ejaunete kwaŋin kere aarei; eraas nuka agoria ŋun aarei.
Ejaunete abaoi akanykauni, ka aigaŋetakec nuka epuesa, aigaŋeta atomon ka nukanykape; aigaŋeta aarei kwap kabao adiopet, ka aigaŋeta aarei kwap kabao nace.
Ka ariino akany nuka abaoi nukowai lokiareit loka ewema, ka ariino akany nuka abaoi nukoto kewema, ari nakoto.
Ka ariit nakokidiŋ naejai kidiŋ kabaoi iriikini anyoun kepuai kiton epuai.
Iladaari abaoi ŋun kesabu, iswamauni da igilunukec lukitolomanakina ariino kesabu: iladaari ariino kesabu.
Isipokini ewema kaputoke naaponi kitcdikin jo komoru.
Ikajakini opirin iwoŋon luka akito nuka sita luiladaaritai kesabu, eraunos igolunakec luka esabu, kotoma aigaŋeta aoŋon nuka epuesa.
Ikajakini aigalisit kwap kogolun, itolomikin asaduku naka aitejenunet toma aigalisit: etiaki aigalisit kamakus aibois nakalaunan ka aibois nakalaunan noi.
Ibwaikini eicoloŋ-lokaitim toma asaduku naka aitejenunet aibois nakalaunan noi.
Ibwaikini emesa kiŋa kaigalisit, ka epir loka atala kiteos kemesa kowai loka ewema ari naka eŋalakimak: ibwaikini emesa ari naka agolitomei.
Iswamauni da akemumwara kuju kagoriake aoŋon: koraas akemumwara nuka ibore idiopet kaŋes: iladaari ŋes kaisinit.
Iswamauni da atubake nuigaete ekurwon, ka initiake ka atanyake, ka igolunake luka akiriŋ, ka ekekiala: iswamauni ikeboro ŋul kere kaisinin.
Iswamakini da etem eboi loka aisinit; ibwaikini ipetai iwoŋon luka aisinin toma agoria aoŋon nuka eboi.
Ibwaikini eboi ŋol kwap kapama nairimorit etem kokwap, tetere edoli eboi kiduj osiepion luka etem.
Ikeuni akito kanuka etem, nuka akito nuka sita, iladaari kes kaisinit.
Irupakinio akito ŋun toma opetai, ejaunos akito ŋun osiepion iarei luka etem adakia.
Kiswama etem kabaoi koorori kotoma: kwape kitodikinitere komoru, kwaŋin ŋes iswamauniata.
Koraas ikepirin akaisaarei, aigaŋetakec da akaisaarei nuka aisinin; igolun luka ipirin ka aikajetakec koraas nuka epuesa.

Kwape kwaŋin owai loka agolitomei ejaunos igoen luigalitoi, aojaukec ikubitin akwatat ka ipirinokec akaisaarei, ka aigaŋetakec akaisaarei, nuka aisinin; igolun luka ipirin ka aikajetakec koraas nuka epuesa.
Kanuka alalau naka alaro kowai lokoto ejaunos igoen luigalitoi aojaukec ikubitin akaisakany: ikecepirin itomon, ka aigaŋetakec atomon.
Alalau da naka alaro kowai lokokide kari nakokide eraun ikubitin akaisakany.
Igoen luigalitoi lukowai ediopet loka erute eraunos ikubitin itomon ka lukany: ipirinokec iuni, aigaŋetakec auni.
Ido kowai ece ejaunos igoen luigalitoi luka ikubitin itomon ka lukany; ipirinokec iuni, aigaŋetakec da auni.

Ido kanuka erute loka alaro ejaun aigalisit naka ikubitin akaisaarei, lobululu, lomuge, ka Lokareŋan, ka ebaputa loecipitai kiusio lueriim, aswam naka ekasonyan: ipirinokec iwon on, aigaŋetakec da aoŋon.
Ipirin kere luka alaro luirimorito ejaunos aikajeta nuka epuesa: igolunakec luka epuesa, ka aigaŋetakec nuka aisinin.
Aojau naka alaro eraun ikubitin akwatat, alalauke da kere ikubitin akaisakany, amukurur ikubitin ikany, nuka ebaputa loecipitai kiusio lueriim, ka aigaŋetakec nuka aisinin.
Iboro kere lukowema ka aijaanakinike kere, ka iloinoke kere, ka iloin kere luka alaro, eraunos luka aisinin.

Kotoma owema loka airiamunun kiŋa kaigalisit naejai iŋaren kaitejenunet, itemonokinete Aaron ka odweke ageun eboŋ aitodol tupuruc kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT: eraun ekisil apaarasia kere anatar aturiokec kodwe luka Isirael.
Ido iswamakini onacekon Aaron inapen lukalaunak, kanuka aibuses ka ajokis da.
Ilimokini kere luejaas itauon luka apirianut, lueteleleb eoŋ kemoyo loka acoa, kiswamata inapen luka Aaron aitalaunia ŋes, kejaanak eoŋ kosasedotene.
Lu kes inapen luiswamaunete kesi; yenikatorob, ka epod,
“Eyaŋaarete esabu, ka lobululu, ka lomuge, ka Lokareŋan, ka ebaputa loejok.
Iswamaunete kesi epod loka esabu, ka lobululu, ka lomuge, ka Lokareŋan, ka ebaputa loecipitai kiusio lueriim, aswam naka ekeswaman kaloepiriana.
Ejaunos lukokeperin iarei luimorikikinitai kosanetakec iarei; tetere imorikikina.
Aenet da naicipitai kapirianut, naejai tomake aenia, koputos akeswam kaswam naka egoeke; loka esabu, ka lobululu, lomuge, lokareŋan, ka ebaputa loecipitai kiusio lueriim.
Ido iyaŋaari amor aarei nuemelomeloto, kigiranak nen ikiroria luka idwe luka Isirael.
Ikiroriakec ikanykape amoru adiopet, ka ikiroria ikanykape luesalitos amoru nakiareit, kwape ejaar auriokec.
Aswam naka ekegiran amor, kwape igiria emacar, ŋes igiria ijo amor ŋun aarei kwape ejaatar ikiroria luka idwe luka Isirael: ilukuni kes kapesan nuka esabu.
Ibwaikini da amor ŋun aarei okeperin luka epod, araun amor nuka aisiitunet kanuka idwe luka Isirael: edakari Aaron ikiroriakec akonyen nuka EJAKAIT kokeperinike iarei araun aisntunet.
Iswamauni da apesan nuka esabu:
Ka irikoi iarei luka esabu kaloelai; iswamauni kwape kaunoi, kaswam kanaeojitoi: ienikini da irikoi lueojitoi toma apesan.
Eraun yenika agoria aoŋon nueriakanara, ekudokinitai bala eriagi, aojauke eraun atutubet naka ekubit, alalauke da atutubet naka ekubit.
Ido ipiripiranakini amor nekiminaikina, ikokoron iwoŋon luka amor: ekokoro loka asadia, * ka atopasit, * ka karubunikol * ŋes eraun ekokoro losodit;
Ekokoro lokiareit loka emeralid, * ka asapiro, * ka diamod*;
Ekokoro lokiwuniet loka eyasit, * ka aget,* ka ametusit*;
Ka ekokoro lokiwoŋonet loka aberul, * ka naemelomelot, * ka ayaseper

Eraunos amor kwape ejaatar ikiroria luka idwe luka Isirael, atomon ka nuarei, kwape ejaatar ikiroriakec; kwape igiria emacar, ŋinituŋanan kwape ejaar ekekiror, eraunos kanuka atekerin atomon ka nuarei.
Ido ibwaikini toma yenikatorob irikoi kwape kaunoi, luka aswam naeojitoi naka esabu kaloelai.
Ibwaikini da igilun iarei luka esabu toma yenikatorob, ibwaikini igilun ŋul iarei osaŋeta iarei luka yenikatorob.
Ibwaikini irikoi iarei luka esabu lueojitoi toma ogilun iarei lukosaŋeta luka yenikatorob.
Ibwaikini isaŋeta ice luka irikoi ŋul luarei lueojitoi toma apesan kwa aarei, kosodi aibwaikin okeperin luka epod, kowaike lokoiŋaren.
Iswamauni da igilun iarei luka esabu, ibwaikini toma osaŋeta iarei luka yenikatorob, toma atokitoitike, naejai owai lokotoma loka epod.
Iswamauni igilun iarei luka esabu, kosodi aibwaikin toma atutubeta aarei nuka ikeperin luka epod kwapuke, kowai lokoiŋaren, eiduny kaimorikikinetake, kuju aenet naka epod naicipitai kapirianut.
Eenikinete igilun luka yenikatorob ka igilun luka epod keusi lobululu, tetere iboie kokuju aenet naka epod naicipitai kapirianut, tetere mam yenikatorob ilajakin kepod.
Ido enapenenei Aaron ikiroria luka idwe luka Isirael kotoma yenikatorob yeniketube kotauke, naelomanaria aibois nakalaunan, araun aisiitunet natir kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT.
Ibwaikini Urim ka Tumim
Ejaun apedot kotomake neitori akou: ejaun atokitoit p-aka aswam naicipitai airimor apedotoke, kwape kapedot naka ekooti loka acuma, kinyek acilio.
Toma atweleike iswamakin akamamagan nuka lobululu, ka lomuge, ka Lokareŋan, airimor atwelei kere; ka icirin luka esabu kidiŋikec airimor:
Ecirit loka esabu ka akamamaga, ka ecirit loka esabu ka akamamaga, airimor atwelei nuka ekaso.
Ido enapenenei Aaron aijaanakinia: iiranario da aruokec naelomanaria aibois nakalaunan akonyen nuka EJAKAIT, naelomununia da, kinyek atwanare.
Ieni keusi lobululu, ido ejaun ogoe lokieniena akou; ejaenena kiŋaren kegoe lokieniena akou.

Ido ejaenena oreet loka Aaron, ibwokenenei Aaron numam adolit nuka iboro lukalaunak, luitalaunete idwe luka Isirael kotoma ainakinetakec kere nukalaunak; ejaenena oreet loka Aaron apaarasia kere, tetere ecamunio kes kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT.
“Icipuni ekooti locerer loka ebaputa kaloejok, iswamauni da kebaputa kaloejok egoe lokieniena akou, iswamauni aenetait naka aŋabet, aswam naka ekasonyan.
Itanapi kes Aaron onacekon, ka odweke; inyonyoikini kes akinyet, itiakuni kes, italauni kes, tetere kejaanakinete eoŋ kosasedotene.
Iswamakini kes ipalei luka ebaputa arapakinia awatekec nuejaas titai; egeunete kanabes kiton amurwos:

Enapenenei Aaron, ka odweke, naelomanariata toma owema loka airiamunun, arai naikunyakiniata otem aijaanakin kotoma aibois nakalaunan; tetere mam ibwokete numam adolit, kosodete atwakare: eraun ekisil kamake ka aurike naetupanakini ikar kere.
Ka imugatin lumam itubuunitoi, ka aluŋuren numam itubuunitoi nuinyalakinitai akinyet, ka imugatin luibenibena lumam itubuunitoi luinyonyoikinitai akinyet: ipouni kes kakiria nuidicic.
Ibwaikini kes odita ediopet, iyauni kes kodita, ka emoŋ lotobait ka imerekekin iarei.
Iyauni Aaron ka odweke okek loka ewema loka airiamunun, iloŋi kes kakip.
Ilemuni igoen, itanapi Aaron ekooti, ka ekaso loka epod, ka epod,
Ienienakini egoe akouke, idokokini aboko nakalaunan ogoe ŋol.
Kosodi ijo alemun akinyet nakinyonyoanakina, kobukok akouke kinyonyoanak ŋes.
Iyauni odweke da, kosodi aitanap kes ikootin.
Ieni kes kaeneta, Aaron ka odweke, ienieni igoen akwesikec: eraunos do isasedotin kokisil lomam edaun: itiakuni ijo Aaron ka odweke.
Iari ijo emoŋ lotobait kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kokek loka ewema loka airiamunun.
Ilemuni aokot nuka emoŋ lotobait ijukonokini da amumwara nuka etem kebokoritikon; ibukokini da aokot kere kwap ketem.
Iwaruni da asiepai kere naerapit lukotoma, ka asiepai naka emany, ka iŋalur iarei, ka asiepaikec, icwei kes kotem.
Konye akiriŋ naka emoŋ lotobait, ka emukuleke, ka ikijitike icwei ijo kokiŋa kiidukurun; erai ainakinet naka adiakar.
Iari do ijo emerekek, iyaŋaari aokotoke, ibwatanakini otem.
Itubutubei emerekek, ilosi lukotomake, ka akejeke, kosodi aibwaikin inerioke ka akouke nepepe.
Icwei emerekek kere kotem: erai ainakinet naicweio mama ejai EJAKAIT: erai asakat naeuru saa, ainakinet naeinakinere kakim mama ejai EJAKAIT.

Kosodi ijo aiar emerekek, iyaŋaari aokot, ijukono kini okobet loka akit nakoteten naka Aaron, okoben da luka aki nukoteten nuka odweke, obokorokec lukapolok luka akaninikec nukoteten, obokorokec lukapolok da luka akejenekec nukoteten, ibwatanakini da aokot otem.
Ilemuni aokot nuejaas otem ka akinyet nakinyonyoanakina ibwatakini Aaron onapeneke da, odweke da, ka onapenekec da nepepe kaŋes: italaunio ŋes, ka inapeneke, ka odweke, ka inapen luka odweke da.
“Ilemuni da asiepai nuka emerekek ka asonyok ka asiepai naerapit lukotoma ka asiepai naka emany ka iŋalur iarei ka asiepaikec, ka amurwo nakoteten; naarai erai emerekek loka atiakunio:
Ka emugati ediopet, ka aluŋuret adiopet naka imugatin luinyalakinitai akinyet, ka emugati ediopet loebenibena kodita loka imugatin lumam itubuunitoi loejai akonyen nuka EJAKAIT:
Ibwaikini kere akanin nuka Aaron ka akanin nuka odweke; ijaŋari kes araun ainakinet naijaŋio kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT.
Ijaari kes kakaninikec, icwei kes kotem kainakinet naicweio, araun asakat naeuru saa kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT: ŋes ainakinet naeinakinere kakim mama ejai EJAKAIT.
Italauni da atorob naka ainakinet naijaŋio, ka amurwo naka ainakinet naedakakina, naijaŋio, naedakakinitai, nuka emerekek loka atiakunio, kes nuka Aaron ka nuka odweke.

Eraunos nuitebeitai Aaron ka odweke ikar kere kodwe luka Isirael: naarai erai ainakinet naedakakinitai: eraun ainakinet naedakakinitai kodwe luka Isirael naka asuban nuka ainakinetakec nuka ainapakin, ŋes ainakinet naedakakinitai mama ejai EJAKAIT.
Enapenenei okokuke loeraun esasedoti aiboisike apaarasia akanykaarei naelomaria owema loka airiamunun aijaanakin toma aibois nakalaunan.
Enyamete Aaron ka odweke akiriŋ naka emerekek, ka imugatin luejaas odita kokek loka ewema loka airiamunun.
Enyamete kesi iboro ŋul lualucere, atiakunia ka aitalaunia kes: konye mam emoit enyami ŋul naarai eraas lukalaunak.
Arai kideun akiriŋ naka atiakunio, arai imugatin aitodol tupuruc, icwei do ijo luideuna kakim: mam enyamio, naarai eraas lukalaunak.
Ŋinipaaran iinakini emoŋ lotobait loka ainakinet naka adiakaret alucio: itesegaari etem nailucio ŋes; inyonyoanakini ŋes aitalaun.
Iluci etem apaarasia akanykaarei, italauni ŋes: eraun etem lokalaunan noi; yenetirori etem kere eraun yenikalaunan.
Iinakini idiopemerekek tupuruc; iinakini yenikiareit eboŋ:

Nepepe kidiopemerekek, idiopet kotomon yenika epa * loka akiria nuidicic nuinyalakinitai kidiopet kooŋon yenika ekin loka akinyet naerukuk: ka idiopet kooŋon yenika ekin loka ebino araun ainakinet namatat.

Iinakini imerekek yenikiareit eboŋ, iswamakini ŋes kwape ejaar ainakinet naka akiria naka tupuruc, ido kwape ejaar ainakineteke namatat, araun asakat naeuru saa, ainakinet naeinakinere kakim mama ejai EJAKAIT.
Eraun ainakinet naicweio naduc anatar aturiokus okek loka ewema loka airiamunun kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT: nekiriamuni kayes, ener kajo kanen.
Nen da ŋes kiriamun kidwe luka Isirael; italauni aibusesuka Ewema.
Etalauni eoŋ ewema loka airiamunun, ka etem: etalauni da Aaron ka odweke, aijaanakin eoŋ kosasedotene.
Eboienenei eoŋ kodwe luka Isirael, araun Ekecedeke.
Ejenunete da ebe, ani Eoŋ EJAKAIT Ekecedeke, loetolomuni kes kakwap nako Misiri, tetere eboie kamakec: Arai eoŋ EJAKAIT Ekecedeke.
Aojauke eraun ekubit,
Iladaari ŋes kesabu loelai, kujuke, ka isiepionoke, ka amumwarake; iswamakini ŋes atorosit naka esabu airimor.
Iswamakini ŋes igilun iarei luka esabu kwap katorositike, amaranake aarei, iswamakini kes osiepionoke iarei; eraunos aiboisio nuka adaketa adakia ŋes.
Iswamauni adaketa nuka akito nuka sita iladaari kes kesabu.
Ibwaikini ŋes kiŋaren kaigalisit naejai eiduny kasaduku naka aitejenunet, kiŋaren keicoloŋ-lokaitim loejai kuju kaitejenunet, nekiriamun kajo.
Isupuruuni Aaron kanen lukisupurununo luka lueuru maa: ŋinitupuruc, naitemonokinio ŋesi atalai isupuruuni kes.
Nainokokinia Aaron atalai eboŋ, isupuruuni kes, lukisupurununo lumam edaunos kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT anatar aturiokus.
Mam isupuruunete lukisupurununo luegelakina kanen, karaida ainakinet naicweio, karaida ainakinet naka akiria; mam ibukokinete ainakinet namatat nen.
Eluci Aaron amumwara nuka etem irwan atipet ŋolikaru: kaokot nuka ainakinet naka adiakaret eluci ŋes atipet ŋolikaru anatar aturiokus: erai lokalaunan noi kama ejai EJAKAIT.”
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Naimaria ijo etiai loka idwe luka Isirael, kwape ejaatar ŋul luimarar kakesi, einakini ŋinituŋanan EJAKAIT lulakunete aijarake, naimaria ijo kes; tetere mam ejaun atular mamakec naimaria ijo kes.
Yen ŋes yeneinakini ŋinituŋanan yenetubori mama ejaas luimarar, atutubet naka esekel
Ŋinituŋanan yenetubori mama ejaas luimarar ageun kaluka ikar akaisaarei ka luedeparito einakini ainakinet naka EJAKAIT.
Mam ikabarak einakinete luedeparito, lukican da mam einakinete luikidioko, adepar atutubet naka esekel, naeinakiniata ainakinet naka EJAKAIT, alucio akusiijar.
Ijauni apesan nuka alucio kama ejaas idwe luka Isirael, itwasamai kes aijaanakinia kowema loka airiamunun; tetere eraun aisiitunet kanuka idwe luka Isirael kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, alucio akusiijar.”
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Iswamauni akalaya naka aisinit, aigaŋeteke naka aisinit, ailonia: ibwaikini ŋes kidiŋ kewema loka airiamunun ka etem, ibukokini akipi toma.
Ilosete Aaron ka odweke akecekanin ka akecekeje kanen;
Naelomanariata owema loka airiamunun, ilosete kakip, tetere mam etwakete; arai naekunyuniata otem aijaanakin, aicwe ainakinet naeinakinere kakim mama ejai EJAKAIT:
Ilosete akecekanin ka akecekeje tetere mam etwakete: eraun ekisil kamakec ikar kere, kamake ka aurike anatar aturiokec.”
“Kolem lueuru maa jokan, emina loecalara isekelin akwat akany, akinomon naewiny atutubet naka ŋol, ŋes akwat aarei ka akaisakany, akalamus da naewiny akwat aarei ka akaisakany.
Luka ekasia da akwat akany kwape ejaar esekel loka aibois nakalaunan, ka ekin
Itarauni ŋes akinyet nakinyonyoanakina nakalaunan, aures nainyalitai kwape ejaar apirianut naka ekenyalan lueuru maa: eraun akinyet nakinyonyoanakina nakalaunan.
Inyonyoanakini ewema loka airiamunun, ka asaduku naka aitejenunet.
Ka emesa ka iboroke kere, ka epir loka atala: ka ikeboro kere, ka etem loka lukisupurununo.
Ka etem loka ainakinet naicweio ka iboroke kere, ka akalaya ka aigaŋeteke.
Italauni ijo kes, koraut lukalaunak noi: yenetirori kes eraun yenikalaunan.
Inyonyoanakini Aaron ka odweke akinyet, italauni da kes, tetere kejaanakinete eoŋ kosasedotene.
Ilimokini idwe luka Isirael ebe, ‘Eraun na akinyet nakinyonycanakina nakalaunan kamaka anatar aturiokus.
Mam ebukokinio akuan naka ituŋanan, karaida yes aiswamaun naeputotor, kwape ejaar eiponeke: erai nakalaunan, eraun da nakalaunan kamakus.
Ŋinituŋanan yeniswamauni naeputotor, arai ŋinituŋanan yeninyonyoikini ŋes emoit, egelario kotuŋake.’ ”
Iswamaunia ijo kes lukisupurununo, aures nainyalitai kwape ejaar apirianut naka ekenyalan lueuru maa, kitijijimitete kabalaŋ, naelai nakalaunan:
Iruki ice kakesi aidecar, ibwaikini da kiŋaren kaitejenunet kowema loka airiamunun, nekiriamuni kajo: eraunos lukalaunak noi kamakon.
Lukisupurununo luiswamauni ijo kwape ejaar eponekec, mam iswamaunete kanukus: eraunos lukalaunak kamakus kanuka EJAKAIT.
Ŋinituŋanan yeniswamauni lueputotor, ainuunun, egelario kotuŋake.”
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Koany, anyarau Besalel, okoku loka Uri, okoku loka Kur, loka ateker naka Yuda:
Elelebik ŋes emoyo loka Edeke, kotoma acoa, ka aijen, ka apirianut, ka iponesio kere luka aswam.
Aswam aswamisio nuka apirianut, atata esabu, ka epuesa, ka aisinit.
Aigir amor nuiminaikinere, ka aiger akito, aswam da iponesio kere luka aswam.
Koany, aseu eoŋ ŋes ka Okoliab, okoku loka Akisamak, loka ateker naka Dan: ido ebwaik eoŋ acoa toma otauon luka ŋul kaluecoak kotauon, tetere iswamaunete lukecorak jo kere:
Ewema loka airiamunun, ka asaduku naka aitejenunet, ka eicoloŋ-lokaitim loejai kujuke, ka iboro kere luka Ewema;
Ka emesa ka iboroke, ka epir loesegara loka atala ka iboroke kere, ka etem loka lukisupurununo;
Ka etem loka ainakinet naicweio ka iboroke kere, ka akalaya ka aigaŋeteke;
Ka inapen luedonyitai, ka inapen lukalaunak luka Aaron esasedoti, inapen da nuka odweke, luka aijaanakinia kosasedotene;
Ka akinyet nakinyonyoanakina, ka lukisupurununo lueuru maa kanuka aibois nakalaunan: iswamaete kesi kwaŋin kwape ejaatar nukecorak jo kere.”
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Kolimok ijo idwe luka Isirael ebe, ‘Abeit idarenenete asabatonoka; naarai erai aanyunet kamakaŋ ka yes anatar aturiokus; tetere ijenunete ebe Arai eoŋ EJAKAIT loketalauni yes
Idarenenete do asabato, naarai erai nakalaunan kamakus: ŋinituŋanan yenitisili ŋes abeit eario: naarai ŋinituŋanan yeniswamai adioswam kere kapaaran kaŋin, egelario ituŋanan ŋin kotuŋake.
Iswamao aswam apaarasia akanykape: konye apaaran nakikanyetekaarei erai nakasabato naka aibworar, nakalaunan naka EJAKAIT: ŋinituŋanan yeniswamai adioswam kapaaran nakasabato, abeit eario.
Kanuka ŋun idarete idwe luka Isirael asabato aricit asabato anatar aturiokec, araun aitutuket namam enaŋi.
Erai aanyunet kamakaŋ ka idwe luka Isirael ikar kere: naarai abu EJAKAIT kosub akuj ka akwap kotoma apaarasia akanykape, kibwora kapaaran nakikanyetekaarei, kikwar.’ ”
Kobala Aaron kes ebe, “Koijedununutu itetio luka esabu, luejaas aki nuka aŋorokus, ka luejaas aki nuka idwekus lutelepai ka lupesur da, koinut eoŋ.”
Koijedununut ituŋa kere itetio luka esabu luajaas akikec, koinut Aaron.
Kijau kakaninikec, kiluŋuluŋ kacuma kanaigiri, kosub itaok yenicaluna; kobalas ebe, “Lu kes idekesiokon, ijo Isirael, lukitolomunete kakwap nako Misiri.”
Keanyu Aaron ŋun, kodukok etem akonyeneke; kolimo Aaron ebe, “Ejaun moi epucit mama ejai EJAKAIT.”
Konyout tupuruc sek, koinanakis ainakineta nuicweio, koyaut ainakineta nuka ainapakin; kiboikinos ituŋa ainyam ka aimat, konyout abolia.
Apaasi atipet anyoun korot loabu kecorak kes: asubut itaok venicaluna, amaata ŋin, ainakis da asubanit, kobalas ebe, ‘Lu kes idekestokon, ijo Isirael, lukitolomunete kakwap nako Misiri.’ ”
Aso do kinyeinai, tetere inepuni noi anyunyuraka aluikin kes, tetere amudiari kes: ketuluori jo ateker naepol.”
Kanukinyo ti elimunioto Imisirian ebe, ‘Abu kitolom kes kanuka aronis, aarakin kes oroŋan, amudiar kes kakwap’? Kinyek anyunyurakon naededeŋ, kiitu ikonituŋa kinyeik aronis ŋin.
