Kiitu Aburaam, ka Isaak ka Isirael, ikonikejaanakinak, luibu kiyapok bon kobala ebe, ‘Eyatakini eoŋ aurikus kwape kaacer nukokuju, akwap ŋin kere naener nuke, ainakini aurikus, irumete kesi ikar kere.’ ”
Kiitu EJAKAIT kinyek aiswamakin ituŋake aronis naabala.
Araas amor aswam naka Edeke, aiwadika da arai aiwadika naka Edeke, naegirakinitai amor.
Kepupu Yosua ecelet loka ituŋa eutaritos, kobala ŋesi Musa ebe, “Ejai ecelet leka ejie toma oidukurun.”
Kobala Musa ebe, “Mere ŋol eporoto loka ŋul kaluecelas kanuka aipikor, karaida eporoto loka ŋul kaluemonyete kanuka aireŋeario: konye apupi ecelet loka ŋul kalueyoete.”
Kosodi nape eapiari oidukurun, koany itaok ka ekosio: kinep noi anyunyura naka Musa, kocaka amor kakaninike, kobwanak kes kwap kemoru.
Koyaŋa itaok yenasubunito, kicweik kakim, kidecidec, kipurupuranak akipi, kiramat idwe luka Isirael.
Kobala Aaron ebe, “Kinyek anyunyura naka ejakaitika ainepun noi: ijeni ijo ituŋa, etupitos cut aronis.
Naarai apotu katemasi eoŋ ebe, ‘Kosubakinai idekesio, lukinarenonokinete oni, naarai Musa ŋol, ekesa lokitolomuni oni kakwap nako Misiri, mam kijeni nuadoikis.’
Katema kes ebe, ‘Yenejai esabu kere, konedununutu’; kwaŋin apotu kainut: kebwaik akim, kolom do itaok yen.”
Kosodi Musa aibwo korute loka iidukurun, kobala ebe, “Ŋinituŋanan yenejai owai loka EJAKAIT kobu mama ajai.” Kotukonokinos odwe kere luka Lebi mama ejai.

Kobala ŋesi kes ebe, “Ebala EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael kwanata ebe, ‘Kibwaik ŋinituŋanan ekekileŋ amurwoke, koboŋoboŋoto kokekia kere anatar iidukurun kere, koar ŋinituŋanan onaceke, ŋinituŋanan aupake, ŋinituŋanan ekeidunyet.’ ”
Kiswamata odwe luka Lebi kwape ajaar akirot naka Musa: kotwaka kapaaran kaŋin kotuŋa, ituŋa kwape ilukumin iuni.
Kobala Musa ebe, “Kotiakunos lolo mama ejai EJAKAIT, ŋinituŋanan ka ikekoku, ka onaceke; tetere ŋes kisirereŋi yes lolo.”
Koboŋo Musa mama ejai EJAKAIT, kobala ebe, “Wu okwe, adiakas ituŋa ŋul aronis naepol, asubut ikulepek idekesio luka esabu.
Konye kwana, arai kisioni ijo aronisikec; konye arai mam, keŋaiŋait, komwatarai eoŋ koitabokon loibu kiwadik.”
Kobala EJAKAIT Musa ebe, “Ŋin kere yenadiakaa kamakaŋ, ŋin ŋes amwatari koitaboka.
Aso kolot, kiŋarenik ituŋa aibois naalimokinit jo; koany, kiŋarenikinenei ekamalaika jo; konye kapaaran naaanyanaria, aanyuni aronisikec.”
Ido eyakuni emalaika koinarenikon; ereŋeari da Ekanaanit, ka Emorait, ka Ekitit, ka Eperisit, ka Ekibit, ka Eyebusit da:
Kakwap naeleleete akile ka esik: naarai mam eoŋ kiupakin kayes; naarai iraas yesi ituŋa lueninik imurisiŋa: kenyek amudiar yes korot.”

Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar, “Kolimok idwe luka Isirael ebe, ‘Iraas yesi lueninik imurisiŋa: arai kiupakin eoŋ kayes karaida apak naedit noi, kamudiari eoŋ yes: aso do kolaca luisirito, kasodi konyet ajenun nukeswamakini yes.’ ”
Kolacasi idwe luka Isirael luesirito kesi ageun komoru Koreb kaiyatakin.
Kosodi naelomanaria Musa owema, anyoununete ituŋa kere, kobwo ŋinituŋanan kokek loka ewemake, asesen Musa aitodol neelomaria owema.
Kosodi kanen, naalomanaria Musa toma owema, kijesunun epir loka edou, kobwo kokek loka ewema: kinerakinos EJAKAIT ka Musa.
Koanyut ituŋa kere epir loka edou ebwoi kokek loka Ewema: konyout ituŋa kere komaata, ŋinituŋanan kokek loka ewemake.
Kinerenenas EJAKAIT kaMusa kiteos, kwape ineratar etuŋanan kopaperoke. Koboŋonori bobo ŋesi oidukurun: konye ekekejaanakinan Yosua, okoku loka Nun, ekatumunan, mam anyoununei koWema.
Kanuka ŋun, keŋaiŋait, arai adumunit asianut kakonyenekon, kitodikinai ikonirotin, tetere kajenuni jo, kasodi adumun asianut kakonyenekon: ido koomoom ebe erai ateker na ikonituŋa.”
Kotema ŋes atiar, “Ajaenena eoŋ kajo, eoŋ da kesiyenuni jo.”
Kotema ŋes atiar, “Arai mam ijaenena keoŋ, sirikiiyaŋa sio ŋina.

Naarai ikwaikinio ai ejenunio ebe abu eoŋ kadum asianut kakonyenekon, eoŋ ka ikonituŋa da? Mere ti ŋes ejenunere naarai iupa ijo kasio, kasodete atiakunio, eoŋ ka ikonituŋa, kotoma otuŋa kere luejaas akwap?”
Kobala ebe, “Keŋaiŋait, kitodik eoŋ akoniibuses.”
Kotema atiar, “Etotori akajokis kere akonyenekon, alimori da ekiror loka EJAKAIT kakonyenekon; ido ekonakini asianut ŋin yenakoto aikonakin asianut, etimi da yenakoto aitim.”
Kobala ebe, “Mam ipedori aanyun akakonyen: naarai mam ituŋanan kaanyuni eoŋ kosodi aijar.”
Kobala EJAKAIT ebe, “Koany, ejai aibois naeapie keoŋ, ibwoi ijo katiiba:
Kosodi naitorio aibusesuka, kepiikini jo toma acilat naka atiiba, arapakini jo kakakan aitodol neatuboror eoŋ:
Alemari akakan, ianyuni ijo epuraka; konye akakonyen mam eanyunos.”
Kitemokin moi kodoku tupuruc moru Sinai, kitodun mama ajai kaidi naka emoru.
Ido sirikedoku ituŋanan nepepe kajo, siriketakanu da idiotuŋanan komoru kere; karaida isipanin luka amerekekin ka aituk kinyeis adak kiŋaren kemoru kaŋol.”
Kikeu ŋesi amor aarei nuaputos kwape kanusodit; konyou Musa tupuruc sek, kodoka moru Sinai, kwape ecorakinitor EJAKAIT, koyaŋa kakanike amor aarei.
Kijesun EJAKAIT kodou, kobwo kanen nepepe kaŋes, kolimo ekiror loka EJAKAIT.

Loiŋadat aitim mama ejaas ilukumin, loisioniei numam adolit ka aibucareta ka aronis; lomam itojokit luegwaunito akiro; loidopei numam adolit nuka lukapapa kodwekec, kodwe da luka idwekec, kiton atur nakiwuniet ka nakiwoŋonet.”
Kisunya Musa, kitulur akou kwap, koma.

Kobala ebe, “Arai kwana adumunit asianut kakonyenekon, wu EJAKAIT, keŋaiŋait, kolosenenei EJAKAIT kokidiŋikosi; naarai eraas ituŋa lueninik imurisiŋa; kitimoi sio numam adolitekosi ka aronisikosi, koyaŋaarai araun airumetekon.”

Kotema atiar, “Koany, etutuki: kakonyen nuka ituŋakon kere eswamai nukaumokin, numam lem iswamatai kakwap kere, karaida kateker adio: eanyunete ituŋa kere luijai ijo mamakec aswam naka EJAKAIT, naarai esogim akirot nakeswamakini.
Kocoite, kinyek aitutuk kaluiboiete kakwap nailosete, kinyek araun atacit kamakus:
Konye ibilete itemwanakec, imunyumunyete da ipirinokec, ijepejepete Aseraikec:
Naarai mam imaete ecedeke kere: naarai EJAKAIT, loerai ekekiror Ekolo, erai Edeke lokekolo:
Kinyek aitutuk kaluiboiete kakwap, kolosete eporo mama ejaas idekesiokec, koinakinete idekesiokec asuban, kinyek idiopet anyarar jo, inyami da asubanitike;
Kinyek amanyakin odwekon adwekec, adwekec alosit eporo mama ejaas idekesiokec, einakinete odwekon alosit adoteu mama ejaas idekesiokec.
Yenepukori aliliget kere erai yenikaŋ; ka ibarenekon kere lueraas ikiliok, ikiyaik luka imoŋin ka imerekekin.
Ka ikiyaik luka asigirian ilakuni kimerekek: arai mam ilakuni ŋes, ibili ekemurisiŋ, Ilakuni ikiyaik kere luka odwekon. Komamei da idio yenetakanuni kakonyeneka komamei ibore.
Iricenenei da epucit loka asabaton, ŋes loka araito nuegeete nuka akima, ka epucit loka atukonokin odula kosaŋe loka ekaru.
Etakanunete ikiliokokon kere irwan auni ŋolikaru kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT Edeke, Edeke loka Isirael.
Naarai ereŋeari atekerin kakonyenekon, etalalai da iikorunokon: mam idiotuŋanan ipudakin akwapukon, nailosio atakanun kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT Ekonideke irwan auni ŋolikaru.
Mam iinakini aokot nuka asubanitika kimugatin luitubuunitoi; karaida aideun asubanit naka epucit loka aleleŋio aitodol tupuruc.
Iyauni nugeet nuka araito nuegeete kalupokon togo loka EJAKAIT Ekonideke. Mam ipoi ikalol kakile nuka totoke.”
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar, “Kiwadik ijo akiro ŋun: naarai kwape ejaatar akiro ŋun etutuk kajo ka Isirael.”
Kojai ŋesi ŋina ka EJAKAIT apaarasia akaisaoŋon paaran ka kuare da; mam anyami atap karaida aimat akipi. Kiwadik ŋesi amor akiro nuka aitutuket, aicorakineta atomon.
Keanyut Aaron ka idwe luka Isirael kere Musa, koany, emilia amuny naka ereeteke; kokuriakaros aikunyakin ŋes.
Kiworo Musa kes; koboŋut Aaron ka ijaka kere luka ekodet neajai ŋesi; kiner Musa kakes.
Kokau kikunyut idwe luka Isirael kere; kicorak kes ŋun kere nuabu EJAKAIT kinera kaŋes komoru Sinai.
Kedau Musa einer kakes, kiswapa ekereet.
Konye nakelomanaria Musa akonyen nuka EJAKAIT einer kaŋes, kolacanari aiswapet, aitodol nakelomununia; kolom, kolimok idwe luka Isirael kere nukicorakinio;
Koanyut idwe luka Isirael ereet loka Musa, ebe emilia amuny naka ereet loka Musa: kiswapa Musa bobo ereeteke, aitodol naalomaria einer kaŋes.”
Iswamao aswam apaarasia akanykape, konye eraun apaaran nakikanyetekaarei apaaran nakalaunan kamakus, nakasabato naka aibworar mama ejai EJAKAIT: yeniswamai adioswam kere kapaaran kaŋin eario.
Sirikisineput akim kaiboisiokus kere kapaaran naka asabato.”
‘Kijaikisi yesi ainakinet mama ejai EJAKAIT: ŋinituŋanan yenejai etau loekot, koyau ainakinet naka EJAKAIT: esabu ka epuesa ka aisinit.
Lobululu, ka lomuge, ka lokareŋan, ka ebaputa loejok, ka ajul nuka akinei;
Ka imukulen luka imerekekin luitereŋitai, ka imukulen luka itakasin,
Akinyet naka atala, ka lueuru maa luka akinyet nakinyonyoanakina; ka luka lukisupurununo;
Amor nuemelomeloto, ka amor nuipiripiranara aibwaikin opod,
Ewema lokalaunan, ewemake, ka eimukoreteke, ka arucetake, II ka abaoike, ka ariinoke, ka ipirinoke, ka aigaŋetake;
Asaduku, ka adaketake; eicoloŋ-lokaitim, ka aigalisitike;
Emesa, ka adaketake, ka iboroke kere, ka imugatin luka aitodikin;
Epir da loka atala, ka iboroke, ka atalaike, ka akinyet naka atala;
Etem loka lukisupurununo, ka adaketake; akinyet nakinyonyoanakina, ka lukisupurununo, ka aigalisit naka ekek, kokek loka ewema lokalaunan;
Etem loka ainakineta nuicweio, ka eboike loka aisinit, ka adaketake, ka iboroke kere; akalaya ka aigaŋeteke;
Igoen luigalitoi luka alaro, ipirinoke ka aigaŋetakec, ka aigalisit naka erute loka alaro;
Iloin luka ewema lokalaunan, ka iloin luka alaro, ka aunoikec;
Inapen luedonyitai ejok, aijaanakinia aibois nakalaunan, inapen lukalaunak luka Aaron esasedoti, ka inapen luka odweke, aijaanakinia osasedotene.”
Konyou ekodet kere loka idwe luka Isirael kaneajai Musa.

Kopotu, ŋinituŋanan yenabu etauke kominakin, ŋinituŋanan yenabu ekemoyo kokotokin, koyaut ainakinet naka EJAKAIT, kanuka aiswamaunia ewema loka airiamunun, ka aijaanakinike kere, ka inapen lukalaunak.
Kopotu, ikiliok ka aŋor da, kere luakotosi ikecetauon, koyaut abwakai, ka itetio, ka igilun, ka aikomon, kere luka esabu; ŋolituŋanan loabu koinak ainakinet naka esabu mama ejai EJAKAIT.
Ŋoltuŋanan da, loajai lobululu ka lomuge ka lokareŋan, ka ebaputa loejok, ka ajul nuka akinei, ka imukulen luka imerekekin luitereŋitai, ka imukulen luka itakasin abu koyau kes.
Ŋinituŋanan yenabu koinak ainakinet naka epuesa ka aisinit, abu koyau ainakinet naka EJAKAIT: ŋolituŋanan da loajaas akito nuka sita kanuka aswam naka aijaanakin, abu koyau.
Aŋor da kere nuapiriaka kotauon apotu koojioto kakecekanin, koyaut da luapotu koojiut, lobululu, ka lomuge, ka lokareŋan, ka ebaputa loejok.
Aŋor kere nuaminakina kotauonokec kacoa apotu koojioto ajul nuka akinei.
Koyaut ikayaitok amor nuemelomeloto, ka amor nuipiripiranara, aibwaikin opod, ka yenikatorub;
Ka lueuru maa, ka akinyet; naka atala ka akinyet nakinyonyoanakina, ka luka lukisupurununo.
Koyaut idwe luka Isirael ainakinet naka akot mama ejai EJAKAIT: ŋolikiliokit ka ŋiniberu luakotos ikecetauon ayaun kanuka aswam kere, naabu EJAKAIT kicorak, aiswamaunio kama kaMusa.
Eleleb ŋes kemoyo loka Edeke, kacoa, ka aijen ka apirianut, ka iponesio kere luka aswam;
Aswam aswamisro nuka apirianut, atata esabu ka epuesa ka aisinit.
Aigir amor nuiminaikinere, ka aiger akito, aswam da iponesio kere luka aswam nakapirianut.
Ebwaiki otauke tetere isisianakini, ŋes ka Okoliab, okoku loka Akisamak loka ateker naka Dan.

Eleleb ŋesi kes kacoa nakotau, aswam iponesio kere luka aswam, naka ekegiran ka ekeswaman loka apirianut, ka naka ekasonyan lobululu, ka lomuge, ka lokareŋan, ka ebaputa loejok, ka naka ekaojion, naka ŋul kere kaluiswamaete ŋiniswam kere, ka naka ŋul kaluiswamaete aswamisio nuka apirianut.
Kijaasi Musa ainakineta kere, nuapotu idwe luka Isirael koyaut kanuka aswam naka aijaanakin naka aibois nakalaunan, aiswamaunia. Koyaununutu bobo mama ejai ŋesi ainakineta nuka akot ŋinitupuruc.
Ituŋa da lukacoa lueswamaete aswam kere naka aibois nakalaunan, kobu ŋinituŋanan kaswamuke naeswamaete kesi;
Kotemasi Musa atiar, “Eyaunete ituŋa luedeparito noi kanuka aijaanakin naka aswam, naecorakinit EJAKAIT aiswamaun.”
Kicorak Musa, kolimoroi da koidukurun kere ebe, “Sirikiyataki bobo ekiliokit arai aberu aswam kanuka ainakinet naka aibois nakalaunan.” Kwaŋin kitikokinai ituŋa ayaunun.
Naarai adolito iboro luajaatar kesi aiswamaunia aswam kere, kodeparito da.
Aojau naka ŋiniigalisit arai ikubitin
Abu koropik aigalisio akany: koropik da aigalisio ace akany.
Abu kiswamak akodeta nubululu oreret loka aigalisit nakawasia kotoma kanuaropikinitai: kiswama kwaŋin koreret loka aigalisit nakawasia kotoma kanuce kanuaropikinitai.
Abu kiswamak akodeta akaisakany aigalisit adiopet kiswamak da akodeta akaisakany oreret loka aigalisit nakiareit naaropikinitai; kiteosi da akodeta ŋun.
Abu kiswamau aruceta akaisakany nuka esabu, kimorikik aigalisio karuceta: koraun do ewema ediopet lokalaunan.
Aojau naka ŋiniigalisit ikubitin akaisauni, ka alalau naka ŋiniigalisit ikubitin iwoŋon: araas aigalisio atomon ka nadiopet nuka aitemis adiopet.
Abu koropik aigalisio akany bonik, ka aigalisio nuce akanykape bonik.
Abu kiswamak akodeta akaisakany oreret loka aigalisit nakawasia kaŋun kanuaropikinitai, kiswamak da akodeta akaisakany oreret loka aigalisit nakawasia ka nuce kanuaropikinitai.
Abu kiswamau aruceta akaisakany nuka aisinit aimorikikinia ewema tetere eraun ediopet.
Abu kiswamau eimukoret loka ewema kimukulen luka imerekekin luitereŋitai, ka eimukoret loka imukulen luka itakasin kujuke.
Aojau naka abao arai ikubitin itomon, alalau naka ŋinibao arai ekubit ediopet ka atutubet.
Ŋinibao ajaas arucetake aarei nuarucokinito adiopet neajai nace: abu kiswamau kwaŋin abaoi kere nuka ewema lokalaunan.
Abu kiswamau abaoi nuka ewema lokalaunan; abaoi akaisaarei kowai loka eŋalakimak kari naka eŋalakimak:
Abu kiswamau aigaŋeta akaisaoŋon nuka epuesa kwap kabaoi akaisaarei; aigaŋeta aarei kwap kabao adiopet neelomarete arucetake aarei, ka aigaŋeta aarei kwap kacebao neelomarete arucetake aarei.
Kowai lokiareit loka ewema lokalaunan, kowai loka agolitomei, abu kiswamau abaoi akaisaarei.
Ka aigaŋetakec akaisaoŋon nuka epuesa; aigaŋeta aarei kwap kabao adiopet, ka aigaŋeta aarei kwap kacebao.
Abu kiswamau abaoi akanykape kowai lokokau kari nakoto.
Abu kiswamau abaoi aarei nuka agoria nuajaas to kewema lokalaunan.
Koraas aareiarei kokwap, kirotakina kwaŋin kiton kuju ogilut ediopet: abu kiswamau kes kwaŋin kagoria kere aarei.
Ajaas abaoi akanykauni, ka aigaŋetakec nuka epuesa, aigaŋeta atomon ka nukanykape; kwap kaŋinibao aigaŋeta aarei.
Ka ariino ace akany nuka abaoi nukowai ece loka ewema, ka ariino akany nukoto kewema kari nakoto.
Abu kiriik ariit nakokidiŋ naejai kidiŋ kabaoi anyoun kepuai kiton epuai.
Kiladaa abaoi kesabu, kiswamak da igilunakec luka esabu lukitoloma ariino: kiladaa ariino kesabu.
Abu kiswamak ipirin iwoŋon luka akito nuka sita, kiladaa kes kesabu: koraas igolunakec luka esabu: kotatak kes aigaŋeta nuka epuesa.
Abu kiswamau aigalisit naka ekek loka Ewema, lobululu, ka lomuge, ka lokareŋan, ka ebaputa loecipitai kiusio lueriim, aswam naka ekasonyan.
Ka ipirinoke ikany ka igolunakec: kiladaa akwesikec ka aikajetakec kesabu: koraas aigaŋetakec akany nuka aisinit.
Kiladaa ŋes kesabu loelai kujuke kotomake da, kosubak ŋes atorosit naka esabu airimor.
Kotatak ŋes igilun iwoŋon luka esabu akejeke aoŋon; igilun iarei osiepike ediopet, ka igilun iarei osiepike ece.
Abu kiswamau adaketa nuka akito nuka sita, kiladaa kes kesabu.
Kitolomik adaketa ogilun lukosiepion luka asaduku, adakia asaduku.
Abu kiswamau eicoloŋ-lokaitim loka esabu loelai, aojauke ikubitin iarei ka atutubet, alalauke ekubit ka atutubet.
Abu kiswamau ikerubin iarei luka esabu: aswam naerukuk ŋes eswamaunia, kosaŋeta iarei luka eicoloŋ-lokaitim.
Ekerubi ediopet osaŋe ediopet, ka ekerubi ece da osaŋe ece: kiswamau eicoloŋ-lokaitim ka ikerubinike koraas luka ibore idiopet.
Kigararaasi ikerubin abebenokakec kuju, korapito eicoloŋ-lokaitim kabebenokakec, kiteos ireetakec, kosesenete ireeta luka ikerubin oicoloŋ-lokaitim.
Kiladaa kesabu loelai, kosubak atorosit naka esabu airimor.
Abu kiswamak atokitoit alalau naka akan airimor, kiswamak da atorosit naka esabu airimor atokitoit.
Kotatak ŋes igilun iwoŋon luka esabu, kibwaik igilun agoria aoŋon nuajaas akejeke aoŋon.
Edunyas igilun katokitoit, aiboisio nuka adaketa adakia emesa.
Abu kiswamau adaketa nuka akito nuka sita, kiladaa kes kesabu, adakia emesa.
Abu kiswamau iboro luajaas omesa, atubaake, ka akaaleike, ka atanyake, ka amotiike, abukununio, nuka esabu loelai.
Alomunito icogen ikanykape kowaitinike; icogen iuni kowai ediopet loka epir loka atala, ka icogen da iuni kowai loce loka epir loka atala:

Akolin auni nueswamatai aputorit aturo kocoget ediopet, akouke ka aturot: akolin auni nueswamatai aputorit aturo kocoget ece, akouke ka aturot: kwaŋin kotoma ocogen ikanykape lualomunito kopir loka atala.
Ajaas akolin aoŋon kotoma opir loka atala nueswamatai aputorit aturo, akwesikec ka aturokec.
Akou kwap kicogen iarei luka ibore idiopet, ka akou kwap kicogen iarei luka ibore idiopet, ka akou kwap kicogen iarei luka ibore idiopet, kwape ajaatar icogen ikanykape lualomunito kopir.
Akwesikec ka icogenekec araas luka ibore idiopet: korai kere aswam naerukuk naka esabu loelai.
Abu kiswamau atalaike, akanykaarei, ka aitudeŋetake ka asaninike nuka ekurwon, nuka esabu loelai.
Abu kiswamau ŋes katalata
Kiladaa ŋes kesabu loelai, kujuke ka isiepionoke ka amumwarake: kiswamak da ŋes atorosit naka esabu airimor.
Abu kiswamak ŋes igilun iarei luka esabu kwap katorositike, amaranake aarei, kosiepionoke iarei, koraas aiboisio nuka adaketa adakia ŋes.
Abu kiswamau adaketa nuka akito nuka sita, kiladaa kes kesabu.
Kiswamak da amumwarake kuju kagoriake aoŋon; koraas amumwara nuka ibore idiopet kaŋes: kiladaa ŋes kaisinit.
Abu kiswamau iboro kere luka etem, atubaake, initiake, atanyake, ka igolunake luka akiriŋ, ka ekialake: eswamaunit iboroke kere kaisinit.
Abu kiswamak etem eboi loka aisinit, kwap kapama naerimorit ŋes kokwap, kodolite kidiŋ osiepion luka etem.
Abu kotata igilun iwoŋon luka isaŋeta iwoŋon luka eboi loka aisinit, luaraas aiboisio nuka adaketa.
Abu kiswamau adaketa nuka akito nuka sita, kiladaa kes kaisinit.
Kitolomanak adaketa ogilun kosiepion luka etem, adakia ŋes; abu kiswamau ŋes kabaoi koorori.
Emwaasi ipirinokec akaisaarei, ka aigaŋetakec nuka aisinit akaisaarei; igolun luka ipirin ka aikajetakec araas luka epuesa.
Kowai loka agolitomei ikubitin akwatat, ipirinokec akaisaarei ka aigaŋetakec akaisaarei, nuka aisinit; igolun luka ipirin ka aikajetakec araas luka epuesa.
Kowai lokoto ajaas igoen luegalitoi luka ikubitin akaisakany, ipirinokec itomon, ka aigaŋetakec atomon; igolun luka ipirin ka aikajetakec araas luka epuesa.
Kowai lokokide ari nakokide ikubitin akaisakany.
Igoen Iucgalitoi luka ewai ediopet loka erute araas ikubitin itomon ka lukany; ipirinokec iuni, ka aigaŋetakec auni;
Kwaŋin epuai da; kakan na ka akan ya da naka erute loka alaro ajaas igoen luegalitoi luka ikubitin itomon ka lukany; ipirinokec iuni, ka aigaŋetakec auni.
Igoen luegalitoi kere luerimorito alaro araas luka ebaputa loecipitai kiusio lueriim.
Araas aigaŋeta nuka ipirin nuka aisinit: igoluna luka ipirin ka aikajetakec luka epuesa; ka akwesikec da eladaaritai kepuesa; ipirin kere luka alaro ajaas aikajeta nuka epuesa.

Aigalisit naka erute loka alaro arai aswam naka ekasonyan, lobululu, ka lomuge, ka lokareŋan, ka ebaputa loecipitai kiusio lueriim: aojauke ikubitin akaisaarei, ka amukururuke ikubitin ikany, koputos kigoen kaluegalitoi alaro.
Emwaasi ikecepirin iwoŋon ka aigaŋetakec aoŋon, luka aisinit; igolunakec luka epuesa, ka akwesikec ka aikajetakec eladaaritai kepuesa.
Iloin kere luka ewema lokalaunan ka lualukunito alaro, araas luka aisinit.
Abu Besalel okoku loka Uri, okoku loka Kur, loka ateker naka Yuda kiswamau kere luabu EJAKAIT kicorak Musa.
Kojai Okoliab, okoku loka Akisamak, loka ateker naka Dan, nepepe kaŋes, loarai ekegiran amor, ekeswaman loepiriana, ekasonyan lobululu ka lomuge ka lokareŋan, ka ebaputa loejok.
Epuesa loka ŋul kaluaponi kimarai kokodet arai atalatan akwatat, ka isekelin elukumit ka akwat akanykaarei ka akaisakanykaarei ka lukany, kwape ajaar esekel loka aioois nakalaunau:

Ŋinituŋanan ebeka, ŋes atutubet naka esekel, kwape ajaar esekel loka aibois nakalaunan, kanuka ŋinituŋanan yenabu kotubor mama ejaas luemarar, ageun kaluka ikar akaisaarei ka luedeparito, kes ituŋa ilukumin akwat akanykape ka ilukumin iuni, ka akwat akany ka akaisakany.
Araas atalatan akwatat nuka epuesa nutataunet aigaŋeta nuka aibois nakalaunan, ka aigaŋeta nuka aigalisit; aigaŋeta akwatat nuka atalatan akwatat, atalata kanuka aigaŋet.
Abu kiswamau igoluna luka ipirin kisekelin elukumit ka akwat akanykaarei ka akaisakanykaarei ka lukany, kiladaari da akwesikec, kiswamakina da aikajetakec.
Aisinit naka ainakinet arai atalatan akaisakanykaarei ka isekelin ilukumin iarei ka akwat aoŋon.
Kiswamaunia ŋin aigaŋeta nuka ekek loka ewema loka airiamunun, ka etem loka aisinit, ka eboike loka aisinit, ka iboro kere luka etem.
Ka aigaŋeta nualukunito alaro, ka aigaŋeta nuka erute loka alaro, ka iloin kere luka ewema lokalaunan, ka iloin kere lualukunito alaro.
Kibenibenata esabu, kididiununutu adonyokinio lobululu, ka lomuge, ka Lokareŋan, ka ebaputa loejok, aswam naka ekeswaman loepiriana.
Apotu kiswamakis lukokeperin, luimorikikinitai; kimorikikinitete kosaŋetake iarei.

Aenet naecipitai kapirianut, naajai tomake aenia, arai naka aput adiopet, koputos kaswamuke; naka esabu, ka lobululu, ka lomuge, ka lokareŋan, ka ebaputa Loecipitai kiusio lueriim; kwape ecorakinitor EJAKAIT Musa.
Kibwaik kes okeperin luka epod, araut amor nuka aisiitunet kanuka idwe luka Isirael; kwape ecorakinitor EJAKAIT Musa.
Korai yenika agoria aoŋon nueriakanara; kokudokis yenikatorob bala eriagi: aojauke atutubet naka ekubit, alalauke da atutubet naka ekubit.
Kipiripiranakis ikokoron iwoŋon luka amor: ekokoro losodit arai loka asadio, ka atopasit,
Ekokoro lokiareit loka emeralid,
Ekokoro lokiwuniet loka eyasit,
Ekokoro lokiwoŋonet loka aberul,
Araas amor kwape ajaatar ikiroria luka idwe luka Isirael, atomon ka nuarei, kwape ajaatar ikiroriakec; kwape igiria emacar, ŋinituŋanan kwape ajaar ekekiror, kanuka atekerin atomon ka nuarei.
Apotu kiswamakis yenikatorob irikoi luesubito bala aunoi luka aswam naeojitoi naka esabu loelai.
Apotu kiswamaut apesan aarei nuka esabu, ka igilun iarei luka esabu; kibwaikis igilun ŋul iarei osaŋeta iarei luka yenikatorob.
Kibwaikis da irikoi ŋul iarei lueojitoi luka esabu ogilun iarei kosaŋeta luka yenikatorob.
Kibwaikis isaŋeta luce iarei luka irikoi apesan aarei, kibwaikis kes okeperin luka epod, kowai lokoiŋaren.
Apotu kiswamaut igilun iarei luka esabu, kibwaikis osaŋeta iarei luka yenikatorob, toma atokitoitike naajai owai lokotoma loka epod.
Kiswamaut igilun iarei luka esabu, kibwaikis kes okeperin iarei luka epod kwapuke, kowai lokoiŋaren, eiduny kaimorikikinetake, kuju aenet naka epod naecipitai kapirianut.
Koenikis igilun luka yenikatorob ka igilun luka epod keusi lobululu, tetere iboie kokuju aenet naka epod naecipitai kapirianur, tetere mam yenikatorob ilajakin kepod; kwape ecorakinitor EJAKAIT Musa.
Ka apedot naka ekaso kotomake, kwape kapedot naka ekooti loka acuma, kojai atokitoit airimor apedotoke tetere mam ecila.
Kiswamakis atwelei nuka ekaso akamamagan nuka lobululu, ka lomuge ka lokareŋan, ka ebaputa loecipitai kiusio lueriim.
Kiswamaut icirin luka esabu kaloelai, kibwaikis icirin kidiŋ kakamamagan airimor atwelei nuka ekaso, kidiŋ kakamamagan;
Ecirit ka akamamaga, ecirit ka akamamaga, airimor atwelei nuka eka so, aijaanakinia; kwape ecorakinitor EJAKAIT Musa.
Ka egoe lokieniena akou loka ebaputa loejok, ka igoen luejok luka akwes luka ebaputa loejok, ka ipalei luka ebaputa loecipitai kiusio Iucriim.
Ka aenet naka aŋabet naka ebaputa loecipitai kiusio lueriim, ka lobululu ka lomuge, ka lokareŋan, aswam naka ekasonyan; kwape ecorakinitor EJAKAIT Musa.
Koenikis eusi lobululu tomake, aenikinia ŋes kuju ogoe lokieniena akou; kwape ecorakinitor EJAKAIT Musa.
Ka eimukoret loka imukulen luka itakasin, ka egoe loka aigalisit;
Asaduku naka aitejenunet, ka adaketake, ka eicoloŋ-lokaitim;
Emesa, ka iboroke kere, ka imugatin luka aitodikin;
Epir loka atala loelai, ka atalaike, kes atalai nuesipokinio ejok, ka iboroke kere, ka akinyet naka atala;
Ka etem loka esabu, ka akinyet nakinyonyoanakina ka lukisupurununo, ka aigalisit naka ekek loka Ewema;
Etem loka aisinit, ka eboike loka aisinit, ka adaketake, ka iboroke kere, akalaya ka aigaŋeteke;
Igoen luigalitoi luka alaro, ka ipirinoke, ka aigaŋetake, ka aigalisit naka erute loka alaro, ka aunoike, ka iloinoke, ka iboro kere luka aijaanakin naka ewema lokalaunan, luka ewema loka airiamunun:
Inapen luecipitai ejok luka aijaanakin kaibois nakalaunan, ka inapen lukalaunak kanuka Aaron esasedoti, ka inapen luka odweke, aijaanakinia kosasedotene.
Kwape ajaatar kere nuecorakinit EJAKAIT Musa, kiswamata idwe luka Isirael aswam kere.
Koany Musa aswam kere, ido koany, apotu kodaut aswam; kwape ecorakinitor EJAKAIT, kwape kwaŋin eswamatotor: kilipak Musa kes arereŋ.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Isipokini ewema lokalaunan loka ewema loka airiamunun kapaaran nasodit naka elap losodit.
Ibwaikini tomake asaduku naka aitejenunet, igaliori da asaduku kaigalisit.
Itolomuni emesa, inapakini da iboro kujuke; itolomuni da epir loka atala, isipokini da atalaike.
Isipokini da etem loka esabu loka lukisupurununo kiŋaren kasaduku naka aitejenunet, ikajakini aigalisit naka ekek loka ewema lokalaunan.
Isipokini da etem loka ainakineta nuicweio kiŋaren kekek loka ewema lokalaunan loka ewema loka airiamunun.
Isipokini akalaya kidiŋ kewema loka airiamunun ka etem, ibukokini da akipi tomake.
Isipokini luka alaro kolukunite, ikajakini aigalisit naka erute loka alaro.
Iyaŋaari akinyet nakinyonyoanakina, inyonyoanakini da ewema lokalaunan, ka iboro kere luejaas toma, italauni da ŋes, ka iboroke kere: eraun lokalaunan.
Inyonyoanakini etem loka ainakineta nuicweio, ka iboroke kere, italauni etem: eraun etem lokalaunan cut.
Inyonyoanakini akalaya ka aigaŋeteke, italauni ŋes.
Iyanauni Aaron ka odweke okek loka ewema loka airiamunun, iloŋi kes kakip.
Itanapi Aaron inapen lukalaunak; inyonyoikini ŋes, italauni ŋes, tetere kejaanakini eoŋ kosasedotene.
Iyanauni odweke, itanapi kes ikootin:
Inyonyoanakini kes, kwape inyonyoikinia papakec, tetere kejaanakinete eoŋ kosasedotene: eraun ainyonyoanakiniokec esasedotene lomam enaŋi kamakec anatar aturiokec.”
Kiswama Musa kwaŋin: kwape ajaatar kere nuecorakinit EJAKAIT ŋes, kiswama kwaŋin.
Kosodi kolap losodit, kokaru lokiareit, kapaaran nasodit naka elap, kosipokinai ewema lokalaunan.
Kosipok Musa ewema lokalaunan, kibwaik aigaŋetake, kosipok abaoike, kirionok ariinoke, kosipok ipirinoke.
Koterak ewema owema lokalaunan, kopesik eimukoret loka ewema kujuke, kwape ecorakinitor EJAKAIT Musa.
Koyaŋa aitejenunet kibwaik toma asaduku, kirupanak adaketa asaduku, kidokok eicoloŋ-lokaitim asaduku:
Kitolom asaduku owema lokalaunan, kikajak egoe loka aigalisit, kigalio asaduku naka aitejenunet; kwape ecorakinitor EJAKAIT Musa.
Kibwaik emesa toma owema loka airiamunun, kowai loka ewema kari naka agolitomei, kiŋa kaigalisit.
Kinapanak imugatin nen kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT: kwape ecorakinitor EJAKAIT Musa.
Kibwaik epir loka atala toma owema loka airiamunun, asesena kemesa, kowai loka ewema lokalaunan kari naka eŋalakimak.
Kosipok atalai akonyen nuka EJAKAIT: kwape ecorakinitor EJAKAIT Musa.
Kosipok etem loka esabu toma owema loka airiamunun kiŋaren kaigalisit:
Kisupur lukisupurununo lueuru maa; kwape ecorakinitor EJAKAIT Musa.
Kikajak aigalisit naka ekek loka ewema lokalaunan.
Kosipok etem loka ainakineta nuicweio okek loka ewema lokalaunan loka ewema loka airiamunun, koinak ainakinet naicweio ka ainakinet naka akiria; kwape ecorakinitor EJAKAIT Musa.
Kibwaik akalaya kidiŋ kewema loka airiamunun ka etem, kobukok akipi toma nukilonet.
Kilota Musa ka Aaron ka odweke akaninikec ka akejekec kanen;
Nakelomanariata owema loka airiamunun, nakikunyanakiniata otem, elosenenete: kwape ecorakinitor EJAKAIT Musa.
Kosipok luka alaro kolukunito ewema lokalaunan ka etem, kikajak aigalisit naka erute loka alaro. Kwaŋin kodau Musa aswam.
Mam Musa abu kopedo alomar owema loka airiamunun, naarai eboie edou kanen, kileleba da aibuses naka EJAKAIT owema lokalaunan.
Kosodi kelemar edou kokuju kewema lokalaunan, kobwota idwe luka Isirael, kobeenenete alositokec kere.
Konye arai mam edou elemaritai, mam alosete aitodol apaaran naelemarere.
Naarai ajai edou loka EJAKAIT kuju owema lokalaunan paaran, ajai da akim nen kuare, kakonyen nuka ekek kere loka Isirael, kalositokec kere.
Kolimok idwe luka Isirael ebe, Naeinakinia ituŋanan kayesi ainakinet mama ejai EJAKAIT, iinakinete ainakinetekus kotoma obaren, kosipanin luka aituk ka luka amerekekin.
Idokokini akekan akou naka ainakinet naicweio; ecamunio kanukeŋ alucio ŋes.
Earanakini emoŋ lotobait kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT: ijaikinete odwe luka Aaron, lusasedotin, aokot, kobwatanakis aokot owaitin luka etem loejai okek loka ewema loka airiamunun.
Ejeni ŋesi ainakinet naicweio, etubutubei da koinerinoke.
Kosodete odwe luka Aaron esasedoti aibwaikin akim otem, ka aigaŋ akito akim:
Inapanakinete odwe luka Aaron, lusasedotin, inerino, akou ka asiepai toma akito nuejaas akim naejai otem:
Konye ilosi kakip lukotomake ka akejeke: kosodi esasedoti aicweikin kere kotem, araun ainakinet naicweio, ainakinet naeinakinere kakim, naka asakat naeuru saa mama ejai EJAKAIT.
Arai da erai ainakineteke kosipan loka amerekekin, arai loka akinei, araun ainakinet naicweio; einakini ŋesi yenikiliokit yenimam eŋwalit.
Earakini ŋes owai loka etem ari naka agolitomei kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT: ebwatanakinete odwe luka Aaron lusasedotin, aokotoke owaitin luka etem.
Etubutubei da koinerinoke, nepepe kakouke ka asiepaike: inapanakini esasedoti kes akito nuejaas akim naejai otem:
Konye ilosi kakip lukotomake ka akeje: einakini esasedoti kere, icweikini kotem: erai ainakinet naicweio, ainakinet naeinakinere kakim, naka asakat naeuru maa mama ejai EJAKAIT.
Eyauni esasedoti ŋes otem, emojirikini aŋedar akouke, kicweikin kotem; eitanakini aokotoke ariri ketem:
Elemari elogorotoke ka ajuloke, ecakakini owai lokokide loka etem, aibois naka ekurwon:
Kosobi aicil abebenokake, konye mam etubutubei: icweikini esasedoti ŋes kotem, kakito nuejaas akim: erai ainakinet naicweio, ainakinet naeinakinere kakim, naka asakat naeuru saa mama ejai EJAKAIT.

Einuni odwe luka Aaron lusasedetin: emuduni ŋesi akan ileleba akiria Ŋun nuidicic, ka akinyeteke, ka lueuru maa kere; icweikini esasedoti ŋes araun aiituneteke kotem, ainakinet naeinakinere kakim, naka asakat naeuru saa mama ejai EJAKAIT:
Ŋun da nuideunos nuka ainakinet naka akiria eraunos nuka Aaron ka odweke: erai ibore yenikalaunan noi yenika ainakineta nuka EJAKAIT nueinakinere kakim.
Arai erai ainakinetekon naka akiria nukeon, eraun naka akiria nuidicic numam itubuunitoi, nuinyalakinitai akinyet.
Itiakatiakai kes katutubeta, ibukokini akinyet: ŋes ainakinet naka akiria.
Arai da erai ainakinetekon naka akiria nuka ibore yenikiwowas, itwasamaeneno kakiria nuidicic kakinyet.
Iyauni ainakinet naka akiria nuitwasamatai kiboro ŋul mama ejai EJAKAIT: einunio esasedoti, ŋes da eyauni otem.
Edakuni esasedoti kainakinet naka akiria aiituneteke, icweikini kotem: ainakinet naeinakinere kakim, naka asakat naeuru saa mama ejai EJAKAIT.
Ŋun da nuideunos nuka ainakinet naka akiria eraunos nuka Aaron ka odweke: erai ibore yenikalaunan noi yenika ainakineta nuka EJAKAIT nueinakinere kakim.
Iinanakinete ŋul araun ainakinet naka nugeet mama ejai EJAKAIT: konye mam isupuruunio kes araun asakat naeuru saa kotem.
Kibwaanakin abalaŋ ŋiniinakinet naka akiria; mam itwataniari abalaŋ naka aitutuket naka Ekonideke kainakinetekon naka akiria: iinanakini abalaŋ kainakinetakon kere.
Ibukonokini akinyet, ibwaikini da lueuru maa: ŋes ainakinet naka akiria.
Icweikini esasedoti aiituneteke, atutubet naka imumwake luicomom, ka atutubet naka akinyeteke, ka lueuru maa kere: ŋes ainakinet naeinakinere kakim mama ejai EJAKAIT.
Idokokini akanike akou naka ainakineteke, earakini ŋes okek loka ewema loka airiamunun: ebwatanakinete odwe luka Aaron lusasedotin aokot owaitin luka etem.
Einakini nuka asubanit naka ainakineta nuka ainapakin ainakinet naeinakinere kakim mama ejai EJAKAIT: asiepai naerapit lukotoma, ka asiepai kere naejai toma.
Ka iŋalur luarei ka asiepaikec naeapias kaŋabet, ka asiepai naka emany nepepe kaiŋalur, ŋul kere elemari.
Icweikinete odwe luka Aaron kotem neejai ainakinet naicweio, naejai akito nuejaas akim: ŋes ainakinet naeinakinere kakim, naka asakat naeuru saa mama ejai EJAKAIT.
Arai einakini imerekek araun ainakineteke, einakini ŋes kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT:
Idokokini akanike akou naka ainakineteke, earakini kiŋaren kewema loka airiamunun: ebwatanakinete odwe luka Aaron aokotoke owaitin luka etem.

Einakini nuka asubanit naka ainakineta nuka ainapakin ainakinet naeinakinere kakim mama ejai EJAKAIT: asiepaike, asonyok kere etubuni kariri naka aŋabet; ka asiepai naerapit lukotoma, ka asiepai kere naejai toma.
Ka iŋalur luarei ka asiepaikec naeapias kaŋabet, ka asiepai naka emany nepepe kaiŋalur, ŋul kere elemari.
Icweikini esasedoti kes kotem: eraas inyamat luka ainakinet naeinakinere kakim mama ejai EJAKAIT.
Arai erai ainakineteke akinei, einakini kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT.
Idokokini akanike akouke, earakini ŋes kiŋaren kewema loka airiamunun: ebwatanakinete odwe luka Aaron aokotoke owaitin luka etem.
Einakini nuka ainakineteke, ainakinet naeinakinere kakim mama ejai EJAKAIT: asiepai naerapit lukotoma, ka asiepai kere naejai toma.
Ka iŋalur luarei, ka asiepaikec naeapias kaŋabet, ka asiepai naka emany nepepe kaiŋalur, ŋul kere elemari.
Icweikini esasedoti kes kotem: eraas inyamat luka ainakinet naeinakinere kakim, naka asakat naeuru saa; asiepai kere erai naka EJAKAIT.
Eraun ekisil lomam edaun anatar aturiokus kaiboisiokus kere, ebe mam inyamenenete asiepai karaida aokot.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Kolimok idwe luka Isirael ebe, Arai kediaka ituŋanan komam ejeni, kakirot kere naecorakinit EJAKAIT ebe mam iswamao, kiswama adiopet kakesi:

Arai kediaka esasedoti loinyonyoikinitai akinyet ayaŋaun abili mama ejaas ituŋa; koinak do ŋesi kanuka adiakareteke naabu kodiaka, emoŋ lotobait lomam eŋwalit mama ejai EJAKAIT araun ainakinet naka adiakaret;
Eyauni emoŋ lotobait okek loka ewema loka airiamunun kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT; idokokini akanike akou naka emoŋ lotobait, earakini emoŋ lotobait akonyen nuka EJAKAIT.
Kosodi esasedoti loinyonyoikinitai akinyet alemun aceokot nuka emoŋ lotobait, eyaŋauni owema loka airiamunun:
Idomakini esasedoti ebokoritike toma aokot, ebwatanari aokot irwan akanykaarei kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT koiŋaren kaigalisit naka aibois nakalaunan.

Ejukonokini esasedoti aokot amumwara nuka etem loka lukisupurununo loejai owema loka airiamunun kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT: ebukokini aokot kere nuka emoŋ lotobait kwap ketem loka ainakineta nuicweio, loejai okek loka ewema loka airiamunun.
Elemari ŋesi asiepai kere naka emoŋ lotobait loka ainakinet naka adiakaret; asiepai naerapit lukotoma ka asiepai kere naejai toma.
Ka iŋalur luarei, ka asiepaikec naeapias kaŋabet, ka asiepai naka emany, nepepe kaiŋalur, ŋul kere elemari.
Kwape elemaria komoŋ loka asubanit naka ainakineta nuka ainapakin: icweikini esasedoti kes kotem loka ainakineta nuicweio.
Emukule loka emoŋ lotobait, ka akiriŋike kere, nepepe kakouke, ka akejeke, ka lukotomake, ka ikijitike.
Emoŋ lotobait kere edakari kiŋa kiidukurun aibois naelai, neebukonokinio ekurwon, kicwe ŋes kakim kakito: neebukonokinio ekurwon, nepenen icweere.
Naejenunor adiakaret naapotu kodiakasi, einakini atukot emoŋ lotobait araun ainakinet naka adiakaret, koyau kiŋaren kewema loka airiamunun.
Idokokinete imakio luka ekodet akaninikec akou naka emoŋ lotobait kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT: earakinio emoŋ lotobait akonyen nuka EJAKAIT.
Koyaŋau esasedoti loinyonyoikinitai akinyet aokot nuka emoŋ lotobait owema loka airiamunun.
Idomakini esasedoti ebokoritike toma aokot, ebwatanari irwan akanykaarei kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT koiŋaren kaigalisit.
Ejukonokini da aokot amumwara nuka etem loejai kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, loejai owema loka airiamunun, ebukokini aokot kere kwap ketem loka ainakineta nuicweio loejai okek loka ewema loka airiamunun.
Elemari ŋesi asiepaike kere, kicweik kotem.
Iswamakini ŋesi emoŋ lotobait kwaŋin; kwape eswamakinia emoŋ lotobait loka ainakinet naka adiakaret, iswamakini lo kwaŋin: ituluci esasedoti kes, isionio kes.
Edakari emoŋ lotobait kiŋa kiidukurun, kicwe ŋes kwape ecweia emoŋ lotobait losodit; ŋes ainakinet naka adiakaret naka atukot.
Arai kitejenun akediakaret naadiakaa ŋesi, eyauni ekoroi lomam eŋwalit araun ainakineteke.
Idokokini akekan akou naka ekoroi, earakini aibois nearanakinio ainakinet naicweio kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT: ŋes ainakinet naka adiakaret.
Elemari esasedoti aokot nuka ainakinet naka adiakaret kebokoritike, ejukonokini amumwara nuka etem loka ainakineta nuicweio, ebukokini aokotoke kwap ketem loka ainakineta nuicweio.
Icwei asiepaike kere kotem, kwape kasiepai naka asubanit naka ainakineta nuka ainapakin: ituluci esasedoti ŋes kanuka adiakareteke, isionio ŋes.
Arai kitejenun akediakaret naadiakaa ŋesi, ŋes konyet eyaunia akinei naberu namam eŋwalit, araun ainakineteke kanuka akediakaret naabu kodiaka.
Idokokini akanike akou naka ainakinet naka adiakaret, earakini ainakinet naka adiakaret aibois naka ainakinet naicweio.
Elemari esasedoti aokotoke kebokoritike, ejukonokini amumwara nuka etem loka ainakineta nuicweio, ebukokini aokotoke kere kwap ketem.

Elemari da asiepaike kere, kwape elemaria asiepai naka asubanit naka ainakineta nuka ainapakin; icwei esasedoti ŋes kotem araun asakat naeuru saa mama ejai EJAKAIT: ituluci esasedoti ŋes, isionio ŋes.
Idokokini akanike akou naka ainakinet naka adiakaret, eari ŋes araun ainakinet naka adiakaret kaibois nearanakinio ainakinet naicweio.
Elemari esasedoti aokot nuka ainakinet naka adiakaret kebokoritike, ejukonokini amumwara nuka etem loka ainakineta nuicweio, ebukokini aokotoke kere kwap ketem:

Elemari da asiepaike kere, kwape elemaria asiepai naka imerekek yenika asubanit naka ainakineta nuka ainapakin; icwei esasedoti ŋes kotem, kopone loka ainakineta nuka EJAKAIT nueinakinere kakim: ituluci esasedoti ŋes kanuka adiakareteke naabu kodiaka, isionio ŋes.

Arai ketiro ituŋanan ibore yenimam elai, akuan nakatwan naka etiaŋ lomam elai, arai akuan nakatwan naka ibaren lumam elaete, arai akuan nakatwan naka iboro lueliatos lumam elaete, komam ejeni, koraun yenimam elai, aso egwauni akirot.
Arai ketiro yenimam elai yenika ituŋanan, yenimam elai kere kere, yenituluori ŋes yenimam elai, komam ejeni; nakejenun, egwauni akirot.
Arai kisud ituŋanan aiyapo kaŋajepeke aswam aronis, arai aswam ajokis, ŋin naesudi ituŋanan einer kaiyaposit, komam ejeni; nakejenun, egwauni adiopet kaŋun:
Kosodi naegwaunia adiopet kaŋun, elimori do ŋesi akirot ŋin naabu kodiaka:

Eyauni ainakineteke naka aronis mama ejai EJAKAIT kanuka adiakareteke naabu kodiaka, yeniberu yenikosipan, imerekek arai akalol, araun ainakinet naka adiakaret; ituluci esasedoti ŋes kanuka adiakareteke.
Eyauni kes mama ejai esasedoti, loisiauni ainakin ŋin yenika ainakinet naka adiakaret, emojirikini aŋedar akou komurisiŋike, konye mam etubutubei:
Ebwatanakini aokot nuka ainakinet naka adiakaret owai loka etem; eitanakini aokot ace kere kwap ketem: ŋes ainakinet naka adiakaret.
Einakini yenikiareit araun ainakinet naicweio, kwape ejaar ekisil: ituluci esasedoti ŋes kanuka adiakareteke naabu kodiaka, isionio ŋes.
Eyauni ŋes mama ejai esasedoti, emuduni esasedoti akan ileleba araun aiituneteke, kicwe kotem, kopone loka ainakineta nuka EJAKAIT nueinakinere kakim: ŋes ainakinet naka adiakaret.
Ituluci esasedoti ŋes kanuka adiakareteke naabu kodiaka kadiokirot kaŋun, isionio ŋes: nuideunos eraunos nuka esasedoti, kwape ainakinet naka akiria.”
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,

“Arai kibuca ituŋanan aidiak komam ejeni, kakiro nukalaunak nuka EJAKAIT: eyauni do ainakineteke naka aronis mama ejai EJAKAIT, emerekek lomam eŋwalit kosipan, kwape itubokinia ijo epuesa kosekelin, kwape ejaar esekel
Egeli ŋesi ŋin naabu kiswama erono kakirot nakalaunan, iyatakini idiopet kokany, einakini esasedoti: ituluci esasedoti ŋes kemerekek loka ainakinet naka aronis, isionio ŋes.
Eyauni ŋesi emerekek lomam eŋwalit kosipan, kwape itubokinia ijo, mama ejai esasedoti araun ainakinet naka aronis: ituluci esasedoti ŋes kanuka ŋin naabu kibuc komam ejeni, isionio ŋes.
Ŋes ainakinet naka aronis: abeit egwaunit akirot kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT.”
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Arai kediaka tuŋanan, aibucar kaneejai EJAKAIT, aiŋal ekeidunyet kakirot naka aiŋad, arai naka etitiŋoi, arai naka aiŋat, arai aŋarunit ekeidunyet;
Arai kedum ŋesi yenaoliorit, kiŋalaŋal, kiyapo nuka aisab; arai kiswama ituŋanan adiopet kaŋun kere, ediakarit kwaŋin:
Aso do arai kediaka, egwaunit da akirot, inyakari do ŋin yenaŋatarit, arai ibore yenaoliorit yenadumu ŋesi.
Arai akirot kere naeyapoi nuka aisab; inyakari do kere, iyatakin ida idiopet kokany: einakini loerai elopet, kapaaran naitodunor ebe egwaunit akirot.
Eyauni ainakineteke naka aronis mama ejai EJAKAIT, emerekek lomam eŋwalit kosipan, kwape itubokinia ijo, mama ejai esasedoti, araun ainakinet naka aronis.
Ituluci esasedoti ŋes kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, isionio ŋes; kaŋun kere nuiswamai ŋesi nuagwaunit.”
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Kicorak Aaron ka odweke ebe, Lo ŋes ekisil loka ainakinet naicweio: ejaanakini ainakinet naicweio akito nukotem akuare kiya kiton tupuruc; inokenonoo akim ŋin nakotem.
Enapenenei esasedoti anapitoke naka ebaputa, enapenenei kakuanake epaleke loka ebaputa; emudanari ekurwon loka ainakinet naicweio naecwe akim kotem, ibwaikini ŋes owai loka etem.
Elacari ikenapen, konap icenapen, kodaka ekurwon ŋina kiidukurun kaibois naelai.
Inokenonoo akim naejai otem, komam eduŋiori, inokenenei esasedoti akito ŋinitupuruc inapanakini ainakinet naicweio, kicweikini asiepai naka ainakineta nuka ainapakin.
Inokenonoo akim kotem tiritir; komam eduŋiori.

Emuduni akan ileleba akiria nuidicic nuka ainakinet naka akiria, ka naka akinyeteke, ka lueuru maa kere luejaas ainakinet naka akiria, kicwe kotem araun asakat naeuru saa, araun aiituneteke mama ejai EJAKAIT.
Ŋun da nuideunos enyamenenei Aaron ka odweke: enyamenenoo komam itubuunitoi kaibois nakalaunan; enyamanakinete alaro naka ewema loka airiamunun.
Mam epeeneno ka yenikitubuunet; Ainak araun ewaikec loka ainakinetaka nueinakinere kakim; erai nakalaunan noi, kwape ainakinet naka adiakaret, kwape da ainakinet naka aronis.
Enyamenenei ŋolikiliokit kodwe luka Aaron, airumetekus nakitebeitai ikar kere anatar aturiokus, kotoma ainakineta nuka EJAKAIT nueinakinere kakim; ŋol loetirori kes eraun lokalaunan.”
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Na ŋes ainakinet naka Aaron ka odweke naeinakinete mama ejai EJAKAIT kapaaran naenyonyoikinere ŋes; idiopet kotomon yenika epa
Iswamaun kakinyet, kotoma akeit; naebauniata itolomari kes: iinakini ainakinet naka akiria ikamoŋon lukeon araun asakat naeuru saa mama ejai EJAKAIT.
Esasedoti loinyonyoikinitai akinyet aiboisike lokodweke ŋes einanakini: icweeneno cut mama ejai EJAKAIT kokisil loka ikar kere.
Icweeneno cut ŋiniinakinet naka esasedoti naka akiria; mam enyamenenoo.”
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,

“Kolimok Aaron ka odweke ebe, Lo ŋes ekisil loka ainakinet naka adiakaret: kaibois nearakinio ainakinet naicweio, nepenen earakinio ainakinet naka adiakaret kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT: erai nakalaunan noi;
Esasedoti loeinakini ŋes kanuka adiakaret ŋes enyami: enyamakini aibois nakalaunan, alaro naka ewema loka airiamunun.
Yenetirori akiriŋike eraun yenikalaunan: ido naebwatanakinotor aokotoke anapito kere, ilosi ŋin naebwatakina kaibois nakalaunan.
Konye ibusakinit aibwaŋ amot naelosere: ido arai ilosio kobore yenika aisinit, iswagario, kilolwarai kakip.
Enyami ŋolikiliokit kosasedotin: erai nakalaunan noi.
Mam enyamenenoo ainakinet naka adiakaret, naeyaunio aokotoke owema loka airiamunun aituluc kaibois nakalaunan: icweio kakim.
Earakinete ainakinet naka aronis kaibois nearanakinete ainakinet naicweio: ibwatanakini aokotoke owaitin luka etem.
Ijaikini ŋesi asiepaike kere; asonyok, ka asiepai naerapit lukotoma.
Ka iŋalur luarei, ka asiepaikec, naeapias kaŋabet, ka asiepai naka emany, nepepe kaiŋalur, ŋul kere elemari:
Icweikini esasedoti kes kotem araun ainakinet naeinakinere kakim mama ejai EJAKAIT: erai ainakinet naka aronis.
Enyami ŋolikiliokit kosasedotin: enyamakini aibois nakalaunan: erai nakalaunan noi.
Kwape ejaar ainakinet naka adiakaret, ainakinet naka aronis ejai kwape kwaŋin: ejai ekisil ediopet kanukec kere: esasedoti loituluci, ŋes eyaŋaari.
Esasedoti da loijaikini ainakinet naicweio naka ituŋanan kere, eyaŋaari esasedoti ŋol emukule loka ainakinet naicweio naabu kijaik.
Ŋiniinakinet naka akiria nupeon kokiala, ka ŋin kere naitemokinitoi kibore yenikiwowas, arai kotoma akeit da, eyaŋaari esasedoti loabu kijaik.
Ŋiniinakinet naka akiria, nainyalakinitai akinyet, arai naeonit, eyaŋaarete odwe kere luka Aaron, kitirianito.

Arai einakini kanuka aimal, einakini asubanit naka aimal aluŋuren numam itubuunitoi nuinyalakinitai akinyet, ka imugatin luebenen lumam itubuunitoi luinyonyoikinitai akinyet, ka aluŋuren nuinyalakinitai akinyet, nuka akiria nuidicic nuebaunito.
Einakini ainakineteke naka aluŋuren nuka imugatin lumam itubuunitoi nepepe kasubanit naka ainakinetake nuka ainapakin kanuka aimal.
Einakini kotomake adiopet kaŋiniinakinet araun ainakinet naedakakinitai mama ejai EJAKAIT: eyaŋaari esasedoti loebwatanari aokot nuka ainakineta nuka ainapakin;
Enyamenenoo akiriŋ naka asubanit naka ainakinetake nuka ainapakin kanuka aimal kapaaran naeinakinere; mam iteperori kiton tupuruc;
Konye arai erai asubanit naka ainakineteke aiyaposit, arai ainakinet naka akote, enyamenenoo kapaaran naeinakinia asubanitike: enyamenenoo naeperorit tupuruc:
Konye icweio kakim akiriŋ naeperorit naka asubanit kapaaran kanakiwuniet;

Arai enyamio adiokiriŋ naka asubanit naka ainakinetake nuka ainapakin kapaaran kanakiwuniet, mam ecamunio, karaida aimarakinio ŋes loabu koinak: eraun naketal, ibwoki da ituŋanan yenenyami ŋes numam adoliteke.
“Mam enyamenenoo akiriŋ naetirori ibore yenimam elai; icweio kakim. Konye enyami ŋinituŋanan yenelai akiriŋ naelai:
Konye ituŋanan yenenyami akiriŋ naka asubanit naka ainakineta nuka ainapakin, naerai naka EJAKAIT, korai yenimam elai, egelario ituŋanan ŋin kotuŋake.

Naetiroria ituŋanan kere ibore yenimam elai, amamus kaila naka ituŋanan, arai itiaŋ yenimam elai, arai yeniketal kere yenimam elai, konyam da akiriŋ naka asubanit naka ainakineta nuka ainapakin, naerai naka EJAKAIT, egelario ituŋanan ŋin kotuŋake.”
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Kolimok idwe luka Isirael ebe, Sirinyamenenete asiepai, naka emoŋ, arai naka amerekek, arai naka akinei.
Ipedorete aitwasam asiepai naka yenetwani bon kanuke, ka asiepai naka yenepoopoete itiaŋ kanuka akirot ace kere: konye mam cut inyamete.
Naarai ŋin yenenyami asiepai naka itiaŋ, yeneinakinete ituŋa araun ainakinet naeinakinere kakim mama ejai EJAKAIT, egelario ituŋanan ŋin yenenyami kotuŋake;
Sirinyamenenete aokot nuka iponesio kere, arai nuka akweny, arai nuka itiaŋ, kaiboisiokus kere.
Ŋinituŋanan yenenyami aokot, egelario ituŋanan ŋin kotuŋake.”
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,

“Kolimok idwe luka Isirael ebe, Ituŋanan yeneinakini asubanit naka ainakinetake nuka ainapakin mama ejai EJAKAIT eyauni ainakineteke mama ejai EJAKAIT kotoma asubanit naka ainakinetake nuka ainapakin:
Eyaunete akekanin kilopet ainakineta nuka EJAKAIT nueinakinere kakim; eyauni asiepai ka atorob, tetere ijaŋio atorob araun ainakinet naijaŋio kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT;
Icweikini esasedoti asiepai kotem: konye eyaŋaari Aaron ka odweke atorob.
Iinakinete yesi esasedoti amurwo nakoteten araun ainakinet naedakakinitai kotoma asuban nuka ainakinetakus nuka ainapakin.
Ŋoloijaikini aokot nuka ainakineta nuka ainapakin, ka asiepai kodwe luka Aaron, eyaŋaari ŋesi amurwo nakoteten araun ewaike;

Naarai alema eoŋ atorob naijaŋio ka amurwo naedakakinitai kodwe luka Isirael kotoma asuban nuka ainakinetakec nuka ainapakin, ainak da Aaron esasedoti ka odweke airumetekec naitebeikinitai ikar kere kodwe luka Isirael.

Ŋol ŋes ewai loka Aaron lokainyonyoikinio akinyet, ka ewai loka odweke lokainyonyoikinio akinyet, loelemunio kainakineta nuka EJAKAIT nueinakinere kakim, kapaaran naitodiaria kes aijaanakin EJAKAIT kosasedotene;
Loecoraki EJAKAIT idwe luka Isirael ainanakin kes, kapaaran nainyonyoikinia kes. Erai airumetekec naitebeikinitai ikar kere anatar aturiokec.”
Loecorakini EJAKAIT Musa komoru Sinai, kapaaran naecorakinia idwe luka Isirael ainakin ainakinetakec mama ejai EJAKAIT, kamodiŋ naka Sinai.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Koyaŋa Aaron ka odweke nepepe kaŋes, ka inapen, ka akinyet nakinyonyoanakina, ka emoŋ lotobait loka ainakinet naka adiakaret, ka imerekekin iarei, ka edita loka imugatin lumam itubuunitoi;
Kotukok ijo ekodet kere okek loka ewema loka airiamunun.”
Kiswama Musa kwape kicorakinia EJAKAIT; kotukokin ekodet okek loka ewema loka airiamunun.
Kotema Musa ekodet atiar, “Na ŋes akirot naecoraki EJAKAIT aswam.”
Koyau Musa Aaron ka odweke, kiloŋ kes kakip.
Kitanap ŋes ekooti, koen aŋabeteke kaenet, kitanap ekaso, kitanap da epod, koen ŋes kaenet naka epod naecipitai kapirianut, kiketak kaŋin.
Kidokok yenikatorob tomake: kibwaik Urim ka Tumim
Kitanap egoe lokieniena akou; ido toma ogoe lokieniena akou koiŋaren, kibwaik amekemeket naka esabu, aboko nakalaunan; kwape kicorakinia EJAKAIT Musa.
Kobwatanak otem irwan akanykaarei, kinyonyoik etem ka iboroke kere, ka akalaya ka aigaŋeteke aitalaunia kes.
Kobukok akinyet nakinyonyoanakina akou naka Aaron, kinyonyoik ŋes, aitalaunia ŋes;
Koyau Musa odwe luka Aaron, kitanap kes ikootin, koen kes kaeneta, koen igoen lukieniena akwes; kwape kicorakinia EJAKAIT Musa.
Koar ŋes; kolem Musa aokot, kojukonok amumwara nuka etem owaitin kere kebokoritike, kitesega etem, kobukok aokot kwap ketem, kitalau ŋes, aitulucio ŋes;
Koyaŋa asiepai kere naerapit lukotoma, ka asiepai naka emany, ka iŋalur luarei, ka asiepaikec, kicwe Musa kes kotem.
Konye emoŋ lotobait, ka emukuleke, ka akiriŋike, ka ikijitike, kicweik kakim kokiŋa kiidukurun; kwape kicorakinia EJAKAIT Musa.
Koar ŋes: kobwatanak Musa aokot otem owaitin kere.
Kotubutub emerekek; kicweik Musa akou, ka atutubeta ka asiepai.
Kilot lukotoma ka akejen kakip; kicweik Musa emerekek kere kotem: ŋes ainakinet naicweio araun asakat naeuru saa: ŋes ainakinet naeinakinere kakim mama ejai EJAKAIT: kwape kicorakinia EJAKAIT Musa.
Koar ŋes; kolem Musa aokotoke, kojukok okobet loka akit nakoteten naka Aaron, obokorotike lokapolon loka akekan nakoteten, obokorit da lokapolon loka akejuke nakoteten.

Koyau odwe luka Aaron, kojukonok Musa aokot okoben luka akikec nukoteten, obokorokec lukapolok luka akaninikec nukoteten, obokorokec da lukapolok luka akejekec nukoteten: kobwatanak Musa aokot otem owaitin kere.
Koyaŋa asiepai, ka asonyok, ka asiepai kere naerapit lukotoma, ka asiepai naka emany, ka iŋalur luarei, ka asiepaikec ka amurwo nakoteten:

Kolem aluŋuret adiopet namam itubuunitoi, ka aluŋuret adiopet naka emugati loejai akinyet, ka emugati ediopet loebenen, kodita loka imugatin lumam itubuunitoi, loajai akonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kidokok asiepai ka amurwo nakoteten:
Kibwaik kere akanin nuka Aaron, akanin da nuka odweke, kijaŋ kes araun ainakinet naijaŋio kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT.
Kolema Musa kes akaninikec, kicweik kotem neajai ainakinet naicweio: araas lutiakuna luka asakat naeuru saa; ŋes ainakinet naeinakinere kakim mama ejai EJAKAIT.
Kolem Musa atorob, kijaŋ araun ainakinet naijaŋio kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT: ŋes ewai loka Musa komerekek loka atiakunio; kwape kicorakinia EJAKAIT Musa.
Icweikinete kakim akiriŋ naideun ka imugatin.
Mam ilomarete kiŋa kekek loka ewema loka airiamunun adaun apaarasia akanykaarei aitodol naitodolioto apaarasia nuka atiakuniokus: naarai kitiakuni ŋesi yes apaarasia akanykaarei.
Kwape eswamaere lolo, kicorak EJAKAIT aswam kwaŋin, aitulucio yes.
Iboienenete kokek loka ewema loka airiamunun paaran ka kuare apaarasia akanykaarei, idarete akirot naka EJAKAIT, kinyeis atwakare; naarai kecorakinitai eoŋ kwaŋin.”
Kiswamata Aaron ka odweke akiro kere nuecorakini EJAKAIT kama ka Musa.
Kotema ŋesi Aaron atiar, “Koyaŋa ijo itaok yenikiliokit araun ainakinet naka adiakaret, ka emerekek araun ainakinet naicweio, lumam eŋwalitos, koinak kes akonyen nuka EJAKAIT.
Ilimokini idwe luka Isirael ebe, ‘Koyaŋaasi yesi ekoroi araun ainakinet naka adiakaret; ka itaok ka imerekek, kere luka ekaru ediopet, lumam eŋwalitos, araun ainakinet naicweio;
Ka emoŋ ka emerekek araun ainakineta nuka ainapakin, araun asubanit kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT; ka ainakinet naka akiria nuinyalakinitai akinyet: naarai kitaanyikin lolo EJAKAIT yes.’ ”
Koyaut ŋuluecorakinit Musa kiŋaren kewema loka airiamunun: kikuny ekodet kere kobwo kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT.
Kotema Musa atiar, “Na ŋes akirot naicorakinit EJAKAIT yes aswam: kitaanyikin da yes aibuses naka EJAKAIT.”
Kotema Musa Aaron atiar, “Kikuny otem, koinak ainakinetekon naka adiakaret, ka ainakinetekon naicweio, kolucokin bon ka ituŋa da kijaik ainakinet naka ituŋa, kituluc kes; kwape kicorakinia EJAKAIT.”
Kikuny Aaron otem, koar itaok yenika ainakinet naka adiakaret, yenike kanuke.
Kijaikis odwe luka Aaron ŋes aokot: kidomak ebokoritike aokot, kojukonok amumwara nuka etem, kobukok aokot kwap ketem:
Konye kicweik asiepai, ka iŋalur, ka asiepai naka emany naka ainakinet naka adiakaret kotem; kwape kicorakinia EJAKAIT Musa.
Kicweik da akiriŋ ka emukule kokiŋa kiidukurun.
Koar ainakinet naicweio; kijaikis odwe luka Aaron ŋes aokot, kobwatanak otem owaitin kere.
Kijaikis ŋes ainakinet naicweio, inerio kere ka akou: kicweik kes kotem.
Kilot lukotoma ka akeje, kicweik kes kaneajai ainakinet naicweio kotem.
Kijaik ainakinet naicweio, koinak kwape ajaar aicorakinet.
Kijaik ainakinet naka akiria, kileleb akekan, kicweik kotem, kogelara kainakinet naicweio naka atupuruc.
Ka asiepai naka emoŋ; ka naka emerekek, ka asonyok, ka naerapit lukotoma, ka iŋalur, ka asiepai naka emany:
Kibwaikis asiepai katorobusio, kicweik asiepai kotem:
Kijaŋ Aaron atorobusio ka amurwo nakoteten araun ainakinet naijaŋio kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT: kwape kicorakinia Musa.
Kolomasi Musa ka Aaron owema loka airiamunun; kosodete nakelomuniata, kilipakis ituŋa arereŋ; kitaanyikin ituŋa kere aibuses naka EJAKAIT.
Koloma akim kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kidopo ainakinet naicweio ka asiepai kotem: keanyut ituŋa kibwoŋas, kibiroros ebuburia.
Kolom akim kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kicweik kes, kotwakikis akonyen nuka EJAKAIT.
Kosodi Musa atemar Aaron atiar, “Na ŋes ŋin naabala EJAKAIT ebe, ‘Ketalaununoo eoŋ kotoma kaŋul kalukekunyakinete eoŋ, ketopoloonorio kakonyen nuka ituŋa kere.’ ” Kililiŋ Aaron.
Kosodete kesi aikunyun, kodakasi kes kokootinikec, koyaŋaasi kiŋa kiidukurun; kwape abalar Musa.

Kotema Musa Aaron, ka Eleasar, ka Itamar, odweke atiar, “Sirikilakasi itima luka akwesikus, karaida aicil ikusinapen; kinyeis atwakare, kinyek ŋesi anyunyurikin ekodet kere: konye iinacanakus, ekek kere loka Isirael, kibworoto aicwe naecweiki EJAKAIT.
Mam ilomarete kiŋa kekek loka ewema loka airiamunun, kinyeis atwakare: naarai akinyet nakinyonyoanakina naka EJAKAIT ejai kamakus.” Kiswamata kesi kwape ejaar akirot naka Musa.
Kotema EJAKAIT Aaron atiar,
“Sirikimat ebino karaida nuitemerete, ijo ka odwekon da, nailomanariata owema loka airiamunun, kinyeis atwakare: eraun ekisil ikar kere anatar aturiokus:
Tetere itiakete yenikalaunan ka yenika ituŋa kere; itiakete da yenimam elai ka yenelai;
Tetere isisianakinete idwe luka Isirael ikisila kere lualimonokinit EJAKAIT kes kama ka Musa.”
Inyamakinete aibois nakalaunan, naarai erai ewaikon, ka ewai loka odwekon, kotoma ainakineta nuka EJAKAIT nueinakinere kakim; naarai kecorakinitai eoŋ kwaŋin.

Inyamakinete atorob naijaŋio ka amurwo naedakakinitai aibois naelai; ijo, ka odwekon, ka adwekon nepepe kajo; naarai kiinakin araun ewaikon, ka ewai loka odwekon, kotoma asuban nuka ainakineta nuka ainapakin nuka idwe luka Isirael.

Eyaunete amurwo naedakakinitai ka atorob naijaŋio nepepe kainakineta nueinakinere kakim nuka asiepai, ajiaŋ ŋes araun ainakinet naiianio kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT: eraun nakon, ka naka odwekon da, araun ewaikon ikar kere; kwape kicorakinia EJAKAIT.”
“Kanukinyo mam ipotu konyamakiniata ainakinet naka adiakaret aibois nakalaunan, naarai erai nakalaunan noi, abu ŋesi koinak ŋes aibwokia numam adolit nuka ekodet, aitulucio kes kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT?
Koany, mam aokotoke ayaŋaunitai toma aibois nakalaunan: tikinyamakis cut aibois nakalaunan, kwape kecorakinia.”

Kotema Aaron Musa atiar, “Koany, ainakis lolo ainakinetekec naka adiakaret ka ainakinetekec naicweio kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT; kadoikis eoŋ akiro nuetia nen: arai kanyam lolo ainakinet naka adiakaret, ti kereka ketojoki kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT?”
Kepupu Musa ŋun, kitojok kakonyeneke.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa ka Aaron atiar,
“Kolimok idwe luka Isirael ebe, Lu kes iboro lukajarak luinyamenenete kotiaŋ kere luejaas akwap,
ŋin kere yenetiakak emagegeret, ka yenimwaasi atutubeta aarei nuka emagegeret, ka yeninyogonokini anyak ikenyamat, kotiaŋ, ŋin inyamenenete.

Konye mam inyamenenete lu kaŋul kaluinyogonokinete anyak ikecenyamat, arai kaŋul kaluimwaasi atutubeta aarei nuka emagegeret: akaala, naarai inyogonokini anyak ikenyamat, konye mam ekemagegeret etiakak, erai yenimam elai kamakus.
Enyuru da, naarai inyogonokini anyak ikenyamat, konye mam ekemagegeret etiakak, erai yenimam elai kamakus.
Ipoo da, naarai inyogonokini anyak ikenyamat, konye mam ekemagegeret etiakak, erai yenimam elai kamakus.
Epege da, naarai etiakak ekemagegeret, imwaasi atutubeta aarei nuka emagegeret, konye mam inyogonokini anyak ikenyamat, erai yenimam elai kamakus.
Mam inyamenenete akiriŋikec, mam itironorete awatekec nukatwak; eraas lumam elaete kamakus.
Kere da luemameete isigigirio ka aabel kaŋololin, kocorin, ka ŋul kere luilatos kotoma akipi, ka lukajarak kere luejaas toma akipi, eraas luketal kamakus.
Eraunos kesi luketal kamakus; sirinyamenenete akiriŋikec, eraas awatekec nukatwak nuketal kamakus.
Ŋin yenemameete isigigirio karaida aabel kotoma akipi, erai ŋin yeniketal kamakus.
Etoori, ka egole koponeke;
Ka ŋolikuruk koponeke;
Ka ekuulu, ka etoori loka akuare, ka eroagol, ka ecur koponeke;
Ekoloroc, ka etotoet, ka etukuri loepol;
Etukuri loesubit bala ejaas amumwara, ka erere ka atarukot;
Etolut, ka egoro koponeke, ka aoŋor, ka emenia.
“Iboro kere luejaas abebenoka lueliatos luelosete kakeje aoŋon eraas luketal kamakus.
Konye ipedorete ainyam lu koboro luejaas abebenoka lueliatos luelosete kakeje aoŋon, luejaas akeje nueojaojatos asomanaror kakwap;
Ipedorete ainyam lu kakesi; emaase koponeke, emelomeloi koponeke, aabaara koponeke, ka ebeere koponeke.
Konye iboro kere luejaas abebenoka lueliatos, luejaas akeje aoŋon eraas luketal kamakus.
“Lu kes kitaraunete yes lumam ilaete; ŋin yenetirori akuanakec nakatwan eraun yenimam elai kiton eboŋ.
Ŋin yenedaki akuanakec nakatwan ilosi ikenapen, eraun yenimam elai kiton eboŋ.
Ŋinitiaŋ kere yenetiakak emagegeret, yenimam atutubeta aarei nuka emagegeret, karaida ainyogonokin anyak ikenyamat, erai yenimam elai kamakus: ŋinituŋanan yenetirori kes eraun yenimam elai.
Ŋin yenelosi kotau kakeju, kotiaŋ kere luelosete kakeje aoŋon, eraas lumam elaete kamakus: ŋin yenetirori awatekec nukatwak eraun yenimam elai kiton eboŋ.
Ŋin da yenedaki akuanakec nakatwan ilosi ikenapen, eraun yenimam elai kiton eboŋ; eraas lumam elaete kamakus.
Eidodo, ka akinyaŋ, ka totokamoŋo, ka aililiaŋ, ka agougou.
Ŋul kes lumam elaete kamakus kotoma kaŋul kalueliatos: ŋin kere yenetirori kes, ketwaka, eraun yenimam elai kiton eboŋ.

Ŋinibore kere yenedoikini idiopet kakesi yenikatwan, eraun yenimam elai: arai ibore yenika akito, arai egoe, arai emukule, arai epuko, ibore kere yenitwasamao, ibusakinit aibwaikin akipi, eraun yenimam elai kiton eboŋ; kosodi konyet araun yenelai.
Ŋinibore kere yenesubio kelupe, yenedoikini idiopet kakesi, ibore kere yenejai tomake eraun yenimam elai, ibwaŋete ibore ŋin.
Inyamat kere luenyamio, luebukokinio akipi, eraunos lumam elaete: numatan kere nuemasio toma obore kaŋin eraunos numam elaete.
Ŋinibore kere yenedoikinete awatekec nukatwak eraun yenimam elai; arai emukaro, arai ekiala loka amoti, ebwaŋabwaŋaun; eraas lumam elaete, eraunos lumam elaete kamakus.
Konye atan arai atapar neetukonokinos akip eraun naelai: konye yenetirori akuanakec nakatwan eraun yenimam elai.
Arai kedoo akuanakec nakatwan okinyom kere luwean luekotoi aiwe, eraas luelaete.
Konye arai kebukokinos akip okinyom, kedoo akuanakec nakatwan tomakec, eraas lumam elaete kamakus.
“Arai ketwana etiaŋ loipedorete yesi ainyam; ŋin yenetirori akuanake nakatwan eraun yenimam elai kiton eboŋ.
Ŋin yenenyami akuan ŋin nakatwan ilosi ikenapen, eraun yenimam elai kiton eboŋ; ŋin da yenedaki akuan ŋin nakatwan ilosi ikenapen, eraun yenimam elai kiton eboŋ.
“Ŋinibore kere yeneliat, yeneliat kakwap erai yeniketal; mam enyamenenoo.
Yeneliat kakoikike, ka yenelosi kakeje aoŋon, ka yenejaas akeje nuipu, kes iboro kere lueliatos, lueliatos kakwap, sirinyamenenete ŋul; naarai eraas luketal.
Sirikimunaunos kibore kayeneliat kere yeneliat kakwap, karaida aituluor lumam ilaete, kinyeis kes amunaun yes.
Naarai arai Eoŋ EJAKAIT Ekusideke: aso kitalaunos, koraut lukalaunak; naarai arai eoŋ lokalaunan: kinyeis amunaun bonik kopone kere loka ibore yeneliat kere yeneliat kakwap.
Naarai arai eoŋ EJAKAIT loketolom yes kakwap nako Misiri, araun Ekusideke: aso koraut lukalaunak, naarai arai eoŋ lokalaunan.”
Ŋol ŋes ekisil loka itiaŋ, ka loka akweny, ka loka ŋinibore kere yenejari yenilato kotoma akipi, ka ŋinibore kere yeneliat kakwap:
Atiakun lumam elaete ka luelaete, atiakun da ibore yenejari yenepedorio ainyam, ka ibore yenejari yenimam epedorio ainyam.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Kolimok idwe luka Isirael ebe, Arai kepotuu aberu, kidou ikoku yenitelepat, eraun namam elai apaarasia akanykaarei; kwape kapaarasia nuka atiakarioke naibamia eraun namam elai.
Kapaaran nakikanyetekauni ekepio amuny naka ekiliokaneke.
Iyatakini ŋin kaokot nuka aitesegaarioke apaarasia akaisauni ka nuuni; mam etirori ibore yenikalaunan, karaida alomar aibois nakalaunan, aitodol naedolioto apaarasia nuka aitesegaarioke.
Konye arai kidou ikoku yenipese, eraun namam elai asabaton aarei, kwape katiakarioke: iyatakini da kaokot nuka aitesegaarioke apaarasia akaisakanykape ka nukanykape.
Ijaikini ŋes kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, ituluci ŋin; italaunitai kotoma alele naka aokotoke. Ŋol ŋes ekisil loka ŋin naidouni, arai yenikiliokit arai yeniberu.

Arai icana ŋesi mam epedori adumun imerekek, eyaŋaari do ajeleik aarei arai ilukei iarei ludidik; idiopet araun ainakinet naicweio, yenikiareit araun ainakinet naka adiakaret: ituluci esasedoti ŋes, eraun naelai.”
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa ka Aaron atiar,
“Ketakanu kamuny naka ituŋanan abuun, arai asalabit, arai aisorit, korau kamunyoke adek naka atapon, ŋes konyet eyaŋaunere neejai Aaron esasedoti, arai neejai ediopet kodweke isasedotin.
Irerei esasedoti adek naejai amunyoke: arai kekwaŋu ijulot yenikotoma adek, aputo naka adek da elomarit toma amunyoke, erai adek naka atapon; irerei esasedoti ŋes, elimokini ebe mam ŋes elai.
Arai kekwaŋu aisorit naejai amunyoke, aputoke da mam elomarit toma amunyoke, mam ijulotoke ekwaŋuuna, ŋes konyet egolokinio esasedoti ŋin yenejai adek apaarasia akanykaarei.
Irerei esasedoti ŋes apaaran nakikanyetekaarei: ido koany, arai eanyuni ebe asal adek kwape kwaŋin, komam adek isiarakina amunyoke, ŋes konyet egolokinio bobo esasedoti ŋes apaarasia ace akanykaarei:
Irerei esasedoti ŋes bobo apaaran nakikanyetekaarei: ido koany, arai kenyasuo adek, komam adek isiarakina amunyoke, elimokini esasedoti ŋes ebe elai: erai asalabit: ilosi ikenapen, eraun yenelai.
Konye arai kisiarakin asalabit amunyoke, kodaunite aitodiar mama ejai esasedoti kanuka aitesegaarioke, itodiari bobo mama ejai esasedoti:
Irerei esasedoti, ido koany, arai kisiarakin asalabit amunyoke, elimokini esasedoti ŋes ebe mam elai: erai atapon.
Irerei esasedoti, ido koany, arai ejai abuun naekwaŋ amunyoke, etakwaŋu ijulot, kotakanu akiriŋ naejon naejari kaneabuunit.
Erai atapon naŋo kamunyoke, elimokini esasedoti ŋes ebe mam elai: mam egolokini ŋes; naarai erai yenimam elai.
Arai kisiarakin atapon amunyoke, arapiar amunyoke kere ageun kakou kiton akeje, kwape keanyanaria esasedoti;
Kosodi esasedoti airere: ido koany, arai arapia atapon akuanake kere, elimokini ebe elai ŋin yenedeka: akwaŋu kere: elai ŋesi.
Konye naetakanunia akiriŋ naejon, eraun yenimam elai.
Irerei esasedoti akiriŋ naejonit, elimokini ebe mam elai: mam akiriŋ naejonit elai: erai atapon.
Arai kijulakin akiriŋ naejonit, akwaŋuun, elosi ŋesi neejai esasedoti.
Irerei esasedoti ŋes: ido koany, arai kekwaŋu adek, elimokini esasedoti ebe elai ŋin yenedeka: erai yenelai.
Toma aibois naka abus kejaun abuun naekwaŋ, arai aisorit, naekwaŋakwaŋat, naereŋereŋet, kosodi itodikinio esasedoti;
Irerei esasedoti, ido koany, arai elomarit aputoke toma amunyoke, akwaŋu da ijulot, kosodi esasedoti alimokin ŋes ebe mam elai: erai adek naka atapon, elomunit kotoma abus.
Konye arai kirere esasedoti, ido koany, emameete ijul lukakwaŋak kotoma, mam elomarit toma amuny, konye enyasuorit, egolokini esasedoti ŋes apaarasia akanykaarei:
Arai kisiarakin amuny, kosodi esasedoti alimokin ŋes ebe mam elai: erai adek.
Konye arai kesal aisorit aiboisike, komam isiarakina, erai apoore naka abus; elimokini esasedoti ŋes ebe elai.
“Arai toma amunyoke ejai neenomorit akim, akiriŋ da naenomorit eluor aisorit, naekwaŋakwaŋat, naereŋereŋet, arai naekwaŋ;

Irerei esasedoti ŋes: ido koany, arai kekwaŋu ijulot kotoma aisorit, elomarit aputoke da toma amuny; erai atapon, elomunit kotoma anomoret: elimokini esasedoti ŋes ebe mam elai: erai adek naka atapon.
Konye arai kirere esasedoti, ido koany, emamei ijulot yenekwaŋ kotoma aisorit, mam elomarit toma amuny, konye enyasuorit; kosodi esasedoti agolokin ŋes apaarasia akanykaarei:
Irerei esasedoti ŋes apaaran nakikanyetekaarei: arai kisiarakin amuny, kosodi esasedoti alimokin ŋes ebe mam elai: erai adek naka atapon.
Arai kesal aisorit aiboisike, komam isiarakina amuny, konye enyasuorit; erai abuunit naka anomoret, elimokini esasedoti ŋes ebe elai: naarai erai apoore naka anomoret.
“Kedekakin ekiliokit arai aberu akou arai epenek.

Irerei esasedoti adek: ido koany, arai elomarit aputoke toma amuny, kojaas tomake ijul ludos luideridera kosodi esasedoti alimokin ŋes ebe mam elai: erai etapitap, erai atapon naka akou arai naka epenek.
Arai kirere esasedoti adek naka etapitap, ido koany, aputoke mam elomarit toma amuny, emamei ijulot yenikirionon kotoma, kosodi esasedoti agolokin ŋin yenedeka etapitap apaarasia akanykaarei.
Apaaran nakikanyetekaarei irerei esasedoti adek: ido koany, arai mam etapitap isiarakina, emameete ijuludos, aputoke da mam elomarit toma amuny.
“Ŋes konyet ibarenio, konye mam ibareni etapitap; egolokini esasedoti ŋin yenedeka etapitap apaarasia ace akanykaarei.

Kapaaran nakikanyetekaarei irerei esasedoti etapitap; ido koany, arai mam etapitap isiarakina amuny, aputoke da mam elomarit toma amuny; kosodi esasedoti alimokin ŋes ebe elai: ilosi inapeneke, eraun yenelai.
Konye arai kisiarakin etapitap amunyoke kodaunite aitesegaarioke;
Kosodi esasedoti airere ŋes: ido koany, arai kisiarakin etapitap amuny, mam esasedoti emoi ijuludos; erai yenimam elai.
Konye arai eanyuni ebe asal etapitap, kelomut ijul lukiriokok kotoma; aŋaleu etapitap, elai ŋesi: elimokini esasedoti ŋes ebe elai.
“Arai ejaas aisorito toma amuny naka akuan naka ekiliokit arai aberu, aisorito nukakwaŋak:
Kosodi esasedoti airere; ido koany, arai ekwaŋakwaŋato aisorito nukotoma amuny naka akuanake; erai egwenyigweny, elomunit kamuny; elai ŋesi.
Arai kidimas ituŋanan itima koiŋaren naka akouke, erai lokepata koreet; konye elai ŋesi.
Konye arai ejai adek naekwaŋakwaŋat naereŋereŋet kakou nakepata, arai koreet kalokepata; erai ŋin atapon, naelomunit kakouke nakepata, arai koreet kalokepata.
Kosodi esasedoti airere ŋes: ido koany, arai ekwaŋakwaŋat ereŋereŋet abuunet naka adek kakouke nakepata, arai koreeteke kalokepata, kwape ejaar aput naka atapon amuny;
Erai ituŋanan yenikatapon, erai yenimam elai: abeit elimokini esasedoti ŋes ebe mam elai; ejai adekake akouke.
Apaarasia kere nuerokor edeka eraun yenimam elai; mam ŋes elai: iboienenei bon; iboienenei kokiŋa kiidukurun.
Arai ewojitoi arai icipitai; naka ebaputa, arai naka ajul; arai komukule, arai toma ŋinibore yeniswamatai kemukule;
Arai erai adek napiria arai naereŋereŋet kanapito, arai komukule, arai neewojitoi, arai neicipitai, arai toma ŋinibore yeniswamatai kemukule; erai adek naka atapon, ibusakinit aitodikin esasedoti.
Irerei esasedoti adek, egolokini yenejai adek apaarasia akanykaarei:

Irerei ŋesi adek apaaran nakikanyetekaarei: arai kisiarakin adek anapito, arai neewojitoi, arai neicipitai, arai komukule, aswam kere naetwasamaere emukule, erai adek naka atapon naiŋemiŋemi; mam elai.
Icweikini ŋesi anapito, arai ewojitoi, arai icipitai, ajul, arai ebaputa, arai ibore kere yenika emukule, naejai adek: naarai erai atapon naiŋemiŋemi; icweikinio kakim.
“Arai kirere esasedoti, ido koany, mam adek isiarakina anapito, karaida neewojitoi, karaida neicipitai, karaida toma ibore kere yenika emukule;
Kosodi esasedoti aicorakin ebe ilosete ibore yenejai adek, egolokini bobo apaarasia ace akanykaarei:
Irerei esasedoti, kodaunite adek ailosio: ido koany, arai mam adek ilocokino kaputoke, komam adek isiarakina, mam ŋes elai: icweikini kakim: eŋemiŋemi, arai epata toma arai kiŋa.
“Arai kirere esasedoti, ido koany, enyasuoro adek kodaunite ailosio, kosodi acilar kanapito, arai komukule, arai neewojitoi, arai neicipitai:
Arai eriŋa etakani kanapito, arai neewojitoi, arai neicipitai, arai kobore kere yenika emukule, elomunit: icweikini ibore ŋin yenejai adek kakim.
Anapito da, arai naewojitoi, arai naicipitai, arai ibore kere yenika emukule, yenilosi, arai anyou adek kamake, ŋes konyet ilosere nakiareit, koraun yenelai.”
Ŋol ŋes ekisil loka adek naka atapon kanapito naka ajul arai naka ebaputa, arai naewojitoi arai naicipitai, arai ibore kere yenika emukule, alimokin ebe elai, arai alimokin ebe mam elai.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Lo ŋes ekisil loka yenikatapon kapaaran naka aitesegaarioke: eyaŋaunio mama ejai esasedoti:
Elomari esasedoti kiŋa kiidukurun; irerei esasedoti, ido koany, arai aŋaleu adek naka atapon kotuŋanan;
Kosodi esasedoti aicorakin alemikin ŋin yenekot aitesegaario akweny aarei nuelaete nuejarete, ka akito nuka eres, ka yenikareŋan, ka esop.
Icorakini esasedoti aiar adiopet kakweny kotoma amot naka elupe kuju neeleleata akip:
Akweny naejari da, eyaŋaari ŋes, ka akito nuka eres, ka yenikareŋan, ka esop, idomakini kes ka akweny naejari toma aokot nuka akweny naarakinitai kuju neeleleata akip:
Ebwatanakini ŋesi ŋin yenekot aitesegaario katapon irwan akanykaarei, elimokini ebe elai ŋesi, eosikini akweny naejari kais.
Ŋin yenekot aitesegaario ilosi ikenapen, ebareni itimake kere, iloŋi kakip, eraun yenelai: kokau kaŋun elomari oidukurun, konye iboie kokiŋa kewemake apaarasia akanykaarei.
Ejaun kapaaran nakikanyetekaarei ebe ebareni itimake kere kakouke, ka epenekike, ka abukioke, ebareni itimake kere: ilosi inapeneke, iloŋi akekuan kakip, eraun yenelai.
Esasedoti loitesegi ibwaikini ituŋanan yenekot aitesegaario, ka iboro ŋul kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kokek loka ewema loka airiamunun:
Elemuni esasedoti idiopet komerekekin ludidik lukiliok, kijaik ŋes araun ainakinet naka aronis, ka atido naka akinyet, ijaŋi kes araun ainakinet naijaŋio kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT.

Earakini imerekek yenididi yenikiliokit aibois nearanakina ainakinet naka adiakaret ka ainakinet naicweio, aibois nakalaunan: naarai kwape eraar ainakinet naka adiakaret naka esasedoti, erai kwape kwaŋin ainakinet naka aronis: erai nakalaunan noi.

Elemuni esasedoti aokot nuka ainakinet naka aronis, ejukokini okobet loka akit nakoteten naka ŋin yenekot aitesegaario, kobokorit da lokapolon loka akekan nakoteten, kobokorit da lokapolon loka akejuke nakoteten.
Elemuni esasedoti atido naka akinyet ebukokini otau kakanike elopet nakokediany:
Idomakini esasedoti ebokoritike lokoteten akinyet naejai akanike nakokediany, ebwatanari akinyet kebokoritike irwan akanykaarei kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT.

Ejukokini esasedoti akinyet naedeun kakanike okobet loka akit nakoteten naka ŋin yenekot aitesegaario, kobokorit da lokapolon loka akekan nakoteten, kobokorit da lokapolon loka akejuke nakoteten, toma aokot nuka ainakinet naka aronis:
Inyonyoikini akinyet naedeun kakan naka esasedoti akou naka ŋin yenekot aitesegaario; ituluci esasedoti ŋes kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT.
Ijaikini esasedoti ainakinet naka adiakaret, ituluci ŋin yenekot aitesegaario kanuka numam alauniteke; kokau eari ainakinet naicweio.
Ijaikini esasedoti ainakinet naicweio ka ainakinet naka akiria kotem: ituluci esasedoti ŋes, eraun yenelai.
Ajeleik aarei arai ilukei iarei ludidik, kwape epedoria adumun; eraun idiopet ainakinet naka adiakaret, ka yenice da ainakinet naicweio.
Kapaaran nakikanyetekauni eyauni kes kanuka aitesegaarioke mama ejai esasedoti, okek loka ewema loka airiamunun, kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT.
Eyaŋaari esasedoti imerekek yenika ainakinet naka aronis, ka atido naka akinyet, ijaŋi esasedoti kes araun ainakinet naijaŋio kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT.

Eari imerekek yenika ainakinet naka aronis, elemuni esasedoti aokot nuka ainakinet naka aronis, ejukokini okobet loka akit nakoteten naka ŋin yenekot aitesegaario, kobokorit da lokapolon loka akanike nakoteten, kobokorit da lokapolon loka akejuke nakoteten.
Ebukokini esasedoti akinyet otau kakanike elopet nakokediany:
Ebwatanari esasedoti kebokoritike lokoteten akinyet naejai akanike nakokediany irwan akanykaarei kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT:

Ejukokini esasedoti akinyet naejai akanike okobet loka akit nakoteten naka ŋin yenekot aitesegaario, kobokorit da lokapolon loka akanike nakoteten, kobokorit da lokapolon loka akejuke nakoteten, toma aibois naka aokot nuka ainakinet naka aronis.
Inyonyoikini akinyet naedeun kakan naka esasedoti akou naka ŋin yenekot aitesegaario, aitulucio ŋes kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT.
Ijaikini idiopet kajeleik, arai kilukei ludidik kwape epedoria adumun;
Kwape epedoria adumun, idiopet araun ainakinet naka adiakaret, ka yenice araun ainakinet naicweio, nepepe kainakinet naka akiria: ituluci esasedoti ŋin yenekot aitesegaario kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT.
Ŋol ŋes ekisil loka ŋin yenedek atapon, yenimam epedori adumun luka aitesegaarioke.”
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa ka Aaron atiar,
“Naidolioto yesi akwap naka Kanaan, naainakini yes araun airumet, ebwaikini adek naka atapon kotogo loka akwap naka airumetekus;
Ebuni elopet etogo elimokini esasedoti ebe, ‘Esubit bala ejai adek naka atapon togoka.’
Icorakini esasedoti alemar iboro kere kotogo, eriŋa ŋes elomara aanyun adek, tetere luejaas toma kere mam eraunos lumam elaete: kokau elomari esasedoti aanyun etogo.
Irerei ŋesi adek, ido koany, arai ejai adek arwatatin nuka etogo, acileta nupiria, arai nuereŋereŋeto, elomarit aputoke toma arwatat;
ŋes konyet elomunia esasedoti kotogo kiton okek loka etogo, kogoli etogo apaarasia akanykaarei.
Eboŋuni esasedoti apaaran nakikanyetekaarei, irerei; ido koany, arai kisiarakin adek arwatatin nuka etogo;
Kosodi esasedoti aicorakin alemar amor nuejaas adek, acakar da aibois namam elai kiŋa naka ere.
Itikisikisi ŋesi etogo toma airimor, ebukonorete nuadaut aikisikis kiŋa naka ere aibois namam elai:
Elemarete amor ace ibwaikinete aibois naka amor kwa; eyauni asiŋe ace, iladai etogo.
“Arai keboŋ bobo adek, atakanun kotogo, kedau ŋesi alemar amor, kedau aikisikis etogo, kedau ailad;
Kosodi esasedoti alomar airere, ido koany, arai isiarakina adek togo, erai atapon naerogirog etogo: mam elai.
Ekesi etogo, amoruke, ka akitoke, ka asiŋe kere naka etogo; edakari kes kiŋa naka ere aibois namam elai.
Bobo da ŋin yenelomari togo kapak kere naegololor eraun yenimam elai kiton eboŋ,
ŋin yeneperi togo ŋol ilosi ikenapen; ŋin yenenyami kotogo kaŋol ilosi ikenapen.
Eyaŋaari akweny aarei aitesegia etogo, ka akito nuka eres, ka yenikareŋan ka esop.
Earakini adiopekweny amot naka elupe kuju neeleleata akip;
Eyaŋaari akito nuka eres, ka esop, ka yenikareŋan, ka akweny naejari, idomakini kes aokot nuka akweny naarakinitai, toma akipi nueleleete da, ebwatanakini togo irwan akanykaarei:
Ido itesegaari etogo kaokot nuka akweny, ka akipi nueleleete, kakweny naejari, kakito nuka eres, ka esop ka yenikaren an.
Konye eyaŋaari akweny naejari kiŋa naka ere koosikini koporo ais; ituluci etogo kwaŋin: eraun loelai.”
Ka loka atapon naka anapito, ka loka etogo;
Ka loka abuunet, ka asalabit, ka aisorit:
Aisisianakin arai mam elai, arai da elai; ŋol ŋes ekisil loka atapon.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa ka Aaron atiar,
“Kolimokis idwe luka Isirael ebe, Arai eleleete etuŋanan abulon arai aokot, kanu elelea mam ŋes elai.
Eraun namam ailake ka aleleke kwanata: arai etakani aleleke, arai da aleleke mam etakani erai namam ailake.
Ŋiniperis naeperio ŋol loelelei eraun namam elai: ŋinibore kere yeniboikini ŋesi eraun yenimam elai.
Ŋin yenetirori aperisike ilosi inapeneke, iloŋi kakip, eraun yenimam elai kiton eboŋ,
ŋin da yeniboikini ibore kere yenikiboio loelelei ilosi ikenapen, iloŋi kakip, eraun yenimam elai kiton eboŋ.
Ŋin da yenetirori akuan naka ŋol kaloelelei ilosi ikenapen, iloŋi kakip, eraun yenimam elai kiton eboŋ.
Arai kimuiki ŋol loelelei aimul ituŋanan yenelai; kosodi loimuikinitai ailot ikenapen, iloŋi kakip, eraun yenimam elai kiton eboŋ,
ŋinibore kere yenibwaneni ŋol loelelei eraun yenimam elai.
Ŋin yenetirori ibore yenajai kwapuke eraun yenimam elai kiton eboŋ: ŋin yenedakuni iboro ŋul ilosi inapeneke, iloŋi kakip, eraun yenimam elai kiton eboŋ.
Arai ketiro ŋol loelelei icetuŋanan kere, komam ber iloluarit akekanin kakip, ilosi yeniketiroritai inapeneke, iloŋi kakip, eraun yenimam elai kiton eboŋ.
Amot da naka elupe naetirori ŋol loelelei, ebwanio; iloluario ŋinibore yenika akito kakip.
Apaaran nakikanyetekauni eyaŋaari ŋesi ajeleik aarei arai ilukei iarei ludidik, ebuni kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT okek loka ewema loka airiamunun, koinak kes esasedoti.
Ijaikini esasedoti kes, idiopet araun ainakinet naka adiakaret, yenice araun ainakinet naicweio; ituluci esasedoti ŋes kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT kanuka aleleke.
Ilosio inapen kere kakip, ka amuny kere naadoikis ikinyom luka aur, eraunos lumam elaete kiton eboŋ.
Aberu da naeperete ketuŋanan loajaas ikinyom luka aur, iloŋete kes kere kakip eraunos lumam elaete kiton eboŋ.
ŋinibore kere yeneperio ŋesi katiakunioke eraun yenimam elai: ŋinibore kere da yeniboikini ŋesi eraun yenimam elai.
Ŋin yenetirori aperisike ilosi ikenapen, iloŋi kakip, eraun yenimam elai kiton eboŋ.
Ŋin yenetirori ibore kere yeniboikini ŋin, ilosi ikenapen, iloŋi kakip, eraun yenimam elai kiton eboŋ.
Arai ejaas aperis, arai toma ŋinibore yeniboikini ŋin naketiro, eraun yenimam elai kiton eboŋ.
Arai keperoto etuŋanan kaŋin, kolomakin ŋes aleleke, eraun lomam elai apaarasia akanykaarei; ŋiniperis naeperio ŋesi eraun namam elai.
Ŋiniperis naeperio ŋesi apaarasia kere nuelelea eraun kwape aperis naka aibamake; ŋinibore kere yeniboikini ŋesi eraun yenimam elai, kwape namam aila naka aibamake.
Ŋin yenetirori iboro ŋul eraun yenimam elai, ilosi kenapen, iloŋi kakip, eraun yenimam elai kiton eboŋ.
Konye arai keŋaleu aleleke, kosodi aimarakinio apaarasia akanykaarei, kokau kaŋun eraun naelai.
Kapaaran nakikanyetekauni eyaŋaari ajeleik aarei arai ilukei iarei ludidik, eyaŋaari mama ejai esasedoti, okek loka ewema loka airiamunun.
Ijaikini esasedoti idiopet araun ainakinet naka adiakaret, ka yenice araun ainakinet naicweio: ituluci esasedoti ŋes kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT kanuka aleleke namam alaia.
Ŋol ŋes ekisil loka ŋol kaloelelei, ka ŋol loalomut ikinyom luka aur tetere mam elai;
Ka ŋin naedek aibam, ka ŋin yenelelei, ekiliokit arai aberu, ka ŋol loeperete kaŋin namam elai.
