Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar, “Kolimok Aaron onacekon ebe, mam elomanari apakio kere aibois nakalaunan nakotoma aigalisit, kakonyen nuka eicoloŋ-lokaitim loejai asaduku; kinyek atwanare: naarai etakanikin eoŋ kodou koicoloŋlokaitim.
Eyaŋauni Aaron iboro lu, alomunia aibois nakalaunan: emoŋ lotobait araun ainakinet naka adiakaret, ka emerekek araun ainakinet naicweio.

Enapenenei ekooti lokalaunan loka ebaputa, enapenenei epale loka ebaputa kakuanake, koenite aenet naka ebaputa, enapenenei da egoe lokieniena akou: eraas inapen lukalaunak; iloŋi akekuan kakip, konapi kes.
Eyaŋaari ikorwa iarei kokodet loka idwe luka Isirael araun ainakinet naka adiakaret, ka emerekek araun ainakinet naicweio.
Eyaŋaari ikorwa luarei, ibwaikini kes akonyen nuka EJAKAIT okek loka ewema loka airiamunun.
Ilamilami Aaron eroet kokorwa luarei; eroet ediopet loka EJAKAIT, ka eroet ece loka Asasel.
Itodiari Aaron ekoroi loabeiki eroet loka EJAKAIT, kijaik ŋes araun ainakinet naka adiakaret.
Konye ekoroi loabeiki eroet loka Asasel ibwaikini ejari akonyen nuka EJAKAIT, aitulucio ŋes, aireŋearia ŋes kanuka Asasel, modiŋ.
“Itodiari Aaron emoŋ lotobait loka ainakinet naka adiakaret, loerai kanuke, elucokini bon, ka ekaleke, eari emoŋ lotobait loka ainakinet naka adiakaret loerai kanuke.
Eyaŋaari aisupurunet ileleba atotole nuka akim kotem kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, ileleba akaninike lukisupurununo luipicipicitai, koyaŋau toma aigalisit.
Ibwaikini lukisupurununo akim kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, tetere erapiari apuru naka lukisupurununo eicoloŋ-lokaitim loejai aitejenunet, kinyek atwanare.
Eyaŋaari aokot nuka emoŋ lotobait, ebwatanakini oicoloŋ-lokaitim kebokoritike ari nakokide; ebwatanari aokot kiŋaren keicoloŋ-lokaitim kebokoritike irwan akanykaarei.
Eluci ŋesi aibois nakalaunan, kanuka numam aila nuka idwe luka Isirael, kanuka aibucaretakec, kes adiakanaretakec kere: ikonakini kwaŋin ewema loka airiamunun, loiboie kakes kokidiŋ kanumam ailakec.
Mam ejaun ediotuŋanan owema loka airiamunun naelomaria ŋesi ailuc aibois nakalaunan, aitodol naelomunia, kodaunite alucokin bon, ka ekaleke, ka atukot kere naka Isirael.
Elomari neejai etem loejai akonyen nuka EJAKAIT, eluci ŋes; eyaŋaari aokot nuka emoŋ lotobait, ka aokot nuka ekoroi, ejukonokini amumwara nuka etem owaitin kere.
Ebwatanakini ŋesi aokot kebokoritike irwan akanykaarei, kitesega, kitalau ŋes kanumam aila nuka idwe luka Isirael.

Idokokini Aaron akaninike kere akou naka ekoroi loejari, kolimo kokujuke numam adolit kere nuka idwe luka Isirael, ka aibucaretakec kere, kes adiakanaretakec kere; ibwaikini kes akou naka ekoroi, ireŋeari ŋes modiŋ kakan naka etuŋanan loitemokino.
Ibwoki ekoroi numam adolitekec kere akwap naemamei ituŋanan: eosikini ŋesi ekoroi kamodiŋ.
Iloŋi akekuan kakip kaibois nakalaunan, enapi ikenapen, elomuni, einakini ainakineteke naicweio, ka ainakinet naicweio naka ituŋa, elucokini elopet, ka ituŋa.
Icweikini asiepai naka ainakinet naka adiakaret kotem.
Ŋol da loeosikini ekoroi loka Asasel ilosi ikenapen, iloŋi akekuan kakip; kokau elomuni oidukurun.

Edakario emoŋ lotobait loka ainakinet naka adiakaret, ka ekoroi loka ainakinet naka adiakaret, luayaŋaunio aokotokec alucio aibois nakalaunan, kokiŋa kiidukurun; icweikinete ikecemukulen, ka akiriŋikec, ka ikijitikec kakim.
Ŋol loicweikini kes, ilosi ikenapen, iloŋi akekuan kakip, kokau elomuni oidukurun.
Naarai kapaaran kaŋin kitulucio yes, aiteseg yes; iraunos luilaete kadiakanaretakus kere kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT.
Ŋes nakasabato naka aibworar nakayamakina mama ijaas, kitakadikis ikusitauon; erai ekisil ikar kere.
Esasedoti da, loinyonyoikinitai, loetiakunitai araun esasedoti aibois naka papake, eluci ŋesi, enapenenei inapen luka ebaputa, kes inapen lukalaunak.
Eluci ŋesi aibois nakalaunan, eluci da ewema loka airiamunun ka etem; ituluci ŋesi isasedotin ka ituŋa kere luka atukot.
Eraun ŋol ekisil lomam enaŋi mama ijaas, alucio idwe luka Isirael kanuka adiakanaretakec kere atipet ŋolikaru.” Kiswama kwape ecorakinia EJAKAIT Musa.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Kolimok Aaron, ka odweke, ka idwe kere luka Isirael, ebe, Na ŋes akirot naecoraki EJAKAIT ebe.
Ituŋanan kere yenika ekek loka Isirael, yenearakini emoŋ, arai imerekek, arai akinei koidukurun, arai yenearakini kiŋa kiidukurun.

Yenimam eyaŋaunit ŋes okek loka ewema loka airiamunun, ainakin ŋes araun ainakinet mama ejai EJAKAIT koiŋaren kewema lokalaunan loka EJAKAIT: imarakinio aokot akouke; kebukoki aokot; egelario ituŋanan ŋin kotuŋake.
Tetere eyaŋanarete idwe luka Isirael asubanakec, nueinakinete kais, tetere eyaŋanarete kes mama ejai esasedoti, einanakinete kes araun asuban nuka ainakineta nuka ainapakin mama ejai EJAKAIT.
Ebwatanakini esasedoti aokot otem loka EJAKAIT, kokek loka ewema loka airiamunun, icweikini asiepai araun asakat naeuru saa mama ejai EJAKAIT.
Mam bobo einanakinete asubanakec mama ejaas ikorwa, luiporooto kesi. Eraun ŋol ekisil mama ejaas ikar kere, anatar aturiokec.
“Ilimokini kes ebe, Ituŋanan kere yenika ekek loka Isirael, arai yenika imo luiboienenete kakes, yeneinakini ainakinet naicweio arai asubanit.
Yenimam eyaunit okek loka ewema loka airiamunun, ainakin araun asubanit mama ejai EJAKAIT: egelario ituŋanan ŋin kotuŋake.
Naarai aijar naka akuan ejai toma aokot; ainak yes kotem alucio aijarakus: naarai aokot kes elucete kanuka aijar.
Ŋes katemaria idwe luka Isirael ebe, Siri idio kayesi kenyam aokot, karaida imoit yeniboienenei kayes ainyam aokot.
Ituŋanan kere yenika ekek loka Isirael, arai yenika imo luiboienenete kakes, yenemejai itiaŋ arai akweny naepedorio ainyam; ebukori ŋesi aokotoke, enuki kalup.
Ŋinituŋanan kere yenenyami yenetwani bon, arai yenepoopooete itiaŋ, karaida kerai iuriat, arai imoit, ilosi ikenapen, iloŋi kakip, eraun yenimam elai kiton eboŋ: kosodi araun yenelai.
Konye arai mam ilosi kes, karaida ailoŋ, ibwoki numam adoliteke.”
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Kolimok idwe luka Isirael ebe, Arai eoŋ EJAKAIT Ekusideke.
Siriswamaenenete aswamisio nuka akwap nako Misiri nekolo iboioto: siriswamaenenete da aswamisio nuka akwap naka Kanaan neketolomari yes: karaida alosenen kokisilakec.
Kiswamaenenete yesi itubesiaka, koricenenete ikisilaka, alosenen kotoma: arai eoŋ EJAKAIT Ekusideke.
Koricenenete do ikakisila, ka itubesiaka: arai kiswama ituŋanan ŋul, ejari tomakec: arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.
“Siri idio kayesi kikunyaki yenepajanasi kaŋes, apukor amujalalake: arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.
Sirikipuko amujalal naka papakon, ŋes amujalal naka totokon: erai ŋesi totokon; sirikipuko amujalalake.
Sirikipuko amujalal naka aberu naka papakon: erai amujalal naka papakon.
Sirikipuko amujalal naka inacikon, akoku naka papakon, arai akoku naka totokon, arai keurikinio ore, arai keurikinio nenice.
Sirikipuko amujalal naka akoku naka okokukon, arai naka akoku naka akokukon: naarai amujalalakec ŋes nakon.
Amujalal naka akoku naka aberu naka papakon, naaurie papakon, erai ŋin inacikon, sirikipuko amujalalake.
Sirikipuko amujalal naka inac naka papakon: inacanas ŋesi kapapakon.
Sirikipuko amujalal naka inac naka totokon: naarai inacanas ŋesi katotokon.
Sirikipuko amujalal naka onace loka papakon, sirikikunyak aberuke: erai ŋesi totokon.
Sirikipuko amujalal naka aberu naka okokukon: erai ŋesi akokukon; sirikipuko amujalalake.
Sirikipuko amujalal naka aberu naka onacekon: erai amujalal naka onacekon.
Sirikipuko amujalal naka aberu ka naka akokuke; sirikiyaŋa akoku naka okokuke, karaida akoku naka akokuke, apukor amujalalake; ipajanasi kesi: erai aronis.
Sirikiyaŋa aberu ka inacike, araun akainike, apukor amujalalake, nepepe kainacike eriŋa ejari.
Sirikiyelokinos kaberu naka eidunyetekon, amunaun kaŋes.
Sirikiinak aurikon aitotor akim mama ejai Molek, karaida aitisil ekiror loka Ekonideke: arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.
Sirikiperoto kikiliok, kwape kaŋor: erai naketal.
Sirikiperoto kitiaŋ kere amunaun kaŋes: karaida aberu aibwo kakonyen nuka etiaŋ, apero kaŋes: erai ainyalakin.
Amunaun akwap: tape edopet ŋes numam adoliteke, elekari akwap da luiboienenete kotoma.
Kanuka ŋun koricenenete yesi ikakisila ka itubesiaka, siriswamaenenete adio kanuketal kaŋun; karaida iuriat, karaida imoit yeniboienenei kayes:
(Naarai eswamata ituŋa luka akwap, lukigeikinete yes nuketal ŋun kere, amunaun akwap;)
Kinyek akwap alekar yes da, naimunauniata yesi ŋes, kwape alekaria ateker nakigeikini yes.
Naarai ŋin yeniswamai adio kanuketal kaŋun, egelario ituŋa luiswamaete ŋun kotuŋakec.
Kanuka ŋun koricito akirotoka, kinyeis aiswamaun idio kiponesio kaŋul kaluketal, lueswamaenenoo ageikin yes, kinyeis amunaun bonik: arai eoŋ EJAKAIT Ekusideke.”
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Kolimok ekodet kere loka idwe luka Isirael ebe, Koraas lukalaunak: naarai eoŋ EJAKAIT Ekusideke arai lokalaunan.
Koyoŋitenenei ŋinituŋanan kayesi totoke, ka papake, koricenenete asabatonoka: arai eoŋ EJAKAIT Ekusideke.
Sirikibelokinos neejaas aputosia, karaida aiswamaun bonik idekesio lucealara: arai eoŋ EJAKAIT Ekusideke.
“Naiinakiniata asubanit naka ainakinet naka ainapakin mama ejai EJAKAIT, koinakis tetere kicamunio.
Enyamio apaaran ŋin naiinakinete ŋes, ka moi da: arai kideun ibore kiton apaaran nakiwuniet, icweio kakim.
Arai do enyamio kapaaran kanakiwuniet, erai naketal: mam ecamunio.
Konye ibwoki ŋinituŋanan yenenyami ŋes numam adoliteke, naarai etisil ibore yenikalaunan yenika EJAKAIT: egelario ituŋanan ŋin kotuŋake.
Siridepidepanari aideŋ emusabibukon, karaida atukonokin araito nuedoununete nuka emanikorikon loka emusabibu; inyeinia kes yenikican ka imoit: arai eoŋ EJAKAIT Ekusideke.
Siriyapoenenete aiŋal kolimito ekakiror, kosodi aitisil ekiror loka Edekekon: arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.
Sirikiken ikimin, karaida aibwaikin yeniguikini imuduk, konye koyoŋite Ekonideke: arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.
Siririmio ebeele otuŋakon: karaida abwoanakin aluikin aokot nuka eidunyetekon: arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.
Sirikinyaŋ akirot, karaida adiŋakinit idwe luka ikonituŋa, konye komina eidunyetekon kwape iminari bon: arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.
Koricenenete ikakisila. Sirikisunup ibarenekon akwar kaluegelegela; sirikiye omanikorikon ikinyom luka iponesio iarei: karaida ainap anapito naka iponesio iarei luka egoe luinyalinyalitai.
“Ŋolituŋanan loeyelo kaberu, naerai abulesit, naisinerit okilenike, namam cut elakunitai, karaida alacakinio; iticanio kes; mam eario, naarai mam ŋin alacakinitai.
Eyauni ŋesi ainakineteke naka aronis mama ejai EJAKAIT, okek loka ewema loka airiamunun, ŋes emerekek araun ainakinet naka aronis.
Ituluci esasedoti ŋes kemerekek loka ainakinet naka aronis kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT kanuka adiakareteke naadiakaa ŋesi; isionio akediakaret naadiakaa ŋesi.
Kilomasi yesi akwap, kiraata da ikito luka iponesio kere lunyaman, imarakinete araitokec araun numam akepepukec: esubete bala numam ekepep kamakus adaun ikar iuni; mam enyamenenoo.
Konye kokaru lokiwoŋonet eraunos araitokec kere nukalaunak, aiturio EJAKAIT.
Kokaru lokikanyet inyamete yesi araitokec, tetere idumunete eiyasikec: arai eoŋ EJAKAIT Ekusideke.
Sirikikeba akwesikus, karaida amunaar iwaitin luka ipenekakus.
Sirikigerata awatekus kanuka lukatwak, karaida aibwaikin aanyuneta: arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.
Koricenenete asabatonoka, koyoŋito aiboisika nakalaunan: arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.
Eraun imoit yeniboie kayes kwape iuriat kamakus, komina ŋes kwape iminari bon; naarai iraas kolo imo kakwap nako Misiri: arai eoŋ EJAKAIT Ekusideke.
Aitemisio nukabeit, imisanin lukabeit, epa
Kidarenenete ikakisila kere ka itubesiaka kere, kiswamaenenete kes: arai eoŋ EJAKAIT,”
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Bobo da, kolimok idwe luka Isirael ebe, ŋinituŋanan kere kodwe luka Isirael, arai komo luiboiete koIsirael, yeneinakini Molek aurike; abeit eario ŋin: ibiribirete ituŋa luka akwap ŋes kamor.
Aluikini eoŋ da ituŋanan ŋin, agelari eoŋ ŋes kotuŋake; naarai abu koinak Molek aurike, amunaun aiboisika nakalaunan, eti sil da ekakiror lokalaunan.
Arai kibwaata ituŋa luka akwap akecekonye kotuŋanan kaŋol, naeinakinia Molek aurike, komam earete ŋes:
Kasodi eoŋ aluikin etuŋanan ŋol, ka ekekike, ka ŋul kere luiporoete kotupito ŋes aipororio Molek, agelari kes kotuŋakec.
Aso do, kitalaunos bonik, koraunos lukalaunak: naarai arai eoŋ EJAKAIT Ekusideke.
Koricito ikisilaka, kiswamaenenete kes: Eoŋ EJAKAIT loetalauni yes.
Naarai ŋinituŋanan yenilamakini papake arai totoke abeit eario: ilamakinit papake arai totoke; ebeikinete ŋes akeceokot.
Etuŋanan da loeperete kaberu naka papake, apuko amujalal naka papake: abeit eario kes kere; ebeikinete kes akeceokot.
Arai keperio etuŋanan aberu naka okokuke, abeit eario kes kere: eswamata nuka ainyalinyal; ebeikinete kes akeceokot.
Arai keperio etuŋanan ekiliokit kwape kaberu, eswamata kere nuketal: abeit eario kes kere; ebeikinete kes akeceokot.
Arai keyaŋa etuŋanan aberu ka totoke da, erai aronis: icweikinio, ŋes ka kes kere; tetere emameun aronis kamakus.
Arai keperio etuŋanan etiaŋ, abeit eario: iarete etiaŋ da.
Arai kikunyaki aberu etiaŋ kere, apero kaŋes, iari ijo aberu ka etiaŋ da: abeit eario kes; ebeikinete kes akeceokot.
Arai keperio etuŋanan aberu naibami, epukori amujalalake; apuko aleleke, ŋin da apuko alele naka aokotoke: egelario kes kere kotuŋakec.
Sirikipuko amujalal naka inaci naka totokon, karaida inaci naka papakon; naarai apuko amujalal naka naipajanas kaŋes; ibwokete numam adolitekec.
Arai keperio etuŋanan aberu naka mamaike, apuko amujalal naka mamaike: ibwokete adiakaretekec; etwakete komameete idwe.
Arai keyaŋa etuŋanan aberu naka onaceke, erai numam aila: apuko amujalal naka onaceke; emamuunete kes idwe.
Sirilosenenete koponesio luka ateker naereŋeari kakonyenekus: naarai eswamata ŋun kere, tape alai kes.
Konye abu katema yes ebe, Irumete yesi akecekwap, eoŋ da kainakini yes airum, akwap naeleleete akile ka esik: arai eoŋ EJAKAIT Ekusideke, loatiakuni yes kotuŋa.

Aso do kotiaka yesi etiaŋ loelai, ka lomam elai, akweny namam elai ka naelai: sirikimunaasi ikusitauon kanuka etiaŋ, arai kanuka akweny, arai kanuka ibore yeneliat kakwap, luatiakunit eoŋ kamakus araut lumam elaete.
Koraunos lukalaunak kama ajai: naarai Eoŋ EJAKAIT arai lokalaunan, abu katiak yes kotuŋa araun lukaŋ.
Dimarai lukokekike luipajanas kaŋes, totoke, ka papake, ka okokuke, ka akokuke, ka onaceke;
ka inacike naerai abekot, nainacanas kaŋes namam ekiliokit, epedori amunaun bon kanukeŋ.
Mam emunaun bon, korai ekapolon kotuŋake, aitisil bon.
Mam ebarenete epata kakwesikec, karaida abaren iwaitin luka ipenekakec, karaida aiger awatekec.
Eraunos kesi lukalaunak kama ejai Edekekec, mam itisilete ekiror loka Edekekec: naarai einanakinete ainakineta nuka EJAKAIT, nueinakinere kakim, atap naka Edekekec: kanuka ŋun eraunos lukalaunak.
Mam kes eyaŋaarete aberu naerai adote, arai naitisilitoi: mam eyaŋaarete da aberu nakireŋea okilenike; naarai erai lokalaunan kama ejai Ekedeke.
Kanuka ŋun italauni ŋes: naarai einakini atap naka Edekekon: eraun lokalaunan mama ijai: naarai eoŋ EJAKAIT loketalauni yes, arai lokalaunan.
Akoku da naka esasedoti, arai kitisil bon araun naadote, etisili papake; icweio ŋin kakim.
Karaida alomar neejai akuan nakatwan, karaida amunaun bon kanuka papake, karaida totoke;
Karaida alomun kaibois nakalaunan, karaida aitisil aibois nakalaunan naka Edekeke; naarai enapit aboko naka akinyet nakinyonyoanakina naka Edekeke: arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.
Emanyi ŋesi aberu nabekot.
Apuserut, ka naireŋetai, ka aberu naitisilitoi, ka naadote, ŋun mam emanyi: konye emanyi abekot kotuŋake.
Mam ŋes itisili aurike kotuŋake; naarai arai eoŋ EJAKAIT loetalauni ŋes.”
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Kolimok Aaron ebe, Ŋolituŋanan loka aurikon anatar aturiokec loeŋwalit, siri ŋol kikunyaki ainakin atap naka Edekeke.
Naarai ŋolituŋanan loeŋwalit, mam ŋol ikunyakini: emuduki, arai loicodo, arai ŋol loŋiriony kekume, arai loejai ibore yeniyatakina.
Arai etuŋanan loebilil akeju, arai loebilil akan.
Arai arubaŋat, arai loarakaki, arai loeŋwalit akoŋu, arai lokijip, arai lokasalabit, arai loebulul itou;
Mam etuŋanan loeŋwalit loka aur naka Aaron esasedoti, ikunyakini ainakin ainakineta nuka EJAKAIT nueinakinere kakim: eŋwalit ŋesi, mam ikunyakini ainakin atap naka Ekedeke.
Enyami atap naka Ekedeke, nakalaunan noi, ka nakalaunan da kere.
Konye mam elomari neejai aigalisit, karaida aikunyakin otem, naarai eŋwalit; kinyek aitisil aiboisioka nukalaunak: naarai arai eoŋ EJAKAIT loetalauni kes.”
Abu Musa kolimok Aaron ŋun, ka odweke, ka idwe kere luka Isirael.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Kolimok Aaron ka odweke ebe. Kotiakunos koboro lukalaunak luka idwe luka Isirael, luetalaunete kamakaŋ, kinyeis aitisil ekakiror lokalaunan: arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.

Kolimok kes ebe, Ŋolituŋanan loka aurikon kere anatar aturiokus, loikunyakini oboro lukalaunak, luitalaunete idwe luka Isirael mama ejai EJAKAIT, lomam elai, egelario etuŋanan ŋol kakonyeneka: arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.

Ŋolituŋanan kere loka aur naka Aaron lokatapon, arai loelelei; mam ŋes enyami iboro lukalaunak, aitodol naelaunia. Ŋol da loetirori ibore yenimam elai kanuka lukatwak, arai etuŋanan loeleleete ikinyomoke luka aur;
Arai ŋol loetirori ibore yeneliat, yenituluori ŋes lomam elai, arai ituŋanan yenepedori aituluor ŋes lomam elai, namam aila naka epone kere;
Etuŋanan loetirori idio kaŋul eraun lomam elai kiton eboŋ, mam enyami iboro lukalaunak, dimarai kiloŋ akekuan kakip.
Naelomaria akoloŋ, eraun loelai; kokau enyami iboro lukalaunak, naarai erai atapake.
Ŋin yenetwani bon, arai yenepoopoete itiaŋ, mam enyami ŋul amunaun bon: arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.
Aso do koricito kesi akakirot, kinyeis aibwok aronis, kotwaka kaŋin, arai emunaunete ŋin: arai eoŋ EJAKAIT loetalauni kes.
Konye arai kegwel esasedoti etuŋanan, loegweli kapesanake, ŋol enyami; ka ŋul da luaurikinio togoke, enyamete atapake.
Arai kedukoki akoku naka esasedoti emoit, mam ŋin enyami ainakinet naijaŋio koboro lukalaunak.
Konye arai akoku naka esasedoti erai apuserut, arai naireŋe tai, komamei ikoku, arai keboŋu togo loka papake, kwape keiditeuke, enyami ŋin atap naka papake: konye mam emoit enyami.
Arai kenyam etuŋanan ibore yenikalaunan komam ejei, iyatakini idiopet kokany mama ejai, kosodi ainakin esasedoti ibore yenikalaunan.
Mam kes itisilete iboro lukalaunak luka idwe luka Isirael, lueinakinete EJAKAIT;
Aisibwok numam adolit nueyaunete aronis, naenyamiata iborokec lukalaunak: naarai arai eoŋ EJAKAIT loetalauni kes.”
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,

“Kolimok Aaron, ka odweke, ka idwe kere luka Isirael ebe, ŋinituŋanan kere yenika ekek loka Isirael, arai yenika imo koIsirael, yeneinakini ainakineteke, arai naka aiyaposiokec, arai naka ainakinetakec nuka akot, nueinakinete EJAKAIT araun ainakinet naicweio;
Iinakinete yenikiliokit yenimam eŋwalit, yenika imoŋin, yenika imerekekin, arai yenika akinei, tetere kicamunio yes.
Konye ŋin kere yeneŋwalit, mam iinakinete ŋin: naarai mam ecamunio kanukus.

Ŋinituŋanan kere yeneinakini asubanit naka ainakineta nuka ainapakin mama ejai EJAKAIT aitodolio aiyaposit, arai araun ainakinet naka akot, yenikosipan loka aituk arai loka amerekekin, ibus araun yenedoliorit cut acamunio: siri ŋes eŋwalit.
Yenemudukana, arai yenebilil, arai yenicodo, arai yenejai ajim, arai egwenyigweny, arai yenika asalab, siriinakinete ŋul mama ejai EJAKAIT, karaida ainakin kes kotem aicweio mama ejai EJAKAIT.
Ipedori ainakin emoŋ lotobait arai imerekek yenejai ibore yeniyatakina, arai yenimam edolit atutubetake, araun ainakinet naka akot; konye mam ecamunio aitodolio aiyaposit.
Ŋin yeneiikinito, arai yeniriecakinitai arai yenebulul, arai yenetuboro itouke, siriinakinete ŋin mama ejai EJAKAIT: siriswamaenenete kwaŋin kakwapukus.
Siriinakinete atap naka Ekusideke kotoma kaŋul kere karaida kakan naka emoit; naarai abosusukec ejai kotomakec, eŋwalito: mam ecamunio kanukus.”
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Keurii imoŋ, arai imerekek, arai ikalol, esalakini enaki totoke adaun apaarasia akanykaarei; ageun kapaaran nakikanyetekauni ka adepar ecamunio araun ainakinet naeinakinere kakim mama ejai EJAKAIT.
Arai erai aiteŋ arai amerekek sirikiarata ŋes ka ikekoku kere kadiopetepaaran.
Naiinanakiniata asubanit naka aimal mama ejai EJAKAIT, iinakinete ŋes tetere kicamunio.
Enyamio kapaaran kaŋin; sirikiteperoosi kiton tupuruc: arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.
Sirikitisiloto ekakiror; konye ketalaunio eoŋ kodwe luka Isirael: arai eoŋ EJAKAIT loketalauni yes.
Loketolomuni yes kakwap nako Misiri, araun Ekusideke: arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.”
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Kolimok idwe luka Isirael ebe, Ipucin lueseunitai luka EJAKAIT, luilimorete araun atukokineta nukalaunak, lupe lu kes ipucinoka lueseunitai.

Iswamaete aswam apaarasia akanykape: konye apaaran nakikanyetekaarei ŋes nakasabato naka aibworar, atukokinet nakalaunan; siriswamaete adioswam kere; erai nakasabato mama ejai EJAKAIT kaiboisiokus kere.
Olap losodit, kapaaran nakitomonet kaoŋon naka elap eboŋ, ŋes aleleŋ naka EJAKAIT.
Kapaaran nakitomonet kakany naka elap kaŋol ŋes epucit loka imugatin lumam itubuunitoi mama ejai EJAKAIT: inyamenenete imugatin lumam itubuunitoi apaarasia akanykaarei.
Kapaaran nasodit itukonokinos atukokinet nakalaunan: siriswamaete aswam, naelaŋir.
Konye iinanakinete ainakinet naeinakinere kakim mama ejai EJAKAIT apaarasia akanykaarei: kapaaran nakikanyetekaarei ŋes atukokinet nakalaunan; siriswamaete aswam naelaŋir.”
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Kolimok idwe luka Isirael ebe, Kidoloto yesi akwap nakainakini yes, isakete nuke da, ŋes konyet iyaŋauniata eisuta loka nugeet nuka aisakakus neejai esasedoti:
Ijaŋi ŋesi eisuta kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, tetere ecamunio kanukus: kapaaran naetupakini nakasabato ŋes ijaŋia esasedoti eisuta.
Kapaaran naijaŋiata yesi eisuta, iinakinete imerekek yenikiliokit yenimam eŋwalit yenika ekaru ediopet araun ainakinet naicweio mama ejai EJAKAIT.
Ainakineteke naka akiria eraun iarei kotomon luka epa

Mam inyamete emugati, karaida imomwa luikawooritai, karaida aluŋuren nukitetiak aitodol apaaran ŋipeŋin, aitodol naiyaŋauniata ainakinet naka Edekekus: erai ekisil lomam edaun anatar aturiokus kaiboisiokus kere.
Imarete apaarasia akaisakany aitodol apaaran naetupakini nakasabato nakikanyetekaarei; iinakinete do ainakinet naka akiria nuka agwei mama ejai EJAKAIT.
Itolomunete kaiboisiokus imugatin iarei lujiaŋio luka iarei kotomon luka epa: eraunos luka akiria nuidicic, ipeete kes kaluitubuunete, araun nugeet mama ejai EJAKAIT.

Iinakinete imerekekin ikanykaarei ludidik lumam eŋwalito luka ekaru ediopet nepepe kimugatin, ka emoŋ lotobait, ka imerekekin iarei: eraunos ainakinet naicweio mama ejai EJAKAIT, nepepe kainakinetekec naka akiria, ka ainakinetakec numatan, ainakinet naeinakinere kakim, naka asakat naeuru saa mama ejai EJAKAIT.
Iinakinete da ekoroi ediopet araun ainakinet naka adiakaret, ka imerekekin iarei lukiliok luka ekaru ediopet araun asubanit naka ainakineta nuka ainapakin.
Ijaŋi esasedoti kes nepepe kemugati loka nugeet araun ainakinet naijaŋio mama ejai EJAKAIT, nepepe kimerekekin luarei ludidik; eraunos lukalaunak mama ejai EJAKAIT luka esasedoti.
Ilimorete kapaaran ŋipeŋin; ejaun atukokinet nakalaunan mamakus: siriswamaete aswam naelaŋir: erai ekisilomam edaun kaiboisiokus kere anatar aturiokus.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Kolimok idwe luka Isirael ebe, Olap lokikanyetekaarei, kapaaran nasodit naka elap ejaun aibworar nakayamakina kamakus, aisiitunet naka aikut arupepen, atukokinet nakalaunan.
Siriswamaete aswam naelaŋir: iinakinete ainakinet naeinakinere kakim mama ejai EJAKAIT.”

“Konye kapaaran nakitomonet naka elap lo lokikanyetekaarei ŋes apaaran naka ailuc: eraun atukokinet nakalaunan mamakus, kitakadikis ikusitauon, iinakinete ainakinet naeinakinere kakim mama ejai EJAKAIT.
Siriswamaenenete adioswam kapaaran kaŋin: naarai erai apaaran naka ailuc, aitulucio yes kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT Ekusideke.
Naarai ŋolitau kere lomam itakadikina kapaaran kaŋin, egelario kotuŋake.
Ŋinituŋanan da yeniswamai adioswam kapaaran kaŋin, agelari eoŋ ituŋanan ŋin kotuŋake.
Siriswamaenenete adioswam: erai ekisil lomam edaun anatar aturiokus kaiboisiokus kere.
Eraun mamakus nakasabato naka aibworar nakayamakina, kitakadikis ikusitauon: kapaaran nakikanyetekaoŋon naka elap eboŋ, agear eboŋ kiton eboŋ, idarete nakasabatokus.”
“Kolimok idwe luka Isirael ebe, Kapaaran nakitomonet kakany naka elap kala lokikanyetekaarei, ŋes epucit loka iswamin adaun apaarasia akanykaarei mama ejai EJAKAIT.
Kapaaran nasodit ejaun atukokinet nakalaunan: siriswamaete aswam naelaŋir.

Iinakinete ainakinet naeinakinere kakim mama ejai EJAKAIT apaarasia akanykaarei: kapaaran nakikanyetekauni ejaun atukokinet nakalaunan mamakus; iinakinete ainakinet naeinakinere kakim mama ejai EJAKAIT: erai atukokinet nakayamakin; siriswamaete aswam naelaŋir.

“Ŋul kes ipucin lueseunitai luka EJAKAIT, luilimorete yesi araut atukokineta nukalaunak, ainakin ainakinet naeinakinere kakim mama ejai EJAKAIT, ainakinet naicweio, ka ainakinet naka akiria, ka asubanit, ka ainakineta numatan, ŋiniinakinet kapaaranike.
Kogelara nukasabaton nuka EJAKAIT, kogelara da ainakinetakus, kogelara aiyaposiokus, kogelara da ainakinetakus nuka akot, nuiinanakinete EJAKAIT.

Kapaaran nasodit iyaŋaarete araito nuka ikito luejok, atenuna nuka idukudukun, ka atenuna nuka ikito lueburok, ka ikito lukaguurut; iyalamasi yesi kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT Ekusideke apaarasia akanykaarei.
Kidarete ŋes araun epucit mama ejai EJAKAIT apaarasia akanykaarei ŋolikaru: erai ekisil lomam edaun katuriokus: kidarete ŋes kolap lokikanyetekaarei.
Kiboiete koswamin apaarasia akanykaarei; kere luurikina koIsirael kiboiete koswamin:
Tetere ejenunete aturiokus ebe abu kesiboik idwe luka Isirael oswamin, naketolomunia eoŋ kes kakwap nako Misiri: arai eoŋ EJAKAIT Ekusideke.”
Abu Musa kolimok idwe luka Isirael ipucino lueseunitai luka EJAKAIT.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Kicorak idwe luka Isirael koinut ijo akinyet naka iseitunin naerukuk naijililitai kanuka atala, ainokia atala tiritir.
Kiŋa kaigalisit naka aitejenunet, kowema loka airiamunun, itemonokini Aaron tiritir kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, agear eboŋ kiton tupuruc: eraun ekisilomam edaun anatar aturiokus.
Itemonokini ŋesi tiritir atalai nukopir loelai loka atala kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT.
Inapanakini kes okokoron iarei, kaŋolikokoro ikanykape, omesa loelai kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT.
Ibwaikini lukesai luelaete kaŋolikokoro, tetere eraun akiitunet naka imugatin, ainakinet naeinakinere kakim mama ejai EJAKAIT.
Inapanakini imugatin ŋinipaaran nakasabato kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT tiritir: erai aitutuket namam edaun kanuka idwe luka Isirael.
Eraunos luka Aaron ka odweke; enyamanakinete aibois nakalaunan: naarai eraas lukalaunak noi mamake luka ainakineta nuka EJAKAIT nueinakinere kakim kokisil lomam enaŋi.”
Koloma okoku loka aberu naka Isirael loarai papake Emisiriat anyoun kodwe luka Isirael: kopegasi okoku loka aberu naka Isirael ketuŋanan loka Isirael koidukurun;
Komoromor okoku loka aberu naka Isirael Ekiror, kiken: koyaŋaarai mama ejai Musa. Ekiror loka totoke Selomit, akoku naka Dibiri, loka ateker naka Dan.
Kibwaikis ŋes aidaris, tetere elimorio kes kaituk naka EJAKAIT.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Kitolomasi lokekenon kiŋa kiidukurun; kidokokis kere luapuput ŋes akaninikec akouke, kibiribir ŋes ekodet kere.
Kolimok idwe luka Isirael ebe, ŋinituŋanan yenikeni Edekeke ibwoki adiakareteke.
Ŋin yenemoromoroi ekiror loka EJAKAIT, abeit eario; abeit ibiribirei ekodet kere; imoit ka iuriat, arai emoromoroi ekiror loka EJAKAIT, eario.
Ŋin yeneseni ituŋanan kotwani, abeit eario;
ŋin yeneseni itiaŋ kotwani, egeli: aijar itia aijar.
Arai itwaŋali ituŋanan ikeidunyet; kwape ekonakinia, ikonakinio ŋes da kwaŋin;
Abulucaret itia abulucaret, akoŋu itia akoŋu, ekelai itia ekelai: kwape itwaŋalia ituŋanan, ikonakinio ŋes da kwaŋin,
ŋin yeneari etiaŋ egeli: ŋin yeneari ituŋanan eario.
Ijaas kekisil ediopet, kanuka imoit ka iuriat; naarai arai eoŋ EJAKAIT Ekusideke.”
Kolimok Musa idwe luka Isirael, kitolomasi ŋol lokekenon kiŋa kiidukurun, kibiribiroto ŋes kamor. Kiswamata idwe luka Isirael kwape kicorakinia EJAKAIT Musa.
“Kolimok idwe luka Isirael ebe, Kidoloto yesi akwap nakainakini yes, ŋes konyet idaria akwap asabato mama ejai EJAKAIT.
Iyei emanikorikon ikar ikanykape, idimi amanakon naka emusabibu ikar ikanykape, itukonokini araitoke.
Konye okaru lokikanyetekaarei ejaun asabato naka aibworar nakayamakina naka akwap, asabato mama ejai EJAKAIT: mam iyei emanikorikon, karaida aidim amanakon naka emusabibu.
Mam isaki nuebwaŋunete bon, mam itukonokini araito nuka emusabibukon lomam ecapap: eraun ekaru loka aibworar nakayamakina naka akwap.
Eraun asabato naka akwap inyamat kamakus; kamakon, ka ekejaanakinanikon, ka akejaanakinanikon, ka ebulesitikon loiwotei, ka imoitikon yeniboie kamakon;
Kama ibarenekon, ka itiaŋ luejiaas akwapukon, amioke kere eraun inyamat.
“Imari ijo asabaton akanykaarei nuka ikar, kes ikar ikanykaarei irwan ikanykaarei; eraunos kamakon apaarasia nuka asabaton akanykaarei nuka ikar, kes ikar akaisaoŋon ka lukanykaoŋon.
Kosodi akutakin arupepe naeruo noi kapaaran nakitomonet naka elap lokikanyetekaarei; ikutakini arupepe kapaaran naka ailuc airimor akwapukus kere.
Italaunete ekaru lokakaisakany, ilimorete da aosikinio airimor akwap mama ejaas luiboiete kotoma kere: eraun eyubili
Eraun ekaru ŋol lokakaisakany eyubili kamakus: mam iyeete, karaida aisak nuebwaŋunete bon, karaida atukonokin araito nuka emusabibuke lomam ecapap.
Naarai erai eyubili; eraun lokalaunan kamakus: inyamete amioke nakotoma omanikor.
Arai itwegeli ibore iidunyetekon, arai agwel kakan naka iidunyetekon, sirikiswamanakinos aronis.
Kwape ejaar etiai loka ikar luetupakinete eyubili igweli kaidunyetekon, kwape ejaar etiai loka ikar luka aisak kitwegeli ŋesi jo.
Kwape ejaar aipues naka ikar iyatakini ijo apesanake, kwape ejaar aikidiokus naka ikar iŋoŋoori ijo apesanake, kitwegeli ŋesi jo kwape ejaar etiai loka ikar luka aisak.
Sirikiswamanakinos aronis; konye koyoŋ Ekonideke, naarai arai eoŋ EJAKAIT Ekusideke.
Erai akwap araitoke, kimonikinos, kiboikinos inapakina.
Arai itemarete ebe, “Kinyami inyo kokaru lokikanyetekaarei? Koany, mam kiyei, karaida atukonokin amiokosi:”
Kasodi aicorakin arereŋuka mamakus kokaru lokikanyetekape, erai araito nuka ikar ŋul luuni.
Iyeete okaru lokikanyetekauni, inyamete araito, nuŋorok nueŋadakinitai; inyamete nuŋorok nueŋadakinitai aitodol okaru lokikanyetekaoŋon, aitodol naelomunia araitoke.
Mam egwelario alup ayaŋaar ikar kere; naarai erai akwap nakaŋ: naarai iraas yesi ipejok ido luiboiororos kamakaŋ.
Kakwap kere naka airumetekus isunupete akwap alakunio.
Arai emamei ituŋanan yenelakuni, kebar ŋesi kodum luedaunete alakun:
ŋes konyet imaria ikar luagwelaritor, kinyakak ameda mama ejai ituŋanan loagwelit; eboŋori ŋesi alupoke.
Konye arai mam epedori ainyakun kanuke, kosodi nuagwelarit apaikin akan naka ŋol kaloagwelit aitodol okaru loka eyubili: kosodi koyubili eosikinio, eboŋori. Ŋesi da alupoke.
“Arai kegwela etuŋanan etogo kore loirigaunitai karwatat, epedori alakun ŋes eriŋa etuboro ekaru ediopet ageun kagwelarike: ekaru ediopet ejai apedor alakun.
Arai mam elakunitai eriŋa etuboro ekaru ediopet, kosodi etogo loejai ore loirigaunitai karwatat itogogoŋitai ŋol loagweli ikar kere anatar aturioke: mam eosikinio koyubili.
Konye itogoi lukoreria lumam irigaunitai karwatat imarakinitai kimanikoria lukorony: epedorio alakun, eosikinio koyubili.
Konye ireria luka Ilebin, itogoi lukoreria luka alupokec, epedorete Ilebin alakun apak kere.
Arai elakuni ediopet koLebin, kosodi etogo loagwelaritai, ka ere loka alupoke eosikinio koyubili: naarai itogoi lukoreria luka Ilebin eraas alupokec kodwe luka Isirael.
Konye emanikor loka ironyia lukoreriakec mam epedorio agwelar; naarai erai alupokec ikar kere.
Sirikiyaŋa ameda kaneejai ŋesi karaida luiyatakina; konye koyoŋ Ekonideke; tetere iboie onacekon kamakon.
Sirikiinak ŋes apesanakon adumun ameda, karaida ainakin ŋes inyamatakon adumun luiyatakina.
Arai eoŋ EJAKAIT Ekusideke, loketolomuni yes kakwap nako Misiri, ainakin yes akwap nako Kanaan, araun Ekusideke.
Eraun kamakon kwape ebulesit loiwotei, kwape ekeboiororon; ijaanakini jo aitodol okaru loka eyubili;
ŋes konyet eosikinor ŋesi kamakon ka ikedwe kaŋes, eboŋori okekike, eboŋori da alup nuka lukapapake.
Naarai eraas ikakejaanakinak luabu ketolom kakwap nako Misiri: mam egwelario kwape ibulesin.
Mam iyait ŋes kagogoŋ; konye koyoŋitenenei Ekonideke.
Ido ibulesinikon ka abulesinikon luijaunete kajo; igwelete ibulesin ka abulesin katekerin nukirimoritos yes.
Bobo da igwelete kodwe luka imo luiboiororete kamakus, kokekiakec luejaas kamakus, luaurikis kesi akwapukus: eraunos airumetekus.
Itaraunete yesi kes airumet naka idwekus lukitupanakinete, aitiŋ araun airumet; iyaŋaarete ibulesinikus kamakec ikar kere: konye siriyaito iinacanakus idwe luka Isirael idiopet ayait yenice kagogoŋ.
“Arai kebar emoit arai ekeboiororon kamakon, onacekon da icana eapie kaŋes, kogwelari bon mama ejai emoit ekeboiororon kamakon, arai mama ejai ateker naka ekek loka emoit:
Kedau agwelario epedorio alakun; epedori ediopet koinacanake alakun ŋes:
Epedori onace loka ikauriakake, arai okoku loka onace loka ikauriakake alakun ŋes, arai ŋolituŋanan loipajanas kaŋes epedori alakun ŋes; arai kebar elopet epedori alakun bon.

Imarakini ŋol loagwelit ŋes ageun kokaru loagwelaritor mama ejai kiton okaru loka eyubili: ejaun etiai loka agwelarike kwape eaar etiai loka ikar; kwape ejaar etiai loka ikar luka ebulesit loiwotei ejaun kaŋes.
Arai eroko esalito ikar luipu, kwape ejaatar kesi inyakakini etiai loka alakunike kapesan nuagwelunere.
Arai esalito ikar luikidioko kiton okaru loka eyubili, kosodi aimarakin ŋes; kwape ejaatar ikaruke inyakakini etiai loka alakunike.
Kwape ebulesit loiwotei ŋolikaru ejaun kaŋes; mam eyait ŋes kagogoŋ kakonyenekon.
Arai mam elakunio kaŋul, eosikinio ŋes kokaru loka eyubili, ka ikedwe kaŋes.
Naarai eraas idwe luka Isirael ikejaanakinak kamaka: eraas ikakejaanakinak luabu ketolom kakwap nako Misiri arai eoŋ EJAKAIT Ekusideke.
Koricito asabatonoka, koyoŋito aiboisika nakalaunan: arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.
Kasodi ainakin yes akiru kapakioke, erai akwap amioke, eraete ikito luka emanikor araitokec.
Edoli aicomokus toma aisakakus, edoli aisakakus roma apak naka aiye: inyamete atapakus kimonikinos, iboikinos akwapukus inapakina.
Ainakini eoŋ ainapakin kakwap, iperete, emamei yenitukuriani yes: etanaŋi eoŋ itiaŋ lueroko kakwap, komam ekileŋ itori akwapukus.
Irukitotor lukasurupokus, eŋianakinete ekileŋ kakonyenekus.
Erukitotor ikany kayesi akwatat, erukitotor akwatat kayesi ilukumin itomon: eŋianakinete lukasurupokus ekileŋ kakonyenekus.
Etei eoŋ yes, etuuriari yes, etupui yes; etogogoŋi akaitutuket kayes.
Inyamete luŋorok lueŋadakinitai sek, itolomunete luŋorok kanuka lukitetiak.
Ebwaikini ewemaka lokalaunan kamakus: mam ekatau kisaci yes.
Aupenena eoŋ kayes, araun Ekusideke, yes da ikatuŋa.
Arai eoŋ EJAKAIT Ekusideke, loabu ketolom yes kakwap nako Misiri, kinyeis araut ibulesinikec; abu kabil akito nuka ajookotokus, ketolot yes kitenara.
Eoŋ da keswamakini yes nu; ejukakini yes akurian, eluera ka ekamidi, luedopodopoete
akusikonye, lueinakinete ikusitauon aipirisiar: iyeete ikinyomokus atai, naarai enyamete lukasurupokus.
Aluikin eoŋ yes, kidanyio kakonyen nuka lukasurupokus: lukilaito kiyaete yes; ikerete komam yenikirukitor yes.
Abili eoŋ apedorikus naiturototor; etuluori akujukus kwape asuat, akwapukus da kwape aisinit:
Edacari akusigogoŋ atai: naarai mam akwapukus erai amioke, karaida ikito luka akwap mam eraete araitokec.
“Arai ilosenenete yesi iŋuŋas keoŋ, iŋerete apupun eoŋ; eyatakini eoŋ ainun yes aiticaneta irwan akanykaarei kwape ejaatar adiakaretakus.
Ejukakini yes etiaŋ loka ais, loidadaanari ikusidwe, emudiari ibarenekus, itidisiari etiaikus; esilokoros irotinikus.
Eoŋ da alosi aŋuŋa kayes; adanyi eoŋ yes, eoŋ elopet, irwan akanykaarei kanuka adiakaretakus.
Kainuni yes ekileŋ, loinyaŋi aitutuket; itukonokinos oreriakus: kejukakini yes atular; kijaikinio yes akan naka lokasurup.
Arai kabil ebelakus loka emugati, epeete aiŋor atomon imugatinikus kokiala ediopet, ijaikinete kesi imugatinikus kaitemis: inyamete komam imonikinos.
“Arai iŋerete apupun eoŋ kanuka ŋun kere, konye ilosenenete iŋuŋas keoŋ;
Eoŋ da alosi aŋuŋa kayes kesiopite; alecori yes irwan akanykaarei kanuka adiakaretakus.
Inyamete akiriŋ naka odwekus, inyamete da akiriŋ naka adwekus.
Amudiari aiboisiokus nuiceleleete, ajepejepei ipirinokus luka akoloŋ, acakakini atesinakus atesina nuka aputosiakus; esaci ekatau yes.
Etuluori ireriakus luiswapito, etisiliori aiboisiokus nukalaunak, aŋeri aiŋuun asakat naka luejijimikus.
Etisiliori akwap; eumokinete lukasurupokus luiboiete kotoma.
Kesiarakini yes da atekerin, autuni ekileŋ atupakin yes: esilior akwapukus, iswapete ireriakus.
Ibworari apak kere naiswapitor; aibworar namam abu kodumunite kasabatonokus, iroko ijaas yesi kotoma,
ŋul da luedeunos kayesi, ainakini itauonokec aiilor kakwap naka lukasurupokec: erukitori kes airurum naka akiot naekusi ekwam; ekerete kesi, kwape ekeria etuŋanan ekileŋ; ibiroros komam yenerukitor.
Icakacakas bonik, kwape ekeriata ekileŋ, komam yenerukitor: emamuunete yes agogoŋ abwoikin lukasurupokus.
Ioliorete kotoma atekerin, kinyami yes akwap naka lukasurupokus.
Eoŋ da alot aŋuŋa kakes, abu ketoloma kes akwap naka lukasurupoke: arai kitasonokinos ikecetauon lumam ekepep, iyuunete aiticanet naka numam adolitekec.
Kasodi eoŋ akiitun akaitutuket ka Yakob; ka akaitutuket ka Isaak, eituni da akaitutuket ka Aburaam; eituni da akwap.
Ejalete kesi akwap, elelakini asabatonoke, kapak naeswapitor komameete kesi; iyuunete aiticanet naka numam adolitekec; naarai ajalakis ikatubesia, asacata ikecetauon ikakisila.
Konye kaŋun kere, naejaatar kesi akwap naka lukasurupokec, mam eoŋ ajalakini kes, karaida mam asaci kes, amudiar kes cut, aibil akaitutuket kakes: naarai arai eoŋ EJAKAIT Ekecedeke:
Konye eituni eoŋ aitutuket naka lukapapaakec kanukec, luabu ketolom kakwap nako Misiri kakonyen nuka atekerin, tetere araun eoŋ Ekecedeke: arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.”
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Kolimok idwe luka Isirael ebe, Naiyapoo ituŋanan aiyaposit mama ejai EJAKAIT naebeit ituŋa, itiriani ijo etiaike.
Itiriani etiai loka ekiliokit agear kaloka ikar akaisaarei aitodol loka ikar akaisakanykape, itiriani etiaike isekelin akaisakany luka epuesa, kwape ejaar esekel
Arai erai naberu, itiriani etiaike isekelin akaisauni.
Arai erai yenika ikar ikany aitodol ikar akaisaarei, itiriani do etiai loka yenikiliokit isekelin akaisaarei, ka loka yeniberu isekelin itomon.
Arai erai yenika elap ediopet aitodol ikar ikany, itiriani etiai loka yenisapat isekelin ikany luka epuesa, ka loka yenipese itiriani etiaike isekelin iuni luka epuesa.
Arai erai yenika ikar akaisakanykape ka adepar; arai erai lokiliokit, itiriani etiaike isekelin itomon ka lukany, ka naberu isekelin itomon.
Konye arai icana ŋesi adepar etiaikon, itobwoi ŋes kakonyen nuka esasedoti, itiriani esasedoti etiaike; kwape ejaar apedor naka ŋol kaloeyapoi itiriani esasedoti etiaike.
“Arai erai etiaŋ, loeinakinete ituŋa araun ainakinet mama ejai EJAKAIT, eraunos kere lukalaunak lueinakini ituŋanan mama ejai EJAKAIT.
Mam iloci ŋes, karaida aisiec, yenejok itia yenerono, arai yenerono itia yenejok: arai do isieci ŋesi itiaŋ itia itiaŋ, eraunos ŋin ka yenisiecitere kere lukalaunak.
Arai erai etiaŋ lomam elai kere, lomam einakinete araun ainakinet mama ejai EJAKAIT, eyauni do etiaŋ akonyen nuka esasedoti:
Itiriani esasedoti etiaike, arai ejok arai erono: kwape itiriania ijo esasedoti etiaike, kojau kwaŋin.
Konye arai ekoto cut alakun ŋes, iyatakini ŋesi idiopet kokany mama ejai etiaikon.
Arai ekoto ŋol loetalaunit alakun etogoke, iyatakini do idiopet kokany mama ejaas apesan nuka etiaikon, eraun lokeŋ
“Arai kitalau etuŋanan atutubet naka emanikor loka alupoke, itiriani ijo etiaike kwape ejaar aiyeke; aiye ekomer
Arai kitalau ŋesi emanikorike agear kokaru loka eyubili, esalakin kwape ejaar etiaikon.
Konye arai kitalau emanikorike akaulo naka eyubili, imarakini esasedoti ŋes apesan kwape ejaatar ikar luesalito aitodol okaru loka eyubili, iŋoŋoori da etiaikon.
Arai ekoto ŋol loetalaunit emanikor: alakun ŋes cut, iyatakini do idiopet kokany mama ejaas apesan nuka etiaikon kosodi itogogoŋio mamakeŋ.
Arai mam ekoto alakun emanikor, ara itwegelit emanikor ecetuŋanan, mam bobo elakunio:
Konye naeosikinen koyubili eraun emanikor lokalaunan mama ejai EJAKAIT, kwape emanikor loegitunitai; eraunos alup nuka esasedoti.
Arai kitalau ŋesi emanikor loagwelit mama ejai EJAKAIT, emanikor lomam erai loka alupoke;
Imarakini esasedoti ŋes ajokis naka etiaikon kiton okaru loka eyubili: einakini etiaikon kapaaran kaŋin, kwape ibore yenikalaunan mama ejai EJAKAIT.
Kokaru loka eyubili eboŋori emanikor mama ejai je loagwelari, ŋes elopet loebeitos alup.
Itiriani itiaisineikon kere kwape ejaar esekel loka aibois nakalaunan: esekel ŋes igeran akaisaarei.
Arai erai yenika etiaŋ lomam elai, elakuni ŋes kwape ejaar etiaikon, iyatakini da idiopet kokany mamakeŋ: arai mam elakunio, egwelario kwape ejaar etiaikon.
Mam elakunio yenegitaritai, yenegitaritai kotuŋa; abeit eario ŋes.
Arai ekoto etuŋanan alakun ice kodiopet kotomonoke, iyatakini idiopet kokany mamakeŋ.
Idiopet kotomon kere yenika isipanin luka aituk ka luka amerekekin, ŋin yenitori kwap kebela, yenikitomonet eraun yenikalaunan mama ejai EJAKAIT.
Mam irerei arai ejok arai erono, karaida aisiec: arai kisiec, eraunos ŋin ka yenisiecitere kere lukalaunak: mam ‘elakunio.’ ”
Ŋun kes aicorakineta, nuabu EJAKAIT kicorak Musa kanuka idwe luka Isirael komoru Sinai.
“Kimarata yesi ekodet kere loka idwe luka Isirael, kwape ejaatar ikekiakec, kwape ejaatar ikalia luka lukapapaakec, kwape ejaar etiai loka ikiroriakec, ŋolikiliokit, kwape ejaatar akecekwes;
Ageun kaluka ikar akaisaarei ka luedeparito, kere luepedorete alosit ojie koIsirael, imarete ijo ka Aaron kes kwape ejaatar irioŋetakec.
Ejauni etuŋanan loka ŋiniteker nepepe kayes; ŋolidiopet loepolokinit ekal loka lukapapaake.
Lu kes ikiroria luka ituŋa luebwoenenete nepepe kayes: loka Reuben: Elisur okoku loka Sedeur.
Loka Simeon; Selumiel okoku loka Surisadai,
loka Yuda; Nason okoku loka Aminadab,
loka Isakar; Netanel okoku loka Suar,
loka Sebulun; Eliab okoku loka Kelon.
Loka idwe luka Yosep: loka Epuraim; Elisama okoku loka Amikud; loka Manase; Gamaliel okoku loka Peda-sur.
Loka Benyamin; Abidan okoku loka Gideoni.
Loka Dan; Akieser okoku loka Amisadai.
Loka Aser; Pagiel okoku loka Ocuran.
Loka Gad; Eliasap okoku loka Deuel.
Loka Naputali; Akira okoku loka Enan.”
Ŋul kes luaponi konyaraunai kotoma okodet, ikapolok luka atekerin nuka lukapapaakec; kes luapolokinito ikekia luka Isirael.
Koyaŋaasi Musa ka Aaron ituŋa ŋul luebilitai ikecekiroria:.

Kotukonokis ekodet kere nepepe kapaaran nasodit naka elap lokiareit, koJimosi lukapapaakec, kwape ejaatar ikekiakec, kwape ejaatar ikalia luka lukapapaakec, kwape ejaar etiai loka ikiroriakec, ageun kaluka ikar akaisaarei ka luedeparito, kwape ejaatar akwesikec.
Kwape abu EJAKAIT kicorakinitor Musa, kimar kes kwaŋin kamodiŋ naka Sinai.

Idwe luka Reuben, ekiyai loka Isirael, aturiokec, kwape ejaatar ikekiakec, kwape ejaatar ikalia luka lukapapaakec, kwape ejaar etiai loka ikiroriakec, kwape ejaatar akwesikec, ŋolikiliokit ageun kaluka ikar akaisaarei ka luedeparito, kere luepedorete alosit ojie;
Ŋul luaponi kimarai kakesi, luka ateker naka Reuben, emwaasi ilukumin akaisaoŋon ka lukanykape ka akwat akany (46,500).
Ŋul luaponi kimarai kakesi, luka ateker naka Simeon, emwaasi ilukumin akaisakany ka lukanykaoŋon ka akwat auni (59,300).
Ŋul luaponi kimarai kakesi, luka ateker naka Gad, emwaasi ilukumin akaisaoŋon ka lukany ka akwat akanykape ka akaisakany (45,650).
Ŋul luaponi kimarai kakesi, luka ateker naka Yuda, emwaasi ilukumin akaisakanykaarei ka luoŋon ka akwat akanykape (74,600).

Idwe luka Isakar, aturiokec, kwape ejaatar ikekiakec, kwape ejaatar ikalia luka lukapapaakec, kwape ejaar etiai loka ikiroriakec, ageun kaluka ikar akaisaarei ka luedeparito, kere luepedorete alosit ojie;
Ŋul luaponi kimarai kakesi, luka ateker naka Isakar, emwaasi ilukumin akaisakany ka luoŋon ka akwat aoŋon (54,400).

Idwe luka Sebulun, aturiokec, kwape ejaatar ikekiakec, kwape ejaatar ikalia luka lukapapaakec, kwape ejaar etiai loka ikiroriakec, ageun kaluka ikar akaisaarei ka luedeparito, kere luepedorete alosit ojie;
Ŋul luaponi kimarai kakesi, luka ateker naka Sebulun, emwaasi ilukumin akaisakany ka lukanykaarei ka akwat aoŋon (57,400).
Ŋul luaponi kimarai kakesi, luka ateker naka Epuraim, emwaasi ilukumin akaisaoŋon ka akwat akany (40,500).

Idwe luka Manase, aturiokec, kwape ejaatar ikekiakec, kwape ejaatar ikalia luka lukapapaakec, kwape ejaar etiai loka ikiroriakec, ageun kaluka ikar akaisaarei ka luedeparito, kere luepedorete alosit ojie:
Ŋulluaponi kimarai kakesi, luka ateker naka Manase, emwaasi ilukumin akaisauni ka luarei ka akwat aarei (32,200).
Ŋul luaponi kimarai kakesi, luka ateker naka Benyamin, emwaasi ilukumin akaisauni ka lukany ka akwat aoŋon (35,400).
Ŋul luaponi kimarai kakesi, luka ateker naka Dan, emwaasi ilukumin akaisakanykape ka luarei ka akwat akanykaarei (62,700).

Idwe luka Aser, aturiokec, kwape ejaatar ikekiakec, kwape ejaatar ikalia luka lukapapaakec, kwape ejaar etiai loka ikiroriakec, ageun kaluka ikar akaisaarei ka luedeparito, kere luepedorete alosit ojie;
Ŋul luaponi kimarai kakesi, luka ateker naka Aser, emwaasi ilukumin akaisaoŋon ka lodiopet ka akwat akany (41,500).

Idwe luka Naputali, aturiokec, kwape ejaatar ikekiakec, kwape ejaatar ikalia luka lukapapaakec, kwape ejaar etiai loka ikiroriakec, ageun kaluka ikar akaisaarei ka luedeparito, kere luepedorete alosit ojie:
Ŋul luaponi kimarai kakesi, luka ateker naka Naputali, emwaasi ilukumin akaisakany ka luuni ka akwat aoŋon (53,400).
Aso kere luaponi kimarai kodwe luka Isirael kwape ejaatar ikalia luka lukapapaakec, ageun kaluka ikar akaisaarei ka luedeparito, kere luepedorete alosit ojie koIsirael:
Kes kere luaponi kimarai emwaasi ilukumin akwat akanykape kaluuni ka akwat akany ka akaisakany (603,550).
Naarai abu Edeke kolimok Musa ebe,
“Ateker bon naka Lebi ŋes mam jo imari, karaida aimorikikin etiaikec toma otiai loka idwe luka Isirael:

Konye kodakak ijo Ilebin aidar ewema lokalaunan loka aitejenunet, ka iboro kere lukotoma, ka iboro kere luejaatar; edakete kesi ewema lokalaunan, ka iboroke kere; ijaanakinete ŋes, ido idukurete kesi airimor ewema lokalaunan.
Naitobwosere ewema lokalaunan, Ilebin kes eusete iloin ka anunuk da; ido naibubukinere ewema, Ilebin kes ibubukinete: ido eario eloŋwait kere loikunyuni die kewema.
Ibubuete idwe luka Isirael iwemanakec, ŋinituŋanan owai loitebeitai aketeker, ŋinituŋanan owai loka emederake, kwape ejaatar irioŋetakec.
Konye idukurete Ilebin airimor ewema lokalaunan loka aitejenunet, kinyek anyunyura abunokin ekodet loka idwe luka Isirael: ido idarete Ilebin ewema lokalaunan loka aitejenunet.”
Kiswamata idwe luka Isirael kwaŋin; kere kwape kicorakinia EJAKAIT Musa, kiswamata kwaŋin.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa ka Aaron atiar,
“Idukurete idwe luka Isirael ŋinituŋanan kwape ejaar emederake, ka aanyuneta nuka ikalia luka lukapapaakec: idukurete kolukunito kobwatara kowema loka airiamunun.
Ŋul luka emedera loka iidukurun luka Yuda, kes idukurete ari nakokide kama eŋiunia akoloŋ, kwape ejaatar irioŋetakec: ido ekapolon loka idwe luka Yuda ŋes Nason okoku loka Aminadab.
Ido erioŋeteke, ka ŋul luaponi kimarai kakesi, emwaasi ilukumin akaisakanykaarei ka luoŋon ka akwat akanykape.
Ido ŋul luidukurete eiduny kaŋes kes luka ateker naka Isakar: ekapolon da loka idwe luka Isakar ŋes Netanel okoku loka Suar:
Erioŋeteke, ka ŋul luaponi kimarai kakesi, emwaasi ilukumin akaisakany ka luoŋon ka akwat aoŋon:
Ateker naka Sebulun: ekapolon loka idwe luka Sebulun ŋes Eliab okoku loka Kelon:
Erioŋeteke, ka ŋul luaponi kimarai kakesi, emwaasi ilukumin akaisakany ka lukanykaarei ka akwat aoŋon.
Kere luaponi kimarai luka iidukurun luka Yuda emwaasi ilukumin akwatat ka akaisakanykauni ka lukanykape ka akwat aoŋon, kwape ejaatar irioŋetakec. Kes egeete alosit.
Erioŋeteke, ka ŋul luaponi kimarai kakesi, emwaasi ilukumin akaisaoŋon ka lukanykape ka akwat akany.
Ŋul luidukurete eiduny kaŋes kes luka ateker naka Simeon: ekapolon loka idwe luka Simeon ŋes Selumiel okoku loka Surisadai:
Erioŋeteke, ka ŋul luaponi kimarai kakesi, emwaasi ilukumin akaisakany ka lukanykaoŋon ka akwat auni:
Ka ateker naka Gad: ekapolon loka idwe luka Gad ŋes Eliasap okoku loka Reuel:
Erioŋeteke, ka ŋul luaponi kimarai kakesi, emwaasi ilukumin akaisaoŋon ka lukany ka akwat akanykape ka akaisakany.
Kere luaponi kimarai luka iidukurun luka Reuben emwaasi ilukumin akwatat ka akaisakany ka lodiopet, ka akwat aoŋon ka akaisakany, kwape ejaatar irioŋetakec, Kes iareikinete kalosit.
Erioŋeteke, ka ŋul luaponi kimarai kakesi, emwaasi ilukumin akaisaoŋon ka akwat akany.
Idunyakin ateker naka Manase neejai ŋesi: ekapolon loka idwe luka Manase ŋes Gamaliel okoku loka Pedasur:
Erioŋeteke, ka ŋul luaponi kimarai kakesi, emwaasi ilukumin akaisauni ka luarei ka akwat aarei:
Ka ateker naka Benyamin: ekapolon loka idwe luka Benyamin ŋes Abidan okoku loka Gideoni:
Erioŋeteke, ka ŋul luaponi kimarai kakesi, emwaasi ilukumin akaisauni ka lukany ka akwat aoŋon.
Kere luaponi kimarai luka iidukurun luka Epuraim emwaasi ilukumin akwatat ka lukanykauni ka akwatat, kwape ejaatar irioŋetakec. Kes iunikinete kalosit.
Erioŋeteke, ka ŋul luaponi kimarai kakesi, emwaasi ilukumin akaisakanykape ka luarei ka akwat akanykaarei.
Ido ŋul luidukurete eiduny kaŋes kes luka ateker naka Aser: ekapolon loka idwe luka Aser ŋes Pagiel okoku loka Ocuran.
Erioŋeteke, ka ŋul luaponi kimarai kakesi, emwaasi ilukumin akaisaoŋon ka lodiopet ka akwat akany:
Ka ateker naka Naputali: ekapolon loka idwe luka Naputali ŋes Akira okoku loka Enan:
Erioŋeteke, ka ŋul luaponi kimarai kakesi, emwaasi ilukumin akaisakany ka luuni ka akwat aoŋon.
Kere luaponi kimarai luka iidukurun luka Dan emwaasi ilukumin akwatat ka akaisakany ka lukanykaarei ka akwat akanykape. Kes iwasiete kalosir kwape ejaatar imederanakec.”
Konye mam Ilebin aponi kimarakinai toma odwe luka Isirael: kwape kicorakinia EJAKAIT Musa.
Na ŋes aur naka Aaron ka Musa kapaaran naeneratar EJAKAIT kaMusa komoru Sinai.
Lu kes ikiroria luka odwe luka Aaron: Nadab ekiyaike, ka Abiku, Eleasar, ka Itamar.
Lu kes ikiroria luka odwe luka Aaron, isasedotin luaponi kinyonyoikinai akinyet, luatiakuni ŋesi aijaanakin toma aswam naka esasedoti.

Kotwakikis Nadab ka Abiku akonyen nuka EJAKAIT, naainakiniata akim naitegelikina kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kamodiŋ naka Sinai, komameete kes idwe: kijaanakis Eleasar ka Itamar kaswam naka esasedoti kakonyen nuka Aaron papakec.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Kisukuny ateker naka Lebi, kibwaik kes akonyen nuka Aaron esasedoti, tetere ijaanakinete ŋes.
Ido idarete akiroke, ka akiro da nuka ekodet kere loejai iŋaren kewema loka airiamunun, aijaanakin toma owema lokalaunan.
Idarete da iboro kere luka ewema loka airiamunun, ka akiro da nuka idwe luka Isirael, aijaanakin roma owema lokalaunan.
Iinakini Ilebin mama ejai Aaron ka odweke: ainakin kes cut mamakeŋ kanuka idwe luka Isirael.
Itebeikini Aaron ka odweke, aidarenen esasedotenekec: eario eloŋwait kere loikunyuni die kewema.”
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Ka eoŋ da, koany, alemu Ilebin kodwe luka Isirael aibois naka ikiyaik luepukorete aliligeta kotoma odwe luka Isirael; eraunos da Ilebin lukaŋ:
Naarai ikiyaik kere eraas lukaŋ; kapaaran naadanyia ikiyaik kere kotoma akwap nako Misiri abu ketalau ikiyaik kere koIsirael kanukaŋ, ituŋanan ka itiaŋ da: eraunos lukaŋ; arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.”
“Kimar idwe luka Lebi kwape ejaatar ikalia luka lukapapaakec, kwape ejaatar ikekiakec: imari ŋolikiliokit ageun kayenika elap ediopet ka yenedeparit.”
Kimar Musa kes kwape ajaar akirot naka EJAKAIT, kwape kicorakinitere.
Lu kes odwe luka Lebi kwape ejaatar ikiroriakec; Gereson, ka Kokat, ka Merari.
Lu kes ikiroria luka odwe luka Gereson kwape ejaatar ikekiakec: Libuni ka Simei.
Odwe luka Kokat kwape ejaatar ikekiakec; Amuram, ka Isar, ka Keburon ka Usiel.
Odwe luka Merari kwape ejaatar ikekiakec; Mali ka Musi. Ŋul kes ikekia luka Ilebin kwape ejaatar ikalia luka lukapapaakec.
Kotoma Gereson ŋes alomunia ekek loka Ilibunin, ka ekek loka Isimein: ŋul kes ikekia luka Igeresonin.
Ŋul luaponi kimarai kakesi, kwape ejaar etiai loka ikiliok kere, ageun kayenika elap ediopet ka yenedeparit, ŋul luaponi kimarai kakesi emwaasi ilukumin ikanykaarei ka akwat akany.
Luka ekek loka Igeresonin idukurete agule kewema lokalaunan kari nakoto.
Ekapolon loka ekal loka lukapapaa luka Igeresonin ŋes Eliasap okoku loka Lael.
Ido kotoma owema loka airiamunun idarenenete odwe luka Gereson ewema lokalaunan, ka Bwema, ka eimukoreteke, ka aigalisit naka ekek loka ewema loka airiamunun.
Ka luikajaj alaro, ka aigalisit naka ekek loka alaro, naidunyas kewema lokalaunan, naidunyas ketem kolukunite, ka aunoike, kwape ejaar aijaanakinikec kere.
Kwape ejaar etiai loka ikiliok kere, ageun kayenika elap ediopet ka yenedeparit, emwaasi ilukumin ikanykauni ka akwat akanykape, idarenenete aibois nakalaunan.
Luka ikekia luka odwe luka Kokat idukurete osiep loka ewema kari naka eŋalakimak.
Ekapolon loka ekal loka lukapapaa luka ikekia luka Ikokatin ŋes Elisapan okoku loka Usiel.
Idarenenete kes asaduku, ka emesa, ka epir loka atala, ka itemwan, ka iboro lukotoma aibois nakalaunan luetwasamaete kesi aijaanakinia, ka aigalisit, ka aijaanakinikec kere.
Eleasar da okoku loka Aaron esasedoti ŋes eraun ekapolon loka ikapolok luka Ilebin, ido eanyanari ŋul luidarete aibois nakalaunan.
Kotoma Merari ŋes alomunia ekek loka Imalin, ka ekek loka Imusin: ŋul kes ikekia luka Merari.
Ŋul luaponi kimarai kakesi kwape ejaar etiai loka ikiliok kere, ageun kayenika elap ediopet ka yenedeparit, emwaasi ilukumin ikanykape ka akwat aarei.
Ekapolon loka ekal loka lukapapaa luka ikekia luka Imerarin ŋes Suriel okoku loka Abikail; idukurete kesi osiep loka ewema kari naka agolitomei.
Ido luaseikinitai odwe luka Merari aidarenen kes abaoi nuka ewema lokalaunan, ka akitoke nukirionokina, ka ipirinoke, ka aigaŋetakec, ka iboro kere lueupatar, ka aijaanakinikec kere:
Ka ipirino luelukunito alaro, ka aigaŋetakec, ka iloinokec, ka aunoikec.

Kere luaponi kimarai luka Ilebin, luemarete Musa ka Aaron kaicorakinet naka EJAKAIT, kwape ajaatar ikekiakec, ikiliok kere ageun kayenika elap ediopet ka yenedeparit, emwaasi ilukumin akaisaarei ka luarei.
Kolimok EJAKAIT Musa ebe, “Kimar ikiyaik kere lukiliok luka idwe luka Isirael ageun kayenika elap ediopet ka yenedeparit, kimar etiai loka ikiroriakec.
Kolemikinai eoŋ Ilebin (arai eoŋ EJAKAIT) aibois naka ikiyaik kere kodwe luka Isirael; ka ibaren luka Ilebin aibois naka ikiyaik kere luka ibaren luka idwe luka Isirael.”
Kimar Musa ikiyaik kere kodwe luka Isirael, kwape kicorakinia EJAKAIT.

Ikiyaik kere lukiliok kwape ejaar etiai loka ikiroriakec, ageun kayenika elap ediopet ka yenedeparit, ŋul luaponi kimarai kakesi, emwaasi ilukumin akaisaarei ka luarei ka akwat aarei ka akaisakanykaarei ka luuni.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Kolem Ilebin aibois naka ikiyaik kere kodwe luka Isirael, ka ibaren luka Ilebin aibois naka ibarenekec: eraunos Ilebin lukaŋ: arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.
Ido kanuka alakunio naka ikiyaik akwat aarei ka akaisakanykaarei ka luuni luka idwe luka Isirael luedeparitotor kesi etiai loka Ilebin.
Ijauni isekelin ikany kaneejai ŋinituŋanan; ijauni kes kwape ejaar esekel
Iinakini Aaron ka odweke apesan nuelakunere luedeparitotor kes.”
Kijau Musa apesan nulakunet kaneejaas ŋul luadeparitotor kesi lualakunete Ilebin:
Kijau ŋesi apesan kaneejaas ikiyaik luka idwe luka Isirael; isekelin elukumit ka akwat auni ka akaisakanykape ka lukany, kwape ejaar esekelloka aibois nakalaunan:
Kijaik Musa Aaron ka odweke apesan nulakunet, kwape ajaar akirot naka EJAKAIT, kwape kicorakinia EJAKAIT Musa.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa ka Aaron atiar,
“Kimarasi odwe luka Kokat kotoma odwe luka Lebi, kwape ejaatar ikekiakec, kwape ejaatar ikalia luka lukapapaakec.
Ageun kaluka ikar akaisauni ka luedeparito aitodol luka ikar akaisakany, kere luekapakina aijaanakin, aswam kotoma owema loka airiamunun.
Na ŋes aswam naka odwe luka Kokat kotoma owema loka airiamunun, koboro lukalaunak cut;
Naitobwosere idukurun, elomari Aaron ka odweke toma, elacunete aigalisit naetiakit, erapakiniata ŋes asaduku naka aitejenunet.
Erapakinete da emukule loka etakas
Epesikinete egoe lobululu omesa loka imugatin luka aitodikin, idokokinete nen atuba ka akaalei ka atanya, ka aikopon nubukununet: ejaunete nen da imugatin ludue:
Ido erapiarete kere kegoe lokareŋan, eburiarete bobo kemukule loka etakas, irupakinete da adaketake.
Elemunete egoe lobululu, aimukoria epir loka atala naka aica, ka atalaike, ka aridetake, ka aitudeŋetake, ka itidoike luka akinyet luetwasamaete kesi aijaanakinia:
Eburiarete ŋes ka itidoike kere kemukule loka etakas, idokokinete adaketeke.
Epesikinete egoe lobululu otem loka esabu, iburiarete bobo kemukule loka etakas, irupakinete da adaketake:
Ibwaikinete iboro kere luetwasamaete aijaanakinia, luejaanakiniata kotoma aibois nakalaunan, toma ogoe lobululu, eburiarete da kere kemukule loka etakas, idokokinete da adaketeke.
Emudarete ekurwon kotoma otem, epesikinete egoe lomuge:

Idokokinete nen iboroke kere, luejaanakiniata ŋes, ieuman luka akim, ka igoluna luka akiriŋ, ka amudeta, ka atanyia, iboro kere luka etem; epesikinete da eimukoret loka emukule loka etakas, irupakinete da adaketake.

Kedaut Aaron ka odweke arapakin aibois nakalauian ka iboro kere lukotoma aibois nakalaunan, naedolio aitobwot iidukurun; akaulo kaŋun, epote odwe luka Kokat aidak ŋes: konye mam kes etirorete iboro lukalaunak kinyeis atwakare. Iboro ŋul kes luedakete odwe luka Kokat luka ewema loka airiamunun.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa ka Aaron atiar,
“Sirikitiakasi ateker naka ikekia luka Ikokatin kotoma oLebin:
Konye kiswamak kes kwana, tetere eiarere kinyeis atwakare, kikunyakis neejaas iboro lukalaunak noi: elomari Aaron ka odweke toma, kosodete aitodianakin kes ŋinituŋanan akeswam ka ibore yenedaki:
Konye mam elomarete toma aanyun iboro lukalaunak, nepecep da, kinyeis atwakare.”
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Kimar odwe luka Gereson da, kwape ejaatar ikalia luka lukapapaakec, kwape ejaatar ikekiakec;
Imari kes ageun kaluka ikar akaisauni ka luedeparito aitodol luka ikar akaisakany; kere luekapakina aijaanakin, aswam. Kotoma owema loka airiamunun.
Na ŋes aswam naka ikekia luka Igeresonin, naijaanakiniata naedakiata da iboro:
Edakete kesi aigalisio nuka ewema lokalaunan, ka ewema loka airiamunun, eimukoreteke, ka eimukoret loka emukule loka etakas loejai kujuke, ka aigalisit naka ekek loka ewema loka airiamunun;

Ka luikajaj alaro, ka aigalisit naka ekek loka erute loka alaro, naidunyas kewema lokalaunan, naidunyas da ketem kolukunite, ka aunoikec, ka iboro kere da lueupatar kaijaanakinikec, kere nuibusakinit aiswamakin kes, ŋupeŋun ijaanakinete.
Kwape icorakinia Aaron ka odweke kwaŋin ijaanakiniata odwe luka Igeresonin, kotoma kaluedakete kere, kotoma kaluiiaanakinete da; itodikinete kes luedakete kere.
Ŋin ŋes aswam naka ikekia luka odwe luka Igeresonin kotoma owema loka airiamunun: idarete kesi koanyanari Itamar okoku loka Aaron esasedoti.
“Ka odwe luka Merari da, imari ijo kes kwape ejaatar ikekiakec, kwape ejaatar ikalia luka lukapapaakec;
Imari kes ageun kaluka ikar akaisauni ka luedeparito aitodol luka ikar akaisakany, ŋinituŋanan yenekapakina aijaanakin, aswam kotoma owema loka airiamunun.
Lu kes iboro luidarete kesi, kwape ejaar aswamukec kotoma owema loka airiamunun; abaoi nuka ewema lokalaunan, ka akitoke nukirionokina, ka ipirinoke ka aigaŋetakec;
Ka ipirino luka alaro naelukunit, ka aigaŋetakec, ka ikeceloin, ka aunoikec, ka iborokec kere lueupatar, ka luijaanakiniata; ibilete ikiroria luka iboro kere luidarete kesi ka luedakete.
Ŋin ŋes aswam naka ikekia luka odwe luka Merari, kwape ejaar aijaanakinikec kere kotoma owema loka airiamunun, koanyanari Itamar okoku loka Aaron esasedoti.”
Ageun kaluka ikar akaisauni ka luedeparito aitodol luka ikar akaisakany, ŋinituŋanan yenekapakina aijaanakin, aswam kotoma owema loka airiamunun.
Ŋul da luaponi kimarai kakesi kwape ajaatar ikekiakec emwaasi ilukumin iarei ka akwat akanykaarei ka akaisakany.
Ŋul kes luaponi kimarai luka ikekia luka Ikokatin, kere luapotu kijaanakis kotoma owema loka airiamunun, luemarete Musa ka Aaron kwape ajaar aicorakinet naka EJAKAIT kama ka Musa.
Ka ŋul da luaponi kimarai luka odwe luka Gereson, kwape ajaatar ikekiakec, kwape ajaatar ikalia luka lukapapaakec.
Ageun kaluka ikar akaisauni ka luedeparito aitodol luka ikar akaisakany, ŋinituŋanan yenekapakina aijaanakin, aswam kotoma owema loka airiamunun.
Ŋul luaponi kimarai kakesi, kwape ajaatar ikekiakec, kwape ajaatar ikalia luka lukapapaakec, emwaasi ilukumin iarei ka akwat akanykape ka akaisauni.
Ŋul kes luaponi kimarai luka ikekia luka odwe luka Gereson, kere luapotu kijaanakis kotoma owema loka airiamunun, luemarete Musa ka Aaron kwape ajaar aicorakinet naka EJAKAIT.
Ka ŋul da luaponi kimarai luka ikekia luka odwe luka Merari, kwape ajaatar ikekiakec, kwape ajaatar ikalia luka lukapapaakec.
Ageun kaluka ikar akaisauni ka luedeparito aitodol luka ikar akaisakany, ŋinituŋanan yenekapakina aijaanakin, aswam kotoma owema loka airiamunun.
Ŋul luaponi kimarai kakesi kwape ajaatar ikekiakec, emwaasi ilukumin iuni ka akwat aarei.
Ŋul kes luaponi kimarai luka ikekia luka odwe luka Merari, luemarete Musa ka Aaron kwape ajaar aicorakinet naka EJAKAIT, kama ka Musa.
Ŋul kere luaponi kimarai luka Ilebin, luemarete Musa ka Aaron ka ikapolok luka Isirael kwape ajaatar ikekiakec, kwape ajaatar ikalia luka lukapapaakec.
Ageun kaluka ikar akaisauni ka luedeparito aitodol luka ikar akaisakany, ŋinituŋanan yenekapakina aswam naka aijaanakin, ka aswam naka aidak iboro kotoma owema loka airiamunun.
Ŋul luaponi kimarai kakesi, emwaasi ilukumin ikanykauni ka akwat akany ka akaisakanykauni.
Kwape ajaar aicorakinet naka EJAKAIT aponi kimarai kes kama ka Musa, ŋinituŋanan kwape ajaar aijaanakinike, ido kwape ajaar aidakake: kwaŋin aponi kimarai, kwape kicorakinia EJAKAIT Musa.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Kicorak idwe luka Isirael, ebe Kireŋeasi kiŋa kiidukurun ŋin yenikatapon, ka ŋin yeneleleete abulon arai aokot, ka ŋin da yenimam elai kanuka aidunyakin kayenikatwan:
Ireŋearete yenikiliokit ka yeniberu da kiŋa kiidukurun; kinyeis amunaun iidukurunukec, lueboienenei eoŋ kotoma.”
Kiswamata idwe luka Isirael kwaŋin, kireŋeasi kes kiŋa kiidukurun: kiswamata idwe luka Isirael kwaŋin kwape atemaria EJAKAIT Musa.
“Kolimok idwe luka Isirael ebe, Naediakaria etuŋanan arai aberu adiakaret kere naediakarete ituŋa, aibucar kaneejai EJAKAIT, kitelekarite ituŋanan ŋin akirot;
ŋes konyet elimoriata akecediakaret naadiakasi: ido egeli akediakaret kere, ka aiyatakin da ogelitike idiopet kokany, kosodi ainakin ŋol loediakarit ŋesi kamakeŋ.
Konye arai emamei lokatekerike loegelio kanuka adiakaret, egelit loegelio kanuka adiakaret itebeo EJAKAIT, ido eraun loka esasedoti; dimarai emerekek loka alucio, loelueere aronisike.
Ido ŋiniinakinet naikeunitai naka iboro kere lukalaunak luka idwe luka Isirael; nueinanakinete esasedoti, eraunos nukeŋ.
Iboro lukalaunak luka ŋinituŋanan eraunos lukeŋ: ŋinibore yerieinakini ŋinituŋanan esasedoti, eraun yenikeŋ.”
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Kolimok idwe luke Isirael ebe, Arai kepaa aberu naka etuŋanan, kosodi adiakar kamakeŋ.
Apero ketuŋanan, komam okilenike ejeni, komam ŋes da enicunitai, komunaun ŋesi, komam yeneanyunit ŋes adiakari, karaida aikamakin adiakareteke;
Kosodi emoyo loka ekokote abunokin okilenike, aitokokol ŋes, komunaun aberu: arai diat kobunok ŋes emoyo loka ekokote, aitokokol ŋes, komam aberu emunauna:
Ŋes konyet eyaŋaaria etuŋanan akeberu neejai esasedoti, eyaŋaaria da ainakinet kanuka aberuke, idiopet kotomon yenika epa
Kosodi esasedoti aitiŋ akipi nukalaunak kotoma atany; ibwaikini da toma akipi ŋun apua adis nuelemuni esasedoti kokwap kewema lokalaunan:

Itobwoi da esasedoti aberu kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, elacari da itim luka akou naka aberu, ido ibwaikini ainakinet naka akiria naka aisiitunet toma akanin nuka aberu, naerai ainakinet naka akiria naka ekokote: ejaunos toma akanin nuka esasedoti akipi nuka adwaris nueyaunete ekenit.

Isiyapoi esasedoti ŋes, etemari da aberu atiar, ‘Arai mam ediotuŋanan kiteperit jo, ido arai mam jo ipaarit toma amamus aila, korai aberu naka ekiliokit, mam nukibeikinete jo kanuka akipi nu nuka adwaris nueyaunete ekenit.
Konye arai ipaarit, korai aberu naka ekiliokit, arai imunauna da, apero kecetunanan lomam erai okilenikon’:
Ŋes konyet isiyapoo esasedoti aberu aiyaposit naka ekenit, etemari esasedoti aberu atiar, ‘Kitarau jo EJAKAIT ekenit ka aiyapoet kotuŋakon, naitoonio EJAKAIT akonimurwo ka aitubuun akonikoik;
Ido akipi nu nueyaunete ekenit elomarete toma akoikikon itubuunete, iroonete da akonimurwo’: eboŋokini aberu da ebe, ‘Kikote nepenen, kikote nepenen.’
“Iwadikai esasedoti ikenito lu oitabo, ido emwatakini kes toma akipi nuka adwaris:
Itamasi aberu akipi nuka adwaris nueyaunete ekenit: ido elomarete akip nueyaunete ekenit tomake kosodete adwaruun.
Ijauni esasedoti ainakinet naka akiria naka ekokote kakan naka aberu, iianari ainakinet naka akiria akonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kosodi ayaun otem:
Emukuni esasedoti akan ileleba naka ainakinet naka akiria, araun aiituneteke, icweikini da kotem; ido akauloke itamasi aberu akipi.

Kedau aitamat ŋes akipi, kosodi ejaun kwana, arai emunauna, kodiakarite kama kokilenike, elomarete akip nueyaunete ekenit tomake kosodete adwaruun, ebuuni akoikike, eoni da akemurwo: ido eraun aberu ekenit kotuŋake.
Konye arai esegara aberu, komam emunauna; ŋes kito emameunotor nuebeikinete, ido epedori apotuun.
“Ŋol ŋes ekisil loka ekokote, arai kepaa aberu, kosodi amunaun, korai aberu naka ekiliokit;
Arai da kebunoki etuŋanan emoyo loka ekokote, aitokokol akeberu; ŋes konyet itobwoia aberu kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, ido iswamakini esasedoti aberu kwape ejaar ekisil ŋol kere.
Mam etuŋanan itebeikino numam adolit, ibwoki aberu ŋin numam adoliteke.”
“Kolimok idwe luka Isirael ebe, Arai kiyapo ekiliokit arai aberu aiyaposit naitegelikina, aiyaposit naka Enasirit,

Ipoliauni da kotoma ebino ka nuitemerete; sirikemat ebino loedwar, karaida nuitemerete nueta ria, ido sirikemat akipi kere nuka emusabibu, karaida ainyam araito nuka emusabibu nuekokito arai nuitoonitai.
Apaarasia kere nuka eipoliake sirikenyam ibore kere yenelomuni kotoma omusabibu, anyoun koeokat aitodol akabubuk.
Sirikeraun lomam elai kanuka papake, karaida kanuka totoke, arai kanuka onaceke, arai kanuka inacike, naetwakiata: naarai eipoliake mama ejai Edeke ejai akouke.
Apaarasia kere nuka eipoliake erai lokalaunan mama ejai EJAKAIT.
Ido kapaaran nakikanyetekauni eyauni ajeleik aarei, arai ilukei iarei ludidik, neejai esasedoti, okek loka ewema loka airiamunun:
Einakini esasedoti adiopet kanuka ainakinet naka adiakaret, ka nace da kanuka ainakinet naicweio, alucio ŋes, naarai adiaka kanuka yenikatwan, ido italauni akekou kapaaran kaŋin.

Ipolia mama ejai EJAKAIT apaarasia nuka eipoliake, ido eyauni imerekek yenikiliokit yenika ekaru ediopet kanuka ainakinet naka adiakaret; konye epalunio apaarasiake nuageit, naarai abu eipoliake komunaun.

Ido einakini EJAKAIT ainakinet imerekek yenikiliokit yenika ekaru ediopet yenimam eŋwalit kanuka ainakinet naicweio, ka imerekek yeniberu yenika ekaru ediopet yenimam eŋwalit kanuka ainakinet naka adiakaret, ka emerekek lomam eŋwalit kanuka ainakineta nuka ainapakin.

Ka edita loka emugati lomam etubuunitoi, ka aluŋuren nuka akiria nuidicic nuinyalakinitai akinyet, ka imugatin luibenibena lumam itubuunitoi luinyonyoikinitai akinyet, ka ainakinetekec naka akiria, ka ainakinetakec numatan.
Kosodi esasedoti aijaikin kes kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, ido einakini ainakineteke naka adiakaret ka ainakineteke naicweio:

Einakini da emerekek kanuka asubanit naka ainakineta nuka ainapakin mama ejai EJAKAIT, nepepe kedita loka emugati lomam etubuunitoi: einakini esasedoti ainakinet naka ituŋanan kaŋin naka akiria, ka ainakineteke namatat.
Ebarenori Enasirit akou naka eipoliake kokek loka ewema loka airiamunun, eyaŋaari da itim luka akou naka eipoliake, kosodi aibwaikin akim naka asubanit naka ainakineta nuka ainapakin.
Elemuni esasedoti akuat naka emerekek naipoo, ka aluŋuret namam etubuunitoi kotoma odita, ka emugati ediopet loibenibena, ijaikini akanin nuka Enasirit, kedau abaren akou naka eipoliake:

Iianari esasedoti kes araun ainakinet naiianio kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT: eraas lu lukalaunak kama ejai esasedoti, nepepe katorob naijaŋio ka amurwo naedakakinitai: akaulo kaŋun epedori Enasirit aimat ebino.

“Ŋol ŋes ekisil loka Enasirit loiyapoi, ka ainakineteke neejai EJAKAIT kanuka eipoliake, ka ice da luepedori ŋesi ainakin: kwape ejaar aiyapositike naiyapoi, kwape kwaŋin ibusakinitor ŋes aswam kwape ajaar ekisil loka eipoliake.”
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Kolimok Aaron ka odweke ebe, Ilipakinete idwe luka Isirael arereŋ kwanata; ilimokinete kes ebe.
Kisirereŋ jo EJAKAIT, kidar jo:
Koinakis ikapolok luka Isirael, luapolokinito ikalia luka lukapapaakec; ŋul kes ikapolok luka atekerin, ŋul kes luayaito ŋul luaponi kimarai:
Koyaut ainakinetakec mama ejai EJAKAIT, agalin akanykape nuemukoritai, ka imoŋin itomon ka luarei; nulukapolok iarei adiopegali, ŋolidiopet emoŋ: kijaikis kes koiŋaren kewema lokalaunan.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Kijau kes, tetere itwasamao kes aijaanakinia ewema loka airiamunun; iinakini kes Ilebin, ŋinituŋanan kwape ejaar aijaanakinike.”
Koyaŋa Musa agalin ka imoŋin, koinak kes Ilebin.
Koinak odwe luka Gereson agalin aarei ka imoŋin iwoŋon, kwape ajaar aijaanakinikec.
Koinak odwe luka Merari agalin aoŋon ka imoŋin ikanykauni, kwape ajaar aijaanakinikec, kakan naka Itamar okoku loka Aaron esasedoti.
Konye mam abu koinak odwe luka Kokat idiobore: naarai aijaanakin naka aibois nakalaunan nakec; adakenenete kokeperinikec.
Koinakis ikapolok kanuka atiakunio naka etem kapaaran naenyonyoanakinere akinyet, ikapolok kes apotu koinakis ainakinetekec kakonyen nuka etem.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar, “Einanakinete ainakinetakec, ŋolikapolon kapaaranike, kanuka atiakunio naka etem.”
Ŋol loabu koinak ainakinet kapaaran nasodit ŋes Nason okoku loka Aminadab, loka ateker naka Yuda:
Ainakineteke ŋes atuba naka epuesa, alaŋiruke isekelin akwatat ka akaisauni, ka atany naka epuesa naka isekelin akaisakanykaarei, kwape ajaar esekel
Akaale da naka esabu naka isekelin itomon, ileleba lukisupurununo:
Ka emoŋ lotobait ediopet, ka emerekek ediopet, ka imerekek yenikiliokit yenika ekaru ediopet, kanuka ainakinet naicweio;
Ekoroi da ediopet kanuka ainakinet naka adiakaret;

Ido kanuka asubanit naka ainakineta nuka ainapakin, imoŋin iarei, ka imerekekin ikany, ka ikorwa ikany, ka imerekekin ikany lukiliok luka ekaru ediopet: ŋin ŋes ainakinet naka Nason okoku loka Aminadab.
Kapaaran nakiareit abu Netanel okoku loka Suar, ekapolon loka Isakar koinak:

Abu koinak kanuka ainakineteke atuba naka epuesa, alaŋiruke isekelin akwatat ka akaisauni, ka atany naka epuesa naka isekelin akaisakanykaarei, kwape ajaar esekel loka aibois nakalaunan; kes aarei kere kileleba akiria nuidicic nuinyalakinitai akinyet, kanuka ainakinet naka akiria;
Akaale da naka esabu naka isekelin itomon, ileleba lukisupurununo;
Ka emoŋ lotobait ediopet, ka emerekek ediopet, ka imerekek yenikiliokit yenika ekaru ediopet, kanuka ainakinet naicweio;
Ekoroi da ediopet kanuka ainakinet naka adiakaret;

Ido kanuka asubanit naka ainakineta nuka ainapakin, imoŋin iarei, ka imerekekin ikany, ka ikorwa ikany, ka imerekekin ikany lukiliok luka ekaru ediopet: ŋin ŋes ainakinet naka Netanel okoku loka Suar.
Kapaaran nakiwuniet Eliab okoku loka Kelon, ekapolon loka idwe luka Sebulun:

Ainakineteke ŋes atuba naka epuesa, alaŋiruke isekelin akwatat ka akaisauni, ka atany naka epuesa naka isekelin akaisakanykaarei, kwape ajaar esekel loka aibois nakalaunan; kes aarei kere kileleba akiria nuidicic nuinyalakinitai akinyet, kanuka ainakinet naka akiria;
Akaale da naka esabu naka isekelin itomon, ileleba lukisupurununo;
Ka emoŋ lotobait ediopet, ka emerekek ediopet, ka imerekek yenikiliokit yenika ekaru ediopet, kanuka ainakinet naicweio;
Ekoroi da ediopet kanuka ainakinet naka adiakaret;
Ido kanuka asubanit naka ainakineta nuka ainapakin, imoŋin iarei, ka imerekekin ikany, ka ikorwa ikany, ka imerekekin ikany lukiliok luka ekaru ediopet: ŋin ŋes ainakinet naka Eliab okoku loka Kelon.
Kapaaran nakiwoŋonet Elisur okoku loka Sedeur, ekapolon loka idwe luka Reuben:

Ainakineteke ŋes atuba naka epuesa, alaŋiruke isekelin akwatat ka akaisauni, ka atany naka epuesa naka isekelin akaisakanykaarei, kwape ajaar esekel loka aibois nakalaunan; kes aarei kere kileleba akiria nuidicic nuinyalakinitai akinyet, kanuka ainakinet naka akiria;
Akaale da naka esabu naka isekelin itomon, ileleba lukisupurununo;
Ka emoŋ lotobait ediopet, ka emerekek ediopet, ka imerekek yenikiliokit yenika ekaru ediopet, kanuka ainakinet naicweio;
Ekoroi da ediopet kanuka ainakinet naka adiakaret;

Ido kanuka asubanit naka ainakineta nuka ainapakin, imoŋin iarei, ka imerekekin ikany, ka ikorwa ikany, ka imerekekin ikany lukiliok luka ekaru ediopet: ŋin ŋes ainakinet naka Elisur okoku loka Sedeur.
Kapaaran nakikanyet Selumiel okoku loka Surisadai, ekapolon loka idwe luka Simeon:

Ainakineteke ŋes atuba naka epuesa, alaŋiruke isekelin akwatat ka akaisauni, ka atany naka epuesa naka isekelin akaisakanykaarei, kwape ajaar esekel loka aibois nakalaunan; kes aarei kere kileleba akiria nuidicic nuinyalakinitai akinyet, kanuka ainakinet naka akiria:
Akaale da naka esabu naka isekelin itomon, ileleba lukisupurununo;
Ka emoŋ lotobait ediopet, ka emerekek ediopet, ka imerekek yenikiliokit yenika ekaru ediopet, kanuka ainakinet naicweio;
Ekoroi da ediopet kanuka ainakinet naka adiakaret;

Ido kanuka asubanit naka ainakineta nuka ainapakin, imoŋin iarei, ka imerekekin ikany, ka ikorwa ikany, ka imerekekin ikany lukiliok luka ekaru ediopet: ŋin ŋes ainakinet naka Selumiel okoku loka Surisadai.

Ainakineteke ŋes atuba naka epuesa, alaŋiruke isekelin akwatat ka akaisauni, ka atany naka epuesa naka isekelin akaisakanykaarei, kwape ajaar esekel loka aibois nakalaunan; kes aarei kere kileleba akiria nuidicic nuinyalakinitai akinyet, kanuka ainakinet naka akiria;
Akaale da naka esabu naka isekelin itomon, ileleba lukisupurununo;
Ka emoŋ lotobait ediopet, ka emerekek ediopet, ka imerekek yenikiliokit yenika ekaru ediopet, kanuka ainakinet naicweio;
Ekoroi da ediopet kanuka ainakinet naka adiakaret;

Ido kanuka asubanit naka ainakineta nuka ainapakin, imoŋin iarei, ka imerekekin ikany, ka ikorwa ikany, ka imerekekin ikany lukiliok luka ekaru ediopet: ŋin ŋes ainakinet naka Eliasap okoku loka Deuel.

Ainakineteke ŋes atuba naka epuesa, alaŋiruke isekelin akwatat ka akaisauni, ka atany naka epuesa naka isekelin akaisakanykaarei, kwape ajaar esekelloka aibois nakalaunan; kes aarei kere kileleba akiria nuidicic nuinyalakinitai akinyet, kanuka ainakinet naka akiria;
Akaale da naka esabu naka isekelin itomon, ileleba lukisupurununo:
Ka emoŋ lotobait ediopet, ka emerekek ediopet, ka imerekek yenikiliokit yenika ekaru ediopet, kanuka ainakinet naicweio;
Ekoroi da ediopet kanuka ainakinet naka adiakaret;

Ido kanuka asubanit naka ainakineta nuka ainapakin, imoŋin iarei, ka imerekekin ikany, ka ikorwa ikany, ka imerekekin ikany lukiliok luka ekaru ediopet: ŋin ŋes ainakinet naka Elisama okoku loka Amikud.

Ainakineteke ŋes atuba naka epuesa, alaŋiruke isekelin akwatat ka akaisauni, ka atany naka epuesa naka isekelin akaisakanykaarei, kwape ajaar esekel loka aibois nakalaunan; kes aarei kere kileleba akiria nuidicic nuinyalakinitai akinyet, kanuka ainakinet naka akiria;
Akaale da naka esabu naka isekelin itomon, ileleba lukisupurununo:
Ka emoŋ lotobait ediopet, ka emerekek ediopet, ka imerekek yenikiliokit yenika ekaru ediopet, kanuka ainakinet naicweio;
Ekoroi da ediopet kanuka ainakinet naka adiakaret;

Ido kanuka asubanit naka ainakineta nuka ainapakin, imoŋin iarei, ka imerekekin ikany, ka ikorwa ikany, ka imerekekin ikany lukiliok luka ekaru ediopet: ŋin ŋes ainakinet naka Gamaliel okoku loka Pedasur.
Kapaaran nakikanyetekaoŋon Abidan okoku loka Gideoni, ekapolon loka idwe luka Benyamin:

Ainakineteke ŋes atuba naka epuesa, alaŋiruke isekelin akwatat ka akaisauni, ka atany naka epuesa naka isekelin akaisakanykaarei, kwape ajaar esekel loka aibois nakalaunan; kes aarei kere kileleba akiria nuidicic nuinyalakinitai akinyet kanuka ainakinet naka akiria;
Akaale da naka esabu naka isekelin itomon, ileleba lukisupurununo;
Ka emoŋ lotobait ediopet, ka emerekek ediopet, ka imerekek yenikiliokit yenika ekaru ediopet, kanuka ainakinet naicweio;
Ekoroi da ediopet kanuka ainakinet naka adiakaret;

Ido kanuka asubanit naka ainakineta nuka ainapakin, imoŋin iarei, ka imerekekin ikany, ka ikorwa ikany, ka imerekekin ikany lukiliok luka ekaru ediopet: Ŋin ŋes ainakinet naka Abidan okoku loka Gideoni.

Ainakineteke ŋes atuba naka epuesa, alaŋiruke isekelin akwatat ka akaisauni, ka atany naka epuesa naka isekelin akaisakanykaarei, kwape ajaar esekel loka aibois nakalaunan; kes aarei kere kileleba akiria nuidicic nuinyalakinitai akinyet, kanuka ainakinet naka akiria;
Akaale da naka esabu naka isekelin itomon, ileleba lukisupurununo;
Ka emoŋ lotobait ediopet, ka emerekek ediopet, ka imerekek yenikiliokit yenika ekaru ediopet, kanuka ainakinet naicweio;
Ekoroi da ediopet kanuka ainakinet naka adiakaret:

Ido kanuka asubanit naka ainakineta nuka ainapakin, imoŋin iarei, ka imerekekin ikany, ka ikorwa ikany, ka imerekekin ikany lukiliok luka ekaru ediopet: ŋin ŋes ainakinet naka Akiesar okoku loka Amisadai.

Ainakineteke ŋes atuba naka epuesa, alaŋiruke isekelin akwatat ka akaisauni, ka atany naka epuesa naka isekelin akaisakanykaarei, kwape ajaar esekel loka aibois nakalaunan; kes aarei kere kileleba akiria nuidicic nuinyalakinitai akinyet, kanuka ainakinet naka akiria:
Akaale da naka esabu naka isekelin itomon, ileleba lukisupurununo;
Ka emoŋ lotobait ediopet, ka emerekek ediopet, ka imerekek yenikiliokit yenika ekaru ediopet, kanuka ainakinet naicweio;
Ekoroi da ediopet kanuka ainakinet naka adiakaret;

Ido kanuka asubanit naka ainakineta nuka ainapakin, imoŋin iarei, ka imerekekin ikany, ka ikorwa ikany, ka imerekekin ikany lukiliok luka ekaru ediopet: ŋin ŋes ainakinet naka Pagiel okoku loka Ocuran.

Ainakineteke ŋes atuba naka epuesa, alaŋiruke isekelin akwatat ka akaisauni, ka atany naka epuesa naka isekelin akaisakanykaarei, kwape ajaar esekel loka aibois nakalaunan; kes aarei kere kileleba akiria nuidicic nuinyalakinitai akinyet, kanuka ainakinet naka akiria;
Akaale da naka esabu naka isekelin itomon, ileleba lukisupurununo;
Ka emoŋ lotobait ediopet, ka emerekek ediopet, ka imerekek yenikiliokit yenika ekaru ediopet, kanuka ainakinet naicweio;
Ekoroi da ediopet kanuka ainakinet naka adiakaret;
Ido kanuka asubanit naka ainakineta nuka ainapakin, imoŋin iarei, ka imerekekin ikany, ka ikorwa ikany, ka imerekekin ikany lukiliok luka ekaru ediopet: ŋin ŋes ainakinet naka Akira okoku loka Enan.

Alaŋiru naka ŋinituba naka epuesa isekelin akwatat ka akaisauni, ka ninitany naka epuesa isekelin akaisakanykaarei: epuesa kere loka iboro Ŋul isekelin ilukumin iarei ka akwat aoŋon, kwape ajaar esekel loka aibois nakalaunan;
Akaalei atomon ka nuarei nuka esabu nuileleba lukisupurununo, ŋinidiopet alaŋiruke isekelin itomon, kwape ajaar esekel loka aibois nakalaunan: esabu kere loka akaalei isekelin akwatat ka akaisaarei:

Imoŋin kere luka ainakinet naicweio itoba itomon ka luarei, ka imerekekin itomon ka luarei, ka imerekekin lukiliok luka ekaru ediopet itomon ka luarei, ka ainakinetekec naka akiria: ka ikorwa araun ainakinet naka adiakaret itomon ka luarei:

Ka imoŋin kere luka asubanit naka ainakineta nuka ainapakin, itoba akaisaarei ka luoŋon, ka imerekekin akaisakanykape, ka ikorwa akaisakanykape, ka imerekekin lukiliok luka ekaru ediopet akaisakanykape. Ŋin ŋes atiakunio naka etem, kedau ainyonyoanakinio.
“Kolimok Aaron ebe, Naisipokinia ijo atalai, atalai akanykaarei kes ecaete koiŋaren kepir loka atala.”
Kiswama Aaron kwaŋin; kosipok atalai nen tetere ecaete koiŋaren kepir loka atala, kwape kicorakinia EJAKAIT Musa.
Eswamatai epir loka atala kwanata, esabu loerukuk; kwapuke kiton aturoke da korau aswam naerukuk: kwape ajaar aput naabu EJAKAIT kitodikinite Musa, kwaŋin kiswamau ŋesi epir loka atala.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
