“Kolem Ilebin kodwe luka Isirael, kitalau kes.
Ikonakini ijo neta aitalaun kes: ibwatakini kes akipi nuitesegaarete, kobarenoto da kes akuan kere, ido kilotata ikecenapen, kitalaunos bonik.
Kosodete ayaŋaar emoŋ lotobait, ka ainakineteke naka akiria, akiria nuidicic nuinyalakinitai akinyet, iyaŋaari ijo emoŋ lotobait ece araun ainakinet naka adiakaret.
Isukunyikini ijo Ilebin kiŋaren kewema loka airiamunun: itukonokini da ekodet kere loka idwe luka Isirael.
Isukunyikini Ilebin akonyen nuka EJAKAIT: idokonokinete idwe luka Isirael akecekanin oLebin:
Ŋanari Aaron Ilebin kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT araut ainakinet naiianio, kanuka idwe luka Isirael, tetere eraunete luiswamaete aijaanakin EJAKAIT.
Idokonokinete Ilebin akecekanin akwes nuka imoŋin lutoba: iinakini ijo ediopet araun ainakinet naka adiakaret, ediopet da araun ainakinet naicweio mama ejai EJAKAIT, alucio Ilebin.
Itobwoi Ilebin kakonyen nuka Aaron, kakonyen da nuka odweke, iinakini kes araut ainakinet naiianio mama ejai EJAKAIT.
Ido akaulo kaŋun elomarete Ilebin toma aswam naka aijaanakin naka ewema loka airiamunun: italauni ijo kes, iinakini kes araut ainakinet naiianio.
Naarai einakina kesi cut mamakaŋ kodwe luka Isirael; ayanau kes mamakaŋ aibois naka ŋul kere luepukorete aliligeta, kes ikiyaik kere luka idwe luka Isirael.
Naarai ikiyaik kere luka idwe luka Isirael eraas lukaŋ, etuŋanan ka etiaŋ da: kapaaran naadanyia ikiyaik kere luka akwap nako Misiri abu ketalau kes kanukaŋ.
Ayaŋa Ilebin aibois naka ikiyaik kere kotoma odwe luka Isirael.

Ido ainak Ilebin araut ainakinet mama ejai Aaron ka odweke kodwe luka Isirael, aijaanakin owema loka airiamunun kanuka idwe luka Isirael, alucio idwe luka Isirael: tetere mam atular ebunokini idwe luka Isirael, arai kikunyakis idwe luka Isirael die kaibois nakalaunan.”
Apotu Musa ka Aaron ka ekodet kere loka idwe luka Isirael kiswamakis Ilebin kwaŋin: kwape ajaatar kere nuecorakinit EJAKAIT Musa kanuka Ilebin, apotu idwe luka Isirael kiswamakis kes kwaŋin.
Kitesegaros Ilebin karonisikec, kilota da ikecenapen; koinak Aaron kes araut ainakinet naijaŋio kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT: ido koluc Aaron kes aitalaun kes.
Akaulo kaŋun kolomasi Ilebin toma aswam naka aijaanakin naka ewema loka airiamunun kakonyen nuka Aaron, kakonyen da nuka odweke: kwape ecorakinitor EJAKAIT Musa nuka Ilebin, kiswamakis kes kwaŋin.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Nu kes akiro nuka Ilebin: ageun kaluka ikar akaisaarei ka lukany ka luedeparito, kes elomarete akapakin aijaanakin kaswam naka ewema loka airiamunun:
Ido kedolo ikar lukapoloukec akaisakany itasaŋete akapakina aswam, mam bobo ijaanakinete:
Konye iŋarakinete iinacanakec kotoma owema loka airiamunun, aidar nuititinitai, konye mam ijaanakinete. Iswamakini ijo Ilebin kwaŋin kanuka nuititinitai.”
“Bobo da ibus idwe luka Isirael aidar aleleŋio kapakike naeseunitai.
Kapaaran nakitomonet kaoŋon naka elap kalo, idarete ŋes atiboŋ naka apakike naeseunitai: kwape ejaatar ikekisila kere, ido kwape ejaatar aicorakinetake kere, idarete ŋes.”
Kolimok Musa idwe luka Isirael aidar alclenio.
Kidarete aleleŋio kotoma olap losodit, kapaaran nakitomonet kaoŋon naka elap, eboŋ, kamodiŋ naka Sinai: kwape ajaatar kere nuecorakinit EJAKAIT Musa, kiswamata idwe luka Isirael kwaŋin.
Ajaas ituŋa ice lumam alaete kanuka akuan naka etuŋanan lokatwan, kanuka ŋun mam apedorito aidar aleleŋio kapaaran kaŋin: kopotu mama ejai Musa ka Aaron kapaaran kaŋin.

Kotemasi ituŋa ŋul ŋes atiar, “Mam sio kilai kanuka akuan naka etuŋanan lokatwan: kanukinyo kirebokinitere sio, komam kicamakinitai ainakin ainakinet naka EJAKAIT kotoma apakike naeseunitai nepepe kidwe luka Isirael?”
Kotema kes Musa atiar, “Kidareutu; kapup ber nukecorakini EJAKAIT kanukus.”
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Kolimok idwe luka Isirael ebe, Arai mam ituŋanan kayesi arai yenika aturiokus elai kanuka akuan nakatwan, ido arai ejai ituŋanan toma alosit naelwana, ibus ŋes aidar aleleŋio kama ka EJAKAIT;
Idarete ŋes eboŋ kapaaran nakitomonet kaoŋon kotoma olap lokiareit; enyamete kimugatin lumam itubuunitoi ka edia loedwar.
Sirikideut idiobore aitodol tupuruc, karaida aibil adiokoit: idarete kesi aleleŋio kwape ejaar ekisil kere.

Konye ituŋanan yenelai, komam ejai toma alosit, kosodi aiŋer aidar aleleŋio, egelario ituŋanan ŋin kotuŋake; naarai mam abu koinak ainakinet naka EJAKAIT kotoma apakike naeseunitai, ibwoki ituŋanan ŋin adiakareteke.

Ido arai kebu emoit aiboienen nepepe kayes, kosodi aidar aleleŋio kama ka EJAKAIT; kwape ejaar ekisil loka aleleŋio, ido kwape ejaar aicorakineteke, iswamai kwaŋin: ijaunos kekisil ediopet, yes kere, imoit ka iuriat.”
Kojaenena kwaŋin duc: korapianari ŋes edou paaran, kotakanunenei akim kuare.
Naelemanarere edou kokuju owema, akauloke konyounete idwe luka Isirael alosit: ido toma aibois naasiponokin edou, ŋina ŋes edukurenenete idwe luka Isirael.
Alosenenete idwe luka Isirael kaicorakinet naka EJAKAIT, ido edukurenenete da kaicorakinet naka EJAKAIT: eboienenete koidukurunukec adaun apak kere naajaar edou kuju owema lokalaunan.
Ido naasalanakinia edou kuju owema lokalaunan apaarasia nuipu, edarenenete idwe luka Isirael akirot naka EJAKAIT, komam elosete.
Acepakio ajaenena edou kuju owema lokalaunan apaarasia adis; kosodi kwape ajaar aicorakinet naka EJAKAIT eboienenete koidukurunukec, ido alosenenete kwape ajaar aicorakinet naka EJAKAIT.
Acepakio ajaenena edou kuju owema eboŋ aitodol tupuruc; naalemanarere edou tupuruc, alosenenete kesi: arai kerai paaran arai kuare, naalemanarere edou, alosenenete kesi.
Arai apaarasia aarei arai elap, arai ekaru, esalakinia edou kuju owema, iboie kanen, eboienenete idwe luka Isirael koidukurunukec komam elosete: konye naalemarere kolosete.
Edukurenenete kaicorakinet naka EJAKAIT, ido alosenenete da kaicorakinet naka EJAKAIT: edarenenete akirot naka EJAKAIT, kaicorakinet naka EJAKAIT kama ka Musa.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Kiswamau arupepen aarei nuka epuesa; kiswamau ka loerukuk: itwasamai kes kanuka anyaraununena ekodet, ido kanuka alosit anyoun kaneidukurete.
Ido naekutanakinere kes, etukokin ekodet kere mama ijai kokek loka ewema loka airiamunun.
Konye arai kekutakin adiopet, etukokinos ikapolok luepolokinito ilukumin luka Isirael mama ijai.
Ido naikutakiniata naka elulu, enyounete ituŋa lukoidukurun luka ari nakokide alosit.
Naikutakiniata da naka elulu nakiareit, enyounete ituŋa lukoidukurun luka ari naka eŋalakimak alosit: ekutanakinete aikwenyar kanuka alositokec.
Konye naekotokinere arukokin ekodet nepepe, ikutanakinete, konye mam ikutakinete naka elulu.
Odwe luka Aaron, isasedotin, kes ekutanakinete arupepen; ido eraunos ŋun ekisil kamakus ikar kere anatar aturiokus kere.
Ido nailosioto aitiji lokasurup lokimwanit yes kakwapukus, ŋes ikutakiniata naka elulu karupepen; kiitunio yes kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT Ekusideke, kitajario da yes kakonyen nuka lukasurupokus.

Kapaaran da naka aiyalamakus, kopucinokus lueseunitai, kotoma ailamunun da naka ilapiokus, ikutaaakinete arupepen kainakinetakus nuicweio, kasuban da nuka ainakineta nuka ainapakin; eraunos da kamakus aisiitunet kakonyen nuka Edekekus: arai eoŋ EJAKAIT Ekusideke.”
Kobwota idwe luka Isirael kwape ajaatar alositokec anyoun kamodiŋ naka Sinai; kosipokin edou amodiŋ naka Paran.
Kogeut alositekec kwape ajaar aicorakinet naka EJAKAIT kama ka Musa.
Kisiaununei emedera loka iidukurun luka idwe luka Yuda aitobwosio kwape ajaatar irioŋetakec: ido loapolokinit erioŋeteke ŋes Nason okoku loka Aminadab.
Ido loapolokinit erioŋet loka ateker naka idwe luka Isakar ŋes Netanel okoku loka Suar.
Loapolokinit erioŋet loka ateker naka idwe luka Sebulun ŋes Eliab okoku loka Kelon.
Kitobwotai emedera loka iidukurun luka Reuben kwape ajaatar irioŋetakec: loapolokinit da erioŋeteke ŋes Elisur okoku loka Sedeur.
Loapolokinit erioŋet loka ateker naka idwe luka Simeon ŋes Selumiel okoku loka Surisadai.
Loapolokinit erioŋet loka ateker naka idwe luka Gad ŋes. Eliasap okoku loka Deuel.
Kobwota Ikokatin, kibwokito da iboro luka aibois nakalaunan: ebubuonokinete kwi ewema lokalaunan eriŋa kes kedolo.
Kitobwotai emedera loka iidukurun luka idwe luka Epuraim kwape ajaatar irioŋetakec: loapolokinit da erioŋeteke ŋes Elisama okoku loka Amikud.
Loapolokinit erioŋet loka ateker naka idwe luka Manase ŋes Gamaliel okoku loka Pedasur.
Loapolokinit erioŋet loka ateker naka idwe luka Benyamin ŋes Abidan okoku loka Gideoni.
Loapolokinit erioŋet loka ateker naka idwe luka Aser ŋes Pagiel okoku loka Ocuran.
Loapolokinit erioŋet loka ateker naka idwe luka Naputali ŋes Akira okoku loka Enan.
Ekonenenei nen alosit naka idwe luka Isirael kwape ajaatar irioŋetakec; kobwota.
Kotema ŋes atiar, “Mam alosi; konye aboŋori bukosi, mama ejai atekereka.”
Kotema atiar, “Sirikiinyei sio, keŋaiŋait; naarai ijeni kwape kilosio aidukur toma amodiŋ, kwaŋin iraun ijo akosikonye.
Ejaun kwanata, arai kiupakin oni, eebo ejaun kwanata ebe, niniiokis kere nakiswamakini sio EJAKAIT, ŋipeŋin kiswamakini isio da jo.”
Korapiarite kes edou loka EJAKAIT paaran naabwosiata koidukurun.
Naeyenununa da kotemanari atiar, “Koboŋu, wu EJAKAIT, neejaas ilukumin itomon luka ilukumin luka Isirael.”
Komonyata ituŋa mama ejai Musa; kilip Musa EJAKAIT, kodunei do akim.
Komaikinai ekiror loka aibois ŋin Tabera:
Kiitu agaria nukinyamenenei atai kotoma Misiri; akolil, ka amonyon, ka edia, ka itugulun, ka lukinyalet.
Konye kwana iriono ekositau; emamei idiobore da: emamei idiobore yenikitei dimarai emanu lo.”
Kiledokinos ituŋa atukonokin ŋes, kiriata kakanasia, korukoto kokisun, kipooto kamoti, kilunulunata imugatin: kosubite bala enyamete kesi edia loinyalakinitai akinyet.
Nakejaununotor akopyo oidukurun kuare, koiaunun emanu da.
Kopup Musa ituŋa emonyete kokaliakec kere, ŋinituŋanan kokek loka ewemake: kinep noi anyunyura naka EJAKAIT; kokadak Musa.
Kotema Musa EJAKAIT atiar, “Kanukinyo iswamakinia ijo ekonibulesit erono? Kanukinyo da mam eoŋ adumunitor asianut kakonyenekon, tape ijo kisibwoki eoŋ alaŋir naka ituŋa kalu kere?
Eoŋ kapotuun kereka ituŋa lu kere? ido eoŋ kedouni kes? Tape ijo kitemar eoŋ ebe, ‘Kodakaa kes katorobukon kwape edakia ekasaan ikoku yenenaki, aitodol akwap naibu kisiyapoik lukapapaakec.’
Ai bo alemunia eoŋ akiriŋ naainakini ituŋa lu kere? naarai emonyete mamaka ebe, ‘Koinakinai sio akiriŋ, kanyama.’
Mam eoŋ apedori bon aibwok ituŋa lu kere, naarai kalanirikinito noi.
Arai kiswamanakini ijo eoŋ kwaŋin, keŋaiŋait koar katipet, arai adumunit asianut kakonyenekon; kenyek aanyun ican luetia nen.”
Eiesuni eoŋ da einer kajo kanen; alemari ece komoyo loijaatar ijo, kasodi aibwaikin mamakec; ibwokete nepepe kajo alaŋir naka ituŋa, tetere mam jo bon ibwoki.

Kolimok ituŋa ebe, ‘Kitalaunos eroko moi edoluno, inyamete da akiriŋ; naarai imonyata kaki nuka EJAKAIT ebe, “Iŋai kitanyami sio akiriŋ? naarai ajok kole isio aiboi koMisiri”: kanuka ŋun kiinaki EJAKAIT akiriŋ, inyamete.
Mere adiopepaaran bon inyamiata, karaida apaarasia aarei karaida apaarasia akany, karaida apaarasia akaisaarei;
Konye elap kere, aitodol naelomunia kokumesikus, nekititirikinio cut: naarai iŋeroto EJAKAIT loejai mamakus, komonyete kakonyeneke ebe, “Kanukinyo kinyounio koMisiri?”’ ”
Kotema Musa atiar, “Ituŋa luajai eoŋ mamakec imwaasi ikiliok ilukumin akwat akanykape; ido itema ijo atiar, ‘Ainakini kes akiriŋ, konyama adaun elap kere?’
Earakinio isipanin luka amerekekin ka luka aituk aisimonikinia kes? arai bo etukonokinio agaria kere nuka aŋolol aisimonikinia kes?”
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar, “Euriana kereka akan naka EJAKAIT? ianyuni do arai itodolikinio akakiro mama ijai arai bo mam.”
Koloma Musa, kolimok ituŋa akiro nuka EJAKAIT: kotukok imakio luka ituŋa akaisakanykaarei, kisibwo kes aisirimor Ewema.
Kijesun EJAKAIT kotoma odou, kiner kaŋes, kolema da ece komoyo loaiaatar ŋesi, kibwaik omakio akaisakanykaarei: kosodi kiboikin emoyo mamakec, kodwarata, kitanaŋata nepenen.
Koker ekatumunan, kolimok Musa ebe, “Edwarete Eludad ka Medad koidukurun.”
Koboŋok Yosua okoku loka Nun, ekejaanakinan loka Musa ameun koiditeuke ebe, “Ejakaitika Musa, kitikok kes.”
Kotema Musa ŋes atiar, “Kikokotik ijo kanukaŋ? Tiejok ituŋa kere luka EJAKAIT koraunos inabin, tikibwaiki da EJAKAIT emoyoke mamakec!”
Koboŋosi Musa ka imakio luka Isirael oidukurun.
Konyout ituŋa apaaran ŋin kere, ka akuare da kere, ka apaaran kere naatupakini, kotukonokis alurueik: ŋin yenatukokinit nuikidioko atukokinit ikomerin
Aroko akiriŋ ejai okelakec, aroko da enyakao, kinep anyunyura naka EJAKAIT aluikin ituŋa, kodany EJAKAIT ituŋa katular naepol noi.
Komaikinai aibois ŋin ekiror Kiburot-kataaba:
Kotemasi atiar, “Enerata kereka EJAKAIT ka Musa bon? Mam ŋes kinerit kasio da?” Kopup EJAKAIT ŋun.
Kiyapeperana Musa noi adepar ituŋa kere luajaas akwapin.
Atipet kotema EJAKAIT Musa ka Aaron ka Miriam da, atiar, “Kopotu yes iuni owema loka airiamunun.” Kolomasi kesi iuni.
Kijesun EJAKAIT kotoma opir loka edou, kobwo kokek loka Ewema, konyara Aaron ka Miriam: kikunyakis kesi.
Kotema atiar, “Kiirasi kwana akakiro: arai ejai enabi kotomakus, eoŋ EJAKAIT etejenun mamake kotoma otapo eneri kaŋes kotoma airuj.
Mam ekakejaanakinan Musa ikoni nen; erai lomunot kotoma togoka kere:
Kinera kaŋes kaituke, kaitebeikin, mere kakiro nuimunonoro; ido eanyuni ŋesi asima naka EJAKAIT: aso kanukinyo mam ipotu kokuriakarotor aluikin ekakejaanakinan Musa koinerekus?”
Kinep anyunyura naka EJAKAIT aluikin ŋes; konyou.
Konyou da edou kokuju owema; ido koany, ebokoror akuan naka Miriam atapon: kite Aaron Miriam, ido koany, korai nakatapon.
Kotema Aaron Musa atiar, “Wu okwe ekajakait, keŋaiŋait, sirikisibwok sio aronis, naarai kiswama nukabaŋaanut, kidiaka da.
Keŋaiŋait, kinyeik ŋesi aisub bala yenikatwan, yenemunauna atutubet naka akuanake elomuni kakoik naka totoke.”
Kiworo Musa mama ejai EJAKAIT atiar, “Kitaŋaleu ŋes, wu Edeke, keŋaiŋait.”

Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar, “Arai kimuikinit papake ŋes aimul oreeteke, ti kereka mam ŋes kiruma ileic apaarasia akanykaarei? Ibus kogolokinai ŋes kiŋa kiidukurun apaarasia akanykaarei, akaulo kaŋun inyakunio ŋes toma bobo.”
Kogoloroi Miriam kiŋa kiidukurun apaarasia akanykaarei: mam ituŋa da apotu koloto aitodol naenyakunere bobo Miriam toma.
Ido akaulo kaŋun, konyout ituŋa koKaserot, kidukuroto amodiŋ naka Paran.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Kijuka ituŋa, korota akwap naka Kanaan, naainakini idwe luka Isirael: ijukari etuŋanan loka ninireker naka lukapapaakec, ŋolidiopet loepol kamakec.”
Kijuka Musa kes anyoun kamodiŋ naka Paran kwape ajaar aicorakinet naka EJAKAIT: kes kere ituŋa luapolokinito idwe luka Isirael.
Ikecekiroria da lu: loka ateker naka Reuben ŋes Samua okoku loka Sacur,
loka ateker naka Simeon, Sapat okoku loka Kori.
Loka ateker naka Yuda, Kaleb okoku loka Yepune.
Loka ateker naka Isakar, Igal okoku loka Yosep.
Loka ateker naka Epuraim, Kosea okoku loka Nun.
Loka ateker naka Benyamin, Paluti okoku loka Rapu.
Loka ateker naka Sebulun, Gadiel okoku loka Sodi.
Loka ateker naka Yosep, ŋes leka ateker naka Manase, Gadi okoku loka Susi.
Loka ateker naka Dan, Amiel okoku loka Gemali.
Loka ateker naka Aser, Setur okoku loka Mikael.
Loka ateker naka Naputali, Nabi okoku loka Bopasi.
Loka ateker naka Gad, Geuel okoku loka Maki.
Ŋul kes ikiroria luka ituŋa luejukari Musa airot akwap. Komaik Musa Kosea okoku loka Nun Yosua.
Koanyut akwap, kwape eputor; ka ituŋa luiboiete kotoma, arai eraas luegogoŋ arai enonok, arai ikidioko arai ipu;
Ido kwape ejaar akwap naiboioto kesi kotoma, arai ejok arai erono; kwape ejaatar da ireria luiboioto kesi kotoma, arai ludukurun, arai luebwaunitai kabwas;
Kwape ejaar akwap, arai naapusuk arai naakurae, arai ejaas amagoron, arai emameete, Kotitiŋikis yesi, koyauniata da adioraito nuka akwap.” Kerai na apak naka imusabibun luageenenete atiokore.
Kosodete kodokasi korota akwap anyoun kamodiŋ naka Sin aitodol Rekob kiton alomaret Kamat.
Kodokasi kari naka Eŋalakimak, kodoloto Keburon; ajaas nen Akiman, Sesai ka Talimai, idwe luka Anak. (Adukitai Keburon ikar ikanykaarei eroko Soan kotoma Misiri.)
Kodolut aditot naka Esukot, kojeput kanen atenut naajai aibuŋet adiopet naka emusabibu, kidielata iarei kakitoi; koyautu da araito nuka ekamamaga, ka nuka etini.
Komaikinai aibois ŋin aditot naka Esukol,
Koboŋosi kairot akwap kedaunos apaarasia akaisaoŋon.
Kolototo kopotu neejai Musa ka Aaron, ka ekodet kere loka idwe luka Isirael, kamodiŋ naka Paran, koKades; koinut kes ka ekodet kere akirot, kitodikis da kes araito nuka akwap.
Kolimokis ŋes ebe, “Kidol akwap naibu ijo kijuka sio, abeit erai naeleleete akile ka esik; ido nu kes araitoke.
Konye ituŋa luiboiete kakwap eraas luegogoŋ, ireriakec da ebwaitai, epolok noi: bobo da kipou kaanyutu kaŋina idwe luka Anak.
Iboie Amalek kakwap naka ari naka Eŋalakimak; iboie da Ekitit ka Eyebusit ka Emorait koroŋan: iboie da Ekanaanit kariri naka aŋolol, ka ariri naka Yorodan da.”
Konye ituŋa luaupara kaŋes kotemasi atiar, “Mam kipedori asurokin ituŋa; naarai egogoŋ kesi adepar oni,”
Koinut idwe luka Isirael akiro nueroko nuka akwap naapotu korota, ebe, “Akwap nakitoro kirosi, erai akwap naenyamanari luiboiete kotoma; ituŋa da lukipou kaanyutu kotoma eraas ituŋa luikososoete.
Kipou kaanyutu kaŋina da Inepilin,
Kodelo ekodet kere; komonya ituŋa akuare ŋin.
Kirurumata idwe luka Isirael kere aluikin Musa ka Aaron da: kobala ekodet kere kes ebe, “Tiejok arai katwakikinito akwap nako Misiri! Tiejok da arai katwakikinito amodiŋ na!
Kanukinyo kiyaunia EJAKAIT sio akwap na, adanyio kekileŋ? Anorokosi ka ikosidwe ludidik da araun lumejan: mam tiejok sio aboŋor Misiri?”
Kosodi Musa ka Aaron aibirokin kwap ebuburia, kakonyen nuka ekodet kere loka idwe luka Isirael.
Apotu Yosua okoku loka Nun ka Kaleb okoku loka Yepune luaraas iarei kaŋul kaluarosito akwap, koeilieilata ikecenapen:
Kolimokis ekodet kere loka idwe luka Isirael ebe, “Akwap, nakitor kirosi, erai akwap naitelekarit kajokis.
Arai kisiyalamikinit oni EJAKAIT, kiyai ŋesi oni akwap ŋin, kainakini oni da; akwap naeleleete akile ka esik.
Konye sirikipaliikis EJAKAIT, karaida aiyoŋ ituŋa luka akwap; naarai eraas atapawok; alemar etorubekec kamakec, ejai EJAKAIT nepepe kaoni: sirikiyoŋa kes.”
Konye akoto ekodet kere aibiribir kes kamor.
Kosodi aibuses naka EJAKAIT aitakanikin idwe kere luka Isirael kowema loka airiamunun.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar, “Itodolete ai ituŋa lu kamwanitos eoŋ? Itodolete da ai mam keyuunitos, kanuka aanyuneta kere nueswamak kes?
Adanyi kes katular, ademari kes airumet, etuluori jo ateker naepol naegogoŋ adepar kes.”

Elimokinete da luiboiete kakwap kaŋin: apuput ebe ijai ijo EJAKAIT kidiŋ kituŋa kalu: naarai kianyununo jo EJAKAIT kakonyen, ebwoi da ekonidou kamakec, iŋarenikinit kes, kepir loka edou paaran, ka epir loka akim kuare.
Aso arai kiara ijo ituŋa lu adaun cut, etemarete atekerin nuapuputu eemutukon atiar.
‘Kanu naarai mam EJAKAIT abu kopedo ayaun ituŋa ŋul toma akwap naabu kiyapoik kes, ŋes aarakinia kes amodiŋ.’
Aso keŋaiŋait, kopoloor apedor naka EJAKAIT kwape ejaatar nuibu ijo kiner ebe,

‘Iyapi EJAKAIT anyunyurikin, ileleba aitim, isioniei numam adolit ka aibucareta, lomam imarakini luegwaunito akirot araun ikadolitok; idopei kodwe numam adolit nuka lukapapakec, aitodol atur nakiwuniet ka nakiwoŋonet.’
Keŋaiŋait, kisioni numam adolit nuka ituŋa kalu kwape ejaar akoniitim naepol, kwape ibu kisionio ituŋa lu, anyoun koMisiri aitodol kwana.”
Konye abeit, kwape ajaria, ido kwape ilelebunor akwap kere aibuses naka EJAKAIT;
Naarai ituŋa ŋul kere luaanyutu akaibuses, ka aanyunetaka da, nuabu keswama koMisiri, kamodiŋ da, konye kakodokodata eoŋ irwan nu atomon, komam epupete ekaporoto;
Abeit mam eanyunete cut akwap naabu keyapoik lukapapaakec, karaida yenabu kamwan eoŋ kere mam eanyuni.
Konye Kaleb ekakejaanakinan, naarai ajaas kemoyo ece, ido karima eoŋ cut, ayai eoŋ ŋes akwap naabu ŋesi kolosite; aurike da irumi ŋes.
Iboiete Emalekait ka Ekanaanit kaditot: kibelokinos moi, koloto amodiŋ korot loebei Aŋolol Nakareŋan.”
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa ka Aaron atiar,
“Etodoli ai atitiŋikinit ekodet lo lokaronon, lokerurumakinit eoŋ? Apup airuruma naka idwe luka Isirael, nakerurumakinitotor eoŋ.
Kolimok kes ebe, Inera EJAKAIT atiar, Kwape ajaria, abeit kwape kilimokiniata akika, kwape kwaŋin da keswamakiniata:
Edoenenete atesinakus amodiŋ na; kere da luaponi kimarai kayesi, kwape ajaar etiaikus kere, ageun kaluka ikar akaisaarei ka luedeparito, lukerurumakis eoŋ.
Abeit mam ilomarete akwap, naabu eoŋ kario akakan ebe kesiboikini yes toma, dimarai Kaleb okoku loka Yepune ka Yosua okoku loka Nun.
Konye idwekus ludidik luibalasi yesi ebe eraunos lumejan, kes etolomari eoŋ, ido kes ejenunete akwap nainero yesi.
Konye yes, edoenenete akusitesin amodiŋ na.
Idwekus da eraunos ikerimok kotoma amodiŋ ikar akaisaoŋon, ibwokete eporokus, aitodol naedaikinotor atesinakus amodiŋ.
Kwape ejaar etiai loka apaarasia nuirosiata yes akwap, kes apaarasia akaisaoŋon, kanuka ŋinipaaran ekaru, ibwokiata numam adolitekus, kes ikar akaisaon on, ijenunete da apalunika.
Ener eoŋ EJAKAIT, abeit eswamakini eoŋ ŋun ekodet lo kere lokaronon, loetukokina nepepe asurokin eoŋ: amodiŋ na ŋes edaikinos, ido nen etwakikinete.”
Ituŋa ŋupeŋul luayaunete akiro nueroko aitoronia akwap, kotwaka atular kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT.
Konye Yosua okoku loka Nun, ka Kaleb okoku loka Yepune, kes apotu kojarata kotuŋa lualosito airot akwap.
Kotema Musa atiar, “Kanukinyo ipaariata kaicorakinet naka EJAKAIT, naarai emamuun asuliany?
Sirikidokasi, naarai mam EJAKAIT ejai kidiŋikus; kinyeis adanyio kakonyen nuka lukasurupokus.
Naarai ejaas ŋina kiŋarenikus Emalekait ka Ekanaanit, kidanyio kekileŋ: naarai iboŋut katupit EJAKAIT, kanuka ŋun mam EJAKAIT ejaun kayes.”
Konye koŋasikinos adokar kuju oroŋat: kwabo mam asaduku naka aitutuket naka EJAKAIT, ka Musa, apotu konyout koidukurun.
Kosodete Emalekait ka Ekanaanit lueboienenete koroŋat kaŋol aijesun, kodanya kes, kibirut kes, aitodol Koruma.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Kolimok idwe luka Isirael ebe, Naidolioto akwap naiboikinos, nakainakini yes.

Kosodete ainakin EJAKAIT ainakinet kakim, ainakinet naicweio, arai asubanit, aitodolio aiyaposit, arai ainakinet naka akote, arai kopucinokus luicorakinitai, aisuŋuuno EJAKAIT asakat naeur saa, kaituk arai kamerekekin:
Loeinakini akeinakinet einakini EJAKAIT ainakinet naka akiria naka idiopet kotomon yenika epa
Ka ebino kanuka ainakinet namatat, idiopet kooŋon yenika ekin, itemonokinete nepepe kainakinet naicweio arai kanuka asubanit kanuka ŋinimerekek yenididi.
Arai kanuka emerekek, itemonokini kanuka ainakinet naka akiria iarei kotomon luka epa loka akiria nuidicic nuinyalakinitai idiopet kouni yenika ekin loka akinyet:
Kanuka ainakinet namatat da iinakini idiopet kouni yenika ekin loka ebino, loka asakat naeur saa mama ejai EJAKAIT.
Naitemokinio emoŋ lotobait kanuka ainakinet naicweio, arai kanuka asubanit, aitodolio aiyaposit, arai kanuka ainakineta nuka ainapakin mama ejai EJAKAIT:
Ŋes einakinia ainakinet naka akiria nepepe kemon lotobait naka iuni kotomon luka epa loka akiria nuidicic nuinyalakinitai katutubet naka ekin loka akinyet.
Iinakini kanuka ainakinet namatat atutubet naka ekin loka ebino, kanuka ainakinet naeinakinere kakim, naka asakat naeur saa mama ejai EJAKAIT.
“Iswamaenenoo kwaŋin kanuka ŋolimoŋ lotobait, ido kanuka nolimerekek, kanuka ŋinimerekek yenikiliokit, arai kanuka ŋinikalol da.
Kwape ejaar etiai loitemokinete, iswamakinete kwaŋin ŋinidiopet, kwape ejaar etiaiakec.
Iurian kere iswamaete akiro ŋun kopone kaŋol, naeinakiniata ainakinet naeinakinere kakim, naka asakat naeur saa mama ejai EJAKAIT.

Arai kiboikin imoit nepepe kayes, arai ice kere yenejaun kidiŋikus katuriokus kere, kosodi ainakin ainakinet naeinakinere kakim, naka asakat naeur saa mama ejai EJAKAIT; kwape iswamaata yesi, iswamai ŋesi da kwaŋin.
Kanuka atukot, ejaun ekisil ediopet kanukus, ido kanuka imoit yeniboienenei nepepe kayes, ekisil lomam edaun katuriokus kere: kwape ijaatar yesi, ejaun kwaŋin imoit kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT.
Ejaun ekisil ediopet ka aicorakinet adiopet kanukus, ido kanuka imoit yeniboienenei kayes.”
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Kolimok idwe luka Isirael ebe, Naidolioto akwap naketolomari yes.
Ejaun kwana, ebe, nainyamiata atap naka akwap, iinakinete ainakinet nadakakina mama ejai EJAKAIT.
Iinanakinete aluŋuret naka agweikus nainumanariata yesi kanuka ainakinet nadakakina: kwape idakuniata ainakinet nadakakina naka epejal, idakunete ŋin da kwaŋin.
Iinanakinete EJAKAIT aluŋuret naka agweikus nainumanariata araun ainakinet nadakakina katuriokus kere.
Ŋun kere nukicorak yes EJAKAIT kama ka Musa, ameun kapaaran naesiaunia EJAKAIT aicorakin, anatar aturiokus kere;

Ejaun kwana, arai kibucasi, komam ekodet ejeni, einakini ekodet kere emoŋ lotobait kanuka ainakinet naicweio, naka asakat naeur saa mama ejai EJAKAIT, nepepe kainakineteke naka akiria, ka ainakineteke namatat, kwape ejaar ekisil, ka ekoroi ediopet kanuka ainakinet naka adiakaret.

Eluci esasedoti ekodet kere loka idwe luka Isirael, isionio da kes; naarai arai aibucaret, ayaut da ainakinetekec, ainakinet naeinakinere kakim mama ejai EJAKAIT, ka ainakinetekec naka adiakaret kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kanuka aibucaretekec:
Isionio ekodet kere loka idwe luka Isirael, ka imoit da yeniboienenei kamakec; naarai arai aibucaret naka ituŋa kere komam ejenete.
Eluci esasedoti aijar naibuearit, naediakaria komam ejeni, kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, alucio ŋes; ido isionio ŋes.
Ijaunos kekisil ediopet kanuka ŋin yeniswamai ibore komam ejeni, ŋin yeneurikinitai odwe luka Isirael, ido ka imoit yeniboienenei kamakec.
Konye aijar naepeleikin aswam ibore, arai iuriat arai imoit, einyanakini ŋin EJAKAIT; egelario ituŋanan ŋin kotuŋake.
Naarai amwaŋ akirot naka EJAKAIT, abil da aicorakineteke; egelario ituŋanan ŋin cut, ejaunos numam adoliteke mamake.”
Koyaut luadumunete ŋes erarai akito mama ejai Musa ka Aaron ido mama ejai ekodet kere.
Koenai, naarai mam ber alimoritai nuiswamakinio ŋes.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar, “Abeit eario etuŋanan: ibiribiri ekodet kere ŋes kamor kokiŋa kiidukurun.”
Koyau ekodet kere ŋes kiŋa kiidukurun, kibiribiroto ŋes kamor, kotwana; kwape kicorakinia EJAKAIT Musa.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Kolimok idwe luka Isirael, kicorak kes aiswamakin isilo atokito nuka inapenekec, anatar aturiokec kere, kitolomikis eusi lobululu osilo luka niuitokiroit:
Eraun kamakus esilot, tetere iteete ŋes, kiitununoto aicorakineta kere nuka EJAKAIT, kiswamata kes; komam ilosete koipud loka etaukus ka akonyenekus loetapitor yes aelor:
Tetere iitunete iswamaete da akaicorakineta kere, koraunos lukalaunak kama ejai Edekekus.
Arai eoŋ EJAKAIT Ekusideke, loketolomuni yes kakwap nako Misiri, araun Edekekus: arai eoŋ EJAKAIT Ekusideke.”
Konyout kakonyen nuka Musa, nepepe kice kodwe luka Isirael, ikapolok akwat aarei ka akaisakany luka ekodet, luanyaraunitai aurianet, ituŋa luajenas;

Kotukonokinos aluikin Musa ka Aaron, kolimokis kes ebe, “Idakakina yes nuipu, kwabo elaunit ekodet kere, ŋinidiopet kakesi, ejai EJAKAIT kakes: kanukinyo do idakakinotor yesi ikulepek aitelekar atukot naka EJAKAIT?”
Kepupu Musa, kibiror ebuburia:
Kolimok Kora ka ipaupake kere ebe, “Moi tupuruc itoduni EJAKAIT lueraas luke, ka yenikalaunan, isudunyikini mamake: ŋol Loeseuni ŋesi isudunyikini mamake.
Kiswamata kwanata; koyaŋaasi yesi aisupuruneta, Kora ka ipaupake kere;
Kibwaikis akim toma, kibwaikis da lukisupurununo toma kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT moi: ejaun kwana ebe etuŋanan loeseuni EJAKAIT, elauni ŋol; idakakina yes nuipu, yes odwe luka Lebi.”
Kotema Musa Kora atiar, “Kopupokisi do yes odwe luka Lebi:

Erai kereka akirot naedit kamakus, Edeke loka Isirael agitun yes kokodet loka Isirael, aisukunyikin yes mama ejai; aijaanakin toma owema lokalaunan loka EJAKAIT, ka abwoenen kakonyen nuka ekodet aijaanakin kes;
Kisukuny ŋesi jo, ka iinacanakon kere odwe luka Lebi nepepe kajo? Imootos yesi da esasedotene?
Kanuka ŋun ijo ka ipaupakon kere itukonokinos nepepe aluikin EJAKAIT: ka Aaron da, iŋai bo ŋesi loirurumakinitos yesi?”
Kijuka Musa anyaraun Datan ka Abiram, odwe luka Eliab: kotemasi atiar, “Mam sio kibuni:
Erai kereka akirot naedit ijo aitonyoun sio kakwap naeleleete akile ka esik, aarakin sio amodiŋ, kwabo ituluoro bon ekapolon lokiyait sio?
Bobo da mam jo kitolomarit sio akwap naeleleete akile ka esik, karaida ainakin airum imanikoria ka amanat nuka imusabibun: mere imod ijo ituŋa lu? mam sio kibuni.”
Konyunyurikin Musa noi, kolimok EJAKAIT ebe, “Sirikicam ainakinetekec: mam eoŋ ayanaarit adiopesigiria kamakec, karaida aisirieb idiopet kakesi.”
Kotema Musa Kora atiar, “Kojaun ijo moi ka ekodetekon kere, akonyen nuka EJAKAIT, ijo ka kes, ka Aaron:

Koyaŋa ŋinituŋanan kayesi akeisupurunet kibwaik lukisupurununo toma, koyaŋaasi mama ejai EJAKAIT ŋinituŋanan akeisupurunet, aisupuruneta akwat aarei ka akaisakany; ijo da, ka Aaron, ŋinituŋanan akeisupurunet.”
Koyaŋaasi ŋinituŋanan akeisupurunet, kibwaikis akimian toma, kibwaikis da lukisupurununo, kobwaata kokek loka ewema loka airiamunun nepepe ka Musa ka Aaron.
Kotukok Kora ekodet kere kiteos kakes kokek loka ewema loka airiamunun: kitakanikin aibuses naka EJAKAIT ekodet kere.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa ka Aaron atiar,
“Kogitaros yesi ka ekodet kalo, kamudia kes katipet.”
Kibiroros ebuburia, kotemasi atiar, “Wu Edeke, Edeke loka imoyon luka lukajarak kere, inyunyurikini ijo ekodet kere kediaka ediopetuŋanan?”
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Kolimok ekodet ebe, Konyoutu kowema loka Kora, ka Datan ka Abiram.”
Konyou Musa kolot mama ejai Datan ka Abiram; kotupito da ŋes imakio luka Isirael.
Kiner kekodet atiar, “Konyoutu, keŋaiŋaito, koweman luka ituŋa lu lukaronok, ido sirikitina idioborekec, kinyeis amudiario kotoma adiakaretakec kere.”
Konyout kowema loka Kora, ka Datan ka Abiram, kaŋoliwai: kolomut Datan ka Abiram, kobwaata kokekia luka iwemanakec, ka akeceŋor ka odwekec, ka ikecedwe ludidik.
Kotema Musa atiar, “Ijenunete kanu ebe EJAKAIT kejukunit eoŋ aswam aswamisio nu kere; naarai mam eswamat kes kanukaŋ.
Arai ketwaka ituŋa lu atwanare naka ituŋa kere, ido arai kedoikis kes nuedoonokinete ituŋa kere; ŋes atemar ebe mere EJAKAIT kejukunit eoŋ.
Konye arai kiswamau EJAKAIT ibore yenikitetet, kooŋ akwap akeituk, kosodi ailikor kes, ka luejaatar kere, kolomasi aipany ejarete; ŋes do ijenuniata ebe amwaŋa ituŋa lu EJAKAIT.”
Kooŋa akwap aitukuke, kiliko kes, ka ikaliakec ka ituŋa kere luaraas luka Kora, ka ikeceboro kere.
Kwaŋin kes, ka luajaatatar kere kolomasi aipany ejarete: kobunak akwap kes, kooliosi katukot.
Kokera luka Isirael kere luerimorito kes kepuput aimonyokec: naarai abakas ebe, “Kinyek akwap ailikor oni da.”
Kobu akim kama ejai EJAKAIT, konyama ituŋa ŋul akwat aarei ka akaisakany luainakinete lukisupurununo.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Kolimok Eleasar okoku loka Aaron esasedoti kolema aisupuruneta kaneecweere, kiweliwel akim; naarai eraas nukalaunak;

Aisupuruneta ŋun nuka ikadiakanarak nuegelito aijarakec, itatai kes aipadalikin arapia etem; naarai apotu koinakis kes mama ejai EJAKAIT, kanuka ŋun eraas nukalaunak: ido eraunos aanyunet mama ejaas idwe luka Isirael.”
Koyaŋa Eleasar esasedoti aisupuruneta nuka aisinit, nuainakinito luecweio; kotatata kes aitaraun arapetait naka etem:

Araun aisiitunet mama ejaas idwe luka Isirael, ebe sirielonwait lomam erai loka aur naka Aaron, kikunyu aicwe lukisupurununo kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT; kinyek aiput Kora ka ipaupake: kwape kelimokinia ŋes EJAKAIT kama ka Musa.
Kosodi ketukokin atukot aluikin Musa ka Aaron, kiteoto owema loka airiamunun: ido koany, korapia edou, kotakanu da aibuses naka EJAKAIT.
Kopotu Musa ka Aaron kiŋaren kewema loka airiamunun.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Konyou kokodet kalo, kamudia kes katipet.” Kibiroros ebuburia.

Kotema Musa Aaron atiar, “Koyaŋa aisupurunetekon, kibwaik akim nakotem toma, kibwaik da lukisupurununo, koyaŋa katipet neejai ekodet, kolueo kes: naarai alomu anyunyura kama ejai EJAKAIT; ageu da atular.”
Koyaŋa Aaron kwape alimokinia Musa, koker kidiŋ kekodet; ido koany, ageuna atular kotuŋa: kibwaik lukisupurununo, koluc ituŋa.
Kobwo ŋesi kokidiŋ kalukatwak ka lukajarak; kitanaŋai atular.
Ido luapotu kotwaka kanuka atular emwaasi ilukumin itomon ka luoŋon ka akwat akanykaarei, komam imarakinitai luatwakete kanuka akiro nuka Kora.
Koboŋo Aaron mama ejai Musa okek loka ewema loka airiamunun: kitanaŋai atular.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,

“Kinera kidwe luka Isirael, kolema kamakec ibelai, ediopet kanuka ŋiniteker naka lukapapaakec, loka ikapolokokec kere kwape ejaatar atekerin nuka lukapapaakec, ibelai itomon ka luarei; kiwadik ekiror loka ŋolituŋanan obelake.
Iwadikai da ekiror loka Aaron obela loka Lebi: naarai ejaun ebela ediopet kanuka ŋolikapolon loka ateker naka lukapapaakec.
Iperikini kes toma owema loka airiamunun kiŋaren kasaduku naka aitejenunet, nekiriamunun kajo.
Kosodi ejaun kwanata ebe, etuŋanan loaseuni eoŋ, elibi ebelake: etanaŋi da airuruma naka idwe luka Isirael, nakirurumakinitotor jo.”

Kiner Musa kidwe luka Isirael, koinakis ikapolokokec kere ŋes ibelai, ediopet kanuka ŋolikapolon, kwape ejaatar atekerin nuka lukapapaakec, ibelai itomon ka luarei: ajai ebela loka Aaron da obelaikec.
Kiperik Musa ibelai kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT kowema loka aitejenunet.
Koyau Musa ibelai kere kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT mama ejaas idwe kere luka Isirael: kosesenata, koyaŋa da ŋolituŋanan ekebela.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar, “Kinyaka ebela loka Aaron kiŋaren kaitejenunet, ainadio araun aanyunet mama ejaas idwe lukepali: tetere itanaŋi airurumakinitekec eoŋ, kinyeis atwakare.”
Kiswama Musa kwaŋin: kwape kicorakinia EJAKAIT ŋes, kiswama kwaŋin.
Kotemasi idwe luka Isirael Musa atiar, “Koany, kiolio, kitwaka, kitwaka isio kere.
Ituŋanan kere yenikunyakini, yenikunyakini owema lokalaunan loka EJAKAIT etwani: kioliori ca isio kere?”
Ikoniinacan da, ateker naka Lebi, ateker naka papakon, kisukuny nepepe kajo, tetere imorikikinio mamakon, kijaanakis jo: konye ijo ka odwekon nepepe kajo ijaunos akonyen nuka ewema loka aitejenunet.
Idarete kesi akirokon, idarete da Ewema kere: konye mam ikunyakinete die kiboro luka aibois nakalaunan karaida otem, kinyeis atwakare, kes, karaida yes.
Imorikikinio kes mamakon, idarete ewema loka airiamunun, kanuka aijaanakin kere naka Ewema:, mam eloŋwait ikunyuni diekus.
Idarete yesi aibois nakalaunan, ka etem da: tetere mam bobo akanyunyura ebunokini idwe luka Isirael.
Eoŋ da, koany, alema iinacanakon Ilebin kodwe luka Isirael: eraas ainakinet mamakon, lueinakinitai EJAKAIT, aijaanakin ewema loka airiamunun.
Idarete ijo ka odwekon esasedotenekus koboro kere luka etem, ka luejaas toma aigalisit; ijaanakinete da: kainakinit yes aijaanakin naka esasedotene bala ainakinet: ido eloŋwait loikunyuni die eario.”

Ŋin eraun nakon koboro lukalaunak noi, numam icweikinitai: ŋiniinakinetekec, ŋes ŋiniinakinetekec naka akiria, ka ŋiniinakinetekec naka adiakaret, ka ŋiniinakinetekec naka aronis, nakainakinete eoŋ, eraun nakalaunan noi kanukon ido kanuka odwekon da.
Inyamanakini aibois nakalaunan noi: enyami ŋolikiliokit; eraunos lukalaunak kamakono

Lukon lu: luedakakinitai luka ainakinetakec, ainakineta da nuijaŋio nuka idwe luka Isirael: kainak jo, ka ikonidwe lusap ka lupesur nepepe kajo, airumetekus nakitebeikinitai ikar kere: ŋin yenelai kokalekon enyami kes.
Akinyet kere naitelekarit ajokis, ka ebino loitelekarit ajokis, akima da, nuegeete kakesi kokaru nueinakinete EJAKAIT, kainak jo.
Araito nuegeete atiokore nuka kere luejaas toma akwap, nueyaununete mama ejai EJAKAIT, eraunos nukon; ŋin yenelai kokalekon enyami kes.
Ŋinibore yenegitunitai kotoma Isirael eraun yenikon.

Ŋinibore yenepukori aliliget, yenika akuan kere yeneinakinete EJAKAIT, yenika etuŋanan ka etiaŋ da, eraun yenikon: konye sirikinyek alakun ekiyai loka etuŋanan, sirikinyek da alakun ekiyai loka itiaŋ lumam elaete.
Ka ŋul da luibusakinit alakun kakesi, ilakuni ageun kaluka elap ediopet, kwape ejaunor aimarakon, isekelin ikany, kwape ajaar esekel

Konye mam ilakuni ekiyai loka emoŋ, arai ekiyai loka amerekek, arai ekiyai loka akinei; eraas lukalaunak: ibwatakini akeceokot otem, icweikini da asiepaikec kanuka ainakinet naeinakinere kakim, asakat naeuru saa mama ejai EJAKAIT.
Akiriŋikec eraun nakon, kwape ka atorob naiianio ka amurwo nakoteten, eraun nakon.

Ainakineta nuedakakinitai kere nuka iboro lukalaunak, nueinakinete idwe luka Isirael EJAKAIT, kainak jo ka ikonidwe lusap ka lupesur, nepepe kajo, airumet nakitebeikinitai ikar kere: erai aitutuket naka abalaŋ naka ikar kere kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT mama ijai ijo ka akoniwur nepepe kajo.”
Kotema EJAKAIT Aaron atiar, “Emamuun jo airumet kotoma akwapukec, karaida adumun akorakinet kamakec: Eoŋ ŋes akorakinetekon ka airumetekon da kodwe luka Isirael.
Ido ameari kwana mam idwe luka Isirael ikunyunete die kewema loka airiamunun, kinyeis aibwok adiakaret, kosodete atwakare.
Konye ijaanakinete Ilebin ewema loka airiamunun, ibwokete numam adolitekec: eraun ekisil katuriokus kere ikar kere, ido emamuun kes airumet kodwe luka Isirael.

Naarai ainak Ilebin idiopet kotomon yenika lueinanakinete idwe luka Isirael kanuka ainakinet naedakakinitai mama ejai EJAKAIT araun airumet: kanuka ŋun alimok kes ebe, Emamuun kes airumet kodwe luka Isirael.”
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,

“Bobo da ilimokini Ilebin ebe, ‘Naijauniata idwe luka Isirael idiopet kotomon yenikainak yes kamakec araun airumetekus, iinakiniata yesi da ainakinet naedakakinitai mama ejai EJAKAIT, idiopet kotomon yenika idiopet kotomon.
Imarakinio mamakus ainakinetekus naedakakinitai kosubite bala kerai alos nakopejal, arai nuegeete nuka acuet naka ebino.
Iinakinete yesi da kwaŋin ainakinet naedakakinitai mama ejai EJAKAIT, idiopet kotomon yenika luijaunete kodwe luka Isirael; iiaikiniata da Aaron esasedoti ainakinet naedakakinitai naka EJAKAIT.
Kainakinetakus kere iinanakinete ŋiniinakinet naedakakinitai naka EJAKAIT, kaluitelekarit ajokis kotomakec ŋes atutubet naitalaunitai kotomakec.’
Ŋes itemaria kes atiar, ‘Naidakuniata naitelekarit ajokis, ŋes imarakinere oLebin kosubite bala nuiyatakina nuka epejal, ka nuiyatakina nuka acuet naka ebino.
Inyamenenete ŋes kaŋiniibois, yes ka ikusikalia da; naarai erai eropitikus atacia aijaanakinikus kowema loka amamunun.
Ido mam ibwokete aronis kanuke, kidaut adakakin naitelekarit ajokis kotomake: sirikitisiloto iboro lukalaunak luka idwe luka Isirael, kinyeis atwakare.’ ”
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa ka Aaron atiar,
“Na ŋes aicorakinet naka ekisil naecoraki EJAKAIT ebe, Kinera kidwe luka Isirael, koinut jo ataok nakareŋan naemamei akemer, komam eŋwalit, namam cut edakit ajookot:
Iinakinete ŋes Eleasar esasedoti, itolomari ŋes kiŋa kiidukurun, koarai kakonyeneke:
Idomakini Eleasar esasedoti ekebokorit toma aokotoke, ebwatanakini aokotoke kiŋaren kewema loka airiamunun irwan akanykaarei:
Icweikinio ataok kakonyeneke; emukuleke, akiriŋike, aokotoke, ka ikijitike da, icweikinio:
Elemuni esasedoti akitoi naka eres, ka esop,
Kosodi do esasedoti ailot ikenapen, ka ailoŋ akekuan kakip, akaulo kaŋun eboŋuni oidukurun, ido esali esasedoti erai lomam elai aitodol eboŋ.
Ido ŋol loecwei ataok ilosi ikenapen kakip, ka ailoŋ da akekuan kakip, esali erai lomam elai aitodol eboŋ.

Etukonokini etuŋanan loelai ekurwon loka ataok, kosodi abukokin aibois naelai kokiŋa kiidukurun, idario ŋes kanuka atukot naka idwe luka Isirael araun akipi nuitesegaarete: erai ainakinet naka adiakaret.
Ilosi ŋol loetukonokini ekurwon loka ataok inapeneke, esali da erai lomam elai aitodol eboŋ: eraun ekisil mama ejaas idwe luka Isirael ka imoit yeniboienenei kamakec ikar kere.
Italaun ŋipeŋin kanen kapaaran nakiwuniet, ido kapaaran nakikanyetekaarei eraun yenelai: konye arai mam italauna kapaaran nakiwuniet, ŋes atemar mam eraun yenelai kapaaran nakikanyetekaarei.

Ŋinituŋanan yenetirori akuan nakatwan naka ituŋanan yenetwanit, komam italauni akekuan, etisilian ŋin ewema lokalaunan loka EJAKAIT; ido egelario ituŋanan ŋin koIsirael: naarai mam ŋes aponi kobwatakinai akipi nuitesegaarete, eraun yenimam elai; esalakini amamus ailake mamake.
Lo ŋes ekisil arai ketwana ituŋanan kotoma owema; nlnidiopet yenelomari owema ŋol, ka ŋinidiopet yenejai toma owema eraun yenimam elai apaarasia akanykaarei.
Ŋinimot da namam erapap, naemamei arapetait kaitukuke, erai namam elai.
Ido ŋinituŋanan yenejai ais yenetirori ituŋanan yenearitai kekileŋ, arai akuan nakatwan, arai akoit naka ituŋanan arai ates, eraun yenimam elai apaarasia akanykaarei.
Ŋul lumam elaete elemunete ekurwon loicweere ainakinet naka adiakaret, ka akipi nueleleete ibwaikinio kere toma amot:
Elemuni ituŋanan yenelai esop, idomakini toma akipi ŋun, kosodi abwatakin owema, ka amoti kere, ka ituŋa luajaas nen: ebwatakini da ŋin yenatirorit akoit, arai yenearitai, arai yenikatwan, arai ates:
Ebwatakini yenelai yenimam elai kapaaran nakiwuniet, kapaaran da nakikanyetekaarei: kapaaran da nakikanyetekaarei italauni ŋes; ilosi ikenapen, iloŋi ilopet kakip, eraun yenelai eboŋ.
Eraun ekisil lomam edaun kamakec. Ŋin yenikabwatan akipi nuitesegaarete ilosi ikenapen; ŋin yenetirori akipi nuitesegaarete eraun yenimam elai aitodol eboŋ.
Ŋinibore yenetirori yenimam elai eraun ŋin da yenimam elai; ŋinituŋanan yenetirori ŋin eraun yenimam elai aitodol eboŋ.”
Komamikis ekodet akip: kotukonokinos nepepe aluikin Musa ka Aaron.
Kitoŋolopata ituŋa Musa, kobalas ebe, “Tiejok arai katwakito naatwakiata iinacanakosi kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT!
Kanukinyo iyauniata atukot naka EJAKAIT amodiŋ na, atwanikin ne, isio ka ibarenekosi da?
Kanukinyo kitolomuniata sio koMisiri, ayaun sio aibois na nakaronon? emameete aibois na ikinyom, karaida itinin, karaida imusabibun, karaida akamamagan; emameete da adisikip numatan.”
Konyoutu Musa ka Aaron kakonyen nuka ekodet kolototo okek loka ewema loka airiamunun, kibiroros ebuburia: kitaanyikin kes aibuses naka EJAKAIT.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Kolem ebela, kotukok ekodet, ijo ka Aaron onacekon, kinerata yesi katiiba kakonyenekec, ebe koinak akekipi; iinuni do kes akipi nuelomunete katiiba: kwaŋin iinakini ekodet ka ibarenekec aimat.”
Kolem Musa ebela kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kwape kicorakinia.
Kikeu Musa akekan, kinom atiiba kekebela irwan aarei; kolomut akipi nuipu, komat ekodet ka ikecebaren.
Kobala EJAKAIT Musa ka Aaron ebe, “Naarai mam ipotu kiyuut eoŋ, aitalaun eoŋ kakonyen nuka idwe luka Isirael, kanuka ŋun mam yes itolomarete ekodet lo toma akwap naainak kes.”
Ŋun kes akipi nuka Meriba;
Kwape ejesarotor lukapapaakosi toma Misiri, keboioto kotoma Misiri ikar luipu; kiticanata da Imisirian sio ka lukapapaakosi;
Ido nakimonyia mama ejai EJAKAIT, abu kopup ekosiporoto, kijuk emalaika, kitolom sio koMisiri: ido koany, kijai toma Kades, ere loejai osaŋe loka eikorukon:

Keŋaiŋait, kocamak ketoroto toma akwapukon: mam sio kitori toma omanikoria karaida omanikoria luka emusabibu, ido mam kimasi akipi nuka atanin: kideri erot loka ekabaka, mam kipaari akan nakoteten karaida akan nakokediany, aitodol nekituboror koikorukon.”
Kotema Edom ŋes atiar, “Mam itori tomaka, kenye asurokin jo kekileŋ.”
Kotemasi idwe luka Isirael atiar, “Kideri isio erot lokapolon: arai kiimat isio akonikipi, eoŋ ka ibareneka, katacakini jo etiaiakec: kocamakinai eoŋ ketor kakejeneka, komam eswamai icebore kere.”
Kotema atiar, “Mam itori.” Kolom Edom ka ituŋa luipu asurokin ŋes kakan nakagogoŋ.
Kimik kwaŋin Edom Isirael aitor oikoruke: kanuka ŋun kibelokin Isirael anyoun kaneajai ŋesi.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa ka Aaron komoru Kor, kariri naka eikor loka akwap naka Edom atiar,
“Eyaŋaario Aaron mama ejaas iketuŋa: naarai mam elomari toma akwap naainak idwe luka Isirael, naarai ipotu kipaliikis akakirot kakipi nuka Meriba.
Aso koyaŋa Aaron ka Eleasar okokuke, kitodoka kes moru Kor:
Kolac inapen luka Aaron, kitanap kes Eleasar okokuke: eyaŋaario Aaron mama ejaas iketuŋa, etwanikini ŋina.”
Kiswama Musa kwape kicorakinia ŋes EJAKAIT: kodokasi moru Kor kakonyen nuka ekodet kere.
Kolaca Musa inapen luka Aaron, kitanap Eleasar okokuke; kotwanik Aaron nen kuju moru: kodokut Musa ka Eleasar komoru.
Keanyu ekodet kere ebe atwana Aaron, kibworoto lukokek loka Isirael Aaron apaarasia akaisauni.
Kiyapo Isirael aiyaposit mama ejai EJAKAIT, kobala ebe, “Arai kiijaik ituŋa lu akanika, amudiari cut ireriakec.”
Kopup EJAKAIT eporoto loka Isirael, kijaik Ikanaanin; komudiasi kes cut ka ireriakec: komaikinai aibois Koruma.
Kinerata ituŋa erono mama ejai Edeke ka Musa, ebe, “Kanuk inyo kitonyounio sio koMisiri atwanikin amodiŋ? naarai emameete inyamat, emameete da akip: apas akosiijar ainyam luebenen.”
Kijukak EJAKAIT imunwo luka akim otuŋa, kotodotodoto ituŋa: kotwaka ituŋa luipu luka Isirael.
Kopotu ituŋa mama ejai Musa, kobalas ebe, “Kidiaka isio, naarai kipou kenera erono mama ejai EJAKAIT ka jo da; kilip EJAKAIT, kolema imunwo kamakosi.” Kilipak Musa ituŋa.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar, “Kosub emun loka akim, kibwaik kuju okitoi: kosodi kanen ŋin yenetodio, naeanyunia, ejari.”
Kosub Musa emun loka aisinit, kibwaik kuju okitoi: kosodi kanen, arai etodit emun ituŋanan kere, naesesenia emun loka aisinit, kojari.
Kolototo idwe luka Isirael, kidukuroto Obot.
Kolototo anyoun koObot, kidukuroto Iyeabarim, amodiŋ naitei Moab, kari nakokide.
Kolototo anyoun kanen, kidukuroto aditot naka Sered.
Kolototo anyoun kanen, kidukuroto juwai naka Arunon, naejai amodiŋ, naelomunit koikor loka Imorain: naarai Arunon ŋes eikor loka Moab, kidiŋ Moab ka Imorain.
Ŋes ebakare kotoma oitabo loka Ijiisio luka EJAKAIT ebe,
“Bakeb kotoma Supa,
Ka aditon nuka Arunon.
Aijulul naka aditon
Naijululuor aibois naka Ar,
Egoŋakina da oikor loka Moab.”
“Kibulubul, wu atan; koyeikis yesi ŋes:
Naawadete ikasianak luka ituŋa,
Kebela loka ajakanut, ka amorokinikec.”
Konyout kamodiŋ kolototo Matana:
Konyout koMatana kodoloto Nakaliel: konyout koNakaliel kodoloto Bamot:
Konyout koBamot kodoloto aditot naejai omanikor loka Moab, kiton kuju naka Pisiga, naitei amodiŋ.
“Kocamakinai ketor akwapukon: mam kipaari omanikoria karaida omanikoria luka emusabibu; mam kimasi akipi nuka atanin: kideri erot loka ekabaka, aitodol nekituboror koikorukon.”
Mam Sikon abu kisiik Isirael aitor toma oikorunoke: konye kotukok Sikon ituŋake kere, koloma asurokin Isirael toma amodiŋ, kodol Yakas; kitiji Isirael.
Kodany Isirael ŋes kakwanis naka ekileŋ, kirum akekwap anyoun koArunon aitodol Yabok, aitodol odwe luka Amon: naarai agogoŋ eikor loka idwe luka Amon.
Kirum Isirael ireria ŋul kere: kiboikin Isirael oreria kere luka Imorain, toma Kesibon, ka ireriake kere.
Naarai arai Kesibon ere loka Sikon ekabaka loka Imorain, loabu kitiji ekabaka loka Moab losek, kodema kotoma akanike akekwap kere, kiton Arunon.
Ŋes ineratatar luineras kawaragasia ebe,
“Koporu yes Kesibon,
Kodukoi ere loka Sikon, kiticatai da;
Aŋajepa nuka akim kotoma ore loka Sikon:
Anyam Ar loka Moab,
Ijaka luka aiboisio nuieelelete nuka Arunon.
Iolio, wu ituŋa luka Cemos:
akoraki odweke araut lukakerak,
ka adweke da araut nunatan,
Mama ejai Sikon ekabaka loka Imorain.
Aolio Kesibon aitodol Dibon,
Kitisil kiton Nopa,
Naedoli Medeba.”
Kwaŋin kiboikin Isirael toma akwap naka Imorain.
Kiyakia Musa airot Yaser, kosodete airum ireriakec, kireŋeasi Imorain luajaas nen.
Kibelokinos kodokasi korot loka Basan: kolom Og ekabaka loka Basan asurokin kes, ŋes ka iketuŋa kere, ejie kakes kolsderei.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar, “Sirikiyoŋ ŋes: naarai akorak ŋes toma akanikon, ka iketuŋa kere, ka akekwap da; iswamakini ŋes kwape ibu kiswamakinia Sikon ekabaka loka Imorain, lueboienenete koKesibon.”
Kwaŋin kodanyata ŋes, ka odweke, ka iketuŋa kere, mam apotu kitasalata karaida idiopet: kirumata akekwap.
Koany Balak okoku loka Sipor kere nukiswamakin Isirael Imorain.
Kokurianar Moab noi ituŋa, naarai epu: koiurunun Moab kanuka idwe luka Isirael.

Kobala Moab imakio luka Midian ebe, “Natikwana elosi etuŋat lo ameor cut kere lukirimoritos, kwape ikoeoria emoŋ eduan lokorony.” Balak da okoku loka Sipor ŋes arai ekabaka loka Moab kapaarasia kaŋun.

Kijuka ikiyakia mama ejai Balaam okoku loka Beor, Pesor, loiririkina Ecor, kakwap naka idwe luka iketuŋa, anyaraun ŋes ebe, “Koany, ejaas ituŋa lueponito koMisiri: koany, egarito akwap, kes da katereikina eoŋ:

Aso, keŋaiŋait, kobia, kikenokinai ituŋa lu; naarai egogoŋ kesi adepar eoŋ, elemuni kepiko: kasodete aidany, kereŋea kakwap: naarai ajeni ebe yenilipakini ijo arereŋ isirereŋio, ido yenikeni ijo ikenio.”
Kotema kes atiar, “Koperoto ne akuare na, kenyakakini eoŋ da yes kwape kalimokinia EJAKAIT.” Kiboikinos lukapolok luka Moab ore loka Balaam.
Kobu Edeke neejai Balaam, kotema atiar, “Lukaŋai ituŋa lu luijaas kajo?”
Kotema Balaam Edeke atiar, “Balak, okoku loka Sipor, ekabaka loka Moab, ŋes keyakikinit, ebe,
‘Koany, ituŋa luapote koMisiri egarito akwap: kobia cabo kikenokinai; elemuni apedori ejie kakes, kereŋea.’ ”
Kotema Edeke Balaam atiar, “Sirikiloto kakes; sirikiken ituŋa: naarai isirerenitai.”
Konyou Balaam tupuruc, kolimok lukapolok luka Balak ebe, “Koloto ma yesi bukus: naarai aŋer EJAKAIT acamakin eoŋ alosit kayes.”
Konyout lukapolok luka Moab, koloto mama ejai Balak, kotemasi atiar, “Aŋer Balaam aupun kasio.”
Kiyatak Balak bobo aijukar lukapolok, luitelekarito kwi aipues, ka luitelekarito da kapolou.
Kopotu mama ejai Balaam, kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Inera kwanata Balak okoku loka Sipor, ebe, ‘Kinye adiokirot aitikokin jo abunore neajai eoŋ, keŋaiŋait.
Naarai ketopoloori eoŋ jo koraun lokaibuses noi, kere da nukilimokini eoŋ eswamai: aso bia, keŋaiŋait, kikenokinai ituŋa lu.’ ”
Koboŋok Balaam kotema ikejaanakinak luka Balak atiar, “Karaida kainaki Balak eketogo ileleba epuesa ka esabu, mam apedori adepar akirot naka EJAKAIT Ekadeke, aiŋoŋar arai aiyatakin.
Aso ber, keŋaiŋaitos, koperoto yes da ne akuare na, tetere ajenuni nuiyatakini EJAKAIT alimokin eoŋ.”
Kobu Edeke neejai Balaam kuare, kotema ŋes atiar, “Arai eponitos ituŋa ŋul anyarit jo, konyou, koloto kakes, konye akirot ban nakalimokini jo, ŋipeŋin iswamai.”
Kinep anyunyura naka Edeke kanu alosio: kobwo emalaika loka EJAKAIT korot asurokin ŋes. Ido kibwanenite asigiriake, koupasi kikekejaanakinak iarei.
Koany asigiria emalaika loka EJAKAIT ebwoi korot, ka ekekileŋ da eutuno kakanike; kinac asigiria kopaa ais: kocar Balaam asigiria ainyakun orot.
Kosodi kobwo emalaika loka EJAKAIT korot loedidiŋ loejai kidiŋ kimanikoria luka emusabibu, kojai abwas epuai ka epuai.
Koany asigiria emalaika loka EJAKAIT, koridakin arwatat, kogirisor akeju naka Balaam karwatat: kocar ŋes bobo.
Kikunya emalaika loka EJAKAIT nediokasilon, kobwo korot loedidiŋ, neamamei apak naibelokinor teten karaida kediany.
Koany asigiria emalaika loka EJAKAIT, koper kwap ka Balaam; kinep anyunyura naka Balaam, kocar asigiria kekebela.
Kitoona EJAKAIT aituk naka asigiria, kotema Balaam atiar, “Kekonak bo eoŋ jo ai, tape kicaracarai eoŋ aatenak ŋun auni?”
Kobala Balaam asigiria ebe, “Naarai kitakadik: arai kiŋa eoŋ kekileŋ akanika, ti kwana kaar jo.”
Kotema asigiria Balaam atiar, “Mere eoŋ akonisigiria, naibwanen ijo kaiiarakon kere aitodol lolo? Etapit tope eoŋ aikonanakin jo kwaŋin?” Kobala ebe, “Mam.”
Kobala emalaika loka EJAKAIT ebe, “Kanukinyo icaracaraa akonisigiria aatenak ŋun auni? Koany, alom asurokin jo, naarai epagal akonilosit kakonyeneka:
Kaanyu asigiria eoŋ, abu kibelokin kakonyeneka aatenak ŋun auni: arai kemam ibelokino kamaka, abeit kwana tikaar jo, tiketajar ŋes.”
Kobala Balaam emalaika loka EJAKAIT ebe, “Adiaka eoŋ: naarai mam ajeni ebe ibwoi ijo korot asurokin eoŋ: aso kwana, arai kitakadikinit jo, aboŋori do,”
Kotema emalaika loka EJAKAIT Balaam atiar, “Kolot kituŋa: konye akirot bon nakalimokini jo, ŋipeŋin inera.” Kosodi koloto Balaam kalukapolok luka Balak.
Kobala Balak Balaam ebe, “Mam abu keyakikinite kaimaimait anyaraun jo? Kanukinyo mam ibu kobunio mamaka? Mam kereka apedori eoŋ aitopoloor jo koraun lokaibuses?”
Kobala Balaam Balak ebe, “Koany, abu neijai: ejai kwana eoŋ apedor kere einer adiokirot? Akirot naibwaikini Edeke aitukuka, ŋipeŋin alimuni.”
Kolototo Balaam ka Balak, kodolo Kiriatkusot.
Koinak Balak asuban nuka imoŋin ka imerekekin, kijukak da Balaam, ka ikapolok luajaas kaŋes.
Kotema Balaam Balak atiar, “Kodukokinai ne itemwan ikanykaarei, kitemonokinai da ne imoŋin ikanykaarei, ka imerekekin ikany kaarei.”
Kiswama Balak da kwape abalar Balaam; koinakis Balak ka Balaam kaŋolitem emoŋ ka emerekek.
Kotema Balaam Balak atiar, “Kobwo ijo eiduny kainakinetekon naicweio, eoŋ da alosi; elemuni ebuni EJAKAIT airiamun keoŋ; nuketodikin eoŋ kere, kalimokini jo.” Kodoka ŋesi kuju neelapat.
Kiriamunos Edeke ka Balaam: kotema ŋesi atiar, “Etemonok itemwan ikanykaarei, ainak kaŋolitem emoŋ ka emerekek.”
Kibwaik EJAKAIT akirot toma aituk naka Balaam, kotema atiar, “Koboŋo neejai Balak, kiner kwaŋin.”
Koboŋo neejai, ido koany, abwoi eiduny kainakineteke naicweio, ŋes ka ikapolok kere luka Moab.
Kiner akewaraga ebe,
“Kayau eoŋ Balak anyoun koAram,
Ekabaka loka Moab anyoun koroŋan lukokide:
Bia, kikenokinai Yakob, Bia, koluik Isirael.
Ido aluikini eoŋ biai lomam Edeke eluikinit?
Ido eteluori ŋes koukon:
Koany, kes ituŋa luiboiete bonik,
Mam imarakinio toma atekerin.
Atai aimar atutubet nakiwoŋonet naka Isirael?
Mere katwana kwape ekadoliton,
Awasiaka do koputokinos kanake!”
Koboŋok ebe, “Mam tikebusakinit acoit einer ŋun nuibwaikini EJAKAIT aitukuka?”
Kotema Balak ŋes atiar, “Keŋaiŋait, kauparos aibois ace, naipedoria aanyun kes; ianyuni esaŋekec bon, komam ianyuni kes kere; kikenok eoŋ kes kaŋina.”
Koyaŋa ŋes omanikor loka Sopim, aidi naka Pisiga, koduk itemwan ikanykaarei, koinak kaŋolitem emoŋ ka emerekek.
Kotema ŋesi Balak atiar, “Kobwo kane eiduny kainakinetekon naicweio, keriamunos ber eoŋ ka EJAKAIT kalaije.”
Kiriamunos EJAKAIT ka Balaam, kibwaik akirot toma aitukuke, kotema atiar, “Koboŋo neejai Balak, kiner kwaŋin.”
Kobu mama ejai, ido koany, abwoi eiduny kainakineteke naicweio, ka ikapolok luka Moab nepepe kaŋes, Kotema Balak ŋes atiar, “Atema bo EJAKAIT ai?”
Kiner akewaraga ebe,
“Konyou, Balak, kiira,
Kopupunoi, ijo okoku loka Sipor:
Mam da erai okoku loka etuŋanan loitoronikin:
Alimu ŋesi, komam kereka iswamai?
Arai ener ŋesi, komam kereka itodoli?
Esireren, mam eoŋ apedori aijulakin.
Karaida aanyunit apaarit kotoma Isirael:
Ejai EJAKAIT Ekedeke kaŋes,
Ka ekare loka ekabaka ejai mamakec.
Ejaas kagogoŋ kwape naka ekosobwan.
Karaida adwaranut kaneejai Isirael:
Kwana inereneneo nuka Yakob ka nuka Isirael da, ebe, ‘Eswama ca ma Edeke!’
Koany, enyounete ituŋa bala aŋatuny,
Edakun bon bala eŋatuny:
Mam eperi aitodol neenyamia imejaunake,
Ka aimat aokot nuka luearitai.”
Kotema Balak Balaam atiar, “Sirikiken kes nepetai da, karaida ailipakini kes adioreren.”
Konye Koboŋok Balaam Balak ebe, “Mam abu kalimok jo ebe, ‘Kere nuinera EJAKAIT, ŋupeŋun kebusakinit aswam?’ ”
Kotema Balak Balaam atiar, “Aso bia, kayaŋa jo aibois ace; elemuni kitojok Edeke jo aikenokin eoŋ kes kaŋina.”
Koyaŋa Balak Balaam aidi naka Peor, neitei amodiŋ.
Kotema Balaam Balak atiar, “Kodukokinai itemwan ikanykaarei, kitemonok kane imoŋin ikanykaatei ka imerekekin ikanykaarei.”
Kiswama Balak kwape abalar Balaam, koinak kaŋolitem emoŋ ka emerekek.
Kiteluo Balaam akekonyen, koany Isirael iboiete kwape ajaatar atekerinikec; kobunok ŋes emoyo loka EJAKAIT.
Kiner akewaraga ebe,
“Inera Balaam okoku loka Beor,
Inera da etuŋanan loetumudakitai akekonye.
Loeanyuni etapo loka Lokapedor kere,
Ibirun, kokwenyete akekonye, ebe.
Ejokuka ca ma iwemanakon, wu Yakob,
Iwemanakon lukalaunak, wu Isirael!
Kwape kamanan nuka ariri naka ecor,
Kwape iluan luera EJAKAIT,
Kwape iresia kariri naka akipi.
Ejaununos ikinyomoke toma akipi nuipu,
Eojaar ekekabaka adepar Agag,
Itopoloorio da akejakanut.
Kitolom ŋes Edeke koMisiri;
Ejaas kagogoŋ kwape naka ekosobwan:
Enyami atekerin nuka lukasurupoke,
Emunyumunyei akecekojo.
Icumi kes kimaliake.
Bala aŋatuny; iŋai itonyouni ŋes?
Isirereŋio yenikilipakini jo arereŋ,
Ilamakinio yenikilamakini jo.”
Kinep anyunyura naka Balak aluikin Balaam, kibapak akekanin: kolimok Balak Balaam atiar, “Abu kanyarau jo aikenokin lukasurupoka, ido koany, ilipak kes arereŋ cut irwan nu auni.
Aso do, koker aiboisikon: enerunit aitopoloor jo koraun lokaibuses; konye koany, kitikok EJAKAIT jo adumun aibuses.”
Kotema Balaam Balak atiar, “Mam eoŋ abu kalimok ikonikiyakia da luibu kijukak ebe,
‘Karaida kainaki Balak eketogo ileleba epuesa ka esabu, mam apedori adepar akirot naka EJAKAIT, aswam nuejok arai nueroko nuaomit eoŋ eloper; nupeinera EJAKAIT, ŋupeŋun eneri eoŋ da’?
Koany, alosi kwana mama ejaas ituŋaka: bia, kalimok jo nuepote ituŋa ŋul aiswamakin ikonituŋa kapaarasia nukakonyen.”
Kiner akewaraga ebe,
“Inera Balaam okoku loka Beor ebe,
Inera da etuŋanan loetumudakitai akekonye:
Inera loepupi akiro nuka Edeke,
Loejeni da aijen naka Loejai kuju kakuj; Loeanyuni etapo loka Lokapedor kere, Ibirun, kokwenyete akekonye, ebe:
Aseseni ŋes, konye mere kodie:
Elomuni aacerit kotoma Yakob,
Ikeuni ebela loka ajakanut koIsirael, Iposi agorieik nuka Moab apedor, Ebili da odwe kere luka eŋuŋet.
Ka Seir da eraun nake, luaraas lukasurupoke;
Kiswamai Isirael nukagogoŋ.
Kotoma Yakob ŋes elomunia ekayaiton,
Emudiari da luideuna kore.”
Kite Amalek, kiner akewaraga ebe,
“Kerai Amalek nasodit naka atekerin;
Konye esaŋeke lokakonyen emudiario.”
Kite da Ekenit, kiner akewaraga ebe,
“Erai aibois naiboionono ijo naegogoŋ,
Ecinakina akaikon atiiba.
Kwabo icweio Kain
Aitodol nakinataria Asur jo.”
Kiner akewaraga ebe,
“Wu okwe, iŋai ejari naiswamaa Edeke ŋun?
Epote aitican Asur, ka aitican da Eber,
Ŋes da emudiario.”
Konyou Balaam, koloto koboŋo aiboisike: kolot Balak da.
Kimorikikin Isirael ka Baal-peor: kinep anyunyura naka EJAKAIT aluikin Isirael.
Kobala EJAKAIT Musa ebe, “Koyaŋa ijaka kere luka ituŋa, komiedak kes EJAKAIT kakoloŋ, tetere ibelokin anyunyura naededeŋ naka EJAKAIT anyoun koIsirael.”
Kotema Musa ikatubok luka Isirael atiar, “Koarata yesi ŋinituŋanan iketuŋa luemorikikinos ka Baal-peor.”
Nakeanyunia Pinekas, okoku loka Eleasar, okoku loka Aaron esasedoti, konyou kokidiŋ kekodet, kitiŋ akwara kakanike:
Kotupak etuŋanan ŋol loka Isirael owema, kicum kes iarei kere aipelor, etuŋanan loka Isirael, ka aberu da akoikike. Kwaŋin kitanaŋai atular kodwe luka Isirael.
Ŋul da luapotu korwaka kanuka atular emwaasi ilukumin akaisaarei ka luoŋon.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Ebeloki Pinekas, okoku loka Eleasar, okoku loka Aaron esasedoti, akanyunyura anyoun kodwe luka Isirael, naarai ekokotiki kes kekakokote, kenye amudiar idwe luka Isirael kokokoteka.
Kanuka ŋun kolimok ebe, ‘Koany, ainakini ŋes aitutuketeka naka ainapakin:
Ejaun mamake, ido mama ejai aurike naetupakini ŋes, aitutuket naka esasedotene lomam enaŋi; naarai abu kikokotik kanuka Ekedeke, koluc da idwe luka Isirael.’ ”
Ekiror da loka etuŋanan loka Isiraelloaario, loaario kaberu naMidianit, ŋes Simiri, okoku loka Salu, ekapolon loka ekal loka lukapapaakec luka Isimeonin.
Ekiror da loka aberu naMidianit naario, ŋes Kosibi, akoku naka Sur; arai ŋesi ekapolon loka ituŋa luka ekal loka lukapapaakec kotoma Midian.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Kitiji Imidianin kodany kes:
Naarai kitiiiete yes kiboteikec, lukijodooriata yes kotoma akiro nuka Peor, ka akiro nuka Kosibi akoku naka ekapolon loka Midian, kinacikec, naaario kapaaran naka atular kakiro nuka Peor.”
“Kimar etiai loka ekodet kere loka idwe luka Isirael, ageun kaluka ikar akaisaarei ka luedeparito, kwape ejaatar ikalia luka lukapapaakec, kere luepedorete alosit ojie koIsirael.”
Kinerata Musa ka Eleasar esasedoti kakes kapuuton naka Moab kariri naka Yorodan ko Yeriko, ebe,
“Kimarata etiai loka ituŋa, ageun kaluka ikar akaisaarei ka luedeparito”; kwape kicorakinia EJAKAIT Musa ka idwe luka Isirael luanyounete kakwap nako Misiri.
Kesuron, ekek loka Ikesuronin: Karami, ekek loka Ikaramin.
Ŋul kes ikekia luka Ireubenin: ŋul luaponi kimarai kakesi emwaasi ilukumin akaisaoŋon ka luuni, ka akwat akanykaarei ka akaisauni.
Odwe luka Palu; Eliab.
Odwe luka Eliab; Nemuel, ka Datan, ka Abiram. Ŋupeŋul kes Datan ka Abiram, luanyaraunio kokodety luetepegete Musa ka Aaron nepepe ka Kora, naetepegeata EJAKAIT:
Kooŋa akwap akeituk, kiliko kes nepepe ka Kora, naketwania erioŋet ŋol; kapak naanyamia akim ituŋa akwat aarei ka akaisakany, koraut aanyunet.
Konye mam odwe luka Kora anotu kotwaka.
Sera, ekek loka Iserakin: Saul, ekek loka Isaulin.
Ŋul kes ikekia luka Isimeonin, ilukumin akaisaarei ka luarei, ka akwat aarei.
Odwe luka Gad kwape ajaatar ikekiakec: Sepon, ekek loka Iseponin: Kagi, ekek loka Ikagin; Suni, ekek loka Isunin:
Osuni, ekek loka Ikosunin: Eri, ekek loka Ierin:
Arod, ekek loka Irodain: Areli, ekek loka Irelain:
Ŋul kes ikekia luka odwe luka Gad kwape ajaatar ŋul luaponi kimarai kakesi, ilukumin akaisaoŋon ka akwat akany.
Odwe luka Yuda kwape ajaatar ikekiakec; Sela, ekek loka Iselanin: Peres, ekek loka Iperesin: Sera, ekek loka Iserakin.
Odwe luka Peres, Kesuron, ekek loka Ikesuronin: Kamul, ekek loka Ikamulin.
Ŋul kes ikekia luka Yuda kwape ajaatar ŋul luaponi kimarai kakesi, ilukumin akaisakanykaarei ka lukanykape ka akwat akany.
Yasub, ekek loka Iyasubin: Simuron, ekek loka Isimuronin.
Ŋul kes ikekia luka Isakar kwape ajaatar luaponi kimarai kakesi, ilukumin akaisakanykape ka luoŋon ka akwat auni.
Ŋul kes ikekia luka Isebulunin kwape ajaatar ŋul luaponi kimarai kakesi, ilukumin akaisakanykape ka akwat akany.
Odwe luka Manase: Makir, ekek loka Imakirin: kouru Makir Gilead: Gilead, ekek loka Igileadin.
Lu kes odwe luka Gilead: Ieser, ekek loka Ieserin; Kelek, ekek loka Ikelekin:
Ka Asuriel, ekek loka Isurielain: ka Sekem, ekek loka Isekemin:
Ka Semida, ekek loka Isemidain; ka Keper, ekek loka Ikeperin.
Ka Selopekad okoku loka Keper amameete idwe lusap, dimarai apesur: ikiroria luka apesur nuka Selopekad kes Mala, ka Noa, ka Kogila, ka Milika, ka Tirusa.
Ŋul kes ikekia luka Manase: ŋul luaponi kimarai kakesi emwaasi ilukumin akaisakany ka luarei ka akwat akanykaarei.
Lu kes odwe luka Sutela: Eran, ekek loka Ieranin.
Ŋul kes ikekia luka odwe luka Epuraim kwape ajaatar ŋul luaponi kimarai kakesi, ilukumin akaisauni ka luarei ka akwat akany, Ŋul kes odwe luka Yosep kwape ajaatar ikekiakec.
Sepupam, ekek loka Isupamin: Kupam, ekek loka Ikupamin.
Odwe luka Bela kes Arid ka Naaman, Arid ekek loka Iridain; Naaman, ekek loka Inaamanin.
Ŋul kes odwe luka Benyamin kwape ajaatar ikekiakec: ŋul luaponi kimaraikakesi emwaasi ilukumin akaisaoŋon ka lukany ka akwat akanykape.
Ikekia kere luka Isukamin, kwape ajaatar ŋul luaponi kimarai kakesi emwaasi ilukumin akaisakanykape ka luoŋon ka akwat aoŋon.
Odwe luka Beria: Keber, ekek loka Ikeberin: Malakiel, ekek loka Imalakielin.
Ekiror da loka akoku naka Aser ŋes Sera.
Ŋul kes ikekia luka odwe luka Aser kwape ajaatar luaponi kimarai kakesi, ilukumin akaisakany ka luuni ka akwat aoŋon.
Yeser, ekek loka Iyeserin: Silem, ekek loka Isilemin.
Ŋul kes ikekia luka Naputali kwape ajaatar ikekiakec: ŋul luaponi kimarai kakesi emwaasi ilukumin akaisaoŋon ka lukany ka akwat aoŋon.
“Mama ejaas ŋul ŋes ekorakinio akwap araun airumet kwape ejaar etiai loka ikiroria.
Mama ejaas luipu iinakini airumet naepol, mama ejaas luikidioko iinakini airumet naedir: mama ejai ŋinidiopet kwape ejaatar ŋul luaponi kimarai kaluke einakinio airumeteke.
Konye ekorokoro akwap kailamilam eroet: irumete kwape ejaatar ikiroria luka atekerin nuka lukapapaakec.
Kwape ejaunor eroet ŋes ekorakinere airumetekec mama ejaas luipu ka luikidioko.”
Lu kes ikekia luka Ilebin: ekek loka Ilibunin, ekek loka Ikeburonin, ekek loka Imalin, ekek loka Imusin, ekek loka Ikorakin. Kouru Kokat Amuram.
Ekiror da loka aberu naka Amuram ŋes Yokebed, akoku naka Lebi, naaurie Lebi kotoma Misiri: kourik ŋesi Amuram Aaron ka Musa ka Miriam kinacikec.
Kouri Aaron Nadab ka Abiku, ka Eleasar ka Itamar.
Kotwaka Nadab ka Abiku, naainakiniata akim naitegelikina kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT.

Ŋul luaponi kimarai kakesi emwaasi ilukumin akaisaarei ka luuni, ŋolikiliokit ageun kayenika elap ediopet ka luedeparito: naarai mam emarakinitai toma odwe luka Isirael, naarai mam ainakinitai kes airumet kodwe luka Isirael.
Ŋul kes luemarete Musa ka Eleasar esasedoti; luemarete idwe luka Isirael kapuutona nuka Moab kariri naka Yorodan koYeriko.
Konye kotoma kaŋul amamei idiotuŋanan kakwi luemarete Musa ka Aaron esasedoti; luemarete idwe luka Isirael kotoma amodiŋ naka Sinai.
Naarai abu EJAKAIT kolimu nukec ebe, “Abeit etwakikinete toma amodiŋ.” Mam ediotuŋanan kakesi abu kideun, dimarai Kaleb okoku loka Yepune, ka Yosua okoku loka Nun.
Kobwaata kakonyen nuka Musa, kakonyen nuka Eleasar esasedoti, kakonyen da nuka ikapolok ka ekodet kere, kokek loka ewema loka airiamunun, kobalas ebe,
“Abu papakosi kotwanik amodiŋ, konye mam ŋes arai opaupakec kaŋul luapotu kotukokinos nepepe aluikin EJAKAIT korioŋet loka Kora: konye atwani ŋesi da kotoma adiakareteke; komameete idwe lusap.
Kanukinyo elemarere ekiror loka papakosi kokekike, naarai amameete ŋes idwe lusap? Koinakinai sio airumet koinacan luka papakosi.”
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Ineras adwe nuka Selopekad nuedolito: abeit iinakini kes airumet koinacan luka papakec; ido itebei airumet naka papakec mamakec.
Ilimokini idwe luka Isirael ebe, ‘Arai ketwana etuŋanan, komamei ikoku yenisapat, itebei do airumeteke mama ejai akokuke.
Arai emamei ŋes akokuke; iinakini airumeteke mama ejaas iinacanake.
Arai emameete ŋes iinacanake, iinakini do airumeteke mama ejaas iinacan luka papake.
Arai emameete papake iinacan, iinakini akeirumet mama ejai opajanake loka ekekike, ŋesi da irumi: eraun kama ejaas idwe luka Isirael ekisil loka etube, kwape kicorakinia EJAKAIT Musa.’ ”
Kianyu ŋes, kiyaŋaario mama ejaas ikonituŋa kwape ayaŋaarere onacekon Aaron:
Naarai ibu kipaliik akakirot kotoma amodiŋ naka Sin, kopeget loka ekodet, aitalaun eoŋ kakonyenekec kakipi.” (Ŋun kes akip nuka Meriba loka Kades kamodiŋ naka Sin.)
Kotema Musa EJAKAIT atiar,
“Kodakak EJAKAIT, Edeke loka imoyon luka awat kere, etuŋanan ayait ekodet.
Loepedori alomar ka alomun da kakonyenekec, loepedori aiŋarenikin kes alomar ka alomun da; tetere mam ekodet loka EJAKAIT esubi bala amerekekin nuemameete ekecokon.”
Kobala EJAKAIT Musa ebe, “Koyaŋa Yosua okoku loka Nun, etuŋanan loejai emoyo, kidokok ŋes akonikan;
Kitobwo kakonyen nuka Eleasar esasedoti, kakonyen nuka ekodet kere; kodakak da ŋes apolou kakonyenekec.
Iinakini ŋes akonipolou, tetere erimari ekodet kere loka idwe luka Isirael.

Ebwoi kakonyen nuka Eleasar esasedoti, loinitununei kanuke kotube loka Urim kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT: kakirotoke elomariata, kakirotoke da elomuniata, ŋes ka idwe kere luka Isirael nepepe kaŋes, ekodet kere.”
Kiswama Musa kwape kicorakinia EJAKAIT ŋes; koyaŋa Yosua, kitobwo ŋes kakonyen nuka Eleasar esasedoti, kakonyen da nuka ekodet kere:
Kidokok ŋes akaninike, kodakak apolou, kwape kineria EJAKAIT kama ka Musa.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Kicorak idwe luka Isirael, kolimok kes ebe, ‘Ainakinetaka, ikanyamat luka ainakinetaka nueinakinere kakim, luka asakat naeuru saa mamaka, iricete ainakin eoŋ kapakikec naebeit.’
Ilimokini kes ebe, Na ŋes ainakinet naeinakinere kakim, naiinakinete EJAKAIT; imerekekin lukiliok luka ekaru ediopet lumam eŋwalito, iarei ŋinipaaran, araut ainakinet naicweio naduc.
Iinakinete imerekek idiopet tupuruc, kosodi idiopet iinakinete eboŋ:
Ka idiopet kotomon yenika epa
Erai ainakinet naicweio naduc, naecorakinio komoru Sinai araun asakat naeuru saa, ainakinet naeinakinere kakim mama ejai EJAKAIT.
Ainakinet da namatat ŋes idiopet kooŋon yenika ekin kanuka imerekek idiopet; ibukokini neejai EJAKAIT kotoma aibois nakalaunan ainakinet namatat naka nuitemerete.
Ka imerekek ice iinakini eboŋ; kwape kainakinet naka akiria naka tupuruc, kwape kainakineteke namatat, iinakini ŋes, ainakinet naeinakinere kakim, naka asakat naeuru saa mama ejai EJAKAIT.

“Kapaaran nakasabato imerekekin lukiliok iarei luka ekaru ediopet lumam eŋwalito, ka iarei kotomon luka epa loka akiria nuidicic araun ainakinet naka akiria, nuinyalakinitai akinyet, ka ainakineteke namatat;
Ŋin ŋes ainakinet naicweio naka ŋinipaaran nakasabato, kogelara ainakinet naicweio naduc, ka ainakineteke namatat.

Ka iuni kotomon luka epa loka akiria nuidicic araun ainakinet naka akiria, nuinyalakinitai akinyet, kanuka ŋolimoŋ lotobait; ka iarei kotomon luka akiria nuidicic araun ainakinet naka akiria, nuinyalakinitai akinyet, kanuka emerekek ŋol;

Ka idiopet kotomon yenika akiria nuidicic nuinyalakinitai akinyet araun ainakinet naka akiria naka ŋinimerekek; araun ainakinet naicweio naka asakat naeuru saa, ainakinet naeinakinere kakim mama ejai EJAKAIT.

Ainakinetakec da numatan eraun atutubet naka ekin loka ebino kanuka emoŋ lotobait, ka idiopet kouni yenika ekin kanuka emerekek, ka idiopet kooŋon yenika ekin kanuka imerekek; ŋin ŋes ainakinet naicweio naka ŋolilap adaun ilapio kere luka ekaru.
Ka ekoroi ediopet araun ainakinet naka adiakaret mama ejai EJAKAIT; einakinio kogelara ainakinet naicweio naduc, ka ainakineteke namatat.
Apaaran nakitomonet kakany naka elap kaŋol ejaun epucit; enyamio emugati lomam itubuunitoi apaarasia akanykaarei.
Toma apaaran nasodit ejaun atukokinet nakalaunan; siriswamaete aswam naelaŋir.

Konye iinakinete ainakinet naeinakinere kakim, ainakinet naicweio mama ejai EJAKAIT: imoŋin lutoba iarei, ka emerekek, ka imerekekin ikanykaarei lukiliok luka ekaru ediopet: eraunos kamakus lumam eŋwalito:
Ka ainakinetekec naka akiria, akiria nuidicic nuinyalakinitai akinyet: iinakinete iuni kotomon kanuka emoŋ lotobait ka iarei kotomon kanuka emerekek;
Iinakini da idiopet kotomon kanuka ŋinimerekek kotoma omerekekin ikanykaarei;
Ka ekoroi ediopet araun ainakinet naka adiakaret, alucio yes.
Iinakinete ŋun kogelara ainakinet naicweio naka tupuruc, naerai ainakinet naicweio naduc.

Iinakinete kopone kaŋol ŋinipaaran, adaun apaarasia akanykaarei, inyamat luka ainakinet naeinakinere kakim, naka asakat naeuru saa mama ejai EJAKAIT: einakinio kogelara ainakinet naicweio naduc, ka ainakineteke namatat.
Kapaaran nakikanyetekaarei ejaun yes atukokinet nakalaunan; siriswamaete aswam naelaŋir.
Konye iinakinete ainakinet naicweio araun asakat naeuru saa mama ejai EJAKAIT; imoŋin lutoba iarei, ka emerekek, ka imerekekin ikanykaarei lukiliok luka ekaru ediopet;
Ka ainakinetekec naka akiria, akiria nuidicic nuinyalakinitai akinyet, iuni kotomon kanuka ŋolimoŋ lotobait, ka iarei kotomon kanuka emerekek ediopet.
Ka idiopet kotomon kanuka ŋinimerekek kotoma omerekekin ikanykaarei;
Ka ekoroi ediopet, alucio yes.
Iinakinete kes kogelara ainakinet naicweio naduc, ka ainakineteke naka akiria (eraunos kamakus lumam eŋwalito), ka ainakinetakec numatan.
Iinakinete ainakinet naicweio araun asakat naeuru saa mama ejai EJAKAIT; emoŋ lotobait ediopet, ka emerekek ediopet, ka imerekekin ikanykaarei lukiliok luka ekaru ediopet lumam eŋwalito:
Ka ainakinetekec naka akiria, akiria nuidicic nuinyalakinitai akinyet, iuni kotomon kanuka emoŋ lotobait, ka iarei kotomon kanuka emerekek.
Ka idiopet kotomon kanuka ŋinimerekek kotoma omerekekin ikanykaarei:
Ka ekoroi ediopet araun ainakinet naka adiakaret, alucio yes:

Kogelara ainakinet naicweio naka elap loilamuni, ka ainakineteke naka akiria, ka ainakinet naicweio naduc ka ainakineteke naka akiria, ka ainakinetakec numatan, kwape ejaar ekecekisil, araut asakat naeuru saa, ainakinet naeinakinere kakim mama ejai EJAKAIT.

Konye iinakinete ainakinet naicweio mama ejai EJAKAIT araun asakat naeuru saa; emoŋ lotobait ediopet, ka emerekek ediopet; ka imerekekin ikanykaarei lukiliok luka ekaru ediopet; eraunos mama ijaas lumam eŋwalito:
Ka ainakinetekec naka akiria, akiria nuidicic nuinyalakinitai akinyet, iuni kotomon kanuka emoŋ lotobait, ka iarei kotomon kanuka emerekek ediopet.
Ka idiopet kotomon kanuka ŋinimerekek kotoma omerekekin ikanykaarei:
Ka ekoroi ediopet araun ainakinet naka adiakaret; kogelara ainakinet naka adiakaret naka alucio, ka ainakinet naicweio naduc, ka ainakineteke naka akiria, ka ainakinetakec numatan.

Iinakinete ainakinet naicweio, ainakinet naeinakinere kakim, naka asakat naeuru saa mama ejai EJAKAIT; imoŋin lutoba itomon ka luuni, ka imerekekin iarei, ka imerekekin itomon ka luoŋon lukiliok luka ekaru ediopet; eraunos lumam eŋwalito:

ka ainakinetekec naka akiria, akiria nuidicic nuinyalakinitai akinyet, iuni kotomon kanuka ŋolimoŋ lotobait, kotoma omoŋin lutoba lutomon ka luuni, ka iarei kotomon kanuka nolimerekek kotoma omerekekin iarei.
Ka idiopet kotomon kanuka ŋinimerekek kotoma omerekekin lutomon ka luoŋon:
Ka ekoroi ediopet araun ainakinet naka adiakaret; kogelara ainakinet naicweio naduc, ka ainakineteke naka akiria, ka ainakineteke namatat.
“Kapaaran nakiareit da iinakinete imoŋin lutoba itomon ka luarei, ka imerekekin iarei, ka imerekekin itomon ka luoŋon lukiliok luka ekaru ediopet lumam eŋwalito:
Ka ainakinetekec naka akiria ka ainakinetakec numatan kanuka imoŋin lutoba, kanuka imerekekin, kanuka imerekekin ludidik da, kwape ejaar etiaikec, kwape ejaar aicorakinet:
Ka ekoroi ediopet araun ainakinet naka adiakaret; kogelara ainakinet naicweio naduc, ka ainakineteke naka akiria, ka ainakinetakec numatan.
“Kapaaran nakiwuniet da, imoŋin lutoba itomon ka lodiopet, ka imerekekin iarei, ka imerekekin itomon ka luoŋon lukiliok luka ekaru ediopet lumam eŋwalito;
Ka ainakinetekec naka akiria ka ainakinetakec numatan kanuka imoŋin lutoba, kanuka imerekekin, kanuka imerekekin ludidik da, kwape ejaar etiaikec, kwape ejaar aicorakinet:
Ka ekoroi ediopet araun ainakinet naka adiakaret; kogelara ainakinet naicweio naduc, ka ainakineteke naka akiria, ka ainakineteke namatat.
“Kapaaran nakiwoŋonet da, imoŋin lutoba itomon, ka imerekekin iarei, ka imerekekin itomon ka luoŋon lukiliok luka ekaru ediopet lumam eŋwalito:
Ainakinetekec naka akiria ka ainakinetakec numatan kanuka imoŋin lutoba, kanuka imerekekin, kanuka imerekekin ludidik da, kwape ejaar etiaikec, kwape ejaar aicorakinet:
Ka ekoroi ediopet araun ainakinet naka adiakaret; kogelara ainakinet naicweio naduc, ainakineteke naka akiria, ka ainakineteke namatat.
Ka ainakinetekec naka akiria ka ainakinetakec numatan kanuka imoŋin lutoba, kanuka imerekekin, kanuka imerekekin ludidik da, kwape ejaar etiaikec, kwape ejaar aicorakinet;
Ka ekoroi ediopet araun ainakinet naka adiakaret; kogelara ainakinet naicweio naduc, ka ainakineteke naka akiria, ka ainakineteke namatat.
“Kapaaran nakikanyetekape, imoŋin lutoba ikanykauni, ka imerekekin iarei, ka imerekekin itomon ka luoŋon lukiliok luka ekaru ediopet lumam eŋwalito:
Ka ainakinetekec naka akiria ka ainakinetakec numatan kanuka imoŋin lutoba, kanuka imerekekin, kanuka imerekekin ludidik da, kwape ejaar etiaikec, kwape ejaar aicorakinet;
Ka ekoroi ediopet araun ainakinet naka adiakaret; kogelara ainakinet naicweio naduc, ainakineteke naka akiria, ka ainakineteke namatat.
“Kapaaran nakikanyetekaarei, imoŋin lutoba ikanykaarei, imerekekin iarei, ka imerekekin itomon ka luoŋon lukiliok luka ekaru ediopet lumam eŋwalito;
Ka ainakinetekec naka akiria ka ainakinetakec numatan kanuka imoŋin lutoba, kanuka imerekekin, kanuka imerekekin ludidik da, kwape ejaar etiaikec, kwape ejaar aicorakinet:
Ka ekoroi ediopet araun ainakinet naka adiakaret, kogelara ainakinet naicweio naduc, ainakineteke naka akiria, ka ainakineteke namatat.

Konye iinakinete ainakinet naicweio, ainakinet naeinakinere kakim naka asakat naeuru saa mama ejai EJAKAIT: emoŋ lotobait ediopet, ka emerekek ediopet, ka imerekekin ikanykaarei lukiliok luka ekaru ediopet lumam eŋwalito:
Ainakinetekec naka akiria ka ainakinetakec numatan kanuka emoŋ lotobait, kanuka emerekek, kanuka imerekekin ludidik da, ejaunos kwape ejaar etiaikec, kwape ejaar aicorakinet:
Ka ekoroi ediopet araun ainakinet naka adiakaret; kogelara ainakinet naicweio naduc, ka ainakineteke naka akiria ka ainakineteke namatat.
Naiyapoo ituŋanan aiyaposit mama ejai EJAKAIT, arai naisumunio aisumunet ajen eketau kaenet, sirikinyei aitodol akekirot; iswamai kwape ejaatar akiro kere nuelomunete kaitukuke.
Naiyapoo aberu aiyaposit mama ejai EJAKAIT, koenikini da bon kaenet, koroko ejai okale loka papake, koiditeuke;
Kepupu papake aiyapositike, ka aeneteke naeenitor eketau, kosodi papake aililiŋikin ŋes: iburai do akeiyaposio kere aitodolio: ka ŋinienet naeenitor ŋesi eketau iburai aitodolio.
Konye arai keneroki ŋes papake kapaaran naepupunio; epalunio aiyaposioke kere, ka aeneta kere nueenitor ŋesi eketau: isionie da EJAKAIT ŋes, naarai abu papake koneroki ŋes.
Konye arai emanyit ŋes ekiliokit, kojaas aiyaposioke mamake, arai aisud einer kaitukuke, nueenitor ŋesi eketau;
Kepupu okilenike, kosodi aililiŋikin ŋes kapaaran naepupunio: iburai do akeiyaposio aitodolio, ka aenetake nueenitor ŋesi eketau iburai aitodolio.
Konye arai keneroki ŋes okilenike kapaaran naepupunio; itapaluni aiyapositike naejai mamake, ka aisud einer kaitukuke, nueenitor ŋesi eketau: isionie EJAKAIT ŋes.
Konye aiyaposit naka apuserut, ka ŋin da naireŋearit okilenike, iburai do ŋes aitodol ŋinikirot naeenitor ŋesi eketau.
Arai eyapoi ŋesi kotoma togo loka okilenike, arai ajen eketau kaenet naka aiyaposit.
Kepupu okilenike kosodi aililiŋikin ŋes, komam enerokini ŋes; iburai do aiyaposioke kere aitodolio, ka ŋinienet nakeenia ŋesi eketau iburai aitodolio.
Konye arai itapalunit kes okilenike kapaaran nakepupunio; epalunio do kere nuka aiyaposioke arai nuka aenet naka etauke nualomunete kaitukuke; etapalau kes okilenike: isionie da EJAKAIT ŋes.
Epedori okilenike aitogogoŋ arai aitapalaun niniyaposit ka ninisumunet naeenit aiticania etau.
Konye arai kililiniki okilenike ŋes ŋinipaaran, itogogoŋi do akeiyaposio kere, arai aenetake kere nuejaas mamake: etogogoŋ kes naarai abu kililinik ŋes kapaaran naapupunio kes.
Konye arai kitapalau kes akaulo kapupun kes, ibwoki do ŋesi numam adolit nuka aberu.”
Ŋul kes ikisila, luecorakini EJAKAIT Musa, mama ejai etuŋanan ka akeberu, mama ejai papa ka akokuke naejai koiditeuke, okal loka papake.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Kinyaŋ idwe luka Isirael kama ejaas Imidianin: akaulo kaŋun ŋes kiyanaarere jo mama ejaas ikonituŋa.”
Kolimok Musa ituŋa ebe, “Kokapanakisi icetuŋa kotomakus kanuka ejie, tetere elosete asurokin Midian, aitodol einyaŋane loka EJAKAIT mama ejai Midian.
Ijukarete yesi ojie luka ŋiniteker elukumit, katekerin kere nuka Isirael.”
Kwaŋin kolemunai kolukumin luka Isirael, luka ŋiniteker elukumit, kes ilukumin itomon ka luarei luakapakina kanuka ejie.
Kijuka Musa kes, luka ŋiniteker elukumit, ojie, kes ka Pinekas okoku loka Eleasar esasedoti, ojie, ajaas iboro luka aibois nakalaunan ka arupepen nuka elala akanike.
Kitijioto Midian, kwape kicorakinia EJAKAIT Musa; koarata da ŋolikiliokit.
Koarata ikabakan luka Midian nepepe kalueekec: Ebi, ka Rekem, ka Sur, ka Kur, ka Reba, ikabakan ikany luka Midian: koarata da Balaam okoku loka Beor kekileŋ.
Kijoreosi idwe luka Isirael aŋor nuka Midian ka ikecedwe ludidik; koŋatasi da ibarenekec kere, ka isipaninikec kere, ka iborokec kere.
Kicweata kakim ireriakec kere kotoma aiboisio nueboiononoto, ka iidukurunukec kere.
Koyaŋaasi iŋatan kere, ka ideman kere, ituŋa ka itiaŋ da.
Koyaut luejoreunitai, ka ideman, ka iŋatan, mama ejai Musa, ka Eleasar esasedoti, ka ekodet loka idwe luka Isirael, mama ejaas iidukurun apuutona nuka Moab nuejaas ariri naka Yorodan ko Yeriko.
Koloto Musa ka Eleasar ka ikapolok kere luka ekodet, airiamun kakes kiŋa kiidukurun.
Konyunyurik Musa ikeŋarenok luka ajore, ikapolok luka ilukumin ka ikapolok luka akwat, luapote kojie.
Kotema Musa kes atiar, “Ttaiarata kereka yesi aŋor kere?
Koany, apotu ŋun koinakis idwe luka Isirael adiakar kama ka EJAKAIT, kanuka ainerun naka Balaam, kakiro nuka Peor, kanuka ŋun da kojaun atular okodet loka EJAKAIT.
Aso do koara niniklliokit kodwe ludidik, koara da ŋiniberu naejeni ekiliokit kanuka apero kaŋes.
Konye idwe lupesur, lumam ejenete ekiliokit kanuka apero kaŋes, kitajarata kanukus.
Kidukuroto yesi kiŋa kiidukurun apaarasia akanykaarei: ŋin yenaarit ituŋanan, ŋin da yenetirorit yenearitai, kitalaunos kapaaran nakiwuniet kapaaran da nakikanyetekaarei, yes ka ijoreunokus.
Italaunete da nininapiro, ka ŋin kere yeniswamatai kemukule, ka yeniswamatai kajulo nuka akinei, ka iboro kere luiswamatai kakiro.”
Kolimok Eleasar esasedoti ikajiok lualosito ojie ebe, “Ŋol ŋes ekisil loka aicorakinet naecoraki EJAKAIT Musa:
Konye esabu, ka epuesa, ka aikomo, ka asua, ka adebe, ka asasin.
Ŋinibore yenimam akim enyami, itotorioto akim, eraun yenelai; konye italaunio kakip nuitesegaarete: kere da yenepedori akim ainyam idomakinete akipi.
Ilosete akusinapen kapaaran nakikanyetekaarei, iraunos da luilaete, akaulo kaŋun ilomarete oidukurun.”
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
