“Kimar iŋatan luanatunio, ituŋa ka itiaŋ da, ijo ka Eleasar esasedoti, ka ikapolok luka ikalia luka lukapapa luka ekodet:
Kokorak da iŋatan toma atutubeta aareij mama ejaas ikajiok luepiiriaka kojie lualosito ojie, ka ekodet kere:
Kitelem ikajiok lualosito ojie esolo kanuka EJAKAIT: idiopet kakwat akany, yenika ituŋa, ka aituk, ka asigiria, ka isipanin:
Kolem ŋes kotoma atutubetakec, koinak Eleasar esasedoti, araun ainakinet naedakakinitai naka EJAKAIT.

Kotoma atutubet da naka idwe luka Isirael ilemuni ijo idiopet kotoma ninikaisakany, naka ituŋa, ka aituk, ka asigiria, ka isipanin, kes luka ibaren kere, koinak Ilebin, luidarete ewema lokalaunan loka EJAKAIT.”
Kiswamata Musa ka Eleasar esasedoti kwape kicorakinia EJAKAIT Musa.
Iŋatan da, luedeunos koŋatan luayaŋaarete ikajiok, emwaasi amerekekin alukumin akwat akanykape ka alukumin akaisakanykaarei ka alukumin akany.
Aituk alukumin akaisakanykaarei ka alukumin aarei.
Asigiria alukumin akaisakanykape ka alukumit adiopet.
Ka ituŋa kere ilukumin akaisauni ka ilukumin iarei, luka apesur numam ajenete ekiliokit kanuka apero kaŋes.
Atutubet nakerai akorakiner naka ŋul kalualosito ojie, arai etiaike amerekekin alukumin akwat auni ka akaisauni ka nukanykaarei ka akwat akany:
Esolo du loka EJAKAIT loka amerekekin kerai akwat akanykape ka akaisakanykaarei ka nukany.
Aituk da emwaasi alukumin akaisauni ka alukumin akanykape; kotoma kaŋun korai esolo loka EJAKAIT akaisakanykaarei ka nuarei.
Emwaasi asigiria alukumin akaisauni ka akwat akany; kotoma kaŋun korai esolo loka EJAKAIT akaisakanykape ka nadiopet.
Emwaasi ituŋa da ilukumin itomon ka lukanykape; kotoma kaŋul da korai esolo loka EJAKAIT ituŋa akaisauni ka luarei.
Koinak Musa Eleasar esasedoti esolo loarai ainakinet naedakakinitai naka EJAKAIT, kwape kicorakinia EJAKAIT Musa.
Atutubet naka idwe luka Isirael naatiakuni Musa kotuŋa luajiito,
(Atutubet da naka ekodet emwaasi amerekekin alukumin akwat auni ka akaisauni ka nukanykaarei ka akwat akany.
Ka aituk alukumin akaisauni ka alukumin akanykape.
Asigiria alukumin akaisauni ka akwat akany.
Ituŋa ilukumin itomon ka lukanykape);
Kotoma atutubet naka idwe luka Isirael, kolem Musa idiopet kotoma ninikaisakany, ituŋa ka itiaŋ da, koinak kes Ilebin luedarete ewema lokalaunan loka EJAKAIT: kwape kicorakinia EJAKAIT Musa.
Kikunyut ikeŋarenok luapolokinito ilukumin luka ajore, ikapolok luka ilukumin ka ikapolok luka akwat neejai Musa:
Kolimokis Musa ebe, “Einara ikonikejaanakinak ikajiok lukidari isio, ido emamei yeneoliorit kasio.
Kiyau da ainakinet naka EJAKAIT, luadumu ŋinituŋanan, iboro luka esabu, ka asua, ka aikomon, ka igilun, ka itetio, ka abwakai, alucio ikositauon kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT.”
Kijaut Musa ka Eleasar esasedoti esabukec, ka lukisiro kere.
Esabu kere loka ainakinet naedakakinitai naainakinete EJAKAIT ikapolok luka ilukumin ka ikapolok luka akwat arai isekelin
(Naarai ayanaarito ikajiok ideman, ŋinituŋanan ocoeke.)
Kijaut Musa ka Eleasar esasedoti esabu loka ikapolok luka ilukumin ka luka akwat, koyaŋaut toma owema loka airiamunun, araun aisiitunet mama ejaas idwe luka Isirael kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT.
Kopotu idwe luka Gad ka idwe luka Reuben kinerata kaMusa ka Eleasar esasedoti ka ikapolok luka ekodet atiar,
“Atarot, ka Dibon, ka Yaser, ka Nimura, ka Kesibon, ka Eleale, ka Sebam, ka Nebo, ka Beon.
Akwap naetiji EJAKAIT kakonyen nuka ekodet loka Isirael, erai akwap naibusakinit ibaren, ejaas da ikonikejaanakinak ibaren.”
Kotemasi atiar, “Arai kidumunit asianut kakonyenekon, koinakinai ikonikejaanakinak akwap na araun airumet; sirikiitodok sio Yorodan.”
Kotema Musa idwe luka Gad ka idwe luka Reuben atiar, “Do iinacanakus elosete ojie, kiboiete yesi kane?
Kanukinyo itakalanyata itauon luka idwe luka Isirael kotoma alosit akwap naainaki kes EJAKAIT?
Apotu lukapapakus kiswamata kwaŋin, naejukaria kes koKades-barunea airot akwap.
Naarai kedokasi aditot naka Esukol, koanyut da akwap, kitakalanyata itauon luka idwe luka Isirael kinyeis alomar akwap naainakinit kes EJAKAIT.
Kinep anyunyura naka EJAKAIT kapaaran kaŋin, kiyapo ebe,
‘Abeit emamei kotoma otuŋa lualomunete koMisiri, ageun kaluka ikar akaisaarei ka luedeparito, loeanyuni akwap naabu keyapoik Aburaam, ka Isaak, ka Yakob; naarai mam katuparito eoŋ kekecetau kere:
Dimarai Kaleb okoku loka Yepune Ekenisit, ka Yosua okoku loka Nun: naarai atupasi EJAKAIT kekecetau kere.’
Kinep anyunyura naka EJAKAIT aluikin Isirael, kisirim kes kamodiŋ ikar akaisaoŋon, aitodol neadaikinor nen aturi kere naabu kiswama aronis kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT.
Ido koany, inyout yesi airum aibois naka lukapapakus, ailwek naka ikadiakanarak, aiyatakin bobo anyunyura naededeŋ naka EJAKAIT mama ejai Isirael.
Naarai arai kipaasi yesi kotoma atupite ŋes, itasalikini bobo ŋesi kes amodiŋ; ido imudiarete yesi ituŋa lu kere.”
Kikunyut mama ejai ŋesi, kotemasi atiar, “Kibwaikini akosiituk aujoi nee, kidukokini ikosidwe ludidik ireria:
Konye isio ikulepek kikapakini cut aiŋarenikin idwe luka Isirael, aitodol nekiyaŋaaria kes aiboisikec; ido iboikinos ikosidwe ludidik oreria luebwaunitai kanuka luiboiete kakwap.
Mam kiboŋori oreriakosi, aitodol nairumiata idwe luka Isirael ŋinituŋanan airumeteke.
Naarai mam sio kirumi kakes okekwa juwai loka Yorodan; naarai akosiirumet ejai okekwa lo loka Yorodan ari nakokide.”
Kotema Musa kes atiar, “Arai kiswamata yesi akirot ŋin; arai kikapakinos yesi alosit ojie kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT.
Kosodi ŋoltuŋanan loekapakina kayesi aidok Yorodan kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, aitodol naireŋearia lukasurupoke kakonyeneke.
Kipikoroi akwap kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT: kosodete konyet aboŋun, komam nuigwaunito kama ejai EJAKAIT, kama ejai Isirael da; eraun akwap na airumetekus kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT.
Konye arai mam iswamaete kwaŋin, koany idiakasi kama ejai EJAKAIT: abeit itodun akusidiakaret.
Kodukokis ikusidwe ludidik ireria, kobwaikis akusimerekekin aujoi; kiswamata da ŋun nualomutu kaitukekus.”
Kinerata idwe luka Gad ka idwe luka Reuben kaMusa atiar, “Iswamaete ikonikejaanakinak kwape icorakinia ekajakait.
Ikosidwe ludidik, ka akosiŋor, ka ikosisipanin ka ikosibaren, ejaunos toma oreria luka Gilead:
Konye edokete ikonikejaanakinak, ŋoltuŋanan loekapakina ejie, kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, ejie, kwape ebalar ekajakait.”

Kolimok Musa kes ebe, “Arai kedokasi idwe luka Gad ka idwe luka Reuben Yorodan nepepe kayes, ŋoltuŋanan loekapakina ejie kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kosodi akwap aipikorio kakonyenekus; iinakinete do kes akwap naka Gilead araun airumet:
Konye arai mam edokete nepepe kayes kokapakina, irumete nepepe kayes kotoma akwap naka Kanaan.”
Koboŋokis idwe luka Gad ka idwe luka Reuben ebe, “Kwape alimokinia EJAKAIT ikonikejaanakinak, kiswamai isio kwaŋin.
Kidoki kakapakina kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT alomar akwap naka Kanaan, kosalak airumetekosi okekwa loka Yorodan.”
Kodukoto idwe luka Gad Dibon, ka Atarot, ka Aroer;
Ka Aturot-sopan, ka Yaser, ka Yogubeka;
Ka Bet-nimura, ka Bet-karan: ireria luabwaitai, ka aujoi nuabwaitai nuka amerekekin.
Kodukoto idwe luka Reuben Kesibon, ka Eleale, ka Kiriataim;
Ka Nebo, ka Baal-meon, (kilocoi ikecekiroria,) ka Sibima: komaikis ireria luadukete icekiroria.
Koloto idwe luka Makir okoku loka Manase Gilead, kiruma ŋes, kodemasi ŋes Imorain luajaas toma.
Koinak Musa Makir okoku loka Manase Gilead; kiboienenei da kanen.
Kolot Yair okoku loka Manase kirum ireriakec, komaik kes Kabot-Yair.
Kolot Noba kirum Kenat, ka ireriake ludidik, komaik ŋes Noba ekekiror obe.
Nu kes alosito nuka idwe luka Isirael, nakenyounioto kakwap nako Misiri toma ajoresiokec kama ka Musa ka Aaron.
Kiwadik Musa anyounonetakec kwape ajaar alositekec kaicorakinet naka EJAKAIT: nu kes alositokec kwape ajaatar anyounonetakec.
Konyout koRameses kolap losodit, kapaaran nakitomonet kakany naka elap losodit; kapaaran naatupakini Aleleŋio kolomasi idwe luka Isirael kakan naarioro kakonyen nuka Imisirian kere.
Napeidaete Imisirian lukiyaikikec kere, luabu EJAKAIT kodany kotomakec: kotubok EJAKAIT ikecedekesio da.
Kolototo anyoun koSukot kidukuroto Etam, naejai ariri naka amodiŋ.
Kolototo anyoun koEtam, kibelooros kiton Pi-kakirot naitei Baal-sepon: kidukuroto akonyen nuka Migidol.
Kolototo anyoun kakonyen nuka Kakirot kitoro kidiŋ aŋolol kiton amodiŋ: koloto alosit naka apaarasia auni kamodiŋ naka Etam, kidukuroto Mara.
Kolototo anyoun koMara kodolut Elim: ajaas toma Elim atanin atomon kaarei ka idukudukun akaisakanykaarei; kidukuroto nen.
Kolototo anyoun koElim, kidukuroto ariri naka Aŋolol Nakareŋan.
Kolototo anyoun kAŋolol Nakareŋan, kidukuroto amodiŋ naka Sin.
Kolototo anyoun kamodiŋ naka Sin, kidukuroto Dopuka.
Kolototo anyoun koDopuka, kidukuroto Alus.
Kolototo anyoun kAlus, kidukuroto Repidim, neamamikiniata ituŋa akip numatan.
Kolototo anyoun koRepidim, kidukuroto amodiŋ naka Sinai.
Kolototo anyoun kamodiŋ naka Sinai, kidukuroto Kiburotkataaba.
Kolototo anyoun koKiburot-kataaba, kidukuroto Kaserot.
Kolototo anyoun koKaserot, kidukuroto Ritima.
Kolototo anyoun koRitima, kidukuroto Rimon-peres.
Kolototo anyoun koRimon-pcres, kidukuroto Libuna.
Kolototo anyoun koLibuna, kidukuroto Risa.
Kolototo anyoun koRisa, kidukuroto Kekelata.
Kolototo anyoun koKekelata, kidukuroto moru Seper.
Kolototo anyoun komoru Seper, kidukuroto Karada.
Kolototo anyoun koKarada, kidukuroto Makelot.
Kolototo anyoun koMakelot, kidukuroto Takat.
Kolototo anyoun koTakat, kidukuroto Tera.
Kolototo anyoun koTera, kidukuroto Mitika.
Kolototo anyoun koMitika, kidukuroto Kasimona.
Kolototo anyoun koKasimona, kidukuroto Moserot.
Kolototo anyoun koMoserot, kidukuroto Bene-yaakan.
Kolototo anyoun koBene-yaakan, kidukuroto Kor-kagidigad.
Kolototo anyoun koKor-kagidigad, kidukuroto Yotibata.
Kolototo anyoun koYotibata, kidukuroto Aburona.
Kolototo anyoun koAburona, kidukuroto Esion-geber.
Kolototo anyoun koEsiongeber, kidukuroto amodiŋ naka Sin (ŋipeŋin ŋes Kades).
Kolototo anyoun koKades, kidukuroto moru Kor, ariri naka akwap naka Edom.
Kodoka Aaron esasedoti moru Kor kaicorakinet naka EJAKAIT, kotwanik nen, kokaru lokakaisaoŋon kedaut idwe luka Isirael anyoun kakwap nako Misiri, kolap lokikanyet, kapaaran kanasodit naka elap.
Kerai Aaron loka ikar akwatat ka akaisaarei ka luuni etwanikini moru Kor.
Kolototo anyoun komoru Kor, kidukuroto Salimona.
Kolototo anyoun koSalimona, kidukuroto Punon.
Kolototo anyoun koPunon, kidukuroto Obot.
Kolototo anyoun koObot, kidukuroto Iyeabarim, koikor loka Moab.
Kolototo anyoun koIyim, kidukuroto Dibon-gad.
Kolototo anyoun koDibon-gad, kidukuroto Alumon-dibilataim.
Kolototo anyoun koAlumon-dibilataim, kidukuroto oroŋan luka Abarim, eiteo ka Nebo.
Kolototo anyoun koroŋan luka Abarim, kidukuroto apuutona nuka Moab ariri naka Yorodan koYeriko.
Kidukuroto ariri naka Yorodan anyoun koBet-yesimot aitodol Abel-sitim kapuutona nuka Moab.
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa kapuutona nuka Moab kariri naka Yorodan koYeriko atiar,
“Kiner kidwe luka Isirael, kolimok kes ebe, Kidokata yesi Yorodan kodolo akwap naka Kanaan.
Ireŋearete luiboienenete kakwap kere kakonyenekus, imudiarete akecemor kere nuigirir, ka akeceputosia nuiswamatai kasua, imudiarete da akeceiboisio nuiceleleete.
Irumete yesi akwap, iboienenete da kanen, naarai kainak yes airum akwap.

Irumete yesi akwap kailamilam eroet kwape ejaatar ikekiakus; iinakinete luipu airumet naepol, ka luikidioko iinakinete airumet naedit, naebeikinia ituŋanan eroet, eraun ŋin nakeŋ; irumete ŋes kwape ejaatar atekerin nuka lukapapaakus.

Konye arai mam ireŋearete kakonyenekus luiboienenete kakwap, esalete do ŋul luitasalete yesi esubito bala ibore yenedopodopoi akusikonye, bala da ikukwa kosiepionokus, kitunyunyurikinete yes kakwap naiboienenete yesi kotoma.
Ejaun do ebe, kwape tikaomitor eoŋ aiswamakin kes, keswamakini yes da kwape kwaŋin.”
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Kicorak idwe luka Isirael, ebe, Kidoloto akwap naka Kanaan, (ŋin ŋes akwap nakibei yes araun airumet, akwap nako Kanaan kwape ejaatar iikorunoke.)
Ewaikus loka ari naka eŋalakimak enyouni kamodiŋ naka Sin kiririkina Edom, eikorukus da loka ari naka eŋalakimak enyouni kosaŋe loka Aŋolol naka Abalaŋ kobei kide:
Ekudoori ekusikor ari naka eŋalakimak naka acinat naka Akurabim, kobei Sin: kodoli ari naka eŋalakimak naka Kades-barunea; kolosi Kasaradar, kobei Asumon:
Ekudoori bobo eikor koAsumon kiton ocor yenika Misiri, kodoli aŋolol.
“Eikorukus da loka ari nakoto ŋes Aŋolol Nakapolon karirike: eraun ŋol eikorukus loka ari nakoto.
“Lo ŋes eikorukus loka ari naka agolitomei: igirunete anyoun kAŋolol Nakapolon kiton Moru Kor:
Anyoun koMoru Kor igirunete kiton neelomaria Kamat; kodoli eikor Sedad;
Kolosi eikor kiton Sipiron, kodoli Kasar-enan: ŋol ŋes eikorukus loka ari naka agolitomei.
“Igirunete eikorukus loka ari nakokide anyoun koKasar-enan kiton Sepam:
Ŋesar eikor anyoun koSepam kiton Ribula, kari nakokide naka Ain; iiesar eikor edoli ariri naka aŋolol naka Cineret kobei kide:
Ŋesar eikor kiton Yorodan, kodoli Aŋolol naka Abalaŋ: eraun ŋin akusikwap kwape ejaatar ikeikoruno luelukunito.”

Naarai adumu ateker naka idwe luka Reuben kwape ejaatar ikalia luka lukapapaakec, ka ateker naka idwe luka Gad kwape ejaatar ikalia luka lukapapaakec, adumu da atutubet naka ateker naka Manase airumetekec:
Adumut atekerin aarei ka atutubet naka ateker airumetekec juwai naka Yorodan koYeriko kari nakokide, neelomunia akoloŋ.”
Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar,
“Lu kes ikiroria luka ituŋa luekorokoroetc akwap kanukus araun airumet: Eleasar esasedoti, ka Yosua okoku loka Nun.
Ilemunete yesi ekapolon ediopet loka ŋiniteker akorokor akwap araun airumet.
Lu kes ikiroria luka ituŋa: loka ateker naka Yuda, Kaleb okoku loka Yepune.
Loka ateker naka idwe luka Simeon, Semuel okoku loka Amikud.
Loka ateker naka Benyamin, Elidad okoku loka Cisilon.
Loka idwe luka Dan ekapolon, Buki okoku loka Yoguli.
Loka idwe luka Yosep; loka ateker naka idwe luka Manase ekapolon, Kaniel okoku loka Epod:
loka ateker naka idwe luka Epuraim ekapolon, Kemuel okoku loka Sipitan.
Loka ateker naka idwe luka Sebulun ekapolon, Elisapan okoku loka Paranac.
Loka ateker naka idwe luka Isakar ekapolon, Palutiel okoku loka Asan.
Loka ateker naka idwe luka Aser ekapolon, Akikud okoku loka Selomi.
Loka ateker naka idwe luka Naputali ekapolon, Pedakel okoku loka Amikud.
Ŋul kes luecorakini EJAKAIT akorokor airumet kanuka idwe luka Isirael kakwap naka Kanaan.”
“Kicorak idwe luka Isirael koinakis Ilebin ireria luiboiononoto kotoma kairumetekec; iinakinete do Ilebin ironyia luelukunito ireria ŋul.
Iboienenete kesi koreria; ejaunos ironyiakec kanuka ibarenekec ka iborokec ka itianikec kere.
Ironyia luka ireria luiinakinete yesi Ilebin, enyounete karwatat naka ere kiton kiŋa ikubitin

Itemete kiŋa naka ere ikubitin ilukumin iarei kari nakokide, ikubitin ilukumin iarei kari naka eŋalakimak, ikubitin ilukumin iarei kari nakoto, ka ikubitin da ilukumin iarei kari naka agolitomei, kojai ere kidiŋ, ŋul kes ironyiakec luka ireria.
Ireria luiinakinete Ilebin koraas ireria ikanykape lukuianara, luiinakinete ekaaran ituŋanan akeriar: iyatakinete ireria akaisaoŋon ka luarei neejaas ŋul.
Ireria kere luiinakinete Ilebin imwaasi ireria akaisaoŋon ka lukanykauni: iinakinete kes ka ironyiakec.

Ireria luiinakinete kairumet naka idwe luka Isirael, kaneejaas luipu ilemarete luipu; kaneejaas luikidioko da ilemarete luikidioko: ŋinituŋanan kwape ejaar airumeteke nairumi einakini Ilebin ireriake.”
“Kolimok idwe luka Isirael ebe, Kidokata Yorodan adolore akwap naka Kanaan.
Iseunete ireriakus lueraunos ireria lukuianara; tetere ekaaran loeari ituŋanan komam epelet ekereari ŋina.
Eraunos ireria luikuianarete yesi kaneejai ekenyaŋaran; tetere mam ekaaran etwani, aitodol naebwoia kakonyen nuka ekodet kanuka atubokinio.
Ireria luiinakinete eraunos kamakus ireria ikanykape lukuianara.
Iinakinete ireria iuni kajuwai naka Yorodan, iinakinete da ireria iuni kakwap naka Kanaan; eraunos ireria lukuianara.
Eraunos ireria ŋul ikanykape luekuianarete idwe luka Isirael, imoit da, ka ikeboiororon kotomakec: tetere ŋinituŋanan yeneari ituŋanan komam epelet ekereari ŋina.
Arai da kitiŋ amoru naepedori aiar ituŋanan asenio ŋes, kotwana, erai ŋesi ekaaran: abeit eario ekaaran da.
Arai da esenit ŋes kakitoi naepedori aiar ituŋanan kotwana, erai ŋesi ekaaran: abeit eario ekaaran da.
Ekenyaŋaran aokot elopet eari ekaaran: nairiamakinotor kaŋes, eari.
Arai eremorit ŋes kanuka alait, arai ibirit ŋes, koŋopikinite, tape etwani;
Arai esenit ŋes kakan kanuka asurup, tape etwani; abeit eario ŋol lokeseni ŋes; erai ekaaran: eari ŋes ekenyaŋaran aokot nairiamakinotor kaŋes.
“Konye arai eremorit ŋes komamei asurup, arai ibirit ŋes kidiobore komam eŋopikinit.
Arai kadiomoru naepedori aiar ituŋanan, komam eanyunit ŋes, kibirio ŋes tape etwani, komam erai lokasurupike, karaida loemootor ŋes aronis:
Etubokini ekodet ekasenon ka ekenyaŋaran aokot kwape ejaatar itubesia lu:
Eyuuni ekodet ekaaran kakan naka ekenyaŋaran aokot, inyakari da ekodet ŋes oreke loakuiarit loakerearit: iboienenei kenan aitodol naetwania esasedoti lopeti, loinyonyoikinitai akinyet nakalaunan.
Konye arai kilam ekaaran eikor loka ereke loakuiarit loakerearit;
Kosodi ekenyaŋaran aokot adumakin ŋes kiŋa keikor loka ereke loakuiarit, kosodi ekenyaŋaran aokot aiar ekaaran; emamuun ŋes akirot kanuka aokot;
Naarai tiebusakinit je asalakinit oreke loakuiarit aitodol naetwania esasedoti lopeti; konye akaulo katwanare naka esasedoti lopeti, eboŋori ekaaran akwapuke naka airumeteke.
Ŋin yeneari ituŋanan eario ikaaran kakirot naka ikajenak: konye mam ituŋanan eario kanuka akirot naka ekajenan ediopet bon.
Sirikijaut egelit kanuka aijar naka ekaaran loebeit atwanare: konye abeit eario.
Sirikijaut egelit kanuka ŋol loekerit oreke loekuiarit, aboŋunio aiboie akwap, aitodol naetwania esasedoti.
Kwaŋin do mam imunaunete akwap naiboiononoto: naarai emunaarete aokot akwap: mam akwap epedori alucio kanuka aokot nuebukorio kotoma, dimarai kaokot nuka ŋol kaloabukori kes.
Sirikimuna da akwap naiboiononoto, naeboienenei eoŋ kokidiŋ; naarai Eoŋ EJAKAIT eboienenei kokidiŋ kidwe luka Isirael.”
Kobalas ebe, “Abu EJAKAIT kicorak ekajakait ainakin idwe luka Isirael akwap araun airumet kailamilam eroet: kicorak da EJAKAIT ekajakait ainakin airumet naka onacekosi Selopekad adweke.

Arai kemanyata odwe luka atekerin ace nuka idwe luka Isirael kes, elemario do airumetekec kairumet naka lukapapakosi, imorikikinio airumet naka ateker naemanyario kes: kwaŋin elemario do koroet loka airumetekosi.
Kedol ekaru loka eyubili loka idwe luka Isirael, ŋes do imorikikinere airumetekec kairumet naka ateker naemanyario kes: kwaŋin elemario do airumetekec kairumet naka ateker naka lukapapakosi.”
Na ŋes akirot naicorakinit EJAKAIT kanuka adwe nuka Selopekad, ebe, ‘Kodukokinos kesi luitojokito kesi; konye edukokinos lukokek loka ateker naka papakec.’
Kwaŋin mam airumet naka idwe luka Isirael eyaŋaario kateker adiopet ainakinio aceteker: naarai idoŋete idwe luka Isirael ŋinituŋanan airumet naka ateker naka lukapapake.
Ido ŋinipese naejai airumet kotoma ateker kere naka idwe luka Isirael, edukokini lokokek loka ateker naka papake, tetere irumete idwe luka Isirael ŋinituŋanan airumet naka lukapapake.
Kwaŋin mam airumet eyaŋaario kateker adiopet ainakinio aceteker; naarai idoŋete atekerin nuka idwe luka Isirael ŋinidiopet airumeteke.”
Kwape kicorakinia EJAKAIT Musa, kiswamata adwe nuka Selopekad kwaŋin:
Naarai apotu Mala, ka Tirusa, ka Kogila, ka Milika, ka Noa, adwe nuka Selopekad, kodukonokinos odwe luka iinacan luka papakec.
Apotu kodukonokinos okekia luka odwe luka Manase okoku loka Yosep, kosalak airumetekec ateker naka ekek loka papakec.
Erai alosit naka apaarasia atomon kanadiopet anyoun koKoreb ibei moru Seir kiton Kades-barunea.
Kosodi kokaru loka akaisaoŋon, kolap lokitomonet ka lodiopet, kapaaran nasodit naka elap, abu Musa kolimok idwe luka Isirael kwape ajaatar kere nuabala EJAKAIT ŋes aicorakin kes;
Kedau aidany Sikon ekabaka loka Imorain, lueboiete koKesibon, ka Og ekabaka loka Basan loeboie koAsitarot, ka Ederei:
Kokekwa loka Yorodan kakwap naka Moab, abu Musa kogeu alimor ikisila lu ebe,
“Abu EJAKAIT Ewokodeke kotema oni koKoreb atiar, ‘Iboioto yesi noi koroŋat kalo:

Kibelokinos, kobwota, koloto akwap nakiukon naka Imorain, ka aiboisio kere nuidunyatar, Araba, akwap nakiukon, ka apuutona, ka Eŋalakimak, ariri naka aŋolol, akwap naka Ikanaanin, ka Lebanon, kiton ocor lokapolon, ecor Eupurat.
Koany, ebwaik akwap akonyenekus: kolomasi, kirumata akwap naabu EJAKAIT kiyapoik lukapapaakus, Aburaam, ka Isaak, ka Yakob, ainakin kes ka aurikec naetupanakini.’
Abu EJAKAIT Ekusideke kitupuu yes, ido koany, isubito yesi lolo bala aacer nuka akuj kanuka aipues.
Kitupuu EJAKAIT, Edeke loka lukapapaakus etiaikus lo irwan alukumit, kisirereŋ yes, kwape kisumunio yes!
Ekwaikini eoŋ ai apedori bon adakit aitapasitoikus, ka alaŋirukus, ka epegetekus?
Koseutu ituŋa luecoak, luka aijen, ka luejenas, kwape ejaatar atekerinikus, adakakini eoŋ apolokinit yes.’
Ipotu koboŋokis eoŋ ebe, ‘Ejokuna sio aswam akirot nainer ijo.’

Kwaŋin abu kadakak lukapolok luka atekerinikus, ituŋa luecoak luejenas, araun lukipolokinito yes, ikapolok luka ilukumin, ikapolok luka akwat, ikapolok luka akaisakany, ka ikapolok luka itomon, ka ijaka, kwape ejaatar atekerinikus.
Abu kecorak ikatubokokus kapak kaya ebe, ‘Kopupoto akiro nuka iinacanakus, kotubokis kadolit etuŋanan ka onaceke, ka imoit yenejai kaŋes.
Mam itiakito ituŋa kotube; ipupete ludidik ka luepolok kopone ediopet; mam ikuriakaros akonyen nuka ituŋanan; naarai erai etube loka Edeke: akirot nakitionikini yes iyaunete mamaka, apupuni eoŋ ŋes.’
Abu kecorak yes kapak kaya akiro kere nukibusakinito aswam.
Abu katema yes atiar, ‘Idolut akwap nakiukon naka Imorain, nakiinakinit EJAKAIT Edekewok.
Koany, ebwaiki EJAKAIT Edekekon akwap akonyenekon: kolot kirum, kwape kilimokinia EJAKAIT Edeke loka lukapapaakon; sirikikurianar, karaida ajuruŋuŋ.’
Ipotu kikunyut neajai, ŋinituŋanan kayesi, kotemasi atiar, ‘Ketiliŋaasi ituŋa, korotakis oni akwap, tetere kiinunete oni akirot naka erot lokibusakinit aitor, ka ireria lukidolokini.’
Abu ketojok akirot ŋin: kaseu ituŋa itomon ka luarei, ediopetuŋanan kaŋiniteker:
Apotu kibelokinos koloto oroŋat, kodoloto aditot naka Esukol, korotata.
Kolemut araito nuka akwap kakaninikec, koinut oni, koinut da akirot ebe, ‘Ejok akwap nakiinakinit EJAKAIT Ewokodeke.’
Ipotu kirurumata kowemanakus ebe, ‘Kanu naarai kilait EJAKAIT oni, ŋes kitolomunia kakwap nako Misiri, aijaikin oni akan naka Imorain, amudiar oni.
Ai bo kilosi oni? acalasi iwokoinacan iwokotauon, ebe, “Epolok ituŋa, eojak da adepar oni; epolok ireria, ebwaitai da kiton akuj; bobo da kianyu odwe luka Anakim kaŋina.” ’
Kasodi eoŋ atemar yes ebe, ‘Sirikiyaloŋoŋoto, karaida akurianar kes.
EJAKAIT Ekusideke lokiŋarenikinit yes, ŋes kijiikini yes kwape ejaatar kere nuabu kiswama kanukus koMisiri kakonyenekus;
Kamodiŋ da, neianyuniata kwape kidakio EJAKAIT Ekusideke yes, kwape edakia etuŋanan ikokuke, korotin kere luilosete, aitodol naidolunioto aibois na.’
Konye kakirot kaŋin, mam ipotu kiyuut EJAKAIT Ekusideke.
Loabu kiŋarenikinite yes korot, amoikin yes aibois naibubukinete ikusiweman, kotoma akim kuare, aitodikin yes erot loitorete, kotoma odou da paaran.
‘Abeit mam idiopet kotuŋa kalu luka aturi kana nakaronon eanyuni akwap naejok naeyapoik ainakin lukapapaakus.
Dimarai Kaleb, okoku loka Yepune, ŋes eanyuni; ainakini ŋes ka ikedwe akwap naecak ŋesi: naarai atupa cut EJAKAIT.’
Abu da EJAKAIT kanyunyurik eoŋ kanukus ebe, ‘Mam jo da ilomari ŋina:
Yosua, okoku loka Nun, loebwoi kakonyenekon, ŋes elomari ŋina: kitogogoŋ ijo ŋes; naarai ŋes isurumi Isirael akwap.
Bobo da ludidikikus, luibalasi yesi ebe eraunos imejan, ka idwekus, lumam lolo ejenete ajokis karaida aronis, kes elomarete, ainakini kes akwap, irumete.
Konye yes, kibelokinos, koloto modiŋ korot loebei Aŋolol Nakareŋan.’

“Kosodete yesi aboŋokin eoŋ ebe, ‘Kidiaka isio kama ejai EJAKAIT, kilosi ejie, kwape ejaatar kere nukicorak EJAKAIT Ewokodeke oni.’ Ipotu koenata ŋinituŋanan lujiisike, koomitos araut akirot naebenen adokar oroŋat.
Katema EJAKAIT eoŋ atiar, ‘Kolimok kes ebe, Sirikidokasi, karaida ejie; naarai mam eoŋ ajai kayes; kinyeis lukasurupokus aidany yes.’
Abu kalimok yes kwaŋin, koŋeroto apupun; konye ipotu kipaliikis aicorakinet naka EJAKAIT, koŋasikinos adokar oroŋat.
Kopotu Imorain lueboiete koroŋat kaŋol asurokin yes, korukioto yes, kwape erukio ao, kodanyata yes koSeir kiton Koruma.
Ipotu koboŋut aimony akonyen nuka EJAKAIT; konye mam EJAKAIT abu kopup ekusiporoto, karaida aitoikin yes akit.
Kwaŋin ipotu kiboioto koKades apaarasia nuipu, kwape ejaatar apaarasia nuipotu kiboioto kaŋina.
Katema EJAKAIT eoŋ atiar,
‘Irimosi eroŋat lo apaarasia nuipu: kibelokinos ari naka agolitomei.
Kicorak ijo ituŋa ebe, Itorete oikor loka ikusiinacan idwe luka Esau, luiboiete koSeir; kikuriakaros kesi yes: aso ca kocoito noi:
Sirikiŋolopata kakes; naarai mam kainakini yes akecekwap, mam karaida nepeicakakini etau loka akeju bon, naarai ainak Esau moru Seir airum.
Igwelete inyamat lunyaman kapesan kamakec; igwelete da akipi numatan kapesan kamakec.
Naarai kisirereŋit EJAKAIT Ekonideke jo kaswam kere naka akanikon; abu ŋesi kojenu alositekon kamodiŋ kana nakos: ajaenena EJAKAIT Ekonideke kajo ikar lu akaisaoŋon; amamei ibore yenibu kipuda.’
Kwaŋin katuboros kaneejaas iinacanawok idwe luka Esau, luiboiete koSeir, anyoun korot loka Araba, anyoun koElat, ka Esion-geber.
“Kebelokinos ketoro orot loka amodiŋ naka Moab.
Katema EJAKAIT eoŋ atiar, ‘Sirikitunyunyurik Moab, karaida aitoŋolop kes kojie: naarai mam kainakini yes airum akekwap; naarai ainak idwe luka Lot airum Ar.’
(Apotu Iemim kiboioto kanen sek, ituŋa luapolok, kipu, koojak bala Inakaim:
Amaikinitai ŋul Irepaim, kwape Inakaim; konye enyarito Imoabin kes Iemim.
Eboioto Ikorin da koSeir sek, konye kirumata idwe luka Esau aiboisikec; komudiasi kes kakonyenekec, kiboikinos aiboisikec; kwape eswamakinia Isirael akwap naka airumeteke, naainakini EJAKAIT kes.)
‘Aso konyoutu do, kodokata aguurut Sered.’ Kipou kadokata aguurut Sered.

Apaarasia nukinyounio oni koKades-barunea, aitodol nakidokia aguurut Sered, emwaasi ikar akaisauni ka lukanykauni; aitodol naadaunor atur kere naka ituŋa lukajiok koidukurun, kwape eyapoikinitor EJAKAIT kes.
Bobo da aluikinit akan naka EJAKAIT kes, amudiar kes koidukurun, aitodol naadaunotor.
“Kosodi kanen ketwaka ituŋa kere lukajiok, kodaunos da kotuŋa.
Katema EJAKAIT eoŋ atiar,
‘Itori ijo lolo Ar, oikor loka Moab:
Naikunyakinia neejaas idwe luka Amon, sirikitunyunyurik kes, karaida aitoŋolop: naarai mam kainakini jo airum akwap naka idwe luka Amon: naarai ainak idwe luka Lot airum ŋes.’
(Ŋin da emaikinitai akwap naka Irepaim: eboioto Irepaim kanen sek; konye enyarito Imorain kes Isamsumim;
Ituŋa luapolok, kipu, koojak bala Inakaim; konye abu EJAKAIT komudia kes kakonyenekec: kirumata kesi, kiboikinos aiboisikec:
Kwape abu ŋesi kiswamakinia idwe luka Esau, luiboiete koSeir, naamudiaria Ikorin kakonyenekec; kirumata kesi, kiboikinos aiboisikec kiton lolo:
Iabim da lueboiete koreria kiton Gasa, apotu Ikaputorim lualomunete koKaputor komudiasi kes, kiboikinos aiboisikec.)
‘Konyoutu, koloto, kitoroto aditot naka Arunon; koany, ainak Sikon Emorait, ekabaka loka Kesibon ka akwapuke akanikon: kogeutu airum ŋes, koŋolopata kitijioto ŋes.
Ageun lolo ebwaikini etasurokon ka ailiilikon otuŋa luejaas kwap kakuj kere, luepupunete akirokon, kosodete amaran ka ariebakin kanukon.’
‘Kisiikinai ketor akwapukon: aderi erot lokapolon, mam apaari akan nakoteten karaida nakokediany.
Kitwegeli ijo eoŋ inyamat lunyaman kapesan; ka akipi da numatan kapesan: kisiikinai ketor aitor kakeje;
Kwape apotu idwe luka Esau luiboiete koSeir ka Imoabin luiboiete koAr keswamakiniata; aitodol naadokia Yorodan alomar akwap nakiinakinit EJAKAIT Ekosideke sio.’
Konye mam Sikon ekabaka loka Kesibon abu kisiik oni aitor akwapuke: naarai abu EJAKAIT Ekonideke kitogogoŋ ekemoyo, kitininik eketau, tetere ijaikini ŋes akanikon, kwape ejaar lolo.
Katema EJAKAIT eoŋ atiar, ‘Koany, ageu aijaikin jo Sikon ka akekwap: kogeu airum, tetere irumi akekwap.’
Kosodi Sikon alomun asurokin oni, ŋes ka iketuŋa kere, ejie koYakas.
Kijaik EJAKAIT Ewokodeke ŋes mamawok; kadanyata ŋes ka odweke, ka ituŋake kere.
Kerumata ireriake kere kapak kaŋin, kamudiasi cut ŋolire loeboioto ituŋa kotoma, ka aŋor ka ludidik; mam kipou kedeutu idio kakesi:
Dimarai kipou kaŋatutu ibaren, ka luŋatan lukiŋatuni koreria lukipou kerumata.
Anyoun koAroer, loejai ariri naka aditot naka Arunon, kore da loejai aditot, kiton Gilead, amamei ere lokiwojakinit oni: abu EJAKAIT Ewokodeke kijaik kere mamawok:
Dimarai akwap naka idwe luka Amon ŋes mam yes ikunyakinete; ariri kere naka ecor Yabok, ka ireria luka akwap nakiukon, ka neabu EJAKAIT Ewokodeke kitikok oni.
“Kasodete aibelokin kabeata Basan: kolom Og ekabaka loka Basan asurokin oni, ŋes ka iketuŋa kere, ejie koEderei.
Katema EJAKAIT eoŋ atiar, ‘Sirikikurianar ŋes; naarai ejaik ŋes ka ituŋake kere, ka akwapuke akanikon; iswamakini ŋes kwape ibu kiswamakinia Sikon ekabaka loka Imorain, lueboiete koKesibon.’
Kwaŋin kijaik EJAKAIT Ewokodeke Og da, ekabaka loka Basan ka ituŋake kere akaniwok: kadanyata ŋes aitodol naamameunor yenedeikina ŋes.
Kipou kerumata ireriake kere kapak kaŋin; amamei erekec lomam oni kipou kerumata; ireria akaisakanykape, akwap kere naka Arugob, ajakanut naka Og koBasan.
Ireria ŋul kere araas luabwaitai karwatatin ka irutei ka agolito nuaojak; kogelara ireria lumam abwaitai karwatatin luepu noi.
Kipou kamudiasi kes cut, kwape kiswamakinia Sikon ekabaka loka Kesibon, kamudiasi cut ŋolire loeboioto ituŋa kotoma, ka aŋor ka ludidik.
Konye kipou kaŋatutu ibaren kere ka luŋatan lukiŋatuni koreria.
Kerumata akwap kapak kaŋin kakan naka ikabakan iarei luka Imorain luajaas okekwa loka Yorodan, anyoun kaditot naka Arunon kiton moru Kerumon;
(Kerumon loenyarito Isidonin Sirion, enyarito da Imorain ŋes Senir:)
Ireria kere luka apuuton, ka Gilead kere, ka Basan kere, kiton Saleka ka Ederei ireria luka ajakanut naka Og koBasan.

(Naarai Og ekabaka loka Basan, ŋes bon asalit kotoma kaluedeuna luka Irepaim; koany, eitadake kerai eitada loka asuat; mere ejai Raba neejaas idwe luka Amon? Aojauke kerai ikubitin Ikanykaoŋon ka alalauke ikubitin iwoŋon, kwape ejaar ekubit
Ka Gilead naedeuna ka Basan kere, ajakanut naka Og abu eoŋ kainak atutubet naka ateker naka Manase; akwap kere naka Arugob, ŋes Basan kere. (Emaikinitai ŋipeŋin akwap naka Irepaim.
Abu Yair okoku loka Manase koyaŋa akwap kere naka Arugob, kiton oikor loka Igesurin ka Imaacatin; abu komaik kes, ŋes Basan, ekekiror elopet, Kabot-yair, kiton lolo.)
Abu kainak Makir Gilead.
Abu kainak Ireubenin ka Igadin anyoun koGilead kiton aditot naka Arunon, akidiŋot naka aditot ka eikoruke; kiton ocor Yabok, loerai eikor loka idwe luka Amon;
Araba da, ka Yorodan ka eikoruke, anyoun koCineret kiton aŋolol naka Araba, Aŋolol naka Abalaŋ, naejai kwap neijululuoro Pisiga kari nakokide.
Konye esalete akusiŋor, ka ludidikikus, ka ibarenekus oreriakus lukainak yes, (ajeni ebe ipu yes ibaren);
Aitodol naisiyeŋunia EJAKAIT ikusiinacan, kwape yes, aitodol nairumiata akwap naeinakinit EJAKAIT Ekusideke kes kokekwa loka Yorodan: ŋes konyet iboŋunioto yesi ŋinituŋanan alupoke nukainak yes.’
Abu kecorak Yosua kapak kaŋin ebe, ‘Aanyut akonikonye kere nueswamaki EJAKAIT Ekonideke ikabakan ŋul luarei: iswamakini kwaŋin EJAKAIT ajakanuto kere nuitori ijo mamakec.
Mam ikuriakaros kes: naarai EJAKAIT Ekusideke, ŋes kijiikinit yes.’

‘Wu EJAKAIT Edeke, igeu aitodikin ekonibulesit akonipolou ka akonikan nakagogoŋ: naarai iŋai edeke loejai toma akuj arai toma akwap, loepedori aswam kwape ejaatar akoniswamisio, ido kwape ejaatar akoniswamisio nukapedor?
Keŋaiŋait, kisiikinai katubor aanyun akwap naejok naejai okekwa loka Yorodan, eroŋat ŋol loejok, ka Lebanon.’
Konye abu EJAKAIT kanyunyurik eoŋ kanukus, mam abu kapup eoŋ: katema EJAKAIT eoŋ atiar, ‘Kililiŋ; sirikiner bobo keoŋ akirot ŋin.
Kodoka ijo aidi naka Pisiga, kiteluo akonikonye to, ka agolitomei, ka eŋalakimak, ka kide, koany kakonyekon: naarai mam idokari Yorodan lo.
Konye kodakak Yosua, kitogogoŋ ŋes, kiticat: naarai iŋarenikini ŋesi ituŋa lu, isurumi kes akwap naianyuni ijo.’
Kwaŋin keboikinos aditot naiteos kaBet-peor.
Siriyatanakinete akirot nakecorakini yes, karaida aiŋoŋar, tetere iricete aicorakineta nuka EJAKAIT Ekusideke nukecorakini yes.
Aanyut akusikonye nukesubi EJAKAIT kanuka Baal-peor: naarai ituŋa kere luatuparito Baal-peor, abu EJAKAIT Ekusideke komudia kokidiŋikus.
Konye yes luipotu kiketakinos kama kEJAKAIT Ekusideke ejari ŋinidiopet kayesi lolo.
Koany, kesisianak yes ikisila ka itubesia, kwape kecorakinia EJAKAIT Ekadeke, kiswamaenenete kwaŋin kotoma akwap nailomarete airum.
Aso kocoito aiswamaenen; naarai ŋin ŋes acoakus ka aijenekus kakonyen nuka atekerin nuepupunete ikisila ŋul kere, etemarete ebe, ‘Abeit ateker na nakos eraas ituŋa lukacoa ka lukaijen.’
Naarai ateker nakos naanyoin, ejai edeke diekec, kwape ejaar EJAKAIT Edekewok nakiwoneeneneo ŋes?
Ido ateker nakos naanyoin, ejaas ikisila ka itubesia luebeito kwape ejaatar ikisila ŋul kere, luebwaik eoŋ akonyenekus lolo?

Apaaran nakolo ibwoia kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT Ekonideke koKoreb, nakatemaria eoŋ EJAKAIT atiar, ‘Kotukonokinai ituŋa, eoŋ da esiirari kes akakiro, kisisiaut ayoŋitenen eoŋ apaarasia kere nuebusioto kakwap, kisisianakinete kesi da ikecedwe.’
Ipŋulotu yesi da kikunyakis kobwaata kokwap kemoru; kosaran emoru kiton otau loka akuj; ka amuton, ka idouon, ka amuton naijesi cucucuc.
Kiner EJAKAIT kayes kokidiŋ akim; ipotu kopuput eporoto loka akiro, konye mam eanyuna idiobore; dimarai eporoto bon.
Abu kolimok yes akeitutuket, naabu kicorak yes aiswamaenen, kes aicorakineta atomon; ewadikat toma amor aarei.
Kecorak EJAKAIT kapak kaya aisisianakin yes ikisila ka itubesia, tetere iswamaenenete kakwap naidokarete airum.
kinyeis amunaun bonik, aikeun aput naepusit idiobore kere, aput naka yenikiliokit arai yeniberu.
Aput naka etiaŋ loejai akwap, aput naka akweny kere naejaas abebenoka naeporitoi kapak.
Aput naka ibore kere yeneliat kokwap, aput naka ibore yenika ecor yenejai toma akipi kwap kalup.

Ido kinye aiteluor akonikonye akuj, kiany da akoloŋ, ka elap ka aacer, ŋes ajore kere nakokuju, kijodijodoorete jo aima kes, ka aijaanakin, luabu EJAKAIT Ekonideke kokorak ituŋa kere luejaas kwap kakuj kere.
Konye abu EJAKAIT kolem yes kasua nuesaranete, koyaŋau koMisiri, araun kamakeŋ ituŋa luka airumet, kwape ejaar lolo.
Bobo da abu EJAKAIT kanyunyurik eoŋ kanukus, keyapoik eoŋ kenyek aidok Yorodan, karaida alomar akwap ŋin nakajokan nakiinakini EJAKAIT Ekonideke araun airumet:
Konye kebusakinit eoŋ atwanikin akwap na, mam kebusakinit aidok Yorodan: konye idokarete yesi, kirumata akwap ŋin nakajokan.
Kocounitos, kinyeis aimurwokin aitutuket naka EJAKAIT Ekusideke, naitutuki kayes, aikeun aput naepusit idiobore kere naabu EJAKAIT Ekonideke kisimik.
Naarai erai EJAKAIT Ekonideke akim naidopori, Edeke loka ekolo.
Anyaraunit akuj ka akwap araun akajenakakus lolo, ebe, itwakete cut atipet kakwap nailosete airum okekwa loka Yorodan; mam akusipaarasia ipuaros, konye imudiaros cut.
Kisiarisiarari EJAKAIT yes otuŋa, ideuni etiaikus edit katekerin, nukireŋeikini EJAKAIT yes.
Ijaanakinete kaŋina idekesio, luesubete ituŋa kakecekanin, akito ka amor, lumam esesenete, karaida aipup, karaida ainyam, karaida aiŋuun.
Konye arai kimo ijo EJAKAIT Ekonideke kaŋina, idumuni ijo ŋes, arai kimo ijo ŋes kekonitau kere ka akoniijar kere.
Naijaikinor ocan, nakidolokinioto da akiro ŋun kere kapaarasia nukokau iboŋuni mama ejai EJAKAIT Ekonideke, ipupuni do ekeporoto:
Naarai EJAKAIT Ekonideke erai Edeke loketimon, mam kijalakini, karaida amudiar jo, karaida aimurwokin aitutuket naka lukapapaakon naabu kiyapoik kes.
Epupunito kereka apeŋo ituŋa eporoto loka Edeke inera kokidiŋ kakim kwape ipupunioto yesi, kosodete aijar?

Arai abu Edeke kotamak alemun ateker kokidiŋ naka aceteker, kaigimoreta, ka aanyuneta, ka nukaumokin, ka ejie, ka akan nakagogoŋ, ka akan naerioro, ka nusogim nukos, kwape ajaatar kere nuabu EJAKAIT Ekusideke kiswama kanukus koMisiri kakonyenekus?
Aponi kitodikin jo tetere ijenuni ebe EJAKAIT ŋes Edeke; emamei ece dimarai ŋes.
Abu kisiira jo ekeporoto kakuj, tetere kisisianakini jo: abu da kitaany jo akekim naepol kakwap; kopup akekiro kokidiŋ kakim.
Kanu naarai abu komina lukapapaakon, abu koseu akeceur naetupakini, kitolom jo koMisiri kakepedor naepol, kojaenena kajo:
Aireŋear atekerin nuepolok nuegogoŋ da adepar jo kakonyenekon, aitolomar jo, ainakin jo akecekwap airum, kwape ejaar lolo.
Aso do kojen lolo, kibwaik otaukon, ebe, EJAKAIT erai Edeke kokuju toma akuj, kwap da kakwap: emamei ece.
Irici ijo ikekisila ka aicorakinetake, nukecorakini jo lolo, tetere ijaun ijo ejok, ka ikonidwe lukitupakinete jo, tetere ipuaros akonipaarasia kakwap nakiinakini EJAKAIT Ekonideke ikar kere.”
Tetere ikaaran ekereari ŋina, yeneari iidunyeteke komam epeleikinit, komam elait ŋes lem sek; tetere ekereari ore ediopet kaŋul kosodi aijar:
Kes lu, Beser kotoma amodiŋ, kapuuton, kanuka Ireubenin; ka Ramot kotoma Gilead kanuka Igadin; ka Golan kotoma Basan, kanuka Imanasin.
Lu kes ikisila luabu Musa kibwaik akonyen nuka idwe luka Isirael:
Nu kes aitejenuneta, ka ikisila, ka itubesia luabu Musa kolimok idwe luka Isirael naalomuniata koMisiri;
Okekwa loka Yorodan kaditot naitei Betpeor, kakwap naka Sikon ekabaka loka Imorain, loeboie koKesibon, luadanyi Musa ka idwe luka Isirael naalomuniata koMisiri:
Kirumata akekwap, ka akwap naka Og, ekabaka loka Basan, ikabakan luarei luka Imorain, luajaas okekwa loka Yorodan kama eŋiunia akoloŋ;
Anyoun koAroer, naejai ariri naka aditot naka Arunon, kiton moru Sion (ŋopeŋol ŋes Kerumon).
Ka Araba kere okekwa loka Yorodan ari nakokide, kiton aŋolol naka Araba, kwap neijululuoro Pisiga.
Konyarau Musa Isirael kere, kotema kes atiar, “Ijo ba Isirael, kiira ikisila ka itubesia lualimokini akiikus lolo, tetere isisiaete kes, kosodete airic aiswamaenen.
Abu EJAKAIT Ewokodeke kitutukik oni koKoreb.
Mam EJAKAIT abu kitutukik lukapapaawok aitutuket ŋin, konye oni, oni lukija ne kere lukijari lolo.
Abu EJAKAIT kiner kayes kiteos komoru kokidiŋ kakim.
(Abwoi eoŋ kokidiŋ EJAKAIT ka yes kapak kaŋin, aitodikin yes akirot naka EJAKAIT: naarai ikuriaka yesi akim, mam ipotu kodokasi moru,) ebe,

Sirikikukonokin kes, karaida aijaanakin kes: naarai eoŋ EJAKAIT Ekonideke arai Edeke lokekolo, edopet kodwe numam adolit nuka lukapapaakec, kiton atur nakiwuniet ka nakiwoŋonet naka ŋul kalukalaito eoŋ;
Ido etimi ilukumin luka ituŋa lukaminas eoŋ koricito akaicorakineta.
Kitaaritoi apaarasia akanykape, kiswama akoniswamisio kere;

Konye do apaaran nakikanyetekaarei ŋes asabato naka EJAKAIT Ekonideke: apaaran ŋin sirikiswama adioswam kere, ijo, ka okokukon, ka akokukon, ka ekonikejaanakinan, ka akonikejaanakinan, ka ekonimoŋ, ka akonisigiria, ka ikonibaren kere, ka imoit yenejai orekon; tetere ekonikejaanakinan ka akonikejaanakinan iyeŋete kwape kajo.
Kiitu ijo ebe irai kolo ijo ebulesit kakwap nako Misiri, kitolom EJAKAIT Ekonideke jo kakan nakagogoŋ, ka akan naerioro: kanuka ŋun kicorakinit EJAKAIT Ekonideke jo airic apaaran nakasabato.
Kosodi naipupunioto yesi eporoto kokidiŋ kamuton, konoki akim komoru, ipotu kikunyut neajai eoŋ, ikapolok kere luka atekerinikus, ka imakiokus;
Kotemasi yesi atiar, ‘Koany, kitodik EJAKAIT Ewokodeke oni akeibuses ka akepolou, kipupu da ekeporoto kokidiŋ kakim: kijenu lolo ebe ineras Edeke kituŋanan, ido ejari.
Kanukinyo do kitwakia isio? Naarai kinyamaari sio akim na naepol: kitwaki arai kiipupu bobo eporoto loka EJAKAIT Ewokodeke.
Naarai iŋai yenejai akuan, yenikepupunit eporoto loka Edeke lokajaran inera kokidiŋ kakim, kwape kipupunio oni, kosodi aijar?
Kikunyak ijo, kopup kere nuetemari EJAKAIT Ewokodeke: kosodi ijo alimokin sio kere nukilimonokini EJAKAIT Ewokodeke; kipupuni isio, kiswamai da.’
“Abu EJAKAIT kopup eporoto loka akirokus, nakilimokiniata eoŋ; katema EJAKAIT eoŋ atiar, ‘Apup eporoto loka akiro nuka ituŋa kalu, nukilimokis jo: alimut ejok ŋun kere nuenerata.
Bala ti kojaenena etau loikoni nen kotomakec, kayoŋito eoŋ, koricito akaicorakineta tiritir, tetere ejaunos ejok ka ikecedwe ikar kere!
Kolot kolimok kes ebe, “Koboŋosi yesi owemanakus.”
Konye ijo, kobwo kane, kalimokini jo aicorakineta kere, ka ikisila, ka itubesia, luisisianakini ijo kes, tetere iswamaenenete kes kakwap naainakini kes airum.’
Kanuka ŋun iricete aswam kwape kicorakinia yes EJAKAIT Ekusideke: mam ipaarete akan nakoteten karaida nakokediany.
Ilosenenete koroietin kere lukorak yes EJAKAIT Ekusideke, tetere ijarete, ijaunos ejok, iyatakinos da akusipaarasia kakwap nairumete.
“Aso na ŋes aicorakinet, ka ikisila, ka itubesia, lukicorakinit EJAKAIT Ekusideke aisisianakin yes, tetere iswamaenenete kakwap naidokarete airum:
Tetere iyoŋit EJAKAIT Ekonideke, iricenenei ikekisila kere ka akeicorakineta, nukecorakini jo, ka ikonikoku ka epapaitikon, apaarasia kere nuka aijarakon; tetere ibusi apaarasia nuipu.
Aso kiira, ijo Isirael, koricite aiswamaenen kwaŋin; ijaun ejok, ido kipuaros noi, kwape kolo kisumunio EJAKAIT, Edeke loka lukapapaakon, kakwap naeleleete akile ka esik.
Kominenena EJAKAIT Ekonideke kekonitau kere, ka akoniijar kere, ka akonigogoŋ kere.
Akiro nu da, nukecorakini lolo, kojaananas otaukon:
Ido kodunyakinite aisisianakin kes ikonidwe, kinerenena da kes iboienenei kotogokon, ilosenenei korot, iperenenei, inyoununei da.
Koenanakini da akanikon araut aanyunet, kotorokinite da kidiŋ oreet.
Kiwadikaenenei da ategerio nukotogokon, koruteikon de.
Ka itogoi luileleba iboro lukajokak kere, lumam jo ilelebit, ka amototin nuebokok, numam jo ibokit, imanikoria luka emusabibu ka iseitunin, lumam irait, konyam kimonikin;
Ŋes konyet icoitor sirikiimurwok EJAKAIT, lokitonyouni kakwap nako Misiri, kotogo loka ebulesene.
Koyoŋitenenei EJAKAIT Ekonideke; kijaanakinenei ŋes, ido kiyapoenenei kokirorike.
Siritupanarete icedekesio, kodekesio luka atekerin nukilukunitos yes;
Naarai EJAKAIT Ekonideke loejai kidiŋikon erai Edeke lokekolo; kinyek anyunyura naka EJAKAIT Ekonideke adakakin jo, komudia kakwap.
Kodunyakinito airic aicorakineta nuka EJAKAIT Ekusideke, ka aitejenunetake, ka ikekisila, lukicorakini jo.
Kiswamaenenei da naedolit ka naejok kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT: tetere ijaun ejok, ilomari da airum akwap nakajokan nakiyapoikini EJAKAIT lukapapaakon.
Aireŋear lukasurupokon kere kakonyenekon, kwape kinerar EJAKAIT.
“Kiiŋit okokukon kapaarasia kanuepote ebe, ‘Inyo bo apolou naka aitejenuneta, ka ikisila, ka itubesia lukicorakini EJAKAIT Ewokodeke?’
Kosodi itemari okokukon atiar, ‘Kirai ibulesin luka Parao koMisiri; kitonyou EJAKAIT koMisiri kakan nakagogoŋ:
Ido kitodu EJAKAIT aanyuneta ka nukaumokin, nukos ka nuetioko, koMisiri, ka Parao da, ka eketogo kere, kakonyekosi:
Kitonyou kaŋina, tetere kitolomari ainakin akwap nakiyapoikini lukapapaawok.
Ido kicorak EJAKAIT aiswamaenen ikisila ŋul kere, ayoŋenen EJAKAIT Ewokodeke, kanuka ajokisiwok apaarasia kere, tetere kidarenenei kijarete, kwape lolo.
Eraun da adolit kamawok, arai kikokit aswam aicorakinet na kere kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT Ewokodeke, kwape kicorakinia.’
Ido nakijaikinia EJAKAIT kes mamakon, idanyi ijo kes; imudiari kes cut; mam itutuki kakes, karaida aitim kes:
Mam imanyasi kakes; mam ikorakini okokuke akonipese, karaida amanyakin okokukon akokuke.
Naarai ibelokini ŋesi okokukon kinye atupit eoŋ, tetere ijaanakinete icedekesio; kwaŋin inepuni anyunyura naka EJAKAIT kamakus, kimudiari da atipet.
Konye iswamakinete kes kwanata; itiyanakinete itemwanakec, imunyumunyete ipirinokec, ijepejepete Aserimikec, icweete da akeceputosia nuegerer.
Mere naarai ipu yesi adepar icetuŋa ŋes kiminar EJAKAIT yes, koseu da; kwabo ikidioko yesi adepar ituŋa kere:

Konye naarai kimina EJAKAIT yes, ido naarai itodolit aiyaposit naeyapoikini lukapapaakus, ŋes do kitolomunia EJAKAIT yes kakan nakagogoŋ, kilakunia yes kotogo loka ebulesene, alemun kakan naka Parao ekabaka loko Misiri.
Aso do kojenutu ebe EJAKAIT Ekusideke, ŋes Edeke; Edeke lomunot, loericit aitutuket ka aitim kaneejaas lueminas ŋes, ka luericito aicorakinetake kiton aturio alukumit;
Eropi ŋupeŋul luelaito ŋes, amudiar kes: mam iyapi airop ŋipeŋin yenelait ŋes.
Kanuka ŋun irici aicorakinet, ka ikisila, ka itubesia lukecorak jo lolo aiswamaenen.

Ido kiminenena jo, kisirereŋenenei jo, kitupui jo: isirereŋi da aur naka akonikuan, ka araito naka alupokon, ka akimakon, ka ebinokon, ka akinyetekon, eiyas loka aitukukon ka amerekekinikon, kakwap naabu kiyapoik lukapapaakon ainakin jo.
Kisirereŋio jo adepar ituŋa kere: emameun yenikiliokit arai yeniberu yenirakan kotomakus, karaida kobarenekus.
Elemari EJAKAIT adekesia kere kamakon; mam ibwaikini mamakon adio da kadekesia nueroko nuka Misiri, nuijeni ijo da, konye ibwaikini kes mama ejaas ŋul kere lukilaito jo.
Imudiari ituŋa kere lukijaikini EJAKAIT Ekonideke jo; mam akonikoŋu itimi kes: karaida aijaanakin ikecedekesio; naarai eraun ŋin atacit kamakon.
Mam ikurianar kes: iituni jokan nuabu EJAKAIT Ekonideke kiswamak Parao, ka Misiri kere;

Aigimoreta nukos nuapotu akonikonye koanyut, ka aanyuneta, ka nukaumokin, ka akan nakagogoŋ, ka akan naerioro, nakitolomunia EJAKAIT Ekonideke jo; iswamakini kwaŋin EJAKAIT Ekonideke ituŋa kere luikuriana ijo.
Bobo da ijukari EJAKAIT Ekonideke ekaturuturut neejaas kesi, aitodol neetwakiata luideunos kakesi ka lueŋopete.
Mam ikurianar kes: naarai ejaenena EJAKAIT Ekonideke kajo, Edeke lokos loketasuro da.
Ireŋeari EJAKAIT Ekonideke atekerin ŋun motimot: mam imudiari kes katipet, kinyeis itiaŋ luka ais aiyatakin kamakon.
Konye kijaikini EJAKAIT Ekonideke jo kes, iticani kes kaiticaneta nukos, aitodol neemudiarere.
Ijaikini ikabakanakec akanikon, itooliori Ijo ekecekiror kokwap kakuj: emamei ituŋanan yenikibwoikini jo, aitodol naimudiaria kes.
Icwei aputosia nuegerer nuka idekesiokec: mam iŋobelei epuesa ka esabu loejaatar kesi; karaida ayaŋaun ŋes mamakon, kinyek aipok kanen: naarai erai naketal kaneejai EJAKAIT Ekonideke:
Mam iyauni yeniketal togokon kinyek araun yenikenitoi kwape kaŋesi: italeori ŋes cut, ilai da ŋes cut; naarai erai ibore yenikenitoi.
“Iricete aicorakinet kere nakecorak yes lolo aiswamaenen, tetere ijarete, kipuaros, kolomasi airum akwap naabu EJAKAIT kiyapoik lukapapaakus.
Iituni erot kere loabu EJAKAIT kiŋarenikinio jo ikar lu akaisaoŋon kotoma amodiŋ, tetere inonokiari ijo, aigimor jo ajenun nuejaas otaukon, arai irici aicorakinetake arai mam.

Abu kitononok jo, kitakany jo eteŋei, kitanyam jo emanu, lomam ibu kojeni, karaida lukapapaakon mam ajenete; tetere kitejenuni jo ebe mam ituŋanan ejari kanuka atap bon, konye ejari ituŋanan kanuka ŋinikirot naelomuni kaituk naka EJAKAIT.
Mam akoninapito abu komojon, karaida akonikeju abuun, kokar kalu akaisaoŋon.
Iwomoomoi ijo kotaukon ebe, kwape elecoria ituŋanan okokuke, kilecori EJAKAIT Ekonideke jo kwaŋin.
Irici ijo aicorakineta nuka EJAKAIT Ekonideke, alosenen korotinike, ka ayoŋit ŋes.
Naarai kiyaŋaarit EJAKAIT Ekonideke jo akwap naejok, akwap naka aguurun nuka akipi, naka akonye nuka atanin ka aidules, nuibulubulununos kaditon ka iukon;
Akwap naka akima ka esairi, ka imusabibun, ka itinin ka ikamamagan; akwap naka iseitunin luka akinyet, ka esik;
Akwap nainyamiata atap naidila, emameun ibore yenipudakinos kaŋina; akwap naeraas akemor asuat, naibokuniata aisinit koukonoke.
Inyami kimonikin, ituri EJAKAIT Ekonideke, kanuka akwap naejok nakiinak jo.
Arai kidau ainyam kimonikin da, kidau adukun itogoi luejok kiboikin nen:
Naeuriarotor isipaninikon luka aituk ka luka imerekekin, naiyatakinor epuesakon ka esabukon, naiyatakinotor da ŋul kere luijaatar ijo;
Kinyek ekonitau adakun, kimurwok EJAKAIT Ekonideke lokitolomuni jo kakwap nako Misiri, kotogo loka ebulesene;
Lokiŋarenikinit jo kamodiŋ nakos naesogim, naajaas imunwo luka akim ka ikiritona, ka akwap naeonit naamameete akip; loetolomuni akipi kanukus katiiba naegogoŋ;
Lokitanyami jo kamodiŋ emanu lomam lukapapaakon ajenete; tetere inonokiari ijo, tetere da kigimori jo, aiswamakin jo nuejok kapaarasia nuepote;
Itemari kotaukon ebe, ‘Apedorika ka agogoŋ naka akakan kes kadumakis eoŋ abara na.’
Konye kiitu ijo EJAKAIT Ekonideke, naarai ŋes lokikorakini jo agogoŋ naidumunia abar; tetere iticasi akeitutuket naeyapoikini lukapapaakon, kwape ejaar lolo.
Kosodi arai kiimurwok ijo EJAKAIT Ekonideke, kitupa da icedekesio, aijaanakin kes, ka aima kes, ketejen yes lolo ebe abeit imudiaros.
Kwape katekerin nuemudianari EJAKAIT kakonyenekus, imudiaros yesi da kwape kwaŋin; naarai iŋeroto apupun eporoto loka EJAKAIT Ekusideke.
Ituŋa luepolok lueojak da, odwe luka Anakim, luijeni ijo, luipupu ijo ebakai ebe, ‘Iŋai epedori abwoikin odwe luka Anak?’

Kojen do lolo ebe, EJAKAIT Ekonideke ŋes lokiŋarenikinit jo bala akim naenyami; emudiari ŋesi kes, itukukumi kes kakonyenekon: ireŋeari ijo kes kwaŋin, imudiari kes atipet, kwape kilimokinia EJAKAIT jo.

Mere kanuka adolitekon, karaida kanuka aitenara naka etaukon, ilomaria ijo airum akecekwap: konye kanuka aronis naka atekerin kaŋun ŋes ireŋeara EJAKAIT Ekonideke kes kakonyenekon, tetere iticasi akirot naabu EJAKAIT kiyapoik lukapapaakon, Aburaam, ka Isaak, ka Yakob.
“Kojen do ebe mam EJAKAIT Ekonideke kiinakinit jo airum akwap na naejok kanuka adolitekon; naarai iraas yesi ituŋa lueninik imurisiŋa.
Kiitu, sirikiimurwok, kwape ibu kitunyunyurikinia EJAKAIT Ekonideke kamodiŋ: ageun kapaaran nailomunia kakwap nako Misiri aitodol naidolunioto aibois na, ipaliikinito EJAKAIT.
KoKoreb da, ipotu kitunyunyurikis EJAKAIT, abu EJAKAIT konyunyurik yes, tikimudiarit da.
Naadokaritor eoŋ moru aijaun amor, kes amor nuka aitutuket naetutukikinit EJAKAIT yes, kasodi aiboi komoru apaarasia akaisaoŋon ka akuaresia akaisaoŋon; mam abu kanyam atap, karaida aimat akipi.
Kejaik EJAKAIT eoŋ amor ŋun aarei nuewadikatai kebokorit loka Edeke; ewadikatai kes kwape ejaatar akiro kere nuabu EJAKAIT kolimok yes komoru kokidiŋ kakim kapaaran naka atukokin.
Kosodi kedaunos apaarasia akaisaoŋon ka akuaresia akaisaoŋon, kainak EJAKAIT eoŋ amor ŋun aarei, kes amor nuka aitutuket.
Katema EJAKAIT eoŋ atiar, ‘Konyou, kijesar atipet; naarai amunaunos ikonituŋa luitolomuni koMisiri; apaasi atipet korot loabu kecorak kes; asubut aput naacaluna.’
Aso do kinyeinai, kamudia kes, kamwata ekecekiror kokwap kakuj: ketuluori jo ateker naegogoŋ naepol da adepar kes.’
Kasodi kebelokin kejesun komoru, konoki emoru akim: kojaas da amor ŋun aarei nuka aitutuket akaninika aarei.
Abu kasesen, ido koany, ipotu kodiakasi kama ejai EJAKAIT Ekusideke; ipotu kiswamaut itaok yenicaluna: ipotu kopaasi atipet korot lokicorakinit EJAKAIT yes.
Abu ketiŋ amor ŋun aarei, kacaka kes kakaninika, kabwaŋ kes kakonyenekus.

Abu kebiror kwap kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kwape kapak kaya, apaarasia akaisaoŋon ka akuaresia akaisaoŋon; mam abu kanyam atap karaida aimat akipi; kanuka adiakaretakus kere nuipotu kodiakasi, kanuka aswam nueroko kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT aitunyunyurikinia ŋes.
Naarai akuriana anyunyura ka akadakin naapol, nakinyunyurikinitor EJAKAIT amudiar yes, Konye abu EJAKAIT kapupok eoŋ kapak kaŋin da.
Abu EJAKAIT konyunyurik noi Aaron tiemudiarit ŋes: abu eoŋ kelipak Aaron da apak ŋipeŋin.
Abu kalem adiakaretekus, itaok yenipotu kosubut, kecwe ŋes kakim, kepudapud ŋes, kedupudupo, aitodol neasubia bala apua: kewelak apuake aguurut naijesuna komoru.
Ido nakijukaria EJAKAIT yes koKades-barunea ebe, ‘Koloto, kirumata akwap nakainak yes’; ipotu kipaliikis aicorakinet naka EJAKAIT Ekusideke, koŋeroto aiyuun ŋes karaida apupun ekeporoto.
Ipalionokis EJAKAIT ageun kapaaran nakajenunia yes.
“Kebiror do kwap kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT apaarasia akaisaoŋon ka akuaresia akaisaoŋon nuabu kebiror; naarai abu EJAKAIT kobala ebe ekoto amudiar yes.
Abu kelip EJAKAIT ebe, ‘Wu EJAKAIT Edeke, sirikimudia ikonituŋa ka airumetekon, nailaku kapoloukon, naitolom koMisiri kakan nakagogoŋ.
Kiitu ikonibulesin, Aburaam, ka Isaak, ka Yakob; sirikite aninik naka ituŋa kalu, karaida aronisikec, karaida adiakaretekec:
Kinyek akwap nakitolomunia ijo sio atemar ebe, “Naarai mam EJAKAIT abu kopedo aitolomar kes akwap naabu kisumun kes, ido naarai alait kes, ŋes etolomaria kes aarakin amodiŋ.”
Kwabo eraas ikonituŋa, airumetekon da, naitolomuni ijo kapedorikon naepol ka akanikon naerioro.’
“Ewadikakini amor ŋun akiro nuajaas amor nusodit nuibu kobwaŋ, ibwaikini ijo kes asaduku.
Abu keswamau asaduku naka akito nuka ekasia kakeu da amor aarei nueputos kanusodit, kadoka moru, ketiŋite amor ŋun aarei kakanika.
Abu kiwadika amor kwape ajaatar aiwadikaeta nusodit, aicorakineta atomon, nuabu EJAKAIT kolimok yes komoru kokidiŋ kakim kapaaran naka atukokin: kainak EJAKAIT eoŋ kes.
Abu kebelokin, kejesun komoru, kebwaik da amor toma asaduku naabu kekeu; ejaas nepenen, kwape abu EJAKAIT kecorakinia eoŋ.
Konyout kanen kolototo Gudugoda; konyout koGudugoda kiton Yotobata, akwap naka aguurun nuka akipi.
Kogita EJAKAIT ateker naka Lebi kapak kaŋin, adakenen asaduku naka aitutuket naka EJAKAIT, abwoenen kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT aijaanakin ŋes, aisirereŋ kokirorike, kiton lolo.
Kanuka ŋun emamei Lebi akorakinet karaida airumet koinacanake; EJAKAIT ŋes airumeteke, kwape abalar EJAKAIT Ekonideke ŋes.)
Katema EJAKAIT eoŋ atiar, ‘Konyou, kiŋarenik ituŋa alosit; elomarete airum akwap naabu keyapoik lukapapaakec ainakin kes.’
Airic aicorakineta nuka EJAKAIT, ka ikisilake, lukecorak yes lolo, tetere idumuni ajokis?
Koany, akuj, ka akuj naka akuj, akwap, ka luejaas toma kere eraas luka EJAKAIT Ekonideke.
Konye itojokit EJAKAIT amina lukapapaakon, abu koseu akeceur naatupakini, ŋes yesi, kotoma otuŋa kere, kwape ejaar lolo.
Kokepata do amunyin nuka itauonokus, siri bobo kitininikata imurisiŋakus.
Naarai EJAKAIT Ekusideke, erai Edeke loka idekesio, EJAKAIT da loka ijaka, Edeke lokos, lokapedor, loketasuro, lomam etiakit ituŋa, karaida acamun agwelio.
Etubokini ikokiok ka apuserun, emina imoit, ainakin ŋes inyamat ka anapito.
Kominasi do yesi da imoit, naarai iraas kolo yesi da imo kakwap nako Misiri.
Koyoŋitenenei EJAKAIT Ekonideke, kijaanakinenei ŋes, kimorikikinos kaŋes, kiyapoenenei kokirorike.
Erai ŋesi aituritikon, ŋesi da Edekekon, lokiswamak jo akiro ŋun nuepolok nuketasuro, nuaanyutu akonikonye.
Apotu lukapapaakon koloto Misiri ituŋa akaisakanykaarei; konye kwana kitupuu EJAKAIT jo kwape aacer nuka akuj kanuka aipues.
Kojenutu do yesi lolo: naarai mam enera kidwekus lumam ejenunito, lumam eanyunito da alecor naka EJAKAIT Ekusideke, akepolou, akanike nakagogoŋ, ka akekan naerioro.
Aanyunetake, ka aswamisioke, nuabu kiswamak Parao ekabaka loko Misiri, ka akwapuke kere, koMisiri;
Nuabu kiswamak ajore naka Misiri, ibalasinikec ka agalinikec: kwape abu korapiaria kes kakip nuka Aŋolol Nakareŋan nakidapitotor yes, kwape amudiaria EJAKAIT kes, kiton lolo;
Nuabu kiswamak yes kamodiŋ, kiton naidolunioto aibois na;

Nuabu kiswamak Datan ka Abiram, odwe luka Eliab, okoku loka Reuben; kwape abu akwap kooŋaria akeituk, kiliko kes, ka ikaliakec, ka iwemanakec, ka ŋinibore kere yenejari yenatuparit kes, koIsirael kere:
Konye aanyut akusikonye aswam kere naepol naeswama EJAKAIT.
Tetere iyatakinos akusipaarasia kakwap naabu EJAKAIT kiyapoik lukapapaakus ainakin kes ka akeceur, akwap naeleleete akile ka esik.
Naarai akwap nailosi ijo airum, mam eputos kakwap nako Misiri, nailomuniata yesi, naibu koyeik ikinyomokon, naibu kobukonok akipi kakejekon, kwape amana naka idiasio;
Konye akwap naidokarete yesi airum, erai akwap naka iukon ka aditon, emasi da akipi nuka akiru naka akuj:
Akwap naidari EJAKAIT Ekonideke; esesenete ŋes akonye nuka EJAKAIT Ekonideke, amear kageunet naka ekaru kiton osaŋe loka ekaru.
Ainakini do akwapukus akiru kotoma apakike, akiru naka aiporo, ka akiru naka akamu, tetere ituki akimakon, ka ebinokon, ka akinyetekon.
Ainakini da imanikoriakon inya kanuka ibarenekon, ido inyami kimonikin.
Kocoito, kinyeis ikusitauon amodio, kosodete apaar, aijaanakin icedekesio aima kes;
Kosodi anyunyura naka EJAKAIT ainepun aluikin yes, agolokin akuj tetere emameun akiru, tetere mam akusikwap ebwaŋuni akeraito; kosodete yesi atwakare atipet kakwap naejok nakiinakini EJAKAIT yes.
Kisisianakis kes ikusidwe, kinerenena da kes, iboienenei kotogokon, ilosenenei korot, iperenenei, inyoununei da.
Kiwadikaenenei da ategerio nukotogokon, koruteikon da:
Tetere akusipaarasia ka apaarasia nuka idwekus iyatakinos kakwap naabu EJAKAIT kiyapoik lukapapaakus ainakin, kwape apaarasia nuka akuj kokuju kakwap.
Naarai arai kidunyakis yesi aricit aicorakinet na kere nakecorak yes aiswamaenen; aminenena EJAKAIT Ekusideke, alosenen korotinike kere, aimorikikin kaŋes;
Ŋes do ireŋearia EJAKAIT atekerin ŋun kere kakonyenekus, irumete do yesi atekerin nuepolok nuegogoŋ da adepar yes.
Ŋiniibois naicakete akusikeje eraun nakus: anyoun kamodiŋ, ka Lebanon, anyoun kocor, ecor Eupurat, kiton aŋolol nakoto, ŋes eraun eikorukus.
Emameun etuŋanan loepedori abwoikin yes: ibwaikini EJAKAIT Ekusideke etasurokus ka ailiilikus akwap kere naicakete yesi, kwape kilimokinia.
Arereŋ, arai kipupoto aicorakineta nuka EJAKAIT Ekusideke nukecorak yes lolo:
Ekenit da, arai kiŋeroto apupun aicorakineta nuka EJAKAIT Ekusideke, kosodete apaar korot lokecorak yes lolo, atupar icedekesio, lumam yes ijenunito.
Mere ejaas kesi okekwa loka Yorodan, kiŋaren kerot kama elomari akoloŋ, kakwap naka Ikanaanin luiboiete koAraba, naitei Giligal, eiduny kiluan luka More?
Naarai idokete yesi Yorodan alomar airum akwap nakiinakinit EJAKAIT Ekusideke, irumete ŋes, iboikinos da nen.
Kidarenenete aitodol ikisila kere ka itubesia luebwaik akonyenekus lolo.
Komudiasi aiboisio kere nuejaanakiniata atekerin nuirumete yesi ikecedekesio, koroŋan lueojak, koukon, kokwap da naka ŋolikitoi kaloepesit:
Kotiyanakis itemwanakec, komunyumunyata ipirinokec, kicweata Aserimikec: kojepejepata aputosia nuegerer nuka idekesiokec; komudiasi ekecekiror kaibois kaŋin.
Konye sirikiswamakis kwaŋin EJAKAIT Ekusideke.
Konye aibois naeseuni EJAKAIT Ekusideke aibwaikin ekekiror katekerinikus kere, komoenenete aiboisike, koponenenete nen:

Koyaŋaununete nen ainakinetakus nuicweio, ka asubanakus, ka lukitomonetakus, ka ainakinet naedakio naka akusikan, ka aiyaposiokus, ka ainakinetakus nuka akote, ka ikiyaik luka isipaninikus luka aituk ka luka amerekekin:
Konyamenenete kanen kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT Ekusideke, kolakanaros kotoma kaŋinibore kayeniswamaete, yesi ka ikaliakus, nakisirereŋio EJAKAIT yes.
Siriswamaete iboro kere lukiswamai oni kane lolo, ŋinituŋanan luedolito kakonyeneke:
Naarai eroko yes kedolo aiyeŋun ka airumet nakiinakinit yes EJAKAIT Ekusideke.
Konye kidokata Yorodan, kiboikinos da akwap nakisurumi yes EJAKAIT Ekusideke, kisiyeŋun yes kaneejaas lukasurupokus kere lukilukunito, kosodete iboikinos da inapakina;

Kosodi kanen iyaŋaunete kere lukecorak yes aibois naeseuni EJAKAIT Ekusideke aisiboikin ekekiror; ainakinetakus nuicweio, ka asubanakus, lukitomonetakus, ka ainakinet naedakio naka akanikon, ka aiyaposiokus kere nuseuna nuiyapoikinete EJAKAIT:

Kolakanaros kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT Ekusideke, yes ka ikusidwe lusap ka lupesur, ka ikusikejaanakinak, ka akusikejaanakinak ka Elebit loejai orekon, naarai emamei ŋes akorakinet karaida airumet kamakus.
Kocoite ebe mam iinakini ainakinetekon naicweio kaŋiniibois naianyuni:
Konye kaibois naeseuni EJAKAIT kotoma adiopet katekerinikus, iinakini kanen ainakinetakon nuicweio, nen da iswamaenena kere nukecorakini jo.
Konye sirinyamenenete aokot; kobukonorete kwap bala akipi.

Sirikinyamak oruteikon yenikitomonet yenika akimakon, ka ebinokon, ka akinyetekon, karaida ikiyaik luka isipaninikon luka aituk ka luka amerekekin, karaida aiyapositikon kere naiyapoi, karaida ainakinetakon nuka akote, karaida ainakinet naedakio naka akanikon;

Konye konyamak kes akonyen nuka EJAKAIT Ekonideke kaibois naeseuni EJAKAIT Ekonideke, ijo ka okokukon, ka akokukon, ka ekejaanakinanikon, ka akejaanakinanikon, ka Elebit loejai orekon: kolakanar kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT Ekonideke kotoma kanuiswamai kere.
Kocoite kinyek aijal Elebit apaarasia kere nuiboionono ijo kakwap.

Arai elwana kaneijai ijo aibois naeseuni EJAKAIT Ekonideke aibwaikin ekekiror, iari do yenika esipanikon loka aituk arai loka amerekekin, lokiinak EJAKAIT jo, kwape kecorakinia jo, inyamakini oruteikon, kwape ejaar eimiel loka ekonitau.
Kwape enyamere amori ka amiam, inyami ijo da ŋun kwaŋin: lumam elaete ka luelaete da enyamete ŋun kopone ediopet.
Konye kitogogoŋ na ebe mam inyamete aokot: naarai aokot ŋes aijar; sirikinyam aijar nepepe kakiriŋ.
Sirinyamenenei kes; kobukonori kwap bala akipi.
Sirinyamenenei kes; tetere ijaun ejok, ka idwekon lukitupanakinete, naiswamaa ijo nuedolito kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT.
Konye koyaŋanari iborokon lukalaunak luijaatar, ka aiyaposiokon, kolot aibois naeseuni EJAKAIT.
Iinakini ainakinetakon nuicweio, akiriŋ ka aokot kotem loka EJAKAIT Ekonideke: ebukokinio aokot nuka asubanakon otem loka EJAKAIT Ekonideke, inyami ijo akiriŋ.
Kidarenene kopupununei akiro nu kere nukecorak jo, tetere ijaun ejok ka ikonidwe lukitupanakinete jo ikar kere, naiswamaa nuejok nuedolito da kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT Ekonideke.
Kocoite jo kinyek alokio atupari kes kemudiar kes kakonyenekon; kinyek aiŋitun idekesiokec ebe, ‘Ijaanakinete atekerin nu ikecedekesio biai? Keswama eoŋ da kwape kwaŋin.’
Sirikiswamak kwaŋin EJAKAIT Ekonideke: naarai eswamakis ikecedekesio nuketal kere kaneejai EJAKAIT, nuelait ŋesi; naarai icweanakinete ikecedwe lusap ka lupesur mama ejaas idekesiokec.
Kosodi aanyunet arai aumokinet adolore, nakilimokinia do jo ebe, ‘Katupasi icedekesio lumam jo ijenunit, kejaanakis kes’;
Sirikipupok akiro nuka enabi kaŋol, arai nuka ekerujan kaŋol lokairujasia: naarai kigimori EJAKAIT Ekusideke yes, ajenun arai iminas EJAKAIT Ekusideke kekusitau kere ka akusiijar kere.
Kotupenenete EJAKAIT Ekusideke, koyoŋito ŋes, koricito aicorakinetake, korimarito ekeporoto, kijaanakis ŋes, kimorikikinos da kaŋes.

Eario enabi ŋol arai ekerujan ŋol lokairujasia; naarai ener nukepali mama ejai EJAKAIT Ekusideke lokitolomuni yes kakwap nako Misiri, lokilakuni yes kotogo loka ebulesene, aitapaar yes korot lokicorakinit EJAKAIT Ekusideke aitorit. Ilemari kwaŋin aronis kamakon.
Idekesio luka ituŋa lukirimorito jo, luidunyas kajo, arai luelwaka kaneijai ijo, ameun kosaŋe ediopet loka akwap kiton osaŋe loce loka akwap;
Sirikicam akekiro, karaida apupun ŋes; karaida akonikoŋu aitim ŋes, karaida aideun, karaida aibwa ŋes:
Konye iari ŋes cut; akonikan ŋes egei aiar ŋes, kosodete konyet akanin nuka ituŋa kere.
Ibiribirei ŋes kamor, kotwana; naarai akoto ŋesi aitapaar jo anyoun kama ejai EJAKAIT Ekonideke lokitolomuni jo kakwap nako Misiri, kotogo da loka ebulesene.
Epupuni Isirael kere, eyoŋi da, mam bobo iswamai aronis naikoni nen kamakon.
‘Alomasi lukelepa ice kamakon, etapaasi luiboienenete korekec ebe, “Kaloto kejaanakisi icedekesio,” ’ lumam yes ijenunito;
Iŋituni do ijo, imoi, iŋici kojokan; ido koany, arai erai abeit, kitogogoŋitete akiro, ebe eswamaun naketal ŋin kamakon;
Idanyi luiboienenete kore kaŋol kakwanis naka ekileŋ, imudiari kes cut, ka luejaas toma kere, ka ibareneke, kakwanis naka ekileŋ.
Kotukokini luŋatanake kere kidiŋ orotoke, icwei ere kakim, ka luŋatanake kere, mama ejai EJAKAIT Ekonideke: eraun aapoŋor ikar kere; mam bobo edukio.
Sirikiŋadak idiobore yenikenitoi akanikon: tetere ibelokin EJAKAIT ainyein adedeŋ naka akenyunyura, kitim jo, kisioni jo, kitupuu jo, kwape abu kiyapoikinitor lukapapaakon;
Naipupio ijo eporoto loka EJAKAIT Ekonideke, aricite aicorakinetake kere nukecorakini jo lolo, aiswamaenen nuedolito kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT Ekonideke.
Naarai iraas yesi ituŋa lukalaunak kaneejai EJAKAIT Ekusideke, kiseu EJAKAIT yes araut ituŋake obe, kotuŋa kere luejaas akwap.
Lu kes itiaŋ luinyamete: emoŋ, ka amerekek, ka akinei.
Amiam, ka amori, ka emalet, ka akinei naka ais, ka eloba, ka ekal, ka ecilil.
Ka ŋinitiaŋ kere yenetiakak emagegeret, ka yenimwaasi atutubeta aarei nuka emagegeret, yeninyogonokini anyak ikenyamat, kotiaŋ, inyamete ŋin.

Konye mam inyamete lu kotiaŋ luinyogonokinete anyak ikecenyamat, arai kaŋul luimwaasi atutubeta aarei nuka emagegeret: akaala, ka ipoo, ka enyuru, naarai inyogonokinete anyak ikecenyamat, konye mam imagegerekec etiakak, eraas lumam elaete kamakus.
Ka epege, naarai etiakak emagegereteke konye mam inyogonokini anyak ikenyamat, erai lomam elai kamakus: sirikinyama akecekiriŋ, sirikitirosi da akecewat nukatwak.
“Inyamete lu koboro kere luejaas akipi: inyamete ŋin yenejaas isigigirio ka aabel:
Sirikinyama ŋin yenemameete isigigirio ka aabel; erai yenimam elai kamakus.
“Inyamete akweny kere nuelaete.
Konye lu kes lumam inyamete: emorukaalet, ka ekokom, ka ogaria;
Ekulukulu, ka egole, ka etoori koponeke;
Ka ŋolikuruk koponeke;
Ka ekuulu, ka etoori loka akuare, ka eroagol, ka ecur koponeke.
Ekoloroc, ka etukuri loepol, ka etukuri loesubit bala ejaas amumwara;
Erere, ka atarukot, ka etotoet;
Etolut, ka egoro koponeke, ka aoŋor, ka emenia.
Iboro kere lueliatos luejaas abebenoka eraas lumam elaete kamakus: mam enyamenenoo.
Ipedorete ainyam akweny kere nuelaete.
“Siripoenenei ikalol kakile nuka totoke.

Inyamakini akonyen nuka EJAKAIT Ekusideke, kaibois naeseuni ŋesi aisiboikin ekekiror, idiopet kotomon yenika akimakon, ka ebinokon, ka akinyetekon, ka ikiyaik luka isipaninikon luka aituk ka amerekekin; tetere isisiauni ayoŋit EJAKAIT Ekonideke apaarasia kere.
Arai elwana alosit kaneijai ijo, tape mam ipedori aibwok, naarai elwana aibois kamakon, naeseuni EJAKAIT Ekonideke aisiboikin ekekiror, nakisirereŋio EJAKAIT Ekonideke jo:
Ŋes konyet igwelaria ŋes apesan, kosodi ajen apesan, kitiŋ kakonikan, alosit aibois naeseuni EJAKAIT Ekonideke:
Igweli kapesan kaŋun yenipuda ekonitau, imoŋin, arai amerekekin, arai ebino, arai nuitemerete, arai yenekot ekonitau: inyamakini nen akonyen nuka EJAKAIT Ekonideke iyalamikin, ijo ka ekonikal:
Mam ijali Elebit loejai orekon; naarai emamei ŋes akorakinet karaida airumet kajo.

Elebit da, naarai emamei akorakinet karaida airumet kajo, ka emoit, ka ikoki, ka apuserut, luejaas orekon, epote ainyam kimonikinos; tetere kisirereŋi jo EJAKAIT Ekonideke kaswamisiokon kere nuiswamai.
Lo ŋes epone loka aosikin: eosikini ŋinikeburan ibore yenikeyuunia ŋesi ekeidunyet; mam cut iburai ŋin kaneejai eidunyeteke ka onaceke; naarai alimor aosikin naka EJAKAIT.
Ipedori aibura yenikacekwap: konye ŋiniborekon yenejai neejai onacekon, iwosikini.
Konye emameun lokican kamakus; (naarai kisirereŋi cut EJAKAIT kakwap nakiinakinit jo EJAKAIT Ekonideke airum;)
Arai kipup ijo kojokan eporoto loka EJAKAIT Ekonideke, aidar aitodol aicorakinet na kere nakecorakini jo lolo.
Naarai kisirereŋi jo EJAKAIT Ekonideke, kwape abu kisumunio jo: iyuununei atekerin nuipu, konye ijo mam iyuun kamakec; iyai atekerin nuipu, konye mam kes kiyaete jo.
Konye abeit ijaikini ŋes yenejai akanikon, abeit iinakini ŋes luitodolete eipudake koboro luilipit ŋesi.

Kocoite sirikejaun aomisioit naerono otaukon, ebe, ‘Aapu ekaru lokikanyetekaarei, ekaru loka aosikin’; kosodi aite onacekon loicana kakoŋu naerono, komam iinakini idiobore; kosodi ŋesi amonyia jo kaneejai EJAKAIT, koraun adiakaret kamakon.
Abeit koinanakinene ŋes, sirekadanakini ekonitau naiinakinia ŋes: naarai kanuka ŋun kisirereŋi jo EJAKAIT Ekonideke kaswamisiokon kere nuiswamaenenei.
Naarai mam lukican edaunos kakwap: kanuka ŋun kecorakini jo ebe, Abeit ijaikini yenejai akanikon, onacekon, ka yenikon yenilwaritoi, ka yenikicanikon, kakwapukon.
Naiwosikinia ŋes anyoun kamakon, sirikiwosik ŋes alosit komam ibore;
Ikorakini ŋes luipu luka esipanikon, ka luka epejalikon, ka luka acuesikon naka ebino: iinakini ŋes kwape kisirereŋitor EJAKAIT Ekonideke jo.
Kiitununei ebe irai kolo ebulesit kakwap nako Misiri, kosodi EJAKAIT Ekonideke alakun jo: kanuka ŋun kecorakini jo akirot ŋin lolo.
Kosodi arai kiitema ŋesi jo atiar, ‘Mam anyouni kaneijai ijo’; naarai emina ŋesi ijo ka ekonikal, naarai ejai ejok kajo;
Ŋes konyet iyaŋaaria emutu apedokinio akekit okirigi, eraun do ekonibulesit ikar kere. Iswamakini da akonibulesit kwaŋin.
Mam kitionikini ijo naiwosikinia ŋes anyoun kamakon; naarai abu kijaanak jo ikar ikanykape itia neeti kiropia ekewoteon irwan aarei: kisirereŋi jo EJAKAIT Ekonideke kanuiswamai kere.
Inyamanakini ŋes akonyen nuka EJAKAIT Ekonideke ŋolikaru kaibois naeseuni EJAKAIT, ijo ka ekonikal.
Arai eŋwalit ŋesi adioŋwal kere, arai icoda, arai emudukana, aŋwal kere naerono, sirikiinak araun asubanit mama ejai EJAKAIT Ekonideke.
Inyamakini ŋes orekon: enyamete lumam elaete ka luelaete da, kwape amori ka amiam.
Konye sirinyamenenei aokotoke; ibukonori kwap bala akipi.
Iinakini lukosipanin luka aituk ka amerekekin araun asubanit naka aleleŋ naka EJAKAIT Ekonideke, kaibois naeseuni EJAKAIT aisiboikin ekekiror.

Sirinyamenenei imugatin luitubuunitoi kasubanit kaŋin; inyamenenei imugatin lumam itubuunitoi apaarasia akanykaarei, kes imugatin luka aiticanitoi; naarai ilomuni ijo kakwap nako Misiri komarani: tetere iituni apaaran nailomunia ijo kakwap nako Misiri apaarasia kere nuka akonikijar.
Mam edumakinio yenikitubuunet oikorunokon kere apaarasia akanykaarei; karaida aiteperoor akiriŋ kere naiinakini araut asubanit apaaran nasodit eboŋ, akuare kere kiton tupuruc.
Sirikijaik asubanit naka aleleŋ koreriakon kere, lukiinakinit jo EJAKAIT Ekonideke:
Konye kaibois naeseuni EJAKAIT Ekonideke aisiboikin ekekiror, nen ijaikinia asubanit naka aleleŋ eboŋ, naelomaria akoloŋ, kapak nailomunia koMisiri.
Ipei inyami da kaibois naeseuni EJAKAIT Ekonideke: ibelokin tupuruc aboŋor owemanakon.
Inyamenenei imugatin lumam itubuunitoi apaarasia akanykape: kapaaran nakikanyetekaarei ejaun atukokinet nakayamakina mama ejai EJAKAIT Ekonideke; siriswamaenenei adioswam.
Idarenenei epucit loka asabaton mama ejai EJAKAIT Ekonideke, kwape ejaar aitemis naka ainakinet naka akot naka akonikan, nakiinakini, kwape kisirereŋitor EJAKAIT Ekonideke jo:

Ilakanari kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT Ekonideke, ijo ka okokukon ka akokukon, ka ekejaanakinanikon, ka akejaanakinanikon, ka ikoki ka apuserut, luejaas mamakon, kaibois naeseuni EJAKAIT Ekonideke aisiboikin ekekiror.
Iitununenei ebe irai kolo ebulesit koMisiri: koricenenei aitodol ikisila ŋul.
Ilakanari kopucitikon, ijo ka okokukon, ka akokukon, ka ekejaanakinanikon, ka akejaanakinanikon, ka Elebit, ka imoit, ka ikoki ka apuserut, luejaas orekon.
Idarenenei epucit mama ejai EJAKAIT Ekonideke apaarasia akanykaarei kaibois naeseuni EJAKAIT: naarai kisirereŋi jo EJAKAIT Ekonideke kamiokon kere, kaswamisiokon kere, ilakanari cut.

“Etakanunete ikiliokokon kere kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT Ekonideke irwan auni ŋolikaru kaibois naeseuni ŋesi; kopucit loka imugatin lumam itubuunitoi, kopucit da loka asabaton, kopucit da loka iswamin: mam itakanunete kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT komam ibore:
Einakini ŋinituŋanan kwape epedoria, kwape kisirereŋitor EJAKAIT Ekonideke jo.
“Koseu ikatubok ka ijaka koreriakon kere lukiinakinit jo EJAKAIT Ekonideke, kwape ejaatar atekerinikon: etubokinete kesi ituŋa ketube loedolit.
Sirikibelok etube; sirikitiak ituŋa; karaida ayaare ainakinet; naarai itumudaki ainakinet akonye nuka lukacoa, aitapaar akiro nuka ikadoliton.
Itupenenei naedolit cut, tetere ijari, irumi akwap nakiinakinit jo EJAKAIT Ekonideke.
Karaida asipokin epir; loelait EJAKAIT Ekonideke.
“Sirikiinak EJAKAIT Ekonideke asubanit naka emoŋ arai amerekek naejai aŋwal, arai yenerono: naarai erai ŋin naketal mama ejai EJAKAIT Ekonideke.
“Arai kedumakin mamakon, oreriakon lukiinakinit jo EJAKAIT Ekonideke, etuŋanan arai aberu, yeniswamai nueroko kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT Ekonideke, adiakar aitutuketeke.
Kosodi alosit aijaanakin icedekesio, aima kes, arai akoloŋ, arai elap, arai idiopet yenika ajore naka akuj, yenimam kecorakinit;
Kosodete alimokin jo, kopup ijo nuke, kosodi ijo aiŋitun kojokan, ido koany, arai erai abeit, kitogogoŋitete akirot, ebe eswamaun naketal ŋin koIsirael;
Ŋes do iyaŋaunia etuŋanan ŋol arai aberu ŋin, yeniswamat aronis ŋin, kiton orutekon, etuŋanan arai aberu; ibiribirete kes kamor, kotwaka.
Kakirot naka ikajenak iarei arai iuni, ŋes earere ŋin yeneario; mam eario kakirot naka ekajenan ediopet.
Ikajenak kes kigeikinete aiar ŋes, kosodete konyet ituŋa kere. Ilemari do kwaŋin aronis kamakon.
Idolokini isasedotin Ilebin, ka ekatubon loejaun kapaarasia kaŋun: iŋituni; kilimokinete jo akirot naka etube:
Iswamai ijo cut kwape ejaar akirot nakilimokinete kesi jo, kaibois kaŋin naeseuni EJAKAIT; irici ijo aiswamaenen kwape ejaatar kere nukisisianakinete kesi jo:
Iswamaenenei cut kwape ejaar ekisil lokisisianakinete kesi jo, kwape ejaar etube lokilimokinete: sirikipaa teten arai kediany, ainyein akirot nakilimokinete kesi jo.
Etuŋanan loeninik, komam epupuni esasedoti loebwoi aijaanakin kanen kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT Ekonideke, arai ekatubon, eario etuŋanan ŋol: ilemari aronis koIsirael.
Epupunete ituŋa kere, eyoŋete, komam bobo eninikaros.
Idakakini ŋol loeseuni EJAKAIT Ekonideke araun ekabakakus: ediopet koinacanakon ŋes idakakini araun ekabakakus: sirikidakak lokacekwap lomam erai onacekon ayait jo.
Konye siri ŋes kitupuu ikebalasin, karaida aitoboŋor ituŋa Misiri, tetere itupui ibalasin: naarai abu EJAKAIT kotema yes ebe, ‘Amear lolo mam bobo iboŋorete ŋina.’
Siri ŋes kitupuu da akeŋor, kinyek eketau apaar; karaida aitupuu noi ekepuesa ka ekesabu.
Ejaenena kaŋes, esiomenenei ŋesi apaarasia kere nuka aijarake: tetere isisiauni ayoŋit EJAKAIT Ekedeke, aidar akiro kere nuka ekisil kaŋol ka ikisila ŋul, aiswamaenen:
Kinyek eketau aomiara adepar iinacanake, tetere mam epaari teten arai kediany ainyein aicorakinet: tetere iyatakinos akepaarasia kajakanutuke, ŋes ka ikedwe, koIsirael.
Mam kes ejaunos kairumet kama ejaas iinacanakec; EJAKAIT ŋes airumetekec kwape alimokinia ŋesi kes.
Lu kes luitebeitai isasedotin kaneejaas ituŋa, kaneejaas ŋul lueinakinete asubanit, arai emoŋ arai amerekek, einanakinete esasedoti akuat, ka iitinyo iarei ka aboi.
Iinakini ŋes nuegeete nuka akimakon, ka ebinokon, ka akinyetekon, ka nusodit nuka ajul nuka amerekekinikon.
Naarai aseu EJAKAIT Ekonideke ŋes katekerinikon kere abwoenen aijaanakin kokiror loka EJAKAIT, ŋes ka odweke ikar kere.
Ijaanakini ŋesi kokiror loka EJAKAIT Ekedeke, kwape iswamaata iinacanake kere Ilebin, luebwoenenete kanen kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT.
Edumunete akorakineta nueriakanara ainyam, kogelara ŋun nuelomunete kotiai loegwelarere akelup.
Siriketakanu kaneijai ijo ituŋanan kere yenitotori okokuke arai akokuke akim, karaida yeniswamai nuka airo, karaida yeneŋici aanyuneta, karaida yenikalemeleman, karaida ikacudan.
Karaida ikaroan, karaida yenikeŋitan ajokin, karaida ikepiedan, karaida yenikeŋitan lukatwak.
Naarai ŋinituŋanan yeniswamai ŋun erai yeniketal mama ejai EJAKAIT; ido kanuka italesio kaŋul, ŋes ireŋearia EJAKAIT Ekonideke kes kakonyenekon.
Korai ijo loidolit kaneejai Ekonideke.
Naarai atekerin nu nuirumi ijo, epupete ŋul lueŋicete aanyuneta ka ikaroak; konye ijo, mam kicamakinit Ekonideke aiswamaenen kwaŋin.

Kwape ejaatar kere nuibu kilip EJAKAIT Ekonideke koKoreb, kapaaran naka atukonokin, kobala ebe, ‘Kenyek akiirar bobo eporoto loka EJAKAIT Ekadeke, ido kenyek aanyun bobo akim na naepol, kenyek atwanare.’
Katema EJAKAIT eoŋ atiar, ‘Enerata ejok ŋun nualimut.
Etonyoikini kes rwaru enabi koinacanakec loeputos kajo: ido ebwaikini akakiro aitukuke, ido kilimokini yes kere nuecorakini.
Kosodi kanen, ŋinituŋanan yenimam iirari akakiro nuinera ŋesi kokirorika, etepeseni kanuka ŋun.
Konye enabi loiilokini einer akiro kokirorika numam ecorakinit ŋes einer, arai ŋol loinera kokiror loka idekesio ice, eario enabi ŋol.’
Arai kitema ijo kotaukon ebe, ‘Kijenuni oni biai akirot namam EJAKAIT elimunit?’
Nainerar enabi kokiror loka EJAKAIT, arai mam akirot etakanunit, karaida adolore, ŋin ŋes akirot namam EJAKAIT elimunit: eilokini enabi einer, sirikikurianar ŋes.
itiakuni ireria iuni kokidiŋ kakwapukon nakiinakinit EJAKAIT Ekonideke airum.
Itemokini erot, itiaki iikoruno luka akwapukon nakisurumi jo EJAKAIT Ekonideke kotoma atutubeta auni tetere ikaaran ekereari ŋina.
“Na ŋes akirot naka ikaaran, yenekereari ŋina kojar: ŋin yenimam epeleikinit aiar eidunyeteke, komam lem sek elait ŋes;
Kwape etuŋanan loelosi amagoro keidunyeteke aibet akito, kosodi aikeun aep ajepia ekitoi, koutor aep kakujup, kocam eidunyeteke, kotwana; ekereari ŋol ore ediopet kaŋul kojar;
Kinyek ekenyaŋan aokot aidap ekaaran, eroko eketau enyunyura noi, kosodi adolokin ŋes, naarai elwana erot, ainom ŋes aiar; kwabo mam ebusakinit ŋesi atwanare, naarai mam abu kolaite ŋes lem sek.
Kanuka ŋun, ŋes kecorakinitor ebe, Itiakuni ireria iuni.
Arai kitalal EJAKAIT Ekonideke eikorukon, kwape eyapoikinia lukapapaakon, ainakin jo akwap kere naabu kiyapoik ainakin lukapapaakon;
Arai kiric aicorakinet na kere aiswamaenen, nakecorakini jo lolo, aminenena EJAKAIT Ekonideke, alosenen duc korotinike; ŋes konyet iyatakinia ireria ice iuni, kogelara ŋul iuni:
Tetere aokot numam akirot mam ebukorio kakwapukon, nakiinakinit jo EJAKAIT Ekonideke araun airumet, kosodete aokot abeikin jo.
Ijukarete imakio luka ereke aomare ŋes, ijaikinete ŋes akan naka ekenyaŋan aokot, tetere eario.
Mam akonikoŋu itimi ŋes, konye ilemari aokot numam akirot koIsirael, tetere ijaun ejok.
Arai kenyoiki ituŋanan ekajenan lomam edolit aitejenun adiakareteke;
Ŋes do ebwoiata ituŋa ŋul iarei luepegas kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kakonyen da nuka isasedotin ka ikatubok luejaunos kapaarasia kaŋun;
Eŋicete ikatubok kojokan; ido koany, arai erai ekajenan ekajenan loeŋalai, kitejenunite da nuka aiŋal kaneejai onaceke;
Ŋes konyet ikwaikiniata ŋes kwape aomitor ŋesi aikwaikin onaceke: ilemari kwaŋin aronis kamakon.
Ido epupunete ŋul luesaleete, eyoŋete da, mam bobo iswamaete aronis ŋin kamakon.
Mam akonikoŋu itimi; egeli aijar aijar, akoŋu itia akoŋu, ekelai da itia ekelai, akan itia akan, akeju da itia akeju.
Kosodi naikunyakiniata ojie, ikunyakini esasedoti kosodi alimokin ituŋa ebe,
‘Kiira, ijo Isirael, ikunyakis lolo aitiji lukasurupokus: kinyeis ikusitauon aiilor; sirikiyaloŋoŋoto, karaida amaran, karaida akurianar kes;
Naarai EJAKAIT Ekusideke, ŋes loelosi kayes, ŋes kijiikini yes lukasurupokus, aitajar yes.’
Elimokinete ijaka da ituŋa ebe, ‘Iŋai etuŋanan loedukit eketogo lokitetet, lomam einakinit akesubanit? Kolot koboŋo togoke, kinyek atwanikin ojie, kosodi ecetuŋanan ainakin asubanit.
Iŋai da etuŋanan loirait akemana naka emusabibu, lomam enyamit araitoke? Kolot koboŋo togoke, kinyek atwanikin ojie, kosodi ecetuŋanan ainyam araitoke.
Iŋai da etuŋanan loisinerit apese, lomam emanyit ŋes? Kolot koboŋo togoke, kinyek atwanikin ojie, kosodi ecetuŋanan aimany ŋes.’
Iyatakinete ijaka alimokin ituŋa ebe, ‘Iŋai etuŋanan loekuriana, loekuruporo eketau? Kolot koboŋo togoke. Kinyeis itauon luka iinacanake da acalar bala etauke.’
Kosodi naitanaŋiata ijaka akirokec mama ejaas ituŋa, edakakinete ikapolok luka ajoresio apolokinit ituŋa.
Kosodi, arai kiiboŋok jo nukainapakin, koŋaik da jo, kosodete ituŋa kere luejaas toma araun ikeswamak ipelueik, ijaanakinete da jo.
Arai kener ainapakin kajo, konye kitiji jo, irigauni do ŋes:
Nakijaikinia EJAKAIT Ekonideke ŋes akanikon, idanyi ŋolikiliokit kakwanis naka ekileŋ:
Konye aŋor, ka ludidik, ka ibaren, ka luejaas ore kere, luŋatan kere, ijoreori kanukon; inyami luŋatuna kaneejaas lukasurupokon, lukiinak EJAKAIT Ekonideke jo.
Iswamakini kwaŋin ireria kere luelwaka kaneijai ijo, lumam eraas ireria luka atekerin nu.
Konye lukoreria luka ituŋa kalu lukiinakinit jo EJAKAIT Ekonideke araun airumet, mam itajari idiobore yeniyeŋa;
Konye imudiari kes cut; Ekitit, ka Emorait, ka Ekanaanit, ka Eperisit, ka Ekibit, ka Eyebusit; kwape kicorakinia EJAKAIT Ekonideke jo:
Tetere mam kisisianakinete yes aiswamaenen nuka italesiakec kere, nueswamakis idekesiokec; kinyeis adiakar kwaŋin kama ejai EJAKAIT Ekusideke.

“Nairigauniata ere apaarasia nuipu aitiji ŋes airum, sirikimudia ikitoke kanuka aijep kaep; naarai ipedori ainyam kes, sirikijep kes; naarai erai kereka ekitoi loka emanikor etuŋanan tape ijo irigauni ŋes?
Dimarai ikito bon luijeni ijo ebe mam enyamio, imudiari kes, ijepi da; idukuni lujiis aitijio ere lokitijie jo, aitodol naibiroror.
Epote do imakiokon ka ikatubokokon, kosodete aitem kiton oreria luelukunito ŋin yenearitai:
Kosodi ere loeapie kituŋanan yenearitai, elemunete imakio luka ere kaŋol ataok nakosipan, namam itwasamatai, namam iriit ajokot;
