Eyaŋaarete imakio luka ere kaŋol ataok aditot naeleleete akip, namam ekoritai, karaida ayeit, ebilete emurisiŋ loka ataok kaditot:
Ikunyunete isasedotin odwe luka Lebi; naarai aseu EJAKAIT Ekonideke kes aijaanakin ŋes, ka aisirereŋ kokiror loka EJAKAIT; ido kwape ejaar akecekirot ŋes ejaunor ŋolipeget ka ŋiniromait:
Ilotakinete imakio kere luka ere kaŋol loeapie kituŋanan yenearitai, akecekanin, neejai ataok naabilio emurisiŋike kaditot:
Eboŋokinete ebe, ‘Mere akosikanin abukorete aokot nu, karaida akosikonyen mam eanyunito.
Wu EJAKAIT, kisioni ikonituŋa Isirael, luilaku, sirikicamak aokot numam akirot asalakin mama ejaas ikonituŋa Isirael.’ Isionio kes nuka aokot.
Ilemari kwaŋin aokot numam akirot kamakon, naiswamaa ijo nuedolito kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT.
Kosodi aanyun kaneejaas lukijoreuno aberu naitemelel, kimielakin ŋes, kokoto aimany ŋes;
Ŋes do iyaŋaaria ŋes togokon; ebareni ŋesi akekou, ekepi da akebelekeka;
Elacari anapito naka aŋatunioke, esalakini togokon, emonyi papake ka totoke elap ediopet: akaulo kaŋun ilomari mamake araun okilenike, eraun ŋesi da akoniberu.
Kosodi, arai mam jo itojokit ŋes, ijalakini do ŋes alosit neekot; konye sirikigwela ŋes cut apesan, sirikikonak ŋes bala abulesit, naarai ibu kitisil ŋes.
Kosodi kapaaran naisurumia ŋesi odweke iboro luejaatar ŋesi, mam ŋes ituluori okoku loka naminat ekiyai ageikin okoku loka naelaitai, loerai ekiyai obe:
Konye ecamuni ŋesi ekiyai, okoku loka naelaitai, ekorakini ŋes iboro luejaatar irwan aarei: naarai ŋol ŋes ageunet naka akegogoŋ; ewai loka ekiyai erai ekeŋ.
Ikamunete do ŋes papake ka totoke, eyaŋaunete mama ejaas imakio luka ereke, kiton orute loka aiboisike;
Etemarete kesi imakio luka ereke ebe, ‘Eninik okokukosi lo, ipaliono da, eŋerit arimar eporotokosi; erai otaupe, emerana da.’
Ibiribirete ŋes ituŋa kere luka ereke kamor, kotwana: ilemari kwaŋin aronis kamakon; epupuni Isirael kere, kosodi aiyoŋ.
Sirikesalaki akekuan okitoi akuare kere, konye idaete ŋes apaaran ŋipeŋin; naarai ikenit Edeke ŋin yenikajakinitai; kinyek amunaun akonikwap nakiinakinit jo EJAKAIT Ekonideke airum.
Arai mam onacekon eapie kaneijai ijo, ido arai mam jo ijeni ŋes, iyaŋaari do ŋes orekon, ejaun kajo aitodol naemoia onacekon ŋes, inyakakini ŋes.
Ikwaikini kwaŋin akesigiria; ikwaikini da kwaŋin akenapito; ikwaikini da kwaŋin ŋinibore yeneoliorit yenika onacekon, yeneoliorit kamake, ka yenidumuni ijo; sirikijalak.
Sirikite asigiria naka onacekon arai ekemoŋ ibirokina orot, kosodi ajalakin: iŋarakini ŋes cut aitobwo kes bobo.
Ijalakini totokec alosit, konye ipedori ayaŋaar idwe; tetere ijaun ejok, iyatakini da akonipaarasia.
“Naidukio etogo lokitetet, idukokini arwatat nadidi airimor eswikon, kinyek aitebe aokot togokon, arai kibirun ituŋanan kaŋina.
Sirikitokor emoŋ nepepe kasigiria.
Sirikinap anapito nainyalinyala, ajul ka ebaputa nuesonyitai nepepe.
Apwakanakin ŋes, amunaun ekekiror, ebe, ‘Abu kamany aberu na kosodi naekunyakinia mamake, mam abu kadum aanyuneta nuka abekonut’:
Kosodi papa kapese, ka totoke, ayaŋaun aanyuneta nuka abekonut naka apese, mama ejaas imakio luka ere orute:
Etemari papa kapese imakio atiar, ‘Abu kakorak etuŋanan lo akokuka aimany, konye elait ŋes;
Ido koany, apwakanaki ŋes ebe, “Mam abu kadum aanyuneta nuka abekonut kaneejai akokukon”; kwabo nu kes aanyuneta nuka abekonut naka akokuka.’ Kosodete apesikin anapito akonyen nuka imakio luka ere.
Eyaŋaarete imakio luka ere etuŋanan ŋol elecorete da ŋes;
Itegelete ŋes isekelin
Konye arai erai akirot abeit, ebe mam edumunitai aanyuneta nuka abekonut kaneejai apese:

Eyaŋaunete do apese okek loka etogo loka papake, ibiribirete ituŋa luka ereke ŋes kamor, kotwana: naarai eswamaa nukabaŋaanut koIsirael araun naadote kotogo loka papake: ilemari kwaŋin aronis kamakon.

Iyaŋaunete do kes kere iarei orute loka ere kaŋol, ibiribirete kes kamor, kotwaka; apese, naarai mam abu kiluluk kwabo ajai ore; ka etuŋanan, naarai abu kitisil aberu naka eidunyeteke: ilemari kwaŋin aronis kamakon.
“Konye arai kedumaki etuŋanan apese naisineritai ais, kosodi aitiŋaikin ŋes, koperoto kaŋes; etuŋanan do bon loaperete kaŋes, ŋes etwani:
Konye mam iswamakini apese idiobore; emamei kaneejai apese adiakaret naibusakinitor atwanare; naarai kwape enyounio etuŋanan asurokin eiidunyeteke, kosodi aiar, kwape kwaŋin ejaar akirot ŋin da:
Naarai adumakin ŋes ais; abu apese naisineritai kiluluk, konye komameun yeneyuuni ŋes.
Elemikini etuŋanan loaperete kaŋes papa kapese isekelin akaisakany luka epuesa, eraun do akeberu, naarai abu kitisil ŋes; mam ireŋeari ŋes apaarasiake kere.
“Etuŋanan loimusuŋitai itouke, arai loetuboritai ekiliokaneke, mam elomari atukot naka EJAKAIT.
“Ikoku yeneurunete ipajan mam elomari atukot naka EJAKAIT; kiton atur nakitomonet mam lukeŋ elomarete atukot naka EJAKAIT.
Naarai mam apotu kijaikis yes inyamat ka akipi korot, nailomuniata koMisiri; ido naarai apotu koropata Balaam okoku loka Beor anyoun koPetor loka Mesopotamia, aiken jo.
Konye mam EJAKAIT Ekonideke abu kopup Balaam; konye abu EJAKAIT Ekonideke kijulak ekenit araun arereŋ kamakon, naarai abu EJAKAIT Ekonideke komina jo.
Sirikimo ainapakinikec karaida akerianutukec apaarasiakon kere ikar kere.
Elomarete idwekec luka atur kanakiwuniet atukot naka EJAKAIT.
“Nailomaria koidukurun aitiji lukasurupokon, igitari ijo koboro kere lueroko.
Konye ejaun, kewar akwap, iloŋi ŋesi kakip: kosodi keloma akoloŋ, elomuni oidukurun.
“Ijaenena da kaibois kiŋa kiidukurun nailomanari aikiŋan:
Ijaenena kabasaŋ oborokon lujiis; kosodi naijorio ijo kokitui, iboki ber kabasaŋakon, kosodi aibelokin anukakin ŋun nuelomunete kotomakon:

Naarai eupasi EJAKAIT Ekonideke kiidukurunukon, ayuun jo, aijaikin jo lukasurupokon; kanuka ŋun ŋes eraunotor iidukurunukon lukalaunak: tetere mam ŋes eanyuni numam elaete kotomakon, kosodi anyoun kamakon.
Iboienenei kajo, kamakon, kaibois naeseuni kotoma ediopet koreriakon, loekot ŋesi noi: sirikiroik ŋes.
Sirikiyaŋau eropit loka naadote, karaida eropit loka ekiŋok, togo loka EJAKAIT Ekonideke kanuka adioyaposit kere: naarai ŋul kere eraas luketal mama ejai EJAKAIT Ekonideke.
Ipedori ayuun emoit kanuka ameda: konye sirikiyuu onacekon kanuka adumunia ameda: tetere kisirereŋi jo EJAKAIT Ekonideke kakirokon kere nuiswamai, kotoma akwap nailosi airum.
Konye arai kiŋer aiyapo, mam eraun aronis kamakon.
Idari aiswamaenen ŋin naelomuni kaitukukon; kwape ejaatar nuiyapok EJAKAIT Ekonideke, ainakinet nakakote, naisumunit kaitukukon.
Nailomaria akima nuka eidunyetekon, ipedori aigitunun akima kakanikon; konye sirikisak kecilikiki akima nuka eidunyetekon.
Kenyou ŋin kotogoke, epedori alosit adukokin etuŋanan ece.
Arai kela ŋes okilenike lokiareit, kosodi aiwadikakin ŋes ebalua loka aireŋear, kititiŋ ŋes, kosodi aireŋear kotogoke; arai da ketwana okilenike lokiareit loamanyit ŋes;
Okilenike losodit loereŋeari ŋes, mam emanyi ŋes bobo, naarai amunaun; naarai erai akirot ŋin naketal kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT: sirikitidiaka akwap nakiinakinit EJAKAIT Ekonideke airum.
Kiitutu nuabu EJAKAIT Ekusideke kiswamak Miriam korot ipote yesi koMisiri.
Ibwoi kokiŋa eyaŋauni etuŋanan loiyuunit ijo kiborekon aititiŋet kiŋa neijai ijo.
Arai erai ŋesi lokican, mam iperio aititineteke:
Inyakakini ŋes aititiŋet keloma akoloŋ, tetere eperi anapitoke, kilipakin jo arereŋ: eraun adolit kamakon kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT Ekonideke.
Kapaaranike iinakini ŋes eropitike, eriŋa akoloŋ kelomara; naarai icana ŋesi, ipuda eketau: kinyek amonyia jo kama ejai EJAKAIT, koraun adiakaret kamakon.
Konye kiituni ebe irai kolo ebulesit koMisiri, kolaku EJAKAIT Ekonideke jo kaŋina: kanuka ŋun kecorakinit jo aiswamaenen akirot ŋin.
Naideŋio araito nuka ekitoikon loka eseitun, sirikinyogok bobo aide atenunake: eraunos ŋun nuka imoit, ka ikoki, ka apuserut.
Naitukonokinia imusabibun luka emanikorikon loka emusabibu, sirikinyogok bobo: eraunos ŋul luka imoit, ka ikoki, ka apuserut.
Iituni ebe irai kolo ebulesit kakwap nako Misiri: kanuka ŋun ŋes kecorakinia jo aiswamaenen ŋun.
“Arai kejaun epeget otuŋa, kosodete aponare atubokinio, kotubokis ikatubok kes; itojokete kesi ikadoliton, itetelekarete ikaronon:
Kosodi kanen, arai ibusakinit ikaronon aleio, iteperikini ekatubon ŋes, aleio kakonyeneke, kwape ajaar aronisike, kimarete.
Epedori atubokin ŋes aleio ibelai akaisaoŋon, sirikedepa ŋul: arai kitedepa aile ŋes ibelai luipu adepar ŋul, esilior onacekon kakonyenekon.
Kosodi irumi ikiyai yenewuruuni ŋesi ekiror loka onaceke loatwana, kinyek ekekiror amwatar koIsirael.

Arai mam etuŋanan ekoto airum aberu naka onaceke, elosi aberu naka onaceke orute mama ejaas imakio, etemari ebe, ‘Eŋerit onace loka okilenika aitoboŋikin onaceke ekiror koIsirael, mam keswamakinit eoŋ nuibusakinit onace loka okilenika.’
Enyaraunete do imakio luka ereke ŋes, inerakinos kaŋes: arai kebwo, kotema atiar, ‘Mam akoto airum ŋes.’
Ebuni aberu naka onaceke mamake kakonyen nuka imakio, elacuni amukat kaje kakejuke, imuikini da aimul oreeteke; eboŋokini ŋesi ebe, ‘Iswamakinio kwaŋin etuŋanan lomam edukokinit onaceke etogo.’
Emaikinio ekekiror koIsirael, Etogo loka ŋol kaloelacaritai akemukat.
“Arai eutas ituŋa iarei, kosodi aberu naka ediopet aikunyakin ayuun okilenike kakan naka ŋol loesenesenei ŋes, arior akekan, aitiŋ ŋes itouke:
Itubori akekan, mam akonikoŋu itimi ŋes.
Siriejaas togo aitemisio nuegelegela, naepol, ka naedit.
Ijaunos jo kemisani loedolit lokabeit; ijaunos jo kaitemis naedolit nakabeit: tetere ipuaros akonipaarasia kakwap nakiinakinit jo EJAKAIT Ekonideke.
Naarai ŋul kere luiswamaete akiro ŋun, kes luiswamaete numam edolito, eraas luketal mama ejai EJAKAIT Ekonideke.
Kwape abu kiriamakinotor kajo korot, kodany lukon lukokau, kere luakalanyaka luajaas kaukon, iiloro ijo, kopasite da; mam ŋes abu koyoŋ Edeke.

Kanuka ŋun, kiinak EJAKAIT Ekonideke jo aiyeŋun kama ejaas lukasurupokon lukilukunito, kakwap nakiinakinit jo EJAKAIT Ekonideke araun airumet nairumi ijo, imwatari aiitunet naka Amalek kokwap kakuj; sirikiimurwok.
“Kosodi rwaru, nailomaria akwap nakiinakini EJAKAIT Ekonideke araun airumet, irumi, iboikin nen:
Ilemuni nugeet nuka araito kere nuka alup, nuidwenyi kakwapukon nukiinakini EJAKAIT Ekonideke; kipikak odita kolot aibois naeseuni EJAKAIT Ekonideke aisiboikin ekekiror.
Ido ilosi mama ejai esasedoti loejai kapaarasia kaŋun, kolimok ebe, ‘Alimo eoŋ lolo EJAKAIT Ekonideke ebe alom akwap nakolo eyapoik EJAKAIT lukapapaawok ainakin oni.’
Elemuni da esasedoti edita kakanikon, kipikak kiŋaren ketem loka EJAKAIT Ekonideke.
Kiswamakis Imisirian sio erono, kiticanata, kipikakis obulesene loalaŋir;
Keworoto EJAKAIT, Edeke loka lukapapaakosi, kiira EJAKAIT ekosiporoto, koany akositicanio, ka aitaaritoikos, ka areuniokos.
Kitonyou EJAKAIT sio koMisiri kakan nakagogoŋ ka akan naerioro, ka etasuro loepol, ka aanyuneta, ka nukaumokin:
Kitolom aibois na, koinak akwap na, akwap naeleleete akile ka esik.
Kwana da, koany, ayaunit nugeet nuka araito nuka alup, nukiinak ijo eoŋ, wu EJAKAIT.’ Ido ipikakini kwap kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT Ekonideke, koma EJAKAIT Ekonideke:
Isiyalamikini nukajokak kere nukiinak EJAKAIT Ekonideke, ka ekonikek, ijo ka Elebit, ka imoit yenejai orekon.

Kinerenena da kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT Ekonideke atiar, ‘Alem iboro lukitalaunio kotogoka, ido ainak Elebit, ka imoit, ka ikoki, ka apuserut kwape ejaar akoniicorakinet kere nakicorakinit; mam adiakarit adiopet kakoniicorakineta, kwabo mam kemurwokinito:
Mam anyamit kes aroko ajai akuudianaka, kwabo mam eŋadakinit komam alai, kwabo mam ainakinit kanuka lukatwak. Abu keira eporoto loka EJAKAIT Ekadeke, eswama kere kwape kolo kecorakinia.
Kosesen ijai aiboisikon nakalaunan, kotoma akuj, kisirereŋ ikonituŋa Isirael, ka alup nukiinak, kwape kolo kiyapoikinio lukapapaakosi, akwap naeleleete akile ka esik.’
“Kicorakini lolo jo EJAKAIT Ekonideke aiswamaenen ikisila ŋul ka itubesia; aso koricenenei aswam kekonitau kere ka akoniijar kere.
Ilimo lolo EJAKAIT araun Ekonideke, ido ilosenenei korotinike; iricenenei ikekisila ka akeicorakineta ka iketubesia, iiranari ekeporoto:
Ido kilimo lolo EJAKAIT jo araut ituŋa luseuna luke obe, kwape kiisumunio, ido koricenenei akeicorakineta kere;
Ido kitopoloo jo aitelekarit atekerin kere nukolo kesubi, kotoma aiturit, kotoma okiror, ido kotoma aibuses; tetere iraunos ituŋa lukalaunak kama ejai EJAKAIT Ekusideke, kwape kinerar.”
Kicorakis Musa ka imakio luka Isirael ituŋa ebe, “Koricito aicorakineta kere nukecorak yes lolo.
Kosodi kapaaran naidokiata Yorodan alosit akwap nakiinakinit jo EJAKAIT Ekonideke, isipokini ijo amor nuepolok, iladakini kes asiŋe;
iwadikakini kes akiro kere nuka ekisil kalo, kidoka juwai; tetere ilomari akwap nakiinakinit jo EJAKAIT Ekonideke, akwap naeleleete akile ka esik, kwape kisumunio EJAKAIT Edeke loka lukapapaakon jo.
Kosodi naidokiata Yorodan, isipokinete amor ŋun, nukecorakini yes lolo, moru Ebal, iladakinete kes asiŋe.
Idukokini EJAKAIT Ekonideke etem nen, etem loka amor: sirikike kes kasuat.
Iduki etem loka EJAKAIT Ekonideke kamor numam ikeitai: iinakini EJAKAIT Ekonideke ainakineta nuicweio kanen:
Iinakini da asuban nuka ainapakin, inyamakini nen; ilakari ijo kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT Ekonideke.
Iwadikakini akiro kere nuka ikisila kalu amor ŋun kideleleete teniten.”
Apotu Musa ka isasedotin Ilebin kotemasi Isirael kere atiar, “Kililiŋ, kopup, ijo Isirael; iraunos lolo yesi ituŋa luka EJAKAIT Ekusideke.
Ŋes do irimaria eporoto loka EJAKAIT Ekonideke, aiswamaenen aicorakinetake ka ikisilake lukecorakini jo lolo,”
Kicorak Musa ituŋa kapaaran ŋipeŋin, ebe,
“Lu kes ebwoete komoru Gerisim, ailipakin ituŋa arereŋ, kidokata Yorodan; Simeon ka Lebi, ka Yuda, ka Isakar, ka Yosep ka Benyamin:
Lu kes ebwoete komoru Ebal kanuka ekenit; Reuben, ka Gad ka Aser, ka Sebulun, ka Dan ka Naputali.
Eboŋokinete Ilebin ituŋa kere luka Isirael keporoto kaloepol, ebe,
Epote da arereŋesio nu kere mamakon, kidolokinete jo, arai kipup ijo eporoto loka EJAKAIT Ekonideke.
Kisirereŋio jo kore, kisirereŋio da komanikor.
Isirereŋio aur naka akonikuan, ka araito nuka alupokon, ka aur naka ibarenikon, eiyas loka aitukukon ka ludidik luka esipanikon.
Isirereŋio editakon ka amotikon nakigures.
Isirereŋio nailomununia, kisirereŋio da nailomanaria.
Icorakini EJAKAIT arereŋ odulaakon, ka aswamisiokon kere nuiswamaenenei; kisirereŋi ŋesi jo kakwap nakiinakinit EJAKAIT Ekonideke.
Kiticasi EJAKAIT yes araun ituŋake lukalaunak kwape kiyapoikinio yes; arai iricito yesi aicorakineta nuka EJAKAIT Ekusideke alosenen korotinike.
Eanyunete ituŋa kere luka akwap ebe kimaikinitai ekiror loka EJAKAIT; kiyoŋete jo.
Itupui EJAKAIT ajokisiokon, kaur naka akuanakon, aur da naka ibarenikon, araito da nuka alupokon, kakwap naabu EJAKAIT kiyapoik lukapapaakon ainakin jo.
Kiŋaikini EJAKAIT jo aiŋadisike naejok ainakin akwapukon akiru kapakike, aisirereŋ aswam kere naka akonikan: iyuununei atekerin nuipu, konye mam jo iyuun kamakec.
Kiinakini EJAKAIT ijo araun ekaliŋan konye mere ekerikakinan; ijaun ijo kuju bon, mam ijaun kwap; arai kipup ijo aicorakineta nuka EJAKAIT Ekonideke, nukecorak ijo lolo airic aiswamaenen;
Komam ipaari ainyein adio kakiro nukecorak yes lolo, apaar teten arai kediany, atupar icedekesio aijaanakin kes.
Kikenio jo kore, kikenio jo komanikor.
Ikenio editakon ka amotikon nakigures.
Ikenio aur naka akuanakon, ka araito nuka alupokon, eiyas loka aitukukon, ka ludidik luka esipanikon.
Kikenio jo nailomununia, kikenio da nailomanaria.
Kitulanari EJAKAIT jo aitodol nakimudiaria jo kakwap nailomari airum.
Kidanyi EJAKAIT jo keluera, ka ekamidi, ka abuun, ka amwanis naepol, ka ekileŋ, ka ekure, ka airouroun; kibwapete jo aitodol naiolioro.
Akujukon da naejai kuju akoukon eraun aisinit, ka alup nuejaas kwapukon eraunos asuat.
Ituluori EJAKAIT akiru naka akwapukon apua ka asiŋei: kibunokinete jo kokuju, aitodol nakimudiarere jo.
Eraun atesikon akiriŋ naka akweny kere, ka itiaŋ luka akwap, emamuun yenetwarari kes.
Kitedeki EJAKAIT jo abusio nuka Misiri, ka ajimii, ka ijip, ka aipii, numam ipedori aŋaleun.
Kitedeki EJAKAIT jo ikerep, ka amudukanut, ka arieŋun naka etau:
Ituriaitoi paaran, kwape eturiaitor emuduk kamuton, komam ikerianar koponesiokon: kiroikinio kiŋasio jo duc, emamuun yenikitajari jo.
Isineri ijo apese, konye eperete ecetuŋanan kaŋes: iduki ijo etogo, konye mam iboikini toma: irai emanikor loka emusabibu, konye mam inyami araitoke.
Eario emoŋokon kakonyenekon, konye mam jo inyami ŋes: kidemario asigiriakon kakonyenekon kadedeŋ, konye mam kinyakakinio: einakinio lukasurupokon amerekekinikon, emamuun yenikitajari jo.
Ekorakinio icetuŋa ikonidwe lusap ka lupesur kosesenete akonikonye, konye itegete kanuka aimuit kes apaaran kere: ido kimamikinete jo nuipedori aswam.
Enyami ateker namam jo ijeni araito nuka alupokon, ka aitaaritoikon; konye kiroikinio jo kicikakinitete duc:
Kikerepikini ijo kanuka nueanyunete akonikonye.
Ibwaikini EJAKAIT abusio nueroko noi: akuŋinikon, ka akejenekon, numam ipedori aŋaleun, ageun kotau loka akejukon kiton osiaduk loka akoukon.
Iraun aumokinet, ka awarag, ka ikienis kotuŋa kere lukireŋeikini EJAKAIT jo.
Iyei ikinyom luipu omanikor, konye isakun idis; naarai enyami emaase kes.
Irai amanat nuka emusabibu icapi kes konye mam imasi ebino, karaida aideŋ araito; naarai enyami ekurut kes
Ejaunos iseitunin oikorunokon kere, konye mam inyonyoikin akinyetekec naarai edounenete araito nuka eseitunikon.
Iwurie idwe lusap ka lupesur konye mam eraunos lukon; naarai eŋatario.
Enyamiari emaase ikitokon kere ka araito nuka alupokon.
Iyatanakini emoit loejai mamakon adokari kuju adepar jo; iyatanakini ijo aidoor kwap.
Kiyuununei ŋes jo, konye mam jo iyuuni ŋes: eraun ŋesi ekaliŋan, ka jo da ekerikakinan
Kibunokinete jo ikenito ŋul kere, kibwapete jo, kidolokinete jo, aitodol nakimudiarere jo; naarai mam ibu kopup eporoto loka EJAKAIT Ekonideke airic aicorakinetake ka ikisilake luabu kicorak jo:
Eraunos kaneijai ijo aanyunet ka aumokinet, kaneejai aurikon da ikar kere.
Kanuka ŋun ijaanakini ijo lukasurupokon luijukuni EJAKAIT asurokin jo, koriebi eteŋei, kojakite akur kimujalal, kipuda iboro kere: idokokini ajookot naka asuat omurisiŋikon aitodol nakimudiaria jo.
Eyaŋauni EJAKAIT ateker kama elwana asurokin jo, anyoun kosaŋe loka akwap, kwape eporitor emorukaalet, ateker namam jo ijenuni akeŋajep.
Ateker naededeŋ akekonyen, namam epod imakio karaida aitim ludidik:

Enyami aur naka ibarenikon, ka araito nuka alupokon, aitodol nakimudiarere: mam ŋes kinyeinia jo akima, arai ebino arai akinyet, arai eiyas loka aitukukon, karaida ludidik luka esipanikon aitodol nakimudiaria jo.
Kirigauni jo koruteikon kere, aitodol naetiyaikinotor arwatatinikon nueojak nuebwaitai, nuibu komuno, anatar akwapukon kere: kirigauni jo koruteikon kere nakiinak EJAKAIT Ekonideke jo.
Inyami ijo aur naka akonikuan, akiriŋ naka idwekon lusap ka lupesur lukiinak EJAKAIT Ekonideke jo; kirigaunitete, kicikakinitete, kanekicikakinete lukasurupokon jo.
Etuŋanan loenonok kotomakus, loijamamai eraun loitei onaceke kakoŋu naerono, ka aberu naka atorobuke, ka Iuideun: kodweke luideikina ŋes:
Komam einakini idio kakesi akiriŋ naka idweke luenyami ŋesi, naarai emamei yenideikina ŋes; kirigaunitete, kicikakinitete kanekicikakinete lukasurupokon jo koruteikon kere.
Aberu naenonok naijamamai kotomakus, namam tiketamaki aicakakin akekeju alup kanuka aijamamake ka anonokuke, itei ŋesi okilenike loka atorobuke, ka okokuke ka akokuke kakoŋu naerono;
Ka aŋasiepeke naelomuni kakejeke, ka ikedwe lueuruuni; naarai enyami kes kaiyeiyea kanuka eipud iboro kere: kirigaunitete, kicikakinitete, kanekicikakinete lukasurupokon jo koruteikon
Kijukakini EJAKAIT jo aiticaneta nukaumokin, ka aiticaneta nuka akoniwur, aiticaneta nukos, nuedaunete apak naepol, ka adekesia nueroko noi, nuedaunete apak naepol.
Kiinuni bobo jo adekesia kere nuko Misiri, nuibu koyoŋ; kidoŋete jo.
Ŋinideka da, ka ŋiniiticanet, namam iwadikatai oitabo loka ikisila kalu, kiinuni EJAKAIT jo kes, aitodol nakimudiarere jo.
Isalete yesi ikidioko, kwabo iraas kolo yesi kwape aacer nuka akuj kanuka aipues; naarai mam ipotu kopupoto eporoto loka EJAKAIT Ekusideke.
Kosodi kanen, kwape esiyalamikinitor EJAKAIT aiswamakin yes nukajokak, ka aitupuu yes; isiyalamikini kwaŋin EJAKAIT aitoolior yes, ka amudiar yes; kilemario do yes kakwap nailomarete airum.
Kisiarakini EJAKAIT jo otuŋa kere, ageun kosaŋe ediopet loka akwap kiton osaŋe ece loka akwap; ijaanakini idekesio ice kaŋina, lumam lem ijenunit, ijo karaida lukapapaakon, kes akito ka amor.
Mam jo idumuni aijamam kotoma atekerin ŋun, emameikini da akonikeju aibworar: konye ijaikini EJAKAIT jo kaŋina etau loemarani, ka akonye nuitegete, ka etau loitururwei:
Ibuonokini noi kanuka aijarakon; ikurianari kuare ka paaran, mam imuno akoniijar:
Itemari tupuruc ebe, ‘Tiejok arai kerai eboŋ!’ Eboŋ da itemari ebe, ‘Tiejok arai kerai tupuruc!’ kanuka akurian naka etaukon naikurianaror, ido kanuka nueanyunete akonikonye.

Kinyakari EJAKAIT jo Misiri kameerin, korot loabu kalimok jo ebe, ‘Mam bobo ianyuni ŋes’; igwelanaros kaŋina mama ejaas lukasurupokus araun ibulesin ka abulesin, konye emameun ituŋanan yenikigweli yes.”
Ŋun kes akiro nuka aitutuket naecorakini EJAKAIT Musa aitutuk ka idwe luka Isirael, kakwap naka Moab, kogelara aitutuket naetutukete ŋesi kakes koKoreb.
Konyarau Musa Isirael kere kotema kes atiar, “Ianyut kere nueswamak EJAKAIT Parao, ka ikekejaanakinak kere, ka akwapuke kere, kakonyenekus kakwap nako Misiri;
Aigimoreta nuepolok nuapotu akonikonye koanyut, aanyuneta da, ka nukaumokin ŋun nukos:
Konye mam EJAKAIT kiinakinit yes etau loejenuni, ka akonye nuesesenete, ka aki nuepupete, kiton lolo.
Keŋarenik yes ikar akaisaoŋon kamodiŋ: mam ikusinapen emojoŋito, akusimuka da mam emojoŋito.
Mam inyamito atap, karaida aimat ebino arai nuitemerete: tetere ijenunete ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT Ekusideke.
Ido naidolunioto aibois na, apotu Sikon ekabaka loka Kesibon, ka Og ekabaka loka Basan, kolomut asurokin oni, kipou oni kadanyata kes:
Kipou kayaŋaasi akecekwap, kainakis araun airumet naka Ireubenin, ka Igadin, ka atutubet naka ateker naka Imanasin.
Kanuka ŋun kidarata akiro nuka aitutuket kana, kiswamaenenete, tetere ikeriakaros kaswamisiokus kere.
“Ibwoete yesi kere lolo kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT Ekusideke; ikapolokokus, atekerinikus, imakiokus, ka ijakakus, ituŋa kere luka Isirael.
Ludidikikus, ka aŋorokus, ka imokus luejaas oidukurunukus, ageun ka ekebetan akitokus, kiton ekeriton akipikus:
Tetere ilomarete aitutuket naka EJAKAIT Ekusideke, aiyapositike da, naitutukinit EJAKAIT Ekusideke kayes lolo:
Tetere kiticasi yes lolo araun iketuŋa obe, koraun ŋesi Edekekus, kwape abu kolimokinia yes, kwape da eyapoikinio lukapapaakus, Aburaam, Isaak, ka Yakob.
Mere yes bonik kitutukio eoŋ aitutuket na ka aiyaposit na:
Konye ka ŋin yenebwoi kane lolo kaoni kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT Ewokodeke, ka ŋin da yenemamei lolo kane kaoni.
“Naarai ijenete kwape kipou keboikinotor akwap nako Misiri; kwape da kitorio atekerin nuipotu kitoroto;
Ipotu koanyut nuka italesiakec, ka aputosiakec, akito ka amor, epuesa ka esabu, nuajaas mamakec.

Kinyek ajaun mamakus etuŋanan, arai aberu, arai ekek, arai atekeu, naepaari eketar lolo ainyein EJAKAIT Ewokodeke, alosit aijaanakin idekesio luka atekerin kaŋun; kinyek ajaun mamakus aliasit naerai epiu ka adwaris.
Kosod: kanen kepupu akiro nuka aiyaposit kana, kikemerik kotauke ebe, ‘Enapakin, karaida katupit aninik naka ekatau,’ amudiar luepalal ka lucokito.
Mam EJAKAIT isionie ŋes, konye epuruuni anyunyura naka EJAKAIT ka ekoloke aluikin ituŋanan ŋin, ebunokini ŋes ikenito kere luiwadikatai oitabo lo, emwatari da EJAKAIT ekekiror kokwap kakuj.
Egitari EJAKAIT ŋes neejai aronis katekerin kere nuka Isirael, kwape ejaatar ikenito kere luka aitutuket naiwadikatai oitabo lo loka ikisila.
Etemari atur da naebuni, idwekus lukitupanakinete yes, ka imoit yenebuni kakwap naelwana, naeanyuniata aiticaneta nuka akwap kaŋin, ka adekesia nuetedek EJAKAIT ŋes;

Ido akwap ŋin kere erai acukumasia, ka abalaŋ, ido naenoki, namam eyeio, karaida aira, karaida idionya apol kotoma, kwape amudiario naka Sodom ka Gomora, ka Aduma ka Seboim, nuamudiari EJAKAIT kanyunyurake, ka aisiopoke:
Etemarete atekerin kere ebe, ‘Kanukinyo eswamakinia EJAKAIT akwap na kwaŋin? Anyoin bo apolou naka amwanis naka anyunyura kana naepol?’
Eboŋokinete do ituŋa ebe, ‘Naarai apotu kojalata aitutuket naka EJAKAIT, Edeke loka lukapapaakec, naetutukete ŋesi kakes naetolomunia kes kakwap nako Misiri;
Kosodete alosit aijaanakin idekesio ice, komaata kes, idekesio lumam kes ajenete, lumam ŋes ainakinit kes.
Ŋes do enepunia anyunyura naka EJAKAIT aluikin akwap na, ainun ŋes ikenito kere luiwadikatai oitabo lo:
Abu EJAKAIT koruto kes kakwapukec kanyunyura, ka aisiop, ka akadakin naepol, kocaka kes akwap ace, kwape lolo.’
Kosodi aboŋun mama ejai EJAKAIT Ekonideke; arimar ekeporoto kwape ejaatar kere nukecorak ijo lolo, ijo ka idwekon, ketaukon kere, ka aijarakon kere;
Ŋes do ibelokinio EJAKAIT Ekonideke aŋatariokon, kitimi jo, eboŋuni atukonokin jo kotuŋa kere, luabu EJAKAIT Ekonideke kisiarak jo mamakec.
Arai kejaunos lukon luireŋearitai atutubeta nukokiŋa nuka akuj, kitukuni EJAKAIT Ekonideke jo kaŋina, kiwomuni ŋesi jo kaŋina:
Kiyaŋauni EJAKAIT Ekonideke jo akwap naerumito lukapapaakon, irumi ijo da ŋes; kiswamakin jo nuejok, kitupui jo adepar lukapapaakon.
Ekepi EJAKAIT Ekonideke ekonitau, ka etau loka aurikon, tetere iminenena EJAKAIT Ekonideke ketaukon kere, ka aijarakon kere, tetere ijari.
Ibwaikini EJAKAIT Ekonideke ikenito lu kere mama ejaas lukasurupokon, ka ŋul da lukilaito, lukimanito jo.
Iboŋuni, irimari eporoto loka EJAKAIT, aiswamaenen aicorakinetake kere nukecorak jo lolo.

Kiinakini EJAKAIT Ekonideke jo akerianut kaswamisio kere nuka akanikon, ka aur naka akuanakon, ka aur naka ibarenikon, ka araito naka alupokon, kanuka ajokis: naarai isiyalamikini bobo EJAKAIT jo kanuka ajokis, kwape esiyalamikinia lukapapaakon.
Arai kirima ijo eporoto loka EJAKAIT Ekonideke airic aicorakinetake ka ikisilake luiwadikatai oitabo lo loka ikisila; arai kibelokin neejai EJAKAIT Ekonideke ketaukon kere, ka aijarakon kere.
Mam ejai akuj, tikitema ebe, ‘Iŋai edokari kuju ainun sio, kosodi aisiirar sio, tetere kiswamai?’
Mam da ejai okekwa loka aŋolol tikitema ebe, ‘Iŋai ikwaŋar kaŋolol, ainun sio, kosodi aisiirar sio, tetere kiswamai?’
Konye eapie akirot noi kamakon, kaitukukon, kotaukon da, tetere iswamai.

Naarai kecorak jo lolo aminenena EJAKAIT Ekonideke, alosenen koponesioke, airic aicorakinetake, ka ikisilake ka itubesiake, tetere ijari, kouriar, tetere da kisirereŋi EJAKAIT Ekonideke jo kakwap nailomari airum.
Konye arai kepaa ekonitau, komam ipupuni, konye kijodijodoor aima idekesio ice, aijaanakin da kes;
Kalimokinit yes lolo ebe abeit itwakete; mam akusipaarasia iyatakinos kakwap naidokarete airum kokekwa loka Yorodan.
Anyaraunit akuj ka akwap araut akajenakakus lolo, ebe ebwaik akonyenekon aijar ka atwanare, arereŋ ka ekenit: aso do koseu aijar, tetere ijari, ijo ka aurikon:

Kominenena EJAKAIT Ekonideke, korima ekeporoto, kimorikikinos kaŋes: naarai ŋes aijarakon, ka eiyas loka apaarasiakon: tetere iboikin akwap naabu EJAKAIT kiyapoik lukapapaakon, Aburaam, ka Isaak, ka Yakob, ainakin kes.”
Kolot Musa kolimok Isirael kere akiro ŋun.
Kotema kes atiar, “Arai eoŋ loka ikar akwatat ka akaisaarei lolo: mam bobo apedori alomar karaida alomun: katema da EJAKAIT eoŋ atiar, ‘Sirikidoka Yorodan lo.’
Kiŋarenikini EJAKAIT Ekonideke jo adokar; emudiari ŋesi atekerin nu kakonyenekon, irumi ijo kes: Yosua da, kiŋarenikini ŋesi yes adokar, kwape atemaria EJAKAIT.
Iswamakini EJAKAIT kes kwape abu kiswamakinia Sikon ka Og, ikabakan luka Imorain, ka akwapukec; luabu ŋesi komudia.
Kijaikini EJAKAIT yes kes, iswamakinete kes kwape ejaatar aicorakineta kere nukecorak yes.
Kicat, kotitiŋior, sirikikurianar, karaida aiyaloŋoŋ kanukec: naarai EJAKAIT Ekonideke, ŋes elosi kajo, mam kitukurwori jo, karaida aijal.”
EJAKAIT da, ŋes lokiŋarenikinit jo; ejaenena kajo, mam kitukurwori jo, karaida aijal: sirikikurianar karaida aiyaloŋoŋ.”
Kicorak Musa kes ebe, “Kosaŋe loka ŋulukar ikanykaarei, kapak naeseikinitai naka ekaru loka aosikin kopucit loka iswamin.
Naitodiaror Isirael kere kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT Ekonideke kaibois naeseuni ŋesi, isiomakini ijo Isirael kere ikisila lu akikec.
Kotukonok ituŋa, ikiliok ka aŋor ka ludidik, ka imoit yenejai orekon, tetere epupunete, isisiaunete da, ayoŋit EJAKAIT Ekusideke, airic aiswamaenen akiro kere nuka ikisila kalu;
Tetere ikecedwe da lumam ejenunito epupunete, isisiaunete da ayoŋit EJAKAIT Ekusideke, apaarasia kere nuijariata kakwap naidokarete Yorodan airum.”
Kotakan EJAKAIT kotoma Owema kopir loka edou: kobwo epir loka edou kokek loka Ewema.

Kotema EJAKAIT Musa atiar, “Koany, ijotoori ijo ka lukapapaakon; enyounete ituŋa lu, alosit eporo neejaas idekesio lumo luka akwap naelosete kesi ajaun mamakec, kajalete eoŋ, ebilete da aitutuketeka naetutuk kakes.

Kosodi akanyunyura ainepun asurokin kes kapaaran kaŋin, ajali eoŋ kes, ebwai da ekareet kamakec, emudiario kes, ebunokinete kes nueroko nuipu ka ican da luipu; etemarete do kapaaran kaŋin ebe, ‘Mere kibunokis oni aronisio nu kanu naarai emamei Edekewok kamawok?’
Abeit ebwai ekareet kapaaran kaŋin kanuka aronisio kere nuiswamaete, naarai atupasi idekesio ice.
Aso do kiwadikata ekosio lo, kisisianak ijo idwe luka Isirael: kibwaik aitukekec, tetere eraun ekosio lo ekajenanika kama ejaas idwe luka Isirael.

Naarai naetolomaria eoŋ kes akwap naabu keyapoik lukapapaakec, naeleleete akile ka esik: kosodete ainyam kimonikinos, kotumata; kosodete kesi atupar idekesio ice aijaanakin kes, kamwaŋata eoŋ, kobilata da akaitutuket.

Kosodi kanen, naebunokiniata kes aronisio nuipu ka ican luipu, itejenuni ekosio lo kes kwape ekajenan; naarai mam imurwokini aituke nuka aurikec: naarai ajeni aitetemonorikec nakotau naejai kwape kwana, eroko eoŋ kitolomara kes akwap naeyapoikinit.”
Kwaŋin kiwadik Musa ekosio lo apaaran ŋipeŋin, kisisianak idwe luka Isirael.
Kosodi kanen keŋetaki Musa aiwadik akiro nuka ikisila kalu oitabo, aitodol neadaunotor.
Kicorak Musa Ilebin, luadakenenete asaduku naka aitutuket naka EJAKAIT ebe,
“Koyaŋaasi eitabo lo loka ikisila, kibwaikis osiep loka asaduku naka aitutuket naka EJAKAIT Ekusideke, tetere ejaun nen araun ekajenanikus.
Naarai ajeni epalikon ka aninik naka emurisiŋikon: koany, aroko eoŋ ajari kayes lolo ipalionokis EJAKAIT; ido konyet katwana eoŋ iyatanakinete biai?
Kotukokisi imakio kere luka atekerinikus, ka ijakakus, tetere alimokini akiro nu akikec, kanyarau da akuj ka akwap araun akajenakakec.

Naarai ajeni ebe katwana eoŋ imunaunos yesi cut, ipaarete ainyein erot lokecorak yes; kidoikini yes aronis kapaarasia nuepote; naarai iswamaete nueroko kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT aitunyunyurikin ŋes kaswamisio nuka akaninikus.”
Kolimok Musa ekodet kere loka Isirael akiro kere nuka ekosio kalo aitodol naaŋetakinotor.
Akwap da kopup akiro nuka aitukuka:
Ijililiun einerika kwape kakopyo;
Kwape kakiru naedit naetepakini amelo,
Kwape kelimilim loilimilimi okui.
Naarai alimori eoŋ ekiror loka EJAKAIT:
Kitopoloosi yesi Ewokodeke!
Naarai eraas irotinike kere etube.
Edeke lomunot loemameete numam adolit,
Erai ŋesi lokabeit ido loedolit.
Amunaunos kamake, mam eraas idweke, Aŋwalata;
Erai atur naepaarit namagul da.
Yes ituŋa lubaŋiok ka lumam acoa?
Mere ŋesi papakon lokidumunit jo?
Kisub jo kiticat da.
Kiitu apaarasia nukolo ŋo kasonya,
Koomoom nuka ikar luka aturio nuipu:
Kiŋit papakon, kitodikini ŋesi jo;
Imakiokon da, kilimokinete jo.
Abu kibwaik iikorun luka ituŋa
Kwape ejaar etiai loka idwe luka Isirael.
Yakob ŋes eroet loka airumeteke.
Amodiŋ naelapat naegatatar itiaŋ;
Abu kirimo ŋes, koric ŋes,
Kidar ŋes bala ecopot loka akoŋuke:
Bala emorukaalet loitetemonokini lukokaike,
Loeporitoi kaneejaas idweke,
Abu korio akebebenoka, koyaŋa kes,
Kodaka kes kabebenokake:
EJAKAIT bon ŋes eŋarenikinit ŋes,
Amamei edeke lomoit kaŋes.
Konyam da amio naka emanikor;
Koinak ŋes aijuju esik loalomuni katiiba,
Ka akinyet naalomuni kamoru naegogoŋ;
Ka asiepai nuka imerekekin ludidik,
Ka imerekekin luka Basan, ka ikorwa,
Ka akima nuturaŋ;
Ibu komat ebino loka aokot nuka emusabibu.
Ibu kotum, koburior, kinutakin:
Kosodi konyet aijal Edeke lokesubi ŋes,
Komen Atiiba naka aitajarioke.
Apotu kisurumata ŋes ekokote kanuka idekesio lumo, Kitunyunyurikisi da ŋes kitalesia.
Koinakis asuban idekesio lumam lem ejenete,
Lukitetiak luapote kokau,
Lumam lem lukapapaakus eyoŋito.
Mam iwomit nuka Atiiba nakiwuruuni jo,
Kimurwok jo Edeke lokiwuruuni jo.
“Koany EJAKAIT, kola kes,
Kanuka aitunyunyurikin naka ikedwe lusap ka lupesur.
Aanyuni ejautene loka esaŋekec:
Naarai eraas atur naepaarit, Idwe lumam eraas lumunon.
Ketunyunyurikis kanuka aamameakakec:
Esurumi kes ekokote kanuka ŋul lumam eraas ateker;
Etunyunyurikini kes kateker naebaŋaana.
Enoki kiton aipany nakokwap cut,
Enyami akwap ka amioke,
Icwei da apeteta nuka iroŋan.
“ ‘Eculakini kes aronisio;
Adaikini ikakojoi mamakec:
Idokoraros kanuka eteŋei,
Enomorio kes keimilia kaloesarani,
Ka amudiario naedwar ria:
Ejukakini kes ikel luka itiaŋ,
Aisorit naka lueliatos luka apua.
Ejaun etasuro agolai;
Emudiari ekatumunan ka abekot,
Yenenaki ka ituŋanan yenebwaŋunito akorwo.
Abu katema atiar, “Tikesiarisiara kes neelwana,
Tiketanan aiitununokec kotuŋa”:
Kinyeis lukasurupokec asabanakin,
Kinyeis kesi atemar atiar, “Itopolooritai awokokan,
Mere EJAKAIT eswamai nu kere.” ’
“Naarai eraas ateker naemamei ainerun,
Emamei da aijen kotomakec.
Tieomito nuka esaŋekec loebuni!
Ka iarei da aiteker ilukumin itomon,
Dimikito egwelarit Atiibakec kes,
Dimi ijaikinit EJAKAIT kes?
Eraas lukasurupowok da ikatubok luka ŋun.
Naarai emusabibukec erai emusabibu loka Sodom,
loka imanikoria luka Gomora:
Ikecemusabibun eraas imusabibun luka epiu,
Edwarak aibuŋetakec:
Ekecebino ŋes aisorit naka imunwo lurwopopoete,
Ka aisorit naededeŋ naka imusagan.
Kipucuc kotoma aiŋadisiaka?
Kapak naejurusiarotor akecekejen:
Naarai aapu apaaran naka amudiariokec,
Ido iwonyunete nuebunokinete kes.
Iituni ikebulesin;
Keanyu ebe alemar akecegogoŋ,
Emamei da yenideuna yeneenitai arai yeneosikinitai.
Atiiba naamunosi kesi;
Luanyamete asiepai nuka asubanakec,
Luamasete ebino loka ainakinetekec namatat?
Konyoutu kesi, kiŋarakis yes,
Koraunos kesi amecisikus.
Emamei edeke keoŋ:
Aari, ido etajari;
Emusuŋi, ido etaŋaleuni:
Emamei idio da yenepedori ademari kakanika.
Ebe, Kwape ajaria ikar kere.
Arai kepen ekileŋika loemwekimweki,
Kosodi akakan aikod etube;
Enyaŋi mama ejaas lukasurupoka,
Ataci ŋul lukalaito eoŋ.
Enyami ekakileŋ akiriŋ;
Kaokot nuka luearitai ka iŋatan,
Ageun kakwes nuka itima lueojak luka lukasurupo.’
Naarai inyaŋi aokot nuka ikekejaanakinak,
Inyaŋi mama ejaas lukasurupoke,
Itegeli kanuka akwapuke, kanuka iketuŋa da.”
Kobu Musa kiner akiro kere nuka ekosio kaŋol kaki nuka ituŋa, ŋes ka Kosea okoku loka Nun.
Kitanaŋ Musa einer akiro ŋun kere mama ejai Isirael kere:
Kotema kes atiar, “Kibwaikisi itauonokus akiro kere nuketejen yes lolo; nuicorakinete yesi ikusidwe, airic aiswamaenen akiro kere nuka ikisila kalu.
Naarai mam eraas akamameak kamakus; naarai erai aijarakus, kanuka ŋun iyatakinete yesi akusipaarasia kakwap naidokarete airum okekwa loka Yorodan.”
“Kodoka ijo oroŋat lo Abarim, moru Nebo loejai akwap naka Moab, naitei Yeriko; koseseni akwap naka Kanaan, naainakinit idwe luka Isirael araun airumet:
Kotwanik moru loidokari ijo, koyanaar mama ejaas ikonituŋa; kwape atwanikinia onacekon Aaron moru Kor, koyaŋaarai mama ejaas iketuŋa:
Naarai ipotu kibuceasi kama ajai kokidiŋ kidwe luka Isirael kakipi nuka Meriba naka Kades, kamodiŋ naka Sin; naarai mam ipotu kitalaut eoŋ kokidiŋ kidwe luka Isirael.
Naarai ianyuni akwap kakonyenekon; konye mam ilomari akwap naainakinit idwe luka Isirael.”
Kotema atiar,
“Abu EJAKAIT kobu koSinai,
Kocaik kes koSeir;
Koca komoru Paran,
Kolom kolukumin itomon luka ikalaunak:
Kakekan nakoteten ajai ekisil loka akim mamakec.
Ejaas ikalaunakake kere akonikan:
Apotu kiboikinos akejekon;
Ijaikinio ŋinituŋanan akonikiro.
Airumet naka ekodet loka Yakob.
Naatukonokinere ikapolok luka ituŋa,
Atekerin kere nuka Isirael.
“Kojar Reuben, komam etwani;
Konye kikidiokoto iketuŋa.”
“EJAKAIT, kopup eporoto loka Yuda,
Kitoloma ŋes neejaas iketuŋa:
Abu koji kakekanin kanukeŋ;
Iŋarakini ijo ŋes aitiji lukasurupoke.”
“Tumimikon ka Urimikon ejaas ka etuŋananikon loka Edeke, Loibu kigimo koMasa,
Loibu kitepeg kakipi nuka Meriba;
‘Mam aanyunit ŋes’:
Mam ŋes abu kolimo ikeinacan,
Karaida ajenun ikedwe:
Naarai aricito akonikirot,
Kidarete aitutuketekon.
Ka Isirael da ekisilikon:
Ibwaikinete lukisupurununo akonyenekon,
Ka ainakinet kere naicweio kotemukon.
Kocam aswam naka akaninike:
Kicum aipelor aŋabes nuka ŋul kaluenyoikinete ŋes,
Nuka ŋul da luelaito ŋes,
Tetere mam bobo enyounete.”
Naka Benyamin kotema atiar,
“Iboikin yeniminat yenika EJAKAIT kainapakin eiduny kaŋes; Imukorit ŋes apaaran kere,
Iboienenei da kokidiŋ kikeperinike.”
“Kisirereŋ EJAKAIT akekwap;
Koboro luketiai loepol luka akui, kakopyo,
Kaidules naidipidipakina kwap.
Koboro luketiai loepol luka araito nuka akoloŋ,
Koboro luketiai loepol luka apol naka ilapio.
Koboro luketiai loepol luka iukon lumam enaŋete.
Kacamunio naka ŋol kaloiboie kokitwi;
Kobu arereŋ akou naka Yosep,
Kosiaduk loka ŋol kaloatiakario koinacanake.
Amumwarake eraas amumwara nuka ekosobwan:
Kes eremoria ŋesi ituŋa, kes kere, kiton osaŋe loka akwap:
Eraas kesi ilukumin itomon luka Epuraim,
Eraas da ilukumin luka Manase.”
Naka Sebulun kotema atiar,
“Sebulun, kolakar kotoma alomarikon;
Isakar da kotoma owemaikon.
Einakinete kaŋina asuban nuka adolit:
Naarai ijujuete luidilas kaŋolol,
Ka luketiai loepol luibwaitai kasiŋe.”
“Isirereŋitoi ŋol loitalalai Gad:
Iboie bala aŋatuny,
Epoopoi kakan, eebo esiaduk loka akou.
Naarai eŋadakinitai ewai loka lokesilan
Kobu nepepe kalukapolok luka ituŋa,
Kitodol abeit naka EJAKAIT,
Ka itubesia koIsirael.”
“Erai Dan ikoku yenika eŋatuny,
Yenesomun koBasan.”
“Wu Naputali, loimono asianut,
Loileleba arereŋ naka EJAKAIT:
Irumi ijo ari nakoto ka eŋalakimak.”
“Isirereŋitoi Aser kidwe; Kocamunai koinacanake,
Kidomak ŋesi akekeju akinyet.
Eraunos agolitokon asuat ka aisinit;
Kwape kapaarasiakon, kwape kwaŋin ejaunor agogoŋukon.”
Loibwaneni akuj aiŋarakin jo,
Kajokisike kakuj.
Kigagat kakanin numam enaŋete:
Ereŋea lukasurupo kakonyenekon,
Kobala ebe, ‘Komudia.’
Atan naka Yakob ejai bon,
Kakwap naka akima ka ebino;
Eebo etepi akekuj akopyo.
Iŋai loeputos kajo, ituŋa luitajarit EJAKAIT,
Ebuku loka aiŋarakiniokon,
Ŋol ŋes ekileŋ loka ajokisikon!
Kinonokikinete jo lukasurupokon;
Icakacakai ijo aiboisiokec nuiceleleete.”
Ka Naputali kere, ka akwap naka Epuraim ka Manase, ka akwap kere naka Yuda, kiton aŋolol nakoiŋaren;
Ka Eŋalakimak, ka Apuuton naka aditot naka Yeriko ere loka idukudukun kiton Soar.
Kotema EJAKAIT ŋes atiar, “ŋin ŋes akwap naabu keyapoik Aburaam, ka Isaak, ka Yakob, ebe, Ainakini aurikon: kesireik jo kakonyekon, konye mam idokari ŋina.”
Kwaŋin kotwanik Musa ekejaanakinan loka EJAKAIT akwap naka Moab, kwape ajaar akirot naka EJAKAIT.
Kidaik ŋes aditot akwap naka Moab naitei Bet-peor: konye emamei ituŋanan yenejeni atesike kiton lolo.
Arai Musa loka ikar akwatat ka akaisaarei naatwania: mam akekoŋu awariwari, karaida akegogoŋ aiŋoŋooro.
Kibworoto idwe luka Isirael Musa kapuutona nuka Moab apaarasia akaisauni: kwaŋin kitanaŋai apaarasia nuka aibworo Musa.
Mam bobo ejauna enabi koIsirael loeputos ka Musa, loanyununos ka EJAKAIT:
Kotoma aanyuneta kere ka nukaumokin, nuejukari EJAKAIT ŋes aiswamakin Parao, ka ikekejaanakinak kere, ka akwapuke kere, kakwap nako Misiri;
Kotoma akan nakagogoŋ, ka etasuro kere loepol, loabu Musa kiswama kakonyen nuka Isirael kere.
“Atwana Musa ekejaanakinanika; aso kwana konyou, kodok ecor lo Yorodan, ijo ka ituŋa lu kere, kolomasi akwap naainakinit eoŋ kes, idwe luka Isirael.
Ŋiniibois neicakete akusikeje, kainak yes, kwape kolo alimokinia Musa.
Ameuni kamodiŋ, ka Lebanon lo, aitodol ocor lokapolon, ecor Eupurat, akwap kere naka Ikitin, kiton aŋolol nati ape neelomanari akoloŋ, ŋes eraun ekusiikor;
Emameun ituŋanan kere yenepedori abwoikin jo apaarasia kere nuka akoniijar: kwape ajaar kolo ka Musa, ajaikin kwape kwaŋin kajo da: mam ketukurwori jo, karaida aijal.
Kicat, kotitiŋior, naarai isurumi ijo ituŋa lu akwap nakolo eyapoikin ainakin lukapapaakec.
Konye kicat ber kotitiŋior noi, aricit aswam kwape ejaatar ikisila lu, lukicorakini ekakejaanakinan Musa: siripaanari kakan nakoteten karaida kediany, tetere irereŋior kama ilosenenei kere.

Eitabo lo loka ikisila sirenyoununei kaitukukon, konye koomoomoenenei ŋes paaran ka akuare da, tetere iricit aswam kere kwape ejaatar nuiwadikatai toma: naarai kwaŋin ŋes erereŋior ekonirot, ikerianaror da;
Mere eoŋ kecorak jo? Kicat, kotitiŋior; sirikikurianar karaida aiyaloŋoŋ: naarai ejai EJAKAIT Ekonideke kajo kama ilosenenei kere.”
Kosodi kicorak Yosua ijaka luka ituŋa atiar,
“Kitoro kidiŋ oidukurun, kicorakis ituŋa atiar, ‘Kitemonokisi inyamat, naarai eriŋa apaarasia auni etuboro idokete ecor lo Yorodan, alomar airum akwap, nakiinakini EJAKAIT Ekusideke airum.’ ”
“Kiitutu akirot nakicorakini yes Musa ekejaanakinan loka EJAKAIT, ebe, ‘EJAKAIT Ekusideke kiinakini yes aiyeŋun, kiinakini da akwap na.’

Akusiŋor, ka ikusidwe, ka ikusibaren, iboikinos akwap nakiinakini Musa kokekwa loka Yorodan; konye yes idokarete kakonyen nuka iinacanakus ikapitos lujiis, ituŋa kere lukirigin, luetitiŋ, iŋarakinete kes:

Aitodol naedaunia EJAKAIT aisiyeŋun ikusiinacan, kwape yes, ido kedaut kesi da airum akwap naeinakini EJAKAIT Ekusideke, kosodete iboŋorete kirumata akwap naka airumetekus, nakiinakini Musa ekejaanakinan loka EJAKAIT kokekwa loka Yorodan mape elomununia akoloŋ.”
Koboŋokis Yosua ebe, “Kere nukicorak ijo sio kiswamai, ido kere nekijukanari kilosenenei.
Kwape kiipupenenoo Musa kakiro kere, kipupenenei jo da kwape kwaŋin: konye kojai EJAKAIT Ekonideke kajo, kwape kejaar ka Musa.
Ŋinituŋanan kere yenipaliikini akoniicorakinet, ido yenimam epupenenei akonikiro kere nuicorakini ŋes, eareneneo: konye kicat, kotitiŋior.”
Kolimokinai ekabaka loka Yeriko ebe, “Koany, elomunito ituŋa ne luka idwe luka Isirael akuare na airot akwap,”
Kijukak ekabaka loka Yeriko Rakab atiar, “Kitolom ituŋa lueponito neijai ijo, lualomasi togokon: naarai eponito airot akwap kere.”
Koyaŋa aberu ituŋa ŋul luarei, kibwa kes; kotema atiar, “Eebo, aponito ituŋa neajai eoŋ, konye mam ajeni neaponiata:
Kosodi kapak naagolere erute, kemutonor akwap, apotu ituŋa kolomasi: mam ajeni neapotu koloto: aso kibwapakisi kes atipet; naarai idolokinete kes.”
Kibwapata ituŋa kes korot loebei Yorodan, kiton odoket: napelomarete luebwapito kes kiŋa kogolokinoi erute.
Eroko kes kepero, abu aberu kolot oswi neajaas kesi;
Kotema ŋesi ituŋa atiar, “Ajeni ebe kiinak EJAKAIT yes akwap, kibunok da isio etasurokus, luiboiete kakwap kere eburunito kakonyenekus.

Naarai kipupu kwape etoonio EJAKAIT akipi nuka Aŋolol Nakareŋan kakonyenekus, nailomuniata koMisiri; ka nuipotu yesi kiswamakis ikabakan iarei luka Imorain, luajaas okekwa loka Yorodan, kes Sikon ka Og, luipotu yesi komudiasi cut.
Napekipupunio isio ŋun, apotu ikositauon koburut, kipirisiar etau loka ŋinituŋanan kanukus: naarai EJAKAIT Ekusideke, ŋes Edeke kokuju toma akuj, kokwap da toma akwap.
Aso do, keŋaiŋait, kiyapoikinoi eoŋ, kolimitos EJAKAIT, naarai kekonak yes nukasianut, yes da kikonakis ekaloka papaka nukasianut, koinakis eoŋ aanyunet nakabeit:
Ebe itajarete papaka; ka totoka, ka iinacanaka, ka ainacanaka, kere da luejaatar kesi, iyuunete aijarakosi kotoma atwanare.”
Kotemasi ituŋa ŋes atiar, “Akosiijar itia nakus, arai mam ilimorete akosikiro nu; ejaun do ebe, nakiinakinia EJAKAIT sio akwap, kikonakini jo nukasianut ka nukabeit.”
Kotema kes atiar, “Kodokasi oroŋat, kinyeis lukibwapito adumun yes; koŋopata kanen apaarasia auni aitodol naeboŋunioto lukibwapito: akaulo kaŋun ilosete konyet.”
Kotemasi ituŋa ŋes atiar, “Emamuunete nukibeikinete sio kanuka aiyapositikon na nakisiyapo ijo sio.
Koany, nakilomunia isio akwap, ienikini auno na nakareŋan adirisa nakijolulunio ijo sio: itukokini papakon ka totokon ka iinacanakon, ka lukokaloka papakon kere togo mama ijai.
Ejaun do ebe, ŋin yenelomuni kotogokon alosit orot, ejaunos aokotoke akouke, emamuunete nukibeikinete sio: ŋin yenejai kajo togo, ejaunos aokotoke akoukosi, arai kesuroki ŋes adiokan.
Konye arai kilimo ijo akosikiro nu, emamuunete do nukibeikinete sio kanuka aiyapositikon nakisiyapo sio.”
Kotema ŋesi atiar, “Kikote nepenen, kwape ejaatar akusikiro.” Kotwar kes, konyout: koenik auno nakareŋan adirisa.
Koloto, kodoloto oroŋat, kiboikinos nen apaarasia auni, aitodol naaboŋunioto lukibwapito: komoata lukibwapito kes orot kere, konye mam apotu kodumut kes.
Kosodete ituŋa luarei aboŋor, kodokut koroŋat, kikwaŋaros, kodoloto neajai Yosua okoku loka Nun; kolimokis ŋes kere nuapotu kodoikis kes.
Kotemasi Yosua atiar, “Abeit kijaik EJAKAIT akwap kere akaniniwok; bobo da eburunito luiboienenete kakwap kakonyenewok.”
Kosodi kanen ketuboros apaarasia auni, kitoro ijaka kidiŋ kiidukurun;
Kicorakis ituŋa ebe, “Naianyuniata asaduku naka aitutuket naka EJAKAIT Ekusideke, ka isasedotin Ilebin edakitos ŋes, inyounete do kaiboisiokus, kotupasi ŋes.
Konye ejaun apak kidiŋikus ka ŋes, aitemis naka ikubitin
Kotema Yosua ituŋa atiar, “Kitalaunos, naarai iswamai moi EJAKAIT nukaumokin kamakus.”
Kotema Yosua isasedotin atiar, “Kodakata asaduku naka aitutuket, kiŋarenikis ituŋa adokar.” Apotu kodakata asaduku naka aitutuket, kiŋarenikis ituŋa alosit.
Icorakini ijo isasedotin luedakito asaduku naka aitutuket ebe, ‘Naidolioto ariri kakipi nuka Yorodan, ibwoete kopalarito koYorodan.’ ”
Kotema Yosua idwe kere luka Isirael atiar, “Kopotu ne, kopuput akiro nuka EJAKAIT Ekusideke.”

Kotema Yosua atiar, “Ijenunete kanu ebe ejai Edeke lokajaran mamakus, ebe da mam ekurwori cut aireŋear Ekanaanit, ka Ekitit, ka Ekibit, ka Eperisit, ka Egirugasit, ka Emorait, ka Eyebusit kakonyenekus.
Koany, kiŋarenikinit yes asaduku naka aitutuket naka EJAKAIT loka akwap kere adokar Yorodan.
Aso do koseutu ituŋa itomon ka luarei luka atekerin nuka Isirael, etuŋanan kanuka ŋiniteker.

Kosodi kanen, naicakiata akeje nuka isasedotin luedakito asaduku naka EJAKAIT, EJAKAIT loka akwap kere, akipi nuka Yorodan, itikorio akipi nuka Yorodan, ka neeleleununiata; esipokinos atukit adiopet.”
Kedoloto luadakito asaduku Yorodan, kicakata akeje nuka isasedotin luadakito asaduku akipi, (naarai ilelebunun Yorodan kiton aririke kere, apak kere naka aisak,)

Kosipokinos akipi nualeleunete, koraunos atukit adiopet, kaneelwana noi, koAdam, ere loidunyas ka Saretan: akipi da nueleleete aŋolol naka Araba, ŋes Aŋolol naka Abalaŋ, kitikoroi; kotuboros ituŋa kiton Yeriko.
Kobwaata isasedotin luadakito asaduku naka aitutuket naka EJAKAIT kaneonit, kokidiŋ Yorodan, kotubor Isirael kere kaneonit, aitodol neatuboror cut ateker kere koYorodan.
“Koseu ituŋa itomon ka luarei kotuŋa, etuŋanan kaŋiniteker.
Kicorak kes ebe, ‘Kolemutu amor atomon ka nuarei kokidiŋ Yorodan, kaibois naabwoiata akeje nuka isasedotin, koyaŋaasi kes, kibwaikis aibois naiperete akuare na.’ ”
Kosodi Yosua anyaraun ituŋa lutomon ka luarei, luaseunit kodwe luka Isirael, etuŋanan kaŋiniteker:
Kotema Yosua kes atiar, “Kotuboros kiŋaren kasaduku naka EJAKAIT Ekusideke kidiŋ Yorodan, kodakak ŋinituŋanan kayesi amoru okeperike, kwape ejaar etiai loka atekerin nuka idwe luka Isirael:
Koraun do aanyunet mamakus, tetere naiŋisiata ikusidwe, kapaarasia nuepote ebe, ‘Anyoin apolou naka amorukus nu?’

Itemarete do kes atiar, ‘Naarai aponi kitikoroi akipi nuka Yorodan koiŋaren kasaduku naka aitutuket naka EJAKAIT; naetorio Yorodan, aponi kitikoroi akipi nuka Yorodan:’ ido eraunos amor nu aisiitunet mama ejaas idwe luka Isirael ikar kere.”

Kiswamata idwe luka Isirael kwape kicorakinia Yosua, kodakut amor atomon ka nuarei kokidiŋ Yorodan, kwape kelimokinia EJAKAIT Yosua, kwape ejaar etiai loka atekerin nuka idwe luka Isirael: kodakas kes aibois naaperete, kibwaikis kes nen.
Kosipok Yosua amor atomon ka nuarei kidiŋ Yorodan, aibois naabwoiata akeje nuka isasedotin luadakito asaduku naka aitutuket: ejaas da nen, kiton lolo.
Naarai apotu isasedotin luadakito asaduku kobwaata kokidiŋ Yorodan, aitodol neadaunor ŋinikirot naecorakinit EJAKAIT Yosua alimokin ituŋa, kwape ajaatar kere nuecorakinit Musa Yosua.
Kiwonyasi ituŋa kotuboros.
Kosodi kanen ketuboros cut ituŋa kere, kotubor asaduku naka EJAKAIT, ka isasedotin, kiŋaren kituŋa.
Kotuboros da idwe luka Reuben, ka idwe luka Gad, ka atutubet naka ateker naka Manase, kokapitos lujiis, kiŋaren kidwe luka Isirael, kwape alimokinitor Musa kes.
Kotuboros kwaka ilukumin akaisaoŋon kokapakina ejie kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kiton apuutona nuka Yeriko.
Kitopoloo EJAKAIT Yosua kapaaran kaŋin kakonyen nuka Isirael kere; koyoŋata ŋes apaarasia kere nuka aijarake, kwape ayoŋitotor Musa.
Kotema EJAKAIT Yosua atiar,
“Kicorak isasedotin luedakito asaduku naka aitejenunet kodokut koYorodan.”
Kicorak do Yosua isasedotin ebe, “Kodokutu yesi koYorodan.”

Kosodi kanen nakedokuniata isasedotin luadakito asaduku naka aitutuket naka EJAKAIT kokidiŋ Yorodan, kicakata da akeje nuka isasedotin akwap naeonit, koboŋokis akip nuka Yorodan aiboisikec, kilelebun kiton aririke kwape lem sek.
Kisipok Yosua amor ŋun atomon ka nuarei Giligal, nualemunete kesi koYorodan.
Kolimok idwe luka Isirael ebe, “Naiŋisiata ikusidwe lukapapakec kapaarasia nuepote ebe, ‘Anyoin apolou naka amor kanu?’
Itejenunete do ikusidwe ebe, ‘Adokuni Isirael Yorodan lo kitorite neeonit.’
Naarai abu EJAKAIT Ekusideke kitoon akipi nuka Yorodan kakonyenekus, aitodol naitubunotor, kwape eswamakinia EJAKAIT Ekusideke Aŋolol Nakareŋan naabu ŋesi kitoon kakonyenewok, aitodol nakitubunor:
Tetere ejenunete ituŋa kere luka akwap akan naka EJAKAIT, ebe erai nakapedor; tetere eyoŋete EJAKAIT Ekusideke ikar kere.”
Kiswamau Yosua ikileŋa luka amor, kokep idwe luka Isirael, koukot loka amunyin.
Akepi Yosua ituŋa kanuka akirot kana: ituŋa kere lualomunete koMisiri, luaraas ikiliok, kes ituŋa kere lukajiok, apotu kotwakikis amodiŋ orot, kedaut alomun koMisiri.
Naarai ituŋa kere lualomunete araas luakepitai: konye ituŋa kere luaurio kamodiŋ korot epote kesi koMisiri, mam akepitai.

Naarai apotu idwe luka Isirael kolototo kamodiŋ ikar akaisaoŋon, aitodol naamudiarere ateker kere, kes ituŋa lukajiok lualomunete koMisiri, naarai mam apotu kopuput eporoto loka EJAKAIT: luabu EJAKAIT kiyapoik ebe mam ecamakini kes aanyun akwap naabu kiyapoik lukapapaakec ebe kiinakin oni akwap naeleleete akile ka esik.
Idwekec, luetopolouni ŋesi aiboisikec, ŋul akepi Yosua: naarai mam akepitai, naarai mam apotu kokepa kes korot.
Kotema EJAKAIT Yosua atiar, “Ekokorio lolo eoŋ amorosit naka Misiri kamakus.” Ŋes do amaikinere aibois ŋin Giligal,
Konyamata akima nuka akwap tupuruc kedaun aleleŋio, imugatin lumam itubuunitoi ka imumwa luikawooritai, kapaaran kaŋipe kaŋin.
Kitanaŋai emanu kapaaran naatupakini ŋin naanyamiata kesi akima nuka akwap; mam bobo idwe luka Isirael apotu koanyut emanu; konye anyamete araito nuka alup nuka Kanaan okaru ŋol.
Kotema atiar, “Mam; konye abunit eoŋ kwape ekapolon loka ajore naka EJAKAIT.” Kibiror Yosua ebuburia, koma, kotema ŋes atiar, “Anyoika nuebala ejakaitika ekekejaanakinan?”
Kotema ekapolon loka ajore naka EJAKAIT Yosua atiar, “Kolaca akonimuk kakejenekon; naarai aibois naibwoia ijo erai nakalaunan.” Kiswama Yosua kwaŋin.
Kogoloro noi Yeriko kanuka idwe luka Isirael: amamei yenelomari karaida yenelomuni.
Kotema EJAKAIT Yosua atiar, “Koany, ainak Yeriko akanikon, ka ekabakake, ka ituŋa lukirigin luetitiŋ.
Irimorete yesi ere, ituŋa kere lukajiok, irimorete ere irwan atipet. Iswamai ijo kwaŋin apaarasia akanykape.
Itiŋete isasedotin ikanykaarei arupepen akanykaarei nuka amumwara nuka imerekekin koiŋaren kasaduku: ido kapaaran nakikanyetekaarei irimorete ere irwan akanykaarei, kokusete isasedotin arupepen.

Ejaun do ebe, naekutakiniata noi amumwarat naka emerekek, naipupunioto yesi aruo naka arupepe, ibwoŋakinete ituŋa kere eibwoŋ loepol: etiyakin arwatat naka ere, edokarete ituŋa ŋinituŋanan ederori kiŋarenike.”

Abu Yosua okoku loka Nun konyarau isasedotin, kotema kes atiar, “Kodakata asaduku naka aitutuket, kitiŋata isasedotin ikanykaarei arupepen akanykaarei nuka amumwara nuka imerekekin koiŋaren kasaduku naka EJAKAIT.”
Kotemasi kesi ituŋa atiar, “Kotuboros, kirimosi ere, koloto ituŋa luekapakina kiŋaren kasaduku naka EJAKAIT.”
Koloto ituŋa luakapakina kiŋaren kisasedotin luakusete arupepen, kotupata lukokau asaduku, kokusete isasedotin arupepen elosete.
Kicorak Yosua ituŋa ebe, “Mam ibwoŋakinete karaida ikusiporotoi apupunio, karaida alimun adiokirot kaitukekus, aitodol apaaran nakecorakinia yes aibwoŋakin; ŋes konyet ibwoŋakiniata.”
Kwaŋin kisirimo asaduku naka EJAKAIT ere, airimor ŋes irwan atipet: koboŋosi oidukurun, koperoto oidukurun.

Kolosenenete isasedotin ikanykaarei luetiŋito arupepen akanykaarei nuka amumwara nuka imerekekin koiŋaren kasaduku naka EJAKAIT, kokusete arupepen: kiŋarenikinitos ituŋa luakapakina lujiis kes; kotupata lukokau asaduku naka EJAKAIT, kokusete isasedotin arupepen elosete.
Kapaaran nakiareit da kirimosi ere irwan atipet, koboŋosi oidukurun: kiswamata kwaŋin apaarasia akanykape.
Kosodi kanen kapaaran nakikanyetekaarei, kodilokis anyoun ecila kide, kirimosi ere kwape ejaar epone ŋol irwan akanykaarei: konye kapaaran kaŋin apotu kirimosi ere irwan akanykaarei.
Kosodi kanen irwan nakikanyetekaarei nakekutakiniata isasedotin arupepen, kotema Yosua ituŋa atiar, “Kibwoŋata; naarai kiinak EJAKAIT yes ere.
Itateleori EJAKAIT ere, ŋes ka luejaas toma kere; dimarai Rakab naadote ŋes ejari, ŋes ka ŋul kere luejaas kaŋes togo, naarai abu ŋesi kibwa ikiyakia lukiijukarit.
Ka yes da, kocoito noi kosaca ibore yenitateleoritai kinyeis naidauniata aitaleor, ayaŋaar ibore yenitateleoritai; kosodete kwaŋin ayaun aiken oidukurun luka Isirael ka aitican kes.
Konye epuesa kere, ka esabu, ka amoti nuka aisinit ka asuat eraas nukalaunak kama ejai EJAKAIT: eyaŋaunio aiŋadis naka EJAKAIT,”

Kosodete ituŋa eibwoŋ, kokutata isasedotin arupepen: kosodi kanen kepuput ituŋa aruo naka arupepe, kibwoŋata ituŋa eibwoŋ loepol, kotiyakin arwatat, kodokasi ituŋa ore, ŋinituŋanan kodero kiŋarenike, kirumata ere.
Komudiasi cut kere luajaas toma ore, ikiliok ka aŋor, ludidik ka lumojoŋ, imoŋin ka amerekekin, ka asigirian, kakwanis naka ekileŋ.
Kolomasi ikatumunak lukarotak, kitolomut Rakab ka papake, ka totoke, ka iinacanake, ka luajaatar kere; kitolomut da lukokekike kere; kibwaikis kes kiŋa kiidukurun luka Isirael.
Kicweikis ere, ka luejaas toma kere: dimarai epuesa ka esabu, ka amoti nuka aisinit ka asuat, apotu kesi kibwaikis ŋul aiŋadis naka etogo loka EJAKAIT.
Konye Rakab naadote, ka ekal loka papake, ka luajaatar kere abu Yosua kitajar; kiboikin mama ejai Isirael, kiton lolo; naarai abu ŋesi kibwa ikiyakia luejukarit Yosua airot Yeriko.
Kicorak Yosua kes kaiyaposit kapak kaŋin ebe, “Kikenoi kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT etuŋanan loenyouni aiduk ere lo Yeriko,
Etwani ekiyaike naepesikinia ŋesi apetetake,
Etwani da eŋooritike naesipokinia ŋesi ikekiake.”
Kijuka Yosua ituŋa anyoun koYeriko alosit Ai, loidunyas ka Bet-aben, kari nakokide naka Bet-el, kotema kes atiar, “Koloto korota akwap.” Koloto ituŋa korota Ai.
Koboŋut mama ejai Yosua, kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Kinyeis ituŋa kere alosit; konye koloto ilukumin iarei arai iuni aidany Ai; sirikitaar ituŋa kere alosit ŋina; naarai ikidioko lukaŋina.”
Kwaŋin koloto ituŋa kwape ilukumin iuni ŋina, kokerata kakonyen nuka ituŋa luka Ai.
Kodanyata ituŋa luka Ai ituŋa kwape akaisauni ka lukanykape kakesi: apotu korukioto kes anyoun korute kiton Sebarim, kodanyata kes kajesa: koburut itauon luka ituŋa, kipirisiaros piris.
Kotema Yosua atiar, “Wu okwe, EJAKAIT Edeke, kanukinyo itodokunia ijo ituŋa lu Yorodan, aijaikin akan naka Imorain, amudiar sio? Tiejok arai kasalito isio aiboi okekwa loka Yorodan!
Wu EJAKAIT, atemari eoŋ ai, kedau Isirael aibelokin lukasurupokec ipuranakec!
Naarai epupunete Ikanaanin ka luiboiete kakwap kere, kosodete alukun sio, amudiar ekosikiror kakwap: ikwaikini ijo ai ekonikiror lokapolon?”
Kotema EJAKAIT Yosua atiar, “Konyou; kanukinyo ibiroror ijo ebuburia?
Adiaka Isirael; eebo, ebucasi aitutuketeka naecorakinit kes: eebo, ayaŋaasi ibore yenetateleoritai; akokwata, ejoseikis, ebwaikis da ŋin oborokec.

Kanuka ŋun mam idwe luka Isirael epedorete aibwo kakonyen nuka lukasurupokec, iboŋokinete lukasurupokec ipuranakec, naarai araut luikenitai: mam bobo ajaenena kayes, dimikito kimudiasi ibore yenitateleoritai kotomakus.

Konyou, kitalau ituŋa, kolimok kes ebe, ‘Kitalaunos eroko moi kedoluno: naarai inera EJAKAIT Edeke loka Isirael kwanata ebe, “Ejai ibore yenitateleoritai tomakon, ijo Isirael; mam jo ipedori abwoikin lukasurupokon, aitodol nailemaria ibore yenitateleoritai kotomakon.”

Kanuka ŋun kisukunyunio moi yes kwape ejaatar atekerinikus: kosodi do ateker naeseuni EJAKAIT ikunyuni kwape ejaatar ikekiake; ekek da loeseuni EJAKAIT ikunyuni kwape ejaatar ikaliake; ekal da loeseuni EJAKAIT ikunyuni idiopet idiopet.
Ejaun do ebe, ŋol loeseunio loejai ibore yenitateleoritai icweio kakim, ŋes ka luejaatar kere: naarai ebuca aitutuket naka EJAKAIT, naarai eswama nukabaŋaanut koIsirael.’ ”
Kodilok Yosua anyoun tupuruc, kisukuny Isirael kwape ejaatar atekerinikec; koseunai ateker naka Yuda:
Kisukuny ikekia luka Yuda; koseu ekek loka Iserakitin; kisukuny ekek loka Iserakitin idiopet idiopet; koseunai Sabidi:
Kisukuny ekaleke idiopet idiopet: koseunai Akan, okoku loka Karumi, okoku loka Sabidi, okoku loka Sera, loka ateker naka Yuda.
Kotema Yosua Akan atiar, “Okokuka, keŋaiŋait, kitopoloo EJAKAIT Edeke loka Isirael, kolimok ŋes aronisikon; kolimokinai eoŋ nuiswamat ijo; sirikiimunonik eoŋ”
Koboŋok Akan Yosua atiar, “Abeit adiaka eoŋ kaneejai EJAKAIT Edeke loka Isirael, eswama nu ka nu:
Naanyunia koŋatan elou loejok loka Babulon, ka isekelin
Kijuka Yosua ikiyakia kokerata owema; ido koany, ebwaitai kowema, epuesa da ajai kwapuke.
Kolemut kes kokidiŋ kewema, koyaut kes neajai Yosua, neajaas idwe kere luka Isirael; kibwaikis kes kwap akonyen nuka EJAKAIT.

Koyaŋa Yosua ka idwe kere luka Isirael, Akan okoku loka Sera, ka epuesa, ka elou, ka ibore yenika esabu, ka ikedwe lusap ka lupesur, ka imoŋinike ka asigirianake, ka amerekekinike, ka ewemake, ka luejaatar kere: koyaŋaasi kes aditot naka Akor.
Kotema Yosua atiar, “Kanukinyo kiticania sio? kiticani EJAKAIT jo da lolo.” Apotu luka Isirael kere kibiribiroto ŋes kamor; kicweata kes kakim kibiribiroto da kamor.
Kotukokisi kujuke atukit naepol naka amor, kiton lolo; kibelokin EJAKAIT ainyein adedeŋ naka anyunyurake. Ŋes amaikinere aibois ŋin ekiror, Aditot naka Akor,
Iswamakini Ai ka ekabakake kwape iswamakinia Yeriko ka ekabakake: konye iyaŋaarete luŋatanake, ka ibareneke kanukus: kibwaik icetuŋa agule naka ere aperun kes.”
Konyou Yosua, ka ituŋa kere lukajiok alosit Ai: koseu Yosua ituŋa ilukumin akaisauni, ituŋa lukirigin luetitiŋ, kijuka kes kuare.
Kicorak kes ebe, “Koany, ilosete yesi aperun ere, kagule naka ere: sirikilwakiata kore, konye kitemokino kere:
Ekunyakini eoŋ ere ka ituŋa kere luejaas keoŋ: kosodi kanen, naelomuniata kesi asurokin, kwape koloje, kikeri isio kakonyenekec;
Kitupete kesi sio, aitodol nekiŋalaaria isio kes kiŋa naka ere; naarai etemarete ebe, ‘Ekerete kakonyenewok, kwape koloje’; kwaŋin kikeri kakonyenekec:
Inyounete yesi kaneiperunioto irumete ere: naarai kijaikini EJAKAIT Ekusideke ŋes akanikus.
Kosodi do, kidaut airum ere, kicweikis ere kakim; kwape ejaar akirot naka EJAKAIT, iswamaete kwaŋin: koany, kecorak yes.”
Kijuka Yosua kes: koloto aperun, kiboioto kokidiŋ Bet-el ka Ai, ari nakoto naka Ai: konye kopero Yosua akuare ŋin kituŋa.
Kolototo ituŋa kere, kes ituŋa lukajiok luajaas kaŋes, kikunyakis, kodoloto kiŋaren naka ere, kidukuroto ari naka agolitomei naka Ai: kojai da aditot kidiŋike ka Ai.
Koyaŋa ituŋa kwape ilukumin ikany, kibwaik kes kidiŋ Bet-el ka Ai aperun kari nakoto naka ere.
Kitemonokisi kwaŋin ituŋa, ajore kere naajai ari naka agolitomei ka lueperunete luajaas ari nakoto naka ere: kolot Yosua akuare ŋin kidiŋ aditot.

Kosodi kanen keanyu ekabaka loka Ai, kisunyakis, konyout tupuruc, kolomasi ituŋa luka ere aitiji Isirael, ŋes ka ituŋake kere, kapak naaseunitai, koiŋaren naka Araba; konye mam ŋes ajeni ebe aperunitoi ŋes kagule naka ere.
Kijoseikis Yosua ka Isirael kere bala ipikoritai kes, kokerata orot loebei modiŋ.
Konyaraunai ituŋa kere luajaas ore arukio kes: korukioto Yosua, kiŋalaarai do kes kore.
Komameun etuŋanan loasalit Ai arai Bet-el, lomam abu kotupak Isirael: kinyeis ere eŋaara, korukioto Isirael.
Kotema EJAKAIT Yosua atiar, “Kikeu akwarakon naejai akanikon kodod Ai; naarai ainakini ŋes akanikon.” Kikeu Yosua akwara naajai akanike adodia ere.
Konyout luaperunito atipet kaiboisikec, kokerata napikeuni ŋesi akekan, kolomasi ore, kirumata ŋes; kisunyakisi aicweikin ere.
Keŋoliasi ituŋa luka Ai kaukec, apotu koanyut, ido koany, apurie apuru naka ere kiton akuj, komam kes epedorete akerit lailo ka laije; koboŋut ituŋa luakerete amodiŋ asurokin ikarukitok.
Keanyu Yosua ka Isirael kere ebe erumata luaperunito ere, ebe da epurie apuru naka ere kuju, koboŋut bobo, koarata ituŋa luka Ai.
Kopotu luce kore asurokin kes; koluk do Isirael kes, ice owai lo ice da owai je: kodanyata kes, komam ideunete idio kakesi karaida aitukuu.
Kikamut ekabaka loka Ai ejari, koyaŋaut ŋes neajai Yosua.

Kosodi kanen kedau Isirael aiar kere lueboienenete koAi koitela, kamodiŋ da naarukorito kes, abu akwanis naka ekileŋ koar kes kere, aitodol neamudiarere, koboŋo Isirael kere Ai, kodany kakwanis naka ekileŋ.
Kere luapotu kotwaka apaaran ŋin, ikiliok ka aŋor, emwaasi ilukumin itomon ka luarei, kes ituŋa kere luka Ai.
Naarai mam Yosua abu kinyakak akekan naekeunia akekwara, aitodol naamudiaria cut kere lueboienenete koAi.
Konye ibaren ka luŋatuna kore kaŋol apotu luka Isirael koyaŋaasi araun iŋatanakec, kwape ajaar akirot naka EJAKAIT naecorakinit Yosua.
Kwaŋin kicwe Yosua Ai, kitaraun ŋes aapoŋor ikar kere, kosilior kiton lolo.
Ido kikajak ŋesi ekabaka loka Ai okitoi kiton eboŋ; keloma akoloŋ kicorak Yosua, kosodete kolemut akuanake kokitoi, kocakakis orute loka ere, kotukokis nen atukit naepol naka amor, kiton lolo.

Kwape kicorakinitor Musa ekejaanakinan loka EJAKAIT idwe luka Isirael, kwape iwadikatere oitabo loka Musa loka ikisila, etem loka amor numam ikee, numam ikeit etuŋanan kadiosuat: koinakis kanen ainakineta nuicweio mama ejai EJAKAIT, koinakis da asuban nuka ainapakin.
Kiwadikak amor aikopunet naka ikisila luka Musa, naabu kiwadik, kakonyen nuka idwe luka Isirael.

Kobwo Isirael kere, ka imakiokec, ka ijakakec, ka ikatubokokec, kowai lo loka asaduku, kowai je da, kakonyen nuka isasedotin Ilebin, luadakito asaduku naka aitutuket naka EJAKAIT, imoit ka iuriat da; atutubetekec kiŋaren kemoru Gerisim, atutubetekec da kiŋaren kemoru Ebal; kwape ecorakinitor Musa ekejaanakinan loka EJAKAIT, ebe isiaunete ber ailipakin idwe luka Isirael arereŋ.
Akaulo kaŋun abu kosiom akiro kere nuka ikisila, arereŋ ka aiken, kwape ejaatar kere nuiwadikatai oitabo loka ikisila.
Amamei adiokirot kotoma akiro kere nuecorakinit Musa, namam Yosua abu kosiom kakonyen nuka ekodet kere loka Isirael, ka aŋor, ka ludidik, ka imo luajaas nepepe kakes.
Kotukonokinos aitiji Yosua ka Isirael ketau ediopet.
Kiswamata kesi da kapirianut, koloto kijoseikis bala araas ikiyakia, koyaŋaasi ipukoi lumojoŋ kasigirianakec, ka imukulen luka ebino, lumojoŋ ka luecilicila luedonyodonyo;
Ka amuk numojon nuepedepedo kakejekec, konapitos inapen lumojoŋ; inyamat kere da luajaatar aokito kirourounito.
Koloto neajai Yosua Giligal oidukurun, kotemasi ŋes ka ituŋa luka Isirael atiar, “Kiponi isio kakwap naelwana: aso kitutukoto do yesi kasio.”
Kotemasi ituŋa luka Isirael Ikibin atiar, “Musiki eapie bukus kasio; kikwaikini isio ai kitutuki kayes?”
Kotemasi Yosua atiar, “Kirai isio ikonikejaanakinak.” Kotema Yosua kes atiar, “Lukaŋai yesi? Ido lali bo kiponiata?”
Kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Apote ikonikejaanakinak kakwap naelwana noi kanuka ekiror loka EJAKAIT Ekonideke: naarai kipupu eemutuke, kaŋun kere nuabu ŋesi kiswama koMisiri.
Kere da nuabu ŋesi kiswamak ikabakan iarei luka Imorain, luajaas okekwa loka Yorodan, Sikon ekabaka loka Kesibon, ka Og ekabaka loka Basan loajai Asitarot.
Apotu imakiokosi kere ka luiboiete kere kakwapukosi kotemasi sio atiar, ‘Koyaŋaasi inyamat luka erot, koloto airiamun kakes, kolimokis kes ebe, “Kirai isio ikonikejaanakinak: aso kitutukoto kasio.” ’
Kiyaŋauni isio inyamatakosi lu komwaka kotogoikosi kapaaran nakilomunia aponare mamakus; konye kwana, koany, aokoto, erourooto da:
Ka imukulen lu luka ebino luapotu kelelebata, etetiak; ido koany, ecilicila: amojoŋata ikosinapen lu ka akosimuk kanuka alosit naelwana noi.”
Kijaut ituŋa inyamatakec, komam iŋitunito akirot kama ejai EJAKAIT.
Kisumun Yosua kes ainapakin, kitutuk kakes, aitajar kes: kiyapoikis ikapolok luka ekodet kes.
Kosodi kanen ketuboros apaarasia auni kedaut kesi aitutuk kakes, apotu kesi kopuput ebe eraas ŋul iidunyetakec, ebe da eapie bukec kakes.
Kolototo idwe luka Isirael, kodoloto oreriakec apaaran nakiwuniet. Ireriakec kes lu, Gibeon, ka Cepira, ka Beerot, ka Kiriat-yearim.
Mam apotu idwe luka Isirael kodanyata kes, naarai apotu ikapolok luka ekodet kiyapoikis kes kolimito EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael. Kirurumak ekodet kere ikapolok.
Konye kotemasi ikapolok kere ekodet kere ebe, “Kipou keyapoikis kes kalimito EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael: kanuka ŋun mam kipedori atiror kes.
Kiswamakini kes nu, ketajarata kes; kinyek anyunyura abunokin oni, kanuka aiyaposit nakipou keyapoikis kes.”
Kotemasi ikapolok kes atiar, “Ketajarata kes:” kwaŋin koraunos ikebetak akito ka ikeritok akipi nuka ekodet kere; kwape alimokinitotor ikapolok kes.
Konyarau Yosua kes kotema kes atiar, “Kanukinyo kimodiata sio ebe, ‘Kilwaka noi kamakus;’ kwabo kiapiete kasio?
Aso kanuka ŋin kikeni yes, mam iswakete araun ibulesin, ikebetak akito ka ikeritok akipi nuka etogo loka Ekadeke.”

Koboŋokis Yosua ebe, “Naarai aponi kolimokinai cut ikonikejaanakinak kwape ecorakinitor EJAKAIT Ekonideke ekekejaanakinan Musa ainakin yes akwap kere, ka amudiar kere luiboiete kakwap kakonyenekus; kanuka ŋun kipou kakuriakata noi kanuka aijarakosi kanukus, ŋes kiswamaa akirot ŋin.
Aso koany, kijaa akanikon: kiswamakinai sio nuitojokit ijo nuedolit jo aiswamakin sio.”
Kiswamak ŋesi kes kwaŋin, kolaku kes kakan naka idwe luka Isirael, mam apotu koara kes.
Kitarau Yosua kes kapaaran kaŋin ikebetak akito ka ikeritok akipi nuka ekodet, ka nuka etem loka EJAKAIT, kiton lolo, kaibois naeseuni ŋesi.
Apotu kokuriakata noi, naarai kerai Gibeon ere loapol, kwape ediopet koreria luajaas ikabakan, ido naarai apol adepar Ai, ituŋake da kere araas lukirigin.
Kanuka ŋun kijuka Adoni-sedek ekabaka loka Yerusalem, mama ejai Kokam ekabaka loka Keburon, ka Piram ekabaka loka Yaramut, ka Yapia ekabaka loka Lakis, ka Debir ekabaka loka Egilon, kobala ebe,
“Kopotu neajai, keŋarakis, kadanyata Gibeon: naarai apucoto ka Yosua ka idwe luka Isirael.”

Kanuka ŋun kotukokinos ikabakan ikany luka Imorain, ekabaka loka Yerusalem, ka ekabaka loka Keburon, ka ekabaka loka Yaramut, ka ekabaka loka Lakis, ka ekabaka loka Egilon, koloto kesi ka ajoresiokec kere, kidukuroto asurokin Gibeon, kitijioto ŋes.
Konyou Yosua koGiligal, ŋes ka iketuŋa lukajiok, ka ituŋa kere lukirigin luetitiŋ.
Kotema EJAKAIT Yosua atiar, “Sirikikurianar kes: naarai ejaik kes akanikon; mam ediotuŋanan kakesi kibwoikini jo.”
Kitiut kesi edolokini kes Yosua; naarai alosi anyoun koGiligal akuare kiya.
Kisiara EJAKAIT kes kakonyen nuka Isirael, kodany kes kaario naepol koGibeon, korukio kes korot loedokarere Betkoron, kodany kes kiton Aseka, kiton Makeda da.

Kosodi kanen ekerete kesi kakonyen nuka Isirael ijesaros kesi koBet-koron, kitetep EJAKAIT amor nuepolok nuapote kokuju mamakec kiton Aseka, kotwakata; epu luaari akak adepar kwi luaarete idwe luka Isirael kekileŋ.
“Akoloŋ, kobwou ijo koGibeon;
Ijo da, Elap, kaditot naka Aiyalon.”
Aitodol naenyaŋia ateker kama ejaas lukasurupokec.
Mere iwadikatai ŋin oitabo loka Yasar? Kosalak akoloŋ kidiŋ akuj, komam iwonyari alomar bala apaaran kere.
Ido amamei apaaran naaputos kaŋin apeŋo karaida ameun kaŋin, naapupunio EJAKAIT eporoto loka etuŋanan: naarai EJAKAIT ajiikinit Isirael.
Koboŋo Yosua, ka Isirael kere kaŋes, Giligal oidukurun.
Kokerata ikabakan ŋul ikany, koŋopata kotoma abua koMakeda.
Kolimokinai Yosua ebe, “Adumun ikabakan lukany, eŋopito kabua koMakeda.”
Kotema Yosua atiar, “Kikokorikisi amor nuepolok aituk naka abua, kibwaikis ituŋa aidar kes:
Konye yes sirikipaikis; kodapata lukasurupokus, kodanyata lukec lukokau; sirikicamakis kes alomar oreriakec: naarai ejaiki EJAKAIT Ekusideke kes akanikus.”
Kosodi kanen, kedau Yosua ka idwe luka Isirael aiar kes kajar naepol, aitodol neamudiarere, nealomariata da luedeuna kakesi oreria luabwaitai.
Koboŋosi ituŋa kere Makeda oidukurun neajai Yosua kainapakina: mam idio yenabu kipen akeŋajep amoromoroo idwe luka Isirael.
Kosodi Yosua atemar ebe, “Kopukosi aituk naka abua, kitolomut ikabakan ŋul ikany koyaut mama ajai.”
Kiswamata kesi kwaŋin, kitolomut ikabakan ŋul ikany kabua mama ejai ŋesi, ekabaka loka Yerusalem, ka ekabaka loka Keburon, ka ekabaka loka Yaramut, ka ekabaka loka Lakis, ka ekabaka loka Egilon.

Kosodi kanen, kitolomut kesi ikabakan ŋul neajai Yosua, konyarau Yosua ituŋa kere luka Isirael, kotema ijaka luka ituŋa lukajiok lualosito kaŋes atiar, “Kikunyutu, kidokokis akusikeje omurisiŋa luka ikabakan kalu.” Kikunyut, kidokokis akecekeje omurisiŋakec.
Kotema Yosua kes atiar, “Sirikikuriakata, karaida aiyaloŋoŋ; kicata, kotitiŋioros: naarai iswamakini EJAKAIT kwaŋin lukasurupokus kere luitijiete yesi.”
Akaulo kaŋun kodany Yosua kes, koara kes, komiedanak kes okito ikany: kijekos kokito kiton eboŋ.
Kosodi kanen, kapak naalomaria akoloŋ kicorak Yosua, koŋedununai kes kokito, kocakanakinai abua naaŋopitotor, kibwaikinai amor nuepolok aituk naka abua, kiton lolo.

Kijaik EJAKAIT kes da, ka ekabakakec akan naka Isirael; kodany kes kakwanis naka ekileŋ, ka ituŋa kere luajaas toma; komam ideuni idio da kotomakeŋ, kiswamak ekabakake kwape eswamakinia ekabaka loka Yeriko.
Kijaik EJAKAIT Lakis akan naka Isirael, kirum ŋes apaaran nakiareit, kodany kes kakwanis naka ekileŋ, ka ituŋa kere luajaas tomake, kwape ajaatar kere nueswamakinit Libuna.
Konyou Yosua koLakis, ka Isirael kere nepepe kaŋes, kitor Egilon; kidukuroto asurokin kes, kitijioto kes;
Kirumata ere kapaaran kaŋin, kodanyata kes kakwanis naka ekileŋ, komudia cut kapaaran kaŋin ituŋa kere luajaas toma, kwape ajaatar kere nueswamakinit Lakis.

Kirumata ere, kodanyata kes kakwanis naka ekileŋ, ka: ekabakakec, ka ireriakec kere, ka ituŋa kere luajaas toma; komam ideuni idio, kwape ajaatar kere nueswamakinit Egilon; konye abu komudia cut ere, ka ituŋa kere luajaas toma.

Kirum ere ka ekabakake, ka ireriake kere; kodanyata kes kakwanis naka ekileŋ, komudiasi cut ituŋa kere luajaas toma; komam ideuni idio da: kwape eswamakinia Keburon, abu kiswamak kwaŋin Debir, ka ekabakake; kwape eswamakinia Libuna ka ekabakake.
Kodany Yosua kes anyoun koKades-barunea kiton Gasa, ka akwap kere naka Gosen, kiton Gibeon.
Kimoria Yosua airum ikabakan ŋul kere ka akecekwap, naarai ajiikinit EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael, Isirael.
Koboŋ Yosua, ka Isirael kere nepepe kaŋes, oidukurun Giligal.
Ka ikabakan luajaas ari naka agolitomei, akwap nakiukon, ka Araba ari naka eŋalakimak naka Kinerot, ka apuutona, ka amukuran nuka Dor kari nakoto.
Mama ejai Ekanaanit loejai ari nakokide ka nakoto, ka Emorait, ka Ekitit, ka Eperisit, ka Eyebusit kakwap nakiukon, ka Ekibit kwap ka Kerumon kakwap naka Misipa.
Kolomasi kesi ka ajoresiokec kere nepepe kakes, ituŋa luipu, aipuesukec kwape kasiŋe naejai ariri naka aŋolol, kojaas kibalasin ka agalin nuipu noi.
Kiriamunos ikabakan ŋul kere; kopotu kidukuroto nepepe ariri naka akipi nuka Merom, aitiji Isirael.
Kotema EJAKAIT Yosua atiar, “Sirikikurianar kes: naarai moi kosawa kalo ejaikini kes aario kakonyen nuka Isirael: itaŋwali ibalasinikec, icwei agalinikec.”
Kitiut kesi ebuni Yosua ka ituŋa kere lukajiok nepepe kaŋes, asurokin kes kariri naka akipi nuka Merom, kitiji Isirael kes.

Kijaik EJAKAIT kes akan naka Isirael, kodanyata kes, kodapata kes kiton Sidon lokapolon, kiton Miserepot-maim, kiton aditot naka Misipe kari nakokide; kodanyata kes, aitodol neamamuunor idio da yenedeikinitai kes.
Kiswamak Yosua kes kwape kicorakinia EJAKAIT ŋes: abu kitaŋwal ibalasinikec, kicwe da agalinikec.
Koboŋo Yosua kapak kaŋin, kirum Kasor, koar ekabakake kekileŋ: naarai Kasor lem apolokinit ajakanuto ŋun kere.
Kodanyata ituŋa kere luajaas toma kakwanis naka ekileŋ, komudiasi kes cut: amamei yeneyeŋa yenedeunitai: kicwe Kasor kakim.
Abu Yosua kirum ireria kere luka ikabakan kaŋul, ka ikabakanakec kere, kodany kes kakwanis naka ekileŋ, komudia kes cut; kwape ecorakinitor Musa ekejaanakinan loka EJAKAIT.
Konye ireria luadukokinitai otutiokec, mam Isirael abu kicwe edio kakesi, dimarai Kasor bon; ŋes abu Yosua kicwe.
Apotu idwe luka Isirael koyaŋaasi luŋatuna koreria kaŋul, ka ibaren; konye apotu kesi koarata ŋinituŋanan kakwanis naka ekileŋ, aitodol neamudiariata kes, komam ideunete yeneyeŋa kere.
Kwape ecorakinitor EJAKAIT Musa ekejaanakinanike, abu Musa da kicorak Yosua kwaŋin: kiswama Yosua kwaŋin; mam abu kinyek adiokirot kakiro kere nuecorakinit EJAKAIT Musa.
Ageun komoru Kalak, loedolit Seir, kiton Baal-gad kaditot naka Lebanon kwap kemoru Kerumon: koyaŋa ikabakanakec kere, kodany kes cut.
Kodau Yosua apak naepol itijiei ikabakan ŋul kere.
Amamei ere loabu kitutuk nukainapakin kidwe luka Isirael, dimarai Ikibin luiboiete koGibeon: koyaŋaasi kere kojie.
Naarai etogogoŋit EJAKAIT ikecetauon, aitiji Isirael, tetere emudiari kes cut, kinyeis adumun asianut, konye tetere emudiari kes, kwape ecorakinitor EJAKAIT Musa.
Amamei edio luka Anakim loedeunitai kakwap naka idwe luka Isirael; konye edeuna ice koGasa, koGat da ka Asudod.
Kwaŋin kirum Yosua akwap kere, kwape ajaatar kere nuabu EJAKAIT kolimok Musa; abu Yosua koinak Isirael akwap araun airumet kwape atiakanakinitere kes katekerinikec, Kiyeŋu akwap ejie.

Sikon ekabaka loka Imorain, loeboie koKesibon, koyaite ageun koAroer, loejai osiep loka aditot naka Arunon, ka ere loejai kidiŋ aditot, ka atutubet naka Gilead, kiton ocor Yabok, eikor loka idwe luka Amon;
Ka Araba kiton aŋolol naka Kinerot, kari nakokide, ido kiton aŋolol naka Araba, ŋes aŋolol naka Abalaŋ, kari nakokide, orot loebei Bet-yesimot; ari da naka eŋalakimak, kwap neijululuoro Pisiga:
Eikor da loka Og ekabaka loka Basan, loka luedeuna luka Irepaim, loeboie koAsitarot ka Ederei.
Loayait moru Kerumon, ka Saleca, ka Basan kere, kiton oikor loka Igesurin ka Imaakatin, ka atutubet naka Gilead, eikor loka Sikon ekabaka loka Kesibon.

Apotu Musa ekejaanakinan loka EJAKAIT ka idwe luka Isirael kodanyata kes: koinak da Musa ekejaanakinan loka EJAKAIT akwap ŋin araun airumet naka Ireubenin, ka Igadin, ka atutubet naka ateker naka Manase.
Akwap nakiukon, ka apuutona, ka Araba, ka neijululuoro, kamodiŋ, kari naka Eŋalakimak; Ekitit, ka Emorait, ka Ekanaanit, ka Eperisit, ka Ekibit, ka Eyebusit:
Ekabaka loka Yeriko, ediopet; ekabaka loka Ai, loidunyas ka Bet-el, ediopet;
Ekabaka loka Yerusalem, ediopet; ekabaka loka Keburon, ediopet;
Ekabaka loka Yaramut, ediopet; ekabaka loka Lakis, ediopet;
Ekabaka loka Egilon, ediopet; ekabaka loka Geser, ediopet;
Ekabaka loka Debir, ediopet; ekabaka loka Geder, ediopet;
Ekabaka loka Koruma, ediopet; ekabaka loka Arad, ediopet;
Ekabaka loka Libuna, ediopet; ekabaka loka Adulam, ediopet;
Ekabaka loka Makeda, ediopet; ekabaka loka Bet-el, ediopet;
Ekabaka loka Tapua, ediopet; ekabaka loka Keper, ediopet;
Ekabaka loka Apek, ediopet; ekabaka loka Lasaron, ediopet;
Ekabaka loka Madon, ediopet; ekabaka loka Kasor, ediopet;
Ekabaka loka Simuron-meron, ediopet; ekabaka loka Akisap, ediopet;
Ekabaka loka Taanak, ediopet; ekabaka loka Megido, ediopet;
Ekabaka loka Kedes, ediopet; ekabaka loka Yokuneam koKaramel, ediopet;
Ekabaka loka Dor kamukurat naka Dor, ediopet; ekabaka loka Goiim koGiligal, ediopet;
ekabaka loka Tirusa, ediopet; ikabakan kere akaisauni ka lodiopet.
Na ŋes akwap naeroko ideuna: akwap kere naka Ipilisitian ka Igesurin kere;

Ageun koSikor, loejai kiŋaren naka Misiri, kiton oikor loka Ekuron kari naka agolitomei, loemarakinitai oKanaanin: ijaka ikany luka Ipilisitian; Igasin, ka Isudodain, ka Isikelonain, ka Igitin, ka Iyekuronin; luka Abim da.
Kari naka eŋalakimak: akwap kere naka Ikanaanin, ka Meara loerai loka Isidonin, kiton Apek, kiton oikor loka Imorain:
Akwap da naka Igebalin, ka Lebanon kere, kama eŋiunia akoloŋ, ageun koBaal-gad kwap kemoru Kerumon kiton neelomarere Kamat:

Luiboiete kere kakwap nakiukon ageun koLebanon kiton Misirepot-maim, kes Isidonin kere; ereŋeari eoŋ ŋul kakonyen nuka idwe luka Isirael: konye kokorak ijo idwe luka Isirael akwap ŋin araun airumet, kwape kecorakinia jo.
Aso kokorak akwap na araun airumet naka atekerin akanykaoŋon, ka atutubet naka ateker naka Manase.”
Ageun koAroer, loejai osiep loka aditot naka Arunon, ka ere loejai kidiŋ aditot, ka apuuton kere naka Medeba kiton Dibon;
ka ireria kere luka Sikon ekabaka loka Imorain, loayait Kesibon, kiton oikor loka idwe luka Amon;
ka Gilead, ka eikor loka Igesurin ka Imaakatin, ka moru Kerumon kere, ka Basan kere kiton Saleca;
Ajakanut kere naka Og koBasan, loayait Asitarot ka Ederei (ŋopeŋol loedeuna loka luedeuna luka Irepaim); naarai abu Musa kodany ŋul, kireŋea da.
Konye mam idwe luka Isirael apotu kireŋeasi Igesurin, karaida Imaakatin: konye apotu Gesur ka Maakat kiboikinos kidiŋ kIsirael, kiton lolo.
Ateker naka Lebi bon ŋes mam ŋes abu koinak airumet; ainakineta nueinakinere kakim nuka EJAKAIT Edeke loka Isirael, kes airumeteke, kwape abu kolimokinia Ŋes.
Koinak Musa ateker naka idwe luka Reuben kwape ejaatar ikekiakec.
Ageunit eikorukec koAroer, loejai osiep loka aditot naka Arunon, ka ere loejai kidiŋ aditot, ka apuuton kere naka Medeba;
Kesibon, ka ireriake kere luejaas apuuton; Dibon, ka Bamot-baal, ka Bet-baal-meon;
Ka Yakas, ka Kedemot, ka Mepaat;
ka Kiriataim ka Sibima, ka Seret-sakar komoru loka aditot;
ka Bet-peor, ka neijululuoro Pisiga, ka Bet-yesimot;

ka ireria kere luka apuuton, ka ajakanut kere naka Sikon, ekabaka loka Imorain, loayait Kesibon, loabu Musa kodany nepepe kijaka luka Midian, Ebi, ka Rekem, ka Sur, ka Kur, ka Reba, ikapolok luka Sikon, lueboiete kakwap.
Apotu idwe luka Isirael koarata Balaam da okoku loka Beor, ekadwaran, kotoma kaŋul luaponi koarai.
Arai Yorodan eikor loka idwe luka Reuben, ka eikoruke. Ŋin ŋes airumet naka idwe luka Reuben kwape ejaatar ikekiakec, ireriakec lukapolok ka ludidik da.
Koinak Musa ateker naka Gad, kes idwe luka Gad, kwape ejaatar ikekiakec.
Arai Yaser eikorukec, ka ireria kere luka Gilead, ka atutubet naka akwap naka idwe luka Amon, kiton Aroer loitei Raba;
Ageun koKesibon kiton Ramat-misipe, ka Betonim; ageun da koMakanaim kiton oikor loka Debir;

Kaditot da, Bet-karam, ka Bet-nimura, ka Sukot, ka Sapon, ka ajakanut kere naedeuna naka Sikon ekabaka loka Kesibon, Yorodan ka eikoruke, kiton osaŋe loka aŋolol naka Kinerot, okekwa loka Yorodan kokide.
Ŋin ŋes airumet naka idwe luka Gad kwape ejaatar ikekiakec, ireriakec lukapolok ka ludidik.
Koinak Musa atutubet naka ateker naka Manase airumet: arai naka atutubet naka ateker naka Manase kwape ejaatar ikekiakec.
Ageunit eikorukec koMakanaim, Basan kere, ajakanut kere naka Og ekabaka loka Basan, ka ireria kere luka Yair, luejaas Basan, ireria akaisakanykape:
ka atutubet naka Gilead, ka Asitarot, ka Ederei, ireria luka ajakanut naka Og koBasan, araas luka idwe luka Makir okoku loka Manese, kes atutubet naka idwe luka Makir kwape ejaatar ikekiakec.
Ŋun kes airumeta nuakorokoroi Musa kapuutona nuka Moab kokekwa loka Yorodan koYeriko, kokide.
Konye mam Musa abu koinak ateker naka Lebi airumet: EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael, ŋes airumetekec, kwape abu kolimokinia kes.
Kwape ajaar ailamilam eroet kanuka airumetakec, kwape ecorakinitor EJAKAIT kama ka Musa, kanuka atekerin akanykaoŋon, ka atutubet naka ateker.
Naarai abu Musa koinak atekerin aarei ka atutubet naka ateker airumet kokekwa loka Yorodan: konye mam abu koinak Ilebin airumet kotomakec.
