Naarai araas idwe luka Yosep atekerin aarei, Manase ka Epuraim: mam apotu koinakis Ilebin akorakinet kakwap dimarai ireria luiboioto, ka ironyiakec kanuka ibarenekec ka iborokec.
Kwape ecorakinitor EJAKAIT Musa, kiswamata idwe luka Isirael kwaŋin, kokorokorata akwap.
Kolo arai eoŋ loka ikar akaisaoŋon nakejukaria Musa ekejaanakinan loka EJAKAIT eoŋ anyoun koKades-barunea airot akwap; kasodi ainun ŋes akirot kwape ajaar otauka.
Konye apotu ikainacan lukiupara keoŋ kipirisiasi itauon luka ituŋa; konye abu eoŋ katup cut EJAKAIT Ekadeke.
Kiyapoik Musa kapaaran kaŋin ebe, ‘Abeit akwap naecak akonikeju eraun airumetekon ka naka idwekon ikar kere, naarai itup cut EJAKAIT Ekadeke.’

Ido koany, ketubut EJAKAIT eoŋ, kwape abu kolimunio, ikar lu akaisaoŋon ka lukany, ameun kapak naalimokinia EJAKAIT Musa akirot ŋin, kirim Isirael kamodiŋ: aso koany, arai lolo eoŋ loka ikar akaisakanykauni ka lukany.
Konye aroko lolo agogoŋ kwape ajaar akagogoŋ kapak kaya, ejai akagogoŋ kwape kwaŋin kwana, kanuka ejie, alomar ka alomun da.

Aso do koinakinai eoŋ eroŋat lo, loenerar EJAKAIT kapaaran kaya; naarai ibu kopup kapaaran kaya ebe ajaas luka Anakim ŋina, ka ireria lukapolok luabwaitai; arai ejaun EJAKAIT keoŋ, ereŋeari kes, kwape abu EJAKAIT kolimunio.”
Koraun do Keburon airumet naka Kaleb okoku loka Yepune Ekenisit, kiton lolo; naarai abu kotup cut EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael.
Arai sek ekiror loka Keburon Kiriat-araba; Araba ŋol arai lokapolon kama ejaas luka Anakim. Kiyeŋu akwap ejie.
Ageunit eikorukec loka ari naka eŋalakimak katutubet nakosaŋe loka Aŋolol naka Abalaŋ, ageun kagor naitei eŋalakimak:
Kitor ari naka eŋalakimak naedokarere Akurabim, kobei Sin, kitor ari naka eŋalakimak naka Kades-barunea, kiriria Kesiron, kitor Adar, kokudo koKaraka:
Kobe Asimon, kitor aguurut nako Misiri; kosaŋ eikor aŋolol: eraun ŋol eikorukus loka ari naka eŋalakimak.
Aŋolol naka Abalaŋ ŋes arai eikor lokokide, kiton osaŋe loka Yorodan. Ageunit eikor loka ari naka agolitomei kariri naka aŋolol kosaŋe loka Yorodan;
Kitor eikor Bet-kogila, kiriria agolitomei naka Bet-araba; kitor eikor amoru naka Bokan okoku loka Reuben:
Kitor eikor Debir ageun kaditot naka Akor, ape agolitomei, kitei Giligal, loitei needokarere Adumim, loejai ari naka eŋalakimak naka ecor: kobe eikor akipi nuka En-semes, kosaŋak En-rogel;

Kitor eikor aditot naka okoku loka Kinom kiton ari naka eŋalakimak naka Eyebusit (ŋopeŋol ŋes Yerusalem): kitor eikor kuju keroŋat loejai kiŋaren kaditot naka Kinom kari nakoto, loejai atutubet nakosaŋe naka aditot naka Repaim kari naka agolitomei:
Kigirunai eikor ageun kokuju keroŋat kiton atan naka akipi nuka Neputoa, kobe oreria luka emoru Epuron; kigirunai eikor kiton Baala (ŋopeŋol ŋes Kiriat-yearim):
Kokudo eikor koBaala ari nakoto kiton emoru Seir, kobe ari naka agolitomei naka emoru Yearim (ŋopeŋol ŋes Kesalon), kitor Bet-semes, kiriria Timuna:
Kobe eikor ari naka agolitomei kowai loka Ekuron: kigirunai eikor kiton Sikeron, kobe emoru Baala, kosaŋ Yabuneel; kosaŋ eikor aŋolol.
Aŋolol nakapolon ŋes arai eikor loka ari nakoto, ka eikoruke. Ŋol ŋes eikor loalukunit idwe luka Yuda kwape ajaatar ikekiakec.
Kireŋea Kaleb odwe iuni luka Anak, Sesai, ka Akiman, ka Talimai, idwe luka Anak.
Koloma asurokin lueboiete koDebir: arai sek ekiror loka Debir Kiriat-seper.
Kotema Kaleb atiar, “Ŋol loedanyi luka Kiriat-seper, kosodi airum ere, akorakini eoŋ ŋol akokuka Akisa aimany.”
Kosodi Otiniel, okoku loka Kenas onace loka Kaleb, kirum ŋes; abu kokorak ŋes akokuke Akisa aimany.
Kosodi kanen, kebu mamake abu ŋin kokoto ŋol ailipun papake emanikor: kodok kasigiriake; kotema Kaleb ŋes atiar, “Inyo bo ikoto ijo?”
Kotema atiar, “Koinakinai eoŋ arereŋ; naarai kiinakinit eoŋ akwap naka ari naka Eŋalakimak, koinakinai eoŋ da atanin nuka akipi.” Abu koinak ŋes atanin nukokuju ka nukajesa da.
Ireria lukosaŋe luka ateker naka idwe luka Yuda kariri naka eikor loka Edom kari naka Eŋalakimak kes lu: Kabuseel, ka Eder ka Yagur;
ka Kina, ka Dimona, ka Adada;
ka Kedes, ka Kasor, ka Itinan;
Sip, ka Telem, ka Bealot;
ka Kasor-kadata, ka Keriot-kesiron (ŋopeŋol ŋes Kasor);
Amam, ka Sema, ka Molada;
ka Kasar-gada, ka Kesimon, ka Bet-pelet;
ka Kasar-sual, ka Beer-seba, ka Bisiotia;
ka Baala, ka Iim, ka Esem;
ka Elitolad, ka Kesil, ka Korima;
ka Sikilag, ka Madumena, ka Sanisana;
ka Lebaot, ka Silikim, ka Ain, ka Rimon: ireria kere imwaasi akaisaarei ka lukanykaoŋon ka ireriakec ludidik.
ka Sanoa, ka En-ganim, ka Tapua, ka Enam;
ka Yaramut, ka Adulam, ka Soko, ka Aseka;
ka Saaraim, ka Aditaim, ka Gedera, ka Gederotaim; ireria itomon ka luoŋon ka ireriakec ludidik.
Senan, ka Kadasa, ka Migidal-gad;
ka Dilan, ka Misipe, ka Yokiteel;
Lakis, ka Bosikat, ka Egilon;
ka Kabon, ka Lakimam, ka Kitilis;
ka Gederot, ka Bet-dagon, ka Naama, ka Makeda; ireria itomon ka lukanykape ka ireriakec ludidik.
Libuna, ka Eter, ka Asan;
ka Iputa, ka Asina, ka Nesib;
ka Keila, ka Akisib, ka Maresa; ireria ikanykaoŋon ka ireriakec ludidik.
Ekuron, ka ireriake ka ireriake ludidik.
Ageun ka Ekuron kiton aŋolol, kere luedunyas ka Asudod, ka ireriakec ludidik.
Kakwap nakiukon, Samir, ka Yatir, ka Soko;
ka Dana, ka Kiriat-sana (ŋopeŋol ŋes Dabir);
ka Anab, ka Esitemo, ka Anim;
ka Gosen, ka Kolon, ka Gilo, ireria itomon ka lodiopet ka ireriakec ludidik.
Arab ka Duma, ka Esan;
ka Yanim ka Bet-tapua ka Apeka;
ka Kumita, ka Kiriat-araba, (ŋopeŋol ŋes Keburon), ka Sior; ireria ikanykaoŋon ka ireriakec ludidik.
Maon, ka Karamel, ka Sip, ka Yuta;
ka Yesereel, ka Yokodeam, ka Sanoa;
Kain, ka Gibea, ka Timuna; ireria itomon ka ireriakec ludidik.
Kalukul, ka Bet-sur, ka Gedor;
ka Maarat, ka Bet-anot, ka Elitekon; ireria ikanykape ka ireriakec ludidik.
Kotoma amodiŋ, Bet-araba, Midin, ka Sekaka;
ka Nibisan, ka Ere loka Abalaŋ, ka En-gedi; ireria ikanykape ka ireriakec ludidik.
Kitor Bet-el kiton Lus, kobe oikor loka Irikain kiton Atarot;
Kijesar ari nakoto oikor loka Iyapeletin, kiton oikor loka Bet-koron loijesara, kiton Geser; kosaŋ aŋolol.
Eikor loka idwe luka Epuraim kwape ejaatar ikekiakec ŋes lo: eikor loka airumetekec kari nakokide korai Atarot-adar, kiton Bet-koron luimukurur;
Kobe eikor ari nakoto koMikimetat kari naka agolitomei; kokudo eikor ari nakokide kiton Taanat-silo, kiriria ŋes kari nakokide naka Yanoa;
Kijesar anyoun koYanoa kiton Atarot, kiton Naara da, kodol Yeriko, kosaŋ Yorodan.
Ageun koTapua kitor eikor ari nakoto kiton ocilet loka Kana; kosaŋ aŋolol. Ŋin ŋes airumet naka ateker naka idwe luka Epuraim, kwape ejaatar ikekiakec.
Nepepe kireria luatiakunitai kanuka idwe luka Epuraim kokidiŋ kairumet naka idwe luka Manase, ireria lukapolok kere ka ireriakec ludidik.
Mam kes apotu kireŋeasi Ikanaanin lueboiete koGeser; konye kiboienenete Ikanaanin kama ejai Epuraim kiton lolo, koraut ibulesin lukeswamak nukailolitoi.

Abeit eroet idwe kere luka Manase luedeuna kwape ajaatar ikekiakec; idwe luka Abieser, ka idwe luka Kelek, ka idwe luka Asuriel, ka idwe luka Sekem, ka idwe luka Keper, ka idwe luka Semida: ŋul kes idwe lukiliok luka Manase okoku loka Yosep kwape ajaatar ikekiakec.

Apotu kesi kikunyut akonyen nuka Eleasar esasedoti, akonyen nuka Yosua okoku loka Nun, akonyen da nuka ikapolok, kotemasi atiar, “Abu EJAKAIT kicorak Musa akorakin sio airumet kama ejaas iinacanakosi:” kanuka ŋun abu kokorak kes airumet kama ejaas iinacan luka papakec kwape ajaar aicorakinet naka EJAKAIT.
Kobeata Manase atutubeta atomon, kogelara akwap naka Gilead ka Basan, naejai okekwa loka Yorodan;
Naarai adumunito adwe nuka Manase airumet kama ejaas odweke: akwap da naka Gilead arai naka odwe luka Manase kere luedeuna.
Ageunit eikor loka Manase koAser kiton Mikimetat, loitei Sekem; kitor eikor akan nakoteten, kiton neajaas lueboiete koEn-tapua.
Korai akwap naka Tapua naka Manase: konye Tapua loejai oikor loka Manase korai loka idwe luka Epuraim.
Kijesar eikor kiton aguurut naka Kana, ari naka eŋalakimak naka aguurut: araas ireria lu luka Epuraim koreria luka Manase: ajai eikor loka Manase ari naka agolitomei naka aguurut, kosaŋ aŋolol:
Kari naka eŋalakimak korau naka Epuraim, kari da naka agolitomei korai naka Manase, aŋolol ŋes arai eikorukec; kodolokis Aser kari naka agolitomei, ka Isakar kari nakokide.

Adumunit Manase kotoma Isakar ka Aser Bet-sean ka ireriake, Ibileam ka ireriake, ka lueboiete koDor ka ireriake, ka lueboiete koEn-dor ka ireriake, ka lueboiete koTaanak ka ireriake, ka lueboiete koMegido ka ireriake, kes amukuran auni.
Konye mam idwe luka Manase apotu kopedosi aireŋear lueboiete koreria kaŋul; konye kiketakinos Ikanaanin aiboi kakwap kaŋin.
Kosodi kanen, kegogoŋioto idwe luka Isirael, apotu kitaraut Ikanaanin ikeswamak lukailolitoi, komam ireŋearere kes cut.
Kotema Yosua kes atiar, “Arai iraasi yesi ituŋa luipu, koloto yesi amagoro, kojeput yesi kanen akwap naka Iperisin, ka Irepaim; naarai kididiŋikinit yes akwap nakiukon naka Epuraim.”

Kotemasi idwe luka Yosep atiar, “Kikadit isio akwap nakiukon: Ikanaanin da kere luiboiete kakwap naka aditot ejaas agalin nuka asua, ŋul luejaas Bet-sean ka ireriake, ka ŋul da luejaas aditot naka Yesereel.”
Kotema Yosua ekal loka Yosep, ŋes Epuraim ka Manase atiar, “Iraasi yesi ituŋa luipu, epol da agogoŋ: mam kitebeo edioperoet bon:

Konye do eraun akwap nakiukon nakus; karaida kerai amagoro, ijepunete yesi ŋes, eraunos da awaitinike nukus: naarai ireŋearete yesi Ikanaanin, karaida kejaas kes agalin nuka asua, karaida kegogoŋ kesi.”
Asalito atekerin akanykaarei kodwe luka Isirael numam ber akorokoroto airumetekec.
Kotema Yosua idwe luka Isirael atiar, “Itodolete yesi ai ikalanyaka alomar airum akwap nakiinak yes EJAKAIT Edeke loka lukapapaakus?
Koseutu yesi ituŋa iuni kaŋiniteker: kejuka kes, enyounete, itorete akwap kere, iwadikaete kesi kwape eputor kwape ejaar airumetekec; eboŋunete neajai.
Ekorokoroete akwap atutubeta akanykaarei; iboikini Yuda oikoruke kari naka eŋalakimak, ekal da loka Yosep iboikini oikorukec kari naka agolitomei.
Iwadikaete kwape eputor akwap kotoma atutubeta akanykaarei, koyaut nuiwadikaete mama ajai eoŋ: kelamilamakini eoŋ yes eroet kane kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT Ewokodeke.

Naarai amamei Ilebin akorakinet kamakus; naarai esasedotene loka EJAKAIT ŋes airumetekec: adumut Gad ka Reuben ka atutubet naka ateker naka Manase airumetekec kokekwa loka Yorodan kari nakokide, naainakini kes Musa ekejaanakinan loka EJAKAIT.”

Konyout ituŋa koloto: kicorak Yosua ŋul lualosete aiwadik akwap ebe, “Koloto kitoro akwap kere, kiwadikata kwape eputor, koboŋut neajai, kelamilamakini eoŋ yes eroet kane koSilo kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT.”
Koloto ituŋa, kitoro akwap kere, kiwadikata oitabo kwape eputor koreria, kotoma akorakineta akanykaarei, kopotu neejai Yosua oidukurun Silo.
Kilamilamak Yosua kes eroet koSilo kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT: kokorokor Yosua akwap kanen mama ejaas idwe luka Isirael kwape atiakanakinitere kes.
Kobe eroet ateker naka idwe luka Benyamin kwape ajaatar ikekiakec: kojai eikor loka eroetekec kidiŋ idwe luka Yuda ka idwe luka Yosep.
Kari naka agolitomei ageunit eikorukec koYorodan; kobe eikor osiep loka Yeriko kari naka agolitomei, kitor akwap nakiukon kari nakoto; kosaŋ amodiŋ naka Bet-aben.
Kitor eikor nen kiton Lus, airirikina Lus (ŋopeŋol ŋes Bet-el), kari naka eŋalakimak; kijesar eikor kiton Atarot-adar, ariri naka eroŋat loejai ari naka eŋalakimak naka Bet-koron loijesara.

Kigirunai eikor kokudo kari nakoto ari naka eŋalakimak ageun koroŋat loejai kiŋaren ka Bet-koron kari naka eŋalakimak; kosaŋ Kiriat-baal (ŋopeŋol ŋes Kiriat-yearim), ere loka idwe luka Yuda: ŋol ŋes ewai lokoto.
Ewai da loka ari naka eŋalakimak ageunit katutubet naesaŋit Kiriat-yearim, kitor eikor ari nakoto, kiton atan naka akipi nuka Neputoa:

Kijesar eikor atutubet naesaŋit eroŋat loejai kiŋaren kaditot naka okoku loka Kinom, loejai aditot naka Repaim kari naka agolitomei; kijesar kiton aditot naka Kinom, kiton osiep loka ari naka eŋalakimak loka Eyebusit, kobe En-rogel;
Kigirunai kari naka agolitomei, kitor En-semes, kobe Gelilot, loitei needokarere Adumim; kijesar kiton amoru naka Bokan okoku loka Reuben;
Kiriria osiep loka Araba kari naka agolitomei kijesar kiton Araba:
Kiriria eikor osiep loka Bet-kogila kari naka agolitomei agor naka Aŋolol naka Abalaŋ, osaŋe loka Yorodan kari naka eŋalakimak: ŋol ŋes eikor loka ari naka eŋalakimak.
Korai Yorodan eikoruke kowai lokokide. Ŋin ŋes airumet naka idwe luka Benyamin, kwape ejaatar iikorunokec luelukunito, kwape ejaatar ikekiakec.
ka Bet-araba, ka Semaraim, ka Bet-el;
ka Abim, ka Para, ka Opura;
ka Keparamoni, ka Opuni ka Geba; ireria itomon ka luarei ka ireriakec ludidik:
Gibeon, ka Rama, ka Beerot;
ka Misipe, ka Kepira, ka Mosa;
ka Rekem, ka Iripeel, ka Tarala;
ka Sela, ka Elep, ka Eyebusit (ŋopeŋol ŋes Yerusalem), ka Gibeat, ka Kiriat; ireria itomon ka luoŋon ka ireriakec ludidik, ŋin ŋes airumet naka idwe luka Benyamin kwape ejaatar ikekiakec.
Apotu kesi kirumata Beer-seba, arai Seba, ka Molada;
ka Kasar-sual, ka Bala, ka Esem;
ka Elitolad, ka Betul, ka Koruma;
ka Sikilag, ka Ber-marakabot, ka Kasar-susa;
ka Bet-lebaot, ka Saruken; ireria itomon ka luuni ka ireriakec ludidik;
Ain, ka Rimon, ka Eter, ka Asan; ireria iwoŋon ka ireriakec ludidik:
ka ireria ludidik kere lualukunito ireria ŋul kiton Baalat-beer, Rama loka ari naka Eŋalakimak. Ŋin ŋes airumet naka ateker naka idwe luka Simeon kwape ajaatar ikekiakec.
Ajai airumet naka idwe luka Simeon toma owai loka idwe luka Yuda: naarai alalakinit noi idwe luka Yuda akorakinetekec: kanuka ŋun ŋes akorakinere idwe luka Simeon airumet kokidiŋ airumetekec.
Kobeik eroet lokiwuniet idwe luka Sebulun kwape ajaatar ikekiakec: ajai eikor loka airumetekec kiton Sarid:
Kitor eikorukec ari nakoto, kiton Marala, kodol Dabeset; kodol da aguurut naejai kiŋaren ka Yokoneam;
Kokudo koSarid ari nakokide mama eŋiunia akoloŋ kiton oikor loka Kisilot-tabor; kobe Daberat, kitor Yapia;
Kobe kanen kiton Gat-keper, kiton Et-kasin; kitor Rimon loedolit Nea;
Kokudo eikor airimor ŋes kari naka eŋalakimak kiton Kanaton: kosaŋ aditot naka Ipita-el;
ka Katat, ka Nakalal, ka Simuron, ka Idala, ka Bet-lekem: ireria itomon ka luarei ka ireriakec ludidik.
Ŋin ŋes airumet naka idwe luka Sebulun kwape ajaatar ikekiakec, ireria ŋul lukapolok ka ireriakec ludidik.
Kobeik eroet lokiwoŋonet Isakar, kes idwe luka Isakar kwape ajaatar ikekiakec.
Ajai eikorukec kiton Yesereel, ka Kesulot, ka Sunem;
ka Kaparaim, ka Sion, ka Anakarat;
ka Rabit, ka Kision, ka Ebes;
ka Remet, ka En-ganim, ka En-kada, ka Bet-pases;
Kodol eikor Tabor, ka Sakasuma, ka Bet-semes; kosaŋ eikorukec Yorodan: ireria itomon ka lukanykape ka ireriakec ludidik.
Ŋin ŋes airumet naka ateker naka idwe luka Isakar kwape ajaatar ikekiakec, ireria lukapolok ka ireriakec ludidik.
Kobeik eroet lokikanyet ateker naka idwe luka Aser, kwape ajaatar ikekiakec.
Eikorukec ŋes Kelakat, ka Kali, ka Beten, ka Akisap;
ka Alamelek, ka Amad, ka Misal; kodol Karamel kari nakoto, kiton Sikor-libunat da;
Kokudo neeŋiunia akoloŋ kiton Bet-dagon, kodol Sebulun, ka aditot naka Ipita-el kari naka agolitomei kiton Bet-emek, ka Neiel; kitor Kabul kakan nakokediany,
ka Eburon, ka Rekob, ka Kamon, ka Kana, kiton Sidon lokapolon;
Kokudo eikor kiton Rama, ka ere loebwaitai loka Turo; kokudo eikor kiton Kosa; kosaŋ aŋolol kakwap naka Akisib:
Uma da, ka Apek, ka Rekob: ireria akaisaarei ka luarei ka ireriakec ludidik.
Ŋin ŋes airumet naka ateker naka idwe luka Aser kwape ajaatar ikekiakec, ireria ŋul lukapolok ka ireriakec ludidik.
Kobeik eroet lokikanyetekape idwe luka Naputali, kes idwe luka Naputali kwape ajaatar ikekiakec.
Ageunit eikorukec koKelep, ageun kolua loajai Saananim, ka Adami-nekeb, ka Yabuneel, kiton Lakum: kosaŋ Yorodan:
Kokudo eikor ari nakoto kiton Asinot-tabor, kobe kanen kiton Kukok; kodolok Sebulun kari naka eŋalakimak, kodolok Aser kari nakoto, ka Yuda da koYorodan kaneeŋiunia akoloŋ.
Ireria luabwaitai kes Sidim, ka Ser, ka Kamat, ka Rakat ka Kineret;
ka Adama, ka Rama, ka Kasor;
ka Kedes, ka Ederei, ka En-kasor;
ka Iron, ka Migidal-el, ka Korem, ka Bet-anat, ka Bet-semes; ireria itomon ka lukanykaoŋon ka ireriakec ludidik.
Ŋin ŋes airumet naka ateker naka idwe luka Naputali kwape ajaatar ikekiakec, ireria lukapolok ka ireriakec ludidik.
Kobeik eroet lokikanyetekaarei ateker naka idwe luka Dan kwape ajaatar ikekiakec.
Eikor loka airumetekec ŋes Sora, ka Esitaol, ka Ir-semes;
ka Saalabin, ka Aiyalon, ka Itila;
ka Elon, ka Timuna, ka Ekuron;
ka Eliteke, ka Gibeton, ka Baalat;
ka Yekud, ka Bene-berak, ka Gat-rimon;
ka Me-yarikon, ka Rakon, kiteos eikor kaYopa.

Kisukunyikis idwe luka Dan eikorukec: naarai apotu idwe luka Dan kolomasi aitiji Lesem, koyaŋaasi ŋes, kodanyata lukeŋ kakwanis naka ekileŋ, kirumata, kiboikinos toma, komaikis Lesem Dan, ekiror loka papakec.
Ŋin ŋes airumet naka ateker naka idwe luka Dan kwape ajaatar ikekiakec, ireria ŋul lukapolok ka ireriakec ludidik.
Kitanaŋata kwaŋin akorokor airumeta nuka akwap kwape ajaatar iikorunoke; koinakis idwe luka Isirael Yosua okoku loka Nun airumet kamakec:
Apotu koinakis ŋes ere loelipit, ŋes Timunat-sera kotoma akwap nakiukon naka Epuraim, kwape ajaar aicorakinet naka EJAKAIT: abu koduk ere, kiboikin toma.
“Kolimok idwe luka Isirael ebe, Koseutu yesi ireria lukuianara, luabu kalimok yes kama ka Musa:
Tetere ikaaran yeneari ituŋanan komam epeleikinit, komam ejeni da, ekereari ŋina: eraunos kamakus luikuianarete kaneejai ekenyaŋaran aokot.
Ekereari ore ediopet koreria kaŋul, ebwoi korute loka ere, kosodi alimokin imakio luka ere kaŋol akekiro; itolomarete kesi ŋes ore mamakec, einakinete ŋes aibois, tetere iboikin mamakec.
Arai kedap ekenyaŋaran aokot ŋes, mam kes ijaikinete ekaaran mamake: naarai aar ekeidunyet komam ejeni, komam lem da elait ŋes.
Iboikin ore ŋol aitodol naebwoia atubokinio kakonyen nuka ekodet, aitodol da naetwania esasedoti lopeti lokejai kapaarasia kaŋun: ŋes konyet eboŋunio ekaaran, ebunio da oreke, togoke, ore loakerea.”
Kokekwa loka Yorodan da koYeriko kari nakokide, apotu koseut Beser kamodiŋ kapuuton naka ateker naka Reuben, ka Ramot koGilead naka ateker naka Gad, ka Golan koBasan naka ateker naka Manase.

Ŋul kes ireria luaseikinitai idwe kere luka Isirael ka imoit yeneboie kamakec, tetere ŋinituŋanan yeneari ituŋanan komam epeleikinit ekereari ŋina, komam ekenyaŋaran aokot eari ŋes, aitodol naebwoia kakonyen nuka ekodet.
Kotemasi kes koSilo kakwap naka Kanaan atiar, “Abu EJAKAIT kicorak kama ka Musa ainakin sio ireria lukiboionono, ka ironyiakec kanuka ibarenekosi.”
Apotu idwe luka Isirael koinakisi Ilebin ireria lu ka ironyiakec kotoma airumetekec, kwape ajaar aicorakinet naka EJAKAIT.
Kobeik eroet idwe luka luedeuna luka Kokat kotoma okekia luka ateker naka Epuraim, ka ateker naka Dan, ka atutubet naka ateker naka Manase, ireria itomon.
Kobeik eroet idwe luka Gereson kotoma okekia luka ateker naka Isakar, ka ateker naka Aser, ka ateker naka Naputali, ka atutubet naka ateker naka Manase koBasan, ireria itomon ka luuni.
Kodumut idwe luka Merari kwape ajaatar ikekiakec kotoma ateker naka Reuben, ka ateker naka Gad, ka ateker naka Sebulun, ireria itomon ka luarei.
Koinakis kotoma ateker naka idwe luka Yuda, ka ateker naka idwe luka Simeon, ireria lu luebilitai kane ikecekiroria.
Koraas luka idwe luka Aaron, luka ikekia luka Ikokatin, luaraas luka idwe luka Lebi: naarai abu eroet losodit kobeik kes.
Apotu koinakis kes Kiriat-araba, Araba ŋol ŋes papa loka Anak, (ŋopeŋol ŋes Keburon) kakwap nakiukon naka Yuda, ka ironyiake lualukunito.
Konye imanikoria luka ere ka ireriake ludidik, apotu kesi koinakis Kaleb okoku loka Yepune airum.
ka Yatir ka ironyiake, ka Esitemoa ka ironyiake;
ka Kolon ka ironyiake, ka Debir ka ironyiake;
ka Ain ka ironyiake, ka Yuta ka ironyiake, ka Bet-semes ka ironyiake, ireria ikanykaoŋon kotoma atekerin ŋun nuarei.
Kotoma ateker naka Benyamin, Gibeon ka ironyiake, Geba ka ironyiake;
Anatot ka ironyiake, ka Alumon ka ironyiake; ireria iwoŋon.
Ireria kere luka idwe luka Aaron, isasedotin, emwaasi itomon ka luuni ka ironyiakec.
Apotu koinakis kes Sekem ka ironyiake kakwap nakiukon naka Epuraim, ere loekuianari ikaaran, ka Geser ka ironyiake;
ka Kibisaim ka ironyiake; ka Bet-koron ka ironyiake; ireria iwoŋon.
Kotoma ateker naka Dan, Eliteke ka ironyiake, Gibeton ka ironyiake;
Aiyalon ka ironyiake, Gat-rimon ka ironyiake; ireria iwoŋon.
Kotoma atutubet naka ateker naka Manase, Taanak ka ironyiake, ka Gat-rimon ka ironyiake; ireria iarei.
Ireria kere luka ikekia luka idwe kere luedeuna luka Kokat emwaasi itomon ka ironyiakec.
Kotoma ateker naka Isakar, Kision ka ironyiake, Daberat ka ironyiake.
Yaramut ka ironyiake; En-ganim ka ironyiake; ireria iwoŋon.
Kotoma ateker naka Aser, Misal ka ironyiake, Abudon ka ironyiake;
Kelekat ka ironyiake; ka Rekob ka ironyiake; ireria iwoŋon.
Kotoma ateker naka Naputali, Kedes koGalilaya ka ironyiake, ere loekuianari ikaaran, ka Kamot-dor ka ironyiake, ka Karutan ka ironyiake; ireria iuni.
Ireria kere luka Igeresonin kwape ajaatar ikekiakec emwaasi ireria itomon ka luuni ka ironyiakec.
Dimuna ka ironyiake, Nakalal ka ironyiake; ireria iwoŋon.
Kotoma ateker naka Reuben, Beser ka ironyiake, ka Yakas ka ironyiake;
Kedemot ka ironyiake, ka Mepaat ka ironyiake, ireria iwoŋon.
Kotoma ateker naka Gad, Ramot koGilead ka ironyiake, ere loekuianari ikaaran, ka Makanaim ka ironyiake;
Kesibon ka ironyiake, Yaser ka ironyiake, ireria kere iwoŋon.
Ŋul kere araas ireria luka idwe luka Merari kwape ajaatar ikekiakec, kes luedeuna luka ikekia luka Ilebin; kobeikis kes ireria itomon ka luarei.
Alukunito ireria ŋul ironyiakec: ekote nen ireria ŋul kere.
Kisiyeŋ EJAKAIT kes kowaitin kere, kwape ajaatar kere nueyapoikinit lukapapaakec: mam edio kalukasurupokec kere loabu kobwoik kes; abu EJAKAIT kijaik lukasurupokec kere akanikec.
Emamei akirot namam abu kodol kakiro nuejok nuabu EJAKAIT kolimokinite ekek loka Isirael; apotu kere kodoloto.
Kosodi Yosua anyaraun Ireubenin ka Igadin ka atutubet naka ateker naka Manase.
Kotema kes atiar, “Ipotu kidarata kere nuabu Musa ekejaanakinan loka EJAKAIT kicorak yes, ipupoto da ekaporoto kotoma kere nuabu kecorak yes:
Mam ijalakinito ikusiinacan kapaarasia kanu nuipu, kiton lolo, konye ipotu kidarata akirot naka aicorakinet naka EJAKAIT Ekusideke.
Kwana esiyeŋu EJAKAIT Ekusideke ikusiinacan, kwape alimokinitor kes: aso do, koboŋosi, koloto owemanakus, akwap nairumito yesi, naabu Musa ekejaanakinan loka EJAKAIT koinak yes kokekwa loka Yorodan.

Konye kocoito kojokan aiswamaenen aicorakinet ka ekisil, loabu Musa ekejaanakinan loka EJAKAIT kicorak yes, aminenen EJAKAIT Ekusideke, alosenen korotinike kere, aidar aicorakinetake kere, ka aimorikikin kaŋes, ka aijaanakin ŋes kikusitauon kere ka akusiijar kere.”
Kwaŋin abu Yosua kilipak kes arereŋ, kotwar kes: koloto owemanakec.
Kotema kes atiar, “Koboŋosi kabar naepol owemanakus, ka ibaren luipu noi, ka epuesa, ka esabu, ka aisinit, ka asua, ka igoen luipu noi: komorata kikusiinacan luŋatuna kaneejaas lukasurupokus.”

Koboŋosi idwe luka Reuben, ka idwe luka Gad, ka atutubet naka ateker naka Manase, konyout koSilo loejai akwap naka Kanaan neejaas idwe luka Isirael, alosit akwap naka Gilead, akwap naka airumetekec, naerumito kesi, kwape ajaar aicorakinet naka EJAKAIT kama ka Musa.

Kedoloto kesi akwap naidunyas ka Yorodan, naejai akwap naka Kanaan, apotu idwe luka Reuben ka idwe luka Gad ka atutubet naka ateker naka Manase kodukoto etem ariri naka Yorodan, etem loepol noi loetakani.
Kepuput idwe luka Isirael ŋun, kotukokin ekodet kere loka idwe luka Isirael Silo, alosit aitiji kes.
Kijukasi nepepe kaŋes ikapolok itomon, ekapolon ediopet loka ekal loka lukapapaa loka ŋiniteker naka Isirael; arai ŋinituŋanan kakesi ekapolon loka ikalia luka lukapapaakec kolukumin luka Isirael.
Kodoloto mama ejaas idwe luka Reuben, ka idwe luka Gad, ka atutubet naka ateker naka Manase, akwap naka Gilead, kotemasi kes atiar,
“Inera kwanata ekodet kere loka EJAKAIT ebe, ‘Naanyoin aibucaret na naibucasi yesi kaneejai Edeke loka Isirael, aibelokin lolo ainyein atupit EJAKAIT, naarai idukut etem, aipaliikin lolo EJAKAIT?’
Kikidiokikinito kereka oni numam adolit nuka Peor, nueriŋa oni kitalauna kiton lolo, karaida kejauna atular okodet loka EJAKAIT.
Yes aibelokin lolo ainyein atupit EJAKAIT? Kosodi do kanu naarai ipaliikis yesi EJAKAIT lolo, enyunyurikini do ŋesi moi ekodet kere loka Isirael.

Aso do, arai mam akwap naka airumetekus elai, kodokasi yesi akwap naka airumet naka EJAKAIT, neiboio ewema lokalaunan loka EJAKAIT, kirumata nepepe kasio; konye sirikipaliikis EJAKAIT, karaida aipaliikin sio, adukun etem loegelara ketem loka EJAKAIT Ewokodeke.
Mere abu Akan okoku loka Sera kibuca koboro luetateleoritai, kobunok anyunyura ekodet kere loka Isirael? Mam etuŋanan ŋol abu kotwana bon kotoma numam adoliteke.”
“EJAKAIT, Edeke loka idekesio, EJAKAIT, Edeke loka idekesio, ŋes ejeni, Isirael da ejenuni; arai kanuka epali, arai kanuka aibucaret mama ejai EJAKAIT, (siri jo kiitajar sio lolo.)

Kidukunio isio etem aibelokin ainyein atupit EJAKAIT; arai ainakin kanen ainakinet naicweio, arai ainakinet naka akiria, arai ainakin asuban nuka ainakineta nuka ainapakin kanen, kitepesen EJAKAIT elopet;
Arai mam sio kiswamat ŋun kaiyaparit, kaomitos ebe, Kapaarasia nuepote epedorete ikusidwe atemar ikosidwe atiar, ‘Inyo bo ejai yes ka EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael?
Naarai etuluo EJAKAIT Yorodan eikorukosi kayes, yes idwe luka Reuben ka idwe luka Gad; emamei yes akorakinet kaneejai EJAKAIT:’ kwaŋin isimikete ikusidwe ikosidwe ayoŋit EJAKAIT.
Ŋes kitemaria ebe, ‘Ketemokinos oni aiduk etem, mere kanuka ainakinia ainakinet naicweio, karaida asubanit:

Konye eraun ekajenan mamakosi kayes, mama ejaas aturiowok nukitupanakinete, tetere kijaanakini kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT kainakinetawok nuicweio ka asubanawok, ka ainakinetawok nuka ainapakin; tetere mam ikusidwe etemarete ikosidwe kapaarasia nuepote atiar, “Emamei yes akorakinet kama ejai EJAKAIT.” ’

Ŋes kitemaria ebe, ejaun do ebe naetemariata sio arai aturiokosi kwaŋin kapaarasia nuepote, kitemari do isio ebe, ‘Koany aput naka etem loka EJAKAIT, loadukunete lukapapaakosi, mere kanuka ainakinia ainakinet naicweio, karaida asubanit; konye erai ekajenan mamakosi kayes.’

Madi akuj, arai kiipaliiki isio EJAKAIT, aibelokin lolo ainyein atupit EJAKAIT, aiduk etem ainakinia ainakinet naicweio, ka ainakinet naka akiria, arai asubanit, kogelara kaneejai etem loka EJAKAIT Ewokodeke loejai owemake lokalaunan.”

Kepupu Pinekas esasedoti, ka ikapolok luka ekodet, kes ikapolok luka ilukumin luka Isirael luajaas kaŋes, akiro nuapotu idwe luka Reuben, ka idwe luka Gad, ka idwe luka Manase kinerata, apotu kesi kitojokata noi.

Kotema Pinekas okoku loka Eleasar esasedoti idwe luka Reuben, ka idwe luka Gad, ka idwe luka Manase atiar, “Kijeni lolo ebe ejai EJAKAIT kidiŋiwok, naarai mam yes ibucarito aibucaret ŋin kaneejai EJAKAIT: iyuut do yesi idwe luka Isirael kakan naka EJAKAIT.”

Koboŋo Pinekas okoku loka Eleasar esasedoti, ka ikapolok, kaneejaas idwe luka Reuben, ka idwe luka Gad, anyoun kakwap naka Gilead, alosit akwap naka Kanaan, mama ejaas idwe luka Isirael, kinyakakis kes akiro.
Kitojokata idwe luka Isirael akirot; kituroto idwe luka Isirael Edeke, mam bobo apotu kinerata nuka alosit aitiji kes, amudiar akwap naeboiononoto idwe luka Reuben ka idwe luka Gad.
Komaikisi idwe luka Reuben ka idwe luka Gad etem Ed,
Abu Yosua konyarau Isirael kere, imakiokec ka ikapolokokec, ikatubokokec, ka ijakakec, kotema kes atiar, “Amojoŋ eoŋ akokosanit da noi:
Ianyut yesi kere nuabu EJAKAIT Ekusideke kiswamak atekerin nu kere kanukus; naarai EJAKAIT Ekusideke ŋes ŋol lokijiik yes.
Koany, kainak yes atekerin nu nuideuna, araun airumet naka atekerinikus, ageun koYorodan, katekerin kere nuamudia eoŋ, kiton aŋolol nakapolon kari naelomaria akoloŋ.
Eremori EJAKAIT Ekusideke kes kakonyenekus, ireŋeari kes kakonyenekus; irumete yesi akecekwap, kwape kilimokinitor EJAKAIT yes.
Aso kotitiŋioto noi aidar aiswamaenen kere nuiwadikatai oitabo loka ikisila luka Musa, kinyeis apaar teten arai kediany;
Tetere mam imorikikinos katekerin nu, nuideuna kamakus; karaida alimit ekiror loka idekesiokec, karaida aiyapo kolimito kes, karaida aijaanakin kes, karaida akukonokin kes:
Konye kimorikikinos ka EJAKAIT Ekusideke, kwape kiswamaata kiton lolo.
Naarai ereŋea EJAKAIT atekerin nukapolok nukagogoŋ da kakonyenekus: konye yes, emamei etuŋanan lokibwoikinit yes kiton lolo.
Ediopetuŋanan kayesi erukoria elukumit: naarai EJAKAIT Ekusideke, ŋes ŋol lokijiik yes, kwape kilimokinitor.
Kocoito do noi yesi, kominenenas EJAKAIT Ekusideke.
Naarai arai kiboŋosi yesi, aimorikikin kaluideuna luka atekerin kanu, kes luideuna kamakus, kosodete amanyanakin kakes, kolomasi da mamakec, kes da mamakus:

Kojenutu cut ebe mam bobo EJAKAIT ireŋeari atekerin nu kakonyenekus; konye eraunos atacit ka eic kamakus, ka edoi kosiepionokus, ka ikukwa kakonyekus, aitodol nakimudiarere yes kakwap kana naejok nakiinak yes EJAKAIT Ekusideke.

Kosodi kanen, kwape kidolokinioto yes nukajokak kere nuabu EJAKAIT Ekusideke kolimokinite yes, kijukakini EJAKAIT yes kwaŋin nukaronok kere aitodol nakimudiaria yes kakwap kana naejok nakiinak EJAKAIT Ekusideke.

Naibucariata aitutuket naka EJAKAIT Ekusideke naabu kicorak yes, kosodete alosit aijaanakin icedekesio ka akukonokin kes; inepuni do anyunyura naka EJAKAIT aluikin yes, kimudiario yes atipet kakwap naejok nakiinak ŋesi yes.”

Kotema Yosua ituŋa kere atiar, “Inera EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael kwanata ebe, ‘Eboiete kolo lukapapaakus kokekwa loka Ecor, ŋes Tera, papa loka Aburaam, papa da loka Nakor: apotu kijaanakis icedekesio.
Kasodi aitonyoun papaakus Aburaam kokekwa loka Ecor, keŋarenik ŋes anatar akwap kere naka Kanaan, ketupuu aurike, kainak da ŋes Isaak.
Kainak Isaak Yakob ka Esau: kainak Esau emoru Seir airum; abu Yakob ka idweke kolototo Misiri.
Abu kejuka Musa ka Aaron, ketican Misiri, kwape ajaatar nuabu keswama kaŋina: akaulo kaŋun abu ketolom yes.
Abu ketolom lukapapaakus koMisiri: ipotu kodoloto aŋolol: kibwaput Imisirian lukapapaakus kagalin ka ikebwanenok kiton Aŋolol Nakareŋan.

Kosodete kiworoto EJAKAIT, abu kibwaik amuton kidiŋikus ka Imisirian, kitoboŋik aŋolol mamakec, korapia kes; apotu akusikonye koanyut nuabu eoŋ keswama koMisiri: kiboioto da yesi kamodiŋ apaarasia nuipu.
Kasodi aitolomun yes akwap naka Imorain, lueboiete kokekwa loka Yorodan; kitijioto yes: abu kejaik kes akanikus, kirumata da yesi akecekwap; abu kamudia kes kakonyenekus.
Kosodi Balak, okoku loka Sipor, ekabaka loka Moab, anyoun asurokin Isirael; kijuka anyaraun Balaam okoku loka Beor aiken yes:
Konye mam abu kapupok Balaam; tape kisirereŋi yes: kwaŋin kayu yes kakanike.
Ipotu kodokata Yorodan, kodoloto Yeriko: apotu ituŋa luka Yeriko kitijioto yes, Emorait, ka Eperisit, ka Ekanaanit, ka Ekitit, ka Egirugasit, ka Ekibit, ka Eyebusit; abu kejaik kes akaninikus.
Abu kejuka ekaturuturut kiŋarenekus, loabu kireŋea kes kakonyenekus, kes ikabakan iarei luka Imorain; mere kekileŋikus karaida akabwakus.
Abu kainak yes akwap namam ipotu kitaaritos, ka ireria lumam yes kidukito, iboiete da kotoma; inyamete imusabibun ka iseitunin lumam yes kiraito.’

Konye arai kironikinit yes aijaanakin EJAKAIT, koseutu yesi lolo loijaanakinete; arai bo idekesio luejaanakinete lukapapaakus luajaas okekwa loka Ecor, arai idekesio luka Imorain, luiboiete yesi kakwapukec: konye eoŋ ka ekakal, kijaanakini EJAKAIT.”
Koboŋokis ituŋa ebe, “Madi akuj isio aijal EJAKAIT, aijaanakin idekesio ice;

Naarai EJAKAIT Ewokodeke, ŋol ŋes lokitolomuni oni ka lukapapaawok kakwap nako Misiri, kotogo da loka ebulesene, loeswamai aanyuneta ŋun nukos kakonyenekosi, loabu kidar oni korot kere lokitorit, kotuŋa da kere lukipou ketoroto mamakec:
Abu EJAKAIT kireŋea ituŋa kere kakonyenewok, kes Imorain lueboiete kakwap: kanuka ŋun kijaanakini isio da EJAKAIT; naarai erai ŋesi Ewokodeke.”
Arai kijalata yesi EJAKAIT, kosodete aijaanakin idekesio lumo, ibelokini do ŋesi aiswamakin yes nukaronok, kimudiari da yes, kedau ŋesi aiswamakin yes nukajokak.”
Kotemasi ituŋa Yosua atiar, “Mam; konye kijaanakini isio EJAKAIT.”
Kotema Yosua ituŋa atiar, “Iraas yesi ikajenak kamakus ebe iseut yesi EJAKAIT aijaanakin ŋes.” Kotemasi atiar, “Kirai ikajenak.”
Kotema atiar, “Aso do kolemasi idekesio lumo luejaas mamakus, kogoŋakis ikusitauon mama ejai EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael.”
Kotemasi ituŋa Yosua atiar, “Kijaanakini EJAKAIT Ewokodeke, kirimari da ekeporoto.”
Kwaŋin kitutukoto Yosua kituŋa kapaaran kaŋin, kisilak kes ekisil ka aicorakinet ko Sekem.
Kotema Yosua ituŋa kere atiar, “Koany, eraun amoru na akajenan kamawok; naarai apupu akiro kere nukilimok EJAKAIT oni: eraun akajenan kamakus, kinyeis aiŋer Ekusideke.”
Kwaŋin kotwar Yosua ituŋa, kolot ŋinituŋanan airumeteke.
Kosodi kokau kaŋun, kotwana Yosua okoku loka Nun, ekejaanakinan loka EJAKAIT, korai loka ikar akwatat ka itomon.
Kidaikisi ŋes oikor loka airumeteke Timunat-sera, loejai akwap nakiukon naka Epuraim, kari naka agolitomei naka eroŋat loka Gaas.
Kotema Yuda onaceke Simeon atiar, “Bia kauparos oroet lokabeit eoŋ, tetere kitijie Ikanaanin; kwape kwaŋin da kiupar eoŋ kajo oroet lokibeit ijo,” Kouparos Simeon kaŋes.
Kolot Yuda; kijaik EJAKAIT Ikanaanin ka Iperisin akanikec: kodanyata ituŋa ilukumin itomon kaŋul koBesek.
Apotu kodumakis Adoni-besek Besek: kitijioto ŋes, kodanyata Ikanaanin ka Iperisin.
Konye koker Adoni-besek; kodapata ŋes, kikamut ŋes, kotubosi ibokoro lukapolok luka akaninike ka luka akejeke da.

Kotema Adoni-besek atiar, “Apotu ikabakan akaisakanykaarei luatuboritai ibokoro lukapolok luka akaninikec ka luka akejekec kirarata ikecenyamat kokwap kemesaka: kwape abu eoŋ keswamaa, keswamaki Edeke eoŋ kwaŋin.” Koyaŋaarai ŋes Yerusalem, kotwanik ŋina.
Kokau kaŋun, koloto idwe luka Yuda aitiji Ikanaanin lueboiete kakwap nakiukon, kari da naka Eŋalakimak, kapuuton da.
Kolot Yuda asurokin Ikanaanin lueboiete koKeburon: (kerai ekiror loka Keburon sek Kiriat-araba:) kodanyata Sesai, ka Akiman, ka Talumai.
Kotema Kaleb atiar, “Ŋol loedanyi luka Kiriat-seper, kosodi airum ere, akorakini eoŋ ŋol akokuka Akisa aimany,”
Kirum Otiniel ŋes, loarai okoku loka Kenas, onace lodidi loka Kaleb: kokorak ŋes Akisa akokuke aimany.
Kosodi kanen, kebu mamake abu ŋin kokoto ŋol ailipun papake emanikor: kodok kasigiriake, kotema Kaleb ŋes atiar, “Inyo bo ikoto ijo?”
Kotema ŋes atiar, “Koinakinai eoŋ arereŋ; naarai kiinakinit eoŋ akwap naka ari naka Eŋalakimak, koinakinai eoŋ da atanin nuka akipi.” Koinak Kaleb ŋes atanin nukokuju ka nukajesa da.
Koloto Yuda ka onaceke Simeon, kodanyata Ikanaanin lueboiete koSepat, komudiasi cut. Komaikinai ere Koruma.
Kirum Yuda Gasa da ka eikoruke, ka Asukelon ka eikoruke, ka Ekuron ka eikoruke.
Kojai EJAKAIT kaYuda; kireŋea lueboienenete kakwap nakiukon; naarai mam ŋes abu kopedo aireŋear lueboienenete kaditot, naarai ajaas ŋul agalin nuka asua.
Koinakis Kaleb Keburon kwape abalar Musa: kireŋea kanen odwe luuni luka Anak.
Mam idwe luka Benyamin apotu kireŋeasi Iyebusin lueboiete koYerusalem; konye kiboioto Iyebusin kidwe luka Benyamin koYerusalem, kiton lolo.
Kolot ekal loka Yosep da asurokin Bet-el: kojai EJAKAIT kakes.
Kijuka ekal loka Yosep ituŋa airot Bet-el. (Kerai ekiror loka akwap sek Lus.)
Koanyut ikarotak etuŋanan elomuni kore, kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Kiŋaiŋait, kitodikinai isio neelomarere ore, kiswamakini isio jo nukasianut.”
Abu itodik kes neelomarere ore, kodanyata lukore kakwanis naka ekileŋ; konye apotu koosikis etuŋanan ŋol ka ekekike kere alosit.
Kolot etuŋanan ŋol akwap naka Ikitin, koduk ere, komaik ekekiror Lus: loerai ekekiror kiton lolo.
Kosodi kanen, kegogoŋor Isirael, apotu kitaraut Ikanaanin ikeswamak nakailolitoi, mam apotu kireŋeasi kes cut.
Konye apotu Iserain kiboioto kama ejaas Ikanaanin ikulepek akwap: naarai mam apotu kireŋeasi kes.
Apotu Imorain koremosi idwe luka Dan akwap nakiukon: naarai mam apotu kocamakis kes abunore aditot:
Konye kiboikinos Imorain moru Keres, ka Aiyalon ka Saalubim: konye kolaŋir akan naka ekal loka Yosep, kwaŋin koraunos ikeswamak nukailolitoi.
Ageunit eikor loka Imorain kaneedokarere Akurabim, anyoun komoru, kiton kuju.
Mam yes itutukete kaluiboiete kakwap kana; itiyanakinete itemwanakec’: konye mam yes irimarito ekaporoto: kanukinyo iswamaata ŋun?
Ŋes do atemaria eoŋ da ebe, Mam ereŋeari kes kakonyenekus; eraunos bala ikukwa kosiepionokus, eraunos da idekesiokec atacit kamakus.”
Kosodi kanen, naenerar emalaika loka EJAKAIT akiro ŋun mama ejaas idwe kere luka Isirael, kodelosi ituŋa, komonya.
Komaikis aibois ŋin Bokim:
Naatwaria Yosua ituŋa, apotu idwe luka Isirael koloto, ŋinituŋanan airumeteke airum akwap.
Apotu ituŋa kijaanakis EJAKAIT apaarasia kere nuka Yosua, ka apaarasia kere nuka imakio luabusito adepar Yosua, luaanyunito aswam kere nakos naka EJAKAIT, naeswamakinit Isirael.
Kotwana Yosua okoku loka Nun, ekejaanakinan loka EJAKAIT, korai loka ikar akwatat ka itomon.
Kidaikis ŋes oikor loka airumeteke Timuna-keres, kakwap nakiukon naka Epuraim, kari naka agolitomei naka eroŋat loka Gaas.
Koyaŋaarai atur ŋin kere mama ejaas lukapapaakec: kotupak kes atur ace namam ajeni EJAKAIT, karaida aswam naeswamakinit ŋesi Isirael.
Kiswamata idwe luka Isirael nueroko kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kijaanakis Ibaalim:
Kojalata EJAKAIT, Edeke loka lukapapaakec, loetolomuni kes kakwap nako Misiri, kosodete atupar icedekesio, luka idekesio luka ituŋa lualukunito kes, kokukonokinos kes: kitunyunyurikisi EJAKAIT.
Kojalata EJAKAIT, kijaanakis Baal ka Asitarot.
Kinep anyunyura naka EJAKAIT aluikin Isirael, kijaik kes akan naka ikaŋatak luaŋasete kes, kogwela kes akan naka lukasurupokec lualukunito, komam bobo epedorete abwoikin lukasurupokec.
Kama alosete kere, aluikinit akan naka EJAKAIT aikonakin kes erono, kwape abalar EJAKAIT, kwape da eyapoikinitor EJAKAIT kes: kiyaloŋoŋoto noi.

Konye mam apotu kopuput ikatubokokec, naarai apotu koloto eporo mama ejaas icedekesio, kokukonokinos kes: kopaasi katipet korot loalosenenoto lukapapaakec, luarimarito aicorakineta nuka EJAKAIT: konye mam kes apotu kiswamata kwaŋin.

Kosodi keseiki EJAKAIT kes ikatubok, kojai do EJAKAIT kekatubon, kitajar kes kakan naka lukasurupokec apaarasia kere nuka ekatubon: naarai abu EJAKAIT kiitu eidinyikec kanuka ŋul kaluaroikinito kes lueticanete kes.

Konye naetwania ekatubon, koboŋonorete, kiswamaenenete nueroko noi adepar lukapapaakec kotoma atupit icedekesio aijaanakin kes, ka akukonokin kes; mam apotu kopalut aswam ŋun karaida eponekec loka aninik.
Kinep anyunyura naka EJAKAIT aluikin Isirael; kotema atiar, “Naarai ebuca ateker na akaitutuket naabu kecorak lukapapaakec, mam erimarito ekaporoto;
Amear kwana mam eoŋ ereŋeari kakonyenekec adio kotoma atekerin nuenyeini Yosua naatwania:
tetere egimoria kes Isirael, arai ericete alosenen korot loka EJAKAIT, kwape aricitotor lukapapaakec, arai bo mam.”
Kwaŋin kinyek EJAKAIT atekerin ŋun, komam ireŋeari kes katipet; karaida aijaikin kes akan naka Yosua.
Tetere aturio nuka idwe luka Isirael ejenunete, aisisianakin kes ejie, ŋun numam lem ajenunito kes sek;
Kes lu, ijaka ikany luka Ipilisitian, Ikanaanin kere, ka Isidonin, ka Ikibin lueboiete komoru Lebanon, ageun komoru Baal-kerumon kiton neelomarere Kamat.
Araas kesi aigimoria Isirael, ajenun arai erimarete aicorakineta nuka EJAKAIT, nuecorakinit lukapapaakec kama ka Musa.
Kiboioto idwe luka Isirael kama ejaas Ikanaanin; Ekitit, ka Emorait, ka Eperisit, ka Ekibit, ka Eyebusit:
Komanyata adwekec, kokorakis odwekec adwekec, kijaanakis da idekesiokec.
Kanuka ŋun kinep anyunyura naka EJAKAIT aluikin Isirael, kogwela kes akan naka Kusanrisataim ekabaka loka Mesopotamia:
Kemonyata idwe luka Isirael mama ejai EJAKAIT, abu EJAKAIT kitonyoik idwe luka Isirael eketajaran, loetajari kes, ŋes Otiniel okoku loka Kenas, onac lodidi loka Kaleb.
Kobunok emoyo loka EJAKAIT ŋes, kotubok Isirael; koloma ejie, kijaik EJAKAIT Kusanrisataim ekabaka loka Mesopotamia akanike: kipiko ŋesi Kusan-risataim.
Kiyeŋu akwap ikar akaisaoŋon. Kotwana Otiniel okoku loka Kenas.
Kotukok mamake idwe luka Amon ka Amalek; kolot kodany Isirael, kirumata ere loka idukudukun.
Kijaanakis idwe luka Isirael Egulon ekabaka loka Moab ikar itomon ka lukanykauni.
Abu Ekud kotatau ekileŋ loekwaka iwaitin iarei, loka aojau naka ekubit;
Kijaik ŋesi Egulon ekabaka loka Moab ainakinet: ido atumit Egulon noi.
Kedau ainakin ainakinet, abu kotwara ituŋa luadakito ainakinet.
Konye abu ŋesi koboŋu kama ejaas amor nuikec nuedunyas ka Giligal, kotema atiar, “Kainunit akirot nakaiyeiyea, wu ekabaka.” Kotema atiar, “Kililiŋata.” Kolomasi ŋul kere luabwoete kaneajai ŋesi.
Kobu Ekud neajai ŋesi; eboie ŋesi bon kagolake nakokuju. Kotema Ekud atiar, “Kainunit jo akirot naka Edeke.” Konyou ŋesi koicoloŋoke.
Korio Ekud akekan nakokediany kout ekileŋ kotulike lokoteten, kicum akekoik:
Koloma akulep da atupakin ekileŋ; korapia asiepai ekileŋ, naarai mam abu kout ekileŋ kakoikike; kipelun kopur.
Kosodi Ekud alomar adapao, kogolok ikekia luka agola, kigoik kes.
Kedau ŋesi alomar, kopotu ikebulesin; koanyut, ido koany, egoikino ikekia luka agola; kotemasi atiar, “Abeit imukorit akekeje kagolake naelilim.”
Kidarata aitodol naerumiata ileic; ido koany, mam abu koŋaa ikekia luka agola; kosodete do kesi alemun elacet, koŋaasi kes; ido koany, atwanit ejakaitikec kibirokina kwap.
Koku Ekud eroko kesi idarete, kotubor kamor nuikec, kokuia Seira.
Kosodi kanen kedolu ŋesi, abu kokutak arupepe kakwap nakiukon naka Epuraim, kijesaros idwe luka Isirael kaŋes kakwap nakiukon, kiŋarenikinite ŋesi kes.
Kotema kes atiar, “Kotupunai; naarai ejaiki EJAKAIT lukasurupokus Imoabin akanikus.” Kotupasi ŋes, kirumata idoketa luka Yorodan luebeete Moab, mam apotu kocamakis idiotuŋanan atubor.
Kodanyata kesi luka Imoabin kapak kaŋin ituŋa kwape ilukumin itomon, ŋolituŋanan lokaburon, ka ŋoltuŋanan loetitiŋ; mam ediotuŋanan abu koku.
Kitononok akan naka Isirael Moab kapaaran kaŋin, Kiyeŋ akwap ikar akaisakanykauni.
Kogwela kes EJAKAIT akan naka Yabin ekabaka loka Kanaan, lokeyait koKasor; ekapolon loka ajoreke ŋes Sisera, lokiboie koKaroset loka Imo.
Komonyata idwe luka Isirael mama ejai EJAKAIT; naarai kejaas kagalin akwat akanykaoŋon nuka asua; koŋara noi idwe luka Isirael ikar akaisaarei.
Kiboienenei da kokwap kedukut loka Debora kidiŋ Rama ka Bet-el kakwap nakiukon naka Epuraim: kolosenenete idwe luka Isirael mamakeŋ atubonokinio.

Kijuka konyarau Barak okoku loka Abinoam anyoun koKedes-Naputali, kobala ebe, “Mere kicorakinit EJAKAIT Edeke loka Isirael atiar, ‘Kobea moru Tabor, koyaŋa da ituŋa ilukumin itomon lukodwe luka Naputali, kodwe da luka Sebulun?
Eoŋ da eriuni mama ijai kocor Kison Sisera lokapolon loka ajore naka Yabin, nepepe kakegalin ka ekekodet; eoŋ da ejaikini ŋes akanikon.’ ”
Kobala Barak ŋes ebe, “Arai kiupar ijo keoŋ, alosi; konye arai mam jo kiupar keoŋ, mam alosi.”
Kobala ŋesi ebe, “Abeit kiupar kajo, konye alosit naikoto alosit mam eraun naka akoniibuses, naarai egwelari EJAKAIT Sisera akan naka aberu.” Konyou Debora, kouparos kaBarak oKedes.
Konyarau Barak Sebulun ka Naputali kotukokinos oKedes; kodokasi ikiliok ilukumin itomon neejai: kodoka Debora da kaŋes.
Kolimokinai Sisera kwape kedokaria Barak okoku loka Abinoam moru Tabor.
Kotukonok Sisera akegalin kere, agalin nuka asua akwat akanykaoŋon, ka ituŋa kere lukejaatar, anyoun koKaroset loka Imo kiton ocor Kison.
Kobala Debora Barak ebe, “Konyou; naarai na ŋes apaaran naekorakinia EJAKAIT Sisera akanikon: mere EJAKAIT kiŋarenikinit jo?” Kosodi kijesun Barak komoru Tabor, kotupakis ituŋa ilukumin itomon.
Kitubur EJAKAIT Sisera ka akegalin kere ka ajoreke da kere kakwanis naka ekileŋ kakonyen nuka Barak; kodoku Sisera kagalike koker kakeje.
Konye kotupak Barak agalin ka ajore kiton Karoset loka Imo; koŋianak ajore kere naka Sisera akwanis naka ekileŋ; komamei etuŋanan loabu kideun.
Koloma Yael airiamun kaSisera, kobala ŋes ebe, “Kopau, ejakait, kopau koloma togoka; sirikiyoŋ.” Kopaa mamake koloma toma owema, kimuko ŋes kakapet.
Kobala ŋes ebe, “Keŋaiŋait ae adisikipi kamat; naarai kajakit akur.” Kopuko eseme loka akile, kitamat ŋes, kosodi kimuko.
Kolimok ŋesi ya ebe, “Kobwo kokek loka ewema, kosodi arai kebu ituŋanan kere kiiŋit jo atiar, ‘Ejai ediotuŋanan ne?’ kotema ebe, ‘Emamei.’ ”
Kosodi kolem Yael aberu naka Keber eloit loka ewema, kolem da anyul kakekan kolot ecedi, kibubuk eloit oreeteke, kipelor kiton alup: naarai kejotoi ajo nuipu; kiilor kotwana.
Ido koany, kibwapite Barak Sisera, kolom Yael aisiriamaar ŋes, kolimok ebe, “Bia, ketodik etuŋanan loimoot ijo.” Kobu mama ejai; ido koany, koperi Sisera etwanit, kidiria da eloit koreeteke.
Kiyatanakin akan naka idwe luka Isirael aipikor Yabin ekabaka loka Kanaan, aitodol nakemudiariata Yabin ekabaka loka Kanaan.
Kosodete Debora ka Barak okoku loka Abinoam ayoore kapaaran kaŋin ebe,
“Naarai apotu ikeŋarenok kiŋarenikis Isirael,
Naarai apotu ituŋa koluŋakinos ketau kaloejok,
Kituroto yesi EJAKAIT!
“Kopuputu, yes ikabakan; kitoikisi aki, yes ikapolok;
Ayeikini eoŋ EJAKAIT:
Ayei aiturit EJAKAIT,
Edeke loka Isirael.
Nailomunia komanikor loka Edom,
Abu akwap komaran, kodou akuj da,
Eebo, apotu idouon kitodoutu akipi.
Ijo da Sinai kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT,
Edeke loka Isirael.
Kapaarasia nuka Yael, amameete ituŋa korotin lukapolok,
Etorito ikalotok orotin luekudukudo.
Aitodol naanyounio eoŋ Debora,
Naanyounio eoŋ toto kotoma Isirael.
Kosodi ejie ajaun orutei:
Atakanu kereka ebuku arai akwara
Kaneajaas ilukumin akaisaoŋon luka Isirael?
Eomit ekatau nuka ikayaitok luka Isirael,
Luapotu kijaikinos ketau loejok kotuŋa:
Kituroto yesi EJAKAIT.
Yes luiboiete komukekan luejok noi,
Ka yes da luilosete korot.
Itatamete aswamisio nuedolito nuka EJAKAIT,
Aswamisio nuedolito nuka ayaiteke kotoma Isirael,
Kolwana ecelet loka ikagumak, kaiboisio nuewokere akipi.
Kosodete ituŋa luka EJAKAIT alosit orutei.
“Kokweny, kokweny, Debora;
Kokweny, kokweny, koye ekosio!
Konyou, Barak, kijoreo lukijoreunokon,
gjo okoku loka Abinoam.
Kosodete luedeuna luka ikapolok ka ituŋa aijesun;
Abu EJAKAIT kijesun kanukaŋ asurokin ikagogoŋok.
Kitupito jo, Benyamin; kotuŋakon;
Kopotu ikayaitok kotoma Makir,
Ka ŋul da luetiŋito ebela loka ejakait kotoma Sebulun.
Kojaas ikapolok luka Isakar kaDebora;
Kwape ajaar Isakar, ajai Barak kwaŋin;
Komotaros aditot kakejeke,
Kalelesia nuka Reuben
Abu kojaun ainerun naepol naka itauon.
Aipup alamarun nuekutakinio isipanin?
Kalelesia nuka Reuben
Abu kojaun ainerun naepol naka itauon.
Dan da, kanukinyo asalakinia ŋesi ameerin?
Kiboikin Aser kopala kariri naka aŋolol,
Kiboikin ociletake.
Naputali da, kaiboisio nuiceleleete nuka ais.
Kosodete ikabakan luka Kanaan ejie,
koTaanak kariri naka akipi nuka Megido:
Mam apotu kodumut ameda naka apesan.
Apotu aacer kitijioto Sisera kotoma alositokec.
Ecor ŋol lokolosek, ecor Kison.
Wu ekatau, kolot kagogoŋ!
“Kosodete imageger luka ibalasin adamac
Kanuka atakar, atakar naka ikagogoŋokokec.
Kikenoto yesi noi luiboiete kotomake;
Naarai mam apotu koponito aiŋarakin EJAKAIT,
Aiŋarakin EJAKAIT aitiji ikagogoŋok.
Aberu naka Keber Ekenit,
Isirereŋio ŋes adepar aŋor kotoma oweman.
Abu kilip ŋes akipi, koinak akile;
Abu koinu ŋes akinyet katuba naejok.
Abu kitiŋ eloit kakekan,
Kitiŋ da anyul naka ekeswaman kakanike nakoteten;
Kibubuk Sisera kanyulike, kibubuk akouke,
Eebo, abu kicum aipelor ereeteke.
Abu kokukum kakejeke, kibiror, koper:
Abu kokukum kakejeke, kibiror:
Neakukumio, nepenen ebirokin kotwana.
“Abu ŋin kireik kadirisa, komony,
Komony toto naka Sisera kadirisa ebe,
‘Kanukinyo eyapia akegali abunore?
Kanukinyo erumorotor akokoron nuka agalike?’
Apotu akeŋor nukacoa koboŋokis ŋes,
Eebo, abu ŋesi alopet Koboŋok ebe.
Ŋinituŋanan apese, arai bo apesur aarei;
Sisera luŋatan luka igoen luiculatai,
Luŋatan luka igoen luiculatai luesonyitai,
Luka igoen luiculatai luesonyitai iwaitin kere, komurisiŋa luka luŋatan?’
Konye kosubito ŋul lueminasi ŋes bala akoloŋ naelomaria kotoma agogoŋuke.”
Kiyeŋ akwap ikar akaisaoŋon.
Kipiko akan naka Midian Isirael: ido kanuka Midian kiswamaut idwe luka Isirael aŋopisia nuejaas oroŋan, ka abuai, ka abwasia nuegogoŋ.
Kosodi do kedau Isirael aiye ikinyom, kopotu Imidianin, ka Imalekain, ka idwe lukokide; kopotu asurokin kes.
Kidukuroto asurokin kes, komudiasi amio naka akwap, kiton Gasa, mam apotu kideut inyamat koIsirael, karaida amerekek, karaida emoŋ, karaida asigiria.
Naarai aponito kibarenikec, ka iwemanakec, kopotu bala emaase kanuka aipues; komam kes ka ikaalaikec imarunos: kolomut akwap amudiar ŋes.
Kitisil Midian Isirael; komonyata idwe luka Isirael mama ejai EJAKAIT.
Kosodi kanen, kemonyata idwe luka Isirael mama ejai EJAKAIT kanuka Imidianin.
Kijukak EJAKAIT idwe luka Isirael enabi: kotema ŋol kes atiar, “Inera kwanata EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael ebe, Abu kayau yes koMisiri, ketolom da kotogo loka ebulesene;
Kayu yes kakan naka Imisirian, kakan da naka ŋul kere lukiroikinito yes, kereŋea kes kakonyenekus, kainak yes akecekwap;
Katema yes atiar, ‘Eoŋ EJAKAIT Ekusideke; sirikiyoŋata idekesio luka Imorain, luiboiete yesi kakwapukec’: konye mam yes irimarito ekaporoto.”
Kitakanikin emalaika loka EJAKAIT ŋes, kotema ŋes atiar, “Ejai EJAKAIT kajo, ijo etuŋanan lokirigi loititiŋ.”

Kotema Gideon ŋes atiar, “Wu ekajakait, arai ejai EJAKAIT kasio, kanukinyo do kidoikinioto sio nu kere? Ai bo ejaas akeswamisio kere nukaumokin nuapotu lukapapaakosi kolimonokis sio ebe, ‘Mere kereka EJAKAIT kiyaŋauni sio koMisiri?’ Konye kwana kicaka EJAKAIT sio, kijaik sio akan naka Midian.”
Kite EJAKAIT ŋes, kotema atiar, “Kolot kagogoŋukon na, kitajar Isirael kakan naka Midian: mere eoŋ kejuka jo?”
Kotema ŋes atiar, “Wu EJAKAIT, ekonakini ai etajari Isirael? Koany, erai ekakek loicana noi kotoma Manase, eoŋ da adite noi koka loka papaka.”
Kotema EJAKAIT ŋes atiar, “Abeit ajaun kajo, iari Imidianin bala ediopetuŋanan.”
Kotema ŋes atiar, “Arai adumunit asianut kakonyenekon, kitodikinai aanyunet naitogogoŋi ebe ijo ŋopeŋol kinera keoŋ.
Keŋaiŋait, sirikinyou kane, aitodol naaboŋunio, ayaŋaun ainakineteka, aibwaikin akonyenekon.” Kotema atiar, “Edareuni aitodol naiboŋunio ijo.”
Koloma Gideon, kitemok ikalol, ka imugatin lumam itubuunitoi luka epa
Kotema emalaika loka EJAKAIT ŋes atiar, “Kolem akiriŋ ka imugatin lumam itubuunitoi, kidokok kes amoru na, kobukok acece.” Kiswama ŋesi kwaŋin.

Kosodi emalaika loka EJAKAIT aikeun ebelake loetiŋit, kotiroria akiriŋ ka imugatin lumam itubuunitoi; kolom akim kamoru, konyam akim akiriŋ ka imugatin lumam itubuunitoi; konyou emalaika loka EJAKAIT kakonyeneke.
Koany Gideon ebe ŋes emalaika loka EJAKAIT; kotema Gideon atiar, “Wu okwe, EJAKAIT Edeke! Naarai aany emalaika loka EJAKAIT keteosi.”
Kotema EJAKAIT ŋes atiar, “Kinapakin; sirikuriana; mam jo itwani.”
Kosodi Gideon adukokin EJAKAIT etem nen, komaik ŋes Yawe-salom:
Ido kodukok EJAKAIT Ekonideke etem kuju kabwas kana, kopone kaloejok, koyaŋa emoŋ lokiareit, koinak ainakinet naicweio kakito nuka Asera loijepi.”

Kosodi Gideon ayaŋaar ituŋa itomon kotoma ikejaanakinakake, kiswama kwape abalar EJAKAIT ŋes: kosodi naarai akuriana ŋesi ekal loka papake ka ituŋa lukore, mam abu kopedo aswam ŋun paaran, kiswama kuare.
Kenyoutu ituŋa lukore tupuruc sek, koany, atiyaikina etem loka Baal, Asera da loedunyas kaŋes ajepitai, ka emoŋ lokiareit aponi koinakinai otem loadukitoi.
Kotemanaros ebe, “Iŋai bo iswamat akirot na?” Kosodete keŋicata, kiŋitanasi da, kotemasi atiar, “Gideon okoku loka Yoas ŋes iswamat ŋin.”
Kosodete ituŋa lukore atemar Yoas atiar, “Kitolom okokukon, kotwana: naarai atiyaiki etem loka Baal, naarai ajep da Asera loedunyas kaŋes.”

Kotema Yoas kere luabwoikinito ŋes atiar, “Irabakinete yesi Baal? Arai bo itajarete yesi ŋes? Ŋol loirabakini ŋes, eario eroko atupuruc: arai erai edeke, kirabakin bon, naarai atiyaiki ituŋanan eketem.”
Komaik do ŋes kapaaran kaŋin Yerubaal,
Konye kodoik emoyo loka EJAKAIT Gideon; kokut arupepe; kotukokin Abieser aitup ŋes.
Kijuka ikiyakia anatar Manase kere; kotukokinos kesi da aitup ŋes: kijuka ikiyakia mama ejai Aser, ka Sebulun, ka Naputali da; kopotu ŋul airiamun kakes.
Kotema Gideon Edeke atiar, “Arai itajari ijo Isirael kakanika, kwape ibu kotemaria.
Koany, ebwaikini emukule loka ajul opejal; arai kejaunos akopyo omukule bon, kookito alup kere, ajenuni do eoŋ ebe itajari ijo Isirael kakanika, kwape ibu kotemaria.”
Kojaun kwaŋin: naarai abu ŋesi kodilok anyoun tupuruc, konunuk emukule, kocu akopyo komukule, kilelebunos akip atany.
Kotema Gideon Edeke atiar, “Kinyek anyunyurakon ainepun aluikin eoŋ, mere kener irwan na atipet bon: keŋaiŋait, kegimo irwan na bon kemukule; koonite do emukule bon, konye kojaunos akopyo alup kere.”
Kiswama Edeke kwaŋin akuare ŋin: naarai aonit emukule bon, konye kojaas akopyo alup kere.
Aso do kolot, kolimo kaki nuka ituŋa ebe, ‘Ŋol loekuriana loemarani, koboŋo konyou da komoru Gilead.’ ” Koboŋosi kotuŋa ituŋa ilukumin akaisaarei ka luarei; kosalata ilukumin itomon.
Kwaŋin koyaŋau ituŋa akipi: kotema EJAKAIT Gideon atiar, “Ŋolituŋanan loemasi akipi kaŋajepeke, kwape emasia ekiŋok, igitari ŋol; ka ŋol da loekukokin aimat.”
Etiai loka ŋul kaluamasete bala ekiŋok, luebwaikinete akanin aitukekec emwaasi akwat auni: konye ituŋa luce kere apotu kokukokinos aimat akipi.
Kotoma EJAKAIT Gideon atiar, “Ketajari jo kituŋa akwat auni luamasete bala ekiŋok, ejaikini Imidianin akanikon: koloto do ŋinituŋanan aiboisike.”
Kitiŋata do ituŋa inyamat kakaninikec, ka arupepenekec: kijuka ituŋa kere luka Isirael ŋinituŋanan owemake, konye abu kitasal ŋul akwat auni: kojaas iidukurun luka Midian kwapukeŋ aditot.
Konye arai ikuriana ijo aijesar, kijesaros ijo ka Pura ekejaanakinanikon oidukurun:
Ipupuni do nuineras kesi; akaulo kaŋun egogoŋioros akonikanin aijesar oidukurun.” Kosodi ŋesi ka Pura ekejaanakinanike aijesar kiton otuŋa luakapakina ejie luajaas osaŋe loka iidukurun.
Koperete Imidianin ka Imalekain ka idwe kere lukokide kaditot bala emaase kanuka aipues; komam ikaalaikec imarunos, kwape asiŋe naejai ariri naka aŋolol kanuka aipues.

Kebu Gideon, koany, ajai etuŋanan loalimonokini oupake airujasit, kobala ebe, “Koany, eruja airujasit, ido koany, bala abu aluŋuret naka emugati loka asairi kikokorun oidukurun luka Midian, kodol owema, kocam ŋes kibiror, kobuburia ŋes, koper ewema.”
Koboŋok oupake ŋes ebe, “Mere ŋin icebore dimarai ekileŋ loka Gideon okoku loka Yoas, etuŋanan loka Isirael: ejaiki EJAKAIT Midian ka ajore kere akanike.”
Kosodi kepupu Gideon inerai airujasit ka apolouke, abu koma Edeke; koboŋo oidukurun luka Isirael, kotema atiar, “Konyoutu; naarai ejaiki EJAKAIT ajore naka Midian akaninikus.”
Kotiak ituŋa akwat auni korioŋeta iuni, kititiŋ kes kere arupepen ka amoti nuamameete iboro kotoma, kibwaik akalasia nuenokete toma amoti.
Kotema kes atiar, “Kosesenai eoŋ, kiswamata kwape kwaŋin; ido koany, naadolio aiboisio nukosaŋe loka iidukurun, kosodi kwape eswamaa eoŋ, iswamaete yesi da kwape kwaŋin.
Naakutakinia arupepe, eoŋ ka ituŋa kere luejaas keoŋ, ikutakinete yesi da arupepen kaŋoliwai kere loka iidukurun, kobalas ebe, ‘Luka EJAKAIT ka luka Gideon da.’ ”

Kokutata irioŋeta iuni arupepen, kobwaŋabwaŋata amoti, kitiŋata akalasia nuenokete kakaninikec nukokediany, ka arupepen kakaninikec nukoteten akusia: kiworoto ebe, “Ekileŋ loka EJAKAIT ka loka Gideen da.”
Kobwaata kesi ŋinituŋanan kaiboisike alukun iidukurun: koker ajore kere; kocelata, kitekerata kes.
Kokutata arupepen akwat auni, abu EJAKAIT koinak ekileŋ loka ŋinituŋanan aitiji oupake, ka ajore kere: koker ajore kiton Bet-sita loebei Serera, kiton oikor loka Abel-mekola, loidunyas kaTabat.
Kotukonokinos ituŋa luka Isirael kotoma Naputali, kotoma Aser, kotoma Manase kere da, kodapata Midian.

Koyaŋaasi ikapolok iarei luka Midian, Oreb ka Seeb; koarakis Oreb moru Oreb, koarakis Seeb acues nakebino naka Seeb, kodapata Midian: koyaut akwes nuka Oreb ka Seeb mama ejai Gideon okekwa loka Yorodan.
Kotema kes atiar, “Eswama anyoika adepar yes? Mere ejokuka luideunos luka imusabibun luka Epuraim adepar luedeŋete luka Abieser?
Ejaiki Edeke ikapolok luka Midian, Oreb ka Seeb, akanikus: anyoika nuabu eoŋ kapedo aswam adepar yes?” Kosodi konyet anyunyurakec aiŋoŋar, kedau ŋesi einer ŋun.
Kobu Gideon Yorodan, kodoka ŋesi ka ituŋa akwat auni luajaas kaŋes, kopasito, konye kodapito.
Kotema ŋesi ituŋa luka Sukot atiar, “Keŋaiŋait, koinakisi ituŋa lukatupito eoŋ imugatin; naarai epasito, ido adapit eoŋ Seba ka Salumuna, ikabakan luka Midian.”
Kotemasi ikapolok luka Sukot atiar, “Ejaas kereka akanin nuka Seba ka Salumuna kwana akanikon, tape sio kiinakini ajorekon imugatin?”
Kotema Gideon atiar, “Kanuka ŋun kedau EJAKAIT aijaikin Seba ka Salumuna akanika, apoopoi eoŋ akusiwat kikukwa luka amodiŋ ka ikodokodo.”
Konyou kanen kolot Penuel, kiner kakes kopone kaŋol; koboŋokis ŋes ituŋa luka Penuel kwape aboŋokinioto ituŋa luka, Sukot.
Kotema ŋesi ituŋa luka Penuel atiar, “Naaboŋunio kainapakin, atiyaikin etogo lo loeoja noi.”
Kolot Gideon korot loka ŋul kalueboiete koweman kari nakokide naka Noba ka Yogibeka, kodany ajore; naarai etumoro ajore.
Kokerata Seba ka Salumuna; kodapa kes; kikam ikabakan iarei luka Midian, Seba ka Salumuna, kitubur ajore kere.
Koboŋ Gideon okoku loka Yoas kojie anyoun kaneedokarere Keres.
Kikam ŋesi ekatumunan lokituŋa luka Sukot, kiŋit ŋes: kitejen ŋes ikapolok luka Sukot ka imakioke, ituŋa akaisakanykaarei ka lukanykaarei.

Kobu neajaas ituŋa luka Sukot, kotema atiar, “Koanyutu Seba ka Salumuna, lukisekelooto yesi eoŋ ebe, Ejaas kereka akanin nuka Seba ka Salumuna akanikon, tape sio kiinakini ikonituŋa luepasito emugati?”
Koyaŋa imakio lukore, ka ikukwa luka amodiŋ ka ikodokodo, kopoopoia ituŋa luka Sukot.
Kotiyaik etogo loeoja noi loka Penuel, koar ituŋa lukore.
Kotema atiar, “Araas kesi ikainacan, odwe luka totoka; kwape ejaria EJAKAIT, arai kitajarito yesi kes, ti mam eoŋ kaar yes.”
Kotema ŋesi Yeter ekiyaike atiar, “Konyou, koar kes.” Konye mam abu ekatumunan kout ekekileŋ: naarai akuriana, naarai ariŋa erai ekatumunan.

Kosodete Seba ka Salumuna atemar ebe, “Konyou ijo, koar sio: naarai kwape ejaar etuŋanan, akegogoŋ da ejai kwaŋin.” Konyou Gideon, koar Seba ka Salumuna, koyaŋa apelia nuajaas omurisiŋa luka ikaalaikec.
Kosodete ituŋa luka Isirael atemar Gideon atiar, “Koyaai ijo sio, ijo ka okokukon, ka okoku loka okokukon da: naarai kitajar ijo sio kakan naka Midian.”
Kotema Gideon kes atiar, “Mam akoto ayait yes, karaida okokuka ayait yes: EJAKAIT ŋes kiyai yes.”
Kotema Gideon kes atiar, “Ejai naakoto ailip yes, koinakinai ŋinituŋanan itetioke luŋatuna.” (Naarai ajaas kes itetio, naarai araas Isimaelin.)
Koboŋokis ebe, “Kiinakini kes ketau kaloejok.” Kopesikis egoe, kocakanakis nen ŋinituŋanan itetioke luŋatuna.
Alaŋiru naka itetio luka esabu luabu kilip arai isekelin
Kiswamau Gideon kes epod,
Kwaŋin kitononokata idwe luka Isirael Midian kakonyenekec, mama bobo apotu kikeut akecekwes. Kiyeŋ akwap kapaarasia nuka Gideon.
Kolot Yerubaal okoku loka Yoas kiboikin togoke.
Ajaas Gideon odwe luaurie ŋesi akaisakanykaarei: naarai epu ŋes aŋor.
Abu akebusiat naajai Sekem kourik ŋes esapat, komaik ekekiror Abimelek.
Kotwana Gideon okoku loka Yoas kedau aibut ejok, kidaikinai ates naka Yoas papake, toma Opura loka Ibieserain.
Mam idwe luka Isirael apotu kiitut EJAKAIT Ekecedeke, loayuun kes kakanin nuka lukasurupokec kere kaŋoliwai:
Karaida aikonakin kasianut ekal loka Yerubaal, ŋes Gideon, kwape ejaatar nukajokak kere nuabu ŋesi kikonak Isirael.

“Keŋaiŋaito, kinerata kaki kere nuka ituŋa luka Sekem ebe, ‘Arai kijokikinito yes odwe kere luka Yerubaal luimwaasi ituŋa akaisakanykaarei, ayaite yes, arai bo ediopet ayaite yes?’ Kiitutu da ebe arai eoŋ akoitikus ka akiriŋikus.”
Kinerata iinacan luka totoke nukeŋ aki kere nuka ituŋa luka Sekem akiro ŋun kere: kokotos ikecetauon atupar Abimelek; naarai abalas ebe, “Erai onacewok.”
Koinakis ŋul ŋes atutubeta akaisakanykaarei nuka epuesa nualemunete kotogo loka Baal-berit, nuabu Abimelek koropia ituŋa luutai luebenen, luatupito ŋes.
Kolot Opura ore loka papake, koarak ikeinacan odwe luka Yerubaal, luemwaasi ituŋa akaisakanykaarei, amoru adiopet: konye kideun Yotam eŋoorit loka Yerubaal; naarai abu koŋop.
Kotukokinos ituŋa kere luka Sekem, ka ekal kere loka Milo, koloto kitaraut Abimelek ekabaka, kaneedunyas kelua loka epir loajai Sekem.
Kolosek apotu ikito koloto ainyonyoikin ekabaka akinyet ayaite kes; kotemasi eseitun atiar, ‘Koyaai ijo sio.’
Konye kotema eseitun kes atiar, ‘Enyeini kereka eoŋ akinyeteka naitopolonorere Edeke ka ituŋanan, kasodi alosit aijaŋijaŋa kokito?’
Kotemasi ikito etini atiar, ‘Bia ijo koyaai sio.’
Konye kotema etini kes atiar, ‘Enyeini kereka eoŋ akajijim, ka araitoka nukajokak, kasodi alosit aijaŋijaŋa kokito?’
Kotemasi ikito emusabibu atiar, ‘Bia ijo, koyaai sio.’
Kotema emusabibu kes atiar, ‘Enyeini kereka ebinoka, loitalakarit Edeke ka ituŋanan, kasodi alosit aijaŋijaŋa kokito?’
Kosodete ikito kere atemar etirir atiar, ‘Bia ijo, koyaai sio.’
Kotema etirir ikito atiar, ‘Arai kinyonyoikinete yesi eoŋ akinyet kotoma abeit araun ekabakakus, kopotu do komunokinos etolimika: arai bo mam, kolom do akim kotirir, konyama iresia luka Lebanon.’
(Naarai abu papaka kojiik yes komam epod aijarake, koyu da yes kakan naka Midian:

Inyoutu do yesi lolo asurokin ekal loka papaka, iarakis odweke, ituŋa akaisakanykaarei, amoru adiopet, itarautu da Abimelek okoku loka abusiatake ekabaka loeyait ituŋa luka Sekem, naarai erai onacekus;)
Arai iswamakinito yesi Yerubaal ka ekaleke lolo nukabeit ka nuetenito, kolelata do yesi kotoma Abimelek, ŋesi da kolele kotomakus:
Konye arai mam, kolom do akim kotoma Abimelek, konyama ituŋa luka Sekem, ka ekal loka Milo; kolom da akim kotoma otuŋa luka Sekem, kotoma okal loka Milo, konyama Abimelek.”
Kosi Yotam, koker, kolot Beer, kiboi kaŋina, kanuka akurian Abimelek onaceke.
Kopolok Abimelek Isirael ikar iuni.
Kijuk Edeke emoyo loerono kidiŋ Abimelek ka ituŋa luka Sekem; kiswamakis ituŋa luka Sekem Abimelek nuka aiŋal:

Tetere edolete nukadedeŋ nuaponi kiswamakinai odwe akaisakanykaarei luka Yerubaal, tetere da itebeo aokotokec Abimelek onacekec, loaari kes, itebeo da ituŋa luka Sekem, luetogogoŋete akaninike aiar iinacanake.
Kibwaikis ituŋa luka Sekem ikaperunok ŋes aidia nuka iroŋan, koŋatata kere luetorete orot ŋol: kolimokinai Abimelek.
Kobu Gaal okoku loka Ebed ka iinacanake, koloto Sekem: komunokinos ŋes ituŋa luka Sekem.
Kolomasi omanikor, kodeŋoto imusabibunukec, kicakacakata imusabibun, kipooto epucit, kolomasi togo loka edekekec, konyamata komatata, kikenoto Abimelek.

Kotema Gaal okoku loka Ebed atiar, “Iŋai bo Abimelek, iŋai da Sekem, tape sio kijaanakini ŋes? Mere ŋes okoku loka Yerubaal? ka Sebul ekiyakiake? ijaanakinete yesi ituŋa luka Kamor papa loka Sekem: konye sio kanukinyo tikijaanakinia ŋes?
Karai kejaas ituŋa lu akanika! Tikalema Abimelek.” Kotema ŋesi Abimelek atiar, “Kiyatak akonijore, kolom.”
Kepupu Sebul ekayaiton ere akiro nuka Gaal okoku loka Ebed, abu akenyunyura kinep.
Abu kijukak Abimelek ikiyakia kaiyeiyea ebe, “Koany, apotu Gaal okoku loka Ebed ka ikeinacan Sekem; ido koany, etiŋaikis ere asurokin jo.
Aso do, konyou kuare, ijo ka ituŋa luejaas kajo, koperut kamanat:
Kosodi tupuruc, atipet naeniunia akoloŋ, kodilok ijo anyoun asurokin ere: ido koany, kelomut ŋesi kituŋa luejaas kaŋes asurokin jo, iswamakini do ijo kes kwape itojokia.”
Konyou Abimelek kuare, ka ituŋa kere luajaas kaŋes, koperut Sekem korioŋeta iwoŋon.
Koloma Gaal okoku loka Ebed, kobwo korute kaneelomarere ore: konyou Abimelek ka ituŋa kere luajaas kaŋes kaneaperunitotor.
Nakeanyunia Gaal ituŋa, kotema ŋesi Sebul atiar, “Koany, ijesuna ituŋa kaidia nuka iroŋan.” Kotema Sebul ŋes atiar, “gseseni ijo etolim loka iroŋan kosubite bala ituŋa.”
Kinera Gaal bobo ebe, “Koany, ijesuna ituŋa kokidiŋ kakwap, itorunit erioŋet ediopet orot loka elua loka Meonenim.”
Kosodi Sebul atemar ŋes atiar, “Ai bo kwana ejai aitukukon, naibalar ebe, ‘Iŋai bo Abimelek, tape sio kijaanakini ŋes?’ Mere ŋul ituŋa luimwaŋit ijo? Keŋaiŋait, koloma cabo do kitiji kes.”
Koloma Gaal kakonyen nuka ituŋa luka Sekem, kitiji Abimelek.
Kodap Abimelek ŋes, koker kakonyeneke, kibiroros luipu luemusuŋitai, kiton neelomarere orute.
Kiboikin Abimelek Aruma: kireŋea Sebul Gaal ka iinacanake, kinyeis aiboi koSekem.
Kosodi kanen, kapaaran naatupakini kolomas ituŋa amanat; kolimokis kesi Abimelek.
Koyaŋa ituŋa, kotiak kes kotoma orioŋeta iuni, koperut kamanat; kosesen, ido koany, kolomut ituŋa kore; konyou asurokin kes, kodany kes.
Kokubokinos Abimelek ka irioŋeta luajaas kaŋes, kobwaata korute kaneelomarere ore: kokerata irioŋeta iarei neajaas ŋul kere luajaas amanat, kodanyata kes.
Kitiji Abimelek ere apaaran ŋin kere; kirum ere, koar ituŋa luajaas toma; kotiyatiya ere, koyeik abalaŋ.
Kolimokinai Abimelek ebe etukokina ituŋa kere lukotogo loeoja loka Sekem.

Kodoka Abimelek moru Salumon, ŋes ka ituŋa kere luajaas kaŋes; kitiŋ aep kakanike, kojep atenu kokito, kitiŋ ŋes, kibwaik okeperike: kotema ituŋa luajaas kaŋes atiar, “Nuianyutu eoŋ eswamai, kisunyito yesi da, kiswamata kwape kwaŋin.”

Kosodete ituŋa kere ajepun ŋinituŋanan aketenut, kotupasi Abimelek, kogaŋata kes abur, kinokokis akim aicweia abur; kotwakata do ituŋa kere lukotogo loeoja loka Sekem, kwape elukumit, ikiliok ka aŋor.
Konye ajai etogo loeoja loagogoŋ toma ore, apotu ikiliok ka aŋor kere kokereasi ŋina, ka ŋul kere lukore, kogoloros kotoma, kodokasi oswi loka etogo loeoja.
Kobu Abimelek togo loeoja, kitiji ŋes, kikunyak okek loka etogo loeoja aicwe ŋes.
Abu aberu adiopet kocakak atapen akou naka Abimelek, kobwaŋ abelekek naka akouke.
Kosodi ŋesi anyaraun katipet ekatumunan loadakit lujiisike, kotema ŋes atiar, “Kout ekileŋikon koar eoŋ, kinyeis ituŋa atemar ebe, ‘Aberu aari ŋes.’ ” Kicum ekatumunanike ŋes aipelor, kotwana.
Keanyut ituŋa luka Isirael ebe atwana Abimelek, koloto ŋinituŋanan aiboisike.
Kwaŋin abu Edeke kinyaŋ aronis naka Abimelek, naabu kiswamak papake, kanuka aiar iinacanake akaisakanykaarei.
Aronis kere naka ituŋa luka Sekem abu Edeke kinyaŋ kakwesikec: abu kobunok kes ekenit loka Yotam okoku loka Yerubaal.
Abu kotubok Isirael ikar akaisaarei kaluuni, kotwana, kidaikinai Samir.
Akauloke konyou Yair, Egileadit; abu kotubok Isirael ikar akaisaarei ka luarei.
Ajaas ŋes odweke akaisauni luebwanenenete isigirian akaisauni, ajaas kes ireria akaisauni, luemaikinitai Kabot-yair kiton lolo, luejaas akwap naka Gilead.
Kotwana Yair, kidaikinai Kamon.
Kinep anyunyura naka EJAKAIT aluikin Isirael, kogwela kes akan naka Ipilisitian, akan da naka idwe luka Amon.
Apotu kisiyaloŋoŋoto koroikis da idwe luka Isirael kokaru kaŋol: apotu koroikis idwe kere luka Isirael luajaas okekwa loka Yorodan akwap naka Imorain naejai Gilead, ikar itomon ka lukanykauni.
Kodokasi idwe luka Amon Yorodan alosit aitiji Yuda ka Benyamin, ka ekal loka Epuraim; kwaŋin kiyaloŋoŋ noi Isirael.
Kotema EJAKAIT idwe luka Isirael atiar, “Mam kereka eoŋ abu ketajar yes kaneejaas Imisirian, ka Imorain, ka idwe luka Amon, ka Ipilisitian?
Apotu Isidonin da, ka Imalekain, ka Imaonin koroikis yes; ipotu komonyata kaneajai, abu eoŋ ketajar yes kakanikec.
Konye kijalata eoŋ, ijaanakis icedekesio: kanuka ŋun mam bobo ketajar yes.
Koloto komonyata mama ejaas idekesio luiseutu; kitajarata do kesi yes kapak naka icanikus.”
Kotemasi idwe luka Isirael EJAKAIT atiar, “Kidiaka; kiswamakinai ijo sio nuitojokit ijo; konye kiŋaiŋait, koyuunai sio lolo.”
Kolemasi idekesio lumo kamakec, kijaanakis EJAKAIT: kokadak eketau kanuka ican luka Isirael.
Kosodete idwe luka Amon atukokin, kidukuroto Gilead. Kotukokinos idwe luka Isirael da, kidukuroto Misipa.
Kotemanaros ituŋa, kes ikapolok luka Gilead ebe, “Iŋai etuŋanan loegei aitiji idwe luka Amon? Eraun ŋol ekapolon loka luiboiete koGilead kere.”

Kourik aberu naka Gilead ŋes idwe lusap; kosodi kepolooros odwe luka aberuke, apotu kireŋeasi Yeputa, kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Mam jo idumuni airumet kokal loka papawok; naarai irai ijo okoku loka aceberu.”
Kosodi Yeputa akerit kaneajaas iinacanake, kiboikin akwap naka Tob: kotukokinos ituŋa luutai neejai Yeputa, kolomasi nepepe kaŋes.
Kosodi kanen ketuboros apaarasia, kitijioto idwe luka Amon Isirael.
Kosodi kitijioto idwe luka Amon Isirael, apotu imakio luka Gilead koloto aomare Yeputa kakwap naka Tob.
Kotemasi Yeputa atiar, “Bia, koraun ekosijakait, tetere kitijie idwe luka Amon.”
Kotema Yeputa imakio luka Gilead atiar, “Mere ipotu yesi kolaata eoŋ, kireŋeasi da kokal loka papaka? Kanukinyo do iponiata neajar eoŋ naijaatar ocan?”
Kotemasi ŋes imakio luka Gilead atiar, “Kanuka ŋun ŋes kiboŋunio mamakon, tetere ilosi kasio aitiji idwe luka Amon, iraun ijo lokapolonikosi loiyait luiboiete koGilead kere.”
Kotema Yeputa imakio luka Gilead atiar, “Arai kiinyakasi yesi eoŋ ore aitiji idwe luka Amon, kosodi EJAKAIT aijaikin kes eoŋ, araun kereka eoŋ lokapolonikus?”
Kotemasi imakio luka Gilead Yeputa atiar, “EJAKAIT, ŋes ekajenaniwok; abeit kiswamai kwape ejaar akonikirot.”
Kosodi Yeputa alosit kimakio luka Gilead, kodakakis ituŋa ŋes araun ekapolon, ejakait da loeyait kes: kiner Yeputa akiroke kere kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT koMisipa.
Kijuka Yeputa ikiyakia mama ejai ekabaka loka idwe luka Amon ebe, “Inyo bo kimariai ijo keoŋ, tape ijo ibuni mamakaŋ aitiji akakwap?”

Koboŋok ekabaka loka idwe luka Amon ikiyakia luka Yeputa ebe, “Naarai abu Isirael koyaŋa akakwap, anyoun koArunon kiton Yabok, kiton Yorodan da, naalomunio koMisiri: aso kinyakakinai akwapin ŋun kainapakin.”
Kijuka Yeputa ikiyakia bobo mama ejai ekabaka loka idwe luka Amon:
Kotema ŋes atiar, “Inera Yeputa kwanata ebe: Mam Isirael abu koyaŋa akwap naka Moab karaida akwap naka idwe luka Amon:
Konye naaponiata kesi koMisiri, abu Isirael kitor amodiŋ kiton Aŋolol Nakareŋan, kodol Kades;

Kosodi Isirael aijukakin ekabaka loka Edom ikiyakia ebe, ‘Keŋaiŋait, kocamakinai ketor akwapukon’: konye mam ekabaka loka Edom abu kopup, Kwape kwaŋin kijuka mama ejai ekabaka loka Moab: konye mam abu kocam: kiboikin Isirael Kades.

Kosodi aitor amodiŋ, kiriria akwap naka Edom, ka akwap naka Moab, kobu kariri nakokide naka akwap naka Moab, kidukuroto juwai naka Arunon; konye mam apotu kolomasi oikor loka Moab, naarai Arunon ŋes arai eikor loka Moab.
Kijuka Isirael ikiyakia mama ejai Sikon ekabaka loka Imorain, ekabaka loka Kesibon; kotema Isirael ŋes atiar, ‘Kiŋaiŋait, kocamak sio ketoroto akwapukon adolore akwapukosi.’
Konye mam abu Sikon komunokin Isirael aitor oikoruke: konye abu Sikon kotukok iketuŋa kere, kidukuru Yakas, kitiji Isirael.
Abu EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael kijaik Sikon ka iketuŋa kere akan naka Isirael, kodanyata kes: kwaŋin kirum Isirael akwap kere naka Imorain lueboienenete kakwap kaŋin.
Kirumata eikor kere loka Imorain, anyoun koArunon kiton Yabok, anyoun kamodiŋ da kiton Yorodan.
Aso abu EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael kodema Imorain airumetekec kakonyen nuka iketuŋa Isirael, ikoto do ijo airum kes?
Mam kereka jo irumi nukiinakini Kemos ekonideke jo airum? Aso ŋul luadema EJAKAIT Ekosideke airumetakec kakonyenekosi, ŋul kes kirumi isio.
Itelekarit kereka ijo Balak okoku loka Sipor, ekabaka loka Moab? Abu ŋesi kitepeg Isirael, arai bo abu ŋesi kitiji kes?
Naeboio Isirael koKesibon ka ireriake, koAroer da ka ireriake, koreria da kere luejaas osiep loka Arunon, ikar akwat auni; kanukinyo mam yes ipotu kinyakariata kes kapak kaŋin?
Kanuka ŋun mam eoŋ adiakit kamakon, konye iswamakinit ijo eoŋ erono aitiji eoŋ: EJAKAIT, Ekatubon, ŋes etubokini lolo idwe luka Isirael ka idwe luka Amon.”
Konye mam ekabaka loka idwe luka Amon abu kopup akiro nuejukakinit Yeputa ŋes.
Kiyapoik Yeputa EJAKAIT aiyaposit ebe, “Arai kijaik ijo cut idwe luka Amon akanika.
Ejaun do ebe, ŋin yenelomuni kokekia luka ekatogo aisiriam eoŋ, naaboŋunio kainapakin kaneejaas idwe luka Amon, eraun ŋin yenika EJAKAIT, ainakini ŋes araun ainakinet naicweio.”
Kwaŋin kotubor Yeputa mama ejaas idwe luka Amon aitiji kes; kijaik EJAKAIT kes akanike.
Kodany kes anyoun koAroer kiton naidolio Minit, ireria akaisaarei, kiton Abel-keramim, kaario naepol noi, Kwaŋin kitononokai idwe luka Amon kakonyen nuka idwe luka Isirael.

Kosodi kanen keanyu ŋesi ŋes, abu kocil ikenapen, kotema atiar, “Otukwi, akokuka! Kitisil ijo eoŋ noi, irai ijo adiopet kotoma kaŋul lukesiyaloŋoŋoete eoŋ: naarai aooŋ akaituk mama ejai EJAKAIT, mam apedori aijulakin.”
Kotema ŋin ŋes atiar, “Papa, iwooŋ akoniituk mama ejai EJAKAIT; kiswamakinai eoŋ kwape ejaatar ŋun nualomunete kaitukukon; naarai kisinyaŋa EJAKAIT jo kaneejaas lukasurupokon, kes idwe luka Amon.”
Kotema ŋin papake atiar, “Kiswamakinai na: kinyeinai ber ilapio iarei, tetere alosi aijesar oroŋan, aimony abekonutuka, eoŋ ka apaupaka.”
Kotema atiar, “Ape bo.” Kotwara ŋes adaun ilapio iarei: kolot, ŋes ka apaupake, komony abekonutuke koroŋan.
Kosodi kanen kedaunos ilapio iarei, koboŋ ŋin neejai papake, lokiswamak ŋes kwape ajaar aiyapositike naeyapoikinit; mam ŋin abu kojeni ekiliokit. Koraun epone kotoma Isirael,
adwe nuka Isirael alosenen ŋolikaru akiitunun akoku naka Yeputa Egileadit apaarasia aoŋon ŋolikaru.
Kotema Yeputa kes atiar, “Kipou eoŋ ka ikatuŋa kapegata noi kidwe luka Amon; kaanyarau yes, mam ipotu kitajarata eoŋ kakanikec.
Kaany eoŋ ebe mam ipotu kitajarata eoŋ, abu kebwaik aijaraka akanika, kasodi atubor asurokin idwe luka Amon, kejaik EJAKAIT kes akanika: kanukinyo do iponitotor mama ajai lolo aitiji eoŋ?”

Kosodi Yeputa atukokin ituŋa luka Gilead kere, kitiji Epuraim: kodanyata ituŋa luka Gilead ituŋa luka Epuraim, naarai abalas ebe, “Iraas yesi luisiito koEpuraim, yes Igileadin, kokidiŋ Epuraim, kokidiŋ da kaManase,”

Kikamut Igileadin idoketa luka Yorodan luebeete Epuraim: kojaun do ebe, naatemaria ŋinidiopet kotoma kaluasiito luka Epuraim ebe, “Kocamakinai katubor,” atemarete ituŋa luka Gilead ŋes atiar, “Irai ijo Epuraimit?” Arai ketema ebe, “Mam”:

Atemarete kesi ŋes atiar, “Aso kolim cani ebe, Shibolet”; kolimuni ŋesi ebe, “Sibolet”; naarai mam apedorit alimun kojokan; kosodete do aikamun ŋes, aarakin odoketa luka Yorodan; kotwakata kapak kaŋin luka Epuraim ilukumin akaisaoŋon ka ilukumin iarei.
Kotubok Yeputa Isirael ikar ikanykape. Kotwana Yeputa Egileadit, kidaikinai ore ediopet koreria luka Gilead.
Kotubok Ibisan loka Bet-lekem Isirael atupakin ŋes.
Ajaas ŋes odwe akaisauni, abu kokora adweke akaisauni, kosodi amanyakin odweke apesur akaisauni. Abu ŋesi kotubok Isirael ikar ikanykaarei.
Kotwana Ibisan, kidaikinai Bet-lekem.
Kotubok Elon Esebulunit Isirael atupakin ŋes; abu ŋesi kotubok Isirael ikar itomon.
Kotwana Elon Esebulunit, kidaikinai Aiyalon akwap naka Sebulun.
Kotubok Abudon okoku loka Kilel Epiratonit Isirael atupakin ŋes.
Ajaas ŋes odweke akaisaoŋon ka odwe akaisauni luka odweke, luebwanenenete isigirian akaisakanykaarei: abu ŋesi kotubok Isirael ikar ikanykauni.
Kotwana Abudon okoku loka Kile! Epiratonit, kidaikinai Piraton akwap naka Epuraim, akwap nakiukon naka Imalekain.
Ajai etuŋanan loka Sora loka ekek loka Idanin, ekekiror Manoa; arai akeberu arakan, mam aurie.
Kitakanikin emalaika loka EJAKAIT aberu, kotema ŋes atiar, “Aso koany, irai ijo arakan, mam iwurie; konye ipotuuni, iwuruuni ikoku yenisapat.
Aso cado kocoite, keŋaiŋait, sirikimat ebino karaida nuitemerete, sirikinyam da idiobore yenimam elai:
Naarai koany, ipotuuni ijo, iwuruuni ikoku yenisapat; mam ejutet icaki akouke: naarai eraun ikoku Enasirit loka Edeke ageun kakoik: egeuni da ŋesi aitajar Isirael kakan naka Ipilisitian.”

Kosodi aberu abunore alimokin okilenike ebe, “Abu etuŋanan loka Edeke kobu neajai, akekonyen koputos bala akonyen nuka emalaika loka Edeke, loeyoŋitai; mam abu keŋitu ŋes neabunio, karaida ŋes alimokin eoŋ ekekiror.

Konye abu katema eoŋ atiar, ‘Koany, ipotuuni, iwuruuni ikoku yenisapat; sirikimat ebino karaida nuitemerete, sirikinyam da idiobore yenimam elai: naarai eraun ikoku Enasarit loka Edeke ageun kakoik kiton apaaran naka atwanareke.’ ”
Kosodi Manoa ailip EJAKAIT ebe, “Wu EJAKAIT, keŋaiŋait, koboŋ bobo etuŋanan loka Edeke loibu kijuk mamakosi, kisisianak isio nukiswamakini ikoku yeneuruunio.”
Kopup Edeke eporoto loka Manoa; koboŋ emalaika loka Edeke mama ejai aberu iboie komanikor: konye mam okilenike Manoa ajaas kaŋes.
Kiwonya aberu koker, kolimok okilenike, kotema ŋes atiar, “Koany, ketakanikin eoŋ etuŋanan loabunit neajai eoŋ apaaran ya,”
Konyou Manoa, kotup akeberu, kodol neejai etuŋanan, kotema ŋes atiar, “gjo ŋes etuŋanan loineras kaberu?” Koboŋok ebe, “Eoŋ lopelo.”
Kotema Manoa atiar, “Aso kedolot akonikiro, kekonakisi ai ikoku, ido anyoin aswamuke?”
Kotema emalaika loka EJAKAIT Manoa atiar, “Kocoite aberu ŋun kere nuabu kalimok ŋes.
Siri ŋes kenyam ibore yenelomuni komusabibu, karaida aimat ebino, arai nuitemerete, karaida ainyam idiobore yenimam elai; koric ŋesi kere nuecorakinit ŋes.”

Kotema emalaika loka EJAKAIT Manoa atiar, “Karaida kasala, mam anyami atapakon: arai ikoto apuikin ainakinet naicweio, ibusakinit ijo ainakin ŋes EJAKAIT.” Naarai mam Manoa ajeni ebe erai ŋesi emalaika loka EJAKAIT.
Kotema Manoa emalaika loka EJAKAIT atiar, “Iŋai bo ekonikiror, tetere kitopoloori jo kedolot akonikiro?”
Kotema emalaika loka EJAKAIT ŋes atiar, “Kanukinyo iŋisitor ijo ekakiror, naarai erai lokaumokin?”
Koyaŋa Manoa ikalol ka ainakineteke naka akiria, koinak EJAKAIT komoru: kiswama emalaika nukaumokin, kosesenata Manoa ka akeberu.
Naarai kedoka akim kiton akuj anyoun kotem, abu emalaika loka EJAKAIT kodokaria kakim naka etem: kosesenata Manoa ka akeberu; kibiroros kwap ebuburia.
Kotema Manoa akeberu atiar, “Abeit kitwaki, naarai kianyu Edeke.”

Konye kotema akeberu ŋes atiar, “Arai kitojokit EJAKAIT aiar oni, timam kecamu ainakinet naicweio ka ainakinet naka akiria kakaniwok, timam da kiitodik oni akiro nu kere, timam kiilimok oni kapak kana akiro nuikote nen.”
Kouru aberu ikoku yenisapat, komaik ekekiror Samuson: kopoloor ikoku, kisirereŋ EJAKAIT ŋes.
Kogeu emoyo loka EJAKAIT aijukit ŋes koMakanedan, kidiŋ Sora ka Esitaol.
Koboŋ, kolimok papake ka totoke atiar, “Aany apese koTimuna naka adwe nuka Ipilisitian: aso do komanyakinai ŋes.”

Kosodete papake ka totoke atemar ŋes atiar, “Emamei do apese kadwe nuka iinacanakon, arai kotuŋaka kere, tape jo ilosi aimany aberu naka Ipilisitian lumam ekepep?” Kotema Samuson papake atiar, “Komanyakinai ŋes; naarai kesiyalamikinit eoŋ noi.”
Kosodi Samuson alosit. Ka papake ka totoke Timuna, kodol amanat nuka emusabibu nuka Timuna: ido koany, abu eŋatuny losorokany kogat asurokin ŋes.
Kodoik ŋes emoyo loka EJAKAIT kagogoŋ, kopooia ŋes kwape tikepooiara ikalol, komamei ibore kakanike: konye mam abu kolimok papake karaida totoke nuabu kiswama.
Kolot, kinerata kapese; abu ŋesi kisiyalamik noi Samuson.
Ketubor apak, abu koboŋo ayaŋaar ŋes, kopaa aanyun akuan nakatwan naka eŋatuny: ido koany, ajai enene loka ao akuan naka eŋatuny, ka esik.
Kitiŋ ŋes kakaninike, kiyatak alosit, konyami kolosi, kodolok papake ka totoke, koinak kes, konyamata: konye mam abu kolimok kes ebe alemuni ŋesi esik kakuan naka eŋatuny.
Kolot papake neejai apese: kipo Samuson epucit kanen; naarai atapit ikatumunak aswam kwaŋin.
Kosodi kanen, keanyut ŋes, apotu koyaut ipaup akaisauni ajaut kaŋes.

Kotema Samuson kes atiar, “Akoto eoŋ alimokin yes asogol: arai kipedosi yesi aitejenun ŋes kotoma apaarasia akanykaarei nuka epucit, ka aitebeikin ŋes, kainakini do yes igoen akaisauni luka ebaputa, ka inapen akaisauni luibusiak:
Konye arai mam ipedorete aitejenun ŋes, kiinakinete do yesi eoŋ igoen akaisauni luka ebaputa, ka inapen akaisauni luibusiak.” Kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Kolim cani asogol, kapuputu.”
Kotema kes atiar,
“Alom akiriŋ kaneejai yenikanyaman,
Alom da awiiny kaneejai yenikagogoŋon.”
Mam apotu kopedosi aitejenun asogol kotoma apaarasia auni.

Komony aberu naka Samuson kakonyeneke, kotema atiar, “Kilait ijo eoŋ, mam kimina eoŋ: ilimok idwe luka ikatuŋa asogol, komam kilimokinit eoŋ.” Kotema ŋes atiar, “Koany, mam alimokinit papaka karaida totoka, ido konyet jo ŋes kalimokini?”
Komony kakonyeneke apaarasia akanykaarei nuajaar epucit: kosodi kanen kapaaran nakikanyetekaarei, abu kolimok ŋes, naarai abu kimaima ŋes noi: kolimok ŋin idwe luka iketuŋa asogol.
Kapaaran nakikanyetekaarei eroko akoloŋ kelomara, apotu ituŋa lukore kolimokis ŋes ebe,
“Inyo bo ewiny adepar esik?
Inyo bo egogoŋ adepar eŋatuny?”
Kotema kes atiar,
“Kedim yes aitokor ataokoka,
Timam kitejenut akasogol.”
Konye aponi aberu naka Samuson kokorakinai aupake, loanaikinit araut opaperoke.
Kotema papa loka ŋin atiar, “Abeit abu kaomite ebe ila ijo ŋes cut; kanuka ŋun abu kakorak ŋes aupakon: mam kinacike nadidi ejok adepar ŋes? Keŋaiŋait, koyaŋa ŋin aiboisike.”
