Kotema Samuson kes atiar, “Emameun eoŋ akirot irwan na kaneejaas Ipilisitian, naameŋerekinia kes.”
Kolot Samuson kikam ikuei akwat auni, kolem akalasia, kiteteik ikorio, koenik akalas kidiŋ kaŋulukorio iarei.
Kosodi kedau ŋesi aisinepikin akalasia, abu koosik kes alosit akima nuka Ipilisitian, kicwe ikes, ka akima nuabwoete, ka iseitunin da.

Kosodete Ipilisitian atemar ebe, “Iŋai eswama nu?” Kotemasi atiar, “Samuson, ekamuran loka Etimunit, naarai abu koyaŋa akeberu, kosodi akorakin aupake.” Kopotu Ipilisitian, kicweata ŋes ka papake kakim.
Kotema Samuson atiar, “Arai iswamaete yesi nuikote nen, abeit enyaŋar eoŋ kamakus, kasodi konyet apalar.”
Kodany kes noi, jokan, aiar naepol: kolot kiboikin acilet naka emoru loka Etam.
Kosodete Ipilisitian alosit, kidukuroto Yuda, kisiarakinos toma Leki.
Kotemasi ituŋa luka Yuda atiar, “Kanukinyo iponiata yesi asurokin sio?” Kotemasi atiar, “Kiponit ajen Samuson, aiswamakin ŋes kwape abu ŋesi kiswamakinia sio.”

Kosodete ituŋa ilukumin iuni luka Yuda alosit acilet naka emoru Etam, kotemasi Samuson atiar, “Mam jo ijeni ebe Ipilisitian kes kiyaito oni? Inyo bo do yen yenikiswamak ijo sio?” Kotema kes atiar, “Kwape keswamakiniata eoŋ, eswamak eoŋ da kes kwaŋin.”
Kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Kiponit ajen jo, tetere kijaikini jo kakan naka Ipilisitian.” Kotema Samuson atiar, “Kiyapoikinoi eoŋ ebe, mam yes ikulepek kiarete eoŋ.”
Kolimokis ŋes atiar, “Mam; konye kieni ber isio jo kagogoŋ, kijaikini jo akanikec: konye abeit mam sio kiari jo.” Koenata ŋes kaunoi aarei nukitetiak, koyaut ŋes komoru.
Kedol ŋesi Leki, kibwoŋakis Ipilisitian iriamunos kaŋes: kodoik ŋes emoyo loka EJAKAIT kagogoŋ, kosubata aunoi nuajaas akaninike bala abira nuicweio kakim, kodooto aenetake kakaninike.
Kodum abokony nakitetet naka asigiria, korio akekan, kitiŋ, kodanyia ituŋa elukumit.
Kotema Samuson atiar,
“Kabokony naka asigiria, atukon katukon,
Adany ituŋa elukumit kabokony naka asigiria.”
Kosodi kanen kedau ŋesi einer, kocaka abokony kakanike: komaikinai aibois ŋin Ramat-leki.
Konye kocil Edeke aipany naejai Leki, kolomut akip kanen; kedau aimat, Koboŋok bobo ekemoyo, kikwar: ŋes do amaikinere ekirorike En-kakore,
Abu ŋesi kotubok Isirael kapaarasia nuka Ipilisitian ikar akaisaarei.
Kolot Samuson Gasa, koany kaŋina naadote, koloma mamakeŋ.
Kolimokinai Igasan ebe, “Abu Samuson ne.” Kolukutu ŋes, koperut ŋes akuare kere korute lokore, kililiŋata akuare kere, kobalas ebe, “Kiwala akwap, kiari ŋes.”
Koper Samuson kiton kidiŋebai, konyou kidiŋebai, kitiŋ ikirigin luka erute lokore, ka ategerio aarei, kouto kes, ka atiket da, korioŋak kes okeperinike, kodaka kes aidi naka eroŋat loitei Keburon.
Kosodi kanen akaulo kaŋun, abu ŋesi kominak aberu kaditot naka Sorek, ekekiror Delila.

Kopotu ijaka luka Ipilisitian neejai ŋin, kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Kijodijod ŋes, kojen neelomunitor akegogoŋ naepol, ka epone lokipedoria aipikor ŋes, tetere kipedori ajen ŋes aitican ŋes: kiinakini isio jo ŋinidiopet kasio atutubeta akwat atomon kanadiopet luka epuesa.”
Kotema Delila Samuson atiar, “Keŋaiŋait, kolimokinai neelomunitor akonigogoŋ naepol, ka epone lokienere jo aitican.”
Kotema Samuson ŋes atiar, “Arai kaenata kesi eoŋ kigegoi ikanykaarei luepalal lumam itoonitoi, ŋes kito akalanyanaror eoŋ, kiputokin kalucetuŋa.”
Kosodete ijaka luka Ipilisitian ainun ŋin igegoi ikanykaarei luepalal lumam itoonitoi, koenia ŋin ŋes.
Ajaas ŋin ikaperunok agola nakotoma. Kotema ŋin ŋes atiar, “Samuson, kibunokis jo Ipilisitian.” Koŋed igegoi kwape eŋedar eusi loka amujajut ketiro akim. Kwaŋin mam akegogoŋ ajenio.
Kotema Delila Samuson atiar, “Koany, kimod ijo eoŋ, kilimokinit da nuka aisab: aso keŋaiŋait, kolimokinai epone lokienere jo.”
Kotema ŋes atiar, “Arai kaenata kesi eoŋ kaunoi nukitetiak numam itwasamatai adioswam, ŋes kito akalanyanaror eoŋ, kiputokin kalucetuŋa.”
Kolem Delila aunoi nukitetiak, koenia ŋes, kotema atiar, “Samuson, kibunokis jo Ipilisitian.” Kiboiete ikaperunok kagola nakotoma. Koŋeda kes kakaninike bala eusi.

Kotema Delila Samuson atiar, “Okwe, kimod ijo eoŋ kiton kwana, kilimokinit da nuka aisab: kolimokinai epone lokienere jo.” Kotema ŋes atiar, “Arai kicipak ijo ikatim luieipitai irwan akanykaarei oboro luicipi.”
Abu ŋin kiketak ŋul keloit, kotema ŋes atiar, “Samuson, kibunokis jo Ipilisitian.” Kokweny kotoma ajo, kout eloit ka aicipet da.
Kosodi kanen kicebok ŋin abokobok ŋes kaimaima ŋin paaran kakiroke, abu eketau kokadak kiton atwanare.

Kejenu Delila ebe alimoki ŋes nukotauke kere, abu kijuka anyaraun ijaka luka Ipilisitian ebe, “Kopotu do irwan na bon, naarai kalimok eoŋ nukotauke kere.” Kosodete ijaka luka Ipilisitian aponare mamake koyaunito apesan kakanikec.
Abu kitojoto ŋes kakejeke; kosodi ŋin anyaraun etuŋanan kobareno iketim luecipitai irwan akanykaarei; kogeu aitican ŋes, konyou akegogoŋ kamake.
Kotema atiar, “Samuson, kibunokis jo Ipilisitian.” Kokweny kotoma ajo, kobala ebe, “Alomari kwape lem sek, kasodi ailakilakaar.” Konye mam ajeni ebe abu EJAKAIT konyou kamakeŋ.
Kikamut Ipilisitian ŋes, kogorut akekonye; koyaŋaasi ŋes Gasa, koenata kirikoi luka aisinit; abu kirienenec kaidaris.
Konye apotu iketim kogeut apol bobo kedaun abaren ŋes.
Kosodete kotukonokinos ijaka luka Ipilisitian ainakin Dagon ekecedeke asubanit naepol, kalakara da: naarai abalas ebe, “Kijaik edekewok oni Samuson lokasurupiwok akaniniwok.”
Keanyut ituŋa ŋes, apotu kituroto edekekec: naarai abalas ebe, “Kijaik edekewok oni lokasurupiwok akaniniwok, loemudiarit awokokwap, loaar luipu kaoni.”
Kosodi kanen, kiyalamikinos ikecetauon, apotu kotemasi ebe, “Konyarautu Samuson, koboliak oni,” Konyaraut Samuson kaidaris; koboliak kes: kibwaikis ŋes kidiŋ opirin.
Kotema Samuson esapat loarikit ŋes kakan ebe, “Kocamakinai kararapa ipirin luigaŋito etogo, tetere agoŋakini kes.”
Eleleba etogo ikiliok ka aŋor; ijaka kere luka Ipilisitian ajaas nen; ajaas ikiliok ka aŋor kwape ilukumin iuni kuju togo, lueteete Samuson eboliakini kes.
Kitiŋ Samuson ipirin iarei lukokidiŋ luegaŋito etogo, kogoŋakin kes, ediopet kakekan nakoteten, ediopet da kakekan nakokediany.

Kotema Samuson atiar, “Mere katwana nepepe k Ipilisitian.” Kokukum kakegogoŋ kere; kotiyaikin etogo ijaka, ka ituŋa kere luajaas toma. Kwaŋin lukatwak luaari ŋesi kapak naka atwanareke epu adepar luaari ŋesi ejari.
Kosodete ikeinacan ka ekal kere loka papake aponare, kolemutu ŋes, koyaŋaut, kidaikis ŋes kidiŋ kaSora ka Esitaol aibois nakidaanakina naka Manoa papake, Abu ŋesi kotubok Isirael ikar akaisaarei.
Ajai etuŋanan loka akwap nakiukon naka Epuraim, ekekiror Mika.

Abu ŋesi kotema totoke atiar, “Atutubeta akwat atomon ka nadiopet nuka epuesa nuaponi koyaŋaarai kaneijai ijo, nuibu ijo kilam, ibu da kiner kapupi, koany, ejai epuesa neajai eoŋ; eoŋ abu kayaŋa ŋes.” Kotema totoke atiar, “Kisirereŋ EJAKAIT okokuka.”

Kinyakak ŋesi totoke atutubeta akwat atomon ka nadiopet nuka epuesa, kotema totoke ŋes atiar, “Abeit atiakakin EJAKAIT epuesa kakanika kanuka okokuka, aiswamaunia aput naegerer ka aput nacaluna: kanuka ŋun enyakakini ijo.”
Kosodi kinyakaki ŋesi totoke apesan, abu totoke kolem atutubeta akwat aarei nuka epuesa, kijaik ekatatan, loeswamaunia ŋun aput naegerer ka aput nacaluna: kojaun togo loka Mika.
Kejai etuŋanan ŋol Mika etogo loka idekesio, kiswamau epod,
Amamei ekabaka koIsirael kapaarasia kaŋun: eswamaenenei ŋinituŋanan nuadolito kakonyeneke bon.
Konyou etuŋanan kore, koBet-lekem-yuda, aiboiororoi kaneedumunia aibois: kodol akwap nakiukon naka Epuraim, togo loka Mika, kalositeke.
Kotema Mika ŋes atiar, “Ai bo kibunio?” Kotema ŋes atiar, “Arai eoŋ Elebit loka Bet-lekem-yuda, alosi aiboiororoi neadumunia aibois.”
Kotema Mika ŋes atiar, “Keboioto keoŋ, koraun papaka, esasedotika da, kainanakini jo atutubeta atomon nuka epuesa ŋolikaru, ka inapen lukitetiak, ka inyamatakon.” Kolomari do Elebit.
Kitojok Elebit aiboi ketuŋanan; kosubite ekatumunan ŋol bala ediopet kodweke.
Kotiak Mika Elebit, koraun ekatumunan ŋol esasedotike, kojaun togo loka Mika.
Kosodi Mika atemar ebe, “Kwana ajeni eoŋ ebe kekonakini EJAKAIT eoŋ ejok, naarai Elebit ŋes esasedotika.”

Kijukas idwe luka Dan kokekikec ituŋa ikany kotiaikec kere, ituŋa lukirigin, anyoun koSora ka Esitaol, airot akwap, ka aiŋic da; kotemasi kes atiar, “Koloto, koŋicata akwap.” Kodolot akwap nakiukon naka Epuraim, togo loka Mika, koperoto nen.
Kidunyakinos kesi togo loka Mika, apotu kojenata eporoto loka ekatumunan Elebit: kopaasi nen, kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Iŋai bo kiyauni jo ne? Inyo bo iswamai ijo kane? Inyo bo da ejai jo nee?”
Kotema kes atiar, “Kekonaki Mika eoŋ kwaŋin, karop eoŋ, araun da eoŋ ekesasedoti.”
Kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Kiŋaiŋait kiŋit Edeke tetere kijenuni arai erereŋ akosilosit nakilosi.”
Kotema esasedoti kes atiar, “Koloto kainapakina. Ejai erotokus loilosete akonyen nuka EJAKAIT,”

Kosodete ituŋa ŋul ikany anyoun, kodolut Lais, koanyut ituŋa luajaas nen, kwape eboioto kinapakina, kwape ejaar epone loka Isidonin, kiyamakina kinapakina da; naarai amamei kakwap yenayait kes, yenepedori aitisil kes kadiokirot, alwaka kesi koSidonin, amameete kes akiro kere kidiotuŋanan.
Koboŋosi neejaas iinacanakec Sora ka Esitaol: kotemasi iinacanakec kes atiar, “Anyoika bo?”
Kotemasi atiar, “Konyoutu, kaloto asurokin kes, naarai kianyu akwap, ido koany, ejok noi: kanukinyo ipalaritotor? Sirikikalanyakata alosit alomar airum akwap.
Nailosioto, idolokinete ituŋa luinapakina, elal da akwap: naarai kijaik Edeke ŋes akanikus; aibois naemamei eipud loka ŋinibore kere yenejai akwap.”
Konyout kanen lukokek loka Idanin, koSora ka Esitaol, ituŋa akwat akanykape luakapito lujiis.
Kolototo, kidukuroto Kiriat-yearim, koYuda: ŋes amaikiniata aibois ŋin Makane-dan, kiton lolo: koany, ejai kau naka Kiriat-yearim.
Kitoroto nen kiton akwap nakiukon naka Epuraim, kopotu togo loka Mika.
Kopaasi nen, kodoloto togo loka ekatumunan Elebit, ŋes etogo loka Mika, kiŋitata ŋes ejauteneke.
Kobwaata ituŋa akwat akanykape luakapito lujiis, luaraas luka idwe luka Dan, korute loka ere.
Koloto ituŋa ikany lualosito airot akwap, kolomasi nen, kolemut aput naegerer, ka epod, ka iterapim, ka aput nacaluna: kobwo esasedoti korute ka ituŋa akwat akanykape luakapito lujiis.
Kosodi kelomasi kwi togo loka Mika, kelemut aput naegerer, ka epod, ka iterapim, ka aput nacaluna, kotema esasedoti kes atiar, “Inyo bo iswamaete yesi?”

Kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Kililiŋ, korapak kakonikan aitukukon, kaupakinos, koraun papakosi ka esasedotikosi: ejok kereka jo araut esasedoti togo loka ediopetuŋanan, arai bo araut esasedoti loka ateker ka ekek loka Isirael?”
Kolakar etau loka esasedoti, kolem epod, ka iterapim, ka aput naegerer, kouparos kituŋa.
Kwaŋin kibelokinos koloto, kisiŋarenoto ludidik ka ibaren ka iboro.
Kelwanikinos kesi kotogo loka Mika, kotukokinos ituŋa luajaas otogoi luedunyas ketogo loka Mika, kodolokis idwe luka Dan.
Kiworoto kesi idwe luka Dan. Koŋoliasi kau, kotemasi Mika atiar, “Inyo bo kisiriebi jo, tape ibunit kerioŋet loetia nen?”
Kotema atiar, “Ilemarito yesi ikadekesio lueswamauni eoŋ, ka esasedoti, iyekasi da, inyo do bobo ejai eoŋ? Ikote kiŋisito eoŋ ai ebe, ‘Inyo bo kisiriebi jo?’ ”
Kotemasi idwe luka Dan ŋes atiar, “Sirikepupun ekoniporoto kamakosi, kinyeis ituŋa luenyunyuraka abunokin jo, kosodi ijo atwaniar aijarakon, ka aijar naka lukokalekon.”
Kolototo idwe luka Dan: keanyu Mika ebe agogoŋ kesi adepar ŋes, abu kibelokin, koboŋo togoke.
Komamei ekayuunan, naarai alwana kaneajai Sidon, amameete da kes akiro kidiotuŋanan; ajai ere aditot naka Bet-rekob. Kodukoto bobo ere ŋol, kiboikinos nen.
Komaikis ekiror loka ere Dan, kwape ajaar ekiror loka Dan papaakec, loaurikinio Isirael: konye kerai sek ekiror loka ere Lais.
Kosipokis idwe luka Dan kanukec aput naegerer; ido Yonatan okoku loka Geresom, okoku loka Musa, ŋes ka odweke, kes araas isasedotin luka ateker naka Idanin aitodol apaaran naaŋatarere akwap.
Kwaŋin kosipokis kesi aput naegerer naka Mika naeswamauni ŋesi, apak kere naajaar etogo loka Edeke Silo.
Kolot akebusiat eporo bala naadote, konyou kamake, kolot togo loka papake Bet-lekem-yuda, kiboi kanen ilapio iwoŋon.
Konyou okilenike, kibwapa ŋes, aimaima ŋes, ainyakun ŋes, kojai ebulesitike kaŋes, ka asigiria aarei: koyaŋa ŋin ŋes togo loka papake: keanyu papa loka apese ŋes, abu kolakar airiamun kaŋes.
Kosodi ekamuranike, papa loka apese aitapaikin ŋes; kiboioto kaŋes apaarasia auni: konyamata, komatata, koperoto nen.
Kosodi kanen kapaaran nakiwoŋonet, kodilokis anyoun tupuruc, konyou alosit: kotema papa loka apese ekamuranike atiar, “Kitalaka ekonitau kidionyamat, kosodi konyet alosit.”
Kiboikinos, konyamata, komatata, kes kere iarei: kotema papa loka apese etuŋanan atiar, “Keŋaiŋait, kocam kitiwala akuare kere, kiyalamikin ekonitau.”
Konyou etuŋanan alosit; konye kimaima ekamuranike, kopere bobo nen.
Kodilok anyoun alosit tupuruc kapaaran nakikanyet; kotema papa loka apese atiar, “Kitalaka ekonitau keŋaiŋait, kidareu aitodol ajotet”; konyamata kesi kere iarei.

Kosodi kenyou etuŋanan alosit, ŋes ka akebusiat ka ekebulesit, kotema ekamuranike, papa loka apese ŋes atiar, “Koany, etiboŋ kwana akwap, keŋaiŋait kitiwala akuare kere: koany, eapie apaaran adaun, kopero ne, kolakar ekonitau; kodilok moi alosit, tetere ilosi ore.”
Naaapikiniata kesi Yebus, kitiboŋite akwap cut; kotema ebulesit ekejakait atiar, “Keŋaiŋait, bia kapaasi ore lo loka Iyebusin, kaperoto nen.”
Kotema ekejakait ŋes atiar,
“Mam oni kipaari ore loka emoit, lomam erai loka idwe luka Isirael; konye kitubor kiton Gibea.”
Kotema ŋesi ekebulesit atiar, “Bia, kekunyakisi adiopet kaiboisio kanu; kiperi da Gibea, arai Rama.”
Kwaŋin kotuboros koloto; kowarik kes akwap eiduny keGibea, loerai loka Benyamin.
Kopaasi ŋina, alosit apero Gibea: abu koloma, kiboikin orot loka ere: naarai amamei ituŋanan yenabu koyaŋa kes togoke apero.
Kiteluo akekonye koany ekaloton korot loka ere; kotema emojoŋ atiar, “Ai bo ilosi ijo? Lali da kibunio?”

Kotema ŋes atiar, “Kilosi anyoun kobet-lekem-yuda kiton osaŋe loka akwap nakiukon naka Epuraim; bukosi ŋina, abu kalosite Bet-lekem-yuda: ido alosi kwana togo loka EJAKAIT; konye emamei etuŋanan loketolomari eoŋ togoke.
Kwabo ejaas anya ka inyamat luka asigiriakosi; ejaas da imugatin ka ebino kanukaŋ, ka akejaanakinanikon, ka ekatumunan loejaas ka ikejaanakinakakon: emamei eipud idiobore.”
Kotema emojoŋ atiar, “Kinapakin ijo; konye kabe eoŋ eipudakon kere; konye sirikiper orot.”
Kwaŋin koyaŋa ŋes togoke, koinak asigiria anya: kilotata kesi akejenekec, konyamata, komatata da.
Koloma etuŋanan, elopet etogo, mamakec, kotema kes atiar, “Mam, ikainacan, keŋaiŋaito, sirikiswamata aronis naetia nen; naarai alomu etuŋanan ŋol togoka, sirikiswamata ŋun nuka abaŋaanut.
Koany, akokuka na apese, ka abusiatake; etolomuni eoŋ kes kwana, kitisiloto yesi kes, kiswamakis kes nuitojokito yesi; konye sirikiswamakis etuŋanan ŋol ŋun nuka abaŋaanut.”
Konye koŋeroto ituŋa apupun ŋes: kwaŋin kitiŋ etuŋanan akebusiat, koina kes; kojenutu ŋes, komunautu ŋes akuare kia kiton tupuruc: kecila kide, koosikis ŋes.
Kosodi aberu abunore kecila kide, kibirokin okek loka etogo loka etuŋanan loajai ejakaitike, aitodol naacaunia akwap.
Konyou ejakaitike tupuruc, koŋaa ikekia luka etogo, koloma alosit: ido koany, ebirokina aberu akebusiat okek loka etogo, kojaas akaninike okek.
Kotema ŋesi ŋin atiar, “Konyou, kaloto”; konye mam yenabu Koboŋok: kosodi ŋesi adakakin ŋin asigiria; konyou etuŋanan, kolot aiboisike.
Kedol togoke, abu kolem ekileŋ, kitiŋ akebusiat, kotubutub inerioke atutubeta atomon ka nuarei, kijuka ŋin oikorun kere luka Isirael.

Kojaun kwanata ebe, apotu kere luapotu koanyutu ŋun kotemasi ebe, “Mam apeŋo eswamatai ibore yenetia nen, karaida aanyun, ageun kapaaran naanyounioto idwe luka Isirael kakwap nako Misiri kiton lolo: koomoomata nuke, kinerut, kolimosi.”
Kitodiaros ijaka luka ituŋa kere, kes atekerin kere nuka Isirael, katukot naka ituŋa luka Edeke, ituŋa ilukumin akwat aoŋon luelosete kakeje luautunito ikileŋa.
(Apotu idwe luka Benyamin kopuput ebe alototo idwe luka Isirael Misipa.) Kotemasi idwe luka Isirael atiar, “Kolimokinai sio, ekonakini ai aronis na iswamaun?”
Koboŋok Elebit, okilenike loka aberu naaaritai ebe, “Abu kadol Gibea loerai loka Benyamin, eoŋ ka akabusiat kapero nen.
Kosodete ituŋa luka Gibea anyoun asurokin eoŋ, kalukakis eoŋ togo kuare; aomitos aiar eoŋ, apotu komunaut akabusiat, kotwana.
Abu kayaŋa akabusiat, katubutub ŋes, kejuka akwap kere naka airumet naka Isirael: naarai eswamata nukasilianut nukabaŋaanut da kotoma Isirael.
Koanyutu, yes idwe luka Isirael, yes kere, kolimutu akusikirot, kinerut.”
Konyout ituŋa kere bala ediopetuŋanan, kotemasi ebe, “Mam idiopet kaoni elosi owemake, karaida idiopet kaoni aboŋor togoke.
Konye kiswamakini oni Gibea kwanata; kilosi asurokin ŋes kailamilam keroet.

Kiseuni ituŋa itomon ka ŋinikwatat katekerin kere nuka Isirael, ka akwatat kotoma elukumit, ka elukumit kotoma olukumin itomon, aomikin ituŋa inyamat, tetere iswamaete, naedolioto Gibea loka Benyamin, kwape ejaar abaŋaanut kere naeswamata koIsirael.”
Kwaŋin kotukokinos ituŋa kere luka Isirael asurokin ere kimorikikina nepepe bala ediopetuŋanan.
Aso do koyautu ituŋa odwe luka Belial, luejaas Gibea, tetere kiari kes, kalemas aronis koIsirael.” Konye apotu Ibenyamin koŋeroto apupun eporoto loka Iinacanakec idwe luka Isirael.
Kotukokinos idwe luka Benyamin anyoun koreria kopotu Gibea, alomar aitiji idwe luka Isirael.
Aponi kimarai idwe luka Benyamin kapaaran kaŋin koreria, ituŋa ilukumin akaisaarei ka lukanykape luautunito ikileŋa, kogelara lueboiete koGibea, luemwaasi akwat akanykaarei, ituŋa luaseunitai.
Ajaas otuŋa ŋul kere ituŋa luaseunitai akwat akanykaarei iŋodialik; ŋolidiopet apedor aporocikin etimat da alicait, komam ediaki.
Aponi kimarai ituŋa luka Isirael kogelara Benyamin, ituŋa ilukumin akwat aoŋon luautunito ikileŋa; ŋul kere araas ikajiok.
Konyout idwe luka Isirael tupuruc, kidukuroto asurokin Gibea.
Kolomasi ituŋa luka Isirael aitiji Benyamin; kiderakinos ituŋa luka Isirael aitiji kes koGibea.
Kolomut idwe luka Benyamin koGibea, kibirokis kwap kapaaran kaŋin luka Isiraelin ituŋa ilukumin akaisaarei ka luarei.
Kosodete ituŋa, kes ituŋa luka Isirael, atitiŋior, kiderakinos ejie kaibois naederakina kesi kapaaran nasodit.
Koloto idwe luka Isirael komonyata kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT kiton eboŋ; kiŋitata EJAKAIT ebe, “Ekunyakini bobo eoŋ lolo aitiji idwe luka Benyamin onaceka?” Kotema EJAKAIT atiar, “Kolot kosurok ŋes.”
Kikunyakis idwe luka Isirael asurokin idwe luka Benyamin kapaaran nakiareit.
Kolom Benyamin asurokin kes koGibea kapaaran nakiareit, kibirokis bobo kwap luka idwe luka Isirael ituŋa ilukumin itomon ka lukanykauni; ŋul kere atunito ikileŋa.

Kosodete idwe kere luka Isirael, ka ituŋa kere alosit, kodoloto Bet-el, komonyata, kiboioto kanen kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kikanyata eteŋei apaaran ŋin kiton eboŋ; koinakis ainakineta nuicweio, ka ainakineta nuka ainapakin mama ejai EJAKAIT.
Kiŋitata idwe luka Isirael EJAKAIT, (naarai ajai asaduku naka aitutuket naka Edeke nen kapaarasia kaŋun.

Pinekas, okoku loka Eleasar, okoku loka Aaron, ŋes abwoi kakonyeneke kapaarasia kaŋun) ebe, “Alomari kereka eoŋ bobo aitiji idwe luka Benyamin onaceka, arai bo apalari?” Kotema EJAKAIT atiar, “Koloto; naarai ejaikini ŋes moi akanikon.”
Koloto idwe luka Isirael asurokin idwe luka Benyamin apaaran nakiwuniet, kiderakinos asurokin Gibea, kwape kapakio ace.

Kolomas idwe luka Benyamin asurokin ituŋa, kiŋalaarai kes kore; kogeut aiar ka aidany kotuŋa kwape kapakio ace, korotin lukapolok, ediopet loelosi Bet-el, loce da loelosi Gibea, koitela, ituŋa luka Isirael kwape akaisauni.
Kotemasi idwe luka Benyamin atiar, “Kidanya kes kakonyenewok, kwape lem.” Konye kotemasi idwe luka Isirael ebe, “Kakerata oni, keŋalaasi kes kore kiton orotin lukapolok.”
Konyout ituŋa kere luka Isirael kaiboisikec, kiderakinos koBaal-tamar: konemesikinos ikaperunok kaiboisikec, ŋes Maare-geba.
Kopotu ituŋa ilukumin itomon luaseunitai kotoma Isirael kere asurokin Gibea, kosisior ejie noi; konye mam kwi ajenete ebe eapikinit kes aronis.
Kodany EJAKAIT Benyamin kakonyen nuka Isirael: komudiasi idwe luka Isirael kapaaran kaŋin luka Benyamin ituŋa ilukumin akaisaarei ka lukany, ka akwatat: ŋul kere autunito ikileŋa.
Kisunyasi ikaperunok, kokerata Gibea; kikunyakis ikaperunok, kodanyata lukore kere kakwanis naka ekileŋ.
Apotu ituŋa luka Isirael ka ikaperunok kinerunito aanyunet na ebe, itupuruunete kesi apuru naepol kore.
Kibeleunos ituŋa luka Isirael kojie, kogeu Benyamin aiar ka aidany ituŋa luka Isirael kwape ituŋa akaisauni: naarai abalas ebe, “Abeit kidanyi kes kakonyenewok kwape kojie losodit.”
Konye kegeu apuru apuruun kore kosubite bala epir loka apuru, koŋoliasi Ibenyamin kau, ido koany, apurie ere kere kiton akuj.
Kibeleunos ituŋa luka Isirael, koumokis ituŋa luka Benyamin: naarai ajenete ebe ebunokinit kes aronis.
Kanuka ŋun apotu kibelooros kakonyen nuka idwe luka Isirael aibe orot loka amodiŋ; konye koduduŋ kes ejie; kosodete lualomunete koreria amudiar kes kanen.
Apotu kolukakis Ibenyamin, kodapata kes, kicakacakata kes kaiboisikec nakibworaret, kiton aibois naiteos koGibea kokide.
Kotwakata luka Benyamin ituŋa ilukumin itomon ka lukanykauni; ŋul kere araas ituŋa lukirigin.
Kibelooros kokeriasi amodiŋ moru loka Rimon: kideput korotin ituŋa ilukumin ikany kakesi; koduduŋata kes kiton Gidom, kodanyata ituŋa ilukumin iarei kakesi.
Kwaŋin kere luapotu kotwaka kapaaran kaŋin luka Benyamin emwaasi ituŋa ilukumin akaisaarei ka lukany luautunito ikileŋa; ŋul kere araas ituŋa lukirigin.
Konye apotu ituŋa akwat akanykape kibelooros kokeriasi amodiŋ, moru Rimon, kiboioto komoru Rimon ilapio iwoŋon.

Kibeleunos bobo idwe luka Isirael mama ejaas idwe luka Benyamin kodanyata kes kakwanis naka ekileŋ, ere kere, ka ibaren, kere da luapotu kesi kodumut: bobo da apotu kicweata ireria kere luapotu kesi kodumut.
Kopotu ituŋa Bet-el, kiboioto kanen kiton eboŋ kakonyen nuka Edeke, kodelosi, komonyata noi.
Kotemasi atiar, “Wu EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael, kanukinyo eswamaunor na kotoma Isirael, ebe lolo ateker adiopet atwaniar koIsirael?”
Kosodi kanen tupuruc, kodilokis ituŋa anyoun, kodukokis etem nen, koinakis ainakineta nuicweio ka ainakineta nuka ainapakin.

Kotemasi idwe luka Isirael atiar, “Iŋai bo kotoma atekerin kere nuka gsirael lomam abunit atukokin mama ejai EJAKAIT? Naarai apotu kiyapoikinito aiyaposit naepol kanuka ŋol lomam abunit atukokin mama ejai EJAKAIT Misipa ebe, ‘Abeit eario ŋol.’ ”
Kiitut idwe luka Isirael kanuka Benyamin onacekec, kotemasi atiar, “Ejai ateker adiopet naagelar kotoma Isirael lolo.
Kikonakini oni ai kidumakini ŋul luesalito aŋor, naarai kiyapo kalimito EJAKAIT ebe mam kikorakini kes adwewok aimany?”
Naarai naemarere ituŋa, koany, amamei ediopet loka luiboienenete koYabes-gilead kanen.
Kijuka ekodet ituŋa ilukumin itomon ka luarei lukirigin noi, kicorak kes ebe, “Koloto kodanyata luiboiete koYabes-gilead kakwanis naka ekileŋ, kaŋor ka ludidik da.
Iswamaete kwanata; imudiarete cut ŋolikiliokit, ka ŋiniberu naeperito kekiliokit.”
Kodumut kaneejaas luiboienenete koYabes-gilead abekon akwat aoŋon, numam ajenete ekiliokit kanuka apero kaŋes: koyaŋautu kes oidukurun Silo, loejai akwap naka Kanaan.
Koboŋo Benyamin kapak kaŋin; kokorakis kes apesur nuetajarete kesi kaŋor nuka Yabes-gilead: konye apotu kokadata kes.
Kiitut ituŋa kanuka Benyamin, naarai abu EJAKAIT kibwaik arorwa atekerin nuka Isirael.
Kosodete imakio luka ekodet atemar ebe, “Kikonakini oni ai kidumakini ŋul luesalito aŋor, naarai amudiar aŋor kotoma Benyamin?”
Kotemasi atiar, “Ibusakinit kojaun airumet naka ŋul kaluakuata luka Benyamin, kinyek ateker amwatario koIsirael.
Konye mam oni kipedori akorakin kes adwewok aimany: naarai eyapoikinito idwe luka Isirael ebe, ‘Kikenoi ŋol loekorakini Benyamin apese aimany.’ ”
Kotemasi atiar, “Koany, ejai epucit loka EJAKAIT ŋolikaru Silo, loejai agolitomei naka Bet-el, ari nakokide naka erot loepol loenyouni koBet-el kiton Sekem, eŋalakimak da naka Lebona.”
Kicorakis kesi idwe luka Benyamin ebe, “Koloto, koperut komanikoria luka emusabibu:

Koanyut, ido koany, arai kelomut adwe nuka Silo ekosio okosio, ilomunete do yesi da komanikoria luka emusabibu, ikamunete yesi ŋinituŋanan akeberu kotoma adwe nuka Silo, kosodete alosit akwap naka Benyamin.

Kosodi naeponiata lukapapakec arai iinacanakec aosan mamakosi, kitemari isio kes ebe, ‘Kokorakinai sio kes kasianut: naarai mam kipou kademakisi kes ŋinituŋanan akeberu kojie; kwabo mam yes ipotu kokorakis kes; ti do yes kigwaut akirot.’ ”
Kiswamata idwe luka Benyamin kwaŋin, koyaŋaasi aŋor, kwape ajaar etiaikec, loka ŋun kanuekosiete, nuapotu kesi koyaŋaasi: kolototo koboŋosi airumetekec, kodukoto irereia, kiboioto kotoma.
Konyout idwe luka Isirael kanen kapak kaŋin, ŋinituŋanan atekerike okekike da, kolototo kanen ŋinituŋanan airumeteke.
Ekiror loka etuŋanan kaŋol kerai Elimelek, ekiror da loka aberuke Naomi, ikiroria luka odweke iarei Malon ka Kilion, Ipuratin luka Bet-lekem-yuda, Apotu kodoloto akwap naka Moab, kiboiororos kaŋina.
Kotwana Elimelek ekile loka Naomi; kosal ŋesi ka odweke iarei.
Apotu komanyata aŋor nuka Moab; ekiror loka adiopet Orupa, ekiror da loka nakiareit Rusi: apotu kesi kodaut ikar kwape itomon kaŋina.
Kotwakata Malon ka Kilion iarei kere; kotwania aberu odweke iarei ka ekileke da.
Konyou kaibois kanaeboienenoo, ka aterakake aarei nepepe kaŋes; koderoto erot aboŋor akwap naka Yuda.
Kosodi Naomi atemar aterakake aarei ebe, “Ape, koboŋosi ŋinidiopet kayesi ore loka totoke; kiswamak EJAKAIT yes nukasianut, kwape ipotu yesi da kiswamakiniata lukatwak, ka eoŋ da.
Koinak EJAKAIT yes adumun aiyeŋun, ŋinidiopet kayesi kore loka ekileke.” Kosodi ŋesi ainu kes; kodelosi, komonyata akiyo.
Kotemasi kesi ŋes atiar, “Okwe ito, konye kiboŋori isio nepepe kajo mama ejaas ituŋakon.”
Kosodi Naomi atemar kes ebe, “Kibelokinos bobo adweka: kanukinyo ipudatar yesi aupar keoŋ? Eroko kereka idwe ejaas aliligeteka lueraunos ikiliokokus?
Kibelokinos bobo, adweka, koloto; naarai amojoŋ eoŋ noi, mam adumuni ekiliokit ece. Arai kener eoŋ ebe, Amuno, karaida kajaun kekiliokit akuare na, kauru da idwe lusap;
Tikidarata kereka yesi kes apoloor? ŋes inyeiniata yesi adumun ikiliok? Okwe, adweka; naarai arieba eoŋ kanukus, naarai abu akan naka EJAKAIT kolom aluikin eoŋ.”
Kodelosi bobo, komonyata akiyo: konu Orupa tataake, konye kimorikikinos Rusi kaŋes.

Kotema Rusi atiar, “Sirikiiŋaiŋa eoŋ aijal jo, aboŋor komam kiupar kajo: naarai mama ibeenenei ijo, ŋes abeenenei eoŋ da; kaneiperenenei ijo, ŋes aperenenei eoŋ da; eraunos ikonituŋa ikatuŋa, Ekonideke da Ekadeke.
Neitwanikini ijo, ŋes atwanikini eoŋ, ŋes kedaikinio da; keswamak EJAKAIT eoŋ kwaŋin ka adepar da, arai ca kitiaki akirot kere jo keoŋ dimarai atwanare.”
Kosodi keanyu ŋesi ebe adau aitogogoŋ alosit kaŋes, kinyek do einer kaŋes.
Kobala kes ebe, “Sirikinyarito eoŋ Naomi,
Abu kolo kanyou kane eleleba, ketoboŋu EJAKAIT ore emamei ibore: inyo ca kinyaritotor Naomi? Kwabo erai EJAKAIT ekajenen kamaka, abu Lokapedor kere ketican eoŋ.”
Kotema Rusi Amoabut Naomi atiar, “Mere kalot kwana mana airar aluŋuran nuka akima, ka aitup da ŋin yenikadumakini asianut kakonyeneke.” Kotema ŋes atiar, “Ape cabo, akokuka.”
Abu kolot, kobu airar toma amana naesakiata ikasakak; ido kodum alukat naka amana naka Boas, loarai loka ekek leka Elimelek.
Ido koany, kobu Boas koBet-lekem, kotema ikasakak atiar, “EJAKAIT kojai kayes.” Koboŋokis ŋes ebe, “Kisirereŋ jo EJAKAIT.”
Kosodi Boas atemar ekebulesit loetasaki ikasakak atiar, “Nakaŋai apese na?”
Abu ebulesit loetasaki ikasakak Koboŋok ŋes ebe, “Na ŋes apese Amoabut naaboŋunete kaNaomi anyoun kakwap naka Moab:
Abu kiner ebe, ‘Keŋaiŋaito, kerarunun ka atukonokin da kaneasakiata ikasakak koisutan da’; kosodi do abunore, eswama apeanan katupuruc kiton kwana, mam eboŋorit ore.”
Kosodi Boas atemar Rusi ebe, “Mere ipupi ijo, akokuka? Sirilosenenei airar mana ace, karaida anyoun kane, konye kojaenena die kapesuruka.
Kojaenenas akonyekon mana naesakenenoo, kotupanar ijo da kes: mam kereka ecorakinit itelepai ebe Sirikitironorete jo? Ido da nakijakia akure, kolosenenei neejai amot komasi ŋun nuewokunete itelepai.”
Kosodi kibiror ebuburia, kisuded, kobala ŋesi ebe, “Inyo bo adumunia asianut kakonyenekon, ijo ajenun eoŋ, kwabo arai eoŋ amoit?”

Koboŋok Boas kobala ŋes ebe, “Aponi kalimonokin cut kere nuibu kiswamak tataakon ageun kaneatwania ekilekon: ido kwape ibu ijo kopalia papakon ka totokon ka akwap da nakolo kiwurikinio, kobu otuŋa lumam apeŋo ijeni.
Kotacak EJAKAIT jo akoniswam, ido EJAKAIT Edeke loka Isirael, loibu aimec kwap kabebenokake korop jo noi.”
Kotema atiar, “Mere kadum asianut kakonyenekon ejakaitika; naarai kitalaka, naarai inera kakonibulesit nuka asianut, karaida mam arai adiopet kotoma abulesinikon.”

Kosodi nakedol apak nakainyam, abu Boas kobala ŋes ebe, “Bia ainyam atap, kicunyak aodunetekon odia loedwar.” Kiboikin ŋesi awai naka ikasakak; apotu koinakis ŋes imomwa luikawooritai, konyam kimonikin kokurwok.
Kosodi kenyou airar, kicorak Boas iketelepai, kotema atiar, “Kirarunun ŋesi koisutan da konye siriretanakinete ŋes.
Komudanakinete ŋes da koisutan, kinyeis, kirar ŋes alopet, konye mam ilimunete.”
Kosodi ŋesi airar kamana aitiwar akwap; kicom nuabu kotukonokinite kodum bala epa
Kibwoko, koloma ore; abu tataake koany nuatukonokinit ŋesi; koyau koinak lunan edeuni ŋesi nakedau aimonikin.

Kosodi tataake kobala ebe, “Ai bo lolo kirararit? Ido ai bo kiswamaarit? Koinakinai asuliany ŋol loabu kojen jo.” Kitejenik ŋesi tataake ŋol loeswamaete kaŋes, kinera ebe, “Ekiliokit lokiswamaa lolo ekekiror Boas.”
Kobala Naomi ateranike ebe, “Kisirereŋ EJAKAIT ŋes, lomam enaŋi akesianut mama kalukajarak ka lukatwak da.” Naomi kobala ŋes ebe, “Ekiliokit ŋol ŋes lokokekiwok cut, ediopet ka lukalakunakawok.”
Kiner Rusi Amoabut ebe, “Ee ba, abu ŋesi katema eoŋ ebe, ‘Kojaenena die kitelepaika aitodol naedauniata aisak nuka kere,’ ”
Kosodi Naomi atemar Rusi ateranike ebe, “Ejok, akokuka, koupananasi nepepe kabulesinike, kwabo kinyein adumun jo kamana ace kere.”
Kosodi ŋesi aapienena kabulesin nuka Boas airarenen aitodol naedaunere aisak esairi ka aisak akima; kiboienenei katataake.
Emamei kereka Boas lokokekiwok lolem iboienenei ijo kabulesinike? Koany, epiesi esairi akuare na kopejal.
Aso kiloŋ kotuanar kakinyet, konap anapitokon, kijesar opejal; konye sirikitejenun mama ejai etuŋanan ŋol aitodol naedaunia ŋesi ainyam ka aimat.
Kosodi naeperio, kojen aibois naeperi ŋesi, koloma ijo da kopuko akejeke koper; kilimokini ŋesi jo nuiswamai.”
Kotema ŋesi ebe, “Nuiner ijo kere eswamai.”
Kosodi ŋesi aijesar opejal, kiswama kere kwape ajaatar nuecorakinit ŋes tataake.
Kosodi kedau Boas ainyam ka aimat, kolakar etauke, kolot apero ariri naka atukot naka akima: kobu ŋesi ecedi, kopuko akejeneke, koper.
Kosodi kidiŋebai korieŋ etuŋanan, kibelokin; ido koany, aperi aberu kakejeneke.
Kotema ebe, “Iŋai bo ijo?” Koboŋok ŋesi ebe, “Eoŋ Rusi akonibulesit; aso kimukoo abulesitikon kanapitokon; naarai irai ekalakunanika.”
Kotema ŋes atiar, “Kisirereŋ EJAKAIT jo akokuka; itodu asianut naedeparit kosaŋe aitelekar nasodit, naarai mam itupanar itelepai, arai lukican arai ikabarak.
Kwape kwana da, akokuka, sirikiyoŋ; keswamakini jo kere nuinera; naarai ejeni ere kere loka ikatuŋa kwape iraar aberu naijok.
Erai teni abeit ebe arai eoŋ lokokekikon; konye ejai ece loeapie koinacane aitelekarit eoŋ.

Aso kosalak ne akuare na, kosodi kedol atupuruc arai kiiswamak ŋesi jo aswam naka ekalakunan, ejok; kiswamak do ŋesi jo aswam naka ekalakunan; konye do arai mam ecamuni aiswamakin jo aswam naka ekalakunan, ŋes do keswamakinia eoŋ jo aswam naka ekalakunan, kwape ejaria EJAKAIT. Koper aitodol tupuruc.”
Naarai abu kotema ebe, “Sirikejenun ebe abunit aberu na opejal.”
Kotema atiar, “Koyau elou loimukor ijo, kitiŋ”: Kosodi ŋesi aitiŋ; kitemokinai aitemisio akanykape nuka esairi kisibwok ŋes; kolot ore.
Kosodi kedol neejai tataake kotema atiar, “Iŋai bo ijo, akokuka?” Kolimok ŋes kere nuabu etuŋanan kiswamak ŋes.
Kotema ŋesi ebe, “ŋes kainakini aitemisio nu akanykape nuka esairi; naarai abu kalimok ebe, ‘Mam ilosi neejai tataakon komamei ibore,’ ”
Kosodi atemar ebe, “Kiboikin kopala akokuka, aitodol neijenunia neebearete akiro: naarai mam etuŋanan ŋol iyeŋuni aitodol naedaunia akirot na lolo.”
Abu koya ikiliok itomon komakio lukore kotema kes ebe, “Kiboikinos ne.” Kiboikinos kesi da.
Kotema ŋesi ekalakunan ebe, “Naomi naabu koboŋu anyoun akwap naka Moab egwelari alup nuaraas kolo nuka onacewok Elimelek:

Ido aomit eoŋ aitejenikin jo, kabala ebe, Kogwel kakonyen nuka ŋul kaluiboiete kane, akonyen da nuka imakio luka ituŋaka, Arai ikoto ailak, kolaku; konye arai mam ikoto alakun, aso bo kolimokinai, kajen: naarai emamei yenelakuni nabarai jo; eoŋ da ŋes katupit jo.” Kotema atiar, “Alakuni bo,”
Kosodi Boas atemar atiar, “Naigwelia amana kakan naka Naomi kibusakinit agwel Rusi da Amoabut, aberu naka lokatwan, aitoboŋikin airumeteke ekiror loka lokatwan.”
Kotema ekalakunan ŋol ebe, “Mam apedor alakun kanukaŋ, kenyek amunaun airumeteka: koyaŋa ijo ailakaka ŋin; naarai mam eoŋ apedori alakun.”
Kosodi ekalakunan ŋol atemar Boas ebe, “Kogwel do ijo.” Kolac amukatake.
Kotema Boas imakio ka ituŋa kere da ebe, “Iraas ikajenak lolo, agwel eoŋ lukolo araas luka Elimelek kere, ka luaraas luka Kilion ka luka Malon da, kakan naka Naomi.

Rusi da Amoabut apuserut naka Malon agwel eoŋ araun aberuka, aitoboŋikin airumeteke ekiror loka lokatwan, kinyek ekiror loka lokatwan aolior koinacanake, korute da loka aiboisitike: iraas yesi lolo ikajenak.”

Kosodete ituŋa kere luajaas orute, ka imakio da atemar ebe, “Kirai isio ikajenak, Kituput EJAKAIT aberu naabu togokon kwape Rakel ka Lea nuapotu kesi aarei kodukoto ekek loka Isirael: kiswama ijo da nuibusak kotoma Epurat, kojenun kotoma Bet-lekem.
Ekonikal da koraun bala ekal loka Peres loaurikini Tamar Yuda, kanuka aur nakiinakini EJAKAIT kotoma aberu na nakatumunan.”
Kobalas aŋor Naomi ebe, “Kituritete EJAKAIT, lomam kinyeinit jo lolo emamei ekalakunan, kojenun da ekirorike koIsirael.
Eraun ŋesi da kamakon eketeteunan aijar, ido eketanan kamojoŋukon; naarai ateranikon, nakimina ijo, naitelekarit idwe ikanykaarei lusap kajokis kamakon, ŋes auru ŋes.”
Kosodi Naomi ayaŋaar ikoku, kotunak atorobuke, koraun akasaanike.
Apotu aŋor aidunyetake konerokis ekiror kineras ebe, “Aurikin Naomi ikoku yenisapat.” Komaikis ekekiror Obed: ŋol ŋes papa loka Yese, papa loka Daudi.
Kesuron kouru Ram, Ram kouru Aminadab:
Aminadab kouru Nason, Nason kouru Salumon;
Salumon kouru Boas, Boas da kouru Obed;
Obed kouru Yese, Yese da kouru Daudi.
Kojaas ŋes aŋor aarei; adiopet ekekiror Kana, nace da ekekiror Penina: ajaas Penina idwe, konye amameete Kana idwe.
Kosodi kedol apaaran nakeinakinia Elukana asuban, koinanak akeberu Penina, ka ikedwe kere lusap ka lupesur, akorakineta;
Konye koinak Kana akorakineta aarei: naarai kemina ŋesi Kana, konye kegolit EJAKAIT akeliliget.
Konye kitunyunyurik noi akainike ŋes, kisiyaloŋoŋo da, naarai kegolit EJAKAIT akeliliget.
Kiswamaenenei kwaŋin ŋolikaru, nakeloseneneo togo loka EJAKAIT, kitunyunyuranakini ya kwaŋin: tape emonyi akiyo, kogir ainyam.
Kobala okilenike Elukana ŋes ebe, “Kana, inyo bo imonyi ijo? Inyo bo kitukurwo ainyam? Inyo da itururwoo ekonitau? Mam kereka eoŋ etelekarit idwe itomon kajokis kamakon?”
Koriebi ŋin eketau, kilip EJAKAIT, komony noi akiyo.

Kiyapoik aiyaposit, kobala ebe, “Wu EJAKAIT loka ajoresio, abeit arai kisesen ican luka akonibulesit, kiitunite eoŋ komam kimurwokini akonibulesit, konye kiinak akonibulesit ikoku yenisapat, aso ainakini EJAKAIT ŋes apaarasia kere nuka aijarake, kwabo mam ejutet icaki akouke.”
Kosodi kanen, nakiyatakinia ailip kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kosesen Eli akeituk.
Naarai eneranakin Kana kotauke; akeituk bon kesubanakin, konye komam epupo eporoto; tape eomit Eli ebe emer.
Kobala Eli ŋes ebe, “Itodoli wori ameranakin? Kosac ebino ŋol.”
Koboŋok Kana kobala ebe, “Mam, ejakait, arai eoŋ aberu naitururwei etau; mam amasit ebino karaida nuitemerete, konye abolorit ekatau akonyen nuka EJAKAIT.
Sirikiinyara akonibulesit akoku naka Belial; naarai toma airurumaka naelitokina ido toma anyunyurikinika ŋes enerar kiton kwana.”
Koboŋok Eli ebe, “Kolot kainapakina; ido koinak Edeke loka Isirael ŋun nuilip ŋes.”
Kinera atiar, “Kodum akonibulesit arereŋ kakonyenekon.” Kosodi kolot aberu, konyam, komam bobo imujurur.
Kosodi kanen, kedolo apaarasia, kopotuu Kana, kidou ikoku; komaik ekekiror Samuel, naarai elipuni kama ejai EJAKAIT.
Kosodi kolot ekes Elukana, ka ekekike kere, ainakin asuban mama ejai EJAKAIT nuka ŋolikaru, ka aiyapositike.
Konye mam Kana abu kolot; naarai kobala ŋesi okilenike ebe, “Mam eoŋ alosi aitodol naejakaria ikoku, kasodi konyet ayaŋaar aitodiar akonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kiboienenei kaŋina apaarasia kere.”
Kobala Elukana okilenike ebe, “Kiswama nuitojokit ijo; kopaik aitodol naejakaria ikoku; konye kitogogoŋ EJAKAIT akekiro.” Kosodi kosalak aberu nen kitanak ikoku, aitodol nekitajakaaria.
Kosodi kedau aitajakaar, koyaŋa kouparos kaŋes, kojaas kimoŋin iuni, ka epa
Koarata emoŋ, koinut Eli ikoku.
Kobala ebe, “Wu ekajakait, kwape ejaria ekonitau, ekajakait, eoŋ aberu naabu kabwoi kama ijai, elipi EJAKAIT.
Yen ŋes ikoku yenabu kelip; ido abu EJAKAIT kainak nuelipit ŋes.
Ŋes ainakinia mama ejai EJAKAIT; eroko ejari einakinitai EJAKAIT.”
Komaata EJAKAIT kaŋina.
“Elakara ekatau kotoma EJAKAIT,
Itopolooritai akamumwarat kotoma EJAKAIT:
Italalara akaituk kaneejaas lukasurupoka;
Naarai eyalama kotoma aitajarakon.
Naarai emamei ice dimarai ijo:
Ido emamei atiiba naeputos ka Edekewok.
Karaida nukailepanut alomun kaitukekus;
Naarai erai EJAKAIT Edeke loka aijen,
Ido ŋes loitemi aswamisio.
Abilas akabwai nuka ituŋa lukirigin,
Ŋul da lueguikinito itanapio agogoŋ.
Ka ŋul da luariebi kolo eteŋei ebworasi:
Eebo, auru arakan ikanykaarei;
Ka ŋin da naejaas idwe luipu esilikinit.
Itolomari toma okatwak, itolomuni da.
Ijesari, ikeuni da.
Itonyouni luilwaritos alemun kotoma otut,
Aisiboikin kes nepepe kikapolok,
Airum da eicoloŋ loka aibuses:
Naarai ipirin luka akwap eraas luka EJAKAIT,
Ido esipokinit akwap kujukec.
Konye isililiŋi ikaronok kotoma amuton;
Naarai emamei etuŋanan loipikori kanuka agogoŋ.
Iretuni kotoma akuj aluikin kes;
Irabakini EJAKAIT kiton owaitin luka akwap,
Einakini ekabakake agogoŋ,
Itopoloori amumwarat naka lokinyonyoikitonike akinyet.”
Ekoni kwanata epone loka isasedotin mama ejaas ituŋa ebe, naeinakinia ituŋanan asubanit, abuni ebulesit loka esasedoti itiŋit kakanike egolu loajaas ikel iuni, napekulai akiriŋ;
Kosodi akiiŋor toma asepulia, arai abinika, arai amot, arai atido; kere naecumuni egolu ŋin ayaŋaari esasedoti. Kiswamanakinai kwaŋin Isiraelin kere luapote nen Silo.
Eebo, eriŋa icweikina asiepai, kobuni ebulesit loka esasedoti, kobala ituŋanan yeneinakini asubanit ebe, “Koinakinai akiriŋ, kapeik esasedoti; naarai mam ekoto akiriŋ naipoo kamakon, konye naejon.”

Arai kelimoki ŋes ituŋanan ebe, “Abeit icweikinio asiepai kwape kwana, ŋes konyet iyaŋaaria naipuda akoniijar kere”: eboŋokini ŋesi da ebe, “Mam, konye kiinakini ijo eoŋ kwape kwana: arai kiner, ayaŋaari kagogoŋ.”
Kopoloor aronis naka ikatumunak kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT: naarai kitapianata ituŋa ainakinet naka EJAKAIT.
Ido kodonyonokini totoke ŋes anapito naedit, koinununei ŋes ŋolikaru, nakeupanarotor kokilenike ainakin asubanit naka ŋolikaru.
Kilipak Eli Elukana ka akeberu arereŋ, kobala ebe, “EJAKAIT koinak ijo ka aberu na aur kanuka ayuunet naayuunia EJAKAIT.” Koboŋosi orekec.
Kemojoŋ noi Eli; kopup kere nueswamanakinete odweke Isirael kere, ido kwape aperioto kaŋor nuejaanakinete kokek loka ewema loka airiamunun.
Kotema kes atiar, “Kanukinyo iswamaata akiro ŋun? Naarai ketejenikis eoŋ ituŋa lu kere akusiswamisio nueroko.
Okwe, odweka; naarai nueira mam eraas nuejok: itapaasi ituŋa luka EJAKAIT.

Arai kediaka ituŋanan mama ejai yeniceke, etubokini ŋes Edeke: konye arai kediaka ituŋanan mama ejai EJAKAIT, iŋai epurokini ŋes?” Konye mam apotu kiirasi eporoto loka papakec, naarai akoto EJAKAIT aiar kes.

Mam abu kaseu ŋes katekerin kere nuka Isirael, araun ekasasedoti, adokanar otemuka aisupuruunun lukisupurununo, anapenen da epod kakonyeneka? Mam abu kainak ekek loka papakon ainakineta kere nuka idwe luka Isirael nueinakinete kakim?
Kanukinyo ipetonoriata asubanaka ka ainakinetaka, nuabu kecorak kaiboisika; koyoŋ odwekon aitelekarit eoŋ, kotumakis nuitelekarito ajokis nuka ainakineta kere nuka ikatuŋa Isirael?

Ŋes enerar EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael atiar, ‘Abeit abu kener ebe elosenenei ekekikon ka ekek loka papakon, kakonyeneka apaarasia kere’: konye kwana inera EJAKAIT atiar, ‘Madi eoŋ: naarai ŋul lukayoŋito eoŋ, etopoloori, ka ŋul da lukamenito mam enyarao idiobore.
Koany, eponito apaarasia, nuajeparia akonikan, ka akan naka ekek loka papakon, kinyek ajaun ekimat kotogokon.
Ido ianyuni aiticanitoi naka aiboisika, toma abar kere naeinakini Edeke Isirael: kwabo emameunun ekimat kotogokon ikar kere.
Ka etuŋananikon lomam amudiari alemar kotemuka, eraun loikokoori akiyo kakonyekon, ka aitakadikin ekonitau: ka aur da naka ekekikon etwakenenete napekuruŋanete.
Eraun na da aanyunet kamakon, naedoikini odwekon luarei, Kopuni ka Pinekas; etwakete kere apaaran adiopet.
Eoŋ da etonyouni esasedoti lomunot, loiswamaenenei kwape ejaatar ŋun nuejaas otauka ka aomisioka: adukokini ŋes ekek loicasit: ido elosenenei kakonyen nuka lokinyonyoikitonoka akinyet ikar kere.

Kosodi kanen, ebuni ŋin yenideuna kokekikon akukonokin ŋes ailip atutubet naka epuesa ka idionyamat, ebe, “Keŋaiŋait, kitaraunai ediopet kotoma aswam naka isasedotin, tetere apedori ainyam idionyamat.” ’ ”
Kosodi kanen kapaarasia kaŋun, eperi Eli kaiboisike, (kowariwarete akekonye, komam epedori asesen.)
Koriŋa eduŋioro atala naka Edeke, koper Samuel kojotor, koyekalu loka EJAKAIT, neajai asaduku naka Edeke;
Kiworo EJAKAIT Samuel: kobala ebe, “Eoŋ lo.”
Koker neejai Eli, kotema atiar, “Eoŋ lo; naarai kiworot.” Kotema atiar, “Mam keworot; koper bobo.” Kolot koper.
Kiworo ŋes bobo EJAKAIT nakiaret ebe, “Samuel.” Konyou Samuel kolot mama ejai Eli, kobala ebe, “Eoŋ lo, naarai kiworot.” Koboŋok ebe, “Mam keworot, ikakoku; koper bobo.”
Koriŋa Samuel kejenuna EJAKAIT, ido koriŋa epukokina ŋes akirot naka EJAKAIT.
Kiworo bobo EJAKAIT Samuel nakiwuniet. Konyou kolot mama ejai Eli, kotema atiar, “Eoŋ lo, naarai kiworot.” Kojen Eli ebe EJAKAIT ŋes iworot ikoku.
Kanuka ŋun kolimok Eli Samuel ebe, “Kolot, koper: kosodi arai kiiworo, kotema atiar, ‘Kiner, EJAKAIT; naarai epupi ekonibulesit.’ ” Kolot Samuel koper kaiboisike.
Kotema EJAKAIT Samuel atiar, “Koany, abuni aswam akirot koIsirael, naisidelori aki kere nuka ŋinituŋanan yeniirari.
Kapaaran kaŋin etodolikini Eli kere nuabu kener nuka ekekike, ageun ka nasodit aitodol nakawasia.
Naarai abu kalimok ŋes ebe atubokini ekekike ikar kere, kanuka numam adolit nuabu kojen, naarai einyanakinete odweke Edeke, komam ŋes itikokini kes.
Kanuka ŋun eyapoikinit ekek loka Eli ebe, numam adolit nuka ekek loka Eli mam elucio kasubanit karaida kainakinet ikar kere.”
Koper Samuel aitiwalar akwap, koŋaana ikekia luka etogo loka EJAKAIT. Kokurianar Samuel alimokin Eli etapo.
Kosodi kiworo Eli Samuel, kobala ebe, “Samuel, okokuka.” Kotema atiar, “Eoŋ lo,”
Kotema atiar, “Anyoin akirot nakilimok jo EJAKAIT? Keŋaiŋait, sirikiimunonik eoŋ: kiswamak jo Edeke kwaŋin ka adepar da, arai kimunon adiokirot kakiro kere nukilimok ŋesi jo.”
Kolimok Samuel ŋes kere, mam abu kimunon adiokirot, Kotema atiar, “Ŋes EJAKAIT: kiswama ŋesi nuitojokit.”
Kojen Isirael kere anyoun koDan kiton Beer-seba ebe etogogoŋi Samuel araun enabi loka EJAKAIT.
Kotakan EJAKAIT bobo koSilo: naarai abu EJAKAIT kopukokin Samuel koSilo kakirot naka EJAKAIT.
Kiderakinos Ipilisitian asurokin Isirael: kejioto, apotu Ipilisitian kodanyata Isiraelin: koarata kojie ituŋa kwape ilukumin iwoŋon luka ajore.

Kosodete keboŋut ituŋa oidukurun kotemasi imakio luka Isirael atiar, “Kanukinyo kidanyia EJAKAIT oni lolo kakonyen nuka Ipilisitian? Mere kaomata asaduku naka aitutuket naka EJAKAIT koSilo, tetere ebuni mamawok, aitajar oni kakan naka lukasurupowok.”
Kijukasi ituŋa Silo, koyaut asaduku naka aitutuket naka EJAKAIT loka ajoresio, loiboie kokidiŋ kikerubin: odwe da luarei luka Eli, Kopuni ka Pinekas, ajaas ŋina kasaduku naka aitutuket naka Edeke.
Kosodi kedolu asaduku naka aitutuket naka EJAKAIT oidukurun, kibwoŋ Isirael kere kelala loepol, kijau da akwap.
Kepuputu Ipilisitian ecelet, kobalas ebe, “Anyoin apolou naka ecelet kaŋol loepol koidukurun luka Iburanian?” Kojenut do ebe adolu asaduku naka EJAKAIT oidukurun.
Kokuriakata Ipilisitian, naarai abalas ebe, “Abu Edeke oidukurun.” Kobalas ebe, “Itukwi! naarai mam ber lem ibore yenikoni nen ejauna.
Itukwi! Iŋai kiyuuni oni kakan naka idekesio lu luegogoŋ? Lu kes idekesio luadanyete Imisirian kiponesio kere luka atular kamodiŋ.
Kogogoŋoto, kitodiasi ekiliokone, yes Ipilisitian, tetere mam iraunos ibulesin luka Iburanian, kwape lem eraatatar kesi lukus: kitodiasi ekiliokone, kojioto.”
Koŋatarai asaduku naka Edeke; koarai da odwe luarei luka Eli, Kopuni ka Pinekas.
Kosodi kedolu, koany, eboie Eli koicoloŋoke kariri naka erot, kidari: naarai amarani eketau kanuka asaduku naka EJAKAIT, Kelomu etuŋanan ore, kolimo akirot, kodelo ere kere.
Kepupu Eli eporoto loka adelor, kotema atiar, “Anyoin apolou naka ecelet kaŋol?” Kiwonya etuŋanan kolimok Eli.
Kerai Eli loka ikar akaisakanykaoŋon ka lukanykauni, awariwarete akekonye, komam epedori asesen.
Kotema etuŋanan Eli atiar, “Eoŋ ŋol loabuni kajore, akeruni eoŋ lolo kajore.” Kotema atiar, “Ikote akiro ai, okokuka?”
Koboŋok loayaun akiro ebe, “Aker Isirael kakonyen nuka Ipilisitian, ajaun da earit loepol kotuŋa, odwekon da luarei, Kopuni ka Pinekas atwaka, aŋatar da asaduku naka Edeke.”
Kosodi kanen kelimu ŋesi nuka asaduku naka Edeke, kibiror Eli eidedia koicoloŋoke kariri naka erute, kobila emurisiŋike, kotwana; naarai amojoŋit ido alaŋir, Abu kirabakinite Isirael ikar akaisaoŋon.
Apotie aberu naka okokuke Pinekas, koapie da aidoun: kepupu ŋin akiro ebe aŋatar asaduku naka Edeke, ido atwaka papaake ka okilenike, kokukum, kidou; naarai abu akeriebo kodolok ŋes.
Napeapie ŋesi atwanare kolimokis ŋes aŋor nuabwoete kanen ebe, “Sirikikurianar, naarai idou esapat.” Konye mam abu Koboŋok, karaida apodokin.
Komaik ikoku Ikabod, kobala ebe, “Anyou aibusesukon, Isirael”: naarai aŋatar asaduku naka Edeke, ido kanuka papaake ka okilenike.
Kotema atiar, “Anyou aibuses koIsirael; naarai aŋatar asaduku naka Edeke.”
Apotu Ipilisitian koŋatarito asaduku naka Edeke, koyaŋaut anyoun koEbeneser kiton Asudod.
Koyaŋaasi Ipilisitian asaduku naka Edeke, kibwaikis togo loka Dagon, kosipokis eiduny ka Dagon.
Kosodete kenyout luka Asudod tupuruc sek, koany, ebirokina Dagon kwap kakonyen nuka asaduku naka EJAKAIT. Kolemut Dagon kinyakakis aiboisike.
Kosodete kenyout tupuruc sek, koany, ebirokina Dagon kwap kakonyen nuka asaduku naka EJAKAIT: ajepara da akou naka Dagon ka akaninike kibelibelos kokek; akuan naka Dagon bon abu kosal.
Kanuka ŋun isasedotin luka Dagon, karaida ŋinidiopet yenelomari togo loka Dagon mam icakakinete akecekeje okek loka Dagon kotoma Asudod, aitodol lolo.
Kosodete keanyut ituŋa luka Asudod ebe ikote nen, kotemasi atiar, “Mam asaduku naka Edeke loka Isirael iboikin mamawok: naarai ededeŋ akekan kamawok, kama kaDagon da ewokodeke.”

Kijukasi kotukokis ijaka kere luka Ipilisitian kotemasi atiar, “Kikwaikini ai asaduku naka Edeke loka Isirael?” Koboŋokis atiar, “Kibwokoroi asaduku naka Edeke loka Isirael Gat.” Kibwokosi asaduku naka Edeke loka Isirael ŋina.
Kosodi do, kedaut kesi aibwokor asaduku koluik akan naka EJAKAIT ere aitican kes: kodany ituŋa lukore, ludidik ka luepolok da, kolomut abusion kamakec.
Kwaŋin kijukasi asaduku naka Edeke Ekuron. Kosodi kanen, kedolu asaduku naka Edeke Ekuron, kodelosi Ikuronin ebe, “Ayaut asaduku naka Edeke loka Isirael mamawok aiar oni ka iwokotuŋa.”

Kanuka ŋun kijukasi kotukokis ijaka kere luka Ipilisitian, kotemasi atiar, “Kijukasi asaduku naka Edeke loka Isirael, kolot bobo aiboisike alopet, tetere mam kiari oni ka iwokotuŋa”: naarai ajai aiticanet naerono ore kere; alaŋir noi akan naka Edeke kanen.
Ituŋa lumam apotu kotwaka aponi kiticanai kabusion: kodoka aimony nakore akuj.
Kojai asaduku naka EJAKAIT akwap naka Ipilisitian adaun ilapio ikanykaarei.
Konyaraut Ipilisitian isasedotin ka ikaroak, kobalas ebe, “Kikwaikini ai asaduku naka EJAKAIT? Kitodikinai lukijukaria kaŋes aiboisike.”

Kotemasi atiar, “Arai ijukarete asaduku naka Edeke loka Isirael, sirikijukasi komamei ibore; konye kinyakasi ŋes kainakinet naka aibucaret: ŋes do iŋaleunioto, kitejenunio da yes numam ŋes elemaritor akekan kamakus.”

Kosodete kesi atemar ebe, “Inyoin eraun ainakinet naka aibucaret yenikinyakaria ŋes?” Kotemasi atiar, “Abusion akany nuka esabu, ka imirio ikany luka esabu, kwape ejaar etiai loka ijaka luka Ipilisitian: naarai adiopetular ajai mamakus kere ka ijakakus da.
Ŋes do iswamauniata aputosia nuka abusionokus ka aputosia nuka imiriokus luemunaunete akwap; iinakinete Edeke loka Isirael aibuses: diat itebebeni akekan kamakus, ka ikusidekesio, ka akusikwap da.
Kanukinyo itogogonioto ikusitauon kwape etogogoŋioto Imisirian ka Parao ikecetauon? Naeswamaa nukaumokin kamakec mam kereka kes apotu kisiikis Ituŋa alosit, kolototo da?
Aso do kolemut kitemokis agali nakitetet, ka aituk aarei nuicirio, numam iirito ajokot, koenikis aituk agali, kinyakut itakakec ore:
Kolemut asaduku naka EJAKAIT, kibwaikis agali; kibwaikis da iboro luka esabu luinyakariata ŋes araun ainakinet naka aibucaret toma asaduku ace eiduny kaya: koremosi tetere elosi.

Koanyut, arai kitor orot loka eikoruke elopet kiton Bet-semes, ŋes atemar ebe ŋes kiswamak oni aronis na naepol: konye arai mam, kijenuni do ebe mere akekan kidany oni; kerai arereŋ naerono naabu kodoik oni.”
Kiswamata ituŋa kwaŋin; kolemut aituk aarei nuicira, koenikis agali, kogolokis da itakakec ore:
Kibwaikis asaduku naka EJAKAIT agali, ka asaduku naajaas imirio luka esabu ka aputosia nuka abusionokec.
Kodero aitukerot loitenara alosit Bet-semes; kodero orot lokapolon, komonyete elosete, mam apotu kopaasi teten arai kediany; kotupakis ijaka luka Ipilisitian kes aitodol oikor loka Bet-semes.
Asakete luka Bet-semes akimakec kaditot; kiteluosi akecekonye, koanyut asaduku, kiyalamikinos da aanyun.
Koloma agali omanikor loka Yosua Ebet-semit, kobwou kanen, kaneajai amoru naapol: kibeta akito nuka agali, koinakis aituk araun ainakinet naicweio mama ejai EJAKAIT.

Kolemut Ilebin asaduku naka EJAKAIT, ka asaduku naajai kaŋes naajaas iboro luka esabu kibwaikis kes amoru ŋin naapol: kijaikis ituŋa luka Bet-semes ainakineta nuicweio, kosubata da asuban apaaran ŋipeŋin mama ejai EJAKAIT.
Kosodete kedaut ijaka ikany luka Ipilisitian aanyun, koboŋosi Ekuron kapaaran kaŋin.

Nu kes abusion nuka esabu nuenyakarete Ipilisitian araun ainakinet naka aibucaret mama ejai EJAKAIT; naka Asudod adiopet, naka Gasa adiopet, naka Asukelon adiopet, naka Gat adiopet, ka naka Ekuron da adiopet;

Ka imirio luka esabu, kwape ajaar etiai loka ireria kere luka ijaka ikany luka Ipilisitian, ireria luebwaitai ka ireria lukoronyia. Amoru naapol, naasipokinete kesi asaduku naka EJAKAIT, amoru ŋin ejai kiton lolo omanikor loka Yosua Ebet-semit.
Kobalas ituŋa luka Bet-semes ebe, “Iŋai bo epedori aibwo kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, Edeke lo lokalaunan? Ido ai ca kitebeari oni ŋes?”
Kijukasi ikiyakia mama ejaas lueboienenete koKiriat-yearim kobalas ebe, “Enyakut bobo Ipilisitian asaduku naka EJAKAIT: kijesunos yesi koomut.”
Kosodi kanen ageun kapaaran kaŋin kiboi asaduku koKiriat-yearim apaarasia nuipu: naarai kes ikar akaisaarei: komony ekek kere loka Isirael mama ejai EJAKAIT.
Kosodete idwe luka Isirael alemar Ibaalin ka Asitarot, kijaanakis EJAKAIT bon.
Kotukokinos Misipa, kookut akipi, kobukosi kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, koluŋata apaaran ŋin, kobalas kanen ebe, “Kidiaka kama ejai EJAKAIT.” Kirabak Samuel idwe luka Isirael koMisipa.
Kepuput Ipilisitian ebe etukokina idwe luka Isirael Misipa, koloto ijaka luka Ipilisitian asurokin Isirael. Kepuput idwe luka Isirael, apotu kokuriakata Ipilisitian.
Kobalas idwe luka Isirael Samuel ebe, “Sirikitanaŋ aimony mama ejai EJAKAIT Ewokodeke kanukosi, tetere kitajari isio kakan naka Ipilisitian.”
Kolem Samuel imerekek yenenaki, koinak ŋes araun ainakinet naicweio mama ejai EJAKAIT: komony Samuel mama ejai EJAKAIT kanuka Isirael; Koboŋok EJAKAIT ŋes.
Napeinakini Samuel ainakinet naicweio, kikunyut Ipilisitian aitiji Isirael: konye kiretak EJAKAIT Ipilisitian kairetun naepol kapaaran kaŋin, kitican kes; kodanyai kes kakonyen nuka Isirael.
Kolomasi ituŋa luka Isirael koMisipa, kodapata Ipilisitian, kodanya kes, kiton naadolioto Bet-car.
Kwaŋin kitononokai Ipilisitian, mam bobo apotu kolomut oikorun luka Isirael: koluik akan naka EJAKAIT Ipilisitian apaarasia kere nuka Samuel.
Kinyakakinai Isirael ireria luaŋatarito Ipilisitian kamakec, anyoun koEkuron kiton Gat; koyu Isirael eikoruke kakan naka Epilisitian. Kinapakina Isirael ka Imorain.
Kirimonori kaŋolikaru Bet-el, ka Giligal, ka Misipa; kotubok Isirael kaiboisio kaŋun kere.
Koboŋonori Rama, naarai ŋina ajai eketogo; kotubok Isirael kanen: kodukok nen etem loka EJAKAIT.
Ekiror loka ekiyaike ŋes Yoel; ka ekiror loka lokiareit Abiya: keraas ikatubok koBeer-seba.
Mam odweke apotu kotupasi ikeponesio, konye apotu kopaasi adumun apesan, apotu kijaut ainakineta nuitumudakete akonye, kitirioto etube.
Kosodete imakio kere luka Isirael atukokin, kopotu Rama neajai Samuel.
Kolimokis ŋes atiar, “Koany, imoion ijo, odwekon da mam etupito ikoniponesio: aso koseikinai sio ekabaka atubonokin sio kwape katekerin kere.”
Konye kitakadik akirot Samuel, naalimunioto ebe, “Koseikinai sio ekabaka atubonokin sio.” Kilip Samuel mama ejai EJAKAIT.
Kotema EJAKAIT Samuel atiar, “Kopupok eporoto loka ituŋa kakiro kere nukilimokinete: naarai mam kiŋerito jo, konye kaŋeroto eoŋ, kenyek araut ekabakakec.
Kwape ejaatar aswamisio kere nueswamata ageun kapaaran naetolomunia kes koMisiri aitodol lolo, kwape kajaliata eoŋ, ejaanakiniata icedekesio, kikonakis jo kwaŋin.
Aso do kopupok ekeceporoto: konye itejenikini kes kaitebeikin, itodikini da epone loka ekabaka loeyai kes.”
Kolimok Samuel ituŋa luelipitos ŋes ekabaka akiro kere nuka EJAKAIT.
Kotema atiar, “Ikoni neta ekabaka lokiyai yes: eyaŋaari odwekus, eseuni kes kanuka agalinike, araun ikebwanenok ibalasinike; ekerete da koiŋaren kagalinike:
Eseuni kes araun ikapolok luka ilukumin, ka ikapolok luka akaisakany; eseuni ice akor akelup, ka aisak ikenyamat, aiswamaun da iboroke lujiis, ka iboro luka agalinike.
Eyaŋaari adwekus araun nuinyalete nueur maa, araun da akepook, araun akapeok imugatin.
Eyaŋaari da imanikoriakus, ka amanatakus nuka emusabibu, ka amanatakus nuka iseitunin, nuitelekarit ajokis kakesi, einakini kes ikekejaanakinak.
Eyaŋaari idiopet kotomon yenika ikinyomokus, yenika amanatakus da nuka emusabibu, einakini ijakake ka ikekejaanakinak.
Eyaŋaari ibulesinikus, ka abulesinikus, ka ikatumunakakus luejok noi, ka asigiriakus, aitwasam akeswam.
Eyaŋaari idiopet kotomon yenika isipaninikus: yesi da iraunos ikebulesin.
Imonyete yesi kapaaran kaŋin kanuka ekabakakus loiseunete yesi; mam EJAKAIT kiboŋokini yes kapaaran kaŋin.”
Tetere kiputokin katekerin kere; tetere da ekosikabaka kitubokini sio, kiŋarenenokini da, ejie ijiisiokosi.”
Kopup Samuel akiro kere nuka ituŋa, kitatam kes kaki nuka EJAKAIT.
Kotema EJAKAIT Samuel atiar, “Kopupok ekeceporoto, koseik kes ekabaka.” Kotema Samuel ituŋa luka Isirael atiar, “Aso kolototo, ŋinituŋanan oreke.”
Kejai ŋes okokuke, ekekiror Saul, ekatumunan loejok loetemelel: amamei kodwe luka Isirael yenadeparit ŋes katemelel: aoja ŋesi anyoun kokeperinike adepar ituŋa kere.
Apotu kooliosi asigiria nuka Kis, papa loka Saul. Kotema Kis Saul okokuke atiar, “Koyaŋa ediopet kobulesin konyou, kolot aimo asigiria.”

Kitor akwap nakiukon naka Epuraim, kitor da akwap naka Salisa, konye mam apotu kodumut kes: kosodete aitor akwap naka Saalim, komameete kanen da: kitor akwap naka Ibenyamin, konye mam apotu kodumut kes.
Kobala ŋes ebe, “Aso koany, ejai toma ore lo etuŋanan loka Edeke, erai da etuŋanan loeyoŋitai, edolenenete kere nuelimuni: aso kaloto ŋina; diat kilimokini nuka alositewok.”
Kosodi Saul atemar ekebulesit atiar, “Konye koany, arai kiilot, inyo kiinari oni etuŋanan? Naarai adaun emugati koriaginiwok, emamei ainakinet nakiinari etuŋanan loka Edeke: inyo bo ejai oni?”
Koboŋok ebulesit Saul bobo atiar, “Koany, ejai akanika idiopet kooŋon yenika esekel loka epuesa: ainakini ŋin etuŋanan loka Edeke, kodwarak oni ewokorot.”
(Lem sek ko Isirael, naelosio ituŋanan aiŋitun Edeke, kobala kwanata ebe, “Bia, kaloto mama ejai ekadwaran”; naarai ŋol loenyaritai. Kwana Enabi anyaritai lem sek Ekadwaran.)
Kosodi Saul atemar ekebulesit atiar, “Iner ejok; bia, kaloto.” Kolototo ore neajai etuŋanan loka Edeke.
Koboŋokis kesi atiar, “Ejai; koany, ejai kiŋarenikus: aso kiwonyasi, naarai ebunit lolo ore; naarai einakinete ituŋa lolo asubanit kaibois naicelelei:

Napeidolioto yesi ore, irasakinete aanyun ŋes, eroko ŋes keloto aibois naicelelei ainyam: naarai mam ituŋa enyamete aitodol neebunio ŋesi, naarai ŋes ilipakini asubanit arereŋ; akauloke enyamete ŋul luenyaritai. Aso do, kodokasi, naarai kapak kana ianyunete ŋes.”
Kodokasi ore; napelomarete kesi ore, koany, kiriamunos kesi ka Samuel elosi aibois naicelelei.

“Moi, osawa lopelo kejukakini jo etuŋanan loka akwap naka Benyamin, inyonyoikini ŋes akinyet araun ekapolon loeyait ikatuŋa Isirael, itajari ŋesi ikatuŋa kakan naka Ipilisitian: naarai ete ikatuŋa, naarai adolu aimonyokec mama ajai.”
Keanyu Samuel Saul, kotema EJAKAIT ŋes atiar, “Koany etuŋanan loabu kalimokinite jo nuke! Lopelo ŋes eyai ikatuŋa.”
Kikuny Saul orute mama ejai Samuel, kotema atiar, “Keŋaiŋait, kolimokinai neejai etogo loka ekadwaran.”
Koboŋok Samuel Saul ebe, “Eoŋ ŋes ekadwaran; kodoka kiŋaren aibois naicelelei, naarai imorete keoŋ ainyam lolo: moi tupuruc katwaria jo, kalimokini kere nuejaas otaukon.
Konye sirikipodokin asigiriakon nuaoliorete apaarasia auni nuatuboros; naarai adumunos. Ido lukaŋai iboro kere luimielas luka Isirael? Mere lupekon, ka ekek kere loka papakon.”
Koboŋok Saul ebe, “Mere eoŋ Ebenyamit, loka ateker naedit noi katekerin nuka Isirael? Ekekika da loedit noi kokekia kere luka ateker naka Benyamin? Kanukinyo inerar keoŋ nuikote nen?”
Koyaŋa Samuel Saul ka ebulesitike, koyaŋau kes agola naka ipejok, kisiboik kes aiboisio nukapolou neajaas luanyaritai, luemwaasi ituŋa akaisauni.
Kotema Samuel ekepoon atiar, “Koyau einer loabu kainak jo, loabu kalimok jo ebe, ‘Kidar ŋes.’ ”

Koyaŋa ekepoon amurwo ka akwalikwalike, kibwaik akonyen nuka Saul. Kotema Samuel atiar, “Koany, ŋin naaponi kiŋadakinai! Kibwaik akonyenekon, konyam; naarai kiŋadakinitai jo aitodol apak naaseikinitai, naarai abu kabala ebe, Anyaraunit ituŋa.”
Kwaŋin komorata Saul ka Samuel kapaaran kaŋin.
Kosodi kijesunos kesi kaibois naicelelei toma ore, kinerata ŋesi ka Saul kokuju togo.
Kodilokis anyoun: kosodi kanen kiwala akwap, konyara Samuel Saul kuju togo, kobala ebe, “Konyou, katwar jo kolot.” Konyou Saul, kouparos kiŋa, ŋes ka Samuel.
Ijesaros kesi alomar kore, kotema Samuel Saul atiar, “Kolimok ebulesit kotubor kiŋarenewok, (kotubori ŋesi,) konye kobwo ijo kanepekane, tetere kesiirari jo akiro naka Edeke.”

Nainyounio kaneajai eoŋ lolo, idumuni ituŋa iarei eiduny kates naka Rakel, koikor loka Benyamin ka Selusa; kilimokinete jo ebe, ‘Asigiria nuibu kolot aimo adumunos: ido koany, enyek papakon apod nuka asigiria epod jo ebe, “Ekwaikini ai kanuka okokuka?” ’

Ŋes do ilosio ijo kanen, idoli olua loka Tabor, iriamunos kituŋa iuni kaŋina luelosete mama ejai Edeke Bet-el, ibwokit ediopet ikalei iuni, ibwokit ece imugatin iuni, ka loce da ibwokit eriagi loka emukule loka ebino:
Kiyogaete jo, kiinakinete jo imugatin iarei; luijauni jo kakanikec.

Akaulo kaŋun ibuni ijo oukot loka EJAKAIT, neejai aibois naka iserikalen luka Ipilisitian; kosodi kanen naidolio jo ore, iriamunos kerioŋet loka inabin ijesunos kaibois naicelelei ejaas kesabuli, ka esimat, ka alamaru, ka adeudeu koiŋarenikec; ido kodwarete kesi:
Kidoikini jo emoyo loka EJAKAIT kagogoŋ, idwari da nepepe kakes, iluor ijo ecetuŋanan.
Kikoni nen, nakidoikiniata jo aanyuneta ŋun, iswamai nuibusakinit aswam; naarai ejai Edeke kajo.

Kiŋarenikini eoŋ alosit Giligal; ido koany, abuni mama ijai ainakin ainakineta nuicweio, ka asuban nuka ainakineta nuka ainapakin; idareuni apaarasia akanykaarei, aitodol neabunio, aitodikin jo nuiswamai.”
Kikwaikis nen, naanyounio ŋesi kaneajai Samuel, abu Edeke koinak ŋes ecetau: kodoloto aanyuneta ŋun kere kapaaran kaŋin.
Kosodi kedolut oukot, koany, kiriamunos erioŋet loka inabin kaŋes; kodoik ŋes emoyo loka Edeke kagogoŋ, kodwar kakes.
Kosodi kanen, keanyut lulem ajenete ŋes ebe koany, edwari nepepe kinabin, kotemanaros ituŋa ebe, “Inyo bo yen yenadoiki okoku loka Kis? Ejai Saul da onabin?”
Koboŋok ediopet loka aibois kaŋin ebe, “Iŋai bo papakec?” Koraun do awaragan ebe, “Ejai Saul da onabin?”
Kosodi kedau aidwar, kobu aibois naicelelei.
Kotema mamai loka Saul atiar, “Keŋaiŋait kolimokinai nuabu Samuel kolimok jo.”
Kotema Saul mamaike atiar, “Abu kolimok sio ebe adumunos asigiria.” Konye akirot naka ajakanut naabu Samuel kinerite, mam abu kolimok ŋes.
Kotema idwe luka Isirael atiar, “Inera kwanata EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael ebe, ‘Abu ketolom Isirael koMisiri, kayu yes kakan naka Imisirian, kakan da naka ajakanuto kere nukimwaŋito yes’:

Konye iŋeroto lolo Edekekus, loabu kitajar yes katiokisiokus kere kocanikus da; ipotu kotemasi ŋes ebe, ‘Mam, konye koseikinai sio ekabaka.’ Aso do kitodiaros akonyen nuka EJAKAIT katekerinikus ka ilukuminikus.”
Kisukuny ateker naka Benyamin kokekiakec, koseunai ekek loka Imaturin: kisukuny ekek loka Maturi ediopet ediopet; koseunai Saul okoku loka Kis; konye kemoata ŋes mam apotu kodumut.
Kanuka ŋun kiŋita bobo EJAKAIT ebe, “Ejai kereka etuŋanan loeroko kedoluno?” Koboŋok EJAKAIT ebe, “Koany, eŋopit koboro.”
Kokerata koomata ŋes kaŋina; kosodi kebwo ŋesi kotuŋa, aoja ŋesi adepar ituŋa kere ageun kokeperinike.
Kotema Samuel ituŋa kere atiar, “Ianyut yesi ŋol loaseu EJAKAIT, ebe emamei loeputotor kotuŋa kere?” Kiworoto ituŋa kere ebe, “Kidari Edeke ekabaka.”
Kolot Saul da togoke Gibea; kolototo ituŋa lukirigin luatirorit Edeke itauonokec kaŋes.
Konye odwe luka Belial ice kotemasi atiar, “Ikwaikini ai etuŋanan lo kitajari oni?” Komenata ŋes, mam apotu koinut ainakinet. Konye kililiŋ ŋesi.
Kotemasi imakio luka Yabes ŋes atiar, “Koinakinai ber isio apaarasia akanykaarei, tetere kijukari ekiyakia oikorun kere luka Isirael: kosodi konyet, arai kemameun yenikitajari sio, kibuni mama ijai.”
Kopotu ikiyakia Gibea loka Saul, kolimokis ituŋa akiro ŋun: kodelosi ituŋa kere, komonyata.
Ido koany, kobu Saul komanikor, etupit imoŋin; kotema Saul atiar, “Inyo bo isiriebi ituŋa tape emonyete?” Kolimokis ŋes akiro nuka ituŋa luka Yabes.
Kodoik emoyo loka Edeke Saul kagogoŋ nakepupunia akiro ŋun, kinep noi akenyunyura.

Koyau imoŋin iarei, kotubutub kijuka oikorun kere luka Isirael kakan naka ikiyakia, ebe, “Ŋinituŋanan yenimam etupit Saul ka Samuel iswamakinio kwaŋin ikemoŋin.” Kodoik ituŋa akurian EJAKAIT, kopotu bala idiopetuŋanan.
Kimara kes koBesek; emwaasi idwe luka Isirael ilukumin akwat auni, ka ituŋa luka Yuda ilukumin akaisauni.
Kotemasi kesi ikiyakia luapote atiar, “Ilimokinete kwanata ituŋa luka Yabes-gilead ebe, ‘Moi, kapak naemwaniar akoloŋ, kiyuunio.’ ” Kopotu ikiyakia kolimokis ituŋa luka Yabes; kiyalamikinos.
Kanuka ŋun kotemasi ituŋa luka Yabes atiar, “Kibuni moi mama ijai, kiswamakini isio kere nuitojokit ijo.”

Kojaun kwaŋin tupuruc, kitemok Saul ituŋa orioŋeta iuni; kopotu kidiŋ kiidukurun kakwenyunet naka tupuruc, kodanyata Imonain aitodol amwanis naka apaaran: kosodi kanen kisiarakinos luapotu kideunos, komam iarei kakesi esalete nepepe.
Kotema Saul atiar, “Mam lolo eario idio tuŋanan: naarai ayu lolo EJAKAIT Isirael.”

Koloto ituŋa kere Giligal; kodakakis Saul araun ekabaka kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT koGiligal; koinakis da kaŋina asuban nuka ainakineta nuka ainapakin kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT: kiyalamikini noi Saul ka ituŋa kere luka Isirael kaŋina.
Kwana da, koany, elosi ekabaka kakonyenekus: eoŋ da amojoŋ abwaŋut akorwo, ido koany, odweka ejaas kayes: abu kalosenenei kakonyenekus ameun keiditeuka kiton lolo.

Eoŋ lo: kolimoroi kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kakonyen da nuka lokinyonyoikitonoke akinyet: iŋai ca ademarit ekemoŋ? Arai iŋai ademarit akesigiria? Arai iŋai arodit luke? Iŋai abu kareite? Arai iŋai abu kedaudau lukitumudakete akakonye? Eoŋ da katacakini yes.”
Kobalas ebe, “Mam irodit lukosi, kwabo mam kireit, kwabo mam ilemarit imodiobore kakan naka idiotuŋanan kere.”
Kotema kes atiar, “EJAKAIT ŋes ekajenan kamakus, ka lokinyonyoikitonoke akinyet da ŋes ekajenan lolo, kwape mam yes idumunitotor ibore kakanika.” Kobalas ebe, “Ŋes ekajenan.”
Aso kwana kobwaata, tetere kipuri kayes kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kanuka aswamisio kere nuedolito nuka EJAKAIT, nukiswamakini yes ka lukapapaakus.
Nakedolio Yakob Misiri, komonyakis lukapapaakus EJAKAIT, kosodi kijuka EJAKAIT Musa ka Aaron, luetonyounete lukapapaakus koMisiri, kisiboikis aibois na.
Konye kimurwokis kes EJAKAIT Ekecedeke, kogwela kes akan naka Sisera lokapolon loka ajore naka Kasor, ido kakan naka Ipilisitian, kakan da naka ekabaka loka Moab, kojioto kakes.
Komonyakis EJAKAIT, kobalas ebe, ‘Kipou kadiakata, naarai kipou kenyeisi EJAKAIT, kejaanakis Ibaalin ka Asitarot: konye kwana koyuunai kakan naka lukasurupokosi, kasodete aijaanakin jo.’
Kijukak EJAKAIT Yerubaal, ka Bedan, ka Yeputa, ka Samuel, koyu yes kakan naka lukasurupokus kariino kere, kiboikinos inapakina.
Naianyuniata kiisurok Nakas ekabaka loka idwe luka Amon, ipotu kotemasi eoŋ atiar, ‘Mam, konye ekabaka ŋes kirumi sio’: kwabo EJAKAIT Ekusideke kerai Ekusikabaka.
Aso do kosesenata ekabaka loipotu koseut, loipotu kilipata: ido koany, kiinak EJAKAIT yes ekabaka.
Arai iyoŋito EJAKAIT kijaanakinete, kopupenenete ekeporoto, kwabo mam ipaliikinete aicorakinet naka EJAKAIT, yes ka ekabaka da lokirumit kotupenenete EJAKAIT Ekusideke, aso:
Konye arai mam ipupenenete eporoto loka EJAKAIT, kipaliikis aicorakinet naka EJAKAIT, ŋes itusurupio akan naka EJAKAIT yes, kwape etusurupio kolo lukapapaakus.
Aso do, kobwaata, koanyut akirot na nakos, naiswamai EJAKAIT kakonyenekus.
Mere lolo asaket naka akima? Elipi EJAKAIT koyaŋau eires ka akiru; kojenut yesi koanyut kwape epoloor akusironis, naipotu kiswamata kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, ailip ekabaka.”
Kosodi Samuel ailip EJAKAIT: koyaŋau EJAKAIT eires ka akiru kapaaran kaŋin; koyoŋata noi ituŋa kere EJAKAIT ka Samuel da.
Kolimok Samuel ituŋa ebe, “Sirikiyoŋa: abeit ipotu kiswamata aronis na kere: konye sirikipaasi ainyein atupenen EJAKAIT, konye kijaanakis EJAKAIT kikusitauon kere:
Sirikipaasi: naarai ti ŋes atupar aamameak, numam ajokis karaida ayuun, naarai eraas nuutaai.
Naarai mam ejalakin EJAKAIT iketuŋa kanuka ekekiror lokos: naarai kitojok EJAKAIT aituluor yes ateker kanukeŋ.
Ido kanukaŋ, madi akuj eoŋ aidiak kama ka EJAKAIT ainyein ailipanakin yes: konye ketuutoori yes erot lokajokan loitenara.
Konye koyoŋito EJAKAIT bon, kijaanakinete kotoma abeit kikusitauon kere: kiitununete akiro kwape eraatar nukos nukiswamanakini yes.
Konye arai Iriŋa iyatanakinete aswam nueroko imudiaros yes kere ka ekusikabaka da.”
Kerai, Saul loka ikar akaisauni naageunia airum; abu kirum Isirael ikar iarei.

Koseu Saul ituŋa luka Isirael ilukumin iuni; kaŋul ajaananas ituŋa ilukumin iarei nepepe ka Saul Mikimas, moru loka Bet-el da, ajaananas da elukumit nepepe ka Yonatan Gibea loka Benyamin: kotwar luce kere ŋinituŋanan owemake.
Kodany Yonatan iserikalen luka Ipilisitian luajaas Geba, kopuput Ipilisitian ŋun, Kokutak Saul arupepe airiamar akwap kere kobala ebe, “Kopuput do Iburanian.”
Kopup Isirael kere ebakai ebe adany Saul iserikalen luka Ipilisitian, ebe da amena Ipilisitian Isirael. Kotukokinos ituŋa atupar Saul Giligal.
Keanyut ituŋa luka Isirael ebe aridakina kesi, (naarai eyaloŋoŋoete ituŋa) apotu ituŋa koŋopata kabuai, kamonieik komorun, katesin ka apanya da.
Ekwaŋara ice koBuranian koYorodan akwap naka Gad ka Gilead; konye Saul, aroko ŋesi ajai Giligal, kotupasi ŋes ituŋa kere komaranete.
Kotema Saul atiar, “Koinunai ainakinet nacweio, ka ainakineta nuka ainapakin.” Kosodi ŋesi ainakin ainakinet naicweio.
Kosodi kanen, napedauni ŋesi ainakin ainakinet naicweio, koany, kobu Samuel; kolot Saul airiamun kaŋes, tetere iyogai ŋes.
Kotema Samuel atiar, “Inyo bo iswamaa ijo?” Kotema Saul atiar, “Naarai abu kaany ituŋa isiararos kamakaŋ, mam da jo ibu kobu kapaarasia kanuaseunitai, atukokina da Ipilisitian Mikimas;
Ŋes atemaria eoŋ ebe, ‘Epote do Ipilisitian mama ajai Giligal, mam elipit asianut naka EJAKAIT’: ŋes etiŋaikinor ainakin ainakinet naicweio.”
Kobala Samuel Saul ebe, “Iswama nukabaŋaanut; mam iricit aicorakinet naka EJAKAIT Ekonideke naabu kicorak jo, naarai ti EJAKAIT kiticat akonijakanut koIsirael ikar kere.
Konye kwana mam akonijakanut icasi: amou EJAKAIT etuŋanan loekot, aseu EJAKAIT ŋes araun ekapolon loeyait iketuŋa, naarai mam iricit ŋin naabu EJAKAIT kicorak jo.”
Konyou Samuel, kolot koGiligal kiton Gibea loka Benyamin.
Kimar Saul ituŋa luajaas kaŋes, kwaka akwat akanykape.
Kiboioto Saul ka Yonatan okokuke, ka ituŋa luajaas kakes koGeba loka Benyamin: konye kidukuroto Ipilisitian Mikimas.
Kopotu ikaŋatak koidukurun luka Ipilisitian korioŋeta iuni: kitor erioŋet ediopet orot loebei Opura, kiton akwap naka Saul:
Kitor ecerioŋet orot loebei Bet-koron: kitor erioŋet ece da orot loka eikor loitei aditot naka Seboim kobei amodiŋ.
Konye alosenenete Isiraelin kere mama ejaas Ipilisitian, ŋinituŋanan aipen ekemeleku, ka ekileŋike, ka aepeke ka eŋitike;
Keŋiŋioros iŋitia, ka ikileŋa, ka imelekes ka aepei; aitemokin da imacarin.”
Kwaŋin kapaaran naka ejie, komameun ekileŋ karaida akwara kakan naka idiotuŋanan kotuŋa luajaas ka Saul ka Yonatan: dimarai Saul ka Yonatan okokuke kes ajaas.
Koloto iserikalen luka Ipilisitian aridat naka Mikimas.
Kosodi adiopepaaran abu Yonatan okoku loka Saul kotema ekatumunan loadakit lujiisike atiar, “Kobia kaloto mama ejaas iserikalen luka Ipilisitian, luejaas owai je.” Konye mam abu kolimok papake.
Kiboikin Saul atutubet nakosaŋe naka Gibea kwap kekamamaga, loejai Miguron: emwaasi ituŋa luajaas kaŋes kwape akwat akanykape.
Abu Akiya okoku loka Akitub, onace loka Ikabod, okoku loka Pinekas, okoku loka Eli, esasedoti loka EJAKAIT koSilo konapite epod. Mam apotu ituŋa kojenut ebe alot Yonatan.
Kidiŋ karidana, nuakoto Yonatan aitor alosit mama ejaas iserikalen luka Ipilisitian, ajai emoru osiep ediopet ka emoru osiep ece da: ekiror loka ediopet ŋes Boses, ka ekiror loka ece da ŋes Sene.
Ajai ediopemoru ari naka agolitomei kiŋaren kaMikimas, loce da ari naka eŋalakimak iŋaren keGeba.
Kobala loadakit lujiisike atiar, “Kiswama kere nuejaas otaukon: koany, ajai eoŋ nepepe kajo, kwape ejaar ekonitau ŋes ejaar lokaŋ da.”
Kosodi Yonatan atemar atiar, “Koany, kilosi mama ejaas ituŋa, kasodete aitodiar kamakec.
Arai kiitemasi kesi oni atiar, ‘Kidareutu aitodol nakibunio mamakus’; ŋes kisalakinia aiboisiwok, mam da kidokari mamakec.
Konye arai ketemasi atiar, ‘Kodokutu mamakosi’; ŋes do kidokaria: naarai ijaikini EJAKAIT kes akaniwok: eraun ŋin aanyunet kamawok.”
Kosodete kesi iarei aitodiar oserikalen luka Ipilisitian: kotemasi Ipilisitian atiar, “Koany, alomut Iburanian kapanya kanuaŋopitotor.”

Koboŋokis iserikalen Yonatan ka loadakit lujiisike ebe, “Kodokutu mamakosi, kitodikini isio yes ibore.” Kotema Yonatan loadakit lujiisike atiar, “Kodok, kotupunai: naarai ejaiki EJAKAIT kes akan naka Isirael.”
Kodoka Yonatan kuju eliat kakanin ka akeje, kotupite ŋes loadakit lujiisike: kibiroros kesi kakonyen nuka Yonatan; komeete loadakit lujiisike aiar kes.
Earit ŋol losodit loaarete Yonatan ka loadakit lujiisike emwaasi ituŋa akaisaarei, katutubet naedit noi kosubite bala epelu lokamana.
Kojau amaran naepol oidukurun, omanikor, otuŋa da kere, iserikalen, ka ikaŋatak da apotu komaranata: komaran akwap, kwaŋin kojaun amaran naepol noi.
Kiteoto ikedarak luka Saul koGibea loka Benyamin; ido koany, kidior atukot, kisiarakinos ŋiniibois.
Kosodi Saul alimokin ituŋa luajaas kaŋes atiar, “Aso kimara, koanyut yenelosit kamawok.” Kosodete kimarata, ido koany, amameete kanen Yonatan ka luadakit lujiisike.
Kotema Saul Akiya atiar, “Koyau asaduku naka Edeke ne.” Naarai ajai asaduku naka Edeke kidwe luka Isirael kapak kaŋin.
Kosodi kanen ineras Saul ka esasedoti, kiyatakin noi ecelet loajai oidukurun luka Ipilisitian; kotema Saul esasedoti atiar, “Kolema akonikan.”
Kotukokinos Saul ka ituŋa kere luajaas kaŋes, kopotu ojie: ido koany, abu ekileŋ loka ŋinituŋanan koluik yeniceke, kojaun aiyaloŋoŋ naepol noi.
Iburanian luajaas lem ka Ipilisitian, lualosete kakes oidukurun kakwap naalukunit; apotu ŋul kibelooros mama ajaas Isiraelin luajaas ka Saul ka Yonatan.
Kwape kwaŋin da ituŋa kere luka Isirael luaŋopitos kakwap nakiukon naka Epuraim, kepuput ebe akera Ipilisitian, apotu kesi da kodapata kes noi kojie.
Kitajar EJAKAIT Isirael kapaaran kaŋin: kotubor ejie Bet-aben.
Kopotu ituŋa kere amagoro; kojai esik kwap.
Kosodi kedolut ituŋa amagoro, koany, koitunun esik: konye mam ediotuŋanan loabu kibwaik akan aitukuke; naarai ayoŋito ituŋa aiyaposit.
Konye mam Yonatan abu kopup naecorakinia papake ituŋa aiyaposit: ŋes edomakinia ebela loetiŋit ŋesi akape nuka esik, kosodi aibwaikin akekan aitukuke; kolakaros akekonyen.
Kosodi ediopet kotuŋa aboŋokin ebe, “Abu papakon kicorak ituŋa aiyaposit ebe, ‘Kikenoi etuŋanan loenyami inyamat apaaran naka lolo.’ ” Kilworunos ituŋa.
Kotema Yonatan atiar, “Etican papaka akwap: keŋaiŋait, koany, kwape alakarotor akonyeneka, naarai abu eoŋ keir edio kosik kalo.
Mere tiejok noi arai kenyamito ituŋa lolo luŋatuna luka lukasurupokec luapotu kodumut? Naarai emamei lolo earit loepol koPilisitian.”
Kodanyata luka Ipilisitian kapaaran kaŋin anyoun koMikimas kiton Aiyalon: kilworunos ituŋa noi.
Kokerata ituŋa oŋatan, kolemut amerekekin, ka imoŋin, ka itak, koarakis kes kwap: konyamata ituŋa kes kaokot da.
Kosodete kesi alimokin Saul ebe, “Koany, adiakasi ituŋa kama ejai EJAKAIT, naarai enyamete kaokot da.” Kotema atiar, “Ibilata ebotet, kikokorikinoi amoru naepol neajai lolo.”
Kotema Saul atiar, “Kisiararos yesi otuŋa, kotemasi kes atiar, ‘Koyau ŋinituŋanan ekemoŋ, ka ŋinituŋanan akemerekek, koarakis ne, konyamata; kinyeis adiakar kama ejai EJAKAIT kanuka ainyam kaokot.’ ”
Koyaut ituŋa kere akuare ŋin ŋinituŋanan ekemoŋ, koarakis nen as Kodukok Saul EJAKAIT etem: ŋopeŋol ŋes arai etem losodit loadukokini ŋesi EJAKAIT.
Kiŋit Saul Edeke atiar, “Adumari eoŋ Ipilisitian? ijaikini kereka ijo kes akan naka Isirael?” Konye mam abu Koboŋok ŋes kapaaran kaŋin.
Kotema Saul atiar, “Kikunyutu ne, yes kere ijaka luka ituŋa: kojenut koanyut da neajai adiakaret lolo.
Naarai kwape ejaria EJAKAIT, loitajari Isirael, karaida kejaun toma okokuka Yonatan, abeit etwani.” Konye komameu kotuŋa etuŋanan loabu Koboŋok ŋes.
Kosodi ŋesi atemar Isirael kere ebe, “Kojaunos yesi owai ediopet, eoŋ da ka okokuka Yonatan kijaun ecewai.” Kotemasi ituŋa Saul atiar, “Kiswama nuitojokit ijo.”
Kanuka ŋun kotema Saul EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael atiar, “Kitodu abeit.” Korounai Saul ka Yonatan: konye kokuata ituŋa.
Kotema Saul atiar, “Kilamilamakinai eoŋ ka Yonatan okokuka.” Korounai Yonatan.
Kosodi Saul atemar atiar, “Kiswama Edeke kwaŋin ka adepar da; naarai abeit itwani, Yonatan.”

Kotemasi ituŋa Saul atiar, “Etwani kereka Yonatan, loeswamau aitajario na naepol mama ejai Isirael? Madi akuj: kwape ejaria EJAKAIT, mam ediotimat loka akouke edoi alup, naarai eswamata ka Edeke kapaaran naka lolo.” Kwaŋin kolakut ituŋa Yonatan, tape mam etwani.
Koboŋ Saul katupit Ipilisitian, kolototo Ipilisitian aiboisiokec.
Abu kiswama nukatitiŋ, kodany Imalekain, abu da koyu Isirael kakan naka ŋul kaluaŋasenenete kes.
Ekiror loka aberu naka Saul arai Akinoam akoku naka Akimaas: ka ekiror loka ekapolon loka erioŋeteke kerai Abiner okoku loka Ner, mamai loka Saul.
Kis ŋes papake loka Saul; Ner papa loka Abiner kerai okoku loka Abiel.
Ebala kwanata EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe, ‘Eteu eoŋ Amalek kanuka nuabu ŋesi kiswamak Isirael, kwape abu kobwoikinia ŋes korot naabunio koMisiri.
Aso do kolot kodany Amalek, komudia kere luejaatar kesi, komam ideunete kes, koarata kere, ikiliok ka aŋor da, imukerun ka luenakete, imoŋin ka amerekekin, akaalai ka asigiria da.’ ”
Kobu Saul ore loka Amalek, kosodete koperut kaditot.

Kotema Saul Ikenin atiar, “Koloto, konyoutu, konyoutu komalekain, kenyek amudiar yes kakes: naarai ipotu kosiakata mama ejaas idwe luka Isirael, naaponiata koMisiri,” Kwaŋin konyout Ikenin komalekain.
Kodany Saul Imalekain, anyoun koKabila bala ilosi Sur, loejai kiŋaren nako Misiri.
Kikama Agag ekabaka loka Imalekain ejari, komudia cut ituŋa kere kakwanis naka ekileŋ.

Konye Saul ka ituŋa kideut Agag, ka luetelekarito ajokis kamerekekin, komoŋin, ka luetumito, ka imerekekin ludidik, ka luajokak kere, komam emudiarete kes cut: konye ibore kere yenarono ka yenamam ajokis, ŋes apotu kesi komudiasi.
Kosodi akirot naka EJAKAIT abunore mama ejai Samuel ebe,
“Eitu eoŋ kanu naarai abu kadakak Saul araun ekabaka: naarai aboŋo kau enyeki atupit eoŋ, ido mam iswamat akaicorakineta.” Konyunyurikin Samuel; komony mama ejai EJAKAIT akuare kia.
Kodilok Samuel anyoun airiamun ka Saul tupuruc; kolimokinai Samuel ebe, abu Saul kobu Karamel, ido koany, abu kosipok aiitunet, ido alot, atubor, abea Giligal.
Kobu Samuel mama ejai Saul: kotema Saul ŋes atiar, “Kisirereŋ EJAKAIT jo: eswama eoŋ aicorakinet naka EJAKAIT.”
Kotema Samuel atiar, “Inyo bo do apolou naka aruo na naka amerekekin naapupi kakiika, ka eikun loapupi loka imoŋin?”
Kotema Saul atiar, “Ayaunio kes kama kImalekain: naarai apotu ituŋa kideut luetelekarito ajokis kamerekekin komoŋin da, ainakinia EJAKAIT Edekekon asuban; ido luce kere kimudia isio cut.”
Kosodi Samuel atemar Saul atiar, “Ijo ber, kalimok jo nuabu EJAKAIT kalimok eoŋ akuare na.” Kotema ŋes atiar, “Aso kiner.”
Kotema Samuel atiar, “Karaida kirai ijo lokidite kakonyenekon mam aponi kodakakin apolokinit atekerin nuka Isirael? Kinyonyoik da EJAKAIT jo akinyet araun ekabaka loiyait Isirael;
Kosodi EJAKAIT aijukar jo alosit, kobala ebe, ‘Aso kolot komudia cut ikadiakanarak kes Imalekain, kitiji kes aitodol naimudiaria kere.’
Kanukinyo do mam jo ibu korimaria eporoto loka EJAKAIT, konye ibu kokerik luŋatan kiswama nueroko kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT?”
Kotema Saul Samuel atiar, “Eebo, abu eoŋ karima eporoto loka EJAKAIT, alot da alosit naabu EJAKAIT kejukak eoŋ, kayau da Agag ekabaka loka Amalek; amudia cut Imalekain.
Konye apotu ituŋa kolemut iŋatan, amerekekin ka imoŋin, luepolok koboro luagitaritai, ainakinia asuban mama ejai EJAKAIT Ekonideke koGiligal.”
Kotema Samuel atiar,
“Isiyalamikinit kereka EJAKAIT ainakineta nuicweio ka asuban
kwape isiyalamikinitor arimarit eporoto loka EJAKAIT?
Koany, arimar itelekarit asubanit,
Ka aipup da edeparit asiepai nuka imerekekin.
Ka aninik bala aputosia nuegerer ka iterapim.
Naarai iŋer ijo akirot naka EJAKAIT,
Kiner ŋesi da jo araut ekabaka.”
Kanuka ŋun, keŋaiŋait, kitim akadiakaret, kibelokin bobo nepepe keoŋ, tetere amai EJAKAIT.”
Kotema Samuel Saul atiar, “Mam eoŋ kiboŋori kajo, naarai iŋer ijo akirot naka, EJAKAIT: EJAKAIT da kiŋer jo araut ekabaka loiyait Isirael.”
Kosodi napibelokin Samuel alosit, abu kitiŋ ekekaso, kocila.
Kotema Samuel ŋes atiar, “Acila EJAKAIT ajakanut naka Isirael kamakon lolo, ainaki da ŋes eidunyetekon, loejok adepar jo.
Bobo da Agogoŋ naka Isirael mam iŋalai karaida aitoronikin: naarai mam ŋes erai etuŋanan tape itoronikin.”
Kosodi ŋesi atemar atiar, “Abu kadiaka: konye keŋaiŋait, kitubusai kakonyen nuka imakio luka ikatuŋa, kakonyen nuka Isirael, kibelokin bobo nepepe keoŋ, tetere amai EJAKAIT Ekonideke.”
Kibelokin do Samuel aupar kaSaul: koma Saul EJAKAIT.
Kosodi Samuel atemar ebe, “Koinunai Agag ekabaka loka Imalekain.”
Kobu Agag mama ejai ŋesi esoga. Kobala Agag ebe, “Abeit atubor apipil naka atwanare.”
Kotema Samuel atiar, “Kwape abu ekonikileŋ kitasalia aŋor emameete idwe, kwaŋin esalia totokon da emamei ikoku kaŋor.” Kojepejep Samuel Agag kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT koGiliga!.
