Mam bobo Samuel abu kobu aanyun Saul aitodol apaaran naatwania; konye komony Samuel kanuka Saul: kiitu EJAKAIT kanu naarai abu kodakak Saul araun ekabaka ayait Isirael.
Kotema Samuel atiar, “Ekwaikini ai alosi? Arai kiira Saul, kaari eoŋ.” Kotema EJAKAIT atiar, “Koyaŋa ataok, kiner atiar, ‘Abunit ainakin EJAKAIT asuban.’
Konyarau Yese kobu asuban, ketodikini jo nuiswamai: inyonyoikini akinyet ŋol lokalimokini jo.”
Kiswama Samuel nuabu EJAKAIT kiner, kobu Bet-lekem, Kopotu imakio lukore emaranete airiamun kaŋes, kotemasi atiar, “Ibunit ijo kainapakin?”
Kotema atiar, “Kainapakin: abunit ainakin EJAKAIT asuban: kitalaunos, kauparos keoŋ asuban.” Kitalau Yese ka odweke, konyarau kes aponare asuban.

Konye kobala EJAKAIT Samuel ebe, “Sirikisesen ereeteke, karaida aojau naka akuanake; naarai aŋer ŋes: naarai mam EJAKAIT eseseni kwape esesenia ituŋanan; naarai itei ituŋanan atakan nakokuju, konye itei EJAKAIT etau.”
Kosodi Yese anyaraun Abinadab, kitotor akonyen nuka Samuel. Kotema atiar, “Mam EJAKAIT eseunit lo da.”
Kosodi Yese aitotor Sama. Kotema atiar, “Mam EJAKAIT eseunit lo da.”
Kitotor Yese odweke ikanykaarei akonyen nuka Samuel. Kobala Samuel Yese ebe, “Mam EJAKAIT eseunit lu,”
Kotema Samuel Yese atiar, “Ejaas ikonidwe ne kere?” Kotema atiar, “Esalit iŋoorit, ido koany, icokie amerekekin.” Kobala Samuel Yese atiar, “Kijuka koomai ŋes: naarai mam kiboikin aitodol neebunio.”
Kijuka, kitolom ŋes, Koreŋ ŋesi, kitemelel, ajok asesen da. Kotema EJAKAIT atiar, “Konyou, kinyonyoik ŋes akinyet, naarai ŋes lo.”
Kosodi Samuel alemun amumwarat naka akinyet, kinyonyoik ŋes akinyet kokidiŋ oinacanake: kodoik emoyo loka EJAKAIT Daudi kagogoŋ amear kapaaran kaŋin kaiyatanakin. Konyou Samuel, kolot Rama.
Kotemasi ibulesin luka Saul ŋes atiar, “Koany, kitican jo emoyo loerono loabuni kama ejai EJAKAIT.

Aso kicorak ekapolonikosi ikonibulesin luejaas akonyenekon, amoun etuŋanan loerami adeudeu kapirianut, kosodi naijaar ijo kemoyo loerono loabuni kama ejai Edeke, ŋes do eramia ŋesi kakekan, iŋaleuni.”
Kobala Saul ikebulesin atiar, “Kodumakinai etuŋanan loerami ejok, koinut.”

Kosodi ediopet kokatumunak aboŋokin ebe, “Koany, aanyunit okoku loka Yese Ebetelekemit, loerami kapirianut, etuŋanan lokirigi loetitiŋ, etuŋanan loejio, loecobe koinerike, loitemelel, ido ejai EJAKAIT kaŋes.”
Kijuka Saul ikiyakia mama ejai Yese, kotema atiar, “Kijukakinai okokukon Daudi, loejaas kamerekekin.”
Kolem Yese asigiria kisibwok imugatin, ka eriagi loka emukule loka ebino, ka ikalol, kijuka kes ka Daudi okokuke mama ejai Saul.
Kobu Daudi mama ejai Saul, kobwo kakonyeneke: kominakin ŋes noi; koraun loedakit lujiisike.
Kijuka Saul mama ejai Yese kobala ebe, “Keŋaiŋait, kocamak Daudi abwoenen kakonyeneka; naarai adumu ŋesi asianut kakonyeneka.”
Kosodi kanen kejau Saul emoyo loerono loabuni kama ejai EJAKAIT, kolemuni Daudi adeudeu, koram kakekan: kicasi do Saul, koŋaleuni, konyou emoyo loerono kamake.
Kotukokinos Saul ka ituŋa luka Isirael, kidukuroto apuuton naka Ela, kiderakinos ejie ka Ipilisitian.
Kobwaata Ipilisitian komoru epuai, kobwaata luka Isirael da komoru kepuai: kojai aditot kidiŋikec.
Kolom ekadedeŋan koswamin luka Ipilisitian, ekekiror Goliat, loka Gas, aojauke ikubitin
Konapite aboko naka aisinit kakouke, konapite da ekooti loka aisinit; alaŋir naka ekooti isekelin ilukumin ikany luka aisinit.
Konapite da kakeje aisinit, ka eliru loka aisinit kopur.
Koputos amorok naka akwarake bala akitoi naesonyere; ka akwarake da alopet alaŋir kitemi isekelin akwat akanykape luka asuat: kiŋarenenokini ŋol lokitiŋenenei ekebuku.
Kobwo kiworo mama ejai ajore naka Isirael, kobala ebe, “Kanukinyo ilomuniata aiderakin? Mere eoŋ Epilisitiat, yes da ibulesin luka Saul? Koseutu ekes kanukus, kikokoroun neajai.
Arai kepedo ejie keoŋ, kaar, aso kiluor isio ikusibulesin; konye keteleka eoŋ ŋes, kaar, aso iluoros yesi ibulesinikosi, kijaanakinete sio.”
Kiner Epilisitiat ebe, “Emua lolo ajore naka Isirael; ae ekes, kajioto.”
Kiira Saul ka luka Isirael kere akiro ŋun nuka Epilisitiat, kiyaloŋoŋoto, kokuriakaros noi.
Ketuparito odwe luka Yese lukapolok iuni Saul ojie: ikiroria da luka odweke luuni lukelositos ojie kes luta, ekiyai ŋes Eliab, loketupi da ŋes Abinadab, ka lokiwuniet ŋes Sama.
Daudi ŋes eŋoorit: ketuparito lukapolok iuni Saul.
Ido koboŋonori Daudi kama ejai Saul acok amerekekin nuka papake Bet-lekem.
Kikunyununei Epilisitiat tupuruc ka eboŋ, kitodianar apaarasia akaisaoŋon.
Kolimok Yese okokuke Daudi ebe, “Koina bo ikoniinacan epa
Koina ekapolon loka elukumitikec ikamoŋon itomon lucokito luka akile, koany kwape ejaatar ikoniinacan, kijau aititiŋetekec.”
Ido Saul, ka kes, ka ituŋa kere luka Isirael, kojaas aditot naka Ela, ejiosi ka Ipilisitian.
Konyou Daudi tupuruc sek, kinyeinia ekejokon amerekekin, kitiŋ iboro, kolot kwape kicorakinia Yese; kodol aibois naka agalin, napedakun ajore ejie, kokutas ikodeta ejie.
Kiderakinos Isirael ka Ipilisitian, kotereikinos ajore ka ajore.
Kinyek Daudi ikeboro kakan naka ekedaran iboro, kodiŋirir mama ejai ajore, kolot kiyoga ikeinacan.
Napiyalaete kakes, koany, kodakun etikadedeŋan je, Epilisitiat loka Gas, ekekiror Goliat, konyou kokokoron luka Ipilisitian, kinera kwape kejaatar akiro kwa: kiira Daudi.
Kosodete ituŋa kere luka Isirael, keanyut ekesa je, kokerata kokuriakaros noi.

Kobalas ituŋa luka Isirael ebe, “Ianyut etuŋanan ŋol loadoku? Abeit adorit Isirael ŋes adokunia: aso arai kear ituŋanan ŋes, itabari ekabaka kabar naepol, einakini da akokuke, ido ituluori ekek loka papake loka aijamam kotoma Isirael.”

Kosodi kinera Daudi kituŋa luedunyatar ebwoete atiar, “Ikonakinio ai ituŋanan yeneari Epilisitiat lo, kolema amorosit kotoma Isirael? Naarai ŋes iŋai Epilisitiat lo lomam ekepitai, adorit ajore naka Edeke lokajaran?”
Koboŋokis ituŋa kobalas ebe, “Ikonakinio nen ituŋanan yeneari ŋes.”
Kobala Daudi ebe, “Ekonak bo eoŋ ai kwana? Mam akirot?”
Kinyek ŋes kibelokin mama ejai ece, kinera akiro kwape kakwa; koboŋokis bobo ŋes ituŋa kwape keboŋonokinioto nusodit.
Kiirar akiro nukinera Daudi, kitejenunai Saul; konyaraarai ŋes.
Kotema Daudi Saul atiar, “Kinyek etau loka ituŋanan ajuruŋuŋ kanukeŋ; elosi ekonibulesit ejie kEpilisitiat ŋol.”
Kotema Saul Daudi atiar, “Mam ipedori airiamakin kEpilisitiat ŋol ejie kaŋes; naarai irai ijo isapat, konye ŋol ekajiot ameun keitelepaneke.”
Kotema Daudi Saul atiar, “Ecokienenei ekonibulesit amerekekin nuka papake; nakebunenenoo eŋatuny, arai edubu, koyaŋa imerekek yenikosipan.
Kalomanari, katupari, kenomi kademuni kaitukuke; keebwokokin, ketiŋi kopenekike, kenom, kaari.
Abu ekonibulesit kinom eŋatuny ka edubu kere: ikonakini nen Epilisitiat ŋol lomam ekepep bala ediopet kakesi, naarai edorit ajore naka Edeke lokajaran.”
Kotema Daudi atiar, “EJAKAIT loabu ketajar kabelekeka nuka eŋatuny, ka abelekeka nuka edubu, ketajari da kakan naka Epilisitiat kaŋol.” Kotema Saul Daudi atiar, “Kolot, ejauni Edeke kajo.”
Kitanap Saul Daudi inapeneke, kidokok aboko naka aisinit akouke, kitanap ekooti loka aisinit.
Koenik Daudi ekekileŋ anapitoke; kitetemo alosit; naarai mam anaikinit, Kotema Daudi Saul atiar, “Mam apedori alosit kalu; naarai mam lem anaikinit.” Kolaca Daudi kes.
Kitiŋ ekebela kakanike, koseu alica akany nuerurut kosamai, kibwaik oriagike lokicokis lokejaatar, toma ocoeke; kojai da akeporocet akanike; kikunyak Epilisitiat.
Kobunok Epilisitiat koapik Daudi; kiŋarenikinit etuŋanan loetiŋenenei ekebuku.
Keŋoleŋol Epilisitiat, koany Daudi, komen; naarai kerai isapat, ikareŋan, ido itemel.
Kotema Epilisitiat Daudi atiar, “Arai kereka eoŋ ekiŋok, ibuni neajai kibelai?” Kilam Epilisitiat Daudi kama ejaas idekesioke.
Kotema Epilisitiat Daudi atiar, “Bia neajai, kakorak akonikuan akweny nuka apak, ka itiaŋ luka ais.”
Kotema Daudi Epilisitiat atiar, “Ibuni ijo neajai kekileŋ, ka eliru, ka akwara; konye eoŋ abunit mama ijai kokiror loka EJAKAIT loka ajoresio, Edeke loka ajoresio nuka Isirael nuidorit.

Kikorakini lolo EJAKAIT akanika; kenomi jo, ajepari da akonikou; ido akorakini lolo akweny nuka apak, ka itiaŋ luka amagoro, atesin nuka ajore naka Ipilisitian; kojenut akwapin kere ebe ejai Edeke toma Isirael:
Kojen teni atukot na kere ebe mam EJAKAIT itajari kekileŋ ka akwara; naarai ejie erai loka EJAKAIT, ŋes da kikorakini yes akanikosi.”
Kosodi kanen, kenyou Epilisitiat, kobu kikunyak airiamakin kaDaudi, kisunya Daudi, kodiŋirir neejai ajore airiamakin kEpilisitiat.
Kirupa Daudi akan oriagike, kolem alicait, kiiliil, koporocik, kocam Epilisitiat oreeteke; koloma alicait oreeteke, kibiror ebuburia.
Kosodi konemesiar Daudi, kicak Epilisitiat, kitiŋ ekekileŋ, kout kakuraruke, koar, kojep akekou. Keanyut Ipilisitian ebe atwana ekadedeŋanikec, kokerata.
Konyout ituŋa luka Isirael ka luka Yuda, ibwoŋas, korukoriata Ipilisitian aitodol neidolio Gat, korutei luka Ekuron. Kibironokinos Ipilisitian lukimusuŋitai orot loebei Saarim, kiton Gat, ka Ekuron.
Koboŋut idwe luka Isirael karukitor Ipilisitian, koŋatata iidukurunukec.
Kolem Daudi akou naka Epilisitiat koyau Yerusalem; konye kiŋadak lujiisike owemake.
Kotema ekabaka atiar, “Kiŋit iŋai bo papa loka esapat kaŋol.”
Napeboŋuni Daudi kajar Epilisitiat, koyaŋa Abiner ŋes, koyaŋa mama ejai Saul kitiŋite akou naka Epilisitiat.
Kotema Saul ŋes atiar, “Iŋai bo papakon, ijo esapat?” Koboŋok Daudi atiar, “Arai eoŋ okoku loka ebulesitikon Yese Ebetelekemit.”
Koyaŋa Saul ŋes apaaran ŋin, komam bobo isiikini ŋes alosit ore togo loka papake.
Kosodete Yonatan ka Daudi aitutuk, naarai abu kominakin ŋes bala etauke elopet.
Kolac Yonatan ekaso loanapit, koinak Daudi, ka ikenapen, ka ekekileŋ, ka akekabwa, ka arokobake.
Kolosenenei Daudi neejukanari Saul ŋes kere, kikemerenenei: kodakak Saul ŋes ayait ituŋa lukajiok, kitojokata ituŋa kere, kitojokata ibulesin da luka Saul.
Koyeete aŋor komeanakinos kaboliakec, kobalas ebe,
“Aar Saul ekelukumit
Ka Daudi da ikelukumin itomon.”
Kosesen Saul Daudi kakoŋu naerono amear kapaaran kaŋin ka aiyatanakin.
Koremo Saul akwara; naarai abala ebe, “Aremi Daudi aiminaikin arwatat.” Kigaikin Daudi irwan aarei kakonyeneke.
Kanuka ŋun kisukunya Saul ŋes kamake, kodakak ŋes apolokin elukumit; kolomanari kolomununei da kakonyen nuka ituŋa.
Kikemerenenei Daudi koponesioke kere; kojaenena EJAKAIT kaŋes.
Kosodi keanyu Saul ebe ikemerenen noi, koyoŋ ŋes.
Konye Isirael kere ka Yuda kominas Daudi; naarai alomanari kolomununei da kakonyenekec.
Kotema Daudi Saul atiar, “Iŋai eoŋ, lukaŋai da ikainacan, ka ekek loka papaka koIsirael, tape araun ekamuran loka ekabaka?”
Konye kedol apak natikekorakinere Daudi Merab akoku naka Saul, aponi kokorakinai Adiriel Emekolatit aimany.
Kominakin Mikal akoku naka Saul Daudi: kolimokinai Saul, kitojok ŋes akirot ŋin.
Kobala Saul ebe, “Akorakini ŋes, tetere eraun eic kamakeŋ, tetere da esurokini akan naka Ipilisitian ŋes.” Ŋes do atemaria Saul Daudi atiar, “Iraun lolo ekamuranika irwan nakiareit.”
Kicorak Saul ikebulesin kere ebe, “Kinerata kaDaudi kaiyeiyea, ebe, ‘Koany, kisiyalamikinit ekabaka jo, kiminas da ikekejaanakinak kere: aso do koraun ekamuran loka ekabaka.’ ”
Kinerata ikejaanakinak luka Saul akiro ŋun kaki nuka Daudi, Kobala Daudi ebe, “Erai akirot naedit kamakus araun ekamuran loka ekabaka, naarai ecana eoŋ, mam arai loka aibuses naepol.”
Kolimokis ibulesin luka Saul ŋes ebe, “Ener Daudi ŋun.”

Kotema Saul atiar, “Itemarete Daudi kwanata ebe, Mam ekabaka ekoto akiitakinio idiobore, dimarai amunyin akwatat nuka ekiliokane loka Ipilisitian, ainyaŋia lukasurupo luka ekabaka.” Koomite Saul Daudi aario kakan naka Ipilisitian.
Kosodi kelimokis ikekejaanakinak Daudi akiro ŋun, kitojok noi Daudi araun ekamuran loka ekabaka, Eroko apaarasia ketuboro.

Konyou Daudi kolot, ŋes ka iketuŋa, koarata ituŋa akwat aarei luka Ipilisitian; koyau Daudi amunyinikec, koinakis ekabaka etiai kere, tetere eraun ekamuran loka ekabaka, Kokorak Saul ŋes Mikal akokuke aimany.
Koany Saul, kojenu da ebe ejai EJAKAIT kaDaudi; kominakin Mikal akoku naka Saul ŋes.
Kiyatak Saul ayoŋit Daudi; koraenena Saul lokasurup loka Daudi tiritir.
Konye Yonatan okoku loka Saul amina noi Daudi. Kolimok Yonatan Daudi ebe, “Ekot Saul papaka aiar jo: aso do keŋaiŋait, kocoikin tupuruc, koŋop kaibois nakaiyeiyea:
Alomari eoŋ abwoi da kapapaka komanikor loijai, eneruni nukon kapapaka; arai kajen akirot, kalimokini jo.”

Kiner Yonatan nuejok nuka Daudi mama ejai Saul papake, kotema ŋes atiar, “Kinyek ekabaka adiakar kama ejai ekejaanakinanike Daudi; naarai mam ŋes ediakarit kamakon, akeswamisio da kamakon araas nukajokak noi:

Naarai abu kijaik akeijar akanike, kocam Epilisitiat, kiswama EJAKAIT aipikor naepol kanuka Isirael kere; ibu ijo da koany, kiyalamikin: kanukinyo do idiakaria ijo kama ejaas aokot numam akirot, aiar Daudi komam akirot?”
Kopup Saul eporoto logka Yonatan: kiyapo Saul ebe, “Kwape ejaria EJAKAIT, mam ŋes eario.”
Konyarau Yonatan Daudi, kitejen ŋes akiro ŋun kere. Koyaŋau Yonatan Daudi mama ejai Saul, kojaenena do akonyeneke kwape lem sek.
Kojaun bobo ejie: koloma Daudi kitiji Ipilisitian, koara kes noi; kokerata kakonyeneke.
Kobunok Saul emoyo loerono loabuni kama ejai EJAKAIT, iboie ŋesi kotogoke kakekwara kakanike; koram Daudi adeudeu kakekan.
Kokoto Saul airem Daudi aiminaikin arwatat kakekwara: konye kigaikin ŋesi konyou kakonyen nuka Saul, korem do akwarake arwatat: koker Daudi koku akuare ŋin.
Kosodi Mikal aijululuun Daudi kadirisa: kolot, koker, koku.
Kolem Mikal aput naka edeke, kiperik oitada, kibwaik egoe loka ajul nuka akinei akwesike, kimuko kigoen.
Nakijukaria Saul ikiyakia aikamun Daudi, kobala ebe, “Edek.”
Kijuka Saul ikiyakia aanyun Daudi ebe, “Koinunai ŋes koitada, tetere aari ŋes.”
Nakelomut ikiyakia, koany, ajai aput naka edeke oitada, ka egoe loka ajul nuka akinei akwesike.

Kotema Saul Mikal atiar, “Kanukinyo kimodia ijo eoŋ kwaŋin, aisiikin lokasurupika alosit, tape ekui?” Koboŋok Mikal Saul atiar, “Abu katema eoŋ atiar, ‘Koosikinai kalot; kanu kainyo tikaaria eoŋ ijo?’ ”
Kolimokinai Saul ebe, “Koany, ejai Daudi Naiot toma Rama.”
Kijuka Saul ikiyakia aikamun Daudi: nakeanyut kesi erioŋet loka inabin edwarete, ebwoi Samuel korai ekapolonikec, kodoik emoyo loka Edeke ikiyakia luka Saul, kodwarata kesi da.
Kelimokin Saul ŋun, abu kijuka icekiyakia, kodwarata ŋul da, Kijuka Saul ikiyakia bobo irwan nakiwuniet, kodwarata kesi da.
Kosodi ŋesi da alosit Rama, kodol atan naepol naejai Seku: kiŋit ebe, “Ai bo ejaas Samuel ka Daudi?” Kotema ediopet atiar, “Koany, ajaas Naiot toma Rama.”
Kobei Naiot toma Rama: kodoik ŋes da emoyo loka Edeke, kiyatak alosit, kodwar, kiton neadolio Naiot toma Rama.
Kolaca ŋesi da ikegoen, kodwar ŋesi da kakonyen nuka Samuel, koper apaaran ŋin kere ka akuare ŋin kere imujalal. Ŋes atemariata ebe, “Ejai Saul da onabin?”
Koker Daudi anyoun koNaiot toma Rama, kobu neejai Yonatan kotema ŋes atiar, “Eswama eoŋ anyoika? Anyoika numam adoliteka? anyoin akaronis mama ejai papakon, tape ŋes ekoto akaijar?”
Kotema ŋes atiar, “Madi akuj; mam itwani: koany, mam papaka iswamai idiobore yenepol arai yenedit, komam ketejenuni eoŋ: kanukinyo kemunonikina papaka eoŋ na? Mere kwaŋin.”

Kiyapo Daudi bobo atiar, “Ejeni papakon cut ebe adumunit asianut kakonyenekon; ebala ebe, ‘Kinyek Yonatan ajenun akiro ŋun, kinyek akadakin.’ Konye abeit, kwape ejaria EJAKAIT, kwape ejaria ekonitau da, ejai kidiŋika ka atwanareka ailamet adiopet bon.”
Kosodi Yonatan atemar Daudi ebe, “Anyoika ikoto ijo keswamak, tetere keswamakin?”
Kotema Daudi Yonatan atiar, “Koany, ilamuni elap moi, mam tikakurwoki aiboikin ainyam kekabaka: konye kisiikinai kalot, tetere aŋopi komanikor aitodol apaaran nakiwuniet eboŋ.
Arai keanyu papakon ebe amamei, itemari do atiar, ‘Abu Daudi keŋit eoŋ apedor alosit oreke Bet-lekem: naarai einakini ekekike kere asubanit naka ŋolikaru.’
Arai ketema ebe, ‘Ejok’; inapakin ekonikejaanakinan: konye arai kenyunyurikin, ijenuni ebe epeleikinit aswam aronis.

Kanuka ŋun kikonak ekonikejaanakinan kasianut; naarai itutukoto kekonikejaanakinan aitutuket naka EJAKAIT: konye arai kejaunos numam adolit mamaka, koar ijo eoŋ elopet; naarai kanukinyo tikiyaunia eoŋ mama ejai papakon?”
Kotema Yonatan atiar, “Madi akuj; naarai arai kajen eoŋ ebe epeleikinit papaka aiswamakin jo aronis, mam eoŋ tikalimok jo?”
Kosodi Daudi atemar Yonatan atiar, “Iŋai bo kalimokin eoŋ arai kiiboŋok papakon jo kadedeŋ?”
Kotema Yonatan Daudi atiar, “Kobia kaloto okitui.” Kouparos kesi iarei okitui.
Kiswamak EJAKAIT Yonatan kwaŋin, ka adepar da, arai kitojok papaka aiswamakin jo aronis, komam eoŋ ketejenuni jo, katwar jo, tetere ilosi inapakina: kojai EJAKAIT kajo, kwape ajaar lem kapapaka.
Mam jo kitodianakini eoŋ asianut naka EJAKAIT aroko ajari bon, tetere mam atwani:
Konye mam ilemari akonisianut kokaleka ikar kere: eebo, mam ilemari naemudiaria EJAKAIT lukasurup kere luka Daudi kakwap.”
Kitutuk Yonatan kekek loka Daudi ebe, “Itepeseni EJAKAIT ŋin kakan naka lukasurup luka Daudi.”
Kisiyapo Yonatan Daudi bobo, kanuka amina naamina ŋes: naarai amina ŋes bala eketau elopet.
Kosodi Yonatan atemar ŋes atiar, “Ilamuni elap moi: eanyunio ebe imamci ijo, naarai emameun ituŋanan koicoloŋokon.
Kidau apaarasia auni, iwonyari alosit, kodol aibois naiŋopitor kapaaran kaya, isalakini osiep loka amoru Esel.
Agumuni eoŋ ikojoi iuni owaike, bala agumi ibore.

Ido koany, ejukuni etelepat, kabala ebe, ‘Kolot komou ikojoi.’ Arai katema eoŋ etelepat atiar, ‘Koany, ejaas ikojoi osiepikon lailo: kolem kes’; kobu, naarai ejai jo ainapakin, emamei aronis, kwape ejaria EJAKAIT.
Konye arai atemari eoŋ etelepat atiar, ‘Koany, elamaros ikojoi kiŋarenikon,’ kolot ijo; naarai kijuka EJAKAIT jo.
Konye akiro nukiner ijo keoŋ koany, ejai EJAKAIT kidiŋikon keoŋ ikar kere.”
Kiboikin ekabaka oicoloŋoke, kwape atapitor, ŋes eicoloŋ loidunyas karwatat; kiteos Yonatan kaŋes, kiboikin Abiner osiep loka Saul: konye amamei etuŋanan kaibois naka Daudi.

Kosodi kanen kapaaran naatupakini, kedau elap ailamun, ŋes apaaran nakiareit, amamei etuŋanan kaibois naka Daudi: kotema Saul Yonatan okokuke atiar, “Kanukinyo mam okoku loka Yese ebunitor ainyam, bian karaida lolo?”
Koboŋok Yonatan Saul ebe, “Abu Daudi keŋit eoŋ kaimaimait noi alosit Bet-lekem:

Kobala ebe, ‘Kisiikinai kalot, keŋaiŋait; naarai einakini ekekikosi asubanit kore; ecoraki da onaceka eoŋ ajaun ŋina: aso do arai adumunit asianut kakonyenekon, kisiikinai kalot, keŋaiŋait, aanyun ikainacan.’ Kanuka ŋun ŋes emam ebunitor omesa loka ekabaka.”

Kosodi anyunyura naka Saul ainepun aluikin Yonatan, kotema ŋes atiar, “Ikoku ijo yenika aberu naimaranana nakepali, mam eoŋ ajeni ebe iseunit ijo okoku loka Yese aisurum jo elopet ileic, aisurum da amujalal naka totokon ileic?
Naarai mam jo icasi karaida akonijakanut eroko okoku loka Yese ejari kakwap. Aso do kijuka koomikinai, naarai abeit etwani.”
Koboŋok Yonatan Saul papake ebe, “Kanukinyo earere ŋes? Anyoika iswamat ŋesi?”
Koremo Saul akekwara acamun ŋes; ŋes do ajenunia Yonatan ebe epeleikinit papake aiar Daudi.
Konyou Yonatan komesa kanyunyura naededeŋ, mam abu konyam kapaaran nakiareit naka elap: naarai akadakinit kanuka Daudi, naarai abu papake kisurum ŋes ileic.
Kosodi kanen tupuruc kolot Yonatan okitui kapak naaseunito kaDaudi, ka etelepat loedit nepepe kaŋes.
Kotema ŋesi etelepat atiar, “Koker cabo, komou ikojoi luagumari.” Ekeri etelepat, koguma ekojo ailam ŋes.
Kosodi kedol etelepat aibois naadoi ekoj loagumari Yonatan, kiworo Yonatan etelepat ebe, “Mam ekojo kilamit jo?”
Kiworo Yonatan etelepat ebe, “Koker, kiwonya, sirikiyap.” Kotukok etelepat loka Yonatan ikojoi, kobu mama ejai ejakaitike.
Konye mam etelepat abu kojen idiobore: Yonatan ka Daudi bonik kes ajenete akirot.
Koinak Yonatan eketelepat lujiisike, kotema ŋes atiar, “Kolot, koyaŋa kes ore.”
Atipet kelot etelepat, konyou Daudi kaibois naka ari naka Eŋalakimak, kibiror ebuburia, kokukum irwan auni: konuanaros, komonyata, aitodol neadeparia Daudi.

Kotema Yonatan Daudi atiar, “Kolot inapakina, naarai kiyapo oni kere kokiror loka EJAKAIT ebe, ‘Ejaenena EJAKAIT kidiŋikon keoŋ, kidiŋ da aurika ka aurikon, ikar kere.’ ” Konyou, kolot: koloma Yonatan ore.

Kotema Daudi Akimelek esasedoti atiar, “Kecorakinit ekabaka eoŋ aswam, katema eoŋ atiar, ‘Kinyek idiotuŋanan ajenun akirot naka aswam nakejukaritor, nakecorakinit da: ecorakinit eoŋ ikatumunak abore kamutan.
Aso do inyo bo ejai akanikon? Koinakinai imugatin ikany akanika, arai icebore kere yenejai kajo.’ ”
Koboŋok esasedoti Daudi ebe, “Emamei emugati loduc kakanika, konye ajaas imugatin lukalaunak; arai mam ca ikatumunak eperito kaŋor.”
Koboŋok Daudi esasedoti atiar, “Abeit mam sio kiperit kaŋor apaarasia nu auni; naanyounio eoŋ alaete iboro luka ikatumunak, karaida kerai alosit nakaduc; elaete do noi ikeceboro lolo,”
Koinak do esasedoti ŋes imugatin lukalaunak; naarai amamei emugati dimarai imugatin luka aitodikin, lualemunio kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT ibwaikinio imugatin luemwaka kapaaran naelemarere ŋul.
Kotema Daudi Akimelek atiar, “Emamei kane kakanikon akwara atai ekileŋ? Naarai mam ayaunit ekakileŋ karaida lujiisika, naarai abu aswam naka ekabaka kesuburia.”

Kotema esasedoti atiar, “Ekileŋ loka Goliat Epilisitiat, loiari ijo kaditot naka Ela, koany, ejai ne ienienitai kegoe kokau kepod: arai ikoto ayaŋaar, koyaŋa: naarai emamei ece kane dimarai ŋol.” Kotema Daudi atiar, “Emamei ece loeputotor ŋol; koinakinai.”
Konyou Daudi koker kapaaran kaŋin kanuka ayoŋit Saul, kolot mama ejai Akis ekabaka loka Gat.
Kotemasi ikejaanakinak luka Akis ŋes atiar, “Mere lo Daudi ekabaka loka akwap? Mam kes apotu koyeonokinos kokosio ebe,
“Aar Saul ilukuminike,
Ka Daudi da ikelukumin itomon?”
Kijulak ejauteneke kakonyenekec, kosub bala ebaŋ kakaninikec, koram ikirigin lukorute, kojalak akeimul eleleete kopenekike.
Kosodi Akis atemar ikekejaanakinak atiar, “Okwe ikatuŋa, kianyut ebe ebaŋaana etuŋanan ŋol: kanukinyo kiinuniata?
Emameete eoŋ ibaŋiok, tape iyaunete etuŋanan lo asubit ebaŋ kakonyeneka? Elomuni kereka etuŋanan lo oreka?”
Kotukonokinos mamakeŋ ŋinituŋanan yenareitai, ka ŋinituŋanan yenajai apesen, ŋinituŋanan da yenakadakinit kotau; koraun ŋesi ekapolonikec: kojaas kaŋes ituŋa kwape akwat aoŋon.
Koyau kes akonyen nuka ekabaka loka Moab: kiboioto kaŋes apak kere naajaar Daudi abua.
Kotema enabi Gad Daudi atiar, “Sirikiboi kabua; konyou kolot akwap naka Yuda.” Kosodi Daudi anyoun kobu amagoro naka Keret.
Kopup Saul ebe atakanu Daudi ka ituŋa luajaas kaŋes: iboie Saul koGibea kokwap kepeduru koRama, kitiŋite akekwara kakanike, kobwoete ikekejaanakinak kere airimor ŋes.

Kotema Saul ikekejaanakinak luebwoete airimor ŋes ebe, “Aso ca kopuputu yesi Ibenyamin; kiinakini kereka yes okoku loka Yese ŋinituŋanan imanikoria ka amanat nuka emusabibu, kidakakini ŋesi yes kere araun ikapolok luka ilukumin ka ikapolok luka akwat;

Tape yes kere inerunete aluikin eoŋ, emamei idioda yeniketejenuni eoŋ naetutukioto okokuka ka okoku loka Yese, emamei idioda kayesi yenitururwei kanukaŋ, karaida yeniketejenuni ebe eŋaraki okokuka ekakejaanakinan aluikin eoŋ, asurokin eoŋ, kwape lolo?”
Kosodi Doeg Edomait, loabwoi kikejaanakinak luka Saul atemar ebe, “Abu kaany okoku loka Yese ebunit Nob, mama ejai Akimelek okoku loka Akitub.
Kiŋit ŋesi EJAKAIT kanuka Daudi, koinak inyamat, koinak da ekileŋ loka Goliat Epilisitiat,”
Kosodi ekabaka aijukar anyaraun Akimelek esasedoti, okoku loka Akitub, ka ekal kere loka papake, isasedotin luajaas Nob: kopotu kere mama ejai ekabaka.
Kotema Saul atiar, “Aso ca kopup, ijo okoku loka Akitub.” Koboŋok ebe, “Ekajakait, eoŋ lo,”

Kotema Saul ŋes atiar, “Kanukinyo ineruniata aluikin eoŋ, ijo ka okoku loka Yese, naarai ibu koinak ŋes imugatin, ka ekileŋ, iŋit da Edeke kanukeŋ, tetere enyouni aluikin eoŋ, asurokin eoŋ, kwape lolo?”
Kosodi Akimelek aboŋokin ekabaka ebe, “Iŋai kobulesinikon kere erai lomunot bala Daudi, loerai ekamuran loka ekabaka, ido erai lokapolon kotoma ainerunikon, erai da loka aibuses kotogokon?

Lolo kereka ageunia eoŋ aiŋit Edeke kanukeŋ? Madi akuj: kinyeik ekabaka aibwaikin adiokirot mama ejai ekebulesit, karaida mama ejai ekek kere loka papaka: naarai mam ekonibulesit ejeni adioda kakiro kaŋun kere, nuikidioko arai nuipu.”
Kotema ekabaka atiar, “Abeit itwani ijo, Akimelek, ijo ka ekek kere loka papakon.”

Kotema ekabaka iserikaleneke, luabwoete airimor ŋes atiar, “Kibelokinos, koarata isasedotin luka EJAKAIT; naarai ejaas akecekanin kaDaudi, naarai apotu kojenut ebe aker, komam ketejenunete eoŋ.” Konye koŋeroto ikejaanakinak luka ekabaka aikeun akan aiar isasedotin luka EJAKAIT.
Kotema ekabaka Doeg atiar, “Kibelokin ijo, koar isasedotin.” Kibelokin Doeg Edomait, koar isasedotin, koar kapaaran kaŋin ituŋa akaisakanykauni ka lukany luanapitos epod loka ebaputa.
Kodany luka Nob da, ere loka isasedotin kakwanis naka ekileŋ, ikiliok ka aŋor da, idwe ka imukerun, imoŋin ka asigiria ka amerekekin, kakwanis naka ekileŋ.
Kolimok Abiatar Daudi kwape aaria Saul isasedotin luka EJAKAIT.
Kotema Daudi Abiatar atiar, “Abu kajen kapaaran kaya naajaar Doeg Edomait ŋina ebe, abeit elimokini ŋesi Saul: eoŋ edupoo aijar naka ituŋa kere luka ekal loka papakon.
Kiboikin ijo keoŋ, sirikikurianar; naarai loemoot aijaraka emoot aijarakon da: arai ijai keoŋ, iiara.”
Kanuka ŋun kiŋit Daudi EJAKAIT ebe, “Alosi eoŋ aidany Ipilisitian lu?” Kotema EJAKAIT Daudi atiar, “Kolot, kodany Ipilisitian, kitajar Keila.”
Kotemasi ituŋa luka Daudi ŋes atiar, “Koany, kikuriakar isio kane koYuda: mere do kikuriakar isio noi adepar kiilot Keila aitiji ajoresio nuka Ipilisitian?”
Kosodi Daudi aiŋit bobo EJAKAIT, Koboŋok EJAKAIT ŋes ebe, “Konyou, kolot Keila; naarai ejaikini Ipilisitian akanikon.”
Kolot Daudi ka iketuŋa Keila, kitijioto Ipilisitian, koŋatut ibarenekec, koarata kes kearit kaloepol noi. Kitajar kwaŋin Daudi luiboienenete koKeila.
Kolimokinai Saul ebe abu Daudi Keila. Kotema Saul atiar, “Kejaiki Edeke ŋes akanika; naarai agolor, kanu alomaria ore loejaas ikirigin ka atiketa.”
Koram Saul ituŋa kere alosit ojie, alosit Keila, alukun Daudi ka iketuŋa.
Kojen Daudi ebe edoŋitor Saul ŋes emod; kotema Abiatar esasedoti atiar, “Koyau epod ne.”
Kosodi Daudi atemar atiar, “Wu EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael, apupu ekonibulesit ebe ekot Saul abunore Keila, amudiar ere kanukaŋ.
Kejaikinete ituŋa luka Keila eoŋ akanike? Ebuni kereka Saul kwape apupunio ekonibulesit? Wu EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael, keŋaiŋait, kolimok ekonibulesit.” Kotema EJAKAIT atiar, “Ebuni.”
Kosodi Daudi atemar atiar, “Kejaikinete kereka ituŋa luka Keila eoŋ akan naka Saul?” Kotema EJAKAIT atiar, “Kijaikinete,”
Kosodete Daudi ka iketuŋa luemwaasi kwape akwat akanykape anyoun koKeila, kolototo kirimoto. Kolimokinai Saul ebe aku Daudi koKeila; mam abu kolot.
Koany Daudi ebe alom Saul amoot aijarake: ajai Daudi amodiŋ naka Sip amonieik.
Konyou Yonatan okoku loka Saul, kolot amonieik mama ejai Daudi, kitogogoŋ akekan kotoma Edeke.
Kotema ŋes atiar, “Sirikikurianar: naarai mam akan naka Saul papaka kidumuni ijo; ido iraun ijo ekabaka loeyait Isirael, katupakini eoŋ jo kapolou; ido ejeni Saul papaka ŋun.”
Kitutukoto kesi iarei kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT: kiboikin Daudi amonieik, kolot Yonatan togoke.
Aso do, kobia, wu ekabaka, kwape imielar ekonitau kere alosit: ka sio da, kijaikini ŋes akan naka ekabaka.”
Kotema Saul atiar, “Kisirereŋ EJAKAIT yes: naarai kitimoto eoŋ.
Keŋaiŋait, koloto, kitogogoŋoto, kojenut koanyut da aiboisike naejai akejuke, ka yeneanyunit ŋes kaŋina: naarai kalimokinitai ebe epiriana ŋesi noi.
Aso do koanyut, kojenut aiboisio nueperununo ka nueŋopenena, kopotu bobo aitogogoŋ mama ajai, kiupari do kayes: kosodi kanen arai ejai toma akwap, amouni ŋes kolukumin kere luka Yuda.”
Konyout, kiŋarenikinito Saul alosit Sip.
Konye ajaas Daudi ka iketuŋa amodiŋ naka Maon, kotoma Araba kari naka eŋalakimak naka amodiŋ.
Kolot Saul ka iketuŋa amoot ŋes, Kolimokinai Daudi: ŋes do abunio neejai atiiba, kiboikin amodiŋ naka Maon. Kepupu Saul ŋun, kotupa Daudi amodiŋ naka Maon.
Kolot Saul owai ediopet loka eroŋat, Daudi da ka iketuŋa owai ece: kisunya Daudi alosit naarai akuriana Saul; naarai apotu Saul ka iketuŋa kolukunito Daudi ka iketuŋa aikamun kes.
Konye kobu ekiyakia mama ejai Saul, kobala ebe, “Kisunyite abunore; naarai ijoreete Ipilisitian akwap.”
Kwaŋin koboŋo Saul katupit Daudi, kolot aitiji Ipilisitian: kanuka ŋun apotu komaikis aibois ŋin Sela-Kamalekot.
Konyou Daudi kanen, kiboikin abuai nuagogoŋ nuka En-gedi.
Kosodi Saul ayaŋaar ituŋa ilukumin iuni luaseunio koIsirael kere, kolot amoot Daudi ka iketuŋa omorun luka akinei nuka ais.
Kobu mama ajaas anukia nuka amerekekin korot, neajai abua; koloma Saul aimukor akekeje, Eboiete Daudi ka iketuŋa kaiboisio nukotoma abua.

Kotemasi ituŋa luka Daudi ŋes atiar, “Koany, apaaran na abu EJAKAIT kobala jo ebe, ‘Koany, kejaikini lokasurupikon akanikon, iswamakini da ijo ŋes nuitojoki ijo.’ ” Kosodi Daudi anyoun, kotub atokitoit naka ekaso loka Saul kaiyeiyea.
Kosodi kokau, kokadak etau loka Daudi, naarai abu kotub atokitoit naka Saul.
Kotema iketuŋa atiar, “Madi akuj eoŋ aiswamakin ekajakait loinyonyoikinit EJAKAIT akinyet akirot ŋin, arior akakan asurokin ŋes, kajeni ebe erai loinyonyoikinit EJAKAIT akinyet.”
Kwaŋin kitikok Daudi iketuŋa kakiro kaŋun, mam abu kocamak kes asurokin Saul. Konyou Saul koloma kabua, kolot.
Konyou Daudi da kokau, koloma kabua, kiworo ŋesi Saul ebe, “Ekajakait, ekabaka.” Kosodi keŋolea Saul kau, kokukum Daudi, kisuded.
Kotema Daudi Saul atiar, “Kanukinyo ipupio ijo akiro nuka ituŋa ebe, ‘Koany, ekot Daudi aiswamakin jo aronis?’

Koany, aanyut akonikonye lolo kwape kejaikinitor EJAKAIT jo lolo akanika kotoma abua: kecorakis ice aiar jo: konye abu ketim jo: kabala ebe, ‘Mam ariori akakan asurokin ekajakait; naarai erai loinyonyoikinit EJAKAIT akinyet.’

Bobo da, ipapa, koany, eebo, koany atokitoit naka ekasokon ejai akanika; naarai abu katub atokitoit naka ekasokon, komam kaari jo, kojen jo koany ebe emamei aronis karaida aibucaret kakanika, mam adiakarit kamakon, kwabo imoot ijo aikamun akaijar.
Kirabak EJAKAIT eoŋ ka jo, kenyaŋ EJAKAIT eoŋ kamakon: konye mam akakan kisurokini jo.
Kwape ebalar awaragan naka imakio lukolosek ebe, ‘Mama ejaas ikaronok ŋes elomunia aronis’: konye akakan mam kisurokini jo.
Iŋai nat elomunit ekabaka loka Isirael asurokin? Iŋai bo idopiat ijo? Ekiŋok lokatwan, idepidepit.
Kirabak EJAKAIT, kotubok da eoŋ ka jo, koany ŋesi, kapurok, kayuu da kakanikon.”
Kotema ŋesi Daudi atiar, “Idolit ijo adepar eoŋ: naarai kikonak eoŋ nuejok, kwabo kekonakinit jo nueroko.
Ilimo lolo kwape kikonakinia eoŋ nuejok: naarai nakejaikinia EJAKAIT akanikon, mam ibu koar eoŋ.
Naarai arai kedumu etuŋanan lokasurupike, ejalakini kereka ŋes alosit eŋalei? Kanuka ŋun kotacak EJAKAIT jo nuejok kanuka nukiswamak eoŋ lolo.
Ido koany, ajeni ebe iraun ijo ekabaka, iticasio ajakanut naka Isirael kakanikon.
Aso ca kiyapoikinoi kolimite EJAKAIT, ebe mam jo imudiari akaur nakatupanakini, ebe da mam imudiari ekakiror kokek loka papaka.”
Kiyapoik Daudi Saul. Kolot Saul ore; konye kolototo Daudi ka iketuŋa abua.
Ajai etuŋanan Maon, loajaas ikeboro Karamel; apol etuŋanan noi, ajaas ŋes amerekekin alukumin auni, ka akinei alukumit: atubi ajul nuka amerekekinike koKaramel.
Arai ekiror loka etuŋanan Nabal, ka ekiror loka aberuke Abigail: aco aberu, etemelel da: konye kerai etuŋanan otaupe loeswamai nukaronok; arai lokotogo loka Kaleb.
Kopup Daudi kamodiŋ ebe atubi Nabal ajul nuka amerekekinike.
Kijuka Daudi ikatumunak itomon kotema Daudi ikatumunak atiar, “Koloto Karamel, mama ejai Nabal, kiyogata ŋes kokirorika:
Itemarete ŋes loekeriana kwanata atiar, ‘Kinapakin ijo, kinapakin da ekonitogo, kinapakinos da kere luijaatar.
Apup ebe ejaas jo ikatubok ajul: ikonikecokok ajaunos kasio, mam apotu keswamakis kes aronis, amamei da ibore yenabu komameun apak kere naajaatar Karamel.
Kiŋit ikatumunakakon, kilimokinete jo; aso do kodumut ikatumunak asianut kakonyenekon; naarai kipou kapaaran kanaejok: keŋaiŋait, koinak yenejai akanikon ibulesinikon ka okokukon Daudi.’ ”
Kosodi kepotu ikatumunak luka Daudi, kolimokis Nabal kwape ajaatar akiro ŋun kere kokiror loka Daudi, kililiŋata.
Koboŋok Nabal ibulesin luka Daudi ebe, “Iŋai bo Daudi? Iŋai bo da okoku loka Yese? Ipu kwana ibulesin luesiete ŋinituŋanan kama ejai ekapolonike.
Do kereka eoŋ alemun ikamugatin ka akakipi ka akakiriŋ naarakinit ikakatubok ajul ainakin ituŋa lumam ajeni nekeponiata?”
Kibelokinos ikatumunak luka Daudi, koboŋosi, kolimokis ŋes kwape ajaatar akiro ŋun kere.
Kotema Daudi iketuŋa atiar, “Konapata yesi ŋinituŋanan ekekileŋ.” Konapa kesi ŋinituŋanan ekekileŋ; konap Daudi da ekekileŋ: kotupasi ituŋa akwat aoŋon Daudi: kopaikis akwat aarei oboro.
Konye abu ediopet kokatumunak kolimok Abigail aberu naka Nabal ebe, “Koany, abu Daudi kijuk ikiyakia kamodiŋ ayogan ejakaitikosi; kisiejanak kes.
Konye kikonakis ituŋa ŋul sio ejok, mam apotu kiswamakis sio aronis, amamei da ibore yenabu komameun, apak kere nakiboio kakes, nakijaar ais.
Araas kesi arwatat kamakosi kuare ka paaran da, apak kere nakijaar kakes kicokie amerekekin.
Aso do kojen, koomoom nuiswamai; naarai epeleikinitai aiswamakin ejakaitikosi aronis ka eketogo kere: naarai kanu eraar ŋesi otaupe, mam ituŋanan epedori einer kaŋes.”
Kotema ikatumunakake atiar, “Kiŋarenikinoi; koany, katupuni yes.” Konye mam abu kolimok okilenike Nabal.
Napeibwaneni ŋesi akesigiria, kijesar neiteriboria eroŋat, ido koany, kijesunos Daudi da ka iketuŋa kiriamunos kakes.
Abu Daudi kobala ebe, “Abeit abu kedar atitai kere luajaatar etikesa lo amodiŋ, komam yenabu komameun koboro kere luajaatar: katacaki ŋesi eoŋ aronis itia ajokis.
Kiswamak kwaŋin Edeke lukasurup luka Daudi, adepar da, arai kenyek idiokoku yenisapat kotoma luejaatar kere moi eŋiuni akoloŋ.”
Kibirokin akejeke kotema atiar, “Kabeikis eoŋ, ekajakait, kabeikis eoŋ numam adolit: keŋaiŋait, kisiik akonibulesit kiner kakiikon, kopup ijo akiro nuka akonibulesit.
Keŋaiŋait, kinyek ekajakait apodokin otaupe ŋol, ŋes Nabal: naarai kwape ejaar ekekiror, ikoni ŋesi da nepenen: Nabal

Aso do ekajakait, kwape ejaria EJAKAIT, kwape ejaria da ekonitau, naarai abu EJAKAIT kitikok jo agwaun akirot naka aokot, ainyaŋ kakonikan, aso kiswamata lukasurupokon, ka luemoatar ejakaitika aronis bala Nabal.
Aso ca ainakinet na naayau abulesitikon ekajakait koinakinai ikatumunak luetupitos ekajakait.
Keŋaiŋait, kisioni aibucaret naka abulesitikon: naarai abeit iticasi EJAKAIT ekek loka ekajakait, naarai ejio ekajakait ijiisio luka EJAKAIT; mam aronis edumakinio mamakon apaarasiakon kere.

Karaida kenyou etuŋanan aidap jo, amoot aijarakon, konye eenikinitai aijar naka ejakaitika arita naka ikajarak kibuakite EJAKAIT Ekonideke; eporocari aijar naka lukasurupokon, bala ejai toma aporocet.
Kosodi kanen naiswamakinia EJAKAIT ejakaitika kwape ejaatar nukajokak kere nuener mamakon, nakiseunia da ijo araun ekepolon loka Isirael;

Mam na kitakadikini jo, mam eraun aitiguikinet nakotau loka ejakaitika, ebe ibuko aokot komam akirot, arai ebe enyaŋa ekajakait kanukeŋ: naikonakinia EJAKAIT ekajakait ejok, ŋes do iitunio akonibulesit.”
Kituritete da akonicoa, kituritete jo da, naitikok eoŋ agwaun akirot naka aokot, ka ainyaŋ kanukaŋ kakakan.
Naarai abeit, kwape ejaria EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael, loketikoki eoŋ aiswamakin jo aronis, kedim ijo aiwonyun airiamun keoŋ, abeit timam kideikin Nabal idiokoku yenisapat tupuruc eŋiuni akoloŋ.”
Kwaŋin kijau Daudi kakekan luainunit ŋes: kotema ŋes atiar, “Kolot togokon kainapakin; koany, apupok ekoniporoto, acam da akonikiro.”
Kosodi kanen tupuruc, kikua emeret loka Nabal, kolimok aberuke ŋes akiro ŋun, kipirisiar etauke kotomake, koluor bala amoru.
Kosodi kanen, ketuboros apaarasia kwape atomon, kinom EJAKAIT Nabal, kotwana.
Kosodete kepotu ibulesin luka Daudi Karamel neejai Abigail, kobalas ŋes ebe, “Kijukunit Daudi sio neijai ijo, ayaŋaar jo mamake aimany.”
Konyou, kokukum, kobala ebe, “Koany, abulesitikon erai abulesit nailosenenei akeje nuka ibulesin luka ekajakait.”
Kisunyak Abigail, konyou, kibwanen asigiria, kakepesur akany nuatupitos ŋes; kotupa ikiyakia luka Daudi, koraun akeberu.
Abu Saul kokorakinite Mikal akokuke, aberu naka Daudi, Paliti okoku loka Lais, loarai loka Galim.
Kosodi Saul anyoun, kolot amodiŋ naka Sip, kojaas kituŋa luseuna luka Isirael ilukumin iuni amoot Daudi amodiŋ naka Sip.
Kidukur Saul oukot loka Kakila loitei amodiŋ ariri naka erot, Konye eboie Daudi kamodiŋ, koany da ebe ibwapunit Saul ŋes amodiŋ.
Kanuka ŋun kijuka Daudi ikarotak, kojen cut ebe abu Saul.
Konyou Daudi, kobu aibois naedukurit Saul: koany Daudi aibois naaperio Saul, ka Abiner okoku loka Ner ekapolon loka ajoreke: aperi Saul kokidiŋ kagalin, kidukurito ituŋa alukun ŋes.
Kwaŋin kopotu Daudi ka Abisai neejaas ituŋa kuare: ido koany, aperi Saul kojotoi kokidiŋ kagalin, kodupakina akekwara kwap kakouke: koperete Abiner ka ituŋa alukunite ŋes.
Kosodi Abisai atemar Daudi atiar, “Kijaik Edeke lokasurupikon akanikon lolo: aso keŋaiŋait kocamakinai kecum ŋes kakwara aipelor kiton alup aicumet adiopet, mam erucakini aicum ŋes nakiareit.”
Kotema Daudi Abisai atiar, “Sirikiar ŋes: naarai iŋai eriori akekan aluikin loinyonyoikinit EJAKAIT akinyet, komam egwaun akirot?”
Kotema Daudi atiar, “Kwape ejaria EJAKAIT, inomi EJAKAIT ŋes; diat edoluni apaaran naka atwanareke; elemuni kolot ojie, koarakinai ŋina.
Madi akuj eoŋ arior akakan aluikin loinyonyoikinit EJAKAIT akinyet: konye, keŋaiŋait, kolem akwara naejai akouke, ka etuo loka akipi, kaloto.”
Kwaŋin kolem Daudi akwara ka etuo loka akipi kakou naka Saul; koloto, mam ituŋanan yenabu koany karaida ajenun, karaida idio akwenyun: naarai ajotoete kere; naarai etojotoorit EJAKAIT kes ajo nuipu.
Kosodi Daudi alosit oitela je, kobwo kaidi naka eroŋat kama elwana; kojai apak naelal noi kidiŋikec.
Kiworo Daudi ituŋa, ka Abiner okoku loka Ner ebe, “Abiner, mam jo iboŋokini?” Kosodi Abiner aboŋokin ebe, “Iŋai ijo loiworot ekabaka?”
Kotema Daudi Abiner atiar, “Mere jo etuŋanan loititiŋ? Iŋai da iputotor ijo koIsirael? Aso kanukinyo mam jo idaritor ekonijakait ekabaka? Naarai abu ediopet kotuŋa kobu aiar ekabaka ekonijakait.

Mam ejok ibore ŋin yeniswama ijo, Kwape ejaria EJAKAIT, ibusakinit yes atwakare, naarai mam ipotu kidara ekusijakait, loinyonyoikinit EJAKAIT akinyet. Aso do koany, neejai akwara naka ekabaka ka etuo loka akipi loajai akouke.”
Kotema atiar, “Kanukinyo idopiator ekajakait ekebulesit? Eswama anyoika? Ido aronis anyoin ejai akanika?

Aso, keŋaiŋait, kopup ekajakait ekabaka akiro nuka ekebulesit, arai erai EJAKAIT kituluikinit jo eoŋ, kocam ŋesi ainakinet: konye arai eraas idwe luka ituŋa, kikenoi kes kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT; naarai kereŋeasi eoŋ lolo kenyek aidoŋ airumet naka EJAKAIT kobalas ebe, ‘Kolot, kijaanak icedekesio.’
Aso do, kinyeis akaokot abukokinio akwap naemamei EJAKAIT: naarai alomu ekabaka loka Isirael amoot idepidepit, kwape emejaa ituŋanan atapeŋ koroŋan.”
Koboŋok Daudi ebe, “Koany akwara, wu ekabaka Aso do kobu ediopet kokatumunak koom.
Ikonakini EJAKAIT ŋinituŋanan kwape ejaar akedolit ka amunonutuke: naarai abu EJAKAIT kijaik jo akanika lolo, konye mam abu kario akakan aluikin loinyonyoikinit EJAKAIT akinyet.
Ido koany, kwape abu kayoŋia akoniijar lolo, koyoŋai do akaijar da kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kayuu da eoŋ kocan kere.”
Kosodi Saul atemar Daudi atiar, “Kisirereŋi ijo, okokuka Daudi: iswamai ijo nukagogoŋ, ipikori da.” Kolot Daudi orotoke, koboŋo Saul da aiboisike,

Kobala Daudi kotauke ebe, “Atwanikini moikace eoŋ akan naka Saul: emamei ibore yenejok kamaka dimarai eoŋ alosit akwap naka Ipilisitian; kapaluni do Saul eoŋ, mam bobo kamoi eoŋ oikorun kere luka Isirael: kwaŋin akui do eoŋ kakanike.”
Konyou Daudi, kotubor, ŋes ka ituŋa akwat akanykape luajaas kaŋes, mama ejai Akis okoku loka Maok, ekabaka loka Gat.
Kiboienenei Daudi koGat nepepe ka Akis, ŋes ka iketuŋa, ŋolituŋanan kekekal, Daudi da kakeŋor aarei, Akinoam Ayesereelit, ka Abigail Akaramelit, aberu kolo naka Nabal.
Kolimokinai Saul ebe aker Daudi Gat: mam bobo abu komo ŋes.
Kotema Daudi Akis atiar, “Arai adumunit asianut kakonyenekon, kainakis kes eoŋ aibois kore ediopet korony, tetere eboikin ŋina: naarai kanukinyo iboioto ekonibulesit kajo kore loka ekabaka?”
Kosodi Akis ainakin ŋes Sikilag kapaaran kaŋin: ŋes do araunor Sikilag loka ikabakan luka Yuda aitodol lolo.
Emwaasi apaarasia nuabu Daudi kiboio kakwap naka Ipilisitian ekaru ediopet ka ilapio iwoŋon.
Kodany Daudi ituŋa, mam abu kitajar etuŋanan arai aberu, koŋata amerekekin ka imoŋin, asigiria ka akaalai, ka igoen; koboŋo, kobu neejai Akis.
Kotema Akis atiar, “Ai bo lolo ipotu kosurokis?” Kotema Daudi atiar, “Eŋalakimak naka Yuda,” ka “Eŋalakimak naka Iyerameelin,” ka “Eŋalakimak naka Ikenin.”
Mam Daudi abu kitajar etuŋanan karaida aberu, ayaŋaun kes Gat, kobala ebe, “Kinyeis einer ebe, ‘Eswama Daudi kwanata.’ ” Ido eswamaenenei ŋesi kwaŋin apak kere naeboienonoo kakwap naka Ipilisitian.
Kiyu Akis Daudi, kobala ebe, “Ainaki iketuŋa Isirael aila ŋes cut; kanuka ŋun eraun ekakejaanakinan ikar kere.”
Kotema Daudi Akis atiar, “Kanuka ŋun ijenuni nuiswamai ekonikejaanakinan.” Kotema Akis Daudi atiar, “Kanuka ŋun kadakakini araun ekedaran akouka apaarasia kere.”
Kotukonokinos Ipilisitian kopotu kidukuroto Sunem: kotukok Saul Isirael kere, kidukuroto Giliboa.
Keanyu Saul ajore naka Ipilisitian abu kokurianar, komaran eketau noi.
Kosodi nakiŋisia Saul EJAKAIT, mam EJAKAIT abu koboŋok ŋes, karaida kotoma airujasia, karaida koUrim, karaida konabin.
Kosodi Saul atemar ikebulesin atiar, “Komoikinai aberu naejai ajokit, tetere alosi mamake aiŋitun.” Kotemasi ikekejaanakinak ŋes atiar, “Koany, ejai aberu En-dor naejai ajokit.”
Kotema aberu ŋes atiar, “Koany, ijeni nueswama Saul, kwape ereŋearia luejaas ajokin ka ikacudak kakwap: kanukinyo ilokia ijo akaijar, aiar eoŋ?”
Kiyapoik Saul ŋes kolimit EJAKAIT ebe, “Kwape ejaria EJAKAIT, mam adiokiticanet kidoikin jo kanuka akirot kana,”
Kosodi aberu atemar atiar, “Iŋai bo etodokuni mamakon?” Kotema atiar, “Kitodokikinai Samuel.”
Keanyu aberu Samuel, kodelo keporoto loepol: kotema aberu Saul atiar, “Kanukinyo kimodia ijo eoŋ? Kwabo irai ijo Saul.”
Kotema ekabaka ŋes atiar, “Sirikikurianar: naarai inyo iseseni ijo?” Kotema aberu Saul atiar, “Aseseni edeke edokuni kokwap.”
Kotema ŋes atiar, “Ejesi ŋesi ai?” Kotema atiar, “Edokuni emojoŋ; erapiara kekaso.” Kojen Saul ebe arai Samuel, kokukum, kisuded.
Kotema Samuel atiar, “Aso kanukinyo kiŋisia eoŋ, naarai anyou EJAKAIT kamakon, erai da lokasurupikon?
Eswama EJAKAIT kanuke, kwape abu kineria kamakaŋ: acila EJAKAIT ajakanut kakanikon, ainaki eidunyetekon Daudi.
Naarai mam ibu korima eporoto loka EJAKAIT, mam ibu kitodol anyunyurake naededeŋ kama ejai Amalek, kanuka ŋun ŋes kiswamakinia EJAKAIT jo akirot na lolo.
Bobo da ijaikini EJAKAIT Isirael ka jo da akan naka Ipilisitian: moi ijaunos ijo ka odwekon nepepe keoŋ: ijaikini EJAKAIT ajore naka Isirael akan naka Ipilisitian.”
Kobu aberu neejai Saul, koany ebe eyaloŋoŋoi noi, kotema ŋes atiar, “Koany, apupoki akonibulesit eporotokon, adacarit akaijar, apupok akonikiro nuibu kolimok eoŋ.
Aso, keŋaiŋait, kopupok ijo da eporoto loka abulesitikon, kainu jo adiotap; konyam, tetere igogoŋior, nailosio korotokon.”
Konye koŋer, kotema atiar, “Mam anyami.” Konye kitiŋaikis ŋes ikekejaanakinak ka aberu; kopupok ŋesi ekeceporoto, Konyou kokwap kiboikin oitada.
Ajai aberu itaok yenatumit togo; kiwonya, koar ŋes; kolem akiria, koŋo kope imugatin lumam itubuunitoi:
Koinu ŋesi Saul ka ikekejaanakinak; konyamata. Kosodete anyoun, kolototo akuare ŋin.
Kotubonoros ijaka luka Ipilisitian kakwat ka ilukumin, kotuboros Daudi da ka iketuŋa kokau ka Akis.

Kosodete ikapolok luka Ipilisitian atemar atiar, “Inyo bo iswamaete Iburanian lu kane?” Kotema Akis ikapolok luka Ipilisitian atiar, “Mere lo Daudi, ekejaanakinan loka Saul ekabaka loka Isirael, loejai nepepe keoŋ apaarasia kanu, arai ikar lu, mam adumunit adioibucaret kamake ageun neasiunia mamakaŋ aitodol lolo?”

Konye konyunyurikinos ikapolok luka Ipilisitian, kotemasi ikapolok luka Ipilisitian ŋes atiar, “Kitoboŋo etuŋanan lo, tetere eboŋori aiboisike naiseikinit ijo ŋes, sirikelot kaoni ojie, kinyek araun lokasurupiwok kojie: naarai ikonakini ai etuŋanan loepucete kejakaitike? Mere ti kakwes nuka ituŋa kalu?
Mere lo Daudi, loayeononoto ikosiete ebe,
‘Aar Saul ikelukumin,
Aar Daudi da ikelukumin itomon?’ ”
Aso do koboŋo, kolot kainapakin, tetere mam itakadikini ijaka luka Ipilisitian.”
Kotema Daudi Akis atiar, “Konye eswama anyoika? Ido inyo idum ijo kaneejai ekejaanakinanikon kapak nakijaar kajo kiton lolo, tape mam alosi aitiji lukasurup luka ejakaitika ekabaka?”
Koboŋok Akis kotema Daudi atiar, “Ajeni ebe ijok ijo kakonyeneka, kwape emalaika loka Edeke: konye alimut ijaka luka Ipilisitian ebe, ‘Mam elosi kaoni ojie.’
Aso do kodilok anyoun tupuruc ka ikejaanakinak luka ejakaitikon luiupuna kajo: atipet kinyout tupuruc, keŋiu akoloŋ kolototo.”
Kodilok Daudi anyoun, ŋes ka iketuŋa, alosit tupuruc, aboŋor akwap naka Ipilisitian. Koloto Ipilisitian Yesereel.
Kijoreosi aŋor ka luajaas toma kere ludidik ka lukapolok da: mam apotu koarata idioda, konye koyaŋaasi kes, koloto.
Kepotu Daudi ka iketuŋa ore, koany, ecweitai kakim; ejoreoritai aŋorokec, ka ikecedwe lusap ka lupesur.
Kosodi Daudi ka ituŋa luajaas kaŋes adelor, komonyata, aitodol naekarakiniata aimony.
Ejoreoritai aŋor aarei nuka Daudi, Akinoam Ayesereelit, ka Abigail aberu kolo naka Nabal Akaramelit.

Kojaikini Daudi ocan luipu noi: naarai alimitos ituŋa aibiribir ŋes kamor, naarai akadakinito itauon luka ituŋa kere, ŋolituŋanan kanuka ikedwe lusap ka lupesur: konye kogogoŋior Daudi kotoma EJAKAIT Ekedeke.
Kiŋit Daudi EJAKAIT ebe, “Arai kebwap eoŋ erioŋet lo, adolokini kereka eoŋ kes?” Koboŋok ebe, “Kibwap: naarai abeit idolokini ijo kes, mam kikurwokini ainyakun kere.”
Kolot Daudi, ŋes ka iketuŋa akwat akanykape luajaas kaŋes, kodoloto aleles Besor, neasalakinete ŋul luelanyakinio.
Konye kibwap Daudi, ŋes ka ituŋa akwat aoŋon: naarai apotu akwat aarei kosalakis, luelolonyito komam epedorete aitub aleles Besor.
Koinakis ŋes atutubet naka aluŋuret naka itinin, ka aibuŋeta aarei nueokito nuka imusabibun. Kedau ŋesi ainyam, kikwar: naarai mam anyamit atap, karaida aimat akipi apaarasia auni ka akuaresia auni.
Kotema Daudi ŋes atiar, “Lokaŋai ijo? Ido lali bo kibunio?” Kotema atiar, “Arai eoŋ esapat Emisiriat, ebulesit loka Emalekait; kajal ejakaitika eoŋ, naarai apenata apaarasia auni adeka.
Apotu kasurokisi ari naka eŋalakimak naka Iceretitin, ka ari naka Yuda, ka Eŋalakimak naka Kaleb; kecweata Sikilag kakim.”
Kotema Daudi ŋes atiar, “Kiyaŋaari ijo eoŋ orioŋet ŋol?” Kotema ŋes atiar, “Kiyapoikinoi kolimite Edeke, ebe mam jo kiari eoŋ karaida aijaikin eoŋ akanin nuka ekajakait, kayaŋaari jo orioŋet ŋol.”
Kodany Daudi kes ageun napimukokini akwap aitodol atiboŋ naka apaaran naatupakini: mam idiotuŋanan abu koku kakesi, dimarai ikatumunak akwat aoŋon luapotu kibwanenoto akaalai kokerata.
Kinyak Daudi kere luaŋatarito Imalekain: koyuu Daudi akeŋor aarei.
Komamei koborokec yenaoliorit, yenepol karaida yenedit; karaida ikecedwe lusap ka lupesur, karaida luŋatan, karaida iboro kere luaŋatarito: kinyak Daudi kere.
Koyaŋa Daudi isipanin kere luka amerekekin ka luka aituk, luameeto koiŋaren kibaren ice, kobala ebe, “Lu kes iŋatan luka Daudi.”

Kosodete ituŋa kere lukaronok ka ituŋa luka Belial, kotoma kaŋul kalualosito ka Daudi aboŋokin ebe, “Kanu naarai mam apotu koloto kaoni, mam kiinakini kes idiobore kotoma luŋatan lukinyaku, dimarai koyaŋa ŋinituŋanan akeberu ka ikedwe, koloto.”
Kosodi Daudi atemar atiar, “Ikainacan, mam iswamakinete kwaŋin iboro lukiinak EJAKAIT oni, lokidar oni, loabu kijaik erioŋet lokisurokinit oni akaniwok.
Iŋai kipupokini yes kakirot kaŋin? Naarai kwape ejaar akorakinet naka ŋol kaloelosi ojie, kwape kwaŋin da ejaar akorakinet naka ŋol kaloidari iboro: ekorokoroete koriakas.”
Kojaun kwaŋin amear kapaaran kaŋin ka aiyatanakin, kisilak araun ekisil ka aicorakinet mama ejaas idwe luka Isirael, kiton lolo.
Kedol Daudi Sikilag, kijukak imakio luka Yuda, ikepapero, ice kotoma luŋatan, ebe, “Koany, ainakinetekus kotoma luŋatan kaneejaas lukasurupo luka EJAKAIT.”
Ainakinet mama ejaas luka Bet-el, ka luajaas Ramot loka Eŋalakimak, ka luajaas Yatir;
Ka luajaas Aroer, ka luajaas Sipimot, ka luajaas Esitemoa;
Ka luajaas Raeal, ka luajaas oreria luka Iyerameelin, ka luajaas oreria luka Ikenin;
Ka luajaas Koruma, ka luajaas Kor-asan, ka luajaas Atak;
Ka luajaas Keburon, ka mama ejaas aiboisio kere nuatapit Daudi alosenen ka iketuŋa.
Kodapata noi Ipilisitian Saul ka odweke; koarata Ipilisitian Yonatan, ka Abinadab ka Maliki-sua, odwe luka Saul.
Kipikoroi Saul kojie, kodolokis ŋes ikagumak imalia; kobur noi kanuka ikagumak imalia.

Kosodi Saul atemar loadakit lujiisike atiar, “Kout ekonikileŋ, kicumia eoŋ; kinyeis lumam ekepep lu abunore aicum eoŋ, aitisil eoŋ,” Konye koŋer loadakit lujiisike; naarai akuriana noi. Kanuka ŋun kolem Saul ekekileŋ, kicumakinor.
Keanyu loadakit lujiisike ebe atwana Saul, kicumakin ŋesi da kekekileŋ, kotwana nepepe kaŋes.
Kwaŋin kotwana Saul, ka odweke iuni, ka loadakit lujiisike, ka iketuŋa kere, kapaaran kaŋin kere nepepe.

Keanyut ituŋa luka Isirael luajaas juwai naka aditot, ka ŋul luajaas juwai naka Yorodan ebe akerata ituŋa luka Isirael, atwana da Saul ka odweke, kojalata ireria, kokerata; kopotu Ipilisitian kiboikinos toma.
Kosodi kanen tupuruc kepotu Ipilisitian aiŋat lukearitai, kodumut Saul ka odweke iuni etwakikinito moru Giliboa.
Kojepasi akekou, koŋatasi lujiisike, kijukasi akwap naka Ipilisitian naerimorit, ayaŋaar akiro togo loka aputosiakec nuegerer, kotuŋa da.
Kibwaikis lujiisike togo loka Asitarot: koenikis akekuan arwatat naka Bet-san.
Kepuput lueboienenete koYabes-Gilead nukeŋ nuapotu Ipilisitian kiswamakis Saul.
Konyout ituŋa kere luatitiŋ, koloto akuare kere, kolemut akuan naka Saul ka awat nuka odweke karwatat naka Bet-san; kopotu Yabes, kicweata kes kanen.
Koyaŋaasi akojokec, konukakis kwap kepeduru koYabes, kikanyata eteŋei apaarasia akanykaarei.
Kosodi kanen kapaaran nakiwuniet, koany, kobu etuŋanan koidukurun kama ejai Saul koeilieilite ikenapen, kojukite alupot da akouke; kosodi kedol mama ejai Daudi, kisuded, kiyoga.
Kobala Daudi ŋes ebe, “Laali bo kibunio?” Kotema atiar, “Akui koidukurun luka Isirael.”
Kobala Daudi ŋes ebe, “Ekote bo ai? Keŋaiŋait kolimokinai.” Koboŋok ebe, “Akera ituŋa kojie, ido ebiroros ituŋa luipu atwaka; Saul ka okokuke Yonatan atwaka kesi da.”
Kobala Daudi etelepat lokelimokini ŋes ebe, “Kijenuni biai ebe atwana Saul ka okokuke Yonatan?”
Kotema etelepat lokelimokini ŋes atiar, “Napajaar eoŋ moru Giliboa, koany, kogoŋakin Saul akwarake; ido koany, agalin ka luibwanenito kituburuunitos.
Kosodi kenolia kau, kaany eoŋ, kanyara. Kaboŋok ebe, ‘Eoŋ lo.’
Katemaeoŋ atiar, ‘Iŋai bo ijo?’ Kaboŋok ŋes ebe, ‘Eoŋ Emalekait.’
Katema eoŋ atiar, ‘Keŋaiŋait, kobwo kosiepika, koar eoŋ, naarai kerumut ican; naarai akaijar eroko ejari kotomakaŋ.’
Kasodi aibwo kosiepike, kaar ŋes, naarai abu kajen cut ebe mam epedori araut ekajaran kedau aibirokin kwap; kayaŋa aboko naajai akouke, ka aisinit naajai akanike, ido ayaunit mama ejai ekajakait.”
Kibworoto, komonyata akiyo, koluŋata aitiwar akwap, kanuka Saul, kanuka Yonatan da okokuke, kanuka ituŋa luka EJAKAIT, kanuka ekek da loka Isirael; naarai ebiroros kekileŋ.
Kobala Daudi etelepat lokelimokini ŋes ebe, “Lokai bo ijo?” Koboŋok ebe, “Arai eoŋ okoku loka emoit, Emalekait.”
Kobala Daudi ŋes ebe, “Kanukinyo mam kiyonia arior akonikan amudiar ŋol loinyonyoikinit EJAKAIT akinyet?”
Konyarau Daudi ediopet kotelepai, kolimok atiar, “Kikunyak, kosomakin.” Kicum ŋes kotwana.
Kobala Daudi ŋes ebe, “Akoniwokot kobeata akoukon; naarai akoniituk ŋes akajenan kamakon inera atiar, ‘Aar ŋol loinyonyoikinit EJAKAIT akinyet.’ ”
Kosodi kokuudian Daudi Saul ka Yonatan okokuke akuudian na:
Kicorak aisisianakin idwe luka Yuda ekosio loka akabwa: koany, kiwadikatai oitabo loka Yasar. Kobala ebe:
“Aibusesukon, WU okwe Isirael, aari kaiboisiokon nuiceleleete!
Wu okwe ebiroros itikirigin!
Sirikisiarakis orotin luka Asukelon;
Kinyeis adwe nuka Ipilisitian aiyalama,
Kinyeis adwe nuka kalumam ekepitai ailel.
Kinyeis akopyo karaida akiru ajaut kokujukus,
Karaida imanikoria luka kaluiinakina;
Naarai ŋina acakakinio kileic ebuku loka itikirigin,
Ebuku loka Saul bala lomam enyonyoikinitai akinyet.
Kasiepa da nuka itikirigin,
Akabwa naka Yonatan mam abonunenei kau,
Ka ekileŋ loka Saul da mam aboijunenei atitai.
Mam aponi kotiakai katwanarekec;
Atiroko aitelekarit imorukaalen,
Agogoŋ aitelekarit iŋatunyo.
Yes adwe nuka Isirael, kibworoto Saul,
Lokitanapi yes lukareŋak lukaitojoka,
Lokisiri ikusinapen kesabu.
Wu okwe ebiroros itikirigin
Kokidiŋ ojie!
Aari Yonatan kaiboisiokon nuiceleleete.
Ibu kitalakaanari eoŋ noi noi;
Akonomin mamakaŋ arai nakaumokin,
Adepar amin naka aŋor.
Wu okwe ebiroros itikirigin,
Amudiaros da lujiis luka ajore!”
Kwaŋin kobwot Daudi, ka akeŋor aarei da, Akinoam Ayesereelit, ka Abigail aberu kolo naka Nabal, Akaramelit.
Kitwobot Daudi ituŋa luajaas kaŋes, ŋinituŋanan ka ekaleke: kiboikinos oreria luka Keburon.
Kopotu ituŋa luka Yuda, kinyonyoikis Daudi akinyet araun ekabaka loka ekek loka Yuda kanen.
Kolimokis Daudi ebe, “Ituŋa luka Yabes-gilead kes luanukete Saul.”
Kijuka Daudi ikiyakia mama ejaas ituŋa luka Yabes-gilead, kobala kes ebe, “Kisirereŋit yes EJAKAIT, naarai itodikis ejakaitikus, ŋes Saul, asianut na, inukata ŋes.
Kitodik kwana EJAKAIT yes asianut ka abeit: eoŋ da aropi yes asianut ŋin, naarai iswamata akirot ŋin.
Aso do kogogoŋoto akaninikus, kotitiŋioto: naarai atwana Saul ekusijakait, bobo da abu ekek loka Yuda kenyonyoik eoŋ akinyet araun ekabakakec.”
Kituluo ŋes ekabaka loka Gilead, ka Iasurin, ka Yesereel, ka Epuraim, ka Benyamin, ka Isirael kere,
(Kerai Is-boset okoku loka Saul loka ikar akaisaoŋon naageunia airum Isirael, kirumak ikar iarei.) Konye kotup ekek loka Yuda Daudi.
Apak naaraar Daudi ekabaka koKeburon irumit ekek loka Yuda emwaasi ikar ikanykaarei ka ilapio ikanykape.
Koloma Yoab okoku loka Seruia ka ikejaanakinak luka Daudi, kiriamunos kakes eiduny katapar naka Gibeon; kiboikinos, lu epuai katapar, kwi da epuai katapar.
Kotema Abiner Yoab atiar, “Keŋaiŋait, konyout ikatumunak abolia kakonyenewok.” Kotema Yoab atiar, “Aso konyoutu.”
Konyout kodokasi imaritai; itomon ka luarei kanuka Benyamin, ka Is-boset okoku loka Saul, ka itomon ka luarei luka ikejaanakinak luka Daudi.
Kitiŋ ŋinituŋanan akou naka aupake, kicum kekilenike osiep loka aupake; kibiroros nepepe: kanuka ŋun ŋes amaikinere aibois ŋin Kelakat-kasurim,
Kosisior ejie kapaaran kaŋin; kipikoroi Abiner ka ituŋa luka Isirael kakonyen nuka ikejaanakinak luka Daudi.
Korukitor Asakel Abiner; mam abu kibelokin teten arai kediany kotoma alositeke naatupitor Abiner.
Kosodi Abiner anoliar kauke, kotema atiar, “Ŋes ijo, Asakel?” Koboŋok ebe, “Eoŋ ca lo.”
Kotema Abiner ŋes atiar, “Kibelokin ijo teten arai kediany, kikam ediopet kokatumunak, kolem lujiisike.” Konye koŋer Asakel aibelokin katupit ŋes.
Kotema bobo Abiner Asakel ebe, “Kibelokin kinyek atupit eoŋ: kanukinyo kebirokinia jo kwap? Ekonakini ai aseseni onacekon Yoab?”

Konye koŋer aibelokin: tape Abiner icumi ŋes akoik ekaukau kakwara, kipelun akwara kokauke; kibirokin nen, kotwanik aibois ŋin: kosodi kanen, luadolunete kere aibois naebirokin Asakel kotwanite, kobwout.
Kotukonokinos idwe luka Benyamin neajai Abiner, koraut erioŋet ediopet, kobwaata kokuju keukot.
Kosodi Abiner aiworo Yoab ebe, “Edanyi kereka ekileŋ ikar kere? Mam jo ijeni ebe awasiake ŋes adwaris? Aso do kitodoli ai eriŋa icorakinia ituŋa aboŋor katupakin iinacanakec?”
Kotema Yoab atiar, “Kwape ejaria Edeke, kemam jo einer, abeit tikeloto ituŋa tupuruc, komam ŋinituŋanan atupit onaceke.”
Kokut Yoab arupepe, kobwoutu ituŋa kere, komam bobo erukitotor Isirael, karaida aitiji kes bobo.
Koboŋo Yoab katupit Abiner: kedau atukonokin ituŋa kere, komameut ituŋa itomon ka lukanykaoŋon ka Asakel kokejaanakinak luka Daudi.
Konye apotu ikejaanakinak luka Daudi kodanyata luka Benyamin, ka ituŋa luka Abiner, tape etwakete ituŋa akwat auni ka akaisakanykape.
Kodakasi Asakal, kidaikis ŋes ates naka papake, naajai Bet-lekem, Kolot Yoab ka ituŋake akuare kia, kocila kide kojaas kesi Keburon.
Lokiareitike, Kileab, loka Abigail aberu kolo naka Nabal Akaramelit; lokiwuniet, Abisalom okoku loka Maaka akoku naka Talumai ekabaka loka Gesur;
Lokiwoŋonet, Adoniya okoku loka Kagit; lokikanyet, Sepatia okoku loka Abital;
Lokikanyetekape, Itiream, loka Egula aberu naka Daudi. Aponi ŋul kourikinai Daudi koKeburon.
Ajai Saul abusiat, ekekiror Risipa, akoku naka Aia: kotema Is-boset Abiner atiar, “Kanukinyo ilomaria ijo mama ejai abusiat naka papaka?”

Konyunyurikin Abiner noi kakiro nuka Is-boset, kotema atiar, “Arai eoŋ akou naka ekiŋok loka Yuda? Etodik lolo eoŋ asianut ekek loka Saul papakon, iinacanake ka ipaperoke, mam kejaikinit jo akan naka Daudi, konye kilimit eoŋ lolo kakirot naka aberu.
Kiswamak Edeke Abiner kwaŋin ka adepar da, arai, kwape eyapoikinia EJAKAIT Daudi, mam eoŋ eswamakini ŋes kwaŋin.
Aijul ajakanut alemar kokek loka Saul, ka asipokin ajakanut naka Daudi airum Isirael, ka Yuda, anyoun koDan kiton Beer-seba.”
Mam abu kopedo aboŋokin Abiner adiopekirot, naarai akuriana ŋes.
Kijuka Abiner ikiyakia kokirorike mama ejai Daudi, kotema ebe, “Nakaŋai akwap?” ebe da, “Kitutuk keoŋ, ido koany, kojaun akanika kajo, aibelokin Isirael kere mamakon.”
Kotema atiar, “Ejok; etutuki eoŋ kajo: konye akoto ibore idiopet kamakon, ŋes yenita, mam ianyuni akonyeneka, dimarai kisiau ber ayaun Mikal akoku naka Saul, naibunio aanyun eoŋ.”
Kijuka Daudi ikiyakia mama ejai Is-boset okoku loka Saul kotema ebe, “Koinakinai Mikal akaberu, naesinerit eoŋ kamunyin akwatat nuka ekiliokane loka Ipilisitian.”
Kiyakia Is-boset, kodemu ŋes kama kokilenike, ŋes Palutiel okoku loka Lais.
Kouparos okilenike kaŋes, kolosi emonyi, kotupite ŋes kiton Bakurim, Kosodi Abiner atemar ŋes atiar, “Ape, koboŋo.” Kosodi ŋesi aboŋor.
Abu Abiner kinerunito kimakio luka Isirael ebe, “Imootos yesi kolo Daudi araun ekabakakus:
Aso do kiswamata: naarai abu EJAKAIT kiner nuka Daudi ebe, ‘Kakan naka ekakejaanakinan Daudi etajari ikatuŋa Isirael kakan naka Ipilisitian, kakan da naka lukasurupokec kere.’ ”
Kiner da Abiner kaki nuka Benyamin: kolot da Abiner einer kaki nuka Daudi koKeburon kere nukitojokit Isirael, ka ekek kere loka Benyamin.
Kobu Abiner mama ejai Daudi Keburon, koupas kituŋa akaisaarei, Kipoik Daudi Abiner ka ituŋa luajaas kaŋes epucit.
Kotema Abiner Daudi atiar, “Anyouni kalot, atukonokini Isirael kere mama ejai ejakaitika ekabaka, kitutukoto kajo, kirum ijo kere luipuda ekonitau.” Kotwar Daudi Abiner; kolot inapakina.
Ido koany, apotu ikejaanakinak luka Daudi ka Yoab koboŋut kainat, koyaut luanatunitai luipu kakes: konye mam Abiner ajai kaDaudi Keburon; paarai atwarit ŋes, alot inapakina.
Kedol Yoab ka ajore kere naajai kaŋes, kolimokis Yoab ebe, “Abu Abiner okoku loka Ner, mama ejai ekabaka, atwar ŋes, alot inapakina.”
Kosodi Yoab abunore mama ejai ekabaka, kotema atiar, “Iswama anyoika? Koany, abu Abiner mama ijai; kanukinyo itwaria ŋes ido alot cut?
Ijeni ijo Abiner okoku loka Ner, abu ŋesi aiŋal jo, ajenun akonilomun ka akonilomar, ajenun da kere nuiswamai.”
Kelom Yoab kaneajai Daudi, kijuka ikiyakia atupakin Abiner, kinyakutu ŋes katan naka Sira: konye mam Daudi ajeni.
Keboŋ Abiner Keburon, koyaŋa Yoab ŋes awai kidiŋ orute einer kaŋes kaiyeiyea, kicum ŋes akoik kanen, kotwana, kanuka aokot nuka onaceke Asakel.
Kokau kiira Daudi, kotema atiar, “Mam nukabeikinete eoŋ ka ajakanutukakakonyen nuka EJAKAIT ikar kere kaokot nuka Abiner okoku loka Ner:
Kobeikis akou naka Yoab, ka ekek kere loka papake: kinyek akurwokin ajaun kokek loka Yoab, yenelelei, arai yenikatapon, arai yenegonakina obela, arai yeniketwani kekileŋ, arai yenekadit atap.”
Kwaŋin koara Yoab ka onaceke Abisai Abiner, naarai abu koar onacekec Asakel koGibeon kojie.
Kidaikis Abiner Keburon: kodelo ekabaka, komony kates naka Abiner: komonyata ituŋa kere.
Kokuudian ekabaka kanuka Abiner, kotema atiar,
“Ibusakinit kereka Abiner atwanare kwape ketwania lobaŋ?
Mam akonikanin aenen,
Karaida akejekon aenen kirikoi:
Kwape ibirokinor etuŋanan kakonyen nuka idwe luka lumam adolit,
Ibu ijo kibiror kwaŋin.”
Komonyata ituŋa kere bobo kanukeŋ.

Kopotu ituŋa kere kimaimata Daudi ainyam atap koriŋa apaaran edauna: konye kiyapo Daudi kotema atiar, “Keswamak Edeke eoŋ kwaŋin ka adepar da, arai keir atap arai icebore kere aitodol naelomaria akoloŋ.”
Kopuput ituŋa kere, kitojokata: kwape kitojokiata ituŋa kere nueswamaenenei ekabaka.
Kojenut ituŋa kere ka Isirael kere kapaaran kaŋin ebe mam arai akirot naka ekabaka aiar Abiner okoku loka Ner.
Kotema ekabaka ikejaanakinakake atiar, “Mam ijenete ebe ebiror ekapolon ido loajenikina koIsirael lolo?
Eoŋ da lolo anonok, karaida arai ekabaka loenyonyoikina akinyet; ketelekarito eoŋ ituŋa lu odwe luka Seruia kagogoŋ: korop EJAKAIT lokeswaman aronis kwape ejaar aronisike.”
Kepupu Is-boset okoku loka Saul ebe atwaniki Abiner Keburon, kokalanyakata akaninike, kiyaloŋoŋoto luka Isirael kere.

Ajaas Is-boset okoku loka Saul ituŋa iarei luapolokinito irioŋeta: ekiror loka ediopet Baana, ekiror loka ece Rekab, odwe luka Rimon Ebeerotit, loka idwe luka Benyamin: (naarai imarakinitai Beerot da araun loka Benyamin:
Kokerata Ibeerotin Gitaim, apotu kiboiororoto kanen kiton lolo.)
Koloto odwe luka Rimon Ebeerotit, Rekab ka Baana, kodolut togo loka Is-boset kapak naamwaniar akoloŋ, kapak naeyenunia ŋesi paaran.
Apiesi aberu naedari ekek loka etogo akima, kiluranar, kojotoi; koceda iinacan Rekab ka Baana kaiyeiyea kolomasi togo.
Kelomasi togo koperi Is-boset koitadake kagolake naperot, kinomata ŋes, koarata, kojepasi akouke, koyaŋaasi akouke, kitoroto orot loka Araba akuare kere.

Koyaut akou naka Is-boset mama ejai Daudi Keburon, kotemasi ekabaka atiar, “Koany akou naka Is-boset okoku loka Saul lokasurupikon, loakoto aijarakon; enyanaki EJAKAIT ekajakait ekabaka kanuka Saul ka aurike lolo.”
Koboŋok Daudi Rekab ka Baana onaceke, odwe luka Rimon Ebeerorit, ebe, “Kwape ejaria EJAKAIT, loalakuni aijaraka kocan kere.
Nakalimokinia kolo etuŋanan eoŋ ebe, ‘Koany, atwana Saul,’ koomite ebe kainunit akiro nukajokak, kekam ŋes, kaara ŋes koSikilag, ŋes eropitike loabu kainak ŋes kanuka akiroke.
Nakeariata ituŋa lukarokok etuŋanan loedolit kotogoke koitadake, mam eyatakini noi aitepesen aokotoke kakanikus, alemari yes kakwap?”
Kicorak Daudi ikatumunakake, koarata kes, kotubonosi akaninikec, ka akejenekec, kikajakis kes eiduny katapar koKeburon. Konye koyaŋaasi akou naka Is-boset, kidaikis ates naka Abiner Keburon.
Kapakio nuatuboros nakeraar Saul ekabakawok, ibu ijo kitoloma kitolom da Isirael: abu EJAKAIT kotema jo atiar, ‘Itanyamenenei ijo ikatuŋa Isirael, iraun ijo ekapolon koIsirael.’ ”
Kwaŋin kopotu imakio kere luka Isirael mama ejai ekabaka Keburon; kitutuk ekabaka Daudi kakes koKeburon kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT: kinyonyoikis Daudi akinyet araun ekabaka koIsirael.
Kirum Yuda koKeburon ikar ikanykaarei ka ilapio ikanykape: kirum Isirael kere ka Yuda koYerusalem ikar akaisauni ka luuni.
Konye kirum Daudi ere loabwaitai kagogoŋ loka Sion; ŋes ere loka Daudi.

Kotema Daudi kapaaran kaŋin ebe, “Ŋolituŋanan loedanyi Iyebusin, kodoka neeleleete akip, kodany iŋwalasik ka imudukiok lualait etau loka Daudi.” Ŋes etemariata ebe, “Mam imudukiok ka iŋwalasik epedorete alomar togo.”
Kiboikin Daudi ore loebwaitai kagogoŋ, komaik ŋes ere loka Daudi. Koduk Daudi airimor anyoun koMilo kotoma da.
Kiyatanakin Daudi apoloor; naarai ajai EJAKAIT, Edeke loka ajoresio, kaŋes.
Kojen Daudi ebe abu EJAKAIT kiticat ŋes araun ekabaka koIsirael, abu da kitopoloo ajakanutuke kanuka iketuŋa Isirael.
Lu kes ikiroria luka ŋul kaluaponi kourikinai ŋes koYerusalem; Samua, ka Sobab, ka Natan, ka Solomon.
Ka Ibar, ka Elisua, ka Nepeg, ka Yapia;
ka Elisama ka Eliada, ka Elipelet.
Apotu Ipilisitian kisiarakinos kaditot naka Repaim.
Kiŋit Daudi EJAKAIT ebe, “Alosi kereka eoŋ aitiji Ipilisitian? Kijaikini ijo kes akanika?” Kotema EJAKAIT Daudi atiar, “Kolot, naarai abeit ejaikini Ipilisitian akanikon.”
Kobu Daudi Baal-perasim, kodany Daudi kes kanen; kotema atiar, “Acil EJAKAIT lukasurupoka kakonyeneka, kwape eciliata akip.” Ŋes amaikinere aibois ŋin Baal-perasim.
Kinyeis aputosiakec kanen, koyaŋaasi Daudi ka ituŋake.
Kopotu bobo Ipilisitian, kisiarakinos aditot naka Repaim.
Nakiŋisia Daudi EJAKAIT, kotema atiar, “Mam ilosi: kirimo kaukec, kobunoki kes kaneejaas ikito luka baka.
Ejaun kwanata ebe, Kipup ijo eporoto loka lueraeete alosit kokuju kikito luka baka, kosodi konyet anyoun: naarai kapak kaŋipe kaŋin ŋes alomaria EJAKAIT kakonyenekon aidany ajore naka Ipilisitian.”
Kiswama Daudi kwaŋin, kwape ecorakinia EJAKAIT; kodany Ipilisitian anyoun koGeba kiton neidolio Geser.
Kotukonok bobo Daudi ituŋa kere luseuna luka Isirael, ilukumin akaisauni.
Konyou Daudi, kolot nepepe kituŋa kere luajaas kaŋes, anyoun koBaale-Yuda, ayaun kanen asaduku naka Edeke, naenyaritai Ekiror, ŋes ekiror loka EJAKAIT loka ajoresio loiboikin okerubin.
Kibwaikis asaduku naka Edeke agali nakitetet, kitolomut kotogo loka Abinadab loajai oukot: kireŋeata odwe luka Abinadab Usa ka Akio agali ŋin nakitetet.
Kitolomut kotogo loka Abinadab loajai oukot kasaduku naka Edeke: kiŋarenik Akio asaduku.
Koram Daudi ka ekek kere loka Isirael iponesio kere luka lueruos lueswamatai kakito, ka adeudeun, ka isabulin, ka isiman, ka ikacwi, ka aisinin nueruosi kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT.
Kinep anyunyura naka EJAKAIT aluikin Usa; kinom Edeke ŋes kanuka aibucareteke; kotwanik nen eiduny kasaduku naka Edeke.
Kokadak Daudi, naarai acil EJAKAIT Usa: komaik aibois ŋin Peres-Usa,
Kokurianar Daudi EJAKAIT kapaaran kaŋin; kotema atiar, “Ikonakini ai asaduku naka EJAKAIT ebuni mama ajai?”
Koŋer Daudi alemar asaduku naka EJAKAIT ayaun ore loka Daudi; konye kodaka Daudi ŋes awai togo loka Obed-edom Egitit.
Kosalak asaduku naka EJAKAIT togo loka Obed-edom Egitit ilapio iuni: kisirereŋ EJAKAIT Obed-edom ka eketogo kere.

Kolimokinai ekabaka Daudi ebe, “Esireren EJAKAIT etogo loka Obededom, ka lukejaatar kaŋes kere, kanuka asaduku naka Edeke.” Kolot Daudi koyau asaduku naka Edeke kotogo loka Obed-edom kitoloma ore loka Daudi kaiyalama.
Kojaun kwanata ebe, nakelosioto ŋul luadakete asaduku naka EJAKAIT ailameta akanykape, koinak emoŋ ka yenikasiepai.
Kikosi Daudi kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT kagogoŋuke kere; konap Daudi epod loka ebaputa.
Kwaŋin koyau Daudi ka ekek kere loka Isirael asaduku naka EJAKAIT, keibwoŋ, ka eporoto loka arupepe.
Kojaun kwanata ebe, kelom asaduku naka EJAKAIT ore loka Daudi, koŋolia Mikal akoku naka Saul kadirisa, koany ekabaka Daudi esomanari ikosie kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT; komwaŋ ŋes kotauke.
Kitolomut asaduku naka EJAKAIT, kibwaikis aiboisike, kidiŋ owema loebubukinit Daudi kanukeŋ: koinak Daudi ainakineta nuicweio ka ainakineta nuka ainapakin kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT.
Kedau Daudi ainakin ainakinet naicweio ka ainakineta nuka ainapakin, kilipak ituŋa arereŋ kokiror loka EJAKAIT loka ajoresio.
Kokorak ituŋa kere, ŋes ekodet kere loka Isirael, ikiliok ka aŋor da, ŋinituŋanan emugati ka aturosit naka akiriŋ, ka aluŋuret naka imusabibun luaokito. Kwaŋin koloto ituŋa kere ŋinituŋanan togoke.

Kotema Daudi Mikal atiar, “Ajai akonyen nuka EJAKAIT, lokaseuni eoŋ aitelekar papakon, ka ekekike kere, adakakin eoŋ araun ekapolon ayait ituŋa luka EJAKAIT, ayait Isirael, ŋes ekosioo eoŋ akonyen nuka EJAKAIT.
Ido eyatakini bobo araun lomam kayonitai, loasilior kakonyeneka; konye kayonete eoŋ akejaanakinak ŋun nuilimit ijo.”
Amamei Mikal akoku naka Saul ikoku kiton apaaran naatwania.
Kotema ekabaka enabi Natan ebe, “Koany, eboie eoŋ kotogo loka ikito luka eres, konye iboie asaduku naka Edeke kotoma aigalisio.”
Kotema Natan ekabaka atiar, “Kolot, kiswama kere nuejaas otaukon; naarai ejai EJAKAIT kajo.”
Kosodi kanen, kakuare kaŋin, kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ejai Natan ebe,
“Kolot kolimok Daudi ekakejaanakinan ebe, ‘Inera EJAKAIT kwanata ebe, Idukokini kereka ijo eoŋ etogo loeboieneno?
Naarai mam eoŋ eboikino togo ageun kapaaran naetolomunia idwe luka Isirael koMisiri, kiton lolo, konye alosenenei kowema, kowema lokalaunan da.
Kaiboisio kere nualosenen kidwe luka Isirael, abu eoŋ kener akirot kateker adiopet naka Isirael, nuecorakini aitanyam ikatuŋa Isirael ebe, “Kanukinyo mam yes kidukokiniata eoŋ etogo loka eres?” ’
Aso do kolimok Daudi ekakejaanakinan kwanata ebe, ‘Inera EJAKAIT loka ajoresio kwanata ebe, Abu kalem jo korony, katupit amerekekin, tetere iraun ekapolon ayait ikatuŋa, ayait Isirael.
Ajaenena kajo kama ilosenenei kere, amudia lukasurupokon kere kakonyenekon; etuluori jo ekiror lokapolon, kwape ekiror loka lukapolok kaluejaas kakwap.
Aseikini ikatuŋa Isirael aibois, eraikini kes, tetere iboiete aiboisikec, komam bobo itwobosete; komam bobo idwe luka aronis iticanete kes, kwape lem sek.
Kwape kapaaran naecorakinia eoŋ ikatubok ayait ikatuŋa Isirael; esiyenuni jo kama ejaas lukasurupokon kere, Bobo da kilimokini EJAKAIT jo ebe kisubakini EJAKAIT jo ekek.
Kedoloto apaarasiakon, ijotori kalukapapaakon, adakakini aurikon naetupakini, naelomuni kakoikikon, eticasi da ajakanutuke.
Ŋol ŋes edukokini ekakiror etogo, eticasi eoŋ eicoloŋ loka ajakanutuke ikar kere.
Araun eoŋ papake, ŋes da eraun okokuka; arai kiswama ŋesi numam adolit, alecori ŋes kebela loka ituŋa, ka ainomonom naka idwe luka ituŋa.
Konye mam akaitim enyouni kamake, kwape kalemaria kaneejai Saul, loabu kalema kakonyenekon.
Itogogoŋio ekekikon ka ajakanutukon ikar kere kakonyenekon: iticasio eicoloŋokon loka ajakanut ikar kere.’ ”
Kwape ejaatar akiro ŋun kere, kwape ejaar aitapoet ŋin kere, kolimok Natan Daudi kwaŋin.
Kerai ŋin da akirot naedit kakonyenekon, wu EJAKAIT Edeke; konye iner ijo da nuka ekek loka ekejaanakinanikon kokar luipu noi luepote; ŋin da kopone loka ituŋa, wu EJAKAIT Edeke!
Inyo bobo epedori Daudi alimokin jo? Naarai ijeni ekonikejaanakinan, wu EJAKAIT Edeke.
Iswama ijo apolou na kere, kanuka akonikirot, kwape ejaar ekonitau, aitejenun ekejaanakinanikon.
Ŋes ipoloor ijo, wu EJAKAIT Edeke: naarai emamei yeneputos kajo, emamei da Edeke ece dimarai ijo, kwape kejaatar kere nukipou keirasi kakosiki.

Ani bo ateker adio kakwap naeputos kikonituna, kes Isirael, luabu Edeke kolot alakun kanuke araun iketuŋa, adumakin ŋes ekiror, ka aswam nukos kanukus, kakiro nusogim kanuka akonikwap, kakonyen nuka ituŋakon luibu kolaku koMisiri kanukon, katekerin kodekesiokec da?
Ibu kiticat kanukon ikonituŋa Isirael araun ituŋakon ikar kere; ka jo da EJAKAIT, ibu koraun Edekekec.
Wu EJAKAIT Edeke akirot naibu kolim naka ekonikejaanakinan ka ekekike, kitogogoŋ ijo ŋes ikar kere, kiswama kwape kilimokinia.
Kitopolooroi ekonikiror ikar kere ebe, ‘EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ŋes Edeke loka Isirael’: iticasio ekek loka ekonikejaanakinan Daudi kakonyenekon.
Naarai ijo, wu EJAKAIT loka ajoresio, Edeke loka Isirael, ipukokinit ekonikejaanakinan ebe, ‘Adukokini jo ekek’: kanuka ŋun etitinior ekonikejaanakinan kotauke ailip ailipasit na mama ijai.
Wu EJAKAIT Edeke, irai ijo Edeke, akonikiro da eraas nukabeit, isumunik ekonikejaanakinan akirot ŋin naejok:
Aso do kitojok ijo aisirereŋ ekek loka ekonikejaanakinan, kiyatanakinenei kakonyenekon: naarai ijo, wu EJAKAIT Edeke, inera ŋun: kisirereŋ ekek loka ekejaanakinanikon karerenukon ikar kere.”
Kodany Moab, kitirian kaitemis, kiteperik kes kwap; kitirian ikokoron iarei aario, ido kitajar ekokoro ediopet, Koraut Imoabin ikejaanakinak luka Daudi, koyaut ainakineta.
Kolema Daudi kamake ikebwanenok elukumit ka akwat akanykaarei, ka lualosete kakeje ilukumin akaisaarei: kitwaŋal Daudi ibalasin kere luka agalin, konye kiŋadak kakes akwatat.
Kepotu Isurian luka Damasiko aisigalikin Kadadeser ekabaka loka Soba, kodany Daudi Isurian ilukumin akaisaarei ka luarei.
Kosodi Daudi aibwaikin atukon nuka iserikalen Suria loka Damasiko: koraut Isurian ikejaanakinak luka Daudi, koyaut ainakineta. Koinak EJAKAIT Daudi aipikor kama kelosenenei kere.
Koŋat Daudi ibukui luka esabu luajaas kikejaanakinak luka Kadadeser, koyau kes Yerusalem.
Koŋat Daudi aisinit naepol noi koBeta ka Berotai, ireria luka Kadadeser.
Kepupu Toi ekabaka loka Kamat ebe adany Daudi ajore kere naka Kadadeser.

Kosodi Toi aijukar Yoram okokuke mama ejai ekabaka Daudi ayogan ŋes, ailipakin ŋes arereŋ, naarai etijiit Kadadeser, adany da; naarai abu Kadadeser kitijiite Toi. Koina Yoram iboro luka epuesa ka iboro luka esabu, ka iboro luka aisinit.
Ŋul da abu Daudi kotiakak EJAKAIT, nepepe kepuesa ka esabu luatiakenenei luka atekerin kere nuepikori.
Luka Suria, ka luka Moab, ka luka idwe luka Amon, ka luka Ipilisitian, ka luka Amalek, ka luŋatuna luka Kadadeser, okoku loka Rekob, ekabaka loka Soba.
Kibwaik atukon nuka iserikalen Edom; kibwaik atukon nuka iserikalen anatar Edom kere, koraut Idomein ikejaanakinak luka Daudi. Koinak EJAKAIT Daudi aipikor kama kelosenenei kere.
Kirum Daudi Isirael kere; kitodolenenei Daudi itubesia ka nuetenito kotuŋake kere.
Kopolokinite Yoab okoku loka Seruia ajore; kerai Yekosapat okoku loka Akilud ekesiitonokinan:
Sadok okoku loka Akitub, ka Akimelek okoku loka Abiatar kes keraas isasedotin; kerai Seraia ekalani;
Kopolokinite Benaia okoku loka Yekoiada Ikeretin ka Ipeletin; keraas odwe luka Daudi isasedotin.
Kejai ekejaanakinan kotogo loka Saul ekekiror Siba, konyaraunai mama ejai Daudi; kotema ekabaka ŋes atiar, “Irai ijo Siba?” Kotema atiar, “Ŋes ekonikejaanakinan.”
Kotema ekabaka atiar, “Eriŋa ejai idio yenideuna yenikokek loka Saul, ketodik ŋes asianut naka Edeke?” Kotema Siba ekabaka atiar, “Ejai okoku loka Yonatan, Ioenwalito akejeke.”
Kotema ekabaka ŋes atiar, “Ai bo ejai ŋesi?” Kotema Siba ekabaka atiar, “Koany, ejai togo loka Makir okoku loka Amiel, koLo-debar.”
Kosodi ekabaka Daudi aijukar, koomai ŋes kotogo loka Makir okoku loka Amiel, koLo-debar.
Kobu Mepiboset, okoku loka Yonatan, okoku loka Saul, mama ejai Daudi, kibirokin ebuburia, kisuded. Kotema Daudi atiar, “Mepiboset,” Koboŋok ebe, “Koany ekejaanakinanikon!”
Kotema Daudi ŋes atiar, “Sirikuriana: naarai abeit ketodik eoŋ jo asianut kanuka Yonatan papakon, kenyakakini jo alup kere nuka Saul papaakon; inyamenenei ijo atap komesaka tiritir.”
Kisuded, kotema atiar, “Inyo bo ekonikejaanakinan, ijo asesen ekiŋok lokatwan kwape keoŋ?”

Ikorionokini ŋes alup, ijo ka odwekon, ka ikejaanakinakakon; iinununei iraan, tetere edumuni okoku loka ejakaitikon atap naenyami: konye enyamenenei Mepiboset okoku loka ejakaitikon atap komesaka duc.” Ajaas Siba odwe itomon ka lukany, ka ikejaanakinak akaisaarei.

Kosodi Siba atemar ekabaka atiar, “Kwape ejaatar kere nuecorakini ekajakait ekabaka ekejaanakinanike, iswamai ekejaanakinanikon kwaŋin.” Kobala ekabaka ebe, “Konye Mepiboset, enyamenenei ŋesi komesaka, kwape ediopet kodwe luka ekabaka.”
Kejai Mepiboset okoku losapat, ekekiror Mika. Kere lueboienenete kotogo loka Siba araas ikejaanakinak luka Mepiboset.
Kwaŋin kiboienenei Mepiboset ko Yerusalem; naarai konyamenenei duc komesa loka ekabaka; eŋwalito akejeke kere.

Kotema Daudi atiar, “Ketodikini Kaŋun okoku loka Nakas asianut, kwape ketodikinia papake eoŋ asianut.” Kwaŋin kijuka Daudi ikejaanakinakake aitalakar ŋes kanuka papake. Kopotu ikejaanakinak luka Daudi akwap naka idwe luka Amon.

Konye apotu ikapolok luka idwe luka Amon kotemasi Kaŋun ejakaitikec atiar, “Iwomit ijo ebe eyoŋit Daudi papakon, aijukakini jo lukitalakarete? Mam kereka Daudi kijukakinit jo ikekejaanakinak airere ere, ka airot ŋes, ka amudiar?”
Koyaŋa do Kaŋun ikejaanakinak luka Daudi, kobaren atutubet naka ipenekakec, kotuboto ikecenapen kokidiŋ, kiton oosikec, kotwara kes.
Kosodi kelimokin Daudi ŋun, kijuka airiamakin kakes; naarai eleicikinito noi ituŋa, Kotema ekabaka atiar, “Kopaikis Yeriko aitodol neecekuniata ipenekakus, kosodete konyet aboŋun.”
Kepupu Daudi, kijuka Yoab, ka ajore kere naka ituŋa lukirigin.
Kolomut idwe luka Amon, kiderakinos ejie korute: kejaas Isurian luka Soba, ka luka Rekob, ka ituŋa luka Tob ka Maaka, bonik korony.
Nakeanyunia Yoab ebe ejai ejie kiŋaren kokau da, koseu ituŋa kere luaseunitai koIsirael, kiderak kes aitiji Isurian:
Kititiŋ Abisai onaceke ituŋa ice kere, kiderak kes aitiji idwe luka Amon.
Kotema atiar, “Arai keetelekasi Isurian eoŋ, kosodi ijo aisigalikin eoŋ: konye arai kiitelekasi idwe luka Amon jo, kasodi eoŋ abunore aisigalikin jo.
Kotitiŋior, ketodiasi ekiliokone kanuka ituŋawok, ka ireria luka Edekewok: kiswama EJAKAIT nuitojokit ŋesi.”
Kikunyak do Yoab ka ituŋa lukejaas kaŋes aitiji Isurian: kokerata kakonyeneke.
Keanyut idwe luka Amon ebe akerata Isurian, kokerata kesi da kakonyen nuka Abisai, kolomasi ore. Kosodi Yoab aboŋun kama kidwe luka Amon kobu Yerusalem.
Keanyut Isurian ebe epikor kes kakonyen nuka Isirael, kotukonokinos.
Kijuka Kadadeser, kitolomut Isurian luajaas okekwa juwai kecor; kopotu Kelam, kiŋarenikinite kes Sobak ekapolon loka ajore naka Kadadeser.
Kolimokinai Daudi; kotukonok Isirael kere, kodok Yorodan kobu Kelam. Kiderakinos Isurian aitiji Daudi, kojioto kaŋes.
Kokerata Isurian kakonyen nuka Isirael; koara Daudi luka Isurian, ituŋa luka agalin akwat akanykaarei, ka ikebwanenok ilukumin akaisaoŋon, kinom Sobak ekapolon loka ajorekec, kotwanik nen.

Keanyutu ikabakan kere luaraas ikejaanakinak luka Kadadeser ebe epikor kes kakonyen nuka Isirael kitutukoto ka Isirael nukainapakin, kijaanakis kes. Kwaŋin kokuriakaros Isurian aisigalikin bobo idwe luka Amon.
Kijuka Daudi kiŋit nuka aberu. Kolimokinai ebe, “Mere ŋin Bat-seba, akoku naka Eliam, aberu naka Uria Ekitit?”
Kijuka Daudi ikiyakia, koyaŋa ŋes; kolom ŋin mama ejai ŋesi, kopero kaŋes; (naarai aponi kitesegaarai ŋin kanumam alauniteke;) koboŋo togoke.
Kopotuu aberu; kijuka alimokin Daudi, kotema atiar, “Kija eoŋ kakoik.”
Kijuka Daudi mama ejai Yoab ebe, “Kijukakinai eoŋ Uria Ekitit.” Kijuka Yoab Uria mama ejai Daudi.
Kedolu Uria neejai ŋesi, kiŋit Daudi ŋes kwape ajaar Yoab, ka ituŋa, ido kwape ajaar ejie.
Kotema Daudi Uria atiar, “Kolot togokon, kilota akonikeje.” Konyou Uria kotogo loka ekabaka, kotupitere ŋes akorakinet naka inyamat luainakini ekabaka ŋes.
Konye koper Uria okek loka etogo loka ekabaka nepepe kikejaanakinak kere luka ejakaitike, mam abu kolot togoke.
Kelimokin Daudi ebe, “Mam Uria abu kolot togoke.” Kotema Daudi Uria atiar, “Mam jo ibonunit kalosit? Inyo bo mam jo ilosio togokon?”

Kotema Uria Daudi atiar, “Iboie asaduku, ka Isirael, ka Yuda koswamin; idukurito ejakaitika Yoab, ka ikejaanakinak luka ejakaitika ais; alomari kereka eoŋ togoka ainyam, ka aimat, ka apero kaberuka? Kwape ijaria ijo, kwape eiariaekonitau da, mam eswamai kwaŋin.”
Kotema Daudi Uria atiar, “Kosalak ne lolo da, katwari jo moi.” Kwaŋin kiboi Uria koYerusalem apaaran ŋin ka apaaran nace da.
Kenyarau Daudi ŋes, konyam komat kakonyeneke; kitemer ŋes; koloma eboŋ aper aperitike nepepe kikejaanakinak luka ejakaitike, konye mam abu kolot togoke.
Kiwadikate ŋes toma obalua ebe, “Kibwaikis Uria kiŋaren neededeniar ejie, kosodete yesi ajalakin ŋes, tetere inomio, kotwana.”
Kosodi kanen, kirere Yoab ere, kibwaik ŋesi Uria aibois naajeni ŋesi ebe ajaas ituŋa luatitiŋ.
Kolomut ituŋa lukore, kojioto kaYoab: kibiroros ituŋa ice luka ikejaanakinak luka Daudi; kotwana da Uria Ekitit.
Kosodi Yoab aijukar alimokin Daudi akiro kere nuka ejie;
Kicor ekiyakia ebe, “Kidau ijo alimokin ekabaka akiro kere nuka ejie.
Arai enyunyura ekabaka, etemari ŋesi jo atiar, ‘Kanukinyo ilosioto yesi eiduny ka ere aitiji? Mam ipotu kojenut ebe epedorete kesi aigum yes ejaas arwatat?

Iŋai bo enomi Abimelek okoku loka Yerubeset? Mam aberu abu kocakak ŋes atapen karwatat tetere etwanikini Tebes? Kanukinyo ilosioto yesi eiduny karwatat?’ Ŋes konyet itemaria ebe, ‘Atwana da Uria Ekitit ekejaanakinanikon.’ ”
Kolot do ekiyakia, kobu kolimok Daudi kere nuejukaritor Yoab ŋes.
Kotema ekiyakia Daudi atiar, “Kitelekasi ituŋa sio, kolomakis sio kokiŋa ais, kajioto isio kakes kiton alomaret naka erute.
Kogumata ikagumak ikonikejaanakinak ejaas arwatat; kotwakata ice kokejaanakinak luka ekabaka, kotwana da Uria Ekitit ekonikejaanakinan.”

Kosodi Daudi atemar ekiyakia atiar, “Ilimokini do Yoab kwanata ebe, ‘Kinyek akirot ŋin aitakadikin jo, naarai ejwenyari ekileŋ yen ka ii da: kitogogoŋ ekonijie asurokin ere, kotiyaik da’: kisidik ijo ŋes.”
Kepupu aberu naka Uria ebe atwana Uria okilenike, kokuudian okilenike.
Kedaun asuban, kijuka Daudi koyaŋa ŋes togoke, koraun akeberu, kourik ŋes ikoku yenisapat. Konye kitakadik EJAKAIT akirot naeswamai Daudi.
