Ajaas ekabaran isipanin luipu noi luka aituk ka amerekekin:

Konye amamei lokican ibore, dimarai amerekek adiopet nakalol, naagweli ŋesi, kitan da: kopoloor nepepe kaŋes ka ikedwe; komorete kaŋes ikenyamat luikidioko, komasete kaikopoke, koperi katorobuke, kosubite bala erai akokuke.

Kobu ekaloton mama ejai ekabaran, mam abu koyaŋa yenikosipaninike luka aituk ka luka amerekekin apuikin ekaloton loabu kobu mamake, konye koyaŋa imerekek yenika lokican, kopuik etuŋanan loabu kobu mamakeŋ.”
Kinep noi anyunyura naka Daudi aluikin etuŋanan; kotema ŋesi Natan atiar, “Kwape ejaria EJAKAIT, etuŋanan loeswamai ŋun ibusakinit atwanare.
Egeli imerekek irwan aoŋon, naarai abu kiswama akirot ŋin, ido naarai mam abu kitim.”
Abu kainak jo etogo loka ejakaitikon, aŋor da nuka ejakaitikon katorobukon, kainak jo ekek loka Isirael ka loka Yuda; arai kiikadito ŋul, tikeyatakinit jo ice bobo.
Kanukinyo imwania akirot naka EJAKAIT, aswam nueroko kakonyeneke? Inom ijo Uria Ekitit kekileŋ, iyana aberuke araun akoniberu, iara ŋes kekileŋ loka idwe luka Amon.
Aso do mam enyouni ekileŋ kokekikon; naarai imwan ijo eoŋ, iyana aberu naka Uria Ekitit araun akoniberu.’
Inera EJAKAIT kwanata ebe, ‘Koany, etonyoikini jo aronis kotogokon, ayaŋaari aŋorokon kakonyenekon, ainakini kes mama ejai eidunyetekon, eperete ŋes kanorokon paaran kaitebeikin.
Naarai iswama ijo kaiyeiyea: konye eswamai eoŋ akirot nln kakonyen nuka Isirael kere paaran kaitebeikin.’ ”
Kotema Daudi Natan atiar, “Adiaka kama ejai EJAKAIT.” Kotema Natan Daudi atiar, “Alema da EJAKAIT adiakaretekon; mam jo itwani.
Konye naarai iinak lukasurupo luka EJAKAIT amoromor kanuka aswamisioit ŋin, abeit etwani ikoku yenikiwurikinitai jo.”
Kolot Natan togoke.
Kinom EJAKAIT ikoku yenaurikini aberu naka Uria Daudi, kodekakin noi.
Kanuka ŋun kiŋaiŋa Daudi Edeke kanuka ikoku: kikany Daudi eteŋei, koloma, koper kalup, akuare kia.
Konyout imakio lukotogoke, kobwaata kosiepike, aitonyoun ŋes kokwap: konye koŋer, mam da abu konyam atap kakes.

Kosodi kanen, kapaaran nakikanyetekaarei kotwana ikoku. Kokuriakata ikejaanakinak luka Daudi alimokin ŋes ebe atwana ikoku; naarai kobalas ebe, “Koany, naariŋar ikoku ejari, kinera oni kaŋes, mam abu kopup iporotoiwok: ikwaikini lolo ai ŋesi erieba, arai kilimokini ŋes ebe atwana ikoku?”
Konye keanyu Daudi ebe iyeiyeanakinos ikejaanakinakake, kojenik Daudi ebe atwana ikoku: kotema Daudi ikekejaanakinak atiar, “Atwana ikoku?” Kotemasi kesi atiar, “Atwana ŋesi.”
Kosodi Daudi anyoun kokwap, kiloŋ, kinyonyoik akinyet, kijul anapitoke; koloma togo loka EJAKAIT, koma: kosodi aboŋor togoke: kekotokin atap kibwaikis akonyeneke, konyam.
Kosodete ikekejaanakinak atemar ŋes atiar, “Anyoika nu nuiswama? Naariŋar ikoku ejari ikany ijo eteŋei komony kanuka ikoku; konye naatwania ikoku, inyou, inyam atap.”
Kotema atiar, “Naariŋar ikoku ejari, abu kekany eteŋei, kamony: naarai abala ebe, ‘Iŋai bo ejeni motoko esiana EJAKAIT mamaka, tetere ejari ikoku?’
Konye do atwana, kanukinyo ekanyia bobo eteŋei? Apedori ainyakun ŋes bobo? Alosi eoŋ rwaru mamake, konye mam ŋes eboŋuni mamakaŋ.”
Kijuka akirot konabi Natan, komaik ekekiror Yedidia,
Kijuka Yoab ikiyakia mama ejai Daudi kotema atiar, “Etiji Raba, eebo, ayaŋa eoŋ ere loka akipi.
Aso do kotukok ituŋa ice luesalito, kidukur asurokin ere, koyaŋa ŋes: kenyek eoŋ ayaŋaar ere, komaikinai ekakiror.”
Kotukonok Daudi ituŋa kere, kolot Raba kitiji, kirum.
Kolem ŋesi aboko naka ekabakakec kakouke; alaŋiruke atalat naka esabu, kejaas amor nuka akais nuipu tomake: kitanapikinai akou naka Daudi. Kitolom luŋatuna luka ere luipu noi.

Kitolom da ituŋa lukejaas nen, kibwaik kes kwap kimusemenin, kwap kasua nuboket, kwap kaepei nuka asua, kitotor kes neecweere amatapalin: kiswamak ireria kere luka idwe luka Amon kwaŋin, Koboŋo Daudi ka ituŋa kere Yerusalem.
Kokadak Aminon kwaŋin abu kodekakin kanuka inacike Tamar; naarai arai ŋesi abekot; kotionik Aminon aiswamakin ŋes akirot.
Konye ajai Aminon epaperoke, ekekiror Yonadab, okoku loka Simea onace loka Daudi: kopiriana Yonadab noi.
Kotema ŋes atiar, “Wu okoku loka ekabaka, kanukinyo isenyitor ijo ŋinipaaran? Mam jo ilimokini eoŋ?” Kotema Aminon ŋes atiar, “Amina eoŋ Tamar, inaci naka onaceka Abisalom.”

Kotema Yonadab ŋes atiar, “Koper kaperitikon, kijoseik bala ideka: kebu papakon aanyun jo kotema ŋes atiar, ‘Keŋaiŋait, kisiik inacika Tamar abunore, kainak eoŋ atap kanyam, kitemok inyamat kakonyeneka, tetere aanyuni, kanyam kakanike.’ ”
Koper do Aminon kijoseik bala edek: kebu ekabaka aanyun ŋes, kotema Aminon ekabaka atiar, “Keŋaiŋait, kisiik Tamar inacika abunore, aipoikin eoŋ imugatin iarei kakonyeneka, tetere anyami kakanike.”
Kosodi Daudi aijukar ore neejai Tamar ebe, “Kolot togo loka onacekon Aminon, kipoik ŋes inyamat.”
Kwaŋin kolot Tamar togo loka onaceke Aminon; koper ŋesi, Kotem aluŋuren kinyon, kiswama imugatin kakonyeneke, kope imugatin.
Kolem aiwowas kobukok kes akonyeneke; konye koŋer ŋesi ainyam. Kotema Aminon atiar, “Kolomasi ituŋa kere kiŋa.” Koloma ŋinituŋanan kaneejai.
Kotema Aminon Tamar atiar, “Koyau inyamat agola, tetere anyami kakanikon.” Koyaŋa Tamar imugatin luabu ŋesi kopeite, koyau kes agola neajai Aminon onaceke.
Naesukunyunia kes mama ejai ainyam, kikam ŋes, kotema atiar, “Bia kaperoto keoŋ, inacika.”
Koboŋok ŋesi ebe, “Mam, onaceka, sirikiitinaik eoŋ; naarai mam akirot ŋin ibus aswam koIsirael: sirikiswama nuka abaŋaanut ŋun.
Eoŋ da, aibo ayaŋaari ileicika? Ijo da, iraun kwape ediopet kalubaniok koIsirael. Aso, keŋaiŋait, kilip ekabaka; naarai mam ŋes eneri aikor eoŋ mamakon.”
Konye koŋer ŋesi apupun ekeporoto: konye kanuagogonor, kitiŋaik ŋes, kiteper ŋes.
Kosodi Aminon aila ŋes kaila kanaepol noi; naarai aila naalait ŋesi kodeparite amin naabu komina ŋes, Kotema Aminon ŋes atiar, “Konyou, kolot.”
Kotema ŋin ŋes ebe, “Mere kwaŋin, naarai aronis na naepol aireŋear eoŋ erono noi adeparit ŋin naibu kiswamak eoŋ.” Konye koŋer apupun ŋes.
Kosodi aiworoun ekekejaanakinan loejaanakini ŋes, kotema atiar, “Kitoloma aberu na kaneajai, koenik ekek kokauke.”
Anapit ŋin anapito naka ejese loegelegela: naarai atapitos adwe nuka ekabaka nuaraas abekon anapit inapen luka epone kaŋol. Kosodi ekekejaanakinan aitolomun ŋes kiŋa, koenik ekek kokauke.
Kipurak Tamar ekurwon akouke, kocilicil akenapito naka ejese kaloegelegela naanapit ŋesi: kibwok akanike, kolot, kiluluei elosi.
Kobala Abisalom onaceke ŋes atiar, “Ajai Aminon onacekon kajo? Konye do kililiŋ inacika: ŋes onacekon; sirikibwaik akirot na otau.” Kosalak Tamar esilikinit kotogo loka onaceke Abisalom.
Konye nakepupu ekabaka Daudi akiro ŋun kere, konyunyurikin noi.
Mam Abisalom abu kiner nuejok karaida nueroko mama ejai Aminon: naarai alait Abisalom Aminon, naarai abu kitiŋaik inacike Tamar.
Kobu Abisalom mama ejai ekabaka, kotema atiar, “Koany, ejaas ekejaanakinanikon ikarubok ajul nuka amerekekin; keŋaiŋait, kouparos ekabaka kikejaanakinakake ka ekejaanakinanikon.”
Kotema ekabaka Abisalom atiar, “Mam, okokuka, mam kilosi kere, kenyeis alaŋirikin jo.” Kimaima noi: konye koŋer alosit, konye kilipak ŋes arereŋ.
Kosodi Abisalom atemar atiar, “Keŋaiŋait, arai mam, kisiik onaceka Aminon alosit kasio.” Kotema ekabaka ŋes atiar, “Kanukinyo elosio ŋesi kajo?”
Konye kimaima Abisalom noi, kisiik Aminon ka odwe kere luka ekabaka alosit kaŋes.
Kicorak Abisalom ikekejaanakinak ebe, “Aso kocoito naelakaror etau loka Aminon kanuka ebino; ido nakalimokinia yes ebe, ‘Kinomata Aminon,’ koara ŋes, sirikikuriakaros.”
Kiswamakis ikejaanakinak luka Abisalom Aminon kwape kicorakinia Abisalom. Kosodete odwe kere luka ekabaka anyoun, kibwanen ŋolituŋanan enyubuke, kokerata.
Kosodi kanen, napelosete, kobu eemut mama ejai Daudi ebe, “Aar Abisalom odwe kere luka ekabaka, mam ediopet kakesi ideuna.”
Kosodi ekabaka anyoun, kocilicil akenapito koper kokwap; kobwaata ikekejaanakinak kere kocilieilito inapenekec.

Koboŋok Yonadab, okoku loka Simea onace loka Daudi ebe, “Kinyek ejakaitika aomit ebe aarata ikatumunak kere odwe luka ekabaka; naarai Aminon bon etwanit; naarai apeleikinit Abisalom ŋin ameun kapaaran kaya naetinaikinia ŋesi inacike Tamar.
Aso do kinyek ejakaitika ekabaka aibwaikin akirot ŋin otauke, aomit ebe atwakata odwe kere luka ekabaka: naarai Aminon bon etwanit.”
Konye koker Abisalom. Abu ekatumunan loabeit aidar kiteluo akekonyen kosesen, ido koany, eponito ituŋa luipu korot lokosiep loka eukot kokauke.
Kotema Yonadab ekabaka atiar, “Koany, eponito odwe luka ekabaka: kwape abalar ekejaanakinanikon, ikote nepenen.”
Kosodi kanen, kedau ŋesi einer, koany, eponito odwe luka ekabaka, kodelosi, komonyata: komony ekabaka da noi ka ikekejaanakinak kere.
Koker Abisalom, kolot Gesur, kiboi kanen ikar iuni.
Kimuite etau loka ekabaka Daudi alosit mama ejai Abisalom: naarai epudunio kanuka Aminon, naarai atwana.
Kojen Yoab okoku loka Seruia ebe imuit etau loka ekabaka Abisalom.

Kijuka Yoab Tekoa, koomai kaŋina aberu naaeo, kotema ŋes atiar, “Keŋaiŋait, kijoseik bala irai naibworo, konap anapito naka aibworo, keŋaiŋait, sirikinyonyoik akinyet, konye koraun kwape aberu naedaunit apak naepol ibworo yenikatwan;
Koloma mama ejai ekabaka, kiner kaŋes kopone kalo.” Kolimok Yoab ŋes nuenera.
Kotema ekabaka ŋes atiar, “Inyo bo itururwoo ijo?” Koboŋok ebe, “Abeit arai eoŋ apuserut, atwana okilenika.
Ajaas akejaanakinanikon odwe iarei, kojioto kesi kais, komamei yenadieki kes, konye kinom ediopet loce, koar ŋes.

Ido koany, anyoiki ekek kere aluikin akejaanakinanikon, kobalas ebe, ‘Kijaik ŋol loenomi onaceke, tetere kiari ŋes kanuka aijar naka onaceke loaari ŋesi,’ komudiasi ekeruman da: kwaŋin kitudenoto atotoleteka naedeuna, komam ideikinete okilenika ekiror karaida yenedeuna kakwap.”
Kotema ekabaka aberu atiar, “Kolot togokon, ecorakini eoŋ nukon.”
Kotema aberu naka Tekoa ekabaka atiar, “Ejakaitika, wu ekabaka, kabeikis eoŋ ka ekek loka papaka numam adolit: komameun ekabaka ka eicoloŋoke akirot.”
Kotema ekabaka atiar, “Ŋol lokilimokini jo akirot kere, koyau ŋes mama ajai, komam bobo ŋes kitirori jo.”

Kosodi ŋin atemar atiar, “Keŋaiŋait, kiitu ekabaka EJAKAIT Ekonideke, kinye ekenyaŋan aokot amudiar bobo, kinyeis amudiar okokuka.” Kotema atiar, “Kwape ejaria EJAKAIT, mam edouni kwap etimat ediopet loka okokukon.”
Kosodi aberu atemar atiar, “Keŋaiŋait, kisiik akejaanakinanikon einer akirot mama ejai ejakaitika ekabaka.” Kotema atiar, “Kolim.”

Kotema aberu atiar, “Kanukinyo inerunia akirot ŋin aluikin ituŋa luka Edeke? Naarai kanuka einer akirot ŋin esubit ekabaka bala loegwaunit akirot, naarai mam ekabaka itobonunit ore lokeŋ loerenearitai.
Naarai kibusakinit atwanare, kisubit bala akipi nuebukoros kwap numam epedorete bobo atukonokin; mam Edeke da elemari aijar, konye eomoomoi eipone, kinyek ekakeran araun loerenearitai cut kamakeŋ.
Aso do abu eoŋ einer akirot na mama ejai ekajakait ekabaka, naarai ketukurianata ituŋa eoŋ; abala akejaanakinanikon ebe, ‘Enera kwana kekabaka; motoko itodoli ekabaka nuelipit akejaanakinanike.
Naarai epupuni ekabaka, ayuun akejaanakinanike kakan naka etuŋanan loekoto amudiar eoŋ ka okokuka anyoun kairumet naka Edeke.’

Kosodi akejaanakinanikon atemar atiar, ‘Keŋaiŋait, koraun akirot naka ejakaitika ekabaka naelakara’: naarai esubit ejakaitika ekabaka bala emalaika loka Edeke, apupun nuejok ka nueroko: kojai EJAKAIT Ekonideke kajo.”
Kosodi ekabaka aboŋokin aberu ebe, “Keŋaiŋait sirikimunonik naakoto aiŋit jo.” Kotema aberu atiar, “Kiner ekajakait ekabaka.”

Kotema ekabaka atiar, “Ejai akan naka Yoab kajo kakiro nu kere?” Koboŋok aberu atiar, “Kwape ejaria ekonitau, ejakaitika ekabaka, emamei yenepedori aibelokin teten arai kediany kaŋun kere nuener ejakaitika ekabaka: naarai ekejaanakinanikon Yoab ŋes abu kecorak eoŋ, abu ŋesi kalimok akiro ŋun kere nuener akejaanakinanikon:
Abu Yoab ekejaanakinanikon kiswama akirot ŋin aijulakin akirot: eco ejakaitika, kwape ejaar acoa naka emalaika loka Edeke, aijen akiro kere nuejaas kakwap.”
Kotema ekabaka Yoab atiar, “Koany, eswama eoŋ ŋun: aso kolot, kinyak esapat Abisalom.”

Kibirokin Yoab kwap ebuburia, kisuded, kilipak ekabaka arereŋ: kotema Yoab atiar, “Ejeni lolo ekejaanakinanikon ebe adum eoŋ asianut kakonyenekon, ekajakait, wu ekabaka, naarai etodol ekabaka nuelipit ekejaanakinanike.”
Konyou Yoab kolot Gesur, koyau Abisalom Yerusalem.
Kotema ekabaka atiar, “Kopaa ŋesi togoke, konye kinyek aanyun akonyeneka.” Kopaa Abisalom togoke, komam eanyunit akonyen nuka ekabaka.

Nakebarenio ŋesi akouke, (abu kobarenenei kanetakinet naka ŋolikaru: naarai alanirikinito ŋes itimake, ŋes abarenenio:) kitem alaŋiru naka itima luka akouke isekelin akwat aarei kwape ejaar emisani loka ekabaka.
Aponi kourikinai Abisalom idwe iuni lusap ka ikoku idiopet yenipese, ekekiror Tamar: arai ŋin aberu naetemelel.
Kiboie Abisalom koYerusalem ikar iarei, mam abu koany akonyen nuka ekabaka.
Kosodi Abisalom anyaraun Yoab aijukar ŋes mama ejai ekabaka; konye koŋer abunore mama ejai: konyarau ŋes bobo nakiareit, konye koŋer Yoab abunore.

Kanuka ŋun kotema ŋesi ikekejaanakinak atiar, “Koany, emanikor loka Yoab idunyas kalokan, ejaas ŋes kesairi kaŋina: koloto kicweikis kakim.” Kosodete ikejaanakinak luka Abisalom aicweikin emanikor kakim.
Kosodi Yoab anyoun, kobu mama ejai Abisalom togoke, kotema ŋes atiar, “Kanukinyo eeweikiniata ikonikejaanakinak emanikorika kakim?”

Koboŋok Abisalom ebe, “Koany, abu kanyarau jo ebe, ‘Kobia, keyakia jo mama ejai ekabaka aiŋit ŋes ebe, “Kanukinyo abunio eoŋ koGesur? Tiejok kamakaŋ karai karina eoŋ ajai ŋina.” Aso do kisiikinai eoŋ kaany akonyen nuka ekabaka; arai ejaas numam adolit kotomakaŋ, kaar ŋesi eoŋ.’ ”
Kobu Yoab mama ejai ekabaka, kolimok ŋes: kedau anyaraun Abisalom, kobu ŋesi mama ejai ekabaka kokukum kokwap kakonyen nuka ekabaka: konu ekabaka Abisalom.

Kodilonokini Abisalom anyoun, kobwoenenei kawai naka erute: kosodi do arai ejai etuŋanan nuewosai nutikibusakinit ayaŋaar mama ejai ekabaka atubokinio, iworouni Abisalom ŋes, kotema atiar, “Lokore kali bo ijo?” Kotema atiar, “Erai ekejaanakinanikon loka adiopet katekerin nuka Isirael.”
Kotema Abisalom ŋes atiar, “Koany, ejok akonikiro edolitos da; konye emamei etuŋanan loadakaki ekabaka akiirar jo.”
Bobo da kotema Abisalom atiar, “Arai karai eoŋ ekatubon kakwap, tetere ebuni ŋolituŋanan loewosai arai loejai akirot mamakaŋ, tiatubokini ŋes kotenan!”
Kosodi arai kikunyaki ituŋanan aisuded kakonyeneke, korio ŋesi akanike, kikam ŋes, konu.
Kiswamak Abisalom kwaŋin luka Isirael kere luaponenenete mama ejai ekabaka atubokinio: kwaŋin kiŋala Abisalom itauon luka ituŋa luka Isirael.
Naarai kiyapo ekejaanakinanikon aiyaposit naajaar Gesur koSuria ebe, ‘Arai keenyaka EJAKAIT eoŋ bobo Yerusalem, kasodi aijaanakin EJAKAIT.’ ”
Kotema ekabaka ŋes atiar, “Kolot inapakina.” Konyou ŋesi, kolot Keburon.
Konye kijuka Abisalom ikarotak anatar atekerin kere nuka Isirael ebe, “Naiirariata eporoto loka arupepe, itemarete ebe, ‘Abisalom ŋes ekabaka koKeburon.’ ”
Koloto ituŋa akwat aarei nepepe ka Abisalom anyoun koYerusalem, luanyaritai, lualosete kitenara itauonokec; komam ejenete idiobore.
Naainakinia Abisalom asuban, abu konyarau Akitopel Egilonit, ekapetan akiro nuka Daudi, anyoun koreke, ŋes Gilo. Kogogoŋ aitemokinet nakaiyeiyea; naarai kiyatanakinos ituŋa duc mama ejai Abisalom.
Kobu ekiyakia mama ejai Daudi, kobala ebe, “Atupasi itauon luka ituŋa luka Isirael Abisalom.”

Kotema Daudi ikejaanakinakake kere luajaas kaŋes koYerusalem atiar, “Konyoutu, kakera; arai mam kikeri emamei idiopet kaoni yenekui kaneejai Abisalom: kisunyito alosit, kinyek adolokin oni atipet, kayaun aronis, ka aidany lukore kakwanis naka ekileŋ.”
Kotemasi ikejaanakinak luka ekabaka atiar, “Koany, itemonokino ikonikejaanakinak aswam kere nueseuni ejakaitika ekabaka.”
Koloma ekabaka, kotupito lukokaleke kere. Kinyek ekabaka aŋor atomon nuaraas abusian aidar etogo.
Koloma ekabaka, kotupito ituŋa kere; kobwout koBet-merak.
Kotubonoros ikekejaanakinak kere kamakeŋ; Ikeretin kere, Ipeletin kere, ka Igitin kere, ituŋa akwat akanykape luatupito ŋes anyoun koGat, apotu kesi kotubonoros kakonyen nuka ekabaka.
Naarai napebian ibuni ijo, tikesirimi lolo jo kasio, naarai alosi neapedori? Koboŋo ijo, kinyaka da ikoniinacan; kojaenena aitim ka abeit kajo,”

Koboŋok Itai ekabaka atiar, “Kwape ejaria EJAKAIT, kwape ejaria da ekajakait ekabaka, abeit kaibois neejai ekajakait ekabaka, arai kanuka atwanare arai kanuka aijar, nepenen da ejaenena ekonikejaanakinan.”
Kotema Daudi Itai atiar, “Kolot, kotubor.” Kotubor Itai Bgitit, ka ituŋake kere, ka ludidik kere luajaas kaŋes.
Komonya lukakwap kere keporoto kaloepol, kotubonoros ituŋa kere: kotubor ekabaka da kaguurut Kiduron, kotuboros ituŋa kere, kobeata erot loka amodiŋ.
Kotema ekabaka Sadok atiar, “Kinyaka asaduku naka Edeke ore: arai kadum asianut kakonye nuka EJAKAIT, kenyakuni ŋesi eoŋ bobo, ketodikini ŋesi eoŋ asaduku ka aiboisike da.
Konye arai kiner ŋesi kwanata ebe, ‘Mam eoŋ kesiyalamikinit jo’; koany, eoŋ lo, keswamak ŋesi eoŋ kwape itojokitor.”
Kotema da ekabaka Sadok esasedoti atiar, “Mere jo ekadwaran? Koboŋo ore inapakina, ijo ka Abiatar, ka odwekus iarei kayes, Akimaas okokukon, ka Yonatan okoku loka Abiatar.
Koany, edareuni kaneedokarere amodiŋ, aitodol naijukunia ijo aitejenun eoŋ akiro.”
Aso kodakasi bobo Sadok ka Abiatar asaduku naka Edeke kinyakasi Yerusalem: kiboioto kaŋina.
Kolimokinai Daudi ebe, “Ejai Akitopel toma iketemonokinok lukaiyeiyea ka Abisalom.” Kotema Daudi atiar, “Wu EJAKAIT, keŋaiŋait, kibelok ainerun naka Akitopel araun abaŋaanut.”
Kotema Daudi ŋes atiar, “Arai kiupa keoŋ, iraun ijo lokilanirikini eoŋ:

Konye arai kibono ijo ore, ilimokini Abisalom ebe, ‘Araun eoŋ ekonikejaanakinan, wu ekabaka; kwape kolo karaar ekejaanakinan loka papakon, kwana da araun ekonikejaanakinan’: ŋes konyet itapalaunia ainerun naka Akitopel kanukaŋ.
Mam kereka ijaas kaSadok ka Abiatar isasedotin kaŋina? Aso do, akiro kere nuipupuni kotogo loka ekabaka ilimokini Sadok ka Abiatar isasedotin.
Koany, ejaas kes ŋina kodwekec iarei, Akimaas okoku loka Sadok, ka Yonatan okoku loka Abiatar; iyakuunete kes kakiro kere nuipupunete.”
Aso koloma Kusai opapero loka Daudi ore; koloma Abisalom da Yerusalem.

Kotema ekabaka Siba atiar, “Inyoin bo apolou kaŋul?” Koboŋok Siba ebe, “Eraas asigiria nuibwanenete lukokalloka ekabaka; ka imugatin ka araito nuka aiporo luenyamete ikatumunak; ka ebino, loemasete luiiloro kamodiŋ.”
Kotema ekabaka atiar, “Ali bo okoku loka ejakaitikon?” Kotema Siba ekabaka atiar, “Koany, iboie ŋesi koYerusalem: naarai ebala ebe, ‘Kenyakakini lolo eoŋ ekek loka Isirael ajakanut naka papaka.’ ”
Kosodi ekabaka atemar Siba atiar, “Koany, kere luejaas ka Mepiboset eraas lukon.” Kotema Siba atiar, “Wu okwe! Eyalama kadumununei asianut kakonyenekon, ekajakait, wu ekabaka.”
Kibiribir ŋesi Daudi kamor, ka ikejaanakinak kere luka ekabaka Daudi; kojaas da ituŋa kere ka ikiliok lukagogoŋ kakanike nakoteten ka nakokediany.
Kiner Simei kwana ilami ebe, “Irwa, irwa, ijo etuŋanan loka aokot, etuŋanan da loka Belial:

Enyaku EJAKAIT mamakon aokot kere nuka ekek loka Saulloirumi ijo aiboisike: ejaik EJAKAIT ajakanut akan naka Abisalom okokukon: ido koany, ilokok ijo kameneranutukon, naarai irai ijo etuŋanan loka aokot.”

Kotema ekabaka atiar, “Inyoin bo kimariai eoŋ kayes, yes odwe luka Seruia? Naarai elami, ido naarai abu EJAKAIT kolimok ŋes ebe, ‘Kilam Daudi’; Iŋai bo do etemari ebe, ‘Kanukinyo kiswamaa ijo kwaŋin?’ ”

Kotema Daudi Abisai ka ikekejaanakinak kere atiar, “Koany, emoi okokuka loalomuni kakuanaka akaijar: mam kereka epedori Ebenyamit lo adepar? Kinyeis ŋes, kisiikis ŋes eilam; naarai ecoraki EJAKAIT ŋes.
Motoko kosesen EJAKAIT aronis nakeswamakinitai eoŋ, ido katacakini EJAKAIT eoŋ ajokis itia eilamane lo loka lolo.”
Kosodokis Daudi ka iketuŋa alosit: kitor Simei moru kitiirianikina kaŋes, kilami elosi, kibiribiriei ŋes kamor, kituanakini apua.
Kopotu ekabaka ka ituŋa kere luajaas kaŋes epasito; kikwar kaŋina.
Kobu Abisalom, ka ituŋa kere ikiliok luka Isirael Yerusalem, ka Akitopel da kaŋes.
Kosodi kanen, kedol Kusai Earikit opapero loka Daudi mama ejai Abisalom, kotema Kusai Abisalom atiar, “Kidar Edeke ekabaka, kidar Edeke ekabaka.”
Kotema Abisalom Kusai atiar, “Erai na asianutukon mama ejai opaperokon? Kanukinyo mam jo iuparotor kopaperokon?”
Kotema Kusai Abisalom atiar, “Mam; konye loaseu EJAKAIT ka ituŋa lu, ka ikiliok kere luka Isirael, araun eoŋ lokeŋ, eboie eoŋ kaŋes.
Bobo da, tikejaanak eoŋ iŋai? Mam kereka tikejaanak kakonyen nuka okokuke? Kwape kejaanakinia kakonyen nuka papakon, kwaŋin ajaenena kakonyenekon.”
Kotema Akitopel Abisalom atiar, “Koloma mama ejaas abusian nuka papakon, nuetasali ŋesi aidar etogo; eirari Isirael kere ebe kila papakon jo: kosodete egogoŋioros akanin nuka ŋul kere luejaas kajo.”
Kosodete kopesikis Abisalom ewema kuju togo; koloma Abisalom mama ejaas abusian nuka papake kakonyen nuka Isirael kere.
Kosubito aomisio nuka Akitopel nualimununei ŋesi kapaarasia kaŋun bala naenisia ituŋanan akirot mama ejai Edeke: ekonenenete nen aomisio kere nuka Akitopel mama ejai Daudi ka Abisalom da.
Bobo da kotema Akitopel Abisalom atiar, “Kisiikinai kaseu ituŋa ilukumin itomon kaluarei, anyouni eoŋ arukitori Daudi akuare na:
Adolokini ŋes kepas, kitegito da akaninike, etukuriani ŋes: ekerete do ituŋa kere luejaas kaŋes; kenomi do ekabaka bon:
Enyakuni ituŋa kere mamakon: kwape ebonunia aberu ore mama ejai okilenike. Imoot ijo aijar naka ediopetuŋanan bon: inapakinos do ituŋa kere.”
Kitojok noi Abisalom akirot ŋin, ka imakio kere luka Isirael.
Kosodi Abisalom atemar atiar, “Konyarakinai cani Kusai Earikit, kapuputu nuenera ŋesi da.”
Kebu Kusai mama ejai Abisalom, kotema Abisalom ŋes atiar, “Ener Akitopel kwaŋin: kiswamai kereka kwape eneria ŋesi? Arai mere kwaŋin, kiner ijo.”
Kotema Kusai Abisalom atiar, “Akiro nuener Akitopel apak kana mam ejokuka.”
Bobo da kotema Kusai atiar, “Ijeni ijo papakon ka ituŋake, ebe eraas lukagogoŋok, enyunyurasi kotauonokec, kwape adubu naedemaritai ludidikike kais: erai papakon ekajiot, mam eperete kituŋa.
Koany, eŋopit ŋesi kwape kwana kaipany, arai kaibois ace: kosodi kanen, naegeuniata ice kakesi aibiror, ŋin yenepupi ŋun etemari ebe, ‘Ejai earit otuŋa luetupito Abisalom.’
Ŋol da loetitiŋ, loesubit etauke bala etau loka eŋatuny, ipirisiar piris; naarai ejeni Isirael kere ebe egogoŋ papakon, ka ŋul da luejaas kaŋes eraas ituŋa lukatitiniok.
Konye eoŋ kabala jo ebe kotukokin Isirael kere mama ijai, anyoun koDan kiton Beerseba, kwape asine naejai kariri naka aŋolol kaipues: kolot ijo da elopet ojie.
Kwaŋin kidolokini oni ŋes kaibois neetakanunia, kidoikini ŋes kwape edoioto akopyo kwap: mam kinyeini kaŋes ka ituŋa kere luejaas kaŋes karaida idiopet.
Bobo da, arai keloma ore, ŋes konyet eyauniata Isirael kere aunoi ore ŋol, kiriari ŋes ocor, aitodol naemameunia alicait adiopet kaŋina.”

Kotema Abisalom ka ituŋa kere luka Isirael atiar, “Ainerun naka Kusai Earikit eteleka ainerun naka Akitopel.” Naarai etemoki EJAKAIT aitapalun ainerun naejok naka Akitopel, tetere eyauni EJAKAIT aronis mama ejai Abisalom.
Kosodi Kusai atemar Sadok ka Abiatar isasedotin atiar, “Kotema Akitopel kwana kwana mama ejai Abisalom ka imakio luka Isirael: kasodi eoŋ da atemar kwana kwana.
Aso do kijuka atipet, kolimokis Daudi ebe, ‘Sirikiper kakuare kana kaneedokarere amodiŋ, konye kotuboros cut; kinyek ekabaka ailikorio, ka ituŋa kere luejaas kaŋes.’ ”
Kiboioto Yonatan ka Akimaas En-rogel; kolosenenei akejaanakinan alimonokin kes; koloto kesi kolimokis ekabaka Daudi: naarai mam akotos ituŋa aanyun kes elomarete ore.
Konye koany esapat kes, kolimok Abisalom: kiwonyasi kesi kere iarei, kopotu Bakurim togo loka etuŋanan lokejai atan alaroke; kijesaros toma.
Kolem aberu arapetait kopesik da aituk naka atan, koloik akima nuieomom kujuke; mam akirot abu kojenun.

Kopotu ikejaanakinak luka Abisalom mama ejai aberu togo; kotemasi atiar, “Alu bo Akimaas ka Yonatan?” Kotema aberu kes atiar, “Atuboros kaguurut naka akipi.” Kemoata kes, mam apotu kodumutu, koboŋosi Yerusalem.
Kosodi kanen, kedaut alosit, kodokut kesi katan, koloto kolimokis ekabaka Daudi; kotemasi kesi Daudi atiar, “Konyoutu, kiwonyasi kotuboros kakipi: naarai eneru Akitopel kwana aluikin yes.”
Kosodi Daudi anyoun, ka ituŋa kere luajaas kaŋes, kotuboros koYorodan: kiwala akwap emamei ediopet kakesi loabu kokurwok atubor Yorodan.
Kodakak Abisalom Amasa ayait ajore aibois naka Yoab. Kerai Amasa okoku loka etuŋanan, ekekiror Itira loka Isirael, loalomari mama ejai Abigail akoku naka Nakas, inac naka Seruia totoke ka Yoab.
Kidukuroto Isirael ka Abisalom akwap naka Gilead.
Koyaut iitadan, ka abesenin, ka amoti nuka elupe, ka akima, ka esairi, ka akiria, ka imumwa luikaworitai, ka imare, ka epone ece loegelara loka alos, ka ekirididi loikaworitai.
Ka esik, ka akinyet, ka amerekekin, ka ikamoŋon luka akile lucokito luka aituk, tetere enyamete Daudi ka ituŋa luajaas kaŋes, naarai abalas ebe, “Eriebi eteŋei ituŋa, ilworuna ejakit akur kamodiŋ.”
Kimar Daudi ituŋa lukejaas kaŋes, kodakanak ijaka luka ilukumin ka ijaka luka akwat.

Kijuka Daudi ituŋa korioŋeta iuni, ediopet akan naka Yoab, ediopet akan naka Abisai okoku loka Seruia, onace loka Yoab, ka ediopet da akan naka Itai Egitit. Kobala ekabaka ituŋa ebe, “Eoŋ da elopet kiupar kayes ojie.”

Konye kobalas ituŋa ebe, “Mam jo ilosi: naarai kiiker isio mam kipodoi: karaida ketwana atutubetekosi, mam kipodoi: konye jo iriakas kasio ilukumin itomon: aso tiejok jo asalakin ore ikapakina ayuun sio.”
Kotema ekabaka kes atiar, “Nuitojokata yesi, kes eswamai eoŋ da.” Kobwo ekabaka kawai kerute, kolomete ituŋa kere kakwat ka ilukumin.
Kicorak ekabaka Yoab ka Abisai ka Itai kinera atiar, “Kiyamuyamut etelepat kanukaŋ, ŋes Abisalom.” Kiirasi ituŋa kere naecorakinia ekabaka ijaka kere akiro nuka Abisalom.
Kipikoroi kaŋina ituŋa luka Isirael kakonyen nuka ikejaanakinak luka Daudi, kojau aario naepol kapaaran kaŋin naka ituŋa ilukumin akwat aarei.
Naarai kaŋina abu ejie kisiarakin akwap kere: koar amagoro ituŋa luipu kapaaran kaŋin aitelekarit lukeari ekileŋ.
Kojai etuŋanan lokeanyuni, kolimok Yoab kinera atiar, “Koany, abu kaany Abisalom iiekokino okum.”
Kotema Yoab etuŋanan lokelimokini atiar, “Koany, ibu ijo koany, kanukinyo kigirio aibirun ŋes kwap? Eoŋ da tikainak jo atutubeta atomon nuka epuesa ka arukan.”

Kobala etuŋanan Yoab ebe, “Karaida kaainakin atutubeta alukumit nuka epuesa akanika, timam karioo akakan mama ejai okoku loka ekabaka: naarai kipou keirasi kicorakini ekabaka jo ka Abisai ka Itai ebe, ‘Kocoito kereka kinye etuŋanan atiror etelepat Abisalom.’
Konye tikeswama nakaiŋal aiar akeijar (kwabo emamei akirot naibwaio kama ejai ekabaka), aso tikiŋadaar ijo da olopet.”
Kosodi kotema Yoab atiar, “Mam apedori aitumor kajo kwaŋin.” Kitiŋ ikojoi iuni kakekan, koremio Abisalom otau, eroko ejari kokidiŋ okum.
Itelepai da itomon lukitinenenete lujiis luka Yoab kirigaut kicwnueumata Abisalom, koara.
Kokut Yoab arupepe, koboŋut ituŋa kama kerukitotor Isirael naarai kitikok Yoab ituŋa.
Koyaŋaasi Abisalom, kocakakis aipany nakepol kamagoro, kotukokis kujuke atukot naepol noi naka amor: kosodete kokera luka Isirael kere, ŋinituŋanan owemake.

Ido eroko Abisalom ejari abu kolem epir lokejai aditot naka ekabaka kosipok: naarai enera atiar, “Emamei een ikoku yeniitununere ekakiror.” Komaik epir ekekiror: ido enyaritai aiitunet naka Abisalom kiton lolo.
Kobala Yoab ebe, “Mam iyaŋaari akiro lolo, konye iyaŋaari aeepaaran; konye lolo mam iyaŋaari akiro, naarai atwana okoku loka ekabaka,”
Kosodi kobala Yoab Ekusit ebe, “Kolot kolimok ekabaka akiro nuiany ijo.” Kokukokin Ekusit Yoab, kopaari akerit.

Kosodi Akimaas, okoku loka Sadok, kobala bobo Yoab ebe, “Mam akiro, kisiikinai kaker eoŋ da katupa Ekusit.” Kobala Yoab ebe, “Ikakoku, kanukinyo ikotor ijo akerit, naarai mam ibore yenidumuni kaŋina?”
Kotema ŋes atiar, “Mam akiro, akeri eoŋ.” Kobala ŋes ebe, “Koker bo.” Kosodi koker Akimaas, kitor Apuuton, kilany Ekusit.
Kiworok eketeon kolimok ekabaka. Kobala ekabaka ebe, “Arai erai ediopet, eyaunit akiro.” Kodiŋirir akerun; koeku die.
Kosodi koany eketeon ecetuŋanan loekeruni: konyarau eketeon ekedaran erute, kobala ebe, “Koany, ecetuŋanan loekeruni bon.” Kobala ekabaka ebe, “Eyaunit ŋesi da akiro.”
Kotema eketeon atiar, “Aomit eoŋ akerit naka ŋol kaloinarenit esubit bala akerit naka Akimaas, okoku loka Sadok.” Kobala ekabaka ebe, “Erai etuŋanan lokajokan, eyaunit akiro nukajokak.”
Kiworok Akimaas ekabaka, kotema ŋes atiar, “Yoga.” Kisuded kakonyen nuka ekabaka, kinera atiar, “Kituritete EJAKAIT Ekonideke, loepiko ituŋa lukedakakinete akecekanin ekajakait ekabaka.”
Kobala ekabaka ebe, “Ejai etelepat Abisalom ejok?” Koboŋok Akimaas ebe, “Nakejukunia Yoab ekejaanakinan loka ekabaka, ŋes eoŋ ekonikejaanakinan, abu kaany autaar naepol konye mam abu kajen akiro.”
Kobala ekabaka ebe, “Komanu, kobwo kane.” Komanu, kobwo.
Kobala ekabaka Ekusit ebe, “Ejai etelepat Abisalom ejok?” Koboŋok Ekusit ebe, “Lukasurup luka ekajakait ekabaka ka ŋul kere lukinyoikinete jo aikonakin aronis, ekonakis kwape ejaar etelepat ŋol.”

Kosodi kiturur noi ekabaka, kodoka togo loejai orute, komony akiyo: napelosi kinera kwanata, ebe, “Wu ikakoku Abisalom, ikakoku, ikakoku Abisalom! Karai gwai eoŋ atwanit kojari ijo, wu Abisalom, ikakoku, ikakoku!”
Aponi kolimokinai Yoab ebe, “Koany emonyi ekabaka ekuudiani Abisalom.”
Koluor aipikor aibworo mama ejaas ituŋa kere kapaaran kaŋin: naarai kopuput ituŋa ebakai ebe, “ltururwei ekabaka okokuke.”
Kidaudaununos ituŋa ore kapaaran kaŋin, kwape idaudaunotor ituŋa luirumito ileic naekeriata koile.
Kimuko ekabaka akonyeneke, komony ekabaka keporoto kaloepol ebe, “Wu ikakoku Abisalom, wu Abisalom, ikakoku, ikakoku!”
Kobu Yoab togo mama ejai ekabaka, kotema atiar,
“Itadaka ijo lolo akwes nuka ikejaanakinakakon kere, luapotu kitajarata aijarakon lolo, ka aijar naka ikonidwe lusap ka lupesur, ka aijar naka aŋorokon, ka aijar da naka abusianakon:

Naarai imina ijo lukilaete jo, ilai da lukiminas jo. Naarai ilimo lolo ijo ebe mam ipodo cut ikapolok ka ikejaanakinak; naarai aany eoŋ lolo ebe, arai kejari Abisalom, ka sio da kere katwakito lolo, tiisiyalamikinit ijo noi.

Aso do konyou, koloma, kitalaka ikejaanakinakakon: naarai eyapoi alimit EJAKAIT ebe arai mam jo ilomari, emamei etuŋanan loiboiete kajo akuare na: ŋin da erono kamakon adepar aronis kere nakidoikinit jo ageun keiditeukon kiton kwana.”
Kosodi ekabaka anyoun, kiboikin orute. Aponi kolimokinai ituŋa kere ebe, “Koany, iboikin ekabaka orute.” Kopotu ituŋa kere mama ejai ekabaka.
Abu Isirael koker ŋinituŋanan owemake.
Kopegas ituŋa kere anatar atekerin kere nuka Isirael atiar, “Kilaku ekabaka oni kakan naka lukasurupowok, kitajar oni kakan naka Ipilisitian; kwana da aker anyoun kakwap kaneejai Abisalom.
Atwaniki Abisalom kojie, lokinyonyoikini akinyet ayait oni. Aso do kanukinyo mam yes ilimunioto akirot ainyakun ekabaka?”

Kijuka ekabaka Daudi mama ejai Sadok ka Abiatar isasedotin, ebe, “Kolimokis imakio luka Yuda ebe, ‘Kanukinyo iraunotor yesi lukawasia ainyakun ekabaka togoke? Naarai adol akirot naka Isirael kere mama ejai ekabaka, ainyakun ŋes togoke.
Yes ikainacan, yes akoitika, ka akiriŋika; kanukinyo iraunotor yesi lukawasia ainyakun ekabaka?’
Kolimokis Amasa da ebe, ‘Mam kereka jo irai akoitika ka akiriŋika? Keswamak Edeke eoŋ kwaŋin ka adepar da, arai mam jo iraun ekapolon loka ajore kakonyeneka tiritir aibois naka Yoab.’ ”
Kitukukum itauon luka ituŋa kere luka Yuda, kwape etau loka ediopetuŋanan; kijukasi do mama ejai ekabaka ebe, “Koboŋ, ijo ka ikejaanakinakakon kere.”
Koboŋ ekabaka kobu Yorodan. Kobu Yuda Giligal, alosit airiamakin kekabaka, aikwanun ekabaka koYorodan.
Kejaas ituŋa elukumit luka Benyamin kaŋes, ka Siba ekejaanakinan loka etogo loka Saul, ka odweke itomon ka lukany ka ikekejaanakinak akaisaarei kaŋes; kitoroto Yorodan akonyen nuka ekabaka.
Kotubor ataker naerisi aikwaŋar ekal loka ekabaka, aswam da nuitojokit ŋesi, Kibirokin Simei okoku loka Gera akonyen nuka ekabaka naatubunor Yorodan.

Kotema ŋesi ekabaka atiar, “Kinyek ejakaitika aimarakin eoŋ aronis, sirikiitu da epali lokiswamakin ekejaanakinanikon jo kapaaran naalomaria ejakaitika ekabaka koYerusalem, sirikibwaiki ekabaka ŋun otau.
Naarai ejeni ekejaanakinanikon ebe Adiak eoŋ: aso koany, abu eoŋ lolo karau losodit kotogo kere loka Yosep alosit airiamakin kejakaitika ekabaka.”
Konye Koboŋok Abisai okoku loka Seruia ebe, “Mam kereka eario Simei kanu elamia loenyonyoikinit EJAKAIT akinyet?”

Kotema Daudi atiar, “Inyoin bo kimariai eoŋ kayes, yes odwe luka Seruia, yes araun lukasurupoka lolo? Eario kereka idiotuŋanan lolo koIsirael? Mam kereka ajeni ebe arai eoŋ lolo ekabaka loka Isirael?”
Kotema ekabaka Simei atiar, “Mam jo itwani.” Kiyapoik ekabaka ŋes.
Kosodi kanen, naabunio ŋesi Yerusalem airiamakin kekabaka, kotema ekabaka ŋes atiar, “Inyo bo kitikokini jo aupar keoŋ, Mepiboset?”

Koboŋok ŋesi ebe, “Ekajakait, wu ekabaka, kenalanal eoŋ ekejaanakinanika; naarai abala ekejaanakinanikon ebe, ‘Kopetanak lupetan asigiria, kebwanen, kauparos kekabaka’; naarai eŋwalit ekejaanakinanikon.
Konye abu kosabanak ekejaanakinanikon kaneejai ejakaitika ekabaka; konye erai ejakaitika ekabaka kwape emalaika loka Edeke: aso kiswama nuitojokit ijo.

Naarai keraas lukokek loka papaka kere kwape lukatwak kakonyen nuka ejakaitika ekabaka: konye ibu ijo kodakak ekejaanakinanikon toma kaŋul luanyamete komesakon. Aso apolou anyoin kijaa keoŋ aiyatakin aimony mama ejai ekabaka?”
Kotema ekabaka ŋes atiar, “Kanukinyo iyatakinitor einer akirokon? Abala eoŋ ebe, ‘Kotiakata ijo ka Siba alup.’ ”
Kotema Mepiboset ekabaka atiar, “Eebo, koyaŋa ŋesi kere, naarai abu ekajakait ekabaka togoke inapakina.”
Kemoionit Barisilai noi, kerai loka ikar akaisakanykauni: abu koinakinite ekabaka inyamat naajaar ŋesi Makanaim; naarai kerai ŋesi etuŋanan loapol noi.
Kotema ekabaka Barisilai atiar, “Kadokasi keoŋ, ketani eoŋ jo, koYerusalem.”
Kotema Barisilai ekabaka atiar, “Imwaasi ai apaarasia nuka ikar luka aijaraka, tape eoŋ kilosi kekabaka Yerusalem?

Arai eoŋ lolo loka ikar akaisakanykauni: apedori kereka atiakun nuejok ka nueroko? Epedori bo ekejaanakinanikon akiir nuanyami ka nuamasi? Apedori bobo akiirar eporoto loka ikiliok lueyeete ka aŋor nueyeete? Aso kanukinyo eraunor ekonikejaanakinan alaŋir mama ejai ekajakait ekabaka?
Edokari bo ekejaanakinanikon Yorodan kekabaka: kanukinyo karopia ekabaka eoŋ keropit loetia nen?
Keŋaiŋait, kisiik ekonikejaanakinan aboŋor bobo, katwanik oreka, ates naka papaka ka totoka, Konye koany, ekejaanakinanikon Cimukam: kodoka ŋesi kejakaitika ekabaka; kiswamak ŋes nuitojokit ijo.”
Koboŋok ekabaka ebe, “Edokari Cimukam keoŋ, eswamakini ŋes nuitojokit ijo: ŋin da yenikoto ijo kaneajai eoŋ, keswamakini jo ŋin.”
Kodokasi ituŋa kere Yorodan, kodoka ekabaka da; konu ekabaka Barisilai, kilipak ŋes arereŋ; koboŋo ŋesi aiboisike.
Kodoka ekabaka kiton Giligal, kodoka Cimukam kaŋes: apotu ituŋa kere luka Yuda ka atutubet naka ituŋa luka Isirael kitodokut ekabaka.

Koboŋokis ituŋa kere luka Yuda ituŋa luka Isirael ebe, “Naarai erai ekabaka lokokekikosi: aso kanukinyo inyunyuratar yesi kakiro kaŋun? Kinyam kereka isio luka ekabaka kere? Kiinak kereka isio adioinakinet?”

Koboŋokis ituŋa luka Isirael ituŋa luka Yuda atiar, “Atutubeta atomon nuka ekabaka eraas nukosi, ido kijaa isio kanuipu adepar yes kama kaDaudi: kanukinyo kimwanitotor sio, mere ti isio kirai lusodit ainerun ainyakun ekabakawok?” Adedeŋ akiro nuka ituŋa luka Yuda aitelekarit akiro nuka ituŋa luka Isirael.
Konyout ituŋa luka Isirael kere katupit Daudi, kotupakis Seba okoku loka Bikiri: konye kiketakinos ituŋa luka Yuda ekabakakec, anyoun koYorodan kiton Yerusalem.
Kosodi ekabaka atemar Amasa atiar, “Konyarakinai ituŋa luka Yuda kotoma apaarasia auni, ijo da kojaun ne.”
Aso kolot Amasa anyaraun ituŋa luka Yuda: konye kitumor adepar apak naaseikinitai ŋes.

Kotema Daudi Abisai atiar, “Kwana kiswamakini Seba okoku loka Bikiri oni aronis adepar naeswamakini Abisalom oni: koyaŋa ijo ikejaanakinak luka ejakaitikon korukitor ŋes, kinyek ŋesi adumun ireria luebwaitai, aiku kamawok.”
Kolomasi ituŋa luka Yoab ka Ikeretin ka Ipeletin ka ituŋa kere lukirigin atupit ŋes; kolomasi koYerusalem, arukoria Seba okoku loka Bikiri.

Kedoloto kesi amoru naapol naajai Gibeon, kobu Amasa airiamakin kakes. Kiridak Yoab inapen luka ejie luanapit ŋesi, kejai arokoba naaenikinitai aŋabetekeŋ kekileŋ lokejai toma akuraruke; napelosi ŋesi kodoi.
Kotema Yoab Amasa atiar, “Ejok, onaceka?” Kitiŋ Yoab Amasa kopenekike kakekan nakoteten ainu ŋes.
Konye mam Amasa abu kopodo ekileŋ lokejai akan naka Yoab: kicumia ŋes akoik, kobukoros amoetekake kwap, mam abu kirucak; kotwana.
Apotu Yoab ka Abisai onaceke korukioto Seba okoku loka Bikiri.
Kobwo ediopet kokatumunak luka Yoab koapias kaŋes, kotema atiar, “Ŋol loekoto Yoab, ka ŋol da loerai loka Daudi, kotupa Yoab.”
Koper Amasa kimodumodun kaokotoke kokidiŋ orot. Keanyu etuŋanan ebe abwout ituŋa kere, kodaka Amasa alemar korot aibwaikin ais, kiswapak anapito, keanyu ŋesi ebe apotu kere luetorito nen kobwout.
Kelemari ŋes korot, kiyatakis Ituŋa kere atupar Yoab, arukitor Seba okoku loka Bikiri.
Kopotu kirigautu ŋes ka Abel loka Bet-maaka, kitutuoto etut eiduny ka ere koriakas karwatat: apotu ituŋa kere lukejaas kaYoab kitakitakete arwatat atiyaikin.
Kosodi aberu nakacoa aiworo kore ebe, “Kopuputu, kopuputu; keŋaiŋait, kolimokis Yoab ebe, ‘Kikuny, kenerakinos kajo.’ ”
Kikunyak ŋes; kotema aberu atiar, “Ijo ŋes Yoab?” Koboŋok ebe, “Eoŋ lo.” Kosodi ŋin atemar ŋes atiar, “Kopup akiro nuka akejaanakinanikon.” Koboŋok ŋesi ebe, “Apupi.”
Kinera ŋesi ebe, “Etapit apeŋo atemar ebe, ‘Abeit iŋisete kesi akiro ka Abel’: kwaŋin kitananete kesi akiro.
Ajai eoŋ owai kaŋul luinapakina ka lumunon koIsirael: imoot ijo amudiar ere loerai toto koIsirael: kanukinyo ikotor ijo ailikor airumet naka EJAKAIT?”
Koboŋok Yoab ebe, “Madi akuj, madi akuj, eoŋ ailikor arai amudiar.

Mam akiro ikote nen: abu etuŋanan loka akwap nakiukon naka Epuraim, ekekiror Seba okoku loka Bikiri, kikeu akekan asurokin ekabaka, ŋes Daudi: kijaik ŋes bon, eoŋ da anyouni kore.” Kotema aberu Yoab atiar, “Koany, eeakunio nat akekou mama ijai karwatat.”

Kosodi aberu alosit kacoake mama ejaas ituŋa kere. Kojepasi akou naka Seba okoku loka Bikiri, kocakakis Yoab. Kokut ŋesi arupepe, kisiarakinos anyoun kore, ŋinituŋanan owemake. Koboŋo Yoab Yerusalem mama ejai ekabaka.
Kitelem Adoram esolo; korai Yekosapat okoku loka Akilud ekesiitonokinan.
Korai Sebua ekalani; koraas Sadok ka Abiatar isasedotin:
Korai da ha Eyairit esasedoti kama ka Daudi.

Konyarau ekabaka Igibeonin einer kakes; (mam Igibeonin araas luka idwe luka Isirael, konye luka luedeuna luka Imorain; apotu idwe luka Isirael kiyapoikis kes: kokoto Saul aiar kes kekokoteke kanuka idwe luka Isirael ka Yuda).
Kotema Daudi Igibeonin atiar, “Keswamakinete yes inyo? Aluci da kinyo, tetere ilipakinete airumet naka EJAKAIT arerens”

Kotemasi Igibeonin ŋes atiar, “Mam erai akirot naka epuesa arai esabu kidiŋikosi ka Saul, ka ekekike; mam da kibusakinit isio aiar ituŋanan koIsirael.” Kotema atiar, “Nuinerasi yesi, keswamakini ŋin.”
Kotemasi kesi ekabaka atiar, “Etuŋanan loabu kodau sio, loabu kiner asurokin sio, amudiar sio kinyek asalakin koikoruno kere luka Isirael.
Kijaikinai sio ituŋa ikanykaarei lukodweke, kikajakini isio kes mama ejai EJAKAIT koGibea loka Saul eseuna loka EJAKAIT.” Kotema ekabaka atiar, “Kainakinete yes.”
Konye koyaŋa ekabaka odwe iarei luka Risipa akoku naka Aia, luaurikinit ŋesi Saul, Arumoni ka Mepiboset; ka odwe ikany luka Mikal
Kijaik kes akanin nuka Igibeonin, kikajakis kes moru kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kotwaka kesi lukanykaarei kere: koarai kapaarasia nuka aisak, kapaarasia nusodit, kageunet naka aisak esairi.
Aponi kolimokinai Daudi nukiswamai Risipa akoku naka Aia, abusiat naka Saul.

Kolot Daudi koyaŋa akojo nuka Saul ka akojo nuka Yonatan okokuke kaneejaas ituŋa luka Yabes-gilead, luapotu kokokoutu kes korot loka Bet-san, kaibois naekaiakiniata Ipilisitian kes, kapaaran nakeariata Ipilisitian Saul koGiliboa.
Koyau ŋesi kaŋina akojo nuka Saul ka akojo nuka Yonatan okokuke; kotukonokisi da akojo nuka ŋul kaluekajakinitai.
Konukata akojo nuka Saul ka Yonatan okokuke akwap naka Benyamin koSela, ates naka papake Kis: kiswamata kere nuecorakinit ekabaka, Akaulo kaŋun kiira Edeke aiŋaiŋaikinio naka akwap.
Kojioto Ipilisitian bobo kaluka Isirael; kolot Daudi ka ikekejaanakinak kaŋes, kitiji Ipilisitian: kilworun Daudi.
Abu Isibi-benob, lokerai lokodwe luka ekekososon, alaŋir naka akwarake isekelin akwat auni nuka aisinit, anapit ŋesi ekileŋ lokitetet, koomite ebe eari Daudi.
Konye kisigalik Abisai okoku loka Seruia ŋes, kinom Epilisitiat, koar ŋes. Kosodete ituŋa luka Daudi aiyapoikin ŋes atiar, “Mam bobo jo ilomari kasio ojie, kinyek aitudeŋ atala naka Isirael.”
Kosodi kojau bobo ejie ka Ipilisitian koGob; koar Elanan okoku loka Yaareoregim Ebet-lekemit Goliat Egitit, koputos amorok naka akwarake bala akitoi naesonyere.
Kosodi kojau bobo ejie koGat, kejai kanen etuŋanan lokaojan, lokejaas ibokor ikanykape kaninikan, ka ibokor ikanykape kaninikeje, emwaasi ibokoroke akaisaarei ka luoŋon; ŋol da aurikinio ekekososon.
Nakemwaŋitor ŋesi Isirael abu Yonatan okoku loka Simei onace loka Daudi koar ŋes.
Keurikinio ŋul iwoŋon ekekososon koGat; kibiroros kakan naka Daudi kakan da naka ikekejaanakinak.
Kotema atiar,
“EJAKAIT ŋes atiibaka, ka akabwas, ekayuunanika, lokaŋ obe;
Ebukuka, amumwarat naka akaitajario,
Akaŋopis naicelelei, neakereanari;
Eketaiaranika, ijo kitajari eoŋ kotoma akale.
Eworoi eoŋ EJAKAIT, loibusakinit aiturio;
Ketajareneneo kwaŋin kama kalukasurupoka.
“Karapiasi eoŋ akailan nuka atwanare,
Ketukuriana eoŋ akalele nuka numam ayoŋit Edeke.
Kerimorito aunoi nuka Okatwak:
Kepoka iica luka atwanare.
Eebo, keworo mama ejai Edekeka:
Abu kiira ekaporoto koyekaluke,
Kodolok aimonyoka akiike.
Kilokilokos da apeteta nuka akui,
Kiianiianas, naarai anyunyura ŋesi.
Kidonyo akim nakelomuni kaitukuke:
Kisinep atotol.
Kojai amuton naejesi ŋaŋ kwap kakejeke.
Eebo, aponi koanyunai kabebenoka nuka ekwam.
Kituluo amuton iweman luiswaparito ŋes,
Atukon nuka akipi, idouon luitolimakinito luka akui.
Kanuka amwekimwek naka akonyeneke,
Kineput atotol nuka akim.
Kolimo ŋol loejai kuju kakuj ekeporoto.
Aimiliaunet, kisiyaloŋoŋ kes.
Kotakanutu da alelesia nuka aŋolol,
Kideleleut apeteta nuka akwapin,
Kanuka airetakin naka EJAKAIT,
Kanuka akutun naka eiyeŋane loka ekumesike.
“Abu kijuk kokuju, kayaŋa;
Kegalala kakipi nuipu.
Abu kayu kama kalokasurupoka lokagogoŋ,
Kama kakesi da lukalaito;
Naarai ketelekarito eoŋ kagogoŋ.
Kabunokis kapaaran naka epolaka;
Konye EJAKAIT ŋes ketogogoŋi.
Abu kayu eoŋ naarai kesiyalamikinit.
“Karop EJAKAIT eoŋ kwape kejaar akadolit;
Katacak kwape ejaar alaunite naka akaninika.
Naarai abu karic irotin luka EJAKAIT,
Ido mam abu kejerukana kama ejai Ekadeke.
Mam abu kanyou da kaneejaas ikisilake.
Abu kedara kenyek aswam numam adolit.
Ŋes katacakinia EJAKAIT kwape ejaar akadolit,
Kwape ejaar alauniteka kakonyeneke.
Mama ejai yenikadoliton da itodianakini adolit;
Ido mama ejai yenetumaana itodianakini airebokinet.
Konye esesenete akonikonye lueomiara, tetere itisili kes.
Naarai irai ijo atalaka, wu EJAKAIT:
Itacauni EJAKAIT akamuton.
Naarai kanukon arukitor ajore;
Ido kanuka aiŋarakinio naka Edekeka elami abwas.
Egimor akirot naka EJAKAIT;
Ŋol ŋes ebuku loka ŋul kere luemunos ŋes.
Iŋai bo da atiiba dimarai Edekewok?
Iŋarenikini ŋesi ikadoliton.
Ido kebwaikini eoŋ aiboisioka nukokuju.
Isisianakini akakanin ejie;
Tetere ikesete akakanin akabwa naka aikomon.
Kiinak eoŋ da ebuku loka akoniitajar:
Ketopoloo eoŋ aiyapeperakon.
Kitalalik eoŋ neetorit,
Mam ejurusiaros akatitiban.
Ebwapit lukasurupoka, amudia kes;
Mam abu kabon aitodol neamudiarotor.
Adau kes, eeumueum kes komam epedorete anyoun:
Eebo, kibirokinos kwap akejeka.
Naarai ibu kitanapik eoŋ agogoŋ najiis;
Itukukum ŋul lukanyoikinete.
Isibonik lukasurupoka ikecepuran neajai eoŋ,
Tetere amudiari lukalaito.
Mama ejai EJAKAIT, konye mam abu Koboŋok.
Kasodi kepudapud kes bala apua nuka akwap,
Kecakacak kes bala erit loka irotin, kesiarak kes.
Kituluo ekeŋarenon loka atekerin:
Kejaanakinete eoŋ ituŋa lumam lem ajeni.
Kanonokikinete imo:
Atipet kepuput nukaŋ karimarete.
Elomunete emaranete kaiboisiokec nuŋopis.
Kitopolooritete Edeke loka atiiba naka akaitajario.
Ketapatanikini eoŋ ituŋa.
Kaiyanari eoŋ kama ejaas lukasurupoka;
Eebo, kidaka eoŋ kuju kaŋul kalukanyoikinete:
Kiyu eoŋ kama ejai ituŋanan yenikakaje.
Ayeenenei aiturit ekonikiror.
Einakini ekabakake aitajar naepol;
Itodianakini da nuka asianut-nakamin lokinyonyoikitonoke akinyet,
Daudi ka akeur ikar kere.”
Nu kes akiro nukawasia nuka Daudi.
Abu Daudi okoku loka Yese,
Etuŋanan da loekeunitai kuju,
Loenyonyoikinit Edeke loka Yakob akinyet,
Ekayoot da loitojokitai koIsirael kobala ebe:
Kojaun akirotoke anaiepeka.
Kiner Atiiba naka Isirael keoŋ ebe,
Ŋol loeyait ituŋa kadolit,
Loeyait kayoŋit naka Edeke.
Atupuruc naemameatar idouon;
Kelom amel kokwap,
Kecau kipioror kikwaa akiru.
Konye do kitutuk ŋesi keoŋ aitutuket namam edaun, Naitemokino kakiro kere, naitieasitai;
Naarai erai aitajarioka kere, ka eimielika kere,
Karaida mam itopoloi.
Konye eraunos lumam eyoŋito Edeke kere kwape ikukwa lueremorio,
Naarai mam epedorio aitiŋ kakan:
Konye etuŋanan loetini kes
Kibusakinit akapakin kasuat ka amorok naka akwara;
Icweikinio kes cut kakim kaiboisikec.”
Lu kes ikiroria luka ituŋa lukirigin lukejaas kaDaudi: Yoseb-basebet Etakemonit, ejakait loka ikapolok; kodaku ŋol akekwara asurokin akwat akanykauni luaari atipet.
Konyou ŋesi, kodany Ipilisitian aitodol neetegia akekan, kimakakin akekan okileŋ: kijaik EJAKAIT aipikor naepol kapaaran kaŋin; koboŋut ituŋa kodumut ebe asal aijoreun bon.
Konye kobwo ŋol kokidiŋ omanikor, koiiu ŋes, koar Ipilisitian: kijaik EJAKAIT aipikor naepol.
Kejai Daudi toma abwas, kejai abwas naka iserikalei luka Ipilisitian Bet-lekem.
Kimiela Daudi, kotema atiar, “Arai kainak idiotuŋanan eoŋ akipi aimat nuka atan naka Bet-lekem, naidunyas kerute!”
Kocila ituŋa luuni lukirigin ajore naka Ipilisitian, kowokut akipi katan naka Bet-lekem, naidunyas kerute, koyaŋas, koinutu Daudi: konye koŋer aimat, konye kiwela mama ejai EJAKAIT.
Kotema atiar, “Madi akuj eoŋ aswam ŋin, wu EJAKAIT: amasi kereka aokot nuka ituŋa lualosito akaŋas naka aijarakec?” Kanuka ŋun koŋer aimat. Kiswamata ituŋa luuni lukirigin akiro ŋun.
Mam ŋes etopolooritai kouni? Kanuka ŋun kitaraunai ekapolonikec: konye mam abu kodolok luuni lusodit.
Koar ŋesi Emisiriat, etuŋanan lotemel: kitiŋite Emisiriat akwara kakanike; konye kolot ŋol mama ejai ŋesi kebela, kodem akwara kakan naka Emisiriat, koar ŋes kakwarake elopet.
Kiswama Benaia okoku loka Yekoiada akiro ŋun, kodum ekiror kotuŋa luuni lukirigin.
Kitopolooritete ŋes adepar akaisauni, konye mam abu kodolok luuni lusodit. Kodakak Daudi ŋes ayait ikedarakake.
Sama Ekarodit, Elika Ekarodit;
Keles Epalitit, Ira okoku loka Ikkes Etekoit;
Abieser Enatotait, Mebunai Ekusatit;
Salumon Ekokait, Makarai Enetopatit;
Keleb okoku loka Baana Enetopatit, Itai okoku loka Ribai loka Gibea loka idwe luka Benyamin;
Benaia Epiratonit, Kidai loka aguurun nuka Gaas;
Abi-alibon Erabatait, Asumabet Ebarumit;
Eliaba Esaalibonit, odwe luka Yasen, Yonatan;
Sama Ekararit, Akiam okoku loka Sarar Erarait;
Elipelet okoku loka Akasibai, okoku loka Emaakatit, Eliam okoku loka Akitopel Egilonit;
Kesero Ekaramelit, Paarai Erabait;
Igal okoku loka Natan loka Soba, Bani Egadit;
Selek Emonait, Nakarai Ebeerotit, luadakito lujiis luka Yoab okoku loka Seruia;
Ira Etirit, Gareb Etitit;
Uria Ekitit: akaisauni ka lukanykaarei kere.
Kotema ekabaka Yoab ekapolon loka ajore lokejai kaŋes ebe, “Kirimirim anatar atekerin kere nuka Isirael ageun koDan kiton Beer-seba, kimarata ituŋa, kajenu eoŋ etiai loka ituŋa.”
Kotema Yoab ekabaka atiar, “Kiyatak EJAKAIT Ekonideke ituŋa kwape ejaar etiaikec irwan akwatat, koanyutu akonye nuka ekajakait ekabaka: konye kanukinyo kisiyalamikinitor ŋin ekajakait ekabaka?”
Kiteleka do akirot naka ekabaka ŋin naka Yoab ka naka ikapolok luka ajore. Koloma Yoab ka ikapolok luka ajore kaneajai ekabaka aimar ituŋa luka Isirael.
Kikwaŋaros Yorodan, kidukuroto Aroer, kari nakoteten naka ere loejai kidiŋ aditot naka Gad, kiton Yaser:
Kosodete adolokin Gilead, kiton akwap naka Tatimodisi; kodolot Dan-yaan, kirimosi kiton Sidon.
Kodolot abwas naka Turo, kiton oreria kere luka Ikibin, ka luka Ikanaanin: kolomasi kiton ari naka eŋalakimak naka Yuda, koBeer-seba.
Aso kedaut airimirim anatar akwap kere, kopotu kesi Yerusalem ketuboros ilapio ikanykaoŋon ka apaarasia akaisaarei.
Abu Yoab koinak ekabaka etiai loka ituŋa luemari ŋesi: kojaas koIsirael ituŋa ilukumin akwat akanykauni luketitin luautununere ikileŋa; emwaasi ituŋa luka Yuda ilukumin akwat akany.
Kenyou Daudi tupuruc, kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ejai enabi Gad, ekadwaran loka Daudi, ebe,
“Kolot kolimok Daudi ebe, ‘Inera EJAKAIT kwanata ebe, Kejaik jo akiro auni; koseu ijo adiopet kakesi, tetere keswamakini jo.’ ”

Kobu do Gad mama ejai Daudi, kolimok ŋes, kotema ŋes atiar, “Epote kereka ikar ikanykaarei luka ebeli mamakon kakwapukon? Arai bo ikeri kereka ijo ilapio iuni kakonyen nuka lukasurupokon korukitotor kesi jo? Arai bo ejaun atular apaarasia auni kakwapukon? Aso kiner, koomoom nuaboŋokini eoŋ ŋol lokejukuni.”
Kotema Daudi Gad atiar, “Katiokikis noi; mere kebirokinos akan naka EJAKAIT; naarai epol akeitim: kenyek aibirokin akan naka ituŋanan.”

Nakerio emalaika akekan adodit Yerusalem amudiar ŋes, kiitu EJAKAIT aronis, kotema emalaika loamudiari ituŋa atiar, “Adol do; kinyaka akonikan.” Edunyas emalaika loka EJAKAIT kepejal loka Arauna Eyebusit.
Keanyu Daudi emalaika loadanyi ituŋa kotema Daudi EJAKAIT atiar, “Koany, adiaka eoŋ, eswama nukepali: konye amerekekin nu, eswamata anyoika? Keŋaiŋait kaluik eoŋ akonikan, ka ekek loka papaka.”
Kolot Daudi kwape ejaar akirot naka Gad, kwape ecorakinia EJAKAIT.
Kiteluo Arauna, koany ekabaka ka ikekejaanakinak eponito mama ejai ŋesi: kolom Arauna kokukum kakonyen nuka ekabaka kitulurite akekou.
Kotema Arauna atiar, “Kanukinyo ebunitor ekajakait ekabaka mama ejai ekekejaanakinan?” Kotema Daudi atiar, “Agwelakin kajo epejal, adukokin EJAKAIT etem, tetere enaŋi atular kotuŋa.”
Kotema Arauna Daudi atiar, “Koyaŋa ekajakait ekabaka koinak nuitojokit ŋesi: koany, imoŋin luka ainakinet naicweio, ka iboro lukicomet, ka iboro luka imoŋin araun akitoke:
Wu ekabaka, einakini Arauna ŋun kere mama ejai ekabaka.” Kotema Arauna ekabaka atiar, “Kocam EJAKAIT Ekonideke jo.”

Kotema ekabaka Arauna atiar, “Mam; konye abeit kigwelakin kotiaike: mam ainakini EJAKAIT Ekadeke ainakineta nuicweio kiboro kaluiinakina taai.” Kwaŋin kogwel Daudi epejal ka imoŋin kisekelin akaisakany nuka epuesa.
Kodukok Daudi EJAKAIT etem nepenen, koinak ainakineta nuicweio, ka ainakineta nuka ainapakin. Kwaŋin kiira EJAKAIT aiŋaiŋaikinio naka akwap, konaŋ atular koIsirael.
Amojoŋit ekabaka Daudi kokokosanite noi; kimukosi ŋes kigoen. Konye mam abu komwanu.

Kanuka ŋun kotemasi ikejaanakinakake ŋes atiar, “Komoikinai abekot nakatumunan ekajakait ekabaka: kobwoi ŋesi kakonyen nuka ekabaka aiŋarakinit ŋes; koperenenei ŋin katorobukon, tetere ejakaitika ekabaka edumuni amwanis.”
Kosodete komout apese naatemel anatar iikoruno kere luka Isirael, kodumut Abisag Asunamit, koyaut ŋes mama ejai ekabaka.
Kitemelel apese noi; kiŋarakinite ekabaka, kijaanaki ŋes; konye mam ekabaka abu kojen ŋes.
Mam papake abu kitakadikinite ŋes kaijarake kere ebe, “Kanukinyo iswamaa ijo ŋun?” Kerai ŋesi da etuŋanan lootemel; aurio ŋes akaulo ka Abisalom.
Kinerut ŋesi kaYoab okoku loka Seruia, ka Abiatar esasedoti: kotupasi Adoniya kiŋarakis ŋes.
Konye Sadok esasedoti, ka Benaia okoku loka Yekoiada, ka Natan enabi, ka Simei, ka Rei, ka ituŋa lukirigin luka Daudi mam ajaas ka Adoniya.
Koarak Adoniya amerekekin ka imoŋin ka lukasiepai amoru naka Sokelet, naidunyas ka En-rogel; konyarau ŋesi iinacanake kere odwe luka ekabaka, ka ituŋa kere luka Yuda ikejaanakinak luka ekabaka:
Konye mam abu konyarau Natan enabi, ka Benaia, ka ituŋa lukirigin, ka Solomon onaceke.
Aso do kobia, keŋaiŋait, kener kajo tetere itajari akoniijar, ka aijar da naka okokukon Solomon.

Kolot, koloma ijo mama ejai ekabaka Daudi, kotema ŋes atiar, ‘Ekajakait, wu ekabaka, mam jo iyapoikinic akejaanakinanikon ebe, “Abeit irumi Solomon okokukon atupakin eoŋ, iboikini ŋesi oicoloŋoka loka ajakanut”? Aso kanukinyo irumia Adoniya?’
Koany, nape iriŋa ijo inerasi kekabaka, kalomuni eoŋ da atupakin jo, aitogogoŋ akirokon.”
Koloma Bat-seba agola mama ejai ekabaka. Amojoŋit ekabaka noi; kijaanakini Abisag Asunamit ekabaka.
Kokukum Bat-seba, kisuded mama ejai ekabaka. Kotema ekabaka ŋes atiar, “Inyo bo ikoto ijo?”
Kwana, koany, irumit Adoniya: ijo da, ekajakait ekabaka, mam ijeni:
Aar imoŋin ka lukasiepai ka amerekekin nuipu noi, anyara odwe kere luka ekabaka, ka Abiatar esasedoti, ka Yoab ekapolon loka ajore: konye mam abu konyara Solomon ekejaanakinanikon.
Uo da, ekajakait ekabaka, kisesenete akonye kere nuka Isirael jo, tetere ilimokini kes iŋai iboikini oicoloŋ loka ekajakait ekabaka atupakin ŋes.
Arai mere kwaŋin, kejotoor ekajakait ekabaka kalukapapaake, kimarakinio eoŋ ka Solomon okokuka kwape ikadiakanarak.”
Ido koany, naperiŋa ŋesi ineras kekabaka, kolom Natan enabi.
Kolimokinai ekabaka ebe, “Koany, Natan enabi lo,” Kelom ŋesi mama ejai ekabaka, kokukum kakonyen nuka ekabaka kitulur akouke.
Kotema Natan atiar, “Ekajakait, wu ekabaka, kibala teni kolo ijo ebe, ‘Adoniya irumi atupakin eoŋ, ŋes iboikini oicoloŋoka loka ajakanut?’

Naarai alot ŋesi lolo, aar imoŋin ka lukasiepai ka amerekekin nuipu noi, anyara odwe kere luka ekabaka, ka ikapolok luka ajore, ka Abiatar esasedoti: ido koany, enyamete, emasete kakonyeneke, kobalas atiar, ‘Kidari Edeke ekabaka Adoniya.’
Konye eoŋ, ekejaanakinanikon, ka Sadok esasedoti, ka Benaia okoku loka Yekoiada, ka Solomon ekejaanakinanikon, mam abu konyara.
Kerai kereka ŋin akirot nakiswamai ejakaitika ekabaka, komam itodiarit mama ejaas ikejaanakinakakon ŋol loiboikini oicoloŋ loka ekajakait ekabaka atupakin ŋes?”
Kosodi ekabaka Daudi aboŋokin ebe, “Konyarakinai Bat-seba.” Kobu ŋin mama ejai ekabaka, kobwo kakonyen nuka ekabaka.
Kiyapo ekabaka kobala ebe, “Kwape ejaria EJAKAIT, loalaku akaijar kocan kere.
Abeit, kwape eyapoikinio jo alimit EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael atiar, ‘Abeit irumi Solomon okokukon atupakin eoŋ, iboikini ŋesi oicoloŋoka loka ajakanut aiboisika’; abeit eswamai kwaŋin lolo.”
Kosodi Bat-seba aitulur akouke kwap, kisuded mama ejai ekabaka, kotema atiar, “Kojar ekajakait ekabaka Daudi ikar kere.”
Kotema ekabaka Daudi atiar, “Konyarakinai Sadok esasedoti, ka Natan enabi, ka Benaia okoku loka Yekoiada.” Kopotu kesi mama ejai ekabaka.
Kotema ekabaka kes atiar, “Koyaŋaasi ikejaanakinak luka ejakaitikus kayes, kisibwanenoto Solomon okokuka ekanyubu, koyaŋaasi ŋes Gikon:
Kinyonyoanakis Sadok esasedoti ka Natan enabi ŋes akinyet araun ekabaka loka Isirael: kokutakis yesi arupepe, kobalasi ebe, ‘Kidar Edeke ekabaka Solomon.’
Kosodete yesi atupakin ŋes, ebuni ŋesi kiboikin oicoloŋoka; naarai eraun ŋesi ekabaka aiboisika: aseu eoŋ ŋes araun lokapolon loka Isirael ka Yuda.”
Koboŋok Benaia okoku loka Yekoiada ekabaka atiar, “Kikote nepenen: kiner kwape kwaŋin EJAKAIT Edeke loka ejakaitika ekabaka.
Kwape kejaenena EJAKAIT kejakaitika ekabaka, kojaenena kwaŋin ka Solomon da, kitopolo eicoloŋoke aitelekarit eicoloŋ loka ejakaitika ekabaka Daudi.”
Kolem Sadok esasedoti amumwarat naka akinyet koWema, kinyonyoik Solomon. Kokutakis arupepe; kobalas ituŋa kere ebe, “Kidar Edeke ekabaka Solomon.”
Kopotu ituŋa kere atupakin ŋes, kokusete ituŋa alamarun, kolakara kaiyalama naepol, kocila akwap kanuka eporotokec.
Kiira Adoniya ka ipejok kere luajaas kaŋes kedaut kesi ainyam. Kepupu Yoab eporoto loka arupepe, kotema atiar, “Inyo bo ibwaanarere kore?”
Eroko inera ŋesi, koany, kobu Yonatan okoku loka Abiatar esasedoti; kotema Adoniya atiar, “Kolom; naarai irai ijo etuŋanan lokaibuses, iyaunit akiro nukajokak.”
Koboŋok Yonatan Adoniya ebe, “Abeit etarau ejakaitiwok ekabaka Daudi Solomon ekabaka:
Abu ekabaka kijuka Sadok esasedoti, ka Natan enabi, ka Benaia okoku loka Yekoiada, ka Ikeretin ka Ipeletin kaŋes, kisibwanenoto ŋes enyubu loka ekabaka.
Apotu Sadok esasedoti ka Natan enabi kinyonyoikis ŋes akinyet araun ekabaka koGikon: apotu kopotu kaŋina elakara, ŋes ebwaaritor ere noi. Ŋol ŋes ecelet loipotu yesi kiirasi.
Ido eboikin Solomon oicoloŋ loka ajakanut.

Bobo da kopotu ikejaanakinak luka ekabaka ailipakin ejakaitiwok ekabaka Daudi arereŋ ebe, ‘Kitojok Edekekon ekiror loka Solomon aitelekar ekirorikon, kitopolo eicoloŋoke aitelekarit eicoloŋokon’: kokukum ekabaka koitada.
Ener ekabaka kwanata atiar, ‘Kituritete EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael, loainaki loiboie oicoloŋoka lolo, aanyut akakonye da.’ ”
Kokuriakaros ipejok kere luka Adoniya, konyout, kolot ŋinituŋanan korotoke.
Kokurianar Adoniya kanuka Solomon; konyou, kolot, kikam amumwara nuka etem.

Kolimokinai Solomon atiar, “Koany, akurianar Adoniya ekabaka Solomon: naarai, koany, ekamu ŋesi amumwara nuka etem ebe, ‘Kisiau ber ekabaka Solomon aiyapoikin eoŋ ebe mam eari ekejaanakinanike kekileŋ.’ ”
Kotema Solomon atiar, “Arai kitodiari bon araun etuŋanan lokaibuses, emameun etimatake loedoi kwape konye arai ketakanu aronis kotomake, etwani bo ŋesi.”
Aso kijuka ekabaka Solomon, koyaunai ŋes kotem, Kobu kisuded kama ejai ekabaka Solomon: kotema Solomon ŋes atiar, “Kolot togokon.”
“Alosi eoŋ neelosete lukakwap kere: aso kogogoŋor, kitodiar kwape ekiliokit;

Koricenenei akirot naka EJAKAIT Ekonideke, alosenen korotinike, koricenenei ikekisila, ka aicorakinetake, ka itubesiake, ka aitejenunetake, kwape ejaatar nuiwadikatai kokisila luka Musa, tetere ikeriana kaŋun kere nuiswamai, ka neibelonokinor kere:

Tetere itogogoŋi EJAKAIT akekirot naenera kamaka ebe, ‘Arai ecoito ikonidwe erotokec, alosenen kakonyeneka kabeit kitauonokec kere, kaijarakec kere, (abala ŋesi ebe) Mam kimamikini ijo etuŋanan loirumi ajakanut naka Isirael.’
Aso kiswama ijo kwape ejaar acoakon, sirikiyu akekou naabwaŋut akorwo alomar okatwak inapakina.
Konye kitodik odwe luka Barisilai Egileadit asianut, koraut kesi kaŋul kaluenyamete komesakon: naarai apotu kesi kekonakis eoŋ kwaŋin naakerea eoŋ Abisalom onacekon.

Ido koany, ejai Simei okoku loka Gera, Ebenyamenit loka Bakurim mamakon, loabu kelam eoŋ elamit loerono kapaaran naalosia Makanaim: konye abu ŋesi kobu airiamakin keoŋ Yorodan, keyapoik ŋes kalimite EJAKAIT ebe, ‘Mam kaari jo kekileŋ.’
Aso do siriwomit ebe mam ŋes egwaunit akirot, naarai ico ijo; ijenuni da nuibusakinit aiswamakin ŋes, itolomari kaokot akekou naabwaŋut akorwo ates.”
Apaarasia da nuerumitor Daudi Isirael emwaasi ikar akaisaoŋon: kirum ŋesi ikar ikanykaarei koKeburon, kirum da ikar akaisauni ka luuni ko Yerusalem.
Kiboikin Solomon oicoloŋ loka Daudi papake; kicat noi akejakanut.
Ido kotema atiar, “Ejaas nuakoto einer kajo.” Kotema ŋin atiar, “Kiner cani.”
Kotema atiar, “ijeni ijo ebe kerai ajakanut nakaŋ, kasesenete eoŋ luka Isirael kere tetere erumi: konye ebelokin ajakanut, araun naka onaceka: naarai kerai nake kama ka EJAKAIT.
Kwana da kelipit jo adiopekirot, sirikiner.” Kotema ŋin ŋes atiar,
“Kiner cani.”
Kotema atiar, “Keŋaiŋait, kilip Solomon ekabaka, (naarai mam ŋes kiŋerokin jo) kakorak Abisag Asunamit kerum.”
Kotema Bat-seba atiar, “Aso ejok; enerakini akonikiro mama ejai ekabaka.”
Kosodi ŋin atemar atiar, “Kelipit jo adiopekirot: sirikiner.” Kotema ekabaka ŋes atiar, “Kilip, toto, naarai mam eoŋ kaŋerokini jo.”
Kotema ŋes atiar, “Kokorakinai Abisag Asunamit onacekon Adoniya airum.”

Koboŋok ekabaka Solomon totoke ebe, “Kanukinyo ilipia ijo Abisag Asunamit akorakinio Adoniya? Kilipakini ŋes ajakanut da; naarai erai onaceka lokapolon; kilipak ŋes, ka Abiatar esasedoti, ka Yoab okoku loka Seruia da.”
Kosodi ekabaka Solomon aiyapo elimit EJAKAIT ebe, “Keswamak Edeke eoŋ kwaŋin ka adepar da, arai mam Adoniya elimunit akirot ŋin itia akeijar.
Aso do, kwape ejaria EJAKAIT, loabu keticat eoŋ, kesiboik oicoloŋ loka Daudi papaka, loabu kadumak eoŋ ekal, kwape kisumunio, abeit eario Adoniya lolo.”
Kijuka ekabaka Solomon kakan naka Benaia okoku loka Yekoiada; kinom ŋes, kotwana.
Kwaŋin kireŋea Solomon Abiatar kinyek araun esasedoti mama ejai EJAKAIT; tetere itodolikini akirot naka EJAKAIT, naabu kiner nuka ekek loka Eli koSilo.
Aponi kolimokinai ekabaka Solomon ebe, “Aker Yoab owema loka EJAKAIT, ido koany, ejai ariri ketem.” Kosodi Solomon aijukar Benaia okoku loka Yekoiada ebe, “Kolot, koar ŋes.”

Kobu Benaia owema loka EJAKAIT, kotema ŋes atiar, “Inera ekabaka kwanata ebe, ‘Kolom.’ ” Kotema atiar, “Mam; konye atwanikini ne.” Kinyak Benaia akirot mama ejai ekabaka ebe, “Ebala Yoab kwaŋin, ido kaboŋok eoŋ kwaŋin.”
Kotema ekabaka ŋes atiar, “Kiswama kwape ebalar, koar ŋes, konuk ŋes; tetere ilemari aokot nuabu Yoab kobuko komam akirot, kamakaŋ, ka ekek loka papaka.

Kitebeik EJAKAIT aokotoke akouke elopet, naarai abu kinom ituŋa iarei luedolito ka luejok adepar ŋes, koar kes kekileŋ, komam papaka Daudi ejeni, kes Abiner okoku loka Ner, ekapolon loka ajore naka Isirael, ka Amasa okoku loka Yeter, ekapolon loka ajore naka Yuda.

Kwaŋin kobeikis aokotokec akou naka Yoab, kakwes da nuka aurike ikar kere: konye mama ejai Daudi, ka aurike, ka ekekike, ka eicoloŋoke loka ajakanut, ejaun ainapakin naebuni kama ejai EJAKAIT ikar kere.”
Kosodi Benaia okoku loka Yekoiada alosit, kinom ŋes, koar: konukakinai togoke modiŋ.
Kodakak ekabaka Benaia okoku loka Yekoiada ayait ajore aiboisike: kodakak ekabaka Sadok esasedoti aibois naka Abiatar.
Naarai apaaran nailomaria, adokar aguurut Kiduron, kojenu cut ebe abeit itwani; ebeikinete aokotokon akoukon.”
Kotema Simei ekabaka atiar, “Iner ejok: kwape ebalar ejakaitika ekabaka, iswamai kwaŋin ekonikejaanakinan.” Kiboienenei Simei ko Yerusalem apaarasia nuipu.
Konyou Simei, kopetak lupetan asigiriake, kolot Gat mama ejai Akis, amoot ikebulesin: kolot Simei, koyau ikebulesin koGat.
Aponi kolimokinai Solomon ebe anyou Simei koYerusalem alot Gat, Aboŋu da.

Kijuka ekabaka konyarau Simei, kotema ŋes atiar, “Mam abu kesiyapo jo kolimite EJAKAIT, ketogogoŋ da kamakon ebe, ‘Kojen cut ebe apaaran ŋin nailomaria, ilosi nenice, abeit itwani?’ Ibu ijo kolimok eoŋ ebe, ‘Akirot nainera ijo ejok.’
Aso kanukinyo mam ibu kidar aiyaposit naka EJAKAIT, ka aicorakinet naabu kecorak jo?”
Ido kotema ekabaka Simei atiar, “ijeni ijo aronis naipupi otaukon, nakiswamakinit ijo Daudi papaka: kanuka ŋun inyakakini EJAKAIT akonironis akoukon.
Konye isirereŋio ekabaka Solomon, iticasio da eicoloŋ loka Daudi kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT ikar kere.”
Aso kicorak ekabaka Benaia okoku loka Yekoiada; koloma, kinom ŋes, kotwana.
Korau Solomon ekamuran loka Parao ekabaka loko Misiri, koyaŋa akoku naka Parao, koyau ŋes ore loka Daudi, aitodol nekedaunia aiduk eketogo, ka etogo loka EJAKAIT, ka arwatat naka Yerusalem airimor.
Konye apotu ituŋa koinakis asuban kaiboisio nuiceleleete, naarai mam ber adukokinitai ekiror loka EJAKAIT etogo kiton apaarasia ŋun.
Kolot ekabaka Gibeon ainakin asuban kaŋina; naarai kerai ŋin aibois naicelelei nakapolon: abu Solomon koinak ainakineta nuicweio alukumit kotem kaŋol.
Kitaanyikin EJAKAIT Solomon koGibeon kotoma airujasit kuare: kotema Edeke atiar, “Kilipai nakainakini jo.”

Kotema Solomon atiar, “Ibu ijo kitodik ekejaanakinanikon Daudi papaka asianut naepol, kwape aloseneneo kakonyenekon kabeit, kadolit, ka etau loetenara kamakon; kiŋadakinit ijo ŋes asianut na naepol, koinak ŋes okoku aiboikin oicoloŋoke loka ajakanut, kwape ejaar lolo.
Kwana da, wu EJAKAIT Ekadeke, idakak ijo ekejaanakinanikon araun ekabaka aibois naka Daudi papaka: arai eoŋ ikoku yenididi; mam ajeni alomar karaida alomun.
Ejai da ekejaanakinanikon kidiŋ otuŋakon luibu koseu, ituŋa luipu lumam epedorio aimar karaida aibil kes kanuka aipues.
Aso koinak ekejaanakinanikon etau lokapirianut atubokin ikonituŋa, tetere atiaki eoŋ ajokis ka aronis; naarai iŋai epedori atubokin ikonituŋa lu luipu?”
Kitojok EJAKAIT akirot ŋin naelipit Solomon.
Kotema Edeke ŋes atiar, “Naarai ilipit ijo akirot ŋin, komam ilipit aibut ikar luipu; karaida ailip abar, karaida ailip aijar naka lukasurupokon; konye ilipit apirianut aitiak itubesia;
Koany, eswama kwape ejaar akonikirot; koany, kainak jo etau lokacoa ka apirianut; emamei lem sek loeriakas kajo, mam da enyouni ece atupakin jo loeriakakinos kajo.
Kainak da numam jo ilipit, abar, ka ayoŋio, mam ejaunos kokabakan lueriakuunete kajo apaarasiakon kere.
Ido arai ilosenenei korotinika, koricenenei ikakisila ka aicorakinetaka, kwape aloseneneo Daudi papakon, ŋes konyet eyatakinia apaarasiakon.”
Kobala aberu adiopet ebe, “Wu ekajakait, kiperi eoŋ ka aberu na ediopetogo; abu eoŋ kedou ikoku kojai ŋesi da togo.
Kosodi kanen, ketuboros apaarasia auni nakadau aidoun, kidoun aberu na da; kija isio nepepe; komamei icetuŋanan kasio kotogo, dimarai isio aarei bonik kotogo.
Kotwana ikoku yenika aberu kana kuare; naarai abu ŋesi kicikak.
Konyou ŋesi kidiŋebai, koyaŋa ikakoku kosiepika nakejotoo akejaanakinanikon, kiperik atorobuke, kiperik ikokuke yenatwanit atorobuka.
Naanyounia eoŋ tupuruc aitanak ikakoku, koany, etwanit: konye kadau airere ŋes tupuruc, koany, mam arai ikakoku, yenauriei eoŋ.”

Kotema aberu ace atiar, “Mam; konye yenikajaran ŋes ikakoku, ka yenikatwan erai ikonikoku.” Kotema ya da ebe, “Mam; konye yenikatwan erai ikonikoku, ka yenikajaran ŋes ikakoku.” Kineras kwaŋin kakonyen nuka ekabaka.
Kosodi ekabaka atemar atiar, “Ebala adiopet ebe, ‘Yen ŋes ikakoku yenejari, ikonikoku da yenetwanit’: ka nace da ebala ebe, ‘Mam; konye ikonikoku yenetwanit, ka ikakoku yenejari.’ ”
Kotema ekabaka atiar, “Koomikinai ekileŋ.” Koinut ekabaka ekileŋ.
Kotema ekabaka atiar, “Kotiak ikoku yenejari irwan aarei, koinak adiopet atutubet ka nace da atutubet.”

Kosodi aberu nakerai ikoku yenejari yenike einer kekabaka, naarai arieba noi eketau ikekoku, kotema atiar, “Wu ekajakait, koinak ŋes ikoku yenejari, konye sirikiar ŋes.” Konye kobala nace ebe, “Mam eraun yenika, karaida yenikon; kotiak ŋes.”
Kosodi ekabaka aboŋokin ebe, “Koinak ŋin ikoku yenejari, konye sirikiar ŋes: ŋin ŋes totoke.”
Kopup Isirael kere nuka etube loatubi ekabaka; koyoŋito ekabaka; naarai apotu koanyut ebe ejai acoa naka Edeke kaŋes airab.
Kerai Solomon ekabaka loka Isirael kere.
Lu kes ikapolok luajaas kaŋes; Asaria okoku loka Sadok, esasedoti;
Elikorep ka Akiya, odwe luka Sisa, ikalanin; Yekosapat okoku loka Akilud, ekesiitonokinan.
Kopolokinite Benaia okoku loka Yekoiada ajore; keraas Sadok ka Abiatar isasedotin.
Kopolokinite Asaria okoku loka Natan ijaka; kerai Sabud okoku loka Natan esasedoti, epapero loka ekabaka.
Kopolokinite Akisar lukokal: kopolokinite Adoniram okoku loka Abuda esolo.
Kejaas Solomon ijaka itomon ka luarei luapolokinito Isirael kere, luadumanakinete ekabaka ka lukokaleke inyamat: ebusakinit ŋinituŋanan ayaunun inyamat ediopelap ŋolikaru.
Lu kes ikiroriakec: Ben-kur, kakwap nakiukon naka Epuraim:
Ben-deker, koMakas, ka Saalubim, ka Betsemes, ka Elon-bet-kanan:
Ben-kesed, koArubot; ewaike Soko, ka akwap kere naka Keper:
Ben-abinadab, kakwap kere naicelelei naka Dor; amanyit ŋesi Tapat akoku naka Solomon:
Baana okoku loka Akilud, koTaanak ka Megido, ka Bet-sean kere naedunyas ka Saretan, kwap Yesureel, anyoun koBet-sean kiton Abel-mekola adepar juwai Yokumeam:

Bengeber, koRamot-gilead; ewaike ireria luka Yair okoku loka Manase, luejaas koGilead; ewaike akwap naka Arugob, naejai Basan, ireria akaisakanykape lukapolok lukejaas arwatatin ka itiketa luka aisinit.
Akinadab okoku loka Ido, koMakanaim.
Akimaas, koNaputali; amanyit ŋesi Basemat akoku naka Solomon.
Baana okoku loka Kusai, koAser ka Bealot.
Yekosapat okoku loka Parua, koIsakar.
Simei okoku loka Ela, koBenyamin.
Geber okoku loka Uri, kakwap naka Gilead, akwap naka Sikon ekabaka loka Imorain ka naka Og ekabaka loka Basan; kerai ŋesi ejakait ediopet bon kakwap.
Kirum Solomon ajakanuto kere anyoun koCor kiton akwap naka Ipilisitian, kiton oikor da loko Misiri: koyaununete ainakineta, kijaanakis Solomon apaarasia kere nuka aijarake.
Inyamat luka Solomon luka adiopepaaran keraas aitemisio akaisauni nuka akiria nuidicic, ka aitemisio akaisakanykape nuka akiria;
Imoŋin itomon luetumito, ka imoŋin akaisaarei lukoronyia, ka amerekekin akwatat, kogelara amiamia, amorio ka imalin ka akweny nuetumito.
Naarai abu kirum akwap kere kiton oCor Eupurat, anyoun koTipisa kiton Gasa, ikabakan da kere kiton oCor Eupurat: kejai ainapakin owaitin kere airimor ŋes.
Kiboie Yuda ka Isirael inapakina, ŋinituŋanan kwap kemusabibuke ka etinike, anyoun koDan kiton Beer-seba, apaarasia kere nuka Solomon.
Kejaas Solomon agolai alukumin akaisaoŋon nuka ibalasin luka agalinike, ka ikebwanenok ilukumin itomon ka luarei.
Apotu ijaka ŋul kodumanakinete ekabaka Solomon inyamat, nepepe kaŋul kere da luapote omesa loka ekabaka Solomon, ŋinituŋanan olapake: mam ibore kere yenabu kokurwok.
Koyaununete da esairi, ka anya nuka ibalasin ka ibalasin luetiroko noi aibois nakejaas ijaka, ŋinituŋanan kwape ketubokinitere.
Abu Edeke koinak Solomon acoa ka ajenun naepol noi noi, ka apoloor naka etau, kwape kasiŋe naejai ariri naka aŋolol.
Kiteleka acoa naka Solomon acoa naka idwe kere lukoto, ka acoa kere da nako Misiri.
Naarai aco ŋesi aitelekar ituŋa kere; aitelekar Etan Eserakit, ka Keman, ka Kalukol, ka Darada, odwe luka Makol: kisiarakin eemutuke atekerin kere nuerimorito.
Kiner ŋesi awaragasia alukumin auni: emwaasi ikososineike elukumit ka ikany.
Kiner ŋesi nuka ikito, anyoun kores loejai Lebanon kiton esop Ioebwanuni karwatat: kiner da nuka itiaŋ, ka akweny, ka iboro lueliatos, ka iboro lukecor.
Kopotu lukatekerin kere akiirar acoa naka Solomon, lukokabakan kere kere luka akwap, luapupunito nuka acoake.
Kijuka Solomon mama ejai Kiram, kobala ebe,
“ijeni ijo kwape mam kepedoria papaka Daudi adukokin ekiror loka EJAKAIT Ekedeke etogo, kanuka ijiisio luerigaunito ŋes kaŋoliwai, aitodol neebwaikinia EJAKAIT kes kwap kakejeneke.
Konye kwana kesiyeŋ EJAKAIT Ekadeke eoŋ kaŋoliwai; emamei lokasurup, karaida aronis.
Ido koany, eneru eoŋ adukokin ekiror loka EJAKAIT Ekadeke etogo, kwape abalar EJAKAIT Daudi papaka ebe, ‘Okokukon, loesiboikini oicoloŋokon aiboisikon, ŋes edukokini ekakiror etogo.’

Aso do kicorak ijo kes ajepakin eoŋ ikito luka eres koLebanon; ejaununos ikakejaanakinak kikonikejaanakinak; kainakini eoŋ jo eropit loka ikonikejaanakinak kwape ejaatar nuinera ijo kere: naarai ijeni ebe emamei kotomakosi loepiriana aijep ikito kwape Isidonin.”
Kosodi kanen, kepupu Kiram akiro nuka Solomon, kiyalamikin noi, kobala ebe, “Kituritete EJAKAIT lolo, loabu koinak Daudi okoku lokacoa airum ituŋa lu luipu.”
Kijuka Kiram mama ejai Solomon ebe, “Apup ŋun nukijukakinit eoŋ: eswamaenenei nuikoto ijo kere nuka akito nuka eres, ka akito nuka eberos.

Eyaunete ikakejaanakinak kes koLebanon kiton aŋolol: etolosi kes eenen kikaleleos kaŋolol kiton aibois nakiseikini eoŋ, ecorakini kolacakinai ŋina, ijo da ijaun kes: ido itodoli ijo nuakoto kere arai kidumanak lukokaleka inyamat.”
Kosodi Kiram koinak Solomon akito nuka eres ka akito nuka eberos kwape ejaar ekeipud kere.
Abu Solomon da koinak Kiram aitemisio alukumin akaisaarei nuka akima araun inyamat luka lukokaleke, ka aitemisio akaisaarei nuka akinyet naecuunitai: koinanakini Solomon Kiram kwaŋin ŋolikaru.
Abu EJAKAIT koinak Solomon acoa, kwape esumunio; kinapakinos Kiram ka Solomon; kitutukoto kesi kere iarei.
Kitelem Solomon Isirael kere esolo; esolo ŋol emwaasi ituŋa ilukumin akaisauni.
Kijuka kes Lebanon, ŋolilap ilukumin itomon emeanakinos: kedaununete Lebanon elap ediopet, kosodi ore ilapio iarei: kopolokinite Adoniram esolo.
Kejaas Solomon luebwokito abwokon ilukumin akaisakanykaarei, ka ilukumin akaisakanykauni luajepete koroŋan:
Kogelara ijaka luka Solomon luapolokinito aswam, ilukumin iuni ka akwat auni, luayaito ituŋa lueswamaete aswam.
Kicorak ekabaka, kobokata amor nuepolok, nuka akais nuipu, apetanakin apetetait naka etogo kamor nuikeitoi.
Apotu ikadukok luka Solomon ka ikadukok luka Kiram ka Igebalin kitetenata kes, kitemonokis akito ka amor adukio etogo.

Kosodi kanen kokaru loka akwat aoŋon ka akaisakanykauni, akaulo ka idwe luka Isirael anyoun kakwap nako Misiri, kokaru lokiwoŋonet loka airumit naka Solomon Isirael, kolap Sib, loerai elap lokiareit, kogeu ŋesi aiduk etogo loka EJAKAIT.
Etogo loadukokini ekabaka Solomon EJAKAIT, kerai aojauke ikubitin
Agola nalomaret koiŋaren keyekalu loka etogo, kerai aojauke ikubitin akaisaarei, kwape kejaar alalau naka etogo; alalauke koiŋaren ketogo ikubitin itomon.
Kiswamak etogo adirisan nuilokonyikinito.
Kicul agolai arwatat airimor, arwatatin nuka etogo airimor, nuka eyekalu ka nuka aibois nakalaunan noi: kiswama agolai airimor:

Ŋinigola nakokwap alal ikubitin ikany, ka nakokidiŋ alal ikubitin ikanykape, ka nakiwuniet alal ikubitin ikanykaarei: naarai kitidisiarite abures naka arwatat naka etogo airimor tetere mam abaoi elomarete arwatatin nuka etogo.
Naadukere etogo, aponi kodukoi kamor nuetemokinitoi kaneabokere kes: amamei anyul karaida aep karaida adiosuat akiirario kotogo, nakedukere ŋes.
Kejai ekek lolomaret agolai nukokidiŋ owai lokoteten loka etogo: kodokanarete kadoketa nuerimonorete kiton agolai nukokidiŋ, anyoun kanukokidiŋ da kiton nakiwuniet.
Koduk ŋesi kwaŋin etogo, kodau; korapa etogo kakito nuaburok ka akito nuepadalalas nuka eres.
Koduk ŋesi agolai airimor etogo kere, ŋinigola amukururuke ikubitin ikany: kidokokis agolai kakito nuka eres.
Kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ejai Solomon ebe,
“Nuka etogo lo loiduki ijo, arai ilosenenei kokisilaka kitodoli itubesiaka, koricenenei aicorakinetaka kere alosenen kakes; ŋes konyet eticasia akakirot kamakon, naabu kalimok papakon Daudi.
Eboienenei kodwe luka Isirael, komam ajalenenei ikatuŋa Isirael.”
Koduk Solomon kwaŋin etogo, kodau.
Koduk arwatatin nukotoma nuka etogo kabaoi nuka eres: anyoun kokwap ketogo aitodol arwatatin nukokuju, korapia kes toma kakito: korapia kwap ketogo kabaoi nuka eberos.
Koduk ŋes ikubitin akaisaarei to ketogo kabaoi nuka eres anyoun kokwap aitodol arwatatin: kodukok kes toma, araun neinerenenere akirot, araun aibois nakalaunan noi.
Etogo da, ŋes eyekalu, koiŋaren neinerenenere akirot kerai aojauke ikubitin akaisaoŋon.
Kejaas akito nuka eres toma togo, nuigiritai kaputosia nuka ituol ka atur nuelakara: kere keraas eres; mam amor ketakanete.
Kitemok aibois neinerenenere akirot kokidiŋ togo toma, asipokin asaduku naka aitutuket naka EJAKAIT.
Toma aibois nainerenenere akirot kejai apak aojauke ikubitin akaisaarei, alalauke ikubitin akaisaarei, amukururuke ikubitin akaisaarei; kiladaa kesabu kaloelai: korapia etem kakito nuka eres.
Kiladaa Solomon etogo kotoma kesabu kaloelai: kitotor irikoi luka esabu koiŋaren kaibois neinerenenere akirot; kiladaa kesabu.
Kiladaa ŋesi etogo kere kesabu, aitodol neadaunor etogo kere: kiladaa etem da kere lokejai toma aibois neinerenenere akiro kesabu.
Abebenok adiopet naka ekerubi ikubitin ikany, abebenok ace naka ekerubi ikubitin ikany: anyoun kosaŋe loka abebenok adiopet kiton osaŋe loka abebenok ace kejaas ikubitin itomon.
Ekerubi ece da ikubitin itomon: ikerubin kere keraas luka aitemis adiopet ka aput adiopet.
Amukurur naka ekerubi ediopet ikubitin itomon, kwape kwaŋin da ekerubi ece.

Kosipok ikerubin togo lokotoma: kigararaete abebenoka nuka ikerubin tetere etirorit abebenok adiopet arwatat adiopet, etirorit da abebenok naka ekerubi ece arwatat epuai; kiriamakina abebenokakec kidiŋ togo.
Kiladaa ikerubin kesabu.
Kigir arwatatin kere nuka etogo airimor kaputosia nuigiritai nuka ikerubin ka idukudukun, ka atur nuelakara, toma kokiŋa da.
Kiladaa kwap ketogo kesabu, toma kokiŋa da.
Kiswamau ikirigin iarei luka akito nuka eseitun; kigir kes kaputosia nuigiritai nuka ikerubin ka idukudukun ka atur nuelakara, kiladaa kes kesabu; kibwaik esabu okerubin odukudukun da.
Kiswamak da neelomanarere oyekalu ategerio nuka akito nuka eseitun, idiopet kooŋon yenika arwatat;
Ka ikirigin iarei luka akito nuka eberos; asukonokinos atutubeta aarei nuka ekirigi ediopet, asukonokinos da atutubeta aarei nuka ekirigi ece.
Kigirak ikerubin ka idukudukun ka atur nuelakara: kiladaa kes kesabu neigiritai.
Koduk alaro nakotoma kikokoron iuni luka amor nuekee, ka ekokoro loka abaoi nuka eres.
Kosipokinai apetetait naka etogo loka EJAKAIT kokaru lokiwoŋonet, kolap Sibo
Kokaru lokitomonet ka lodiopet, kolap Bul, ŋes elap lokikanyetekauni, kodaun etogo katutubetake kere, kwape ajaar aputoke. Kwaŋin kodau ikar ikanykaarei eduki.

Naarai koduk etogo loka ikito luka Lebanon; aojauke ikubitin akwatat, alalauke ikubitin akaisakany, amukururuke ikubitin akaisauni, kotoma okokoron iwoŋon luka ipirin luka eres, ka abaoi nuka eres kopirin.
Koraparai kakito nuka eres kokuju agolai akaisaoŋon ka nukany, nuajaas kuju kipirin: ŋolikokoro atomon ka nukany.
Ajaas apedon okokoron iuni, ido kidokonokino apedon kokokoron iuni.
Aojau ka alalau naka ikekia ariakanara, naka apedon da ariakanara: ido kidokonokino apedon kokokoron iuni.
Kiswamau agola neelomarere kipirin; aojauke ikubitin akaisakany, alalauke ikubitin akaisauni; neelomarere da koiŋareneke; ipirin ka adoketa koiŋareneke.
Ŋul kere keraas nuka amor nuka akais nuipu, amor nuekee, kwape ajaar aitemis, kotuboi kisumenon, toma kokiŋa da, anyoun kapetetait, kiton oswi, kwaŋin kiŋa da kiton alaro nakapolon.
Kerai apetetait naka amor nuka akais nuipu, amor nuepolok, amor nuka ikubitin itomon, ka amor nuka ikubitin ikanykauni.
Kejaas amor nuka akais nuipu kuju da, amor nuekee, kwape ajaar aitemis, ka akito nuka eres.
Alaro da naerimorit kejaas ikokoron iuni luka amor nuekee, ka ekokoro loka abaoi nuka eres; koputos kalaro nakotoma naka etogo loka EJAKAIT, ka agola neelomarere togo.

Kerai ŋesi okoku loka aberu napuserut naka ateker naka Naputali, kerai papake etuŋanan loka Turo, ekeswaman aisinit; eleleba ŋes acoa ka aijen ka apirianut, aswam aswamisinei kere nuka aisinit. Kobu ŋesi mama ejai ekabaka Solomon, kiswama akeswam kere.
Kiswamau akwes aarei nuka aisinit naecalara, asipokin kuju opirin: amukurur naka akou adiopet ikubitin ikany, aojao da naka akou ace ikubitin ikany.
Ajaas iboyan luka aswam nailokonyitai, ka irikoi luka aswam naeojitai luka akwes nukejaas kuju opirin, eboi loka akou adiopet, ka eboi loka akou nace.
Kiswamau kwaŋin akamamagan: kokokoron iarei airimor eboi ediopet arapiar akou nakejai kuju opir; kiswamak akou ace da kwaŋin.
Araas akwes nuajaas kuju opirin luajaas agola neelomarere nuka aswam bala nakapecel, ikubitin iwoŋon.
Ajaas akwes da kuju opirin, kidunyasi kakoik naedunyas kiboyan: emwaasi akamamagan akwat aarei, kokokoron airimor ŋinikou.
Kosipok ipirin agola neelomarere oyekalu: kosipok epir lokoteten, komaik ekekiror Yakin: kosipok epir lokokediany, komaik ekekiror Boas.
Kejai aswam nakapecel kuju opirin; kodau kwaŋin aswam naka ipirin.
Kojaas ituol luerimorito ŋes kwap kereret alukun, ikubitin itomon, kirimorite aŋolol: kojaas ituol okokoron iarei kocala kere nepepe kotataete.

Kidokokino omoŋin itomon ka luarei, kosesenete iuni ari naka agolitomei, kosesenete iuni ari nakoto, kosesenete iuni ari naka eŋalakimak, kosesenete iuni ari nakokide: kidokokino aŋolol kujukec, kojaas iwosikec toma.
Aburesuke alalau naka akan: erereteke kiswamai bala ereret loka atido, bala aturot naka apecel: abu kigau akaalakanya alukumin aarei.
Kiswamau aicegeria atomon nuka aisinit; aojau naka aiceger adiopet ikubitin iwoŋon, alalauke ikubitin iwoŋon, amukururuke ikubitin iuni.
Ikote aicegeria neta: kojaas abaoi; kojaas abaoi kidiŋ kanuiriikino:
Kojaas iŋatunyo, ka Imoŋin, ka ikerubin abaoi nuajaas kidiŋ kanuiriikino; kojai aigaŋetait kuju kanuiriikino: kwap kiŋatunyo ka imoŋin kojaas lueojitai luejekosi.
Kojai ŋiniiceger akokoron aoŋon nuka aisinit, ka nuisibelonokinete nuka aisinit: kojaas aigaŋeta nuka akalaya kagoriake aoŋon: kocalara aigaŋeta, kojaas lueojitai kosiep loka ŋiniigaŋet.
Aitukuke toma aboko kerai ekubit adiopet kuju: kolukuna aitukuke kwape aswam naka aikit, ekubit ediopet ka atutubet: kojaas agirai aitukuke, abaoikec keraas nueriakas nuitenara komam elukuna.
Kojaas akokoron aoŋon kwap kabaoi: kojaas nuisibelonokinete akokoron aiceger: amukurur naka akokoro ekubit ka atutubet naka ekubit.
