Aswam naka akokoron korai bala aswam naka akokoro naka agali: nuisibelonokinetakec, ka ipirinokec, ka airimetakec, akidiŋotokec da, kere kecalara.
Kojaas aigaŋeta aoŋon agoria aoŋon nuka ŋiniiceger: keraas aigaŋeta nuka aiceger alopet.
Ajai aieunet kuju kaiceger amukururuke atutubet naka ekubit: akaninike ka abaoike kuju kaiceger koraas nuka adiopeswam.
Kigir ŋesi ikerubin, ka iŋatunyo, ka idukudukun, neepadalalas akaninike ka abaoike, kwape ajaar apakikec, ka lueojitai airimor.
Kiswamau aicegeria atomon nuikote nen: kojaas kes kere otatae ediopet, ka aitemis adiopet, ka aput adiopet.
Kosipok aicegeria, akany owai lokoteten loka etogo, ka akany owai lokokediany loka etogo: kosipok aŋolol owai lokokide loka etogo asesen eŋalakimak.
Kiswamau Kiram akalaya, ka iŋitia, ka atanyia. Kwaŋin kodau Kiram aswam kere naeswamakini ekabaka Solomon kotogo loka EJAKAIT:
Ipirin iarei, ka atiboi aarei nuka akwes nuajaas kuju opirin; ka iboyan iarei arapia atiboi nuka akwes nuajaas kuju opirin;
Ka akamamagan akwat aoŋon nuka iboyan iarei; ikokoron iarei luka akamamagan kaŋoliboi, arapia atiboi aarei nuka akwes nuajaas kuju opirin:
Ka aicegeria atomon, ka akalaya atomon nuka aicegeria;
Aŋolol adiopet, ka imoŋin itomon ka luarei kwap kaŋolol.
Kocala ekabaka kes kApuuton naka Yorodan, kolupe loejai kidiŋ Sukot ka Saretan.
Kinyek Solomon ainiŋ iboro kere, naarai epu kes adepar: mam apedorit adumun alaŋiru naka aisinit.
Ka ipirin lukatalai luka esabu loelai, ikany owai lokoteten, ka ikany owai lokokediany, koiŋaren neinerenenere akirot; atur da, ka atalai, ka arideta, nuka esabu;

Ka akolin, ka aitudeŋeta, ka atanyia, ka akaalei, ka atubake nuigaete ekurwon, nuka esabu loelai; ka ipatai luka ikirigin luka etogo lokotoma, aibois nakalaunan noi, ka ikirigin luka etogo, ŋes eyekalu, kere luka esabu.
Kodaun kwaŋin aswam kere naeswamai ekabaka Solomon kotogo loka EJAKAIT, Koyau Solomon iboro luabu Daudi papake kotiaku, epuesa, ka esabu, ka iboro, kibwaik kes aiŋadisia nuka etogo loka EJAKAIT.
Kotukonokinos ituŋa kere luka Isirael mama ejai ekabaka Solomon opucit, kolap Etanim, ŋes elap lokikanyetekaarei.
Kopotu imakio kere luka Isirael da, kodakut isasedotin asaduku.
Koyaut asaduku naka EJAKAIT, ka ewema loka airiamunun, ka iboro kere lukalaunak luajaas owema; kes iboro luapotu isasedotin ka Ilebin koyaut.

Kosodi ekabaka Solomon ka ekodet kere loka Isirael luatukonokinos mama ejai ŋesi, ajaas kaŋes kiŋaren kasaduku, koinakis amerekekin ka imoŋin araun asuban numam epedorio alimun karaida aimarun kanuka aipues.
Kitolomasi isasedotin asaduku naka aitutuket naka EJAKAIT aiboisike, toma aibois neinerenenere akirot naka etogo, aibois nakalaunan noi, kwap kabebenoka nuka ikerubin.
Naarai kigararas ikerubin abebenokakec kuju aibois naka asaduku, korapias ikerubin asaduku ka adaketake.
Kewojak adaketa tetere etakani esaŋekec kaibois nakalaunan koiŋaren kaibois neinerenenere akirot; konye mam ketakanete kokiŋa; ejaas nepenen, kiton lolo.
Amamei ibore kotoma asaduku dimarai amor aarei nuabu Musa kibwaik koKoreb, nakitutukio EJAKAIT aitutuket kaidwe luka Isirael, nakelomuniata kakwap nako Misiri.
Kosodi kanen, kedaut isasedotin alomun kaibois nakalaunan, kilelebun edou togo loka EJAKAIT.
Mam isasedotin apotu kopedosi aibwo aijaanakin kanuka edou: naarai kilelebun aibuses naka EJAKAIT etogo loka EJAKAIT.
Abeit kadukok jo etogo aiboikin, Aibois naiboieneno ijo ikar kere.”
Kibelokin ekabaka, kilipak ekodet kere loka Isirael arereŋ: kobwo ekodet kere loka Isirael.
Kotema ŋesi atiar, “Kituritete EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael, loabu kiner kakeituk mama ejai Daudi papaka, ido kitodol da kakekan ebe,
‘Ageun kapaaran naketolomunia ikatuŋa Isirael koMisiri, mam abu kaseu ere katekerin kere nuka Isirael aiduk etogo, tetere ejaun nen ekakiror; konye abu kaseu Daudi apolokin ikatuŋa Isirael.’
Abu Daudi papaka koomite kotauke adukokin ekiror loka EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael, etogo.
Konye abu EJAKAIT kotema Daudi papaka atiar, ‘Naarai iwomit ijo kotaukon adukokin ekakirot etogo, iswama ejok aomit kotaukon:
Konye mam jo iduki etogo; konye okokukon, loelomuni kakuanakon, ŋes edukokini ekakiror etogo.’
Etodol EJAKAIT akekirot naabu kiner; naarai anyou eoŋ aibois naka Daudi papaka, eboikini oicoloŋ loka Isirael, kwape esumunia EJAKAIT, adukok ekiror loka EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael, etogo.
Nepenen da ebwaik aibois naka asaduku, naejai aitutuket naka EJAKAIT tomake, naetutuki ŋesi kalukapapaawok, nakitolomunia kes kakwap nako Misiri.”

Kobala ebe, “Wu EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael, emamei Edeke loiputosi kajo, kuju toma akuj, arai kokwap kakwap; loitodolenenei aitutuket ka aitim kikonikejaanakinak luelosenenete kakonyenekon kikecetauon kere:
Loitodolik ekonikejaanakinan Daudi papaka ŋun nuibu kisumun ŋes: eebo, ibu kiner kaitukukon, itodolo da kakanikon, kwape ejaatar lolo.

Aso, wu EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael, kitodolik ekejaanakinanikon Daudi papaka ŋun nuibu kisumun ŋes ebe, ‘Mam kimamikini ijo etuŋanan loiboikin oicoloŋ loka Isirael kakonyeneka kwape ilosenenoo ijo kakonyeneka.’
Aso do, wu Edeke loka Isirael, keŋaiŋait, kitogogoŋoi akonikirot, nakilimokini ekonikejaanakinan Daudi papaka.
Konye kocam ijo ailip naka ekonikejaanakinan, ka aiŋaiŋake, wu EJAKAIT Ekadeke, akiirar aimony ka ailip nailipi ekonikejaanakinan kakonyenekon lolo:
Kokwenyenenete akonikonyen asesen etogo lo apaaran ka akuar, ŋes aibois nakolo ilimit ebe, ‘Ejaenena nen ekakiror’: akiirar ailip nailipi ekonikejaanakinan kaibois kana.
Kiiranari da aiŋaiŋa naka ekonikejaanakinan, naka ikonituŋa Isirael da nailipenenata kesi kaibois kana: eebo, kiiranari ijo ijai toma akuj aiboisikon: ido naipupunio, kisionie.
“Arai kediak etuŋanan kama ejai eidunyeteke, kisiyapoikinoi aiyaposit, ebuni ŋesi aiyapo koiŋaren ketemukon togo lo;
Kopupununei do ijo ijai toma akuj, kiswama, kotubok ikonikejaanakinak, kiteteleka ikaronon, aitoboŋikin ekepone akouke; kitojok da ikadoliton, ainakin ŋes kwape ejaar adoliteke.
Kopupununei do ijo ijai toma akuj, kisionie aronis naka ikonituŋa Isirael, kinyaku kes bobo akwap nakiinakinit lukapapakec.
“Naegolokinere akuj, komamei akiru, naarai adiakasi kamakon; arai ilipete kiteete aibois na, kolimorete ekonikiror, kibelokinos anyoun karonisikec, nakiticania ijo kes;

Kopupununei ijo ijai toma akuj, kisionie aronis naka ikonikejaanakinak ka naka ikonituŋa Isirael, nakisisianakinia ijo kes erot loejok loibusakinit kes aloseneno; kitetep akiru akwapukon, naibu koinak ikonituŋa araun airumet.
ŋiniilip ka ŋinikiŋaiŋa nailipi ituŋanan kere, arai ikonituŋa Isirael kere, yenejeni ŋinituŋanan atular nakotauke, korio akekanin mama ejai etogo lo:
Kopupununei do ijo ijai roma akuj aiboisikon, kisionie, kiswama, koropi ŋinituŋanan kwape ejaatar iponesioke, yenijeni ijo etauke; (naarai ijo, ijo bon ijeni itauon luka idwe luka ituŋa kere:)
Tetere kiyoŋete jo apaarasia kere nuiboienenoto kesi kakwap nakiinakinit lukapapaakosi.
“Bobo da nuka imoit, yenimere yenika ikonituŋa Isirael, naenyounio ŋesi kakwap naelwana kanuka ekonikiror;
(Naarai iirarete kesi nuka ekonikiror lokapolon, nuka akanikon nakagogoŋon, nuka akanikon naerioro;) naebunio ŋesi ailip kitei etogo lo:

Kopupununei ijo ijai toma akuj aiboisikon, kiswama kwape ejaatar kere nukiworoi imoit jo; tetere ejenunete atekerin kere nuka akwap ekonikiror, koyoŋito jo, kwape kiyoŋitotor ikonituŋa Isirael, tetere ejenunete ebe emaikinitai etogo lo loadukit eoŋ ekonikiror.
“Arai kelomasi ituŋakon aitiji lukasurupokec, korot kere loijukari ijo kes, ilipete EJAKAIT kiteete ere lokiseuni ijo, kiteete da etogo loadukokinit eoŋ ekonikiror:
Kopupununei do jo ijai toma akuj akecekilip, ka akeceiŋaiŋa, kisigalik akecekirot.
Arai keomoomata kesi kakwap naejoreoritai, kibelokinos bobo, kiŋaiŋaata ijo kakwap naka ŋul kalukijoreorete kes, kobalasi ebe, ‘Kidiaka isio, kiswama nukepali, kikwaik erono’;

Arai keboŋut mama ijai ijo kikecetauon kere, kaijarakec kere kakwap naka lukasurupokec, luejoreorete kes, kilipete jo kiteete akwapukec, nakiinakinit lukapapaakec, ere lokiseuni ijo, ka etogo loadukokinit ekonikiror:
Kopupununei do ijo akeceilip ka akeceiŋaiŋa ijai toma akuj aiboisikon, kisigalik akecekirot;
Kisionie ikonituŋa luapotu kodiakasi kamakon, ka aibucaretakec kere nuebucarete kamakon; koinak kes aitimio kakonyen nuka ŋul kaluejoreorete kes, tetere itimete kes:
Naarai eraas ikonituŋa, ka airumetekon, naitolomuni kolo koMisiri, anyoun kokidiŋ oupa loka asuat:
Kokwenyenenete akonikonye aiŋaiŋa naka ekonikejaanakinan, ka aiŋaiŋa naka ikonituŋa Isirael, kiiranari kes naemonyananata mamakon.
Naarai ibu kotiak kes katekerin kere nuka akwap, araun airumetekon, kwape ibalar kama ka Musa ekonikejaanakinan, naitolomunia lukapapaakosi koMisiri, wu EJAKAIT Edeke.”
Kosodi, kedau Solomon ailip ailipasit ŋin kere ka aiŋaiŋa mama ejai EJAKAIT, konyou ŋesi koiŋaren ketem loka EJAKAIT, kane nan ekukokina eriorit akaninike akuj.
Kobwo ŋesi, kilipak ekodet kere loka Isirael arereŋ keporoto loepol ebe,
“Kituritete EJAKAIT, loabu kisiyeŋ iketuŋa Isirael, kwape ejaatar kere nuabu kisumun: mam adiokirot kere naeoliorit kaisumunetake nuejok, nuesumunit kakan naka Musa ekejaanakinanike.
Kojaenena EJAKAIT Ewokodeke kaoni, kwape ajaenenar kalukapapaawok: kinyek ŋesi anyoun kamawok, karaida ajalakin oni:
Tetere isibelokini itauonowok mamake, alosenen korotinike kere, aricenen aicorakinetake, ka ikisilake ka itubesiake, luecorakinit lukapapaawok.
Akakiro nu, nueŋaiŋa kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, koapikis kesi EJAKAIT Ewokodeke paaran ka kuare, kisigalik akirot naka ekejaanakinanike, ka akirot naka iketuŋa Isirael, kwape ekotor ŋinipaaran.
Tetere ejenunete atekerin kere nuka akwap ebe EJAKAIT, ŋes Edeke; emamei ece kere.
Kodolioritos do itauonokus mama ejai EJAKAIT Ewokodeke, alosenen kokisilake, aricenen aicorakinetake, kwape lolo.”
Kosodi ekabaka ka Isirael kere nepepe kaŋes, koinakis asuban mama ejai EJAKAIT.

Koinak Solomon asubanit naka ainapakin nakeinakini EJAKAIT, imoŋin ilukumin akaisaarei ka luarei, ka amerekekin alukumin akwatat ka akaisaarei. Kwaŋin kotiaku ekabaka ka idwe luka Isirael etogo loka EJAKAIT.

Kapaaran kaŋipekaŋin da kitalau ekabaka kidiŋ alaro naajai kiŋaren ketogo loka EJAKAIT; naarai koinak kanen ainakinet naicweio, ka ainakinet naka akiria, ka asiepai nuka ainakineta nuka ainapakin: naarai adit etem loka aisinit loajai akonyen nuka EJAKAIT ailosikin ainakinet naicweio, ka ainakinet naka akiria, ka asiepai nuka ainakineta nuka ainapakin.
Kapaaran nakikanyetekauni kotwar ituŋa, kilipakis kesi ekabaka arereŋ, koloto owemanakec kolakara, kiyalamas kotauon kanuka ajokis kere naetodiki EJAKAIT Daudi ekejaanakinanike, ka Isirael iketuŋa.
Kitaanyikin EJAKAIT Solomon nakiareit kwape kolo etakanikinor ŋes koGibeon.
Kotema EJAKAIT ŋes atiar, “Eira eoŋ ailipikon ka aiŋaiŋakon, nailipit kakonyeneka: etalau eoŋ etogo lo, loiduk ijo, aibwaikin ekakiror ikar kere; ejaenenas akonyeka ka etauka nen apaarasia kere.
Ka jo da, arai ilosenenei kakonyeneka, kwape aloseneno Daudi papakon, kadolit nakotau, kaitenara, aiswamaenen kwape ejaatar kere nukecorakinit jo, aricenen ikakisila, ka itubesiaka;
Kasodi eoŋ aiticat eicoloŋ loka ajakanutukon koIsirael ikar kere; kwape esumunio eoŋ Daudi papakon ebe, ‘Mam kimamikini ijo etuŋanan koicoloŋ loka Isirael.’
Konye arai kipaasi anyoun katupit eoŋ, yes arai ikusidwe, komam iricenenete aicorakinetaka ka ikisilaka luebwaikinit kakonyenekus, konye ilosete ijaanakinete idekesio ice, imaete kes:
Kasodi eoŋ amudiar Isirael kakwap naainakinit kes; acakari etogo lo, loetalaunit kanuka ekakiror kakonyeneka; eraun Isirael awarag ka ikienis katekerin kere:
Karaida kimukurur etogo lo, konye eumokini ŋinituŋanan yenitori, ijuari; ebalasi ebe, ‘Kanukinyo asubakinia EJAKAIT akwap na kwaŋin ka etogo lo?’

Eboŋokinete ebe, ‘Naarai apotu kojala EJAKAIT Ekecedeke, lokolo etolomuni lukapapaakec kakwap nako Misiri, kitiŋata icedekesio, komaata kes, kijaanakis kes: kanuka ŋun abu EJAKAIT koyau aronis na kere mamakec.’ ”
Kosodi kanen ketuboros ikar akaisaarei, luadukio Solomon itogoi ŋul iarei, etogo loka EJAKAIT ka etogo loka ekabaka,
(Abu Kiram ekabaka loka Turo koinak Solomon ikito luka eres ka ikito luka eberos, ka esabu, kwape ajaar akoteke kere,) kosodi ekabaka Solomon da ainakin Kiram ireria akaisaarei kakwap naka Galilaya.
Kolom Kiram koTuro alosit aanyun ireria luainakini Solomon ŋes; mam apotu kisiyalamikis ŋes.
Kotema ŋesi atiar, “Okwe onaceka, inyoika ireria lu lukiinakinit eoŋ?” Komaik kes akwap naka Kabul, kiton lolo.
Abu Kiram kijukak ekabaka atalatan akwatat ka akaisaarei nuka esabu.
Abu Parao ekabaka loko Misiri kolot, kipiko Geser, kicwe kakim, koar Ikanaanin lueboiete kore, koinak araun akorakinet naka akokuke, aberu naka Solomon.
Koduk Solomon Geser, ka Bet-koron lokajesa.
Ka Baalat, ka Tamar toma amodiŋ, akwap naka Yuda,
ka ireria kere lukiŋadet luajaas ka Solomon, ka ireria luka agalinike, ka ireria luka ikebwanenokoke, ka luepuda Solomon aiduk aisiyalamikin ŋes koYerusalem, koLebanon, kakwap kere naka airumiteke.
Ituŋa kere luedeunos luka Imorain, ka Ikitin, ka Iperusin, ka Ikibin, ka Iyebusin, lumam araas luka idwe luka Isirael;
Ikecedwe luedeunos atupakin kes kakwap, lumam apedorete idwe luka Isirael amudiar cut, kolemununei Solomon iitubusiana kamakec, kiton lolo.
Konye mam Solomon abu kitarau idwe luka Isirael ibulesin: konye araas kesi ikajiok, ka ikejaanakinakake, ka ikapolokoke, ka ijakake, ka ikayaitok luka agalinike ka luka ikebwanenokoke.
Ŋul kes ijaka lukapolok luayaito aswam naka Solomon, akwat akany ka akaisakany, luerumito ituŋa lueswamaete aswam.

Abu Solomon koinak irwan auni ŋolikaru ainakineta nuicweio ka ainakineta nuka ainapakin kotem loadukokinit ŋesi EJAKAIT, kisupuru lukisupurununo kotem loajai akonyen nuka EJAKAIT. Kodau ŋesi kwaŋin etogo.
Kijuka Kiram ikekejaanakinak toma ameerin ŋun, ikekwaŋak luajai aijen nuka aŋolol, nepepe kikejaanakinak luka Solomon.
Kopotu Opir, koomata esabu kanen, atalatan akwat aoŋon ka akaisaarei, koinut ekabaka Solomon.
Kobu Yerusalem kojaas kituŋa luipu noi, ka akaalai nuebwokito luewuru maa, ka esabu Loepol noi, ka amor nuka akais nuipu: kosodi kedolu ŋesi neejai Solomon, kolimok ŋes akiro kere nukejaas otauke.
Kitejenu Solomon akiro kere nukiŋisit ŋesi: amamei akirot naaponi kimunonikinai ekabaka namam kitejenunit ŋes.
Kosodi kedau Akabaka naka Seba aanyun acoa kere naka Solomon, ka etogo da lokeduki.
Inyamat da lukomesake, ka eiboie loka ikebulesin, ka aijaanakin naka ikekejaanakinak, ka ikecenapen, ka ikekaliak da, ka eititiriake lokedokanaria togo loka EJAKAIT; kimwokolikin eketau.
Kotema ŋesi ekabaka atiar, “Akirot naabu kapupunite kakwapuka kerai nakabeit naka aswamisiokon, ka akonicoa da.
Kwabo mam abu keyu akiro ŋun, aitodol naabunio koanyut akakonye: ido koany, mam kalimokinitai atutubet: akonicoa ka akonikerianut itelekarito eemut loabu keira.
Elakara ikonituŋa, elakara da ikonikejaanakinak lu, luebwoenenete kakonyenekon apaarasia kere, kopupete akonicoa.
Kituritete EJAKAIT Ekonideke loeyalamikin kanukon adakakin; oicoloŋ loka Isirael: naarai abu EJAKAIT komina Isirael ikar kere. Ŋes kituluoria jo ekabaka, aiswamaenen nukabeit ka nuedolito.”

Koinak ŋesi ekabaka esabu atalatan akwatat ka akaisaarei, ka luewuru maa luipu noi noi, ka amor da nuka akais nuipu: mam eyauna bobo luewuru maa luipu lueriakas kaŋul luainakini Akabaka naka Seba ekabaka Solomon.

Kitarau ekabaka ikito lukajokak ipirin luka etogo loka EJAKAIT ka luka etogo loka ekabaka da, adeudeun da ka isabulin luka ikayook: mam eyauna bobo ikito lukajokak lueputos kaŋul, kwabo mam etakanuna, kiton lolo.

Kosodi Ekabaka Solomon ainakin Akabaka naka Seba iboro kere lukipuda ŋesi, ŋinibore kere yenikilipi, adepar ŋul lukeinakini ekabaka Solomon kotoma asianut naka ekabaka. Kwaŋin kibelokin do, koboŋo ŋesi akwapuke, ka ikekejaanakinak.
Alaŋiru naka esabu loainunitai Solomon kokaru ediopet kerai atalatan akwat akanykape ka akaisakanykape ka nukanykape nuka esabu.
Adepar loainunete ikemutunok, ka agwelanar naka ikagwelanarak, ka loka ikabakan luka ituŋa luinyalakina, ka loka ikayaitok luka akwap.
Kiswamau ekabaka Solomon ibukwi lukapolok akwat aarei luka esabu loerukuk: ŋolibuku lokapolon abu koya isekelin akwat akanykape luka esabu.
Kiswamau ŋesi ibukwi akwat auni luka esabu loerukuk; ŋolibuku abu koya ilatirin iuni luka esabu: kibwaik ekabaka kes togo loka ikito luka Lebanon.
Bobo da kiswamau ekabaka eicoloŋ lokapolon loka ikel luka etom, kiladaa ŋes kesabu kaloejok noi.
Kejaas adoketa akanykape oicoloŋ, kolukuna kuju keicoloŋ kokauke: kejaas akanin epuai kepuai kaibois neiboiere, ka iŋatunyo iarei luabwoete kawaitin nuka akanin.
Kobwaata iŋatunyo itomon kaluarei epuai kepuai kadoketa akanykape: amamei lokeputos kaŋol kajakanut kere.

Iboro kere lumaset luka ekabaka Solomon keraas luka esabu, ka iboro kere lukotogo loka ikito luka Lebanon keraas luka esabu kaloelai: amameete lukeraas luka epuesa; mam apodoi araut ibore kapaarasia nuka Solomon.

Naarai kejai ekabaka erioŋet loka Tarusis aŋolol nepepe kerioŋet loka Kiram: abu erioŋet loka Tarusis kobunenenei atipet ŋulukar iuni, ayaun esabu, ka epuesa, ka ikela luka etom, ka icomion, ka akweny nukejaas ikorio lukijesesinei kaluipu.
Kwaŋin kiteleka ekabaka Solomon ikabakan kere luka akwap kabar ka acoa.
Komoata lukakwap kere aanyun Solomon, akiirar acoake, nakibwaikinit Edeke otauke.
Koinununete ŋinituŋanan ainakineteke, iboro luka epuesa, ka iboro luka esabu, ka inapen, ka lujiis, ka luewuru maa, ka ibalasin, ka inyubun, esolo loka ŋolikaru.
Kitarau ekabaka epuesa asubit bala amor koYerusalem, kitarau iresia asubit bala ikito luka esukumor luejaas apuutona, kanuka aipues.
Ayaunio ibalasin lukejaas kaSolomon koMisiri kodumut ikagwelanarak luka ekabaka kes kosipanin, nolisipan kotiaike.
Ayaun agali koMisiri kogwelarite kisekelin akwat akanykape luka epuesa, ebalasit da akwatat ka akaisakany: koinununut kes kwaŋin ikabakan kere luka Ikitin, ka ikabakan kere luka Suria kakanikec.

Nuka atekerin nuabala EJAKAIT idwe luka Isirael ebe, “Mam ilosete mamakec, karaida kes abunore mama ijaas: naarai abeit ibelokinete kesi ikusitauon atupenen ikecedekesio.” Kiminaikin Solomon ŋun kamin.
Kejaas ŋes aŋor akwat akanykaarei, nukapolok, ka abusian akwat auni: kibelokis akeŋor etaukeŋ.
Naarai nakemojoŋia Solomon, kibelokis akeŋor etauke atupit idekesio ice: mam kedolit eketau mama ejai EJAKAIT Ekedeke, kwape ajaar etau loka Daudi papake.
Naarai kotupa Solomon Asitoret adeke naka Isidonin, ka Milikom etal loka Imonain.
Kiswama Solomon nueroko kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, mam abu kotuparite cut EJAKAIT kwape atuparitor Daudi papake.
Kosodi Solomon adukokin Kemos etal loka Moab, aibois naicelelei, komoru loitei Yerusalem, Molok da etal loka idwe luka Amon.
Kiswamak kwaŋin aŋoroke kere numo, nuesupurununete lukisupurununo koinakis da asuban mama ejaas idekesiokec.
Ido kicorak ŋes nuka akirot kana ebe kinyek atupar idekesio ice; konye mam ŋes kerica nuecorakini EJAKAIT.
Kanuka ŋun kotema EJAKAIT Solomon atiar, “Naarai iswama ŋun, komam iricit aitutuketaka ka ikisilaka, lukecorakini jo, abeit acilari eoŋ ajakanut kamakon, ainakini ekejaanakinanikon.
Konye mam eswamai ŋun kapaarasiakon, kanuka Daudi papakon: dimarai acilari kama kokokukon.
Konye mam acilari ajakanut kere; dimarai ainakini okokukon ateker adiopet, kanuka Daudi ekejaanakinanika, ido kanuka Yerusalem lokaseuni.”
Naarai nakejaar Daudi Edom, kolot Yoab da ekapolon loka ajore aida lukatwak, ido abu koar ŋolikiliokit koEdom;
(Naarai kosalak Yoab ka Isirael kere ŋina ilapio ikanykape, aitodol neamudiaria ŋolikiliokit koEdom;)
Konye koker Kadad, ŋes ka Idomein ice luka ikejaanakinak luka papake, alosit Misiri; koroko Kadad erai ikoku yenididi.
Konyout koMidian, kodolot Paran: koyaŋaasi ituŋa nepepe kakes koParan, kodolot Misiri, mama ejai Parao ekabaka loko Misiri; loabu koinak ŋes etogo, kokorak inyamat, koinak ŋes alup.
Kominunai Kadad noi kakonyen nuka Parao, tape ekorakini ŋes inaci naka aberuke elopet aimany, inaci naka Tapenes akabaka.
Kourik inaci naka Tapenes ŋes Genubat okokuke, lokejakari Tapenes kotogo loka Parao: kojai Genubat togo loka Parao nepepe kodwe luka Parao.
Kepupu Kadad koMisiri ebe kejotoor Daudi kalukapapaake, atwana da Yoab ekapolon loka ajore, kobala Kadad Parao atiar, “Kisiikinai kalot, kaboŋo bukosi.”
Kosodi Parao atemar ŋes atiar, “Konye kiwoliki ijo inyo kamakaŋ, tape ikoto alosit bukus?” Koboŋok ebe, “Mam ibore: konye kisiikinai kalot.”
Kotukonok ŋesi ituŋa mamake, korau ekapolon loka erioŋet, nakearia Daudi luka Soba: koloto Damasiko, kiboienenete kaŋina, kirumata Damasiko.
Kerai ŋesi lokasurup loka Isirael apaarasia kere nuka Solomon, kogelara ameŋeranut naka Kadad: kola ŋesi Isirael, kirum Suria.
Na ŋes akirot naainakinit ŋes aitonyoun akekan asurokin ekabaka: koduk Solomon Milo, konwok neketiyaara kore loka Daudi papake.
Kerai ekesa je Yeroboam ekirigi loketitiŋ: koany Solomon ebe ekukurana ekatumunan, koinak ŋes ayait aitaaritoi kere naka ekek loka Yosep.
Kosodi kanen kapak kaŋin, nakelomaria Yeroboam koYerusalem, kodum Akiya enabi Esilonit ŋes korot; abu Aldya konap anapito nakitetet, kojaas kesi kere iarei bonik okitui.
Kitiŋ Akiya anapito nakitetet naanapit, kocilicil atutubeta atomon ka nuarei.
Kotema ŋesi Yeroboam atiar, “Koyaŋa ijo atutubeta atomon: naarai inera EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael kwanata ebe, ‘Koany, acilari eoŋ ajakanut kakan naka Solomon, kainakini jo atekerin atomon:
(Konye esalakini ŋes ateker adiopet, kanuka Daudi ekejaanakinanika, ido kanuka Yerusalem, ere lokaseuni kotoma atekerin kere nuka Isirael:)

Naarai apotu kajalakis eoŋ, komaata Asitoret adeke naka Isidonin, ka Kemos edeke loka Moab, ka Milikom edeke loka idwe luka Amon; mam apotu kolosenenete korotinika, aiswamaenen nuedolito kakonyeneka, aricenen ikakisila ka ikatubesia, kwape kolo eswamaa Daudi papake.
Konye mam ayaŋaari ajakanut kere kakanike: konye etaraun ŋes ekapolon apaarasia kere nuka aijarake, kanuka Daudi ekakejaanakinan, loabu kaseu, naarai aricenenei aicorakinetaka ka ikisilaka:
Konye alemari ajakanut kakan naka okokuke, ainakini jo, atekerin atomon.
Ainakini okokuke ateker adiopet, tetere ejaenena Daudi ekejaanakinanika atala tiritir kakonyeneka koYerusalem, ere loabu kaseu aibwaikin nen ekakiror.
Ayaŋaar eoŋ jo, irumi ijo kwape ipudar akoniijar kere, iraun ekabaka koIsirael.

Kosodi, arai ipupuni kere nuecorakini jo, kolosenenei korotinika, kiswamaenenei da nuedolito kakonyeneka, koricenenei ikisilaka ka aicorakinetaka, kwape kolo kiswamaa Daudi ekejaanakinanika; ajaenena kajo, adukokini jo ekek loicasit, kwape adukokinia Daudi, ainakini jo Isirael.
Ido eticani aur naka Daudi kanuka ŋun, konye mere ikar kere.’ ”
Kanuka ŋun komoote Solomon aiar Yeroboam: konye konyou Yeroboam, koker Misiri, mama ejai Sisak ekabaka loko Misiri, kojaenena Misiri aitodol neatwania Solomon.
Apak naabu Solomon kirumak Isirael kere koYerusalem keraas ikar akaisaoŋon.
Kojotor Solomon kalukapapaake, kidaikinai ore loka Daudi papake: kirum Rekoboam okokuke aiboisike.
Kosodi kanen, kepupu Yeroboam okoku loka Nebat ŋun, (naarai keriŋa ejai Misiri, neakeriarit anyoun kakonyen nuka ekabaka Solomon, kiboienenei Yeroboam koMisiri. Aponi kijukarai anyaraun ŋes.)
Kobu Yeroboam ka ekodet kere loka Isirael, kinerata kaRekoboam ebe,
“Abu papakon kitalaŋir ajookotokosi: aso do kitebeben aswam naetiono naka papakon, ka ajookotoke naelaŋir naebwaikinit mamakosi, isio da kijaanakini jo.”
Kotema kes atiar, “Koloto kodaut apaarasia auni, kosodete aboŋun mamakaŋ.” Koloto ituŋa.
Kobalas ŋes atiar, “Arai ikoto araun ekejaanakinan mama ejaas ituŋa lu lolo, kokoto aijaanakin kes, Koboŋok kes, kolimok akiro nuejok, aso eraunos kesi ikonikejaanakinak ikar kere.”
Konye kola ainerun naka imakio naapesikinito ŋes, kinerut kikatumunak luapolounete kaŋes, luabwoete kakonyeneke.
Kotema kes atiar, “Ibalas bo yesi ai, kaboŋokis ituŋa ŋul, luapotu kabalas eoŋ ebe, ‘Kitebeben ajookot nakibwaikini papakon mamakosi’?”

Kotemasi ikatumunak luapolounete kaŋes ebe, “Kolimok ituŋa lu lukibalas jo ebe, ‘Abu papakon kitalaŋir ajookotokosi konye jo kitebeben ŋes kamakosi’; ilimokini kes kwanata ebe, ‘Ebur ekabokorit lodidi aitelekar aŋabet naka papaka.
Aso do abu papaka kisibwok yes ajookot naelaŋir, eyatakini do eoŋ ajookotokus: abu papaka koswala yes kidase, konye eoŋ kaswalari yes kikiritona.’ ”
Aso kobu Yeroboam ka ituŋa kere mama ejai Rekoboam apaaran nakiwuniet, kwape ecorakinia ekabaka ebe, “Koboŋut bobo apaaran nakiwuniet.”
Koboŋok ekabaka ituŋa kaisiejakin, kola ainerun naka imakio naapesikinito ŋes:
Kinera kakes kwape ajaar ainerun naka ikatumunak ebe, “Abu papaka kitalaŋir ajookotokus, konye eoŋ eyatakini ajookotokus: abu papaka koswala yes kidase, konye eoŋ kaswalari yes kikiritona.”
Aso mam abu ekabaka kopup ituŋa; naarai kerai akirot naabu EJAKAIT koyau, tetere iticasi akekirot naabu EJAKAIT kiner kama ka Akiya Esilonit mama ejai Yeroboam okoku loka Nebat.
“Anyoin akorakinetekosi kama ka Daudi?
Ido emamei sio airumet kotoma okoku loka Yese:
Ape ma owemanakus, wu Isirael:
Daudi, koanyanar do ekonikek.”
Koloto do luka Isirael owemanakec.
Kosodi ekabaka Rekoboam aijukar Adoram, loapolokinit esolo; abu Isirael kere kibiribir ŋes kamor, kotwana. Kiwonya ekabaka Rekoboam adokar agalike akerit Yerusalem.
Kwaŋin kipaliik do Isirael ekek loka Daudi, kiton lolo.
Kosodi kanen, kepupu Isirael kere ebe Aboŋu Yeroboam, kijukasi anyaraun ŋes abunore atukot, kitaraut ŋes ekabaka koIsirael kere: amamei yenatupit ekek loka Daudi, dimarai ateker naka Yuda bon.
Konye kobu akirot naka Edeke mama ejai Semaia etuŋanan loka Edeke ebe,
“Kolimok Rekoboam okoku loka Solomon, ekabaka loka Yuda, ka ekek kere loka Yuda ka Benyamin, ka ituŋa ice da ebe,

‘Inera EJAKAIT kwanata ebe, Mam ilosete, ido mam ijiikinos kiinacanakus idwe luka Isirael: koboŋo ŋolituŋanan togoke; naarai erai akirot na nakaŋ.’ ” Kosodete kopuput akirot naka EJAKAIT, koboŋosi, koloto kwape ajaar akirot naka EJAKAIT.
Kotema Yeroboam kotauke atiar, “Kwana eboŋori ajakanut okek loka Daudi:

Arai kelosenenoto ituŋa lu ainanakin asuban togo loka EJAKAIT Yerusalem, ibelokinos bobo itauon luka ituŋa kalu mama ejai ejakaitikec, Rekoboam ekabaka loka Yuda; kaarete eoŋ, eboŋorete do mama ejai Rekoboam ekabaka loka Yuda.”
Kosodi kineru ekabaka, kiswamau itak iarei luka esabu; kotema kes atiar, “Erai akirot naepol yes alosenen Yerusalem; koany idekesiokon, ijo Isirael, lukitolomunete jo kakwap nako Misiri.”
Kosipok idiopet Betel, ka ice da kosipok Dan.
Koraun akirot ŋin adiakaret: naarai kolosenenoto ituŋa ice aima idiopet Betel, ice da mape Dan.
Kodukok itogoi aiboisio nuiceleleete, koseu icetuŋa kotuŋa kere kitarau isasedotin, lumam keraas idwe luka Lebi.

Kicorak Yeroboam epucit kolap lokikanyetekauni, kapaaran nakitomonet kakany naka elap, kwape kepucit loejai Yuda, kolot ŋesi otem; kiswama kwaŋin da koBetel, koinak asuban mama ejaas itak luabu kiswamau: kibwaik isasedotin luka aiboisio nuiceleleete nuabu kiswamau koBetel.
Kolot otem loabu kiswamau koBetel kapaaran nakitomonet kakany kolap lokikanyetekauni, ŋes elap loabu ŋesi koseu kotauke: kicorak epucit kanuka idwe luka Isirael, kolot otem aisupuruun lukisupurununo.

Kilamak etem kakirot naka EJAKAIT, kotema atiar, “Wu etem, etem, inera kwanata EJAKAIT ebe, ‘Koany, ewuruunio ikoku kokek loka Daudi, ekekiror Yosia; einakini ŋesi kamakon isasedotin luka aiboisio nuiceleleete luisupuruunete lukisupurununo kamakon araun asuban, icweikinete kesi akojo nuka ituŋa kamakon.’ ”
Koinak aanyunet kapaaran kaŋin, ebe, “Na ŋes aanyunet naenera EJAKAIT: koany, ecila etem, ebukor ekurwon loejai tomake.”

Kosodi kanen, kepupu ekabaka akirot naka etuŋanan loka Edeke, naelamia ŋesi etem koBetel, kikia Yeroboam akekan kotem, kotema ebe, “Kikam ŋes.” Koono akekan naekiarit adoditor ŋes, komam epedori asukokin.
Kocila etem da, kobukor ekurwon kotem, kwape ajaar aanyunet naabu etuŋanan loka Edeke koinak kakirot naka EJAKAIT.

Koboŋok ekabaka kotema etuŋanan loka Edeke ebe, “Kiŋaiŋa cabo asianut naka EJAKAIT Ekonideke, kilipakinai eoŋ, koŋaleu akakan.” Kiŋaiŋa etuŋanan loka Edeke EJAKAIT, kitaŋaleunai akekan, kojaun kwape lem sek.
Kotema ekabaka etuŋanan loka Edeke atiar, “Kaloto ore, kikwaru, kainakini jo ainakinet.”
Kotema etuŋanan loka Edeke ekabaka atiar, “Arai kiinaki ijo eoŋ atutubet naka etogokon, mam eoŋ alosi kajo, idomam anyami atap karaida aimat akipi kaibois kana.
Naarai aponi kecorakinitete eoŋ kakirot naka EJAKAIT ebe, ‘Mam inyami atap, karaida aimat akipi, karaida aboŋor korot lokibunio.’ ”
Kosodi koboŋo kecerot, mam abu koboŋo korot kaloabunio Betel.
Kiboienenei enabi lomojoŋ koBetel; kobu ediopet kodweke kolimok ŋes aswamisio kere nueswama etuŋanan loka Edeke kapaaran kaŋin koBetel: akiro nuabu ŋesi kolimok ekabaka, ŋun da kolimokis papakec.
Kotema papakec kes ebe, “Etoro bo ŋesi orot ali?” Apotu odweke koanyut erot loetori etuŋanan loka Edeke, loabunit koYuda.
Kotema odweke atiar, “Kopesikinai lupetan asigiria.” Kosodete kesi apesikin lupetan asigiria: kibwanen ŋesi.
Kibwapak etuŋanan loka Edeke, kodum ŋes iboie kotolim kelua: kotema ŋes atiar, “Ijo ŋes etuŋanan loka Edeke loabuni koYuda?” Kotema atiar, “Eoŋ lo,”
Kosodi atemar ŋes atiar, “Kaboŋosi oreka, konyam atap.”
Kotema atiar, “Mam apedori aboŋor kajo, karaida alomar kajo: mam da anyami atap karaida aimat akipi kajo kaibois kana:
Naarai aponi kalimokinitete kakirot naka EJAKAIT ebe, ‘Sirikinyam atap, karaida aimat akipi kaŋina, sirikiboŋo da korot loibu kobunio.’ ”
Kotema ŋes atiar, “Eoŋ da enabi kwape kajo; abu emalaika kalimok eoŋ kakirot naka EJAKAIT ebe, ‘Kinyaku ŋes togokon, konyam atap, komat akipi.’ ” Konye abu kiŋalai.
Kwaŋin koboŋo kaŋes, konyam atap kotogoke, komat akipi.
Kiworo mama ejai etuŋanan loka Edeke loabunit koYuda ebe, “Inera EJAKAIT kwanata ebe, ‘Naarai ipaliiki ijo akirot naka EJAKAIT, mam iricit aicorakinet naecoraki EJAKAIT Ekonideke jo.
Konye iboŋu, inyama atap, imat akipi kaibois nakilimokinio jo ebe, “Sirikinyam atap, sirikimat akipi”; mam akuanakon idaikinio ates naka lukapapaakon.’ ”
Kosodi kanen kedau ŋesi ainyam atap, ka aimat, kopesik lupetan asigiria enabi loenyakuni ŋesi.
Napelosi, kiriamakinos keŋatuny korot, koar eŋatuny ŋes, kocakak akekuan orot, kobwo asigiria die kaŋes; kobwo da eŋatuny die kakekuan.
Ido koany, kitoroto ituŋa, koanyutu akuan korot, eŋatuny da ebwoi die kates; kopotu, koyaut akiro ore neeboieneno enabi ŋol lomojoŋ.

Kepupu ŋun enabi loabu kinyaku ŋes korot, kotema atiar, “Ŋes ŋol etuŋanan loka Edeke, loabu kipaliik akirot naka EJAKAIT: kanuka ŋun ejaiki EJAKAIT ŋes mama ejai eŋatuny, loapoopoo ŋes, aara da, kwape ajaar akirot naka EJAKAIT, naabu kiner kaŋes.”
Kolimok odweke ebe, “Kopesikinai lupetan asigiria.” Kopesikis.
Kolot, kodum aketes korot, ka asigiria ka eŋatuny ebwoete die kates: mam abu eŋatuny konyamite ates, karaida apoopo asigiria.
Kodaku enabi ates naka etuŋanan loka Edeke, kidokok asigiria, kinyaku ore, aibworo ka ainuk ŋes.
Kibwaik akuanake atesike elopet; kibworoto ŋes ebe, “Wu okwe onaceka!”
Kosodi kanen, kedau ainuk ŋes kotema odweke ebe, “Katwana eoŋ, konukakis eoŋ ates neenukuk etuŋanan loka Edeke; kibwaikis akakojo eiduny kakekojo.
Naarai abeit itodolikinio akirot naabu ŋesi kiworo kakirot naka EJAKAIT ilamakini etem koBet-el, ilamakini da itogoi kere luka aiboisio nuiceleleete nuejaas oreria luka Samaria.”
Koraun akirot ŋin adiakaret kokek loka Yeroboam, agelar ŋes, ka amudiar ŋes kakwap.
Kapaarasia kaŋun kodekakin Abiya okoku loka Yeroboam.

Kotema Yeroboam nakowaike ebe, “Konyou, keŋaiŋait, kitegelikin bon, tetere mam ijenun ebe irai aberu naka Yeroboam: kolot Silo; koany, ejai Akiya enabi ŋina, loabu kinera nukaŋ ebe araun eoŋ ekabaka loka ituŋa kalu.
Koyaŋa da imugatin itomon, ka aluŋuren nuka imugatin, ka atany naka esik da, kolot mama ejai: kilimokini ŋesi jo nuedoikinete ikoku.”
Kotema EJAKAIT Akiya atiar, “Koany, ebuni aberu naka Yeroboam aiŋitun jo nuka okokuke; naarai edek; ilimokini ŋes kwanata kwanata”: naarai nakelomunia itegelikini bon araun aceberu.
Kosodi kepupu Akiya akejeke napelomuni kokek, kotema atiar, “Kolom, ijo aberu naka Yeroboam; kanukinyo itegelikinor bon araun ace? Naarai kejukunitai mamakon kakiro kanuelaŋir.
Kolot, kolimok Yeroboam ebe, ‘Inera EJAKAIT Edeke loka Isirael kwanata ebe: “Naarai abu ketopoloo jo kotuŋa, ketarau jo ekapolon kotuŋaka Isirael.

Abu kacila da ajakanut alemar kokek loka Daudi, kainak jo; konye mam jo iputosi bala ekejaanakinanika Daudi, loabu koricite aicorakinetaka, katupite keketau kere, aiswamaenen nuedolito bonik kakonyeka:
Konye ibu kiswama aronis adepar kere lukigeikinete jo, ilot isub icedekesio, ka aputosia nucaluna, aitunyunyurikin eoŋ, kicaka eoŋ kaukon:

Kanuka ŋun, koany, ayaun aronis kokek loka Yeroboam, amudiari kama ka Yeroboam ŋinikoku yenikiliokit, ŋin yenienitai ka ŋin yeneosikinitai koIsirael, apiari cut ekek loka Yeroboam, kwape epiaria ituŋanan aoret, aitodol needaunotor.
Ŋin yenika Yeroboam yenetwanikini ore enyamete iŋokwo; ŋin da yenetwanikini ais enyamete akweny nuka apak: naarai alimu EJAKAIT ŋin.” ’
Aso konyou ijo, kolot togokon; naelomariata akonikeje ore, etwani ikoku.
Ibworosi lukoIsirael kere ŋes, enukete ŋes; naarai ŋes bon yenika Yeroboam yenidaikinio ates: naarai kotomake edumuna adiokirot naejok mama ejai EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael, kokek loka Yeroboam.
Bobo da edakakini EJAKAIT ekabaka koIsirael loemudiari ekek loka Yeroboam kapaaran kaŋin: inyo bo da? Kwape kwana.

Naarai edanyi EJAKAIT Isirael, kwape ijaŋere aladot kakipi; erutuni da Isirael kakwap kana naejok naabu koinak lukapapaakec, isiarisiari kes juwai kEcor; naarai asubata Aserinikec, aitunyunyurikin EJAKAIT.
Ejalakini ŋesi Isirael kanuka aronisio nuka Yeroboam, nuadiaka ŋesi, nuetidiaka Isirael da.”
Kida Isirael kere ŋes, kibworo ŋes; kwape ajaar akirot naka EJAKAIT, naenera ŋesi kama ka Akiya enabi ekejaanakinanike.
Aswamisio ace kere nuka Yeroboam, kwape ajior, ido kwape erumia, koany, iwadikatai oitabo loka aisiitonokin nuka ikabakan luka Isirael.
Apaarasia nuabu Yeroboam kirumak emwaasi ikar akaisaarei ka luarei: kojotoor kalukapapaake, kirum Nadab okokuke aiboisike.
Kiswama Yuda nuaroko kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT; kisurumata ŋes ekokote kanuka aronisiokec nuapotu kiswamata, adepar nueswamaete lukapapaakec.
Naarai kes da kodukoto aiboisio nuiceleleete, ka ipirino, ka Aserin, kaŋoliukot loicelelei, ido kwap kaŋolikitoi loepesit.
Ajaas da iketepak ikiliok kakwap: apotu kiswamata kwape ajaatar italesio luka atekerin nuereŋeari EJAKAIT kakonyen nuka idwe luka Isirael.
Koyaŋa iboro luka akais nuipu luka etogo loka EJAKAIT, ka iboro luka akais nuipu luka etogo loka ekabaka: koyaŋa kere: koyaŋa da ibukui kere luka esabu lueswamat Solomon.
Kiswamau ekabaka Rekoboam ibukui luka aisinit aiboisikec, kijaik akanin nuka ikapolok luka ikedarak, luedarete ekek loka etogo loka ekabaka.
Kosodi nakelomanaria ekabaka togo loka EJAKAIT, kodakanarete ikedarak kes, kinyakanarete agola naka ikedarak.
Aswamisio ace nuka Rekoboam, kere da nuabu kiswama, mam kereka iwadikatai oitabo loka aisiitonokin nuka ikabakan luka Yuda?
Ido kejaenena ejie kidiŋ Rekoboam ka Yeroboam ducuduc.
Kojotoor Rekoboam kalukapapaake, aponi kidaikinai kalukapapaake ore loka Daudi: ekiror loka totoke Naama naka Amon, Kirum Abiyam okokuke aiboisike.
Kokaru do lokitomonet kakanykauni loka ekabaka Yeroboam okoku loka Nebat kogeu Abiyam airum Yuda.
Kirumak ikar iuni koYerusalem: ekiror loka totoke ŋes Maaka akoku naka Abisalom.
Kolosenenei karonisio kere nuka papake, nueswamai ageikini ŋes: mam eketau adolit kaneejai EJAKAIT Ekedeke, kwape ketau loka papaake Daudi.
Konye kanuka Daudi abu EJAKAIT Ekedeke koinak ŋes atala koYerusalem, adakakin okokuke atupakin ŋes, aiticat Yerusalem:
Naarai abu Daudi kiswama nuedolito kakonye nuka EJAKAIT, mam abu kopaa kakirot kere naecorakini ŋes, apaarasia kere nuka aijarake, dimarai akirot naka Uria Ekitit.
Kejaenena ejie kidiŋ Rekoboam ka Yeroboam apaarasia kere nuka aijarake.
Aswamisio ace kere nuka Abiyam, kere da nuabu kiswama, mam kereka iwadikatai oitabo loka aisiitonokin nuka ikabakan luka Yuda? Kejaenena ejie kidiŋ Abiyam ka Yeroboam.
Kojotoor Abiyam kalukapapaake; aponi kidaikinai ore loka Daudi: kirum Asa okokuke aiboisike.
Kokaru lokakaisaarei loka Yeroboam ekabaka loka Isirael kogeu Asa airum Yuda.
Kirumak ikar akaisaoŋon ka lodiopet koYerusalem: ekiror loka totoke ŋes Maaka akoku naka Abisalom.
Kiswama Asa nuedolit kakonye nuka EJAKAIT, kwape eswamaa Daudi papaake.
Kireŋea iketepak ikiliok kakwap, kolema aputosia kere nueswamato lukapapaake.
Kireŋea da Maaka totoke karaut akabaka, naarai abu kiswamau aput naketal araun Asera; kojepa Asa aputoke, kicwe kaguurut Kiduron.
Konye mam aponi kolemarai aiboisio nuiceleleete: konye kedolit etau loka Asa kaneejai EJAKAIT apaarasiake kere.
Kitoloma iboro togo loka EJAKAIT luabu papake kotiakarite, ka iboro luabu ŋesi elopet kotiakarite, epuesa, ka esabu, ka iboro.
Kejaenena ejie kidiŋ Asa ka Baasa ekabaka loka Isirael apaarasiakec kere.
Kolot Baasa ekabaka loka Isirael asurokin Yuda, koduk Rama, tetere mam ecamakini idiotuŋanan alomar arai alomun mama ejai Asa ekabaka loka Yuda.

Kosodi Asa ayaŋaar epuesa kere ka esabu luedeuna koboro luka akais nuipu luka etogo loka ekabaka, kijaik kes akanin nuka ikejaanakinakake; kijuka ekabaka Asa kes mama ejai Ben-kadad, okoku loka Tab-rimon, okoku loka Kesion, ekabaka loka Suria, loeboienenei koDamasiko, ebe,

“Ejai aitutuket kidiŋika kajo, kidiŋ papaka ka papakon: koany, ejukakinit jo ainakinet naka epuesa ka esabu; kolot, kobil aitutuketekon kaBaasa ekabaka loka Isirael, tetere enyouni ŋesi kaneajai eoŋ.”
Kiira Ben-kadad ekabaka Asa, kijuka ikapolok luka ajoresioke asurokin ireria luka Isirael, kodany luka Iyon, ka Dan, ka Abel-bet-maaka, ka Kinerot kere, ka akwap kere naka Naputali.
Kosodi kanen, kepupu Baasa ŋun, kinyeik aiduk Rama, kiboikin do Tirisa.
Kosodi ekabaka Asa kokut luka Yuda kere; komamei yenedeparitai: kibwokata amor nuka Rama, ka akitoke, nuabu Baasa kodukitor: kodukio ekabaka Asa Geba loka Benyamin, ka Misipa.

Aswamisio ace kere nuka Asa, ka akegogoŋ kere, ka kere nuabu kiswama, ka ireria luabu koduk, mam kereka iwadikatai oitabo loka aisiitonokin nuka ikabakan luka Yuda? Konye kapaarasia nuka amojoŋuke kodekakin akejeke.
Kojotoor Asa kalukapapaake, aponi kidaikinai kalukapapaake ore loka Daudi papaake: kirum Yekosapat okokuke aiboisike.
Kogeu Nadab okoku loka Yeroboam airum Isirael kokaru lokiareit loka Asa ekabaka loka Yuda, kirumak Isirael ikar iarei.
Kiswama nueroko kakonyen nuka Edeke, kolosenenei korot loka papake, kakeronis naetidiakaria Isirael da.
Kokaru lokiwuniet loka Asa ekabaka loka Yuda koar Baasa ŋes, kosodi airum aiboisike.

Kosodi kanen, keraun ekabaka, atipet kodany lukokek kere loka Yeroboam; mam abu kideik Yeroboam idio yenikajaran, aitodol neamudiaria ŋes; kwape ajaar akirot naka EJAKAIT, naabu kiner kama kekejaanakinanike Akiya Esilonit:
Kanuka aronisio nuka Yeroboam nuabu kodiak, ido nuetidiakaria Isirael da: kanuka anyunyura naabu ŋesi kitunyunyurikinia EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael.
Aswamisio ace nuka Nadab, ka kere nuabu kiswama, mam kereka iwadikatai oitabo loka aisiitonokin nuka ikabakan luka Isirael?
Kejaenena ejie kidiŋ Asa ka Baasa ekabaka loka Isirael apaarasiakec kere.
Kokaru lokiwuniet loka Asa ekabaka loka Yuda kogeu Baasa okoku loka Akiya airum Isirael kere koTirisa, kirumak ikar akaisaarei ka luoŋon.
Kiswama nueroko kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kolosenenei korot loka Yeroboam, kakeronis naetidiakaria Isirael.
“Naarai abu ketopoloo jo kotoma apua, kadakak jo araun ekapolon kotuŋaka Isirael; konye ilosenen korot loka Yeroboam, itidiak ikatuŋa Isirael, aitunyunyurikin eoŋ karonisiokec;
Koany, apiari cut Baasa ka ekekek: etusubi ekonikek bala ekek loka Yeroboam okoku loka Nebat.
Yenika Baasa yenetwanikini ore enyamete iŋokwo; ŋin da yenike yenetwanikini ais enyamete akweny nuka apak.”
Kojotoor Baasa kalukapapaake, aponi kidaikinai Tirisa; kirum Ela okokuke aiboisike.

Bobo da kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT kama kenabi Yeku okoku loka Kanani aluikin Baasa, ka ekekek, kanuka aronis kere naabu kiswama kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, aitunyunyurikin ŋes kaswam naka akaninike, araut kwape kekek loka Yeroboam, ido kanuka aidany ŋes.
Kokaru loka akaisaarei ka lukanykape loka Asa ekabaka loka Yuda, kogeu Ela okoku loka Baasa airum Isirael koTirisa, kirumak ikar iarei.
Kineru Simuri ekekejaanakinan, ekapolon loka atutubet naka agalinike asurokin ŋes: kejai ŋesi Tirisa, emata komera kotogo loka Arusa, loapolokinit ekale koTirisa.
Koloma Simuri kinom ŋes, koar, kokaru loka akaisaarei ka lukanykaarei loka Asa ekabaka loka Yuda, kirum aiboisike.
Kwaŋin komudia Simuri ekek loka Baasa kere, kwape ajaar akirot naka EJAKAIT, naabu kiner kama ka Yeku enabi aluikin Baasa.
Kanuka aronisio kere nuka Baasa, ka aronisio nuka Ela okokuke, nuapotu kodiakasi, nuetidiakariata Isirael, aitunyunyurikin EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael kakamameakakec.
Aswamisio ace nuka Ela, ka kere nuabu kiswama, mam kereka iwadikatai oitabo loka aisiitonokin nuka ikabakan luka Isirael?
Kopuputu ituŋa luedukuritos ebakai ebe, eneru Simuri, aar ekabaka da: kanuka ŋun kitarau Isirael kere Omuri, ekapolon loka ajore, ekabaka loka Isirael kapaaran kaŋin koidukurun.
Konyou Omuri koGibeton, ka Isirael kere kaŋes, kirigaut Tirisa.
Kosodi kanen, keanyu Simuri ebe aŋatar ere, koloma toma abwas naka etogo loka ekabaka, kicweik etogo loka ekabaka kakim, kotwanik nen.
Kanuka akeronisio nuadiaki ŋesi kotoma aswam nueroko kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, alosenen korot loka Yeroboam, kakeronis naadiaki ŋesi, aitidiakaria Isirael.
Aswamisio ace nuka Simuri, ka akebilakin ebotet, mam kereka iwadikatai oitabo loka aisiitonokin nuka ikabakan luka Isirael?
Konye apotu ituŋa luatuparete Omuri kipikosi ituŋa luatuparete Tibuni okoku loka Ginat: kotwana Tibuni, kirum do Omuri.
Kokaru loka akaisauni ka lodiopet loka Asa ekabaka loka Yuda, kogeu Omuri airum Isirael, kirumak ikar itomon ka luarei: kirumak koTirisa ikar ikanykape.
Kogwel eukot Samaria kama ka Semer katalatan aarei nuka epuesa; koduk oukot, komaik ere loaduki ŋesi Samaria, kwape araar ekiror loka Semer elopet eukot.
Naarai kolosenenei korot loka Yeroboam okoku loka Nebat, kakeronisio nuetidiakaria Isirael, aitunyunyurikin EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael, kakamameakakec.
Aswamisio ace nuka Omuri nuabu kiswama, ka akegogoŋ naabu kitodu, mam kereka iwadikatai oitabo loka aisiitonokin nuka ikabakan luka Isirael?
Kojotoor do Omuri kalukapapaake, aponi kidaikinai Samaria: kirum Akab okokuke aiboisike.
Kokaru loka akaisauni ka lukanykauni loka Asa ekabaka loka Yuda kogeu Akab okoku loka Omuri airum Isirael: kirumak Akab okoku loka Omuri Isirael koSamaria adaun ikar akaisaarei ka luarei.
Kiswama Akab okoku loka Omuri nueroko kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT adepar kere lukegeikinete ŋes.

Kosodi kanen, kosubite akirot bala nakebenenikinit ŋes tape elosenenei karonisio nuka Yeroboam okoku loka Nebat, komany Yesebel akoku naka Etibaal ekabaka loka Isidonin, kolot kijaanak Baal, komaenenei ŋes.
Kosipok etem loka Baal togo loka Baal, lokedukit ŋesi Samaria.
Kiswama Akab Asera; kiyatak Akab aitunyunyurikin EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael adepar ikabakan kere luka Isirael lukegeikinete ŋes.

Kapaarasiake koduk Kiel Ebet-elit Yeriko: kopesik apetetait kotwania ekiyaike Abiram, kosipok ikekia kotwania eŋooritike Segub; kwape ajaar akirot naka EJAKAIT, naabu kiner kama ka Yosua okoku loka Nun.
Kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mamake ebe,
“Konyou kane, kibelokin kolot kide, koŋop kaguurut Keris naiteos ka Yorodan.
Kosodi kanen imasenenei akipi nuka aguurut; ido ecorak ikuruka aitanyamenen jo kaŋina.”
Kolot kiswama kwape ajaar akirot naka EJAKAIT: naarai abu kolot kiboikin ariri kaguurut Keris, naiteos ka Yorodan.
Kosodete ikuruka koinununete ŋes inyamat ka akiriŋ tupuruc, ka inyamat ka akiriŋ eboŋ; komasenenei da akipi nuka aguurut.
Kosodi kanen ketubor apak koonik aguurut, kanu amamear akiru kakwap.
Kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mamake ebe,
“Konyou kolot Sarapet, loka Sidon, kiboie kaŋina; koany, ecorak apuserut naka ŋina aitanyamenen jo.”
Kosodi konyou, kolot Sarapet: ido nakedolio orute loka ere, koany, kojai apuserut erarai akito; konyarau ŋes, kobala ebe, “Keŋaiŋait koomikinai adisikipi kibore, kamat.”
Konye napelosi aomare, konyarau ŋes, kobala ebe, “Keŋaiŋait, koinunai idionyamat kakanikon.”

Kobala ŋesi ebe, “Kwape ejaria EJAKAIT Ekonideke, emameete eoŋ inyamat, dimarai ikiria adiopekan ejaas amot, ka idiokinyet katany; ido koany, edepuni akito aarei, kaloma kepou eoŋ ka ikakoku, kanyama, kedenyiata atwakare.”
Kotema Eliya atiar, “Sirikiyoŋ; kolot kiswama kwape ibalar; konye kogeu ber aipoikin eoŋ idionyamat koinu, kokau kipou ijo alopet ka ikonikoku.
Naarai ebala kwanata EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael ebe, ‘Mam iŋoŋar amot naka akiria, karaida akinyet nakatany mam edaun, aitodol apaaran naisitepia EJAKAIT akiru akwap.’ ”
Kosodi kolot kiswama kwape ebalar Eliya: ŋes alopet, ka ŋes, ka lukotogoke, konyamata apaarasia nuipu.
Mam abu kiŋoŋar amot naka akiria, karaida akinyet nakatany mam abu kodaun, kwape kejaar akirot naka EJAKAIT, nakinera kama ka Eliya.
Kosodi kanen kokau kaŋun kodekakin okoku loka aberu, alopet etogo; kinyikok noi adekake, komam bobo iyeŋa.
Kotema ŋesi Eliya atiar, “Kimariai eoŋ inyo kajo, ijo etuŋanan loka Edeke? Ibu mama ajai aisiitun akaronis, ka aiar okokuka!”
Kotema ŋes atiar, “Ae okokukon.” Kodak katorobuke, kodokaria agola nakokuju naeboionono, kiperik aperisike elopet.
Komonyak EJAKAIT, kobala ebe, “Wu EJAKAIT, Ekadeke, iyaŋau aronis mama ejai apuserut nakesiperi, kanuka aiar okokuke?”
Korionor irwan auni kama ejai ikoku, komonyak EJAKAIT, kobala ebe, “Wu EJAKAIT, Ekadeke, keŋaiŋait, Koboŋok bobo aijar naka ikoku kayen tomakeŋ.”
Kiira EJAKAIT eporoto loka Eliya; Koboŋok bobo aijar naka ikoku tomakeŋ, kikwar.
Kodaku Eliya ikoku, kijesunor kagola koyau togo, koinak totoke: kotema Eliya atiar. “Koany, ejari do okokukon.”
Kotema aberu Eliya atiar, “Ajenu do kwana kwape iraar ijo etuŋanan loka Edeke, ido akirot naka EJAKAIT kaitukukon erai abeit.”
Kosodi Eliya alosit aitodiar mama ejai Akab. Kodeden noi ebeli ko Samaria.
Konyarau Akab Obadia loapolokinit ekal. (Keyoŋit Obadia EJAKAIT noi:
Naarai, nakemudiaria Yesebel inabin luka EJAKAIT, kituku Obadia inabin akwatat, kibwa kes akaisakany akaisakany kotoma abua, kitanyamenenei kes inyamat ka akipi.)
Kotema Akab Obadia atiar, “Kimaniman akwap, neejaas atanin kere nuka akipi, ka neejaas aguuruto kere: elemuni kipedori adumun anya aitajar ibalasin ka inyubun, kinyeis atwakiar itiaŋ kere.”
Kotiakata akwap aimaniman: kolot Akab orotoke bon, kolot Obadia da orotoke bon ece.
Kejai Obadia orot, koany, kiriamas kEliya: kojenu ŋes, kibiror ebuburia, kotema atiar, “ŋes ijo, Eliya ekajakait?”
Koboŋok ŋes ebe, “ŋes eoŋ: kolot, kolimok ekonijakait ebe, ‘Koany, ejai Eliya ne.’ ”
Kotema atiar, “Anu bo adiakarit eoŋ, tape jo ijaikini ekonikejaanakinan akan naka Akab, aiar eoŋ?

Kwape ejaria EJAKAIT Ekonideke, emamei ateker karaida ajakanut, namam ejakaitika ijukarit amoote jo: naketemariata atiar, ‘Emamei ŋesi kane,’ kisiyapoi lukajakanut kaŋin ka lukateker kaŋin ebe mam kianyunito jo.
Kwana da ibala ijo ebe, ‘Kolot, kolimok ekonijakait ebe, “Koany, ejai Eliya ne.” ’

Ejaun do atipet naanyounio kamakon, kidakari emoyo loka EJAKAIT jo nemam eoŋ da ajeni; kosodi do naalimokinia Akab, komam ŋes epedori adumun jo, kaari eoŋ: konye eoŋ ekonikejaanakinan ayoŋit EJAKAIT ameun keiditeuka.

Mam aponi kolimokinai ekajakait nuabu eoŋ keswama nakearia Yesebel inabin luka EJAKAIT, kwape abu kebwaia ituŋa akwatat luka inabin luka EJAKAIT akaisakany, akaisakany kotoma abua, ketanyamenenei kes inyamat ka akipi?
Kwana da ibala ijo ebe, ‘Kolot, kolimok ekonijakait ebe, Koany, ejai Eliya ne’: kaari ŋesi eoŋ.”
Kotema Eliya atiar, “Kwape ejaria EJAKAIT loka ajoresio, loabwoi eoŋ kakonyeneke, abeit etodikin lolo eoŋ mamakeŋ.”
Kosodi Obadia alosit airiamakin ka Akab, kolimok ŋes: kolot Akab airiamakin kEliya.
Koboŋok ŋesi ebe, “Mam eoŋ eticanit Isirael; dimarai ijo, ka ekek loka papakon, naarai ijalata aicorakineta nuka EJAKAIT, ido itupa Ibaalim.
Aso do kijuka, kotukok Isirael kere mama ajai, moru Karamel, ka inabin luka Baal akwat aoŋon ka akaisakany, ka inabin luka Asera akwat aoŋon, luenyamete komesa loka Yesebel.”
Kikunyak Eliya ituŋa kere, kotema atiar, “Itodolete ai yesi icodoete kaomisio aarei? Arai kerai EJAKAIT Edeke, kotupasi ŋes: konye arai Baal, kotupasi ŋes.” Mam ituŋa apotu koboŋokisi ŋes akirot.
Kosodi Eliya atemar ituŋa atiar, “Eoŋ, eoŋ bon asal, enabi loka EJAKAIT: konye inabin luka Baal eraas ituŋa akwat aoŋon ka akaisakany.

Aso koinakis kesi oni imoŋin iarei; koseutu kesi ediopemoŋ kanukec, kotubutuboto, kipetipetata akito, ido mam ibwaikinete akim kwap; etemokini eoŋ locemoŋ, epesipesi akito, ido mam ebwaikini akim kwap.
Kiwoneoto yesi ekiror loka ekusideke, eoŋ da ewonei ekiror loka EJAKAIT: Edeke da loeboŋokini kakim, korau ŋesi Edeke.” Koboŋokis ituŋa kere ebe, “Iner ejok.”
Kotema Eliya inabin luka Baal ebe, “Koseutu yesi emoŋ ediopet kanukus, kogeutu yesi aitemokin; naarai ipu yesi; kiwoneoto ekiror loka edekekus, konye mam ibwaikinete akim kwap.”

Koyaasi do emoŋ loainakinitai kes, kitemokis ŋes, kiwoneoto ekiror loka Baal ageun tupuruc kiton paaran, ebe, “Wu Baal, kiirarai sio.” Konye amamei eporoto, karaida yenaboŋokini. Kosomanaros airimor etem loeswamatai.
Kosodi kanen kidiŋ paaran, kokienar Eliya kes, kotema atiar, “Kiworoto noi; naarai ŋes edeke; arai eomoomoi ŋesi, apaa ŋesi, arai ejai orot, arai diat ejotoi, ibusakinit aitwekenyunio.”
Kiworoto noi, koduŋuduŋos bonik, kikileŋa ka akwaras kwape ajaar ekecepone, aitodol naaleleuniata aokot kamakec.
Kosodi ketubor kidiŋ paaran, apotu komurwoto aitodol apak naka ainakin ainakinet naka aboŋ; konye amamei eporoto karaida yenaboŋokini, karaida yenebwaikinit etau.
Kotema Eliya ituŋa kere atiar, “Kikunyutu mamaka.” Kikunyakisi ituŋa kere mamakeŋ. Kiteteu etem loka EJAKAIT loacakakinitai kwap.
Kolem Eliya amor atomon ka nuarei kwape ajaar etiai loka atekerin nuka odwe luka Yakob, loabu akirot naka EJAKAIT kobu mamake ebe, “Isirael ŋes eraun ekonikiror.”
Koduk etem kamor kaŋun kokiror loka EJAKAIT: kitoito aipany airimor etem, etiai loepedor aisilosikin aitemisio aarei nuka ikinyom.
Kinapanak akito, kotubutub emoŋ, kipetipet akito. Kotema atiar, “Kilelebata ipipai iwoŋon luka akipi, kobukokisi ainakinet naicweio, akito da.”
Kotema atiar, “Kiareikisi”; kiareikis. Kotema atiar, “Kiuniikisi”; ido kiuniikis.
Koleleata akip airimor etem; kileleb aipany da akipi.
Kopupunoi eoŋ, WU EJAKAIT, kopupunoi, kojenut ituŋa lu ebe ijo EJAKAIT irai Edeke, isibeloki da ikecetauon aboŋun bobo.”
Kosodi akim naka EJAKAIT adoere, kidopo ainakinet naicweio, ka akito, ka amor, ka apua, kimiela akipi kere nuajaas toma aipany.
Keanyutu ituŋa kere, kibiroros ebuburia; kotemasi atiar, “EJAKAIT, ŋes Edeke; EJAKAIT, ŋes Edeke.”
Kotema Eliya kes atiar, “Kikamutu inabin luka Baal; kinyek ediopet kakesi aiku.” Kikamutu kes: koyaŋa Eliya kes aguurut Kison, koarak kes ŋina.
Kotema Eliya Akab atiar, “Konyou, konyam, komat; naarai ejai airurum naka akiru naepol.”
Konyou Akab ainyam ka aimat. Kodoka Eliya kuju Karamel; kisuded, kibwaik akouke kidiŋ akuŋinike.
Kotema ŋesi ekekejaanakinan atiar, “Kolot, kiteluo aŋolol.” Kolot, kiteluo, kotema atiar, “Emamei ibore.” Kotema atiar, “Kolot bobo irwan akanykaarei.”

Kosodi kanen karwan nakikanyetekaarei, kotema atiar, “Koany, elomunit edou kaŋolol, edit bala akan naka ituŋanan.” Kotema atiar, “Kolot, kolimok Akab ebe, ‘Kitemok agalikon, kijesar, kinyek akiru aitikokin jo.’ ”
Kosodi kanen nediokasilon, kirionu akuj idouon ka ekwam, kotep akiru naepol noi. Kiboikin Akab agalike, kolot Yesereel.
Kojai akan naka EJAKAIT mama ejai Eliya; koen aŋabeteke, koker koiŋaren naka Akab kiton orute loka Yesereel.
Kosodi Yesebel aijukar ekiyakia neejai Eliya ebe, “Keswamakis idekesio eoŋ kwaŋin, ka adepar da, arai mam moi esawa kwape kalo eoŋ etusubit akoniijar bala aijar naka ediopet kakesi.”
Kepupu ŋun, konyou, kolot kanuka akeijar, kobu Beer-seba, loerai loka Yuda, kitasal ekekejaanakinan kaŋina.
Koper kojotoor kotolim loka erotem; ido koany, kotiro emalaika ŋes, kotema ŋes atiar, “Konyou, konyam.”
Koŋolia, ido koany, kejai emugati loapeitoi katotol eiduny kakouke, ka atany naka akipi, Konyam komat, kopere bobo.
Kobu emalaika loka EJAKAIT irwan nakiareit, kotiro ŋes, kotema atiar, “Konyou, konyam, naarai elwana noi akonilosit.”
Konyou konyam komat, kolot kagogoŋ naka inyamat kaŋul apaarasia akaisaoŋon ka akuaresia akaisaoŋon kiton Koreb, moru loka Edeke.

Kotema atiar, “Kerumit noi ekokote kanuka EJAKAIT, Edeke loka ajoresio; naarai ajalata idwe luka Isirael aitutuketekon, atiyaikis itemwanakon, aarata inabinokon kekileŋ: eoŋ, eoŋ bon asal; emoete da akaijar amudiar.”

Kotema atiar, “Kolom, kobwo komoru loka EJAKAIT.” Ido koany, kotubor EJAKAIT, kodi ekwam loepol loegogoŋ iroŋan, kobwaŋabwaŋ atiiban kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT: konye komamei EJAKAIT kokwam: akaulo kekwam amaran naka akwap; konye komamei EJAKAIT kamaran naka akwap.
Akaulo kamaran naka akwap akim; konye komamei EJAKAIT kakim: akaulo naka akim eporoto loedit loeyamakina.
Kosodi, kiira Eliya, kimuko akekou kegoeke, koloma, kobwo neelomarere abua, Ido koany, kobu eporoto mama ejai ŋesi ebe, “Eliya, inyo bo iswamai ijo kane?”

Kotema atiar, “Kerumit noi ekokote kanuka EJAKAIT, Edeke loka ajoresio; naarai ajalata idwe luka Isirael aitutuketekon, atiyaikis itemwanakon, aarata inabinokon kekileŋ; eoŋ, eoŋ bon asal; emoete da akaijar amudiar.”
Kotema EJAKAIT ŋes atiar, “Kolot, koboŋo korotokon kiton amodiŋ naka Damasiko: kidol, kinyonyoik Kasael akinyet araun ekabaka loka Suria:
Kinyonyoik da Yeku okoku loka Nimisi akinyet araun ekabaka loka Isirael: kinyoinyoik Elisa okoku loka Sapat loka Abel-mekola akinyet araun enabi aiboisikon.
Kosodi kanen, ŋol loekui ekileŋ loka Kasael eari Yeku: ŋol da loekui ekileŋ loka Yeku eari Elisa.
Konye edeuni eoŋ ilukumin ikanykaarei koIsirael, akuŋin kere numam ekukonokina Baal, ka ŋiniituk kere namam enuit ŋes.”
Aso abu ŋesi konyou kanen, kodum Elisa okoku loka Sapat, ekoriei, kejaas ajookon atomon ka nuarei kiŋarenike, kejai ŋesi ka nakitomonet kaarei: kitor Eliya neejai ŋesi, kocakak ŋes ekegoe.
Kinyek imoŋin, koker atupit Eliya, kotema atiar, “Keŋaiŋait, kisiikinai kanu papaka ka totoka, kasodi konyet eoŋ atupun jo.” Kotema ŋes atiar, “Koboŋo; naarai inyo bo keswamak eoŋ jo?”
Koboŋo katupit ŋes, koyaŋa imoŋin luka ajookot, koar kes, kipo akecekiriŋ kakito nuka imoŋin, koinak ituŋa, konyamata, Kosodi ŋesi anyoun, kotupa Eliya, kijaanak ŋes.
Kijuka ikiyakia mama ejai Akab ekabaka loka Isirael, ore, kotema ŋes atiar, “Inera Ben-kadad kwanata, ebe.
Epuesakon ka esabukon eraas lukaŋ: akoniŋor da ka ikonidwe, lukajokak, eraas lukaŋ.”
Koboŋok ekabaka loka Isirael atiar, “Kwape ejaar akonikirot, ekajakait, wu ekabaka; arai eoŋ lokon, ka lukijaar eoŋ kere.”
Koboŋut ikiyakia bobo, kotemasi atiar, “Inera Ben-kadad kwanata ebe, Abeit abu kejukak jo ebe, Kijaikini ijo eoŋ ekonipuesa ka esabukon, ka akoniŋor, ka ikonidwe;

Konye ejukuni eoŋ ikakejaanakinak mama ijai ijo moi, kwape kapak kana, irereete kesi kotogokon, kotogoi da luka ikonikejaanakinak; kosodi ibore kere yenejokuna kakonyenekon, ikamunete kakecekanin eyaŋaarete.”
Kotemasi imakio kere ka ituŋa kere ŋes atiar, “Sirikiira, karaida acamun.”

Kanuka ŋun kotema ŋesi ikiyakia luka Ben-kadad ebe, “Kolimokis ekajakait ekabaka ebe, Eswamai eoŋ ŋun kere nusodit nuijukunitor ijo ekonikejaanakinan: konye akirot na mam apedori.” Koloto ikiyakia, kinyakakis ŋes akirot.
Kijuka Ben-kadad mama ejai ŋesi, kotema atiar, “Keswamakis idekesio eoŋ kwaŋin ka adepar da, arai kilosikin apua naka Samaria aileleb akanin nuka ituŋa kere lukatupitos eoŋ.”
Koboŋok ekabaka loka Isirael atiar, “Kolimok ŋes ebe, Kinyek loekapanakini lujiisike aiturokin bon kwape ŋol loelacari kes.”
Kosodi kanen, kepupu Ben-kadad akiro ŋun, naamatatar, ŋes ka ikabakan, koswamin, kotema ikekejaanakinak atiar, “Kiderakinos.” Kiderakinos aitiji ere.
Kotema Akab ebe, “Lukaŋai bo?” Kotema atiar, “Inera EJAKAIT kwanata ebe, Ikatumunak luka ikapolok luka ibukui.” Kosodi ŋesi atemar ebe, “Iŋai bo egeuni ejie?” Koboŋok ebe, “Ijo,”
Kosodi kimar ikatumunak luka ikapolok luka ibukui, emwaasi akwat aarei ka akaisauni ka luarei: akaulo abu kimar ituŋa kere, kes idwe kere luka Isirael, emwaasi ilukumin ikanykaarei.
Kogeutu ikatumunak luka ikapolok luka ibukui alomar; kijuka Ben-kadad, kolimokinai ŋes ebe, “Alomut ituŋa ko Samaria.”
Kotema atiar, “Arai elomunitos kainapakina, kikamutu kes ejarete; arai elomunitos ejie, kikamutu kes ejarete.”
Kolomasi kesi kiŋa naka ere, ikatumunak luka ikapolok luka ibukui, ka ajore naatupit kes.
Koar ŋinituŋanan eketuŋanan; kokerata Isurian, korukitor Isirael kes: koku Ben-kadad ekabaka loka Suria kebalasit ka ikebwanenok.
Koloma ekabaka loka Isirael, kodany ibalasin ka agalin, koar Isurian kearit loepol.
Kiswama akirot na; kolema ikabakan, ŋinituŋanan kaiboisike, kibwaikikayaitok aiboisiokec:
Kimar ijo ajore, kwape kajore naibu kotwania, ebalasit aibois kebalasit, agali aibois kagali; kijio kakes kapuuton, abeit kigogoŋoor oni aitelekar kes.” Kiira ŋesi ekeceporoto, kiswama kwaŋin.
Aponi kimarai idwe luka Isirael, koinakinai kes inyamat, koloto ejie kakes: kidukuroto idwe luka Isirael koiŋarenekec kwape isipanin iarei luedisiak luka ikalei; konye kilosikinos Isurian akwap.

Kikunyak etuŋanan loka Edeke kotema ekabaka loka Isirael atiar, “Inera EJAKAIT kwanata ebe, Naarai abalasi Isurian ebe, Erai EJAKAIT Edeke loka iukon, konye mere Edeke loka aditon: kanuka ŋun ŋes ejaikinia ekodet lo kere loepol akanikon, ijenunete yesi ebe Eoŋ EJAKAIT.”
Kidukuroto kiteosi apaarasia akanykaarei. Kosodi kapaaran nakikanyetekaarei kiriama ejie: kapaaran adiopet koarata idwe luka Isirael Isurian ituŋa ilukumin akwatat lukelosete kakeje.
Konye kokera luedeunos Apek, toma ore; kibirokin arwatat ituŋa ilukumin akaisaarei ka lukanykaarei luedeuna.
Koker Ben-kadad, koloma ore, agola nakotoma.

Kotemasi ikekejaanakinak ŋes atiar, “Koany do, kipupu ebe ikabakan luka ekek loka Isirael eraas ikabakan luketimok: kiŋaiŋait, kanapa ipukoi kaŋabesiwok, aunoi da kakwesiwok, kalomasi mama ejai ekabaka loka Isirael: elemuni kitajar ŋesi akoniijar.”

Koenata do ipukoi aŋabesikec, aunoi da akwesikec, kopotu mama ejai ekabaka loka Isirael, kobalas ebe, “Ebala ekejaanakinanikon Ben-kadad ebe, Keŋaiŋait, kisiikinai kajar.” Kotema atiar, “Eriŋa ŋes ejari? Erai onaceka.”

Kosodete ituŋa aiŋic noi, kisunyas ajenun arai ikote nen akeomisio; kotemasi atiar, “Onacekon Ben-kadad.” Kosodi ŋesi atemar atiar, “Koloto koyautu ŋes.” Kosodi Ben-kadad alomun neejai ŋesi; kitodokik ŋes agali.

Kotema Ben-kadad ŋes atiar, “Kenyakakini jo ireria luabu papaka kodemarite papakon; itemokini irotin koDamasiko kwape kolo kitemokinio papaka koSamaria.” Kobala Akab ebe, “Eoŋ da kaosikini jo kaitutuket kana.” Kitutuko kaŋes aitutuket, koosik.
Kosodi ŋol atemar ŋes atiar, “Naarai mam jo irimarit iporoto loka EJAKAIT, koany, atipet napinyounio ijo kamakaŋ, kiari eŋatuny jo.” Ido atipet napanyounio kamakeŋ, kodum eŋatuny ŋes, koar.
Kosodi ŋol adumun ecetuŋanan, kotema atiar, “Kimusuŋai eoŋ, keŋaiŋait.” Kimusuŋ etuŋanan ŋes, kicum, kimusuŋ.
Konyou do enabi, kidareu ekabaka korot, kitegelikin bon kiswap akonyeke kaenet naka akou.

Nakitorio ekabaka, kiworou ŋol ekabaka; kotema atiar, “Abu ekonikejaanakinan koloma kidiŋ ojie; ido koany, abu etuŋanan kopau, koyau ecetuŋanan mamaka kotema atiar, ‘Kidar etuŋanan lo: arai keolio, ŋes konyet ejaunia akoniijar aibois kaijarake, arai bo itaci ijo atalata naka epuesa.’
Naelolitor ekonikejaanakinan lailo ka laije da, kosii etuŋanan.” Kotema ekabaka loka Isirael ŋes atiar, “Kitubokinio jo kwaŋin; ijo elopet icam.”
Kisunya ŋesi, kolaca aenet naka akou kakonyeke; kojen ekabaka loka Isirael ebe erai ŋesi ediopet konabin.
Kotema ŋes atiar, “Inera EJAKAIT kwanata ebe, ‘Naarai ibu koosik kakanikon etuŋanan loabu eoŋ kagita amudiar, kanuka ŋun egeli aijarakon aijarake, ikonituŋa da itia ituŋake.’ ”
Kolot ekabaka loka Isirael oreke ekadakinit, konyunyura, kobu Samaria.

Kosodi Akab kobala Nabos ebe, “Ae emanikorikon loka emusabibu koraun lokaŋ araun emanikor loka edia, naarai eapie kekatogo; kainakini eoŋ jo emanikor ece loka emusabibu loitelekarit ajokis: arai bo itojokit, kainakini apesan kwape ejaar eketiai.”
Kobala Nabos Akab ebe, “Madi EJAKAIT, eoŋ ainakin jo airumet naka lukapapaaka.”

Kobu Akab togoke ekadakinit ido konyunyura kanuka akirot nakelimokini Nabos Eyesereelit ŋes: naarai enera atiar, “Mam kainakini jo airumet naka lukapapaaka.” Korior kaperisike, kimwaŋa akekonyen, koŋer ainyam.
Konye kobu aberuke Yesebel mama ejai, kobala ŋes ebe, “Inyo bo etakadiki ekonitau kwaŋin, tape iŋeri ainyam?”

Kobala ŋes ebe, “Naarai ener kaNabos Eyesereelit, kalimok ŋes ebe, ‘Ae ekonimanikor loka emusabibu kagwel kapesan; arai bo isiyalamikinit kesiec kecemanikor’: kaboŋok ebe, ‘Mam kainakini ekamanikor loka emusabibu.’ ”
Kobala ŋes aberuke Yesebel ebe, “Mere kereka jo iyait ajakanut naka Isirael? Konyou, konyam inyamat, kolakar ekonitau: kainakini eoŋ jo emanikor loka emusabibu loka Nabos Eyesereelit.”
Kwaŋin kiwadik ŋes ibaluan kokiror loka Akab, kipucak kes akeipucet, kijuka ibaluan mama ejaas imakio ka ikapolok lukejaas oreke, lukiboiete kaNabos.
Kiwadik obaluan kinera atiar, “Kolimos ailuŋ, kibwaikis Nabos akonyen nuka ituŋa:
Kisibwaata ituŋa iarei, idwe luka Belial kakonyeneke, kitorona ŋes, kobalas ebe, ‘Ibu koŋerok Edeke ka ekabaka da.’ Koyaŋaasi konyet, kibiribiroto kamor, kotwana.”
Kosodete ituŋa lukorekeŋ, imakio ka ikapolok lukiboiete korekeŋ, kiswamata kwape kicorakinia Yesebel, kwape kiwadikatere obaluan luejukakini ŋesi kes.
Kolimos ailuŋ, kibwaikis Nabos akonyen nuka ituŋa.

Kopotu ituŋa iarei, idwe luka Belial, kiboikinos akonyeneke: kitorona odwe luka Belial Nabos kakonyen nuka ituŋa, atiar, “Abu Nabos koŋerok Edeke ka ekabaka da.” Kitolomasi ŋes kiŋa naka ere, kibiribiroto kamor, kotwana.
Kiyakiasi neejai Yesebel atiar, “Ebiribirii Nabos kamor, atwana.”

Kosodi kanen, kiira Yesebel ebe ebiribirii Nabos kamor, atwana da, kolimok Yesebel Akab atiar, “Konyou, kirum emanikor loka emusabibu loka Nabos loagirit ainakin jo agwel kapesan: naarai mam Nabos eroko ejari, konye atwana.”
Kosodi kanen, kiira Akeb ebe atwana Nabos, konyou Akab kijesar omanikor loka emusabibu loka Nabos Eyesereelit airum.
“Konyou kijesar airiamun ka Akab ekabaka loka Isirael, loiboie koSamaria: koany, ejai omanikor loka emusabibu loka Nabos Eyesereelit airum.

Ido kolimok ŋes atiar, ‘Inera EJAKAIT kwanata ebe, “Iar, irum da?” ’ Kolimok da atiar, ‘Inera EJAKAIT kwanata ebe, “Aibois nakemeoto iŋokwo aokot nuka Nabos, emeete da kwaŋin iŋokwo akoniwokot, nupekon.” ’ ”
Koboŋok atiar, “Kaany; naarai igwelari bon aswam nueroko kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT.
Koany, ayauni nukaronok mama ijai, ido kapiar jo cut, adaun da kama ejai Akab ŋinikoku yenisapat, ka ŋin yeneenen, ka yenimam eenen koIsirael.
Ido etuluori ekonikek aputoor loka Yeroboam okoku loka Nebat, ka aputoor ekek loka Baasa okoku loka Akiya, kanuka aitunyunyurikin nakitunyunyurikini, aitidiakanar Isirael.
Ido kiner EJAKAIT nuka Yesebel da atiar, ‘Enyamakinete iŋokwo Yesebel arwatat naka Yesereel.’
Yenika Akab yenetwanikini ore enyamenenete iŋokwo; ido ŋin yenetwanikini ais enyamenenete akweny nuka apak.”
Kiswamaenenei noi nuketal katuparit aputosia, kwape ejaatar kere nukiswamaenenete Imorain, lukireneari kolo EJAKAIT kakonyen nuka idwe luka Isirael.)
Kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ejai Eliya Etisibit, kobala ebe,
“Iany ijo Akab kwape etasonikinor kakonyeneka? Naarai etasonikin kakonyeneka, mam ayauni aronis ŋin kapaarasiake: konye kapaarasia nuka okokuke ŋes ayaunia aronis ŋin okekike.”
Kotuboros ikar iuni komamei ejie kidiŋ Suria ka Isirael.
Kosodi kanen kokaru lokiwuniet, kobu Yekosapat ekabaka loka Yuda mama ejai ekabaka loka Isirael.
Kotema ekabaka loka Isirael ikekejaanakinak atiar, “ijenete yesi ebe erai Ramot-gilead lowok, oni da kipalarit, mam kidemuni ŋes kakan naka ekabaka loka Suria?”
Kotema ŋesi Yekosapat atiar, “Kiupar tope ijo keoŋ ejie Ramot-gilead?” Kotema Yekosapat ekabaka loka Isirael atiar, “Arai eoŋ kwape iraar ijo, ikatuŋa kwape ikonituŋa, ikabalasin kwape ikonibalasin.”
Kotema Yekosapat ekabaka loka Isirael atiar, “Keŋaiŋait, kiŋit kakirot naka EJAKAIT lolo.”

Kosodi ekabaka loka Isirael atukonokin inabin, kwape ituŋa akwat aoŋon, kotema kes atiar, “Alosi kereka eoŋ aitiji Ramotgilead, arai bo kenye?” Kotemasi kesi atiar, “Kolot; naarai kijaik EJAKAIT ŋes akan naka ekabaka.”
Konye kotema Yekosapat atiar, “Emamei bobo da enabi ece loka EJAKAIT, keŋitata ŋes?”

Kotema ekabaka loka Isirael Yekosapat atiar, “Eriŋa ejai etuŋanan ediopet lokipedori aiŋitunia EJAKAIT, Mikaia okoku loka Imila: konye asac eoŋ ŋes; naarai mam kadwaranakini eoŋ nukajokak, dimarai ca nupekaronok.” Kotema Yekosapat atiar, “Kinyek ekabaka einer kwaŋin.”
Kosodi ekabaka loka Isirael anyaraun ekapolokiton, kotema atiar, “Kisunyite koom Mikaia okoku loka Imila.”
Kiboikin ekabaka loka Isirael ka Yekosapat ekabaka loka Yuda, ŋinituŋanan oicoloŋoke, konapitos inapenekec, kaibois naelal neelomarere orute loka Samaria; kodwarata inabin kere kakonyenekec.
Kotatau Sedekia okoku loka Kenaana amumwara nuka asua, kotema atiar, “Inera EJAKAIT kwanata ebe, ‘Iremio nu Isurian, aitodol naedaunotor kesi.’ ”
Kodwarata inabin kere kwaŋin ebe, “Kolot Ramotgilead, kisirereŋio: naarai ijaikini EJAKAIT ŋes akan naka ekabaka.”

Kosodi ekiyakia loabu kolot anyaraun Mikaia kotema ŋes atiar, “Koany, ejokuka akiro nuka inabin kaituk adiopet mama ejai ekabaka: keŋaiŋait, koputokinos akirotokon kwape kakirot naka ediopet kakesi, kiner nuejok.”
Kotema Mikaia atiar, “Kwape ejaria EJAKAIT, nukalimokini EJAKAIT eoŋ, ŋupeŋun eneri.”

Kedolu ŋesi mama ejai ekabaka, kotema ekabaka ŋes atiar, “Mikaia, kilosi kereka isio Ramot-gilead ejie, arai bo kenyeis?” Koboŋok ŋes ebe, “Koloto, kisirereŋio; ijaikini EJAKAIT ŋes akan naka ekabaka.”
Kotema ekabaka ŋes atiar, “Irwan imwaasi ai kesiyapo jo ebe sirikiilimok eoŋ adiokirot, dimarai nukabeit kokiror loka EJAKAIT.”
Kotema atiar, “Abu kaany Isirael kere isiarakina koroŋan, kwape amerekekin nuemameete ekecokon: kotema EJAKAIT atiar, ‘Emameete nu ejakait; koboŋosi kesi ŋinituŋanan oreke inapakina.’ ”
Kotema ekabaka loka Isirael Yekosapat atiar, “Mam abu kalimok jo ebe mam kadwaranakini eoŋ nukajokak dimarai ca nupekaronok?”
Kotema atiar, “Aso kiira akirot naka EJAKAIT: abu kaany EJAKAIT iboie koicoloŋoke, kobwoi da ajore kere naka akuj kakanike nakoteten ka nakokediany da.
Kotema EJAKAIT atiar, ‘Iŋai iŋalaari Akab, tetere elosi aibirokin Ramot-Gilead?’ Kotema ediopet kopone kalo, ece da kopone ece.
Kolom do emoyo, kobwo kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kotema atiar, ‘Eŋalaari eoŋ ŋes.’
Kotema EJAKAIT ŋes atiar, ‘Kinyo?’ Kotema atiar, ‘Alomari, araun emoyo lokaiŋal kaituke nuka inabinoke kere.’ Kotema ŋesi atiar, ‘Iŋalaari ijo ŋes, ido ipedori: koloma, kiswama kwaŋin.’
Aso do koany, ebwaik EJAKAIT emoyo lokeŋalan aituke nuka inabinokon lu kere; kinerak EJAKAIT jo aronis.”
Kotema Mikaia atiar, “Koany, ianyuni kapaaran kaŋin, nailomaria agola nakotoma aiŋop.”
Kotema ekabaka loka Isirael atiar, “Kikamutu Mikaia, kinyakakis ŋes Amon ekayaiton loka ere, mama ejai Yoas da okoku loka ekabaka;
Kolimokis ebe, ‘Inera ekabaka kwanata ebe, “Kibwaikisi ekesa lo aidaris, kitanyamete ŋes inyamat luka aiticanitoi, kakipi nuka aiticanitoi, aitodol neabunio eoŋ kainapakin.”’ ”
Kotema Mikaia atiar, “Arai teni iboŋu Ijo kainapakin, mam EJAKAIT inerit kamakaŋ.” Kotema atiar, “Kiirasi yesi ituŋa, yes kere.”
Koloto do ekabaka loka Isirael ka Yekosapat ekabaka loka Yuda Ramotgilead.
Kotema ekabaka loka Isirael Yekosapat atiar, “Etegelikini eoŋ bon, alosi ojie; konye konap ijo inapenekon.” Kitegelikin ekabaka loka Isirael bon, kolot ojie.
Abu ekabaka loka Suria kicorakinite ikapolokitok luka agalinike akaisauni ka luuni ebe, “Sirikijioto kaludidik karaida kalukapolok, dimarai kito ekabaka loka Isirael bon.”
Kosodi kanen, keanyut ikapolokitok agalin Yekosapat, kobalas ebe, “Abeit ŋes ekabaka loka Isirael.” Korioto aitiji ŋes; kodelo Yekosapat.
Kosodi kanen, keanyut ikapolokitok agalin ebe mere ŋes ekabaka loka Isirael koboŋut karukitor ŋes.

Kiket ediotuŋanan akabwake komam elosikinit, kogum ekabaka loka Isirael neiriamitotor inapeneke lukasua: kanuka ŋun kotema ekereŋean agalike atiar, “Kibelok akanikon, kodaka eoŋ kajore; naarai kemusuŋi noi.”
Kosisior ejie kapaaran kaŋin: kigaŋitete ekabaka kagalike aitiji Isurian, kotwana do eboŋ; koleleete aokot kamusuŋut ogali.
Kojau eworo anatar ajore kere napelomari akoloŋ ebe, “Ŋinituŋanan oreke, ka ŋinituŋanan obukec.”
Kotwana do ekabaka, koyaunai Samaria; kidaikinai ekabaka Samaria.
Kilota agali katapar naka Samaria; komeoto iŋokwo aokotoke; (kiloŋenenete adotia kanen;) kwape ajaar akirot naka EJAKAIT naabu kolim.
Aswamisio ace nuka Akab, ka kere nuabu kiswama, ka etogo loabu koduk, mam kereka iwadikatai oitabo loka aisiitonokin nuka ikabakan luka Isirael?
Kojotoor Akab kalukapapaake; kirum Akasia okokuke aiboisike.
Korai Yekosapat loka ikar akaisauni ka lukany egeuni ŋesi airum; kirumak ikar akaisaarei ka lukany koYerusalem. Ekiror loka totoke ŋes Asuba akoku naka Sili.

Kolosenenei ŋesi korot kere loka Asa papake; mam abu kopaa, kiswama nuejok kakonye nuka EJAKAIT: konye mam aponi kolemarai aiboisio nuiceleleete; koriŋa da ituŋa ainanakinete asuban, kisupuruunete lueuru maa kaiboisio nuiceleleete.
Kopuco Yekosapat kekabaka loka Isirael.
Aswamisio ace nuka Yekosapat, ka akegogoŋ naetodiarit, kwape ajior da, mam kereka iwadikatai oitabo loka aisiitonokin nuka ikabakan luka Yuda?
Abu kireŋea kakwap luedeunos luka luitepete ikiliok, luedeunos kapaarasia nuka Asa papake.
Kiswamau Yekosapat ameerin nuka Tarusis alosit Opir adumun esabu: konye mam apotu koloto; naarai kobilas ameerin koEsion-geber.
Kosodi Akasia okoku loka Akab atemari Yekosapat atiar, “Kisiik ikakejaanakinak aupar kikonikejaanakinak kameerin.” Konye koŋer Yekosapat.
Kojotoor Yekosapat kalukapapaake, aponi kidaikinai nepepe kalukapapaake ore loka Daudi papaake: kirum Yekoram okokuke aiboisike.
Kogeu Akasia okoku loka Akab airum Isirael koSamaria kokaru lokitomonet kakanykaarei loka Yekosapat ekabaka loka Yuda, kirumak Isirael ikar iarei.
Kiswama nueroko kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kolosenenei korot loka papake, korot loka totoke, korot da loka Yeroboam okoku loka Nebat, loetidiakaria Isirael.
Abu kijaanak Baal, komaenenei ŋes, kitunyunyurik EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael, kwape ajaatar kere nuabu papake kiswama.

Konye kotema emalaika loka EJAKAIT Eliya Etisibit atiar, “Konyou, kolot kiriamakinos kikiyakia luka ekabaka loka Samaria, kotema kes atiar, ‘Emamei kereka Edeke kotoma Isirael, tape ilosete aiŋitun kama ejai Baal-sebub edeke loka Ekuron?’
Aso do inera EJAKAIT kwanata ebe, ‘Mam inyouni koitada loidokikinit, konye abeit itwani.’ ” Konyouni do Eliya.
Koboŋosi ikiyakia mamake, kotema ŋesi kes atiar, “Kanukinyo iboŋunioto?”

Kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Abu kobu etuŋanan airiamun kasio, kolimok sio ebe, ‘Koloto, koboŋosi mama ejai ekabaka lokiyakuuni yes, kotemasi ŋes atiar, Inera EJAKAIT kwanata ebe, Emamei kereka Edeke kotoma Isirael, tape iyakiari aiŋitun kama ejai Baal-sebub edeke loka Ekuron? Kanuka ŋun mam inyouni koitada loidokikinit, konye abeit itwani.’ ”
Kotema kes atiar, “Ejesi bo ai etuŋanan loabuni airiamun kayes, kolimok akiro ŋun?”
Koboŋokis ŋes ebe, “Erai etuŋanan loecekit, enapit arukan naka emukule kaŋabeteke.” Kotema ŋesi atiar, “Ŋes Eliya Etisibit.”
Koboŋok Eliya ekapolon loka akaisakany ebe, “Arai arai eoŋ etuŋanan loka Edeke, kobu akim kokuju, kicwe jo ka akaisakanyikon.” Kobu akim kokuju, kicwe ŋes ka akaisakanyike.
Koboŋok Eliya kotema kes atiar, “Arai arai eoŋ etuŋanan loka Edeke, kobu akim kokuju, kicwe jo ka akaisakanyikon.” Kobu akim naka Edeke kokuju, kicwe ŋes ka akaisakanyike.
Koany, abu akim kobu kokuju kicwe ikapolok iarei lusodit luka akaisakany ka akaisakanyikec: konye korai akaijar naka akais nuipu kakonyenekon.”
Kotema emalaika loka EJAKAIT Eliya atiar, “Kikokoror kaŋes; sirikikurianar ŋes.” Konyou, kikokoror kaŋes mama ejai ekabaka.

Kotema ŋes atiar, “Inera EJAKAIT kwanata ebe, naarai ibu kiyakia ikiyakia aiŋitun kama ejai Baal-sebub edeke loka Ekuron, emamei kereka Edeke kotoma Isirael aiŋitun akekirot? Kanuka ŋun mam inyouni koitadakon loidokikinit, konye abeit itwani.”
Kotwana do kwape ajaar akirot naka EJAKAIT naenera Eliya. Kogeu Yekoram airum aiboisike kokaru lokiareit loka Yekoram okoku loka Yekosapat ekabaka loka Yuda; naarai amamei ŋes ikoku yenitelepat.
Aswamisio ace nuka Akasia nuabu kiswama mam kereka iwadikatai oitabo loka aisiitonokin nuka ikabakan luka Isirael?
Kotema Eliya Elisa atiar, “Keŋaiŋait kopaik ne: naarai kejukit EJAKAIT eoŋ Besel.” Kobala Elisa ebe, “Kwape ejaria EJAKAIT, ido kwape ejaria ekonitau da, mam kajali jo.” Koloto koton Besel.
Kolomunete do idwe luka inabin lukejaas Besel neejai Elisa, kotemasi ŋes atiar, “ijeni ebe eyaŋaari EJAKAIT ekonijakait kama ijai ijo lolo?” Kobala ŋesi ebe, “Eebo, ajeni, kililiŋata yesi,”

Kosodi kotema Eliya ŋes atiar, “Keŋaiŋait, Elisa, kopaik ne; naarai kejukit EJAKAIT eoŋ Yeriko,” Kobala ŋesi ebe, “Kwape ejaria EJAKAIT, ido kwape ejaria ekonitau da, mam kajali jo.” Kosodete kodolo Yeriko.
Kikunyakis idwe luka inabin lukejaas Yeriko neejai Elisa, kotemasi ŋes atiar, “ijeni ebe eyaŋaari EJAKAIT ekonijakait kama ijai ijo lolo?” Koboŋok ŋesi ebe, “Eebo, ajeni; kililiŋata yesi.”
Kosodi kotema Eliya ŋes atiar, “Keŋaiŋait, kopaik ne; naarai kejukit EJAKAIT eoŋ Yorodan.” Kobala ŋesi ebe, “Kwape ejaria EJAKAIT, ido kwape ejaria ekonitau da, mam kajali jo.” Kosodokis kesi luarei.
Koloto ikiliok akaisakany lukotoma odwe luka inabin, kobwaata atereikina kes kama elwana; kobwaata kesi luarei koYorodan.
Kosodi kolem Eliya ekelou, konunuk, kopaari ainomia akipi, kotiakas epuai ka epuai, kitoro da kesi luarei neeonit.
Kobala ŋes ebe, “Ilipit ijo akirot naetiono: konye, arai kiiany kaalemar eoŋ, ikwaikinos nen; konye arai mam, mam ikwaikinos nen.”
Kosodi kanen, eriŋa elosete, iyalaete, koany, kotakan agali naka akim ka ibalasin luka akim, kotiakata kes luarei; kodoka Eliya toma akuj ketapipirio.
Keanyu Elisa, kiworo atiar, “Ipapa, Ipapa, agalin nuka Isirael ka ikebwanenok da.” Mam eanyuna ŋes bobo.
Kosodi kitiŋ ikenapen kocil atutubeta aarei.
Kolem da elou loka Eliya loabu kodou, koboŋo, kobwo kariri naka Yorodan.
Kolem elou loka Eliya loabu kodou, kinomia akipi, kotema atiar, “Ai bo ejai EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Eliya?” Ido kedau ŋesi da ainomia akipi, kotiakas epuai ka epuai: kotubor Elisa.
Keanyut ŋes idwe luka inabin lukejaas Yeriko kotemasi atiar, “Adoiki emoyo loka Eliya neejai Elisa.” Kopotu aisiriamaar ŋes, kisudedoto kakonyeneke.

Kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Koany, ejaas ituŋa akaisakany lukagogoŋok, nepepe kikonibulesin; kiŋaiŋait, koloto kesi amoot ejakaitikon: motoko edakarit emoyo loka EJAKAIT ŋes kocaka ŋes oroŋat, arai bo aditot.” Kotema atiar, “Mam iyakiarete kes.”
Kimaimaata ŋes aitodol neeleicikinio, kotema atiar, “Kiyakiasi do,” Kanuka ŋun kiyakiarai ituŋa akaisakany; komoata adaun apaarasia auni, konye mam apotu kodumut.
Koboŋut mama ejai, eroko idarit koYeriko; kotema kes atiar, “Mam abu kalimok yes ebe, ‘Sirikiloto?’ ”
Kotema atiar, “Koinunai atany nakitetet, kibwaikis abalaŋ toma.” Koinut ŋes.
Koloma kolot neejai akoŋu naka atan, kocakak abalaŋ, kotema atiar, “Inera EJAKAIT kwanata ebe, Etaŋaleu eoŋ akipi nu; mam bobo elomuni atwanare karaida aimotoikin.”
Kwaŋin konaleut akip kiton lolo, kwape ajaar akirot naka Elisa naenera.
Koŋolia kau koany kes, kiken kes kokiror loka EJAKAIT. Kolomut adubui aarei kamonieik, kopoopoata idwe akaisaoŋon ka luarei kakesi.
Konyou kanen kolot moru Karamel, konyou kanen koboŋo Samaria.
Kiswama nueroko kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT; konye komam aputokin nuka papake ka totoke: naarai abu kolema epir loka Baal loabu papake kiswama.
Konye kiketakin karonisio nuka Yeroboam okoku loka Nebat, nuetidiakaria Isirael; mam abu konyou kakesi.
Kosodi kanen ketwana Akab, kipaliik do ekabaka loka Moab ekabaka loka Isirael.
Koloma ekabaka Yekoram koSamaria kapakio kaŋun, kimar Isirael kere.

Kolot kiyakia mama ejai Yekosapat ekabaka loka Yuda ebe, “Kepaliiki ekabaka loka Moab; kiupari ijo keoŋ aitiji Moab?” Kotema atiar, “Alosi: arai eoŋ kwape iraar ijo, ikatuŋa kwape ikonituŋa, ka ikabalasin da kwape ikonibalasin.”
Kotema atiar, “Kitoro orot ali?” Koboŋok ebe, “Orot lokamodiŋ naka Edom.”
Kotema ekabaka loka Isirael atiar, “Wu okwe! Naarai anyarau Ejakait ikabakan lu luuni aijaikin kes akan naka Moab.”

Konye kotema Yekosapat atiar, “Emamei kereka kane enabi loka EJAKAIT, aiŋitunia EJAKAIT?” Koboŋok ediopet loka ikejaanakinak luka ekabaka loka Isirael ebe, “Ejai Elisa okoku loka Sapat kane, loalianakini akipi akanin nuka Eliya.”
Kotema Yekosapat atiar, “Ejai akirot naka EJAKAIT kaŋes.” Kolot ekabaka loka Isirael ka Yekosapat ka ekabaka loka Edom mama ejai.
Kotema Elisa atiar, “Kwape ejaria EJAKAIT loka ajoresio, loabwoi eoŋ kakonyeneke, abeit, arai kemam apodo Yekosapat ekabaka loka Yuda ajaut kane, timam kaaŋolia jo, timam ketei da.
Aso do koinunai ekaraman.” Kosodi kanen, kerama ekaraman, kodoik ŋes apedor naka EJAKAIT.
Kotema atiar, “Inera EJAKAIT kwanata ebe, ‘Kilelebata alelesia aditot na.’
Naarai inera EJAKAIT kwanata ebe, ‘Mam ianyunete ekwam karaida akiru, konye ilelebunos akip aditot; imasete yesi da, yes, ka ibarenekus, ka itiaŋikus.’
Konye erai na akirot naedit kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT: ijaikini da ŋesi Imoabin akaninikus.
Idanyete luka ŋolire loebwaitai, ka ŋolire loititatai, ijepete ŋolikitoi loejok, inukete atanin kere nuka akipi, imunaarete kamor ŋinimana naejok.”
Kosodi kanen, tupuruc, kapak naka ainakin ainakinet, koany, kopotu akipi elomunito korot loka Edom, kilelebun akwap akipi.
Kepuputu Imoabin kere ebe apotu ikabakan aitiji kes, kotukonokinos, kere luepedorete ainap lujiis ka adepar, kobwaata koikor.
Konyoutu tupuruc sek, kocaik akoloŋ akipi, koanyutu Imoabin akipi kajuwaikec ereŋak bala aokot.
Kotemasi atiar, “Nu kes aokot; abeit amudiaros ikabakan, adanyakinos, ŋinituŋanan aar aupake: aso do, Moab, kaŋata.”
Kedoloto oidukurun luka Isirael, konyoutu Isiraelin kodanyata Imoabin, kokerata kakonyenekec: kiyatakinos alosit akwap edanyete Imoabin.

Kotiyatiyata ireria; kocakanakis ŋolituŋanan akemoru ŋinimana naejok, kilelebun; konukata atanin kere nuka akipi, kojepata ikito kere lukajokak; aitodol needeuniata amor nuko Kir-kareset ban; konye kirimirimoto lukaporoceta, atiyatiya.
Keanyu ekabaka loka Moab ebe ipikorit ejie ŋes, koyaŋa ituŋa akwat akanykaarei lukedakito ikileŋa kaŋes, acilar mama ejai ekabaka loka Edom: konye mam apotu kopedosi.
Kosodi alemun okokuke ekiyai lotikirum aiboisike, koinak ŋes araun ainakinet naicweio karwatat, Kojaun anyunyura naepol mama ejai Isirael: konyout kamakeŋ, koboŋosi akwapukec.
Kotema Elisa ŋes atiar, “Anyoika keswamakini jo? Kolimokinai; inyo bo ejai kajo togo?” Kotema atiar, “Emamei akonikejaanakinan ibore kotogo, dimarai amot naka akinyet.”
Kosodi ŋesi atemar atiar, “Kolot, kilipu ikoniidunyeta kere lukirimorito amoti, amoti nuemameete iboro kotoma; sirikilipu nuikidioko.
Ilomari, igolor ijo ka ikonidwe, kobukonok akinyet amoti ŋun kere; kiŋadanari nuilelebunos awai.”
Konyou ŋin kama ejai ŋesi, kogolor ŋes ka odweke iarei; koinununut ŋes amoti, kobukonokini.
Kosodi kanen, kilelebunos amoti, kotema ŋin okokuke atiar, “Koinunai aeemot.” Kotema ŋes atiar, “Emamei bobo amot.” Kosaŋak akinyet.
Kosodi ŋin abunore alimokin etuŋanan loka Edeke. Koboŋok ŋesi atiar, “Kolot, kogwela akinyet, kotac apesenekon, ido luideunos kojariata ijo ka ikonidwe.”
Kotema ŋin okilenike atiar, “Koany, amisiik eoŋ lo erai etuŋanan lokalaunan loka Edeke, loitorenenei ne tiritir.
Keŋaiŋait, kadukokis ŋes igola karwatat; kebwaikis nen kanuke eitada, ka emesa, ka eicoloŋ, ka epir loka atala: tetere naebunenenoo ŋesi mamawok, kopauni nen.”
Kosodi apaaran adiopet, kobu ŋesi nen, kopau agola koper nen.
Kotema ŋesi Gekasi ekejaanakinanike atiar, “Konyarau Asunamit ŋin.” Kosodi kenyaraun, kobwo kakonyeneke.
