Kotema ŋes atiar, “Kolimok ŋin ebe, Koany, kibuak ijo sio kaibuakin naetia netine; inyo bo do kiswamakinio jo? Ikoto aitodiario mama ejai ekabaka arai bo mama ejai ekapolon loka ajore?” Koboŋok ŋin ebe, “Eboie eoŋ kotuŋaka.”
Kotema atiar, “Aso inyo bo do kiswamakinio ŋes?” Koboŋok Gekasi ebe, “Abeit emamei ŋes ikoku yenitelepat, emojoŋit da okilenike.”
Kotema atiar, “Konyarau ŋes.” Konyarau, kobwo ŋin kokek.
Kotema ŋesi atiar, “Kapak kana, kedol ekaru, ituni ikoku yenitelepat.” Kotema ŋin ŋes atiar, “Mam, ekajakait, ijo etuŋanan loka Edeke, sirikiŋal akonikejaanakinan.”
Kopotuu aberu, kouri ikoku yenitelepat kapak kaŋin kedol ekaru, kwape alimokinia Elisa ŋes.
Kosodi kepoloor ikoku, adiopepaaran, kolot mama ejai papake mama ejaas ikadwenyak.
Kotema ŋesi papake atiar, “Akouka, akouka.” Kotema ekejaanakinanike atiar, “Kodaka ŋes mama ejai totoke.”
Keyaŋaa, kitodol mama ejai totoke, kiboikin akuŋinike aitodol kidiŋ paaran, kotwana.
Kodoka ŋin, kiperik oitada loka etuŋanan loka Edeke, kogolok ekek, koloma kiŋa.
Kiworo okilenike kotema atiar, “Keŋaiŋait, kijukakinai ediopet kokejaanakinak, ka adiopet kasigirian, kakeria mama ejai etuŋanan loka Edeke, kaboŋu.”
Kotema atiar, “Kanukinyo ikotor alosit neejai ŋesi lolo? Mam erai ailamun naka elap karaida nakasabato.” Kotema ŋin atiar, “Nukajokak.”
Kosodi ŋin aipet lupetan asigiriake, kotema ekejaanakinanike atiar, “Kireŋea, kiyatak alosit; sirikiyap aibwanen, dimarai kaalimok jo.”
Kolot do, kodol mama ejai etuŋanan loka Edeke omoru Karamel.
Kosodi kanen, keany etuŋanan loka Edeke ŋes elwana, kotema Gekasi ekejaanakinanike ebe, “Koany, ejai Asunamit ŋina:
Keŋaiŋait, koker airiamakin kaŋes, kiŋit ŋes atiar, Ijai ejok? Okilenikon da ejok? Ikoku da ejok?” Koboŋok ŋin atiar, “Ejokuka.”

Kedolo ŋesi mama ejai etuŋanan loka Edeke koukot, kitiŋ akejeke. Kikunyak Gekasi aremor ŋes; konye kotema etuŋanan loka Edeke atiar, “Kinyek: naarai ekadakinit eketau; kemunonikinit EJAKAIT, mam kalimokinit eoŋ.”
Kosodi ŋin atemar atiar, “Abu eoŋ kakoto ikoku yenitelepat kama ejai ekajakait? Mam abu katema atiar, Sirikiiŋala?”

Kosodi ŋesi atemar Gekasi atiar, “Koen aŋabetekon, kitiŋ ebelaka akanikon, kolot: arai kiriamunos kituŋanan kere, sirikiyoga ŋes; arai kiiyoga ituŋanan, sirikiboŋok: kibwaik ekabela akonyen nuka ikoku.”
Kobala toto naka ikoku ebe, “Kwape ejaria EJAKAIT, kwape ejaria ekonitau da, mam kajali jo.” Konyou ŋesi, kotupa ŋin.
Kotubor Gekasi kiŋarenikec, kibwaik ebela akonyen nuka ikoku; konye amamei eporoto karaida apupun, Kanuka ŋun koboŋo airiamakin kaŋes, kolimok ebe, “Mam ikoku ekwenyunit.”
Keloma Elisa togo, koany, atwana ikoku, kiperikinitete oitadake.
Koloma do kogoloros kes iarei, kilip EJAKAIT.
Kolot, koper ebuburia kakuan naka ikoku, kibwaik akeituk aituk naka ikoku, akonyeke da akonyeke, akaninike da akaninike: koriori kama ejai ikoku; komwanu akuan naka ikoku.
Kosodi ŋesi aboŋor, koriaria kotoma togo; kodoka koriori kama ejai ikoku: kikaresio ikoku irwan akanykaarei, kokweny ikoku.
Konyarau Gekasi, kotema atiar, “Konyarau Asunamit ŋin,” Konyarau ŋes, Keloma ŋin mamake, kotema atiar, “Kodaka ikonikoku.”
Kosodi ŋin alomun, kisudede kakejeneke, kokukum kwap; kodak okokuke, koloma.
Koloma ediopet omanikor aide edia, kodum emusabibu loka ais, kodeŋ imonyono luka ais kotunite kogoe, kobu kogetanak kes toma akeit naka atap: naarai mam ajenete kes.
Kodutakinai ituŋa ainyam. Kosodi kanen, enyamete, kiworoto ebe, “Wu okwe, etuŋanan loka Edeke, ejai atwanare toma akeit ŋin,” Mam apotu kopedosi ainyam.
Konye kotema ŋesi atiar, “Koyautu akiria.” Kocakak akeit; kotema atiar, “Kodutakisi ituŋa, konyama.” Kemamei bobo aronis kotoma akeit.
Kotema ekejaanakinanike atiar, “Okwe! ebwaikini lu akonyen nuka ituŋa akwatat?” Konye kotema atiar, “Koinak ituŋa konyama; naarai inera EJAKAIT kwanata ebe, Enyamete, kideut.”
Kibwaik akonyenekec, konyamata kideutu, kwape ajaar akirot naka EJAKAIT.
Apotu Isurian kolomarito korioŋeta, koŋatut ipese kakwap naka Isirael; ido kijaanakinenei ŋin aberu naka Naaman.
Kosodi kotema ŋesi totoke atiar, “Arai papaka ejaas kenabi loejai Samaria! Ti kitaŋaleu ŋes aketapon.”
Kosodi koloma etuŋanan, kolimok ejakaitike atiar, “Ebala kwaŋin ipese yenikakwap naka Isirael.”
Kosodi kobala ekabaka loka Suria ebe, “Ape bo kolot, ejukakini eoŋ ekabaka loka Isirael ebalua.”
Kosodi kolot, koyaŋa da atalatan atomon nuka epuesa, ka atutubeta nuka esabu alukumin akanykape, ka inapen itomon.
Kosodi koinu ekabaka loka Isirael ebalua, kobala ebe, “Aso kiidolok jo ebalua lo, koany, kejukakinit jo ekakejaanakinan Naaman, tetere itaŋaleuni ŋes atapon.”

Kosodi kanen, kesioma ekabaka loka Isirael ebalua, kocil ikenapen, kobala ebe, “Arai gwai eoŋ Edeke, aiar ka aitajar da, tape ekesa lo kejukakini eoŋ aitaŋaleun etuŋanan aketapon? Konye koomoomata, keŋaiŋaito, kojenut kwape emoia aitoŋolop eoŋ.”
Kosodi kobu Naaman ka ikebalasin ka akegalin da, kobwo kokek loka etogo loka Elisa.
Kijukak Elisa ŋes ekiyakia, kobala ebe, “Kolot kiloŋ koYorodan irwan akanykaarei, itemokin bobo akonikuan, ijo da iŋaleuni.”
Konye konyunyurikin Naaman, kolot, kobala ebe, “Koany, aomit bo eoŋ ebe mam eswaki alomuni mama ajai, aibwo, ka aiworo ekiror loka EJAKAIT Ekedeke, ka ararapaanar akais nuka atapon ka aitaŋaleun eoŋ.
Abana ka Parupar, icorin luka Damasiko, mam itelekarito ajokis akipi kere nuka Isirael? Mam apedori ailoŋ kaŋul, kasodi aŋaleun?” Kibelokin kolot elilit.
Kikunyakis ikekejaanakinak, kinerata kaŋes, kotemasi atiar, “Okwe ipapa, arai kiicorakinit enabi aswam akirot naepol, mam tikiswama? Aso mam itelekarit noi, nakilimokinia jo ebe, Kiloŋ, koŋaleu?”
Kosodi kijesar, kolumono irwan akanykaarei koYorodan, kwape kejaar akirot naka etuŋanan loka Edeke, kitemokin bobo akekuan kwape akuan naka ikoku yenididi, koŋaleu.
Konye Koboŋok ŋesi ebe, “Kwape ejaria EJAKAIT, loabwoi eoŋ kakonyeneke, mam kejaari idiobore,” Kimaima ŋes aijaar; konye kogir.

Kobala Naaman ebe, “Arai mam kijaari, aso keŋaiŋait jo koinakinai ekonikejaanakinan aritai nuka alup nuibwokete inyubun iarei; naarai mam eriŋa bobo ekonikejaanakinan einanakini luinanakina luicweio karaida asuban mama ejaas icedekesio, dimarai mama ejai EJAKAIT.

Kisioni EJAKAIT ekonikejaanakinan kakirot kana; naelomanaria ejakaitika toma abila naka Rimon aima, kegoŋakin akanika, kesuded eoŋ kabila naka Rimon, naesudedeonono kabila naka Rimon, kisionienenei EJAKAIT ekonikejaanakinan kakirot kaŋin.”
Kotema ŋes atiar, “Kolot inapakina.” Konyou kama ejai koeka neelwanikina.
Kotupak Gekasi Naaman. Keanyu Naaman yenatupit ŋes, kodoku kogali aisiriama ŋes, kotema atiar, “Kojokuka baca?”

Kobala ebe, “Ejokuka. Kejukunit ejakaitika ebe, Koany, adolut kwape kwana neajai itelepai iarei luka odwe luka inabin, luapote koukon luka Epuraim; keŋaiŋait, koinak kes atalata naka epuesa, ka inapen iarei.”
Kotema Naaman ŋes atiar, “Kiyu, koyaŋa atalatan aarei.” Kikanikan, koen atalatan aarei nuka epuesa koriagin iarei, ka inapen iarei, kisibwok ikekejaanakinak iarei; kibwokata kakonyeneke.
Kedol oukot, kijaa kakanikec, kiŋadak togo: kotwar ituŋa, koboŋosi.
Konye koloma, kobwo kakonyen nuka ejakaitike. Kobala Elisa ebe, “Gekasi, ai bo kibunio?” Kobala ebe, “Mam neelosit ekonikejaanakinan.”

Kobala ŋes ebe, “Mam ekatau elosit kajo, naebelokinor etuŋanan kagalike aisiriam jo? Ŋes apak aijaun epuesa, ka aijaun inapen, ka imanikoria luka iseitunin, ka luka imusabibun, ka amerekekin, ka imoŋin, ka ibulesin ka abulesin?
Aso kikopakin jo atapon naka Naaman, ka akoniwur ikar ka ikar.” Koloma kaneejai ibokoriat akuan atapon.
Kiŋaiŋait, kaloto Yorodan, kojepu ŋolituŋanan atekat, kadukioto ŋina aibois nekiboio.” Koboŋok ŋesi ebe, “Koloto yesi.”
Kotema ediopet atiar, “Keŋaiŋait, kiyu, kouparos kikonikejaanakinak.” Koboŋok ebe, “Kiupari.”
Kosodi aupar kakes. Kedoloto Yorodan, kojepa akito.
Konye napejepi ediopet atekat, kidotun aep kodo akipi: komony kotema atiar, “Wu okwe, ekajakait! Naarai erai ailipuna.”
Kotema etuŋanan loka Edeke atiar, “Ai bo adoo?” Kitodik ŋes aibois. Kojepu akitoi, kocakak nen, kisilepu asuat.
Kotema atiar, “Kolem,” Korio akekan, kolem.
Kosodi kojioto ekabaka loka Suria ka Isirael; kinerut kikekejaanakinak atiar, “Abore kamutan ŋes ejaikin ekaswam.”
Kiyakik etuŋanan loka Edeke ekabaka loka Isirael kinera atiar, “Kocoite kinyek aitor abore kamutan naarai itorete Isurian ŋina.”
Kijuka ekabaka loka Isirael toma aibois ŋin naalimokini etuŋanan loka Edeke ikwenyari; koku kaŋina, mere irwan atipet karaida aarei.
Kosodi kiyaloŋoŋ noi ekabaka loka Suria kotauke kanuka akirot kaŋin; konyarau ikekejaanakinak kotema kes atiar, “Mam kitejenunete eoŋ ediopet kaoni loejai kanuka ekabaka loka Isirael?”
Kotema ediopet kokejaanakinakake atiar, “Mam ekajakait, wu ekabaka; konye Elisa enabi loejai koIsirael ŋes elimonokini ekabaka loka Isirael akiro nuinera ijo kagolakon.”
Kotema atiar, “Koloto koanyutu neejai, kejuka koomai.” Kolimokinai ebe, “Koany, ejai Dotan.”
Kosodi kijuka ibalasin ka agalin, ka ajore naepol: kopotu kuare kirigaut ere.
Koboŋok ebe: “Sirikikurianar: naarai ipu ŋul lueja kaoni adepar luejaas kakes.”

Kilip Elisa kobala ebe, “Wu EJAKAIT, keŋaiŋait, kitwekeny akekonye tetere eanyuni.” Kosodi kitwekeny EJAKAIT akonye nuka etelepat; koany; ido koany, ileleba eroŋat ibalasin ka agalin nuka akim irimorito Elisa.
Kikokororos kesi neejai ŋesi, kilip Elisa EJAKAIT, kotema atiar, “Keŋaiŋait kitumudak akonye nuka ituŋa kalu.” Kitumudak akonyekec kwape ajaar akirot naka Elisa.
Kotema Elisa kes atiar, “Mere lo ŋes erot, ido mere lo ŋes ere: kotupunai, ketodoli eoŋ yes mama ejai etuŋanan loimoete.” Koyaŋa kes Samaria.
Kosodi kanen, kedoloto Samaria, kotema Elisa atiar, “EJAKAIT, kitwekeny akonye nuka ituŋa kalu, koanyut.” Kitwekeny EJAKAIT akonyekec, koanyutu; ido koany, kejaas toma Samaria.
Keanyu kes, kotema ekabaka loka Isirael Elisa atiar, “Ipapa, adanyi kes? Adanyi kes?”
Koboŋok ebe, “Mam idanyi kes: ikoto kereka aidany ŋul luiŋatu kekonikileŋ ka akabwakon? Kibwaik atap ka akipi akonyenekec, konyama komata, koboŋosi mama ejai ejakaitikec.”
Kipoik kes inyamat luipu: kedautu ainyam ka aimat, kotwara kes, koloto mama ejai ejakaitikec, Mam bobo apotu irioŋeta luka Suria kopotu akwap naka Isirael.
Kosodi kanen, kokau kaŋun, kotukonok Ben-kadad ekabaka loka Suria ajoreke kere, kodoka, kirigau Samaria.

Kojai ebeli loededeŋ toma Samaria: ido koany, kirigaut, aitodol neagwelariata akou naka asigiria atutubeta akaisakanykauni nuka epuesa, ka atutubet nakiwoŋonet naka aoret naka ajele atutubeta akany nuka epuesa,
Nakitoritor ekabaka loka Isirael arwatat, komonyak aberu ŋes, kotema atiar, “Kiŋarakinai, ejakaitika, wu ekabaka.”
Kotema atiar, “Arai mam EJAKAIT kiŋarakini jo, alemuni eoŋ kai lukeŋarakinia jo? Opejal arai bo acuet ebino?”
Kotema ekabaka ŋes atiar, “Anyoika bo?” Koboŋok ebe, “Abu aberu na katema eoŋ atiar, ‘Kopala ikokukon, kanyama ŋes lolo, kinyami yenika da moi.’
Kipou kepooto ikokuka, kanyama: kasodi eoŋ atemar ŋes kapaaran nakiareit ebe, ‘Kopala ikokukon, kanyama.’ Konye ebwa ŋesi ikokuke.”
Kosodi kanen, kepupu ekabaka akiro nuka aberu, kocil inapeneke; ido etorit ŋesi arwatat; kosesenete ituŋa, ido koany, kenapit epuko kakuanake.
Kosodi ŋesi atemar atiar, “Keswamak Edeke eoŋ kwaŋin, ka adepar da, arai esalakini akou naka Elisa okoku loka Sapat mama ejai ŋesi lolo.”
Eroko inera kakes, koany, kodol ekiyakia mama ejai: kotema atiar, “Koany, aronis na erai naka EJAKAIT; kanukinyo bo edaritor EJAKAIT?”

Kosodi ekapolon loagoŋanakin ekabaka akanike aboŋokin etuŋanan loka Edeke ebe, “Koany, arai kiswama EJAKAIT apedon toma akuj, tikepedoo akirot ŋin ajaut?” Kotema atiar, “Koany, ianyuni kakonikonye konye mam inyami.”

Arai kiitema atiar, Kalomasi ore, ejai ebeli ore, kitwakikini nen: arai kiiboikini nepene kitwaki. Aso do kaloto, kaluŋakinos ajore naka Isurian: arai kiitajarata oni, kijari; arai kijarata, kitwaki do.”
Konyout nape imuki alosit oidukurun luka Isurian: kedoloto ariri naka iidukurun luka Isurian, koany, kemamei ediotuŋanan.

Naarai abu EJAKAIT kisiira ajore naka Isurian aruo naka agalin, ka aruo naka ibalasin, aruo naka ajore naepol: kotemanaros atiar, “Koany, ebooleikis ekabaka loka Isirael ikabakan luka Ikitin ka ikabakan luka Imisirian aitiji oni,”
Kanuka ŋun konyout kokerata nape imuki, kinyeikis iwemanakec, ka ibalasinikec, ka asigirianakec, kwape ajaatar Iidukurun, kokerata kanuka akeceijar.

Kedoloto lukatapon ŋul ariri naka iidukurun, kolomasi owema ediopet, konyama komata, kolemut epuesa ka esabu ka inapen, koloto kibwaata; koboŋut, kolomasi owema ece, kolemut kanen da, koloto kibwaata.

Kopotu kiworoto ekagolon loka ere: kolimonokis kes ebe, “Kidolo isio oidukurun luka Isurian, ido koany, amamei etuŋanan, karaida eporoto loka ituŋanan, konye ibalasin eenen, ka asigirian eenen, ka iweman da kwape kwaŋin.”
Konyarau ikagolok; kolimokis lukokal loka ekabaka lukotoma.

Konyou ekabaka kuare, kotema ikekejaanakinak atiar, “Kekwenyari yes nukiswamakis Isurian oni. Ejenete kesi ebe kiriebi oni eteŋei; kanuka ŋun ŋes alomariata koidukurun aiŋop ais, kobalas ebe, ‘Kelomut kore, kaŋatasi ejarete, kilomari do ore.’ ”

Koboŋok ediopet kokejaanakinakake kotema atiar, “Keŋaiŋait, koyaŋaasi icetuŋa ibalasin ikany luedeunos, luesalito ore, (koany, esubito kesi bala ekodet kere loka Isirael loedeun kaŋes; koany, esubito bala ekodet kere loka Isirael loamudiar:) kejukasi, kaanyutu.”
Kosodete koyaŋaasi agalin aarei kibalasin; kijuka ekabaka atupar ajore naka Isurian, kobala ebe, “Koloto, koanyut.”
Kibwapakis kes aitodol Yorodan: ido koany, eleleba erot inapen ka iboro, luacakanarete Isurian iwonyete, Koboŋut ikiyakia, kolimokis ekabaka.
Kodakak ekabaka ekapolon loagoŋa kin* (esekel ŋes apesa) ekabaka akanike apolokin erute: kicakacakata ituŋa ŋes korute, kotwana kwape abalar etuŋanan loka Edeke, loenera kelot ekabaka mama ejai.
Kosodi kanen, kwape abalar etuŋanan loka Edeke ekabaka ebe, “Aitemisio aarei nuka esairi esekel, ka aitemis naka akiria nuidicic esekel, ejaun kwaŋin korute loka Samaria moi kwape tinenikwana.”
Abu ekapolon ŋol Koboŋok etuŋanan loka Edeke kotema atiar, “Koany, arai kiswama EJAKAIT apedon toma akuj, tikepedoo akirot ŋin ajaut?” Kobala ebe, “Koany, ianyuni kakonikonye, konye mam inyami.”
Kodolok ŋes kwaŋin; naarai kicakacakata ituŋa ŋes korute, kotwana.
Konyou aberu kiswama kwape ajaar akirot naka etuŋanan loka Edeke: kolot kalukokaleke, kiboiororoi kakwap naka Ipilisitian ikar ikanykaarei.
Kosodi kanen ketuboros ikar ikanykaarei koboŋu aberu anyoun kakwap naka Ipilisitian: koloma amonyakin ekabaka kanuka eketogo ka alupoke.
Eŋisit ekabaka Gekasi ekejaanakinan loka etuŋanan loka Edeke, kobala ebe, “Keŋaiŋait, kolimokinai akiro nuepolok nuabu Elisa kiswama.”

Kosodi kanen, napelimonokini ŋesi ekabaka kwape etajarunia ŋol loatwanit, koany, kodoluni aberu naetajarikini ŋesi okokuke, komonyak ekabaka kanuka eketogo ka akelup da. Kotema Gekasi atiar, “Ejakaitika, wu ekabaka, na ŋes aberu, lo da okokuke, loetajaruni Elisa.”
Kiŋit ekabaka aberu, kolimok ŋes, Koseu ekabaka ekapolokiton ediopet kotema atiar, “Kinyakakis kere luaraas luke, ka araito kere nuka alupoke ageun kapaaran naanyounio kakwap, kiton lolo.”
Kobu Elisa Damasiko; adeka Ben-kadad ekabaka loka Suria; aponi kolimokinai ŋes ebe, “Abu etuŋanan loka, Edeke ne.”
Kotema ekabaka Kasael atiar, “Koyaŋa ainakinet kakanikon, kolot airiamun ketuŋanan loka Edeke, kiŋitunia ŋes EJAKAIT ebe, ‘Aŋaleuni adeka na?’ ”

Kolot Kasael airiamun kaŋes, koyaŋa ainakinet, naka ŋinibore yenejok yeniko Damasiko, naebwokito akaalai akaisaoŋon, kobu kobwo kakonyeneke, kotema atiar, “Okokukon Ben-kadad ekabaka loka Suria ŋes keyakuunit neijai ebala ebe, ‘Aŋaleuni adeka na?’ ”
Kotema Elisa ŋes atiar, “Kolot, kolimok ŋes ebe, ‘Abeit iŋaleuni.’ Konye ketodikinite EJAKAIT eoŋ ebe abeit etwani.”
Kosesen noi aitodol naeleicikinio: komony etuŋanan loka Edeke akiyo.

Kotema Kasael atiar, “Inyo bo emonyi ekajakait?” Koboŋok ebe, “Naarai ajeni aronis naiswamakini ijo idwe luka Isirael: icwei abwasinikec kakim, iari itelepaikec kekileŋ, ilatanari ludidikikec, iŋerereanari akeceŋor nuepotiete.”
Kotema Kasael atiar, “Konye ekonikejaanakinan ŋes inyo, loerai ekiŋok cut, aswam akirot ŋin naepol?” Koboŋok Elisa ebe, “Ketodik EJAKAIT eoŋ ebe iraun ijo ekabaka loka Suria.”
Kosodi ŋesi anyoun kama ejai Elisa, kobu neejai ejakaitike; loketemari ŋes atiar, “Ebala bo Elisa ai?” Koboŋok ebe, “Kalimoki ebe abeit iŋaleuni.”
Kosodi kanen kapaaran naatupakini, kolem eimukis, kidomak akipi, korapak akonyeneke, kotwana: kirum Kasael aiboisike.
Kerai loka ikar akaisauni ka luarei egeuni airum; kirumak ikar ikanykauni ko Yerusalem.
Kolosenenei korot loka ikabakan luka Isirael, kwape eswamaenenaa ekek loka Akab; naarai amanyit akoku naka Akab: kiswama nueroko kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT.
Konye mam EJAKAIT akoto amudiar Yuda, kanuka Daudi ekekejaanakinan, kwape kisumunio ŋes ainakin atala kanuka ikedwe ikar kere.
Kosodi Yoram adokar Sair, ka agalinike kere kaŋes: konyou kuare, kodany Idomein lualukunito ŋes, ka ikapolok luka agalin: kokera ituŋa owemanakec.
Kwaŋin kipaliik Edom anyoun kakan naka Yuda, kiton lolo. Kosodi Libuna da aipaliikin kapaarasia kaŋun.
Aswamisio ace nuka Yoram, ka nuabu kiswama kere mam kereka iwadikatai oitabo loka aisiitonokin nuka ikabakan luka Yuda?
Kojotoor Yoram kalukapapaake, kidaikinai kalukapapaake ore loka Daudi: kirum Akasia okokuke aiboisike.
Kokaru lokitomonet kaarei loka Yoram okoku loka Akab ekabaka loka Isirael kogeu Akasia okoku loka Yekoram ekabaka loka Yuda airum.
Kerai loka ikar akaisaarei ka luarei egeuni airum; kirumak ekaru ediopet ko Yerusalem. Ekiror loka totoke ŋes Atalia akoku naka Omiri ekabaka loka Isirael.
Kolosenenei korot loka ekek loka Akab, kiswama nueroko kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kwape eswamaenenaa ekek loka Akab; naarai kerai ekamuran loka ekek loka Akab.
Kouparos Akasia ka Yoram okoku loka Akab aitiji Kasael ekabaka loka Suria koRamot-gilead: kimusuŋata Isurian Yoram.

Koboŋo ekabaka Yoram aŋaleun amusuŋun koYesereel nuemusuŋete Isurian koRama, nakejiotor kaKasael ekabaka loka Suria. Kolot Akasia okoku loka Yekoram ekabaka loka Yuda aanyun Yoram okoku loka Akab koYesereel, naarai adeka.
Kidolo ŋina komou kaŋina Yeku okoku loka Yekosapat okoku loka Nimisi, koloma, kitonyou ŋes kama ejaas iinacanake, kitoloma agola nakotoma.
Kosodi alemun ekube loka akinyet, kobukok akouke, kotema atiar, ‘Inera EJAKAIT kwanata ebe, Kenyonyoik jo akinyet araun ekabaka loka Isirael.’ Kosodi koŋaa ekek, koker, sirikiyap.”
Aso abu ekatumunan, ŋes ekatumunan enabi kolot Ramot-gilead.
Kedolo, koany, iboiete ikapolok luka ajore: kotema atiar, “Ejaas nukejukunitere mama ijai ijo, lokapolon.” Kotema Yeku atiar, “Mama ejai iŋai kasio kere?” Kotema atiar, “Mama ijai ijo, lokapolon.”
Konyou ŋesi, koloma togo; kobukok akinyet akouke, kotema ŋes atiar, “Inera kwanata EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael ebe, Kenyonyoik jo akinyet araun ekabaka loka ituŋa luka EJAKAIT, kes Isirael.
Ido idanyi ekek loka Akab ekapolonikon, kenyaŋ aokot nuka ikakejaanakinak inabin, ka aokot nuka ikejaanakinak kere luka EJAKAIT, nuabukoros kakan naka Yesebel.
Naarai eoliori ekek kere loka Akab: amudiari ŋinikoku yenitelepat yenika Akab, ka ŋol loeenitai ka lomam eenitai kotoma Isirael.
Ido etuluori ekek loka Akab kwape ekek loka Yeroboam okoku loka Nebat, kwape da ekek loka Baasa okoku loka Akiya.
Enyamakinete iŋokwo Yesebel amana naka Yesereel, emameun yenidai ŋes.” Koŋaa ekek, koker.
Kobalas ebe, “Isabi; kolimokinai do.” Kotema atiar, “Ebala kwana kwana ebe, ‘Inera EJAKAIT kwanata ebe, Kenyonyoik jo akinyet araun ekabaka loka Isirael.’ ”
Kisunyasi ŋoltuŋanan alemun ekegoe, kopesikis kwapuke kuju kadoketa, kokuta arupepe, kotemasi atiar, “Yeku ŋes ekabaka.”
Kwaŋin kinerut Yeku okoku loka Yekosapat okoku loka Nimisi asurokin Yoram. (Kidari Yoram Ramot-gilead, ŋes ka Isirael kere, kanuka Kasael ekabaka loka Suria.

Konye keboŋunit ekabaka Yoram Yesereel aŋaleun amusuŋun nuemusuŋito Isurian ejiosi kaKasael ekabaka loka Suria.) Kotema Yeku atiar, “Arai ikotosi kwaŋin kinyek ajaut loesii alomar ore, alosit alimokin koYesereel.”
Kodoka Yeku agali, kolot Yesereel; naarai aperi Yoram kaŋina, Abu Akasia ekabaka loka Yuda kolosite aanyun Yoram.

Kobwoi ekedaran kotogo lokokuju koYesereel, koany erioŋet loka Yeku ebunit, kotema atiar, “Aany erioŋet.” Kotema Yoram atiar, “Koseu ekebwanenon ebalasit, kiyakia airiamakin kakes, kobala ebe, ‘Ejai kereka ainapakin?’ ”

Kolot ediopet ibwanenit ebalasit airiamun kaŋes, kotema atiar, “Inera ekabaka kwanata ebe, ‘Ejai kereka ainapakin?’ ” Kotema Yeku atiar, “Inyo bo ipodo ijo kainapakin? Komana kauka.” Kolimok ekedaran ebe, “Adolo ekiyakia neejaas kesi, konye mam eboŋunit.”
Kosodi ŋesi aiyakia lokiareit ibwanenit ebalasit, kodolo neejaas kotema atiar, “Inera ekabaka kwanata ebe, ‘Ejai kereka ainapakin?’ ” Koboŋok Yeku ebe, “Inyo bo ipodo ijo kainapakin? Komana kauka.”
Kolimok ekedaran ebe, “Adolo ŋol da neejaas, konye mam eboŋunit: eireŋe eputos bala eireŋe loka Yeku okoku loka Nimisi; naarai ireŋei ŋesi komositoi.”
Kosodi kanen, keanyu Yoram Yeku, kotema atiar, “Ejai kereka ainapakin, Yeku?” Koboŋok ebe, “Ainapakin anyoin, adoteu naka totokon Yesebel ka icudetake luipu luetia nen?”
Kibelok Yoram akegali koker, kotema ŋesi Akasia atiar, “ijo ba, Akasia, ejai ebotet.”
Kiket Yeku akabwake kagogoŋuke kere, kogum Yoram kidiŋ opura, koloma emal otauke, kibirokin toma agalike.

Kosodi Yeku atemar Bidikar ekapolonike atiar, “Kodaku, kocakak ŋes amana naka alup nuka Nabot Eyesereelit: naarai kiitu ebe nakibwanenenoo eoŋ ka jo katupito Akab papake, kibwaik EJAKAIT abwokon na mamake;
Inera EJAKAIT ebe, ‘Abeit aany bian aokot nuka Nabot, ka aokot nuka odweke’; inera EJAKAIT ebe, ‘Atacakini jo kamana kana.’ Aso do kodakaa kocakak amana na, kwape ajaar akirot naka EJAKAIT.”
Kodakakis ikekejaanakinak ŋes agali koyaŋaasi Yerusalem, kidaikinai atesike nepepe kalukapapaake ore loka Daudi.
Kokaru lokitomonet ka lodiopet loka Yoram okoku loka Akab kogeu Akasia airum Yuda.
Kosodi elomari Yeku korute, kotema atiar, “Ejai kereka ainapakin, ijo Simiri, ekaaran ekapolonikon?”
Kitonyou akekonyen adirisa, kotema atiar, “Iŋai ejai owaika? Iŋai?” Kireikis ŋes ibwacin iarei arai iuni.
Kotema atiar, “Kocakutu kwap.” Kwaŋin kocakunai kwap: kodetanakinos aokotoke arwatat, kobalasin da; kicakacaka ŋes kakeje.
Kosodi keloma toma, konyam komat; kotema atiar, “Kidara aberu ŋin naekenokinitoi, kidaata: naarai erai akoku naka ekabaka.”
Koloto aida ŋes: konye mam apotu kodumut kaŋesi dimarai abelekek kakou, ka akeje, ka atitiban nuka akanin.
Kanuka ŋun koboŋutu kolimokis ŋes, Kotema atiar, “Na ŋes akirot naka EJAKAIT, naenera toma okejaanakinanike Eliya Etisibit ebe, ‘Enyamakinete iŋokwo akuan naka Yesebel mana naka Yesereel:
Akuan da naka Yesebel eraun bala aoret kais kamana naka Yesereel; kinyeis einer ebe, Na ŋes Yesebel.’ ”
“Aso napeedoluni ebalua lo mama ijaas, naarai ejaas odwe luka ekapolonikus kayes, ejaas da agalin ka ibalasin kayes, ka ere loebwaitai da, ka lujiis;
Komoata loejok ka loibus kodwe luka ekapolonikus, kodakakis oicoloŋ loka papake, kojiut ekek loka ekapolonikus.”
Konye kokuriakaros noi, kotemasi atiar, “Koany, mam apotu ikabakan ŋul luarei kobwaata kakonyeneke: kikonakini isio kibwoi ai?”

Apotu ekapolokiton loka ekal, ka ekapolokiton loka ere, ka imakio da, ka ŋul luasaete idwe, kiyakikis Yeku ebe, “Kirai isio ikejaanakinakakon, kiswamai kere nukicorakini ijo sio; mam kitaraun ituŋanan kere ekabaka: kiswama ijo nuejok kakonyenekon.”

Kosodi ŋesi airucakin aiwadik ebalua kiner atiar, “Arai ijaas kanukaŋ, arai kiirasi eporotoka, koyaut akwes nuka ituŋa odwe luka ekapolonikus, kopotu neajai Yesereel moi tinenikwana.” Kejaas odwe luka ekabaka, kes ituŋa akaisakanykaarei, kikapolok luka ere, luasaete kes.
Kosodi kanen kedol ebalua neejaas, koyaata odwe luka ekabaka, koarata kes, ituŋa akaisakanykaarei, kibwaikis akwesikec obukito, kijukasi kes neejai ŋesi Yesereel.
Kobu ekiyakia, kolimok ŋes ebe, “Ayaun akwes nuka odwe luka ekabaka.” Kotema atiar, “Kotuk atukon aarei neelomarere korute aitodol moi.”
Kosodi kanen tupuruc, koloma, kobwo, kotema ituŋa kere atiar, “Iraas yesi luidolito: koany, abu keneru asurokin ekapolonika, ka aiar da: konye iŋai aar lu kere?
Kojenut do ebe mam edoi kwap adio kakiro nuka EJAKAIT nuenerit EJAKAIT nuka ekek loka Akab: naarai eswama EJAKAIT ŋin naenerit kama ka Eliya ekejaanakinanike.”
Kwaŋin kodany Yeku luedeunos kere lukokek loka Akab koYesereel, ka iketuŋa kere lukapolok, ka ipaperoke luminan, ka isasedotinike, aitodol namam inyeinia ŋes idio yenapaikin.
Konyou kolot, kobu Samaria, Kosodi ejai orot togo loka ikecokok luka aiŋer ajul.
Kiriamakinos Yeku kiinacan luka Akasia ekabaka loka Yuda, kotema atiar, “Lukaŋai bo yesi?” Koboŋokis ŋes ebe, “Kirai isio iinacan luka Akasia: kilosi ayogan idwe luka ekabaka ka idwe luka akabaka.”
Kotema atiar, “Kikamutu ejarete.” Kikamutu kes ejarete, koarakinai aipany naka etogo loka aiŋer ajul, kes ituŋa akaisaoŋon ka luarei; mam abu kideun ediopet kakesi.
Kotema atiar, “Kauparos, koany ekakokote kanuka EJAKAIT.” Kisiboik agalike.
Kedolo ŋesi Samaria, kodany kere luedeuna luka Akab koSamatia, aitodol neamudiaria, kwape ajaar akirot naka EJAKAIT, nakelimokinit Eliya.

Aso do konyarautu inabin kere luka Baal neajai, ikamaakake kere, ka isasedotinike; sirikemamuun ediopet da: naarai ejai ainakin Baal asubanit naepol noi; ŋin yenemamuuni, mam ejari.” Konye kiswamai Yeku ŋun amodunia, tetere emudiari ikamaak Baal.
Kotema Yeku atiar, “Kitalautu atukonokin nakalaunan mama ejai Baal.” Koramai otuŋa kere.
Kiyakia Yeku anatar Isirael kere: kikokounos ikamaak. Baal kere, mam abu kopaik ediotuŋanan lomam ebunit. Kopotu togo loka Baal; kilelebun etogo loka Baal pas.
Kotema ŋesi ŋol loapolokinit agola naenapere atiar, “Koyau inapen luka luemaete Baal kere.” Kitolomik kes inapen.
Kolot Yeku, ka Yekonadab okoku loka Rekab, togo loka Baal; kotema ŋesi ikamaak Baal atiar, “Komoutu, koanyut ebe emamei kane ediopet ka lukejaanakinak luka EJAKAIT, dimarai ikamaak Baal bon.”
Kolomasi toma ainakin asuban ka ainakineta nuicweio.
Kibwaikinit Yeku ituŋa akaisakanykauni kiŋa, kotema atiar, “Toma otuŋa luayauni eoŋ akaninikus arai keku ediopet, aijarake etaci aijar naka ŋol.”

Kosodi kanen, kedau ainakin ainakinet naicweio, kotema Yeku ikedarak ka ikapolok atiar, “Kolomasi, koara kes; sirikeku ediopet da.” Kodanyata kes kakwanis naka ekileŋ; kocakasi ikedarak ka ikapolok kes kiŋa, koloto ore loka etogo loka Baal.
Kitolomut ipirin luajaas togo loka Baal, kicweata.
Kobilibilata epir loka Baal, kobilibilata etogo loka Baal, kitaraut aipany kiton lolo.
Kwaŋin komudia Yeku Baal koIsirael.
Konye mam Yeku abu konyou karonisio nuka Yeroboam okoku loka Nebat nuetidiakaria Isirael, kes itak luka esabu luajaas Bet-el, ka Dan.
Kotema EJAKAIT Yeku atiar, “Naarai iswama ejok itodolit nuejok kakonyeneka, iswamak etogo loka Akab kwape ajaatar nukotauka kere, iboikinos do odwekon luka atur nakiwoŋonet oicoloŋ loka Isirael.”
Konye mam Yeku abu kopodokin alosenen okisila luka EJAKAIT Edeke loka Isirael keketau kere: mam abu konyou karonisio nuka Yeroboam nuetidiakaria Isirael.
Anyoun koYorodan ari nakokide, akwap kere naka Gilead, Igadin, ka Ireubenin ka Imanasen, anyoun koAroer, loidunyas kajesa naka Arunon, ŋes Gilead ka Basan.
Aswamisio ace nuka Yeku, ka nuabu kiswama kere, ka agogoŋuke kere, mam kereka iwadikatai oitabo loka aisiitonokin nuka ikabakan luka Isirael?
Kojotoor Yeku kalukapapaake: aponi kidaikinai Samaria. Kirum Yekoakas okokuke aiboisike.
Apak naabu Yeku kirumak Isirael koSamaria keraas ikar akaisaarei ka lukanykauni.

Konye Yekoseba, akoku naka ekabaka Yoram, kinacike ka Akasia, koyaŋa Yoas okoku loka Akasia, kokokwa ŋes kodwe luka ekabaka luaario, ŋes ka akasaanike, kibwaik kes agola naeŋadio ikitadan; kimunonikis ŋes Atalia tetere mam eario.
Kojai kaŋes ibwaitai kotogo loka EJAKAIT ikar ikanykape; kirum Atalia akwap.
Kicorak kes ebe, “Na ŋes akirot naiswamaete: atutubetekus nakiwuniet luelomunete kanakasabato eraunos luericete aidar etogo loka ekabaka;
Atutubet nakiwuniet ejaunos okek Sur; ka atutubet nakiwuniet ejaunos okek kau ka ikedarak: kwaŋin ŋes iriciata aidar etogo, iraunos luitikokinete;
Atukonokus nuarei, luelomarete kanakasabato, ericete aidar etogo loka EJAKAIT airimor ekabaka.
Ilukunete ekabaka, kitiŋite ŋolituŋanan lujiisike kakanike; ŋin da yenelomari okokoron, koarai; kojaenanas kekabaka naelomununia, naelomanaria da.”
Kijaik esasedoti ikapolok luka akwat akwaras ka ibukui lukeraas sek luka ekabaka Daudi, luajaas togo loka EJAKAIT.
Kobwaata ikedarak, kitiŋite ŋolituŋanan lujiisike kakanike, ameun kowai lokoteten loka etogo kiton owai lokokediany loka etogo, eiduny ketem ka etogo, elukunito ekabaka.
Kosodi ŋesi aitolomun okoku loka ekabaka, kidokok aboko akouke, koinak aitejenunet; kitaraut ŋes ekabaka, kinyonyoikinai akinyet; kibapakis akanin kotemasi atiar, “Kidari Edeke ekabaka.”

Kosesen, ido koany, ebwoi ekabaka neejai epir, kwape ejaar epone, ka ikapolok ka arupepen kidunyas kekabaka; kibwoŋasi ituŋa kere luka akwap, kokuta arupepen. Kosodi Atalia aicil ikenapen, kiworo ebe, “Ebotet, ebotet lokibilakinito.”

Kosodi Yekoiada esasedoti aicorakin ikapolok luka akwat luapolokinito ajore, kotema kes atiar, “Kitolomasi ya kidiŋ okokoron; ŋol da loetupari ŋes koarata kekileŋ”: naarai abala esasedoti ebe, “Kinyek aarakinio togo loka EJAKAIT,”
Kocilakis ŋes erot; kolot orot neelomanariata ibalasin togo loka ekabaka: koarakinai ŋes ŋina.

Koloto ituŋa kere luka akwap togo loka Baal, kotiyatiyata; kobilibilata cut iketemwan ka akeputosia, koarakinai Matan esasedoti loka Baal kiŋaren kitemwan. Kodakak esasedoti ikapolokitok luka etogo loka EJAKAIT.

Koyaŋa ikapolok luka akwat, ka Ikarin, ka ikedarak, ka ituŋa kere luka akwap; kitolomut ekabaka kotogo loka EJAKAIT, kopotu korot lokorute loka ikedarak mama ejai etogo loka ekabaka, Kiboikin ŋesi oicoloŋ loka ikabakan.
Kibwoŋasi ituŋa kere luka akwap, kinapakin ere: koarakinai Atalia kekileŋ neejai etogo loka ekabaka.
Korai Yekoas loka ikar ikanykaarei egeuni airum.
Kiswama Yekoas nuejokuka kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT apaarasiake kere nuetuutooria Yekoiada esasedoti ŋes.
Konye mam aponi kolemarai aiboisio nuiceleleete: koroko ituŋa einanakinete asuban ka aisupuruun lueuru maa kaiboisio nuiceleleete.
Kijaununut isasedotin, ŋinituŋanan kijauni yenejeni ŋesi: kipuciata acilan nuka etogo, needumunere acilat kere.”
Konye kokaru loka akaisaarei ka luuni loka ekabaka Yekoas koriŋa isasedotin ipuca acilan nuka etogo.

Kosodi ekabaka Yekoas anyaraun Yekoiada esasedoti, ka isasedotin ice, kotema kes atiar, “Inyo bo mam ipucanariata acilan nuka etogo? Aso do mam bobo ijaununete apesan kama kaluijenete, konye koinakis ŋun nuitukokinito kanuka acilan nuka etogo.”
Kocamut isasedotin ebe mam bobo ijaunete apesan kotuŋa, karaida aipucanar acilan nuka etogo.
Kosodete keanyut ebe ejaas apesan nuipu toma asaduku, kopotu ekewadikan loka ekabaka ka esasedoti lopeti, koenata kimarata da apesan nuadumuna kotogo loka EJAKAIT.
Kijaikis apesan nuetemio akanin nuka ŋul kalueswamaete aswam, luapolokinito etogo loka EJAKAIT: koropiata ikekeok ka ikadukok lueswamaete aswam naka etogo loka EJAKAIT;
Ka lukadukok kamor, ka lukekeok amor, agwelia da akito ka amor nuikec aipucanaria acilan nuka etogo loka EJAKAIT, ka nuepudasi kere aiteteunia etogo.
Konye mam aponi kiswamakinere etogo loka EJAKAIT akolin nuka epuesa, ka aitudeŋeta, ka atanya, ka arupepen, iboro kere luka esabu, arai iboro kere luka epuesa, kapesan nuetolomunio togo loka EJAKAIT.
Naarai aponi koinakinai ŋun lueswamaete aswam, lueteteunete etogo loka EJAKAIT.
Bobo da mam apotu kimarata etiai mama ejaas ituŋa luainakinio apesan akoranakin ikeswamak: naarai keraas lumunon.
Mam aponi koyaunai apesan nuka ainakineta nuka aidiak, ka apesan nuka ainakineta nuka aronis togo loka EJAKAIT: keraas ŋun nuka isasedotin.

Kosodi Yekoas ekabaka loka Yuda kolem iboro kere luetalaunitai luapotu Yekosapat, ka Yekoram, ka Akasia, lukapapaake, ikabakan luka Yuda kotiakunito, ka iboroke luetalaunitai, ka esabu kere loadumuna koboro luka akais nuipu luka etogo loka EJAKAIT, ka luka etogo loka ekabaka, kijukak Kasael ekabaka loka Suria: konyou do ko Yerusalem.
Aswamisio ace nuka Yoas, ka nuabu kiswama kere, mam kereka iwadikatai oitabo loka aisiitonokin nuka ikabakan luka Yuda?
Konyout ike-jaanakinakake, kinerut, koarakis Yoas togo loka Milo, orot loebei Sila.
Naarai kibuŋata ŋes Yosakar okoku loka Simeat, ka Yekosabad okoku loka Somer, ikekejaanakinak, kotwana; aponi kidaikinai kalukapapaake ore loka Daudi: kirum Amasia okokuke aiboisike.
Kokaru loka akaisaarei ka luuni loka Yoas okoku loka Akasia, ekabaka loka Yuda, kogeu Yekoakas okoku loka Yeku airum Isirael koSamaria, kirumak ikar itomon ka lukanykaarei.
Kiswama nueroko kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kotupa aronisio nuka Yeroboam okoku loka Nebat, nuetidiakaria Isirael; mam abu konyou kaŋun.
Kinep anyunyura naka EJAKAIT aluikin Isirael, kijaik kes akan naka Kasael ekabaka loka Suria, ka akan da naka Ben-kadad okoku loka Kasael apaarasia kere,
Kiŋaiŋa Yekoakas EJAKAIT, kopupok EJAKAIT ŋes; naarai abu koany aroikinio naka Isirael, kwape aroikinitor ekabaka loka Suria.
(Koinak EJAKAIT Isirael eketajaran, konyout kakanin nuka Isurian: kiboikinos idwe luka Isirael oreriakec, kwape lem sek.
Konye mam apotu konyoutu karonisio nuka etogo loka Yeroboam, nuetidiakaria Isirael, konye kolosenenete kaŋun: kosalakis Asera da ko Samaria.)
Naarai mam abu kideik Yekoakas ituŋa dimarai ikebwanenok akaisakany, ka agalin atomon, ka luelosete kakeje ilukumin itomon; naarai abu ekabaka loka Suria komudia kes, kitarau kes apua naipudao.
Aswamisio ace nuka Yekoakas, ka nuabu kiswama kere, ka akegogoŋ, mam kereka iwadikatai oitabo loka aisiitonokin nuka ikabakan luka Isirael?
Kojotoor Yekoakas kalukapapaake; kidaikinai Samaria: kirum Yoas okokuke aiboisike.
Kokaru loka akaisauni ka lukanykaarei loka Yoas ekabaka loka Yuda, kogeu Yekoas okoku loka Yekoakas airum Isirael koSamaria, kirumak ikar itomon kalukanykape.
Kiswama nueroko kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT; mam abu konyou karonisio kere nuka Yeroboam okoku loka Nebat, nuetidiakaria Isirael: konye kolosenenei kaŋun.
Aswamisio ace nuka Yoas, ka nuabu kiswama kere, ka akegogoŋ naetijio Amasia ekabaka loka Yuda, mam kereka iwadikatai oitabo loka aisiitonokin nuka ikabakan luka Isirael?
Kojotoor Yoas kalukapapaake; kiboikin Yeroboam oicoloŋoke: aponi kidaikinai Yoas Samaria nepepe kikabakan luka Isirael.
Kotema Elisa ŋes atiar, “Kolem akabwa ka imalia.” Kosodi kolem akabwa ka imalia.
Kotema ŋesi ekabaka loka Isirael atiar, “Kibwaik akan akabwa”: kibwaik akanike. Kidokok Elisa akaninike akanin nuka ekabaka.

Kotema atiar, “Koŋaa adirisa nakokide”: koŋaa, Kosodi Elisa atemar ŋes atiar, “Koguma”: kosodi ŋesi agumar. Kotema atiar, “Emal loka EJAKAIT loka aipikor, ŋes emal loka aipikor Suria: naarai idanyi ijo Isurian koApek, aitodol neimudiaria kes.”
Kotema atiar, “Kolem imalia”: kolem kes. Kotema ŋesi ekabaka loka Isirael atiar, “Kinom akwap”: kosodi kinom irwan auni, kinyek.
Konyunyurik etuŋanan loka Edeke ŋes, kotema atiar, “Tikinom irwan akany arai irwan akanykape; aso tikidany Suria aitodol neimudiaria ŋes: aso do kwana jo idanyi Suria irwan auni bon.”
Kosodi kanen, idaio etuŋanan, koany, kiteluosi erioŋet; kocakakis etuŋanan ates naka Elisa: napetirori etuŋanan akojo nuka Elisa, kikwaru, kobwo.
Konye kosianiar EJAKAIT mama ejaas kesi, kitim kes, kopodo kes, kanuka aitutuketeke naetutukit kaAburaam, ka Isaak ka Yakob, mam akoto amudiar kes, komam ber akoto aireŋear kes kakonyeneke.
Kotwana Kasael ekabaka loka Suria; kirum Ben-kadad okokuke aiboisike.
Kolem bobo Yekoas okoku loka Yekoakas kakan naka Ben-kadad okoku loka Kasael ireria luayaŋaarit kakan naka Yekoakas papake ejio, Kodany Yoas ŋes irwan auni, kinyaku ireria luka Isirael.
Kerai loka ikar akaisaarei ka lukany egeuni airum; kirumak ikar akaisaarei ka lukanykaoŋon koYerusalem: ekiror loka totoke kerai Yekoadin naka Yerusalem.
Kiswama nuejok kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, konye mam abu koriakas kaDaudi papaake: eswamaenenei kwape ajaatar nueswamai papake Yoas.
Konye mam aponi kolemarai aiboisio nuiceleleete: koriŋa ituŋa einanakinete asuban, ka aisupuruun lueuru maa kaiboisio nuiceleleete.
Kosodi kanen, napiticasio ajakanut kakanike, abu koar ikejaanakinakake luaarete ekabaka papake:

Konye mam abu koar idwe luka ikaarak: kwape ajaatar ŋun nuewadikatai oitabo loka ikisila luka Musa, kwape ecorakinitor EJAKAIT ebe, “Mam lukapapa eario kanuka idwe, karaida idwe mam eario kanuka lukapapakec; konye etwani ŋinituŋanan kanuka aronisike.”

Kijuka Yekoas ekabaka loka Isirael mama ejai Amasia ekabaka loka Yuda kobala ebe, “Abu ekenep loajai Lebanon kijukak eres loajai Lebanon ebe, ‘Kokorak akokukon okokuka komany’: kitoro etiaŋ loka ais loajai Lebanon, kicakacak ekenep.
Abeit idany Edom, iturokina etaukon: kibwoŋak ŋun, kopaik ore: naarai kanukinyo ilomaria akiro numere nukon ka atwaniar, kibirori ijo ka Yuda da kajo?”
Kireŋeai Yuda kakonyen nuka Isirael, koker ŋinituŋanan owemake.

Kikam Yekoas ekabaka loka Isirael Amasia ekabaka loka Yuda, okoku loka Yekoas, okoku loka Akasia, koBet-semet, kobu Yerusalem, kotiyatiya arwatat naka Yerusalem anyoun korute loka Epuraim kiton orute loka agor, ikubitin akwat aoŋon.
Koŋata esabu ka epuesa kere, ka iboro kere luadumunio kotogo loka EJAKAIT, koboro luka akais nuipu lukotogo loka ekabaka, ka lukititiŋa da, koboŋo Samaria.
Kojotoor Yekoas kalukapapaake, aponi kidaikinai Samaria nepepe kikabakan luka Isirael; kirum Yeroboam okokuke aiboisike.
Aswamisio ace nuka Amasia mam kereka iwadikatai oitabo loka aisiitonokin nukaikabakan luka Yuda?
Kinerut asurokin ŋes koYerusalem; koker Lakis; konye kijukasi atupakin ŋes Lakis, koarakinai ŋina,
Koyaunai ŋes kobalasin: aponi kidaikinai Yerusalem kalukapapaake ore loka Daudi.
Koyaata ituŋa kere luka Yuda Asaria, lokerai loka ikar itomon ka lukanykape, kitaraut ŋes ekabaka aibois naka papake Amasia.
Koduk ŋesi Elat, kinyakak Yuda, kedau ekabaka ajotoor kalukapapaake.
Kokaru lokitomonet kakany loka Amasia okoku loka Yoas ekabaka loka Yuda, kogeu Yeroboam okoku loka Yoas ekabaka loka Isirael airum koSamaria, kirumak ikar akaisaoŋon ka lodiopet.
Kiswama nueroko kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT: mam abu konyou karonisio kere nuka Yeroboam okoku loka Nebat, nuetidiakaria Isirael.

Abu kinyaka eikor loka Isirael ageun kaneelomarere Kamat kiton aŋolol naka Araba, kwape ajaar akirot naka EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael, naener kama ka ekejaanakinanike Yona okoku loka Amitai, enabi, loarai loka Gat-keper.
Naarai koany EJAKAIT aiticanio naka Isirael, erono noi: naarai amamei yeneenitai karaida yenimam eenitai, karaida ekeŋarakinan neejai Isirael.
Mam enerit EJAKAIT ebe emwatari ŋesi ekiror loka Isirael kokwap kakuj: konye kitajar kes kakan naka Yeroboam okoku loka Yoas.
Kojotoor Yeroboam kalukapapaake, kes ikabakan luka Isirael; kirum Sekaria okokuke aiboisike.
Kerai loka ikar itomon ka lukanykape egeuni airum; kirumak ikar akaisakany ka luarei koYerusalem, ekiror loka totoke kerai Yekolia naka Yerusalem.
Kiswama nuejok kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kwape ajaatar kere nueswamai papake Amasia.
Konye mam aponi kolemarai aiboisio nuiceleleete: koriŋa ituŋa einanakinete asuban, ka aisupuruun lueuru maa kaiboisio nuiceleleete.
Kitedek EJAKAIT ekabaka, koraun lokatapon aitodol apaaran naatwania, kiboie kotogo loetiakuna, Kopolokinit Yotam okoku loka ekabaka ekal, aitub kotuŋa luka akwap.
Aswamisio ace nuka Asaria, ka nuabu kiswama kere, mam kereka iwadikatai oitabo loka aisiitonokin nuka ikabakan luka Yuda?
Kojotoor Asaria kalukapapaake; aponi kidaikinai kalukapapaake ore loka Daudi: kirum Yotam okokuke aiboisike.
Kokaru loka akaisauni ka lukanykauni loka Asaria ekabaka loka Yuda kirumak Sekaria okoku loka Yeroboam Isirael koSamaria ilapio ikanykape.
Kiswama nueroko kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kwape eswamaata lukapapaake; mam abu konyou karonisio nuka Yeroboam okoku loka Nebat, nuetidiakaria Isirael.
Kinerut Salum okoku loka Yabes asurokin ŋes, kicumak akonyen nuka ituŋa, koar; kirum aiboisike.
Aswamisio ace nuka Sekaria, koany, iwadikatai oitabo loka aisiitonokin nuka ikabakan luka Isirael.
Ŋin ŋes akirot naka EJAKAIT naalimokini Yeku ebe, “Iboikinos odwekon luka aturi nakiwoŋonet oicoloŋ loka Isirael.” Ido kitodolikinoi kwaŋin.
Konyou Menakem okoku loka Gadi koTirusa, kobu Samaria, kicumak Salum okoku loka Yabes koSamaria, koar ŋes, kirum aiboisike.
Aswamisio ace nuka Salum, ka ainerunike naabu kiner, koany, iwadikatai oitabo loka aisiitonokin nuka ikabakan luka Isirael.
Kosodi Menakem aidany Tirusa, ka luajaas toma kere, ka iikorunoke, anyoun koTirusa: naarai mam apotu koŋaikis ŋes, kanuka ŋun ŋes adanyia kes; koŋerereana aŋor kere nukotoma nuapotiete.
Kokaru loka akaisauni ka lukanykaoŋon loka Asaria ekabaka loka Yuda kogeu Menakem okoku loka Gadi airum Isirael, kirumak ikar itomon koSamaria.
Kiswama nueroko kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT; mam abu konyou karonisio nuka Yeroboam okoku loka Nebat nuetidiakaria Isirael apaarasiake kere.
Kobu Pul ekabaka loka Asuria asurokin akwap; koinaki Menakem Pul atalata alukumit nuka epuesa, kojai akekan kaŋes aitogogoŋio ajakanut akanike.

Kitelem Menakem apesan koIsirael, kotuŋa kere lukagogoŋ lukabarak, kitelem ŋolituŋanan isekelin akaisakany luka epuesa, ainakin ekabaka loka Asuria, Koboŋo ekabaka loka Asuria, mam abu kopaik akwap ŋin.
Aswamisio ace nuka Menakem, ka nuabu kiswama kere, mam kereka iwadikatai oitabo loka aisiitonokin nuka ikabakan luka Isirael?
Kojotoor Menakem kalukapapaake; kirum Pekakia okokuke aiboisike.
Kiswama nueroko kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT: mam abu konyou karonisio nuka Yeroboam okoku loka Nebat, nuetidiakaria Isirael.

Kineru Peka, okoku loka Remalia, ekapolonike asurokin ŋes, kicumak Samaria, arwatat naegogoŋ naka etogo loka ekabaka, nepepe ka Arugob ka Aric; ido kejaas ituŋa akaisakany luka Igileadin kaŋes: koar ŋes, kirum aiboisike.
Aswamisio ace nuka Pekakia, ka nuabu kiswama kere, koany, iwadikatai oitabo loka aisiitonokin nuka ikabakan luka Isirael.
Kiswama nueroko kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT: mam abu konyou karonisio nuka Yeroboam okoku loka Nebat, nuetidiakaria Isirael.
Kineru Kosea okoku loka Ela asurokin Peka okoku loka Remalia, kicum ŋes, koar, kirum aiboisike, kokaru loka akaisaarei loka Yotam okoku loka Usia.
Aswamisio ace nuka Peka, ka nuabu kiswama kere, koany iwadikatai oitabo loka aisiitonokin nuka ikabakan luka Isirael.
Kerai loka ikar akaisaarei ka lukany egeuni airum; kirumak ikar itomon ka lukanykape koYerusalem: ekiror loka totoke kerai Yerusa akoku naka Sadok.
Kiswama nuejok kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT: kiswama kwape ajaatar kere nueswamai papake Usia.
Konye mam aponi kolemarai aiboisio nuiceleleete: koriŋa ituŋa einanakinete asuban, ka aisupuruun lueuru maa kaiboisio nuiceleleete. Koduk ŋesi erute loikumemei, loka etogo loka EJAKAIT.
Aswamisio ace nuka Yotam, ka nuabu kiswama kere, mam kereka iwadikatai oitabo loka aisiitonokin nuka ikabakan luka Yuda?
Kapaarasia kaŋun kogeu EJAKAIT aijukun Resin ekabaka loka Suria ka Peka okoku loka Remalia asurokin Yuda.
Kojotoor Yotam kalukapapaake, aponi kidaikinai kalukapapaake ore loka papaake Daudi: kirum Akas okokuke aiboisike.
Kerai Akas loka ikar akaisaarei egeuni airum; kirumak ikar itomon ka lukanykape koYerusalem: mam abu kiswama nuejokuka kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT Ekedeke, kwape papaake Daudi.
Konye kolosenenei orot loka ikabakan luka Isirael, eebo, kitotor okokuke akim, kwape ajaatar italesia luka ikapirin, luabu EJAKAIT kireŋe kakonyen nuka idwe luka Isirael.
Koinanak asuban kisupuruununei lueuru maa kaiboisio nuiceleleete, koukon, ido kokwap ka ŋolikitoi loepesit.
Kapaarasia kaŋun ŋes enyakunia Resin ekabaka loka Suria Elat oSuria, kireŋea Iyudayan anyoun koElat: kopotu Isurian Elat, kiboikinos nen, kiton lolo.

Kijuka Akas ikiyakia mama ejai Tigilatpileser ekabaka loka Asuria ebe, “Arai eoŋ ekonikejaanakinan, ka okokukon: kobia kitajarai kakan naka ekabaka loka Suria, kakan da naka ekabaka loka Isirael, lukanyoikis eoŋ.”
Kolem Akas epuesa ka esabu loadumuna togo loka EJAKAIT, ka lukoboro luka akais nuipu lukotogo loka ekabaka, kijukak ekabaka loka Asuria araun ainakinet.
Kiira ekabaka loka Asuria ŋes: kolot ekabaka loka Asuria asurokin Damasiko, kirum, kijoreo ituŋake koyaŋa Kir, koar Resin.
Kolot ekabaka Akas Damasiko airiamun ka Tigilat-pileser ekabaka loka Asuria, koany etem loajai Damasiko: kijukak ekabaka Akas Uriya esasedoti esube loka etem, ka aputoke, kwape ajaar eiswamaeke kere.
Koduk Uriya esasedoti etem: kwape ajaatar kere nuabu ekabaka Akas kijukak koDamasiko, kwaŋin kosub Uriya esasedoti tetere edumuni ekabaka Akas ŋes ebuni koDamasiko.
Kebu ekabaka koDamasiko, koany ekabaka etem: kikunyak ekabaka otem, koinak asuban kanen.
Kicwe ainakineteke naicweio, ka ainakineteke naka akiria, kobuk ainakineteke namatat, kobwatanak aokot nuka ainakinetake nuka ainapakin, kotem.
Koyau etem loka aisinit loajai kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT alemun koiŋaren ketogo, kidiŋ kotemuke ka etogo loka EJAKAIT, kibwaik ari naka agolitomei naka etemuke.

Abu ekabaka Akas kicorak Uriya esasedoti ebe, “Kicweenenei kotem loepol ainakinet naicweio naka tupuruc ka ainakinet naka akiria naka eboŋ, ka ainakinet naicweio naka ekabaka, ka ainakineteke naka akiria, nepepe kainakinet naicweio naka ituŋa kere luka akwap, ka ainakinetekec naka akiria, ka ainakinetakec numatan; kobwatanakini ŋes aokot kere nuka ainakinet naicweio, ka aokot kere nuka asuban: konye eraun etem loka aisinit lokiŋitununetekaŋ.”
Kiswama kwaŋin Uriya esasedoti kwape ajaatar kere nuecorakinit ekabaka Akas.
Erot loarapakinitai loka asabato loadukitoi toma togo, ka erute loka ekabaka lokokiŋa, kibelokinoi kiton togo loka EJAKAIT, kanuka ekabaka loka Asuria.
Aswamisio ace nuka Akas nuabu kiswama, mam kereka iwadikatai oitabo loka aisiitonokin nuka ikabakan luka Yuda?
Kojotoor Akas kalukapapaake, aponi kidaikinai kalukapapaake ore loka Daudi: kirum Kesekia okokuke aiboisike.
Kiswama nueroko kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, konye mere kwape ikabakan luka Isirael luageikinete ŋes.
Kobu Salumaneser ekabaka loka Asuria asurokin ŋes; koraun Kosea ekejaanakinanike, koinununei ainakineta,

Kodum ekabaka loka Asuria ebotet kaneejai Kosea; naarai abu kijuka ikiyakia mama ejai So ekabaka loko Misiri, mam abu koinak ekabaka loka Asuria ainakinet, kwape eswamaa ŋolikaru: kanuka ŋun kogolok ekabaka loka Asuria ŋes, koen kaidaris.
Kosodi ekabaka loka Asuria kobu koŋata akwap kere, kolot Samaria, kirigau ŋes ikar iuni.
Kokaru lokikanyetekaoŋon loka Kosea, kirum ekabaka loka Asuria Samaria, kijoreo Isirael ayaŋaar Asuria, kibwaik kes Kala, ka Kabor, kariri kecor loka Gosan, koreria luka Imedin.
Kojai kwaŋin, naarai apotu idwe luka Isirael kodiakasi kama ejai EJAKAIT Ekecedeke, loetolomuni kes koMisiri anyoun kakan naka Parao ekabaka loko Misiri, koyoŋito idekesio ice.
Kolosenenete kokisila luka atekerin, nuereŋei EJAKAIT kakonyen nuka idwe luka Isirael, ka ŋul da lukibwaikinete ikabakan luka Isirael.
Kokokoanakinos idwe luka Isirael aswam numam ejok nukasurokin EJAKAIT Ekecedeke, kodukoto aiboisio nuiceleleete koreriakec kere, ageun kotogo loeoj loka ikedarak kiton ore lokebwaitai.
Kosipokis ipirin ka Aserim kaŋoliukot loeoja, ido kokwap kaŋolikitoi loepesit.
Kisupuruununete kaŋina lueuru maa kaiboisio kere nuiceleleete, kwape eswamaenenaata atekerin nuereŋeari EJAKAIT kakonyenekec: kiswamata nukaronok aitunyunyurikin EJAKAIT.
Kijaanakis aputosia, nualimokinit EJAKAIT kes ebe, “Sirikiswamata akirot na.”

Konye kitejenik EJAKAIT Isirael, ka Yuda, kama ka ŋolinabi, ka ŋolikadwaran, ebe, “Kibelokinos yesi anyoun korotinikus lueroko, koricata aicorakinetaka ka ikakisila, kwape ejaatar ikakisila kere lukecorakinit lukapapaakus, lukejukakinit yes kama ka ikakejaanakinak inabin.”
Konye koŋero akiirar, konye kitininikata imurisiŋakec, kwape kimurisiŋa luka lukapapaakec, lumam apotu kiyuut EJAKAIT Ekecedeke.

Koŋerenenete ikisilake, ka aitutuketeke naetutukit kalukapapaakec, ka aitejenuneta nuetejenunit kes; kotupasi aamameak, koraunos lukaamameak, kotupenenete atekerin nuerimorito kes, nuabu EJAKAIT kicoro kes ebe sirikiswamata kwape kakesi.
Kojala aicorakineta kere nuka EJAKAIT Ekecedeke, kosubut aputosia nuecalara, kes itak iarei, kosubut Asera da, komaenenete ajore kere nakokuju, kijaanakis Baal,
Kitotoroenenete ikecedwe lusap ka lupesur akim, kiswamata nuka airo ka nuka ecudet, kogwelaros aswam nueroko kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, aitunyunyurikin ŋes.
Kanuka ŋun konyunyurik noi EJAKAIT Isirael, kolema kakonyeneke; mam abu kideun dimarai ateker naka Yuda bon.
Koŋer EJAKAIT aur kere naka Isirael, kitican kes, kijaik kes akanin nuka ikaŋatak, aitodol nakireŋearia kes kakonyeneke.
Naarai kocila Isirael alemar kotogo loka Daudi; kodakakis Yeroboam okoku loka Nebat araun ekabaka: kiŋalaa Yeroboam Isirael anyoun katupit EJAKAIT, kitidiaka kes aidiak naepol.
Kolosenenete idwe luka Isirael karonisio kere nuka Yeroboam nueswamai; mam apotu konyoutu kakesi;
Aitodol naalemaria EJAKAIT Isirael kakonyeneke, kwape enerar kama ka Ikekejaanakinak kere inabin. Koyaŋaarai cut Isirael Asuria anyoun kakwapuke, kiton lolo.
Kosodi, egeete aiboi kanen, mam ayoŋito EJAKAIT: kanuka ŋun kijukak EJAKAIT kes iŋatunyo, luaarete ice kakesi.

Ŋes kelimokiniata ekabaka loka Asuria ebe, “Atekerin nuiyaŋaari ijo cut, kibwaik oreria luka Samaria, mam ejenete epone loka Edeke loka akwap: ŋes keinakini ijukakini kes iŋatunyo, ido koany, earete kes, naarai mam ejenete epone loka Edeke loka akwap.”
Kosodi ekabaka loka Asuria aicorakin atiar, “Koyaŋaas ediopet kosasedotin lukiyaunete kaŋina; koloto kiboioto kaŋina, kisisianak kes epone loka Edeke loka akwap.”
Kosodi ediopet kosasedotin lualemario koSamaria kobu kiboikin Bet-el, kisisianak kwape ibusakinitor ayoŋit EJAKAIT.
Konye kosubununei ŋiniteker idekesiokec, kibwaanakinete otogoi luka aiboisio nuiceleleete nuadukito Isamarian, ŋiniteker oreriakec neiboioto.
Kosubut ituŋa luka Babulon Sukot-benot, kosubut ituŋa luka Kut Nerigal, kosubut ituŋa luka Kamat Asima.
Kosubut Ibain Nibas ka Taratak, kicweenenete Iseparabin ikecedwe kakim neejaas Adaramelek ka Anamelek, idekesio luka Separabaim.
Koyoŋenenete EJAKAIT, ido kotiakutu kotomakec isasedotin luka aiboisio nuiceleleete, luainanakinete asuban kanukec kotogoi luka aiboisio nuiceleleete.
Koyoŋenenete EJAKAIT, kijaanakis da ikecedekesio, kwape kejaar epone loka atekerin nuayaŋaario,
Iswamaete kiton lolo kwape ajaatar iponesio lukolosek.
Mam eyoŋito EJAKAIT, mam iswamaete kwape kejaar apucunetakec, karaida itubesiakec, karaida ikisila arai aicorakinet naecorakinit EJAKAIT idwe luka Yakob, loamaikinit Isirael;
Loetutuki EJAKAIT kaŋes, kicorak kes ebe, “Sirikiyoŋata icedekesio, karaida akukonokin kes, karaida aijaanakin, karaida ainakin kes asuban:
Konye EJAKAIT, lokitolomuni yes kakwap nako Misiri. Kagogoŋ naepol, ka akan naarioro, ŋol ŋes loiyoŋenenete, ŋol ŋes loikukonokinos, ŋol da loiinanakinete asuban;
Apucuneta ka itubesia, ka ikisila ka aicorakinet luabu ŋesi kiwadikak yes, iricenenete aswam ikar kere; sirikiyoŋa idekesio ice.
Aitutuket naetutuk eoŋ kayes, sirikimurwonokinete; karaida aiyoŋ icedekesio.
Konye koyoŋenenete EJAKAIT Ekusideke; kitajarenenei ŋesi yes kakan naka lukasurupokus kere.”
Konye mam apotu kopupokis, konye kiswamata kwape ajaar eponekec lolem sek.
Kerai loka ikar akaisaarei ka lukany egeuni airum; kirumak ikar akaisaarei ka lukanykaoŋon koYerusalem; ekiror loka totoke kerai Abi akoku naka Sekaria,
Kiswama nuejok kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kwape ajaatar kere nueswamai papaake Daudi.

Kolema aiboisio nuiceleleete, kobil ipirin, kojepejep Asera: komunyumuny emun loka aisinit loasubi Musa: naarai aitodol apaarasia ŋun koriŋa idwe luka Isirael isupuruunekinete ŋes lueuru maa: komaik ŋes Nekusutan.
Naarai abu kimorikikin ka EJAKAIT, mam abu konyou katupit ŋes, konye koricite aicorakinetake, nuecorakin EJAKAIT Musa,
Kojai EJAKAIT kaŋes: nealomanari kere kokerianar: kipaliik ŋesi ekabaka loka Asuria, mam abu kijaanak.
Kodany Ipilisitian kiton Gasa ka iikorunoke; ageun kotogo kaloeoj loka ikedarak kiton ore lokebwaitai.
Kosodi ketuboros ikar iuni kiruma: ŋes ekaru lokikanyetekape loka Kesekia, ŋes ekaru lokikanyetekaoŋon loka Kosea ekabaka loka Isirael, kirumai Samaria,
Kijoreo ekabaka loka Asuria Isirael ayaŋaar Asuria, kibwaik kes Kala, ka Kabor, ariri kecor loka Gosan, oreria da luka Imedin:
Naarai mam apotu korimakis eporoto loka EJAKAIT Ekecedeke, konye kodiakasi aitutuketeke, kere da nuecorakini Musa ekejaanakinan loka EJAKAIT, koŋero akiirar, karaida aswam.

Kijukak Kesekia ekabaka loka Yuda ekabaka loka Asuria Lakis ebe, “Adiak eoŋ; kinyeinai koboŋo: lukitubokini ijo eoŋ acamuni.” Kotuboki ekabaka loka Asuria Kesekia ekabaka loka Yuda atalatan akwat auni nuka epuesa ka atalatan akaisauni nuka esabu.
Kosodi Kesekia ainakin ŋes epuesa kere loadumuna kotogo loka EJAKAIT, koboro da luka akais nuipu lukotogo loka ekabaka.
Kapak kaŋin kikisunun Kesekia esabu kokirigin luka eyekalu loka EJAKAIT, kopirin da lueladaarit Kesekia ekabaka loka Yuda, koinak ekabaka loka Asuria.

Kijuka ekabaka loka Asuria Taratan ka Rab-saris ka Rabasake anyoun koLakis mama ejai ekabaka Kesekia kajore naepol Yerusalem, Kodokasi kopotu Yerusalem, Kedoloto, kopotu kobwaata kariri kaleles naka atapar nakokuju, korot loka emanikor loka ekelotan igoen,
Kedaut anyaraun ekabaka, kolom neejaas Eliakim okoku loka Kilikia, loapolokinit ekal, ka Sebuna ekewadikan, ka Yoa okoku loka Asap ekesiitonokinan.
Inera ijo, konye eraas akiro nuka aituk bon ebe, Ejai acoa ka agogoŋ naka ejie, Iŋai do imunokina ijo, tape kipaliikin eoŋ?

Koany ca, imunokina ijo ebela loka egada lo loiriecakina, ŋes Misiri; arai kegoŋakini ituŋanan mamake, elomari akani ke icumi: ikoni nepenen Parao ekabaka loko Misiri mama ejaas ŋul kere luemunosi ŋes.
Konye arai kitemas ebe, ‘Kimuno isio EJAKAIT Ekosideke’: mere ŋes ŋol loalemari Kesekia aiboisioke nuiceleleete ka itemwanake, kolimok Yuda ka Yerusalem ebe, ‘Imaenenete kotem kalo koYerusalem?’
Aso do, keŋaiŋait, kojaakis ekajakait ekabaka loka Asuria iboro lukititiŋa, kainakin eoŋ jo da ibalasin ilukumin iarei, arai ipedori ijo kowaikon aibwaikin luibwanenete.
Aso ipedori biai aisibelokin akonyen nuka ekapolon ediopet kotoma kaludidik kokejaanakinak luka ejakaitika, komuno Misiri kanuka agalin ka ikebwanenok.
Abu kereka eoŋ asurokin aibois na amudiar komamei EJAKAIT? EJAKAIT, ŋes kabala ebe, ‘Kosurok akwap na, komudia.’ ”

Kosodi Eliakim okoku loka Kilikia, ka Sebuna, ka Yoa, atemar Rabasake atiar, “Kiŋaiŋait, kiner kikonikejaanakinak kaŋajep nako Suria; naarai kijeni; sirikiner kasio kaŋajep naka Iyudayan, kaki nuka ituŋa luejaas arwatat.”

Konye kotema Rabasake kes atiar, “Keyakuunit ekajakait mama ejai ejakaitikon, ka jo da, einer akiro nu? Mam kereka keyakuunit otuŋa luiboiete karwatat, ainyam acinikec, ka aimat akulakec nepepe kayes?”
Kosodi Rabasake aibwo, kiworo keporoto loepol kaŋajep naka Iyudayan, kotema atiar, “Kopupokisi yesi akirot naka ekabaka lokapolon, ekabaka loka Asuria.
Inera ekabaka kwanata ebe, ‘Kinyek Kesekia aiŋal yes; naarai mam epedori aitajar yes kakanike:
Kinyek Kesekia ainakin yes amunokina EJAKAIT ebe, Abeit kitajari EJAKAIT oni, ere lo da mam ijaikinio akan naka ekabaka loka Asuria.’

Sirikipupokis Kesekia: naarai inera ekabaka loka Asuria kwanata ebe, ‘Kinerutu keoŋ nuka ainapakin, kopotu neajai; konyama yesi ŋinituŋanan emusabibuke, ŋinituŋanan nuka etinike, komata da yesi ŋinituŋanan akipi nukoicoike;

Aitodol neabunio kayaŋaa yes akwap naeputosi kanakus, akwap naka akima ka ebino, akwap naka atap ka imanikoria luka emusabibu, akwap naka akinyet naka eseitun, ka esik, tetere ijarete, komam itwakete: sirikipupokis Kesekia, nakijodooria yes ebe, Kitajari EJAKAIT oni.
Ejai cani edio kodekesio luka atekerin loitajarit akekwap kakan naka ekabaka loka Asuria?
Alu bo ejaas idekesio luka Kamat, ka luka Arupad? Alu bo ejaas idekesio luka Separabaim, luka Kena, ka luka Iba da? Apotu tope kitajarata Samaria kakanika?
Lukaŋai kodekesio kere luka akwapin luapotu kitajarata akwapukec kakanika, tetere itajari EJAKAIT Yerusalem kakanika?’ ”
Konye kililiŋa ituŋa, mam apotu koboŋokis ŋes akirot; naarai kejai aicorakinet naka ekabaka ebe, Sirikiboŋokis.
Kosodi Eliakim okoku loka Kilikia, loapolokinit ekal, ka Sebuna ekewadikan, ka Yoa okoku loka Asap ekesiitonokinan kopotu mama ejai Kesekia ecilicilito inapenekec, kolimokis akiro nuka Rabasake.
Kijuka Eliakim, loapolokinit ekal, ka Sebuna ekewadikan, ka imakio luka isasedotin, konapitos ipukoi, mama ejai Isaia enabi okoku loka Amos.
Kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Inera Kesekia kwanata ebe, Apaaran na erai apaaran naka ican, naka aitoronio, ka naka amoromoroo: naarai adol idwe aurio, emamei da agogoŋ nakaidoun.

Motoko iirari EJAKAIT Ekonideke akiro kere nuka Rabasake, loejukuni ekabaka loka Asuria ejakaitike amoromor Edeke lokajaran, ka aitoron akiro nuapupu EJAKAIT Ekonideke: aso kitonyou ailipikon kanuka aatoŋot naedeun.”
Kopotu do ikejaanakinak luka ekabaka Kesekia neejai Isaia.
Kotema Isaia kes atiar, “Kolimokis ejakaitikus kwanata ebe, ‘Inera EJAKAIT kwanata ebe, Sirikiyoŋ akiro nuipup, nukamoromorooto eoŋ ikejaanakinak luka ekabaka loka Asuria.
Koany, ebwaikin emoyo tomake, epupuni ŋesi eemut, eboŋori bukec; ebirokini eoŋ da ŋes kekileŋ akwapuke.’ ”
Kepupu inerai nuka Tiraka ekabaka loko Etiopia ebe, “Koany, alomu aitiji jo”: kiyakik bobo ŋesi Kesekia ikiyakia ebe,
“Itemarete Kesekia ekabaka loka Yuda kwanata ebe, ‘Kinyek Edekekon loimuno aiŋal jo ebe, Mam Yerusalem ijaikinio akan naka ekabaka loka Asuria.
Koany, ipupunit ijo nueswamakis ikabakan luka Asuria akwapin kere, amudianarete kes cut: do konyet ijo kiyuunio?
Apotu kereka idekesio luka atekerin koyuununete kes, nuamudianarete lukapapaaka, Gosan, ka Karan, ka Resep, ka idwe luka Eden luajaas Telasar?
Ai bo ejai ekabaka loka Kamat, ka ekabaka loka Arupad, ka ekabaka loka ere loka Separabaim, loka Kena, ka Iba da?’ ”
Kilip Kesekia kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kobala ebe, “Wu EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael, loiboie kokerubin, ijo ŋes Edeke, ijo bon, loka ajakanuto kere nuka akwap; ijo kolo isubi akuj ka akwap.
Kitoik akonikit, wu EJAKAIT, kiira; kokweny, wu EJAKAIT, koany; kopup akiro nuka Senakerib, nuejuku ŋesi amoromoroo Edeke lokajaran.
Abeit, wu EJAKAIT, apotu ikabakan luka Asuria komudiasi atekerin ka akecekwapin.
Apotu kocakasi idekesiokec akim: naarai mam keraas idekesio, konye aswam naka akanin nuka ituŋa, ikito ka amor; ŋes kemudiarere ŋes.
Aso do, wu EJAKAIT Ekosideke, keŋaiŋait, kitajarai sio kakanike, tetere ejenunete ajakanuto kere nuka akwap ebe ijo ŋes EJAKAIT Edeke, ijo bon ba.”
Na ŋes akirot naener EJAKAIT mama ejai ŋesi ebe:
“Kimwaŋit akoku nabekot naka Sion jo,
ekienar jo kisekelei;
emuŋumuŋ akoku naka Yerusalem akouke neijai.
Iŋai loitopolooritor ijo ekoniporoto,
ka aiteluor akonikonyen kuju?
Isurok Lokalaunan loka Isirael.
kinera atiar, ‘Kaipues naka agalinika
Adokari oswion luka iroŋan,
atutubeta nukotoma nuka Lebanon.
Ajepi iresiake lueojak,
ka iberosinike luejokuka;
Alomari da aiboisike naiwasie,
amagoro naka emanikorike loideŋeriat.
Abok, amat akipi nukimo,
etooni da kakakeju
icorin kere luko Misiri.’
Kasub agear apeŋo?
Kwana da etodolit,
Korai ijo loimudiari ireria lukebwaitai
araun aapoŋor nukamejei.
keraas luedit agogoŋ,
koburut kitirirata;
kosubito bala inya luka ais, kwape kikui,
kwape kinya luejaas kuju togo,
kwape kakima nueokito eriŋa epolooro.
ka alomarikon, ka alomunikon,
aikerepoonutukon kaneajai.
ido naarai adolu emokodekon akika,
ŋes ebwaikinia ekagolu okumesikon,
ka arukanaka da aitukukon,
kenyakati jo orot loilomunia.
Edupi aatoŋot naideuni naabu koku kokek loka Yuda alias kwap, kota araito kokuju.
Naarai elomari aatoŋot koYerusalem, luekuete da komoru Sion: itodolikini ŋun adunyanut naka EJAKAIT,
“Kanuka ŋun inera kwanata EJAKAIT nuka ekabaka loka Asuria ebe, Mam edoluni ore lo, karaida agumakin emal, karaida adolokin kebuku, karaida aitutu etut asurokinia ŋes.
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Orot lokelomunia, ŋopeŋol eboŋoria, ido mam edoluni ore lo.
Naarai egaŋi eoŋ ere lo aitajar, kanukaŋ, ido kanukaŋ ekakejaanakinan Daudi.”
Kosodi Senakerib ekabaka loka Asuria anyoun, kolot, koboŋo, kiboikin Ninebe.
Kosodi kanen, emai ŋesi kotogo loka Nisurok ekedeke, koarata Aduram-melek ka Sareser ŋes kekileŋ: kokereasi akwap naka Ararat. Kirum Esar-kadon okokuke aiboisike.
Kosodi kibelok akekonyen arwatat, kilip EJAKAIT, kotema atiar,
“Kiitu kwape kwana, wu EJAKAIT, keŋaiŋait, kwape aloseneneo kakonyenekon kabeit ka etau loeteni, keswama nuejok kakonyenekon.” Komony noi Kesekia akiyo,
Kosodi kanen, eroko Isaia elomuna alosit kidiŋ ore, kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ejai ŋesi ebe,

“Koboŋo, kolimok Kesekia ekapolon loka ikatuŋa ebe, ‘Inera kwanata EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Daudi papaakon ebe, Eira ailipikon, aany akonikiyo: koany, ketaŋaleuni jo: apaaran nakiwuniet ŋes idokaria togo loka EJAKAIT.
Eyatakini da akonipaarasia ikar itomon ka lukany, ketajari jo ka ere kalo kakan naka ekabaka loka Asuria; egaŋi eoŋ ere lo kanukaŋ, ido kanuka Daudi ekakejaanakinan.’ ”
Kotema Isaia atiar, “Koodutu araito nuka etini.” Koodutu kibwaikis abus, koŋaleu.
Kotema Kesekia Isaia atiar, “Ani bo aanyunet naitejenuni ebe ketaŋaleuni EJAKAIT eoŋ, kasodi adokar togo loka EJAKAIT kapaaran nakiwuniet?”
Kotema Isaia atiar, “Na ŋes eraun aanyunet mamakon naebuni kama ejai EJAKAIT, ebe iswamai EJAKAIT ŋin naener: elosi kereka etolim kiŋaren ailameta atomon, arai bo eboŋori kau ailameta atomon?”
Koboŋok Kesekia ebe, “Erai akirot naepatana aijesun ailameta atomon: mam, konye koboŋo etolim kau ailameta atomon.”
Komonyak Isaia enabi EJAKAIT: kinyaka etolim kau ailameta atomon, nukejositor akoloŋ kailameta nuka Akas.

Kopupok Kesekia kes, kitodik kes etogo kere loka iboroke luka akais nuipu, epuesa, ka esabu, ka lueuru maa, ka akinyet naka akais nuipu, ka etogo loka lujiisike, ka luadumuna koboroke luka akais nuipu: amamei ibore kotogoke karaida ayaetake kere, yenimam Kesekia etodikinit kes,
Kosodi Isaia enabi abunore mama ejai ekabaka Kesekia, kotema ŋes atiar, “Anyoika nuabalasi ituŋa ŋul? Apote kai aponare mamakon?” Kotema Kesekia atiar, “Apote kakwap naelwana, Babulon.”
Kotema atiar, “Inyo bo aanyut kotogokon?” Koboŋok Kesekia ebe, “Aanyut iboro kere luejass togoka: emamei ibore koboroka luka akais nuipu yenimam eoŋ etodikinit kes.”
Kotema Isaia Kesekia atiar, “Kopupok akirot naka EJAKAIT.
Koany, eponito apaarasia, eyaŋaario kere luejaas togokon, ka ŋul kaluapotu lukapapaakon kiŋadata kiton lolo, Babulon: ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Emameun ibore yenepianun.
Eyaŋaarete da lukodwekon, lukiuriei ijo elop; eraunete ibwacin kotogo lokapolon loka ekabaka loko Babulon.”
Kosodi Kesekia atemar Isaia ebe, “Ejok akirot naka EJAKAIT nainera ijo.” Bobo da kotema atiar, “Mere kwaŋin, arai ejaunos ainapakin ka abeit kapaarasiaka?”
Kojotoor Kesekia kalukapapaake: kirum Manase okokuke aiboisike.
Kerai Manase loka ikar itomon ka luarei egeuni airum; kirumak ikar akaisakany ka lukany ko Yerusalem: ekiror loka totoke kerai Kepisi-ba.
Kiswama nueroko kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kwape ajaatar italesia luka ikapirin, luereŋei EJAKAIT kakonyen nuka idwe luka Isirael.
Naarai koduk bobo aiboisio nuiceleleete nuamudiarit papake Kesekia; kodukok Baal itemwan, kiswama Asera, kwape eswamaa Akab ekabaka loka Isirael, koma ajore kere naka akuj, kijaanak kes.
Koduk itemwan togo loka EJAKAIT, loenera EJAKAIT ebe, “Yerusalem ŋes ebwaikini ekakitor.”
Kodukok ajore kere naka akuj itemwan alaroi aarei nuka etogo loka EJAKAIT.
Kitotor okokuke akim, kiswama nukaidwar, ka nuka ecudet, kolosenenei mama ejaas lukajokin ka imurwok: kiswama nueroko nuipu kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT aitunyunyurikin ŋes.
Kosipok aput naegerer naka Asera naasubit togo loalimokinit EJAKAIT Daudi ka Solomon okokuke atiar, “Togo lo, ka Yerusalem, loaseunit katekerin kere nuka Isirael, ebwaikini ekakiror ikar kere:

Mam esirimi bobo akeje nuka Isirael anyoun kakwap naainakinit lukapapaakec; arai ecoito aiswamaenen kwape ejaatar kere nuecorakinit kes, kwape ejaatar da ikisila kere luecorakinit Musa ekakejaanakinan kes.”
Konye mam apotu kiirasi; kijodou Manase kes aswam nueroko aitelekar nuejodoununete atekerin nuamudiar! EJAKAIT kakonyen nuka idwe luka Isirael.
Kinera EJAKAIT okejaanakinakake inabin ebe,
“Naarai eswama Manase ekabaka loka Yuda italesia lu, eswama da nueroko aitelekarit kere nueswamaete Imorain luageikinete ŋes, etidiak da Yuda kaputosiake:
Ŋes inerar kwanata EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael ebe, Koany, ayauni Yerusalem ka Yuda aronis naetia netinen, kosodi yenepupuni kere, kodelosi akeki.
Kosodi ejeleleuni auno naka Samaria koYerusalem, ka ebiriji loka etogo loka Akab: amwatari Yerusalem kwape emwataria ituŋanan asanit, emwasi kobuburikini,
Acakari aatoŋot naka airumeteka, kejaik kes akan naka lukasurupokec; eraunos imejan ka iŋatuna mama ejaas lukasurupokec kere;
Naarai eswamata nueroko kakonyeneka, ketunyunyurikis, ageun kapaaran naalomuniata lukapapaakec koMisiri, kiton lolo.”
Kojotoor Manase kalukapapaake, aponi kidaikinai omanikor loka etogoke, omanikor loka Usa: kirum Amon okokuke aiboisike.
Kiswama nueroko kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kwape eswamaa Manase papake.
Kolosenenei korot kere loalosenenoo papake, kijaanak aputosia nuejaanakinenei papake, komaa kes:
Kojai EJAKAIT, Edeke loka lukapapaake, mam alosenenei korot loka EJAKAIT.
Kinerut ikejaanakinak luka Amon asurokin ŋes, koarakis ekabaka togokeŋ.
Konye apotu ituŋa luka akwap koarata ŋul kere luenerunete asurokin ekabaka Amon; kodakakis ituŋa luka akwap Yosia okokuke araun ekabaka aiboisike.
Aswamisio ace nuka Amon nuabu kiswama, mam kereka iwadikatai oitabo loka aisiitonokin nuka ikabakan luka Yuda?
Aponi kidaikinai atesike omanikor loka Usa: kirum Yosia okokuke aiboisike.
Kiswama nuejok kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kolosenenei korot kere loka Daudi papaake, komam epaari akan nakoteten karaida nakokediany.
“Kodoka neejai Kilikia esasedoti lopeti, kimar apesan nueyaunitai togo loka EJAKAIT, nuejaununut ikagolok kotuŋa:
Kijaikis akan naka ikeswamak luiteete etogo loka EJAKAIT: koinakis ikeswamak luejaas togo loka EJAKAIT, aiteteunia etogo neetiyanara:
Ikekeok akito, ka ikadukok, ka ikekeok amor: ido kanuka egwelet akito ka amor nuikec aiteteunia etogo.”
Konye mam apodos aimar apesan nukijaikinitai akanikec; naarai eswamaenenete kamunonut.
Kobu Sapan ekewadikan neejai ekabaka, kinyakak ekabaka akiro, kobala ebe, “Akorasi ikonikejaanakinak apesan nuadumuna kotogo, ejaikis akan naka ikeswamak luiteete etogo loka EJAKAIT,”
Kosodi Sapan ekewadikan alimokin ekabaka ebe, “Kejaiki Kilikia esasedoti eitabo.” Kosiom Sapan kakonyen nuka ekabaka.
Kicorak ekabaka Kilikia esasedoti, ka Akikam, okoku loka Sapan, ka Akubor okoku loka Mikaia, ka Sapan ekewadikan, ka Asaia ekejaanakinan loka ekabaka, ebe,

“Koloto yesi, kiŋita EJAKAIT kanukaŋ, kanuka ituŋa da, ido kanuka Yuda kere, akiro nuka eitabo kalo loadumun: naarai epol anyunyura naka EJAKAIT nakinepak oni, naarai mam lukapapaawok apotu kopuput akiro nuka eitabo kalo, aiswamaenen kwape ejaatar kere nukiwadikakinio oni.”
Kotema ŋesi kes atiar, “Inera kwanata EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael ebe: ‘Kolimokis etuŋanan lokijukunit yes neajai ebe.
Inera kwanata EJAKAIT ebe, Koany, ayauni aronis aibois na, ka neejaas luiboiete kotoma, akiro kere nuka eitabo kaloasiomi ekabaka loka Yuda:
Naarai kajala, esupuruikis lukisupurununo odekesio ice, aitunyunyurikin eoŋ kaswam kere naka akaninikec; ŋes inepakinia akanyunyura aibois na, komam eduŋeori,
Konye ekabaka loka Yuda, lokijukuni aiŋitakin EJAKAIT, kolimokis ŋes kwanata ebe, Inera kwanata EJAKAIT Edeke loka Isirael ebe: Nuka akiro nukipupuni,

Kanu anonokiaror ekonitau, kitasonikin kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, naipupunio nuenerak aibois na, ka luiboiete kotoma ebe, eluoros amejei ka aikenio, kocil ikoninapen, komony akiyo kakonyeneka; inera EJAKAIT ebe, Keira eoŋ da,
Kanuka ŋun, koany, atukokini jo mama ejaas lukapapaakon, kitukokinio jo ailitikon inapakina, kwabo mam eanyunete akonikonye aronis kere naayauni aibois na.’ ” Kinyakakinai ekabaka akiro.

Kodoka ekabaka togo loka EJAKAIT, ka ituŋa kere luka Yuda ka lukiboiete koYerusalem nepepe kaŋes, ka isasedotin, ka inabin, ka ituŋa kere, ludidik ka lukapolok: kosiomak akiikec akiro kere nuka eitabo loka aitutuket loadumun kotogo loka EJAKAIT.

Kobwo ekabaka kaneejai epir, kitutuk aitutuket kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, atupit EJAKAIT, airic aicorakinetake, ka aitejenunetake ka ikekisila, keketau kere, ka akeijar kere, aitogogoŋ akiro nuka aitutuket kana nuewadikatai oitabo lo: kitogogoŋoto ituŋa kere aitutuket.

Kolema isasedotin luamaenenete aputosia, luatiakunete ikabakan luka Yuda aisupuruunun lukisupurununo kaiboisio nuiceleleete nukoreria luka Yuda, ka aiboisio nuerimorito Yerusalem; ŋul da luesupuruunokinete Baal, ka akoloŋ, ka elap, ka aacer, ka ajore kere naka akuj, lukisupurununo.
Kitolom Asera kotogo loka EJAKAIT, kiŋa ka Yerusalem, koyau aguurut Kidiron, kicwe ŋes kaguurut Kidiron, kicakacak kidupudupo, kiwelanak atesina nuka ituŋa kere.
Kotiyatiya itogoi luka iketepak ikiliok, luajaas togo loka EJAKAIT, nekesonyenenata aŋor aigalisio nuka Asera.

Kitolom isasedotin kere koreria luka Yuda, komunaa aiboisio nuiceleleete neesupuriononoto isasedotin lukisupurununo, anyoun koGeba kiton Beer-seba; kobilibil aiboisio nuiceleleete nukorutei nuajaas neelomarere orute loka Yosua ekayaiton loka ere, nuajaas akan nakokediany orute loka ere,
Konye mam apotu isasedotin luka aiboisio nuiceleleete kodokasi otem loka EJAKAIT Yerusalem, konye konyamenenete imugatin lumam itubuunitoi koinacanakec,
Komunaa da Topet, loajai aditot naka idwe luka Kinom, kinyek ituŋanan aicwe okokuke karaida akokuke araun asubanit mama ejai Molek.
Kolema ibalasin luainakinito ikabakan luka Yuda akoloŋ, neelomarere togo loka EJAKAIT, eiduny kagola naka Natan-melek ebwacit, naapie kanen; kicwe agalin nuka akoloŋ kakim,

Kobilibil ekabaka itemwan luajaas kuju kagola nakokuju naka Akas, luadukito ikabakan luka Yuda, ka itemwan luadukokinit Manase alaroi aarei nuka etogo loka EJAKAIT, komunyumuny kes kanen, kocakak aguurut Kidiron.

Komunaa ekabaka aiboisio nuiceleleete nuiteete Yerusalem, nuajaas akan nakoteten naka emoru loka amunaar, loadukokinit Solomon ekabaka loka Isirael Asitoret etal loka Isidonin, ka Kemos etal loka Moab, ka Milikom etal loka idwe luka Amon.
Kobilibil ipirin, kojepejep Asera, kileleb aiboisiokec akojo nuka ituŋa.

Kosodi koŋolia Yosia kau, koany atesina nuajaas nen moru; kijuka, kolemunai akojo katesina, kicwe kes kotem, komunaa ŋes, kwape ajaar akirot naka EJAKAIT naalimori etuŋanan loka Edeke, loalimori akiro ŋun,
Kosodi ŋesi atemar atiar, “Anyoin aiitunet ŋin naany?” Kolimokis ŋes ituŋa lukore kaŋol ebe, “Ŋes ates naka etuŋanan loka Edeke, loabuni koYuda, kolimok akiro nu nuiswamak ijo etem loka Bet-el.”
Kotema atiar, “Kinyeisi ŋes; kinyek etuŋanan kere akutun akekojo.” Kosodete kinyeinai akekojo nepepe kakojo nuka enabi loabuni koSamaria.

Kolema Yosia abilai kere nuka aiboisio nuiceleleete nuajaas oreria luka Samaria, nukedukete ikabakan luka Isirael aitunyunyurikin EJAKAIT, kiswamak kes kwape ajaatar aswamisio kere nueswamat koBet-el.
Koarak otemwan isasedotin kere luka aiboisio nuiceleleete luajaas nen, kicwe akojo nuka ituŋa kotemwan kaŋul; koboŋo Yerusalem.
Abeit mam aricito Aleleŋio naikoni nen ageun kapaarasia nuka ikatubok luatubonokinete Isirael, karaida apaarasia kere nuka ikabakan luka Isirael, karaida nuka ikabakan luka Yuda.
Konye kokaru lokitomonet kakanykauni loka ekabaka Yosia korica Aleleŋio ŋin mama ejai EJAKAIT koYerusalem.

Emamei ekabaka kaluageikinete ŋes luaputos kaŋes, loebelokina mama ejai EJAKAIT keketau kere, ka akeijar kere, ka akegogoŋ kere, kwape ejaatar ikisila kere luka Musa; akauloke da mam enyounit ediopet loeputos kaŋes.
Kotema EJAKAIT atiar, “Alemari Yuda da kakonyeneka, kwape alemaria Isirael, acakari ere ka loaseunit, ŋes Yerusalem, ka etogo loabu kener ebe, Iboieaenei ekakiror kanen.”
Aswamisio ace nuka Yosia, ka nuabu kiswama kere, mam kereka iwadikatai oitabo loka aisiitonokin nuka ikabakan luka Yuda?
Kapaarasiake koloma Parao-neko ekabaka loko Misiri asurokin ekabaka loka Asuria ocor Eupurat; kolot Yosia asurokin ŋes; koarak Megido, kedau aanyun ŋes.

Kodakasi ikekejaanakinak aketes kagali anyoun koMegido, koyaut ŋes Yerusalem, kidaikis ailitike. Koyaata ituŋa luka akwap Yekoakas okoku loka Yosia, kinyonyoikis ŋes akinyet, kitaraut ŋes ekabaka aibois naka papake.
Kiswama nueroko kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kwape ajaatar kere nukiswamato lukapapaake.
Koen Parao-neko ŋes koRibula akwap naka Kamat, kinyek airum koYerusalem; kotubok akwap esolo loka atalatan akwatat nuka epuesa, ka atalata adiopet naka esabu.
Kitarau Parao-neko Eliakim okoku loka Yosia ekabaka aibois naka Yosia papake, kilocok ekekiror komaik Yekoiakimr konye koyaŋa Yekoakas; kobu Misiri, kotwanik ŋina.

Koinak Yekoiakim Parao epuesa ka esabu; konye kotubok akwap iboro ainakin apesan kwape ecorakinia Parao: kitelem epuesa ka esabu kotuŋa luka akwap, kaŋinituŋanan kwape ejaar esoloke, ainakin Parao-neko.
Kerai Yekoiakim loka ikar akaisaarei ka lukany egeuni airwn; kirumak ikar itomon ka lodiopet koYerusalem: ekiror loka totoke kerai Sebida akoku naka Pedaia loka Ruma.
Kiswama nueroko kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kwape ejaatar kere nukiswamato lukapapaake.
Abeit kobunok ŋin Yuda kaicorakinet naka EJAKAIT, alemar kes kakonyeneke, kanuka aronisio nuka Manase, kwape ajaatar kere nueswamat ŋesi;
Kanuka aokot da nuamameete aronis nuabukori ŋesi, naarai abu kileleb Yerusalem aokot nuamameete aronis: mam EJAKAIT akoto aitim,
Aswamisio kere nuka Yekoiakim, ka nuabu kiswama kere, mam kereka iwadikatai oitabo loka aisiitonokin nuka ikabakan luka Yuda?
Kojotoor Yekoiakim kalukapapaake: kirum Yekoiakin okokuke aiboisike.
Mam abu ekabaka loko Misiri kobu bobo anyoun kakwapuke: naarai abu ekabaka loko Babulon koyaŋa kere luaraas luka ekabaka loko Misiri, ageun kaguurut nako Misiri kiton ocor Eupurat.
Kiswama nueroko kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kwape ajaatar kere nukiswamat papake.
Kobu Nebukadenesar ekabaka loko Babulon ore, koroko ikekejaanakinak irigaunito;

Kolom Yekoiakin ekabaka loka Yuda neejai ekabaka loko Babulon, ŋes, ka totoke, ka ikekejaanakinak, ka ikapolokoke, ka ikapolokitokoke: kikam ekabaka loko Babulon ŋes okaru lokikanyetekauni loka airumuke.
Koyaŋa ŋina iboro kere luka akais nuipu luka etogo loka ekabaka, kojepejep iboro kere luka esabu lueswamat Solomon ekabaka loka Isirael koyekalu loka EJAKAIT, kwape abalar EJAKAIT,

Koyaŋa lukoYerusalem kere, ka ikapolok kere, ka ituŋa lukirigin kere luetitiŋ, ilukumin itomon luejoreorio, ka ikeswamak kere luepiriaka, ka ikatatak; mam luapotu kideunos dimarai lukican luka ituŋa luka akwap,
Koyaŋa Yekoiakin Babulon; ka toto naka ekabaka, ka aŋor nuka ekabaka, ka ikapolokitokoke, ka ijaka luka akwap, kijoreo Babulon alemar ko Yerusalem,
Ituŋa kere lukirigin, ilukumin ikanykaarei, ka ikeswamak luepiriaka ka ikatatak elukumit, kes kere lukagogoŋ luapedorito ejie, kijoreo ekabaka loko Babulon kes Babulon.
Kitarau ekabaka loko Babulon Matania onac loka papake ekabaka aiboisike, kilocok ekekiror komaik Sedekia.
Kiswama nueroko kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kwape kejaatar kere nueswamat Yekoiakim.
Naarai abu kodol koYerusalem ka Yuda kanuka anyunyura naka EJAKAIT, aitodol naedaunia aireŋear kes kakonyeneke.

Kosodi kanen kokaru lokikanyetekaoŋon loka airumuke, kolap lokitomonet, kapaaran nakitomonet naka elap kobu bobo Nebukadenesar ekabaka loko Babulon, ŋes ka akejore kere, asurokin Yerusalem, kidukuroto airigaun ŋes; kitutuoto itutio lujiis.
Kwaŋin kirigaut ere aitodol okar lokitomonet ka lodiopet loka ekabaka Sedekia.
Kapaaran nakikanyetekaoŋon naka elap kalokiwoŋonet, kodedeŋar eteŋei kore, komamikis cut ituŋa luka akwap inyamat.

Kosodete kotiyasi arorwa kore, kokera ikajiok kere kuare korot loka erute loejai kidiŋ arwatatin aarei, loidunyas kemanikor loka ekabaka: (konye erimorito Ikaludean, asurokin ere iwaitin kere:) kitor ekabaka orot loka Araba.
Konye korukio ajore naka Ikaludean ekabaka, kodolokis ŋes kapuutona nuka Yeriko: kisiarakin ajoreke kere aijal ŋes.
Kosodete kikamas ekabaka, koyaŋaasi neejai ekabaka loko Babulon Ribula; kotubokinai akiro,
Koarakinai odwe luka Sedekia akonyeneke, kogorununoi Sedekia akonye, koenai kirikoi, koyaŋaarai Babulon.
Kicwe etogo loka EJAKAIT, ka etogo loka ekabaka; itogoi kere lukotoma Yerusalem, ŋolitogo kere loepol, kicweikin kakim.
Abu ajore kere naka Ikaludean luajaas kalokapolon loka ikedarak, kotiyatiya arwatatin nuka Yerusalem airiamar.
Aatoŋot naka ituŋa lukideuna kore, ka ŋul da lualuŋakina, lualuŋakina mama ejai ekabaka loko Babulon, ka aatoŋot naka ikeswamak, kijoreo Nebusaradan ekapolon loka ikedarak,
Konye kitasal ekapolon loka ikedarak lukican noi kakwap araut iketemonokinok emusabibu ka ikakoriok du.
Koyaŋaasi amoti, ka iŋitia, ka aitudeŋeta, ka akaalei, ka iboro kere luka aisinit lukijaanakiniata:
Ka atiboka nuigaete ekurwon, ka atanyia; nukeraas nuka esabu, esabu, ka nukeraas nuka epuesa, epuesa, kwaŋin ayaŋaaria ekapolon loka ikedarak.
Ipirino iarei, ka aŋolol adiopet, ka aicegeria, lueswamakinit Solomon etogo loka EJAKAIT; aisinin nuka iboro kalu kere mam kepedorete ainiŋio.

Aojau naka epir ediopet kerai ikubitin itomon ka lukanykauni, kejai akou naka aisinit kokujuke; aojau naka akou adiopet ikubitin iuni; kolukunito iboyan ka akamamagan akou, kere luka aisinit: ekoni epir lokiareit nepenen kaswam naka iboyan.

Kikama kore ekapolokiton lokeyait ikajiok; ka ituŋa ikany kaŋul lukeanyununete akonyen nuka ekabaka, lukedumunio kore; ka ekewadikan, ekapolon loka ajore, loaramununei ituŋa luka akwap; ka ituŋa akaisakanykape luka ituŋa luka akwap lukedumunio kore.
Kikama Nebusaradan ekapolon loka ikedarak kes, koyau mama ejai ekabaka loka Babulon Ribula.
Kodany ekabaka loko Babulon kes, koarak Ribula akwap naka Kamat. Kwaŋin kijoreoroi Yuda anyoun kakwapuke.
Ituŋa da luasalete kakwap naka Yuda, luabu Nebukadenesar kinyek, koinak ŋul Gedalia okoku loka Akikam, okoku loka Sapan araun ekayaitonikec.

Kepuputu ikapolok kere luka irioŋeta, kes ka ituŋakec, ebe, kitarau ekabaka loko Babulon Gedalia ekayaiton, kopotu mama ejai Gedalia Misipa, Isimael okoku loka Netania, ka Yokanan okoku loka Karea, ka Seraia okoku loka Tanumet Enetopatit, ka Yaasania okoku loka Emaakatit, kes ka ikecetuŋa.
Kiyapoik Gedalia kes ka ikecetuŋa, kotema kes atiar, “Sirikiyoŋa kanuka ikejaanakinak luka Ikaludean: kiboikinos akwap, kijaanakis ekabaka loko Babulon, ijaunete do ejok.”

Konye kolap lokikanyetekaarei, kobu Isimael okoku loka Netania, okoku loka Elisama, loka aur naka ekabaka, ka ituŋa itomon nepepe kaŋes, kicuma Gedalia, kotwana, ka Iyudayan ka Ikaludean luajaas kaŋes Misipa,
Konyout ituŋa kere, ludidik ka lukapolok ka ikapolok luka irioŋeta, kopotu Misiri; naarai kokuriakata Ikaludean.
Kinera kaŋes nukasianut, kitopolo eicoloŋoke aitelekarit iicoloŋo luka ikabakan lukejaas kaŋes Babulon.
Kilocok inapeneke luka aidaris, konyamenenei inyamat kakonyeneke apaarasia kere nuka aijarake.
Akorakineteke, abu ekabaka koinanak ŋes akorakinet ŋinipaaran, apaarasia kere nuka aijarake.
Kenan, Makalalel, Yared;
Enok, Metusela, Lamek;
Noa, Sem, Kam, ka Yapet.
Odwe luka Gomer; Asukenas, ka Dipat, ka Togaruma.
Odwe luka Yaban; Elisa, ka Tarusis, ka Kitim, ka Rodanim.
Odwe luka Kam; Kus, ka Misuraim, ka Put ka Kanaan.
Odwe luka Kus; Seba, ka Kabila, ka Sabuta, ka Raama, ka Sabuteka, Odwe luka Raama; Seba ka Dedan.
Kouri Kus Nimurod; kogeu araun lokagogoŋ kotoma akwap.
Misuraim kouri Ludim, ka Anamim, ka Lekabim, ka Naputukim,
ka Paturusim, ka Kasulukim (nealomuniata Ipilisitian), ka Kaputorim.
Kanaan kouri ekekiyai Sidon, ka Ket;
ka Eyebusit, ka Emorait, ka Egirugasit;
ka Ekibit, ka Erukait, ka Esinit;
ka Erubadait, ka Esemarit, ka Ekamatit.
Arupakasad kouri Sela, Sela kouri Eber.
Eber kouri idwe iarei lusap: ekiror loka ediopet Peleg; naarai toma apaarasiake ŋes akorokoroere akwap; ekiror loka onaceke ŋes Yokutan.
Yokutan kouri Alumodad, ka Selep, ka Kasarumabet, ka Yera;
Ka Kadoram, ka Usal, ka Dikula;
ka Ebal, ka Abimael, ka Seba;
Ka Opir, ka Kabila, ka Yobab. Ŋul kere kes odwe luka Yokutan.
Eber, Peleg, Reu;
Serug, Nakor, Tera;
Aburam (ŋopeŋol ŋes Aburaam).
Na ŋes auriokec: ekiyai loka Isimael, Nebaiot; kosodi Kedar, ka Adubeel, ka Mibusam.
Misima, ka Duma, ka Masa; ka Kadad, ka Tema.
Yetur, ka Napis, ka Kedema. Ŋul kes odwe luka Isimael.
