Odwe luka Midian; Epa, ka Eper, ka Kanok, ka Abida, ka Eludaa. Ŋul kere kes odwe luka Ketura.
Odwe luka Elipas; Teman, ka Omar, ka Sepi, ka Gatam, ka Kenas ka Timuna ka Amalek.
Odwe luka Reuel; Nakat, ka Sera, ka Sama, ka Misa.
Odwe luka Lotan; Kori ka Komam: korai Timuna inacike ka Lotan.
Odwe luka Sobal; Alian ka Manakat ka Ebal, ka Sepi ka Onam, Odwe luka Sibeon; Aia ka Ana.
Odwe luka Ana; Dison. Odwe luka Dison; Kamuran ka Esaban ka Itiran ka Ceran.
Odwe luka Eser; Bilukan ka Saban, ka Yaakan. Odwe luka Disan; Us ka Aran.
Kotwana Bela, kirum Yobab okoku loka Sera loka Bosura aiboisike.
Kotwana Yobab, kirum Kusam loka akwap naka Itemanin aiboisike.
Kotwana Kusam, kirum Kadad okoku loka Bedad aiboisike, lokitojie Midian komanikor loka Moab: ekiror loka ereke ŋes Abit.
Kotwana Kadad, kirum Samula loka Masereka aiboisike.
Kotwana Samula, kirum Saul loka Rekobot loedunyas ka Ecor aiboisike.
Kotwana Saul, kirum Baal-kanan okoku loka Acabor aiboisike.
Kotwana Baal-kanan, kirum Kadad aiboisike; ekiror loka ereke ŋes Pai: ekiror loka aberuke ŋes Meketabel, akoku naka Matured, akoku naka Me-sakab.
Kotwana Kadad, Ijaka luka Edom kes lu; ejakait Timuna, ejakait Alia, ejakait Yetet;
Ejakait Okolibama, ejakait Ela, ejakait Pinon;
Ejakait Kenas, ejakait Teman, ejakait Mibisar;
Ejakait Magudiel, ejakait Iram. Ŋul kes ijaka luka Edom.
Dan, ka Yosep ka Benyamin, ka Naputali, ka Gad ka Aser.
Odwe luka Yuda; Er ka Onan, ka Sela; luuni luaurikinit ŋes Bat-sua Akanaanit. Arono Er, ekiyai loka Yuda, kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT: koara ŋes.
Abu Tamar aberu naka okokuke kourik ŋes Peres ka Sera. Odwe kere luka Yuda emwaasi ikany.
Odwe luka Sera; Simiri ka Etan, ka Keman, ka Kalikol, ka Dara; emwaasi kere ikany.
Odwe luka Karumi; Akar eketicanan loka Isirael, loabu kibuca kobore yenikenitoi.
Odwe luka Etan; Asaria.
Ram kouri Aminadabi Aminadab kouri Nason, ekapolon loka idwe luka Yuda;
Nason kouri Saluma, Saluma kouri Boas;
Boas kouri Obed, Obed kouri Yese;
Yese kouri Eliab ekiyaike, ka Abinadab lokiareit, ka Simea lokiwuniet;
Netanel lokiwoŋonet, Radai lokikanyet;
Osem lokikanyetekape, Daudi lokikanyetekaarei:
Ka ainacanakec Seruia ka Abigail. Odwe luka Seruia: Abisai, ka Yoab, ka Asakel, iuni.
Abigail kouri Amasa: papake loka Amasa ŋes Yeter Isimaelit.
Kouri Kaleb okoku loka Kesuron odwe kaneejai Asuba aberuke, kaneejai Yeriot da: lu kes odweke; Yeser, ka Sobab, ka Arudon.
Kotwana Asuba, komany Kaleb Epurat naabu kourik ŋes Kur.
Kur kouri Uri, Uri kouri Besalel.
Kouri Segub Yair, loajaas kireria akaisaarei ka luuni kakwap naka Gilead.
Kodemasi Gesur ka Aram ireria luka Yair kamakec, ka Kenat, ka ireriake ludidik, kes ireria akaisakanykape. Ŋul kere kes odwe luka Makir papake ka Gilead.
Kedau Kesuron atwanikin Kaleb-epurata, kosodi kourik Abiya aberu naka Kesuron ŋes Asur papa loka Tekoa.
Odwe luka Yerameel ekiyai loka Kesuron, Ram ekiyaike, ka Buna, ka Oren, ka Osem, ka Akiya.
Kejai Yerameel aceberu, ekekiror Atara; ŋin ŋes toto naka Onam.
Odwe luka Ram ekiyai loka Yerameel, Maas, ka Yamin, ka Eker.
Odwe luka Onam Samai, ka Yada; odwe luka Samai: Nadab ka Abisur.
Ekiror loka aberu naka Abisur Abikail; kourik ŋes Aban ka Molid.
Odwe luka Nadab; Seled, ka Apaim: konye kotwana Seled komameete idwe.
Odwe luka Apaim; Isi. Odwe luka Isi; Sesan, Odwe luka Sesan; Alai.
Odwe luka Yada onace loka Samai; Yeter, ka Yonatan; kotwana Yeter komameete idwe.
Odwe luka Yonatan; Pelet, ka Sasa, Ŋul kes odwe luka Yerameel.
Amameete Sesan idwe lusap konye lupesur, Ajai Sesan ebulesit, Emisiriat, ekekiror Yara.
Kokorak Sesan akokuke Yara ebulesitike aimany; kourik ŋes Atai.
Atai kouri Natan, Natan kouri Sabad;
Sabad kouri Epilal, Epilal kouri Obed;
Obed kouri Yeku, Yeku kouri Asaria;
Asaria kouri Keles, Keles kouri Eleasa;
Eleasa kouri Sisimai, Sisimai kouri Salum;
Salum kouri Yekamia, Yekamia kouri Elisama.
Odwe luka Kaleb onace loka Yerameel, Mesa ekiyaike, lokerai papa loka Sip; ka odwe luka Maresa papa loka Keburon.
Odwe luka Keburon; Kora, ka Tapua, ka Rekem, ka Sema.
Sema kouri Rakam, papa loka Yorukeam; Rekem kouri Samai.
Okoku loka Samai ŋes Maon; Maon ŋes papake ka Bet-sur.
Epa, abusiat naka Kaleb, kouri Karan, ka Mosa, ka Gases: Karan kouri Gases.
Odwe luka Yadai; Regem, ka Yotam, ka Gesan, ka Pelet, ka Epa, ka Saap.
Maaka, abusiat naka Kaleb, kouri Seber ka Tirukana.
Kouri ŋin da Saap papa loka Madamana, Seba papa loka Makubena, ka papa loka Gibea; akoku naka Kaleb ŋes Akisa.
Ŋul kes odwe luka Kaleb.
Okoku loka Kur, ekiyai loka Epurata, Sobal papa loka Kiriat-yearim;
Saluma papa loka Bet-lekem, Karep papa loka Bet-gader.
Ajaas Sobal papa loka Kiriat-yearim odwe; Koroe, atutubet naka Menukot
Ikekia luka Kiriat-yearim; Itirin, ka Iputin, ka Isumatin, ka Imisirain; apote kakes Isoratin ka Isitaolin.
Odwe luka Saluma; Bet-lekem, ka Inetopatim, Aturot-bet-Yoab, ka atutubet naka Imanakatin, Isorin.
Ka ikekia luka ikewadikak lueboiete koYabes; Itiratin, Isimeatin, ka Isukatio. Ŋul kes Ikenin luapote ka Kamat, papa loka etogo loka Rekab.
Lokiwuniet, Abisalom okoku loka Maaka akoku naka Talumai ekabaka loka Gesur; lokiwoŋonet, Adoniya okoku loka Kagit;
Lokikanyet, Sepatia loka Abital; lokikanyetekape, Itiream loka Egula aberuke.
Aponi kourikinai ŋes ikanykape koKeburon; kirumak kaŋina ikar ikanykaarei ka ilapio ikanykape; kirumak ko Yerusalem ikar akaisauni ka luuni.
Aponi kourikinai ŋes lu koYerusalem: Simea, ka Sobab, ka Natan, ka Solomon, iwoŋon, luka Bat-sua akoku naka Amiel:
ka Ibar, ka Elisama, ka Elipelet;
Ka Noga, ka Nepeg, ka Yapia;
ka Elisama, ka Eliada, ka Elipelet, ikanykaoŋon.
Ŋul kere kes odwe luka Daudi, kogelara odwe luka abusian; Tamar ŋes kinacikec.
Yoram okokuke, Akasia okokuke, Yoas okokuke;
Amasia okokuke, Asaria okokuke, Yoram okokuke;
Akas okokuke, Kesekia okokuke, Manase okokuke;
Amon okokuke, Yosia okokuke.
Odwe luka Yosia; Yokanan ekiyaike, Yekoiakim lokiareit, Sedekia lokiwuniet, Salum lokiwoŋonet.
Odwe luka Yekoiakim: Yekonia okokuke, Sedekia okokuke.
Odwe luka Yekonia, loejoreunitai: Sealutiel okokuke,
ka Malikiram, ka Pedaia, ka Senasar, ka Yekamia, ka Kosama, ka Nedabia.
Odwe luka Pedaia; Serubabel, ka Simei: odwe luka Serubabel; Mesulam, ka Kanania; Selomit ŋes kinacikec:
ka Kasuba, ka Okel, ka Berekia, ka Kasadia, ka Yusab-kesed, ikany.
Odwe luka Kanania; Pelatia, ka Yesaia: odwe luka Repaia, odwe luka Arunan, odwe luka Obadia, odwe luka Sekania.
Odwe luka Sekania; Semaia: odwe luka Semaia; Katus ka Igal, ka Baria, ka Nearia, ka Sapat, ikanykape.
Odwe luka Nearia; Elioenai, ka Kisikia, ka Asirikam, iuni.
Odwe luka Elioenai; Kodabia, ka Eliasib, ka Pelaia, ka Akub, ka Yokanan, ka Delaia, ka Anani, ikanykaarei.
Reaia okoku loka Sobal kouri Yakat; Yakat kouri Akumai ka Lakad.
Ŋul kes ikekia luka Isoratin.
Lu kes luka papa loka Etam; Yesereel, ka Isima, ka Idibas: ekiror loka inacikec Kaseleleponi:
ka Penuel papa loka Gedor, ka Eser papa loka Kusa. Ŋul kes odwe luka Kur, ekiyai loka Epurata, papa loka Bet-lekem.
Ajaas Asur papa loka Tekoa aŋor aarei, Kela ka Naara.
Kourik Naara ŋes Akusam, ka Keper, ka Temeni, ka Kaaka-sitari, Ŋul kes odwe luka Naara.
Odwe luka Kela Seret, ka Isar, ka Etinan.
Kakos kouri Anub, ka Sobeba, ka ikekia luka Akarel okoku loka Karum.
Kitopolooritete Yabes aitelekarit iinacanake: komaik totoke ekekiror Yabes ebe, “Naarai kedou ŋes kaiturur.”
Kiwone Yabes Edeke loka Isirael ebe, “Wu okwe arai kisirereŋ ijo eoŋ kabeit, kitalal eikoruka, kojaenena akanikon keoŋ, kidar eoŋ karonis, komam eyauni aiturur mamakaŋ!” Kocam Edeke nuabu ŋesi kilip.
Kelub onace loka Suka kouri Mekir, loarai papa loka Esiton.
Esiton kouri Bet-rapa, ka Pasea, ka Tekina papa loka Ir-nakas. Ŋul kes ituŋa luka Reka.
Odwe luka Kenas; Otiniel, ka Seraia: odwe luka Otiniel; Katat.
Meonotai kouri Opura: Seraia kouri Yoab papa loka Ge-karasim; naarai keraas ikeswamak luepiriaka.
Odwe luka Kaleb okoku loka Yepune; lru, ka Ela, ka Naam: odwe luka Ela; Kenas.
Odwe luka Yekalelel; Sip, ka Sipa, ka Tiria, ka, Asarel.
Odwe luka Esera; Yeter, ka Mered, ka Eper, ka Yalon: kouri ŋin Miriam, ka Samai, ka Isiba papa loka Esitemoa.
Akeberu Ayudayat kouri Yered papa loka Gedor, ka Keber papa loka Soko, ka Yekutiel papa loka Sanoa. Ŋul kes odwe luka Bitia akoku naka Parao, naamanyit Mered.
Odwe luka aberu naka Kodia, kinaci naka Nakam, kes lukapapa luka Keila Egarumit, ka Esitemoa Emaakatit.
Odwe luka Simon; Aminon, ka Rina, ka Ben-kanan, ka Tilon. Odwe luka Isi; Soket, ka Ben-soket.
Odwe luka Sela okoku loka Yuda; Er papa loka Leka, ka Laada papa loka Maresa, ka ikekia luka etogo loka ŋul kalukesonyete ebaputa loejok, luka etogo loka Asibea;
ka Yokim, ka ituŋa luka Koseba, ka Yoas, ka Sarap, loapolokinit Moab, ka Yasubi-lekem. Ido akiro ŋun eraas nuŋo,
ŋul kes ikajeak amoti, ka lueboiete koNetaim ka Gedera: kiboioto kaŋina nepepe kekabaka kanuka akeswam.
Odwe luka Simeon; Nemuel, ka Yamin, ka Yarib, ka Sera, ka Saul:
Salum okokuke, Mibisam okokuke, Misima okokuke.
Odwe luka Misima; Kamuel okokuke, Sakur okokuke, Simei okokuke:
Kejaas Simei idwe lusap itomon ka lukanykape, ka lupesur akanykape; konye amameete iinacanake idwe luipu, kwabo mam kiyatakina ekekikec, kwape idwe luka Yuda.
Kiboioto kesi Beer-seba, ka Molada, ka Kasar-sual;
koBilika da, ka Esem, ka Tolad;
koBetuel da, ka Koruma, ka Sikilag;
koBet-marakabot, ka Kasar-susim, ka Bet-biri, ka Saaraim, ŋul kes ireriakec kiton airum naka Daudi.
Ireriakec ludidik kes Etam, ka Ain, ka Rimon, ka Token, ka Asan, ireria ikany:
ka ireriakec ludidik kere luerimorito ireria ŋul kiton Baal. Ŋun kes aiboisiokec, ejaas kes aurikec.
Mesobab, ka Yamulek, ka Yosa okoku loka Amasia;
ka Yoel, ka Yeku okoku loka Yosibia, okoku loka Seraia, okoku loka Asiel;
ka Elioenai, ka Yaakoba, ka Yesokaia, ka Asaia, ka Adiel, ka Yesimiel, ka Benaia;
ka Sisa okoku loka Sipi, okoku loka Alon, okoku loka Yedaia, okoku loka Simiri, okoku loka Semaia;
Ŋul lualimor ikecekiroria kes ikapolok luka ikekiakec: kiyatakinos noi itogoi luka lukapapaakec.
Koloto kiton nealomarere Gedor, kiton ari nakokide naka aditot, amoote inya luka isipaninikec.
Kodumut inya luelibito ejok, kolal akwap kiyamakina, kinapakina da; naarai lueboioto kaŋina apeŋo keraas luka Kam.

Ŋul da luewadikao ikiroria apote kapaarasia nuka Kesekia ekabaka loka Yuda, komunaasi iwemanakec, ka Imeunim luadumunos kaŋina, komudiasi kes cut, kiton lolo, kiboikinos aiboisikec: naarai ajaas inya kaŋina luka isipaninikec.
Ice kakesi, kes odwe luka Simeon, ituŋa akwat akany, koloto moru Seir, ikapolokitokokec kes Pelatia, ka Nearia, ka Repaia, ka Usiel, odwe luka Isi.
Kodanyata lukideunos luka Imalekain luakuete, kiboikinos do ŋina, kiton lolo.
Naarai abu Yuda kiteleka iinacanake, kotomakeŋ ŋes alomunia ekapolon; konye apolou kerai naka Yosep):
Odwe luka Reuben ekiyai loka Isirael; Kanok, ka Palu, ka Kesuron, ka Karumi.
Odwe luka Yoel; Semaia okokuke, Gog okokuke, Simei okokuke;
Mika okokuke, Reaia okokuke, Baal okokuke;
Beera okokuke, loabu Tiligat-pilineser ekabaka loka Asuria kijoreo: kerai ŋesi ekapolon loka Ireubin.
Iinacanake kokekiakec, kwape emarere aur naka aturiokec; ejakait, Yeiel, ka Sekaria,
ka Bela okoku loka Asas, okoku loka Sema, okoku loka Yoel, loeboie koAroer, kiton Nebo ka Baal-meon:
kari nakokide kiboie kiton neelomarere amodiŋ anyoun kocor Eupurat: naarai kiyatakinos ibarenekec kakwap naka Gilead.
Kapaarasia nuka Saul kitijioto Ikagarin, luaario kakaninikec: kiboioto kowemanakec anatar akwap kere kari nakokide naka Gilead.
Yoel ejakait, ka Sapam lokiareit, ka Yanai, ka Sapat koBasan:
ka iinacanakec luka ikekia luka lukapapaakec; Mikael, ka Mesulam, ka Seba, ka Yorai, ka Yakan, ka Sia, ka Eber, ikanykaarei.
Ŋul kes odwe luka Abikail, okoku loka Kuri, okoku loka Yaroa, okoku loka Gilead, okoku loka Mikael, okoku loka Yesisai, okoku loka Yado, okoku loka Bus:
Aki okoku loka Abudiel, okoku loka Guni, ejakait loka ikekia luka lukapapaakec.
Kiboioto kesi koGilead koBasan, koreriake, koronyia kere luka Saron, kiton oikorunokec.
Ŋul kere kimarunos kwape ajaar auriokec, kapaarasia nuka Yotam ekabaka loka Yuda, kapaarasia da nuka Yeroboam ekabaka loka Isirael.

Odwe luka Reuben, ka Igadin, ka atutubet naka ateker naka Manase, ituŋa luetitiŋ, ituŋa luepedorete aidak ebuku ka ekileŋ, ka aigum kakabwa, luepiriaka ejie, emwaasi ilukumin akaisaoŋon ka luoŋon, ka akwat akanykaarei ka akaisakanykape, luepedorete alosit ojie.
Kitijioto Ikagurin, ka Yetur, ka Napis, ka Nodab.
Aponi kiŋarakinai asurokin kes, kijaikinai Ikagurin akanikec, ka luajaas kakes kere: naarai apotu komonyata mama ejai Edeke kojie, kiyu ainainakec; naarai apotu komunokinos ŋes.
Koŋatasi ibarenekec; akaalaikec ilukumin akaisakany, amerekekin ilukumin akwat aarei ka ilukumin akaisakany, asigirian ilukumin iarei, ka ituŋa ilukumin akwatat.
Naarai apotu kibiroros luaaritai luipu, naarai kerai ejie loka Edeke. Kiboikinos aiboisikec aitodol neejoreorere.
Kiboioto idwe luka atutubet naka ateker naka Manase kakwap: kiyatakinos kesi anyoun koBasan kiton Baal-kerumon ka Senir ka emoru Kerumon.
Lu kesi ikapolok luka ikekia luka lukapapaakec; Eper, ka Isi, ka Eliel, ka Asuriel, ka Yeremia, ka Kodabia, ka Yadiel, ituŋa lukirigin luetitiŋ, lukodwaratau, ikapolok luka ikekia luka lukapapaakec.
Apotu kodiakasi kama ejai Edeke loka lukapapaakec, koloto eporo odekesio luka ituŋa luka akwap, luabu Edeke komudia kakonyenekec.

Kisidik Edeke loka Isirael emoyo loka Pul ekabaka loka Asuria, ka emoyo loka Tiligat-pilineser ekabaka loka Asuria, kijoreo kes, Ireubin ka Igadin, ka atutubet naka ateker naka Manase, koyau kes Kala, ka Kabor, ka Kara, kiton ocor loka Gosan, kiton lolo.
Odwe luka Kokat; Amuram, ka Isar, ka Keburon, ka Usiel.
Odwe luka Amuram; Aaron, ka Musa, ka Miriam. Odwe luka Aaron; Nadab ka Abiku, ka Eleasar ka Itamar.
Eleasar kouri Pinekas, Pinekas kouri Abisua;
Abisua kouri Buki, Buki kouri Usi;
Usi kouri Serakia, Serakia kouri Meraiot;
Meraiot kouri Amaria, Amaria kouri Akitub;
Akitub kouri Sadok, Sadok kouri Akimaas;
Akimaas kouri Asaria, Asaria kouri Yokanan;
Yokanan kouri Asaria (ŋes ŋol lokerai esasedoti kotogo loadukokinit Solomon Yerusalem):
Asaria kouri Amaria; Amaria kouri Akitub;
Akitub kouri Sadok, Sadok kouri Salum;
Salum kouri Kilikia, Kilikia kouri Asaria;
Asaria kouri Seraia, Seraia kouri Yekosadek;
Aponi Yekosadak kijoreoroi, naayaŋaria EJAKAIT Yuda ka Yerusalem kakan naka Nebukadenesar.
Lu kes ikiroria luka odwe luka Geresom; Libuni ka Simei.
Odwe luka Kokat kes Amuram, ka Isar, ka Keburon ka Usiel.
Odwe luka Merari; Mali ka Musi, ŋul kes ikalia luka Ilebin kwape ejaatar ikekia luka lukapapaakec.
Luka Geresom; Libuni okokuke, Yakat okokuke, Sima okokuke;
Yoa okokuke, Ido okokuke, Sera okokuke, Yeaterai okokuke.
Odwe luka Kokat; Aminadab okokuke, Kora okokuke, Asir okokuke;
Elukana okokuke, ka Ebiasap okokuke, ka Asir okokuke;
Takat okokuke, Uriel okokuke, Usia okokuke, ka Saul okokuke.
Odwe luka Elukana; Amasai, ka Akilnot.
Luka Elukana: odwe luka Elukana; Sopai okokuke, ka Nakat okokuke;
Eliab okokuke, Yerokam okokuke, Elukana okokuke.
Odwe luka Samuel; Yoel ekiyaike, kii Abiya lokiareit.
Odwe luka Merari; Mali, Libuni okokuke, Simei okokuke, Usa okokuke;
Simea okokuke, Kagia okokuke, Asaia okokuke.
Kijaanakis kayoore koiŋaren kewema lokalaunan loka ewema loka airiamunun, aitodol neadukokinia Solomon etogo loka EJAKAIT Yerusalem, kidarata aswamukec kwape ajaar abeanakinikec.
Lu kes luedarenenete, ka odwekec. Luka odwe luka Ikokatin: Keman ekayoon, okoku loka Yoel, okoku loka Samuel;
Okoku loka Elukana, okoku loka Yerokam, okoku loka Eliel, okoku loka Toa;
Okoku loka Sup, okoku loka Elukana, okoku loka Makat, okoku loka Amasai;
Okoku loka Elukana, okoku loka Yoel, okoku loka Asaria, okoku loka Sepania;
Okoku loka Takat, okoku loka Asir, okoku loka Ebiasap, okoku loka Kora;
Okoku loka Isar, okoku loka Kokat, okoku loka Lebi, okoku loka Isirael.
Ka onaceke Asap loabwoenenei kakanike nakoteten, ŋes Asap okoku loka Berekia, okoku loka Simea;
Okoku loka Mikael, okoku loka Baaseia, okoku loka Malikiya;
Okoku loka Etini, okoku loka Sera, okoku loka Adaia;
Okoku loka Etan, okoku loka Sima, okoku loka Simei;
Okoku loka Yakat, okoku loka Geresom, okoku loka Lebi.
Kakan nakokediany iinacanakec odwe luka Merari: Etan okoku loka Kisi, okoku loka Abidi, okoku loka Maluk;
Okoku loka Kasabia, okoku loka Amasia, okoku loka Kilikia;
Okoku loka Amisi, okoku loka Bani, okoku loka Semer;
Okoku loka Mali, okoku loka Musi, okoku loka Merari, okoku loka Lebi.
Aponi koseunai Ilebin iinacanakec kanuka aijaanakin kere naka ewema lokalaunan loka etogo loka Edeke.
Lu kes odwe luka Aaron; Eleasar okokuke, Pinekas okokuke, Abisua okokuke;
Buki okokuke, Usi okokuke, Serakia okokuke;
Meraiot okokuke, Amaria okokuke, Akitub okokuke;
Sadok okokuke, Akimaas okokuke.
Apotu koinakis kes Keburon kakwap naka Yuda, ka ironyia lualukunito ŋes;
Konye apotu koinakis Kaleb okoku loka Yepune imanikoria luka ere, ka ireriake ludidik.
Apotu koinakis odwe luka Aaron iretia luekuianarete, Keburon; Libuna ka ironyiake, ka Yatir, ka Esitemoa ka ironyiake;
Ka Kilen ka ironyiake, Debir ka ironyiake;
Asan ka ironyiake, ka Bet-semes ka ironyiake:
Kateker naka Benyamin; Geba ka ironyiake, ka Alemet ka ironyiake, ka Anatot ka ironyiake, Ireriakec kere anatar ikekiakec emwaasi ireria itomon ka luuni.
Mama ejaas odwe luka Geresom, kwape ajaatar ikekiakec, kateker naka Isakar, kateker naka Aser, kateker naka Naputali, kateker da naka Manase koBasan, ireria itomon ka luuni.
Aponi koinakinai odwe luka Merari koroet, kwape ajaatar ikekiakec, kateker naka Reuben, kateker naka Gad, kateker naka Sebulun, ireria itomon ka luarei.
Apotu idwe luka Isirael koinakis Ilebin ireria ka ironyiakec.
Apotu kesi koinakis koroet kateker naka idwe luka Yuda, kateker naka idwe luka Simeon, kateker naka idwe luka Benyamin, ireria ŋul luebilitai ikiroriakec.
Koinakis kes ireria luekuianarete, Sekem kakwap nakiukon naka Epuraim ka ironyiake; Geser da ka ironyiake;
ka Yokumeam ka ironyiake, ka Bet-koron ka ironyiake;
ka Aiyalon ka ironyiake, ka Gat-rimon ka ironyiake:
Katutubet naka ateker naka Manase; Aner ka ironyiake, ka Bileam ka ironyiake, kanuka luedeuna lukokek loka odwe luka Kokat.
Kateker naka Isakar; Kedes ka ironyiake, Daberat ka ironyiake;
Ramot ka ironyiake, ka Anem ka ironyiake;
Kateker naka Aser; Masal ka ironyiake, ka Abudon ka ironyiake;
ka Kukok ka ironyiake, ka Rekob ka ironyiake;
Kateker naka Naputali; Kedes koGalilaya ka ironyiake, ka Kamon ka ironyiake, ka Kiriataim ka ironyiake.
Mama ejaas luedeuna luka Ilebin, odwe luka Merari, kateker naka Sebulun, Rimono ka ironyiake, Tabor ka ironyiake:
Okekwa Yorodan koYeriko, ari nakokide naka Yorodan, kateker naka Reuben, Beser kamodiŋ ka ironyiake, ka Yasar ka ironyiake;
ka Kedemot ka ironyiake, ka Mepaat ka ironyiake:
Kateker naka Gad; Ramot koGilead ka ironyiake, ka Makanaim ka ironyiake,
ka Kesibon ka ironyiake, ka Yeser ka ironyiake.

Odwe luka Tola; Usi, ka Repaia, ka Yeriel, ka Yamai, ka Ibusam, ka Semuel, ikapolokitok luka ikekia luka lukapapaakec, kes luka Tola; ituŋa lukirigin luetitiŋ katuriokec: etiaikec kapaarasia nuka Daudi emwaasi ilukumin akaisaarei ka luarei ka akwat akanykape.
Odwe luka Usi; Isirakia: odwe luka Isirakia; Mikael, ka Obadia, ka Yoel, ka Isia, ikany: kes kere ituŋa lukapolok.
Kojaas nepepe kakes, katuriokec, kwape ajaatar ikekia luka lukapapaakec, irioŋeta luka ajore ejie, ilukumin akaisauni ka ilukumin ikanykape; naarai ajaas kes aŋor ka isap luipu.
Iinacanakec kokekia kere luka Isakar, ituŋa lukirigin luetitiŋ, kimarai kakere kauriokec, emwaasi ilukumin akaisakanykauni ka ilukumin ikanykaarei.

Odwe luka Bela; Esibon, ka Usi, ka Usiel, ka Yerimot, ka Iri, ikany; ikapolok luka ikekia luka lukapapaa, ituŋa lukirigin luetitiŋ; aponi kimarai kauriokec ilukumin akaisaarei ka luarei ka akais auni ka luoŋon.
Odwe luka Beker; Semira, ka Yoas, ka Elieser, ka Elioenai, ka Omiri, ka Yerimot, ka Abiya, ka Anatot, ka Alemet. Ŋul kere kes odwe luka Beker.
Aponi kimarai kaurikec, kwape ajaatar aturiokec, ikapolok luka ikekia luka lukapapaakec, ituŋa lukirigin luetitiŋ, ilukumin akaisaarei ka akwat aarei.
Odwe luka Yediael; Bilikan: odwe luka Bilikan; Yeus, ka Benyamin, ka Ekud, ka Kenaana, ka Setan, ka Tarusis, ka Akisakar.
Ŋul kere kes odwe luka Yediael, kwape ajaatar ikapolok luka ikekia luka lukapapaakec, ituŋa lukirigin luetitiŋ, ilukumin itomon ka lukanykaarei ka akwat aarei, luapedorete alosit kajore ojie.
Supim da, ka Kupim, odwe luka Ir, Kusim, odwe luka Aker.
Komany Makir aberu nako Kupim ka Supim, ekiror loka inacike ŋes Maaka); ekiror loka lokiareit Selopekad: ajaas Selopekad adwe.
Kouri Maaka aberu naka Makir okoku, komaik ekekiror Peres; ekiror loka onaceke Seres; odweke Ulam ka Rakem.
Odwe luka Ulam; Bedan, Ŋul kes odwe luka Gilead okoku loka Makir, okoku loka Manase.
Abu kinacike Kamolekat kouri Isikod, ka Abieser, ka Mala.
Odwe luka Semida kes Akian, ka Sekem, ka Liki, ka Aniam.
ka Sabad okokuke, ka Sutela okokuke, ka Eser, ka Elead, luapotu ituŋa luka Gat luaurikinio kakwap koarata, naarai apotu kojesaros ademar ibarenekec.
Kibworo Epuraim papakec apaarasia nuipu, kopotu ikeinacan aipudun ŋes.
Koloma mama ejai akeberu, kopotuu ŋesi, kouri ikoku, komaik ekekiror Beria, naarai ajaas karonis togokec.
Akokuke ŋes Seera, naabu koduk Bet-koron nakaiesa ka nakamukurat, ka Usen-seera.
Okokuke ŋes Repa, ka Resep, ka Tela okokuke, ka Takan okokuke;
Ladan okokuke, Amikud okokuke, Elisama okokuke;
Nun okokuke, Yosua okokuke.
Ikeceboro ka aiboisiokec kes Betel ka ireriake, Naaran kari nakokide, Geser, ka ireriake koto; Sekem da ka ireriake, kiton Asa ka ireriake:
Eiduny kiikoruno luka odwe luka Manase, Bet-sean ka ireriake, Taanak ka ireriake, Megido ka ireriake, Dor ka ireriake. Kiboikinos odwe luka Yosep okoku loka Isirael oreria ŋul.
Odwe luka Beria; Keber, ka Malukiel, lokerai papa loka Birisait.
Keber kouri Yapelet, ka Somer, ka Kotam, ka Sua kinacikec.
Odwe luka Yapelet; Pasak, ka Bimikal, ka Asubat. Ŋul kes odwe luka Yapelet.
Odwe luka Semer; Aki, ka Roga, ka Yekuba, ka Aram.
Odwe luka Kelem onaceke; Sopa, ka Imina, ka Seles, ka Amal.
Odwe luka Sopa; Sua, ka Karuneper, ka Sual, ka Beri, ka Imira;
Beser, ka Kod, ka Sama, ka Silisa, ka Itiran, ka Beera.
Odwe luka Yeter; Yepune, ka Pisipa, ka Ara.
Odwe luka Ula; Ara, ka Kaniel, ka Risia.

Ŋul kere kes odwe luka Aser, ikapolok luka ikekia luka lukapapaakec, ituŋa lukeseunitai lukirigin luetitiŋ, ikapolok luka ikapolok. Kimarai etiaikec kaurikec aijaanakin ojie emwaasi ituŋa ilukumin akaisaarei ka ilukumin ikanykape.
Noka lokiwoŋonet, ka Rapa lokikanyet.
Kejaas Bela odwe, Adar, ka Gera, ka Abikud;
ka Abisua, ka Naaman, ka Akoa;
ka Gera, ka Sepupan, ka Kuram,
ŋul kes odwe luka Ekud: ŋul kes ikapolok luka ikekia luka lukapapaakec luka lueboiete koGeba, kijoreosi kes Manakat.
Ka Naaman, ka Akiya, ka Gera, kijoreo kes; kouri Usa ka Akikud.
Kouri Sakaraim idwe komanikor loka Moab, kedau aitwara kes; Kusim ka Baara kes aŋoroke.
Kouri ŋesi ka Kodes akeberu, Yobab, ka Sibia, ka Mesa, ka Malikam;
ka Yeus, ka Sakia, ka Mirima. Ŋul kes odweke, ikapolok luka ikekia luka lukapapaakec.
Kouri ŋesi kaKusim Abitub ka Elupaal.
Odwe luka Elupaal; Eber, ka Misam, ka Semed, lokeduki Ono ka Lod, ka ireriakec.
Ka Beria ka Sema, lukeraas ikapolok luka ikekia luka lukapapaakec luka lueboiete ko Aiyalon, luapotu kitekera lueboiete koGat;
ka Akio, ka Sasak, ka Yeremot;
ka Sebadia, ka Arad, ka Eder;
ka Mikael, ka Isipa, ka Yoka, odwe luka Beria;
ka Sebadia, ka Mesulam, ka Kisiki, ka Keber;
ka Isimerai, ka Isilia, ka Yobab, odwe luka Elupaal;
ka Yakim, ka Sikiri, ka Sabudi;
ka Elienai, ka Siletai, ka Eliel;
ka Adaia, ka Beraia, ka Simirat, odwe luka Simei;
ka Isipan, ka Eber, ka Eliel;
ka Abudon, ka Sikiri, ka Kanan;
ka Kanania, ka Elam, ka Anatotiya;
ka Ipideia, ka Penuel, odwe luka Sasak;
ka Samuserai, ka Sekaria, ka Atalia;
ka Yaaresia, ka Eliya, ka Sikiri, odwe luka Yerokam.
Ŋul kes ikapolok luka ikekia luka lukapapaakec anatar aturiokec, ikapolok; eboienenete ŋul ko Yerusalem.
Okokuke lokiyai Abudon, ka Sur, ka Kis, ka Baal, ka Nadab;
ka Gedor, ka Akio, ka Seker.
Mikilot kouri Simea. Ŋul da kiboienenete kiinacanakec koYerusalem, eiduny kiinacanakec.
Ner kouri Kis; Kis kouri Saul; Saul kouri Yonatan, ka Malikisua, ka Abinadab, ka Es-baal.
Okoku loka Yonatan ŋes Merib-baal; Merib-baal kouri Mika.
Odwe luka Mika; Piton, ka Melek, ka Tarea, ka Akas.
Akas kouri Yekoada; Yekoada kouri Alemet, ka Asamabet, ka Simiri; Simiri kouri Mosa:
Mosa kouri Binea; Rapa ŋes okokuke, Eleasa okokuke, Asel okokuke:
Kejaas Asel odwe ikanykape, lu kes ikiroriakec; Asirikam, ka Bokeru, ka Isimael, ka Searia, ka Obadia, ka Kanan. Ŋul kere odwe luka Asel.
Odwe luka Esek onaceke; Ulam ekiyaike, Yeus lokiareit, ka Elipelet lokiwuniet.
Keraas odwe luka Ulam ituŋa lukirigin luetitiŋ, ikagumak imalia, kejaas odwe luipu, ka odwe luka odwe, akwatat ka akaisakany. Ŋul kere odwe luka Benyamin.
Luageete aiboikin airumetakec, oreriakec kes lu, Isirael, isasedotin, Ilebin, ka Inetinim.
Kiboiete ko Yerusalem lukodwe luka Yuda, ka lukodwe luka Benyamin, ka lukodwe luka Epuraim ka Manase;
Utai okoku loka Amikud, okoku loka Omiri, okoku loka Imiri, okoku loka Bani, Iokodwe luka Peres okoku loka Yuda.
Luka Isilonin; Asaia ekiyaike, ka odweke.
Lukodwe luka Sera; Yeuel, ka iinacanakec, akwat akanykape ka akaisakanykaoŋon.
Lukodwe luka Benyamin; Salu okoku loka Mesulam, okoku loka Kodabia, okoku loka Kasenua;
ka Ibuneia okoku loka Yerokam, ka Ela okoku loka Usi, okoku loka Mikiri, ka Mesulam okoku loka Sepatia, okoku loka Reuel, okoku loka Ibiniya;
ka iinacanakec, kwape ajaatar aturiokec, akwat akanykaoŋon ka akaisakany ka lukanykape. Ituŋa ŋul kere kes ikapolok luka ikekia luka lukapapaakec kwape ajaatar ikekia luka lukapapaakec.
ka Asaria okoku loka Kilikia, okoku loka Mesulam, okoku loka Sadok, okoku loka Meraiot, okoku loka Akitub, ekapolokiton etogo loka Edeke;
ka Adaia okoku loka Yerokam, okoku loka Pasur, okoku loka Malikiya, ka Maasai okoku loka Adiel, okoku loka Yasera, okoku loka Mesulam, okoku loka Mesilemit, okoku loka Imer;
ka iinacanakec, ikapolok luka ikekia luka lukapapaakec, elukumit ka akwat akanykaarei ka akaisakanykape; ituŋa lukapedor noi aswam aijaanakin naka etogo loka Edeke.
ka Bakabakar, Keres, ka Galal, ka Matania okoku loka Mika, okoku loka Sikiri, okoku loka Asap;
ka Obadia okoku loka Semaia, okoku loka Galal, okoku loka Yedutun, ka Berekia okoku loka Asa, okoku loka Elukana, lueboienenete koreria ludidik luka Inetopatin.
lu lem kidarenenete erute loka ekabaka ari nakokide: keraas kesi ikagolok luka iidukurun luka idwe luka Lebi.

Koanyanar Salum okoku loka Kore, okoku loka Ebiasap, okoku loka Kora, ka iinacanake, lukokek loka papaake, Ikorakin, aswam naka aijaanakin, ikagolok luka ikekia luka Ewema lokalaunan: keraas lukapapaakec ikapolok luka iidukurun luka EJAKAIT, ikagolok luka ekek;
Kerai Pinekas okoku loka Eleasar ekapolonikec kolo sek, kojai EJAKAIT kaŋes.
Kerai Sekaria okoku loka Meselemia ekagolon loka ekek loka ewema loka airiamunun.

Ŋul kere luaponi koseunai araun ikagolok luka ikekia, emwaasi akwat aarei ka itomon ka luarei. Aponi ŋul kimarai kauriokec koreriakec ludidik, luapotu Daudi ka Samuel ekadwaran kotiakut aswam aswamukec nakemunoi.
Kosodete kesi ka idwekec koanyanarete ikekia lukotogo loka EJAKAIT, ŋes etogo loka ewema lokalaunan, kameanakin.
Kejaananas ikagolok owaitin iwoŋon, kide, ka to, ka eŋalakimak, ka agolitomei.
Koponenenete iinacanakec, koreriakec ludidik, kaŋunupaarasia akanykaarei apakio kapakio ajaut kakes:
Naarai ikagolok luoŋon lukapolok, lukeraas Ilebin, ajaas kaswam naatiakakinitai, kopolokinito agolai ka aiŋadisia nuka iboro kaluketiai kotogo loka Edeke.
Kiboienenete airimor etogo loka Edeke, naarai aidar nakec, nakec da anaanar ŋinitupuruc.
Kidarenenete ice kakesi iboro luka aijaanakin; naarai emareneneo nakitolomanarere ka nakitolomununere.
Kotiakakinitete ice kakesi aidar iboro lukotogo, ka iboro kere luka aibois nakalaunan, ka akiria nuidicic, ka ebino, ka akinyet, ka lukisupurununo, ka lueur maa.
Kitemokis ice kodwe luka isasedotin eiswamae loka lueur maa.
Aponi kotiakakinitete Matitia, ediopet koLebin, lokerai ekiyai loka Salum Ekorakit aidar iboro lupeon.
Kopolokinito ice koinacanakec, lukodwe luka Ikokatin akiro nuka emugati loka aitodikin, aitemokin ŋes ŋinipaaran nakasabato.
Ŋul kes ikapolok luka ikekia luka lukapapaakec luka Ilebin, anatar aturiokec, ikapolok: kiboienenete ŋul koYerusalem.
Abudon okokuke lokiyai, ka Sur, ka Kis, ka Baal, ka Ner, ka Nadab;
ka Gedor, ka Akio, ka Sekaria, ka Mikilot.
Mikilot kouri Simeam. Kiboiete kesi da kiinacanakec koYerusalem, eiduny kiinacanakec.
Ner kouri Kis; Kis kouri Saul; Saul kouri Yonatan, ka Malikisua, ka Abinadab, ka Es-baal.
Okoku loka Yonatan ŋes Merib-baal; Merib-baal kouri Mika.
Odwe luka Mika; Piton, ka Melek, ka Tarea, ka Akas.
Akas kouri Yara; Yara kouri Alemet, ka Asumabet, ka Simiri; Simiri kouri Mosa:
Mosa kouri Binea; ka Repaia okokuke, Eleasa okokuke, Asel okokuke:
Kejaas Asel odwe ikanykape, ikecekiroria lu; Asirikam, ka Bokeru, ka Isimael, ka Searia, ka Obadia, ka Kanan: ŋul kes odwe luka Asel.
Kodapata noi Ipilisitian Saul ka odweke; koarata Ipilisitian Yonatan, ka Abinadab ka Maliki-sua, odwe luka Saul.
Kipikoroi Saul kojie, kodolokis ŋes ikagumak imalia; kobur noi kanuka ikagumak imalia.

Kosodi Saul atemar loadakit lujiisike atiar, “Kout ekonikileŋ, kicumia eoŋ; kinyeis lumam ekepep lu abunore aicum eoŋ, aitisil eoŋ,” Konye koŋer loadakit lujiisike; naarai akuriana noi. Kanuka ŋun kolem Saul ekekileŋ, kicumakinor.
Keanyu loadakit lujiisike ebe atwana Saul, kicumakin ŋesi da kekekileŋ, kotwana.
Kwaŋin kotwana Saul, ka odweke iuni; kotwakata lukotogoke kere nepepe.
Keanyutu ituŋa luka Isirael kere lukejaas aditot ebe ekerete kesi, atwana da Saul ka odweke, kojalata ireriakec, kokerata; kopotu Ipilisitian kiboikinos toma.
Kosodi kanen tupuruc, kepotu Ipilisitian aiŋat luaaritai, kodumut Saul ka odweke etwakikinito moru Giliboa.
Kolacasi ikegoen, koyaŋaasi akouke, ka lujiisike, kijukasi akwap naka Ipilisitian naerimorit, ayaŋaar akiro mama ejaas aputosiakec, ka ituŋa da.
Kibwaikis lujiisike togo loka idekesiokec, koenikis akekou togo loka Dagon.
Kepuput luka Yabes-Gilead kere nuapotu Ipilisitian kiswamakis Saul kere.
Konyout ituŋa kere luetitiŋ, kolemut akuan naka Saul ka awat nuka odweke, koyaut kes Yabes, konukakis akojokec kwap kepeduru koYabes, kikanyata eteŋei apaarasia akanykaarei.
Kwabo mam abu kiŋit EJAKAIT: kanuka ŋun abu koar ŋes, kibelok ajakanut mama ejai Daudi okoku loka Yese.
Kapakio nua tuboros nukeraar Saul ekabaka, ibu ijo kitoloma kitolom da Isirael: abu EJAKAIT Ekonideke kotema jo atiar, ‘Itanyamenenei ijo ikatuŋa Isirael, iraun ijo ekapolon loka ikatuŋa Isirael.’ ”

Kwaŋin koporu imakio kere luka Isirael mama ejai ekabaka Keburon; kitutuk Daudi kakes koKeburon kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT: kinyonyoikis Daudi akinyet araun ekabaka loka Isirael, kwape ajaar akirot naka EJAKAIT kama ka Samuel.
Kotemasi lukiboiete koYebus Daudi atiar, “Mam ilomuni ne.” Konye abu Daudi kirum ere loegogoŋ loka Sion; ŋol ŋes ere loka Daudi.
Kotema Daudi atiar, “Loegeuni aidany Iyebusin, eraun ŋol ekapolon ka ekayaiton.” Kogeuni do Yoab okoku loka Seruia alomar, kitaraunai ekapolon.
Kiboikin Daudi ere loegogoŋ; kanuka ŋun aponi komaikinai ere loka Daudi.
Koduk ere airimor, anyoun koMilo ka airimor: kiteteu Yoab aiboisio ace nukore.
Kopoloor Daudi noi noi; naarai ajaenena EJAKAIT loka ajoresio kaŋes.
Lo ŋes etiai loka ituŋa lukirigin lukejaas ka Daudi: Yasobeam, okoku loka Ekakumonit, ekapolon loka akaisauni; kodaku ŋol akekwara asurokin akwat auni koar kes katipet.
Kotupite ŋes Eleasar okoku loka Dodo, Ekokait, lokerai ediopet kotuŋa iuni lukirigin.
Ajaas ŋes ka Daudi koPas-damin, etukokina Ipilisitian ŋina ejie komanikor loeleleba esairi; kokerata ituŋa kakonyen nuka Ipilisitian.
Kobwaata kesi kokidiŋ omanikor, kojiut ŋes, koarata Ipilisitian; kitajar EJAKAIT kes kaipikor naepol.
Kejai Daudi toma abwas, kejai abwas naka iserikalei luka Ipilisitian Betlekem.
Kimiela Daudi, kotema atiar, “Arai kainak idiotuŋanan eoŋ akipi aimat nuka atan naka Bet-lekem naidunyas kerute!”
Kocila luuni ajore naka Ipilisitian, kowokut akipi katan naka Bet-lekem, naidunyas kerute, koyaŋas, koinutu Daudi: konye koŋer Daudi aimat, konye kiwela mama ejai EJAKAIT.

Kotema atiar, “Madi akuj, eoŋ aswam ŋin: amasi kereka aokot nuka ituŋa kalu lualosito akaŋas naka aijarakec? Naarai apotu koyaut kakaŋas naka aijarakec.” Kanuka ŋun koŋer aimat. Kiswamata ituŋa luuni lukirigin akiro ŋun.
Kitopolooritete ŋes adepar luarei kouni, kitaraunai ekapolonikec: konye mam abu kodolok luuni lusodit.

Koar ŋesi Emisiriat da, etuŋanan lokos loeoja ikubitin ikany; kitiŋite Emisiriat akwara kakanike naaputos kakitoi naesonyere; kolot ŋol mama ejai ŋesi kebela, kodem akwara kakan naka Emisiriat, koar ŋes kakwarake elopet.
Kiswama Benaia okoku loka Yekoiada akiro ŋun, kodum ekiror kotuŋa luuni lukirigin.
Koany, kitopolooritete ŋes adepar akaisauni, konye mam abu kodolok luuni lusodit: kodakak Daudi ŋes ayait ikedarakake.
Samot Ekarorit, Keles Epelonit;
Ira okoku loka Ikes Etekoit, Abieser Enatotait;
Sibekai Ekusatit, Ilai Ekokait;
Makarai Enetopatit, Keled okoku loka Baana Enetopatit;
Itai okoku loka Ribai loka Gibea loka idwe luka Benyamin, Benaia Epiratonit;
Kurai loka aguuruto nuka Gaas, Abiel Erabatait;
Asumabet Ebakarumit, Eliaba Esaalubonit;
Odwe luka Kasem Egisonit, Yonatan okoku loka Sage Ekararit;
Akiam okoku loka Sakar Ekararit, Elipal okoku loka Ur;
Keper Emekeratit, Akiya Epelonit;
Kesiro Ekaramelit, Naarai okoku loka Esibai;
Yoel onace loka Natan, Mibar okoku loka Kagiri;
Selek Emonait, Nakarai Eberotit, loadakit lujiis luka Yoab okoku loka Seruia;
Ira Itirit, Gareb Itirit;
Uria Ekitit, Sabad okoku loka Alai;
Adina okoku loka Sisa Ereubenit, ekapolon loka Ireubenin, ka akaisauni nepepe kaŋes;
Kanan okoku loka Maaka, ka Yosapat Emitinit;
Usia Esiteratait, Sama ka Yeiel odwe luka Kotam Eroerait;
Yediael okoku loka Simiri, ka Yoka onaceke, Etisit;
Eliel Emakabit, ka Yeribai, ka Yosabia, odwe luka Elunaam, ka Itima Emoabit;
Eliel, ka Obed, ka Yaasiel Emesobait.
Kokapitos akabwai, apedorete aitwasam akan nakoteten ka nakokediany da aporocanaria alica, ka agumanaria imalia da kakabwa; koraas luka iinacan luka Saul luka Benyamin.
Lokapolon ŋes Akieser, kosodi Yoas, odwe luka Semaa Egibeatit; ka Yesiel, ka Pelet, odwe luka Asumabet; ka Bereka, ka Yeku Enatotait;
ka Isimaia Egibeonit, etuŋanan lokirigi kotoma akaisauni, loapolokinit akaisauni; ka Yeremia, ka Yakasiel, ka Yokanan, ka Yosabad Egederatit;
Elusai, ka Yerimot, ka Bealia, ka Semaria, ka Sepatia Ekarupit;
Elukana, ka Isia, ka Asarel, ka Yoeser, ka Yasobeam, Ikorakin;
ka Yoela, ka Sebadia, odwe luka Yerokam loka Gedor.
Eser lokapolon, Obadia lokiareit, Eliab lokiwuniet;
Misimana lokiwoŋonet, Yeremia kokianyet;
Atai lokikanyetekape, Eliel lokikanyetekaarei;
Yokanan lokikanyetekauni, Elisaba lokikanyetekaoŋon;
Yeremia lokitomonet, Makubanai lokitomonet kalodiop.
Keraas ŋul lukodwe luka Gad ikapolok luka ajore; ŋol lokerai lodidi kakesi keriakas kakwatat, lokapolon da kelukumit.
Ŋul kes luapotu kodokas Yorodan kolap losodit, kedau ŋesi ailapanar aririke kere; kitekerata ŋul kere luka aditon, kiton kide, koto da.
Kopotu lukodwe luka Benyamin ka Yuda mama ejai aibois naebwaitai mama ejai Daudi.

Koloma Daudi airiamakin kakes, Koboŋok kotema atiar, “Arai ca iponito yesi inapakina mama ajai aiŋarakin eoŋ, kimorikikin ekatau ka lukus; konye arai iponito abilakin eoŋ ebotet mama ejaas lukasurupoka, naarai emamei aronis kakaninika, kosesen Edeke loka lukapapaawok, kitoron.”
Kosodi emoyo abunokin Amasai lokerai lokapolon loka akaisauni, kotema atiar,
“Kirai isio lukon, Daudi,
owaikon, ijo okoku loka Yese.
Ainapakin, ainapakin kojai mama ŋal,
ainapakin da mama ejaas ikeŋarakinakakon!
Naarai kiŋarakinit Edekekon.”
Kosodi Daudi aisukunyuun kes, kitarau kes ikapolok luka erioŋet.
Naalosio ŋesi Sikilag, koluŋakinos mamake luka Manase, Aduna, ka Yosabad, ka Yediael, ka Mikael, ka Yosabad, ka Eliku, ka Siletai, ikapolok luka ilukumin lukeraas luka Manase.
Kiŋarakis Daudi asurokin erioŋet loka ikaŋatak; naarai keraas kesi kere ituŋa lukirigin luetitiŋ, koraas ikapolok luka ajore.
Naarai ŋinipaaran kopotu ituŋa mama ejai Daudi aiŋarakin ŋes, aitodol nakeraunor ajore naepol, kwape ajore naka Edeke.
Idwe luka Yuda lukitiŋitos ibukui ka akwaras emwaasi ilukumin ikanykape ka akwat akanykauni, luakapitos lujiis.
Lukodwe luka Simeon, ituŋa lukirigin luetitiŋ ejie, ilukumin ikanykaarei ka akwatat.
Lukodwe luka Lebi ilukumin iwoŋon ka akwat akanykape.
Yekoiada ŋes ekeŋarenikinon loka ekek loka Aaron, kojaas kaŋes ilukumin iuni ka akwat akanykaarei;
Sadok ekatumunan lokirigi loetitiŋ, ka lukotogo loka papake ikapolok akaisaarei ka luarei.
Lukodwe luka Benyamin, iinacan luka Saul, ilukumin iuni: naarai aitodol apakio ŋun keraas luitelekarito aipues lukiketakina atupar etogo loka Saul.
Lukodwe luka Epuraim ilukumin akaisaarei ka akwat akanykauni, ituŋa lukirigin luetitiŋ, ituŋa lukodwaratau kokekia luka lukapapaakec.
Lukatutubet naka ateker naka Manase ilukumin itomon ka lukanykauni, luabilitai ikiroriakec, aponare aitaraun Daudi ekabaka.
Lukodwe luka Isakar, ituŋa luajenete apakio, ajenun nuibusakinit Isirael aswam: ikapolokokec emwaasi akwat aarei; kiswamata iinacanakec kere kwape ajaar aicorakinetekec.
Luka Sebulun, luapedorete alomar kajore, luapedorete aiderakin ejie, lukejaas kiboro lukiponesio luipu lujiis, ilukumin akaisakany; luapedorete aiderakin ejie, luamameete itauon iarei.
Luka Naputali ikapolok elukumit, nepepe kakes da lukejaas ibukui ka akwaras ilukumin akaisauni ka lukanykaarei.
Luka Idanin luapedorete aiderakin ejie, ilukumin akaisaarei ka lukanykauni ka akwat akanykape.
Luka Aser, luapedorete alomar kajore, luapedorete aiderakin ejie, ilukumin akaisaoŋon.
Okekwa juwai Yorodan, luka Ireubenin, ka Igadin, ka atutubet naka ateker naka Manase, lukejaas kiboro lukiponesio luipu lujiis ilukumin akwatat ka ilukumin akaisaarei.

Ŋul kere, ituŋa lukajiok, luapedorete aiderakin ejie, apotu kopotu Keburon ketau loetenara, aitaraun Daudi ekabaka loka Isirael kere: luka Isirael ice kere da kejaas ketau ediopet aitaraun Daudi ekabaka.
Kejaas ŋina nepepe ka Daudi apaarasia auni, enyamete, emasete: naarai apotu iinacanakec kitemokis kanukec.

Bobo da ŋul luedunyas kakes, kiton Isakar ka Sebulun ka Naputali, kibwokut inyamat kasigirian, kakaalai, konyubun, komoŋin, inyamat luka akiria, aluŋureta nuka itinin, aibuŋeta nueokito nuka imusabibun, ka ebino, ka akinyet, ka imoŋin, ka imerekekin, epu noi; naarai kejai aiyalama koIsirael.

Kotema Daudi atukot kere naka Isirael atiar, “Arai itojokito yesi, arai da erai naka EJAKAIT Ewokodeke, kejukasi anatar iinacanawok luideuna kakwap kere naka Isirael, lukejaas kisasedotin ka Ilebin oreriakec luejaas ironyia, kotukunos mamawok:
Kenyakut bobo asaduku naka Edekewok mamawok: naarai mam kipou keŋitununiata ŋes kapaarasia nuka Saul.”
Kobala atukot kere ebe tikiswama kwaŋin: naarai ebecokino akirot kakonyen nuka ituŋa kere.
Kodoka Daudi, ka Isirael kere, Baala, ŋes Kiriat-yearim, lokerai loka Yuda, aitonyoun kaŋina asaduku naka Edeke, EJAKAIT loiboikini ikerubin, naenyaritai Ekekiror.
Kodakutu asaduku naka Edeke kagali nakitetet, alemun kotogo loka Abinadab; kireŋeata Usa ka Akio agali.
Kikosi Daudi ka Isirael kere kakonyen nuka Edeke kagogoŋukec kere: kikososinei, ka adeudeun, ka isabulin, ka isiman, ka ikacwi, ka arupepen da.
Kinep anyunyura naka EJAKAIT aluikin Usa, kinom ŋes, naarai ariori akekan mama ejai asaduku: kotwana kanen kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT.
Kokadak Daudi, naarai acil EJAKAIT Usa; komaik aibois ŋin Peres-usa,
Kokurianar Daudi EJAKAIT kapaaran ka ŋin ebe, “Ekonakini ai ayaun asaduku naka EJAKAIT ore mama ajai?”
Kwaŋin mam Daudi abu koyau asaduku mamake ore loka Daudi, konye abu kitapaa adakar ŋes togo loka Obed-edom Egitit.
Kosalak asaduku kokale loka Obed-edom togoke ilapio iuni: kisirereŋ EJAKAIT etogo loka Obed-edom ka luajaatar kere.
Kojen Daudi ebe abu EJAKAIT kiticat ŋes araun ekabaka loka Isirael, naarai kitopolooritete akejakanut, kanuka iketuŋa Isirael.
Lu kes ikiroria luka idwe luaurikinio ŋes koYerusalem; Samua, ka Sobab, ka Natan, ka Solomon;
ka Ibar, ka Elisua, ka Elipelet;
ka Noga, ka Nepeg, ka Yapia;
ka Elisama, ka Beeliada, ka Elipelet.
Apotu Ipilisitian kopotu koŋatata kaditot naka Repaim.
Kiŋit Daudi Edeke ebe, “Alosi kereka eoŋ aitiji Ipilisitian? Kijaikini ijo kes akanika?” Kotema EJAKAIT ŋes atiar, “Kolot; naarai ejaikini kes akanikon.”
Kopotu Baal-perasim, kodany Daudi kes kaŋina; kotema Daudi atiar, “Acil EJAKAIT lukasurupoka kakanika, kwape eciliata akip.” Ŋes amaikinere aibois ŋin Baal-perasim,
Kinyekis idekesiokec kanen; kicorak Daudi, aponi kicweikinai kakim.
Kiŋit bobo Daudi Edeke; kotema Edeke ŋes atiar, “Mam ilosi atupakin kes: kiwarak kes, kobunok kaneejaas ikito luka baka.
Ejaun kwanata ebe, Kipup ijo eporoto loka lueraeete alosit kokuju kikito luka baka, kosodi konyet alosit ejie: naarai kiŋarenikinit Edeke aidany ajore naka Ipilisitian.”
Kiswama Daudi kwape ecorakinia EJAKAIT: kodanyata ajore naka Ipilisitian anyoun koGibeon kiton Geser.
Kisiarakin eemuto loka Daudi akwapin kere; koinak EJAKAIT atekerin kere akurianar ŋes.
Kosodi Daudi atemar atiar, “Mam luibusakinit adakar asaduku naka Edeke dimarai Ilebin: naarai kes abu EJAKAIT koseu adakanar asaduku naka Edeke, ka aijaanakin ŋes ikar kere.”
Kotukok Daudi Isirael kere Yerusalem, aitodokun asaduku naka EJAKAIT toma aibois naabu ŋesi kitemokinite.
Kotukok Daudi odwe luka Aaron, ka Ilebin:
Lukodwe luka Kokat; Uriel lokapolon, ka ikeinacan akwatat ka akaisaarei:
Lukodwe luka Merari; Asaia lokapolon, ka ikeinacan akwat aarei ka akaisaarei;
Lukodwe luka Geresom: Yoel lokapolon, ka ikeinacan akwatat ka akaisauni:
Lukodwe luka Elisapan; Semaia lokapolon, ka ikeinacan akwat aarei:
Lukodwe luka Keburon; Eliel lokapolon, ka ikeinacan akaisakanykauni:
Lukodwe luka Usiel; Aminadab lokapoion, ka ikeinacan akwatat ka itomon ka luarei.
Konyarau Daudi Sadok ka Abiatar isasedotin, ka Ilebin, kes Uriel, ka Asaia, ka Yoel, ka Semaia, ka Eliel, ka Aminadab.

Kotema kes atiar, “Iraas yesi ikapolok luka ikekia luka lukapapaa luka Ilebin: kitalaunos bonik, yes ka iinacanakus, tetere ipedorete aitodokun asaduku naka EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael, toma aibois naabu eoŋ ketemokinite ŋes.
Naarai mam ipotu kisiautu adakar ŋes, ŋes kecilia EJAKAIT Ewokodeke kamawok, naarai mam kipou kamootos ŋes kwape ajaar aicorakinet.”
Kitalaunos do isasedotin ka Ilebin bonik aitodokun asaduku naka EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael.
Kodakasi do idwe luka Ilebin asaduku naka Edeke kokeperinikec kadaketake, kwape kicorakinitor Musa kwape ajaar akirot naka EJAKAIT.
Koseut Ilebin Keman okoku loka Yoel; ka lokiinacanake, Asap okoku loka Berekaia; ka lokodwe luka Merari iinacanakec, Etan okoku loka Kusaia;

ka ikeceinacan luka atukot nakiareit, Sekaria, ka Ben, ka Yaasiel, ka Semiramot, ka Yekiel, ka Uni, ka Eliab, ka Benaia, ka Maaseia, ka Matitia, ka Elipeleku, ka Mikeneia, ka Obed-edom, ka Yeiel, ikagolok luka ekek.
Aponi koseunai ikayook, Keman, ka Asap, ka Etan, kikacwi luka aisinin aituru;
ka Sekaria, ka Asiel, ka Semiramot, ka Yekiel, ka Uni, ka Eliab, ka Maaseia, ka Benaia, kisabulin koporoto loka Alamot;
ka Matitia, ka Elipeleku, ka Mikeneia, ka Obed-edom, ka Yeiel, ka Asasia, aiŋarenikin kadeudeun koporoto loka Iseminit.
Kopolokinit Kenania, ekapolon loka Ilebin ekosio: kituutoor ŋesi ekosio, naarai kepiriana.
Berekia ka Elukana kes ikagolok luka asaduku.
Apotu Sebania ka Yosapat, ka Netanel, ka Amasai, ka Sekaria, ka Benaia, ka Elieser, isasedotin, kokusete arupepen koiŋaren kasaduku naka Edeke; Obed-edom ka Yekia kes ikagolok luka asaduku.
Kosodi kanen, kiŋarak Edeke Ilebin luadakete asaduku naka aitutuket naka EJAKAIT, apotu koinakis imoŋin lutoba ikanykaarei ka imerekekin ikanykaarei araun asuban.
Kenapit Daudi ekaso loka ebaputa loejok, ka Ilebin kere luadakito asaduku, ka ikayook, ka Kenania ekapolon loka ekosio kikayook: konapit Daudi epod loka ebaputa.
Kwaŋin kitodoku Isirael kere asaduku naka aitutuket naka EJAKAIT keibwoŋ, ka eporoto loka apeen, ka arupepen, ka ikacwi, koramata da isabulin ka adeudeun.
Kedau Daudi ainakin ainakinet naicweio ka ainakineta nuka ainapakin, kilipak ituŋa arereŋ kokiror loka EJAKAIT.
Kokorak da ŋinituŋanan yenika Isirael, ikiliok ka aŋor, ŋinidiopet emugati, aturosit naka akiriŋ, ka aluŋuret naka imusabibun lukeokito.
Koseu ice luka Ilebin aijaanakin koiŋaren kasaduku naka EJAKAIT, ainakin asuban ka aimal ka aiturit EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael:
Asap lokapolon, kotupite ŋes Sekaria, Yeiel, ka Semiramot, ka Yekiel, ka Matitia, ka Eliab, ka Benaia, ka Obed-edom, ka Yeiel, kejaas kisabulin ka adeudeun; ka Asap kejaas kikacwi, aituru kes;
ka Benaia ka Yakasiel isasedotin kejaas karupepen tiritir, koiŋaren kasaduku naka aitutuket naka Edeke.
Kitejenutu aswamisioke otuŋa.
Kitatamata aswamisioke kere nukaumokin.
Kolakaros itauon luka ŋul kaluemoete EJAKAIT.
Komoata akonyeneke ikar kere.
Nukaumokinike, ka itubesia luka aitukuke.
Wu yes aur naka Isirael ekejaanakinanike,
Yes idwe luka Yakob, luseunake.
Ŋes EJAKAIT Ewokodeke:
Iketubesia eja akwap kere.
Kiitutu aitutuketeke ikar kere,
Akirot naabu kicorak aturio alukumit;
Ka aiyapositike mama ejai Isaak;
Kitogogoŋ da ŋipeŋin mama ejai Yakob araun ekisil,
Mama ejai Isirael araun aitutuket namam edaun.
Ebe, “Kainakini jo akwap naka Kanaan,
Ewai loka airumetekon.”
Eebo, luikidioko noi, kiboiororoto kotomake;
Kirimete kateker kiton ateker,
Anyoun kajakanut adiopet kiton otuŋa ice.
Eebo, abu kitoron ikabakan kanukec;
Sirikiswamakis ikanabin aronis.”
Kitodiasi akeitajar ŋinipaaran.
Aswamisioke nukaumokin kotuŋa kere.
Loibusakinit ayoŋio adepar idekesio kere.
Konye EJAKAIT ŋes asubi akuj.
Agogoŋ ka aiyalama ejaas aiboisike.
Koinakis EJAKAIT, yes atekerin nuka ituŋa,
Koinakis EJAKAIT aibuses ka agogoŋ.
Koinakis EJAKAIT aibuses naibusakinit ekekiror:
Koyautu ainakinet, kopotu kakonyeneke.
Komaata EJAKAIT konapito luelaete.
Komaran kakonyeneke, akwap kere:
Icasit akwap da, komam epedori aijaŋijaŋa.
Kolimosi katekerin ebe, “Irumit EJAKAIT,”
Kolel ekitui, ka luejaas toma kere;
Kosodete do ikito luka amagoro ayoore kanuka aiyalama
Kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT,
Naarai ebunit atubokin akwap.
Naarai ejaenena akeitim ikar kere.
Wu Edeke loka aitajarakosi,
Kotukonokinai sio koyuunai katekerin,
Aimalaenen ekonikiror lokalaunan,
Kebwoŋananas kotoma aiturit jo.
Ameun ikar luŋo kiton ikar kere!”
Kobalas ituŋa kere ebe, “Amen,” kituroto EJAKAIT.
Abu kitasal Asap ka iinacanake kanen, koiŋaren kasaduku naka aitutuket naka EJAKAIT, aijaanakin tiritir koiŋaren kasaduku, kwape kibusakinitor aswam naka ŋinipaaran:
ka Obed-edom ka iinacanakec, akaisakanykape ka ikanykauni; Obed-edom da okoku loka Yedutun ka Kosa araun ikagolok;
ka Sadok esasedoti, ka ikeinacan isasedotin, koiŋaren kewema lokalaunan loka EJAKAIT toma aibois naicelelei naajai Gibeon.
Ainanakin ainakineta nuicweio mama ejai EJAKAIT kotem loka ainakineta nuicweio tiritir tupuruc ka eboŋ, kwape ajaatar kere nuiwadikatai kokisila luka EJAKAIT, luabu ŋesi kicorak Isirael;
Keman da ka Yedutun kakes, ka ice luaseunitai, luabilitai ikiroriakec, aimalaenen EJAKAIT, naarai ejaenena akeitim ikar kere;
Keman da ka Yedutun ka kes kejaas karupepen ka ikacwi kanuka ŋul kaluituruete, ka iboro luka ikososinei luka Edeke: odwe luka Yedutun da ajaut okek.
Kotema Natan Daudi atiar, “Kiswama kere nuejaas otaukon; naarai ejai EJAKAIT kajo.”
Kosodi kanen kakuare kaŋin, kobu akirot naka Edeke mama ejai Natan ebe,
“Kolot kolimok Daudi ekakejaanakinan ebe, ‘Inera EJAKAIT kwanata ebe, Mam jo idukokini eoŋ etogo loeboieneno:
Naarai mam eoŋ eboikino togo ageun kapaaran naetolomunia Isirael kiton lolo: konye alosenenei anyoun kowema kiton owema, anyoun kowema lokalaunan kiton ece da.
Kaiboisio kere nualosenen kaIsirael kere, abu eoŋ kener akirot kedio kokatubok luka Isirael, luecorakinit aitanyam ikatuŋa ebe, “Kanukinyo mam yes kidukokiniata eoŋ etogo loka eres?” ’
Aso do kolimok Daudi ekakejaanakinan kwanata ebe, ‘Inera EJAKAIT loka ajoresio kwanata ebe, Abu kalem jo korony, katupit amerekekin, tetere iraun ekapolon ayait ikatuŋa Isirael:
Ajaenena eoŋ kajo kama ilosenenei kere, amudia lukasurupokon kere kakonyenekon; etuluor jo ekiror, kwape ekiror loka lukapolok luejaas kakwap.
Aseikini ikatuŋa Isirael aibois, eraikini kes, tetere iboiete aiboisikec, komam bobo itwobosete; komam bobo idwe luka aronis iticanete kes, kwape lem sek.
Kwape kapaaran naecorakinia eoŋ ikatubok ayait ikatuŋa Isirael; etonokokiari lukasurupokon kere. Bobo da alimokini jo ebe kidukokini EJAKAIT etogo.
Kosodi kanen, kedoloto apaarasiakon, ilosi ijo ajaut kalukapapaakon, adakakini eoŋ aurikon naetupakini naelomuni kodwekon; eticasi da ajakanutuke.
Ŋol ŋes kadukokini etogo, eticasi eoŋ ekeicoloŋ loka ajakanut ikar kere.
Araun eoŋ papake, ŋes da eraun okokuka: mam alemari akaitim kamake, kwape abu kalemaria kama kaŋol kalokinarenikinit jo:
Konye etogogoŋi eoŋ ŋes kotoma togoka, kajakanutuka da ikar kere; iticasio ekeicoloŋ loka ajakanut ikar kere.’ ”
Kwape ejaatar akiro ŋun kere, kwape ejaar aitapoet ŋin kere, kolimok Natan Daudi kwaŋin.
Kerai ŋin da akirot naedit kakonyenekon, wu Edeke; konye iner ijo nuka ekek loka ekejaanakinanikon kokar luipu noi luepote, isesen eoŋ kwape araar etuŋanan loitopolooritai, wu EJAKAIT Edeke.
Inyo bobo epedori Daudi alimokin jo nuka aibuses naisubakinitai ekonikejaanakinan? Naarai ijeni ekonikejaanakinan.
Wu EJAKAIT, iswama ijo apolou na kere, kanuka ekejaanakinanikon, kwape ejaar ekonitau da, aitejenun akiro nu kere nukapolok.
Wu EJAKAIT, emamei yeneputos kajo, emamei da Edeke ece dimarai ijo, kwape ajaatar kere nukipou keirasi kakosiki.

Ani bo ateker adio kakwap naeputos kikonituna Isirael, luabu Edeke kolot alakun kanuke araun ituŋa, adumakin ekiror kakiro nukos ka nusogim, ireŋei atekerin kakonyen nuka ikonituŋa luibu kolaku koMisiri?
Naarai ikonituŋa Isiraei ibu kitarau ikonituŋa ikar kere; ijo da, EJAKAIT, ibu koraun Edekekec.
Aso do, wu EJAKAIT, kitogogoŋoi akirot naibu kiner naka ekonikejaanakinan, ka ekekike ikar kere, kiswama kwape kineria.
Kicat ekonikiror, kitopolooroi ikar kere ebe, EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ŋes Edeke loka Isirael, Edeke mama ejai Isirael: iticasio ekek loka ekonikejaanakinan Daudi kakonyenekon.
Naarai ijo, wu Ekadeke, ipukokinit ekonikejaanakinan ebe idukokini ijo ŋes ekek; kanuka ŋun etitinior ekonikejaanakinan kotauke ailip kakonyenekon.
Aso do wu EJAKAIT, irai ijo Edeke, isumunik ekonikejaanakinan akirot ŋin naejok:
Kitojok ijo aisirereŋ ekek loka ekonikejaanakinan, kiyatanakinenei kakonyenekon ikar kere: naarai ijo, wu EJAKAIT, ibu kisirereŋ, ido isirereŋitoi ikar kere.”
Kodany Moab; koraut Imoabin ikejaanakinak luka Daudi koyaut ainakineta.
Kitoji Daudi Kadareser ekabaka loka Soba kiton Kamat, nakelosio aiticat ayaiteke eiduny kecor Eupurat.
Kolema Daudi kamake agalin alukumit, ka ikebwanenok ilukumin ikanykaarei, ka lualosete kakeje ilukumin akaisaarei: kitwaŋal Daudi ibalasin kere luka agalin, konye kiŋadak kakes luka agalin akwatat.
Kepotu Isurian luka Damasiko aisigalikin Kadareser ekabaka loka Soba, kodany Daudi ituŋa ilukumin akaisaarei ka luarei luka Isurian.
Kosodi Daudi aibwaikin atukon nuka iserikalen Suria loka Damasiko; koraut Isurian ikejaanakinak luka Daudi, koyaut ainakineta. Koinak EJAKAIT Daudi aipikor kama kelosenenei kere.
Koŋatu Daudi ibukui luka esabu lukejaas kikejaanakinak luka Kadareser, koyau kes Yerusalem.
Koŋatu Daudi aisinit naepol noi koTibat, ko Cun, ireria luka Kadereser, naabu Solomon kiswamaa aŋolol naka aisinit, ka ipirin, ka iboro luka aisinit.

abu kijuka Kadoram okokuke mama ejai ekabaka Daudi, ayogan ŋes, ailipakin ŋes arereŋ, naarai etijiit Kadareser kodany ŋes; naarai abu Kadareser kitijiite Tou; kejaas kaŋes iponesio kere luka iboro luka esabu ka epuesa ka aisinit.
Ŋul da abu Daudi kotiakak EJAKAIT, nepepe kepuesa ka esabu loabu koŋatu katekerin kere; kama ka Edom, ka Moab, kodwe luka Amon, koPilisitian, ka Amalek da.
Kibwaik atukon nuka iserikalen Edom; koraut Idomein kere ikejaanakinak luka Daudi. Koinak EJAKAIT Daudi aipikor kama kelosenenei kere.
Kirum Daudi Isirael kere; kitodolenenei itubesia ka nuetenito kotuŋake kere.
Kopolokinite Yoab okoku loka Seruia ajore; kerai Yekosapat okoku loka Akilud ekesiitonokinan.
Sadok okoku loka Akitub, ka Abimelek okoku loka Abiatar keraas isasedotin; kerai Sabusa ekalani;
Kopolokinite Benaia okoku loka Yekoiada Ikeretin ka Ipeletin; keraas odwe luka Daudi ikapolok eiduny kekabaka.

Kotema Daudi atiar, “Ketodikini Kaŋun okoku loka Nakas asianut, naarai abu papake ketodik eoŋ asianut.” Kijuka Daudi ikiyakia aitalakar ŋes kanuka papake. Kopotu ikejaanakinak luka Daudi akwap naka idwe luka Amon mama ejai Kaŋun, aitalakar ŋes.

Konye apotu ikapolok luka idwe luka Amon kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Iwomit ijo ebe eyoŋit Daudi papakon, aijukakin jo lukitalakarete? Mam kereka eponito ikejaanakinakake airere, ka amudiar, ka airot akwap?”
Koyaŋa do Kaŋun ikejaanakinak luka Daudi, kobaren kes, kotuboto ikecenapen kokidiŋ, kiton oosikec, kotwara kes.

Kosodete ice alosit, kolimokis Daudi kwape kikonakinere ituŋa. Kijuka airiamakin kakes; naarai eleicikinito noi ituŋa. Kotema ekabaka atiar, “Kopaikis Yeriko aitodol neecekuniata ipenekakus, kosodete konyet aboŋun.”
Kwaŋin kiboleikis agalin alukumin akaisauni ka nuarei, ka ekabaka loka Maaka ka ikejaanakinakake; luapotu kidukuroto koiŋaren ka Medeba. Kotukonokinos idwe luka Amon anyoun koreriakec, kopotu ejie.
Kepupu Daudi ŋun, kijuka Yoab, ka ajore kere naka ituŋa lukirigin.
Kolomut idwe luka Amon, kiderakinos ejie korute loka ere: ikabakan luapotu kopotu kejaas bonik orony.
Nakeanyunia Yoab ebe ejai ejie kiŋaren kokau da, koseu ituŋa kere luaseunitai koIsirael, kiderak kes aitiji Isurian.
Kititiŋ Abisai onaceke ituŋa ice kere, kiderakinos kesi aitiji idwe luka Amon.
Kotema atiar, “Arai keetelekasi Isurian eoŋ, kosodi ijo aisigalikin eoŋ: konye arai kiitelekasi idwe luka Amon jo, kasodi eoŋ aisigalikin jo.
Kotitiŋior, ketodiasi ekiliokone kanuka ituŋawok, ka ireria luka Edekewok: kiswama EJAKAIT nuitojokit ŋesi.”
Kikunyak do Yoab ka ituŋa lukejaas kaŋes aitiji Isurian; kokerata kakonyeneke.
Keanyut idwe luka Amon ebe akerata Isurian, kokerata kesi da kakonyen nuka Abisai onaceke, kolomasi ore, Kosodi Yoab abunore Yerusalem.
Kolimokinai Daudi; kotukonok Isirael kere, kodok Yorodan, kobunok kes, kiderakin ejie aitiji kes. Kosodi kedau Daudi aiderakin ejie aitiji Isurian, kojioto.
Kokerata Isurian kakonyen nuka Isirael; koar Daudi luka Isurian, ituŋa luka agalin alukumin akanykaarei, ka lualosete kakeje ilukumin akaisaoŋon, koar da Sopak ekapolon loka ajore.
Keanyut ikejaanakinak luka Kadareser ebe epikor kes kakonyen nuka Isirael, kitutukoto kaDaudi nukainapakin, kijaanakis ŋes: koŋeroto Isurian aisigalikin bobo idwe luka Amon.
Kolem Daudi aboko naka ekabakakec kakouke, kiniŋ alaŋiruke atalata naka esabu, kejaas amor nuka akais nuipu tomake; kidokokinoi akou naka Daudi, kitolom luŋatuna lukore luipu noi.
Kitolom da ituŋa lukejaas nen, kotub kes kimusumenin, ka asua nuboket, ka aepei. Kiswamak Daudi ireria kere luka idwe luka Amon kwaŋin, Koboŋo Daudi ka ituŋa kere Yerusalem.
Kosodi kanen kokau kaŋun, kojau bobo ejie ka Ipilisitian koGeser: kosodi Sibekai Ekusatit aiar Sipai, loka odwe luka ekekososon: aponi kipikoroi.
Kosodi kojau bobo ejie ka Ipilisitian: koar Elanan okoku leka Yair Lami onace loka Goliat Egitit, koputos amorok naka akwarake bala akitoi naesonyere.
Kosodi kojau bobo ejie koGat, kejai kanen etuŋanan lokaojan, lokejaas ibokor akaisaarei ka luoŋon, ikanykape luka ŋinikan, ka ikanykape luka ŋinikeju; ŋes da aurikinio ekekososon.
Naamwanitor ŋesi Isirael, abu Yonatan okoku loka Simea onace loka Daudi koar ŋes.
Aurikinio ŋul ekekososon koGat; kibiroros kakan naka Daudi, kakan da naka ikekejaanakinak.
Kotema Daudi Yoab ka ikapolok luka ituŋa ebe, “Koloto, kimarata Isirael anyoun koBeer-seba kiton Dan; kinyakutu akiro, kajen eoŋ etiaikec.”

Kotema Yoab atiar, “Kiyatak EJAKAIT iketuŋa kwape ejaar etiaikec irwan akwatat: konye, ekajakait ekabaka, mere kes kere ikejaanakinak luka ekabaka? Kanukinyo ekotor ekajakait akirot na? Kanukinyo kitagwaunia ŋesi Isirael?”
Konye kiteleka akirot naka ekabaka Yoab. Tape Yoab enyouni, kitor anatar Isirael kere, kobu Yerusalem.

Kobil Yoab etiai loka ituŋa luemari ŋesi mama ejai Daudi. Ŋul kere luka Isirael emwaasi ilukumin elukumit ka ilukumin akwatat luautununete ikileŋa: emwaasi ituŋa luka Yuda ilukumin akwat aoŋon ka ilukumin akaisakanykaarei luautununete ikileŋa.
Konye mam abu kimar Lebi ka Benyamin kotomakec: naarai apagalikinit akirot naka ekabaka Yoab.
Kokadak Edeke akirot ŋin: tape edanyi Isirael.
Kotema Daudi Edeke atiar, “Adiaka eoŋ noi, naarai eswama eoŋ akirot ŋin: konye kwana, keŋaiŋait, kolema numam adolit nuka ekonikejaanakinan; naarai eswama eoŋ nukabaŋaanut naepol.”
Kotema EJAKAIT Gad, ŋes ekadwaran loka Daudi atiar,
“Kolot kolimok Daudi ebe, ‘Inera EJAKAIT kwanata ebe, Kejaik jo akiro auni; koseu ijo adiopet kakesi, tetere keswamakini jo.’ ”
Kobu do Gad mama ejai Daudi, kotema ŋes atiar, “Inera EJAKAIT kwanata ebe, Koseu naikoto;

Arai bo ikar iuni luka ebeli; arai ilapio iuni amudiario kakonyen nuka lukasurupokon, kodolok jo ekileŋ loka lukasurupokon; arai bo apaarasia auni ekileŋ loka EJAKAIT, atular kakwap, emudiari emalaika loka EJAKAIT anatar ariino kere nuka Isirael. Aso do koomoom nuaboŋokini eoŋ ŋol lokejukuni.”
Kotema Daudi Gad atiar, “Katiokikis noi: mere kebirokin akan naka EJAKAIT: naarai, epol noi akeitim: kenyek aibirokin akan naka ituŋanan.”
Kijuk EJAKAIT atular toma Isirael: kotwakata ituŋa ilukumin akaisakanykaarei luka Isirael.

Kijuka Edeke emalaika Yerusalem amudiar ŋes: konye napebala ŋesi emudiari, kosesen EJAKAIT, kiitu ŋesi aronis, kotema emalaika loamudiari ebe, “Adolo do: kinyaka akonikan.” Abwoi emalaika loka EJAKAIT eiduny kepejal loka Orunan Eyebusit.

Kiteluo Daudi akonyeneke, koanyu emalaika loka EJAKAIT ebwoi kidiŋ kakuj ka akwap, kitiŋite ekileŋ loautuno kakanike, koriorite adoditor Yerusalem, Kosodi Daudi ka imakio aibiror ebuburia, konapitos ipukoi.

Kotema Daudi Edeke atiar, “Mere eoŋ loabu kecorak aimar ituŋa? Ŋes eoŋ loabu kadiaka eswama nukaronok; konye amerekekin nu, eswamata anyoika? Keŋaiŋait, wu EJAKAIT Ekadeke, kaluik eoŋ akonikan, ka ekek loka papaka; konye kinyek aluikin ikonituŋa, atular kes.”
Kosodi emalaika loka EJAKAIT aicorakin Gad alimokin Daudi ebe, kolot Daudi, adukokin EJAKAIT etem opejal loka Orunan Eyebusit.
Kolot Daudi kakirot naka Gad, naalimokinit ŋesi kokiror loka EJAKAIT.
Kibelokin Orunan, koany emalaika; koŋopata odweke iwoŋon lukejaas kaŋes. Ecomi Orunan akima.
Kebuni Daudi mama ejai Orunan, kosesen Orunan koany Daudi, kolom kopejal, kokukum mama ejai Daudi kitulurite akekou.
Kosodi Daudi atemar Orunan atiar, “Koinakinai eoŋ aibois naka epejal kalo, kadukok EJAKAIT etem: koinakinai eoŋ katacakini jo etiaike kere: tetere enaŋi atular kotuŋa.”

Kotema Orunan Daudi atiar, “Koyaŋa ŋes, kiswama ekajakait ekabaka nuitojokit kakonyeke: koany, ainakini jo imoŋin araun ainakineta nuicweio, ka iboro lukicomet kanuka akito, ka alos araun ainakinet naka akiria; ainakini kere.”
Kotema ekabaka Daudi Orunan atiar, “Mam; konye abeit kigwelakin kotiaike kere: naarai mam ayaŋaari nukon ainakin EJAKAIT, karaida ainakin ainakinet naicweio kiboro kaluiinakina taai.”
Koinak Daudi Orunan isekelin akwat akanykape luka esabu lueninio itia aibois.
Kodukok Daudi EJAKAIT etem nepenen, koinak ainakineta nuicweio ka ainakineta nuka ainapakin, kiwone EJAKAIT; Koboŋok ŋes kakim naebuni kokuju kotem loka ainakineta nuicweio.
Kicorak EJAKAIT emalaika; kinyakak bobo ekileŋ akuraruke.
Kapak kaŋin, keanyu Daudi ebe abu EJAKAIT Koboŋok ŋes kopejal leka Orunan Eyebusit, kosodi konyet ainakin asuban kanen.
Naarai kapak kaŋin kejai ewema lokalaunan loka EJAKAIT, loabu Musa kosub kamodiŋ, ka etem loka ainakineta nuicweio aibois naicelelei koGibeon.
Konye koŋer Daudi alosit nen aiŋitun EJAKAIT: naarai akuriana ekileŋ loka emalaika loka EJAKAIT.
Kitemok Daudi asua nuipu noi nuka isumalin luka ikirigin luka irutei, ka luimorikikinete; ka aisinin nuipu noi numam iniŋos;
ka iresia lumam imarunos; naarai apotu Isidonin ka luka Turo koyaut iresia luipu noi mama ejai Daudi.

Kotema Daudi atiar, “Edit Solomon okokuka, enonok, kibusakinit etogo loekotoi adukokin EJAKAIT korai loitopolooritai, loka eemut, ka loka aibuses anatar akwapin kere: kanuka ŋun etemokini eoŋ iboroke.” Kitemok Daudi luipu noi eroko ketwana.
Kosodi anyaraun Solomon okokuke, kicorak ŋes adukokin EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael, etogo.
Kotema Daudi Solomon okokuke atiar, “Kejai otaukan adukokin ekiror loka EJAKAIT Ekadeke etogo.
Konye kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mamakaŋ ebe, ‘Ibuko ijo aokot nuipu, ijii noi: mam jo idukokini ekakiror etogo, naarai ibuko ijo aokot nuipu kakwap kakonyeneka:
Koany, kiwurikinio jo esapat, loeraun etuŋanan loka ainapakin: esinapikini eoŋ ŋes kama kalukasurupoke kere luirimorito: naarai emaikinio ekekiror Solomon,
Edukokini ŋesi ekakiror etogo; eraun ŋesi okokuka, eoŋ da araun papake; eticasi eicoloŋ loka ajakanutuke koIsirael ikar kere.’
Aso, ikakoku, kojai EJAKAIT kajo; kokerianar, koduk etogo loka EJAKAIT Ekonideke, kwape alimokinia ŋesi nukon.
Konye ca koinak EJAKAIT jo acoa ka ajenun, kicorak jo nuka Isirael; tetere iricit ekisil loka EJAKAIT Ekonideke.
Kwaŋin ikerianar, arai ikokit aitodol ikisila ka itubesia luecorakinit EJAKAIT Musa nuka Isirael: kicat, kotitiŋior; sirikikurianar, kwabo sirikiyaloŋoŋ.

Kwana, koany, kaitaaritoika abu ketemok etogo loka EJAKAIT atalatan alukumin akwatat nuka esabu, ka atalatan alukumin alukumit nuka epuesa; aisinin ka asua numam iniŋos; naarai ipu noi: abu ketemok da akito ka amor; iyatakini ijo da.
Bobo da ejaas ikeswamak kajo luipu noi, ikajepak ka ikeswamak amor ka akito, ka ituŋa kere luepiriaka kopone kere loka aswam;
luka esabu, ka epuesa, ka aisinin, ka asua, mam imarunos; konyou, kiswama, kojai EJAKAIT kajo.”
Kicorak da Daudi ikapolok kere luka Isirael aiŋarakin Solomon okokuke, ebe,
“Mam kereka EJAKAIT Ekusideke ejai kayes? mam ŋes kisinapik yes kaŋoliwai? Naarai abu kijaik lueboiete kakwap akanika; kenonokiar akwap kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kakonyen nuka iketuŋa da.

Kwana kibwaikis itauonokus ka aijarakus amoot EJAKAIT Ekusideke; konyoutu do, kodukoto yesi aibois nakalaunan naka EJAKAIT Edeke, aitolomar asaduku naka aitutuket naka EJAKAIT, ka iboro lukalaunak luka Edeke, togo loekotoi adukokin ekiror loka EJAKAIT.”
Kotukonok ikapolok kere luka Isirael, ka isasedotin ka Ilebin.
Aponi kimarai Ilebin ageun kaluka ikar akaisauni ka adepar; etiaikec kakwesikec, ŋinituŋanan, emwaasi ilukumin akaisauni ka lukanykauni.
Ka ŋul, koanyanarete ilukumin akaisaarei ka luoŋon aswam naka etogo loka EJAKAIT: ilukumin ikanykape kes ikapolokitok ka ikatubok:
Ilukumin iwoŋon keraas ikagolok; kituritos da ilukumin iwoŋon EJAKAIT kiboro luabala Daudi ebe, “Abu eoŋ keswama kes aituritor.”
Kotiaka Daudi kes toma abeanakin kwape ajaatar odwe luka Lebi; Gereson, ka Kokat, ka Merari.
Luka Igeresonin; Ladan ka Simei.
Odwe luka Ladan; Yekiel lokapolon, ka Setam, ka Yoel, iuni.
Odwe luka Simei; Selomot, ka Kasiel, ka Karan, iuni. Ŋul kes ikapolok luka ikekia luka lukapapaa luka Ladan.
Odwe luka Simei; Yakat, ka Sina, ka Yeus, ka Beria. Ŋul iwoŋon kes odwe luka Simei.
Yakat ŋes lokapolon, Sisa lokiareit; konye amameete Yeus ka Beria odwe luipu; kanuka ŋun kimarakinitete araun ekek ediopet loka lukapapaakec.

Odwe luka Amuram; Aaron ka Musa: aponi Aaron kotiakai tetere etalauni iboro lukalaunak noi, ŋes ka odweke, ikar kere, aisupuruunun lukisupurununo kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, aijaanakin ŋes, ka ailipenen arereŋ kokirorike ikar kere.
Konye Musa, etuŋanan loka Edeke, aponi odweke komaikinai ateker naka Lebi.
Odwe luka Musa; Geresom ka Elieser.
Odwe luka Geresom; Sebuel lokapolon.
Odwe luka Elieser kes Rekabia lokapolon. Amameete Elieser icedwe lusap; konye epu noi odwe luka Rekabia.
Odwe luka Isar; Selomit lokapolon.
Odwe luka Keburon; Yeria lokapolon, Amaria lokiareit, Yakasiel lokiwuniet, ka Yekameam lokiwoŋonet.
Odwe luka Usiel; Mika lokapolon, ka Isia lokiareit.
Odwe luka Merari; Mali ka Musi. Odwe luka Mali; Eleasar ka Kis.
Kotwana Eleasar, komameete idwe lusap, konye lupesur bon: komanyata ikeceinacan odwe luka Kis kes.
Odwe luka Musi; Mali, ka Eder, ka Yeremot, iuni.
Naarai abala Daudi ebe, “Abu EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael kisinapik iketuŋa; iboienenei ŋesi koYerusalem ikar kere.
Mam bobo ipudas Ilebin adakar ewema lokalaunan ka iboroke kere luka aijaanakinikeŋ.”
Naarai kakiro nukawasia nuka Daudi aponi kimarai idwe luka Lebi, ageun kaluka ikar akaisaarei ka adepar.
Naarai aswamukec ŋes aijaanakin odwe luka Aaron toma aijaanakin naka etogo loka EJAKAIT, alaroi, ka agolai, ka aiteseg iboro lukalaunak kere, ŋes aswam naka aijaanakin naka etogo loka Edeke.
Naka imugatin luka aitodikin, ka akiria nuidicic nuka ainakinet naka akiria, arai nuka imugatin luebenen lumam itubuunitoi, arai lupeon, arai luipoo, kaiponesio kere luka aitem ka luka etiai;
Abwoenen aimal ka aiturit EJAKAIT, ŋinitupuruc, ka aboŋ da;
Ainakin ainakineta nuicweio kere mama ejai EJAKAIT, kanuka asabaton, napilamununei elap, kopucin lueseunitai, kotiai kwape kejaar aicorakinetekec, tiritir kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT:
Tetere iricete aidar ewema loka airiamunun, ka aidar aibois nakalaunan, ka aidar iinacanakec odwe luka Aaron, aijaanakin kotogo loka EJAKAIT.
Konye apotu Nadab ka Abiku kotwakata eriŋa papakec, komameete kes idwe; kanuka ŋun kiswamata Eleasar ka Itamar esasedotene.
Abu Daudi nepepe ka Sadok lokodwe luka Eleasar, ka Akimelek lokodwe luka Itamar kotiak kes kwape ajaar aitemonokin naka aijaanakinikec.

Aponi kodumunai lukapolok luipu lukodwe luka Eleasar adepar odwe luka Itamar; aponi kotiakai kwanata: emwaasi lukodwe luka Eleasar itomon ka lukanykape, lukapolok luka ikekia luka lukapapaakec; ka lukodwe luka Itamar kwape ajaatar ikekia luka lukapapaakec emwaasi ikanykauni.
Aponi kotiakai koroet kopone ediopet kere; naarai kejaas ikapolok luka kibois nakalaunan, ka ikapolok luka Edeke, lukodwe luka Eleasar, ka lukodwe luka Itamar da.

Abu Semaia okoku loka Netanel ekewadikan, lokerai loka Ilebin, kiwadik kes kakonyen nuka ekabaka, ka ikapolok, ka Sadok esasedoti, ka Akimelek okoku loka Abiatar, ka Ikapolok luka ikekia luka lukapapaakec luka isasedotin ka Ilebin; aponi kolemunai ekek ediopet loka lukapapaakec luka isasedotin ka Ilebin; aponi kolemunai ekek ediopet loka lukapapaakec kanuka Eleasar, ka ediopet kanuka Itamar.
Lokiwuniet Karim, lokiwoŋonet Seorim;
Lokikanyet Malikiya, lokikanyetekape Miyamin;
Lokikanyetekaarei Kakos, lokikanyetekauni Abiya;
Lokikanyetekaoŋon Yesua, lokitomonet Sekania;
Lokitomonet ka lodiopet Eliasib, lokitomonet kaarei Yakim;
Lokitomonet kauni Kupa, lokitomonet kaoŋon Yesebeab;
Lokitomonet kakany Biliga, lokitomonet kakanykape Imer;
Lokitomonet kakanykaarei Kesir, lokitomonet kakanykauni Kapises;
Lokitomonet kakanykaoŋon Petakia, lokakaisaarei Yekesikel;
Lokakaisaarei ka lodiopet Yakin, lokakaisaarei ka luarei Gamul;
Lokakaisaarei ka luuni Delaia, lokakaisaarei ka luoŋon Maasia.
Ŋin ŋes abeanakinikec kaijaanakinikec, alomar togo loka EJAKAIT kwape ajaar aicorakinet naainakinitai kes kama ka Aaron papaakec, kwape ecorakinitor kes EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael.
Luka Rekabia: lokodwe luka Rekabia, Isia lokapolon.
Luka Isarin, Selomot; lokodwe luka Selomot, Yakat.
Odwe luka Keburon; Yeria lokapolon, Amaria lokiareit, Yakasiel lokiwuniet, Yekameam lokiwoŋonet.
Odwe luka Usiel, Mika; lokodwe luka Mika, Samir.
Onace loka Mika, Isia: lokodwe luka Isia, Sekaria.
Odwe luka Merari; Mali ka Musi; odwe luka Yaasia; Beno.
Odwe luka Merari; luka Yaasia, Beno, ka Sokam, ka Sakur, ka Ibiri.
Loka Mali; Eleasar, loamameete idwe lusap.
Luka Kis; odwe luka Kis, Yerameel.
Odwe luka Musi; Mali, ka Eder, ka Yerimot. Ŋul kes odwe luka Ilebin kwape ajaatar ikekia luka lukapapaakec.

Ŋul da apotu kilamilamata kwape kiinacanakec odwe luka Aaron kakonyen nuka Daudi ekabaka, ka Sadok, ka Akimelek, ka ikapolok luka ikekia luka lukapapaa luka isasedotin ka Ilebin; ikekia luka lukapapaa luka lokapolon kwape ka ŋul luka onaceke lodidi.
Lukodwe luka Asap; Sakur, ka Yosep, ka Netania, ka Asarela, odwe luka Asap; kakan naka Asap luadwarenenete kwape ajaar aicorakinet naka ekabaka.
Luka Yedutun: odwe luka Yedutun; Gedalia, ka Seri, ka Yesaia, ka Kasabia, ka Matitia, ikanykape; kakan naka papakec Yedutun kadeudeu, luadwarenenete kaimal kaiturit EJAKAIT.
Luka Keman: odwe luka Keman; Bukia, ka Matania, ka Usiel, ka Sebuel, ka Yerimot, ka Kanania, ka Kanani, ka Eliata, ka Gidaliti, ka Romamiti-eser, ka Yosebekasa, ka Maloti, ka Kotir, ka Makasiot:
Ŋul kere odwe luka Keman ekadwaran loka ekabaka kakiro nuka Edeke, aikeun amumwarat. Abu Edeke koinak Keman idwe lusap itomon ka luoŋon ka lupesur iuni.
Ŋul kere kejaas kakan naka papakec ayoore kotogo loka EJAKAIT, kikacwi, ka isabulin, ka adeudeun, aijaanakin kotogo loka Edeke; Asap, ka Yedutun, ka Keman lukejaas kaicorakinet naka ekabaka.
Etiaikec, nepepe kiinacanakec luetuutooritai ayeonokin EJAKAIT, kes kere lukepiriaka, emwaasi akwat aarei ka akaisakanykauni ka ikanykauni.
Apotu kilamilamata ajenun abeanakinikec, kere koriakanara, ludidik ka lukapolok, ekesisianakinan ka ekesisian.
Kobeik eroet losodit Yosep loka Asap; lokiareit Gedalia; ŋes ka iinacanake ka odweke emwaasi itomon kaluarei.
Lokiwuniet Sakur, odweke ka iinacanake, itomon ka luarei:
Lokiwoŋonet Isiri, odweke ka iinacanake, itomon ka luarei.
Lokikanyet Netania, odweke ka iinacanake, itomon ka luarei.
Lokikanyetekape Bukia, odweke ka iinacanake, itomon ka luarei.
Lokikanyetekaarei Yesarela, odweke ka iinacanake, itomon ka luarei.
Lokikanyetekauni Yesaia, odweke ka iinacanake, itomon ka luarei.
Lokikanyetekaoŋon Matania, odweke ka iinacanake, itomon ka luarei.
Lokitomonet Simei, odweke ka iinacanake, itomon ka luarei.
Lokitomonet ka lodiopet Asarel, odweke ka iinacanake, itomon ka luarei.
Lokitomonet kaarei Kasabia, odweke ka iinacanake, itomon ka luarei.
Lokitomonet kauni Subael, odweke ka iinacanake, itomon ka luarei.
Lokitomonet kaoŋon Matitia, odweke ka iinacanake, itomon ka luarei.
Lokitomonet kakany Yeremot, odweke ka iinacanake, itomon ka luarei.
Lokitomonet kakanykape Kanaia, odweke ka iinacanake, itomon ka luarei.
Lokitomonet kakanykaarei Yosebekasa, odweke ka iinacanake, itomon ka luarei.
Lokitomonet kakanykauni Kanani, odweke ka iinacanake, itomon ka luarei.
Lokitomonet kakanykaoŋon Maloti, odweke ka iinacanake, itomon ka luarei.
Lokakaisaarei Eliata, odweke ka iinacanake, itomon ka luarei.
Lokakaisaarei ka lodiopet Kotir, odweke ka iinacanake, itomon ka luarei.
Lokakaisaarei ka luarei Gidaliti, odweke ka iinacanake, itomon ka luarei.
Lokakaisaarei ka luuni Makasiot, odweke ka iinacanake, itomon ka luarei.
Lokakaisaarei ka luoŋon Romamitieser, odweke ka iinacanake, itomon ka luarei.
Ajaas Meselemia idwe lusap; Sekaria ekiyai, Yediael lokiareit, Sebadia lokiwuniet, Yatiniel, lokiwoŋonet;
Elam lokikanyet, Yekokanan lokikanyetekape, Eliekoenai lokikanyetekaarei.
Ajaas Obed-edom idwe lusap; Semaia ekiyai, Yekosaba lokiareit, Yoa lokiwuniet, Sakar lokiwoŋonet, ka Netanel lokikanyet;
Amiel lokikanyetekape, Isakar lokikanyetekaarei, Peuletai lokikanyetekauni: naarai kisirereŋ Edeke ŋes.
Aponi kourikinai Semaia da okokuke idwe lusap, lukeyaito ekek loka papakec: naarai keraas ituŋa lukirigin luetitiŋ.
Odwe luka Semaia; Otini, ka Repael, ka Obed, ka Elisabad, lukeraas iinacanake ituŋa luetitiŋ, Eliku, ka Semakia.
Ŋul kere odwe luka Obed-edom; kes ka odwekec ka iinacanakec, ituŋa lukapedor ka agogoŋ aijaanakin; akaisakanykape ka luarei luka Obed-edom.
Ajaas Meselemia idwe lusap ka iinacan, ituŋa luetitiŋ, itomon ka lukanykauni.
Kosa da, lokodwe luka Merari, ajaas ŋes idwe lusap; Simiri lokapolon (naarai abu papake kitarau ŋes lokapolon kwabo mam kerai ekiyai);
Kilikia lokiareit, Tebalia lokiwuniet, Sekaria lokiwoŋonet: odwe ka iinacan kere luka Kosa emwaasi itomon ka luuni.
Kotoma kaŋul kobeanakinos ikagolok, ituŋa lukapolok, lukejaas nukisinadio, kwape kiinacanakec, aijaanakin kotogo loka EJAKAIT.
Apotu kilamilamata, ludidik kwape kalukapolok, kwape ajaatar ikekia luka lukapapaakec, kanuka ŋolirute.
Kobeik Selemia eroet lokokide. Kosodete ailamilamikin Sekaria okokuke, ekapetan akiro lokecobe; kobeik ekeroet ari naka agolitomei.
Kobeik Obed-edom ari naka eŋalakimak: ka odweke etogo loka aiŋad.
Kobeik Supim ka Kosa ari nakoto, erute loka Saleket, nekejai eititiria loedokari, kiteonoro ikedarak kaluce.
Kejaas Ilebin ikanykape ari nakokide, iwoŋon ŋinipaaran ari naka agolitomei, iwoŋon ŋinipaaran ari naka eŋalakimak, ka iareiarei kanuka etogo loka aiŋad.
Kanuka Parabar ari nakoto, iwoŋon neejai eititiria, ka iarei oParabar.
Ŋun kes abeanakineta nuka ikagolok; lukodwe luka Ikorakin, ka lukodwe luka Merari.
Odwe luka Ladan; odwe luka Igeresonin lukeraas luka Ladan, ikapolok luka ikekia luka lukapapaakec lukeraas luka Ladan Egeresonit; Yekieli.
Odwe luka Yekieli; Setam, ka Yoel onaceke, kopolokinito aiŋadisia nuka etogo loka EJAKAIT.
Luka Imuramain, luka Isarin, ka luka Ikeburonin, ka luka Iusielin;
Kerai Sebuel okoku loka Geresom, okoku loka Musa ekayaiton aiŋadisia.
Ka iinacanake; loka Elieser kobu Rekabia okokuke ka Yesaia okokuke, ka Yoram okokuke, ka Sikiri okokuke, ka Selemot okokuke.

Kopolokinite Selemot ŋol ka ikeinacan aiŋadisia kere nuka iboro luatiakunitai, luapotu Daudi, ka ikapolok luka ikekia luka lukapapaakec, ikapolok luka ilukumin, ka lukakwatat, ka ikapolok luka ajore kotiakasi.
Luka luŋatuna luadumunete kojiisio apotu kotiakasi aiteteun etogo loka EJAKAIT.
Kere da luabu Samuel ekadwaran, ka Saul okoku loka Kis, ka Abiner okoku loka Ner, ka Yoab okoku loka Seruia, kotiak; ŋinibore kere yeniketiakunitai, kerai ŋin yenikakan naka Selemot ka iinacanake.
Luka Ikeburonin, Kasabia ka iinacanake, ituŋa luetitiŋ, elukumit ka akwat akanykaarei, kopolokinito Isirael okekwa juwai Yorodan ari nakoto; kanuka aswam kere naka EJAKAIT, ido aijaanakin ekabaka.

Luka Ikeburonin kerai Yeriya lokapolon, loka Ikeburonin, kwape ajaar aurikec kwape ajaatar ikekia luka lukapapaakec. Kokaru loka akaisaoŋon loka airum naka Daudi aponi komoai, ido kodumunai kakesi ituŋa lukirigin luetitiŋ koYaser loka Gilead.

Iinacanake, ituŋa luetitiŋ, emwaasi ilukumin iarei ka akwat akanykaarei, ikapolok luka ikekia luka lukapapaakec, luabu Daudi kitarau ikapolokitok luka Ireubenin, ka Igadin, ka atutubet naka ateker naka Imanasein, kaŋinikirot mama ejai Edeke, kakiro da nuka ekabaka.

Idwe luka Isirael kwape kejaar etiaikec, kes ikapolok luka ikekia luka lukapapaakec, ka ikapolok luka ilukumin ka luka akwatat, ka ikapolokokec luapotu kijaanakis ekabaka, kakiro kere nuka abeanakineta nuelomunete ka nuelomarete ŋolilap anatar ilapio kere luka ekaru, kaŋinibeikinet emwaasi ilukumin akaisaarei ka luoŋon.
Kerai ŋesi loka idwe luka Peres, ekapolon loka ikapolok kere luka ajore kolap losodit.
Kopolokinite Dodai Ekokait abeikinet naka elap lokiareit, ka abeikineteke; ka Mikilot ekayaiton: emwaasi ilukumin akaisaarei ka luoŋon kotoma abeikineteke.
Kerai Benaia, okoku loka Yekoiada esasedoti ekapolon lokiwuniet loka ajore naka elap lokiwuniet, lokapolon: emwaasi ilukumin akaisaarei ka Iuonon kotoma abeikineteke.
Ŋes Benaia ŋol, lokerai etuŋanan lokirigi loka akaisauni, loapolokinit akaisauni: kerai Amisabad okokuke kotoma abeikineteke.
Kerai Asakel onace loka Yoab ekapolon lokiwoŋonet loka elap lokiwoŋonet, ka Sebedia okokuke atupakin ŋes: emwaasi ilukumin akaisaarei ka luoŋon kotoma abeikineteke.
Kerai Samut Isarit ekapolon lokikanyet loka elap lokikanyet: emwaasi ilukumin akaisaarei ka luoŋon kotoma abeikineteke.
Kerai Ira okoku loka Ikes Etekoit ekapolon lokikanyetekape loka elap lokikanyetekape: emwaasi ilukumin akaisaarei ka luoŋon kotoma abeikineteke.
Kerai Keles Epelonit loka idwe luka Epuraim ekapolon lokikanyetekaarei loka elap lokikanyetekaarei: emwaasi ilukumin akaisaarei ka luoŋon kotoma abeikineteke.
Kerai Sibekai Ekusatit loka Iserakin ekapolon lokikanyetekauni loka elap lokikanyetekauni: emwaasi ilukumin akaisaarei ka luoŋon kotoma abeikineteke.
Kerai Abieser Enatotait, loka Ibenyaminin ekapolon lokikanyetekaoŋon loka elap lokikanyetekaoŋon; emwaasi Ilukumin akaisaarei ka luoŋon kotoma abeikineteke.
Kerai Makarai Enetopatit, loka Iserakin ekapolon lokitomonet loka elap lokitomonet: emwaasi ilukumin akaisaarei ka luoŋon kotoma abeikineteke.
Kerai Benaia Epiratonit loka idwe luka Epuraim ekapolon lokitomonet ka lodiopet loka elap lokitomonet ka lodiopet: emwaasi ilukumin akaisaarei ka luoŋon kotoma abeikineteke.
Kerai Kelidai Enetopatit, loka Otiniel, ekapolon lokitomonet kaarei loka elap lokitomonet kaarei: emwaasi ilukumin akaisaarei ka luoŋon kotoma abeikineteke.
Bobo da luapolokinito atekerin nuka Isirael: kerai Elieser okoku loka Sikiri ekayaiton loka Ireubenin: Sepatia okoku loka Maaka ŋes loka Isimeonin:
Loka Lebi, Kasabia okoku loka Kemuel: loka Aaron, Sadok.
Loka Yuda, Eliku, ediopet koinacan luka Daudi: loka Isakar, Omiri okoku loka Mikael:
Loka Sebulun, Isimaia okoku loka Obadia: loka Naputali, Yeremot okoku loka Asuriel:
Loka idwe luka Epuraim, Kosea okoku loka Asasia: loka atutubet naka ateker naka Manase, Yoel okoku loka Pedaia:
Loka atutubet naka ateker naka Manase koGilead, Ido okoku loka Sekaria: loka Benyamin, Yaasiel okoku loka Abiner:
Loka Dan, Asarel okoku loka Yerokam. Ŋul kes keraas ikapolok luka atekerin nuka Isirael.
Konye mam Daudi abu kimar etiai kaŋul luka ikar akaisaarei ka lueroko edolo ŋul: naarai abu EJAKAIT kotema ebe iyatakini Isirael kwape aacer nuka akuj.
Kogeu Yoab okoku loka Seruia aimar, konye mam abu koŋetak; ŋes abunokinia Isirael anyunyura; etiai da mam aponi kiwadikai toma oitabo loka aisiitonokin nuka ekabaka Daudi.
Kopolokinite Asumabet okoku loka Adiel aiŋadisia nuka ekabaka: kopolokinite Yonatan okoku loka Usia aiŋadisia nukejaas komanikoria, koreria lukapolok ka ludidik, ka ireria luebwaitai.
Kopolokinite Esiri okoku loka Kelub ŋul lueswamaete komanikoria akor.
Kopolokinite Simei Eramatit imanikoria luka imusabibun: kopolokinite Sabidi Esipimit araito nuka imanikoria luka imusabibun aili ebino.
Kopolokinite Baalkanan Egederit iseitunin ka isukumorio lukejaas apuuton: kopolokinite Yoas aili akinyet.
Kopolokinite Sitirai Esaronit isipanin luadakas Saron: kopolokinite Sapat okoku loka Adulai isipanin lukejaas aditon.
Kopolokinite Obil Isimaelit akaalai: kopolokinite Yedeia Emeronotit asigman.
Kopolokinite Yasis Ekagirit amerekekin. Ŋul kere kes ikayaitok luka iboro luka ekabaka Daudi.
Kerai Akitopel ekapetan akiro loka ekabaka: kerai Kusai Earakit epapero loka ekabaka.
Abu Yekoiada okoku loka Benaia kotupakinite Akitopel, kosodi Abiatar: kerai Yoab ekapolon loka ajore naka ekabaka.

Kosodi Daudi ekabaka aibwo kakejeke, kotema atiar, “Kopupokinai, ikainacan, ka ikatuŋa; kejai otaukan adukokin asaduku naka aitutuket naka EJAKAIT, ka eicoloŋ loka akeje nuka Edekewok etogo loka aiyeŋun; ido abu ketemokinite aiduk.
Konye abu Edeke katema eoŋ atiar, ‘Mam jo idukokini ekakiror etogo, naarai irai ijo etuŋanan lokijiisio, ibu kobuko aokot.’

Konye abu EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael, kaseu eoŋ kokek kere loka papaka araun ekabaka loka Isirael ikar kere: naarai abu koseu Yuda araun ekapolon; kokek loka Yuda da, ekek loka papaka; kodwe luka papaka kalelak eoŋ aitaraun ekabaka loka Isirael kere:
Kodweka da kere (naarai kainak EJAKAIT eoŋ idwe lusap luipu), abu koseu Solomon aiboikin oicoloŋ loka ajakanut naka EJAKAIT airum Isirael.
Kalimok eoŋ ebe, ‘Solomon okokukon, ŋes eduki ekatogo ka akalaroi: naarai aseu eoŋ ŋes araun okokuka, eoŋ da araun papake.
Eticasi akejakanut ikar kere, arai kinyikoki aiswamaenen aicorakinetaka ka itubesiaka, kwape lolo.’

Aso do, kakonyen nuka Isirael kere, ekodet loka EJAKAIT, kopupi Edekewok, koricenenete komoenenete aicorakineta kere nuka EJAKAIT Ekusideke: tetere irumete akwap na naejok, kinyeiniata araun airumet naka ikusidwe lukitupanakinete yes ikar kere.
Aso kocoite; naarai kiseu EJAKAIT jo adukokin aibois nakalaunan etogo: aso kicat, kiswama.”
