Ka aput naka nukejaas omoyoke kere, nuka alaroi nuka etogo loka EJAKAIT, ka agolai kere nuelukunito, naka aiŋadisia nuka etogo loka Edeke, ka naka aiŋadisia nuka iboro luatiakunitai.
Bobo da nuka abeanakineta nuka isasedotin ka Ilebin, ka aswam kere naka aijaanakin kotogo loka EJAKAIT, ka iboro kere luka aijaanakin kotogo loka EJAKAIT.
Esabu loitemitoi loka iboro luka esabu, iboro kere luka ŋolipone loka aijaanakin; epuesa loitemitoi loka iboro kere luka epuesa, iboro kere luka ŋolipone loka aijaanakin.

Itemem da esabu loka ipirin luka atalai, loka atalaike, nuka esabu, loetemem loka ŋolipir loka atala ka atalaike: ido loka ipirin luka atalai luka epuesa, epuesa loetemem loka ŋolipir loka atala, ka atalaike, kwape kejaar aijaanakin naka ŋolipir loka atala.
Etemem da esabu loka imesan luka imugatin luka aitodikin, kaŋolimesa; epuesa da loka imesan luka epuesa.
Ka igolun luka akiriŋ, ka atanya, ka akolin, nuka esabu loelai: etemem da esabu loka atuba, kaŋinituba; etemem da epuesa loka atuba, ka ŋinituba.
Etemem do esabu loililiauna loka etem loka lukisupurununo: esabu da loka aput naka agali, kes ikerubim, luigararaete abebenokakec, arapaar asaduku naka aitutuket naka EJAKAIT.
Kobala Daudi ebe, “Ŋun kere ketejenunete eoŋ kaiwadikaeta kakan naka EJAKAIT, kes aswamisio kere nuka aput kana.”

Ido koany, ejaas abeanakineta nuka isasedotin ka Ilebin, nuka aijaanakin kere nakaetogo loka Edeke: ejaun kajo ŋolituŋanan loekoto loepiriana, kaŋolipone loka aijaanakin kotoma aswam naka ŋolipone: erimakinete da cut ikapolok ka ituŋa kere aicorakinetekon.”

Etemokinit eoŋ kakagogoŋ kere iboro luka etogo loka Ekadeke, esabu loka lukesabu, epuesa loka lukepuesa, aisinin nuka lukaisinin, asua nuka lukasua, akito da nuka lukakito; amor nuemelomeloto, ka nuipiripiranara, amor nuiminaikinere, ka nuka ijesesinei luegelegela, ka amor nuka akais nuipu nuka ŋolipone kere, ka amor nuesegara nuipu noi.
Bobo da, naarai kaminakinit etogo loka Ekadeke, naarai ejaas eoŋ lukakais luipu lueraas lukaŋ luka esabu ka epuesa, ainakini kes togo loka Ekadeke adepar kere luetemokinit luka etogo lokalaunan:
Kes atalatan alukumin auni nuka esabu, loka esabu loka Opir, ka atalatan alukumin akanykaarei nuka epuesa loililiauna, ailadaaria arwatatin nuka itogoi.
Esabu loka iboro luka esabu, ka epuesa loka luka epuesa, loka ŋolipone kere loka aswam naiswamao kakanin nuka ipirioitin. Iŋai bo do einakini ketau loekot atiakun elopet lolo mama ejai EJAKAIT?”
Koinakis kanuka aijaanakin kotogo loka Edeke luka esabu atalatan alukumin akany, ka idarikin
Ŋul lukejaas amor nuka akais nuipu koinakis kes oboro luka akais nuipu luka etogo loka EJAKAIT, kakan naka Yekiel Egeresonit.
Kosodete ituŋa aiyalama, naarai apotu koinakis kitauon luekotosi, naarai kitauon luedolito apotu koinakis kitauon luekotosi mama ejai EJAKAIT: kiyalama da Daudi ekabaka kaiyalama naepol.
Wu EJAKAIT, apolou, ka apedor, ka aibuses, ka aipikor, ka aiyoŋ eraas nukon: naarai luejaas akuj ka akwap kere eraas lukon; wu EJAKAIT, ajakanut erai nakon, kitopoloorio aitelekar kere.
Ebuni abar ka aibuses kamakon, ido irumit kere; ejai apedor ka agogoŋ akanikon; aitopoloor ka ainakin kere agogoŋ ejai akanikon.
Aso do, wu Ekosideke, kimalai, keturito ekonikiror lokakibuses.
“Konye eoŋ iŋai, ikatuŋa da kes inyo, isio apedor ainakin kwaŋin kitauon luekotosi? Naarai epote iboro kere kamakon, kiinakinit isio jo lukon.
Naarai kirai isio ipejok ka ikalotok kakonyenekon, kwape kejaatar lukapapaakosi kere: esubito apaarasiakosi kotoma akwap bala etolim, emamei da amuno.
Wu EJAKAIT Ekosideke, iboro lu kere lukitemonoki isio adukokinia jo etogo loka ekonikiror lokalaunan epote kakanikon, ido kere eraas lukon.
Ekadeke, ajeni da eoŋ ebe igimori ijo etau, isiyalamikinit nuetenito. Eoŋ da kajai ketau loitenara ainak eoŋ kakote iboro lu kere: kwana da aany kaiyalama ikonituŋa luejaas ne, kiinakis jo kakote.
Wu EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Aburaam, ka loka Isaak, ka loka Isirael, lukapapaakosi, kitogogoŋ na ikar kere kaitetemonor nuka aomisio nuka itauon luka ikonituŋa, kiteten ikecetauon neijai.
Koinak Solomon okokuka etau loedolit, airic aicorakinetakon, ka aitejenunetakon, ka ikisilakon, aswam akiro ŋun kere, aiduk etogo lokapolon loetemonok eoŋ iboroke.”
Kotema Daudi ekodet kere atiar, “Kwana kituro EJAKAIT Ekusideke.” Kituru ekodet kere EJAKAIT, Edeke loka lukapapaakec, kituluroto akwesikec, komaata EJAKAIT, ka ekabaka da.

Koinakis asuban mama ejai EJAKAIT, koinakis ainakineta nuicweio mama ejai EJAKAIT, kapaaran naatupakini apaaran ŋin, kes imoŋin lutoba elukumit, imerekekin elukumit, imerekekin ludidik elukumit, ka ainakinetakec numatan, ka asuban nuipu kanuka Isirael kere;
Konyama, komata, kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT kapaaran kaŋin kaiyalama naepol.
Kirucakis aitaraun Solomon okoku loka Daudi ekabaka, kinyonyoikis ŋes akinyet mama ejai EJAKAIT araun lokapolon, ka Sadok araun esasedoti.
Kosodi Solomon aiboikin oicoloŋ loka EJAKAIT korai ekabaka aibois naka Daudi papake, kokerianar; korimak ŋes Isirael kere.
Apotu ikapolok kere, ka ituŋa lukirigin, ka odwe kere da luka ekabaka Daudi kononokikis Solomon ekabaka.
Kitopoloo noi noi EJAKAIT Solomon kakonyen nuka Isirael kere, koinak aibuses nakajakanut namam etakanunit okabakan kere luageikinete toma Isirael.
Kirumit Daudi okoku loka Yese Isirael kere.
Apak naabu ŋesi kirumak Isirael keraas ikar akaisaoŋon; kirumak ikar ikanykaarei koKeburon, kirumak da ikar akaisauni ka luuni koYerusalem.
Kotwana emojoŋit noi, kileleba apaarasi, ka abar, ka aibuses: kirum Solomon okokuke aiboisike.
Aswamisio nuka Daudi ekabaka, nuageikinete ka nukawasia, koany, iwadikatai kakiro nuka Samuel ekadwaran, kakiro nuka Natan enabi, kakiro da nuka Gad ekadwaran;
Kairumuke da kere, ka agogoŋuke, ka akiro nuapotu kodoonokis ŋes, ka Isirael, ka ajakanuto kere nuka akwapin.
Kolot do Solomon, ka ekodet kere kaŋes, mama ejai aibois naicelelei nakejai Gibeon; naarai nen kejai ewema loka airiamunun loka Edeke, loabu Musa ekejaanakinan loka EJAKAIT kiswama kamodiŋ.
Konye abu Daudi koyau asaduku naka Edeke anyoun koKiriat-yearim ayaŋaar aibois naabu Daudi kitemok ŋes: naarai abu ŋesi kibubuk ewema kanuke Yerusalem.
Bobo da kejai nen koiŋaren kewema lokalaunan loka EJAKAIT etem loka aisinit loabu Besalel okoku loka Uri, okoku loka Kur kiswamau: kolosenenete Solomon ka ekodet kere mamake.
Kodoka Solomon ŋina mama ejai etem loka aisinit kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, lokejai owema loka airiamunun, koinak ainakineta alukumit nuicweio kanen.
Kotema Solomon Edeke atiar, “Ibu ijo kitodik Daudi papaka asianut naepol, kitarau eoŋ ekabaka aiboisike.
Kwana, wu EJAKAIT Edeke, kicat aisumunetckon mama ejai Daudi papaka: naarai kidakak eoŋ araun ekabakaloka ituŋa luesubito bala apua naka alup kaipues.
Aso koinakinai do acoa ka aijen, tetere alomanari alomununei da kakonyen nuka ituŋa kalu: naarai iŋai epedori atubokin ikonituŋa lu luipu?”

Kotema Edeke Solomon atiar, “Naarai kejaas nu otaukon, kwabo mam ilipit abar, akerianut, karaida aibuses, karaida aijar naka ŋul kalukilaito jo, kwabo mam ilipit aibut apaarasia nuipu; konye ilipit acoa ka aijen kanukon, tetere itubokini ikatuŋa, luketarau jo ekabakakec:
kiinakin jo acoa ka aijen; kainakini da abar ka akerianut, ka aibuses, numam lem ejaas kaikabakan lukigeikinete jo, kwabo mam ejaunos lukitupakinete jo aputokin kajo,”
Koboŋo Solomon kalositeke kama ejai aibois naicelelei nakejai Gibeon, anyoun kowema loka airiamunun, kobu Yerusalem; kirum Isirael.
Kitarau ekabaka epuesa ka esabu araut bala amor ko Yerusalem, kitarau iresia da bala isukumorin luejaas apuutona, kanuka aipues.
Keyaunio ibalasin lukejaas ka Solomon koMisiri; kodumut ikagwelanarak luka ekabaka kes kosipanin, nollsipan kotiaike.
Koomata, koyaut koMisiri agali kisekelin akwat akanykape luka epuesa, ka ebalasit kakwatat ka akaisakany: koinunut kes kwaŋin ikabakan kere luka Ikitin, ka ikabakan luka Suria kakaninikec.
Kotiaku Solomon ituŋa ilukumin akaisakanykaarei aibwok abwokon, ka ituŋa ilukumin akaisakanykauni luajepete koroŋan, ka ilukumin iuni ka akwat akanykape luayaito kes.
Kijuka Solomon mama ejai Kuram ekabaka loka Turo ebe, “Kwape kikonakinia ijo Daudi papaka, kijukak ŋes iresia adukokin etogo aiboio kotoma, kikonak eoŋ da kwaŋin.

Koany, adukokini eoŋ ekiror loka EJAKAIT Ekadeke etogo, atiakun kanuke, aieweenen kakonyeneke lukisupurununo lueuru maa, kanuka emugati lokaitodikin lotir, kanuka ainakineta nuicweio tupuruc ka eboŋ, kasabaton, ka napilamununei elap, kopucin da lueseunitai luka EJAKAIT Edekekosi. Erai ŋin aicorakinet naka ikar kere koIsirael.
Epol etogo loaduki eoŋ: naarai epol Ekosideke adepar idekesio kere.
Konye iŋai epedori adukokin ŋes etogo, naarai mam akuj, ka akuj naka akuj epedori ailosikin ŋes? Aso iŋai bo eoŋ, adukokin ŋes etogo, dimarai aisupuruun lueuru maa kakonyeneke?

Aso do kijukakinai eoŋ etuŋanan loepiriana aswam kesabu, kepuesa, kaisinin, kasua, ka lomuge, ka Iokaren an, ka lobululu, loepiriana aigir iponesio kere luigirio, ajaun kituŋa luepiriaka luejaas keoŋ ko Yuda ka Yerusalem, luabu Daudi papaka kodumunite.

Kijukakinai da ikito luka eres, ka ikito luka eberos, ka ikito lukajokak koLebanon: naarai ajeni ebe epiriaka ikonikejaanakinak aijep ikito koLebanon; ido koany, ejaununos ikakejaanakinak kaikonikejaanakinak,
aitemonokin akito nuipu noi: naarai etogo loakoto aiduk eraun loepol lokaumokin.

Ido koany, ainakini ikonikejaanakinak, luejepete ikito, aitemisio alukumin akaisaarei nuka alos nuecomom, ka aitemisio alukumin akaisaarei nuka esairi, ka akaalakanya alukumin akaisaarei nuka ebino, ka akaalakanya alukumin akaisaarei nuka akinyet.”

Ido kobala Kuram ebe, “Kituritete EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael, lokesubi akuj ka akwap, loabu koinak Daudi ekabaka okoku lokacoa, loejaas kacobeu ka ajenun, loekot adukokin EJAKAIT etogo, ka etogo loka ajakanutuke.
“Aso do kejukak etuŋanan loepiriana, loejaas kajenun loka Kuram papaka.

Okoku loka aberu naka adwe nuka Dan, kerai papake etuŋanan loka Turo, epiriana aswam kesabu, ka epuesa, ka aisinin, ka asua, ka amor, kakito, ka lomuge, ka lobululu, ka ebaputa loejok, ka Lokareŋan: bobo da aigir epone kere loigirio: ka apwakun aputo kere: kojaun ŋesi aibois kaikonituna luepiriaka, ka ituŋa luepiriaka luka ejakaitika Daudi papakon.
Aso do, luabu ekajakait kiner, akima ka esairi, ka akinyet ka ebino, kijukak ikekejaanakinak:
kijepi isio ikito koLebanon, kotiai loipuda: kiyanaun mamakon kikaleleos kaŋolol kiton Yopa; ido da iyaŋaari Yerusalem.”
Kibwaik ilukumin akaisakanykaarei kakes aibwok abwokon, ka ilukumin akaisakanykauni luajepete koroŋan, ka ilukumin iuni ka akwat akanykape luayaito ituŋa lueswamaete aswam.
Kogeu aiduk kapaaran nakiareit naka elap lokiareit kokaru lokiwoŋonet loka airumuke.
Nu kes apeteta nuapesikinit Solomon aiduk etogo loka Edeke. Aojau kokubitin kwape ajaar aitemis nasodit ŋes ikubitin akaisakanykape, ka alalau da ikubitin akaisaarei.
Agola nalomaret nakejai koiŋaren ketogo, aojauke, kwape ajaar alalau naka etogo, ikubitin akaisaarei, amukurur akwatat ka akaisaarei: kiladaa toma kesabu loelai.
Kiswap etogo lokapolon kakito nuka eberos, nukiladaari kesabu loejok, kiswama tomake ikito luka idukudukun ka irikoi.
Kitubusia etogo kamor nuka akais nuipu: esabu kerai esabu loka Parubaim.
Kiladaa da etogo, ka abaoi, ka neelomarere, ka arwatatinike, ka ikiriginike kesabu; kigirak ikerubin arwatatin.
Abu kiswamau etogo lokalaunan noi; aojauke kwape kejaar alalau naka etogo, ikubitin akaisaarei, alalauke ikubitin akaisaarei: kiladaa ŋes kesabu loejok, kotiai loka atalatan akwat akanykape.
Alaŋir naka isumalin isekelin akaisakany luka esabu. Kiladaa agolai nukokuju kesabu.
Aoiak abebenoka nuka ikerubin ikubitin akaisaarei: abebenok adiopet ikubitin ikany, kodolite arwatat naka etogo; abebenok ace da ikubitin ikany, kodolite abebenok naka ekerubi ece.
Abebenok naka ekerubi ece ikubitin ikany, kodolite arwatat naka etogo: abebenok ace da ikubitin ikany, kiriamakina kabebenok naka ekerubi ece.
Kigararaete abebenoka nuka ikerubin kaŋul ikubitin akaisaarei: kobwaata kesi kakejenekec, kiteete akonyenekec etogo.
Kiswamau aigalisit kalobululu, ka lomuge, ka lokareŋan, ka ebaputa loejok, kosonyak ikerubin kotomake.
Kiswamau irikoi neinerenenere akirot, kibwaik kes kuju kipirin; kiswamau akamamagan akwatat kibwaik kes korikoi.
Kosipok ipirin koiŋaren keyekalu, ediopet kakan nakoteten, ece kakan nakokediany; komaik ekiror loka ŋol kakan nakoteten Yakin, ekiror loka ŋol kakan nakokediany Boas.
Abu kiswamau da aŋolol naecalara ikubitin itomon anyoun koreret kiton oreret, kolukuna, amukururuke ikubitin ikany; kolukunite aitemis naka ikubitin akaisauni.
Kwapuke kejaas luesubito bala imoŋin, luerimorete ŋes, kokubitin itomon, airimor aŋolol. Kejaas imoŋin okokoron iarei, kocala kere nepepe kotatai.

Kidokokinai omoŋin itomon ka luarei, kosesenete iuni ari naka agolitomei, kosesenete iuni ari nakoto, kosesenete iuni ari naka eŋalakimak, kosesenete iuni ari nakokide: kidokokinai aŋolol kujukec, kojaas iwosikec kere toma.
Aburesuke alalau naka akan; kiswamai erereteke bala ereret loka atido, bala aturot naka apecel: abu kigau akaalakanya alukumin auni.

Abu kiswamau da akalayan atomon, kibwaik akany kakan nakoteten, ka akany da nakokediany, ailosenena; apotu kilosenenata iboro lukeraas luka ainakinet naicweio kotomakec: konye kerai aŋolol neelonenenata isasedotin.
Kiswamau da imesan itomon, kibwaik kes oyekalu, ikany kakan nakoteten, ikany da kokediany. Kiswamau da atanyia akwatat nuka esabu.
Bobo da abu kiswamau alaro naka isasedotin, ka alaro nakapolon, ka ikirigin luka alaro, kiladaa ikiriginikec kaisinit.
Kosipok aŋolol kowai lokoteten loka etogo, kokide ari naka eŋalakimak.
Ipirin iarei, ka atiboi, ka akwes aarei nukejaas kuju opirin; ka iboyan iarei arapia atiboi aarei nukejaas kuju opirin;
ka akamamagan akwat aoŋon nuka iboyan iarei; ikokoron iarei luka akamamagan kaŋoliboi, arapia atiboi aarei nukejaas kuju opirin.
Abu kiswamau da aicegeria, kiswamau akalayan nuka aicegeria;
aŋolol adiopet, ka imoŋin itomon ka luarei kwapuke,
amoti da, ka iŋitia, ka igolun luka akiriŋ, ka iboroke kere, kiswamak Kuram papake Solomon ekabaka, luka etogo loka EJAKAIT luka aisinit naepwatat.
Kotata ekabaka kes kApuuton naka Yorodan, kolupe loejai kidiŋ Sukot ka Sereda.
Kwaŋin kiswama Solomon iboro ŋul kere luipu noi: naarai mam kepedorit adumun alaŋir naka aisinin.
ka ipirin lukatalai ka atalaikec, tetere enokete kwape ajaar aicorakinet koiŋaren kaneinerenenere akirot, luka esabu loelai.
Ka aturo, ka atalai, ka arideta, nuka esabu, eebo, esabu loejok cut;

ka aitudeŋeta, ka atanyia, ka akaalei, ka atuba nuigaete ekurwon, nuka esabu loelai: neelomarere togo, ikiriginike lukotoma luka aibois nakalaunan noi, ka ikirigin luka etogo, kes luka eyekalu, keraas luka esabu.
Kotukonokinos ituŋa kere luka Isirael mama ejai ekabaka kopucit, lokejai kolap lokikanyetekaarei.
Kopotu imakio kere luka Isirael, kodakut Ilebin asaduku.
Koyaut asaduku, ka ewema loka airiamunun, ka iboro kere lukalaunak lukejaas owema; kes iboro luapotu isasedotin Ilebin koyaut.
Kejai ekabaka Solomon ka ekodet kere loka Isirael, luatukonokinos mama ejai ŋesi, koiŋaren kasaduku, einanakinete imerekekin ka imoŋin, lumam epedorio alimun karaida aimarun kanuka aipues.
Kitolomasi isasedotin asaduku naka aitutuket naka EJAKAIT aiboisike, neinerenenere akirot, aibois nakalaunan noi, kwap kabebenoka nuka ikerubin.
Naarai kigararas ikerubin abebenokakec kuju aibois naka asaduku, korapias ikerubin asaduku ka adaketake.
Kewojak adaketa tetere etakani esaŋekec kasaduku koiŋaren kaneinerenenere akirot; konye mam ketakanete kokiŋa: ejai nepenen, kiton lolo.
Amamei ibore kotoma asaduku dimarai amor aarei nuabu Musa kibwaik koKoreb, nakitutukio EJAKAIT aitutuket kaidwe luka Isirael, nakelomuniata koMisiri.
Kosodi kanen, kedaut isasedotin alomun kaibois nakalaunan, (naarai apotu isasedotin kere lukejaas nen kitalaunos, komam ericito abeanakinikec;

bobo da kobwaata Ilebin lukeraas ikayook kowai lokokide loka etem, kes kere, Asap, ka Keman, ka Yedutun, ka odwekec ka iinacanakec, konapito ebaputa loejok, kojaas kaisinin nueruosi ka isabulin ka adeudeun; ido isasedotin akwatat ka akaisaarei nepepe kakes kokusete arupepen:)

Kosodi do kanen, keraut ikakutak arupepen ka ikayook bala ediopet, aisiirario eporoto ediopet aiturit ka aimal EJAKAIT; kitonyoutu kesi iporotoikec nepepe karupepen ka aisinin nueruosi ka lueruosi kere, kituritos EJAKAIT ebe,
“Naarai ejok ŋesi:
naarai ejaenena akeitim ikar kere”:
kosodi do kilelebun edou togo, ŋes etogo loka EJAKAIT.
Mam isasedotin apotu kopedosi aibwo aijaanakin kanuka edou: naarai kilelebun aibuses naka EJAKAIT togo loka Edeke.
“Abala EJAKAIT ebe iboienenei ŋesi kamuton naejesi ŋaŋ.
Konye abu eoŋ kadukok jo etogo loiboionono,
ka aibois naiboieneno ijo ikar kere.”
Kibelokin ekabaka, kilipak ekodet kere loka Isirael arereŋ: kobwo da ekodet kere loka Isirael.
Kotema ŋesi atiar, “Kituritete EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael, loabu kiner kakeituk mama ejai Daudi papaka, ido kitodol da kakekanin ebe,

ageun kapaaran naketolomunia ikatuŋa kakwap nako Misiri, mam abu kaseu ere katekerin kere nuka Isirael aiduk etogo, tetere ejaun nen ekakiror: kwabo mam abu kaseu etuŋanan araun lokapolon loka ikatuŋa Isirael.
Konye abu kaseu Yerusalem, tetere ejaun nen ekakiror; abu kaseu Daudi da apolokin ikatuŋa Isirael.
Abu Daudi papaka koomite kotauke adukokin ekiror loka EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael, etogo.
Konye abu EJAKAIT kotema Daudi papaka atiar, ‘Naarai iwomit ijo kotaukon adukokin ekakiror etogo, iswama ejok aomit kotaukon:
konye mam jo iduki etogo; konye okokukon, loelomuni kakuanakon, ŋes edukokini ekakiror etogo.’
Etodol EJAKAIT akekirot naabu kiner; naarai anyou eoŋ aibois naka Daudi papaka, eboikini oicoloŋ loka Isirael, kwape esumunia EJAKAIT, adukok ekiror loka EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael, etogo.
Nepenen da ebwaik asaduku, naejai aitutuket naka EJAKAIT kotomake, naetutuki ŋesi kidwe luka Isirael.”

(Naarai abu Solomon kiswamau abwois naka aisinit, naeoj ikubitin ikany, alalauke ikubitin ikany, amukururuke ikubitin iuni, kosipok kidiŋ alaro; kobwo kokujuke, kokukokin kakuninike kakonyen nuka ekodet kere loka Isirael, korio akekanin kuju:)

Kotema ŋesi atiar, “Wu EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael, emamei Edeke loiputosi kajo, toma akuj arai kakwap; loitodolenenei aitutuket ka aitim kikonikejaanakinak, luelosenenete kakonyenekon kikecetauon kere:
loitodolik ekonikejaanakinan Daudi papaka ŋun nuibu kisumun: eebo, ibu kiner kaitukukon, itodolo da kakanikon, kwape ejaatar lolo.

Aso do, wu EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael, kitodolik ekonikejaanakinan Daudi papaka, nuibu kisumun, ebe, ‘Mam kimamikini ijo etuŋanan loiboikin oicoloŋ loka Isirael kakonyeneka; arai kito ecoito ikonidwe ekecerot, alosenen okisilaka kwape ilosenenoo ijo kakonyeneka.’
Aso do, wu EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael, kitogogoŋoi akonikirot, nakilimokini ekonikejaanakinan Daudi.
Konye kocam ijo ailip naka ekonikejaanakinan, ka aiŋaiŋake, wu EJAKAIT Ekadeke, akiirar aimony ka ailip nailipi ekonikejaanakinan kakonyenekon:
kokwenyenenete akonikonyen asesen etogo lo apaaran ka akuare, ŋes aibois nakolo ilimit ebe ibwaikini nen ekonikiror; akiirar ailip nailipi ekonikejaanakinan kaibois kana.
Kiiraranari da aiŋaiŋa naka ekonikejaanakinan, ka naka ikonituŋa Isirael, nailipenenata kesi kaibois kana: eebo, kiiranari ijo kaiboisikon, ŋes akuj; ido naipupununio, kisionie.
“Arai kediak etuŋanan kama ejai eidunyeteke, kisiyapoikinoi ŋes aiyaposit, ebuni ŋesi aiyapo keiŋaren ketemukon togo lo:
kopupununei do ijo ijai toma akuj, kiswama, kotubok ikonikejaanakinak, kitokokol ikaronon, aitoboŋikin ekepone akouke; kitojok da ikadoliton, ainakin ŋes kwape ejaar adoliteke.
kopupununei do ijo ijai toma akuj, kisionie aronis naka ikonituŋa Isirael, kinyaku kes bobo akwap nakiinakinit kes ka lukapapaakec.

kopupununei do ijo ijai toma akuj, kisionie aronis naka ikonikejaanakinak, ka naka ikonituŋa Isirael, nakisisianakinia ijo kes erot loejok loibusakinit kes aloseneno: kitetep akiru akwapukon, naibu koinak ikonituŋa araun airumet.
ŋiniilip ka niniinaina kere nailipi ituŋanan kere, arai ikonituŋa Isirael kere, yenejeni ŋinituŋanan atularike ka aburunike, korio akekanin mama ejai etogo lo:
kopupununei do ijo ijai toma akuj aiboisikon, kisionie, koropi ŋinituŋanan kwape ejaatar iponesioke kere, yenijeni ijo etauke; (naarai ijo, ijo bon, ijeni itauon luka idwe luka ituŋa:)
tetere kiyoŋete jo, alosenen korotinikon apaarasia kere nuiboienenoto kesi kakwap nakiinakinit lukapapaakosi.

kopupununei do ijo ijai toma akuj, ŋes aiboisikon, kiswama kwape ejaatar kere nukiworoi imoit jo; tetere ejenunete ituŋasinei kere luka akwap ekonikiror, koyoŋito jo, kwape kiyoŋitotor ikonituŋa Isirael, tetere ejenunete da ebe emaikinitai etogo lo loadukit eoŋ ekonikiror.
“Arai kelomasi ituŋakon aitiji lukasurupokec, korot kere loijukari ijo kes, kilipete mama ijai kiteete ere lo lokiseuni ijo, ka etogo loadukokinit eoŋ ekonikiror;
kopupununei do ijo ijai toma akui akeceilip ka akeceiŋaiŋa, kisigalik akecekirot.
arai do keomoomata kesi kakwap naejoreoritai, kibelokinos bobo, kiŋaiŋaata ijo kakwap naejoreoritai ebe, ‘Kidiaka isio, kiswama nukepali, kikwaik erono’;

arai keboŋut mama ijai ijo kikecetauon kere, kaijarakec kere, kakwap naka aijoreoriokec, kama kijoreoritai, kilipete kiteete akwapukec, nakiinakinit lukapapaakec, ka ere lokiseuni ijo, ka etogo loadukokinit eoŋ ekonikiror:
kopupununei do ijo ijai toma akuj, ŋes aiboisikon, akeceilip ka akeceiŋaiŋa, kisigalik akecekirot; kisionie ikonituŋa luapotu kodiakasi kamakon.
Wu Ekadeke, keŋaiŋait, kokwenyenenete akonikonye, kitoik da akoniki ailip nailipitai kaibois kana.
Wu EJAKAIT Edeke, konapitos isasedotinikon aitajario, kiyalamikis lukalaunakakon ajokis.
kiitu aitim naka Daudi ekonikejaanakinan.”
Mam apedorete isase dotin alomar togo loka EJAKAIT, naarai kilelebun aibuses naka EJAKAIT togo loka EJAKAIT.
Kosesenata idwe kere luka Isirael, naabunio akim, kojaun aibuses naka EJAKAIT togo; kokukumoto, kituluroto akecekonyen kwap neitutuitoi, komaata, kimalata EJAKAIT ebe,
“Naarai ejok;
naarai ejaenena akeitim ikar kere.”
Abu ekabaka Solomon koinak asuban imoŋin ilukumin akaisaarei ka luarei, ka imerekekin ilukumin akwatat ka ilukumin akaisaarei, Kwaŋin kotiaku ekabaka ka ituŋa kere etogo loka Edeke.

Kobwaata isasedotin, kwape ejaar aswamukec; Ilebin da, ejaas kiboro lueruos luka EJAKAIT, luabu Daudi ekabaka kiswamau aimalaa EJAKAIT, naarai ejaenena akeitim ikar kere, nakituritor Daudi kotoma aijaanakinikec; kokuta isasedotin arupepen koiŋarenikec; kobwaata do luka Isirael kere.
Kapaaran nakikanyetekauni kojaun atukonokin nakayamakin: naarai koricito atiakunio naka etem apaarasia akanykaarei, ka epucit apaarasia akanykaarei.
Kapaaran naka akaisaarei ka nuuni naka elap lokikanyetekaarei kotwara ŋesi ituŋa alosit owemanakec, elelete, kiyalamas kotauon ajokis kere naabu EJAKAIT kitodik Daudi, ka Solomon, ka Isirael iketuŋa.
Kitaanyikin EJAKAIT Solomon kuare, kotema ŋes atiar, “Eira eoŋ ailipikon, aseu aibois na araun ekatogo loka asuban.
Arai kagol eoŋ akuj komam ejaun akiru, arai ecorakini emaase ainyam akwap, arai kejuka atular otuŋaka;

arai kitasonikinos ikatuŋa luemaikinitai ekakiror, kilipete, komoete akakonyen, kibelokinos anyoun koponesiokec lukaronok; kasodi do eoŋ apupokin kes kajai toma akuj, esionie kes aronisikec, etaŋaleuni da akwapukec.
Ekwenyunete do akakonyen, etoikini akaki ailip nailipeneneo kaibois kana.
Naarai aseu eoŋ etogo lo, etalau da, tetere ejaunun nen ekakiror ikar kere: ejaununos neo akakonye ka etauka tiritir.
Ka jo da arai ilosenenei kakonyeneka kwape alosenenoo Daudi papakon, iswamaenenei kwape ejaatar kere nukecorak jo, iricenenei ikakisila ka itubesiaka;
kasodi eoŋ aiticat eicoloŋ loka ajakanutukon, kwape ketutukio kaDaudi papakon ebe, ‘Mam kimamikini ijo etuŋanan araun ekayaiton loka Isirael.’
kasodi eoŋ arutuni kes kaliasiokec kakwapuka naabu kainak kes; acakari etogo lo, laetalauni kanuka ekakiror, kakonyeneka, etarauni ŋes awarag ka amorosit kotuŋa kere.
Etogo lo da, lotii etia nen, eumokini ŋinituŋanan yenitori, kobala ebe, ‘Kanukinyo eswamakinia EJAKAIT akwap na kwaŋin, ka etogo lo da?’

Eboŋokinete do ebe, ‘Naarai apatu kojalata EJAKAIT, Edeke loka lukapapaakec, lokitolomuni kes kakwap nako Misiri, korokut icedekesio, komaata kes kijaanakis kes: kanuka ŋun ŋes ainunia kes aronis na kere.’ ”
ireria luabu Kuram koinak Solomon, koduk Solomon kes, kisiboik idwe luka Isirael ŋina.
Kodukok Tadumor amodiŋ, ka ireria kere lukainad luadukokini Kamat.
Koduk da Bet-koron Ioimukurur, ka Bet-koron loijesara, ireria luabwaitai, lukejaas arwatatin, ka ikirigin, ka atiketa;

ka Baalat, ka ireria kere lukainad lukejaas ka Solomon, ka ireria kere luka agalinike, ka ireria luka ikebwanenokoke, ka kere luakoto Solomon aiduk aisiyalamikinor kotoma Yerusalem, ka Lebanon, ka akwap kere naka airumuke.
Ituŋa kere da luedeunos luka Ikitin, ka Imorain, ka Iperisin, ka Ikibin, ka Iyebusin, lumam keraas luka Isirael;
luka idwekec luedeunos kakes kakwap, lumam idwe luka Isirael emudiara, kolemununei Solomon ikitubusiana kamakec, kiton lolo.
Konye mam abu Solomon kitubulesene idwe luka Isirael kanuka akeswam; konye keraas kesi ikajiok, ka ikapolok luka ikapolokoke, ka ikapolokitok luka agalinike ka ikebwanenokoke.
Lu kes ikapolok lukapolok luka ekabaka Solomon, kes akwat aarei ka akaisakany, luayaitos ituŋa.
Kosodi Solomon ainakin ainakineta nuicweio mama ejai EJAKAIT kotem loka EJAKAIT, loaduki kiŋaren kaneelomarere,

kwape kibusakinitor nuka ŋinipaaran, koinanakini kwape ajaar aicorakinet naka Musa, ka nukasabaton, ka napilamununei elap, kopucin lueseunitai, irwan auni ŋolikaru, kopucit loka emugati lomam itubuunitoi, kopucit loka asabaton, kopucit da loka iswamin.

Kitemok, kwape ajaar aicorakinet naka Daudi papake, abeanakin naka isasedotin kaijaanakinikec, ka Ilebin kaswamukec, aiturit, ka aijaanakin isasedotin kwape epudar aswam naka ŋinipaaran: ikagolok da kabeanakinikec korutei kere: naarai abu Daudi etuŋanan loka Edeke kicorak kwaŋin.
Mam apotu konyout kaicorakinet naka ekabaka mama ejaas isasedotin ka Ilebin kadiokirot kere, ka nuka iboro luka akais nuipu da.
Kitemokinoi aswam kere naka Solomon kiton apaaran naka apetetait naka etogo loka EJAKAIT, kiton da neadaunia. Kwaŋin kitodoloi etogo loka EJAKAIT.

Kijukak Kuram ŋes kakanin nuka ibulesinike ameerin ka ibulesin luajenete aŋolol; kouparos kaibulesin luka Solomon alosit Opir, koomata kaŋina atalatan akwat aoŋon ka akaisakany nuka esabu, koyaut mama ejai ekabaka Solomon.
Kitejenu Solomon akiro kere nukiŋisit ŋesi: amamei akirot naaponi kimunonikinai Solomon namam kitejenunit ŋes.
Kedau akabaka naka Seba aanyun acoa naka Solomon, ka etogo lokeduki,

inyamat da lukomesake, ka eiboie loka ikebulesin, ka aijaanakin naka ikekejaanakinak, ka ikecenapen; ka ikekaliak da, ka ikecenapen; ka eititiriake lokedokanaria togo loka EJAKAIT; kimwokolikin eketau.
Kotema ŋesi ekabaka atiar, “Akirot naabu kapupunite kakwapuka kerai nakabeit naka aswamisiokon, ka akonicoa da.
Kwabo mam abu keyu akirokec, aitodol naabunio, koanyut akakonye: ido koany, mam kalimokinitai atutubet naka apolou naka acoakon: itelekar eemut loabu keira.
Elakara ikonituŋa, elakara da ikonikejaanakinak lu, luebwoenenete tiritir kakonyenekon, kopupete akonicoa.

Kituritete EJAKAIT Ekonideke, loeyalamikin kanukon, adakakin jo oicoloŋoke, araun ekabaka loka EJAKAIT Ekonideke: naarai abu Ekonideke komina Isirael, aiticat kes ikar kere, ŋes kituluoria jo ekabakakec, aiswamaenen nukabeit ka nuedolito.”

Koinak ŋesi ekabaka atalatan akwatat ka akaisaarei nuka esabu, ka lueur maa luipu noi, ka amor nuka akais nuipu: mam eanyuna bobo lueur maa lueriakas kaŋul luainakini akabaka naka Seba ekabaka Solomon.
Abu ekabaka kiswamau itutio luka etogo loka EJAKAIT, ka luka etogo loka ekabaka, ka adeudeun ka isabulin luka ikayook: mam apeŋo eanyuna lueputos kaŋul kakwap nako Yuda.
Kosodi ekabaka Solomon ainakin akabaka naka Seba iboro kere lukipuda ŋesi, ŋinibore kere yenikilipi, adepar luabu ŋesi koinu ekabaka. Kwaŋin kibelokin do, koboŋo ŋesi akwapuke, ka ikekejaanakinak.
Alaŋiru naka esabu loainunitai Solomon kokaru ediopet kerai atalatan akwat akanykape ka akaisakanykape ka nukanykape nuka esabu;
adepar luainunete ikemutunok ka ikagwelanarak; apotu ikabakan kere luka Arabia ka ikayaitok luka akwap koinut Solomon esabu ka epuesa.
Kiswamau ekabaka Solomon ibukui lukapolok akwat aarei luka esabu loerukuk: ŋolibuku lokapolon abu koya isekelin akwat akanykape luka esabu loerukuk.
Kiswamau ŋesi ibukui akwat auni luka esabu loerukuk; ŋolibuku abu koya isekelin akwat auni luka esabu: kibwaik ekabaka kes togo loka ikito luka Lebanon.
Bobo da kiswamau ekabaka eicoloŋ lokapolon loka ikel luka etom, kiladaa ŋes kesabu loelai.
Kejaas adoketa akanykape oicoloŋ, kojai da iicoloŋ yenika akeje yenika esabu, yenirotakinio keicoloŋ, kejaas akanin epuai kepuai kaibois neiboiere, ka iŋatunyo iarei luabwoete kawaitin nuka akanin.
Kobwaata iŋatunyo itomon ka luarei epuai kepuai kadoketa akanykape; amamei loaputos kaŋol kajakanut kere.
Iboro kere Jumaset luka ekabaka Solomon keraas luka esabu, ka iboro kere lukotogo loka ikito luka Lebanon keraas luka esabu loelai: mam epuesa apodoi araut ibore kapaarasia nuka Solomon.

Naarai kejaas ekabaka ameerin nualosenenete Tarusis nepepe kibulesin luka Kuram: apotu ameerin nuka Tarusis kopotu atipet ŋulukar iuni, koyaut esabu, ka epuesa, ka ikel luka etom, ka icomion, ka akweny nuajaas ikorio lukijesesinei luipu.
Komoata ikabakan kere luka akwapin aanyun Solomon, akiirar acoake, nakibwaikinit Edeke otauke.
Koinununete kesi ninlrunanan ainakineteke, iboro luka epuesa, ka iboro luka esabu, ka inapen, ka lujiis, ka lueur maa, ka ibalasin ka inyubun, esolo loka ŋolikaru.
Kejaas Solomon aiboisio alukumin aoŋon nuka ibalasin ka agalin, ka ikebwanenok ilukumin itomon ka luarei, lukibwaikinit oreria luka agalin, ka Yerusalem da nekejai ekabaka.
Kirum ŋesi ikabakan kere anyoun koCor kiton akwap naka Ipilisitian, kiton oikor loko Misiri.
Kitarau ekabaka epuesa araut bala amor koYerusalem, kitarau iresia da bala ikito luka isukumorin luejaas apuutona, kanuka aipues.
Koinununai Solomon ibalasin koMisiri ka akwapin kere.
Kirumak Solomon Isirael kere ko Yerusalem ikar akaisaoŋon.
Kojotoor Solomon kalukapapaake, kidaikinai ore loka Daudi papake: kirum Rekoboam okokuke aiboisike.
Kosodi kanen, kepupu Yeroboam okoku loka Nebat ŋun, (naarai kejai Misiri, neakeriarit anyoun kakonyen nuka ekabaka Solomon,) koboŋu do Yeroboam koMisiri.
Kijukasi konyarautu ŋes; kobu Yeroboam ka Isirael kere, kinerata ka Rekoboam atiar,
“Abu papakon kitalaŋir ajookotokosi: aso do kitebeben aswam naetiono naka papakon, ka ajookotoke naelaŋir naebwaikinit mamakosi, isio da kijaanakini jo.”
Kotema kes atiar, “Koboŋutu neajai eoŋ ketuboros apaarasia auni.” Koloto ituŋa.
Kobalas ŋes ebe, “Arai kisianiar ijo kaneejaas ituŋa ŋul, kisiyalamik kes, kolimok akiro nuejok, aso eraunos kesi ikonikejaanakinak ikar kere.”
Konye kola ainerun naka imakio naapesikinito ŋes, kineru kikatumunak luapolounete kaŋes, luabwoete kakonyeneke.
Kotema kes atiar, “Ibalasi bo yesi ai, kaboŋokis ituŋa ŋul, luapotu kabalas eoŋ ebe, ‘Kitebeben ajookot nakibwaikini papakon mamakosi?’ ”

Kotemasi ikatumunak luapolounete kaŋes atiar, “Kolimok ituŋa ŋul lukibalas jo ebe, ‘Abu papakon kitalaŋir ajookotokosi, konye jo kitebeben ŋes kamakosi’; ilimokini kes kwanata ebe, ‘Ebur ekabokorit lodidi aitelekar aŋabet naka papake.
Aso do abu papaka kisibwok yes ajookot naelaŋir, eyatakini do eoŋ ajookotokus: abu papaka koswala yes kidas, konye eoŋ kaswalari yes kikiritona.’ ”
Aso kobu Yeroboam ka ituŋa kere mama ejai Rekoboam apaaran nakiwuniet, kwape ecorakinia ekabaka ebe, “Koboŋut bobo apaaran nakiwuniet.”
Koboŋok ekabaka ituŋa kaisiejakin: kola ekabaka Rekoboam ainerun naka imakio,
kinera kakes kwape ajaar ainerun naka ikatumunak ebe, “Abu papaka kitalaŋir ajookotokus, konye eoŋ eyatakini ŋes; abu papaka koswala yes kidas konye eoŋ kaswalari yes kikiritona.”
Aso mam abu ekabaka kopup ituŋa; naarai kerai akirot naabu Edeke koyau, tetere iticasi EJAKAIT akekirot, naabu kiner kama ka Akiya Esilonit mama ejai Yeroboam okoku loka Nebat.
Keanyu Isirael kere ebe mam abu ekabaka kopup kes, koboŋokis ituŋa ekabaka ebe,
“Anyoin akorakinetekosi kama ka Daudi?
Ido emamei sio airumet kotoma okoku loka Yese:
Ape ma ŋinituŋanan owemanakus, wu Isirael:
Daudi, koanyanar do ekonikek.”
Koloto do luka Isirael kere owemanakec.
Konye kirum Rekoboam idwe luka Isirael luiboiete koreria luka Yuda.
Kosodi ekabaka Rekoboam aijukar Kadoram, loapolokinit esolo: apotu idwe luka Isirael kibiribiroto ŋes kamor, kotwana, Kiwonya ekabaka Rekoboam adokar agalike, akerit Yerusalem.
Kwaŋin kipaliik do Isirael ekek loka Daudi, kiton lolo.
Konye kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ejai Semaia etuŋanan loka Edeke ebe,
“Kolimok Rekoboam okoku loka Solomon, ekabaka loka Yuda, ka Isirael kere luejaas koYuda ka Benyamin, ebe,
‘Inera EJAKAIT kwanata ebe, Mam ilosete, ido mam ijiikinos kikusiinacan; koboŋo ŋoltuŋanan togoke; naarai erai akirot na nakaŋ.’ ” Kosodete kopuput akiro nuka EJAKAIT, koboŋosi kasurokin Yeroboam.
Kiboikin Rekoboam Yerusalem, koduk ireria luka aigalikin koYuda.
Koduk do Ber-lekem, ka Etam, ka Tekoa,
ka Bet-sur, ka Soko, ka Adulam,
ka Gat, ka Maresa, ka Sip,
ka Adoraim, ka Lakis, ka Aseka,
ka Sora, ka Aiyalon, ka Keburon, luejaas ko Yuda ka Benyamin, ireria luebwaitai.
Kitogogoŋ ireria lukagogoŋ, kibwaik ikapolok roma, ka imono, ka akinyet ka ebino.
Kibwaik ibukui ka akwaras toma ŋolire kere, kitogogoŋ kes noi noi. Koraas Yuda ka Benyamin luke.
Kolosenenete isasedotin ka Ilebin mamake lukejaas koIsirael kere anyoun koikorukec kere.
Naarai kojalakis Ilebin ironyiakec ka airumetekec, kopotu Yuda ka Yerusalem: naarai apotu Yeroboam ka odweke kireŋeasi kes, kinyeis aijaanakin kwape isasedotin kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT.
Koseu ŋesi isasedotin luka aiboisio nuiceleleete, ka luka ikorwa, ka luka itak luabu ŋesi kiswamau.
Ido kotoma atekerin kere nuka Isirael, luebwaikinito itauonokec amoot EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael, apotu kotupasi Ilebin, kopotu Yerusalem ainakin asuban mama ejai EJAKAIT, Edeke loka lukapapaakec.
Kwaŋin kitogogoŋito ajakanut naka Yuda, kitogogoŋito Rekoboam okoku loka Solomon, ikar iuni: naarai kolosito korot loka Daudi ka Solomon ikar iuni.
Komany Rekoboam aberu, Makalat akoku naka Yerimot okoku loka Daudi, ka naka Abikail akoku naka Eliab okoku loka Yese:
kourik ŋes odwe; Yeus, ka Semaria, ka Sakam.
Kokau kaŋin komany Maaka akoku naka Abisalom; kourik ŋes Abiya, ka Atai, ka Sisa, ka Selomit.

Komina Rekoboam Maaka akoku naka Abisalom adepar akeŋor kere ka akebusian: (naarai komany aŋor atomon ka nukanykauni, ka abusian akaisakanykape, kouri idwe lusap akaisaarei ka lukanykauni ka lupesur akaisakanykape.)
Koseu Rekoboam Abiya okoku loka Maaka araun lokapolon, ŋes lokapolon koinacanake: naarai akoto aitaraun ŋes ekabaka.
Kiswama kacoa, kisiarak odweke kere anatar akwapin kere nuka Yuda ka Benyamin, toma ŋolire loebwaitai: koinak kes inyamat luipu. Komoik kes aŋor nuipu.
Kosodi kanen, kokaru lokikanyet loka ekabaka Rekoboam, kobu Sisak ekabaka loko Misiri asurokin Yerusalem, naarai apaasi kama ejai EJAKAIT.
Kejaas kagalin akwat atomon ka nuarei, ka ikebwanenok ilukumin akaisakanykape: ituŋa da luaupunos kaŋes anyoun koMisiri mam epedorio aimar; Ilubim, ka Isukiim, ka Itiopian.
Kirum ireria luebwaitai luka Yuda, kobu Yerusalem.

Kobu do Semaia enabi mama ejai Rekoboam, ka ikapolok luka Yuda, luatukonokina Yerusalem kanuka Sisak, kotema kes atiar, “Inera EJAKAIT kwanata ebe, Ipotu kojalata eoŋ, kanuka ŋun kenyeik yes da akan naka Sisak.”
Kosodete ikapolok luka Isirael ka ekabaka aitasonikin; kotemasi atiar, “Edolit EJAKAIT.”

Keanyu EJAKAIT ebe etasonikinos, kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ejai Semaia atiar, “Etasonikinos kesi; mam amudiari kes; konye ainakini kes adioitajario, mam akanyunyura ebukokinio Yerusalem kakan naka Sisak.
Konye do eraunos kesi ikekejaanakinak; tetere ejenunete aijaanakinika, ka aijaanakin naka ajakanuto nuka akwapin.”
Kiswamau ekabaka Rekoboam ibukui luka aisinin aiboisikec, kijaik akanin nuka ikapolok luka ikedarak, luedarete ekek loka etogo loka ekabaka.
Kosodi naalomanaria ekabaka togo loka EJAKAIT, kopotu ikedarak kodakanarete kes, kinyakanarete agola naka ikedarak.
Nakitasonikinor, kibelokin anyunyura naka EJAKAIT kamake, kinyek amudiar ŋes cut: bobo da kotakanut nuejok kotoma Yuda.
Kiswama nueroko, naarai mam ebwaikinit eketau amoot EJAKAIT.
Kojotoor Rekoboam kalukapapaake, aponi kidaikinai ore loka Daudi: kirum Abiya okokuke aiboisike.
Kirumak ikar iuni koYerusalem: ekiror loka totoke kerai Mikaia akoku naka Urielloka Gibea. Kejai ejie kidiŋ Abiya ka Yeroboam.
Kolot Abiya kajore naka ikajiok luetitiŋ, kes ituŋa ilukumin akwat aoŋon lueseunitai asurokin: kiderakin Yeroboam ejie kaŋes kituŋa ilukumin akwat akanykauni lueseunitai, lukeraas ikirigin luetitiŋ.
Kobwo Abiya komoru Semaraim loejai kakwap nakiukon naka Epuraim, kotema atiar, “Kopupokinai jo Yeroboam ka Isirael kere;
mam kereka ibusakinit yes ajenun ebe abu EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael koinak Daudi ajakanut naka Isirael ikar kere, ŋes, ka odweke kaitutuket naka abalaŋ?
Konye konyou Yeroboam okoku loka Nebat, ekejaanakinan loka Solomon okoku loka Daudi, kipaliik ekejakait.
Kotukonokinos ituŋa luutai mama ejai, odwe luka Belial, lukitogogoŋete asurokin Rekoboam okoku loka Solomon, korai Rekoboam esapat, loka etau loenonok, komam kepedori aitikokin kes.

Mam baca yes ipotu kireŋeasi isasedotin luka EJAKAIT, odwe luka Aaron, ka Ilebin, kodumut isasedotin kopone loka ituŋa lukacekwapin? Tape loebuni atiakun bon kemon lotobait ka imerekekin ikanykaarei, epedori araun esasedoti loka ŋul lumam eraas idekesio.
Konye do isio, EJAKAIT ŋes Edekekosi, mam sio kipou kajalata ŋes; kija isio ka isasedotin luijaanakinete EJAKAIT, odwe luka Aaron, ka Ilebin toma aswamukec:

icweikinete kesi ŋinitupuruc ka ŋinitiboŋ ainakineta nuicweio, ka lukisupurununo lueuru maa: inapanakinete kesi imugatin luka aitodikin omesa loesegaara; ka epir loka atalai loka esabu ka atalaike ainok ŋinitiboŋ: naarai kiric isio akiro nuka EJAKAIT Ewokodeke; konye ipotu yesi kojalata ŋes.

Ido koany, ejai Edeke kasio kiŋarenikinit, ka isasedotinike karupepen nuka elulu akusia elulu asurokin yes. Yes idwe luka Isirael, sirikisurokis EJAKAIT, Edeke loka lukapapaakus; naarai mam ikeriakaros.”
Konye kitolot Yeroboam ikaperunok kokaukec: kojaas kes kiŋaren ka Yuda, ka ikaperunok kaukec.
Keŋoliasi luka Yuda kau, koany, kejai ejie kiŋaren, kokaukec da: kiworoto mama ejai EJAKAIT, kokuta isasedotin arupepen.
Kosodete ituŋa luka Yuda eibwoŋ: napibwonas ituŋa luka Yuda, kosodi kanen, kodany Edeke Yeroboam ka Isirael kere kakonyen nuka Abiya ka Yuda.
Kokerata idwe luka Isirael kakonyen nuka Yuda: kijaik Edeke kes akanikec.
Koar Abiya ka ituŋake kes kearit loepol: kibiroros luaaritai luka Isirael ituŋa ilukumin akwat akany lueseunitai.
Kwaŋin kitonokokai idwe luka Isirael kapaarasia kaŋun, kipikosi idwe luka Yuda naarai kegoŋakina EJAKAIT, Edeke loka lukapapaakec.
Korukitor Abiya Yeroboam, kirum ireria kamake, Bet-el ka ireriake, ka Yesana ka ireriake, ka Epuron ka ireriake.
Mam bobo abu Yeroboam kogogoŋor kapaarasia nuka Abiya: kinom EJAKAIT ŋes, kotwana.
Konye kogogoŋor Abiya, komany aŋor atomon ka nuoŋon, kouri idwe lusap akaisaarei ka luarei, ka lupesur itomon ka lukanykape.
Aswamisio ace nuka Abiya, ka iponesioke, ka akiroke, iwadikatai oitabo loka enabi Ido.
Kiswama Asa nuejok ka nuedolito kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT Ekedeke:
naarai kolema ŋesi itemwan lumo, ka aiboisio nuiceleleete, kobilibil ipirin, kojepejep Aserim:
kicorak Yuda amoot EJAKAIT, Edeke loka lukapapaakec, ka aricenen ikisila ka aicorakineta.
Kolema da koreria kere luka Yuda aiboisio nuiceleleete ka aputosia nuka akoloŋ: kiyamakina ajakanut kakonyeneke.
Koduk ireria luebwaitai koYuda: naarai eyamakina akwap, amamei ejie kokar kaŋul; naarai abu EJAKAIT kisiyeŋu ŋes.

Naarai kotema ŋesi Yuda atiar, “Kadukoto ireria lu, kerigaut karwatatin, ka itogoi lueojak, ikirigin ka atiketa; eriŋa akwap ejai kakonyenewok, naarai kimoot oni EJAKAIT Ewokodeke; kimoot ŋes, abu ŋesi da kisiyeŋu oni kaŋoliwai.” Kosodete kodukoto, kokeriakaros.

Kejaas Asa kajore nakedakit ibukui ka akwaras, ilukumin akwat auni koYuda; koBenyamin da, lukedakitos ibukui ka aiket akabwai, ilukumin akwat aarei ka ilukumin akaisakanykauni: ŋul kere keraas ituŋa lukirigin luetitiŋ.
Kolom Sera Etiopiat asurokin kes ejaas kajore naka ilukumin elukumit, ka agalin akwat auni; kobu ŋesi Maresa.
Koloma do Asa airiamakin, kiderakinos ejie kaditot naka Sepata koMaresa.

Komonyak Asa EJAKAIT Ekedeke, kotema atiar, “EJAKAIT, emamei lokiŋarakini kilema ijo, kidiŋ ka lokagogoŋ ka loemamei agogoŋ; kiŋarakinai sio, wu EJAKAIT Ekosideke; naarai kigoŋakina jo, kokirorikon ŋes kilomunia asurokin ekodet lo loepol. Wu EJAKAIT, irai ijo Ekosideke; kinyek etuŋanan aipikor jo.”
Kodany do EJAKAIT Itiopian kakonyen nuka Asa, kakonyen nuka Yuda da; kokerata Itiopian.

Korukitor Asa ka ituŋa lukejaas kaŋes kiton Gerar: kibiroros luipu noi luka Itiopian komam epedorete aitaiara bonik; naarai amudiaros kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kakonyen nuka ajoreke da; koyaŋaasi luŋatuna luipu noi.
Kodanyata lukoreria kere luirimorito Gerar; naarai kobunoki kes etasuro loka EJAKAIT: koŋata ireria kere; naarai kejaas luŋatuna luipu tomakec.
Kipota da iweman luka ibaren, koŋatut amerekekin nuipu noi ka akaalai, koboŋosi Yerusalem.

koloma ŋesi airiamakin ka Asa, kotema ŋes atiar, “Kopupokinai, Asa, ka Yuda kere ka Benyamin: ejai EJAKAIT kayes, naijaatar yesi kaŋes; arai imootos ŋes, idumunete; konye arai iialete ŋes, ŋes da kijali.
Apak naepol amamei Isirael Edeke lokabeit, amamei da esasedoti loisisianakini, amameete da ikisila:
konye nakejaatar ocan kibelokinos mama ejai EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael, komoata ŋes, kodumutu ŋes.
Kapaarasia kwa amamei ainapakin ŋin yenelomari, karaida ŋin yenelomuni, konye kiyaloŋoŋoete noi luiboiete kere kakwapin.
Kobilibilunos, ateker kateker, ka ere ka ere: naarai kisiyaloŋoŋ Edeke kes katiokisio kere.
Konye kicata yesi, sirikijalijalakinos akusikanin: naarai eropio akusiswam.”
Kotukonok Yuda kere ka Benyamin, ka ŋul lukiboiororos kakes koEpuraim ka Manase, koSimeon da; naarai kobwota luipu kakesi mama ejai ŋesi koIsiraei, keanyutu kesi ebe ejai EJAKAIT Ekedeke kaŋes.
Kotukonokinos do koYerusalem kolap lokiwuniet, kokaru lokitomonet kakany loka airum naka Asa.
Koinakis EJAKAIT asuban kapaaran kaŋin, nuka luŋatuna luayaut, imoŋin akwat akanykaarei ka amerekekin alukumin akanykaarei.
Kolomasi toma aitutuket amoot EJAKAIT, Edeke loka lukapapaakec, kikecetauon kere ka akeceijar kere;
ebe da yeneŋeri amoot EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isiraei, eario, arai yenedit arai yenepol, arai ekiliokit arai aberu.
Kiyapoikis EJAKAIT keporoto loepol, keibwoŋ, karupepen, ka apeen.
Kisiyalamik Yuda kere aiyaposit: naarai apotu kiyapoto kitauonokec kere, komoata ŋes keimielakec kere; apotu kodumut ŋes: kisiyeŋu EJAKAIT kes kowaitin kere.
Konye mam aponi kolemarai aiboisio nuieeieleete koIsirael: konye kedolit etau loka Asa apaarasiake kere.
Kitoloma iboro togo loka Edeke luabu papake kotiakarite, ka iboro luabu ŋesi elopet kotiakarite, epuesa ka esabu ka iboro.
Amamei bobo ejie aitodol okaru loka akaisauni ka lukany loka airum naka Asa.
Kosodi Asa alemun epuesa ka esabu koboro luka akais nuipu luka etogo loka EJAKAIT, ka luka etogo loka ekabaka, kijukak Ben-kadad ekabaka loka Suria, loeboienenei koDamasiko, ebe,
“Ejai aitutuket kidiŋika kajo, kwape ajaar kidiŋ papaka ka papakon: koany, ejukakinit jo epuesa ka esabu; kolot, kobil aitutuketekon ka Baasa ekabaka loka Isirael, tetere enyouni ŋesi kaneajai eoŋ,”
Kiira Ben-kadad ekabaka Asa, kijuka ikapolok luka ajoresioke asurokin ireria luka Isirael; kodanyata luko Iyon, ka Dan, ka Abelmaim, ka ireria kere luka aiŋad luka Naputali.
Kosodi kanen, kepupu Baasa ŋun, kinyeik aiduk Rama, kitanaŋ akeswam.
Kosodi Asa ekabaka ayaŋaar Yuda kere; koyaŋaasi amor nuka Rama, ka akitoke, nuabu Baasa kodukitor; kodukio Geba ka Misipa.
Mam kereka Itiopian ka Ilubim ajore nakos, kejaas kagalin ka ikebwanenok luipu noi noi? Konye naarai ibu kogoŋakina EJAKAIT, abu ŋesi kijaik kes akanikon.
Naarai enolenoleete akonye nuka EJAKAIT anatar akwap kere, aitodikin akegogoŋ kanuka ŋul luetenito itauonokec kakonyeneke. Iswama nukabaŋaanut kaŋun; naarai agear kwana ijaun kaiiiisio.”
Kosodi Asa anyunyurikin ekadwaran, kibwaik ŋes aidaris; naarai kisiopak ŋes kanuka akirot kaŋin. Koroik Asa ice kotuŋa kapak kaŋin.
Ido koany, aswamisio nuka Asa, nusodit ka nukawasia, koany, iwadikatai oitabo loka ikabakan luka Yuda ka Isirael.
Kokaru loka akaisauni ka lukanykaoŋon loka airumuke kodekakin Asa akejeke; kepol noi adekake: konye toma adekake mam abu komoote EJAKAIT, konye mama ejaas imurwok.
Kojotoor Asa kalukapapaake, kotwana kokaru loka akaisaoŋon ka lodiopet loka airumuke.

Aponi kidaikinai adiopet katesinake elopet, nuabokit kanuke ore loka Daudi, kiteperikinoi oitada loeleleba auresio nuejok ka lueur maa luegelegela luetemokinitoi kapirianut naka emurwon: kisupuronokinete luipu noi.
Kirum Yekosapat okokuke aiboisike, kogogoŋior asurokin Isirael.
Kibwaik irioŋeta koreria kere luebwaitai koYuda, kibwaik iserikalen kakwap naka Yuda, oreria da luka Epuraim luabu Asa papake kirum.
Kojai EJAKAIT kaYekosapat, naarai alosenenei korotin lusodit luka Daudi papaake, mam abu komoote neejaas Ibaalim;
konye komoote Edeke loka papake, kolosenenei kaicorakinetake, mam atupit nukiswamaenenei Isirael.
Kanuka ŋun kiticat EJAKAIT ajakanut kakanike; koinu Yuda kere ainakineta mama ejai Yekosapat; kojau ŋesi kabar ka aibuses naepol.
Kitonyounoi eketau orotin luka EJAKAIT: bobo da kolema aiboisio nuiceleleete ka Aserim koYuda.
nepepe kakes da Ilebin, Semaia, ka Netania, ka Sebadia, ka Asakel, ka Semiramot, ka Yekonatan, ka Adoniya, ka Tobiya, ka Tob-adoniya, Ilebin; nepepe kakes da Elisama ka Yekoram, isasedotin.
Kisisianakinete koYuda, kejaas keitabo loka ikisila luka EJAKAIT; kitoroto anatar ireria kere luka Yuda, kisisianakinete ituŋa.

Koyaut ice ka Ipilisitian ainakineta mama ejai Yekosapat, ka esolo loka epuesa; koinut Iarabun da ŋes isipanin, imerekekin ilukumin ikanykaarei ka akwat akanykaarei, ka ikorwa ilukumin ikanykaarei ka akwat akanykaarei.
Kiyatanakin apolou naka Yekosapat apoloor noi; koduk itogoi luegozon ka ireria lukainad koYuda.
Kejaas ŋes aswamisio nuipu koreria luka Yuda; ka ikajiok, ituŋa lukirigin luetitiŋ, koYerusalem.
Lo ŋes etiaikec kwape ajaatar ikekia luka lukapapaakec; luka Yuda, ikapolok luka ilukumin; Adana lokapolon, ka ituŋa lukirigin luetitiŋ ilukumin akwat auni nepepe kaŋes:
kotupite ŋes Yekokanan ekapolon; ka ilukumin akwat aarei ka ilukumin akaisakanykauni nepepe kaŋes.
Kotupite ŋes Amasia okoku loka Sikiri, loabu kijaikin ketau loejok mama ejai EJAKAIT; ka ituŋa lukirigin luetitiŋ ilukumin akwat aarei nepepe kaŋes.
Luka Benyamin; Eliada etuŋanan lokirigi Ioetitin, ka ilukumin akwat aarei nepepe kaŋes lukekapito akabwai ka ibukui:
kotupite ŋes Yekosabad, ka ilukumin akwatat ka ilukumin akaisakanykauni nepepe kaŋes luetemokino ejie.
Ŋul kes luejaanakinete ekabaka kogelara ŋul luebwaikinit ekabaka oreria luebwaitai anatar Yuda kere.
Ketuboros ikar kolot ŋesi neejai Akab Samaria. Koarak Akab ŋes ka ituŋa lukejaas kaŋes amerekekin ka imoŋin luipu, kilip ŋes aupar alosit Ramot-gilead.
Kotema Akab ekabaka loka Isirael Yekosapat ekabaka loka Yuda atiar, “Kiupar tope ijo keoŋ alosit Ramot-gilead?” Koboŋok ŋes ebe, “Arai eoŋ kwape iraar ijo, ikatuŋa kwape ituŋakon; kiupari kajo ojie.”

Kosodi ekabaka loka Isirael atukonokin inabin, ituŋa akwat aoŋon, kotema kes atiar, “Kilosi kereka aitiji Ramot-gilead, arai bo kenye?” Kotemasi kesi atiar, “Kolot, naarai kijaik Edeke ŋes akan naka ekabaka.”
Konye kotema Yekosapat atiar, “Emamei bobo da enabi ece loka EJAKAIT, keŋitata ŋes?”

Kotema ekabaka loka Isirael Yekosapat atiar, “Eriŋa ejai etuŋanan ediopet lokipedori aiŋitunia EJAKAIT: konye asac eoŋ ŋes; naarai mam kadwaranakini eoŋ nukajokak, dimarai ca nupekaronok duc: ŋes ŋol Mikaia okoku loka Imila.” Kotema Yekosapat atiar, “Kinyek ekabaka einer kwaŋin.”
Kosodi ekabaka loka Isirael anyaraun ekapolokiton, kotema ŋes atiar, “Kisunyite koom Mikaia okoku loka Imila.”

Kiboikin ekabaka loka Isirael ka Yekosapat ekabaka loka Yuda ŋinituŋanan oicoloŋoke, konapitos inapenekec, kiboikinos kaibois naelal neelomarere orute loka Samaria; kodwarata inabin kere kakonyenekec.
Kotatau Sedekia okoku loka Kenaana amumwara nuka asua, kotema atiar, “Inera EJAKAIT kwanata ebe, Iremio nu Isurian, aitodol neadaunotor kesi.”
Kodwarata inabin kere kwaŋin ebe, “Kolot Ramot-gilead, kisirereŋio: naarai ijaikini EJAKAIT ŋes akan naka ekabaka.”

Kosodi ekiyakia loabu kolot anyaraun Mikaia kotema ŋes atiar, “Koany, ejokuka akiro nuka inabin kaituk adiopet mama ejai ekabaka: keŋaiŋait, koputokinos do akonikirot kwape kadiopet ka nukec, kiner nuejok.”
Kotema Mikaia atiar, “Kwape ejaria EJAKAIT, nuelimuni Ekadeke, ŋupeŋun eneri.”
Kedolu ŋesi mama ejai ekabaka, kotema ekabaka ŋes atiar, “Mikaia, kilosi kereka isio Ramot-gilead ejie, arai bo kenyek?” Kotema atiar, “Koloto yesi, kisirereŋio; kijaikinio kes akanikus.”
Kotema ekabaka ŋes atiar, “Irwan imwaasi ai kesiyapo jo ebe Sirikiilimok eoŋ adiokirot dimarai nukabeit kokiror loka EJAKAIT?”
Kotema atiar, “Abu kaany Isirael kere isiarakina koroŋan, kwape amerekekin nuemameete ekecokon: kotema EJAKAIT atiar, ‘Emameete nu ejakait; koboŋosi kesi ŋinituŋanan oreke inapakina.’ ”
Kotema ekabaka loka Isirael Yekosapat atiar, “Mam abu kalimok jo ebe mam kadwaranakini eoŋ nukajokak, dimarai ca nupekaronok?”
Kotema atiar, “Kanuka ŋun kiirasi yesi akirot naka EJAKAIT: abu kaany EJAKAIT iboie koicoloŋoke, kobwoi da ajore kere naka akuj kakanike nakoteten ka nakokediany.
Kotema EJAKAIT atiar, ‘Iŋai iŋalaari Akab ekabaka loka Isirael, tetere elosi aibirokin Ramot-gilead?’ Kotema ediopet kopone lo, ece da kopone ece.
Kolom do emoyo, kobwo kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kotema atiar, ‘Eŋalaari eoŋ ŋes.’ Kotema EJAKAIT ŋes atiar, ‘Kinyo?’
Kotema atiar, ‘Alomari, araun emoyo loka aiŋal kaituke nuka inabinoke kere.’ Kotema atiar, ‘Iŋalaari ijo ŋes, ido ipedori: koloma, kiswama kwaŋin.’
Aso do koany, ebwaik EJAKAIT emoyo loka aiŋal aituke nuka inabinokon lu; kinerak EJAKAIT jo aronis.”
Kotema Mikaia atiar, “Koany, ianyuni kapaaran kaŋin, nailomaria agola nakotoma aiŋop.”
Kotema ekabaka loka Isirael atiar, “Kikamutu Mikaia, kinyakakis ŋes Amon ekayaiton loka ere, mama ejai Yoas da okoku loka ekabaka;
kolimokis ebe, ‘Inera ekabaka kwanata ebe, Kibwaikisi ekesa lo aidaris, kitanyamete ŋes inyamat luka aiticanitoi ka akipi nuka aiticanitoi, aitodol neaboŋunio eoŋ kainapakin.’ ”
Kotema Mikaia atiar, “Arai teni kibonu ijo kainapakin, mam EJAKAIT inerit kamaka.” Kotema atiar, “Kiirasi yesi ituŋa, yes kere.”
Koloto do ekabaka loka Isirael ka Yekosapat ekabaka loka Yuda Ramotgilead.
Kotema ekabaka loka Isirael Yekosapat ekabaka loka Yuda atiar, “Etegelikini eoŋ bon, alosi ojie; konye konap ijo inapenekon.” Kitegelikin ekabaka loka Isirael bon; koloto ojie.
Abu ekabaka loka Suria kicorakinite ikapolokitok luka agalinike ebe, “Sirikijioto ka ludidik karaida kalukapolok, dimarai kito ekabaka loka Isirael bon.”

Kosodi kanen, keanyut ikapolokitok luka agalin Yekosapat, kobalas ebe, “Ŋes ekabaka loka Isirael.” Kanuka ŋun korioto aitiji ŋes; konye kodelo Yekosapat, kiŋarak EJAKAIT ŋes; kibelok Edeke kes anyoun kamake.
Kosodi kanen, keanyut ikapolokitok luka agalin ebe mere ŋes ekabaka loka Isirael, koboŋut karukitor ŋes.

Kiket ediotuŋanan akabwake komam elosikinit, kogum ekabaka loka Isirael neiriamitotor inapeneke lukasua: kanuka ŋun kotema ekereŋean agalike atiar, “Kibelok akanikon, kodaka eoŋ kajore; naarai kemusuŋi noi.”
Kosisior ejie kapaaran kaŋin; konye kiganakin ekabaka loka Isirael agalike asurokin Isurian aitodol eboŋ: kapak naalomaria akoloŋ kotwana.
Koboŋo Yekosapat ekabaka loka Yuda togoke Yerusalem inapakina.

Koloma Yeku okoku loka Kanani ekadwaran airiamakin kaŋes, kotema ŋesi ekabaka Yekosapat atiar, “Ti kereka ejok jo aiŋarakin ikaronok, amina da ŋul luelaito EJAKAIT? Kanuka akirot kaŋin kibunok jo anyunyura kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT.
Konye edumuna nuejok kotomakon, naarai ilema Aserot kakwap, ibwaikinit ekonitau amoot Edeke.”
Kiboie Yekosapat koYerusalem: koloma bobo mama ejaas ituŋa anyoun koBeer-seba kiton akwap nakiukon naka Epuraim, kinyaku kes mama ejai EJAKAIT, Edeke loka lukapapaakec.
Kodakanak ikatubok kakwap anatar ireria kere luebwaitai luka Yuda, kaŋolire kere.
Kotema ikatubok atiar, “Koomitos nuiswamaete: naarai mam itubete kanuka ituŋanan, konye kanuka EJAKAIT: ejai ŋesi kayes kotube.
Aso do koyoŋito yesi EJAKAIT; kocoito kiswamata: naarai emameete numam adolit kaneejai EJAKAIT Ewokodeke, karaida atiakit ituŋa, karaida aijaun ainakineta.”
Kicoro kes ebe, “Kikwaikisi neta iyonete EJAKAIT, amunonut, ka etau Ioedolit.

Naeyauniata ikusiinacan luiboiete koreriakec epeget kere mama ijaas, kokidiŋ kaokot ka aokot, kokidiŋ kekisil ka aicorakinet, ikisila ka itubesia, kikwenyasi kes, kinyeis agwaun akiro mama ejai EJAKAIT, kosodi anyunyura abunokin yes ka ikusiinacan: kiswamata ŋun, mam do igwaunete.

Ido koany, kipolokinit yes Amaria esasedoti lopeti kakiro kere nuka EJAKAIT; ka Sebedia okoku loka Isimael, ekayaiton ekek loka Yuda kakiro kere nuka ekabaka: Ilebin da eraunos ikapolokitokokus, Kiswamata katitiŋ, kojai EJAKAIT ka yenejok.”
Kosodi kanen, akaulo kaŋun, kopotu idwe luka Moab, ka idwe luka Amon, ka ice koMonain kakes asurokin Yekosapat.
Kosodi kopotu ice lualimokinete Yekosapat ebe, “Ebunit ekodet loepol asurokin jo anyoun kokekwa koSuria; ido koany, ejaas Kasason-tamar (ŋes ŋol Engedi).”
Kokuriana Yekosapat, kodunyak amoot EJAKAIT; kolimo ailuŋ anatar Yuda kere.
Kotukonokin Yuda kere, amoot aiŋarakinio kaneejai EJAKAIT: kopotu koreria kere luka Yuda amoot EJAKAIT.
Kobwo Yekosapat katukot naka Yuda ka Yerusalem, togo loka EJAKAIT kiŋaren kalaro nakitetet;
kotema atiar, “Wu EJAKAIT, Edeke loka lukapapaakosi, mere ijo Edeke toma akuj? Mere ijo ekayaiton ajakanuto kere nuka atekerin? Kakonikan ejai agogoŋ ka apedor, ŋes emamear loepedori aitikokin jo.
Mam kereka jo, wu Ekosideke, irenearit lueboiete kakwap kana kakonyen nuka ikonituŋa Isirael, koinak aur naka Aburaam opaperokon ikar kere?
Apotu kiboikinos kanen, kodukokis jo kanen aibois nakalaunan kanuka ekonikiror, kobalas ebe,
‘Arai kiidoik sio aronis, ekileŋ, etube, arai atular, arai ebeli, kibwoi koiŋaren ketogo kalo, kakonyenekon, (naarai ejai ekonikiror togo lo,) kimonyia isio jo kocanikosi, iirari itajari da.’
Aso do koany, idwe luka Amon ka Moab ka lukomoru Seir, lumam jo icamunit Isirael alomar akwapukec nakeponiata kesi kakwap nako Misiri, konye apotu kesi kinaca, mam apotu komudiasi kes;
koany, kwape kitaciata kesi sio aponare aireŋear sio kairumetekon, naibu ijo koinak sio airum.
Wu Ekosideke, mam kereka jo itubokini kes? Naarai emamei sio agogoŋ asurokin ekodet lo loepolloabu asurokin sio; mam kijeni da nukiswamai; konye esesenete akosikonye jo.”
Kobwo Yuda kere kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, nepepe kaludidikikec, ka aŋorokec, ka idwekec.
Kosodi kodoik emoyo loka EJAKAIT Yakasiel okoku loka Sekaria, okoku loka Benaia, okoku loka Yeiel, okoku loka Matania, Elebit, lokodwe luka Asap, kokidiŋ katukot.

Kotema ŋesi atiar, “Kiirasi yesi, Yuda kere, ka yes luiboiete koYerusalem, ka jo Yekosapat ekabaka: inera EJAKAIT kwanata mama ijaas ebe, ‘Sirikikuriakaros, karaida aiyaloŋoŋ kanuka ekodet kala loepol; naarai ejie mam erai lokus, konye loka Edeke.
Koloto yesi moi asurokin kes: koany, epote kadokaret naka Sis; idumakinete kes osaŋe loka aditot, koiŋaren kamodiŋ naka Yeruel.

Mam yes ipudasi ejie kojie lo; kiderakinos, kobwaata kopalarito, koanyut aitajar naka EJAKAIT naejai kayes, wu Yuda ka Yerusalem’: sirikikuriakaros karaida aiyaloŋoŋ; koloto moi asurokin kes; naarai ejai EJAKAIT kayes.”
Kobwaata Ilebin, lukodwe luka Ikokatin, ka lukodwe luka Ikorakin, kituritos EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael, keporoto loepol noi.
Kedau ŋesi ainerun kaituŋa, koseu lueyeikinete EJAKAIT, luituritos ajokis naka alaunit, nakelosioto kiŋarenikinito ajore, kobalasi ebe,
“Kimalata EJAKAIT;
Naarai ejaenena akeitim ikar kere.”
Naarai konyoikis idwe luka Amon ka Moab aluikin luiboiete moru Seir, aiar ka amudiar kes cut: kedautu kesi aiar luiboiete koSeir, kigaŋanakinos ŋulutuŋa aiar yeni ee.

Kebu Yekosapat ka iketuŋa aiŋat kes, kodumut ibaren luipu noi, ka iboro, ka inapen, ka iboro luka akais nuipu, luapotu kolacut kanukec, adepar luapedorete ayaŋaar: kodaut apaarasia auni eŋasete, naarai epu noi.
Kapaaran nakiwoŋonet kotukonokinos aditot naka Beraka;
Kosodete aboŋor, ŋolituŋanan loka Yuda ka Yerusalem, kiŋarenikinite Yekosapat kes, aboŋor Yerusalem kaiyalama; naarai abu EJAKAIT kisiyalamik kes kama kalukasurupokec.
Kopotu Yerusalem ejaas kisabulin ka adeudeun ka arupepen mama ejai etogo loka EJAKAIT.
Kojau etasuro loka Edeke atekerin kere nuka akwapin, kepuput kesi ebe asurok EJAKAIT lukasurupo luka Isirael.
Kiyamakin do ayaetait naka Yekosapat; naarai kisiyeŋ Ekedeke ŋes kowaitin kere.
Kolosenenei korot loka Asa papake, mam abu kopaa, kiswamaenenei nuejok kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT.
Konye mam aponi kolemarai aiboisio nuiceleleete; kwabo eriŋa ber ituŋa ibwaikina itauonokec mama ejai Edeke loka lukapapaakec.
Akaulo kaŋun kimorikikinos Yekosapat ekabaka loka Yuda ka Akasia ekabaka loka Isirael; abu ŋol kiswama nueroko noi.
Kimorikikinos kaŋes aiswamaun ameerin nuelosenenete Tarusis; apotu kiswamaut ameerin koEsion-geber.

Kosodi Elieser okoku loka Dodabaku loka Maresa adwarakin Yekosapat ebe, “Naarai ibu kimorikikinos ka Akasia, emudiari EJAKAIT akoniswamisio.” Aponi kobilibilai ameerin, tape mam apedorete alosit Tarusis.
Kojotoor Yekosapat ka lukapapaake, aponi kidaikinai kalukapapaake ore loka Daudi: kirum Yekoram okokuke aiboisike.
Ajaas ŋes iinacan odwe luka Yekosapat, Asaria, ka Yekiel, ka Sekaria, ka Asaria, ka Mikael, ka Sepatia: ŋul kere odwe luka Yekosapat ekabaka loka Isirael.
Koinak kes papakec ainakineta nuepolok, epuesa ka esabu, ka iboro luka akais nuipu, ka ireria luebwaitai koYuda: konye koinak Yekoram ajakanut naarai ŋes ekiyaike.
Nakedakakinor Yekoram ayait ajakanut naka papake, kogogoŋoor, koar iinacanake kere kekileŋ, ka ice kokapolok luka Isirael da.
Kerai Yekoram loka ikar akaisauni ka luarei egeuni airum; kirumak ikar ikanykauni ko Yerusalem.
Kolosenenei korot loka ikabakan luka Isirael, kwape kalukokek loka Akab: naarai amanyit akoku naka Akab: kiswama nueroko kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT.
Konye mam EJAKAIT akoto amudiar ekek loka Daudi, kanuka aitutuket naetutukit ka Daudi, kwape kisumunio da ainakin ŋes ka odweke atala ikar kere.
Kosodi Yekoram atubor nepepe kikapolokoke, ka agalinike, kere kaŋes: konyou kuare, kodany Idomein lualukunito ŋes, ka ikapolok luka agalin.
Kwaŋin kipaliik Edom anyoun kakan naka Yuda, kiton lolo: kosodi Libuna da aipaliikin kapaarasia kaŋun kakanike: naarai abu kojal. EJAKAIT, Edeke loka lukapapaake.

Kosodi kobu aiwadikaet mama ejai ŋesi nakebuni kama ka Eliya enabi ebe, “Inera kwanata EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Daudi papaakon ebe, Naarai mam jo ilosenenei korotin luka Yekosapat papakon, karaida korotin luka Asa ekabaka loka Yuda;
konye ilosenenei korot loka ikabakan luka Isirael, kitopor Yuda ka luiboiete koYerusalem, kwape lukokek loka Akab; ido iar iinacanakon lukokek loka papakon, luejok aitelekarit jo:
koany, edanyi EJAKAIT ikonituŋa, ka idwekon, ka aŋorokon, ka luijaatar kere katular naepol.
Idekakini ijo adeka naka akoik, aitodol naedoenenotor Lukakoikikon ŋinipaaran kanuka adek.”
Kopotu kesi asurokin Yuda, kobelaros kolomasi, koyaŋaasi iboro kere luadumunio kotogo loka ekabaka, ka odweke da, ka aŋoroke; mam aponi kideikinai ŋes ikoku, dimarai Yekoakas, eŋoorit kodweke.
Akaulo kaŋun kere kinom EJAKAIT ŋes akoikike kadek namam epedor aŋaleun.
Kosodi kanen ketuboros apaarasia, kedaut ikar iarei, kodooto lukakoikike kanuka adekake, kotwana kadeka naerono noi. Mam iketuŋa apotu kisupuruutu kanuke, kwape kisupuronokiniata lukapapaake.
Kerai ŋesi loka ikar akaisauni ka luarei egeuni airum, kirumak ikar ikanykauni koYerusalem: kolot komam yenimuit; aponi kidaikinai ore loka Daudi, konye mere toma atesina nuka ikabakan.
Kerai Akasia loka ikar akaisaoŋon ka luarei egeuni airum; kirumak ekaru edioper ko Yerusalem: ekiror loka totoke kerai Atalia akoku naka Omiri.
Kolosenenei Akasia da korotin luka ekek loka Akab: naarai totoke ŋes akenerunanike aswam nukaronis.
Kiswama nueroko kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kwape lukokek loka Akab: naarai araas kesi ikenerunakake akaulo katwanare naka papake, amudiar ŋes.
Kotupa da ainerunikec, kouparos ka Yekoram okoku loka Akab ekabaka loka Isirael aitiji Kasael ekabaka loka Suria koRamot-gilead: kimusuŋata Isurian Yoram.

Koboŋo Yesereel aŋaleun amusuŋun nuemusunitai ŋes koRama, naajiotor ka Kasael ekabaka loka Suria. Kolot Asaria okoku loka Yekoram ekabaka loka Yuda aanyun Yekoram okoku loka Akab koYesereel, naarai adeka.
Kosodi kanen, naetodolikinio Yeku etube kokek loka Akab, kodum ikapolok luka Yuda, ka odwe luka iinacan luka Akasia ijaanakinete Akasia, koar kes.

Komo ŋesi Akasia, kikamut ŋes, (eŋopit do koSamaria,) koyaŋaut mama ejai Yeku, koarata ŋes; kidaata ŋes naarai abalas ebe, “Ŋes okoku loka Yekosapat, loamoot EJAKAIT keketau kere.” Amamei ekek loka Akasia apedor ayait ajakanut.
Keanyu Atalia toto naka Akasia ebe atwana okokuke, konyou, komudia aur kere naka ekabaka loka ekek loka Yuda.

Konye koyaŋa Yekosabeat, akoku naka ekabaka, Yoas okoku loka Akasia, kokokwa ŋes kodwe luka ekabaka luaario, kibwaik ŋes ka akasaanike agola naeŋadio iitadan. Kwaŋin abu Yekosabeatrakoku naka ekabaka Yekoram, aberu naka Yekoiada esasedoti, (naarai kerai ŋesi inaci naka Akasia,) kimunonikis ŋes Atalia, kinyek aiar.
Kojai kakes ibwaitai kotogo loka Edeke ikar ikanykape: kirum Atalia akwap.
Kitoroto koYuda, kotukonokis Ilebin koreria kere luka Yuda, ka lukapolok luka ikekia luka lukapapaa luka Isirael, kopotu Yerusalem.
Kitutukoto ekodet kere ka ekabaka togo loka Edeke. Kotema kes atiar, “Koany, irumi okoku loka ekabaka, kwape abalar EJAKAIT kodwe luka Daudi.
Na ŋes akirot naiswamaete: atutubetekus nakiwuniet, luelomunete kanakasabato, naka isasedotin ka Ilebin, iraunos ikagolok luka ikekia;
Atutubet nakiwuniet ejaunun togo loka ekabaka; ka atutubet nakiwuniet orute loka apetetait: ejaunos da ituŋa kere alaroi nukotogo loka EJAKAIT.
Konye sirikisiikis ituŋanan alomun togo loka EJAKAIT dimarai isasedotin, ka lukoLebin luijaanakinete; ŋul kes elomunete, naarai eraas lukalaunak: konye ericete ituŋa kere aidar naka EJAKAIT.
Elukunete Ilebin ekabaka, kitiŋite ŋolituŋanan lujiisike kakanike; yenelomuni togo kere, koarai: kojaenenas yesi kekabaka naelomununia ka naelomanaria da.”
Kijaik Yekoiada esasedoti ikapolok luka akwat akwaras ka iupalia ka ibukui lukeraas sek luka ekabaka Daudi, luajaas togo loka Edeke.
Kisibwo ituŋa kere, kitiŋite ŋolituŋanan loiiisike kakanike, ameun kowai lokoteten loka etogo kiton owai lokokediany loka etogo, eiduny ketem ka etogo, elukunito ekabaka.
Kosodete kesi aitolomun okoku loka ekabaka, kidokokis aboko akouke, koinakis aitejenunet, kitaraut ŋes ekabaka: kinyonyoata do ŋes Yekoiada ka odweke akinyet; kotemasi atiar, “Kidari Edeke ekabaka.”
Kepupu Atalia ecelet loka ituŋa ekerete ituritos ekabaka, kobu mama ejaas ituŋa togo loka EJAKAIT.

Kosesen, ido koany, ebwoi ekabaka eiduny kepirike neelomarere, ka ikapolok ka arupepen eiduny ka ekabaka; kibwoŋasi ituŋa kere luka akwap, kokuta arupepen; koramata da ikayook iboro lueruosi, kiŋarenikinito ayoore naka aiturit. Kosodi Atalia aicil ikenapen, kobala ebe, “Ebotet, ebotet lokibilakinito.”

Koyau Yekoiada esasedoti ikapolok luka akwat luapolokinito ajore, kotema kes atiar, “Kitolomasi ya kidiŋ okokoron; ŋol da loetupari ŋes, koarata kekileŋ.” Naarai abala esasedoti ebe, “Sirikiarata ŋes kotogo loka EJAKAIT.”
Kocilakis ŋes erot; kolot neelomarere orute loka ibalasin aibe togo loka ekabaka: koarakinaiŋina.
Koloto ituŋa kere togo loka Baal, kotiyatiyata, kobilibilata iketemwan ka akeputosia, koarakinai Matan esasedoti loka Baal kiŋaren kitemwan.

Kitetemik Yekoiada aswam naka etogo loka EJAKAIT kakan naka isasedotin Ilebin, luabu Daudi kokorak togo loka EJAKAIT, ainakin ainakineta nuicweio nuka EJAKAIT, kwape ewadikatere okisila luka Musa, keibwoŋ ka ayoore, kwape ajaar aicorakinet naka Daudi.
Kibwaik ikagolok orutei luka etogo loka EJAKAIT, kinyek yenimam elai alomar toma.

Koyaŋa ikapolok luka akwat, ka ijaka, ka ikayaitok luka ituŋa, ka ituŋa kere luka akwap, kitolomut ekabaka kotogo loka EJAKAIT: kolomasi orute lokokuju koloto togo loka ekabaka, kibwaikis ekabaka oicoloŋ loka ajakanut.
Kibwoŋasi do ituŋa kere luka akwap, kiyamakin ere: koarata Atalia kekileŋ.
Kiswama Yoas nuejokuka kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT apaarasia kere nuka Yekoiada esasedoti.
Komanyak Yekoiada ŋes aŋor aarei; kouri idwe lusap ka lupesur.
Kosodi kanen akaulo kaŋun, kokoto Yoas aiteteun etogo loka EJAKAIT.

Kotukonok ŋesi isasedotin ka Ilebin, kotema kes atiar, “Kolomasi oreria luka Yuda, kotukonokis apesan kama ka Isirael kere aiteteunia etogo loka Ekusideke ŋolikaru, koanyutu ebe isuburikinete yesi akirot.” Konye mam Ilebin apotu kisuburikis.

Konyarau ekabaka Yekoiada ekapolon, kotema ŋes atiar, “Kanukinyo mam ca jo itepesenia Ilebin ayaŋaun koYuda ka Yerusalem esolo loka Musa ekejaanakinan loka EJAKAIT, ka loka ekodet loka Isirael kanuka ewema loka aitejenunet?”
Naarai apotu odwe luka Atalia, aberu ya nakaronon, kobelaros togo loka Edeke; iboro da lutiakuna kere luka etogo loka EJAKAIT ainakis Ibaalim.
Kolimoroi anatar Yuda ka Yerusalem, ainun EJAKAIT esolo loabu Musa ekejaanakinan loka Edeke kicorak Isirael kamodiŋ.
Kiyalamas ikapolok kere, ka ituŋa kere, koyautu kocakakis asaduku, aitodol neadaunotor.

Kosodi keyaun asaduku mama ejaas ikapolok luka ekabaka kakan naka Ilebin, keanyutu ebe ejaas apesan nuipu, kobu ekewadikan loka ekabaka ka ekaroan loka esasedoti lopeti, kobuko asaduku, koyaŋaasi, kinyakakis aiboisike. Kiswamata kwaŋin ŋinipaaran kotukonokis apesan nuipu noi.
Koinak ekabaka ka Yekoiada luiswamaete aswam naka aijaanakin togo loka EJAKAIT; kisiwoteoto ikadukok ka ikekeok aiteteun etogo loka EJAKAIT, ikatatak da asua ka aisinin aiteteunia etogo loka EJAKAIT.
Kiswamata ikeswamak, kitodoloto aswam ejok, kosipokis etogo loka Edeke kaibusesuke, kitogogoŋoto ŋes.

Kedautu kesi, koyaut apesan nuedeunos mama ejai ekabaka ka Yekoiada. Kiswamauniata iboro lukotogo loka EJAKAIT, iboro aijaanakinia, ka ainakinia, ka akaalei, ka iboro luka esabu ka luka epuesa, Koinanakis ainakineta nuicweio togo loka EJAKAIT tiritir apaarasia kere nuka Yekoiada.
Aponi kidaikinai ore loka Daudi neejaas ikabakan, naarai abu kiswama nuejok koIsirael, mama ejai Edeke da ka ekekek.
Kojalata etogo loka EJAKAIT, Edeke loka lukapapaakec, kijaanakis Aserim ka aputosia: kobunok anyunyura Yuda ka Yerusalem kanuka adiakaretekec kana.
Konye kijukanakini nesl kes inabin ainyakun bobo mama ejai EJAKAIT; kitejenikis kes; konye koŋeroto akiirar kes.
Kinerutu aluikin ŋes, kibiribiroto ŋes kamor kaicorakinet naka ekabaka alaro naka etogo loka EJAKAIT.
Kwaŋin mam abu Yoas ekabaka kiitu asianut nakiswamakinit Yekoiada papa loka Sekaria, konye koar okokuke, Etwani kotema atiar, “Kosesen EJAKAIT, kitepesen.”
Naarai abu ajore naka Isurian kerioŋet loedit loka ituŋa; kijaik EJAKAIT ajore naepol noi akanikec, naarai apotu kojalata EJAKAIT, Edeke loka lukapapaakec. Kwaŋin kitodolik Yoas etube.
Lu kes luenerunete asurokin ŋes; Sabad okoku loka Simeat Amonit, ka Yekosabad okoku loka Simirit Amoabit.
Nuka odweke, ka apolou naka aritai nukisibwokio, ka airucakin aiduk etogo loka Edeke, koany, iwadikatai kakiro nuka eitabo loka ikabakan. Kirum Amasia okokuke aiboisike.
Kiswama nuejok kakonyen nuka Ejakait, konye mere keketau kere.
Kosodi kanen, nakitieasere akejakanut kamake, koar ikekejaanakinak luapotu koarata papake.

Konye mam abu koar ikecedwe, konye kiswama kwape ejaatar nuiwadikatai oitabo loka ikisila luka Musa, kwape kicorakinia EJAKAIT ebe, Mam lukapapa etwakikinete idwekec, karaida idwe atwakikin lukapapakec; konye etwanikini ŋinituŋanan akeronis.
Kiboleoto ŋesi kituŋa ilukumin akwatat lukirigin luetitiŋ koIsirael atalatan akwatat nuka epuesa.
Konye kobu etuŋanan loka Edeke mama ejai, kotema atiar, “Wu ekabaka, kinyek ajore naka Isirael aupar kajo; naarai mam EJAKAIT ejai kaIsirael, kes idwe kere luka Epuraim.
Konye arai ilosi; kiswama katitiŋ, kogogoŋor kojie; kibirori Edeke jo kakonyen nuka lukasurupo; naarai ejai Edeke apedor aiŋarakin, ka aibiror.”
Kotema Amasia etuŋanan loka Edeke atiar, “Konye kikwaikini do ai nuka atalatan akwatat nuainak ajore naka Isirael?” Koboŋok etuŋanan loka Edeke ebe, “Epedori Edeke ainakin jo nuitelekarito ŋun.”
Kosodi Amasia agitar kes, ajore naabuni mamake koEpuraim, aboŋor ore: ŋes kinepunia anyunyurakec noi aluikin Yuda, koboŋosi ore kanyunyura naepol.
Kotitiŋior Amasia, kiŋarenik iketuŋa, kolot Aditot naka Abalaŋ, kodany ilukumin itomon kodwe luka Seir.
Kiioreutu idwe luka Yuda ice ilukumin itomon ejarete, koyaut kes kuju moru, kocakasi kes kokuju moru, kobilibiliunos.
Konye ituŋa luka erioŋet loabu Amasia kinyaka, kinyeis aupar kaŋes ojie, kibirokinos ireria luka Yuda, anyoun koSamaria kiton Bet-koron, kodany ilukumin iuni kakesi, koyaŋaasi luŋatuna luipu.
Ŋes kinepunia anyunyura naka EJAKAIT aluikin Amasia, kijukak ŋes enabi, loatemari ŋes atiar, “Kanukinyo imoiaa ijo idekesio luka ituŋa, lumam apotu kitajarata ikecetuŋa kakanikon?”

Kosodi kanen, kineras kaŋes, kotema ekabaka ŋes atiar, “Kidakakinit kereka isio jo araun lokaurianet naka ekabaka? Kinyek; kanukinyo tikiinomere?” Kosodi enabi ainyein, kotema atiar, “Ajeni ebe elosikinit Edeke amudiar jo, naarai iswama ŋun, komam iirari akainerun.”

Kijuka Yoas ekabaka loka Isirael mama ejai Amasia ekabaka loka Yuda, kobala ebe, “Abu ekenep loajai Lebanon kijukak eres loajai Lebanon, ebe, Kokorak akokukon okokuka komany: kitoro etiaŋ loka ais loajai Lebanon, kicakacak ekenep.
Ibala ijo ebe, ‘Koany, adany Edom’; iturokina etaukon ailabilab: kopaik ore; kanukinyo ilomaria ijo akiro numere nukon ka atwaniar, kibirori ijo, ka Yuda da kajo?”
Kolot do Yoas ekabaka loka Isirael; koanyunos kakonye, ŋesi ka Amasia ekabaka loka Yuda koBet-Semes, loarai loka Yuda.
Kireŋeai Yuda kakonyen nuka Isirael; koker, ŋinituŋanan owemake.

Kikam Yoas ekabaka loka Isirael Amasia ekabaka loka Yuda, okoku loka Yoas, okoku loka Yekoakas, kolset-semes, koyau ŋes Yerusalem, kotiyatiya arwatat naka Yerusalem anyoun korute loka Epuraim kiton orute loka agor, ikubitin akwat aoŋon.
Koŋata esabu ka epuesa kere, ka iboro kere luadumunio koObededom togo loka Edeke, ka iboro luka akais nuipu lukotogo loka ekabaka, ka lukititiŋa da, koboŋo Samaria.
Aswamisio ace nuka Amasia, nusodit ka nukawasia, koany, mam kereka iwadikatai oitabo loka ikabakan luka Yuda ka Isirael?
Agear kapaarasia nuebelokinor Amasia anyoun katupit EJAKAIT, kinerut asurokin ŋes koYerusalem; koker Lakis; konye kijukasi atupakin ŋes Lakis, koarakinai ŋina.
Koyaunai ŋes kobalasin, kidaikis nepepe kalukapapaake ore loka Yuda.
Koduk ŋesi Elot, kinyakak Yuda, kedau ekabaka ajotoor kalukapapaake.
Kerai Usia loka ikar itomon ka lukanykape egeuni airum: kirumak ikar akaisakany ka luarei ko Yerusalem: ekiror loka totoke kerai Yekilia naka Yerusalem.
Kiswama nuejok kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kwape kejaatar kere nueswamai papake Amasia.
Kibwaik etau amoot Edeke kapaarasia nuka Sekaria, lokituutoori aiyoŋ Edeke: kapaarasia nuamootor EJAKAIT kitekerian Edeke ŋes.
Kiŋarak Edeke ŋes asurokin Ipilisitian, ka Iarabun lukiboiete koGur-baal, ka Imeunim.
Koinakis Imonain ainakineta mama ejai Usia; kisiarakina ekekiror kiton neelomarere Misiri; naarai kogogoŋoor noi.
Ido koduk Usia itogoi lueojak Yerusalem, korute loka agor, korute da loka aditot, ka neekudokinia arwatat da, kitogogoŋ kes.

Koduk itogoi lueojak kamodiŋ, kobok ataparin nuipu, naarai ajaas ŋes kibaren nuipu ajesa kapuutona da; ajaas ikakoriok ka ikacapak emusabibu koroŋan komanikoria lupusuk da; naarai komina ŋesi noi akoru.
Ido ajai Usia ajore naka ikajiok lualomanarete ojie korioŋeta, kwape ajaar etiai loka aimarakec loemari Yeiel ekewadikan ka Maaseia ekapolokiton, kakan naka Kanania, ediopet kokapolok luka ekabaka.
Etiai kere loka ikapolok luka ikekia luka lukapapaakec, ituŋa lukirigin luetitiŋ emwaasi ilukumin iarei ka akwat akanykape.
Kakanikec ajai ajore naetuutooro ilukumin akwat auni ka lukanykaarei ka akwat akany, luajiononos kagogoŋ naepol, aiŋarakin ekabaka asurokin lukasurup.
Kitemok Usia ibukui, ka akwaras, ka ikopiran, ka ikootin lukasua, ka akabwai, ka alica nuporoea kanukec, ŋes ajore kere.

Kiswamau koYerusalem acuman, nuapwakunete ituŋa luepiriaka, ajaut kotogoi lueojak karwatatin nuitogogoŋio, agumia imalia ka amor nuepolok. Kisiarakin ekekiror kama eiwana; naarai kinarakinitai noi noi, aitodol nakegogoŋoror.
Koloma Asaria esasedoti atupakin ŋes, ka isasedotin luka EJAKAIT akaisakanykauni nepepe kaŋes, luaraas ituŋa luetitiŋ:

kirebokinete Usia ekabaka, kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Mam eraas nukon, Usia, aisupuruun lukisupurununo mama ejai EJAKAIT, konye eraas nuka isasedotin odwe luka Aaron, luatiakunio aisupuruun lukisupurununo: koloma kaibois nakalaunan: naarai ibuca; kwabo mam ibusiar kama ejai EJAKAIT Edeke.”

Kosodi Usia anyunyurikin; kitiŋite aisupurunet akanike aisupuruun lukisupurununo; napenyunyurikini isasedotin, kolomuni atapon koreeteke kakonyen nuka isasedotin kotogo loka EJAKAIT, eiduny ketem lokisupuruunet.
Koŋolia ŋes Asaria esasedoti lopeti, ka isasedotin kere, ido koany, ejai atapon oreeteke, kisunyas aremor ŋes kina; eebo, kisunya ŋesi da elopet alomar, naarai enomit EJAKAIT ŋes.

Korai Usia ekabaka lokatapon kiton apaaran naka atwanareke, kiboienenei kotogo loegelara, naarai kerai lokatapon; naarai agelario kotogo loka EJAKAIT; koyaite do Yotam okokuke etogo loka ekabaka, etubonokini ituŋa luka akwap.
Kojotoor do Usia kalukapapaake; aponi kidaikinai kaJukapapaake omanikor lokidaanakina lokerai loka ikabakan; naarai abalasi ebe, “Erai lokatapon.” Kirum Yotam okokuke aiboisike.
Kiswama nuejok kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kwape ajaatar kere nueswamai Usia papake: konye mam ŋes alomanari oyekalu loka EJAKAIT. Kiyatakinito ituŋa aiswamaenen nueroko.
Koduk ŋesi erute lokokuju loka etogo loka EJAKAIT, koduk da luipu karwatat naka Opel.
Ido koduk ireria kakwap nakiukon naka Yuda, kotoma amonyieik da koduk itogoi luegogoŋ ka itogoi lueojak.

Kitiji da ekabaka loka idwe luka Amon, kipiko kes. Kokaru kaŋol koinakis idwe luka Amon ŋes atalatan akwatat nuka epuesa, ka aitemisio alukumin atomon nuka akima, ka alukumin atomon nuka esairi. Kotacakis idwe luka Amon ŋes etiai ŋol kokaru lokiareit, ido kokaru lokiwuniet da.
Kogogoŋoor do Yotam, naarai kitemonok ikeponesio kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT Ekedeke.
Aswamisio ace nuka Yoram, ka ijiisioke kere, ka ikeponesio, koany, iwadikatai oitabo loka ikabakan luka Isirael ka Yuda.
Kerai ŋesi loka ikar akaisaarei ka lukany egeuni airum, kirumak ikar itomon ka lukanykape ko Yerusalem.
Kojotoor Yoram ka lukapapaake, aponi kidaikinai ore loka Daudi: kirum Akas okokuke aiboisike.
konye kolosenenei korotin luka ikabakan luka Isirael, kiswamau da aputosia nuecalara kanuka Ibaalim.
Ido kisupuruun lukisupurununo aditot naka okoku loka Kinom, kicwe ttedwe kakim, kwape ajaatar italesia luka ikapirin, luabu EJAKAIT kireŋe kakonyen nuka idwe luka Isirael.
Koinak asuban kisupuruun da lukisupurununo kaiboisio nuiceleleete, koukon da, ido kokwap ka ŋolikitoi loepesit.
Naarai koar Peka okoku loka Remalia koYuda ilukumin akwatat ka ilukumin akaisaarei kapaaran adiopet, kes kere ituŋa luetitiŋ; naarai apotu kojalata EJAKAIT, Edeke loka lukapapaakec.
Abu Sikiri, etuŋanan lokirigi loka Epuraim, koar Maaseia okoku loka ekabaka, ka Asirikam ekayaiton etogo, ka Elukana loiareikinit ekabaka.

Konye kojai ŋina enabi loka EJAKAIT, ekekiror Oded; kolom ŋesi airiamakin kajore naebunit Samaria, kotema kes atiar, “Koany, naarai anyunyurik EJAKAIT Edeke loka lukapapaakus Yuda, ejaik kes akanikus, iarata kes kanyunyura naedolit akui.
Kwana da ipeleikinito aitonokok idwe luka Yuda ka Yerusalem araut ibulesin ka abulesinikus: mam kereka kotomakus da nuigwaunito kama ejai EJAKAIT Ekusideke?
Aso do kopupunoi, kinyakasi luijoreunito, luiioreutu yesi koinacanakus: naarai ejai anyunyura naededeŋ naka EJAKAIT mamakus.”
Kosodete ice kokapolok lukodwe luka Epuraim, Asaria okoku loka Yokanan, ka Berekia okoku loka Mesilemet, ka Yekisikia okoku loka Salum, ka Amasa okoku loka Kadalai, konyoikis ŋul Juapote kojie.

Kotemasi kes atiar, “Mam yes itolomunete ne luijoreunito: naarai ipeleikis nukitwagaunete oni kama ejai EJAKAIT, aiyatakin aronisiowok ka agwauniwok: naarai epol agwauniwok, ejai da anyunyura naededeŋ aluikin Isirael.”
Kinyekis do ituŋa luakapakina lujiis luejoreunito ka luŋatuna kakonyen nuka ikapolok ka ekodet kere.
Naarai apotu bobo Idomein kopotu aidany Yuda, koyaŋaasi lukijoreoro.

Konataritos da Ipilisitian ireria luka apuutona, ka Eŋalakimak naka Yuda, kirumata Bet-semes, ka Aiyalon, ka Gederot, ka Soko ka ireriake, ka Timuna ka ireriake, Gimiso da ka ireriake: kiboikinos nen.
Naarai kitisil EJAKAIT Yuda kanuka Akas ekabaka loka Isirael; naarai kikonak komam aitikokin koYuda, kogwau noi akiro kama ejai EJAKAIT.
Kobu Tiligat-pilineser ekabaka loka Asuria mama ejai, kitican ŋes, konye mam abu kitogogoŋ.
Naarai kolema Akas atutubet korogo loka EJAKAIT, kotogo da loka ekabaka ka loka ikapolok, koinak ekabaka loka Asuria; konye mam ŋun kiŋarakinito ŋes.

Naarai abu koinak asuban mama ejaas idekesio luka Damasiko, luadanyete ŋes; kobala ebe, “Naarai idekesio luka ikabakan luka Suria kinarakinete kes, ŋes ainakinia eoŋ asuban mama ejaas, tetere keŋarakinete eoŋ.” Konye koraunos amudiarike, ka naka Isirael kere.
Kotukonok Akas iboro kere luka etogo loka Edeke, kojepejep iboro lukotogo loka Edeke, kogolok ikekia lukotogo loka EJAKAIT; kiswamau itemwan agoria kere nukoYerusalem.
Kiswamak aiboisio nuiceleleete oreria kere luka Yuda, aisupuruunia lukisupurununo mama ejaas idekesio ice, kitunyunyurik EJAKAIT, Edeke loka lukapapaake.
Aswamisioke ace, ka iponesioke kere, nusodit ka nukawasia, koany, iwadikatai oitabo loka ikabakan luka Yuda ka Isirael.
Kojotoor Akas ka lukapapaake, aponi kidaikinai ore, ŋes Yerusalem; naarai mam aponi koyaŋaarai atesina nuka ikabakan luka Isirael: kirum Kesekia okokuke aiboisike.
Kiswama nuejok kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kwape ajaatar kere nueswamai Daudi papaake.
Kitolom isasedotin ka Ilebin, kotukok kes aibois naelal ari nakokide,
kotema kes atiar, “Kopupunoi eoŋ, yes Ilebin; kitalaunos, kitalautu da etogo loka EJAKAIT Edeke loka lukapapaakus, kodakasi amodokok kina kaibois nakalaunan.
Naarai apaasi lukapapaawok, eswamata nueroko kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT Ewokodeke, ajalata ŋes, ebelokis da akecekonyen kaibois naka EJAKAIT, ebonokis ipuranakec.
Agolokis da kek ia kaneelomarere, etudeniosi atalai, mam apotu kisupuruut lukisupurununo karaida ainakin ainakineta nuicweio kaibois nakalaunan mama ejai Edeke loka Isirael.
Kanuka ŋun abunok anyunyura naka EJAKAIT Yuda ka Yerusalem, ejaiki kes araun etasuro, araun aumokinet, ka aijuar, kwape ianyuniata yesi kakonyenekus.
Naarai koany, apotu lukapapaawok kibiroros kekileŋ, ijoreoritai idwewok lusap ka lupesur, ka anorowok kanuka ŋun.
Ejai teni otauka aitutuk ka EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael, tetere ibelokini akenyunyura naededeŋ anyoun kamawok.
Ikadwe, sirikipalasi kwana: naarai kiseu EJAKAIT yes abwoenen kakonyeneke, aijaanakin ŋes, koraut ikekejaanakinak, kisupuruut lukisupurununo.”
Kosodete Ilebin anyoun, Makat okoku loka Amasai, ka Yoel okoku loka Asaria, kodwe luka Ikokatin: kodwe luka Merari, Kis okoku loka Abidi, ka Asaria okoku loka Sima, ka Eden okoku loka Yoa:
Kodwe luka Elisapan, Simiri ka Yeuel: kodwe luka Asap, Sekaria ka Matania:
kodwe luka Keman, Yekuel ka Simei: kodwe luka Yedutun, Semaia ka Usiel.
Kotukonokis iinacanakec, kitalaunos, kolomasi, kwape ajaar aicorakinet naka ekabaka kakiro nuka EJAKAIT, aiteseg etogo loka EJAKAIT.
