Kolomasi isasedotin atutubet nakotoma nakotogo loka EJAKAIT, aiteseg ŋes, kitolomut amodokok kere nakedumunete koyekalu loka EJAKAIT alaro naka etogo loka EJAKAIT. Koyaŋaasi Ilebin kodakasi kiŋa kiton aguurut Kidiron.

Kogeut kapaaran nasodit naka elap losodit aitalaun, ido kapaaran nakikanyetekauni naka elap kodolot neelomarere naka EJAKAIT; kitalaut etogo loka EJAKAIT kodaut apaarasia akanykauni: kapaaran nakitomonet kakanykape naka elap losodit, kodaut do.

Kosodete alomar mama ejai Kesekia ekabaka togoke, kotemasi atiar, “Kidau aitesegaar etogo kere loka EJAKAIT, ka etem loka ainakineta nuicweio, ka iboroke kere, ka emesa loka imugatin luka aitodikin, ka iboroke kere.
Ido iboro kere luabu ekabaka Akas kocaka kairumuke naadiakaria ŋesi, kipou ketemokis kes ka aitalaun; ido koany ejaas kiŋaren ketem loka EJAKAIT.”
Kosodi Kesekia ekabaka anyoun tupuruc, kotukok ikapolok luka ere, kolot togo loka EJAKAIT.

Koyaut imoŋin lutoba ikanykaarei, ka imerekekin ikanykaarei, ka imerekekin ludidik ikanykaarei, ka ikorwa ikanykaarei araun ainakinet naka aronis kanuka ajakanut, ido kanuka aibois nakalaunan ka Yuda da. Kicorak ŋesi isasedotin odwe luka Aaron ainakin kes otem loka EJAKAIT.
Koarata imoŋin lutoba, kijaut isasedotin aokot, kobwatanakis kotem: koarata da imerekekin ludidik, kobwatanakis aokot kotem.
Kisukunyikis ikorwa araun ainakinet naka aronis kakonyen nuka ekabaka ka ekodet; kidokokis kes akaninikec;
koarata isasedotin kes, kiswamaut ainakinet naka aronis kaokotokec kotem: aitulucio Isirael kere; naarai kicorak ekabaka ainakin ainakinet naicweio ka ainakinet naka aronis kanuka Isirael kere.
Kobwaata Ilebin ejaas kiboro lueruosi luka Daudi, ka isasedotin da karupepen.
Kicorak Kesekia ainakin ainakinet naicweio kotem. Napegeun ainakin naicweio, kogeuni da ekosio loka EJAKAIT, ka arupepen, nepepe kiboro lueruosi luka Daudi ekabaka loka Isirael.
Komaata lukokodet kere, koyooto ikayook, kokutata ikakutak arupepen; kikote nen aitodol neadaunor ainakinet naicweio.
Kedautu ainakin, kokukum ekabaka ka ŋul kere luajaas kaŋes, komaata.
Ido apotu Kesekia ekabaka ka ikapolok kicorakis Ilebin ayoore aiturit EJAKAIT kakiro nuka Daudi, ka nuka Asap ekadwaran, Koyooto aiturit kaiyalama, kituluroto akwesikec, komaata.
Etiai loka ainakineta nuicweio, nuayauni ekodet, emwaasi imoŋin lutoba akaisakanykaarei, imerekekin akwatat, ka imerekekin ludidik akwat aarei: ŋul kere keraas ainakineta nuicweio mama ejai EJAKAIT.
Iboro luketiakunitai emwaasi imoŋin akwat akanykape ka amerekekin alukumin auni.

Konye ekidioko isasedotin, mam apedorete aijen ainakineta nuicweio kere: kanuka ŋun kiŋarakis iinacanakec Ilebin kes aitodol neadaunor aswam, aitodol da neetalaunotor isasedotin bonik: naarai etenara Ilebin itauon aitalauna bonik aitelekarit isasedotin.
Epu noi da ainakineta nuicweio, ka asiepai nuka ainakineta nuka ainapakin, ka ainakineta numatan nuka ŋiniinakinet naicweio Kitemokinoi kwaŋin aijaanakin naka etogo loka EJAKAIT.
Kiyalamikin Kesekia, ka ituŋa kere, kanuka ŋun nuetemokinit Edeke ituŋa: naarai kiswamaun akirot atipet.
Kijuka Kesekia mama ejai Isirael kere ka Yuda, kiwadik ibaluan da mama ejai Epuraim ka Manase, tetere epote togo loka EJAKAIT Yerusalem, aidar Aleleŋio mama ejai EJAKAIT Edeke loka Isirael.
Naarai kinerut ekabaka ka ikapolokoke, ka ekodet kere koYerusalem, aidar Aleleŋio kolap lokiareit.
Naarai mam apedorete aidar kapak kaŋin, naarai mam isasedotin apotu kitalauna bonik kotiai loedauni, karaida ituŋa atukokin Yerusalem.
Kitojokai akirot kakonyen nuka ekabaka ka ekodet kere.

Kibwaikis ekisil alimor anatar Isirael kere, anyoun koBeer-seba kiton Dan, aponare aidar Aleleŋio mama ejai EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael, Yerusalem: naarai luipu mam apotu kidarata ŋes kwape kiwadikatere.

Koloto ikakerak kibaluan anyoun kokabaka ka ikapolokoke anatar Isirael kere ka Yuda, kwape ajaar aicorakinet naka ekabaka ebe, “Yes idwe luka Isirael, kibelokinos bobo mama ejai EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Aburaam, ka Isaak ka Isirael, tetere eboŋuni mama ejai aatoŋot naaku kayesi kakan naka ikabakan luka Asuria.
Sirikiputokinos kalukapapaakus, ka ikusiinacan, luapaas kama ka EJAKAIT, Edeke loka lukapapaakec, tetere einakini kes aitisilario, kwape ianyuniata.

Siriraas lueninik imurisiŋa, kwape lukapapaakus; konye koluŋakinos mama ejai EJAKAIT, kolomasi aiboisike nakalaunan, naetalaunit ikar kere, kijaanakis EJAKAIT Ekusideke, tetere ibelokin akenyunyura naededeŋ kamakus.

Naarai arai ibelokinos bobo mama ejai EJAKAIT, itimio ikusiinacan ka ikusidwe kakonyen nuka ŋul kaluejoreorete kes, eboŋunete bobo akwap na: naarai esiana EJAKAIT Ekusideke, lokaitim da, mam ibelokini akekonyen kamakus arai ibonuŋete mamake.”
Konye kitasonikinos ice luko Aser ka Manase ka Sebulun, kopotu Yerusalem.
Kojai da akan naka Edeke koYuda ainakin kes etau ediopet, aswam aicorakinet naka ekabaka ka ikapolok kakirot naka EJAKAIT.
Kotukonokina ituŋa luipu koYerusalem aidar epucit loka imugatin lumam itubuunitoi kolap lokiareit, ekodet loapol noi.
Konyout kolemasi itemwan luajaas Yerusalem, kolemasi da itemwan lukisupuruunet, kocakakis aguurut Kidiron.
Kosodete aiar lukalelenio kapaaran nakitomonet kaoŋon kolap lokiareit: kirumata isasedotin ka Ilebin ileic, kitalaunos bonik, koyaut ainakineta nuicweio togo loka EJAKAIT.
Kobwaata kaiboisiokec kwape kibusakinitotor, kwape ajaar ekisil loka Musa etuŋanan loka Edeke: kobwatanakis isasedotin aokot, nuejaikinete kes Ilebin.
Naarai ajaas luipu kokodet lumam etalauna bonik: kanuka ŋun koraun do aswam naka Ilebin aaranakin ŋinituŋanan yenimam elai aleleŋio, aitalaun kes mama ejai EJAKAIT.

Naarai epu ituŋa, ido luepu kakesi luka Epuraim ka Manase, Isakar ka Sebulun, mam apotu kitalauna bonik, konye konyamata lukalelenio kopone lomam ewadikatere. Naarai abu Kesekia kilipak kes ebe, “Kisioni EJAKAIT lokajokan ŋinituŋanan
yenibwaikini eketau amoot Edeke, EJAKAIT, Edeke loka lukapapaake, karaida mam italaunitai kwape ejaar aitesegario naka aibois nakalaunan.”
Kiira EJAKAIT Kesekia, kitaŋaleu ituŋa.

Kidarata idwe luka Isirael luajaas Yerusalem epucit loka imugatin lumam itubuunitoi adaun apaarasia akanykaarei kaiyalama naepol: kituritos Ilebin ka isasedotin EJAKAIT ŋinipaaran, koyeikis EJAKAIT kiboro lueruosi noi.

Kiner Kesekia nukaitalakaar Ilebin kere luepiriaka noi aijaanakin EJAKAIT, Konyamakis do epucit kere adaun apaarasia akanykaarei, koinanakinete asuban nuka ainakineta nuka ainapakin, kolimonorete EJAKAIT, Edeke loka lukapapaakec.

Naarai abu Kesekia ekabaka loka Yuda koinak ekodet imoŋin lutoba elukumit ka amerekekin alukumin akanykaarei araut ainakineta; apotu da ikapolok koinakis ekodet imoŋin lutoba elukumit ka amerekekin alukumin atomon: kitalaunos isasedotin luipu noi bonik.
Kiyalama ekodet kere loka Yuda, ka isasedotin ka Ilebin, ka ekodet kere loabuni koIsirael, ka imo luapote kakwap naka Isirael, ka lueboiete koYuda.
Kojai do aiyalama naepol Yerusalem: naarai ageun kapaarasia nuka Solomon okoku loka Daudi ekabaka loka Isirael amamei naaputotor koYerusalem.
Kosodete isasedotin Ilebin anyoun, kilipakis ituŋa arereŋ, Kiirarai ekeceporoto, kodol ailipikec aiboisike nakalaunan, ŋes akuj.

Kitetemik da ewai loka iboro luejaatar ekabaka araun ainakineta nuicweio, kes nu, nuka ainakineta nuicweio nuka tupuruc ka eboŋ, ainakineta nuicweio da nuka asabaton, ka napilamununei elap, ka nuka ipucin lueseunitai, kwape iwadikatere okisila luka EJAKAIT.
Kicorak da ituŋa lueboiete koYerusalem ainanakin ewai loka isasedotin ka Hebin, tetere einanakinete bonik kokisila luka EJAKAIT.

Atipet nakitisiarikinor aicorakinet, koinanakis idwe luka Isirael kaipues lugeet luka akima, ka ebino, ka akinyet, ka esik, ka luka amio kere nakomanikor: koyaununut yenikitomonet yenika iboro kere kaipues.

Idwe luka Isirael ka Yuda, lukiboiete koreria luka Yuda, koyaut da yenikitomonet yenika imoŋin ka amerekekin, ka yenikitomonet yenika iboro luetiakunitai mama ejai EJAKAIT Ekecedeke, kibwaikis atukon.
Kolap lokiwuniet kogeut aituk atukon, kodaut kes kolap lokikanyetekaarei.
Kebu Kesekia ka ikapolok koanyut atukon, kiturito EJAKAIT ka iketuŋa Isirael.
Kosodi Kesekia ainitunun isasedotin ka Ilebin nuka atukon.

Koboŋok Asaria esasedoti Iopeti lokokek loka Sadok, kotema ŋes atiar, “Ageun ituŋa ayaun ainakineta togo loka EJAKAIT, kinyami isio lukidaunete, kideuni da luipu: naarai kisirereŋ EJAKAIT iketuŋa; luedeunos kes atukot na naepol.”
Kicorak do Kesekia kes aitemokin agolai togo loka EJAKAIT; kitemokis.
Koyaut ainakineta ka lukitomon ka iboro luetiakunitai da kamunonut: korai Konania Elebit ekayaitonikec, kiareik Simei onaceke.

Ido Yekiel, ka Asasia, ka Nakat, ka Asakel, ka Yerimot, ka Yosabad, ka Eliel, ka Isimakia, ka Makat, ka Benaia, koraas ikaanyanarak kakan naka Konania ka Simei onaceke, kanuka aicorakinet naka Kesekia ekabaka, ka Asaria ekayaiton etogo loka Edeke.
Ido abu Kore okoku loka Imina Elebit, ekagolon erute lokokide, kopolokinite ainakineta nuka akot nuka Edeke, akoranakin ainakineta nuka EJAKAIT, ka iboro lukalaunak noi.
Kwapuke ajai Eden ka Minaimin, ka Yesua, ka Semaia, ka Amaria, ka Sekania, koreria luka isasedotin, kaswamukec, ainakin ikeceinacan kabeanakin, lukapolok ka ludidik da:

kogelara ŋul luemaritai kaurikec naka lukiliok, ageun ka luka ikar iuni ka adepar, ŋolituŋanan loelomari togo loka EJAKAIT, kwape ibusakinitor aswam naka ŋinipaaran, aijaanakin kaswamukec kwape ajaatar abeanakinetakec.
Kaŋul luemaritai kaurikec naka isasedotin kwape ajaatar ikekia luka lukapapaakec, ka Ilebin ageun ka luka ikar akaisaarei ka adepar, kaswamukec kwape ajaatar abeanakinetakec;
ka ŋul luemaritai kaurikec naka ludidikikec, ka aŋorokec, ka ikecedwe lusap ka lupesur, anatar ekodet kere: naarai kaswamukec kitalaunos bonik kalaunit.

Ido lukodwe luka Aaron isasedotin, luajaas omanikoria luka ironyia luka ireriakec, kaŋolire kere, ajaas ituŋa luabilitai ikiroriakec, ainakin akorakineta mama ejaas lukiliok kere kosasedotin, ka ŋul kere luemaritai kaurikec koLebin.
Kaŋiniswam kere naegeuni kaijaanakin naka etogo loka Edeke, kokisila, kaicorakineta da, amoot Ekedeke, kiswama keketau kere, kisirereŋitoi.
Keanyu Kesekia ebe abu Senakerib, idenyakinit da asurokin Yerusalem,
kinerut kaikapolokoke ka iketuŋa lukirigin ainwok akipi nuka ieoai luajaas kina naka ere; kiŋarakis ŋes.
Kotukokinos do ituŋa luipu, konwokata ieoai kere, ka aguurut naelelei kokidiŋ kakwap, kobalas ebe, “Kanuto kinyo tikeponiata ikabakan luka Asuria, adumun akipi nuipu?”
Kotitiŋior, koduk arwatat kere naatiyatiyatai, kitonyou kiton otogoi lueojak, ka arwatat ace kokiŋa, kitogogoŋ Milo ore loka Daudi, kiswamau lujiis ka ibukui luipu.
Kibwaik ikapolok luka ejie apolokin ituŋa, kotukok kes neajai ŋesi kaibois naelal korute loka ere, kiner kakes nukaitalakaar, ebe,
“Kicata, kotitiŋioto, sirikikuriakaros karaida aiyaloŋoŋ kanuka ekabaka loka Asuria, karaida ekodet kere loepol loejai kaŋes: naarai epol loejai kaoni aitelekarit loejai kaŋes.
Ejai akan naka akuan kaŋes: konye ejai EJAKAIT Ewokodeke kaoni aiŋarakin, ka ejie kojiisiowok.” Kogoŋakina ituŋa akiro nuka Kesekia ekabaka loka Yuda.
“Inera kwanata Senakerib ekabaka loka Asuria ebe, ‘Iŋai bo loimunosi, tape idarete airigaunio koYerusalem?
Mam kereka Kesekia kinalarit yes, ainakin yes atwakare kebeli ka akure ebe, “Itajari EJAKAIT Ewokodeke oni kakan naka ekabaka loka Asuria”?
Mam kereka Kesekia ŋol alemarit aiboisioke nuiceleleete, ka itemwanake, kicorak da Yuda ka Yerusalem ebe, “Imaete kotem ediopet, kaŋes da isupuruunete lukisupurununo”?
Mam yes ijenete nukeswamakin eoŋ ka lukapapaaka ituŋa kere luka akwapin? Kepedorito tope idekesio luka atekerin nuka akwapin ayuun akecekwap kakanika?
Iŋai bo kodekesio kere luka atekerin ŋun nuamudiarete lukapapaaka cut, luapedorit ayuun iketuŋa kakanika, tape epedori Ekusideke ayuun yes kakanika?

Aso do kinye Kesekia aiŋal yes, karaida aisidik yes kakirot kana, kwabo sirikiyuutu ŋes: naarai amamei edeke ediopet loka ateker karaida ajakanut loapedorit ayuun iketuŋa kakanika, kakan da naka lukapapaaka: ikoni epedori ai Ekusideke nepepec da ayuun yes kakanika?’ ”
Kiyatakis ikekejaanakinak einer erono mama ejai EJAKAIT Edeke, ka Kesekia da ekekejaanakinan.

Kiwadika da ibaluan, aimwaŋ EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael, kiner erono mamake ebe, “Kwape idekesio luka atekerin nuka akwapin, lumam apotu koyuutu ikecetuŋa kakanika, kwape kwaŋin da mam Edeke loka Kesekia eyuuni iketuŋa kakanika.”
Kiworoto keporoto loepol kaŋajep naka Iyudayan mama ejaas ituŋa luka Yerusalem luajaas arwatat, aitukurian kes, ka aisiyaloŋoŋ da; tetere irumete ere.
Kineras nuka Edeke loka Yerusalem, kwape nuka idekesio luka ituŋa luka akwapin, luaraas aswam naka akanin nuka ituŋa.
Apotu Kesekia ekabaka, ka Isaia enabi okoku loka Amos, kilipa kanuka ŋun, komonyata mama ejai akui.

Kijuka EJAKAIT emalaika, komudia ituŋa kere lukirigin luetitiŋ, ka ikeŋarenok, ka ikapolok, koidukurun luka ekabaka loka Asuria, Koboŋo akwapuke kodakara akou. Keloma ŋesi abila naka edekeke, apotu ŋul lualomunete kopikisike koarakis ŋes nen kekileŋ.
Kwaŋin kitajar EJAKAIT Kesekia ka luiboiete koYerusalem kakan naka Senakerib ekabaka loka Asuria, kakan da naka ice kere, kiŋarenik kes kaŋoliwai.
Apotu luipu koinut EJAKAIT ainakineta koYerusalem, ka iboro luka akais nuipu mama ejai Kesekia ekabaka loka Yuda: kitopolooroi do kakonyen nuka atekerin kere agear kanen.
Konye mam abu Kesekia kikonak kwape ajaar ajokis naeswamakinio ŋes; naarai kodakun eketau; kanuka ŋun kobunok ŋes anyunyura, ka Yuda ka Yerusalem da.
Konye kitasonikin Kesekia kanuka aiwoŋonut nakotauke, ŋes ka luiboiete koYerusalem, ŋes mam anyunyura naka EJAKAIT ebunokinia kes kapaarasia nuka Kesekia.
Ajai Kesekia abar naepol ka aibuses: koduk aiŋadisia nuka epuesa, ka nuka esabu, ka nuka amor nuka akais nuipu, ka nuka lueur maa, ka nuka ibukui, ka nuka iponesio kere luka iboro luejok;
itogoi lukainad da luka eiyas loka akima ka ebino ka akinyet; aujoi da nuka iponesio kere luka itiaŋ, ka anukia nuka amerekekin.
Bobo da kodum ireria, ka isipanin luipu noi luka aituk ka luka amerekekin: naarai abu Edeke koinak ŋes iboro luipu noi.
Abu Kesekia ŋopeŋol kigalik atan naimukurur naka akipi nuka Gikon, kitelelea kes eitena ari nakoto naka ere loka Daudi, Kokerianar Kesekia kaswamisioke kere.
Konye kakirot naka ikiyakia luka ikapolok luka Babulon, lukijukunete aiŋitun nakaumokin naeswamatai kakwap, kojal Edeke ŋes aigimor, tetere ejenuni nuajaas otauke kere.
Kojotoor Kesekia kalukapapaake, aponi kidaikinai adoket naka atesina nuka odwe luka Daudi: kitubusikis ŋes Yuda kere ka luiboiete ko Yerusalem katwanareke, Kirum Manase okokuke aiboisike.
Kiswama nueroko kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kwape ajaatar italesia luka ikapirin, luerenearit EJAKAIT kakonyen nuka idwe luka Isirael.
Naarai koduk bobo aiboisio nuiceleleete nuatiyatiyat Kesekia papake; kosipok itemwan luka Ibaalim, kiswamau Aserot, koma ajore kere naka akuj, kijaanak kes.
Koduk itemwan togo loka EJAKAIT, loabu EJAKAIT kiner ebe, “Ejaenena ekakiror Yerusalem ikar kere.”
Koduk itemwan luka ajore kere naka akuj alaroi aarei nukotogo loka EJAKAIT.

Kitotor ikedwe akim kaditot naka okoku loka Kinom: konie aanyuneta, kitwasam nukalemelem, kiswama nukaicud, kouparos kaŋul kaluajaas ajokina, ka ikepiedak: kiswama nukaronok nuipu kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT aitunyunyurikin ŋes.

Kibwaik aput naegerer naka ibore yenemai ŋesi, naabu kiswamau, togo loka Edeke, loabu Edeke kolimok Daudi ka Solomon okokuke ebe, “Ebwaikini ekakiror togo lo ikar kere, Yerusalem da, loaseunit katekerin kere nuka Isirael.
Mam bobo da alemari akeju naka Isirael kakwap naaseikinit lukapapaakus; arai teni iricete aiswamaenen nuecoraki kes kere, ikisila kere ka apucuneta ka aicorakineta kakan naka Musa.”
Kitapaa Manase Yuda ka luiboiete koYerusalem, kiswamata nueroko aitelekar atekerin, nuabu EJAKAIT komudia kakonyen nuka idwe luka Isirael.
Kanuka ŋun koyau EJAKAIT ekapolon loka ajore naka ekabaka loka Asuria, loabu koyaŋa Manase kirikoi, koen ŋes kasua, koyaŋa Babulon.
Nakejaar ŋesi ocan, kiŋaiŋa EJAKAIT Ekedeke, kitasonikin noi kakonyen nuka Edeke loka lukapapaake.
Kilip ŋes; kopup akeilip, kiira aiŋaiŋake, kinyaku Yerusalem ajakanutuke, Kosodi konyet kojen Manase ebe EJAKAIT ŋes Edeke.
Kolema idekesio lumo, ka ibore yenamai ŋesi kotogo loks EJAKAIT, ka itemwan kere luadukokinit moru loka etogo loka EJAKAIT, ka Yerusalem da, kocaka kina naka ere.
Kiteteu etem loka EJAKAIT, koinak asuban nuka ainakineta nuka ainapakin ka nuka aimal kotomake, kicorak Yuda aijaanakin EJAKAIT, Edeke lokaIsirael.
Konye koroko ituŋa einanakinete asuban kaiboisio nuiceleleete, konye mama ejai EJAKAIT Ekecedeke bon.
Aswamisio ace nuka Manase, ka akeilip mama ejai Edekeke, ka akiro nuka ikadwarak nualimonokinete ŋes kokiror loka EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael, koany, iwadikatai kaswamisio nuka ikabakan luka Isirael.

Akeilip da, ido kwape kiiraria Edeke ŋes, aronisike kere, ka adiakarike, ka aiboisio nuadukokinit ŋesi aiboisio nuiceleleete, kosipok Aserim, ka aputosia nuegerer, eriŋa kitasonikino; koany, iwadikatai kakiro nuka Kosai.
Kojotoor do Manase kalukapapaake, aponi kidaikinai togoke kelopet: kirum Amon okokuke aiboisike.
Kerai Amon loka ikar akaisaarei ka luarei egeuni airum: kirumak ikar iarei koYerusalem.
Kiswama nueroko kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kwape eswamaa Manase papake: koinak Amon asuban mama ejaas aputosia kere nuegerer nuabu Manase papake kiswamau, kijaanak kes.
Mam abu kitasonikin kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kwape kitasonikinor papake; konye kiyatanak Amon ŋol agwaun akiro.
Kinerut ikekejaanakinak asurokin ŋes, koarakis ŋes togokeŋ.
Konye apotu ituŋa luka akwap koarata ŋul kere luenerunete asurokin ekabaka Amon; kodakakis ituŋa luka akwap Yosia okokuke araun ekabaka aiboisike,
Kiswama nuejok kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kolosenenei korotin luka Daudi papaake, komam epaari akan nakoteten karaida nakokediany.

Naarai kokaru lokikanyetekauni loka airumuke, eriŋa erai esapat, kogeu amoot Edeke loka Daudi papaake: kokaru lokitomonet kaarei kogeu aiteseg Yuda ka Yerusalem alemar aiboisio nuiceleleete, ka Aserim, ka aputosia nuegerer, ka aputosia nuecalara;

kobilibilai itemwan luka Ibaalim kakonyeneke; kojepejep aputosia nuka akoloŋ nuiceleleete kokujukec; komunyumuny Aserim, ka aputosia nuegerer, ka aputosia nuecalara, kitarau apua, kipurupuranak atesina nuka ŋul kaluapotu koinakis asuban mamakec.
Kicwei akojo nuka isasedotin kotemwanakec, kiteseg Yuda ka Yerusalem.
Kiswama kwaŋin koreria luka Manase ka Epuraim ka Simeon, kiton Naputali, ka aaponorukec airimor.
Kobilibil itemwan, kidecidec Aserim ka aputosia nuegerer araun apua, kojepejep aputosia nuka akoloŋ anatar akwap kere naka Isirael, koboŋo Yerusalem.

Kopotu mama ejai Kilikia esasedoti lopeti, kijaikis apesan nuayaunitai togo loka Edeke, nuatukokinito Ilebin, ikagolok ekek, kakan naka Manase ka Epuraim, ka aatoŋot kere naka Isirael, ka Yuda kere ka Benyamin, ka luiboiete koYerusalem.
Kijaikis akan naka ikeswamak luiteete etogo loka EJAKAIT; koinakis ikeswamak lueswamaete togo loka EJAKAIT aiteteunia ka apucunio etogo.
Koinakis ikekeok, ka ikadukok, agwelia amor nuikec, ka akito nuimorikikinete, aiswamaa abaoi nuka itogoi luapotu ikabakan luka Yuda komudiasi.

Kiswamata ituŋa kamunonut; ikaanyanarakakec Yakat ka Obadia, Ilebin, lukodwe luka Merari; Sekaria ka Mesulam, lukodwe luka Ikokatin aiteten: ice luka Ilebin da, kere luepedorete airam ejok iboro lueruosi.
Kepolokinito kesi luebwokete abwokon, kitetenata kere lueswamaete ŋolipone loka aijaanakin: ajaas koLebin da ikewadikak, ka ikapolokitok, ka ikagolok.
Koboŋok Kilikia kotema Sapan ekewadikan atiar, “Adum eoŋ eitabo loka ikisila kotogo loka EJAKAIT.” Kosodi Kilikia aijaikin Sapan eitabo.
Kodaka Sapan eitabo mama ejai ekabaka, ido kinyakak ekabaka akiro, ebe, “Iswamaete ikonikejaanakinak kere nukititinitai.
Akorasi apesan nuadumuna kotogo loka EJAKAIT, ejaikis akan naka ikaanyanarak, akan da naka ikeswamak.”
Kosodi Sapan ekewadikan alimokin ekabaka ebe, “Kejaiki Kilikia esasedoti eitabo.” Kosiom Sapan kakonyen nuka ekabaka.
Kicorak ekabaka Kilikia, ka Akikam okoku loka Sapan, ka Abudon okoku loka Mika, ka Sapan ekewadikan, ka Asaia ekejaanakinan loka ekabaka ebe,

“Koloto yesi, kiŋita EJAKAIT kanukaŋ, kanuka ŋul da luideuna koIsirael ka Yuda, akiro nuka eitabo loadumun: naarai epol anyunyura naka EJAKAIT nakibukokina oni, naarai mam lukapapaawok apotu koricito akirot naka EJAKAIT, aiswamaenen kwape ajaatar kere nuiwadikatai oitabo lo.”
Kotema ŋesi kes atiar, “Inera kwanata EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael, ebe, ‘Kolimokis etuŋanan lokijukunit yes neajai ebe.
Inera kwanata EJAKAIT ebe, Koany, ayauni aronis aibois na, ka neejaas luiboiete kotoma, aikenito kere nuiwadikatai oitabo loasiomi kakonyen nuka ekabaka loka Yuda:
naarai kajala, esupuruikis lukisupurununo odekesio ice, aitunyunyurikin eoŋ kaswamisio kere nuka akaninikec; ŋes ebukokinor akanyunyura aibois na, komam eduŋeori.
Konye ekabaka loka Yuda, lokijukuni aiŋitakin EJAKAIT, kolimokis ŋes kwanata ebe, Inera kwanata EJAKAIT Edeke loka Isirael ebe: Nuka akiro nukipupuni,

kanu anonokiaror ekonitau, kitasonikin kakonyen nuka Edeke, naipupunio akekiro aluikin aibois na, aluikin da luiboiete kotoma, kitasonikin kakonyeneka, kocil ikoninapen, komony akiyo kakonyeneka; inera EJAKAIT ebe, Keira eoŋ da,
koany, atukokini jo mama ejaas lukapapaakon, kitukokinio jo ailitikon inapakina, kwabo mam eanyunete akonikonye aronis kere naayauni aibois na, ka luiboiete kotoma.’ ” Kinyakakinai ekabaka akiro.

Kodoka ekabaka togo loka EJAKAIT, ka ituŋa kere luka Yuda, ka lukiboiete koYerusalem, ka isasedotin, ka Ilebin, ka ituŋa kere, lukapolok ka ludidik kere: kosiomak akiikec akiro kere nuka eitabo loka aitutuket loadumun kotogo loka EJAKAIT.

Kobwo ekabaka kaiboisike, kitutuk aitutuket kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, atupit EJAKAIT, airic aicorakinetake, ka aitejenunetake, ka ikisilake, keketau kere, kakeiiar da kere, aitodol akiro kere nuka aitutuket nuewadikatai oitabo lo.
Kitogogoŋ da ituŋa kere Iuadumuna koYerusalem ka Benyamin, aitodol. Kiswamata lukiboiete koYerusalem kwape ajaar aitutuket naka Edeke, Edeke loka lukapapaakec.

Kolema Yosia italesia kere kakwapin kere nuaraas nuka idwe luka Isirael, kisidik luadumuna kere koIsirael aijaanakin, ŋes aijaanakin EJAKAIT Ekecedeke. Apaarasiake kere mam apotu konyoutu katupit EJAKAIT, Edeke loka lukapapaakec.
Kibwaik isasedotin aswamukec, kisinyikok kes aijaanakin kotogo loka EJAKAIT.

Kotema ŋesi Ilebin luisisianakinete Isirael kere, luaraas lukalaunak mama ejai EJAKAIT atiar, “Kibwaikis asaduku nakalaunan togo loabu Solomon okoku loka Daudi ekabaka loka Isirael koduk; mam bobo ejaun abwokon okeperinikus: kijaanakisi do EJAKAIT Ekusideke, ka iketuŋa Isirael.
Kitemonokisi kwape ejaatar ikekia luka lukapapaakus, kabeanakinikus, kwape ajaatar aiwadikaeta nuka Daudi ekabaka loka Isirael, ido kwape ajaatar aiwadikaeta nuka Solomon okokuke.
Kobwaata kaibois nakalaunan kwape ajaatar atiaketa nuka ikekia luka lukapapaakus luka ikusiinacan idwe luka ituŋa, kojaun kanolidiopet atiaket naka ekek loka lukapapaa luka Ilebin.
Koarata lukalelenio, kitalaunos bonik, kitemokis nuka ikusiinacan, aswam kwape ajaar akirot naka EJAKAIT kama ka Musa.”

Koinakis ikapolokoke araun ainakinet naka akote mama ejaas ituŋa, ka isasedotin, ka Ilebin. Apotu Kilikia ka Sekaria ka Yekiel, ikayaitok luka etogo loka Edeke koinakis isasedotin ibaren ludidik ilukumin iarei ka akwat akanykape, ka imoŋin akwat auni araun ainakineta nuka aleleŋio.
Konania da, ka Semaia ka Netanel, iinacanake, ka Kasabia ka Yeiel ka Yosabad, ijaka luka Ilebin, koinakis Ilebin ibaren ludidik ilukumin ikany, ka imoŋin akwat akany.
Koarata lukalelenio, kobwatanakis isasedotin aokot nuejaunete kakanikec, kojenata Ilebin kes.

Kolemasi ainakineta nuicweio, tetere einakinete kwape ajaatar atiaketa nuka ikekia luka lukapapaa luka idwe luka ituŋa, ainakin EJAKAIT, kwape iwadikatere oitabo loka Musa. Kiswamata kwaŋin komoŋin da.
Kopeoto lukalelenio kakim kwape ajaar aicorakinet: kipooto ainakineta nukalaunak kotoma amotii, ka akeito, kasepulian da, kodakasi katipet mama ejaas idwe kere luka ituŋa.

Kokau kitemokis nukec, ka nuka isasedotin da; naarai kirododorito isasedotin odwe luka Aaron ainakin ainakineta nuicweio ka asiepai kiton kuare: kanuka ŋun kitemokis Ilebin nukec, ka nuka isasedotin odwe luka Aaron.

Kejaas ikayook, odwe luka Asap aiboisikec, kwape ajaar aicorakinet naka Daudi, ka Asap, ka Keman, ka Yedutun ekadwaran loka ekabaka; ajaas ikagolok kanolirute: komam ipudas anyoun kaswamukec, naarai kitemokis ikeceinacan Ilebin nukec.
Kwaŋin kitemokin aijaanakin kere naka EJAKAIT kapaaran kaŋin, airic aleleŋio, ainakin da ainakineta nuicweio kotem loka EJAKAIT, kwape ajaar aicorakinet naka ekabaka Yosia.
Koricata idwe luka Isirael luajaas nen aleleŋio kapak kaŋin, ka epucit loka imugatin lumam itubuunitoi apaarasia akanykaarei.

Amamei da aleleŋio naikoni nen naarieitai koIsirael ageun kapaarasia nuka Samuel enabi; kwabo mam ediokabaka loka Isirael abu koric aleleŋio kwape kerieia Yosia, ka isasedotin ka Ilebin, ka Yuda kere ka Isirael luajaas nen, ka lukiboiete koYerusalem.
Kokaru lokitomonet kakanykauni loka airum naka Yosia ŋes kericere aleleŋio ŋin.

Konye kijuka ŋesi ikiyakia mama ejai ebe, “Kimariai inyo eoŋ ka jo, ijo ekabaka loka Yuda? Mam eoŋ kasurokini jo lolo, dimarai asurokin ekek lokijior eoŋ; kecorak Edeke aisunyakin: kinyek ijo aiilokin Edeke, loejai keoŋ, kinyek amudiar jo.”
Konye koŋer Yosia aibelokin akekonyen, konye kitegelikin bon, kosodi ejie kaŋes, mam abu kiira akiro nuka Neko, nuapote kaituk naka Edeke, kobu ejie aditot naka Megido.
Kogumata ikagumak imalia ekabaka Yosia; kobala ekabaka ikekejaanakinak ebe, “Koyaŋaarai eoŋ: naarai kemusuŋi noi.”
Kitodokut ikekejaanakinak ŋes kagali, kibwaikis ŋes agali nakiareit naajai kaŋes, koyaut ŋes Yerusalem; kotwana, aponi kidaikinai atesina nuka lukapapaake. Kibworoto Yuda kere ka Yerusalem Yosia.
Kokuudian Yeremia Yosia: kinerata ikayook kere ka akayook nuka Yosia kakuudianakec, kiton lolo: kitaraut aicorakinet koIsirael: ido koany, iwadikatai roma akuudian.
Aswamisio ace nuka Yosia, ka akeswamisio nuejok, kwape ejaatar nuiwadikatai okisila luka EJAKAIT,
akeswamisio da, nusodit ka nukawasia, koany, iwadikatai oitabo loka ikabakan luka Isirael ka Yuda.
Kerai Yoakas loka ikar akaisaarei ka luuni egeuni airum: kirumak ilapio iuni koYerusalem.
Kireŋea ekabaka loko Misiri ŋes karaut ekabaka koYerusalem, kotubok akwap esolo loka atalatan akwatat nuka epuesa, ka atalata naka esabu.
Kitarau ekabaka loko Misiri Eliakim onaceke ekabaka loka Yuda ka Yerusalem, kilocok ekekiror komaik Yekoiakim. Koyaŋa Neko Yoakas onaceke, kodakarai Misiri.
Kobu Nebukadanesar ekabaka loko Babulon asurokin ŋes, koen ŋes kasua, adakar ŋes Babulon.
Kodaka Nebukadanesar da lukoboro luka etogo loka EJAKAIT Babulon, kibwaik kes oyekaluke koBabulon.
Aswamisio ace nuka Yekoiakim, ka italesio luabu kiswama luadumunio kamakeŋ, koany, iwadikatai oitabo leka ikabakan luka Isirael ka Yuda; kirum Yekoiakin okokuke aiboisike.
Kedol ekaru, kijuka ekabaka Nebukadanesar koyau ŋes Babulon, nepepe kiboro luejok luka etogo loka EJAKAIT, kitarau Sedekia onaceke ekabaka loka Yuda ka Yerusalem.
Kiswama nueroko kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT Ekedeke; mam abu kitasonikin kakonyen nuka Yeremia enabi, lokinera nuapote kaituk naka EJAKAIT.
Kipaliik ŋesi ekabaka Nebukadanesar, lokisiyapoikinit ŋes alimit Edeke: konye kitininik emurisiŋike, kitogogoŋ eketau kinyek aibelokin mama ejai EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael.
Ido kibucasi noi ijaka kere luka isasedotin, ka ituŋa, atupakin italesio kere luka ikapirin; komunaut etogo leka Edeke loabu kitalaunite ko Yerusalem.
Konye kisekeloto ikiyakia luka Edeke, komwaŋito akekiro, kokienatar inabinoke, aitodol neadakunor anyunyura naka EJAKAIT asurokin iketuŋa, aitodol neamameunor aŋaleun.
Iboro da kere luka etogo loka Edeke, lukapolok ka ludidik, ka iboro luka akais nuipu luka etogo leka EJAKAIT, ka iboro luka akais nuipu luka ekabaka, ka luka ikapolokoke; ŋul kere koyau Babulon.
Kicweata etogo loka Edeke, kotiyatiyata arwatat naka Yerusalem, kicweata itogoi lukapolok kere kakim, komudias iborokec kere lukajokak.
Ŋul da luakuete ekileŋ koyaŋa Babulon; koraut ikebulesin ka luka odweke kiton airum naka ajakanut naka Perusia.
Aitodol akirot naka EJAKAIT kaituk naka Yeremia, aitodol nealakaror akwap kasabatonoke; naarai kapak naeswapitor, koricite asabatoke, aitodol ikar akaisakanykaarei.

“Inera kwanata Kuro ekabaka loko Perusia ebe, ‘Kainaki eoŋ EJAKAIT, Edeke loka akuj, ajakanuto kere nuka akwapin; kecoraki da adukokin ŋes etogo Yerusalem, loejai toma Yuda. Ŋin yenejai kayes kotuŋake kere, kojai EJAKAIT Ekedeke kaŋes, kolot.’ ”
Kuro ekabaka loko Perusia, kolimo anatar ajakanutuke kere, kiwadika da ebe:
Ŋin yenejai kayes kotuŋake kere, kojai Ekedeke kaŋes, kolot Yerusalem, loejai toma Yuda, koduk etogo loka EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael, ŋes Edeke, loejai Yerusalem.
Yenesalit da kere, kaŋiniibois naiboiororor, kiŋarakis ituŋa luka aiboisike kepuesa, ka esabu, ka iboro, ka ibaren, komam imarakinito ainakineta nuka akot nuka etogo loka Edeke loejai Yerusalem.’ ”
Ŋul da kere lualukunitos kitogogoŋoto akecekanin kanuka iboro luka epuesa, ka esabu, ka iboro, ka ibaren, ka iboro luka etiai loepol, komam imarakinito kere luainaldnito kanuka akot.
Kitolom Kuro da iboro luka etogo loka EJAKAIT, luabu Nebukadanesar kolem koYerusalem, kibwaik abila naka idekesioke;
ŋupeŋul etolomuni Kuro ekabaka loko Perusia kakan naka Mituredat ekeŋadan, kimarak Sesebasar, ekapolon loka Yuda.
Lo ŋes etiaikec: atuba akaisauni nuka esabu, atuba alukumit nuka epuesa, ikileŋa akaisaarei ka lukanykaoŋon:
atiboi akaisauni nuka esabu, atiboi nuka epuesa nuka epone lokiareit akwat aoŋon ka itomon, ka iboro ice elukumit.
Iboro kere luka esabu ka luka epuesa emwaasi ilukumin ikany ka akwat aoŋon, Abu Sesebasar koyaŋau ŋul kere, nakeyaŋauniata luejoreoritai anyoun koBabulon kiton Yerusalem.
luapotu kouparos ka Serubabel, Yesua, Nekemia, Seraia, Reelaia, Morudeini, Bilisan, Misipar, Bigibai, Rekum, ka Baana.
Etiai lo ka ikiliok luka ituŋa luka Isirael:
idwe luka Paros, ilukumin arei ka akwatat ka akaisakanykaarei ka luarei.
Idwe luka Sepatia, akwat auni ka akaisakanykaarei ka luarei.
Idwe luka Ara akwat akanykaarei ka akaisakanykaarei ka lukany.
Idwe luka Pakat-moab, luka idwe luka Yesua ka Yoab, ilukumin iarei ka akwat akanykauni ka itomon ka luarei.
Idwe luka Elam, elukumit ka akwat aarei ka akaisakany ka luoŋon.
Idwe luka Satu, akwat akanykaoŋon ka akaisaoŋon ka lukany.
Idwe luka Sakai, akwat akanykaarei ka akaisakanykape.
Idwe luka Bani, akwat akanykape ka akaisaoŋon ka luarei.
Idwe luka Bebai, akwat akanykape ka akaisaarei ka luuni.
Idwe luka Asagad, elukumit ka akwat aarei ka akaisaarei ka luarei.
Idwe luka Adonikam, akwat akanykape ka akaisakanykape ka lukanykape.
Idwe luka Bigibai, ilukumin iarei ka akaisakany ka lukanykape.
Idwe luka Adin, akwat aoŋon ka akaisakany ka luoŋon.
Idwe luka Ater, luka Kesekia, akaisakanykaoŋon ka lukanykauni.
Idwe luka Besai, akwat auni ka akaisaarei ka luuni.
Idwe luka Yora, akwatat ka itomon ka luarei.
Idwe luka Kasum, akwat aarei ka akaisaarei ka luuni.
Idwe luka Gibar, akaisakanykaoŋon ka lukany.
Idwe luka Bet-lekem, akwatat ka akaisaarei ka luuni.
Ituŋa luka Netopa, akaisakany ka lukanykape.
Ituŋa luka Anatot, akwatat ka akaisaarei ka lukanykauni.
Idwe luka Asamabet, akaisaoŋon ka luarei.
Idwe luka Kiriat-arim, ka Kepira ka Beerot, akwat akanykaarei ka akaisaoŋon ka luuni.
Idwe luka Rama ka Geba, akwat akanykape ka akaisaarei ka ediopet.
Ituŋa luka Mikimas, akwatat ka akaisaarei ka luarei.
Ituŋa luka Bet-el ka Ai, akwat aarei ka akaisaarei ka luuni.
Idwe luka Nebo, akaisakany ka luarei.
Idwe luka Magabis, akwatat ka akaisakany ka lukanykape.
Idwe luka Elam ece, elukumit ka akwat aarei ka akaisakany ka luoŋon.
Idwe luka Karim, akwat auni ka akaisaarei.
Idwe luka Lod, ka Kadid, ka Ono, akwat akanykaarei ka akaisaarei ka lukany.
Idwe luka Yeriko, akwat auni ka akaisaoŋon ka lukany.
Idwe luka Senaa, ilukumin iuni ka akwat akanykape ka akaisauni.
Idwe luka Imer, elukumit ka akaisakany ka luarei.
Idwe luka Pasur, elukumit ka akwat aarei ka akaisaoŋon ka lukanykaarei.
Idwe luka Karim, elukumit ka itomon ka lukanykaarei.
Ikayook: idwe luka Asap, akwatat ka akaisaarei ka lukanykauni.
Idwe luka ikagolok: idwe luka Salum, idwe luka Ater, idwe luka Talumon, idwe luka Akub, idwe luka Katita, idwe luka Sobai, kes kere akwatat ka akaisauni ka lukanykaoŋon.
idwe luka Keros, idwe luka Siaka, idwe luka Padon;
idwe luka Lebana, idwe luka Kagaba, idwe luka Akub;
idwe luka Kagab, idwe luka Samalai, idwe luka Kanan;
idwe luka Gidel, idwe luka Gakar, idwe luka Reaia;
idwe luka Resin, idwe luka Nekoda, idwe luka Gasam;
idwe luka Usa, idwe luka Pasea, idwe luka Besai;
idwe luka Asana, idwe luka Meunim, idwe luka Nepisim;
idwe luka Bakabuk, idwe luka Kakupa, idwe luka Karur;
idwe luka Basulut, idwe luka Mekida, idwe luka Karasa;
idwe luka Barakos, idwe luka Sisera, idwe luka Tema;
idwe luka Nesia, idwe da luka Katipa.
idwe luka Yaala, idwe luka Darakon, idwe luka Gidel;
idwe luka Sepatia, idwe luka Katil, idwe luka Pokeretkasebaim, idwe luka Ami.
Lu kes luapotu konyout koTel-mela, Tel-karasa, Kerub, Adan, ka Imer: konye mam apedorete aitodun ikekia luka lukapapaakec, ka auriokec, arai araas luka Isirael.
Idwe luka Delaia, idwe luka Tobia, idwe luka Nekoda, akwat akanykape ka akaisakany ka luarei.
Ka idwe luka isasedotin: idwe luka Kabaia, idwe luka Kakos, idwe luka Barasilai, loamanyit aberu kadwe nuka Barasilai Egileadit, loaponi komaikinai ekirorikec.
Komoata ŋul ikiroriakec mama kaŋul kaluaponi kimarakinitete kwape ajaar akeceurio, konye mam apotu kotakanut: kanuka ŋun eomitos ebe emunauna kesi, kireŋearai kes kosasedotene.
Kolimok Etirusata kes ebe mam enyamete iboro lukalaunak noi, aitodol naejaunia esasedoti loejaas Urim ka Tumin.
komam imarakina ikejaanakinakakec ka akejaanakinakakec, luemwaasi ilukumin ikanykaarei ka akwat auni ka akaisauni ka lukanykaarei: ajaas da ikiliok lukayook ka aŋor nukayook akwat aarei.
Emwaasi ibalasinikec akwat akanykaarei ka akaisauni ka lukanykape; inyubunukec akwat aarei ka akaisaoŋon ka lukany;
akaalaikec, akwat aoŋon ka akaisauni ka nukany; asigiria alukumin akanykape ka akwat akanykaarei ka akaisaarei.
Koinakis kwape apedoriata toma aiŋadis naka aswam idarikin
Kwaŋin kiboienenete isasedotin, ka Ilebin, ka ice kotuŋa, ka ikayook, ka ikagolok ka Inetinim koreriakec, ka Isirael kere koreriakec.
Nakedolio elap lokikanyetekaarei, kojaas idwe luka Isirael oreria lukapolok, kotukonokinos ituŋa ketau ediopet Yerusalem.

Kosodi kobwo Yesua okoku loka Yosadak, ka ikeinacan isasedotin, ka Serubabel okoku loka Sealutiel, ka ikeinacan, kodukoto etem loka Edeke loka Isirael, ainanakinia kanen ainakineta nuicweio, kwape kiwadikatere kokisila luka Musa etuŋanan loka Edeke.
Kosipokis etem aiboisike; naarai akuriaka kesi ituŋa luka akwapin kaŋun: koinanakis kanen ainakineta nuicweio neejai EJAKAIT, ainakineta nuicweio tupuruc ka eboŋ.
Koricata epucit loka iswamin, kwape kiwadikatere, koinakis ainakineta nuicweio nuka ŋinipaaran kwape ejaar etiaikec, kwape ejaar aicorakinet, kwape ibusakinitor ŋinipaaran;

kokau ainakinet naicweio natir, ka ainakineta nuka nailamununia elap, ka nuka ipucino kere luka EJAKAIT luecorakinitai luatiakunitai, ka nuka ŋinituŋanan yenabu koinak atai ainakinet naka akot neejai EJAKAIT.
Apaaran nasodit naka elap lokikanyetekaarei ŋes ageuniata ainakin ainakineta nuicweio neejai EJAKAIT: konye koriŋa kesipokina apeteta nuka eyekalu loka EJAKAIT.

Koinakis da ikadukok ka ikekeok apesan; ka lunyaman ka lumatan ka akinyet neejaas luko Sidon, ka luko Turo, alemun iresia koLebanon ayaun kiton aŋolol kiton Yopa, kwape kejaar aeamakinet naka Kuro ekabaka loko Perusia.
Kosodi kobwo Yesua nepepe kodweke ka ikeinacan, Kadumiel da ka odweke, odwe luka Yuda kere nepepe, aroanar ikeswamak luka etogo loka Edeke: odwe luka Kenadad ka odwekec ka ikeceinacan Ilebin.
Komeanakinos ayoore aiturit ka aimal EJAKAIT ebe,
“Naarai ejok ŋesi,
naarai ejaenena akeitim ikar kere mama ejai Isirael.”
Kikareoto ituŋa kere keporoto loepol, nakituritotor EJAKAIT, naarai ebwaikin apetetait naka etogo loka EJAKAIT.

Konye luipu lukosasedotin ka Ilebin, ka ikapolok luka ikekia, imakio luapotu koanyut etogo losodit, napibwaikinio apetetait naka etogo kalo kakonyenekec, komonyata keporoto loepol; luipu da kikareoto kanuka aiyalama:
komam ituŋa apedorete atiakun eporoto loka ekare kanuka aiyalama ka eporoto loka aimony naka ituŋa; naarai kikareoto ituŋa keporoto loepol, kiirarai ekare kama elwana.
Kepuputu da lukasurupo luka Yuda ka Benyamin ebe adukoto idwe luejoreoritai eyekalu loka EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael;

kikunyakis kesi neejai Serubabel, ka ikapolok luka ikekia luka lukapapakec, kobalas ebe, “Mere kadukoto nepepe kayes: naarai kimoot isio Ekusideke, kwape kayesi; kiinakini isio ŋes asuban ageun kapaarasia nuka Esar-kadon ekabaka loka Asuria lokitodokuni sio nee.”

Konye Serubabel, ka Yesua ka ice kere luka ikapolok luka ikekia luka lukapapa luka Isirael, kotemasi kes atiar, “Mam kipuda yes aimorikikin kasio kotoma aiduk etogo loka Ekosideke; konye sio kiduki bonik etogo loka EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael, kwape abu Kuro ekabaka loko Perusia kicorakinia.”
koropata ikapetak akiro aluikin kes, aitikokin akeceinerun, apaarasia kere nuka Kuro ekabaka loko Perusia, aitodol naerumia Dario ekabaka loko Perusia.
Kairum naka Akasuero, ageunet naka airumuke, kiwadikata aosan lukiboiete ko Yuda ka Yerusalem.

Kapaarasia nuka Aratasasata apotu Bisilam, ka Mituredat, ka Tabeel, ka lukaupake ice kere, kiwadikata mama ejai Aratasasata ekabaka loko Perusia; ewadikatai ebalua keiwadikae loka Suria, kaŋajep naka Isurian.
Kiwadikata Rekum lokebuku, ka Simisai ekewadikan ebalua mama ejai Aratasasata ekabaka asurokin Yerusalem kopone kalo:
Kosodete kiwadikata Rekum lokebuku, ka Simisai ekewadikan, ka iukaupakec ice kere; Idinaitin, Iparasatakain, Itarapelin, Ipasian, Irakebain, Ibabulonin, Isusanikin, Idekain, Ilamein,
ka atekerin ace kere nukitwobotuni Osunapar lokapolon lokaibuses, kibwaik ore loka Samaria, ka akwap ace da okekwa juwai, ka ace da.
Ikopuna nu kobalua lokijukakinete kesi: “Aratasasata ekabaka: Ikonikejaanakinak, ituŋa luka okekwa juwai, ka ace da.
Kojen ekabaka ebe adolut Iyudayan luanyounete kamakon mamakosi Yerusalem; edukete ere lokepali lokaronon da, adaut arwatatin, eteteut da apeteta.
Aso kojen ekabaka ebe, arai keduki ere lo, kodaunai da arwatatin, mam kes elemete esolo loka ituŋa, ka esolo loka iboro, ka esolo loka ikalotok da, kosodi kokau etwakiarete ikabakan.
Aso do naarai kinyami abalaŋ naka etogo loka ekabaka, mam ibus sio aanyun aitisilio naka ekabaka, kanuka ŋun kijukakinit aitejenikin ekabaka;

koŋicai oitabo loka aisiitonokin loka lukapapakon: kwaŋin idumuni koitabo loka aisiitonokin ijenuni kwape eraar ere lo ere lokepali, loitisili ikabakan ka ibukui, ebe da apotu kipaliikis apeŋo kotomake: kanuka ŋun da amudiarere ere lo.
Kitejenunit ekabaka ebe, arai keduki ere lo, kodaunai da arwatatin, kanuka ŋun mam ijaun ijo kewai okekwa juwai.”
Kosodi ekabaka aijukar aboŋokin mama ejai Rekum lokebuku, ka Simisai ekewadikan, ka lukaupakec ice kere lukiboiete ko Samaria, kakwap ace nakokekwa juwai ebe, “Kinapakinos, ka ace da.
Aponi kasomakin eoŋ kaitebeikin ebalua lokijukakinete yesi sio.
Kebwaik ekisil, komoata, apotu kodumutu ebe ere ŋol ageun apeŋo ebilanakini ikabakan ebotet aipaliikin ka amwaŋit da inerununoo kotomake.
Ido ajaenenas ikabakan lukagogoŋ luapolokinete Yerusalem, luayaitos akwap kere okekwa juwai; atacanakinio kes esolo loka ituŋa, esolo loka iboro, ka esolo loka ikalotok da.
Aso do kibwaikisi ekisil, kitanaŋata ituŋa lu aswam, kinyek ere ŋol adukio, aitodol naebwaikinia eoŋ ekisil.
Kocoito kinyeis aijalakin kaŋun: kanukinyo tikepolooror aronis aitwataniar ikabakan?”
Kosodi aswam nakotogo loka Edeke loejai Yerusalem aitananio; aponi kitanaŋai aitodol okaru lokiareit loka airum naka Dario ekabaka loko Perusia.
Kosodi Serubabel okoku loka Sealutiel ka Yesua okoku loka Yosadak anyoun, kogeutu aiduk etogo loka Edeke loejai Yerusalem; kojaas da nepepe kakes inabin luka Edeke kiŋarakinito.
Kasodete aboŋokin kes kwanata ebe, “Lukaŋai bo ikiroria luka ituŋa luedukete etogo lo?”
Konye itei akoŋu naka Edekekec imakio luka lyudayan, komam itanaŋio aswamukec, aitodol neitodolikinere akiro neejai Dario, kosodi adumun aboŋokinet kobalua kanuka akiro kaŋun.
kijukasi ebalua loewadikatai kwanata ebe: “Mama ejai ekabaka Dario ainapakin kere.

Kojenu ekabaka ebe kipou kapotu obuku loka Yuda, togo loka Edeke lokapolon loedukitai kamor nuepolok, ido ibwaikinitai akito toma arwatatin, aswam na da elosi iyatanakin kakukuranut ka arereŋ kotoma akaninikec.
Kasodete aiŋit imakio ŋul katemasi kes atiar, ‘Iŋai bo kiinakini yes ekisil aiduk etogo lo, ka adaun da arwatat na?’
Keŋitata da ikiroriakec, aitejenun jo, tetere kiwadikai ikiroria luka ituŋa lueyaitos kes.
Kosodete kesi aboŋokin ebe, ‘Kirai isio ikejaanakinak luka Edeke loka akuj ka akwap, kiduki da etogo lokedukitoi apeŋo ikar kwi luipu, loabu ekabaka lokapolon loka Isirael kodaunite aiduk.
Konye kokau kitunyunyurikis lukapapaakosi Edeke loka akuj, kijaik kes akan naka Nebukadanesar ekabaka loko Babulon Ekaludayat, loabu komudia etogo lo, koŋata da ituŋa Babulon.
Konye kokaru losodit loka Kuro ekabaka loko Babulon, abu ekabaka Kuro kibwaik ekisil aiduk etogo lo loka Edeke.

Iboro da luka esabu ka luka epuesa luka etogo loka Edeke, luabu Nebukadanesar koŋat koyekalu loajai Yerusalem koyaŋa oyekalu loka Babulon, kolem ekabaka Kuro ŋul koyekalu loka Babulon, aponi koinakinai etuŋanan ekekiror Sesebasar, loetaraunit ekayaiton.
Kotema ŋes atiar, “Koyaŋa iboro lu, kolot kibwaik toma oyekalu loejai Yerusalem, kodukoi etogo loka Edeke kaiboisike.”
Kosodi Sesebasar abunore, kibwaik apeteta nuka etogo loka Edeke loejai Yerusalem: netikolo ageunere kapaarasia kaŋun kiton kwana eriŋa ca edukio, konye mam edauna.’

Aso do arai itojokit ekabaka, komoai toma aiŋadis naka ekabaka naejai Babulon arai ikote nen, ebe kibwaik Kuro ekabaka ekisil aiduk etogo lo loka Edeke Yerusalem, kijuka ekabaka nuitojokit ŋesi kakiro kaŋun,”
Kodumunai anunuket koAkameta, kotogo lokapolon loejai obuku loka Media, aponi kiwadikatete tomake kwanata araut aisiitunet.

“Kokaru losodit loka Kuro ekabaka, kibwaik Kuro ekabaka ekisil; Kanuka etogo loka Edeke koYerusalem, kodukoi etogo aibois naainanakinere asuban, kopesikinai apeteta kagogoŋ; amukururuke ikubitin akaisakanykape, alalauke ikubitin akaisakanykape;
ikokoron iuni luka amor nukapolok, ka ekokoro loka akito nukitetiak: kotacakinai etiaikec kotogo loka ekabaka:

kinyakarai da iboro luka esabu ka luka epuesa luka etogo loka Edeke lualemari Nebukadanesar koyekalu loejai Yerusalem luayauni Babulon, koyaŋaarai bobo oyekalu loejai Yerusalem, ŋinibore aiboisike, ibwaikini kes togo loka Edeke.”
kinyeis aswam naka etogo kala loka Edeke; koduk ekayaiton loka Iyudayan ka imakio luka Iyudayan etogo lo loka Edeke aiboisike.

Bobo da ebwaikin ekisil nuiswamakinete imakio lu luka Iyudayan aiduk etogo lo loka Edeke: koinakinai koboro luka ekabaka, ŋes esolo lokokekwa juwai, kotacakinai ituŋa lu kainyikokin, kinyeis aitikokinio.

Iboro da luiburao, imoŋin lutoba, ka imerekekin, ka imerekekin ludidik, araun ainakineta nuicweio mama ejai Edeke loka akuj, akima, ka abalaŋ, ka ebino ka akinyet, kwape ejaananar akirot naka isasedotin luejaas Yerusalem, koinanakinete ŋinipaaran komam aisal.
Tetere einanakinete asuban nuka asakat naeuru saa mama ejai Edeke loka akuj, kilipanakinete aijar naka ekabaka ka naka odweke da.
Ebwaik da ekisil ebe, loijulanakini akirot na, koketunai akitoi kotogoke, kodakarai ŋes koenikinai neni korau eketogo ameje.

Edeke da loabu kibwaik ekekiror ŋina isibirori ikabakan kere ka atekerin, luerionorete akecekanin aijulakin akirot, amudiar etogo lo loka Edeke loejai Yerusalem. Eoŋ Dario ebwaik ekisil; kiswamai kainyikokin kere.”

Kodukoto imakio luka Iyudayan kokeriakata da, kanuka aidwar naka Kagai enabi ka Sekaria okoku loka Ido. Kodukoto kodautu, kwape ajaar aicorakinet naka Edeke loka Isirael, kwape ajaar ekisil loka Kuro, ka Dario, ka Aratasasata ekabaka loko Perusia.
Kodaun etogo lo kapaaran nakiwuniet naka elap Adar, kokaru lokikanyetekape loka airum naka Dario ekabaka.

Koinakis kanuka atiakunio naka etogo lo loka Edeke, imoŋin lutoba akwatat, imerekekin akwat aarei, imerekekin ludidik akwat aoŋon; ido ikorwa itomon ka luarei araut ainakinet naka adiakaret naka Isirael kere, kwape ajaar etiai loka atekerin nuka Isirael.
Kibwaikis isasedotin katukonokec, ka Ilebin kabeanakinikec, aijaanakin Edeke, loejai Yerusalem; kwape ewadikatere oitabo loka Musa.
Naarai etesegara isasedotin ka Ilebin; araas kere luasegara: koarata lukaleleŋ kanuka idwe kere luka aijoreorio, ka iinacanakec isasedotin, kanukec da bonik.
Konyama idwe luka Isirael, luapotu koboŋutu kaijoreorio, ka ŋul da kere luapotu kogitara anyoun kotoma asilianut naka ikapirin luka akwap, amoot EJAKAIT Edeke loka Isirael.

Koricata epucit loka imugatin lumam itubuunitoi apaarasia akanykaarei kaiyalama: naarai abu EJAKAIT kisiyalamik kes, abu kijulakinite etau loka ekabaka loka Asuria neejaas, aitogogoŋ akecekanin kaswam naka etogo loka Edeke, Edeke loka Isirael.
okoku loka Salum, okoku loka Sadok, okoku loka Akitub,
okoku loka Amaria, okoku loka Asaria, okoku loka Meraiot,
okoku loka Serakia, okoku loka Usi, okoku loka Buki,
koku loka Abisua, okoku loka Pinekas, okoku loka Eleasar, okoku loka Aaron esasedoti lopeti:

abu Esera ŋol konyou abunore koBabulon; kerai ŋesi ekewadikan loakapakina kokisila luka Musa luabu EJAKAIT Edeke loka Isirael koinak: koinak ekabaka ŋes kere nuabu kilip, kanuka akan naka EJAKAIT Ekedeke naajai kaŋes.
Kobu ŋesi Yerusalem kolap lokikanyet kokaru lokikanyetekaarei loka ekabaka.
Naarai kapaaran nasodit naka elap losodit ŋes ageunia ŋesi anyoun koBabulon, kapaaran da nasodit naka elap lokikanyet ŋes adolio Yerusalem, kanuka akan nakajokan naka Ekedeke naajai kaŋes.
Naarai abu Esera kibwaikinite eketau amoot ikisila luka EJAKAIT, ka aiswamaenen da, ka aisisianakin toma Isirael ikisila ka itubesia.
Na ŋes aikopunet naka ebalua loabu ekabaka Aratasasata koinak Esera esasedoti, ekewadikan, ŋes ekewadikan loka akiro nuka aicorakineta nuka EJAKAIT, ka loka ikisilake mama ejai Isirael.
“Aratasasata, ekabaka loka ikabakan, mama ejai Esera esasedoti, ekewadikan loka ikisila luka Edeke loka akuj, loedolit, ka ace da.
Ebwaikini ekisil, mama ejaas ŋul kere lukotuŋa luka Isirael, ka ikecesasedotin, ka Ilebin, lukotoma ayaetaitika, luekotos alosit Yerusalem kanukec, kouparos kajo.
Naarai kijukarit jo ekabaka ka ikekenerunak ikanykaarei, aiŋitun akiro nuka Yuda ka Yerusalem, kwape ejaatar ikisila luka Edekekon luejaas akanikon;
koyaŋa da epuesa ka esabu, luainakis ekabaka ka ikekenerunak kanukec mama ejai Edeke loka Isirael, loiboienenei koYerusalem.
Epuesa da ka esabu kere loidumuni kobuku kere loko Babulon, nepepe ka ainakineta nuka akot nuka ituŋa ka nuka isasedotin, nuainakinete kanukec kanuka etogo loka Edekekec loejai Yerusalem;

ŋes ibusakinitor ainyikokin noi agwel kiboro kalu imoŋin lutoba, imerekekin, imerekekin ludidik, ka ainakinetakec nuka akiria, ka ainakinetakec numatan, ijaikini kotem loka etogo loka Edekekus loejai Yerusalem.
Ŋinibore kere yenitojoki jo ka ikoniinacan aitwasamaa epuesa ka esabu loedeuna, kiswamata kwape ekotor Ekusideke.
Iboro da lukiinakinio kanuka aijaanakin nakotogo loka Ekusideke, koinak kakonyen nuka Edeke loka Yerusalem.
Ido luipudai kere aiyatakin luibusakinito ainakin kanuka etogo loka Ekonideke, koinak kotogo lokaiŋad loka ekabaka.
Kiton atalatan akwatat nuka epuesa, ka aitemisio akwatat nuka akima, ka akaalakanya akwatat nuka ebino, ka akaalakanya akwatat nuka akinyet, ka abalaŋ namam ebilunitai etiaike.
Ŋin naecorakinit Edeke loka akui, kiswamaenenete cut kanuka etogo loka Edeke loka akuj; naarai kanukinyo ti kebunokinia anyunyura ayaetait naka ekabaka ka odweke?

Ido kitejenuni yes nuka isasedotin ka Ilebin, ikayook, ikagolok, Inetinim, arai ikejaanakinak luka etogo kala loka Edeke, timam ibusakinit atubokin kes esolo loka ituŋa, esolo loka iboro, karaida esolo loka ikalotok.
Ido ŋol lomam iyuuni aswam ikisila luka Edekekon, ka ikisila luka ekabaka, korubokin ŋes kainyikokin kere, arai naka aario, arai naka aireŋeario, arai naka ademario luke, arai naka aenio.”

loetalala aitim mamaka kakonyen nuka ekabaka, ka ikekenerunak, kakonyen da nuka ikapolok kere lukagogoŋ luka ekabaka. Kagogoŋoor kanuka akan naka EJAKAIT Ekadeke naajai keoŋ, katukok kotoma Isirael ikapolok aupar kaeoŋ.
Lu kes ikapolok luka ikekia luka lukapapaakec, na da ŋes aur naka ŋul kaluauparos kaeoŋ anyoun koBabulon, kairum naka Aratasasata ekabaka.
Kodwe luka Pinekas, Geresom: kodwe luka Itamar, Daniel: kodwe luka Daudi, Katus.
Kodwe luka Sekania; kodwe luka Paros, Sekaria: nepepe kaŋes aponi kimarakinitete kaur naka ikiliok akwatat ka akaisakany.
Kodwe luka Pakat-moab, Eliekoenai okoku loka Serakia; nepepe kaŋes da ikiliok akwat aarei.
Kodwe luka Sekania, okoku loka Yakasiel; nepepe kaŋes da ikiliok akwat auni.
Kodwe luka Adin, Ebed okoku loka Yonatan; nepepe kaŋes da ikiliok akaisakany.
Kodwe luka Elam, Yesaia okoku loka Atalia; nepepe kaŋes da ikiliok akaisakanykaarei.
Kodwe luka Sepatia, Sebadia okoku loka Mikael; nepepe kaŋes da ikiliok akaisakanykauni.
Kodwe luka Yoab, Obadia okoku loka Yekiel; nepepe kaŋes da ikiliok akwat aarei ka itomon ka lukanykauni.
Kodwe luka Selomit, okoku loka Yosipia; nepepe kaŋes da ikiliok akwatat ka akaisakanykape.
Kodwe luka Bebai, Sekaria okoku loka Bebai; nepepe kaŋes da ikiliok akaisaarei ka lukanykauni.
Kodwe luka Asagad, Yokanan okoku loka Kakatan; nepepe kaŋes da ikiliok akwatat ka itomon.
Kodwe luka Adonikam, lukawasia; lu kes ikecekiroria, Elipelet, Yeuel, ka Semaia, nepepe kakes da ikiliok akaisakanykape.
Kodwe luka Bigibai, Utai ka Sabud; nepepe kakes da ikiliok akaisakanykaarei.
Kasodi anyaraun Elieser, ka Ariel, ka Semaia, ka Elunatan, ka Yarib, ka Elunatan, ka Natan, ka Sekaria, ka Mesulam, ituŋa lukapolok; ka Yoiarib, ka Elunatan, luaraas ikesisianakinak.
Kejuka kes neejai Ido ekapolon loka aibois Kasipia; kalimok nuelimokinete Ido, ka ikeinacan Inetinim, kaibois Kasipia, tetere kiinunete sio ikejaanakinak luka etogo loka Edekewok.
Kanuka akan nakajokan naka Edekewok naajai kaoni, koinutu etuŋanan lokacoa, lokodwe luka Mali, okoku loka Lebi, okoku loka Isirael; ka Serebia, ka odweke ka iinacanake, itomon ka lukanykauni;
ka Kasabia, ido nepepe kaŋes Yesaia lokodwe luka Merari, iinacanake ka odwekec, akaisaarei;
luka Inetinim, luapotu Daudi ka ikapolok koinakis aijaanakin Ilebin, Inetinim akwat aarei ka akaisaarei: kolimoroi kere ikecekiroria.

Naarai keleicik ailip ekabaka erioŋet loka iserikalei ka ikebwanenok aigaŋakin korot kama ejaas lukasurup: naarai kipou kenerata kekabaka ebe, “Akan naka Edekekosi ejai kaŋul kere kaluemoete ŋes, kanuka ajokis; konye apedorike ka anyunyurake eluikini ŋul kere luinyeinete ŋes.”
Kipou do kaluŋata, keŋaiŋaata Edekewok akirot ŋin: kiira ŋesi aiŋaiŋakosi.
Kasodi atiakun itomon ka luarei kokapolok luka isasedotin, Serebia, ka Kasabia, ka itomon koinacanakec kakes,
ketemok kes epuesa, ka esabu, ka iboro, ŋes ainakinet kanuka etogo loka Edekewok naainak ekabaka ka ikekenerunak, ka ikapolokoke, ka Isirael kere luajaas nen:
Ketemok cut akanikec atalatan nuka epuesa akwat akanykape ka akaisakany, ka iboro luka epuesa atalatan akwatat; esabu da atalatan akwatat:
ka atiboi nuka esabu akaisaarei nuka idarikin elukumit; ka iboro iarei luka aisinit naejok naiputut, luka akais nuipu bala esabu.
Kabala kes atiar, “Iraas yesi lukalaunak mama ejai EJAKAIT, iboro da eraas lukalaunak; epuesa ka esabu kes ainakinet naka akot mama ejai EJAKAIT, Edeke loka lukapapaakus.
Kokwenyete, kidarete; aitodol naitemioto kes kakonyen nuka ijaka luka isasedotin ka Ilebin, ka ikapolok luka ikekia luka lukapapaa luka Isirael, koYerusalem, kotoma agolai nuka etogo loka EJAKAIT.”
Kesodete isasedotin ka Ilebin aijaun aitemis naka epuesa ka esabu, ka iboro, ayaŋaar Yerusalem togo loka Edekewok.
Kapotu Yerusalem, kadautu da apaarasia auni kanen.

Kapaaran nakiwoŋonet aponi kitemoi epuesa ka esabu ka iboro kotogo loka Edekewok kakan naka Meremot okoku loka Uria esasedoti; nepepe kaŋes ajai Eleasar okoku loka Pinekas; nepepe kakes ajai Yosabad okoku loka Yesua, ka Noadia okoku loka Binui, Ilebin;
kere kwape ejaar ekecetiai ka akecelaŋir da: kiwadikai alaŋiru kere kapakio kaŋun.
Koinakis lukibukui luka ekabaka, ka ikayaitok lukokekwa juwai aicorakineta nuka ekabaka: kisigalikis ituŋa ka etogo loka Edeke.
Naarai emanyete apesurukec, komanyanakinete odwekec da; kwaŋin kinyalinyalun aur nakalaunan katekerin nuka akwapin: eebo, akan naka ikapolok ka ikayaitok ŋes ageiki adiakanar ŋin.”
Naapupunio akirot ŋin, kacil anapitoka ka elouka, kenyul itima luka akouka ka lukopenekika, kasala eboie kaumokinit.
Kotukonokinos neajai kere luamaranete kakiro nuka Edeke loka Isirael, kanuka aidiak naka ŋul kaluejoreoritai; kasala eboie kaumokinit aitodol ainakinet naka eboŋ.
Kosodi keinakini ainakinet naka eboŋ, kanyou kaisilarika, kociliciluna anapitoka ka elouka; kakukokini kakuŋinika, kariono akakanin mama ejai EJAKAIT Ekadeke;
kener atiar, “Wu Ekadeke, keruma eoŋ ileic, kekamu aitirir aitonyoun akonyeneka mama ijai, wu Ekadeke: naarai eyatakinos numam adolitekosi adepar akwesikosi, apoloor agwaunitekosi adolo toma akuj.

Ageun kapaarasia nuka lukapapaakosi kidiakanari akiro nukos kiton lolo; kanuka numam adolitekosi, ŋes kiinakinere sio, ka ikosikabakan, ka isasedotinikosi akanin nuka ikabakan luka akwapin, neejai ekileŋ, ka aijoreorio, ka aŋasio, ka aisurumio da ileic, kwape lolo.

Kwana da, kapak naeuriana, etodun asianut naebuni kama ejai EJAKAIT Ekosideke, aideikin aatoŋot naaku, kainakini da sio aseitoit kaiboisike nakalaunan, kitacaik Edeke akosikonye, kainakini da adioisikwarunio kobulesenekosi.

Naarai kirai ibulesin; konye mam Edeke kinyeinit sio kobulesenekosi, konye kiyataki aitimio kakonyen nuka ikabakan luka Perusia, ainakin sio aikwarun, ka aiduk etogo loka Edekekosi, aiteteun da aapoŋoruke, ainakin da sio arwatat koYuda ka Yerusalem.
“Aso do, wu Edekekosi, kiŋeri anu akaulo kaŋun? Naarai kipou kenyeis akoniicorakineta,

nuibu kicorak kama kikonikejaanakinak inabin, ebe, ‘Akwap nailomarete airum, ŋes akwap namam elai kanuka amamus aila naka ituŋa luka akwapin, kanuka italesiakec, luesilelebata asilianutukec epuai kepuai da.

Aso do sirikikorakis akusipesur otelepaikec, karaida amanyanakin ikusitelepai akecepesur, siriikotononos ainapakinikec karaida asulianyikec ikar kere: tetere igogoŋooros, inyamete ajokis naka akwap, inyeiniata ikusidwe araun airumet ikar kere.’

Ido kedautu ŋun adolokin sio kanuka aswamisiokosi nueroko, kanuka agwaun akiro nuepolok, naarai ijo Ekosideke ibu kitican sio kwabo mere kwape ibusakinitor numam adolitekosi, koinak sio aatoŋot kwape na.
Kibili kereka bobo isio aicorakinetakon, karaunos ikamurak luka atekerin nuiswamaete italesia ŋul? Ti mam kinyunyuranakini aitodol nekimudiaria, komamei aatoŋot, karaida luekuete?

Wu EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael, irai ijo loidolit; naarai kisalaki isio kirai aatoŋot naaku, kwape ejaar lolo: koany, kija kakonyenekon kagwaunetekosi; naarai emamei loepedori aibwo kakonyenekon kanuka ŋun.”

Koboŋok Sekania okoku loka Yekiel, ediopet kodwe luka Elam, kotema Esera atiar, “Kibuca kama ejai Edekewok, aimany aŋor numo nuka atekerin nuka akwap: konye kwape kwana ejai amunonut neejai Isirael kanuka ŋun.

Aso do ketutukoto aitutuket ka Edekewok aireŋear aŋor kere, ka lueurito kesi, kwape ejaar ainerun naka ejakaitika, ka ŋul luemaranete toma aicorakinet naka Edekewok, ido kiswamaunai kwape ejaar ekisil.
Konyou; naarai akirot ŋin nakon, isio da kija kajo; kicata, kiswama.”
Kosodi Esera anyoun, kisiyapo ijaka luka isasedotin, ka lebin, ka Isirael kere, ebe kiswamaenenete kwape ejaar akirot ŋin. Kiyapoto do.
Aponi kolimoroi anatar Yuda ka Yerusalem, mama ejaas idwe kere luka aijoreorio, kotukonokinos Yerusalem;
Ido yenimam ebuni toma apak naka apaarasia auni, kwape ejaar ainerun naka ikapolok ka imakio, kotwania ikeboro kere, ka ŋes elopet kogelarai kokodet loka aijoreorio.
Kobwo Esera esasedoti kolimok kes ebe, “Ipotu kibucasi komanya aŋor numo, kosodete aiyatakin adiakar koIsirael.
Aso do kolimosi mama ejai EJAKAIT, Edeke loka lukapapaakus, kiswamata nuitojokit ŋesi: kogitaros katekerin nuka akwap, ka aŋor numo da.”
Kosodi ekodet kere aboŋokin keporoto loepol ebe, “Kwape inerar ijo akirokosi, kwape kwaŋin kibusakinitor aswam.
Konye ipu ituŋa, ido ŋes apak naka akiru naepol, mam kipedori aibwo kokiŋa, ido na mere ŋes aswam naka apaaran adiopet arai aarei: naarai kibuca noi kakirot kana.

Aso koseunai ikapolokokosi kokodet kere, ka ŋul kere luejaas toma oreriakosi luemanyito aŋor numo kopotu kapakio nueseunitai, ido nepepe kaŋul, imakio luka ŋolire, ka ikatubokoke, aitodol neibelokinor anyunyura naededeŋ naka Edekewok anyoun kamawok, aitodol naedaunor akirot ŋin.”
Konye kobwaata Yonatan okoku loka Asakel ka Yaseia okoku loka Tikuba aiŋer akirot na: kigaŋakis kes Mesulam ka Sabetai Elebit.

Kiswamata idwe luka aijoreorio kwaŋin. Kotiakunai Esera esasedoti, ka ice kokapolok luka ikekia luka lukapapaakec, kwape ajaatar ikekia luka lukapapaakec, kes kere ebilitai ikecekiroria; kiboikinos kapaaran nasodit naka elap lokitomonet aiŋic akirot ŋin.
Kodautu akiro nuka ikiliok kere luamanyito aŋor numo koroko apaaran nasodit naka elap losodit etuboro.
Apotu koriosi akecekanin kwape ireŋeariata do akeceŋor; ido naarai agwaunito akiro, koinakis emerekek lokosipan kanuka agwaunikec.
Kodwe luka Imer; Kanani ka Sebadia.
Kodwe luka Karim; Maaseia, ka Eliya, ka Semaia, ka Yekiel, ka Usia.
Kodwe luka Pasur; Elioenai, Maaseia, Isimael, Netanel, Yosabad, ka Elasa.
KoLebin; Yosabad, ka Simei, ka Kelaia (ŋes ŋol Kelita), Petakia, Yuda ka Elieser.
Kokayook: Eliasib: kokagolok; Salum, ka Telem, ka Uri.
Kodwe luka Elam; Matania, ka Sekaria, ka Yekiel, ka Abidi, ka Yeremot, ka Eliya.
Kodwe luka Satu; Elioenai, Eliasib, Matania, ka Yeremot, ka Sabad, ka Asisa.
Kodwe luka Bebai; Yekokanan, Kanania, Sabai, Atalai.
Kodwe luka Bani; Mesulam, ka Maluk, ka Adaia, ka Yasub, ka Seal, ka Yeremot.
Kodwe luka Pakat-moab; Adana ka Kelal, ka Benaia, ka Maaseia, ka Matania, ka Besalel, ka Binui, ka Manase.
Kodwe luka Karim; Elieser, ka Isiya, ka Malakiya, ka. Semaia, ka Simeon;
Benyamin, ka Maluk, ka Semaria.
Kodwe luka Kasum; Matenai, ka Matata, ka Sabad, ka Elipelet, ka Yeremai, ka Manase, ka Simei.
Kodwe luka Bani; Maadai, ka Amuram, ka Uel;
Benaia, ka Bedeia, ka Keluki;
Bania, ka Meremot, ka Eliasib;
Matania, ka Matenai, ka Yaasu;
ka Bani, ka Binui, ka Simei,
ka Selemia, ka Natan, ka Adaia;
Makanadebai, ka Sasai, ka Sarai;
Asarel, ka Selemia, ka Semaria;
Salum, ka Amaria, ka Yosep.
Kodwe luka Nebo; Yeiel, ka Matitia, ka Sabad, ka Sebina, ka Ido, ka Yoel, ka Benaia.
Ŋul kere amanyito aŋor numo; ajaas ice kakesi aŋor nuauritotor idwe.
Kosodi kanen kolap Kisileb kokaru loka akaisaarei, naajar eoŋ toma Susan togo lokapolou,
kobu Kanani, ediopet koinacanaka koYuda, ŋes ka icetuŋa; keŋitata nuka Iyudayan kaluakuete, luapotu kosalakinitos toma aijoreorio, ka akiro da nuka Yerusalem.
Kabalasi eoŋ ebe, “Aatoŋot naasalakinit kotoma aijoreorio ŋina obuku aanyut ican luipu ka amoromoroo: ido abilibilun arwatat naka Yerusalem, iruteike da ecwei kakim.”
Kosodi kanen, keira akiro ŋun, keboikin kamony akiyo, kebwor da apaarasia ace; kaluŋ kelip kakonyen nuka Edeke loka akuj,
kenera da atiar, “Keŋaiŋait jo, wu EJAKAIT, Edeke loka akuj, Edeke lokapolon lokaŋosibib, loericit aitutuket ka aitim mama kaŋul kalueminas ka aricit da akeicorakineta:

kiira kakonikit, akonikonye da kokwenyut, kiira ailip naka ekonikejaanakinan, naelipit kakonyenekon kapak kana, apaaran ka akuare da, kanuka ikonikejaanakinak idwe luka Isirael, alimori aronisio nuka idwe luka Isirael, nukidiakana kamakon: eebo, kidiaka eoŋ ka ekek loka papaka.
Kipou keswamata nukasilianut kamakon, kwabo mam kipou karicata aicorakineta, karaida ikisila, karaida itubesia, luibu kicorak ekonikejaanakinan Musa.
Keŋaiŋait, kiitu akirot naibu kicorak ekonikejaanakinan Musa kobala ebe, ‘Arai kibucasi yesi, kesiarisiarete cut toma atekerin.

Konye arai kiboŋut mamaka, koricenenete da akaicorakineta, ka aiswemaenen kes, karaida aponi kireŋearai lukus kiton awasia cut naka akuj, konye atukonokini kes kaŋina, kasodi ayaun toma aibois naabu kaseu aisiroikin nen ekakiror.’
Aso lu kes ikonikejaanakinak, ka ituŋakon, luibu kolaku kakonipedor naepol, kakanikon nakagogoŋ.

Wu EJAKAIT, keŋaiŋait, kiira cabo akonikit ailip naka ekonikejaanakinan, ka ailip da naka ikonikejaanakinak luiyalamas aiyoŋ ekonikiror: keŋaiŋait, kisirereŋ lolo ekonikejaanakinan, koinak aitimio kakonyen nuka etuŋanan kalo,”
Arai eoŋ ekaliyan loka ekabaka.
Kabala ekabaka eoŋ atiar, “Inyo bo lolo ekadakinitotor akonikonyen, naarai mam jo ideka? Mam na erai acekirot dimarai akadakinite nakotau.” Kasodi akurianar noi.
Kasodi katema ekabaka ebe, “Kobusenenei ekabaka ikar kere: ti inyo kisimiki akakonyen akadakinite, emejeiki ere, aibois naka atesin nuka lukapapaaka, iruteike da ecwei kakim?”
Kosodi ekabaka atemar eoŋ atiar, “Ilipit inyo?” Kelip do Edeke loka akuj.
Katema eoŋ ekabaka atiar, “Arai kitojok ekabaka, arai edumunit ekonikejaanakinan asianut kakonyenekon, kijukarai Yuda, ore loka atesina nuka lukapapaaka, kaduk.”
Katema ekabaka eoŋ atiar (eboie akabaka da kidunyas kaŋes), “Erai bo akonilosit naka apaarasia imwaasi ai? Ido iboŋuni wori?” Kitojok ekabaka aijukar eoŋ: ketodik apak.
Bobo da katema ekabaka atiar, “Arai itojokit ekabaka kainakin ibaluan mama ejaas lukibukui lukokekwa juwai, tetere kacamakinio atubor adolore toma Yuda.

Ka ebalua da mama ejai Asap ekedaran loka amagoro naka ekabaka, tetere kainakini akito aiswamaunia abaoi nuka irutei luka etogo lokagogoŋ loidunyasi etogo, ido nuka arwatat naka ere, nuka etogo da loalomari.” Kiyu ekabaka, kanuka akan nakajokan naka Ekadeke naajai kaeoŋ.
Kasodi abunore mama ejaas lukibukui lukokekwa juwai, kainak kes ibaluan luka ekabaka. Abu ekabaka keyakiarite eoŋ nepepe ka ikapolok luka ajore ka ikebwanenok.
Kepuput Sanabalat Ekoronit, ka Tobia ekejaanakinan, Emonait, kokadakis kesi noi, naarai ebunit etuŋanan atamakin aisigalikin idwe luka Isirael.
Kanyou kuare, eoŋ nepepe kituŋa luikidioko; ido mam abu kalimok etuŋanan nuabu Ekadeke kibwaik otauka aiswamakin Yerusalem: kwabo amamei ecetiaŋ kere dimarai etiaŋ loebwanenit.
Kaloma kuare korute loka Aditot, mama ejai Atan naka Apiu, orute da loka Aoret, kasodi aiŋic arwatatin nuka Yerusalem nuebilibilunos, ka iruteike luecwei kakim.
Kasodi aiyatakin neejai erute loka Ecor kiton Atapar naka Ekabaka: konye komameun erot lotikitor etianaka loebwanenit.
Kasodi kadoka kuare kaguurut, aiŋic arwatat; kebelokin, kaloma korute loka Aditot, kabon kwaŋin.
Mam ikapolok apotu kojenutu kwape abu kalosio, karaida nuabu keswama; kwabo mam ber alimokinit Iyudayan, karaida isasedotin, karaida isotia, karaida ikayaitok, karaida ice kere lueswamaete.
Kalimok kes kwape ejaar akan nakajokan naka Ekadeke keoŋ; ka akiro da nuka ekabaka nuabu kalimok eoŋ. Kobalas ebe, “Kanyoutu, kaduko.” Kosodete kitogogoŋoto akecekanin kanuka aswam ŋin naejok.
Konye kepuput Sanabalat Ekoronit, ka Tobia ekejaanakinan, Emonait, ka Gesem Earabut, kokienatatar sio noi, komwaŋata da, kobalas ebe, “Inyo bo na naiswamaete yesi? Ikotosi aipaliikin ekabaka?”
Kasodi kaboŋok kes katema atiar, “Kisirereŋi sio Edeke loka akuj; ŋes kiinakini sio ikekejaanakinak kinyouni aiduk: konye emamei yes ainakinet, karaida apedor, karaida aisiitunet, kotoma Yerusalem.”
Kotupakinete ŋes ituŋa luka Yeriko aiduk. Kotupakin kes Sakur okoku loka Imiri aiduk.
Kodukoto odwe luka Kasenaa erute loka Lukecor; kopesikis abaoike, kosipokis ikiriginike, ka igolisike, ka atiketake.
Kotupakin kes Meremot, okoku loka Uria, okoku loka Kakos, Kotupakin kes Mesulam okoku loka Berekia, okoku loka Mesesabel aiteteun. Kotupakin kes Sadok okoku loka Baana aiteteun.
Kotupakinete kes Itekoin aiteteun: konye mam isotiakec ibwaikinito imurisiŋakec aswam naka ejakaitikec.
Kotupakinete kes Melatia Egibeonit, ka Yadon Emeronotit, ituŋa luka Gibeon, ka luka Misipa, aiteteun, naarai keraas lukeyait lokebuku lokokekwa juwai.
Kotupakin ŋes Usial okoku loka Karakaia ikatatak luka esabu, aiteteun. Kotupakin ŋes Kanania ediopet kokenyalak aures, aiteteun, kitogogoŋoto Yerusalem kiton arwatat naelal.
Kotupakin kes Rapaia okoku loka Kur, ekayaiton loka atutubet naka ebuku loka Yerusalem aiteteun.
Kotupakin kes Yedaia okoku loka Karumap aiteteun neesesenas ketogoke. Kotupakin ŋes Katus okoku loka Kasabaneia aiteteun.
Malakiya okoku loka Karim, ka Kasub okoku loka Pakat-moab, kiteteut ecewai, ka etogo loeoja loka iupa.
Kotupakin ŋes Salum okoku loka Kalokes, ekayaiton loka atutubet naka ebuku loka Yerusalem aiteteun, ŋes ka akepesur.

Kotupakin ŋes Nekemia okoku loka Asabuk, ekayaiton loka atutubet naka ebuku loka Betsur, aiteteun kiton aibois naesesenas katesina nuka Daudi, kiton atapar naabokitai, kiton da togo loka ituŋa lukirigin.
Kotupakis ŋes Ilebin, Rekum okoku loka Bani aiteteun. Kotupakin ŋes Kasabia, ekayaiton atutubet naka ebuku loka Keila, aiteteun kanuka ebukuke.
Kotupakis ŋes ikeceinacan, Babai okoku loka Kenadad, ekayaiton loka atutubet naka ebuku loka Keila aiteteun.
Kotupakin Eser okoku loka Yesua, ekayaiton loka Misipa, aiteteun ewai ece, loasesenas kaneedokarere toma aiŋadis naka lujiis neekudio arwatat.
Kotupakin ŋes Baruk okoku loka Sabai aiteteun ewai ece kakukuranut, anyoun kaneekudio arwatat kiton okek loka etogo loka Eliasib esasedoti lopeti.
Kotupakin ŋes Meremot okoku loka Uria, okoku loka Kakos aiteteun ewai ece, anyoun kokek loka etogo loka Eliasib aitodol onaŋe loka etogo loka Eliasib.
Kotupakis ŋes isasedotin, ituŋa luka Apuuton, aiteteun.
Kotupakinete kes Benyamin ka Kasub aiteteun neasesenas kekecetogo. Kotupakin Asaria okoku loka Maaseia okoku loka Anania aiteteun osiep loka etogoke.
Kotupakin Binui okoku loka Kenadad aiteteun ewai ece, anyoun kotogo loka Asaria aitodol neakudokinia arwatat, ka aitodol agor da.
Kiteteu Palal okoku loka Usai neakudio arwatat, ka etogo loeoja loiririkina togo lokokuju loka ekabaka, loedunyas kalaro naka ikedarak. Kotupakin Pedaia okoku loka Paros aiteteun.
(Kiboienenete Inetinim koOpel aitodol aibois naesesenas kerute loka Akipi kokide, ka etogo loeoja loelitoro kiŋa.)
Kotupakis Itekoin aiteteun ewai ece, loesesenas ketogo loeoja loepol loelitoro kiŋa, aitodol arwatat naka Opel.
Kotupakin Sadok okoku loka Imer aiteteun neasesenas keketogo. Kotupakin Semaia okoku loka Sekania ekagolon erute lokokide aiteteun.
Kotupakinete Kanania okoku loka Selemia, ka Kaŋun okoku lokikanyetekape loka Salap, aiteteun ewai ece. Kotupakin Mesulam okoku loka Berekia aiteteun neasesenas kakegola.
Kotupakin Malikiya ediopet kokatatak luka esabu aiteteun aitodol togo loka Inetinim, ka loka ikagwelanarak, loasesenas kerute loka Kamipikad, aitodol neadokarere agor.
Ido kiteteut ikatatak luka esabu ka ikagwelanarak kidiŋ kaneadokarere agor ka erute loka Amerekekin.

Kiner kakonyen nuka iinacanake ka ajore naka Samaria, kobala ebe, “Iswamaete inyo Iyudayan lu lukalanyak? Ekotosi kereka abwaun bobo? Ekotosi ainakin asuban? Ekotosi adaun kapaaran adiopet? Ekotosi aisikwarun amor katukon nuka aapoŋor, naarai icweitai?”
Kosodi Tobia Emonait loedunyas kaŋes kotema atiar, “Kaŋin da yenedukito kesi, arai kicaka ekue, ebilibilei arwatatakec nakamor.”
Kiira ijo, wu Edekekosi; naarai kimeni: kinyakak amorositikec akwesikec, kokorak aŋatario kakwap nakaijoreorio:
sirikirapak numam adolitekec, aronisikec da kinyek amwatario kakonyenekon: naarai kitunyunyurikis jo kakonyen nuka ikadukok.
Kasodete kadukoto arwatat; arwatat kere kimorikikin nepepe aitodol atutubet naka amukururuke: naarai apotu ituŋa kibwaikis itauon aswam.
Konye kepuput Sanabalat, ka Tobia, ka Iarabun, ka Imonain, ka Isudodain, ebe iyatanakin aswam naka aiteteun arwatatin nuka Yerusalem, ageun da ainwok arorwaitin, konyunyurikinos noi;
kinerutu kere nepepe aponare aitiji Yerusalem, aisiyaloŋoŋ lukotoma.
Konye kipou kelipata mama ejai Edekekosi, aibwaikin da ikekwenyanarak paaran ka kuare da kanukec.
Kotema Yuda atiar, “Eŋoŋar agogoŋ naka ikebwokak abwokon, ipu aapoŋor; tape mam kipedori aiduk arwatat.”
Kotemasi lukasurupokosi atiar, “Mam ejenunete, karaida aanyun, aitodol nekilomaria kidiŋikec, kasodete aiar, ketanaŋata aswamukec.”
Kosodi kanen, kepotu Iyudayan luaraas iidunyetakec, kolimokis kesi sio aatenak atomon kaiboisio kere ebe, “Ibusakinit koboŋut mamakosi.”
Ŋes kebwaikinia ituŋa toma atutubeta nuijesakina kapak naajai kau karwatat, kaiboisio nuelapat, kebwaik do ituŋa kwape ajaatar ikekiakec, kojaas da kikileŋakec, ka akwarasikec, ka akabwaikec da.

Kasodi kasesen, kanyou, katema isotia, ka ikayaitok, ka ituŋa ice atiar, “Sirikiyoŋa kes: kiitunitos EJAKAIT, loepol lokaŋosibib, kojiosi kanuka iinacanakus, ka idwekus, lusap ka lupesur, ka aŋorokus ka itogoikus da.”

Kosodi kanen, agear kapak kaŋin, eswamaenenete atutubet naka ikakejaanakinak aswam, kitiŋito atutubet kakesi akwaras, ka ibukui, ka akabwai, ka ikootin luka asua; kojaananas ikayaitok kau kekek kere loka Yuda.
Ŋul luadukenenete arwatat, ka ŋul luebwokenenete abwokon kigugunatos, kiswamai ŋinituŋanan aswam kadiopekan, kitiŋite nace da yenijiisike.
Ikadukok da, koenikinite ŋinituŋanan ekileŋike aŋabeteke, kodukenenei kwaŋin. Ŋol da loakusenenei arupepe kijaenena keoŋ.
Kalimoki isotia, ka ikayaitok, ka ituŋa ice ebe, “Epol aswam, elal da, kiderakina oni karwatat, elwanikina ŋinituŋanan ka yenice:
kotoma ŋiniibois naiirariata eporoto loka arupepe, kokerununete ayuun sio; kijiikini Edeke oni.”
Kasodete keswamaenenete aswam: kitiŋenenete atutubetekec akwaras ageun ecilakide kiton neetakanuniata aacer.
Ido toma apak kaŋin kalimok ituŋa ebe, “Koperenenei ŋinituŋanan ka ekekejaanakinan toma Yerusalem, koraananas ikedarakakosi kuare, ido kitaaritos paaran.”
Kanuka ŋun mam kilacununei inapenekosi, karaida eoŋ karaida ikainacan, karaida ikakejaanakinak, karaida ituŋa lukedarak lukatupito eoŋ, kolosenenei ŋinituŋanan atan itiŋit yenijiisike.
Naarai ajaas luabalananas ebe, “Kipu isio, ka idwe kosi lusap ka lupesur: kadumutu akima, kanyama kajara da.”
Kojaas ice da luabalananas ebe, “Kititiŋaari isio imanikoriakosi, ka amanat nuka emusabibu, ka itogoikosi: kadumutu akima kanuka eteŋei.”
Kojaas da luabalananas ebe, “Kipou kayuunos kapesan nuka esolo loka ekabaka komanikoriakosi ka amanat nuka emusabibu.

Konye do awatekosi eputosi bala awat nuka iinacanakosi, ka idwekosi kwape idwekec: ido koany, kitubuleseni idwekosi lusap ka lupesur araut ibulesin, ido ace kadwekosi adaut aitubulesenio: ido emamei sio nukiswamai aitikokinia; naarai ejaas icetuŋa kimanikoriakosi ka amanatakosi nuka emusabibu.”
Kasodi keneru bon, kapega kaisotia ka ikayaitok, kabala kes ebe, “Itubonokinete ameda, ŋinituŋanan konaceke.” Katukonok atukonokin naepol.

Katema kes atiar, “Kipou isio kalakutu kwape kipedoria ikosiinacan Iyudayan, luagwelaritai mama ejaas ikapirin; yes da ikotosi agwelar iinacanakus, ti kereka kigwele isio kes?” Kosodete kesi aililiŋ, mam apotu koboŋokis akirot.
Katema da atiar, “Akirot naiswamaete yesi mam ejok; mam kereka ti ibusakinit yes alosenen kaiyoŋ Edekewok, kanuka amorosit naka ikapirin lukasurupowok?
Eoŋ da, ikainacan ka ikakejaanakinak kiyuuni kes kapesan ka akima kimedaikis. Keŋaiŋait, kenyeis ameda.

Keŋaiŋait, kinyakakisi lolo kes imanikoriakec, amanatakec nuka emusabibu, amanatakec nuka iseitunin, ka itogoikec, ido idiopet kakwatat yenika apesan, ka yenika akima, ka ebino ka akinyet, luitelemenenete yesi.”
Kosodete kesi atemar atiar, “Kinyakakini isio, komam kitepeseni kes; kiswamai kwaŋin, kwape ibalar.” Kasodi anyaraun isasedotin, kesiyapo kes, ebe iswamaete kwape esumunioto.

Abu da kelakilak ekagoe kener atiar, “Kilakilakakini Edeke kwaŋin ŋinituŋanan kotogoke, kotoma aswamisioke, yenimam itodolikini aisumunet na; kilakilakakinio kwaŋin, adaun.” Kobala ekodet kere ebe, “Amen.” Kituroto EJAKAIT. Kiswamata do ituŋa kwape esumunioto.

Konye ikayaitok lukolo lukageikinete kitelemununete ituŋa lukenyamete, emugati ka ebino, kogelara isekelin akaisaoŋon luka epuesa; eebo, ka ikecekejaanakinak da ayaitos kwaŋin ituŋa: konye eoŋ, mere ŋes naeswamaenenei, kanuka aiyoŋ Edeke.
Eebo, abu kadunyak aswam naka arwatat kana, komam kigweli adisilup: kotukonokinos ikakejaanakinak kere kaswam.
Ido kojaananas komesaka luka Iyudayan ka ikayaitok ituŋa akwatat ka akaisakany, kogelara ŋul luapote mama kijaa isio kokapirin lukirimorito sio.

Luepoenenoo luka apaaran adiopet, emoŋ ediopet ka amerekekin akanykape nuseuna; ido kepoonokinio eoŋ da akokoroi, irwan atipet da ŋunupaarasia atomon ebino loka ŋolipone: ido karaida kejaas kwaŋin mam abu ketelem atap naka ekayaiton, naarai kelaŋirikinit ebulesene ituŋa lu.
Wu Ekadeke, kiitu neajai kanuka ajokis, kere nueswamak eoŋ ituŋa lu.
Keyakikis Sanabalat ka Gesem eoŋ kobalas ebe, “Kobia, keriamunos ediopet koreria luka apuuton naka Ono.” Konye keomito aiswamakin eoŋ aronis.
Kasodi aijukar ikiyakia mama ejaas kesi ebe, “Eswamai eoŋ aswam naepol, mam apedori alosit: inyo bo ti kitaŋania aswam, eoŋ ajalakin ŋes abunore mama ijaas?”
Keyakikis bobo kwaŋin irwan aoŋon; kaboŋok kwape kwaŋin.
Kosodi Sanabalat aijukun ekekejaanakinan kwape kwaŋin irwan nakikanyet kitiŋite ebalua loepukoro kakanike;

ewadikatai kotomake ebe, “Elimorokinitai toma atekerin, abu da Gasimu kolim ebe, kwape iwomitotor ijo ka Iyudayan aipaliikin; ŋes kiinakini iduki arwatat: ikoto araun ekabakakec, kwape ejaatar akiro ŋun.
Ibwaiki da inabin luelimonokinete nukon ko Yerusalem, kineras atiar, ‘Ejai ekabaka toma Yuda’: kwana da itejenunio ekabaka kwape ejaatar akiro ŋun. Aso do, kobia, kenerut.”
Kasodi aiyakikin ŋes ebe, “Mam iswamaunitai akiro ŋun kwape inerar ijo, konye isabi ijo elopet kotaukon.”
Naarai akotosi kesi kere aitukurian sio ebe, “Kokalanyakata akaninikec, kinyek aswam aiswamaunio.” Konye kwana, wu Edeke, kitogogoŋ ijo akakanin.
Katema atiar, “Etuŋanan loetia ne bala eoŋ tikeker? Iŋai da loetia ne bala eoŋ yeni ti keloma oyekalu aitajar akeijar? Mam alomari.”
Kamisiik, ido koany, mam abu Edeke kijukunite ŋes: konye abu ŋesi kolimite adwaretait na nakaluikin: naarai aropitos Tobia ka Sanabalat ŋes.
Keropio kakirot kana tetere akurianari eoŋ kasodi aswam ŋun, kadiaka, kosodete kesi adumun akirot naerono kasodete amoromoroo.
Wu Ekadeke, kiitu Tobia ka Sanabalat kwape ajaatar aswamisiokec nu, ka anabi Noadia da, ka inabin ice, luti ketukurianata.
Kodaun arwatat kapaaran naka akaisaarei ka nukany kolap Elul, kotoma apaarasia akaisakany ka nuarei.
Kosodi kanen, kepuputu lukasurupokosi ŋun, kokuriakaros ikapirin kere lukirimorito sio, kodisiakaros kesi kakonyenekec: naarai koanyutu ebe aswam na eswamaa Edekekosi.
Ido kapaarasia kaŋun apotu isotia luka Yuda kiyakiasi ibaluan luipu mama ejai Tobia, luka Tobia da kopotu mama ajaas kesi.
Naarai ajaas koYuda luipu luapotu kiyapoikinito naarai kerai ŋesi ekamuran loka Sekania okoku loka Ara; abu okokuke Yekokanan komanyite akoku naka Mesulam okoku loka Berekia.
Ido kinerenenas aswamisioke nuejok kakonyeneka, kolimonokinete ŋes akiroka. Kiyakuununei Tobia ibaluan aisiyonia eoŋ.
abu ketitiŋ onaceka Kanani, ka Kanania ekayaiton loka etogo lokagogoŋ ayait Yerusalem: naarai kerai lomunot, koyoŋite Edeke aitelekarit luepu.

Kasodi atemar kes atiar, “Sirieŋaanario irutei luka Yerusalem eroko akoloŋ emwanuuna; naebwoenenata kesi idarete, kogolonokinete ikekia, kotikete katiketa: kibwaanakinete ikedarak kaŋul luiboiete ko Yerusalem, ŋinituŋanan kabeanakinike, ka ŋinituŋanan asesena keketogo.”
Alal ere, kopol da; konye ekidioko ituŋa luajaas toma, komam itogoi da edukuk.
luapote nepepe ka Serubabel, ka Yesua, ka Nekemia, ka Asaria, ka Raamia, ka Nakamani, ka Morudekai, ka Bilisan, ka Misiperet, ka Bigibai, ka Nekum, ka Baana.
Etiai loka ikiliok luka ituŋa luka Isirael:
idwe luka Paros, ilukumin iarei ka akwatat ka akaisakanykaarei ka luarei.
Idwe luka Sepatia akwat auni ka akaisakanykaarei ka luarei.
Idwe luka Ara, akwat akanykape ka akaisakany ka luarei.
Idwe luka Pakat-moab, lukodwe luka Yesua ka Yoab, ilukumin iarei ka akwat akanykauni ka itomon ka lukanykauni.
Idwe luka Elam, elukumit ka akwat aarei ka akaisakany ka luoŋon.
Idwe luka Satu, akwat akanykauni ka akaisaoŋon ka lukany.
Idwe luka Sakai, akwat akanykaarei ka akaisakanykape.
Idwe luka Binui, akwat akanykape ka akaisaoŋon ka lukanykauni.
Idwe luka Bebai, akwat akanykape ka akaisaarei ka lukanykauni.
Idwe luka Asagad, ilukumin iarei ka akwat auni ka akaisaarei ka luarei.
Idwe luka Adonikam, akwat akanykape ka akaisakanykape ka lukanykaarei.
Idwe luka Bigibai, ilukumin iarei ka akaisakanykape ka lukanykaarei.
Idwe luka Adin, akwat akanykape ka akaisakany ka lukany.
Idwe luka Ater, luka Kesekia, akaisakanykaoŋon ka lukanykauni.
Idwe luka Kasum, akwat auni ka akaisaarei ka lukanykauni.
Idwe luka Besai, akwat auni ka akaisaarei ka luoŋon.
Idwe luka Karip, akwatat ka itomon ka luarei.
Idwe luka Gibeon, akaisakanykaoŋon ka lukany.
Ituŋa luka Betlekem ka Netopa, akwatat ka akaisakanykauni ka lukanykauni.
Ituŋa luka Anatot, akwatat ka akaisaarei ka lukanykauni.
Ituŋa luka Betasamabet, akaisaoŋon ka luarei.
Ituŋa luka Kireat-yearim, Kepira, ka Beerot, akwat akanykaarei ka akaisaoŋon ka luuni.
Ituŋa luka Rama ka Geba, akwat akanykape ka akaisaarei ka lodiopet.
Ituŋa luka Mikimas, akwatat ka akaisaarei ka luarei.
Ituŋa luka Bet-el ka Ai, akwatat ka akaisaarei ka Iuuni.
Ituŋa luka Nebo ece, akaisakany ka luarei.
Ituŋa luka Elam ece, elukumit ka akwat aarei ka akaisakany ka luoŋon.
Idwe luka Karim, akwat auni ka akaisaarei.
Idwe luka Yeriko, akwat auni ka akaisaoŋon ka lukany.
Idwe luka Lod, ka Kadid ka Ono, akwat akanykaarei ka akaisaarei ka lodiopet.
Idwe luka Senaa, ilukumin iuni ka akwat akanykaoŋon ka akaisauni.
Idwe luka Imer, elukumit ka akaisakany ka luarei.
Idwe luka Pasur, elukumit ka akwat aarei ka akaisaoŋon ka lukanykaarei.
Idwe luka Karim, elukumit ka itomon ka lukanykaarei.
Ilebin: idwe luka Yesua, luka Kadumiel, lukodwe luka Kodeba, akaisakanykaarei ka luoŋon.
Ikayook: idwe luka Asap, akwatat ka akaisaoŋon ka lukanykauni.
Ikagolok: idwe luka Salum, idwe luka Ater, idwe luka Talumon, idwe luka Akub, idwe luka Katita, idwe luka Sobai, akwatat ka akaisauni ka lukanykauni.
Inetinim: idwe luka Sika, idwe luka Kasupa, idwe luka Tabaot;
Idwe luka Keros, idwe luka Sia, idwe luka Padon;
idwe luka Lebana, idweluka Kagaba, idwe luka Salamia;
idwe luka Kanan, idwe luka Gidel, idwe luka Gakar;
idwe luka Reaia, idwe luka Resin, idwe luka Nekoda;
idwe luka Gasam, idwe luka Usa, idwe luka Pasea;
idwe luka Besai, idwe luka Meunim, idwe luka Nepusesim;
idwe luka Bakabuk, idwe luka Kakupa, idwe luka Karukur;
idwe luka Basilit, idwe luka Mekida, idwe luka Karasa;
idwe luka Barakos, idwe luka Sisera, idwe luka Tema;
idwe luka Nesia, idwe luka Katipa.
idwe luka Yaala, idwe luka Darakon, idwe luka Gidel;
idwe luka Sepatia, idwe luka Katil, idwe luka Pokeretkasebain, idwe luka Amon.
Inetinim kere, ka idwe luka ikejaanakinak luka Solomon, emwaasi akwat auni ka akaisakanykaoŋon ka luarei.
idwe luka Delaia, idwe luka Tobia, idwe luka Nekoda, akwat akanykape ka akaisaoŋon ka luarei.
Luka isasedotin: idwe luka Kobaia, idwe luka Kakos, idwe luka Barasilai loamanyit aberu kotoma adwe nuka Barasilai Egileadit, komaikinai ekirorikec.
Komoata ŋul neewadikatai kes kotoma kaŋul kaluemaritai kaurikec, konye mam abu kotakanu: kanuka ŋun koomitos ebe amunaunos, kireŋearai kosasedotene.
Kotema Etirusata ebe kinyeis ainyam iboro lukalaunak noi, aitodol neebwoia esasedoti loejai Urim ka Tumim.
Ekodet kere nepepe emwaasi ilukumin akaisaoŋon ka luarei, ka akwat auni ka akaisakanykape,
komam imarakin ikejaanakinakakec ka akejaanakinakakec, luemwaasi ilukumin ikanykaarei ka akwat auni ka akaisauni ka lukanykaarei: ajaas da ka ikayook ka akayook akwat aarei ka akaisaoŋon ka lukany.
Emwaasi ibalasinikec akwat akanykaarei ka akaisauni ka lukanykape; inyubunukec, akwat aarei ka akaisaoŋon ka lukany.
