Akaalaikec, akwat aoŋon ka akaisauni ka nukany; asigirianakec, alukumin akanykape ka akwat akanykaarei ka akaisaarei.
Apotu ice kokapolok luka ikekia luka lukapapaakec koinakis idarikin ilukumin akaisaarei luka esabu, ka ilatirin ilukumin iarei ka akwat aarei luka epuesa toma aiŋadis naka aswam.
Luainakinete ice da kotuŋa kes idarikin ilukumin akaisaarei luka esabu, ka ilatirin ilukumin iarei luka epuesa, ka inapen luka isasedotin akaisakanykape ka lukanykaarei.
Kedolo elap lokikanyetekaarei ajaas idwe luka Isirael oreriakec.
Koyau Esera esasedoti ikisila akonyen nuka atukot, ikiliok ka aŋor da, ka kere luapedorete apupun kajenun, kapaaran nasodit naka elap lokikanyetekaarei.

Kosiom nu koiŋaren kaibois naelal naesesenas kerute loka Akipi ageun tupuruc sek kiton kidiŋ paaran, kojaas kiliok ka aŋor da, ka ŋul luapedorete ajenun; kitoikis ituŋa kere apupokin eitabo loka ikisila.

Kobwo Esera ekewadikan kotut loka akito, loekeitoi kanuka ŋun; kobwaata Matitia, ka Sema ka Anaia, ka Uria, ka Kilikia, ka Maaseia eiduny kaŋes kakekan nakoteten; kakekan da nakokediany Pedaia, ka Misael, ka Malakiya, ka Kasum, ka Kasabadana, ka Sekaria, ka Mesulam.
Kopuko Esera eitabo kakonyen nuka ituŋa kere; (naarai ajai kuju kituŋa kere;) kepuko, kobwaata ituŋa kere.
Kimala Esera EJAKAIT, Edeke lokapolon. Koboŋokis ituŋa kere ebe, “Amen, Amen”; kikianarete akaninikec: kosodete kituluroto akwesikec, komaata EJAKAIT, kitulurito akecekonyen kwap.

Ido Yesua, ka Bani, ka Serebia, ka Yamin, ka Akub, ka Sabetai, ka Kodia, ka Maaseia, ka Kelita, ka Asaria, ka Yosabad, ka Kanan, ka Pelaia, ka Ilebin, kitejenut ituŋa ikisila; kobwaata ituŋa kaiboisiokec.
Kosiomata eitabo, toma okisila luka Edeke, nuepuposi; koyautu apolou, kojenunos nuasomio.

Kosodi atemar kes atiar, “Koloto, konyamata asiepai, komata luewiny, kijukakis akorakineta ŋin yenimam itemokinitoi ibore: naarai apaaran na nakalaunan mama ejai EJAKAIT iwok: kwabo sirikikadakis; naarai aiyalama naka EJAKAIT ŋes agogonokus.”
Kisililinata Ilebin ituŋa kere ebe, “Kililiŋata, naarai erai apaaran nakalaunan; kwabo sirikikadakis.”
Kolototo ituŋa kere ainyam ka aimat, ka aijukar akorakineta, kaitalakar naepol noi, naarai ajenutu akiro nualimonokinio kes.
Kapaaran nakiareit da kotukonokinos ikapolok luka ikekia luka lukapapaa luka ituŋa kere, ka isasedotin, ka Ilebin, neejai Esera ekewadikan, aitoikin aki neejaas akiro nuka ikisila.
Koanyut nukiwadikatai okisila, kwape abu EJAKAIT kicorakinia kama ka Musa ebe koperenenete idwe luka Isirael oswamin kopucit loka elap lokikanyetekaarei.

Koramenenete kolimonokinete koreriakec kere, ka Yerusalem ebe, “Koloto moru, koomata atenuna nuka eseitun, ka atenuna da nuka eseitun loka ais, ka atenuna nuka ikadasia, ka atenuna nuka idukudukun, ka atenuna nuka ikito luetumito, aiswamaa iswamin, kwape kiwadikatere.”

Kosodete ituŋa alomar, koyaŋaut kes, kiswamata da iswamin, ŋinituŋanan oswi loka etogoke, ka alaroikec, ka alaroi nuka etogo loka Edeke, kaibois da naelal naka erute loka Akipi, kaibois da naelal naka erute loka Epuraim.

Kiswamata ekodet loka ŋul kere luaboŋunete kaijoreorio iswamin, kiboikinos oswamin: naarai agear kapaarasia nuka Yesua okoku loka Nun aitodol apaaran ŋin mam idwe luka Isirael eswamaenenete kwaŋin. Kojai ailel naepol noi.

Ido ŋinipaaran, agear kapaaran nasodit aitodol apaaran nakawasia, asiomenenei ŋesi kotoma oitabo loka ikisila luka Edeke. Koricata epucit apaarasia akanykaarei; apaaran nakikanyetekauni kojai atukonokinet nakayamakina, kwape ajaar aicorakinet.
Kotiakar aur naka Isirael komo kere, kobwaata kolimonosi aronisiokec ka numam adolit nuka lukapapaakec.
Kobwaata kaiboisiokec, kosiomata kotoma oitabo loka ikisila luka EJAKAIT Ekecedeke kodaut atutubet nakiwoŋonet naka apaaran; atutubet ace nakiwoŋonet kolimosi, komaata EJAKAIT Ekecedeke.
Kosodete kobwaata Yesua, ka Bani, ka Kadumiel, ka Sebania, ka Buni, ka Serebia, ka Bani, ka Kenani, kadoketa nuka Ilebin, komonyakis EJAKAIT Ekecedeke keporoto loepol.

Kosodete Ilebin, Yesua, ka Kadumiel, ka Bani, ka Kasabaneia, ka Serebia, ka Kodia, ka Sebania, ka Petakia, kotemasi atiar, “Kobwaata, kimalata EJAKAIT Ekusideke, ameun ikar luŋo kiton ikar kere: kituritete ekonikiror loka aibuses, loitopolooritai aitelekarite aimal ka aiturit kere.
Irai ijo EJAKAIT Edeke, loabu koseu Aburam ka alemun ŋes kour loka Ikaludean, kosodi amaikin ŋes ekiror Aburaam;

ibu kodum eketau erai lomunot kakonyenekon, kosodi kitutuk kaŋes aitutuket ainakin akwap naka Ekanaanit, ka Ekitit, ka Emorait, ka Eperisit, ka Eyebusit, ka Egirugasit, ainakin aurike, ido ibu ijo kitodolik akonikiro; naarai irai ijo loidolit.
“Ido ibu koany aiticanitoi naka lukapapaakosi koMisiri, kosodi apupun aimonyokec kariri naka Aŋolol Nakareŋan;
kitodu da aanyuneta ka nukaumokin kama ejai Parao, ka ikekejaanakinak kere, ka ituŋa kere luka akwapuke; naarai ibu kojen eiturikec kamakec; kodumunia ekiror, kwape ejaar lolo.
Ido ibu kotiak aŋolol kakonyenekec, kitoroto kidiŋ kaŋolol kakwap naeonit; ŋul da luebwapitos kes ibu kocakak ataro, kwape ecakarere amoru toma akipi nuegogoŋ.
Ido bobo ibu kiŋarenikinite kes kopir loka edou paaran; kopir da loka akim kuare; acaikinite kes korot lotikitoroto.
Ido ibu kodoku komoru Sinai, kinere kakes ijai toma akuj, kosodi ainakin kes itubesia luetenito, ka ikisila lukabeit, apucuneta ka aicorakineta nuejok.
Kitejenu kes asabatokon nakalaunan, kicorak kes aicorakineta, ka apucuneta, ka ekisil, kama ka Musa ekonikejaanakinan.
Koinak da inyamat luapote kokuju kanuka eteneikec, kitolomik kes akipi kotoma atiida kanuka akurekec, kicorak kolomasi airum akwap naibu korio akonikan ainakin kes.

koŋeroto arimar, mam da apotu kiitutu nnkaumokinikon nuibu kosub kotomakec; konye kitininikata imurisiŋakec, kibwaikis ekayaiton kipaliikis aboŋor obulesenekec, konye irai ijo Edeke loitemonokino aision, lokasianut, loileleba aitim, loiyapi anyunyurtkin, loepol aitim, mam ibu kojal kes.
Eebo, kedautu kesi asubun itaok yenicalara, kobalas ebe, ‘Yen ŋes Edekekon lokitolomuni koMisiri,’ ido kiswamatos nukitunyunyurikinete noi;

konye ijo kanuka aitimikon nakiponesio luipu mam ibu kojalak kes kamodiŋ: mam epir loka edou anyoununei kamakec paaran, aiŋarenikinite kes korot; karaida epir loka akim kuare, acaikinite kes, aitodikinitor erot lotikitoroto.
Ido ibu koinak ekonimoyo lokajokan aituutoonor kes, mam ibu kimik emanukon aitukekec, ibu koinak kes akipi kanuka akurekec.
Eebo, ibu kitanenenei kes ikar akaisaoŋon kamodiŋ, komamei ibore yenepudasi; mam ikecenapen amojoŋenenete, mam akecekejen abuununete.
Ido ibu koinak kes ajakanuto ka atekerin, nuibu kokorak kwape ejaatar akorakinetakec: kosodete airum akwap naka Sikon, akwap naka ekabaka loka Kesibon, ka akwap naka Og ekabaka loka Basan.
Ido ibu kitupuu ikecedwe kwape aacer nukokuju, kitolomik da kes akwap, naibu kolimok lukapapaakec ebe elomarete airum.
Aso kolomasi idwe kirumata akwap, ibu kipiko lueboiete kakwap, Ikanaanin, kakonyenekec, kijaik akaninikec, ka ikabakanakec, ka atekerin nuka akwap, kiswamakis kes kwape kekotototor.

Kirumata ireria luabwaitai, ka akwap napusuk, kirumata itogoi luileleba iboro kere lukajokak, amototin nuabokok, imanikoria luka emusabibu ka luka iseitunin, ka ikito luipu noi luka araito; aso konyamata, kimonikinos, kotumata, kisiyalamanakinete ajokisikon naepol.

Ŋes ibu kijaikinia kes akan naka lukasurupokec, luesiyaloŋoŋoete kes: aso kapak naka icanikec naamonyenenata neijai, kopupununei ijai toma akuj; kwape ejaar akoniitim nakiponesio luipu koinak kes iketajarak luetajarenenete kes kakan naka lukasurupokec.

Konye nakedaununiata aiyeŋun, kiswamata bobo aronis kakonyenekon; ŋes ibu kinyeinia kes akan naka lukasurupokec ayaite koyata kes: konye nakeboŋununioto, komonyakis jo, kopupununei ijai toma akui; koyuununei kes irwanipu kwape ejaar akoniitim.

Kitejenikin mama ejaas kesi, kosodi kinyaku bobo okisilakon: konye kiswamatos keitur, komam epupunete aicorakinetakon, konye kodiakanarete itubesiakon, (lutikiswama ituŋanan, tetere ejari kotomakec,) kolemununete kokeperinikec, kitininikata imurisiŋakec, koŋeroto apupun.
Konye kotitiŋonokini kes ikar luipu, kitejenikin mama ejaas kesi komoyokon kotoma onabinokon: konye koŋeroto aitoikin akit: ŋes ibu kokorakinia kes akan naka ituŋa luka akwapin.
Konye kanuka aitimikon naka iponesio luipu mam ibu kodau kes cut, karaida aijal kes; naarai irai ijo Edeke lokasianut ido loketimon.
Konye irai ijo lokadoliton kakere nukidolokinete sio; naarai ibu kiswamaenenei nukabeit, konye sio kipou keswamaenenete nueroko:

karaida ikabakanakosi, ka ikapolokokosi, ka isasedotinikosi, karaida lukapapaakosi mam apotu koricenenete ikonikisila, kwabo mam eiranarete aicorakinetakon, ka aitejenunetakon, nuitejenanakini ijo kes.
Naarai mam apotu kijaanakis jo kotoma ajakanutukec, ido kotoma ajokisikon naepol naibu koinak, ido kakwap naepol napusuk naibu koinak kakonyenekec mam apotu kibelokinos anyoun kaswamisiokec nueroko.
Koany, kirai lolo ibulesin, akwap da naibu koinak lukapapaakosi anyamenen araitokeŋ ka aiokisiken, koany, kirai isio ibulesin kotomake.
Ido einakini ameda naepol ikabakan luibu ijo kibwaik ayait sio kanuka adiakanaretakosi: ido ejaas kes kapedor kawatekosi, ka ibarenekosi, kwape itojokitotor kesi, kianyu isio ican luipu.”
Karaida kejaas ŋun kwaŋin konye kitutukinit aitutuket nakabeit, kiwadika da; ipucakinete da ikosikapolok, ka Ilebinikosi, ka isasedotinikosi aanyunetakec.
Seraia, ka Asaria, ka Yeremia;
Pasur, ka Amaria, ka Malikiya;
Katus, ka Sebania, ka Maluk;
Karim, ka Meremot, ka Obadia;
Daniel, ka Gineton, ka Baruk;
Mesulam, ka Abiya, ka Miyamin;
Maasia, ka Biligai, ka Semaia: ŋul kes araas isasedotin.
Ikiroria da luka Ilebin kes lu: Yesua okoku loka Asania, ka Binui lokodwe luka Kenadad, ka Kadumiel;
ka ikeceinacan, Sebania, ka Kodia, ka Kelita, ka Pelaia, ka Kanan;
Mika, ka Rekob, ka Kasabia;
Sakur, ka Serebia, ka Sebania;
Kodia, ka Bani, ka Beninu.
Ijaka luka ituŋa: Paros, Pakat-moab, Elam, Satu, Bani;
Buni, Asagad, Bebai;
Adoniya, Bigibai, Adin;
Ater, Kesekia, Asur;
Kodia, Kasum, Besai;
Karip, Anatot, Nobai;
Magapias, Mesulam, Kesir;
Mesesabel, Sadok, Yadua;
Pelatia, Kanan, Anaia;
Kosea, Kanania, Kasub;
Kalokes, Pila, Sobek;
Rekum, Kasabana, Maaseia;
Akia, Kanan, Anan;
Maluk, Karim, ka Baana.

Kimorikikinos kesi kaiinacanakec, isotiakec, kocamut ekenit, ka aiyaposit, alosenen kokisila luka Edeke, lukeinakinio kama ka Musa ekejaanakinan loka Edeke, aidarenen ka aiswamaenen aicorakineta kere nuka EJAKAIT, EJAKAIT ikosi, ka itubesiake, ka ikisilake.
Ido kenyeis aikor apesuruwok atekerin nuka akwap, karaida amanyanakin itelepaiwok apesurukec.

Ido arai keyaununutu atekerin nuka akwap iboro arai lunyaman kere agwelanar kapaaran nakasabato, mam kigwelanakini kakes kapaaran nakasabato, karaida apaaran nakalaunan: ido kisiukaari alup kokaru lokikanyetekaarei, kijali da aiburaenen apesen kere.
Ido kibwaanakini ikisila, atubonokinor ŋolikaru idiopet kouni yenika esekel kanuka aijaanakin naka etogo loka Edekewok;

Kanuka imugatin lukaitodikin, ka ainakinet naka akiria natir, ka ainakinet naicweio natir, nuka asabaton, ka napilamununia elap, ka ipucin lueseunitai, ka nuka iboro lukalaunak, ka ainakineta nuka adiakaret aitulucio Isirael, ido kaswam kere naka etogo loka Edekewok.

Kipou kelamilamata eroet, isasedotin, ka Ilebin, ka ituŋa, kanuka ainakinet naka akito, ayaunun toma togo loka Edekewok, kwape ejaatar ikekia luka lukapapaawok, kapakio nueseunitai kaŋolikaru, aicweenena kotem loka EJAKAIT Edekewok, kwape kiwadikatere kokisila:
ayaunun da araito nugeet nuka alupowok, ka araito nugeet nuka araito kere nuka iponesio kere luka ikito, ŋolikaru, togo loka EJAKAIT.

Ido ikiyaik luka odwewok, ka luka ibarenewok, kwape kiwadikatere kokisila: ka ikiyaik luka isipanin luka aituk ka amerekekin, ayaunun toma togo loka Edekewok, mama ejaas isasedotin luijaanakinete togo loka Edekewok.

Ayaunun da nugeet nuka ainumaretawok, ka ainakinetawok nukikianara, ka araito nuka iponesio kere luka ikito, ebino ka akinyet, mama ejaas isasedotin, kotoma agolai nukotogo loka Edekewok; ka idiopet kotomoneta luka alupowok mama ejaas Ilebin; naarai ŋul, kes Ilebin, luetukonokinete idiopet kotomoneta koreriawok kere luekoriere.

Ido ejaenena esasedoti okoku loka Aaron ka Ilebin, naetukonokiniata Ilebin idiopet kotomoneta: eyaununete Ilebin idiopet kotomoneta toma idiopet kotomoneta togo loka Edekewok, agolai, togo loka imono.

Eyaununete idwe luka Isirael ka idwe luka Lebi ainakineta nukikianara nuka akima, ka ebino, ka akinyet, agolai nuejaas iboro luka aibois nakalaunan, ka isasedotin luijaanakinete, ka ikagolok, ka ikayook da; mam do kijalakini etogo loka Edekewok.
Kosodete ituŋa ailipakin arereŋ ikiliok kere lueŋasikina aiboikin Yerusalem.

Kojaenenas koYerusalem ice kodwe luka Yuda, ka lukodwe luka Benyamin. Kodwe luka Yuda; Ataia okoku loka Usia, okoku loka Sekaria, okoku loka Amaria, okoku loka Sepatia, okoku loka Makalalel lokodwe luka Peres;
ka Maaseia okoku loka Baruk, okoku loka Kol-kose, okoku loka Kasaia, okoku loka Adaia, okoku loka Yoiarib, okoku loka Sekaria, okoku loka Esilonit.
Odwe luka Peres kere luajaenenas koYerusalem emwaasi ituŋa luetitiŋ akwat aoŋon ka akaisakanykape ka lukanykauni.
Lu kes odwe luka Benyamin; Salu okoku loka Mesulam, okoku loka Yoed, okoku loka Pedaia, okoku loka Kolaia, okoku loka Maaseia, okoku loka Itiel, okoku loka Yesaia.
Kotupite ŋes Gabai, Salai, akwat akanykaoŋon ka akaisaarei ka lukanykauni.
Kerai Yoel okoku loka Sikiri ekaanyanaranikec: kiareikin Yuda okoku loka Kasenua ayait ere.
Seraia okoku loka Kilikia, okoku loka Mesulam, okoku loka Sadok, okoku loka Meraiot, okoku loka Akitub, ekayaiton loka etogo loka Edeke.

Ikeceinacan lueswamaenenete aswam naka etogo, akwat akanykauni ka akaisaarei ka luarei: ka Adaia okoku loka Yerokam, okoku loka Pelalia, okoku loka Amisi, okoku loka Sekaria, okoku loka Pasur, okoku loka Malikiya,
ka ikeinacan, ijaka luka ikekia luka lukapapaakec, akwat aarei ka akaisaoŋon ka luarei: ka Amasisai okoku loka Asarel, okoku loka Akasai, okoku loka Mesilemot, okoku loka Imer,
ka ikeceinacan, ituŋa lukirigin luetitiŋ, akwatat ka akaisaarei ka lukanykauni: Sabidiel okoku loka Kagedolim ŋes ekaanyanaranikec.
Lukolebin: Semaia okoku loka Kasub, okoku loka Asirikam, okoku loka Kasabia, okoku loka Buni;
ka Sabetai ka Yosabad lukojaka luka Ilebin, luaanyanarete aswamisio nukokiŋa nukotogo loka Edeke.

Ka Matania okoku loka Mika okoku loka Sabidi, okoku loka Asap, lokerai lokapolon aiŋarenikin aimal naelipenenata, ka Bakabukia, lokiareit koinacanake; ka Abuda okoku loka Samua, okoku loka Galal, okoku loka Yedutun.
Ilebin kere luajaas ore lokalaunan emwaasi akwat aarei ka akaisakanykauni ka luoŋon.
Luasalakinete luka Isirael, luka isasedotin, Ilebin, ajaenenas koreria kere luka Yuda, ŋinituŋanan kairumeteke.
Konye kiboikinos Inetinim koOpel: kopolokinito Sika ka Gisipa Inetinim.
Ido ekaanyanaran loka Ilebin ko Yerusalem ŋes Usi okoku loka Bani, okoku loka Kasabia, okoku loka Matania, okoku loka Mika, lokodwe luka Asap, ikayook, loayait aswam naka etogo loka Edeke.
Naarai abu ekabaka kicorakinite nukec, ka aicorakinet naicasit kanuka ikayook, kwape ejaar eipud loka ŋinipaaran.
Kojai Petakia okoku loka Mesesabel, lokodwe luka Sera okoku loka Yuda, kakan naka ekabaka kanuka akiro kere nuka ituŋa.
KoYesua da, ka Molada, ka Bet-pelet;
koKasar-sual da, ka Beer-seba ka ireriake;
koSikilag, ka Mekona ka ireriake;
koEnrimon, ka Sora, ka Yaramut;
Sanoa, ka Adulam, ka ireriakec, Lakis ka imanikoriake, Aseka da ka ireriake. Kidukuroto anyoun koBeer-seba kiton aditot naka Kinom.
Kiboienenete da idwe luka Benyamin anyoun koGeba ape, koMikimas ka Aiya, koBet-el ka ireriake;
koAnatot, ka Nob, ka Anania;
ka Kasor, ka Rama, ka Gitaim;
Kadid, Seboim, Nebalat;
Lod, ka Ono, aditot naka ikeswamak luepiriaka.
LukoLebin, kimorikikinos irioŋeta ice koYuda ka Benyamin.
Amaria, Maluk, Katus;
Sekania, Rekum, Meremot;
Ido, Ginetoi, Abiya;
Miyamin, Maadia, Biliga;
Semaia, ka Yoiarib, Yedaia;
Salu, Amok, Kilikia, Yedaia. Ŋul kes ijaka luka isasedotin ka luka ikeceinacan kapaarasia nuka Yesua.
Bakabukia da ka Uno, iinacanakec, komeanakinos kakes korioŋeta.
Yesua kouri Yoiakim, Yoiakim kouri Eliasib, Eliasib kouri Yoiada.
Yoiada kouri Yonatan, Yonatan kouri Yadua.
Kapaarasia nuka Yoiakim ajaas isasedotin, ikapolok luka ikekia luka lukapapaakec: loka Seraia, Meraia; loka Yeremia, Kanania;
loka Esera, Mesulam; loka Amaria, Yekokanan;
loka Maluki, Yonatan; loka Sebania, Yosep;
loka Karim, Aduna; loka Meraiot, Kelikai;
loka Ido, Sekaria; loka Gineton, Mesulam;
loka Abiya, Sikiri; loka Miniamin, loka Moadia, Pilitai;
loka Biliga, Samua; loka Semaia, Yekonatan;
loka Yoiarib, Matenai; loka Yedaia, Usi;
loka Salai, Kalai; loka Amok, Eber;
loka Kilikia, Kasabia; loka Yedaia, Netanel.
Ilebin kapaarasia nuka Eliasib, ka Yoiada, ka Yokanan, ka Yadua, aponi kiwadikai ikapolok luka ikekia luka lukapapaakec, ka isasedotin da, kairum naka Dario Eperusiat.
Aponi kiwadikai odwe luka Lebi, ikapolok luka ikekia luka lukapapaakec oitabo loka aisiitonokin, aitodol apaarasia nuka Yokanan okoku loka Eliasib.
Ijaka luka Ilebin: Kasabia, Serebia, ka Yesua okoku loka Kadumiel, ka iinacanakec kosesenas, aiturit ka aimal kwape ajaar aicorakinet naka Daudi etuŋanan loka Edeke, erioŋet koseseni erioŋet.
Matania, ka Bakabukia, Obadia, Mesulam, Talumon, Akub, kes ikagolok luedarete aiŋadisia nukorutei.
Ŋul kes lukejaas kapaarasia nuka Yoiakim okoku loka Yesua, okoku loka Yosadak, kapaarasia da nuka Nekemia ekayaiton ka nuka Esera esasedoti ekewadikan.
Kotukonokinos odwe luka ikayook, anyoun kotoma apuuton nairimorit Yerusalem, koreria da luka Inetopatin;
kotoma Bet-giligal, komanikoria lukoGeba ka Asumabet: naarai adukitos ikayook ireria airimor Yerusalem.
Kitesegaaros isasedotin ka Ilebin, kitesegaasi ituŋa da, ka irutei ka arwatat.
Kotupite kes Kosaia, ka atutubet naka ikapolok luka Yuda.
Ka Asaria, ka Esera, ka Mesulam.
Yuda, ka Benyamin, ka Semaia, ka Yeremia,
ka ice kodwe luka isasedotin ejaas karupepen: Sekaria okoku loka Yonatan, okoku loka Semaia, okoku loka Matania, okoku loka Mikaia, okoku loka Sakur, okoku loka Asap;
ka ikeinacan, Semaia, ka Asarel, Milalai, Gilalai, Maai, Netanel, ka Yuda, ka Kanani, kojaas kiboro lueruos luka Daudi etuŋanan leka Edeke; kiŋarenikinite kes Esera ekewadikan:
kitoroto orute loka ecoa, itenarito, kodokasi kadoketa nuka ere loka Daudi, neikiaror arwatat, kuju ketogo loka Daudi, kiton orute loka akipi ari nakokide.

kuju kerute loka Epuraim, ka neejai erute lomojoŋ, ka neejai erute loka lukecor, ka etogo loeoja loka Kananel, ka etogo da loeoja loka Kamea, kiton orute loka amerekekin: kobwaata kopalarito korute loka ikedarak.
Kobwaata atukon aarei kaŋul kaluimalaete kotogo loka Edeke, eoŋ da, ka atutubet naka ikayaitok kaeoŋ:
ka isasedotin, Eliakim, Maaseia, Miniamin, Mikaia, Elioenai, Sekaria, ka Kanania da, ejaas karupepen;
ka Maaseia, ka Semaia, ka Eleasar, ka Usi, ka Yekokanan, ka Malikiya, ka Elam, ka Eser. Kosodete ikayook ayoore keporoto loepol, Yeserakia ŋes ekeŋarenonikec.
Koinakis asuban nuepolok kapaaran kaŋin, kiyalamas; naarai abu Edeke kisiyalamikinite kes kaiyalama naepol: kiyalamasi da aŋor ka idwe; kopupunoi da aiyalama naka Yerusalem kaneelwana.
Koricito aijaanakin naka Edekekec, ka aijaanakin naka aitesegaario, eswamaenenete kwape kwaŋin ikayook ka ikagolok, kwape ajaar aicorakinet naka Daudi ka naka okokuke Solomon da.
Naarai kapaarasia nusek nuka Daudi ka Asap ajaenena ekeŋarenon loka ikayook, ka ikososinei luka aiturit ka aimal Edeke.

Ido kapaarasia nuka Serubabel, kapaarasia da nuka Nekemia, koinak Isirael kere akorakineta nuka ikayook ka ikagolok kwape ejaar eipud loka ŋinipaaran: kogitasi nuka Ilebin; ka Ilebin da kogitasi nuka odwe luka Aaron.
Naarai mam apotu kisiriamata idwe luka Isirael ejaas kinyamat ka akipi, konye koropata Baalam aluikin kes, aiken kes: konye kituluo Edeke ekenit araun arereŋ.
Kosodi kanen, kedaut apupun ikisila, kosodete atiakar kotoma Isirael erioŋet kere loka imo.
Eroko ŋun keiaikina, abu Eliasib esasedoti loaseunitai apolokin agolai nuka etogo loka Edekewok, naarar ekamuran loka Tobia,

kitemokinite Tobia agola naepol, nelem ibwaanakinete ainakineta nuka akiria, ka lueur maa, ka iboro, ka lukitomoneta luka akima ka ebino ka akinyet, nuainanakinio Elebin, ka kiyaook, ka ikagolok kaicorakinet; ka ainakineta nuikearitai nuka isasedotin.
Konye kapakio kaŋun kere kamamei eoŋ koYerusalem: naarai kokaru loka akaisauni ka luarei loka Aratasasata ekabaka loka Babulon, abu kalot mama ejai ekabaka, kosodi ketuboros apaarasia keŋitu ekabaka:
kabu Yerusalem, kajenu aronis naabu Eliasib kiswama kanuka Tobia, aitemokin ŋes agola kalaroi nuka etogo loka Edeke.
Ketakadik eoŋ noi: ŋes ainakin acakar kina iboro kere luka Tobia.
Kasodi aicorakin, kitesegaasi agolai: kayau do bobo iboro luka etogo loka Edeke, ka ainakineta nuka akiria ka lueur maa.
Kasodi ketoron ikayaitok, kabala ebe, “Kanukinyo inyeinere etogo loka Edeke?” Katukonoki kes, kebwaik aiboisiokec.
Kosodete luka Yuda kere ayaun idiopet kotomon yenika akima ka ebino ka akinyet aiŋadisia.

Kadakak ikedarak aiŋadisia, Selemia esasedoti, ka Sadok ekewadikan, lokoLebin da Pedaia: kotupak kes Kanan okoku loka Sakur, okoku loka Matania: naarai aomitai araut lumunon, aswamukec ŋes akoranakin iinacanakec.
Wu Ekadeke, kiitununei eoŋ kanuka ŋin, ido sirikimwata aswamisioka nuejok nueswamanakini etogo loka Ekadeke, ka aijaanakinike.
Ajaas da ituŋa luka Turo kanen, luetolomete lukecor, ka iboro luka iponesio kere, kitwegelanarete idwe luka Yuda, ko Yerusalem da kapaaran nakasabato.
Kasodi ketoron isotia luka Yuda, katema kes atiar, “Aronis anyoin na naiswamaete, amunamun apaaran nakasabato?
Mere kwape kwaŋin eswamaete lukapapaakus, Edekewok da mam eyauna aronis na kere mamawok, ka ere lo da? Konye yes iyatakinete ayaun anyunyura toma Isirael kanuka amunamun apaaran nakasabato.”
Kosodete ikagwelanarak ka ikagwelak luka iboro luka iponesio kere koperoto kiŋa ka Yerusalem irwan atipet arai aarei.
Karaun ekajenan mamakec, kabala kes ebe, “Kanukinyo iperioto yesi airimor arwatat? Arai kiswamata bobo kwaŋin, kaeni yes.” Kosodi ageun kapaaran kaŋin mam bobo apotu kopotu kanakasabato.
Kasodi aicorakin Ilebin aitalaun bonik, aponare aidar irutei, aitalaun apaaran nakasabato. Wu Ekadeke, kiitununei eoŋ kanuka ŋin, kitim kwape ejaar akoniitim naepol noi.
Kapaarasia kaŋun da abu kaany lyudayan luamanyitos aŋor nuka Asudod, ka nuka Amon, ka nuka Moab:
kinerasi idwekec da aŋajep nainyalinyala naka Asudod, kwabo mam apedorete einer aŋajep naka Iyudayan, konye kwape ajaar aŋajep naka ŋiniteker.

Kasodi ketoron kes, kelamaki da kes, kanaŋanaŋa da ice kakesi, kainyul da ikecetima, kesiyapoik kes kolimito Edeke ebe, “Mam ikoranakinete adwekus odwekec, karaida amanyanakin adwekec odwekus, karaida yes ikulepek.

Mam kereka abu Solomon ekabaka loka Isirael kodiak kotoma kaŋun? Konye toma atekerin nuipu mam etakanuna ekabaka loariakatar ŋesi, abu Ekedeke komina ŋes, abu Edeke kitarau ŋes ekabaka loka Isirael kere: konye apotu aŋor numo kitapaasi ŋes.
Aso do kopupunoi yes da iswamaete aronis na naepol kere, aibucar mama ejai Edekewok aimany aŋor numo?”
Wu Ekadeke, kiitununei kes, naarai komunamunata esasedotene, ka aitutuket naka esasedotene, ka naka Ilebin.
ka ainakinet naka akito, kapaarasia nueseunitai, ka nuka araito nugeet. Wu Ekadeke, kiitununei eoŋ kanuka ajokis.
kapaarasia kaŋun, nakiboikinor ekabaka Akasuero oicoloŋ loka ajakanutuke, loajai Susa togo lokapolou,
kokaru lokiwuniet loka airumuke, abu kipoik epucit ikapolokoke kere ka ikekejaanakinak; kojaun apedor naka Perusia ka Media, kes ijaka ka ikapolok luka ibukui akonyeneke:
abu kitodia abar naka akejakanut nakaibuses, ka aiturio naka apolouke naitelekarit, apaarasia nuipu, kes apaarasia akwatat ka akaisakanykauni.

Kosodi ketuboros apaarasia ŋun, abu ekabaka kipoik epucit ituŋa kere luajaas nen Susa togo lokapolou, lukapolok ka ludidik da, apaarasia akanykaarei, kotoma alaro naka emanikor loka etogo lokapolou loka ekabaka:

ajaas aigalisio nuka egoe loekwaŋ, lopiria, lobululu koenitete kaunoi nuka ebaputa loejok, ka lomuge, kigiluna luka epuesa ka ipirin luka amor nukijesesinei: keraas itutio luka esabu ka epuesa, kamor nukijesesinei nuepesitai nukareŋak, nukakwaŋak, nudos, ka nukirionok da.
Koinakis kes aimat koboro luka esabu, (kogelegela iboro kaputokec,) kepol da noi ebino loka ekabaka, kwape ajaar aikor naka ekabaka.
Aimat da kojai kwape ejaar ekisil; komamei yenepedor aitiŋaikinit: naarai abu ekabaka kicorakinite ikekapolokitok kere lukotogoke kwaŋin, kiswama ŋinituŋanan kwape ekotor.
Abu Basiti da akabaka, kipoik aŋor epucit kotogo loka ekabakane loarai loka ekabaka Akasuero.

Kapaaran nakikanyetekaarei, naalakaror etau loka ekabaka kanu ebino, kicorak ŋesi Mekumam, Bisita, Karabona, Bigita, ka Abagata, Setar, ka Karakas, ibwacin ikanykaarei luejaanakinete kakonyen nuka Akasuero ekabaka,
ayaun Basiti akabaka kakonyen nuka ekabaka konapite aboko naka ajakanut aitodikin ituŋa ka ikapolok ajokisike: naarai kerai naatemel.
Konye koŋer akabaka Basiti abunore kaicorakinet naka ekabaka kobwacin: ŋes anyunyurikinor noi ekabaka, koresiar da akenyunyura kotomake.

kidunyasi Karasena, ka Setar, ka Adamata, ka Tarusis, ka Meres, ka Marasena, ka Memukan, kaŋes, ikapolok ikanykaarei luka Perusia ka Media, luaanyununete akonyen nuka ekabaka, luaraas lusodit kotoma ajakanut:)
kotema atiar, “Kekwaikis ai akabaka Basiti kwape ajaar ekisil, naarai mam erimarit ŋin naabu ekabaka Akasuero kicorak kobwacin?”
Koboŋok Memukan kakonyen nuka ekabaka ka ikapolok ebe, “Mam akabaka Basiti ediakarit mama ejai ekabaka bon, konye mama ejaas ikapolok kere, ka ituŋa da kere luejaas obulmi kere luka ekabaka Akasuero.
Naarai epupunete do aŋor kere aswamisioit na naka akabaka, emwaŋenenete ikecekiliok kakonyenekec naelimitere ebe, ‘Abu ekabaka Akasuero kicorak Basiti akabaka ayaunio kakonyeneke, konye mam ebuno.’
Apaaran na da akapolok nuka Perusia ka Media nueiras nuka aswamisioit naka akabaka elimokinete kwaŋin ikapolok kere luka ekabaka, Aso ejaun do emwaŋit loepol ka anyunyura da.

Arai kitojok ekabaka, kicorakinai do aicorakinet naka ekabaka, kiwadikai da kokisila luka Iperusian ka Imedian, kinyek ailocio, ebe, ‘Sirikebu bobo Basiti kakonyen nuka ekabaka Akasuero’; koinak ekabaka apolouke naka akabaka ace naitelekarit ŋes ajokis.
Kosodi naelimorere ekisil loka ekabaka loelosi ŋesi aisilakin anatar ajakanutuke kere, (naarai epol,) kosodete do aŋor kere ayoŋite ikiliokokec, lukapolok ka ludidik da.”
Kitalaka akirot ŋin ekabaka ka ikapolok; kiswama ekabaka kwape ajaar akirot naka Memukan:

Naarai kijuka ibaluan obukui kere luka ekabaka, toma ŋolibuku kwape ejaar eiwadikaeke mama ejai ŋiniteker kwape ejaar aŋajepekec, koyaite ŋolituŋanan ekaleke elopet, ido kolimoroi da kwape ejaar aŋajep naka iketuŋa.
Kosodete ikejaanakinak luka ekabaka luijaanakinete ŋes atemari ŋes atiar, “Mere komoikinai ekabaka abekon nukatumunak nuitemelelas:

koseu ekabaka ijaka kobukui kere luka ajakanutuke, kotukonokis abekon kere nukatumunak nuitemelelas Susa togo lokapolou, togo loka aŋor, toma akan naka Kegai ebwacit loka ekabaka, ekedaran aŋor; kijaikinai iborokec luka aitesegaario:
apese da naitojokit ekabaka koraun akabaka aibois naka Basiti.” Kitalaka akirot ŋin ekabaka; kiswama kwaŋin.
Kojai Eyudayat toma Susa togo lokapolou, ekekiror Morudekai, okoku loka Yair, okoku loka Simei, okoku loka Kis, Ebenyamenit:
lokeyanaario ko Yerusalem nepepe ka luejoreunitai ka Yekonia ekabaka loka Yuda, loabu Nebukadanesar ekabaka loko Babulon koyaŋa.
Kitanu ŋesi Kadasa, ŋes Esita, akoku naka papake lodidi: naarai amamei ŋin papa karaida toto, etemelel apese ajok asesen noi; ketwana papake ka totoke, koyaŋa Morudekai ŋes araun akokuke.

Kosodi kanen, kepupun aicorakinet naka ekabaka, ka ekekisil, kotukokinitete apesur nuipu Susa togo lokapolou, akan naka Kegai, koyaŋaarai Esita togo loka ekabaka, kotoma akan naka Kegai, ekedaran loka aŋor.

Kisiyalamik ŋes apese, kodum asianut kamakeŋ; kisunya ŋesi ainakin ŋin iboroke luka aitesegaario, ka akorakinetake, ka apesur akanykaarei nuibusakinit ainakinio kotogo loka ekabaka: abu kiloco ŋes ka apesuruke kitolomik kes aibois naitelekarit ajokis kotogo loka aŋor.
Mam abu Esita kitejenu atekerike ka ikeinacan: naarai abu Morudekai kieorite ŋes ebe sirikitejenu.
Kitorenenei Morudekai nolikolonit kiŋaren kalaro naka etogo loka aŋor, ajenun kwape ejaar Esita, ka nuedoikinete ŋes.

Kedol abeikin naka ŋinipese alomar mama ejai ekabaka Akasuero, kedaun ŋes aiswamakinio kwape ejaar ekisil loka aŋor, ilapio itomon ka luarei, (naarai kedoloto kwaŋin apaarasia nuka aitesegaariokec, kes ilapio ikanykape akinyet naka luesaete, ka ilapio ikanykape aures namaa, ka iboro luka aiteseg aŋor,)
ŋes do ebunio apese mama ejai ekabaka, koinakinai ŋes nuekoto kere alosit kaŋes enyouni kotogo loka aŋor alomar togo loka ekabaka.

Elosi ŋesi eboŋ, kobonun tupuruc toma togo lokiareit loka aŋor, akan naka Saasagas, ebwacit loka ekabaka, loidari abusian: mam bobo ŋin alomanar mama ejai ekabaka, dimikito isiyalamikinit ekabaka, enyaraunitai ekirorike.
Aponi Esita koyaŋaarai mama ejai ekabaka Akasuero toma togoke loka akabakane olap lokitomonet, ŋes elap Tebet, okaru lokikanyetekaarei loka airumuke.
Komina ekabaka Esita aitelekarit aŋor kere, kodum ŋes asianut ka aminunio kakonyeneke aitelekarit abekon kere; kibwaik ŋesi aboko naka akabakane akouke kitarau ŋes akabaka aibois naka Basiti.
Kosodi ekabaka aipoikin ikapolokoke ka ikejaanakinakake epucit loepol, ŋes epucit loka Esita; koinak ibukui aitimio, kokor ainakineta, kwape ajaar aikor naka ekabaka.
Mam ber Esita etejenunit ikeinacan ka aketeker; kwape ecorakinia Morudekai; naarai kiswama Esita aicorakinet naka Morudekai, kwape eswamaenena eroko ŋesi esai ŋes.
Apaarasia kaŋun iboie Morudekai korute loka ekabaka, konyunyurikinos ibwacin iarei luka ekabaka, Bigitan ka Teres, kaŋul luidarete ekek, komoata aikamun ekabaka Akasuero.
Kojenu Morudekai, kitejenu ŋesi Esita akabaka; kolimok Esita ekabaka ŋun kokiror loka Morudekai.
Kedautu aiŋic akiro ŋun, apotu kotakanut ebe ikote nen, aponi kes kere iarei kikajakinai okitoi: aponi kiwadikai da oitabo loka aisiitonokin kakonyen nuka ekabaka.
Kokukumoto ikejaanakinak kere luajaas orute loka ekabaka, kisudedoto Kaman: naarai abu ekabaka kicorakinite kwaŋin kanuke. Konye mam abu Morudekai kokukumik ŋes karaida aisudedikin ŋes.
Kosodete ikejaanakinak luka ekabaka luajaas orute loka ekabaka atemar Morudekai atiar, “Kanukinyo idiakaria aicorakinet naka ekabaka?”
Kosodi kanen, naenerananatar kaŋes ŋinipaaran, komam ŋes epupuni kes, kolimokis Kaman, aanyun arai ca eketakinos akiro nuka Momdekai: naarai abu kolimokinite kes ebe erai ŋesi Eyudayat.
Keanyu Kaman ebe mam Morudekai ekukumit karaida mam abu kisudedikin ŋes, konyunyurikin Kaman noi.

Konye komwaŋ aikamun Morudekai bon; naarai aponi kitejenikinitete ŋes ateker naka Morudekai: kanuka ŋun komoote Kaman amudiar Iyudayan kere luajaas anatar ajakanut kere naka Akasuero, ŋes ateker naka Morudekai.

Kotema Kaman ekabaka Akasuero atiar, “Ejaas ituŋa luisiarakina aikaara toma atekerin kobukui kere luka ajakanutukon; kogelara ikisilakec kaŋul luka ateker ace; mam kes ericete ikisila luka ekabaka: kanuka ŋun mam ajokis ekabaka aeamakinit kes.
Arai kitojok ekabaka, kiwadikai komudiarai: atacakini eoŋ atalatan alukumin atomon nuka epuesa akanin nuka ŋul kaluidarete akiro nuka ekabaka, ayaun toma aiŋadisia nuka ekabaka.”
Kolaca ekabaka ekegilut kakanike, koinak Kaman okoku loka Kamedata Egagait, lokasurup loka Iyudayan.
Kotema ekabaka Kaman atiar, “Kiinakinitai jo epuesa, ka ituŋa da, aiswamakin kes kwape itojokitor.”

Kijukarai ibaluan kikakerak obukui kere luka ekabaka, amudiar, aiar, ka aidany Iyudayan kere, ludidik ka imoionai, idwe ludidik ka aŋor, kapaaran adiopet, ŋes apaaran nakitomonet kauni naka elap lokitomonet kaarei, ŋes elap Adar, ayaŋaar da lunatunakec araun imejan.
Aponi kokorai aikopunet naka aiwadikaet mama ejaas ibukui kere, tetere elimorio ekisil atekerin kere, tetere ekapanakinos apaaran ŋin.
Kiwonyas ikakerak kanuka aicorakinet naka ekabaka, kolimoroi da ekisil koSusa togo lokapolou: kiboikinos ekabaka ka Kaman aimat; konye kobuonokinos lukore loka Susa.
Kobu kiŋaren orute loka ekabaka: naarai emamei yenepedori alomar orute loka ekabaka konapite epuko.
Kanolibuku da neadolenenei aicorakinet naka ekabaka ka ekekisil, kojai aibworo naepol oYudayan, ka ailuŋ, ka aimony akiyo, ka elulu: koperoto luipu opukoi ka ekurwon.
Kopotu apesur nuka Esita ka ibwacinake kolimokis ŋes; kokadak akabaka noi noi: kijuka anapito aitanap Morudekai ka alacar da epuko: konye mam abu kiyu.
Kosodi Esita anyaraun Katak, ediopet kobwacin luka ekabaka, luabu ŋesi koseu aijaanakin ŋes, kicorak ŋes alosit mama ejai Morudekai, ajenun akirot ŋin ido kanukinyo kejaar.
Koloma do Katak mama ejai Morudekai neejai aibois naelal naka ere, naesesenas kerute loka ekabaka.
Kolimok Morudekai ŋes nuadoikis ŋes kere, ka etiai obe loabu Kaman kisumun ekabaka atacakin aiŋadisia nuka ekabaka kanuka Iyudayan, amudiar kes.

Koinak da aikopunet naka aiwadikaet naka ekisil loalimoritai koSusa amudiar kes, aitodikin Esita, ka alimokin ŋes da; ka aicorakin ŋes alomar mama ejai ekabaka, aiŋaiŋa ŋes, ka ailipakin atekerike kakonyeneke.
Kobu Katak kolimok Esita akiro nuka Morudekai.
Kosodi Esita einer ka Katak, koinak ŋes akiro nuiinara Morudekai ebe,

“Ejenete ikejaanakinak kere luka ekabaka, ka ituŋa da luka ibukui luka ekabaka, ebe, ŋinituŋanan kere, arai ekiliokit arai aberu, yenelomari alaro nakotoma mama ejai ekabaka, yenimam enyaritai, ejai ekisil ediopet neejai ŋesi, ebe, eario, dimikito yen yenidodit ekabaka kesas loka esabu, ŋes ejari: konye mam eoŋ kanyararitai mama ejai ekabaka apaarasia nu akaisauni.”
Kolimokinai Morudekai akiro ŋun nuka Esita.
Kosodi Morudekai aicorakin kes ainyakakin Esita akiro ebe, “Siriwomit kotaukon ebe ikui ijo kotogo loka ekabaka aitelekarit Iyudayan kere.

Naarai arai kililiŋi ijo cut kapak kana, enyouni do aiŋarakin ka aitajar naka Iyudayan kamace, konye imudiario jo ka ekek loka papakon: ido iŋai bo nat ejeni ebe elemuni ibu ijo toma ajakanut kanuka apakio nuikote kwape nu?”
Kosodi Esita aicorakin kes ainyakakin Morudekai akiro ebe,

“Kolot kotukok Iyudayan kere luejaas Susa, koluŋata kanukaŋ, sirikinyama karaida aimat apaarasia auni paaran ka kuare da: aluni eoŋ da ka akapesur kwape kwaŋin; ŋes konyet alomaria mama ejai ekabaka, namam erai kwape ejaar ekisil: arai da kamudiar, kamudiar.”
Kolot do Morudekai, kiswama kwape ejaatar kere nuecorakinit Esita ŋes.
Kosodi keanyu ekabaka Esita akabaka ebwoi kalaro, kodum asianut kakonyeneke; korio ekabaka esas loka esabu loetiŋit kakanike adodia Esita. Kikuny do Esita, kotiro akou naka esas.
Kosodi ekabaka atemar ŋes atiar, “Inyo bo ikoto ijo, akabaka Esita? Inyo bo ilipit ijo? Kiinakinio jo kiton atutubet naka ajakanutuka.”
Kotema Esita atiar, “Arai kito kitojokit ekabaka, kobu ekabaka ka Kaman lolo opucit loepoikinit ŋes,”
Kosodi ekabaka atemar atiar, “Kisuburikis Kaman, keswamata nuebala Esita.” Kobu do ekabaka ka Kaman opucit loepoit Esita.
Kotema ekabaka Esita kopucit loka ebino atiar, “Inyo bo ilipit ijo? Kiinakinio jo. Iŋaiŋait ca inyo? Itodolikinio kiton atutubet naka ajakanut.”
Kosodi Esita aboŋokin ebe, “Akaiŋaiŋa ka ailipika ŋes nata:

arai kadum asianut kakonyen nuka ekabaka, arai da kitojok ekabaka ainakin eoŋ naelipit, ka aitodolikin naenainait eoŋ, kopotu ekabaka ka Kaman opucit loepoikini kes, moi da, ŋes eswamaa kwape etemaria ekabaka.”
Konye do kotitiŋik Kaman, kolot ore; kijuka aomare ikepapero ka Seres akeberu.
Kitatamik Kaman kes ailiil naka abarake, ka aipues da naka idweke, ka akiro kere da nuadakaki ŋes ekabaka, kwape kitopoloo ŋes aitelekarit ikapolok ka ikejaanakinak luka ekabaka.
Ido kotema Kaman atiar, “Eebo, mam abu Esita akabaka kisunup ituŋanan alomar nepepe kekabaka opucit loepoit ŋesi nabarai eoŋ; moi da kanyararit eoŋ nepepe kekabaka.
Konye ŋun kere kamamikinit ajokis, eroko eoŋ aanyuni Morudekai Eyudayat iboie korute leka ekabaka.”

Kosodi Seres akeberu ka ikepapero kere atemar ŋes atiar, “Kosipokinai akito aojauke ikubitin akaisakany, kinerut moi ka ekabaka aikajakin Morudekai nen; ŋes konyet ilomaria ka ekabaka ilakara opucit.” Kisiyalamik ŋin Kaman; kicorak asipokin
Aponi kodumunai iwadi katai ebe alimo Morudekai nuka Bigitana ka Teres, iarei kobwacin luka ekabaka, kaŋul kaluedarenenete ekek, luapotu kotamito aikamun ekabaka Akasuero.
Kotema ekabaka atiar, “Aibuses anyoin ka apolou aponi kiswamaldnai Morudekai kanuka ŋun?” Kosodete ikejaanakinak luka ekabaka luijaanakinete ŋes atemar ebe, “Mam ibore aponi kiswamakinai ŋes,”
Kotema ekabaka atiar, “Iŋai bo ejai alaro?” Alomunit do Kaman alaro nakokiŋa naka etogo loka ekabaka, ainerun ka ekabaka aikajakin Morudekai akito nuabu kosipokinite ŋes.
Kotemasi ikejaanakinak luka ekabaka ŋes atiar, “Koany, ebwoi Kaman kalaro.” Kotema ekabaka atiar, “Kolom bo.”

Kolom do Kaman. Kotema ekabaka ŋes atiar, “Ikwaikinio bo ai etuŋanan loisiyalamikinit ekabaka ainakin aibuses?” Kobala do Kaman kotauke ebe, “Iŋai bo ti loisiyalamikinit ekabaka ainakin aibuses adepar ca eoŋ?”
Kotema Kaman ekabaka atiar, “Etuŋanan loisiyalamikinit ekabaka ainakin aibuses,
koomai anapito nuka ekabakane, nulem enapenenei ekabaka, ka ebalasit loibwanenenei ekabaka, konapakinai da aboko naka ekabakane;

kijaikinai anapito ka ebalasit akan naka ediopet kokapolok luka ekabaka loitelekarit aibuses, kitanapai ŋun etuŋanan loisiyalamikinit ekabaka ainakin aibuses, kisibwanen ŋes ebalasit aitor orot loka ere, kolimo kakonyeneke ebe, ‘Ikwaikinio nen etuŋanan loisiyalamikinit ekabaka ainakin aibuses.’ ”

Kosodi ekabaka atemar Kaman atiar, “Kiwonya kolem anapito ka ebalasit, kwape ibalar, kiswamak Morudekai Eyudayat, loiboie korute loka ekabaka, kwape ibalar: kinye akurwokin adiokirot kaŋun kere nuibala.”
Kosodi Kaman ayaŋaar anapito ka ebalasit, kitanapik Morudekai, kisibwanen aitor orot loka ere, kolimo kakonyeneke ebe, “Ikwaikinio nen etuŋanan loisiyalamikinit ekabaka ainakin aibuses.”

Kitatamik Kaman Seres akeberu ka ikepapero kere nuadoikinito ŋes kere, Kosodete iketuŋa lukacoa ka Seres akeberu atemar ŋes atiar, “Morudekai loigeu ijo aibiror kakonyeneke, arai erai loka aur naka lyudayan, mam ipikori ijo ŋes, konye abeit ibirori kakonyeneke.”
Eriŋa kesi inerasi kaŋes, kopotu ibwacin luka ekabaka, kisunyasi ayaare Kaman opucit loepoit Esita.
Kopotu do ekabaka ka Kaman opucit ka Esita akabaka.
Kotema bobo ekabaka Esita kapaaran nakiareit kopucit loka ebino atiar, “Inyo bo ilipit ijo, akabaka Esita? Kiinakinio. Inyo ca da iŋaiŋait ijo? Itodolikinio kiton atutubet naka ajakanutuka.”
Kosodi Esita akabaka aboŋokin ebe, “Arai kadum asianut kakonyenekon, wu ekabaka, arai da kitojokit ekabaka, koinakinai aijaraka kanuka ailipika, ka ikatuŋa da kanuka aiŋaiŋaka:
naarai kagwelaritai, eoŋ ka ikatuŋa, amudiario, adanyio, ka aolior da. Konye arai gwai kigwelaritai araut ibulesin ka abulesin, ti keliliŋ, karaida mam tikepedo lokasurup aigel lutiketwania ekabaka.”
Kosodi ekabaka Akasuero atemar aka baka Esita atiar, “Iŋai bo ŋol, ido ai ca do ejai ŋesi, eŋaŋat atitimkin kotauke aikwaikin nen?”
Kotema Esita atiar, “Lokasurup ka lokadinakinit, ŋesi bo lo Kaman lokaronon.” Kosodi Kaman akurianar kakonyen nuka ekabaka ka akabaka.
Konyou do ekabaka kopucit loka ebino kanyunyurake, koloma omanikor loka etogo lokapolou: kobwo Kaman ailip aijarake kaneejai Esha akabaka; naarai abu koany aronis naenerak ekabaka ŋes.

Kosodi koboŋ ekabaka komanikor loka etogo lokapolou kolom aibois naka epucit loka ebino; kibirokina Kaman otut loeboio Esha. Kosodi ekabaka atemar atiar, “Itinaikin ca akabaka kakonyeneka otogo?” Napalomun akirot aituk naka ekabaka, aponi korapai akonyen nuka Kaman.

Kosodi Karabona ediopet kobwacin luajaas kakonyen nuka ekabaka atemar atiar, “Ido koany, akito nueojak ikubitin akaisakany, nueswamakinit Kaman Morudekai loabu kiner nuejok kanuka ekabaka, ebwoete kotogo loka Kaman.” Kotema ekabaka atiar, “Kikajakis ŋes nen.”
Kikajakinai do Kaman akito nuetemokinit Morudekai. Kosodi do anyunyura naka ekabaka aiyamakin.
Kolacu ekabaka egilutuke loalemun kama ka Kaman, koinak Morudekai. Kibwaik Esita Morudekai ayait etogo loka Kaman.
Kinera bobo Esita kakonyen nuka ekabaka, kibirokin akejeneke, kiŋaiŋa ŋes emonyi akiyo alemar aronis naka Kaman Egagait, aibil da eboteteke mama ejaas Iyudayan.
Kosodi ekabaka arior esas loka esabu mama ejai Esita, Konyou do Esita, kobwo kakonyen nuka ekabaka.

Kotema atiar, “Arai kitojok ekabaka, arai da kadum asianut kakonyeneke, arai kesub akirot bala edolit kakonyen nuka ekabaka, eoŋ da esiyalamik akonyeneke, kiwadikai ailoc ibaluan luenerunitor Kaman okoku loka Kamedata Egagait, luewadika amudiar Iyudayari luejaas obukui kere luka ekabaka:
naarai ekoni apedor ai atitiŋikin asesen aronis naebunokini ituŋaka? Ekoni apedor ai da atitiŋikin asesen amudiar naka lukatekerika?”
Kosodi ekabaka Akasuero atemar Esita akabaka ka Morudekai Eyudayat atiar, “Koany, ainak Esita etogo loka Kaman, aponi kikajakinai ŋes akito, naarai abu kibwaik akanike oYudayan.

Kiwadikakis yesi lyudayan, kwape itojokitotor yesi, kokiror loka ekabaka, kipucakis da aanyunet kegilut loka ekabaka: naarai aiwadikaet naiwadikatai okiror loka ekabaka, ido naipucakinitai aanyunet kegilut loka ekabaka, emamei ituŋanan yenepedori ailocokin.”

Kiwadik kokiror loka ekabaka Akasuero, kipucak aanyunet kegilut loka ekabaka, kijuka ibaluan koyaŋaasi ikakerak luebwanenito ibalasin, luebwanenito ibalasin luetiroko luetwasamatai aijaanakinia ekabaka, luaurio kosipanloka ekabaka.

Kocamak ekabaka Iyudayan luajaas kaŋolire atukonokin, abwoikin aijarakec, amudiar, aiar, ka aidany, apedor kere naka ituŋa ka ebuku kaluekotosi asurokin kes, ka ikecedwe ludidik ka aŋorokec, ayaŋaar da lunatunakec araun imejan,
kapaaran adiopet kobukui kere luka ekabaka Akasuero, ŋes nakitomonet kauni naka elap lokitomonet kaarei, ŋes elap Adar.
Aponi kokorai aikopunet naka aiwadikaet mama ejaas atekerin kere, tetere elimoro ekisil kanolibuku, kokapakina da Iyudayan kebu apaaran ŋin ainyaŋ lukasurupokec.
Kolomasi do ikakerak ibwanenito ibalasin luetiroko luetwasamatai aijaanakinia ekabaka, kobubuakinai kisuburikinai kaicorakinet naka ekabaka; kolimoroi da ekisil koSusa togo lokapolou.
Ajaas Iyudayan kaica ka aiyalama, ka ailel ka aibuses.

Kanolibuku da, ka ŋolire, kama edolokini aicorakinet naka ekabaka ka ekekisil, ajaas Iyudayan kaiyalama ka ailel, epucit ka apaaran naejok da. Koluoros luipu luka atekerin nuka akwap Iyudayan; naarai kodoikinite kes akurian Iyudayan.
Kotukonokinos Iyudayan oreriakec anatar ibukui kere luka ekabaka Akasuero, aikam ŋul luemootos aitican kes: amamei da ituŋanan yenepedor airebokin kes: naarai kodoikinite atekerin kere akurian kes.
Apotu ikapolok kere lukibukui, ka lukibukui, ka ikayaitok, ka ŋul da lukiswamaenenete aswam naka ekabaka kiŋarakis Iyudayan; naarai kodoikinite kes akurian Morudekai.
Naarai kerai Morudekai ekapolon kotogo loka ekabaka, kisiarakina eemutuke anatar ibukui kere: naarai kiyatanakin etuŋanan ŋol Morudekai apoloor noi.
Kodanyata Iyudayan lukasurupokec kere iposete kes kekileŋ, ka aiar, ka amudiar, kiswamakis ŋul lukelaito kes kwape akototor.
KoSusa togo lokapolou apotu Iyudayan koarata komudiasi ituŋa akwat akany.
Ka Parasanadata, ka Dalapon, ka Asapata,
ka Porata, ka Adalia, ka Aridata,
ka Paramasata, ka Arisai, ka Aridai, ka Baisata.
Koarata da odwe lutomon luka Kaman okoku loka Kamedata, lokasurup loka Iyudayan; konye mam kes apotu kibwaikis akecekan onasit.
Kapaaran kaŋin aponi koyaunai etiai loka ŋul luaarakinio Susa togo lokapolou mama ejai ekabaka.

Kotema ekabaka Esita akabaka atiar, “Aarata Iyudayan amudiasi da ituŋa akwat akany koSusa togo lokapolou, ka odwe lutomon luka Kaman da; aso do eswamata anyoika kobukui ice uka ekabakal Inyo bo ca ilipit ijo? Kiinakinio. Arai inyo bo bobo Iinainait? Kiswamai.”
Kosodi Esita atemar atiar, “Arai kitojok ekabaka, kocamakinai Iyudayan luejaas Susa aswam moi da kwape ejaar ekisil loka lolo, kikajakinai da odwe lutomon luka Kaman akito.”
Kicorak ekabaka kikwaikinai nepenen: kolimoroi ekisil koSusa togo lokapolou; kikajakinai da odwe lutomon luka Kaman.
Kotukonokinos Iyudayan luajaas Susa apaaran nakitomonet kaoŋon da naka elap Adar, koarata ituŋa akwat auni koSusa; konye mam kes apotu kibwaikis akecekan onasit.
Aponi ŋun kiswamai kapaaran nakitomonet kauni naka elap Adar; kapaaranike nakitomonet kaoŋon kibworasi kesi, kituluosi apaaran naka ipucino ka aiyalama.
Konye apotu Iyudayan luajaas Susa kotukonokinos kapaaran nakitomonet kauni ka apaaran nakitomonet kaoŋon da; kapaaran nakitomonet kakany kibworasi, kituluosi apaaran naka ipucino ka aiyalama.

Ŋes ituluoriata Iyudayan luka ireria ludidik luiboiete koreria luemameete arwatatin apaaran nakitomonet kaoŋon naka elap Adar apaaran naka aiyalama ka ipucino, apaaran da naejok, naijaanakinotor da akoreta.
Kiwadika Morudekai ŋun, kijuka ibaluan mama ejaas Iyudayan kere luajaas obukui kere luka ekabaka Akasuero, lueapiete ka luelwaka da,
kicorak kes aidar apaaran nakitomonet kaoŋon naka elap Adar, apaaranike nakitomonet kakany da, ŋolikaru.

Kes apaarasia nuadumuniata Iyudayan aibworar kama kalukasurupokec, elap da loebelokinotor icanikec araun aiyalama, nakaibworo araun apaaran naejok; kituluosi kes apaarasia nuka ipucino ka aiyalama, ka nuka aijaanakinor akoreta, ainakinia da lukican ainakineta.
Kisumunoto Iyudayan aiswamaenen kwape egeariata, ido kwape ewadikakinia kes Morudekai;
naarai abu Kaman okoku loka Kamedata, Egagait, lokasurup loka Iyudayan kere, kopeleik amudiar Iyudayan, abu kilamilam Pur kes iroeta, apiar kes, ka amudiar da;
konye kedol akirot akonyen nuka ekabaka, kicorak kobaluan eboteteke lokaronon loabilakinit ŋesi Iyudayan kobe akouke elopet; ŋes da ka odweke kikajakinai akito.
Ŋes kemaikinere apaarasia ŋun Purim, kwape ejaar ekiror Pur. Kosodi kanuka akiro kere nuka ebalua kaŋol, ka nuadautu kesi aanyun kakirot kaŋin, ka nuadoikis kes da,

ŋes kicorakiniata Iyudayan, kisumunot da kanukec, kanuka aurikec da, ka ŋul kere luimoranakinos kakes, ebe, idarenenete apaarasia ŋun nuarei kwape ajaar aiwadikaeteke, ido kwape ajaar apak naeseunitai ŋolikaru.
Kiitununio apaarasia ŋun kidareneneo da anatar aturio kere, ikekia kere, kanolibuku ka ŋolire; kinyeis apaarasia ŋun nuka Purim aitwatanario koYudayan, karaida aiitunetekec aolior kaurikec.
Kijuka ibaluan mama ejaas Iyudayan kere, mama ejaas ibukui akwatat ka akaisaarei ka lukanykaarei luka ajakanut naka Akasuero, kakiro nuka ainapakin ka abeit,
aitogogoŋ apaarasia ŋun nuka Purim kapakiokec nueseunitai, kwape kicorakinia Morudekai Eyudayat ka Esita akabaka, ido kwape kicorakiniata kesi kanukec ka aurikec da, kakiro nuka ailunukec ka aimony.
Kitogogoŋ aicorakinet naka Esita akiro ŋun nuka Purim. Kiwadikai da oitabo.
Aswamisio kere nuka akepedor ka akegogoŋ, ka akiro kere nuka apolou naka Morudekai naetopolooria ekabaka ŋes, mam kereka iwadikatai oitabo loka aisiitonokin nuka ikabakan luka Media ka Perusia?
Naarai kiareikin Morudekai Eyudayat ekabaka Akasuero, kopol ko Yudayan, kocamunai kaipues naka iinacanake; komoote ajokis naka iketuŋa, kinera nukainapakin mama ejai aurike kere.
Kourite idwe lusap ikanykaarei, ka lupesur iuni.

Ido iboroke araas amerekekin alukumin akanykaarei, ka akaalai alukumin auni, ka ajookon akwat akany nuka imoŋin iareiarei, ka asigirian nuŋor akwat akany, ka ikejaanakinak luipu noi; kanuka ŋun kerai etuŋanan loapol aitelekar idwe kere lukokide.
Koloto odweke kipooto epucit ŋolidiopet kotogoke kapaaranike; kijukanarete anyaraunun ainacanakec auni ainyam ka aimat nepepe kakes.

Kosodi ketuboros apaarasia nuka epucitikec, kijuka Yob kitalau kes, kodilonokin anyounun tupuruc, koinanak ainakineta nuicweio kwape ketiaikec kere: naarai kobala Yob ebe, “Musiki adiakasi odweka, aiŋer Edeke toma otauonokec.” Kwape kwaŋin abu Yob kirucuruc aiswamaenen.
Kobala EJAKAIT ebe, “Satan, kibuni kai?” Koboŋok Satan kobala ebe, “Abuni kaboŋoboŋo keilat kakwap kariariat lailo ka laije.”
Kobala EJAKAIT Satan ebe, “Iwomit ijo nuka ekakejaanakinan Yob? Naarai emamei loeputos kaŋes kakwap, etuŋanan lomam itoronitai, loeteni, loeyoŋit Edeke, esacit da aronis.”
Kosodi Satan aboŋokin ebe, “Eyoŋit kereka Yob Edeke atai?
Mam ibwaikinit abwas aisirimor ŋes, ka etogoke, ka iboro kere luejaatar, kowaitin kere? Isirerenit aswam naka akaninike, iyatakina ikeboro kakwap.
Konye korio cani akanikon, kotiro kere luejaatar, ido kiŋerokini ŋesi jo kakonyenekon.”
Kobala EJAKAIT Satan atiar, “Koany, kere luejaatar ejaas toma akanikon, konye mam iriori akanikon mama ejai ŋesi elopet.” Konyou do Satan kama ejai EJAKAIT.
kobu ekiyakia neejai Yob, kotema atiar, “Ajaas imoŋin ekoriete, kodakasi asigirian osiepikec:
aŋatasi Isabean ayaŋaasi kes; eebo, aarata ikatumunak kakwanis naka ekileŋ; eoŋ bon aku alimokin jo.”
Eroko inera ŋesi, kobu ece kotema atiar, “Ebirun akim naka Edeke edokuni kokuju, anyama amerekekin, ka ikatumunak, amudia kes; eoŋ bon aku alimokin jo.”
Eroko inera ŋesi, kobu ece kotema atiar, “Etemokis Ikaludean irioŋeta iuni, aŋatasi akaalai, ayaŋaasi kes, eebo, aarata ikatumunak kakwanis naka ekileŋ; eoŋ bon aku alimokin ijo.”
Eroko inera ŋesi, kobu ece da kotema atiar, “Anyamete ikonidwe lusap ka lupesur amasete da ebino kotogo loka onacekec lokapolon:
ido koany, kobu ekwam loepol kamodiŋ, kinom agoria aoŋon nuka etogo, korapak ikatumunak, atwaka da; eoŋ bon aku alimokin jo.”
Kobala ebe, “Abu kalom kakoik naka totoka emujalal, aboŋori da emujalal: EJAKAIT ŋes abu kainak, ido EJAKAIT ŋes alemaa; kituritete ekiror loka EJAKAIT,”
Kotoma kaŋun kere mam abu Yob kodiaka mam da abu komoro Edeke abaŋaanut.
Kojai bobo apaaran kopotu odwe luka Edeke aitodiar kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kobu Satan da nepepe kakes aitodiar kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT.
Kobala EJAKAIT Satan ebe, “Kibuni kai?” Koboŋok Satan EJAKAIT ebe, “Abuni kaboŋoboŋo keilat kakwap, kariariat lailo ka laije.”

Kobala EJAKAIT Satan ebe, “Iwomit ijo nuka ekakejaanakinan Yob? Naarai emamei loeputos kaŋes kakwap, etuŋanan lomam itoronitai, loeteni, loeyoŋit Edeke, esacit da aronis: ido eroko itogogoŋit abeiteke, karaida kiimaimait eoŋ ebe keliko ŋes komam akirot.”
Koboŋok Satan EJAKAIT, kotema atiar, “Amuny itia amuny, eebo, einakini etuŋanan kere luejaatar itia aijarake.
Konye korio cani akonikan, kotiro akekojo ka akekuan, ido kiŋerokini ŋesi jo kakonyenekon.”
Kobala EJAKAIT Satan ebe, “Koany, ejai akanikon; konye kocoite akeijar.”
Konyou do Satan kama ejai EJAKAIT, kitedek Yob abusion nuetioko anyoun kotau loka akejuke kiton osiadukuke.
Kolem atibolok akojo; kipwokakin okurwon.
Kotema aberuke ŋes atiar, “Iroko kereka itogogoŋit abeitekon? Koŋer Edeke, kotwana.”

Kosodete kepuputu ipapero luuni luka Yob aronis na kere naadoikini ŋes, kopotu, konyounite ŋinituŋanan kaiboisike; Elipas Etemanit, ka Bilidad Esukit, ka Sopar Enaamatit: kitutukis adolokin amonyakin ka aitalakar ŋes.
Kiteluosi kama elwana, mam apotu kojenut ŋes, kodelosi, komonyata; kocil ŋolituŋanan ekelou, kituanasi apua kuju kakwesikec.
Kiboioto kaŋes kokwap kodautu apaarasia akanykaarei ka akuaresia akanykaarei, komam loelimokini ŋes adiokirot: naarai apotu kireikis icanike ipu noi.
Koboŋok Yob kotema atiar:
ka akuare da nakinera atiar,
‘Epotio ikoku yenisapat.’
Koraun apaaran ŋin amuton!
Kinyek Edeke aite ŋes ejai toma akuj,
Aica da kinyek ailiyaikin ŋes.
Kiboikin edou tomake;
kitukurianata luisirionete kere apaaran.
Koŋat amuton naejesi cucucuc akuare ŋin!
Kinyek aiyalama nepepe kapaarasia nuka ekaru;
kinyek alomar otiai loka ilapio.
Koany, korau akuare ŋin arakan;
kinyek eporoto lokaiyalama adolokin.
luetemokino agwaun Lebiatan.
Komutokoros aacer nuka aikamus:
komo aica, konye komam edumuni;
komam eseseni abukio nuka atupuruc;
Naarai mam abu kogol ikekia luka akoik naka totoka,
karaida aibwa ican kakonyeneka.
“Kanukinyo mam abu katwania ameun kakoik?
Kanukinyo da mam abu kajalia aijar naalomunia kakoik?
Kanukinyo da keyuuniata akuŋin?
Kanukinyo da keyuuniata ikisin, tape anaki?
Naarai kwana tikapere keliliŋ;
tikajotoor; kasodi aibworar;
nepepe ka ikabakan ka ikenerunak luka akwap,
lukedukete ojeburun kanukec;
arai nepepe kikapolok luajaas kesabu,
luelelebito itogoikec epuesa.
Arai kwape ikoku yenikijecuna yenikibwaitai timam kajaun;
kwape imukerun lumam apotu koanyutu aica.
Kaŋina ajoŋoosi ikaronok aitican;
kaŋina da ŋes ibworariata luilolonyito.
Kaŋina ijakakaete ienan;
mam epupete eporoto loka eketwasaman.
Ejaas ŋina ludidik ka lukapolok;
eosikin ebulesit kaneejai ejakaitike.
ka yenerieba kotau aanyun aijar?
luebokete adumun ŋes aitelekarit abar naibwaitai;
luibwoŋas cut noi,
luiyalamasi, naepedoriata adumun ates.
loabu Edeke kirigak eriga?
Naarai ebuni eidinyika eriŋa enyama,
ebukunun agataka kwape akipi.
Naarai kabunoki eoŋ ibore yeneyaloŋoŋi,
kadolok eoŋ ibore yenakurianar.
Mam eboie ejok, karaida aiyamakina,
karaida aiyeŋun; konye kadolokis ican.”
Kosodi Elipas Etemanit aboŋokin, kotema atiar:
“Arai etamakini etuŋanan einer kajo, inyunyurikini?
Konye iŋai itikokin kinyek einer?
Koany, ituutoo luipu,
ibu kitogogoŋ akanin nuekalanyaka.
Apotu akonikiro kigaŋata ŋin yenikibiror,
ibu kitogogoŋ akuŋin nuelejekekas.
kitirosi, iyaloŋoŋ.
Atenit naka ikonirotin da mere ŋes akonimunonut?
“Keŋaiŋait, kiitu, iŋai abu kooliorite, komamei akirot?
Arai luetenito kotauon ai bo emudiaritere?
lueyeete ameŋeranut, esakete ŋupeŋun.
Eoliorete kanuka eiyeŋane loka Edeke,
epiaros da kanuka akutun naka akenyunyura.
ka ikel luka iŋatunyo ludidik, ebilasi.
kisiarakinos idwe luka aŋatuny.
“Aponi kacedakin akirot,
kopupok akakit aiyeiyeakeŋ.
nailuranariata ituŋa ajo nuipu,
kabunok akurian ka amaran,
naelokilokete akakojo kere.
kobalasi itima luka akouka sau sau.
Kobwoi kopalarite, konye mam abu kapedo amisiikin kwape eputor;
kojai etoil kakonyeneka:
kidasite tiiti, kosodi apupun eporoto loebala ebe,
‘Epedori kereka etuŋanan loetwani
araut loedolit kakonyen nuka Edeke?
Epedori kereka etuŋanan araut loesega kakonyen nuka Ekasubanike?
Itepeseni da ikemalaikan kanuka apaarikec:
Itelekarit cama aitepesenit ŋul lueperete otogoi luka alup,
apetetaitikec ejai toma apua,
luidecidecio kwape ikaporipor!
Emudiaros kotoma apak naejai kidiŋ atupuruc ka eboŋ,
eoliorete ikar kere komam yenibwaikinit etau.
Mam kereka eutunio auno nakotoma owemakec?
Etwakete, komam adiocoa kere.’ ”
“Kiworo cani; ejai yenikibonokini jo?
Iŋai ka lukalaunak loibelokin jo?
Naarai eari anyunyura etuŋanan lobaŋ,
ekokote da eari lomam acoa.
Abu kaany lobaŋ eremori alias;
konye kelamak katipet aiboisike.
Kolwanik idweke ainapakin,
koridakinai korute
komamei yeneyuuni kes.
Enyami yenikeriebi eteŋei nuedwenyete,
elemununei da kokukwa,
ilikonori da yenikakure iborokec.
Naarai mam elomunete numam adolit kotoma apua,
karaida ican abwaŋun kalup;
konye etuŋanan eurikinitai ican,
kwape edetarotor atwenyitweny kuju.
ido ti akoto aititiŋ Edeke akakiro:
loiswamai nuepolok numam emounos;
nukaumokin numam imarunos:
loisitepi akiru akwap,
loijukari akipi omanikoria:
kosodi adakakin ŋul luejaas kwap;
edakuni ŋul luibworos toma ainapakin.
Itapalauni ainerun naka luepiriaka,
tetere mam epedorete akecekanin aswam nuepeleunete.
isurukanyari aitanaŋ ainerun naka lukelepa.
Iriamete kamuton paaran,
erarapitos kidiŋ paaran bala kuare.
Konye itajari kokileŋ loka aitukekec,
itajari yenipuda kakan naka lokagogoŋon.
Kwaŋin ejai lokican kamunonut,
ebutarete numam adolit.
aso sirikimen alecor naka Lokapedor kere.
imusuŋi, ido akaninike kes itaŋaleunete.
eebo, kakanykaarei mam kitirori jo aronis.
Kilakununei kobeli komam itwani;
kojie da kapedor naka ekileŋ.
mam da ikurianari amudiario naebunio.
Ikienar amudiario ka ebeli;
mam da ikurianari itiaŋ luka akwap.
inapakinos itiaŋ luka ais kajo.
Ijenuni kwape inapakinor ekoniwema;
ido imanimani ekonisipan komam itwaniari ibore.
Ijenuni da ebe akoniwur elalaari,
itataikon da kwape anya nuka akwap.
Idolokini ailitikon kobusite ikar luipu,
kwape elomunia eisuta loka akima kokaruke.
Koany ŋun, kipou kanicutu, ikote nen:
kepup, kojen ijo kosodi kojaun ejok.”
Kosodi koboŋok Yob kotema atiar:
“Arai kiŋiŋitete anyunyuraka,
arai kibwaikinitete nepepe kepolaka toma aitemis!
Naarai kwape kwana ti do kitelekasi alaŋir naka asiŋe naka aŋololin:
kanuka ŋun ŋes esunyitor akakiro.
emasi ekamoyo aisoritike;
iderakina etasuro loka Edeke asurokin eoŋ.
Emonyi kereka asigiria naka ais arai eja ŋes anya?
Arai emoŋ aruo kojaas inyamatake?
Ipedori kereka ainyam luepiaka komamei abalaŋ?
Arai bo ejai ibore yenebala jel osirapurapu loka abeet?
Eŋerit ekatau atiror kes;
esubitos bala lunyaman luketal kaneajai.
“Karai kapedoo adumun nuelipit;
tikainak Edeke eoŋ nueŋobelei!
Tikisiyalamik Edeke aidecidec eoŋ;
tikejal akekan, kagela cut!
Ŋes konyet adumunia aitalakario;
eebo, tikecur kanuka ariebo namam etimi;
naarai mam anerenenei akiro nuka Lokalaunan.
Agogoŋuka ŋes bo inyo, kedareu?
Awasiaka da ŋes bo inyo, katitiŋik?
Erai tope agogoŋuka agogoŋ naka amor?
Arai akakuan naka aisinit?
Konye abeit emamei yenikeŋarakini kotomaka,
Ereŋear da aswam nakapirianut kama ajai.
“Ibusakinit ekepapero aitodiar asianut mama ejai ŋol loekoto aiilor;
ŋol da loinyeini ayoŋit Lokapedor kere.
Iŋalaŋalas ikainacan bala aguurut,
bala ecilet loka aguurun nueoliorete;
nuirioko cucucuc kanuka akipi nuikamunito,
ŋes neenopia akaka:
kapakio nuka amwanis, ilicaros;
naejaenenara aibuse, eonikinete kaiboisiokec.
Epaarete ikalotok luelosete aririkec;
elosete toma amodiŋ, eoliorete.
Apotu ikalotok luka Tema kiteoto,
kidareut atukon nuka Seba kes.
Kirumata ileic naarai apotu komunokinos;
keporu ŋina kitirirata.
ianyunete yenikitukuriani, ikuriakaros.
Arai ebe, ‘Koinakis koborokus araut ainakinet kanukaŋ’?
Arai ebe, ‘Koyuunai kakan naka lokasurup’?
Arai ebe, ‘Kolakunai kakan naka ikareitok’?
Kitejenunai neapaaritor.
Akiro nukaitenara eraas ca nukagogoŋ!
Konye epegetekus itoroni inyo?
Iwomitos aitoron akiro?
Naarai einer loka ŋol kaloejuruŋuŋit esubit bala ekwam.
Eebo, tikilamilamata eroet kanuka ikoki,
Tikimutunoto kaneejai opaperokus.
Aso do kiyuutu kosesenata eoŋ;
naarai abeit mam eŋalai kakonyenekus.
Kibelokinos, keŋaiŋait, kinyeis numam ebeito ajakut;
eebo, kibelokinos bobo, edolit akakirot.
Mam epedori akainyigol amisiikin nukameŋeranut?”
Akepaarasia da mam eputos bala apaarasia nuka ŋol kaloeropio?
Kwape ebulesit loiŋobelei noi etolim,
kwape kaŋol loeropio komuno eropitike;
Aponi kakorakin akuaresia nuka aitapasitoi.
Naaperenenoo eoŋ kener atiar,
‘Anyoun wori’? Konye eoja akuare;
kebelonokini aisiwalar akwap.
erubanakini amunyoka kosodi kidedeununei bobo.
Isunyito akapaarasia aitelekarit ibore yenitolomanari ekasonyan egoe,
edaunos komamei adiomuno.
mam akakonye esesenete bobo ajokis.
esesenete akonikonye eoŋ, konye kamamei.
kwape kwaŋin ŋin yenijesari Okatwak mam bobo edokuni.
Mam bobo eboŋuni togoke,
akeibois da mam bobo ejenuni ŋes.
eneri kotoma aburun nakomoyoka;
erurumai kotoma adwaris nakotauka.
Arai kereka eoŋ aŋolol, arai etiaŋ loeiliili lokaŋolol,
tape ibwaikini ikedarak asesen eoŋ?
Arai kener ebe, ‘Ketalakarit eoŋ ekaitada,
etojoniari ekajam arieboka’;
ŋes konyet kisiyaloŋoŋoo eoŋ kairujasia,
kitukuriani kaitapoeta:
Tape ekatau eseuni amiedio,
ka atwanare aitelekarit akakojo nu.
kinyeinai eoŋ; naarai akapaarasia eraas aamameak.
tape jo ibwaikinit ŋes etaukon,
tape ianyanari ŋes ninirupuruc,
aitem ŋes ŋinipak?
Itodoli bo ai mam jo inyeini asesen eoŋ,
karaida ajalakin aitodol neelikoria eoŋ aimulaka?
Kanukinyo kibwaikinia araut adeseikinetekon,
tape kalaŋirikini eoŋ bon?
Kanukinyo mam isionio aibucareteka,
alemar da numam adoliteka?
naarai kwana aperi kotoma apua;
ikukurikini amoot eoŋ, konye kamamei.”
Kosodi koboŋok Bilidad Esukit kotema atiar:
“Itodoli ai einer ŋun?
Itodolete da ai akiro nuka aitukukon asubit bala ekwam lokagogoŋ?
Arai bo ibelokini Lokapedor kere abeit?
Arai apotu idwekon kodiakasi kama ejai,
ŋes da kokoraki kes akan naka aibucaretekec:
arai ikoto ijo akukurikin amoot Edeke
ka aiŋaiŋa da Lokapedor kere;
arai kosegara ijo ido kitenara da;
abeit tikekwenyu kanukon,
tikitekeriana aibois naka adolitekon.
Karaida kedit ageunetekon,
tikiyatakini noi esaŋekon.
kibwaik etau ŋun nuapotu lukapapaakec koŋicut;
naarai apaarasia nukidauni kakwap eraas kwape etoribe.
Mam kereka kes kisisianakinete jo,
ka alimonokin jo da,
kinerasi akiro nuelomunete kotoma otauonokec?
“Epedori kereka aladot apoloor komamei erit?
Epedori da esege abwaŋun komameete akipi?
erinyori do ageikin ikui ice kere.
eolionori amun naka ituŋanan yenimam eyoŋit Edeke.
Ebila amunonutuke,
Yeniyuunit ŋes esubit bala elago loka asimokok.
Iketanakini, konye mam egogoŋoor.
Itosokok kaneejai akoloŋ,
akekui da eliaiete airiamar emanikorike.
Ienienete aliasike atukot nakamor,
eseseni aibois naka amor.
kosodi eneri ŋesi ebe, ‘Mam kaanyununei jo.’
ebwaŋunete ice kotoma alup.
kwabo mam igaŋenenei ŋul luiswamaete nueroko.
Kiton neisilelebia akoniituk akiena,
aŋajepekon da eibwoŋ.
Ileicikinete ŋul lukilaito jo;
mam ejaununei bobo ewema loka ikaronok.”
Kosodi koboŋok Yob kotema atiar:
Konye ikonakini ai ituŋanan eraun yenikadoliton kaneejai Edeke?
Arai ipuda ŋesi apega kaŋes,
mam epedori aboŋokin akirot adiopet kotoma alukumit.
Eco ŋesi kotau, ido epol kotoma agogoŋ:
Iŋai ŋin yenininikiar kaneejai ŋesi, kosodi aisirereŋio?
Loeukori iroŋan, komam ejenete,
naebuburiaria kes kanyunyurake.
komaranete ipirinoke.
Loicorakini akoloŋ kinyek alomun;
ido ipucakini aacer.
Loepesikini bon akuj,
ido icakacakai akailan nuka aŋolol.
ka agolai nuka eŋalakimak.
Loiswamai nukos numam eŋicunos;
eebo, nukaumokin numam imarunos.
iyatakini da akelosit, konye mam ajenuni.
iŋai bo epedori aitikokin ŋes?
Iŋai bo da etemari ebe, ‘Inyo bo iswamai ijo?’
“Mam Edeke inyakuni akenyunyura;
Ekukumete ikeŋarakinak luka Rakab kokwapuke.
Ekoni eoŋ ai apedori aboŋokin ŋes,
aseun akakiro ainerun kaŋes?
tikeŋaiŋa lokasurupika.
Tikeworo, ŋes da kaboŋokini;
mam tieyuunit ebe apupu ŋesi ekaporoto.
iyatanakini amusuŋunuka komam akirot.
Mam kesiikini aiyeŋanar apuru,
konye kesilelebi adwaris.
Arai kinera nuka agogoŋ naka lokagogoŋon, koany, ejai!
arai nuka etube, iŋai bo ketetemikini apak?
Karaida kadolit, akaituk ketetelekari akiro:
karaida ketenara, ketejenuni kwape araar lomagul.
Etenara eoŋ; mam asesena bon;
ameni aijaraka.
Emudiari luitenara ka lukaronok.
Arai keŋesa akaŋas atular,
isekeli ŋesi epola loka yenimam akiro.
erapaari akonye nuka ikatubokoke;
arai mere ŋes, ŋes ca iŋai?
“Etiroko akapaarasia aitelekarit ekakeran:
ekerete, mam eanyunete ajokis.
Etubonoros kwape atakerin nuka aladoi:
kwape euruporia emorukaalet imejaunake.
Arai abala ebe, ‘Kemurwoki airurumakaŋ,
ejulakini eoŋ akakonyen nuakadakinito, kalakari’:
ajeni ebe mam kiinyarit eoŋ lomam akiro.
Ketelekarete akiro;
kanukinyo ca etaaritor atai?
Arai keloŋ kakipi nuelaete noi noi,
ketesega noi akakanin;
Konye kibirokini ijo eoŋ aipany,
kalaete eoŋ ikanapen.
eoŋ aboŋokin ŋes,
tetere kiriamakin kotube.
loibwaikini akekanin kamakosi kere.
Kolema ŋesi ekebela kamaka,
kinyek etasuroke aitukurian eoŋ:
ŋes konyet ti enerar, komam akurianar;
naarai mam ikote nen kamakaŋ.”
“Apianik ekatau akaijar;
Erurumai koleleete akakiro;
eneri kadwaris naka ekatau.
Kabala eoŋ Edeke ebe, Sirikititeleka eoŋ akiro;
kitodikinai nukiinakinit ijo apega keoŋ.
Isiyalamikinit kereka ijo areit,
tetere imwaŋi aswam naka akaninikon,
Acaikin da ainerun naka ikaronok?
arai bo ianyuni ijo da kwape eanyuniata ituŋa?
Eputosi tope apaarasiakon kapaarasia nuka ituŋa,
arai bo ikarukon kwape apaarasia nuka ituŋa?
Tape iŋici numam adoliteka,
imoi da akaronis.
Karaida kijeni ebe mam eoŋ arono;
emamei da loepedori ayuun kakanikon.
nepepe airimor; konye kimudia eoŋ.
ido ikoto ainyakar bobo toma apua?
kisicarakamit eoŋ kwape edika?
Kitanapit eoŋ amuny ka akiriŋ,
ibu kisimorikik eoŋ kakojo ka aputio.
Ibu koinak eoŋ aijar ka asianut,
aibuakinitekon ŋes iricitor ekamoyo.
Konye ibu kimunono akiro nu otaukon;
ajeni ebe ajaas ŋun kajo;
arai kadiaka, irerei ijo,
mam kilacari eoŋ kanumam adoliteka.
arai adolit, mam teni ekeuni akakou;
Emuara eoŋ noi,
etei akaiticanio.
kosodi bobo itoduna iumokina kaneajai.
Kiteteu ikonikajenak kaneajai,
iyatakini akadakinitekon kaneajai;
kiiny eoŋ ajoresio ka ejie.
“Aso ca kanukinyo kitolomunia eoŋ kakoik?
Tikajal aijar, komam akoŋu aanyun eoŋ.
Tikajau bala mam abu kajai;
tikadakun anyoun kotoma akoik aitarasario toma ailit.
Aso kopala do,
kinyeinai, kalakari mot,
ŋes akwap naka amuton ka etoribe loka atwanare;
akwap naka amuton naejesi ŋaŋ, naemutono cucucuc;
akwap naka etoribe loka atwanare, naijulujula,
naesubit aicake bala amuton.”
Kosodi koboŋok Sopar Enaamatit kotema atiar:
“Mam kereka ibusakinit aboŋokin akiro nuipu?
itojokio da etuŋanan loinerana?
Aiturokinikon tikepedo aisililiŋ ituŋa?
Naisekelor ijo, mam ituŋanan kisurumi ileic?
alai eoŋ da kakonyenekon.’
Konye wu arai tikiner Edeke,
kooŋ akeituk aluikin jo,
kwape eraatar nuka ipitenyo luipu toma aswam nakapirianut.
Aso kojen ebe mam Edeke kitepeseni ijo
kwape ibusakinitor numam adolitekon.
Ipedori kereka adolokin osaŋeta luka Lokapedor kere?
Icelelei kwape akuj; inyo ipedori ijo aswam?
Idul adepar Okatwak; inyo ipedori ijo aijen?
Aitemisike edeparit akwap kaojau,
ido elal adepar akar.
Arai etubor, eeni ituŋa,
enyarauni da kes atubokinio, iŋai gwai itikokini?
ido eanyuni numam adolit, karaida mam eomit.
Konye emamei etuŋanan lootai ajenun,
eebo, eurio ituŋanan kwape ikoku yenika atuko.
iriori akaninikon mama ejai ŋesi;
arai ejaas numam adolit akanikon, kibwaik neelwana,
sirikisiik nukaronok aiboienen kowemanakon;
eebo, icasi, komam ikurianari.
Naarai kimurwokinete icanikon;
iituni kes bala akipi nuatuboros.
Ipiororoi akoniijar aitelekarit kidiŋ paaran;
karaida ejai amuton, eraun bala atupuruc.
Inapakini ijo da, naarai ejai amunonut;
eebo, inolenolei kosodi aiyen kinapakina.
Ido iriori, komam yenikitukuriani;
eebo, ipu lukikanikanete jo.
Konye ekurwokinete akonye nuka ikaronok,
emameikini kes neekeriara,
eraun amunokec aijal aijar.”
Kosodi koboŋok Yob kotema atiar:
“Komamei abuonokin iraas yesi ituŋa obe,
etwani acoa da kayes.
Konye eoŋ da ejai ajenun kwape yes;
mam yes kideparito eoŋ;
eebo, iŋai bo mam ejeni nuikote nen?
loabu keworo Edeke, kaboŋok;
etuŋanan loedolit, loitenara ŋes ekienare.
ekapakina ŋul luejurusiaros kakecekeje.
Ekerianaros iweman luka ikaŋatak,
inapakinos ŋul luitunyunyurikinete Edeke;
lueyaunete ekecedeke toma akanikec.
Konye do kiŋit itiaŋ, kisisianakinete jo;
ka akweny nuka apak da, kilimonokinete.
Arai kinerakinos kalup, kisisianakinete jo;
iboro lukecor da, kitetemonokinete.
Iŋai bo mam ejeni kotoma kaŋul kere,
ebe akan naka EJAKAIT ŋes abu kiswama ŋun?
ka eiyeŋane da loka ituŋasinei kere.
Mam kereka akit igimori akiro,
kwape iiriata aanyigol ikecenyamat?
Ejai acoa ka ituŋa lumojoŋ,
ajenun da ebuni kotoma aibut.
“Ejai acoa ka apedor kaŋes;
ŋes ejai ainerun ka ajenun.
egolokini ituŋanan, komam epedorio ajaar.
bobo da ijukari kes, korapaasi akwap.
Ejai agogoŋ ka aswam nakapirianut kaŋes;
yeniŋalao ka yeniŋalai kesi luke.
Erikori ikenerunak eŋataritai,
ituluori ikatubok ibaŋiok.
Elacari irikoi luka ikabakan,
ido eeni akeceŋabes kausi.
Erikori isasedotin eŋataritai,
elatakini da lukagogoŋok kwap.
Itubutari lumunon,
elemari ajenun naka imakio.
Ebukokini ikapolok emenit,
ido elacuni arokoba naka lukagogoŋok.
itacauni etoribe loka atwanare.
Itupuci atekerin ido emudiari kes;
itanyanyaari atekerin kosodi aitolomar.
Elemari itauono luka ijaka luka ituŋa luka akwap,
ido itotori kes amodiŋ neemamei erot.
Erarapitos kotoma amuton komam aica,
einakini kes aigetanar kwape ekameran.”
“Koany, aanyu akakoŋu ŋun kere,
Abu akakit kopup kojenu da.
Nuijenete yesi, eoŋ da ajeni:
mam yes kideparito eoŋ.
Konye akoto einer kaLokapedor kere,
ido emiela ainerun ka Edeke.
Konye yes iraas ikajukok aiŋal,
yes kere imurwok luutaai.
Tierai akusicoa.
Aso kopuputu akakirot,
kiirasi eirab loka akaituk.
Inerakinete kereka nukaiŋal?
Ipegasi yesi kanuka Edeke?
Ejok tope ŋes airere yes?
Arai bo kwape yeniŋalaŋalai ituŋanan,
iŋalaŋalaete ŋes da?
Abeit kitoroni yes,
arai itubusikinete ituŋa kaiyeiyea.
Mam akepolou kitukuriani yes?
Etasuroke da mam kidoikini?
“Idaesiakus eraas awaragasia nuka ekurwon,
ikegalikinokokus kes ikegalikinok luka elupe.
Kililiŋata, kinyeinai kener,
keja nuepote kopotu.
ka aibwaikin akaijar akanika?
konye etogogoŋi eoŋ ikarotin kakonyeneke.
ŋol lomam eyoŋit Edeke mam edolenenei akonyeneke.
Kopupokis noi akakiro,
ka ŋun da nualimori kojaut toma akiikus.
Aso koany, esuduny akakiro;
ajeni ebe arai loadolit.
Kasodi keliliŋ kajal akaijar.
Na bon sirikiiswamak akiro aarei kasodi mam aŋopi kakonyenekon.
Kolema akanikon kolwaniar kamaka;
kinyek etasurokon aitukurian eoŋ.
Aso kiworo ijo, eoŋ da eii;
arai bo kinyeinai kener, ido koboŋok.
Imwaasi ai numam adoliteka ka aronisioka?
Kitejenunai cani aibucaretaka ka akaronis.
konyara da lokasurupikon?
Irukitor ijo ariaŋ naeonit?
ido isurumi numam adolit nuka eiditeuka;
igiri eikor aisirimor akakeje.
Karaida kasubit bala ibore yenabos aipirisiar,
bala egoe loenyami ekajekelut.”
ikidioko akepaarasia, ileleba ican.
iirori kwape etoribe, mam ebusi.
koyau atubokinio mamakon?
Mam idio da.
Naarai inerunit apaarasiake,
etiai loka ilapioke ejai kajo,
ibu kibwaik eikor lomam epedori ailam;
aitodol naedaunia apaaranike kwape yeneropio.
“Naarai ejai amun ebe ekitoi kejepar, itocuni bobo,
mam edaunos alibunetake.
Karaida kemojoŋata akejeke kotoma alup,
aketorom da etwanikini alup;
konye kanuka aiŋuun akipi elibuni,
iganete atenuna kwape iraat yenilidio.
Konye etwani ituŋanan, elosi inona;
eebo, ejali ituŋanan akeijar, ejai bo ai?
Kwape eonikinioto akip kaŋolol,
ebosuni ecor eonikini;
aitodol naedaunor akuj, mam ekwenyunete,
karaida aitekwenyunio kajokec.
Wu okwe arai kiitoŋop eoŋ toma Okatwak,
tikimunon kaiyeiyeakon,
kiton naetuboror anyunyurakon,
tikibwaik apak naeseunitai, kiitu eoŋ!
Tikedareu adaun apaarasia kere nuka ejieka,
aitodol needolunio akaosikinio.
tiimiela aswam naka akaninikon.
mere iseseni akaronis?
Eenen akadiakar toma ocoe loipucitai,
iburit numam adoliteka.
“Abeit iŋoŋar eroŋat kodaun,
atiiba da elemunio kaiboisike;
iturususete akip amor;
ailapanarikec itelelearete apua naka akwap:
imudiari da amuno naka ituŋanan.
Ipikori ijo ŋes ikar kere, etubor;
ijulakini ijo akonyeneke, kijuka.
itisilio kes, komam ŋes ejeni kwape ejaatar.
kokuudiani da akeijar.”
Kosodi koboŋok Elipas Etemanit kotema atiar,:
“Ti kereka keboŋoki lokacoa kaijen naatai,
kisileleb akoikike kekwam lokokide?
Tikepegata kakiro nuemameete ajokis,
arai bo aibakibak numam epedoros?
Eebo, itapalauni aiyoŋ,
ido itikokini aima Edeke.
Naarai numam adolitekon kes isisianakinete aitukukon,
iseuni ijo aŋajep naka araparap.
Akoniituk ŋes kitubok aitelekar jo, konye mere eoŋ;
eebo, akoniituk ŋes akajenanikon.
Arai bo kourii jo eroko imor?
Iwomikina ijo bon araun lokacoa?
Anu bo da nuimisiikinit ijo komam sio?
luitelekarito papakon kamojoŋ.
Aitalakar naka Edeke mam kidaunit jo,
ka akirot naiswamai kajo kaiyapepera?
Kanukinyo kiyaŋaaria ekonitau?
Kanukinyo da ereŋatatar akonikonye?
Tape ibelokini ekonitau aluikin Edeke,
acamakin akiro nuikote nen alomun kaitukukon.
Ka yeneuriei aberu tape edolit?
eebo, mam akuj elai kakonyeneke.
ituŋanan yenemasi numam adolit kwape kakipi!
“Ketodikini jo, kopup eoŋ:
Kaŋun nuabu kaany alimokini:
ameun kalukapapaakec, komam aimunon.
kwabo komamei imoit yenikitori kamakec).
kes etiai loka ikar kaluisiŋadikinitai ikareiton.
kekerianar ebunokini ekaŋatan ŋes.
Mam iyuuni ebe eboŋuni kotoma amuton,
ido idareunit ekileŋ ŋes.
Ejeni ŋesi ebe ekapakina apaaran naka amuton aapu kaŋes.
Aburun ka ariebo itukurianete ŋes;
ipikorete, kwape ekabaka loitemonokino ejie.
edorit Lokapedor kere.
Emotakini kitininikite emurisiŋ,
kojaas imugogol luepolok oupaliake.
ijaŋililos aŋaliŋalin kosiepionoke;
iboienenei koreria luiswapito,
kotogoi luemamei ituŋanan kotoma,
luelosete araun aapoŋor.
Mam ebarenenei, karaida ikeboro aibut kaneejai,
karaida akeceraito mam ilururuete.
itooni akim aketenuna,
ido eoliori cut kanuka eiyeŋane loka aitukuke.
naarai aamameak kes eraunos ekeropit.
mam aketenut eraun naetiitii.
Eraraari araitoke numam ekokito kwape emusabibu,
ido itodoori aturoke kwape keseituni.
enyamenenei akim iweman luka ainakineta nuitumudakete akonye.
itemonokinete itauonokec aiŋal.”
Kosodi koboŋok Yob kotema atiar:
“Apupunun nuipu nuikote nen:
iraas yesi kere iketalakarak luitapasete.
Enaŋete kereka akiro nukamameak?
Arai bo inyo kitunyunyurikini tape iboŋokini?
arai kejaas ikusitauon toma aibois naka ekatau,
tikapedo airuc akiro aitoronia yes,
Aimunumunakinia yes akakou.
Tiketogogoŋ yes kakaŋajep,
aitalakar da naka akaituk tiketojono ariebokus.
“Karaida enera, mam akariebo ejoni;
ido karaida katitiŋik inyo iŋogari kamakaŋ?
Konye kwana ketapas;
itisilio akatukot kere.
Ido kicuik ijo eoŋ noi, ŋes ekajenan kamakaŋ:
akadokoror kanyoikini, ketejenikini kakonyeneka.
Kagwaragwar kakenyunyura, kareit;
kaŋianaki ikelake:
kedetanakini lokasurupika akekonye.
kebapanasi amataŋen kaimuar:
katukonokinotor alosikinit eoŋ.
Kakorakini Edeke mama ejaas lumam eyoŋito ŋes,
kacakakini akanin nuka ikaronok.
Abu kajai toma aijamam kabilibil ŋesi eoŋ,
eebo abu ketiŋ kalari, kepicipic:
ido kasipok araun egumatake.
Kerimosi ikagumakake iwaitin kere,
ecili ŋesi ikaŋeretenya, komam itimi;
ebukokini epiuka kwap.
Kapedepede apedon nuipu,
kakerik kwape ekagogoŋon.
ebwaik amumwarataka apua.
Amunaunos akonyeneka kanuka aimony,
ejai etoribe loka atwanare abukioka;
karaida kemamei akaje kakaninika,
ililiauna akailip.
akaimony da kinyek aisiyeŋunio.
ido ekabwaaranika ejai toma akuj.
Kamwaŋito ikapapero;
konye emonyete akakonye akiyo mama ejai Edeke,
ka loka okoku loka ituŋanan mama ejai iidunyeteke.
alosi eoŋ erot lomam aboŋunio.”
kedarit ailit.
ibusakinit akakoŋu aite aitunyunyurikinikec.
Iŋai bo yeniketiŋ akakan?
Naarai imunonik ekecetau kinyeis ajenun:
ŋes mam itopolooria kes.
Ŋol loirupeenenei ipaperoke aituluor imejan,
etwakete akonye nuka idweke.
arau ibore yenikimuaritono kakere.
Awariwarata akakonye kanuka aburunit,
araut akatutubeta kere kwape etoribe.
Eumokinete ituŋa luitenara ŋun,
ŋin da yenemamei akirot ecerededei aluikin lumam eyoŋito Edeke.
Ŋin da yenejaas akanin nuelaete iyatanakini agogoŋor.
mam adumunit yenikacoa kotomakus.
aomisio da nukotoma otauka.
Ejulakis akuare araun apaaran,
ebe, ‘Idunyas aica kamuton.’
Arai kamunokini Okatwak araut etogoka;
arai apesikinit aperitika toma amuton;
arai kalimok aipany ebe, ‘Ijo papaka,’
ka ekurut da ebe, ‘Ijo totoka,’ ido ‘kinacika’;
Ai bo ejai akamun?
Iŋai ca eanyuni akamun?
Kiupari nepepe kejesaros toma apua?”
Kosodi koboŋok Bilidad Esukit kotema atiar,
“Itodoli ai alokit akiro?
Koomoom ber, kokau kinera isio.
Karaunos lumam elaete kakonyenekon?
epedori akwap ainyeinio kanukon?
Arai bo atiida alemario kaiboisike?
mam asara naka akimike ecauni.
Eraun aica amuton kowemake,
ituduŋiorio atalake naejai kujuke.
Eridakina agogoŋ naka ailametake,
elatanari ainerunike ŋes.
Naarai akekeje kes ebirokinete ŋes oboi,
ido elosenenei neejaas aloketa.
Ikamuni atacit aketatinyo,
ipoki eic ŋes.
Imurumuraritai aipany kalup,
ka atacit korot.
ido korukitor aduduŋit atatinyonoke.
iguanakini ŋesi kobunokin epola.
Enyamenenei atutubeta nuka akuanake,
eebo, enyamenenei ekiyai loka atwanare atutubetake.
ido eyaununo mama ejai ekabaka loka etasuro.
ebukokinio acukuman toma aiboisike.
Eonionokinete cut akeliasio
kwap kokuju da itelio aketenuna.
emameun ekekiror korot.
Ireŋeario toma amuton anyoun kaica,
ido emejao anyoun kotoma akwap.
karaida yenideikini ŋes kaneeboienenoo.
Eumonokinete luetupanakinete akepaaran,
kwape kitukurianitere ŋul lukegeikinete.
ido ŋin ŋes aibois naka ŋol kalomam ejeni Edeke.”
Kosodi koboŋok Yob kotema atiar:
ka abilibil eoŋ kakiro?
Kimoromoroto eoŋ irwan nu atomon:
mam kileicikinito alaŋirikinit eoŋ.
apaarika ejai keoŋ elopet.
kosodete apega keoŋ kanuka amorositika,
kabwau keboike.
Koany, elalai ebe, ‘Akaje,’ konye mam kapupunio:
amony aiŋarakinio, konye komamei etube.
ido ebwaik amuton korotinika.
Kalaca da akaibuses,
ido alema aboko kakouka.
Kabilibil eoŋ iwaitin kere, aeka eoŋ da:
aruto akamun kwape kekitoi.
kemarak eoŋ araut lokasurupike.
idukurete airigaun ewemaka.
ka ŋul da luajeni araunos bala lumam ajeni.
Esokosi lukatekerika,
kapalut da ikapapero.
Ŋul da lukiboienenete kotogoka, ka akejaanakinakaka,
kanyaritos do eoŋ eloŋwau:
arau emoit kakonyenekec.
Anyarauni ekakejaanakinan, mam kaboŋokini eoŋ,
karaida keŋaiŋa kakaituk.
Mam akaberu ejeni eiyenaneka,
kasacitos idwe luka totoka.
Kamwaŋata idwe ludidik;
arai anyouni, kalimonokinete nukaronok.
Kalaitos ipadicaka kere:
ŋul da luamina kaluikis.
Akoŋororata akakojo,
akuit kamuny naka ikelaka.
Kitimoi, kitimoi, wu yes ipadicaka;
naarai katiro akan naka Edeke.
Kanukinyo kireitotor kwape ka Edeke,
kanukiyo mam yes kiupitor akakuan?
“Okwe arai kiwadikatete akakiro!
Okwe arai kigirigirai oitabo!
Arai kigirigirai atiida
kakwara nakasuat ka asasit ikar kere!
Konye ajeni ebe ejari Ekalakunanika,
ido kawasia ebwoi kakwap:
kedau amunyoka amudiario kwaŋin,
konye kotoma akuanaka aanyuni Edeke.
Eoŋ ŋes aanyuni ŋes elopet,
akakonye da kes esesenete, kwabo mere nuka ece.
Epirisiar aijaraka kotomaka.
Arai ibalas yesi ebe, ‘Kireu ca ma ŋes!
Naarai adumun aliasit naka akirot kotomakeŋ’;
Koyoŋata ekileŋ:
naarai anyunyura eyaŋauni aiticanio kekileŋ,
kosodete kojenutu ebe ejai etube.”
Kosodi koboŋok Sopar Enaamatit kotema atiar,
“Ŋes kaboŋokinioto akaomisio,
kanuka aisunyit naejai kotomaka.
Apupu aitoronio nakesurumit ileic,
ido kaboŋok eoŋ emoyo loka ajenunika.
Mam ibu kojen nu sek
ageun naebwaikinere ituŋanan akwap,
ailel da naka lumam eyoŋito Edeke erai naka apak adio?
Karaida kimukurur akepolou kiton akuj,
akekou da adolokin odouon;
Konye eoliori ikar kere kwape kakecin;
ebalasi ŋul luaanyunito ŋes ebe, ‘Ejai bo ai?’
Elicari ŋesi kwape airujasit, komam etakani:
eebo, ireŋeanario cut kwape aitapoet naka akuar.
Akoŋu nakeanyunit ŋes mam eanyuni bobo;
mam babo etakanuni aiboisike.
Emoete ikedwe asianut naka lukican,
inyakanakinete akekanin abarake.
Ileleba akekojo akuruŋanake,
konye eperenenei kaŋes kotoma apua.
“Karaida kejijim aronis kaitukuke,
karaida kibwa kwap kaŋajepeke,
karaida iŋadakini, komam ekoto aijal,
konye itasalikini aitukuke;
eraunos aisorit naka asigirikoloŋa kotomake.
ebukuni Edeke kotoma akoikike.
Imujumuji aisorit naka asigirikoloŋa;
eari aŋajep naka emusaga ŋes.
icileta lueleleete kesik ka akinyet.
Inyakakini nuka akeitaaritoi, komam ilikonori;
mam iyalamikini kanuka ameda naka aimutunuke.
Naarai abu koreite ka aijal lukican;
abu koŋatu etogo kagogoŋ, lomam adukit.
mam itukui imodiobore kaŋul kalukisiyalamikinete ŋes.
Mam abu kitasal imodiobore, konyama pit;
kanuka ŋun mam akerianutuke ebusi.
Karaida kebarara iboroke konye erai yeneridakina;
ebunokini ŋes agogoŋ kere naka lueburunito.
ebukonokini Edeke ŋes adedeŋ naka akenyunyura,
isitepanakini kwape lunyamanake.
ipelonori emal loka aisinit ŋes.
eebo, elomuni amilisisike naemwekimweki kopiuke;
ejaas nuketasuro kamake.
icweikini ŋes akim namam isinepito ituŋa;
idopori ŋul luesalakinete owemake.
enyoikini da akwap ŋes.
Enyouni ameda nakotogoke,
elelearete ikeboro kapaaran naka anyunyurake.
airumet da naeseikinit Edeke ŋes.”
Kosodi koboŋok Yob kotema atiar:
“Kiirasi kojokan akakiro;
koraut ŋun nukitalakarete.
Kisiikinai, kener eoŋ da;
kadau einer, kiyatakis aisekel.
Inyo bo kesimikit eoŋ amamus katitiŋikin?
Kosesenai eoŋ, koumokis,
kibwaikis akaninikus aitukekus.
Naeitunio, eyaloŋoŋi,
kekamuni etasuro akuanaka.
emojoŋete, eebo, kogogoŋioto kapedor?
Icasit aurikec kakonyenekec,
ipapaikec da kakonyenekec.
Inapakina ireriakec komam akurian,
ebela da loka Edeke emamei kakes.
Eurianakini emonokec lomasenik, komam ekurwokini;
eurie akeceiteŋ, komam ijeci.
Ijukarete ludidikikec kwape esipan,
ikosiete da ikecedwe.
Eyeete kalueruos ka adeudeun,
kolelakinito da eporoto loka alamaru.
Edaunete apaarasiakec kokeriaka,
etwakete katipet.
Konye apotu kotemasi Edeke ebe, ‘Irwa;
naarai mam sio kipuda ajenun ikonirotin.
Lokapedor kere ŋes iŋai, tape kijaanakini ŋes?
Tikiimedau inyo, arai kilipenenei ŋes?’
Koany, emamei akerianutukec kakaninikec:
Elwana ainerun naka ikaronok kamaka.
“Irwan imwaasi ai itudeŋio atala naka ikaronok?
Ebunokinia kes epola?
Ekorakinia da Edeke ican kotoma anyunyurake?
