Dimarai akonikan nakoteten, ka aica naka akonyenekon,
Naarai ibu komina kes.
Kicorak aitajar kanuka Yakob.
Kicakacakai ŋul lukinyoikinete sio kanuka ekonikiror.
Ekakileŋ da mere ŋes ketajari eoŋ.
Konye ibu ijo kitajar sio kama kalukasurupokosi,
Ibu kisurum ŋul lukilaito sio ileic.
Kimalaenenei ekonikiror ikar kere.
Konye natikwana kicaka ijo sio, kitisil;
Kwabo mam iupanaros kajoresiokosi.
Enaŋete ŋul lukilaito sio kanukec.
Ibu kisiarak sio toma atekerin.
Komam idumunit ameda kotiaikec.
Kituluo sio amorosit kama ejaas iidunyetakosi,
Lukisekelio ka lukisuanara kama ejaas ŋul lukirimorito.
Kituluo iwaraga kotoma atekerin,
Ikimuŋumunes akwes kotuŋa.
Ejai aitisilioka akonyeneka aitiwar akwap,
Adakar akakou.
Mam ikositauon ebonorito kau,
Karaida akosikejen mam epaarito korotokon;
Ibu kiteribo sio ketoribe loka atwanare.
Arai kimurwokinit isio ekiror loka Edekekosi,
Arai kiiriorit akosikanin mama ejai edeke logela;
Naarai ejeni aiyeiyea nakotau.
Kimario bala imerekekin lutubutubo.
Kokweny! Kanukinyo iiotoo, wu EJAKAIT?
Konyou! Sirikiicaka ikar kere.
Kanukinyo ibwaia akonikonyen,
Kimurwok aiticanitoikosi ka aroikiniokosi?
Naarai aluroosi ikositauon toma apua;
Eminaikinos akosikoikes alup.
Konyou kiŋarakinai,
Kolakunai sio kanuka akonisianut-nakamin.
Ilapanar akirot naejok kotauka;
Enera akiro nuapeleu nuka ekabaka:
Aŋajepeka ŋes ekalamu loka ekewadikan loekapakina.
Itemelel ijo aitelekarit idwe luka ituŋa;
Ebukokinitai asianut aitukukon:
ŋes kisirereŋio Edeke jo ikar kere.
Koenik ekonikileŋ otul, ijo ekagogoŋon,
Koen akoniibuses ka apoloukon.
Kibwanen kapoloukon kipiko,
Kanuka abeit ka aitasono ka adolit:
Akonikan da nakoteten kisisianakini jo akiro nusogim.
Eitak ikonikojoi:
Ibironoros ituŋa kakonyenekon;
Ejaas ikonikojoi otauon luka lukasurupo luka ekabaka.
Ebela lokadolit ŋes ebela loka ajakanutukon.
Tape Edeke, Ekonideke, kinyonyoikini jo
Akinyet naka aiyalama aitelekarit lucekon.
Eurok ikoninapen kere sa luesaete, icicikwa, ka ekasia;
Kisiyalamikinito jo iraman luka aputio
Kotoma otogoi luka ekabaka luka ikel luka etom.
Ejaas adwe nuka ikabakan toma aŋorokon nukaibuses:
Ebwoi akabaka kakanikon nakoteten enapit esabu loka Opir.
Kimurwokis ituŋakon, ka ekal loka papakon.
Naarai iŋes ekonijakait; komaenenei ŋes.
Ebuni da apese naka Turo kainakinet;
Iŋaiŋaete lukabarak kotuŋa akonimin.
Esonyitai inapeneke kesabu.
Eyaŋaunio mama ejai ekabaka enapit lueculueulo:
Eyaŋaunio neuai ijo
Abekon nukaupake nuetupitos.
Eyaŋaunio kaiyalama ka ailel:
Elomarete togo loka ekabaka.
Luituluori ijaka kakwap kere.
ŋes kimalaeneneata jo ituŋa ikar kere.
Edeke ŋes neekerianarawok, ka agogoŋuwok,
Ekeŋarakinan lokirurukit noi kotoma ocan.
Ŋes mam kikuriakaror, karaida kijulakin akwap,
Karaida keukonoros iroŋan kidiŋ aŋololin:
Karaida kirurumata akip kilunulunanaros,
Karaida kemaranata iroŋan kanuka adakununukec,
Aibois nakalaunan naka iweman luka iŋol loejai kuju kakuj.
Iŋarakini Edeke iŋes tupuruc sek.
Erurumata atekerin, aukonoros ajakanuto;
Kelimo ekeporoto, kocalar akwap.
Ejai EJAKAIT loka ajoresio kaoni;
Edeke loka Yakob ŋes neekerianarawok.
Kopotu, koanyut aswamisio nuka EJAKAIT,
Nukaumokin nueswamaki akwap.
Itasani ijiisio kiton osaŋe loka akwap;
Ebili akabwa, etubutubei akwaras;
Icwei agalin kakim.
Kopalasi, kojenut ebe Eoŋ Edeke:
Ketopoloonorio katekerin,
Ketopoloonorio kakwap.
Ejai EJAKAIT loka ajoresio kaoni;
Edeke loka Yakob ŋes neekerianarawok.
Kibapata akanin, yes ituŋa kere!
Kibwoŋata mama ejai Edeke keporoto loka aipikor.
ŋes Ekabaka lopeti kakwap kere.
Atekerin da akejewok.
Ajokis naka Yakob loamina ŋesi.
Adoka EJAKAIT keporoto loka arupepe.
Koyooto aiturit Edeke, koyooto aiturit ŋes!
Koyooto aiturit Ekabakawok, koyooto aiturit ŋes!
Koyooto aiturit ŋes kaijen.
Irumit Edeke atekerin;
Iboie Edeke koicoloŋoke lokalaunan.
Atukonokinos ijaka luka ituŋa
Neejaas ituŋa luka Edeke loka Aburaam:
Naarai ibukui luka akwap eraas luka Edeke;
Itopolooritai ŋes noi.
Kotoma ore loka Edekewok, koronatake lokalaunan.
ŋes emoru Sion, kari naka agolitomei,
Ere loka Ekabaka lokapolon.
Etejenun Edeke kotogoike lukapolok
Ebe Erai neekerianara.
Kotuboros nepepe.
Apotu koanyut, kosodete aumokin;
Kiyaloŋoŋoto, kiwonyasi.
Komaranata kanen;
Koriebasi bala aberu naerieb aidoun.
ŋes ibilibilia ameerin nuka Tarusis.
Kore loka EJAKAIT loka ajoresio,
Kore loka Edekewok:
lticasi Edeke ŋes ikar kere.
Wu Edeke, kiwoomoom isio akonisianut-nakamin,
Kokidiŋ oyekalukon.
Ejai kwape kwaŋin akoniiturit aitodol osaŋe loka akwap:
Ileleba akonikan nakoteten adolit.
Kolakar emoru Sion,
Kolelata adwe nuka Yuda,
Kanuka itubesiakon.
Aso kirimosi Sion, kimanimanata,
Kimarata itogoike lukaojak.
Kirereoro arwatatinike,
Koomoomata nuka itogoike lukapolok;
Tetere itatamanakinete atur naetupakini.
Erai ekeŋarenikinoniwok aitodol atwanare.
Kiirasi nu, yes atekerin kere;
Kitoikisi aki, yes kere luiboienenete kakwap:
Imukopin ka lukapolok,
Lukabarak ka lukibakor kere nepepe.
Inerenena akaituk nuka acoa;
Eomoomoenenei ekatau nuka aijen.
Ekuiuni kadeudeu akakirot naemunonit.
Inyo bo akurianar kotoma apaarasia nuka aronis,
Nakerigaunitor amamus adolit atitibanaka?
Luemunos abarakec,
Koomiara kanuka aipues naka abarakec.
Karaida ainakin Edeke lugelis ŋes:
Ibusakinit ainyeinio ikar kere.)
Komam ebosi.
Naarai eanyuni ebe etwakete lukacoa,
Yenibaŋ ka yenesubit etiaŋ eoliorete kere nepepe,
Inyeiniata da ice akecebar.
Eomitos kotauonokec
Ebe Ejaenenas ikecetogoi apaarasia kere
Aiboisiokec da enatarete aturio kere:
Emaanakinete akecekwapin ikiroriakec kikulepek.
Konye mam ebusenenei etuŋanan kayonio:
Esubit bala itiaŋ lueoliorete.
Ekecerot ŋol ŋes akecebaŋaanut:
Konye ituŋa luetupakinete kes itojokete akecekiro.
Eraun atwanare ekecokonikec:
Eyaenenete luetenito kes kiwala akwap;
Eraun aputokec nailikorio kokatwak,
Tetere emameikini aibois.
Naarai ŋes kesukunyikini.
Siriyonenenei etuŋanan kebar,
Kiyatakin aibuses naka eketogo:
Naarai naetwania mam eyaŋaari imodiobore;
Mam akeibuses etupari ŋes.
Karaida abu konyarite akeijar nakarereŋ naariŋar ejari,
Ido kiturito ituŋa jo naiswamanakinor nukajokak.
Elosi ŋesi neejai atur naka lukapapaake;
Mam eanyunete bobo aica.
Edeke, ŋes Edeke, EJAKAIT, ener,
Anyara akwap anyoun kaneelomunia akoloŋ
Aitodol neelomaria bobo.
Anyoun koSion, ajokis naedolit,
Eliyau Edeke.
Ebunit Ewokodeke, mam Ililiŋi:
Enyami akim koiŋareneke,
Irimorito ŋes ikwamin lueiliilete.
Akwap da, tetere etubokini iketuŋa;
ŋul luetutukete keoŋ aitutuket kasubanit.
Elimonokini akuj akedolit;
Naarai Edeke elopet ŋes ekatubon.
“Kiirasi, okwe ikatwa, kener eoŋ:
Ijo Isirael, ketejenuni jo:
Arai eoŋ Edeke, Ekonideke.
Mam ketoroni kanuka asubanakon;
Ejaas ainakinetakon nuicweio akonyeneka tiritir.
Karaida ikorwa lumaseniko kosipaninikon.
Naarai iŋolitiaŋ loka amagoro erai lokaŋ,
Ka ibaren luejaas koukono ilukumin.
Ajeni akweny kere nukoronan:
Ka itiaŋ da luka ais eraas lukaiŋ.
Arai kaariebi eteŋei, timam kalimok jo:
Naarai erai akwap nakaŋ, ka ailelebake.
Anyamenenei kereka eoŋ akirig naka imoŋin lumaseniko?
Arai amasenenei kereka eoŋ aokot nuka ikorwa?
Kitodolenenei akoniiyaposio mama ejai iŋol loejai kuju kakuj:
Kayuuni jo, kitopoloori ijo da eoŋ.”
Konye ebala Edeke yenikaronon ebe,
“Ipodo inyo alimonokin akaicorakineta,
Aitwasam da akaitutuket kaitukukon?
Ieakanari da akakiro kaukon.
Ido kimorikikinos kidotea.
Itacamikinit akoniituk einer aronis,
Inera da akoninaiep nuka aiŋal.
Iboie komoromoroi onacekon;
Ido isabanakini okoku loka totokon.
Koomite ebe opaputokon cut eoŋ:
Konye ketoroni jo, eterereikini kes akonyenekon.
Aso do kiitutu nu, yes lukimurwokis Edeke,
Kenye apoopo yes, komameun yenikiyuuni;
Yeneinakini asubanit naka aimal, ketopoloori eoŋ:
ŋin da yenitemokini ekerot
Etodikini eoŋ ŋes aitajar naka Edeke.”
Komwata apaanaretaka kwape ejaar aipues naka aitimesiakon.
Kitesegarai da akadiakar.
Akadiakar da ejai duc akonyeneka.
Eswama nukaronok kakonyenekon:
Tetere kitojokio jo nainerar,
Kosegara naitubio.
Toma adiakar da ŋes kapotuunio totoka.
Koany, imiela ijo abeit kotoma atutubeta nukotoma:
Kitejenuni ijo eoŋ acoa kotoma atutubet naibwaa.
Kidetarai kesop,
Kiloŋai, kakwanu aitelekarit akile.
Kisiirarai alakara ka aiyalama;
Tetere iyalamikinos akojo nuibu kobil.
Kibwa akonyenekon kinyeis aanyun adiakanaretaka,
Komwata numam adoliteka kere.
Kibwaikinai emoyo lokitetet loetenit tomakaŋ.
Sirikilema ekonimoyo lokalaunan kamakaŋ.
Kigaŋai eoŋ kemoyo loka asianut.
Kasodi aisisianakin ikapaanarak ikoniponesio;
Ibeleunos do ikadiakanarak mamakon.
Wu Edeke, koyuunai kotoma akirot naagwaunit naka aokot,
Ijo Edeke loka aitajaraka;
Ikalalai akaŋajep ayoore akonidolit.
Wu EJAKAIT, kitoona akaituk;
Itodiari akaituk akoniiturio.
Naarai mam isiyalamikinit asubanit; tikainak:
Mam da itojokit ainakinet naicweio.
Asubanit naka Edeke ŋes emoyo loebilil:
Wu Edeke, mam imeni etau loebilil loisilarit.
Kiswamak Sion ejok kakotekon naejok;
Koduk ijo arwatatin nuka Yerusalem.
Ainakinet naicweio ka ainakinet napeot;
Kosodete kesi ainakin imoŋin lutobai kotemukon.
Iswamai nuka aiŋal kwape kebarenit loekwana.
Ka aiŋal da adepar einer nuka adolit.
Imina akiro kere nuisiriebete,
Okwe ijo aŋajep nakeŋalan.
Kidakuni jo, kiwurupuuni jo kowemakon,
Kirutuni anyoun kakwap naka lukajarak.
Ekienatatar kinerasi ebe,
Konye komunokin akebar naepol,
Kiketakin kotoma aronisike.”
Loelibilibi kotogo loka Edeke:
Amuno aitim naka Edeke ikar lumam enaŋete.
Edareununei ekonikiror, naarai ejokuna,
Kakonyen nuka lukalaunakakon,
Abosata, eswamata aronis naketal;
Emamei yeniswamai nuejok.
Aanyun arai kejaas ice kakesi luajenete,
Luamoete Edeke.
Emamei yeniswamai nuejok, emamei idio da.
Luenyamete ikatuŋa kwape enyamiata atap,
Ido mam iwoneete Edeke.
Apotu kokuriakata noi kanen, kaneamamei akurian:
Naarai esiarisiar Edeke akojo nuka ŋin kayenidukurit asurokin jo;
Isurum kes ileic, naarai aŋer Edeke kes.
Arai kebunit aitajario naka Isirael koSion!
Nainyakunia Edeke iketuŋa luenataritai,
Elakar do Yakob, iyalamikin Isirael.
Kitajarai, wu Edeke, kanuka ekonikiror,
Kotubokinai kagogoŋukon.
Wu Edeke, kiira akailip;
Kitoik akit akiro nuka aitukuka.
Naarai kanyoikis imo,
Emoete ikadedeŋak akaijar:
Mam ibwaikinito Edeke akonyenekec,
Ejai EJAKAIT nepepe kaŋul kaluigaŋito akaijar.
Komudia ijo kes kotoma abeitekon.
Kainakini jo ainakinet nakakote:
Wu EJAKAIT, emalaenenei ekonikiror, naarai ejokuna.
Naarai kayuu kotoma ocan kere;
Asesen da akakoŋu nuakotor lukasurupoka.
Wu Edeke, kitoik akit akailip,
Kwabo sirikiŋopik akaiŋaiŋa.
Koŋolearai, koboŋokinoi:
Elolitoi eoŋ kanurianaka, edinyil da;
Kanuka eporoto loka lokasurup,
Kanuka aroikinit naka ikaronok;
Naarai kaeakanakis numam edolito,
Ido kerigaete kanyunyura.
Kadoiki da etasuro loka atwanare.
Kadoloki arieŋun ka amaran,
Kaunia akurian.
Kasodi eoŋ ebe, “Arai kiŋa kabebenoka nuka ajelel Tikaporoo, kalot keyeŋ.
Koany, tikapaa neelwana,
Tikaper modiŋ.
Tikadinirir nemecat
Ikwamin ka akiru naepol.”
Komudia, wu EJAKAIT, kotiakatiak akeceŋajepa:
Naarai aany adedeŋ ka eŋuŋet kore.
Edapadapata karwatatin paaran ka kuare aswam ŋun:
Ido nepenen ejaas numam adolit ka ameŋeranut.
Nepenen da ejaas nukaronok:
Mam aroikinit ka emodit enyounete korotinike.
Naarai mere lokasurup kamoromoroi;
Tikapedo atitiŋikin:
Mere iŋopeiŋol lokalait loitopolooro bon aluikin eoŋ:
Tikaiŋopik.
Kipou kenerununete nepepe kaiyalama,
Kipou kalosenenete kotogo loka Edeke kikodeta.
Kodokasi Okatwak ejarete:
Naarai ejai aronis otogoikec, kokidiŋikec.
Ewonenenei eoŋ elopet Edeke;
Ido ketajarenenei EJAKAIT.
Aŋuriani, edinya da:
Iiranari ŋesi da ekaporoto.
Kojie lokasurokinitere:
Naarai epu luketijiete eoŋ.
Ŋes ŋol loebusi ameun apeŋo,
Ŋul lumam ijulakinos,
Lumam eyoŋete Edeke.
Ario akekanin mama ejaas ŋul luenapapaete kaŋes:
Abu kobil akeitutuket.
Ajijim akeituk bala akinyet,
Konye kojio eketau:
Kononok akekiro aitelekarit akinyet,
Konye koraas ikileŋa lueutunitoi.
Ŋes da kiganununei jo:
Mam ecamakinit ikadolitok aiiananario.
Konye jo, wu Edeke, itodokari kes toma aipany naka amudiario:
Ikaarak ka ikeŋalak mam ebusete adaun atutubet naka apaarasiakec;
Konye eoŋ kamunoneno jo.
Itiwarete akwap ejios aroikinit eoŋ.
Naarai ipu luketijiete kaiwononut.
Kamunoneno jo.
Amunokina Edeke, mam akurianar;
Keswamakini ituŋanan eoŋ inyo?
Iloconokinete akakiro aitiwar akwap;
Kaluikinitos akeceomisio kere aiswamakin eoŋ aronis.
Kwape edariata ekatau.
Ekuete kereka kanuka numam adolit?
Wu Edeke, kibiro ituŋa kanyunyura!
Kibwaik akakiyo acupakon:
Emameete kereka koitabokon?
Kapaaran naeworoo:
Ajeni na ebe, ejai Edeke keoŋ.
Mama ejai Edeke ŋes etureneneo akekirot:
Mama ejai EJAKAIT ŋes etureneneo akekirot.
Amunokina Edeke, mam akurianar;
Keswamakini ituŋanan eoŋ inyo?
Kejaikini jo ainakineta nuka aimal.
Mam kereka ibu koyu akakeje kinyeis aiguikin?
Tetere alosenenei kakonyen nuka Edeke
Kotoma aica naka lukajarak,
Naarai emecit ekatau mamakon:
Eebo, toma otoribe loka abebenokakon ŋes amecenenei,
Aitodol needaunotor aronisio nu.
Edeke lokeswamaki kere.
Karat iŋol lokakoto ailikor eoŋ;
Ijukuni Edeke akeitim ka akebeit.
Aperi kidiŋ kaŋul kaluenokete,
Kes idwe luka ituŋa, ikecekel kes akwaras ka imalia,
Akecenaiepa da kes ikileŋa luekwaka.
Kojau akoniibuses da kuju kakwap kere.
Alur akaijar:
Abokikis aipany orotoka;
Ebirokinos kes ikulepek kidiŋike.
Ayei, eebo ayei aiturit.
Kokwenyutu, esabuli ka adeudeu!
Eoŋ elopet adilokini akwenyun.
Wu EJAKAIT, kemalai jo kotuŋa:
Ayei aiturit jo katekerin.
Ka akonibeit da kiton odouon.
Kitopoloor ijo, wu Edeke, kokuju kakuj!
Kojau akoniibuses da kuju kakwap kere!
Ineras kereka yesi nuka adolit eililiŋa?
Itubenenete kereka akiro nuka abeit, yes odwe luka ituŋa?
Itemete epali loka akaninikus kotoma akwap.
Epaarete kesi ageun kaurunio, iŋalaete.
Esubitos bala emusaga lokimin loisikakini akekit:
Lomam iirari eporoto loka ikesupak,
Karaida kisupata kacoa.
Wu EJAKAIT, kolokono cut itirikada luka iŋatunyo ludidik.
Kiliearos bala akipi nueleleete atipet:
Naedeseikinia kikoioike, koraut bala luetubutubo.
Koraut bala totokacelet nailiear komameun:
Ido bala yenikijecuna yenika aberu yenimam eanyunit akoloŋ.
Eyaŋaari kes ketapipirio, luepalal ka luenokete kere.
Ilosi akekeje kaokot nuka lukaronok.
“Abeit ejai ainakinet kanuka ikadolitok:
Abeit ejai Edeke loetubi akiro nuka akwap.”
Wu Ekadeke, koyuunai kama kalukasurupoka:
Kikiarai kama kaŋul kalukanyoikinete.
Koyuunai kama kaŋul kaluiswamaete numam adolit,
Kitajarai kama ejaas ikaarak.
Etukonokinos ikagogoŋok asurokin eoŋ:
Mere kanuka apaarika, kwabo mere kanuka akadiakar, wu EJAKAIT.
Ekerete itemonokinos komam eoŋ ebuearit.
Kokweny kiŋarak eoŋ, koany.
Sirikitim ikapaanarak lueroko kere. Sela.
Eboŋunete eboŋ, emonyete bala iŋokwo,
Irimorete ere.
Koany, ijerasi kesi;
Ekwaka aitukekec bala ekileŋ:
Naarai ineras ebe, “Iŋai bo iirari?”
Isekelei atekerin kere.
Wu jo agogoŋuka, kedareununei jo:
Naarai Edeke ŋes akaŋopis naicelelei.
Keŋarenikini eoŋ Edeke loka akaitimio:
Ketaanyununei Edeke nuemiela kama kalukasurupoka.
Kisiarisiar kagogoŋukon, kisurum ileic,
Wu EJAKAIT, ekosibuku.
Kanuka aronis naka aitukekec,
Ka akiro da nuka aŋajepakec,
Kikamunai kanuka eiturikec,
Ido kanuka nuineras nuka eilam ka aiŋal.
Komudia kanyunyura,
Komudia kes, kinyeis bobo ajakut:
Kojenut ebe irumit Edeke kotoma Yakob,
Aitodol osaŋeta luka akwap.
Koboŋut eboŋ, emonyete bala iŋokwo,
Irimorete ere.
Irimete amoot inyamat,
Iwalakinete arai mam imonikinos.
Konye eoŋ ayeenenei nuka agogoŋukon;
Eebo, ayeenenei teni nuka akoniitim tupuruc:
Naarai mu akaŋopis naicelelei,
Amecis da kotoma apaaran naka icanika.
Wu jo akagogoŋ, ayoonokini aiturit jo:
Naarai Edeke ŋes akaŋopis naicelelei, Edeke loka akaitimio.
Wu Edeke, kicaka sio, kibilibil:
Ibu konyunyurikin; okwe kinyakunai bobo.
Ibu kisimaran akwap; ibu kocil ŋes:
Kiteteu neetiyanakina; naarai ijaŋijaŋa.
Ibu kitodik ikonituŋa nuetioko;
Kitamat da sio ebino luka aigesitoi.
Tetere itodiario ŋes kanuka abeit.
Kitajar kakonikan nakoteten, koboŋokinoi.
Atiaki Sekem, akori aditot naka Sukot.
Epuraim ŋes aigaet naka akouka;
Yuda ŋes ekabela loka ajakanut.
Moab da ŋes akailoŋis;
Edom ŋes acakakini akamukat:
Ijo Pilisitia, kibwoŋ kanukaŋ.”
Iŋai bo ketolomari ore loegogoŋ?
Iŋai bo keŋarenikini kiton Edom?
Kwabo mam iupasi kaiorekosi, wu Edeke.
Kiŋarakinai kama ejai lokasurup:
Naarai aiŋarakin naka ituŋa emamei ajokis.
Naarai ŋol ŋes ipudapudai lukasurupowok.
Wu Edeke, kiira aimonyoka; Kopupok akailip.
Kiŋarenikinoi aitodokar atiiba nakadeparit eoŋ kaojau.
Aŋopis naegogoŋ kama ejai lokasurup.
Ameci kotoribe loka abebenokakon.
Kiinak eoŋ airumet naka ŋul kalueyonete ekonikiror.
Iyatakini apaarasia nuka aijar naka ekabaka:
Eraunos ikaruke bala aturio nuipu.
Okwe, kitemonok asianut-nakamin ka abeit,
Tetere idarete ŋes.
Tetere etodolenenei ŋinipaaran aiyaposioka.
Idarit ekatau Edeke bon:
Mamake ŋes ebunio akaitajario.
Ŋes bon akatiiba ka aitajarioka:
Erai ŋesi anopisika naicelelei; mam eoŋ eianakini noi.
Yes kere aiar ŋes,
Bala arwatat naerii, bala abwas naijaiŋijaŋa?
Isiyalamikinito kesi aiŋal.
Ilipakinete arereŋ kaitukekec,
Konye kikenos kotauonokec.
Naarai elomunit amunoka kamakeŋ.
Ŋes bon atiibaka, akaitajario da:
Erai ŋesi anopisika naicelelei;
Mam eoŋ eianakini.
Atiiba naka agogoŋuka, ka amecisika, ejai neejai Edeke.
Kobukokisi ikusitauon akonyeneke:
Edeke ŋes amecisiwok.
Abeit ituŋa lumam aibuses eraas eiyeŋane,
Ituŋa da luka aibuses eraas aiŋal:
Ikiaros kuju kotoma aitemis;
Ebenen kesi kere adepar eiyeŋane.
Sirisosoloko kotoma aiŋat:
Arai kiyatakin abar, sirikibwaikis ikusitauon tomake.
Ener Edeke irwan atipet,
Apup eoŋ da nu irwan aarei;
Ebe Edeke ŋes elopet apedor:
Naarai itacanakini ŋinituŋanan kwape ejaar akeswam.
Ejakit ekatau akure kanukon, imwit akakuan jo,
Kotoma akwap naeonit nakailolony, naemameete akip.
Kiturenenei jo aitukuka.
Kwaŋin kemalaenenei jo aroko ajari:
Arionori akakanin okirorikon.
Kiturenenei jo akaituk kaŋajep naiyalama.
Naaomitor nukon kapakio nuakwenyunia kuare.
Eyalamikin kotoribe loka abebenokakon.
Kegaŋit akonikan nakoteten.
Konye ŋul luemoete amudiar akaijar
Elosete kwap alup.
Einakinio mama ejai agogoŋ naka ekileŋ:
Eraunos akorakinet naka ikuwei.
Iyalama ŋin yenelimit ŋes;
Naarai itubutario aituke nuka ŋul kaluineras nuka aiŋal,
Wu Edeke, kiiranari eporotoka, kotoma akadanakinika:
Kidarenenei aijaraka kenyek akurianar yenikasurup.
Kama ejai ecelet loka ikeswamak numam edolito.
Luetebeikis imaliakec, kes akiro nuedwarak:
Tetere egumete iŋol loedoliorit toma aiboisio nukaiyeiyea:
Enesarete aigum ŋes, komam ekuriaka.
Isidikete itauonokec kotoma ainerun aronis:
Inerununete ailok iica kaiyeiyea;
Kobalas ebe, “Iŋai eanyuni kes?”
Emoete numam edolito;
Kobalas ebe, “Kidau akukunyikin aimo noi.”
Idul aomisioit nakotoma naka ŋinituŋanan ka etau da.
Konye egumi kes Edeke;
Enesario aimusuŋ kemal.
Kere lueanyunete kes imuŋumuŋete akwesikec.
Ekuriakaros ituŋa kere;
Elimorete da aswam naka Edeke,
Eomoomoete akeswamisio kacoa.
Emunokinos da ŋes;
Iturete luitenara kotauon.
Wu Edeke kidarit jo aiturit koSion:
Ido mamakon itodolenenere aiyaposit.
Mamakon epote kere luejaas awat.
Iluci ijo aibucanaretakosi.
Tetere iboienenei kalaroikon:
Kisimonikinio sio ajokis naka ekonitog,
Aibois nakalaunan naka eyekalukon.
Kotoma akiro nusogim kiboŋokini ijo sio kadolit,
Wu Edeke loka aitajariokosi;
Ijo loirai amun naka isaŋeta kere luka akwap,
Ka naka ŋul da kaluelwaka luejaas aŋolol:
ŋol loitieasi imor kakegogoŋ;
Konapite apedor:
Ka ecelet loka atekerin.
Iinakinit ijo elomune loka tupuruc ka loka atiboŋ alakera.
Ianyanari akwap, icocoi da, Itabari noi;
Ecor loka Edeke ileleba akip:
Itudumikini kes akima,
Kidau aitemonokin akwap kwaŋin.
Icocoi noi alelesiake; Idipakini itutioke:
Itonokoki kelimilim; Isirereŋi akebwanun.
Edoenenete ikonirotin atarion.
Idonanakinos oronyia luka amodiŋ:
Enapete iukon aiyalama.
Enapito ironyia isipanin;
Akima da erapito aditon;
Ikareete kanuka aiyalama, eyeete da,
Kikare akwap kere kaiyalama mama ejai Edeke:
Koye nuka aibuses naka ekekiror:
Kitubusik akeiturit.
Kanuka ailiil naka akonipedor kinonokikinete lukasurupokon.
Kiyeikinete;
Eyeikinete ekonikiror.
Iŋosibib ŋesi kotoma nuiswamakini idwe luka ituŋa.
Apotu kitoroto ocor kakeje;
Kanen kipou kalakaros kotomakeŋ.
Esesenete akekonyen atekerin:
Kinyeis lukepali aitopoloor bonik.
Aso do yes ituŋa, kiturenenete Edekewok,
Kisiirasi eporoto loka akeiturio:
Ibwaikinit itauonowok toma aijar,
Mam isunupit akejewok airiaŋiriaŋa.
Ibu kililiau sio, kwape ililiaunere epuesa.
Ibu kitolomik sio oboi;
Ibu koinak sio aigugunatoi naelaŋir kaŋabesikosi.
Isibwaneni ituŋa kosodete aidok kakwesikosi;
Kipou ketoro akim ka akipi da;
Konye ibu kitolomik sio aibois naidilas iboro.
Katacakini jo aiyaposioka.
Nuabu akaituk kiner,
Ka nuabu akaŋajep kolim, nakaburunia.
Kainakini jo asuban nuicweio nuka kaluetarioko,
Ka lukisupurununo luka imerekekin lumaseniko:
Ainakini imoŋin lutoba ka akinei.
Kopotu, kiirasi, yes kere luiyoŋito Edeke,
Kalimonokis nuabu ŋesi kiswamak ekatau.
Abu keworo kakaituk,
Kitopolooroi ŋes kakaŋajep.
Mam EJAKAIT epupuni.
Konye abeit apupu Edeke;
Eira eporoto loka akailip.
Kituritete Edeke,
Lomam abu kireŋea akailip,
Kwabo mam kemikit akeitim,
Kitacaik oni akekonyen;
Aŋaleukon da naitajari kotoma atekerin kere.
Kiturito jo Ituŋa kere.
Naarai itubokini ituŋa kadolit,
Irumi atekerin kotoma akwap.
Kiturito jo ituŋa, wu Edeke:
Kiturito jo ituŋa kere.
Edeke da, Edeke lopewok, kitusulianyi oni.
Isaŋeta da kere luka akwap eyoŋete ŋes.
Konyou Edeke, kisiarakinos lukasurupoke;
Ŋul da luelaito ŋes kokerata kamakeŋ.
Kwape ireŋearere apuru, kireŋea ijo da kes kwaŋin:
Kwape ecalaror edipor kakim,
Kooliosi ikaronok kwaŋin kakonyen nuka Edeke.
Konye kiyalamasi ikadolitok;
Kibwoŋasi kakonyen nuka Edeke:
Eebo, kolakaros kaiyalama.
Koyeikisi Edeke, koyooto aiturit ekekiror:
Kiswamaut erot loka ŋol kaloibwanenit kitorite amodiŋ;
YAWE ŋes ekekiror; kibwoŋasi do kakonyeneke.
Edeke kotoma aiboisike nakalaunan,
Ŋes papa loka ikokiok, ekeraban da loka apuserun.
Elacuni lueenitai kaenis aitekeriana kes:
Konye luipaliok iboiete kakwap naeonit.
Naitoritor ijo amodiŋ:
Kodaeun akuj kakonyen nuka Edeke:
Komaran emoru je Sinai kakonyen nuka Edeke,
Edeke loka Isirael.
Ijo, wu Edeke, ibu kitetep akiru naepol,
Kitogogoŋ airumetekon naalolonyitor.
Ijo, wu Edeke, ibu kitemonok ajokisikon lukican.
Elimuni EJAKAIT akirot:
Aŋor nuisiarakinete eemut eraas ajore naepol.
Ekerete ikabakan luka ajoresio, ekerete:
ŋin da naesali ore ekori luŋatuna.
Kwape kabebenoka nuka ajele nuerapara kepuesa,
Ka akekopir nuejaas esabu loodos?
Nakitisiarikinia Lokapedor kere ikabakan kanen,
Kosubite bala akako naetepakini Salumon.
Eroŋat Basan ŋes eroŋat loka Edeke;
Eroŋat Basan ŋes eroŋat loeoja.
Yes iroŋan lukaojak, kanukinyo iteoto kekokote
Eroŋat loakoto Edeke aiboikin?
Eebo, iboienenei EJAKAIT kanen ikar kere.
Kes alukumin nuka alukumin:
Ejai EJAKAIT tomakec, kwape toma Sinai, aibois nakalaunan.
Ijau ijo ainakineta kotuŋa,
Eebo, kama kaluipaliok da, tetere iboienenei EJAKAIT
Edeke nepepe kakes.
Kituritete EJAKAIT:
Loibwokenenei ŋinipaaran alagiruwok,
ŋes Edeke loerai aitajariowok,
EJAKAIT YAWE ŋes elopet aitajar kotoma atwanare.
Konye icumi Edeke akou naka lukasurupoke,
Aipelor esiaduk loitatelooritai loka ŋinituŋanan yenedunyakinit agwaunun akiro.
Abala EJAKAIT ebe, “Enyakuni kes anyoun koBasan,
Enyakuni kes anyoun katar naka aŋolol:
Tetere idomakini akonikeju aokot,
Tetere edumunete aŋajepa nuka iŋokwokon akorakinetakec kama ejaas lukasurupokon.”
Aanyut kesi alositokon, wu Edeke,
Alosito nuka Ekadeke, Ekakabaka, ilomanari aibois nakalaunan.
Kiŋarenoto ikayook, kotupakis luetiŋito iboro lueruos,
Kokidiŋ apesur nuiyekete isiman.
“Kituroto Edeke kotoma atukono,
Ŋes EJAKAIT, yes luka atan naka Isirael.”
Ejai Benyamin lodidi ekayaitonikec,
Ikapolok luka Yuda ka aurianetekec,
Ikapolok luka Sebulun, ka ikapolok luka Naputali.
Ecoraki Edekekon akonigogoŋ:
Kitogogoŋ, wu Elieke, nuibu ijo kiswamak sio.
Ŋes kiinuniata ikabakan jo ainakineta.
Kitoron etiaŋ lokotoma osege,
Ekodet loka imerukwai ka itak luka ituŋa,
Ipudapudai kakeje atutubeta nuka epuesa;
Esiarisiar ituŋa luelelakinitos ejie.
Isunyakini Etiopia arior akekanin mama ejai Edeke.
Koyeikisi Edeke, yes ajakanuto nuka akwapin;
Koyooto aiturit EJAKAIT;
Mama kaŋol kaloibwanenit akuj naka akuj, nakejai ageun apeŋo;
Koany, inera keporotoke, eporoto lokagogoŋ.
Koinakisi Edeke agogoŋ,
Irumit akejokis Isirael,
Akegogoŋ da ejai toma akuj.
Edeke loka Isirael, ŋes ekori agogoŋ ka apedor mama ejaas ituŋake,
Kituritete Edeke!
Wu Edeke, kitajarai:
Naarai alomasi akip kiton otauka.
Kepok erit loidul, nemam ipedoria abwoia:
Adolok atar, nekelikoria akalele.
Kapas akaimony; aono ekaporoto:
Eriokuut akakonye naedaritor Ekadeke.
Ŋul luekotos aicutar eoŋ,
Lukasurupoka kanuka aiŋal, eraas ikagogoŋok:
Kasodi kenyakak lumam aŋatarit.
Wu Edeke, ijeni akabaŋaanut;
Mam akadiakanareta imunonitai kamakon.
Kinyeis ŋul lukidareunito jo aileicikin kanukaŋ,
Wu EJAKAIT Edeke loka ajoresio:
Kinyeis ŋul lukimoete jo aitisilio kanukaŋ,
Wu Edeke loka Isirael.
Naarai apotu kamoromoroto eoŋ kanukon;
Kodakar akakou.
Eloŋwait kodwe luka totoka.
Kebirokinos amorosito nuka ŋul kalukimoromoroete jo.
Naamonyia, ido kaleco ekatau keteŋei, ŋun kes kamoromoroere.
Karau egaraca kama ejaas.
Arai eoŋ ekosio loka ikamerak.
wu EJAKAIT, kapak nakacamunio:
Wu Edeke, kotoma aitimikon naepol,
Koboŋokinoi kotoma abeit naka akoniitajar.
Koyuunai kotoma orit, kenyek alumor:
Kayuun kama ejaas lukalaito, kataro da.
Kinyek akalele arapar eoŋ,
Karaida ataro ailikor eoŋ;
Kinyek aipany abunakin eoŋ.
Koboŋokinoi, wu EJAKAIT;
naarai ejok akonisianut-nakamin:
Kwape ejaar aipues naka aitimesiakon, koŋolearai.
Sirikitoŋopik ekonibulesit akonikonyen;
Naarai kaburunit; kisunya aboŋokin eoŋ.
Koduduŋ ekatau, koyuu:
Kolakunai kama kalukasurupoka.
Ejaas lukasurupoka kere akonyenekon.
Ecum amorosit ekatau; kagor noi:
Amo luketimete, konye emamei idio da;
Ka luketalakarete, konye mam abu kadum.
Nakajakitor akur ketamata yenikadwaran.
Ido naijamamaata korau akuluma.
Komudukakata akecekonye, kinyeis aanyun;
Kisitelitel aŋabesikec tiritir.
Kobukok kes akoninyunyura,
Kodolok kes adedeŋ naka akonikadakin.
Kinyek da ituŋanan kere ajaut owemanakec.
Emocatar ican kaŋul kaluimusuŋit ijo.
Kinyeis alomar adolitekon.
Kinyeis aiwadikao nepepe kikadolitok.
Konye ecana eoŋ ido etururue:
Kekeu akoniitajara kuju, wu Edeke.
Eturi eoŋ ekiror loka Edeke kekosio,
Etopoloori ŋes kaimal.
Isiyalamikinete ŋul EJAKAIT aitelekarit emoŋ,
Arai emoŋ lotobait loeja amumwar ka imageger.
Aanyutu luitasonos ŋun, ido eyalamikinos:
Yes luimoenenete Edeke, kojarata ikusitauon.
Naarai epupununei EJAKAIT luilwaritos,
Mam emwaŋit ienanake.
Akuj ka akwap kituroto ŋes,
Aŋololin ka iboro kere luirimete kotoma.
Eduki da ireria luka Yuda;
Kes da iboienenete kanen, kirumito da.
Aur da naka ikekejaanakinak irumi ŋes,
Kes da lueminas ekekiror iboienenete kotoma,
Wu Edeke, korurukun ayuun eoŋ;
Wu EJAKAIT korurukun aiŋarakin eoŋ.
Luemoete ekatau!
Kitoboŋoroi kau kosodete kitisiloi
Luisiyalamikinito arieboka.
Kitoboŋoroi kes kau kanuka ikeceleic
Lukakienatatar ebe, “Ha, ha, ha!”
Ŋul da lueminas akoniitajar kobalananas duc ebe, “Kitopolooroi Edeke.”
Wu Edeke, korurukai:
Ijo ekeŋarakinanika ekakayuunan da;
Wu EJAKAIT, sirikiyap.
Wu EJAKAIT, ebwaik akamuno tomakon:
Sirikerumata bobo ileic.
Koyuunai, kitajarai kadolitekon:
Kitoik akonikit mamaka, kitajarai.
Naalosenenei ducuduc:
Icorak ijo aitajar eoŋ;
Naarai ijo ŋes akatiiba ido akabwas da.
Koyuunai, wu Ekadeke, kakan naka ikaronon,
Kakan da naka yenemamei adolit ka yenemeŋerana.
Ijo amunoka ageun koiditeuka.
Ijo ŋol lokitolomuni eoŋ kakoik naka totoka:
Keturenenei jo tiritir.
Konye irai ijo akaŋopis nakagogoŋ.
Ilelebun akaituk aituriokon,
Ka aibusesukon apaaran kere.
Sirikiireŋea kapak nakamojoŋuka;
Sirikiijal nakiŋoŋoor akagogoŋ.
Ka ŋul da lueperunete ekatau inerununete nepepe.
Kobalas ebe, “Ajal Edeke ŋes:
Korukioto kikamut ŋes;
Naarai emamei yeneyuuni.”
Wu Ekadeke, korurukun aiŋarakin eoŋ.
Korapiasi kes amorosito ka aitisilio
Luemoete aisirieb eoŋ.
Konye eoŋ amunonena tiritir;
Eyatakini noi aiturit jo.
Ka aitajarakon apaaran kere;
Naarai mam ajeni etiaikec.
Alimonori nuka adolitekon nupekon bon.
Wu Edeke, kisisianak ijo eoŋ ameun keiditeuka;
Aitodol kwana da alimo akoniswamisio nukaumokin.
Eebo, karaida kamojoŋ koja da akorwo,
Wu Edeke, sirikiijal;
Aitodol nealimoro akonigogoŋ
Mama ejai aturi naetupakini,
Akonipedor da mama ejai yenebuni kere.
Ijo loiswama nuepolok,
Wu Edeke, iŋai bo iriakatar jo?
Kitajari sio bobo,
Kitodokuni sio kaidules naka akwap.
Kiyatak jo akapolou,
Ido kibelokin bobo kitalaka eoŋ.
Abeitekon da, wu Ekadeke:
Ayeikinenei aiturit jo kadeudeu,
Wu jo Lokalaunan loka Isirael.
Ka ekatau da loibu kolaku.
Inerenenei da akaŋajep adolitekon Apaaran kere:
Naarai eleicikis, adakaros da akecekwes,
Luemoete aisirieb eoŋ.
Wu Edeke, koinak ekabaka itubesiakon,
Okoku loka ekabaka da akonidolit.
Ka lukicanikon ketube.
Einunete iroŋan ituŋa ainapakin,
Ka iukono da adolit.
Irabanakini ŋesi lukican kotuŋa,
Eyuuni idwe luka luilwaritos,
Emunyumunyei da ikamwaŋan.
Eyoŋete jo eriŋa akoloŋ ejai,
Eriŋa da elap ecai, anatar aturio kere.
Kwape irwairwaikinia elimilim akwap.
Ainapakin da naepol aitodol naemamuunor elap.
Kocor kiton osaŋeta luka akwap.
Luiboiete kamodiŋ ekukonokinos ŋes;
Lukasurupoke da idielete apua.
Ikabakan da luka Syeba ka Seba einakinete akorakineta.
Eebo, isudedikinos ikabakan kere kakonyeneke:
Ijaanakinete ŋes atekerin kere.
Naarai eyuuni yenilwaritoi kemony;
Ka yenikican yenemamei ekeŋarakinan.
Itimi yenikican ka yenilwaritoi,
Itajari da aijar naka luilwaritos.
Elakuni aijarakec kotoma amwaŋio ka adedeŋ:
Aokotokec da eraunos nuka etiai loepol kakonyeneke.
Ilipanakinete ŋes ituŋa tiritir;
Imalaete ŋes apaaran kere.
Araitoke da kijaŋijaŋa kwape ka Lebanon:
Epolooros lukore bala anya nuka akwap.
Ikopa ekekiror kwape ebusio akoloŋ:
Isirereŋio ituŋa kotomakeŋ;
Atekerin kere nuka akwap enyaraete ŋes lokarereŋ.
Kituritete EJAKAIT Edeke, Edeke loka Isirael,
Loesubi bon nukaumokin.
Kituritete ekekiror lokaibuses ikar kere;
Akwap kere kilelebun akeibuses.
Amen, Amen.
Asaŋata ne ailipasia nuka Daudi okoku loka Yese.
Abeit ejok Edeke mama ejai Isirael,
Ido mama ejaas luesegas kotauon.
Konye eoŋ, nepetai akakeje apaar;
Nepetai da eoŋ ajurusiar kotoma alositeka.
Naarai etokokolit eoŋ luituroko,
Naanyunia akerianut naka ikaronok.
Naarai emamei ariebo katwanarekec:
Konye icasit akecegogoŋ.
Mam kes iticanitos bala icetuŋa;
Karaida aisiriebio kwape kalucetuŋa.
Imukorit akaje kes bala anapito.
Itulereras akecekonye kanuka atumes:
Ipu noi luejaatar adepar luipudas ikecetauon.
Ineras kitopoloro bonik.
Ido itorit akeceŋajep kakwap.
Ŋes aboŋunioto iketuŋa nee:
Tape ikokoorete akipi nuileleba aikopo.
Ejai da adiocoa neejai Loejai kuju kakuj?”
Koany, ŋul kes ikaronok;
Kanuijamamata duc, iyatanakin abarakec.
Elot akakanin kotoma amamut aronis.
Naarai keticani apaaran kere,
Ŋinitupuruc da kalecorio.
Arai katemarite ebe, “Mere kener kwaŋin,”
Koany, ti kabilakebotet aturi naka idwekon.
Abu kesirieb eoŋ noi;
Kaomoom esaŋekec lokokau.
Abeit ibwaik ijo kes aiboisio nuerurut,
Icakak kes toma amudiario.
Aluoros kesi asiles atipet!
Amudia kes cut etasuro.
Kwape airujasit kekwenyu ituŋanan;
Kwaŋin, wu EJAKAIT, naikwenyunia ijo, imwaŋi ijo akeceput.
Naarai abu kokadak ekatau,
Aponi kecumi oŋeretenyaka:
Abu kasubite bala etiaŋ, loemamei aijen;
Karai eoŋ etiaŋ kakonyenekon.
Konye ajaenena kajo duc:
Itiŋi ijo akakan nakoteten.
Kokau kaŋun kisukunyikini eoŋ kaibuses.
Emamei idiotuŋanan kakwap yenepuda eoŋ dimarai ijo.
Konye Edeke ŋes atiiba naka ekatau, ŋes ekawai ikar kere.
Naarai, koany, ŋul luelwaka kamakon eoliorete cut:
Imudia ijo ŋul kere lukinyeis jo kolosete eporo.
Etarau EJAKAIT Edeke akaŋopis,
Tetere alimonokini nukaswamisiokon kere.
Kanukinyo epurionokinia anyunyurakon amerekekin nukoronyikon?
Kiitu ekodetekon, lokolo ibu ijo kogwel,
Loibu ijo kolaku araun ateker nakairumetekon;
Ka emoru Sion lokiboieneno ijo.
Kodakak akonikeje amejei numam edaunos,
Nukaronok kere nueswamaki lokasurup aibois nakalaunan.
Ebwaikis imederanakec araun aanyuneta.
Kosubito bala ituŋa luapotu kikeut aepeikec
Ajepia amoni naka ikito.
Aswamisio nuigirir kere
Ajepa kesi kaepei ka anyulia.
Ecweikis akoniibois nakalaunan;
Etisilioto aibois naiboieneno ekonikiror atiyakis kwap.
Ecweanakis da atukosia kere nuka Edeke kotoma akwap.
Emamei bobo enabi edio da;
Kwabo emamei kamawok idio yenejeni ebe itodoli ai.
Wu Edeke, itodoli lokasurup ai emoromoroi?
Einyanakini kereka da lokasurup ekonikiror ikar kere?
Kanukinyo inyakaria ijo akonikan, akonikan nakoteten?
Kolem ŋes katorobukon komudia kes.
Loiswamai aitajar kokidiŋ kakwap.
Idecideci akwes nuka apiuan kakipi.
Iinak ŋes araun inyamat luka ituŋa luiboienenete kamodiŋ.
Ibu kocil atan ka akalele da:
Kitoonik icorin luepolok noi.
Apaaran erai nakon, akuare da nakon:
Ibu kitemok aica ka akoloŋ da.
Ibu kiswama akamu ka aiporo da.
Ituŋa da lubaŋiok ainyanakis ekonikiror.
Sirikiimurwok aijar naka lukieanakon ikar kere.
Naarai aiboisio nuemutoko nuka akwap ileleba itogoi luka akaje.
Kituroto lukican ka luilwaritos ekonikiror.
Kiitu kwape kimoromoroo jo ituŋanan yenibaŋ apaaran kere.
Sirikiimurwok eporoto loka lukasurupokon:
Edokununei tiritir ecelet loka ŋul kalukisurokinito jo.
Wu Edeke, kimalaenenei isio jo,
Kimalaenenei, naarai eapie ekonikiror:
Elimonorete ituŋa nuka aswamisiokon nukaumokin.
Naadolokinia eoŋ apak naeseunitai,
Atubi kabeit.
Asipokinit eoŋ ipirinoke.
Abu kalimok luituroko ebe, “Sirikiswamata nuka abaŋaanut”:
Kalimok da ikaronok ebe, “Sirikikeut amumwar:
Sirikikeut akusimumwar kuju noi;
Sirikinera kimurisiŋa lueninik.”
Naarai mere ari nakokide, arai ari nakoto,
Mere da ari naka eŋalakimak ebunio aikeunun.
Ijesari ice kwap, ido ikeari ice kuju.
Ipu luinyalinyalitere, ebukununei ŋesi kotoma;
Abeit emasete ikaronok kere lukotoma akwap,
Ikokoorete asidak nakotoma.
Konye alimori ikar kere,
Ayeenenei aiturit Edeke loka Yakob.
Atubonori amumwar kere nuka ikaronok;
Konye amumwar nuka ikadolitok ikeunio kuju.
Ejen Edeke kotoma Yuda:
Epol ekekiror kotoma Isirael.
Ejai ekewema lokalaunan toma Salem,
Toma Sion da iboieneno.
Ebuku, ka ekileŋ, ka ejie.
Loitelekarit iroŋan lumam edaunos.
Emamei da loicasit kotuŋa lukagogoŋok.
Kosodete ajo nuka atwanare aikamar agali ka ebalasi.
Iŋai bo da epedori abwa kakonyenekon nainyunyurikinor ijo?
Abu ekonitube kopupun anyoun kokuju;
Kokurianar akwap, kopalaa.
Naanyounio Edeke aitub,
Aitajar luitasonos kere lukotoma akwap.
Inapi da anyunyura naesalakinit.
Luelukunito ŋes kere koyaut ainakineta
Mama ejai ŋol loibus ayoŋio.
Erai losogim kama ejaas ikabakan luka akwap.
Amonyi kekaporoto mama ejai Edeke;
Ebwololoi kekaporoto mama ejai Edeke,
Ŋesi da kapupuni.
Korioro akakan kuare komam itegi;
Kogir ekatau aitalakario.
Eitunit Edeke, keyaloŋoŋi:
Kaŋuriani, emwokolikin ekamoyo.
Isikoler akakonye:
Mam apedori ener da naarai eticanitoi noi.
Ikar da lukoloŋo sek.
Eitunit ekakosio loka akuare:
Aomoom kotauka bon;
Ekamoyo da ekukunyikina amoote.
Ecakari kereka Edeke ikar kere?
Mam bobo ŋes itoduni aminake?
Atwania akeisumunet ikar ka ikar?
Etasaŋa da ŋesi akeitimesia kotoma anyunyura?
Konye eituni ikar luka akan nakoteten naka
Loejai kuju kakuj.”
Naarai eituni nukaumokinikon nukoloŋo.
Aomoomoenenei da aswamisiokon kere,
Ido enyogonokini aomoom nuisubenenei.
Iŋai bo edeke loepol kwape Edeke?
Irai ijo Edeke loiswamai nukaumokin:
Itejenu ijo akonigogoŋ kotuŋa.
Ilaku ijo ikonituŋa kakonikan,
Odwe luka Yakob ka Yosep.
Apotu akip koanyut jo, koyoŋata,
Komaranata da ataroi.
Apotu idouon kobukut akipi,
Kijuk akuj eires:
Kisiarakinos da imaliakon.
Eporoto loka airetunikon abu kojai toma otapipirio
Eimilia da kitacau akwap:
Komaran akwap kijaŋijaŋa.
Ka isokonokon da toma akipi nuipu,
Konye mam ajenio ikonikukut.
Kakan naka Musa ka Aaron.
Kitoikisi akusiki akiro nuka aitukuka.
Eneri akiro nuimunonoro nukoloŋo.
Nukilimonokis oni lukapapaawok.
Alimonokin aturi naebunit aiturio naka EJAKAIT,
Ka akegogoŋ ka akeswamisio da nukaumokin nueswama.
Abu kiticat aitejenunet kotoma Yakob,
Kibwaik ekisil toma Isirael,
Loabu kicorak lukapapaawok, ebe,
Ibusakinit aitejenun kes idwekec.
Ka idwe da lueponio aur;
Luepote anyoun alimokin kes ikecedwe.
Tetere ibwaikinete amunokec toma Edeke,
Komam imurwokinete aswamisio nuka Edeke,
Konye koricito akeicorakineta.
Ido kinyeis aiput lukapapaakec,
Aturi naaninik naepaliono;
Aturi namam abu kitemok eketau,
Namam ekemoyo eketakina mama ejai Edeke.
Akapakina idwe luka Epuraim kalujiis, kitiŋito akabwai,
Koboŋosi kau kotoma apaaran naka, ejie.
Mam aricito aitutuket naka Edeke,
Koŋero alosenen kokisilake;
Ka nukaumokin nuabu kitodik kes.
Kotoma akwap nako Misiri, omanikor da loka Soan.
Kitobwo akipi kwape kabwas.
Akuare da kere kaica naka akim.
Kitamat kes akipi nuepu bala nuelomunete kataro.
Kitelelea da akipi kwape kicorin.
Aipaliikin Loejai kuju kakuj kotoma amodiŋ.
Kanuka eibelikec kiisito inyamat.
Kobalas ebe, “Epedori kereka Edeke aitemokin emesa kotoma amodiŋ?
Koleleata icileta;
Epedori kereka ŋesi ainakin atap da?
Itudumikini kereka ŋesi iketuŋa akiriŋ?”
Kanuka ŋun kepupu EJAKAIT, konyunyurikin:
Kinepak akim Yakob,
Konyoik da anyunyura Isirael.
Komam da emunos akeitajar.
Koŋaa da ikekia luka akuj;
Koinak da kes akima nukokuju.
Apotu ituŋa konyamata atap naka lukapedor:
Kijukak kes inyamat luaupete cut.
Kitukut ekwam loka ari nakokide kotoma akui:
Abu kiŋarenik ekwam loka ari naka eŋalakimak kotoma apedorike.
Kitetepik kes akiriŋ kwape kapua,
Ka alurueik da kwape kasinei naka aŋololin.
Kitodoik kidiŋ oidukurunukec,
Alukun akeceiboisio.
Kwaŋin apotu konyamata, kimonikinos cut;
Koinak luekibelikinito kes.
Mam ekeceibel abu kiŋoŋoor,
Koriŋa akecekiriŋ ejai aitukekec.
Konyoiki kes anyunyura naka Edeke,
Koar luetelekaritos atumit kakesi,
Kodany ikatumunak luka Isirael.
Keja ŋun kere da, kodiakanarete ca kwape kwaŋin,
Komam iyuunito aswamisioke nukaumokin.
Kanuka ŋun, abu ŋesi koŋetak akecepaarasia kotoma nukamameak,
Ka ikecekaru da kotoma akurian naepol.
Koboŋut kodunyakis amoote Edeke.
Kiitut da ebe Edeke ŋes atiibakec,
Edeke Loejai kuju kakuj ŋes ekalakunanikec.
Kiŋalaŋalata da ŋes kakeceŋajepa.
Ido mam keraas imunon kotoma aitutuketeke.
Mam abu komudia kes:
Eeca, irwan ipu abu ŋesi kisinac akededeŋ,
Ido mam abu kidikok akenyunyura kere.
Ekwam loetubor, komam eboŋuni bobo.
Ipu ca ma aatenak nuapotu kipaliikinioto ŋes kotoma ais:
Kitakadikiniata ŋes kotoma amodiŋ!
Kibelokinos da bobo kokodut Edeke,
Kitunyunyurikis Lokalaunan loka Isirael.
Mam apotu kiitut akekan,
Karaida apaaran naalakunia kes kama kalukekolo.
Kwape kibwaikinia akeanyuneta toma Misiri,
Ka nukaumokinike da omanikor loka Soan;
Ka ikececileta da tetere mam epedorete aimat.
Ka aidodoka da nuapotu komudiasi kes.
Ka lukorionokec da kitanyam emaase.
Ka isukumorinikec da komudia kakako naepol noi.
Ikecebaren da kotula kakako,
Ka ikecesipanin luka amerekekin kotula kamwanis naka eipyei.
Anyunyura, ka aisiop, ka ican da,
Ekodet loka imalaikan lukaronok.
Abu kocilak akenyunyura esokot,
Mam abu kideu aijarakec kaneejai atwanare,
Konye kotulana.
Ageunet naka agogoŋukec koweman luka Kam.
Kiŋarenik kes kotoma amodiŋ kwape kesipan loka amerekekin
Konye abu aŋolol korapia lukasurupokec.
Kiton oroŋat lo, loagwelit akanike nakoteten.
Kokoranak kes airumetekec,
Kisiboik da idwe luka Isirael owemanakec.
Edeke Loejai kuju kakuj,
Mam da aricito aitejenunetake.
Kopaasi awai bala akabwa nakeŋalan.
Kitokokoloto da ŋes kaputosiakec nuikec.
Kosac cut Isirael.
Ewema loeboieneno ŋesi kokidiŋ otuŋa.
Akeibuses da toma akan naka lukasurup.
Koinak iketuŋa da neejai ekileŋ;
Konyunyurikinite airumeteke.
Konyam akim ikatumunakakec;
Apesurukec da amamei ekosio loenyamanarere adukokin.
Apuserunukec da mam akuudianete.
Kwape etuŋanan lokagogoŋon loecela kanuemerar ajon.
Koreto lukasurupoke kau:
Kisurum kes ileic lumam edaunos.
Bobo da abu kogir ewema loka Yosep,
Mam abu koseu ateker naka Epuraim.
Konye koseu ateker naka Yuda,
Emoru Sion loamina.
Kwape kakwap naeticat ŋesi ikar kere.
Kolem ŋes kanuk naka amerekekin.
Aitanyam Yakob iketuŋa, ka Isirael airumeteke.
Kiŋarenik da kes kapirianut naka akaninike.
Amunaut eyekalukon;
Atiyanakis Yerusalem aitaraun aapoŋor.
Ainakis itiaŋ luka akwap akiriŋ naka lukalaunakakon.
Komamei da yenidai kes.
Kiraun isio amorosit kama ejaas iidunyetakosi,
Aisekelio ka akienar kama ejaas lukirimorito sio.
Enokenenei kereka ekonikolo bala akim?
Kobukok da mama ejaas ajakanuto numam iwoneete ekonikiror.
Naarai anyamasi Yakob,
Etisilioto da akeibois.
Konye koruruk sio akoniitim:
Naarai kisilior isio noi.
Kanuka aibuses naka ekonikiror:
Kolaku sio, koluc akosironisio,
Kanuka ekonikiror.
Kanukinyo atemariata do ikapirin ebe, “Ai bo ejai Ekecedeke?”
Ibus ainyaŋ aokot nuka ibulesinikon nuabukoros,
Kojenun kotoma okapirin keteete isio da.
Kwape ejaar apolou naka apedorikon kitajar ijo ŋul lueraas idwe luka atwanare.
Kinyakak toma atorobu naka iidunyetakosi irwan akanykaarei,
Amorositokec, nukimoromoroto jo, wu EJAKAIT.
Aimalaenen jo ikar kere:
Kitodikini aturio kere akoniiturio.
Ijo loiŋarenikinit Yosep bala esipan loka amerekekin;
Ijo loiboie kama kikerubin, kocaik.
Kisidik akonigogoŋ kakonyen nuka Epuraim ka Benyamin ka Manase,
Kobu aitajar sio.
Kitacau akonikonyen, sio da kitajario.
Wu EJAKAIT Edeke loka ajoresio,
Itodoli ai inyunyurikinit ailip naka ikonituŋa?
Itanyam ijo kes atap naka akiyo,
Itamat kes akiyo nuipu noi.
Kitarau sio eŋuŋet kama ejaas iidunyetakosi:
Lukasurupokosi ekienanakinos bonik.
Kinyakarai sio bobo, wu Edeke loka ajoresio;
Kitacau akonikonyen, sio da kitajario.
Ibu kireŋea atekerin, kiraik ŋes.
Ibu kirienya akwap kakonyeneke,
Koremo akejeke kwap noi, kiriam akwap kere.
Abu etolimike korapia iroŋan,
Aketenuna koputos kiresia luka Edeke.
Akelibuneta da kodolo Ocor.
Tape luitorete orot kere edeŋete?
Iboiboi eputir akitoike,
Itiaŋ da lukadedeŋak lukais enyamete ŋes.
Koŋolia kwap ijai kuju, kosesen,
Koanyana emusabibu lo.
Ka atenu naibu ijo kitogogoŋ kanukon.
Icweio kakim, ajepar cut:
Etwakete kisiŋir luka akonyenekon.
Neejai okoku loka etuŋanan loibu ijo kitogogoŋ kanukon.
Kwaŋin mam sio kiboŋori kama ijai ijo:
Kitajarunai sio, sio da kiwonei ekonikiror.
Kitacau akonikonyen, sio da kitajario.
Koboorianata ayoere mama ejai Edeke agogoŋuwok:
Kikareoto kaiyalama mama ejai Edeke loka Yakob.
Koyooto esabuli kituruoto da isiman,
Ka adeudeu naejijim ka yenikutat.
Kepoloor da cut elap, kapaaran naka epucitiwok loiyamakina.
Aicorakinet naka Edeke loka Yakob.
Abu koseu ŋes kotoma Yosep araun aitejenunet,
Naalosio aluikin akwap nako Misiri:
Nama apupunio aŋajep namam ajeni.
“Abu kalema alaŋiru kokeperike:
Ka akekanin da kojalas kodita.
Kaboŋok jo kotoma aibois nakaiyeiyea naka airetun;
Abu ketem jo kakipi nuka Meriba.
Kopuputu, wu ikatuŋa, eoŋ da ketejenuni yes:
Wu Isirael, tikipupok eoŋ!
Karaida jo aima ecedeke loegelara.
Loabu kitolom jo kakwap nako Misiri:
Kooŋa noi akoniituk, kelelebik.
Konye ikatuŋa mam apotu kopupokis ekaporoto;
Ido Isirael mam kakoto eoŋ.
Tetere elosenenete kotoma ainerununikec nuka ikulepek.
Kosodi Isirael alosenen korotinika!
Tieon ketonokok lukasurupokec atipet,
Kasodi aibelokin akakan asurokin luitokokolito kes.
Luelaito EJAKAIT tiiyapaara kamakeŋ:
Konye timam akecepak kedaun.
Tiketanyam yes akima nuejok noi adepar:
Tikesimonik kesik lokomoru.”
Irabi kokidiŋ kidekesio.
Ido itubusikinito ikaronok? Sela.
Kirabakisi lukican ka ikokiok:
Kirabakisi da kabeit luereitai ka lukibakor.
Kolakutu lukican ka luilwaritos:
Koyuutu kes kakan naka ikaronok.”
Irimete kesi taai kotoma amuton,
Apeteta kere nuka akwap ejanaros.
Yes kere iraas odwe luka Loejai kuju kakuj.
Karaida kwaŋin itwakete yesi kwape kituŋa,
Ibiroros da kwape kediopet kotoma ikapolok.”
Naarai irumit ijo atekerin kere.
Wu Edeke, sirikililiŋ:
Wu Edeke, sirikitau ti, sirikipala.
Ŋul da lukilaito jo ekeut akwes.
Iŋitanaros nepepe aluikin lukibwaitonokon.
Tetere mam bobo ekiror loka Isirael iitununoo.”
Naarai eŋitanaros nepepe, acamut da kediopetau;
Etutukoto aluikin jo.
Iweman luka Edom ka Isimaelin;
Moab ka Ikagarein;
Gebal, ka Amon, ka Amalek;
Pilisitia ka luiboiete kotoma Turo.
Asuria da imorikikina nepepe kakes,
Eŋarakis kesi idwe luka Lot.
Kwape ka Sisera, kwape ka Yabin kocor loka Kison:
Luatwakikinete En-dor;
Koraunos da aworet naka akwap.
Eebo, ikapolokokec kere kwape ka Seba ka Salumuna.
Luatemasi ebe, “Ketarautu oni
Ironyia luka Edeke luwok.”
Wu Ekadeke, kituluo kes kwape apua naka etapipirio;
Kwape da kagugu nuekutari ekwam.
Kwape kakim naicwei amagoro,
Kwape kaipelonoreta nuka akim nuinokokinete iroŋan;
Kibwap kes kwaŋin kekonikwam loededeŋ,
Kitukurian kes kekonitapipirio loepol!
Kisileleb ileic akonyenekec;
Tetere emoete ekonikiror, wu EJAKAIT.
Kisurumai kes ileic, kisiyaloŋoŋoi ikar kere;
Kitisiloi kitoolioroi da.
Tetere ejenunete ebe ijo bon, Loerai ekonikiror YAWE,
Irai Loijai kuju kakuj koyaite akwap kere.
Wu EJAKAIT loka ajoresio!
Imiela ekamoyo, eebo, iilonori da
Kanuka alaroi nuka EJAKAIT;
Ekatau ka akakuan da eyeete kaiyalama
Mama ejai Edeke Lokajaran.
Eebo, adumu anyiporit etogoke,
Iporoidoliat da adum akai naeurianakini ikedwe,
Kes itemwanakon, wu EJAKAIT loka ajoresio,
Ekakabaka Ekadeke da.
Isirereŋitoi ŋul luiboiete kotogokon:
Iyatanakinete duc aiturit jo.
Isirereŋitoi ŋin yenejai agogoŋuke tomakon:
Yenejaas otauke irotin luepolok luebeete Sion.
Itorito toma aditot naka Aimony
Ituluorete ŋes aibois naka akonye nuka atanin;
Eebo, akiru naeliŋun erapiari ŋes karereŋio.
Ŋinidiopet kakesi etakanuni kakonyen nuka Edeke kotoma Sion.
Wu EJAKAIT Edeke loka ajoresio, kopup akailip:
Kopupokinai, wu Edeke loka Yakob.
Koŋolek ereet loka lokinyonyoikitonokon akinyet.
Naarai apaaran adiopet kotoma alaroikon
Itelekarit apaarasia kamace alukumit,
Ibus eoŋ araun ekedaran ekek kotogo loka Edekeka,
Itia aiboi koweman luka aronis.
Naarai EJAKAIT Edeke ŋes akoloŋ ka ebuku:
Einakini EJAKAIT asianut ka aibuses;
Emamei ibore yenejok yenimiki ŋesi
Ŋul luelosenenete kadolit.
Wu EJAKAIT loka ajoresio,
Isirereŋitoi ituŋanan yenikimuno jo!
Inyaku arereŋ naka Yakob.
Isioni numam adolit nuka ikonituŋa,
Irapaa aronisikec kere.
Ilema akoninyunyura kere:
Ibelokin anyoun kadedeŋ naka akoniisiop.
Kibelokinoi sio, wu Edeke loka akosiitajario,
Kitanaŋ akoniisiopanakin sio.
Inyunyurikini kereka ijo sio ikar kere?
Isinatari kereka akoninyunyura aturio kere?
Tetere ikonituŋa iyalamikinos kanukon?
Wu EJAKAIT, kitodikinai sio akoniitim,
Koinakinai sio akoniitajar.
Naarai elimonokini ituŋake ka lukalaunakake ainapakin:
Konye sirikemanasi bobo neejai abaŋaanut.
Abeit eapie aitajarake kaŋul kalueyonito ŋes;
Tetere iboienenei aibuses kakwapuwok.
Anuanaros adolit ka ainapakin.
Ete adolit kwap kojai toma akuj.
Emienenei awokokwap.
Iŋarenikini adolit ŋes;
Itemokini erot loitorete akekeje.
Kitoik akonikit, wu EJAKAIT, koboŋokinoi;
Naarai ecana eoŋ ido elwaritoi.
Kidar akaijar; naarai ayoŋit eoŋ Edeke:
Wu jo Ekadeke, kitajar ekonibulesit lokimuno jo.
Kitimoi, wu EJAKAIT;
Naarai amonyi mamakon aitiwar akwap.
Kisiyalamik aijar naka ekonibulesit;
Naarai ekeunit ekatau mama ijai, wu EJAKAIT.
Epol aitimikon mama kaŋul kere lukiwoneete jo.
Wu EJAKAIT, kitoik akit akailip;
Kopupok eporoto loka akaiŋaiŋa.
Kapaaran naka icanika ewonei jo;
Naarai kiboŋokini eoŋ.
Emameete da nueputotor akoniswamisio.
Itopoloorete da ekonikiror.
Ijo bon Edeke.
Wu EJAKAIT, kisisianakinai ekonirot,
Alosenenei kotoma abeitekon:
Kimorikik ekatau ayoŋit ekonikiror bon.
Wu EJAKAIT Ekadeke, keturi jo kekatau kere;
Etopoloori ekonikiror ikar kere.
Ibu koyu akaijar kaipany naejai kwap noi.
Wu Edeke, kanyoikis luiwoŋooko,
Emoi da atukot naka lukakaje akaijar,
Komam kibwaikinito jo akonyenekec.
Iyapi anyunyurikin, epol akoniitim ka abeit.
Okwe, kibelokin mama ajai, kitimoi;
Koinak ekonibulesit akonigogoŋ,
Kitajar ikoku yenika akonibulesit.
Kitodikinai aanyunet naka ajokis;
Tetere lukalaito eanyunete, kirumata ileic,
Naarai ijo, EJAKAIT, ibu kiŋarak eoŋ, kitalaka da.
Akepetetait ejai oroŋan lukalaunak.
Emin EJAKAIT irutei luka Sion,
Adepar aiboisio kere nuka Yakob.
Wu ere loka Edeke.
Alimori nuka Rakab ka Babulon,
Kotoma kakesi nukajenete eoŋ;
Koany Pilisitia, ka Turo, nepepe ka Etiopia;
Ebalasi ebe, “Aurikinio ŋin ŋina.”
“Aurikinio ŋin ka ii tomake”;
Loejai kuju kakuj ŋes elopet iticasi.
“Aurikinio ŋin ŋina.”
Kes lueyeete ka kes da luikosiete etemarete ebe,
“Akatanin kere eja tomakon.”
Wu EJAKAIT, Edeke loka akaitajario,
Amonyi paaran ka kuare da kakonyenekon:
Kocamak akailip kolom neijai ijo;
Kitoik akonikit mama ejai aimonyoka.
Naarai ileleba emoyoka ican,
Akaijar da aapia Okatwak.
Kemarakinitai eoŋ nepepe kaŋul kaluijesaros toma Aipany;
Arai eoŋ kwape ketuŋanan yenemamei aiŋarakinio.
Kacakakin neeja ikatwak,
Kwape luaaritai lueperete kates,
Lumam ijo iitunit bobo cut;
Agelaros kakanikon.
Kiperik ijo eoŋ toma Aipany nakokwap noi,
Toma aiboisio nuemutoko, toma ataro.
Kalaŋirikinit noi akoninyunyura,
Kiŋaru ijo eoŋ kakonikailan kere.
Isieka ijo ikapapero kamakaŋ,
Kitarau da eoŋ ibore yeneketal kamakec;
Kagoloritai, mam apedori alomun kiŋa.
Aororor akakoŋu kanuka aiticanioka;
Wu EJAKAIT, ewonenenei mamakon ŋinipaaran,
Egagat akakanin mamakon.
Itodikini kereka ijo lukatwak nukaumokin?
Enyounete kereka itoilon aiturit jo?
Elimor kereka akonisianut-nakamin kotoma ates?
Arai bo akonimunonut kotoma Amudiario?
Adolitekon da kotoma akwap naka aimurwonut?
Konye wu EJAKAIT, mamakon amony eoŋ,
Ido tupuruc elipenenaa kakonyenekon.
EJAKAIT, kanukinyo icakaria ijo ekamoyo?
Kanukinyo da ibwaia ijo akonikonyen kamakaŋ?
Nakesiriebiata nuketasurokon eyaloŋoŋi.
Karapa eoŋ anyunyurakon naededeŋ:
Kagelasi eoŋ nuketasurokon.
Apotu kesi kerimosi eoŋ bala akipi apaaran kere;
Apotu da kalukut eoŋ.
Ipaupaka da amuton.
Ayei nuka aitim naka EJAKAIT ikar kere:
Itejenuni da akaituk amunonutukon mama ejaas aturio kere.
Naarai atema atiar, “Edukio aitim ikar kere:
Iticasi ijo akonimunonut kotoma akuj cut.
Eyapoik Daudi ekabulesit;
Aduki eicoloŋokon loka ajakanut mama ejaas aturio kere.”
Wu EJAKAIT, ituri akuj nukaumokinikon,
Akonimunonut da katukot naka lukalaunak.
Naarai iŋai bo EJAKAIT kitirianere jo kotoma akuj?
Iŋai da kodwe luka idekesio iputotor ijo?
Edeke loiŋosibib noi kainerunet naka lukalaunak,
Loibus ayoŋit adepar ŋul kere luirimorito ŋes.
Wu EJAKAIT Edeke loka ajoresio,
Iŋai bo lokapedor kwape kajo, wu Edeke?
Akonimunonut da kirimorit jo.
Naedakunotor akailan nukotoma, isililiŋi ijo kes.
Isiarisiar lukasurupokon kakan nakagogoŋukon.
Erai akuj nakon, ka akwap da erai nakon;
Akwap ka ailelebake, ijo kisubuni kes.
Iyalamas Tabor ka Kerumon kokirorikon.
Ejai jo akan naka apedor:
Erai akanikon nakagogoŋ, ikiara akanikon nakoteten.
Adolit ka etube kes apeteta nuka eicoloŋokon,
Aitim ka abeit kes kiŋarenikinito jo.
Wu EJAKAIT, elosenenete kotoma aica naka akonyenekon.
Isiyalamikinito ekonikiror apaaran kere:
Itopoloorio da kes kadolitekon.
Naarai ijo aibuses naka agogoŋukec:
Kotoma asianutukon ŋes itopoloorere amumwaratakosi.
Ekabakawok da ŋes loka Lokalaunan loka Isirael
Ibu kolo kiner kalukalaunakakeŋ kaitapoet,
Kotema atiar, “Ebwaik aiŋarakinio neejai ŋol loegogoŋ;
Etopoloo da ediopet loeseunitai kotuŋa.
Enyonyoik ŋes akakinyet nakalaunan:
Iticasenenei akakan;
Akakan da itogogoŋi ŋes.
Mam lokasurup eŋasi ŋes;
Karaida okoku loka aronis aitican ŋes.
Esibirori eoŋ lukasurupoke kakonyeneke;
Adanyi da luelaito ŋes.
Kokirorika itopoloorere akemumwarat
Ebwaikini akekan aŋolol,
Akekan da nakoteten ebwaikini ocorin.
Ekadeke, atiiba da naka aitajarioka.’
Ido loitelekarit ikabakan kere luka akwap.
Edarenenei akaitim kanukeŋ ikar kere,
Akaitutuket da icasi cut kamakeŋ
Ka ekeicoloŋ loka ajakanut kwape kepaarasia nuka akuj.
Komam etupito itubesiaka;
Arai kebila ikakisila,
Komam ericete akaicorakineta;
Ŋes do eticania eoŋ aibucaretakec kebela,
Numam adolitekec da kamacareta.
Konye mam erikari cut aitimika kamakeŋ,
Karaida aiŋoŋar akamunonut.
Mam abili akaitutuket,
Karaida aijulakin akirot naadau alomun kaitukuka.
Mam eŋalai Daudi;
Ekeicoloŋ da loka ajakanut kwape kakoloŋ kama ajai.
Ido kwape kekajenan lomunot kotoma akuj.”
Konye icakar ijo isac da,
Inyunyurik lokinyonyoikitonokon akinyet.
Itisil da akeboko acakakin kwap.
Ibelebel ijo iregiake kere;
Itiyatiya da ikereria.
Luitorete orot kere enaŋete ŋes:
Araun ŋesi amorosit koidunyetake.
Itopoloo ijo akan nakoteten naka lukekoloke;
Isiyalamik da lukasurupoke kere.
Eebo, itiŋiŋ ijo akwanis naka ekileŋike;
Mam ibu kitobwo ŋes kojie.
Itanaŋ apiripirike,
Icakak eicoloŋoke loka ajakanut kwap.
Ituurian apaarasia nuka atumunike;
Iburia da ŋes kileic.
Wu EJAKAIT, itodoli ai iŋopit ikar kere?
Itodoli ai akoninyunyura enoki bala akim?
Aamameak anyoika kisubia kolo idwe kere luka ituŋa!
Yeneyuuni akeijar kapedor naka Okatwak? Sela.
Nuibu kiyapok Daudi kamunonutukon.
EJAKAIT, kiitu amorosit naka ibulesinikon;
Kwape adakitor katorobuka amorosit naka ituŋa kere lukagogoŋok;
Nakemoromoroto lukasurupokon, wu EJAKAIT,
Nakemoromoroto ikukut luka lokinyonyoikitonokon akinyet.
Kituritete ETAKAIT ikar kere.
Amen, Amen.
EJAKAIT, irai ijo akosiibois nakiboienenoo,
Anatar aturio kere.
Eriŋa jo kesubuna alup ka akwap,
Ameun ikar luŋo kiton ikar kere, ijo ŋes Edeke.
Kobala ebe, “Koboŋosi, yes idwe luka ituŋa!”
Esubito bala nakabian naatubor,
Ido bala akwenyunet naka akuare.
Tupuruc esubito bala inya luebwanuŋete.
Etubio eboŋ, erinyorete.
Naarai kimudia sio akoninyunyura,
Kisiyaloŋoŋoi sio akoniisiop.
Adiakanaretakosi nukaiyeiyea da aica naka akonyenekon.
Naarai atuboros akosipaarasia kere kotoma anyunyurakon:
Kitanaŋi ikosikar bala aomisioit.
Apaarasia nuka ikarukosi kes ikar akaisakanykaarei,
Arai kija kagogoŋ imwaunete ikar akaisakanykauni;
Konye ekeceitur erai aitaaritoi ka aiturur bon;
Naarai eoliori atipet, kimameun da.
Iŋai bo ejeni apedor naka akoninyunyura,
Ka akoniisiop kwape kibusakinitor ayoŋit jo?
Tetere kidumuni etau loka acoa.
Kiitu ikonibulesin.
Kisimonikinai sio tupuruc kakoniitim;
Kasodete ailel ka aiyalamikin akosipaarasia kere.
Kisiyalamikinai sio kwape ejaatar apaarasia nuibu kiticania,
Ka ikar da lukianyunitor aronis.
Ka akoniibuses da odwekec.
Kiticat ijo aswam naka akaninikosi kamakosi,
Eebo, kiticat aswam naka akosikanin.
Yeniboie kaibois naka aiyeiyea naka Loejai kuju kakuj,
Iboienenei kotoribe loka Lokapedor kere.
Alimuni nuka EJAKAIT ebe, “Ŋes neekerianaraka ka abwasika;
Ekadeke, loamuno.”
Naarai kiyuuni jo kairukutu naka ekalokan akweny,
Ka atular da naerono.
Imeci ijo kwap kabebenokake:
Akebeit erai ebuku ka aupal.
Karaida emal loegumunio paaran;
Karaida atular naebuni kamuton,
Karaida amudiar naemunauni paaran.
Ibirokinos ilukwnin osiepikon,
Ka ilukwnin itomon kakonikan nakoteten,
Konye mam kidolokini jo.
Ianyuni da eropit loka ikaronok.
Naarai jo, wu EJAKAIT, irai neekerianaraka!
Itarau Loejai kuju kakuj aiboisikon naiboieneno;
Karaida adiotular adolokin owemakon.
Koricito jo korotinikon kere.
Kinyek amoru aiguikin akonikeju.
Ipudapudai iŋatuny ka emun.
Ayuuni ŋes, naarai kaminakin eoŋ noi;
Ekeuni ŋes kuju naarai ajenu ekakiror.
Ajaenena kaŋes kotoma ocan;
Ayuuni ŋes, etopoloori da.
Esimonikini ŋes aibut naka apaarasia nuipu,
Ido etodikini ŋes akaitajar.
Ejok aimalaenen EJAKAIT,
Ayoere aiturit ekonikiror, wu jo Loijai kuju kakuj.
Aitodunia asianutukon-nakamin tupuruc,
Amunonutukon da ŋinikuare.
Kobore yeniramat yenikaputio atomon, ka isabulin,
Ka aruo naiyapaara naka adeudeu.
Naarai ijo, EJAKAIT, kisiyalamik eoŋ kaswamukon:
Ebwonenena da kaswamisio nuka akanikon.
Aomisiokon da idulok noi.
Ebaŋ da mam ejenuni ŋun.
Naekeriakarotor lukeswamak numam adolit kere;
Iswamaete kwaŋin tetere emudiario ikar kere.
Konye ijo, wu EJAKAIT, ijai kuju ikar kere.
Naarai, koany, lukasurupokon, wu EJAKAIT,
Naarai, koany, etwakete lukasurupokon;
Isiarakinio da lukeswamak numam adolit kere.
Konye itopoloo ijo akamumwarat kwape kamumwarat naka ekosobwan:
Kenyonyoikin akinyet nakitetet.
Aanyu akakoŋu nuemiela eoŋ kodoikis lukasurupoka,
Apuput da akaki nuemiela apupun kama ka luiswamaete nukaronok lukanyoikis asurokin eoŋ.
Epoloi da kwape eres loka Lebanon.
Ekeriakaros kalaroi nuka Edekewok.
Eraenenete araito kemojoŋata;
Ileleba kes akip elibilibete da.
Erai atiibaka, emamei da amamus adolit kotomakeŋ.
Enapit EJAKAIT, eenikinit agogoŋ:
Icasit akwap da, mam epedori aijaŋijaŋa.
Ijai ijo ageun kolo ŋo.
Wu EJAKAIT, ekeut akalele,
Ekeut akalele ekeceporoto;
Ekeut akalele akecekailan.
Akailan nukapolok nuka aŋolol,
EJAKAIT lokokuju ŋes agogoŋ!
Eraas aitejenunetakon numunon cut:
Alaunit ŋes itubusikinit ekonitogo
Ikar kere, wu EJAKAIT.
Wu EJAKAIT, ijo Edeke lokenyaŋan,
Ijo Edeke lokenyaŋan, kocaik!
Koinak luituros nuibusakinito kes.
Itodolete ai ikaronok kibwoŋatatar?
Eoloboboto bonik ikeswamak numam adolit kere.
Wu EJAKAIT, emunyumunyete kesi ikonituŋa,
Aŋarut da akoniirumet.
Earete apuserut ka imoit,
Earete da ikoki.
Kobalas ebe, “Mam EJAKAIT eanyuni,
Mam Edeke loka Yakob eomoomoi.”
Koomoomata yesi luisubito bala itiaŋ kotuŋa:
Ka yes da ibaŋiok, icounete wori?
Lokesubi da akoŋu, ŋes emam eanyuni?
Ŋopeŋol loisisianakini ituŋanan acoa.
Eraas nukamameak.
Yenisisianakini ijo kokisilakon.
Isibworari ijo ŋes kinyek aanyun apaarasia nuka ican,
Aitodol naebokikinere ikaronok aipany.
Karaida aijal airumeteke.
Naarai etube eboŋori mama ejai adolit;
Kes da luitenara kotauon etuparete ŋes.
Iŋai bo enyouni kanukaŋ aluikin ikeswamak nukaronok?
Iŋai bo ebwoi kanukaŋ aluikin ikeswamak numam adolit?
Kedim EJAKAIT araut ekeŋarakinanika,
Esunyakinit ekatau aiboikin eililiŋa.
Naalimunio ebe, “Ejurusiar akakeju”;
Wu EJAKAIT, aitimikon ŋes kegaŋit.
Kotoma aipues naka aomisioka kotomaka,
Isiyalamikinito aitalakaretakon ekatau.
Luisilakinete nukameŋeranut?
Etubokinete da aiar aokot numam aronis.
Konye korai EJAKAIT ekapir loeoja:
Ekadeke da korai atiibaka nakerianara.
Emudiari da kes karonisikec;
Emudiari kes EJAKAIT Edekewok.
Kopotu, kayeikis EJAKAIT:
Kekareete kaiyalama mama ejai Atiiba naka aitajariowok.
Kekunyakis akonyeneke kaimal,
Kekareete mamake kaiyalama kisabulin.
Naarai EJAKAIT ŋes Edeke Lopeti,
Ekabaka da lopeti, adepar idekesio kere.
Agururin nuka akwapin ejaas toma akanike,
Aidiasia da nuka iroŋan eraas nukeŋ.
Aŋololin nukeŋ, ŋes kolo kesubi:
Akekanin elunuluŋete akwap naeonit.
Kakukonokinos kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT Ekasubaniwok.
Oni da kirai ituŋa lukoronyike;
Amerekekin nuka akanike.
Lolo, arai kiirasi ekeporoto!
Kwape kapaaran naka Masa kamodiŋ:
Nakakoduniata eoŋ lukapapaakus,
Ketogogoŋoto, koanyut akaswam.
Kabala ebe, “Kes ituŋa luapuoros kotauonokec,
Komam ejenete ikarotin.”
Mam elomunete rwaru aibworareteka.
Koyeikisi EJAKAIT ekosio lokitetet:
Koyeikisi EJAKAIT, yes akwapin kere.
Koyeikisi EJAKAIT, kiturito ekekiror:
Kitodiasi akeitajar ŋinipaaran.
Kolimosi akeibuses katekerin,
Aswamisioke nukaumokin kotuŋa kere.
Naarai epol EJAKAIT, loibusakinit noi aiturio:
Loibusakinit ayoŋio adepar idekesio kere.
Konye EJAKAIT ŋes asubi akuj.
Aibuses ka apolou ejaas akonyeneke:
Agogoŋ ka atemelel ejaas aiboisike nakalaunan.
Koinakis EJAKAIT aibuses ka agogoŋ.
Koinakis EJAKAIT aibuses naibusakinit ekekiror:
Koyautu ainakinet, kolomut alaroike.
Komaata EJAKAIT konapito luelaete:
Komaran kakonyeneke akwap kere.
Icasit akwap da, komam epedori aijaŋijaŋa:
Etubokini ituŋa kabeit.”
Kiyalamikin akuj, kolel akwap;
Kirurum aŋolol, ka ailelebake kere.
Kolel ekitui, ka luejaas toma kere;
Kosodete do ikito kere luka amagoro ayoore kanuka aiyalama;
Naarai ebunit atubokin akwap:
Etubokini akwap kadolit, Ka ituŋa da kakebeit.
Eyait EJAKAIT; kolel akwap;
Kiyalamikinos apujana nuipu.
Irimorito ŋes idouon ka amuton:
Adolit ka etube kes apetetait naka eicoloŋoke.
Icwei lukasurupoke luirimorito.
Abu eimiliake kinwak akwap:
Koany akwap, komaran.
Kocalaros iukon bala edipor kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT,
Kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT loka akwap kere.
Elimori akuj akedolit,
Aanyut da ituŋa kere akeibuses.
Lueoloboboto kanuka aputosia:
Komaata ŋes, yes idekesio kere.
Abu Sion kiira kiyalamikin,
Kolelata da adwe nuka Yuda;
Kanuka itubesiakon, wu EJAKAIT.
Kitopolooritai noi aitelekarit idekesio kere.
Idari ŋesi itauon luka lukalaunakake;
Eyuuni kes kakan naka ikaronon.
Eŋiuni aica kanuka ikadolitok,
Aiyalama da kanuka luitenara kotauon.
Kiyalamikinos kotoma EJAKAIT, yes ikadolitok;
Kimalata ekekiror lokalaunan.
Naarai eswama nukaumokin:
Akekan nakoteten ka akekan nakalaunan
Eswamakis ŋes aitajar.
Edeleleu da adoliteke kakonyen nuka atekerin.
Mama ejai ekek loka Isirael;
Isaŋeta kere luka akwap aanyut aitajar naka Edekewok.
Kikare akwap kere kaiyalama mama ejai EJAKAIT;
