Konye naeneria, ekotosi kesi ejie.
Eteluori akakonye mama ejaas iroŋan:
Ai bo ebunio akaiŋarakinio?
Ebuni akaiŋarakinio kama ejai EJAKAIT,
Lokesubi akuj ka akwap.
Ŋol lokidari jo mam iluranar.
Koany, ŋol loidari Isirael
Mam iluranar karaida ajotoor.
EJAKAIT ŋes ekedaranikon:
EJAKAIT ŋes etolimikon kakanikon nakoteten.
Karaida elap kuare.
Idari ŋesi ekonitau.
Amear lolo aitodol ikar kere.
“Kaloto togo loka EJAKAIT.”
Ebwoete akosikeje
Koruteikon, wu Yerusalem.
Bala ere loidunyudunyitai:
Kes atekerin nuka EJAKAIT,
Araut aitejenunet mama ejai Isirael,
Aimal ekiror loka EJAKAIT.
Naarai esipokinitai nen Iicoloŋo luka aitub,
Iicoloŋo luka etogo loka Daudi.
Ekeriakaros lukiminasi jo.
Kojau ainapakin kotoma arwatatinikon,
Akerianut da otogoikon lukapolok.
Kanuka ikainacan ka ikapaup,
Alimuni do ebe, “Kojaun ainapakin tomakon.”
Kanuka etogo loka EJAKAIT Ewokodeke
Kamoikini jo ajokis.
Keteluori jo kakakonye,
Wu jo loiboie kotoma akui.
Koany, kwape eseseniata akonye nuka ibulesin akan naka
ekeceiakait,
Ido kwape eseseniata akonye nuka abulesit ajakaitike;
Kwape kwaŋin eseseniata akosikonye EJAKAIT Ekosideke,
Aitodol nakltimio ŋesi sio.
Kitimoi sio, wu EJAKAIT, kitimoi sio:
Naarai kiup isio cut amenio.
Aupa ikositauon
Aisekelio naka ŋul kaluiiakakaete,
Ka amenio naka luiturosi.
Kedim EJAKAIT ajakut owaiwok.
Kedim EJAKAIT ajakut owaiwok,
Nakinyoikinioto ituŋa asurokin oni:
Naenepunia akecenyunyura asurokin oni:
Ti do akipi kilelearito oni,
Aleles da tierapiarit iwokotauon.
Ti do akipi nuedakununos
Erapiarito iwokotauon.
Kituritete EJAKAIT,
Lomam abu koinak oni okelakec bala lumejauna.
Aku ewokotau bala akweny naekui kairukutu naka ikalokak:
Elakulakun airukutu, kiku do oni.
Lokesubi akuj ka akwap.
Ŋul luemunos EJAKAIT esubito bala emoru Sion,
Lomam epedorio aijanar, konye ebwoi ikar kere.
Kwape irimoritotor iroŋan Yerusalem,
Irimorit kwaŋin EJAKAIT ikeruna,
Amear lolo aitodol ikar kere.
Naarai ebela loka aronis mam esalakini airumet naka ikadolitok;
Tetere mam ikadolitok eriorete akecekanin mama ejaas nwnam adolit.
Wu EJAKAIT, kikonak ejok ŋul luejok,
Ka ŋul da luitenara kotauonokec.
Itolomari EJAKAIT kes nepepe kikeswamak numam adolit. Kinapakin Isirael.
Kipou kasubata bala ŋul luirujaete.
Ayoore da anaiepawok:
Kotemasi do atekerin ebe,
“Eswamaki EJAKAIT kes nuepolok.”
Kiswamak oni EJAKAIT nuepolok;
Ŋes kiyalamar.
Wu EJAKAIT, kibelok bobo akosiŋatario,
Kwape kalelesia nuka ari naka Enalaklmak.
Esakete kailel.
Karaida elosi korotoke komonyi akiyo,
Kitiŋite ikinyom luyean;
Eboŋuni kailel, eyaŋauni da iisutanake.
Dimikito keduk EJAKAIT etogo,
Itaaritos atai luedukete:
Dimikito kidar EJAKAIT ere,
Ekwenyi lokedaran atai.
Ainyam da atap naka aitapasitoi:
Naarai einakini kwaŋin iminanake ajo.
Aur da naka akoik ŋes ainakineteke.
Kwape kimalia kakan naka ekagogoŋon,
Esubito kwaŋin idwe luka atumun.
Iyalama etuŋanan loilelebit kes ocoeke:
Emameete ileic,
Naineratar kalukasurupokec orute.
Isirereŋitoi ŋinituŋanan yeneyoŋit EJAKAIT,
Yenelosenenei korotinike.
Iyalamikini ijo, ijaun ejok.
Epusi akoniberu bala emusabibu loerai noi,
Kaiboisio nukotoma nuka togokon:
Elukunete idwekon emesakon bala aitoceta nuka iseitunin.
Koany, isirereŋio kwaŋin
Ituŋanan yeneyoŋit EJAKAIT.
Ianyununei da ajokis naka Yerusalem
Apaarasia kere nuka aijarakon.
Kinapakin Isirael.
“Keticanata eoŋ irwan ipu ameun keiditeuka.
Keticanata eoŋ irwan ipu ameun keiditeuka:
Konye mam kepikorito.
Etooiasi aloboikec.”
Aŋed ŋesi aunoi nuka ikaronok.
Kisurumai kes ileic kitoboŋooroi,
Ŋul kere luelaito Sion.
Nueokete eroko kepolooro:
Numam ilelebia ekasakan akekan,
Karaida loeeni iisutan atorobuke.
“Arereŋ naka EJAKAIT kojai kayes;
Kilipakini yes arereŋ kokiror loka EJAKAIT.”
EJAKAIT, kiira ekaporoto:
Kitoik akoniki
Eporoto loka aiŋaiŋaka.
Wu EJAKAIT, iŋai bo yenebwoi?
Tetere kiyonio.
Amunokina da akekirot.
Ipuda ekatau EJAKAIT,
Aitelekarit eipud loipudatar ikedarak atupuruc,
Eebo, aitelekarit eipud loka ikedarak atupuruc.
Naarai mama ejai EJAKAIT ejai aitim,
Mamakeŋ ŋes ejai alakun naepol.
Kotoma numam adoliteke kere.
Karaida akakonye aomiara;
Mam da alomanakin akiro nukapolok,
Karaida akiro nukekarunito.
Kwape ikoku yenejakarit kodakite totoke,
Esubit ekatau bala ikoku yenejakarit.
Wu Isirael, komunokin EJAKAIT,
Amear lolo aitodol ikar kere.
EJAKAIT, kiitu Daudi Aicanioke kere;
Kwape eyapoikinio EJAKAIT,
Kiyapoik da Lokapedor loka Yakob ebe:
“Abeit mam alomari owema loka ekatogo,
Karaida alosit aperitika;
Karaida abukioka ailuranar;
Aitodol naadumakinia EJAKAIT aibois,
Ewema lokalaunan loka Lokapedor loka Yakob.”
Kadumakisi da ŋes amana naka amonieik.
Kilomari owemanake lukalaunak;
Kimai ŋes kokwap keicolog loka akejeke.
Ijo, ka asaduku naka agogoŋukon.
Kikareoto lukalaunakakon kanuka aiyalama.
Kanuka Daudi ekonibulesit,
Sirikibelok akonyen nuka lokinyonyoikitonokon akinyet.
Mam ijulakini:
Ebe, “Kaur naka akuanakon esiboikini oicoloŋokon.
Arai kerica ikonidwe aitutuketeka
Ka aitejenunetaka nuesisianakini kes,
Iboikinos do ikecedwe da oicoloŋokon ikar kere.”
Naarai aseu EJAKAIT Sion;
Ekilakin aitaraun akeibois.
Na ŋes aibois nakiyenisika ikar kere:
Nee ŋes neeboikin eoŋ; naarai ekilakin ŋes.
Esirereŋi cut inyamatake:
Esimonikini lukicanike katap.
Lukalaunakake da ikareete kanuka aiyalama.
Etemok atala kanuka lokinyonyoikitonoka akinyet.
Etanapi lukasurupoke ileic:
Konye emwekimweki abokoke kamakeŋ,
Iinacan aiboi nepepe kidicasi!
Naelelei kiton ajulo nuka epenek,
Epenek loka Aaron;
Naelelei kiton adal naka inapeneke.
Nueleleete koroŋan luka Sion:
Naarai ŋina ecorakin EJAKAIT arereŋ,
Ŋes aijar naka ikar kere,
Yes ibulesin kere luka EJAKAIT,
Luibwoete kuare kotogo loka EJAKAIT.
Kituroto da yesi EJAKAIT.
Ŋes lokesubi akuj ka akwap.
Kituroto yesi EJAKAIT!
Kituroto ekiror loka EJAKAIT;
Kituroto ŋes, yes ibulesin luka EJAKAIT;
Kalaroi da nuka etogo loka Edekewok.
Kituroto yesi EJAKAIT; naarai ejok EJAKAIT:
Koyooto aiturit ekekiror; naarai ibus.
Isirael da araun abarake obe.
Naarai ajeni ebe epo! EJAKAIT,
Itelekarit da EwokoJAKAIT idekesio kere.
Nuetojokit EJAKAIT, ŋupeŋun eswama ŋesi,
Kotoma akuj, ka akwap, ka aŋololin, ka ataroi kere da.
Ka eimina aupa kakiru;
Itukutuni ikwamin kaiŋadisiake.
Loabu kodany ikiyaik luko Misiri,
Luka ituŋa ka luka itiaŋ da.
Abu kijuk aanyuneta ka nukaumokin kidiŋikon, ijo Misiri, Mama ka Parao, ka ikebulesin kere.
Koara da ikabakan lukagogoŋ:
Ka Og ekabaka loka Basan,
Ka ajakanuto kere da nuka Kanaan:
Airumet naka Isirael iketuŋa.
Wu EJAKAIT, ejaenena aiitunetekon anatar aturio kere.
Iituni da ikebulesin.
Aswam naka akanin nuka ituŋa.
Ejaas kes aituke, konye mam ineras;
Ejaas akonye, konye mam esesenete;
Ejaas aki, konye mam epupete;
Emamei da edioiyenane kaitukekec.
Eputokinos lueswamaete kes kakes;
Eebo, ŋinidiopet yenemuno kes.
Ijo ekek loka Isirael, kituroto EJAKAIT:
Ijo ekek loka Aaron, kituroto EJAKAIT:
Ijo ekek loka Lebi, kituroto EJAKAIT:
Yes luiyoŋito EJAKAIT, kituroto EJAKAIT.
Kituritete ETAKAIT koSion,
Loiboie ko Yerusalem.
Kituroto yesi EJAKAIT.
Naarai ejaenena akeitim ikar kere.
Naarai ejaenena akeitim ikar kere.
Naarai ejaenena akeitim ikar kere.
Ŋol loiswamai bon nukaumokin nukapolok:
Naarai ejaenena akeitim ikar kere.
Naarai ejaenena akeitim ikar kere.
Naarai ejaenena akeitim ikar me.
Naarai ejaenena akeitim ikar kere.
Akoloŋ ayait apaaran:
Naarai ejaenena akeitim ikar kere.
Elap ka aacer ayait akuare:
Naarai ejaenena akeitim ikar kere.
Naarai ejaenena akeitim ikar kere.
Naarai ejaenena akeitim ikar kere.
Kakan nakagogoŋ, kakan naerioro da:
Naarai ejaenena akeitim ikar kere.
Naarai ejaenena akeitim ikar kere.
Kosodi aitotor Isirael kidiŋike:
Naarai ejaenena akeitim ikar kere.
Konye kocakak Parao ka ajoreke Aŋolol Nakareŋan:
Naarai ejaenena akeitim ikar kere.
Naarai ejaenena akeitim ikar kere.
Ŋol loabu kodany ikabakan lukapolok:
Naarai ejaenena akeitim ikar kere.
Naarai ejaenena akeitim ikar kere.
Naarai ejaenena akeitim ikar kere.
Naarai ejaenena akeitim ikar kere.
Naarai ejaenena akeitim ikar kere.
Airumet naka Isirael ekebulesit:
Naarai ejaenena akeitim ikar kere.
Naarai ejaenena akeitim ikar kere.
Kilaku oni kama ejaas lukasurupowok:
Naarai ejaenena akeitim ikar kere.
Naarai ejaenena akeitim ikar kere.
Kimalata ca Edeke loka akuj:
Naarai ejaenena akeitim ikar kere.
Nakiitunio Sion.
Kipou kekajakisi akosideudeun
Okito lukanen.
Naarai akotosi lukiŋatarito sio ikososio kamakosi,
Ŋul da lukimwanito sio akotosi aboliasio, kobalas ebe, “Koyeikinai sio ediopet kokososio luka Sion.”
Kiyei isio biai ekosio loka EJAKAIT Kacekwap?
Arai keemurwoki ijo, wu Yerusalem,
Kimurwoki da akakan nakoteten apirianutuke.
Arai mam keitunit jo;
Arai mam etopoloorit Yerusalem
Adepar akaiyalama kere.
Kanuka apaaran naka Yerusalem;
Luabalas ebe, “Kotiyaikisi, kotiyaikisi,
Kiton apetetaitike.”
Iyalamikini ŋesi yenikiropi jo
Kwape kiswamakinia sio.
Iyatamikini ŋesi, yenedakuni kosodi aideeakin
Ludidikikon atiiba.
Ayei ammt jo kakonyen nuka idekesio.
Emalai da ekonikiror kanuka akonisianut-nakamin ka abeitekon:
Naarai itopoloo ijo akonikirot adepar ekonikiror kere.
Kisinyikok eoŋ kagogoŋ kotauka.
Wu EJAKAIT, kimalaete rwaru jo ikabakan kere luka akwap,
Naarai apuput akiro nuka aitukukon.
Eebo, eyeete nuka irotin luka EJAKAIT;
Naarai epol aibuses naka EJAKAIT.
Konye luiwoŋoko ejeni kama elwana.
Iriori akonikan asurokin anyunyura naka lukasurupoka, Akonikan nakoteten ŋes ketajari eoŋ.
Wu EJAKAIT, ejaenena akoniitim ikar kere;
Sirikijal aswamisio nuka akonikanin.
Ijeni akaomisoit eroko elwana.
Iŋici ekasokot, ka aperoka da,
Ijeni da ikarotin kere.
Konye koany, wu EJAKAIT, ijeni ŋes cut.
Kiluk eoŋ kiŋaren kokau da,
Ido kidokok eoŋ akonikan.
Aijen naikoni nen kekarunit;
Ikiara noi, mam apedori adolokin ŋes.
Ai bo alosi anyoun komoyokon?
Ai bo da akereari anyoun kakonyenekon?
Arai kapesik akaperit toma Okatwak, koany, ijai Ijo nen da.
Arai kaporo kabebenoka nuka tupuruc,
Kasodi aiboikin osaŋe cut loka aŋolol:
Keŋarenikini akonikan ŋina da,
Ketiŋi akonikan nakoteten.
Arai kener ebe, “Abeit karapiari amuton,
Aica da nakalukunit eraun akuare.”
Mam amuton kinopikini jo,
Konye ecai akuare kwape kapaaran:
Eputos amuton ka aica kamakon.
Naarai ibu ijo kosub ineretenyaka:
Ibu koburia eoŋ kakoik naka totoka.
Kemalaenenei jo; naarai kasubunitai eoŋ kopone loeyoŋoŋ ka loeumokina da:
Nukaumokin akoniswamisio;
Ejeni ekatau ŋun jokan.
Mam akasubunet ibwaa kamakon,
Nakasubere kaiyeiyea,
Nakeswamaere kapirianut katutubeta nukokwap nuka akwap.
Apotu akonikonye koanyut eoŋ alidio,
Ewadikatai akatutubeta kere oitabokon,
Nukeswamaere ginipaaran,
Koroko ketakanuna adiokakesi.
Wu Edeke, akoniwomisio eraas nuka akais nuipu kamakanl Epol ca ma etiaikec!
Arai kemar kes, epol etiaikec adepar asiŋe:
Naakwenyunia, eriŋa ajai nepepe kajo.
Aso konyoutu kaneajai yes ikaarak.
Lukasurupokon da elimito ekonikiror atai.
Wu EJAKAIT, mam kereka alait eoŋ kes lukilaito jo?
Mere asacit eoŋ ŋul lukinyoikinete jo?
Alait kes kalait alopet:
Emarakinit kes araut lukasurupoka.
Kitemoi, kojen akaomisio:
Ido kiŋarenik eoŋ korot lomam edaun.
Wu EJAKAIT, koyuunai kama ejai ituŋanan yenikaronon; Kidarai kama ejai ituŋanan yenikadedeŋan:
Luitetemonorete ameŋeranut kotauonokec;
Icebokinitos atukonokin nepepe ejie.
Ejai aisorit naka emusaga kwap kaŋajepekec.
Wu EJAKAIT, kidarai kakanin nuka ikaronok:
Kidarai da kama ejaas ituŋa lukadedeŋak:
Lualosikis aitapaar akakeje.
Aterakis eboi ariri kerot;
Etemokis da atacin alokia eoŋ.
Ijo ŋes Ekadeke:
Wu EJAKAIT, kitoik akit eporoto loka aiŋaiŋaka.
Irapia akakou kapaaran naka ejie.
Sirikitodol ekebotet lokaronon;
Kinyeis aitopoloor bonik.
Korapia kes ameŋeranut nakanaiepakec.
Kocakakinai kes akim;
Toma apanya nuidulok, tetere mam bobo enyounete.
Mam iticasio kakwap yeninera nueroko:
Emejai aronis aibiror ituŋanan yenikadedeŋan.
Ka abeit da naka luilwaritos.
Abeit imalaete ikadolitok ekonikiror:
Iboikinos luitenara akonyenekon.
EJAKAIT, kewonet jo; kiwonyuni mama ajai,
Kitoik akonikit eporotoka nakewoneo jo.
Arionor da naka akaninika bala asubanit naka atiboŋ.
Wu EJAKAIT, kidar akaituk;
Kidar ekek loka anaiepeka.
Ailolitoi kaswamisio nuka aronis
Kituŋa Iuiswamaete numam adolit;
Sirikanyam lukajijimakakec.
Kenomata do ikadolitok, eraun asianut;
Ketoron ŋesi eoŋ, eraun bala akinyet naebukokinio akou; Sirikener akakou ŋes:
Konye iyatanakin akailip kotoma aronisikec da.
Acakar ikecekatubok ariri naka atiiba;
Epupunete da akakiro; naarai ejijim kesi.
Awokokojo da isiarakinos aituk naka ates.
Kamunokini jo; sirikinyek ekatau esilikinit.
Kidarai koic lokalokitotor,
Ka atacin da nuka ikeswamak numam adolit.
Kakuj bo do eoŋ.
Eŋaiŋai EJAKAIT kekaporoto.
Adoriani kakonyeneke;
Etoduni ikacan.
Naeiloror ekamoyo kotomaka,
Ibu kojen ekasokot.
Ebwaata kesi eic lokalokitotor korot loetorit.
Kosesen akanika nakoteten, koany;
Naarai emamei ituŋanan yenikaieni:
Kakurwoki aiku; emamei ituŋanan yenepodo ekatau.
Kabala ebe, Ijo neekeriaraka,
Airumeteka da kakwap naka ikajarak.
Naarai ketisili noi.
Koyuunai kama ejaas lukemanito;
Naarai ketelekarito eoŋ kagogoŋ.
Tetere emalai ekonikiror:
Kerimorito ikadolitok;
Naarai kikonakini ijo eoŋ nuejok.
Wu EJAKAIT, kiira akailip:
Kitoik akit akaiŋaiŋa:
Koboŋokinoi kamunonutukon kadolitekon da.
Naarai kakonyenekon emamei ikajaran yenitojokio.
Enomo aijaraka alatakin kwap:
Kesiboiki aiboisio nuka amuton, kwape kaŋul kaluatwakata sek.
Kanuka ŋun eilor ekamoyo kotomakaŋ;
Asiliki etauka kotomakaŋ.
Aomoomoi aswamisiokon kere:
Enoosikin aomoom aswam naka akaninikon.
Ejakit ekatau akur kanukon, kwape kakwap kanaeonit,
Wu EJAKAIT, kisunyite ca bo aboŋokin eoŋ;
Eilor ekamoyo:
Sirikibwa akonikonye kamakaŋ;
Kenye aiput ŋul luelomarete Aipany.
Kisiirarai akonisianut-nakamin tupuruc;
Naarai kamuno jo.
Kitejenunai erot loibusakinit eoŋ aitorenen:
Naarai etonyouni ekatau mama ijai.
Wu EJAKAIT, koyuunai kaneejaas lukasurupoka:
Akeruni aiŋop mamakon.
Naarai irai ijo Ekadeke;
Ejok emoyokon;
Kiŋarenikinoi toma akwap naka aitenara.
Kitajarai, wu EJAKAIT, kanuka ekonikiror:
Kotoma adolitekon kitolom ekatau kotoma ocan.
Ido kanuka akonisianut-nakamin komudia lukasurupoka, Kodanya kere luereito ekatau;
Naarai arai eoŋ ekonibulesit.
Loisisianakini akakanin ejie,
Ikabokoro da anaŋ.
Edeke ŋes akasianut-nakamin, ka abwasika,
Ekapir loeoja, ekayuunanika;
Ekabuku, ka ŋol loamuno eoŋ;
Loketononokikini ikatuŋa.
Arai bo okoku loka ituŋanan, tape jo iwomit nuke?
Esubit ituŋanan bala aamameak:
Akepaarasia da bala etoribe loetubor.
Kotiro iroŋan, epuruunete.
Koeaku eimilia, kisiarisiara kes;
Kijuku ikonimalia, kisiyaloŋoŋ kes.
Kolakunai, koyuunai kakipi nukepuak,
Kakan naka imo:
Luineras akeceituk aamameak,
Akecekan da nakoteten erai akan nakoteten naka aiŋalanut.
Ayei aiturit jo kadeudeu naka aputio atomon.
Ŋes ŋol loitajari ikabakan:
Loeyuuni Daudi ekebulesit kokileŋ kaloekwana.
Kolakunai, koyuunai da kakan naka imo,
Luineras akeceituk aamameak,
Akecekan da nakoteten erai akan nakoteten naka aiŋalanut.
Naesubiata odwewok bala iraan luepolok koiditeukec; Adwewok da bala amoru nuka agor nuigirio kwape nukore lokapolon;
Nailelebunotor idulaawok, kojaas inyamat toma luegelegela; Naeuriata awokomerekekin ilukumin ka ilukumin itomon koronyiawok;
Naemameunor acilun, arai acilar,
Komamei da elulu korotiniwok;
Eebo, iyalamas ituŋa, luerai EJAKAIT Ekecedeke.
Ketopoloori jo Ekadeke, wu Ekabaka;
Eturenenei ekonikiror ikar kere.
Keturenenei jo ŋinipaaran;
Eturenenei ekonikiror ikar kere.
Epol EJAKAIT, loibusakinit aiturio;
Mam akepolou emounio.
Aturi adiopet ituri aswamisiokon mama ejai aturi ace,
Elimori da akoniswamisio nukapedor.
Nuka aibuses naepol naka apoloukon,
Ka akoniswamisio nukaumokin, kes aomoomoi.
Itatamete ituŋa apedor naka aswamisiokon nuketasuro; Alimori eoŋ da apoloukon.
Iŋerete aiitunet naka ajokisikon naepol,
Eyeete da nuka adolitekon.
Iyapi anyunyurikin, ido loka aitim naepol.
Aitimesiake nuejok ejaas mama kaswamisioke kere.
Kiturete jo lukalaunakakon.
Iŋerete nuka aibuses naka ajakanutukon,
Itatamete da akonipedor;
Aitejenun odwe luka ituŋa aswamisioke nukapedor,
Aibuses da naka apolou naka akejakanut.
Akonijakanut erai ajakanut namam enaŋi,
Ejaenena da ayaitekon anatar aturio kere.
Igaŋi EJAKAIT luibiroros kere,
Itonyouni da ŋul kere luekukumito.
Kidarito jo akonye nuka kere,
Iinakini kes ikecenyamat kedol apak.
Ipukori akonikan,
Isimonikini da eimiel loka ŋinibore kere yenikajaran.
Edolit EJAKAIT korotinike kere,
Esiana da kaswamisioke kere.
Kama kaŋul kere luiwoneete ŋes kabeit.
Epupuni da aimonyokec, itajari kes.
Konye emudiari ikaronok kere.
Ineri akaituk aiturit EJAKAIT;
Kitur ŋinikuan kere ekekiror lokalaunan ikar ka ikar.
Kituroto yesi EJAKAIT!
Kiturite EJAKAIT, wu ekatau.
Eturi EJAKAIT aroko abusi:
Ayei aiturit EJAKAIT aroko ajari.
Karaida okoku loka ituŋanan, loemamei aiŋarakin.
Eoliorete aomisioke apaaran ŋipeŋin.
Aŋolol, ka luejaas tomakec kere;
Loidari abeit ikar kere:
Loitodoli etube kanuka luemwaŋitai;
Loitanyami lueriebi eteŋei inyamat.
Elacakini EJAKAIT lueenitai;
Itwekenyuni EJAKAIT akonye nuka imudukiok;
Itonyouni EJAKAIT luekukumito;
Emina EJAKAIT luedolito;
Idari EJAKAIT imo;
Igaŋi ikokiok ka apuserun;
Konye ebuburiari erot loka ikaronok.
Irumi EJAKAIT ikar kere,
Edekekon, wu Sion, anatar aturio kere,
Kituroto yesi EJAKAIT!
Kituroto yesi EJAKAIT!
Naarai ejok ayoore aiturit Edekewok;
Naarai ejok, ibus aiturit.
Etukonokini luaponi kireŋeai koIsirael.
Eeni da amusuŋunukec.
Emaanakini kes kere ikecekiroria.
Aijeneke mam imarun.
Ecakakini ikaronok kwap.
Koyeikisi aiturit Edekewok kadeudeu:
Itemokini akwap akiru,
Isibwaŋuni inya koroŋan.
Ikuruka da ludidik luemonyete.
Kwabo mam itojokit akeje nuka ituŋanan.
Itojokit EJAKAIT ŋul lueyoŋito ŋes,
Ŋul luemunos akeitim.
Ijo Yerusalem, kiturite EJAKAIT,
Ijo Sion, kiturite Edekekon.
Naarai etogogoŋ atiketa nuka iruteikon;
Esireren idwekon kotomakon.
Eyauni ainapakin oikorunokon;
Kisimonikini jo apokoi nuka akima.
Etirono akekirot.
Ekori ŋesi akako kwape kajujo nuka amerekek;
Ebwasi akopyo nuidoudouto kanuka aaterot kwape kekurwon.
Ecakanari akekipi nuerurwakito kwape kararasia;
Iŋai bo epedor abwoikin aaterotoke?
Ijukuni akirotoke, ecalari kes,
Itukusi ikwaminike, elelearete akip.
Ka Isirael da ikisilake ka itubesiake.
Mam ejenunito itubesiake,
Kituroto yesi EJAKAIT!
Kituroto yesi EJAKAIT!
Kituroto yesi EJAKAIT kokuju:
Kituroto ŋes kaneicelelei.
Kituroto ŋes, yes akejore kere.
Kituroto ŋes, ijo akoloŋ ka elap:
Kituroto ŋes, yes aacer kere nuicaete.
Ka yes da akipi nuejaas kuju kakuj.
Naarai abu kicorak, kosubunai.
Esilaki ekisil lomam edaun.
Yes akinyana, yes da ataroi kere:
Akim ka akako, akiru ka ilisinai;
Ekwam loeiliili, itodolete akekirot.
Ikito lueraete noi ka iresia kere:
Itiaŋ ka ibaren kere;
Iboro lueliatos ka akweny nueporitos.
Ikapolok ka ikatubok kere luka akwap:
Isap ka apesur;
Imakio ka idwe da.
Naarai ekekiror bon itopolooritai:
Akeibuses edeparit akwap ka akuj da.
Aiturit naka lukalaunakake kere;
Kes idwe luka Isirael, ituŋa luidunyas kaŋes.
Kituroto yesi EJAKAIT.
Koyeikisi EJAKAIT ekosio lokireter,
Aiturioke da katukor naka lukalaunak.
Kolakaros idwe luka Sion kanuka ekabakakec.
Kituroto kesi ekekiror kikosiete:
Koyeikis aiturit ŋes, kisiman ka adeudeu.
Itubusi luitasonos kaitajar.
Kitopoloosi lukalaunak ŋes kaibuses:
Koyeenenete kaiyalama kaperitokec.
Ka ekileŋ da loekwaka iwairin iarei akaninikec;
Aitodol enyaŋit katekerin,
Ka aiticaneta kotuŋa;
Ajen ikabakanakec kirikoi,
Ka ikapolokokec kaeneta nuka asua.
Ejai lukalaunakake kere aibuses ŋin.
Kituroto yesi EJAKAIT!
Kituroto yesi EJAKAIT!
Kituroto Edeke kotoma aiboisike nakalaunan:
Kituroto ŋes kotoma apak naka agogoŋuke.
Kituroto ŋes kanuka aswamisioke nukagogoŋ:
Kituroro ŋes kwape ejaar apolouke kaibuses.
Kituroto ŋes keporoto loka arupepe:
Kituroto ŋes kisabulin ka adeudeu.
Kituroto ŋes kiraman luka aputio ka alamaru.
Kituroto ŋes kaisinin nueruosi noi:
Kituroto ŋes kaisinin nueruosi bala iciirin.
Kituroto yesi EJAKAIT!
Ajenun acoa ka aituutoorio:
Amisiikin akiro nuka ajenun:
Kotoma adolit, ka etube, ka nuetenito
Ainakin ijimat acobeu,
Ka ekatumunan da aijen ka apirianut:
Tetere epupuni lokacoa, iyatakini aisisiaun;
Etuŋanan da loejenuni edolokini ainerun naeŋalei:
Ajenun awarag, ka agarac;
Akiro nuka lukacoa ka aibukaanaretakec.
Konye luebaŋaaka emenete acoa ka aituutoorio.
Okokuka, kiira ijo aituutoor naka papakon,
Sirikiŋer da aicor naka totokon:
Naarai eraun aboko nakasianut kakoukon,
Ka erikot komurisiŋikon.
Sirikicam.
Kaperutu aiar,
Kaŋopikis tai lumam akirot kaiboisio nukaiyeiyea;
Koŋaleete, kwape kaŋul kaluijesaros Aipany;
Kidumuni iboro kere lukakais nuipu,
Kilelebi itogoiwok luŋatan;
Kitebeikini eroetekon mamakosi;
Kimori enasoro ediopet.”
Kitiku akejukon korotokec:
Ewonyasi da abukor aokot.
Naarai epesikinio eboi taai
Kakonyen nuka ŋinikweny kere:
Eperunete ŋul akeceokot,
Eŋopikinete akeceijar kaiboisio nukaiyeiyea.
Elemari aijar naka ikulepek.
Ikeseuni ekeporoto kaiboisio nuelalak;
Iworoi kaibois nakapolon naetukonokinoi;
Kaneelomarere korutei, ore, ineria akekiro ebe:
“Yes lumam acoa, itodolete ai iminas amamut kacoa?
Ka lukesuarak aisiyalamikinite aisuar,
Ka ibaŋiok aila aijen?
Koany, abukokini emoyoka mama ijaas,
Ketejenunete akakiro.
Ario akakan, kwabo emamei yenapodokinit.
Kwabo mam ikotosi aitoronoka nepetai da:
Aso eoŋ da akiena kapaaran naka apolakus:
Esekelo kedolu akurianukus:
Kedolu akurianukus kwape ekwam,
Nakidoikinio epola kwape etapipirio,
Nakibunokiniata aiyaloŋoŋ ka aoyanar.
Kamoete noi, konye mam kadumunete:
Komam eseunete ayoŋit EJAKAIT.
Mam akotosi cut akainerun;
Apotu komenata aitoronoka kere:
Naarai ajurusiar kau naka lumam acoa eari kes, Ido akerianut naka ibaŋiok emudiari kes.
Konye ŋin yenikeirari eoŋ iboienenei icasit,
Iyamakina komam ekuriana aronis.”
Okokuka, arai kicam akiroka
Kiŋadak da aicorakinetaka mamakon;
Tetere itoikini akonikit mama ejai acoa,
Ibwaikini da ekonitau ajenun;
Eebo, arai kimonyak amisiikin;
Ikeseun da ekoniporoto adumun ajenun;
Kirii ŋes kwape abar naibwaitai;
Ŋes konyet ijenunia ayoŋit EJAKAIT,
Idumuni da aijen Edeke.
Elomuni aijen ka ajenun kaitukuke.
Erai ŋesi ebuku loka ŋul kaluelosenenete kabeit;
Idari erot loka lukalaunakake.
Ŋes konyet ijenunia adolit ka etube,
Ka nuetenito, eebo, ŋolirot loejok.
Naarai elomari acoa otaukon,
Aijen da isiyalamikini ekonitau;
Ajenun da kirici jo.
Kiyuunete jo korot loka aronis,
Kotuŋa luinerenenas nukelepa;
Alosit korotin luka amuton.
Luelelakinito aswam nueroko,
Luisiyalamikinito elepa loka aronis;
Luimagululos korotinikec,
Luipaanarete kosokonokec.
Kiyuunete jo kaberu naadote,
ŋes nakerimon naijodijodi kakiroke;
Imurwokini da aitutuket naka Ekedeke:
Naarai ijesari etogoke kiton atwanare,
Irotinike da kiton okatwak.
Karaida adolore orotin luka aijar.
Koric da isokono luka luedolito.
Naarai iboienenete luitenara kotauon kakwap,
Idoŋete luedolito tomake.
Konye egelario lukaronok kakwap,
Erutorio luebilete ibotei.
Konye koricenenei akaicorakineta kotaukon:
Naarai kiyatakinio kwaŋin aibut apaarasia,
Ka ikar luipu, ka ainapakin da.
Koenanakini omurisiŋikon;
Kiwadikaenenei kes apukenit naka etaukon:
Kakonyen nuka Edeke ka ituŋa da.
Kwabo sirigoŋakina toma ajenunikon.
ŋes da iteteni akonilosit.
Koyoŋitenenei EJAKAIT, konyou karonis.
Eraun ŋin aŋaleu naka akonikuan,
Asumeta da nuka akojokon.
Ka lugeet kere luka akerianutukon.
Ilapanar da ebino kaalakanyakon.
Kwabo kinyek akeriemeriem aitapas jo.
Kwape eriemeriemaa papa ikekoku yenelelakinit.
Elakara ituŋanan yenedumuni acoa,
Ka ŋin da yenedumuni ajenun.
Akemeda da itelekarit esabu loejok.
Kwabo emamei ibore yenipedori aiŋobel aitiriania ŋes.
Toma akanike nakokediany da ejai abar ka aibuses.
Isokonoke da kere eraas ainapakin.
Elakara da ŋinituŋanan yenericit ŋes.
Toma ajenun da kiticasia akuj.
Itodoununei akuj akopyo.
Okokuka, koricit acoa naeŋalei ka acobeu,
Sirienyounete kakonyenekon;
Tetere eraunos aijar kotaukon,
Asianut da komurisiŋikon.
Ŋes konyet ilosenenoo kainapakina,
Komam iguikini akonikeju.
Eebo, iperi, ido kijijimikinete akonijo.
Sirikikurianar etasuro Iokisirieŋuni,
Karaida amudiario naka ikaronok, naebunio:
Naarai eraun EJAKAIT amunokon,
ldari ŋesi akonikeju kinyek aipok.
Nakepedoria akonikan aiswamaun.
Kainakini moi”; kwabo ejai ibore diekon.
Sirikineru aronis aluikin eidunyetekon,
Naarai iboie kamakon kainapakina.
Arai mam kikwaikinit jo erono.
Sirikikokotik etuŋanan loka akaje,
Sirikiseu irotinike.
Naarai loepaarit erai loketal mama ejai EJAKAIT:
Konye ipaperikini ŋesi kaluitenara kotauon.
Konye isirereŋi neiboienenoo lokadoliton.
Konye einakini luitasonos asianut.
Konye irumete ibaŋiok ileic.
Kibwaikis itauon ajenun:
Naarai kainakini yes aituutoor naejok;
Sirikijalakis aisisianakinika.
Yenanonok, yeniminat kwape iteluna mama ejai totoka.
“Kikam akakiro kotaukon;
Koric aicorakinetaka, kojar:
Kodum acoa, kodum ajenun;
Sirikiimurwok, sirikipaa da kakiro nuka aitukuka:
Komina ŋes, kosodi ŋesi aricit jo.
Eebo, kanuidumunit kere, kodum ajenun.
Kitubusi ŋesi jo, naitunia ijo ŋes.
Etorokini ŋesi akoukon aboko nakasianut:
Kijaikini ŋesi jo aboko nakaibuses.”
Ijo okokuka, kiira, kocam da akiroka:
Kosodi aibut ikar luipu.
Kesisianakinit jo erot loka acoa;
Keŋarenikinit jo kosokono luka atenit.
Arai ikeri, mam kiguikini.
Kikam cut aituutoorio; sirikiwosik:
Koric ŋes; naarai erai ŋesi aijarakon.
Sirikiloma osokot loka ikaronok,
Kwabo sirikilot orot loka ituŋa lukaronok.
Kinac ŋes, sirikitor nen;
Kibelokin kotubor.
Naarai mam ejotoete dimikito kiswamata ameŋeranut;
Ikolerikito akonye, dimikito kitiguikis ice.
Naarai enyamete atap naka aronis,
Emasete ajon nuka akaje.
Naeyatanakin acaun aitodol apaaran naedoliorit.
Mam ejenete nuitiguikinete kes.
Okokuka, kibwaik akakiro otau;
Kitoik akonikit nuenera.
Sirienyounete kakonyenekon;
Koric kes kokidiŋ otaukon.
Naarai eraas aijar mama kaŋul kaluedumunete kes,
Aŋaleu da nakawatekec.
Kodunyakinite noi aidar ekonitau;
Naarai kotomake ŋes elomuniata nuka aijar.
Kolema kamakon aituk namagul,
Kibwaik kama elwana aŋajep naepaanari.
Kogipas akonyekon,
Kiŋarenikinitos abukiokon asesen tenan.
Kicasito ikonirotin kere.
Kolemu akonikeju karonis.
Okokuka, kibwaik akacoa otaukon;
Kitoik akonikit ajenunika;
Koric da akoniituk aijen.
Naarai elelei esik kaituk naka aberu naadote,
Ejijim akeŋajep adepar akinyet:
Ekwana kwape kekileŋ loekwaka iwaitin iarei.
Ederi akelosit Okatwak;
Tape mam edumuni esokot loitenara loka aijar,
Iriaŋiriaŋas ikerotin, mam da ejeni ŋun.
Aso do, ikadwe, kopupunoi,
Sirikinyout kakiro nuka aitukuka.
Kitwalan ekonirot kamakeŋ,
Sirikikunyak okek loka etogoke:
Kinyek ainakin ice aibusesukon,
Ikonikar mama ejaas luededeŋ:
Kinyeis imo aimonikin akonigogoŋ;
Aitaaritoikon da ajaut togo loka lukacekwap;
Idinya ijo kosaŋekon,
Naedaunor akonikiriŋ ka akonikuan.
Ibala rwaru ijo ebe, “Ala cama aituutoorio,
Amwaŋ da ekatau aitoronio;
Mam abu karimarite eporoto loka ikesisianakinakaka,
Karaida aitoikin akakit ŋun luketuutoorete!
Kaapik cut aronis kere,
Kidiŋ kekodet ka atukot.”
Komasenenei akipi nukamotikon,
Akipi nueleleete katanikon.
Tikereka ejok akonyen nuka ecoakon kikaikina,
Icorin da luka akipi korotin?
Koraut nukon bon,
Ido mere nuka imo kajo.
Kolakara kaberu naka atumunikon.
Kominakinitos jo ikisinake apakio kere;
Kolelakinite aminake.
Naarai okokuka, kanukinyo ilelakinitor aberu naadote,
Kitunia atorob naka nakerimon?
Iteteni ŋesi ikesokono kere.
Eenio kaunoi nuka akeronis.
Eoliori kanu epolor abaŋaanutuke.
Arai kititiŋ akonikan eloŋwait.
Arai kipok kakiro nuka akoniituk,
Kikamunio kakiro nuka akoniituk.
Kiswama kwanata okokuka, koyuun bon;
Naarai idoo ijo akan naka eidunyetekon;
Kiwonya, kolot, kikanikan eidunyetekon.
Karaida abukiokon ailuranar.
Koyuun bon kwape amori kakan naka ekamejan,
Ka akweny da kakan naka ekalokan.
Koomoom ikeponesio, kocou:
Emamei ŋes ejakait,
Ekaanyanaran, karaida ekayaiton.
Idiasi ikenyamen luka akamu,
Etukonokini ikenyamat kaidweny.
Itodoli ai iperi, ijo loiloŋwana?
Wori bo inyounio kajokon?
Ailokony akanin nepetai arior ajotoor.
Kwaŋin kibunokini jo ailwaritoi kwape ekerurwon,
Ka eipudikon da kwape etuŋanan loekapit ebuku.
Etuŋanan lotai, etuŋanan lomam edolit;
Elosenenei ŋesi inera numagul;
Idodikini kibokoroke;
Epwakununei aronis tiritir:
Eyeenenei ŋesi ikinyom luka aŋolopa.
Ebilio katipet, komamei aŋaleun.
Ejaas akiro akanykape nuelait EJAKAIT;
Eebo, akanykaarei nueraas nuketal kamakeŋ:
Akanin da nuebukorete aokot numam akirot;
Akeje nuisunyito akerit mama ejai ameŋeranut;
Ka ŋol da loeyei ikinyom luka aŋolopa koinacan.
Sirikiner da aicor naka totokon:
Kiminanakinenei kes otaukon,
Koenanakini kes omurisiŋikon.
Nailosenenoo, kiŋarenikinenete jo,
Naiperenenoo, kidarenenete jo;
Naikwenyununaa, iyalaenenete kajo.
Aitoroneta nuka aituutoorio ŋes erot loka aijar:
Aricit jo kama kaberu nakaronon,
Kaijodijod naka aŋajep naka nakerimon.
Karaida acamun abukioke aipok jo.
Konye nakeporon emejai aijar nakakais nuipu.
Epedori kereka etuŋanan aibwaikin akim otorobuke,
Komam enyami ikenapen?
Arai bo itori etuŋanan atotole nuesaranete,
Komam enomorete akekeje?
Ikoni nen ŋol loelomari mama ejai aberu naka eidunyeteke,
ŋol kere loetirori ŋin mam eswaki aiticanio.
Mam kereka ituŋa emwaŋete ekokolan arai ekokoi
Aisimonikin aijarake kerieb eteŋei?
Einakini iboro kere lukotogoke.
Loekoto amudiar aijarake iswamai ŋun.
Ebeikinete ŋes amusuŋun ka aitisilio:
Mam akemorosit emwatario.
Naarai ekokote itunyunyurikini ekiliokit;
Mam itimi kapaaran naka ainyaŋ.
Mam ecamuni lugelis;
Mam italakario, karaida kiinak ŋes ainakineta nuipu.
Okokuka, koric akiroka,
Kiŋadak da aicorakinetaka mamakon.
Ekakisil da kwape kecopot loka akoŋukon.
Kiwadikaenenei kes apukenit naka etaukon.
Kolimok acoa ebe, “Irai ijo kinacika”;
Komaik da ajenun apaikon:
Tetere kidarete kama ejai aberu naadote,
Kama ejai nakerimon nakijodijodi kakiroke.
Naarai kadirisa nakotogoka,
Kereik kapedotoka;
Kamisiik kotoma okatumunak,
Ekatumunan loemamei aijen.
Itorit orot eapie kagorike,
Kolot orot loebei togoke;
Napiriono akuare, kamuton.
Kanapito nuka kanaadote, epiriana kotau.
Mam akekeje idoŋete oreke:
Ejai do orotin, ejai do asisiarin,
Eperuni da kaŋinigor.
Ikamuni do je, konu,
Etemari aeomilikonyen ŋes atiar:
“Ejaas asuban nuka ainapakin oreka;
Lolo ŋes etodolio aiyaposioka.
Ŋes alomunia aisiriam jo,
Adunyakinit amoot akonikonyen, kadum jo.
Kigoen lucererin lukiusiok lukoMisiri.
Abwatanakinit akaperit
Kemina, ka icicikwa, ka akinomon.
Kaloto, kemonikinos amin kiton atupuruc;
Kalakanaros kamin.
Naarai emamei okilenika kore,
Elosit neelwana:
Ayaŋa eriagi loka apesan nepepe kaŋes,
Eboŋuni ore naikesakinia elap.”
Kakiroke nuipu nuejok kimaima ŋes,
Kaijodijod naka aŋajepeke kitiŋaiki ŋes alosit.
Kotupak ŋes katipet,
Kwape elosio emoŋ aario,
Arai aeneta alecor ebaŋ:
Aitodol naicumia emal emanyike;
Kwape iwonyaria akweny aracit,
Komam ejeni ebe eyaŋaari aijarake.
Aso do, ikadwe, kopupunoi,
Kibwaikis akiro nuka aitukuka otauon.
Sirikitoik ekonitau orotinike,
Sirikipaa osokonoke.
Eebo, lueari ŋesi kere kes ajore naepol.
Ijesari agolai nuka atwanare.
Ido mam iworoi ajenun ekeporoto?
Ebwoi kasisiarin,
Kaneimukurur kariri naka erot.
Ikalalat kariri naka irutei,
Kane elomarere ore lokapolon,
Kokekia kane elomarere toma, atiar:
“Ikatuŋa, keworoto yes;
Ekaporoto da ejai mama ejaas idwe luka ituŋa.
Yes lujimat, kojenut apirianut;
Ka yes da lubaŋiok, kojautu ketau loka ajenun.
Aooŋ da naka akaituk elomunete akiro nuedolito.
Erai aronis naketal kaŋajepeka.
Akiro kere nuka aitukuka eraas adolit;
Emamei ibore yenimagul karaida yenepaarit kotoma.
Ideleleete kere kama ejai ŋin yenejeni,
Ido itenara kama kaŋul kaluedumunete aijen.
Kodumutu akaisisianakin, kwabo mere epuesa;
Ido aijen aitelekarit esabu loseuna.
Iboro da kere luimielai mam epedorio aitiirian kaŋes.
Eoŋ Acoa etuluo apirianut ekatogo,
Amoot da aijen ka ainerun.
Aiwoŋonut, ka eitur, ka erot lokaronis,
Ka aituk naepaarit, kes nuasacit.
Arai eoŋ ajenun; ajai kagogoŋ.
Icorakinete da ikayaitok abeit.
Kanukaŋ eyaitos ikapolok,
Isotia ka ikatubok kere luka akwap.
Ka ŋul da lukadunyakinito amoot kaanyunete.
Eebo, abar namam edaun ka adolit.
Ekaiyas da aitelekarit epuesa loseuna.
Etorit orot loka adolit,
Kidiŋ osokono luka etube.
Tetere esurumi lukaminas iboro ŋul,
Tetere esilelebanari da akeceiŋadisia.
Nasodit naka akeswamisio nupeŋo.
Eriŋa akwap kejauna.
Aponi kasubi naamamear ataro,
Naamameatar atanin nuedilas akip.
Aponi eoŋ kasubi ageikin iukon.
Eroko ŋes kesuba akwap, karaida ais,
Karaida nugeet nuka apua naka akwap.
Nakitemokinio ŋesi akuj, ajai eoŋ:
Nakelukunia eikor loka ataro:
Nakiticasia idouon kokuju:
Nakitogogoŋio akonye nuka ataro:
Tetere mam akipi etubete aicorakineteke:
Nakigiria apeteta nuka akwap:
Arai eoŋ aiyalamake ŋinipaaran,
Kalakanar kakonyeneke tiritir:
Ajai akaiyalama neejaas idwe luka ituŋa.
Naarai isirereŋitoi ŋul luericito ikaponesio.
Kopuputu aituutoorio, koraut lukacoa,
Sirikiŋeroto.
Isirereŋitoi etuŋanan lokapupuni,
Irereenenei ŋinipaaran oruteika,
Idareununei kacuneta nuka ikiriginika.
Ejaun kasianut naka EJAKAIT.
Ŋul da kere lukalaito eminas atwanare.”
Asipok ikepirin ikanykaarei:
Aar iketiaŋ; enyalinyala ebinoke;
Etemok da ekemesa.
Kaiboisio nuiceleleete nukore.
Etemari da ŋesi ŋol lomam acoa atiar,
Komata ebino loenyalinyalit.
Kinyeis ajimat, kojarata;
Ido kolosenenete korot loka ajenun.”
Ŋol loeriemiriemei ekesekelon erasio,
ŋol da loitoroni ekaronon emoromoroo.
Kitoron lokacoa, kiminuni ŋesi jo.
Kisisianak ekadoliton, iyatakini da aisisiaun.
Aijen Lokalaunan ŋes ajenun.
Iyatanakinotor da ikar luka aijarakon.
Arai da isekeli, eraas ŋun nukon.
Ilebilebitoi aberu naebaŋaana;
Ajimat, mam ejeni adis da.
Iboie ŋesi okek loka etogoke,
Oicoloŋ kaiboisio nuiceleleete nukore.
Anyaraun ŋul luitorete,
Luelosete orotinikec.
Ebe, “Ŋol lojimat, komanu lailo.”
Etemari da ŋesi ŋol lomam acoa atiar,
Ejijim da atap naenyamio kaiyeiyea.”
Konye mam ŋol ejeni ebe ejaas nen lukatwak;
Ipejokoke da ejaas kwap noi toma Okatwak.
Awaragasia nuka Solomon.
Okoku loecobe einakini papake alakara:
Konye okoku loebaŋaana itakadikini totoke.
Konye adolit ŋes kiyuuni katwanare.
Konye ireŋeari aiŋobel naka ekaronon.
Konye akan naekukurana itabari.
Loetukonokini kakamu ŋes okoku loecobe:
Konye ŋol loejotoi kaidweny ŋes okoku loiswamai nukileic.
Konye erapit akaje aituk naka ekaronon.
Konye ebosi ekiror loka ekaronon.
Iyuunete lukacoa kotauon aicorakineta:
Konye ibirori loinerenenei nukabaŋaanut.
Konye ejenunio lomagul ikerotin.
Loeedi kakoŋuke eyauni ican,
Konye ibirori loinerenenei nukabaŋaanut.
Konye erapit akaje aituk naka ekaronon.
Konye erapi amina aibucanareta kere.
Konye ejai ebela kanuka ŋol kaloemamei ajenun.
Iŋadakinete lukacoa aijen:
Konye aituk naka loebaŋaana isukunyuni amudiario.
Amudiar naka lukican ŋes icanikec.
Aitaaritoi naka ekadoliton itebei ŋes aijar,
Eiyas loka ekaronon itebei ŋes aronis.
Ŋol loibwaikini etau aituutoorio ejai orot loebei aijar:
Konye epaari ŋol loijalijala aitoronio.
Ŋol loimunoni elait erai loka aituk nakeŋalan:
Ebaŋaana da ŋol loesabanakinenei.
Konye ŋol loetiki akeŋajep iswamai kacoa.
Eputos aŋajep naka ekadoliton ka epuesa loseuna:
Etau loka ekaronon erai lootai.
Itanyami aituk naka ekadoliton luipu:
Konye etwakete lubaŋiok naarai eolikinete acoa.
Mam da inyalakini ican kaŋes.
Aswam aronis esubit bala abolia mama ejai ebaŋ:
Aswam da nukacoa itojokit etuŋanan lokajenun.
Ido einakinio ekadoliton nuimiela.
Konye icasit ekadoliton ikar kere.
Kwape ebino loedwar ria kokel, ka apuru toma akonye,
Ikoni nen loiloŋwana kama ejaas ŋul luiyakito ŋes.
Konye ituurianitai ikar luka ekaronon.
Konye eoliori amun naka ekaronon.
Konye erai amudiar mama ejaas ikeswamak numam adolit.
Mam cut ikadolitok elemanario:
Konye mam ikaronok iboienenete kakwap.
Itolomuni aituk naka ekadoliton acoa:
Konye emudiario aŋajep naepaarit.
Ejeni aituk naka ekadoliton nuecamunio:
Konye aituk naka ekaronon ejeni nuepaarito.
Aitemis nakaiŋal ŋes naketal mama ejai EJAKAIT:
Konye isiyalamikinit ŋes emisani loedolit.
Konye ejai acoa kaluitasonos.
Abeit naka luitenara kotauon ŋes iŋarenikini kes:
Konye amagul naka luebilete ebotet ŋes emudiari kes.
Konye eyuuni adolit katwanare.
Iteteni adolit naka loliogot otau ekerot:
Konye ibirori ekaronon kanuka akeronis.
Konye ipoki ameŋeranutukec ŋul luebilete ebotet.
Naetwania ekaronon, eoliori akemun:
Eoliori da amun naka numam adolit.
Eyuunio ekadoliton kotoma ocan,
Kobuni do ekaronon aiboisike.
Edeke ekeidunyet kaitukuke:
Konye eyuunio ekadoliton kanuka aijen.
Nakeolioroto ikaronok ejai eibwoŋ.
Itopoloorio ere kanuka aisirereŋio naka luitenara kotauon:
Konye etiyaikinete aituke nuka ikaronok.
Ŋol loemwaŋi ekeidunyet emamei acoa,
Konye ililiŋi etuŋanan lokajenun.
Otibeele loideidei epukori nukaiyeiyea:
Konye ŋol lokemoyo lomunot imunoni akirot.
Konye kaipues naka ikenerunak ejai ainapakin.
Ŋol loerauni ekabwoaran loka emoit eanyuni ican:
Konye inapakina ŋol loelait abwoanar.
Aberu nakasianut edumuni aibuses:
Ikiliok lukakaje edumunete abar.
Konye ŋol loededeŋ iticani akuanake.
Konye ŋol loeyei adolit edumuni eropit lokabeit.
Ŋol loiketakina kadolit edumuni aijar:
ŋol da loetupari aronis earakini bon.
Ŋul luejaas itauon lumagul eraas luketale mama ejai EJAKAIT:
Konye ŋul luedoliorito korotokec isiyalamikinete ŋes.
Abeit etuŋanan lokaronon mam eswaki aiticanio,
Konye eyuunio aur naka ekadoliton.
Kwape etet loka esabu kokume loka epege,
Ikoni nen aberu naitemelel naemamei acobeu.
Konye amuno naka ikaronok ŋes anyunyura.
Ejai loisiarisiari, ido iyatanakini adumun;
Ejai da loimiki aitelekarit luibusakinito, konye etwaniari.
Ŋol da loicocoi akipi icocoikinio.
Konye ejai arereŋ akou naka ŋol kaloegwelari.
Konye ŋol loemoot ameŋeranut, edolokini ŋes.
Konye ekerianar loedolit kwape kakuii nuelibete.
Eraun ebaŋ ebulesit loka lokacoa kotau.
Araito naka ekadoliton ŋes ekitoi loka aijar;
Ka ŋol da loejai acoa edumuni aijar naka ituŋa.
Itelekarito cama ekaronon ka ekadiakanaran!
ŋol loekoto alimokinio, ekoto ajenun:
Konye ŋol loelait aitoronio esubit bala etiaŋ.
Etuŋanan loejok edumuni asianut kama ejai EJAKAIT,
Konye etubokini ŋesi aitelekar etuŋanan lokibotei lueroko.
Mam etuŋanan icasit kanuka aronis:
Konye esali aliasit naka ekadoliton komam ijaŋijaŋio.
Konye ŋin naitisili esubit bala abosus kotoma akojoke.
Edolito aomisio nuka ikadolitok:
Konye iŋalana ainerun naka ikaronok.
Eperunete akiro nuka ikaronok aokot:
Konye eyuuni aituk naka luitenara.
Konye ebwoi etogo loka ekadoliton.
Konye emenio ŋol loejai etau lomagul.
Lomam enyaritai araut ibore, kojai ebulesit,
Itelekarit ŋol loiturokina, komameete inyamat.
Konye eroko aitimesia nuka ikaronok.
Konye ŋol loerupari aamameak emamei aijen.
Konye aliasit naka ekadoliton erai araito.
Konye ekui ekadoliton kocan.
Inyakakinio etuŋanan aswamisio nuka akaninike.
Konye lokacoa epupokini ainerun.
Ejenunio atipet anyunyura naka lobaŋ:
Konye ibwai etuŋanan lokacobeu ileic.
Ŋol loelimokini nukabeit isideleleuni adolit,
Konye ekajenan lokaiŋal isideleleuni aiŋalanut.
Ejai loisudi akiro kwape aicum kekileŋ;
Konye eŋaleuni aŋajep naka lukacoa.
Konye aŋajep nakaiŋal erai naka aied akoŋu.
Ejai aiŋalanut otauon luka ŋul kaluepwakunete aronis:
Konye iyalamasi ŋul luinerunete ainapakin.
Konye imonikinos ikaronok aronis.
Konye isiyalamikinete ŋes ŋul luiswamaete nukabeit.
Ibwai etuŋanan loecobe aijen:
Konye ilabilabete itauon luka ibaŋiok abaŋaanut.
Konye eraunos luekalanyaka ikeswamak nukailolitoi.
Konye isiyalamikinete ŋes akiro nuejok.
Eraun ekadoliton ekeŋarenikinon eidunyeteke:
Konye erot loka ikaronok itapaari kes.
Etuŋanan lokalanyana mam epei luamejau:

Emamei atwanare korot kaŋol.
Konye yenemwaŋana mam epupuni aitoronio.
Enyami etuŋanan nuejok kanuka araito nuka aitukuke:

Konye loitooŋari noi akeituk edumuni amudiario.
Iŋobelei etau loka kaloeloŋwana, komam edumuni ibore:

Konye etuŋanan lokaronon esiliana, ido irumete ileic.
Konye isibirori aronis ekadiakanaran.
Ejai loitabarikin, kwabo komamei ibore:

Iyalama aica naka luedolito:

Konye einakinio loeyoŋit aicorakinet eropit.
Anyoun koica luka atwanare.

Konye ebaŋ isiarakini abaŋaanut.
Ibirokin ekijukitono lokaronon aronis:

Konye itubusikinio loibwaikinit etau toma aitoronio.
Ejijimikini etau aiŋobel naetodolikin:
Konye anyoun karonis erai naketal kama ejaas ibaŋiok.
Koupenenas kalukacoa, icouni ijo da:

Konye etacakinio ikadolitok ajokis.
Iŋadakinio ikadolitok abar naka ikadiakanarak.
Konye ejai loemudiario kanuka aitub namam abeit.
Konye loemina okokuke ekukurikina aiteten ŋes.
Enyami ekadoliton kimonikin eketau:

Konye etiyatiyai nabaŋ kakaninike.
Konye ŋol lomagul korotinike emeni ŋes.

Konye epatana aijen kama ejai ŋol loejai ajenun.
Konyou kakonyen nuka lobaŋ,

Konye abaŋaanut naka ibaŋiok ŋes aiŋal.
Konye isirereŋitoi luitenara itauon.
Ejeni etau akadakinike;

Konye ekerianar ewema loka loitenara etau.
Konye osaŋeke kes irotin luka atwanare.

Etuŋanan da loejok imonikini nuke elopet.
Iyuunit ijimat ŋinikirot:

Konye iraŋaana lobaŋ, ido iilokin.

Irumito lujimat abaŋaanut:

Konye ekabaran ejaas ipapero luipu.
Konye elakara loitimi lukican.
Mam kereka ŋul luepwakunete aronis epaarete?
Konye ejaununos aitim ka abeit kaŋul kaluepwakunete ajokis.
Ejai ameda toma aitaaritoi kere:
Konye ailabilabanut eyauni aibabanitoi.
Abarakec ŋes aboko naka lukacoa,

Itajari ekajenan lokabeit aijar naka luce:

Konye ŋol loitimi loilwaritoi Itubusakini ŋes.
Konye ekadoliton emuno aketwanare.
Ejai acoa otau loka ŋol kaloejai aijen:
Konye ejenunio nuejaas otauon luka ibaŋiok.
Itopoloori adolit ateker:
Konye aronis emorere ateker kere.
Konye enyunyurikini ŋol loiswamai nukileic.
Aboŋokinet naiyapaara irebori anyunyura:
Konye akiro nuededeŋ isidikete anyunyura.
Aŋajep naka lokacoa ekori aijen naibecokino:
Konye ebukuni aituk naka ebaŋ nukabaŋaanut.
Irereete aronis ka ajokis.
Aŋajep naiperioro ŋes ekitoi loka aijar:

Emeni lobaŋ aicor naka papake:
Konye loibwaikini etau aitoronio edumuni acobeu.
Ejai abara naepol togo loka ekadoliton:
Konye luedumuni lokaronon eraas ican bon.
Isilosikinete aituke nuka luecobe aijen:
Konye mam ikote nen kotauon luka ibaŋiok.
Konye isiyalamikini ailip naka luitenara itauon.
Konye emina ŋesi loetupari adolit.
Ejai aisisianakinio naetiono neejai ŋol loinyeini erot:
Ŋol da loelai aitoronio etwani.
Aso ideleleete do noi itauon luka idwe luka ituŋa!
Mam ekamwaŋan emina aitoronio:
Mam da ekoto alosit neejaas lukacoa.
Etau loiyalama italakari akonyen:
Konye ican lukotau kes ebilete emoyo.
Etau loka ŋol kaloejai ajenun emoot aijen:
Konye aituke nuka ibaŋiok enyamete abaŋaanut.
Eroko apaarasia kere nuka luiticanio:
Konye ŋol loejai etau loelakara enyami epucit lomam edaun.
Itelekarit abar naepol naejaas ican.
Ejok ainyam edia lokigalala kominanara,

Etuŋanan lokanyunyura isidiki aŋolopa:
Konye ŋol loiyapi anyunyura isinapikini epeget.
Erot loka loekalanyana esubit bala abwas naka ikukwa:

Okoku lokacoa isiyalamikinit papake:
Konye lobaŋ emeni totoke.
Konye iteteni etuŋanan loejai aijen alositeke.
Neemamei ainerun etwakiarete nuelosikinitoi:
Konye icatunete kaipues naka ikenerunak.
Isiyalamikinit etuŋanan aboŋokinet naka aitukuke:
Ejok ca ma akirot nainerai kapakike naebeit!
Tetere enyouni kokwap kaneejai Okatwak.
Erutori EJAKAIT etogo loka loiwoŋoono,
Konye iticasi eikor loka apuserut.
Aomisio nuka ikaronok eraas nuketale kaneejai EJAKAIT:
Konye ejokuka akiro nuisiyalamikinito.
Konye ejari ŋol loesaci ainakineta.
Konye ebukuni aituk naka ekaronon nukelepa.
Konye iirari ailip naka ekadoliton.
Isiyalamikinit aica naka akonye etau:

Akit naepupuni aitoron naka aijar
Iboienenei kalukacoa,
ŋol loeŋeri aicorio emeni eketau:
Konye ŋol loepupuni aitoronio edumuni aijen.
Ayoŋit EJAKAIT ŋes aituutoorio nakacoa;
Ido aitasonikin iŋarenikini aibuses.
Konye ebuni aboŋokinet naka aŋajep kaneejai EJAKAIT.
Konye itemi EJAKAIT imoyon.
Kititiŋik EJAKAIT aswamisiokon,
Akoniwomisio da iticasio.
Eebo, lukaronok da esubakinit apaaran naka aronis.
Ŋolituŋanan loiturokina kotauke erai loketale kaneejai EJAKAIT:
Abeit, mam eswaki aiticanio.
Ido ayoŋit EJAKAIT isinaci ituŋa aronis.
Isinapikini lukasurupoke da.
Ejok ajaut kaluikidioko ka adolit,
Itia ajaut kameda naepol ka amamus etube lokabeit.
Konye EJAKAIT iteteni akejeke.
Adwaranut ejai aituk naka ekabaka:
Mam ediakari aŋajepeke kotoma otube.
Luitemete kere lukoriagi eraas aswamuke.
Aswam aronis erai naketal kaneejaas ikabakan,
Naarai adolit iticasi eicoloŋ loka ajakanut.
Isiyalamikinete ikabakan aituke nuedolito:
Eminasi kesi ŋol loinera nuitenara.
Esubit anyunyura naka ekabaka bala ikiyakia luka atwanare:
Konye lokacoa isinapikini ŋes.
Ejai aijar toma aica naka akonyen nuka ekabaka:
Esubit akesianut bala idouon luka akiru naka aiporo.
Adumun acoa ejok ca ma itia adumun esabu!
Eebo, ejok aseun ajeaun itia epuesa.
Loericit erotoke itajari aijarake.
Iŋarenikinit eitur amudiario,
Emoyo da loiwoŋoono iŋarenikinit aibiror.
Ejok ajaut kemoyo loitasono mama ejaas lukican,
Itia akorokoro luŋatuna kalukeitur.
ŋol da loemuno EJAKAIT ejaas kalakara.
Lukacoa kotauon enyaritai luecobe:
Ajijim da naka aituk iyatakini aimaima.
Ajenun ŋes atan naka aijar mama ejai ŋol loejaatar:
Konye abaŋaanut ŋes aiticanet naka ibaŋiok.
Iyatakini da aimaima aŋajepeke.
Akiro nuisiyalamikinete esubito bala akap nuka ao,
Ejijimikinito aijar, ido eraas aŋaleu naka akojo.
Konye osaŋeke kes irotin luka atwanare.
Aiŋobel naka ekeswaman iswamakini ŋes aswam;
Naarai isinyikokini akeituk.
Epwakuni etuŋanan lotai ameŋeranut;
Esubito akiroke bala akim naenomori.
Eyei etuŋanan lomagul epeget:
Ido etiaki ekedeideon ipapero.
Ijodijodi lokelepa ekeidurryet,
Kosodi ayaŋaar toma orot lomam ejok.
Ŋol loeedi akekonye ŋes aipwak akiro numagul,
ŋol da loebutarit itodolikini aronis.
Akou naabwaŋut akorwo ŋes aboko nakaibuses:
Edumunun korot loka adolit,
ŋol loiyapi aayunyurikin ejok aitelekarit ikagogoŋok:
Ŋol da loeyait ekemoyo itelekarit loeŋatari ere.
Ilamilamakinio eroet ogoen,
Konye EJAKAIT ŋes itebeikini.
Ejok aiban neejai aiyapaara,
Itia ainyam epucit kotogo loeleleba aŋolopa.
Ebulesit lokacoa eyai ikoku yeniswamai nukileic,
Ido irumi airumet koinacan.
Konye EJAKAIT itemi itauon.
Ibwaikini loiswamai aronis eketau neejaas aituke nueroko:

Ŋol da loisiyalamikinit ican mam eswaki aiticanio.
Idwe luka idwe kes aboko naka imakio;

Mam ibusakinit lobaŋ einer nuepolok:

Ekerianari neibelokinor kere.
Ŋol loerapakini aibucaret emoi amina:
Konye loicecemono etiaki ipapero.
Elomari noi aitoronio toma otuŋanan lokaijen,
Aitelekarit ibelai akwatat kaneejai lobaŋ.
Etuŋanan lokaronon emoi epali bon;
ŋes kijukarere ekiyakia loededeŋ mamakeŋ.
Ejok etuŋanan airiamakin kadubu naedemaritai ikedwe,
Itia airiamakin ebaŋ kabaŋaanutuke.
Mam enyouni aronis kokaleke.
Aso do kinyek epeget, eriŋa ejauna aŋolopa.
Eraas kesi kere luketal kaneejai EJAKAIT.
Kanukinyo ejaatar lobaŋ apesan akanike agwelia acoa,
Kwabo emamei ŋes aijen?
Emina epapero apaarasia kere,
Ido onace euritai kanuka apakio nuka ican.
Etuŋanan loemamei aijen ititiŋi akan,
Eraun ekabwoaran kakonyen nuka eidunyeteke.
Loemina ecelet emina aibucar:
Ŋol da loitoojari ekekike emoi amudiario.
Ŋol loemagul etau mam edumuni ajokis:
Ŋol da loemagul aŋajep ibirokin aronis.
Loeurie ebaŋ eanyuni ican:
Papa da loka ebaŋ mam iyalama.
Etau loelakara ŋes ekia loejok:
Konye emoyo loebilil itooni akojo.
Aibelokinio irotin luka etube.
Konye akonye nuka ebaŋ ejaas osaŋeta luka akwap.
Okoku lobaŋ itakadikini papake,
Ido erai adwaris mama ejai nakeurie ŋes.
Ido mam ejok aitican ekadoliton,
Karaida aile isotia kanuka aitenarakec.
Etuŋanan loejai emoyo loelilim emisiana.
Lobaŋ da arai ililiŋi enyaritai lokacoa:
Arai ebutarit eomitai loecobe.
Ŋol loetiakar bon emoi ekeimiel elopet,
Epega kacoa kere naeŋalei.
Mam ebaŋ isiyalamikinit aijen,
Konye ekoto apukonor nukotauke.
Arai kebu lokaronon, ebuni da amwaŋio,
Ido aitisilio da ebuni kamoromoroo.
Atan nakacoa erai aguurut naelelei.
Karaida aireŋe Iokadoliton kotube.
Aŋajep naka ebaŋ eyauni epeget,
Iriuni da akeituk aleio.
Aituk naka ebaŋ ŋes amudiarioke,
Aŋajepeke da ŋes eic loka aijarake.
Akiro nuka ekerupean esubito bala edia loejijim,
Elomarete toma atutubeta nukotoma nuka akoik.
Ŋol da loijalijala kotoma aswamuke,
ŋes onace kaŋol kaloemudiari.
Ekeri ekadoliton nen kosodi aiyar.
Abara naka ekabaran ŋes ekere loegogoŋ,
Kwape karwatat naeoja kotoma aomisioke.
Eriŋa emudiara, iturokina etau loka etuŋanan,
Aitasonikin da iŋarenikinit aibuses.
Loeboŋokini koriŋa epupuno,
ŋes abaŋaanut ka ileic kamakeŋ.
Emoyo loka etuŋanan etitiŋikini adekake;
Konye iŋai bo epedori atitiŋikin emoyo loebilil?
Akit da naka lokacoa emoi aijen.
Ido itodoli akonyen nuka lukapolok.
Loisiauni aosan esubit bala ŋes edolit;
Konye ebuni ekeidunyet, kosodi aiŋic.
Itanaŋi eroet ipegeta,
Edieki da ikagogoŋok.
Arai kenyunyrikin onac etiono ainyakun aitelekarit ere loegogoŋ:
Ipegeta luikote nen eputokinos katiketa nuka ere.
Akoik naka etuŋanan ilelebun araito nuka aitukuke;
Imonikini da keiyas naka aŋajepeke.
Ka ŋul da luipudasi ŋes enyamete araitoke.
Loedumuni aberu edumuni ajokis,
Edumuni da asianut naka EJAKAIT.
Konye isiejanakini lokabaran.
Konye ejai epapero loimorikikina noi aitelekarit onac.
Itia lokaituk namagul ido kobaŋaana.
ŋol da loiwonyi kakekeje ediaki.
Kosodi enyunyurikini eketau EJAKAIT.
Abara iyatakini ipapero luipu:
Konye lokican etiakas kepaperoke.
ŋol da loesabanakini mam ekui.
Ipu luimaimaete asianut naka ekapolon:
Ido ŋolituŋanan erai epapero loka ŋol kaloeinakini ainakineta.
Elaete lokican ikeinacan kere:
Itelekarito ca ma ikepapero alwakiar kama ejai!
Ibwapit kes kakiro, konye koekarito.
Loedumuni acoa emina aijarake:
Loerici aijen edumuni ajokis.
ŋol da loesabanakini emudiario.
Aso ikoni ibusakinit ai ebulesit ayait lukapolok?
Ido aibusesuke ŋes aisioni aibucaret.
Anyunyura naka ekabaka esubit bala agat naka eŋatuny;
Konye akesianut bala akopyo kanya.
Erai okoku lobaŋ ican kaneejai papake:
Aŋolopa da naka aberu ŋes aiit naduc.
Konye aberu naecobe ebuni kaneejai EJAKAIT.
Akalanyanut eyaŋauni ajo nuipu;
Aijar da naijalijalana eriebi eteŋei.
Konye lomam ibwaikinit eketau toma orotinike etwani.
Ido etacakini ŋesi bobo aswamuke naejok.
Koleco ikonikoku naarai ejai amun;
Kwabo sirikiŋobel amudiarioke.
Etuŋanan lokanyunyura naepol egeli:
Naarai arai kiyu ŋes ibusakinit airucakin ayuun.
Kopupununei ainerun, kiyuununei aisisianakinio,
Tetere iraun lokacoa kapaarasiakon nukawasia.
Konye ainerun naka EJAKAIT icasit.
Nuimiela etuŋanan ŋes asianutuke:
Lokican da itelekarit ekeŋalan.
Ŋol da loejaatar ŋin iboie imono;
Mam aronis ebunokini ŋes.
Idoni akan naka loeloŋwana atuba,
Komam bobo ekot ainyakun toma aitukuke.
Kinom loemwaŋana, isisiauni ijimat acobeu:
Kitoron loejai aijen, ejenuni da aijen.
Loeŋasi papake, kireŋea da totoke,
ŋes ikoku yenisurumi ileic, iriuni da amorosit.
Ipaari do anyoun kakiro nuka aijen.
Isekeli ekajenan lotai etube:
Ilikori aituk naka ekaronon numam adolit.
Itemokinitoi itubesia kanuka lukamwaŋak,

Loiriaŋitoi kanuka ŋun emamei acoa.

Konye ekoto ŋolibaŋ aŋolopa.
Eneri loeloŋwana akoru kapak naka ailob;

Konye epedori etuŋanan lokaijen aiwok.

Etuŋanan loedolit loelosenenei kabeiteke,

Ekabaka loiboie koicoloŋoke loka aitub
Epietari aronis kere kakonyeneke.
Arai loasegara kotoma aronisika”?
Imisanin luegelegela ka, aitemisio nuegelegela,
Eraas kere luketale kaneejai EJAKAIT.
Arai esegara aswamuke, arai ejok.
EJAKAIT ŋes esubit kere.
Kokwenyut akonikonyen, kosodi kimonikin inyamat.
Ebala ekagwelan ebe, “Erono, erono.”
Konye keeka, ŋes do ituror.
Ejai esabu ka amor nukareŋak nuipu noi:
Konye aituk naka aijen ŋes ibore yenika akais nuipu.
Kolema anapito naka ŋol kaloebwoari eloŋwau,
Korau ŋesi aititiŋet loebwoari nakerimon.
Ejijimikini etuŋanan atap naka aiŋal;
Konye kokau ilelebunos iŋaroi aitukuke.
Ŋin nailosikini itogogoŋitai kainerun:
Koji ejie kaiŋarenikinio nakacoa.
Loirimirimi kideideonokini epukori nukaiyeiyea:
Aso siriupasi kaŋol kaloeooŋanari akeituk.
Itudeŋio atalake kamuton naejesi cucucuc.
Mam isirereŋitoi kawasiake.
Kidareu EJAKAIT, ŋes da kitajari jo.
Aitemisio nuegelegela eraas nuketale kaneejai EJAKAIT;

Ikwaikini ai epedori etuŋanan ajenun erotoke?
Erai eic kaneejai etuŋanan aisunyit atemar atiar, “Erai lokalaunan,”

Epiesi ekabaka lokacoa ikaronok,
Ido eyauni agali nakicomis kujukec.
Emoyo loka etuŋanan ŋes atala naka Edeke,

Itajarete aitim ka abeit ekabaka:
Ido aitim ŋes iganuni ekeicoloŋ loka ajakanut.
Aibuses naka ikatumunak ŋes agogoŋukec:
Atemelel da naka imakio ŋes akoruo nuka akwesikec.
Apipil naka imacarin itesegari aronis:
Ibelai da italaunete atutubeta nukotoma.
Ejai etau loka ekabaka akan naka EJAKAIT kwape aleles naka akipi:
Ibelokini ŋes kwape ekotor.
Konye itemi EJAKAIT itauon.
Iyuunit EJAKAIT aitelekarit asuban.
Akonye nueomiara ka etau lokaiwoŋonut,

Aomisio nuka luekukuraka eyaŋaunete aipues:

Adumun abar kaŋajep nakeŋalan,

Akaje naka ikaronok epiyari kes;

Arai iticanio ekamwaŋan, itocouni ijimat,

Kwape elatarere lukaronok kooliosi.
Ŋes da kemony, konye mam epupunio.

Loimiela aiyalama eraenena lokican,

Luebilete ibotei da ebeete aibois naka luitenara.
Ejok aiboienen kakwap nakamodiŋ,
Itia aiboi kaberu naeŋolopana naedelana.
Konye ilikori lobaŋ.
Edumuni aijar ka adolit, ka aibuses da.
Edokari lokacoa ore loka luegogoŋ,

Ŋol loidari aitukuke ka aŋajepeke,
Idari akeijar kinyek adumun ican.
Ekamwaŋan ŋes ekiror loka etuŋanan loiwoŋoono, loeomiara,

Eari aiŋobel loeloŋwana:
Naarai eŋerito akekanin aswam.
Eraŋana ekaronon aitiwar akwap:

Asubanit naka ekaronon erai naketale:

Eoliori ekajenan lokeŋalan:

Etuŋanan lokaronon itogogoŋit akekonyen:

Emamei acoa karaida aijen,

Ekapakinitai ebalasit kapaaran naka ejie:

Tiejok aseun ekiror loejok itia abar naepol,

EJAKAIT ŋes ekasubanikec kere.
Konye itorete lujimat nen, iticanio.
Eropit lokaitasono ka ayoŋit EJAKAIT,

Kitanaik ikoku erot loibusakinit alosenenoo,

Edaun da ebela loka anyunyurake.

Loekot etau loesegara,

Ebala loeloŋwana ebe, “Ejai eŋatuny kiŋa:

Kwape etet loka esabu ka yenisirir yenika esabu loejok,
Ikoni nen loitoroni akit naerimari.
Kwape alilim naka akaka kapak naka aisak,
Ikoni nen ekiyakia lomunot kaneejaas luijukarete,
Naarai iteteuni itauon luka ikapolokitokoke.
Ikoni nen ŋol loilabilabi kanuka ainakinetake numam einakinit.
Toma atitiŋikin noi ŋes ijodijodio lokapolon,
Aŋajep da naenonok ebili akoit.
Arai idum esik loka ao, konyam lokidaunit;
Kinyek ainyam noi kosodi ailek.
Kociciŋ akonikeju kotogo loka eidunyetekon,
Kinyek ŋesi apianikin jo, kosodi aila.
Erai anyul, ka ekileŋ, ka ekojo loeiit.
Esubit bala ekelai loipirit arai akeju naeŋabuikino.
Ido kwape ebino loedwar toma osoda,
Ikoni nen loeyeikini ikososio loekadakinit etau.
Arai kejak akure koinak ŋes akipi komat:
Ido kiinakini EJAKAIT eropitikon.
Eyaŋauni ekwam loka agolitomei akiru:
Aŋajep da nakedeideon eyaŋauni kwaŋin akonyen nukanyunyura.
Ejok aiboi kagor nakokuju togo,
Itia aiboi kaberu naeŋolopana kotogo loelal.
Kwape akipi nukalilimok nuearete akure,
Ejaas kwaŋin akiro nuejok nuepote kakwap naelwana.
Ikoni nen etuŋanan loedolit loeremorete lukaronok.
Kwaŋin arai emoete ituŋa aibusesukec, mam erai aibuses.
Etuŋanan lomam eyait ekemoyo.
Esubit bala ere loetiyatiyauna loemamei arwatat.
Kwaŋin mam aibuses ibusakinit ebaŋ.
Kwaŋin mam ekenit lotaai ecamuni.
Edaset kanuka ebalasit, amuny kanuka asigiria,
Ka ebela da kanuka epura loka ebaŋ.
Kinyek ijo da aputoor ŋes.
Koboŋok ebaŋ kwape ejaar akebaŋaanut,
Kinyek araun lokacoa kotoma aomoomoke.
Ŋol loiyakiari akirot kakan naka ebaŋ,
Ejepi akekeje, emasi akaje.
Kwape akeje nuka loicodo, nuilejekekas;
Ikoni nen awaragan kaituke nuka ibaŋiok.
Kwape loeenikini alicait toma aporocet,
Ikoni nen ŋol loeinakini ebaŋ aibuses.
Kwape ekukwai loicumi akan naka ekameran,
Ikoni nen awaragan kaituke nuka ibaŋiok.
Kwape imusunia ekaguman ŋinituŋanan kere,
Ikoni nen loisiwotei ebaŋ ka loisiwotei luitorete kere.
Ikoni nen ebaŋ loinyogonokini akebaŋaanut.
Iany kereka ijo etuŋanan loeomikina ebe erai lokacoa?
Ipedori amunokin ebaŋ aitelekarit ŋes.
Ebala loeloŋwana ebe, “Ejai eŋatuny kiŋa!
Ejai eŋatuny orot.”
Kwape ibelonokinor ekirigi kotoma aenetake,
Ibelonokini kwaŋin loeloŋwana kaperitike.
Idomakini loeloŋwana akanike atuba,
Isilolonyi ainyakun bobo aitukuke.
Eomikina loeloŋwana araut lokacoa,
Aitelekarit ituŋa ikanykaarei luepedorete aboŋokin kacobeu.
Loitorit kosodi aiilokin opeget lomere loke,
Esubit bala etuŋanan loitiŋi ekiŋok kaki.
Kwape lokikerep loecakari akalasia,
Imalia ka atwanare;
Kobala ebe, “Mere emocet bon?”
Eduŋei akim arai emameete akito:
Epalunio epeget arai emamei ekerupean.
Ikoni nen etuŋanan loeŋolopana isinepuni epeget.
Elomarete toma atutubeta nukotoma nuka akoik.
Esubito bala amoti naka elupe nailadatai kelele loka epuesa.
Loelait emodi kaitukuke,
Konye iŋadakinit aiŋal tomake.
Nainerar nukasianut sirikiyuu;
Naarai kotoma otauke ejaas nuketal akanykaarei.
Karaida erapari elaitike kapirianut,
Konye itodunio aronisike kakonyen nuka ekodet
ŋol da loikokoriori amoru, eboŋuni mamake.
Aituk da naemai iswamai amudiario.
Naarai mam ijeni nunyoika nueyaŋauni apaaran.
Kitur ecetuŋanan jo, mere akoniituk alopet;
Ice, mere aŋajepekon alopet.
Konye anyunyura naka ebaŋ itelekarit kere alaŋir.
Konye iŋai ca epedori aibwo kaneejai ekokote?
Itia amin naibwaitai.
Numunon amusuŋun nuka epapero:
Konye aŋueta nuka lukasurup ipu noi.
Etuŋanan loimonikini cut inyaikin akapet nakao:
Konye etuŋanan loeriebi eteŋei ejijimikinit ŋinibore kere yenedwar.
Ikoni nen etuŋanan loirimi anyoun kaiboisike.
Isiyalamikini akinyet ka lueuru maa etau:
Isiyalamikinit kwaŋin ajijim naka epapero
loka etuŋanan kainerun nakotauke.
Sirikijal epaperokon, ka epapero loka papakon;
Sirikilot togo loka onacekon kapak naka iloukon:
Ejok eidunyet loeapie itia onacekon loelwana.
Kasodi aboŋokini ŋol lokamori.
Konye itorete lujimat nen, iticanio.
Kolema anapito naka ŋol kaloebwoari eloŋwau;
Korau ŋesi aititiŋet loebwoari nakerimon.
Imario bala ekenit neejai.
Aiit naduc kapaaran naetepia akiru naepol,
Eputokinos kaberu naeŋolopana.
Loekoto aitikokin ŋes, itikokini ekwam,
Arai aibun akinyet kakekan nakoteten.
Asuat ipeni asuat;
Etuŋanan da ipeni kwaŋin akonyen nuka epaperoke.
ŋol da loijaanakini ejakaitike edakakinio aibuses.
Kwape esesenatar akonyen kakonyen kotoma akipi,
Kwape kwaŋin esesenatar etau loka etuŋanan ketuŋanan.
Akonye da nuka etuŋanan mam imonianakinos.
Amot ŋes ililiaunete epuesa, eupa da esabu,
Itemio etuŋanan da kotoma aiturioke.
Karaida kicur ebaŋ kokisu karukit nepepe kalos,
Mam akebaŋaanut enyouni kamakeŋ.
Kokukuranar ijo aijen isipaninikon luka amerekekin kwape ejaatar,
Koŋicenenei noi isipaninikon luka aituk.
Naarai abar mam erai nakapaarasia kere;
Ido ejaenena kereka aboko aitodol aturio kere?
Eŋerario anya, etakanuni do amel,
Etukokinio da ikui luka iroŋan.
Kitudumikinete idwe luka amerekekin lunapanakon,
Akinei da kes akais nuka imanikoria:
Ejaunos akile nuka akinei nukidaunete aitanyam jo, ka aitanyam da lukokalekon;
Ka nuitania apesurukon.
Ekerete lukaronok komamei etuŋanan loetupakini:
Konye ikadolitok etitiŋikinete kwape keŋatuny.
Kanuka aidiak naka akwap ipuakaros ikapolokoke:
Konye kanuka ituŋa luejai acobeu ka aijen iyatakini apolouke ajaenena.
Esubit bala akiru naekusi naegiriari inyamat kere.
Konye ŋul luericete ikisila itoŋolopete kes.
Konye ŋul luemoete EJAKAIT ejenunete akiro kere.
Ejok lokican loelosenenei kabeiteke
Itia ekabaran loemagul korotinike.
Ŋol loerici ikisila erai ikoku yenikacoa:
Konye ŋol loipaperikinos kituŋa luiraŋaka isurumi papake ileic.
Loiyatakini iboroke kanuka luimedauna ka luiyatakina
Etukonokini ŋesi ŋol loitimi lukican.
Ailipike da erai naketal.
Ibirokini ŋesi elopet toma aipanyike,
Konye luedoliorito irumete ajokis.
Eomikina loepalal akanin araut lokacoa;
Konye lokican loejai aijen emisiikini ŋes.
Naipikoriata ikadolitok, ejai aibuses naepol:
Konye naenyounioto lukaronok, eŋopete ituŋa.
Loibwai aibucaretake mam ekerianari:
Konye ŋol loelimori kosodi aisac edumuni aitimio,
ŋol loeyoŋit elakara apaarasia kere:
Konye ŋol loitinikiki eketau ibirokini aronis.
Ikoni nen ekapolon lokaronon loeyait ituŋa lukican.
Ido ekapolon loemamei aijen ejai noi kaimwaŋ;
Konye ŋol loelait airaŋanut ebusi apaarasia nuipu.
Etuŋanan loigugunatoi kaokot nuka etuŋanan ece kere,
Ekereari toma aipany; emamei ediotuŋanan loitikuni.
Eyuunio ŋol loelosenenei itenara:
Konye ibirori atipet lokirotin lumagul.
Loekoriei alupoke edumuni inyamat luipu:
Konye ŋol loetupari aamameak edumuni ailwaritoi naepol.
Ipuakaros arereŋesio kaneejai etuŋanan lomunot:
Konye loisunyakini aibar mam eswaki aiticanio.
Karaida etuŋanan aibucar kanuka idisinyamat.
Loibitiono isunyakini aibar,
Kwabo mam ejeni needolokinio ŋes ailwaritoi.
Loitoroni etuŋanan eminunio kokau,
Aitelekarit ŋol loemai kaŋajep.
Loeŋasi papake arai totoke, kobala ebe, “Mam ŋin erono”;
Ŋope ŋol ŋes epadic loka ekamudiaran.
Konye loemunokina EJAKAIT itutumio ŋes.
Loemunokina etauke bon ebaŋaana:
Konye loelosenenei kacoa eyuunio.
Loekori mama ejaas lukican mam etwaniari ibore:
Konye loitumudak akekonye edumuni ikenito luipu.
Naenyounioto ikaronok, eŋopete Ituŋa:
Konye naeolioroto, iyatakinos ikadolitok.
Etuŋanan loitinikiki ekemurisiŋ arai itoronio aatenak nuipu,
Itiuni abilio komam eŋaleuni.
Naiyatanakinotor ikadolitok iyalamasi ituŋa,
Konye arai eyait etuŋanan lokaronon idinyasi ituŋa.
ŋol loiboiete kanudotia icanicani ikeboro.
Iticasi ekabaka akwap kanuka etube:
Konye loitelemi ainakineta emunauni akwap.
Etuŋanan loemai ekeidunyet
Elokikin eboi akejeke.
Aibucar naka etuŋanan loerono ejai eic
Konye eyei ekadoliton elakara da.
Konye emamei lokaronon aijen ajenun ŋun.
Ituŋa lukamwaŋak ipurujaete ere:
Konye lukacoa isibelokinete anyunyura.
Arai epegasi lokacoa kebaŋ,
Enyunyurikini ekieniei, emamei da aiyeŋun.
Elaete ikaarak ŋol loedoliorit:
Emoete da aijar naka loitenara.
Ebukuni ebaŋ akenyunyura kere:
Konye etiki lokacoa isiyamikini.
Arai epupi ekayaiton nukaiŋalanut,
Eraunos ikekejaanakinak kere lueroko.
Itacauni EJAKAIT akecekonye kere.
Iticasio ekeicoloŋ loka ajakanut apaarasia kere.
Ebela ka aitoronio eyaŋaunete acoa:
Konye ikoku yenijalijalakinoi isurumi totoke ileic.
Konye esesenete ikadolitok aibirorikec.
Eebo, isiyalamikin aijarakon.
Konye isirereŋitoi loericit ikisila.
Mam ebulesit ituutoor kakiro bon:
Naarai karaida kejeni, mam ibwaikinit etau.
Iany kereka ijo etuŋanan loisunyit akekiro?
Epedorio amunokin ebaŋ aitelekarit ŋes.
Ŋol loitani ekebulesit kaisijemikinit ameuni keiditeuke,
Kokau edumuni araut okokuke.
Etuŋanan lokanyunyura isidiki aŋolopa,
Ipuakaros da aibucanareta nuka etuŋanan loisiopana.
Konye loejaas ketau loitasono edumuni aibuses.
Epupuni aiyapoikinio komamunos bobo nuinera.
Konye loemunokina EJAKAIT ejaas kainapakin.
Emoete luipu asianut naka ekayaiton:
Konye atubokinio naka etuŋanan ebuni kama ejai EJAKAIT.
Etuŋanan lomam edolit erai loketale neejaas lukadolitok:
ŋol da loitenara korot erai loketale neejaas lukaronok.
Akiro nuka Agur okoku loka Yake; abwokon.
Elimokini etuŋanan Itiel, Itiel ka Ukal ebe.
Ido amamei kaijen naka etuŋanan.
Mam esisiat acoa,
Amamei da aijen naka Lokalaunan.
Iŋai bo abu kotukonok ikwamin kakanike?
Iŋai bo abu koen akipi konapeneke?
Iŋai bo abu kiticat isaŋeta kere luka akwap?
Iŋai ekekiror, iŋai da ekiror loka okokuke, arai ijeni?
Erai ŋesi ebuku neejaas ŋul luemunokina ŋes.
Kinyek ŋesi aitoron jo, kosodi jo araun lokeŋalan.
Elipit jo akiro aarei:
Sirikiimik eoŋ eriŋa etwana:
Sirikiinak ican karaida abar;
Kitanyamai inyamat lukebusakinito:
Arai bo kenyek araut lokican, kasodi akoko,
Keiner erono ekiror loka Ekadeke.
Sirikisabanak ebulesit kaneejai ejakaitike,
Kinyek aiken jo, jo da igwauni akirot.
Ejaas ituŋa luikenete lukapapakec,
Lumam ilipanakinete nukatotokec arereŋ.
Kwabo mam iloŋara amodokokokec.
Ejaas ituŋa, eomiara ca ma akecekonyen!
Ibekereras da akecebukio!
Itirikadakec da bala ikileŋa,
Luenyamete lukican adaun kakwap,
Ka luilwaritos da kotuŋa.
Ejaas ediket apesur aarei,
Nuikeseunete ebe, “Ae, ae.”
Ejaas da iboro iuni lumam imonikinos apaarasia kere,
Eebo, iwoŋon lumam cut ebalas ebe, “Kinye kwaŋin.”
Ka akwap namam imonikin akipi,
Ka akim da namam cut ebala ebe, “Kinye kwaŋin.”
Naemeni arimar totoke;
Egorunete ikuruka luka aditot,
Enyamete da idwe luka atarukon.
Ejaas akiro auni nukaumokin nukekarunitos eoŋ,
Eebo, aoŋon numam ajeni:
Erot loka emorukaalet kotoma apak;
Erot loka emun kotoma atiiba;
Erot loka ataker kotoma aŋolol:
Erot da loka etuŋanan kapese.
Ikoni nen erot loka aberu naadote;
Enyami, kosodi aimwat akeituk,
Ebala ebe, “Mam aronis naeswamat.”
Emarani akwap kanuka akiro auni,
Eebo, aoŋon, numam epedori atitiŋikin.
Ebaŋ kimonikin inyamat;
Aberu naelaitai kedukokin;
Ka abulesit da nairumi aibois naka tataake.
Ejaas iboro iwoŋon luedisiak kakwap,
Konye ejaas kacoa naepol noi.
Konye idiasete ikecenyamat kiporo;
Konye edukete ikaisikec omor;
Emaase emamei ekabaka,
Konye inosit kirioŋeta.
Aililiaŋ, itiŋio kakanin,
Konye iboie kotogoi luka ikabakan.
Ejaas iboro iuni luesaara itorete,
Eebo, iwoŋon luesaara elosete:
Eŋatuny, loitelekarit itiaŋ kere kagogoŋ,
Kwabo mam ibelokini cut kama kakere.
Ekiŋok loeriim egur; ekoroi da;
Ka ekabaka lomam enyoonokinio.
Arai iwomoomot nueroko,
Kibwaanakin akan aitukukon.
Naarai aibuk akile ŋes elomunia akinyet,
Aicikakin ekume ŋes elomuniata aokot:
Aicikakin da anyunyura ŋes elomunia aŋolopa.
Akiro nuka ekabaka Lemuel: abwokon naesisianakini totoke.
Anyoika tope, okokuka?
Anyoika okoku loka akoikika?
Anyoika da, ijo okoku loka aiyaposioka?
Karaida ikonirotin neejaas ŋun nuemudianarete ikabakan.
mere nuka ikabakan aimat ebino;
Karaida ikapolok einer atiar, “Ai bo eja nuitemerete?”
Kosodete aibelokin etube loka etuŋanan kere loiticanio.
Ebino da lueriebasi kotauon:
Komata, kimurwokis icanikec,
Kinyeis akiitun bobo aburunikec.
Kooŋ akoniituk kanuka ebaŋ,
Kirabak ŋul kere luasilikis.
Kotubonokinenei lukican ka luilwaritos.
Aberu naejok, iŋai epedori adumun?
Naarai itelekarit noi etiaike amor nukareŋak nuka akais.
Emunokina etau loka okilenike ŋes,
Kwabo mam etwaniari ameda.
Iswamanakini ŋes nuejok, kwabo mere nueroko
Apaarasia kere nuka aijarake.
Emoi ŋesi ajulo ka abirai,
Iswamai kakukuranut kakaninike.
Eputosi kameerin nukagwelanar,
Eyaŋaununei ikenyamat kama elwana.
Einakini lukokaleke lunyaman,
Ekorakini apesuruke akeceswamisio.
Irerei emanikor, kosodi agwel:
Araito nuka akaninike ŋes iraia emanikor loka emusabibu.
Eeni ŋesi aŋabetake kagogoŋ,
Itogogoŋi akaninike.
Eanyuni ebe luegwelanari einunete ameda:
Mam eduŋei aketala kuare.
Ibwaikini akekanin akitoi napopiret,
Itiŋito akekanin akitoi nawojis eusi.
Igagaunit lukican kakekanin,
Eebo, eriori akekanin neejaas luilwaritos.
Mam ekurianar ŋesi aaterot kanuka lukokaleke,
Naarai enapito lukokaleke kere inapen lukareŋak.
Iswamanakini aimuketa;
Enapenenei ebaputa loejok ka lumugeik.
Iboienenei kanen kama ejaas lukapolok luka akwap.
Esonyununei inapen luka ebaputa kogwelanari,
Ijaikini da ikagwelanarak ausio nukaŋabes.
Ekieniei apaarasia nuepote.
Eooŋi akeituk kacoa;
Aisisianakin nakasianut ejaenena aŋajepeke.
Ido mam enyami inyamat lukaloŋwanut
Okilenike da, ituri ŋes atiar;
“Eswamata aŋor nuipu nuejok,
Konye ca ijo ŋes itelekarit kere.”
Konye aberu naeyoŋit EJAKAIT itureneneo.
Koinak ŋes araito nuka akaninike;
Iturenenete da aswamisioke ŋes korutei.
Akiro nuka Ekalimonokinan, okoku loka Daudi, ekabaka kotoma Yerusalem.
Anyoin ameda naedumuni etuŋanan kaitaaritoike kere naetaaritor kokwap kakoloŋ?
Konye iboienenei akwap ikar kere.
Iwonyari alosit aiboisike neelomunia.
Kosodi aibelokin agolitomei;
Ibelonokini ducuduc kalositoke,
Eboŋori bobo toma airimorike.
Konye mam aŋolol ilelebun;
Aibois naelosenenete icorin,
Nepenen da elosenenete bobo.
Mam epedori etuŋanan alimun:
Mam akoŋu imonikin asesen,
Akit da mam eupi akiirar.
Nukiswamao apeŋo kes nuiswamao rwaru;
Emamei ibore yenikitetet kokwap kakoloŋ.
Ejai tope ibore yenebalas ituŋa ebe,
“Koany, itet yen”?
Kejau kolo ŋo kokaru lukigeikinete oni.
Emamei aiitunet naka ikar lukolo ŋo:
Mam ejaun da aiitunet naka ikar luekotosi aponare, Kotoma kaŋul kaluetupanakinete.
Eoŋ Ekalimonokinan abu karai ekabaka loka Isirael kotoma Yerusalem.
Abu kebwaik ekatau amoot ka aŋicun kacoa kere nuiswamas kokwap kakuj; ŋes aitaaritoi naepol naabu Edeke kijaik odwe luka ituŋa aitaaritor.
Abu kaany aswamisio kere nuiswamas kokwap kakoloŋ; ido koany, kere eraas aamameak ka ainyam ekwam.
Yenemamei da mam epedorio aimar.
Abu kebwaik ekatau aijen acoa, aijen da ikerep, ka abaŋaanut: abu kajenu ebe eraas ŋun da ainyam ekwam.
Ŋol da loiyatakini aijen iyatakini ican.
Abu katema nuka akiena atiar, “Ikerep”: ka nuka alakara da atiar, “Ajokis anyoin?”

Abu kamoote kotauka kwape etalakaria akakuan kebino, koriŋa ekatau keteteni eoŋ kacoa, ka epone da loekamunia abaŋaanut, kasodi ajenun nuibusakinito odwe luka ituŋa aswam kokwap kakuj apaarasia kere nuka aijarakec.
Abu keswama aswamisio nuepolok; abu kaduk itogoi; keraa da imanikoria luka emusabibu;
abu keswama amanat ka ironyia, ido keraa ikito roma lukiponesio kere luka araito.
Abu keswama ataparin nuka akipi, aicocoenenaa amagoro nakipepes ikito:
abu kagwel ibulesin ka abulesin, kaurikis da ibulesin kotogoka; ido kajaas kabar naepol naka isipanin luka aituk ka luka imerekekin, aitelekarit ŋul kere lukageikinete ko Yerusalem:
ido abu katukok epuesa ka esabu ka abar naka ŋinikwap naka ikabakan ka naka lukibukui; kadum ikayook ka akayook, ka abusian nuipu noi nuisiyalamikinete odwe luka ituŋa.
Nuemielas akakonye kere mam abu kemik kes: mam abu ketikok ekatau aiyalama kere, naarai abu ekatau kiyalama kanuka akaitaaritoi kere; ŋin ŋes kerai akakorakinet kotoma aitaaritoika kere.
Kasodi asesen aswamisio kere nueswamaete akakanin, ka aitaaritoi naetaaritor eoŋ aswam: ido koany, kere araas aamameak ka ainyam ekwam, amamei da ameda kokwap kakoloŋ.
Kasodi aanyun ebe acoa itelekarit abaŋaanut kajokis, kwape itelekaritor aica amuton.
Ejaas lokacoa akonye roma akouke, konye elosenenei ebaŋ kotoma amuton: kwabo amisiikini ebe edolokini adiopekirot kes kere.
Kasodi atemar kotauka ebe, “Kwape edoikinio ebaŋ, ŋes kadoikinio eoŋ da; aso ca ajokis anyoin ajaut kacoa naepol?” Kasodi atemar kotauka ebe, “Ŋun da aamameak.”
Naarai emamei aiitunet naka lokacoa apaarasia kere, kwape ka ebaŋ da; naarai kapaarasia nuepote koiŋaren kodaunitos sek aimurwokinio. Etwani cama lokacoa kwape ebanl
Kwaŋin abukala aijar; naarai aswam naiswama kokwap kakoloŋ ketakadikinit: naarai kere eraas aamameak ka ainyam ekwam.
Iŋai ma ejeni arai eraun lokacoa arai ebaŋ? Konye irumi ŋesi aitaaritoika kere naetaaritor, naeswamat kacoa kokwap kakoloŋ. Ŋun da aamameak.
Kanuka ŋun kebelok aisiiurunun etauka kanuka aitaaritoi kere naetaaritor kokwap kakoloŋ.
Naarai ejaun etuŋanan loetaaritoi kacoa ka aijen ka apirianut da; konye inyekinia etuŋanan lomam etaaritoi araut akekorakinet. Ŋun da eraas aamameak ka aronis naepol.
Naarai anyoika nuedumuni etuŋanan kaitaaritoike kere, naetaaritor kokwap kakoloŋ?
Naarai akepaarasia kere eraas ican, aitaaritoike da ŋes akadakin: eebo, kuare da mam eketau iyeŋuni. Ŋun da aamameak.
Naarai iŋai bo epedori ainyam, iŋai da epedori aiyalama adepar eoŋ?

Naarai einakini Edeke etuŋanan loisiyalamikinit ŋes acoa, ka aijen, ka aiyalama da: konye einakini ekadiakanaran aitaaritoi, atukonokin ka aidiat, tetere einakini ŋol loisiyalamikinit Edeke. Ŋun da eraas aamameak ka ainyam ekwam.
Apak naka aira, apak da naka airut ŋul lukiraio;
Apak naka aiket, apak da naka aiduk:
Apak naka aibworo, apak da naka ekosio;
Apak naka acakanar amor, apak da naka atukonokin amor;
Apak naka aitun, apak da naka ainyein aitun;
Apak naka amoot, apak da naka aitoolior;
Apak naka aidar, apak da naka acakar;
Apak naka aililiŋ, apak da naka einer;
Apak naka aitiji, apak da naka ainapakin.
Abu ŋesi kosub ŋinibore aibecokino kapakike: ido kibwaik akwapisinei otauonokec, konye kopone lomam epedoriata ituŋa aiŋic aswam naeswamai Edeke anyoun kageunet aitodol awasia.
Ajeni ebe emamei ibore yenitelekarit ajokis kama ejaas ituŋa, alemar ailel ka aswam ajokis apaarasia kere nueiariata.
Ido ŋolituŋanan ainyam ka aimat ka adumun ajokis kaitaaritoike kere, ŋes ainakinet naka Edeke.
Ajeni eoŋ ebe ŋinibore kere yeniswamai Edeke ejaenena ikar kere: emamei ibore kere yenepedori aiyatakinio, karaida ainonoorio: ido eswama Edeke ŋun, tetere eyoŋete ituŋa ŋes.
Nuejaas kwana kejaas apeŋo; ŋun da nuekotosi ajakut apotu kojaas sek: emoot Edeke bobo nukolo ketuboros.
Abu katema kotauka ebe, Etubokini Edeke ikadolitok ka ikaronok; naarai itemokinit apak naka ŋinikirot ka ŋiniswam.
Abu katema kotauka ebe, Akiro nuka odwe luka ituŋa igimori Edeke kes tetere eanyunete ebe esubito bala Itiaŋ.

Naarai nuedoikinete odwe luka ituŋa edoikinete otiaŋ da; edoikini kes adiopekirot: kwape etwania ediopet etwani ece kwaŋin; eebo, kere ejaas keiyeŋane ediopet; mam ituŋanan itelekarit itiaŋ; naarai kere eraas aamameak.
Elosete kere aibois adiopet; elomunete kere kapua, eboŋorete bobo kere apua.
Iŋai bo ejeni emoyo loka ituŋanan arai elosi kuju, emoyo da loka itiaŋ arai elosi kwap toma alup?
Ŋes kaanyunia ebe emamei ibore yenitelekarit ajokis kilema ituŋanan alelakinit aswamuke; naarai ŋin ŋes akekorakinet: naarai iŋai epedori ainyakun ŋes aanyun nuetupanakinete ŋes?

Kasodi bobo kaany aimwaŋ kere naiswama kokwap kakoloŋ: ido koany, akiyo nuka ŋul kalukemwanitai, kwabo emameete luitalakarete kes; kojai da apedor neejaas luemwanito kes, konye komameete luitalakarete kes.
Ŋes keturio lukatwak luadaut atwakare aitelekarit luejarete lueroko ejarete.
Eebo, kaomoom aitelekarit kere ŋin yeneroko ejauna, yenimam ber eanyunit aswamisio nukaronok nuiswamas kokwap kakoloŋ.
Kasodi aanyun aitaaritoi kere ka ŋiniswam kere nakapirianut, kanuka ŋun ŋes ikokotikinio etuŋanan ekeidunyet. Ŋun da eraas aamameak ka ainyam ekwam.
Amukunet adiopet naka akan kaiyamakina itelekarit amukuneta aarei kaitaaritoi ka ainyam ekwam.
Kasodi bobo kaany aamameak kokwap kakoloŋ.

Kojai obonipe, komamei lokiareit; eebo, emamei ŋes ikoku karaida onace; konye aitaaritoike kere mam enaŋi, akekonye da mam imonikinos abar, Aso ebala ebe, “Etaarikini iŋai, emiki da ekatau ajokis kanuka ŋai?” Ŋun da aamameak, eebo, aitaaritoi naepol.
Itelekarito iarei ediopet; naarai ejaas keropit loejok kanuka aitaaritoikec.
Naarai arai kibiroros, itonyouni ediopet aupake; konye itukwi ŋin yenejai bon naibiroror, yenemamei aupake loitonyouni.
Bobo da, arai eperete iarei nepepe, ibusubusakinete: konye obonipe epedori biai aibusubusakin?
Arai da itelekari etuŋanan obonipe, ipikorete ŋes iarei; auno da naicipitai kauni mam eŋeda atipet.
Ekatumunan lokican lokacoa itelekarit ekabaka loemoionit kobaŋaana, lomam ecamuni bobo alimokinio.
Naarai toma aenis ŋes kelomunia araun ekabaka; eebo, keurio kerai lokican kajakanutuke.
Abu kaany lukajarak kere luilatos kokwap kakoloŋ, kojaas nepepe kekatumunan, lokiareit, loabwoi kaiboisike.
Emamei neesanakinete ituŋa kere, ŋul kere luirumit ŋesi: konye ŋul luetupanakinete mam isiyalamikinete ŋes. Abeit ŋun da eraas aamameak ka ainyam ekwam.
Sirikilebileb kaitukukon, karaida ekonitau aisunyit einer akirot kere kakonyen nuka Edeke; naarai ejai Edeke toma akuj, ijo da toma akwap; aso kikidiokoto akonikiro.
Naarai ebuni airujasit kaipues naka aswamisio; eporoto loka ebaŋ da ebuni kaipues naka akiro.
Ejok timam kiyapo itia aiyapo kosodi akurwokin aitodolikin.
Sirikijalak aitukukon aidupor akonikuan; sirikiner kakonyen nuka emalaika ebe kerai aibucaret: kanukinyo tienyunyurikinia Edeke ekoniporoto, amudiar da aswamisio nuka akaninikon?
Bobo da amio naka akwap erai naka kere: ekabaka da ijaanakinio komanikor.
Ŋol Ioikila epuesa mam imonikin epuesa; ŋol da loikila luipu mam imonikini eiyas: ŋun da eraas aamameak.
Arai kiyatakinos iboro, ŋul da luenyamete kes iyatakinos: ameda anyoin edumuni elopet dimarai asesen kes kakekonyen?
Ejijim ajo nuka lokeswaman, arai enyami luikidioko arai luipu; konye aimonut naka ekabaran mam isiikini ŋes ajo.
etwaniari abar ŋin kanuka arereŋ naerono; arai da keuri ikoku, komamei ibore kakanike.
Kwape kelomunia kakoik naka totoke, eboŋori emujalal kwape kelomunia, kwabo mam eyaŋaari ibore kanuka aitaaritoike yenepedori ayaŋaar kakanike.
Na da ŋes aronis naepol, kwape kelomunia elosi cut kwape kwaŋin: edumuni ameda anyoin etaaritor kanuka ekwam?
Enyamenenei kamuton apaarasiake kere, ido eburuni noi, edekanakin enyunyuranakini da.

Koany, nuabu kaany ebe ejok ibusak da kes nu, etuŋanan ainyam ka aimat, ka aisiyalamikin aitaaritoike kere, naetaaritor kokwap kakoloŋ, apaarasia kere nuka aijarake nakijaikin Edeke: naarai ŋin ŋes akekorakinet.
Ido ŋinituŋanan kere yenijaikinit Edeke abar ka iboro, ido ijaikinit apedor ainyam ka alemunun da akekorakinet, ka aisiyalamikin aitaaritoike; ŋin ŋes ainakinet naka Edeke.
Naarai mam iituni noi apaarasia nuka aijarake; naarai eboŋokini Edeke toma alakara naka etauke
Ejai aronis naabu kaanyu kokwap kakoloŋ, ido naelanirikinit ituŋa:

Etuŋanan loijaikinit Edeke abar, ka iboro, ka aibuses, tetere mam etwa niari kere nuimiela eketau, konye komam Edeke einakinit apedor ainyam kes, konye emoit enyami; ŋun eraas aamameak, ido ŋes adek naerono.
Arai keuri etuŋanan idwe akwatat, kobut da ikar luipu, kipuakaros apaarasia nuka ikekaru, konye komam eketau imonikin ajokis, ido komam enukio; abala eoŋ ebe, Ikoku yenikijecuna da itelekarit ŋes.
Naarai ebuni ŋin kaamameak, elosi da kamuton, erapario da ekekiror kamuton;
Bobo da mam eanyunit akoloŋ, kwabo mam ejeni; ibworari ŋin adepar ŋol.
Eebo, karaida kebut ŋesi ikar elukumit irwan aarei, komam isiyalamikinit ajokis: mam kereka eboŋokinete kere aibois adiopet?
Naarai itelekari biai lokacoa ebaŋ? Inyo bo da ejai lokican loejeni alosit kakonyen nuka lukajarak?
Asesen kakonye ŋes itelekarit airimirim naka aiŋobel: ŋun da eraas aamameak ka ainyam ekwam.
Naarai ejaas akiro nuipu nuiyatakinete aamameak, iŋarakinete etuŋanan biai?
Naarai iŋai ejeni luibusakinito etuŋanan kaijarake, apaarasia kere nukaijarake naatai nuebusio kwape etoribe? Naarai iŋai epedori alimokin etuŋanan nuejaunos atupanakin ŋes kokwap kakoloŋ?
Apaaran da nakatwanare itelekarit apaaran nakaurio.
Itia alosit togo loka epucit:
Naarai nen ŋes esaŋe loka ituŋa kere;
Ibwaikini lokajaran ŋun otauke.
Naarai akadakinit naka akonye ŋes ejokuunia etau.
Etau loka lukacoa ejai togo loka aibworo:
Konye etau loka ibaŋiok ejai togo loka ikososio.
Ejok akiirar aitoronio naka lokacoa
Itia akiirar ekosio loka ibaŋiok.
Kwape edeedeatar ikukwa kokwap kamot,
Ikoni nen akiena naka ibaŋiok:
Ŋun da aamameak.
Ainakinet da emunauni aijen.
Loejai emoyo Ioinirikinit itelekarit loejai emoyo loeomiara.
Naarai iboie anyunyura katorob naka ibaŋiok.
Sirikiner ebe, “Akirot anyoin itelekaritotor apaarasia nukolosek nuka kwana?”
Naarai mam iŋisi ŋun kacoa.
Ejok acoa nepepe kairumet:
Eebo, ejok aitelekarit neejaas ŋul lueanyunete akoloŋ.
Naarai igalikinit acoa kwape igalikinitor epuesa da:
Konye ajokis naka aijen ŋes na ebe idari acoa aijar naka ŋul kaluejaas kaŋes.
Naarai iŋai epedori aiteten ŋun nuasubunit ŋesi imagululos?
Kolakara kapaaran naka aikemer, koomoom da kapaaran naka ican: asubunit Edeke adiopet kwape kanace, tetere mam etuŋanan enicuni nuetupanakinete ŋes.
Sirikilitokin kadolitekon: karaida alitokin kacoa: kanukinyo tikimudiaror bon?
Sirikilitokin karonis, karaida araut ebaŋ: kanukinyo tikitwania eriŋa edoluno apakikon?
Ejok koric ŋun; eebo kakwa da mam ijalakini kakanikon: naarai loeyoŋit Edeke ebeluni kakes kere.
Erai acoa agogoŋ neejai lokacoa aitelekarit ikayaitok itomon luejaas toma ore.
Sirikibwaik etau akiro kere nuinerai; kinye akiirar ebulesitikon kikeni:
naarai irwan ipu ejeni ekonitau da ebe ikeni ijo da luce kwape kwaŋin.
Ŋun kere abu ketem kacoa; kener atiar, “Araun lokacoan; konye kalwanik.
Nuejaas da, elwaka, ido idulok noi; iŋai bo epedori aŋicun?
Abu kebelokin, ketininik ekatau ajenun, ka aŋicun, ka amoot acoa ka apolou naka akiro, ajenun da ebe aronis ŋes abaŋasnut, ka abaŋaanut da kes ikerep.
Abu kadum da akirot naitelekarit atwanare kadwaris, ŋes aberu naerai etauke iica ka iboyan, akekanin da bala irikoi: ekui ŋolloisiyalamikinit Edeke kamakeŋ; konye ikamuni ŋesi ekadiakanaran.
Koany, ebala Ekalimonokinan ebe, Abu kadum na, kwape etiiriania akirot kakirot adumunia apolou:
naerina emoot ekatau, konye mam adumunit: abu kadum ediopetuŋanan kotoma olukumit; konye mam abu kadum aberu kotoma kaŋul kere.
Koany, abu kadum na bon ebe, kosub Edeke ituŋa itenara; konye apotu kesi komoata lupwakununa luipu.”
Iŋai loesubit bala lokacoa?
Ido iŋai ejeni aitejenun akiro?
Acoa naka etuŋanan itacauni akekonyen,
Itegelikini da agogoŋ naka akekonyen.
