Ijaunos yesi kekosio kwape loka akuar naka epucit lokalaunan; ailele da nakotau, kwape naelosio ituŋanan kalamaru abunore oroŋat loka EJAKAIT, Atiiba naka Isirael.
Isiirari da EJAKAIT ekeporoto loka aibuses, itodikini aijesun naka akanike, aisiop naka anyunyuraken, airian naka akim naidopori, ajielelitoi naka akiru, ka ekwam, ka akako da.
Ebilibilio Eyasuriat kanuka eporoto loka EJAKAIT, loinomi kebela.
Ŋiniinometait da naka ebela loeseunitai, loinomi EJAKAIT ŋes, ejaun kisiman ka adeudeun: ejiikinos ŋesi ka kes kojiisio luka aiiaŋiian.
Naarai aponi Topet kitemokinitete sek; eebo, etemonokinitoi kanuka ekabaka; etemoki kidul kopol: oupake ejai akim ka akito nuipu; isinepi eiyeŋane loka EJAKAIT ŋes, kwape aleles naka acukuman.
Luemunosi agalin, naarai ipu kesi,
Ikebwanenok da, naarai egogoŋ kesi noi;
Konye mam esesenete Lokalaunan loka Isirael,
Karaida amoot EJAKAIT!
Konye eco ŋesi da, eyauni aronis, mam inyakuni akekiro:
Konye enyouni asurokin etogo loka ikeswamak aronis, Asurokin da luiŋarakinete luiswamaete numam adolit.
Eraas ibalasinikec da akiriŋ, konye mam eraas emoyo. Naikiaria EJAKAIT akekan,
Iguikini loinarakini, ibirori da loiŋarakinic,
Ikarakinete kes kere nepepe.
Naarai kabala kwanata EJAKAIT eoŋ ebe,
Kwape irurumaa eŋatuny arai iŋatuny kanuka lumejanake,
Arai enyaraunio ekodet loka ikecokok asurokin ŋes,
Mam ekurianar kanuka iporotoikec,
Karaida apodokin eceletekec:
Kwape kwaŋin ijesuni EJAKAIT loka ajoresio
Moru Sion ka eukotoke ejie.
Kwaŋin da ibuakinit EJAKAIT loka ajoresio Yerusalem, Ibuakinit, eyuuni, etubori, itukuei.
Naarai kapaaran kaŋin ecakarete kesi ŋinituŋanan aputosiake nuka epuesa, ka aputosiake nuka esabu, nukisubakinete akusikanin araun aronis.
Emudiari ŋes ekileŋ lomere loka etuŋanan;
Ekeri ŋesi ekileŋ,
Eraunos ikekatumunak ikeswamak nukailolitoi.
Eupake da koYerusalem ebe:
“Etubori atiibake kanuka amaran,
Eburunete ikapolokoke kanuka aanyunet.”
Eyaete lukapolok kerube.
Ido eraun etuŋanan aŋopis kama ejai ekwam,
Ka amecis akiru;
Kwape ka icorin kaibois naeonit,
Kwape ka etolim loka emoru loepol kakwap nakailolony.
Iirarete da aki nuka ŋul kaluepupete.
Etau da loka loemositoi ejenuni acoit,
Ka aŋajep naka Iuinejiŋejas itemonokino adesiar.
Ebaŋ mam bobo enyarao ekasianan,
Karaida otaupe anyarao ojokotau.
Naarai inera ebaŋ nukabanaanur,
Eketau da iswamai numam adolit,
Esubi nukainyanakin Edeke,
Elimit da nueriete mama ejai EJAKAIT,
Aisirieb eteŋei aijar naka yeniketeŋei,
Ka aikokoor da nutikemat yenejakit akur.
Ido eroko iponesio luka otaupe,
Ebili ibotei lueroko amudiar yenitasono kaiŋal,
Karaida inera yenilwaritoi abeit.
Konye iswamai ekasianan nukasianut;
Ido icasit kotoma asianut.
Yes apesur nuibwalara, kitoikis aki akakiro.
Yes aŋor nuibwalara, ianyunete ican apaarasia nuedeparito ekaru:
Naarai emameun aide emusabibu, emameun da aisak.
Komaranata, yes aŋor nuijalijalas;
Kopodokinos yes nuibwalara;
Kolacasi ikusinapen, komuialalata,
Konapata ipukoi kanabesikus.
Edipidipete atorobusio kanuka amanat nukajokak,
Kanuka emusabibu da loerait.
Eebo, kotogoi kere lukaiyalama kotoma ore loiyalama.
Naarai ebwosio rwaru kotogo lopeti:
Inyeinio ere loipu ituŋa;
Eukot ka aitelies eluoros abuai ikar kere,
Alakara naka itukoi, erony loka isipanin;
Koraun amodiŋ amana naapusuk,
Ka amana da naapusuk konyarai amagoro.
Ejaikin da adolit mana naapusuk.
Ido eyauni adolit aiyamakina ka aicasit ikar kere.
Iboikinos ikatuŋa aibois nakainapakina,
Kotogoi da luegogoŋ, kotoma aiyeŋuneta nuiyamakina.
Etiyakinio cut ere.
Luimearete akeje nuka emoŋ ka asigiria neebearete kere.
Loiswamai nukaimod, komam kes kiswamakinito jo nukaimod!
Arai kidau ijo amudiar, kimudiario;
Kidau aswam nukaimod, kiswamakinete kesi da jo nukaimod.
Wu EJAKAIT, kiswamakinai sio asianut;
Kipou kedareut jo:
Korai ijo akanikosi
Aitajariokosi da kapak naka ican.
Kanuka airuruma naka ecelet ekerete ituŋa;
Kanuka anyounikon isiarisiarunos atekerin.
Etukokinio lunatanakus kwape etukokinia ekurut:
Esomakinos kwape esomanaror emaase.
Isilelebit ŋesi Sion ketube ka adolit.
Aidiles naka aitajario ka acoa, ka aijen:
Ayoŋit EJAKAIT ŋes abarake.
Emonyete noi ikiyakia luka ainapakin akiyo.
Abil aitutuket, amen ireria,
Mam epodo ituŋanan.
Ibworo akwap akalanyanar:
Irumito Lebanon ileic erinyori:
Eputokinos Saron kamodiŋ;
Eraraaros Basan ka Karumel akuikec.
Kwape kwana adakun;
Kwape kwana etopoloor.
Ipotiete agugu, idounete ariaŋ:
Eiyeŋanekus ŋes akim nakidopori yes.
Ikonakinete ituŋa bala icweikinitai araun ecoka:
Bala ikukwa luejepitai, luicweio kakim.”
Kiirasi, yes luilwaka, nueswamat eoŋ;
Yes da luiapiete, kocamut akapedor.
Akuriakaros ikadiakanarak luka Sion;
Ekam amaran ŋul lumam eyoŋito Edeke.
Iŋai bo kaoni epedori aiboienen kakim naidopori?
Iŋai bo kaoni epedori aiboienen kaiewe namam edaun?
Ŋol loelosenenei kadolit, loinerenenei nuetenete;
Ŋol loemeni ameda naka aimwaŋ,
Loilakilaki akekanin kinyeis aitiŋ ainakineta nuitumudakete akonye,
Loisikakini akeki kinyeis aipup nuka aokot,
Loitumudaki akekonye kinyeis asesen aronis;
Iboienenei ŋol kokuju:
Ejaun akeibois nanopis atiiban nuegogoŋ noi:
Einakinio ikenyamat; mam akekipi eonikinete.
Iteete rwaru akonikonye ekabaka katemeleleke:
Eanyunete akwap nainyaminyamakina noi.
Ali bo loimarit, ali bo loininit esolo?
Ali bo da loimarit itogoi lueojak?
Ateker naka aŋajep naepagal amisiikin,
Naka aŋajep naineiineia namam ipedori ajenun.
Kosesen Sion, ere loka ipueinowok lueseunitai:
Eanyunete akonikonye Yerusalem aibois naiyamakina, ewema lomam elemario,
Iloinoke mam eutunio cut,
Karaida aunoike mam eŋedeŋedeunos.
Aibois naka icorin luelalak ka aguuruto;
Nemam ataker naejaas akinola itori,
Karaida ameeri nakeiie mam etubori kanen.
EJAKAIT ŋes Lokesilan ikisilawok;
EJAKAIT ŋes ekabakawok; kitajari ŋesi oni.
Ejarijarunos aunoikon;
Mam apedorete aitogogoŋ akeju naka epirikec,
Mam apedorete arior emedera:
Kosodi ckorokoroi luŋatuna luipu luijoreunitai;
Luiriadas kes eyaŋaarete luŋatuna.
Ituŋa luiboienenete kanen isionio numam adolitekec.
Kikunyutu, yes atekerin, kopupur;
Kiirasi, yes ituŋa!.
Kopuput alup ka ailelebakec;
Akwap, ka iboro kere da luelorŋunere kotoma.
Naarai enyunyurikinit EJAKAIT atekerin kere,
Isiopakinit ajorekec kere:
Amudia kes cut, ijaikinit kes aario.
Ecakario luaaranakec,
Enyouni abosus naka atesinakec,
Ecalaros iroŋan kaokotokec.
Eŋunukio akuj kwape emukule:
Eraraar ajorekec kere, kwape eraraaror akiot komusabibu,
Ido kwape eraraaror akiot kotini.
Koany, ijesuni mama ejai Edom,
Oruna luka ekenitika, aitub akiro.
Itutumio katarion,
Kaokot nuka imerekekin ludidik ka akinei,
Kasiepai nuka iŋalur luka imerekekin:
Naarai ejai EJAKAIT asubanit koBosura,
Earit loepol kakwap naka Edom.
Ijesunos ikosobwa kakes, imoŋin lutobai kimoŋin;
Emerikini akwapukec aokot, itutumio apuakec katarion.
Naarai ŋes apaaran naka enyaŋit loka EJAKAIT,
Ekaru loka aitepesen anolopakec kaSion.
Eluoros aguurutoke emina,
Apuake da acukuman,
Eluor akwapuke emina loenoki.
Epurienenei apuruke ikar kere:
Iswapi ameun katur kiton atur;
Emameun yenetubori kanen ikar ka ikar.
Konye irumete etolut ka ecoc;
Iboienenete etukuri ka ekuruk:
Eriori ŋesi ekokoro loka aitirira kamake,
Ebiriji da loka apalapalat.
Enyarakinete isotiake ajakanut, konye emameun idiopet; Eraunos lukapolokoke kere aamameak.
Ikodokodo ka isukukur kaiboisioke nuegogoŋ:
Eraun aibois naka ikuwei,
Alaro da naka ikuului.
Iriamakinos itiaŋ luka amodiŋ kibuin;
Emonyakini ekoroi aupake;
Eebo, edoi akimat nakakuare nen,
Edumakin aibois naka aibworar.
Itemokini aipom ekaike kaŋina, eunei,
Ebekuni, etukonokini kwap kotoribeke:
Eebo, etukonokinos atoorion kaŋina,
Ŋinidiopet kopadicake.
Mam idiopet kaŋul eoliori,
Emameun naeoliori opadicake:
Naarai aituk naka EJAKAIT ŋes icorakinit,
Ekemoyo da ŋes atukokinit kes.
Akekan da ŋes akorakinit kes kokokoro:
Irumete kesi ikar ka ikar,
Ameun katur kiton atur iboienenete kesi kotoma.
Eyalamikin ais ka aibois naelarionoŋ;
Eleli amodiŋ, ituroi kwape apecel.
Ituroi noi, eleli kaitac ka ayoore;
Einakinio aibuses naka Lebanon,
Ajokis naka Karumel ka Saron:
Eanyunete aibuses naka EJAKAIT,
Ajokis naka Edekewok naitelekarit.
Kitogogoŋoto da akuŋin nuilejekekas.
Kolimokis ŋul luejaas itauon luekuriaka ebe,
“Kogogocoros, sirikikuriakaros:
Koany, ebuni Ekusideke kenyaijit, kaitepcsen naka Edeke; Ebuni ŋesi, kitajar yes.”
Epukorio aki nuka imajiŋa.
Eyei aŋajep naka ebaŋ:
Naarai ibulubulete akip kais,
Aguuruto da kamodiŋ.
Eraun asine naemwekimweki abwal,
Alup da nuejakit akur akonye nuka icowai:
Kaibois naka ikuwei, neaperenenete,
Ejaunos anya kagadai ka abiloi.
Emaikinio Erot loka alaunit;
Lumam elaete mam itorete nen;
Konye eraun loka kwi ikalotok,
Eebo, ibaŋiok mam epaarete nen.
Karaida ediotian loemudiari mam itori nen,
Mam edumunos kaŋina;
Konye esakasakaete luelakunitai korot kaŋol.
Epote Sion eyeete:
Ejaun ailel namam edaun akwesikec:
Edumunete aiyalama ka ailel,
Ilicaros aiturur ka eidiny.
Kijuka ekabaka loka Asuria Rabasake anyoun koLakis alosit Yerusalem mama ejai ekabaka Kesekia ajaas kajore naepol. Kobwo kariri kaleles naka atapar nakokuju, korot loka emanikor loka ekelotan igoen.
Kosodi kolom Eliakim okoku loka Kilikia loapolokinit ekal mama ejai ŋesi, ka Sebuna ekewadikan, ka Yoa okoku loka Asap ekesiitonokinan.
Kotema Rabasake kes atiar, “Kolimokis do Kesekia ebe, ‘Inera ekabaka lokapolon, ekabaka loka Asuria, kwanata ebe, Amuno nanyoin naimuno?
Abala eoŋ ebe, ainerunikon ka agogoŋ ejie eraas akiro nuutai: iŋai bo do imunokina ijo, tape kipaliikin eoŋ?
Koany, imunokina ijo ebela loka egada lo loiriecakina, ŋes Misiri; arai kegoŋakini ituŋanan mamake, elomari akanike, icumi; ikoni nepenen Parao ekabaka loko Misiri mama ejaas ŋul kere luemunosi ŋes.
Konye arai kiitema eoŋ atiar, “Kimuno isio EJAKAIT Ekosideke”; mere ŋes ŋol loalemari Kesekia aiboisioke nuiceleleete ka itemwanake, kolimok Yuda ka Yerusalem ebe, “Imaenenete kotem kalo”?
Aso do, keŋaiŋait, koinakis ekajakait ekabaka loka Asuria iboro lukititiŋa, kainakin eoŋ jo da ibalasin ilukumin iarei, arai ipedori ijo kowaikon aibwaikin luibwanenete.
Aso ipedori biai aisibelokin akonyen nuka ekapolon ediopet kotoma ludidik kokejaanakinak luka ejakaitika, komuno Misiri kanuka agalin ka ikebwanenok.
Abu kereka eoŋ asurokin aibois na amudiar komamei EJAKAIT? EJAKAIT ŋes kabala ebe, “Kolot kosurok akwap na, komudia.” ’ ”
Kosodi Eliakim ka Sebuna ka Yoa atemar Rabasake atiar, “Kiŋaiŋait, kiner kikonikejaanakinak kaŋajep nako Suria; naarai kijeni; sirikiner kasio kaŋajep naka Iyudayan, kaki nuka ituŋa luejaas arwatat.”

Konye kotema Rabasake kes atiar, “Keyakuunit ekajakait mama ejai ejakaitikon, ka jo da einer akiro nu? Mam kereka keyakuunit otuŋa luiboiete karwatat, ainyam acinikec, ka aimat akulakec nepepe kayes?”
Kosodi Rabasake aibwo, kiworo keporoto loepol kaŋajep naka Iyudayan, kotema atiar, “Kopupokisi yesi akiro nuka ekabaka lokapolon ekabaka loka Asuria.
Inera ekabaka kwanata ebe, ‘Kinyek Kesekia aiŋal yes; naarai mam epedori aitajar yes.
Kinyek Kesekia ainakin yes amunokina EJAKAIT ebe, Abeit kitajari EJAKAIT oni, ere lo da mam ijaikinio akan naka ekabaka loka Asuria.’

Sirikipupokis Kesekia: naarai inera ekabaka loka Asuria kwanata ebe, ‘Kinerutu keoŋ nuka ainapakin, kopotu neajai; konyama yesi ŋinituŋanan emusabibuke, ŋinituŋanan nuka etinike, komata yesi ŋinituŋanan akipi nukoicoike;
aitodol neabunio kayaŋaa yes akwap naeputosi kanakus, akwap naka akima ka ebino, akwap naka atap ka imanikoria luka emusabibu.’
Kocoito kinye Kesekia aijodoor yes ebe, ‘Kitajari EJAKAIT oni.’ Ejai cani edio kodekesio luka atekerin loitajarit akekwap kakan naka ekabaka loka Asuria?
Alu bo idekesio luka Kamat ka Arupad? Alu bo idekesio luka Separabaim? Apotu tope kitajarata Samaria kakanika?
Lukaŋai kodekesio kere luka akwapin kaŋun luapotu kitajarata akwapukec kakanika, tetere itajari EJAKAIT Yerusalem kakanika?”
Kosodi Eliakim okoku loka Kilikia, loapolokinit ekal, ka Sebuna ekewadikan, ka Yoa okoku loka Asap ekesiitonokinan kopotu mama ejai Kesekia, ecilicilito inapenekec, kolimokis ŋes akiro nuka Rabasake.
Kijuka Eliakim, loapolokinit ekal, ka Sebuna ekewadikan, ka imakio luka isasedotin, konapitos ipukoi, mama ejai Isaia enabi okoku loka Amos.
Kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Inera Kesekia kwanata ebe, Apaaran na erai apaaran naka ican, naka aitoronio, ka naka amoromoroo; naarai adol idwe aurio, emamei da agogoŋ nakaidoun.

Motoko iirari EJAKAIT Ekonideke akiro nuka Rabasake, loejukuni ekabaka loka Asuria ejakaitike amoromor Edeke lokajaran, ka aitoron akiro nuapupu EJAKAIT Ekonideke: aso kitonyou ailipikon kanuka aatoŋot naedeun.”
Kopotu do ikejaanakinak luka ekabaka Kesekia neejai Isaia.
Kotema Isaia kes atiar, “Kolimokis ejakaitikus kwanata ebe, ‘Inera EJAKAIT kwanata ebe, Sirikiyoŋ akiro nuipup, nukamoromorooto eoŋ ikejaanakinak luka ekabaka loka Asuria.
Koany, ebwaikin emoyo tomake, epupuni ŋesi eemut, eboŋori bukec; ebirokini eoŋ da ŋes kekileŋ akwapuke.’ ”
Kopup inerai nuka Tiraka ekabaka loka Etiopia ebe, “Koany, alomu aitiji jo.” Kepupu ŋun, kiyakik ŋesi Kesekia ikiyakia ebe,
“Ilimokinete Kesekia ekabaka loka Yuda kwanata ebe, ‘Kinyek Edekekon loimuno aiŋal jo ebe, Mam Yerusalem ijaikinio akan naka ekabaka loka Asuria.
Koany, ipupunit ijo nueswamakis ikabakan luka Asuria akwapin kere, amudianarete kes cut: do konyet jo kiyuunio?
Apotu kereka idekesio luka atekerin koyuununete kes, nuamudianarete lukapapaaka, Gosan, ka Karan, ka Resep, ka idwe luka Eden luajaas Telasar?
Ai bo ejai ekabaka loka Kamat, ka ekabaka loka Arupad, ka ekabaka loka ere loka Separabaim, loka Kena, ka Iba da?’ ”
Kijau Kesekia ebalua kakan naka ikiyakia, kosiom; kolot Kesekia togo loka EJAKAIT, kopesia kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT.
Kilip Kesekia EJAKAIT, kobala ebe,
“Wu EJAKAIT loka ajoresio, Edeke loka Isirael, loiboie kokerubin, ijo ŋes Edeke, ijo bon, loka ajakanuto kere nuka akwap; ijo kolo isubi akuj ka akwap.
Kitoik akonikit, wu EJAKAIT, kiira; kokweny, wu EJAKAIT, koany; kopup akiro kere nuka Senakerib, nuejuku ŋesi amoromoroo Edeke lokajaran.
Abeit, wu EJAKAIT, apotu ikabakan luka Asuria komudiasi atekerin kere, ka akecekwap da.
Apotu kocakasi idekesiokec akim: naarai mam keraas idekesio, konye aswam naka akanin nuka ituŋa, ikito ka amor; ŋes kemudiarere kes.
Aso do, wu EJAKAIT Ekosideke, kitajarai sio kakanike, tetere ejenunete ajakanuto kere nuka akwap ebe, Ijo ŋes EJAKAIT, ijo ben ba.”
Kosodi Isaia okoku loka Amos aijukakin Kesekia ebe, “Inera kwanata EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael, ebe, Naarai ilip ijo eoŋ asurokin Senakerib ekabaka loka Asuria,
na ŋes akirot naener EJAKAIT mama ejai ŋesi ebe:
“Kimwaŋit akoku nabekot naka Sion jo,
Ekienar jo kisekelei:
Emuŋumuŋ akoku naka Yerusalem akouke neijai.
Iŋai bo imoromor ijo, kisekel?
Iŋai bo itopolooritor ijo ekoniporoto, ka aiteluor akonikonye kuju?
Isurok Lokalaunan loka Isirael.
Imoromor EJAKAIT kokiyakiakon,
Kinera atiar, ‘Kaipues naka agalinika
Adokari oswion luka iroŋan,
Atutubeta nukotoma nuka Lebanon;
Ajepi iresiake lueojak, ka iberosinike luejokuka;
Alomari da aiboisike naiwasie,
Amagoro naka emanikorike loideŋeriat.
Abok, amat akipi,
Etooni da kakakeju icorin kere luko Misiri.’
Mam ibu kopup kwape eswamaa kolo,
Kasub agear apeŋo?
Kwana da etodolit,
Korai ijo loimudiari ireria lukebwaitai
Araun aapoŋor nukamejei.
Kanuka ŋun lueboiete kotoma keraas luedit agogoŋ,
Koburut, kitirirata;
Kosubito bala inya luka ais, kwape ikui,
Kwape kinya luejaas kuju togo,
Kwape emanikor loka akima eriŋa epolooro.
Konye ajeni eoŋ akoniiboie,
Alomarikon ka alomunikon,
Aikerepoonutukon kaneajai.
Ido naarai adolu emokodekon akiika,
Ŋes ebwaikinia ekagolu okumesikon,
Arukanaka da aitukukon,
Kenyakari jo orot loilomunia.
“Na ŋes eraun aanyunet mamakon: okaru lo inyamete yenebwaŋuni bon, okaru lokiareit yenitocuni kaji; okaru lokiwuniet koyeata, kodwenya, kiraata imanikoria luka emusabibu, konyama araitoke.
Edupi aatoŋot naideuni naabu koku kokek loka Yuda alias kwap, kora araito kokuju.
Naarai elomari aatoŋot koYerusalem, luekuete da komoru Sion: itodolikini ŋun adunyanut naka EJAKAIT loka ajoresio.
“Aso inera kwanata EJAKAIT nuka ekabaka loka Asuria ebe, Mam edoluni ore lo, karaida agumakin emal, karaida adolokin kebuku, karaida aitutu etut asurokinia ŋes.
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Orot lokelomunia, ŋopeŋol eboŋoria, ido mam edoluni ore lo.
Naarai egaŋi eoŋ ere lo aitajar, kanukaŋ, ido kanuka ekakejaanakinan Daudi.”
Kosodi Senakerib ekabaka loka Asuria anyoun, kolot, koboŋo, kiboikin Ninebe.
Kosodi kanen, emai ŋesi kotogo loka Nisurok ekedeke, koarata Aduram-melek ka Saresar odweke ŋes kekileŋ: kokereasi akwap naka Ararat. Kirum Esar-kadon okokuke aiboisike.
Kosodi Kesekia aibelokin akekonyen arwatat, kilip EJAKAIT,
kotema atiar, “Kiitu, wu EJAKAIT, keŋaiŋait, kwape aloseneneo kakonyenekon kabeit, ka etau loeteni, keswama nuejok kakonyenekon.” Komony noi Kesekia akiyo.
Kosodi kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ejai Isaia ebe,
“Kolot, kolimok Kesekia ebe, ‘Inera kwanata EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Daudi papaakon ebe, Eira ailipikon, aany da akonikiyo: koany, eyatakini akonipaarasia ikar itomon ka lukany.
Ketajari jo ka ere kalo kakan naka ekabaka loka Asuria: egaŋi eoŋ ere lo.’
Koany, enyakari eoŋ etolim loejai ailameta, loisukunyarit akoloŋ ailameta nuka Akas aitoboŋor kau ailameta atomon.” Aso koboŋo akoloŋ ailameta atomon kailameta nealomaria ŋesi.
Aiwadik naka Kesekia ekabaka loka Yuda, kedau adekakin kosodi aŋaleun kadekake.
Alomari eoŋ orutei luka Okatwak:
Kemiki nuesalito nuka ikaruka.
Kakwap naka ikajarak:
Mam bobo aseseni ituŋa kotoma luiboiete kakwapin.
Anunuk akaijar kwape ekaojion;
Katubuni ŋesi eoŋ kousio:
Paaran ka kuare da kitanaŋi eoŋ cut.
Amonyi aiŋarakinio aitodol tupuruc;
Ebilibilei akakojo kere kwape eŋatuny:
Paaran ka kuare da kitanaŋi eoŋ cut.
Ebworo kwape ajele:
Eriokuut akakonye kanuka asesen kuju;
Wu EJAKAIT, ketieanitai, koraun ijo ekabwoaranika.
Ido eswama ŋun:
Alosenenei motimot ikaruka kere,
Kanuka ariebo nakotauka.
Wu EJAKAIT, ejarete ituŋa kanuka akiro kaŋun,
Aijar da naka ekamoyo ejai tomakec cut:
Wu okwe kitaŋaleunoi, kitajar eoŋ.
Koany, kanuka ainapakinika, ŋes kariebar noi:
Konye kaminakon ibu kitajar aijaraka kaipany naka amudiario:
Naarai icaka akaronisio kere kaukon.
Mam atwanare epedori aima jo:
Luijesaros aipany mam epedorete amunokin akonibeit.
Kwape eoŋ lolo:
Itejenikini papa idwe akonibeit.
Kanuka ŋun kiyei ikososioka koraman lukaputio
Apaarasia kere nuka aijarakos
Kotogo loka EJAKAIT.
Ido abu Kesekia kotema atiar, “Ani bo aanyunet naitejenuni ebe adokari togo loka EJAKAIT?”

Kiyalamikin Kesekia kanukec, kitodik kes etogo loka ikeboro luka akais nuipu, epuesa, ka esabu, ka lueuru maa, ka akinyet naka akais nuipu, ka etogo kere loka lujiisike, ido kere luadumuna koboroke luka akais nuipu: amamei ibore kotogoke karaida ayaetake kere, yenimam Kesekia etodikinit kes.
Kosodi Isaia enabi abunore mama ejai ekabaka Kesekia, kotema ŋes atiar, “Anyoika bo nuabalasi ituŋa lu? Apote kai aponare mamakon?” Kotema Kesekia atiar, “Apote mamakaŋ kakwap naelwana, Babulon.”
Kotema atiar, “Inyo bo aanyut kotogokon?” Koboŋok Kesekia ebe, “Aanyut iboro kere luejaas togoka: emamei ibore koboroka luka akais nuipu yenimam eoŋ etodikinit kes.”
Kosodi Isaia atemar Kesekia atiar, “Kopupok akirot naka EJAKAIT loka ajoresio.
Koany, eponito apaarasia, eyaŋaario kere luejaas togokon, ka ŋul luapotu lukapapaakon kiŋadata kiton lolo, Babulon: ebala EJAKAIT ebe, emameun ibore yenepianun.
Eyaŋaarete da lukodwekon lukiwuriei ijo elop: eraunos ibwacin kotogo lokapolon loka ekabaka loka Babulon.”
Kosodi Kesekia atemar atiar, “Ejok akirot naka EJAKAIT nainera ijo.” Ido korema atiar, “Naarai ejaunos ainapakin ka abeit kapaarasiaka.”
Ebala Ekusideke ebe,
Kitalakasi, kitalakasi ikatuŋa.
Kinerata nukaitalakar Yerusalem, kiworokis ŋes ebe,
Adaun ejieke, esionii numam adolit;
Ainakin kakan naka EJAKAIT irwan aarei kanuka aronisioke kere.
“Kitemokisi erot loka EJAKAIT kais,
Kitenasi erot loka Edekewok kamodiŋ.
Itutuo rwaru niniditot, ikeio ŋolimoru ka ŋoliukot;
Itenario amagulul, iiyaiyakinio nuimugogolito.
Erataikinete ituŋasinei kere aanyun:
Naarai ener aituk naka EJAKAIT.”
Kojau yene bala ebe, “Anyoika ekalalaa?”
Ituŋasinei kere eraas inya,
Akecejokis da eputos bala aturot naka ais:
Erinyorete inya, isokokoi da aturot;
Naarai ekutakini ŋes euria loka EJAKAIT:
Abeit eraas ituŋa inya.
Erinyorete inya, isokokoi da aturot;
Konye akirot naka Edekewok eperonori ikar kere.
Wu jo loilimonokini Sion akiro nukajokak,
Kodoka kuju oroŋat loicelelei:
Wu jo loilimonokini Yerusalem akiro nukajokak, kikalal noi; Kikalal sirikiyoŋ;
Kolimok ireria luka Yuda ebe,
“Koanyutu Edekekus!”
Akekan da irumakinit ŋes;
Koany, ejai aimalaeteke kaŋes,
Ekeropit da ejai kakonyeneke.
Etukonokin idwe luka amerekekin akanike,
Ka aidak katorobuke,
Isiyapi da ŋun nuitanakete.
Iŋai bo itemit akipi kotau kakanike,
Itemit akuj katutubet naka ekubit,
Egolorit apua naka akwap toma amot,
Iniŋit iroŋan kaitemisioit,
lukon da kaitiirianet?
Arai ituutorit ŋes kwape ekapetan akiroke?
Inerunit ŋesi kaŋai, iŋai da kituutorit ŋes,
Kisisianak ŋes erot loka etube,
Kisisianak ŋes aijen,
Kitodik ŋes erot loka ajenun?
Koany, esubito atekerin bala aidonakinet naka akipi kamot, Imaritai kwape apua naidupukuk naejai toma aitemis:
Koany edakit apujan kwape ibore yenedit noi.
Mam Lebanon ilosikino araun akito nukinoka,
Itianike da mam ilosikinos araun ainakinet naicweio.
Esubito atekerin kere bala mam eraas ibore kakonyeneke; Imaritai kes kamakeŋ araut atai, ido aamameak.
Arai aput anyoin itiirianiata ŋes?
Aput naegerer, ekeswaman ŋes itacalari,
Ekatatan esabu ŋes iladai kesabu,
Etataanakini ŋes irikoi luka epuesa.
Emouni ekeswaman loepiriana asipokin aput namam ijaŋijaŋa.
Mam kilimonokinitai kageunet?
Mam kimisiikis ageun kapeteta nuka akwap?
Kosubito luiboiete kotoma bala ibeerei;
Loepesi akuj kwape aigalisit,
Eterari ŋes kwape ewema lokibois.
Itarauni ikatubok luka akwap aamameak.
Eebc, mam ber kiraitai; eebo, mam ber eyeitai;
Eebo, mam ber aliasikec isiaranara kalup:
Kosodi akutakin kes, erinyorete,
Ekakaari etapipirio kes kwape ariaŋ.
Iŋai bo kesubi ŋun?
Loitolomuni ajorekec kimarite:
Emaanakini kes kere ikiroria;
Kanuka apolou naka apedorike,
Ido naarai egogoŋ ŋesi katitiŋ,
Mam adiopet eoliori.
Kanukinyo ibalar ijo, wu Yakob,
Inera, wu Isirael, ebe,
“Ibwaitai ekarot kinye EJAKAIT aanyun,
Atubor atubokinioka kama ejai Ekadeke”?
EJAKAIT ŋes Edeke lomam edaun,
Lokasuban isaŋeta luka akwap.
Mam iilori, karaida aipas;
Mam epedorio amisiikin ajenunike.
Einakini luiiloros ati tiŋ;
Iyatakini da agogoŋ ŋin yenemamei apedor.
Karaida iiloros isap, epasete,
Ibiroros ikatumunak kanuka ailolony:
Ekerete, komam epasete;
Elosete kakeje, komam iiloros,
Kililiŋata kakonyeneka, yes apujan;
Kiteteut ituŋa akecegogoŋ:
Kikunyutu kesi; kosodete einer:
Kekunyakisi nepepe otube.
Loenyarauni ŋes kadolit abunore akejeke?
Ijaikini atekerin kakonyeneke,
Einakini ŋes ayait ikabakan;
Ijaikini kes okilenike kwape apua,
Kwape ariaŋ naekutaritai mama ejai akabwake.
Erukitori kes, kotubor kainapakin;
Korot lomam lem itorito akejeke.
Lokenyarau aturio ameun kageunet?
Eoŋ EJAKAIT, losodit,
Ido nepepe ka lokawasia, eoŋ Ŋopeŋol.
Apotu apujana koanyut, kokuriakaros;
Komaranata isaŋeta luka akwap:
Kikunyutu, kopotu.
Kiŋaranakinos ŋinituŋanan kikeidunyet;
Kobala ŋinituŋanan onaceke ebe, “Kotitiŋior.”
Ekekeon isidiki ekatatan esabu,
Loipadipadi kenyodo isidiki loedai kamoru,
Ebala nuka airuc ebe, “Ejokuna”:
Kimorianak kaseito, tetere mam ilokulokun.
Yakob loaseunit,
Aur naka Aburaam opaperoka;
Ijo lokekamuni kosaŋeta luka akwap,
Lokanyarauni kagoriake,
Katema jo ebe, “Ijoŋ ekakejaanakinan,
Kaseunit jo, mama kacakari cut.”
Sirikibur, naarai arai eoŋ Ekonideke:
Ketogogoŋi jo; eebo, keŋarakini jo;
Eebo, kegani jo kakan nakoteten naka adoliteka.
Imoi ijo luinolopatar, mam idumuni kes:
Ŋul lukisurokinete jo eraunos mere ibore, kwape ibore yenitai.
Naarai eoŋ EJAKAIT Ekonideke egagauni akonikan nakoteten,
Kabala jo ebe, “Sirikikurianar; keŋarakini jo.”
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Keŋarakini jo,
Ido ekalakunanikon ŋes Lokalaunan loka Isirael.
Yeneitara yenejaas ikel:
Icomi ijo iroŋan, iriecirieci kes,
Itusubi iukon kwape agugu.
Isiarisiari kes etapipirio,
Ilelakini EJAKAIT, itopoloori Lokalaunan loka Isirael.
Emootos lukican ka luilwaritos akipi, ido emameete,
Eokete akeceŋajepa kanuka akure;
Eoŋ EJAKAIT aboŋokini kes,
Eoŋ Edeke loka Isirael mam ajalakini kes.
Ka akonye nuka icowa kokidiŋ kaditon:
Etarauni ais atapar naka akipi, Akwap naalarion ikico luka akipi.
Eraikini eres,* ka ekasia,* ka ekadas,* ka eseitun * loka ais toma ais;
Ebwaikini eberos, * etidar, * ka eteasur
Kojenutu nepepe ebe akan naka EJAKAIT ŋes eswamat ŋun, Lokalaunan loka Isirael ŋes asubi.
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, “Koyaut akusikirot.”
Ebala Ekabaka loka Yakob ebe, “Kitolomut nuitogogoŋito.”
Kitolomut kes, kolimokis sio nuelosete ajaun:
Kolimokis nusodit, kwape ejaatar, kaomoomata, kajenutu awasiakec;
Arai bo kitodikis sio akiro nuepote.
Kajenutu ebe iraas yesi idekesio:
Eebo, kiswamata nuejok, arai kiswamata nueroko,
Kobur, kanolianakinos.
Koany, iraas yesi atai, akusiswam da atai:
Loketale ŋol lokiseuni yes.
Etuŋanan loiwonei ekakiror loebuni kaneelomunia akoloŋ:
Ebunokini ŋesi ikayaitok kwape elupot,
Kwape ipudapudaa ekajean elupe.
Iŋai bo kilimokinit ameun kageunet, tetere kijenuni?
Ido ameun apeŋo, tetere kinera ebe, “Edolit ŋesi”?
Eebo, emamei yenelimokinit, eebo, emamei yenitodikinit,
Eebo, emamei yeniirarit akusikiro.
Eoŋ ageuni alimokin Sion ebe, “Koany, koany kes”:
Ido ainakini Yerusalem yeneyauni akiro nukajokak.
Emamei kotomakec ekapetan akiro loepedori aboŋokin akirot, Arai keŋit ŋes.
Koany, kes kere, eraas aswamisiokec atai, mere ibore;
Eraas akeceputosia nuecalara ekwam ka aamameak.
Eseunaka, loisiyalamikinit akaijar;
Epiik emoyoka tomake;
Itodiari rwaru etube neejaas imo.
Mam iworoi, karaida elulu,
Karaida aisiirar ekeporoto korot.
Mam ebili egada loiriecakina,
Karaida aitudeŋ eusi loepuriei;
Itodiari etube kotoma abeit.
Aitodol neibwaikinia etube toma akwap;
Idarete da apujana ikekisila.
Kotera akwap ka luelomunete kotomake;
Loeinakini ituŋa luejaas tomake eiyeŋane,
Ka emoyo da luelosenenete kanen ebe:
Ketiŋenenei jo akonikan, kedarenenei jo,
Kebwaik araun aitutuket naka ituŋa, aica da naka imo:
Alemun lueenitai kaipany,
Ka ŋul da luiboiete kamuton kotogo loka aenis.
Mam ainakini ice akaibuses,
Karaida akaiturio mama ejaas aputosia nuegerer.
Koany, adolut nuageete, alimonokin nukitetiak;
Kalimonokinete kes eroko etakanuna.”
Ka akeiturit da ageun kosaŋe loka akwap;
Yes luijesaros aŋolol, ka luejaas tomake kere,
Ka apujana, ka ŋul da luiboiete kotoma.
Kikalalata amodiŋ ka ireria lukapolok luejaas toma,
Ireria neiboio Kedar;
Koyeikis luiboiete kotoma Sela,
Kikalalaete kaidiasia nuka iroŋan.
Koinakis EJAKAIT aibuses,
Ido kolimonokis akeiturit kapujana.
Elomuni rwaru EJAKAIT kwape ekagogoŋon;
Isidiki adunyanut kwape ekajion;
Iworoi, eebo ikalalai;
Iswamakini lukasurupoke nukagogoŋ.
Abu keliliŋ ape; kapala, kanirik;
Natikwana amonyi bala aberu naeriebi aidoun;
Kenyikonokin keyenanakin da.
Etisili rwaru iroŋan ka iukon,
Etirinyoori da luebwanete kere kotomakec;
Etuluori icorin apujana, etooni da ataparin.
Ayauni imudukiok korot loeolito;
Etotori kes osokono lueolito;
Esieauni amuton kakonyenekec,
Etenari da aiboisio nuekudukudo.
Asubi ŋun, kwabo mam enyeini kes.
Inyakario, ileicikinete noi luemunosi aputosia nuegerer,
Luelimokinete aputosia nuecalara ebe,
“Iraas yesi ikosidekesio.”
Kiirasi, yes ikimiŋiok;
Kosesenete, yes imudukiok, tetere ianyunete.
Arai bo iŋai ekimiŋ, kwape ekakiyakia loejukari?
Iŋai bo emuduki kwape ŋol loagitunit,
Arai bo emuduki kwape ekejaanakinan loka EJAKAIT?
Epukoro akeki, konye mam epupi.
Itojokit EJAKAIT aitopoloor ekisil,
Kaitubusikin da, kanuka adoliteke.
Konye lu kes ituŋa lueruruoritai, lukenataritai;
Elokitai kes kere kapanya; itoŋopitai kaidarisia:
Eraas lumejan, emamei yeneyuuni;
Luŋatan, emamei yenetemari atiar, “Kinyak.”
Iŋai bo kayesi loitoikini akit ŋun?
Loepupuni loeirari da nuka apak naebunit?
Iŋai bo ejaikinit Yakob aŋatario,
Isirael da ikeruruok? Mere EJAKAIT?
Lokipou kadiakasi kamakeŋ,
Koŋeroto kesi alosit korotinike,
Mam kerimarito ikisilake.
Ka agogoŋ da naka ejie;
Kisinepik ŋes akim airimor, komam ŋes ejeni;
Konomo ŋes, konye mam kibwaikinit etau.
Ŋol Iokilunuluni jo, wu Isirael, ebe:
“Sirikikurianar, naarai kalaku jo;
Kanyarit jo kokirorikon, irai Lokaŋ.
Toma ocorin, mam kiraparete:
Arai itori toma akim, mam kinomori;
Mam eiriani akim kama ijai.
Lokalaunan loka Isirael, eketajaranikon;
Ainak Misiri araun lugelisikon,
Etiopia da ka Seba kanukon.
Lokayonio, kamina jo;
Ŋes ainakinia ituŋa kanukon,
Atekerin kanuka aijarakon.
Ayauni eoŋ aurikon kokide, Kenotuni jo koto:
Alimokini agolitomei ebe; Koosik;
Eŋalakimak da ebe, Sirikitikok:
Koyau ikadwe lusap kama elwana,
Ka lupesur da kosaneloka akwap.
Yenabu kasub kanuka aibusesuka;
Keluŋuluŋ ŋes; eebo, kasub eoŋ ŋes.”
Ka ikimiŋiok luejaas aki!
Kinotunos atekerin kere, kotukonokinos ituŋa;
Iŋai bo idio kakesi epedori alimokin ŋun,
Aitodikin oni akiro nusodit?
Koyaut kesi ikajenakakec, kitojokai;
Kopuputu kesi, kobalas ebe, Abeit ŋin.
lokaseunit:
Tetere kijenete kiyuunete eoŋ,
Ŋeŋunete ebe eoŋ Ŋopeŋol;
Emamei Edeke lokesubitai ageikin eoŋ,
Mam ejaun da lokatupakini.
Eoŋ, eoŋ obe, arai EJAKAIT;
Emamei eketajaran dimarai eoŋ.
Amamei edeke lomoit kamakus.”
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, “Kanuka ŋun iraas yesi ikakajenak,
Eoŋ da arai Edeke.
Kwabo emamei yenepedori ayuun kakanika:
Eswamai eoŋ, iŋai bo itikokini?”
Ebala kwanata EJAKAIT, ekusikalakunan,
Lokalaunan loka Isirael ebe,
“Kanukus ŋes keiukaria Babulon,
Esijesari kes kere kwape luekerete,
Kes Ikaludean, toma ameerin nuka aiyalamakec.
Lokasuban loka Isirael, ekabakakus.”
Loesubi erot toma aŋolol,
Esokot da toma akipi nukagogoŋ;
Eperete nepepe, mam enyounete;
Erikaros, itudeŋio kwape eusi, ebe:
“Sirikiitut akiro nusodit,
Karaida aomoom akiro nukasonya.
Elibuni kwape kwana; mam yes ijenunete?
Asubi eoŋ erot toma ais,
Icorin da toma amodiŋ.
Naarai ainakini akipi kotoma ais,
Icorin da kotoma amodiŋ,
Aitamasia ituŋaka, luseuŋunaka;
Ituŋa luasubuni eoŋ
Tetere elimonorete aiturioka.
Ketapasa jo, wu Isirael.
Mam kiiŋununei eoŋ ibaren ludidik luka ainakinetakus nuicweio;
Mam kirubusikinit eoŋ kasubanakon.
Mam kesilanirikinit jo ainanakin eoŋ ainakineta,
Karaida aitapas jo kaluisupuruuŋuno.
Karaida aisimonikin eoŋ kasiepai nuka asubanakon:
Konye ibu ijo kisilanirikinite eoŋ karonisiokon,
Kitapas eoŋ kanumam adolitekon.
Mam eituni akonironisio.
Kisiitunoi; kapurokinos:
Kopet akonikiro, tetere kitojokio.
Kopaasi ikejulakakon kamakaŋ.
Kejaik Yakob araun ekenit,
Ka Isirael da amoromoroo.”
Ka Isirael loaseunit.
Lokiluŋuluŋi jo ameun kakoik, lokiŋarakini ebe;
Sirikikurianar, wu Yakob ekakejaanakinan;
Ka jo da, Yesurun, loaseunit.
Aguuruto da akwap naeonit:
Abukokini ekamoyo akoniwur,
Arereŋuka da odwekon:
Elibunete kwape anya,
Kwape ikito kama eleleata akip.
Ece da emaikini bon ekiror loka Yakob;
Ece da iwadikakini akanike ebe, ‘Loka EJAKAIT’;
Emaikini bon ekiror loka Isirael.”
Ekalakunanike da, EJAKAIT loka ajoresio:
Ebe: Arai eoŋ losodit, arai lokawasia da;
Kwabo emamei ecedeke dimarai eoŋ.
Iŋai bo eputos keoŋ? Kolimo do,
Kitejen kitemonok kanukaŋ.
Iŋai bo elimorit apeŋo akiro nuepote?
Kitejenut ŋun nuejaunete rwaru.
Mam apeŋo kalimonokini jo ka aitodianakin?
Iraas yesi da ikakajenak.
Ejai Edeke ece dimarai eoŋ?
Eebo, emamei Atiiba; mam eoŋ ajeni adio da.”
Iŋai bo asubi edeke, arai keealari aput naetatao naemamei ameda?
Koany, irumete ileic ipaupake kere; ikasubak da eraas ituŋa: kotukonokinai kere nepepe, kobwaata; ekuriakaros, irumete kere ileic.
Itemi ekekeon ekokoro; igiri kekalamu; esonyi kesonyet, itemi kaitemisio, ituputoori kwape aput naka ituŋanan, kwape ejaar atemelel naka ituŋanan, aiboi kotogoke.
Ejepi iresia, eyaŋaari da etekwa ka elua, itogogoŋi kanukeŋ ediopet kokito luka amagoro: eraikini eberos, itani akiru.
Kosodi konyet araun akito nuka ituŋanan; elemuni ipieri; eebo, inoki, ipoio inyamat: eebo, esubunia edeke, emai ŋes; esubunia aput na gerer, ekukonokini kakonyeneke.
Icwei ŋesi atutubet kakim; atutubet ŋipeŋin ŋes enyamia akiriŋ; epei nupeon, imonikin: eebo, ipieri, kobala ebe, “Bu, amwanu eoŋ, aany akim.”
Nuesalito esubunia edeke, aputoke naegerer; ekukonokini ŋes emai da, ilipi ŋes, kobala ebe, “Koyuunai; naarai irai ijo ekadeke.”

Emamei da yeniituni, emamei da aijen karaida amisiikin atemar ebe, “Eeweik eoŋ arutuber kakim; eebo, epoo atap katotoleke; ape akiriŋ, kanyam da; asubunia teni nuesalito ibore yeniketal? Akukonokini kereka apunure naka ekitoi?”
Enyami ŋesi ekurwon: etapaa etau loenalatai tetere mam epedori ayuun eketau, karaida atemar atiar, “Mere ejai aiŋal akanika nakoteten?”
Kiitu akiro nu, wu Yakob;
Ka Isirael da, naarai irai ijo ekakejaanakinan;
Eoŋ kelunuluŋuni; irai ijo ekakejaanakinan;
Wu Isirael, mam eoŋ kemurwokini jo.
Koboŋu neajai; naarai kalaku jo.
Kikareoto yes atutubeta nukokwap nuka akwap;
Kogeut ayoore, yes iroŋan,
Ijo amagoro, ka ŋolikitoi kotomake;
Naarai alaku EJAKAIT Yakob,
Itopolooritai koIsirael.
Ŋol lokiluŋuluŋi jo ameun kakoik ebe:
“Arai eoŋ EJAKAIT, loasubi kere;
Loapesit bon akuj; loaterarit akwap;
Iŋai ca ejai keoŋ?
Esikerepikini ikaroak;
Loetobonori lukacoa kau,
Loesibanibani akeceijen:
Etodoli da ainerun naka ikiyakiaka;
Loenera nuka Yerusalem ebe, ‘Edumuni luiboikinos toma’;
Nuka ireria luka Yuda da ebe, ‘Edukio,
Eoŋ da etonyouni aiboisiokec nuiswapito’:
Eoŋ da etooni icorinikon’;
Itodoli ŋesi kere nuakoto eoŋ’;
Enera da nuka Yerusalem ebe, ‘Edukio’;
Nuka eyekalu da ebe, ‘Epesio akonipeteta.’ ”
Loetiŋit eoŋ akekan nakoteten, aitonokok atekerin kakonyeneke,
Alacar aŋabes nuka ikabakan;
Aŋaar ikekia kakonyeneke,
Ido mam irutei egolonokinio:
Ebe: “Keŋarenikini eoŋ jo,
Eiyakini aiboisio nuimugogolito:
Abilibilei ikirigin luka aisinit,
Atubutubei atiketa nuka asua.
Abar da naibwaitai naka aiboisio nukaiyeiyea,
Tetere ijenuni ebe Arai eoŋ EJAKAIT,
Edeke loka Isirael, lokanyarit jo kekirorikon.
Kanyarit jo kekirorikon:
Kamaikinit jo ekiror, karaida mam kijenunit eoŋ.
Emamei Edeke dimarai eoŋ:
Kaenikini arokoba, karaida mam kijenunit eoŋ.
Kiton to da, ebe emamei ece dimarai eoŋ:
Arai eoŋ EJAKAIT, emamei ece.
Ayauni ainapakin, asubuni aronis;
Arai eoŋ EJAKAIT, loeswamai ŋun kere.
Kobukut idouon adolit:
Koooŋata da alup, tetere itolomunete aitajario,
Isilibunete da adolit;
Eoŋ EJAKAIT asubunit ŋun.
Atibolok kotoma atiboloka nuka akwap!
Iŋisi tope elupe ŋol lokiluŋuluŋi ebe, ‘Iswamai inyo?’
Arai aswamukon ebe, ‘Emameete ŋes akanin?’
Itukwi ŋol loebala papake ebe, ‘Iwuriei inyo?’
Arai aberu ebe, ‘Irieba awuruun inyo?’ ”
Lokalaunan loka Isirael, ido Lokasubanike ebe,
“Kiŋitunai nuka akiro nuepote;
Kicorakinai cabo nuka idweka,
Ido nuka aswam naka akaninika.
Asubunit da etuŋanan kotomake:
Eoŋ, akakanin epesikinito akuj,
Ecorakinit eoŋ ajoreke kere.”
“Etonyounit ŋes kadolit, eteteni ikerotin kere:
Eduki ŋesi ekare,
Eosikini atai lukaŋ lukirenearitai,
Mere kanuka agwelar, karaida aropio.”
“Aitaaritoi nako Misiri, ka lugwelanara luka Etiopia,
Ka Isabean, ituŋa lukaojak,
Epote mama ijai, eraunos lukon;
Kitupakinete jo; epote kotoma orikoi:
Kikukonokinos, kilipete jo ebe,
‘Abeit ejai Edeke mamakon;
Emamei ece, emamei Edeke ece.’ ”
Wu Edeke loka Isirael, Eketajaran.
Irumete kes ileic, eebo, itiriraete, kes kere:
Edakaros akwesikec kere luesubete aputosia.
Mam yes irumenenete ileic,
Karaida aitirir ikar lumam edaunos.
Naarai ebala kwanata EJAKAIT loasubuni akui;
Ŋes Edeke;
Lokiluŋuluŋi akwap, kosub:
Kiticat, mam asubuni atai,
Kilunuluni tetere iboikinoi kotoma, ebe:
“Arai eoŋ EJAKAIT; emamei ece.
Kaibois naka akwap naka amuton;
Mam kabala aur naka Yakob ebe, ‘Komoai eoŋ atai’:
Eoŋ EJAKAIT enera nukadolit,
Alimokini akiro nuetenete.
Kikunyutu, yes luikuata luka atekerin:
Emamei kes aijen luedakete akitoi naka aputokec naegerer,
Ilipete edeke lomam epedori aitajar.
Kolimosi, kikeut;
Eebo, kinerutu nepepe.
Iŋai bo kitoduunit ŋin ageun kasonya?
Iŋai bo kelimokinit apeŋo?
Mere Eoŋ EJAKAIT?
Emamei ecedeke dimarai eoŋ;
Edeke loedolit, ido eketajaran;
Emamei ece dimarai eoŋ.
“Kosesenai, Kitajarunos, isaŋeta kere luka akwap:
Naarai arai eoŋ Edeke, emamei ece.
Alomu akirot kaitukuka kadolit,
Ido mam eboŋuni, ebe,
‘Kakukonokin ŋinikuŋ eoŋ,
Keyapoikini ŋiniŋajep.’
Ejauni yenikabala ebe,
Ejai adolit ka agogoŋ toma EJAKAIT bon:
Epote ituŋa mamakeŋ, irumete ileic
Ŋul kere luenyunyurikineteŋes.
Itojokio aur kere naka Isirael toma EJAKAIT,
Ituro da.”
Idokonokino aputosiakec otiaŋ, obaren da;
Iboro luidakitos yesi eraunos ibwokon,
Alaŋir kaneejaas itiaŋ luepasete.
Akukumo, akukonokinos nepepe;
Mam apedorete ayuun alaŋiru,
Konye ijoreorio kes ikulepek.
Aatoŋot kere naka ekek loka Isirael,
Lukadakit ageun kakoik,
Lukarionit ageun kauriokus:
Ido kiton abwaŋun akoruokus, eoŋ kadakit yes:
Asub, ido egaŋi;
Eebo, adaki, etajari da.
“Aso kituputoorete eoŋ kaŋai, kitiirianete,
Kitusubito eoŋ inyo, kaputokinos?
Luebukete esabu koriagi,
Luitemete epuesa kaitemis,
Eropete ekatatan-esabu, esubuni edeke;
Ekukonokinos, eebo, emaete da.
Esipokinete aiboisike, kobwoi kanen;
Mam enyouni kaiboisike;
Eebo, iwonei mutan ŋes, konye mam epedori aboŋokin,
Karaida ayuun kocanike.
“Kiitutu ŋun, koeerededata;
Kisiitonokinos, yes ikadiakanarak.
Naarai arai eoŋ Edeke, emamei ece:
Arai eoŋ Edeke, emamei yenikiputor eoŋ:
Ido akiro nueriŋa iswama ameun apeŋo:
Ebe, ‘Icasit akainerun,
Ido etodolikini nuetojokit kere.’
Etuŋanan loka ainerunika anyoun kakwap naelwana;
Eebo, ener, etodoli da;
Alosikinit, ido eswamai.
Luilwaka kadolit:
Mam akaitajar itumori:
Ebwaikini eoŋ aitajario Sion,
Kanuka Isirael aibusesuka.”
Kiboikin kwap komamei eicoloŋ loka ajakanut,
Ijo akoku naka Ikaludean:.
Naarai mam bobo kinyaritai naenonok naijamamai.
Kolaca egoekon lokimukos,
Kolaca da inapen, kisideleleo akeje,
Kotubor kocorin.
Eebo, etakanete ileicikon:
Enyaŋi eoŋ, komam etimi idictunanan.
Ekalakunaniwok, EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ŋes ekekiror, Lokalaunan loka Isirael.
Ijo akoku naka Ikaludean:
Naarai mam bobo kinyaritai Ajakait naka ajakanuto.
Ketisil akairumet,
Kejaik kes akanikon:
Mam ibu kitim kes:
Kisibwok imakio ajookotokus kalaniru naepol.
Kanuka ŋun mam ibwaikinit akiro ŋun otaukon,
Karaida akiitun awasiakec.
Naiboie kaijakak,
Nainera kotaukon ebe,
“Ajai eoŋ, ido emamei ece dimarai eoŋ;
Mam eboikini kwape apuserut,
Karaida aijen atwaniar idwe.”
Atwaniar idwe, ka eipuserune:
Kidoikinete jo kaitemisikec naedoliorit,
Karaida kipuakata aipiedetakon,
Kidilas da noi icudetakon.
Ibu kotema atiar, “Emamei yenikaanyuni”;
Akonicoa ka akoniijen, kes kitapaarete:
Kitema kotaukon atiar,
“Ajai eoŋ, emamei ece da dimarai eoŋ.”
Namam ipedori ailuc:
Kidoikin ameŋeranut, namam ipedori airebokin:
Kituriaikini jo asiles namam ijeni.
Aso do kobwo kicudetakon, kaipiedetakon nuipu noi, Nukitaaritor ageun keiditeukon;
Motoko ipedori akerianar,
Motoko ipedori aitukurian.
Kipas ijo kanuka aipues naka ainerunikon;
Kobwaata bo ŋul luketiakete akuj,
Ikerereok aacer, ikadwarak akiro nuka ŋolilap,
Kitajarata jo kakiro nukibunokinete.
Mam eyuunos kapedor naka alian:
Mam eraun atotol nukipiera,
Karaida akim nakiririkina mamake.
Irimete luapotu kogwelanas kajo ageun keiditeukon,
Ŋolituŋanan owaike;
Emameun yenikitajari jo.
Luenyaritai ekiror loka Isirael,
Lualomut kakipi nuka Yuda;
Luiyapoete kolimito ekiror loka EJAKAIT,
Luelimorete Edeke loka Isirael,
Konye mere kabeit, karaida kadolit.
Igoŋakina mama ejai Edeke loka Isirael;
EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ŋes ekekiror.
Eebo, kolomut kaitukuka, ketodia kes:
Keswama kes katipet, kodoloto.
Ekonimurisiŋ ŋes esilot lokasuat,
Ereetekon aisinit;
Ŋes kalimokinia jo ageun kasonya;
Ketodik jo eriŋa kedolo:
Kinyek ijo atemar atiar, ‘Akaput ŋes eswamat ŋun,
Ecorakis ŋun akaput naegerer ka akaput naicalara.’
Ibu kopup ŋun; koanyutu ŋun kere;
Mam yes kilimokinete?
Ketodik jo akiro nukitetiak ageun kapak kana,
Akiro nuibwaitai numam ijenunit.
Esubunitai kwape kwana, mere ageun kasonya;
Kiton lolo mam lem ipupunit kes;
Kinyek atemar atiar, ‘Koany, ajeni kes kolo.’
Eebo, ageun kasonya mam epukoro akonikit:
Naarai abu kajen ebe iswama noi kaimod,
Kinyaritai ekapaaran ageun kakoik.
Kanuka akaiturio etikokini kamakon,
Kenyek amudiar jo.
Kegimo jo koupa loka aiticanitoi.
Naarai ikwaikini ai ekakiror itisilio?
Mam ainakini ice akaibuses.
Eoŋ ŋopeŋol,
Arai eoŋ losodit, ido arai lokawasia.
Eterakinit akakan nakoteten akuj:
Arai kanyarau kes, ebwoete nepepe.
Kotukonokinos, yes kere, kopuputu;
Iŋai bo kakesi elimorit ŋun?
Emina EJAKAIT ŋes:
Iswamakini ŋesi Babulon nuitojokit,
Akekan da esurokini Ikaludean.
Eoŋ, eoŋ obe, ener; eebo, anyarau ŋes:
Kayau ŋes, ido ekerianar korotoke.
Ameun kageunet mam abu kener kaiyeiyea;
Ageun kapak naajaar, ajai eoŋ.”
Ido kwape kwana ejuku EJAKAIT eoŋ ka Emoyoke.
Ekalakunanikon, Lokalaunan loka Isirael ebe:
“Arai eoŋ EJAKAIT Ekonideke,
Lokisisianakini jo aimeda,
Lokiŋarenikini jo korot lotikilosio.
Ŋes konyet esubia ainapakinikon kwape ecor,
Akonidolit da kwape akailan nuka aŋolol.
Idwe luka akoikikon kwape kapuake:
Ekekiror mam ti egelario karaida amudiario kakonyeneka.”
Kitodiasi keporoto loka ayoore, kolimokis,
Kinerasi kiton osaŋe loka akwap:
Kobalas ebe, “Alaku EJAKAIT ekekejaanakinan Yakob.”
Kodi atiiba da, kilepunos akip.
“Emamei ainapakin kaneejaas ikaronok.”
Kiirasi da yes ituŋa luilwaka:
Abu EJAKAIT kanyarau kakoik;
Kolimo ekakiror kaliliget naka totoka.
Kebwa kotoribe loka akanike;
Ketarau ekojo loiputut,
Ocoeke da ŋes karicitor:
Isirael, ŋes ketubusikinere.”
Atwania akagogoŋ aloŋ, atwania taai:
Konye abeit ejai akatubokinio neejai EJAKAIT,
Ekaropit da ejaas ka Ekadeke.”
Natikwana inera EJAKAIT lokasubi eoŋ kotoma akoik
Araun ekekejaanakinan,
Ainyakakin ŋes bobo Yakob,
Ido kotukonokinai Isirael neejai:
(Naarai ebusu eoŋ kakonye nuka EJAKAIT,
Ekadeke da arau akagogoŋ.)
“Erai akirot naebenen noi jo araun ekakejaanakinan
Aitonyoun atekerin nuka Yakob,
Ka aitajar luapiaŋunos kotoma Isirael:
Kainakin jo da araun aica mama ejaas lukacekwapin, Koraenena akaitajar aitodol awasia naka akwap.”
Inera kwanata EJAKAIT,
Ekalakunan loka Isirael, ido Ekalaunanike,
Mama ejai ŋol loemenito ituŋa, ŋol loelait ateker,
Ekejaanakinan loka ikayaitok, ebe:
“Eanyunete ikabakan, enyounete;
Lukapolok da, emaete;
Kanuka EJAKAIT loerai emunot,
Ekalaunan loka Isirael, loabu koseu jo.”
“Kaboŋok jo kapak nakaeamunia,
Ido keŋarak kapaaran naka aitajario:
Ido kekuniai jo,
Kainak araun aitutuket mama ejaas ituŋa,
Aiticat akwap, aisurum airumeta nukamejei;
Ka ŋul luejaas kamuton ebe, ‘Kitoduunos.’
Enyamenenete korotin,
Komor kere luelapat nen eraun eronyikec.
Kwabo mam enomonori akoloŋ karaida aibuse:
Naarai ŋol loitimi inarenenokini kes,
Eyanaanari da atanin.
Ido etuluori ikaronan kere araun erot,
Iturio da ikarotin.
Koany, epote lu kama elwana;
Ido, koany, epote lu kagolitomei koto da;
Ido epote lu kakwap naka Sinim.
Koye, ijo akuj; kolakar, ijo akwap;
Kogeut ayoore, yes iroŋan:
Naarai etalaka EJAKAIT ikennja,
Ido itimi luke lukiticanio.”
Konye kobala Sion ebe, “Kajalak YAWE,
Kemurwoki EJAKAIT.”
Komam isionie okoku loka akoikike?”
Eebo, epedorete ŋun aimurwokin,
Konye mam eoŋ kemurwokini jo.
Ejaenenas arwatatinikon kakonyeneka tiritir.
Isunyito ikadukokokon adepar ikamudiarakakon,
Elomarete da ŋul lukitisilete kamakon.
Etukonokinos ŋul kere, epote mamakon.
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, “Kwape ajaria,
Abeit inapi kes kere kwape lukisiro,
Iyogogoi kwape ateran.
Ka akwapukon naemudiara,
Abeit kwape kwana ididinik luiboiete kotomakon,
Ŋul da lukilikorete elwakaros.
‘Kadidiniki eoŋ aibois:
Konyaikinai keboikin.’
‘Iŋai bo kaurikini ŋul,
Naarai atwania idweka, do acuduŋun bon,
Arai nakerenearitai, nairimi lailo ka laije?
Iŋai esai ŋul? Koany, asal bon; ai bo kejaas ŋul?’ ”
Ebala EJAKAIT Edeke kwanata ebe,
“Koany, ekeari akakan mama ejaas atekerin,
Asipokini aanyuneteka mama ejaas ituŋa:
Eyaunete odwekon katorobusiokec,
Erionakinete adwekon okepirinikec.
Akabakanakec da nukatotokon nukisaete:
Ekukonokinos jo kitulurito akecekonyen kwap,
Emeete adae nukakejekon;
Ŋeŋuni da ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT,
Ŋul da lukedareunete mam irumete ileic.”
Arai bo eyuunio lukikamuna luka ekadoliton?
Konye ebala EJAKAIT kwanata ebe,
“Edemario cabo lukikamuna luka ikagogoŋok,
Eyuunio da lumejan luka lusogim:
Naarai kinolopikin eoŋ kaŋol loinolopas kajo,
Etajari ikonidwe.
Eoŋ EJAKAIT arai eketajaranikon,
Ekalakunanikon, Ekagogoŋon loka Yakob.”
“Ali bo ebalua loka aireŋear totokus,
Lokerenearia ŋes?
Arai bo iŋai bo kaŋul lukeburaete loabu ketwegel yes?
Koany, kigwelaritai kanuka numam adolitekus,
Ireŋearitai totokus kanuka adiakanaretakus.
Nakanyaritor, kemamear yeneboŋokini?
Aurianar cabo akakan, tetere mam epedori alakun?
Emamei kereka eoŋ apedor ayuun?
Koany, arai ketoron, etooni aŋolol,
Etusubi icorin kwape amodiŋ:
Ebosuunete iborokec lukecor, naarai emameete akip,
Etwakete akure.
Etanapi eoŋ akuj amonut,
Emukori ŋes kepuko.”
Tetere ajeni aigaŋ kakiro ŋin yenepasit:
Itikwenyuni ŋinitupuruc,
Itikwenyuni akakit akiiranar kwape ŋul luisisianakinitai.
Ido mam eoŋ epali ono,
Karaida aboŋor kau.
Iitinyoka da mama kaŋul lukenyulanarete ajul:
Mam abu karap akakonyen koleic
Ka aimwanakinio da aimul.
Ŋes mam etiriraa;
Ŋes keticasia akakonyen bala eikep,
Ido ajeni ebe mam kerumete ileic.
Iŋai ca ketonolopi? Kabwaata bo nepepe.
Iŋai ca lokekoloka? Kikuny mama ajai.
Iŋai ca ŋin yenikesitelekari?
Koany, emoionete rwaru kesi kere kwape anapito;
Idonyorete ikajekel kes pit.
Yenerimarit eporoto loka ekebulesit?
Ŋin yenelosenenei kamuton, komam aica,
Komun do ŋesi ekiror loka EJAKAIT,
Kieatunitor Ekedeke.
Iyenanakinos bonik akalasia;
Kolosenenete kotoma aica naka akimikus,
Ido toma akalasia nuisinepata.
Idumunete na kakanika,
Iperete kotoma aiturur.
Yes luimootos EJAKAIT:
Kosesenata atiiba kama kikeunere,
Apedot da naka aipany kama kibokunere.
Naarai nakeraar ediopet bon kanyarau ŋes,
Kesireren, ketalal ŋes noi.
Etalaka aiboisioke kere nuiswapito,
Etuluo aisuke kwape Eden,
Amodinike kwape emanikor loka EJAKAIT;
Edumunos kanen ailel ka aiyalama,
Aimal, ka eporoto loka ayoore.
“Kopupunoi, yes ikatuŋa;
Kitoikinai akit, ijo atekereka:
Naarai elomuni ekisil kamakaŋ,
Etarauni eoŋ etubeka aica naka ituŋa.
Etubokinete akakanin ituŋa;
Kedareunete apujana eoŋ, emunos akakan.
Kosesenata da akwap kokwap:
Naarai ilicari akuj kwape apuru,
Emoioni akwap kwape egoe,
Luiboiete kotoma da etwakete kwape isiru:
Konye ejaenena akaitajar ikar kere,
Akadolit da mam itapalaunio.
Ituŋa luejaas ekakisil otauonokec;
Sirikikuriakaros amorosit naka ituŋa,
Karaida aburun kanuka amoromorokec.
Naarai enyami kes ekajekelut kwape enyamia egoe,
Enyami kes aeoroi kwape ajul:
Konye ejaenena akadolit ikar kere,
Akaitajar da aitodol aturio kere.”
Kokweny, kwape kapaarasia nukasonya, aturio nukolo karobai.
Mere jo naitubutubee Rakab, nakieumi apiu?
Nakituluori aidules naka aŋolol erot loetuborotor lulakuna?
Ido eboŋunete lugweluna luka EJAKAIT, epote Sion kayoore;
Ejaun ailel namam edaun akwesikec:
Edumunete ailel ka aiyalama,
Ilicaros aiturur ka eidiny.
Iŋai bo jo tetere ikuriana etuŋanan loetwani,
Okoku loka etuŋanan da loeluori kwape anya?
Loeterakinit akuj, kopet apeteta nuka akwap;
Ikuriana tiritir apaaran kere kanuka adedeŋ naka ekamwaŋan,
Naitemokinio ŋesi amudiar;
Ani bo adedeŋ naka ekamwaŋan?
Mam etwani kwabo mam elomari aipany,
Karaida ikenyamat aiŋoŋar.
Loiguri aŋolol tetere irurumaete akailan:
EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ŋes ekekiror.
Kebwait jo kotoribe loka akanika,
Tetere eraikini akuj,
Apesi apeteta nuka akwap,
Alimokini Sion ebe, ‘Iraas yesi ikatuŋa.’ ”
Loimasit kakan naka EJAKAIT adere naka anyunyurake;
Ibu komat asidak nakotoma adere naka aigetigeta, aikokoor.
Emamei loinarenikini ŋes kodwe kere luaurie:
Emamei da loirikit akekan kodwe kere luasai ŋesi.
Asilio ka amudiar, ebeli ka ekileŋ:
Ekwaikini eoŋ ai ketalakari jo?
Aup kes adedeŋ naka EJAKAIT,
Airetakin naka Ekonideke.
Aso do kiira nu, ijo naiticanitoi,
Naimera, konye mere kanuka ebino:
Ekonideke loepurokini akirot naka ikeruna ebe,
“Koany, alema eoŋ kakanikon adere naka aigetigeta,
Atany naka adedenuka;
Mam bobo imasenenei:
Lukilimokinete aijarakon ebe, ‘Kokukum, katuboros’;
Ituluo epurakon kwape akwap,
Ido kwape erot, kotubonorotor kesi.”
Konap inapenekon lukaseganut,
Ijo Yerusalem, ere lokalaunan:
Naarai amear lolo mam bobo elomununei tomakon
Yenimam ekepitai ka yenimam elai.
Kolacakin korikoi lukomurisiŋikon,
Ijo apese naka Sion nakinataritai.
Naarai inera kwanata EJAKAIT Edeke ebe, Ageun apotu ikatuŋa koloto Misiri aiboiororoi ŋina; koreu kes Eyasuriat atai.
Inera EJAKAIT ebe, Aso natikwana asubi nyo kane, naarai aponi koyanaara ikatuŋa atai? Inera EJAKAIT ebe, Eresianaros ŋul lueyaito, emoromoroo ru ekakiror duc apaaran kere.
Ŋes ejenuniata ikatuŋa ekakiror: ŋes ejenuniata kapaaran kaya ebe Eoŋ ŋopeŋol loenera: koany, Eoŋ lopelo.”
nukajokak,
Loelimori ainapakin, loeyaunit akiro nukajokak nuka ajokis, Loelimori aitajario;
Loebala Sion ebe, “Irumit Ekonideke!”
nepepe;
Naarai eanyunete rwaru akoŋu ka akoŋu,
Naeboŋunio EJAKAIT Sion.
Korwaunos ailel, koyooto nepepe,
Yes aiboisio nuiswapito nuka Yerusalem;
Naarai etalaka EJAKAIT iketuŋa,
Alaku Yerusalem.
Isaŋeta kere luka akwapisinei eanyunete aitajar nak:
Ewokodeke.
Sirikitirosi ibore kere yenimam elai;
Konyout kokidiŋike;
Kitalaunos, yes luidakito iboro luka EJAKAIT.
Kwabo mam ilosete ikerete;
Naarai kinarenikin yes EJAKAIT:
Ido kitupit yes Edeke loka Islrael.
Iturio, itopoloorio, ikiar noi.
(Emunauna akekonyen aitelekarit ituŋanan kere,
Ka akesubunet aitelekarit naka idwe luka ituŋa.)
Ebutarete ikabakan kanukeŋ:
Naarai eanyunete numam alimonokinitai kes:
Ejenunete da numam kiiranarito.
Ido iŋai epukokinitai akan naka EJAKAIT?
Kwape aliasit naelomuni kaneeoŋit:
Emamei asubunet karaida aliogotot, tetere kiseseni ŋes, Emamei atemelel nakisinobelei.
Etuŋanan lokican, loenaikinit aiturur:
Kwape loibwaiata ituŋa akecekonyen komenai kwaŋin, Komam kinyarit idiobore.
Kwabo kipou kaomitos bala isiriebitai,
Iticanitai Edeke, ereitai.
Aponi komaearai kanuka numam adolitewok:
Aiticanio kanuka ainapakiniwok kojai kaŋes;
Ikemaearin kes kitaŋaleunete oni.
Kibelokin ŋinituŋanan orotoke:
Ebwaiki EJAKAIT kamake numam adolitewok kere.
Ido kwape ililiŋia amerekek kakonyen nuka ikekatubok ajul:
Eebo, mam kooŋ akeituk.
Ido luka aketur, iŋai kakesi abu koomite ebe aponi kogelarai Anyoun kakwap naka lukajarak?
Aponi kisiriebai kanuka epali loka ikatuŋa.
Ido ka lukabarak katwanareke;
Karaida mam kipaliikinit,
Kwabo komamei aiŋalanut kaitukuke.
Naainakinia akeijar araun asubanit kanuka aronis,
Eanyuni akeur, iyatakini akepaarasia,
Ka ŋun nuemin EJAKAIT ekeriakaros kakanike.
Kanuka aijeneke einakini ekakejaanakinan loedolit luipu adol Ibwoki numam adolitekec.
Etiaki iŋatan nepepe ka lukagogoŋ:
Naarai abu koluŋak akeijar kiton atwanare,
Kimarakinai ka ikadiakanarak:
Kwabo abu kibwok aronis naka luipu,
Epurokini lukadiakanarak.
Kogeu ayoore, kikare, ijo namam irieba aidoun.
Naarai ebala EJAKAIT ebe,
Ipu idwe luka naesilikinit adepar idwe luka aberu ekiliokit.
Kitalala aibois naka ewemakon,
Koterarai aigalisio nuka aiboisiokon;
Sirikitikok: Kitoojaa aunoikon, kitogogoŋ da iloinokon.
Naarai ikaikini akan nakoteten ka nakokediany da;
Irumi akoniur atekerin,
Isiboikini ituŋa oreria luesilok.
Sirikikurianar; naarai mam ileic kirumito:
Karaida aitirir; naarai mam isurumio ileic:
Naarai kimurwokinete ileic luka eiditeukon,
Ido mam bobo iituni amorosit naka, eipuserunekon.
EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ŋes ekekiror:
Lokalaunan loka Isirael ŋes Ekalakunanikon:
Enyaritai Edeke loka akwapisinei kere.
Naarai ebala Ekonideke ebe,
Kinyarit EJAKAIT jo kwape aberu naejalakinitai, naekadakir komoyoke,
Aberu naka atumun, nairenearere.
Konye katukonokini jo kaitim naepol.
Kanyunyura naelapara abu kebwa akakonyen kamakon apak naedit;
Konye ketimi jo kasianut namam edaun.
Naarai kwape keyapoikinia ebe mam bobo enatarete aki nuka Noa akwap,
Eyapoi kwaŋin ebe mam kanyunyurikini jo,
Karaida airetakin.
Enyounete iroŋan, ijaŋiianas iukon;
Konye mam enyouni akasianut kamakon,
Karaida akaitutuket naka ainapakin mam ijaŋijaŋa.
Apetanakini apetetakon asapiro.
Asubakini adirisanakon amor nukareŋak,
Iruteikon amor nuimilias,
Eikorukon kere da amor nuisiyalamikinete.
Epol da ainapakin naka ikonidwe.
Kiticasitai kadolit:
Ilwana ijo kamwanio, naarai mam ikurianari;
Ilwana da kotasuro, naarai mam kikunyakini jo.
Koany, motoko isidikete aŋolopa,
Konye mere eoŋ loesidikit:
Ŋin yenesidiki aŋolopa aluikin jo,
Ibirori ŋesi kanukon.
Koany, kasub ekatatan loicuki akim naka atotol,
Elemuni ŋesi ibore yenikiswamas akeswam;
Kasub da ekamudiaran tetere emudiari.
Itelekari nininaiep nakinyoikini jo kotube.
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe,
Ŋin ŋes airumet naka ikejaanakinak luka EJAKAIT,
Ido adolitekec naebuni kamakaŋ.
Kopotu yesi neejaas akip,
Ŋin da yenemameete apesan:
Kopotu yesi, kogwela konyama;
Eebo, kopotu, kogwela ebino ka akile,
Komameete apesan, komamei da etiai.
Kanukinyo iinakiniata akusipesan agwelia ibore yenimam erai
inyamat?
Aitaaritoikus agwelia lumam kisimonikinete?
Kodunyakis akiirar eoŋ, konyamata luejokuka,
Kisiyalamikis atarion.
Kiirasi, ejari do akusiijar:
Etutuki eoŋ aitutuket namam edaun kayes,
Ŋes aitim nakabeit naka Daudi.
Ido ekeruni ateker namam lem kijeni jo mama ijai,
Kanuka EJAKAIT Ekonideke,
Ido kanuka Lokalaunan loka Isirael;
Naarai kitopoloo ŋesi jo.
Kiwoneete ŋes kapak naeapiar.
Koboŋu mama ejai EJAKAIT, itimi ŋes;
Mama ejai Edekewok, naarai isionie noi.
Naarai ebala EJAKAIT ebe,
Akaomisio mam eraas akusiwomisio,
Karaida ikusirotin mam eraas ikarotin.
Naarai kwape ieeleleo akuj adepar akwap,
Kwape kwaŋin iceleleoto ikarotin adepar ikusirotin,
Akaomisio da adepar aomisiokus.
Komam eboŋori ŋina, konye icocoi alup,
Isibwaŋuni isiburukunyi,
Einakini ekayean ikinyom, ekanyaman da inyamat;
Ejaun kwape kwaŋin akakirot naelomuni kaitukuka;
Mam eboŋuni mama ajai epalapalat,
Konye itodoli nuetojokit eoŋ,
Ido ekerianari kanueyakiaria.
Naarai ilomarete kailel, inarenikinio kainapakin;
Egeunete iroŋan ka iukon ayoore kakonyenekus,
Ibapete ikito kere luka ais akecekanin.
Elomuni eberos aibois naka ekukwai,
Elomuni eteasur aibois naka ekodokodoi:
Eraun ekiror mama ejai EJAKAIT,
Aanyunet namam edaun namam egelario.
“Kidarenenete etube, kiswamaenenete adolit:
Naarai eapie akaitajar abunore,
Akadolit da apukorio.
Okoku loka etuŋanan da loiketakini kes:
Yenericenenei asabato kinyek aitisil,
Yenitikokini akekan kinyek aiswamaenen adioronis kere.”
“Abeit kagitari EJAKAIT eoŋ kotuŋake”;
Kinyek ebwacit da atemar atiar,
“Koany, arai eoŋ ekitoi loeonit.”
Naarai ebala EJAKAIT kwanata ebe,
“Ibwacin luerieenenete asabatonoka,
Lueseunete akiro nuetojokit eoŋ,
Luiketakinete akaitutuket:
Aiitunet ka ekiror loitelekarit idwe lusap ka lupesur;
Ainakini kes ekiror lomam edaun,
Lomam egelario.
“Ido imo, luimorikikina neejai EJAKAIT,
Aijaanakin ŋes, lueminasi ekiror loka EJAKAIT,
Lueraunos ikejaanakinakake,
Ŋinidiopet yenericenenei asabato kinyek aitisil,
Yeniketakini akaitutuket;
Ainakini kes alakara kotogoka lokilipet;
Ecamakinitai ainakinetakec nuicweio, ka asubanakec kotemuka:
Naarai enyaritai ekatogo etogo lokilipet loka ituŋasinei kere.
Atukonokini ice da mamakeŋ, nepepe kaluken luatukonokinitai.”
Yes itiaŋ kere luka ais, kopotu ainyam,
Yes itiaŋ kere luka amagoro.
Eraas kere iŋokwo lubaŋiok, mam epedorete eirem;
Irujaete, eperete, eminas ajo.
Eebo, iranaaka iŋokwo, mam imonianakinos;
Ido lu kes ikecokok lumam epedorete ajenun:
Ebelokinos kere orotokec bonik,
Ŋolidiopet kakemeda, kes kere.
Ebalas ebe, “Kopotu yesi, kiwomi ajon,
Kedeneoto nuitemerete;
Moi da eputoori lolo, epol adepar aitemis.”
Eoliori ikadoliton, emamei yenibwaikini ŋun etau;
Elemario ikasiakak,
Emamei yeneomoomoi ebe elemaritai ikadoliton karonis.
Elomakini ainapakin;
Ibworarete koitadanakec,
Ŋinidiopet yenelosi itenara.
Aur naka lodote ka naadote.
Iboliatar iŋai? Iniŋitotor iŋai?
Imielanakinotor iŋai aŋajepa?
Mere yesi idwe luka adiakar, aur naka aiŋal.
Yes luitumulaunete aiŋobel kotoma oluan,
Kokwap kaŋolikitoi loepesit;
Luiarakinete idwe aditon,
Kaeilana nuka atiiban?
Ewaikus ejai neejaas amor nuerurut nuka aditon;
Kes, kes ba, nuebeikinit ekoniroet:
Ibu kobukok kes ainakinet namatan,
Ibu koinak ainakinet naka akiria.
Kesiyamikinete kereka ŋun eoŋ?
Ibu kolot ŋina da ainakin asuban.
Naarai ipukokinit mama ejai ece lomere eoŋ, idoka;
Ibu kitalala eitadakon, kitutuk kakes,
Komina eitadakec kama kianyunia.
Ibu kolot mama ejai ekabaka kakinyet,
Iyatakinit iponesio luegelegela lukakinyet lueurok maa,
Kijuka ikiyakiakon kama elwana,
Neidul kiton Okatwak.
Kitapas alwanis naka erotokon;
Konye mam ibu kotema atiar, “Emamei amun”;
Idum aikwarun naka agogoŋukon;
Ŋes mam iiloror.
Komam kiitunit eoŋ, karaida aibwaikinit otaukon?
Mam kelilinikinit apak naepol,
Ido mam jo ikurianar eoŋ?
Alimokini akonidolit;
Akoniswamisio da mam kimedaikinete.
Konye ekutari kes ekwam, elemari eiyeŋane kes kere:
Konye yenemuno eoŋ eyai akwap, irumi eronataka lokalaunan.
Ebalai ebe, “Kitutuoto, kitutuoto, Kitemokisi erot,
Kolemasi ikomion korot loka ikatuŋa.”
Ekekiror Lokalaunan ebe:
“Eboie eoŋ kaibois naicelelei nakalaunan,
Nepepe kaŋin yenejai emoyo loitoronikina loitasono, Aisikwarun emoyo loka luitasonos,
Ido aisikwarun emoyo loka luitoronikina.
Karaida anyunyuranakin apaarasia kere:
Naarai tikipirisiar emoyo kakonyeneka,
Ka itauon lukasubi eoŋ.
Kenom ŋes, kebwa akakonyen, kanyunyurik:
Kiyatakin ŋesi aibelokin ekaukau korot lokotauke.
Ido eŋarenikini ŋes,
Enyakakini ŋes ka ikebworokoke nuitalakaarete.
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe,
Ainapakin, ainapakin mama ejai ŋin yeneiwana,
Ka ŋin da yeneapie,
Etaŋaleuni eoŋ ŋes.
Konye esubito ikaronok kwape aŋolol naekulai; Naarai mam epedori apalar,
Edakunete akipike erit ka amodokok.”
“Kikalal noi, sirikipala, kikeu eporotokon kwape arupepe,
Kolimok ikatuŋa akecediakar,
Ka ekek loka Yakob akeceronisio.
Konye komoenenete eoŋ ŋinipaaran,
Iyalamas ajenun ikarotin:
Kwape ateker nakiswamaenenei nuedolito,
Komam ejalete aicorakinet naka Edekekec,
Kelipete eoŋ aicorakineta nukadolit,
Iyalamas aikunyakin Edeke.
Kanukinyo kitieanenenaa akosiijar, komam jo ibwaikinit etau?’
Koany, kapaaran naka ailunukus ŋes ianyuniata akusiiyalama,
Koyaito da ikusikeswamak kere kagogoŋ.
Koany, iluŋete kanuka eŋuŋet ka epeget,
Ka aidip da kakan naka aronis:
Mam iluŋete lolo kanuka aisiirar ikusiporotoi kuju.
Apaaran naiticania ituŋanan akeijar?
Ŋes tope aitulur akekou kwape amusala,
Ka aipet epuko ka ekurwon?
Ŋin tope ŋes kinyarit ailuŋ,
Ka apaaran da naitojokit EJAKAIT?
“Mere na ailuŋ naabu kaseu?
Aiiariiar aeneta nuka aronis,
Alacar arukan naka eloit, Aosikin luereitai,
Ibilata yesi ŋoliloit?
Ka aisukunyun togokon yenikican yenirenetai?
Kiany yenimujalal, kitanap;
Ido sirikiŋopik akonikuan alopet?
Ŋes konyet ecilar akoniica kwape ecilar kide,
Kisunya akoninaleun atakanun:
Kiŋarenikini akonidolit:
Kitupakini aibuses naka EJAKAIT.
Kosodi iwonei, ebonokin EJAKAIT:
Iworoi, ŋes da iii ebe, Eoŋ lo.
Arai kilema eloit kokidiŋikon,
Ka aidod kebokorit, einer da nueroko;
Kisimonik aijar naiticanitai;
Kosodi aicakon alomun kamuton,
Esubi awariwarakon bala paaran:
Kiŋarenikini jo EJAKAIT tiritir,
Isimoni aijarakon kaiboisio nueokito,
Itogogoŋi da akonikojo;
Iraun ijo bala imanikor yenicocoo,
Ido bala akoŋu naka atan, namam iŋoŋar.
Edukete bobo lukon aiboisio nukejalakinitai kolo;
Ikeuni apeteta nuka aturio nuipu;
Kinyaritai Eketetean neetiyanara,
Ekenyakanakinan irotin lukibois.
Komam iswamaenenei nuitojokit ijo kapaaranika nakalaunan;
Kinyara asabato aiyalama,
Nakalaunan naka EJAKAIT, naeyomtai;
Kitubusik ŋes komam Itupanari ikonirotin,
Karaida amoot nuitojokit ijo, karaida ailabilab:
Eoŋ da ketodokari aiboisio nuimukururas nuka akwap,
Ketanyami airumet naka Yakob papakon:
Naarai ener ŋun aituk naka EJAKAIT.”
Tape mam epedori aitajar;
Kwabo mam akekit ekiminana,
Tape mam epedori apupun:
Konye apotu numam adolitekus kogitasi yes ka Edekekus,
Kibwaata akusironisio akekonyen kamakus,
Tape eŋeri apupun.
Ikusibokoro da numam adolit;
Ineras aitukekus nukaiŋal,
Irurumaete anaiepakus nukaronok.
Emamei yenepuri kabeit:
Emunosi aamameak, ineras nukaiŋal;
Epotiete ameŋeranut, idounete numam adolit.
Eojiete elago loka asimokok;
Ŋin yenenyami akecebeei etwani,
Naidecidecio da elomuni emusaga kotoma.
Mam ikecelagoi eraunos inapen,
Mam imukoros kakeceswamisio:
Akeceswamisio eraas aswamisio nuka numam adolit,
Aswam naka akaje ejai toma akaninikec.
Isunyitos abukor aokot numam akirot:
Akeceomisio eraas aomisio nuka numam adolit:
Ejaas asilior ka amudiar orotinikec.
Emamei etube kalositokec:
Etemokis isokono lumagul;
Ŋin da yenitori kanen mam ejeni ainapakin.
Kimoi aica, konye kianyuni amuton;
Kimoi awaŋ, konye kisakasakai kamusimus.
Eebo, kirarapitoi bala ŋul luemameete akonye:
Kiguikini kidiŋ paaran, bala toma aikamus;
Kotoma kaŋul kaluekurunanete kisubi oni bala lukatwak.
Kigata kere kwape idubun,
Kibworo noi kwape ajeleik:
Kimoi etube, konye emamei;
Kimoi aitajario, konye alwaniar kamawok.
Naarai epuakata adiakanaretakosi kakonyenekon,
Itejenunete akosironisio kamakosi:
Naarai ejaas adiakanaretakosi kasio,
Ido kijeni numam adolitekosi.
Kibelonokini kenyeis aitup Edekekosi,
Kinerenena nukaimwan ka nukepali,
Kipwakuni kilimonokini da akiro nukaiŋal nuepote kotoma otau.
Ebwoi adolit kama elwana:
Naarai ebirokin abeit orot,
Ido mam atenit epedori alomun.
Eebo, aolio abeit;
Ŋin da yenenyouni kotoma aronis itaraun bon iŋatara,
Koany EJAKAIT ŋun, kokadak,
Naarai amamei etube.
Koumok naarai amamei yenedieki:
Kanuka ŋun abu akekan elopet koyau aitajar;
Akedolit da ŋes kiganit.
Akopira naka aitajar akouke;
Konap igoen luka ainyaŋ araut inapen,
Kimukok ekolo da kwape elou.
Kwape ejaatar aswamisiokec, etacakini kwape kwaŋin,
Adedeŋ mama ejaas lukediŋeteke,
Eropit mama ejaas lukasurupoke;
Etacakini apujana eropit.
Akeibuses ageun kaneelomunio akoloŋ:
Naarai ebuni kwape aguurut naelelei kagogoŋ,
Naeremit eiyeŋane loka EJAKAIT.
Mama ejaas ŋul luibelokinos ainyein apaar kotoma Yakob.”
Kiliyaik jo aibuses naka EJAKAIT.
Naarai, koany, erapakini amuton akwap,
Ka amuton nairiono cucucuc erapaari atekerin:
Konye kiliyaikini jo EJAKAIT,
Etakanuni da akeibuses kamakon.
Ikabakan da epote amwekimwek naka ailiyaunikon.
Kiteluo akonyekon koŋoleŋol, koany:
Etukonokinos kere nepepe, epote mama ijai:
Epote ikonisap kama elwana,
Akonipesur da edakio.
Kosodi kanen ianyuni kitacaikin,
Erieŋuni ekonitau, eleli;
Naarai ijulunio mamakon aipadara naejai aŋolol,
Ebuni da abar naka atekerin mamakon.
Itak luka ikaalai luka Midian ka luka Epa da;
Epote kere koSeba.
Eyaunete esabu ka emina lokisupuruŋuno, Elimorete da aiturio naka EJAKAIT.
Kijaanakinete jo imerekekin lumaseniko luka Nebaiot:
Edokanarete otemuka Kacamunio,
Etubusikini da etogo loka aibusesuka.
Lukaŋai bo lu lueporitos bala idouon,
Ido bala ajeleik kokekia luka akaisikec?
Egeunete atakerin nuka Tarusis ayaun ikonisap kama elwana,
Nepepe ka epuesakec ka esabukec,
Kanuka ekiror loka EJAKAIT Ekonideke,
Ka Ekalaunan loka Isirael,
Naarai ŋes kitubusik jo.
Kijaanakinete da ikabakanakec:
Naarai abu kenom jo kotoma akanyunyura,
Konye ketim kotoma akasianut.
Mam egoleneno paaran ka kuare da;
Tetere kiinunete ituŋa abar naka atekerin,
Ikecekabakan da inarenikinitai.
Eebo, emudiario cut atekerin ŋun.
Ŋes eberos; ka etidar, ka eteasur
Aitojok aiboisika nakalaunan,
Ido etubusikini aibois naka akakeje.
Ka ŋul da kere luapotu komenito jo isudedeonokinos kwap kakejekon;
Kinyaraete jo Ere loka EJAKAIT,
Sion loka Ekalaunan loka Isirael.
Karaida aponi kinyein kolai da,
Komam inujanan yenikitorenenei neuai ijo,
Ketuluori jo araun ajokis naepol namam enaŋi,
Aiyalama naka aturio nuipu.
Ido inaki ikisin luka ikabakan:
Ŋeŋuni da ebe, Eoŋ EJAKAIT arai Eketajaranikon,
Ido Ekalakunanikon, Ekagogoŋen loka Yakob.
Ayauni esabu aibois naka aisinit,
Epuesa da aibois naka asuat,
Aisinit aibois naka akito, ka asuat da aibois naka amor:
Etarauni ijakakon luisinapikinete,
Ikoniketelemak da luisibecikinete.
Karaida ameje karaida amudiario koikorunokon;
Konye imaikini arwatatinikon Aitajar,
Ka iruteikon da. Aiturit.
Kwabo mere bobo elap kicaanakini jo kanuka ailiya;
Konye EJAKAIT eraun kamakon aica namam edaun,
Ido Ekonideke eraun aibusesukon.
Kwabo mam bobo elumori ekonilap:
Naarai EJAKAIT eraun akoniica namam edaun,
Konanete da apaarasia nuka akuudianakon.
Irumete rwaru akwap ikar kere;
Atenu nakolo eraikini eoŋ, aswam naka akakanin,
Tetere ketubusikinio.
Yenedit da ateker nakagogoŋ:
Kedol apakikec,
Eoŋ EJAKAIT esunyakini ŋun.
Naarai kenyonyoiki EJAKAIT eoŋ akinyet
Alimonokin luitasonos akiro nukajokak;
Kejuku eoŋ aider luebilil itauon,
Alimonokin lueŋasitai aosikinio,
Ka lueenen da alacakinio;
Ka apaaran naka Edekewok naka enyaŋit;
Aitalakaar da luibworos kere;
Akinyet naka aiyalama aibois naka akuudian;
Anapito naka aiturit aibois naka etau loekadakinit;
Tetere emaikinio ikito luka adolit,
Lukirai EJAKAIT, tetere itubusikinio ŋes.
Itemonokinete ireria luiswapitos,
Ijeburo luka aturio nuipu.
Eraunete ipejok ikakoriokokus,
Iketitak imusabibunukus.
Kinyaraete yes ituŋa ikejaanakinak luka Edekewok:
Inyamete abar naka atekerin,
Toma aibusesukec ŋes iwogatar.
Aibois da naka aitirira isiyalamikinete ewaikec:
Kanuka ŋun irumete irwan aarei kakwapukec:
Ejaunos kailel namam edaun.
Ainakini kes eropitikec kabeit.
Etutuki aitutuket namam edaun kakes.
Ejen aurikec kotoma atekerin,
Idwekec da kotoma otuŋa:
Ecamunete kere lueanyunete kes
Ebe eraas kesi aur naisirereŋit EJAKAIT.
Elelakini akaijar Ekadeke;
Naarai ketanap inapen luka aitajar,
Kemukok ŋesi eoŋ ekaso loka adolit,
Kwape isirio eteran aboko,
Kwape iyogogoo ateran kiboroke luka akais.
Ido kwape isibwaŋunia emanikor ikinyom lueyeitai toma; Kwape kwaŋin isibwaŋunia EJAKAIT Edeke adolit ka aiturio
Kakonyen nuka atekerin kere.
Kanuka Sion mam ber eliliŋi,
Ido kanuka Yerusalem mam ber ebworari,
Aitodol naelomunia adoliteke kwape ailiya,
Aitajarake da kwape akalas naenoki.
Ikabakan kere da aibusesukon:
Kimaikinio ekiror lokitetet,
Loemaikini aituk naka EJAKAIT.
Amekemeket naka ekabakane kakan naka Edekekon.
Ido akonikwap mam bobo enyaritai Naimucoŋoŋ:
Konye imaikinio Nakesiyalamikinit, akwapukon da Naedukokinitai:
Naarai kisiyalamikinit EJAKAIT jo, adukokinio akwapukon.
Naarai kwape edukokinia ekaturŋunan abekot,
Kwape kwaŋin kidukokiniata odwekon lo:
Ido kwape elelakinia eteran ateran,
Kwape kwaŋin kilelakinia Ekonideke jo.
Mam ililiŋenenete paaran ka akuar:
Yes luisiituŋunete EJAKAIT, sirikipalasi.
Ido aitodol neituluoria ŋes aiturio kakwap.
Kakan da naka agogoŋuke ebe,
“Abeit mam bobo ainanakini akimakon araun atap naka lukasurupokon;
Imo da mam emasenenete ekonibino, loitaaritor:
Ŋul da luadenito kes emasete kalaroi nuka aiboisika nakalaunan.”
Kotuboros, kotuboros korutei;
Kitemokis erot loka ituŋa,
Kitutuoto, kitutuoto erot lokapolon;
Koukonosi amor; kikeikis ituŋa aanyunet.
“Koany, ebunit akoniitajario;
Koany, ejai aimalaeteke kaŋes,
Ekeropit da ejai kakonyeneke.”
Emaikinio Ituŋa lukalaunak, Lulakuna luka EJAKAIT; Kimaikinio jo Naemootai, Ere lomam ejalakinitai.
Ejaas kigoen luitereŋitai, ebunit koBosura?
Ŋol loibusak ikenapen, kolosi kotoma apolou naka akegogoŋ?
“Eoŋ loenera kotoma adolit, loapedorit aitajar.”
Ikonigoen da koputos bala ŋol loicakacakai acuetz
Ido kotuŋa amamei yenikijaar eoŋ:
Eebo, ecakacak kes kakaisiop,
Ido epudapud kes kakanyunyura;
Epiricanakinos aokot nuka aijarakec onapeneka,
Emodimod eoŋ da ikagoen kere.
Naarai ajai apaaran naka ainyanar otauka,
Adolu da ekaru loka ilakunaka.
Abu kaumok naarai amamei idio yenikegaŋuni:
Kanuka ŋun akakan kelopet ŋes kainuni aitajar,
Akanyunyura da ŋes kegaŋuni.
Ketemer kes kakanyunyura,
Kabukok kwap aokot nuka aijarakec.”
Alimuni do asianut-nakamin naka EJAKAIT,
Kaitureta nuka EJAKAIT,
Kwape ejaatar ŋun kere nukiinakin EJAKAIT oni;
Ka ajokis naepol mama ejai ekek loka Isirael, naeinakinit kes,
Kwape ejaar akeitim, kwape ipadar akesianut-nakamin.
Naarai abu kotema atiar,
Abeit eraas kesi ikatuŋa,
Idwe lumam do iŋalaete:
Kanuka ŋun korau ŋesi Eketajaranikec.
Koyu kes koimalaikaneke,
Abu kolaku kes kotoma aminake ka akeitim da;
Kodakenenei kibwokenenei da kes apaarasia kere nukasonya.
Kanuka ŋun abu kibelokin araun lokasurupikec,
Koluik aitiji kes.
Kosodi kiitu apaarasia nukasonya,
Nuka Musa ka iketuŋa,
Kobalasi ebe,
Ai bo ejai ŋol lokitodokuni kes alemun kaŋolol,
Nepepe ka ekecokon loka ekesipan?
Ai bo ejai loabu kibwaik Emoyoke Lokalaunan tomakec?
Loatiaki akipi kakonyenekec,
Amaikinor ŋes elopet ekiror lomam edaun?
Loetotori kes ataro kwape ebalasi kamodiŋ,
Kinyeis aiguikin?
Kwape ijesarotor ibaren aditot,
Abu Emoyo loka EJAKAIT kisiyeŋu kes:
Kwaŋin ibu ijo kiŋarenik ikonituŋa,
Ijo elopet amaikinor ekiror lokaibuses.
Kosesen kwap ijai akuj,
Koany ijai aibois naka alaunitekon, ka naka aibusesukon da:
Ani bo akokitekon ka aswamisiokon nuka agogoŋ?
Aipielit naka ekonitau, ka aitimesiakon itikoritai kamaka.
Karaida kemam Aburaam kijeni sio,
Isirael da mam kilimorit sio:
Wu EJAKAIT, irai ijo Papakosi;
Ekosikalakunan ameun ikar kere ŋes Ekonikiror.
Koboŋ kanuka ikonibulesin, atekerin nuka airumitekon.
Ecakacakata ŋes lukasurupokosi.
Kiluor bala ŋul lumam apeŋo jo irumit;
Bala lumam apeŋo emaikinitai ekonikiror.
Wu okwe, arai kodi ijo akuj, arai kijesun ijo,
Kosodete iroŋan amaran kakonyenekon;
Kwape inepunia akim kakito,
Isiwalaria da akim akipi;
Aitejenikin lukasurupokon ekonikiror,
Kosodete atekerin amaran kakonyenekon.
Nakiswamaa ijo kolo nusogim numam sio kimunonena,
Ibu kijesun, komaranata da iroŋan kakonyenekon.
Karaida akoŋu aanyun Edeke dimarai ijo,
Loiswamakini ŋin yenidaret ŋes.
Ŋul lukiitunete jo korotinikon:
Koany, ibu konyunyura, sio da kadiakanasi:
Kiboienenei kaŋin ameun apeŋo, kipedori leka isio aitajario?
Adolitekosi kere esubit bala anapito naamodok:
Kirinyori isio kere kwape akiot;
Numam adolitekosi kiyanaasi isio kwape kekwam.
Yenimuket bon aikamun jo:
Naarai ibwa ijo akonikonyen kamakosi,
Ibu kijaik sio akan naka numam adolitekosi.
Kirai isio elupe, ijo ekajeanikosij
Kirai isio kere aswam naka akanikon.
Sirikinyunyurikin noi noi, wu EJAKAIT,
Karaida akiitun numam adolit ikar kere:
Koany, kosesen, kiŋaiŋait, kirai isio kere ikonituŋa.
Araut ireriakon lukalaunak ais,
Araun Sion ais, Yerusalem da asilio.
Nekiituritotor kolo jo lukapapaakosi, anyam akim; Ecanieaŋunos da ikosiboro kere lukisiyalamikinito.
Itikokin tope kakiro kaŋun, wu EJAKAIT?
Ililinikini ca ka aitican sio noi noi?
Ketemokino adumunio kama kaŋul lumam kamootos:
Kabala ebe, “Eoŋ lo, Eoŋ lo,” mama ejai ateker namam iwonet ekakiror.
Luelosenenete korot lomam ejok,
Kwape ejaatar akeceomisio:
Luisupurununete lukisupurununo kamatapalin;
Luenyamete akiriŋ naka epege,
Ido acece nuka iboro luketal ejaas toma oborokec.
Sirikikuny mama ajai, naarai agitara kamakon.”
Eraas ŋun apuru okumesika, akim naenoki apaaran kere.
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, “Mam eoŋ eliliŋi,
Konye atacakini, eebo, atacakini toma atorobusiokec.
Naarai kisupuruŋunete lukisupurununo koron an,
Kamoromoroete eoŋ koukon:
Kanuka ŋun etemi eoŋ katorobusiokec nuetacakinete aswamisiokec nuŋo.”
“Kwape edumunor ebino lokitetet kaibunet,
Ebalai ebe, ‘Sirikimuna, naarai ejai arereŋ tomakeŋ’:
Kwape kwaŋin eswamai eoŋ kanuka ikakejaanakinak,
Kenyek amudiar kes kere.
Irumete luseunaka, iboienenete ikakejaanakinak kaŋina.
Aditot naka Akor da aibois naeuriakiata isipanin luka aituk, Kanuka ikatuŋa lukamootos.
Luitemokinete Arereŋ emesa,
Luilelebikinete Anerokin aderekai ebino loinyalinyalitai;
Naarai nakeworoo, mam ijito;
Nakeneria, mam ipupunito;
Konye iswamata nueroko kakonyeneka,
Iseut numam kesiyalamikinito.”
Kanuka ŋun ebala EJAKAIT Edeke kwanata ebe,
“Koany, enyamete ikakejaanakinak,
Konye yes kiriebi eteŋei:
Koany, emasete ikakejaanakinak,
Konye yes kijakit akur:
Koany, elelete ikakejaanakinak,
Konye yes kirumete ileic:
Koany, eyeete ikakejaanakinak kanuka aiyalama naka etau,
Konye yes imonyete kanuka aiturur naka etau,
Ibwololoete kanuka akadakin naka emoyo.
Kiari EJAKAIT Edeke;
Emaikini ikekejaanakinak ekiror ece.
Tetere ŋin yenilipakin bon arereŋ kakwap,
Ilipakin bon arereŋ kolimite Edeke loka abeit,
Ŋin da yeniyapoi kakwap iyapoi kolimite Edeke loka abeit; Naarai imurwokinete ican lusodit,
Ido naarai ibwaitai kakonyeneka.
Mam nusodit iitunio, karaida alomar toma aomisio.
Konye kiyalamikinos yesi, kolelakis ŋin yenasubi eoŋ ikar kere:
Naarai koany, asubi Yerusalem araut eibwoŋ ka iketuŋa da aile!.
Mam bobo epupunio eporoto loka aimony akiyo kotomake, Karaida eporoto loka icano
Naarai etwani ikoku yenika ikar akwatat,
Ikenio da ikadiakaran yenika ikar akwatat.
Iraete imanikoria luka emusabibu, enyamete da araitokec.
Mam edukete kosodete ice aiboi kotoma;
Mam iraete, kosodete ice ainyam;
Naarai ejaunos apaarasia nuka ikatuŋa kwape apaarasia nuka ekitoi,
Ebusete luseunaka elelakinete aswam naka akaninikec.
Naarai eraas Jesi aur naka luisirereŋit EJAKAIT,
Ka ikecedwe da kakes.
Ido eriŋa inera, eirari.”
“Edakasi rwaru epeet ka imerekek nepepe,
Enyami eŋatuny ariaŋ kwape emoŋ:
Apua ŋes eraun inyamat luka emun.
Mam isiriebete karaida amudiar koroŋataka kere lokalaunan.”
“Erai akuj ekaicoloŋ,
Erai akwap da eicoloŋ loka akejeka:
Etogo lonyoin lokidukokinete eoŋ?
Aibois nanyoin naeraun akaibworaret?”
“Akakan ŋes asubi ŋun kere,
Aso kwaŋin ejaunos iboro ŋul kere:
Konye yen ŋes ituŋanan yenaseseni eoŋ,
Ŋin yenitasono, yenikemoyo loitoronikina,
Yenemarani kakakirot.
“Ikoni loeari emoŋ kwape loeari etuŋanan;
Ikoni loeinakini imerekek araun asubanit kwape loebili emurisiŋ loka ekiŋok;
Loeinakini ainakinet naka akiria kwape loeinakini aokot nuka
epege;
Loisupuruuni lukisupurununo, kwape loilipakini aput arereŋ:
Eebo, aseutu kesi ikecerotin,
Isiyalamikinete ikecetauon italesiakec.
Nakeneria, mam epupunito;
Konye kiswamata nueroko kakonyeneka,
Koseut numam kesiyalamikinito.”
Ebe, “Apotu ikusiinacan lukilaito,
Lukireŋearete kanuka ekakiror kotemasi atiar,
‘Kitopolooroi EJAKAIT, tetere kianyuni akusiiyalama’;
Konye isurumio kes ileic.
“Eporoto loka ecelet loebuni kore,
Eporoto loebuni koyekalu,
Eporoto loka EJAKAIT loetacakini lukasurupoke!
Eriŋa apipiluke edoluno, kidou ikoku yenisapat.
Iŋai lem eirarit naikoni nen?
Iŋai eanyunit nuikote nen?
Eurio teni akwap kapaaran adiopet?
Idounio tope ateker katipet?
Naarai nepeariebakinor Sion, kidou idweke.
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Etodolikini tope aur komam aisidoun?
Ebala Edekekon ebe, Agolokini tope akoik, Eoŋ loesidouni?
“Kiyalamikinos yesi kaYerusalem, kibwoŋata kanukeŋ,
Yes kere luiminasi ŋes,
Kiyalamikinos kailel nepepe kaŋes,
Yes kere luibworosi kanukeŋ.
Konakata do ikisin luka aitalakarike; kimonikinos;
Kodeŋ noi, kiyalamikinos kaidiles naka aibusesuke.”
“Koany, etalalari ainapakin kamake kwape ecor,
Aibuses da naka atekerin kwape aguurut nailapanar;
Inakete yesi, kidakitai yes kosiep,
Kilepanario kakuŋin.
Kwape yenitalakari totoke,
Kwape kwaŋin etalakaria eoŋ yes;
Kitalakario ko Yerusalem.
Epoloete akusikoio kwape amel:
Ejenun akan naka EJAKAIT kama ejaas ikekejaanakinak,
Enyunyurikini lukasurupoke.
Esubito agalinike kwape etapipirio;
Aijaikin anyunyutake kadedeŋ,
Airetakinike kalianeta nuka akim.
Kekekileŋ da, mama ejaas lukawat kere;
Ipu da lueari EJAKAIT.

Ebwaikini eoŋ aanyunet kamakec, ejukari ke kakes luakuete mama ejaas atekerin, Tarusis, Pul ka Lud, luikesete akabwai, Tubal ka Yaban, apujana nuelwaka, lumam epupunito iemutoka, karaida aanyun aibusesuka; elimonokinete akaibuses mama ejaas atekerin.

Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Eyaunete kesi ikusiinacan kere anyoun katekerin kere araut ainakinet mama ejai EJAKAIT, kobalasin, kagalin, kagalin nuimukoritai, kanyubun, kakaalai da, epote oronataka lokalaunan Yerusalem, kwape eyauniata idwe luka Isirael ainakinetekec togo loka EJAKAIT, kotoma obore yenelai.”
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe. “Alemuni ice kakes da araut isasedotin ka Ilebin.”
Kwape kwaŋin esalakinia aurikus ka ekusikiror da.”
“Ageun kolap ediopet lokelamunan kiton ece,
Ido ageun kasabato adiopet kiton ace,
Eponenenete lukawat kere aima kakonyeneka.
Loabuni akirot naka EJAKAIT mamakeŋ kapaarasia nuka Yosia okoku loka Amon, ekabaka loka Yuda, kokaru lokitomonet kauni loka airumuke.

Kobu da kapaarasia nuka Yekoiakim okoku loka Yosia, ekabaka loka Yuda, kiton osaŋe loka ekaru lokitomonet kalodiop loka Sedekia okoku loka Yosia, ekabaka loka Yuda; kiton neejoreorere luko Yerusalem olap lokikanyet.
Kosodi kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai eoŋ kobala ebe,
Ido eriŋa ilomuna kakoik abu ketalau jo:
Kaseu jo araun enabi mama ejaas atekerin.”
Konye kabala EJAKAIT eoŋ ebe,
“Sirikiner ebe, ‘Arai eoŋ esapat:’
Naarai ilosenenei mama ejaas ŋul kere lukejukanari jo, Inerenenei da ŋun kere nukecoranakini jo.
Sirikikurianar kes:
Naarai ajaenena kajo ayuun jo,”
“Koany, ebwaik akakiro aitukukon:
Arutun ka abilibil,
Amudiar, ka atiyaikin;
Aiduk ka aira da,”
Ido da kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai kobala ebe, “Yeremia, ianyu inyo?” Kabala ebe, “Aany ebela loka ekuŋur,”
Kosodi EJAKAIT atemar eoŋ atiar, “Iany ejok: naarai edarenenei akakirot aitodolikin.”
Kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT nakiareit mama ajai kobala ebe, “Ianyu inyo?” Kabala ebe, “Aany amot naekulai; kipuŋuno da kagolitomei.”
Kosodi EJAKAIT atemar eoŋ atiar, “Ebuni aronis abelun kagolitomei mama ejaas kere luiboienenete kakwap kana.

Naarai ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Koany, anyarauni atekerin kere nuka ajakanuto nuka agolitomei; epote do, esipokinete kesi ŋinituŋanan ekeicoloŋ loka ajakanut neelomarere orutei luka Yerusalem, asurokin arwatatinike kere airimor, asurokin da ireria kere luka Yuda.
Ido alimori ikatubesia aluikin kes kanuka nukaronokokec kere; naarai kajalata, kisupurunonokis lukisupurununo icedekesio, komaata da aswamisio nuka akaninikec.
Aso do jo koen aŋabetekon, konyou, kolimok kes kere nukecoranakini jo: sirikiyaloŋoŋ nukec, kenyek eoŋ aisiyaloŋoŋ jo kakonyenekec.

Naarai koany, ketuluo jo lolo ere loebwaitai, epir da lokasuat, arwatatin nukaisinin, aluikin akwap kere, aluikin ikabakan luka Yuda, aluikin ikapolokoke da, aluikin isasedotinike, ido aluikin ituŋa luka akwap kana.
Ejiikinos kesi kajo: konye mam kipikorete: naarai ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Ajaenena eoŋ kajo ayuun jo.”
Kosodi kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai, kobala ebe,
“Kolot, kiworo kaki nuka Yerusalem kiner atiar, Ebala EJAKAIT kwanata ebe,
Eitunit asianut naka eiditeukon, Aminakon naka ateran;
Kwape kiitupitotor eoŋ kotoma amodiŋ,
Toma akwap namam eyeikinio ikinyom.
Araito nugeet nuka aidwenyike:
Kere luanyamenenete kes itelekarito akiro; Ebala EJAKAIT ebe,
Ebunokini kes aronis.”
Kopuputu yesi akirot naka EJAKAIT, ijo ekek loka Yakob, ka ajena kere nuka ekek loka Isirael.
Ebala EJAKAIT kwanata ebe,
“Anyoika numam adolit nuapotu lukapapaakus kodumut kotamakan,
Tape ebwataros neelwana kamakaŋ,
Kotupito aamameak, koraunos lukaamameak?
Mam apotu kobalas ebe, ‘Ali bo EJAKAIT
Lokitolomuni oni kakwap nako Misiri;
Lokiŋarenikini oni kotoma ais,
Akwap naka amodiŋo ka apanya,
Akwap naka akure ka etoribe loka atwanare,
Akwap neamamei yenitori, namam iboikin ituŋanan?’
Ketolom yes akwap napusuk,
Anyamenen araitoke, ka ajokisike:
Konye nailomuniata itisiloto akwapuka,
Kitaraut airumeteka naketal.
Ŋul luitiŋitos ikisila mam apotu kajenut eoŋ:
Kodiakasi da ikayaitok kamakaŋ,
Kodwarete inabin kolimitos Baal,
Kotupitos da akiro numam ameda.
Ŋes kipurio kayes,
Ido apurokini idwe luka ikusidwe.
Naarai kotuboros yesi kapujana nuka Kitim, koanyut;
Kijukasi Kedar, kokukuranaros aomoom;
Koanyut arai ajai lem akirot naikoni nen.
Lumam eraas idekesio?
Konye elocokis ikatuŋa aibusesukec
Kanuka yenimam ameda.
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Koumok ŋun, ijo akui,
Kokurianar noi noi, kosilior lio.
Kajalata eoŋ ekicoi loka akipi nukajarak.
“Erai kereka Isirael ebulesit?
Erai kereka ŋesi ebulesit loeurikinio ore?
Kanukinyo araunor imejat?
Agatakis ŋes iŋarunyo ludidik, ikunas noi;
Amunaasi akwapuke;
Ecwei ireriake, emamei yeniboie kotoma.
Abelata idwe luka Nop ka Tapanes esiadukukon.
Mam kereka jo isudunyikinit ŋun,
Naarai ibu kojal EJAKAIT Ekonideke,
Nakiŋarenikinitor korot?
Aimat akipi nuka Sikor?
Ido da ikwaikini ai korot loelosi Asuria;
Aimat akipi nuka Ecor?
Aronisikon ŋes kilecori,
Aboŋonorikon kau ŋes kiretakini jo:
Aso do kojen koany da ebe erai akirot naerono ido naedwar,
Ijo aijal EJAKAIT Ekonideke,
Emamei da ayoŋit eoŋ tomakon.
“Naarai koloŋo abilibil ajookotokon, aŋedeŋed aenetakon;
Kosodi atemar atiar, ‘Mam kejaanakini,’
Ibu kirapanakin kaŋoliukot loemukurur,
Ido kwap kaŋolikitoi loepesit, kwape naadote.
Ekinyomit loetenit cut:
Kikwaikini ai iraun kamaka ekiot loemunauna
Loka emusabibu lokais?
Karaida iloŋi kesoda,
