Itwasamai asabunyun nuipu,
Konye emasikinito numam adolitekon kakonyeneka.
Mam atupenenei Ibaalin?’
Koany ekonirot kaditot, kojen nuiswamat:
Isubit bala akaala naiiriai korotinike;
Atuko naenaikinit amodiŋ,
Naesupi ekwam kotoma oimielike;
Toma apakike iŋai bo epedori aisibelokin ŋes?
Ŋul kere luemootos ŋes mam itapasitos;
Edumunete ŋes kolapake.
Kimik akonikeje kinyeis ajaut komameete amuk,
Kinyek elogorotokon da aonore akure:
Konye ibu kiner ebe, ‘Emamei amun:
Mam; naarai abu kamin imo, atupakini kes.’
“Kwape irumiata ileic ekokolan naedumunere,
Kwape kwaŋin irumiata ileic ekek loka Isirael;
Kes, ikecekabakan, ka ikapolokokec,
Ka isasedotinikec, ka inabinokec da;
Amoru da ebe, ‘Ijo kiwuriei eoŋ’:
Naarai ebelokis ipuranakec mamakaŋ,
Kwabo mere akonyenekec:
Konye kapak naka icanikec ebalas ebe, ‘Konyou, kitajarai!’
Konyoutu bo kesi,
Arai epedorete aitajar jo kapak naka icanikon:
Naarai kwape imwatatar ireriakon,
Imwaasi kwaŋin ikonidekesio, ijo Yuda.
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe,
Kanukinyo kirurumakinitotor eoŋ?
Ipotu kere kodiakasi kamakaŋ.
Mam edumunito alecorio:
Ajwenya ekusikileŋ ikusinabin,
Kwape eŋatuny loemudiari.
Ijo atur, koanyutu yesi akirot naka EJAKAIT.
Abu kereka karau ais kama ejai Isirael?
Karau akwap naka amuton naijesi ŋaŋ?
Kanukinyo ineratar ikatuŋa ebe, ‘Kijakakai;
Mam bobo kibuni mamakon’?
Arai ateran inapeneke?
Konye ikatuŋa kemurwokis eoŋ
Apaarasia numam imarunos.
“Itemonokini ca ma ijo ekonirot amoot ipailon!
Tape isisianakin aŋor nueroko ikonirotin.
Mam idumunito epakapakaete,
Konye kaŋun kere
Abeit ebelokin akenyunyura kamakaŋ.’
Koany, katubokini jo akiro,
Naarai inera ebe, ‘Mam eoŋ adiakit.’
Misiri da kisurumi jo ileic,
Kwape kisurumia Asuria jo ileic.
Naarai aŋer EJAKAIT luimunokina,
Mam ikerianari kamakec.”
“Arai kireŋe etuŋanan akeberu,
Enyouni ŋin da kamakeŋ,
Korau naka ecetuŋanan,
Eboŋori tope je mamake bobo?
Mam akwap ti kemunaun noi?
Konye irau ijo naadote mama ejaas ipailon luipu;
Konye ebala EJAKAIT ebe,
Ikoto kereka aboŋun mama ajai?
Anu bo numam kiteperitere?
Ibu kiboie kawai kerot aidareun kes.
Kwape Eyarabut kais;
Ibu komunau akwap kadoteukon, ka aronisikon.
Komameun akiru naka akamu;
Kwabo kijai kereet loka naadote,
Ibu koŋer aileicikin.
‘Ipapa, kirai ijo epadic loka atumunika.
Enyunyuranakini kereka ŋesi ikar kere?
Isiopanakini kiton osaŋe?’
Koany, ibu kiner, konye kiswama nueroko, kwape kipedoria.”
Kabala ebe, ‘Kedau ŋesi aiswama akiro ŋun kere, eboŋuni do ŋesi mama ajai’; konye mam abu koboŋu; abu Yuda kinacike naemodana koany.
Koany da, naereŋearia Isirael nakaboŋonoran kau kanuka adoteuke, kainak da ebalua lokaireŋear; konye Yuda kinacike naemodana mam akuriana, konye kolot ŋin da kodotei.
Kosodi kanen naarai ebenenikinit ŋes adoteuke, komuna akwap, kodotei kamor ka apuŋurei.
Konye ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Karaida ŋun kere mam Yuda kinacike naemodana eboŋunit neajai keketau kere, konye ijoseikinit.”
Kabala EJAKAIT eoŋ atiar, “Isirael nakaboŋonoran kau itodiara araun naedolit aitelekar Yuda naemodana.
Kolot kolimonok akiro nu koseseni agolitomei, kiner atiar,
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe,
‘Koboŋu ijo Isirael nakaboŋonoran kau;
Mam kaseseni jo kanyunyura;
Naarai ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Arai eoŋ lokaitim,
Mam anyunyuranakin ikar kere.
Na bon, kolimo numam adolitekon,
Ebe idiaka kama ejai EJAKAIT Ekonideke,
Isiarak ikonirotin mama ejaas imo kokwap kaŋolikitoi loepesit,
Komam irimarit ekaporoto.
Yes idwe luiboŋonorete kau;
Naarai arai eoŋ lokowaikus:
Ido kalemuni yes, ediopet kore, iarei kokek,
Kayau Sion.’

Kosodi kanen, ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Naipuakarotor iyatanakinotor da kakwap, kapaarasia kaŋun mam bobo ineras ebe, “Asaduku naka aitutuket naka EJAKAIT.” Mam aomisioitike elomari otauonokec; mam iitunete ŋes; mam ipeionokinete ŋes; ido mam bobo iswamao.
Kapak kaŋin emaikinete Yerusalem eicoloŋ loka EJAKAIT: etukonokinos atekerin kere mamakeŋ, okiror loka EJAKAIT, Yerusalem: ido mam bobo elosenenete kwape ejaar aninik naka itauonokec lueroko.
Kapaarasia kaŋun euparos ekek loka Yuda kekek loka Isirael, enyounete nepepe kotoma akwap naka agolitomei epote akwap nakainakinit lukapapaakus araun airumet.
Ainakin jo akwap nakailel,
Airumet naejok naka ajoresio nuka atekerin.
Abu kaomite ebe kinyaraete eoŋ Papa;
Komam ibelokinos ainyein atupun eoŋ.
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe,
Abeit kwape enyounio aberu kama kokilenike kaimod,
Kwape kwaŋin kimodiata yesi eoŋ,
Wu ekek loka Isirael.”
Aimony ka aiŋaiŋa naka idwe luka Isirael;
Naarai etirioto ekecerot,
Emurwokis EJAKAIT Ekecedeke.
Etaŋaleuni aboŋonorikus kau.
Koany, kiponi mama ijai;
Naarai irai ijo EJAKAIT Edekekosi.
Ecelet da koroŋan:
Abeit ejai aitajario naka Isirael toma EJAKAIT Edekewok.
Kapero kotoma oleiciwok, korap oni aitirirawok: naarai kidiaka kama ejai EJAKAIT Edekewok, oni ka lukapapaawok, ageun keiditeuwok kiton lolo: mam kipou karimarito eporoto loka EJAKAIT Edekewok.”
“Arai ikoto aboŋun mama ajai eoŋ, ijo Isirael,
Iboŋuni mama ajai:
Arai kilema italesiakon kakonyeneka,
Ŋes konyet mam iriaŋiriaŋar;
Kabeit, kotube, kadolit da;
Ilipakinos atekerin arereŋ kotomakeŋ,
Tomakeŋ da ŋes itubusikinotor.”
“Kokorioto alupokus nuiukarito,
Sirikiyeata neejaas ikukwa.
Kolemas amunyin nuka itauonokus,
Yes ituŋa luka Yuda, ka luiboiete koYerusalem:
Kinyek akanyunyura alomun kwape kakim,
Kicwe komamei yenepedori aitudeŋ,
Kanuka aronis naka aswamisiokus.”
Kolimosi koYuda, kisiarakis akiro koYerusalem, kineras atiar,
“Kokutata yesi arupepe kakwap:
Kiworoto kobalas ebe,
‘Kotukonokinos, kaloto oreria luebwaitai.’
Kokerata kolakunos, sirikipaikis:
Naarai ayauni aronis naebuni kagolitomei,
Ka amudiar naepol.
Ejai orot, alom kaiboisike;
Aitisilior akwapukon, tetere iswapete ireriakon,
Komamei yeniboie kotoma.
Kokuudianata kibwololoto:
Naarai anyunyura naededeŋ naka EJAKAIT
Mam ibelokino kamawok.
“Kosodi kanen kapaaran kaŋin ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Ipirisiar etau loka ekabaka, ka itauon luka ikapolok; isirieŋunio isasedotin, eumokinete da inabin.”
Kasodi eoŋ atemar atiar, “Wu okwe, EJAKAIT Edeke! Abeit iŋalat noi ituŋa lu, ka Yerusalem da, kobala ebe, ‘Ijaunos kainapakin’; kwabo adoloki ekileŋ aijarakec.”
Ŋes ekwam Loegogoŋ adepar ŋun loebuni kanukaŋ: kwana eoŋ da enerakini kes itubesia.”
Agalinike da kwape etapipirio:
Etiroko ibalasinike adepar imorukaalen.
Itukwi oni! naarai kiŋatario.
Itodoli ai eperete akoniwomisio nueroko kotomakon?
Elimonokini aronis naebuni koukon luka Epuraim:
Koany, kolimonokis Yerusalem ebe,
“Epote ikerereok anyoun kakwap naelwana,
Edolokinete ireria luka Yuda.
Naarai ebala EJAKAIT ebe,
Kepaliiki eoŋ.
Ŋin ŋes aronisikon,
Naarai edwar, naarai adoloki otaukon.”
Ebala etauka ditidit;
Mam apedori aililiŋ;
Naarai apupi eporoto loka arupepe,
Elala loka ejie.
Naarai eŋataritai akwap kere:
Kitiut ikaweman eŋatario,
Aigalisioka da katipet.
Itodoli ai aanyun aanyunet,
Kapupi eporoto loka arupepe?
Eraas idwe lujikit, emamei kes aijen:
Ecoak kesi aswam nueroko,
Konye emamei aijen aswam nuejok.”
Akuj da amamei aica.
Kilokilokos iukon epuai kepuai.
Kekerata akweny kere nuka apak.
Abu kaany, ido koany, emanikor lopusuk araun ais,
Ketiyanakinos ireriake kere kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT,
Kakonyen nuka anyunyurake naededeŋ.
konye mam etanaŋi cut.
Irioniar akuj kokuju:
Naarai abu kalim, abu kanerok,
Ido mam abu keitu, ido mam ejulakini.”
Elomarete amonieik, edokarete atiiban,
Asilior ŋolire,
Emamei da ituŋanan yeniboie kotoma.
Karaida kinap inapen lukareŋak,
Karaida kiyogog kiboro luka esabu
Karaida italali akonyekon kekia,
Itubusikina taai;
Kimenete ipailonokon, emootos akoniijar
Kwape loka aditar naka ŋin naidouni ekiyaike,
Eporoto loka akoku naka Sion, nainyikonokini iyeŋa,
Korionori akekanin, kobala ebe,
“Itukwi eoŋ! Eilori akaijar kakonyen nuka ikaarak.”
Koanyut bo, kojenut, komoata kaiboisioke nuelalak,
Arai ipedorete aanyun ituŋanan,
Arai ejai yeniswamai nuebeito, yenemoot amunonut;
Aso etimi eoŋ ere.
Abeit iyapoete nukaiŋal.
Inom kes, konye mam itururwete;
Idany kes, konye agiro aicorio:
Etogogonoto akecekonyen aitelekarit atiiba;
Agiro aboŋun.
Naarai mam ejenete erot loka EJAKAIT,
Karaida ekisil loka Ekecedeke.
Naarai ejenete kesi erot loka EJAKAIT, ka ekisil loka Ekecedeke.”
Konye abila ŋul eloit kediopetau, aŋedata aeneta.
Eŋasi kes epeet loka amodiŋ,
Eperuni eris koreriakec,
Ŋinituŋanan yenelomuni kotoma enyilinyilio;
Naarai ipu adiakanaretakec,
Eyatakin akecepaar.
Kajala ikonidwe eoŋ,
Eyapoikis ŋul lumam eraas idekesio:
Abu kesimon kes kosodete adotiar,
Kotukonokinos katukon otogoi luka nudotia.
Ŋolituŋanan icicina kaberu naka yenice.
Mam kereka eticani kanuka ŋun?
Ido mam tope inyaŋi ekatau kateker naikoni nen?
Konye sirikitanaŋa cut:
Kolemasi aketenun;
Naarai mam eraas nuka EJAKAIT.
Naarai keŋala noi noi ekek loka Isirael,
Ka ekek loka Yuda.
Kwabo mam kidoikini oni aronis,
Kwabo mam kianyuni ekileŋ karaida eteŋei.
Eraunos inabin da ekwam,
Kwabo emamei akirot kotomakec:
Iswamakinio kes kwaŋin.’ ”
Edeke loka ajoresio, ebe:
“Kanu ineratar akirot ŋin,
Koany, etuluori akakiro kaitukukon araun akim,
Ka ituŋa lu da araun akito, icwei kes.
Koany, ayauni mama ijaas ateker naebuni kama elwana,
Ijo ekek loka Isirael:
Ateker nakagogoŋon, ateker nakolo sek,
Ateker namam ijeni akeceŋajep,
Kwabo mam ijenuni nuineras.
Ecoekec loka ikojoi erai ailit naesabara,
Eraas kere ikiliok lukirigin.
Lutikenyama ikonidwe lusap ka lupesur:
Enyamete ikonisipanin luka aituk ka luka amerekekin;
Enyamete ekonimusabibu, ka etinikon:
Ejepejepeete kekileŋ ikonireria luebwaitai, luimunokina.”
“Konye ebala EJAKAIT ebe, karaida kapaarasia kaŋun, mam ketanaŋete cut.

Kosodi kanen, naineriata atiar, ‘Kanukinyo kiswamakinia EJAKAIT Ewokodeke akiro ŋun kere?’ Kosodi Koboŋok kes ebe, ‘Kwape kinyeiniata yesi eoŋ, kijaanakis idekesio lumo kakwapukus, ijaanakinete kwape kwaŋin imo kakwap namere nakus.’ ”
Kolimosi nu kokek loka Yakob,
Kolimonokis koYuda, kineras atiar,
Luejaas akonye, komam ianyunete;
Luejaas aki komam ipupunete.
Mam imaranete kakonyeneka?
Ebwaik asine araun eikor loka aŋolol,
Kokisil lomam edaun, tetere mam etubor,
Karaida edakununos akailan, mam epedorete aipikor;
Karaida irurumaete, mam epedorete atubor.
Konye ejaas ituŋa lu itauon luepaarete ido luepaliikis;
Apaasi aloto.
Loeinakini akiru kapakike;
Akiru naka aiporo ka naka akamu da;
Loinadakini oni asabaton nuseuna nuka aidweny.’
Aremosi numam adolitekus akiro ŋun,
Erebokis aronisiokus ajokis kamakus.
Naarai edumunos ikaronok kotuŋaka:
Idarete, kwape eperunioto ikalokak akweny;
Elokete atacit, ipokete ituŋa.
Kwape ilelebunotor akweny aruja,
Kwape kwaŋin ilelebunotor itogoikec aiŋal:
Ŋes apolokorotor, kobarata.
Eebo, elitoro kaswamisio nukaronok:
Mam etubete kabeit akiro nuka ikokiok,
Tetere ekeriakaros;
Mam epurokinete luilwaritos nuebeito.
Mam kereka eticani kanuka ŋun?
Mam ekatau inyaŋi ateker naikoni nen?”
Adoloki akirot nakaumokin ka nasogim akwap;
Eyaito isasedotin kanuka aisigalikinikec;
Ekotosi ikatuŋa kwaŋin;
Ikwaikinete yesi ai kedolu esaŋe?
Konyout kokidiŋ Yerusalem,
Kokutata arupepe koTekoa,
Kikeasi aanyunet koBet-kakerem:
Naarai etakani aronis ebuni kagolitomei,
Ka amudiar naepol.
Agelari akoku naka Sion,
Naitemelel naijamamai.
Ibubuete iwemanakec airimor;
Itadakete kes, ŋinituŋanan kaiboisike.
“Kokapanakinos ejie kaŋes;
Konyoutu, kadokasi kidiŋ paaran!”
“Itukwi oni! naarai aiotaki akoloŋ,
Aojaaros itolimon luka atiboŋ!”
“Konyoutu, kadokasi kuare,
Kamudiasi itogoike lukapolok!”
“Kojeput ikito, kitutuoto etut,
Asurokin Yerusalem:
Lo ŋes ere lokitieana;
Ileleba emwaŋit pas kidiŋike.
Kwape kwaŋin da ibwelibwelio aronisike:
Iirario akaje ka aiŋat kotomake;
Ejai adek ka amusuŋun kakonyeneka tiritir.
Kinyek ekatau anyoun kama ijai;
Kenyek aitaraun jo asilio,
Akwap namam ituŋanan.”
Ebala EJAKAIT loka ajoresio kwanata ebe:
“Inyogokinete aidepidep cut aatoŋot naka Isirael kwape emusabibu:
Kinyakanyak bobo akonikan katenun kwape yenedeŋi emusabibu.”
Koany, mam akeceki ekepep,
Kwabo mam epedorete akiirar:
Koany, araun akirot naka EJAKAIT amorosit kamakec;
Mam isiyalamikinito.
Kapas aitikokinit.
“Kobukok odwe korot,
Ido katukot naka ikatumunak nepepe:
Naarai eyaŋaario ekile ka nakowaike,
Lomojoŋ ka ŋol da loileleba apaarasia.
Nepepe kaŋorokec ka imanikoriakec:
Naarai ebala EJAKAIT ebe,
Ariori akakan mama ejaas luiboiete kakwap kana.
Eraŋani ŋinituŋanan aimedaun;
Ido ageun konabi kiton osasedoti,
Emodi ŋinituŋanan.
Kobalas ebe, ‘Ainapakin, ainapakin,’
Kereka emamei ainapakin.
Be! Mam cut erumito ileic,
Ido mam apedorete aitirir.
Kanuka ŋun ebiroros nepepe kaŋul luebiroros:
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe,
Kapak naeticania kes elataros.”
“Kobwaata yesi korotin, koanyut,
Kiŋita isokono lukoloŋo,
Neejai erot loejok, koloto kotoma,
Ido idumunete aiyeŋun kotauonokus:
Konye kobalas ebe, ‘Mam kilosi kotoma.’
‘Kopuputu eporoto loka arupepe!’
Konye kobalas ebe, ‘Mam kipupuni.’
Aso do kopuputu, yes atekerin,
Kojen, ijo ekodet, nuedoikinete kes.
Araito nuka akeceomisio,
Naarai mam apotu kiirasi akakiro;
Ido aŋeroto ekakisil.
anyoun koSeba,
Eitola da loebuni kakwap naelwana?
Ainakinetakus nuicweio mam ecamunio,
Asubanakus da mam kesiyalamikinito.
‘Koany, ebwaikini ikomion akonyen nuka ituŋa kalu:
Iguikinete lukapapa ka odwekec kere nepepe;
Eoliori eidunyet ka epaperoke da.’ ”
Ebala EJAKAIT kwanata ebe:
“Koany epote ituŋa kakwap naka agolitomei;
Ekwenyuni ateker naepol kowaitin luelwaka luka akwap.
Ibworitos kesi, mam itimenenete;
Irurumaete ikeceporotoi kwape aŋolol,
Ibwanenito ibalasin;
Ekapanakina ŋolituŋanan kwape ekajiot,
Asurokin jo, wu akoku naka Sion.”
Koleiekekaros akaniniwok;
Kikam aditar,
Ka ariebo kwape naka aberu naidouni.
Naarai ejai ekileŋ loka lokasurup ka aitasuro kaŋoliwai.
Kipunupunokin kotoma okurwon:
Kibworo, kwape ibworor ikoku yenilemura,
Akuudian naepol noi noi,
Naarai kitiuni oni ekamudiaran.
“Ketarau jo ekegimoron, ekeniŋon da kotoma otuŋaka;
Tetere ijenuni igimori da ekecerot.
Irimete kasabanakin;
Eraas kesi aisinit ka asuat:
Iswamaete kere nukamunaar.
Ekusi acukut kagogoŋ; Idopori akim asasit;
Iyatanakinete ailiaun atai;
Naarai mam ikaronok edemario.
Naarai agiri EJAKAIT kes.”
Akirot naabu kobu mama ejai Yeremia kama ejai EJAKAIT, kobala ebe:
“Kobwo korute loka etogo loka EJAKAIT, kolimo kanen akirot na, kiner atiar, Kiirasi akirot naka EJAKAIT, yes kere luka Yuda, luelomarete korutei kalu aima EJAKAIT.
Ebala kwanata EJAKAIT loka ajoresio, Edeke loka Isirael, ebe, Kitemokis irotinikus ka aswamisiokus, eoŋ da kesiboikini yes aibois na.
Sirikimunokinos akiro nukaiŋal ebe, ‘Lo ŋes eyekalu loka EJAKAIT, eyekalu loka EJAKAIT, eyekalu loka EJAKAIT.’
“Naarai arai itemokinete kojokan irotinikus ka aswamisiokus; arai itodolete kojokan etube kokidiŋ ketuŋanan ka eidunyeteke;
arai mam imwaŋete imoit, ka ikoki, ka apuserut, ido mam ibukokinete aokot numam akirot aibois na, komam itupanarete idekesio ice aiticanar bonik:
Ŋes konyet kesiboikinio yes aibois na, akwap naainakinit lukapapaakus, ageun apeŋo kiton ikar kere.
“Koany, imunosi akiro nukaiŋal, numam epedorete aimedaun.
Ikotosi kereka yesi akoko, ka aiar, ka adote, ka aiyapo nukaiŋal, ka aisupuronokin Baal lukisupurununo, ka atupanar da idekesio ice lumam lem ijenete,
kosodete aponare aibwo kakonyeneka togo lo, loemaikinitai ekakiror, kobalas ebe, ‘Kiyuunitai’; kiswamaenenete da italesia ŋul kere?
Araun ca ma etogo lo, loemaikinitai ekakiror, abua naka ikokolak kakonyenekus? Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Koany, eoŋ, eoŋ obe, aany ŋun.
Konye koloto do yesi aiboisika naajai Silo, naesiaunia eoŋ aisiboikin ekakiror, koanyut nueswamakinit Ŋes kanuka aronis naka ikatuŋa Isirael.
Ido ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Naarai ipotu kiswamata aswamisio ŋun kere, abu kener kayes, kadilok tupuruc kener, konye mam yes epupuno; kanyarit yes, konye mam ijito:
Ŋes konyet eswamakinia etogo loemaikinitai ekakiror, loimunosi yesi, ido aibois nakainak yes ka lukapapaakus, kwape eswamakinitor Silo.
Kacakari yes kakonyeneka, kwape acakaritor ikusiinacan kere, aur kere naka Epuraim.
Mam kereka jo ianyunit nuiswamaete kesi kotoma oreria luka Yuda korotin da luka Yerusalem?
Eraraete idwe akito, inokete lukapapakec akim, igurete aŋor da atap ailunulunanakinia akabaka naka akuj imugatin; ido ebukonokinete idekesio ice ainakineta numatan, tetere ketunyunyurikinete.
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Ketunyunyurikinete teni eoŋ? Mere kitunyunyurikinos bonik, aitadakar akwesikec?
Kanuka ŋun ebala EJAKAIT Edeke kwanata atiar, Koany, ebukokinio akanyunyura ka akaisiop aibois na, otuŋa, otiaŋ da okito lukomanikoria, ka araito da nuka alup; icwei ido mam itudeŋio.”
Naarai mam abu kener kalukapapaakus, kwabo mam ecorakinit kes kapaaran naketolomunia kes kakwap nako Misiri, nuka ainakineta nuicweio karaida asuban.
Konye kecorakinit kes akirot na ebe, ‘Kiiranarete ekaporoto, eoŋ da araun Edekekus, yes da iraunos ikatuŋa. Kolosenenete korot kere lokecorakini, tetere ijaunos ejok.’
Konye mam apotu kiirasi, mam apotu kitoikis akiikec, konye kolosenenete kainerunikec, kaninik naka itauonokec lueroko, kobononosi kau, mam apotu kiyatakis kiŋaren.
Ageun kapaaran naalomuniata lukapapaakus kakwap nako Misiri kiton lolo, kejukak yes ikakejaanakinak kere inabin, kadilonokin tupuruc aijukunun kes:
konye mam apotu keirasi, mam apotu kitoikis akiikec, konye kitininikata imurisiŋakec: kiswamata nueroko aitelekarit lukapapaakec.
Ilimokini kes ebe, ‘Na ŋes ateker namam eirarit eporoto loka EJAKAIT Edekekec, ido mam ecamunito aituutoorio: aolio abeit, egelaritai kaitukekec.
Kocaka neelwana,
Kikeseu akuudian kokuju neelapat;
Naarai aŋer EJAKAIT; ido ajal ituŋa luka atur naka anyunyurake.’
Adukoto aiboisio nuiceleleete nuka Topet, naejai aditot naka okoku loka Kinom, aicweia ikecedwe lusap ka lupesur kakim; numam ecorakinit, mam da aomisioitike alomarit otauka.
Aso do koany, ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Epote apaarasia, mam bobo enyaritai Topet, karaida Aditot naka okoku loka Kinom; dimarai Aditot naka Earit: naarai idaanakinete kesi Topet, naarai emamei apak kamace.
Eraunos atesina nuka ituŋa kalu akiriŋ naka akweny nuka apak, ka itiaŋ luka akwap; emameun yenetwaranari kes.
Kasodi eoŋ aitanaŋ koreria luka Yuda, korotin da luka Yerusalem, eporoto loka aitac ka eporoto da loka aiyalama, eporoto loka eteran ka eporoto da loka ateran: naarai eraun akwap naiswapit.”

Ebala EJAKAIT ebe: “Kapak kaŋin itolomunete akojo nuka ikabakan luka Yuda, ka akojo nuka ikapolokoke, ka akojo nuka isasedotin, ka akojo nuka inabin, ka akojo da nuka luiboiete ko Yerusalem, kailinakec:

eloikinete kes kakonyen nuka akoloŋ, ka elap, ka ajore kere naka akuj, nuaminas kesi, nukijaanakinete, nuatupenenete, nuamootos, nuamaete da: mam etukonokinio, karaida aidaio; eraunos kesi kwape aoret kalup.
Ebala EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe, Eseunio atwanare itia aijar kotoma aatoŋot kere naedeun naka ekek kalo lokaronon, luedeunos kaiboisio kere nukereŋearit kes.
“Bobo da ilimokini kes ebe, Ebala EJAKAIT kwanata ebe,
Ibiroros kereka ituŋa, komam enyounete bobo?
Eboŋori tope ituŋanan komam eboŋuni?
Iketakinito aiŋal, aŋeroto aboŋun.
Emamei yenitoronikin akeronis kinera ebe, ‘Ekwaik ai?’
Ibelokini ŋinituŋanan aboloboloke,
Kwape ebalasit loitokaar ojie.
Eŋicete eluke ka iporoidoliat ka ewalu da apak naka aponarekec;
Konye ikatuŋa mam ejenete ekisil loka EJAKAIT.
Ejai du ekisil loka EJAKAIT kaoni’?
Konye koany, akwara nakaiŋal naka ikewadikak etarau lokaiŋal.
Erumata lukacoa ileic, eburunito, ikamunitai:
Koany, aŋeroto akirot naka EJAKAIT;
Acoa anyoin ejai mamakec?
Imanikoriakec mama ejaas ŋul lukirumetc kes:
Naarai ageun ka loedit kakesi kiton lokapolon kakesi,
Eraŋani ŋinituŋanan aimedaun,
Ido ageun konabi kiton osasedoti
Emodi ŋinituŋanan.
Kobalas ebe, ‘Ainapakin, Ainapakin,’
Kereka emamei ainapakin.
Be! Mam cut erumito ileic,
Ido mam apedorete aitirir:
Kanuka ŋun ebiroros nepepe kaŋul luebiroros:
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe,
Kapak naeticania kes, elataros.
Naakotor aideŋ kes:
Emameete imusabibun komusabibu,
Karaida itinin kotini,
Erinyorito da akui;
Ido nuainakinit kes atuboros kamakec.”
Kotukonokinos, kalomasi oreria luebwaitai,
Keliliŋata kaŋina:
Naarai kisililiŋ EJAKAIT Edekewok oni,
Koinak oni akipi nuka epiu aimat,
Naarai kipou kadiakasi kama ejai EJAKAIT.
Kamunos apak naka aŋaleun, konye koany aburun!
“Epupunio aiŋoror naka ibalasinike koDan;
Eporoto loka aruo naka ikagogoŋokoke
Einakini akwap kere amaran;
Naarai apotu konyamata akwap ka luejaas tomake kere;
Ere, ka ŋul da luiboiete kotoma.
Naarai koany, ebala EJAKAIT ebe,
Ejukuni imunwo, asigirikoloŋa kotomakus,
Lumam elemelemeo, kitodotodoete yes.”
Wu okwe karai kapedor aitalakar bon kenyek aiturur!
Epirisiar etauka kotomaka.
Koany, eporoto loka aimony naka akoku naka ikatuŋa,
Kakwap naelwana noi:
“Emamei kereka EJAKAIT koSion?
Emamei ekabakake kotomake?”
“Kanukinyo ketunyunyurikiniata kaputosiakec nuegerer,
Ka aamameak da numo?”
“Atubor aidweny, adaun ejet,
Mam oni kitajaruna.”
Eoŋ da ebworo; Kekam aitirir.
Emamei emurwon kaŋina?
Aso kanukinyo mam eŋaleunio aijar naka akoku naka ikatuŋa?
Wu okwe arai kerai akouka akipi,
Akakonye da koraas ikico luka akiyo,
Tetere amonyenenei akiyo paaran ka akuar
Kanuka luearitai luka akoku naka ikatuŋa!
Arai kajai kaiyenet naka ikalotok kamodiŋ;
Tikajal ikatuŋa, anyoun kamakec!
Naarai eraas kere ludotia,
Atukot naka ituŋa kaluemodaka.
Agogonoros kakwap, konye mere kanuka abeit;
Naarai ebala EJAKAIT ebe,
Iwotonokinete anyoun karonis kiton aronis,
Mam kajenete.
Sirikimunokinos onace kere;
Naarai onace kere elomakini numere nuke
Elatonori ŋiniidunyet kasabanakin.
Emodete kesi ŋinituŋanan ekeidunyet,
Mam ineras nukabeit:
Esisianakis aŋajepakec einer nukaiŋal;
Itapasitos bonik aswam numam adolit
Ejai aiboisikon kidiŋ aimod;
Kanuka aimod ŋes agirioto ajenun eoŋ.
“Koany, acalari kes, egimori da;
Naarai ti kekwaik ai kanuka akoku naka ikatuŋa?
Aŋajepekec ŋes ekoj loeari; inera nuka aimod;
Inera ituŋanan kekeidunyet nuka ainapakin kaŋajepeke,
Konye kotauke eperunit ŋes.
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe,
Mam kereka eticani kes kanuka ŋun?
Mam ekatau inyaŋi ateker naikoni nen?
“Ageuni eoŋ aimony ka elulu da kanuka iroŋan,
Ido akuudian kanuka ironyia luka ais,
Naarai icweio tetere emamei yenitori nen:
Ido mam epedorete ituŋa akiirar eporoto loka ibaren;
Akera akweny nuka apak ka itiaŋ da, aloto.
Etarauni do Yerusalem aapoŋor,
Aibois naka ikuwei;
Etisiliori da ireria luka Yuda,
Komamei yeniboie kotoma.”
Ido ebala EJAKAIT ebe, “Naarai ajalata ikakisila luebwaikinit kakonyenekec, ido mam erimarito ekaporoto, ido mam elosenenete kotoma;
konye elosenenete kwape ejaar aninik naka itauonokec korupitos Ibaalin, lukisisianakinete lukapapaakec:
kanuka ŋun ebala kwanata EJAKAIT loka ajoresio, Edeke loka Isirael ebe, Koany, etanyami kes, ituŋa ŋupeŋul, aliasit nakadwaris, etamasi da akipi nuka epiu.
Esiarakini kes toma atekerin, numam lem kes ejenete karaida lukapapaakec: ejukari da ekileŋ atupakin kes, aitodol neamudiaria.”
“Koomoomata yesi, konyarautu aŋor nuibworos, kopotu:
Kijukasi anyaraun aŋor nuepiriaka, kopotu kesi da;
Koleleete akiyo kakonyekosi,
Kibwelibwelete akip kabukiokosi.
‘Kiŋasi cut! Kitirira noi;
Naarai kipou kenyeis akwap,
Naarai ebirosi ikositogoi.’ ”
Konye yes aŋor, kiirasi akirot naka EJAKAIT,
Kijaut akusiki akirot naka aŋajepeke,
Kisisianakis adwekus elulu,
Kisisianak ŋinituŋanan akeidunyet akuudian.
Naarai adoku atwanare kadirisanawok,
Aloma otogoiwok lukapolou;
Agela idwe kina,
Ka ikatumunak da korotin.
Kinerasi ebe, “Ebala EJAKAIT kwanata ebe:
Ibiroros atesina nuka ituŋa kwape aoret kamanat,
Ido kwape luedeunos akaulo kekasakan,
Emameun yenedei kes.”

Konye yeneolobobot koolobobote kana ebe kamisiikinit, ido kajeni eoŋ, ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT loeswamai nukasianut, nuketube, ka nukadolit da kakwap: naarai ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Kesiyalamikinito akiro ŋun.”
Misiri, ka Yuda, ka Edom, ka idwe luka Amon, ka Moab, ka ŋul kere da luekebeb itimakec, luiboiete kais: naarai atekerin ŋun kere mam ekepep, ekek da kere loka Isirael mam ekepep kotau,”
Wu ekek loka Isirael, kopuput akirot nakitemari EJAKAIT yes.
“Sirikisisiaut erot loka atekerin,
Sirikiburununut kanuka aanyuneta nuka akuj;
Naarai eburunito atekerin kanukec.
Naarai iponesio luka ituŋa eraas aamameak:
Naarai ejepep ekitoi kamagoro,
Aswam naka akanin nuka ekeswaman kaep.
Isirete kesi ŋes kepuesa, ka esabu;
Iketakinete kaseito ka anyulia,
Tetere mam ilokulokun.
Ibusakinit adakio, naarai mam epedorete alosit,
Sirikuriaka kes;
Naarai mam epedorete aswam aronis,
Ido emamei tomakec aswam nuejok.”
Ipol ijo, epol da ekonikiror kotoma apedor.
Naarai kibusakinit:
Naarai kotoma lukacoa kere luka atekerin
Ido kotoma ajakanutokec kere,
Emamei cut yenerianas kajo.
Konye eraas kwape itiaŋ ido ebaŋabaŋato;
Aisisianakin aputosia, erai ekomio atai.
Ka esabu loeyaunitai koupas,
Aswam naka ekeswaman, ka akanin nuka ekatatan esabu;
Enapitos igoen lubululu ka lumugeik;
Eraas kere aswam naka ituŋa luepiriaka.
Erai ŋesi Edeke lokajaran, ekabaka lomam edaun:
Akenyunyura da isimarani akwap,
Mam epedorete atekerin atitiŋikin akeisiop.
Ilimokini kes kwanata ebe, “Idekesio lumam kesubete akuj ka akwap, eoliorete kakwap, ido kokwap kakuj.”
Kanuka acoake abu kiticat akwap,
Kanuka aijeneke abu kopesik akuj.
Naikeseunia eporotoke, ejai airurum naka akipi toma akuj,
Itonyouni elisina kosaŋeta luka akwap;
Iswamakini akiru eimilia,
Itolomuni da ekwam kaiŋadisiake.
Erai ŋinituŋanan bala itiaŋ, emamei aijen;
Aputoke naegerer isurumi ŋolikatatan esabu ileic:
Naarai aputoke naecalara erai aiŋal,
Emamei eiyeŋane kotomakec.
Eraas aamameak, aswam naka aiŋal:
Kapak naka aiticaniokec eoliorete.
Naarai erai ŋesi lokasuban iboro kere;
Isirael da ŋes ateker naka airumeteke:
EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ŋes ekekiror.
Kotukonok iborokon kokwap,
Ijo loiboie kore loirigaunitai.
“Koany, aporocari luiboiete kakwap kapak kana,
Etuburuni kes, koriebakinos.”
Akamusuŋut kesiriebi noi.
Konye kabala ebe, “Abeit ŋin ŋes akadek,
Kebusakinit da atitiŋikin.”
Aŋatar ewemaka, aŋedas aunoika kere:
Anyout idweka kamaka, ido emameete:
Emamei yeneterari bobo ekawema,
Asipokin aigalisioka.
Naarai araut ikecokok itiaŋ,
Kwabo mam apotu kiŋitata EJAKAIT:
Kanuka ŋun ŋes mam kekeriakarotor;
Esiarakinos isipaninikec kere.
Eporoto loka eemut! Koany ebuni,
Autaar naepol naebuni kakwap naka agolitomei,
Aitisilior ireria luka Yuda,
Aitaraun aibois naka ikuwei.
Emamei kotoma otuŋanan yenelosi aitetenar akekeje.
Mere kakoninyunyura, kinyek aitidisiar.
Atekerin da numam iwoneete ekonikiror;
Naarai anyamasi Yakob;
Eebo, anyamasi, adautu ŋes, etisilioto aiboisike.
Akirot naabu kobu mama ejai Yeremia kama ejai EJAKAIT ebe,
“Kiirasi yesi akiro nuka aitutuket na, kolimokis ituŋa luka Yuda, ka luiboiete ko Yerusalem.
Kolimok ijo kes ebe, Ebala kwanata EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael ebe, Kikenoi ituŋanan yenimam epupi akiro nuka aitutuket kana,

nakecorakinit lukapapaakus kapaaran naketolomunia kes kakwap nako Misiri, koupa loka asuat, enera ebe, Korimarito ekaporoto, kiswamata kwape ejaatar kere nukecorakinit yes: kwaŋin iraunos ikatuŋa, eoŋ da araun Ekusideke.
Tetere eticasi aiyaposit nakeyapoikinit lukapapaakus, ainakin kes akwap naeleleete akile ka esik, kwape lolo.” Kasodi eoŋ aboŋokin ebe, “Kikote nepenen, wu EJAKAIT.”
Naarai abu ketejenik noi lukapapaakus kapaaran naketolomunia kes kakwap nako Misiri, kiton lolo, kadilonokin tupuruc ido ketejenikini ebe, Korimarito ekaporoto.

Konye mam apotu korimasi, ido man apotu kitoikis akiikec, konye kolosenenete ŋinituŋanan kaninik naka etauke lokaronon: kanuka ŋun ketebeik kes akiro kere nuka aitutuket kana, nukecorakinit kes aswam, konye mam apotu kiswamata.”

Aboŋosi mama ejaas numam adolit nuka lukapapaakec, luapotu kogiroto apupun akakiro; atupasi kesi icedekesio aijaanakin: abilata ekek loka Isirael ka ekek loka Yuda akaitutuket naketutukit kalukapapaakec.
Kanuka ŋun ebala EJAKAIT kwanata ebe, Koany, ayaun aronis mamakec, namam epedorete ainac; karaida kamonyakis, konye mam eoŋ eirari kes.
Kosodete ireria luka Yuda ka luiboiete koYerusalem alosit amonyakin idekesio luisupuronokino lukisupurununo: konye mam cut itajarete kes kapak naka icanikec.
Naarai kwape imwatatar ireriakon, imwaasi kwaŋin ikonidekesio da, ijo Yuda; ido kwape imwatatar irotin luka Yerusalem, ipotu kosipokis ileic itemwan, kes itemwan aisupurikin Baal lukisupurununo.
Inyo bo ejaar naminataka togoka, naarai eswama nukasilianut? Epedorete kereka aiyaposio ka akiriŋ nakalaunan aituku yes katwanare? Ipedorete kereka eibwoŋ?
Abu EJAKAIT komaik jo ekiror ‘Eseitun loepesit, loejok karaito nuejok’. Keporoto loka ecelet loepol enokoki akim, abilasi da atenunake.

Naarai abu EJAKAIT loka ajoresio lokiraikini jo kolim aronis kamakon, kanuka aronis naka ekek loka Isirael, ka naka ekek loka Yuda, nakiswamakinos bonik ketunyunyurikis eoŋ kanuka aisupuronokin Baal lukisupurununo.”
Ketejenik EJAKAIT eoŋ, kajen:
Kosodi ijo aitodikin eoŋ aswamisiokec.
Mam abu kajen ebe enerut kaiyeiyea asurokin eoŋ,
Kobalasi ebe, “Kamudiasi ekitoi ka araitoke da,
Kagelasi ŋes kakwap naka lukajarak,
Tetere mam bobo iitunio ekekiror.”
Loigimori aomisio ka etau,
Kinye ber kaany enyaŋitikon kamakec:
Naarai kekuiok jo akakirot.
Kanuka ŋun ebala kwanata EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe, “Koany, eticani kes: etwakete ikatumunak kekileŋ: etwakete ikecedwe da lusap ka lupesur eteŋei.
Ido mam luideunos kakesi: naarai ayauni aronis kotuŋa luka Anatot, kokaru loka aiticaniokec.”
Konye akoto apurokin bon kamakon akiro:
Kanukinyo ekerianaror erot loka ikaronok?
Kanukinyo ijamamaata kere luiswamaenenete noi nuka aimod?
Epoloete, eebo, eraete araito:
Iapiei ijo kaitukekec,
Ilwanikina da kaomisiokec.
Kiany eoŋ, igimori ekatau kamakon:
Kiriu kes kwape amerekekin nuaarat,
Kotiak kes kanuka apaaran naka earit.
Akui da nuka akwap kere arinyor?
Kanuka aronis naka ŋul kaluiboiete kotoma
Ŋes edaunotor itiaŋ ka akweny;
Naarai ebakai ebe, “Mam ŋes eanyuni esanewok lokokau.”
Ikwaikini ai ipedori abolobol kibalasin?
Ido arai ilatara ijo kakwap naka ainapakin,
Ikwaikini ca ai kaiturokina naka Yorodan?
Naarai ikoniinacan, ka ekek loka papakon,
Ŋupeŋul kiswamakinete nuka aimod;
Ŋupeŋul kiluluoto jo:
Sirikiyu kes, karaida kiinerakis jo akiro nukajokak.”
“Ajal etogoka, acaka airumeteka;
Ainak naemin ekatau noi akan naka lukasurupoke.
Ekeseu ekeporoto asurokin eoŋ;
Ŋes alaia ŋes.
Erai kereka airumeteka kamakaŋ kwape ekweny loeerepus loemejai?
Irigaunete kereka ŋes ikweny luemeiaete asurokin?
Koloto yesi, kotukonokis itiaŋ kere luka ais,
Koyautu kes konyamasi.
Kipudapudata ewaika kakeje,
Kitaraut ewaika loejok ais naesil.
Ibworo mama ajai naarai esil;
Itisilioritai akwap kere,
Naarai emamei ituŋanan yenibwaikinit etau.
Adoloto ikaŋatak kuju neelapat toma ais:
Naarai iŋinyari ekileŋ loka EJAKAIT ageun kosaŋe ediopet loka akwap kiton osaŋe ece loka akwap;
Emamei akuan nainapakina.
Itapasitos atai, mam imedaunete:
Kisurumito araitokus yes ileic,
Kanuka anyunyura naededeŋ naka EJAKAIT.”
Kosodi kanen, kadau arutor kes, aboŋuni etimi kes: ido enyakakini kes, ŋinituŋanan airumeteke, ŋinituŋanan da alupoke.

Kosodi kanen, arai edunyaka kesi aisisia iponesio luka ikatuŋa, iyapoete kolimito ekakiror ebe, ‘Kwape ejaria EJAKAIT’, kwape esisianakiniata kesi ikatuŋa aiyapo kolimito Baal; ŋes konyet edukokinere kidiŋ kikatuŋa.
Konye ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Arai mam epupete, kasodi eoŋ arutor ateker ŋin, arutori ido amudiari.”
Kabala EJAKAIT kwanata ebe, “Kolot kogwel aenet naka ebaputa, konapak aŋabetekon, mam idomakin akipi.”
Abu do kagwel aenet kwape kejaar akirot naka EJAKAIT, kanapak aŋabeteka.
Kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai nakiareit ebe,
“Koya aenet naigwelit, naejai aŋabetekon, konyou kolot Eupurate, kibwa kaŋina kobur loka atiida.”
Kwaŋin do kalot, kebwa ŋes kariri naka Eupurate, kwape kecorakinia EJAKAIT.
Kosodi kanen, ketuboros apaarasia nuipu, kabala EJAKAIT ebe, “Konyou, kolot Eupurate, kolem kaŋina aenet, nakecorakinit jo aibwa kaŋina.”
Kasodi eoŋ alosit Eupurate, kabok, kalem aenet kaibois kama kebwaitor: ido koany, emunaara aenet amamei ajokis.
Kosodi akirot naka EJAKAIT abunore mama ajai ebe,
“Ebala EJAKAIT kwanata ebe, Amunaari kwape kwaŋin aiturokina naka Yuda, ka aiturokina naepol naka Yerusalem.
Ituŋa lu lukaronok, lueŋerete akiirar akakiro, luelosenenete kaninik naka itauonokec, luetupasi idekesio ice aijaanakin, ka aima kes, eraunos kesi kwape aenet na, naemamei ajokis.

Naarai ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Kwape iketakinor aenet aŋabet naka ituŋanan, kwape kwaŋin kesiketikinia ekek kere loka Isirael ka ekek kere loka Yuda, tetere eraunos kamakaŋ ateker, ka ekiror, ka aiturit, ka aibuses da: konye koŋeroto akiirar.
“Kanuka ŋun ilimokini kes akirot na ebe: Ebala kwanata EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael ebe, ‘Ilelebio ŋinimot ebino.’ Kilimokinete jo ebe, ‘Mam ca sio kijeni ebe, ilelebio ŋinimot ebino?’

Kosodi ijo atemar kes ebe, ‘Ebala EJAKAIT kwanata ebe, Koany, esilelebi emeret luiboiete kere kakwap kana, ikabakan luiboiete koicoloŋ loka Daudi, ka isasedotin, ka inabin, ka luiboiete da kere koYerusalem.
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Esinaŋanakini kes, lukapapa ka idwekec nepepe. Mam etimi, karaida aideun, karaida aisioni, komam amudiarit kes.’ ”
Sirikipogakinos naarai ener EJAKAIT.
Eriŋa eyauna amuton,
Ido eriŋa iguikina akusikeje
Koroŋan luka aikamus;
Ido naimoiata aica,
Kituluo etoribe loka atwanare,
Kitarau da amuton nairiono cucucuc.
Konye arai iŋerete apupun,
Emonyi ekatau kaiyeiyea kanuka akusiiwoŋonut;
Emonyete noi akakonyen, eleleete da akiyo,
Naarai ijoreoritai esipan loka EJAKAIT.
Naarai itisilitai nuinapito kakwes,
Aboko naka aibusesukus.”
Emamei da yeneŋaari kes:
Yuda kere ijoreoritai;
Ijoreoritai cut kere.
Ali bo esipan lokiinakinitai,
Ekonisipan loejok noi?
Anyoika nuinera naedakakinia ŋesi ipaperokon kujukon,
Naarai jo elopet isisianakinit kes asurokin jo?
Mam tope kikamuni jo aiturur,
Kwape aberu naeriebi aidoun?
‘Kanukinyo kadoikinioto akiro nu?’
Kanuka ailiil naka numam adolitekon
Ŋes epukorere ikonigoen,
Eriebatar akonititiban kakaje.
Epedori kereka Etiopiat aijulakin amunyoke,
Arai bo eris aijulakin amerianutuke?
Kosodete yesi aswam nuejok
Luinaikinito aswam nueroko.
Kanuka ŋun ŋes esiarisiaria kes,
Kwape agugu nuekutari ekwam loka ais.
Akorakinet naketemokinit jo;
Naarai kimurwokinit eoŋ, komunokina aiŋal.
Kotakanut ileicikon.
Ka adoteukon, ka aicicinakon,
Ka asilianut naka adoteukon,
Koukon luka ais.
Itukwi ijo Yerusalem!
Itodolete ai eriŋa kitalauna?”
Akirot naka EJAKAIT naabu kobu mama ejai Yeremia nuka ekure:
Iboiete iketuŋa kokwap, kokuudianete;
Ekear aimony naka Yerusalem.
Edolete atapar, mam edumunete akipi;
Eboŋunete ewokito amotiikec;
Irumito ileic itiriraete,
Imukorete akwesikec.
Kanuka alup nuecilicilas,
Naarai emamei akiru naetepi akwap,
Irumito ikakoriok ileic,
Imukorete akwesikec.
Eebo, ewurie amori kais, ejali ikokuke,
Naarai emameete inya.
Iyenanakinos adumunia ekwam kwape ikuwei;
Ewariwarete akonyekec,
Naarai emameete ikui.
Kiswama ijo kanuka ekonikiror, wu EJAKAIT:
Naarai ipu akosiboŋonoreta kau;
Kidiaka isio kama ijai.
Eketajaranike kapak naka ican,
Kanukinyo ti kiraunia kwape loiboiororor kakwap,
Ido kwape ekaloton loepaari aidareun akwap aiwalar?
Kwape lokirigi lomam epedori aitajar?
Konye jo, wu EJAKAIT, ijai kidiŋikosi,
Kimaikinitai ekonikiror;
Sirikijal sio.”
“Kwape kwaŋin aminas airim:
Mam kitikokinito akejekec:
Ŋes mam EJAKAIT ecamakinia kes;
Iitunit kwana numam adolitekec, Iticani aronisiokec.”
Arai ikanyete eteŋei, mam apupuni aimonyokec; arai da einakinete ainakineta nuicweio ka ainakineta nuka akiria, mam acamuni kes: konye apiari kes kekileŋ, ka eteŋei, ka atular da.”
Kasodi eoŋ ebe, “Wu okwe, EJAKAIT Edeke, koany, elimonokinete inabin kes ebe, ‘Mam ianyunete ekileŋ, mam da ijaunete keteŋei; konye ainakini yes ainapakin naicasit kaibois kana.’ ”

Kosodi EJAKAIT atemar eoŋ atiar, “Edwareteinabin nukaiŋal kokirorika; mam eoŋ ejukarit kes, mam abu kecorak kes, karaida einer kakes: kidwarakinete yes aitapoet nakaiŋal, ka aidwar naatai, ka aimod naka itauonokec bonik.
Kanuka ŋun ebala kwanata EJAKAIT nuka inabin luedwarete kokirorika, komam eoŋ ejukarit kes, konye ebalasi ebe, ‘Mam ejaunos ekileŋ ka eteŋei kakwap kana’, ebe: Epiari ekileŋ ka eteŋei inabin ŋul.
Ituŋa da luedwarakinete kesi ireŋearitai korotin luka Yerusalem kanuka eteŋei ka ekileŋ: emamikinete luidaete kes, kes ka aŋorokec ka idwekec lusap ka lupesur. Naarai abukokini kes aronisikec.
Koleleata akiyo kakonyeka,
Kuare kapaaran da, komam esaŋete;
Naarai apaki akoku nabekot naka ikatuŋa arorwa naepol,
Amusuŋut naerono noi.
Arai alomari ore,
Aso koany, luedekasi eteŋei!
Naarai irimorete enabi ka esasedoti kere akwap,
Komamei kes aijen.”
Ala cut ekonitau Sion?
Kanukinyo kidanyere sio,
Komamei sio aŋaleun?
Kipou kamunos ainapakin,
Konye mam ajokis ebuno;
Kimunos apak naka aŋaleun, ido koany aburun!
Ka numam adolit da nuka lukapapaakosi:
Naarai kipou kadiakasi kama ijai.
Sirikitisil eicoloŋ loka aibusesukon:
Kiitu, sirikibil aitutuketekon kasio.
Epedori cabo akuj ayaun elimilim?
Mere jo ŋopeŋol, wu EJAKAIT Edekekosi?
Ŋes kidaria jo;
Naarai isubi ijo iboro ŋul kere.
Kosodi kanen arai kitemarete jo atiar, ‘Ai bo kilomaria?’ Ŋes konyet ilimokinia kes ebe, ‘Ebala EJAKAIT kwanata ebe:
Lukatular neejai atular;
Lukekileŋ, neejai ekileŋ;
Luketeŋei neejai eteŋei:
Ido luijoreorio neejai aijoreorio.’ ”
Ainakini kes aisiarakinio toma ajakanuto kere nuka akwap, kanuka Manase okoku loka Kesekia ekabaka loka Yuda, kanueswamat ŋesi koYerusalem.
Iŋai gwai kikuudiani jo?
Iŋai gwai epauni aiŋitun akonikiro?
Iboŋonori kau:
Ŋes arioria akakan asurokin jo, ka amudiar;
Kapas eoŋ akiitunun.
Alema idwekec, amudia ikatuŋa;
Mam apotu koboŋut korotinikec.
Etupuu apuserunukec aitelekarit asine naka aŋololin:
Ayau mamakec ekamudiaran paaran asurokin nukatoto nuka ikatumunak:
Etodoikin kes katipet aditar ka nuketasuro.
Apal aijarake;
Aloma akoloŋoke eriŋa erai paaran;
Isurumio ileic itirirai.
Ido ebala EJAKAIT ebe,
Ejaikini aatoŋotokec okileŋ kakonyen nuka lukasurupokec.”
Kobala EJAKAIT ebe, Abeit ketogogoŋi jo kanuka ajokis; abeit ainakini lokasurup aiŋaiŋa jo kapak naka aronis, kapak da naka aiticanitoi.
Epedori kereka ituŋanan aibil asuat, asuat naebuni kagolitomei, ka aisinit?
Kainakini yes aijaanakin lukasurupokus kakwap namam ijenete: naarai inepunit akim kakanyunyura, nakicweikini yes.”
Kiitunoi, koanyanarai,
Kinyaŋakinai kama ejaas ikareitokoka;
Sirikiiyaŋa eoŋ kotoma atitiŋukon:
Kojen ebe kamoromoroi eoŋ kanukon.
Keraas akirokon kamaka ailel ka aiyalama naka etauka;
Naarai kamaikinitai ekirorikon,
Wu EJAKAIT Edeke loka ajoresio.
Mam abu kalel:
Abu keboi bon kanuka akanikon;
Naarai ibu kilelebik eoŋ akadakin.
Akamusuŋut da mam eŋaleunio,
Naenerit aimukeo?
Iraun ijo kamakaŋ kwape aguurut naeŋalai,
Kwape akipi nueonikinito?
“Arai iboŋuni, kasodi eoŋ ainyakun jo,
Tetere ibwoi kakonyeneka.
Arai da ilemuni nuka akais nuipu kotoma nuutai,
Iraun do kwape akaituk.
Eboŋunete kesi mamakon,
Konye mam jo iboŋori mamakec.
Ketaraun jo arwatat naebwaitai naka aisinit
Mama ejaas ituŋa lu;
Ijiikinos kajo, konye mam kipikorete;
Naarai ebala EJAKAIT ebe,
Ajaenena kajo aitajar jo,
Ido ayuun jo.
Kalakuni da kakan naka luketasuro.”
Ido kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai ebe:
“Sirikimany aberu, kwabo mam iwurikini idwe lusap ka lupesur aibois na.
Naarai ebala kwanata EJAKAIT nuka idwe lusap ka lupesur lukeurikinio aibois na, ido nuka nukatotokec nukeuriete kes, ido nuka lukapapakec lukeurikinete kes kakwap kana ebe:

etwakete kanuka adekesia nueroko. Emamuunete luekuudianete kes, karaida aida kes; eraunos kwape aoret kakwap. Ekileŋ ka eteŋei kes epiarete kes; eraunos atesinakec inyamat luka akweny nuka apak, ka itiaŋ da luka akwap.
Etwakikinete lukapolok ka ludidik akwap na: mam idaio, ido mam ituŋa ekuudianete kes, karaida ager, ido mam ebarenete akwesikec kanukec.
Mam ituŋa einarete kes atap ibworosi, aipudun kes kanuka lukatwak; ido mam ituŋa einakinete kes adere naka aitalakaar amasia kanuka papakec arai kanuka totokec.
Ido sirikiloma togo loenyamiata epucit, aiboikin kakes, ainyam ka aimat.

Naarai ebala kwanata EJAKAIT loka ajoresio, Edeke loka Isirael ebe: Koany, etanaŋi kaibois kana, kakonyenekus, ido kotoma apaarasiakus, eporoto loka aitac, ka eporoto da loka aiyalama, eporoto loka eteran ka eporoto da loka ateran.
Kosodi ijo atemar kes atiar: ‘Naarai ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Apotu lukapapaakus kajalata eoŋ, kotupata idekesio ice, kijaanakis kes, komaata kes, kajalata eoŋ, komam ericito ikakisila.
Iswamata yesi da nukaronok adepar lukapapaakus; naarai koany ituparete yesi ŋinituŋanan aninik naka eketau loerono, iŋeroto apupun eoŋ.
Kanuka ŋun kereŋeari yes kakwap kana alomar akwap namam lem ijenete, yes ka lukapapaakus da; kaŋina da ipote aijaanakin idekesio ice paaran ka kuare da; naarai mam ketodikini yes asianut nepetai da.’
“Kanuka ŋun, koany, ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Mam bobo ebakai ebe, ‘Kwape ejaria EJAKAIT lokitolomuni idwe luka Isirael kakwap nako Misiri’;
konye ebe, ‘Kwape ejaria EJAKAIT lokitolomuni idwe luka Isirael kakwap naka agolitomei, ido kakwapin kere kama ereŋearit.’ Naarai enyakuni kes akwapukec naabu kainak lukapapaakec.
Naarai esesenete akakonye irotinikec kere: mam eŋopito kakonyeneka, ido numam adolitekec mam imunonounos kakonyeka.
Ido esiauni ber atacakin irwan aarei numam adolitekec ka aronisikec, naarai etisiloto akwapuka katesin nuka ikeceboro luketal, elelebata kesi airumeteka kitalesiakec.”
Neakerianari kapaaran naka ican,
Epote atekerin mamakon anyoun kosaŋeta nuka akwap,
Ebalasi ebe, “Mam lukapapaakosi irumito idiobore dimarai nukaiŋal,
Aamameak ka akiro numam imedaunete.
Mam ŋul eraas idekesio!”
“Kanuka ŋun, koany, etejenikini kes, irwan na atipet etejenikini kes akanika ka apedorika; ejenunete kesi ebe ekakiror ŋes EJAKAIT.”
Kapak naiitunioto ikecedwe itemwanakec ka Aserimikec, kama ejaas ikito luepesito, koukon da luiceleleete,
koroŋan da luka ais. Ainakini ikoniboro ka abarakon kere aŋatario, aiboisiokon nuiceleleete kanuka aronis, anatar iikorunokon kere.
Ijo da ipaluni kama ejai airumetekon naabu kainakinite jo; kainakini jo aijaanakin lukasurupokon kakwap namam ijeni: naarai esinepu akanyunyura akim naicweenenei ikar kere.”
“Kikenoi ituŋanan yenemunokina ituŋanan,
Yenitaraun akuan akekan,
Eketau da enyoununei kama ejai EJAKAIT.
Mam eanyuni neeponiata nukajokak.
Iboikini aiboisio nuilarioŋoŋos nuka ais,
Akwap naka abalaŋ naemameete ituŋa.
Ido EJAKAIT ŋes akemun.
Loisiliarit aliasioke ocor,
Kwabo mam eyoŋi akoloŋ keca noi,
Konye eribiribete akekui;
Kwabo mam iyaloŋoŋoi kokaru loka ekure,
Kwabo mam inyeini aira araito.”
Ido epol akedek noi:
Iŋai bo epedori ajenun ŋes?
Ainakini ŋinituŋanan kwape ejaatar ikeponesio,
Kwape ejaatar da araito nuka akeswamisio.”
Ikoni nen yenetukonokin abar, kwabo mere kotoma abeit;
Kokidiŋ kapaarasiake etiakas kakes,
Kawasiake da eraun ibaŋ.
Eicoloŋ lokaibuses loitopolooritai ameun kageunet,
Ŋes aiboisiwok nakalaunan.
Lukinyeinete ijo kere irumete rwaru ileic;
Lukenyounete kere kaneijai iwadikao toma alup,
Naarai enyeis EJAKAIT,
Atan naka akipi nukajarak.
Kitaŋaleunoi, wu EJAKAIT, ido aŋaleuni;
Kitajarai, ido etajaruun;
Naarai ijo ekaituritono.
“Ai ca ejai akirot naka EJAKAIT?
Kobu cabo!”
Eoŋ da mam abu kesunyak ainyein araun ekecokon atupit jo;
Mam abu kemiela apaaran naka epola;
Ijeni ijo;
Nualomunete kaitukuka ajaenenas akonyenekon.
Sirikirau loketasuro kamaka:
Ijo neekerianarakan kapaaran naka aronis.
Kirumata ileic lukareito,
Konye eoŋ kenyeis ileic airum;
Koburut kes,
Konye eoŋ kenyek aburun:
Kitodolik kes apaaran naka aronis;
Komudia kes kamudiar naka airucakin!
Kabala EJAKAIT eoŋ kwanata ebe: “Kolot, kobwo korute loka idwe luka ituŋa, neelomununiata ikabakan luka Yuda neelomanariata da, korutei kere luka Yerusalem.
Kolimok kes ebe: Kiirasi yesi akirot naka EJAKAIT, yes ikabakan luka Yuda, ka Yuda kere, ka luiboiete kere koYerusalem, luelomununete korutei kalu.
Ebala EJAKAIT kwanata ebe: Kocoito bonik, siribwokenenete lubwokon kapaaran naka asabato, karaida aitolomun korutei luka Yerusalem.
Ido siribwokenenete lubwokon aitolomun kotogoikus kapaaran naka asabato, sirikiswamata adioswam kere: konye kitalaut apaaran nakasabato, kwape kecorakinitor lukapapaakus.
Konye mam kes apotu kiirasi, karaida aitoikin akiikec, konye kitininikata imurisiŋakec, kinyeis akiirar, kinyeis da aituutoorio.

“Kosodi kanen, ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Arai idunyakinito akiiranar eoŋ, komam itolomununete lubwokon kere korutei luka ere kala kapaaran nakasabato, konye italaunete apaaran nakasabato, komam iswamaete adioswam kere kapaaran kaŋin,

ŋes konyet elomununiata korutei luka ere kalo ikabakan ka ikapolok luiboikinos oicoloŋ loka Daudi, ibwanenito agalin ka ibalasin, kes ka ikapolokokec, ituŋa luka Yuda, ka luiboiete da ko Yerusalem: ejaenena ere lo ikar kere.

Epote kesi koreria luka Yuda, kaiboisio da nuirimorito Yerusalem, kakwap naka Benyamin, kapuutona, koroŋan, ka Eŋalakimak da, eyaunete ainakineta nuicweio, ka asuban ka ainakineta nuka akiria, ka lukisupurununo, ido eyaunete asuban nuka aimal, togo loka EJAKAIT.

Konye arai kiŋeroto akiirar eoŋ komam italaunete apaaran nakasabato, ibwokete da lubwokon ilomunete korutei luka Yerusalem kapaaran nakasabato; kasodi eoŋ ainokokin akim koruteike, epiari da itogoi lukapolou luka Yerusalem, komam ituduŋeori.”
Akirot naabu kobu mama ejai Yeremia kama ejai EJAKAIT, ebe:
“Konyou, kijesar togo loka ekajean, kaŋina da kesiirari jo akakiro.”
Kasodi eoŋ aijesar togo loka ekajean, ido koany, iswamai akeswam kokokoroke.
Ido naemunaunor amot naiswamai ŋesi kelupe kakan naka ekajean, kirueakini bobo aije amot ace, kwape itojokitor ekajean aije.
Kosodi kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai ebe:
“Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Wu jo ekek loka Isirael, mam kereka apedori eoŋ aiswamakin yes kwape eswamaa ekajean lo? Koany, kwape elupe kakan naka ekajean, ikoni ijo nen kakanika, ijo ekek loka Isirael.
Kapak kaŋin naenerar nuka ateker, ka nuka ajakanut, arutun ka abilibil ka amudiar da;
arai ibelokin ateker ŋin, naabu kenerite nuke, ainyein aronisike, eitokini aronis naalosikinit aiswamakin kes.
Ido kapak kaŋin naenerar nuka ateker ka nuka ajakanut, aiduk ka aira ŋes;
arai kiswama aronis kakonyeneka, komam erimari eporotoka, kasodi eoŋ aiitokin ajokis naabu kener aitojok ŋes.

Aso do kolot, kolimok ituŋa luka Yuda, ka luiboiete ko Yerusalem ebe: ‘Ebala kwanata EJAKAIT ebe: Koany, etemok aronis mama ijaas, eneru akirot asurokin yes. Koboŋutu do yesi, ŋinituŋanan korotoke lokaronon, kitojokata ikusirotin ka aswamisiokus da.’
“Konye etemarete ebe, ‘Emamei amun: naarai kitupi akirokosi, kiswamai da ŋinituŋanan kwape ejaar aninik naka eketau lokaronon.’
Kinitiŋita yesi atekerin,
Iŋai epupunit akiro nuikote nen?
Eswama abekot naka Isirael akirot nasogim noi.
Epedori kereka akaka naka Lebanon aimijar katiida naka ais?
Eonikinete kereka akip nuelilim nueleleunete kama elwana?
Apotu kisupurikis aamameak lukisupurununo;
Kitiguikis kes korotinikec, kosokono lumojoŋ,
Atubitoi kokitui, nemam erot itutut.
Ka aijuar namam enaŋi.
Eumokini ŋinituŋanan yenitori nen,
Kimuŋimuŋi akouke.
Kwape kekwam lokokide:
Etodikini kes ekapur konye mere akakonyen,
Kapaaran naka epolakec.”
Kibwaikinai eoŋ etau, wu EJAKAIT,
Kiira eporoto loka ŋul kaluketoŋolopete eoŋ.
Naarai abokikis akaijar aipany.
Kiitu kwape kabwoia kakonyenekon ainerakin kes ajokis,
Aibelokin akoninyunyura kamakec.
Kanuka ŋun kijaik ikecedwe oteŋei,
Kokorak kes apedor naka ekileŋ;
Aŋorokec kotwakiasi ikecedwe, koraut da apuserun.
Kotularos ikecekiliok,
Kodany ekileŋ ikecekatumunak kojie.
Kopupunoi aimony kotogoikec,
Naisituriaikinia kes erioŋet!
Naarai abokata aipany alokia eoŋ,
Ebwaata atacin aisipokia akakeje.
Sirikisioni numam adolitekec,
Sirikimwata da aronisikec kakonyenekon.
Konye kolatarai kes kakonyenekon;
Kitepesen kes kapak naka anyunyurakon.
koloma neejai aditot naka okoku loka Kinom, naejai eiduny neelomarere orute loka Atiboloka, kitatam kaŋina akiro nukalimokini jo.

Kinera ebe, ‘Kopuputu yesi akirot naka EJAKAIT, yes ikabakan luka Yuda, ka luiboiete koYerusalem. Ebala kwanata EJAKAIT loka ajoresio, Edeke loka Isirael ebe, Koany, ayauni aronis aibois na, naisideloori aki nuka ŋinituŋanan yeniirari.

Naarai kajalata eoŋ, amunaut aibois na, kisupurununut lukisupurununo kotomake mama ejaas idekesio ice, lumam lem ejenete, kes ka lukapapaakec, ka ikabakan luka Yuda; kilelebata aibois na kaokot nuka lumam akirot.
Apotu kodukoto aiboisio nuiceleleete nuka Baal, aicweia ikecedwe kakim araun ainakineta nuicweio nuka Baal: numam eoŋ kecorakinit, karaida einer, mam da aomisioitike alomarit otauka.
Kanuka ŋun koany, ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Epote apaarasia numam bobo aibois na enyaritere Topet, karaida Aditot naka okoku loka Kinom, konye Aditot naka Earit.

Etapaluni ainerun naka Yuda ka Yerusalem kaibois kana; ebirokin eoŋ da kes kekileŋ kakonyen nuka lukasurupokec, kakan da naka ŋul kaluemootos aijarakec. Ainakini atesinakec araun akiriŋ naka akweny nuka apak, ka itiaŋ da luka akwap.
Etarauni ere lo aumokinet, ka aijuar; eumokini ŋinituŋanan yenitori nen, isuari kanuka aiticanitoike kere.
Ainakini kes konyama awat nuka idwekec lusap ka lupesur, ŋinituŋanan konyam akuan naka opaperoke, kirigaunitete, kicikakinitete, kanekicikakinete lukasurupokec, ka ŋul da luemootos akeceijar.’

ilimokini kes ebe, ‘Ebala kwanata EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe: Abwaŋi kwape kwaŋin ituŋa lu ka ere lo, kwape ebwaŋia ituŋanan amot naka ekajean, namam bobo epedorio aipucakin. Ido idaikinete ituŋa Topet, naarai emamikini aibois kamace.
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Eswamakini kwape kwaŋin aibois na, ka luiboiete kotoma, aituputoor ere lo kwape Topet.

Ido itogoi luka Yerusalem, ka itogoi luka ikabakan luka Yuda, luamunaaros, eraunos kwape aibois naka Topet, itogoi kere luesupurununere lukisupurununo oswionokec mama ejai ajore kere naka akuj, kobukokis icedekesio ainakineta numatan,’ ”
“Ebala kwanata EJAKAIT loka ajoresio, Edeke loka Isirael ebe, Koany, ayauni ore lo ka ireriake kere aronis kere naenerak ŋes; naarai apotu kitininikata imurisiŋakec, aŋeroto apupun akiroka.”
Kosodi Pasur aile Yeremia enabi, kibwaik ŋes oloit loejai orute lomukur loka Benyamin, loajai togo loka EJAKAIT.
Kosodi kanen kapaaran naatupakini, kitolom Pasur Yeremia koloit. Kosodi Yeremia atemar ŋes atiar, “Mam EJAKAIT kimaikinit ekonikiror Pasur, konye Etasuro kowaitin kere.

Naarai ebala EJAKAIT kwanata ebe: Koany, etaraun jo etasuro kamakon elopet, ido kama ejaas ipaperokon kere. Ibiroros kekileŋ loka lukasurupokec, eanyunete da akonyekon. Ainakini Yuda kere akan naka ekabaka loko Babulon; ijoreori kes Babulon, eari kes kekileŋ.

Bobo da, ainakini abar kere naka ere kalo, ka amedake kere, ka iboroke kere luka akais nuipu, eebo, abar kere naka ikabakan luka Yuda ainakini akan naka lukasurupokec, lueŋatarete kes, ikamunete kes, eyaŋaarete Babulon.
Kajo da, Pasur, ka luiboiete kere kotogokon kiioreorio: idolokini Babulon; itwanikini ŋina, kidaikinio ŋina, ijo ka ipaperokon kere, luidwarak nukaiŋal.”
Itelekari eoŋ kagogoŋ, kipiko.
Araun eoŋ akienis aitiwaria akwap;
Kesekeli ŋinituŋanan.
Eworoi ebe, “Akaje ka aŋatar!”
Naarai arau akirot naka EJAKAIT amorosit kamakaŋ,
Ido akienis, aitiwaria akwap.
Karaida einer bobo kokirorike,”
Aso ejai otauka bala akim naenoki
Naegolokinitoi akojoka,
Eoŋ da kapas aitikokinit, kwabo mam apedori.
Etasuro kowaitin kere!
Ebalasi ipapero lukodicika kere,
Luidarito eoŋ aibiror ebe,
“Koluikisi, sio da kiluikini ŋes!
Elemuni ijodijodoor,
Oni da kipikori, ido kinyaŋi.”
Ŋes iguikinotor lukareito,
Kwabo mam kepikorete.
Isurumio noi ileic, naarai mam eswamatos nukacoa. Aitisiliokec namam edaun mam imurwokinio.
Kaany cani ainyanakon kamakec;
Naarai kapukoki jo akakirot.
Naarai ayuu aijar naka ŋin kayenilwaritoi
Kakanin nuka ikeswamak nueroko.
Apaaran nakawuria totoka kinyek aisirereŋio!
Kikenoi etuŋanan loainuni papaka akiro ebe,
“Kiwurikin ikoku yenitelepat,”
Kisiyalamik ŋes noi.
Luatiyaiki EJAKAIT, komam itimi;
Kiira aimony tupuruc,
Ka elala kidiŋ paaran;
Kwaŋin tikeraun totoka akailit,
Akekoik da tikeraun naepol apaarasia kere.
Adumun aitaaritoi ka ican,
Amunaunos akapaarasia kanuka ileic?
“Keŋaiŋait, kiŋitakinai EJAKAIT, naarai itemonokino Nebukadanesar ekabaka loko Babulon aitiji oni: motoko kiswamakini EJAKAIT kwape ejaatar akeswamisio kere nukaumokin, tetere itoboŋoori ŋes.”
Kosodi Yeremia kolimok kes ebe, “Ilimokinete Sedekia kwanata ebe:

‘Inera kwanata EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael ebe: Koany, esinyakari lujiis luejaas akaninikus, luitijioto ekabaka loko Babulon, ka Ikaludean, lukirigaunito arwatatinikus; ido atukonokini kes kidiŋ ore lo.
Ido eoŋ elopet ketijie yes, kakan naerioro, ka akan da nakagogoŋ, kanyunyura, ka adedeŋ, ka adwaris naeta ria.
Adanyi eoŋ da luiboiete kore kalo, ituŋa ka itiaŋ da: etwakete atular naededeŋ.

Ido ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Akaulo kaŋun, ejaikini Sedekia ekabaka loka Yuda, ka ikekejaanakinak, ka ituŋa, ŋul luapiaŋunos kore kalo kanuka atular, ka ekileŋ, ka eteŋei, akanin nuka Nebukadaresar ekabaka loko Babulon, ka akanin nuka lukasurupokec, ka akanin da nuka ŋul kaluemoete akeceijar. Edanyi ŋesi kakwanis naka ekileŋ; mam ideuni kes, mam itimi, ido mam isionie.’
Yeniboikini ore lo, eari ekileŋ, ka eteŋei, ka atular; konye yenelomari, aluŋakin Ikaludean lukirigaunete, ebusi ŋipeŋin, akeijar da eraun aŋatuna.
Naarai ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Asesen eoŋ ere lo kakoŋu kanaerono, konye mere kanaejok: ijaikinio akan naka ekabaka loko Babulon, Ŋes da icwei kakim.’
“Ido nuka ekek loka ekabaka loka Yuda, kiner ebe, ‘Kiirasi akirot naka EJAKAIT.
Ijo ekek loka Daudi!’ Ebala EJAKAIT kwanata ebe:
“Kodilok aitub akiro,
Koyu iŋatara kakan naka ekareiton,
Kinyek akadedeŋ alomar kwape akim,
Kicwe komamei yenepedori aitudeŋ,
Kanuka aronis naka aswamisiokus.”
Ijo yeniboie kaditot, atiiba naka apuuton;
Yes luibalasi ebe, ‘Iŋai ca ikokorun asurokin oni?
Iŋai bo da elomuni aiboisiowok?’
Enokokini akim amagoroke,
Isidopori da kere luirimorito.”
Inera EJAKAIT kwanata ebe: “Kijesar togo loka ekabaka loka Yuda, kiner kaŋina akirot na,
kolimok ebe, ‘Kiira akirot naka EJAKAIT, ijo ekabaka loka Yuda, loiboie koicoloŋ loka Daudi, ijo ka ikonikejaanakinak ka ikonituŋa da luelomununete orutei lu.’

Inera EJAKAIT kwanata ebe: Kitodolenenete etube ka adolit, koyuutu iŋatara kakan naka ekareiton. Sirikireata, sirikiswamakis imoit, ka ikoki, ka apuserut, nukepali, sirikibukosi aokot numam akirot kaibois kana.
Naarai arai teni kiswamata akirot ŋin, kwaŋin elomuniata korutei luka etogo kalo ikabakan luiboiete koicoloŋ loka Daudi, ibwanenito agalin ka ibalasin, kes, ka ikecekejaanakinak, ka ikecetuŋa da.
Konye arai mam iirarete akiro ŋun, ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Eyapoikin elopet ebe, esilior etogo lo.
Naarai inera kwanata EJAKAIT nuka ekek loka ekabaka loka Yuda ebe:
“Isubit ijo bala Gilead kamakaŋ,
Aidia naka Lebanon:
Ateni ketuluori jo amodiŋ,
Ka ireria luemameete ituŋa.
Ŋolituŋanan ka lujiisike:
Kijepakinete iresiakon luseuna,
Kocakanakinete akim.”
Kosodete aboŋokin ebe, “Naarai apotu kojalata aitutuket naka EJAKAIT Edekekec, komaata idekesio lumo, kijaanakis da.”
Konye komonyata noi loipidipiditere;
Naarai mam eboŋuni bobo,
Karaida aanyun akwap nakobukec.
Nabarai ŋipeŋina neijoreoritai ŋes etwanikini, kwabo mam bobo eanyuni akwap na.”
Ka agolaike nukokuju kanumam ebeito;
Loitubusiani ikeidunyet tai,
Komam eropi ŋes:
Loebala ebe, ‘Mere kaduk etogo loelal,
Ka agolai nukokuju nuepolok’,
Kosodi apedonokin adirisan;
Kigalio eswi kakito nuka eres,
Kinyonyo aitereŋ.
Mam kereka papakon arai ekanyaman ka ekamatan,
Ekatubon loitenara lokabeit?
Kwaŋin kojau ejok.
Kwaŋin kojau ejok.
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe,
Mere kereka ŋin ŋes ajenun eoŋ?
Dimarai aswam nukaiŋobel,
Ka abukor aokot numam akirot,
Ka areit, ka akaje da.”
“Mam ekuudianete ŋes ebe,
‘Wu okwe onaceka!’ arai bo ‘Wu okwe inac!’
Mam ekuudianete ŋes ebe,
‘Wu okwe Ejakait!’ arai ‘Wu okwe aibusesuke!’
Kiriitete acakar kiŋa kirutei luka Yerusalem,”
“Kodoka Lebanon, komony;
Kikesea eporotokon koBasan:
Komony kotoma Abarim;
Naarai amudiaros ipaelonokon kere.
Konye ibu ijo kobala ebe, ‘Mam eirari.’
Ŋol ŋes eponekon ageun keiditeukon,
Mam irimarit ekaporoto.
Ipaelonokon da ijoreorio:
Kosodi ateni kirumete ileic,
Itirirai kanuka aronisikon kere.
Loiduki kaikon oresia,
Itukwi ijo nakibunokinia ariebo,
Aikilianar kwape naka aberu naidouni!”
ido ejaikini jo akan naka ŋul kaluemoete akoniijar, akan da naka ŋul kaluiyoŋit, ŋes akan naka Nebukadaresar ekabaka loko Babulon, kakan da naka Ikaludean.
Kacakari eoŋ da jo, ka totokon nakiiwuriei, ape akwap ace namam kiwurikinitai; itwakikinete ŋina.
Konye toma akwap naimielas ikecetauon aboŋun, mam eboŋunete cut.”
Erai kereka ŋesi amot namam isiyalamikinitai?
Kanukinyo ereŋearere, ŋes ka akeur,
Acakar akwap namam ejenete?
Wu jo, akwap, akwap, akwap,
Kiira akirot naka EJAKAIT!
Inera EJAKAIT kwanata ebe:
“Kiwadikata etuŋanan lo ebe loemameete idwe,
Etuŋanan lomam isikerianio apaarasiake kere:
Naarai emamei etuŋanan loka aurike loisikerianio,
Aiboikin oicoloŋ loka Daudi,
Karaida ayait bobo Yuda.”

Kanuka ŋun ŋes inerar kwanata EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael, nuka ikecokok luitanyamete ikatuŋa ebe: “Isiarisiarata yesi ekasipan, ireŋeata, komam ianyanarete kes; koany, ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Edopei kamakus aronis naka aswamisiokus.
Atukonokini eoŋ da aatoŋot naka esipanika kotoma akwapin kere nukereŋearit, enyakuni bobo aujoikec; kes da ewuriaros iyatanakinos.
Adakakini eoŋ ikecokok luitanyamete kes. Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Ido mam eyoŋete bobo, karaida aiyaloŋoŋ, karaida idiopet kakesi aolior.
Eyuunio Yuda kotoma apaarasiake, Isirael da iboienenei kainapakina. Emaikinio rwaru ŋes ekiror lo ebe, ‘EJAKAIT ŋes adolitewok.’
“Aso do koany, ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Ŋes eponitotor apaarasia numam bobo ebalananatar ebe, ‘Kwape ejaria EJAKAIT lokolo etolomuni idwe luka Isirael kakwap nako Misiri’;

konye ebe, ‘Kwape ejaria EJAKAIT lokolo etolomuni kiŋarenik da aur naka ekek loka Isirael akwap naka ari naka agolitomei; ido anyoun kakwapin da kere nuabu kereŋeanarite kes.’ Kosodete aiboikin akwapukec obe.”
“Abila ekatau kotomaka,
Ejanijaŋunos akakojo kere;
Asub bala ekameran,
Ido bala etuŋanan loeniaut ajon;
Kanuka EJAKAIT, ido kanuka akekiro nukalaunak.
Naarai kanuka ekenit ibworo akwap;
Aokoto ironyia luka amodiŋ,
Erono ekecerot,
Akecegogoŋ da mam ejok.
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe,
Eebo, adum aronisikec kiton togoka da.
Kanuka ŋun eraun ekecerot kamakec bala aiboisio nuerurut kamuton;
Emeario, ibirokinos nen:
Naarai ebala EJAKAIT ebe,
Ayauni aronis mamakec,
Okaru loka aiticaniokec.
Adwarata kama ejai Baal,
Aitapaar ikatuŋa Isirael.
Edoteete, kolosenenete kaiŋal,
Itogogoŋete akanin nuka ikeswamak aronis,
Komamei yeninyeini aronisike:
Esubito kes kere kamakaŋ bala Sodom,
Ka luiboiete kanen bala Gomora.”
Kanuka ŋun ŋes inerar kwanata EJAKAIT loka ajoresio nuka inabin ebe:
“Koany, etanyami kes aliasit naeta ria,
Etamasi da kes akipi nuka epiu:
Naarai kotoma onabin luka Yerusalem
Alom amunaar akwap kere.”
Elimonokinete tiritir ŋul luemwanito akirot naka EJAKAIT ebe, ‘Ijaunos ejok’; kolimonokinete ŋin yenelosi kaninik naka etauke ebe, ‘Mam aronis kidoikini jo.’
Yenikeanyuni kiira da akekirot?
Iŋai bo yenikecoit akekirot kiira?
Adedeŋ, eebo etapipirio loipiripiritoi:
Edoikini akou naka ikaronon.
Aitodol neadaunia akeswam,
Kiton aitodolikin nuelosikinit eketau,
Apaarasia nukawasia ijenunete jokan.
“Mam abu kejuka inabin lu,
Konye apotu kesi kokerata:
Mam abu kener kakes,
Konye apotu kodwarata.
Arai kesi kobwoito kaurianeteka,
Tiisiirarito ikatuŋa akiroka,
Tiisibelikinito kotoma orotinikec lueroko,
Ka aswamisiokec da nueroko.
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Epedori kereka ituŋanan aiŋop kotoma aiboisio nukaiyeiyea komam eoŋ apedori aanyun? Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Mam tope eoŋ eleleba akui ka akwap?
Eira nueneras inabin luedwarete nukaiŋal kokirorika ebe, ‘Eruja, eruja!’
Itodolete ai ŋun ajaut otauon luka inabin luedwarete nukaiŋal; kiton inabin luedwarete aiŋal naka itauonokec?
Luelosikinito aisimurwokin ikatuŋa ekakiror kanuka airujasiakec nuelimonokini ŋinituŋanan ekeidunyet, kwape kimurwokiniata lukapapaakec ekakiror kanuka Baal.
Enabi loerujai, mere kolimok airujasit; ka ŋin da yenika akakirot, kinera akakirot teni. Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Ikwaikinete ai agugu eriakakinos alos?
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Mere esubit akakirot akim? Ido bala anyul naebwaŋabwaŋai amor?
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Aso koany, asurokini inabin, luekokoanakinos akakiro.
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Asurokini inabin, luitwasamaete aŋajepakec kobalas ebe, ‘Ebala EJAKAIT ebe’.

Koany, ebala EJAKAIT ebe, asurokini ŋul luedwarete airujasia nukaiŋal, aitatamanakin, aitapaar ikatuŋa kanuka aiŋalakec, kanuka ailabilabanutukec naatai, kwabo mam eoŋ ejukarit kes, karaida aicorakin, Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, mam eyaunete adiojokis otuŋa lu.
Konye enabi ka esasedoti ka ituŋa luetemarete ebe, ‘Abwokon naka EJAKAIT,’ eticani eoŋ etuŋanan ŋol ka ekekal.
Itemanaros ŋinituŋanan kikeidunyet, ka ŋinituŋanan konaceke atiar, ‘Biai bo aboŋoki EJAKAIT?’ ido ‘Biai bo atema EJAKAIT?’
Mam bobo ilimunete nuka ‘abwokon naka EJAKAIT’: naarai abwokon ŋes akirot naka ŋinituŋanan ilopet; naarai itirioto akiro nuka Edeke lokajaran, nuka EJAKAIT loka ajoresio, Edekewok.
Ilimokini kwanata enabi ebe, ‘Biai bo kiboŋok EJAKAIT?’ ido ‘Biai bo atema EJAKAIT?’

Konye arai itemarete atiar, ‘Abwokon naka EJAKAIT’; kanuka ŋun ŋes inerar EJAKAIT kwanata ebe, ‘Naarai inerasi akirot na ebe, “Abwokon naka EJAKAIT”, ido kejukak yes ebe, “Siribalas, Abwokon naka EJAKAIT.”
Aso do koany, abeit kekeuni yes, kacakari yes, ka ere da loabu kainak yes ka lukapapaakus, aolior kama ajai.
Ido kainuni yes amorosit namam edaun ka ileic lumam enaŋete, lumam imurwokinio.’ ”
Edita ediopet ajai etini loajok noi, kwape etini loegei akonore: edita lokiareit ajai etini loarono, lomam epedori anyamio, naarai arono noi.
Kalimok EJAKAIT eoŋ ebe, “Yeremia, iany inyo?” Katema atiar, “Etini; etini loejok, loejok jokan; ka ŋol da loerono, loerono jokan, lomam epedori anyamio, naarai erono noi.”
Kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai ebe,
“Inera kwanata EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael ebe: Kwape eraar etini lo loejok, kwaŋin asesenia kanuka ajokis ijoreoriton luka Yuda, luabu kejuka kaibois kana alosit toma akwap naka Ikaludean.
Naarai ebwaikini akakonye mamakec kanuka ajokis, enyakuni bobo kiton akwap na. Eoŋ da aduki kes, kwabo mere aibiror; erai kes, kwabo mere arutor.
Ainakini kes etau lokajenun eoŋ, ebe Eoŋ EJAKAIT: kes da eraunos ikatuŋa, eoŋ da araun Ekecedeke: naarai eboŋunete mamakaŋ kikecetauon kere.
Ejaikini kes aisiarisiario kanuka aronis toma ajakanuto kere nuka akwapin; araun amorosit, agaracio, ainyanakinio ka ekenit, kaiboisio kere nuereŋeari kes.
Ejukari da ekileŋ, ka eteŋei, ka atular, mamakec, aitodol naemudiarotor kakwap naainakinit kes ka lukapapaakec.”
naalimokini enabi Yeremia ituŋa kere luka Yuda, ka ŋul kere luiboiete koYerusalem kobala ebe:

“Ageun kokaru lokitomonet kauni loka Yosia okoku loka Amon, ekabaka loka Yuda, kiton lolo, ikar lu akaisaarei ka luuni, kobunenenei akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai, kenerenena kayes, adilonokini tupuruc einer, konye mam yes ipotu kopuput.
Ido abu EJAKAIT kijukanakini yes ikekejaanakinak kere inabin, edilonokini tupuruc aijukunun; konye yes mam ipotu kopuput, karaida aitoikin akiikus akiirar.
Ebala ebe, ‘Koboŋutu kinye ŋinituŋanan ekerot loerono, ka aronis naka aswamisiokus, kiboikinos akwap nakiinakinit EJAKAIT yes ka lukapapaakus, ageun apeŋo aitodol ikar kere;
ido siritupanarete idekesio ice aijaanakin ka aima kes, sirikitunyunyuranakis eoŋ kaswamisio nuka akaninikus. Eoŋ da mam keswamakini yes aronis.’
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Konye mam ipotu kopuput eoŋ; kitunyunyurikis kaswamisio nuka akaninikus aiswamakin bonik aronis.
“Kanuka ŋun ŋes inerar kwanata EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe: Naarai mam ipotu kopuput akakiro,

ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Koany, ejukari aomare ikekia kere luka ari naka agolitomei, ka Nebukadaresar ekabaka loko Babulon, ekakejaanakinan, kayau kes aitiji akwap na, ka ŋul da luiboiete kotoma, ka atekerin nu kere nuirimorito; ido amudiari cut, ketuluo kes aumokinet, aimuaret, asilio da namam edaun.
Ido bobo, alemari kamakec eporoto lokaiyalama ka eporoto lokailel, eporoto loka eteran ka eporoto da loka ateran, aruo naka akaŋas, ka aica naka atala.
Itisilio akwap na kere, eraun aumokinet; ijaanakinete da atekerin nu ekabaka loko Babulon ikar akaisakanykaarei.
Kosodi kanen, ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Kedaunos ikar akaisakanykaarei, kasodi eticani eoŋ ekabaka loko Babulon, ka ateker ŋin, ka akwap naka Ikaludean, kanuka numam adolitekec, ido etisili ikar kere.
Ido ayauni kakwap ŋin akakiro kere nuabu kenerite, kere nuewadikatai oitabo lo, loadwari Yeremia mama ejaas atekerin kere.
Naarai atekerin nuipu ka ikabakan lukapolok itubusianete kes, eebo, kes da ba; atacakini kwape ejaatar aswamisiokec, ido kwape ejaar aswam naka akaninikec.”
Emasete, igetanaros, ikerepikinete kanuka ekileŋ loejukari mamakec.”
Kasodi alemun adere kakan naka EJAKAIT, ketamat atekerin kere nukejukari EJAKAIT eoŋ:
ebe Yerusalem ka ireria luka Yuda, ka ikabakanakec, ka ikapolokokec, aituluor asilio, aumokinet, aimuaret, ka ekenit; kwape ejaar lolo;
Parao ekabaka loko Misiri ka ikekejaanakinak, ka ikapolokoke, ka iketuŋa kere;
ka ituŋa kere luinyalinyala, ka ikabakan kere luka akwap naka Us, ka ikabakan kere luka akwap naka Ipilisitian (Asukelon, ka Gasa, ka Ekuron, ka luapiaŋunos luka Asudod);
Edom, ka Moab, ka idwe luka Amon;
ka ikabakan kere luka Turo, ka ikabakan kere luka Sidon, ka ikabakan luka apujan naejai okekwa juwai aŋolol;
Dedan ka Tema, ka Bus, ka ituŋa kere luebarenete arokio;
ikabakan kere luka Arabia, ka ikabakan kere luka ituŋa luinyalinyala luiboiete kamodiŋ;
ikabakan kere luka Simiri, ka ikabakan kere luka Elam, ka ikabakan kere luka Imedin;
ka ikabakan kere luka ari naka agolitomei, luelwaka ka lueapiete, ameanakin; ka ajakanuto kere nuka akwapin, nuejaas akwap. Akaulokec emasi do ekabaka loka Sesak.
“Kosodi arai keŋeroto aijaar adere kakanikon aimat, kosodi ilimokini kes ebe, ‘Inera EJAKAIT loka ajoresio kwanata ebe: Kibusakinit yes aimat!
Naarai koany, ageuni eoŋ aswam aronis kore loemaikinitai ekakiror, yes da mam kiticanio? Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Mam iswakete aiticanio: naarai anyarakini ekileŋ asurokin kere luiboiete kakwap.’
‘Irurumai EJAKAIT kokuju,
Ikeseuni ekeporoto kaiboisike nakalaunan;
Irurumakini aujoke kagogoŋ;
Ereseikini kere luiboiete kakwap,
Bala ikepudapudak emusabibu.
Naarai epurete EJAKAIT katekerin;
Etubokini luejaas awat kere,
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe,
Apiari lukaronok kekileŋ.’
“Inera kwanata EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe:
Koany, elomuni aronis anyoun kateker kiton ateker,
Itukutuni etapipirio loepol anyoun kosaŋeta luka akwap!
“Kibwololoto, yes ikecokok, komonyata;
Kipunupunokinos kotoma okurwon, yes ikayaitok luka esipan:
Naarai adolut cut apaarasia nuka aariokus, ka aisiarisiariokus,
Yes da ibiroros bala ibore yenisiyalamikinitai.
Mam ikecokok edumunete erot lokereara,
Karaida ikayaitok luka esipan neekuiata.
Eporoto loka aikalal naka ikecokok.
Ka aibwolol naka ikayaitok luka esipan!
Naarai amunaa EJAKAIT ekecerony.
Kanuka anyunyura naededeŋ naka EJAKAIT.
Enyeki akeŋopis, kwape eŋatuny,
Naarai araun akecekwap aumokinet
Kanuka adedeŋ naka ekileŋ loereit,
Ido kanuka anyunyurake naededeŋ.”
“Inera kwanata EJAKAIT atiar: Kobwo kalaro naka etogo loka EJAKAIT, kolimok ireria kere luka Yuda, luepote aima togo loka EJAKAIT, akiro kere nukecorakini jo alimokin kes; sirikimunon adiokirot.
Diat iirarete, kibelokin ŋinituŋanan ainyein ekerot loerono; kasodi keitu ainyein aronis, naalosikinit aiswamakin kes kanuka aronis naka aswamisiokec.
Ido kolimonokini kes atiar, ‘Inera kwanata EJAKAIT atiar: Arai mam kipupete eoŋ, alosenen kokisilaka, luebwaikinit kakonyenekus,
apuponokini akiro nuka ikabulesin inabin, lukejukanakini yes, kadilonokini tupuruc sek aijukunun, konye mam yes ipupununete;
aso etuluori rwaru etogo lo aiput kwape Silo, ido etuluori ere lo araun ekenit kotoma atekerin kere nuka akwap.’ ”
Apotu isasedotin ka inabin ka ituŋa kere da kiirasi Yeremia inera akiro ŋun kotogo loka EJAKAIT.
Kosodi kanen, kedau cut Yeremia einer akiro kere nukicorakinit EJAKAIT alimonokin ituŋa kere, kikamut ŋes isasedotin ka inabin ka ituŋa kere, kobalas ebe, “Abeit itwani ijo!

Kanukinyo idwaria kokiror loka EJAKAIT, kinera atiar, ‘Eraun etogo lo kwape Silo, ka ere lo da eraun ameje, komamei ituŋanan yeniboie kotoma’?” Kotukonokinos ituŋa kere mama ejai Yeremia togo loka EJAKAIT.
Kosodete isasedotin ka inabin kobalasi ikapolok ka ituŋa kere ebe, “Ibusakinit ekesa lo atwanare; naarai adwaraki ere lo kwape iirariata yesi da ikulepek kakusiki.”
Kosodi kobala Yeremia ikapolok kere ka ituŋa kere ebe, “EJAKAIT ŋes kejukuni aidwar nuka etogo kalo ka ere lo akiro kere nuiirasi yesi.
Aso do kitemonokis ikusirotin ka akusiswamisio, korimasi eporoto loka EJAKAIT Ekusideke; aso iitokini EJAKAIT ainyein aronis nakinerakinit yes.
Konye eoŋ, koany ajai akanikus. Kiswamakinai nuejok ka nuebeito kakonyekus.
Kojenutu kereka yes, arai kiiara eoŋ, kibeikinete yes aokot nuemameete aronis kore kalo, ka ŋul luiboiete kotoma; naarai abeit EJAKAIT kejukunit mama ijaas einer akiro nu kere kakiikus.”
Kosodete ikapolok ka ituŋa kere kobalas isasedotin ka inabin ebe: “Mam ibusakinit etuŋanan lo atwanare: naarai inerit kaoni kokiror loka EJAKAIT Ewokodeke.”
Kosodete konyout imakio ice luka akwap, kobalas atukot kere naka ituŋa ebe,
“Abu Mikaia Emorasit kodwar kapaarasia nuka Kesekia ekabaka loka Yuda; kinera kituŋa kere luka Yuda, kobala ebe: ‘Inera kwanata EJAKAIT loka ajoresio atiar,
Iloboo rwaru Sion kwape kamana;
Yerusalem da eluori aapoŋor,
Emoru da loka etogo eraun kwape aiboisio nuiukekeete nuka
amoni.’
Ido da kojai etuŋanan loadwarit kokiror loka EJAKAIT, Uria okoku loka Semaia loka Kiriat-yearim. Abu ŋol da kodwarak ere lo ka akwap na kwape ejaatar akiro ŋun kere nuka Yeremia.
Nakiiraria ekabaka Yekoiakim ka iketuŋa lukirigin kere ka ikapolok kere akekiro, kokoto ekabaka aiar ŋes: konye kiira Uria, kokurianar, koker, kolot Misiri.
Kijuka ekabaka Yekoiakim ituŋa Misiri, Elunasan okoku loka Akubor, ka icetuŋa nepepe kaŋes,
koomai Uria koMisiri, koyaunai mama ejai ekabaka Yekoiakim koara ŋes kekileŋ, kocakak akekuan ailin nuka ituŋa kere.
Kabala EJAKAIT kwanata ebe: “Kiswamau aunoi ka ajookon, koenik omurisiŋikon.

Kijukak ace mama ejai ekabaka loka Edom, ka ekabaka loka Moab, ka ekabaka loka idwe luka Amon, ka ekabaka loka Turo, ka ekabaka loka Sidon, kakanin nuka ikiyakia luepote Yerusalem mama ejai Sedekia ekabaka loka Yuda.
Kitetemik kes akiro nu ainar ikapolokokec kobala ebe: Inera kwanata EJAKAIT loka ajoresio, Edeke loka Isirael ebe: Ilimokinete lukapolokokus kwanata ebe:
Eoŋ abu kasub akwap, ka ituŋa, ka itiaŋ, luejaas akwap, kapedorika naepol ka akanika naerioro; ainakini eoŋ ŋin yenetojokit.
Kwana da ainak akwapin nu kere akan naka Nebukadaresar ekabaka loko Babulon, ekakejaanakinan; ainak da itiaŋ luka ais aijaanakin ŋes.
Atekerin da kere ijaanakinete ŋes ka okokuke, ka otataitike, aitodol needolioto apaarasia nuka akekwap: kosodete itubusianete ŋes atekerin nuipu ka ikabakan lukapolok.

“Kosodi kanen, ateker arai ajakanut naeŋeri aijaanakin Nebukadanesar ŋol, ekabaka loko Babulon, ido lueŋerete aibwaikin imurisiŋakec ajookot naka ekabaka loko Babulon, ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Eticani ateker ŋin, kekileŋ, ka eteŋei, ka atular, aitodol neesimudiaria ŋes kes.
Konye yes, sirikiirasi inabinokus, karaida ikaroakakus, karaida airujasiakus, karaida ikadwarakakus, karaida ikacudakakus, lukilimokinete ebe, ‘Mam ijaanakinete ekabaka loko Babulon.’
Naarai kidwarakinete yes nukaiŋal, ayaŋaar yes naelwana kakwapukus; kasodi eoŋ aireŋear yes, ido iwoliorete.
Konye ateker naibwaikini emurisiŋike ajookot naka ekabaka loko Babulon, kijaanak, ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Enyeini ŋin aiboi kakwapukec: ido ekoriete iboikinos nen.”
Kanukinyo ikototor atwakare, ijo ka ikonituŋa, kanuka ekileŋ, ka eteŋei, ka atular, kwape ineritor EJAKAIT nuka ateker naeŋeri aijaanakin ekabaka loko Babulon?
Kwabo sirikiirasi akiro nuka inabin luineras kayes ebe, ‘Mam ijaanakinete ekabaka loko Babulon.’ Naarai edwarete kesi nukaiŋal.
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Naarai mam ejukununei kes, konye edwarete kokirorika aiŋal: tetere kereŋeari yes, ido iwoliorete yesi, ka inabin lukidwarakinete.”
Sirikiirasi kes; kijaanakis ekabaka loko Babulon, tetere ijarete, Inyo bo ti keraunor ere lo asilio?

Konye arai eraas inabin, ka akirot naka EJAKAIT da arai ejai kakes, kiŋaiŋaata kito kesi EJAKAIT loka ajoresio, kinyeis iboro luesalito kotogo loka EJAKAIT, kotogo da loka ekabaka loka Yuda, koYerusalem da ayaŋaario Babulon.
Naarai inera kwanata EJAKAIT loka ajoresio nuka ipirin, ka nuka aŋolol, ka nuka aicegeria, ido nuka luapiaŋunos luka iboro luesalito kore kalo,
lumam iritonorit Nebukadanesar ekabaka loko Babulon, naejoreoria Yekonia okoku loka Yekoiakim ekabaka loka Yuda, alemar koYerusalem, koyaŋaa Babulon, ka ikapolok kere luka Yuda ka Yerusalem;
eebo, inera kwanata EJAKAIT loka ajoresio, Edeke loka Isirael, nuka iboro luapiaŋunos kotogo loka EJAKAIT, kotogo da loka ekabaka loka Yuda, koYerusalem da ebe:
Eyaŋaario Babulon, ido ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Ejaenenas ŋina, aitodol apaaran naaanyanaria kes, Kasodi alemuni enyakuni bobo aibois na.”
“Inera kwanata EJAKAIT loka ajoresio, Edeke loka Isirael ebe: Abil eoŋ ajookot naka ekabaka loko Babulon.
Eriŋa cut edauna ikar iarei enyakuni bobo toma aibois na iboro kere lukotogo loka EJAKAIT, luabu Nebukaderesar ekabaka loko Babulon kolema kaibois kana kosodi ayaŋaar Babulon.

Ido ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Enyakuni bobo toma aibois na Yekonia okoku loka Yekoiakim, ekabaka loka Yuda, ka ikijoreoritono kere luka Yuda, lualosito Babulon: naarai abili ajookot naka ekabaka loko Babulon.”
Kosodi enabi Yeremia alimokin enabi Kanania kojaas isasedotin, kojaas da ituŋa kere ebwoete kotogo loka EJAKAIT.

Kiner enabi Yeremia ebe, “Kikote nepenen! Kikonak EJAKAIT kwaŋin: kitodol EJAKAIT akiro nuidwar, ainyakun bobo iboro lukotogo loka EJAKAIT, ka ŋul kere luejoreoritai, alemun koBabulon ayaun aibois na.
Konye ca kiira akirot na naenera kopupi ijo, kopupete da ituŋa kere ebe,
Inabin lukageikinete eoŋ ido lukigeikinete ijo kolo, kedwarenenete ejie, ka aronis, ka atular nueponikinete akwapin nuipu, ka ajakanuto nuepolok.
Enabi loedwari nuka ainapakin, kedol akirot naka enabi kaŋol, ŋes konyet ejenunere ebe, abeit EJAKAIT ejukunit enabi ŋol.”

Kiner Kanania kojaas ituŋa kere ebe, “Ebala EJAKAIT kwanata ebe: Abili kwaŋin ajookot naka Nebukadaresar ekabaka loko Babulon komurisiŋa luka atekerin kere eriŋa cut edauna ikar iarei.” Kosodi enabi Yeremia asuenyikin.
Kosodi kedau enabi Kanania aibil akitoi komurisiŋ loka enabi Yeremia, kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ejai Yeremia kobala ebe:
“Kolot, kolimok Kanania ebe, ‘Inera EJAKAIT kwanata ebe, Ibila ijo ajookot naka akito; konye iswamauni do ajookon nuka asua aiboisikec.

Naarai inera kwanata EJAKAIT loka ajoresio, Edeke loka Isirael ebe: Ebwaik ajookot naka asua omurisiŋa luka atekerin kanu kere, kijaanakis Nebukadanesar ekabaka loko Babulon; ido ijaanakinete: ainak da itiaŋ luka ais.’ ”
Kosodi enabi Yeremia kotema enabi Kanania atiar, “Kiira kito, Kanania; mam EJAKAIT kiyakienenet: konye iinak ituŋa lu amunokina aiŋal.
Ŋes ebalar EJAKAIT ebe: ‘Koany, kereŋeari jo kakwap: itwani kokaru kalo, naarai iner nuka epali mama ejai EJAKAIT.’ ”
Kedau Yekonia ekabaka, ka toto naka ekabaka, ka ibwacin, ka ikapolok luka Yuda ka Yerusalem, ka ikeswamak, ka ikatatak, anyoun koYerusalem.
Kijuka ebalua kakan naka Elasa okoku loka Sapan, ka Gemaria okoku loka Kilikia, luabu Sedekia ekabaka loka Yuda kijuka Babulon mama ejai Nebukadaresar ekabaka loka Babulon, ebe:
“Inera kwanata EJAKAIT loka ajoresio, Edeke loka Isirael mama ejaas luejoreoro kere, luainakin aijoreoreo anyoun koYerusalem ayaŋaar Babulon, ebe:
Kodukoto itogoi, kiboienenete kanen; kiraata imanikoria, konyama araitokec.
Komanya aŋor, kowuriata idwe lutelepai ka lupesur; komanyanakis odwekus aŋor, kokorenenete apesurukus adukonokinio, kowurienenete idwe lutelepai ka lupesur; kilelebunos ŋina kwabo mam iŋoŋaros.
Kokototor ere lokesijoreorit ainapakin, kilipakis kama ejai EJAKAIT: naarai kanuka ainapakinike ŋes idumuniata yesi da ainapakinikus.
Naarai inera kwanata EJAKAIT loka ajoresio. Edeke loka Isirael ebe: Kinyeis inabinokus, luejaas kayes, ka ikaroakakus aiŋal yes, kwabo sirikicamut airujasiakus nuirujaete.
Naarai kidwarakinete nukaiŋal kokirorika: ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Mam keyakienenei kes.
Naarai ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Ajeni eoŋ aomisio nuaomit kanukus, aomisio nuka ainapakin, kwabo mere nueroko, ainakin yes amunokina nuepote.
Iwoneete yesi da eoŋ, ilosete ailip eoŋ, ido eirari yes.
Yes da kimoete eoŋ, kianyunete; arai kito kiimoata kikusitauon kere.

Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Kianyunete eoŋ; ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Ebelokini eoŋ aijoreoriokus, katukonokini yes alemun kotoma atekerin kere, ka aiboisio da kere, nukereŋearit, ido kenyakuni yes bobo toma aibois nakesijoreoria.
“Naarai inerata ebe, Kitonyoik EJAKAIT inabin kotoma Babulon.
Ŋes inerar kwanata EJAKAIT nuka ekabaka loiboie koicoloŋ loka Daudi, ka nuka ituŋa kere luejaas ore lo, iinacanakus lumam aupara kayes aijoreorio:
inera kwanata EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe, Koany, ejukakini kes ekileŋ, ka eteŋei, ka atular, ido etuluori kes bala etini loebos, lomam epedori anyamio, naarai erono noi.

Ido arukitori kes kekileŋ, ka eteŋei, ka atular, ainakini kes aisiarisiario kotoma ajakanuto kere nuka akwap, araut ekenit, ka aumokinet, ka aimuario, ka amorosit, kotoma atekerin kere kama kereŋearit.
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Naarai mam apotu kiirasi akakiro, nuejukakinitor kes ikakejaanakinak inabin, adilonokini tupuruc aijukunun kes; ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Konye ipotu koŋero akiirar.
Aso do kiirasi yesi akirot naka EJAKAIT, yes kere ikijoreoritono, lukayaŋaari Babulon anyoun koYerusalem.

Inera kwanata EJAKAIT loka ajoresio, Edeke loka Isirael nuka Akab okoku loka Kolaia, ido nuka Sedekia okoku loka Maaseia, lukidwarakinete yes aiŋal kokirorika, ebe: Koany, ainakini kes akan naka Nebukadaresar ekabaka loko Babulon: eari do ŋesi kes kakonyenekus.
Naarai kanukec ŋes ikenioto ikijoreoritono luka Yuda luejaas Babulon ebe, ‘Kituput EJAKAIT jo kwape Sedekia ka Akab, luabu ekabaka loko Babulon kitisis kakim.’

Naarai kiswamata nukabaŋaanut kotoma Isirael, ido kite eloete aŋor nuka iidunyetakec, ido kineras kokirorika akiro nukaiŋal, numam ecorakinit kes. Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Eoŋ lo loajeni, ido arai ekajenan.”
Nuka Semaia Enekelamit ilimokini ebe:

“Ebala kwanata EJAKAIT loka ajoresio, Edeke loka Isirael ebe: Naarai ijuka ibaluan kokirorikon mama ejaas ituŋa kere luejaas Yerusalem, ka neejai Sepania okoku loka Maaseia esasedoti, ido neejaas isasedotin kere ebe,
‘Kituluo EJAKAIT esasedoti aibois naka Yekoiada esasedoti, koraut ijaka kotogo loka EJAKAIT kanuka ŋinituŋanan yenikikerep, ka yenituluor enabi, kibwaik toma oloit ka akito nueridakinete emurisiŋ.
Aso do kanukinyo mam itoronia Yeremia loka Anatot, loituluoro elopet bon enabi kamakus?
Naarai ejuku mamakosi Babulon ebala ebe, “Erai aijoreoriokus naka apak naepol: aso do kodukoto itogoi, kiboienenete kanen; kiraata imanikoria, konyama araitokec.” ’ ”
Kosodi Sepania esasedoti kosiom ebalua ŋol kopup enabi Yeremia.
Kosodi kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ejai Yeremia ebe,
“Kijukak ŋul kere ikijoreoritono kobala ebe, ‘Inera kwanata EJAKAIT nuka Semaia Enekelamit ebe: Naarai kidwarak Semaia, kwabo mam eoŋ ejukunit, kiinak yes amunokina aiŋal;

ŋes inerar EJAKAIT kwanata ebe: Koany, eticani Semaia Enekelamit, ka akeur; ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Emamuun ituŋananike yeniboikin otuŋa lu, ido mam ŋes eanyuni ajokis naeswamakini ikatuŋa: naarai ener nukepali mama ejai EJAKAIT.’ ”
Akirot naka EJAKAIT naabu kobu mama ejai Yeremia ebe:
“Inera kwanata EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael ebe: Kiwadik akiro kere nuka pukokini toma oitabo.
Naarai koany, ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Epote apaarasia, nuenyakunia aijoreorio naka ikatuŋa Isirael ka Yuda. Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Etoboŋuni kes akwap nakolo ainakini lukapapaakec, ido irumete.”
Nu kes akiro nuabu EJAKAIT kiner nuka Isirael ka nuka Yuda da:
“Inera EJAKAIT kwanata ebe:
Kiira oni eporoto loka amaran,
Loka aiyoŋ, kwabo mere loka ainapakin.
Kiŋitata cani, koanyut,
Epedori kereka ekiliokit aidoun?
Kanukinyo do aanyunia ŋollikiliokit itiŋit aŋabet,
Bala aberu nairieba aidoun?
Kanukinyo elocokinor ejese loka akonyen kere?
Ŋes apak naanyunia Yakob ican;
Konye itajario kamakec.
“Kosodi kanen ebala EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe, Kapaaran kaŋin, abili akeiookot komurisiŋikon, ido aŋedeŋedei lukiyenitere; mam bobo imo itubusianete.
Konye ijaanakinete kesi EJAKAIT Ekecedeke, ka Daudi ekabakakec, loetonyoikini.
Ido sirikiyaloŋoŋ, ijo Isirael;
Naarai koany, ketajari jo kama elwana,
Ka akoniwur da kakwap naka aijoreoriokec;
Eboŋuni Yakob, iyamakin do inapakin,
Emameun da yenitukuriani.
