Naarai ebala EJAKAIT ebe,
Ajai eoŋ nepepe kajo, aitajar jo:
Naarai adauni cut atekerin kere nukesiarakinit,
Konye jo mam kadauni cut;
Konye kaleconori jo motimot,
Kwabo mam kenyeini cut komam keticanenenei.
Mam ariebokon eŋaleuni,
Eiliili amusuŋutukon.
Emamei yenikipurokini, tetere kimadio;
Emamei jo ekia loitaŋaleuni.
Naarai kecum jo amusuŋut naka lokasurup,
Kaiticanet naka loibworit;
Kanuka aipues naka numam adolitekon,
Naarai eyatakina aronisiokon.
Imonyi inyo kanuka ariebokon?
Mam icanikon edaunos;
Kanuka aipues naka numam adolitekon,
Naarai eyatakina aronisiokon,
Ŋes kainakin keswamakini ŋun.
Ijoreorio da lukasurupokon kere, ŋinidiopet kakesi;
Ŋul da lukiŋasete, eraunete iŋatuna,
Ŋul da kere lukimejaete akorakini araut imejasit.
Ido etaŋaleuni akonimusuŋun;
Naarai kinyarito yenereŋearitai, ebe:
‘Ŋes Sion, yenimam epodoi.’
Koany, enyakuni bobo aijoreorio naka iweman luka Yakob,
Etimi itogoike;
Edukio bobo ere amejeke,
Esali ere loka ekabaka kwape ejaar ekepone.
Esupui kes, kwabo mam ikidiokoros;
Ido etopoloori kes,
Kwabo mam itidisiario.
Iticasio ekecekodet kamaka,
Eticani kere luereito kes.
Elomuni ekayaitonikec kotomakec;
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe,
Esukunyikini ŋes, ŋes da kekunyakini:
Naarai iŋai tope etitiŋikini eketau aikunyakin eoŋ?
Iraunos ikatuŋa,
Eoŋ da araun Ekusideke.”
Ŋes adedeŋuke, etapipirio loipiripiritoi:
Edoikini akou naka ikaronon.
Mam eboŋuni anyunyura naka EJAKAIT,
Aitodol naedaunia akeswam,
Kiton aitodolikin nuelosikinit etauke.
Apaarasia nukawasia ijenunete jokan.
“Inera EJAKAIT ebe, Kapaarasia kaŋun, araun Edeke loka ikekia kere luka Isirael, kes da eraunete ikatuŋa.”
Inera kwanata EJAKAIT ebe:
“Ituŋa luedeunos kokileŋ adumut asianut kamodiŋ;
Naalosio aisiyeŋuun Isirael.
Eebo, kekilakina jo kamin namam edaun;
Ŋes keriunia jo kasianut-nakamin.
Kaduki jo bobo, jo da kidukio,
Ijo abekot naka Isirael:
Kisirio bobo kaisinin,
Ilomari da toma okosio loka ŋul kaluibwalito.
Iraete ikeraak, konyama araitoke.
‘Konyoutu, kadokasi Sion neejai EJAKAIT Edekewok.’ ”
“Koyooto kaiyalama kanuka Yakob,
Koboorianata kanuka nakapolon naka atekerin;
Kolimosi, kituroto, kinerasi atiar,
‘Etajar EJAKAIT iketuŋa, aatoŋot naka Isirael.’
Atukokini kes anyoun kawaitin nuka akwap,
Nepepe kaŋul da imuduki ka iŋwalas,
Aberu naepotiei,
Nepepe kaŋin da naerieb aidoun:
Eboŋunete ne, erioŋet loepol.
Etolosi kes kariri nuka aguuruto nuka akipi,
Korot Ioitenara lomam iguikinotor:
Naarai arai eoŋ papa mama ejai Isirael,
Epuraim da ŋes ekiyaika.
Kolimokis apujana nuelwaka;
Kineras atiar, ‘ŋol loesiarari Isirael, ŋes erukonokini,
Kidari, kwape idaria ekecokon esipanike.’
Ayuu alemun kakan naka ŋol kaloetelekarit kagogoŋ.
Ido ikomaunos neejai ajokis naka EJAKAIT,
Neejaas akima, ka ajon, ka akinyet,
Ka ikaalei ka itak da lukosipan;
Eraun etaukec da kwape emanikor loicocoo akipi;
Kwabo mam bobo itururuete cut.
Kosodete iyalamikinos abekon kotoma okosio,
Itelepai ka imakio da nepepe:
Naarai etuluori akuudianakec aiyalama,
Ido etalakari kes, kesiyalamik da kinyeis aiturur.
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe,
Esititirikini da etau loka isasedotin kasiepai,
Ikatuŋa da imonikinos ajokisika.”
“Eirar eporoto koRama,
Akuudian, ka aibworo naepol,
Emonyi Rakel ikedwe;
Egirit aitalakario kanuka idweke,
Naarai emameete.”
“Kisililiŋ ekoniporoto kinye aibworo,
Akonikonyen da komameut akiyo.
Naarai ebala EJAKAIT ebe,
Idumuni ainakinet kanuka akoniswam;
Ido eboŋunete bobo anyoun kakwap naka lokasurup.
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe:
Ejai amuno awasiakon,
Eboŋunete da bobo ikonidwe bukec.
‘Kilecoo, kalecorio,
Kwape itaok yenimam enaikinit ajookot:
Kibelokinoi, eoŋ da ebelokin,
Naarai irai ijo EJAKAIT Ekadeke.
Ido kadau aisisianakinio, kebap akamurwo:
Apotu keruma ileic, eebo, abu ketirir,
Naarai abu kadaku amorosit naka eiditeuka.’
Erai kereka Epuraim ikakoku yeniminat?
Erai ŋesi ikoku yenikesiyalamikinit?
Naarai napenerakinia aronis,
Ariŋa eitununei ŋes.
Aso epod etauka ŋes;
Abeit etimenenei.
Kiswamau ipirin luitejenunete,
Kibwaik ekonitau neejai erot lokapolon,
Ŋes erot loilomaria:
Koboŋu, wu abekot naka Isirael,
Koboŋu bobo oreriakon lu.
Wu jo akoku naiboŋonori kau?
Naarai esubit EJAKAIT akirot nakitetet kotoma akwap,
Igalikinit aberu ekiliokit.”
‘Kisirereŋ EJAKAIT, ijo aibois naiboio abeit,
Ijo eroŋat loka alaunit.’
Ido iboikin Yuda nen nepepe ka ikereria kere; ikakoriok, ka ŋul da luirimete kisipaninikec.
Naarai esimonik etau loepasit, esileleb da ŋolitau loitururwei.”
Kasodi konyet akwenyun, kaany; kajijimikis akajo.
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Kosodi kanen ejaun kwape kolo keteononoo kes arutun ka abilibil ka aibiror ka amudiar ka aitican; kwape kwaŋin eteenenei kes aiduk ka aira.
Kapaarasia kaŋun mam bobo ineras atiar,
‘Anyama lukapapa imusabibun luedwarak,
Ido aliokos ikel luka idwe.’
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Mere kwape ejaar aitutuket nakolo etutuki ka lukapapaakec kapaaran naketiŋia kakan aitonyoun kakwap nako Misiri: apotu kobilata aitutuket ŋin karaida abu karai lokowaikec.

Konye ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Na ŋes aitutuket naetutuki rwaru kekek loka Isirael, akaulo kapaarasia kaŋun: epikakini rwaru ikakisila atutubetakec nukotoma, ewadikakini da otauonokec; eoŋ da araun Ekecedeke, kes da eraunos ikatuŋa.

Kwabo mam bobo isisianakinos ŋinituŋanan ikeidunyet, ka ŋinituŋanan onaceke, kobalas ebe, ‘Kojen EJAKAIT:’ naarai ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Kajenunete rwaru kere, ameun ka yenididi aitodol yenikapolon kakesi, naarai etimi kes numam adolitekec, ido mam bobo eituni akecediakar.”
Loeinakini akoloŋ acaenen paaran,
Ka aicorakineta nuka elap ka aacer acaenen kuare,
Loigurokin aŋolol, kirurumata akekailan:
EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ŋes ekekiror, ebe:
Aso esaŋi aur naka Isirael da,
Komam erai ateker kakonyeneka ikar kere.”
“Arai epedor akuj naejai kokuju aitemio,
Ido arai epedorete apeteta nuka akwap amoio kokwap,
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe,
Aso acakari eoŋ da aur kere naka Isirael
Kanuka ŋun kere nukiswamaete.”
Iriario auno nakitemis idererei kiton moru Gareb, iriamari da kiton Goa.

Aditot kere da naka awat nuka lukatwak, ka ekurwon, ka imanikoria kere kiton aguurut Kiduron, kiton agor naka erute loka Ibalasin kokide, eraun nakalaunan kama ejai EJAKAIT. Mam erutorio, karaida amunaar bobo ikar kere.”
Kapak kaŋin abu ajore naka ekabaka loko Babulon kirigau Yerusalem: koenitete enabi Yeremia kalaro naka ikedarak, naajai togo loka ekabaka loka Yuda.
Naarai Sedekia ekabaka loka Yuda, ŋes aenit, kobala ebe, “Kanukinyo kidwaria, kinera ebe: ‘Inera EJAKAIT kwanata ebe: Koany, ainakini ere lo akan naka ekabaka loko Babulon, ŋes da irumi:
mam ekui Sedekia ekabaka loka Yuda kakan naka Ikaludean, konye abeit einakinio akan naka ekabaka loko Babulon, ineras kaŋes kaituke, eanyunete akekonyen akonyen nuka ŋol.
Ido eyaŋaari Sedekia Babulon. Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Iboie kaŋina aitodol naaanyanaria: karaida kijioto ka Ikaludean mam kisirereŋio’?”
Kotema Yeremia atiar, “Abu kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai ebe.
Koany, ebuni Kanamel okoku loka Salum mamaikon mama ijai ebala ebe, ‘Kogwel emanikorika loejai Anatot: naarai kibeit ijo apedor naka alakun.’

Kosodi do Kanamel okoku loka mamaika kobu mama ajai alaro naka ikedarak, kwape kejaar akirot naka EJAKAIT, kobala ebe, ‘Keŋaiŋait, kogwel emanikorika loejai Anatot, loejai akwap naka Benyamin; naarai airum nakon, ka alakun da nakon; kogwel ijo bon.’ Kasodi eoŋ ajenun ebe ŋin ŋes akirot naka EJAKAIT.
Kewadika akiro, kepucak, keworou ikajenak, ketemok ŋes epuesa kaitemis.
Kalema aiwadikaet naepucakinitai naka egwelet, ya nakibwaikinitai aipucet, kwape kejaar ekisil ka epone, ka ace da naepukoro:

kejaik aiwadikaet naka egwelet Baruk okoku loka Neria, okoku loka Maseia, koseseni Kanamel okoku loka mamaika, kosesenete da ikajenak luewadikaete aiwadikaet naka egwelet, kakonyen nuka Iyudayan kere luiboiete kalaro naka ikedarak.
Kecorak Baruk kakonyenekec, kabala ebe,

‘Inera kwanata EJAKAIT loka ajoresio, Edeke loka Isirael ebe: Kolema aiwadikaeta nu, aiwadikaet na naka egwelet naepucakinitai, ka aiwadikaet na naepukoro, kibwaik amot nakelupe; tetere edaunete apak naepol.
Naarai inera kwanata EJAKAIT loka ajoresio, Edeke loka Isirael ebe: Egwelio bobo itogoi ka imanikoria luka emusabibu kakwap kana.’
‘Wu okwe EJAKAIT Edeke! Koany, ijo kisubi akuj ka akwap kapedorikon naepol, ka akanikon naerioro, emamei adiokirot nakikaruni jo:
loitimenenei ilukumin luka ituŋa, itacakini atorobusio nuka idwekec luetupakinete numam adolito nuka lukapapakec: Edeke lokapolon, lokapedor, EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ŋes ekekiror;
Ekapetan lokapolon, lokapedor aswam: esesenete akekonyen irotin kere luka ituŋa; ainakin ŋinituŋanan kwape ejaatar irotinike, ido kwape ejaatar araito nuka aswamisioke;
loibu kibwaik aanyuneta ka nukaumokin toma akwap nako Misiri, kiton lolo, kotoma Isirael ka ituŋa da; kodumunia ekiror kwape lolo.
Kitolom ikonituŋa Isirael kotoma akwap nako Misiri, kaanyuneta ka nukaumokin, kakan nakagogoŋ, kakan da naerioro, ketasuro loepol;
koinak akwap na, nakiyapoikinit lukapapaakec ainakin, akwap naeleleete akile ka esik.
Kolomut kirumata; konye mam apotu korimasi ekoniporoto, karaida alosenen kokisilakon; mam eswamaete adiokirot kotoma kaŋun kanuicorakinit kes aswam; ŋes ainakini iyauni aronis na kere mamakec.
Koany, adolut itutio ore airum; ainakin ere akan naka Ikaludean luitijiete, kanuka ekileŋ, ka eteŋei, ka atular da; adolo nuibu kiner; ido koany, iany.
Ido wu EJAKAIT Edeke, ibu kolimok eoŋ ebe, “Kogwelu amana kapesan, konyarau ikajenak”: kwabo ere da ainakin akan naka Ikaludean.’ ”
Kosodi kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ejai Yeremia ebe:
“Koany, arai eoŋ EJAKAIT, Edeke loka luejaas awat kere: ejai kereka adiokirot nakekaruni?
Ŋes ainakin EJAKAIT inera kwanata ebe: Koany, ejaikini ere lo akan naka Ikaludean, akan da naka Nebukadaresar ekabaka loko Babulon, ido irumi ŋes.

Ikaludean da, Iuitijiete ere lo, epote inokokinete ere lo, icweikinete, ka itogoi da lukisupurionokiniata Baal lukisupurununo kokujukec, kobukonokinete icedekesio ainakineta numatan, aitunyunyurikin eoŋ.

Naarai apotu idwe luka Isirael, ka idwe luka Yuda kiswamata nueroko bon kakonyeneka, ameun keiditeukec. Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Mam apotu idwe luka Isirael kiswamata idiobore kakaninikec cut dimarai yenikaitunyunyurikin eoŋ.
Naarai ketunyunyuranakini ere lo ka aisideden ameuni kapaaran naadukere kiton lolo; ŋes do acakaria kakonyeneka.

Kanuka aronis kere naeswamaete idwe luka Isirael ka idwe luka Yuda aitunyunyurikin eoŋ, kes ka ikabakanakec, ka ikapolokokec, ka isasedotinikec, ka inabinokec, ka ituŋa luka Yuda, ka luiboiete da kotoma Yerusalem.
Kebelokis asebot kwabo mere akonyen; ido karaida kesisianakinit kes, adilonokin tupuruc aisisianakin, konye mam kiirara karaida acamun aisisianakinio.
Konye ebwaikis italesiakec toma togo loenyaritai ekakiror, amunaasi da.

Adukoto aiboisio nuiceleleete nuka Baal, nuejaas aditot naka okoku loka Kinom, aitotor ikecesap ka akecepesur akim mama ejai Molek; numam ecorakinit, mam da aomisioitike alomarit otauka aswam nuketale ŋun: aisidiakar Yuda.
“Aso do inera kwanata EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael nuka ere lo loineras yesi ebe, ‘Einakinitai akan naka ekabaka loko Babulon kanuka ekileŋ, ka eteŋei, ka atular da,’ ebe:
Koany, atukonokini kes aitonyoun kakwapin kere nukereŋearit kanuka anyunyuraka ka akadedeŋ, ka adwaris naeta ria; ido enyakuni kes bobo aibois na, kesiboik inapakina.
Eraunos kesi ikatuŋa, eoŋ da araun Ekecedeke.
Ainakini etau ediopet ka erot ediopet, kayonenenete eoŋ apaarasia kere; tetere ejaunete ejok, kes ka ikecedwe da luetupanakinete.
Ido etutuki kakes aitutuket namam edaun, komam ebelokini ainyein aiswamanakin kes ajokis, ebwaikin ayoŋit eoŋ otauonokec, kenyeis aijal.
Eebo, esiyalamikini aiswamanakin nuejok, ido abeit, eraikini kes akwap na kekatau kere, ka akaijar kere.
Egwelio imanikoria kakwap kana, nainerasi yesi ebe, Esil, emamei etuŋanan karaida etiaŋ; einakinitai akan naka Ikaludean.

Egwelete ituŋa imanikoria kanuka apesan, iwadikaete aiwadikaeta, ipucete kes aipuceta, enyaraunete ikajenak, kakwap naka Benyamin, kotoma aiboisio nuidunyas Yerusalem, ka oreria da luka Yuda, kotoma oreria luka akwap nakiukon, kotoma oreria luka apuutona, koreria da luka Eŋalakimak; naarai ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Etoboŋuni aijoreoriokec.”
“Inera kwanata EJAKAIT loiswamai, EJAKAIT lokesubi aiticat, EJAKAIT ŋes ekekiror, ebe:
Konyarai, eoŋ da kaboŋokini, kapukok nukapolok, ka nuetioko, numam ijeni.
Naarai inera kwanata EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael, nuka itogoi lukore kalo, ido nuka itogoi luka ikabakan luka Yuda, luaponi kotiyanakinai adukio aigalioret aitikokinia itutio, ka ekileŋ, ebe:
Elomunete Ikaludean ejie, ka aileleb kes kawat nukatwak nuka ituŋa, luadanyi kakanyunyura ka akadedeŋ, naarai ebwa akakonyen kore kalo kanuka aronisikec kere.
Koany, ainuni aijar ka aitaŋaleunio, eoŋ da etaŋaleuni kes; ido apukokini ainapakin ka abeit nuepolok noi teni.
Enyakuni aijoreorio naka Yuda, ka aijoreorio naka Isirael, aduki, kwape sek.
Ido elotari numam adolitekec kere, nukediakanariata kama ajai; esioniei numam adolitekec kere, nukediakanariata kama ajai, nukepaariata kama ajai.

Ere lo da eraun kama ajai ekiror loka ailel, loka aiturit, loka aibuses da, kakonyen nuka atekerin kere nuka akwap, nuiirarete ajokis kere naeswamak, koyoŋa, komaranata kanuka ajokis kere, ka ainapakin kere nuadumakini ŋes.

“Inera EJAKAIT kwanata ebe: Toma aibois na nainerasi yesi ebe, ‘Eswap, emamei etuŋanan karaida etiaŋ,’ koreria luka Yuda, korotin da luka Yerusalem luesilok, emamei etuŋanan, emamei yeniboie kotoma, emamei da etiaŋ,
iirario bobo eporoto loka ailel ka eporoto loka aiyalama, eporoto loka eteran, ka eporoto da loka ateran, eporoto loka ŋul luinerasi ebe,
‘Kimalata EJAKAIT loka ajoresio,
Naarai ejok EJAKAIT,
Naarai ejaenena akeitim ikar kere’;
ido eporoto loka ŋul lueyaunete asuban nuka aimal toma togo loka EJAKAIT, Naarai ebala EJAKAIT ebe, enyakuni bobo aijoreorio naka akwap kwape sek.

Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Itorete bobo isipanin akanin nuka ŋol loimari kes, koreria luka akwap nakiukon, koreria luka akwap naka apuutona, koreria luka Eŋalakimak, kakwap naka Benyamin ka aiboisio nuidunyasi kaYerusalem, koreria da luka Yuda.
Kapaarasia kaŋun, kapak kaŋin, etilibikini Daudi Atenut naka adolit; ido itodoli ŋol nuketube ka nukadolit kakwap.
Kapaarasia kaŋun itajario Yuda, Yerusalem da iboie inapakina; lo da ŋes ekiror loemaikinio ebe, ‘EJAKAIT ŋes akosidolit.’
Ido mam emamikini isasedotin Ilebin ekiliokit kakonyeneka loeinanakini ainakineta nuicweio, aicwe ainakineta nuka akiria, ka ainanakin asuban tir.”
Kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ejai Yeremia, kobala ebe:
“Inera EJAKAIT kwanata ebe: Arai ipedorete aibil akaitutuket naka apaaran, ka akaitutuket naka akuare, kinye ajaun apaaran ka akuare kapakikec;
aso epedori akaitutuket abilio nakolo kitutuki ka Daudi ekakejaanakinan, kinye ajaun kikoku yenirumi koicoloŋoke; ka akaitutuket da nakitutuki ka Ilebin isasedotin, ikakejaanakinak.
Kwape ajore naka akuj mam epedori aimario, asine da naka aŋolol aitemio; kwape kwaŋin etanyanyaa aur naka Daudi ekakejaanakinan, ka Ilebin lukejaanakinete.”
Kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ejai Yeremia kobala ebe:
“Mam kereka iwomoomoi nuenerata ituŋa lu ebe, ‘Acaka EJAKAIT ikekia iarei luaseunit’? Amenata kwaŋin ikatuŋa, kinyeis bobo araun ateker kakonyenekec.
Inera EJAKAIT kwanata ebe: Arai mam icasit kakaitutuker naka apaaran ka akuare, arai da mam ebwaikinit aicorakineta nuka akuj ka akwap,
aso acakari aur naka Yakob, ka naka Daudi ekakejaanakinan, kenye ayaŋaar kaurike airum aur naka Aburaam ka Isaak, ka Yakob da; naarai enyakuni bobo aijoreoriokec, ido etimi kes.”

“Inera kwanata EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael ebe: Kolot, kinera ka Sedekia ekabaka loka Yuda, kolimok ebe, ‘Inera EJAKAIT kwanata ebe: Koany, ainakini ere lo akan naka ekabaka loko Babulon, ŋes da icweikini kakim.
Mam ikui ijo kakanike, konye abeit kikamario, kiinakinio akanike; eanyunete akonikonyen akonyen nuka ekabaka loko Babulon, ŋes da inerakinos kajo kaituke, ido ilosi Babulon.’
Konye ca kiira akirot naka EJAKAIT, ijo Sedekia ekabaka loka Yuda. Inera EJAKAIT kwanata kanukon ebe: ‘Mam kiari ekileŋ.

Itwani kainapakin. Ido kwape kisupuronokiniata lukapapaakon, ikabakan lulem kigeikinete jo, kwape kwaŋin kisupuronokiniata jo. Ekuudianete kesi jo, kobalasi ebe, “Wu okwe ekosijakait!” ’ Naarai ebala EJAKAIT ebe, eoŋ ener akirot ŋin.”
Kojiosi ajore naka ekabaka loko Babulon ka Yerusalem, ka ireria kere luka Yuda luapianuna, Lakis ka Aseka; naarai ŋul bon asalito koreria luka Yuda lukebwaitai.
Ŋinituŋanan aosikin ekebulesit, ka ŋinituŋanan aosikin akebulesit, arai erai Eburaniat, arai Aburaniat; kinye ajaut yenitubusiani Eyudayat, onaceke.
Kosodete ikapolok kere ka ituŋa kere arimar, ŋul luetutukito aitutuket, ŋinituŋanan aosikin ekebulesit, ka ŋinituŋanan aosikin akebulesit, kinyeis aitubusianio bobo; korimasi, koosikis.
Konye kokau kibelokinos, kinyakutu ibulesin ka abulesin luaosikinito, koyaata kitubulesenoto bobo ibulesin ka abulesin.
Ŋes abunio akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ejai Yeremia naebuni kama ejai EJAKAIT, kobala ebe:
“Inera kwanata EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael ebe: Abu ketutuk aitutuket ka lukapapaakus kapaaran naetolomunia kes kakwap nako Misiri, kotogo loka ebulesene, kabala ebe,

‘Ketuboros ikar ikanykaarei ewosianakini ŋinituŋanan onaceke loBuraniat, lokitwegelitai, lokijaanak ikar ikanykape, iwosianakini ŋes anyoun kamakon.’ Konye mam apotu lukapapaakus keirasi, kwabo mam apotu ketoikis akeceki.
Yesi da koloje pac ipotu kibelokinos, kiswamata nuejok kakonyeneka, ilimorete aosikinio ŋinituŋanan aupake; ido ipotu kitutukis aitutuket kotoma togo loenyaritai ekakiror.
Konye kibelokinos, kisimoromoroto ekakiror, kinyakutu ŋinituŋanan ekebulesit ka ŋinituŋanan akebulesit, luipotu koosikinito kwape ekototor; kitubulesenoto bobo, araut kamakus ibulesin ka abulesin.

Ŋes enerar EJAKAIT kwanata ebe: Mam ipotu kiirasi eoŋ, alimor aosianakin, ŋinituŋanan onaceke, ka ŋinituŋanan aupake, Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Koany, alimori aosianakin kama ejai ekileŋ, ka atular, ka eteŋei; ido kainakini yes aisiarisiario toma ajakanuto kere nuka akwap.
Ido ituŋa luadiaka akaitutuket, lumam eswamato akiro nuka aitutuket naetutukete kakonyeneka, etuputoori itaok yenetubio katutubeta aarei, kosodete aitor kidiŋ katutubetake;
ikapolok luka Yuda, ka ikapolok luka Yerusalem, ka ibwacin, ka isasedotin, ka ituŋa kere luka akwap luetorete kidiŋ atutubeta nuka itaok.
Ainakini teni kes akan naka lukasurupokec, akan da naka ŋul kaluemooto aijarakec. Akecewat da nukatwak eraunete inyamat mama ejaas akweny nuka akuj, ka neejaas itiaŋ luka ais.
Ainakini Sedekia ekabaka loka Yuda, ka ikapolokoke akan naka lukasurupokec, ka akan da naka ŋul kaluemooto aijarakec, akan da naka ajore naka ekabaka loko Babulon, luanyout kamakus.
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Koany, ecorakini, etoboŋuni kes ore lo; ido itijiete ŋes, ipikorete, icweikinete kakim, Etuluori ireria luka Yuda ameje, komamei yeniboie kotoma.”
“Kolot okekia luka Irekabin, kinera kakes, kitolomik togo loka EJAKAIT, agola adiopet, koinak ebino aimat.”
Kasodi kayaŋa Yaasania okoku loka Yeremia, okoku loka Kabasinia, ka ikeinacan, ka odweke kere, ka ekek kere loka Irekabin.
Ketoloma kes togo loka EJAKAIT, toma agola naka odwe luka Kanan okoku loka Igidalia, etuŋanan loka Edeke, naidunyas kagola naka ikapolok, naajai kuju kagola naka Maaseia okoku loka Salum, ekagolon.
Kebwaik ituol lueleleba ebino, ka aderekai, kakonyen nuka odwe luka ekek loka Irekabin; katema atiar, “Komata ebino.”
Konye kes kobalas ebe, “Mam kimasi ebino: naarai abu Yonadab okoku loka Rakab, papaakosi, kicorak kobala ebe, ‘Mam imasenenete ebino, yes, karaida odwekus ikar kere.
Kwabo mam idukenenete etogo, ido mam iyeenenete ikinyom, karaida aira amanat nuka emusabibu, mam ijaenenas kakes; konye iboienenete koweman akusipaarasia kere; kobuto ikar luipu kakwap naiboioto.’
Kipou karimasi eporoto loka Yonadab okoku loka Rekab, papaakosi, kakiro kere nukiititiŋi, amamus amasenen ebino, akosipaarasia kere, isio ka akosiŋor, ka ikosidwe lusap ka lupesur,
karaida adukun itogoi lukibois, Ido emamei sio amana naka emusabibu, karaida imanikoria, karaida ikinyom;
konye kiboienenei kowemam, karimarito, keswamaete kere nukicorakinit Yonadab papaakosi.

Kosodi kanen nakebunio Nebukadaresar ekabaka loko Babulon aitiji akwap, kenerata ebe, ‘Kopotu, kaloto Yerusalem, kanuka akurian ajore naka Ikaludean, ka nuka akurian ajore naka Isurian.’ Aso ŋes kiboio koYerusalem.”
Kosodi kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ejai Yeremia, kobala ebe:
“Inera kwanata EJAKAIT loka ajoresio, Edeke loka Isirael, ebe: Kolot, kolimok ituŋa luka Yuda ka luiboiete koYerusalem ebe, Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Mam kereka yes iyuunete aisisianakinio akiirar akakiro?

Etodolikinitai akiro nuka Yonadab okoku loka Rekab nuecorakinit odweke amamus amasenen ebino, kwabo mam emasenenete aitodol lolo, naarai erimarete aicorakinet naka papaakec: konye eoŋ abu kener kayes, adilonokin tupuruc einer; ido mam ipotu kopuput eoŋ.

Kejukanakini da yes ikakejaanakinak kere inabin, adilonokin tupuruc aijukunun kes, kabala ebe, ‘Koboŋu cabo ŋinituŋanan ainyein ekerot loerono, kitetenata akusiswamisio, siritupanarete icedekesio aijaanakin kes, ido iboiete kakwap naabu kainak yes ka lukapapaakus.’ Konye mam itoonokinete akusiki, kwabo mam ipotu kopuput eoŋ.
Naarai etodolikis odwe luka Yonadab okoku loka Rekab aicorakinet naka papaakec naecorakinit, konye ituŋa lu mam apotu karimasi eoŋ.

Ŋes enerar kwanata EJAKAIT, Edeke loka ajoresio, Edeke loka Isirael, ebe: Koany, ayauni kotoma Yuda ka ŋul kere luiboiete koYerusalem, aronis kere naenerakinit kes: naarai abu kener kakes, konye mam apotu kapuput; ido eworo, konye mam apotu kaboŋokis.”
ŋes inerar kwanata EJAKAIT loka ajoresio, Edeke loka Isirael ebe: Mam Yonadab okoku loka Rekab emamikini etuŋanan loebwoi kakonyeneka ikar kere.”
Kosodi kanen kokaru lokiwoŋonet loka Yekoiakim okoku loka Yosia, ekabaka loka Yuda, kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ejai Yeremia atiar:
“Koyaŋa anunuket naka eitabo, kiwadika toma akiro kere nuabu kalimok jo aluikin Isirael, ka Yuda, ka atekerin kere, ameun apaaran nakenerar kajo, ameun kapaarasia nuka Yosia, kiton lolo.
Motoko iirari ekek loka Yuda aronis kere naalosikinit aiswamakin kes; kibelokinos ŋinituŋanan ainyein ekerot loerono, kesioni numam adolitekec ka aronisikec.”
Kicorak Yeremia Baruk atiar, “Kaenitai; mam apedori alosit togo loka EJAKAIT.
Aso kolot ijo, kosiom nuka anunuket, nuiwadikat kaitukuka, akiro nuka EJAKAIT kaki nuka ituŋa kotogo loka EJAKAIT apaaran naka ailuŋ: isiomi da kaki nuka ituŋa kere luka Yuda, luelomunete koreriakec.
Motoko edolokini ailipikec EJAKAIT, ibelokini ŋinituŋanan ainyein ekerot loerono: naarai epol anyunyura ka adedeŋ naka EJAKAIT, naenerit ŋesi mama ejaas ituŋa lu.”
Kiswama Baruk okoku loka Neria kere nuecorakinit enabi Yeremia, kosiom kotoma oitabo akiro nuka EJAKAIT kotogo loka EJAKAIT.

Kosodi kosiom Baruk kotoma oitabo akiro nuka Yeremia kotogo loka EJAKAIT kagola naka Gemaria okoku loka Sapan ekewadikan, kalaro nakokuju, kariri kerute lokitetet loka etogo loka EJAKAIT, kaki nuka ituŋa kere.
Kepupu Mikaia okoku loka Gemaria, okoku loka Sapan, akiro kere nuka EJAKAIT kotoma oitabo,

kijesar togo loka ekabaka, toma agola naka ekewadikan; ido koany, kiboiete kanen ikapolok kere: Elisama ekewadikan, ka Delaia okoku loka Semaia, ka El-natan okoku loka Akubor, ka Gemaria okoku loka Sapan, ka Sedekia okoku loka Kanania, ka ikapolok da kere.
Kitejen Mikaia akiro kere nukiirari, naasiomia Baruk eitabo kaki nuka ituŋa.

Kosodete ikapolok kere kiyakias Yekudi okoku loka Netania, okoku loka Selemia, okoku loka Kusi, mama ejai Baruk ebalas ebe, “Kolem anunuket na nan isiomi kaki nuka ituŋa, kobu.” Kosodi Baruk okoku loka Neria kolem anunuket, kolot neajaas.
Kolimokis ŋes ebe, “Aso kiboikin, kosiom kakiikosi.” Kosiom Baruk kakiikec.
Kosodi kanen, kiirasi akiro kere, koŋolianakinos kanuka akurian, kotemasi Baruk atiar, “Kibusakinit aitejenun ekabaka akiro ŋun kere.”
Kiŋita Baruk kobalas ebe, “Aso cani kolimokinai, kiwadikai biai akiro nu kere? Ikopuni kereka ijo kaitukuke?”
Kosodi Koboŋok Baruk ebe, “Kalimonokini ŋesi eoŋ akiro ŋun kere kaitukuke, kewadikai eoŋ toma oitabo kebwino.”
Kosodete ikapolok alimokin Baruk ebe, “Kolot, koŋopa diidi, ijo ka Yeremia; sirikejenu ituŋanan neijaas.”
Kolomasi alaro mama ejai ekabaka; konye kiŋadakinito anunuket togo loka Elisama ekewadikan; kitejenut ekabaka akiro kere.
Kosodi ekabaka kijuka Yekudi aomare anunuket: kolem kotoma agola naka Elisama ekewadikan, Kosiom Yekudi kaki nuka ekabaka, kaki da nuka ikapolok kere luabwoete aapu kekabaka.
Kiboie ekabaka kotogo loka aiporo olap lokikanyetekaoŋon, kojai da ekiala kinokokitete akim kakonyeneke.
Kosodi kanen, naesiomia Yekudi apapulai auni arai aoŋon, kotubutubei ekabaka kekileŋ, kocakanakini akim nakokiala, kiton needoporia anunuket kere kotoma okiala.
Konye mam apotu koyoŋa, karaida acilicil ikecenapen, ekabaka, karaida ikekejaanakinak kere lueiraritos akiro ŋun kere.
Karaida apotu El-natan ka Delaia ka Gemaria kiŋaiŋaata ekabaka ainyein aicwe anunuket; konye koŋer apupun kes.
Kicorak ekabaka Yerameel okoku loka ekabaka, ka Seraia okoku loka Asuriel, ka Selemaia okoku loka Abudeel, aikamun Baruk ekewadikan ka enabi Yeremia; konye kibwa EJAKAIT kes di.
“Koyaŋa bobo acenunuket, kiwadika tomake akiro kwa kere nusek nuajaas toma anunuket nasodit, naecwei Yekoiakim ekabaka loka Yuda.

Inera nuka Yekoiakim ekabaka loka Yuda ebe, ‘Inera EJAKAIT kwanata ebe, Icweik anunuket ŋin, kobala ebe, “Kanukinyo kiwadikaa kotomake ebe, abeit ebuni ekabaka loko Babulon, amunaar akwap na, ido itanaŋi kanen etuŋanan ka etiaŋ?”
Kanuka ŋun inera kwanata EJAKAIT nuka Yekoiakim ekabaka loka Yuda ebe, Emameun ituŋanan yeniboikini oicoloŋ loka Daudi. Ecakario akuanake nakatwan kiŋa neejai amwanis paaran, ka aterot da kuare.

Eticani eoŋ ŋes ka akeur ka ikekejaanakinak kanuka numam adolitekec; ayaun mamakec, ka neejaas luiboiete koYerusalem, ka neejaas ituŋa luka Yuda, aronis kere naabu kenerak kes, konye mam apotu kopuput.’ ”
Konye mam ŋes, ka ikekejaanakinak, ka ituŋa luka akwap, mam apotu kiirasi akiro nuka EJAKAIT nuenera kama ka Yeremia enabi.
Ido kolomanari Yeremia kolomununei da otuŋa: naarai aroko egolokino aenis.
Kelomunit ajore naka Parao anyoun ko Misiri: nakiirariata Ikaludean luerigaunito Yerusalem akirokec, konyout koYerusalem.
Kosodi kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ejai enabi Yeremia, kobala ebe:
“Inera kwanata EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael ebe: Ilimokini kwanata ekabaka loka Yuda, lokiijukunit jo aiŋit eoŋ, ebe, ‘Koany, eboŋori ajore naka Parao Misiri, akwapukec, naanyounit aisigalikin yes.
Eboŋunete bobo Ikaludean da, itijiete ere lo; irumete, icweikinete kakim.
Inera EJAKAIT kwanata ebe, Sirikimodomodas ebe, “Abeit enyounete Ikaludean kamawok”; naarai mam enyounete.
Naarai karaida kidanyata yesi ajore kere naka Ikaludean luejios kayes, kopianunos ituŋa luimusuŋitai bonik kakesi, tikenyout kesi, ŋinituŋanan kowemake, aicweikin ere lo kakim.’ ”
Kosodi kanen, nakenyou ajore naka Ikaludean kotoma Yerusalem kekuriakata ajore naka Parao,
kosodi Yeremia kolom ko Yerusalem alosit akwap naka Benyamin, adumun ekewai kaŋina kotoma otuŋa.
Nakejaar Ŋesi orute loka Benyamin kojai ekapolokiton loka ikedarak, ekekiror Iriya okoku loka Selemia, okoku loka Kanania; kikam enabi Yeremia, kobala ebe, “Isii ijo mama ejaas Ikaludean.”
Kobala Yeremia ebe, “Isabi ijo; mam eoŋ asiit oKaludean.” Konye koŋer Iriya akiirar. Kosodi kikam Yeremia koyaŋa mama ejaas ikapolok.
Konyunyurikis ikapolok Yeremia, kibuŋata, kogolokis aenis togo loka Yonatan ekewadikan; naarai etuluoritai etogo ŋol aenis.

kosodi kijuk ekabaka Sedekia aomare ŋes: kiŋit ekabaka ŋes kaiyeiyea kotogoke, atiar, “Ejai tope adiokirot naka EJAKAIT?” Kobala Yeremia ebe, “Ejai bo.” Kobala bobo ebe, “Kiinakinio jo akan naka ekabaka loko Babulon.”
Kotema bobo Yeremia ekabaka Sedekia atiar, “Nunyoika adiakaa kamakon, arai kokejaanakinakakon, arai kotuŋa lu, tape kigolokinete aenis?
Alu bo kwana inabinokus lukiidwarakinete ebe, ‘Mam ebuni ekabaka loko Babulon asurokin yes, karaida akusikwap’?
Aso kwana, kiirarai, wu ekajakait ekabaka, keŋaiŋait: kodolok akailip mamakon, keŋaiŋait; sirikiinyakak togo loka Yonatan ekewadikan, kenye atwanikin ŋina.”

Kosodi ekabaka Sedekia kicorak, kibwaikis Yeremia aidaris naka alaro naka ikedarak, koinanakinai ŋinipaaran emugati loeyaunio korot loka ikapeok, aitodol neadaunotor imugatin kere lukore. Kosalak Yeremia alaro naka ikedarak.
“Inera EJAKAIT kwanata ebe, Yeniboikini ore lo eari ekileŋ, ka eteŋei, ka atular: konye yenelomari mama ejaas Ikaludean ejari, einakinio da akeijar araun ŋnatuna, ido ejari.
Inera EJAKAIT kwanata atiar, Abeit einakinio ere lo akan naka ajore naka ekabaka loko Babulon, irumi ŋes.”

Kosodete ikapolok atemar ekabaka atiar, “Kiŋaiŋait koarai ekesa lo; naarai esijalijala akanin nuka ikajiok luesalito ore lo, akanin da nuka ituŋa kere, kanuka alimonokin akiro nuikote kwaka ŋun; naarai ekesa ŋol mam emoikinit ituŋa lu ajokis, dimarai aronis.”
Abu Sedekia ekabaka kotema atiar, “Koany, ejai akaninikus, naarai mam epedori ekabaka aisimik yes adiokirot.”
Kosodete koyaŋaasi Yeremia, kocakakis aipany naka Malikiya okoku loka ekabaka, naajai alaro naka ikedarak: kijoliliosi Yeremia kaunoi, Amameete akip kotoma aipany, dimarai erit: kiliko erit Yeremia.
kolom Ebed-melek kotogo loka ekabaka, kotema ekabaka atiar.
“Ekajakait ekabaka, eswamata ituŋa lu nueroko kakere nueswamakis Yeremia enabi, loacakakis aipany; ido ekot atwanikin aibois neejai kanuka eteŋei; naarai emameete inyamat kore.”
Kosodi ekabaka aicorakin Ebed-melek Etiopiat, kobala ebe, “Koyaŋa kane ituŋa akaisauni, kouparos kakes, kolemutu Yeremia enabi kaipany, eroko ketwana.”
Kosodi Ebed-melek koyaŋa ituŋa, kouparos kakes, koloma togo loka ekabaka kwap kaiŋadis, kolem inyakinyakia lumojoŋ luacakaritai, ka idapaica, kisijolilio kaunoi aipany mama ejai Yeremia.
Kosodi kotema Ebed-melek Etiopiat Yeremia atiar, “Kibwaik inyakinyakia lu lumojoŋ luacakaritai ka idapaica lu akirididinikon kanuka aunoi.” Kiswama Yeremia kwaŋin.
Kosodete airiun Yeremia kaunoi kaŋun, kolemut kaipany. Kosalak Yeremia alaro naka ikedarak.
Kosodi kijuka Sedekia ekabaka, koyaunai Yeremia enabi mamake alomaret nakiwuniet naejai togo loka EJAKAIT. Kotema ekabaka Yeremia atiar, “Keeŋit akirot; sirikimunonik adiokirot kere.”
Kosodi Yeremia kotema Sedekia atiar, “Arai kaalimok, mam kereka kipedor aiar eoŋ? Ido arai keecor, mam kiirari.”
Kosodi Sedekia ekabaka kiyapoik Yeremia kaiyeiyea, kiner ebe, “Kwape ejaria EJAKAIT, lokiisubakini oni aijar na, mam kaari, kwabo mam kainakini akan naka ituŋa ŋul luemoete akoniijar.”
Konye arai kiner alomar alosit mama ejaas ikapolok luka ekabaka loko Babulon, aso einakinio ere lo akan naka Ikaludean, ido icweikinete kakim, ijo da mam ikui kakanikec.”
Kosodi Sedekia ekabaka atemar Yeremia atiar, “Ayoŋit Iyudayan luasiata oKaludean, kenyeis ainakin akanikec, kesekeloto.”
Konye kotema Yeremia atiar, “Mam kiinakinete. Keŋaiŋait, korima eporoto loka EJAKAIT, kaŋun nukalimok jo: aso ijaun ejok, ejari da ekonitau.
Konye arai kiŋer alomar, na ŋes akirot naabu EJAKAIT ketodik eoŋ:
Koany, aŋor kere nukinyeinio kotogo loka ekabaka loka Yuda itolomunio mama ejaas ikapolok luka ekabaka loko Baulon, iŋerete aŋor kwa ebe,
‘Kimodete ipapero lukodicikon,
Kipikosi jo.
Epokata akonikejen kotoma orit,
Aboŋosi kesi kau.’
Kosodi kolimok Sedekia Yeremia ebe, “Sirikejenu ituŋanan akiro nu, aso mam itwani.
Konye arai kiirasi lukapolok ebe kinere kajo, epote kesi neijai atemar ebe, ‘Aso cani kolimokinai nuibu kolimok ekabaka; bobo da nukilimok ekabaka jo; sirikiimunonik sio, mam sio kiari jo’;
Kosodi ilimokini kes ebe, ‘Abu keŋaiŋa ekabaka, kenyek ainyakar togo loka Yonatan, kenyek atwanikin ŋina.’ ”
Kosodete kopotu ikapolok kere mama ejai Yeremia, kiŋita; kolimok akiro ŋun kere nuecorakini ekabaka, Kinyeis einer kaŋes, naarai mam apotu kopupos akiro.
Kosodi kosalak Yeremia alaro naka ikedarak, kiton apaaran naerumiarere Yerusalem.
kokaru lokitomonet kalodiopet loka Sedekia, kolap lokiwoŋonet, kapaaran nakikanyetekaoŋon naka elap, kocila ere.

Kosodi kanen naerumiarere Yerusalem, kolomas ikapolok kere luka ekabaka loko Babulon, kiboikinos orute lokokidiŋ, kes Neregal-sareser, Samugar-nebo, Saresekim lokerai Rab-saris, Neregal-sareser lokerai Rabmag, ka ikapolok ice kere luka ekabaka loko Babulon.
Kosodi kanen, keanyu Sedekia ekabaka loka Yuda, ka ikajiok kere, kokerata, konyout kotoma ore kuare, korot loka emanikor loka ekabaka, korute lokokidiŋ arwatatin aarei: koloma korot loka Araba.
Konye korukio ajore naka Ikaludean, kodolokis Sedekia kapuutona nuka Yeriko: kedaut aikamun, koyaŋaasi Ribula akwap naka Kamat, mama ejai Nebukadaresar ekabaka loko Babulon, kotubokinai akiro.
Kosodi koarak ekabaka loka Babulon odwe luka Sedekia Ribula, kakonyeneke; koar da ekabaka loko Babulon isotia kere luka Yuda.
Ido kogorununoi akonye nuka Sedekia, koenai ŋes kirikoi, ayaŋaar Babulon.
Kicweata Ikaludean etogo loka ekabaka, ka itogoi luka ituŋa, kotiyatiyata arwatatin nuka Yerusalem.
Kosodi Nebusaradan ekapolon loka ikedarak aijoreor luasalito luka ituŋa luapianuna kore, ka luasiete da mamakeŋ, ka luasalito luka ituŋa luapianuna, koyaŋa Babulon.
Konye kitasal Nebusaradan, ekapolon loka ikedarak, lukican kotuŋa, luamamei idiobore, toma akwap naka Yuda, koinak kes kapak kaŋin amanat nuka emusabibu ka imanikoria.
Ido kicorak Nebukadaresar ekabaka loko Babulon Nebusaradan, ekapolon loka ikedarak, nuka Yeremia ebe,
“Koyaŋa ŋes, kidari ŋes ejok, sirikiswamak nueroko; konye nukilimokini, ŋun iswamakini ŋes.”
Aso kijuka Nebusaradan, ekapolon loka ikedarak, ka Nebusasiban lokerai Rabsaris, ka Neregal-sareser lokerai Rab-mag, ka ijaka kere luka ekabaka loko Babulon;
kijuka, kolemasi Yeremia kalaro naka ikedarak, kijaikis Gedalia okoku loka Akikam, okoku loka Sapan, ayaŋaar orekeŋ. Kosodi kiboioto kituŋa.
Kobu do akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ejai Yeremia, naaenitere kalaro naka ikedarak, kobala ebe:
“Kolot, kolimok Ebed-melek Etiopiat ebe, ‘Inera kwanata EJAKAIT loka ajoresio, Edeke loka Isirael ebe, Koany, ayauni akakiro ore lo kanuka aronis, mere kanuka ajokis, ianyuni ijo da kes apaaran ya.
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Konye kayuuni jo kapaaran kaya; ido mam kiinakinio akan naka ituŋa luikuriana.
Naarai ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Abeit ketajari jo, mam ekileŋ kiari; konye eraun aijarakon aŋatuna: naarai kimunokina eoŋ.’ ”
Koya ekapolon loka ikedarak Yeremia, kotema atiar, “Enerak EJAKAIT Ekonideke aronis na kere aibois na:
Ido etodolik EJAKAIT, eswama kwape abu kinerar; naarai ipotu kodiakas kama ejai EJAKAIT, kwabo mam ipotu korimasi ekeporoto, kanuka ŋun kibunok akirot na.

Ido kwana koany, kalacakini lolo korikoi luejaas akaninikon. Arai itojokit ijo aupar keoŋ Babulon, aso kobia, kedarenenei jo ejok; konye arai eraas nueroko jo aupar keoŋ Babulon, kinye: koany, akwap kere ejai akonyenekon; kolot neitojokit ijo neiwomit edolit alosit.”

Kosodi eriŋa enyouno aboŋor, kotema atiar, “Koboŋo do neejai Gedalia okoku loka Akikam, okoku loka Sapan, loainaki ekabaka loko Babulon ayait ireria kere luka Yuda, kiboikin oreke otuŋa; arai bo ilosi kere neiwomit edolit alosit.” Kosodi ekapolon loka ikedarak ainakin ŋes inyamat, ka ainakinet, kolakak.
Kosodi Yeremia alosit mama ejai Gedalia okoku loka Akikam, Misipa, kiboikin oreke otuŋa luasalito kakwap.

Nakiirariata ikapolok kere lukorioŋeta luajaas okitui, kes ka ikecetuŋa, ebe, ainak ekabaka loko Babulon Gedalia okoku loka Akikam, ayait akwap, ido etitiŋ ikiliok ka aŋor ka idwe ludidik, kaŋul lukican luka akwap, lumam ejoreoritai Babulon;

kopotu mama ejai Gedalia Misipa, Isimael okoku loka Netania, ka Yokanan ka Yonatan odwe luka Karea, ka Seraia okoku loka Tanumet, ka odwe luka Epai Enetopatit, ka Yesania okoku loka Emaakatit, kes ka ikecetuŋa da.
Kosodi Gedalia okoku loka Akikam, okoku loka Sapan, kiyapoik kes ka ikecetuŋa kinera atiar, “Sirikiyoŋa aijaanakin Ikaludean. Kiboikinos akwap, kijaanakis ekabaka loko Babulon, ido ijaununete ejok.

Koany, ajaenena eoŋ Misipa, abwoenen kakonyen nuka Ikaludean, luepote mama kija oni. Konye yes, korukonokinete ebino, ka araito nuka akamu ka akinyet, kibwaanakinete oborokus, kiboienenete koreriakus luiruma.”

Idokwape kwaŋin Iyudayan kere luajaas toma Moab, ka lukotoma odwe luka Amon, kotoma Edom, ka luajaas toma akwapin kere, nakiirariata kwape esidoŋio ekabaka loko Babulon aatoŋot kotoma Yuda, ido adakaki Gedalia okoku loka Akikam, okoku loka Sapan ayait kes,
kosodete koboŋut Iyudayan kere anyoun kaiboisio kere nuereŋearitai, kopotu toma akwap naka Yuda, mama ejai Gedalia, Misipa, kotukonokis ebino ka araito nuka akamu nuipu noi teni.
Ido bobo kobu Yokanan okoku loka Karea, ka ikapolok kere lukorioŋeta luajaas okitui mama ejai Gedalia Misipa.
Kobalas ebe, “Ijeni kereka ijo ebe ejuku Baalis ekabaka loka idwe luka Amon Isimael okoku loka Netania aiar jo?” Konye kogirok Gedalia okoku loka Akikam kes.

Kosodi Yokanan okoku loka Karea kinera ka Gedalia ko Misipa kaiyeiyea, kobala ebe, “Keŋaiŋait, mere kalot, kaar Isimael okoku loka Netania, komam ituŋanan yenejenuni. Tikiarak jo inyo, tape Iyudayan kere luatukokina mama ijai isiarisiarunos, koolio aatoŋot naka Yuda?”
Konye Gedalia okoku loka Akikam kotema Yokanan okoku loka Karea atiar, “Sirikiswama akirot ŋin; naarai isabanakini Isimael.”
Kosodi konyou Isimael okoku loka Netania, ka ituŋa itomon Iuajaas kaŋes, kicumata Gedalia okoku loka Akikam, okoku loka Sapan, kekileŋ, koarata, loabu ekabaka loko Babulon kodakak ayait akwap.
Koar bobo Isimael lyudayan kere luajaas ka Gedalia, Misipa, ka Ikaludean luadumunio kaŋina, kes ikajiok.
Kosodi kanen apaaran nakiareit kedaun aiar Gedalia, komamei yenejeni,
kopotu ituŋa anyoun koSekem, ka Silo, ka Samaria, ituŋa akaisakanykauni luabarenito ipeneka, kocilicila anapitokec, kogerito awat, ekoditos ainakineta ka lukisupurununo, ayaŋaun togo loka EJAKAIT.
Konyou Isimael okoku loka Netania ko Misipa aisiriam kes, kolot mama ejaas emonyi. Kosodi kanen, kiriamakinos kakes, kotema kes atiar, “Kopotu neejai Gedalia okoku loka Akikam.”
Kosodete kedolut kidiŋ ore, koar Isimael okoku loka Netania kes, kocakak aipany, ŋes ka ituŋa luajaas kaŋes.

Konye kotakanut ituŋa itomon kotomakec, luatemarete Isimael atiar, “Sirikiara sio: naarai ejaas bukosi imono luebwaitai omanikor, akima, ka esairi, ka akinyet, ka esik.” Kosodi kinye, mam abu koar kes kwape kiinacanakec.

Kosodi kijoreo Isimael luedeunos kere luka ituŋa luajaas Misipa, kiton adwe nuka ekabaka, ka ituŋa da kere luasalito Misipa, luabu Nebusaradan ekapolon loka ikedarak kititiŋ Gedalia okoku loka Akikam. Kijoreo Isimael okoku loka Netania kes, konyou alosit mama ejaas idwe luka Amon.
koyaŋaasi ituŋa kere, koloto aitiji Isimael okoku loka Netania, kodumakis atapar naepol naajai Gibeon.
Kosodi kanen keanyutu ituŋa kere luajaas ka Isimael Yokanan okoku loka Karea, ka ikapolok kere luka irioŋeta luajaas kaŋes, kiyalamikinos.
Apotu ituŋa kere luejoreorit Isimael anyoun ko Misipa kibelokinos koboŋosi, koloto mama ejai Yokanan okoku loka Karea.
Konye koku Isimael okoku loka Netania kama ejai Yokanan, ŋes nepepe kituŋa ikanykauni, kolot mama ejaas idwe luka Amon.

Kosodi Yokanan okoku loka Karea, ka ikapolok kere luka irioŋeta luajaas kaŋes, koyaŋaasi aatoŋot kere naka ituŋa luabu Isimael kijoreo anyoun koMisipa, kedau aiar Gedalia okoku loka Akikam, kes ikajiok, ka aŋor, ka idwe, ka ibwacin, luenyakuni Yokanan koGibeon.
Koloto, kiboikinos Gerut Kimam, eiduny ka Bet-lekem, alosior Misiri,
kanuka Ikaludean; naarai kokuriakaros kes, naarai abu Isimael okoku loka Netania koar Gedalia okoku loka Akikam, loadakakinit ekabaka loko Babulon ayait akwap.

kotemasi enabi Yeremia atiar, “Kiŋaiŋait, kocam akosiilip, kilipak sio mama ejai EJAKAIT Ekonideke, ilipakini aatoŋot na kere; (naarai kisal idis taai kotoma luetia nen, kwape aanyuniata akonikonye sio).
Kitodik EJAKAIT Ekonideke sio erot lokibusakinit aitorenen, ka akirot da nakibusakinit aiswamaenen.”
Kosodi kotema enabi Yeremia atiar, “Keira yes; koany, elipi EJAKAIT Edekekus kwape ejaatar akusikiro; kosodi kanen akirot kere nakibonokini yes EJAKAIT, kalimokinete; mam kemunonikin adiokirot kere.”
Kosodete kotemasi Yeremia atiar, “Korau EJAKAIT ekajenan lokabeit lomunot kamawok, arai mam kiswamai kwape ejaar akirot kere nakijukunia EJAKAIT Ekonideke mamakosi.
Arai ejok, arai erono, kirimari eporoto loka EJAKAIT Ewokodeke, lokijukarit isio jo mama ejai; tetere kijaun ejok, arai kiirima eporoto loka EJAKAIT Ewokodeke.”
Kosodi kanen ketuboros apaarasia atomon, kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ejai Yeremia.
Kosodi konyarau ŋesi Yokanan okoku loka Karea, ka ikapolok kere luka irioŋeta luajaas kaŋes, ka ituŋa kere ageun ka ludidik kiton lukapolok.
Kotema atiar, “Inera kwanata EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael, lokiijukaritos mama ejai alimor akusiilip kakonyeneke ebe:
Arai kicamutu aiboi kakwap kana, aso kaduki yes, kwabo mam kebirorete, kerai yes, kwabo mam karutorete; naarai eitok aronis naabu keswama.
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Sirikikuriakata ekabaka loko Babulon, loikuriaka; sirikikuriakata ŋes, Naarai ajai eoŋ nepepe kayes aitajar, ka ayuun da yes kakanike.
Ido ainakini yes aitimio, tetere kitimi ŋesi yes, kisiboik akwapukus.
Konye arai ibalas ebe, ‘Mam kiboikin akwap na’; komam irimarete eporoto loka EJAKAIT Ekusideke;
ibalas ebe, ‘Mam; konye kilosi akwap nako Misiri, nemam kianyuni ejie, kwabo mam kiirari eporoto loka arupepe, ido mam kiriebi eteŋei loka inyamat; ŋina ŋes kiboikin,’

aso do kiirasi akirot naka EJAKAIT, yes aatoŋot naka Yuda. Inera kwanata EJAKAIT loka ajoresio, Edeke loka Isirael ebe: Arai kitogogoŋoto akusikonyen cut alomar akwap nako Misiri, kolototo aiboi ŋina;
kosodi kanen, kidolokini ekileŋ loiyoŋito kaŋina kakwap nako Misiri, eteŋei da loikuriaka, kiduduŋi yes kaŋina koMisiri, ido itwakikinete ŋina.
Ikonakinio nen ituŋa kere luitogogoŋito akecekonyen alosit Misiri aiboi ŋina; eari ekileŋ, ka eteŋei, ka atular da: emamei idio yenesali yenekui karonis naainuni kes.
Ener EJAKAIT mamakus, yes aatoŋot naka Yuda ebe, ‘Sirikiloto Misiri’: kojenutu cut ebe kekwenyarit yes lolo.

Naarai iswamata nukaimod kotauonokus, yes ikulepek; naarai ipotu kijukasi eoŋ mama ejai EJAKAIT Ekusideke, ibalas ebe, ‘Kilipakinai kama ejai EJAKAIT Ewokodeke: kere da nuetemari EJAKAIT Ewokodeke, kolimok sio, kiswamai isio da.’
Lolo da ketejenu yes; konye mam ipotu korimasi eporoto loka EJAKAIT Ekusideke kakiro kere nukejukunia mama ijaas.
Aso do kojenutu cut ebe kiari ekileŋ, ka eteŋei, ka atular da, kotoma akwap naikotosi alosit aiboi.”

kosodi Asaria okoku loka Kosaia, ka Yokanan okoku loka Karea, ka ituŋa kere luisoŋoloko, kinerata ka Yeremia kobalas ebe, “Iŋalai. Mam kijukunit EJAKAIT Ewokodeke einer ebe, ‘Sirikiloto Misiri aiboi ŋina.’
Konye Baruk okoku loka Neria ŋes kisidiki jo aijaikin sio akan naka Ikaludean, tetere kiarete kesi sio, ka aijoreor da Babulon.”
Aso Yokanan okoku loka Karea, ka ikapolok kere luka irioŋeta, ka ituŋa kere, mam apotu korimasi eporoto loka EJAKAIT, aiboikin akwap naka Yuda.
Konye koyaŋa Yokanan okoku loka Karea ka ikapolok kere luka irioŋeta, aatoŋot naka Yuda luaboŋunito anyoun katekerin kere nuereŋearitai aiboikin akwap naka Yuda,

ikiliok, ka aŋor, ka idwe ludidik, ka adwe nuka ekabaka, ka ŋinituŋanan yenenyekinia Nebusaradan ekapolon loka ikedarak Gedalia okoku loka Akikam, okoku loka Sapan, ka enabi Yeremia, ka Baruk okoku loka Neria.
Kolomasi akwap nako Misiri; naarai mam apotu korimasi eporoto loka EJAKAIT, Kodoloto Ta-panes.
Kosodi kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ejai Yeremia koTa-panes, kobala ebe:
“Kolem amor nuepolok akanikon, kibwa kotoma alup nuka amatapalin, nuejaas neelomarere togo loka Parao koTa-panes, kosesenete da ituŋa luka Yuda;

kolimok kes ebe: ‘Inera kwanata EJAKAIT loka ajoresio, Edeke loka Isirael ebe: Koany, ejukuni alemuni Nebukadanesar ekabaka loko Babulon, ekakejaanakinan, ebwaikini ekeicoloŋ loka ajakanut amor nu nuebwa; ido eterakini ewemake loka ekabaka mamakec.
Ido ebuni, edanyi akwap nako Misiri; einakini lukatular, atular, lukijoreo aijoreorio, lukekileŋ okileŋ.
Enokokini akim otogoi luka idekesio luko Misiri, ido icweikini kes, ijoreori kes: enapi akwap nako Misiri, kwape enapia ekecokon anapitoke; enyouni kaŋina inapakina.
Ido ebilibilei ipirin luka Bet-semes, loejai akwap nako Misiri; icweikini da kakim itogoi luka idekesio luko Misiri.’ ”
“Inera kwanata EJAKAIT loka ajoresio, Edeke loka Isirael ebe: Ianyut aronis kere naabu kayau Yerusalem, koreria da kere luka Yuda. Ido koany, eraas lolo amejei, emamei ituŋanan yeniboie kanen,
kanuka nukaronokokec nueswamata aitunyunyurikin eoŋ, naarai apaasi aisupuronokin lukisupurununo, ka aijaanakin da icedekesio, lumam kolo ajenete, kes, karaida yes, karaida lukapapaakus.
Konye abu kejukanak yes ikakejaanakinak kere inabin, adilonokini tupuruc aijukunun kes, kabala ebe, ‘Wu okwe! Sirikiswamata akirot na naketal naalait.’
Konye mam apotu kopuput, kwabo mam itoikino akeceki ainyein nukaronokokec, amamus aisupuronokin icedekesio lukisupurununo.
Ŋes abukokinia akanyunyura ka akadedeŋ, kinep koreria luka Yuda, korotin da luka Yerusalem; ido eswapa, emejeikis, kwape ejaatar lolo.

Aso do ŋes inerar kwanata EJAKAIT, Edeke loka ajoresio, Edeke loka Isirael, ebe: Kanukinyo iswamakiniata ikusitauon aronis naetia ne, yes amudiar ekiliokit ka aberu, ka ikoku ka imukeru da kotoma Yuda, ainyein yes komamei yenasalit?

Kanukinyo kitunyunyurikiniata eoŋ kanuka aswamisio nuka akaninikus, isupuronokinete icedekesio lukisupurununo kakwap nako Misiri naipotu kopotu aiboi; tape kimudiario, araun ekenit, ka amorosit kotoma atekerin kere nuka akwap?

Kimurwok kereka yes aronis naka lukapapaakus, ka aronis naka ikabakan luka Yuda, ka aronis naka aŋorokec, ka aronisikus, ka aronis da naka aŋorokus, naapotu kiswamata kakwap naka Yuda, korotin da luka Yerusalem?
Mam itisilaara kiton lolo, kwabo mam eyoŋito, ido mam elosenenete kokisilaka, karaida kaicorakinetaka, nuabu kebwaik kakonyenekus, kakonyen da nuka lukapapaakus.

Ayaŋaari aatoŋot naka Yuda, luetogogoŋete akecekonyen alosit akwap nako Misiri aiboi kaŋina, epiario kes kere, Ebiroros kakwap nako Misiri; epiari ekileŋ, ka eteŋei; etwakete kekileŋ, ka eteŋei ageun kalodidi kiton lokapolon: eraunete aimuario, ka aumokinet, ka ekenit, ka amorosit.
Naarai eticani ŋul luiboiete kakwap nako Misiri, kwape abu keticania Yerusalem, kekileŋ, ka eteŋei, ka atular da.
Tetere mam ekui karaida aisal imodio kaatonot naka Yuda luaponito aiboi akwap nako Misiri, aboŋor akwap naka Yuda, naemielas kesi aboŋor aiboi. Naarai emamei yeneboŋori dimarai idis luekuete.”.

Kosodete koboŋokis ituŋa kere Yeremia, luajenete kwape esupuronokiniata aŋorokec icedekesio lukisupurununo, ka aŋor kere nukebwoete kosiepikec, atukot naepol, ituŋa kere luiboiete kakwap nako Misiri, kotoma Paturos, kobalas ebe,
“Akirot naibu kolimok sio kokiror loka EJAKAIT, mam kiirari.

Konye abeit kiswamai ŋinikirot naelomuni kaitukekosi, aisupuronokin akabaka naka akuj lukisupurununo, abukonokin ŋes ainakineta numatan, kwape kiswamaa, isio ka lukapapaakosi, ikabakanakosi, ka ikapolokokosi, koreria luka Yuda, korotin da luka Yerusalem: naarai kapak kaŋin ŋes kimonianakinor inyamat, kajaut ejok, komam kianyunit nukaronok.
Konye netikolo kinyeinia aisupuronokin akabaka naka akuj lukisupurununo, abukonokin ŋes ainakineta numatan, kitwakia kere, kipiari kekileŋ keteŋei.”

Kobalas aŋor da ebe, “Nakiisupuronokinia akabaka naka akuj lukisupurununo, abukonokin da ainakineta numatan, kepoonokis imugatin amaia, kabukonokis ainakineta numatan, mam kereka acamunito ikosikiliok?”
Kosodi kolimok Yeremia ituŋa kere, ikiliok ka aŋor da, kes ituŋa kere luaboŋokinete ŋes kwaŋin, kobala ebe:

“Lukisupurununo luisupurununete koreria luka Yuda, korotin da luka Yerusalem, yes ka lukapapaakus, ikusikabakan ka ikapolokokus, ka ituŋa luka akwap, mam kereka abu EJAKAIT kiitu, ido mam apotu kojaut otauke?

Tape mam epedori EJAKAIT cut atitiŋikin bobo, kanuka aronis naka aswamisiokus, kanuka italesia luipotu kiswamata; ŋes ainakin akwapukus eraun ameje, ka aumokinet, ka ekenit da, komamei yeniboie kotoma, kwape ejaar lolo.

Naarai ipotu kisupurununut lukisupurununo, ido naarai ipotu kodiakasi kama ejai EJAKAIT, kwabo mam erimara eporoto loka EJAKAIT, ido mam eloseneno kokisilake, karaida kaicorakinetake, karaida toma aitejenunetake; ŋes ainakin aronis na kidolokini yes, kwape ejaar lolo.”

Inera kwanata EJAKAIT loka ajoresio, Edeke loka Isirael ebe: Inerata yesi ka akusiŋor kaitukekus, itodolikis da kakusikanin ebe, ‘Abeit kitodolikin aiyaposiokos nukiyapot, aisupuronokin akabaka naka akui lukisupurununo, ka abukonokin ainakineta numatan.’ Aso kiticata aiyaposiokus, kitodolo da aiyaposiokus.

Aso do kiirasi akirot naka EJAKAIT, yes kere luka Yuda luiboiete kakwap nako Misiri. Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Koany, eyapo kalimit ekakiror lokos ebe mam bobo elimitoi ekakiror kaituk kere naka ituŋanan yenika Yuda kakwap kere nako Misiri, ebe, ‘Kwape ejaria EJAKAIT.’
Koany, eteenenei kes kakoŋu naerono, konye mere kanaejok; epiari ekileŋ ka eteŋei ituŋa kere luka Yuda luejaas akwap nako Misiri, aitodol needaunotor.

Ŋul da luekuete kokileŋ enyounete kakwap nako Misiri eboŋorete akwap naka Yuda idis taai: ejenunete ŋul aatoŋot kere naka Yuda lualomut aiboi akwap nako Misiri, nakaŋai akirot naebwoi, nakaŋ, arai nakec.
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Na ŋes aanyunet kamakus, ebe, eticani yes kaibois kana, kojenutu cut kwape Icasitotor akakiro kamakus kanuka aronis.

Inera EJAKAIT kwanata ebe, Koany, ainakini Parao Kopura ekabaka loko Misiri akan naka lukasurupoke, kakan da naka ŋul kaluemooto akeijar; kwape abu kainakinia Sedekia ekabaka loka Yuda akan naka Nebukadaresar ekabaka loko Babulon, lokasurupike, loamoot akeijar.”
“Inera kwanata EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael, neijai ijo, Baruk, ebe:
Ibu kotema atiar, ‘Wu okwe! Abei ai? Naarai eyataki EJAKAIT ican toma arieboka; kapas eidinyaka, kwabo mam adumunit aiyeŋun kere.’
Itemari Ŋes kwanata atiar, Inera kwanata EJAKAIT ebe: Koany, aketari ŋin yenabu kaduk, arutori da ŋin yenabu kera; ido eswamakini kwaŋin akwap kere.
Imoot ijo nuepolok? Sirimoot; naarai ebala EJAKAIT ebe: Koany, ayauni aronis mama ejaas ŋul kere luejai akuan, konye ainakini akoniijar araut aŋatuna kaiboisio kere nuilosenenei.”
Kikunyakis ejie!
Kopesikis nupetan abalasin;
Kibwanenoto, yes ikebwanenok!
Kiderakinos, konapitos abokoikus nuka aisinin;
Kopwata akwaras, konapitos ikootin luka asua!
Aburut, aboŋosi kau.
Ebironor ikiriginikec,
Ido anemesiaros, mam eŋoliarete kau.
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe,
Ejai etasuro owaitin kere!
Karaida ekirigi aiku;
Kari naka agolitomei kariri naka ecor Eupurate,
Eguikis, ebiroros.
Kwape icorin lukibukas akipikec?
Anyou Misiri kwape Nile,
Ibukas akekipi kwape icorin.
Kobala ebe, Anyouni, karapak akwap kere;
Amudiari ere ka ŋul da luiboiete kotoma.
Kodokasi yesi, ibalasin;
Kikerepikis yesi, agalin!
Kolomasi ikirigin;
Ituŋa luka Etiopia ka Put luekapitos iupalin;
Ituŋa da luka Lud, luekapitos luikesito da akabwai.
Edeke loka ajoresio,
Apaaran naka enyaŋit, inyaŋakini lukasurupoke.
Enyami ekileŋ, imonikini da,
Ido emasi aokotokec itekori cut.
Naarai ejai EJAKAIT, Edeke loka ajoresio, asubanit
Akwap naka ari naka agolitomei,
Kariri naka ecor Eupurate.
Ijo akoku nabekot nako Misiri!
Itwasamai taai ikee luipu:
Komamei aŋaleun kamakon.
Eirasi atekerin ikonileic,
Elelebun akoniimony akwap;
Naarai eriama ekirigi ka ekirigi,
Ebiroros kere nepepe.”
“Kolimosi koMisiri, kitisiarikis ko Migidol,
Kitisiarikis koNop, ka Ta-panes;
Kineras atiar, ‘Kobwou, kokapakin;
Naarai anyam ekileŋ iwaitinikon.’
Kanukinyo amearere ikonikirigin?
Mam ebwouna, naarai EJAKAIT ereŋet.
Kobalas ebe, ‘Kanyoutu,
Kaboŋosi otuŋawok, akwap nakobuwok,
Akerit ekileŋ lokireit.’
Konyarata Parao, ekabaka loko Misiri ekekiror,
‘Ekepopolan loitumori apak titai.’
Kwape ajaria, abeit kwape Tabor oroŋan,
Ido kwape Karamel ariri kaŋolol,
Ebuni ŋesi.
Kitemok iboro lukiŋatarere;
Naarai eraun Nop ameje,
Icweio, komamei yeniboikin.
Konye enyouni ekamonit kagolitomei, kobunok ŋes.
Ido ituŋake lukeropit kotomake esubito bala itak luetumito;
Naarai aboŋosi kesi da, akerata nepepe,
Mam ebwouna:
Naarai adolok kes apaaran naka icanikec,
Apak naka aiticaniokec.
Naarai eracete lukasurupokec alosit ajore,
Elosete kokapito aepei,
Kwape ikajepak ikito.
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe,
Ejepete amagoroke,
Karaida mam epedori aitorio;
Naarai itelekarito kesi emaase kaipues;
Ido mam imarunos.
Irumete apese nako Misiri ileic;
Ijaikinio akan naka ituŋa luka agolitomei.”
Akorakini kes akan naka ŋul kaluemoete akeceijar, kakan naka Nebukadanesar ekabaka loko Babulon, ka akan da naka ikekejaanakinak. Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Kokau iboikinos ituŋa, kwape apaarasia nukolosek.
Kwabo sirikiibur, ijo Isirael:
Naarai koany, ketajari jo kama elwana,
Ka akoniwur da kakwap naka aijoreoriokec.
Eboŋuni Yakob, iyamakin ijamamai,
Emameuni do yenitukuriani.
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe,
Sirikiyoŋ, ijo Yakob ekakejaanakinan,
Naarai ajaenena kajo,
Naarai apiari atekerin kere nukereŋearit,
Konye jo, mam kapiari cut.
Naarai kaleconori jo motimot,
Kwabo mam kenyeini cut komam keticanenenei.”
Koany, edakunos akip kagolitomei,
Eraunete kesi ecor loelelei;
Eleleete kesi toma akwap ka iboro kere da luejaas toma,
Ore ka luiboiete kotoma.
Emonyete ituŋa,
Ibwololoete kere luiboiete kotoma.
Amositoi naka agalinike, aikururitoi naka ikokoron,
Mam lukapapa keŋolianarete kau mama ejaas idwekec,
Naarai alaiakakas akaninikec.
Amudiar ŋolikeŋarakinan kere
Loideuna koTuro ka Sidon.
Naarai eŋatari EJAKAIT Ipilisitian,
Aatoŋot naka apujan naka Kaputor.
Etamamaun Asukelon.
Ijo aatoŋot naka aditotokec,
Itodoli ai agera?
Itodoli ai komam iyeŋuni?
Koloma toma akurarukon;
Kiyeŋu, kililiŋ!
Arai kicorakinit EJAKAIT?
Ecorakinit mama ejai Asukelon,
Ka ariri naka aŋolol.”
Inera kwanata EJAKAIT loka ajoresio,
Edeke loka Isirael ebe:
“Itukwi Nebo! naarai eswap!
Esurumi Kiriataim ileic, eŋataritai.
Esurumi Misigab ileic, atiyatiyai;
Emamei bobo aiturio nako Moab.
Enerakin aronis kotoma Kesibon ebe,
‘Kopotu, kamudiasi kinyek araun ateker!’
Ijo da, wu Madumen, kiaililiŋio;
Kirukitori ekileŋ.
“Eporoto loka ecelet loebuni koKoronaim,
‘Aiŋat, ka amudiar naepol!’
Amudiar Moab;
Apupun aimony naka idweke ludidik.
Naarai kaneedokere Lukit edokarete
Komonyenenete akiyo;
Naarai kaneejesarere Koronaim,
Apotu kopuputu aimony nakican naka amudiario.
Kokera! Kitajarata akusiijar!
Kosubata bala ekiot loka amodiŋ!
Ka abarakon jo da kikamario:
Ijoreorio Kemos, ka isasedotinike,
Ka ikapolokoke da nepepe.
Edolokini ekaŋatan ŋolire,
Emameun ere loekui;
Eoliori aditot, emudiario da apuuton;
Kwape enerar EJAKAIT.
“Koinak Moab abebenoka,
Kopororia kolot;
Eraunos ikereria amejei,
Komamei da yeniboie kotoma.
Ijililiara akesidak;
Komam ailocoloeoo anyoun kobore kiton obore,
Ido mam ijoreoritai;
Kanuka ŋun eroko esalit akejijim tomake,
Ido mam auresike iiulakina.
“Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Aso koany, epote apaarasia nuejukunia ŋul luebukonorete, ido ebukonorete ŋes; itoonete amotiike, ebwaŋabwaŋaete da acupaike.
Irumete Moab ileic kanuka Kemos, kwape erumiata ileic ekek loka Isirael kanuka Bet-el loamunokina.
Ka luetirin kojie’?
Adoku ekamudiaran loka Moab ka ireriake,
Ekokorioros ikatumunakake luseuna oarit.
Eapiete ican luka Moab adolun,
Arurukun aiticanitoike.
Ka yes da kere luijenete ekekiror;
Kobalas ebe, ‘Abila ca ma ebela lokagogoŋ,
Esuretait loejok!’
Kikokoror anyoun kaibusesukon,
Kiboikin, kojakite akure.
Naarai kibunok ekamudiaran loka Moab,
Amudia abwasinakon nuegogoŋ.
Kobwou korot airot:
Kiŋit loekeri ka ŋin da naekui;
Kiner ebe, ‘Anyoika bo?’
Kibwololoto, komonyata!
Kolimosi kotoma Arunon ebe, Eswap Moab.
“Adoloki atubokinio akwap naka apuutona; Kolon, ka Yasa, ka Mepaat,
ka Dibon, ka Nebo, ka Bet-dibilataim;
ka Kiriataim, ka Betgamul, ka Bet-meon;
ka Keriot, ka Bosura, ka ireria kere luka akwap nako Moab, luejaas kama elwana, ka lueapiete da.
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Atubor amumwarat naka Moab, abila akekan da.
Naarai mam kereka kerai Isirael eimuaritono kamakon? Aponi kereka kodumakinai kidiŋ kikokolak? Naarai nainerenenar nuke, imunimuŋi akonikou.
Kiboioto katiiba!
Kosuba bala adudumer naiswamai akaike
Ariri kaituk naka ebur.
Ebe iturokina noi;
Aitopolooroke, ka eiturike, aomiarake,
Ka aisoŋolonut da naka etauke.
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Ajeni ekepali;
Iŋalaŋalai ailabilabake,
Iŋalaŋalaete da akeswamisio.
Eebo, adelori kanuka Moab kere:
Ebworo kanuka ituŋa luka Kir-keres.
Amonyi akiyo kanukon, adepar aimony naka Yaser;
Apesito akonitenun adepar aŋolol,
Kodolot aŋolol naka Yaser;
Ebirokin ekaŋatan araitokon nuka akamu,
Ka ludwenyanakon.
Ido etoonikini ebino kotoma acuesia;
Emameuni yenicakacakai keibwoŋ;
Acela ŋin mam erai acela naka eibwoŋ.
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Bobo da etanaŋi kotoma Moab yeneinakini asuban kaiboisio nuiceleleete, ka ŋin da yenisupurikini ikedekesio lukisupurununo.
Kanuka ŋun emonyi ekatau kanuka Moab kwape alamarun, emonyi ekatau kwape alamarun kanuka ituŋa luka Kir-keres: kanuka ŋun aolio abar naatukonokinit.
Ejai akuudian kokuju otogoi kere luka Moab, korotinike da kere; naarai ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Abwaŋ Moab kwape amot namam kesiyalamikinit.
Abwaŋa ca! Ebwololoto ca! Ebeloki ca ma Moab asebot kileic! Eraun do Moab naimuario naituburuni ŋul kere luirimorito ŋes.”
“Koany, eporori kwape kemorukaalet,
Loeterari akebebenoka asurokin Moab.
Eraunos itauon luka ikirigin luka Moab kapaaran kaŋin,
Kwape etau loka aberu naerieba aidoun.
Naarai itopolooro kama ejai EJAKAIT.
Wu jo loiboie koMoab,
Kibunokinete jo etasuro, ka aipany, ka atacit da.
ŋol loekeri kotasuro ibirokin aipany;
Ŋol da loekui kaipany, ipoki atacit:
Naarai ainuni Moab ŋun,
Okaru loka aiticanioke.
Kotolim loka Kesibon;
Naarai alom akim koKesibon,
Alomut aipelonoreta nuka akim kokidiŋ Sikon;
Anyamata agor naka Moab,
Ka aboko da naka akwes nuka luecelas.
Aoliosi ituŋa luka Kemos:
Naarai ijoreoritai ikusidwe lusap,
Akusipesur da ijoreoritai.
Abeit enyakuni bobo aijoreorio naka Moab
Kapaarasia nukawasia.”
Adol ber ne atubokinio naka Moab.
Inera EJAKAIT kwanata ebe:
“Emameete teni Isirael idwe lusap?
Emamei kereka ekeruman?
Aso kanukinyo irumia Malakam Gad,
Iboioto da ituŋake koreriake?
Aso koany, epote apaarasia
Nuetupupunio elala loka ejie
Asurokin Raba loka idwe luka Amon;
Eraun ameje naesilior,
Icwei akim akepesur.
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe,
Kosodi Isirael airum lulem irumito ŋes.
Kikalalata, yes apesur nuka Raba!
Konapata ipukoi,
Kokuudianata, kokerata ŋiniibois kere kabwasin!
Naarai ijoreorio Malakam,
Ka isasedotinike ka ikapolokoke da nepepe.
Aditotokon naelelei,
Ijo apese naeboŋonori kau?
Naemunokina abarake, kobala ebe,
‘Iŋai bo kabunokini?’
Ebala EJAKAIT Edeke loka ajoresio ebe,
Koany, kainuni akurian,
Kotoma kere lukirimorito;
Kireŋeario yes ŋinituŋanan neelwana noi,
Ido emamei yenetukonokini luiposiaros.
Inera kwanata EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe:
“Emamei kereka bobo acoa koTeman?
Aolio ca ainerun kotoma omisioitin?
Elicar cut acoakec?
Yes luiboiete koDedan;
Naarai ainuni Esau ican,
Kapak naeticania ŋes.
Mam ti kedepanasi ace?
Arai kiponikinitos ikokolak kuare,
Mam tikemudiasi aitodol neeupiata?
Apukorit akeiboisio nukaiyeiyea,
Mam epedori aiŋop.
Amudiar aurike, ka ikeinacan, ka ikeidunyeta da;
Ŋes da arumor.
Kinyek ikonidwe eraas ikokiok,
Edari eoŋ koraut luejarete;
Ka akonipuserun da kamunokinos eoŋ.”
Naarai ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Eyapoikin elopet ebe eraun Bosura aumokinet, ka amorosit, ka ameje, ka ekenit da; eraunete ikereria kere amejei nutir.”
Iyakuunitai ekiyakia katekerin ebala ebe:
“Kotukonokinos nepepe, kosurokis,
Konyout kojioto!
Naarai koany, ketidisiari jo kotoma atekerin,
Ainakin da ituŋa aimwaŋ jo.
Kimodata jo aitukurianetakon nusogim,
Ka aisoŋolonut nakotaukon,
Ijo loiboie kabuai nuka atiida,
Loirumit aidi naka eukot.
Karaida kiduki akonikai kuju kwape kemorukaalet,
Ketodokuni kaŋina.
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Kwape amudiarere Sodom ka Gomora ka ireria kere luidunyatar, emameun ituŋanan yenejaun ŋina, kwabo emameun ikoku yenika ituŋanan yeniboikin nen.

Koany, edokari kwape eŋatuny loebuni kamoni naka Yorodan asurokin aibois naegogoŋ: konye etekeri ŋes katipet; ido adakakini ŋin yenaseuni ayait ŋes, Naarai iŋai bo eputosi keoŋ? Ido iŋai bo kebwaikini apak? Iŋai da ekecokon lokabwoikini eoŋ?
Aso kiirasi ainerun naka EJAKAIT, naeneru kanuka Edom; kaŋun nuelosikinit mama ejaas luiboiete koTeman: abeit iriarete kesi ludidik luka esipan; abeit eburunete anukiakec kanukec.
Emarani akwap kanuka epororo loka aibirorikec; ejai acalanari, epupunio eporotoke kAŋolol Nakareŋan.
Koany, edokari eporori kwape kemorukaalet, loeterari akebebenoka asurokin Bosura: eraunos itauon luka ikirigin luka Edom kapaaran kaŋin kwape etau loka aberu naerieba aidoun.”
“Erumata Kamat ileic, ka Arapad da;
Naarai eirasi akiro nueroko,
Ajuruŋuŋata itauon;
Iyaloŋoŋoete kwape aŋolol namam inapakina.
Ekamu amaran;
Adumu ariebo ka ican,
Kwape aberu naerieba aidoun.
Ere loka akaiyalama?
Ebala EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe,
Kanuka ŋun ŋes ibironokinotor ikekatumunak orotinike,
Emudiario da ikajiokoke kere kapaaran kaŋin.
Icwei itogoi lukapolok luka Ben-kadad.”
Inera EJAKAIT kwanata ebe:
“Konyoutu, kodokasi Kedar!
Koŋata idwe lukokide!
Aigalisiokec, ka iborokec kere,
Edemarete da akaalaikec:
Ilulukinere ebe, ‘Erum etasuro iwaitin kere!’
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe,
Kokera, koriariata, koŋopata,
Yes luiboiete koKasor:
Naarai eneru Nebukadaresar ekabaka loka
Babulon nukasurokin yes,
Apet nuelosikinit aiswamakin yes.
Konyoutu, kodokasi mama ejai ateker naijamamai,
Naiboie inapakina;
Naemameete irutei karaida ariino,
Naiboie egitara.
Isipanin da lukibarenekec lukoran.
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe,
Esiarakini luekebito arokio mama ejaas ikwamin kere,
Ido ainuni kes ican luepote kowaitin kere.
Ameje namam edaun:
Emamuun ituŋanan yenejaun ŋina,
Kwabo emamuun ikoku yenika ituŋanan yeniboikin nen.”
Ainuni Elam ikwamin iwoŋon anyoun kariino aoŋon nuka akuj, ido eweliwelari mama ejaas ikwamin ŋul kere; emameun areker namam edolete luereŋearitai luka Elam.

Ainakin Elam aburun kakonyen nuka lukasurupokec, kakonyen da nuka ŋul kaluemooto aijarakec. Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Ainuni kes aronis, ŋes akanyunyura naededeŋ, ejukuni ekileŋ arukio kes, aitodol neamudiaria kes.
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Ebwaikini ekaicoloŋ Elam, amudiari kanen ekabaka ka ikapolok da.
“Konye ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Kapaarasia nukawasia, enyakuni bobo aijoreorio naka Elam.”
Kikiasi emedera, Kitejenut,
Sirikimunonikis: kineras atiar,
‘Aŋatar Babulon,
Erumata Bel ileic,
Eyalonoŋ Merodak,
Erumata aputosiake ileic,
Iyaloŋoŋoete akeputosia nuegerer.’
Iŋisete nuka Sion, kotereitos ereetakec ŋina, kobalas ebe, ‘Kopotu, kemorikikinos ka EJAKAIT kaitutuket namam edaun namam imurwokinio.’
“Araur ikatuŋa amerekekin nukeoliorete; etooliosi ikecokokokec, etapaasi oroŋan: anyout koroŋat kiton oukot, imurwokinito nekeuriakenenata.
Anyamata kere lukeanyunete: kobalas lukasurupokec ebe, ‘Mam kigwaunit akiro, naarai adiakasi kama ejai EJAKAIT, aiboisikec nakabeit, ŋes EJAKAIT, amun naka lukapapaakec.’

Naarai koany, etwekenyuni etodokari da atukot naka atekerin nukapolok asurokin Babulon, nuepote kagolitomei: iderakinos asurokin ŋes: ameun kanen eŋatario. Eraunos ikecekojoi bala luka ikirigin luenaikinito, lumam eboŋunete epalapalato.
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Eŋatario Kaludea: imonikinos kere lueŋatarete ŋes.
Yes luiŋatasi akairumet,
Naarai icuros kwape ataok naicakacakai akima,
Icieinas kwape abalasin nuegogoŋ;
Irumete totokus ileic noi;
Itirirai ŋin nakiwuruuni,
Koany, eraun ŋesi awasia naka atekerin,
Amodiŋ, akwap nalarioŋ, elet.
Kanuka anyunyura naka EJAKAIT mam iboikinoi,
Konye eraun asilio:
Eumokin ŋin yenitori Babulon,
Isuari icanike kere.
Kiderakinos asurokin Babulon kowaitin kere,
Yes kere luikesito akabwai;
Kogumata ŋes, sirikitasalata imalia;
Naarai adiaka kama ejai EJAKAIT.
Alo akanin;
Ebiroros apetetake,
Atiyanar akerwatatin.
Naarai lo ŋes enyaŋit loka EJAKAIT;
Kinyaŋakis;
Kwape kolo eswamaa,
Kiswamakis ŋes kwaŋin.
Ka yenekapit ekurupeta kapak naka aisak:
Kanuka aiyoŋ ekileŋ loereit,
Eboŋori ŋinituŋanan mama ejaas iketuŋa,
Ekeri ŋinituŋanan akwap nakobukec.
Ŋes inerar kwanata EJAKAIT loka ajoresio Edeke loka Isirael ebe: Koany, eticani ekabaka loko Babulon ka akekwap, kwape abu keticania ekabaka loka Asuria.
Ido enyakuni Isirael bobo toma oronyiake, ido edakenena ŋesi Karamel ka Basan, imonikini eketau koukon luka Epuraim ka Gilead da.
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Kapaarasia kaŋun, kapak kaŋin, emootai numam adolit nuka Isirael, kwabo emameete; aronisio da nuka Yuda, kwabo mam etakanunete: naarai esioniei ŋul lualeleŋi araun aatoŋot.
Kosurokis da luiboiete koPekod,
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe,
Koara, komudiasi cut atupakin kes,
Kiswamata kere nuabu kecorak.
Ejai ecelet loka ejie toma akwap,
Ka amudiar naepol!
Aluor cama Babulon ameje kokidiŋ atekerin!
Mam ibu kojen:
Itakanu, kikamun da,
Naarai ipegata ka EJAKAIT.
Alemu lujiis luka anyunyurake,
Naarai ejai EJAKAIT,
EJAKAIT loka ajoresio,
Aswam naelosi aswam kaŋina,
Kakwap naka Ikaludean.
Kopotu kosurokis anyoun kaŋoliikoru,
Kodakasi asotoi nuka idulake;
Kotukonosi atukon,
Kosodete amudiar cut:
Sirikitasala imodiobore kere.
Kijesaros oarit.
Itukwi kes! Naarai adolu akecepaaran,
Apak naka aiticaniokec.
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Kanuka ŋun ŋes ibirokinotor ikekatumunak orotinike, emudiario da ikajiokoke kere kapaaran kaŋin.
“Ebala EJAKAIT, EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe,
Koany, kasurokin eoŋ jo, ijo ekewoŋot,
Naarai adolo akonipaaran,
Apak naketicania.
Ido emameun yenitonyouni:
Esinepikini akim oreriake,
Enyami da ŋul kere luirimorito.
“Inera kwanata EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe: Ereitai idwe luka Isirael ka idwe luka Yuda; ŋul da kere luapotu kijoreosi kes eridakinito; eŋerito aosikin.
Egogoŋ Ekalakunanikec, EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ŋes ekekiror. Abeit epuri kanukec, tetere isinapikini akwap, konye isiyalononoi luiboiete koBabulon.
Ka luiboiete koBabulon,
Ka ikapolokoke, ka lukacoake da.
Esurokini ekileŋ ikelabilabak,
Koluoros ibaŋiok:
Esurokini ekileŋ ikiriginike,
Eburunete.
Ka ituŋa kere luinyalinyaluna luejaas kokidiŋike,
Eraunos ŋul bala aŋor.
Esurokini ekileŋ abarake,
Eŋatario.
Naarai erai akwap naka aputosia nuegerer,
Abaŋakaros kotoma aputosia.
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Kwape kolo ebiroria Edeke Sodom ka Gomora ka ireria kere luedunyatar, kwaŋin emameun ituŋanan yenejaun ŋina, karaida ikoku yenika ituŋanan yeniboiororoi nen.
Ateker napeti,
Isikwenyunio ikabakan luipu
Anyoun kosaŋeta luka akwap.
Ededeŋ, emamei da aitim;
Irurumai eporotokec bala aŋolol,
Ibwanenitos abalasin;
Ederakinos mamakon kwape ikajiok,
Ijo apese naka Babulon.
Alajakakata akaninike;
Adita akirot etauke,
Ka ariebo kwape naka aberu kanaerieba aidoun.
Aso kiirasi ainerun naka EJAKAIT, naeneru kanuka Babulon; kaŋun nuelosikinit mama ejai akwap naka Ikaludean: Abeit iriete kesi ludidik luka esipan; abeit ekuriakaros aiboisiokec kanukec.
Emarani akwap kanuka ecelet loka aŋatar Babulon, epupunio adelonorike kotoma atekerin.”
Inera EJAKAIT kwanata ebe:
“Koany, etonyouni ekwam loemudiari
Asurokinia Babulon,
Ka ŋul da kere luiboiete ko Kaludea.
Ikekeete ŋes,
Epiarete akwap:
Naarai esurokinete kowaitin kere
Kapaaran naka ican.
Lokakabwa sirikiket akabwake,
Ido sirikebwo konapite anapitoke naka asua,
Sirikitimo ikatumunakake;
Komudiasi cut ajoreke kere.
Luimusuŋitai da orotinike.
Mam ejalit Isirael ka Yuda;
Karaida kileleba akwapukec adiakanareta
Kama ejai Ekalaunan loka Isirael.
Kitajar ŋinituŋanan akeijar!
Kinyeis amudiario kanumam adoliteke:
Naarai erai apak naka enyaŋit loka EJAKAIT,
Etacakini ŋes eropitike.
Naitemerikinia akwap kere;
Amata atekerin ebinoke;
Kanuka ŋun ikerepikinito atekerin.
Kibwololoto kanukeŋ!
Kolemikisi ekia kanuka arieboke,
Diat itaŋaleunio.
Konye mam itaŋaleun,
Kojala do ŋes,
Kaloto ŋinituŋanan obukec:
Naarai adol aketubokinio toma akuj,
Ikiariokiton odouon
Kopotu, kalimosi koSion
Aswamisio nuka EJAKAIT Edekewok.
Kokapa ibukui!
Esidik EJAKAIT itauon luka ikabakan luka Imedin; naarai elosikinit amudiar Babulon; naarai erai enyaŋit loka EJAKAIT, ainyaŋ eyekaluke.
Kitogogoŋoto eidare;
Kibwaikis ikedarak;
Kitemokis ikaperunok;
Naarai elosikinit EJAKAIT, ido eswama
Nuenerakinit luiboiete koBabulon.
Adol awasiakus,
Etiai loka eraŋakus.
Abeit kesilelebikini ituŋa, kwape enyede;
Ikalalaete eibwoŋ kamakon.
Kanuka acoake abu kiticat akwap,
Kanuka aijeneke da abu kopesik akuj.
Ido itodokaari elisina anyoun kosaŋeta luka akwap.
Iswamakini akiru eimilia,
Itolomuni da ekwam kaiŋadisiake.
Aputoke naegerer isurumi ŋolikatatan-esabu ileic:
Naarai erai aputoke naecalara aiŋal,
Emamei eiyeŋane kotomake.
Kapak naka aiticaniokec eoliorete.
Naarai erai ŋesi lokasuban iboro kere,
Isirael da ŋes ateker naka airumuke;
EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ŋes ekekiror.
Kabilibilia jo atekerin,
Kamudiaria ajakanuto.
Kabilibilia jo ebalasi ka ekebwanenonike;
Kabilibilia jo ekiliokit ka aberu;
Kabilibilia jo emojoŋ ka esapat;
Kabilibilia jo ekatumunan ka apese;
Kabilibilia jo ekecokon ka ekesipan;
Kabilibilia jo ekakorion ka imoŋin luka ajookotoke;
Kabilibilia jo ikayaitok ka ikapolokitok.
Koany, kasurokini jo, ijo eroŋat ekamudiaran,
Loimudiari akwap kere;
Ekiari eoŋ akakan asurokinia jo,
Kekokori jo katiiban,
Ketuluori jo eroŋat loidopi.
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe,
Mam elemunio kamakon amoru araun naka agor,
Karaida amoru araun apetetait,
Konye isilior do ikar kere.
Kokuta arupepe katekerin,
Kitemokis atekerin ejie kaŋes,
Konyaraut ajakanuto,
Nuka Ararat, ka Mini ka Asukenas ejie kaŋes;
Koyautu ibalasin kwape enyede loikirimigito ajul.
Kitemokis atekerin ejie kaŋes,
Ikabakan luka Imedin, ka ikayaitokokec, ka ikegaŋitokoke kere,
Ka akwap kere naka ayaiteke.
Naarai itodolikinio nuelosikinit EJAKAIT asurokinia Babulon,
Aitisilio akwap nako Babulon,
Komameun yeniboie kotoma.
Iboiete kaneerigatai;
Enoŋarit akecegogoŋ,
Araut kwape aŋor;
Ecwei aiboisioke,
Abilas atiketake.
Ekerete da ikijukitono iriamunos,
Alimokin ekabaka loko Babulon ebe
Erumi ereke kowaitin kere.
Erumutu neesedeny,
Icweitai esege,
Akuriakaros ikajiok.
Edeke loka Isirael ebe:
Esubit akoku naka Babulon bala epejal
Kapak naipudapudaere;
Esalit apak naedit Kodoli aidwenyeke.
Kacuiki, kenyeki aonit,
Keliko kwape etiaŋ loeiliili,
Esileleb akoikike kanukaiokakaka,
Kacaka.”
Etemari yeniboie koSion atiar,
“Kobeik Babulon akaje nakeswamakinio eoŋ ka akuanaka.”
Etemari Yerusalem da atiar,
“Kobeikis akaokot mama ejaas luiboiete koKaludea.”
“Koany, apuri akirokon, kenyaŋakini jo,
Etoonikini akeŋolol, etoonikini da aketan.
Aibois naiboioto ikuwei,
Aumokinet, aimuario,
Komamei yeniboie kotoma.
“Kiunete nepepe kwape iŋatunyo ludidik;
Irurumaete kwape idwe luka iŋatunyo.
Kemwakuut awatekec,
Epoikini kes epucit, etemeri kes,
Kolakaros, kojotooros ajo numam enaŋete,
Komam akwenyun.
Esijesari kes kwape idwe luka amerekekin aario,
Kwape imerekekin ka ikorwa.
Esirieŋun eituritono loka akwap kere!
Araun cama Babulon asilio kotoma atekerin!
Arapaa kanuka aipues naka akailanake.
Araut ireriake asilio,
Akwap naeonit, amodiŋ da,
Akwap namam iboio ituŋanan,
Namam itorit okoku loka ituŋanan.
Esilekuni ŋes nuabu kilikono.
Mam bobo eleleete atekerin mamake;
Ibiror arwatat naka Babulon.
Kitajarunos ŋinituŋanan
Kanyunyura naededeŋ naka EJAKAIT.
Kwabo sirikiyoŋa kanuka nukabe nuiirario kakwa;
Naarai epote nukabe kokaru ediopet,
Kosodi kokau kokaru ece epote nukabe,
Ejai akaje da akwap,
Ekayaiton ejiosi kecekayaiton.
Nuetepesenia aputosia nuegerer nuko Babulon;
Irumete akwapuke kere ileic;
Luke kere lueario ibirokinos kidiŋike.
Kosodete akuj ka akwap,
Ka iboro kere luejaas toma,
Ayoore kanuka aiyalama kanuka Babulon;
Naarai epote ikaŋatak mamakeŋ kari naka agolitomei.
Kwape kwaŋin ibirokinotor lukeario luka akwap kere Babulon.
Koloto, sirikibwaata kopalarito!
Kiitutu EJAKAIT kama elwana,
Ido koloma Yerusalem toma otauonokus.
Erumata akonyenewok ileic,
Naarai alomasi imo aiboisio nukalaunak
Nuka etogo loka EJAKAIT.”
“Ebala EJAKAIT ebe,
Aso do koany, epote apaarasia,
Nuetepesenia aputosiake nuegerer;
Idinyasi luimusuŋito
Anatar akwapuke kere.
Karaida kedokarit Babulon kiton akuj,
Karaida kitieasit amukurur naka agogoŋuke,
Konye epote ikaŋatak neejai kamakaŋ.
Ka loka amudiar naepol
Loebuni kakwap naka Ikaludean!
Naarai eŋasi EJAKAIT Babulon,
Ido emudiar ecelet loepol kamakeŋ,
Ido irurumaete akailanakec kwape akipi nuipu,
Edakun ecelet loka iporotoikec.
Eebo, abunoki Babulon;
Aŋatar da ikiriginike,
Abilibilunos akabwaikec;
Naarai EJAKAIT ŋes Edeke loetaci,
Abeit eropi.
Eremeri ikapolokoke, ka lukacoake,
Ikayaitokoke, ka ikegaŋitokoke, ka ikiriginike da;
Ido ejotooros ajo numam enaŋete,
Komam ekwenyunete.
Etiyatiyao cut arwatat naelal naka Babulon,
Icweio iruteike luiceleleete.
Itaaritos atekerin aamameak,
Itapasitos atekerin kanuka akim.”
Akiro nuecorakini Yeremia enabi Seraia okoku loka Neria, okoku loka Maseia, naalosio Babulon nepepe ka Sedekia ekabaka loka Yuda kokaru lokiwoŋonet loka airumuke. Kerai Seraia ekapolon loka inyamat.
Kosodi kiwadik Yeremia oitabo aronis kere naebunokin Babulon, kes akiro ŋun kere nuiwadikatai kanuka Babulon.
Kotema Yeremia Seraia atiar, “Naidolio toma Babulon mam iswaki asoman akiro ŋun kere.
Kinera ebe, ‘Wu EJAKAIT, ibu kinera nuka aibois kana, amudiar, kinyek idiotuŋanan kere aiboi kanen, ituŋanan karaida itiaŋ, konye kitisiloi do ikar kere.’
Kosodi kidau asoman eitabo lo, ienikini amoru kocakak kidiŋ naka Eupurate.
Ido kinera ebe, ‘Elumori Babulon kwaŋin, kwabo mam ikeuni bobo kanuka aronis naainuni ŋes, ido epasete.’ ”
Anaŋata akiro nuka Yeremia ne.
Kiswama nueroko kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, kwape ejaatar kere nueswamaenene Yekoiakim.
Kosodi kanen abeit kitodolikinoi anyunyura naka EJAKAIT koYerusalem ka Yuda, kireŋea kes kakonyeneke.
Kipaliik Sedekia ekabaka loko Babulon.

Kosodi kanen kokaru lokikanyet kaoŋon loka airumuke, kolap lokitomonet, kapaaran nakitomonet naka elap, kobu Nebukadaresar ekabaka loko Babulon, ŋes ka akejore kere asurokin Yerusalem, kidukuroto airigaun ŋes; kitutuoto itutio lujiis.
Kwaŋin kirigaut ere aitodol okaru lokitomonet ka lodiopet loka ekabaka Sedekia.
Olap lokiwoŋonet, kapaaran nakikanyet kaoŋon kodedeŋar eteŋei kore, komamikis cut ituŋa luka akwap inyamat.

Kosodete kotiyasi arorwa kore, kokera ikajiok kere, kolomut kore kuare korot loka erute loejai kidiŋ arwatatin aarei, loidunyas kemanikor loka ekabaka, (Kiriamarito Ikaludean ere kere.) Kobeata korot loka Araba.
Konye korukio ajore naka Ikaludean ekabaka, kodolokis Sedekia kapuutona nuka Yeriko; kisiarakin ajoreke kere aijal ŋes.
Kosodete kikamas ekabaka, koyaŋaasi neejai ekabaka loko Babulon, Ribula, kakwap naka Kamat; kotubok ŋes akiroke.
Koarak ekabaka loko Babulon odwe luka Sedekia akonyeneke; koar da ikapolok kere luka Yuda Ribula.
Kogorunun ŋesi Sedekia akonye; koen ekabaka loko Babulon ŋes kirikoi, koyaŋa Babulon, kibwaik toma aenis aitodol apaaran naketwania.
Kicwe etogo loka EJAKAIT, ka etogo loka ekabaka; ka itogoi kere lukotoma Yerusalem, ŋolitogo kere loepol kicweikin kakim.
Abu ajore kere naka Ikaludean luajaas ka lokapolon loka ikedarak, kotiyatiya arwatatin kere nuka Yerusalem ainamar.
Kosodi kijoreo Nebusaradan ekapolon loka ikedarak lukican noi kotuŋa, ka aatoŋot naka ituŋa lukideuna kore, kaŋul da lualuŋakina ekabaka loko Babulon, ka aatoŋot naka ikeswamak.
Konye kitasal Nebusaradan ekapolon loka ikedarak lukican noi kakwap araut iketemonokinok emusabibu ka ikakoriok da.
Ido koyaŋaasi amoti ka iŋitia, ka aitudeŋeta, ka atanyia, ka akaalei, ka iboro kere luka aisinit lukijaanakiniata.

Ka akolin da, ka atiboka nuigaete ekurwon, ka atanyia, ka amotii ka ipirin luka atalai, ka akaalei, ka atiboi da; nukeraas nuka esabu, esabu, ka nukeraas nuka epuesa epuesa, kwaŋin ayaŋaaria ekapolon loka ikedarak.
Ipirin luarei, aŋolol adiopet, ka imoŋin itomon ka luarei luka aisinin lukejaas kwap kacegeria, lueswamakinit ekabaka Solomon etogo loka EJAKAIT: aisinin nuka iboro kaŋul kere mam kepedorete ainiŋio.
Ipirin da, aojau naka epir ediopet kerai ikubitin itomon ka lukanykauni; kolukunite aitemis naka ikubitin itomon ka luarei, aburesuke ibokor iwoŋon: eorori.
Kejai akou naka aisinit kokujuke; aojau naka akou adiopet ikubitin ikany, kolukunito iboyan ka akamamagan akou, kere luka aisinit, ekoni epir lokiareit nepenen ka akamamagan.
Kosiepion kejaas akamamagan akaisakanykaoŋon ka nukanykape; akamamagan kere lukelukunito iboyan emwaasi akwatat.

Kikama kore ekapolokiton lokeyait ikajiok; ka ituŋa ikanykaarei kaŋul lukeanyununete akonyen nuka ekabaka, lukedumunio kore; ka ekewadikan loka ekapolon loka ajore, loaramununei ituŋa luka akwap; ka ituŋa akaisakanykape luka ituŋa luka akwap, lukedumunio kokidiŋ ore.
Kikama Nebusaradan ekapolon loka ikedarak kes, koyau mama ejai ekabaka loko Babulon, Ribula.
Kodany ekabaka loka Babulon kes, koarak Ribula akwap naka Kamat. Kwaŋin kijoreoroi Yuda anyoun kakwapuke.
Kokaru lokitomonet kakanykauni loka Nebukadaresar, kijoreo ŋesi koYerusalem ituŋa akwat akanykauni ka akaisauni ka luaarei;

kokaru loka akaisaarei ka luuni loka Nebukadaresar kijoreo Nebusaradan ekapolon loka ikedarak Iyudayan akwat akanykaarei ka akaisaoŋon ka lukany: ituŋa kere emwaasi ilukumin iwoŋon ka akwat akanykape.
Kinera kaŋes nukasianut, kitopoloo eicoloŋoke aitelekarit iicoloŋo luka ikabakan lukejaas kaŋes Babulon.
Kilocok inapeneke luka aidaris, konyamenenei inyamat kakonyeneke, apaarasia kere nuka aijarake.
Akorakineteke, abu ekabaka loko Babulon koinanak ŋes akorakinet ŋinipaaran, aitodol apaaran naka atwanareke, apaarasia kere nuka aijarake.
Aluor ca ma bala apuserut!
Ŋol lokerai loepol kotoma atekerin, Ekapolon kotoma obukui,
Aluor ca do loitelemio esolo!
Kopailonoke kere emamei idiopet yenitalakarit ŋes:
Eŋalaŋalata ŋes ipaperoke kere, Aluoros da lukasurupoke.
Iboie kotoma okapirin, Mam edumuni nekiyeŋunet:
Ikekarcitok kere ekamakis ŋes aridat.
Ibworos irotin luka Sion,
Naarai emamei yenebuni neejai atukonokin nakalaunan;
Emejeikis iruteike kere,
Idinyas isasedotinike:
Iticanitos apesuruke, Ewoyaanar ŋesi da elopet.
Naarai etican EJAKAIT ŋes Kanuka epalike loepol:
Aŋatar ikedwe ludidik kakonyen nuka lokediŋet.
Ido atwania apese naka Sion akepolou kere:
Aluoros ikapolokoke kwape amiamia numam edumunitos needakas,
Aloto komameete agogoŋ Kakonyen nuka ŋol kaloerukitor.
Ka aburunike, iboroke kere luesiyalamikinitos
Luajaas kapaarasia nukolosek.
Napebirokinotor iketuŋa akan naka lokediŋet,
Kwabo kemamei yenikeŋarakini,
Keanyut lukediŋetake, kisekeloto asilioke.
Ŋes aluoror bala ibore yenimam elai:
Amenata kere luetubusikinito ŋes,
Naarai aanyut amujalalake:
Eebo, idinya, ibelokin da kau.
Mam abu kiitu awasiake;
Ŋes edooror noi;
Emamei yenitalakari.
“Wu EJAKAIT, koany akaiticanio,
Naarai etopoloor lokasurup.”
Oboroke kere luisiyalamikinitos;
Naarai aanyu ŋesi ebe
Alomasi ikapirin aiboisike nakalaunan,
Luicorakinit kinyeis alomar toma atukotokon.
Ainakis iborokec luisiyalamikinitos
Agwel inyamat lukisikwarunete etau,
“Wu EJAKAIT, kosesen, koany;
Naarai araun eoŋ esilioit.”
Koanyutu, kosesenata,
Arai ejaas ican kere lueriakas ka icanika,
Lukeswamakin eoŋ, luketicania eoŋ EJAKAIT,
Kotoma apaaran naka anyunyurake naededeŋ.
Kitonokok kes:
Alok akakejen keboi,
Kesiboŋo kau;
Kenyeki kasilikinit,
Ka aiiloro da apaaran kere.
Akekan ŋes iridia;
Idokokinitoi omurisiŋika;
Eŋoŋa ŋesi akagogoŋ;
Kejaik EJAKAIT akaninikec,
Lumam apedori abwoikin.
Anyara atukot asurokinia eoŋ
Aipiricaria ikatumunakaka:
Epudapud EJAKAIT akoku nabekot naka Yuda
Kwape toma acues.
“Kanuka ŋun ŋes amonyia akiyo;
Eleleete akiyo kakonyeneka;
Naarai elwana eketalakaran lotikisikwaru akaijar:
Asilikis ikadwe,
Naarai epiko lokasurup.”
Atera Sion akekanin,
Emamei yenitalakari:
Ecoraki EJAKAIT nuka Yakob
Koraut luirimorito lukasurupoke;
Erai Yerusalem kamakec
Bala ibore yenimodokok.
Naarai epaliik eoŋ aicorakinetake;
Kopuputu keŋaiŋait, yes ituŋa kere,
Koanyutu ikacan;
Ejorcor abekonoka ka ikatumunakaka.
“Abu keworo ipailonoka,
Konye kamodata:
Isasedotinika ka imakioka
Atwakikis ore,
Naemoiata inyamat
Aisikwarunia aijarakec.
Naarai etururwei;
Iyaloŋoŋi akaijar;
Eeuio ekatau kotomaka;
Naarai epaliik noi:
Eari ekileŋ kokiŋa;
Togo da esubit bala ejai atwanare.
Emamei yeniketalakari;
Apuputu lukasurupoka kere nuka ikacan;
Iyalamasi naarai iswama.
Iyauni apaaran naibu kolimo,
Eputokinos ŋul da keoŋ.
“Kodol aronisikec kere kakonyenekon;
Kiswamak kes kwape kiswamakinia eoŋ
Kanuka adiakanaretaka kere:
Naarai epol eidinyika, Eilori da ekatau.”
Kotoma anyunyurake!
Aeaku aibuses naka Isirael
Anyoun kakuj kiton akwap,
Kwabo mam iitunit iicoloŋ yenika akejeke
Kapaaran naka anyunyurake.
Komam itimit,
Ebiru kotoma adedeŋuke abwasio nuka akoku naka Yuda;
Atiyatiya kiton kwap:
