Amunaa ajakanut ka ikapolokoke.
Kakenyunyura naededeŋ;
Enyaka akekan nakoteten kakonyen nuka lukasurup:
Etisis ŋesi Yakob kwape akim naesarani,
Nairiamarit iwaitin kere.
Ebwoi kakekan nakoteten kwape loitokokoli.
Aar kere luetalakarito akonyen
Kowema loka akoku naka Sion;
Abukok akededeŋ kwape kakim.
Eliko Isirael;
Eliko iketogoi kere lukapolou,
Amunaa akebwasin:
Eyataki ŋesi akoku naka Yuda
Aibworo ka akuudian.
Kwape yenikomanikor;
Amunaa aiboisike natukonokina:
Esumurwok EJAKAIT koSion
Atukokinet naeseunitai ka asabato,
Ido kanuka adedeŋ naka akenyunyura
Amwaŋa ekabaka ka esasedoti.
Asac akeibois nakalaunan;
Akoraki akanin nuka lukasurup
Arwatatin nuka itogoike lukapolou:
Acelut kotogo loka EJAKAIT
Kwape kapaaran naka atukokinet naeseunitai.
Naka akoku naka Sion;
Atera auno,
Mam inyakara akekan kamudiar;
Konye etukuudian abwas ka arwatat da;
Ijunepepas kere.
Amunaa abilibil cut atiketa:
Ekabakake ka ikapolokoke ejaas atekerin;
Emameete bobo ikisila,
Inabinoke da mam edumunete aitapoet
Kama ejai EJAKAIT.
Iboiete kokwap, ililiŋete;
Ipurito apua akwesikec;
Enapitos ipukoi:
Itukumonokinito abekon nuka Yerusalem
Akwesikec kiton alup.
Itururwei ekatau,
Abukokin emanyika kwap,
Kanuka amudiar naka akoku naka ikatuŋa,
Naarai iiloros idwe ludidik ka imukerun
Korotin lukore.
Emonyete mama ejaas nukatotokec, ebe,
“Alu bo inyamat ka ebino?”
Naiilorotor kwape luimusuŋitai korotin lukore,
Naebukoror aijarakec atorobusio nuka nukatotokec.
Ketupusi kinyo, ijo akoku naka Yerusalem?
Ketiiriani kinyo ketalaka,
Wu jo akoku nabekot naka Sion?
Naarai epol akonicilat kwape kaŋolol:
Iŋai kitaŋaleuni?
Aitapoeta nuka aamameak ka abaŋaanut;
Kwabo mam apotu kopukosi numam adolitekon,
Tetere kinyakunete kaijoreoriokon:
Konye kidwaranakis abwokon
Nuka aamameak ka nukitapaarete.
Isuarete imuŋimuŋete akecekwes
Mama ejai akoku naka Yerusalem,
Kobalas ebe, “Lopelo tope ŋes ere
Loamaikinitai Ajokis naedolit cut,
Aiyalama naka akwap kere?”
Kisuasi, kiriamanakinete ikel;
Kobalas ebe, “Kiliko ŋes:
Abeit na ŋes apaaran nakipou kemielas;
Adolu do, kianyu da!”
Etodoliki akekirot;
Kwape ecorakinitor kolo sek,
Ebiru, komam itimit:
Esiyalamik lokasurupikon,
Etopoloo amumwarat naka lukitokokolete jo.
Wu jo arwatat naka akoku naka Sion,
Koleleata akiyo kwape ecor,
Paaran ka kuare!
Mam iyeŋuni nepetai da;
Mam erwakakin ecopot loka akoŋukon.
Kagcuneta nuka akwenyuneta;
Kobuko ekonitau kwape akipi
Kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT;
Kikia akonikanin mamakeŋ
Kanuka aijar naka ikonidwe ludidik,
Luekotos atwakare eteŋei
Kasisiarin nuka irotin kere.
Lukaŋai luibu kiswamak nuikote nen?
Ti tope aŋor kenyama aurikec,
Idwe luilepanarete kakaninikec?
Ti tope kearakin esasedoti ka enabi
Aibois nakalaunan naka EJAKAIT?
Aar ekileŋ akabekon ka ikakatumunak:
Iar kes kapaaran naka anyunyurakon;
Iar, kwabo mam itimit.
Kwape kapaaran naka atukokinet naeseunitai;
Kwabo emamei idio yenabu koku karaida aisal
Kapaaran naka anyunyura naka EJAKAIT;
Amudia lokasurupika
Ŋul luelepanari ka luasait.
Arai eoŋ ituŋanan yenaanyunit aiticanio Kobela loka anyunyurake.
Abu keŋarenik, ketolot da,
Kotoma amuton kwabo mere aica.
Abeit icebokinit aibelonokin akekan
Asurokinia eoŋ apaaran kere.
Esirinyo ŋesi akakiriŋ ka akamuny;
Abilibil akakojo.
Aduk mama ajai,
Kerigau kepiu ka apason.
Kwape luketwaka kolosek.
Kabwau, mam apedori alomar;
Esilaŋirir ekarikot.
Egoluni ailipika kiŋa.
Abwa irotinika kamor nuikec,
Etukud ŋesi ikasokono.
Kwape eŋatuny loeŋopi kaiboisio nukaiyeiyea.
Ketisilio.
Kasipoki araut idesiara yenika emaleke.
Etolomik imalia luka akuraruke
Oŋeretenyaka.
Ekosiokec apaaran kere.
Ketuup aliasit naeta ria.
Karapak ekurwon.
Itwalan ekatau kama ejai ainapakin;
Kemurwoki aiyalama kwape ejaar.
Ka akamuno da mama ejai EJAKAIT.”
Kiitu aiticanioka, ka aitururuka,
Aliasit naeta ria ka epiu da.
Iitununei ekatau,
Ipirisiar kotomakaŋ.
Keitu ŋun,
Ŋes ejaunor amun.
Naarai mam iŋorari aisionike.
Epol akonimunonut.
Tape amuno ŋes.”
Kama ejai aijar naemoot ŋes.
Aitajar naka EJAKAIT.
Kotoma atumunike.
Naarai edokoki ŋesi ŋin.
Elemuni kojai amun.
Kimonikin amoromoroo.
Ikar kere.
Naarai karaida keyauni ican,
Konye isionie ŋesi kwape ejaar apolou naka aitimike.
Karaida aitakadikin kes.
Aipudapuda
Ienan kere luka akwap.
Aitirii etube loka ituŋanan
Kakonyen nuka ŋol loejai kuju kakuj.
Mam EJAKAIT itojokit ŋun.
Arai mam EJAKAIT icorakinit?
Kaituk naka ŋol loejai kuju kakuj?
Ituŋanan yeniticanio kanuka aronisioke?
Kaboŋosi bobo mama ejai EJAKAIT.
Mama ejai Edeke toma akuj.
Mam jo isionit.
“Irapar kanyunyura korukitor sio;
Iar komam itimit.
Irapar kedou
Kinyek ailip apedor.
Kokidiŋ katekerin.
“Lukasurupokosi kere
Kiwooŋanakis aituke.
Kidolokis sio akurian ka aipany,
Aŋasio ka amudiario.
Elele akakoŋu icorin luka akipi,
Kanuka amudiario naka akoku naka ikatuŋa.
“Ebuki akakoŋu akiyo, komam itanaŋi,
Komam ejoŋoi.
Koany ejai toma akuj.
Itakadikinit akakoŋu akaijar,
Kanuka apesur kere nuka ereka.
Komam akirot.
Kebiribiroto kamor.
Kabala ebe, ‘Aolio.’
Kajai aidules naka aipany.
Kaimonyoka aiŋarakinio.’
Kobala ebe, ‘Sirikikurianar.’
Ilaku akaijar.
Wu EJAKAIT, iany akamwaŋio;
Kotub ijo akakiro.
Ka akeceinerun da kere mamakaŋ.
“Ibu kiira, wu EJAKAIT, amorositikec,
Ka ainerunikec da kere mamakaŋ;
Aŋajepa nuka ŋul kalukanyoikinete,
Ka nukalosikinito apaaran kere.
Arai eoŋ ekecekosio.
Kwape ejaar aswam naka akaninikec.
Ekonikenit mamakec.
Ireŋet kes kanyunyura,
Imudiari kes kokwap kakuj naka EJAKAIT.”
Amasiki ca ma esabu!
Elocokin ca ma esabu loalai noi!
Acakanakin amor nuka aibois nakalaunan
Asisiarin nuka ŋolirot.
Lueriakasi kesabu loililiauna,
Emari ca ma kwape amoti nuka elupe,
Aswam naka akanin nuka ekajean!
Konakete ludidikikec:
Konye ebwor akoku naka ikatuŋa,
Kwape ikuului luka amodiŋ.
Odokolike kanuka akure:
Ilipitos idwe ludidik inyamat,
Kwabo emamei yenedutakini kes.
Ŋul luapolokinete ogoen lukareŋak
Eperete otutio luka ekurwon.
Itelekaritos aronis naka Sodom,
Loketiyakinio katipet,
Emamei akan naaponi kibwaikinai.
Asegara isotiake adepar akako,
Eliacanito adepar akile,
Areŋak awatekec adepar amor nukareŋak,
Apwatarakec da esubit bala asapiro.
Mam ejenunos korotin:
Eminaikin akecemunyo kakojokec;
Aono, esubit bala akitoi.
Ejok lukeari ekileŋ itia lukeari eteŋei;
Naarai adokororata,
Icumitai kanu amamikiniata araito
Nukomanikor.
Kakaninikec akulepek;
Korautu inyamatakec
Kanuka amudiario naka akoku naka ikatuŋa.
Abuku akenyunyura naededeŋ;
Enokoki akim Sion,
Etisisi da apetetake.
Karaida luiboiete kotoma akwap kere,
Ebe, epedorete loitokokoli ka lokasurup
Alomar korutei luka Yerusalem.
Ka numam adolit nuka isasedotinike,
Luapotu kobukosi aokot
Nuka ikadolitok kokidiŋike.
Amunaaros kaokot,
Mam cut epedorete ituŋa
Atiror anapitokec.
Iworoete ituŋa ebe, “Irwa! Mam ilaete!
Irwa! Irwa! Sirikitirosi!”
Kwaŋin koraut ikasiak ka ipasoitin,
Kobalasi ituŋa kotoma atekerin ebe,
“Mam iboikinos bobo kasio.”
Mam eroko ibwaikinit kes etau:
Mam eyoŋete akonyen nuka isasedotin,
Mam eminasi da imakio.
Nakidaria kipou kedara ateker
Namam epedori aitajar oni.
Mam kipedori alosit korotiniwok,
Eapie awasiawok adolun, Etodolikinos awokopaarasia;
Naarai adolu awasiawok.
Atiroko lukirukitotor
Aitelekarit imorukaalei luka apak:
Kibwapitos koroŋan, Kiperunete kamodiŋ.
Lokinyonyoikitono akinyet naka EJAKAIT,
Epok kotoma apanyiakec;
Lokipou keneras ebe,
“Kiboie kotoribeke kotoma atekerin.”
Kolakar, kolel, ijo akoku naka Edom,
Naiboie kakwap naka Us:
Ikopuni akoli mamakon da;
Imerikin, kosodi amujalalar.
Etodolikin aiticanet naka numam adolitekon,
Ijo akoku naka Sion;
Mam bobo kiioreorio;
Konye iticani numam adolitekon,
Ijo akoku naka Edom;
Ilepilepi aronisiokon.
Kiitu, wu EJAKAIT, nukibunokis sio;
Koany, kosesen aitisiliokosi.
Araun airumetekosi naka imo,
Itogoikosi da luka lukacekwapin.
Kirau ikokiok, luemameete lukapapa,
Asubata nukatotokosi bala apuserun.
Kitaci akipi nukimasi,
Kitwegelio akitokosi.
Lukirukitotor ejaas omurisinakosi;
Kilworun, emamei aibworar.
Ka Iyasurian da, tetere isimonikinete inyamat.
Kibwokit isio da numam adolitekec.
Kiyaito ibulesin:
Emamei yenikilakuni kakanikec.
Kidumuni inyamatakosi kaipal aijar,
Kanuka ekileŋ loka amodiŋ.
Esarani amunyokosi bala emukaru,
Kanuka amwanis naitisisiei naka ebeli.
Abekon da koreria luka Yuda.
Ikajanakinete ikapolok akaninikec;
Mam eyoŋito imakio.
Iguanakinete idwe ludidik ibwokitos akito.
Enyeis itelepai ayoorekec.
Asaŋa aiyalama nakotauonokosi;
Aluor akosiisom aibworo.
Ado aboko anyoun kakwesikosi:
Itukwi isio! Naarai kidiakana.
Kanuka ŋun ŋes awariwariata akosikonyen.
Kanuka eroŋat loka Sion, loesil;
Irimete ikuwei kanen.
Konye jo, wu EJAKAIT, ijaenena ikar kere;
Ejai ekoniicoloŋ ageun katur kiton aturio.
Kanukinyo kimurwokinia apaarasia kere,
Kojal isio apak naetia nen?
Kitobonunoi, wu EJAKAIT, sio da kiboŋuni;
Kiteteu akosipaarasia kwape kolosek.
Konye kigiri kereka ijo sio cut?
Kinyunyurik kereka noi?
Kapaaran nakikanyet naka elap, ŋes arai ekaru lokikanyet loka aijoreorio naka ekabaka Yekoiakin,
kobu teni akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ejai Esekiel esasedoti, okoku loka Busi, kakwap naka Ikaludean, kariri naka ecor Kebar; kojau akan naka EJAKAIT mamakeŋ kaŋina.
Ido kokidiŋike kolomut luesubito bala isuban iwoŋon lukajarak. Kikoni ne atakanukec; asubito bala etuŋanan.
Ŋinidiopet ajaas ireeta iwoŋon, ŋinidiopet da ajaas abebenoka aoŋon.
Etenara akecekejen: aicaketa da nuka akejenekec asubito bala aicaket naka itaok; komwekimwekete kwape aisinit naepwatat.
Ajaas kes akanin nuka etuŋanan kwap kabebenokakec kosiepionokec iwoŋon. Ido ŋul iwoŋon ajaas ireetakec ka abebenokakec kwanata:
eriamanakina abebenokakec; mam ebelonokinos naelosioto, kolototo ŋinidiopet ederit.

Asubito ireetakec kwanata, ajai ŋillidiopet ereet loka etuŋanan; ido ŋul luoŋon ajai ŋinidiopet ereet loka eŋatuny kosiep lokoteten; ido ŋul luoŋon ajai ŋinidiopet ereet loka emoŋ kosiep lokokediany; ŋul luoŋon da ajai ŋinidiopet ereet loka emorukaalet.
Ekote nen ireetakec. Egararaete abebenokakec kokuju; eriamanakina abebenoka aarei nuka ŋinidiopet, arapitos aarei awatekec.
Kolototo ŋinidiopet ederit; neekot emoyo alosit, ŋes elosete; mam ebelonokinos naalosenenoto.
Kidiŋ kisuban lukajarak kojai ibore yenesubit bala atotol nuesaranete akim, bala akalasia; kirimi kokidiŋ kisuban lukajarak: asarani akim, kolom eimilia kakim.
Kokerata isuban lukajarak, kohoŋut, kwape keimilia.
Atakan naka akokoron ka aswamukec asubit bala ejese loka aberulo: ido kere aoŋon araas nuka aput adiopet: asubit atakanukec ka aswamukec bala akokoro kotoma akokoro.
Naalosenenoto, kolosenenete kosiepionokec iwoŋon; mam ebelonokinos naalosenenoto.
Ajaas akokoron ireren, ajaas da ipirin; kileleba akonye airimor ireren ŋul iwoŋon.
Ido naalosenenoto isuban lukajarak, kolosenenete akokoron kosiepikec: ido naetonyoununere isuban lukajarak kalup, kitonyoununio da akokoron.
Neekot emoyo alosit, ŋes elosete; kouparos akokoron da kakes; naarai ajai emoyo loka isuban lukajarak toma akokoron.
Naalosenenoto ŋul alosete nu da; ido nakebwoeneniata ŋul abwoete nu da; ido naetonyounere ŋul kalup, kouparos akokoron da kakes; naarai ajai emoyo loka isuban lukajarak toma akokoron.
Ido kwap kapak kitenara abebenokakec, adiopet kiteos kanaceke; ajaas ninidlopet abebenoka aarei nukeraparitor akuanake.

Naalosenenoto, keira airurum naka abebenokakec, kwape airurum naka akipi nuipu, kwape eporoto loka Lokapedor kere, airurum naka ecelet kwape airurum naka ajore: nakebwoeneniata, kijolulununete abebenokakec.
Kejai eporoto kokuju apak nakejai kuju akwesikec: nakebwoeneniata, kijolulununete abebenokakec.

Ido kaany bala ejese loka esabu loepwatat, bala akim kotomake airimor, ageun kaneasubit bala aŋabeteke kiton kuju; ido ageun kaneasubit bala aŋabeteke kiton kwap, kaany bala akim, kojai amwekimwek nairiamarit.
Bala aput naka etaluka loejai odou kapaaran naka akiru, ekoni nen ejese loka amwekimwek kowaitin kere.
Ŋin ŋes arai aput naasubit bala aibuses naka EJAKAIT. Kosodi nakaany, kebiror ebuburia, keira eporoto loka ŋol lokinera.
Koloma emoyo tomaka nakinerar keoŋ, kesibwo kakakeje; keira ŋol lokinera keoŋ.
Kalimok eoŋ atiar, “Okoku loka etuŋanan, kejukari jo mama ejaas idwe luka Isirael, mama ejaas atekerin nuipalioko, nukepaliikis eoŋ: kes ka lukapapaakec da apaasi kamakaŋ, kiton lolo.
Elepaakata idwe da, ido aninikata itauon; kejukari mama ejaas ŋul: kolimok kes atiar, ‘Inera kwanata EJAKAIT EDEKE.’
Kes da, arai iirarete, arai eŋerete akiirar, (naarai eraas ekek lokepali) ejenunete kereka kwape ajaar enabi kidiŋikec.

Ido da, okoku loka etuŋanan, sirikikurianar kes, kwabo sirikikurianar akecekiro, karaida ejaas ikodokodo ka ikukwa kajo, ido iboie kokiritona; sirikikurianar akecekiro, kwabo sirikijuruŋuŋ kanuka ekwenyekec, karaida eraas ekek lokepali.
Ido ilimokini kes akakiro, arai iirarete, arai eŋerete akiirar: naarai ipalioko kesi noi.
Naasesenia da, koany, koriunoi akan mama ajai; ido koany, kojai anunuket naka eitabo toma;
kotera kakonyeneka; kiwadikatai iwaitin kere: kiwadikatete nen akuudian, aibworo, ka ican.
Kasodi kaooŋ akaituk, kainak eoŋ ainyam anunuket.
Katema atiar, “Okoku loka etuŋanan, kitanyam akonikoik, kisimonik aboikon anunuket na nakainak.” Kasodi kanyam; kowiny kaitukuka kwape kesik.
Kosodi katema eoŋ atiar, “Okoku loka etuŋanan, kolot kodol neejai ekek loka Isirael, kiner akakiro mamakec.
Naarai mam kijukaritai neejai ateker naegelara aŋajepeke, ido luka aŋajep naetiono, nabarai togo loka Isirael:
mere neejaas atekerin nuipu nuegelara aŋajepekec ido luka aŋajep naetiono, lumam ipedori ajenun akirokec, Abeit arai keejukarit neejaas ŋul, ti kiirasi.
Konye ekek loka Isirael, mam kiirarete; naarai mam keirarete eoŋ; naarai ekek loka Isirael kere eraas luegogoŋ akonyen, ido lueninik itauon.
Koany, etogogoŋ akonikonyen kama ejaas akecekonyen, etogogoŋ ekonireet da koreetakec.
Kwape egogoŋior eikep adepar alicait, etuluo kwaŋin ereetekon: sirikikurianar kes, karaida ajuruŋuŋ ekwenyekec, karaida kerai ekek lokepali.”
Ido katema eoŋ bobo atiar, “Okoku loka etuŋanan, akakiro kere nukalimokini jo, kiyuu kotaukon, kiira da kakoniki.
Ido kolot, kodol neejaas ŋul luijoreoritai, neejaas idwe luka ikonituŋa, kiner kakes kolimok ebe, ‘Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE’; arai iirarete arai eŋerete akiirar.”
Keira eporoto loka abebenoka nuka isuban lukajarak eretonokinos, ka eporoto loka akokoron kosiepikec, eporoto loka aunya naepol.
Kosodi kadaka eoŋ Emoyo, kayaŋa: kalot kakadakinit, komulai ekatau, kicasite da akan naka EJAKAIT kamakaŋ.
Kasodi abunore mama ejaas lukijoreoritono Tel-abib, lueboiete kariri naka ecor Kebar, neiboioto, Keboikin mamakec etirirai apaarasia akanykaarei.
Kosodi kanen ketuboros apaarasia akanykaarei, kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai, ebala ebe:
“Okoku loka etuŋanan, ketarau jo ekedaran loka ekek loka Isirael: aso kiira akiro nuka aitukuka, kikwenya kes kanukaŋ.

Arai katema ikaronon atiar, ‘Abeit itwani’; komam jo ikwenyari ŋes, ido komam inera aikwenyar ikaronon anyoun korotoke loerono, aitajar akeijar; etwanikini ikaronon ŋin toma numam adoliteke; konye etepeseni akeokot kakanikon.
Konye arai ikwenyari ikaronon, kogiri aibelokin ainyein akeronis, karaida anyoun korotoke loerono, etwanikini toma numam adoliteke; konye kitajarite ijo akoniijar.

Bobo da, kibelokin ikadoliton ainyein akedolit, kiswama numam adolit, kebwaik eoŋ ekomio kakonyeneke, etwani; naarai mam ikwenyarit, etwanikini toma aronisike, mam iitunio akeswamisio nukadolit nueswamat; konye etepeseni akeokot kakanikon.
Konye arai ikwenyari ikadoliton, kinyek ikadoliton aidiak, komam ediaki, abeit ejari, naarai acamu aikwenyario; ijo da kitajarite akoniijar.”
Kasodi kanyou, kalot apuuton: ido koany, abwoi aibuses naka EJAKAIT kaŋina, kwape aibuses naabu kaanyunite kariri naka ecor Kebar: kebiror ebuburia.
Kalomak Emoyo, kesibwo kakejeneka; kiner keoŋ, katema atiar, “Kolot, kogolokin togokon.
Konye jo, okoku loka etuŋanan, koany, kibwaikinio irikoi, kienere, tetere mam ipedori alomun otuŋa.
Esimakakini anajepekeŋ kodokolikon, korau ebaŋ, komam ipedori aitoron kes; naarai eraas ekek lokepali.
Konye nakineria eoŋ kajo, esiwooŋari akoniituk, ijo da ilimokini kes ebe, ‘Inera Ejakait EDEKE kwanata’; Ŋin yeniirari, kiira; ka ŋin da yeneŋeri akiirar koŋer; naarai eraas ekek lokepali.
“Ijo da, okoku loka etuŋanan, kolem amatapalit, kibwaik akonyenekon, kigir aput naka ere Yerusalem:
kirigau, koduk arwatatin asurokinia, kitutu itutio; kiswama iidukurun asurokinia, kibwaik akuta nutiyanakinet airimor.
Ido kolem aiwowas naka asuat, kibwaik araun arwatat naka asuat kidiŋikon ka ere: kotereik akonikonyen neejai, aso irigaunio do, ijo da irigauni ŋes, Eraun ŋin aanyunet mama ejai ekek loka Isirael.
“Bobo da koper kosiepikon lokokediany, ebwaikini aiticanet naka ekek loka Isirael mamakon: etiai loka apaarasia nuiperi, kiŋuikin aiticanetekec.
Naarai kaseik ikar luka aiticanetekec araut kamakon etiai loka apaarasia, kes apaarasia akwat auni ka akaisakanykaoŋon: kwaŋin kiŋuikin aiticanet naka ekek loka Isirael.
Ido, naidaunia aitodolikin ŋun, iperi kosiepikon lokoteten, kiŋuikin aiticanet naka ekek loka Yuda; apaarasia akaisaoŋon, ŋinipaaran erianas kekaru, ŋupeŋun kaseik jo.
Kotereik akonikonyen neejai airigaun naka Yerusalem, kopukorite akonikan; idwari asurokinia ere.
Ido koany, kebwaik aeneta mamakon, komam ibelokini esiep epuai, aitodol neitodolikinio apaarasia nuka airigaunikon.

“Kolem da eŋano, ka esairi, ka imare, ka ekao, ka akima, ka imumwa da, kibwaik kes obore idiopet, koŋo atap; inyamenenei ŋin apaarasia kere nuiperenenoo kosiepikon, kes apaarasia akwat auni ka akaisakanykaoŋon.
Itemenenoo ŋinipaaran inyamat luinyamenenei isekelin
Imasenenei akipi nuitemio, idiopet kokanykape yenika ekin:
Inyamenenei bala aluŋuren nuka esairi, ipei da kacin nuka ituŋa kakonyenekec.”
Kobala EJAKAIT ebe, “Kwape kwaŋin enyamenenata idwe luka Isirael inyamatakec lumam elaete, kotoma atekerin nuereŋeari kes.”

Kasodi eoŋ atemar atiar, “Wu okwe Ejakait EDEKE! Koany, mam lem akaijar emunaaritai; naarai ameun koiditeuka kiton kwana mam anyamenenei ŋin yenetwani, karaida yenepoopoot etiaŋ; akiriŋ da naketal mam elomanari aitukuka.”
Kosodi ŋesi atemar eoŋ atiar, “Koany, kainak aoret naka aituk aibois naka acin nuka ituŋa, itemonokinenei kanen ikoninyamat.”
Bobo da katema eoŋ atiar, “Okoku loka etuŋanan, koany, abili ebela loka inyamat kotoma Yerusalem: enyamenenete inyamat luitemete, ido iyaloŋoŋoete, emasenenete akipi nuitemete, ido kojuruŋuŋito:
tetere emamikinete inyamat ka akipi, koŋolianakinos kajuruŋuŋ, idokororaros kotoma aiticanetekec.

Icwei atutubet nakiwuniet kakim kokidiŋ ore, naitodolikinere apaarasia nuka airigaun; kolem atutubet nakiwuniet kireb kekileŋ airimor ere; atutubet nakiwuniet da kiwelana neejai ekwam, autuni eoŋ ekileŋ loetupari kes.
Ilemuni idis, koen kanapitokon.
Ilemuni kaŋul da, icakakini kidiŋ akim, icwei kes; namakec elomuni akim nailosikini ekek kere loka Isirael.
Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Ŋin ŋes Yerusalem: ebwaik kidiŋ atekerin ka akwapin da nuirimorito.
Abu kipaliik ikatubesia kiswamaenenei nukaronok adepar atekerin, ido epaliiki ikakisila adepar akwapin nuirimorito: naarai agiro ikatubesia, mam da elosenenete kotoma okisilaka.

Kanuka ŋun ŋes inerar kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Naarai iloliaka yesi adepar atekerin nukirimorito, kwabo mam ilosikinito ikakisila, komam iricito ikatubesia, karaida aswam kwape elaatar itubesia luka atekerin nukirimorito;
ŋes inerar kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Koany, eoŋ, eoŋ obe, arai lokasurupikon, etodolikini ikatubesia kamakon kakonyen nuka atekerin.
Keswamakini jo numam eswamat apeŋo, mam bobo abuni aswam kwaŋin, kanuka italesiokon kere.
Kanuka ŋun enyamete lukapapa idwe kokidiŋikon, idwe da enyamete lukapapakec; etodolikini itubesia kamakon, eweliweli da aatoŋotokon kere mama ejaas ikwamin kere.
Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Aso, kwape ajaria, abeit, naarai imunaa akaibois nakalaunan kanuka iborokon kere luasacit, ka italesiakon kere, kanuka ŋun keŋoŋari jo: mam akakoŋu isionie, ido mam etimi.

Etwani atutubetekon nakiwuniet atular, epiari eteŋei kes kokidiŋikon; eari ekileŋ atutubetekon nakiwuniet airimor; eweliweli da atutubet nakiwuniet mama ejaas ikwamin kere, autuni ekakileŋ loetupari kes.
Bobo da ketuluori asilio ka amorosit kotoma atekerin kere nukirimorito, koanyunete ŋul kere luitorete.
Kosodi eraun amorosit, ka ainyanakin, ka aikwenyaret ka aumokinet da mama ejaas atekerin nukirimorito, naetodolikinio itubesia kamakon kanyunyura ka adedeŋ, kaitoronio naededeŋ: Eoŋ EJAKAIT ener ŋun.
Nakejukakinia imalia lueroko, luka eteŋei, ka luka amudiar, lukejukuni amudiaria; ido eyatakini eteŋei kamakus, abili do ebelakus loka inyamat.
Kejukakini yes eteŋei ka itiaŋ lueroko, itwakiarete lukus; itori atular ka aokot mamakus; kainuni da ekileŋ. Eoŋ EJAKAIT ener ŋun.”
Kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai ebe:
“Okoku loka etuŋanan, kite iroŋan luka Isirael, kodwarak kes.

Kiner atiar, Yes iroŋan luka Isirael, kiiras akirot naka Ejakait EDEKE! Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE iroŋan ka iukon, isama ka aditon da ebe: Koany, eoŋ, eoŋ obe, kainuni yes ekileŋ, amudiari aiboisiokus nuiceleleete.
Itisilio itemwanakus, ebilibilio aputosiakus nuka akoloŋ: acakakini ituŋakus lueario akonyen nuka aputosiakus.
Ido eperikini atesin nuka idwe luka Isirael akonyen nuka aputosiakec; esiarisiari da akojokus airimor itemwanakus.

Iswapete ireriakus kotoma aiboisiokus kere, itisilio aiboisio nuiceleleete; tetere iswapete itemwanakus, itisilio, ebilibilio aputosiakus edaunos, ejepejepeo aputosiakus nuka akoloŋ, emwatario da akusiswamisio.
Ibirokinos lueario kidiŋikus, ijenunete da ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.
“Konye do etasali aatoŋot, Naarai ijaunete kice luekuete ekileŋ kotoma atekerin, nakisiarakinere akwapin.

Keitunete ŋul luekuete kayes kotoma atekerin kama ijoreoritai, kadau aibil itauonokec ludotea luanyoutu kamakaŋ, ka aitumudak akonyenekec nuelosete eporo kaputosiakec; ekadakinete kesi kanuka aronisio nueswamata, ka italesiakec kere.
Ejenunete ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT: mam ener atai ebe eswamakini kes aronis ŋin.”
Yenelwana etwani atular; yeneapie eari ekileŋ; ka yenesali irigaunitai etwani eteŋei. Kwaŋin etodolikini akadedeŋ mamakec.

Ijenunete yesi ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT, naejauniata ikecetuŋa luearitai toma aputosiakec airimor itemwanakec, kaŋoliukot loimukurur, aidiasia kere nuka iroŋan, kokwap kaŋolikitoi loepesit, kokwap da kanolilua loiswapit, aiboisio nuainanakiniata lueuru saa aputosiakec kere.
Ariikini kes akakan, aitisil akwap kiswap, anyoun kamodiŋ naka Dibila, airiamar ireriakec kere; ejenunete do ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.”
Bobo da kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai ebe:
“Ijo da, okoku loka etuŋanan, inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE akwap naka Isirael ebe: Awasia! Adolok awasia agoria aoŋon nuka akwap.
Kwana kidolok awasia, kejukakini akanyunyura, katubokini jo kwape ejaatar ikonirotin; keticani jo kanuka italesiakon kere.
Kwabo mam kisionie akakoŋu, ido mam etimi; konye keticani kanuka irotinikon, ejaunete da italesiakon kidiŋikon: ijenunete da ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.
“Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Aronis, aronis adiopet! Koany, ebunit.
Adol awasia, adol awasia alopet; akwenyu asurokin jo. Koany, ebunit.
Acila kide naka aijarakon, ijo yeniboie kakwap: adol apak, eapie apaaran; apaaran naka elala, konye mere naka eibwoŋ, koroŋan.
Kwana eapie abukokin akadedeŋ mamakon, ketodoliki akanyunyura mamakon, katubokini jo kwape ejaatar ikonirotin; ido keticani kanuka italesiakon kere.
Kwabo mam isionie akakoŋu, ido mam etimi: keticani kanuka irotinikon, ejaunete da italesiakon kidiŋikon. Ijenunete do ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT loadanyi.
“Koany, apaaran! Koany, ebunit! Acila kide naka aijarakon; eturo ebela, ibutunit eitur.
Apolou akaje araun ebela loka aronis; emameun yenideun kakesi, karaida aipuesikec, karaida abarakec: emameun apolou kamakec.
Adol apak, aeku apaaran die. Kinyek yenegweli ailel, kinyek da yenegwelari akadakin: naarai ejai adedeŋ aipuesikec kere.
Naarai mam eboŋori ikagwelaran neejai yenegwelarit, karaida keroko ejarete, Naarai ikamunit aitapoet aipuesikec kere, emameun yeneboŋuni; ido emameun yeniketakin kanumam edolito nuka aijarake.
“Akutata arupepe, akapata kere; konye emamei yenelosi ojie: naarai ejai akanyunyura aipuesikec kere.
Ejai ekileŋ kiŋa, atular da ka eteŋei ejaas toma: ŋin yenejai ais eari ekileŋ; ŋin da yenejai ore, emeori eteŋei ka atular.
Konye ŋul luekuete kakesi ekuete, ido ejaunete oroŋan kwape idudumerun luka aditon, ekuudianete kere, ŋinituŋanan kanumam adoliteke.
Elajakakaros akanin kere, ekalanyakaros da akuŋin kere kwape akipi.
Ido enapete ipukoi, erapari asogim kes; irumete ileic akonyenekec kere, ejaunos ipatai akwesikec kere.

Ecakanakinete ekecepuesa orotin, eraun da ekecesabu ibore yenimam elai; mam epedori epuesakec ka esabukec ayuun kes kapaaran naka anyunyura naka EJAKAIT; mam isimonikinete aijarakec, ido mam ituupete akecekoikes, Naarai keraas ŋul ikomion luka numam adolitekec.
Atemelel naka ikecebore yenisirio kiloco araun eitur, konye kiswamaut aputosia nuka italesiakec ka ikeceboro luasacit kaŋes: ŋes etuluoria kamakec kwape ibore yenimam elai.
Ainakini akanin nuka imo araun imejat, ido mama ejaas ikaronok luka akwapin araun iŋatara; emunaarete da.
Ido ebelokini kes akasebot, emunaarete da akaibois nakaiyeiyea: elomarete ikaŋatak, komunaasi.
Kanuka ŋun ŋes ayaunia lukacekwapin luitelekarito aronis, kiruma itogoikec: etanaŋi da aiwoŋonut naka ikagogoŋok; emunaario aiboisiokec nukalaunak.
Ebunit amudiar, emoete ainapakin, komam edumunete.
Ebuni ameŋeranut kameŋeranut, nukabe da nukabe; emoete aitapoet kaneejai enabi; konye eoliorete ikisila kama ejai esasedoti, ka ainerun da kama ejaas imakio.
Ibworo ekabaka, enapi ekapolon aburun, emaranete akanin nuka ituŋa luka akwap. Eswamakini kes kwape ejaar ekecerot, ido atubokini kes kwape atubonokiniata; ejenunete do ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.”
Kosodi kanen kokaru lokikanyetekape, toma olap lokikanyetekape, kapaaran nakikanyet naka elap, naeboio kotogoka, kiboiete da imakio luka Yuda kakonyeneka, kadoik eoŋ akan naka Ejakait EDEKE.
Kasodi kasesen, ido koany, aputo naesubit bala akim; ageun kaneasubit bala aŋabeteke kiton kwap, akim: ageun da kaneasubit bala aŋabeteke kiton kuju, bala amwekimwek, bala ejese loka esabu.

Korio naasubit bala akan, ketiŋ ecuude; kadaku emoyo kokidiŋ kakwap ka akuj, kayaŋa Yerusalem kotoma aitapoeta nuka Edeke, mama ejai ekirigi loka erute loka alaro nakotoma loeseseni agolitomei: neajai eicoloŋ loka aput naka ekolo, naitokokoli.
Ido koany, kojai nen aibuses naka Edeke loka Isirael, kwape ajaar aitapoet naabu kaany kapuuton.

Kosodi kabala ebe, “Okoku loka etuŋanan, kiteluo kwana akonikonye orot loebei agolitomei.” Kasodi keteluo akakonye orot loebei agolitomei, ido koany, kejai aput ŋin naka ekolo, neelomarere orute loka etem ari nakagolitomei.

Katema eoŋ atiar, “Okoku loka etuŋanan, iany kereka nuiswamaete? Italesia luepolok luiswamai ekek loka Isirael kane, tape ekunyari neelwana anyoun kaiboisika nakalaunan? Konye iyatakini bobo aanyun nukitalesia ace nuepolok.”
Kasodi kayau okirigi loka alaro; kasodi kete, ido koany, kojai apedot arwatat.
Kosodi atemar atiar, “Okoku loka etuŋanan, kobok arwatat”: ido kadau aibok arwatat, koany, kojai ekirigi.
Katema atiar, “Koloma, koany italesia lukaronok luiswamaete kane.”
Kaloma, kaany; ido koany, aponi kinomitete aputosia nuka ŋolipone loka lueliatos, ka itiaŋ luketal, ka aputosia kere nuka ekek loka Isirael, toma arwatat iwaitin kere.
Kobwoete kakonyenekec ituŋa akaisakanykaarei komakio luka ekek loka Isirael, kobwoi Yaasania okoku loka Sapan kokidiŋikec, Kokodite ŋolituŋanan aisupuruuneteke; kopuru asakat naka lukisupurununo.

Kosodi ŋesi atemar atiar, “Okoku loka etuŋanan, iany kereka nuiswamaete imakio luka ekek loka Isirael kamuton, ŋolituŋanan kagolaike nuka aputosia? Naarai ebalas ebe, ‘Mam EJAKAIT kianyuni oni; enyek EJAKAIT akwap.’ ”
Katema bobo atiar, “Iyatakini bobo aanyun nukitalesia ace nuepolok nuiswamaete,”
Kosodi kayau okek loka erute loka etogo loka EJAKAIT loitei agolitomei; ido koany, kiboiete aŋor kokuudianete Tamus.
Katema atiar, “Iany kereka nu, ijo okoku loka etuŋanan? Iyatakini bobo aanyun nukitalesia ace nuepolok adepar ŋun.”

Kosodi katema atiar, “Iany kereka nu, ijo okoku loka etuŋanan? Erai tope akirot naepatana kokek loka Yuda kes aswam italesia lueswamata kane? Naarai elelebata akwap akaje, aiyatakin aitunyunyurikin eoŋ. Ido koany, ibwaikinete atenut okumesikec.
Aso ekonakini eoŋ da kadedeŋ, mam isionie akakoŋu, ido mam etimi: karaida kemonyata keporoto loepol akiika, mam apupuni kes.”

Ido koany, kopotu ikiliok ikanykape elomunete korot loka erute loikumemei, lokagolitomei, ŋolituŋanan ekapit yenijiisike yeneari kakanike; etuŋanan ediopet kidiŋikec loanapit ebaputa, konapite amumwarat naka ebwino loka ekewadikan kaŋabeteke. Kolomasi, kobwaata kariri ketem loka aisinit.
Kedokunit aibuses naka Edeke loka Isirael anyoun kokerubi, nekejai, kiton ariiri kekek loka etogo; kiworo ŋesi etuŋanan loanapit ebaputa, lokejai amumwarat naka ebwino loka ekewadikan aŋabeteke.
Kotema EJAKAIT ŋes atiar, “Kitor kidiŋ ore, kidiŋ Yerusalem, kibwaik aanyunet oreeta luka ituŋa luewojanaros ka luedinyasi kanuka italesia kere lueswamao kokidiŋike.”
Kotema ŋesi ice kapupi eoŋ atiar, “Kitoro kidiŋ ore atupakin ŋol, kodanyata: mam isioniete akusikonye, ido mam itimete.

Koarata cut imakio, ikatumunak ka apesur, idwe ludidik ka aŋor da: konye sirikikunyakis idiotuŋanan kere yenejai aanyunet, Kogeutu da kaiboisika nakalaunan.” Kosodete kogeut kimakio lukejaas kiŋaren ketogo.
Kotema kes atiar, “Komunaasi etogo, kilelebata alaroi kalueario, Kolomasi.” Kolomasi do, kodanyata lukore.
Kosodi kanen, nakedanyiata, kenyein eoŋ, kebiror ebuburia, kamony, kabala ebe, “Wu okwe Ejakait EDEKE! Imudiari kereka ijo aatoŋot kere naka Isirael kanuka abukokin adedenukon toma Yerusalem?”
Eoŋ da, mam akakoŋu isionie, ido mam etimi, konye etebei akeceswamisio akwesikec.”
Ido koany, kinyak etuŋanan loanapit ebaputa, lokejai amumwarat naka ebwino aŋabeteke akiro, kobala ebe, “Eswama kwape ibu kicorakinia.”

Kolimok etuŋanan loanapit ebaputa ebe, “Koloma kidiŋ kakokoron nuidiridirete, kokwap kikerubin, kileleb akonikanin kere atotol nuka akim nuejaas kidiŋ kikerubin, kiwelanaa ore.” Koloma ŋesi kaseseni eoŋ.
Kobwaata do ikerubin kakan nakoteten naka etogo, nakelomaria etuŋanan; kilelebun edou alaro nakotoma.
Kodok aibuses naka EJAKAIT kotoma okerubin, kobwo kariri naka ekek loka etogo; kilelebun edou togo, kileleba da alaro amwekimwek naka aibuses naka EJAKAIT.
Kopupos iporotoi luka abebenoka nuka ikerubin kiton alaro nakokiŋa, kwape eporoto loka Edeke Lokapedor kere nainerar.
Kosodi kanen, nakicorakinia etuŋanan je loanapit ebaputa, kobala ebe, “Kolem akim kokidiŋ kakokoron nuidiridirete, kokidiŋ kikerubin,” koloma ŋesi, kobwo kosiep loka akokoro.
Korio ekerubi akekan kokidiŋ kikerubin kiton akim nakejai kidiŋ kikerubin, kolem, koinak akanin nuka ŋol kaloanapit ebaputa; kitiŋ ŋesi koloma.
Kotakanu kokerubin naasubit bala akan naka etuŋanan kokwap kabebenokakec.
Atakanukec, aputosi kesi kere aoŋon, bala kejai akokoro kotoma akokoro.
Naalosenenoto, kolosenenete kosiepionokec iwoŋon: mam ebelonokinos naalosenenoto, konye aibois nakesesenenei akou kotupanarete: mam ebelonokinos naalosenenoto.
Eleleba akonyen awatekec owaitin kere, ipuranakec, ka akaninikec, abebenokakec, ka akokoron, kes akokoron nuajaas kesi iwoŋon.
Kapup eoŋ akokoron enyaritai akokoron nuidiridirete.

Ido ajai ŋinidiopet ireeta iwoŋon: ereet losodit kerai ereet loka ekerubi, ereet lokiareit kerai ereet loka etuŋanan, ereet lokiwuniet kerai ereet loka eŋatuny, ka ereet da lokiwoŋonet kerai ereet loka emorukaalet.
Naalosenenoto ikerubin, kolosenenete akokoron kosiepionokec: nakitonyoununoto ikerubin abebenokakec adokar anyoun kokwap, akokoron da mam ebelonokinos anyoun kosiepionokec.
Naabwoenenata ŋul, kobwoete nu da; nakedokanariata ŋul kuju, kodokasi nu da kakes: naarai kejai emoyo loka isuban lukajarak kotomakec.

Kitonyout ikerubin abebenokakec, kodokasi anyoun kokwap, ketei eoŋ kwape alomuniata, akokoron da kosiepionokec: kobwaata kokirigi loka erute lokokide loka etogo loka EJAKAIT; kojai da aibuses naka Edeke loka Isirael kokujukec.
Kejai ŋolidiopet ireeta iwoŋon, ido ŋolidiopet abebenoka aoŋon; aput naka akanin nuka etuŋanan kejai kwap kabebenokakec.
Aput da naka ireetakec, keraas ireeta ŋupeŋul luabu kaany kariri naka ecor Kebar, atakanukec ka kes da ikulepek. Kolot ŋolidiopet ederit.
Katema eoŋ atiar, “Okoku loka etuŋanan, lu kes ituŋa luepwakete numam adolit, lueinakinete ainerun naerono kore kalo.
Luebalas ebe, ‘Eroko apak edolo aiduk itogoi: ere lo ŋes amot, oni da kirai akiriŋ.’
Aso kodwarak kes, kodwar, ijo okoku loka etuŋanan.”
Itupuata iaranakus kore kalo, ilelebata da irotinike iaran.
Aso do inera EJAKAIT EDEKE kwanata ebe: Iaranakus luiperionokinito kidiŋike, kes akiriŋ, ere lo da amot: konye kilemario yes anyoun kotomakeŋ.
Iyoŋito ekileŋ; konye ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Kainunete ekileŋ.
Kalemari yes kokidiŋike, kejaikini yes akanin nuka imo, etodolikini da itubesia kamakus.
Kibirori ekileŋ; katubokini yes koikor loka Isirael; ijenunete da ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.
Mam ere lo eraun akusimot, ido mam iraunete akiriŋ kotomake; katubokini yes koikor loka Isirael;
Ijenunete da ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT: naarai mam ipotu kolosenenoto kokisilaka, ido mam itodolito ikatubesia, konye iswamata kwape ejaatar itubesia luka atekerin nukirimorito.”
Kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai ebe:

“Okoku loka etuŋanan, iinacanakon, eeba, iinacanakon, ituŋa luka atekerikon, ka ekek kere loka Isirael, kes ŋul luapotu luiboiete koYerusalem kolimokis ebe, ‘Kikunyasi kaneejai EJAKAIT; kiinakinitai sio akwap na araun airumet.’

Aso do kiner ebe, ‘Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Karaida kalema kes kama elwana kotoma atekerin, karaida keweliwel kes kotoma akwapin, konye araun aibois nakalaunan kamakec nediokasilon kotoma akwapin nuadoloto.’
Aso do kiner ebe, ‘Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Kedepidepi yes katekerin, katukokini yes kakwapin nuisiarakina, kainakin akwap naka Isirael.’
Naeponiata kaŋina, elemarete kanen iboro kere luasacit ka Italesia kere.
Ainakini kes etau ediopet, ebwaikini emoyo lokitetet kotomakec; alemuni etau lokamoru kawatekec, ainakini da etau loka akiriŋ:
tetere elosenenete kokisilaka, koricenenete itubesiaka aiswamaenen: eraunos ikatuŋa, eoŋ da araun Ekecedeke.
Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Konye ŋul luelosenenete ikecetauon atupit itauon luka iborokec luasacit, ka italesiakec, etebei akeceswamisio akwesikec kikulepek.”
Kodoka aibuses naka EJAKAIT anyoun kokidiŋ ore, kobwo koroŋat loejai ari nakokide naka ere.
Kadaku Emoyo eoŋ, kayau Kaludea kaitapoet naka Emoyo loka Edeke, mama ejaas ŋul lukijoreoritono. Kosodi konyou aitapoet kamakaŋ.
Kasodi kalimok ŋul lukijoreoritono akiro kere nuabu EJAKAIT ketodik.
Kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT bobo mama ajai ebe:
“Okoku loka etuŋanan, iboie kokidiŋ kekek loka epali, luejaas akonye aanyun, kwabo mam eanyunete, ejaas aki apupun, kwabo mam epupunete, naarai eraas ekek loka epali.

Aso do, ijo okoku loka etuŋanan, kitemok iboro luka aitwobosio, konyou aibwot paaran kosesenete kesi; ibwosi anyoun kaiboisikon kiton aibois ace kosesenete kesi, Diat eomoomoete, karaida eraas ekek loka epali.
Itolomuni iborokon paaran kosesenete kesi, kwape iboro luka aitwobosio: ilomuni elopet eboŋ kosesenete kesi, kwape elomuniata ituŋa luitwobosio.
Kobok ijo arwatat kosesenete kesi, kitotor iboro.
Korioŋ kokeperinikon, kosesenete kesi, kitolom kamuton; irapi akonikonyen, komam ianyuni alup: naarai kebwaik jo araun aanyunet mama ejai ekek loka Isirael.”
Kasodi keswama kwaŋin kwape kecorakinitere: ketolom ikaboro paaran, kwape iboro luka aitwobosio, eboŋ da kabok arwatat kakakanin, ketolom kamuton, karioŋ kokeperinika kosesenete kesi.
Kosodi tupuruc kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai ebe:
“Okoku loka etuŋanan, mere kiŋisit jo ekek loka Isirael, ekek loka epali ebe, ‘Inyo bo iswamai?’
Kolimok kes ebe, ‘Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Abwokon na naka ekapolon lokotoma Yerusalem, ka ekek kere loka Isirael loejai toma.’
Kolimok ebe, ‘Eoŋ aanyunetekus: kwape abu keswamaa, kwape kwaŋin iswamakinere kes: itwobosio, ijoreorio.’
Ekapolon loejai kidiŋikec erioŋi kokeperike kamuton, elomari: ebokete arwatat aitotor iboro: erapi akonyeneke, naarai mam eanyuni alup kakonyeke.
Ido aterakini ŋes ekaboi, ipoki katacitika: ayauni ŋes Babulon akwap naka Ikaludean; konye mam eanyuni, karaida etwanikini nen.
Eweliweli okwamin kere ŋul kere luirimorito aiŋarakin, ka ikekodeta da kere; autuni eoŋ ekileŋ loetupari kes.
Ejenunete do ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT, naesiarisiaria kes kotoma atekerin, naeweliwelia kes kotoma akwapin.
Konye apianuni ituŋa iuikidioko kakes, luekuete ekileŋ, ka eteŋei ka atular da; tetere elimorete italesiakec kere kotoma atekerin nuedolete; ejenunete do ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT,”
Bobo da kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai ebe:
“Okoku loka etuŋanan, konyam ikoninyamat, komarani, komat akipikon komarani, kisorirai.

Kolimok ituŋa luka akwap ebe, Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE nuka luiboiete ko Yerusalem, ka akwap naka Isirael ebe: Epote ainyam inyamatakec kisoriraete, emasete da akecekipi kitiriraete, naarai edokidokori iboro kakwapukec, kanuka akaje naka ŋul kere kaluiboiete kotoma.
Iswapete ireria luiboioto ituŋa, itisilio akwap; ijenunete da ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.”
Kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai ebe:
“Okoku loka etuŋanan, awaragan nanyoin na naijaatar kakwap naka Isirael, kineras ebe, ‘Eyapata apaarasia, aolio da ŋiniitapoet’?

Aso do kolimok kes ebe, ‘Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Etanaŋi awaragan na, mam bobo inerai kwape awaragan kotoma Isirael.’ Konye kolimok kes ebe, Aaput apaarasia, ka aitodolikinio da naka ŋiniitapoet.
Naarai mam ejaun bobo aitapoet natitai karaida aidwar naiteleli kotoma okek loka Isirael.
Naarai eoŋ EJAKAIT eneri, ido itodolikinio akirot naeŋeri. Mam bobo itilorio. Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Naarai kapaarasiakus, ijo ekek loka epali, eneri eoŋ akirot, ido etodolikini.”
Kobu bobo akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai ebe:
“Okoku loka etuŋanan, koany, ebalasi lukokek loka Isirael ebe, ‘Aitapoet naeseseni ŋesi erai naka apaarasia nuipu koiŋaren, edwari ŋesi nuka apakio nuelwaka.’
Aso do kolimok kes ebe, Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Mam bobo itilorio adio kakakiro. Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Konye akirot naeŋeri itodolikinio.”
Kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai ebe:
“Okoku loka etuŋanan, kodwarak inabin luka Isirael luedwarete, kolimok ŋul luedwarete nuepote kotauonokec ikulepek ebe, ‘Kiirasi akirot naka EJAKAIT’.
Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Itukwi inabin lubaŋiok, luetuparete imoyonokec ikulepek, kwabo emameete nueanyunito!
Wu jo Isirael, asubitos ikoninabin bala ikuwei kaiboisio nuiswapito.
Mam idokanarete karorwaitin, karaida aiteteunun abwas kanuka ekek loka Isirael, tetere ebwoi kojie kapaaran naka EJAKAIT.
Aanyut aamameak ka aidwar nakaiŋal, luineras ebe, ‘Ebala EJAKAIT’: kwabo mam EJAKAIT iyakit kes, konye emunosi ebe itodolikinio akecekirot.
Mam kereka ianyunito aitapoet natai ido mam idwarito nukaiŋal, naarai ineras ebe, ‘Ebala EJAKAIT’; kwabo mam eoŋ enerit?”
Aso do inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: “Naarai inerata aamameak, ido ianyutu nukaiŋal, ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Aso koany, arai eoŋ lokasurupikus.

Itusurupi akakan inabin lueanyunete aamameak, kaidwar nukaiŋal: mam ejaunete aurianet naka ikatuŋa, ido mam iwadikao aiwadikaeta nuka ekek loka Isirael, ido mam elomarete akwap naka Isirael; ijenunete do ebe arai eoŋ Ejakait EDEKE.
Naarai, eebo, naarai etapaarito ikatuŋa, kobalas ebe, ‘Ainapakin’; kwabo emamei ainapakin; ido naedukioto ituŋa arwatat iladaete inabin ŋul aitwakaŋ.
Kolimok ŋul luiladaete aitwakaŋ ebe, Ibirori. Ejauni akiru naibiruni noi; ibiruni da akaka naepol; etiyaikini da ekwam loededeŋ.
Koany, naetiyaikinor arwatat, mam kereka kiŋisio yes ebe, ‘Ai bo ejai akwaŋis naipotu kiladata?’
Aso do inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Atiyaikini kekwam loededeŋ kotoma aisiopoka; ido ejauni akiru naibiruni noi kanyunyuraka, ka akaka naepol kadedeŋ amudiar.
Kwaŋin atiyaikini arwatat naipotu kiladata aitwakaŋ, aitodolikin kwap, tetere epukorio apetetake; naibirunor, yes da kimudiario kokidiŋike; ijenunete do ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.
Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Kwaŋin etodolikini akaisiop arwatat, ka ŋul da lukiladaete aitwakaŋ; atemari yes atiar, Emamei arwatat, karaida ŋul lukiladaete;
kes inabin luka Isirael luedwarete nuka Yerusalem, lueanyunete aitapoeta nuka ainapakin kanukeŋ, kwabo emamei ainapakin.

kinera ebe, Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Itukwi aŋor nuedonyete imakakin luka akanin kere, nuesonyete itabalan luka akwes nuka ituŋa luka ŋinirian amejaa aijar! Imejaete ca ma aijar naka ikatuŋa, ka aitajar da aijar ace kanukus?

Ipotu komoromoroto eoŋ kotoma otuŋaka kanuka aoduneta nuka esairi, ka aluŋureta nuka atap, aiar aijar naka ŋul kalumam tiketwaka, aitajar da aijar naka ŋul kalumam tikejara, aiŋal ikatuŋa luecamunete nukaiŋal.
“Aso do inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Koany, etusurupi imakakinikus, luimejaata aijar kwape akweny, anyilununei kakaninikus; aosikini aijar, aijar naka ŋul kaluimejaete kwape akweny.
Anyilununei da itabalanakus, ayuuni ikatuŋa kakanikus, mam bobo ejaunete akaninikus amejao; ijenunete do ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.
Naarai itakadikinete etau loka ikadoliton kaiŋal, yenimam eoŋ etakadikinit; ka aitogogoŋ akanin nuka ikaronon, komam aibelokin korotoke lokaronon aitajar akeijar.
Kanuka ŋun mam bobo ianyunete aamameak, karaida aidwar adwaresia; ayuuni da ikatuŋa kakaninikus. Ijenunete do ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.”
Kosodi kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai ebe:
“Okoku loka etuŋanan, ayaŋaasi ituŋa lu aputosiakec kotauonokec, ebwaikis da ekomyo loka numam adolitekec kakonyenekec: epedorete ŋul biai aiŋit eoŋ nepetai da?

Aso kiner kakes kobala ebe, Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Ŋinituŋanan yenikotogo loka Isirael yeneyanaari aputosiake kotauke, kibwaik ekomyo loka numam adoliteke kakonyeneke, kosodi abunore mama ejai enabi: Eoŋ EJAKAIT aboŋokini kaŋun kwape ejaar aipues naka aputosiake;
tetere ekamuni itauon luka ekek loka Isirael, naarai agitaros kere kaneajai kanuka aputosiakec.
“Aso kolimok ekek loka Isirael atiar, Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Koboŋutu, kibelokinos ainyein aputosiakus; kibelokis da akusikonyen ainyein ikusitalesia kere.

Naarai ŋinituŋanan yenikokek loka Isirael, arai yenika imo luiboiete kotoma Isirael, yenegitar kama ajai, koyaŋa akeputosia kotauke, kibwaik ekomyo loka numam adoliteke kakonyeneke, kobu mama ejai enabi aiŋitun eoŋ: eoŋ EJAKAIT elopet ŋes aboŋokini;
ido etogogoŋi akakonyen mama ejai ituŋanan ŋin, etuluori da aumokinet, araun aanyunet ka awaragan, agelari da kokidiŋ otuŋaka; ijenunete do ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.
Ido arai kiŋalai enabi kiner akirot, eoŋ EJAKAIT eŋalat enabi ŋol, ariori da akakan mama ejai, kamudia ŋes kokidiŋ otuŋaka Isirael.
Ibwokete da aiticanet naka numam adolitekec: aiticanet naka enabi erianakin cut kaiticanet naka ŋol kalokiŋisit ŋes.
Inera Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Kinyek ekek loka Isirael apaar bobo anyoun kama ajai, karaida amunaar bobo kakecediakanareta kere; tetere konyet eraunos ikatuŋa, eoŋ da araun Ekecedeke.”
Kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai ebe:
“Okoku loka etuŋanan, arai kiswama akwap aronis adiakanar mamakaŋ, ariori eoŋ akakan kamake, abilari da ebela loka inyamatake, ejukuni eteŋei, amudiari da ituŋa ka itiaŋ.
Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Karaida kejaas ituŋa lu luuni kotomakeŋ, Noa, ka Daniel, ka Yob, tikeyuut aijarakec ikulepek bonik kanuka adolitekec.
Arai ketotor itiaŋ lueroko toma akwap, emunaarete iswapi do, tetere emamei ituŋanan yenitori kanuka itiaŋ ŋul;
ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Kwape ajaria, karaida kejaas ituŋa ŋul luuni kotomakeŋ, timam keyuut idwekec lusap ka lupesur; kes bonik tikeyuun, konye iswapi akwap.
Arai da kayau ekileŋ akwap ŋin, kabala ebe, Ekileŋ, kitor akwap; kadau ituŋa ka itiaŋ;
ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Kwape ajaria, karaida kejaas ituŋa ŋul luuni kotomakeŋ, timam keyuut idwekec lusap ka lupesur, konye kes bonik tikeyuun.
Arai da kejuk atular akwap ŋin, kabukok ca akadedeŋ kaokot, amudiar ituŋa ka itiaŋ:
ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Kwape ajaria, karaida kejaas Noa, ka Daniel ka Yob kotomakeŋ, timam keyuut idwekec lusap ka lupesur; tikeyuut aijarakec bonik kanuka adolitekec.

Konye arai kesal aatoŋot kotomakeŋ naitolomuni idwe lusap ka lupesur, naelomuniata mamakus, ianyunete yesi da ikecerotin ka akeceswamisio: kitalakario kotoma aronis naayau eoŋ Yerusalem, ŋun kere nuayau kotomakeŋ.
Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Kitalakarete kesi yes, naianyuniata ikecerotin ka akeceswamisio: ijenunete do ebe mam keswamakinit atitai kere nueswamat.”
Kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai ebe:
“Okoku loka etuŋanan, itelekarit biai emusabibu ikito kere, atenut naka emusabibu naejai okito luka amagoro?
Elemununo kereka akitoke aiswamaunia ibore kere? Arai bo elemununete kereka ituŋa iloit kaŋes aikajakinia ibore kere?
Koany, ecakakinio toma akim araun akito nukinoka: enyami akim epuai ka epuai, icweio da kidiŋike; ejai tope ajokis kaswam kere?
Koany, kwape ajaar ber, mam epedori adioswam; ibusakini biai adioswam kedau akim ainyam, icwee da?
Aso do inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Kwape emusabibu kokito luka amagoro, luainakinit akim araun akito nukinoka, kwaŋin ainakinia luiboiete koYerusalem.
Etogogoŋi akakonyen mama ejaas; elomunete kakim, konye enyami kes akim; ijenunete do ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT, naetogogoŋio akakonyen mama ejaas.
Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Etisili akwap, naarai adiakasi.”
Kobu bobo akirot naka Ejakait mama ajai ebe:
“Okoku loka etuŋanan, kitejenik Yerusalem italesiake.
Kiner atiar, Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE kaYerusalem ebe: Ageunetekon, ka auruniokon ajai akwap naka Ekanaanit; Emorait ŋes papakon, totokon da Akitit.
Nakiwuruunere, kapaaran nakiwuruunere mam aponi kotuboi aliligetekon, kwabo mam aponi kiloŋi kakipi aitalaunia; mam aponi kibwaikin adiobalaŋ, karaida adiokimukorio.
Amamei akoŋu nakitimit, aiswamakin jo ŋun kere, aisioni jo; konye aponi kocakar kiŋa ais, naarai kilaitai, kapaaran nakiwuruunere.
“Kosodi naetorio, kaany ibelibelo kaokotokon, katema atiar, ‘Karaida kijai aokotokon, kojar’; eebo, katema atiar, ‘Karaida kijai aokotokon, kojar.’
Ketupuu kwape aibutunet naka ais, kiyatanakin korau nakapolon, kodolok toma atumun naibus; eburut ikisinakon, apolooros itimakon; konye ijai titai imujalal.
Kasodi keloŋ kakipi; eebo, kelota cut aokotokon, kenyonyoanak akinyet.
Ketanap da anapito naesonyitai, ketanap amuk nuka emukule, kemuko kebaputa kaloejok, karapak aliiri.
Kesiri da kiisiro, kebwaik aikomon akaninikon, erikot da omurisiŋukon.
Kebwaik itetio okumesikon, kakiikon da, aboko da naetemelel akoukon.

Kwaŋin ŋes kiisirere kesabu ka epuesa; kerai anapitokon naka ebaputa kaloejok, ka aliiri, ka anapito naesonyitai; konyamenenei atap naidicic, ka esik, ka akinyet. Kitemelel noi noi, kisirereŋi aitodol apolou naka ekabakane.
Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Kilosikin eemutokon atekerin kanuka atemelelekon; naarai etodolikinitoi, kanuka apolouka naabu kebwaikinite jo.
Ibu kolem inapenekon, kiswamau aiboisio nuiceleleete nuesiritoi kijesesia luegelegela, kodotear kamakec; mam lem ejaenenas nuikote nen, karaida ajaun.
Ibu kolem da ikoniboro luejok luka akais nuipu luka esabuka ka luka epuesaka lukainakinit jo, kiswamaa aputosia nuka ituŋa, kodotear kakes.
Ibu kolem inapenekon luesonyitai, korapak kes, kibwaik akakinyet ka lukisupurununoka kakonyenekec.
Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Ikanyamat da lukainakinit jo, atap naidicic, ka akinyet, ka esik, luketanyamenenei jo, ibu kibwaik kakonyenekec araut asakat naeuru saa.
Bobo da, ibu kolem ikonidwe lusap ka lupesur, lukiwurikinit eoŋ, koinak ŋul araut asuban mama ejaas kwi ainyam. Kerai kereka akonidoteu ibore yenedit,
tape iari ikadwe, kijaik kes araut ainakinet naicweio mama ejaas?
Ido kotoma otalesiakon kere ka adoteukon, mam ibu kiitu apaarasia nuka eiditeukon, naijaenenar titai imujalal, kibelibelo kaokotokon.
“Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Itukwi, itukwi jo! Kosodi kanen akaulo kanukaronokokon kere,
iduku aibois naikumemei, iswamau aibois naiidiara kaŋolirot.
Iduku aiboisikon naiidiara asisiarin kere, ituluo atemelelekon araut naketal, ipukok akonikejen mama ejai ŋol kere loitori, iyatanak adoteukon.
Ielokinos kimisirian da, ikoniidunyeta lueburok awat; iyatanak adoteukon, aitunyunyurikin eoŋ.
Aso do koany, kariik akakan, eŋoŋa akorakinetekon, kejaik jo mama ejai akot naka ŋun nukilaito, adwe nuka Ipilisitian, nuirumito ileic kanuka eponekon lokadoteu.
Idotear da mama ejaas Iyasurian, naarai mam kipedori atitirikin, eebo, idotear mama ejaas, kwabo mam kiupi.
Ido bobo iyatanak adoteukon akwap naka Kanaan, kiton Kaludea; kwabo mam ŋun da kiupete.
Naarai iduki akoniibois naikumemei kaŋiŋisisiar, kiswamau akoniibois naiidiara kaŋolirot; kwabo mam ibu korai kwape adote, naarai imen eropit.
Aberu naadote ba! Naisukunyuni ca ma imo aibois naka okilenike!
Einakinete ituŋa adotea ainakineta; konye jo iinakini ainakinetakon mama ejaas ipailonokon kere, aijodounio, tetere epote neijai ijo kaŋoliwai kanuka adoteukon.
Igelara ijo kaŋor ace kadoteukon, naarai emamei yenikitupuni jo aelokinor: ido naarai ibu korop, kwabo mam kiropio, kanuka ŋun igelara ijo.
“Aso do ijo adote, kiira akirot naka EJAKAIT.

Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Naarai abukor akonisilianut, kopukoroi amujalalakon kanuka adoteukon mama ejaas ipailonokon; ido kanuka aputosia kere nuka italesiakon, kanuka aokot nuka idwekon luiinakinit kes;

aso do koany, atukonokini ipailonokon kere, luibu kolakanarotor, ka ŋul kere lukimina, ka ŋul da kere luibu kolaite; atukonokini kes ejie kajo kowaitin kere, apukokini kes amujalalakon, koanyutu amujalalakon.
Ido katubokini akiro, kwape etubokinere aŋor nuegircte adukokinikec nuebukorete da aokot; ido kainuni aokot nuka adedeŋ ka ekokote.

Kakorakini akanin nuka ipailonokon, ecakarete kesi aiboisikon naikumemei, kotiyatiyata aiboisiokon nuiidiara; kilacarete inapenekon, enaŋete ikoniboro lukajokak luka akais nuipu: kinyeinete ijai titai imujalal.
Kiinunete erioŋet asurokinia jo, kibiribirete kamor, kicumucumata cut kikecekileŋa.
Ido icweete ikonitogoi, itodolikinete etube kamakon kosesenete aŋor nuipu; kesinyeini adoteu, kwabo mam bobo iropi.
Kwaŋin esimonikinia akadedeŋ kamakon, kinyein ekakokote, eyamakin, komam bobo anyunyurikin.
Naarai mam iitununei apaarasia nuka eiditeukon, konye kitakadikin kaŋun kere; ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Aso koany, ayauni eoŋ ekonirot akoukon.
“Mam kereka iyatakinit adoteu kotalesiakon kere?
Koany, ŋinituŋanan yeninera awaragasia kiwaragi jo ebe, ‘Epone ka toto, ŋes loka akokuke da.’
Irai ijo akoku naka totokon, naelait okilenike ka ikedwe; irai ijo inac naka akoniinacan, nuelaete ikiliokokec ka ikecedwe, Kerai totokus Akitit, papakus da kerai Emorait.
Kinacikon nakapolon ŋes Samaria, naejai akanikon nakokediany, ŋes ka adweke: kinacikon nadidi naejai akanikon nakoteten, ŋes Sodom ka adweke.
Konye mam ilosenenei korotinikec, ido mam iswamaenenei kwape ejaatar italesiakec; konye apak naedit, ibosit ijo adepar kes korotinikon kere.
Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Kwape ajaria, mam kinacikon Sodom, karaida adweke, eswamaenenete kwape iswamaa ijo ka adwekon.
Koany, keraas nu numam adolit nuka kinacikon Sodom; aiwoŋonut, ka aimonianakin inyamat, ka aijamam naka akerianut kejaas mamake ka adweke; mam ŋes esigalikinit yenikican ka yenilwaritoi.
Ido eomikina kesi, kiswamata nuketal kakonyeneka; ŋes kainakini alemar kwape abu ketojokia.
Kwabo Samaria da mam eswamat atutubet naka aronisiokon; konye jo iyatanakini italesiakon adepar kes, iinakinit akoniinacan atakan bala nuedolito kanuka italesiakon kere luiswamat.

Ijo da, kibwok alopet ikonileic, naarai iinakinit etube loka ainacanakon abeneniar; kanuka aronisiokon nuiswamat nuketal adepar kes, ŋes kitelekaritotor ijo kadolit. Eebo, kitirira, ijo da kibwok ikonileic, naarai iinakinit akoniinacan atakan bala nuedolito.
tetere ibwoki ikonileic alopet, kirumata ileic kanuka ŋun kere nuiswamat, naarai italakari kes.
Eboŋunete do ainacanakon Sodom ka adweke apoloukec nakolo, eboŋunete da Samaria ka adweke apoloukec nakolo; ibonuŋete ijo da ka adwekon apoloukus nakolo.
Mam kereka kiwaragit kinacikon Sodom kapaaran naka aiwononutukon,
eroko epukoro akonironis? Kwana da iputokinos kaŋes araut naamoromorot naka adwe nuka Edom, ka ŋun kere nuirimorito ŋes, ka adwe da nuka Ipilisitian, nukirimorito kimwaŋito jo.
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Ibu kibwok adoteukon ka italesiakon.
Konye eituni akaitutuket kajo naka apaarasia nuka eiditeukon, ido eticasi kamakon aitutuket namam edaun.
Kosodi konyet iituni irotinikon, kirumata ileic, nakainakinia jo ainacanakon, nukapolok ka nudidik; kainakini kes araut adwe, konye mere kanuka akoniitutuket.
Ido eticasi kamakon akaitutuket: ijenuni do ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.
Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Tetere iituni, itirirai, mam bobo iwooŋari akoniituk, kanuka ileicikon; naadaunia aisioni jo kere nuiswamat.”
Kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai ebe:
“Okoku loka etuŋanan, kolim asogol, kiner awarag mama ejai ekek loka Isirael:
Kiner ebe, Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Abu emorukaalet loepol lokejaas abebenoka nuepolok ka akopir nueojak, loeleleba ajul, loka ijesesia luipu kobu Lebanon, koyaŋa aidi naka eres:
kobila nakokuju naka aibutunetake, kodaka akwap naka agwelanar; kibwaik ore loka ikagwelanarak.
Koyaŋa da ikinyom luka akwap kira alup nupusuk, abu kosipok neajaas akipi nuipu, Kibwaik kwape aderut.
Kopoloor, koraun emusabibu loepesit kouriana, kibelokinos atenueikike mamake, kojaas aliasioke kwapuke. Aso koraun emusabibu, kopet atenun, kolibi akidikidin.

“Kejai da emorukaalet ece loepol, lokejaas abebenoka nuepolok ka ajul nuipu: ido koany, kitukud emusabibu ŋol akeliasio mamake, kolibi atenueikike abear neejai, tetere icocoi. Kouko kapanya nueraitai,
kiraik alup nuejok neajaas akipi nuipu, tetere epesi atenun, ido kora araito, koraun emusabibu loejok.

Kiner ebe, Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Isirereŋio? Mam kereka erutuni ŋesi aliasioke, kodeŋ akeraito, tetere erinyori? Tetere erinyorete akekwi kere nuepalal nuelibunete; mere kanuka agogoŋ naepol karaida kanuka ituŋa luipu arutun akelias.
Eebo koany, kiraikin, isirereŋio? Mam kereka erinyori cut, kijaŋ ekwam lokokide? Erinyori kotoma apanya nuapolokini.”
Bobo da kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai ebe,
“Kolimok ekek lokepali ebe, Mam kereka ijenete apolou naka akiro kaŋun? Kolimok ebe, Koany, abu ekabaka loko Babulon kobu Yerusalem, kikama ekabakake, ka ikapolokoke, koyaŋau kes neajai Babulon.
Koyaŋa ediopet kaur naka ekabaka, kitutukoto kaŋes aitutuket; ido kisiyapo ŋes. (Koyaŋa ikagogoŋok luka akwap:
aitisil ajakanut, kinyek adakara, konye kicat kanuka airic aitutuketeke.)
Konye kipaliik kiyakia ikekiyakia Misiri, koinakinai ibalasin ka ituŋa luipu. Isirereŋio kereka ŋes? Ekui tope ŋol loiswamai nuikote nen? Ebili aitutuket, kosodi aiku?
Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Kwape ajaria, abeit etwanikini loamwaŋi aiyapositike, kobili akeitutuket, kidiŋ Babulon, aibois neiboio ekabaka lokitarau ŋes ekabaka.
Kwabo mam Parao ka akejore nakagogoŋ ka ekekodet loepol iŋarakinete ŋes kojie, naitutuoto itutio, edukete abwasin amudiaria ituŋa luipu.
Naarai amwaŋ aiyaposit ka aibil aitutuket; ido koany, itogogoŋit kakanike, konye eswama ŋun kere; mam ekui.
Aso do inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Kwape ajaria, abeit aiyapositika naabu komwaŋa, ka akaitutuket nakebili, etodolikini akouke.
Aloki ekaboi mamake, ipoki akatacit, ayaŋauni Babulon, kipuri kaŋes kaŋina kanuka akediakaret naadiakarit kamakaŋ.
Ibiroros ikakerakake kere lukorioŋetake kere kekileŋ, isiarisiario ŋul kere luideunos kokwamin kere: ijenunete do ebe eoŋ EJAKAIT ener.”
Eraikini oroŋat loimukurur loka Isirael: elibi ŋesi atenun, ka aira araito, eraun eres loejok: iboiete akweny nuka iponesio kere kotolim loka atenueikike.
Ejenunete ikito kere luka ais ebe eoŋ EJAKAIT etisili ekitoi loeoj, etopoloo ekitoi loeuriana, esirinyori ekitoi loepesit, esilibi da ekitoi loeonit. Eoŋ EJAKAIT ener, eswama da.”
Kobu bobo akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai ebe:
“Apoloukus anyoin, inerasi awarag na nuka akwap naka Isirael ebe, ‘Anyamata lukapapa emusabibu loedwar, aliokos idwe ikel’?
Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Kwape ajaria, mam bobo inerasi awarag na koIsirael.
Koany, eraas itauon kere lukaŋ; kwape etau loka papa, kwape kwaŋin etau loka ikoku da erai lokaŋ; etau loiswamai aronis, ŋes etwani.
“Konye arai edolit ituŋanan kiswamai nuicoranakinio nuibusakinito,
kwabo mam enyamakinit oroŋan, ido mam iteluorit akekonye mama ejaas aputosia nuka ekek loka Isirael, komam emunaarit aberu naka aupake, komam ikunyakinit aberu apakio nuka atiakarike;
komam erodit idiotuŋanan, konye kinyakak lokapesenike akeititiŋet, kwabo mam eŋasit idiotuŋanan kagogoŋ, ido kitanyamenenei yeniketeŋei inyamat, kimukonokini da yenemujalal anapito;
yeneyuununei komam aimedaun, kwabo mam ecamununei luitedeparito kere, yenelemari akekan kama kanumam edolito, yenikitodolenenei etube lokabeit loka etuŋanan ka aupake,
yenikelosenenei kokisilaka, ido koricenenei itubesiaka, aswam nukabeit; ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, ‘Edolit ŋin, abeit ejari.’
kwabo mam iswamai nuibusakinito kere, konye enyamakinit oroŋan, komuna aberu naka aupake,
yenabu korod yenikican ka yenilwaritoi, koŋat kagogoŋ, komam enyakakinit aititiŋet, eteluo akekonye mama ejaas aputosia, eswama nuketal,
yenayuununei kanuka aimedaunia, yenacamunit luedeparito; aso eraun kereka ŋin ikajaran? Mam ejari. Eswama italesia ŋul kere: abeit etwani; ebeikinete ŋes akeokot.
“Koany, arai keuri ŋesi ikoku, yeneanyuni aronisio kere nuka papake nueswamat, koyoŋ, komam iswamai nuikote nen,
yenimam enyamakinit oroŋan, ido mam iteluorit akekonye mama ejaas aputosia nuka ekek loka Isirael, yenimam emunaarit aberu naka aupake,
komam erodit ituŋanan kere, yenimam ayanaarit aititiŋet, karaida aiŋat kagogoŋ, konye kitanyamenenei yeniketeŋei inyamat, kimukonokini yenemujalal anapito.

Yenelemari akekan kama kanumam edolito, yenimam ecamunit aimedaun karaida luitedeparito, yenitodolenenei ikatubesia, kolosenenei kokisilaka; mam ŋin etwani kanuka numam adolit nuka papake, abeit ejari.
Konye papake, naarai amwaŋit kadedeŋ, koŋat onaceke kagogoŋ, kiswama numam ejok kotuŋake, koany, etwani kanuka numam adoliteke.

Etau loeswamai aronis, ŋes etwani. Mam ikoku ibwoki numam adolit nuka papake, kwabo mam papake ibwoki numam adolit nuka okokuke; ejaun adolit naka ikadoliton mamakeŋ, ejaun da aronis naka ikaronon mamakeŋ.
Mam iitunio akediakanareta nueswamat: ejari kadoliteke nueswamat.
Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Esiyalamikinit tope atwanare naka ikaronon? Konye gwai kibelokin korotoke, kojar?

Konye arai kibelokin ikadoliton kadoliteke, kiswama numam adolit, kiswama da kwape ejaatar italesia kere nuiswamai ikaronon, eraun kereka ŋin ikajaran? Mam iitunio adio kaswamisioke nukadolit nueswamat: kapaarike naepaarit, karonisike naeswamat, etwani kanuka ŋun.
Arai kibelokin ikadoliton kadoliteke, kiswama numam adolit, kotwana kaŋun; kanumam adoliteke nueswamat, etwani kanuka ŋun.
Bobo da, arai kibelokin ikaronon karonisike naeswamat, kiswama nuicorakinio nuibusakinito, itajari eketau.
Naarai eomoomoi, ibelokini kapaaretake nueswamat, abeit ejari, mam etwani.
Konye etemari ekek loka Isirael atiar, ‘Mam eriana erot loka EJAKAIT.’ Wu ekek loka Isirael, mam teni ikarotin erianasi? Mere ikusirotin lumam erianasi?
Kocakasi neelwana akusipaar kere nuipaarito; kiswamaut etau lokitetet ka emoyo lokitetet. Kanukinyo ikotor atwanare, ijo ekek loka Isirael?
Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Naarai mam esiyalamikinit atwanare naka ŋin yenetwani: aso do kibelokinos, kojarata.”
kohala ebe:
Kerai totokon inyo? aŋatuny:
Naaperi koŋatunyo, kokidiŋ oŋatunyo ludidik itanaki ikedwe.
Korau iŋatuny yenididi;
Kisisiau amej; konyam ituŋa.
Kikamunai kaipanyikec:
Koyaŋaarai kigoluna akwap nako Misiri.
Koseu ikokuke ice,
Kituluo iŋatuny yenididi.
Kisisiau amej, konyam ituŋa.
Kojenu ikecetogoi lukapolok,
Kitecek ireriakec;
Kosilior akwap, ka iboro kere lukejaas,
Kanuka eporoto loka agatake.
Kolokikis eboikec,
Kikamunai kaipanyikec.
Koyaŋaasi mama ejai ekabaka loko Babulon;
Koyaŋaasi toma abwasin,
Kinyek ekeporoto apupun bobo koroŋan luka Isirael.
Loeraitai neajaas akipi:
Ideneriat, eleleba atenueik kanuka akipi nuipu.
Kanuka ŋul kalueyaenenete,
Kitopolooritai, etiaikec kokidiŋ katenueik nueburok;
Koanyunai kanuka aojaukec kaipues naka atenueikikec.
Kitoon ekwam lokokide araitoke:
Kobilunai ibelaike luegogoŋ, korinyosi;
Konyam akim kes.
Akwap naewonit naka akure.
Anyam araitoke,
Komamun kamake ebela loegogoŋ
Araut ebela loka ajakanut loka ayait.
Eraas nu nuka akuudian, eraunos da akuudian.
Kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai ebe:
“Okoku loka etuŋanan, kinera kimakio luka Isirael, kolimok kes ebe, Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Iponito aiŋit eoŋ? Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Kwape ajaria, mam kiŋisete eoŋ.
Okoku loka etuŋanan, itubokini kereka ijo kes? Itubokini kereka ijo kes? Kitejenik italesia luka lukapapaakec.

Kolimok kes ebe, Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Apaaran naaseunia Isirael, kekeu akakan mama ejai aur naka ekek loka Yakob, ketejenun mama ejaas kesi kakwap nako Misiri, naekeunia akakan mamakec, kener atiar, Arai eoŋ EJAKAIT Ekusideke.
Apaaran ŋin kekeu akakan mamakec, aitonyoun kakwap nako Misiri aitolomar akwap naarotakinit kes, naeleleete akile ka esik, ŋes aibuses naka akwapin kere.
Kabala kes ebe, Kocaka ŋinituŋanan italesia luimielas akonyekus, ido sirikimunaaros kaputosia nuko Misiri; arai eoŋ EJAKAIT Ekusideke.
Konye kepaliikis, kagiroto akiirar; mam ecakara ŋinituŋanan italesia luimielasi akonyeke, ido mam inyeina aputosia nuko Misiri.
“Kasodi kener abukokini kes akadedeŋ, aitodolikin akanyunyura mamakec kokidiŋ kakwap nako Misiri.
Konye eswama eoŋ ŋun kanuka ekakiror, kinyek amoromoroo kakonyen nuka atekerin nukejaas kesi, nuketejenunor mamakec, ketolomu kakwap nako Misiri.
Kwaŋin ketolomu kes kakwap nako Misiri, kayaŋa modiŋ.
Kainak ikakisila, ketejenu ikatubesia, luejaria ituŋanan arai kiswama kes.
Bobo da kainak akasabaton, araut aanyunet kidiŋikec ka eoŋ, tetere ejenunete ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT loetalauni kes.
Konye kepaliik ekek loka Isirael kamodiŋ: mam alosenenete kokisilaka, kogiroto ikatubesia luejaria ituŋanan arai kiswama kes; komunaasi noi akasabaton.
“Kasodi kener abukokini kes akadedeŋ kamodiŋ, amudiar kes.
Konye eswama eoŋ ŋun kanuka ekakiror, kinyek amoromoroo kakonyen nuka atekerin, kanuetolomunia kes kakonyenekec.
Bobo da kekeu akakan mamakec kamodiŋ, kenyek ayaun kes toma akwap naainakinit, naeleleete akile ka esik, ŋes aibuses naka akwapin kere.
Naarai aŋeroto ikatubesia, komam elosenenete kokisilaka, komunaasi da akasabaton: naarai atupanarete ikecetauon aputosiakec.
Konye kitim akakoŋu, kenyek amudiar kes, kwabo mam abu kapia kes cut kamodiŋ.
“Kasodi alimokin ikecedwe kamodiŋ ebe, Sirilosenenete kokisila luka lukapapaakus, ido siriricenenete itubesiakec, kwabo sirikimunaaros kaputosiakec.
Arai eoŋ EJAKAIT Ekusideke, kolosenenete kokisilaka, koricenenete ikatubesia, kiswamaenenete,
ido kitalautu akasabaton; eraunete aanyunet kidiŋikus ka eoŋ, tetere ijenunete ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT Ekusideke.
Konye kepaliikis idwe; mam kelosenenete kokisilaka, kwabo mam kericenenete itubesiaka aiswamaenen, luejaria ituŋanan, arai kiswama kes; komunaasi da akasabaton.
“Kasodi kener abukokin kes akadedeŋ, aitodolikin akanyunyura mamakec kamodiŋ.
Konye kenyaku akakan, keswama kanuka ekakiror, kinyek amoromoroo kakonyen nuka atekerin kanuetolomunia kes kakonyenekec.
Bobo da kekeu akakan mamakec kamodiŋ ebe, eweliweli kes toma atekerin, esiarisiari kes toma akwapin;
Naarai mam apotu kiswamata ikatubesia, konye koŋeroto ikakisila, komunaasi da akasabaton, ido emielas akecekonye aputosia nuka lukapapaakec.
Bobo da abu kainak kes ikisila lumam ejok, ka itubesia lumam ejariata.
Kamuna kes kanuka ainakinetakec, naarai kitotorenenoto ikiyaikec kere akim, tetere etisiliori kes, kojenutu ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.

Naarai naadaunia ayaun kes akwap, nakekeu akakan ainakin kes, kosodete nakeanyuniata eukot loeoja, ka ekitoi loetumit, koinakis kanen asubanakec, koinakis kanen ainakinetakec nuitunyunyurikinete; kanen da kisupuruut asakatakec nueuru saa, kobukonokinete kanen ainakinetakec numatan.
Kasodi alimokin kes ebe, Aibois naicelelei nailosete apolouke inyo? Kosodi komaikinai ekekiror Bama
Aso do kolimok ekek loka Isirael ebe, Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Imunaaros ca kwape kejaar epone loka lukapapaakus? Ido idotearos ca atupar italesiakec?

Naiinanakiniata ainakinetakus, naitotorioto idwekus akim, imunaaros ca kaputosiakus kere kiton lolo. Aso kiŋisete ca eoŋ, wu ekek loka Isirael? Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Kwape ajaria, mam kiŋisete eoŋ.
Ido kalemuni katekerin, katukonok yes alemun kakwapin nukiisiarakinio, kakan nakagogoŋ, kakan da naerioro, kadedeŋ naebukoro.
Kayauni amodiŋ naka atekerin, ido kipuri kaŋina kayes kasesenas kakonyen.
Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Kwape kapurio kalukapapaakus kamodiŋ naka akwap nako Misiri, kwape kwaŋin ŋes kipurio kayes da.
Ketotori yes kwap kebela, ketolomari olomorut loka aitutuket;
apiari lukepali kotomakus, ka ŋul da luediakarete mama ajai: alemuni kakwap naiboioto, konye mam elomarete akwap naka Isirael. Ijenunete do ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.
Acamuni yes kwape asakat naeuru saa, nakalemunia ayaun katekerin, katukonok alemun kakwapin nukiisiarakinitai; ketalaunio kamakus kakonyen nuka atekerin.
Ijenunete do ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT, naketolomaria akwap naka Isirael, akwap naabu kekeu akakan ainakin lukapapaakus.
Kosodete iitunete kaŋina ikusirotin, ka aswamisiokus kere, nuipotu komunaarotor; kikadakinete kanuka aronisiokus kere nuiswamato.
Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Ijenunete ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT nakeswamakiniata yes kanuka ekakiror, mere kwape ejaatar irotinikus lueroko, karaida kwape ejaatar aswamisiokus nukasilianut.”
Kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai ebe:
“Okoku loka etuŋanan, kitete akonikonyen eŋalakimak, kolimonok akonikirot kobei eŋalakimak, kodwarak amagoro naka ais nakotoma Eŋalakimak.

Kolimok amagoro naka Eŋalakimak ebe, Kiira akirot naka EJAKAIT: inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Koany enokokini akim mamakon, kicwe ŋolikitoi loepesit kotomakon, ka ŋolikitoi loeonit: mam itudeŋio aipelonoreta nuka akim naesarani, enyami akim akonyen kere ageun keŋalakimak kiton agolitomei.
Eanyunete awat kere ebe eoŋ EJAKAIT enokokinit: mam itudeŋio.”
Kasodi atemar atiar, “Wu okwe Ejakait EDEKE! Kabalas eoŋ ebe, ‘Mere ŋes eketataman loka awaragasia?’ ”
Kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai ebe:
“Okoku loka etuŋanan, kitete akonikonyen Yerusalem, kolimonok akonikirot kobei aiboisio nukalaunak; kodwarak akwap naka Isirael.
Kolimok akwap naka Isirael ebe, Inera kwanata EJAKAIT ebe: Koany, arai lokasurupikon, ido autuni ekakileŋ kalem kakuraruke, kapiaria cut ikadoliton ka ikaronon.
Aso naarai kapiari cut ikadoliton ka ikaronon, ŋes einakini ekakileŋ alomun kakuraruke asurokinia awat kere ageun keŋalakimak kiton agolitomei.
Ejenunete do awat kere ebe eoŋ EJAKAIT autunit ekakileŋ kakuraruke; mam eboŋokini bobo.
Aso ijo okoku loka etuŋanan, kidiny; kidiny kiŋereteny luebilil, kaiturur naepol kakonyenekec.

Kosodi kanen, kiitemasi atiar, ‘Kanukinyo idinyar?’ kiner ebe, ‘Kanuka apupon, Naarai epote, eburuni ŋolitau, ilajakakaros akanin kere, iilori ŋolimoyo, ekalanyakaros akuŋin kere kwape akipi.’ Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Koany, epote, iswamao da.”
Kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai ebe:
“Okoku loka etuŋanan, kodwar, kiner ebe, Inera kwanata EJAKAIT ebe: Kiner ebe, Ekileŋ, ekileŋ, ipenitai, epwasitai da!
Ipenitai tetere eari, epwasitai da tetere imilia! Aso kiyalamikini baca? Okokuka, imenit ijo ebela, ka ŋinibore kere yenikakitoi.
Einakinitai ekileŋ apwasio, tetere itiŋio; ipenitai, eebo, epwasitai da, aijaikin akan naka ekaaran.
Okoku loka etuŋanan, komony, kibwolol: naarai esurokinit ituŋaka, esurokinit ikapolok kere luka Isirael: ekorakinitai mama ejai ekileŋ nepepe kikatuŋa, Aso kibap ekonitul.
Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Naarai mam eraun eitemis; ikwaikini bo do ŋes ai arai imenit ebela?
Ebwaik emidet loka ekileŋ oruteikec kere, tetere eburunete ikecetauon, kiyatanakinete aiguikin. Wu okwe! etusubi bala eimilia, eisitai aaria.
Kitemokin, kojep teten; kiderakin, kojep kediany; nen kere neebeit akwanisikon.
Ebapi eoŋ da akakanin, esimoni akanyunyura: eoŋ EJAKAIT ener.”
Kobu bobo akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai ebe:
“Ijo da, okoku loka etuŋanan, kitodik irotin iarei, luebunio ekileŋ loka ekabaka loko Babulon; elomunete ŋul iarei kakwap adiopet. Kigir aibois, kigir neegeunitor erot loebei ore.
Kitodik erot loka ekileŋ abunore Raba loka idwe luka Amon, ka Yuda kotoma Yerusalem loebwaitai.
Naarai ebwoi ekabaka loko Babulon kaneetiakar erot, neegeunitotor irotin iarei, airo: ilamilami imalia, kiŋit iterapim,
Kakanike nakoteten eroet loka Yerusalem, aitemokin akuta nutiyanakinet, awooŋ aituk aiar, aikeseun eporoto keibwoŋ, aitemokin akuta nutiyanakinet orutei, aitut itutio, aiduk arwatatin.
Eraun kamakec bala aidwar naatai kakonyenekec, luiyapoikinete aiyaposio: konye isiituni kes numam adolit, tetere ikamunio.
“Kanuka ŋun inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Naarai kisiituut numam adolitekus, naarai apukor adiakanaretakus, kotakanut aronisiokus kotoma aswamisiokus kere; ido naarai kiitunio kikamunio kakan.
Ijo da, lokaronon Ioimusuŋitai cut, ekapolon loka Isirael, kidolok apaaranikon, apak naka aiticaniokon nakawasia;
Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Kolac egoe lokienieni akou, koou aboko: mam bobo ejaunos ŋun kwaŋin: kitopoloo yenejai kwap, kitisil yenejai kuju.
Abuburiari, abuburiari, abuburiari: mam bobo ŋun ejaunete, aitodol neabunio elopet: ido ainakini ŋes.
naeanyuniata aamameak kanukon, naedwariata nukaiŋal kanukon, aisiperikin jo omurisiŋa luka ikaronok luimusuŋitai noi, lukedoloki akecepaaran, apak naka aiticaniokec nakawasia.
Kinyakak akuraruke, Aibois nakisubakinitai, akwap nakiwurikinitai, nepenen katubokinia.
Ido kabukokini jo akaisiop; kakutakini jo akim naka akanyunyura: kejaikini akanin nuka ituŋa luesubito bala itiaŋ, luepiriaka amudiar.
Iraun akito nukinoka; ejaunos akoniwokot kidiŋ akwap; mam kiitunio bobo: naarai eoŋ EJAKAIT ener.”
Bobo da kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai ebe,
“Ijo da, okoku loka etuŋanan, itubokini, itubokini kereka ijo ere loka aokot? Aso kitejenik ŋes italesiake kere.
Kinera ebe, Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Ere loebukokini aokot kidiŋike, tetere edolokini apakike, loiswamai aputosia amunaaror!
Igwaunit akirot naka aokot nuibukoo, imunaar kaputosiakon nuiswama; isukuny apaarasiakon, ido idolok okarukon, ŋes kainakini ketuluori amorosit katekerin, ka yenikisekelo kakwapin kere.
Lukiapiatar, ka luelwaka, kisekelete, ijo loejai ekiror lokamunaara, ido ileleba autaar.
Kotomakon kemenenenata papa ka toto; kidiŋikon kiswamanakiniata ipejonon nukamwanit: kotomakon kenyamanakiniata kepali yenemamei papake ka apuserut.
Imwan ikaboro lukalaunak, imunaa da akasabaton.
Kejaenenas ituŋa lukasabanakinak kotomakon abukor aokot: kotomakon da ŋes kenyameneniata koroŋan: kidiŋikon kiswamaeneniata nukadoteu.
Kotomakon kepukoriata amujalal naka lukapapakec: kotomakon kitisilioto aŋor numam alaete kanuka atiakarikec.
Ido ejai loiswamai nuketal kaberu naka eidunyeteke; ido ejai ece loemunaari kadoteu aberu naka okokuke; ido ejai ece kotomakon loitisili kinacike, akoku naka papake.
Kotomakon eropio kes abukor aokot; ibu kotukonok ameda aitedepar, idum amakira kama ejaas iidunyetakon kanuka areit; ido ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Kimurwok eoŋ.
Epedori kereka ekonitau atitiŋikin, arai akonikanin ajaut kagogoŋ, kapaarasia nukeswamakinia? Eoŋ EJAKAIT ener, eswamai da.
Kesiarisiari jo katekerin, keweliweli kakwapin; etanaŋi da amodokokokon kotomakon.
Kosodi imunaar kanukon, kakonyen nuka atekerin; ijenuni ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.”
Kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai ebe,
“Okoku loka etuŋanan, arau ekek loka Isirael elele kamaka; eraas kesi kere aisinin, ka adebe, ka asua, ka asasin kokidiŋ oupa; eraas kesi elele loka epuesa.
Aso do inera kwana ta Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Naarai iraunos kere elele, aso do koany, katukonokini yes kidiŋ Yerusalem.
Kwape etukonokinere epuesa ka aisinin, ka asua ka asasin ka adebe kidiŋ oupa, aicukokin akim, aisicalaria; katukonokini yes kwaŋin kakanyunyura, kakadedeŋ; kebwaikini nen, kesicalari.
Eebo, katukonokini, kecukokini akim naka akanyunyura, icalaros yesi kokidiŋike.
Kwape ecalaror epuesa kokidiŋ oupa, icalaros yesi da kwape kwaŋin kokidiŋike; ijenunete ebe eoŋ EJAKAIT kabukok yes akadedeŋ.”
Kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai ebe:
“Okoku loka etuŋanan, kolimok ŋes ebe, Irai ijo akwap namam itesegario ido mam itetepio akiru kapaaran naka aisiop.
Enerut inabinoke kokidiŋike, kwape eŋatuny loegat naepoopoaa imejauna: anyamata aijar naka ituŋa; aŋatata iboro luka akais nuipu ka luka etiai loepol; etupuata apuserunuke kokidiŋike.

Epaliikis isasedotinike ikakisila, amunaasi ikaboro lukalaunak; mam etiakitos iboro lukalaunak ka luka apakio kere, mam isisianakinito atiaketait kotoma lumam elaete ka luelaete, ebwaata akecekonye kasabatonoka, kamoromoroo eoŋ da kamakec.
Esubito ikapolokoke kokidiŋike bala ipeen luepoopoete imejauna; abukor aokot, ka amudiar aijar, tetere imakiraete kaimod.
Ido eladaata inabinoke kanukec aitwakaŋ, eanyunete aamameak, edwarakinete kes nukaiŋal, kobalas ebe, ‘Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE,’ kwabo mam EJAKAIT inerit.
Apotu ituŋa luka akwap komwaŋa, kotupasi aiŋat; eebo, esiyaloŋoŋoto lukican ka luilwaritos, ido amwaŋata imoit atitai.
Kamoote ituŋanan kotomakec, yeniketetean abwas, yenebwoi karorwa kakonyeneka kanuka akwap, kenyek amudiar; konye mam abu kaany imodio da.
Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Kanuka ŋun ŋes abukokinia kes akaisiop; kadau kes kakim naka akanyunyura: etebeik ekecerot akwesikec.”
Kobu bobo akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai ebe:
“Okoku loka etuŋanan, ajaas aŋor aarei, totokec adiopet:
kiporoto Misiri; kiporoto koiditeukec: koridakinai ikecekisin kaŋina, kicikakis atibolok nuka abekonutukec kaŋina.
Ikecekiroria Akola nakapolon, ka Akoliba kinacike. Koraut nukaŋ, kouriata idwe lusap ka lupesur. Ikecekiroria da, Samaria ŋes Akola, Yerusalem da ŋes Akoliba.
Lukenapenenete lubulului, ikayaitok ka ijaka, kes kere ikarumunak luimielai, ikebwanenok luibwanenete ibalasin.
Kokorak kes akedoteu, kes kere, ituŋa luseuna luka Asuria: ka ŋol da lokikila ŋesi, komunaar kaputosiakec kere.
Kwabo mam kinyeini akedoteu anyoun kapaarasia nuka Misiri; naarai koperoto kaŋes katumunike, kicikakis atiboloka nuka abekonutuke: kobukokis ŋes akecedoteu.
Ŋes kakorakinia akanin nuka ipailonoke, akanin nuka Iyasurian, lukikila.
Kopukosi ŋul amujalalake: koyaŋaasi ikedwe lusap ka lupesur, koara ŋes kekileŋ: koraun naejenio kaŋor; naarai aponi kotubokinai akiro.
“Koany kinacike da Akoliba ŋun, konye kiteleka ŋesi ŋin kapaar naka eikilike, kotoma adoteuke da naitelekarit adoteu naka inacike.
Kikila Iyasurian, ikayaitok ka ijaka, ikeidunyeta, lukenapenenete lukaibuses naepol, ikebwanenok luibwanenete ibalasin, kes kere ikatumunak luimielai.
Kaany ebe emunaara; kotupasi kesi kere edioperot.
Konye kiyatak ŋesi akedoteu: naarai koany ituŋa lukinomakinitai arwatat, aputosia nuka Ikaludean nukinomitai kejese loiraŋaŋai.
Koenitos arokoban aŋabesikec, kienienito akwesikec kigoen lukijesesinei, kes kere kotakanete kwape ikapolok, kwape ejaar aput naka Ibabulonin luka Kaludea, akwap nakobukec.
Napaanyunia kes kikila, kiyakik ikiyakia koKaludea.
Kopotu Ibabulonin mama ejai ŋesi kaperis naka amin, komunaasi ŋes kadoteukec, komunaar kakes, kopianik eketau kes.
Kwaŋin kopuko akedoteu, kopuko da akemujalal: kopianik ekatau ŋes, kwape apianikinia ekatau kinacike.
Konye kiyatak adoteuke, kiitu apaarasia nuka atumunike, nueporoo kakwap nako Misiri.
Kikila ipailonokec, kosubito awatekec bala awat nuka asigiria, kosubite aurikec bala aur naka ibalasin.
Kwaŋin iitunit adoteu naka atumunikon, nakieikakiniata Imisirian aiburun naka atibolokakon nuka atumunikon.
Ibabulonin, ka Ikaludean kere, Pekod ka Soa, ka Koa, ka Iyasurian kere nepepe kakes: ikatumunak luimielai, kes kere ikayaitok ka ijaka, ikapolok ka ituŋa luejenikina, kes kere ibwanenito ibalasin.

Epote kesi asurokin jo ekapitos lujiis, kagalin, ka nukakokoron, ka atukot naka ituŋa; iderakinos ejie kajo kojaas kiupalin ka ibukwi ka akopiran owaitin kere: adakakini kes atubokin akiro, kitubokinete kwape ejaatar itubesiakec.
Ederakini ekokoteka asurokin jo, kiticanete kadedeŋ. Kituborete ikumesikon, ka akiikon; irikakini ekileŋ akonitutubet naesali. Eyaŋaarete idwekon lusap ka lupesur; icweio akonitutubet naesali kakim.
Kilacarete inapenekon, eyaŋaarete lukaseganutukon luejok.
Kwaŋin etanaŋia akonidoteu, ka eporokon lokolo iyauni kakwap nako Misiri: tetere mam iteluori akonikonye mamakec, karaida akiitun bobo Misiri.
Naarai inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Koany, kakorakini jo akanin nuka ŋul kaluireit, akanin nuka ŋul kaluapianiki etaukon.
Kiswamakinete jo nukanar, kidemarete aitaaritoikon kere, kijalakinete imujalal atitai: epukorio amujalal naka adoteukon. Eporokon ka adoteukon kere
kiswamakinito kwaŋin naarai ibu kiporo mama ejaas ikapirin, ido naarai imunaar kaputosiakec.
Ibu kotupa erot loka inacikoo; ŋes kainakinia akolike akanikon.
Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe:
Imasi akoli naka inacikon, Naidul naepol;
Kikienare noi kimuario; Naarai igauni ŋesi nuipu.
Kilelebikin amera ka aiturur.
Akoli naka aitirira ka ajalakinio,
Ŋes akoli naka inacikon Samaria.
Iboiboi abelekekake,
Icili da ikonikisina:
Naarai ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Eoŋ ener.
Aso inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Naarai kimurwok eoŋ, kocaka eoŋ kaukon, aso do jo da kibwok eporokon ka adoteukon.”
Naarai adoteata, ejaas aokot akaninikec; adoteata aputosiakec; ido etotoroto ikecedwe lusap lukawurikinete akim ainakin ŋun ainyam.
Ido bobo keswamakis eoŋ nu: amunaasi akaibois nakalaunan apaaran ŋipeŋin, amunaasi da akasabaton.
Naarai kedautu aarakin ikecedwe mama ejaas aputosiakec, kosodete alomar aiboisika nakalaunan kapaaran kaŋin amunaar. Ido koany, kwape kwaŋin eswamaata kotogoka.
Ido bobo ijukakis anyaraun ituŋa luepote kama elwana: luejukakinio ekiyakia, ido koany, kopotu. Kiloŋ kanuka ŋul, kojuk akonyekon, kisir lukisiro.
Kiboikin aperis nanepuk, kitemonokinitete emesa kiŋarenike, loibwaikinit lukisupurununoka ka akakinyet.
Kojai eporoto loka ekodet loijamamai kaŋes: koyaunai ikamerak anyoun kamodiŋ nepepe kimukopin; kitanapai ŋun aikomon akaninikec, ka abokoi da nuejok akwesikec.
“Kasodi eoŋ einer nuka ŋin naemojonikinit adoteu ebe, Kwana edoteete kaŋes, ŋin da kakes.
Kolomasi mama ejai, kwape elomariata mama ejai naadote. Kwape kwaŋin kelomariata mama ejai Akola ka Akoliba, aŋor nukeporok.
Etubokinete ikadolitok ŋun akiro kwape etubokinere nudotea, ido kwape etubokinere aŋor nuebukorete aokot; naarai eraas nudotea, ejaas aokot akaninikec.”
Naarai ebala kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: “Etonyoikini kes ekodet, kainakin aiiliilio ka aŋatario.
Ibiribirei kes ekodet kamor, icutarete kikileŋakec; earete ikecedwe lusap ka lupesur, icweete ikecetogoi kakim.
Kwaŋin etanaŋia eporo kakwap, tetere isisianakinio aŋor kere kinyeis arokor eporokus.
Ido kitacakinio eporokus, ibwokete aronisio nuka aputosiakus: ijenunete do ebe arai eoŋ Ejakait EDEKE.”
Bobo da, kokaru lokikanyetekaoŋon, olap lokitomonet, kapaaran nakitomonet naka elap, kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai ebe:
“Okoku loka etuŋanan, kiwadik ekiror loka apaaran, apaaran napena. Ekunyu do ekabaka loko Babulon Yerusalem apaaran napena.
Kinerak ekek lokepali awarag, kolimok ebe, Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe:
Kidorok amot, kidorok,
Kobukok akipi:
Kotukonok inerioke,
Ŋoliiner loejok, amurwo ka akuat;
Kileleb akojo nueseunitai.
Koyaŋa lueseunitai kosipan,
Kotukok akojo kwapuke; Kitukul noi;
Eebo kipooto noi akojoke kotomake.
Naarai ejaas akeokot kidiŋike; ebwaiki atiida naelapat; mam ebukokinit alup, arapar kapua.
Tetere kitodoku adedeŋ ainyaŋia, ebwaik eoŋ akeokot atiida naelapat, kinyeis arapara.
Kanuka ŋun inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Itukwi ere lokaokot! Etopoloori da atukot nakakito.
Kicul akito, kinokok akim, kipo noi akiriŋ, kisidiki acece, kosisioto akojo.
Kosodi aibwaikin amot atotoleke komamei ibore kotoma, komwanuu, kidop aisinitike, kocalar amadokokoke, kodaun airourounike.
Ketapas aitaaritoi; kwabo mam elemar airourounike naepol; mam airourounike elemar kakim.
Airourounike ŋes eporokon lomodok. Naarai abu ketesega jo, komam jo isegar, mam bobo kitesegaario aitodol naesimonikinia akadedeŋ mamakon.
