Eoŋ EJAKAIT ener: edoli, eswamai da. Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Mam aboŋori kau, ido mam etimi, ido mam eitokini; kwape ejaatar ikonirotin, ido kwape ejaatar akoniswamisio, kitubokinete akiro.”
Ido da kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai ebe:
“Okoku loka etuŋanan, koany, ademari katipet kamakon naimielas akonikonye: konye mam ikuudiani karaida aimony, karaida akiyo alele kakonyekon.
Kidiny, konye eililiŋa; sirikikuudian nakatwan. Koen ekonigoe loka akou, konap akonimuk kakejekon; sirikirapak aituk, karaida ainyam atap naka ikebworok.”
Abu kener kituŋa tupuruc; kotwana akaberu eboŋ. Keswama atupuruc nace kwape kecorakinetere.
Kabala kes ebe, “Abu akirot naka EJAKAIT kobu mama ajai ebe:

‘Kolimok ekek loka Isirael ebe, Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Koany, amunaari akaibois nakalaunan, eitur loka apedorikus, naimielas akonyekus, eipud da loka aijarakus; ibiroros ikusidwe lusap ka lupesur kekileŋ, luipotu kojalakis.
Iswamaete yesi da kwape eswamaa eoŋ: mam irapakinete aitukekus, kwabo mam inyamete atap naka ikebworok.
Ejaunos igoenekus akwesikus, ka amukakus akejekus: mam ikuudianete karaida aimony; konye idokororiaros kanumam adolitekus, idinyanakinos ŋinituŋanan kaupake.
Kwaŋin eraun Esekiel aanyunet kamakus; kere nueswama ŋesi iswamaete yesi da. Naejauniata ŋun, kosodi do ijenunete ebe arai eoŋ Ejakait EDEKE.’
“Ka jo da, okoku loka etuŋanan, kapaaran naalemaria agogoŋukec, aiyalama naka aibusesukec, naimielas akonyekec, ka ŋin naebwaikinito ikecetauon, ka ikecedwe da lusap ka lupesur,
apaaran ya ebuni yenekui mamakon, kisiira jo kaki.
Kapaaran kaya iwooŋaari aitukukon mama ejai ŋin yenekui, ineri da, komam bobo ibaŋaana. Kwaŋin iraunor aanyunet mamakec: ejenunete do ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.”
“Okoku loka etuŋanan, kite idwe luka Amon, kodwarak kes.

Kolimok idwe luka Amon ebe, Kiirasi akirot naka Ejakait EDEKE; Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Naarai iner atiar, ‘Uus!’ aimwaŋ akaibois nakalaunan, nakemunaaror; aimwaŋ da akwap naka Isirael, nakitisilere; aimwaŋ da ekek loka Yuda, nakijoreorere;
aso do koany, kejaikini jo araun airumet naka idwe lukokide, idukurete kesi tomakon, edukokinete ikecetogoi tomakon; enyamete akoniraito, emasete da akonikile.
Etarauni Raba auj naka ikaalai, ka idwe da luka Amon aperis naka isipanin. Ijenunete do ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.
Naarai inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Naarai ibap akaninikon, kotac kakejekon, kolelak kepali kere lokotaukon akwap naka Isirael;
aso koany, ario akakan mamakon, kejaikini jo araun iŋatat yenika atekerin; keŋadaari jo kotoma otuŋa, ketooliori jo kakwapin: kamudiari. Ijenuni do ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.
aso koany, aŋaikini ewai loka Moab anyoun koreria, anyoun koreriake lukoikorunoke, aibuses naka akwap, Bet-yesimot, ka Baal-meon, ka Kiriataim.
Mama ejaas idwe lukokide, aitiji idwe luka Amon, ainakini kes araun airumet, tetere mam bobo iitunio idwe luka Amon katekerin.
Atubokini Moab. Ejenunete do ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.
Ŋes inerar kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe, ariori akakan mama ejai Edom, apiari ituŋa ka itiaŋ; etisili ageun koTeman; aitodol Deden ibiroros kekileŋ.
Ebwaikini Edom ekanyaŋit kakan naka ikatuŋa Isirael; iswamakinete Edom kwape ejaar akanyunyura ido kwape ejaar akadedeŋ. Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Ejenunete kesi ekanyaŋit.
aso do inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Koany, ariori akakan mama ejaas Ipilisitian, apiari Ikeretin, amudiari da aatoŋot naka ariri naka aŋolol.
Enyaŋi noi kamakec kairetakin naededeŋ. Ejenunete do ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT, naebwaikinia kes ekanyaŋit.”
Kosodi kanen kokaru lokitomonet kadiopet, kapaaran nasodit naka elap, kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai ebe:
“Okoku loka etuŋanan, naarai enerak Turo Yerusalem ebe, ‘Uus, abila ŋol lokerai erute loka ituŋa; ebelokin neajai: elelebun do, naarai kwana eswap ŋesi.’
Aso inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Koany, ijo Turo, kasurokini jo, ketonyoikini atekerin nuipu, kwape itonyounio aŋolol akekailan.
Emudiarete kesi arwatatin nuka Turo, ka atiyatiya itogoike lueojak; ekisari apuake, etuluori atiiba naelapat.
Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Eraun aibois naeterarere iboyan kokidiŋ aŋolol: naarai eoŋ ŋes ener: eraun ŋesi enatat loka atekerin.
Eario apesuruke nuejaas orony kekileŋ, Ejenunete do ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.
Eari apesurukon nuejaas orony kekileŋ: eduki arwatatin asurokinia, itutuei etut asurokinia, kikeikini eupal.
Ibwaikini akutake nutiyanakinet arwatatinikon, ido ejepejepei cut abwasinikon kaepeike.

Kirapari apua naka ibalasinike naarai ipu: ilokilokos arwatatinikon kanuka ecelet loka ikebwanenok, ka loka akokoron, ka loka agalin, naelomaria koruteikon, kwape elomariata ituŋa ore loebelitai arorwa.
Ipudapudai ikonirotin kere kimageger luka ibalasinike: eari ikonituŋa kekileŋ, ijesunos ipirin luka agogoŋukon kwap.
Ido enaŋete akonibar, emejaete lugwelanarakon: etiyatiyaete cut arwatatinikon, emudiarete itogoikon lukaisiyalamikina: ecakanakinete amorukon ka akitokon ka apuakon kidiŋ akipi.
Ido etanaŋi eoŋ eporoto loka ikososiokon; mam iirario bobo aruo naka adeudeunokon.
Ido ketuluori atiiba naelapat: iraun aibois naeterarere iboyan; mam kidukio bobo, Naarai ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Eoŋ EJAKAIT ener.
Kosodete ijesunos ikapolok kere luka aŋolol koicoloŋokec luka ajakanut, elemunete ikecegoen, elacunete ikecenapen luesonyitai: enapete amaran; iboikinos kwap, emaranete ŋinipak, kiumokinete jo.
Kikuudianete, kobalas ebe,
‘Imudiari ca, loeboienenoto ikekwaŋak aŋolol,
Ere loajena,
Lokegogoŋ kaŋolol,
Ŋol ka lukiboiete kotoma,
Lokititasurokinit ŋul kere lueboiete kotoma.
Kwana emaranete apujana Kapaaran naka aibirorikon,
Eebo, apujana nuejaas aŋolol Eburunete kanuka alositekon.’
“Naarai inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Naketuluoria jo ere lokitisilio, kwape ireria luemameete luiboiete kotoma; naketadakikinia akar, nakirapariata akipi nuipu;

ŋes konyet kesijesunia jo nepepe kaŋul luijesunos toma Aipany, mama ejaas ituŋa luŋo, kesiboikini atutubeta nukokwap nuka akwap, aiboisio nuesilok nuŋo; nepepe kaŋul luijesunos toma Aipany kinyek ajaut kituŋa; ido ebwaikini aibuses akwap naka ikajarak.
Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Ketuluori jo etasuro, mam bobo ijaun: karaida kiimoi, mam kianyunio bobo.”
Kobu bobo akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai ebe:
“Ijo da, okoku loka etuŋanan, kokuudian Turo;
kolimok Turo ebe, Wu jo loiboie kaneelomarere aŋolol, loirai ekagwelanaran loka atekerin mama ejaas apujana, inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe:
Ijo, wu Turo, iner ebe,
‘Adolit eoŋ kajokis.’
Ejaas iikorunokon otau loka aŋololin;
Itodolito ikadukokokon ajokisikon.
Koberosin lueyaunio koSenir:
Ayaut iresia koLebanon Aiswamakinia jo epir.
Eswamata atutubetakon nukokwap koteasurin
Lueyaunio kapujana nuka Kitim,
Kitwalitete kikela luka itomei.
Loesonyitai loeyaunio koMisiri,
Koraun aanyunetekon;
Ijesesinei lubulului ka lumugeik
Lueyaunio kapujana nuka Elisa
Kiswapito jo.
Keraas ikonikekwaŋak
Luiboiete koSidon ka Arubad;
Ijo Turo, kejaas lukacoakon kotomakon,
Keraas ikeŋarenokokon.
Keraas ikanwokakakon kotomakon;
Atakerin kere nuka aŋolol nepepe kikenareŋokokec
Kejaas tomakon aisiecanar igwelanarakon.
Kejaenenas ituŋa luka Arubad nepepe kajorekon kuju arwatatinikon airimor, kejaenenas Igamain toma abwasinikon: kikajanakinete ibukuikec arwatatinikon airimor; itodolito ajokisikon.
Yaban, ka Tubal, ka Mesek, keraas ikagwelanarakakon; kisiceanarete kesi awat nuka ituŋa ka iboro luka aisinin kanuka igwelanarakon.
Kisiceanarete lukokek loka Togaruma ibalasin ka ibalasin luka ejie ka inyubun kanuka iborokon.
Keraas ituŋa luko Dedan ikagwelanarakakon: keraas apujana nuipu agwelanaret naka akanikon: kiinununete ikela luka itomei ka eboni,
Kerai Edom ekagwelanaranikon kanuka aipues naka aswamisiokon: kisiceanarete imeralidin, ka lumugeik, ka aswam naesonyitai, ka ebaputa loejok, ka koral,
Yuda ka akwap naka Isirael keraas ikonikagwelanarak: kisiceanarete akima nuka Minit, ka Panag, ka esik ka akinyet, ka emim kanuka igwelanarakon.
Kerai Damasiko ekagwelanaranikon kanuk: aipues naka aswamisiokon, kanuka aipues naka abar nakiponesio luipu kebino loka Kelubon, ka ajul nuekwaŋak nuka amerekekin.
Kisiecanaret Bedan ka Yaban iusio kanuka iborokon: asua nuepwatat, ekasia, ka akalamu keraas igwelanarakon.
Kerai Dedan ekagwelanaranikon loka igoen luketiai lukibwanenis.
Arabia, ka ikapolok kere luko Kedar, keraas ŋul ikagwelanarak luka akanikon; imerekekin ludidik, ka imerekekin ka akinei keraas ikagwelanarakakon luka ŋul.
Ikagwelanarak luko Seba ka Raama keraas ikagwelanarakakon: kisiceanarete luitelekarito kere kalueuru maa, ka amor kere nuketiai, ka esabu, kanuka iborokon.
Karan, ka Kane, ka Eden, ikagwelanarak luko Seba, ka Asur ka Kilimad, keraas ikagwelanara kakon.
Keraas ŋul ikagwelanarak luka iboro lueseunitai, iloun lubululu ka luesonyitai, ka asadukun nuka inapen luibusak, nueenitai kaunoi nueswamaunio keres, kalugwelanarakon.
Keraas ameerin nuka Tarusi nukalotok nuka igwelanarakon.
Kitelelebi, kitubusikinitete noi
Kotoma otau loka aŋololin.
Kibili ekwam lokokide kotau loka aŋololin.
Ikekwaŋakakon, ka ikeŋarenokokon,
Ikanwokakakon, ikesiecanarak luka igwelanarakon,
Ka ituŋakon kere lukajiok, luejaas tomakon,
Nepepe katukotokon kere naejai kidiŋikon,
Ibirokinos otau loka aŋololin
Apaaran naka aibirorikon.
Emaranete ironyia
Kanuka eporoto loka aimony naka ikeŋarenokokon.
Kere luitiŋito akiŋolia.
Ikekwaŋak, ka ikeŋarenok kere luka aŋolol,
Ebwoete do kaneonit.
Edelorete,
Iwelanakinos apua akwesikec,
Ibelibelos kokurwon.
Ebarenos kanukon, enapete ipukoi,
Ido emonyete akiyo kanukon kokadakinito itauonokec
Kaibworo naedwar.
Kotoma aimonyokec ekuudianete kanukon,
Kikuudianikinete ebe,
‘Iŋai ma eputosi bala Turo,
Bala ŋol loisililinio kokidiŋ aŋolol?
Nakelomuniata iborokon kotoma aŋolol,
Kisimonik ituŋa luipu;
Kanuka aipues naka abarakon ka igwelanarakon
Kitabar ikabakan luka akwapin.
Kwana kibilata aŋololin
Kataro naka akipi,
Kolumosi igwelanarakon ka atukotokon kere
Nepepe kajo.
Akuriakata noi ikabakanakec,
Anyorididoto ireetakec.
Iraun etasuro,
Mam bobo ijaun.’ ”
Kobu bobo akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai ebe:
“Okoku loka etuŋanan, kolimok ekapolon loka Turo ebe, Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe:
Naarai ekeun ekonitau,
Ibu da kiner ebe, ‘Arai eoŋ edeke,
Eboiei koicoloŋ loka Edeke,
Kokidiŋ kaŋololin’;
Kwabo irai etuŋanan, mere Edeke,
Karaida itupusit ijo ekonitau bala etau loka Edeke:
Mam kimunonikinitai jo nukaiyeiyea kere.
Kanuka acoakon ka ajenunikon idum abar,
Idum da esabu ka epuesa
Kotoma aiŋadisiakon:
Iyatanak abarakon,
Ekeun da ekonitau kanuka abarakon.
Naarai itupusit ijo ekonitau Bala etau loka Edeke;
Eutunete ikecekileŋa
Asurokin ajokis naka acoakon,
Emunaarete amwekimwekekon.
Kijesarete jo kiton Aipany;
Itwani atwanare naka ŋul kaluearitai,
Kotau loka aŋololin.
Iriŋa kereka ijo inera ebe, ‘Arai eoŋ Edeke,’
Kakonyen nuka yenikiari?
Kwabo irai etuŋanan, mere Edeke,
Kakan naka yenikimusuŋi.
Naarai ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe,
Eoŋ ŋes ener.”
Bobo da kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai ebe:
“Okoku loka etuŋanan, kokuudianik ekabaka loka Turo, kolimok ŋes ebe, Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe:
“Ibu ijo korai aanyunet naka etiai,
Ileleba acoa, idoliorit kajokis.
Kerai ŋinimoru naketiai arapetekon,
Asadia, atopasit, ka daimod.
Aberulo, naemelomelot, ka ayaseper,
Asapiro, emeralid, ka karubunikol;
Iminanakinitai kesabu loegerer.
Kitemonokinitoi kapaaran nakisubunere.
Ibu kojai oroŋat lokalaunan loka Edeke;
Kirimi kokidiŋ amor nuka akim.
Ibu kodolit korotinikon
Ageun kapaaran nakisubunere,
Aitodol neatakanuniata numam adolit kamakon.
Kanuka aipues naka agwelanarikon,
Kilelebi akaje, idiaka;
Ŋes kacakaria jo kwape yenemunaara
Anyoun koroŋat loka Edeke;
Kireŋea jo ekerubi loidari
Kokidiŋ kamor nuka akim.
Kimuna acoakon kanuka amwekimwekekon:
Kacaka jo kiton akwap,
Keperik akonyen nuka ikabakan,
Tetere kisesenete.
Kanuka numam adolit nuka agwelanarikon,
Imunaa aiboisiokon nukalaunak:
Kanuka ŋun etolom akim kokidiŋikon,
Kitisisi jo, ketuluo ekurwon kakwap,
Kakonyen nuka ŋul kere lukisesenete.
Kiumokinete ŋul kere
Lukijenete jo kotoma otuŋa:
Iraun etasuro, mam bobo ijaun.”
“Okoku loka etuŋanan, kite Sidon, kodwarak ŋes,
kiner ebe, Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe:
“Koany, arai eoŋ lokasurupikon, ijo Sidon;
Ketopoloor kokidiŋikon,
Ejenunete do ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.
Kadau aitodolikin itubesia kamake,
Ketalaun kamake.
Ka aokot korotinike;
Ibirokinos luimusuŋitai kidiŋike,
Kanuka ekileŋ loirimori ŋes kowaitin kere,
Ejenunete do ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.

Iboikinos nen inapakina; eebo, edukete itocoi, iraete imanikoria luka emusabibu. Iboiete inapakina, kadau aitodolikin itubesia kama kaŋul kere luiswamaete nukepali kowaitin kere. Ejenunete do ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT Ekecedeke.”
Kokaru lokitomonet, kolap lokitomonet, kapaaran nakitomonet kaarei naka elap, kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai ebe:
“Okoku loka etuŋanan, kite Parao ekabaka loko Misiri, kodwarak ŋes, ka Misiri da kere.
Kiner, kobala ebe, Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe:
Koany, kasurokini jo,
Parao ekabaka loko Misiri,
Apiu naepol naeperi kokidiŋ ocorinike,
Naabu kiner ebe, ‘Ekacor ekaŋ,
Eoŋ elopet asubuni.’
Eminaikini agaria nukocorikon aabelekon;
Kebwosuni jo kokidiŋ ocorinikon,
Ijo ka agaria kere nukocorinikon
Nuiminaikina aabelekon.
Ijo ka agaria da kere nukocorinikon:
Ibirokin kiŋa ais;
Mam kitukonokinio, kwabo mam kimudio,
Kainaki jo araun inyamat
Luka itiaŋ luka akwap, ka akweny da nuka apak.
Kiitiŋi kakan, kobila, kocil ikeperinikec kere: kegoŋakinos jo, kobila, kisimaran aŋabesikec.
Kanuka ŋun inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Koany, kainuni ekileŋ, amudiari ituŋa ka itiaŋ.
Eraun akwap nako Misiri naesil naiswapit. Ejenunete do ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.
“Naarai abala ebe, ‘Ecor ekaŋ, eoŋ asubuni.’
Aso koany, arai eoŋ lokasurupikon ka ikonicorin da, etarauni akwap nako Misiri naiswapit cuc naesil, ageun kotogo loeoja loka Sebene kiton oikor loka Etiopi.
Mam itorete akeje nuka ituŋanan, ido mam itorete akeje nuka itiaŋ, mam da ituŋa iboikinos toma adaun ikar akaisaoŋon.

Etarauni akwap nako Misiri naesil kokidiŋ akwapin nuesilok, ka ireriake da kokidiŋ oreria luiswapito eraunete luesilok adaun ikar akaisaoŋon. Esiarisiari Imisirian toma atekerin, eweliweli kes anatar akwapin.
Enyakuni aijoreorio nako Misiri, etoboŋuni kes kiton akwap nako Pataros, kiton akwap naewurikinitai; ejaunete ŋina ajakanut nakokwap.
Eraun nakokwap aitelekarit ajakanuto kere; ido mam bobo itopoloor aitelekarit atekerin: eŋoŋori kes, komam bobo eyaito atekerin.
Mam bobo eraun amun naka ekek loka Isirael kisiitununei numam adolitekec, naibelokinotor asesen kes. Ejenunete do ebe arai eoŋ Ejakait EDEKE.”
Kosodi kanen kokaru loka akaisaarei ka lukanykaarei kolap losodit, kapaaran nasodit naka elap, kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai ebe:

“Okoku loka etuŋanan, abu Nebukadaresar ekabaka loko Babulon koinak ajoreke aitaaritoi naepol asurokinia Turo: adum ŋinikou epata, abulucar ŋolikeper: kwabo mam eropio ŋes karaida ajoreke koTuro, kanuka aitaaritoike naetaaritoi asurokin.
Kanuka ŋun inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Koany, ainakini Nebukadaresar ekabaka loko Babulon akwap nako Misiri; eyaŋaari ŋesi ekodeteke, eŋasi, emejai da; eraun eropit loka ajoreke.
Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Ainak ŋes akwap nako Misiri atacia aitaaritoike, naarai keswamakis eoŋ.
Kobu bobo akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai ebe:
“Okoku loka etuŋanan, kodwar, kiner ebe, Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe:
Kibwololoto ebe, ‘Itukwi apaaran!’
Aapu ca apaaran naka EJAKAIT;
Apaaran naka idouon,
Eraun apak naka ikapirin.
Ejaunete ican luipu ko Etiopia,
Naibirokinotor luearitai koMisiri;
Eyaŋaarete ekodeteke,
Etiyakinio akepeteta,
“Inera EJAKAIT kwanata ebe:
Ibiroros ŋul da luigaŋito Misiri,
Ijesuni eitur loka akepedor:
Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe,
Ageun kotogo loeoja loka Sebene
Ibiroros ekileŋ.
Ejaunos ireriake kokidiŋ kireria luiswapito.
Ejenunete do ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT,
Naadaunia ainokokin akim Misiri,
Emudiaros ikegaŋitokoke kere.
Etanaŋi da ekodet loko Misiri
Kakan naka Nebukadaresar ekabaka loko Babulon.
Lusogim luka atekerin, amudiar akwap;
Eutunete ikecekileŋa aitiji Misiri,
Kilelebata akwap lueario.
Agwelari akwap akan naka ituŋa lueroko;
Etisili akwap, ka iboro kere luejaas roma;
Kakan naka imo:
Eoŋ EJAKAIT ener.
Ido amudiari aputosia,
Etanaŋi da lukamameak kotoma Nop;
Mam ejaun bobo ekapolon kotoma akwap nako Misiri;
Ebwaikini etasuro akwap nako Misiri.
Etodolikini da itubesia toma No.
Abukokini Sin akadedeŋ,
Abwas naegogoŋ nako Misiri;
Ido apiari ekodet loka No.
Enokokini da akim Misiri;
Eanyuni Sin ican luipu,
Etiyatiyaun No:
Ejaunete lukasurup Nop paaran.
Ibiroros ikatumunak luka Aben ka luka Pi-beset kekileŋ:
Ijoreorio ireria ŋul.
Naabilia iloin luko Misiri,
Edauni da eitur loka akepedor:
Eraparete idouon ŋes, Ijoreorio akepesur.
Kwaŋin etodolikinia itubesia Misiri.
Ejenunete do ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.”
Kosodi kanen kokaru lokitomonet kadiopet, kolap losodit, kapaaran nakikanyetekaarei naka elap, kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai ebe:
“Okoku loka etuŋanan, abil eoŋ akan naka Parao ekabaka loko Misiri; ido koany, mam eenitai aisutakin ekia, karaida aider, tetere ejaun agogoŋ aitiŋ ekileŋ.
Aso do inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Koany, arai eoŋ lokasurup loka Parao ekabaka loko Misiri, ido abili akekanin kere, ŋin naegogoŋ, ka ŋin da naebilil; etodoi ekileŋ kotoma akanike.
Ido esiarisiari Imisirian toma atekerin, eweliweli da anatar akwapin.
Etogogoŋi akanin nuka ekabaka loko Babulon, ebwaikini ekakileŋ toma akanike: konye abili akanin nuka Parao, idinya ŋesi kakonyeneke kwape etuŋanan loimusuŋitai noi.

Ido egaŋi akanin nuka ekabaka loko Babulon, ibiroros do akanin nuka Parao; ejenunete do ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT, Naebwaikinia ekakileŋ toma akan naka ekabaka loko Babulon, edakakini ŋesi asurokin akwap nako Misiri.
Esiarisiari Imisirian toma atekerin, eweliweli da anatar akwapin. Ejenunete do ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.”
Kosodi kanen kokaru lokitomonet kadiopet, kolap lokiwuniet, kapaaran nasodit naka elap, kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai ebe:
“Okoku loka etuŋanan, kolimok Parao ekabaka loko Misiri, ka ekekodet ebe:
Iputosi kaŋai kapoloukon?
Loejai etolim loerapari, loeoja:
Kojai aidike odouon.
Kitanete akipi ŋes,
Kitopol aidules naka icorinike,
Lueleleete airimor emanikorike;
Abu kitodol alelesiake
Okito kere luka ais.
Aitelekarit ikito kere luka ais;
Kopeta atoromake,
Koojakaros atenueikike,
Kanuka akipi nuipu kotoma akidikidinike.
Akaisikec atenueikike,
Kouriata itiaŋ kere luka ais idwekec
Kwap katoromake,
Kiboioto atekerin kere nukapolok
Kotolimike.
Kwaŋin korai loejok kapolouke,
Kaojau naka atenueikike;
Naarai kejaas akeliasio neejaas akipi nuipu.
Mam apedorete aibwa ŋes:
Mam iberosin ariakas katoromake,
Mam iaremok eputosi atenueikike;
Kwabo amamei ekitoi kere komanikor loka Edeke
Loaputotor ŋes kajokis.
Kwaŋin kitokokoloto ŋes ikito kere luka Eden,
Luajaas omanikor loka Edeke.
ejaikini ŋes akan naka lokapedor loka atekerin; abeit iswamakini ŋes kwape ejaatar nukaronokoke, Ereŋea ŋes.

Ajepata ŋes imo, lusogim luka atekerin, enyekis. Ibiroros atenueikike koroŋan kaditono da kere, abilas atoromake kotoma alelesia kere nuka akwap; anyoutu atekerin kere nuka akwapin kotolimike, enyekis ŋes.
Iboikinos akweny kere nuka apak akuanake naibiroro, ejaunos itiaŋ kere luka ais atenueikike:

tetere mam itopoloori imodiokitoi kere yeneapias kakipi kaojauke, karaida aitodol aidike odouon, karaida lukapedorike aibwo kaicelelekec, kere luemasete akipi: naarai ijaikinio kere atwakare, kiton atutubeta nukokwap nuka akwap, kokidiŋ odwe luka ituŋa, nepepe kaŋul kaluijesaros Aipany.
“Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Kapaaran naejesaror Okatwak, esibwori aidules, aeni icorinike, itikokinio akipi nuipu: esirioni Lebanon kanuke, iilooros ikito kere luka ais kanuke.

Abu kesimaran atekerin kanuka airurum naka aibirorike, naacakaria Okatwak nepepe kaŋul kaluijesaros Aipany: alakaros ikito kere luka Eden, luejok lueseunitai luka Lebanon, kere luemasete akipi, kotoma atutubeta nukokwap nuka akwap.
Apotu kesi da kijesaros Okatwak nepepe kaŋes mama ejaas ŋul lukearitai kekileŋ; eebo, ŋul lukeraas akanike, lukiboienenete kotolimike kokidiŋ katekerin.

Iŋai ca ma iputotor kotoma aibuses ka apolou kokito luka Eden? Kwabo kijesario nepepe kikito luka Eden kiton atutubeta nukokwap nuka akwap; iperi kokidiŋ kalumam ekepitai nepepe kaŋul kalukeario kekileŋ.
“Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, ŋol ŋes Parao ka ekekodet kere.”
Kosodi kanen kokaru lokitomonet kaarei, kolap lokitomonet kaarei, kapaaran nasodit naka elap, kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai ebe:
“Okoku loka etuŋanan, kokuudianik Parao ekabaka loko Misiri, kolimok ŋes ebe:
Kitupusitoi kiŋatuny yenika atekerin:
Kwabo iputos kapiu naejai aŋololin;
Ido ibeluni kocorinikon,
Iticani akipi kakejekon,
Komunaa icorinikec.
Kapesikini jo ekaboi
Katukot naka ituŋa luipu;
Kibwosunete kekaboi.
Kacakar kiŋa ais,
Ketodoikini jo akweny kere nuka apak,
Kesimonikinia da itiaŋ luka alwap kere.
Elelebi aditon kamukururukon.
Ido ecocoi akwap kaokotokon nuiduio
Kiton oroŋan;
Ilelebi alelesia kere.
Etumutonori aacer;
Arapakini edou akoloŋ,
Kwabo mam elap ecauni.
Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe,
Etumutonori italai kere
Luecaete lukokujukon,
Etumutonori akonikwap.
“Esiyalononoi itauon luka ituŋa luipu, naetodolio amudiariokon toma atekerin, akwapin numam lem ijeni.
Eebo, esitirirai ituŋa luipu kanukon, ekuriakaros noi ikabakanakec kanukon, naeiliilia ekakileŋ kakonyenekec; emaranete ŋinipak, ŋolituŋanan kanuka akeijar, kapaaran naka aibirorikon.
Naarai inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Kidolokini jo ekileŋ loka ekabaka loko Babulon.
Ebirori ekonikodet kikileŋa luka lukapedor; eraas kere lusogim luka atekerin. Eŋasete eitur loko Misiri, emudiario ekodeteke kere.
Lueapias akipi nuipu;
Ido mam bobo iticanete akeje nuka ituŋanan,
Karaida imageger luka itiaŋ aitican kes.
Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe,
Kasodi aisiiriir akecekipi,
Ka aitelel icorinikec kwape kakinyet.
Ka aitiswap akwap naetwaniarit ailelebake,
Naadanyia kere luiboiete kotoma,
Kosodete do ejenunete ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.
Kosodi kanen kokaru lokitomonet kaarei, kapaaran nakitomonet kakany naka elap, kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai ebe:
“Okoku loka etuŋanan, komonyak ekodet loko Misiri, kibironok kwap, ŋes nepepe ka apesur nuka atekerin nuajenas, kiton atutubeta nukokwap nuka akwap, nepepe kaŋul kaluijesaros Aipany:
Kijesar, kiperikin nepepe kalumam ekepitai.’
Ibirokinos kidiŋikec luearitai kekileŋ: ejaikin okileŋ: kiriasi ŋes ka ekekodet kere.
Ineras kaŋes lukagogoŋ lukotoma lukapedor kokidiŋ Okatwak nepepe kaŋul kalukeganitok ebe: ‘Ejesaros, aperoto aŋatata, lumam ekepitai, luearitai kekileŋ.’
“Ejai nen Asur ka aketukot kere; irimorito akeilin: kes kere earitai, ebirokin ekileŋ.
Ejaas akeceilin toma atutubeta nukokwap nuka Aipany, irimorit aketukot akeilit: kes kere earitai, ebirokin ekileŋ, luayaunete etasuro akwap naka ikajarak.

Apesikis ŋes aperis kokidiŋ kaluearitai nepepe kekekodet kere; irimorito ŋes akeilin: kes kere lumam ekepitai, lueari ekileŋ; naarai eyaunio etasurokec akwap naka ikajarak, ibwokito ikeceleic nepepe kaŋul kaluijesaros Aipany; ibwaikinitai kidiŋikec kaluearitai.

Ido mam eperete nepepe kalukapedor luebiroros lumam ekepitai luejesaros Okatwak ekapito lujiisikec, ibwaikinito ikileŋakec aicoloŋ kakwesikec, ejaas numam adolitekec akojokec; naarai kejai etasuro loka lukapedor kakwap naka ikajarak.
Konye kibilakinio kidiŋ kalumam ekepitai, iperi nepepe kaŋul kalueari ekileŋ.
Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Naarai ebwaik eketasuro akwap naka ikajatak: iperikinio Parao ka ekekodet kere kidiŋ kalumam ekepitai, nepepe kaŋul kalueari ekileŋ.”
Kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai ebe:
“Okoku loka etuŋanan, kiner kidwe luka ikonituŋa, kolimok kes ebe, Naayaunia ekileŋ akwap, arai kelemut ituŋa luka akwap kaŋin ituŋanan idiopet kotomakec, kodakakis ŋes araun ekedaranikec:
arai kekutaki arupepe naeanyunia ekileŋ ebunokini akwap, ka aikwenyar ituŋa;
kosodi ŋin yeniirari eporoto loka arupepe, komam ecamuni aikwenyario, arai kebu ekileŋ alemar ŋes, ejaunete aokotoke akouke kilopet.
Abu kiira eporoto loka arupepe, komam ecamunit aikwenyario; ejaunete aokotoke kamakeŋ. Konye arai kecamunit aikwenyario tikituku akeijar.
Konye arai keanyu ekedaran ekileŋ ebuni, komam ekutakini arupepe, komam ituŋa ikwenyario, kobu do ekileŋ, kolema ituŋanan kamakec; elemario kanumam adoliteke, konye etepeseni akeokot kama kekedaran.
Arai kalimok ikaronon ebe, Ijo ikaronon, abeit itwani, komam jo inera aikwenyar ikaronon ii korotoke; etwanikini ikaronon ii numam adoliteke, konye etepeseni akeokot kamakon.
Konye arai kikwenya ijo ikaronon aibelokin korotoke, komam ŋes ibelokini korotoke; etwanikini numam adoliteke, konye iyuuni ijo akoniijar.

Kolimok kes ebe, Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Kwape ajaria, Mam esiyalamikinit atwanare naka ikaronon; konye kibelokin ikaronon korotoke kojar: kibelokinos, kibelokinos kotoma orotinikus lueroko; kanukinyo itwakiata, ijo ekek loka Isirael?

Ijo da, okoku loka etuŋanan, kolimok idwe luka ikonituŋa ebe, Adolit naka ikadoliton mam eyuuni ŋes kapaaran naka adiakarike; ido da aronis naka ikaronon mam isibirori kapaaran naibelokinor anyoun karonisike: kwabo mam epedori ikadoliton aijar kanuka adoliteke kapaaran naediakaria.
Arai kalimok ikadoliton ebe abeit ejari; arai kemunokin akedolit, kiswama numam adolit, mam iitunio adio kaswamisioke nuadolito; konye etwanikini numam adoliteke nueswamat.
Ido bobo, arai kalimok ikaronon ebe, ‘Abeit itwani’; arai kibelokin ainyein akeronis, ka aswam da nuibusakinito ka nuedolito;
Arai kinyakaki aititiŋet, kotac lukekokwarit, kolosenene kokisila luka aijar, komam iswamai numam adolit; abeit ejari, mam etwani.
Mam iitunio adio karonisioke nueswamat: eswamat nuibusakinito nuedolito; abeit ejari.
“Konye ebalas idwe luka ikonituŋa ebe, ‘Mam eriana erot loka EJAKAIT’: kwabo ikecerotin kes mam erianas.
Naibelokinor ikadoliton ainyein akedolit, kiswama numam adolit, etwanikini ŋun.
Naibelokinor ikaronon ainyein akeronis, kiswama nuibusakinito nuedolito, ejarakini ŋun.
Konye ibalas yesi ebe, ‘Mam eriana erot loka EJAKAIT.’ Wu jo ekek loka Isirael, katubokini yes, ŋinituŋanan kwape ejaatar ikerotin.”
Kabunok akan naka EJAKAIT eboŋ, eroko lokekui ebuno; kesiwooŋa akaituk, kiton nekadolokinio ŋol tupuruc; kooŋar akaituk kwabo mam bobo abaŋaana.
Kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai ebe:
“Okoku loka etuŋanan, luejaas aiboisio nu nuiswapito nuka akwap naka Isirael inerenenasi ebe, ‘Arai Aburaam ediopet, kirum akwap; konye oni kirai luipu; kiinakinitai akwap araut alrumet.’
Aso kolimok kes ebe, Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Inyamete luejaas aokot, iteluorete akusikonye mama ejaas aputosiakus, ibukorete da aokot; irumete tope yesi akwap?
Icatunito kokileŋakus, iswamaete nuketal, komunaaros ŋolituŋanan kaberu naka eidunyeteke: irumete tope yesi akwap?

Ilimokini kes kwanata ebe, Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Kwape ajaria, abeit etwakete ŋul kere luejaas aiboisio nuiswapito kekileŋ, ka ŋin da yenejai kiŋa ais akorakini ŋes konyama itiaŋ; ka ŋul da luejaas abwasin nuegogoŋ ka abuai da etwakete atular.
Etarauni akwap asilio ka aumokinet, enaŋi eitur loka akepedor; esilioros iroŋan luka Isirael, komam ituŋanan yenitori nen.
Kosodete do ejenunete ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT, naetuluoria akwap asilio ka aumokinet, kanuka italesiakec kere lueswamata.
Epote neijai kwape eponiata ituŋa, iboikinos kakonyenekon kwape ikatuŋa, epupunete akakiro, konye mam iswamaete: naarai itodikinete amin naepol kaŋajepakec, konye ekecetau etupari aimakirakec.
Ido koany, irai kamakec ekosio loejok noi loka ekayoot loitalakarit noi, loejeni airam jokan; naarai epupunete akonikiro, konye mam iswamaete.
Naitodolikinere ŋun, (koany itodolikinio), kosodete do ejenunete ebe ajai enabi kidiŋikec.”
Kosodi kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai, kobala ebe:

“Okoku loka etuŋanan, kodwarak ikecokok luka Isirael, kodwarak, kolimok kes, ikecokok ŋul, ebe, Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Itukwi ikecokok luka Isirael luitanyamas bonik! Mam ti ikecokok itadakete amerekekin?
Inyamete lukasiepai, konapete ajul, koarete luetarioko: kwabo mam itadakete amerekekin.
Yeniroga mam iticasete, kwabo mam itaŋaleunete yenedek, kwabo mam iderete yenebilil, kwabo mam inyakununete yenereŋearitai, kwabo mam imoenenete yeneoliorit; konye iyaitos kes kagogoŋ ka adedeŋ.
Kisiarakinos kesi kanuemamear ekecokon: koraut inyamat luka itiaŋ kere luka ais, kisiarakinos.
Kirimoto akamerekekin komor kere, ka ŋoliukot loeoj; eebo, kisiarakinos akamerekekin akwap kere; kwabo amamei yenabu kiŋisiŋisitoi karaida amoun.
“Aso, yes ikecokok, kiirasi akirot naka EJAKAIT:

Inera Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Kwape ajaria, abeit naarai apotu akamerekekin koluoros amejan, koraut da akamerekekin inyamat luka itiaŋ kere luka ais, kanuamamear ekecokon; kwabo mam ikakecokok apotu komoata akamerekekin, konye kitanyamas ikecokok bonik, komam itadakete akamerekekin;
aso, yes ikecokok, kiirasi akirot naka EJAKAIT:

Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Koany, etusurupi eoŋ ikecokok; eburai da akamerekekin kakanikec, kesinyeik kes aitadak amerekekin; kwabo mam bobo ikecokok itanyamas, Ayuuni akamerekekin kaitukukec, kinyeis araun inyamat kamakec.
“Naarai inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Koany, eoŋ elopet, eoŋ ba, eŋisiŋisitoi akamerekekin, amouni kes.
Kwape emootor ekecokon ekesipan kapaaran naejaatar amerekekinike ace nuesiarakina neelwana, kwaŋin amoia akamerekekin, ayuuni kes kaiboisio kere kama kisiarakina kapaaran naka idouon ka naka amuton.
Alemuni kes kotuŋa, atukonokini kakwapin, ayauni kes akwapukec; etadaki kes oroŋan luka Isirael, kariri naka alelesia, ka aiboisio kere nuiboiere kakwap.
Etadaki kes amel, koroŋan luiceleleete luka Isirael eraun anukukec: nepenen eperete anuk naejok, kotosata amel koroŋan luka Isirael.
Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Eoŋ elopet etadaki akamerekekin, kesiperik.
Amouni ŋin yenikeoliorit, enyakuni yenirenearitai, ederi yenebilil, eticasi yenedek: amudiari yenetumit ka yenikagogoŋ; etadaki da kaitub akiro.
Erai teni kamakus akirot naedit adak amel naatosok, konye kibusakinit tope aipupus kakusikeje amelokus nakesalit? Ido komata akipi nueliiliete, konye kibusakinit tope amunaar nukesalito kakusikeje?
Edakasi kereka akamerekekin ŋin naipupusato kakusikeje, emasete da ŋun nuimunaasi kakusikeje?
“Kanuka ŋun elimokini Ejakait EDEKE kes kwanata ebe: Koany, eoŋ, eoŋ obe, atubokini ibaren luetumito ka ibaren luesenyito.
Naarai iremorete kisiepion ka ikeperin da, iremorete luedekasi kere kamumwarakus, aitodol neisiarakiniata neelwana.
Aso etajari ekasipan, mam eraunos bobo imejan; atubokini ibaren ka ibaren.
Adakakini ekecokon ediopet, itadaki ŋesi kes, ŋes ekabulesit Daudi; itadaki kes, eraun ekecokonikec.
Eoŋ EJAKAIT araun Edekekec, ekabulesit Daudi da ekapolon kokidiŋikec; Eoŋ EJAKAIT ener.
Etuluori kes ka aiboisio da nuirimorito ekaroŋat arereŋ; ainakini elimilim kapakike; eraun da elimilim lokarereŋ.

Eraete ikito luka ais araitokec, einakini akwap amioke, ejaikinos akwapukec inapakina; ejenunete do ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT, naadaunia aibil akito nuka ajookotokec, ka ayuun da kakanin nuka luetubusianito kes.
Mam bobo eraunete imejan mama ejaas ikapirin, karaida Itiaŋ luka akwap ainyam kes; konye iboiete inapakina, komam yenitukuriani kes.
Etonyoikini kes emanikor loejena, mam bobo epiari ebeli kakwap, karaida aibwok bobo ileic luka ikapirin.
Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Ejenunete do ebe Eoŋ EJAKAIT Ekecedeke ajai nepepe kakes, kes da ekek loka Isirael eraas ikatuŋa.
Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Yes da akamerekekin, amerekekin nukoronyika, iraas ituŋa, eoŋ da arai Ekusideke.”
“Okoku loka etuŋanan, kite emoru Seir, kodwarak ŋes.
Kolimok ebe, Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Koany, arai lokasurupikon, wu emoru Seir, ariori akakan asurokin jo, ketuluori asilio ka aumokinet.
Etiswapi ireriakon, irauni ijo asilio: ijenuni ebe arai Eoŋ EJAKAIT.
Naarai iraenena lokasurup, ikorak idwe luka Isirael mama ejai apedor naka ekileŋ kapak naka epolakec, kapak naka aiticaniokec naka awasia;
aso ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Kwape ajaria, ŋes ketemokinia aokot, ido kitupete aokot; naarai mam ibu kolaite aokot, ŋes do kitupiata aokot.
Etuluori emoru Seir aumokinet ka asilio; etamamauni kanen yenitori ka yeneboŋuni.
Elelebi ikeroŋan iketuŋa lukeario; toma oroŋanakon ka aditonokon ka alelesiakon kere ibirokinos lueari ekileŋ.
Etuluori asilio namam edaun, mam bobo ejaunete ituŋa oreriakon; ijenunete do ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.
aso ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Kwape ajaria, eswamai kwape ejaar akoninyunyura, ido kwape ejaar ekonikokote loitodiarit kanuka areit kes; etejenikini eoŋ kes, nakatubokinia jo.’
Ijenuni do ebe eoŋ EJAKAIT eira akoniinyanakin kere nainerakinit iroŋan luka Isirael, kobala ebe, ‘Etisiloor, kiinakin sio ajwenyar.’
Itopolooros kama ajai eoŋ kaŋajepakus, ka akirokus nuiyatanakis mamakaŋ; eira eoŋ ŋun.
Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Naeyalamikinor akwap kere, ketisili jo.
Kwape kiyalamikinor airumet naka ekek loka Isirael, naarai asilior, keswamakini jo kwaŋin: isilior jo, emoru Seir, ka Edom kere, kere ba. Ejenunete do ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.
“Ijo da, okoku loka etuŋanan, kodwarak iroŋan luka Isirael, kiner ebe, Yes iroŋan luka Isirael, kiirasi akirot naka EJAKAIT.
Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Naarai kinerak yes lokasurup ebe, ‘Uus!’ ido, ‘Aiboisio nuiceleleete nukolo sek araut bo do nukosi’:

aso kodwar, kiner ebe, Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Naarai, eebo, naarai kitisiliosi, kojwenyasi kowaitin kere, tetere kirumete nukesalete nuka atekerin, kilimitoi kaŋajepa nuka ikeyalak, ka abekoi naerono naka ituŋa:

kanuka ŋun, yes iroŋan luka Isirael, kiirasi akirot naka Ejakait EDEKE. Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE elimokini iroŋan ka iukon, ka alelesia, ka aditono, ka aiboisio nuiswapito nuesilok, ka ireria luinyeinitai, luaraas imejan ka amorosito mama ejaas nukesalete nuka atekerin nuirimorito.

Ŋes inerar kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Abeit ener kotoma akim naka ekokoteka asurokin nukesalete nuka atekerin, ka Edom kere, luaseikinos ikulepek akakwap araun airumet naka aiyalama naka itauonokec kere, kanuka epali loka etau, tetere irumete araut amejat.

Kanuka ŋun kodwar nuka akwap naka Isirael, kolimok iroŋan ka iukon, ka alelesia ka aditono ebe, Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Koany, ener kokokoteka, kadedenuka, narai ibwokata ileic luka ikapirin:
aso inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Ekeu akakan, ebe, Abeit ikapirin lukirimorito, ibwokete kesi ikulepek ikeceleic.
“Konye yes, iroŋan luka Isirael, ipesiarete atenueikikus, koraikis ikatuŋa Isirael araitokus; naarai eapie kes aboŋun.
Naarai koany, ajai eoŋ owaikus, ebelokin eoŋ mamakus, kikorio kiyeio.
Etupui ituŋa kamakus, ekek kere loka Isirael, kere ba: ejaunete ituŋa oreria, iteteununio aiboisio nuiswapito.
Etupui ituŋa ka itiaŋ da kamakus: iyatanakinos, iwuriaros: ketudumikini yes ituŋa kwape lem ijaatar, ka aiswamakin yes ejok aitelekarit ageunetekus. Ijenunete do ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.
Eebo, ainakin ituŋa aitorit nekus, kes ikatuŋa Isirael; kirumete, iraun airumetekec, mam bobo itwataniari kes ikecedwe.
Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Naarai kilimonokinete ebe, ‘Inyami ijo ituŋa, itwataniari atekerikon idwe’:
ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Aso mam bobo iyatakini ainyam ituŋa, karaida aitwataniar akoniteker idwe.
Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Mam bobo kesibwoki ileic luka ikapirin, ido mam bobo ibwoki amorosit naka ituŋa, ido mam bobo itiguikini akoniteker.”
Bobo da kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai ebe:
“Okoku loka etuŋanan, nakiboio ekek loka Isirael kakwapukec, apotu komunaaros korotinikec ka aswamisiokec da: korau ekecerot kakonyeneka bala namam elai naka aberu naibami.
Aso kabukoki kes akadedeŋ kanuka aokot nuapotu kobukokis akwap, kanu da amunaarotor kaputosiakec:
kesiarisiar kes atekerin, kiweliwelai anatar akwapin: katubok kes kwape ejaar ekecerot, ido kwape ejaatar akeceswamisio.
Nakedolioto kesi atekerin nualosete, komunaasi ekakiror lokalaunan; naarai kobalas ituŋa ebe, ‘Lu kes ituŋa luka EJAKAIT, anyoutu kesi da kakwapuke.’
Konye abu ketim ekakiror lokalaunan, loamunaari ekek loka Isirael kotoma atekerin nualosete.
Etalauni eoŋ ekakiror loepol, loamunaaritai katekerin, loimunaarete yesi kokidiŋikec, Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Ejenunete do atekerin ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT, naetalaunor kamakus kakonyenekec.
Naarai kalemuni yes katekerin, katukonok alemun kakwapin kere, ketolomik akwapukus.
Ido kabwasi yes akipi nuelaete, ilaunete: kedetarete kotoma amodokokus kere ka aputosiakus da kere.
Kainakinete etau lokitetet, ebwaikini emoyo lokitetet tomakus: ido alemuni etau lokamoru kawatekus, kainakinete etau loka akiriŋ.
Ebwaikini ekamoyo tomakus, ketoloto kokisilaka, ido iricete ikatubesia, kiswamata da.
Iboikinos akwap nakolo kainakini lukapapaakus; iraenenas ikatuŋa, eoŋ da araenena Ekusideke.
Ido etajari yes kanumam ailakus kere: anyarauni akima, ka aiyatakin, mam bobo kainunete ebeli.
Ido esideneriai araito nuka ikito, ka amio nakomanikor, kinyeis bobo amoromoroo katekerin kanuka ebeli.
Kosodete aiitun ikusirotin lueroko, ka akusiswamisio numam ajokuka; itakadikinos kanuka numam adolitekus, ka italesiakus.
Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Kojenutu bo, mam eswamai nu kanukus. Kirumata ileic kitiriraata da kanuka ikusirotin, ijo ekek loka Isirael.
Ekorio akwap naasil, nakerai naesil kakonyen nuka ŋul kere kalukitorenenete.
Ebalasi do ebe, ‘Arau akwap na naasil bala emanikor loka Eden; ireria da lueswapito luasilok ka luatiyanakina abwai ido eboikinos ituŋa toma.’
Kosodete ejenunete atekerin nukesalete nukirimorito ebe Eoŋ EJAKAIT aduk aiboisio nuatiyanakina, era da neasil: Eoŋ EJAKAIT ener, eswamai da.
Bala esipan loka asuban, bala esipan loka Yerusalem kopucinoke lueseunitai; kwaŋin elelebia ireria lueswapito isipanin luka ituŋa, Ejenunete do ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.”
Ketotor airimor kes: ido koany, epu noi kaditot; ido koany, kookito de.
Kalimok eoŋ ebe, “Okoku loka etuŋanan, epedorete tope akojo nu aijar?” Kaboŋok ebe, “Wu Ejakait EDEKE, jo ijeni.”
Kalimok eoŋ bobo ebe, “Kodwarak akojo nu, kolimok ebe, Yes akojo nuiwokito, kiirasi akirot naka EJAKAIT.
Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE akojo nu ebe: Koany, ketolomikini yes eiyeŋane, ido ijarete.
Ebwaikini aputio mamakus, ayauni akiriŋ mamakus, karapakinete amuny, akutakini eiyaŋane, ido ijarete; ijenunete do ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.”
Aso kadwara kwape kecorakinitere: napadwaria kojai airuruma, ido koany, komaran akwap, kiriamanakinos akojo, akoit mama ejai akoit naceke.
Kaany, ido koany, kejaas aputio mamakec, kolom akiriŋ, korapak amuny kokuju: konye kemamei eiyeŋane kotomakec.
Kosodi kalimok eoŋ ebe, “Kodwarak eiyeŋane, kodwar, okoku loka etuŋanan, kolimok eiyeŋane ebe, Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Kobia, ijo eiyeŋane, kokwamin iwoŋon, kiyeŋak lu luearitai, kojarata.”
Aso kadwara kwape kecorakinia, koloma eiyeŋane tomakec, kojarata, kobwaata kakecekeje, ajore naailiili noi.
Kanuka ŋun kodwar, kolimok kes ebe, Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Koany, apukori ailinakus, ketolomunete kailinakus, yes ikatuŋa; kayaunete kiton akwap naka Isirael.
Ido ijenunete ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT, kadau apukor ailinakus, ka aitolomun kailinakus, yes ikatuŋa.
Kepikakinete yes ekamoyo, ijarete, kebwaikinete akwapukus. Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Ijenunete do ebe Eoŋ EJAKAIT ener, eswama da.”
Kobu bobo akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai ebe,

“Ka jo da, okoku loka etuŋanan, kolem ebela ediopet, kiwadik toma obela ebe, ‘Loka Yuda ka idwe luka Isirael ipaupake’; kosodi kolem ecebela, kiwadik toma obela, ‘Loka Yosep, ebela loka Epuraim, loka ekek kere loka Isirael ipaupake.’
Aso kimorikik nepepe araun ediopebela, korau ediopet kakanikon.
Kosodete naineratar idwe luka ikonituŋa kajo, ebe, ‘Kitejenikinai apolou naka ŋun?’

Kolimok kes ebe, Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Koany, alemuni ebela loka Yosep, loejai akan naka Epuraim, ka atekerin nuka Isirael ipaupake; ebwaikini kes ebela loka Yuda, etarauni kes ebela ediopet, eraunete kesi ediopet kakanika.
Ibelai da luiwadikat ejaunete akanikon kakonyenekec.
Kolimok kes ebe, Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Koany, alemuni idwe luka Isirael kokidiŋ atekerin nualosito, katukonok kowaitin kere, kayau kes toma akwapukec.
Ido etuluori ateker adiopet kakwap, koroŋan luka Isirael; ekabaka ediopet eraun ekecekabaka kere: mam bobo eraunos atekerin aarei, kwabo mam etiakio cut bobo araun ajakanuto aarei.

Ido mam emunaaros bobo kanuka aputosiakec, karaida italesiakec, karaida adiakanaretakec kere: konye etajari kes kotoma aijerukanutukec kere, naeswamaeneniata nukaronok, etesegi kes: aso eraunete do ikatuŋa, eoŋ da araun Ekecedeke.

Ido iboikinos akwap nakolo ainakini Yakob ekabulesit, naeboienenoto lukapapaakus; aso iboikinos nen, kes ka ikecedwe, ka idwe luka idwekec, ikar kere: Daudi da ekabulesit ŋes eraenena ekapolonikec ikar kere.
Ido bobo etutuki kakes aitutuket naka ainapakin: eraun aitutuket namam enaŋi kamakec: esirereŋi kes, etupui kes, ebwaikini akaibois nakalaunan kidiŋikec ikar kere.
Ejaenena da ekawema kakes: eoŋ da araun Ekecedeke, kes da eraunos ikatuŋa.
Ejenunete do atekerin ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT loetalaunit Isirael, naejaenenar akaibois nakalaunan kidiŋikec ikar kere.”
Kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai ebe:
“Okoku loka etuŋanan, kite Gog, loka akwap naka Magog, ekapolon loka Ros, ka Mesek ka Tubal, kodwarak ŋes,
kiner ebe, Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Koany, arai lokasurupikon, ijo Gog, ekapolon loka Ros, ka Mesek ka Tubal.

Kebelokini jo, kebwaikini igolun abokonyakon, ketolomuni jo ka akonijore kere, ibalasin ka ikebwanenok, kere luenapitos lujiis luilosikino, atukot naepol naejaas iupalin, ka ibukwi, ekapito kere ikileŋa:
Perusia, ka Kus, ka Put nepepe kakes; ejaas kere ibukwi ka akopiran.
Gomer, ka ikekodeta kere; ekek loka Togarama owaitin lukosaŋe loka agolitomei, ka ikekodeta kere: ituŋa luipu luejaas kajo.

Akaulo kapaarasia nuipu kianyanario: ikar lukawasia ibuni kiton akwap naenyakunio kairum naka ekileŋ, akwap nakitukonokinere ituŋa anyoun katekerin nuipu, oroŋan luka Isirael, luaraas lueswapito duc: konye itolomunio iketuŋa katekerin, iboikinos iyamakina, kes kere.
Idokari, ibuni bala ekwam loepol, iraun bala edou arapakin akwap, ijo ka ikonikodeta kere, ka ituŋa luipu luejaas kajo.
“Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Kapaaran kaŋin elomarete aomisio otaukon, ipwakuni ijo nukiswama nueroko:
Itemari atiar, ‘Adokari kiton akwap naka ireria lumam ebwaitai; alosikini luijamamaete, luiboiete iyamakina, kere luiboiete komameete arwatatin, karaida atiketa ka irutei’:
aiŋat iŋatan ka amej imejan: ibelokini akonikan asurokin aiboisio nulem iswapito nuejaas ituŋa, ka asurokin ituŋa luetukokina anyoun katekerin, luadumunito ibaren ka iboro, luiboiete kokidiŋ kakwap.

Seba ka Dedan, ka ikagwelanarak luka Tarusis, ka idwe luka iŋatunyo kere, kitemarete atiar, ‘Ibunit kereka ijo aiŋat iŋatan? Itukokinit kereka akonitukot amej imejan? Ayaŋaar epuesa ka esabu, alemar ibaren ka iboro, aŋatar iŋatuna luipu?’
Ibuni ijo kaiboisikon kosaŋe loka agolitomei, ijo ka ituŋa luipu, ibwanenito kere ibalasin, atukot naepol, ka ajore da nakos:
Idokuni asurokin ikatuŋa Isirael, kwape kedou loerapakini akwap. Kosodi kanen kapaarasia nukawasia, kayauni jo asurokin akakwap, tetere kajenunete atekerin, naetalaunor kakonyenekec kamakon, ijo Gog.
“Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Ijo kereka ŋol loenerenena eoŋ apeŋo kama kikabulesin inabin luka Isirael, luadwarenenete kapaarasia kakwa ikar luipu ebe kayauni jo asurokin kes?
Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Kosodi kanen kapaaran kaya, naebunio Gog asurokin akwap naka Isirael, elomari akadedeŋ okumesika.
Naarai ener kotoma okokoteka, ka akim naka akanyunyura ebe, Abeit kapaaran kaŋin ejauni amaran naepol kakwap naka Isirael.

Emaranete iboro lukecor lukaŋolol, ka akweny nuka apak, ka itiaŋ luka ais, ka iboro kere lueliatos kalup, ka ituŋa da kere luejaas akwap, kanuka abunoreka, eukonorio iroŋan, ibirori neicelelei, ibironoros da arwatatin kere kwap.
Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Anyarakini ekileŋ koroŋanaka kere asurokin ŋes; esurokini ekileŋ loka ŋolituŋanan onaceke.
Atubokini ŋes katular ka aokot; etetepakini ŋes ka ikodetake, ka ituŋa luipu luejaas kaŋes, akiru naepol, ka akako naepol, ka akim, ka acukuman.
Ido etopoloor ketalaun da, etejenun bon kakonyen nuka atekerin nuipu. Ejenunete do ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.
Kebelokini, kameari, aitodokar anyoun kowaitin lukosaŋe loka agolitomei; kayauni oroŋan luka Isirael.
Enomari akonikabwa kotoma akanikon nakokediany, etodoi da imaliakon kakanikon nakoteten.
Ibirokini oroŋan luka Isirael, ijo ka ikonikodeta kere, ka ituŋa da luejaas kajo: kakorakini jo anyamio mama ejaas akweny, nuikibelito nuka iponesio kere, ido kaneejaas itiaŋ luka ais.
Ibirokini ais; naarai ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Eoŋ ener.
Ido ejukari akim Magog, ka ŋul da kere luiboiete kapujana iyamakina: ejenunete do ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT.
Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Koany, ebunit, ido iswamao; ŋin ŋes apaaran naabu kener.

“Elomunete ŋul luiboiete koreria luka Isirael, inokokinete akimian kalujiis, icweikinete kes, ibukwi ka iupalin, akabwai ka imalia, ibelai luka akanin ka akwaras, inokokinete akimian ikar ikanykaarei.
Mam eraraete akito okitui, kwabo mam ejepete kamagoron; naarai inokokinete akimian kalujiis. Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Enaŋete kesi luaŋasito kes, iruruete da lueruruete kes.

“Kosodi kanen kapaaran kaŋin, ainakini Gog aibois nakidaanakina kotoma Isirael, aditot naka ŋul kaluitorete kari nakokide naka aŋolol: ido itikokini ŋul luitorere: idaanakinete nen Gog ka iketuŋa kere: emaikinete Aditot naka Kamon-gog.
Edauni ekek loka Isirael ilapio ikanykaare idaete kes tetere itesegarete akwap.
Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Eebo idaete ituŋa luka akwap; eraun aitopoloor kamakec, apaaran naetopolooror.
Etiakarete ituŋa luitorenenete akwap aida ŋul luesalito kakwap, tetere itesegarete akwap: ketuboros ilapio ikanykaarei emoete.
Naitorioto toma akwap, naeanyunia ituŋanan akoit naka ituŋanan, esipokini nen aanyunet, aitodol neidaikiniata ikedaak Aditot naka Kamon-gog.
Eraun Kamona da ekiror loka ere. Kwaŋin itesegariata akwap.
Iŋinyete awat nuka ikagogoŋok, idiŋaete da aokot nuka ikapolok luka akwap, nuka imerekekin, ka imerekekin ludidik, ka nuka akinei, ka imoŋin lutoba, kes kere luetarioko luko Basan.
Iŋinyete atarion kimonikinos, idiŋaete da aokot komerikinos, kasubanit naetemokinit yes.
Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Imonikinos komesaka ibalasin ka ikebwanenok, ka lukirigin, ka ituŋa da kere lukajiok.’
Aso ejenuni ekek loka Isirael ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT Ekecedeke, agear kapaaran kaŋin ka aiyatanakin da.
Ejenunete atekerin ebe ejoreorio ekek loka Isirael kanumam adolitekec; naarai apotu kodiakasi kamakaŋ, kebwa akakonyen kamakec: aso kainak kes akan naka lukasurupokec, kibiroros kesi kere kekileŋ.
Kwape ajaatar amamus ailakec, ido kwape ajaar adiakarikec, kwape kwaŋin abu keswamak kes; kebwa akakonyen kamakec.
Imurwokinete ileicikec, ka adiakanaretakec kere nuadiakasi kamakaŋ, naiboikinotor akwapukec iyamakina, kwabo emamuunete luitukurianete kes,
naadaunia ainyakun kes kotoma atekerin, ka atukonokin kotoma akwapin nuka lukasurupokec, naetalaunor kotomakec kakonyen nuka atekerin nuipu.
Ejenunete do ebe arai eoŋ EJAKAIT Ekecedeke, naarai abu kainak kes aijoreorio atekerin, ido atukokinit kes kiton akwapukec, Kwabo mam bobo enyeini idio kakesi kere kaŋina.
Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Mam bobo ebwai akakonyen kamakec: naabukokinia ekek loka Isirael Ekamoyo.”
Kaitapoeta nuka Edeke kayau akwap naka Isirael, kebwaik eoŋ oroŋat loeoj noi, kujuke kojai ibore yenesubit bala ere kari naka Eŋalakimak.
Kayaŋau eoŋ nen, ido koany, kojai etuŋanan, kosubite atakanuke bala atakanu naka aisinit, loetiŋit auno naka abirai kakanike, ka agada nakitemis; kobwo korute.

Kalimok eoŋ etuŋanan ŋol ebe, “Okoku loka etuŋanan, koany kakonikonye, kiira da kakoniki, kibwaik ekonitau kere nuketodikini; naarai kiyaunio ne tetere ketodikini jo kes; nuianyuni kere kitejenik ekek loka Isirael.”
Kosodi kobu orute loeseseni kide, kodoka kadoketake; kitem okek loka erute, aburesuke agada adiopet: ka ekek ece aburesuke agada adiopet.
Aoj ŋinigola nakidaret agada adiopet, alal agada adiopet; apak da kokidiŋ kagolai nukidaret ikubitin ikany; ido ekek loka erute aapie kagola nalomaret orute atereikina ketogo, agada adiopet.
Kitem da agola nalomaret orute atereikina ketogo, agada adiopet.
Kosodi kitem agola nalomaret orute, ikubitin ikanykauni; ka ategerioke ikubitin iarei; kojai agola nalomaret orute atereikina ketogo.
Emwaasi agolai nuka erute kari nakokide auni epuwai, ka auni da epuwai; kwa auni araas nuka aitemis adiopet: ategerio da nuka aitemis adiopet epuwai, ka epuwai da.
Kitem alalau neeŋaario erute, ikubitin itomon; aojau da naka erute, ikubitin itomon ka luuni;
ajai apak koiŋaren naka agolai, ekubit ediopet epuwai, ka apak ekubit ediopet epuwai da; emwaasi agolai ikubitin ikanykape epuwai, ka ikubitin ikanykape epuwai da.
Kitem erute anyoun katunuru naka agola adiopet, kiton atunuru naka ace, alalau naka ikubitin akaisaarei ka lukany; kiteosi ekek ka ekek.
Kitem neelomarere da, ikubitin akaisaarei, ido kirimorite alaro neelomarere orute.
Anyoun koiŋaren naka erute kiton to naka agola nalomaret nakotoma, emwaasi ikubitin akaisakany.
Ajaas agolai apedon nuagolokino, kejaas da toma ategerio toma orute airimor, kwape kwaŋin acuneta: kojaas apedon toma ammor: kojaas da idukudukun ategerio.
Kojai neitutuitoi kawai naka irutei kosesenas aojau naka irutei, neitutuitoi nakokwap.
Kosodi kitem alalau anyoun koiŋaren kerute lokokwap kiton kiŋaren naka alaro nakotoma kokiŋa ikubitin akwatat, kide ka agolitomei da.
Ka erute loka alaro nakokiŋa loeseseni agolitomei kitem aojauke ka alalauke.
Emwaasi agolaike auni epuwai, ka auni da epuwai, ategerioke ka acunetake koriakasi kaitemis naka erute losodit: aojauke ikubitin akaisakany, alalauke ikubitin akaisaarei ka lukany.
Apedonoke, ka acunetake, ka idukudukunuke, koriakasi aitemis naka erute loeseseni kide: kojaas adoketa akanykaarei adokaria; kojaas da acunetake kiŋarenikec.
Kojai erute alaro nakotoma kosesenas erute ece, kari naka agolitomei, kari da nakokide; kitem ageun korute kiton orute, ikubitin akwatat.
Keŋarenik eoŋ abear eŋalakimak, ido koany, erute loka eŋalakimak: kitem ategerioke ka acunetake kwape ajaatar aitemisio kwa.
Kojaas apedon tomake, ido toma acunetake airimor, kwape apedon kwa: aojauke ikubitin akaisakany, ka alalauke da ikubitin akaisaarei ka lukany.
Kojaas adoketa akanykaarei adokaria, kojaas acunetake kiŋarenikec; kojaas idukudukun, ediopet epuwai, ediopet da epuwai, kotoma ategerioke.
Kojai erute alaro nakotoma kari naka eŋalakimak: kitem ageun korute kiton orute kari naka eŋalakimak, ikubitin akwatat.
Kosodi kayau alaro nakotoma korute loka eŋalakimak: kitem erute loka eŋalakimak kwape ajaatar aitemisio kwa.
Ka agolaike, ka ategerioke, ka acunetake, kwape ajaatar aitemisio kwa: kojaas apedon tomake ka toma acunetake da airimor: aojauke ikubitin akaisakany, alalauke da ikubitin akaisaarei ka lukany.
Kojaas acuneta airimor, aojaukec ikubitin akaisaarei kalukany, alalaukec da ikubitin ikany.
Atereikina acunetake kalaro nakokiŋa; kojaas idukudukun kategerioke: needokarere kojaas adoketa akanykauni.
Kayau alaro nakotoma naeseseni kide: kitem erute kwape ajaatar aitemisio kwa:
agolaike, ka ategerioke, ka acunetake, kwape ajaatar aitemisio kwa: ido ajaas apedon tomake, toma acunetake da airimor: aojauke ikubitin akaisakany, alalauke ikubitin akaisaarei ka lukany.
Atereikina acunetake kalaro nakokiŋa: kojaas idukudukun kategerioke, epuwai, ka epuwai da: needokarere kojaas adoketa akanykauni.
Kayau orute loka agolitomei: kitem ŋes kwape ajaatar aitemisio kwa.
Agolaike, ka ategerioke, ka acunetake; kojaas apedon tomake airimor: aojauke ikubitin akaisakany, alalauke ikubitin akaisaarei ka lukany.
Atereikina acunetake kalaro nakokiŋa; kojaas idukudukun kategerioke, epuwai, ka epuwai da; needokarere kojaas adoketa akanykauni.
Agola nalomaret naka erute ajaas imesan iarei epuwai, ka imesan da iarei epuwai, aarenena ainakinet naicweio, ka ainakinet naka adiakaret, ka ainakinet da naka aronis.
Ajaas imesan iarei epuwai kokiŋa, needokarere kalomaret naka erute loka agolitomei; ajaas da imesan iarei epuwai neebeit agola nalomaret orute.
Ajaas imesan iwoŋon epuwai, ka imesan da iwoŋon epuwai eapias kerute; imesan ikanykauni luearanakinio asuban.

Ajaas imesan iwoŋon luka ainakinet naicweio, luka amoru nuikec, aojaukec ekubit ediopet ka atutubet, alalaukec ekubit ediopet ka atutubet, amukururukec ekubit ediopet; luebwaanakinete iboro luaaris ainakinet naicweio ka asubanit.
Itemokinitoi igolun lueojak alalau naka etau loka akan kotoma airimor: kojai akiriŋ naka ainakinet omesan.
Kosodi ŋesi atemar eoŋ atiar, “Agola na, naeseseni eŋalakimak, erai naka isasedotin, ikedarak luidarete etogo.
Agola naeseseni agolitomei erai naka isasedotin, ikedarak luidarete etem: kes idwe luka Sadok, lukotoma odwe luka Lebi luikunyakinete aijaanakin EJAKAIT.”
Kitem alaro, aojauke ikubitin akwatat, alalauke ikubitin akwatat, koriana kowaitin kere; kojai etem kiŋaren ketogo.
Kosodi kayau agola nalomaret togo, kitem ŋinitegerioit naka agola nalomaret, ikubitin ikany epuwai, ka ikubitin ikany da epuwai: alalau naka erute ikubitin iuni epuwai, ka ikubitin iuni da epuwai.
Aojau naka agola nalomaret ikubitin akaisaarei, alalauke ikubitin itomon kadiopet; eapie kadoketa nuedokanarere: ajaas ipirin eapias kategerio, ediopet epuwai, ka ece da epuwai.
Alalau naka alomaret ikubitin itomon; isiepion luka alomaret keraas ikubitin ikany epuwai, ka ikubitin ikany da epuwai; kitem aojauke, ikubitin akaisaoŋon, alalauke ikubitin akaisaarei.
Kosodi alomar toma, kitem ŋinitegerioit naka alomaret, ikubitin iarei; ka alomaret, ikubitin ikanykape; alalau naka alomaret, ikubitin ikanykaarei.
Kitem aojauke, ikubitin akaisaarei, alalauke da ikubitin akaisaarei, koiŋaren keyekalu: katema eoŋ atiar, “Na ŋes aibois nakalaunan noi.”
Kosodi kitem arwatat naka etogo, ikubitin ikanykape; alalau da naka ŋinigola nakosiep, ikubitin iwoŋon, airimor etogo kowaitin kere.

Eculul agolai nukosiep irwan auni, adiopet kuju kanace: akaisauni kaŋinikiculet, Kolomasi ŋun arwatat naka etogo kanuka agolai nukosiep airimor, tetere igaŋio kanen, komam egoŋakina arwatat naka etogo.

Kiyatanakinos agolai nukosiep alalaar airimor, iwosete kuju: naarai airimor etogo eyatanakin aiwot kuju airimor etogo: ŋes ainakin alalau naka etogo iyatanakin kuju: kwaŋin kidoka anyoun kanakokwap kiton kuju itori aiculet nakokidiŋ.
Abu kaany da ebe kejai etut airimor: apeteta nuka agolai nukosiep keraas agada adiopet cut naka ikubitin ikanykape lueojak.
Abures naka arwatat nakokiŋa naka agolai nukosiep kerai ikubitin ikany: atutubet nakesali kere aibois naka agolai nukosiep nukotogo.
Ido kidiŋ kagolai ajai abures naka ikubitin akaisaarei airimor etogo kowaitin kere.
Ketereikina ikekia luka agolai nukosiep aibois nakesali, atereikina da ekek ediopet agolitomei, ka ekek ece eŋalakimak: abures naka aibois nakesali kerai ikubitin ikany airimor.
Aduket nakejai kiŋaren kaneatiakaritai kari nakoto alalauke ikubitin akaisakanykaarei; abures da naka arwatat naka aduket kerai ikubitin ikany airimor, aojauke da ikubitin akaisakanykaoŋon.
Kitem etogo, aojauke, ikubitin akwatat; kaneatiakaritai ka aduket nepepe karwatatinike aojauke ikubitin akwatat.
Alalau da nakoiŋaren ketogo kokide, ka alaro kerai ikubitin akwatat.
Kitem aojau naka aduket koiŋaren kaneatiakaritai naejai kauke, ka ibalasanake epuwai ka epuwai, ikubitin akwatat.
Eyekalu da lokotoma, ka agolai nulomaret nuka alaro,
ariri naka ikekia, ka apedon nuagolokino, ka ibalasan luirimorito aiculetakec auni atereikina ariri naka ekek keraparito akito kowaitin kere, anyoun kokwap aitodol apedon; ido keraparitai apedon:
aitodol apak nakejai kuju kekek kiton togo lokotoma, kokiŋa da, karwatat da kere airimor kotoma, kokiŋa da, kaitemis.
Kegeritai ikerubin ka idukudukun; kejai edukudukut kidiŋ ekerubi ka ekerubi, kejaas ŋolikerubi ireeta iarei;
kwaŋin kejai ereet loka etuŋanan atereikina edukudukut kepuwai, ka ereet loka ikoku yenika eŋatuny atereikina edukudukut kepuwai. Kiswamatai kwaŋin anatar etogo kere airimor;
kegeritai ikerubin ka idukudukun anyoun kokwap kiton kuju okek: kikoni nen arwatat naka eyekalu.
Oyekalu kejaas ategerio nueriakanara owaitin kere; koiŋaren naka aibois nakalaunan ajai ibore yenasubit bala
etem loka akito, amukururuke ikubitin iuni, aojauke ikubitin iarei; agoriaike, kwapuke, ka arwatatinike keraas nuka akito. Katema eoŋ atiar, “Lo ŋes emesa loejai akonyen nuka EJAKAIT.”
Ido eyekalu ka aibois nakalaunan da kere ajaas ikekia iarei.
Araas ikirigin luka abaoi aarei, abaoi aarei nuesukonokinos; abaoi aarei nuka ekirigi ediopet, ka abaoi aarei nuka ekirigi lokiareit.
Ido kegerakinitai okirigin luka eyekalu, ikerubin ka idukudukun, kwape ageritere arwatatin; ido kiŋaren kagola nalomaret kokiŋa, kejaas abaoi nueburok nuka akito.
Ajaas apedon nugolokino, ka idukudukun epuwai ka epuwai da, kowaitin luka agola nalomaret: kikote nen agolai nukosiep nuka etogo, ka abaoi nueburok.
Aojau naka aduket nakejai owai loka agolitomei kerai ikubitin akwatat, ka alalauke da ikubitin akaisakany.
Atereikina ikubitin akaisaarei luka alaro nakotoma ka atereikina etut loka alaro nakokiŋa, kejai ebalasa atereikina ebalasa ece kaiculeta auni.
Ido kiŋaren kagolai ajai erot toma, alalauke ikubitin itomon; erot loka ikubitin akwatat, ketereikina ikekiakec agolitomei.
Ido agolai nukokuju keraas nuewuriaka aitelekarit: naarai elikorito ibalasan apakikec, aitelekar apak naka kwa nukokwap, ka nukokidiŋ, kotoma aduket.
Naarai kejaas aiculeta auni, ido kemameete ipirin kwape ipirin luka alaro: kanuka ŋun adidiŋ nakokuju aitelekarit nakokwap, ka nakokidiŋ anyoun kokwap.
Arwatat nakejai kiŋa naedunyasi kagolai, atereikina alaro nakokiŋa asesena kagolai, aojauke ikubitin akaisakany.
Naarai aojau naka agolai nukejaas alaro nakokiŋa kerai ikubitin akaisakany: kwa nuatereikina eyekalu keraas ikubitin akwatat.
Ido kwap kagolai ŋun ajai alomaret kowai lokokide, nailomaria tomakec anyoun kalaro nakokiŋa.
Kotoma abures naka arwatat naka alaro atereikina kide, koiŋaren kaibois naetiakaritai, koiŋaren da naka aduket, kejaas agolai.
Erot lokejai kiŋarenikec aputos bala atakanu naka erot loka agolai nuetereikina agolitomei; kwape ajaar aojaukec, ekoni nen alalaukec ido alomaretakec kere aputos kotoma asubuniokec, ka ikiriginikec.
Ido kwape ikekia luka agolai nuetereikina eŋalakimak, kejai ekek kageunet naka erot, ŋes erot loajai kiŋaren karwatat, atereikina kide arai ilomari tomakec.

Naelomanariata isasedotin aibois nakalaunan, mam bobo elomunete alaro nakokiŋa koroko elacara inapenekec luejaanakiniata; naarai eraas lukalaunak: aso enapenenete inapen ice tetere ikunyakinete ŋin naka ituŋa.”
Kosodi kedau aitem etogo lokotoma, ketolom korot loka erute loeseseni kide, kitem airimor.
Kitem ŋesi kowai lokokide kagada ŋin nakitemis, agadai akwat akany, kagada nakitemis.
Kibelokin kitem kowai loka agolitomei, agadai akwat akany, kagada nakitemis.
Kibelokin kitem kowai loka eŋalakimak, agadai akwat akany, kagada nakitemis.
Kibelokin ari nakoto kitem agadai akwat akany kagada nakitemis.
Kitem ŋesi kowaitin iwoŋon. Kejai arwatat airimor, aojau akwat akany, alalau akwat akany, aitiak nakalaunan ka naka ituŋa kere.
Ido koany, kobu aibuses naka Edeke loka Isirael korot lokokide: eporotoke da kwape eporoto loka akipi nuipu; kiliyau akwap kanuka akeibuses.
Kosubite bala atakanu naka aitapoet naanyunit, bala aitapoet naabu kaany naabunio ŋesi amudiar ere: ekote aitapoeta bala aitapoet naabu kaany kocor Kebar; kebiror ebuburia.
Koloma aibuses naka EJAKAIT oyekalu korot loka erute loeseseni kide.
Kadaka Emoyo eoŋ, kayaŋa kiton alaro nakotoma; ido koany, kileleba aibuses naka EJAKAIT togo.

Katema eoŋ atiar, “Okoku loka etuŋanan, na ŋes aibois naka eicoloŋoka, ka aibois naka aicaketa nuka akejeka, naeboio kidiŋ ka idwe luka Isirael ikar kere. Kwabo mam bobo idwe luka Isirael emunaarete ekakiror lokalaunan, karaida kes, karaida ikabakanakec, kanuka eporokec, ido kanuka atesin nuka ikabakanakec kotoma aiboisiokec nuiceleleete;

Kanuka aiduk aririkec naka ekek eiduny karirika, ategerioitikec eiduny kategerioitika, ajai arwatat bon kidiŋ eoŋ ka kes. Amunaasi ekakiror lokalaunan, kanuka italesiakec lueswamaete: kanuka ŋun etanana kes kanuka akanyunyura.
Kwana kolemasi ca kesi eporokec, ka atesina nuka ikabakanakec neelwana kamakaŋ, aso eboienenei kokidiŋikec ikar kere.

Ido arai irumete ileic kanuka ŋun kere nueswamata, kitejenik kes asubunet naka etogo, ka aputoke, ka alomaretake, ka alomunetake, ka asubunetake kere, ka aicorakinetake, ka asubunetake kere, ka ikisilake kere, kiwadik kakonyenekec: tetere ericete asubuneteke kere, ka aicorakinetake kere, ka aswam da.
Lo ŋes ekisil loka etogo: kuju aidi naka eroŋat kiton osaŋeke kere airimor eraun nakalaunan noi. Koany, ŋol ŋes ekisil loka etogo.
Ageun kokwap naejai kwap kiton amurut nakokwap ikubitin iarei, alalauke ekubit; ido ageun kamurut naedit kiton amurut naepol, ikubitin iwoŋon, alalau da ekubit.
Ido etem lokokuju ikubitin iwoŋon, ido ageun kokiala loka etem kiton kuju ejaunos amumwar aoŋon.
Aojau naka ekiala loka etem eraun ikubitin itomon kaarei, alalau da ikubitin itomon kaarei, koriakas iwaitinike kere iwoŋon.
Amurut da koriana alalau ka aojau ikubitin itomon ka luoŋon; atokitoitike eraun atutubet naka ekubit, kokwapuke ekubit airimor: esesenete akedoketa kide.”
Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Iinakini isasedotin Ilebin lukaur naka Sadok, lueapiete keoŋ aijaanakin eoŋ, emoŋ lotobait araun ainakinet naka adiakaret.
Ilemuni aokotoke, ibwaikini amumwarake aoŋon, ka agoria aoŋon nuka amurut, ka atokitoit airimor: kwaŋin itesegia ŋes, iluci da.
Ilemuni da emoŋ lotobait loka ainakinet naka adiakaret, icweio ŋes kaibois naeseunitai naka etogo, kokiŋa kaibois nakalaunan.
Kosodi kapaaran nakiareit iinakini ekoroi lomam eŋwalit araut ainakinet naka adiakaret; itesegete etem, kwape etesegitotor komoŋ lotobait.
Naidaunia aiteseg, iinakini emoŋ lotobait lomam eŋwalit, ka emerekek lomam eŋwalit loelemunio kosipan.
Isukunyikini kes akonyen nuka EJAKAIT, ecakanakinete isasedotin abalaŋ, einakinete kes araut ainakinet naicweio mama ejai EJAKAIT.
Kapaarasia akanykaarei itemonokinene ŋinipaaran akinei araut ainakinet naka adiakaret: ido itemonokinete emoŋ lotobait, ka emerekek lomam eŋwalit loelemunio kosipan.
Apaarasia akanykaarei ilucete kanuka etem, itesegarete; kwaŋin ŋes etiakariata.

Kosodi kedautu apaarasia ŋun, edoli apaaran nakikanyetekauni, ka aiyatanakin da, einanakinete isasedotin ainakinetakus nuicweio, ka ainakinetakus nuka ainapakin kotem. Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Kacamuni do yes.”
Katema EJAKAIT eoŋ atiar, “Esalakini erute lo egolol, mam eŋaario, kwabo emamuun ituŋanan yenelomari, naarai aloma EJAKAIT, Edeke loka Isirael nen; ŋes agolere.
Iboikin ekapolon nen, korai ekapolon, anyamanakin atap nen kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT; elomari korot loka agola nalomaret naka erute, ido elomuni korot ŋopeŋol.”

Katema EJAKAIT eoŋ atiar, “Okoku loka etuŋanan, kibwaik ekonitau noi, kosesen kakonikonye, ido kiira kakoniki ŋun kere nukalimokini jo nuka aicorakineta kere nuka etogo loka EJAKAIT, ka ikekisila kere: ido kibwaik ekonitau noi luelomanarete togo, ka luelomanarete da aibois nakalaunan.
Ido ilimonokini lukepali, kes ekek loka Isirael ebe, Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Wu jo ekek loka Isirael, kodautu italesiakus kere,

naarai itolomununete imo, lumam ekepitai kotauon, ido Iumam ekepitai kawat, ajaut toma aiboisika nakalaunan, amunaar ekatogo, naiinanakiniata ikanyamat, atarion, ka aokot da. Ibilata yesi akaitutuket, aiyatakin italesiakus kere.
Kwabo mam iricito ikaboro lukalaunak: konye ibwaikis yesi imo araut ikaricak akaibois nakalaunan.
Konye Ilebin lualuluasi kamakaŋ, luapaasi kamakaŋ atupar aputosiakec, naapaaria Isirael, ibwokete kesi numam adolitekec.

Konye eraunete kesi ikejaanakinak kotoma aiboisika nakalaunan, aanyanar korutei luka etogo, kijaanakinete da kotogo: earanakinete ŋul ainakinet naicweio, ka asubanit kanuka ituŋa, ido ebwoenenete kakonyenekec aijaanakin kes.
Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Naarai kijaanakis kes kakonyen nuka aputosiakec, koraut ekomio kanumam adolit mama ejai ekek loka Isirael; ŋes ekeikinia akakan aluikin kes, ido ibwokete numam adolitekec.

Kwabo mam ikunyunete diekaŋ, aitodol aswam naka esasedoti mamakaŋ, karaida aikunyakin idio koboroka lukalaunak, ka iboro da lukalaunak noi; konye ibwokete ikeceleic, kanuka italesiakec lueswamaenenete.
Konye etuluori kes ikaricak etogo, kanuka aijaanakin kere nakotoma, kanuka akiro kere da nuiswamao kanen.
Elomanarete kesi aiboisika nakalaunan, ikunyununete omesaka, aijaanakin eoŋ, ido ericete akakiro.
Kosodi kanen naelomanariata orutei luka alaro nakotoma, enapenenete inapen luka ebaputa; kwabo mam enapenenete lukajul, naijaanakiniata korutei luka alaro nakotoma, kotoma da.
Ejaenenas igoen lukieniena luka ebaputa akwesikec, ka epale loka ebaputa kaŋabesikec; mam enapenenete ibore kere yenisinyinyiri.

Kosodi naelomununiata alaro nakokiŋa, ŋes alaro nakokiŋa naka ituŋa, elacenenete inapenekec luejaanakiniata, kinadakis agolai nukalaunak; kosodete ainap inapen ice, tetere mam italaunete ituŋa kinapenekec.
Ido mam ebarenenete akwesikec, karaida aipit itim; konye eŋerenenete itimakec.
Mam emasenenei ediosasedoti ebino, naelomariata alaro nakotoma.
Kwabo mam emanyenenete apuserut, karaida naereŋearitai; konye komanyenenete abekon nuka aur naka ekek loka Isirael, arai apuserut nakerai apuserut naka esasedoti.
Ido isisianakinete kesi ikatuŋa atiaketait kwape ejaar kidiŋ yenikalaunan ka yenika ituŋa kere, itejenikinete da atiaketait kwape ejaar kidiŋ yenimam elai ka yenelai.
Etubonokinete kesi naejaatatar ipegeta; etubonokinete kwape ejaatar ikatubesia. Koricito ikakisila ka akaicorakineta opucinoka kere lueseunitai; kitalaununete da asabatonoka.
Mam ikunyanakinete yenikatwan amunaaror: konye kanuka papa, arai toto, arai ikokukec yenisapat arai yenipese, arai onace, arai kinaci naemamei ekiliokit, epedorete amunaar.
Kedau aitesegaario, kimarakinai apaarasia akanykaarei.
Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Kosodi kapaaran naelomaria aibois nakalaunan, alaro nakotoma, aijaanakin aibois nakalaunan, einakini ber ainakineteke naka adiakar.
Enyamenenete ainakineta nuka akiria, ka ainakineta nuka adiakar, ka ainakineta nuka aronis; ido ŋinibore yenipoliatai koIsirael eraun yenikec.

Ka luegeete kere luka araito kere nugeet, ka ŋiniinakinet kere naka ŋinibore kere, naka ainakinetakus kere, eraununos nuka isasedotin: iinanakinete da isasedotin atapakus nakainumunum, tetere isirereŋio ekonitogo.
Mam enyamenenete isasedotin ibore kere yenetwani bon, arai yenepoopootai, arai akweny, arai itiaŋ.
Ejaun nen aibois nakalaunan, aojauke ikubitin akwat akany, alalauke da ikubitin akwat akany, ariakanara; ka ikubitin akaisakany kanuka ironyia airimor.
Kaitemisioit na itemi aojau naka ikubitin ilukumin akaisaarei ka lukany, ka alalau naka ilukumin itomon: tomake ejaun aibois nakalaunan, naerai nakalaunan noi.

Erai atutubet nakalaunan naka akwap; eraun naka isasedotin, ikejaanakinak luka aibois nakalaunan, luikunyakinete aijaanakin EJAKAIT: eraun aibois naka itogoikec, ka aibois nakalaunan kanuka aibois nakalaunan.
Ido Ilebin, ikejaanakinak lukotogo, ejaunos ka ikubitin ilukumin akaisaarei ka lukany aojau, ka ikubitin ilukumin itomon alalau, araut alupokec, kanuka ireriakec luiboienenoto.
“Igitarete alup nuka ere ikubitin ilukumin ikany alalau, ka ikubitin akaisaarei ka lukany aojau, kidunyakina kainakinet naka atutubet nakalaunan: eraunos nuka ekek kere loka Isirael.
Eraunos alupoke kotoma akwap naka Isirael. Kwabo mam bobo ikapolokoka emwaŋete ikatuŋa; konye einakinete ekek loka Isirael akwap kwape ejaatar atekerinikec.
Koraas epa ka akaalakany nuka aitemisioit adiopet, edoli akaalakany yenikitomonet yenika ekomer
Esekel
“Na ŋes ainakinet naiinanakinete; idiopet kokanykape yenika epa yenelemunio kaŋolikomer loka eŋano, iinanakinete da idiopet kokanykape yenika epa yenelemunio kaŋolikomer loka esairi:

ka ainakinet naicorakinitai naka akinyet, naka akaalakany naka akinyet, eraun idiopet kotomon yenika akaalakany yenelemunio kokor, kes akaalakanya atomon, kes ekomer; naarai akaalakanya atomon kes ekomer:

ka imerekek idiopet yenikosipan yenelemunio kakwat aarei, koronyia lukecoa luka Isirael. Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, ŋin ŋes ainakinet naka akiria, ka ainakinet naicweio, ka ainakineta nuka ainapakin, alucio kes.
Einanakinete ituŋa kere luka akwap ainakinet ŋin kanuka ekapolon loka Isirael.

Eraun aswam naka ekapolon ainakin ainakineta nuicweio, ka ainakineta nuka akiria, ka ainakineta numatan, kopucin, ka nailamununia elap, kasabaton, kopucin kere lueseunitai luka ekek loka Isirael: ŋes itemonokini ainakinet naka adiakaret, ka ainakinet naka akiria, ka ainakinet naicweio, ka ainakineta nuka ainapakin, alucio ekek loka Isirael.
Elemuni esasedoti aokot nuka ainakinet naka adiakar, ejuki ategerio nuka etogo, ka agoria aoŋon nuka amurut naka etem, ka ategerio nuka erute loka alaro nakotoma.
Ido iswamaenenei kwaŋin kapaaran nakikanyetekaarei naka elap, kanuka ŋinituŋanan yenepaari, kaŋin da yenijimat: kwaŋin ilucenenoto etogo.
Kapaaran kaŋin itemonokini ekapolon emoŋ lotobait araun ainakinet naka adiakaret kanukeŋ, kanuka ituŋa da kere luka akwap.

Itemonokini ŋesi ainakinet naicweio mama ejai EJAKAIT apaarasia akanykaarei nuka epucit, imoŋin lutoba ikanykaarei, ka imerekekin ikanykaarei lumam eŋwalito ŋinipaaran adaun apaarasia akanykaarei; ka ekoroi da ŋinipaaran araut ainakinet naka adiakaret.
Ido itemonokini ainakinet naka akiria, epa ediopet kaŋolimoŋ lotobait, ka epa ediopet kaŋolimerekek, ka ekin

Kolap lokikanyetekaarei, kapaaran nakitomonet kakany naka elap, kopucit, kiswamaenenei kwape kwaŋin adaun apaarasia akanykaarei: kwape ejaar ainakinet naka adiakaret, ka ainakinet naicweio ka ainakinet naka akiria, ka naka akinyet, kwape ejaatar.

Elomanari ekapolon korot loka agola nalomaret lokorute lokokiŋa, kobwo eiduny kategerioit naka erute. Itemonokinete isasedotin ainakineteke naicweio, ka ainakinetake nuka ainapakin, emaenenei ŋesi kaneelomarere korute. Kosodi alomun, konye mam ekek egolonokinio aitodol eboŋ.
Emaenenete ituŋa luka akwap kokek loka erute kaŋol kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT kasabaton ka nailamununia elap.
Ainakinet da naicweio naeinanakini ekapolon mama ejai EJAKAIT kasabato eraenena imerekekin ikanykape ludidik lumam eŋwalito, ka emerekek lomam eŋwalit;
ainakinet da naka akiria eraenena epa ediopet kanuka emerekek, ka ainakinet da naka akiria kanuka imerekekin ludidik kwape epedoria ainakin, ekin da naka akinyet kaŋoli epa.
Kapaaran da nailamunia elap eraenena emoŋ lotobait lodidi lomam eŋwalit; ka imerekekin ludidik ikanykape ka emerekek; eraenenas lumam eŋwalito.
Ido itemonokini ainakinet naka akiria, epa ediopet kanuka emoŋ lotobait, epa ediopet da kanuka emerekek, ido kanuka imerekekin ludidik kwape epedoria, ekin da loka akinyet kaŋoli epa.
Naelomanaria ekapolon, elomanari korot loka agola nalomaret naka erute, ido iboŋonori korot kaŋope kaŋol.
Naelomanariata ituŋa, elomanari ekapolon da kakes, ido naelomununiata, elomununei ŋesi da.

“Kopucin da ka apakio nueseunitai eraun ainakinet naka akiria epa ediopet kanuka emoŋ lotobait, ka epa ediopet kanuka emerekek, ido kwape epedoria ainakin kanuka imerekekin ludidik, ekin da loka akinyet kaŋoli epa.

Ido naitemonokinia ekapolon ainakinet naka akote, ainakinet naicweio, arai ainakineta nuka ainapakin araut ainakinet naka akote mama ejai EJAKAIT, eŋaanakinio erute loeseseni kide, itemonokini da ainakineteke naicweio ka ainakinetake nuka ainapakin, kwape iswamaenenaa kasabaton. Kosodi do elomuni, kedau alomun egolenenoo erute.

Itemonokini da ainakinet naka akiria nepepe kaŋes, ŋinitupuruc, idiopet kokanykape yenika epa, ka idiopet kouni yenika ekin loka akinyet ainyalakinia kakiria nuidicic; ainakinet naka akiria natir mama ejai EJAKAIT kanuka aicorakinet namam enaŋi.
Kwaŋin itemonokinioto imerekek, ka ainakinet naka akiria, ka akinyet, ŋinitupuruc, araut ainakinet natir naicweio.
“Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE ebe: Arai einakini ekapolon idio kodweke ainakinet, erai airumeteke, eraun da nakodweke; eraas alupokec nukiruma.
Konye arai einakini nuka airumuke ainakinet mama ejai idio kobulesinike, eraun nake kiton okaru loka aosikinio; kosodi ainyakakinio neejai ekapolon; konye airumeteke eraun naka odweke.
Bobo da mam ekapolon eyaŋaari airumet naka ituŋa, aireŋear kalupokec; einakini odweke airumet naelemuni kalupoke elopet: kinyeis ikatuŋa aisiarisiarun ŋinituŋanan anyoun kalupoke.”
Kosodi ketotor neelomarere, kariri kerute, ketoloma agolai nukalaunak nuka isasedotin, nuesesenete agolitomei: ido koany, kojai aibois agule kari nakoto.

Katema eoŋ atiar, “Na ŋes aibois naipoenenoto isasedotin ainakinet naka adiakaret ka ainakinet naka aronis, neepeenenoto ainakinet naka akiria; tetere mam itolomarete alaro nakokiŋa, aitalaunia ituŋa.”
Kosodi ketolom alaro nakokiŋa ketotor agoria aoŋon nuka alaro; ido koany, kojai alaro toma ŋinigor.
Kagoria aoŋon nuka alaro, kejaas alaroi nuedisiak nukebwaitai, aojaukec ikubitin akaisaoŋon, alalaukec da ikubitin akaisauni: ŋun aoŋon nukejaas agoria keraas nuka aitemisioit adiopet.
Kotomakec, kejai ekokoro loadukitoi airimor kes kere aoŋon, ido kiswamatai kojaas ikial lukipois kwap kikokoron airimor.
Kosodi katema atiar, “Lu kes itogoi lukipois, lukipoenenata ikejaanakinak luka etogo asubanit kanuka ituŋa.”
Kosodi ketolom korot lokorute loka agolitomei, kayaŋa kesirimo orot lokokiŋa kiton orute lo kokiŋa, korot lokorute loeseseni kide; ido koany koleleete akip kowai lokoteten.
Kitem bobo elukumit, ketotor akipi, akipi nuasaŋito akuŋin. Kitem bobo elukumit, ketotor akipi, akipi nuasaŋito aŋabet.
Kosodi kitem elukumit; korau ecor lomam apedori aitor: naarai amukururas akipi, akipi nukiduis, ecor lomam epedorio aitor.
Katema eoŋ atiar, “Okoku loka etuŋanan, iany nu?”
Kosodi kayau ketoboŋ koitolima loka ecor.
Kosodi naaboŋoria, koany, kojaas ikito luipu noi koitolima loka ecor epuwai ka epuwai.
Kosodi katema eoŋ atiar, “Elelearete akip nu owai lokokide, ijesaros toma Araba; elosete aŋolol; aŋolol ŋes elosete akip nukitolomunio; ido itaŋaleunio akipi.

Kosodi kanen ejari ŋinibore yenikajaran yenilweki, kaŋiniibois naedolete icorin; idilaros lukecor noi; naarai adolut akip nu, itaŋaleunio akipi nuka aŋolol, ido ejari ŋinibore kere kaneedolenenei ecor kere.
Kosodi kanen ebwoete ikalokak koitolimake: anyoun ko En-gedi kiton En-egilaim eraun aibois naeakanakinet iboyan; ejaunete lukecor lukiponesio luipu noi, kwape lukecor luka Aŋolol Nakapolon.
Konye aiboisio nukerit, ka isamake da mam itaŋaleunio; inyeinio eraas nukabalaŋ.

Ido koitoliman luka ecor, epuwai ka epuwai, ebwaŋunete ikito lukiponesio kere luenyamio, lumam erinyorete akuikec, ido mam araitokec iŋoŋooros. Eraenenete araito nukitetiak ŋolilap, naarai apote akecekipi kaibois nakalaunan. Eraunete akeceraito inyamat, akecekui da eraunete ekia lokitaŋaleunet.”
Itiakatiakaete ŋes korianas; naarai abu kekeu akakan ainakin lukapapaakus: ibeata yesi da akwap na airum.
Kamat, Berota, Siburaim, loejai kidiŋ keikor loka Damasiko, ka eikor loka Kamat; kiton Kaseratikon, loejai oikor loka Kauran.
Eikor da anyoun kaŋolol eraun Kasar-enon koikor loka Damasiko, kari naka agolitomei ejai eikor loka Kamat. Ŋol ŋes ewai loka agolitomei.
Kowai lokokide da, kidiŋ Kauran ka Damasiko ka Gilead, ka akwap naka Isirael, eraun Yorodan; itemete ageun koikor loka agolitomei kiton aŋolol nakokide. Ŋol ŋes ewai lokokide.
“Kowai loka eŋalakimak ebei anyoun koTamar aitodol akipi nuka Meribot-kades, kiton aguurut nako Misiri, kiton Aŋolol Nakapolon. Ŋol ŋes ewai lokeŋalakimak.
“Kowai lokoto eraun Aŋolol Nakapolon eikor, ageun koikor lokeŋalakimak kiton neesesenas kaneelomarere Kamat. Ŋol ŋes ewai lokoto.
“Kwaŋin ikorokoraata akwap na kwape ejaatar atekerin nuka Isirael.

Kosodi kanen, ikorete keroet araut airumetekus, ka naka imo luiboiete kamakus, luewuriete idwe kokidiŋikus; eraunos kamakus kwape iwurian luka idwe luka Isirael; irumete kesi da nepepe kayes kotoma atekerin nuka Isirael.
Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Kosodi kanen, ŋiniteker naiboieneno imoit, ŋina ŋes iinakiniata airumeteke.
Koikor loka Dan, ageun kokide kiton to; Aser, akorakinet adiopet.
Koikor loka Aser, ageun kokide kiton to; Naputali, akorakinet adiopet.
Koikor loka Naputali, ageun kokide kiton to; Manase, akorakinet adiopet.
Koikor loka Manase, ageun kokide kiton to; Epuraim, akorakinet adiopet.
Koikor loka Epuraim, ageun kokide kiton to; Reuben, akorakinet adiopet.
Koikor loka Reuben, ageun kokidekiton to; Yuda, akorakinet adiopet.
Aojau naka ainakinet naiinakinete mama ejai EJAKAIT eraun ikubitin ilukumin akaisaarei ka lukany, alalauke da ilukumin itomon.

Ido ainakinet nakalaunan eraun naka ŋul, kes isasedotin, agolitomei aojauke ikubitin ilukumin akaisaarei ka lukany, to alalauke ilukumin itomon, kide alalauke ilukumin itomon, eŋalakimak da aojauke ilukumin akaisaarei ka lukany: ejaun da aibois nakalaunan naka EJAKAIT kidiŋike.
Eraun naka isasedotin luitalaunitai lukodwe luka Sadok, luarieito akaicorakinet; lumam apotu kopaasi naapaariata idwe luka Isirael, kwape apaariata Ilebin.
Eraun kamakec ainakinet naelemunio kainakinet naka akwap, aibois nakalaunan noi, koikor loka Ilebin.

Edumunete Ilebin eiduny keikor loka isasedotin ikubitin ilukumin akaisaarei ka lukany kaojau, ka ilukumin itomon kalalau. Aojau kere ikubitin ilukumin akaisaarei ka lukany, ka alalauke da ilukumin akaisaarei.
Ido mam egwelanarete, karaida aisiecanar adiokalup kaŋun, karaida araito nugeet nuka akwap mam eraunos nuka ice: naarai eraas nukalaunak mama ejai EJAKAIT.

nu kes aitemisioke; kowai loka agolitomei ikubitin ilukumin iwoŋon ka akwat akany, kowai loka eŋalakimak ilukumin iwoŋon ka akwat akany, kowai lokokide ilukumin iwoŋon ka akwat akany, kowai da loko to ilukumin iwoŋon ka akwat akany.

Ejaunete ere ironyia; kari naka agolitomei ikubitin akwat aarei ka akaisakany, kari naka eŋalakimak akwat aarei ka akaisakany, kari nakokide akwat aarei ka akaisakany, kari nakoto da akwat aarei ka akaisakany.
Luideuna kaojau kowai loka ainakinet nakalaunan ikubitin ilukumin itomon kide, ka ilukumin itomon to; idunyasi kainakinet nakalaunan. Amioke da eraunos inyamat luka ŋul luiswamaete kore.
Ŋul da luiswamaete kore, luka atekerin kere nuka Isirael ekorienenete.
Ainakinet kere eraun aojau ikubitin ilukumin akaisaarei ka lukany, alalau da ilukumin akaisaarei ka lukany: iinakinete ainakinet nakalaunan korianas kowaitin iwoŋon, nepepe kalup nuka ere.
bobo da ageun kalup nuka Ilebin, ka alup nuka ere, nuejaas kidiŋ katutubet naka ekapolon, kidiŋ oikor loka Yuda, ka eikor loka Benyamin, eraunete nuka ekapolon.
“Nuka atekerin nuideuna: ageun kokide kiton to; Benyamin, akorakinet adiopet.
Koikor loka Benyamin ageun kokide kiton to; Simeon, akorakinet adiopet.
Koikor loka Simeon, ageun kokide kiton to; Isakar, akorakinet adiopet.
Koikor loka Isakar, ageun kokide kiton to; Sebulun, akorakinet adiopet.
Koikor loka Sebulun, ageun kokide kiton to; Gad, akorakinet adiopet.
Koikor loka Gad, kari naka eŋalakimak, ejaun eikor ageun koTamar kiton akipi nuka Meribat-kades, kiton aguurut nako Misiri, kiton Aŋolol Nakapolon.
Ebala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, Ŋin ŋes akwap naikorokoroete keroet atekerin nuka Isirael araun airumet; ŋun da kes akorakinetakec.
emaikinio irutei luka ere ikiroria luka atekerin nuka Isirael; irutei iuni kari naka agolitomei; erute loka Reuben, ka erute loka Yuda, ka erute loka Lebi.
Kari nakokide ikubitin ilukumin iwoŋon, ka akwat akany; ka irutei iuni; erute loka Yosep; ka erute loka Benyamin; ka erute loka Dan.
Kari naka eŋalakimak, ikubitin ilukumin iwoŋon, ka akwat akany; ka irutei iuni; erute loka Simeon; ka erute loka Isakar; ka erute loka Sebulun.
Kari nakoto ikubitin ilukumin iwoŋon, ka akwat akany; ka iruteikec iuni; erute loka Gad; ka erute loka Aser; ka erute loka Naputali.
Airimor ere ikubitin ilukumin itomon ka akanykauni. Ido ageun kapaaran kaŋin eraun ekiror loka ere, Ejai EJAKAIT nen.”
Abu EJAKAIT kijaik Yekoiakim ekabaka loka Yuda akanike, kice koboro luka etogo loka Edeke; koyaŋa kes akwap naka Sinar togo loka ekedeke: kibwaik iboro aiŋadis togo loka ekedeke.
Abu ekabaka kolimok Asupenas ekapolokiton ibwacinake aitolomikin ice kodwe luka Isirael, luka aur naka ekabaka ka naka ikapolok da;

ikatumunak lumam eŋwalito, konye luejokuka akonyen, lueberiaŋ kacoa kere, luepiriaka kaijen, luedesiarete nuituutoorio, ka luibus da aibwo kotoma togo loka ekabaka; ido kisisianak kes acoa naka Ikaludean ka aŋajepekec da.
