Kicorak ekabaka adutanakin kes ŋinipaaran inyamat luka ekabaka ka ebino loemasenenei, ido kitanai kes ikar iuni; naedaunotor tetere kes ebwoete kakonyen nuka ekabaka.
Kotoma kaŋul ajaas kodwe luka Yuda, Daniel, Kanania, Misael ka Asaria.
Abu ekapolon loka ibwacin komaanak kes ikiroria: komaik Daniel Beletesasar; komaik Kanania Sadurak; komaik Misael Mesak; komaik da Asaria Abed-nego.
Abu Edeke koinak Daniel aminunio ka aitimio kakonyen nuka ekapolon loka ibwacin.

Kotema ekapolon loka ibwacin Daniel atiar, “Ayoŋit eoŋ ejakaitika ekabaka, loabu kicorak luinyamenenete ka luimasenenete: kinyek aanyun akusikonyen mam ejokuka kwape nuka ikatumunak luka aturikus; kwaŋin iyaunete aronis akouka kama ejai ekabaka,”
Kosodi Daniel atemar eketeon, loabu ekapolon loka ibwacin koinak ayait Daniel, ka Kanania, ka Misael, ka Asaria ebe:
“Keŋaiŋait, kitem ber ikonibulesin apaarasia atomon; koinanakinete sio idiasio ainyam, ka akipi da aimat.
Kosodete konyet airer akonyenekosi kakonyenekon, ka akonyen da nuka ikatumunak luenyamenenete inyamat luka ekabaka; ido kwape ianyunia ijo, kikwaik nen ikonibulesin,”
Kopup ŋesi kes kakirot kaŋin, kitem kes apaarasia atomon.
Kosodi ketuboros apaarasia atomon, kotakanut akonyenekec ejok, ido kibukeikinito awatekec, aitelekarit ikatumunak kere luanyamenenete inyamat luka ekabaka.
Kosodi do eketeon alemar inyamatakec, ka ebino lotikemasenenete, koinanak kes idiasio.
Kosodete kedaunos apaarasia nuabu ekabaka kicorak aitolomunia, kitolom ekapolon loka ibwacin kes akonyen nuka Nebukadenesar.
Kiyala ekabaka kakes; ido kotomakec kere mam apotu kotakanut lueputos bala Daniel ka Kanania, ka Misael, ka Asaria: kobwaata do kesi kakonyen nuka ekabaka.
Ido kaŋinikirot kere naka acoa ka aijen, nakiŋisenenei kes ekabaka, koany kes ejok irwan atomon adepar imurwok ka ikasupok luajaas ajakanutuke kere.
Abu Daniel kojau aitodol okaru losodit loka ekabaka Kuro.
Kosodi ekabaka aicorakin anyaraun imurwok, ka ikasupok, ka ikaroak, ka Ikaludean alimokin ekabaka airujasiake, Kolomasi do kobwaata kakonyen nuka ekabaka.
Kotema ekabaka kes atiar, “Erujat eoŋ airujasit, kiyaloŋoŋ da ekatau ajenun airujasit.”
Kosodete Ikaludean atemar ekabaka kaŋajep naka. Asurian ebe, “Wu ekabaka, kobusi ikar kere: kolimok ikonikejaanakinak airujasit, ka sio da kitoduuni apolouke.”
Koboŋok ekabaka kotema Ikaludean atiar, “Alom akirot kamaka: arai mam yes itejenunete eoŋ airujasit ka apolouke da, kijepejepeo yes, ikusitogoi da eraunos amejei.
Konye do arai kitodutu airujasit ka apolouke, idumunete ainakineta ka iropito ka aibuses naepol da; aso kitodikinai eoŋ airujasit ka apolouke da.”
Kirucakis aboŋokin ebe, “Kolimok do ekabaka ikekejaanakinak airujasit, kasodete isio aitodiar apolouke.”
Koboŋok ekabaka ebe, “Ajeni cut ebe ikotosi yesi aitumor naarai ianyut ebe alom akirot kamakaŋ.

Konye arai mam kitejenikinete eoŋ airujasit, ejai ekisil ediopet kanukus: naarai ipotu kitemokis akiro nukaisab ka nukaronok einer kakonyeneka, aitodol nailocokinotor apakio: aso do kolimokinai eoŋ airujasit, kasodi eoŋ ajenun ebe ipedorete aitodiar apolouke.”

Koboŋokis Ikaludean kakonyen nuka ekabaka ebe, “Emamei da ituŋanan kakwap yenepedori aitodiar akirot naka ekabaka: naarai emamei ekabaka loepol ido lokapedor lolem iŋisit emurwon, arai ekasupon, arai Ekaludeat akirot naikoni nen.
Epagal akirot naitiŋaikinit ekabaka, kwabo emamei yenepedori aitodikin ekabaka, dimikito idekesio lumam iboiete kaluejaas awat.”
Kanuka ŋun kodedeŋiar ekabaka konyunyurikin noi, kicorak amudiar lukacoa kere luko Babulon.
Aso kolimoroi ekisil loka aiar lukacoa; aponi komoai Daniel ka lukaupake da aiar.
Kosodi Daniel aboŋokin kacoa kaiyapepera Ariok ekapolon loka ikedarak luka ekabaka, loalomarit aiar lukacoa luko Babulon;
Koboŋok kotema Ariok ekapolon loka ekabaka ebe, “Kanukinyo kisuburikinia ekisil loebunit kama ejai ekabaka?” Kosodi Ariok aitejenun Daniel akirot.
Koloma Daniel, kilip ekabaka aseikin ŋes apak, tetere itodikini ekabaka apolou.
Kosodi Daniel alosit togoke, kitejenik ikepaup Kanania, ka Misael, ka Asaria akirot.
Tetere ilipete aitim naka Edeke loka akuj kanuka aiyeiyea kaŋin; kinyeis Daniel ka ikepaup amudiario nepepe ka lukacoa ice luko Babulon.
Koboŋok Daniel, kotema atiar,
“Kituritete ekiror loka Edeke ikar ka ikar:
Naarai acoa ka apedor eraas nuke.
Elemari ŋesi ikabakan, edakakini da ikabakan:
Einakini lukacoa acoa,
Aijen da mama ejaas lueberiaŋ ajenun;
Ejeni ŋesi nuejaas toma amuton,
Iboie aica kaŋes.
Lokiinak eoŋ acoa ka apedor,
Kwana da kitejenik eoŋ nukipou kelipito jo:
Naarai kitejenik sio akirot naka ekabaka.”

Aso koloma Daniel mama ejai Ariok, loabu ekabaka koseu amudiar lukacoa luko Babulon: abu kolot kotema ŋes kwanata atiar, “Sirikimudia lukacoa luko Babulon: kitolomarai eoŋ mama ejai ekabaka, eoŋ da etodikini ekabaka apolou.”
Kosodi kisunya Ariok aitolomar Daniel mama ejai ekabaka, kotema ŋes kwanata ebe, “Adum eoŋ etuŋanan lokodwe luejoreunitai luka Yuda, itejenikini ŋesi ekabaka apolou.”
Koboŋok ekabaka kotema Daniel, ekekiror Beletesasar, atiar, “Ipedori tope ijo aitejenikin eoŋ airujasit naabu kaany, ka apolouke da?”
Koboŋok Daniel kakonyen nuka ekabaka ebe, “Mam epedorete lukacoa, ka ikasupok, ka imurwok, karaida ikadwarak aitodikin ekabaka nukaiyeiyea nuabu ekabaka kicorak:
konye ejai Edeke toma akuj, loepukori nukaiyeiyea, ido kitejenik ŋesi ekabaka Nebukadenesar nuejaunete kapaarasia nukoiŋaren, Akoniirujasit, ka aitapoeta nuka akoukon kaperitikon, kes nuta:
Wu ekabaka, apotu aomisio kopotu mama ijai ijo kaperitikon, nuka nuekotosi ajakut; ŋol da loepukori nukaiyeiyea kitejenik ijo nuekotosi ajakut.
Konye mam kapukokinitai eoŋ aiyeiyea na kanuka adiocoa nakijaar eoŋ adepar yenikajaran kere, konye tetere itejenikinio ekabaka apolouke, ido tetere ijenuni aomisio nukotaukon.
“Wu ekabaka, ibu kosesen, ido koany, aput nakos. Abu aput ŋin nakapedor, naimwekimwek aitelekar, kobwo kakonyenekon; eiponeke da loketasuro.
Aput ŋin korai akouke nakesabu loejok, aketorobu da ka akaninike nukepuesa, akekoik ka amurwosike nukaisinit,
akejeke nukasua, ka aicaketake da atutubet nakasuat ka atutubet nakelupe.
Ibu kosesen aitodol neatiakar amoru, komam akan etirorit, kocam aput aicaketake nukasua ka elupe, kobilibil kes.

Kobilibilunos da asuat, ka elupe, ka aisinit, ka epuesa, ka esabu da, koluoros kwape agugu nukopejal kamu; kokutar ekwam pit, komam kes edumunitos aibois: koluor amoru naabu kocam aput eroŋat lokos, kilelebun akwap kere.
“Ŋin ŋes airujasit; kilimori kwana do apolouke kakonyen nuka ekabaka.
Ijo, wu ekabaka, irai ekabaka loka ikabakan, loabu Edeke loka akuj koinak ajakanut, ka apedor, ka agogoŋ, ka aibuses.
Kama iboioto da idwe luka ituŋa kere, abu kokorak akanikon itiaŋ luka ais ka ikweny luka akuj, koinak ijo ayait kes kere: irai ijo akou naka esabu.
Akaulokon kitupakin acejakanut namam eriakas kajo; ka ajakanut ace nakiwuniet naka aisinit naeyai rwaru akwap kere.
Egogoŋ ajakanut nakiwoŋonet kwape kasuat: naarai ebilibilei asuat iboro kere, idecideci da: ido kwape kipicipicia asuat ŋul kere, ebilibilei ipicipici ŋin da.

Ido kwape kianyunia aicaketa ka ibokoro, atutubet naka elupe loka ekajean, atutubet da naka asuat, eraun ajakanut naetiakak; konye ejaun kotomake agogoŋ naka asuat, naarai ibu koany asuat inyalakina elupe lokenyadu.
Ido kwape keraatar ibokor luka akejen atutubet nakasuat, atutubet da nakelupe, ikwaikin nen ajakanut, atutubet naegogoŋ, ka atutubet da naebilil.
Ido kwape kianyunia asuat inyalakina kelupe lokenyadu, inyalakin kwape kwaŋin aur naka ituŋa; konye mam imorianakinos, kwape mam inyalakinotor asuat kelupe.

Ido kapaarasia nuka ikabakan ŋul edakakini Edeke loka akui ajakanut namam emudiario ikar kere, karaida airumuke ajalakinio ituŋa ice; konye ebilibilei emudiari da ajakanuto ŋun kere, ido kojaenena ikar kere.

Ido naarai ibu koany amoru etiakun koroŋat komam akan etirorit, kobilibil asuat, ka aisinit, ka elupe, ka epuesa, ka esabu da; etejenu Edeke lokapolon ekabaka nuekotosi ajakut: erai airujasit nakabeit, etogogoŋi da apolouke.”
Koboŋok ekabaka kotema Daniel atiar, “Abeit Ekonideke ŋes erai Edeke loka idekesio, ka EJAKAIT loka ikabakan, ka ekapukoron nukaiyeiyea, naarai ipedo ijo apukor aiyeiyea ŋin.”
Kitopoloo do ekabaka Daniel, koinak ŋes ainakineta nuipu nuepolok, koinak ŋes ayait ebuku kere loko Babulon, kitarau da ŋes ekayaiton lokapolon loka lukacoa kere luko Babulon.
Kilip Daniel ekabaka, kitopol ŋesi Sadurak, ka Mesak, ka Abed-nego kotoma akiro nuka ebuku loko Babulon: konye kojaenena Daniel orute loka ekabaka.

Kosodi ekabaka Nebukadenesar aijukar atukonokin lukibukui, ka luketeok, ka lukitemwan, ikerabak, ka ikeŋadak, ikenerunak, ka iricakisila, ka ijaka kere lukobukui, aponare toma asuban nuka aitan aput naabu ekabaka Nebukadenesar kosipokinite.

Kosodete lukibukui, ka luketeok, lukitemwan, ka ikerabak, ka ikeŋadak, ka ikenerunak ka iricakisila ka ijaka kere lukobukui, kotukonokinos kanuka asuban nuka aput naabu ekabaka Nebukadenesar kosipokinite; kobwaata kesi kakonyen nuka aput, naasipokinit ekabaka Nebukadenesar.
Kosodi lokalimoron aiworoor kuju ebe, “Kicorakinitai yes ituŋa, ka atekerin ka aŋajepa,
naipupunioto aruo naka arupepe, ka alamaru, ka adeudeu, ka ajosi, ka etida, ka esos, ka ŋolipone kere loeruo, kosodete aisuded kere aima aput naka esabu naabu ekabaka Nebukadenesar kosipokinite:
ido yenimam isudedei aima apak ŋipeŋin, ecakakinio kidiŋ oupa loesarani noi.”

Aso kapak kaŋin kepuput ituŋa kere aruo naka arupepe, ka alamaru, ka adeudeu, ka ajosi, ka etida, ka ŋolipone kere loeruo, kosodete ituŋa kere, atekerin, ka aŋajepa, aisuded aima aput naka esabu naabu ekabaka Nebukadenesar kosipokinite.
Koboŋokis kotemasi ekabaka Nebukadenesar atiar, “Wu ekabaka Nebukadenesar, kobusi ikar kere.
Ijo, wu ekabaka, ibu kibwaik ekisil ebe, ŋin yeniirari aruo naka arupepe, ka alamaru, ka adeudeu, ka ajosi ka etida, ka esos, ka ŋolipone kere loeruo, kisudedei komai aput naka esabu:
ido ŋin yenimam isudedei ka aima ecakakinio kidiŋ oupa loesarani noi.

Ejaas Iyudayan ice luibu ijo kitopoloo kotoma akiro nuka ebuku loko Babulon, Sadurak, ka Mesak, ka Abed-nego; ituŋa ŋul, wu ekabaka, mam kipodosi jo; mam ijaanakinete idekesiokon, karaida aima aput naka esabu naibu kosipok.”
Koboŋok Nebukadenesar kotema kes atiar, “Yes, Sadurak, ka Mesak, ka Abed-nego, ipeleikinito kereka yesi apele aigir aijaanakin ekadeke, aima da aput naka esabu naabu eoŋ kasipok?

Aso natikwana arai itemonokino kipuput aruo naka arupepe, ka alamaru, ka adeudeu, ka ajosi, ka etida, ka esos, ka ŋolipone kere loeruo, kisudedeoto aima aput naabu kasub, aso; konye arai mam imaete, kicakakinio toma oupa loesarani noi; ido iŋai bo Edeke ŋol Iokiyuuni yes kakaninika?”
Koboŋokis Sadurak, ka Mesak, ka Abed-nego, kotemasi ekabaka atiar, “Wu Nebukadenesar, mam sio ibusakinit aboŋokin jo kotoma akirot kaŋin.
Arai kikwaik nen, epedori Edekekosi lokijaanakini ayuun sio kotoma oupa loesarani noi, kiyuuni da kakanikon, wu ekabaka.
Konye arai mere kwaŋin, kojen, wu ekabaka, kwape mam sio kijaanakinia idekesiokon karaida aima aput naka esabu naibu kosipok.”
Kanen, konyunyurikin cut Nebukadenesar, kitegelikin epone loka akonyeneke mama ejaas Sadurak, ka Mesak, ka Abed-nego, kiner, kicorak aitasaran eupa aatenak akanykaarei adepar nelem esarania.
Kicorak ikagogoŋok ice kaŋul luajaas ajoreke ajen Sadurak, ka Mesak, ka Abed-nego: ka acakakin da toma oupa loesarani noi.
Aponi koenai ituŋa ŋul konapitos ipaleikec, ka ikootinikec, ka ilounakec, ka inapenekec ice, kocakakis kidiŋ oupa loesarani ŋol.
Kanuka ŋun naarai abu ekabaka kicorakinite cut kosaranunite eupa noi, apotu aipelonoreta nuka akim koarata ituŋa kwi luetiŋito Sadurak, ka Mesak, ka Abed-nego.
Kodooto ituŋa ŋul luuni, Sadurak, ka Mesak, ka Abed-nego, eenen kidiŋ oupa loesarani noi.
Kosodi ekabaka Nebukadenesar aumokin, kodetun; kiner kotema ikekenerunak atiar, “Mam nat oni kicakakinit ituŋa iuni eenen kidiŋ akim?” Koboŋokis kotemasi ekabaka atiar, “Abeit, wu ekabaka.”
Koboŋok kotema atiar, “Koany, aseseni eoŋ ituŋa iwoŋon elacara, elosete kokidiŋ akim, kwabo emamei kes aronis; asima naka lokiwoŋonet esubit bala okoku loka idekesio.”

Kosodi kikunyak Nebukadenesar okek loka eupa loesarani noi; kotema atiar, “Sadurak, ka Mesak, ka Abed-nego, yes ibulesin luka Edeke Loejai kuju kakuj, kolomutu, kopotu nee.” Kosodete Sadurak ka Mesak ka Abed-nego alomun kokidiŋ akim.

Kotukokinos lukibukui ka luketeok, ka lukitemwan, ka ikenerunak luka ekabaka, aanyun ituŋa ŋul, lumam akim apedorit awatekec, karaida itima luka akwesikec mam asisiito, karaida ikecenapen mam ilocokino, karaida aures naka akim mam ajaas kakes.

Kotema Nebukadenesar atiar, “Kituritete Edeke loka Sadurak, ka Mesak, ka Abed-nego, loejukuni ekemalaika, kitajar ikebulesin luapotu komunokinos ŋes, kilocoto da akirot naka ekabaka, kijaikis awatekec kinyeis aijaanakin karaida aima edeke kere nabarai Edekekec bon.

Ŋes esilakinia ekisil ebe, ŋulutuŋa, ka ateker, ka aŋajep, luinerenenas aronis kere mama ejai Edeke loka Sadurak, kaMesak ka Abed-nego, ejepejepeo, itogoikec da ituluorio amejei: naarai emamei edeke ece loepedori aitajar kopone kaŋol.”
Kosodi ekabaka aitopoloor Sadurak, ka Mesak ka Abed-nego, kobuku loko Babulon.
Etojok aitodiar aanyuneta ka nukaumokin nuabu Edeke Loejai kuju kakuj keswamak eoŋ.
Egogoŋ da nukaumokinike!
Akejakanut ŋes ajakanut namam enaŋi,
Airumiteke da ageun katurio kiton aturio.
Ajai eoŋ, Nebukadenesar, kaijamam kotogoka, egananai da kotogoka lokapolou.
Abu kaany airujasit naketukuriani; kesiyaloŋoŋoto aomisio kaperitika ka aitapoeta da nuka akouka.
Ŋes esilakinia ekisil lukacoa kere luko Pabulon ayaunio mamaka, tetere ketejenikinete eoŋ apolou naka airujasit.
Kosodete imurwok, ka ikasupok, ka Ikaludean, ka ikadwarak alomun: kalimok kes airujasit; konye mam apotu ketejenikis eoŋ apolouke.
Konye kokau kolom Daniel mamaka, ekekiror Beletesasar, kwape ejaar ekiror loka ekadeke, ejai kotomake emoyo loka idekesio lukalaunak; kalimok ŋes airujasit ebe,

“Wu Beletesasar, ekapolon loka imurwok, naarai ajeni ebe ejai emoyo loka idekesio lukalaunak kotomakon, ido emamei nakaiyeiyea nakisiyaloŋoŋoi jo, kolimokinai aitapoeta nuka airujasitika naabu kaany, ka apolouke da.
Aitapoeta nuka akouka kaperitika kes nuta: abu kaany, ido koany, ekitoi kokidiŋ kakwap, epol da aojauke.
Kopoloor ekitoi, kogogoŋor, kodol aidike toma akuj, kotakanu da kosaŋe loka akwap kere.
Kojokuka akuike, kipu da araitoke, kojaas kotomake inyamat luedaunito kere: kojaas itiaŋ luka ais otolimike, kiboiete akweny nuka akuj katenunake, konyamenenete kere luejaas awat.
Abu kaany kaitapoeta nuka akouka kaperitika, ido koany, kodoku ekedaran, ekalaunan, kokuju.
Kikeseu ŋesi ekeporoto kobala kwanata ebe, ‘Kojep ekitoi, Kojep da aketenun, kilakilaka akuike, kisiarisiar araitoke; konyoutu itiaŋ kokwapuke, ka akweny da katenunake.
Konye do kinyek ekomio loka aliasike kalup, koenite kasuat ka aisinit kotoma anya nuka ais; kitapapal kakopyo nuka akuj, komora kitiaŋ ainyam inya luka akwap.
Kilocokinoi etauke loka etuŋanan, koinakinai ŋes etau loka etiaŋ: kotuboros apakio akanykaarei mamakeŋ.

Erai akirot kokisil loka ikedarak, aicorakinet da kakirot naka ikalaunak: tetere ejenunete lukajarak ebe irumit ŋol loejai kuju kakuj ajakanut naka ituŋa, einakini ŋin yenekoto, edakakini yenitasono kotuŋa.’

Abu eoŋ, ekabaka Nebukadenesar, kaany airujasit ŋin: ka jo da, wu Beletesasar, kolim apolouke, naarai mam epedorete lukacoa kere luka ajakanutuka aitejenikin eoŋ apolouke; konye ipedori ijo, naarai ejai emoyo loka idekesio lukalaunak kotomakon.”

Kosodi Daniel, ekekiror Beletesasar, aumokin nediokasilon, kisiyaloŋoŋoto ŋes akeomisio. Koboŋok ekabaka ebe, “Beletesasar, kinye airujasit, karaida apolouke, aisiyaloŋoŋ jo.” Koboŋok Beletesasar ebe, “Ekajakait, korai airujasit naka ŋul kalukilaito jo, apolouke da naka lukasurupokon.
Ekitoi loibu ijo koany, loapoloor, loagogoŋ, loadolit aidike toma akuj, loatakani mama ejaas kere luka akwap;
loajokuka akuike, loapol araitoke, loajaas kotomake inyamat luedaunito kere; loeboiete itiaŋ luka ais kokwapuke, loeboiete akweny nuka akuj katenunake:
ŋes ijo, wu ekabaka, loipoloor, loigogoŋ: naarai apoloor apoloukon, adol toma akuj, airumitekon da kiton osaŋe loka akwap.

Ido kwape keanyunia ekabaka ekedaran, ekalaunan edokuni kokuju ebala ebe, ‘Kojep ekitoi, komudia ŋes; konye kinyek ekomio loka aliasike kalup, koenite kasuat ka aisinit, kotoma anya nuka ais; kopalal kakopyo nuka akuj, komora kitiaŋ luka ais, aitodol neatuborotor apakio akanykaarei mamakeŋ:
Na ŋes apolouke, wu ekabaka, erai ekisil loka ŋol loejai kuju kakuj, loabunok ekajakait ekabaka:

ebe, kireŋeario jo anyoun kotuŋa, iboienenete ijo kitiaŋ luka ais, inyami anya kwape imoŋin, ipalalar kakopyo nuka akuj, etuboros apakio akanykaarei kamakon; aitodol naijenunia ijo ebe irumit ŋol loejai kuju kakuj ajakanut naka ituŋa, einakini da ŋin yenekoto ŋesi.
Ido naarai ecorakin ainyein ekomio loka alias nuka ekitoi; icasi akonijakanut kamakon, kidau ajenun ebe eyait Akuj.
Aso do, wu ekabaka, kocam ainerunika, kosac akonironisio kanuka aswam adolit, numam adolitekon da kaitim lukican; motoko ejaun aitoojaar aijamamakon.’ ”
Apotu ŋun kere kodoikis ekabaka Nebukadenesar.
Ketuboros ilapio itomon ka luarei, kojai ŋesi irimi kotogo lokekabakane ko Babulon.
Kiner ekabaka, kobala ebe, “Mere kereka lo Babulon lokapolon loabu kaduk araun aibois nakekabakane, kanuka agogoŋ naka apedorika, ka aibuses da naka apolouka?”
Eriŋa akirot ejai aituk naka ekabaka, kodou eporoto ebuni kokuju ebe, “Wu ekabaka Nebukadenesar, inerai mamakon: anyou ajakanut kamakon.

Kireŋear kotuŋa, iboienenete ijo kitiaŋ luka ais; inyami anya kwape imoŋin, etuboros apakio akanykaarei kamakon; aitodol naijenunia ijo ebe irumit ŋol loejai kuju kakuj ajakanut naka ituŋa, einakini da ŋin yenekoto ŋesi.”

Kosawa kaŋol kitodolikinitai akirot mama ejai Nebukadenesar, aponi kireŋearai kotuŋa, konyam anya kwape imoŋin, kopalal akekuan kakopyo nuka akuj, aitodol naepoloorotor iketima kwape ajulo nuka imorukaalen, akebelekeka da kwape kabelekeka nuka akweny.
Naarai airumiteke ŋes airum namam enaŋi,
Akejakanut da ageun katurio kiton aturio.
Iswamai ŋesi kwape ekotor kajore naka akuj,
Ido mama ejaas luiboiete kakwap:
Emamei da yenepedori aitikokin akekan,
Karaida atemar ŋes atiar, “Anyoika bo nuiswamai?”
Kwana do eoŋ Nebukadenesar eturit, etopoloorit, etubusikinit da Ekabaka loka akuj; naarai eraas akeswamisio kere abeit, ikerotin da etube; ŋul da luelosete kaiturokina epedori ŋesi aitisil.

Kiir ŋesi ebino, kicorak Belesasar ayaun iboro luka esabu ka luka epuesa luabu Nebukadenesar papake koŋat koyekalu loajai Yerusalem; tetere emasi ekabaka ka ijakake, ka akeŋor ka akebusian da kotomakec.
Aponi koyaunai iboro luka esabu luaponi koŋatarai koyekalu loka etogo loka Edeke loajai Yerusalem; komasia ekabaka ka ijakake, ka akeŋor ka akebusian da.
Komasete ebino, kituritos idekesio luka esabu, ka luka epuesa, ka luka aisinin, ka luka asua, ka luka akito, ka luka amor da.
Kosodi kijulakinos akonyen nuka ekabaka, kisiyaloŋoŋoto ŋes akeomisio; komaranata akojo nuka itulinike, koretonokinos akekunin.

Kiworo ekabaka aitolomun ikasupok, Ikaludean, ka ikadwarak. Kotema ekabaka lukacoa luko Babulon atiar, “ŋin yenepedori asoman nuiwadikatai nu, ka aitodikin da eoŋ apoloukec, kitanapai lomuge, erikot da loka esabu omurisiŋike, eraun ekayaiton lokiwuniet loka ajakanut,”
Kolomutu do lukacoa kere luka ekabaka: konye mam apedorete asoman nuiwadikatai, karaida aitejenikin ekabaka apolouke.
Kosodi kiyaloŋoŋ ekabaka Belesasar noi, kijulakinos akekonyen, kobuonokinos ijakake.
Kolom akabaka togo loka epucit kanuka akiro nuka ekabaka ka ijakake, Kotema akabaka atiar, “Wu ekabaka, kobusi ikar kere; kinyeis akoniwomisio aisiyaloŋoŋ jo, karaida akonyenekon aijulakin.

Ejai etuŋanan toma ajakanutukon, loejai emoyo loka idekesio lukalaunak kotomake; kapaarasia da nuka papakon aponi kodumunai aica ka aijen ka acoa da tomake kwape kacoa naka idekesio. Abu ekabaka Nebukadenesar papakon, ŋes ekabaka, papakon, kitarau ŋes ekapolon loka imurwok, ka ikasupok, ka Ikaludean, ka ikadwarak da;

naarai kojai kotoma Daniel ŋol loabu ekabaka komaik Beletesasar, emoyo loitelekarit, ka aijen ka apirianut aitejenun apolou naka airujasia, ka abeunun asogolin, ka ailac ilomorun. Aso konyarau Daniel, ŋes da kitodikini apoloukec.”
Kosodi koyaunai Daniel akonyen nuka ekabaka. Kotema ekabaka Daniel atiar, “Ijo kereka Daniel ŋol, loirai lokodwe luka aijoreunio naka Yuda, luejoreuni papaka koYuda?
Apupu eoŋ nukon, ebe ejai emoyo loka idekesio kotomakon, ido ejai aica ka aijen ka acoa da naitelekarit tomakon.
Kwana do aponi kitolomunai lukacoa, ikasupok, akonyeneka tetere esiomete nuiwadikatai ŋun, ketejenikis da eoŋ apoloukec: konye mam apedorete aitodikin apoloukec.

Konye apupu nukon ebe ipedori ijo aitejen apolou, ka ailac ilomorun; aso arai ipedori ijo asoman nuiwadikatai ŋun, ka aitejenikin eoŋ apoloukec, kitanapi lomuge, ka erikot loka esabu omurisiŋikon, iraun ekayaiton lokiwuniet loka ajakanut.”
Kosodi Daniel aboŋokin ekabaka ebe, “Koraut ainakinetakon nukon, koinak da ece iropitokon; konye asomakini eoŋ ekabaka nuiwadikatai, etejenikini ŋes apoloukec da.
Wu jo ekabaka, abu Edeke loejai kuju kakuj koinak Nebukadenesar papakon ajakanut, ka apolou, ka aibuses, ka apedor:

ido kanuka apolou naabu koinak ŋes, komaranata koyoŋito ituŋa kere, ka atekerin ka aŋajepa kakonyeneke: yenakoto ŋesi aiar, abu koar, yenakoto aidar ejari, abu kidar; yenakoto adakakin, abu kodakak, ka yenakoto da aitisil, abu kitisil.
Konye naeomiaror eketau, koninikiar da ekemoyo tape iswamai nukeitur, aponi kolemarai koicoloŋoke loka ekabakane, kodemarai da akeibuses:

kireŋearai kodwe luka ituŋa; korau eketau kwape kitiaŋ, kiboienenei kitukoi; kitanyamai anya kwape imoŋin, kopalal akekuan kakopyo nuka akuj: aitodol naajenunia ebe irumit Edeke loejai kuju kakuj ajakanut naka ituŋa, ido edakakini ŋin yenekoto ŋesi.
Ijo da, okokuke, wu Belesasar, mam itasonikino kotaukon, karaida ibu kojen ŋun kere;

konye iomiara aluikin EJAKAIT loka akuj; apotu koyaut iboro lukotogoke akonyenekon, ipotu komasiata ebino, ijo ka ijakakon, ka aŋorokon, ka abusianakon da; ibu kiturite idekesio luka epuesa, ka luka esabu, ka luka aisinin, ka luka asua, ka luka akito, ka luka amor da, lumam eanyunete, karaida akiirar, kwabo mam ejenete da: konye Edeke loejai eiyeŋanekon akanike, loerai elopet ikonirotin kere, mam ibu kitopoloo.
“Kosodi aponi kijukunai atutubet naka akan anyoun kakonyeneke, aponi kiwadikai nuiwadikatai nu.
Na ŋes aiwadika naewadikatai, MENE, MENE, TEKEL, UPARASIN. (Apolouke Kimario, kimario, kitemio, atiakatiakauneta.)
Na ŋes apolou naka akirot; MBNE; abu Edeke kimar akonijakanut, kitanaŋ da.
TEKEL; kitemitoi jo kaitemisioit, ido itakanu ikadit.
PERES; etiakak akonijakanut, einakinio Imedin ka Iperesian.”
Kosodi Belesasar aicorakin, kitanapai Daniel lomuge, konapakis erikot loka esabu omurisiŋike, kolimoroi nuke ebe, korau ekayaiton lokiwuniet loka ajakanut.
Kirum Dario Emedit ajakanut, korai loka ikar kwaka akaisakanykape ka luarei.
Kopolokinito kes ikayaitok iuni, korai Daniel ediopet kakes; tetere imarete lukibukui ŋul ikeceboro mama ejaas, komam ekabaka etwaniari luke.
Kosodi kodakakinai Daniel ŋol aitelekarit ikayaitok ka lukibukui, naarai ejai emoyo loitelekarit kotomake: komuno ekabaka adakakin ŋes ayait ajakanut kere.
Kosodete ikayaitok ka lukibukui amoot akiro nukiwosaet Daniel kotoma ajakanut; konye mam apedorete adumun akiro karaida aibucaret; naarai kerai ŋesi lomunot, amamei apaar karaida aibucaret kotomakeŋ.
Kosodete ituŋa ŋol atemar atiar, “Mam kianyuni akiro nuluikinet Daniel ŋol, dimikito kiiluiki ŋes kanuka ekisil loka Edekeke.”

Apotu ikayaitok kere luka ajakanut, iketeok ka lukibukui, ka ikenerunak, ka lukitemwan, kinerutu nepepe aisilakin ekisil loka ekabakane, ido aitogogoŋ aicorakinet ebe, ŋin yenilipi akirot mama ejai edeke kere arai ituŋanan kere adaun apaarasia akaisauni, dimikito ilipi mamakon, wu ekabaka, ecakakinio ŋin toma abua naka iŋatunyo.
Aso do, wu ekabaka, kitogogoŋ aicorakinet, kiwadika ekonikiror toma nuiwadikatai, tetere mam ilocokinio, kwape ejaatar ikisila luka Imedin ka Iperesian, lumam ijulakinos.”
Kibwaik teni ekabaka Dario ekekiror nuiwadikatai ka aicorakinet.
Kosodete ituŋa ŋul atukonokin, kodumut Daniel ilipi iŋaiŋai kakonyen nuka Ekedeke.

Kosodete kesi aikunyakin, kinerasi kakonyen nuka ekabaka nuka aicorakinet naka ekabaka ebe; “Mam kereka jo ibwaikinit ekonikiror aicorakinet ebe ŋinituŋanan yenilipi akirot mama ejai edeke kere arai ituŋanan adaun apaarasia akaisauni, dimikito ilipi mamakon, wu ekabaka, ecakakinio abua naka iŋatunyo?” Koboŋok ekabaka kotema atiar, “Erai nakabeit, kwape ejaatar ikisila luka Imedin ka Iperesian, lumam ijulakinos.”

Kosodete kesi aboŋokin kotemasi kakonyen nuka ekabaka atiar, “Daniel ŋol, loerai lokodwe luka aijoreunio naka Yuda, mam epodokino jo, wu ekabaka, karaida aicorakinet naibwaikinit ijo ekonikiror, konye ilipenenei irwan auni ŋinipaaran.”

Kosodete ituŋa ŋul atukonokin mama ejai ekabaka, kotemasi ekabaka atiar, “Wu ekabaka, kojenu ebe erai ekisil loka Imedin ka Iperesian ebe mam epedori aicorakinet karaida ekisil loitogogoŋi ekabaka ailocokinio.”
Aponi koyaunai amoru, kibwaikinai aituk naka abua; komacarik ekabaka kemacarike, ka emacar loka ijakake; tetere mam nuka Daniel ilocokinio.
Kosodi do kolot ekabaka togoke lokapolou, kikany eteŋei akuare kiya: kwabo mam aponi koyaunai lueruosi kakonyeneke: kikoleroto akekonyen.
Kodilok ekabaka anyoun tupuruc sek, koruruk alosit abua naka iŋatunyo.

Nakikunyakinia abua mama ejai Daniel, kodelo keporoto lokican: kiner ekabaka kotema Daniel atiar, “Wu Daniel, ekejaanakinan loka Edeke lokajaran, epedorit kereka Edekekon loijaanakinenei ijo tiritir aitajar jo kama ejaas iŋatunyo?”
Kosodi Daniel atemar ekabaka atiar, “Wu ekabaka, kobusi ikar kere.
Abu Ekadeke kijuk ekemalaika, kitubuta aituke nuka iŋatunyo, mam kesiriebito eoŋ: naarai amamei eoŋ aitoronio kakonyeneke; ido kakonyenekon da, wu ekabaka, mam abu keswama aronis.”
Kiton ekabaka alakar noi jokan, kicorak alemun Daniel kabua. Kolemunai do Daniel kabua, mam abu koany adioronis, naarai abu komunokina Ekedeke.

Kicorak ekabaka, koyaunai ituŋa ŋul luerupeete Daniel, kocakakinai abua naka iŋatunyo, kes, ka ikecedwe, ka aŋorokec da: apotu iŋatunyo kopedosi kes, kobilibilata akojokec kere, eriŋa kedolo kwap kabua.
Esilak eoŋ ekisil, toma ayaeta kere nuka ajakanutuka komaranete ituŋa koyoŋito kakonyen nuka Edeke loka Daniel:
Naarai erai ŋesi Edeke lokajaran,
Icasit ikar kere,
Akejakanut da mam emudiario,
Ejaunun airumiteke kiton osaŋe:
Iswamai ŋesi aanyuneta ka nukaumokin
Toma akuj, toma akwap da;
Loabu koyu Daniel
Kapedor naka iŋatunyo.”
Kiner Daniel atiar, “Abu kasesen kaitapoeteka kuare, ido koany, komotakinos ikwamin luoŋon luka akuj aŋolol nakapolon.
Kolomut itiaŋ iwoŋon lukos kaŋolol, luegelegela.

Koputos losodit bala eŋatuny, kojaas kabebenoka nuka emorukaalet: abu kaany aitodol naedimere ajul nuka abebenokake, kitonyounoi kakwap kitobwoai kakejen aarei kwape etuŋanan, aponi koinakinai ŋes etau loka etuŋanan.
Ido koany, ecetiaŋ, lokiareit, kwape kedubu, kikiara osiep ediopet, ajaas amarana auni aitukuke ekonyitos ikelake: kotemarai kwanata ebe, ‘Konyou, konyam akiriŋ naepol.’
Akaulo kaŋun abu kasesen, ido koany, ece kwape eris, kojaas opurake abebenoka aoŋon nuka akweny; ajaas etiaŋ kakwes aoŋon; aponi koinakinai ŋes ayait.

Akaulo kaŋun abu kasesen kaitapoeta nuka akuare, ido koany, etiaŋ lokiwoŋonet, loketasuro losogim, ido lokagogoŋ naepol noi; kojaas kikel lukos lukasua: konyam, kobilibil, kipudapud da luedeunos kakejeke: kogelara kitiaŋ ice kere luageikinete ŋes; kojaas kamumwara atomon.

Abu kerere amumwara, ido koany, kolom kotomakec amumwarat ace, naedit, aponi korutoroi amumwara auni kaŋun nusodit kakonyeneke; ido koany, kojaas akonye toma amumwarat ŋin kwape kakonye nuka etuŋanan, ka aituk da naenera nukos.

Abu kasesen aitodol neebwaikinere iicoloŋo, kiboikin emojoŋ loŋorot: ekwaŋ akenapito kwape kakako, itima da luka akouke kwape kajulo nuliogot nuka amerekek; eicoloŋoke kosubite bala aipelonoreta nuka akim, akekokoron da bala akim naesarani.
Kolom ecor loka akim kolelei akonyeneke: kijaanakinete ŋes ilukumin elukumit, kobwoete ilukumin itomon irwan ilukumin itomon kakonyeneke: kojau etube, kopukoroi iitabon.
Abu kasesen kapak kaŋin kanuka eporoto loka akiro nukos nuenera amumwarat; abu kasesen aitodol neaarere etiaŋ, komudiarai akekuan, koinakinai aicweio kakim.
Luesalito da luka itiaŋ aponi kolemarai ayaitekec, konye aponi kiyatakinai aijarakec ekaru ka apak.
Abu kasesen kaitapoeta nuka akuare, ido koany, kobu etuŋanan kodouon luka akuj loesubit bala okoku loka etuŋanan, kobu ŋesi mama ejai emojoŋ loŋorot, kisukunyikinai kakonyeneke.
Aponi koinakinai ŋes ayait, ka aibuses, ka ajakanut, tetere ijaanakinete ŋes ituŋa kere, ka atekerin, ka aŋajepa. Ayaitike erai ayait namam enaŋi, namam etubor, akejakanut da namam emudiario.
“Ido eoŋ, Daniel, kokadak emoyoka kotoma akuanaka, kesiyaloŋoŋoto aitapoeta nuka akouka.
Abu kekunyak ediopet kaŋul luabwoete kanen keŋit ŋes abeit naka ŋun kere. Aso kalimok ŋesi eoŋ ketejen apolou naka akiro, ebe,
‘Itiaŋ ŋul lukos, luimwaasi iwoŋon, kes ikabakan iwoŋon luelomunete kakwap.
Konye einakinio lukalaunak luka ŋol loejai kuju kakuj ajakanut, ido irumete ajakanut ikar kere, kes ikar ka ikar.’

“Kasodi kepuda ajenun abeit naka etiaŋ lokiwoŋonet, loegelara kakesi kere, loketasuro loepol noi, lokejaas kikel lukasua, ka abelekekake nukaisinin; loabu konyam, kobilibil, ka aipudapud da luedeunos kakejeke.
Ido nuka amumwara atomon nuajaas akouke, ka amumwarat ace naabu kolom, kibirokinos auni akonyeneke; amumwarat ŋin naajaas akonye, ka aituk naenera nukos, naatakani ebur aitelekarit nuceke.
Abu kasesen, ido kojiikinos amumwarat ŋin kalukalaunak, kipiko kes;
aitodol naebunio Emojoŋ loŋorot, kotubokinai akiro mama ejaas lukalaunak luka ŋol loejai kuju kakuj; kodol apak naerumiata lukalaunak ajakanut.
“Kotema kwanata ebe, ‘Eraun etiaŋ lokiwoŋonet ajakanut nakiwoŋonet kakwap, naegelara kajakanuto kere, enyamari akwap kere, ipudapudai, ebilibilei da.
Ido amumwara ŋun atomon, enyounete ikabakan itomon kotoma ajakanut ŋin: enyouni da ece atupakin kes; kogelara ŋesi kaŋul lusodit, elemari da ikabakan iuni.
Ido inera ŋesi akiro aluikin ŋol loejai kuju kakuj, kitaari lukalaunak luka ŋol loejai kuju kakuj; eomit ailoc apakio ka ikisila; einakinio akanike adaun apak, ka apakio ka atutubet naka apak.
Konye ejauni etube, elemarete akeyaetait, apiar ka amudiar da kiton awasia.

Ido ajakanut ka ayaetait, ka apolou da naka ajakanuto nuejaas kwap kakuj kere, einakinio ituŋa luka lukalaunak luka ŋol loejai kuju kakuj: akejakanut ŋes ajakanut namam enaŋi, ijaanakinete ŋes ayaeta kere, erimarete da.’
Okaru lokiwuniet loka airumit naka ekabaka Belesasar ketaanyikin eoŋ Daniel aitapoet, atupakin ŋin naesiauni aitaanyikin eoŋ.
Abu kaany kaitapoet; kikoni neta, naanyunia kajai Susan, etogo lokapolou loejai obuku Elam; ido abu kaany kaitapoet, bala ajai ariri kecor Ulai.
Kasodi aiteluor akakonye, kasesen, ido koany, kobwo emerekek kariri naka ecor, loejaas amumwara aarei: koojak da amumwara ŋun aarei; konye kodeparite adiopet nace, ido kobwaŋu naedeparit kokau.

Abu kaany emerekek eremonori ari nakoto, ka agolitomei, ka eŋalakimak da; emameete itiaŋ luepedorete aibwo kakonyeneke, emamei da yenepedori ayuun kakanike; konye kiswama kwape akotor, kitopolooro bon.
Napaomoomoi eoŋ, koany, kobu ekoroi ebuni koto, koŋata akwap kere, komam etirorit akwap: kojai ekoroi amumwarat naedelelei kidiŋ akonyeke.
Kobu ŋesi mama ejai emerekek loajaas amumwara aarei, loabu kaany ebwoi kariri kecor, komotakin ŋes kadedeŋ naka apedorike.

Kaany ŋes ikunyakinit emerekek, konyunyurik ŋes noi, konaŋ emerekek, kopaka amumwarake aarei; amamei da emerekek apedor aibwo kakonyeneke: konye kibirok kwap, kipudapud; amamei da yenepedori ayuun emerekek kakanike.
Kitopoloor ekoroi bon noi noi: kosodi kegogoŋor, kopakar amumwarat nakapolon; kolomut amumwara aoŋon nuedeleleete aiboisike kotereikina ikwamin luoŋon luka akuj.
Kopoloor, kiton ajore naka akuj; kocakak ace kajore naka aacer kwap, kipudapud.
Eebo, kitopolooro bon, kiton neejai ekapolon loka ajore; kolemakama ejai ŋesi ainakinet naicweio natir, kotiyaikinai aiboisike nakalaunan.
Kijaikinai da ŋes ajore nepepe kainakinet naicweio natir kanuka aibucaret; kocakak abeit kwap, kiswamai nuipuda kokerianar.

Kasodi eoŋ aipup ekalaunan inera; kotema ekalaunan ece ŋol loenera ebe, “Itodoli bo ai ejauni aitapoet naka ainakinet naicweio natir, aibucaret da naitisili, aijaikin aibois nakalaunan ka ajore da aipudapudao kakeje?”
Katema ŋesi eoŋ atiar, “Kiton atiboŋa ka atupuruco alukumin aarei ka akwat auni; ŋes konyet itesegaarere aibois nakalaunan.”
Kosodi kanen, kadau eoŋ, ŋes eoŋ Daniel, aanyun aitapoet, abu kakoto ajenun ŋes; ido koany, kobwo kakonyeneka yenesubit bala etuŋanan.
Abu kapup eporoto loka etuŋanan kokidiŋ Ulai, loeworoi, kobala ebe, “Gaburiel, kitejenik etuŋanan lo aitapoet.”
Kikuny ŋesi die mama abwoia eoŋ; kebu ŋesi, abu kakurianar, kebiror ebuburia: konye katema ŋesi eoŋ atiar, “Kojenu, ijo okoku loka etuŋanan; naarai erai aitapoet naka apak nakosaŋe.”
Kosodi naenerar ŋesi keoŋ, abu kajotoor ajo nuipu ebuburia: konye katiro, ketobwo.
Kotema atiar, “Koany, ketejenikini jo nuejaunete kapak nakokau naka anyunyura: naarai erai naka apak naeseunitai nakosaŋe.
Emerekek loibu koany loajaas kamumwara aarei kes ikabakan luka Media ka Peresia.
Ekoroi da losanyir ŋes ekabaka loka Yonan: amumwarat da nakapolon naejai kidiŋ kakonyeneke ŋes ekabaka losodit.
Ŋin da naabila, kobwaata aoŋon kaiboisike, enyounete ajakanuto aoŋon kotoma ateker, konye mam ejaunos kapedorike.
Ido kapak nakokau naka ajakanutukec, naitodolioto ikebucarak aronisikec, enyouni ekabaka loededeŋ akekonyen, loejenuni asogolin.
Epol noi akepedor, konye mere toma apedorike elopet; emudiari ŋesi ketasuro, ekerianari kiswamai nuipuda; emudiari ŋesi ikadedeŋak ka ituŋa luka lukalaunak.
Ido kanuka apirianutuke itekeriani aimod kakanike; itopolooro bon kotauke, eturiaikin amudiar luipu: ebwoikini da asurokin ekapolon loka ikapolok; konye ebilio komam akan.
Ido aitapoet naka atiboŋa ka atupuruco naalimokinio erai nakabeit: konye kimunon ijo aitapoet; naarai erai naka apaarasia nuipu nuepote.”

kokaru losodit loka airumiteke abu eoŋ Daniel kajenu kanuka iitabon etiai loka ikar luibusakinit atubor aitodolikin aimejeikin naka Yerusalem kwape ejaar akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ejai enabi Yeremia, kes ikar akaisakanykaarei.
Kagipa mama ejai EJAKAIT Edeke, amoot ailip, ka aiŋaiŋa, kekanyi eteŋei, kanapite epuko ka ekurwon.
Kelip EJAKAIT Ekadeke, kalimo, kenera ebe, “Wu EJAKAIT Edeke lopeti, loketasuro, loitodoli aitutuket ka aitim mama kaŋul lueminas ŋes koricito da akeicorakineta;
Kidiaka isio, kiswama nukepali, kikwaik erono, kipaliiki isio apaar ainyein aituutooretakon, ka itubesiakon.
Mam kipou keirasi ikonibulesin inabin, luapotu kinerasi kokirorikon mama ejaas ikabakanakosi, ka ikapolokokosi, ka lukapapaakosi, ido mama ejaas ituŋa kere luka akwap.

Wu EJAKAIT, adolit ŋes nakon, konye do kirumito sio ileic, kwape lolo; ituŋa luka Yuda, ka luiboiete koYerusalem, ka Isirael kere, lueapiete ka luelwaka, anatar akwapin kere nukireŋeari ijo kes, kanuka adiakaret naadiakasi mama ijai ijo.
Wu EJAKAIT, kirumito sio ileic, ikosikabakan, ka ikosikapolok, ka lukapapaakosi, naarai kipou kadiakasi kamakon.
Aitim ka aisioni eraas nuka EJAKAIT Ekosideke; karaida kipou kepaliikis ŋes:
kwabo mam kirimarit eporoto loka EJAKAIT Ekosideke alosenen okisilake, lukibwaikin kakonyenekosi kobulesinike inabin.
Eebo, ebuca Isirael kere ikonikisila, apaasi, kinyeis arimar ekoniporoto: ŋes kibukokinere ekenit ka aiyaposit naewadikatai okisila luka Musa ekejaanakinan loka Edeke; naarai kidiaka kamake.
Kitogogoŋ ŋesi akekiro, nuenera aluikin sio, ka ikatubokokosi lukitubonokinete sio; nakiinunia sio aronis naepol: naarai kwap kakuj kere mam apeŋo iswamakinitai kwape eswamakinere Yerusalem.
Kibunok sio aronis na kere, kwape iwadikatere okisila luka Musa: kwabo mam kipou keŋaiŋaata asianut naka EJAKAIT Ekosideke, kajalata numam adolitekos, kamisiikis akonibeit.
Kanuka ŋun kirerei EJAKAIT aronis, koinu mamakos: naarai edolit EJAKAIT Ekosideke kakeswamisio kere nuiswamai, mam da kipou karimasi ekeporoto.
Kwana da, wu EJAKAIT Ekosideke, lokitolom ikonituŋa kakwap nako Misiri kakan nakagogoŋ, ido ibu kodumunia ekiror, kwape lolo; kidiaka isio, kiswama nueroko.

Wu EJAKAIT, kwape ejaar adolitekon kere, keŋaiŋait, kibelok anyunyurakon ka aisiopokon anyoun korekon Yerusalem, eroŋatakon lokalaunan: naarai kanuka aronisiokosi ka numam adolit nuka lukapapaakosi, aluor Yerusalem ka ikonituŋa amorosit mama ejaas ŋul kere lukirimorito.
Aso do, wu EJAKAIT Ekosideke, kiira ailip naka ebulesitikon, ka aiŋaiŋake, kitacaik akonikonyen aiboisikon nakalaunan naesil, kanuka EJAKAIT.
Wu Ekadeke, kitoik akonikit, kopup; kokweny, kosesen amejeikosi, ka ere loemaikinitai ekonikiror: naarai mam kiyauni aiŋaiŋakosi akonyenekon kanuka adolitekosi, konye kanuka akoniitim naepol.
Wu EJAKAIT, kiira; wu EJAKAIT, kisioni: wu EJAKAIT, kopup, kiswama; sirikiyap; kanukon, wu Ekadeke, naarai emaikinitai erekon ka ituŋakon ekonikiror.”
Kosodi napenerar, elipi, alimori da akaronis ka aronis naka ikatuŋa Isirael, ayait da aiŋaiŋaka akonyen nuka EJAKAIT, Ekadeke kanuka eroŋat lokalaunan loka Ekadeke;
Eebo, eriŋa enera kailip, aponi kitoporounoi katipet etuŋanan Gaburiel, loabu kaany kaitapoet kageunet, kikuny kapak naka ainakinet naka atiboŋ.
Ketejenik, kiner keoŋ, kotema atiar, “Ijo Daniel, alom eoŋ kwana aitedesiar jo toma aijen.
Ageunet naka aiŋaiŋakon kolom aicorakinet, abunit eoŋ da alimokin jo: naarai kiminai noi: aso koomoom akirot, kojen aitapoet.

“Ecorakin asabaton akaisakanykaarei otuŋakon korekon da lokalaunan, aitanaŋ adiakar, adaun da aronisio aituluc numam adolit, ainun adolit namam enaŋi, aipuc da aitapoet ka enabi, ainyonyoikin da aibois nakalaunan noi akinyet.

Aso do kojen komisiik, ageun naalomunia aicorakinet ainyakar ka aiduk Yerusalem kiton ekapolon loinyonyoikinio akinyet, ejaunos asabaton akanykaarei: asabaton da akaisakanykape ka nuarei, kodukoi bobo, irotin ka arwatatin, konye kapakio nuka ican.

Ketuboros asabaton ŋun akaisakanykape ka nuarei, emudiario loinyonyoikinio akinyet, mam ejaun kibore: emudiarete ituŋa luka ekapolon loebuni ere ka aibois nakalaunan; ejaun esaŋeke kakalele, ejaunos da ijiisio kiton osaŋe; epeleikinitai aisimejeikin.

Itogogoŋi ŋesi aitutuket kaluipu adaun asabato adiopet: itanaŋi asubanit ka ainakinet atutubet naka asabato; ebuni da ŋol loisimejeikini kabebenok naka italesio; aitodol neebukokinere esaŋe loepeleikinitai mama ejai loisimejeikini.”
Kokaru lokiwuniet loka Kuro ekabaka loka Peresia, aponi kopukokinai Daniel loamaikinitai ekekiror Beletesasar akirot; korai akirot nakabeit, ŋes ejie lokos: kojenu ŋesi akirot, komisiiki aitapoet.
Kapaarasia kaŋun ebworo eoŋ Daniel asabaton auni kere.
Mam abu kanyam inyamat luejijim, karaida akiriŋ karaida ebino aicak aitukuka, mam da abu keledanakin akinyet, aitodol neatuborotor asabaton auni cut.
Kapaaran naka akaisaarei ka nuoŋon naka elap losodit, naajaar kariri naka ecor lokapolon, ŋes Kidekel,
keteluo akakonye, kasesen, ido koany, etuŋanan loenapit ebaputa, koenite aŋabet esabu loelai loka Upas:
eputos da akuanake aberul, kosubite ereeteke aimiliaun, akekonye da bala atalai nuka akim, akekanin ka akekejen koraas bala aisinin nuepwatat, eporoto da loka akiroke bala eporoto loka ekodet loepol.
Abu eoŋ Daniel kaany aitapoet, eoŋ bon: naarai mam apotu ituŋa luajaas keoŋ koanyut aitapoet; konye komaranata noi noi, kokerata aiŋop.
Kapaik do eoŋ bon, abu kaany aitapoet nanakapolon, mam abu agogoŋ kosalak tomakaŋ: naarai abu ajokisika koluor abosis kotomakaŋ, kodaun agogoŋ.
Konye do abu kapup eporoto loka akiroke: ido naapupunia eporoto loka akiroke, kasodi aibiror ebuburia kajotoor ajo nuipu, kosesenas ekareet kalup.
Ido koany, katiro akan, kesikukok akuŋinoka kotauon da luka akaninika.
Katema ŋesi eoŋ atiar, “Ijo Daniel, ijo etuŋanan lominat noi, kojenu akiro nukabala jo, kobwo itenara; naarai keyakuunitai mamakon.” Kedau ŋesi alimokin eoŋ akirot ŋin, kabwo kamarani.

Kosodi ŋesi atemar eoŋ atiar, “Sirikikurianar Daniel; naarai ageun kapaaran nasodit naibwaikinia ijo etaukon ajenun, ka aitasonikin kakonyen nuka Edekekon, aponi kopupuno akonikiro: abunit eoŋ da kanuka akonikiro.
Konye abu ekabaka loka Peresia ketikok apaarasia akaisaarei ka nadiopet; konye koany, abu Mikael ediopet kojaka lukapolok kobu keŋarak; kajalak ŋes ŋina nepepe kikabakan luka Peresia.
Abunit do aitejenikin jo nuedoikinete otuŋakon kapaarasia nukawasia: naarai erai aitapoet naka apaarasia nuipu nuepote.”

Ido koany, abu ediopet loeputos kwape idwe luka ituŋa kotiro aitukuka; kasodi kaooŋ akakituk, kener, kabala ŋol loabwoi kakonyeneka ebe, “Wu ekajakait, kanuka aitapoet kaboŋok eoŋ ariebo kodaun agogoŋ;
naarai ikoni epedori ai ekejaanakinan loka ejakaitika lo einer kejakaitika lo? Naarai kanukaŋ, atipet kodaun agogoŋuka, mam da abu kosal eiyeŋane kotomaka.”
Kosodi abu ediopet loesubit bala etuŋanan katiro bobo, ketogogoŋ ŋesi eoŋ.
Kotema atiar, “Ijo etuŋanan lominat noi, sirikikurianar: ainapakin kojai mamakon, kicat, eebo, kicat.” Kosodi nakinerar keoŋ, abu kagogoŋoor, katema atiar, “Ekajakait, kiner; naarai ibu kitogogoŋ.”
Kosodi ŋesi atemar atiar, “Ijeni ijo nukainakinito eoŋ abunore mama ijai? Kwana do aboŋori aitiji ekapolon loka Peresia: ido naalomaria, koany, ebuni ekapolon loka Yonan.
Konye kalimokini jo nuigirigiritai toma aiwadika nakabeit: emamei da yenejai owaika asurokin ŋul dimarai Mikael ekapolonikus.
Kwana da ketodikini jo abeit. Koany, ebwoete ikabakan iuni bobo koPeresia; lokiwoŋonet da itelekari noi kes kere kabar; ido kegogoŋor kanuka abarake, isidiki kere ejie kajakanut naka Yonan.
Ebwoi da ekabaka lokagogoŋon, loirumi kayait naepol, iswamai ŋesi kwape ekotor.

Ido naebwoia ŋesi, ebila akejakanut, etiakatiakaun mama ejaas ikwamin luoŋon luka akuj; konye mam ekorakinio aurike karaida kwape ejaar airumiteke naerumit; naarai erutorio akejakanut, mama ejaas ice luegelara.
“Egogoŋ ekabaka loka ari naka eŋalakimak, konye ediopet kokapolokoke egogoŋ adepar ŋes; airumiteke da eraun airumit naepol.

Ketuboros ikar imorikikinos nepepe; ebuni akoku naka ekabaka loka ari naka eŋalakimak mama ejai ekabaka loka ari naka agolitomei aitutuk: konye mam ŋin icasi kapedor naka akekan; mam ŋol da ebwoi karaida aurike; konye ijaikinio ŋin, ka ŋul lukeyaunete, ka ŋol lokeurie, ka ŋol da loabu kitogogoŋ ŋes kapakio kaŋun.
“Konye ebwoi atenut naelomuni kaliasike aiboisike, edolokini ŋesi ajore, elomari ore loegogoŋ loka ekabaka loka ari naka agolitomei, esurokini kes, ipikori da.
Eŋatari da idekesiokec, ka aputosiakec nuecalara, ka iborokec luejok luka epuesa ka luka esabu, ayaŋaar Misiri; ido edauni icekaru komam esurokini ekabaka loka ari naka agolitomei.
Elomari ŋesi ajakanut naka ekabaka loka ari naka eŋalakimak, konye eboŋori akwapuke.
Enyunyurikini ekabaka loka ari naka eŋalakimak, elomuni ejie kaŋes, ŋes ekabaka loka ari naka agolitomei; itonyouni ajore naepol, ijaikinio da ajore akanike.
Naeyaŋaaria ajore, kiturokin eketau: ibirokini ilukumin luipu, konye mam ipikori.
Eboŋuni ekabaka loka agolitomei, itonyouni ajore naepol aitelekarit nasodit; ido ketuboros ikar iyatanakini abunore kajore naepol ka iboro da luipu.
“Kapaarasia kaŋun ebwoikinete luipu asurokin ekabaka loka ari naka eŋalakimak: ido itonyounos idwe luka luemeŋeraka kotuŋakon aiticat aitapoet; konye ibiroros.
Kosodi do ekabaka loka agolitomei abunore, eduki etut, irumiar ere loebwaitai: mam ebwoete irioŋeta luka eŋalakimak, karaida iketuŋa luaseunitai, mam da ejaun agogoŋ aibwo.
Konye ŋol loebuni asurokin ŋes iswamai kwape ekotor, mam idio da yenebwoikini ŋes: ebwoi ŋesi kakwap nakaibuses, ejauni amudiar akanike.
Itemokini akonyeneke abunore kagogoŋ kere naka ajakanutuke, eyaŋauni lukabeit nepepe kaŋes; iswamai ŋun; ikorakini ŋes akoku naka aŋor amudiar ŋes; konye mam ebwoi, karaida aisigalikin ŋes.
Akaulo kaŋun ibeloori akekonyen mama ejaas apujana, irumiari nuipu: konye itasani ekapolon amorosit nakeyauni ŋol; eebo, inyakakini ŋes amorositike.
Kosodi konyet aibeloor akekonyen mama ejaas ireria luegogoŋ luka akwapuke elopet: konye iguikini, kibiror, komam bobo etakanuni.
“Kosodi do enyouni ediopet aiboisike itotori eketeleman esolo kotoma aibuses naka ajakanut: konye kapaarasia nuikidioko emudiario, konye mere kanyunyura, karaida kojie.
Enyouni ekes loemwaŋitai aiboisike, lomam sek einakinitai aibuses naka ajakanut: konye ebuni ŋesi kapak nakainapakin, eyaŋaari ajakanut kanuka akiro nukaijodijod.
Elelearete ajoresio kwape kakalele kakonyeneke, ebilas; eebo, ekapolon loka aitutuket da.
Kedautu aitutuk iswamai kaliokonut; naarai edokari, eraun lokagogoŋ, kojaas kituŋa luikidioko.

Kapak nakainapakin elomari aiboisio nuitelekarito amio nukobuku; iswamai numam lukapapake iswamatos, karaida lukapapaake; ekorakini kes lumejauna, ka luŋatuna, ka iboro da: eebo, ebilakini iboteike asurokin ireria luegogoŋ, adaun apak.

Ido isidiki akepedor ka aketitiŋ asurokin ekabaka loka ari naka eŋalakimak kajore naepol: itijie da ekabaka loka ari naka eŋalakimak ŋes ejie kajore naepol noi naededeŋ: konye mam ebwoi, naarai ebilakinete ŋes ibotei.
Eebo, ŋul luenyamete ikenyamat, kes ca emudiarete ŋes, elelei ajoreke: ibiroros luipu edanyio.
Ido ikabakan ŋul luarei, ibwaikinete itauonokec ameŋeranut, esabanakinete enyamete nepepe: konye mam ekeriakaros; naarai ejaun esaŋe kapak naeseunitai.
Ŋes konyet eboŋoria akwapuke kiboro luipu; konye esurokini eketau aitutuket nakalaunan: iswamai nuekoto, kobonori do akwapuke.
“Eboŋori do kapak naeseunitai, elomari ari naka eŋalakimak; konye mam ejaun kapak kaŋin kwape sek ajaar nasodit.
Naarai epote ameerin nuka Kitim asurokin ŋes; ŋes konyet iburakinia, eboŋori, enyunyurikini aitutuket nakalaunan, iswamai nuekoto; eboŋori do ibwaikini etau ŋul luejalete aitutuket nakalaunan.
Ebwoete irioŋeta kowaike, itisilianete aibois nakalaunan, ŋes ere loegogoŋ, elemarete asubanit natir, esipokinete etal loisimejeikini.
Itapaari ŋesi kaijodijod ŋul lueswamaete nueroko asurokin aitutuket: konye do icasito ituŋa luejenete Ekecedeke, iswamaete nukatitiŋ.
Lukacoa da lukotoma otuŋa ituutoorete luipu: konye ibirokinos okileŋ, ka akim, ka aijoreorio, ka aŋatario, apaarasia nuipu.
Kosodi naibirorotor, iŋarakinio kaiŋarakin naedit: konye imorikikinos luipu mamakec kakiro nukaijodijod.
Ibiroros da ice kakesi lukacoa, aililiaun kes, aitesegaar, aitalaun kes aitodol apak nakawasia: naarai eroko ejai apak naeseunitai.
Mam da epodokini idekesio luka lukapapaake, karaida loimielas aŋor, karaida apod edeke kere: naarai etopoloor aitelekar kere.
Konye kaiboisike itubusikini edeke loka ireria luegogoŋ: itubusikini edeke lomam kolo ajenete lukapapaake kesabu, ka epuesa, ka amor nuka akais nuipu, ka iboro luketiai loepol.
Ikwaikini da ireria luegogoŋ aitelekarit kiŋarakinite edeke lomoit; ŋul da luecamunete ŋes iyatakini aibuses: einakini kes airum luipu, ekori akwap kanuka etiai.

“Kapak da nakosaŋe eremori ŋes ekabaka loka ari naka eŋalakimak: ebuni ekabaka loka ari naka agolitomei asurokin ŋes kwape etapipirio, kagalin, ka ikebwanenok, ka ameerin nuipu; elomari ŋesi akwapin, elelei, etubori.
Elomari da akwap nakaibuses, ibirokini luipu: konye itajario nu kakanike, Edom, ka Moab, ka lukapolok luka idwe luka Amon.
Eriori da akekan akwapin: akwap da nako Misiri mam ekui.
Konye edumuni apedor kama ejaas aiŋadisio nuka esabu ka nuka epuesa, ka iboro da kere luka akais nuipu luko Misiri: etupakinete ŋes Ilibian ka Itiopian.
Konye isiyaloŋoŋoete ŋes iyemuto luepote kokide, kari da naka agolitomei: elomari kanyunyura naededeŋ amudiar, ka aidany da cut luipu.
Ido iraikini iweman lukotogoke lokapolou kidiŋ kaŋolol ka eroŋat lokaibuses lokalaunan; konye edolokini osaŋeke, komam yeniŋarakini ŋes.
Ekwenyunete da luipu kaŋul kaluejotoete kotoma apua naka akwap, ice neejai aijar namam edaun, ice da mama ejaas ileic ka amwaŋio namam edaun.
Ecaunete da ŋul lukacoa kwape amwekimwek naka akuj; ŋul da luibelokinete luipu mama ejai adolit kwape aacer ikar ka ikar.
Konye jo, wu Daniel, kimunon akiro, kipuc eitabo, aitodol apak nakawasia: ekerete luipu lailo ka laije, iyatakin da aijen.”
Kasodi eoŋ, Daniel, asesen, ido koany, ebwoete ice iarei, ediopet kowai lo kariri naka ecor, ece juwai kariri naka ecor.
Kosodi ediopet kiŋit etuŋanan loenapit ebaputa, loajai kuju akipi nukocor ebe, “Itodoli bo ai kiton osaŋe loka nukaumokin nu?”

Korio etuŋanan loenapit ebaputa, loajai kuju akipi nukocor, akekan nakoteten ka akekan nakokediany da kiton akuj, kasodi apupun ŋes iyapoi kolimite ŋol loejarenenei ikar kere ebe, itodoli apak, ka apakio, ka atutubet; ido kedaut kesi abilibil apedor naka ituŋa lukalaunak, kosodete konyet ŋun kere adaun.
Kapup, konye mam abu kajen: kasodi atemar ebe, “Wu ekajakait, nuelomunete kaŋun kere anyoika?”
Kotema atiar, “Kolot, Daniel: naarai emunon akiro, epucakin da aitodol apak nakawasia.
Itesegaaros luipu, italaunos, ililiaunos; konye iswamaete lukaronok nukaronok; emameun yenikaronon yenejenuni: konye ejenunete ŋul lukacoa.
Ido ageun kapak naelemarere ainakinet naicweio natir, esipokino da etal loisimejeikini, ejaunete apaarasia alukumit ka akwat aarei ka akaisakanykaoŋon.
Isirereŋitoi ŋin yenidaret, kodol apaarasia alukumit ka akwat auni ka akaisauni kanukany.
Konye kolot ma ijo aitodol naejaunia awasia: naarai ibworari, ibwoi da kotoma nakibeit jo osaŋe loka apaarasia.”
Aso abu ŋesi kolot komany Gomer akoku naka Dibilaim; kopotuu ŋesi, kourik ŋes isapat.
Kosodi kanen kapaaran kaŋin, abili eoŋ akabwa naka Isirael toma aditot naka Yesereel.”
Kopotuu bobo kouru ipese, Kotema EJAKAIT ŋes atiar, “Komaik ekekiror Lo-rukama.
Konye etimi ekek loka Yuda, etajari kes kanuka EJAKAIT Ekecedeke, mam etajari kes kanuka akabwa, karaida ekileŋ, karaida ejie, karaida ibalasin, karaida ikebwanenok.”.
Kosodi kedau aitajakaar Lo-rukama, kopotuu, kouru isapat.
Kotema EJAKAIT atiar, “Komaik ekekiror Lo-ami;
Etukonokinos idwe luka Yuda ka idwe luka Isirael, eseunete lokapolon ediopet, enyounete kakwap: naarai epol apaaran naka Yesereel.
Kolimokisi ikusiinacan ebe, “Ami”;
Naarai mam erai akaberu,
Eoŋ da mam arai okilenike:
Kosac ŋesi adoteuke kakonyeneke,
Ka eporoke kokisinake;
Ketuput ŋes kwape amodiŋ,
Kebwaik ŋes kwape akwap naeonit,
Kaar ŋes kakure.
Eebo, mam etimi ikedwe;
Naarai eraas idwe luka adoteu.
Eswama ŋin naapotuunit kes nukileic:
Naarai abala ebe, “Alosi mama ejaas ipaelonoka,
Lueinakinete eoŋ atapaka, ka akipika,
Ajuloka ka abiraika, akinyeteka ka numatanaka.”
Aduki arwatat kaneejai ŋesi,
Tetere mam edumuni ikerotin.
Konye mam edolokini kes:
Emoi kes, konye mam edumuni:
Kosodi do ebala ebe, “Alosi
Aboŋori mama ejai okilenika losodit
Naarai ajai ejok kolo adepar kwana.”
Naarai mam ŋes ajeni ebe
Eoŋ ŋes ainakinit ŋes
Akima ka ebino ka akinyet,
Keyatak mama ejai epuesa ka esabu
Luejaanakiniata Baal.
Ŋes enyakunia akimaka kapakike,
Ka ebinoka kokaruke,
Alemari da ajuloka ka abiraika
Nutikerapiata amujalalake.
Kwana da etoduuni ikeleic
Kakonyen nuka ipaelonoke,
Emameun yeneyuuni ŋes kakanika.
Ipucinoke, ailamunun naka ilapioke, asabatonoke,
Ka atukokinetake kere nukaiyamakina.
Luabu ŋesi kotema ebe,
“Lu kes eropitika,
Loapotu ipaelonoka kainakis eoŋ”;
Etuluori kes amagoro,
Enyamete da kes itiaŋ luka ais.
Kanuka apaarasia nuka Ibaalim,
Luabu ŋesi kisupurik lukisupurununo,
Kisiri kitetio ka itibineke,
Kibwapa ipaelonoke, kimurwok eoŋ.
Ayauni ŋes amodiŋ,
Enerakin ŋes nuitalakarete.
Aditot naka Akor araun ekek loka amun:
Eboŋokini ŋesi kaŋina, kwape kapaarasia nuka eiditeuke,
Kwape kapaaran naanyounio kakwap nako Misiri.”
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, “Kosodi kapaaran kaŋin, kimaikini eoŋ, ‘Okilenika’ mam bobo kimaikinit eoŋ ‘Baalika’.
Naarai alemari ikiroria luka Ibaalim kaitukuke, mam bobo elimitoi ikiroriakec.
Kapaaran kaŋin etutukikini kes aitutuket kitiaŋ luka ais, ka akweny nuka apak, ka lueliatos kakwap: abili akabwa ka ekileŋ ka ejie anyoun kakwap, esiperikini kes inapakina.
Kesineri jo ikar kere; eebo, kesineri jo kadolit, kotube, kasianut-nakamin, ka aitimio da.
Kesineri teni jo kamunonut: ijenuni do EJAKAIT.”
Aboŋokini, aboŋokini akuj,
Ŋes da eboŋokini akwap;
Eboŋokini akwap akima, ka ebino, ka akinyet;
Eboŋokinete kesi da Yesereel.
Etimi ŋin namam lem itimitoi:
Alimokini ŋul lumam araas ikatuŋa ebe,
“Iraas yesi ikatuŋa;
Kes da inerasi ebe, ‘Ijoŋo Ekadeke.’ ”

Kosodi kabala EJAKAIT eoŋ ebe, “Kolot bobo, komin aberu naemina opaike, naadote, kwape eminar EJAKAIT idwe luka Isirael, karaida ibelokinos mama ejaas idekesio ice, iminas aluŋuren nuka imusabibun nueokito.”
Aso kagwelu ŋes katutubeta atomon ka nukany nuka epuesa, ka ekomer
Katema ŋes atiar, “Kiboikin keoŋ apaarasia nuipu; mam ilosi eporo, mam iraun aberu naka etuŋanan kere: eoŋ da ekonakini nen mamakon.”
Naarai iboiete idwe luka Isirael apaarasia nuipu komamei ekabaka, karaida ekapolon, komamei asubanit, karaida epir, komamei da epod
Akaulo kaŋun eboŋunete idwe luka Isirael, emoete EJAKAIT Ekecedeke, ka Daudi ekabakakec; epote kaiyoŋ mama ejai EJAKAIT ka ajokisike kapaarasia nukokau.
Naarai ejai EJAKAIT aŋolopa kaluiboiete kakwap,
Naarai emamei abeit, karaida aitim,
Karaida ajenun Edeke kakwap.
Emamei ibore dimarai aiyapo, ka aiŋal, ka aibil ebotet, ka aiar, ka akoko, ka adoteu;
Ebelaros, aokot da edolokinete aokot.
Ekalanyana ŋinituŋanan yeniboie kotoma,
Nenipe kitiaŋ luka ais ka akweny nuka apak;
Eebo, elemario da iboro lukecor.
Karaida ituŋanan aitoron;
Naarai eraas ikonituŋa kwape luitepegete esasedoti.
Iguikini da enabi nepepe kajo kuare;
Amudiari da totokon.
Emudiaros ikatuŋa kanu amamus aijen:
Naarai ibu koŋer aijen, eoŋ da kaŋeri jo,
Mam iraun esasedoti mamakaŋ;
Naarai kimurwokis ikisila luka Edekekon,
Eoŋ da kemurwokinete ikonidwe.
Kwape epuarotor, kwape kwaŋin adiakanariata kamakaŋ:
Elocokini eoŋ da aibusesukec araun ileic.
Enyamenenete aronis naka ikatuŋa,
Iraŋaete numam adolitekec.
Aso eriakanara ituŋa ka esasedoti:
Eticani kes kanuka iponesiokec,
Aropi kes kanuka aswamisiokec.
Edotearos komam ipuaros:
Naarai enyekis aibwaikin etau mama ejai EJAKAIT.
Kes elemarete ajenun.
Ebelakec da elimokini kes:
Naarai etapaa kes emoyo loka adoteu,
Aloto eporo anyoun kama ejai Edekekec.
Isupuruununete lukisupurununo koukon,
Kwap kiluan, ka isiepen ka ipeduro,
Naarai ejok itolimonokec.
Kanuka ŋun eelos akusipesur,
Edote aterakakus.
Mam eticani akusipesur eelos,
Karaida aterakakus edote:
Naarai apaasi kesi ikulepek kanudotea,
Einakinete asuban nepepe kakerimok:
Ibirorio ituŋa lumam ejenere.
Kinyek Yuda agwaun akirot; Sirikiloto Giligal,
Karaida alosit Bet-aben,
Karaida aiyapo ebe, “Kwape ejaria EJAKAIT.”
Naarai eninik Isirael,
Kwape ataok naeninik:
Aso itadaki tope EJAKAIT kes
Kwape imerekek kaibois naelal?
Kinyek ŋes.
Edwarak amatanakec:
Iporoonoros tiritir:
Eminasi noi ikapolokoke ileic.
Ekutari ŋes ekwam kabebenokake;
Irumete ileic kanuka asuba
Kiirasi na, yes isasedotin,
Kopupokis yesi lukokek loka Isirael,
Kitoik akit, ijo ekek loka ekabaka,
Naarai etube ŋes lokus;
Naarai iraas yesi eic koMisipa,
Ka eboi loepesikinitai Tabor.
Etudulosi aipany naka Sitim;
Konye etoroni eoŋ kes kere.
Isirael da mam eŋopi kamakaŋ:
Naarai kwana, ijo Epuraim, iporoi,
Amunaun Isirael.
Mam aswamisiokec ecamakinete kes
Aibelokin mama ejai Edekekec:
Naarai ejai emoyo loka eporo kotomakec,
Mam ejenete EJAKAIT.
Itejenuni aiturokin naka Isirael kakonyeneke:
Kanuka ŋun iguikinete Isirael ka Epuraim toma numam adolitekec;
Iguikini Yuda da kakes.
Elosete nepepe kisipaninikec luka amerekekin ka aituk amoot EJAKAIT:
Konye mam edumunete ŋes; ajal kes.
Naarai aurut idwe lumo,
Kwana emudiari elap lokelamunan kes ka imanikoriakec.
Kokuta nuka elulu koBet-aben:
Kokaukon, ijo Benyamin.
Eraun Epuraim etisilio kapaaran naka aitoronio:
Abu ketejen atekerin nuka Isirael nuekotosi cut ajakut.
Abukokini kes akanyunyura kwape akipi.
Naarai itojokit atupar aamameak.
Ŋes konyet araunor kwape ekajekelet mama erai Epuraim.
Ido kwape aibos mama ejai ekek loka Yuda.
Nakeanyunia Epuraim adekake, ka Yuda da amusuŋutuke,
Kosodi Epuraim alosit Asuria,
Kijuka mama ejai ekabaka Yareb:
Konye mam ŋes epedori aitaŋaleun jo,
Mam epedori aitaŋaleun amusuŋutukon.
Naarai araun eoŋ kwape eŋatuny mama ejai Epuraim,
Kwape iŋatuny da mama ejai ekek loka Isirael:
Eoŋ, eoŋ obe, apoopooi, kasodi alosit;
Aŋatari, emameun da yeneyuuni.
Alosi aboŋori aiboisika,
Aitodol naelimoriata aidiakakec, emoete akakonyen:
Edunyakinete amoot eoŋ kaiticanitoikec.
Naarai ŋes apoopoo, ŋes da kitaŋaleuni;
Ŋes icumi, ŋes da kimadi.
Ketuboros apaarasia aarei kisikwaruni:
Kitonyouni kapaaran nakiwuniet,
Oni da kijari kakonyeneke.
Icasit akelomar kwape katupuruc:
Ebuni mamawok kwape kakiru,
Kwape kakiru nakiloboet nairwairwai akwap.”
Wu Epuraim, kekonakini jo ai?
Wu Yuda, kekonakini jo ai?
Naarai esubit akusijokis bala edou loka atupuruc,
Ido kwape akopyo nueokete nape sek.
Kaar kes kakiro nuka aitukuka:
Esubito ikatubesia bala aica naipelun.
Ka aijen Edeke aitelekarit ainakineta nuicweio.
Konye adiakasi kesi aitutuket kwape Adam;
Kamodata eoŋ kanen.
Erai Gilead ere loka ŋul kaluiswamaete numam edolito,
Ejukitoi aokot.
Ido kwape idariata ikodeta luka ikaŋatak etuŋanan,
Eari kwaŋin atukot naka isasedotin korot loebei Sekem:
Eebo, eswamata nukasilianut.
Aanyik akirot naasogim okek loka Isirael;
Atakanu adoteu koEpuraim, amunaun Isirael.
Naenyakunia ikatuŋa kaijoreorio,
Naakotor aitaŋaleun Isirael,
Ŋes etakanunia numam adolit nuka Epuraim,
Ka aronis da naka Samaria;
Naarai emodete:
Elomuni ekokolan kotoma,
Eŋasi ekodet loka ikaŋatak kokiŋa.
Kwana do irigaunete kes akeceswamisio,
Ejaas kakonyeneka.
Ka ikapolok da kaisabakec.
Eraas kere idotea:
Eraas bala ekiala loinoki ekepoon;
Inyeini do aiyatakin akim,
Ageun kainyoŋ akiria aitodol naebuunioto.
Kapaaran naka ekabakawok kodekakinos ikapolok kadwaris naka ajon;
Korio akekan nepepe kikesekelok.
Naarai etemokis ikecetauon kwape ekiala, eperunete;
Ejotoi anyunyurakec akuare kia;
Tupuruc enoki kwape akim naesarani.
Idoporete ikatubokokec;
Ebiroros ikabakanakec kere:
Emameun kotomakec yenikewonet eoŋ.
Epuraim ŋes emugati lomam ibelokinitai.
Anyamata imo akegogoŋ, komam ejeni;
Eebo, abwaŋut akoruo kamake, komam ŋes ejeni.
Itejenuni aiturokin naka Isirael kakonyeneke:
Kwabo mam apotu koboŋut mama ejai EJAKAIT Ekecedeke,
Karaida amoot ŋes kanuka ŋun kere.
Esubit Epuraim bala ajele naebaŋaana,
Naemamei aijen:
Iwoneete Misiri, elosete Asuria.
Alatakini kes kwap kwape akweny nuka apak:
Alecori kes, kwape epupunio ekodetekec.
Itukwi kesi! Naarai apaasi kamakaŋ;
Komudiarai, naarai ebucasi kamakaŋ!
Karaida akoto alakun kes,
Konye apotu kasabanakis.
Konye ibwololoete kaperitokec:
Egeras kanuka akima ka ebino,
Kepaliikis ŋol.
Karaida abu eoŋ ketuutoorite, ketogogonite da akecekanin,
Konye itetemonorete ameŋeranut aluikin eoŋ.
Esubito bala akabwa nakaimod:
Ibiroros ikapolokokec kekileŋ,
Kanuka adedeŋ naka aŋajepekec:
Ŋin ŋes aisekeliokec kakwap nako Misiri
Ebuni kwape emorukaalet asurokin etogo loka EJAKAIT:
Naarai ebucasi aitutuketeka,
Adiakasi da ikakisila.
Ekadeke, isio Isirael kijeni jo.
Acaka Isirael ŋin naejok:
Erukio lokasurup ŋes.
Aseut ikapolok, komam eoŋ ajeni:
Eswamaut aputosia nuka epuesakec ka esabukec,
Tetere egelario.
Enepu akanyunyura aluikin kes:
Iwori bo edolokinioto aseganut?
Naarai ebuni ŋin da koIsirael.
Ekeswaman ŋes asubi, mam ŋin erai Edeke:
Eebo, ebilibilun itaok yenika Samaria.
Naarai eyeete ekwam, esakete ca etapipirio:
Emameete ŋes akima karaida atinoi;
Mam ekokuunete aluŋuren;
Konye karaida ekokuunete,
Ilikorete do imo.
Elikor Isirael:
Ejaas kwana kotoma atekerin
Kwape ibore yenimam isiyalamikinit.
Eropi Epuraim ipaelon.
Kwana atukonokini eoŋ kes;
Tetere epalarete nediokasilon
Kainyonyoikin ekabaka ka ikapolok akinyet.
Naarai asub Epuraim itemwan luipu adiakia,
Eraas mamake itemwan luka aidiak.
Imarakinitai araut lukimo.
Eminasi asuban;
Einakinete asuban nuka akiriŋ, enyamete da;
Konye mam EJAKAIT ecamuni kes:
Iituni kwana numam adolitekec, Iticani kanuka aronisiokec;
Eboŋorete kesi Misiri.
Abu koduk itogoi lukapolou;
Eyatak Yuda ireria luebwaitai:
Konye ejukakini eoŋ akim oreriake,
Idopori itogoi luegogoŋ.
Sirikibwoŋ kailel, ijo Isirael! Kwape atekerin;
Naarai iporo ijo ainyein Ekonideke,
Imina aropio kaŋolipejal.
Mam epejal ka acuet nakebino itanyamete kes,
Emamikini ŋes ebino lokitetet.
Konye eboŋori Epuraim Misiri,
Enyamete inyamat lumam elaete koAsuria.
Mam akecesuban isiyalamikinete ŋes;
Eraun atapakec kwape atap naka aibworo;
Luenyamete ŋes kere emunaunos:
Naarai atapakec erai kanuka eteŋei bon:
Mam itolomario togo loka EJAKAIT.
Anyoika bo nuiswamaete yesi kapaaran naka atukokinet nakaiyamakina,
Kapaaran da naka epucit loka EJAKAIT?
Naarai koany, aekasi kamudiario,
Etukokini Misiri kes, idai Memipis kes:
Irumete iduanin ikeceboro luisiyalamikinete luka epuesa:
Elomunete ikukwa owemanakec.
Adolut apaarasia nuka aitepesenio;
Ejenuni Isirael:
Ebaŋaana enabi, ekerepiki da ituŋanan yenejai emoyo,
Kanu ipuatar numam adolitekon,
Naarai epol asurup.
Enabi ŋes ekedaran loka Epuraim,
Ituŋa luka Ekadeke,
Konye ejai atacit naka ekalokan-akweny orotinike kere,
Asurup da togo loka Ekedeke.
Iituni ŋesi numam adolitekec,
Iticani kanuka aronisiokec.
Kaany lukapapaakus kwape nugeet nuka etini kokaruke losodit:
Konye apotu kopotu Baal-peor,
Kotiakakinos mama ejaas ileic,
Koraut luketale kwape Ŋin yenikeminas.
Eporori aibuses naka Epuraim kwape kakweny;
Emameun aur, ka nuejaas kakoikes, ka nuepotuunete da.
Komam ituŋanan ideun;
Eeba, itukwi kes naanyounio kamakec!
Kwape kaanyunia, elosikinito odwe luka Epuraim araun lumejauna:
Ibusakinit Epuraim aitolomun odweke aario.
Anyoika nuiinakini?
Koinak kes akoik naelomuni kiŋa, ka ikisin lucokito.
Ejai aronisikec kere Giligal;
Kaŋina ber kalai kes:
Kanuka aronis naka aswamisiokec
Ereŋeari kes kotogoka:
Mam bobo amina kes;
Ipalioko ikapolokokec kere.
Inomio Epuraim, erinyor aliasitikec,
Mam eraete araito;
Eebo, karaida euriete,
Aari eoŋ idwekec luminan.
Naarai mam apotu kopuputu ŋes:
Eraunos ikejobirak kotoma atekerin.
Erai Isirael emusabibu loigananai,
Loijaikini akeraito:
Kwape epuatar araitoke, eyatanak ŋesi
kwape kwaŋin itemwanake:
Kwape ajokuunia akwapuke, etojokia kwape kwaŋin ipirinoke.
Iŋalas ikecetauon; Kwana kitelekasi akiro:
Ebili ŋesi itemwanakec, Emudiari ipirinokec.
Abeit ebalasi ebe, “Emamei oni ekabaka:
Naarai mam kiyoŋit EJAKAIT;
Ekabaka da, anyoika nuepedori ŋesi aiswamakin oni?”
Inerasi akiro nuutai,
Iyapoete nuka aiŋal itutukete aitutuketa:
Tape elomuni etube kwape eduan lokaisorit
Kaloboi nuka emanikor.
Kanuka itaok yenika Bet-aben:
Naarai ibworos iketuŋa ŋes,
Edelorete ikesasedotin kanuke,
Naarai anyou aibusesuke kamakeŋ.
Araun ainakinet naka ekabaka Yareb:
Irumete Epuraim ileic,
Ileicikini da Isirael ainerunike.
Samaria da, egelario ekabakake,
Kwape akuletait naka akito kakipi.
Aronis naka Isirael:
Elomuni ekukwai ka esukukurut kotemwanakec;
Ebalasi kesi iroŋan ebe, Koraparai sio;
Ka iukon da ebe, Kibirunos mamakosi.
Apotu kobwaata kaŋina;
Kinyek ejie adolokin idwe luka numam adolit koGibea.
Etukokinos ituŋa asurokin kes,
Naelecorere kanuka adiaketakec aarei.
Erai Epuraim ataok naetuutoorio,
Naemina aicom;
Abu kaleleŋite emurisiŋike loitemelel:
Konye kwana ebwaikini Epuraim ajookot;
Ekoriei Yuda, etwai Yakob.
Kosakata araito nuka amin;
Kilobos alup nuiyeŋito,
Naarai adol apak amoot EJAKAIT,
Aitodol naebunio ŋesi aisitepikini yes adolit.
Isakata numam adolit;
Inyamata araito nuka aiŋalanut;
Naarai ipotu komunokinos ekusirot,
Ka aipues da naka ikiriginikus.
Eŋatario ireriakon kere luegogoŋ,
Kwape keŋataria Saluman Bet-arabel kapaaran naka ejie:
Ipicipicitai nukatoto ka idwekec.
Wu ekek loka Isirael, kikwaikinio yes kwaŋin,
Kanuka aronisikon naepol noi:
Egelario cut ekabaka loka Isirael ecila kide.
Kanyarau ikakoku anyoun koMisiri.
Kwape kwaŋin ekunyariata;
Koinanakinete Ibaalim asuban,
Kisupuronokinete lukisupurununo aputosia nuegerer.
Katunite kes kakaninika;
Konye mam apotu kojenut ebe etaŋaleu kes.
Kasubite kama ejaas bala ŋul luelacete arukana kabokonyakec,
Kebwaik inyamat kakonyenekec.
Konye eraun Eyasuriat ekabakakec,
Naarai aŋeroto aboŋun mamakaŋ.
Edoikini ekileŋ oreriake,
Enyami da atiketake kodau,
Kanuka ainerunikec bonik.
Abolosi ikatuŋa itauon ajurusiar anyoun kaneajai:
Karaida kenyaritai neejai ŋol loejai kuju,
Mam idio da yenecamunit aitopoloor.
Kakorakini biai, Isirael?
Ketuluori jo biai bala Aduma?
Kebwaikini biai bala Seboim?
Ebelokin ekatau kotoma, anoku akaitim.
Mam aboŋuni amudiar Epuraim:
Naarai arai eoŋ Edeke, kwabo mam arai etuŋanan;
Ekalaunan loejai kidiŋikon:
Mam abuni amudiar.
Etuparete rwaru EJAKAIT,
Loegatuni bala eŋatuny;
Naarai egatuni, epote da idwe emaranete koto.
Epote emaranete kwape akweny naebuni ko Misiri,
Kwape ebunio ajele kakwap naka Asuria;
Ido inera EJAKAIT ebe,
Esiboikini kes otogoikec.
Kesirimorit eoŋ Epuraim kaiŋal,
Ka ekek da loka Isirael kaimod:
Konye eroko Yuda igesitoi kaneejai Edeke,
Ido erai lomunot kaneejai Ekalaunan.
Etupit ekwam lokokide:
Iyatanakini tiritir aiŋal ka aimod;
Itutukete kAsuria, eyaŋaario akinyet Misiri.
Ejai EJAKAIT aŋolopa ka Yuda,
Iticani Yakob kwape ejaatar iponesioke;
Itepeseni ŋes kwape ejaatar aswamisioke.
Ido kekuruŋan koutas ka Edeke:
Komony akiyo, kiŋaiŋa ŋes:
Kiriamunos ka Edeke koBet-el,
Kaŋina da kinera Edeke kaŋes.
Ŋes EJAKAIT, Edeke loka ajoresio;
EJAKAIT ŋes ekekiror.
Aso do kibelokin ijo mama ejai Ekonideke;
Koricite aitim ka etube,
Kidareununei tiritir Ekonideke.
Ekagwelanaran, itiŋit ainiŋesio nuka aiŋal kakanike:
Emina aimod.
Abala Epuraim ebe, “Abeit abar eoŋ, adum abar”:
Konye mam abarake kere edauni aronis naadiaka ŋesi.
Anyoun kakwap nako Misiri;
Esiboikini bobo yes oweman,
Kwape kapaarasia nuka epucit lokaiyamakina.
Abu eoŋ kener da kinabin,
Eoŋ ŋes eyatakini aitapoeta,
Kainak awaragasia kama ka inabin.
Abeit eraunos aamameak;
Arai einakinete imoŋin lutoba koGiligal,
Eraunos itemwanakec atukon nuka amor
Kaloboi nuka emanikor.
Kijaanak Isirael adumunia aberu,
Kicokiei amerekekin adumunia aberu.
Kidarenenei enabi kes.
Kanuka ŋun kobeata ŋes akeokot,
Inyakakini EJAKAIT ŋes akemorosit.
Kitopoloor koIsirael;
Konye nakegwaunia akirot kanuka Baal, kotwana.
Kwana da iyatanakinos adiakanar,
Eswamaut aputosia nuecalara nuka epuesakec,
Kes aputosia kwape ejaar aijenikec,
Kes kete aswam naka luepiriaka:
Enerasi nukec ebe,
Konuata ca ituŋa lueinakinete asuban itak.
Kanuka ŋun eraunos kwape elisina loka atupuruc
Kwape akopyo nuisunyito ailicar,
Kwape agugu nuekutari etapipirio kopejal,
Kwape apuru da naelomuni kapedot.
Konye arai eoŋ EJAKAIT Ekonideke
Anyoun kakwap nako Misiri;
Mam ijeni ecedeke dimarai eoŋ,
Emamei da ecetjaemar eoŋ ekal
Kakwap naka akure naepol.
Kwape kedakananatar kimonianakinos;
Kimonikinos kitopoloor ekecetau:
Tape imurwokinete eoŋ.
Kanuka ŋun araun eoŋ kwape eŋatuny kamakec:
Edari korot kwape eris:
Kiriamakin kakes kwape adubu naademaritai idweke, Apoopooi atorobukec:
Kaŋina da anyami kes kwape eŋatuny;
Epoopooi kes etiaŋ loka ais.
Kamudiari jo, Isirael;
Iŋai bo kiŋarakini?
Ka ikatubokokon da luibala ijo ebe,
“Koinakinai eoŋ ekabaka ka ikapolok?”
Abu kalema kes kaisiopoka.
Iŋadakinitai akeronis.
Ebunokini ŋes ariebo naka aberu naidouni;
Erai okoku loemamei acoa;
Naarai kwana iyapi airukum okek loka akoik.
Alakuni kereka kes katwanare?
Wu jo atwanare, ai bo ejai atularikon?
Wu jo ates ai bo ejai amudiarikon?
Ibwaitai aitoronikin kakonyeneka.
Karaida euriara ŋesi koinacanake,
Ebuni ekwam lokokide,
Ekwam loka EJAKAIT loebuni kamodiŋ,
Eonikini atanike, eonikini da ecoake:
Eŋatari ŋesi aiŋadisia nuka iboro kere luisiyalamikinito.
Naarai ipaliikinit Ekedeke:
Etwakete kekileŋ;
Ipicipicio imukerunukec,
Eŋerereo aŋorokec nuepotiet
Naarai ibiror kanumam adolitekon.
Kolimok ŋes ebe, “Kolema numam adolit kere,
Kocam nuejok:
Kasodete isio ainakin aiturit naka aitukekosi.
Mam Asuria kitajari sio:
Mam bobo kibwaneni ibalasin:
Ido mam bobo kilimokini aswam naka akaninikosi ebe, ‘Yes ikosidekesio.’
Naarai kotomakon ŋes edumuniata ikokiok aitim.”
Etaŋaleuni eoŋ akecejurusianar kau,
Amina kes atitai:
Naarai ebelokin akanyunyura kamakec.
Araun eoŋ kwape akopyo mama ejai Isirael:
Ituroi kwape aapecel,
Isiarakini akelias kwape Lebanon.
Igananaete atenunake,
Ajokisike da eputokini eseitun,
Auresike kwape Lebanon.
Eboŋunete ŋul luiboiete otolimike;
Ikwarunete kwape akima,
Ituroete kwape emusabibu:
Eraun auresike kwape ebino loka Lebanon.
Aboŋokini eoŋ, aseseni da ŋes:
Arai eoŋ kwape eberos loepalal;
Kamakaŋ ŋes idumununia araitokon.
Yenicobe da kojenu kes,
Naarai itenara irotin luka EJAKAIT,
Itorenenete da ikadolitok tomakec;
Konye iguikinete luepaarete.
Kitoikis aki yes kere luiboiete kakwap.
Abu kereka na kojaun kapaarasiakus,
Arai bo kapaarasia nuka lukapapakus?
Ikusidwe da kolimokis idwekec,
Ka idwekec da atur ace.
Luedeuni ogagul, anyam emaase;
Luedeuni emaase anyam enyede;
Luedeuni enyede anyam ekutelek.
Kodelosi, yes kere ikamatak ajon, Kanuka ajon nuwinyiwiny;
Naarai ademaritai kaitukekus.
Naegogoŋ, namam imario;
Esubito ikelake bala ikela luka eŋatuny,
Ejaas itirikada luka aŋatuny.
Erega cut, acaka; Etwakaŋ atenunake.
Kanuka okilenike loka atumunike.
Kotogo loka EJAKAIT;
Ibworos isasedotin,
Ikejaanakinak luka EJAKAIT.
Naarai eswapata akima,
Aoko ajon nukitetiak,
Eŋoŋar akinyet.
Kodelosi, okwe yes ikacapak imusabibun,
Kanuka akima ka esairi;
Naarai aolio aidweny naka emanikor.
Arinyoto ekamamaga, ka eidukudukut,
ka emucugwa, Ikito kere da lukomanikor:
Naarai arinyo ailel kodwe luka ituŋa.
Kodelosi, yes ikejaanakinak luka etem.
Kopotu, koperoto opukoi akuare kia,
Yes ikejaanakinak luka Ekadeke:
Naarai imikitai ainakinet naka akiria ka ainakinet namatat,
Kotogo loka Edekekus.
Kotukonokinos imakio ka luiboiete kakwap kere
Kotogo loka EJAKAIT Ekusideke,
Komonyata mama ejai EJAKAIT.
Naarai aapu apaaran naka EJAKAIT,
Ebuni kwape amudiar kaneejai Lokapedor kere.
Eebo, ailel ka aiyalama kotogo loka Edekewok?
Ebosete ikinyom kaloboi; Esilioros idulai,
Ebilio itujai;
Naarai arinyoto akima.
Ejuruŋuŋito isipanin luka ibaren,
Naarai emameete kes inya luedakas;
Eebo, itisilio isipanin luka amerekekin.
Wu EJAKAIT, amonyi eoŋ mama ijai:
Naarai edopo akim ironyia luka amodiŋ,
Ecweata aipelonoreta ikito kere luka ais.
Naarai aokoto icileta luka akipi,
Edopo akim ironyia luka amodiŋ.
Kilalaata komoruka lokalaunan;
Komaranata kere luiboiete kakwap:
Naarai ebunit apaaran naka EJAKAIT, naarai aapu:
Apaaran naka idouon ka amuton naejesi cucucuc,
Kwape ecilar kide koroŋan;
Etuŋat loepol loegogoŋ,
Ageun apeŋo amamei loaputos kaŋol,
Mam rwaru bobo ejaun lueputos kakes,
Kiton ikar luka aturio nuipu.
Kokaukec da enokete aipelonoreta,
Esubit akwap bala emanikor loka Eden koiŋarenekec,
Kokaukec da amodiŋ nailaroŋoŋ;
Eebo, emamei da loabu koku kamakec.
Ekerete kwape ikebwanenok.
Esomanaros kwape ecelet loka agalin,
Kaidiasia nuka iroŋan,
Kwape ecelet loka aipelonoreta nuka akim Naidopori ariaŋ,
Kwape ituŋa lukagogoŋ luiderakinos ejie.
Ijulakinos akonyenekec kere.
Ekerete kwape ituŋa lukirigin;
Edokete arwatat kwape ikajiok;
Eraci ŋinituŋanan korotoke,
Komam ijeranakinos.
Mam ediopet eremori loce;
Eraci ŋinidiopet korotoke:
Etiakete kesi lujiis komam itikokinio.
Esomanaros ore;
Ekerete karwatat;
Edokanarete otogoi;
Elomanarete kadirisan kwape ekokolan.
Emarani akuj.
Amutonor akoloŋ ka elap,
Enyakasi aacer aicakec.
Naarai ipu iidukurunuke;
Naarai egogoŋ ŋesi loitodoli akekirot:
Naarai epol apaaran naka EJAKAIT, nakaŋosibib naepol;
Iŋai bo epedori abwoikin?
Kitauonokus kere,
Kailuŋ, ka aimony akiyo, ka aibworo:
Kibelokinos mama ejai EJAKAIT Ekusideke:
Naarai esiana ŋesi, ileleba aitim,
Iyapi anyunyurikin, ebarara aitim, Iituni kinyek aronis.
Iituni, inyeini arereŋ kokauke,
Ainakinet naka akiria ka ainakinet namatat da
Mama ejai EJAKAIT Ekusideke?
Kokuta arupepe koSion, Kitalaut ailuŋ,
Konyarautu atukonokin nakalaunan;
Kitalaut ekodet,
Kinotut imakio,
Kotukonokis idwe,
Ka luenakete ikisin:
Kolom eteran kagolake,
Ka ateran da kotoma igolake.
Ikejaanakinak luka EJAKAIT,
Kokidiŋ kaneelomarere ka etem,
Kotemasi atiar, “Kideu ikonituŋa, wu EJAKAIT,
Sirikiinak airumetekon araun amorosit,
Ka agaracio kotoma atekerin:
Kanukinyo etemariata kesi katekerin ebe,
‘Ai bo ejai Ekecedeke?’ ”
Kitim iketuŋa.
“Koany, kejukakini yes
Akima ka ebino, ka akinyet, Kisimonete yes:
Mam bobo ketarauni yes amorosit katekerin.
Ajore naka agolitomei,
Ereŋeari ŋes akwap nailaroŋoŋ, naesil,
Ikeŋarenokoke kotoma aŋolol nakokide,
Ka ikagolokoke kotoma aŋolol nakoto;
Elomuni auresike,
Elomuni da abosusuke naeur tulutul,
Naarai eswama nuepolok.
Naarai eswama EJAKAIT nuepolok.
Naarai ebwaŋunete ironyia luka amodiŋ,
Naarai erai ekitoi araitoke,
Ejaikini etini ka emusabibu agogoŋukec.
Kolakaros kotoma EJAKAIT Ekusideke:
Naarai kiinakini ŋesi akiru naka aiporo naedolit,
Isitepakini yes akiru,
Akiru naka aiporo, ka akiru naka akamu,
Kwape lem sek.
“Ilelebunos ipejala akima,
Ilapanaros ebino ka akinyet kotoma akaalakanya.
Enyakakini eoŋ yes ikar luanyam emaase,
Ka enyede, ka ekutelek, ka ogagul,
Akajore naepol naejukunit mamakus.
Iturete ekiror loka EJAKAIT Ekusideke,
Lokiswamak yes nukaumokin:
Mam bobo ikatuŋa ileicikinete.
Eoŋ arai EJAKAIT Ekusideke, emamei ece kere:
Mam bobo ikatuŋa ileicikinete.
Abukokini ekamoyo kere luejaas awat,
Edwarete idwekus lusap ka lupesur,
Irujaete ikusimakio airujasia,
Eanyunete ikusikatumunak aitapoeta.
Abukokini ekamoyo obulesin ka abulesin.
Eluor akoloŋ amuton, ka elap da araun aokot, koriŋa edoluno apaaran nakos ka nakaŋosibib naka EJAKAIT.
Kosodi kanen, itajaruunos kere luiwoneete ekiror loka EJAKAIT; naarai komoru Sion ka Yerusalem ejaunete luekuete, kwape enerar EJAKAIT, kotoma aatoŋot da ŋul luenyarauni EJAKAIT.
“Naarai, koany, kapaarasia kakwa, kapak kaya da, naenyakunia luejoreoritai luka Yuda ka Yerusalem,
atukonokini atekerin kere, ayauni kes aditot naka Yekosapat; apurokini kakes kanuka ikatuŋa ka akairumet Isirael, luapotu kesi kisiarakis katekerin, ka akorokor da akakwap.
Apotu kilamilamata eroet kanuka ikatuŋa: ainakis esapat itia naadote, agwelasi apese itia ajon, tetere kes emasete.
Naarai ipotu koyaŋaasi epuesaka, ka esabuka, kodakasi iboroka luejok luisiyalamikinito abilaikus.
Ipotu kogwelasi da idwe luka Yuda ka idwe luka Yerusalem mama ejaas Iyonanin, tetere eyaŋaarete kes kama elwana koikorunokec.
Koany, esidiki kes aitonyoun kaibois naipotu kogwelas kes, enyakakini nuipotu kiswamata akwesikus.
Agwelari ikusidwe lusap ka lupesur akanin nuka idwe luka Yuda, kes da egwelarete kes mama ejaas ituŋa luka Seba, ateker naelwana: naarai ener EJAKAIT.”
Kolimonokis ŋun katekerin;
Kokapakinos ejie;
Kisidikis ituŋa lukirigin;
Kikunyutu ikajiok kere, kopotu.
Ka ieilikikinikus lukidimet aituluor akwaras:
Kolimok loenonok ebe, “Agogoŋ eoŋ.”
Kisunyito yesi, kopotu,
Yes atekerin kere nuirimorito, Kotukonokinos:
Kitodok ikagogoŋokokon, wu EJAKAIT.
Kopotu aditot naka Yekosapat;
Naarai eboikin kanen
Atubokin atekerin kere nuirimorito.
Kopotu kipudapudata, naarai ileleba aicues.
Ilapanaros akaalakanya,
Naarai epol aronisikec.
Ikodeta, ikodeta, kotoma aditot naka etube!
Naarai eapiei apaaran naka EJAKAIT,
Kaditot naka etube.
Amutonor akoloŋ ka elap,
Enyakasi da aacer aicakec.
Elimuni ekeporoto koYerusalem;
Ijaŋijaŋun akuj ka akwap,
Konye eraun EJAKAIT aŋopis naka ituŋake,
Ka abwas da mama ejaas idwe luka Isirael.
Loeboie koSion emoruka lokalaunan.
Kosodi Yerusalem araun lokalaunan,
Mam bobo imo itorete tomake.
Idonete iroŋan ebino loewiny,
Eleleete iukon akile,
Eleleete da aguuruto kere nuka Yuda akipi;
Elomuni atan kotogo loka EJAKAIT,
Naisinauni aditot naka Sitim.
“Esilior Misiri,
Eraun Edom da amodiŋ naesil,
Kanuka nukadedeŋ nueswamakinitai idwe luka Yuda,
Naarai abukosi aokot numam aronis kakwapukec.
Konye iboienenei Yuda ikar kere,
Ka Yerusalem da kiton aturio kere.
Etesegi eoŋ aokotokec numam etesegaarit,
Naarai iboie EJAKAIT ko Sion.”
Kotema atiar:
“Egatuni EJAKAIT koSion,
Elimuni ekeporoto koYerusalem;
Ibworos ironyia luka ikecokok,
Erinyori aidi naka Karumel.”
“Kanuka aibucareta auni nuka Damasiko,
Eebo, kanuka aoŋon, mam ejulakini aiticanioke;
Naarai apotu kieomata Gilead
Kiboro lukicomis luka asua.
Konye ejukakini akim togo loka Kasael,
Idopori itogoi lukapolou luka Ben-kadad.”
“Abili eoŋ atiket naka Damasiko,
Agelari luiboiete kaditot naka Aben,
Ka ŋol da loitiŋit ebela loka ajakanut kotogo loka Eden:
Ijoreorio ituŋa luka Suria kiton Kir.”
“Kanuka aibucareta auni nuka Gasa,
Eebo, kanuka aoŋon, mam ejulakini aiticanioke;
Naarai ejoreosi ituŋa kere,
Aijaikin kes Edom.
Idopori itogoike lukapolou.”
Ebala EJAKAIT Edeke ebe,
“Agelari luiboiete koAsudod,
Ka ŋol da loitiŋit ebela loka ajakanut koAsukelon;
Ebelokini akanika asurokin Ekuron,
Eoliori aatoŋot naka Ipilisitian.”
“Kanuka aibucareta auni nuka Turo,
Eebo, kanuka aoŋon, mam ejulakini aiticanioke:
Naarai apotu kijaikis Edom ituŋa kere,
Mam apotu kiitutu aitutuket naka einacane.
Konye ejukakini akim arwatat naka Turo,
Idopori itogoike lukapolou.”
“Kanuka aibucareta auni nuka Edom,
Eebo, kanuka aoŋon, mam ejulakini aiticanioke;
Naarai abu korukitor onaceke kekileŋ,
Kocaka aitim kere,
Koresianar akeisiop tiritir,
Koric akenyunyura ikar kere.
Konye ejukakini eoŋ Teman akim,
Idopori itogoi lukapolou luka Bosura.”
“Kanuka aibucareta auni nuka idwe luka Amon,
Eebo, kanuka aoŋon, mam ejulakini aiticanioke;
Naarai apotu koŋerereata aŋor nuepotiete nuka Gilead,
Tetere italalaete eikorukec.
Idopori itogoike lukapolou,
Kecelet kapaaran naka ejie,
Ka ekwam da kapaaran naka etapipirio.”
“Elosi ekabakakec aijoreorio,
ŋes nepepe ka ikapolokoke kere.”
“Kanuka aibucareta auni nuka Moab,
Eebo, kanuka aoŋon, mam ejulakini aiticanioke;
Naarai abu kicwe akojo nuka ekabaka loka Edom koraut ekurwon.
Idopori itogoi lukapolou luka Keriot;
Etwani Moab kelulu ka ecelet,
Ka eporoto da loka arupepe.”
“Agelari ekatubon kokidiŋike,
Aari ikapolokoke kere nepepe kaŋes.”
“Kanuka aibucareta auni nuka Yuda,
Eebo, kanuka aoŋon, mam ejulakini aiticanioke;
Naarai aŋeroto ekisil loka EJAKAIT,
Mam apotu koricito akeicorakineta,
Kitapaa kes aiŋalakec,
Naatupenenete lukapapaakec.
Idopori itogoi lukapolou luka Yerusalem.”
“Kanuka aibucareta auni nuka Isirael,
Eebo, kanuka aoŋon, mam ejulakini aiticanioke;
Naarai egwelanarete ikadoliton kanuka epuesa,
Ka yenikican da kanuka amuk.
Lueremorete awai erot loka luitasonos:
Elomanarete etuŋanan ka papake mama ejai apese,
Aitisil ekakiror lokalaunan.
Ido toma togo loka Edekekec emasete ebino
Loka ŋul luaponi kitegelai.
Kosubite akeojau bala aojau naka iresia,
Kogogoŋ bala iluan;
Konye abu kamudia araitoke kokuju,
Ka aliasike da kokwap.
Ido abu eoŋ ketolom yes kakwap nako Misiri,
Keŋarenik yes ikar akaisaoŋon kamodiŋ,
Aisurum akwap naka Emorait.
Ikusikatumunak da araun Inasirin.”
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe,
“Wu yes idwe luka Isirael,
Mam kereka ekote nen?
Ipotu kicorakis inabin ebe, ‘Sirikidwarata.’
“Koany, aridakini yes kaiboisikus,
Kwape eridakinor agali naileleba iisutan.
Etwaniari loetirono aŋopis,
Mam lokagogoŋon itogogoŋi akegogoŋ,
Karaida lokirigi aitajar akeijar.
Loikesi akabwa mam ebwoi;
Loetirono kakeje da mam eyuuni bon:
Loibwaneni ebalasit da mam itajari akeijar.”
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe,
“Ŋol da loetitiŋ kotoma lukirigin
Ekeri emujalal kapaaran kaŋin.”
Kiirasi akirot na nakinerak yes EJAKAIT, wu idwe luka Isirael, ka ajen kere naetonyouni alemun kakwap nako Misiri kabala ebe:
ŋes keticania yes kanuka numam adolitekus kere.
“Epedorete kereka iarei aup,
Arai mam imorikikina?
Egat kereka eŋatuny kamagoro,
Komam emejaunit?
Ikuna kereka iŋatuny kotoma abuake,
Arai mam ikamunit ibore?
Epedori kereka akweny aipok kokwap,
Komam elokitai elabwata?
Ejetakin kereka aloket kokwap,
Arai mam ipokit ibore?
Komam ituŋa ekuriakaros?
Edoikin kereka aronis ore,
Arai mam EJAKAIT eyaŋaunit?
Dimarai epukokinit ikebulesin inabin akeiyeiyea.
Iŋai bo mam ekurianar?
Ener EJAKAIT Edeke,
Iŋai bo ekurwokini aidwar?”
Kolimonosi kotogoi luka Asudod,
Kotogoi da kakwap nako Misiri,
Kineras atiar, “Kotukonokinos koroŋan luka Samaria,
Koanyut iceleta luetia nen luejaas toma,
Ka imwaŋito da kwape ejaatar kidiŋ nen.”
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe,
“Naarai mam ejenete aswam naejok,
ŋul luiŋadaete epali ka aiŋat kotogoikec.”
