“Ejaun lokasurup, airiamar akwap iwaitin kere:
Itojoni akonigogoŋ,
Eŋasio da ikonitogoi lukapolou.”

Inera kwanata EJAKAIT ebe: “Kwape edemunia ekecokon akeje aarei arai itutubet yenikakit kaituk naka eŋatuny; eyuunio kwaŋin idwe luka Isirael luiboiete koSamaria kotoma agor naka aperis, ka aicoloŋisio nuka aliiri nukotut.”
Inera EJAKAIT Edeke, Edeke loka ajoresio ebe:
“Kiirasi, koraut ikajenak kokek loka Yakob.
Eticani da itemwan luka Bet-el,
Ejepio da amumwar nuka etem,
Kibirokinos kwap.”
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe,
“Atiyakini etogo loka aiporo, ka etogo da loka akamu;
Eoliorete itogoi luka ikel luka etom,
Enaŋete da itogoi lukapolou.”
“Kopupokis akirot na, yes aituk nuka Basan,
Nuejaas oronot loka Samaria,
Nueroikinito lukican, nueeuete luilwaritos,
Nuebalas ijakakec ebe, ‘Koyautu, kamata!’
Abu EJAKAIT Edeke kiyapo kolimit alauniteke ebe,
Koany, kibunokinete yes apaarasia,
Kilemario kigolun,
Ka nuedeunos kayesi kilemario kigolun luka ikalokak.”
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, “Ilomarete karorwaitin,
Ŋinidiopet kakonyeneke,
Kiremokinio Karumon.
Giligal da, kiyatanakis aidiak;
Koyaununut asubanakus ŋinitupuruc,
Ka idiopet kaŋulutomon ŋunupaarasia auni.
Kolimosi ainakineta nuka akote korama kes.”
Ebala EJAKAIT Edeke ebe,
“Naarai ŋun kitojokito yesi, wu yes idwe luka Isirael.”
“Kainak eoŋ yes alaunit naka ikel koreriakus kere,
Ka amamus da inyamat kaiboisiokus kere:
Kwabo mam ipotu koboŋut neajai eoŋ.”
“Etikok eoŋ da akiru kamakus,
Koroko esalito ilapio iuni adolokin aisak:
Esitepanakini ere ediopet,
Mam esitepanakini ere ece;
Kotepenenei akiru aibois adiopet,
Koono da aibois namam etepenenei akiru.
Kirimenenete ireria iarei arai iuni
Mama ejai ere ediopet aimat akipi,
Mam imonianakinos.”
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe,
“Konye mam ipotu koboŋut neajai eoŋ.
Anyam ogagul aipues naka imanikoriakus,
Ka amanatakus nuka emusabibu,
Ka ikitokus da luka itinin ka iseitunun.”
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe:
“Konye mam ipotu koboŋut neajai eoŋ.
“Kejukak yes atular koipone loko Misiri:
Aar ikusikatumunak kekileŋ,
Ayaŋaa ikusibalasin;
Ketodok aures naka iidukurunukus okumesikus.”
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe,
“Konye mam ipotu koboŋut neajai eoŋ.
Kwape ebiroria Edeke Sodom ka Gomora,
Kosubito yesi bala akalas naalemuna kakim.”
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe,
“Konye mam ipotu koboŋut neajai eoŋ.
Ido naarai keswamakini jo ŋun, ijo Isirael,
Kitemokin aisiriama Ekonideke!”
Loelimokini ituŋanan aomisioke,
Loituluori atupuruc amuton,
Loicakacakai da aiboisio nukokuju nuka akwap;
EJAKAIT, Edeke loka ajoresio, ŋes ekekiror.
Naenera eoŋ akuudian jo.
“Ebiror abekot naka Isirael;
Mam enyouni bobo:
Alatakin alupoke;
Emamei yenitonyouni.”
Naarai ebala EJAKAIT Edeke kwanata ebe:
“Ere loalomunia elukumit, Ideunos akwatat,
Ŋol da loalomunia akwatat, Ideunos itomon,
Lukokek loka Isirael.”
“Komoata eoŋ, ijarete;
Karaida alomar Giligal,
Sirikitoroto Beer-seba:
Naarai abeit elosi Giligal aijoreorio,
Epalun Bet-el.”
Komoata EJAKAIT, ijarete;
Kinyek anokun kwape akim kokek loka Yosep,
Idopori komameun yenitudeŋi kobet-el.
Yes luibelokinete etube araun adwaris,
Luicakakinete adolit kwap!
Loibelokini etolim loka atwanare araun atupuruc,
Loitumutonori apaaran kakuare;
Loenyarauni akipi nuka aŋolol,
Ebukokini kes toma akwap;
EJAKAIT ŋes ekekiror.
Eŋesari ŋesi lukagogoŋok katular,
Tetere ebunokini amudiar ere loegogoŋ.
Esacete ŋin yeninera nuitenara.
Itelemete ŋes akima,
Ipotu kodukoto itogoi luka amor nuegerer,
Konye mam iboiete kotoma;
Ipotu kiraata amanat nuejok nuka emusabibu,
Konye mam imasete ebinokec.
Kwape da eiliiliotor aronisiokus;
Yes luiroikinete ikadolitok,
Luitelemenenete ainakineta,
Luiremosi luilwaritos awai korute.
Kanuka ŋun ililiŋi locobe kapak kaŋin;
Naarai erai apak naerono.
Tetere ejaenena EJAKAIT,
Edeke loka ajoresio kayes,
Kwape kibalatar.
Kiticat etube korute:
Motoko kosianak EJAKAIT,
Edeke loka ajoresio,
Aatoŋot naka Yosep,
“Ejaun aimony toma asisiarin kere nuelalak;
Ebalasi kotoma orotin kere ebe,
‘Wu okwe! Wu okwe!’
Enyaraunete ekakorion aibworo,
Ka ŋul da luepiriaka akuudian, aimony.”
“Ejaun teni aimony amanat kere nuka emusabibu:
Naarai etori eoŋ kidiŋikus.”
Kanukinyo ikototor apaaran naka EJAKAIT?
Erai kereka amuton, kwabo mere aica.
Bala ekeri etuŋanan kama keŋatuny, Kiriamas kedubu;
Arai elomari togo kogoŋakin akan arwatat, Kokonyi ŋes emun.
Mam kereka apaaran naka EJAKAIT eraun amuton,
Kwabo mere aica?
Amuton naejesi cucucuc,
Naemamei amwekimwek kotoma?
Kwabo mam esiyalamikinit atukonokinetakus nukaiyamakina.
Eebo, karaida iinakinete eoŋ ainakinetakus nuicweio ka ainakineta nuka akiria,
Mam acamuni kes:
Mam da etei ainakinetakus nuka ainapakin
Nuka itiaŋikus luetarioko.
Kolema ca ijo eporoto loka ikososineikon;
Naarai aŋeri apupun aruo naka adeudeunokon.
Konye kolelei etube kwape akipi,
Ka adolit da kwape aguurut naelelei ikar kere.
Eebo, ipotu kodakata Sikut ekabakakus ka Kaiwan aputosiakus, aacerit naka edekekus, loipotu kiswamaut.”
Ebala EJAKAIT, loerai ekekiror Edeke loka ajoresio ebe, “Kanuka ŋun, ainakini yes aijoreoreo juwai Damasiko.”
“Itukwi kes luebwalara koSion,
Ka kes da luijamamaete koroŋat loka Samaria,
Luejenas luka nakapolon naka atekerin,
Luepote lukokek loka Isirael mamakec!
Koloto anyoun kanen kiton Kamat lokapolon:
Kosodete koloto Gat loka Ipilisitian:
Ejokuka kereka kesi aitelekarit ajakanuto nu?
Arai ca epol eikorukec aitelekarit eikorukus.
Luisukunyunete eicoloŋ loka akaje?
Itukwi lueperete oitadan luka ikel luka etom,
Luerioros kotutiokec,
Luenyamete imerekekin ludidik lulemuna kosipan,
Ka itak lulemuna kauj;
Lueyeete ikososinei luutai koramete adeudeu;
Luepwakunete bonik iboro lueruos kwape Daudi;
Luemasete ebino kotoma atanya,
Luinyonyoanakinos akinyet naejok aitelekar kere;
Konye mam ekadakinete aiticanio naka Yosep!
Aso kanuka ŋun ijoreorio kotoma lusodit kaluijoreorio,
Eoliori eibwoŋ loka ŋul kaluapotu korioros.”
Eyapo EJAKAIT Edeke elimit elopet,
Ebala EJAKAIT Edeke loka ajoresio ebe:
“Asaci apolou naka Yakob, Alait itogoike lukapolou:
Kanuka ŋun ejaikini ere ka luejaas toma kere.”
Kosodi kanen, arai edeunos ituŋa itomon togo ediopet, etwakete.

Nakedakaria papake lodidi, ŋol loiewei ŋes, aitolomun akojo kina ketogo etemari ŋesi ŋol loejai to ketogo atiar, “Eroko idio ejai kajo?” Ebala ŋesi ebe, “Mam,” Kosodi ŋesi atemar atiar, “Kililiŋ: naarai mam kibusakinit oni alimor ekiror loka EJAKAIT.”
Naarai koany, icorakini EJAKAIT,
etiyakin etogo lokapolon emunyumunyuun,
ka etogo lodidi da, ebilibiluun.
Ekerete kereka ibalasin katiiba?
Ekoriei kereka ituŋanan nen kimoŋin?
Konye ipotu yesi kijulakis etube araun epiu,
Ka araito nuka adolit da araun adwaris.
Yes luisiyalamikinete aamameak,
Luibalas ebe, “Mam kereka kipou kademutu amumwara kagogoŋukosi?”
“Ijo ekek loka Isirael, adakakini ateker asurokin yes:
Iroikinete kesi yes anyoun kaneelomarere Kamat,
Kiton Aguurut naka Araba.”
Abu Ejakait EDEKE ketodik kwanata: ido koany, kosub ŋesi emaase kageunet naka alomun naka alibun nakokau; ido koany arai alibun nakokau kedau ekabaka aiŋer anyake.
Kosodi kanen kedau emaase ainyam anya nuka akwap, kasodi eoŋ atemar atiar,
“Wu Ejakait EDEKE, keŋaiŋait, kisioni!
Ikwaikini do ai Yakob ebwoi?
Naarai edit ŋesi!”
Kobala EJAKAIT ebe, “Mam ejauni.”
Abu Ejakait EDEKE ketodik kwanata: ido koany, kiworo Ejakait EDEKE etube loka akim; kidopoo ataro naepol, kouta aiŋiny akwap.
Kasodi eoŋ atemar atiar,
“Wu Ejakait EDEKE, keŋaiŋait, kinyek!
Ikwaikini do ai Yakob ebwoi?
Naarai edit ŋesi!”
Kobala Ejakait EDEKE ebe, “Mam ŋin da ejauni.”
Abu ŋesi ketodik kwanata: ido koany, ebwoi EJAKAIT eiduny karwatat naadukio kebiriji, itiŋit ebiriji kakanike.
Katema EJAKAIT eoŋ atiar, “Amos, iany inyo?” Kabala ebe, “Ebiriji.” Kosodi EJAKAIT atemar atiar,
“Koany, ebwaikini ebiriji kidiŋ kikatuŋa Isirael;
Mam bobo enaeenenei kes.
Iswapete aiboisio nukalaunak nuka Isirael;
Anyoikini da ekek loka Yeroboam kekileŋ.”
Naarai ebala Amos kwanata ebe,
‘Etwani Yeroboam kekileŋ,
Abeit da ijoreorio Isirael Anyoun kakwapuke.’ ”
Bobo da kotema Amasia Amos atiar, “Ijo ekadwaran, kolot, kokerea akwap naka Yuda, konyam atap kaŋina, kodwara da kaŋina.
Konye sirikidwara bobo koBet-el; naarai ŋes aibois nakalaunan naka ekabaka, erai da etogo loka ekabakane.”
Abu EJAKAIT kalem kameet esipan, katema EJAKAIT atiar, ‘Kolot, kodwarak ikatuŋa Isirael.’
Ibala ijo ebe, ‘Sirikidwar aluikin Isirael,
Sirikilimonok aluikin ekek loka Isaak.’
Eraun akoniberu naadote kotoma ore,
Ibiroros idwekon lusap ka lupesur kekileŋ,
Ekorio alupokon kaitemis;
Ijo da itwanikini akwap namam elai,
Abeit da ijoreorio Isirael anyoun kakwapuke.”
Abu Ejakait EDEKE ketodik kwanata: ido koany, edita loka araito nuka akamu.
Kotema atiar, “Amos, iany inyo?” Katema atiar, “Edita loka araito nuka akamu.” Kosodi EJAKAIT atemar eoŋ atiar,
“Abunok esaŋe ikatuŋa Isirael;
Mam bobo enaeenenei kes.
Ebala EJAKAIT EDEKE ebe,
Eraunos ikososinei luka eyekalu aibwolol kapaaran kaŋin;
Ipu awat nukatwak;
Kaŋiniibois kere ecakanarete kes kiŋa kililiŋete.”
Kiirasi nu, yes luipudapudaete luilwaritos,
Luitananete lukican luka akwap.
Tetere kigwelari akima?
Ka apaaran da nakasabato, Tetere kijaikini akima?
Kitidisiari epa,
Kimoda kainineta nukaiŋal.
Tetere kigweli yenikican kepuesa,
Ka yenilwaritoi kamuk,
Kigwelari da agugu nuka akima.”
“Abeit mam kemurwokin adiopet kaswamisiokec.
Ka ŋinituŋanan da yeniboie kotoma aibworo?
Eebo, enyouni cut kwape Ecor;
Ilapanari kosodi aboŋori bobo kwape Ecor loko Misiri.”
Ecolomari akoloŋ kidiŋ paaran,
Etumutoni akwap toma aica naka apaaran.
Ikososineikus kere akuudian;
Ayauni ipukoi toma aŋabes kere,
Ka epata toma ŋinikou;
Etuluori bala aibworo okoku loteluna,
Esaŋeke bala apaaran naedwar.”
“Epote apaarasia nuejukaria eoŋ ebeli kakwap,
Mere ebeli loka inyamat, karaida akure naka akipi,
Konye loka akiirar akiro nuka EJAKAIT.
Irimete anyoun kaŋolol kiton aŋolol,
Anyoun kagolitomei kiton kide;
Ekerete lailo ka laije amoot akirot naka EJAKAIT,
Komam edumunete.
“Kapaaran kaŋin iiloros abekon nutemel
Ka ikatumunak da kanuka akure.
Ebalas ebe, ‘Kwape ejaria ekonideke, ijo Dan,’
Ido ebe, ‘Kwape ejaria epone loka Beer-seba,’
Ibiroros kesi, mam bobo enyounete.”
Abu kaany EJAKAIT ebwoi eiduny ketem: kotema ŋesi atiar,
“Kinom acuneta, tetere ilokulokunos apeteta:
Kobilibil kes kakwesikec kere;
Aari yenegoli kakesi kekileŋ;
Emameun idiokakesi yenekeri,
Emameun da idiokakesi yenekui.
Elemuni akakan kes kaŋina;
Karaida edokarete kiton akuj,
Etodokuni kes kaŋina da.
Amoi alemun kes kaŋina da;
Karaida ibwaio kes kakonyeneka kwap toma aŋolol,
Ecorakini emun kaŋina, ekonyi kes.
Ecorakini ekileŋ kaŋina, eari kes;
Aseseni kes kakakonye ayaun aronis kwabo mere ajokis.”
Ŋes ŋol loetirori akwap ecalari,
Ibworosi ŋul kere luiboiete kocoma;
Enyouni cut kwape Ecor;
Eboŋori bobo, kwape Ecor loko Misiri.
Ŋes ŋol loedukokini agolaike akuj,
Eticat apetetake kakwap;
Ŋol loenyarauni akipi nuka aŋolol,
Ebukokini kes akwap,
EJAKAIT ŋes ekekiror.
“Yes idwe luka Isirael,
Mam iraas kamakaŋ kwape Itiopian?
Mam kereka ketolomuni Isirael kakwap nako Misiri,
Ka Ipilisitian anyoun koKaputor,
Ka Isurian da koKir?
Amudiari eoŋ ŋes kakwap. Konye ebala EJAKAIT ebe,
Dimarai mam amudiari cut ekek loka Yakob.”
“Naarai koany, ecorakini,
Ido ekekei ekek loka Isirael kotoma atekerin kere,
Kwape ekekeia akima kotoma aikekeet,
Konye mam idiokimait edoi kwap.
Etwakete ikadiakanarak kere luka ikatuŋa kekileŋ,
Luebalas ebe, ‘Mam aronis kidolikini, karaida airiamakin kaoni.’
Epuci aciletake;
Etonyouni da aapoŋoruke,
Eteteuni kwape kapaarasia nukoloŋo.
Ka atekerin kere nuemaikinio ekakiror.”
Ebala kwaŋin EJAKAIT loiswamai ŋun.
Nuedolokinio ekakorion ekasakan,
Ka ŋol loipudapudai emusabibu ŋol loeyei ikinyom;
Idonete iroŋan ebino loewiny,
Eleleete iukon kere.
Edukete ireria lueswapito, iboikinos toma;
Iraete kesi amanat nuka emusabibu,
Emasete da ebinoke;
Ekoriete imanikoria, enyamete da araitokec.”
“Eraikini eoŋ kes akwapukec,
Mam bobo erutunio kakwapukec naainakinit kes.”
Inera kwanata Ejakait EDEKE nuka Edom ebe:
Kipupu akiro kaneejai EJAKAIT,
Ejukunitai ekiyakia alimokin atekerin ebe:
“Konyoutu yesi!
Kanyoutu oni aitiji ŋes!”
Koany, ketidisiari jo katekerin:
Kimwaŋio noi.
Okwe jo loiboie kaciŋeta nuka emoru,
Loiboie kaneicelelei; Loibala kotaukon ebe,
“Iŋai ca epedori aitodokun eoŋ kwap?”
Karaida kidir kuju bala emorukaalet,
Karaida kejaun akaikon kidiŋ aacer,
Ketodokuni jo kaŋina.
Arai kibunokinito ikokolak jo,
Arai kibunokinito ikerurwok kuare,
(Mere kimudiario jo!)
Mam tikekokwata aitodol naeupiata?
Arai kibunokinito ikedeak emusabibu
Mam tikideutu imusabibun lueroko bon?
Eŋanyiŋanyi ca ma iboro luka Esau!
Aŋici ca ma aiŋadisiake nuibwaa!
Kireŋeut ituŋa kere lukitutukito kajo orotokon,
Kiton oikor:
Kimodata ituŋa luinapakina kajo, kipikosi da;
Ŋul luenyamete akonitap kilokata jo katacit:
Emamei aijen kotomakeŋ.
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Mam kereka eoŋ kapaaran kaŋin
Amudiari lukacoa ko Edom,
Ka aijen komoru loka Esau?
Ŋes ainakini ŋinituŋanan emudiario
Komoru loka Esau kaario.
Naibu kiswamak onacekon Yakob,
Kimudiario ikar kere.
Kapaaran naejoreoritotor imo ikeboro,
Naalomariata lukacekwap oruteike,
Kilamilamata eroet kanuka Yerusalem,
Kosubite ijo bala ediopet kakesi.
Kapaaran naka icanike,
Siriyalama kanuka idwe luka Yuda
Kapaaran naka amudiariokec;
Karaida einer nuka eitur
Kapaaran naka aiyaloŋoŋ.
Sirikiloma orute loka ikatuŋa
Kapaaran naka epolakec;
Eebo, sirikite aiticanitoikec
Kapaaran naka epolakec,
Karaida aidokokin akonikanin oborokec
Kapaaran naka epolakec.
Sirikijaik luke luideunos kapaaran naka aiyaloŋoŋ.
Kwape ibu kiswamaa, kiswamakinio jo da kwaŋin,
Eboŋokini akoniswam akoukon elopet.
Naarai kwape ibu komasia koroŋataka lokalaunan,
Emasete kwaŋin atekerin kere tiritir;
Eebo, emasete, kilikorete,
Ejaunos bala mam lem ejauna.
Konye ejaunos luekuete Moru Sion,
Eraun lokalaunan;
Irumi ekek loka Yakob airumetake.
Eraun ekek loka Yakob akim,
Ekek loka Yosep da aŋajepa nuka akim,
Ka ekek da loka Esau ariaŋ;
Enokete kesi, enyamari kes:
Emameun yenideun kokek loka Esau;
Naarai ener EJAKAIT.
Irumete luka apuutona da Ipilisitian:
Irumete emanikor loka Epuraim, ka emanikor da loka Samaria;
Irumi Benyamin da Gilead.
Luajaas koKanaanin, irumete aitodol Sarepat;
Luijoreoritai da luko Yerusalem, luejaas Separad,
Irumete ireria luka ari naka Eŋalakimak.
Eraun ajakanut naka EJAKAIT.
“Konyou, kolot Ninebe, ore ŋol loepol, kiworo aikwenyar ŋes; naarai adolu aronisikec mamakaŋ.”
Konye konyou Yona akerear Tarusis anyoun kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT. Kolot Yopa, kodum ameeri naalosi Tarusis: kotac etiai loka erotoke, kikwaŋar, alosit kakes Tarusis, anyoun kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT.
Konye kijuka EJAKAIT ekwam loepol aŋolol, kojaun ekwam loepol noi aŋolol, koapikinite ameeri abilibilun.
Kosodete ikekwaŋak akurianar, kiwone ŋinituŋanan ekedeke; kocakanakisi iboro luajaas ameeri aŋolol, tetere ebeneniar. Konye alomarit Yona atutubet nakotoma naka ameeri; koperi kojotoi.
Kobu ekapolon loka ameeri neejai ŋesi, kotema ŋes atiar, “Biai bo, ijo loijotoi? Konyou, kiwone Ekonideke! Elemuni eomoomoi Edeke nuwok, kenyeis atwakare.”
Kosodete atemar ŋes atiar, “Kiŋaiŋait jo, kolimokinai sio, akirot kaŋai kidoikinio sio aronis na? Anyoin akoniswam? Laali bo kibunio? Ai bo obukus? Loka lukaŋai bo jo?”
Kotema kes atiar, “Arai eoŋ Eburaniat; ido ayoŋit EJAKAIT, Edeke loka akuj, loasubi aŋolol ka akwap naeonit.”
Kosodete ituŋa akurianar noi noi, kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Anyoika ŋun nuisub?” Naarai apotu ituŋa kojenut ebe ekerit ŋesi anyoun kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, naarai abu kolimok kes.
Kosodete atemar ŋes atiar, “Anyoika kiswamakini isio jo, tetere aŋolol iyamakin?” Naarai eyata ekwam noi noi kaŋolol.
Kotema kes atiar, “Kodakarai eoŋ, kocakakis aŋolol; kwaŋin iyamakinor aŋolol: naarai ajeni ebe kanukaŋ ŋes kibunokinia yes ekwam lo loepol.”
Konye kikwanata ituŋa kagogoŋ aboŋor neeonit; konye mam kepedoro; naarai eyata ekwam noi noi kaŋolol aluikinite kes.

Kanuka ŋun kiwoneoto EJAKAIT ebe, “Kiŋaiŋait jo, wu EJAKAIT, kiŋaiŋait, kenyeis isio atwakare kanuka aijar naka etuŋanan kalo, sirikibwaik mamakosi aokot numam aronis: naarai ijo, wu EJAKAIT, iswama kwape itojokitor.”
Kodakutu Yona, kocakakis aŋolol: kiyamakin aŋolol.
Kosodete ituŋa aiyoŋ EJAKAIT noi noi; koinakis EJAKAIT asubanit, kiyapoto.
Kosodi Yona ailip EJAKAIT Ekedeke kakoik naka ibore yenikecor.
Kotema atiar,
“Abu keworo EJAKAIT kocanika, Kaboŋok;
Keworo da kakoik naka Okatwak,
Ibu kiira ekaporoto.
Otau loka aŋololin,
Kerimo akalele;
Elaparos akailanakon kere kamakaŋ.
Ekwaikini ai bobo aseseni eyekalukon lokalaunan?’
Apotu akip kalukunito eoŋ, kiton otauka;
Kaluku da ataro;
Kojai egirio akouka.
Abu kejesar kwap cut naka iroŋan:
Kagolo akwap kariinoke ikar kere:
Konye ilem ijo aijaraka kaipany,
Wu EJAKAIT Ekadeke.
Abu keitu EJAKAIT:
Kodolo akailip mama ijai,
Oyekalukon lokalaunan.
Ejalito akeceitimio.
Etodoli ŋun nueyapo.
Erai aitajar naka EJAKAIT!”
Kirucak akirot naka EJAKAIT abunore mama ejai Yona ebe,
“Konyou, kolot Ninebe, ore ŋol loepol, kolimok ŋes akirot nakecorakin jo.”
Konyou Yona, kolot Ninebe, kwape ajaar akirot naka EJAKAIT. Kerai Ninebe ere loepol noi noi, loka alosit naka apaarasia auni.
Kogeu Yona alomar ore alosit naka adiopepaaran. Kiworo, kotema atiar, “Esalito apaarasia akaisaoŋon, kosodi konyet Ninebe atiyanakinio!”
Kiyuut ituŋa luka Ninebe Edeke; kolimosi ailuŋ, konapitos ipukoi, ageun ka lukapolok kiton ludidik kakesi.
Abu kolimo kitejen Ninebe kere ebe, “Kokisil loka ekabaka ka ikapolokoke; Sirikiir ituŋanan karaida itiaŋ, esipan loka aituk, karaida loka amerekekin, idiobore: sirikenyama, karaida aimat akipi;
Konye kimukoros kipukoi, ituŋanan ka itiaŋ da, kiwoneoto noi Edeke: eebo, kibelokinos kesi ŋinituŋanan ainyein ekerot loerono, anyoun da kadedeŋ naejai kakaninikec.
Iŋai bo ejeni arai mam Edeke ibelokin iituni da, aibelokin ainyein akenyunyura naededeŋ, tetere mam kitwaki?”
Koany Edeke aswamisiokec, kwape ebelokinotor ainyein ekecerot loerono; kiitu Edeke kinyek aronis naabala iswamakini kes; mam abu kiswama.

Kilip EJAKAIT, kotema atiar, “Keŋaiŋait, wu EJAKAIT, mere nuabala eoŋ nu, naarokor ajai bukosi? Kanuka ŋun abu kesunya akerit Tarusis; naarai abu kajeni ebe irai ijo Edeke loisiana, ileleba aisioni, iyapi anyunyurikin, ebarar aitimikon, iituni kinyek aronis.
Aso do, wu EJAKAIT, keŋaiŋait kolema aijaraka kamakaŋ; naarai ejok eoŋ atwanare itia aijar.”
Kotema EJAKAIT atiar, “Isubit kereka ijo ejok anyunyurikin?”
Kosodi Yona alomar kiŋa naka ere, kiboikin ari nakokide naka ere, kidukur iswam. Kiboikin otolimike, aanyun nuedoikinete ere.
Kitemok EJAKAIT Edeke ekakale, kitopolou ŋes kaneejai Yona, tetere eyaun etolim akouke, ayuun ŋes kationisike. Kiyalamikin Yona noi kanuka ekakale.
Konye kitemok Edeke ekurut tupuruc apaaran naatupakini, konyam ekakale, korinyo.
Kosodi kelom akoloŋ, kitemok Edeke ekwam lokokide loemwana; konomo akoloŋ akou naka Yona, kiilor; kilip atwanare, kobala ebe, “Ejok eoŋ atwanare itia aijar.”
Kotema Edeke Yona atiar, “Isubit kereka ijo ejok anyunyura kanuka ekakale?” Kotema atiar, “Asubit ejok anyunyura kiton atwanare da.”
Kotema EJAKAIT atiar, “Itimi ijo ekakale, lomam jo ibu kitaaritor, karaida aitopoloun; loalomuni akuare adiopet, loarinyori da akuar: adiopet.

Mam ti eoŋ ebusakinit aitim Ninebe, ere ŋol loepol; loejaas ituŋa luedeparito ilukumin akwatat ka ilukumin akaisaarei lumam epedorete atiak akecekan nakoteten ka akecekan nakokediany; ka ibaren da luipu?”
Kiirasi, yes ituŋa, yes kere;
Kiira, ijo akwap, ka luejaas tomake kere;
Korau Ejakait EDEKE ekajenan kamakus,
EJAKAIT koyekaluke lokalaunan.
Edokuni, icakacakai aiboisio nuiceleleete nuka akwap.
Ecalaros iroŋan kwapuke,
Ecilunos aditon kwape edipor kakim,
Kwape akipi nuebukoros aibois naijululuei.
Kanuka aronisio da nuka ekek loka Isirael.
Anyoin bo aibucaret naka Yakob?
Mere Samaria?
Anyoika bo aiboisio nuiceleleete nuka Yuda?
Mere Yerusalem?
Bala aibois nairaio emusabibu:
Abukokini amoruke aditot, Apukori apetetake.
Idecidecio aputosiake kere nuegerer,
Icweio iropitoke kere kakim,
Etisili eoŋ aputosiake kere nuemaio:
Naarai abu kotukok kes keropit loka naadote,
Eboŋorete da araut eropit loka naadote.
Kanuka ŋun ŋes adeloria eoŋ ebworor da;
Kalosi alaeara kemujalal:
Adelori kwape ikuwei,
Ebworo da kwape ikuului.
Naarai adoloki Yuda da; Adol orute loka ikatuŋa,
Ŋes Yerusalem.
Sirikilimokis koGat,
Sirikimonyata cut:
Kibelibelokinos kapua
KoBet-le-Apura.
Kitoroto imujalalasi, kirumito ileic,
Yes luiboiete koSapir:
Mam luiboiete koSaanan elomuna:
Aibworo naka Bet-esel kidema yes aibois nabwoet.
Naarai idareunete luiboiete koMarot Ajokis kaiyaloŋoŋ;
Naarai adoku aronis naebuni kama ejai EJAKAIT,
Kiton orute loka Yerusalem.
Koenikis agali obalasit loetirono,
Yes luiboiete koLakis:
Kerai ŋesi ageunet naka aronis mama ejai akoku naka Sion;
Naarai edumuna aibucareta nuka Isirael kamakon.
Kanuka ŋun ŋes iinakinia Moreset-gat ainakineta nuka aitwar;
Eraunos itogoi luka Akisib lukaimod
Mama ejaas ikabakan luka Isirael.
Kainuni jo ŋol lokirumi,
Wu jo yeniboie koMaresa;
Edoluni aibuses naka Isirael Adulam.
Kanuka idwe luka ailelekon:
Kitalal apatakon kwape emorukaalet,
Naarai ijoreoritai kamakon.
Luiswamaete aronis kaperitokec!
Kiwala akwap, itetemonorete,
Naarai ejai toma apedor naka akanikec.
Iŋobeleete alup, koŋasete;
Itogoi da, kodemete;
Emwaŋete etuŋanan ka eketogo,
Ido etuŋanan ka akeirumet.
Koany, enerak aronis okek lo,
Namam ilemarete komurisiŋakus,
Karaida alosit iŋonasi;
Naarai na ŋes apak naerono.
Kapaaran kaŋin kiwaragio,
Ekuudianete akuudian nakican, Ebe, “Kiŋasi cut;
Esiec akorakinet naka ikatuŋa; Kademaa ca!
Akoraki lukepali akosilup.”
Katukot naka EJAKAIT.
“Siridwarete,” kwaŋin edwariata.
“Mam ibus aidwar nuikote nen;
Mam amorosito kidolokinete oni.”
Ijo ekek loka Yakob,
Ibus kereka einer ŋun?
Eŋoŋar ca ma emoyo loka EJAKAIT?
Nu tope kes akeswamisio?
Mam akakiro iswamakinete ajokis ŋol loelosi itenara?
Konye idakunos yes asurokin ikatuŋa
Idemete asuukai konapen luka ŋul kaluitorete inapakina
Kwape ituŋa lumam ekotosi ejie.
Ireŋeanarete aŋor nuka ikatuŋa kotogoikec luisiyalamikinitos;
Ilemarete akaibuses ikar kere kodwekec ludidik.
Naarai mere ne aiyeŋunetekus:
Kanuka amodokok naemudiari,
Ido ka amudiario naasogim.
Arai esabi etuŋanan loelosi kokwam loka aiŋal,
Ebe, “Kadwarakini jo nuka ajon ka luitemerete”;
Ŋopeŋol eraun ekadwaran loka ituŋa kalu!
Mam aswaki atukokin aatoŋot naka Isirael:
Ebwaikin nepepe kwape amerekekin nuka Bosura;
Kwape esipan loejai kidiŋ oronyikec,
Iumaumato noi kanuka aipues naka ituŋa.
Adoka ekabelan kakonyenekec;
Atikoros, atuboros adolior orute,
Alomut kanen.
Atubor ekabakakec kakonyenekec,
Eŋareniki EJAKAIT kes.
Kopupokisi, keŋaiŋait, yes ikapolok luka Yakob,
Ka ikayaitok luka ekek loka Isirael!
Mere kereka nakus ajenun etube?
Luisaeete ajokis, kominas aronis;
Luibulucarete amunyinokec,
Ka akiriŋikec alemar kakojokec;
Ijenete amunyinokec, ibilete akojokec:
Eebo, irikirikete kes, kwape toma amot,
Kwape akiriŋ toma atakwa.
Konye mam ŋes eboŋokini kes:
Eebo, ibwai ekereet kamakec kapak kaŋin,
Naarai eswamata aronis kaswamisiokec.
Luiworoete ebe, “Ainapakin,”
Arai kejaas kaluekonyete kikecekel:
Konye ekapanakinos ejie kaŋol
Lomam ibwaikini ibore aitukekec.
Komam aitapoet;
Kimutonikis, komam idwarete.
Elomari akoloŋ kama ejaas inabin,
Kojesi da apaaran cucucuc kamakec.
Edakaros akwes nuka ikaroak;
Eebo, ebunete kesi aitukekec:
Naarai emamei aboŋokinet naka Edeke.
Ka Emoyo loka EJAKAIT,
Ka etube, ka apedor da,
Alimonokin Yakob aibucareteke,
Ka Isirael da akeronis.
Kopupokisi nu, keŋaiŋait,
Yes ikapolok luka ekek loka Yakob,
Ka ikayaitok luka ekek loka Isirael,
Luilaete etube,
Luitiriete nuitenara kere.
Edukete Sion kaokot,
Ka Yerusalem da kanumam adolit.
Isisianakinete isasedotinike kanuka eropit,
Edwarete inabinoke kanuka apesan:
Konye egoŋakina neejai EJAKAIT ebalas ebe,
“Mere ejai EJAKAIT kidiŋiwok?
Mam aronis kidoikini oni.”
Eraun Yerusalem aapoŋor,
Eroŋat da loka etogo
Kwape aiboisio nuiceleleete nuka amagoro.
Ecatunit eroŋat loka etogo loka EJAKAIT
Kaidi naka iroŋan,
Itopolooro kuju kiukon;
Idiaete ituŋa mamakeŋ.
“Kopotu, kadokasi oroŋat loka EJAKAIT.
Togo da loka Edeke loka Yakob;
Kisisianakini ŋesi oni ikeponesio,
Kilosenenei korotinike.”
Naarai elomuni ekisil koSion,
Akirot da naka EJAKAIT koYerusalem.
Ediekakini atekerin nuegogoŋ nuelwaka;
Etataete kesi ikileŋakec aituluor imelekes,
Ka akwarasikec da aituluor icilikikin lukidimet:
Mam ateker ikiari ekileŋ asurokinia aceteker,
Kwabo mam bobo isisiaunete ejie.
Kwap ketinike da;
Mam yenitukuriani kes:
Naarai ener aituk naka EJAKAIT loka ajoresio.
Ŋinidiopet kokiror loka ekedeke,
Konye kilosenenei oni kokiror loka EJAKAIT
Ewokodeke Ikar ka ikar.
Kapaaran kaŋin
Enotuni ŋin naicodo,
Atukokini ŋin naereŋearitai,
Ka ŋin da naabu eoŋ ketican;
Ka ŋin da naereŋearitai ateker naegogoŋ:
Irumi EJAKAIT kes komoru Sion
Amear kwana, ido aitodol ikar kere.
Ka jo da, wu etogo loeoja loka esipan,
Eukot loka akoku naka Sion,
Edolokini jo;
Eebo, edolokini ayait nakolo,
Alakanut naka akoku naka Yerusalem.
Aso do kanukinyo ideloria?
Emamei kereka ekabaka kotomakon?
Aolio ekapetan akirokon,
Tape kikamuni ariebo kwape naka aberu naidouni?
Koriebakin, kitaaritoi aidoun, ijo akoku naka Sion,
Kwape aberu naidouni:
Naarai kwana ilomari kiŋa naka ere,
Iboie okitui, idoli da Babulon.
Kiyuunio kaŋina,
Ŋina ŋes kilakunia EJAKAIT jo
Kakan naka lukasurupokon.
Kwana da etukonokinos atekerin nuipu asurokin jo,
Nuebalas ebe, “Komunaun ŋesi,
Koanyutu do awokokonye eimielikec koSion.”
Konye mam ejenete kesi aomisio nuka EJAKAIT,
Karaida ajenun ainerunike;
Naarai atukok kes kwape iisutan kopejal.
Naarai etaraun eoŋ amumwarakon asuat,
Ka imagegerakon da aisinit:
Inomonomoi atekerin nuipu;
Igitari amedakec mama ejai EJAKAIT,
Ka iborokec da mama ejai EJAKAIT loka akwap
Ijo akoku naka moneta:
Kirigau ŋesi sio asurokin:
Inomete kesi ekatubon loka Isirael Kebela oitiny.
Loidit ajaut toma okekia luka Yuda,
Elomuni kotomakon kanukaŋ
Etuŋanan loeraun ekayaiton loka Isirael;
Alomanaretake ejaas ameun apeŋo,
Ameun ikar lumam enaŋete.
Kanuka ŋun ijaikini kes,
Aitodol apak naidounio ŋin naeriebi:
Kosodete luideunos luka ikeinacan
Aboŋor mama ejaas idwe luka Isirael.
Kapolou naka ekiror loka EJAKAIT, Ekedeke:
Iboienenete kesi;
Naarai kwana eraun ŋesi loepol
Kiton osaŋeta luka akwap.
Naelomunia Eyasuriat akwapuwok,
Naecakia ŋesi itogoiwok lukapolou,
Kasodete oni aitonyoun ikecokok ikanykaarei,
Ka ituŋa ikanykauni lukapolok asurokin ŋes.
Ka aiboisio nuelomarere nuka akwap naka Nimirod:
Kiyuuni ŋesi oni kama ka Eyasuriat,
Naelomunia ŋesi akwapuwok,
Naecakia ŋesi kotoma oikoruwok.
Kwape akopyo nuepote kama ejai EJAKAIT,
Kwape elimilim neejaas anya;
Lomam idareuni ituŋanan,
Karaida aidareun idwe luka ituŋa.
Eraun aatoŋot naka Yakob mama ejaas atekerin,
Kokidiŋ kituŋa luipu,
Kwape eŋatuny mama ejaas itiaŋ luka amagoro,
Kwape iŋatuny mama ejaas isipanin luka amerekekin:
Naitorio, icakacakai epoopooi,
Emamei yeneyuuni.
Kikiara akonikan kuju kalukediŋetakon,
Komudiaros lukasurupokon kere.
Kapaaran kaŋin agelari ibalasinikon kokidiŋikon,
Amudiari agalinikon:
Agelari ireria luka akwapukon,
Akesi ireriakon kere luegogoŋ.
Agelari icudeta kakanikon;
Mam bobo ijaunos kikadwarak:
Ka ipirinokon kokidiŋikon;
Mam bobo imai aswam naka akaninikon.
Arutuni Aserimikon kokidiŋikon:
Amudiari ireriakon.
Etodoli eoŋ enyaŋit kanyunyura kaisiop
Mama ejaas atekerin numam erimarito.
Aso kiirasi nuinera EJAKAIT atiar:
Konyou, kopur kakonyen nuka imor,
Kisiira iukon ekoniporoto.
Ka yes da apeteta nuka akwap numam edaunos;
Naarai ejai EJAKAIT aŋolopa ka iketuŋa,
Epuri ka Isirael.
Inyo gwai ketapasitor eoŋ yes?
Koboŋokinoi!
Kalaku kotogo loka ebulesene;
Kesiŋarenik yes Musa, ka Aaron ka Miriam.
Ka nuaboŋokini da Balaam okoku loka Beor;
Kiitutu ageun koSitim kiton Giligal,
Tetere ijenunete aswamisio nukadolit nuka EJAKAIT.”
Kesudede kakonyen nuka Edeke loitelekarit kere?
Ekunyakini kereka ŋes kainakineta nuicweio,
Ka itak luka ekaru ediopet?
Arai icorin ilukumin itomon luka akinyet?
Ainakini kereka eoŋ ikoku yenikiyai kanuka apaarika,
Araito naka akuanaka kanuka aronis nakotauka?”
Okwe etuŋanan, kipukok jo naejok;
Inyo bo kiburai EJAKAIT,
Mere aswam nuebeito, amin aitim,
Alosit da kaitasono nepepe ka Ekonideke?
Iworoi eporoto loka EJAKAIT mama ejai ere,
Yenikacoa da eyoŋi ekonikiror:
“Kopupokisi yesi ebela, ka loaseuni ŋes.
Eroko kereka ejaas iboro luka akais nuipu luka aronis
Kotogo loka ikaronok,
Ka aitemis da naiŋoŋara naerai naketal?
Ka eriagi da loka aitemisio nukaiŋal?
Naarai ileleba ikabarakake akaje,
Esabanakinete luiboiete kotomake,
Iŋalaete aŋajepakec kotoma aitukekec.
Kanuka ŋun ŋes kenomia eoŋ jo kamusuŋut naerono noi;
Ketisil jo kanuka aronisiokon.
Inyami, konye mam imonanakin;
Iworoori kotomakon;
Ilemari, konye mam iyuuni;
ŋul da luiyuuni ejaikini eoŋ ekileŋ.
Iyei, konye mam isaki;
Ipudapudai iseitunin, konye mam inyonyoikin akinyet;
Icui emusabibu da, konye mam imasi ebino.
Ka aswamisio kere nuka ekek loka Akab;
Ilosenenete kainerunikec:
Tape ketuluor yes aapoŋor,
Ka luiboiete kotoma eraunos aijuaret;
Ibwokete amorosit naka ikatuŋa.”
Bala naedaunere aide emusabibu:
Emamei aibuŋet naanyamat;
Karaida etini loegeit akonore loimiela ekatau.
Emamei da yenitenara etau kotuŋa:
Eperunete kere aiar;
Emejai ŋinituŋanan onaceke keboi.
Ilipi ekapolon, ekoto ekatubon eropit;
Ituŋanan loepol ŋes da inera nuka aiŋobel nakaronon nakotauke;
Kwaŋin ewojiete nepepe.
Loejok kakesi erai ekodokodoi;
Loitenara aitelekar luce erono kwape abwas naka ikukwa.
Adolu apaaran naka ikedarakakon, ŋes aiticaniokon;
Kwana ebuonokinos.
Sirikimunokinos ipaper,
Sirikigoŋakinos ekeŋarenon;
Kidar ikekia luka aitukukon
Kaneejai ŋin naeperi atorobukon.
Enyoikini akoku totoke,
Aberu naka okoku eluikini tataake;
Lukasurupo luka ituŋanan kes ituŋa lukokaleke.
Konye kanukaŋ, aseseni eoŋ EJAKAIT;
Edareuni Edeke loka aitajarioka;
Kapupok Ekadeke eoŋ.
Arai kebiror, anyouni;
Naeboikinor amuton,
Eraun EJAKAIT aica kamakaŋ.
Atitiŋikini anyunyura naka EJAKAIT,
Naarai adiaka kamakeŋ:
Aitodol nekapurokinia akakirot,
Itodolikini eoŋ etube,
Ketolomuni eoŋ toma aica;
Aanyuni da akedolit.
Kosodi nakasurup aanyun ŋun,
Koraparito ileic nakabala eoŋ ebe,
“Ai bo ejai EJAKAIT Ekonideke?”
Elakara akakonye aanyun ŋin;
Ipudapudao ŋes kwape erit lokorotin.
Apaaran naka aiduk arwatatinikon!
Kapaaran kaŋin italalaario eikorukon.
Kapaaran kaŋin epote mama ijai
Anyoun koAsuria ka ireria luko Misiri,
Anyoun koMisiri da kiton Ocor,
Anyoun kaŋolol kiton aŋolol,
Koroŋat da kiton oroŋat.
Konye esilior akwap kanuka ŋul kaluiboiete kotoma,
Kanuka araito nuka aswamisiokec.
Esipan loka airumetekon,
Luiboiete ileŋokino,
Toma amagoro kidiŋ ka Karumel;
Kodakasi kesi toma Basan ka Gilead,
Kwape kapaarasia nupeŋo.
Kwape kapaarasia nuilomunia ijo kakwap nako Misiri
Etodikini ŋes akiro nukaumokin.
Kanuka agogoŋukec kere:
Ebunete aitukekec,
Imaiinikinos akiikec.
Emeorete apua kwape kemun;
Elomunete emaranete kaiboisiokec nuŋopis,
Kwape lueliatos kakwap:
Epote kaiyoŋ mama ejai EJAKAIT Ewokodeke,
Ekuriakaros kanukon.
Loisioniei numam adolit,
Loinaci aibucar naka aatoŋot naka airumeteke?
Mam enyunyuranakinenei ikar kere,
Naarai isiyalamikinit aitim.
Icakacakai numam adolitewok kokwap kakejeneke.
Icakari ijo aronisiokec kere ataro naka aŋolol.
Ka aitim da mama ejai Aburaam,
Nuibu kiyapoik lukapapaakos
Ameun kapaarasia nupeŋo.
Abwokon naka Ninebe, Eitabo loka aitapoet naka Nakum Elikosit.
Erai EJAKAIT Edeke lokekolo, inyaŋi da;
Inyaŋi EJAKAIT, ileleba anyunyura;
Inyaŋi EJAKAIT kama ka lukediŋeteke,
Elilikini lukasurupoke.
Lomam itojoki luegwaunito akiro.
Ejai EJAKAIT ekerot otapipirio, kokwamin da,
Idouon kes adae nuka akejeke.
Itooni da icorin kere:
Enonokiar Basan, ka Karumel,
Enonokiar da aturot naka Lebanon.
Ecalaros iukon;
Ebuburiar akwap kakonyeneke,
Eebo, akwapin, ka luiboiete kotoma kere.
Iŋai bo epedori abwoikin aisiopoke?
Iŋai da epedori atitiŋikin adedeŋ naka anyunyurake?
Ebukunio anyunyurake kwape akim,
Etiyatiyai ŋesi imor.
Ejeni ŋesi ŋul luemunosi ŋes.
Erukoria lukasurupoke kiton amuton.
Anyoika nuitetemonorete kaomisio aluikin EJAKAIT?
Itanaŋi ŋesi cut:
Mam irucakini bobo aitican.
Naarai karaida esubito bala ikukwa luikodikodito,
Epalala kesi da kanumatanakec,
Idoporio kes cut kwape ariaŋ naeonit de.
Aiomu idiopet kamakon yenitetemor aronis aluikin EJAKAIT,
Yenineruni nukaronok.
Inera EJAKAIT kwanata ebe:
“Karaida egogoŋ kes cut, ipu da, Ejepio kes, eoliorete.
Karaida abu kareite jo,
Mam bobo karei jo.
Kwana abili ajookotoke kamakon,
Aaŋololedi irikoikon.”
Abu EJAKAIT kicorak nukon ebe:
“Mam bobo eyeio ekonikiror;
Kotogo loka idekesiokon
Ajepi aput naegerer, ka aput da naecalara.
Etemokini atesikon;
Naarai isiliana ijo.”
Loelimonokini ainapakin koroŋan!
Kidar ipucinokon, ijo Yuda,
Kitodol aiyaposiokon:
Naarai mam ikaronon itori bobo tomakon;
Egelario cut.
Abu aŋololol loidecideci kobu akonyenekon.
Kidar abwas, kirere erot,
Kitogogoŋ aŋabetekon,
Kiticat akonipedor baaba.
Naarai inyakuni EJAKAIT ajokis naka Yakob,
Kwape ajokis naka Isirael:
Naarai apiasi ikaŋatak kes,
Amunaasi da atenunakec nuka emusabibu.
Iterenitai ebuku loka iketuŋa lukirigin,
Enapitos ituŋa lukatitiŋok lukareŋak,
Emwekimwekete aisinin nuka agalin
Kapaaran naka aitemonokinike.
Iniŋio noi akwaras.
Ikerepikinito agalin korotin,
Enaŋanakinos korotin luelalak:
Etakanete kesi bala akalasia,
Egumitos bala aimiliaunun.
Iituni ŋesi isotiake:
Iguikinos kairacakec;
Iwonyete arwatatake,
Itemonokinitoi eupal lopeti.
Eŋaara irutei luka icorin,
Ebaikini etogo loka ekabaka.
Epukoro Kusab, edakario,
Ibworos apesuruke bala iporotoi luka ajeleik,
Kodipidipete atorobusiokec.
Konye ageun apeŋo koputos Ninebe
Bala atapar naka akipi:
Konye ekerete.
Kiworoete ebe, “Kobwaata, kobwaata!”
Konye mam yeneŋoliari kau.
Koyaŋaasi yesi luŋatuna luka epuesa,
Koyaŋaasi da luŋatuna luka esabu!
Naarai mam iboro edaununos,
Abar naka iboro kere luisiyalamikinito.
Ikokooro ŋesi, asilior, emejeiki:
Epirisar etau, iriamanakinos akuŋin,
Eriebete noi aŋabes kere,
Ijulakinos da akonyenekec kere.
Ani bo abua naka iŋatunyo,
Ka aibois da naenyamiata iŋatunyo ludidik,
Naesakasakatotor eŋatuny ka aŋatuny,
Ka ikoku yenika eŋatuny, komam yenitukuriani kes?
Kopoopo eŋatuny luedaunete idweke,
Komiedanak aŋatunyoke;
Kileleb abuaike lumejauna,
Ka aburinike da luŋatan.
Ebala EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe, Koany aluikin eoŋ jo, ecwei agalinikon
Itukwi ijo ere loka aokot!
Ileleba kere aiŋal ka luepoopootai;
Mam enyounete lumejauna.
Ecelet loka edaaset,
Ka ecelet da loka airurum naka agalin;
Ibalasin luidamaeacas,
Agalin da nuesomanaros!
Ekebwanenon loedoki,
Ekileŋ loemwekimweki, ka akwara naimilia,
Aipues da naka lueario,
Ka atukot da naepol naka lukatwak,
Mam edaununos atesin;
Iguikinos atesinakec!
Alopet ecudet,
Naegwelari atekerin kanuka adoteuke,
Ka ikekia kanuka ecudeteke.
Koany, aluikini eoŋ jo,
Alaeari inapenekon kakonyenekon;
Etodikini atekerin amujalalakon,
Ka ajakanuto da ileicikon.
Kacakakini jo luimodokokas, Etisili jo,
Ebwaikini jo araun naesesenio kamenit.
Kosodi kanen, kere lukisesenete jo
Ekerete kamakon,
Kobalas ebe, Esiliana Ninebe;
Iŋai bo ibworo ŋes?
Ai bo kamoikinia jo lukitalakarete?
Ijok kereka ijo adepar No-amon,
Naajai neajaas icorin,
Nairimorito akip:
Etutike ŋes aŋolol,
Arwatatake da kerai aŋolol?
Ŋin da namam enaŋi;
Keraas Put ka Lubim da ikeŋarakinakakon.
Kipicipicitai ikedwe ludidik Kasisiarin nuka irotin;
Apotu kilamalamata iroeta akoria isotiake,
Koenitete iketuŋa kere lukapolok kirikoi.
Imerikin ijo da, ileleboi;
Imoi ijo da abwas kanuka lokasurup.
Itinin luejaas araito nugeet:
Arai kijaŋijaŋi,
Edoununete aituk naka ikanyaman.
Eŋaara noi kolalak irutei luka akonikwap
Mama ejaas lukasurupokon;
Edopo akim atiketakon.
Kirit akipi eriŋa kirigauna,
Kitogogoŋ ireriakon luebwaitai:
Kolot neejai elupe, kicak alupot,
Kitiŋ atuba nasubet amatapalin.
Kijepi jo ekileŋ,
Kidopori jo kwape enyede.
Kipuaros kwape enyede,
Kipuaros kwape emaase!
Ibu kiyatak ikagwelanarakakon
Adepar aacer nukokuju,
Ebutori enyede, kosodi aporor.
Ka ikewadikakakon kwape atukon nuka ibeerei,
Luidukurete abwasin kapaaran naelilim,
Konye kelom akoloŋ epororete,
Aiboisikec da neajaas mam ejenun.
Ijo ekabaka loka Asuria;
Iluranaros isotiakon,
Isiarakinos ikonituŋa oroŋan,
Emamei da yenetukokini kes.
Epol amusuŋutukon.
Kere luiirarete eemutukon
Kibapakinete jo akaninikec.
Naarai iŋai yenimam edolokinit
Aronisikon naduc?
Abwokon naabu Kabakuk enabi koany.
Komam jo ipupuni?
Eworo mama ijai nuka akaje,
Komam jo itajari?
Kanukinyo kitodikinia eoŋ numan adolit,
Asesen ameŋeranut?
Naarai ejai amudiar ka akaje kakonyeneka:
Ejai da epeget, elomuni do aŋolopa.
Mam etube da elomununei:
Naarai irigauni ikaronon ikadoliton; ŋes elomununia etube lomagul.
Koanyutu yesi kotoma atekerin,
Kosesenete, koumokis noi:
Naarai eswamai eoŋ aswam kapaarasiakus,
Namam iyuunete karaida kilimonokinitai.
Ateker ŋin naededeŋ, naedodoro;
Eracaete aitor alalau naka akwap,
Airum aiboisio nuiboikinos numere nukec.
Eraas luesogim ka luketasuro:
Elomuni etubekec ka apoloukec kama kikulepek.
Ededeŋ aitelekarit ipeen lukeboŋ;
Igararaete ikebwanenokokec,
Eebo, epote ikebwanenokokec kama elwana;
Eporitos bala emorukaalet loerurukit ainyam.
Epote kesi kere kanuka akaje;
Iŋarenikinit kes etasuro.
Etukonokinete lukijoreoro kwape kasiŋe.
Eebo, isekelete kesi ikabakan,
Emwaŋio ikapolok kamakec.
Emwaŋete kesi ŋiniibois naegogoŋ;
Naarai etukonokinete apua, irumete.
Kosodete amotar kwape kekwam,
Etuboros, luegwaunito akiro:
Akecegogoŋ ŋes ekecedeke.
Wu EJAKAIT Ekadeke, Ekalaunanika,
Mam kereka jo ijai ageun apeŋo?
Mam sio kitwaki.
Wu EJAKAIT, ibu kicorak kes kanuka etube;
Ijo da, wu Atiiba, itieata kes kanuka alecor.
Irai ijo loka akonye nuesegaara numam esesenete aronis,
Mam ipedori aite ameŋeranut,
Kanukinyo iteio ijo ŋul luebilakinete ebotet,
Ililiŋia da nailikoria ikaronon ituŋanan yenedolit aitelekarit ŋes?
Ituluori ituŋa kwape agaria nuka aŋolol,
Kwape lueliatos, luemameete ekayaitonikec.
Ikami kes kere kegolu, Eloki kes karujake,
Etukonokini kes oboike:
Ŋes ibwoŋar, kiyalamikin da.
Kanuka ŋun ŋes einakinia asuban mama ejai arujake,
Isupurikini eboike lukisupurununo;
Naarai kanukec ebur ewaike, epu inyamatake.
Aso do ebukenenei kereka lukoboike,
Mam inyeini aiar atekerin tiritir?
Eteluori aanyun nuinera keoŋ,
Ka nuaboŋokini nuka aŋuurianaka.
“Kiwadika aitapoet, kidelelei kamor,
Tetere ekeri do yenesiomi.
Ewonyari mama ejai esaŋe, mam iŋalai.
Karaida kitumor, kidareu ŋes;
Naarai abeit ebuni, mam iyapi.
Mam itenara kotomake:
Konye ebusi ikadoliton kanuka aiyuunike.
Etuŋanan loiwoŋoono, lomam esalenenei ore;
Loitalalaari eimielike bala Okatwak,
Esubit bala atwanare, mam epedorio aimonikin,
Konye etukonokini atekerin kere mamakeŋ,
Etunakini ituŋa kere mamakeŋ.
Mam lu kere itatamete awarag aluikin ŋes, agarac naikienatari ŋes, ebalasi ebe,
“Itukwi ŋol loiyatakini lumere luke!
Itodoli ai?
Loigugunatoi kaititiŋeta!”
Mam kereka kes enyounete katipet lukikonyete jo,
Ekwenyunete lukitunyunyurikinete jo?
Iraun do ijo loŋatunakec.
Naarai iŋat ijo atekerin nuipu,
Kiŋasete jo luedeunos kere luka ituŋa;
Kanuka aokot nuka ituŋa, ka akaje naeswamakinio akwap,
Naeswamakinio ere ka luiboiete kotoma kere.
Itukwi ŋin yenedumakini etogoke ameda naerono,
Tetere esipokini akaike neicelelei,
Tetere itajario kakan naka aronis!
Ineru nukileic abunokin etogokon,
Naarai igela ijo atekerin nuipu;
Idiaka kama ejai aijarakon.
Naarai emonyi amoru kotoma arwatat,
Abao da kotoma akito eboŋokini ŋes.
Itukwi ŋin yeneduki ere kaokot,
Kiticat ere kanumam adolit!
Ituŋa aitaaritoi kanuka akim,
Ka atekerin da agogoritoi kanuka aamameak?
Kwape erapitotor akip aŋolol.
Itukwi ŋin yenitamasi iidunyereke,
Kosodi ainyalakin aisoritike,
Kitemer ŋes da tetere eseseni amujalalakec!
Ileleba ijo ileic itia aibuses.
Komat ijo da, koraun bala yenimam ekepep.
Kibelokin aikopo naka akan nakoteten naka EJAKAIT mamakon,
Ejaunos ileic luimodokokas mama ejai aibusesukon.
Kitukurian jo amudiar naka itiaŋ;
Kanuka aokot nuka ituŋa, ka akaje nakiswamakin akwap,
Ka ere, ka luiboiete da kotoma kere.
Anyoin ameda kidumakini aput naegerer,
Naegeria ekasubanike ŋes;
Aput naecalara, ka ekesisianakinan aimod?
Naarai emunokina ekasubanike akeswam,
Naesubunia aputosia nuebaŋaaka.
Itukwi ŋin yenetemari akito ebe, Kokweny;
Amoru da naabaŋ ebe, Konyou!
Isisianakini tope ŋin?
Koany, iladaaritai kesabu ka epuesa,
Emamei cut eiyeŋane kotomake.
Konye ejai EJAKAIT kotoma oyekaluke lokalaunan:
Kililiŋ akwap kere kakonyeneke.
Ailip naka Kabakuk enabi, naituruo epororo loka Sigionot.
Wu EJAKAIT, apup iemutokon, akurianar:
Wu EJAKAIT, kisikwar akoniswam kokidiŋ kikar,
Kitejen kokidiŋ kikar;
Kanyunyura kiitu aitim.
Ebuni Edeke koTeman,
Lokalaunan komoru Paran.
Erapi aibusesuke akuj,
Ileleba akwap aituritike.
Esubit amwekimwekeke bala aica;
Kolomunete amumwara kakanike;
Nen da ebwaitor akepedor.
Kiŋarenik ŋes atular,
Kolomasi imalia luesaranete kakejeneke.
Kosesen, kisirieŋ atekerin;
Kisiarisiar iroŋan luŋo,
Kokukumoto iukon lukasonya.
Akelosito araas nupeŋo.
Abu kaany iweman luka Kusan kiticanitoi;
Komaranete aigalisio nuka akwap nako Midian.
Koluiki kereka anyunyurakon icorin,
Arai aisiopokon aluikin aŋolol,
Tape ibwanenit ibalasinikon,
Agalinikon nuka aitajar?
Itoduu cut akabwakon;
Ibwaik ikojoi auno.
Ibu kocil akwap kicorin.
Koanyutu jo iroŋan, kokuriakaros;
Kotubor ekwam loepol kakipi:
Kolimu atar ekeporoto,
Kikea akekanin kuju.
Kobwaata akoloŋ ka elap kopalarito kaiboisikec;
Kaica naka imaliakon elosete,
Kamwekimwek naka akwarakon naimilia.
Kicom atekerin kanyunyura.
Aitajar lokinyonyoikitonokon akinyet;
Ibu kimusuŋ akou kotogo loka ikaronon,
Aitodun apetetait kiton omurisiŋ.
Ibu kicum akwes nuka ikajiokoke kibelaike:
Luapotu kopotu kwape etapipirio aitisiarikin eoŋ;
Iyalamas bala luenyamete lukican kaiyeiyea.
Ibu kicak aŋolol kibalasinikon,
Atukot naka akipi nuegogoŋ.
Apupi, emarani da akoikika,
Emarani aitukuka kanuka eporoto ŋol;
Koloma aibos akojoka, amarani kaiboisika.
Edareuni kaiyamakina apaaran naka ican
Abunokin ituŋa lukisurokinete sio.
Karaida emamei araito komusabibun;
Emameun aitaaritoi naka eseitun,
Komam imanikoria eraete inyamat;
Kogelarai esipan loka amerekekin kanuk,
Komamei esipan loka aituk kaujoi:
Eyalamikin Edeke loka aitajarioka.
Itupusi ŋesi akakeje bala akeje nuka amori,
Ketolosi kaiboisioka nuiceleleete.
Loka Ekapolon loka iboro lueruos, koboroka lukaputio lueruos.
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe,
“Etanaŋi cut iboro kere kakwap.”
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe,
“Etanaŋi ituŋanan ka itiaŋ;
Etanaŋi akweny nuka apak, ka iboro lukecor,
Ka luitiguikinete nepepe ka ikaronok;
Amudiari da ituŋanan kakwap.
Ka luiboiete koYerusalem kere;
Amudiari aatoŋot naka Baal kaibois kana,
Ka ekiror da loka isasedotin luemaete aputosia;
Koswion luka itogoi;
Ka ŋul luemaete, luiyapoikinete mama ejai EJAKAIT,
Iyapoikinete da elimito Malakam;
Ka ŋul da luaboŋosi anyoun katupit EJAKAIT:
Ka ŋul da lumam apotu komoata EJAKAIT,
Karaida aiŋit nuke.”
Kililiŋ kakonyen nuka Ejakait EDEKE:
Naarai eapie apaaran naka EJAKAIT:
Naarai etemoki EJAKAIT asubanit,
Etalau da ikepejok.
Kosodi kanen ejaun kapaaran naka asubanit naka EJAKAIT,
“Eticani eoŋ ikapolok, ka odwe luka ekabaka,
Ka ŋul kere luenapitos anapito numo.
Kapaaran kaŋin eticani eoŋ ŋul kere luilamete ekek,
Luilelebete etogo loka ejakaitikec akaje ka aiŋal.”
“Kapaaran kaŋin ejaun ecelet loka aimony
Naebuni korute loka Agaria,
Ka aibwolol kari nakiareit,
Ka aigugururunun koukon.
Naarai amudiaros ituŋa kere lukagwelanarak:
Ŋul kere luigugunatos kepuesa agelaros.
Aŋici eoŋ Yerusalem kakalasia;
Eticani ituŋa luaburokoros kanuka adakaikec,
Luebalas kotauonokec ebe,
‘Mam EJAKAIT iswamai nuejok,
Karaida aswam nueroko.’
Ikecetogoi da amejei,
Eebo, edukete itogoi,
Konye mam iboikinos toma;
Iraete imanikoria luka emusabibu,
Konye mam emasete ebinoke.”
Eapie, iwonyunit noi,
Ŋes eporoto loka apaaran naka EJAKAIT;
Emonyi noi etuŋanan lokirigi kanen.
Apaaran ŋin ŋes apaaran naka anyunyura,
Apaaran naka ican ka aburun,
Apaaran naka asilio ka ameje,
Apaaran naka amuton ka ajikilil,
Apaaran naka idouon ka amuton naejesi cucucuc.
Aluikin ireria luebwaitai,
Aluikin da itogoi lukagogoŋok lueojak.
Ayauni eoŋ aburun otuŋa,
Tetere elosete bala imudukiok,
Naarai adiakasi kama ejai EJAKAIT:
Ebukoros aokotokec bala apua,
Akiriŋikec da bala aoret.
Kapaaran naka anyunyura naka EJAKAIT,
Konye idoporo akwap kere kakim naka ekoloke;
Naarai itanaŋi, eebo, itanaŋi ketasuro
Ŋul kere luiboiete kakwap.
Ijo ateker namam ileieikin;
Eroko etuboro apaaran bala agugu,
Eroko ebunokina yes anyunyura naededeŋ naka EJAKAIT,
Eroko apaaran naka anyunyura naka EJAKAIT ebunokina yes.
Luiswamaete akeicorakineta;
Komoata adolit, komoata da aitasono:
Motoko kitoŋopio kapaaran naka anyunyura naka EJAKAIT.
Eraun Asukelon da ameje:
Ireŋeario ituŋa luka Asudod kidiŋ paaran,
Eutorio da Ekuron.
Ateker naka Ikeretin!
Kiluik akirot naka EJAKAIT jo, wu Kanaan,
Akwap naka Ipilisitian;
Kamudiari jo komam esali yeniboie kotoma.
Ejaunos idukurun luka ikecokok,
Ka anukia da nuka isipanin.
Itadakete isipaninikec kanen:
Eperete kuare otogoi luka Asukelon.
Naarai eanyanari kes EJAKAIT Ekecedeke,
Inyakuni kaijoreoriokec,
Ka amoromor naka idwe luka Amon,
Nuamoromorooto ikatuŋa,
Aitopoloor bonik aluikin eikorukec.”
Edeke loka Isirael ebe,
“Kwape ajaria eoŋ, abeit eraun Moab bala Sodom,
Ka idwe luka Amon bala Gomora,
Airumet naka ikukwa, ka apanya nuka abalaŋ,
Ka ameje naka ikar kere.
Luideunos luka ikatuŋa enaŋete kes,
Aatoŋot naka atekereka irumi kes.”
Edumunete ŋun kanuka eiturikec,
Naarai amoromoroto ido kitopolooros bonik,
Asurokin ituŋa luka EJAKAIT loka ajoresio.
Naarai isiriebi idekesio kere luka akwap eteŋei;
Emaete ŋes ituŋa, ŋinituŋanan kaiboisike,
Kes apujana kere nuka atekerin.
Emudiari Asuria;
Ituluori ŋesi Ninebe ameje,
Koono da bala amodiŋ.
Itiaŋ kere luka atekerin;
Iboie erere ka ecoc kopirinoke;
Eruo etukuri kadirisan;
Ejaun ekuruk okek;
Naarai alaca aswam naka eres.
Loabala kotauke ebe, “Ajai eoŋ,
Emamei ece lokiputor eoŋ,”
Buu! Arau ca ma ameje,
Aibois neeperete itiaŋ!
Ŋin yenitori etubor isuari ŋes,
Ijaŋijaŋi akanike.
Itukwi ŋol lokepali loemunauna,
Ere loemwaŋana!
Mam ecamunit alecorio;
Mam emunokina EJAKAIT;
Mam ikunyakinit Ekedeke.
Ikapolokoke kokidiŋike kes iŋatunyo luegatas;
Ikatubokoke kes ipeen luka eboŋ;
Mam iteperorete ibore kiton tupuruc.
Amunaasi isasedotinike aibois nakalaunan,
Eswamakis ekisil nuka akaje.
Mam iswamaenenei cut numam adolit;
Isideleleuni eketube ŋinitupuruc.
Mam ekurwori;
Konye lumam edolito mam ejenete aileicikin.
“Abu eoŋ kagela atekerin;
Asiŋoros itogoikec lukagogoŋok;
Etisil irotinikec, komamei yenitori;
Amudiaros ireriakec, tape emamei ituŋanan,
Emamei yeniboie kotoma.
Ecamuni alecorio;
Kinyek aiboisike agelario,
Kwape ajaatar kere nuaseu kanuke.’
Konye kodilokis anyoun kitobosata aswamisiokec kere.”
“Kidareutu yesi eoŋ,
Aitodol apaaran naanyounio amejaun,
Naarai apeleikinit atukonokin atekerin,
Ainotun ajakanuto,
Abukokin kes aisiopoka,
Akanyunyura kere naededeŋ;
Naarai idoporio akwapin kere kakim naka ekoloka.
“Naarai kapak kaŋin ebelokini do einere loka atekerin
Araun einere loesegara,
Tetere iworoete kere ekiror loka EJAKAIT,
Ka aijaanakin da ŋes ketau ediopet.
Eyaunete ikeŋaiŋaakaka,
Apese naka luisiarisiaraka, ainakineteka.
Nuibuearit kamakaŋ;
Naarai alemari kokidiŋikus luituros luiwoŋooko,
Mam bobo ipoga koroŋataka lokalaunan.
Emunosi kesi ekiror loka EJAKAIT.
Karaida einer nuka aisab;
Karaida mam edumuna aŋajepa nuka aiŋal aitukekec:
Naarai enyamete eperete, Emameun da yenitukuriani kes.”
Kibwoŋ, ijo Isirael!
Kiyalama, kolakara ketau kere,
Ijo akoku naka Yerusalem!
Ereŋea lokasurupikon.
Ekabaka loka Isirael,
Ŋes EJAKAIT, Ejai kidiŋikon:
Mam bobo ikurianar aronis.
“Sirikikurianar, ijo Sion,
Kinyeis akonikanin aleiekekar.
Ejai EJAKAIT Ekonideke kidiŋikon,
Lokirigi loitajari:
Iyalamikini ŋesi kanukon kailel;
Iyeŋi ŋesi kaminake,
Elakari kayoore kanukon.”
“Alemari abili kamakus,
Tetere mam idumunete amorosit kanuke.
Koany, kapak kaŋin
Eswamakini eoŋ ŋul kere lukiroikinito jo;
Etajari ŋin naicodo,
Etukonokini ŋin naereŋearitai:
Etuluori ikeceleic araun aiturit ka ekiror,
Kakwapin kere.”
Kapak kaŋin da atukonokini yes:
Naarai ketuluori yes ekiror ka aiturit
Kotuŋasinei kere luka akwap,
Nakenyakunia kaijoreoriokus kakonyenekus.”
“Inera EJAKAIT loka ajoresio kwanata ebe: Ebalas ituŋa lu ebe, Eroko apak naduket etogo loka EJAKAIT edolo.”
Kosodi kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ejai Kagai enabi ebe,
“Erai kereka na apak naiboioto yesi kotogoikus luitubusitai, kwabo asilior etogo lo?
Aso do inera EJAKAIT loka ajoresio kwanata ebe: Koomoomata ikusiponesio.

Ipotu koyeata luipu, isakete luikidioko; inyamete konye mam imonikinos; imasete, konye mam numatan kiupete; inapitos igoen, konye emamei yenemwana; ŋin yenedumununei eropit, edumununei eropit aibwaikin oriagi loepedopedo.
“Inera EJAKAIT loka ajoresio kwanata ebe: Koomoomata ikusiponesio.
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Kodokasi oroŋat, koyaut akito, kodukoto etogo; eoŋ da esiyalamikini ŋes, ketubusikinere.

Ipotu koomito adumun luipu, ido keany, koraunos luikidioko; naiyauniata kes ore, abu kakuta. Ebala EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe, Kanukinyo? Kanuka ekatogo loasilior, kwabo ikerete yesi ŋinituŋanan togoke.
Kanuka ŋun etikoki akuj akopyo, etikoki da akwap akeraito kanukus.
Abu kanyarak akamu toma akwap, ka iroŋan, ka akima, ka ebino, ka akinyet, ka lueraete kalup, ka ituŋa, ka ibaren, ka aitaaritoi da kere naka akanin.”
Kosodi Kagai, ekiyakia loka EJAKAIT atemar kakirot naka EJAKAIT mama ejaas ituŋa atiar, “Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Ajai eoŋ kayes.”

Kisidik EJAKAIT emoyo loka Serubabel okoku loka Sealutiel, ekayaiton loka Yuda, ka emoyo loka Yosua okoku loka Yekosadak, esasedoti lopeti, ka imoyon da luka luedeuna kere kotuŋa; kopotu kiswamata aswam kotogo loka EJAKAIT loka ajoresio, Ekecedeke,
kapaaran naka akaisaarei ka nuoŋon naka elap, kolap lokikanyetekape.
Kokaru lokiareit loka ekabaka Dario, kolap lokikanyetekaarei, kapaaran naka akaisaarei kanadiopet naka elap, kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ejai Kagai enabi ebe,
“Kolimok Serubabel okoku loka Sealutiel, ekayaiton loka Yuda, ka Yosua okoku loka Yekosadak, esasedoti lopeti, ka luedeuna kotuŋa ebe,
‘Iŋai bo esalit kayesi loabu koanyunite etogo lo kaibusesuke nasek? Etakani kwana biai kamakus? Mere esubit kakonyenekus bala ibore yenitai?’

Konye ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Kogogoŋior, ijo Serubabel; kogogoŋior, ijo Yosua, okoku loka Yekosadak, esasedoti lopeti; kogogoŋioros, yes ituŋa kere luka akwap; ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Kiswamata: naarai ebala EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe, Ajai eoŋ kayes,
kwape ajaar akirot naabu ketutukik yes nailomuniata koMisiri, iboienenei ekamoyo kotomakus: sirikikuriakaros.
Naarai inera EJAKAIT loka ajoresio kwanata ebe: Irwan atipet bobo, apak naedit, ejaŋakini akuj, ka akwap, ka aŋolol, ka akwap naeonit;
ejaŋijaŋi atekerin, epote iboro luimielas atekerin kere: ebala EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe, Elelebi aibuses togo lo.
Ebala EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe, Erai epuesa ekaŋ, esabu da ekaŋ.
Ebala EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe, Aibuses naka etogo kalo nakoiŋaren itelekari nasek: Ebala EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe, Esinapikini aibois na,”
Kapaaran naka akaisaarei ka nuoŋon kolap lokikanyetekaoŋon, kokaru lokiareit loka Dario, kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ejai Kagai enabi ebe,
“Inera EJAKAIT loka ajoresio kwanata ebe: Kiŋit cani isasedotin nuka ikisila ebe,

‘Arai kitiŋ ituŋanan akiriŋ nakalaunan katwele naka egoeke, kotiroria emugati, arai atap, arai ebino, arai akinyet, arai akiriŋ kere katweleke, araun kereka ŋin yenikalaunan?’ ” Koboŋokis isasedotin ebe, “Mam.”
Kosodi Kagai atemar atiar, “Arai ketiro yenimam elai kanuka akuan nakatwan idiopet koboro kaŋul eraun kereka ŋin yenimam elai?” Koboŋokis isasedotin atiar, “Eraun yenimam elai.”
Kosodi Kagai aboŋokin ebe, “Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Ikote nen ituŋa lu, ikoni da nen ateker na kakonyeneka; ikoni nen ŋiniswam naka akaninikec; ŋin yeneinakinete kaŋina erai yenimam elai.
Aso do, keŋaiŋait, koomoomata nuejaunete amear kapaaran kana ape. Eroko idokokino amoru kuju amoru koyekalu loka EJAKAIT: ipotu kojaas biai?
Ameun kapaki kaŋin kere, naabunio ituŋanan atukit naka aitemisio akaisaarei, emwaasi do atomon bon; naabunio ituŋanan acues naka ebino aokun amotii akaisakany, emwaasi do akaisaarei bon.
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Abu kadany yes kaitukub, ka airouroun, ka akaka da kotoma aswamisio kere nuka akaninikus; konye mam ipotu kibeleunos mama ajai.
Keŋaiŋait, koomoomata amear kapaaran kana ape, amear kapaaran naka akaisaarei ka nuoŋon naka elap lokikanyetekaoŋon. Amear kapaaran naasipokinere apetetait naka eyekalu loka EJAKAIT, koomoomata:
eroko kereka ikinyom ejaas odula? Eroko teni mam erai emusabibu, ka etini, ka ekamamaga ka eseituni? Kesirereŋi yes ameari lolo.”
Kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT irwan nakiareit mama ejai Kagai kapaaran naka akaisaarei ka nuoŋon naka elap ebe,
“Kolimok Serubabel, ekayaiton loka Yuda ebe, Ejaŋijaŋi akuj ka akwapin:

abuburiari eicoloŋ loka ajakanuto; amudiari agogoŋ naka ajakanuto nuka atekerin; abuburiari agalin, ka ŋul da luiboiete kotomakec; ibiroros abalasin ka lukebwanenokokec, ŋinituŋanan kekileŋ loka onaceke.

Ebala EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe, Kapaaran kaŋin kayaŋaari jo, Serubabel ebulesitika, okoku loka Sealutiel; Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Ketuluori jo egilut lokipucet, Ebala EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe, Naarai kaseu jo.”
“Anyunyuriki noi EJAKAIT lukapapaakus.
Kanuka ŋun kolimok kes ebe, Inera EJAKAIT loka ajoresio kwanata ebe: Ebala EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe, Koboŋutu neajai eoŋ, Ebala EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe, Eoŋ da aboŋuni mama ijaas.

Sirikiputokinos kalukapapaakus, luamonyanakinete inabin lusek mamakec ebe, ‘Inera EJAKAIT loka ajoresio kwanata ebe, Koboŋutu ca yesi anyoun koponesiokus lueroko, ka aswamisiokus da nueroko.’ Konye ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Mam apotu kopuput, karaida akiirar eoŋ.
Ai bo ejaas lukapapaakus? Inabin da, ejarenenete kereka kesi ikar kere?

Konye akakiro ka ikakisila luecorakinit ikakejaanakinak inabin, mam kes apotu kodolokis lukapapaakus? Kibelokis kotemasi atiar, Kwape keomitor EJAKAIT loka ajoresio aiswamakin oni, kwape ejaatar iponesiowok, kwape ejaatar da aswamisiowok, abu kiswamak oni kwape kwaŋin.”

Kapaaran naka akaisaarei ka nuoŋon naka elap lokitomonet ka lodiopet, ŋes elap Sebat, kokaru lokiareit loka Dario, kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ejai Sekaria okoku loka Berekia, okoku loka Ido, enabi. Kobala Sekaria ebe,
“Abu kaany kuare, ido koany, etuŋanan ibwanenit ebalasit lokareŋan, kobwo ŋesi kaneajaas ikito luka ekadas luajaas ajesa; kauke da ajaas ibalasin lukareŋak, ka lukomolik, ka lukakwaŋak.
Kasodi atemar ebe, ‘Wu ekajakait, inyoika bo lu?’ Kabala emalaika lokinera keoŋ ebe, ‘Etodikini jo kwape ejaatar.’
Koboŋok etuŋanan loabwoi neejaas ikito luka ekadas kotema atiar, ‘Lu kes luejukarit EJAKAIT alosit lailo ka laije kakwap.’
Koboŋokis kesi emalaika loka EJAKAIT loabwoi neajaas ikito luka ekadas, kotemasi atiar, ‘Kipou kaloto lailo ka laije kakwap, ido koany, iboie akwap kere iyamakina.’
Kosodi emalaika loka EJAKAIT aboŋokin ebe, ‘Wu EJAKAIT loka ajoresio, itodoli ai mam itimi Yerusalem, ka ireria luka Yuda, luinyunyurikinit ijo ikar lu akaisakanykaarei?’
Koboŋok EJAKAIT emalaika lokinera keoŋ kakiro nuejok, kes akiro nuitalakarete.
Katema do emalaika lokinera keoŋ ebe, ‘Kiworo ijo ebe, Inera EJAKAIT loka ajoresio kwanata ebe: Ekokotikin noi Yerusalem ka Sion kekokote loepol.
Anyunyurik noi atekerin nuebwalara; naarai abu kanyunyurikin edit, kiyatakis kesi aiticanet.
Kanuka ŋun inera EJAKAIT kwanata ebe: Aboŋu eoŋ Yerusalem kaitim; ebala EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe, Edukokinio nen ekatogo, eriorio auno nakitemis ko Yerusalem.
Kiworo bobo ebe, Inera EJAKAIT loka ajoresio kwanata ebe: Ilaparos bobo ireriaka kanuka akerianut; italakari bobo EJAKAIT Sion, eseuni bobo Yerusalem.’ ”
Keteluo akakonye kete, ido koany, amumwar aoŋon.
Katema emalaika lokinera keoŋ atiar, “Anyoika bo nu?” Kaboŋok ebe, “Nu kes amumwara nukisiarisiarete Yuda, ka Isirael, ka Yerusalem da.”
Ketodik EJAKAIT eoŋ ikatatak iwoŋon.

Kasodi atemar ebe, “Anyoika nueponitos lu aswam?” Kiner ebe, “Nu kes amumwara nukisiarisiarete Yuda, tape emameun ituŋanan yenitonyouni akouke: konye eponito lu aitukurian kes, aiket amumwara nuka atekerin nuadakakis amumwarakec akwap naka Yuda aisiarisiar ŋes.”
Kasodi atemar ebe, “Ai bo ilosi ijo?” Katema ŋesi eoŋ atiar, “Aitem Yerusalem, aanyun alalauke, ka aojauke da.”
Ido koany, koloma emalaika lokinera keoŋ, kolom ecemalaika aisiriamar ŋes.
Kotema ŋes atiar, “Koker, kinera kekatumunan kaŋol ebe, ‘Ejaunos luiboiete ko Yerusalem kwape koreria lumam ebwaitai, kanuka aipues naka ituŋa ka ibaren kotoma.
Naarai ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Araun eoŋ arwatat naka akim airimor ŋes, araun da aibuses kidiŋike.’ ”
Ijo ba, Sion, koyuun bon, ijo loiboiete kakoku naka Babulon.
Naarai inera EJAKAIT loka ajoresio kwanata ebe: Akaulo kaibuses abu kejuk eoŋ mama ejaas atekerin nukiŋatarito jo: naarai ŋin yenikitirori jo etirorit ecopot loka akoŋuke:
“Naarai, koany, elakilaki akakan kamakec, eraunos amejei mama ejaas ŋul luejaanakinete kes. Ijenunete do ebe kejuku EJAKAIT loka ajoresio eoŋ.
Koye, kolel, ijo akoku naka Sion; naarai ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Koany, abuni, eboikini mamakon.
Imorikikinos atekerin nuipu mama ejai EJAKAIT kapaaran kaŋin, eraunos ikatuŋa; eboikini mamakon, ijenunete do ebe kejuku EJAKAIT loka ajoresio eoŋ mamakon.
Irumi EJAKAIT Yuda bala ewaike kakwap nakalaunan, eseuni bobo Yerusalem.”
Kotema EJAKAIT Satan atiar, “Kitoron EJAKAIT jo, Satan! Eebo, EJAKAIT loabu koseu Yerusalem kitoron jo! Mere lo akalas naalemuna kakim?”
Konapit Yosua inapen lumodok, ebwoi kakonyen nuka emalaika.
Koboŋok, kolimok ŋul luebwoete kakonyeneke ebe, “Kolacak ŋes inapen lumodok.” Kotema ŋes atiar, “Koany, alaca numam edolitokon kamakon, ketanapi do jo igoen luejokuka cut.”
Kabala ebe, “Kitanapikis ŋes egoe loelai lokieniena akouke.” Kitanapikis ca egoe loelai lokieniena akouke, kitanap da inapen; kobwo emalaika loka EJAKAIT kodieke.
Kitogogoŋ emalaika mama ejai Yosua kobala ebe,

“Inera kwanata EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe: Arai ilosenenei korotinika, arai da iricit aicorakineteka, ŋes konyet itubokinia ekatogo, idari da alaroika, kainakini eoŋ jo aibois alomunun nepepe kaŋul luebwoete kodie.
Kopup bo ijo, Yosua, esasedoti lopeti, ijo ka ipaupakon luiboiete kakonyenekon; naarai kes ituŋa lueraas aanyunet; naarai koany, etolomikini ekakejaanakinan Atenut.

Naarai koany, amoru naebwaikinit kakonyen nuka Yosua; ejaas akonye akanykaarei kamoru: koany, ebala EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe, Egirakini emacareteke, alemari da numam adolit naka akwap kana kadiopepaaran.
Ebala EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe, Kapaaran kaŋin inyaraunete yesi ŋinituŋanan ekeidunyet kwap kemusabibuke ido kwap ketinike.”

Katema ŋesi eoŋ atiar, “Inyo bo iany ijo?” Katema atiar, “Aany, ido koany, epir loka atala loka esabu kere, atubake da kujuke, ejaas da kaketalai akanykaarei; ejaas da ipiin ikanykaarei kaŋinidiopet naka atalai, nuejaas kujuke.
Kidunyas kikito iarei luka eseitun, ediopet kosiepike lokoteten loka atuba, ece da kosiepike lokokediany.”
Kaboŋok emalaika lokinera keoŋ atiar, “Ekajakait, anyoika bo nu?”
Kosodi emalaika lokinera keoŋ aboŋokin eoŋ ebe, “Mam ca ma jo ijeni ŋun?” Katema atiar, “Eeca, ekajakait.”
Kosodi ŋesi aboŋokin eoŋ ebe, “Na ŋes akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ejai Serubabel ebe: Ebala EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe, Mere kanuka agogoŋ, karaida kanuka apedor, konye kanuka Ekamoyo.
Iŋai ca ma ijo, ijo eroŋat lokapolon? Iraun apuuton kakonyen nuka Serubabel; itolomuni ŋesi amoru nakapolon kibwoŋas ebe, ‘Asianut, asianut mama ejai!’ ”
Ido kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai ebe,
“Apesikis akanin nuka Serubabel apetetait naka etogo kalo; enetakinete da akekanin ŋes. Ijenuni ijo da ebe kejuku EJAKAIT loka ajoresio eoŋ mama ijai.
Naarai iŋai ca emenit apaaran naka iboro ludidik? Naarai iyalamasi kesi, eanyunete ebiriji kakan naka Serubabel,
“Nu akanykaarei, kes akonye nuka EJAKAIT; ekerete lailo ka laije anatar akwap kere.”
Kasodi eoŋ aboŋokin ŋes ebe, “Inyo bo ikito lu luarei luka eseitun kosiep lokoteten loka epir loka atala kosiepike da lokokediany?”
Kaboŋok eoŋ nakiareit katema ŋes atiar, “Inyo bo aluŋuren nu nuarei nuka eseitun, nuidunyas kamodoi nuka esabu, nuebukonorete akinyet naka esabu?”
Kaboŋok ŋesi eoŋ ebe, “Mam ca ma jo ijeni ŋun?” Kabala ebe, “Eeca, ekajakait.”
Kosodi ŋesi atemar ebe, “Ŋul kes luarei lukinyonyoikitono akinyet, luebwoete kodie ka EJAKAIT loka akwap kere.”
Kasodi bobo eoŋ aiteluor akakonye, kete, ido koany, anunuket naka eitabo naeporitoi.
Katema ŋesi eoŋ atiar, “Inyo bo iany ijo?” Kaboŋok ebe, “Aany anunuket naka eitabo naeporitoi; aojauke ikubitin

Kosodi ŋesi atemar eoŋ atiar, “Ŋin ŋes ekenit loelosi anatar akwap kere: naarai kwape ejaar owaike ediopet egelario ŋinituŋanan kere yenekokoi; ido kwape ejaar owaike ece egelario ŋinituŋanan kere yeniyapoi.
Ebala EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe, Etolosi eoŋ ŋes, elomari ŋesi togo loka ekokolan, togo da loka ŋin yeniyapoi aiŋal elimit ekakiror: iboienenei togoke, emudiari ŋes ka akitoke ka amoruke da.”
Kosodi emalaika lokinera keoŋ alomar, katema ŋesi eoŋ atiar, “Kiteluo cani akonikonye, kite ibore ii yenelosi.”
Kabala ebe, “Inyo bo ii?” Kotema atiar, “Ŋin ŋes epa
Ido koany, aponi kikeunai arapetait naka asasit, ido kiboie aberu kotoma epa!
Kobala ebe, “Na ŋes Aronis”; kocaka ŋes kotoma epa, kocaka alaŋiru naka asasit kaitukuke.
Kasodi aiteluor akakonye, kete, ido koany, kolomut aŋor aarei. Kojai ekwam kabebenokakec; ajaas kes kabebenoka kwape abebenoka nuka etolut: kodakasi epa kidiŋ kakwap ka akuj.
Kasodi eoŋ atemar emalaika lokinera keoŋ atiar, “Ai bo eyaŋaarete nu epa?”
Katema ŋesi eoŋ atiar, “Adukokinia ŋes etogo kakwap naka Sinar: naitemokinor, ibwaikinete epa ŋol nen aiboisike.”
Keteluo bobo akakonye, kete, ido koany, kopotu agalin aoŋon kokidiŋ kiroŋan iarei; iroŋan da keraas iroŋan luka aisinit.
Agali nasodit ajaas ibalasin lukareŋak; agali nakiareit ibalasin lukirionok;
agali nakiwuniet ibalasin lukakwaŋak; ka agali da nakiwoŋonet ibalasin lueŋirooko lukagogoŋok.
Kasodi eoŋ aboŋokin emalaika lokinera keoŋ ebe, “Ekajakait, inyoika bo lu?”
Kaboŋok emalaika eoŋ atiar, “Lu kes ikwamin iwoŋon luka akui, lualomasi anyoun kaibwo kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT loka akwap kere.
Ebei agali naejaas ibalasin lukirionok akwap naka agolitomei; kotupakis lukakwaŋak kes; kobeete lueŋirooko akwap naka eŋalakimak.”
Kobeete lukagogoŋok, komootos aimaniman lailo ka laije anatar akwap. Kobala ebe, “Koloto yesi, kimanimanata lailo ka laije da anatar akwap.” Kosodete kimanimanata akwap.
Kosodi ŋesi aiworor eoŋ katema ebe, “Koany, ŋul luebeete akwap naka agolitomei apotu kisiyamikis Ekamoyo kakwap naka agolitomei.”
Kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ajai ebe:
“Koyaŋa kakesi kaluejoreoritai, kes Kelidai, ka Tobiya, ka Yedaia, luadolut anyoun koBabulon, kolot ijo da kapaaran kaŋin, koloma togo loka Yosia, okoku loka Sepania.
Ido kijau kes epuesa ka esabu, kiswamaunia abokoi, kitanapik kes akou naka Yosua okoku loka Yekosadak, esasedoti lopeti;
kolimok ŋes ebe, ‘Inera kwanata EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe, Koany, etuŋanan ekekiror Atenu; epolouni ŋesi kaiboisike, eduki ŋesi eyekalu loka EJAKAIT.
Eduki teni ŋesi eyekalu loka EJAKAIT; ibwoki ŋesi aibuses, iboie irumi koicoloŋoke loka ajakanut. Ejaun esasedoti die koicoloŋoke: ejaun ainerun naka ainapakin kidiŋ kakesi luarei.’
Ejaunos abokoi mama ejaas Kelem,
Kosodi kanen, kokaru lokiwoŋonet loka ekabaka Dario, kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ejai Sekaria kapaaran nakiwoŋonet naka elap loki kanyerekaoŋon, ŋes Kisileb.
Apotu luko Bet-el kiyakias Sareser ka Regemmelak, ka ikecetuŋa aimaimaun asianut naka EJAKAIT,
ka aiŋit da isasedotin luka etogo loka EJAKAIT loka ajoresio, ka inabin ebe, “Kebusakinit kereka eoŋ aimony ka ailuŋ kolap lokikanyet, kwape eswamaa ikar lu luipu?”
Kosodi kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT loka ajoresio mama ajai ebe,
“Kolimok ituŋa kere luka akwap, ka isasedotin ebe, Naipotu koluniata ka aibworo kolap lokikanyet ka lokikanyetekaarei, ikar lu akaisakanykaarei, ipotu tope koluŋata mama ajai eoŋ, eoŋ ba?
Nainyamiata, naimasiata da, mam kereka inyamete kanukus, komasete da kanukus?

Mam kereka kibusakinito akiirar akiro nukelimonokini EJAKAIT konabin lusek, nakejaatar ituŋa lukiboiete koYerusalem, kisirereŋitete da, ka ireria lukidunyas kaŋes, kejaas da ituŋa lukiboiete ari naka Eŋalakimak ka apuutona?”
Kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ejai Sekaria ebe,
“Inera kwanata EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe, Kitodol etube lokabeit, kitodianak ŋinituŋanan onaceke aitim ka aisioni.
Sirikiroik apuserut, karaida ikoki, karaida imoit, karaida lukican; kinyek idio kayesi aitetemonor aronis kotauke aluikin onaceke.”
Konye koŋeroto kesi apupun, kibelonokis ikeperin, kisikakis akiikec kinyeis apupun.

Eebo, kituluos itauonokec bala eikep, kinyeis apupun ekisil, ka akiro nukijukunit EJAKAIT loka ajoresio komoyoke kama ka inabin lusek. Kanuka ŋun ŋes alomunia anyunyura naepol kama ejai EJAKAIT loka ajoresio.
Ebala EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe, “Kosodi kanen, kwape amonyia eoŋ, koŋeroto kesi apupun; emonyete kesi da kwaŋin, eoŋ da aŋeri apupun.
Konye esiarisiari kes ketapipirio mama ejaas atekerin kere numam apotu kojenete. Kosilior kwaŋin akwap akaulokec, komam ituŋanan etubor karaida aboŋun: naarai kitisilo akwap naajok.”
Kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT loka ajoresio mama ajai ebe,
“Ebala kwanata EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe: Ekokotikin Sion kekokote loepol, ekokotikin ŋes kanyunyura naepol.
Inera EJAKAIT kwanata ebe: Aboŋuni eoŋ Sion, eboienenei kokidiŋ Yerusalem: emaikinio Yerusalem Ere loka abeit: ka eroŋat da loka EJAKAIT loka ajoresio Eroŋat lokalaunan.
Inera kwanata EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe: Iboienenete imakio ka amakio bobo korotin luka Yerusalem, kitiŋite ŋinituŋanan ebelake loitabia kakanike naarai amojoŋ noi.
Ilelebunos irotin luka ere itelepai ka apesur koboliasi korotinike.
Inera kwanata EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe: Arai erai nakaumokin kakonyen nuka aatoŋot naka ituŋa kalu kapaarasia kanu; ebala EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe, Tikeraun nakaumokin da kakonyeneka?
Inera kwanata EJAKAIT loka aloresio ebe: Koany, Etajari ikatuŋa anyoun kakwap nakokide, kakwap nakoto da:
ayauni kes, iboienenete kokidiŋ Yerusalem; eraunos kesi da ikatuŋa, eoŋ da araun Ekecedeke, kotoma abeit ka adolit da.”
Naarai eriŋa kedolo apaarasia ŋun amamei eropit loka ituŋanan, karaida eropit loka etiaŋ; amamei da ainapakin ŋol loaloman ka loalomuni kanuka lokasurup: naarai abu ketuluik ŋinituŋanan kekeidunyet.
Konye ebala EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe, Mam kwana ekoni nen mama ejai aatoŋot naka ituŋa lu kwape kapaarasia nukoloŋo.
Naarai ejaunos ikinyom luka ainapakin; einakini emusabibu araitoke, einakinete alup amiokec, einakini da akuj akopyoke; esurumi da aatoŋot naka ituŋa kalu iboroŋul kere.
Kosodi kanen, kwape kiraar ekenit kotoma atekerin, ijo ekek loka Yuda ka ekek loka Isirael, ketajari do yes kwaŋin, iraunos yesi arereŋ. Sirikikuriakaros, konye kogogoŋoto do akusikanin.”
kwape kwaŋin kapaarasia kanu abu kaomite aiswamakin Yerusalem ka ekek loka Yuda ajokis: sirikikuriakaros.
Nu kes akiro nuiswamaete; kinerasi yesi ŋinituŋanan abeit mama ejai ikeidunyet; kitodolenenete etube loka abeit ka ainapakin koruteikus:
kinyek idio kayesi aitetemonor aronis kotauke aluikin ikeidunyet; siriminas aiyaposit naka aiŋal: naarai ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Ŋun kere eraas nuasacit eoŋ.”
Kobu akirot naka EJAKAIT loka ajoresio mama ajai eoŋ ebe,

“Inera kwanata EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe: Ailuŋ naka elap lokiwoŋonet, ka ailuŋ naka lokikanyet, ka ailuŋ naka lokikanyetekaarei, ka ailuŋ naka lokitomonet eraunos ipucin lukailel ka lukaiyalama, ka lukalakara mama ejai ekek loka Yuda: kanuka ŋun kominas abeit ka ainapakin.
“Inera kwanata EJAKAIT loka ajoresio atiar: Epote teni atekerin, ka luiboiete koreria luipu:
luiboiete kore ediopet elosete ore ece, kinerasi ebe, ‘Karurukaros aimaimaun asianut naka EJAKAIT, ka amoun EJAKAIT loka ajoresio: alosi eoŋ da.’
Eebo, epote ituŋa luipu ka atekerin nuegogoŋ amoun EJAKAIT loka ajoresio Yerusalem, ka aimaimaun da asianut naka EJAKAIT.

Inera kwanata EJAKAIT loka ajoresio atiar: Kapaarasia kaŋun, ikamunete ituŋa itomon, kotoma aŋajepa kere nuka atekerin, ikamunete kito anapito naka ituŋanan kayeni-Yudayat, ebe, ‘Kiupar kayes, naarai kiira isio ebe ejai Edeke kayes.’ ”
Ka Damasiko aibois naeounere.
Naarai itei EJAKAIT akoŋu naka ituŋanan
Ka naka atekerin kere nuka Isirael.
Turo ka Sidon, naarai eco ŋesi.
Abu Turo koduk abwas naegogoŋ kanukeŋ,
Kotukonok epuesa bala apua,
Ka esabu loejok kwape erit loka irotin.
Ecakari akebar toma aŋolol;
Idoporio kakim.
Gasa da, eriebakin noi;
Ka Ekuron, naarai itisilio nuabu komuno.
Eoliori ekabaka koGasa,
Mam ituŋa iboienenete koAsukelon.
Iboie ateker nainyalakina koAsudod,
Etanaŋi da eitur loka Ipilisitian.
Alemari akeokot kaitukuke,
Italesiake da kokidiŋ okelake;
Eraun ŋesi da aatoŋot naka Edekewok:
Eraun kwape ekapolon koYuda,
Ka Ekuron kwape Eyebusit.
Komam yenitori karaida aboŋor:
Mam bobo ekamwaŋan itori tomakec:
Naarai kwana aany kakakonye.
Kikalal, ijo apese naka Yerusalem!
Koany, ebunit ekabakakon neijai:
Erai loedolit ejaas kaitajario;
Itasono kibwanenite da isigiria,
Itaok yenika asigiria.
Ka Yerusalem da ebalasi,
Edemario da akabwa naka ejie;
Elimokini da atekerin ainapakin;
Ilosikin ayaiteke anyoun kaŋolol kiton aŋolol,
Ido anyoun koCor kiton osaŋe loka akwapin.
Adau alemun ienanakon kotoma aipany namam akip.
Kibelokinos neejai abwas naegogoŋ,
Yes ienan luemunos;
Kalimonokin lolo ebe kenyakakini jo irwan aarei.
Naarai abu ketukud Yuda kwape akakabwa,
Etemok Epuraim araut ekemal;
Esidiki da odwekon, wu Sion,
Aluikin odwekon, wu Yaban,
Ketuluori jo kwape ekileŋ loka lokirigi.
Etakanuni EJAKAIT kamakec,
Elomari emaleke kwape eimilia:
Ekutakini Ejakait EDEKE arupepe,
Euparos kitapipirion luka eŋalakimak.
Enyamete, icakacakaete alica nuka aporocet;
Emasete akeceokot kwape kajon:
Ilelebunos kwape atanyia,
Kwape agoria nuka etem.
Kwape esipan loka iketuŋa:
Naarai eraunos bala amor nuka aboko,
Emwekimwekete kakwapuke.
Naarai epol ca ma akejokis,
Epol ca ma aketemelel!
Itopolounete akima ikatumunak,
Ka ebino da lokitetet apesur.
Ŋes EJAKAIT loesubi aimiliaununeta;
Einakini ŋesi kes ilimilimia luka akiru,
Ŋinituŋanan ikui komanikor.
Apotu ikadwarak koanyutu aimod;
Apotu ikerujak kolimokis airujasia nukaiŋal,
Italakarete atai.
Kanuka ŋun ŋes epaariata ituŋa kwape amerekekin;
Iticanio naarai emamei ekecokon.
Eticani ikorwa:
Naarai aanyana EJAKAIT loka ajoresio esipanike, ekek loka Yuda,
Itarauni kes kwape ekebalasit loejok kojie.
Kamakec eloit, kamakec akabwa naka ejie,
Kamakec da ŋolikayaiton.
Eraunos bala ituŋa lukirigin,
Icakacakaete lukasurupokec korit loka irotin kojie;
Ejiosi, naarai ejai EJAKAIT kakes:
Isurumete ikebwanenok ibalasin ileic.
“Etogogoŋi eoŋ ekek loka Yuda,
Etajari da ekek loka Yosep.
Enyakuni kes, naarai etimi kes;
Eraunos bala mam eoŋ ereŋearit kes;
Naarai arai eoŋ EJAKAIT Ekecedeke, eirari kes.
Eraunos luka Epuraim kwape etuŋanan lokirigi,
Elakara ikecetauon kwape luelakara kanuka ebino.
Eebo, eanyunete ikecedwe ŋun, elakaros:
Iyalamikinos ikecetauon kotoma EJAKAIT.
Naarai alaku kes:
Iyatanakinos kwape kolo eyatanakinototor.
Karaida abu kesiarisiar kes kotuŋa;
Keitunete kesi eoŋ kakwapin nuelwaka:
Ebusete nepepe kidwekec, eboŋunete.
Atukonokini kes koAsuria;
Etolomuni kes akwap naka Gilead ka Lebanon;
Komam akwap ilosikini kes.
Inomio akailan nuka aŋolol,
Eokete ataroi kere nuka Nile.
Itisilio eitur loka Asuria,
Enyouni da ebela loka ajakanut nako Misiri.
Etogogoŋi eoŋ kes kotoma EJAKAIT,
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Irimete kokirorike.”
Koŋa ikekiakon, ijo Lebanon,
Tetere idopori akim iresiakon.
Kodelo ijo eberos, naarai ebiror eres,
Naarai amudiaros ikito lukajokak.
Kodelosi, yes iluan luka Basan,
Naarai ajepar amagoro naegogoŋ.
Eporoto loka adelor naka ikecokok!
Naarai eŋatara aibusesukec.
Eporoto loka iŋatunyo ludidik luegatas!
Naarai eŋatara eitur loka Yorodan.
Abu EJAKAIT Ekadeke kiner kwanata ebe: “Korau ijo ekecokon loka esipan loebuni aario.
Luegwelete kes earete kes, kobalas ebe mam adiokirot naitelekarit kes; ŋul da luegwelarete kes ebalasi ebe, ‘Kituritete EJAKAIT, naarai abar eoŋ’: mam ikecokokokec itimete kes.
Naarai ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Mam bobo etimi luiboiete kakwap. Konye, koany, ejaikini ituŋa ŋinituŋanan akan naka iidunyeteke, akan da naka ekabakake: edanyete lukakwap, mam eoŋ da ayuuni kes kakanikec.”
Kolap ediopet kamudia ikecokok iuni. Naarai etapasito ekatau, kes da kalaitos eoŋ.
Kasodi eoŋ atemar atiar, “Mam teni araun ekecokonikus. Ŋin yenetwani, kotwana; ŋin yenemudiario, komudiarai; ŋul da luideunos konyamata ŋinidiopet akiriŋ naka yenice.”
Ketiŋ ekabela Asianut, kabil, tetere abili akaitutuket naetutukit kituŋa kere.
Kobilai kapaaran kaŋin: kwaŋin kojenut ikagwelak amerekekin lukerereete eoŋ ebe kerai akirot naka EJAKAIT.
Kabala kes ebe, “Arai kitojokito, koinakinai eoŋ ekaropit; arai mam, kinyeis.” Kitemoto do ekaropit atutubeta akaisauni nuka epuesa,
Kabala EJAKAIT eoŋ ebe, “Kocakak ekajean” etiai lokapolon loapotu ketemokis eoŋ. Kalem atutubeta akaisauni ŋun nuka epuesa, kacakak ekajean, togo loka EJAKAIT.
Kasodi eoŋ aibil ebelaka ece Eidie, tetere abili einacane kama ejai Yuda ka Isirael.

Naarai koany, adakuni ekecokon kakwap, lomam epod lueoliorito, karaida amoot luesiarakina, karaida aider luebilil; mam da itadaki luicasito, konye enyami ŋesi akiriŋ naka luetumitos, ecilicilei imagegerekec.
Kojaun ekileŋ akanike, akoŋuke da nakoteten!
Koono de akekan,
Komudukanar cut akekoŋu nakoteten!”
“Koany, etuluor Yerusalem aikopo naka aigetigeta mama ejaas ituŋa kere luirimorito; ejaun mama ejai Yuda da kotoma airigaunio naka Yerusalem.
Kosodi kanen, kapaaran kaŋin, etuluori Yerusalem amoru naelaŋir noi mama ejaas ituŋa kere; ŋul kere luedakete ŋes imusuŋanakinos noi. Etukonokinos atekerin kere nuka akwap asurokin ŋes.
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Kapaaran kaŋin, esuumokini ŋolibalasit, esikeripikini ekebwanenonike. Konye esesenete akakonye ekek loka Yuda, naetumudakia ŋolibalasit loka ituŋa.
Etemarete ijaka luka Yuda kotauonokec ebe, ‘Luiboiete ko Yerusalem kes akagogoŋ kotoma EJAKAIT loka ajoresio Ekecedeke.’

“Kapaaran kaŋin etusubi ijaka luka Yuda bala atido naka akim kotoma akito, ido bala akalas naka akim kotoma oisutan; idoporete ituŋa kere airimor, kakan nakoteten ka nakokediany da; eriŋa bobo iboie Yerusalem kaiboisike, ŋes Yerusalem.
Kapaaran kaŋin eiikini EJAKAIT luiboiete koYerusalem; ŋin da yenikalanyana kakesi kapaaran kaŋin eraun kwape Daudi; ekek da loka Daudi eraun kwape Edeke, kwape emalaika loka EJAKAIT kakonyenekec.
Kosodi kanen kapaaran kaŋin amoi eoŋ amudiar atekerin kere nuepote asurokin Yerusalem.
Kapaaran kaŋin ejaun aibworo naepol ko Yerusalem, kwape aibworo naka Kadad-rimon kaditot naka Megidon.
Ibworos lukakwap, ŋolikek kowaike; ekek loka etogo loka Daudi kowaike, ka akeceŋor kowaikec; ekek loka etogo loka Natan kowaike, ka akeceŋor da kowaikec;
ekek loka etogo loka Lebi kowaike, ka akeceŋor kowaikec; ekek loka Isimein kowaike, ka akeceŋor kowaikec;
ikekia kere luedeunos, ŋolikek kowaike, ka akeceŋor da kowaikec.

Kosodi kanen, arai ketakanu bobo ituŋanan edwari, kosodi papake ka totoke luauruunete ŋes atemar ŋes atiar, ‘Mam ijari; naarai inera ijo nukaiŋal kokiror loka EJAKAIT.’ Icumete ŋes papake ka totoke luauruunete ŋes naedwaria.
Kosodi kanen kapaaran kaŋin, ileicikinete inabin, ŋolituŋanan aitapoeteke, naedwaria; mam enapete da elou lokajul aiŋalaa;
konye etemari atiar, ‘Mam eoŋ arai enabi, arai ekakorion akwap; naarai alup kes akairumet ameun keiditeuka.’
Arai kiŋit ŋes idio atiar, ‘Anyoika amusuŋun ŋun kopurakon?’ Kosodi ŋesi aboŋokin ebe, ‘Ŋun kes amusuŋ nukemusuŋio kotogo loka ipaperoka.’ ”
“Kokweny, ijo ekileŋ, asurokin ekecokonika,
Asurokin da etuŋanan epadicika:
Kosen ekecokon, kisiarakinos amerekekin;
Ebelokini akakan mama ejaas ludidik.
Kakwap kaŋin kere, egelario atutubeta aarei nukotomake, etwakete;
Konye kinyeinai atutubet nakiwuniet nakotomake ejari.
Eliliauni kes kwape eliliauna epuesa,
Etemi kes kwape itemere esabu.
Iwoneete ekakiror, eirari kes.
Kabala ebe, ‘Eraas ikatuŋa’,
Kes da ebalasi ebe, ‘Erai EJAKAIT Ekadeke.’ ”
Koany, ebunit apaaran naka EJAKAIT, naekorokoroere lunatarakon kokidiŋikon.
Naarai atukonokini atekerin kere asurokin Yerusalem aitijie; irumio ere, eŋatario itogoi, aŋor da emunaario: ijoreorio atutubet naka ere, konye luideunos luka ituŋa mam egelario kore.
Kosodi konyet elomari EJAKAIT, aitiji atekerin ŋun, kwape kejior kapaaran naka ejie.

Kapaaran kaŋin ebwoete akekejen komoru loka Iseitunin, loitei Yerusalem kari nakokide; ecila emoru loka Iseitunin kokidiŋike kari nakoto ka ari da nakokide, ejaun aditot naepol noi; enyoun atutubet naka emoru aibe ari naka agolitomei, ka atutubeteke ace aibe ari naka eŋalakimak.

Ikerete yesi da kaditot naka iroŋanaka, naarai edoli aditot naka iroŋan Asel: eebo, ikerete, kwape ikeriata anyoun kamaran naka akwap kapaarasia nuka Usia ekabaka loka Yuda. Kosodi kanen ebuni EJAKAIT Ekadeke, ka lukalaunak kere nepepe kaŋes.
Kosodi kanen kapaaran kaŋin, mam ejaun aica kaimiliaun karaida amuton:
konye eraun apaaran adiopet naejeni EJAKAIT; mere apaaran, mere kuare da: konye kanen do ejaun aica eboŋ.
Iboiete ituŋa da kotoma, mam bobo ekenit; konye iboie Yerusalem iyamakina.
Na ŋes atular naedanyia EJAKAIT ituŋa kere luetijiete Yerusalem: ebosi akecekiriŋ eriŋa ebwoete, ebosikinete akecekonye toma adokocokec, ebosikinete aŋajepakec toma aitukekec.
Kosodi kanen kapaaran kaŋin, ejaun aiticanio naebuni kama ejai EJAKAIT mamakec; ikamuni ŋinituŋanan akan naka ikeidunyet, ikeuni da akekan asurokin akan naka ikeidunyet.
Yuda da itijiei Yerusalem. Etukonokinio abar naka atekerin kere nuirimorito, esabu ka epuesa, ka anapito, luipu noi noi.
Edoikini da atular kwape atular ŋin obalasin, onyubun, akaalai, asigiria, ka otiaŋ da kere luejaunos oidukurun ŋul.
Ejaun do ebe ŋin yenika ikekia kere luka akwap yenimam elosi Yerusalem aima Ekabaka, EJAKAIT loka ajoresio, mam akiru etepakini kes.
Arai da mam ekek loko Misiri elosi, aitodiar bon, kosodi edoikini atular mamakec, naedanyia EJAKAIT atekerin numam elosete aidar epucit loka iswamin.
Ŋin ŋes eraun aiticanet naka Misiri, ŋes aiticanet da naka atekerin kere numam elosete aidar epucit loka iswamin.
Kapaaran kaŋin egirir kocirin luka ibalasin ebe, “Yenikalaunan yenika EJAKAIT.” Eputokinos da amoti nukotoma otogo loka EJAKAIT, kwape atanya nukoiŋaren ketem.

Eebo, eraun ŋinimot koYerusalem ka Yuda nakalaunan mama ejai EJAKAIT loka ajoresio: ŋul kere da lueinakinete asuban epote eyaŋaarete kes, ipoete akiriŋ naka asubanit kotoma. Kapaaran kaŋin da emameun bobo ekagwelanaran kotogo loka EJAKAIT loka ajoresio.
Abwokon naka akirot naka EJAKAIT mama ejai Isirael kama ka Malaki.
Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, “Kamina yes.” Konye ibalas yesi ebe, “Kimina ijo sio biai?” Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, “Mam kereka Esau arai onace loka Yakob? Konye amina Yakob;
kwabo alait Esau, ketuluo da ikeroŋan luiswapito, kainak da airumeteke ikuwei luka amodiŋ.”

Karaida kebala Edom ebe, “Kitiyakin kwap, konye kiboŋori aiduk aiboisio nuatiyanakinos”; inera EJAKAIT loka ajoresio kwanata ebe, “Edukete kesi, konye atiyakini eoŋ kwap: emaikinete ituŋa kes Eikor loka aronis, ido Ituŋa luenyunyurikinit EJAKAIT ikar kere.”
Eanyunete akusikonye, itemarete ebe, “Kitopolooritete EJAKAIT adepar eikor loka Isirael!”
Iinakinete emugati loitisilitoi kotemuka. Ibalas ebe, ‘Kitisil isio jo biai?’ Naarai ibalas ebe, Emenen emesa loka EJAKAIT.

Naiinakiniata ibarasit yenimuduk araun asubanit, mam erai aronis! Naiinakiniata da iŋwalas ka ikadekan, mam erai aronis! Ebala EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe, Koinakisi do ekayaitonikus; kisiyalamikini kereka ŋesi jo? Ecamuni kereka jo?”
Keŋaiŋait, kilip asianut naka Edeke, tetere esianiar mamawok. Ebala EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe, Alomunete ŋun kakaninikus: ecamuni kereka ŋesi idio kayesi?

Ti ejok arai kojaun idiopet kayesi yenegolokini ikekia tetere mam yes isinepunete akim kotemuka titai! Ebala EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe, Mam kesiyalamikinit yes, karaida acamun ainakinet naka akanikus.

Naarai ameun kaneelomunia akoloŋ kiton neelomaria ŋesi epol ekakiror kama ka lukacekwapin; ido kaŋiniibois einakinio lukisupurununo mama ejai ekakiror, ka ainakinet naelai: ebala EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe, Naarai epol ekakiror kama ka lukacekwapin.
Konye imunaunete yesi ŋes, naarai ibalas ebe, Esil emesa loka EJAKAIT, emenen da ikenyamat.
