Ibalas da ebe, Koany, epol ca ma aitapasitoi! Ebala EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe, Isuanasi ŋes. Iyaut luademunio kagogoŋ, ka iŋwalasik, ka luedekas; iyaut kwaŋin ainakinet! Ebala EJAKAIT ebe, Acamuni tope eoŋ ŋin kakanikus?

Konye ikenitoi ekamodan loejai ibarasit yenikiliokit osipanike, kiyapoi, kosodi ainakin EJAKAIT yeneŋwalit. Naarai ebala EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe, Arai eoŋ Ekabaka loapol, esogim da ekakiror kama ka lukacekwapin.
Aso do, yes isasedotin, kitebeitai yes aicorakinet na.

Ebala EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe, “Arai kiŋero yesi akiirar, arai da kiŋero yesi aibwaikin etau, aitubusikin ekakiror, ejukuni do ekenit mamakus, ekeni da arerenesiokus: eebo, adau aiken kes, naarai mam ibwaikinito etau.
Koany, etoroni aurikus kanukus, aiukokini aoret akonyenekus, aoret naka asubanakus; kilemario yes nepepe kaŋes.
Ebala EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe, Ijenunete ebe ejukunit aicorakinet na mamakus, tetere akaitutuket ejaun ka Lebi.
Ajai akaitutuket naka aijar ka ainapakin kaŋes; abu kainak ŋes kes tetere eyoŋi, abu kayoŋ eoŋ, kokurianar da ekakiror.
Ajai ekisil loka abeit aitukuke, mam adumakinio numam adolit aŋajepeke. Alosenenei keoŋ kainapakin ka aitenara, kibelok luipu anyoun kanumam adolit.
Naarai ibusakinit aŋajep naka esasedoti aricit aijen, ibusakinit da ituŋa amoot ekisil kaitukuke: naarai erai ŋesi ekiyakia loka EJAKAIT loka ajoresio.
Konye ebala EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe, Ipaasi yesi korot; itiguikis luipu kokisil; ibilata aitutuket naka Lebi.
Kanuka ŋun kainak yes amenio ka asiles kakonyen nuka ituŋa kere, naarai mam ipotu koricata ikarotin, konye ipotu kotiaka ituŋa kokisil.”
Abil Yuda ebotet, eswama naketale kolsirael ka Yerusalem; naarai amuna Yuda alaunit naka EJAKAIT naemin, amany akoku naka edeke lomoit.
Emudiari EJAKAIT ŋol loekwenyi ka ŋol loeboŋokini, koweman luka Yakob, ka ŋol loeinakini ainakinet mama ejai EJAKAIT loka ajoresio, kama ejai ituŋanan yeniswamai ŋun.
Iswamaete da bobo nu: irapiarete etem loka EJAKAIT kakiyo, ka aimony, ka eidiny, naarai mam bobo eseseni ainakinet, karaida acamun kasianut kakanikus.
Konye ibalas ebe, “Kanukinyo?” Naarai arai EJAKAIT ekajenanikon ka aberu naka atumunikon, nakimodomodoi ijo, kwabo erai apaupakon, ka aberu naka aitutuketekon.
Mam ŋes abu kosub idiopet, karaida abu kideu emoyo? Kanukinyo idiopet? Abu komo aur naejok, Aso do kocoito ikusimoyon, kinyek idiopet amodomod aberu naka atumunike.
Naarai ebala EJAKAIT Edeke loka Isirael ebe, “Alait aireŋear, ŋin da yenerapiarit ekegoe kadedeŋ. Ebala EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe, Aso, do kocoito ikusimoyon, kinyeis amodomod.”

Itapasata EJAKAIT kakusikiro, Kwabo ibalas ebe, “Kitapasa ŋes biai?” Naarai ibalas ebe, “ŋinituŋanan yeniswamai aronis ejok kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT, ido isiyalamikinit ŋes.” Arai ebe, “Ai bo ejai Edeke loka etube?”
Konye iŋai bo etitiŋikini apaaran naka abunoreke? Iŋai ca ma ebwoi ketakanu ŋesi?
“Naarai esubit bala akim naka ekeliliaunan, ido bala asabunyu naka ekapwatunan;
iboie rwaru kwape ekeliliaunan, eketesegaaran da loka epuesa, itesegaari odwe luka Lebi, egelemari da kwape esabu ka epuesa; ijaanakinete asuban neejai EJAKAIT kotoma adolit.
Kosodi eminakini EJAKAIT asubanit naka Yuda ka Yerusalem, kwape kapaarasia nuka asonya, kwape kokar lupeŋo.
Ameun kapaarasia nuka lukapapaakus ipaasi yesi kaicorakinetaka, mam iricito kes. Ebala EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe, Koboŋutu mama ajai, eoŋ da aboŋuni mama ijaas. Konye ibalas ebe, ‘Kiboŋuni biai?’
Ekokoi kereka ituŋanan kaneejai Edeke? Konye ikokoete yesi kaneajai eoŋ, Konye ibalas ebe, ‘Kikoko isio inyo kaneijai ijo?’ Lukotomon ka ainakineta.
Kikenitoi yes kekenit; naarai ikokoete yesi kaneajai eoŋ, ateker na kere.

Ebala EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe, Koyautu yenikitomonet kere aiŋadis, tetere ejaunos inyamat togoka, kigimoriata eoŋ, arai mam eoŋ kaŋaikini yes apedon nuka akuj, kasodi abukokin yes arereŋ, namam ilosikin apak kanuka ailiilike.
Ido etoroni ekanyaman kanukus, mam da emudiari araito naka alupokus; ebala EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe, Karaida emusabibukus mam eraraari akeraito komanikor eroko apak.
Ebala EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe, Kinyaraete yes atekerin kere luisirereŋitoi; naarai iraunos akwap naisiyalamikinit.
“Ebala EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe, Kiluikinitos eoŋ kakiro kanuegogoŋ. Konye ibalas ebe, ‘Kiluikinit jo biai koinerikosi?’
Itemasi ebe, ‘Erai aijaanakin Edeke naatai, Ido ajokis anyoin nakipou kedariata akekirot, kilosio da aibworo kakonyen nuka EJAKAIT loka ajoresio?
Kwana kinyarit isio luituros Iuisirereŋitoi; eebo, edukio ŋul luiswamaete aronis; eebo, igimorete Edeke, eyuunio,’ ”
Ebala EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe, “Eraunos lukaŋ, kapaaran naeswamaa, lukaŋ luka etiai loepol; esioniei kes, kwape isionio etuŋanan okokuke loijaanakini ŋes.
Kosodete yesi aboŋun aitiak ikadolitok ka ikaronok, ŋol loijaanakini Edeke, ka ŋol lomam ijaanakini ŋes.

“Naarai ebala EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe, Koany, ebunit apaaran, esarani bala eupa; eraunos luituros kere, ka luiswamaete aronis kere ariaŋ: icwei kes apaaran naebunit, mam ideikini kes aliasit karaida atenu.
Konye yes luiyoŋito ekakiror elomuni kanukus akoloŋ naka adolit ejai kaitaŋaleun kotoma abebenokake. Ilosete yesi icuros bala itak keŋaun kauj.
Ebala EJAKAIT loka ajoresio ebe, Ipudapudaete yesi ikaronok; naarai eraunos ekurwon kotauon luka akejekus kapaaran naeswamaa.
Ibelokini ŋesi itauon luka lukapapa mama ejaas idwekec, ka itauon luka idwe mama ejaas lukapapakec: kenyek eoŋ abunore aidany akwap kekenit.”
Yuda kouri Peres ka Sera kama ka Tamar; Peres kouri Kesuron; Kesuron kouri Ram;
Ram kouri Aminadab; Aminadab kouri Nason; Nason kouri Salumon;
Salumon kouri Boas kama ka Rakab; Boas kouri Obed kama ka Rusi; Obed da kouri Yese;
Yese kouri Daudi ekabaka.
Daudi kouri Solomon kama kaŋin nakerai aberu naka Uria;
Solomon kouri Rekoboam; Rekoboam kouri Abiya; Abiya kouri Asa;
Asa kouri Yekosapat; Yekosapat kouri Yoram; Yoram kouri Usia;
Usia kouri Yotam; Yotam kouri Akas; Akas kouri Kesekia;
Kesekia kouri Manase; Manase kouri Amon; Amon kouri Yosia;
Yosia kouri Yekonia ka ikeinacan, apak naka aijoreorio Babulon.
Serubabel kouri Abiud; Abiud kouri Eliakim; Eliakim kouri Asor;
Asor kouri Sadok; Sadok kouri Akim; Akim kouri Eliud;
Eliud kouri Eleasar; Eleasar kouri Matan; Matan kouri Yakob;
Yakob kouri Yosep ekile loka Mariam, naauriei Yesu loenyaritai Kristo.

Kwaŋin aturio kere ameun ka Aburaam kiton Daudi emwaasi aturio atomon ka nuoŋon, ameun ka Daudi da kiton aijoreorio Babulon aturio atomon ka nuoŋon, ameun da kaijoreorio Babulon kiton Kristo aturio atomon ka nuoŋon.
Konye ekileke Yosep kineru ainyein ŋes kaiyeiyea naarai korai ekiliokit loedolit, komam ekoto aisurum ŋes ileic.
Konye nakeomoomaa ŋun, koany, kitakanikin ŋes emalaika loka Ejakait kotoma airujasit, ebala ebe, “Yosep, okoku loka Daudi, sirikiyoŋ aimany Mariam; naarai akepotuun erai naka Emoyo Lokalaunan.
Idouni ŋesi ikoku yenisapat, imaikini ekekiror Yesu, naarai ŋes itajari iketuŋa kadiakanaretakec.”
Iswamatai nu kere, tetere edoli akirot naenerit Ejakait kama ka enabi ebe:
Emaikinete ekekiror Imanuel”
(apolouke ebe, Edeke ejai kaoni).
Nakenyounio Yosep kajoo, kiswama kwape kicorakinia emalaika loka Ejakait, komany akeberu;
mam abu kojen ŋes aitodol naauria ikoku yenisapat; komaik ekekiror Yesu.
kobalas ebe, “Ai bo ejai ŋol lokeurio Ekabaka loka Iyudayan? Naarai kipou kaanyutu aaceritike kokide, ido kiponit isio aima ŋes.”
Nakepupunio Kerode ekabaka ŋun, kiyaloŋoŋ, ka luko Yerusalem da kere nepepe kaŋes.
Kotukonok isasedotin lupeti ka ikewadikak luka ituŋa kere, kiŋitana kes netieurikinitai Kristo.
Kolimokis ŋes ebe, “Toma Betelekem loka Yudaya, naarai iwadikat enabi kwaŋin ebe,
Mam irai loidite kokapolok luka Yuda;
Naarai kotomakon elomuni ekayaiton,
Loicokiei ikatuŋa Isirael.’ ”
Kosodi konyarau Kerode lukacoa kaiyeiyea, kinyikok aiŋitiŋit kes apak nakitaanyikinor aacerit.
Kijuka kes Betelekem, kotema atiar, “Koloto, komoata ikoku kainyikokin; kidaut aanyun ŋes, kitejenut eoŋ akiro, tetere eoŋ da alosi aima ŋes.”
Nakedauniata apupun akiro nuka ekabaka, koloto; ido koany, kiŋarenik kes aacerit ya nakeanyunete kokide, aitodol neabwoia kaibois kanaajai ikoku,
Nakeanyuniata aacerit kiyalamikinos aiyalama naepol noi.
Kolomasi togo, koanyut ikoku ka Mariam totoke; kibiroros komaata ŋes; kosodete kopukosi ikeceboro lukakais, kijaikis ŋes ainakineta, esabu ka lukisupurununo ka luesaete.
Kosodi kikwenya kes Edeke kairujasit ebe sirikeboŋosi mama ejai Kerode, koboŋosi obukec kecerot.
Konyou ŋesi, koyaŋa ikoku ka totoke kuare, koloto Misiri;
kiboi kaŋina aitodol neatwania Kerode; tetere edoli akirot nakinerit Ejakait kama ka enabi ebe, “Abu kanyarau okokuka koMisiri.”

Kosodi nakeanyunia Kerode ebe amodata lukacoa, konyunyurikin noi, kiyakia ituŋa aiar idwe kere lusap lukejaas Betelekem, koidunyetake da kere, lukeraas luka ikar iarei ka lumam edolito ŋul, kwape ejaar apak kaya nakinyikokinia aiŋitun kama ejaas lukacoa.
Kosodi kitodolikin akirot nakinerit enabi Yeremia ebe,
Komam ecamunit aitalakario, naarai emameete.”
Konye ketwana Kerode, koany, kitakanikin emalaika loka Ejakait Yosep kairujasit koMisiri,
kobala ebe, “Konyou koyaŋa ikoku ka totoke, kolot akwap naka Isirael: naarai atwakata luemootos aijar naka ikoku.”
Konyou ŋesi, koyaŋa ikoku ka totoke, kodol akwap naka Isirael.
Konye nakepupunio ebe erum Arekelao Yudaya aibois naka Kerode papake, kokurianar alosit ŋina; kosodi kikwenya Edeke ŋes kairujasit, kolot akwap nako Galilaya.
Kolot kiboikin ore loenyaritai Nasaret: tetere itodolikinio akirot naenerito inabin ebe, “Enyarao Enasarayot.”
ebala ebe, “Kitoronikinos; naarai aapu ajakanut naka akuj.”
“Eporoto loka loiworoi kamodiŋ ebe,
Kitemonokisi erot loka Ejakait,
Kitetenata ikesokono.”
Kosodete kolomasi mama ejai lukoYerusalem ka luko Yudaya kere, ka lukakwapin kere nuidunyas Yorodan;
kibatisa ŋesi kes kocor Yorodan, kolimonorete akecediakanareta.
Aso koraata araito nuibusakinito aitoronikin:
kwabo siriwomito kotauonokus ebe, ‘Ejai oni Aburaam papaawok’: naarai kalimokini yes ebe epedori Edeke aitonyoikin Aburaam idwe kotoma amoru kanu.
Nati kwape kwana da ibwaikinitai aep atoromin nuka ikito: aso ŋolikitoi lomam erai araito nuejok ejepario, ka acakakin akim.
Ejai ekeritei akanike, epiari cut ekepejal; etukonokini akimake odula, konye icwei agugu kakim namam itudeŋio.”
Konye kokoto Yokana aitikokin, ebala ebe, “Epuda jo aibatis eoŋ, ijo da ibuni mamakaŋ?”
Konye Koboŋok Yesu, kolimok ŋes ebe, “Kocam do kwana; naarai kwaŋin ibusakinitor oni aitodol adolit kere.” Kosodi kocam.
Nakedaunia Yesu aibatisao, atipet kodoku kakipi: ido koany, kopukokin akuj, koany Emoyo loka Edeke ijesun kwape ajele, ebuni mamakeŋ;
ido koany, kobu eporoto kokuju ebe, “Lo ŋes Okokuka lominat, loalelia eoŋ noi.”
Koluŋ apaarasia akaisaoŋon apaaran ka akuare, kosodi konyet korieb eteŋei.
Konye Koboŋok ebe, “Iwadikatai ebe, Mam ituŋanan ejari kanuka atap bon, nabarai kanuka ŋinikirot naelomuni kaituk naka Edeke.”
Kosodi Satan ayaŋaar ŋes ore lokalaunan; kisibwo koswi loka eyekalu,
kolimok ebe, “Arai tope irai ijo Okoku loka Edeke, kosomari kwap: naarai iwadikatai ebe,
Einakini ikemalaikan aidar jo, Kidakete jo kakaninikec,
Kinyek amoru aiguikin akonikeju.”
Koyaŋa bobo Satan ŋes oroŋat loicelelei noi, kitodianak ajakanuto kere nuka akwap, ka aibusesukec;
kotema ŋes atiar, “Kainakini ŋun kere, arai kibiror aima eoŋ.”
Kosodi kotema Yesu atiar, “Irwa, Satan; naarai iwadikatai ebe,
Komaenenei Ejakait Ekonideke, Kijaanakinenei ŋes bon.”
Nakepupunio ŋes ebe ekamar Yokana, kolot Galilaya;
konyou koNasaret, kobu kiboikin Kaparanaum, loidunyas aŋolol, koikorun luka Sebulun ka Naputali,
tetere itodolikinio akirot naenerit Isaia enabi ebe,
“Akwap naka Sebulun, ka akwap naka Naputali,
Abear aŋolol, kokekwa Yorodan,
Galilaya naka Imo.
Ituŋa lueboiete kamuton, Aanyut aica naepol,
ŋul da lueboiete kakwap ka etoribe loka atwanare, Eliyaiki aica.”
Kotema kes atiar, “Kotupunai, eoŋ da ketaraun yes ikalokak ituŋa.”
Atipet kinyeis iboyanakec, kotupasi ŋes.
Kikunyak kiŋaren koany iinacan ice iarei, Yakob okoku loka Sebedayo, ka Yokana onaceke, lukejaas ataker nepepe ka Sebedayo papakec, erucete iboyanakec; konyarau kes.
Atipet kinyeis ataker ka papakec, kotupasi ŋes.
Kikaikin ekeemut Suria kere: koinunai ituŋa kere lukedekas, lukikamunito iponesio luegelegela luka adekesia, ka ariebo, lukajokina, ka lukipumu, ka lukasenyak da; kitaŋaleu kes.
Kotupasi ŋes ikodeta luipu lukepote koGalilaya ka Dekapoli, ka Yerusalem, ka Yudaya, ka okekwa Yorodan da.
Kooŋ akeituk, kisisianak kes, kobala ebe:
Kiyalamikinos, kolakaros noi: naarai epol ekusiropit kotoma akuj: naarai kimana kolo kwaŋin inabin lukigeikinete yes.
Ido mam ituŋa inokokinete atala, ka abuburikin ebukit, dimarai ikajakinete ocoget, ecaikini kere luejaas togo.
Kwaŋin kocau akusiica kakonyen nuka ituŋa, tetere eanyunete akusiswamisio nuejokuka, kitopoloosi Papakus loejai toma akuj.
Naarai abeit katemari yes atiar, Aitodol naedaunotor akuj ka akwap, mam cut edaun inyukuta idiopet, karaida aitakinet adiopet naka ikisila, aitodol neitodolikinere kere.

Aso ituŋanan kere yenepaluni aicorakinet adiopet kotoma kaŋun kanueraas nudidik, ka aisisianakin ituŋa kwaŋin, enyarao yenididi cut kotoma ajakanut naka akuj: konye ŋin kere yeniswamai ka aisisianakin kes, enyarao ŋin ikapolon kotoma ajakanut naka akuj.
Naarai katemari yes atiar, arai mam akusidolit itelekarit adolit naka ikewadikak ka Iparisayon, mam cut ilomunete toma ajakanut naka akuj.

Konye eoŋ katemari yes atiar, Ŋinituŋanan yenenyunyurikini onaceke ibusakinit atubokinio; ka ŋin da yenemoromoroi onaceke ibusakinit airabis; ŋin da yenetemari atiar, Ibaŋaanal Ibusakinit eupa loidopit.
Aso arai iyauni ainakinetekon otem, kosodi kiitu kanen ebe ejaas onacekon akiro kajo,
kinyek ainakinetekon kotem, kolot ber; kopuco konacekon, kosodi konyet aboŋun ainakin ainakinetekon.
Kocamanaros atipet kalokiwosat jo, apak naijaatatar kaŋes orot; kinyek je lokiwosat ayaŋaar jo mama ejai ekatubon, ekatubon da ayaŋaar jo mama ejai eserikalet, ijo da kiremokinio aidaris.
Abeit katemari jo atiar, Mam cut inyouni kanen, aitodol neitacia ikapu yenikawasia.
Konye eoŋ katemari yes atiar, Ŋolituŋanan loeseseni aberu kaiŋobel, etielo ŋes kotauke.
Arai kiduporit akonikoŋu nakoteten, kogoru, kocaka: naarai ibus koolio idiopet katutubetakon, kinye akonikuan kere acakario toma oupa.
Arai kiduporit akonikan nakoteten, kojepa, kocaka; naarai ibus koolio idiopet katutubetakon, kinye akonikuan kere alosit toma oupa.
konye eoŋ katemari yes atiar, ŋolituŋanan loireŋeari akeberu, dimarai kanuka adotear, esidotea ŋin: ŋol da loemanyi ya naereŋearitai, adotear.
Konye eoŋ katemari yes atiar, Siriyapoi cut; karaida alimit akuj, naarai erai eicoloŋ loka Edeke;
karaida alimit akwap, naarai erai iicoloŋ yenika akejeke; karaida alimit Yerusalem, naarai erai ere loka Ekabaka lokapolon.
Kwabo siriyapoi alimit akonikou, naarai mam ipedori aituluor ekonitimat ediopet araun Ioekwaŋ arai loiriono.
Konye nuineras koraas Eebo, eebo, arai Mam, mam: naarai nuedeparito ŋun epote kama ejai lokaronon.
Ka ituŋanan yenekot awoosan jo, ayaŋaar ekasokon, kinyeinia ŋes ekooti da.
Ŋin da yenikitiŋaikini alosit amairo adiopet, kolot ka ŋes amairon aarei.
Yenikilipi, koinak, ka yenekot ayuunio kamakon sirikiboŋok epur.
Konye eoŋ katemari yes atiar, Kominasi lukasurupokus, kilipanakinete da lukimanito;
tetere iraunete idwe luka Papakus loejai toma akuj; naarai itacaikini ŋesi akekoloŋ lukaronok ka lukajokak da, isitepikini akiru luedolito ka lumam edolito da.
Naarai arai iminasi lukiminas yes, idumunete eropit enyoin? Mam kereka iketelemak esolo iswamaete nuikote nen?
Arai da iyogaete iinacanakus bon, iswamaete nunyoika adepar ice? Mam kereka Imo iswamaete nuikote nen?
Aso iraunete yesi luidolito, kwape edolitor Papakus lokotoma akuj.

“Aso naikoria ainakineta nukaitim, sirikituru arupepe kakonyenekon, kwape iswamaata lukesoswai kotoma atukosia, korotin da, tetere itopoloorete ituŋa. Abeit katemari yes atiar, Adaut adumun eropitikec.
Konye jo naikoria ainakineta nukaitim, kinyek akonikan nakokediany ajenun nuiswamai nakoteten;
korau akoniikor nakaiyeiyea; Papakon da loeseseni kaiyeiyea kiropi jo.
Konye jo nailipenenaa, kolomanari toma agolakon, kidau agolokin ekonikek, kilip Papakon lokaiyeiyea, Papakon da loeseseni kaiyeiyea kiropi jo.
Aso sirikiputokinos kaŋul: naarai ejeni Papakus nuipudasi yesi, eriŋa kilipa.
Papakosi loejai toma akuj, Ekonikiror kitalaunai.
Nuikoto kiswamai kakwapin Kwape iswamaere kotoma akuj.
Koinakinai sio lolo ikosinyamat luka lolo.
Kwape kisionio isio lukapeseninikosi.
Konye koyuunai kama ejai lokaronon.
[Naarai ajakanut, ka apedor, ka apolou, eraas nukon, ikar kere, Amen.]
Konye arai mam yes isioniete luce akeceibucanareta, Papakus da mam kisionie yes akusiibucanareta.
Konye jo, nailuŋia, kinyonyoenenei akinyet akoukon, kilosi da akonikonyen,
tetere mam itakanuni kotuŋa ebe iluŋi, dimarai Papakon lokaiyeiyea: Papakon da loeseseni kaiyeiyea, kiropi jo.
Konye kiŋadanakinete kanukus abar akuj, nemam emunaariata ikajekel ka amasikin, ido nemam ebokiata ikokolak ka akokwaar da.
Naarai nepejai akonibar, nepenen ejaikin ekonitau da.
Konye arai erono akonikoŋu, akonikuan kere emutono. Aso arai emutono aica naejai kotomakon, epol ca ma amuton ŋin!
Emamei ituŋanan yenepedori aijaanakin ijaka iarei; naarai arai elai ediopet, komina loce; arai bo iketakin kediopet, emeni loce. Mam ipedorete aijaanakin Edeke ka aijaanakin abar da.
Kosesenata akweny nuka apak, mam eyeete, karaida aidweny, karaida atukonokin Emono; konye itanyami kes Papakus lokotoma akuj. Mam kereka yes itelekaritos ŋun ketiai?
Iŋai bo kayesi kiyaloŋoŋ epedori aiyatakin akeibut?
Kanukinyo iyaloŋoŋooto kanuka anapito? Koomito aapecelun nuka ais, kwape epolooto; mam itaaritos, ido mam eojiete:
konye katemari yes atiar, Ka Solomon da kotoma aibusesuke kere mam esiritoi kojokan kwape adiopet kaŋun.
Aso arai itanapi Edeke kwaŋin inya luka ais, luejaas lolo, ecakario moi oupa, mam kereka itelekari aitanap yes, okwe yes luedit aiyuun?
Aso sirikiyaloŋoŋoto kobalas ebe, ‘Kinyami inyo?’ Arai ‘Kimasi inyo?’ Arai, ‘Kinapi inyo?’
Naarai emoete Imo ŋun kere; kwabo ejeni Papakus lokotoma akuj ebe ipudas ŋun kere.
Konye komoata ber yesi akejakanut, ka akedolit da; ido kiyatakinio ŋun kere.
Naarai etube loitubete, ŋopeŋol kitubokinere; ka aitemis naitemioto, ŋipeŋin kitemere yes da,
Aso kanukinyo isesenia igugut yenejai akoŋu naka onacekon, komam ipodo akitoi naejai akoŋukon kilopet?
Arai ilimokini biai onacekon ebe, ‘Kinyek kalem igugut yenejai akoŋukon’; ido koany, ejai akitoi akoŋukon kilopet?
Yenikesoswai ijo, kolem ber akitoi naejai akoŋukon kilopet; kosodi konyet asesen kotenan alemun igugut kakoŋu naka onacekon.
Naarai ŋin yenilipi ijaikinio; yenemoi edumuni; ka yenikuŋukuŋi da enaikinio.
Arai iŋai kereka kayesi, kilip ikokuke emugati, einakini tope amoru?
Arai kilip agar, einakini tope ŋes emun?
Aso arai yes lukaronok ijenete ainakin ikusidwe ainakineta nuejok, mam kereka itelekarit noi Papakus loejai toma akuj ainakin ŋul Iuilipete ŋes iboro luejok?
Aso nuikotosi ituŋa aikonakin yes, kikonakis yesi da kes kwape kwaŋin: naarai ŋun kes ikisila ka inabin da.
Edidiŋ erut, eridid da erot loebei aijar, luedumunete da eraas luikidioko.
Ijenunete kes kakeceraito. Edeŋete kereka ituŋa imusabibun kokito luka ikukwa, arai bo itinin kokodokodo?
Kwape kwaŋin ŋolikitoi loejok erai araito nuejok; konye do ekitoi loerono erai araito nueroko.
Mam epedori ekitoi loejok aira araito nueroko, karaida ekitoi loerono aira araito nuejok.
Ŋolikitoi lomam erai araito nuejok ejepario, kocakakinai akim.
Kanuka ŋun ijenunete kes kakeceraito.
Katemarete luipu kapaaran kaŋin atiar, ‘Ejakait, Ejakait, mam kereka kipou kadwarata kokirorikon, kokirorikon da kereŋeasi ajokin, kokirorikon da keswamata aswamisio nukapedor nuipu?’
Kasodi alimor mamakec ebe, ‘Mam lem kajeni yes nepecep da: konyoutu kama ajai, yes lukeswamak nukepali.’
kotep akiru, kolelek akalele, kokuta ikwamin, koleata etogo ŋol; mam ibiroro: naarai kepesikinitai atiida.
Ŋin da yeniirari akakiro nu, komam iswamai, ituputoorio ketuŋanan lobaŋ, lokeduki eketogo asiŋe:
kotep akiru, kolelek akalele, kokuta ikwamin, koleata etogo ŋol; kibiror; akeibiror da korau naepol.”
Naarai kisisianakini kwape etuŋanan loejai apedor, kwabo mere kwape ikewadikakakec.
Ido koany, kobu etuŋanan lokatapon mama ejai, koma ŋes, kobala ebe, “Ejakait, arai ikoto, ipedori aiswagar eoŋ.”
Korio Yesu akekan, kotiro ŋes, kotema atiar, “Akoto; kiswagar.” Atipet kiswagar aketapon.
Kolimok Yesu ŋes ebe, “Kocoite, sirikilimok idiotuŋanan; konye kolot, kitodiar mama ejai esasedoti, koinak ainakinet nakolo kicorakini Musa, araun aitejenunet kamakec.”
kotema atiar, “Ejakait, eperi ekatelepat kotogo edeka eseny, erieba noi jokan.”
Kotema ŋes atiar, “Abuni aitaŋaleun.”
Koboŋok ekapolokiton kobala ebe, “Ejakait, mam eoŋ kebusakinit jo alomun kwap kekaswi; konye kolim akirot bon, eŋaleuni ekatelepat.
Naarai eoŋ da arai etuŋanan lokayaitai, ejaas iserikalei luayait eoŋ: ido alimokini ediopet ebe, ‘Kolot,’ elosi; ece da ebe, ‘Bia,’ ebuni; ekabulesit da ebe, ‘Kiswama na,’ ido iswamai.”
Nakiiraria Yesu ŋun, koumok, kotema kwi luketupito atiar, “Abeit katemari yes atiar, Mam lem adumunit aiyuun naepol naetia na, karaida toma Isirael kere.
Katemari yes atiar, Epote rwaru luipu anyoun kokide koto da, kiboikinos kesi nepepe ka Aburaam, ka Isaak, ka Yakob, toma ajakanut naka akuj.
Konye idwe luka ajakanut ecakario toma amuton nakokiŋa: ejaun kaŋina aimony ka airiamanakin ikel.”
Kotema Yesu ekapolokiton atiar, “Kolot, kwape ejaar akoniiyuun, kojau kwape kwaŋin.” Koŋaleu etelepat kosawa kaŋol.
Kotiro akekan, koŋaleu ekamidi; konyou kijaanak ŋes.
Nakitiboŋ, koinunai lukajokin luipu: kireŋea ajokin kakekirot, kitaŋaleu lukadekak kere.
Tetere itololikinio akirot naenerit Isaia enabi ebe, “Kolema ŋesi elopet awokokalanyanut, kibwok adekesiawok.”
Kobu ekewadikan ediopet mama ejai, kotema ŋes atiar, “Ekesisianakinan, katupenenei jo kama ilosi kere.”
Kotema Yesu ŋes atiar, “Ejaas ikuwei apanya, akweny da nuka apak ejaas akaisikec; konye Okoku loka etuŋanan emamei nama iperikini akekou.”
Kotema ece kokesisiak ŋes atiar, “Ejakait, kisiikinai ber kalot keda papaka.”
Konye kotema Yesu ŋes atiar, “Kotupunai; kinye lukatwak kidaata lukatwakakec.”
Ido koany, kodakun ekwam loepol kaŋolol, korapasi akailan ataker: konye kejotoi ŋesi.
Koloto ikekesisiak mama ejai kitwekenyut, kobalas ebe, “Ejakait, kitajarai; kimudiar.”
Kotema kes atiar, “Kanukinyo ikuriakarotor, yes luedit aiyuun?” Kosodi konyou, kiretak ikwamin ka aŋolol; kojaun aiyamakin cut,
Koumokis ituŋa, kobalas ebe, “Ikoni bo ai etuŋanan lo? Naarai ikwamin ka aŋolol da erimasi ŋes.”
Ido koany, kiworoto, kobalas ebe, “Ijo Okoku loka Edeke, anyoika ijo kasio? Ibu kereka ijo aitican sio eroko apakikosi kedolo?”
Ido kojai esipan loka ipegei luipu edakasi kama elwana.
Kiŋaiŋaata ajokin ŋes kobalas ebe, “Arai kiireŋea sio, kijukarai kalomasi osipan je loka ipegei.”
Kotema kes atiar, “Kolototo.” Kolomutu kolomasi toma opegei; ido koany, komotar esipan kere nejululuei kibirokinos aŋolol, kotwakikis akipi.
Kokerata ikecokok, kolomasi ore, kolimonokis akiro kere, ka nukedoikinete kwi lukajokin.
Ido koany, kolomut lukore kere airiamun ka Yesu: nakeanyut, kiŋaiŋaata ŋes anyoun koikorunokec.
Ido koany, koinut ŋes etuŋanan lokasenyan, eperi koitada: nakeanyunia Yesu akeceiyuun, kotema lokasenyan atiar, “Okoku, kotitiŋior; esionii akonidiakanareta.”
Ido koany, kotemasi ice kokewadikak kotauonokec atiar, “Einyanakini lo Edeke.”
Konye kojen Yesu aomisio nukotauonokec, kotema atiar, “Kanukinyo iwomitotor nukaronok kotauonokus?
Ani bo naepatana, atemar atiar, Esionii akonidiakanareta, arai bo atemar ebe, Konyou, kolot?
Konye tetere ijenunete ebe ejai Okoku loka etuŋanan apedor kakwap aisioni adiakanareta” kosodi kotema ŋesi lokasenyan atiar, “Konyou, kibwok ekoniitada, kolot orekon.”
Konyou ŋesi, kolot oreke.
Konye nakeanyuniata ikodeta, kokuriakaros, kitopoloosi Edeke, lokeinakini ituŋa apedor naikoni na.
Nakeanyuniata Iparisayon, kotemasi ikekesisiak atiar, “Kanukinyo emoriata Ekusikesisianakinan ka iketelemak esolo ka ikadiakanarak da?”
Konye nakepupunio Yesu, kotema atiar, “Lukaŋaleok mam ipudasi emurwon, dimarai lukadekak.
Konye koloto yesi kisisiata apolou naka akiro nu ebe, ‘Akoto aitim, kwabo mere asuban.’ Naarai mam abunit anyarit ikadolitok, dimarai ikadiakanarak.”
Kotema Yesu kes atiar, “Epedorete kereka luenyaritai oiterane aibworo, naeiaarar ka eteran? Konye eponito apaarasia nuedemarere eteran, eluŋete do.
Emamei ituŋanan yenedonyokini acana naka egoe lokitetet toma ananito namojoŋ; naarai acana naibwaikinio ecili anapito, iyatakini do acilat.

Kwabo mam ituŋa ibwaikinete ebino lokitetet toma oriagin lumojoŋ luka emukule; arai kibwaikis, enedasi iriagin, ebukor ebino, emunaaros iriagin; dimarai ibwaikinete ituŋa ebino lokitetet oriagin lukitetiak, tetere ikuniaete kere.”
Konyou Yesu kotupa ŋes, nepepe kikekesisiak.
Ido koany, kobu aberu kokauke, nakedeka alel naka aokot ikar itomon ka luarei, kotiro atwele naka anapitoke;
naarai kotema kotauke atiar, “Arai katiro anapitoke bon, aŋaleuni.”
Kibelokin Yesu, koany ŋes, kotema atiar, “Kotitiŋior akokuka; kitaŋaleu jo akoniiyuun.” Koŋaleu aberu ameun kosawa kaŋol,
Nakedolio Yesu ore loka ekayairon, koany luekusere alamarun, ka ekodet eborianete,
kotema atiar, “Kolomasi kiŋa; naarai mam etwanit ipese konye ejotoi.” Kokienatar ŋes.
Konye kedau aitolomar ekodet, kooma toma, kitiŋ akan naka ipese, konyou ŋin.
Kilosikinos akiro ŋun akwap ŋin kere;
Nakitorio Yesu kanen, kotupasi imudukiok iarei, kiworoto kotemasi atiar, “Okoku loka Daudi, kitimoi sio.”
Keloma ŋes itogo, kopotu imudukiok mama ejai; kotema kes Yesu atiar, “Iyuunitos ebe apedori eoŋ aswam na?” Kotemasi atiar, “Eebo, Ejakait.”
Kosodi kotiro akonyenekec kobala ebe, “Kwape ejaar akusiiyuun kiswamakin yes kwaŋin.”
Kokwenyutu akecekonyen. Kicoro Yesu kes noi ebe, “Kocoito, kinyek imodiotuŋanan ajenun.”
Konye konyoutu kesi, kisiarakis ekeemut akwap ŋin kere.
Napenyounete kwi, koany, koinunai ebaŋ loajai ajokit.
Kireŋear ajokit kiner lobaŋ; koumokis ikodeta, kobalas ebe, “Mam lem etakanunitos nuikote nen kotoma Isirael.”
Konye kobalas Iparisayon ebe, “Ireŋeari ŋesi ajokin kanuka lokapolon loka ajokin.”
Keanyu ikodeta, kitim kes, naarai kilworuna ka aisiarakina, bala amerekekin nuemamei ekecokon.
Kosodi kotema ikekesisiak atiar, “Ipu idwenyan, konye ikidioko ikeswamak;
aso kilipa Ejakait loka aidweny kijuk ikeswamak toma aidwenyeke.”
Ikiroria luka ikiyakia itomon ka luarei kes luta: losodit, Simon, loenyaritai Petero, ka Anderea onaceke; Yakob okoku loka Sebedayo, ka Yokana onaceke;
Pilip ka Batolomayo; Tomas ka Matayo eketeleman esolo; Yakob okoku loka Alipayo, ka Tadayo;
Simon Ekananayot, ka Yuda Isikariot, lokebilakini ŋes ebotet.
Kijuka Yesu ŋul itomon ka luarei, kicorak kes ebe, “Sirikilomasi orotin luka lukacekwapin, sirikilomasi da ediore kere loka Isamarian,
konye gwai koloto mama ejaas amerekekin nueoliorito nuka ekek loka Isirael.
Nailosioto kolimonokis ebe, ‘Aapu ajakanut naka akuj’.
Kitaŋaleununete lukadekak, kitajarununete lukatwak, kiswaganarete lukatapon, kireŋeanarete ajokin, Kiinakinitai atitai, yes da koinakis atitai.
Sirikiyaŋaasi koriaginikus esabu, karaida epuesa, karaida aikomon,
karaida ecoe loka alosit, karaida ikootin iarei, karaida amuk, karaida ebela; naarai ibusakinit ekeswaman ikenyamat.
Ido ŋolire arai ekialo loilomanarete, komoenenete yenibusakinit kanen, kosalenenete mamake aitodol neinyounioto.
Nailomariata togo, kiyogaete.
Arai ibusakinit etogo, kodol ainapakinikus tomake; konye arai mam ibusakinit, koboŋu do ainapakinikus mamakus.
Arai mam kisukunyikinio karaida akiirar akirokus, nailomuniata kotogo kaŋol, arai kore kaŋol, kilakilakete adae nuka akejenekus.
Abeit, katemari yes atiar, Epatanikini rwaru akwap naka Sodom ka Gomora atitiŋikin kapaaran naka etube aitelekarit ere ŋol.
Konye kocoito ituŋa; naarai kiyaŋaarete aurianeta, kidaete da kotoma atukosiakec.
Kiriarete akonyen nuka ikayaitok ka ikabakan kanukaŋ, araut ikajenak kamakec, kama kalukacekwapin da.
Konye nakiyaŋanariata, sirikiyaloŋoŋoto epone loineratar karaida nuinerasi; naarai kiinakinio kapak kaŋin nuinerasi;
naarai mere yes inerasi, dimarai Emoyo loka Papakus loinera kotomakus.
Onace einakini onaceke aario, papa da ikokuke, enyoikinete idwe lukauriakakec aicutar;
kiŋarunete yes ituŋa kere kanuka ekakiror. Konye yenetitiŋikini kiton awasia ŋes itajario.
Nakireiata yes kore ediopet, kokerata ore ece, naarai abeit katemari yes atiar, Mam idaunete ireria kere luka Isirael aitodol naebunio Okoku loka etuŋanan.
Edaunit ekesisian aputoor ekesisianakinanike, ka ebulesit aputoor ejakaitike. Arai enyaraete elopet etogo Beelesebul, edeparete ca do amoromor luejaas okaleke.
Nukalimokini yes kamuton, kinerata yesi kotoma aica; nuiirarete kaiyeiyea, kolimonokis kokuju otogoi.
Sirikikuriakaros ŋul luearete akuan komam epedorete aiar aijar; konye gwai kokuriaka ŋol loepedori amudiar akuan ka aijar da kotoma oGeena.
Mam kereka egwelete anyiporin aarei apesa adiopet? Emamei adio da naedoi kwap komam Papakus ejeni,
Konye yes, imaritai itima da kere luka akwesikus.
Aso sirikikuriaka; iraas yesi luka etiai adepar anyiporin nuipu.
Aso ŋinituŋanan yenikalimori eoŋ kakonyen nuka ituŋa, alimori eoŋ da ŋes kakonyen nuka Papaka loejai toma akuj;
konye ŋin yenikaŋeri eoŋ kakonyen nuka ituŋa, aŋeri eoŋ da ŋes kakonyen nuka Papaka loejai toma akuj.
Naarai abu kabu aitusurupikin etuŋanan ka papake, apese ka totoke, aberu naka okokuke ka tataake.
Lukokale luka etuŋanan kes eraunos lukasurupoke.
Ŋin yenemina papake arai totoke adepar eoŋ, mam kebusakinit; ŋin da yenemina ikokuke yenitelepat arai yenipese adepar eoŋ, mam kebusakinit.
Ŋin da yenimam erioŋi ekemusalaba ka atupar eoŋ, mam kebusakinit.
Ŋin yenedumuni akeijar itooliori, ŋin da yenitooliori akeijar kanukaŋ edumuni.
Ŋin yenisukunyikini enabi naarai erai enabi, edumuni eropit loka enabi, ŋin da yenisukunyikini ekadoliton naarai erai ekadoliton, edumuni eropit loka ekadoliton.
Ŋin yenitamasi idiopet ka ludidik kalu akoli naka akipi nuelilim bon, naarai erai ikesisian, abeit katemari yes atiar, mam etwaniari cut eropitike.”
kobalas ebe, “Irai kereka ijo ŋol loebunit, arai bo kedarata ece?”
Koboŋok Yesu kotema kes atiar, “Koloto, kolimokis Yokana akiro nuiirasi ka nuianyut:
Ekwenyunete imudukiok, elosete iŋwalasik, iswagio lukatapon, epupete ikimiŋiok, itajario lukatwak, elimonokinio da lukican akiro nukajokak.
Isirereŋitoi da ŋol lomam itiguikin kanukaŋ.”
Konye bo kilomarete asesen inyo? Etuŋanan lokenapit anapito naanebek? Koany, ŋul luenapito anapito nuunebek ejaas toma otogoi luka ikabakan.
Konye kanukinyo kilomariata? Asesen enabi? Eebo, katemari yes atiar, Loitelekarit enabi.
Ŋol ŋes iwadikatere nu ebe,
‘Koany, ejukari ekakiyakia kakonyenekon,
Loitemonokini ekonirot kakonyenekon.’
Ameun kapaarasia nuka Yokana Lokebatisan kiton kwana ebuikinitoi ajakanut naka akuj, enatarete da ikabuorok.
Naarai apotu inabin kere ka ikisila kodwarata kiton apak naka Yokana;
Arai ikotosi acamun, ŋes Eliya loedwara abunore.
Yenejaas aki kiira.
“Konye etupusi kinyo atur na? Eputos kidwe luiboiete kagwelanaret luenyaritos ipaupakec kobalas ebe,
Kibwolol, mam yes ibworo.’
Abu Okoku loka etuŋanan kobu enyami emasi da, kobalas ebe, ‘Koany, ekeraŋat lo, ekameran da, epapero loka iketelemak esolo ka ikadiakanarak!’ Konye aswamisioke kes itojokere acoa.”
Kobala ebe, “Itukwi ijo Korasin! Itukwi ijo Betesaida! Naarai arai kiswamatai koTuro ka Sidon nukaumokin nukiswamatai kamakus, ti kitoronikinos ŋo sek, ka ainap da ipukoi ka ekurwon.
Konye katemari yes atiar, Epatanikini rwaru Turo ka Sidon atitiŋikin kapaaran naka etube aitelekarit yes.
Ka jo da, Kaparanaum, kitopoloorio kereka kiton akuj? Kijesario do kiton Okatwak, Naarai arai kiswamatai koSodom nukaumokin nukiswamatai kamakon, ti kesal ore ŋol kiton lolo.
Konye katemari yes atiar, Epatanikini akwap naka Sodom atitiŋikin kapaaran naka etube aitelekarit jo.”
eebo, Papa, naarai kwaŋin ibu kitojokia kakonyenekon.
Kainak Papaka iboro kere; ido emamei yenejeni Okoku dimarai Papa, kwabo emamei yenejeni Papa dimarai Okoku, ka ŋin da yenekot Okoku apukokin ŋes.
Kopotu neajai, yes kere luitaaritos ka lukilaŋirikinito, eoŋ da kesiyenuni yes.
Korioŋata ajookotoka, kisisiautu kamakaŋ; naarai etasiono eoŋ, eyapepera kotau, yes da idumunete aiyeŋun kotauonokus.
Naarai imeimeo akajookot, akabwokon da ebenen.”
Kotema kes atiar, “Mam kereka isomenenete nukiswamai Daudi, nakeriebia eteŋei, ŋes ka ikepaup;
kwape kelomaria togo loka Edeke, konyam imugatin luka aitodikin, lumam ebusakinit ŋes ainyam karaida ipaupake, dimarai isasedotin bonik?
Arai bo mam kereka isomenenete kotoma okisila ebe apaaran nakasabato kemunaasi isasedotin koyekalu asabato; komam egwaunete akiro?
Katemari yes atiar, ejai ne yenitelekarit eyekalu.
Konye arai kojenete apolou naka akiro kanu ebe, ‘Akoto aitim kwabo mere asuban,’ timam kititelekaasi lumam egwaunito akiro.
Naarai Okoku loka etuŋanan ŋes erai ejakait loka asabato.”
Ido koany, kojai etuŋanan lokeonit akan. Kiŋita ŋes kotemasi atiar, “Ibus kereka aitaŋaleun kapaaran nakasabato?” Tetere iwosaete ŋes.
Kotema kes atiar, “Iŋai bo kayesi, yenejai amerekek adiopet yenimam iriuni ka alemun arai kibirokin aipany kapaaran nakasabato?
Mam tope ituŋanan itelekarit amerekek kotiai? Aso ibus aswam nuejok kapaaran nakasabato.”
Kosodi kotema ŋesi etuŋanan atiar, “Korio akonikan.” Korio, koŋaleu, koputokinos kanace.
Konye kolomasi Iparisayon kinerut asurokin ŋes, ka epone loemudiariata ŋes.
Kicor kes kinyeis aitakanun ŋes.
Tetere itodolikin akirot naenerit kama kenabi Isaia ebe:
Mam epega, karaida aiwor;
Karaida ituŋanan apupun ekeporoto korotin;
Mam ebili agada nairiecakina,
Mam itudeŋi abirait naepuriei,
Aitodol naijukunia etube aipikor;
Emunokinos lukacekwapin ekekiror.”
Koumokis ituŋa kere, kobalas ebe, “Mere caat lo okoku loka Daudi?”
Konye kiirasi Iparisayon kotemasi atiar, “Mam ŋol ireŋeari ajokin dimarai kanuka Beelesebul, ekapolon loka ajokin.”
Kosodi kejeni Yesu akeceomisio kotema kes atiar, “Ŋinijakanut naetiakatiakaun asurokin bon emudiar, ere da arai etogo loetiakatiakaun asurokin bon mam icasi.
Satan arai ireŋeari Satan, etiakatiakaun asurokin bon; aso ikonakini ai akejakanut icasi?
Arai ereŋeari eoŋ ajokin kanuka Beelesebul, ido bo ikusidwe ireŋearete kanuka iŋai? Kanuka ŋun ŋes eraatar ŋul ikusikatubok.
Konye arai ereŋeari eoŋ ajokin kEmoyo loka Edeke, aso adolu ajakanut naka Edeke mamakus.
Arai bo ikwaikini epedori ai etuŋanan alomar togo loka ekagogoŋon ka aiŋat ikeboro, arai mam ber eenit ekagogoŋon ŋol? Kosodi konyet epedori aiŋat eketogo.
Ituŋanan yenimam ejai keoŋ ŋes yenikekoloka, ituŋanan da yenimam etukonokini keoŋ isiarakini.
Kanuka ŋun katemari yes atiar, Isionio niŋironis ka ŋiniinyanakin naka ituŋa, konye mam cut isionio ainyanakin Emoyo.
Ŋinituŋanan da yeninera akirot asurokin Okoku loka etuŋanan isionio; konye ŋin yeninera asurokin Emoyo Lokalaunan mam isionio kotoma okar kalu, karaida kaluepote.
Yes aur naka imusagan! Ikote ipedorete ai einer nuejok arai iraas luiroko? Naarai inera aituk nuilapununos kotau.
Itolomuni ituŋanan yenejok nuejok kotoma nuiŋadat nuejok, ituŋanan da yenikaronon itolomuni nukaronok kotoma nuiŋadat nueroko.
Katemari yes atiar, Ŋinikirot nakejal naineras ituŋa itodiarete kapaaran naka etube.
Naarai kanuka akonikiro kimarakinio adolit, kanuka akonikiro da kitubokinio aitelekar.”
Konye Koboŋok kes kotema atiar, “Atur nakaronon naadote emoi aanyunet; kwabo mam einakinio aanyunet dimarai aanyunet naka enabi Yona.
Naarai kwape kejaar Yona toma akoik naka etiaŋ lokos loka aŋolol adaun apaarasia auni ka akuaresia auni, kwape kwaŋin Okoku loka etuŋanan edauni apaarasia auni ka akuaresia auni kakoik naka akwap.
Enyounete ikiliok luka Ninebe kapaaran naka etube nepepe katur na, itetelekarete ŋes akiro; naarai apotu kesi kitoronikinos kanuka alimonokin naka Yona, ido koany, ejai ne yenitelekarit Yona.
Enyouni akabaka naka Eŋalakimak kapaaran naka etube nepepe katur na, itetelekari kes akiro; naarai abu ŋesi kobu kosaŋe loka akwap akiirar acoa naka Solomon, ido koany, ejai ne yenitelekarit Solomon.
“Kenyou emoyo loerono kotuŋanan, itori aiboisio nuemameete akip emoot nekiyeŋunet, komam edumuni.
Kosodi etemari atiar, ‘Aboŋori togoka nekabunio’; keboŋu edumuni esil, epieitai, epesitai da.

Kosodi elosi eupunos nepepe kimoyon ice ikanykaarei luitelekarito ŋes aronis, elomarete kesi da esalete nen; ejautene loka ituŋanan kaŋin lokawasia eraun loerono adepar losodit. Kwape kwaŋin ejaunia atur na nakaronon.”
Kolimoki etuŋanan ŋes ebe, “Koany, totokon ka ikoniinacan ebwoete kokiŋa, ekotosi einer kajo.”
Koboŋok ŋol lokelimokini ŋes ebe, “Iŋai bo erai totoka, lukaŋai da eraas ikainacan?”
Kitodik ikekesisiak kakekan, kotema atiar, “Koany, totoka ka ikainacan!
Naarai ŋin yeniswamai nuekoto Papaka loejai toma akuj, ŋin ŋes onaceka; ka inacika, ka totoka da.”
Kotukokinos ikodeta luipu mama ejai, kodoka ataker kiboikin; kobwoi ekodet kere koitolima.
Kolimonok akiro nuipu kawaragasia, kotema atiar, “Koany, abu ekayean koloma aiye.
Napeyei, kodooto ikinyom ice ariri kerot, kopotu akweny, konyamata.
Kodooto ice aŋaŋam, nemam kipu alup, atipet kobwaŋutu, kanumam idulotor alup,
konye kecau akoloŋ konomosi, kanuamameatar alias korinyosi.
Kodooto ice okukwa, kolibut ikukwa koridakis.
Kodooto ice alupo nuejok koraata, ice akwatat, ice akaisakanykape, ice da akaisauni.
Yenejaas aki, kiira.”
Kosodi kopotu ikekesisiak mama ejai, kotemasi atiar, “Kanukinyo kineratar kakes kawaragasia?”
Koboŋok kotema kes atiar, “Kiinakinitai yes ajenun nukaiyeiyea nuka ajakanut nakotoma akuj, konye kes mam einakinitai.
Naarai yenejai ibore, einakinio luiyatakina luipu; konye yenemamei ibore, ŋin da yenejaas kaŋes edemario.
Kanuka ŋun kinera kakes kawaragasia, naarai naeseseniata mam esesenete, naeirariata da mam iirarete, karaida ajenun.
Ido itodolikinio akirot naka enabi Isaia kamakec naebala ebe, ‘Akiirar iirarete, konye mam ijenunete cut, ido asesen isesenete, konye mam ianyunete cut.
Naarai esiepaikis itauon luka ituŋa kalu, Kimiŋarito akiikec,
Itumudakito akecekonye,
Tetere mam eanyunete kakecekonye, Ka akiirar kakeceki,
Ka ajenun da kikecetauon, Kibelokinos ketaŋaleu.’
Abeit katemari yes atiar, Apotu kimielas inabin luipu ka ikadolitok aanyun nuisesenete yesi, mam eanyuna, ka akiirar da nuiirarete yesi, mam iirara.
“Aso kopupokisi awaragan naka ekayean.
Naiiraria ituŋanan akirot naka ajakanut, komam ejenuni ŋes, ebuni lokaronon kourupo nukeyeitai otauke; ŋul kes lukeyeio ariri kerot.
Ŋul da lukeyeio aŋaŋam, ŋul kes luiirarete akirot, atipet kiyuutu kaiyalama;
konye emameete alias kotomakec, kicata nediokasilon, kedolokis ican arai areio kanuka akirot, atipet itiguikinos.
Ŋul da lukeyeio okukwa, ŋul kes luiirarete akirot, konye aiyaloiŋon naka ikar kalu, ka aiŋal naka abar koridakis akirot, mam eraa.
Ŋul da lukeyeio alup nuejok, ŋul kes luiirarete akirot ka ajenun; eraete ŋul, ice akwatat, ice akaisakanykape, ka ice da akaisauni.”
konye kejotooros ituŋa, kobu lokasurupike koyeik igitun toma akima, kolot.
Konye kebwaŋut akima, ka aisur, kotakanut igitun da.
Kopotu ibulesin luka elopet etogo kolimokis ŋes ebe, ‘Ejakait, mam tope kiyeit ikinyom luejok amanakon? Kepote bo kai igitun?’
Kotema kes atiar, ‘Lokasurup ŋes kiswamai ŋun.’ Kotemasi ibulesin ŋes atiar, ‘Aso ikoto kaloto karutosi kes?’
Konye kotema atiar, ‘Mam; elemuni nairusioto igitun, kimoriununut kakima da.’
Kinyeisi kere kopolooros kiton aidweny; ido kapak naka aidweny alimokini ikadwenyak ebe, ‘Koruto ber igitun, koenata ikes kicweata; konye akima kotukonokis odulaaka.’ ”
Kedit ŋesi aitelekarit ikinyom kere, konye kepoloor, kiteleka ikui kere koraun do ekitoi, kopotu akweny nuka apak koperenenete atenieikike.”
Tetere itodolikin akirot nakinerit enabi ebe,
“Etooŋari akaituk kawaragasia,
Alimori da nukibwaitai ameun kapetetait naka akwap.”
Koboŋok kotema kes atiar, “Lokeyei ikinyom luejok erai Okoku loka etuŋanan;
Amana da erai akwap, ikinyom luejok eraas idwe luka ajakanut; igitun eraas idwe luka lokaronon,
lokasurup lokeyei kes erai Satan; aidweny erai awasia naka akwap, ikadwenyak da kes imalaikan.
Kwape etukonokinere igitun ka aicweikin kakim, ikonakinio nen kawasia naka akwap.
Ijukuni Okoku loka etuŋanan ikemalaikan, etukonokinete kotoma ajakanutuke kere nuitiguikinete kere, ka luiswamaete nukepali,
ecakakinete oupa loka akim; ejaun kaŋina aimony ka airiamanakin ikel.
Kosodete ecaunete ikadolitok kwape kakoloŋ kotoma ajakanut naka Papakec, Yenejaas aki, kiira.
“Bobo da, eputos ajakanut naka akuj; bala ekagwelanaran loemoi ilulun luejok;
nakedumunia elulu ediopet loka etiai loepol, kolot kogwela lukejaatatar kere, kogwelu.
Kosodi kilelebun, kiriut ituŋa oitolima, kiboikinos, kotukonokis luejok oboro, konye lueroko kocakasi.
Ikoni nen awasia naka akwap. Epote imalaikan, etiakarete lukaronok kama ka lukadolitok,
ecakakinete kes oupa loka akim; ejaun kaŋina aimony ka airiamanakin ikel.”
Kiŋit Yesu kes ebe, “Ijenutu kereka yesi ŋun kere?” Kotemasi atiar, “Eebo.”
Kotema kes atiar, “Kanuka ŋun ŋinikewadikan yenituutooritai kajakanut naka akuj; eputos bala etuŋanan elopet etogo loelemuni kotoma abarake iboro lukitetiak ka lumojoŋ da.”
Nakedolio bukec, kisisianak kes kotoma atukosikec, koumokis kotemasi atiar, “Kedumuni bo lo kai acoa na ka nukaumokin nu?
Mam kereka lo erai okoku loka ekekeon? Mere totoke naenyaritai Mariam? Mere ikeinacan Yakob ka Yosep ka Simon ka Yuda?
Emameete akeinacan kere kane kamawok? Aso kedumun bo lo kai nu kere?”
Kitiguikinos kanukeŋ. Konye kotema
Yesu kes atiar, “Mam eswaki enabi aitopoloorio dimarai bukec kotogoke da.”
Mam abu kiswama nukaumokin nuipu kanen, kanu amamus aiyuunikec.
Kotema ikekejaanakinak atiar, “Erai ŋol Yokana Lokebatisan, ajaru kotoma okatwak; kanuka ŋun iswamai nukapedor ŋun kotomakeŋ.”
Naarai kikamunit Kerode Yokana koen, kibwaik aidaris, kanuka Kerodia aberu naka Pilip onaceke.
Naarai abu Yokana kolimok ŋes ebe, “Mam ibusakinit jo ajaut kaŋes.”
Kokoto aiar ŋes konye kokurianar ekodet, naarai aomito ebe kerai Yokana enabi.
Konye kedol apaaran nakaurio naka Kerode, kosom apese naka Kerodia kakonyen nuka ituŋa, kisiyalamik Kerode,
kanuka ŋun kisumunik kaiyaposit ebe einakini ŋes ibore kere yenilipi.
Kicoro totoke ŋes, kosodi kotema atiar, “Ae kane katuba akou naka Yokana Lokebatisan.”
Kokadak ekabaka; konye kanuka akeiyaposio ka lukemorete kaŋes kicorak ainakinio.
Kijuka kotubunoi akou naka Yokana kaidaris,
koyaunai akekou katuba koinakinai apese, koyaŋa neejai totoke,
Kopotu ikekesisiak koyaŋaasi akuan, kidaata; kosodete koloto kolimokis Yesu.
Kelom Yesu koany ekodet loepol; kitim kes, kitaŋaleu lukadekakakec.
Kitiboŋ akwap, kopotu ikekesisiak mama ejai, kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Aibois na erai amodiŋ, atuboto isawan; aso, kotwar ikodeta tetere elomanarete okialon agwel inyamat.”
Kotema Yesu atiar, “Mam ipudasi alosit; koinakis yesi kes lunyaman.”
Kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Emamei sio idiobore kane dimarai imugatin ikany ka lukecor iarei.”
Kotema atiar, “Koinunai.”
Kicorak ikodeta aiboikin anya; kolem imugatin lukany, ka lukecor luarei, kosesen akuj, kisirereŋ, kobilibil imugatin, koinak ikesisiak, koinakis ikesisiak da ikodeta.
Konyama kere kimonikinos. Kotukonokinai atutubeta nuabilibila nuasalete iditai itomon ka luarei ileleba.
Lukenyamete emwaasi bala ikiliok ilukumin ikany, kilema aŋor ka idwe.
Kedau ŋesi aitwar ikodeta, kodoka oroŋat neejaikinor bon ailip. Kitiboŋ akwap, kojai ŋina bon.
Konye kedaunit ataker aikwaŋar neelwana koitolima kibukete akailan; naarai kekutunit ekwam kakonyen,
Kakwenyunet nakiwoŋonet naka akuar kobu Yesu mama ejaas, kicakacakai aŋolol.
Konye nakeanyuniata ikesisiak ŋes icakacakai aŋolol, kiyaloŋoŋoto, kotemasi atiar, “Erai etoil” Kiworoto kanuka akurian.
Atipet kiner Yesu kakes kotema atiar, “Kotitiŋioros! Eoŋ lo, sirikikuriakaros.”
Koboŋok Petero kotema ŋes atiar, “Ejakait, arai erai jo ŋol, kicorakinai kabu mama ijai kokuju akipi.”
Kotema atiar, “Bia,” Kodoku Petero kataker, kicakacakai akipi alosit mama ejai Yesu.
Konye nakeanyunia ekwam, kokurianar, kogeu alumor, kiworo ebe, “Ejakait, kitajarai.”
Atipet korio Yesu akekan kitiŋ ŋes, kotema atiar, “Ijo loedit aiyuun, kanukinyo ibuonokinor?”
Kedokasi kesi ataker kopala ekwam.
Komaata ŋes lukejaas toma ataker kotemasi atiar, “Abeit irai ijo Okoku loka Edeke.”
Kedaut aikwaŋar juwai, kodoloto akwap naka Genesaret.
Kejenut ituŋa luka aibois kaŋin, koramata luka akwap ŋin kere, koinut ŋes lukadekak kere.
Kiŋaiŋaata ŋes acamakin kes atironor atwele naka anapitoke bon; koŋaleutu kere luketirorete.
“Kanukinyo ijalijalatar ikonikesisiak epone loka imakio? Naarai mam ilosete akecekanin naenyamiata.”
Koboŋok kotema kes atiar, “Kanukinyo ijalijalatar yesi aicorakinet naka Edeke kanuka eponekus?
Naarai abu Edeke kobala ebe, ‘Koyoŋitenene papakon ka totokon,’ ido ebe, ‘Ŋin yenimoromoroi papake arai totoke, abeit etwani.’
Konye yes ibalasi ebe, Arai elimokini ituŋanan papake arai totoke ebe, Lutikidum kamakaŋ ainakin Edeke, mam itepesenitai ayoŋit papake arai totoke.
Aso kanuka eponekus, itapalaut akirot naka Edeke.
Yes lukesoswai! Araas nuebeito nuadwarit Isaia kanukus, ebe:
Konye elwaka ikecetauon kama ajai;
Konye kamaete eoŋ atai,
Isisianakinete aituutooreta nuka ituŋa bala erai aisisianakin nakabeit.’ ”
Konyarau ekodet kotema kes atiar, “Kiirasi kojenutu da:
ŋin yenelomari kaituk mam emunaari ituŋanan, dimarai nuelomunete kaituk, ŋun emunaarete ituŋanan.”
Kosodete kopotu ikekesisiak mama ejai, kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Ijeni kereka ijo ebe naeirariata Iparisayon akirot ŋin, apotu konyunyurikinos?”
Koboŋok kobala ebe, “Ŋinikiraa yenimam irait Papaka lokotoma akuj erutunio.
Kinyeis ŋul; eraas ikeŋarenok lumudukiok, Arai emuduki iŋarenikini emuduki, ibirokinos kere iarei toma aipany.”
Kosodi Koboŋok Petero kotema atiar, “Kitejenunai awaragan ŋin.”
Kotema atiar, “Eriŋa yes da emamei ajenun?
Mam ijenete ebe ŋinibore kere yenelomari kaituk edoli akoik, kosodi ikiŋaario?
Konye nuitorunete aituk elomunete kotau, ŋun kes emunaarete ituŋanan.
Naarai toma otau epote aomisio nukaronok, aiar, adoteu, aelo, akokolanut, asabanakin, amoromor,
Ŋun kes emunaarete ituŋanan; konye ainyam eriŋa ilota akanin mam emunaari ituŋanan.”
Ido koany, kolom aberu Akanaanit koikorun kaŋul, kiworo ebe, “Kitimoi, wu Ejakait, ijo okoku loka Daudi; ikapese iticani noi ajokit.”
Konye ŋes mam eboŋokino akirot, Kopotu ikekesisiak mama ejai kiŋaiŋaata ebe, “Kotwara ŋin; naarai iworotoi kokauwok.”
Konye Koboŋok kobala ebe, “Mam kejukunio dimarai mama ejaas amerekekin nukeoliorete nuka ekek loka Isirael.”
Konye kobu ŋin, koma ŋes, kobala ebe, “Ejakait, kiŋarakinai.”
Koboŋok ebe, “Mam ejok alemun inyamat luka idwe, acakakin iŋokwo.”
Konye kotema atiar, “Eebo, Ejakait; konye iŋokwo da enyamete ararasia nuedoununete komesa loka ijakakec.”
Kosodi koboŋok Yesu kotema ŋes atiar, “Ijo ba toto, epol akoniiyuun; kojaut mamakon kwape ikotor.” Koŋaleu akepese ameun kosawa kaŋol.
Kopotu ikodeta luipu mamakeŋ, koinut luecodos, ka imudukiok, ka ibaŋiok, ka iŋwalasik, ka ice da luipu, kibwaikis akejeneke; kitaŋaleu kes.
Koumok ekodet, nakeanyuniata ibaŋiok ineras, iŋwalasik etenete, luecodos elosete, ka imudukiok da ekwenyete; kituroto Edeke loka Isirael.
Kotemasi ikekesisiak atiar, “Kidumuni kai inyamat luipu kamodiŋ aisimonikinia ekodet loetia ne?”
Kotema Yesu kes atiar, “Ejaas yes imugatin imwaasi ai?” Kobalas ebe, “Ikanykaarei, ka agaria nuikidioko.”
Kicorak ekodet aiboikin kwap,
Kolem imugatin ikanykaarei ka agaria, kimal, kobilibil koinak ikekesisiak, kosodete ikesisiak koinakis ikodeta.
Konyamata kere, kimonikinos; kotukonokis atutubeta nuabilibila nukesalete ibukito ikanykaarei ileleba.
Lukenyamete keraas ikiliok ilukumin iwoŋon, kilema aŋor ka idwe,
Kotwara ikodeta, kodoka ataker kolot atutubeta nuka Magadan.
Koboŋok kotema atiar, “Naitiboŋia, ibalas ebe, ‘Ipiororoi moi, naarai ereŋ akuj.’
Tupuruc da ebe, ‘Etepi lolo, naarai ereŋ akuj, edalidali da.’ Ijenete yesi amisiikin kwape ejaar akuj, konye mam ipedorete amisiikin aanyuneta nuka apakio.
Atur naerono naadote emoot aanyunet, konye mam einakinio aanyunet, dimarai aanyunet naka Yona.” Kinyek kes, kolot.
Kedoloto ikesisiak okekwa juwai, kimurwokis ayaŋaar imugatin.
Kotema Yesu kes atiar, “Kokwenya, kocoito aitubuunet naka Iparisayon ka Isadukayon.”
Kiŋitanakinos bonik ebe, “Mam kiyaunit imugatin.”
Konye kojen Yesu, kotema atiar, “Wu yes luedit aiyuun, kanukinyo iŋitanakinotor, naarai emameete yes imugatin?
Eriŋa yes ejenuna? Karaida akiitun imugatin kwi ikany luka ilukumin ikany, ka iditai luemwaasi nen Iuipotu kotukonokis?
Arai bo imugatin ikanykaarei luka ilukumin iwoŋon, ka ibukito luemwaasi nen luipotu kotukonokis?
Ikonakinito bo yesi ai mam imisiikinito ebe mam enera kayes nuka imugatin? Kocoito aitubuunet naka Iparisayon ka Isadukayon.”
Kosodete kojenut ebe mam kelimokinit kes acoit aitubuunet naka emugati, dimarai aisisianakin naka Iparisayon ka Isadukayon.
Kobalas ebe, “Ebalas ice ebe Yokana Lokebatisan, ice Eliya, ice da Yeremia arai ediopet konabin.”
Kotema kes atiar, “Ido bo yes kibalas ebe arai eoŋ iŋai?”
Koboŋok Simon Petero kobala ebe, “Irai ijo Kristo, Okoku loka Edeke lokajaran.”
Koboŋok Yesu kotema ŋes atiar, “Kisirereŋitoi jo, Simon okoku loka Yona! Naarai mam akuan ka aokot kipukokinito jo ŋun, dimarai Papaka loejai toma akuj.
Eoŋ da kalimokini jo ebe irai ijo Petero, adukokini ekakanisa toma atiida na, ikirigin da luka okatwak mam ipikorete.
Kainakini jo ilaceta luka ajakanut naka akuj, kere nuieni ijo kakwap, eenio kokuju, kere da nuilacakini ijo kakwap, elacakinio kokuju.”
Kosodi kicor jokan ikesisiak sirikelimokis idiotuŋanan ebe erai ŋesi Kristo.
Koyaŋa Petero Yesu, kogeu aitoron ŋes, kobala ebe, “Madi akuj, Ejakait! Mam kiponikinete jo ŋun.”
Konye kibelokin kotema ŋesi Petero atiar, “Koboŋo kaukaŋ, Satan! Irai ijo ekomio kamakaŋ; naarai mam iwomit nueraas nuka Edeke, dimarai nuka ituŋa.”
Naarai ŋin yenekoto aitajar akeijar etwaniari, ka yenetwaniari akeijar kanukaŋ edumuni.
Naarai ajokis anyoin kedum etuŋanan akwap kere kosodi atwaniar akeijar? Arai bo elemuni ituŋanan inyo alakunia akeijar?
Naarai ebuni rwaru Okoku loka etuŋanan nepepe kikemalaikan kotoma aibuses naka Papake, kosodi etacakini ŋinituŋanan kwape ejaatar akeswamisio.
Abeit katemari yes atiar, ejaas ituŋa luebwoete kane lumam iirete cut atwanare kiton naeanyuniata Okoku loka etuŋanan ebuni toma ajakanutuke.”
Ido koany, kitakanikinos Musa ka Eliya, inerasi kaŋes.
Koboŋok Petero kotema Yesu atiar, “Ejakait, ejok oni ajaut ne; arai ikoto, eswami ne iswamin iuni, ediopet lokon, ediopet loka Musa, ka ediopet da loka Eliya.”
Napekinerar ŋun, koany, kiteribo kes edou loemilia; ido koany, kolom eporoto kotoma odou kobala ebe, “Lo ŋes Okokuka lominat, loalelakinit noi; kiirasi ŋes.”
Nakiirariata ikesisiak ŋun, kibiroros ebuburia, kokuriakaros noi.
Kobu Yesu kotiro kes, kotema atiar, “Konyoutu, sirikikuriakaros.”
Kikeutu akecekonye, mam eanyuna ituŋanan dimarai Yesu bon.
Kiŋita ikekesisiak ebe, “Aso kanukinyo ineratar ikewadikak ebe, ibusakinit ber Eliya aige abunore?”
Koboŋok ŋesi ebe, “Abeit ebunit ber Eliya, itemokini ŋesi kere:
konye katemari yes atiar, Adau Eliya abunore, mam apotu kojenutu ŋes, konye kiswamakis kere nuakotos, Kwape kwaŋin elosi Okoku loka etuŋanan da aiticanio kamakec.”
Kosodete kojenut ikesisiak ebe enera ŋesi kakes nuka Yokana Lokebatisan.
“Ejakait, kitim ikakoku, naarai edek ipumu iticanete noi; naarai irwan ipu ibironokin akim, irwan ipu da akipi.
Abu kainu ikonikesisiak, mam epedoro aitaŋaleun ŋes.”
Koboŋok Yesu kotema atiar, “Wu atur namam iyuunit, naepaarit, etodoli ai aiboi kayes? Etodoli ai da atitiŋikinit yes? Koinunai kane.”
Kiretak Yesu ŋes, kolom ajokit: koŋaleu etelepat ameun kosawa kaŋol.
Kosodete kopotu ikesisiak mama ejai Yesu kaiyeiyea, kotemasi atiar, “Kanukinyo mam sio kipedoria aireŋear ŋes?”

Kotema atiar, “Kanuka aiyuunikus naedit. Naarai abeit katemari yes atiar, arai kijaas kaiyuun naetia ecokat loka ekaradali, ilimokinete eroŋat lo ebe, ‘Konyou kane, kolot laije,’ enyouni do; kwabo emamei akirot nakikaruni yes. [
Konye mam enyouni epone lo, dimarai kanuka ailip ka ailuŋ.]”
earete ŋes, apaaran nakiwuniet ejaruni.” Kokadakis kes noi.

Kobala Petero ebe, “Elemi.” Nakelomaria togo, koliŋ Yesu aiŋit ŋes ebe, “Iwomit ijo biai, Simon? Edumunete ikabakan luka akwap esolo loka akwap arai esolo loka ekayaiton kotuŋa inyoika? Kodwekec, arai bo komo?”
Napekiner ebe, “Komo,” kobala Yesu ebe, “Aso anu ikote nen, ijakakaete cado odwe.
Konye kenyeis aitiguikin kes, kolot aŋolol kocakak egolu, kolem agar nasodit naikeuni; kiŋaa aitukuke, ianyuni esekel; koyaŋa ŋol, koinak kes kanukaŋ, kanukon da.”
Konyarau ikoku kisibwo kokidiŋikec;
kotema atiar, “Abeit, katemari yes atiar, Arai mam ibelokinos koluoros bala idwe, mam ilomarete cut toma ajakanut naka akuj.
Aso ŋinituŋanan yenitasonikin ilopet kwape kikoku kayen, ŋin ŋes erai yenikapolon kotoma ajakanut naka akuj.
konye ŋin yenitapaari idiopet ka ludidik kalu lukeyuunito eoŋ, ti ejok ŋes aenikinio akukuse omurisiŋike ka acakakin ataro nakaŋolol.
“Itukwi akwap kanuka akiro nuitiguikinete! Naarai mam eswakete nuitiguikinete ajaut, konye itukwi ituŋanan ŋin yeneyauni akiro ŋun nuitiguikinete!
Arai kiidupo jo akonikan, arai akonikeju, kotubo kocaka; ejok jo alomar toma aijar iŋwalit arai icodo, itia acakakinio akim namam eduŋei, ijaas kakanin aarei arai akeje aarei.
Arai kiidupo jo akonikoŋu, kogoru kocaka; ejok jo alomar toma aijar idoponyony itia acakakinio oupa loka akim.
Naarai abu Okoku loka etuŋanan kobu aitajar yenikeoliorit.]
Iwomito biai? Arai ejaas ituŋanan amerekekin akwatat, keolio adiopet, mam kereka inyeini akaisakanykaoŋon ka nukanykaonon, kolot oukon amoote ŋin nakeoliorit?
Arai kedumu, abeit katemari yes atiar, Iyalamikini noi kanuka ŋin itia kwa akaisakanykaoŋon ka nukanykaonon numam aoliorito,
Kwaŋin mam Papakus loejai toma akuj ekoto idiopet kaludidik kalu aolior.
Konye arai mam kiirari, kouparos do ka ediopet arai iarei, tetere itogogoŋio ŋinikirot kaituke nuka ikajenak iarei arai iuni.
Arai kegir akiirar ŋul, kolimok ekanisa; arai kegir akiirar ekanisa da, korau ŋesi kamakon bala emoit ka eketeleman esolo.
Abeit katemari yes atiar, ŋin yenieni ijo kakwap eenio kotoma akuj, ŋin da yenilacari kakwap elacario kotoma akuj.
Bobo da katemari yes atiar, Arai kecamanaros iarei kayesi kakirot kere nailipete, iswamakini kes Papaka lokotoma akuj.
Naarai neetukokinotor iarei arai iuni kokirorika, ajai eoŋ da nepenen kidiŋikec.”
Yesu kotema ŋes atiar, “Mam kalimokinit jo irwan akanykaarei, dimarai ebe akaisakanykaarei irwan akanykaarei.
“Kanuka ŋun ajakanut naka akuj eputosi bala ekabaka lokekoto aimar ikeboro kama kikebulesin.
Kegeu aimar, koinunai etuŋanan ediopet Iokiburao atalantan
Kemamikis nutacet, kicorak ejakaitike ŋes agwelario, ka akeberu, ka ikedwe, ka luajaatar kere, kotacakinere apesen.
Kokukokin do ebulesit, kiŋaiŋa, kobala ebe, ‘Okwe Ejakait, kotitiŋikinoi, eoŋ da katacakini jo kere.’
Abu ejakait loka ebulesit kaŋol kitim ŋes, koosik, kisioni apesen.
Konye koloma ebulesit ŋol, kiriama ŋesi kediopet ebulesit aupake lokiburai adenarin
Kokukokin do ebulesit aupake kiŋaiŋa, kobala ebe, ‘Okwe, kotitiŋikinoi, eoŋ da katacakini jo kere.’
Konye koŋer, kolot kibwaik aidaris aitodol naetacakinia apesen.
Kosodete nakeanyuniata ibulesin luce nukiswamas, kokadakis noi, koloto kitejenut ejakaitikec kere nukiswamas.
Kosodi konyarau ejakaitike ŋes kotema atiar, ‘Ebulesit ijo loirono! Abu kesioni jo apesen ŋin kere nakiŋaiŋaia;
ti mam kereka jo da ibusakinit aitim aupakon, kwape ketimio eoŋ jo?’
Konyunyurikin ejakaitike, kijaik ikedarak, aitodol naetacakinia apesenike kere.
Ikonakini nen Papaka lokotoma akuj ŋinidiopet kayesi, arai mam isioniete yesi ŋinituŋanan onaceke kotauonokus.”
Kotupasi ikodeta luipu; kitaŋaleu kes kaŋina.
Koboŋok kotema kes atiar, “Mam isomenenete ebe Lokesubi kes kageunet abu kosub kes yenikiliokit, ka yeniberu.
Kotema atiar, ‘Kanuka ŋun inyeini etuŋanan papake ka totoke kirotakinos kakeberu, ŋul luarei eraunos adiopetekuan’?
Aso mam bobo eraas iarei dimarai adiopetekuan. Aso lukimorikikini Edeke, kinyek ituŋanan aitiak.”
Kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Aso do kanukinyo kicorakinia Musa ainakin ebalua loka atiak, ka ainyein?”
Kotema atiar, “Kanuka aninik naka ikusitauon abu Musa kocam yes ainyein akusiŋor, konye ameun kageunet mam arai kwaŋin.
Katemari yes atiar, Ŋolituŋanan loinyeini akeberu dimarai kanuka aelo, komany ace, adotiar; ŋol da loemanyi nakinyeinio adotiar.”
Kobalasi ikesisiak ŋes ebe, “Arai ikote nen akiro nuka etuŋanan ka akeberu, emamei ajokis aimany.”
Konye kotema kes atiar, “Mam ituŋa kere epedorete acamun akirot ŋin, dimarai ŋul lueinakinitai.

Naarai ejaas ibwacin lukeurio kopone kaŋol ameun kakoikes nuka nukatotokec; bobo da ejaas ibwacin lukidoŋete ituŋa; bobo da ejaas ibwacin lukibwaciikinete kanuka ajakanut naka akuj, ŋol da loepedori acamun akirot na, kocam.”
Konye kobala Yesu ebe, “Kocamutu idwe ludidik kopotu mama ajai, kwabo sirikisimika kes; naarai lueputos kaŋul ajakanut naka akuj erai nakec.”
Kidokok kes akekanin, konyou kaŋina.
Kotema ŋes atiar, “Kanukinyo kiŋisia eoŋ nuka ajokis? Ejai ediopet loerai loejok. Konye arai ikoto alomar aijar, koricite ikisila.”
Kotema atiar, “Alu?” Kotema Yesu atiar, “Siriari, Siridote, Sirikokoi, Sirisabanakinenei.
Koyoŋitenenei papakon ka totokon, Komina da ikoniidunyet kwape iminar bon.”
Kobala etelepat ebe, “Aricit ŋul kere; inyo eriŋa kaolikinit bobo?”
Kotema Yesu ŋes atiar, “Arai ikoto araun loitekoro, kolot, kogwela kere luijaatar, kokoranak lukican, ijaunete kabar toma akuj; kosodi kobu kotup eoŋ.”
Nakiiraria etelepat ŋun kolot itururwei; naarai kejaas iboro luipu.
Kotema Yesu ikekesisiak atiar, “Abeit katemari yes atiar, etionikini ekabaran alomar toma ajakanut naka akuj.
Katemari bobo atiar, Epatanikinit akaala aitor apedot naka ekus itia ekabaran alomar ajakanut naka Edeke.”
Nakiirariata ikesisiak ŋun koumokis noi, kotemasi atiar, “Aso iŋai bo do epedori aitajario?”
Konye kosesen Yesu kes, kotema atiar, “Mam epedorio akiro ŋun kotuŋa, konye kama ejai Edeke epedoros kere.”
Kosodi koboŋok Petero kotema Yesu atiar, “Koany, kipou isio kenyeis kere katuputu jo. Inyoin bo do kidumuni?”

Kotema Yesu kes atiar, “Abeit, katemari yes atiar, kotoma akwap nakitetet naiboikinor Okoku loka etuŋanan oicoloŋ loka aibusesuke, yes da lukiitupunete eoŋ iboikinos toma oicoloŋo itomon ka luarei, itubokinete atekerin atomon ka nuarei nuka Isirael.
Ŋinituŋanan yenikinyeini itogoi, arai iinacan, arai ainacan, arai papa arai toto, arai idwe arai amanat, kanuka ekakiror, edumuni irwan akwatat ka airum da aijar naka ikar kere.
Konye luipu lueraas lusodit eraunete lukawasia, ka lukawasia da eraunete lusodit.”
Kedau ŋesi acamanar ka ikeswamak ainakin adenari kanuka apaaran, kijuka kes amanake naka emusabibu.
Kolom kwaka esawa lokiwuniet, koany ice ebwoete kagwelanaret ebolwaka.
Kotema kes atiar, ‘Koloto yesi da toma amanaka naka emusabibu, karopete yes nuedolito.’ Koloto kesi.
Kolom bobo kwape isawan ikanykape ka ikanykaoŋon da, kikon kwape kwaŋin.
Kolom da kwaka isawan itomon kalodiopet, kodum ice ebwoete; kobala kes ebe, ‘Kanukinyo ibwoiata kane apaaran kere kobolwaka?’
Kobalas ebe, ‘Naarai emamei ituŋanan yenikiboleikinit.’ Kotema atiar, ‘Koloto yesi da toma amanaka naka emusabibu.’
Napekitiboŋ, kotema ejakait loka amana naka emusabibu ekapolokitonike atiar, ‘Konyarau ikeswamak, korop eropitikec, agear ka lukokau kiton lukegeete.’
Kepotu kwi luka isawan itomon kalodiopet, kodum ŋolituŋanan adenari.
Kepotu lukegeete, koomitos ebe edumunete kesi iyatakina; kodumut kesi da ŋolituŋanan adenari.
Konye kedaut adumun, kirurumakis elopet etogo,
kobalas ebe, ‘Ŋul lukokau eswamata esawa ediopet bon, itiirian ijo kes kasio lukitapasitoi apaaran kere kikanyi adedeŋ naka akoloŋ.’
Konye Koboŋok ŋesi ediopet kakesi, kotema atiar, ‘Opapero, mam keswamakinit jo erono; mam kereka kiboleikinit ijo keoŋ adenari?
Koyaŋa naerai nakon, kolot; akoto ainakin ŋol lokokau kwape kajo.
Mam kereka apedori aitwasam ikaboro kwape akotor? Arai bo erono akonikoŋu, naarai ajokuna eoŋ?’
Kwape kwaŋin lukokau eraunos Iusodit, ka lusodit da eraunos lukokau.”
“Koany, kidokari alosit Yerusalem; einakinio Okoku loka etuŋanan akanin nuka isasedotin lupeti ka ikewadikak, etubokinete ŋes atwanare;
ijaikinete ŋes Imo aboliar, ka aida, ka aibubukin, apaaran nakiwuniet ejaruni.”
Kotema atiar, “Ikoto inyo?” Kotema atiar, “Kicorak ebe kiboikinos odweka lu luarei, ediopet kakanikon nakoteten, ediopet da nakokediany, kotoma akonijakanut.”
Koboŋok Yesu ebe, “Mam ijenete nuilipete. Ipedorete kereka aimat akoli naamasi eoŋ?” Kotemasi atiar, “Kipedori,”
Kotema kes atiar, “Imasete bo akolika, konye aiboikin akanika nakoteten ka nakokediany, mere nakaŋ aikor, konye erai nakec kaŋul kaluitemokinit Papaka.”
Kepuputu lutomon, konyunyurikis iinacan iarei.
Konye Yesu konyarau kes, kotema atiar, “Ijenete ebe ikayaitok luka atekerin eyaito kes kagogoŋ, ejaas lukapolokokec kapedor mamakec.
Konye mam ikote nen kamakus; konye ŋinituŋanan yenekoto araut yenikapolon kamakus korau ikusikejaanakinan,
ŋin da yenekoto araut yenisodit korau ikusibulesit;
kwape mam ebunitor Okoku loka etuŋanan aijaanakinio dimarai aijaanakin, ka ainakin da akeijar alakunia ikepuak.”
Ido koany, kiboiete imudukiok iarei kariri kerot, nakiirariata kesi ebe itorit Yesu, kiworoto, kotemasi atiar, “Kitimoi, Ejakait, Okoku loka Daudi!”
Kiretak ekodet kes tetere ililiŋete; konye kiyatakis aiworo kotemasi atiar, “Kitimoi, Ejakait, Okoku loka Daudi!”
Kobwou Yesu, konyarau kes, kobala ebe, “Ikotos keswamakis inyo?”
Kotemasi atiar, “Ejakait, kikoto kitwekeny akosikonye.”
Kitim Yesu kes, kotiro akecekonye, atipet kokwenyut, kotupasi ŋes.
kotema kes atiar, “Koloto ore loisesenete, atipet idumunete asigiria naeenitai, ka ikekoku, kolacut, koinut eoŋ.
Arai kitemari idiotuŋanan akirot, iboŋokinete ŋes ebe, ‘Ejakait ipuda kes.’ Kosodi atipet kijaikini kes.”
Kojaut ŋun tetere edoli akirot nakinerit enabi ebe,
Koany, ebunit Ekabakakon mamakon,
Loitasono, ibwanenit asigiria,
Ibwanenit ikoku, ikoku yenikatiaŋ nakebwokan.”
Koloto ikesisiak, kiswamata kwape kicorakinitor Yesu kes.
Koinut ŋes asigiria, ka ikekoku, kopetanakis ikecenapen; kibwanen ŋesi.
Kopetanakis ituŋa luipu lukotoma okodet ikecenapen orot, ice da kojepununut atenieik kokito, kopetanakis kes da orot.
Kiworoto ikodeta lukiŋarenikinito ka luketupakinito ŋes ebe, “Kosana mama ejai Okoku loka Daudi! Isirereŋitoi loebunit kokiror loka Ejakait! Kosana kuju noi kakuj!”
Nakelomaria ŋesi Yerusalem, korieŋut lukore kere, kobalas ebe, “Iŋai bo lo?”
Koboŋokis ikodeta ebe, “Ŋol ŋes enabi Yesu loko Nasaret nako Galilaya.”
kotema kes atiar, “Iwadikatai ebe, ‘Ekatogo enyaritai etogo lokilipet,’ konye yes ituluosi abua naka ikaŋatak.”
Kopotu imudukiok ka luicodos mama ejai oyekalu, kitaŋaleu kes.
Konye nakeanyuniata isasedotin lupeti ka ikewadikak nukaumokin nukiswamai, ka idwe lukiworoete koyekalu ebe, “Kosana mama ejai Okoku loka Daudi!” konyunyurikinos;
kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Ipupi ijo nuinerasi lu?” Kotema kes Yesu atiar, “Eebo, mam isiomitos ebe,
‘Kaituke nuka idwe ludidik ka luenakete,
Itodol aiturit?’ ”
Kinye kes, koloma kiŋa ka ere kiton Betania, koper ŋina.
Tupuruc, nakeboŋoria ore, korieb eteŋei.
Koany etini kariri kerot, kolot neejai, mam eanyuna ibore kokujuke dimarai akui bon. Kolimok ŋes ebe, “Mam bobo iraenenei araito ikar kere!” Atipet korinyo etini.
Nakeanyuniata ikesisiak, koumokis, kobalas ebe, “Ekonaki bo ai etini erinyori atipet?”

Koboŋok Yesu kotema kes atiar, “Abeit katemari yes atiar, Arai ijaas kaiyuun komam ibuonokinos, mam iswamaete ŋin naka etini bon, konye arai ilimokinete eroŋat lo ebe, ‘Koukor kocakar aŋolol,’ iswamaun.
Kere da nuilipete kailipikus iyuunito, idumunete.”
Koboŋok Yesu kotema kes atiar, “Eoŋ da keŋisi yes akirot adiopet; arai kiboŋokinete eoŋ, ŋes konyet kalimokiniata yes apolou nakeswamaa nu.

Aibatisa naka Yokana kebuni kai? Kebuni kotoma akuj, arai bo kotuŋa?” Kiŋitanakinos bonik ka bonik, kobalas ebe, “Arai kiitema ebe, ‘Kebuni kotoma akuj’; kitemari ŋesi oni ebe, ‘Aso kanukinyo mam kiyuuniata ŋes?’
Arai kiitema ebe, ‘Kebuni kotuŋa,’ kikuriana ekodet; naarai eomito ituŋa kere ebe kerai Yokana enabi.”
Koboŋokis Yesu kobalas ebe, “Mam kijeni.” Kotema kes atiar, “Eoŋ da mam kalimokini yes apolou nakeswamaa nu.”
“Konye iwomito biai? Kojaas etuŋanan idwe iarei; kolot mama ejai losodit kotema atiar, ‘Ikakoku, kolot lolo kiswama toma amana naka emusabibu.’
Koboŋok ebe, ‘Alosi Ipapa,’ konye mam eloto.
Kolot mama ejai lokiareit kinera ŋupeŋun; Koboŋok ebe, ‘Mam akoto,’ kokau abu kitoronikin, kolot.

Aso ali ka luarei kaŋul loabu kiswama nuakoto papake?” Kotemasi atiar, “Lokiareit.” Kotema Yesu kes atiar, “Abeit, katemari yes atiar, Kigeikinete yes iketelemak esolo ka nudotea alomar toma ajakanut naka Edeke.
Naarai abu Yokana kobu mamakus korot loka adolit, mam yes iyuuna, konye apotu iketelemak esolo ka nudotea kiyuutu ŋes; yes da nakianyuniata, mam ipotu kitoronikinos kokau, ka aiyuun ŋes.
Keapu apak naka araito, kijuka ikebulesin mama ejaas ikeswamak, adumun akeraito.
Konye kikamut ikeswamak ikebulesin kodaata ece, koarata ece, ka ece da kibiribiroto kamor.
Kijuka bobo ibulesin ice luipu adepar lusodit; kikonakis ŋul da nepenen.
Kokau kijuka okokuke mamakec, kobala ebe, ‘Eyoŋete okokuka.’
Konye nakeanyuniata ikeswamak okoku, kineranakinos bonik ka bonik kobalas ebe, ‘Erai lo ekeruman; aso kaarata ŋes, kabeata oni akeirumet.’
Kikamut ŋes kocakas kiŋa kamana naka emusabibu koarata.
Aso naebunio ejakait loka amana naka emusabibu ikonakini ai ikeswamak kwi?”
Kotemasi atiar, “Emudiari erono ikaronok kwi, ititiŋi amana naka emusabibu ikeswamak ice lueinanakinete araito kedolo apak.”
Kotema Yesu kes atiar, “Mam isiomito nuiwadikatai ebe:
‘Amoru nakeŋerete ikadukok
Ŋin ŋes keponi kitaraunai nakapolon naka agor;
Abuni akirot ŋin kama ejai Ejakait,
Erai nakaumokin kakonyenewok.’
Kanuka ŋun katemari yes atiar, Elemario ajakanut naka Edeke kamakus, einakinio ateker ace naerai akeraito.”
Yenibirokini kuju amoru ŋin ebilibiliun; konye ŋin yenibirokin amoru, ipicipicari ŋes cut.
Nakiirariata isasedotin lupeti ka Iparisayon awaragasiake, kojenut ebe inerakinit kes.
Nakemoiata aikamun ŋes, kokuriakata ikodeta, naarai aomito ebe erai ŋesi enabi.
Koboŋok Yesu bobo, kiner kakes kawaragasia ebe,
“Ajakanut naka akuj eputos bala ekabaka lokipoikini okokuke epucit loka eiterane.
Kijuka ikebulesin anyaraun lukenyaritai aponare opucit; konye kogiroto kwi aponare.
Kijuka bobo ibulesin ice, kobala ebe, ‘Kolimokis kwi lukenyaritai ebe, Koany, etemonok ikanyamat, adau aiar ikamoŋin ka ikatak lurobok, adau aitemonokin kere; kopotu do opucit.’
Konye kes mam apotu kopodos, koloto, ediopet omanikorike, ece agwelanarike,
lukesalete da kikamut ikebulesin, kiswamakis nukepali, koarata.
Kosodi konyunyurikin ekabaka, kijuka akejore komudia ikaarak kwi, kicwe da erekec,
Kosodi kotema ikebulesin atiar, ‘Itemokino epucit, konye lukenyaritai mam ibusakinito.
Aso koloto asisiarin nuka irotin, konyarautu ŋinituŋanan kere yenidumunete kobu opucit.’
Konyoutu ibulesin ŋul koloto orotin, kotukonokis lukedumunete kere, lueroko ka luejok da; kilelebun etogo loka epucit ipejok.
Konye nakelomaria ekabaka aanyun ipejok, koany kanen etuŋanan lomam enapit anapito nakepucit.
Kotema ŋes atiar, ‘Opapero, kilomuni ne biai komamei anapito nakepucit?’ Kobuta.
Kosodi kotema ekabaka ikejaanakinak atiar, ‘Koenata akanin ka akeje, koyaŋaasi kocakakis amuton nakokiŋa; kaŋina ejaun aimony ka airiamanakin ikel.’
Naarai ipu luenyaritai, konye luseuna ikidioko.”

Kiyakikis ŋes ikesisiakakec, nepepe ka Ikerodian, kobalas ebe, “Ekesisianakinan, kijeni ebe irai ijo lokabeit, isisianakini da erot loka Edeke kotoma abeit, kwabo mam ipodo idiotuŋanan kere; naarai mam iseseni ejautene loka ituŋa.
Aso kolimokinai iwomit biai? Ibus kereka ainakin Kaisar esolo, arai bo mam?”
Konye Yesu kojen akeceronis, kotema atiar, “Yes lukesoswai, kanukinyo kikoduniata eoŋ?
Kitodikinai cani apesa naka esolo.” Koinunai adenari.
Kotema Yesu kes atiar, “Nakaŋai aput na, ka nuiwadikatai?”
Kotemasi atiar, “Nuka Kaisar.” Kosodi kotema kes atiar, “Aso kotacakis Kaisar nueraas nuka Kaisar, ka Edeke da nueraas nuka Edeke.”
Kepuputu kesi koumokis; kinyeis ŋes koloto.
kobalas ebe, “Ekesisianakinan, abu Musa kobala ebe, ‘Arai ketwana etuŋanan, komameete idwe, emanyi onaceke akeberu, tetere edumakini onaceke aur.’
Aso, kejaas iinacan ikanykaarei kamakosi; komany losodit, kotwana, ido naarai emamei ŋes aur kinyeinia onaceke akeberu;
kwape kwaŋin lokiareit, ka lokiwuniet, aitodol kere ikanykaarei.
Akaulo kakere, kotwana aberu ŋin da.
Aso, kotoma ajarun, eraun ŋin aberu naka ŋai kakwi kalukanykaarei? Naarai kere apotu kojaas kaŋes.”
Koboŋok Yesu kotema atiar, “Ipaarete yesi, naarai mam ijenete nuiwadikatai karaida apedor naka Edeke.
Naarai kotoma ajarun mam emanyete karaida adukokinio, konye eraas bala imalaikan kotoma akuj.
Bobo da kakiro nuka ajarun kokatwak, mam isiomito akirot nakinerit Edeke ebe,
‘Arai eoŋ Edeke loka Aburaam, Edeke loka Isaak, ka Edeke loka Yakob da’? Mam ŋes erai Edeke loka lukatwak, konye loka lukajarak.”
Nakiirariata ikodeta, koumokis akeisisianakin.
Ediopet kakes, ericakisila, kiŋit ŋes aiŋiset naekoduni,
ebe, “Ekesisianakinan, aicorakinet ani erai nakapolon kotoma okisila?”
Kotema ŋes atiar, “Komina Ejakait Ekonideke kekonitau kere, ka akoniijar kere, ka akonicoa da kere.
Na ŋes aicorakinet nakapolon nasodit.
Ejai da nakiareit naeputotor ebe, Komina ikoniidunyet kwape iminar bon.
Kotoma aicorakineta nu aarei kes icatunitotor ikisila kere ka inabin da.”
“Anyoika nuiwomito kanuka Kristo? Erai Okoku kaŋai?” Kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Loka Daudi.”
Kiŋit kes ebe, “Aso kikwaikini ai Daudi enyarit ŋes Ejakait, koMoyo ebe,
‘Abu Ejakait kotema Ekajakait ebe,
Kiboikin akanika nakoteten,
Aitodol neebwaikinia lukasurupokon kwap kakejekon’?
Aso arai enyarit Daudi ŋes Ejakait, kikonakini bo ai erai ikekoku.”
Mam apedorit ituŋanan aboŋokin ŋes akirot, ido ameun kapaaran kaŋin amamei bobo yeniketitiŋikinit aiŋit ŋes adiokirot.
“Iboikinos ikewadikak ka Iparisayon oicoloŋ loka Musa;
aso nukilimokinete kere kiswamata, koricito da, konye sirikiswamata nuiswamaete kesi; naarai inerasi kesi kwabo mam iswamaete.
Eenete arita nuelaŋir nuetioko aibwok, kisirioŋata ituŋa; kwabo mam kes ikulepek ekotosi atiror kebokoritikec.
Iswamaete aswamisiokec kere tetere eanyunete ituŋa; naarai italalaarete ikuniaikec luetoronokinete oreeta; itoojaete da atokito nuka inapenekec.
Ekotosi aibois nakapolon kopucin, ka iicoloŋo lukapolou kotoma atukosia,
ka ayogao kagwelanareta, konyaritos ituŋa kes ebe Rabi.
Konye yes, sirikinyaritai Rabi, naarai ejai yes ekesisianakinan ediopet, yes da kere iraas iinacan.
Sirikinyarata ediotuŋanan papa kakwap, naarai ejai yes Papakus ediopet, loejai toma akuj.
Sirikinyaritai da ikeŋarenok, naarai ejai yes ekeŋarenon ediopet, ŋes Kristo.
Konye loerai lokapolon kotomakus eraun ekusikejaanakinan.
Yenitopoloor bon itidisiario, yenitidisiar bon da itopoloorio.
“Itukwi yes, ikewadikak ka Iparisayon, lukesoswai! Naarai igolokinete ituŋa ajakanut naka akuj; naarai yes ikulepek mam ilomarete, kwabo luelomarete da mam icamakinete alomar. [
Itukwi yes, ikewadikak ka Iparisayon, lukesoswai! Naarai icamete itogoi luka apuserun, kanuka ejose da ilipete ailipasia nueojak; kanuka ŋun kitubokinio aitelekarit.]

Itukwi yes, ikewadikak ka Iparisayon, lukesoswai! Naarai irimirimete aŋolol ka akwap, tetere ibelokinete idiopetuŋanan, kedau aibelokin ituluorete ŋes ikoku yenika Geena irwan aarei aitelekarit yes ikulepek.
Ibaŋiok yesi, imudukiok! Naarai ali bo epol!, esabu arai bo eyekalu loitalauni esabu?
Ebe da, ‘Arai kiyapo ituŋanan kolimite otem, mam akiro; konye ituŋanan yeniyapoi kolimite asubanit naejai otem, aenikin.’
Imudukiok yesi! Naarai ani bo epol, ainakinet, arai bo etem loitalauni ainakinet?
Aso yeniyapoi kolimite etem, iyapoi kolimite ŋes ka ŋinibore kere yenejai tomake;
ŋin da yeniyapoi kolimite eyekalu, iyapoi kolimite ŋes ka ŋol da loiboie kotomakeŋ;
ŋin da yeniyapoi kolimite akuj, iyapoi kolimite eicoloŋ loka Edeke, ka ŋol da loiboikin tomakeŋ.
Yes ikeŋarenok lumudukiok, ijililiete esirut, ilikorete da akaala!
Ijo Eparisayot lomuduk! Kilot ber toma akoli ka asanit, tetere kiŋa da elauni.
Yes da kwape kwaŋin itakanete kokiŋa kaneejaas ituŋa koraas luidolito, konye kotomakus ileleba aisoswanut ka epali.
“Itukwi yes, ikewadikak ka Iparisayon, lukesoswai! Naarai idukete atesin nuka inabin ka aitubus ailiin nuka ikadolitok,
ka einer ebe, ‘Arai kiija isio kolo kapaarasia nuka lukapapaakosi, timam kiimorikikin kakes toma abukor aokot nuka inabin.’
Kanuka ŋun itejenunos bonik ebe iraas yesi ikecedwe kalukearete inabin.
Aso kilelebata aitemis naka lukapapaakus.
Yes imunwo, yes ailwek naka imusagan, ikuete biai atubokinio naka Geena?
Kanuka ŋun koany, kejukakini yes inabin, ka lukacoa, ka ikewadikak; iarete ice kakesi, ka aibubuonokin, idaete ice kotoma atukosiakus, irukitotor da koreria kere.
Tetere kibeikinete yes aokot kere nuka ikadolitok nukebukokinos kakwap, ageun kaokot nuka Abel ekadoliton, kiton aokot nuka Sakaria okoku loka Barakia, lokiarakinete kidiŋ aibois nakalaunan ka etem,
Abeit katemari yes atiar, Eponikinete akiro ŋun kere atur na.
Koany kinyeinere yes ekusitogo esil.
Naarai katemari yes atiar, Mam kianyunete eoŋ bobo cut, aitodol naitemariata ebe, ‘Isirereŋitoi ŋol loebunit kokiror loka Ejakait.’ ”
Konye Koboŋok kes kotema atiar, “Ianyut kereka nu kere? Abeit katemari yes atiar, mam esalakini ne amoru kuju kamoru, namam etiyakinio.”
Nakiboio koMoru loka Iseitunin, kopotu ikesisiak mama ejai kaiyeiyea, kobalas ebe, “Kolimokinai, ejaunete akiro ŋun wori, anyoin da aanyunet naka abunorekon, ka naka esaŋe loka akwapin?”
Koboŋok Yesu kotema kes atiar, “Kocoito kinyek ituŋanan aitapaar yes.
Naarai epote rwaru luipu kokirorika, ebalas ebe, ‘Eoŋ arai Kristo,’ itapaarete kesi luipu.
Iirarete yesi nuka ijiisio ka iemuto luka ijiisio; kocoito sirikiyaloŋoŋoto; naarai ibusakinit ŋun ajaun, konye koroko awasia edoluno.
Naarai enyoikini ateker asurokin ateker, ajakanut da asurokin ajakanut, ejaunun ebel ka amaran naka akwap aiboisio nuegelegela;
eraas ŋun kere ageunet naka ariebo naka aidoun.
Kosodete iguikinete luipu, kes da ebilanakinos ibotei, ka aŋaranar.
Enyounete inabin luipu lukeŋalak, itapaarete luipu.
Ido naarai iyatakina epali, ejoniari amin naka luipu.
Konye ŋin yenetitiŋikini kiton awasia, ŋes itajario.
Elimonokinio Akiro nu Nukajokak nuka ajakanut anatar akwapin kere, araut akajenak mama ejaas atekerin kere; kosodi konyet edoluni awasia.
ŋes konyet ekeriata ŋul luejaas Yudaya oroŋan;
ituŋanan yenejai kuju togo sirikedoku ayaŋaar iboro luejaas togoke;
ido yenejai mana da sirikeboŋu kau ayaŋaar akenapito.
Konye itukwi kes nuepotiete, ka nuitanakete da kapaarasia kaŋun!
Kilipata yesi kinyek akusikerit adolun kiporo, karaida apaaran naka asabato:
naarai ejaunos ican luipu, lumam peŋo etakanunito ameun kageunet naka akwap kiton kwana, ido mam bobo ejaunete cut.
Arai kedim iŋoŋaritai apaarasia ŋun, timam kitajari akuan kere; konye kanuka luseuna iŋoŋario apaarasia ŋun.
Kapak kaŋin arai kitemari yes ituŋanan atiar, ‘Koany, ejai Kristo ne,’ arai, ‘Ejai laije’, sirikiyuut.
Naarai enyounete lukriston lukeŋalak, ka inabin lukeŋalak, itoduunete ŋul aanyuneta nuepolok, ka nukaumokin da; tetere itapaarete luseuna arai epedoros.
Koany, kadau aikwenyar yes eroko nu epona.
Aso arai kitemarete yes atiar, ‘Koany, ejai amodiŋ’; sirikiloto. Ebe da, ‘Koany, ejai toma agola’ sirikiyuut.
Naarai kwape imiliaunia ageun kokide kotakani kiton to; ikoni nen abunore naka Okoku loka etuŋanan.
Naarai neejai akuan nakatwan, etukonokinos da atarukon nen.
kosodi konyet etakanuni aanyunet naka Okoku loka etuŋanan kokuju; kosodete konyet ibworos atekerin kere nuka akwap, eanyunete Okoku loka etuŋanan ebuni kodouon luka akuj kapedor ka aibuses naepol.
Ijukuni ikemalaikan keporoto loepol loka arupepe, etukonokinete luseunake anyoun kokwamin iwoŋon, ameun kosaŋe ediopet loka akuj kiton loce.
“Kisisiautu akewaragan kama ejai etini; kedaut aketenieik alibun, itolomuni akekui, ijenunete ebe eapie apak naka aidweny;
aso yes da naianyuniata ŋun kere, kojenut ebe eapie ŋesi, kokek,
Abeit katemari yes atiar, mam atur na edaun aitodol naedolioto akiro ŋun kere.
Edaunos akuj ka akwapin, konye akakiro mam edaunos cut.
Naarai kwape kejaatar apaarasia nuka Noa, ikonakini nen abunore naka Okoku loka etuŋanan.
Naarai kwape kejaatar toma apaarasia nukegeikinete akalele, anyamete, amasete, amanyasi, amanyio da, kiton apaaran nakelomaria Noa toma ataker,
komam kejenete kiton neadolunio akalele kolelea kere, ikonakini nen abunore naka Okoku loka etuŋanan.
Kapak kaŋin ejaikinos ituŋa iarei omanikor; eyaŋaario ediopet, inyeinio loce.
Ejaikinos aŋor aarei iriete; eyaŋaario adiopet, inyeinio nace.
Aso kokwenyete; naarai mam ijenete apaaran anyoin naebunio Ejakait ikus.
Konye kojenutu na ebe, arai kejeni elopet etogo apak naka akuare naebunio ekokolan, tikekweny, kwabo timam kejalaki eketogo abokio.
Kanuka ŋun kokapakina yesi da; naarai ebuni Okoku loka etuŋanan kosawa lomam iwomito.
“Aso iŋai bo ebulesit lomunot loepiriana da, lokedakakini ejakaitike ayait lukokaleke akoranakin kes ikecenyamat apakio nuedolito?
Isirereŋitoi ebulesit ŋol loedumuni ejakaitike iswamai kwaŋin naebunio.
Abeit katemari yes atiar, Edakakini ŋes ayait luejaatar kere.
Konye arai ketema ebulesit ŋol lokaronon kotauke atiar, ‘Eyapa papaka,’
kogeu aibuŋa ibulesin lukaupake, ainyam ka aimat nepepe kalukamerak,
ebuni ejakait loka ebulesit kaŋol kapaaran namam ŋes eomit, ka esawa da lomam ejeni,
etubi ŋes katutubeta aarei, itebei ekewai nepepe ka lukesoswai; ejaun kanen aimony ka airiamanakin ikel.
Akany kakes kebanaaka, akany da kepiriaka.
Naarai nakeyaŋaariata nukebaŋaaka atalaikec, mam apotu koyaŋaasi akinyet da;
Konye nukepiriaka koyaŋaasi akinyet kokubeikec nepepe katalaikec.
Nakiyapia eteran, kiluranaros kere, kojotooros.
Konye kidiŋebai kojau ecelet ebe, ‘Koany, eteran! Kolomutu kisiriamasi.’
Kosodete konyout apesur ŋun kere, kitemonokis atalaikec.
Kotemasi nukebaŋaaka nukepiriaka ebe, ‘Koinakinai sio da amodiokinyetekus, naarai aduŋeosi akositalai.’
Konye koboŋokis nukepiriaka ebe, ‘Diat mam ilosikin sio kayes; koloto gwai mama ejaas ikagwelanarak kogwelut.’
Konye napelosete agwel, kobu eteran, kolomasi nuetemokino nepepe kaŋes toma opucit; kogolokinoi ekek.
Kokau kopotu apesur nuce da kobalas ebe, ‘Ejakait, ejakait, koŋaarai.’
Konye Koboŋok, kotema atiar, ‘Abeit katemari yes atiar, mam kajeni yes.’
Aso kokwenyete, naarai mam ijenete apaaran karaida esawa.
Koinak ediopet atalatan akany, ka ece aarei, ka ece da adiopet, ŋolituŋanan kwape kejaar apedorike; kosodi kolot akwap ace.
Atipet kolot ŋol lokedumuni atalatan akany, kogwelana, kitobon ameda naka atalatan ace akany.
Kwape kwaŋin lokeinakinitai aarei, kitobon ameda naka atalatan ace aarei.
Konye lokeinakinitai atalat adiopet, kolot kobok alup, kibwa apesan nuka ejakaitike.
Kosodi ketuboros apaarasia nuipu, kobu ejakait loka ibulesin kaŋul, kimar kakes akepesan.
Kobu lokeinakinitai atalatan akany, koyau atalatan ace akany, kotema atiar, ‘Ejakait, ibu kititiŋ eoŋ atalatan akany; koany, etoboŋu atalatan ace akany.’
Kotema ejakaitike atiar, ‘Ejok, ebulesit ijo loejok lomunot da; ibu korau lomunot kaluikidioko, kadakakini jo ayait luipu; aso kolom ma toma aiyalama naka ejakaitikon.’
Kobu da ŋol lokeinakinitai atalatan aarei, kotema atiar, ‘Ejakait, ibu kititiŋ eoŋ atalatan aarei; koany, etoboŋu atalatan ace aarei.’
Kotema ejakaitike atiar, ‘Ejok, ebulesit ijo loejok lomunot da; ibu korau lomunot kaluikidioko, kadakakini jo ayait luipu; aso kolom ma ijo da toma aiyalama naka ejakaitikon.’
Kobu da ŋol lokeinakinitai atalat adiopet, kotema atiar, ‘Ejakait, abu kajen ebe irai ijo etuŋanan loeninik, idwenyi kama nemam iyeikinit, itukonokini kanemam isiarakinit;
aso kakurianar, kalot kebwa akonitalat kalup: koany, napekon na.’
Konye Koboŋok ejakaitike kotema atiar, ‘Ebulesit ijo loerono loeloŋwana! Ibu kojen ebe adwenyi kama nemam ayeikinit, atukonokini da kanemam esiarakinit;
ti ibusakinit ijo ainakin akapesan mama ejaas ikeŋadak arupian, eoŋ da kabu tikadum nuaraas nukaŋ ka amedakec da.
