Aso kodemasi ŋes atalat, koinakis ŋol loejaas atalatan atomon.
Naarai yenejai ibore einakinio, ido edumuni luipu noi; konye yenemamei ibore, ŋin da yenejaas kaŋes edemario.
Kocakakisi ebulesit ŋol lomam ajokis amuton nakokiŋa: ejaun kanen aimony ka airiamanakin ikel.’
etukonokinos atekerin kere akonyeneke, etiakatiakai ŋesi kes kwape etiakatiakaa ekecokon amerekekin ka akinei:
ibwaikini amerekekin akanike nakoteten ka akinei da akanike nakokediany.
Kosodi etemari ekabaka lukakanike nakoteten atiar, ‘Kopotu yesi lukisirereŋit Papaka, kirumata ajakanut nakitemonokinitoi ameun kaisub akwapin;
naarai kariebi eteŋei, ipotu koinakis aimuj, kajakit akur, ipotu koinakis numatan; arai epejonon, ipotu kisukunyikis;
amujalal, ipotu kitanapa; adeka, ipotu koanyanasi; ajai toma aidaris, kopotu mama ajai.’
Kosodete eboŋokinete ikadolitok ebe, ‘Ejakait, kipou kaanyutu jo wori kiriebi eteŋei, kesimujata? Arai kijakit akur, ketamata?
Kipou kaanyut jo wori irai epejonon, kesukunyikis? Arai imujalal, ketanapa?
Kipou da kaanyutu jo wori ideka, arai toma aidaris, kapotu mama ijai?’
Kanen eboŋokini ekabaka ebe, ‘Abeit katemari yes atiar, Kwape kiswamakiniata idiopet kalu iinacanaka ludidik, ipotu kiswamakis eoŋ.’
Kosodi do etemari lukakanike nakokediany atiar, ‘Irwa yesi, lukilamakinitai, kolomasi akim naka ikar kere naitemokinitoi Satan ka ikemalaikan.
Naarai kariebi eteŋei, mam ipotu koinakis aimuj; kajakit akur, mam ipotu koinakis numatan;
arai epejonon, mam ipotu kisukunyikis; amujalal, mam ipotu kitanapa; adeka, ajai da toma aidaris, mam ipotu koanyanasi.’
Kosodete eboŋokinete kesi da ebe, ‘Ejakait, kipou kaanyutu jo wori iriebi eteŋei, arai kijakit akur, arai irai epejonon, arai imujalal, arai ideka, arai ijai toma aidaris, komam kijaanakinit jo?’
Kanen eboŋokini kes ebe, ‘Abeit katemari yes atiar, Kwape mam kiswamakiniata idiopet kaludidik kalu, mam ipotu kiswamakis eoŋ.’
Elosete ŋul alomar toma aiticanio naka ikar kere, konye luedolito elosete toma aijar naka ikar kere.”
“Ijenete ebe esalito apaarasia aarei, kosodi ejaun Aleleŋ, ijaikinio Okoku loka etuŋanan aibubukinio.”
Kosodete kotukonokinos isasedotin lupeti ka imakio luka ituŋa toma alaro naka esasedoti lopeti, ekekiror Kaiapa,
kinerut nepepe tetere ikamunete Yesu kapirianut kosodete aiar.
Konye kobalas ebe, “Mere toma apak naka epucit, kinyek ecelet ajaun kotuŋa.”
kobu aberu mamakeŋ nakejai ekube loka akinyet naketiai loepol noi, kobukok akouke, iboie enyami,
Konye nakeanyuniata ikekesisiak, konyunyuras kobalas ebe, “Anyoin aimadiŋ na?
Naarai tikegwelar akinyet na apesan nuipu, akoranakin lukican.”
Konye kojenu Yesu, kotema kes atiar, “Kanukinyo itiyaloŋoŋooto aberu na? Naarai keswamaki eoŋ aswam naejok.
Naarai apaarasia kere ejaas lukican nepepe kayes, konye eoŋ mam kija kayes apaarasia kere.
Naarai kanu abukokinia akuanaka akinyet ŋin, eswama kwaŋin tetere itemokini eoŋ aidaio.
Abeit katemari yes atiar, Neelimonokinio Akiro nu Nukajokak kotoma akwapin kere, ŋin naeswama aberu na elimorio akiitunitor ŋes.”
kotema kes atiar, “Kiinakinete eoŋ inyo arai kejaik ŋes mamakus?” Kotacakis ŋes atutubeta akaisauni nuka epuesa.
Ameun kapak kaŋin komoote apak naejok aijaikinia ŋes.
Kotema atiar, “Kolot ore mama ejai mutan, kolimokis ŋes ebe, ‘Ebala Ekesisianakinan ebe, aapu akapak; etodolikini Aleleŋ orekon nepepe kikakesisiak.’ ”
Kiswamata ikesisiak kwape kicorakinia Yesu, kitemokis lukaleleŋ.
napenyamete, kotema atiar, “Abeit katemari yes atiar, ediopet kayes kabilakini eoŋ ebotet.”
Kitururwoto noi, kogeut aiŋitanar ŋes ediopet ediopet ebe, “Ŋes ca nat eoŋ ya, Ejakait?”
Koboŋok ebe, “Ŋol lokicunyi keoŋ atibo, ŋes kabilakini ebotet.
Elosi Okoku loka etuŋanan kwape kiwadikatere kanukeŋ, konye itukwi etuŋanan ŋol loebilakini Okoku loka etuŋanan ebotet! Tiejok kama ketuŋanan kaŋol arai mam kewuruunitai.”
Koboŋok Yuda lokebilakinit ŋes ebotet kotema atiar, “Ŋes ca nat eoŋ ya, Rabi?” Kotema atiar, “Ijo ibala.”
Napenyamete, kolem Yesu emugati, kisirereŋ, kobilibil, koinak ikesisiak, kobala ebe, “Kolemutu, konyamata; lo ŋes akakuan.”
Kolem akoli da, kedau aimal, koinak kes, kobala ebe, “Komata yesi kere lo:
naarai nu kes akaokot nuka aitutuket, nuebukoros kanuka ikepuak alemar aronisio,
Katemari yes atiar, Mam amasi bobo cut nuka araito na naka emusabibu kiton apaaran ya naamasia nukitetiak nepepe kayes kotoma ajakanut naka Papaka.”
Kosodi Yesu kotema kes atiar, “Iguikinos yesi kere kakuar kana kanukaŋ; naarai iwadikatai ebe, ‘Ebuŋai rwaru ekecokon, isiarakinos amerekekin nukosipan.’
Konye kadau ajarun, keŋarenikinete yes alosit Galilaya.”
Koboŋok Petero kotema ŋes atiar, “Karaida kiguikinos kere kanukon, konye eoŋ mam keguikini cut.”
Kotema Yesu ŋes atiar, “Abeit katemari jo atiar, akuar na, eriŋa ekokoro keruikino, kiŋeri eoŋ irwan auni.”
Kotema Petero atiar, “Karaida kebusakinit atwanare kajo, mam kaŋeri jo cut.” Kinerata ikesisiak kere da kwape kwaŋin.
Koyaŋa Petero ka odwe iarei luka Sebedayo, kogeu aiturur ka aburun.
Kosodi kotema kes atiar, “Itururwei ekatau noi, aapiar atwanare; kosalata yesi ne, kokwenya nepepe keoŋ.”
Kikunyak nediokasilon, kibiror ebuburia, kilip ebe, “Wu Papaka, arai epedoros, kenac akoli na; konye mere nuakoto eoŋ, dimarai kwape ikotor ijo.”
Kobu mama ejaas ikesisiak, kodum kes ejotoete; kotema ŋesi Petero atiar, “Aso ca mam ipedorete aikweny nepepe keoŋ esawa ediopet?
Kokwenya, kilipa kinyeis alomar toma acodunio; ekoto bo emoyo, konye ekalanyana akuan.”
Koboŋo bobo nakiareit kilip ebe, “Papaka, arai mam epedori akoli na ainac komam eoŋ amasi, kiswamai do nuikoto ijo.”
Kobu bobo kodum kes ejotoete, naarai eluranaros ajo.
Kinye kes bobo, kolot kilip nakiwuniet, inera bobo akiro kwapekwa.
Kosodi kobu mama ejaas ikesisiak, kotema kes atiar, “Iroko kereka ijotoete, iyeŋito? Koany aapu esawa, einakinio Okoku loka etuŋanan akanin nuka ikadiakanarak.
Konyoutu, kaloto; koany, eapie lokabilaki ebotet.”
Koinakinite lokebilakini ŋes ebotet kes aanyunet ebe, “Loanui eoŋ ŋes ŋol; kikamutu ŋes.”
Atipet kolot mama ejai Yesu, kotema atiar, “Yoga, Rabi!” Konu noi,
Kotema Yesu ŋes atiar, “Opapero, kiswama nukiyaunito.” Kosodete kikunyakis koriosi akecekanin kikamut Yesu,
Ido koany, ediopet kaŋul kalukejaas kaYesu korio akekan, kout ekekileŋ, kinom ebulesit loka losasedoti lopeti, kojepa akekit.
Kosodi Yesu kotema ŋes atiar, “Kinyakak ekileŋikon aiboisike; naarai kere luekapito ikileŋa, emudiari ekileŋ.
Arai iwomitos ebe mam apedori aiŋaiŋa Papaka, kejukak kwape kwana irioŋeta luedeparito itomon ka luarei luka imalaikan?
Aso edolete biai nukiwadikatai ebe ibusakinit ŋun ajaun?”
Kosawa kaŋol kotema Yesu ikodeta atiar, “Ilomutu teni yesi kikileŋa ka ibelai aikamun eoŋ, bala ekaŋatan? Ŋinipaaran eboonokin kotoma oyekalu esisianakini, komam kikamunete eoŋ.
Konye ajaut nu kere tetere edolete nukiwadikato inabin.” Kosodete kojalakis ŋes ikesisiak kere, kokerata.
Kotupa Petero kama elwana, kiton alaro naka losasedoti lopeti, koloma toma, kiboikin nepepe ka ikedarak aanyun nuebeikinete.
Aso komoata isasedotin lupeti ka aurianet kere ikajenak lukeŋalak aluikin Yesu tetere earete,
mam edumuna, karaida ketakanut ikajenak luipu lukeŋalak, Konye kokau kotakanut iarei,
kobalas ebe, “Abala ŋol ebe, apedori aiket eyekalu loka Edeke, ka adukokin apaarasia auni.”
Kosodi kobwo losasedoti lopeti kotema atiar, “Mam ca bo iboŋokini akirot? Anyoika ŋun nuetejenut ŋul aluikin jo?”
Konye kililiŋ Yesu. Kotema losasedoti lopeti ŋes atiar, “Kesiyapoi jo mama ejai Edeke lokajaran, kolimokinai cani sio arai irai ijo Kristo, Okoku loka Edeke.”
Kotema Yesu ŋes atiar, “Ijo ibala, Konye katemari yes atiar, Amear kwana ianyunete Okoku loka etuŋanan iboie kakan nakoteten naka Apedor, ebuni kotoma odouon luka akuj.”
Kosodi kocil losasedoti lopeti ikenapen, kobala ebe, “Ainyanaki, Anyoika bobo kipudar ikajenak? Koany, iirasi kwana akeinyanakin.
Iwomitos anu?” Koboŋokis ebe, “Ibusakinit atwanare.”
Kosodete kimwaanakis aimul akonyeneke, kodipidipoto ŋes; ice da kibapanasi,
kobalas ebe, “Ijo Kristo, kodwarak iŋai! Iŋai bo kibuŋa?”
Kiboie Petero kokiŋa kotoma alaro: kobu apese mama ejai kobala ebe, “Ijai nan ijo da nepepe kaYesu Egalilayat.”
Konye koŋer kakonyen nuka ituŋa kere, kobala ebe, “Mam ajeni nuinera ijo.”
Konye nakelomunia okek, koany acepese ŋes, kotema ŋesi lukejaas nen atiar, “Ajai lo da nepepe ka Yesu Enasarayot.”
Koŋer bobo kaiyapo ebe, “Mam ajeni etuŋanan ŋol.”
Nediokasilon kopotu lukebwoete kanen, kotemasi Petero atiar, “Abeit irai ijo lokec, naarai itejenunit ekoniiner.”
Kosodi kogeu eilam ka aiyapo ebe, “Mam eoŋ ajeni etuŋanan ŋol.” Atipet koruik ekokor.
Kiitu Petero akirot nakelimokini Yesu ŋes ebe, “Eriŋa ekokor keruikino, kiŋeri eoŋ irwan auni.” Koloma kiŋa komonyi noi akiyo.
koenata ŋes, koyaŋaasi, kijaikis Pilato lokerai ekayaiton.
kobala ebe, “Abu kadiak, abilakin ebotet aokot numam akirot.” Konye kotemasi kesi atiar, “Anu nat kamakosi? Nukon bo ŋun.”
Kocakak atutubeta kwa nuka epuesa aibois nakalaunan, konyou; kolot komiedakin.
Kolemasi isasedotin lupeti atutubeta nuka epuesa, kobalas ebe, “Mam ibus aibwaikin kes aiŋadis, naarai eraas etiai loka aokot.”
Kinerut, kogweluniata emanikor loka ekajean, aidaanakin nen ikalotok.
Kanuka ŋun ŋes enyaritere emanikor ŋol, Emanikor loka Aokot, kiton lolo.
Kosodi kitodolikinoi akirot nakinerit Yeremia enabi ebe, “Apotu kolemasi atutubeta akaisauni nuka epuesa, etiai loka ŋol kalokitirianitai, lokitirianete ice kodwe luka Isirael:
kogweliata emanikor loka ekajean kwape kicorakinia Ejakait.”
Nakiwosaata ŋes isasedotin lupeti ka imakio mam eboŋokino akirot.
Kosodi kotema Pilato ŋes atiar, “Mam kereka jo ipupi nuetia nen nuiwosaete kesi?”
Mam ŋes eboŋokino, karaida amodiokirot: koumok noi ekayaiton.
Kejaas keenat loajenikina kapak kaŋin, lokenyaritai Baraba.
Naketukokinotor, kotema Pilato kes atiar, “Ikotosi kaosikis yes iŋai? Baraba arai bo Yesu loenyaritai Kristo?”
Naarai ajeni ŋesi ebe ainakis kanuka ekolo.
Nakiboikinor oicoloŋ loka aitub, kiyakik akeberu ŋes, kotema atiar, “Sirikiswamak ekadoliton ŋol adiokirot; naarai keticani nuipu kairujasit kakuar kana kanukeŋ.”
Kosodete kisidikoto isasedotin lupeti ka imakio ikodeta tetere ilipete Baraba, ka amudiar Yesu.
Konye Koboŋok ekayaiton kotema kes atiar, “Ikotosi kaosikis yes iŋai ka luarei?” Kobalas ebe, “Baraba,”
Kotema Pilato kes atiar, “Aso do ekonakini ai Yesu loenyaritai Kristo?” Kobalas kere ebe, “Kibubukinoi.”
Kobala ebe, “Kanukinyo? Naanyoin aronis nakiswamai?” Konye kiyatakisi kesi aiworo noi ebe, “Kibubukinoi.”
Koboŋokis ituŋa kere ebe, “Kobeikisi akeokot sio, ka ikosidwe da.”
Kosodi koosik kes Baraba: konye kedau aida Yesu, koinak tetere ibubukinio.
Kolacasi ikenapen, kitanapa anapito nakareŋan,
Kojeata aboko naka ikukwa, kitanapikis akouke, ka agada da kakanike nakoteten; kokukonokinos kakonyeneke, kokienatar, kobalas ebe, “Yoga, ijo Ekabaka loka Iyudayan!”
Kimwaanakis aimul, kodemasi agada ŋin kinomonomiata akouke.
Kosodete kedautu akienar ŋes, kolacasi anapito ŋin, kitanapa ikenapen, koyaŋaasi aibubukin.
Napenyounete kore, kodumut etuŋanan Ekurenayot, ekekiror Simon: kitiŋaikis ŋol airioŋ emusalaba loka Yesu.
Nakedolioto aibois naenyaritai Gologota, apolouke ebe, Aibois naka Abelekek naka Akou,
koinakis aimat ebino loinyalakinitai epiu: kedau akiir, koŋer aimat.
Kedautu aibubukin, kokorokorata akenapito, kailamilam eroet.
Kiboikinos kidarata ŋes kaŋina.
Kikajakis kuju kakouke nueosatai ŋes nuewadikatai ebe, LO ŊES YESU EKABAKA LOKA IYUDAYAN.
Kapak kaŋin kibubukinoi ikaŋatak iarei nepepe kaŋes, ediopet kakanike nakoteten, ka ediopet da kakanike nakokediany.
Lukitorito nen koinyanakinete ŋes, kimuŋumuŋete da akecekwes,
kobalas ebe, “Ijo lokaketan eyekalu, ka aiduk da kotoma apaarasia auni, kitajarun cani: arai irai ijo Okoku loka Edeke, kodoku komusalaba.”
Kikote nen da isasedotin lupeti kokienatar ŋes, nepepe ka ikewadikak ka imakio, kobalas ebe,
“Etajar ice; mam epedori aitajarun bon. Erai ŋesi Ekabaka loka Isirael; kodoku kwana komusalaba, kiyuuni do ŋes.
Emunokina Edeke; mere cani kitajar ŋes kwana, arai ekoto ŋes; naarai abu kinera ebe, ‘Arai eoŋ Okoku loka Edeke.’ ”
Ikaŋatak kwi da lukibubukinitoi nepepe kaŋes, korutonokis ŋes akiro kwapekwa.
Ameun kosawa lokikanyetekape kojau amuton akwap kere kiton osawa lokikanyetekaoŋon.
Bala esawa lokikanyetekaoŋon kodelo Yesu keporoto loepol, kobala ebe, “Eli, eli, lama sabakatani?” apolouke ebe, “Ekadeke, Ekadeke, kanukinyo kijalakinia eoŋ?”
Ice kaŋul kalukebwoete kanen, kiirasi, kobalas ebe, “Enyarit ŋol Eliya.”
Atipet koker ediopet kakesi, kolem acago, kileleb ebino loedwar ria, kibwaik toma agada, kitamat ŋes,
Kobalas ice ebe, “Kinyek; kaanyutu arai cani ebuni Eliya aitajar ŋes.”
Kodelo Yesu bobo keporoto loepol, kojal ekemoyo.
koŋaanaros atesin; kitonyounoi awat nuipu nuka lukalaunak kalukolo kejotooros;
kedau Yesu ajarun kolomut katesin, kolomasi ore lokalaunan, kitakanikinos luipu.
Nakeanyuniata ekapolokiton ka ŋul da lukejaas kaŋes idarete Yesu, amaran naka akwap, ka akiro da nukiswamas, kokuriakaros noi, kobalas ebe, “Abeit kerai teni ŋol Okoku loka Edeke.”
kotomakec kejai Mariam Magadalene, ka Mariam toto naka Yakob ka Yosep, ka toto naka odwe luka Sebedayo.
Kolot ŋol mama ejai Pilato kilip akuan naka Yesu. Kosodi kicorak Pilato ŋes ainakinio.
Kolem Yosep akuan, konunukik toma obaputa Ioelai,
kibwaik toma atesike nakitetet, nakebokit ŋesi atiida; kikokorik amoru naepol agolokinio ekek loka ates, kolot.
Kejaas nen Mariam Magadalene ka Mariam ace, iboiete kotereikina ates.
Apaaran naatupakini, ŋes atemar ebe, akaulo kapaaran naka Aitemonokin, kotukokinos isasedotin lupeti ka Iparisayon mama ejai Pilato,
kobalas ebe, “Ejakait, kiitunit isio ebe abala lem ekeŋalan ŋol naarokor ejari ebe, ‘Akaulo kapaarasia auni ajaruni.’

Kanuka ŋun kicorak kidarai ates kojokan aitodol apaaran nakiwuniet, kinyeis ikekesisiak alosit akokwar ŋes, kosodete alimonokin ituŋa ebe, ‘Ajaru kotoma okatwak’ itelekari do aiŋal nakokau ya nasodit.”
Kotema Pilato kes atiar, “Ejaas yes iserikalei lukedarak; koloto, kidarata kojokan kwape ipedoriata.”
Koloto do kidarata ates kojokan, kipucakis amoru ka aibwaikin da iserikalei lukedarak.
Ido koany, kejai amaran naka akwap; naarai kodok emalaika loka Ejakait kokuju, kobu kikokoro amoru awai, kiboikin kujuke.
Kotakanu bala eimilia, ikenapen da kiliacanito kiac.
Komaranata ikedarak kanuka akurianar ŋes, kosubata bala lukatwak,
Koboŋok emalaika kotema aŋor atiar, “Sirikikuriakaros yesi; naarai ajeni ebe imootos Yesu lokibubukinitoi.
Emamei kane; naarai ajaru, kwape eneritor. Kopotu koanyut aibois naeperikinitoi.
Koloto yesi da atipet, kolimokis ikekesisiak ebe, ‘Ajaru kotoma okatwak’; ido koany, kiŋarenikini yes alosit Galilaya; ianyikinete ŋes ŋina; koany kadau alimokin yes.”
Konyout atipet kates kakurian ka aiyalama naepol, kokerata alimokin ikekesisiak.
Ido koany, kiriamakin Yesu kakes, kobala ebe, “Yoga!” Kikunyakis kitiŋata akekejen komaata ŋes.
Kosodi Yesu kotema kes ariar, “Sirikikuriakaros; koloto kolimokis ikainacan koloto Galilaya, ŋina kaanyikinete.”
Napelosete, koany, kolomasi ice kokedarak ore, kolimokis isasedotin lupeti akiro nukedoikinete,
Kotukokinos nepepe kimakio kinerut, koinakis iserikalei arupiyan nuipu,
kobalas ebe, “Kinerata yesi ebe, ‘Apotu ikekesisiak kopotu kuare, kokokwasi ŋes kijotoi isio.’
Arai kiirar akirot na kama ekayaiton, kimaimai isio ŋes, kinyeis yes aiticanio.”
Kolemasi arupiyan kiswamata kwape kisisianakinitere; kisiarakin akirot na toma oYudayan kiton lolo.
Nakeanyuniata ŋes, komaata; konye kobuonokinos ice kakesi.
Kobu Yesu neejaas kinera kakes, kotema atiar, “Kainakin eoŋ apedor kere kokuju kakwapin da.
Aso kolot kituluosi lukatekerin kere ikesisiak, kibatisaete kes kokiror loka Papa, ka loka Okoku, ka loka Emoyo Lokalaunan;
kisisianakinete kes aricit akiro kere nukecorakinit yes; ido koany, ajai eoŋ nenipe kayes apaarasia kere, kiton awasia naka ikar kere,”
Ageunet naka Akiro Nukajokak nuka Yesu Kristo, Okoku loka Edeke.
Kwape kiwadikatere toma Isaia enabi ebe:
“Koany, ejukari ekakiyakia kakonyenekon, Loitemonokini ekonirot;
‘Kitemonokis erot loka Ejakait, Kitetenata ikesokono.’ ”
Kotakanu Yokana Lokebatisan elimonokini kamodiŋ aibatisa naka aitoronikin kanuka alemar adiakanareta.
Kolosenenete lukakwap kere naka Yudaya ka luko Yerusalem da kere mama ejai; kibatisai kes kocor Yorodan, kolimonorete akecediakanareta.
Konapenenei Yokana ajul nuka akaal, ka amuny naka emukule kaŋabeteke, konyamenenei da emaase ka esik loka ais.
Kolimonokini, kobala ebe, “Ebunit kokaukaŋ loketelekarit eoŋ kagogoŋ, lomam eoŋ kebusakinit akukum alacun amuny naka amukake.
Kebatisat eoŋ yes kakip; konye ŋes kibatisai yes kEmoyo Lokalaunan.”
Atipet napedokuni kakipi, koany akuj ecilil, kodoku Emoyo mamakeŋ kwape ajele.
Kobu eporoto kotoma akuj kobala ebe, “Irai ijo Okokuka lominat, Kalelakinit jo noi.”
Kojau toma amodiŋ apaarasia akaisaoŋon, ecoduni Satan ŋes; kojaas nenipe kitiaŋ luka ais, kijaanakinete ŋes imalaikan.
kobala ebe, “Adol apak, aapu da ajakanut naka Edeke. Kitoronikinos, kiyuut Akiro Nukajokak.”
Kotema Yesu kes atiar, “Kotupunai, ketuluori yes ikalokak ituŋa,”
Atipet kinyeis iboyanakec, kotupasi ŋes,
Kiyatak alosit nediokasilon, koany Yakob okoku loka Sebedayo ka Yokana onaceke, lukejaas toma ataker erucete iboyan.
Atipet konyarau kes; kinyekis papakec Sebedayo kataker nenipe kikewoteok, kotupasi ŋes.
Koumokis noi ituŋa akeisisianakin, naarai kisisianakini kwape elopet apolou, kwabo mere kwape ikewadikak.
Atipet kojai toma atukosikec etuŋanan lokejai emoyo loerono. Kiworo, kobala ebe,
“Anyoika sio ka jo, Yesu loko Nasaret? Ibu kereka amudiar sio? Kajeni jo kwape iraar, Lokalaunan loka Edeke.”
Kiretak Yesu ŋes ebe, “Kobuta, kolom kamakeŋ!”
Kitamaran ŋes emoyo lokaronon, kodelo keporoto loepol, kolom kamakeŋ.
Koumokis kere, kiŋitanaros kobalas ebe, “Anyoika bo nu? Itet ca ma aisisianakin na! Naarai icorakini kapedor imoyon lueroko da, erimasi ŋes!”
Atipet kisiarakin ekeemut aiboisio kere anatar atutubeta kere nuirimorito nuko Galilaya.
Keperi kanen amuran naka Simon edeka ekamidi, atipet kolimokis Yesu akekiro.
Kikunyak kitiŋ akekan, kitonyou ŋes. Atipet koŋaleu ekamidi, kijaanak kes.
Nakitiboŋ, keloma akoloŋ, koinut ŋes kere lukedekas ka lukajokin.
Kotukokinos lukore kere orute.
Kitaŋaleu luipu lukejaas adekesia nuegelegela, kireŋea da ajokin nuipu; mam kecamakinit ajokin einer, naarai kejenete ŋes.
Kibwapito ŋes Simon ka ikepaup.
Nakedumuniata kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Kimooto jo ituŋa kere.”
Kotema kes atiar, “Kaloto nenice, oreria lueapiete, tetere alimonokini ŋina da; naarai ŋin abunitor eoŋ.”
Kolot ilokidai Galilaya kere, elimonokini katukosiakec ka aireŋeanar da ajokin.
Konyunyura, korio akekan, kotiro kotema atiar, “Akoto; kiswagar.”
Atipet koŋaleu atapon, kiswagar.
Kisiopak Yesu ŋes, kireŋea atipet,
kotema ŋes atiar, “Kocoite sirikilimok idiotuŋanan adiokirot. Konye kolot, kitodiar mama ejai esasedoti, koinak nukolo kicorakinit Musa kanuka aiswagariokon, koraut akajenak kamakec.”

Konye koloma, kogeu alimonokin noi, ka aitisiarakin akirot, komam bobo Yesu epedori alomar ore kaitebeikin, konye kojai kiŋa toma aiboisio nuemameete ituŋa, Kopotu ituŋa mamakeŋ anyoun kaiboisio kere.
Kotukokinos ituŋa luipu, komamei adiopak naesalit karaida kokek; kolimonokini kes akirot,
Kopotu koinut ŋes etuŋanan lokasenyan ibwokito ituŋa iwoŋon.
Namam kepedoriata aikunyakin ŋes kanuka ekodet, koketasi eswi kama kejai; kedaut apukor, kijesut akapet nakiperikinitoi lokasenyan.
Nakeanyunia Yesu akeceiyuun, kotema lokasenyan atiar, “Okokuka, esionii akonidiakanareta.”
Ikewadikak ice lukejaas nen iboiete, kopegas kotauonokec ebe,
“Kanukinyo inerar ŋol kwaŋin? Einyanakini Edeke. Iŋai bo epedori aisioni adiakanareta, dimarai Edeke bon?”
Atipet kojenu Yesu kotauke ebe epegas kwaŋin kotauonokec, kotema kes atiar, “Kanukinyo ipegatatar kwaŋin kotauonokus?
Ani bo naepatana, alimokin lokasenyan ebe, ‘Esionii akonidiakanareta,’ arai bo atemar ebe, ‘Konyou, kibwok akonikapet kolot?’
Konye tetere ijenunete ebe ejai Okoku loka etuŋanan apedor kakwap aisioni adiakanareta” kanen kotema lokasenyan atiar,
“Katemari jo atiar, konyou, kibwok akonikapet, koboŋo orekon.”
Atipet konyou, kibwok akekapet koloma kakonyenekec kere: koumokis kere, kitopoloosi Edeke, kobalas ebe, “Mam lem kianyununei nuikote nen.”
Nakitoritor, koany Lebi okoku loka Alipayo iboie kaitelemis, kotema atiar, “Kotupunai.” Konyou kotupa ŋes.
Kosodi kanen, nakiboio enyami koreke, kiboiete iketelemak esolo luipu ka ikadiakanarak da nepepe ka Yesu ka ikekesisiak; naarai araas luipu.
Kotuparito da ikewadikak luka Iparisayon, ido nakeanyuniata ŋes emorete kikadiakanarak ka iketelemak esolo, kiŋita ikekesisiak atiar, “Kanukinyo emoriata ŋesi ka iketelemak esolo ka ikadiakanarak?”
Nakiiraria Yesu, kotema kes atiar, “Lukagogoŋok mam ipudas emurwon, dimarai lukadekak. Mam abunit anyarit ikadolitok, dimarai ikadiakanarak.”
Koboŋok Yesu kes ebe, “Epedorete biai ipapero luka eteran ailuŋ eriŋa eteran ejai kakes? Apak kere naejaatar keteran, mam epedorete ailuŋ,
Konye eponito apaarasia nuedemarere eteran; eluŋete do kapaaran kaŋin,
Emamei yenedonyokini atutubet naka egoe lokitetet anapito namojoŋ; arai kikonaki nen, atutubet nakitetet ecili ya namojoŋ, iyatakini acilat.
Emamei da yenebukokini ebino loitet oriagin lukemukule lumojoŋ; arai kikonaki nen, ecili ebino iriagin, imadiŋikin ebino ka iriagin da; konye ebukonokinio ebino loitet oriagin lukitetiak.”
Kotemasi Iparisayon atiar, “Koany! Kanukinyo iswamaata numam ibus kapaaran nakasabato?”
Kotema kes atiar, “Mam lem isiomito nukiswamai Daudi, nakipudar korieb eteŋei, ŋes ka ikepaup;
kwape kelomaria togo loka Edeke apaarasia nukeraar Abiatar esasedoti lopeti, konyam Imugatin luka Aitodikin, lumam ibus ainyam dimarai isasedotin, koinak ikepaup da?”
Kotema kes atiar, “Asubio Asabato kanuka etuŋanan, kwabo mere etuŋanan kanuka Asabato.
Kwaŋin Okoku loka etuŋanan ŋes Ejakait loka Asabato.”
Kiteikinitoi ŋes, aanyun arai itaŋaleuni kapaaran nakasabato, tetere iwosaete ŋes.
Kotema ŋesi etuŋanan lokejai akan nakewonit atiar, “Kobwo kokidiŋ.”
Kiŋit kes ebe, “Ibus kereka aswam nuejok kapaaran nakasabato, arai bo aswam nueroko, aitajar aijar, arai bo aiar?” Konye kililiŋata.
Kosesen kes kanyunyura, kokadak kanuka aninik naka ikecetauon, kolimok etuŋanan ebe, “Korio akonikan.” Korio ŋesi akekan, koŋaleu.
Kolomasi Iparisayon, kinerutu atipet kaluKerodian asurokin ŋes, ka epone loemudiariata ŋes.
ko Yerusalem ka Idumea, ka okekwa Yorodan, ka ariino da nuka Turo ka Sidon, ekodet loapol, lokiirarit akiro kere nukiswamat, kobu mamakeŋ.
Kolimok ikekesisiak aitemokinit ataker aidaret ŋes, kanuka ekodet, kinyeis aridakin ŋes;
naarai kitaŋaleunit luipu, tape da kere lukiticanete adekesia ebelaros atiror ŋes.
Nakeanyuniata ŋes imoyon lueroko, kibiroros kakonyeneke, kiworoto kobalas ebe, “Irai ijo Okoku loka Edeke.”
Kicorenenei kes jokan kinyeis aitejenun ŋes.
Koseu itomon kaluarei ajaenena kaŋes, ido aiyakienen alimonokin;
kojaas da kapedor aireŋear ajokin.
Koseu lutomon kaluarei lu: Simon, komaik ekekiror Petero;
ka Yakob okoku loka Sebedayo, ka Yokana onaceke (komaik kes ekiror Boanerege, apolouke ebe, Idwe luka airetun);
ka Anderea, ka Pilipo, ka Batolomayo, ka Matayo, ka Tomas, ka Yakob okoku loka Alupayo, ka Tadayo, ka Simon Ekanaanit
ka Yuda Isikariot, ŋes lokebilakini ebotet.
Koboŋo ore.
Kotukokin bobo ekodet, komam epedorete ainyam idisinyamat.
Nakiirariata lukeŋ, kolomasi aikamun ŋes, naarai kobalas ebe, “Amunaar.”
Kobalas ikewadikak lukijesunos koYerusalem ebe, “Ejai Beelesebul, ido ireŋeari ajokin kanuka ekapolon loka ajokin.”
Konyarau kes kolimok kawaragasia ebe, “Epedori biai Satan aireŋear Satan?
Ajakanut arai etiakatiakaun bon, mam epedori ajakanut ŋin aicasit.
Arai da etogo etiakatiakaun bon, mam epedori etogo ŋol aicasit.
Aso arai enyoikino Satan bon, etiakatiakaun da, mam epedori aicasit; konye enaŋete nuke nen,
Konye emamei loepedori alomar togo loka ekagogoŋon, ka aiŋat ikeboro, arai mam ber eenit ekagogoŋon ŋol; ŋes konyet eŋasia eketogo.
“Abeit katemari yes atiar, Isionio adiakanareta kere nuka ituŋa, ka ainyanakineta da kere nueinyanakinete;
konye yeneinyanakini Emoyo Lokalaunan mam isionio cut; konye egwaunete akiro nukadiakar naka ikar kere.”
Naarai apotu kobalas ebe, “Ejai emoyo loerono.”
Kiboie ekodet elukunit ŋes; kobalas ŋes ebe, “Koany, totokon ka ikoniinacan ejaas kiŋa, kimootos jo.”
Koboŋok kes kotema atiar, “Iŋai bo totoka ka ikainacan?”
Kirere ŋul lueboiete elukunito ŋes, kotema atiar, “Koany, totoka, ka ikainacan!
Naarai ituŋanan kere yeniswamai nuekoto Edeke, ŋin ŋes onaceka, ka inacika, ka totoka da.”
Kisisianak akiro nuipu kotoma awaragasia, kolimok kes kotoma aisisianakinike ebe,
“Kiirasi! Koany, abu ekayean koloma aiye.
Kosodi kanen napeyei, kodooto ikinyom ice ariri korot, kopotu akweny, konyama.
Kodooto ice aŋaŋam, nekikidioko alup; atipet kobwaŋutu, naarai kesedeny alup.
Nakecaunia akoloŋ konomo; ido naarai kemameete alias, korinyosi.
Kodooto ice okukwa; kolibut ikukwa koridakis, mam apotu koraata araito.
Kodooto ice alup nuejok, koraata araito, kopolooros, kiyatakinos; koraata akaisauni, ka akaisakanykape, kiton akwatat da.”
Kotema atiar, “Yenejaas aki nuka akiirar, kiira.”
Kosodi nakejaar bon, apotu ituŋa lukelukunito ŋes ka ikesisiak itomon kaluarei kiŋita ŋes akiro nuka awaragasia.
Kotema kes atiar, “Kiinakinitai yes ajenun aiyeiyea naka ajakanut naka Edeke; konye mama ejaas kwi luejaas kiŋa eraas kere awaragasia:
tetere aanyun eanyunete komam emisiikinete; akiirar da iirarete komam ejenunete; kinyeis aibelokin ka aisionio.”
Kotema kes atiar, “Mam kereka yes ijenete awaragan na? Aso ijenunete biai awaragasia kere?
Eyei ekayean akirot.
Ŋul lukariri kerot kama keyeikinio akirot kes lu; kedaut akiirar, atipet ebuni Satan, elemari akirot nakeyeikinio otauonokec.
Ikote nen da lukeyeikinio aŋaŋam, kedaut akiirar akirot, atipet ecamunete kaiyalama.
Kwabo emameete alias kotomakec, konye etitiŋikinete nediokasilon; kosodete naeponikiniata aiticaneta ka areio kanuka akirot, atipet iguikinos.
Ice kes lukeyeikinio okukwa; kes lukiirarete akirot,
kosodi aiyaloŋoŋ naka akwapin, ka aiŋal naka abar, ka eraŋa loka acekiro elomarete, eridakinete akirot, mam erai.
Ka ŋul da lukeyeikinio alup nuejok kes lukiirarete akirot, kocamut, koraata araito, akaisauni, ka akaisakanykape kiton akwatat da.”
Naarai emamei akirot naibwaitai, dimarai kito aitakanunio; kwabo emamei akirot naimunonitai, dimarai kito aikujunio.
Arai ejaas ituŋanan aki nuka akiirar, kiira.”
Kotema kes atiar, “Kocoito nuipupete. Aitemis naitemioto yesi, ŋipeŋin kitemere yes, kiyatakinio da.
Naarai yenejai ibore einakinio ice; konye yenemamei ibore, edemunio ŋin da yenejaas kaŋes.”
Kotema atiar, “Ikoni ne ajakanut naka Edeke bala etuŋanan lokeyei ikinyom alup;
kojotoor, ka anyoun, kuare ka paaran; kobwaŋutu ikinyom kopolooros, komam ŋes ejeni kwape kikonakinere.
Eraete alup kanukec, egeuni akiot, kosodi aluŋuret, kosodi konyet akima nuekokito.
Konye kekoko araito, atipet ijukari ecilikiki, naarai adol aidweny.”
Eputos ka ecokat loka ekaradali, loeyeikinio toma alup, karaida kedit aitelekarit ikinyom kere luka akwapin;
konye nakeyeikin, epoloor, eraun lokapolon aitelekarit idiasio kere, kijany atenieik nuepolok, tape edukete akweny nuka apak akaisikec otolimike.”
Kolimok kes akirot kawaragasia nuipu nuekote nen, kwape kepedoriata akiirar.
Kwabo mam abu kolimok kes emamei awaragan: konye kitebeik ikekesisiak akiro kere kaiyeiyea.
Kinyeis ekodet, koyaŋaasi ŋes nepepe kakes kwape kejaar, kotoma ataker. Koupasi atakerin ace da.
Kokut ekwam loededeŋ, Koretonokinos akailan ataker, aitodol neapiatar akipi ailelebun ataker,
Konye kejai ŋesi elopet okori kataker, ejotoi kaicolonit. Kitwekenyut ŋes kotemasi atiar, “Ekesisianakinan, mam jo ipodo kimudiari oni?”
Kokweny ŋesi, kiretak ekwam, kolimok aŋolol ebe, “Kililiŋ! Kinapakin!” Kopala ekwam, kojaun aiyamakin naepol.
Kotema kes atiar, “Kanukinyo ikuriakarotor? Eroko ca ma yes iyuuna?”
Kolomak kes aiyoŋ naepol, kotemanaros atiar, “Iŋai bo lo, naarai ekwam ka aŋolol da erimasi ŋes?”
Nakedokunia kataker, atipet kiriamunos ketuŋanan lokemoyo loerono, lokebuni katesin,
Kiboienenei ŋol katesin. Komamei ituŋanan yenepedori aien ŋes bobo, karaida kirikoi;
naarai keenenenoo irwan ipu kiloin ka irikoi, koŋedeŋedei irikoi, kobilibil da aeneta; komamei ituŋanan kere yenikejaas kagogoŋ aitapatan ŋes,
Apaarasia kere, apaaran ka akuar, kojaenena atesin ka oroŋan, iworoi, ka atubutubo kamor.
Nakeanyunia Yesu kama elwana, koker koma ŋes.
Kiworo keporoto loepol, kobala ebe, “Anyoika eoŋ ka jo, Yesu, Okoku loka Edeke Loejai kuju kakuj? Kesiyapoi kalimite Edeke, sirikiitican eoŋ.”
Naarai abu Yesu kotema ŋes atiar, “Ijo emoyo loirono, kolom kotuŋanan!”
Kiŋit Yesu ŋes ebe, “Ekonikiror iŋai?” Koboŋok ebe, “Ekakiror erai Ajore; naarai kipu isio.”
Kiŋaiŋa noi ebe kinyek aireŋear kakwap kaŋin.
Kanen koroŋat kojai esipan loapol loka ipegei edakasi.
Kiŋaiŋaata ŋes imoyon ebe, “Kijukarai toma opegei, kalomakisi kes.”
Kocamak kes. Kolomut imoyon lueroko kolomasi toma opegei: komotar esipan kere neijululuei kiton aŋolol, emwaasi bala ilukumin iarei; kotwakikis aŋolol.
Kokerata ikecokok, kisiarakis akiro ore, kokialon da. Kolomut ituŋa aanyun nuadoikis.
Koloto mama ejai Yesu, koanyut lolem ajaas ajokin iboie, enapit igoen, kejokiar adam, ŋopeŋol lokejai lem ajore ŋin; kokuriakaros.
Ŋul da luapotu koanyut kolimokis kes nuadoikis lolem ajaas ajokin, ka nuka ipegei da.
Kogeut aiŋaiŋa Yesu anyoun koikorunokec.
Nakedokaria ataker, kiŋaiŋa lolem ajaas ajokin aupar kaŋes.
Konye koŋer Yesu, kotema ŋes atiar, “Kolot orekon mama ejaas lukobukus, kolimonok akiro nukapolok nuetia nen nukiswamak Ejakait, ido kwape kitimio jo.”
Kolot, kogeu alimonokin kotoma Dekapoli akiro nukapolok nuetia nen nukiswamakinit Yesu ŋes; koumokis ituŋa kere.
Nakedaunia Yesu aikwaŋar bobo aboŋor kataker okekwa, kotukokin ekodet loapol mamakeŋ; kojai ŋesi kariri kaŋolol.
Kobu ekayaiton ediopet loka atukos, ekekiror Yairo; nakeanyunia Yesu, kibirokin akejeneke,
kiŋaiŋa noi, kotema atiar, “Ikapese eapikinit airidakin, keŋaiŋait kobu kidokok ŋes akonikanin, tetere itaŋaleuni ŋes, kojar da.”
Kolot nepepe kaŋes.
Kotupa ekodet loapol, koridakis ŋes.
Kojai aberu nakedeka alele nakaokot ikar itomon kaluarei;
nakiticanitoi noi kakanin nuka imurwok luipu, nakitatacio kere lukejaatar, komam eŋaleuni, konye do kinyikokinite adek.
Nakiiraria akiro nuka Yesu, kitor okodet kikuny kokauke, kotiro akenapito.
Naarai abu kotema atiar, “Arai katiro anapitoke bon ketaŋaleunio.”
Atipet koonik alele naka akeokot; kojen kakuanake ebe aŋaleu ican ŋul.
Atipet kojen Yesu ebe aloma apedor kamake, kibelokin kotoma okodet, kotema atiar, “Iŋai bo atiro anapitoka?”
Kotemasi ikekesisiak atiar, “Iany ekodet kiiridak, ibala ebe, ‘Iŋai bo katiro?’ ”
Kirere Yesu aanyun iŋai kiswamat ŋin,
Konye kokurianar aberu komaran, kojen nukiswamakinio kobu kibirokin akonyeneke, kolimok abeit kere.
Kotema ŋes atiar, “Akokuka, kitaŋaleu jo akonikiyuun; kolot inapakina, koŋaleu icanikon.”
Napinera ŋun, kopotu lukepote kore loka ekayaiton loka atukos, kobalas ebe, “Atwana akokukon, Kanukinyo itaaria bobo Ekesisianakinan?”
Konye nakiiraria Yesu akirot ŋin nainerai, kolimok ekayaiton loka atukos ebe, “Sirikikurianar, kiyuu aiyuun.”
Mam abu kisunup icetuŋanan atupar ŋes dimarai Petero ka Yakob ka Yokana onaceke.
Kodoloto togo loka ekayaiton loka atukos, koany ecelet, ka ituŋa emonyete kibwololoete noi.
Nakelomaria, kotema kes atiar, “Kanukinyo icelatar komonyete? Mam ikoku etwanit, konye ejotoi.”
Kokienatar ŋes. Konye nakedaunia aireŋear kes kere kiŋa, koyaŋa papa loka ikoku ka totoke, ka ŋul da lukejaas kaŋes, koloma nekejai ikoku.
Kitiŋ akan naka ikoku kotema atiar, “Talita kumai”; apolouke ebe, “Ipese katemari jo atiar, konyou.”
Atipet konyou ipese kosakasak; naarai kerai yenika ikar itomon kaluarei. Atipet koumokis kaumokin naepol.
Kicor jokan kinye ituŋanan ajenun akiro ŋun, kicorak kes ainakin ŋes inyamat.

Apaaran nakasabato kogeu aisisianakin kotoma atukos. Nakiirariata luipu koumokis, kotemasi atiar, “Kedumuni lo ŋun kai? Anyoin acoa naeinakinitai ŋes? Anyoika nukapedor nuetia nen nuiswamai kakaninike?
Mere lo ekekeon, okoku loka Mariam, onace loka Yakob ka Yose ka Yuda ka Simon, akeinacan da emameete kane kamawok?” Kiguikis kanukeŋ.
Kotema Yesu kes atiar, “Enabi mam emwaŋio dimarai akwapuke, kaneejaas ipajenake, ka lukotogoke.”
Mam abu kopedo aswam nakapedor adio da kaŋina, dimarai aidokokin lukadekak idis akekanin kitaŋaleu kes.
Koumok kanuka amamus aiyuunikec.
Kimaniman ireria kere isisianakini.
kicorak kes kinyeis ayaŋaar idiobore yenikerot, dimarai ebela bon; mam karaida inyamat, karaida ecoe, karaida apesan kamunyinikec;
konye konapito amuk; ido sirinapenenete ikason iarei.
Kotema kes atiar, “Ŋolitogo loilomanarete, kosalenenete nen aitodol nainyounioto kore kaŋol.
Kaŋiniibois kere namam kisukunyikinere yes, karaida akiirar, nainyounioto kanen, kilakilakenenete adae nuejaas akejenekus araut akajenak kamakec.”
Koloto kesi kolimonokis ituŋa aitoronikin.
Kireŋeanasi ajokin nuipu, kinyonyoanakis lukadekak luipu akinyet, kitaŋaleut.
Konye kobalas ice ebe, “Erai Eliya.” Ice da ebe, “Erai enabi, kwape ediopet kotoma onabin.”
Konye nakiiraria Kerode, kotema atiar, “Yokana, lokajepari eoŋ akekou, ajaru ŋol.”
Naarai abu Kerode elopet kijuka kikam Yokana, koenik aidaris kanuka Kerodia, aberu naka Pilipo onaceke; naarai amanyit ŋes,
kosodi Yokana alimokin Kerode ebe, “Mam ibus jo ajaut kaberu naka onacekon.”
Kwaŋin kolil Kerodia, kokoto aiar ŋes; mam epedoro;
naarai keyoŋit Kerode Yokana, kojen ebe erai etuŋanan loedolit, lokalaunan, koricite ŋes. Nakiiraria kobuonokin noi; kiiranari ŋes kaiyalama.
Kosodi kodolok apak naajok nakipoikinio Kerode ijakake, ka ikapolokitok lukapolok, ka ituŋa lukapolok luko Galilaya epucit kanuka apaaran naka aurioke,
Kanen kolom akoku naka Kerodia kikosi, kisiyalamik Kerode ka lukejaas kaŋes opucit. Kolimok ekabaka apese ebe, “Kilipai eoŋ ibore kere yenikoto, kainakini jo.”
Kiyapoik ŋes ebe, “Ŋinibore kere yenilipi, kainakini jo, kiton atutubet naka ajakanutuka.”
Koloma ŋin kiŋit totoke ebe, “Elipi inyo?” Kotema atiar, “Akou naka Yokana Lokebatisan.”
Atipet kisunya alomun mama ejai ekabaka, kilip ebe, “Akoto koinak kwape kwana akou naka Yokana Lokebatisan katuba.”
Kokadak ekabaka noi; konye kanuka akeiyapo, kanuka ŋul da lukejaas opucit, mam abu kokoto aimik ŋes.
Atipet kiyakia ekabaka eserikalet, kicorak ayaun akouke. Kolot kojepu akouke kaidaris.
Koyau akouke katuba, koinak apese; apese da koinak totoke.
Nakiirariata ikekesisiak akiro, koloto koyaŋaasi akekuan, kidaikis ates.
Kotema kes atiar, “Kogitunos yesi bonik aibois naesil, kibworasi nediokasilon.” Naarai kejaas ituŋa luipu eponenenete koboŋonorete, komam adiopak da naka ainyam.
Koloto toma ataker kogitaros aibois naesil.
Koanyutu ituŋa kes elosete, kojenata luipu, kokerata ŋina kakejen anyoun koreria kere, koliŋakis adolore.
Nakedokunia kataker koany ekodet loapol, kitim kes, naarai kesubito bala amerekekin nuemamei ekecokon: kogeu aisisianakin kes akiro nuipu.
Ketubor akwap, kopotu ikekesisiak mamakeŋ, kotemasi atiar, “Aibois na erai amodiŋ, atubor da akwap,
Kotwar kes, tetere elosete amanat koreria da luirimorito, kogwelata lunyaman.”
Konye Koboŋok kotema kes atiar, “Koinakis yesi kes lunyaman.” Kotemasi atiar, “Kilosi ca kagwelata imugatin luka adenarin
Kotema kes atiar, “Ejaas yes imugatin imwaasi ai? Koloto koanyut.” Nakedauniata ajenun kotemasi atiar, “Ikany ka agaria aarei.”
Kicorak aisiboikin ituŋa kere katukon toma anya numel.
Kiboikinos katukon, ice akwatat ka ice akaisakany.
Kolem imugatin lukany ka agaria aarei, kosesen akuj, kisirereŋ, kobilibil imugatin; koinak ikekesisiak akorokor. Kokoranak agaria aarei mamakec kere.
Konyamata kere kimonikinos.
Kotukonokinai atutubeta nuabilibila nuelelebete idita itomon kaluarei, ka atutubeta nuka agaria da.
Lukenyamete emwaasi ikiliok ilukumin ikany.
Kedau aitwar kes, kolot oroŋat ailip.
Kimukok, kojai ataker kidiŋ aŋolol, kojai ŋesi da bon oitela.
Koany kes itaaritos aikwaŋ, naarai kemeunit ekwam koiŋaren, kedol akwenyunet nakiwoŋonet naka akuar, kobu mama ejaas kicakacakai aŋolol; kokoto adepar kes,
Konye nakeanyuniata ŋes icakacakai aŋolol, keomitos ebe erai etoil, kilalaata:
naarai apotu kere koanyut, kokuriakaros. Atipet kinera kakes, kotema atiar, “Kotitiŋioros! Eoŋ lo. Sirikikuriakaros.”
Kodoka ataker nekejaas kesi; kiyamakin ekwam. Koumokis noi kotauonokec;
naarai mam apotu kojenutu nuka imugatin, konye keninik ikecetauon.
Nakedauniata aikwaŋar, kodolo akwap naka Genesaret, koenata ataker oitolima.
Nakedokuniata, atipet kojenut ituŋa ŋes.
Kokerata kirimosi akwap ŋin kere, kogeut ayaŋanar lukadekak kakapekec, alosit ŋiniibois nakepupunete ebe ejai ŋesi.
Ido kama kelomanari kere, oreria, ka oreria da lukapolok, arai amanat, kiperionokis lukadekak agwelanareta, kiŋaiŋaata atiror atwele naka anapitoke. Luketironorete kere kitaŋaleunoi.
koanyutu ice kokesisiakake enyamete inyamat kakanin numam elaete, ŋes atemar ebe numam ilotaritai.
(Naarai mam Iparisayon ka Iyudayan kere enyamete dimikito ilosito noi akecekanin, kiketakina kopone loka imakio.
Bobo da keboŋut kagwelanaret, arai mam itesegaaros, mam enyamete: ejaas da akiro ace nuipu, nukeinakinitai kes aiketakinit, kwape aitesegar akolin, ka amoti, ka iboro da luka aisinin.)
Kiŋita Iparisayon ka ikewadikak ŋes ebe, “Kanukinyo emam ikonikesisiak elosioto kwape ejaar epone loka imakio, konye enyamete inyamat kakanin numam elaete?”
Kotema kes atiar, “Abu Isaia kodwar kojokan akirokus yes lukesoswai, kwape kiwadikatere ebe,
‘Ketopoloorito ituŋa lu kaitukekec,
Konye elwaka ikecetauon kamakaŋ.
Konye kamaete eoŋ atitai,
Isisianakinete aicorakineta nuka ituŋa bala aisisianakinikec.’
Inyeinete yesi aicorakinet naka Edeke, iketakina koinono loka ituŋa.”
Kotema kes atiar, “Iŋerete jokan aicorakinet naka Edeke, tetere iricito einonokus.
Naarai abala Musa ebe, ‘Koyoŋitenene papakon ka totokon’; ido ebe, ‘Yenemoromoroi papa arai toto, koarai’.
Konye yes ibalas ebe, ‘Arai ketema ituŋanan papake arai totoke atiar, Nutikainak jo aiŋarakinia erai Koroban’, ŋes atemar ebe Einakinitai Edeke;
mam bobo icamakinete ŋes aswam imodiobore kere kanuka papake arai totoke.
Itapalaunete akirot naka Edeke kanuka einonokus loikopete: ido iswamaete akiro nuipu nuikote nen.”
Konyarau bobo ekodet kere kotema atiar, “Kiirasi yesi kere, kojenutu da.
Emamei ibore yenejai kiŋa ketuŋanan, keloma tomakeŋ yenepedori amunaar ŋes, Konye nuelomunete kotoma otuŋanan kes ŋun nuemunaarete ŋes. [
Yenejaas aki nuka akiirar, kiira.]”
Nakelomaria togo kinyek ekodet, kiŋita ikekesisiak akiro nuka awaragan ŋin.
Kotema kes atiar, “Kiton yes da emamei ajenun? Mam ijenete ebe, ŋinibore yenejai kiŋa ketuŋanan, keloma tomakeŋ, mam epedori amunaar ŋes?
Naarai mam elomari otau dimarai akoik bon, kanen ikiŋaario.” Kanuka ener kwaŋin, abu kitalau inyamat kere.
Kotema atiar, “Nuelomunete kotuŋanan, kes emunaunete ituŋanan.
Naarai toma otauon luka ituŋa elomunete aomisio nukaronok; adoteu, akokolanut, earit, aelonut,
airaŋaanut, ameŋeranut, aiŋal, abenyanut, akoŋu naerono, asabanakin, aiwoŋonut, abaŋaanut:
elomunete akiro nu kere nueroko kotoma, kes da emunaarete ituŋanan.”
Konye atipet kobu aberu, nakejai ikepese emoyo loerono, naabu kiira akiroke, kibirokin akejeke.
Kerai aberu ŋin da Ayonanit, aketeker Suropoenike, kiŋaiŋa ŋes aireŋear ajokit kama kikepese,
Kotema Yesu atiar, “Kinyek ber idwe kimonikinos: naarai mam ejok alemun inyamat luka idwe acakakin iŋokwo.”
Konye Koboŋok kotema atiar, “Eebo, Ejakait: konye iŋokwo da luejaas kwap kemesa enyamete ararasia nuka idwe.”
Kotema ŋes atiar, “Kanuka akirot kaŋin kolot; anyou ajokit kapesekon.”
Kolot aberu orekec, kodum ikoku iperikinitoi oitada kedau ajokit anyoun.
Koinunai ekimiŋ loiŋejiŋeja; kiŋaiŋaata ŋes aidokokin akekan.
Kogita ŋes bon awai kama ejai ekodet, kibwaik ikebokor akike, kimuik aimul kotiro akeŋajep;
kosesen akuj, kiyeŋak, kotema ŋes atiar, “Epata,” apolouke ebe, “Kopukor.”
Kopukoros akike, kolacar aŋajepeke, kiner kotenan.
Kikwenya kes sirikelimokis idiotuŋanan; konye kwape kiyatanakinia aikwenyar, kwape kwaŋin eyatanakiniata aitisiarikin akiro.
Koumokis noi adepar, kobalas ebe, “Eswama akiro kere ejok, Isipedori ikimiŋiok akiirar, ka lumam ineras da einer.”
“Etim ekodet, naarai adaut apaarasia auni iboiete keoŋ, kwabo emameete kes inyamat,
Arai katwara kes alosit oreriakec eriebi eteŋei, iiloros korot; ice kakesi eponito kama elwana.”
Koboŋokis ikekesisiak ebe, “Okwe, epedori biai ituŋanan aisimonikin ituŋa lu kimugatin kane kamodiŋ?”
Kiŋit kes ebe, “Ejaas yes imugatin imwaasi ai?” Kobalas ebe, “Ikanykaarei.”
Kicorak ekodet aiboikin kwap; kolem imugatin lukanykaarei, kimala, kobilibil, koinak ikekesisiak akoranakin, kokoranakis kesi da ekodet.
Kejaas da agaria nuikidioko. Kisirereŋ kes, kolimok kokoranakis ŋun da.
Konyama, kimonikinos; kotukonokis atutubeta nuabilibila nukesalete, ibukito ikanykaarei.
Keraas ituŋa bala ilukumin iwoŋon. Kotwar kes.
Atipet kodoka ataker nepepe kikekesisiak, kolot atutubeta nuka Dalamanuta.
Koom etau, kokadak komoyokeŋ, kotema atiar, “Kanukinyo emootor atur na aanyunet? Abeit katemari yes atiar, Mam cut atur na einakinio aanyunet.”
Kinye kes kodoka bobo ataker, kolot okekwa juwai.
Kimurwokis kes ayaŋaar imugatin; dimarai kejai emugati ediopet bon kakes toma ataker.
Kicor kes kobala ebe, “Kokwenya, kocoito aitubuunet naka Iparisayon, ka aitubuunet da naka Kerode.”
Kiŋitanakinos bonik naarai amameete imugatin.
Konye kojen Yesu kotema kes atiar, “Kanukinyo iŋitanakinotor, naarai emameete yes imugatin? Eriŋa ber emisiikina, karaida ajenun? Eninik ca ma ikusitauon?
Ijaas kakonyen, mam ca ianyunete; ijaas kaki da, mam ca ipupunete? Mam kereka iitunito?
Naabilibilia imugatin ikany kanuka ituŋa ilukumin ikany, ipotu kotukonokis iditai imwaasi ai lueleleba atutubeta nuabilibila?” Kolimokis ŋes ebe, “Itomon kaluarei.”
Ebe da, “Ka lukanykaarei kanuka ilukumin iwoŋon, ipotu kotukonokis ibukito imwaasi ai lueleleba atutubeta nuabilibila?” Kolimokis ŋes ebe, “Ikanykaarei.”
Kotema kes atiar, “Eriŋa ca yes ejenuna?”
Kitiŋ akan naka emuduki, kitoloma kiŋa naka ere; kosodi kedau aimuikin akonyeke, ka aidokokin akekanin, kiŋit ŋes ebe, “Ianyuni ibore?”
Kosesen kuju kotema atiar, “Aanyuni ituŋa; konye esubito bala ikito elosete.”
Kanen kidokok bobo akekanin akonyeke; kosesen kotenan, koŋaleu, koany iboro kere ejok.
Kotwar ŋes alosit oreke, kobala ebe, “Sirikiloma ber ore lo.”
Konyou Yesu nepepe kikekesisiak, koloto oreria luka Kaisarea Pilipi, Korot kiŋit ikekesisiak kotema atiar, “Ebalas ituŋa ebe arai eoŋ iŋai?”
Kolimokis ŋes ebe, “Yokana Lokebatisan; ice ebe ‘Eliya’; ka ice da ebe, ‘Ediopet konabin.’ ”
Kiŋit kes ebe, “Ido bo yes kibalas ebe arai eoŋ iŋai?” Koboŋok Petero kotema atiar, “Irai ijo Kristo.”
Kicor kes kinyeis alimokin idiotuŋanan akiroke.
Kogeu aisisianakin kes ebe, ibusakinit Okoku loka etuŋanan aiticanio nuipu, egirete da imakio ka isasedotin lupeti ka ikewadikak, ka aiar, kapaaran da nakiwuniet ejaruni,
Kinera ŋun aitebeunun. Koyaŋa Petero ŋes, kogeu aitoron,
Konye kibelokin kosesen ikekesisiak, kitoron Petero, kotema atiar, “Koboŋo kaukaŋ, Satan; naarai mam iwomit aomisio nuka Edeke konye nuka ituŋa.”
Naarai ŋin yenekoto aitajar akeijar etwaniari; konye ŋin yenetwaniari akeijar kanukaŋ, kanuka akiro nukajokak da, itajari ŋes.
Naarai ajokis anyoin arai kedumu ituŋanan akwapin kere, kitwatania akeijar?
Naarai etacakini ituŋanan inyo alakunia akeijar?

Naarai yenirumete ileic kanukaŋ kanuka akakiro da kotoma atur na naadote nakadiakanaran, irumete ileic Okoku loka etuŋanan da kanukeŋ, naebunio rwaru kaibuses naka Papake nepepe kimalaikan lukalaunak.”
Kotema kes atiar, “Abeit katemari yes atiar, ejaas ituŋa kaŋul kaluebwoete kane lumam iirete cut atwanare, aitodol neaanyuniata ajakanut naka Edeke abu kapedor.”
kimilias ikenapen, kokwanut kiac, kopone lomam epedori ekelotan loka akwap aitwakaŋuunia.
Kitakanikinos Eliya ka Musa, inerasi ka Yesu.
Koboŋok Petero kotema Yesu atiar, “Ekesisianakinan, ejok oni ajaut ne; ikoto keswamata iswamin iuni, ediopet lokon, ediopet loka Musa, ka ediopet da loka Eliya.”
Naarai mam kejeni nukinera, naarai apotu kokuriakata noi.
Kobu edou kiteribo kes, kolom epororo kotoma odou ebe, “Lo ŋes Okokuka lominat; kiirasi ŋes.”
Atipet koŋoleŋoleoto, mam bobo eanyuna idiotuŋanan nepepe kakes dimarai Yesu bon.
Koricito akirot, kiŋitanaros bonik ebe ajarun kotoma okatwak ikoni bo ai?
Kiŋita ŋes, kotemasi atiar, “Kanukinyo ineratar ikewadikak ebe ibusakinit ber Eliya aige abunore?”
Kotema kes atiar, “Abeit ebunit ber Eliya aiteteun akiro kere; ido iwadikatai bo biai nuka Okoku loka etuŋanan, ebe iticanio nuipu ka amwaŋio da?
Konye katemari yes atiar, Adau Eliya abunore, kiswamakis ŋes kere nuakotos, kwape Iwadikatere nukeŋ.”
Atipet nakeanyuniata ŋes lukokodet kere, koumokis noi, kokerata mama ejai kiyogata ŋes.
Kiŋit kes ebe, “Nunyoika nuipegas kakes?”
Koboŋok ediopet kotoma okodet ebe, “Ekesisianakinan, ayaŋaunit ikakoku mamakon, ejai ajokit naabaŋ;
ido naikamunia kere, ibirokini kwap: ekui ekuetete, iriamanakin ikel, idekererar; elip ikonikesisiak aireŋear ŋes; mam epedoro.”
Koboŋok kes kotema atiar, “Wu okwe yes atur namam iyuunit, etodoli eoŋ ai ajaut kayes? Etodoli ai da atitiŋikinit yes? Koinunai.”
Koyaut ŋes mamakeŋ; atipet nakeanyunia kisiilio ajokit; kibirokin kwap, kibelibel koku ekuetete.
Kiŋit Yesu papake ebe, “Apak anyoin adau ŋesi ikoni nen?” Kotema atiar, “Ameuni keiditeu.
Ecakanakini irwanipu toma akim, toma akipi da, tetere emudiari: konye arai ipedori akirot kere, kitimoi sio, kiŋarak.”
Kotema Yesu ŋes atiar, “Arai ipedori! Epedorio kere kama ejai yeniyuunit.”
Atipet kiworo papa loka ikoku kotema atiar, “Eyuunit; kiŋarak amamus aiyuunika.”
Nakeanyunia Yesu ebe akeru ekodet mama ejai, kiretak ajokit naerono, kotema atiar, “Ijo ajokit naabaŋ naakimiŋ, kecorakinit jo ebe kolom kaneejai ŋesi, ido sirikiboŋok bobo.”
Komony, kitamaran jokan, kolom do: kosubite ikoku bala atwana; kotemasi luipu ebe, “Atwana.”
Konye Yesu kitiŋ akekan, kitonyou ŋes; kobwo do.
Nakelomaria togo, kiŋita ŋes ikekesisiak kaiyeiyea ebe, “Kanukinyo mam sio kipedoria aireŋear ŋes?”
Kotema kes atiar, “Mam epedori epone lo aireŋeario kanuka akirot kere dimarai kanuka ailip bon.”
Naarai kisisianak ikekesisiak, kotema kes atiar, “Elosi Okoku loka etuŋanan ainakinio akanin nuka ituŋa, kes da earete ŋes; kedau aario, akaulo kapaarasia auni ejaruni.”
Konye mam kes apotu kojenut akirot ŋin, koyoŋata aiŋit ŋes.
Konye kililiŋata: naarai kepegas bonik ka bonik korot ebe iŋai bo lokapolon.
Kiboikin, konyarau lutomon kaluarei kotema kes atiar, “Arai ekoto ituŋanan araun yenisodit, koraun yenikawasia adepar kere, ido ikejaanakinan yenika luce kere.”
Kolem ikoku, kisibwo kokidiŋikec: kotun ŋes, kotema atiar,
“Ŋin yenisukunyikini idiopet kodwe kwaka yen kokirorika, kesukunyikinit eoŋ; ŋin da yenikesukunyikini eoŋ, mam kesukunyikinit eoŋ, dimarai je lokejukuni.”
Konye kotema Yesu atiar, “Sirikisimika: naarai emamei ituŋanan yeniswamai nakapedor kokirorika, yenepedori atipet amoromor eoŋ.
Naarai yenimam kitusurupit oni, erai yenikowaiwok.
Naarai ŋin yenikitamasi yes akoli naka akipi, naarai kimaikinitai luka Kristo, abeit katemari yes atiar, Mam cut etwaniari ainak ineteke.
“Ido yenidupori idiopet ka ludidik kalu kalukeyuunito, tiejok aenikin akukuse naepol omurisiŋike, ka acakakin aŋolol.
Arai kidupori jo akonikan, kojepa; ejok jo alomar aijar koŋwalite itia ajaut kak anin aarei alosit ogeena, neejai akim namam eduŋei. [
Nemam etwania ekurutukec, karaida akim mam eduŋei.]
Arai kidupori jo akonikeju, kojepa; ejok jo alomar aijar icedo, itia ajaut kakeje aarei acakakinio ogeena. [
Nemam etwania ekurutukec, karaida akim mam eduŋei.]
Arai kidupori jo akonikoŋu, kogoro: ejok jo alomar ajakanut naka Edeke idoponyony, itia ajaut kakonyen aarei acakakinio ogeena;
nemam etwania ekurutukec, karaida akim mam eduŋei.
Naarai ibwaikinio ŋinituŋanan akim kwape ibwaikinere abalaŋ.
Ejok abalaŋ; konye arai kepianiar, itemokinio kinyo? Kojaas kabalaŋ tomakus, kojaas kainapakin bonik ka bonik.”
Kopotu Iparisayon mamakeŋ, kiŋita ŋes ebe, “Ibus kereka etuŋanan aitwar akeberu?” Kokodut ŋes.
Koboŋok kotema kes atiar, “Anyoika kicorakinit Musa?”
Kotemasi atiar, “Abu Musa kocam aiwadik ebalua loka alacakin, ka aitwar.”
Konye kotema Yesu kes atiar, “Kanuka aninik naka ikusitauon abu ŋesi kiwadik aicorakinet ŋin kanukus.
Konye ameun kageunet naka asubunio, ‘Abu kosub yenikiliokit ka yeniberu.’
Kanuka akirot kaŋin ŋes inyeinia etuŋanan papake ka totoke, kirotakinos kakeberu;
eraunete ŋul luarei adiopetekuan: mam bobo eraas iarei dimarai adiopetekuan.
Kwaŋin luadau Edeke airotakin, kinyek ituŋanan aitiak.”
Kiŋita bobo ikekesisiak akirot ŋin naajaar togo.
Kotema kes atiar, “Ŋolituŋanan loetwari akeberu komany ace, adotear, adiaka kama ejai aberuke.
Ŋin da arai inyeini okilenike, kodukok ece, adotear.”
Konye nakeanyunia Yesu kokadak noi, kotema kes atiar, “Kocamutu idwe ludidik abunore mama ajai, sirikisimika kes; naarai lueputos kalu ajakanut naka Edeke erai nakec.
Abeit katemari yes atiar, Ŋin yenimam iyuuni ajakanut naka Edeke kwape ikoku yenididi, mam cut elomari toma.”
Kotun kes, kidokok akekanin, kisirereŋ da.
Kotema Yesu ŋes atiar, “Kanukinyo kinyaraaa eoŋ lokajokan? Emamei yenikajokan dimarai ediopet, ŋes Edeke.
Ijeni aicorakineta ebe, Siriari, Siridote, Sirikokoi, Sirisabanakinenei, Sirirodi, Koyoŋitenenei papakon ka totokon.”
Kotema ŋes atiar, “Ekesisianakinan, aricit ŋun kere ameun keiditeuka.”
Kosesen Yesu ŋes komina, kotema atiar, “Kiwolik adiopekirot: kolot, kogwela luijaatar kere, kokoranak lukican, ijaunete moolo kabar kotoma akuj: kosodi kobu kotup eoŋ.”
Konyorididior ereeteke kanuka akirot kaŋin, kolot itururwei: naarai kejaas iboro luipu.
Koŋoleŋole Yesu, kotema ikekesisiak atiar, “Etiono ca ma lukabarak alomar ajakanut naka Edeke!”
Koumokis ikekesisiak kanuka akiroke, Konye Koboŋok Yesu bobo, kotema kes atiar, “Idwe, etiono ca ma lukabarak alomar ajakanut naka Edeke!
Epatana ekaal aitor apedot naka ekus, itia ekabaran alomar ajakanut naka Edeke.”
Koumokis noi jokan, kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Aso iŋai bo do epedori aitajario?”
Kosesen kes Yesu kotema atiar, “Mam epedorio kotuŋa, konye mam ikote nen kama ejai Edeke: naarai epedoros kere kama ejai Edeke.”
Kogeu Petero alimokin ŋes ebe, “Koany, kipou isio kenyeis kere, katuputu jo.”
Kotema Yesu atiar, “Abeit katemari yes atiar, Emamei ituŋanan yeninyeinit etogo, arai iinacan, arai ainacan, arai toto, arai papa, arai idwe, arai amanat, kanukaŋ, kanuka Akiro Nukajokak da,
konye edumuni irwan akwatat kwape kwana apak na, itogoi, ka iinacan, ka ainacan, ka nukatoto, ka idwe, ka amanat, nepepe kareio; kosodi moolo toma okar luepote aijar naka ikar kere.
Konye luipu lueraas lusodit eraunete lukawasia; ka lukawasia da eraunete lusodit.”
Kobala ebe, “Koany, kidokari alosit Yerusalem; einakinio Okoku loka etuŋanan akanin nuka isasedotin lupeti ka ikewadikak; etubokinete ŋes atwanare, ijaikinete ŋes mama ejaas Imo,
Eboliatar, ka aimuanakin aimul, ka aida, ka aiar da; akaulo kapaarasia auni ejaruni.”
Kotema kes atiar, “Ikotosi keswamakis inyo?”
Kotemasi ŋesi atiar, “Kocamakinai sio keboikinos ediopet akanikon nakoteten, ediopet da akanikon nakokediany, kotoma aibusesukon.”
Konye kotema Yesu kes atiar,
“Mam ijenete nukilipito. Ipedorete tope aimat akoli naamasi eoŋ? Arai aibatisao kaibatis nakebatisatai eoŋ?”
Kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Kipedori.” Kotema Yesu kes atiar, “Imasete bo akoli naamasi eoŋ: ido ibatisao kaibatis nakebatisatai eoŋ:
konye akiro nuka aiboikin akanika nakoteten arai nakokediany mere nakaŋ aikor: konye einakinio ŋul luitemokinitoi sek.”
Kosodete nakepupunioto lutomon kogeut anyunyurikin Yakob ka Yokana.
Konyarau Yesu kes kotema atiar, “Ijenete ebe ŋul lueomitai araut ikayaitok luka Imo, eyaete kes kagogoŋ: ejai ikapolokokec apedor kamakec.
Konye mam ikote nen kamakus: konye ituŋanan yenekoto araut yenikapolon kamakus, korau ikusikejaanakinan;
ŋin da yenekoto araut yenisodit kamakus, korau ibulesit yenika ituŋa kere,
Naarai Okoku loka etuŋanan da mam abu kobu aijaanakinio, dimarai aijaanakin, ka ainakin da akeijar alakunia luipu.”
Nakiiraria ebe erai ŋol Yesu loko Nasaret, kogeu aiworo, kobala ebe, “Yesu, ijo okoku loka Daudi, kitimoi eoŋ.”
Kiretakis luipu tetere ililiŋi: konye ŋes kiyatak noi aiworo ebe, “Wu ijo okoku loka Daudi, kitimoi eoŋ.”
Kobwou Yesu, kotema atiar, “Konyarautu ŋes,” Konyaraut emuduk, kotemasi atiar, “Kotitiŋior: konyou, kinyarit ŋesi jo.”
Kocaka akenapito, kodetun, kobu mama ejai Yesu.
Koboŋok Yesu kotema ŋes atiar, “Ikoto keswamak jo inyo?” Kotema emuduk atiar, “Raboni, (Ekesisianakinan,) akoto kakweny.”
Kotema Yesu ŋes atiar, “Kolot: kitaŋaleu jo akoniiyuun.” Atipet kokweny, kotupa ŋes korot.
Kotema kes atiar, “Koloto kiton ore loisesenete: atipet kilomasi idumunete ikoku yenika asigiria eenitai, yenimam lem ibwanenit idiotuŋanan; kolacut, koinut.
Arai kitemari yes ituŋanan ebe, ‘Kanukinyo iswamaata kwaŋin?’ ilimokinete ŋes ebe, ‘Ejakait ipuda ŋes, ido inyakuni bobo ne atipet.’ ”
Koloto, kodumut isigiria eenikinitai okek kiŋa orot; kolacut.
Kotemasi ice kalukebwoete kanen atiar, “Kanukinyo ilacariata yesi isigiria?”
Koboŋokis kes kwape alimokinitor Yesu: kocamakis kes alosit.
Koinut Yesu isigiria, kocakanakis ikecenapen; kibwanen ŋesi.
Kopetanakis luipu ikecenapen orot; ice da akui nukejepununete kamanat.
Kiworoto ituŋa lukiŋarenikinito ka luketupakinito ebe, “Kosana! Isirereŋitoi loebunit kokiror loka Ejakait!
Isirereŋitoi ajakanut naebunit, naka papaakosi Daudi! Kosana kuju noi kakuj.”
Apaaran naatupakini, nakeponiata ko Betaniya, korieb eteŋei.
Kiteluo etini kama elwana eribiribi, kolot aanyun arai diat epedori adumun amodioraito kotomakeŋ; nakedolokinio mam edumuna amodioraito dimarai akui bon; naarai mam kerai apak naka itinin.
Koboŋok kotema ŋes atiar, “Sirikenyam ituŋanan araitokon amear lolo kiton ikar kere.” Kopupete ikekesisiak.
kwabo mam ecamakina ituŋanan aibwokit ibore kotoma oyekalu.
Kisisianak kes, kotema atiar, “Mam kereka iwadikatai ebe, ‘Enyarao ekatogo etogo lokilipet kanuka atekerin kere’? Konye yes ituluosi abua naka ikaŋatak.”
Kiirasi isasedotin lupeti ka ikewadikak ŋun, komoata epone loemudiariata; naarai kekuriaka ŋes, naarai keumokinit ekodet kere kanuka akeisisianakin.
Nakitiboŋenenaa akwap kolomanarenenei kore.
Kiitu Petero akiroke, kotema atiar, “Rabi, koany, kerinyo etini lokilamakini ijo.”
Koboŋok Yesu kotema kes atiar, “Kiyuutu Edeke.
Abeit katemari yes atiar, Ŋinituŋanan yenelimokini eroŋat lo ebe, ‘Koukor, kocakakin aŋolol’; komam ebuonokini kotauke, konye kiyuunite ebe nuinera edolete; iswamakinio.
Kanuka ŋun katemari yes atiar, Akiro kere nuilipete ka nuiŋaiŋaete kiyuunito ebe kiinakinitai, ido kiswamakinio.
Naibwoenenaata ilipete, kisioniete, arai ijaas kakirot kayenice; tetere Papakus loejai toma akuj isioniei akusiibucanar. [
Konye arai mam yes isioniete, Papakus da loejai toma akuj mam isioniei akusiibucanar.]”
kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Iswamai ijo nu kapolou anyoin? Iŋai da kiinakini jo apolou nakiswamaa nu?”
Kotema Yesu kes atiar, “Mere eoŋ da keŋit yes akirot adiopet, yes da koboŋokis eoŋ, ŋes konyet kalimokiniata apolou nakeswamaa nu.
Aibatisa naka Yokana kebuni kotoma akuj, arai bo kotuŋa? Koboŋokinoi.”
Kiŋitanakinos bonik ka bonik, kobalas ebe, “Arai kiitema ebe, ‘Kebuni kotoma akuj’; etemari ŋesi ebe, ‘Aso kanukinyo mam kiyuuniata ŋes?’
Konye arai kiitema ebe, ‘Kebuni kotuŋa’ kokuriaka ituŋa: naarai aomito ituŋa kere ebe kerai Yokana enabi abeit.
Koboŋokis Yesu ebe, ‘Mam kijeni.’ ” Kotema Yesu kes atiar, “Eoŋ da mam kalimokini yes apolou nakeswamaa nu.”
Kedol apak kiyakia ebulesit mama ejaas ikakoriok, tetere edumuni araito nuka amana naka emusabibu kama ejaas ikakoriok.
Kikamut ŋol, kibuŋata, kotwarata atitai.
Kijuka bobo ecebulesit mamakec; kobelebelata, kisuruma ileic,
Kijuka ece; koarata ŋes: ka ice da luipu; kibuŋata ice, ice da koarata.
Aso kesalit bobo ediopet, okoku lominat: kiyakia ŋol da kawasia, kobala ebe, ‘Eyoŋete okokuka.’
Konye kineranakinos ikakoriok ŋul ebe, ‘Lo ŋes lokeruman; aso kaarata ŋes, koraun airum nawok.’
Kikamut ŋes, koarata, kocakasi kiŋa kamana naka emusabibu.
Aso ikonakini ai ejakait loka amana naka emusabibu? Ebuni emudiari ikakoriok ŋul, einakini ice amana naka emusabibu.
Mam kereka isiomito nuiwadikatai nu ebe,
‘Amoru nakeŋerete ikadukok,
Ŋin ŋes keponi kitaraunai amor nakapolon naka agor:
Abuni akirot ŋin kama ejai Ejakait,
Erai nakaumokin kakonyenewok’?”
Komoata aikamun ŋes; konye kokuriaka ekodet; naarai apotu komisiikis ebe enerakinit kes awaragan ŋin: kinyeis ŋes koloto.

Nakedolokis, kotemasi atiar, “Ekesisianakinan, kijeni ebe irai ijo lokabeit, kwabo mam ipodo idiotuŋanan kere: naarai mam iseseni ejautene loka ituŋa, konye isisianakini erot loka Edeke kotoma abeit. Ibus kereka ainakin Kaisar esolo arai bo mam?
Kiinakini, arai bo mam kiinakini?” Konye kojen ŋesi ekecesoswai, kotema kes atiar, “Kanukinyo kikoduniata eoŋ? Koinunai adenari, kaany.”
Koinut. Kotema kes atiar, “Nakaŋai aput na ka nukiwadikatai?” Kotemasi atiar, “Nuka Kaisar.”
Koboŋok Yesu kotema kes atiar, “Kotacakis Kaisar nueraas nuka Kaisar, ka Edeke da nueraas nuka Edeke.” Koumokis noi jokan.
“Ekesisianakinan, abu Musa kiwadikak sio ebe, Arai ketwana onace ketuŋanan, kinyek akeberu emamei ikoku, eyaŋaari onaceke akeberu, tetere edumakini onaceke aur.
Kejaas iinacan ikanykaarei: komany losodit aberu, kotwana komam inyeinit aur;
Kirum lokiareit ŋes, kotwana, komam inyeinit aur; ka lokiwuniet da kwape kwaŋin.
Kiton lukanykaarei kere komam inyeinito aur. Kokaukec kere kotwana aberu da.
Aso kotoma ajarun eraun ŋin aberu nakaŋai kama kaŋul? Naarai kerai aberu naka lukany kaarei kere.”
Kotema Yesu kes atiar, “Mere akirot na ŋes ipaanariata yesi? Naarai mam ijenete nukiwadikatai, karaida apedor naka Edeke.
Naarai naejaruniata kotoma okatwak, mam emanyete, karaida amanyio: konye eraas bala imalaikan toma akui.

Konye nuka lukatwak ebe itajarunio; mam isiomito kotoma oitabo loka Musa kotoma owai loka Ekiot, kwape kelimokinia Edeke ŋes ebe, ‘Arai eoŋ Edeke loka Aburaam, Edeke loka Isaak, ka Edeke loka Yakob da’?
Mam ŋes erai Edeke loka lukatwak, dimarai loka lukajarak; ipaarete noi.”
Koboŋok Yesu ebe, “Nasodit ŋes na ebe, ‘Kiira wu Isirael; Ejakait Ewokodeke, erai Ejakait ediopet.
Komina Ejakait Ekonideke kekonitau kere, ka akoniijar kere, ka akonicoa kere, ka akonigogoŋ kere.’
Nakiareit da ŋes na ebe, ‘Komina ikoniidunyet kwape iminar bon.’ Emamei aicorakinet ace nakapolon aitelekarit nu.”
Kotema ekewadikan ŋes atiar, “Abeit, Ekesisianakinan, iner kotenan ebe erai ŋesi ediopet; kwabo emamei ece dimarai ŋes.
Amina ŋes ketau kere, ka ajenun kere, ka agogoŋ kere, ka amina ikeidunyet kwape eminar bon, itelekarit noi ainakineta nuicweio kere ka asuban da.”
Nakeanyunia Yesu ebe aboŋoki kapirianut, kotema ŋes atiar, “Mam jo ilwana kajakanut naka Edeke.” Akaulo kaŋun amamei bobo yeniketitiŋikinit aiŋit ŋes akirot.
Abu Daudi elopet kiner kanuka Emoyo Lokalaunan ebe,
‘Abu Ejakait kotema Ekajakait ebe,
Kiboikin akanika nakoteten,
Aitodol neebwaikinia lukasurupokon kwap kakejenekon.’
Daudi elopet enyarit ŋes Ejakait; aso keraun bo biai ikekoku?” Kopupokinite ekodet loapol kaiyalama.
ka iicoloŋo lukapolou katukosia, ka aiboisio nukapolou kopucin.
Luecamete itogoi luka apuserun, luijoseete ebe ilipete nukaojak; edumunete ŋul atubokinio naitelekarit.”
Kobu apuserut nakican kocakak ikapun iarei luerai apesa.
Konyarau ikekesisiak, kotema kes atiar, “Abeit katemari yes atiar, acakaki apuserut ŋin nakican luipu adepar kere luecakanakinete aiŋadis.
Naarai acakakis ŋul kere kideikina luipu; konye ŋin kotoma ocanike acakaki lukejaatar kere, ŋes aijarake kere.”
Kotema Yesu ŋes atiar, “Iany aduketa nu nuepolok? Mam esalakin amoru adiopet kuju kanace, namam etiyakinio.”
Nakiboioo kotoma omoru loka Iseitunin atereikina eyekalu, kiŋita ŋes Petero ka Yakob ka Yokana ka Anderea kaiyeiyea ebe,
“Kolimokinai, ejaunete bo ŋun wori? Anyoin da aanyunet naka apak naeapuuniata ŋun kere aitodolikinio?”
Kogeu Yesu atemar kes atiar, “Kocoito kinyek ituŋanan aitapaar yes.
Epote rwaru luipu kokirorika, kobalas ebe, Eoŋ ŋopeŋol; itapaarete kesi luipu.
Naiirariata nuka ijiisio ka iemuto luka ijiisio, sirikiyaloŋoŋoto: ibusakinit ŋun ajaun; konye koroko awasia edoluno.
Naarai enyoikini ateker asurokin ateker, ka ajakanut da asurokin ajakanut: ejaununete amaraneta nuka akwap kaiboisio nuegelegela; ejaunun da ebel: ŋun ŋes ageunet naka ariebo naka aidoun.
Ibusakinit ber Akiro Nukajokak alimonokinio atekerin kere,
Nakiyaŋaariata yes aijaikin atubokinio, sirikiliŋa aiyaloŋoŋ nuinerete: konye nukiinakinio kosawa kaŋol kinerata ŋun: naarai mere yes inerasi, dimarai Emoyo Lokalaunan.
Ijaikini onac onaceke atwanare, papa da ikekoku; enyoikinete idwe da lukauriakakec, tetere eario.
Kiŋarunete yes ituŋa kere kanuka ekakiror: konye yenetitiŋikini kiton awasia, ŋes itajario.
Konye naianyuniata etal loemudiari ebwoi nemam ibusakinit (yenesiomi kojenu), ŋes konyet ekeriata ŋul luejaas Yudaya oroŋan.
Ituŋanan yenejai kuju togo sirikedoku, karaida alomar ayaŋaar ibore kotogoke.
Yenejai mana da sirikeboŋu kau ayaŋaar akenapito.
Konye itukwi kes nuepotiete, ka nuitanakete da kapaarasia kaŋun!
Kilipata yesi kinyek apak ŋin adolun kiporo.
Naarai eraunos apaarasia ŋun nukican, numam peŋo etakanunito ameun kasubio naasubia Edeke kiton kwana, komam bobo ejaunete cut.
Kedim Ejakait aiŋoŋar apaarasia timam kitajari akuan kere; konye kanuka luseuna, luabu ŋesi koseu, eŋoŋa apaarasia.
Kapak kaŋin arai kitemari yes ituŋanan ebe, ‘Koany, ejai Kristo ne’; arai bo, ‘Koany, ejai laije’; sirikiyuut.
Naarai enyounete luKriston lukeŋalak ka inabin lukeŋalak, itodikinete ŋul aanyuneta ka nukaumokin da, tetere itapaarete luseuna, arai epedoros.
Konye kocoito yesi kadau aikwenyar yes eroko akiro nu kere epona.
ibirununos aacerin kotoma akuj, itamaranio da nukapedor nuejaas toma akuj.
Kosodi konyet eanyunete Okoku loka etuŋanan ebuni kodouon, kapedor naepol ka aibuses.
Kosodi ijukuni imalaikan, etukonokini luseunake anyoun kokwamin iwoŋon, ameun kosaŋe loka akwap kiton osaŋe loka akuj.
Aso kisisiautu akewaragan kama ejai etini; kedaut aketenieik alibun, itolomuni akekui, ijenunete ebe eapie apak naka aidweny.
Aso yes da, naianyuniata ŋun edolunete, kojenut ebe eapie ŋesi, kokek,
Abeit katemari yes atiar, Mam edaun atur na aitodol naejaunotor akiro ŋun kere.
Edaunos akuj ka akwapin, konye akakiro mam edaunos cut.
Kocoito, kokwenyete, kilipete: naarai mam ijenete naejaikinor apak.
Eputos bala etuŋanan ekepejon loiboiororoi kacekwap, kinyeinite eketogo, koinakinite ikebulesin apolou, ŋinituŋanan akeswam, kicorakinite da ekagolon aikweny.
Aso kokwenyete: naarai mam ijenete naebunio ejakait loka etogo, arai eboŋ, arai kidiŋ ebai, arai naeruikinioto ikokoroi, arai tupuruc;
kinyek aŋesun atipet kodum yes ijotoete.
Ido nukalimokini yes, alimokini kere, ebe Kokwenyete.”
Naarai kobalas ebe, “Mere toma apak naka epucit, kinye diat ecelet ajaun otuŋa.”
Konye kojaas ice lukenyunyuras, kotemanaros atiar, “Kanukinyo emadiŋikinor akinyet kopone kaŋol?
Naarai tikepedor agwelar akinyet ŋin adenarin akwat auni ka aitedepar da, kokoranakinai lukican.” Kitorona ya.
Konye kotema Yesu atiar, “Kinyekisi; kanukinyo itiyaloŋoŋooto ŋes? Keswamak eoŋ aswam naejok.
Naarai apaarasia kere ejaas lukican nepepe kayes, ido naikototor ipedorete aiswamakin kes nuejok: konye eoŋ mam kija kayes apaarasia kere.
Eswama nuepedorit: ageik ainyonyoikin akakuan akinyet kanuka aidaare.
Ido abeit katemari yes atiar, Neelimonokinio Akiro Nukajokak kotoma akwapin kere, ŋin naeswama aberu na elimorio akiitunitor ŋes.”
Kosodete nakiirariata, kiyalamikinos, kisumunoto ainakin ŋes arupian. Komo apak naejokiar aijaikin ŋes mamakec.
Kiyakia iarei kokesisiakake kotema kes atiar, “Koloto ore, iriamunos yesi ketuŋanan loibwokit amot naka akipi: kotupasi ŋes.
Kere neelomari, kolimokis elopet etogo ebe, ‘Ebala Ekesisianakinan ebe, Ani bo akagola nakipejok, neanyamakini lukaleleŋ nepepe kikakesisiak?’
Kitodikini ŋesi yes agola naepol nakokuju epesitai itemokino: kitemonokis nen kanuwok.”
Konyout ikekesisiak, koloto ore, kodumut kwape kelimokinitor: kitemokis lukaleleŋ.
Napiboiete enyamete, kotema Yesu atiar, “Abeit katemari yes atiar, ediopet kayesi lokimori keoŋ kabilakini nat ebotet.”
Kogeut akadakin, kotemanasi ediopet ediopet atiar, “Eoŋ ca nat ya?”
Kotema kes atiar, “Ediopet kotomon kaluarei, lokicunyi keoŋ atibo,
Naarai elosi Okoku loka etuŋanan kwape kiwadikatere kanukeŋ; konye itukwi, etuŋanan ŋol loebilakini Okoku loka etuŋanan ebotet! Tiejok kama ketuŋanan kaŋol arai mam kewuruunitai.”
Kolem akoli da, kedau aimal, koinak kes; komatata kere.
Kotema kes atiar, “Nu kes akaokot nuka aitutuket, nuebukoros kanuka ikepuak.
Abeit katemari yes atiar, Mam amasi bobo cut nuka araito naka emusabibu, kiton apaaran ya naamasia nukitetiak kotoma ajakanut naka Edeke.”
Kobala Yesu kes ebe, “Iguikinos yesi kere: naarai iwadikatai ebe, ‘Ebuŋai rwaru ekecokon, isiarakinos amerekekin.’
Konye kadau ajarun, keŋarenikinete yes alosit Galilaya.”
Konye kotema Petero ŋes atiar, “Karaida kiguikinos kere, konye eoŋ mam.”
Kotema Yesu ŋes atiar, “Abeit katemari jo atiar, Lolo akuare na, eriŋa ekokor eruikino irwan aarei, kiŋeri eoŋ irwan auni.”
Konye kiyatak ŋesi noi kobala ebe, “Karaida kebusakinit atwanare kajo, mam kaŋeri jo cut.” Luce da kere kinerata kwape kwaŋin.
Koyaŋa Petero ka Yakob ka Yokana nepepe kaŋes, kogeu ainoŋanakin noi ka aburun.
Kotema kes atiar, “Itururwei noi ekatau aapiar atwanare: kosalata yesi ne, kokwenyete.”
Kikunyak nediokasilon, kibiror ebuburia, kilip ebe arai kepedoros kinac esawa ŋol.
Kobala ebe, “Aba, Papa, kere epedoros kamakon: kolemarai akoli na: konye mere nuakoto eoŋ, dimarai nuikoto ijo.”
Koboŋ, kodum kes ejotoete, kotema ŋesi Petero atiar, “Simon, ijotoi ca ijo? Mam ipedori aikweny esawa ediopet?
Kokwenya kilipa, kinyeis alomar acodunio; ekoto bo emoyo, konye ekalanyana akuan.”
Kikunya bobo, kilip, kinera akiro kwapekwa,
Koboŋ bobo, kodum kes ejotoete, naarai eluranaros ajo; mam apotu kojenut nueboŋokinete ŋes,
Koboŋ bobo nakiwuniet, kotema kes atiar, “Iroko kereka ijotoete, iyeŋito? Aso do; adolu esawa; koany, einakinio Okoku loka etuŋanan akanin nuka ikadiakanarak.
Konyoutu, kaloto; koany, eapie lokabilaki eb otet.”
Koinakinite kes lokebilakini ŋes ebotet aanyunet, kobala ebe, “Loanui eoŋ, ŋes ŋol; kikamutu ŋes, koyaŋaasi ikokito.”
Napekedolu, atipet kolot mama ejai Yesu, kobala ebe, “Rabi”; konu noi.
Koriosi akecekanin, kikamut ŋes.
Konye ediopet kakesi lukebwoete eapie, kout ekekileŋ, kinom ebulesit loka esasedoti lopeti, kojepa akekit.
Koboŋok Yesu kotema kes atiar, “Ilomut teni yesi kikileŋa ka ibelai aikamun eoŋ, bala ekaŋatan?
Ajaenena kayes ŋinipaaran toma oyekalu, esisianakini, komam kikamunete; konye ajaut nu tetere edolete Nukiwadikatai.”
Kosodete kojalakis ŋes kere, kokerata.
Kotupa etelepat ediopet, lokijelokinit egoe lokebaputa bon. Kikamut ŋes,
Konye kinyek egoe lokebaputa, koker imujalal.
Koyaŋaasi Yesu mama ejai losasedoti lopeti; kotukonokinotor isasedotin lupeti kere ka imakio ka ikewadikak da.
Petero da kotupite kama elwana, kiton toma alaro naka losasedoti lopeti; kiboiete nepepe kikejaanakinak, ipieri akim.
Komoata isasedotin lupeti ka aurianet kere ikajenak aluikin Yesu, tetere earete; mam edumuna.
Naarai apotu luipu kitejenut nukaiŋal, konye mam emorikikina akeceitejenun.
Kobwaata ice, kitejenut nukaiŋal, kobalas ebe,
“Kipou isio keirasi ŋes ebala ebe, ‘Akesi eoŋ eyekalu lo lokedukio kakanin, adukuni ece kotoma apaarasia auni lomam edukio kakanin.’ ”
Karaida kwaŋin mam aitejenunikec emorikikina.
Kobwo losasedoti lopeti kokidiŋ, kiŋit Yesu ebe, “Mam cabo iboŋokini akirot? Anyoika ŋun nuetejenut ŋul aluikin jo?”
Konye ŋes kililiŋ, mam eboŋokino akirot, Kiŋit bobo losasedoti lopeti, kotema atiar, “Irai kereka ijo Kristo, Okoku loka Loituritoi?”
Kotema Yesu atiar, “Eoŋ ŋopeŋol; ido ianyunete rwaru Okoku loka etuŋanan iboie kakan nakoteten nakapedor, eupunos kidouon luka akuj.”
Kocil losasedoti lopeti ikenapen, kobala ebe, “Inyo bo kipudar bobo ikajenak?
Iirasi ainyanakinike: iwomitos anu?” Kotubokis kere ebe ibusakinit atwanare.
Kogeut ice aimwaanakin aimul, korapakis akekonyen, kodipidipoto, kobalas ebe, “Komurwo.” Ikejaanakinak da lukeyaŋaarete, kibapanasi ŋes.
koany Petero ipieri akim, kosesen ŋes, kobala ebe, “Ijai nan ijo da nepepe ka Enasarayot je Yesu.”
Konye koŋer, kobala ebe, “Mam ajeni, ido mam apupi nuinera ijo.” Koloma kiŋa kiton neelomarere: koruik ekokor.
Koany akejaanakinan ya ŋes, kogeu bobo alimokin ŋul lukebwoete kanen ebe, “Erai lo lokec.”
Konye koŋer bobo. Apak edit bobo kolimokis Petero lukebwoete kanen ebe, “Abeit irai ijo lokec; naarai irai ijo Egalilayat.”
Konye kogeu eilam ka aiyapo ebe, “Mam eoŋ ajeni etuŋanan ŋol loilimito yesi.”
Atipet koruik ekokor irwan nakiareit. Kiitu Petero akirot nakelimokini Yesu ŋes ebe, “Eriŋa ekokor keruikino irwan aarei, kiŋeri eoŋ irwan auni.” Komulau eketau, komony.
Kiŋit Pilato ŋes ebe, “Irai kereka ijo Ekabaka loka Iyudayan?” Koboŋok kotema atiar, “Ijo ibala.”
Kiwosatos ŋes isasedotin lupeti kakiro nuipu.
Kiŋit bobo Pilato ŋes ebe, “Mam cabo iboŋokini akirot? Koany akiro nuetia nen nukiwosatere,”
Mam bobo Yesu eboŋokino akirot; koumok Pilato.
Kopucit atapit aosikin kes eenat ediopet, loelipete.
Kejai etuŋanan lokenyaritai Baraba, lokeenitai nepepe kalukipaliikinete, lukearete ituŋa kotoma aipaliikin ŋin,
Kobu ekodet kogeu ailip aiswamakin kes kwape kenaikinitotor.
Koboŋok Pilato kes ebe, “Ikotosi kaosikis yes Ekabaka loka Iyudayan?”
Naarai ajeni ŋesi ebe ainakis isasedotin kanuka ekolo.
Konye kisidikoto isasedotin lupeti ekodet ebe, koosik gwai Baraba.
Koboŋok bobo Pilato, kotema kes atiar, “Aso ekonakini ai ŋol loibalasi yesi ebe erai Ekabaka loka Iyudayan?”
Kiworoto bobo ebe, “Kibubuk ŋes.”
Kotema Pilato kes atiar, “Kanukinyo, naanyoin aronis nakiswamai?” Konye kiyatakisi kesi aiworo noi ebe, “Kibubuk ba.”
Kosodi kokoto Pilato aisiyalamikin ekodet, koosik kes Baraba, ido kedau aida Yesu koinak tetere ibubukinio.
Kitolomasi ŋes iserikalei alaro, naerai Epuraitorion
Kitanapa anapito namuge, kojeata aboko naka ikukwa, kitanapikis akouke.
Kogeut ayogan ŋes ebe, “Yoga, ijo Ekabaka loka Iyudayan!”
Kinomonomata akouke kagada, kimwaanakis aimul, kokukonokinos komaata.
Kosodete kedaut akienar ŋes, kolacasi anapito namuge, kitanapata akenapito. Kitolomasi kiŋa aibubukin.
Koyaŋaasil aitodol aibois naenyaritai Gologota, apolouke ebe, Aibois naka Abelekek naka Akou.
Koinakis ebino lokinyalakinitai lukesai; konye mam abu kocam.
Kibubukis ŋes, kokorokorata ikenapen, kilamilamata eroet, aanyun lueyaŋaari ŋolituŋanan.
Kerai esawa lokiwuniet, kibubukis ŋes.
Kojai da ebalua loka nueosatai ŋes loewadikatai kuju ebe, “EKABAKA LOKA IYUDAYAN.”
Kibubukis ikaŋatak iarei nepepe kaŋes; ediopet kakanike nakoteten, ka ediopet da kakanike nakokediany. [
Kosodi kitodolikinoi Nukiwadikatai ebe, “Aponi kimarakinai nepepe kalukepali.”]
Lukitorito nen koinyanakinete ŋes, kimuŋumuŋete da akecekwes, kobalas ebe, “Aso cado! Ijo loikesi eyekalu, ka adukun kotoma apaarasia auni,
kitajarun cani, kodoku komusalaba!”
Kikote nen da isasedotin lupeti kokienatar ŋes bonik ka bonik nepepe kikewadikak, kobalas ebe, “Etajar ice; mam epedori aitajarun bon.
Kristo, Ekabaka loka Isirael, kodoku komusalaba, kaanyutu, keyuutu da.” Ŋul da lukibubukinitoi nepepe kaŋes kimuasi ŋes.
Kosawa lokikanyet kaoŋon kodelo Yesu keporoto loepol kobala ebe, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabakatani?” apolouke ebe, “Ekadeke, Ekadeke, kanukinyo kijalakinia eoŋ?”
Ice kalukebwoete kanen, kiirasi, kobalas ebe, “Koany, enyarit Eliya.”
Koker ediopet, kileleb acago ebino loedwar ria, kibwaik toma agada, kitamat ŋes, kobala ebe, “Kinyeisi; kaanyutu arai cani ebuni Eliya aitodokun ŋes.”
Konye Yesu kodelo keporoto loepol, kiridak.
Kocila aigalisit naka eyekalu kaarei ameun kokuju kiton kwap.
Keanyu ekapolokiton lokebwoi kanen atereikina, ebe eridaki kwaŋin, kobala ebe, “Abeit etuŋanan lo kerai Okoku loka Edeke.”
nuaupenenas kaŋes, naajaar Galilaya, ijaanakinete ŋes; ka aŋor ace da nuipu nukedokarete nenipe kaŋes Yerusalem.
kobu Yosep loko Arimataya, esot lokaurianet, lokemunokina ajakanut naka Edeke; kotitiŋior koloma mama ejai Pilato, kilip akuan naka Yesu.
Koumok Pilato kwape ketwania atipet: konyarau ekapolokiton, kiŋit arai teni kedau atwanare.
Kedau ajenun kama kekapolokiton, kocam ainakin Yosep akuan.
Kogwel ŋesi egoe loka ebaputa, kolacu akuan, konunukik ogoe loka ebaputa, kibwaik toma ates nakikeitoi atiiba; kikokorik amor okek loka ates.
Kosesenete Mariam Magadalene ka Mariam toto naka Yose aibois naebwaikinio.
Kosodi tupuruc sek kapaaran nasodit nakasabato, koloto ates napeŋiuni akoloŋ,
Kineranakinos bonik ka bonik ebe, “Iŋai bo kikokorikini oni amoru alemar kokek loka ates?”
Nakiteluoroto, koanyutu amoru ikokorioritai awai; naarai apol noi.
Kolomasi ates, koanyutu etelepat iboie kowai lokoteten, enapit anapito nailiacanit; koumokis.
Kotema kes atiar, “Sirikiwumokis; imoete yesi Yesu Enasarayot lokibubukinitoi: ajaru; emamei kane; koanyutu aibois kama kibwaikinitai ŋes!
Konye koloto, kolimokis ikekesisiak ka Petero da ebe, Kiŋarenikini ŋesi yes alosit Galilaya; ianyikinete ŋes ŋina, kwape kilimokinitor yes.”
Kolomutu kiŋa, kokerata anyoun kates; naarai apotu komaranata, ka aumokin: mam elimokina imodiotuŋanan akirot; naarai akuriaka.
Nakedaunia ajarun tupuruc apaaran nasodit nakasabato, kisiau aitakanikin Mariam Magadalene, nakolo kireŋeari ŋesi ajokin akanykaarei.
Kolot ŋin kolimok lukejaenenas kaŋes, nakibworotor komonyete.
Kes da nakiirariata ebe ejari, aanyu ŋesi, mam apotu kiyuut.
Koboŋosi kolimokis luce; mam apotu kiyuut ŋul da.
Kotema kes atiar, “Koloto yesi akwapisinei kere, kolimonokis ŋinisubat kere Akiro Nukajokak.
Yeniyuuni kibatisai, itajario; konye yenimam iyuuni itelekarete akiro.
Etupanakinete aanyuneta nu ŋul luiyuunete; kokirorika ireŋeanarete ajokin: inerenenas aŋajepa nukitetiak;
ikamununete imunwo, karaida kemata ibore yenikaaran, mam isiriebi kes cut; idokonokinete lukadekak akecekanin, eŋaleunete.”
Konyoutu kwi, kolimonokis kotoma aiboisio kere, kiswamai Ejakait nepepe kakes, kitogogoŋ akirot kanuka aanyuneta nuketupanakinete. Amen.]
Naarai apotu luipu kotamakis aiwadik kotenan akiro ŋun nuetodolikinos kamawok,
kwape kiilimonokiniata kwi lukeraas ikajenak lukeanyunito ameun kageunet, ido ikejaanakinak luka akirot kaŋin,
ketojok eoŋ da, naarai abu kamoote abeit naka akiro ŋun kere ameun kanusodit, kesuduny da, kewadikak jo Teopilo lokaibuses,
tetere ijenuni abeit naka akiro nukiisisianakinio.
Keraas kesi kere luedolito kakonyen nuka Edeke, kolosenenete kaicorakineta ka ikisila da kere luka Ejakait komam aitoronio.
Kemamei kes ikoku, naarai arakakit Elisabet, ido kemojoŋito kesi kere.
Kosodi kanen, nakiswamaa ŋesi aswam naka esasedoti kakonyen nuka Edeke, kwape kebeikinitor,
kwape kejaar epone loka esasedotene, kobeik ŋes eroet alomar aibois nakalaunan naka Ejakait, aisupuruun lukisupurununo.
Kilipi ekodet kere loka ituŋa kokiŋa kosawa loka aisupuruun.
Kitakanikin ŋes emalaika loka Ejakait ebwoi kowai lokoteten loka etem loka aisupuruun.
Nakeanyunia Sakaria ŋes, kiyaloŋoŋ, kokurianar.
Konye kotema emalaika ŋes atiar, “Sakaria, sirikikurianar; naarai eirar akoniilip, kiwurikini jo akoniberu Elisabet ikoku yenisapat, imaikini ekekiror Yokana.
Ilakar ijo, iyalamikin; ido isiyalamikinete luipu akeurunio.
Naarai eraun lokapolon kakonyen nuka Ejakait, kwabo mam emasi ajon karaida nuitemerete; ilelebun Emoyo Lokalaunan, ameun kakoik naka totoke,
Ido inyakuni ŋesi luipu kodwe luka Isirael mama ejai Ejakait Ekecedeke.
Iŋareni kakonyeneke komoyo ka apedor naka Eliya, ainyakun itauon luka lukapapa mama ejaas idwe, ka lukepali mama ejai acoa naka ikadolitok; aitemonokin Ejakait ituŋa luesikapikinitai.”
Kotema Sakaria emalaika atiar, “Ajenuni biai ŋun? Naarai amojoŋit eoŋ, akaberu da atuboros ikekar.”
Koboŋok emalaika kotema ŋes atiar, “Eoŋ Gaburiel, loabwoi kakonyen nuka Edeke; keyakuunitai einer kajo, ka alimokin jo akiro nu nukajokak.
Ido koany, ililiŋi ijo komam ipedori einer, aitodol apaaran naedolioto nu, naarai mam iyuunit akakiro, nuitodolikinio kapakikec.”
Edarito ituŋa Sakaria, koumokis kanu etumoror kaibois nakalaunan.
Nakelomunia, mam apedori einer kakes: kojenut ebe aanyunit aitapoet kotoma aibois nakalaunan: kiyatak aitetem kakanin, kosal mam epedori einer.
Kosodi kanen, nakitodolikinotor apaarasia nuka aijaanakinike, koboŋo oreke.
Akaulo kapaarasia kaŋun kopotuu akeberu Elisabet; koŋop ilapio ikany, kobala ebe,
“Kekonak Ejakait kwanata kapaarasia nukasesenia, tape kawoori ikaleic kakonyen nuka ituŋa.”
Kolap lokikanyetekape aponi kijukunai emalaika Gaburiel kama ejai Edeke alosit Galilaya ore Nasaret,
mama ejai abekot nakisinerit ekiliokit ekekiror Yosep, lokokek loka Daudi; ekiror loka abekot ŋes Mariam.
Koloma emalaika mama ejai, kotema atiar, “Yoga, naisirereŋitoi noi, ejai Ejakait kajo!”
Konye kiyaloŋoŋ ŋesi noi kanuka akiroke, koomoom kotauke ebe ikoni bo ai ayogan na,
Kotema emalaika ŋes atiar, “Sirikiyoŋ, Mariam, naarai idum asianut kama ejai Edeke.
Ido koany, ipotuuni, idouni ikoku yenitelepat, imaikini ekekiror Yesu.
Eraun ŋol lokapolon, enyarao Okoku loka je Ioejai kuju kakuj; Ejakait Edeke einakini ŋes eicoloŋ loka Daudi papaake,
irumi ekek loka Yakob ikar kere; akejakanut da mam enaŋi.”
Kotema Mariam emalaika atiar, “Ikwaikinete bo ai ŋun, naarai mam ajeni ekiliokit?”
Koboŋok emalaika ŋes ebe, “Kidoikini jo Emoyo Lokalaunan, kirapiari agogoŋ naka Je loejai kuju kakuj; kanuka ŋun yeneuruunio enyarao yenikalaunan, Okoku loka Edeke.
Ido koany, Elisabet kinacikon, ŋes da epotiei ikoku yenitelepat kotoma amojoŋuke; elap lo da ŋes lokikanyetekape loka ŋin nakenyaritai arakan.
Naarai emamei akirot naikaruni Edeke.”
Kobala Mariam ebe, “Koany, arai eoŋ abulesit naka Ejakait; kojaut mamakaŋ kwape kakonikiro.” Kosodi konyou emalaika kamakeŋ.
Kapaarasia kaŋun konyou Mariam, kisunya alosit akwap nakiukon, kiton ore ediopet loko Yuda;
koloma togo loka Sakaria kiyoga Elisabet.
Kosodi kanen, nakiiraria Elisabet ayogan naka Mariam, kicuru ikoku kakoikike; kilelebai Elisabet Emoyo Lokalaunan;
kodelo jokan, kotema atiar, “Isirereŋitoi jo kotoma aŋor, isirereŋitoi da araito nuka aliligetekon.
Kepote bo nu kai, toto naka Ekajakait abunore mamakaŋ?
Naarai koany, napadolunio ayoganikon akiika, kicuru ikoku kakoikika kanuka aiyalama.
Isirereŋitoi da ŋin naiyuunit; naarai itodolikinio nualimokinitai ŋes kama ka Ejakait.”
“Itopoloori ekatau Ejakait.
Elelakinit da ekamoyo Edeke Ekaketaiaran.
Naarai koany, amear lolo kanyaritos eoŋ aturio kere naitusulianyitai.
Lokalaunan ekekiror.
Esiarisiar ikewoŋok kaomisio nuka itauonokec.
Etopolo luitasonos.
Epapel ikabarak.
Eŋaraki Isirael ekebulesit.
Aburaam ka aurike apaarasia kere.”
Kosalak Mariam kaŋes bala ilapio iuni, kosodi koboŋo orekec,
Kosodi kanen kodol apak naka Elisabet aidoun, kidou ikoku yenitelepat.
Kiirasi ikeidunyeta ka ikepajen ebe etopoloo Ejakait akeitim mamakeŋ, kiyalamikinos nenipe kaŋes.
Kosodi kapaaran nakikanyetekauni kopotu aikep ikoku; kokotosi amaikin ekiror loka papake Sakaria.
Koboŋok totoke kotema atiar, “Mam, konye emaikinio Yokana.”
Kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Emamei yenikajenakon yenemaikinitai ekiror ŋol.”
Kokwetut papake ajenun ebe ekoto amaikin iŋai.
Kilip ibore yenikiwadika, kiwadik ebe, “Ekekiror erai Yokana.” Koumokis kere.
Atipet kopukoroi akeituk, kolacarai da akeŋalep, kiner, iturit Edeke,
Kokuriakaros ikeceidunyeta kere, Kitisiarakinai akiro ŋun anatar akwap kere nakiukon naka Yudaya;
kere lukiirarete koricata kotauonokec, kobalas ebe, “Aso eraun ikoku yen yenikepone enyoin?” Naarai akan naka Ejakait ajai kaŋes.
Kilelebun papake Sakaria Emoyo Lokalaunan, kodwar kobala ebe,
Kwape enerar kolo kageunet
Kaituke nuka inabinoke lukalaunak;
Kejaanakis ŋes komam kikuriaka;
Kotoma alaunit ka adolit kakonyeneke Apaarasia kere nuka aijarawok.
Naarai iŋareni kakonyen nuka Ejakait aitemokin ikerotin.
Kipejok oni Acilakide naabuni kokuju.
Kotoribe da lokatwanare,
Aiteten awokokeie korot loka ainapakin.”
Kosodi kanen kapaarasia kaŋun, kobu ekisil kama ka Kaisar Augusito ebe ibusakinit ituŋa luka akwapin kere aiwadikao.
Ŋin ŋes aiwadikao nasodit nakeraar Kuirinio ekayaiton loka Suria.
