Koloto ituŋa kere aiwadikao, ŋinituŋanan bukec.
Konyou Yosep da koGalilaya, kore Nasaret, kodoka alosit Yudaya, ore loka Daudi, loenyaritai Betelekem, naarai kerai ŋesi lokokek ka ajena naka Daudi;
tetere iwadikao nepepe ka Mariam, nakisinerit ŋesi, epotiei.
Kosodi kanen, ejaas ŋina, kodoloto akepaarasia nuka aidoun.
Kidou yenikiyaike yenisapat; kimuko kigoen lukimukeru, kiperik atuba nakenyamenenata ibaren, naarai mam adumunito apak kotogo loka ipejok.
Kojaas ikecokok kakwap kaŋin lukiboiete kais idarete ekecesipan kuare.
Kotakanik kes emalaika loka Ejakait, kocau aŋosibib naka Ejakait airiamar kes: kokuriakaros noi.
Kotema emalaika kes atiar, “Sirikikuriakaros; naarai koany, kainunit yes akiro nukajokak nuka aiyalama naepol naejauni mama ejaas ituŋa kere;
naarai auruun lolo kanukus Eketajaran, ŋes Kristo Ejakait kotoma ore loka Daudi,
Na ŋes aanyunet kamakus; idumunete ikoku yenimukeru imukoritai kigoen lukimukeru, eperi kotoma atuba nakenyamenenata ibaren.”
Atipet kojai nepepe kemalaika kaŋol ekodet loka ajore naka akuj ituritos Edeke, ebalasi ebe,
Ka ainapakin da kakwapin mama ejaas ituŋa luitoiokit.”
Kosodi kanen, kenyout imalaikan aboŋor toma akui, kotemanaros ikecokok ebe, “Aso kaloto kiton Betelekem, kaanyut ŋun nuiswamatai, nukitejenu Ejakait oni,”
Koloto atipet, kodumutu Mariam ka Yosep, nepepe kimukeru eperi katuba nakenyamenenata ibaren.
Keanyutu, kitejenut akirot nakelimokinio kes naka ikoku kaŋin,
Koumokis lukiirarete kere akiro nukelimokinete ikecokok.
Konye koricite Mariam akiro ŋun kere, koomite kotauke.
Koboŋosi ikecokok, itopoloorito ituritos da Edeke kanuka akiro kere nukiirarete, ka nuaanyut da, kwape kelimokinitere.
(Kwape iwadikatere kokisil loka Ejakait ebe, “Ŋinikoku yenikiliokit yenepukori aliliget enyaritai yenikalaunan mama ejai Ejakait.”)
Koinakis da asuban kwape kineritere kokisila luka Ejakait, “Ajeleik aarei arai ilukei iarei ludidik.”
Ido koany, kejai etuŋanan Yerusalem, ekekiror Simeon, kerai etuŋanan loedolit loeyoŋit Edeke, edaret aitalakario naka Isirael, kejai ŋes Emoyo Lokalaunan.
Kikwenyarit Emoyo Lokalaunan ŋes ebe mam etwani eroko eanyuna Kristo loka Ejakait.
Kobu ŋol toma oyekalu iŋarenikinit Emoyo; ido nakeyauniata ikauriak ikoku Yesu tetere iswamakinete ŋes kwape ejaar epone loka ikisila,
kodak ŋes elopet kakaninike, kimal Edeke, kotema atiar,
Kwape ejaar akonikirot;
Nakitemonokinit kakonyen nuka ituŋa kere.
Araun aibuses naka ikonituŋa Isirael.”
Koumokis papake ka totoke ŋun nukinerai kanukeŋ.
“Koany, ibwaikinitai ikoku yen kanuka aibiror ka anyoun da naka luipu kotoma Isirael,
Ido araut aanyunet naitepegitai.
Ijo da alopet kicumi ekileŋ ekonitau,
Tetere epukoros aomisio nukotauon kaluipu.”
Kejai da anabi, ŋes Ana, akoku naka Panuel loka ateker naka Aser; kedaunit ikar luipu, kiboikino kokilenike ikar ikanykaarei ameun kabekonutuke,
kerai apuserut ikar akaisakanykauni ka luoŋon, Mam kenyoununei koyekalu, konye komaenenei Edeke paaran ka kuare da kailuŋ ka ailip.
Kotakanu ŋin da kapak kaŋin, kimala Edeke, kolimok lukidareto alakunio naka Yerusalem nuka ikoku.
Kopoloor ikoku, kiyatakin agogoŋ, kileleba acoa; asianut da naka Edeke kojai kaŋes.
Nakedol ŋesi ikar itomon kaarei, koloto kwape kejaar epone loka epucit;
nakedaut aitodolikin apaarasia, apak naka aboŋorikec, kosalak isapat Yesu Yerusalem, komam ikekauriak ejenete.
Konye koomitos kesi ebe ejai toma okodet, koloto alosit naka apaaran adiopet; kosodete komoata ŋes opajenakec ka opaperokec da.
Nakekurwokis adumun, koboŋosi Yerusalem emootos ŋes.
Kosodi kanen, ketuboros apaarasia auni kodumakis ŋes oyekalu, iboie kokidiŋ kikesisianakinak, epupi, kiŋisi da aiŋiseta.
Koumokis kere lukiirarete ŋes akeijen ka akeboŋonokin da.
Nakeanyuniata, koumokis: kotema totoke ŋes atiar, “Ikakoku, kanukinyo kikonakinia sio kwaŋin? Koany, papakon ka eoŋ da kipou kamootos jo kaiturur.”
Kotema kes atiar, “Kanukinyo kimoiata eoŋ? Mam kereka yes ijenete ebe kebusakinit aiboi kotogo loka Papaka?”
Mam kes apotu kojenut akirot ŋin nakelimokini kes.
Kijesar nepepe kakes, kiton Nasaret; kononokikinite kes. Koricite totoke akiro ŋun kere kotauke.

Kokaru lokitomonet kakany loka airumit naka Kaisar Tiberio, korai Pontio Pilato ekayaiton loko Yudaya, ka Kerode da ekabaka loko Galilaya, ka Pilipo onaceke ŋes ekabaka loka akwap naka Ituraya ka Turakonito, ka Lusania ŋes ekabaka loka Abilene,
kapak nakeraatar Ana ka Kaiapa lusasedotin lupeti, kobu akirot naka Edeke mama ejai Yokana okoku loka Sakaria kamodiŋ.
Kolot akwap kere naidunyasi Yorodan, elimonokini aibatisa naka aitoronikin kanuka alemar adiakanareta.
Kwape kiwadikatere koitabo loka akiro nuka enabi Isaia ebe,
“Eporoto loka yenikiworoi kamodiŋ ebe,
Kitemonokis erot loka Ejakait,
Kitetena ikesokono.
Itutuo rwaru ŋinidirot,
Ikeio ŋoliroŋat ka ŋoliukot;
Itetenio neekudukudo, liyaiyakinio nuimugogolito;
Aso koraata araito nuibusakinito aitoronikin, ido sirikigeut einer kotauonokus ebe, ‘Ejai oni Aburaam papaawok’; naarai kalimokini yes ebe, Epedori Edeke aitonyoikin Aburaam idwe kotoma amor kanu.
Nati kwape kwana da ibwaikinitai aep atoromin nuka ikito: aso ŋolikitoi lomam erai araito nuejok ejepario, ka acakakin akim.”
Kiŋita ŋes ikodeta ebe, “Aso keswamara anyoika?”
Koboŋok kes kotema atiar, “Yenejaas ikason iarei, koinak yenemamei; ka yenejaas inyamat da kikon nepenen.”
Kopotu luketelemak esolo da aibatisao, kiŋita ŋes ebe, “Ekesisianakinan, keswamata isio da anyoika?”
Kotema kes atiar, “Siritelemenenete luedeparito lukicorakinitai.”
Kiŋita ŋes iserikalei da ebe, “Ka sio da, keswamata anyoika?” Kotema kes atiar, “Siribenyaka kama ejai ituŋanan, sirisabanakinete; kisiyalamikinito da ekusiropit.”

Koboŋok Yokana kotema kes kere atiar, “Abeit kebatisai yes kakipi; konye ebunit loketelekarit eoŋ kagogoŋ, lomam eoŋ kebusakinit alacun amuny naka amukake: kibatisai ŋol yes kEmoyo Lokalaunan ka akim,
Ejai ekeritei akanike, epiari cut ekepejal, etukonokini akimake odula; konye icwei agugu kakim namam itudeŋio.”
Ido kaicoreta ace nuipu kolimonok ituŋa akiro nukajokak.
Konye ekabaka Kerode, kanuetoronia Yokana ŋes kanuka Kerodia aberu naka onaceke, ka nukaronok kere nukiswamat Kerode,
kiyatak na da tomakec, kogolok ŋesi Yokana aidaris.
kijesun Emoyo Lokalaunan mamakeŋ kakuan bala ajele, kolom eporoto kakuj, ebe, “Irai ijo Okokuka Iominat; kalelakinit jo noi.”
Okoku loka Matat, okoku loka Lebi, okoku loka Meliki, okoku loka Yanai, okoku loka Yosep,
okoku loka Matatia, okoku loka Amos, okoku loka Nakum, okoku loka Esili, okoku loka Nagai,
okoku loka Maat, okoku loka Matatia, okoku loka Semein, okoku loka Yosek, okoku loka Yoda,
okoku loka Yoanan, okoku loka Resa, okoku loka Serubabel, okoku loka Sealutiel, okoku loka Neri,
okoku loka Meliki, okoku loka Adi, okoku loka Kosam, okoku loka Elamadam, okoku loka Er,
koku loka Yesu, okoku loka Elieser, okoku loka Yorim, okoku loka Matat, okoku loka Lebi,
okoku loka Simeon, okoku loka Yuda, okoku loka Yosep, okoku loka Yonam, okoku loka Eliakim,
okoku loka Melea, okoku loka Mena, okoku loka Matata, okoku loka Natan, okoku loka Daudi,
okoku loka Yese, okoku loka Obed, okoku loka Boas, okoku loka Salumon, okoku loka Nason,
okoku loka Aminadab, okoku loka Arani, okoku loka Kesuron, okoku loka Peres, okoku loka Yuda,
okoku loka Yakob, okoku loka Isaak, okoku loka Aburaam, okoku loka Tera, okoku loka Nakor,
okoku loka Serug, okoku loka Reu, okoku loka Peleg, okoku loka Eber, okoku loka Sela,
okoku loka Kainan, okoku loka Arupakasad, okoku loka Sem, okoku loka Noa, okoku loka Lamek,
okoku loka Metusela, okoku loka Enok, okoku loka Yared, okoku loka Makalaleel, okoku loka Kainan,
okoku loka Enos, okoku loka Set, okoku loka Adam, okoku loka Edeke.
kodau apaarasia akaisaoŋon, ecoduni Satan ŋes. Kapaarasia kaŋun mam kenyami ibore: kedaunos, korieb eteŋei,
Kotema Satan ŋes atiar, “Arai tope irai ijo Okoku loka Edeke kicorak amoru na koraun atap.”
Koboŋok Yesu ŋes ebe, “Iwadikatai ebe, Mam ituŋanan ejari kanuka atap bon.”
Kitodoka kuju, kitodianak ajakanuto kere nuka akwapin, katipet,
Kotema Satan atiar, “Kainakini jo apolou na kere, ka aibusesukec; naarai kainakinitai eoŋ; eoŋ da ainakini yenakoto kere.
Aso arai kiima eoŋ, eraunete kere nukon.”
Koboŋok Yesu kotema ŋes atiar, “Iwadikatai ebe, Komaenenei Ejakait Ekonideke, kijaanakinenei ŋes bon.”
Koyaŋa ŋes Yerusalem, kisibwo koswi loka eyekalu, kotema atiar, “Arai tope irai ijo Okoku loka Edeke, kosomari kwap.
Naarai iwadikatai ebe,
Icorakini ikemalaikan kanukon, kidarata jo.
Kidakete jo kakaninikec,
Kinyek amoru aiguikin akonikeju.”
Nakedaunia Satan ŋinicodunet, kinyek ber ŋes.
Kisisianakinenei kotoma atukosiakec, kitopolooritos ituŋa kere.
Koinakinai eitabo loka enabi Isaia. Kopuko eitabo, kodum aibois mama kiwadikatai ebe,
Naarai abu kenyonyoik akinyet alimonokin lukican akiro nukajokak;
Kejuk eoŋ alimor aosikinio mama ejaas luijoreoritai,
Ka imudukiok da akwenyun,
Alakakin lueridakinitai.
Korapak eitabo, kinyakak ekejaanakinan, kiboikin; kosesenata ŋes noi ituŋa kere lukejaas atukos.
Kogeu alimokin kes ebe, “Etodolikin lolo nukiwadikatai nu toma akiikus.”
Kitejenut kere, koumokis akiro nukasianut nukelomunete kaitukuke: kobalas ebe, “Mere lo okoku loka Yosep?”
Kotema kes atiar, “Abeit ipote ainerakin eoŋ awaragan na ebe, ‘Emurwon, kitaŋaleun bon: ŋun kere nukiiranari ebe kiswamat Kaparanaum, kiswama kane da kobukus.’ ”
Kotema atiar, “Abeit katemari yes atiar, Emamei enabi loecamunio kobukec.
Konye abeit katemari yes atiar, Kojaas kolo apuserun nuipu koIsirael kapaarasia nuka Eliya, apak nakegolitere akuj ikar iuni ka ilapio ikanykape, nakedoikinio ebeli loepol akwap kere;
mam aponi kijukarai Eliya mama ejai adiopet kakesi, dimarai Sarapeta, kakwap naka Sidon, mama ejai aberu nakerai apuserut.
Kojaas da lukatapon luipu koIsirael kapaarasia nuka Elisa enabi; mam yenaponi kiswagarai, dimarai Naaman Esuriat.”
Nakiirariata kesi akiro ŋun kotoma atukos, kilelebunos kere anyunyura.
Konyoutu, koremosi kiŋa ka ere, koyaŋaasi neetukum koukot loadukokinitai ekecere, tetere eremorete ŋes kwap cut.
Konye ŋes kitoro kidiŋikec kolot.
Koumokis noi ituŋa akeisisianakin; naarai kejai akekirot apolou,
Kejai etuŋanan atukos lokejai emoyo loka ajokit naerono, kiworo keporoto loepol ebe,
“Kinyeinai! Anyoika isio kajo, Yesu loko Nasaret? Ibu kereka amudiar sio? Kajeni jo kwape iraar, Lokalaunan loka Edeke.”
Kiretak Yesu ŋes ebe, “Kobuta, kolom kamakeŋ.” Kibirok ajokit lokadekan kidiŋikec, konyou kamakeŋ, komam imadiŋit,
Koumokis kere, kineranakinos bonik ka bonik ebe, “Akirot anyoin na? Naarai icorakini imoyon lueroko kapolou ka apedor, elomunete da.”
Kisiarakin ekeemut anatar aiboisio kere nuidunyatar akwap ŋin.
Kobwo kama ejai, kiretak ekamidi; kinyek ŋin: atipet konyou kijaanak kes.
Napibiror akoloŋ, ŋul kere lukejaas ituŋa lukedekasi adekesia nuegelegela koinut ŋes; kidokok akekanin ŋinidiopet kaŋul, kitaŋaleu kes.
Konyoununut ajokin da kaneejaas luipu, kiworoto ebe, “Irai ijo Okoku loka Edeke.” Kiretak kes, kisimik einer, naarai kejenete ebe ŋes Kristo.
Kosodi kiwala akwap, konyou kolot aibois naesil; komoata ŋes ikodeta, kopotu mama ejai, kokotosi aitasal ŋes, kinyek anyoun kamakec.
Konye kotema kes atiar, “Kebusakinit alimonokin akiro nukajokak nuka ajakanut naka Edeke koreria ice da: naarai ŋin keyakuunere.”
Kolimonokinenei katukosia nuko Galilaya.
Koany atakerin aarei nukejaas oitolima loka aŋolol; konye kedokunito ikalokak ilosete iboyanakec.
Kodoka ataker adiopet, nakerai naka Simon, kilip ŋes aisukunyar nediokasilon anyoun koitolima, Kiboikin kisisianak ikodeta kojai ataker.
Nakedau einer, kotema ŋesi Simon atiar, “Koremo ataker kiton ataro, kocakakis iboyanakus aikamia lukecor.”
Koboŋok Simon kotema atiar, “Ejakait, kipou ketaaritos akuare kiya, komam kidumuni idiobore: konye kanuka akonikirot, acakakini bo iboyan.”
Kedaut aswam ŋun, kipokata iboro lukecor luipu noi: kokotosi ikeceboyan aŋed;
kokwetut lukaupakec lukejaas ataker ace aponare aiŋarakin kes. Kopotu, kisilelebata atakerin kere aarei kiton neebuciata alumor.
Konye keanyu Simon Petero ŋun, kibirokin kwap akuŋin nuka Yesu, kobala ebe, “Wu Ejakait, kinyeinai, naarai arai eoŋ ekadiakanaran.”
Naarai koumok ŋesi, ka ŋul kere lukejaas kaŋes, kanuka aipues naka lukecor lukikamunete:
koumokis da Yakob ka Yokana, odwe luka Sebedayo, lukemoranara ka Simon. Kotema Yesu Simon atiar, “Sirikikurianar; amear natikwana iraun ekalokan ituŋa.”
Nakedauniata aitodokun atakerinikec oitolima, kinyeis kere, kotupasi ŋes.
Korio Yesu akekan, kotiro ŋes, kotema atiar, “Akoto; kiswagar.” Atipet konyou atapon kamakeŋ.
Kicor ŋes sirikelimoki idiotuŋanan; konye ebe, “Kolot, kitodiar mama ejai esasedoti, koinak kanuka aiswagariokon kwape kolo kicorakinitor Musa, araun aitejenunet kamakec.”
Konye kiyatakinos akekiro aisiarar: kotukonokinos ikodeta luipu akiirar, ido aitaŋaleunio adekesiakec.
Konye ŋes kogitar kolot amodiŋ, kilip.
Ido koany, kibwokut ituŋa etuŋanan loesenyit koitada: kokotos aitolomar ŋes toma, ka aibwaikin akonyeneke,
Nakekurwosi aitolomar kanuka ekodet, kodokasi kuju oswi, kijoliliut ŋes aitorunio ametegulan koitadake kokidiŋ, akonyen nuka Yesu,
Nakeanyunia ŋesi akeceiyuun kotema atiar, “Ijo ba, esionii akonidiakanareta.”
Kogeut ikewadikak ka Iparisayon epeget kobalas ebe, “Tŋai bo lo loinera nukainyanakin Edeke? Iŋai bo epedori aisioni adiakanareta, dimarai Edeke bon?”
Konye kojeni Yesu ekecepeget, koboŋok kotema kes atiar, “Kanukinyo ipegatatar kotauonokus?
Ani bo naepatana, atemar ebe, ‘Esionii akonidiakanareta,’ arai bo atemar ebe, ‘Konyou kolot?’
Konye tetere ijenunete ebe ejai Okoku loka etuŋanan apedor kakwap aisioni adiakanareta,” (kolimok lokasenyan ebe,) “Katemari jo atiar, Konyou, kibwok ekoniitada, kolot orekon.”
Atipet konyou kakonyenekec, kibwok akeperit, kolot oreke, itopoloorit Edeke.
Koumokis kere, kitopoloorito Edeke; kilelebunos akurian, kobalas ebe, “Kiany lolo nukaumokin.”
Kinyek kere, konyoi: kotupa ŋes.
Kirurumakis Iparisayon ka ikewadikakakec ikekesisiak kobalas ebe, “Kanukinyo inyamiata imasiata da nepepe ka iketelemak esolo ka ikadiakanarak da?”
Koboŋok Yesu kotema kes atiar, “Lukaŋaleok mam ipudas emurwon; dimarai lukadekak.
Mam abunit anyarit ikadolitok, dimarai ikadiakanarak tetere itoronikinos.”
Kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Eluŋete ikesisiak luka Yokana irwan ipu, ka ailip; ikote nen da ikesisiak luka Iparisayon; konye lukon enyamete emasete da.”
Kotema Yesu kes atiar, “Ipedorete kereka aituluŋ luenyaritai opucit loka eiterane, naejaatar keteran?
Konye eponito apaarasia, nuedemarere eteran, eluŋete do kapaarasia kaŋun.”

Kolimok kes awaragan, ebe, “Emamei yeneciluni atutubet kanapito nakitetet, ka adonyokin ŋes anapito namojoŋ; arai kikonaki nen eciluni nakitetet, atutubet da naecilunio kama kanakitetet, mam ecamanaros kanamoion.
Emamei da yenebukokini ebino loitet oriagin lukemukule lumojoŋ; arai kikonaki nen, ecili ebino loitet iriagin, ebukor ebino, imadiŋikinos iriagin da.
Konye ebukonokinio ebino loitet oriagin lukitetiak.
Kwabo emamei yenemasi ebino loikuniatai, yenekoto loitet; naarai ebala ebe, ‘Ejok loikuniatai.’ ”
Konye ice koParisayon kotemasi atiar, “Kanukinyo iswamaata yesi numam ibus kapaaran nakasabato?”
Koboŋok Yesu kotema kes atiar, “Mam isiomito na nakiswamai Daudi, nakeriebia eteŋei, ŋes ka ikepaup;
kwape kelomaria togo loka Edeke, kolem imugatin luka aitodikin, konyam, koinak da ikepaup; lumam ibus ainyam dimarai isasedotin bonik?”
Kotema kes atiar, “Okoku loka etuŋanan ŋes ejakait loka asabato.”
Kiteikinito ikewadikak ka Iparisayon, aanyun arai itaŋaleuni kapaaran nakasabato; tetere edumunete akirot nakiwosaet ŋes.
Konye kojeni akeceomisio; kolimok etuŋanan lokejai akan nakewonit ebe, “Konyou, kobwo kokidiŋ.” Konyou ŋesi kobwo.
Kotema Yesu kes atiar, “Keŋisit yes ebe, Ibus kereka aswam nuejok kapaaran nakasabato, arai bo aswam nueroko, aitajar aijar arai bo amudiar?”
Kosesen kes kere, kolimok je ebe, “Korio akonikan.” Kikonak nen: koŋaleu akekan,
Konye kilelebun kes anyunyura, kinerut bonik nuiswamakinete Yesu.
Kiwala akwap, konyarau ikekesisiak; koseu itomon ka luarei kotomakec, luabu komaik ikiyakia;
Simon, loamaikini Petero, ka Anderea onaceke, ka Yakob ka Yokana, ka Pilip ka Batolomayo,
ka Matayo ka Tomas, ka Yakob okoku loka Alupayo, ka Simon loenyaritai Selot,
ka Yuda okoku loka Yakob, ka Yuda Isikariot, lokebilakini ŋes ebotet.
ŋul da lukiticanete imoyon lueroko aponi kitaŋaleunoi.
Kokotos lukokodet kere atiror ŋes; naarai kolom apedor kamakeŋ kitaŋaleu kes kere.
“Isirereŋitoi yes lukican; naarai ajakanut naka Edeke erai nakus.
“Isirereŋitoi yes luimonyete kwana: naarai ikieniete.
Kolelakis ka eicur apaaran ŋin: naarai koany, epol ekusiropit kotoma akui: naarai kikonakis, lukapapaakec inabin kwaŋin.
“Itukwi yes, luikienasi kwana! Naarai ipote aibworo ka aimony.
kilipakis arereŋ ŋul lukilamete, kilipakis da ŋul lukireito yes.
Yenikibapi eitinyo, kibelok loce da; yenikidemari ekonilou, sirikimik ekaso da.
Koinak ŋinituŋanan kere yenikilipi; yenikidemari jo ikoniboro sirikiburau bobo.
Kwape ikototor ituŋa aikonakin yes, kikonakis yesi da kes kwape kwaŋin.
“Arai iminasi ŋul lukiminasi yes, kimalao kanuka inyo? Naarai ikadiakanarak da eminasi lueminasi kes.
Arai da iswamakinete nuejok ŋul lukiswamakinete yes nuejok, kimalao kanuka inyo? Naarai ikadiakanarak da iswamaete kwape kwaŋin.
Arai da iyuunete ŋul luimunos adumun kamakec, kimalao kanuka inyo? Ikadiakanarak da eyuunete ikadiakanarak tetere edumunete ŋupeŋul bobo.

Konye kominasi lukasurupokus, kiswamakisi nuejok, koyuut, komam ijuruŋuŋito; epol rwaru ekusiropit, iraunete yesi idwe luka Je kaloejai kuju kakuj: naarai esiana ŋesi mama kalumam imalaete ka lueroko da.
Koraas luketimok, kwape eraar Papakus loketimon.
koinakisi, yes da kiinakinio; aitemis naejok, naicikakinitai, naijaŋijaŋitai, kiton abukonor, ŋin ŋes kiinakinete ituŋa atorobusiokus. Naarai aitemis naitemioto, ŋipeŋin kitemere yes da.”
Mam ekesisian itelekari ekesisianakinanike, konye ŋinituŋanan yenituutooritai cut erianakinos ka ekesisianakinanike.
Aso kanukinyo isesenia igugut yenejai akoŋu naka onacekon, komam ipodo akitoi naejai akoŋukon kilopet?

Arai ipedori biai alimokin onacekon ebe, ‘Onaceka, kinyek kalem igugut yenejai akoŋukon’, komam iseseni akitoi naejai akoŋukon kilopet? Yenikesoswai ijo, kolem ber akitoi naejai akoŋukon, kosodi konyet asesen kotenan alemun igugut kakoŋu naka onacekon.
“Naarai emamei ekitoi loejok loerai araito nukaronok; karaida ekitoi loerono loerai araito nuejok.
Naarai ejenunio ŋolikitoi kanuka araitoke. Naarai kotoma okukwa mam ituŋa edeŋete itinin, karaida toma okodokodo aideŋ imusabibun.
Itolomuni ituŋanan yenejok nuejok kotoma kanuejok nuiŋadakinit otauke; ituŋanan da yenikaronon itolomuni nukaronok kotoma kanueroko nuiŋadakinit: naarai inera akeituk nuilapununos kotauke.
Kanukinyo kinyaritotor eoŋ ebe, ‘Ejakait, Ejakait,’ kwabo mam iswamaete nuabala eoŋ?
Ŋinituŋanan kere yenebuni mamakaŋ, kiira da akakiro ka aswam kes, ketodikini yes kwape eputor:
Eputos bala ekadukon etogo, loeboki kwap noi, epesikini apetetait atiida; naeleleunia akalel, naeretonokinotor akip nukecor togo ŋol, mam epedori aijaŋijaŋa: naarai edukitoi ejok.
Konye yenepupuni, komam iswamai, eputos bala lokeduki eketogo alup komamei apetetait; koretonokinos akip nukecor togo ŋol, atipet kibiror; kepol da atiyakinike.”
Kejai ekapolokiton-erioŋet ekebulesit lokemina noi, lokedeka eapikinit airidakin,
Nakiiraria ŋol eemut loka Yesu, kiyakia imakio luka Iyudayan ailip ŋes abunore aitaŋaleun ekebulesit.
Nakedolioto kesi mama ejai Yesu, kiŋaiŋaata noi, kobalas ebe, “Ibus ŋesi, kiswamaki nu:
naarai emin awokoteker, kidukok sio akositukos.”
Kouparos Yesu kakes, Nakeapikinia etogoke, kiyakik ekapolokiton ikepapero kotema atiar, “Ejakait, sirikitaar: naarai mam eoŋ kebusakinit jo alomun kwap kekaswi.
Ŋes mam aomitor aibusakin abunore mamakon: konye kolim akirot bon, eŋaleuni ekatelepat.
Naarai eoŋ da arai etuŋanan lokayaitai, ejaas iserikalei luayait eoŋ: ido alimokini ediopet ebe, ‘Kolot’, elosi; ece da ebe, ‘Bia,’ ebuni; ekabulesit da ebe, ‘Kiswama na,’ ido iswamai.”
Nakiiraria Yesu akiro ŋun, koumok kanukeŋ, kibelokin kolimok ekodet loketupit ŋes ebe, “Katemari yes atiar, Mam lem adumunit aiyuun naepol naetia na, karaida toma Isirael kere.”
Nakeboŋoriata lueyakunitai ore, kodumut ebulesit keŋaleu.
Kosodi kanen ketubor apak naedit kolot ore loenyaritai Nain, koupas ikekesisiak kaŋes ka ekodet loepol.
Nakeapiaria orute loka ere, koany, kibwokunitai lokatwan kiŋa, lokerai loteluna, totoke da kerai apuserut: kejaas ituŋa luipu lukore nenipe kaŋes.
Nakeanyunia Ejakait ŋin kitim, kotema ŋes atiar, “Sirikimony.”
Kikunyak kotiro ekirigi lokibwokitere, kobwout lukibwokito. Kotema atiar, “Etelepat, katemari jo atiar, Konyou.”
Kiboikin lokatwan kogeu einer. Koinak ŋes totoke.
Kokuriakaros kere; kitopoloosi Edeke, kobalas ebe, “Atakanu cama enabi lokapolon kamawok!” ebe da, “Aanyana Edeke iketuŋol”
Kisiarakinos akiro ŋun toma Yudaya kere, ka akwap kere naidunyatar.
Kenyarau Yokana iarei kokesisiakake kiyakia mama ejai Ejakait, iŋisit ebe, “Irai kereka ijo ŋol loebunit, arai bo kedarata ece?”
Nakedolioto ituŋa mamakeŋ, kobalas ebe, “Kijukunit Yokana Lokebatisan sio mamakon iŋisit ebe, ‘Irai kereka ijo ŋol Iocbunit, arai bo kedarata ece?’ ”
Kosawa kaŋol kitaŋaleu luipu akecedekesia, ka ican ka imoyon lueroko; koinak imudukiok luipu aanyun.

Koboŋok kotema kes atiar, “Koloto, kolimokis Yokana ŋun nuianyut ka nuiirarito da; ekwenyunete imudukiok, elosete iŋwalasik, iswagio lukatapon, epupete ikimiŋiok, itajario lukatwak, elimonokinio da lukican akiro nukajokak.
Isirereŋitoi da ŋol lomam itiguikin kanukaŋ.”
Kosodi kedaut ikiyakia luka Yokana alosit, kogeu alimokin ikodeta nuka Yokana ebe, “Kilomarete alosit amodiŋ aanyun inyo? Egada lokijaŋijaŋ! ekwam?
Konye bo kilomarete asesen inyo? Etuŋanan lokenapit anapito naanebek? Koany, luisiritoi kaluibusak, luenyamete da luetaitaete, ejaas toma alaroi nuka ikabakan.
Konye kilomarete asesen inyo? Enabi? Eebo, katemari yes atiar, loitelekarit enabi.
Ŋol ŋes iwadikatere nu ebe,
‘Koany, ejukari ekakiyakia kakonyenekon,
Loitemonokini ekonirot kakonyenekon.’
(Nakiirariata ituŋa kere, ka iketelemak esolo da, kitogogoŋoto adolit naka Edeke, naarai kibatisauna kaibatisa naka Yokana.
Konye koŋeroto Iparisayon ka iricakisila ainerun naka Edeke, naarai mam apotu kibatisaunos kamakeŋ.)
“Aso do etupusi kinyo ituŋa luka atur kana, eputosi kesi kinyo?
Eputosi kidwe luiboiete kagwelanaret, konyaras, kobalas ebe,
‘Kikut alamarun, mam yes esoma;
Kibwolol, mam yes emonya.’
Kobu Okoku loka etuŋanan enyami emasi da; ibalasi yesi ebe, ‘Koany, ekeraŋat lo, ekameran da, epapero loka iketelemak esolo ka ikadiakanarak!’
Konye ikedwe kere kes itojokere Acoa.”
Ido koany, kepupu aberu nakore kaŋol, nakerai nakadiakanaran ebe eboikin togo loka Eparisayot ainyam, koyau ekube loka akinyet;
kobwo kokauke koapie kakejeke, emonyi, kogeu aitodoonokin akiyo akejeke, koninana kitima luka akouke, konu akejeke, kinyonyoanak akinyet.
Keanyu Eparisayot lokenyararit, kotema kotauke atiar, “Arai kerai etuŋanan lo enabi, tikejenu aberu ŋin erai iŋai, ido nakepone enyoin, naetironori ŋes, naarai erai nakadiakanaran.”
Koboŋok Yesu kotema atiar, “Simon, ejai akirot naakoto alimokin jo.” Kotema atiar, “Aso, Ekesisianakinan, kiner.”
Kotema atiar, “Kejaas etuŋanan kalukapesen iarei; kiburai ediopet adenarin akwat akany, lokiareit da akaisakany.
Amameete kes nutacet, abu kitim kes kere iarei. Kotoma kes luarei, iŋai bo eminuni ŋes aitelekarit?”
Koboŋok Simon ebe, “Aomit ebe je lokisionio nuipu.” Kotema ŋes atiar, “Itub kotenan.”
Kibelokin mama ejai aberu kotema ŋesi Simon atiar, “Iany ijo aberu na? Alom eoŋ togokon, mam jo einakina akipi nuka akejeka, konye na etodoonoki akiyo akejeka ka anina da kitimake.
Mam jo ibu konu eoŋ, konye ameun napenan alomunia mam na inyeina ainu noi akakeje.
Mam jo ibu kinyonyo akinyet akouka, konye na enyonyo akinyet akejeka,
Kanuka ŋun katemari jo atiar, Isionio akediakanareta nuipu, naarai epol akemin; konye yenisionio nuikidioko, edit akemin.”
Kotema ŋesi ŋin atiar, “Esionii akonidiakanareta.”
Kosodete kogeutu lukemorete kaŋes atemanar atiar, “Iŋai ca lo, loisioniei adiakanareta?”
Kotema ŋesi aberu atiar, “Kitajar jo akoniiyuun; kolot inapakina.”
ka aŋor ace nukitaŋaleunitai imoyon lueroko ka adekesia, Mariam naenyaritai Magadalene, nakelomunete ajokin akanykaarei,
ka Yoana aberu naka Kusa ekeŋadan loka Kerode, ka Susana, ka ace nuipu nukijaanakinete kiborokec lukejaatar.
“Abu ekayean koloma aiye ikekinyom; napeyei, kodooto ice ariri kerot; kicakacakai, konyama ikweny luka apak.
Kodooto ice aŋaŋam; nakegeuniata abwaŋun, kooko, kanuemameatar akip.
Kodooto ice okukwa; kopolooto ikukwa kakes, koridakis,
Kodooto ice alup nuejok, kopolooros, koraata araito kiton akwatat.” Nakinerar akiro ŋun, kiworo ebe, “Yenejaas aki nuka akiirar, kiira.”
Kiŋita ŋes ikekesisiak ebe inyo bo apolou kawaragan kaŋin.
Kotema atiar, “Kiinakinitai yes ajenun nukaiyeiyea nuka ajakanut naka Edeke; konye ice kawaragasia; tetere eanyunete komam eanyunete, ido iirarete komam ejenunete.
Aso apolou naka awaragan ŋes nata: Ekinyomit ŋes akirot naka Edeke.
Kwi da lukariri kerot kes lukiirarete; kosodi ebuni Satan, alemar akirot kotauonokec, tetere mam iyuunete ka aitajario da.
Kwi da lukaŋaŋam kes lukiirarete kocamut akirot kailel; konye komameete alias, iyuunete nediokasilon, kosodete kapak naka acodunio etiakaros,
Kwi da lukedoete okukwa, kes lukiirarete, ido kelototo koridakinos aiyaloŋoŋ, ka abar, ka aiyalama naka aijar, komam ititionete adioraito.
Kwi da luka alup nuejok, kes luka itauon luitenara luejok lukiirarete akirot, koricito, koraata araito katitiŋikin.
Naarai emamei akirot naibwaitai, namam ikujunio, karaida naimunonitai namam ejenunio ka aikujunio.
Aso kocoito kwape ipupioto; naarai yenejai ibore, einakinio ice; ka yenemamei ibore, edemunio ŋin da yeneomit ŋesi ebe ejaatar.”
Kolimokinai ebe, “Ebwoete totokon ka ikoniinacan kokiŋa; ekotosi aanyun jo.”
Konye Koboŋok kotema kes atiar, “Totoka ka ikainacan kes ŋul luiirarete akirot naka Edeke, kiswamata da.”
Konye napikwaŋasi kojotoor ŋesi, kokut ekwam loepol kaŋolol; kogeut akipi ailelebun ataker, kojaut toma ationis.
Koloto mama ejai kitwekenyut, kobalas ebe, “Ekapolon, ekapolon ba, kitwaka.” Kokweny ŋesi, kiretak ekwam ka agat naka akipi: kopalasi kojaun aiyamakin.
Kotema kes atiar, “Ani bo aiyuunikus?” Kokuriakata, koumokis, kotemanaros atiar, “Aso iŋai bo lo, naarai icorakini kiton ikwamin ka akipi da, korimarete?”
Nakedokunia koitolima, kiriamunos ketuŋanan loka ore kaŋol lokejaas ajokin; apak naepol mam anapit inapen, mam abu kosal togo, konye toma atesin,
Nakeanyunia ŋol Yesu, kilala, kibirokin kakonyeneke, kiner keporoto loepol ebe, “Anyoika eoŋ kajo, Yesu, Osoku loka Edeke loejai kuju kakuj? Keŋaiŋait, sirikiitican eoŋ.”
Naarai abu kicorak emoyo loerono alomun kotuŋanan. (Naarai kikamununei ŋes irwan ipu; kidareneno, koenen kirikoi ka iloin; koŋedeŋedei lukeenitere; kokerianara ŋes ajokit amodiŋ.)
Kiŋit Yesu ŋes ebe, “Ekonikiror iŋai?” Kobala ebe, “Ajore,” naarai kelomakinitos ŋes ajokin nuipu.
Kiŋaiŋaata ŋes sirikicorak kes alomar aipany.
Kejai nen esipan loka ipegei luipu edakasi oroŋat; kiŋaiŋaata ŋes acamakin kes alomar opegei. Kocamak kes,
Kolomut ajokin kotuŋanan, kolomasi toma opegei: komotar esipan kaneijululuei, kibirokin aŋolol, kotwakikis akipi.
Nakeanyuniata ikecokok nuadoikis, kokerata, kisiarakis akiro toma ore kamanat da.
Koloto aanyun nuadoikis; kopotu mama ejai Yesu, kodumut etuŋanan lokelomunete ajokin, iboie kakejen nuka Yesu, enapit igoen, kejokiar adam; kokuriakaros.
Ŋul da luapotu koanyut kitejenut kes kwape kitaŋaleunere ŋol lolem ajaas ajokin,
Kosodete ituŋa kere luka akwap naka Igerasenin airiamar kilipa ŋes anyoun kamakec; naarai kikam kes akurian naepol; kodoka ataker, koboŋo.
Konye kilip etuŋanan lokelomunete ajokin aup kaŋes; konye kotwar, kobala ebe,
“Koboŋo orekon, kolimonok nukapolok nukiswamak jo Edeke.” Kolot, kolimonok anatar ere kere nukapolok nukiswamakini ŋes Yesu.
Ido koany, kobu etuŋanan ekekiror Yairo, lokerai ekayaiton loka atukos; kibirokin akejen nuka Yesu, kiŋaiŋa ŋes alomar togoke;
Naarai kejai ŋes apese nateluna, naka ikar itomon ka luarei, keapikinit atwanare.
Konye napelosi koridakis ikodeta,
Kosodi aberu nakedeka alele nakaokot ikar itomon ka luarei, naketacakinit imurwok lukejaatar kere, komam epedori ituŋanan aitaŋaleun,
komanu kokauke, kotiro atwele naka anapitoke; atipet kosaŋ alele nakaokotoke.
Kotema Yesu atiar, “Iŋai bo katiro?” Kosodete nakeŋerioto ituŋa kere, kobala Petero ebe, “Ekapolon, kilukut jo ikodeta kiridakis da!”
Konye kotema Yesu atiar, “Katiro ma ituŋanan: naarai amisiik ebe alom apedor kamakaŋ.”
Nakeanyunia aberu ebe mam epedori aibwaio, kobu emarani, kibirokin akonyeneke, kitejenu kakonyen nuka ituŋa kere akiro nukeinakinete ŋes atiror, ido kwape kitaŋaleunere atipet.
Kotema ŋes atiar, “Akokuka, kitaŋaleu jo akoniiyuun; kolot inapakina.”
Napinera ŋun, kobu etuŋanan kore loka ekayaiton loka atukos, kobala ebe, “Adaun akoonipese; sirikitaar bobo Ekesisianakinan.”
Konye nakiiraria Yesu ŋun koboŋok ebe, “Sirikikurianar; konye kiyuu aiyuun, itajario.”
Nakedolio togo, mam abu kisunup ituŋanan alomar nepepe kaŋes, dimarai Petero, ka Yokana, ka Yakob, ka papa loka ikoku ka totoke.
Kokienatar ŋes noi, naarai kejenete ebe adau ikoku atwanare.
Konye kitiŋ akekan, kiworo ebe, “Ipese, kokweny.”
Koboŋu ekemoyo, atipet konyou; kicorak ainakin ŋes inyamat.
Koumokis ikekauriak; konye kicor kes kinyeis alimokin ituŋanan nukiswamao.
Kiyakia kes alimonokin ajakanut naka Edeke, ka aitaŋaleun da lukadekak.
Kotema kes atiar, “Sirikiyaŋaasi ibore kere yenikerot, karaida ebela, karaida ecoe, karaida inyamat, karaida apesan, karaida ajaut kikason iarei.
Kaŋolitogo loilomanarete, kosalenenete nen, aitodol nainyounioto alosit.
Ŋul lumam kisukunyikinete yes, nainyounioto kotoma ore kaŋol, kilakilakenenete adae nuka akejenekus araut akajenak kamakec.”
Koloto kesi, kiriamas ireria, elimonokinete Akiro Nukajokak, ka aitaŋaleun da kaŋiniibois.
ka ice da ebe, “Atakanu Eliya”; ka ice da ebe, “Ajaru ediopet kotoma onabin lukolo sek.”
Kobala Kerode ebe, “Abu kajepa akou naka Yokana; konye iŋai bo lo loapupi eoŋ akiro nuetia nen?” Kokoto aanyun ŋes.
Konye nakejenuniata ikodeta kotupasi ŋes; kisukunyik kes kaiyalama kolimok kes nuka ajakanut naka Edeke, kitaŋaleu da lukipudas aitaŋaleunio,
Kejotaki akoloŋ; kopotu lutomon kaarei mama ejai, kotemasi atiar, “Kotwar ekodet, tetere elosete toma oreria ka amanat da nuidunyatar, kodumutu neeperete ka inyamat da; naarai kijaa ne amodiŋ.”
Konye kotema kes atiar, “Koinakisi yesi kes lunyaman.” Kotemasi atiar, “Emamei sio ibore yenedeparit imugatin ikany ka agaria aarei; arai mam kilosit agwelakin etuŋat lo kere inyamat.”
Naarai emwaasi ikiliok bala ilukumin ikany. Kotema ikekesisiak atiar, “Kisiboikis kes katukon bala akaisakany ŋinitukot.”
Kiswamata kwaŋin, kisiboikis kes kere.
Kolem imugatin lukany, ka agaria aarei, kosesen akuj, kisirereŋ kes, kobilibil; koinak ikesisiak akoranakin ekodet.
Konyama, kimonikinos kere; kotukonokinai atutubeta nuabilibila nukesalete, iditai itomon ka luarei.
Koboŋokis ebe, “Yokana Lokebatisan; konye ice Eliya; ice da ebe ajaru ediopet konabin lukolo sek.”
Kotema kes atiar, “Ido bo yes kibalas ebe arai eoŋ iŋai?” Koboŋok Petero ebe, “Ijoŋ Kristo loka Edeke.”
Konye kicor kes, kisimik alimokin idiotuŋanan akirot ŋin.
Kobala ebe, “Ibusakinit Okoku loka etuŋanan aiticanio nuipu, egirete da imakio ka isasedotin lupeti ka ikewadikak, ka aiar, kapaaran da nakiwuniet ejaruni.”
Kolimok kes kere ebe, “Arai ekoto ituŋanan aitup eoŋ, koŋerokin ilopet, korioŋ ekemusalaba ŋinipaaran, katup eoŋ.
Naarai ŋin yenekoto aitajar akeijar etwaniari; konye ŋin yenetwaniari akeijar kanukaŋ, itajari ŋes,
Naarai ajokis anyoin arai kedumu ituŋanan akwapin kere, kitoolio arai kotwania akeijar?
Naarai yenirumete ileic kanukaŋ, kanuka akakiro da, irumete ileic Okoku loka etuŋanan da kanukeŋ, naebunio kaibusesuke, ka naka Papa, ka naka imalaikan da lukalaunak.
Konye abeit katemari yes atiar, Ejaas ice kaluebwoete kane lumam iirete cut atwanare aitodol neaanyuniata ajakanut naka Edeke.”
Napilipi, kogelakin epone loke ereeteke, kiliacanata ikenapen komwekimwekete,
Ido koany, kineras ituŋa iarei kaŋes, lukeraas Musa ka Eliya;
luketakanete kaibuses, kineras akiro nuka atwanareke naelosi ŋesi aitodolikin koYerusalem.
Kilurunito Petero ka lukejaas kaŋes ajo; konye nakekwenyuniata koanyutu aibusesuke, ka kwi da iarei lukebwoete kaŋes,
Kosodi kanen, napetiakas kaŋes, kotema Petero Yesu atiar, “Ekapolon, ejok oni ajaut ne; aso keswamata iswamin iuni; ediopet lokon, ediopet loka Musa, ka ediopet da loka Eliya.” Komam ejeni nukinera.
Napinera ŋesi ŋun, kobu edou, kiteribo kes; kokuriakaros nakelomariata odou.
Kolom eporoto kotoma odou, kobala ebe, “Lo ŋes Okokuka, loseunaka; kiirasi ŋes.”
Napinera eporoto ŋol, kotakan Yesu bon. Kililiŋata kesi, komam elimokinete idiotuŋanan kapaarasia kaŋun adiokirot kanuaanyut.
Ido koany, kiworo etuŋanan kotoma okodet ebe, “Ekesisianakinan, keŋaiŋait, koany ikakoku; naarai erai ikateluna;
Ido koany, ikamununei ajokit ŋes, atipet isilalai; bobo da kisiilio, kokui ekuetete, mam inyeini dimarai kationis, idecideci ŋes,
eŋaiŋa ikonikesisiak aireŋear ŋes, konye mam epedoro.”
Koboŋok Yesu kotema atiar, “Wu okwe yes atur namam iyuunit, naepaarit, etodoli eoŋ ai ajaut kayes, ka atitiŋikinit da yes? Koyau ma ikonikoku ne.”
Napebuni kibirok ajokit kwap, kisiilio. Kiretak Yesu ajokit naerono, kitaŋaleu isapat kinyakak papake.
Koumokis kere apolou naka Edeke.
Konye napeumokinitos kere akiro kere nueswamai, kotema ŋesi ikekesisiak atiar,
“Kitolomasi akiro nu akiikus; naarai einakinio Okoku loka etuŋanan akanin nuka ituŋa.”
Konye mam kes apotu kojenut akirot ŋin, kimunonitai kamakec, kinyeis amisiikin; koyoŋata aiŋit apolou naka akirot kaŋin.
Konye kejen Yesu epeget loka itauonokec, koyau ikoku yenididi, kisibwo kodieke,

kotema kes atiar, “Ŋin yenisukunyikini ikoku yen kokirorika kesukunyikinit eoŋ, ŋin da yenikesukunyikini eoŋ, isukunyikinit ŋol lokejukuni; naarai loerai loedit kokidiŋikus kere, ŋol ŋes erai lokapolon.”
Koboŋok Yokana kotema atiar, “Ekapolon, kipou kaanyutu etuŋanan ireŋeari ajokin kokirorikon, kesimika ŋes, naarai mam kiupa kaoni.”
Konye Yesu kotema ŋes atiar, “Sirikisimika; naarai ŋol lomam erai lokasurupikus, erai lokowaikus.”
Kijuka ikiyakia aliŋakin ŋes, koloto kolomasi ore loka Isamarian tetere itemokinete kanukeŋ;
konye mam kes apotu kisukunyikis, naarai atereit akekonyen aibe Yerusalem.
Keanyut ikekesisiak Yakob ka Yokana ŋun, kobalas ebe, “Ejakait, ikoto kecorakis akim kodoku kokuju komudia kes [kwape kolo eswamaa Eliya]?”
Konye kibelokin, kitoron kes, [kotema atiar, “Mam ijenete epone loka emoyo loejai kayes. Naarai mam abunit Okoku loka etuŋanan amudiar aijar naka ituŋa, dimarai aitajar.”]
Koloto ore ece.
Kotema Yesu ŋes atiar, “Ejaas ikuwei apanya, akweny da nuka apak ejaas akaisikec; konye Okoku loka etuŋanan emamei nama iperikini akekou.”
Kotema ŋesi ece atiar, “Kotupunai.” Konye kobala ebe, “Ejakait, kisiikinai ber kalot keda papaka.”
Konye kotema ŋes atiar, “Kinye lukatwak kidaata lukarwakakec; konye jo, kolot kolimono ajakanut naka Edeke.”
Kobala ece da ebe, “Ejakait, katupenenei jo; konye kisiikinai ber katwar ituŋa lukokaleka.”
Konye Yesu kotema ŋes atiar, “Emamei yenetiŋit emeleku lokimoŋin, kosesen kau, yenibusakinit ajakanut naka Edeke.”
Kotema kes atiar, “Ipu idwenyan, konye ikidioko ikeswamak; aso kilipa Ejakait loka aidweny kijuk ikeswamak toma aidwenyeke.
Koloto yesi; koany, keyakiari yes kwape idwe luka amerekekin kokidiŋ opeen.
Sirikiyata eriagi, karaida ecoe, karaida amuk; sirikiyogata da ituŋanan korot.
Ido ŋolitogo loilomanarete, kotemasi ber atiar, ‘Kojau ainapakin togo lo!’
Arai kejaun okoku loka ainapakin kanen, esalakini ŋes ainapakinikus; arai mam, kiboŋokini yes ainapakinikus.
Kosalata ber togo ŋopeŋol, inyamete komasete lukiinakinete yes, naarai edolit ekeswaman aropio; siribwosenenete otogoi ice.
Ido ŋolire kere loilomanarete kiisukunyikis, konyamata inyamat lukiinakinete yes;
kitaŋaleununete lukadekak luejaas nen, kolimonokinete ebe, ‘Ekunyu ajakanut naka Edeke mamakus.’
Konye ere kere loilomanarete, arai mam kisukunyikinete, kolomutu orotinike, kineras ebe.
Kilakilakanakini yes adae nukakejenekosi; konye kojenutu na ebe, ‘Ekunyu ajakanut naka Edeke mamakus.’
Katemari yes atiar, Kapaaran kaya, epatana Sodom atitiŋikin aitelekarit ere ŋol.
Konye apaaran naka etube epatanikini Turo ka Sidon atitiŋikin aitelekarit yes.
Ka jo da Kaparanaum, kitopoloorio kereka kiton akuj? Kijesario do kiton Okatwak.
Kosodete koboŋut kwi akaisakanykaarei kaiyalama, kobalas ebe, “Ejakait, kononokikis sio ajokin da kokirorikon!”
Kotema kes atiar, “Aany Satan ibiruni kokuju kwape keimilia.
Koany, kainakinit yes apedor aicakacak imunwo ka ikiritona, ido kama ejai apedor kere naka lokasurup; emamei da ibore kere yenikikonakini yes erono.
Konye sirikiyalamikinos kanu kinonokikiniata yes ajokin; konye kiyalamikinos naarai iwadikatai ikusikiroria kotoma akuj.”
Kainak Papaka iboro kere; ido emamei yenejeni Okoku dimarai Papa, kwabo emamei yenejeni Papa dimarai Okoku, ka ŋin da yenekot Okoku apukokin ŋes.”
Kosodi kibelokin mama ejaas ikekesisiak, kiner kakes kaiyeiyea ebe, “Isirereŋitoi akonye nuesesenete nuisesenete yesi.
Naarai katemari yes atiar, ‘Apotu kimielas inabin luipu ka ikabakan aanyun nuisesenete yesi, mam eanyuna, ka akiirar da nuiirarete yesi, mam iirara.’ ”
Kotema ŋes atiar, “Iwadikatai bo inyo toma okisila? Isiomi biai?”
Koboŋok ŋes ebe, “Komina Ejakait Ekonideke kekonitau kere, ka akoniijar kere, ka akonigogoŋ kere, ka akonicoa kere; ka ekoniidunyet da kwape iminari bon.”
Kotema ŋes atiar, “Iboŋok kotenan; kikonaki nen, ijari.”
Konye ŋes ekoto aitoiokikin, kiŋit Yesu ebe, “Iŋai bo ekaidunyet?”
Koboŋok Yesu kobala ebe, “Abu etuŋanan kijesar anyoun koYerusalem alosit Yeriko, kiriamunos kikaŋatak, lukelacarete ŋes inapen, kibuŋata, koloto kinyeis eapie airidakin.
Kosodi kanen kitor esasedoti orot ŋol; nakeanyunia ŋes, kinac kotubor,
Elebit da kwape kwaŋin, nakedolio aibois ŋin, koany ŋes, kinac kotubor.
Konye Esamariat ediopet kalositeke, kedol nen nekejai; nakeanyunia, kitim ŋes,
kikunyak koen akemusuŋun, kobukok akinyet ka ebino; kibwanenik otiaŋake koyaŋa kiton togo loka ipejok, kimuke,
Apaaran nakiareit kolem adenarin
Iŋai kaŋul kaluuni loiwomit ijo araut ekeidunyet kaje kalokiriamunos kikaŋatak”
Kotema atiar, “Ŋol lokitimi ŋes.” Kolimok Yesu ŋes ebe, “Kolot ijo da, kikonak nen.”
Kejai ŋes kainacike naenyaritai Mariam, nakiboie kakejen nuka Yesu, iirari akekiro,
Konye abu Marita kitaaritoi kanuka aijaanakin naapol; kolot mama ejai Yesu kotema ŋes atiar, “Ejakait, mam kereka ipodo ebe kenyeinia kinacika aijaanakin bon? Aso kolimok ŋes keŋarak eoŋ.”
Konye Koboŋok Ejakait kotema atiar, “Marita, Marita, iyaloŋoŋoi ilolonyi da kanuka akiro nuipu;
konye ipudai luikidioko, arai bo idiopet bon; naarai aseu Mariam ewai loejok, lomam edemario ŋes.”
Kotema kes atiar, “Nailipiata, kineras ebe, Papakosi loejai toma akuj, ekonikiror kitalaunai. Akonijakanut kobu. Nuikoto kiswamai kakwap, kwape iswamaere kotoma akuj.
Koinanakinai sio ikosinyamat luka ŋinipaaran;
Kisionioi sio akosidiakanareta; naarai kisioniei isio lukapeseninikosi. Sirikiya sio toma acodunio, konye koyuunai sio kama ejai lokaronon.”
Kotema kes atiar, “Iŋai kayesi yenejai ekepapero, kelot mama ejai kidiŋ kuare, kotema ŋes atiar, ‘Opaperoka, koyuunai ber kimugatin iuni;
naarai adolu ekapapero mamaka ebuni kalosit, emamei eoŋ idiobore yenainakini ŋes ainyam’;
eboŋokini lokotogo ebe, ‘Sirikiitapas eoŋ; egolol ekek, kiperi eoŋ nepepe kikadwe koitada; mam apedori anyoun ainakin jo’?
Katemari yes atiar, Karaida mam enyouni ainakin naarai erai ekepapero, konye kanuka akeiŋaiŋait enyouni einakini ŋes luipuda kere.
Katemari yes atiar, Kilipa, kiinakinio; komoata, idumunete; kikuŋukuŋoto, kiŋaikinio,
Naarai ŋin yenilipi ijaikinio, yenemoi edumuni, ka yenikuŋukuŋi da enaikinio.
Iŋai bo kayesi erai papa, arai kilipi ikokuke emugati, einakini tope amoru? Arai bo agar, ido aibois kagar einakini tope ŋes emun?
Arai kilip abeet, einakini tope ekiriton?
Aso arai yes lukaronok ijenete ainakin ikusidwe ainakineta nuejok, mam kereka itelekarit noi Papakus loejai toma akuj ainakin ŋul luilipete ŋes Emoyo Lokalaunan?”
Konye kobalas ice kakesi ebe, “Ireŋeari ŋesi ajokin kanuka Beelesebul ekapolon loka ajokin.”
Kocodut ice, kokotosi aanyunet naebuni kotoma akuj.
Konye kejeni ŋesi akeceomisio, kotema kes atiar, “Ŋinijakanut naetiakatiakaun asurokin bon emudiar; arai etogo ketogo ibiror.
Aso arai etiakatiakaun Satan bon, ikonakini ai akejakanut icasi? Naarai ibalasi yesi ebe ereŋeari eoŋ ajokin kanuka Beelesebul.
Aso arai ereŋeari eoŋ ajokin kanuka Beelesebul, ido bo ikusidwe ireŋearete kanuka iŋai? Kanuka ŋun ŋes eraatar ŋul ikusikatubok.
Konye arai ereŋeari eoŋ ajokin kebokorit loka Edeke, aso adolu ajakanut naka Edeke mamakus,
Etuŋanan lokagogoŋ ekapi lujiisike idari alaroke, inapakina ikeboro:
Konye naebunokinia ekagogoŋon loedeparit ŋes, ipikori edemari lujiisike kere luamunokina ŋesi, ka akorokor iŋatanake.
Ituŋanan yenimam ejai keoŋ, ŋes yenikekoloka; ituŋanan da yenimam etukonokini keoŋ, isiarakini.
“Kelonu emoyo loerono kotuŋanan, itori aiboisio nuemameete akip, emoot nekiyeŋunet; keoliki, ebala ebe, ‘Aboŋori togoka nekabunio.’
Keboŋu, edumuni epieitai, epesitai da.
Kosodi do elosi eupunos kimoyon ice ikanykaarei luitelekarito ŋes aronis; elomarete kesi da esalete nen; ejautene loka ituŋanan kaŋin lokawasia eraun loerono adepar losodit.”
Konye Yesu kobala ebe, “Konye ca, nuitelekarito, isirereŋitoi luiirarete akirot naka Edeke, koricata da!”
Naarai kwape keraar Yona aanyunet kama ejaas ituŋa luko Ninebe, kwape kwaŋin eraunia Okoku loka etuŋanan kama ejai atur na.

Enyouni akabaka naka Eŋalakimak kapaaran naka etube nepepe kituŋa luka atur kana, itetelekari kes akiro; naarai abu ŋesi kobu kosaŋe loka akwap akiirar acoa naka Solomon, ido koany, ejai ne yenitelekarit Solomon.
Enyounete ikiliok luka Ninebe kapaaran naka etube nepepe katur na itetelekarete ŋes akiro; naarai apotu kesi kitoronikinos kanuka alimonokin naka Yona, ido koany, ejai ne yenitelekarit Yona.
Emamei yeninokokini atala kibwaik aipany arai toma obukit, dimarai ikajakini ocoget, tetere epedorete luelomunete aanyun aica.
Atala naka akuan ŋes akonikoŋu; arai oteni akonikoŋu, akonikuan kere ecai; konye arai erono, akonikuan da emutono.
Aso kocoite kinye aica nakotomakon araun amuton.
Aso arai ecai akonikuan kere, komamei adiotutubet naemutono, ileleba kere aica pas, kwape katala nakinwakakinit jo kaicake.”
Keanyu Eparisayot ŋol koumok, naarai mam ber kilosit eroko enyama.
Kotema Ejakait ŋes atiar, “Kwana yes Iparisayon itesegarete kiŋa kakolin ka asanin, konye kotomakus ileleba aiŋat ka aronis,
Ibaŋiok yesi! Lokesubi lukokuju mere ŋes lokesubi lukotoma da?
Konye koinakisi lukotoma araut ainakineta nukaitim; ido koany, elaete kere kamakus.
Itukwi yes Iparisayon! Naarai iminasi iicoloŋo lukapolou katukosia, ka aiyogao kagwelanareta.
Itukwi yes! Naarai iputos katesin numam etakanete, nuitorito ituŋa komam ejenete.”
Koboŋok ediopet koricakisila kotema ŋes atiar, “Ekesisianakinan, kiner ijo kwaŋin kimoromor sio da.”
Kotema atiar, “Itukwi yes da iricakisila! Naarai isibwokete ituŋa ibwokon lukalaŋirok, konye yes ikulepek mam itirorete ibwokon kediopet kobokorokus.
Itukwi yes! Naarai idukete atesin nuka inabin luapotu lukapapaakus koara.
Aso iraas ikajenak icamunito da aswamisio nuka lukapapaakus; naarai kes lukearete, yes da idukete atesinakec,
Kanuka ŋun inera acoa naka Edeke ebe, ‘Ejukakini kes inabin ka ikiyakia, earete ice kakes, ereete,’
tetere itepesenio atur na aokot nuka inabi; kere, nukebukoros ameun kapetetait naka akwap,
ameun kaokot nuka Abel kiton aokot nuka Sakaria, lokearakinio kidiŋ ketem ka aibois nakalaunan. Eebo, katemari yes atiar, Itepesenio kotoma atur kana.
Itukwi yes iricakisila! Naarai ilemut alacetait naka aijen; mam yes ilomarito, ido itikokinito luakotos alomar.”
Nakelomunia kanen, kogeut ikewadikak ka Iparisayon aridakin jokan, ka aiŋitiŋit akiro nuipu,
kolokata ŋes tetere ipoki kakirot naelomuni kaitukuke.
Konye emamei akirot naimunonitai, namam epukorio; karaida naibwaitai, namam ejenunio,
Aso nuinerata kamuton iirario kaica; ido nuiyeiyeata kagolai nukotoma elimonokinio kokuju otogoi.
“Katemari yes ikapapero atiar, Sirikikuriakaros luearete akuan, kosodi mam bobo nuepedorete aswam.
Konye kekwenyari yes loikuriaka: kokuriaka ŋol loejai apedor kedau aiar acakakin Ogeena; eebo, katemari yes ariar, Kokuriaka ŋol.
Mam kereka egwelete anyiporin akany apesan aarei? Kwabo mam imurwokinio adiopet kakonyen nuka Edeke.
Konye imaritai itima da kere luka akwesikus kere, Sirikuriaka; iraas yesi luketiai adepar anyiporin nuipu.
“Katemari yes atiar, ŋinituŋanan yenikalimori eoŋ kakonyen nuka ituŋa, elimori da Okoku loka etuŋanan ŋes kakonyen nuka imalaikan luka Edeke;
Konye ŋin yenikaŋeri eoŋ kakonyen nuka ituŋa, enerio ŋin da kakonyen nuka imalaikan luka Edeke.
Ŋinituŋanan da yeninera akirot asurokin Okoku loka etuŋanan isionio; konye yeneinyanakini Emoyo Lokalaunan mam isionio.
Nakiyaŋaariata yes akonyen nuka atukosia ka ikayaitok ka lukapolou, sirikiyaloŋoŋoto epone arai akiro nuiboŋokinete arai nuineras;
naarai kisisianakini Emoyo Lokalaunan kosawa kaŋol nuibusakinit einer.”
Kotema ediopet kokodet atiar, “Ekesisianakinan, kolimok onaceka katiakata keoŋ akosikirumet.”
Konye kotema ŋes atiar, “Ikatunanan, iŋai bo kadakakini eoŋ araut ekatubon arai ekakoran kamakus?”
Kotema kes atiar, “Kocoito, kidaras bonik kama ejai airaŋaanut kere; naarai aijar naka ituŋanan mere iboro luipu luejaatar ŋesi.”
Kolimok kes awaragan ebe, “Kebwaŋunito noi alup nuka etuŋanan lokabaran.
Kogeu aomoom kotauke ebe, ‘Kekonak ai, naarai emamei neengadakini ikanyamat?’
Kotema atiar, ‘Ekonakini ne; atiyatiyai idulaaka, ka aje da luitelekarito; eŋadakini nen akakima kere ka ikaboro.’
Atemari akaijar atiar, ‘Aijar, ejaas jo iboro luipu luimonot kanuka ikar luipu; aso kijamam, konyam, komat, kolakara da.’
Konye kotema Edeke ŋes atiar, ‘Ibaŋaana ijo! Ekotoi akoniijar akuare na; iboro da luitemokinit, eraunete lukaŋai?’
Ikoni nen yeniŋadakinit iboro luka akais kanuke elopet, komam ebari mama ejai Edeke.”
Naarai aijar itelekarit inyamat, ka akuan da itelekarit anapito.
Koomito ikuruka ebe mam eyeete kwabo mam idwenyete, emameete aiŋadisia karaida idulaa; konye itanyami kes Edeke, Itelekarito cama yesi noi akweny!
Iŋai bo kayes kiyaloŋoŋ epedori aiyatakin akeibut?
Aso do arai mam ipedorete akirot naedit noi kwaŋin, kanukinyo iyaloŋonooro kanuka ace kere?
Koomito aapecelun, kwape epolooto; mam itaaritos, karaida aoj; konye katemari yes atiar. Ka Solomon da kotoma aibusesuke kere mam esiritoi kojokan kwape adiopet kaŋun.
Aso arai itanapi Edeke kwaŋin inya luka ais, Iuejaas lolo, ecakario moi oupa; itelekarit cama noi aitanap yes, okwe yes luedit aiyuun.
Sirikimoata luinyamete karaida nuimasete, kwabo sirikibuonokinos.
Naarai emooto atekerin kere nuka akwapin ŋun kere: konye ejeni Papakus ebe ipudasi yesi ŋun.
Konye komoata akejakanut, kiyatakinio da ŋun.
Kogwelanasi luijaatar, kokora lukaitim; kodonyonokinos iriagin lumam emojoŋete, emono kotoma akuj lomam iŋoŋar, aibois namam eapikini ekokolan, karaida ikajekel amunaun.
Naarai nepejai akusibar, nepenen ejaikinos ikusitauon da.
yes da ikulepek kosubito bala ituŋa luidarete ejakaitikec naeboŋunio koiterane tetere naebunio aikuŋukuŋ koŋaikis atipet.
Isirereŋitoi ibulesin ŋul luedumuni ejakaitikec ekwenyete naebunio; abeit, katemari yes atiar, eeni akeŋabet, isukunyikini kes onyamat, ebuni ŋesi elopet ijaanakini kes.
Arai kebu kakwenyunet nakiareit, arai nakiwuniet, kodum ikote nen, isirereŋitoi ibulesin ŋul.
Konye kojenutu akirot na ebe arai kejeni elopet etogo esawa loebunio ekokolan, tikekweny, kwabo timam kejalaki eketogo abokio.
Yes da kokapakina; naarai ebuni Okoku loka etuŋanan kosawa lomam iwomito.”
Kotema Petero atiar, “Ejakait, kilimokinit sio bon awaragan ŋin, arai bo ituŋa kere?”
Kotema Ejakait atiar, “Aso iŋai bo erai ekeŋadan lomunot loepiriana, lokedakakini ejakaitike ayait lukokaleke kere akoranakin kes ikecenyamat kapakikec?
Isirereŋitoi ebulesit ŋol, loedumuni ejakaitike iswamai kwaŋin naebunio.
Abeit katemari yes atiar, Edakakini ŋes ayait luejaatar kere.
Konye arai etemari ebulesit ŋol otauke ebe, ‘Eyap ejakaitika abunore,’ kogeu aibuŋ itelepai ka apesur, ka ainyam ka aimat ka amer da;
ebuni ejakait loka ebulesit kaŋol kapaaran namam eomit, ka esawa da lomam ejeni, etubi ŋes katutubeta aarei, itebei ekewai nepepe kalumam iyuunito.
Ebulesit ŋol loejeni nuekoto ejakaitike, komam ekapakin, karaida aswam nuekoto ejakaitike, edaio luipu.
Konye ŋol lomam ejeni, kiswama da nuibusakinito adaia, edaio luikidioko. Ŋin da yeneinakinitai nuipu, emoio nuipu kamake; ŋin da yenititiŋito ituŋa nuipu, iburaete nuiyatakina.
“Abunit acakakin akim akwap; ti akoto kinokokinitete sek!
Ejai aibatis naebusakinit aibatisao; ido aridakina cama eoŋ kiton neitodolikinere!
Aso iwomitos kereka ebe abu kabu ayaŋaun ainapakin toma akwap? Katemari yes atiar, Mam; dimarai atiakatiak:
naarai amear kwana ejaikinos ituŋa ikany togo ediopet, etiakas iuni aluikin iarei, ka iarei da aluikin iuni;
etiakas, papa eluikini okokuke, ka okoku da eluikini papake, toto eluikini akokuke, ka akoku da eluikini totoke, tataa eluikini ateranike, ateran da eluikini tataake.”
Naianyuniata ekusi ekwam loka eŋalakimak, ibalas ebe, ‘Ejaun aibuse naepol’; ejaun da kwaŋin,
Yes lukesoswai, ijenete aŋicun ejautene loka akwap ka akuj; konye kanukinyo mam ijeniata aŋicun apak na?
“Kanukinyo mam yes ikulepek itubioto nueraas nukabeit?

Naarai naiupatarar ka lokiwosat alosit mama ejai ekayaiton, kinyikok ainerun kaŋes korot nuka aipuc, kinyek aidilidilar jo mama ejai ekatubon, ekatubon da kijaikini akanin nuka eketatacan, eketatacan da kieakakini aidaris.
Katemari jo atiar, Mam cut ilomuni kanen aitodol naidaunia atacakin apesa nakawasia.”
Koboŋok kotema kes atiar, “Iwomito kereka ebe keroko Igalilayan ŋul aitelekarit Igalilayan ice kere, naarai iticanio ŋun?
Katemari yes atiar, Mam; konye arai mam yes itoronikinos, imudiaros kere kwape kwaŋin,
Arai kwi itomon kakanykauni lukibirokin etogo loeoja, koSiloam, koara kes, iwomito kereka ebe ebucarito ŋul aitelekarit ituŋa kere lukiboiete koYerusalem?
Katemari yes atiar, Mam; konye arai mam yes itoronikinos, imudiaros kere kwape kwaŋin.”
Kotema ŋesi ekeswaman loka amana naka emusabibu atiar, ‘Koany, ikar iuni lu abu amoot araito naka etini kalo, mam adumunit amodio. Kojepa; kanukinyo imadiŋikinia alup?’
Koboŋok kotema atiar, ‘Ejakait, kinyek ber ekaru lo da, kebokibok kewor da.
Arai kera do araito okaru je, ejok; konye arai mam, ijepari.’ ”
Kapaaran nakasabato isisianakini kotoma adiopet katukosia.
Ido koany, kojai aberu nakejai ajokit nakalany ikar itomon kakanykauni; nakekudokina, komam epedori cut aitenar,
Nakeanyunia Yesu ŋes, konyarau, kotema ŋes atiar, “Toto, kilacar kotoma akalanyanutukon.”
Kidokok ŋes akekanin, atipet kitenar, kitopolo Edeke.

Konye konyunyura ekayaiton loka atukos naarai etaŋaleun Yesu kapaaran nakasabato, kotema ituŋa atiar, “Ejaas apaarasia akanykape nuejokiar ituŋa aiswamaa aswam; aso kopotu aitaŋaleunio kapaarasia kaŋun, kwabo mere kapaaran nakasabato.”
Konye Ejakait Koboŋok ebe, “Yes lukesoswai! Kapaaran nakasabato mam kereka ilacununete ŋinidiopet kayes ekemoŋ arai akesigiria kotoma auj, koyaŋa aitamat?
Aberu na da, naerai aur naka Aburaam, nakeeni Satan ikar lu itomon kalukanykauni, mam tope kibusakinit alacakinio kaenet kana apaaran nakasabato?”
Nakinerar ŋun, kirumata ileic lukasurupoke kere: kiyalamikin ekodet kere kanuka akiro kere nukaibuses nukiswamai ŋesi.
Eputosi kecokat loka ekaradali lokelemari etuŋanan, kocakak toma omanikorike; kobwaŋ, koraun ekitoi; koperenenete akweny nuka apak atenieikike.”
Kotema bobo atiar, “Etupusi kinyo ajakanut naka Edeke?
Eputosi kaitubuunet nakelemari aberu kibwa kotoma aitemisio auni nuka akiria, kiton neabuunioto kere.”
Kiyatak akelosit aitor koreria lukapolok ka ludidik, isisianakini, ebei Yerusalem,
Kiŋit ŋes etuŋanan ediopet ebe, “Ejakait, ikidioko ca luitaiario?” Kotema kes atiar,
“Kokokito alomar kokek kaloedidiŋ: naarai katemari yes atiar, Ekotokinos luipu alomar kwabo mam epedorete.
Apak naanyounio elopet etogo agoloki da ekek, igeunete yesi aibwo kokiŋa, ka aikuŋukuŋ ekek, kobalas ebe, ‘Wu okwe Ejakait, koŋaarai;’ eboŋokini ŋesi etemari atiar, ‘Mam ajeni nekiponiata.’
Kanen igeunete atemar atiar, ‘Kipou kanyama kamata da kakonyenekon, ijo da kisisianakini korotinikosi;’
etemari ŋesi atiar, ‘Katemari yes atiar, Mam ajeni nekiponiata; irwa kamakaŋ, yes kere lukeswamak numam adolit.’
Kanen ejaun aimony ka airiamanakin ikel, naianyuniata Aburaam, ka Isaak, ka Yakob, ka inabin kere, kotoma ajakanut naka Edeke, ka yes da ikulepek kicakario kiŋa.
Epote ituŋa anyoun kokide, koto, ka agolitomei ka eŋalakimak da, iboikinos kesi toma ajakanut naka Edeke.
Ido koany, ejaas lukawasia lueraunos lusodit, ejaas da lusodit, lueraunos lukawasia.”
Kosawa kaŋol kopotu Iparisayon ice kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Konyou kane kolot nenice; naarai ekoto Kerode aiar jo.”
Kotema kes atiar, “Koloto kolimokis ekuwe ŋol ebe, ‘Koany, ereŋeari ajokin, etaŋaleununei da lolo ka moi, kapaaran nakiwuniet etodolikin.
Konye kebusakinit aibe ekarot lolo ka moi, ka apaaran naetupakini da; naarai mam ibusakinit enabi amudiario kokiŋa naka Yerusalem.’

Wu okwe Yerusalem, Yerusalem, loeari inabin ka aibiribir kamor ŋul lukiyakunio mamakon! Irwan imwa ai abu kakotor atukonokin ikonidwe kwape etukonokinia akokor ikemiyoi kwap abebenokake, konye mam yes ekotokino!
Koany, kinyeinere ekusitogo. Katemari yes atiar, Mam kianyunete eoŋ bobo cut, aitodol naitemariata atiar, ‘Isirereŋitoi ŋol loebunit kokiror loka Ejakait!’ ”
Kosodi koany, kiŋarenike kejai etuŋanan lokedeka eidada.
Koboŋok Yesu iricakisila ka Iparisayon kobala ebe, “Ibus kereka aitaŋaleun kapaaran nakasabato arai bo mam?”
Konye kes kililiŋata. Kitim, kitaŋaleu ŋes, kotwar.
Kotema kes atiar, “Iŋai bo kayesi, arai kibirokin akeiteŋ arai akesigiria toma aipany, yenimam iriuni ŋes atipet kapaaran nakasabato?”
Kes da mam apotu kopedosi aboŋokin ŋun.
“Arai kinyararit jo ituŋanan opucit loka eiterane, sirikiboikin oicoloŋ lokapolou, kinyek loenyarit ŋesi lokitelekarit jo apolou abunore.
Kosodi ŋol lokiinyarari jo ka ŋes alimokin jo ebe, ‘Koosik lo aibois,’ kanen kigeunete ileic airum, ibei da aibois nakokwap.
Konye nakinyararere, kolot kiboikin aibois nakokwap, tetere naebunio je lokinyararit jo kolimok ebe, ‘Opapero ba, kikuny ne kuju’; kanen ijaunete kaibuses kakonyen nuka ŋul kere kalukiboiete kajo.
Naarai ŋin kere yeniturokin itisilio, ka yenitisilikin iturio.”

Kotema da lokenyarit ŋes atiar, “Naipoio inyamat luka paaran arai luka eboŋ, sirikinyarau ikonipapero karaida ikoniinacan, karaida ikonipajen, karaida iidunyeta lukabarak, kinyeis ŋul anyarar jo bobo, jo da kitacakinio.
Konye naipoio epucit, konyaraununei lukican, ka iŋwalasik, ka luicodos, ka imudukiok da,
kwaŋin kisirereŋitoi; naarai emameete ŋul lukitacakiniata; naarai kitacakinio kotoma ajarun naka luedolito.”
Konye kotema ŋes atiar, “Kojai etuŋanan loabu kipo epucit loepol, konyarau ituŋa luipu;
kedol apak naka ainyam kiyakia ekebulesit alimonokin kwi luanyaritai ebe, ‘Kopotu; naarai adaun aitemonokin iboro kere.’
Konye kogeutu kere aiyanar kediopetau. Kobala losodit ebe, ‘Agwel emanikor, kebusakinit alosit aanyun; keŋaiŋait kiikinai.’
Kobala ece ebe, ‘Agwel imoŋin ajookon akany, alosi aitetemor; keŋaiŋait, kiikinai.’
Kobala ece ebe, ‘Amany aberu, ŋes mam apedoria abunore.’

Kobu ebulesit kolimok ejakaitike akiro ŋun kere. Kosodi konyunyurikin elopet etogo, kotema ekebulesit atiar, ‘Koloma atipet kolot toma orotin ka isokono da luka ere, koyau ne lukican, ka iŋwalasik ka imudukiok, ka luicodos da.’
Kotema ebulesit atiar, ‘Ejakait, ŋun nukicorak eswamasi, konye ca eriŋa aibois ejai.’ ”
Kotema ejakait ebulesit atiar, “Koloma kolot orotin lukapolok ka asisiarin da, kitiŋau ituŋa alomun, tetere ilelebun ekatogo.
Naarai katemari yes atiar, Kotoma kwi kalukenyaritai emamei edio da loiiri ekapueit.”
Kouparos ikodeta luipu kaŋes; kibelokin kotema kes atiar,
“Arai ebuni etuŋanan mamaka, komam elai papake, ka totoke, ka nakowaike, ka ikedwe, ka ikeinacan ka ainacan, eebo, kiton akeijar alopet, mam epedori araun ekakesisian.
Ŋin yenimam erioŋi ekemusalaba, katup eoŋ, mam epedori araun ikakesisian,
Naarai iŋai bo kayesi, arai ekoto aiduk etogo loeoja, mam iboikini ber aimar eketiai, ebe luejaatar edaunete?
Kinyek diat kedau aipet apetetait, komam epedori adaun, egeunete ituŋa kere lueanyunete akienar ŋes,
kobalas ebe, ‘Abu etuŋanan ŋol kogeu aiduk, komam epedori adaun.’
Arai bo ekabaka enyoin, arai ekoto alosit ejie kekabaka ece, lomam ber iboikini ainerun arai epedori kilukumin itomon airiamakin kaje loebunit asurokin ŋes kilukumin akaisaarei?
Arai keanyu ebe mam epedori, iyakiari ikiyakia ailip nukainapakin, eriŋa je elwana.
Aso kwaŋin ŋinituŋanan kayesi, yenimam epaluni luejaatar kere mam epedori araun ikakesisian.
Mam ibusakini alup, karaida etut; ebukorete ituŋa kiŋa, Yenejaas aki nuka akiirar, kiira.”
Kirurumata Iparisayon ka ikewadikak ebe, “Isukunyikini etuŋanan ŋol ikadiakanarak, emorete da kakes.”
Kolimok kes awaragan na ebe,
“Iŋai bo kayes yenejaas amerekekin akwatat, keolio adiopet, mam kereka inyeini akaisakanykaoŋon ka nukanykaonon kamodiŋ, kolot amoot ŋin nakeoliorit aitodol needumunia?
Kedau adumun, erioŋakini okeperinike, kolakara.
Naedolio togoke, enyarauni ikepapero ka ikeidunyeta, kolimok ebe, ‘Kolakaros nepepe keoŋ, naarai adum akamerekek naaoliorit.’
Katemari yes atiar, Kwape kwaŋin ŋes ejaunor alakara toma akuj kanuka ikadiakanaran idiopet yenitoronikin itia kanuka ituŋa akaisakanykaoŋon ka lukanykaoŋon lumam ipudasi aitoronikin.
“Arai iŋai bo aberu, ejaas karupiyan atomon, arai koolio adiopet, mam inokokini atalake ka aipie etogo ka amoot kainyikokinit kiton needumunia?
Kedau adumun, enyarauni akepapero ka akeidunyeta kolimok ebe, ‘Kolakaros nepepe keoŋ, naarai adum arupiya naaoliorit.’
Katemari yes atiar, Kwape kwaŋin ejai alakara kakonyen nuka imalaikan luka Edeke kanuka ikadiakanaran idiopet yenitoronikin.”
Kobala ebe, “Kojai etuŋanan lokejaas odweke iarei.
Kotema lodidi papake atiar, ‘Papa, ae atutubet naka ikoniboro lukabeito eoŋ.’ Kokorak do kes lukejaatar.
Ketuboros apaarasia nuikidioko, kotukonok lodidi lukebeito ŋes kere, kolot akwap naelwana, kiweliwel ikeboro kaŋina koponesio luutai.
Nakedaunia aitwasam kere, kodo ebeli akwap ya, kogeu ŋesi da aiyarorotoi.
Kolot kimorikikinos kediopet kokulepek akwap, kijuka ŋol ŋes oronyike acok ipegei.
Koŋat aimonikin abubuk nukenyamete ipegei; kemamei da ituŋanan yeneinakini ŋes idiobore.
Nakiitoki kotauke, kobala ebe, ‘Imwaasi ai ikejaanakinak luka papaka luenyamete inyamat kosala, eoŋ da kane atwani eteŋei.
Anyouni do kalot mama ejai papaka, kalimok ŋes ebe, “Papa, adiaka kama ejai akuj, kakonyenekon da;
Mam bobo kebusakinit anyarao okokukon; kikonakinai bala ediopet kokejaanakinakakon.” ’
Konyou kobu mama ejai papake. Konye naperoko elwana, koany papake ŋes, kitim, koker kibirokin omurisiŋike, konu ŋes.
Kotema okoku ŋes atiar, ‘Papa, adiaka kama ejai akuj, kakonyenekon da; mam bobo kebusakinit anyarao okokukon.’
Konye kobala papake ikekejaanakinak ebe, ‘Koyaŋautu atipet anapito naitelekarit aibuses, kitanapa ŋes; kitanapikis da egilut obokoritike, ka amuka da akejeke;
koyaŋautu da itaok yenirobok koarata, kanyama kalakaros;
naarai okokuka lo abu kotwana, ajaru bobo; aoliorit, atakanu bobo.’ Kogeut alakar.
“Kojai okokuke lokapolon amana; konye napebuni aapikin ere, kiira lueruos ka ekosio.
Konyarau ediopet kotelepai kiŋit ebe, ‘Ikote bo ai ŋun?’
Kolimok ebe, ‘Abu onacekon, aaraki papakon itaok yenirobok, naarai abwatu ŋes eŋalei.’
Konye konyunyurikin, mam abu kokoto alomar toma. Kolom papake kiŋa kiŋaiŋa.
Konye Koboŋok ŋesi papake ebe, ‘Koany, kejaanak jo ikar lu luipu, kwabo mam adiakit adioicorakinetekon; konye mam kiinakinit eoŋ imodiokalol, kalakarotor kikapapero.
Konye napabunio okokukon ŋol, loabu konyam ikoniboro nepepe kanudotea, iarak ŋes itaok yenirobok.’
Kotema papake atiar, ‘Ikakoku, ijai ijo keoŋ apaarasia kere, kere da lukijaar eoŋ eraas lukon.
Ibusakinit alakar ka aiyalamikin, naarai onacekon ŋol abu kotwana, ajaru bobo; aoliorit, atakanu bobo.’ ”
Kotema bobo Yesu ikekesisiak atiar, “Kojai etuŋanan ekabaran lokejai ekekeŋadan, kirupeai ŋol kamake ebe eweliwel iboroke.
Konyarau kotema ŋes atiar, ‘Akiro nunyoika nu nueirarit kamakon? Kimar iboro luka akoniiŋad, naarai mam ipedori bobo araut ekeŋadan.’
Kotema ekeŋadan je kotauke atiar, ‘Kekonak ai, naarai kadema papaka aiŋad? Emamei eoŋ agogoŋ akor, kerumito da ileic ailipitoi.
Ajeni nueswamai, tetere keereŋei kaiŋadakaŋ, kesukunyikis otogoikec.’
Konyarau lukapesenin luka ejakaitike ŋolidiopet, kotema losodit atiar, ‘Inyo bo kiburai ejakaitika jo?’
Kobala ebe, ‘Aitemisio akwatat nuka akinyet.’ Kolimok ebe, ‘Kolem akoniitutuket, kiboikin atipet, kiwadik akaisakany.’
Kosodi atemar ece atiar, ‘Inyo bo kiburao jo?’ Kobala ebe, ‘Aitemisio akwatat nuka akima.’ Kotema ŋes atiar, ‘Kolem akoniitutuket, kiwadik akaisakanykauni.’
Kitojok ejakaitike ekeŋadan lokeŋalan kanuka aswam nukapirianut; naarai idwe luka akwapin kanu kotoma aturikec ejaas kapirianut aitelekarit idwe luka aica.
Katemari yes atiar, Koneronosi ipapero kotoma abar naka amamus adolit, tetere naemamuunor, kisukunyikis yes toma aiboisio nuka ikar kere.
Aso arai mam yes iraas lumunon kotoma abar naka aiŋal, iŋai bo kisiŋadikini yes abar nakabeit?
Arai mam iraas lumunon kotoma kaŋul kalueraas luka ice, iŋai bo kiinakini yes lueraas lukus ikulepek?
Emamei ekejaanakinan loepedori aijaanakin ijaka iarei, naarai arai elai ediopet, komina loce, arai bo iketakin kediopet emeni loce. Mam ipedorete aijaanakin Edeke ka aijaanakin abar da.”
Kotema kes atiar, “Iraas yesi luitojokas araut ikadolitok kakonyen nuka ituŋa, konye ejeni Edeke ikusitauon; naarai yenitopolooritai kotuŋa erai yeniketal kakonyen nuka Edeke.
Konye epatana akuj ka akwap adaun itia aicunyakinet adiopet naka ikisila apalunio.
“Kojai etuŋanan lokabaran, lokenapenenei egoe lomuge ka ebaputa loejok, kolakanar ŋinipaaran koboro luetaitaete.
Kojai da lokican ekekiror Lasaro, loeperionokino oruteke, kojaas kajimii nuipu.
Kimiela ŋesi aimonianakin ararasia nukedoenenete komesa loka ekabaran; koponenenete iŋokwo da aime akejimii.
Kosodi kanen kotwana lokican, kodakasi imalaikan atorob naka Aburaam. Kotwana ekabaran da, konukai.
Kitonyou akekonye kotoma Okatwak, kanekejaar toma aikilianar naepol, koany Aburaam kama elwana ka Lasaro da katorobuke.
Kiworo ebe, ‘Aburaam Papa, kitimoi, kijuk Lasaro kidomak kiŋaren kebokoritike akipi ketojonia akaŋajep; naarai arieba noi kotoma akim na.’
Kobala Aburaam ebe, ‘Okokuka, kiitu ebe ibu ijo kodum nukajokakakon kotoma aijarakon, ka Lasaro da kwaŋin kodum nukaronok; konye kwana italakario ŋes kane, ka jo da kisiriebio.
Mere ŋun bon, konye kidiŋikosi kayes ejai asoogot naidul, tetere ŋulluekotosi anyoun kane mam epedorete atubun mamakus, emameete da luepedorete anyoun kaŋina ailamun mamakosi.’
Kotema atiar, ‘Aso papa, keŋaiŋait, kijuka ŋes togo loka papaka,
naarai ejaas eoŋ iinacan ikany, tetere ikwenyari kes, kinyeis kesi da adolun aibois na nakaikilianar.’
Konye kobala Aburaam ebe, ‘Ejaas kes kaMusa ka inabin, kiirasi ŋul.’
Kotema atiar, ‘Mam, Aburaam Papa; konye arai kelot etuŋanan loenyouni kokatwak, itoronikinos.’
Kotema ŋes atiar, ‘Arai mam iirarete Musa ka inabin, mam ecamunete karaida kejaru ituŋanan kokatwak.’ ”
Kotema ikekesisiak atiar, “Mam eswakete nuitiguikinete abunore; konye itukwi ituŋanan ŋin yeneyaŋauni ŋun!
Tiejok ituŋanan ŋin aenikin akukuse omurisiŋike, kocakakinai aŋolol itia aitiguikin idiopet kaludidik kalu.
Kocoito; arai kediak onacekon, kitoron ŋes; arai kitoronikin kisioni.
Arai kediak kamakon irwan akanykaarei kapaaran adiopet, koboŋu mamakon irwan akanykaarei, kobala ebe, ‘Etoronikin,’ kisioni ŋes.”
Kotema Ejakait atiar, “Arai kijaas kaiyuun naetia ecokat loka ekaradali, tikilimokis esukamin lo ebe, ‘Koukor, kiraikin aŋolol.’ Tikiirimak yes.
“Ido iŋai bo kayesi yenejai ekebulesit loekoriei arai loicokiei amerekekin yenelimokini ŋes atipet napeboŋunio kotoma amana ebe, ‘Kobia atipet kiboikin ainyam’.
Arai bo elimokini ŋes ebe, ‘Kitemokinoi ikanyamat lukatiboŋ, koen aŋabet, kijaanak eoŋ, kiton neadaunia eoŋ ainyam ka aimat; kosodi konyet inyami ijo da ka aimat’?
Imalai kereka ŋesi ebulesit naarai eswama nuecorakinitai?
Kwape kwaŋin yes da, naidauniata aswam kere nukicorakinitai, kineras ebe, ‘Kirai isio ibulesin lumam ajokis; kiswama bon nukibusakinit aswam.’ ”
Napelomari ore ediopet, kiriamunos kalukatapon itomon, lukebwoete kama elwana,
kiworoto kobalas ebe, “Wu Yesu, Lokapolon, kitimoi sio.”
Nakeanyunia kes kotema atiar, “Koloto, kitodiaros mama ejaas isasedotin.” Ido napelosete kiswagarai.
Kosodi ediopet kakesi nakeanyunia ebe aŋaleu, koboŋu, kitopolo Edeke keporoto loepol.
Kibirokin ebuburia akejen nuka Yesu, kimala ŋes. Kerai da ŋol Esamariat.
Koboŋok Yesu kiner atiar, “Mam eswagara itomon kere? Ai bo do ejaas kwi ikanykaoŋon?
Mam ca etakanunit edio da aboŋun aitopoloor Edeke dimarai emoit lo?”
Kotema ŋes atiar, “Konyou, kolot; kitajar jo akoniiyuun.”
kwabo mam ineras ebe, ‘Koany, ejai lailo!’ arai, ‘Ejai laije!’ Naarai koany, ejai ajakanut naka Edeke tomakus.”
Kotema ikekesisiak atiar, “Epote rwaru apaarasia, nuimielatar aanyun adiopet kotoma apaarasia nuka Okoku loka etuŋanan, komam ianyunete.
Kilimokinete ebe, ‘Koany, ejai laije!’ ‘Koany, ejai lailo!’ Sirikiloto, kwabo sirikitupasi da.
Naarai kwape imiliaunia eimilia ameun kowai ediopet loka akuj, inwakit kiton owai ece loka akuj, kwape kwaŋin ejaunia Okoku loka etuŋanan kotoma apaaranike.
Konye ibusakinit ber ŋes aiticanio nuipu, kogir atur na.
Kwape kejaatar kapaarasia nuka Noa, kwape kwaŋin ejauniata kotoma apaarasia nuka Okoku loka etuŋanan.
Konyama, komata, komanya, ka amanyio da, kiton apaaran nakelomaria Noa toma ataker, kijesun akalele komudia kere.
Kwape kwaŋin kwape kejaatar kapaarasia nuka Lot; konyama, komata, kogwela, kogwelasi, kiraata, koduko da;
konye kapaaran nakelomunia Lot koSodom, kotep akim ka acukuman abunore kakuj, komudia kere.
Ikote nen kapaaran naepukorere Okoku loka etuŋanan.
Kapaaran kaŋin, yenejai kuju togo, kojaas ikeboro toma togo, sirikijesun alemun; kwape kwaŋin yenejai mana sirikeboŋu kau.
Kiitut aberu naka Lot.
Inituŋanan yenekoto aitajar akeijar, itooliori; ka ŋin da yenitooliori akeijar itajari.
Katemari yes atiar, kakuare kaŋin ejaunos ituŋa iarei oitada ediopet; eyaŋaario ediopet, inyeinio loce.
Ejaunos aŋor aarei iricete nepepe; eyaŋaario adiopet, inyeinio nace. [
Ejaunos ituŋa iarei amana; eyaŋaario ediopet, inyeinio loce]”
Kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Laali bo, Ejakait?” Kotema kes atiar, “Neejai akuan, etukonokinos da atarukon nen.”
Kotema kes atiar, “Kojai kolo ekatubon ore ece, lomam eyoŋit Edeke, kwabo mam kepodo ituŋa.
Kojai da apuserut ore ŋol; nakicebokinit abunenen mamake, kobala ebe, ‘Kigaŋai kama kalokasurupika.’
Koŋer ber; konye kokau kotema kotauke atiar, ‘Karaida mam ayoŋit Edeke, karaida mam apodo ituŋa,
konye naarai kecebokinit apuserut na, egaŋi ŋes, kenye aitapas eoŋ kanuka arim tiritir neajai.’ ”
Kotema Ejakait atiar, “Kiirasi nuenera ekatubon lomam edolit.
Mam kereka igaŋi Edeke luseunake, luemonyakinete paaran ka kuare, etitiŋikinit ŋesi kanukec?
Katemari yes atiar, Igaŋi kes atipet. Konye naebunio Okoku loka etuŋanan, edumuni kereka aiyuun kakwap?”
Kolimok da awaragan na ituŋa lukemunokina ebe eraas kesi luedolito komwaŋito luce;
“Kodokasi ituŋa iarei oyekalu ailip, ediopet Eparisayot, loce da eketeleman esolo.
Kobwo Eparisayot kilip kwana kotauke ebe, ‘Wu Edeke, kemalai jo naarai mam eoŋ kiputo kicetuŋa, ikaŋatak, ikeŋalak, idotea, karaida bala lo eketeleman esolo.
Aluŋenenei eoŋ irwan aarei ŋinisabato, ainanakini da yenikitomonet kotoma kaluadumuni kere.’
Konye kobwo eketeleman esolo kama elwana, kwabo mam ketitinikinit aikeun akekonyen akuj, konye kodipidip aketorob, kobala ebe, ‘Wu Edeke, kitimoi eoŋ ekadiakanaran!’
Katemari yes atiar, Abu ŋol kodok alosit oreke imarakinitai adolit aitelekarit je; naarai ŋinituŋanan yeniturokin itisilio, konye yenitisilikin iturio.”
Konye Yesu konyarau kes kotema atiar, “Kocamutu idwe ludidik abunore mama ajai, kwabo sirikisimika kes; naarai lueputosi kalu ajakanut naka Edeke erai nakec.
Abeit katemari yes atiar, ŋin yenimam iyuuni ajakanut naka Edeke kwape kikoku yenididi, mam cut elomari toma.”
Kotema Yesu ŋes atiar, “Kanukinyo kinyaraa eoŋ lokajokan? Emamei yenikajokan dimarai ediopet, ŋes Edeke.
Ijeni aicorakineta ebe: ‘Siridote, Siriari, Sirikokoi, Sirisabanakinenei, Koyoŋitenenei papakon ka totokon.’ ”
Kotema atiar, “Aricit ŋun kere ameun keiditeuka.”
Nakiiraria Yesu ŋun, kotema ŋes atiar, “Eriŋa kiwolikit adiopekirot. Kogwela luijaatar kere, kokoranak lukican, ijaunete moolo kabar kotoma akuj; kosodi kobu, kotup eoŋ.”
Konye nakiiraria ŋun kokadak noi, naarai kebarit noi.
Nakesesenia Yesu ŋes kotema atiar, “Etiono cama lukabarak alomar ajakanut naka Edeke!
Epatana ekaal aitor apedot naka ekus, itia ekabaran alomar ajakanut naka Edeke.”
Kotemasi ŋul lukiirarete atiar, “Aso iŋai bo do epedori aitajario?”
Konye kotema atiar, “Numam epedorio kotuŋa epedorio kama ejai Edeke.”
Kobala Petero ebe, “Koany, kipou isio kenyeis ikosiboro katuputu jo.”
Kotema kes atiar, “Abeit katemari yes atiar, Emamei etuŋanan loenyeinit etogo arai aberu, arai iinacan, arai ikauriak, arai idwe, kanuka ajakanut naka Edeke,
lomam edumuni ipu noi aitelekarit kapak kana, ido kokar luepote aijar naka ikar kere.”
Naarai einakinio mama ejaas Imo, eboliatar, iswamakinio nukepali, imwaanakinio aimul:
edaete ka aiar ŋes; kapaaran da nakiwuniet ejaruni.”
Konye mam kes apotu kojenut adis kaŋun; naarai kimunonikinitai kes akirot ŋin, kwabo mam ejenuna nukinerai.
Nakiiraria ekodet itorit, kiŋit ebe, “Ikote bo ai ŋun?”
Kolimokis ŋes ebe, “Yesu loko Nasaret itorit.”
Kiworo ebe, “Yesu, okoku loka Daudi, kitimoi eoŋ.”
Ŋul da lukiŋarenito kiretakis tetere ililiŋi: konye ŋes kiyatak noi aiworo ebe, “Wu jo okoku loka Daudi, kitimoi eoŋ.”
Kobwou Yesu, kicorak ayaunio mama ejai, Napekeapiki, kiŋit ŋes ebe,
“Ikoto keswamak jo inyo?” Kotema atiar, “Ejakait, akoto kakweny.”
Kotema Yesu ŋes atiar, “Kokweny: kitaŋaleu jo akoniiyuun.”
Atipet kokweny, kotupa ŋes, itopoloorit Edeke. Nakeanyuniata ituŋa da kere, kituritos Edeke.
Koloma Yeriko kitorite kidiŋike,
Ido koany, kojai etuŋanan ekekiror Sakayo; korai eketeleman esolo lokapolon, kerai da ekabaran,
Kemoot ŋol aanyun Yesu kerai loka epone enyoin, mam epedoro kanuka ekodet, naarai kewuriana ŋesi.
Koker kiŋaren, kodoka kuju osukamin, tetere eanyuni; naarai itorunit orot ŋol.
Nakedolio Yesu aibois ŋin, kosesen okitoi, kotema atiar, “Sakayo, kodoku atipet; naarai kebusakinit lolo aiboikin togokon.”
Kodoku atipet, kisukunyik ŋes kaiyalama.
Nakeanyuniata ituŋa kirurumata kere, kobalas ebe, “Aloma aiboikin ketuŋanan lokadiakanaran.”
Kobwo Sakayo, kotema ŋesi Ejakait atiar, “Koany, Ejakait, akorakini lukican atutubet naka ikaboro; arai da arodit ituŋanan idiobore, atacakini irwan aoŋon.”
Kotema Yesu ŋes atiar, “Adolu lolo aitajario togo lo, naarai erai ŋesi da okoku loka Aburaam.
Naarai abu Okoku loka etuŋanan amoot ka aitajar yenikeoliorit.”
Aso kobala ebe, “Kojai etuŋanan lokapolon, kolot akwap naelwana, tetere edumuni ajakanut, kosodi konyet aboŋun,
Konyarau itomon kobulesinike, koinak kes ŋinituŋanan arupian atomon, kotema kes atiar, ‘Aso kogwelanasi aitodol neaboŋunio.’
Konye kolaata ŋes ituŋa lukoreke, kiyakiasi ikiyakia atupar ŋes, alimokin ebe, ‘Mam kikoto ŋol ayait sio.’
Kosodi kanen nakeboŋunio, kodumunite akejakanut, kicorak anyaraun ibulesin ŋul luainakinit arupian, tetere ejenuni ameda naadumut kanuka agwelanar.
Kobu losodit akonyeneke, kobala ebe, ‘Ejakait, akonirupia emedau ace atomon.’
Kotema ŋes atiar, ‘Iswama ejok, ijo ebulesit loejok! Naarai irai lomunot kakirot naedit noi, koyaŋa apolou naka ireria itomon.’
Kobu lokiareit da, kobala ebe, ‘Ejakait, akonirupia emedau ace akany.’
Kotema ŋes atiar, ‘Ijo da koyaŋa ireria ikany.’
Kobu ece da kobala ebe, ‘Ejakait, koany akonirupia na, naeŋadakinit ogoe.
Naarai abu kakurianar jo, naarai irai loininik: ilemuni numam ibwaikinit, idwenyi da numam iyeit.’
Kotema ŋes atiar, ‘Katubokini jo kakiro nuka aitukukon, ijo ibulesit loerono! Ibu kojeni ebe aninik eoŋ, alemi numam ebwaikinit, adwenyi da numam ayeit.
Aso kanukinyo mam kiinakinia akarupian mama ejaas ikagwelanarak, tetere neabunio kadum nepepe kamedakec?’
Kobala lukebwoete eapias ebe, ‘Kodemut arupia, koinakis je loka arupian atomon.’
Kotemasi ŋes atiar, ‘Ejakait, ejaas ŋes arupian atomon.’
‘Katemari yes atiar, yenejai ibore einakinio; konye yenemamei ibore, edemunio ŋin da yenejaas kaŋes.
Bobo da ŋul lukasurupoka, lumam akotos eoŋ ayait kes, koyaut ne, koarata kakonyeneka.’ ”
Nakedaunia einer ŋun, kiŋarenik kes adokar Yerusalem.
Kosodi kanen nakeapiki Betepage ka Betaniya, komoru loenyaritai loka Iseitunin, kijuka iarei kokesisiak,
kobala ebe, “Koloto ore loisesenete; nailomariata toma idumunete ikoku yenika asigiria eenitai, yenimam lem ibwanenit idiotuŋanan: kolacut, koinut.
Arai kiŋisi ituŋanan ebe, ‘Kanukinyo ilacariata?’ iboŋokinete ebe, ‘Ejakait ipuda ŋes.’ ”
Koloto lukijukario kodumut kwape kelimokinitere.
Napelacunete ikoku yenika asigiria, kobalas ikulepek ebe, “Kanukinyo ilacariata isigiria?”
Koboŋokis ebe, “Ejakait ipuda ŋes.”
Koyaŋaut mama ejai Yesu, kopetanakis isigiria ikecenapen, kisibwanenoto Yesu.
Napelosi, kopetanakis ikecenapen orot,
Nakeapikinia aijesaret naka Emoru loka Iseitunin, kogeu ekodet kere loka ikesisiak ailel ka aiturit Edeke keporoto loepol kanuka aswamisio kere nukapedor nuaanyut.
Kobalas ebe, “Isirereŋitoi Ekabaka loebunit kokiror loka Ejakait! Ainapakin kotoma akuj, ka aibuses da kokuju kakuj!”
Ice koParisayon lukejaas toma okodet kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Ekesisianakinan, kitoron ikonikesisiak.”
Koboŋok ebe, “Katemari yes atiar, Arai kililiŋata lu, iworoete do amor.”
kobala ebe, “Arai kojeni ijo kapaaran kana akiro nukiinakinete ainapakin! Konye kwana ibwaitai kakonyenekon.
Naarai epote apaarasia nukidukokiniata lukasurupokon itutio airigaunia, kiridakinete jo airiamar iwaitin kere,
kibirokinete jo kwap, ka ikonidwe kotomakon, komam kinyeiniata amoru naidokokino amoru nace; naarai mam ibu kojen apak naka aanyanariokon.”
Kobala kes ebe, “Iwadikatai ebe, ‘Ekatogo eraun etogo lokilipet’; konye yes ituluosi abua naka ikaŋatak.”
konye mam eanyuna nuepedorete aswam, naarai kokotos noi ituŋa kere akiirar ŋes.
Kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Kolimokinai iswamai ijo nu kapolou anyoin, bobo da iŋai bo kiinakini apolou ŋin?”
Koboŋok ebe, “Eoŋ da keŋisi yes akirot adiopet; kolimokis;
aibatis naka Yokana kebuni kereka kotoma akuj arai bo kotuŋa?”
Kiŋitanakinos bonik ka bonik, kobalas ebe, “Arai kiitema ebe ‘Kebuni kotoma akuj’, etemari ŋesi atiar, ‘Aso kanukinyo mam kiyuuniata ŋes?’
Konye arai kiitema ebe, ‘Kebuni kotuŋa’ kibiribirete oni ituŋa kamor; naarai acamunito ebe kerai Yokana enabi.”
Koboŋokis ebe mam kejenete nekebunio.
Kotema Yesu kes atiar, “Eoŋ da mam kalimokini yes apolou nakeswamaa nu.”
Kapak naka aidweny kiyakia ebulesit mama ejaas ikakoriok, tetere einakinete araito nuka emusabibu; konye kibuŋata ikakoriok ŋol, kireŋeasi titai.
Kiyakia ebulesit ece: kibuŋata ŋol da, kisuruma ileic, kireŋeasi titai.
Kiyakia lokiwuniet da: kimusuŋata ŋol da, kocakasi kiŋa,
Kobala ejakait loka amana naka emusabibu ebe, ‘Ekonakini ai? Ejukari okokuka lominat: elemuni eyoŋete ŋes.’
Konye nakeanyuniata ikakoriok, kinerut bonik ka bonik, kobalas ebe, ‘Lo ŋes lokeruman: aso kaarata ŋes, tetere eraun airum nawok.’
Kocakasi kiŋa kamana naka emusabibu, koarata. Aso ikonakini kes ai ejakait loka amana naka emusabibu?
Ebuni emudiari ikakoriok ŋul, einakini ice amana naka emusabibu.” Nakiirariata ŋun, kobalas ebe, “Madi akuj!”
Konye kosesen kes, kotema atiar, “Anyoin apolou naka akirot kana naiwadikatai ebe,
‘Amoru nakeŋerete ikadukok,
ŋin ŋes keponi kitaraunai amoru nakapolon naka agor?’
Kiteikinitoi, kijukasi ikarotak, lukijoseete araut lukabeit, tetere ikamunete ŋes kakiroke, kosodete aijaikin ŋes mama ejai ayait ka apolou naka ekayaiton.
Kiŋita kobalas ebe, “Ekesisianakinan, kijeni ebe inera, isisianakini da nukabeit, kwabo mam isei ituŋa, konye isisianakini erot loka Edeke kotoma abeit.
Ibus kereka sio ainakin Kaisar esolo, arai bo mam?”
Konye kojeni akecepirianut, kotema kes atiar,
“Kitodikinai adenarit. Nakaŋai aput na, ka nuiwadikatai?” Koboŋokis ebe, “Nuka Kaisar.”
Kotema kes atiar, “Aso kotacakis Kaisar nueraas nuka Kaisar, ka Edeke da nueraas nuka Edeke.”
Ido mam apedorete aikamun ŋes kakiroke kakonyen nuka ituŋa; koumokis akeboŋokin koŋatakis.
“Ekesisianakinan, abu Musa kiwadikak sio ebe, arai ketwana onace ketuŋanan, loemanyit, komamei ikoku, ibusakinit onaceke ayaŋaar aberu, kodumak onaceke aur.
Aso kejaas iinacan ikanykaarei: komany losodit aberu, kotwana komamei ikoku;
ka lokiareit da,
Koyaŋa Iokiwuniet da; ka ice da kere ikanykaarei, kotwaka komam inyeinito idwe.
Kawasia kotwana aberu da,
Aso kotoma ajarun eraun ŋin aberu nakaŋai? Naarai kemanyito ikanykaarei kere.”
Kotema Yesu kes atiar, “Emanyete odwe luka akwapin kanu, emanyario da;
konye ŋul luimaritai araut luibusakinito adolokin akwap ya ka ajarun kokatwak, mam emanyete, karaida amanyio.
Naarai mam epedorete atwakare bobo: naarai eriakakinos ka imalaikan; kes da eraas idwe luka Edeke, kanu eraatar idwe luka ajarun.
Konye ebe itajarunio lukatwak, abu Musa da kitodik, kotoma owai loka Ekiyot, nakelimoria Ejakait araut Edeke loka Aburaam, ka Edeke loka Isaak, ka Edeke loka Yakob da.
Mam ŋes erai Edeke loka lukatwak, dimarai loka lukajarak; naarai ejarete kere kamakeŋ,”
Koboŋokis ikewadikak ice, kotemasi atiar, “Ekesisianakinan, iner ejok.”
Naarai mam bobo etitiŋikino aiŋit akirot.
Naarai Daudi elopet inera koitabo loka Isabulin ebe,
‘Abu Ejakait kotema Ekajakait atiar,
Kiboikin akanika nakoteten.
Aitodol neebwaikinia lukasurupokon araut iicoloŋ yenika akejekon.’
Aso enyarit Daudi ŋes Ejakait, kikonakini bo ai erai ikekoku?”
“Kocoito ikewadikak, luekotos alosit konapitos ikason Iueojak, kominasi aiyogao kagwelanareta, ka aiboikin aiboisio nukokuju katukosia, ka iicoloŋo lukapolou kopucin;
ecamete itogoi luka apuserun, kanuka ejose da ilipete ailipasia nueojak; edumunete ŋul atubokinio naitelekarit.”
Koany apuserut adiopet nakican ecakakini ikapun iarei.
Naarai acakanakis ŋul kere kotoma luebarara, konye ŋin kotoma ocanike acakaki lukejaatar kere.”
“Ŋun nuisesenete, epote apaarasia numam esalakinia amoru adiopet kuju kanace namam etiyakinio.”
Kiŋita ŋes ebe, “Ekesisianakinan, ejaunete bo ŋun wori? Anyoin da aanyunet naeapuuniata ŋun adolun?”
Kotema atiar, “Kocoito kinyein aitapaar yes; naarai epote luipu kokirorika, kobalas ebe, ‘Eoŋ ŋopeŋol!’ Ebe da, ‘Aapuu apak!’ Aso sirikitupasi ŋul.
Naiirariata rwaru nuka ijiisio ka iceleta, sirikikuriakaros, naarai ibusakinit ber ŋun ajaun, konye mam awasia edoluni atipet.”
Ejaununete amaraneta nuepolok nuka akwap, ejaunun da ebeli, ka atular kaiboisio nuegelegela; ejaunete nuketasuro ka aanyuneta nukos abunore kotoma akui.
Konye eriŋa ŋun edoluno, kikamunete yes, kireete, kijaikinete yes kakonyen nuka atukosia ka aidarisia, kiyaŋaario kakonyen nuka ikabakan ka ikayaitok kanuka ekakiror.
Eraunete ŋun akajenak kamakus.
Aso kibwaikisi otauonokus ebe sirikiwomoomata ber nuiboŋokinete;
naarai kainakinete yes aituk ka acoa, numam lukasurupokus kere epedorete aitepeg karaida airebokin.
Kijaikinete ikauriakakus, ka iinacanakus, ka lukatekerekus, ka ipaperokus, earete ice kayesi;
kiŋarunete yes ituŋa kere kanuka ekakiror.
Konye mam eoliori etimat ediopet loka akwesikus.
Kotoma atitiŋikinikus ikucaunete akusiijar.
“Konye naianyuniata irimorito ajoresio Yerusalem, aso kojenut ebe aapiki amudiarioke.
Ŋes konyet ekeriata ŋul luejaas Yudaya oroŋan, kolomutu ŋul luejaas kotomake kiŋa, sirikelomasi ŋul luejaas amanat;
naarai eraas nu apaarasia nuka einyaŋane, tetere edolete kere nuiwadikatai.
