Itukwi kes nuepotiete, ka nuitanakete da kapaarasia kaŋun! Naarai ejaun ationus naepol toma akwap, ka anyunyura da asurokin ateker na.
Eŋianakinere akwanis naka ekileŋ, ijoreorio toma atekerin kere; icakacakaete Imo Yerusalem, aitodol naedolioto apakio nuka Imo.
Ejaunete moolo aanyuneta toma akoloŋ ka elap ka aacer, ido toma akwap aburun naka atekerin, nuebuonokinos kanuka agat naka aŋolol ka akailan;
ipirisiaros itauon luka ituŋa kanuka akurian, ido kanuka aidaret akiro nueponikinito akwap: naarai itamaranio nukapedor nuka akuj.
Kosodi konyet eanyunete Okoku loka etuŋanan ebuni kodou kapedor ka aibuses naepol.
Konye naegeuniata ŋun atakanun, kikeutu akwesikus, kosesenata kuju, naarai aapu alakuniokus.”
Apak naegeuniata ailib, ianyunete, ijenunete da kanukus ebe aaput apaarasia nuka aidweny,
Aso do, yes da, naianyuniata akiro ŋun ketakanut, kojenutu ebe aapu ajakanut naka Edeke.
Abeit katemari yes atiar, Mam edaun atur na, aitodol naejaunotor akiro kere.
Edaunos akuj ka akwapin; konye akakiro mam edaunos cut.
Naarai edolokini ituŋa kere luejaas akwapin kere.
Konye kokwenya apakio kere, kiŋaiŋaata tetere idumunete agogoŋ aiku kakiro ŋun kere nuedolokinete, ka aibwo da kakonyen nuka Okoku loka etuŋanan.”
Kodilenenete ituŋa kere tupuruc sek alosit mama ejai oyekalu akiirar ŋes.
Komootos isasedotin lupeti ka ikewadikak epone loka aiar ŋes; naarai apotu kokuriaka ituŋa.
kolot kinerut ka lusasedotin lupeti, ka ikapolokitok iserikalei, epone loka aijaikin ŋes akaninikec.
Kiyalamikinos, kitutukoto ainakin ŋes arupian.
Kocam, komo apak naka aijaikin ŋes mamakec, komamei ekodet.
Kiyakia Yesu Petero ka Yokana kobala ebe, “Koloto kitemonokis lukaleleŋ kanuwok, tetere kinyami.”
Kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Ikoto ketemokis lali?”
Kotema kes atiar, “Koany, nailomariata ore, iriamunos ketuŋanan loibwokit amot naka akipi; kotupasi ŋes, kolomasi togo loelomari ŋesi,
Ilimokinete elopet etogo ebe, ‘Ebala Ekesisianakinan ebe, Ani bo agola nakipejok, neanyamakini lukaleleŋ nepepe kikakesisiak?’
Kitodikini ŋesi yes agola naepol nakokuju naepesitai; kitemonokis nen.”
Nakedolio apak, kiboikin ainyam nepepe kikekesisiak.
Kotema kes atiar, “Abu kemiela noi aimor kayes lukaleleŋ lu, eriŋa eoŋ kiticana;
naarai katemari yes atiar, Mam anyami bobo lukaleleŋ kiton naitodolikinere kotoma ajakanut naka Edeke.”
Kolem akoli, kedau aimal kobala ebe, “Kolemutu na, kijaanakinos:
naarai katemari yes atiar, Amear kwana mam amasi araito nuka emusabibu kiton neebunio ajakanut naka Edeke.”
Kolem emugati, kedau aimal, kobilibil, koinak kes, kobala ebe, “Lo ŋes akakuan, nakeinakinio kanukus: kiswamaenenete kwaŋin akiitunitor eoŋ,”
Ka akoli da kwape kwaŋin kedautu ainyam, kobala ebe, “Akoli na erai aitutuket nakitetet kotoma aokotoka, nuebukoros kanukus.
Konye koany, akan naka ŋol kalokabilakini ebotet ejai keoŋ omesa.
Naarai elosi Okoku loka etuŋanan kwape kelosikinitere; konye itukwi etuŋanan ŋol loebilakini ŋes ebotet!”
Kogeutu aiŋitanar bonik ebe Iŋai bo kakesi ekoto aswam akirot ŋin.
Kotema kes atiar, “Irumitos ikabakan lukacekwapin ikecetuŋa; ŋul da lukapedor kamakec enyaritai ikeswamak ajokis.
Konye yes mam ikote kwaŋin, dimarai lokapolon kamakus koraun bala erai lodidi, ka lokeŋarenikinon da bala ŋol loijaanakini.
Naarai iŋai bo lokapolon, ŋol loiboikini ainyam, arai bo ŋol lojaanakini? Mere tope je loiboikini ainyam? Konye ajai eoŋ kokidiŋikus bala ekejaanakinan.
“Iraas yesi luipotu kotitiŋikis keoŋ kotoma acodunioka;
eoŋ da keŋadakinit yes ajakanut, kwape keŋadakinitor Papaka eoŋ,
tetere inyamete ka aimat komesaka kotoma ajakanutuka, ka aiboikin oicoloŋo luka ajakanut, itubokinete atekerin atomon kanuarei nuka Isirael.
Konye kelipak eoŋ jo kinyek akoniiyuun akurwor; ijo da naibelokinor, kitogogoŋ ikoniinacan.”
Kotema ŋes atiar, “Ejakait, etemokino aupar kajo aenio, kiton atwanare da.”
Kotema atiar, “Kalimokini jo, Petero, ebe mam lolo ekokor eruikini aitodol nakiŋerio eoŋ irwan auni ebe mam kijeni.”
Kotema kes atiar, “Konye kwana, yenejai eriagi koyaŋa, ka yenikecoe da kwape kwaŋin. Yenemamei ekileŋ kogwela ekelou, kogwelunia.
Naarai katemari yes atiar, Ibusakinit ŋun nuewadikatai aitodolikinio mamakaŋ ebe, ‘Aponi kimarakinai nepepe ka lukepali’; naarai nukabeito eoŋ ejaas aitodolikiniokec.”
Kobalas ebe, “Ejakait, koany, ejaas ne ikileŋa iarei.” Kobala kes ebe, “Aso do.”
Nakedolio aibois ŋin kotema kes atiar, “Kilipa, kinyeis alomar toma acodunio.”
Kotiakar ŋesi elopet bala apak naetiakara amoru, kokukokin, kilip,
ebe, “Wu Papa, arai ikoto, kolema akoli na kamakaŋ; konye mere nuakoto eoŋ, dimarai nuikoto ijo kiswamai.”
Kitakanikin ŋes emalaika loabuni kokuju, kitogogoŋ ŋes.
Kosodi kanuka aikilianar kiyatak noi ailip; kosubito ainyinyirake bala imany luka aokot nuedoenenete kwap,
Nakenyounio kotoma ailipike, kobu mama ejaas ikesisiak kodum kes ejotoete kanuka aiturur.
Kotema kes atiar, “Kanukinyo ijotooto? Konyoutu kilipa kinyeis alomar toma acodunio.”
Kotema Yesu ŋes atiar, “Yuda, ibilakini kereka ijo Okoku loka etuŋanan ebotet kainu?”
Ŋul da lukejaas die kaŋes, kojenutu nuekotosi adoikin, kobalas ebe, “Ejakait, kajepejepata ca kikileŋa?”
Ediopet kakesi kojepe ebulesit loka losasedoti lopeti kotubo akekit nakoteten,
Koboŋok Yesu ebe, “Kinyeis ŋun!” Kotiro akekit kitaŋaleu.
Kosodi kobala Yesu isasedotin lupeti ka ikapolokitok luka eyekalu ka imakio lukeponikinito ŋes ebe, “Ilomutu ca ikapito ikileŋa ka ibelai bala aikamun ekaŋatan?
Apaarasia kere ajaenena eoŋ nenipe kayes toma oyekalu, konye mam ipotu kikamut eoŋ. Konye lo erai ekusisawa, ka apedor naka amuton.”
Kedaut ainokokin akim kidiŋ alaro, kiboikinos nepepe, kiboie Petero da kokidiŋikec,
Kanen koany apese ŋes, iboie kaneejai akim, kojene, kobala ebe, “Ajaas nan etuŋanan lo nenipe kaŋes.”
Konye koŋer, kobala ebe, “Ŋo ba na, mam eoŋ ajeni ŋes,”
Nediokasilon koany ece ŋes, kobala ebe, “Ijo da irai lokec.” Konye Koboŋok Petero ebe, “Ijo ba lo, mere eoŋ,”
Ketubor bala esawa ediopet kitogogoŋ ece ebe, “Abeit ajai lo nepepe kaŋes; naarai erai ŋesi da Egalilayat.”
Konye kobala Petero ebe, “Ijo ba lo, mam ajeni nuinera ijo.” Atipet napinera ŋesi koruik ekokor.
Kibelokin Ejakait kosesen Petero. Kiitu Petero akirot ya naka Ejakait, nakelimokinit ŋes ebe, “Lolo, eriŋa ekokor eruikino, kiŋeri eoŋ irwan auni.”
Koloma kiŋa komony noi.
korapanakis akekonye kiŋita atiar, “Kodwaru cani! Iŋai bo kinom jo?”
Koinyanakinete da kakiro nuipu nuka amoromor.
“Arai irai ijo Kristo, kolimokinai.” Kobala ebe, “Karaida kaalimokis yes, mam iyuunete cut;
Arai keeŋit yes, mam iboŋokinete.
Konye amear natikwana iboikin Okoku loka etuŋanan akan nakoteten naka apedor naka Edeke.”
Kobalas kere ebe, “Aso irai kereka ijo Okoku loka Edeke?” Kobala kes ebe, “Yes ibalas ebe arai eoŋ.”
Kobalas ebe, “Kipudar bo inyo bobo nuitejenunete? Naarai kiira oni ikulepek akiro nuka aitukuke.”
Kogeutu aosan, kotemasi atiar, “Kianyu lo itapaari atekerekosi, ka aiteŋer ituŋa ainanakin Kaisar esolo, ebala ebe ŋes elopet erai Kristo ekabaka.”
Kiŋit Pilato ŋes ebe, “Irai kereka ijo ekabaka loka Iyudayan?” Koboŋok ebe, “Ijo ibala.”
Kobala Pilato isasedotin lupeti ka ikodeta ebe, “Mam aanyunit akirot naerono kotuŋanan kalo.”
Konye kiketakis kesi noi, kobalas ebe, “Isidiki ituŋa, isisianakini kotoma Yudaya kere, ameun koGalilaya kiton ne da.”
Kiira Pilato ŋun, kiŋit arai erai etuŋanan ŋol Egalilayat.
Nakejenu ebe erai eyaitono loka Kerode, kijuka ŋes mama ejai Kerode, naarai kejai ŋesi da Yerusalem kapaarasia kaŋun.
Kosodi napekeanyu Kerode Yesu, kiyalamikin noi, naarai abu kokoto lem aanyun ŋes, naarai abu kiiranar akekiro, komuno aanyun aanyunet naiswamai.
Kiŋiriŋit ŋes kakiro nuipu; konye ŋes mam eboŋokino amodiokirot.
Kobwaata isasedotin lupeti ka ikewadikak, kiwosata ŋes kakiro nuipu.
Kosodete Kerode nepepe kikeserikalei kowena Yesu, koboliatar; kitanapata anapito naibus, kinyakas mama ejai Pilato.
Kosodi kapaaran kaŋin kominunos do Kerode ka Pilato, naarai kekolosi lem.
Kosodi kotukonok Pilato isasedotin lupeti ka ikayaitok ka ituŋa,
kotema kes atiar, “Kiinut etuŋanan lo kwape loitapaari ituŋa, eoŋ da eŋitana ŋes kakonyenekus, ido koany, mam abu kaany amodiodiakaret kotoma akiro ŋun kere nuiwosatotor ŋes.
Karaida Kerode, naarai enyaku ŋes mamawok. Aso koany, emamei akirot kere naeswamat naibusakinit atwania;
kanuka ŋun alecori ŋes kasodi aosikin.” [
Kibusakinit ŋes aosikin kes ediopet kopucit.]
Konye kiworoto kere nepepe ebe, “Koyaŋa lo, koosik sio Baraba.”
Kerai ŋesi etuŋanan lokeenitai kanuka aipaliikin kotoma ore, ka aiar da,
Kosodi kiner Pilato kakes bobo, kokoto aosikin Yesu;
konye kiworoto ebe, “Kibubuk, kibubuk baa!”
Kolimok irwan nakiwuniet ebe, “Kanukinyo, naanyoin aronis naeswamat lo? Mam aanyunit kamakeŋ adiokirot naibusakinit atwania; kanuka ŋun alecori ŋes kasodi aosikin.”
Konye kes kiketakis, kilipa kiporotoi luepolok ebe ibusakinit ŋes aibubukinio. Kipikosi iporotoikec.
Kotub Pilato kwape eŋaiŋaitotor.
Koosik etuŋanan lokeenitai kanuka aipaliikin ka aiar, lokilipete; konye koinak Yesu aiswamakinio kwape kekototor.
Kotupite ekodet loepol loka ituŋa, ka aŋor da nukedipidipeete atorobusio ibworosi ŋes.
Konye kibelokin Yesu kobala ebe, “Yes apesur nuko Yerusalem, sirikiimonyata eoŋ, konye komonya akulepek, ka ikusidwe.
Naarai koany, epote apaarasia nuetemariata atiar, ‘Isirereŋitoi arakanin, ka aliligeta numam eurito, ka ikisin da lumam itanakito!’
Kanen egeunete kesi alimokin iroŋan ebe, ‘Kibirunos mamakosi’; ka iukon da ebe, ‘Koraparai’.
Naarai arai kiswamata nu kokitoi loepalal, ikonakinete bo do ai kaloeonit?”
Koyaŋaasi ice da iarei, ikeswamak nueroko, aario nenipe kaŋes.
Nakedolioto aibois naenyaritai Abelekek naka Akou, kibubukis ŋes nen, ka kwi ikeswamak nueroko, ediopet akanike nakoteten, ka ediopet da akanike nakokediany.
Kotema Yesu atiar, “Papa, kisioni kes; naarai mam ejenete nuiswamaete.” Kokorokorata ikenapen kailamilam eroet.
Kobwoete ituŋa esesenete; konye ikayaitok koinyanakinete kobalas ebe, “Etajari lem ice; kitajarun ŋes elopet, arai erai kito Kristo loka Edeke, Loseunake!”
Kokienatar iserikalei da, koloto koinutu ŋes ebino loedwar ria;
kobalas ebe, “Arai irai cani Ekabaka loka lyudayan, kitajarun jo elopet!”
Kujuke da kojai aiwadikaet ebe, “LO ŊES EKABAKA LOKA IYUAYAN.”
Ediopet ka ikeswamak nueroko lukikajakinitai koluik ŋes kobala ebe, “Mere ijo Kristo? Kitajarun bon ka sio da!”
Koboŋok loce kitoron ebe, “Mam jo iyoŋit Edeke, naarai ijai ijo toma atubokinio napena?
Erai na nakabeit kamawok; naarai kitacakinio nukibusakinito kanuka aswamisiowok; konye lo mam iswamat adiokirot naerono.”
Kotema atiar, “Wu Yesu, kiitunoi eoŋ nailomaria toma ajakanutukon.”
Kotema ŋes atiar, “Abeit katemari jo atiar, lolo ijaun nepepe keoŋ Paradais
Komamu aica naka akoloŋ; kocila aigalisit naka aibois nakalaunan kaarei.
Kodelo Yesu keporoto loepol ebe, “Wu Papa, ebwaikini ekamoyo akaninikon.” Kedau einer ŋun, kiridak.
Keanyu ekapolokiton nuadoikis, kitur Edeke, kobala ebe, “Abeit kerai etuŋanan lo loedolit.”
Ikodeta da kere luatukokina aanyun ŋun, keanyutu nuadoikis, koboŋosi ore edipidipeete atorobusio.
Kere da lukejenete ŋes, ka aŋor nuketupito ŋes anyoun koGalilaya, kobwoete kama elwanikina, esesenete akiro ŋun.
(Mam ŋes acamunit ainerunikec ka aswamisioitikec da.) Kerai ŋesi loka Arimataya, ere ediopet loka Iyudayan, edaret ŋesi ajakanut naka Edeke.
Kolot ŋol mama ejai Pilato, kilip akuan naka Yesu.
Kolacu, konunukik ogoe loka ebaputa, kiperik ates nakikeitoi atiiba, namam lem kiperikinitoi idiotuŋanan.
Kerai apaaran naka Aitemonokin, koapie asabato ageun.
Kotupito aŋor nukepote kaŋes koGalilaya, koanyutu ates, ka epone lokiperikinere akekuan.
Koboŋosi kitemonokis lueuru maa ka akinyet.
Konye kapaaran nasodit nakasabato, tupuruc sek, koloto ates, koyaŋaasi lueuru maa lukitemokinito.
Kodumut amoru kikokorior kates.
Kolomasi toma mam eanyuna akuan naka Ejakait Yesu.
Kosodi kanen, napebuonokinos kanuka akirot kaŋin, koany, kobwaata ituŋa iarei aapu kakes enapito inapen luimilias;
nakekuriakarotor kesi ka aitulur akonyenekec kwap, kotemasi ŋul atiar, “Kanukinyo imoototor lokajaran mama ejaas lukatwak?
Emamei kane, konye ajaru, Kiitutu kwape enerar kayes eroko ejai Galilaya,
ebe ibusakinit Okoku loka etuŋanan ainakinio akanin nuka ikadiakanarak, ka aibubukinio, ka ajarun da kapaaran nakiwuniet.”
Kiitut akiroke,
koboŋosi kates, kolimokis lutomon kadiopet ka ice da kere, akiro ŋun kere.
Keraas kesi Mariam Magadalene, ka Yoana, ka Mariam toto naka Yakob, ka aŋor ace nuajaas nepepe kakes, nualimokinete ikiyakia akiro ŋun.
Kosubito akiro ŋun kakonyenekec bala nukabaŋaanut; mam apotu kiyuut kes.
Konye konyou Petero, koker kiton ates; kokukum kireik toma, koany igoen luka ebaputa egitara; koboŋo ore eumokinit nuajaut.
Emao, lokelwanikina ko Yerusalem bala amairon akanykaarei,
kineranakinos kesi bonik akiro ŋun kere nuadoikis.
Napinerasi epeganakinos, kikunyak Yesu elopet koupakinos kakes.
Konye koraparai akecekonye kinyeis ajenun ŋes,
Kotema kes atiar, “Akiro anyoika ŋun nuineranakinos ilosete?” Kobwaata ekadakinito.
Kosodi ediopet kakes, ekekiror Keleopa, Koboŋok ebe, “Ijo bon ipejonikinit ko Yerusalem tape mam ijeni nuadoikis nen kapaarasia kanu?”
Kotema kes atiar, “Anyoika?” Kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Akiro nuka Yesu loko Nasaret, lokerai enabi lokapedor kotoma aswamisio ka akiro kakonyen nuka Edeke ka ituŋa da kere.
Bobo da epone loejaikiniata ŋes isasedotin lupeti ka ikayaitokowok toma atubokinio naka atwanare, kibubukis.
Konye kipou isio kamunosi ebe ŋes loekoto alakun Isirael. Eebo, keja ŋun da, lolo ŋes apaaran nakiwuniet ameun naeswamatar akiro ŋun.
Bobo da, kituwumokis sio ace kaŋor nukokodetekosi, nuadilito sek ates,
mam eanyuna akekuan; kopotu ebalas ebe etakanikina kes imalaikan luabalas ebe ejari ŋesi.
Ice da lukejaas nenipe kasio apotu koloto ates, koanyut kwape kwaŋin kwape eneratar aŋor kwa; konye mam apotu koanyutu ŋes.”
Kotema kes atiar, “Wu yes luedit aijen, luiyapete da itauon aiyuun kere nukineras inabin!
Mam kereka ebusakinit Kristo aiticanio ŋun, ka alomar da toma aibusesuke?”
Kosodi ageun kama ka Musa ka inabin kere kitejen kotoma kanukiwadikatai kere akiro nuabeito ŋes.
Keapikis ere lokelosete, kosubite bala elitor kiŋaren;
konye kitiŋaasi ŋes, kobalas ebe, “Kosalak ne kasio, naarai ekamus akwap, aapu apaaran adaun.” Koloma kosal kakes.
Kosodi nakiboioto kakes enyamete, kolem emugati, kisirereŋ, kobilibil koinak kes.
Kopukoroi akecekonye kojenut ŋes; koolio kakonyenekec.
Kotemanaros bonik atiar, “Mam tope amulaete iwokotauon naenerar kaoni korot, ka aikujonokin oni nukiwadikatai?”
Konyout kosawa kaŋope kaŋol koboŋosi Yerusalem, kodumut lutomon ka lodiopet etukokina, kes ka lukejaas nepepe kakes,
ebalas ebe, “Abeit ajaru Ejakait, etakanikin ŋesi Simon,”
Kes da kolimokis akiro kwa nukorot, ka epone lokitejenunor mamakec kotoma abilibil emugati.
Konye korieŋutu kokuriakata noi, koomitos ebe aanyut etoil.
Kotema kes atiar, “Kanukinyo iyaloŋoŋooto, kanukinyo da iŋitanarotor kotauonokus?
Koanyutu akakanin ka akakeje, ebe eoŋ lopelo: kotiroroi, koanyutu; naarai emamei etoil akuan, ka akojo da, kwape ianyuniata ejaas eoŋ.”
Kedau einer ŋun, kitodik kes akekanin ka akekeje,
Naarokotor mam iyuuna kanuka aiyalama, koumokis da, kotema kes atiar, “Ejaas yes idisinyamat?”
Koinakis atutubet naka agar naipoo.
Kolem, konyam kakonyenekec.
Kosodi kikujok akececoa ajenun nukiwadikatai.
Kotema kes atiar, “Kwaŋin iwadikatai ebe ibusakinit Kristo aiticanio, ka ajarun da kotoma okatwak kapaaran nakiwuniet.
Ebe da elimonokinio atekerin kere kokirorike aitoronikin ka aisionio naka adiakanareta, agear ko Yerusalem,
iraas yesi da ikajenak luka akiro kaŋun.
Ido koany, kejukakini yes aisumunet naka Papaka; konye kiboikinos ore, aitodol nekitanapere yes apedor naebuni kokuju.”
Kosodi kanen napisirereŋi kes, kotiakar kamakec, koyaŋaarai toma akuj.
Komaata ŋes, koboŋosi Yerusalem kailel naepol:
Kojaenenas duc toma oyekalu, ituritos Edeke.
Kojai ŋol kageunet mama ejai Edeke.
Kesubio iboro kere kanukeŋ; kemamei ŋesi mam kesubi ibore kere yenikesubio.
Kojai aijar tomakeŋ; korai aijar ŋin aica naka ituŋa.
Ecai aica kamuton, ido mam amuton ipikorit.
Kobu ŋol araut ekajenan, tetere itejenuni nuka aica kaŋin, tetere iyuunete kere kanukeŋ.
Mam ŋol kerai aica ŋin, dimarai kobu tetere itejenuni nuka aica.
Kejai aica nakabeit naecaikini ŋinituŋanan ebunit toma akwap.
Kejai ŋesi toma akwap, kesubio akwap kanukeŋ, ido mam akwap abu kojenu ŋes,
Abu kobu obukeŋ, ido ŋul lukeraas iketuŋa mam apotu kisukunyut.
Konye ŋul kere lukisukunyunete ŋes, koinak apedor araut idwe luka Edeke, kes ŋul luiyuunito ekekiror:
lumam keurio kaokot, karaida koipud loka akuan, karaida koipud loka ekiliokit, dimarai kanuka Edeke.
Etejenuni Yokana nukeŋ, eworoi ebe, “Ŋol ŋes loabu eoŋ kabala ebe, ŋol loebunit kokaukaŋ arau lokageikini; naarai ajai ŋesi sek ageikin eoŋ.”
Ido kotoma ailelebake kipou kere kadumutu, asianut da itia asianut.
Naarai ikisila etorunere neejai Musa, konye asianut ka abeit etorunere neejai Yesu Kristo.
Emamei ituŋanan yeneanyunit Edeke kapakio kere; Okoku loteluna, loejai atorob naka Papa, ŋol ŋes etejenuni.
Kolimo, mam abu kogir, konye kolimo ebe, “Mam eoŋ arai Kristo.”
Kiŋita ŋes ebe, “Inyo bo do? Irai kereka ijo Eliya?” Kotema atiar, “Mam arai,” “Irai kereka ijo enabi je?” Koboŋok ebe, “Mam.”
Kanuka ŋun kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Iŋai bo do ijo? Kaboŋokisi kwi lukiijukunete. Ibala bo ijo ai kanukon?”
Kotema atiar, “Arai eoŋ eporoto loka yeniworoi kamodiŋ ebe, ‘Kitetenata erot loka Ejakait,’ kwape kineritor enabi Isaia.”
Ejukunitai kes kama ejaas Iparisayon.
Kiŋita ŋes, kotemasi atiar, “Kanukinyo ibatisaa, arai mam jo irai Kristo, arai Eliya, karaida enabi je?”
Koboŋok Yokana kotema atiar, “Ebatisai eoŋ kakip; konye ebwoi kokidiŋikus lomam yes ijenete,
ŋes ŋol loebunit kokaukaŋ, lomam kebusakinit eoŋ ailac arukan naka amukatake.”
Eswamao ŋun koBetaniya okekwa Yorodan, neajai Yokana ibatisai.
Ŋol ŋes loabu eoŋ kenerite ebe, ‘Ebunit kokaukaŋ etuŋanan lokageikini, naarai ajai ŋesi sek ageikin eoŋ.’
Kwabo mam abu kajeni ŋes; konye abu eoŋ kabu ebatisai kakipi tetere itodikinio ŋes Isirael.”
Kitejen Yokana ebe, “Aany Emoyo edokuni kokuju kwape kajele, kosal mamakeŋ.
Kwabo mam abu kajeni ŋes; konye kabala ŋes lokejukuni eoŋ aibatis kakipi ebe, ‘Ŋol loianyuni Emoyo edokuni mamakeŋ kosalak, ŋes ŋol loibatisai kEmoyo Lokalaunan.’
Aany eoŋ, etejen da ebe erai ŋol Okoku loka Edeke.”
Bobo da kapaaran naatupakini kobwoi Yokana nepepe kikekesisiak iarei;
kosesen Yesu elosi, kotema atiar, “Koany Imerekek yenika Edeke!”
Kiirasi ikesisiak ŋul iarei inera ŋesi, kotupasi Yesu.
Kibelokin Yesu koany etupito ŋes, kotema kes atiar, “Imoete inyo?” Kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Rabi, (apolouke Ekesisianakinan,) iboie kai?”
Kotema kes atiar, “Kopotu ianyunete.” Koloto, koanyutu nekiboio; kosalakis mamakeŋ apaaran ŋin, naarai kerai bala esawa lokitomonet.
Anderea, onaceke ka Simon Petero, ŋes arai ediopet kaluarei lueirarete Yokana, kotupasi Yesu.
Kodum ber ŋesi Simon onaceke, kotema ŋes atiar, “Kidumu Mesia,” (apolouke ebe Kristo).
Koyaŋa ŋes mama ejai Yesu. Kosesen Yesu ŋes, kotema atiar, “Ijo Simon okoku loka Yokana, Kinyarao Kepa” (apolouke ebe Petero, arai Amoru).
Kerai Pilip loko Betesaida, ere loka Anderea ka Petero.
Kodum Pilip Natanael, kotema ŋes atiar, “Kidum ŋol lokiwadikai Musa kotoma okisila, ka inabin da, Yesu loko Nasaret, okoku loka Yosep.”
Kotema Natanael ŋes atiar, “Epedori tope ibore yenejok alomun koNasaret?” Kotema Pilip atiar, “Bia koany.”
Koany Yesu Natanael ebunit mamakeŋ, kiner nuke ebe, “Koany, lokIsirael obe, loemamei aimod kotomakeŋ!”
Kotema Natanael ŋes atiar, “Kikonakini ai kijenuni eoŋ?” Koboŋok Yesu ebe, “Eriŋa Pilip kenyarauna jo, naijaar kwap ketiŋi abu kaany jo.”
Koboŋok Natanael ebe, “Rabi, irai ijo Okoku loka Edeke! Irai ijo Ekabaka loka Isirael!”
Koboŋok Yesu ebe, “Naarai kalimok jo ebe abu kaany jo kwap ketiŋi, ŋes iyuunia? Ianyuni akiro nuepolok aitelekarit nu.”
Kotema ŋes atiar, “Abeit, abeit, katemari yes atiar, Ianyunete akuj eŋaara, ka imalaikan luka Edeke edokarete edokunete da mama ejai Okoku loka etuŋanan.”
konyararai Yesu da ka ikekesisiak opucit.
Kedaun ebino, kotema totoke Yesu atiar, “Emamei kes ebino.”
Kotema Yesu ŋes atiar, “Toto, anyoika eoŋ ka jo? Eroko akapak edolo.”
Kolimok totoke ikejaanakinak ebe, “Nukilimokini kere, kiswamata.”
Aso kejaas nen akaalakanya akanykape nuka amor, kibwaikinitai kes nen kanuka epone loka Iyudayan loka aitesegaar, nuilosikinos akeito aarei arai auni.
Kotema Yesu kes atiar, “Kilelebata akaalakanya akipi.” Kes da kilelebata kiton atokitoit,
Kotema kes atiar, “Aso do kooko, koinasi ekapolon loka epucit.” Koinasi.
Kosodi kiir ekapolon loka epucit akipi nukeluoros ebino, komam ejeni nekebunio, (konye kojenete ikejaanakinak luaokete akipi,) konyarau ekapolon loka epucit eteran,
kotema ŋes atiar, “Ŋinituŋanan itemokini ber ebino loejijim, kosodi kedaut ituŋa aimat noi, eyaunio do loepiana; konye jo iŋadak loejijim kiton kwana,”
Abu Yesu kiswama aanyunet na nasodit koKana loko Galilaya, kitodia da akeibuses; kiyuutu ikekesisiak ŋes.
Kodum kotoma oyekalu lukegwelanarete imoŋin ka amerekekin ka ajeleik da, ka ikesiecanarak arupian iboiete.
Kosub edaset kaunoi, kireŋea kes kere koyekalu, amerekekin ka imoŋin da; kobuko arupian nuka ikesiecanarak, kobuburiana imesanakec.
Kolimok ŋul lukegwelanarete ajeleik ebe, “Kolemasi ŋun; sirikituluosi etogo loka Papaka araut logwelanaret.”
Kiitut ikekesisiak ebe iwadikatai ebe, “Kaari ekokote loka ekonitogo.”
Kosodete koboŋokis Iyudayan kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Aanyunet anyoin nakitodikini ijo sio naarai iswama nu?”
Koboŋok Yesu ebe, “Kotiyakisi eyekalu lo, ido adukokini eoŋ apaarasia auni.”
Kosodete kotemasi Iyudayan atiar, “Eyekalu lo lokedukokinio ikar akaisaoŋon ka lukanykape, iduki tope ijo kotoma apaarasia auni?”
Konye enera ŋesi nuka eyekalu loka akuanake.
Aso nakejarunia kotoma okatwak, kiitut ikekesisiak ebe enerit ŋun; kiyuut nakiwadikatai ka akirot da nakinera Yesu.
Nakejaar Yerusalem kapak naka epucit loka Aleleŋ, kiyuut ituŋa luipu ekekiror, nakeanyuniata aanyuneta nukiswamai,
Konye Yesu mam abu komunokina kes, naarai kejeni ituŋa kere,
komam ipuda ituŋanan aitejenun ŋes nuka ituŋa; naarai kejeni ŋesi elopet nukejaas otuŋa.

Kobu ŋol mama ejai Yesu kuare, kotema ŋes atiar, “Rabi, kijeni ebe irai ijo Ekesisianakinan loibunit kama ejai Edeke; naarai emamei ituŋanan yenepedori aswam aanyuneta nu nuiswamai ijo, dimikito ejai Edeke kaŋes.”
Koboŋok Yesu kotema ŋes atiar, “Abeit, abeit, katemari jo atiar, Arai mam ituŋanan eurio nakiareit, mam epedori aanyun ajakanut naka Edeke.”
Kobala Nikodemo ŋes ebe, “Ikwaikini ai ituŋanan eurio kemojoŋ? Epedori kereka airucakin alomar akoik naka totoke, kouriai?”
Koboŋok Yesu ebe, “Abeit, abeit, katemari jo atiar, Arai mam ituŋanan eurio kakipi ka Emoyo, mam epedori alomun ajakanut naka Edeke.
Ibore yeneuriei akuan erai akuan; ka yeneuriei Emoyo erai emoyo,
Sirikiwumok naarai kabala jo ebe, Ibusakinit yes aurio nakiareit.
Ekusi ekwam mama ekot, ipupi airurumake; konye mam ipedori aijen kama kebunio, karaida mama ebei; ikoni nen ŋinituŋanan yeneuriei Emoyo.”
Koboŋok Nikodemo kotema ŋes atiar, “Ikwaikinete ŋun ai epedoros?”
Koboŋok Yesu kotema ŋes atiar, “Irai tope ijo ekesisianakinan loka Isirael, komam ijeni akiro ŋun?
Abeit, abeit, katemari jo atiar, Kinera nukijeni, kitejenuni da nukianyunit; konye do mam yes icamunito akosiitejenun.
Arai abu kalimok yes akiro nuka akwap komam iyuunete, ikote Iyuunete ai arai kaalimokis akiro nuka akuj?
Emamei yenabu kodokarite toma akuj, dimarai ŋol lokedokuni kotoma akuj, ŋes Okoku loka etuŋanan.
Kwape kolo kikajakinia Musa emun kamodiŋ, ibusakinit Okoku loka etuŋanan da aikajakinio kwape kwaŋin:
tetere ŋinituŋanan yeniyuuni ŋes kojaas kaijar naka ikar kere.”
Naarai mam Edeke ejukunit Okokuke akwapin tetere itelekarete akwapin akiro, dimarai tetere itajario akwapin kanukeŋ.
Ŋin yeniyuuni ŋes mam itelekarete akiro; yenimam iyuuni ŋes adaut akiro aitelekar, naarai mam abu kiyuu ekiror loka Okoku loteluna loka Edeke.
Lo da ŋes etube, ebe abu aica kobu akwapin, konye kominas ituŋa amuton aitelekarit aica, naarai aroko aswamisiokec.
Naarai ŋinituŋanan yeniswamai nueroko elait aica, kwabo mam ebuni neejai aica, kinyeis akeswamisio aideleleun.
Konye yeniswamai nukabeit ebuni neejai aica, tetere etakanete akeswamisio, ebe iswamatai kotoma Edeke.
Kibatisai Yokana da kAenon naeapias ka Salim, naarai kejaas akipi nuipu nen; kolosenenete ituŋa mamakeŋ kibatisai.
Naarai koriŋa Yokana eenikina aidaris.
Aso kojau epeget ikekesisiak luka Yokana ka Eyudayat kanuka aitalaun.
Koloto mama ejai Yokana, kotemasi atiar, “Rabi, ŋol loajai nenipe kajo okekwa Yorodan, lokitejenunit, koany, ibatisai ŋol, ido elosenenete ituŋa kere mamakeŋ.”
Koboŋok Yokana ebe, “Mam epedori ituŋanan adumun akirot kere dimikito einakinitai abunore kotoma akuj.
Itejenut yesi ikulepek ebe, abu kener ebe, Mam eoŋ arai Kristo, dimarai kejukunitai aiŋarenikin ŋes.
Loejaas kateran ŋes eteran; konye epapero loka eteran, loebwoi iirari ŋes, elelakinit noi eporoto loka eteran; aso adol do akaiyalama ŋin.
Ibusakinit ŋes aiyatakin, konye eoŋ aiŋoŋar.”
Itejenuni ŋun nueanyunit ka nuiirarit da, kwabo emamei yeniyuuni akeitejenun.
Yeniyuunit akeitejenun itogogoŋit ebe Edeke ŋes abeit.
Naarai lokijukuni Edeke inera akiro nuka Edeke: naarai mam Edeke einakini Emoyo kaitemis.
Emina Papa Okoku, ititiŋit iboro kere.
Yeniyuuni Okoku ejaas kaijar naka ikar kere; konye yenimam erima Okoku mam eanyuni aijar, konye esalakini ŋes anyunyura naka Edeke.
(Kwabo mam Yesu elopet kibatisai, dimarai ikekesisiak,)
kinye Yudaya kolot bobo Galilaya.
Kibusakinit ŋes aitor kidiŋ Samaria.
Kosodi kodol ore loko Samaria, loenyaritai Sukar, loaapias kamana nakeinakini Yakob okokuke Yosep.
Kejai nen atan naka Yakob, aso naarai kepasit Yesu kanuka alositeke, kiboikin atan. Kerai bala esawa lokikanyetekape.
Kobu aberu naSamariat aiwok akipi. Kotema Yesu ŋes atiar, “Ae akipi kamat.”
Naarai kelositos ikekesisiak ore agwel inyamat.
Kotema aberu naSamariat ŋes atiar, “Ikonakini ai ijo Eyudayat kilipi eoŋ akipi, eoŋ naarai Asamariat?” Naarai mam Iyudayan imorikikina kIsamarian.
Koboŋok Yesu kotema atiar, “Arai kijeni ainakinet naka Edeke, ka ŋol da lokibala ebe, Ae akipi kamat, tikilipi ŋes, tikiinak jo akipi nukajarak.”
Kotema aberu ŋes atiar, “Ejakait, emamei jo ibore yeniwokunet, idul atan da; aso idumuni kai akipi ŋun nukajarak?
Ipol kereka ijo aitelekarit papaakosi Yakob, loabu koinak sio atan na, ŋes da elopet komat akipike, nepepe kikedwe, ka ikebaren da?”
Koboŋok Yesu kotema ŋes atiar, “Ŋin yenemasi akipi nu ejaki bobo akur,
konye yenemasi akipi nuainakini eoŋ, mam ejaki akur ikar kere; konye akipi nuainakini eoŋ eraunete kotomake atan naka akipi nuibulubulitos kiton aijar namam edaun.”
Kobala aberu ŋes ebe, “Ejakait, koinakinai eoŋ akipi ŋun kenyek akur aijak, karaida abunenen ne aiwok akipi.”
Kotema Yesu ŋes atiar, “Kolot, konyarau okilenikon, koboŋu ne,”
Koboŋok aberu ebe, “Emamei eoŋ ekiliokit.” Kotema Yesu atiar, “Inera abeit ebe, Emamei eoŋ ekiliokit;
naarai kijaas kikiliok ikany, ŋol da loijaatar kwana mam erai okilenikon; inera nu abeit.”
Kotema aberu atiar, “Ejakait, aanyun ebe irai enabi.
Kemaete lukapapaakosi koroŋat kalo; ibalasi yesi ebe Yerusalem ŋes aibois naibusakinit amaia.”
Kotema Yesu ŋes atiar, “Toto, kiyuunai, ebunit esawa lomam imaiata bobo Papa koroŋat kalo karaida Yerusalem.
Imaete yesi yenimam ijenete; kimai isio yenikijeni, naarai ebunit aitajario kotoma oYudayan.
Konye ebunit esawa, ejai da kwana, loemaiata ikamaak lukabeit Papa, kotoma omoyo ka abeit, naarai emoot Papa ituŋa luikote nen aima ŋes.
Erai Edeke Emoyo, ŋul da luemaete ŋes, ibusakinit aima kotoma omoyo ka abeit.”
Kotema aberu ŋes atiar, “Ajeni ebe ebunit Mesia (ŋol Ioenyaritai Kristo); naebunio ŋesi kipukokini sio akiro kere.”
Kotema Yesu ŋes atiar, “Eoŋ lopelo lokinera kajo.”
Atipet kopotu ikekesisiak, koumokis naarai kineras kaberu, konye mam loabu kolim ebe, “Ikoto inyo?” Arai ebe, “Kanukinyo ineratar kaŋes?”
Aso kinyek aberu akemot, kolot ore, kolimok ituŋa ebe,
“Kopotu, koanyut etuŋanan lokalimoki akiro kere nukeswamaenenei. Epedori kereka lo araut Kristo?”
Kolomutu kesi kore koloto mamakeŋ.
Kapak kaŋin kiŋaiŋaata ikesisiak ebe, “Rabi, konyam.”
Konye kotema kes atiar, “Ejaas eoŋ inyamat lumam yes ijenete.”
Kineranakinos ikesisiak ebe, “Ejai ca nat yeneinunit ŋes inyamat?”
Kotema Yesu kes atiar, “Ikanyamat kes luta, aswam nuekot lokejukuni, ka aitodol da akeswam.
Mam kereka ibalasi yesi ebe, ‘Eroko esalito ilapio iwoŋon, kodoli aidweny’? Katemari yes atiar, Kikeutu akusikonye, koanyut amanat ebe adaut areŋeun adwenyio,
Eropio ekadwenyan, etukonokini araito kanuka aijar namam edaun, tetere iyalamikinos ekayean ka ekadwenyan nepepe.
Naarai erai akirot nakabeit ebe, ‘Eyei ice, edwenyi da ice.’
Abu kejuka yes aidweny ŋun numam kitaaritotor; konye kitaaritos ice, ilomakis yesi aitaaritoikec.”
Kiyuut Isamarian luipu kotoma ore kaŋol kanuka akirot naka aberu, nakitejenunit ebe, “Abu kalimok akiro kere nukeswamaenenei.”
Aso nakeponiata Isamarian mamakeŋ, kiŋaiŋaata ŋes asalakin kakes; kosalak do nen apaarasia aarei.
Kiyuut ice luipu kanuka akekirot.
Kotemasi aberu atiar, “Kiyuunit kwana, mere kanuka ekoniiner bon, naarai kiira isio ikulepek, kijenu da ebe abeit erai ŋol Eketajaran loka akwapisinei.”
Naarai kitejen Yesu elopet ebe mam enabi eyoŋio kobukec.
Aso nakedolio Galilaya, kisukunyikis Igalilayan, naarai apotu koanyutu akiro kere nukiswamai koYerusalem kopucit, naarai kelosito ŋul da opucit.
Kiira ŋol ebe ebunit Yesu Galilaya anyoun koYudaya, kolot neejai kiŋaiŋa aijesar aitaŋaleun okokuke, naarai keapikinit atwanare.
Kotema Yesu ŋes atiar, “Arai mam ianyunete aanyuneta ka nukaumokin, mam iyuunete cut.”
Kobala lokapolou ebe, “Ejakait, kijesar eroko ikakoku ketwana.”
Kotema Yesu ŋes atiar, “Kolot; ejari okokukon.” Kiyuu etuŋanan akirot nakelimokini Yesu ŋes, kolot.
Kosodi napijesar kiriamakinos kikebulesin, lukebalas ebe ejari okokuke.
Kiŋit kes esawa lokegeunia aitemokin, kolimokis ŋes ebe, “Bian esawa lokikanyetekaarei alakakinia ekamidi ŋes.”
Kosodi kojen papake ebe ŋes esawa je lokelimokinia Yesu ebe, “Ejari okokukon.” Kiyuu ŋesi ka lukokaleke kere.
Ŋin ŋes aanyunet nakiareit nakiswamai Yesu nakenyounio koYudaya adolore Galilaya.
Akaulo kaŋun kojai epucit loka Iyudayan, kodoka Yesu Yerusalem.
KoYerusalem ejai atapar ariri kerute loka amerekekin, nakenyaritai kAburanian Betesata, naejaas alomareta akany.
Koperenenete lukadekak luipu kanen, imudukiok, ka luicodos, ka lukasenyak da, [lukidarito akulaun naka akipi,
Naarai kejai apak nakedokununia emalaika loka Ejakait atapar, kigur akipi: aso yenikegei alomar kedaun aigur akipi koŋaleuni adeka kere nakikamunit.]
Kojai nen etuŋanan, lokedeka ikar akaisauni ka lukanykauni.
Nakeanyunia Yesu ŋol eperi kojen ebe kikoni nen ikar luipu, kotema ŋes atiar, “Ikoto aŋaleun?”
Koboŋok lokadekan ebe, “Ejakait, emamei eoŋ etuŋanan lokebwaikini eoŋ atapar naitukulaunere akipi, konye naalosio, kageikini icetuŋanan adokar.”
Kotema Yesu ŋes atiar, “Konyou, kibwok akonikapet, kolot.”
Atipet koŋaleu etuŋanan ŋol, kibwok akekapet, kolot.
Kerai da apaaran ŋin nakasabato.
Kanuka ŋun kolimokis Iyudayan etuŋanan lokitaŋaleunio ebe, “Erai lolo nakasabato, mam ibus jo aibwok akonikapet.”
Konye Koboŋok ebe, “Ŋol loketaŋaleuni ŋes kalimokini ebe, ‘Kibwok akonikapet, kolot.’ ”
Kiŋita ebe, “Iŋai bo ŋol lokilimokini ebe, ‘Kibwok, kolot?’ ”
Konye etuŋanan lokitaŋaleunio mam kejeni ebe erai iŋai, naarai koekarite Yesu, naarai ajaas ituŋa luipu aibois ŋin.
Kokau kaŋun kodum Yesu ŋes koyekalu, kotema ŋes atiar, “Koany, iŋaleu! Sirikidiaka bobo, kinyek akirot naerono adepar ŋin adoikin jo.”
Kolot etuŋanan kolimok Iyudayan ebe kerai Yesu lokitaŋaleuni ŋes.
Kanuka ŋun kimanata Iyudayan Yesu, naarai kiswamai ŋun kapaaran nakasabato.
Konye Koboŋok Yesu kes ebe, “Iswamai Papaka kiton kwana, eoŋ da eswamai.”
Aso kanuka akirot kaŋin kiyatakis Iyudayan amoot aiar Ŋes, naarai mere bon aibil asabato, konye kanu anyaritor Edeke Papake, kitiriana da ka Edeke.
Naarai emin Papa Okoku, itodikini ŋes kere nuiswamai ŋesi elopet; itodikini da aswamisio nuitelekarito ŋun, tetere yes iwumokinete.
Naarai kwape itajaria Papa lukatwak ka ainakin kes aijar, kwaŋin einakinia Okoku da ŋul luekot aijar.
Mam Papa etubokini idiotuŋanan kere akiro, konye ainak Okoku etube kere,
tetere ituŋa kere itopoloorete Okoku, kwape itopolooritotor Papa. Ŋin yenimam itopoloori Okoku mam itopoloori Papa da lokijukuni.
Abeit, abeit, katemari yes atiar, ŋin yeniirari akakirot ka aiyuun ŋol lokejukuni, ejaas kaijar naka ikar kere; kwabo mam elomari toma atubokinio, konye anyou kotoma atwanare aloma aijar.
Naarai kwape ejaatar Papa aijar kotomakeŋ, kwape kwaŋin abu koinak Okoku da ajaut kaijar kotomakeŋ;
koinak ŋes apedor naka aitub, naarai erai Okoku loka etuŋanan,
Sirikiwumokis akiro nu; naarai ebunit esawa, loiirariata ituŋa kere luejaas toma atesin ekeporoto,
elomunete; ŋul luiswamato nuejok mama ejai ajarun naka aijar; ka ŋul da luiswamato nueroko, mama ejai ajarun naka atubokinio.
Arai ketejenu eoŋ nukaŋ elopet, akaitejenun mam erai nakabeit;
ejai ece loitejenuni nukaŋ, ajeni eoŋ ebe akeitejenun naitejenunia nukaŋ erai nakabeit.
Ipotu yesi kijukut ituŋa mama ejai Yokana, kitejenu ŋesi abeit.
Konye eoŋ mam adumuni aitejenunio naebuni kotuŋa; konye enera eoŋ nu tetere yes kitajario.
Kerai ŋol atala naenoki kocai, yes da ikotos aisiyalamikin akeica apak naedit.
Konye aitejenun nakijaar eoŋ erai naepol adepar naka Yokana; naarai aswamisio nukainakinit Papa aitodolikin, aswamisio akulepek nueswamai, itejenunito nukaŋ ebe, kejukunit Papa.
Papa da lokejukunit, etejenunit nukaŋ, Mam yes iirarito ekeporoto apaarasia kere, karaida aanyun akeput.
Mam da akekirot esalit tomakus, naarai mam yes iyuunitos lokijukuni ŋesi.
Imoete kotoma nukiwadikatai, naarai iwomito ebe ijaunete kaijar naka ikar kere kotomakec; ŋun da itejenunito nukaŋ;
kwabo iŋerete aponare mamakaŋ tetere ijaunete kaijar.
Mam eoŋ adumuni aibuses kotuŋa.
Konye kajeni yes, ebe emamei amin naka Edeke kotomakus.
Abu kabu kokiror loka Papaka, mam yes kisukunyikis eoŋ; arai kebu ece kokirorike elopet, isukunyikinete ŋol.
Ipedorete biai aiyuun, yes luidumanakinos aibuses bonik komam imoete aibuses naebuni kama ejai Edeke ediopet bon?
Siriwomito ebe kewosai yes kama ejai Papa; ejai lokiwosai, ŋes Musa, loimunosi yesi.
Naarai arai kiyuunito Musa, tikiyuut eoŋ da, naarai abu ŋesi kiwadika nukaŋ.
Konye arai mam iyuunito akeiwadikaeta, ikwaikinete ai iyuunete akakiro?”
Kotupa ekodet loepol, naarai apotu koanyut aanyuneta nukiswamakini lukadekak.
Kodoka Yesu oroŋat, kiboikin nen nepepe kikekesisiak.
Keapie Aleleŋ, epucit loka Iyudayan.
Aso kikeu Yesu akekonye, koany ekodet loepol ebunit mama ejai, kotema ŋesi Pilip atiar, “Kigweli kai inyamat, konyamata lu?”
Kinera ŋun aitem ŋes: naarai ajeni ŋesi elopet nuelosi aswam.
Koboŋok Pilip ebe, “Inyamat luka adenarin akwat aarei mam ilosikinos kes, arai kenyam ŋinituŋanan idis tai.”
Ediopet kokesisiakake, ŋes Anderea onace loka Simon Petero, kotema ŋes atiar,
“Ejai ne isapat, yenejaas imugatin ikany lukesairi, ka agaria aarei: konye epedorete inyo ŋul kotuŋa luetia nen?”
Kotema Yesu atiar, “Kisiboikis ituŋa.” Kejaas anya nuipu aibois ŋin, Aso kiboikinos ikiliok, kwaka ilukumin ikany.
Kosodi kolem Yesu imugatin; kedau aimal, kokorak lukiboiete; kikonak nen agaria, koinak kwape akototor.
Nakimonikinotor, kolimok ikekesisiak ebe, “Kotukonokisi atutubeta nuabilibila nuesalito, sirikedepar imodiobore.”
Kosodete kotukonokis, kilelebata ibukito itomon ka luarei atutubeta nuabilibila nuka imugatin ikany lukesairi, nukitasalete kwi lukenyamete.
Kosodete nakeanyuniata ituŋa aanyunet naeswamai, kobalas ebe, “Abeit lo ŋes enabi loebunit akwapin.”
kodokas ataker, kogeut aikwaŋar alosit Kaparanaum. Komutonor akwap, komam ber Yesu ebunit mamakec.
Kogeu aŋolol akulaun kanuka aikut naka ekwam loepol.
Nakikwaŋarotor bala amairon auni arai aoŋon, koanyut Yesu itorit aŋolol, ikunyunit ataker; kokuriakaros.
Konye kotema kes atiar, “Eoŋ lo: sirikikuriakaros.”
Aso kokotosi aisukunyuun ŋes ataker; atipet kodol ataker akwap naabeete kesi.
Apaaran naatupakini keany ekodet loabwoi kokekwa kaŋolol ebe emamei acetaker, dimarai adiopet bon, bobo da ebe mam Yesu adokarit ataker ŋin nepepe kikekesisiak, konye alosito ikekesisiak bonik.
(Konye kopotu atakerin ace anyoun koTiberia koapias kaibois nakenyamiata imugatin kedau Ejakait aimal.)
Aso nakeanyunia ekodet ebe emamei Yesu kanen, karaida ikekesisiak, kodokasi kesi ikulepek atakerin, koloto Kaparanaum, emooto Yesu.
Nakedumuniata ŋes kokekwa kaŋolol, kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Rabi, kibuni ijo ne wori?”
Koboŋok Yesu ebe, “Abeit, abeit, katemari yes atiar, kimoete eoŋ, mere kanuianyuniata aanyuneta, konye naarai ipotu konyama imugatin kimonikinos.
Siritaaritos kanuka inyamat luedaunos, konye kanuka inyamat luikuniasi kiton aijar naka ikar kere, lukiinakini Okoku loka etuŋanan; naarai ŋol ŋes loepucakinit Papa.”
Kosodete kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Kikonakini ai tetere kiswamai aswamisio nuka Edeke?”
Koboŋok Yesu kotema kes atiar, “Na Ŋes aswam naka Edeke, kiyuut ŋol lokijukuni ŋesi.”
Kosodete kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Aso ca iswamai aanyunet anyoin, tetere kianyun keyuutu jo? Iswamai aswam anyoin?
Apotu lukapapaakosi konyama emanu kamodiŋ; kwape iwadikatere ebe, ‘Koinak kes inyamat lukepote kotoma akuj ainyam.’ ”
Kotema Yesu kes atiar, “Abeit, abeit, katemari yes atiar, Mere Musa kiinakini yes inyamat ŋul lukepote kotoma akuj; konye Papaka ŋes kiinakini yes inyamat lukabeit luepote kotoma akuj.
Naarai inyamat luka Edeke ŋes ŋin yenijesuni kotoma akuj, ka ainakin akwapisinei aijar.”
Kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Ejakait, koinakinai inyamat lu apaarasia kere.”
Konye katema yes atiar kianyut eoŋ, komam iyuunito.
Kere lukainakini Papa epote mama ajai; ŋin da yenebuni mamakaŋ mam cut ereŋeari.
Naarai ejesuna kotoma akuj, mere aswam nuakoto eoŋ, dimarai nuekot lokejukuni.
Nuekot lokejukuni kes nu ebe, Kotoma kaŋul kere lukainakini siriketoolio idiopet da, konye ketajar kapaaran nakawasia.
Naarai nuekot Papaka kes nu ebe, Yeneanyuni Okoku ka aiyuun ŋes kojaut kaijar naka ikar kere; etajaruni eoŋ ŋes kapaaran nakawasia.”
Kosodete kirurumakis ŋes Iyudayan, naarai abala ebe, “Arai eoŋ inyamat lukijesunos kotoma akuj.”
Kobalas ebe, “Mere kereka lo Yesu, okoku loka Yosep, lokijeni papake ka totoke? Ikwaikini ai ebala ebe, Ejesun eoŋ kotoma akuj?”
Koboŋok Yesu kotema kes atiar, “Sirikirurumata bonik ka bonik.
Emamei ituŋanan yenepedori abunore mamakaŋ arai mam eriunit Papa lokejukuni; eoŋ da etajaruni ŋes kapaaran nakawasia.
Iwadikatai kotoma onabin ebe, ‘Isisianakini Edeke kes kere.’ Ŋin yeniirarit, ka aisisiaun kaneejai Papa, ebuni mamakaŋ.
Mere ebe eanyunit ituŋanan Papa, dimarai ŋol loabuu kama ejai Edeke; ŋol ŋes eanyunit Papa.
Abeit, abeit, katemari yes atiar, Yeniyuunit ejaas kaijar naka ikar kere.
Arai eoŋ inyamat luka aijar.
Apotu lukapapaakus konyamata emanu kamodiŋ, kotwaka da.
Lu kes inyamat luijesunos kotoma akuj, tetere enyami ituŋanan kes komam etwani.
Arai eoŋ inyamat lukajarak lukijesunos kotoma akuj; arai kenyam ituŋanan inyamat lu, ebusi ikar kere; inyamat da luainakini eoŋ kanuka aijar naka akwapisinei ŋes akakuan.”
Aso kotema Yesu kes atiar, “Abeit, abeit, katemari yes atiar, Arai mam inyamete akuan naka Okoku loka etuŋanan, ka aimat da akeokot, emamei aijar kotomakus.
Yenenyami akakuan ka aimat da akaokot ejaas kaijar naka ikar kere, eoŋ da etajaruni ŋes kapaaran nakawasia.
Naarai akakuan kes inyamat lukabeit, akaokot da kes numatan nukabeit.
Yenenyami akakuan ka aimat da akaokot esalakini tomakaŋ, eoŋ da tomakeŋ,
Kwape kejukunia Papa lokajaran eoŋ, ajari eoŋ da kanuka Papa, kwape kwaŋin yenikanyami eoŋ ejari kanukaŋ,
Lu kes inyamat lukijesunos kotoma akuj, mere kwape kenyamiata lukapapaa kotwaka; yenenyami inyamat lu ejari ikar kere.”
Enera ŋesi akiro ŋun kotoma atukos, naesisianakinia Kaparanaum.
Nakiirariata ice luipu kokesisiakake kobalas ebe, “Etiono ca akirot na; iŋai bo epedori aiirar?”
Konye kojeni Yesu kotauke ebe erurumata ikekesisiak kanuka akirot kaŋin, kotema kes atiar, “Kitiguiki ca yes akirot na?
Ikonakinete bo do ai arai ianyunete Okoku loka etuŋanan edokari nekolo kejai sek?
Emoyo ŋes einakini aijar, mam akuan epedori ibore; akiro nukalimokinit yes eraas emoyo, eraas da aijar.
Konye ejaas ice kotomakus lumam iyuunito.” Naarai kejeni Yesu ameun kageunet lumam iyuunito, ka ŋol da loebilakini ŋes ebotet.
Kobala ebe, “Kanuka ŋun katema yes ebe emamei ituŋanan yenepedori abunore mamakaŋ, dimikito einakinitai kama ka Papa.”
Kanuka ŋun koboŋosi luipu kokesisiakake, komam bobo eupasi kaŋes.
Aso kotema Yesu lutomon kaarei atiar, “Ikotosi kereka yesi da aboŋor?”
Koboŋok Simon Petero ebe, “Ejakait, kilosi mama ejai iŋai? Ijaas ijo kakiro nuka aijar naka ikar kere.
Kiyuunit isio, bobo da kijeni ebe irai ijo Lokalaunan loka Edeke.”
Koboŋok Yesu kes ebe, “Mere kereka eoŋ kaseunit yes lutomon kaarei, ediopet da kayesi erai Satan?”
Enera nuka Yuda okoku loka Isikariot, naarai ŋol loebilakini ŋes ebotet, ŋes da ediopet kotomon ka luarei.
Keapie epucit loka lyudayan loka iswamin.
Aso kotemasi ŋes ikeinacan atiar, “Konyou kane kolot Yudaya, tetere eanyunete ikonikesisiak akoniswamisio nuiswamai.
Naarai emamei ituŋanan yeniswamai akiro kaiyeiyea, yenekoto ŋes elopet aitebeun. Arai kiswama nu kitodiar kakwapin.”
Naarai ikeinacan da mam eyuunito ŋes.
Aso kotema Yesu kes atiar, “Eroko akapak edolo; konye itemokino akusipak apaarasia kere.
Mam akwapin kipedorete aila yes, konye kalaito eoŋ, naarai etejenu eoŋ ebe eroko akeceswamisio.
Kodokasi yesi opucit, mam ber eoŋ edokari opucit ŋol, naarai eroko akapak itodolikino.”
Nakedaunia alimokin kes ŋun kosalak Galilaya.
Konye nakedauniata ikeinacan adokar opucit, kanen kodoka ŋesi da elopet, mere kaitebeikin konye bala kaiyeiyea.
Aso komoata Iyudayan ŋes kopucit, kobalas ebe, “Ai bo ejai ŋol?”
Kojau airuruma naepol kokodeta kanukeŋ; kobalas ice ebe, “Erai etuŋanan loejok.” Kobalas ice da ebe, “Mere kwaŋin, konye itapaari ekodet.”
Konye emamei ituŋanan yeninera kaitebeikin naarai kekuriaka Iyudayan.
Kosodi kanen kokidiŋ kepucit kodoka Yesu, koloma oyekalu, kogeu aisisianakin.
Koumokis Iyudayan, kobalas ebe, “Kikonakini lo ai ecouni komam isisiat?”
Aso Koboŋok Yesu kotema kes atiar, “Akaisisianakin mere nakaŋ dimarai naka ŋol lokejukuni;
arai ekoto ituŋanan aswam nuekot ŋol, ejenuni nuka aisisianakin kana, arai kebuni kama ejai Edeke, arai bo enera kanukaŋ bon.
Yeninera kanukeŋ bon emoot akeibuses ilopet; konye yenemoot aibuses naka ŋol kalokijukuni ŋes erai yenikabeit, ido kotomake emamei aiŋalanut.
Mam kereka Musa kiinakinit yes ikisila? Konye emamei idio kayesi yenericit ikisila. Kanukinyo kimoiata aiar eoŋ?”
Koboŋok ekodet ebe, “Ejai jo ajokit! Iŋai bo emoot aiar jo?”
Koboŋok Yesu kotema kes atiar, “Abu keswama aswamisioit adiopet, iwumokinito yesi kere.
Kanuka ŋun abu Musa koinak yes aikep (konye mam abuni kama ka Musa, konye kama ka lukapapaa); ikepete yesi etuŋanan kapaaran nakasabato.
Arai ekepio etuŋanan kanakasabato, tetere mam ekisil loka Musa ebila, kinyunyurikis kereka eoŋ kanu etaŋaleunio cut etuŋanan kapaaran nakasabato?
Sirikituboto kwape eseseniata akusikonye, konye kotuboto kotoma adolit.”
Konye, koany, inera kaitebeikin, kwabo mam elimokinete adiokirot! Motoko ejenete ikayaitok abeit ebe erai lo Kristo?
Konye kijeni lo neebunitor; konye naebunio Kristo, emamei yenejeni neebunio.”
Kiworo Yesu isisianakini koyekalu kobala ebe, “Ijenete eoŋ, ijenete nekabunio da; kwabo mam eoŋ abunit kanukaŋ, konye ŋol lokejukuni erai lokabeit, lomam yes ijenete.
Ajeni eoŋ ŋes; naarai abuni kamakeŋ, ŋes da kejukuni.”
Kosodete komootos aikamun ŋes; konye mam etuŋanan abu korio akekanin aikamunia, naarai ariŋa edoluno ekesawa.
Konye luipu lukokodet kiyuut ŋes; kobalas ebe, “Naebunio Kristo, iswamai kereka ŋesi aanyuneta nuipu aitelekarit nuiswamat lo?”
Kiirasi Iparisayon ikodeta irurumaete ŋun kanukeŋ; kosodete isasedotin lupeti ka Iparisayon kijukasi ikejaanakinak aikamun ŋes.
Kosodi Yesu kobala ebe, “Eroko apak edit ajai nenipe kayes, kasodi alosit mama ejai lokejukuni.
Kimoete eoŋ komam kidumunete: neajai eoŋ mam yes ipedorete aponare.”
Kosodete kineranakinos Iyudayan ebe, “Ai bo elosi lo nemam oni kipedori adumunia ŋes? Elosi kereka ŋesi mama ejaas luisiarakina oYonanin, ka aisisianakin da Iyonanin?
Akirot anyoin na nainerit ebe, ‘Kimoete eoŋ komam kidumunete’, ido, ‘Neajai eoŋ mam ipedorete aponare’?”
Yenikeyuuni, kwape ineratar nuiwadikatai ebe, ‘Eleleete icorin luka akipi nukajarak kotomakeŋ.’ ”
Enerit akirot ŋin kanuka Emoyo, loeinakinio luiyuunito ŋes: naarai ariŋa ber Emoyo einakina, naarai eriŋa Yesu itopolooro.
Ice da kobalas ebe, “Erai lo Kristo.” Konye ice kobalas ebe, “Mam, ebuni tope Kristo koGalilaya?
Mam kereka ebalas nukiwadikatai ebe ebuni Kristo kaur naka Daudi, kotoma Betelekem, ere lokejai Daudi?”
Kwaŋin kojai atiakatiakaun kotuŋa kanukeŋ.
Kokotosi ice aikamun ŋes, konye komamei yenikibwaikini ŋes akanin.
Koboŋokis ikejaanakinak ebe, “Mam inerit cut idiotuŋanan kwape inerar etuŋanan lo.”
Kosodete koboŋokis Iparisayon ebe, “Aso cama kitapaa yes da?
Iŋai bo kotoma ikayaitok loiyuunit ŋes, arai kotoma oParisayon?
Konye ikenitoi ekodet ŋol lomam ejeni ikisila.”
Kobala Nikodemo, ŋes lokelosit kolo mama ejai Yesu, lokerai ediopet kakesi ebe,
“Etubokinete kereka ikisilawok etuŋanan, eriŋa ber iirara ŋes ka ajenun nuiswamai?”
Koboŋokis kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Ibunit kereka ijo da koGalilaya? Koŋic, koany ebe mam enyouni enabi koGalilaya.”
Koboŋo ŋolituŋanan oreke.
Koboŋo tupuruc sek oyekalu, kopotu ituŋa kere mamakeŋ; kiboikin kogeu aisisianakin kes.
Koyaut ikewadikak ka Iparisayon aberu naekamunitai kadoteu; kibwaikis kidiŋ,
kobalas ŋes ebe, “Ekesisianakinan, ikamunitai aberu na edotei.
Aso kotoma okisila abu Musa kicorak aibiribir nuikote nen kamor; aso ca ibala bo ijo ai?”
Kinerasi kesi akiro ŋun ekodunete ŋes, tetere edumunete akirot nakiwosaet. Konye kokukum Yesu, kiwadik alup kekebokorit.
Nakiyatanakiniata aiŋit ŋes, kitenar kotema kes atiar, “Yenemamei adiakaret kotomakus, kogeu aibir ŋes kamoru.”
Kokukum bobo, kiwadik alup kekebokorit.
Kes da, nakiirariata, kilepilepata itauonokec, kolomasi idiopet idiopet, ageun komakio kiton lukawasia; kosalak Yesu bon, ka aberu ebwoi kanen kokidiŋ,
Kitenar Yesu, kotema ŋes atiar, “Toto, alu bo ŋul lukiwosato jo? Emamei kereka yenikitubokini jo?”
Kotema atiar, “Emamei, Ejakait.” Kotema Yesu atiar, “Eoŋ da mam katubokini jo: kolot; konye sirikidiaka bobo.”
Kotemasi Iparisayon ŋes atiar, “Itejenuni ijo elopet boni mam akoniitejenun erai nakabeit.”
Koboŋok Yesu kotema kes atiar, “Karaida ketejenun eoŋ elopet erai akaitejenun nakabeit; naarai ajeni nekabunio, ka nealosi da; konye yes mam ijenete nekabunio, karaida nealosi.
Itubete yesi kwape ejaar akuan; mam eoŋ atubokini ituŋanan.
Karaida katubi eoŋ, erai ekatube lokabeit; naarai mam eoŋ ajai bon, konye eoŋ ka lokejukuni.
Bobo da kotoma okisilakus iwadikatai ebe aitejenun naka ituŋa iarei erai nakabeit.
Etejenuni eoŋ elopet, ketejenuni Papa da lokejukuni.”
Kosodi kotemasi atiar, “Ejai bo ai Papakon?” Koboŋok Yesu ebe, “Mam kijenete eoŋ karaida Papaka; arai kiijenete eoŋ, tikijenut Papaka da.”
Kinera akiro ŋun kotoma agola naka aiŋad, nakisisianakinia koyekalu; kwabo amamei etuŋanan loekamuni ŋes; naarai aroko ekesawa edoluno.
Kosodete kotemasi Iyudayan atiar, “Earakin ca, naarai ebala ebe, ‘Nealosi eoŋ mam yes ipedorete aponare’?”
Kotema kes atiar, “Iraas yesi lukokwap, arai eoŋ lokokuju; iraas yesi luka akwapin kanu; mam eoŋ arai loka akwapin kanu.
Kanuka ŋun kalimokis yes ebe itwakete kotoma adiakanaretakus; naarai arai mam iyuunito ebe arai eoŋ, itwakete kotoma adiakanaretakus.”
Kosodete kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Irai bo ijo iŋai?” Kotema Yesu kes atiar, “Ŋopeŋol lokalimokinit yes ameun kageunet.
Ejaas nuipu einer ka aitub da kanukus: konye ŋol lokejukuni erai abeit; nueirari eoŋ kamake, kes enera kotoma akwapin.”
Kwabo mam apotu kojenut ebe inerakinit kes nuka Papa.
Aso kotema Yesu atiar, “Naidauniata aikeun Okoku loka etuŋanan, ŋes konyet ijenuniata ebe eoŋ ŋopeŋol, ebe da mam eswamai akirot kanukaŋ bon, dimarai kwape kesisianakinia Papa, enera kwaŋin.
Ejai ŋol lokejukuni nenipe keoŋ; mam kenyeinit eoŋ bon; naarai eswamaenenei nuekot ŋesi apaarasia kere.”
Nakinerar ŋesi ŋun, kiyuut luipu.
Aso kotema Yesu lyudayan lukiyuunito ŋes atiar, “Arai kisalakis toma akirotoka, abeit iraas ikakesisiak;
ijenunete da abeit, abeit da kiwosikini yes.”
Koboŋokis ŋes ebe, “Kirai isio aur naka Aburaam, kwabo mam kiraunit ibulesin luka idiotuŋanan kere apakio kere: ikwaikini ijo ibala ai ebe, Kiwosikinio yes?”
Mam ibulesit iboie kotogo ikar kere; konye iboie okoku ikar kere.
Aso arai kiiwosik Okoku, iraas lukiwosikinitai cut.
Ajeni ebe iraas yesi aur naka Aburaam; konye kimootos aiar eoŋ, naarai emamei akakirot aibois kotomakus.
Nuaanyunit kaneejai Papa kes nuenera eoŋ: yes da iswamaete akiro nukiirarito kaneejai papakus.”
Konye kwana kimootos aiar eoŋ, lokalimoki yes abeit, naeirarit kama ejai Edeke: mam Aburaam abu kiswama kwaŋin.
Iswamaete yesi aswamisio nuka papakus.” Kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Mam sio kiwuritai kadoteu; ejai sio Papa ediopet, ŋes Edeke.”
Kotema Yesu kes atiar, “Arai kerai Edeke Papakus, tikiminas eoŋ; naarai abu kalom kama ka Edeke kabu; naarai mam kabuni kanukaŋ bon, konye ŋes kejukunit.
Kanukinyo mam ijenuniata ŋun nuenera eoŋ? Naarai mam ipedorete aiirar akakirot.

Iraas yesi luka Satan papakus, ikotosi da aswam airaŋaanut naka papakus. Kerai ŋesi ekaaran ameun kageunet, mam icasit kotoma abeit, naarai emamei abeit kotomakeŋ. Nainerar nukaiŋal, inera nueraas nukeŋ elopet; naarai erai ekeŋalan, papa da loka aiŋalanut.
Konye naarai enera eoŋ abeit mam kiyuunito eoŋ.
Iŋai kayes kelepilepi nukaronok? Arai enera eoŋ abeit, kanukinyo mam yes iyuuniata?
Yenerai yenika Edeke iirari akiro nuka Edeke; kanuka ŋun mam yes iirarete, naarai mam iraas luka Edeke.”
Koboŋok Yesu ebe, “Emamei eoŋ ajokit; konye ayoŋit eoŋ Papaka, konye yes kimwaŋito eoŋ.
Kwabo eoŋ mam amoot akaibuses; ejai loemoot ka aitub da.
Abeit, abeit, katemari yes atiar, Arai keric ituŋanan akakirot, mam egipari atwanare ikar kere.”
Kobalas Iyudayan ebe, “Kwana do kijeni ebe ejai jo ajokit, Kotwana Aburaam, ka inabin da; ibala ijo ebe, ‘Arai keric ituŋanan akakirot, mam iiri atwanare ikar kere.’
Itelekarit tope ijo kapolou papaakosi Aburaam loketwani? Inabin da luketwakete; ituluori ijo elopet iŋai?”
Koboŋok Yesu ebe, “Arai ketopoloor eoŋ elopet, akaibuses mam erai ibore; loketopoloorit eoŋ ŋes Papaka; ŋol loibakasi yesi ebe erai Ekusideke;
kwabo mam ipotu kojenut ŋes; konye eoŋ ajeni ŋes; arai kener ebe, ‘Mam ajeni ŋes,’ tikaraun ekeŋalan kwape kayesi; konye ajeni ŋes, aricit da akekirot.
Abu papaakus Aburaam kolelakinite aanyun akapaaran; ŋes da koany, kiyalamikin.”
Kosodete kotemasi lyudayan atiar, “Eroko jo edolo ikar akaisakany, ianyunit tope ijo Aburaam?”
Kotema Yesu kes atiar, “Abeit, abeit, katemari yes atiar, Eroko Aburaam ejauna, ajai eoŋ.”
Kosodete kirarata amor tetere ibiribirete; konye Yesu koŋop, koloma koyekalu.
Kiŋita ŋes ikekesisiak ebe, “Rabi, iŋai bo kediakarit, etuŋanan lo arai bo ikekauriak, tape eurio emudukana?”
Koboŋok Yesu ebe, “Mam lo ediakarit, karaida ikekauriak; konye tetere itodiaros aswamisio nuka Edeke kotomakeŋ.
Kibusakinit aswam aswamisio nuka ŋol lokejukuni, eroko apaaran; ebuni akuar, namam epedoria ituŋanan aswam.
Naajaar eoŋ akwapin, arai eoŋ aica naka akwapin.”
Nakedaunia einer ŋun, kimuik aimul kwap, kosubunia elupe, kinyonyo akonye nuka etuŋanan kelupe,
Kotema ŋes atiar, “Kolot kilota katapar naka Siloam” (apolouke ebe Loiyakiaritai), Kosodi kolot, kilota, koboŋu eseseni,
Kosodete ikeidunyeta ka lukeanyununete lem erai ekelipan kotemasi atiar, “Mere kereka lo lolem iboienenei ilipitoi?”
Kobalas ice ebe, “Ŋes ŋol”; ka ice da ebe, “Mam, konye eputosi kaŋes.” Kobala ŋesi ebe, “Eoŋ lopelo.”
Kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Kekwenyunete biai akonikonye?”
Koboŋok ebe, “Etuŋanan loenyaritai Yesu kosub elupe kenyonyoik akakonye katema atiar, ‘Kolot Siloam kilota’; kasodi kalot, kelota, kakweny.”
Kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Ai bo ejai ŋol?” Kotema atiar, “Mam eoŋ ajeni.”
Koyaŋaasi lokerai lem emuduki mama ejaas Iparisayon.
Kerai apaaran nakasabato nakesubia Yesu elupe ka aitwekenyun da akekonye.
Aso kiŋita ŋes bobo Iparisayon da epone lokekwenyunia, Kotema kes atiar, “Abu kibwaik elupe akonyeka, kelota, kwana do aseseni.”

Kobalas ice koParisayon ebe, “Mam etuŋanan ŋol ebunit kama ejai Edeke, naarai mam ericit nakasabato.” Konye kobalas ice ebe, “Epedori biai ekadiakanaran aswam aanyuneta nuikote nen?” Kojaun atiakatiakaun kamakec.
Kobalas bobo emuduki ebe, “Ido bo jo ibala biai kanukeŋ, naarai abu kitwekeny akonikonyen?” Kobala ebe, “Erai enabi.”
Aso mam Iyudayan apotu kiyuut akekiro ebe kerai lem emuduki, kosodi akwenyun, kiton neanyarauniata ikauriak luka lokitwekenyunio,
kiŋita kes ebe, “Erai kereka lo okokukus? Loibalasi aurio emudukana? Ikwaikini bo ai ekwenyi kwana?”
Koboŋokis ikekauriak ebe, “Kijeni ebe lo ŋes okokukosi, ebe da aurio emudukana;
konye epone loekwenyia kwana mam kijeni; mam kijeni da yenikitwekenyuni ŋes akonye. Kiŋita ŋes; epol ŋesi, ineri elopet kanukeŋ.”
Enerasi ikekauriak kwaŋin naarai akuriaka Iyudayan; naarai enerunitos Iyudayan ebe arai elimori ituŋanan ŋes araut Kristo, ireŋeario katukos.
Kanuka ŋun ŋes eneratar ikekauriak ebe, “Epol ŋesi; kiŋita ŋes.”
Koboŋok ebe, “Arai ca erai ekadiakanaran, mam eoŋ ajeni; ajeni adiopekirot ebe karai eoŋ emuduki, kwana do akwenyi.”
Kosodete kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Kiikonakini ai? Kiitwekenyuni biai akonikonye?”
Koboŋok kes ebe, “Kadau alimokin yesi komam iirarete. Kanukinyo bobo ikototor akiirar? Ikotosi yesi da araun ikekesisiak?”
Komoromoroto, kobalas ebe, “Ijo irai ekekesisian; konye kirai isio ikesisiak luka Musa.
Kijeni isio ebe abu Edeke kinera ka Musa; konye ŋol mam kijeni nekebunio.”
Koboŋok etuŋanan kotema atiar, “Eraas nu nukaumokin, ebe mam yes ijenete nekebunio, konye abu ketwekeny akakonye.
Kijeni ebe mam Edeke iirari ikadiakanarak; konye arai emai ituŋanan Edeke, iswamai da nuekoto ŋesi, iirari ŋol.
Ameun kageunet naka akwapin mam lem iiraritai ebe itwekenyunit ituŋanan akonye nuka yeneuritai emudukana.
Arai kemam ŋol ebunit kama ejai Edeke, ti mam kepedo aswam akirot kere.”
Koboŋokis kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Kiwuritai cut jo kotoma adiakar, kisisianakini kereka ijo da sio?” Kireŋeasi ŋes kiŋa.
Kiira Yesu ebe ereŋeasi kiŋa, kodum ŋes kotema atiar, “Iyuunit kereka ijo Okoku loka etuŋanan”
Koboŋok ŋesi kotema atiar, “Ŋes bo iŋai, Ejakait, keyuu ŋes?”
Kotema Yesu ŋes atiar, “Iany ŋes, ŋes ŋol loineras kajo.”
Kotema atiar, “Ejakait, eyuunit.” Komaa ŋes.
Kotema Yesu atiar, “Abu kabu toma akwapin nu kanuka etube, tetere eanyunete lumam eanyunete, koraut da lueanyunete imudukiok.”
Nakiirariata ice koParisayon lukejaas nepepe kaŋes, kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Kirai kereka isio da imudukiok?”
Kotema Yesu kes atiar, “Arai kiraas imudukiok, timam ijaas kadiakar; konye kwana ibalasi ebe ‘Kikwenyi,’ aso esalit adiakarikus.”
“Abeit, abeit, katemari yes atiar, yenimam itori orute elomari anuk naka amerekekin konye kodoka kamace, erai ŋin ikokolan ka ikaŋatan da;
konye yenitori orute ŋes erai ekecokon loka amerekekin.
Eŋaikini ekagolon ŋes; iirarete amerekekin ekeporoto, enyarai ŋesi akemerekekin kikiroriakec, itolomari kes kiŋa,
Kedau aitolomar nukeŋ kere, iŋarenikini kes, etupakinete amerekekin, naarai ejenete ekeporoto.
Mam etuparete cut eloŋwau, konye ekerete kama ejai, naarai mam ejenete eporoto loka iloŋwau.”
Abu Yesu kolimok kes awaragan ŋin, konye mam ejenuna akiro nualimokini kes.
Kere lukageikinete keraas ikokolak ka ikaŋatak; konye mam apotu amerekekin kiirasi kes.
Arai eoŋ erute; arai kitoro ituŋanan mamakaŋ, itajario, elomari ka alomun, edumuni da erony.
Mam ekokolan ebuni atai dimarai akoko, ka aiar, ka amunaar da; abu eoŋ kabu tetere ejaunete kaijar, ejaunete da kanaedeparit.
Arai eoŋ ekecokon lokajokan. Einakini ekecokon lokajokan akeijar kanuka amerekekin.
Etuŋanan loeropio, lomam erai ekecokon, amerekekin da mam eraas nuke, eanyuni epeet ebuni, inyeini amerekekin, ekeri; ikami do epeet kes, isiarakini.
Ekeri ŋol naarai erai loeropio, mam epodo amerekekin.
Arai eoŋ ekecokon lokajokan; ajeni ŋun nueraas nukaŋ, nukaŋ da kajenete eoŋ,
kwape kajenia Papa, eoŋ da ajeni Papa; ainakini akaijar kanuka amerekekin.
Ido ejaas eoŋ amerekekin ace, numam eraas nuka anuk kana; kebusakinit ayaun ŋun da, iirarete ekaporoto; kosodete araun esipan ediopet, ka ekecokon ediopet.
Kanuka na kamina Papa, naarai ejaikini akaijar, tetere alemuni bobo.
Emamei ituŋanan yenikademari, konye ejaikini eoŋ elopet. Ejai eoŋ apedor naka aijaikin, ejai da apedor alemun bobo; adumunit aicorakinet na kama ejai Papaka.”
Luipu kakes kobalas ebe, “Ejai lo ajokit, ekerepiki; kanukinyo iirariata ŋes?”
Kobalas ice ebe, “Akiro ŋun mam eraas nuka ituŋanan yenejai ajokit. Epedori kereka ajokit aitwekenyun akonye nuka imudukiok?”
Kerai epucit loka Atiakunio koYerusalem; kapak naka aterot;
kitorit Yesu oyekalu alomaret naka Solomon.
Kosodete kolukut ŋes Iyudayan kotemasi atiar, “Itodoli ai isibuonokini ikositauon? Arai irai Kristo, kolimokinai kaitebeikin.”
Koboŋok Yesu ebe, “Abu kalimok yes, konye mam iyuunito. Aswamisio nueswamai eoŋ kokiror loka Papaka, kes ketejenunito.
Konye yes mam iyuunito, naarai mam iraas lukotoma amerekekinika.
Iirarete akamerekekin ekaporoto, ajeni kes, kes da katupito eoŋ;
ainakini kes aijar naka ikar kere, mam cut eoliorete, kwabo emamei ituŋanan yeneurupoori kes kakanika.
Papaka lokainakini ŋun erai lokapolon aitelekarit kere, kwabo emamei ituŋanan yenepedori aurupoor kes kakan naka Papaka.
Kirai eoŋ ka Papa ipe.”
Koboŋok Yesu kes ebe, “Ketodik yes aswamisio nuipu nuejok nuepote kama ejai Papa; kanuka aswamisioit anyoin kaŋun kibiribirioto eoŋ kamor?”
Koboŋokis Iyudayan ebe, “Mam kibiribiri jo kanuka aswamisioit naejok, konye kanuka ainyanakin Edeke; naarai jo etuŋanan, ituluori bon Edeke.”
Koboŋok Yesu ebe, “Mam kereka iwadikatai kokisilakus ebe, ‘Kabala iraas yesi idekesio’?
Arai abu konyara kes idekesio ŋul lukebunokini akirot naka Edeke (ido mam epedorete nukiwadikatai abilio),
ibalasi kereka yesi lokitalauni Papa kijuk akwapin ebe, ‘Iinyanakini Edeke’; kanu abalar ebe, ‘Arai eoŋ Okoku loka Edeke’?
Arai mam eswamai aswamisio nuka Papaka, sirikiyuut.
Konye arai eswamai, karaida mam kiyuunito eoŋ, kiyuutu aswamisio; tetere ijenunete ipiirikinete da ebe ejai Papa tomaka, eoŋ da toma Papa.”
Komoata bobo aikamun ŋes; konye koku kakanikec.
Kopotu luipu mamakeŋ; kobalas ebe, “Abeit mam Yokana eswamat aanyunet kere: konye nukinera Yokana kere kanuka ŋol keraas abeit.”
Kiyuut luipu kaŋina.
Ŋes Mariam nakinyonyoanakini Ejakait akinyet, konina akekeje kitimake, ŋipeŋin nakedeka onaceke Lasaro.
Aso kiyakiasi ainacan ŋun mama ejai Yesu ebe, “Ejakait, edeka ŋol loimina ijo.”
Konye nakiiraria Yesu kobala ebe, “Adeka na mam erai nakatwanare; konye kanuka aibuses naka Edeke, tetere itopoloorio Okoku loka Edeke kanuka ŋun.”
Komina Yesu Marita ka inacike, ka Lasaro da.
Aso nakiiraria ebe edek, kosalak nekejai apaarasia aarei,
Kosodi kokau kaŋun kotema ikekesisiak atiar, “Kaloto bobo Yudaya.”
Kotemasi ŋes ikekesisiak atiar, “Rabi, koloje kwape kwana kikotos Iyudayan aibiribir kamor, ilosi teni bobo ŋipeŋina?”
Koboŋok Yesu ebe, “Mam kereka eraas isawan luka paaran itomon ka luarei? Arai elosi ituŋanan paaran mam iguikini, naarai eanyuni aica naka akwapin kanu.
Konye arai kelot kuare, iguikini, naarai emamei aica kotomakeŋ.”
Kinera ŋun, kosodi kotema kes atiar, “Opaperowok Lasaro ejotoi, konye alosi eoŋ ketwekeny.”
Kotemasi ikekesisiak ebe, “Ejakait, arai ejotoi, eŋaleuni.”
Konye kinera Yesu nuka atwanareke, koomitos kesi ebe enera akiro nuka ajo.
Kosodi kolimok Yesu kes kaitebeikin ebe, “Atwana Lasaro.
Ido eyalamikin eoŋ kanukus naarai amamei eoŋ kaŋina, tetere iyuunete. Konye kaloto do mamakeŋ.”
Kosodi Tomas loenyaritai Didumo
Kosodi nakedolio Yesu kodum edaunit ŋesi apaarasia aoŋon kates,
Keapias Betaniya ka Yerusalem, bala amairon aarei,
keponitos ituŋa luipu ko Yudayan mama ejai Marita ka Mariam aipudun kes kanuka onacekec.
Kosodi nakiiraria Marita ebe ebunit Yesu, kolot aisiriam ŋes; kosalakinite Mariam togo.
Kosodi kotema Marita Yesu atiar, “Ejakait, arai kijai ijo ne, timam onaceka ketwana.
Konye kwana da ajeni ebe kere nuilipi ijo Edeke kiinakini Edeke.”
Kotema Yesu ŋes atiar, “Ejaruni onacekon.”
Kotema Marita ŋes atiar, “Ajeni ebe ejaruni kotoma ajarun naka apaaran nakawasia.”
Kotema Yesu ŋes atiar, “Arai eoŋ ajarun ka aijar da; ŋin yenikeyuuni eoŋ, karaida ketwana, ejari.
Ŋin da yenejari yenikeyuuni eoŋ mam etwani ikar kere. Iyuunit kereka ijo ŋun?”
Kotema ŋes atiar, “Eebo, Ejakait; eyuunit eoŋ ebe irai ijo Kristo, Okoku loka Edeke, loebunit akwapin.”
Nakedaunia einer ŋun, kolot, konyarau kinacike Mariam kaiyeiyea, kobala ebe, “Ejai Ekesisianakinan ne, kinyarit jo.”
Nakiiraria ŋesi ŋun, kodetun atipet, kolot mamakeŋ.
Aroko Yesu edoluno ore, konye aroko ejai aibois naesiriamia Marita.
Kosodete Iyudayan luajaas ka Mariam togo ipudunete, nakeanyuniata edetun atipet ka alomar kiŋa, kotupasi ŋes, koomito ebe elosi ates aimony ŋina.
Kosodi nakedolio Mariam nekejai Yesu, koany ŋes, kibirokin akejeke, kotema atiar, “Ejakait, arai kijai ijo ne timam onaceka ketwana.”
Nakeanyunia Yesu ŋes emonyi, ka Iyudayan da lukeupas kaŋes emonyete, komulau eketau, kokadak,
kotema atiar, “Ibwaikinito ai?” Kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Ejakait, bia koany.”
Komony Yesu,
Kosodete kotemasi Iyudayan atiar, “Koany, kwape lem keminar ŋes!”
Konye kobalasi ice kakesi ebe, “Ŋol lokitwekenyuni akonye nuka emuduki mam tikepedo aisimik ŋol atwanare?”
Kotema Yesu atiar, “Kolemasi amoru.” Kobala Marita inac naka lokatwan ebe, “Ejakait, eur kwana, naarai edaunit apaarasia aoŋon etwanit.”
Kotema Yesu ŋes atiar, “Mam kereka kalimokinit jo ebe arai iyuunit, ianyuni aibuses naka Edeke?”
Kosodete kolemasi amoru. Kikeu Yesu akekonye akuj, kotema atiar, “Kemalai jo Papa, naarai kiira eoŋ.
Kajen ebe kiiranari eoŋ apaarasia kere, konye kener nu kanuka ekodet kalo loejai ne, tetere iyuunete ebe jo kijukunit eoŋ.”
Nakedaunia einer ŋun, kiworo keporoto loepol ebe, “Lasaro, kolom.”
Kolom lokatwan, eenitai akanin ka akeje kigoen luka aida; eenitai akekonye da keitabala. Kotema Yesu kes atiar, “Kolacasi ŋes, koosikis kolot.”
Konye ice kakesi koloto mama ejaas Iparisayon, kolimokis nukiswamai Yesu.
Kosodete isasedotin lupeti ka Iparisayon kotukokis aurianet, kobalas ebe, “Kikwaikini ai? Naarai iswamai etuŋanan ŋol aanyuneta nuipu.
Arai kiinyei, iyuunete ŋes ituŋa kere: epote Iromayon kidemarete oni aiboisiwok ka awokoteker da.”
Konye ediopet kakesi, ŋes Kaiapa, lokerai losasedoti lopeti kokaru kaŋol, kotema kes atiar, “Mam ijenete adiokirot kere.
Kwabo mam iwomito ebe ibusakinit ediopetuŋanan atwanare kanuka ituŋa, kinye ateker kere amudiar.”
Mam ŋes kinera akirot ŋin kanukeŋ bon; konye naarai kerai losasedoti lopeti kokaru kaŋol, abu kodwar ebe etwani Yesu kanuka ateker;
kwabo mere kanuka ateker kaŋin bon, konye tetere etukokini nepepe idwe luka Edeke lukisiarakinos araut ipe,
Ameun kapaaran kaŋin kinerut nuka aiar ŋes.
Kanuka ŋun mam bobo Yesu alosi kaitebeikin kotoma oYudayan, konye konyou kaŋina kolot aibois naeapias kamodiŋ, kiton ore loenyaritai Epuraim; kosal ŋina nenipe kikekesisiak.
Kosodete komoata Yesu, kineranakinos ebwoete koyekalu ebe, “Iwomito inyo? Mam kereka ŋes ebuni opucit lo?”
Kicorakinito isasedotin lupeti ka Iparisayon ebe arai kejenu ituŋanan neejai, kitejenu kes, tetere ikamunete.
Kosodi kolem Mariam elatiri loka akinyet naelai naka etiai loepol, kinyonyoanak akeje nuka Yesu, konina akekeje kitimake; kilelebun aures naka akinyet etogo kere,
Konye kobala Yuda Isikariot, ediopet kokesisiakake, loekoto abilakin ŋes ebotet, ebe,
“Kanukinyo mam egwelarere akinyet na adenarin akwat auni, koinakinai lukican?”
Kinera nu mere kanu etimitor lukican; konye naarai kerai ekokolan, ŋes etiŋenenei eriagi koyaŋanar nukibwaanakinio toma.
Kosodi kotema Yesu atiar, “Kinyeisi ŋes, kiŋadak kanuka apaaran naka aidaioka.
Naarai ejaas lukican nenipe kayes apaarasia kere, konye eoŋ mam kija kayes apaarasia kere.”
Kosodete kejenut luipu koYudayan ebe ejai ŋina; kopotu kesi, mere kanuka Yesu bon, dimarai aanyun Lasaro da, lokitajaruni ŋesi kotoma okatwak.
Konye kinerut isasedotin lupeti aiar Lasaro da;
naarai kanukeŋ apotu luipu koYudayan kotiakas, kiyuut Yesu.
Kogweununut atenieik nuka amusogon, kolomasi aisiriam ŋes, kiworoto ebe, “Kosana! Isirereŋitoi ŋol loebunit kokiror loka Ejakait, Ekabaka loka Isirael!”
Adumunit Yesu ikoku yenika asigiria, kibwanen; kwape iwadikatere ebe,
“Sirikikurianar, ijo akoku naka Sion;
Koany ebunit Ekonikabaka,
Ibwanenit ikoku yenika asigiria.”
Kitejen ekodet lokejai kaŋes nakenyaraunia Lasaro alomun kates, kitajaru da ŋes kokatwak.
Kanuka ŋun kolot ekodet aisiriam ŋes naarai apotu kiirasi ebe eswamat aanyunet ŋin.
Kineranakinos Iparisayon bonik ebe, “Koanyutu mam ipedorete ibore; koany, atupasi ŋes lukakwapin kere.”
Aso koloto ŋul mama ejai Pilip, etuŋanan loko Betesaida loko Galilaya, kilipata ŋes ebe, “Ejakait, kikoto isio aanyun Yesu.”
Kolot Pilip kolimok Anderea; kouparos Anderea ka Pilip, kolimokis Yesu.
Koboŋok Yesu kes ebe, “Adol esawa kitopolooroi Okoku loka etuŋanan.
Abeit, abeit, katemari yes atiar, Arai mam ecokat loka akimait edoi kwap kotwani, esalit ikoni nepenen; konye arai ketwana, erai araito nuipu.
Yenemina akeijar itooliori; ka yenelait akeijar kakwapin kanu idari kiton aijar naka ikar kere.
Arai kejaanakini ituŋanan eoŋ, katup; neajai eoŋ ejauni ikakejaanakinan da nepenen; arai kejaanakini ituŋanan eoŋ, itopoloori Papa ŋes.
Papa, kitopoloo ekonikiror.” Kosodi kobu eporoto kotoma akuj ebe, “Etopolo, ido etopoloori bobo.”
Nakiiraria ekodet lokebwoi kanen kobalas ebe Eretu akuj; kobalas ice ebe, “Emalaika enerata kaŋes.”
Koboŋok Yesu kotema atiar, “Mam ebunit eporoto lo kanukaŋ, konye kanukus.
Atubokin kwana akwapin nu akiro: ereŋear kwana ekapolon loka akwapin kanu.
Eoŋ da arai keekiar kakwap, eriari ituŋa kere mamakaŋ.”
Konye kinera nu itodikini aketwanare naetwani.
Koboŋok ekodet kotema ŋes atiar, “Kiirarit isio kotoma okisila ebe ebusi Kristo ikar kere: ikwaikini ai ijo inera ebe ibusakinit Okoku loka etuŋanan aikiario? Iŋai bo ŋol erai Okoku loka etuŋanan?”
Kotema Yesu kes atiar, “Eroko aica ejai kayes apak naedit. Koloto yesi eroko aica ejai kayes, kinye amuton adolokin yes; ŋin yenelosi kamuton mam ejeni neelosi.
Eroko aica ejai kayes, kiyuutu aica ŋin, tetere iraunete idwe luka aica.”
Kiner Yesu ŋun, konyou kamakec koŋop.
Karaida abu kiswama aanyuneta nuipu noi kakonyenekec mam apotu kiyuut ŋes;
tetere edoli akirot naka enabi Isaia nakinerit ebe, “Ejakait, iŋai eyuunit akosikirot? Iŋai da epukokinitai akan naka Ejakait?”
Kanuka ŋun ŋes mam kiyuuniata naarai enerit bobo Isaia ebe,
“Etumudak akecekonye, etininik ikecetauon,
Kinyeis aanyun kakecekonye, kojenut kotauonokec,
Ka aibelokin, ketaŋaleu kes.”
Konye kiton ikayaitok da kiyuut ŋes luipu; konye kanuka Iparisayon mam apotu kolimosi, kinyeis aireŋeario katukos:
naarai keminasi aibuses naka ituŋa aitelekarit aibuses naka Edeke.
Yenikaanyuni eoŋ, eanyuni je lokejukuni.
Abu eoŋ kabu araun aica toma akwapin, tetere ŋin yenikeyuunit mam esalakini amuton.
Arai kiira ituŋanan akakiro, komam erici, mam eoŋ atubokini ŋes; naarai mam eoŋ abunit atubokin akwapin, dimarai aitajar akwapin.
Yenikaŋeri eoŋ, yenimam ecamuni akakiro, ejai ekatubokinanike: akirot naenerit, ŋes etubokini kapaaran nakawasia.
Naarai mam eoŋ enerit kanukaŋ bon; konye Papa lokejukuni kainakinit aicorakinet, nuatemari ka nuenera da.
Ajeni ebe akeicorakinet erai aijar naka ikar kere: aso akiro nuenera eoŋ, kwape kalimokinitor Papa, kwape kwaŋin enerar.”
Napenyamete lukatiboŋ, kodaunite Satan aibwaikin Yuda Isikariot, okoku loka Simon, etau lokabilakin ebotet,
kejeni Yesu ebe ainaki Papa akiro kere akaninike, ebe da alomu kama ejai Edeke, elosi da mama ejai Edeke,
konyou konyamat, kolaca ikenapen; kolem aninaet, koenik aŋabeteke.
Kosodi kobukok akipi atuba, kogeu ailot ikekesisiak akeje, ka anina kes kaninaet nakenapit.
Kodolok do Simon Petero. Kotema Petero ŋes atiar, “Ejakait, ilosi ijo akakeje?”
Koboŋok Yesu kotema ŋes atiar, “Nueswamai eoŋ mam ijeni kwana, konye ijenuni kokau.”
Kotema Petero atiar, “Mam jo ilosi akakeje cut kiton ikar kere.” Koboŋok Yesu ebe, “Arai mam kelosi jo, mam imorikikina keoŋ.”
Kotema Simon Petero ŋes atiar, “Ejakait, mere akakeje bon, konye akakanin ka akakou da.”
Kotema Yesu ŋes atiar, “Yenedauni ailoŋ emamei eipud dimarai ailot akeje, konye elai akuan kere: ilaete yesi da, konye mere kere.”
Naarai ajeni ŋesi loekoto abilakin ŋes ebotet; ŋes abalar ebe, “Mam ilaete kere.”
Kinyarito eoŋ Ekesisianakinan ka Ejakait da; inerasi yesi kotenan, naarai arai eoŋ kwaŋin.
Aso arai eoŋ, Ekusijakait ka Ekusikesisianakinan da, kelot yes akeje, ibusakinit yes da ailot akeje nuka lucekus.
Naarai kainak yes aitodikinet, tetere iswamaete yesi da kwape keswamakinia yes.
Abeit, abeit, katemari yes atiar, Mam ebulesit itelekarit ejakaitike; karaida ekiyakia aitelekarit lokiyakiari.
Arai kijenutu ŋun, isirereŋitoi yes arai kiswamata.
Mam enera nukus kere: ajeni luaseunit; konye kodol naiwadikatai ebe, ‘Lokenyami ikanyamat, ŋes ketonyoik aketitibat.’
Amear kwana kalimokini eriŋa edoluno, tetere naedolunioto, kiyuut ebe eoŋ ŋopeŋol.
Abeit, abeit, katemari yes atiar, Yenisukunyikini ŋin yeneyakiari, kesukunyik eoŋ; yenikesukunyikini eoŋ isukunyikinit je lokejukuni.”
Koŋoleanakinos ikesisiak, kobuonokinos iŋai bo ŋol loelimit ŋesi.
Kejai ediopet kokesisiakake lokegoŋakina atorob naka Yesu, lokemina Yesu.
Aso kokwet Simon Petero ŋes, kobala ebe, “Kiŋitu cani loelimit ŋesi.”
Aso egoŋakina ŋesi kwape kwaŋin atorob naka Yesu, kotema atiar, “Ejakait, ŋes bo iŋai?”
Koboŋok Yesu ebe, “Loecunyakini aodunet kainak, ŋes ŋol.” Kosodi kedau aicunyakin aodunet, kolem koinak Yuda okoku loka Simon Isikariot.
Kokau kaodokinet, kolomak Satan ŋes, Kosodi kotema Yesu ŋes atiar, “Nuiswamai, kisunyite aswam.”
Kwabo emamei etuŋanan kalukemorete kaŋes lokejeni akirot nakelimokinia ŋes ŋun.
Naarai koomitos ice ebe naarai itiŋit Yuda eriagi, abu Yesu kolimok ŋes ebe, “Kogwel lukipuda kanuka epucit,” arai ebe kijaik lukican ibore.
Kosodi kedau ŋol aijaar aodokinet, atipet koloma: kerai da kuare.
Kosodi nakedaunia ŋol alomar, kotema Yesu atiar, “Kwana itopolooritai Okoku loka etuŋanan; Edeke da itopolooritai kotomakeŋ.
Itopoloori Edeke ŋes kotomakeŋ, itopoloori da atipet.
Yes idwe ludidik, eroko apak naedit ajai nepepe kayes. Kimoete eoŋ; kwape abu kalimokinitor Iyudayan ebe, ‘Nealosi eoŋ, mam yes ipedorete abunore’; kwana da kalimokini yes kwape kwaŋin.
Kainakini yes aicorakinet nakitetet ebe, Kominanaros; kwape abu kaminar yes, kominanaros yesi da kwape kwaŋin.
Kanuka ŋun ejenunete ituŋa kere ebe iraas yesi ikakesisiak, arai iminanaros bonik.”
Kotema Simon Petero ŋes atiar, “Ejakait, ilosi bo ai?” Koboŋok Yesu ebe, “Nealosi eoŋ, mam kipedori atupun kwana; konye kitupuni kokau.”
Kotema Petero ŋes atiar, “Ejakait, kanukinyo mam eoŋ apedoria atupar jo kwana? Ainakini akaijar kanukon.”
Koboŋok Yesu ebe, “Iinakini kereka ijo akoniijar kanukaŋ? Abeit, abeit, katemari jo atiar, Mam ekokor eruikini, aitodol nakiŋerio eoŋ irwan auni.
Togo loka Papaka ejaas aiboisio nuipu; arai mere kwaŋin tikalimokis kereka yes ebe alosi aitemokin yes aibois?
Arai kalot eoŋ aitemokin yes aibois, aboŋuni bobo kesukunyu yes mamakaŋ, tetere neajai eoŋ ijaikinos yesi da nen.
Ijenete yesi erot loalosi eoŋ,”
Kotema Tomas atiar, “Ejakait, mam sio kijeni neilosi ijo; kijenuni biai erot?”
Kotema Yesu atiar, “Arai eoŋ erot, ka abeit, ka aijar da; emamei yenebuni mama ejai Papa, dimikito itorit tomakaŋ.
Arai kiijenete eoŋ, tikijenutu Papaka da; amear kwana ijenete ŋes, ianyut da.”
Kotema Pilip atiar, “Ejakait, kitodikinai Papa, kidauni.”
Kotema Yesu atiar, “Ajai lem eoŋ kayes apak naetia nen kere, mam jo da kijeni eoŋ, Pilip? Yenikaanyunit eoŋ, eanyunit Papa; aso biai bo ibalar ijo ebe, ‘Kitodikinai Papa’?
Mam kereka jo iyuunit ebe ajai eoŋ toma Papa, Papa da tomakaŋ? Akiro nuabala yes mam enera kanukaŋ bon; konye Papa loiboie tomakaŋ iswamai akeswamisio.
Kiyuunai ebe ajai eoŋ toma Papa, Papa da tomakaŋ; arai mere kwaŋin, kiyuunai kanuka aswamisio akulepek.
Akirot kere nailipete kokirorika, eswamai ŋin, tetere itopoloorio Papa kotoma Okoku;
Arai kilipa akirot kere kokirorika, eswamai ŋin.
Eoŋ da elipi Papa, kiinakini ŋesi yes Ekayuunan ece, tetere ejaenena kayes ikar kere,
ŋes Emoyo lokabeit, lomam epedorete akwapin adumun; naarai mam eanyunete ŋes karaida ajenun; ijenete yesi ŋes; naarai esalit mamakus, ejaenena da tomakus.
“Mam kenyeinete yes iraas ikokiok; abuni mama ijaas.
Apak edit mam kaanyunete bobo akwapin; konye yes kianyunete; naarai ajari eoŋ, yes da ijarete.
Kapaaran kaŋin ijenunete ebe ajai eoŋ toma Papaka, yes da tomakaŋ, eoŋ da tomakus.
Ŋin yenejaas kakaicorakineta, koricite da kes, ŋin ŋes kamina eoŋ: ŋin da yenikamina eoŋ, eminuni Papaka, eoŋ da aminuni ŋes ka aitakanikin mamake.”
Kotema Yuda (mere Isikariot) atiar, “Ejakait, ikwaikini ai ikoto aitakanikin mamakosi, kwabo mere akwapin?”
Koboŋok Yesu ebe, “Arai kamina ituŋanan, erici da akakirot, eminuni Papaka, sio da kiponi mamakeŋ kitarauni ŋes ekosire.
Ŋin yenimam kamina eoŋ, mam erici akakiro; akirot da naiirarete mam erai nakaŋ dimarai naka Papa lokejukuni.
“Kalimokis yes akiro ŋun, naariŋar ajai kayes.
Konye Ekayuunan, ŋes Emoyo Lokalaunan, loijukuni Papa kokirorika, kisisianakini ŋol yes akiro kere, kisiituni da kere nukalimokinit yes.
Kenyeiniata ainapakin; kainak yes akainapakin; mere kwape einakiniata akwapin, kainakinia eoŋ yes. Sirikiyaloŋoŋoto ikusitauon, kinyeis da akurian.
Ipuput eoŋ abala ebe, Alosi eoŋ, abuni da bobo mama ijaas. Arai kiiminasi eoŋ, tikilakaros, naarai alosi mama ejai Papa; naarai Papa ŋes lokapolon adepar eoŋ.
Kwana da kalimok yes eriŋa edoluno, tetere naedolunio, kiyuut.
Mam bobo kinera kayes akiro nuipu, naarai ebunit ekapolon loka akwapin kanu. Konye emamei ŋes adiokirot kotomakaŋ;
konye eswamai eoŋ kwape kecorakinitor Papa, tetere ejenunete akwapin ebe amina eoŋ Papa. Konyoutu do, kaloto kane.
Ŋinitenu kotomakaŋ namam erai araito, elemari ŋesi, ka ŋinitenu da naerai araito igweri, tetere iyatakini aira araito.
Idaut yesi araut luilaete kanuka akirot nakalimokinit.
Kosalakis tomakaŋ, eoŋ da tomakus. Kwape mam epedoria atenu aira araito alopet bon, arai mam esalit toma omusabibu, kwape kwaŋin yes da mam ipedorete, arai mam isalito tomakaŋ.
Arai eoŋ emusabibu, iraas yesi atenun. Yenesalit tomakaŋ, eoŋ da tomakeŋ, erai ŋin araito nuipu, naarai neamamea eoŋ mam ipedorete ibore.
Ituŋanan arai mam esali tomakaŋ, ecakario kiŋa kwape katenu, erinyori; etukokinio atenuna, ecakakinio akim, kidoposi.
Arai isalito tomakaŋ, akakiro da esalito tomakus, kilipata nuikotosi kere, kiswamakinio.
Itopolooritai Papaka kotoma nu arai iraete yesi araito nuipu, iraunos da ikakesisiak,
Kwape kaminar Papa, eoŋ da kamina yes kwape kwaŋin; kosalata toma aminaka.
Arai iricete akaicorakineta, isalete toma aminaka, kwape aricitor eoŋ aicorakineta nuka Papaka, asalit da toma aminake.
Kalimokis yes akiro ŋun tetere ejaun aiyalamaka tomakus, kitodolikinoi da aiyalamakus.
Emamei yenejaas kamin naepol aitelekarit na, ituŋanan ainakin akeijar kanuka ipaperoke.
Iraas yesi ikapapero arai iswamaete nukecorakini yes.
Mam kanyarit bobo ibulesin, naarai ebulesit mam ejeni nuiswamai ejakaitike, konye kanyara yes ikapapero, naarai ketejenu yes kere nueirarit kama ejai Papaka.
Mere yes kiseunete eoŋ, dimarai eoŋ kaseu yes, kadakak yes tetere ilosete koraata araito, araitokus da kosalito; tetere nuilipete Papa kere kokirorika, kiinakini.
Kecorakini yes ŋun tetere iminanaros.
Arai kiraas lukakwap, tiemina akwap yenerai yenikeŋ; konye naarai mam iraas lukakwap, konye abu kaseu yes kotoma akwap, kanuka ŋun ŋes kilaia yes akwap.
Kiitunito akirot nakalimokinit yes ebe, Mam ebulesit itelekarit ejakaitike kapolou. Arai kareito eoŋ, kireete yes da; arai kericito akakirot, ericete nakus da.
Konye kiswamakinete yes ŋun kere kanuka ekakiror, naarai mam ejenete lokejukunit,
Arai kemam abunit einer kakes, timam ejaas karonis; konye kwana mam eiyaros karonisikec.
Yenikaŋara eoŋ eŋara Papaka da.
Arai mam keswamat kamakec aswamisio numam icetuŋanan iswamat, timam ejaas karonis, konye kwana kaanyut kaŋarut eoŋ ka Papaka da.
Konye itodolikinio akirot naewadikatai kotoma okisilakec ebe, ‘Apotu kalaata atitai.’
Konye kebu Ekayuunan, lokejukakini yes anyoun kama ejai Papa, ŋes Emoyo Lokabeit, loebuni kama ejai Papa, itejenuni ŋol nukaŋ;
Yes da itejenunete, naarai ijaas keoŋ ameun kageunet.
Kireŋeanario katukosia; eebo, ebunit esawa loeomitor ŋinituŋanan yenikiari yes ebe ijaanakini Edeke.
Iswamaete ŋun da naarai mam ejenunito Papa, karaida eoŋ.
Konye abu kalimok yes ŋun tetere naedolio esawakec, kiitunete ebe abu kalimokinite yes.
Konye naarai kalimokis yes akiro nu, elelebunos ican otauonokus.
Konye eoŋ kalimokini yes abeit; ejok kamakus arai kalot eoŋ, naarai arai mam alosi mam ebuni Ekayuunan mama ijaas; konye arai alosi ejukuni ŋes mamakus.
Kebu ŋol, ilepilepi ŋesi akwapin kanuka aronis ka adolit, ka etube da.
Aronis, naarai mam keyuunito eoŋ;
adolit, naarai alosi mama ejai Papa, mam bobo kianyunete;
ka etube da, naarai adaun lokapolon loka akwapin kanu atubokinio.
Kebu je, Emoyo loka abeit, kiŋarenikini yes kabeit kere; naarai mam inera nuke bon, konye inera kere nuepupuni, kitejenuni da yes akiro nuepote.
Ketopoloori ŋesi eoŋ, naarai elemuni nueraas nukaŋ kitejenuni yes.
Nuejaatar Papa kere eraas nukaŋ; kanuka ŋun ŋes abalar ebe elemuni nueraas nukaŋ ka aitejenun yes.
Kineranakinos ice kokesisiakake atiar, “Anyoika bo nu nuebala ŋesi oni ebe, ‘Apak naedit, mam kianyunete eoŋ, bobo da apak naedit, kianyunete’; ido ebe, ‘Naarai alosi mama ejai Papa’?”
Kobalas ebe, “Anyoika bo nu nuebala ebe, ‘Apak naedit’? Mam kijeni nuinera.”
Kojeni Yesu ebe ekotosi aiŋit ŋes; kotema kes atiar, “Nupenu kereka nuiŋitanaros yesi nuabala eoŋ ebe, ‘Apak naedit, mam kianyunete eoŋ, bobo da apak naedit kianyunete’?
Abeit, abeit, katemari yes atiar, Imonyete yesi, ka aibworo, konye iyalamikinos akwapin; itururwete yesi, konye akusiiturur eraun ailel.
Naeriebar aberu aidoun eanyuni ican, naarai adolu ekesawa; konye kedau auruun ikoku, mam bobo iituni ariebo ŋin, kanuka ailel! naarai aurii ituŋanan kotoma akwapin.
Yes da, kwape kwaŋin ianyunete ican kwana, konye eoŋ kaanyuni yes bobo, elelete ikusitauon, emamei yenikidemari akusiilel.
Kapaaran kaŋin mam kiŋisete eoŋ adiokirot. Abeit, abeit, katemari yes atiar, Arai kilipa Papa akirot kere kiinakini kokirorika.
Kiton kwana mam ipotu kilipata akirot kokirorika; kilipa, idumunete tetere itodolikin akusiilel.
Kapaaran kaŋin ilipete kokirorika; kwabo mam kabala ebe eoŋ kelipakini yes kama ejai Papa;
naarai Papa elopet kimina yes, naarai kiminasi yesi eoŋ, ido iyuunito ebe abu kabu kama ejai Papa.
Abu kabu kama ejai Papa, kabu toma akwapin; bobo da enyeini akwapin, alosi mama ejai Papa.”
Kijeni do kwana ebe ijeni akiro kere, mam bobo ipuda ituŋanan aiŋit jo; kanuka ŋun kiyuunit ebe ibu kobu kama ejai Edeke.”
Koboŋok Yesu kes ebe, “Aso iyuunito do kwana?
Koany, ebunit esawa, eebo, adau adolun, naisiarakinotor ŋolituŋanan oreke, ka ajalakin eoŋ kasilikinit, Konye mam eoŋ kasilikini, naarai ejai Papa keoŋ.
Kalimokis yes akiro ŋun tetere ijaunete kainapakin tomakaŋ, Toma akwapin ejaas yes ican; konye kotitiŋikis, epiko eoŋ akwapin.”
Kwape ibu koinakinia apedor kama kaluejaas awat kere, tetere einakini kere lukiinakini ŋes aijar namam edaun.
Aijar namam edaun ŋes na ebe, kojenutu jo Edeke ediopet lokabeit, ka Yesu Kristo Iokijukuni.
Ketopolo eoŋ jo kakwap, naarai etodolik aswam naibu koinak eoŋ aswam.
Kwana da, wu Papa, kitopolooroi eoŋ kamakon kaibuses nakijaar eoŋ kajo eroko akwapin ejauna.
Kwana ejenete ebe kere lukiinak apote kamakon:
naarai akiro nukiinakinit eoŋ ainak kes; acamut, ajenut da abeit ebe abu kalom kamakon, eyuut ebe ijo kijukuni eoŋ.
Elipakini eoŋ ŋul: mam elipakini akwapin, konye ŋul lukiinak; naarai eraas lukon.
Ŋul da kere lueraas lukaŋ eraas lukon, lueraas lukon da lukaŋ; ketopolooritai eoŋ tomakec.
