Kosodi nakedaunia Paul aidokokin kes akekanin, kodoik kes Emoyo Lokalaunan; kinerata kaŋajepa, ka aidwar.
Keraas kere bala ituŋa itomon ka luarei.
Koloma Paul atukos, kinerenena katitiŋ ilapio iuni, epesi akiro kituŋa kiyamuyam kes toma akiro nuka ajakanut naka Edeke.
Konye ice lueninik kogiroto aiyuun, kinerasi nueroko nuka Erot kakonyen nuka ekodet, kosodi kinyek kes, kogita ikesisiak, kopegenenas ka ituŋa ŋinipaaran kosomero loka Turano.
Kiyatanakinos akiro ŋun apak naka ikar iarei; kiton lukiboiete kere koAsia aiirar akirot naka Ejakait, Iyudayan ka Iyonanin da.
Kiswama Edeke nukaumokin nuedeparito kakanin nuka Paul,
kiton ayaŋaar iitabalan ka inapen kakuanake mama ejaas ikadekak, konyout adekesia kamakec, kolomut da ajokin nueroko kamakec.
Konye koŋasikinos ice koYudayan lukerimok, ikereŋeak ajokin, alimor ekiror loka Yesu mama ejaas lukejaas ajokin nueroko, kobalas ebe, “Kecorak yes kanuka Yesu loelimonokini Paul.”
Kosodi kojaas idwe ikanykaarei luka Sekeba esasedoti lopeti loYudayat, lukiswamaenenete ŋun.
Konye Koboŋok kes ajokit naerono ebe, “Ajeni Yesu, ajeni Paul da; konye yes lukaŋai?”
Kosomakin kes etuŋanan lokejai ajokit naerono, kiteleka kes kere, kipiko, tape ekerete kotogo kaŋol imujalalas, imusuŋitai.
Kojenut ŋun kere Iyudayan ka Iyonanin lukiboiete ko Epeso; kirum akurian kes kere; kitopolooroi da ekiror loka Ejakait Yesu.
Kopotu luipu da kaŋul luiyuunito, kolimosi, kilepilepata da akeceswamisio.
Ka ituŋa luipu kaŋul lukiswamaete nukamurwonut, kotukonokis ikeceitabon, kicweata kakonyen nuka ituŋa kere; kimarata etiaikec, kodumut ebe edolit atutubeta alukumin akaisakany nuka epuesa.
Kwaŋin kopoloor akirot naka Ejakait, kitelekarit kagogoŋ.
Kiyakia iarei kokejaanakinakake alosit Makedonia, kes Timoteo ka Erasito, kosalak ŋes elopet Asia apak.
Naarai etuŋanan ekekiror Demeterio ekatatan epuesa, lokesubenenei abilai nuka epuesa nuka Aratemi, lokedumanakini ikeswamak luepiriaka ameda naepol;
kotukonoki ŋul nepepe ka ikeswamak ice luka aswam kaŋin, kobala kes ebe, “Ikatuŋa, ijenete yesi ebe kidumuni abarawok kotoma aswam kana.
Bobo da ianyut, iirarete da ebe, mere koEpeso bon, konye eapie toma Asia kere, ejodijod Paul lo ituŋa luipu ka aijulakin akeceomisio, ebala ebe ŋulluiswamao kakanin mam eraas idekesio:
mere atemar ebe aswamuwok na bon emwaŋio, konye eyekalu da loka adeke nakapolon Aratemi mam imario araut ibore, ebuni aitisilio kapolouke, ŋin naemaete luko Asia kere ka akwapisinei da.”
Nakiirariata ŋun konyunyurikinos, kiworoto kobalas ebe, “Aratemi naka Ipeson ŋes nakapolon!”
Kilelebun ere ecelet; komotaros ketau ediopet alomar alaro naka aboliasio, kedaut aikamun Gaio ka Arisitariko, ituŋa luko Makedonia, lukeupas ka Paul kalositeke.
Kokoto Paul alomar otuŋa, kisimika ikesisiak.
Ikapolok ice da luka Asia, lukeraas ikepapero kiyakiasi mamakeŋ, kiŋaiŋaata ŋes kinyek alomar alaro naka aboliasio,
Aso kiworoto ice ace, ka ice da ace; naarai kitolutoluno ekodet; naarai luipu kakesi mam kejenete akirot naeinakinit kes atukokin.
Kolemut Alegesanda kotoma okodet, lokisibwoete Iyudayan kakonyen nuka ituŋa. Kokwetu Alegesanda kakanike, kokoto apurokin kakonyen nuka ituŋa.
Konye nakejenuniata ebe erai ŋesi Eyudayat, kiworoto kere keporoto ediopet bala apak naka isawan iarei ebe, “Aratemi naka Ipeson ŋes nakapolon!”

Nakedaunia ekewadikan loka ere aisiyamikin ekodet, kobala ebe, “Okwe ikatuŋa luko Epeso, iŋai bo ituŋanan yenimam ejeni ebe, erai ere loka Epeso ekedaran loka eyekalu loka Aratemi nakapolon, ka loka aput nakedouni kokuju?
Aso naarai mam epedorio aiŋer akiro ŋun, ibusakinit yes aiyamakin, komam isunyito akirot,
Naarai iyaut ituŋa lu ne lumam ekokoto iboro luka eyekalu, karaida ainyanakin adekewok.
Aso arai ejaas Demeterio ka ikeswamak ice ipaupake akiro nuiwosaete kituŋanan, ejai airabet, ejaas da ikayaitok; kiwosakinos.
Konye arai imootos acekirot, itemonokinio katukot naduc.
Naarai kija toma aronis aiwosao kanuka ecelet loka lolo, loemamei akirot; ido kotoma akirot kana mam kipedori aitojok atukokin na.”
Kedau einer ŋun kotwar atukot.
Kinapakin ailoŋiloŋa, konyarau Paul ikesisiak, kicor, kotwar kes, konyou kolot Makedonia,
Nakedaunia aitor atutubeta ŋun, ka aitalakar kakiro nuipu, kodol Yonan.
Kosalak nen ilapio iuni, ido nakineruniata Iyudayan asurokin ŋes edwar aikwaŋar alosit Suria, kopeleik aboŋor korot loko Makedonia.
Kouparos kituŋa kalu, Sopater loka Beroea, okoku loka Puro, ka Arisitariko ka Sekundo Isesalonikan; ka Gaio loka Derube, ka Timoteo; ka Tukiko ka Toropimo luko Asia.
Konye keliŋara ituŋa ŋul, kidareut sio koTiroa,
kekwaŋaros isio anyoun koPilipi akaulo kapaarasia nuka imugatin lumam itubuunitoi, kadolokis kes koTiroa kalosit naka apaarasia akany; kasalakis nen apaarasia akanykaarei.
Kojaas atalai nuipu kagola nakokuju kama kitukokina.
Iboie etelepat ekekiror Eutuko kadirisa; kilurutu noi ajo; kiyatakinit Paul noi alimonokin, kipikosi ajo, kibiror kwap kagola nakiwuniet, kodakunai etwanit.
Konye kodoka Paul kokukum kamake, kotun, kobala ebe, “Sirikiyaloŋoŋoto; naarai eroko ŋesi ejari.”
Kodoka bobo kuju, kobil emugati, konyam, kiyatak einer kakes apak naepol, kiton tupuruc, kosodi kolot.
Koyaut etelepat ejari, kolakara alakara naepol.
Konye sio kaliŋa alosit ataker, kekwaŋaros kiton Assos, kamunos aitodokun Paul ataker kaŋina; naarai kitemokinit ŋesi kwaŋin, komuno ŋes; aitorit neeonit,
Nakiriamunor Assos, ketodokutu ŋes ataker, kasodete kadoloto Mitulene,
Kekwaŋaros anyoun kaŋina kadolo apaaran nakiareit aibois naetereikina ka Kios; apaaran da naatupakini kabwoutu koSamos, ka naatupakini ŋin kadoloto Mileto.
Naarai abu Paul kitojokite ainac Epeso tetere mam itumor kotoma Asia; naarai kemarani arai epedori adolore Yerusalem eroko apaaran naka Pentekote edolo.
Nakejaar Mileto kiyakik anyaraun imakio luka ekanisa koEpeso.
Nakedolunioto mamakeŋ, kotema kes atiar,
“Ijenete yesi kwape keboienenoo kayes apak kere ageun kapaaran kanasodit naadolio Asia,
ejaanakinenei Ejakait kaitasono kere, ka akiyo, ka acoduneta nukadoikinete kobotei luka Iyudayan,
mam abu kenac alimonokin yes akirot kere naeyaun ajokis, kesisianakinenei yes kaitebeikin, ido kaŋolitog,
etejenuni lyudayan ka Iyonanin da nuka aitoronikin mama ejai Edeke ka aiyuun da Ejakaitiwok Yesu Kristo.
Aso kwana, koany, alosi Yerusalem, kaenitai komoyo, mam ajeni akiro nukadoikinete kaŋina,
dimarai ketejenuni Emoyo Lokalaunan kaŋolire ebe kedareto aeneta ka areio.
Konye mam apodo akaijar araun naketiai kamakaŋ, dimikito kaŋetak akaigerosit ka aijaanakin nakadumuni kama ejai Ejakait Yesu, aitejenun Akiro Nukajokak nuka asianut naka Edeke.
Aso kwana, koany, ajeni eoŋ ebe yes kere lukerimorit alimonokin ajakanut naka Edeke mam bobo ianyunete akakonyen.
Kanuka ŋun ketejenuni yes lolo ebe mam akusiwokot kabeikinete eoŋ,
naarai mam abu kenac alimonokin yes ainerun kere naka Edeke.
Kocoito yesi, ka esipan da kere loadakaki Emoyo Lokalaunan yes araut ikaanyanarak, tetere icokiete ekanisa loka Edeke, lokikurauni kakeokot elopet.
Ajeni ebe kanyou eoŋ epote ipeen luededeŋ mamakus, mam itimete esipan;
bobo da enyounete kotomakus ikiliok luineras nuitapaarete airiar ikesisiak atupar kes.
Asokokwenyete, kiitunitos ebe ikar iuni mam abu kenyek aicor ŋinituŋanan paaran ka kuar kakiyo.
Kwana da ketitiŋ yes Edeke, ka akirot naka akesianut naepedori aiduk yes ka ainakin da airumet nepepe kaŋul kere luitalaunitai.
Mam abu kemiela epuesa karaida esabu karaida inapen luka ituŋanan.
Ijenete yesi ebe akakanin nu apotu kiswamata nukeipudika, ka loka ŋul kalukija nepepe keoŋ.
Kotoma akiro kere ketodik yes ebe kaitaaritoi naikoni nen ibusakinit aiŋarakin luekalanyaka, kaiitunite akiro nuka Ejakait Yesu, nukebala ebe, ‘Ainakin erai nakarereŋ adepar adumun.’ ”
Komonyata noi kere, kotunata Paul konuata.
Ekadakinitos noi kanuka akirot ŋin nakinera ebe mam bobo eanyunete akekonyen. Kinyamakis do kiton ataker.
Kosodi kanen nakidaunia atwarakin, kekwaŋaros kiderit kadoloto Kos, apaaran da naatupakini kadoloto Rodo, kanyout kanen kadolo Patara.
Kadumutu ataker naekoto aikwaŋar kiton Poenike, kadokasi, kekwaŋaros.
Nakianyunia Kupuro kipou kenyeisi ŋes kakan nakokediany, kediata kiton Suria, kadokutu koTuro; naarai nen kekotor ataker alemario iboro lueleleba.
Kiidau amoun ikesisiak, kasalakis nen apaarasia akanykaarei. Kolimokis kesi Paul kanuka Emoyo ebe sirikedoka Yerusalem.
Kosodi kedaunos apaarasiakosi kanen, kanyoutu kasodokinete; apotu ituŋa kere, nepepe kaŋorokec ka idwekec kinyamakis sio kiton kiŋa naka ere; kakukokinos oitolima kelipa kasodete katwarakinos.
Kadokas isio ataker, koboŋosi do kesi orekec.
Kasodete nakidaunia alositekosi anyoun koTuro, kadoloto Pitolomai; keyogata iinacan kasalata mamakec apaaran adiopet.
Tupuruc kanyoutu kadoloto Kaisarea; kalomasi togo loka Pilipo ekalimonokinan, lokerai ediopet kokanykaarei, kasalata mamake.
Kejaas ŋol apesur aoŋon abekon, nukeraas akadwarak.
Nakisalitor nen apaarasia nuipu, kodoku enabi ekekiror Agabo anyoun koYudaya.

Nakedolunio mamakosi kolem amuny naka Paul, koen elopet akekeje ka akekanin, kotema atiar, “Ebala Emoyo Lokalaunan kwanata ebe, Kwape kwaŋin eeniata Iyudayan luko Yerusalem elopet amuny na, ijaikinete da akanin nuka Imo.”
Nakiiraria ŋun, isio ka ituŋa luka aibois kaŋin, keŋaiŋaata ŋes sirikedoka Yerusalem.
Kosodi Koboŋok Paul ebe, “Anyoika iswamaete yesi, aimony ka aibil ekatau? Naarai akapakina mere aenio bon, konye atwanare da kotoma Yerusalem, kanuka ekiror loka Ejakait Yesu.”
Nakegirio akosiiŋaiŋa, kapalutu do kabalas ebe, “Nuekoto Ejakait kiswamai.”
Akaulo kapaarasia kaŋun, ketemokisi ikosiboro kadokasi kiton Yerusalem.
Kouparos ice kokesisiak luko Kaisarea kasio, koyaŋaasi sio ore loka Menason loko Kupuro, ekesisian lokolo sek, lokipejoi mamakeŋ.
Nakidolio Yerusalem kisukunyikis iinacan sio kaiyalama.
Kapaaran naatupakini koloma Paul nepepe kasio mama ka Yakob; kojaas da imakio kere.
Akaulo kayogan kes, kitatam kisudunyite akiro kere nukiswamai Edeke kama ka Imo kotoma aijaanakinike.
Nakiirariata, kituroto Edeke. Kotemasi ŋes atiar, “Onacekosi, iany kwape imwaatar ilukumin luka Iyudayan luiyuunito, irumit kes kere ekokote kanuka ikisila,
elimonokinitai kes nukon ebe isisianakini Iyudayan kere luejaas Omo ainyein Musa, ilimonokini kes ebe sirikekepata ikecedwe karaida atupit iponesio.
Aso ikwaikinio bo do ai? Abeit epupunete ebe ibu ijo.
Aso kiswama nukilimokini jo, Ejaas sio ikiliok iwoŋon lueenit aiyaposit;
koyaŋa ituŋa lu, kitalaun nepepe kakes, kotacak kes tetere ebarenete akwesikec. Kojenut ituŋa kere ebe akiro kwa nukelimonokinitai kanukon mam ebeito, konye jo elopet iricit aitodol ikisila.
Konye kanuka Imo luiyuunito, kipou kewadikata ebalua katubito ebe kinaca kesi iboro lueinakinio aputosia araut asuban, ka aokot, ka itiaŋ luemiedio, ka adoteu.”

Kosodi Paul ayaŋaar ikiliok ŋul, kitalaun elopet nepepe kakes apaaran naatupakini, koloma oyekalu, aitejenun apak naitodolikinere apaarasia nuka aitesegaario naeinakinere asubanit kanuka ŋolidiopet kakesi.
Keapuut apaarasia akanykaarei aŋetakin, koanyut lyudayan lukepote koAsia ŋes koyekalu, kisidikoto ekodet kere, kikamutu ŋes,

kocelut ebe, “Yes ikiliok luka Isirael, kiŋarakinai sio! Lo ŋes etuŋanan loisisianakini ituŋa kere kaiboisio kere asurokin atekerewok ka ikisila ka aibois na da; ido da ayau ŋesi Iyonanin toma oyekalu, amunaa aibois na nakalaunan.”
Naarai keanyunitos Toropimo Epesot nepepe kaŋes kore, koomitos da ebe ayau Paul ŋes toma oyekalu.
Kosodi kibwaa ere kere, kokerut ituŋa; kikamutu Paul kibwosasi kiŋa keyekalu, atipet kogolokinoi ikekia.
Nakemoototor epone loaret, kodolokis akiro ekapolon loka erioŋet ebe enyalinyalun Yerusalem kere.
Atipet kolem iserikalei ka ikapolokitokokec, koker mamakec; kosodete nakeanyuniata ekapolon ka iserikalei kinyeis aibuŋa Paul.
Kosodi koapik ekapolon kikam ŋes, kicorak aenio kirikoi iarei, Kiŋit ebe, “Iŋai bo lo?” ido ebe, “Anyoika eswama?”
Kocelas ice kokodet ace, ka ice da ace; namam kepedoria ajenun akiro kanuka ecelet, kicorak ayaŋaario ore loka iserikalei.
Nakedolio adoketa kodakasi ŋes iserikalei kanuka agogoŋ naka ekodet;
naarai ketupit ekodet loka ituŋa luipu, ecelasi, kobalas ebe, “Kicutasi ŋes!”
Konye napedwar kes aitolomar ŋes orekec, kiŋit Paul ekapolon ebe, “Ibus kereka eoŋ alimokin jo akirot?” Kobala ŋesi ebe, “Ijeni tope ijo Ayonanin?
Mere kereka ijo Emisiriat je, loitonyounit pac ituŋa ilukumin iwoŋon lukenyaritai Ikaarak, kiŋarenik amodiŋ?”
Koboŋok Paul ebe, “Arai eoŋ Eyudayat, loko Taruso kotoma Kilikia, lokore lomere loedit; keŋaiŋait, kisiikinai kener kituŋa kalu.”
Kisiik ŋes, kosodi kobwo Paul kadoketa, kokwet ituŋa; kojau aililiŋ tiiti, kiner kakes kaŋajep nAburaniat, ebe:
Nakiirariata ebe inera kakes kaŋajep nAburaniat, kiyatakis aililiŋ tii. Kobala ebe:
Kareite ituŋa luka Erot kala kiton atwanare, kaenenei karemonokin aidaris ikiliok ka aŋor da,

kwape itejenikina esasedoti lopeti ka imakio kere luka aurianet, Abu kadum ibaluan kamakec ainar iinacan, kalot Damasiko tetere ekamuni luejaas ŋina da, ka ayaun kes Yerusalem eenitai tetere iticanio.
“Kosodi kanen napalosi, aapikin Damasiko, kidiŋ paaran, atipet kemiliaik aica naepol naabuni kokuju.
Kebirokin kwap, keira eporoto lokabala eoŋ ebe, ‘Saul, Saul, kanukinyo kireitor eoŋ?’
Kaboŋok ebe, ‘Ijoŋo iŋai, Ejakait?’ Kabala ebe, ‘Arai eoŋ Yesu Enasarayot, loireit ijo.’
Ŋul da lukejaas keoŋ apotu koanyut aica ŋin, konye mam apotu kiiras eporoto loka ŋol kalokinera keoŋ.
Kabala ebe, ‘Keswama anyoika, Ejakait?’ Katema Ejakait eoŋ atiar, ‘Konyou, koloma Damasiko, kanen kilimokinio kere nuitemokinitoi jo aswam.’
Konye namam apedoritor aanyun kanuka amwekimwek naka aica kaŋin, karikosi eoŋ ŋul lukejaas keoŋ, kaloma Damasiko.
Kanen Anania, etuŋanan loeyoŋit Edeke kwape ejaatar ikisila, loetojokitai koYudayan kere lukiboiete kanen,
kobu mamakaŋ, kobwo kodiekaŋ kabala ebe, ‘Onaceka Saul, kokweny.’ Ido kosawa kaŋol abu kakweny kaany ŋes.
Kobala ŋesi ebe, ‘Kiseu jo Edeke loka lukapapaawok tetere ijenuni nuekoto ŋesi, ka aanyun da Ekadoliton, apupun eporoto loelomuni kaitukuke;
naarai iraun ekekajenan kotuŋa kere kakiro kaŋun nuiany ka nuiiraa da.
Aso kwana idaret inyo? Konyou, kibatisai, kilota akonidiakanareta, kiwonete ekekiror.’
Abu kaany ŋes, katema eoŋ atiar, ‘Kisunyite, konyou atipet koYerusalem, naarai mam ecamunete akoniitejenun kamakaŋ.’
Kabala ebe, ‘Ejakait, ejenete kesi ebe abu eoŋ kaenenenei ka aibuŋ da ŋul lukiyuunito jo kaŋinitukos kere.
Naabukorere da aokot nuka Sitepan ekajenanikon, ajai eoŋ da abwoi eapie, ketojokite, kedari inapen luka lukearete ŋes.’
Katema eoŋ atiar, ‘Ape; naarai keyakiari jo neelwana mama ejaas Imo.’ ”
Napecelasi, ka acakanar ikecenapen ka aiwelanar da apua kuju,
kicorak ekapolon aitolomar ŋes ore loka iserikalei, kotema ŋes aŋicio kadaio, tetere ejenuni nuainakinit kes ecelas kwaŋin kanukeŋ.
Nakedauniata aien ŋes kaunoi, kobala Paul ekapolokiton lokebwoi eapie ebe, “Ibus kereka yes aida etuŋanan loerai Eromayot komam etubokinitai?”
Nakiiraria ekapolokiton kolot kitejen ekapolon kobala ebe, “Nunyoika ikoto ijo aswam? Naarai erai etuŋanan ŋol Eromayot.”
Kobu ekapolon kiŋit ŋes ebe, “Kolimokinai, irai teni ijo Eromayot?” Kobala ebe, “Eebo.”
Koboŋok ekapolon ebe, “Abu eoŋ kagwel araut Eromayot karupian nuipu.” Kobala Paul ebe, “Konye eoŋ euriat.”
Atipet kobwata lukekapakina aiŋit ŋes; kokuriana ekapolon da, naarai ajenu ebe erai Eromayot ido abu koen ŋes.
Apaaran naatupakini, kokoto ajenun abeit nuainakinete Iyudayan aosan ŋes, kolacak, kicorak isasedotin lupeti ka aurianet kere atukokin, koyaŋau Paul da kisibwo ŋes kakonyenekec.
Kicorak Anania losasedoti lopeti lukebwoete aapu kaŋes aibap ŋes akeituk.
Kosodi Paul atemar ŋes atiar, “Kibapi jo Edeke, ijo arwatat naiworiworitai kakwanis! Iboikin kereka ijo atubokin eoŋ kwape ejaatar ikisila, kwabo icorak eoŋ aibapio aitegelikin ikisila?”
Kobalas lukebwoete aapu kaŋes ebe, “Ijo ba, imoromoroi kereka esasedoti lopeti loka Edeke?”
Kotema Paul atiar, “Iinacan, mam ajeni ebe erai esasedoti lopeti; naarai iwadikatai ebe, ‘Sirikiner erono mama ejai ekayaiton loka ikonituŋa.’ ”
Nakedaunia einer ŋun, kojau epeget kidiŋ Iparisayon ka Isadukayon; kotiaka atukot.
Naarai ebalas Isadukayon ebe emamei ajarun, karaida emalaika, karaida emoyo; konye ecamunito Iparisayon ŋun kere.
Kojau ecelet loepol; kobwaata ikewadikak ice owai loka Iparisayon, koutasi kobalas ebe, “Mam sio kidumuni adiokirot naerono kotuŋanan kalo. Arai bo emoyo inera kaŋes, arai bo emalaika?”
Kiyatakin ecelet apoloor, kokurianar ekapolon ebe enyilinyiliete kesi Paul, kicorak iserikalei adokun ka alemun ŋes kagogoŋ kakaninikec, ainyakar da ore loka iserikalei.
Nakiwala akwap, kitutuko Iyudayan, koenikinos kaiyaposit ebe mam enyamete karaida aimat kiton neaariata Paul.
Lukiyapoikinete kwaŋin emwaasi ituŋa akaisaoŋon ka adepar da.
Koloto kesi mama ejaas isasedotin lupeti ka imakio, kotemasi atiar, “Kienikin noi kaiyaposit ebe mam kiiri ibore kiton nekiaria Paul.
Aso do kwana, kikwenyasi yesi ka aurianet ekapolon ayaŋaun Paul mama ijaas, bala ikotosi ajenun kotenan akekiro, Kikapakina isio da aiar ŋes eriŋa eekuna die.”
Kiira ecen loka Paul nuka aperunikec; kolot koloma ore loka iserikalei, kolimok Paul.
Konyarau Paul ekapolokiton ediopet kotemaatiar, “Koyaŋa etelepat lo mama ejai ekapolon; naarai ejai akirot naelimokini ŋes.”
Kanuka ŋun koyaŋa ŋes, kitoloma neejai ekapolon, kobala ebe, “Abu Paul ŋol eenat kanyara eoŋ, kelip aitolomun etelepat lo mamakon, naarai ejai akirot naineras kajo.”
Kitiŋ ekapolon akekan kogitaros kaŋes, kiŋit kaiyeiyea ebe, “Anyoin akirot naikoto ijo alimokin eoŋ?”
Kobala ebe, “Enerut Iyudayan aiŋitun jo aitodokar Paul moi toma aurianet, bala ekotos aiŋitiŋit kotenan akekiro.

Aso siri jo kicam; naarai eperunito ŋes ituŋa luedeparito akaisaoŋon kakesi, luaenikinos kaiyaposit ebe mam enyamete karaida aimat kiton neaariata ŋes; aso kwana ekapakina kesi, idaretos akoniisumunet.”
Kosodi kotwar ekapolon etelepat, kicoro ebe, “Sirikilimok idiotuŋanan ebe kikwenyarit eoŋ.”
Kosodi konyarau ikapolokitok iarei, kobala ebe, “Kitemokis iserikalei akwat aarei, ka ikebwanenok akaisakanykaarei, ka lukakwaras da akwat aarei, alosit kiton Kaisarea, osawa lokiwuniet loka akuar.
Kitemokis itiaŋ lukisibwaneno Paul da, koyaŋaasi ŋes mama ejai Pelikis ekayaiton eiyara.”
Kiwadik ebalua kepone kalota:
Ikamunito Iyudayan etuŋanan lo, aapikinito aiar ŋes, kabunok kes nepepe ka iserikalei, kayu, kajenu ebe erai Eromayot.
Kakoto ajenun akirot naeosatotor, ketodoka aurianetekec.
Kadum ebe kiwosatai kanuka aiŋiseta nuka ikisilakec, kwabo mam kiwosatai adiokirot kere naibusakinitor aaria karaida aenia.
Kosodi nakapukokinere ebe ejaun ebotet loebilakinete ekiliokit lo, atipet kejuku mamakon, kecoraki da lukewosatok einer akecekiro kakonyenekon.”
Kosodete koyaŋaasi iserikalei Paul kwape kicorakinitere kinyamasi kuare kiton Antipaturi.
Tupuruc do koboŋosi kesi ore loka iserikalei kinyeis ikebwanenok aiyatakin alosit kaŋes,
Kedolo ŋul Kaisarea, ka ainakin ekayairon ebalua, kisibwaata da Paul kakonyeneke.
Ŋes da nakedaunia asoman, kiŋit ebe, “Erai ŋesi loko buku ali?” Nakejenunia ebe erai loko Kilikia,
kotema atiar, “Keirari jo naeponiata lukiwosato.” Kicorak aidario kotogo lokapolou loka Kerode.
Kosodi ketuboros apaarasia akany, kijesar Anania esasedoti lopeti nepepe kice komakio, ka ekeneranikec, Teratulo. Kikujokis kesi ekayaiton nuesurokinitotor Paul.
Kenyaraun ŋes, kogeu Teratulo aosan ebe:
“Naarai kidumunit ainapakin naepol kanukon, wu Pelikis lokaibuses, kanuka apiirikinikon da eteteun akiro nuka ateker kana,
kicamunit da kaimal naepol koponesio kere kaiboisio da kere.
Konye kenyek aitapas jo noi, keŋaiŋait jo kopupok sio kasianutukon kanuesupaaka.
Naarai kidum isio ekesa lo erai ekamunaaran, ekesidikon da loka ecelet koYudayan kere anatar akwapin kere, ekeŋarenon da loka erioŋet loka Inasarayon.
Bobo da abu kotam amunaar eyekalu, kekamut, [kakotos atubokin kwape ejaatar ikisilakosi.
Konye kobu ekapolon Lusias kolema ŋes kagogoŋ naepol kakaninikosi,]
kicorak da ikewosatokoke aponare akonyenekon. Ijo elopet kaiŋitiŋitikon ipedori adumun akiro nukiwosat isio ŋes.”
Kiwosata Iyudayan da kobalas ebe, “Ikote nepenen.”
Kosodi kokwet ekayaiton Paul einer, Koboŋok ebe:
“Naarai ajeni ebe irai ijo ekatubon loka ateker kana ikar luipu, atubo elop ketau kaloelakara,
naarai ipedori ajenun ebe eroko apaarasia edepara atomon kanuarei ageun naadokaria eoŋ Yerusalem aima;
mam ituŋa lu apotu kadumut koyekalu kipega kidiotuŋanan, karaida aituwutaar atukot, karaida katukosia, karaida kore.
Kwabo mam epedorete aitogogoŋ akiro ŋun nuiwosaete kwana.
Konye alimori kamakon nu ebe kwape ejaar Erot, loenyarito kesi erioŋet, kwaŋin amaia Edeke loka lukapapaakosi, eyuunit kere nuelimito ikisila, ka nuiwadikatai oitabon luka inabin,
amunokina Edeke, ŋol loecamunito kesi da ikulepek, ebe ejaun ajarun naka luedolito ka lumam edolito da.
Kanuka ŋun enyikokinit ajaut ketau lomam itoronio mama ejai Edeke ka ituŋa da apaarasia kere.
Akaulo naka ikar luipu abu kabu ainun atekereka nukaitim ka ainakineta da.
Kaŋun kadumut eoŋ koyekalu etesegaara, komamei ekodet karaida autar. Konye Iyudayan ice lukepote ko Asia—
lutiebusakinit ajaut ne akonyenekon aosan eoŋ, arai ejai adiokirot keoŋ,
Arai bo kolimut lupelu aibucaret naeanyunitos kamakaŋ naabwoia kaurianet,
dimarai akirot na adiopet bon nakeworoi kabwoi kokidiŋikec ebe, ‘Kanuka ajarun naka ikatwak katubokinio lolo kakonyenekus.’ ”
Kosodi kicorak ekapolokiton aidar Paul konye kajalakinit, komam isimiki idio kopaperoke aijaanakin ŋes.
Kosodi ketuboros apaarasia kodol Pelikis nepepe ka Durusila akeberu, nakerai Ayudayat, kiyakia anyaraun Paul, kiira ŋes inera nuka aiyuun naejai toma Kristo Yesu.
Kopesik Paul ŋes akiro nuka adolit, ka nuka ayaikina, ka atubokinio naebunit, kokurianar Pelikis, Koboŋok ebe, “Kolot do kwana; kadum eoŋ apak, keworouni.”
Komuno da ebe einakini ŋes Paul arupian, Kanuka ŋun konyaraunun eyala kaŋes.
Kosodi ketuboros ikar iarei, kodakakinai Porukio Pesito airum aibois naka Pelikis; kekoto Pelikis aitojokio kama ka Iyudayan, kwaŋin kinyek Paul kaidaris.
Kosodi nakedolio Pesito obuku, ketuboros apaarasia auni kodoka Yerusalem anyoun koKaisarea.
Kikujokis ŋes isasedotin lupeti ka ikeŋarenok luka Iyudayan nuka Paul, kiŋaiŋaata ŋes,
kilipata kasianutuke ayaun Paul Yerusalem, tetere eperunete ka aarakin orot,
Konye Koboŋok Pesito ebe idario Paul koKaisarea, eapie ŋes da alosit ŋina.
Kobala ebe, “Aso ŋulluejai apedor kayesi kauparos kaeoŋ, arai kito ejai akirot naerono kotuŋanan kaŋol, kiwosata do.”
Nakesalitor kakes apaarasia numam edeparito akanykauni arai atomon, kijesar Kaisarea; apaaran naetupakini kiboikin oicoloŋ loka etube, kicorak Paul ayaunio.
Nakedolunio Paul, kobwaata Iyudayan lukijesunos koYerusalem airimor ŋes, kiwosata ŋes akiro nuipu nuelaŋir, numam apedorete aitogogoŋ,
Kobala Paul eiyar ebe, “Mam eoŋ adiakit akirot karaida kokisila luka Iyudayan, karaida oyekalu, karaida mama ejai Kaisar.”
Konye Pesito kekoto aitojokio kama ka Iyudayan, Koboŋok Paul ebe, “Ikoto kereka ijo alosit Yerusalem atubokinio kaŋina kakonyeneka kakiro kanu?”
Konye kobala Paul ebe, “Abwoi eoŋ kane koiŋaren keicoloŋ loka etube loka Kaisar, nekebusakinitor atubokinio; mam adiakit akirot koYudayan, kwape ijenia ijo kotenan.
Aso arai adiakit, arai eswamat akirot naibusakinitor atwania, mam aŋeri atwanare; konye arai emamei abeit kanukewosatotor, emamei yenepedori aijaikin eoŋ akaninikec. Eyatakinit mama ejai Kaisar.”
Kosodi nakedaunia Pesito einer kituŋa luka aurianet Koboŋok ebe, “Iyatakinit ijo mama ejai Kaisar; ilosi do mama ejai Kaisar.”
Ketuboros apaarasia, kodol Agiripa ekabaka, ka Berenike Kaisarea ayogan Pesito.
Nakesalitotor nen apaarasia nuipu, kitatamik Pesito ekabaka akiro nuka Paul ebe, “Ejai ne etuŋanan lokinyeini Pelikis eenitai;
lokekujokinete isasedotin lupeti ka imakio luka Iyudayan akiroke nakajaar Yerusalem, kokotosi ŋes atubokinio.
Abu kaboŋok kes ebe mam erai epone loka Iromayon aijaikin etuŋanan kere eroko yeniwosatai etereikina ka luiwosato, ka adumun apak naka aiyar kotoma kanuiwosatai.
Aso naketukonokinotor ne, mam abu keyap, konye apaaran naatupakini keboikin oicoloŋ loka etube, kecorak etuŋanan ŋol ayaunio.
Kosodi nakebwoiata lukiwosato ŋes mam eyauna akirot naerono kwape abu kaomitor;
konye ejaas aiŋiseta ace nuka edinikec, ido nuka etuŋanan ece Yesu loabu kotwana, konye loitogogoŋit Paul ebe ejari.
Kaoliki eoŋ aiŋic aiŋiseta ŋun, abu keŋit arai ekoto alosit Yerusalem atubokinio kaŋina kakiro kaŋun.
Konye Paul kiyatak aidario tetere etubokini Kaisar, kecorak ŋes aidario kiton neejukaria ŋes mama ejai Kaisar.”
Kotema Agiripa Pesito atiar, “Eoŋ da elopet abu kakoto apupun etuŋanan ŋol.” Kobala ebe, “Ipupuni ŋes moi.”
Kotema Pesito atiar, “Ekabaka Agiripa, ka yes kere luijaas ne nepepe kasio, ianyut etuŋanan lo lokelipito eoŋ Iyudayan kere luko Yerusalem ka ne da, kiworoete ebe mam bobo ebusakinit ŋes aijar.
Konye abu kaany ebe mam iswamat akirot naibusakinitor atwanare; ŋes da elopet iyatakinit mama ejai Kaisar, abu kaomite aijukar.
Eoŋ da emamei akirot nakabeit naewadikakini ejakait. Kanuka ŋun ayau ŋes ne akonyenekus, aitelekarit akonyenekon, wu Ekabaka Agiripa, tetere kidau aiŋitiŋit kadum akirot naewadikai.
Naarai aomit eoŋ ebe mam ejok aijukar eenat komam itodiara nuiwosatere ŋes.”
Kobala Agiripa Paul ebe, “Kinup jo einer kanukon.” Kosodi korio Paul akekan, koiyar, kobala ebe:
“Wu Ekabaka Agiripa, kekemer naarai kaiyar lolokakonyenekon kanuka akiro kere nukewosatotor Iyudayan,
aitelekarit naarai ijeni ijo iponesio kere ka aiŋiseta da kere nuejaas oYudayan. Kanuka ŋun kemaimait kopupok eoŋ katitiŋikinit.
Naarai ejenete Iyudayan kere ekajautene ameun keitelepane, lokejai kageunet kotoma atekereka, ido ko Yerusalem da.
Apotu kajenut ameun apeŋo, arai ekotosi aitejenun, ebe abu karai Eparisayot lokorioŋet loetokit noi kotoma odinikosi.
Kwana da abwoi kane atubokinio kanuka amun aisumunet nakisumunit Edeke lukapapaakosi,
naemunosi atekerinikosi atomon ka nuarei adolokin, emaenenete Edeke kainyikokinit paaran ka kuare da.
Kanukinyo eomitere kamakus araut akirot namam ecamuna ebe itajari Edeke ikatwak?
Abu keswama ŋun ko Yerusalem; abu kaen ice kalukalaunak aidaris, kadau ainakinio apedor kaneejaas isasedotin lupeti, ido da abu kekeik akan luaario.
Ido irwan ipu abu keticanenenei kes katukosia kere, ketiŋaikinite ainyanakin Edeke; kareite kes kaibworit kiton oreria lukokiŋa da.
“Kasodi alosit Damasiko kanuka aswam kaŋin, kija kapedor ka anupakinio naka isasedotin lupeti.
Kosodi kidiŋ paaran, wu ekabaka, abu kaany aica nakebuni kokuju, nakedeparit ailiya naka akoloŋ, kacaikin eoŋ ka ŋul lukija nenipe keoŋ.
Kebirokinos isio kere kwap, keira eporoto lokinera keoŋ kaŋajep naka Aburanian ebe, ‘Saul, Saul, kanukinyo kireitor eoŋ? Kitionikinit ijo aipet iketetin.’
Kabala ebe, ‘Iŋai bo ijo, Ejakait?’ Katema eoŋ Ejakait atiar, ‘Eoŋ Yesu loireit ijo.
Konye konyou, kobwo kakejekon; naarai ketakanikin jo kanuka nu, adakakin jo araun ekejaanakinan ka ekajenan loka akiro nuibu koanyunia eoŋ, ido kaŋun nuketakanikinor,
kayuuni jo kama kituŋakon ka Imo da-lukeyakiari mamakec,

aitwekenyun akecekonye, tetere ibelokinos ainyein amuton kesesenata aica, ainyein da apedor naka Satan kosesenata Edeke, kosodete adumun aisionio adiakanareta, ka airumet kokidiŋ; kaŋul kaluitalaunitai kanuka aiyuun naejai tomakaŋ.’

konye abu kageu alimonokin luko Damasiko, kosodi koYerusalem, kotoma akwap kere da naka Iyudayan, ka Imo da, ebe kitoronikinos, kibelokinos mama ejai Edeke, iswamaete aswamisio nuibusakinito aitoronikin.
Kanuka ŋun ŋes kekamuniata Iyudayan kotoma oyekalu, katamakis aiar da.
Aso kiton lolo adum aisigalikinio naebuni kama ejai Edeke, abwoi aitejenun ludidik ka lukapolok da, kwabo mam eneri akirot dimarai ŋun nukinerasi Musa ka inabin ebe ejaunete:
ebe ibusakinit Kristo aiticanio, ido da korau ŋesi losodit ajarun kokatwak, elimonokini aica mama ejaas ituŋakosi ka Imo da.”
Kosodi nakeiyaror kwaŋin, kotema Pesito keporoto loepol atiar, “Kikerepiki cama ijo, Paul, kijulaki jo aisisiakon naepol.”
Konye kobala Paul ebe, “Mam kekerepikinit, wu Pesito lokaibuses, dimarai enera akiro nukabeit ka nukapirianut da obe.
Naarai ejeni ekabaka nuka akiro kaŋun, eoŋ da enera kaŋes katitiŋ; naarai etogogoŋit ebe emamei akirot kotoma kaŋun naimunonikinitai ŋes, naarai mam nu eswamas kagor.
Ekabaka Agiripa, iyuunit tope ijo inabin? Ajeni ebe iyuunit.”
Kotema Agiripa Paul atiar, “Kanaesupaana ikoto aituluor eoŋ da Ekristayot!”
Koboŋok Paul ebe, “Arai kanaesupaana, arai kanaepol elipi Edeke mere ijo bon, konye kaŋul da kere lukapupete lolo, koraut kwape keoŋ-dimarai aeneta nu.”
Kosodi kobwo ekabaka, ka ekayaiton ka Berenike, ka ŋul lukiboiete kakes;
napenyounete, kineranakinos ebe, “Mam etuŋanan lo iswamat akirot naibusakinitor atwanare karaida aenio.”
Kobala Agiripa Pesito ebe, “Arai kedim etuŋanan ŋol aiyatakinit mama ejai Kaisar ti kelacakin.”
Kadokas ataker naka Aduramutio, nakekapakina alosit kiton oreria luka oitolima luka Asia, kekwaŋasi, kauparos ka Arisitariko Emakedoniat loko Sesalonika.
Apaaran naatupakini kadolo Sidon; kikonak Yulio Paul asianut, kocamak ŋes alosit mama ejaas ipaperoke tetere imukeo.
Kanyoutu kanen kekwaŋaros kediata keririto Kupuro, naarai kemeunito ikwamin kakonyen.
Ketoro aŋolol naka Kilikia ka Pampulia, kadolo Mura nako Lukia.
Kanen kodum ekapolokiton ataker naka Alegesanderia idiai Italia, kadokikis ŋin,
Kekwaŋaros motimot apaarasia nuipu, kadolo Kinido kationis, ido naarai kitikokinit ekwam, keririata Kurete katereikina Salumone,
Ketoroto kationis aapu koitolima, kadolo aibois naenyaritai Odoketa Lukajokak naidunyas ka ere Lasea.
kobala kes ebe, “Lukipa, aanyunit eoŋ ebe ejaun amunaar ka atwaniar alosit na, mere iboro bon ka ataker, konye aijarawok da.”
Konye abu ekapolokiton kopupok ekekwaŋan lokapolon ka elopet ataker aitelekarit ŋun nuenera Paul.

Ido da mam ebusakinit edoket ŋol aiboio apak naka aaterot, kidelut luipu kakesi aikwaŋar anyoun kanen, tetere elemuni edolete Poenike, edoket loka Kurete, loetereikina agolitome nakokide, ka egalakimak nakokide, kasala nen kapak naka aaterot.
Kosodi napekusi ekwam lokeŋalakimak kiyamakina, koomitos ebe adumutu nukekotos, kibwosut edobo lokitapaikinet, kikwaŋaros aapu koitolima loka Kurete.
Ketubor apak naedit kokut ekwam lokagogoŋ, loenyaritai Eurakulon ebuni kaneonit,
Kokutar ataker, mam epedoro atereikina ekwam, kajalakisi kikutario,
Kanen ketoro atipet ariri naka apujan naedit naenyaritai Kulauda, kekurautu ajen itaker.
Kekiasi ŋes, kitwasamata aisigalikineta, koenikis kwap ataker; ido naarai kokuriaka aipok koSuritis, kijoliliosi iboro, kwaŋin kokutarai.
Naarai kiiliilit ekwam, apaaran naatupakini kogeut acakar iboro aŋolol;
apaaran nakiwuniet da kocakanasi kakaninikec ikulepek iboro luka ataker.
Mam atakani akoloŋ karaida aacer apaarasia nuipu, kokuta sio ekwam loededeŋ, kokau kodaun amun kere naka aitajario.
Nakiboioto apak naapol mam enyamete, kosodi kobwo Paul kokidiŋikec, kotema atiar, “Lukipa, ti ebusakinit yes aiirar eoŋ, amamus aikwaŋar anyoun koKurete, adumun amunaar ka atwaniar na.
Aso kwana kecori yes kolakaros; naarai emameun yenetwaniari akeijar, dimarai ataker bon.
Naarai kakuar kana abu emalaika loka Edeke, loarai eoŋ lokeŋ, loamaenenei da, kobwo aapu keoŋ,
kalimok eoŋ ebe, ‘Paul, sirikikurianar; ibusakinit ijo aibwo kakonyen nuka Kaisar; ido koany, kiinak Edeke ituŋa lu kere luiupatar.’
Aso, lukipa, kolakaros, naarai eyuunit eoŋ Edeke, ebe ejaun kwape kalimokinitere.
Konye ibusakinit aipok kapujan.”
Kosodi kedol apaaran nakitomonet kaoŋon, nakikaleleor aŋolol naka Adiria, bala kidiŋ ebai koomitos ikekwaŋak ebe aapikis neeonit.
Kitemo, kodumut aidules akaisaarei; kiyatakis edit kitemo bobo, kodumut aidules atomon kakany.
Kokuriakaros aipok katiban, koosikis idoboi iwoŋon lukitapaikinet kokori, kilipa akwap aiwalar.
Nakekototor ikekwaŋak aisii kataker, apotu kijoliliosi itaker toma aŋolol, kijoseikinito bala eosikinete idoboi lukitapaikinet kokume.
Kolimok Paul ekapolokiton ka iserikalei ebe, “Dimikito esalete ituŋa lu ataker, mam ipedorete aitajario.”
Kosodete iserikalei aitub aunoi nuka itaker, kojalakis kodo.
Aso keŋaiŋait, konyamata; naarai eraun mamakus aitajario, naarai emamei karaida etimat loka akwesikus loeoliori.”
Kedau einer ŋun, kolem emugati, kimala Edeke kakonyenekec kere, kobil, kogeu ainyam.
Kosodete kolakaros kere, konyama kesi da.
Isio lukija toma ataker kimwa ituŋa kere akwat aarei ka akaisakanykaarei, ka lukanykape.
Kedaut aimonikin, kitebebenata ataker, kocakakis akima aŋolol.
Kiwala akwap, mam ejenuna akwap ŋin, dimarai apotu koanyutu agule naejai oitolima, kinerut aisukunyar ataker ŋina arai epedor.
Kocakasi idoboi lukitapaikinet, kinyeis kes kaŋolol, nepepe kaijarijar aunoi nueenis aiteteneta; kikeut egoe tetere ekutari ekwam kobeasi oitolima.
Konye kodoloto neiriamata akailan kipok ataker kokwap, kiminaikin ekume, kosalak komam ijaŋijaŋa, konye kobila akailan ekori.
Kinerut iserikalei aiar ienan, kinye idiokakesi aiduor ka aisi;
konye kokoto ekapolokiton aituku Paul, kitikok kinyeis aswam nuenerunitotor. Kicorak luapedorete aidu kisiaut aibironokin aŋolol kobeata neeonit,
lukesalete da kabaoi ka oboro ke luka ataker. Kwaŋin kokuasi ituŋa kere neeonit.
Nakidaunia aiku, kajenut ebe apujan ŋin kenyaritai Melita.
Kiswamakis sio ikulepek akwap asianut namam etapit, naarai apotu kinokokis akim, kisukunyikis sio, kanuka edou loketepi, ido kanuka aterot da.
Nakeraraa Paul ekesit loka akito, kibwaik akim, kolom emusaga kanuka amwanis, kidolakin akanike.
Nakeanyuniata ikulepek akwap emun edelideli kakanike, kotemanaros ebe, “Abeit erai etuŋanan lo ekaaran, Karaida kekuit kaŋolol, mam Etube isiikit ŋes aijar.”
Konye ŋes kilakilakak emun akim komam edumunit amusuŋut.
Kidarito, komunosi ŋes abuun arai aibiror atwanare eŋeso; konye kedaut aidar apak naepol koanyut ebe amamei adiomusuŋut kere, kibelokinos kotemasi ebe erai edeke.
Aapu kaibois kaŋin kejaas amanat nuka ekapolon loka apujan, ekekiror Publio, kisukunyik ŋol sio ketau loka eipaperone apaarasia auni.
Kosodi kanen kedeka papa loka Publio ekamidi ka aleporit aokot, koloma Paul mamakeŋ, kilip, kidokok ŋes akekanin, kitaŋaleu,
Akaulo kaŋun, kopotu ice lukedekas kapujan kaŋin kitaŋaleunoi.
Kosodete kitubusikis sio kainakineta nuipu; ido nakikwaŋaror kibwaikis iboro kere lukipuda ataker.
Akaulo naka ilapio iuni, kediata kataker naka Alegesanderia, nakesalakinit apujan apakio nuka aterot, aanyuneteke kerai Iinacan Imwatok,
Kadolo Surakusa, kasalakis nen apaarasia auni.
Anyoun kanen kerimosi kadolo Regium; ketubor apaaran adiopet kokut ekwam lokeŋalakimak, kadolo Puteoli apaaran nakiareit.
Kanen kadumut iinacan, kiŋaiŋaata sio asalakin mamakec apaarasia akanykaarei. Kwaŋin kadolo do Rome.
Kiirasi iinacan lukaŋina nukosi, kopotu kiton Agwelanaret naka Apius ka Iswamin Iuni aisiriam sio. Nakeanyunia Paul kes, kimal Edeke, kotitiŋior.
Nakilomaria Rome, kocamakinai Paul aiboi bon nepepe ka eserikalet loidari ŋes.
Kaadaut aiŋitanar, kakotosi alacakin, naarai kemamei adiokirot kamakaŋ naaret.
Konye nakepegatar Iyudayan, ketiŋaikin aiyatakin mama ejai Kaisar-kwabo amamei nakiwosaet ituŋa luka atekereka.
Aso kanuka ŋun kanyarautu yes aponare aanyun eoŋ keiner keoŋ, naarai kanuka amun naka Isirael ŋes kaenitere korikot kalo.”
Kotemasi kesi ŋes atiar, “Mam sio kidumunit ebalua anyoun koYerusalem kakirokon, ido emamei onace edio da loebunit ne loelimorit ka ainerit akirot naerono kanukon.
Konye kikoto apupun kamakon nuiwomit; naarai kanuka akiro nuka erioŋet kalo ejenikina kamakosi ebe ereitai noi kaŋinikibois.”
Kedaut aseikin ŋes apaaran kopotu luipu noi mamakeŋ togo lokiboio.
Kitetemik kes ka aitejenun ameun tupuruc kiton eboŋ nuka ajakanut naka Edeke, ikujokini akiro nuka Yesu kanuka ikisila luka Musa ka inabin da.
Apotu ice kiyuut nuenerai, kwabo ice mam iyuuna.
Namam kecamanarotor, koloto do, kedau Paul einer akirot adiopet na ebe: “Abu Emoyo Lokalaunan kinera kotenan kama ka enabi Isaia mama ka lukapapaakus ebe:
Kiiranarete konye mam ijenunete, Koanyuŋunete da konye mam imisiikinete,
Abaŋaakata itauon luka ituŋa kalu, Ijikititas akiikec,
Itumudakito akecekonyen,
Kinyeis aanyun kakonyenekec,
Ka aiirar kakeceki,
Kojenut kotauonokec,
Kibelokinos ketaŋaleu kes.’
Kedau einer ŋun koloto Iyudayan, epeganakinos noi.]
Kodau Paul ikar iarei kotogoke loketacanakini, kisukunyanakinenei kere lukeponenenete mamakeŋ,
elimonokini ajakanut naka Edeke, ido ka aisisianakin katitiŋ akiro nuka Ejakait Yesu Kristo, komam itikokinio.
nuesumunit Edeke kolo kama ka inabinoke kotoma nukiwadikatai nukalaunak,
kes akiro nuka okokuke Yesu Kristo Ejakaitiwok, lokeurio kaur naka Daudi kwape ejaar akuan,
loedakakinitai araut Okoku loka Edeke kapedor kwape ejaar Emoyo loka Alaunit, kanuka ajarun kokatwak,
kotomakeŋ ŋes kipou kadumuniata asianut ka eiyakiane tetere erimarete lukatekerin kere aiyuun kanuka ekekiror,
kotomakec yes da kinyaritai araut luka Yesu Kristo.
Asianut kojai mamakus ka ainapakin nuepote kama ejai Edeke Papawok ka Ejakait Yesu Kristo.
Naarai Edeke, loamai komoyoka kotoma Akiro Nukajokak nuka Okokuke, ŋes ekajenanika ebe alimununei yes kailipika komam apalari.
Ecebokinit ailip arai motoko kanuka akoteke kesipedori Edeke arurukun mama ijaas.
Naarai kemuit aanyun yes tetere kekopakin yes adioinakinet naka emoyo nakiticasi yes,
ŋes atemar ebe aitalakanario bonik ka bonik kanuka aiyuunikus, ka nakaŋ da.
Konye iinacan, akoto yes ajenun ebe irwan ipu alosikinit abunore mamakus, tetere adumuni adioraito kamakus kwape kama kImo ice, konye ketikokinitai kiton kwana.
Keburaete Iyonanin ka lukacekwapin da, keburaete lukacoa ka lueolito da:
kanuka ŋun akapakina eoŋ kowaika alimonokin Akiro Nukajokak kiton mamakus da luijaas Rome.
Naarai tomakec epukoritai adolit naka Edeke, anyoun kaiyuun kiton aiyuun; kwape iwadikatere ebe, “Ebusi ikadoliton kanuka aiyuun.”
Naarai ejenas akiro nuka Edeke ideleleete kotomakec, naarai abu Edeke kisideleleu mamakec.
Naarai ameun kaisub akwap, atakanut iboroke lumam etakanete, ŋes atemar akepedor namam enaŋi, ka Eidekeoneke, kotoma oboro lukesubi. Aso emamei kes aiyar:
naarai apotu kojenut Edeke, mam kes itubusikinito ŋes kwape Edeke, karaida aima ŋes, dimarai kooliosi kotoma aomisiokec, kitumutoroi ikecetauon luemamei ajenun.
Kineras ebe eraas lukacoa, kobaŋaakaros,
kisiecata aibuses naka Edeke lomam etwani aituputoor aputosia nuka ituŋa kaluetwakete, arai nuka akweny, arai nuka itiaŋ, arai nuka lueliatos.
naarai apotu kisiecata abeit naka Edeke araun aiŋal, koyoŋito komaata da isubat itia Ekasuban loituritoi ikar kere! Amen.
Kanuka ŋun abu Edeke kojalak kes ainekit naka ileic, naarai apotu aŋorokec da kilocokis einono lokaurunet aituluor lomere lokaurunet,

ikiliok da kwape kwaŋin kinyeis einono lokaurunet loka aberu kibworo kotoma oraŋakec ŋolituŋanan mama ejai locekeŋ, ikiliok kiswamanakis ikiliok nukileic, ido koinanakinos eropit loebusakinit apaarikec.
Ido kwape mam apotu kocamuniata ajenun Edeke, abu Edeke kojalak kes aomisio numam ajokis, kiswamata numam ibusakinito.
Ileleba amamus adolit kere, nukaronok, airaŋaanut, ameŋeranut; ileleba ekokote, earit, aŋolopa, aiŋal, aomisio nueroko, ikedeideok,
ikasiomak, luelaito Edeke, lukepali, luepogaka, luituros, ikapwakak nueroko, luiulakinito ikauriakakec,
luemamei acoa, luejalete aitutuket, lumam eminanara, luemamei aitim,
luejenete aitepesenit naka Edeke, ebe luiswamaete nuikote nen ibusakinit atwanare, mam bon iswamaete ŋun, konye itojokito da ŋul lukiswamaete ŋun.
Kijeni oni ebe aitub naka Edeke erai nakabeit mama ejaas ŋul luiswamaete nuikote nen.
Ijo ituŋanan, yenitubokini luiswamaete nuikote nen, iswamai ijo da ŋupeŋun, iwomit ebe ikui tope kaitub naka Edeke?
Imwaŋit kereka ijo abar naka ajokisike, ka aŋirikin, ka atitiŋikinitike da? Mam kereka ijeni ebe ajokis naka Edeke kiriuni jo aitoronikin?
Konye kanuka aninikukon, ka etaukon loemamei aitoronikin, iŋadakin bon anyunyura kapaaran naka anyunyura ka apukorio naka etube loedolit loka Edeke,
loetacakini ŋinituŋanan kwape ejaatar aswamisioke;
mama ejaas ŋul luemoete aibuses ka ayoŋio, ka aibut, kotoma atitiŋ naka aswamisio nuejok einakini aijar naka ikar kere.
Ido kaŋul kalueŋolopaka, luiulakinito abeit, luerimasi amamus adolit, edumunete anyunyura ka adedeŋ.
Ejaunete ican ka aridakinio toma aijar naka ŋinituŋanan yeniswamai nueroko, aisiaun lyudayat, ka Iyonanit da,
konye aibuses ka ayoŋio ka ainapakin mama ejai ŋinituŋanan yeniswamai nuejok, aisiaun Iyudayat, ka Iyonanit da.
Naarai emamei aitiak ituŋa kama ejai Edeke.
Naarai lukediakarete kere komameete ikisila, emudiaros da komameete ikisila, ŋul da kere lukediakarete kojaas kikisila, etubokinio kokisila.
Naarai mere ŋul luiirarete ikisila kes eraas ikadolitok kakonyen nuka Edeke, konye ikeswamak ikisila kes luitojokio araut ikadolitok.
Naarai naiswamaata Imo luemameete ikisila koinono loka ikisila, karaida emameete ikisila eraas kesi ikulepek ikisila.
Itodikinete ebe iwadikatai aswam naka ikisila toma otauonokec itejenikini da etaukec, iwosaete akeceomisio nuepegasi bonik ka bonik, arai bo eiyaros;
kapaaran naetubokinia Edeke nukaiyeiyea nuka ituŋa kama ka Yesu Kristo kwape ejaatar Akiro Nukajokak nuketitiŋitai eoŋ.
kojeni nuekoto ŋesi, icamuni da nuitelekarito ajokis, kituutooritai kotoma okisila,
itogogoŋit bon araut ekeŋarenon loka imudukiok, aica da naka ŋul kaluejaas amuton,
eketetenan loka ibaŋiok, ekesisianakinan loka imukerun, ijai kaput naka aijen ka abeit toma okisila,
aso jo loisisianakini loce, mam tope isisianakini bon? Jo loilimonokini ebe Sirikokoi, ikokoi kereka ijo?
Jo loibala ebe Siridote, idotei ijo? Jo loisacit aputosia, iŋasi ijo abilai?
Jo loiwolobobot kotoma okisila, itisili kereka Edeke kanuka apaar kokisila?
Naarai kwape iwadikatere ebe, “Einyanakinio ekiror loka Edeke katekerin kanukus.”
Aso arai erici lomam ekepep aicorakineta nuka ikisila, mam kereka amamus akepioke imarakinio araut akepio?
Ŋol da lomam ekepitai koinono loerici ikisila, mam kereka kitubokini jo loijaas kaiwadikaet ka akepio da, loipaari kokisila?
Naarai ŋol loerai Eyudayat kokuju mere ŋol Eyudayat cut, karaida akepio nakokuju toma akuan;
dimarai ŋol loerai Eyudayat kotoma, ka akepio nakotau kotoma omoyo kwabo mere aiwadikaet. Akeiturio mam ebuni kotuŋa dimarai kama ejai Edeke.
Itelekarit kereka Eyudayat kinyo? Arai anyoin bo ajokis naka akepio?
Itelekarit noi kaŋolipone. Nasodit, naarai isiŋadikinitai Iyudayan akiro nuka Edeke.
Anyoika bo arai ice kakesi araas lumere lumunon? Amamus amunonutukec itapalauni tope amunonut naka Edeke?
Madi akuj! Korai Edeke lokabeit, ŋinituŋanan da ikeŋalan, kwape iwadikatere ebe,
“Tetere itojokio araut loedolit kakirokon,
Ipikori da kotoma atubokiniokon.”
Konye arai amamus adolitewok iticasi adolit naka Edeke, kenera anu? Ebe Mam Edeke erai loedolit aitican oni kanyunyura? (Enera kopone loka etuŋanan.)
Madi akuj! Kanuka ŋun ikonakini ai Edeke etubokini akwapin?
Konye arai kanuka aiŋalaka iyatanakini abeit naka Edeke aitodiar akeibuses, kanukinyo eriŋa katubokinitere eoŋ kwape ekadiakanaran?
Ido kanukinyo mam kibalar ebe, “Keswamata nukaronok tetere epote nukajokak”? kwape kisabanakiniata icetuŋa sio ebe kinera isio kwaŋin, Edolit atubokiniokec.
kwape iwadikatere ebe:
“Emamei ikadoliton, karaida idiopet;
Emamei yenejenuni, emamei da yenemoot Edeke.
Apaasi kere, emamei kes kere ajokis;
Emamei yeniswamai nuejok, emamei karaida idiopet.”
Ijodijodete kaŋajepakec,
Ejai aisorit naka emusaga kwap kaŋajepakec.”
Ejai amudiar ka aburun orotinikec.
Mam apotu kojenut erot loka ainapakin.”
Kanuka ŋun emamei yenejai akuan yenitojokio araut yenedolit kakonyeneke kanuka aswamisio nuka ikisila, naarai kanuka ikisila ŋes ejenunor adiakar.
ŋes adolit naka Edeke naejai kanuka aiyuun Yesu Kristo, mama ejaas kere luiyuunito. Naarai emamei atiaketait;
naarai adiakasi kere, komam edolokinito aibuses naka Edeke,
akesianut naeinakini atitai ŋes itojokit kes araut luedolito, kanuka alakunio naejai toma Kristo Yesu,
loibwaikinit Edeke araut aitupucet kanuka aiyuun akeokot, tetere itodikini akedolit kanuka ajalakin adiakanareta nukolo nueŋirikinit Edeke;
kosodi kitodik adoliteke kapak kana, tetere eraun loedolit ka loitojoki da ŋin yeniyuuni Yesu araut loedolit.
Luka aswamisio? Mam cut, konye kanuka ikisila luka aiyuun.
Naarai kitogogoŋit ebe itojokio ituŋanan araut yenedolit kanuka aiyuun, komameete aswamisio nuka ikisila.
Erai kereka Edeke loka Iyudayan bon? Mam kereka erai loka Imo da? Eebo, loka Imo da,
naarai erai Edeke ediopet; loitojoki luekepitai kotoma aiyuun, ka lumam ekepitai da kanuka aiyuun ŋipeŋin.
Aso kitapalauni kereka ikisila kanuka aiyuun ŋin? Madi akuj! Konye kiticasi ikisila.
Aso kinera anyoika nuka Aburaam papaakosi kwape ejaar akuan?
Naarai arai kitojokitai Aburaam kanuka aswamisioke, ejai naeolobobaa, konye mere kakonyen nuka Edeke.
Naarai inerasi biai nuiwadikatai? Ebe, “Abu Aburaam kiyu Edeke, kimarakinai ŋes araun adolit.”
Konye mama ejai ekeswaman, mam ekeropit imarakinio kanuka asianut, dimarai iburao.
Kwabo mama ejai yenimam iswamai, konye iyuuni ŋol loitojoki luetumaaka, imarakinio akeiyuun araun adolit.
Kwape inerar Daudi ebe isirereŋitoi ituŋanan yenimarakinit Edeke araun ikadoliton komameete aswamisio;
Ebe, “Isirereŋitoi luisionio aronisio, ka luerapitai da adiakanareta;
Isirereŋitoi etuŋanan lomam Ejakait imarakinit adiakar.”
Kimarakinio biai? Kedaun aikep, arai bo eroko kekepa? Mere kedaun aikep, dimarai eroko ekepa.
Abu ŋesi kodum akepio araun aanyunet arai nakaipucakinet naka adolit naka akeiyuun eroko ekepa, tetere eraun papa loka lukeyuunak kere karaida mam ekepitai, tetere imarakinio kes adolit.
Eraun da papa loka akepio mere mama ejaas ŋul luekepitai bon, konye mama ejaas ŋul da luetupito ikukut luka aiyuun naka papaakosi Aburaam nakejaatar eriŋa ekepa.
Naarai arai luka ikisila kes ikerumak, eraun aiyuun atitai, aisumunet da itapalaunio.
Naarai eyaŋaunete ikisila anyunyura, konye naemameatar ikisila emamei apaar.
kwape iwadikatere ebe, “Kadakaki jo araun papa loka atekerin nuipu,”) kakonyen nuka Edeke loiyuunit ŋesi, loeinakini lukatwak aijar, loenyarauni da iboro luemameete bala luejaas.
Kemamei amun abu kiyuu kotoma amun, tetere eraun papa loka atekerin nuipu; kwape kelimokinere ebe, “Kwape kwaŋin ejaun akoniwur.”
Mam abu akeiyuun kononokiar, naaomitor ejautene loka akuanake naketwanit, nakeraar loka ikar bala akwatat, ka akoik da naka Sara nakerakakinit,
konye mam abu kobuonokin kanuka aisumunet naka Edeke kamamus aiyuun, dimarai kogogoŋor kaiyuun, kitopoloo Edeke,
kojeni cut ebe epedori Edeke aswam nuisumunit.
Kanuka ŋun, “kimarakinai ŋes adolit.”
Konye mam kiwadikatai kanukeŋ bon ebe, “Kimarakinai ŋes”,
dimarai kanuwok da, Kiponio aimarakin oni da lukiyuunit ŋol lokitajaruni Yesu Ejakaitiwok kokatwak,
lokeinakinio kanuka aibucanaretawok, kitajarunai da aitojok oni araun luedolito.
Kanukeŋ kidumu erot loka aiyuun lokitodoli asianut ŋin nakibwoia, kiwoloboboi da kotoma amun aibuses naka Edeke.
Kwabo mere ŋun bon, dimarai kiwoloboboi da kotoma aiticanio, kajenete ebe aiticanio eyaŋauni atitiŋikin,
atitiŋikin da eyaŋauni aitogogoŋio, aitogogoŋio da eyaŋauni amun,
amun da mam itisili, naarai ekwamakinitai amin naka Edeke otauonowok kanuka Emoyo Lokalaunan lokiinakinitai oni.
Naarai nakirokor kikalanyaka, kedol apak abu Kristo kotwanik luetumaaka,
Naarai etiono ituŋanan atwanikin ikadoliton, konye diat eluŋakin ituŋanan aŋirikin atwanikin yenejok.
Konye iturit Edeke akemin mamawok, naarai nakirokor kirai ikadiakanarak abu Kristo kotwanik oni.
Aso aitelekarit noi kiidau kwana aitojokio kotoma akeokot, kitajario da kanukeŋ alemunio kama ejai anyunyura.
Naarai arai nakiraar kolo lukasurup kitupucitoi kEdeke kanuka atwanare naka Okokuke, aitelekarit noi kiidau aitupucio, kitajario kotoma aijarake.
Kwabo mere ŋun bon, konye kiwoloboboi da kotoma Edeke, kanuka Ejakaitiwok Yesu Kristo, lokidumunia kwana aitupuciowok.
naarai ajai adiakar toma akwap aliŋakin ikisila, konye mam emaritai adiakar naemameatar ikisila.
Konye erumit atwanare ameun ka Adam kiton Musa, erumit da ŋesi lumam apotu kodiakasi kopone loka apaar naka Adam, loerai aput naka ŋol kaloebunit.

Konye ainakinet mam eputos kaibucaret. Naarai arai apotu luipu kotwaka kanuka aibucaret naka ediopet, aitelekarit noi epoloor asianut naka Edeke ka ainakinet naejai toma asianut naka etuŋanan ediopet Yesu Kristo, kanuka luipu.
Ido ainakinet mam eputos kanaayau loadiakaa. Naarai etube loabu kobu kanuka ediopetuŋanan abu koyau atubokinio, konye ainakinet naabu kobu kanuka aibucanareta nuipu ayau aitojokio.

Aso, arai kanuka aibucar naka ediopetuŋanan abu atwanare kirum kanuka etuŋanan ŋol, aitelekarit noi ŋul luedumunete aipadara naka asianut ka ainakinet naka adolit irumete toma aijar kanuka etuŋanan ŋol ediopet, Yesu Kristo.
Naarai kwape keraunotor luipu ikadiakanarak kanuka epali loka ediopetuŋanan, kwape kwaŋin itaraunio luipu ikadolitok kanuka arima naka etuŋanan ediopet.
Apotu ikisila kolomut tetere iyatanakin aibucar; konye nekiyatakinor adiakar, abu asianut kodepa noi noi,
tetere kwape erumitor adiakar kotoma atwanare, kwape kwaŋin irumi asianut kanuka adolit kiton aijar naka ikar kere kanuka Yesu Kristo Ejakaitiwok.
Madi akuj! Oni lukitwaka kama kadiakar kikwaikini ai kirina kibusi kotomakeŋ?
Arai bo mam ijenete ebe oni kere lukibatisatai kotoma Kristo Yesu, aponi kibatisai kotoma atwanareke?
Aso aponi kidaai nepepe kaŋes kanuka aibatis kotoma atwanare, tetere kwape kitajarunere Kristo kokatwak kanuka aibuses naka Papa, kwape kwaŋin oni da kilosenenei kaijar nakitetet.
Kijeni na ebe aponi etuŋananiwok lokolo kibubukinoi kaŋes, tetere itapalaunio akuan nakadiakanar, komam bobo adiakanar kitubuleseni oni.
Naarai yenatwana eosikinitai anyoun kadiakar,
Konye arai kipou katwaka nepepe ka Kristo, kiyuunit ebe kijari da nepepe kaŋes.
Kijeni ebe kedau Kristo ajarun kokatwak, mam etwani bobo, mam bobo atwanare eyait ŋes.
Naarai atwanare naketwani, abu kotwanik adiakar irwan atipet bon, konye aijar naejari, ejari mama ejai Edeke.
Yes da kwape kwaŋin koomito bonik araut lukatwak kama ejai adiakar, konye ikajarak mama ejai Edeke kotoma Kristo Yesu.

Kwabo sirijaikinete akusitutubeta mama ejai adiakar aitwasamaa amamus adolit, dimarai kijaikis bonik mama ejai Edeke, kwape ikajarak luanyout kokatwak, akusitutubeta da mama ejai Edeke aitwasamaa adolit;
naarai mam adiakar kiyait yes, naarai mere ikisila kiyaito yes, dimarai asianut.
Mam kereka ijenete ebe loijaikinos bonik arimar kwape ibulesin, iraas do ibulesin luka ŋol kaloirimarito, arai adiakar naeyauni atwanare, arai bo arima naeyauni adolit?
Konye kimalai Edeke, naarai iraas kolo ibulesin luka adiakar, konye ipotu korimasi kotauonokus aput naka aisisianakin nakiinakinio yes,
ido nakiwosikinere anyoun kadiakar koraut ibulesin luka adolit.

Enera eoŋ kopone loka etuŋanan kanuka akalanyanut naka awatekus. Naarai kwape kijaikiniata kolo atutubetakus aitwasamao kotoma amodokok, ka epali loeyauni epali, kwape kwaŋin kijaikis do kwana atutubetakus aitwasamao kotoma adolit naeyauni aitalaunio.
Naarai nakiraatar ibulesin luka adiakar, kiwosikinitai anyoun kadolit.
Anyoika kereka araito nuipotu kodumut kapaarasia kaŋun, kakiro kaŋun nukisurumito kwana ileic? Naarai awasia naka akiro kaŋun ŋes atwanare.
Konye kwana kidaut aosikinio anyoun kadiakar iraut ibulesin luka Edeke, idumut araito nueyaunete alaunit, awasiakec da ŋes aijar naka ikar kere.
Naarai eropit loka adiakar ŋes atwanare, konye ainakinet naka Edeke erai aijar naka ikar kere kotoma Kristo Yesu Ejakaitiwok.
Iinacan, mam kereka ijenete-naarai enera kaŋul kaluejenete ikisila ebe eyaito ikisila etuŋanan eroko ejari?
Naarai eenito ikisila aberu naemanyitai eroko okilenike ejari; konye ketwana ekiliokit, eosikinitai ŋin kokisila luka okilenike.
Kanuka ŋun enyarao naadote arai kedumun kecekiliokit, apak naeriŋar okilenike ejari. Konye arai ketwana okilenike, eosikinitai anyoun kokisila, mam da erai naadote arai kemany ekiliokit ece.
Naarai nakiraar kolo luka akuan, abu airaŋaanut naka adiakar kiswama kotoma atutubetawok kanuka ikisila, kasodete adumakin atwanare araito.
Konye kwana kiwosikinitai anyoun kokisila, kitwaka kama ejai ŋin nakijoreorit, kasodete kejaanakis komoyo lokitetet kwabo mere kaiwadikaet namojoŋ.
Konye adiakar, naabu kodum apak kanuka aicorakinet, kiswama kotomakaŋ ŋolipone loka aiŋobel, Naarai etwanit adiakar emameete ikisila.
Abu eoŋ karai kolo loajari komameete ikisila, konye nakebunio aicorakinet kojaru adiakar, katwana do eoŋ.
Kerai aicorakinet naeyauni aijar kosubite ŋin kamakaŋ naeyauni atwanare.
Naarai abu adiakar, naabu kodum apak kanuka aicorakinet, keŋala eoŋ, kaaria da.
Kwaŋin eraas ikisila lukalaunak, ka aicorakinet da nakalaunan, ka naedolit ka naejok da.
Naarai kijeni ebe eraas ikisila luka emoyo; konye eoŋ arai lokakuan, kagwelaritai ayait naka adiakar.
Naarai mam ajeni nueswamai, Naarai nuakoto, mere kes nueswamai, konye eswamai nualait.
Konye arai eswamai numam akoto, acamunit ebe ejokuka ikisila.
Aso kwana mere eoŋ eswamai ŋun dimarai adiakar naiboie kotomakaŋ.
Naarai ajeni ebe emamei ibore yenejok yeniboie kotomakaŋ, ŋes atemar ebe toma akuanaka. Naarai ejai akote diekaŋ, konye aswam ajokis be.
Naarai mam eswamai ajokis naakoto, konye aronis namam akoto, ŋes eswamai.
Konye arai eswamai numam akoto, mam bobo eoŋ eswamai dimarai adiakar naiboie kotomakaŋ.
Kwaŋin adumuni ekisil ebe naakotor eoŋ aswam nuejok, kaapikin aronis.
Naarai alelakinit ikisila luka Edeke kotoma otuŋanan lokotoma.
Konye aanyuni ekisil ece kotoma atutubetaka ejiosi kekisil loka aomisioka, ka aituluor eŋatara loka ekisil loka adiakar loejai toma atutubetaka.
Itukwi eoŋ lokican! Iŋai bo kayuuni eoŋ kakuan kana nakatwanare?
Emalai Edeke kanuka Yesu Kristo Ejakaitiwok! Aso do eoŋ elopet ejaanakini ekisil loka Edeke kaomisioka, kwabo ekisil loka adiakar kakuanaka.
Aso do kwana emamei ŋul luejaas toma Kristo Yesu atubokinio.
Naarai kaosikis eoŋ ikisila luka Emoyo loka aijar loejai toma Kristo Yesu anyoun kokisila luka adiakar ka atwanare.
Naarai ŋun numam apedorito ikisila, kanuka akalanyanut naka akuan, abu Edeke, naejukunia Okokuke elopet kaput naka akuan nakadiakaran ido kanuka adiakar, kotubok adiakar kotoma akuan,
tetere aicorakineta nuka ikisila itodolikinio kotomawok, lumam kilosenenei atupar akuan dimarai atupar Emoyo.
Naarai ŋul luetuparete akuan eomitos nuka akuan, konye ŋul luetuparete Emoyo, eomitos nuka Emoyo.
Naarai aomit naka akuan ŋes atwanare, konye aomit naka Emoyo ŋes aijar ka ainapakin.
Kanuka ŋun aomit naka akuan ŋes aitusurup Edeke; naarai mam enonokikinit ikisila luka Edeke, kwabo mam epedori anonokikin;
kes da luejaas toma akuan mam epedorete aisiyalamikin Edeke.
Konye arai ejai Kristo kotomakus, atwakata awatekus kanuka adiakar, konye ejarete ikusimoyon kanuka adolit.
Konye arai iboie Emoyo loka ŋol lokitajaruni Yesu kokatwak kotomakus, ŋol lokitajaruni Kristo Yesu kokatwak einakini da akusiwat nuetwakete aijar kanuka Ekemoyo loiboie kotomakus.
naarai arai ijarete atupar akuan, ikotosi atwakare, konye arai kitwataniasi aswamisio nuka akuan kanuka Emoyo, ijarete do.
Naarai kere luiŋarenikinit Emoyo loka Edeke, ŋul kes odwe luka Edeke.
Naarai mam idumunito emoyo loka ebulesene aboŋor bobo akurian, dimarai idumunito emoyo loka araun odwe. Kanuka ŋol kimonya ebe, “Abba! Papa!”
Emoyo elopet itejenikini imoyonowok ebe kirai idwe luka Edeke,
arai kirai idwe, kirai da ikerumak, ikerumak luka Edeke, luirumete nepepe ka Kristo, arai ca kiiticani nepepe kaŋes, tetere kitubusikinio da kaŋes.
Naarai idarete isuban keimiel noi apukokinio naka odwe luka Edeke;
naarai kitononokikinai isuban aamameak, mere kanuka eipudikec, dimarai kanuka ŋol lokitononokikini kotoma amun;
naarai eosikinio isuban da anyoun kobulesene loka aibos, alomar aosikinio naka aibuses naka idwe luka Edeke.
Naarai kijeni ebe idinyasi isuban kere, eriebasi da nepepe kiton tinenikwana;
kwabo mere ŋul bon, dimarai oni da ikulepek luejaas araito nugeet nuka Emoyo, kidinya oni da kotomawok, kedareto araut odwe, ŋes atemar ebe alakun naka awatewok
Naarai kiponi kitajari kanuka amun. Konye ketakanu ibore yenikemunoi emamei bobo amun. Naarai iŋai tope emunokina ibore yenetakani?
Konye arai kimunokina yenimam etakani, kidaret katitiŋikin.
Kwape kwaŋin da isigalikini Emoyo akalanyanutuwok; naarai mam kijeni kwape ibusakinitor ailip, konye kinainaanakin Emoyo oni keidiny lomam inerio.
Ŋol da loirerei itauon ejeni aomisio nuka Emoyo, kwape ejaatar, naarai iŋaiŋaaŋakini lukalaunak kwape ekotor Edeke.
Kijeni ebe iswamaete iboro kere nepepe kanuka ajokis mama ejaas ŋul lueminasi Edeke, ŋes atemar ŋul lukenyaraunio kanuka alosikiniteke.
Naarai ŋul luabu kojenu sek, abu koseu da sek aituput kes aput naka Okokuke, tetere erauni ŋesi ekiyai kotoma oinacan luipu.
Ŋul da luabu koseu sek, konyarau da kes; ŋul da luabu konyarau, kitojok da kes; ŋul da luabu kitojok, kitubusik da kes.
Ŋol lomam abu kimik Okokuke elopet, konye koinak ŋes kanuwok kere, mam kereka kikorakini iboro kere da nepepe kaŋes?
Iŋai bo iwosai luseuna luka Edeke? Edeke itojokit;
iŋai bo etubokini? Kristo Yesu loketwani, konye aitelekarit lokitajarunio, loejai akan nakoteten naka Edeke, loiŋaiŋaanakini oni.
Iŋai bo kitiaki oni kamin naka Kristo? Arai bo ican, arai aridakinio, arai areio, arai ebeli, arai amujalal, arai aronis, arai ekileŋ?
Kwape iwadikatere ebe,
“Kanukon kiario aitiwar akwap,
Kimario bala amerekekin nutubutubo.”
Naarai etogogoŋi ebe karaida atwanare, karaida aijar, karaida imalaikan, karaida lueyaito, karaida nuejaas, karaida nuejaunete, karaida lukapedor,
karaida amukurur, karaida aidules, karaida isubat kere, mam kipedorete aitiak oni kamin naka Edeke naejai toma Kristo Yesu Ejakaitiwok.
Enera abeit kotoma Kristo, mam eŋalai; itejenunete akaomisio kotoma Emoyo Lokalaunan,
ebe kakadakinit noi ka ariebo da namam enaŋi kotauka.
Naarai tikapedo ailip eoŋ elopet aikenio atiakario kama ka Kristo kanuka ikainacan, lukatekerika kwape ejaar akuan,
kes luka Isirael, lukeinakinio araut odwe, ka aibuses, ka aitutuketa, ka ainakinio ikisila, ka aijaanakin Edeke, ka aisumuneta da;
eraas lukapapaa lukec, ido kotomakec alomunia Kristo kwape ejaar akuan. Kituritete Edeke loeyait kere ikar ka ikar. Amen.
karaida keraas lukaur naka Aburaam, mam kere eraas idwe; konye “toma Isaak ŋes enyaritere akoniwur.”
Ŋes atemar ebe idwe luka akuan mere ŋul idwe luka Edeke, dimarai idwe luka aisumunet imaritai araut akeur.
Naarai akirot na ŋes ebalar aisumunet ebe, “Kedol apak, aboŋuni, ido ejaunete Sara da kikoku.”
Kwabo mere ŋin bon, konye Rebeka da kedum akoik kokiliokit ediopet, ŋes Isaak papaawok,
karaida mam ber euruunitai idwe ŋul, komam iswamato adiokirot naejok arai naerono, tetere icasit alosikinit naka Edeke naka aseun, mere kanuka aswamisio, dimarai kanuka anyariteke,
aponi kolimokinai ŋin ebe, “Ijaanakini lokapolon lodidi.”
Kwape iwadikatere ebe, “Abu kamina Yakob, konye kala Esau.”
Naarai ebala ŋesi Musa ebe, “Etimi yenakoto aitim, ido ekonakini asianut yenakoto aikonakin asianut.”
Aso do mere kanuka loekot karaida loekeri, dimarai kanuka aitim naka Edeke.
Naarai ebala nakiwadikatai Parao ebe, “Kanuka nu ŋes ketonyounio jo tetere etodikini akapedor mamakon, ido tetere elimorio ekakiror kakwapin kere.”
Aso do itimi loekot, ido itininiki loekot.
Aso kitemari eoŋ ebe, “Kanukinyo eriŋar ŋesi itoronitor? Naarai iŋai kereka enyoikini nuelosikinit ŋesi?”
Ijo ba ituŋanan, iŋai bo ijo yeniboŋokini Edeke? Epedori kereka ibore yenisubuna alimokin yenikesubuni ebe, “Kanukinyo kiisubia eoŋ kwana?”
Emamei kereka ekajean apedor kama kelupe, asubun ibore yenibus ka ibore da yenesil kaluŋuret ŋipeŋin?
Konye anyoika bo arai ekoto Edeke aitodikin anyunyura ka aitejenun da akepedor, abu kotitiŋikin katitiŋ kanaepol iboro luka anyunyura luasubitai amudiario,
tetere itejenuni abarara naka akeibuses kotoma oboro luka aitim, luetemonokinit apeŋo kodumut aibuses,
kes oni lukiinyarauni mere Iyudayan bonik, dimarai Imo da?
Kwape kineritor da kama ka Kosea ebe,
“Ŋul lumam araas ikatuŋa, anyarai ikatuŋa,
ŋin da namam kerai naminataka, anyarai naminat.”
‘Mam yes iraas ikatuŋa,’
Nepenen enyaraere idwe luka Edeke lokajaran.”
“Karaida kerai etiai loka odwe luka Isirael kwape asiŋe naka aŋolol, aatoŋotokec bon itajario;
naarai iswamai Ejakait akekirot kakwap aitodol ka atubutub da.”
Ido kwape kegeunia Isaia einer ebe:
“Arai kemam Ejakait loka ajoresio kinyeinitor oni aur,
Ti kiirau bala Sodom, ti kiiputokin ka Gomora.”
Konye do luka Isirael luetupito ikisila luka adolit, mam edolokinito ikisila ŋul.
Kanukinyo? Naarai mam apotu kotupata korot loka aiyuun, dimarai korot loka aswamisio. Kitiguikinos kamoru naketiguikinan,
kwape iwadikatere ebe,
“Koany, ebwaikini toma Sion amoru naketiguikinan ka atiiba nakebiroron;
Yeniyuuni ŋes mam isurumio ileic.”
Naarai etejenuni kanukec ebe edunyaka kanuka Edeke, konye mere kotoma aijen.
Naarai kanumam ejeniata adolit naka Edeke, kokotos aitogogoŋ adolitekec kikulepek, mam apotu korimasi adolit naka Edeke.
Naarai Kristo ŋes aŋetakinet naka ikisila, tetere ŋin yeniyuuni itojokio araut ikadoliton.
Konye adolit naelomuni kaiyuun inera kwanata ebe, Sirikiner kotaukon ebe, “Iŋai bo yenekot adokari toma akuj?” (Ŋes atemar ebe, ayaun Kristo kwap.)
Arai bo ebe, “Iŋai bo yenekot aijesar toma aipany?” (Ŋes atemar ebe, ayaun Kristo kuju anyoun kokatwak.)
Konye inera anu? Ebe, Eapie akirot kamakon, kaitukukon, kotaukon da, (ŋes atemar ebe akirot naka aiyuun nakilimonokini isio).
Naarai arai ilimori kaitukukon ebe Yesu ŋes Ejakait, iyuuni da kotaukon ebe abu Edeke kitajar ŋes kokatwak, kitajario.
Naarai iyuuni ituŋanan kotauke kiton adumun adolit, elimori da kaitukuke kiton adumun aitajario.
Naarai ineras nuiwadikatai ebe, “Ŋin yeniyuuni ŋes mam irumete ileic.”
Naarai emamei atiaketait, Eyudayat ka Eyonanit; naarai erai ŋesi Ejakait loka kere, ekabaran mama ejaas kere luiwoneete ŋes.
Naarai “Ŋin yeniwonei ekiror loka Ejakait itajario.”
Aso iwoneete biai ŋol lomam iyuunito? Ido da iyuunete biai ŋol lomam iirarito? Iirarete da biai komamei ekalimonokinan?
Elimonokinete biai komam iyakiaritai? Kwape iwadikatere ebe, “Ejokuka cama akeje nuka ŋul kaluelimonokinete Akiro Nukajokak!”
Konye mam kes kere apotu korimasi akiro nukajokak. Naarai inera Isaia ebe, “Ejakait, iŋai bo iyuunit akiro nueirarit kamakosi?”
Aso aiyuun elomuni kotoma aiirar, aiirar da kanuka akirot naka Kristo.
“Anata ekeceporoto akwap kere,
Akecekiro da kiton osaŋeta luka akwapin.”
“Kesurumi yes ekokote kama kaŋul lumam eraas ateker;
Ketunyunyurikini do yes kanuka ateker naemamei aijen.”
“Abu kadumun kama kaŋul lumam kamooto;
Abu ketejenun mama kaŋul lumam keŋisito.”
Mam Edeke enerit iketuŋa luabu kogeu ajenun, Mam kereka ijenete nuineras nuiwadikatai kanuka Eliya, kwape iwosaa luka Isirael kakonyen nuka Edeke?
Ebe, “Ejakait, aarata inabinokon, atiyanakis da itemwanakon, eoŋ bon asal, ido emoete akaijar.”
Konye aboŋokinet naka Edeke ebala biai? Ebe, “Etasalit kanukaŋ ikiliok ilukumin ikanykaarei, lumam ekukokinos Baal.”
Aso kwape kwaŋin apak na, naka kwana, ejai aatoŋot naeseunitai kanuka asianut.
Konye arai erai kanuka asianut, mam bobo elomuni kanuka aswamisio; arai timam asianut eroko erai asianut.
kwape iwadikatere ebe,
“Abu Edeke koinak kes emoyo loka ajo,
Akonye numam eanyunete,
Aki da numam iirarete,
Kiton apaaran naka lolo.”
“Korau emesakec eic ka akuluma,
Ka ibore yenikitiguikinet, ka yenikitegelet kes.
Kitumudakai akonyekec, tetere mam esesenete,
Kitukukum ipuranakec apaarasia kere.”
Aso arai eraun aibucarikec abar naka akwapin, atwaniarikec da araun abar naka Imo, itelekarit cama aitodolikiniokec!
Konye enera kayes Imo. Aso naarai arai eoŋ ekiyakia loka imo, etopoloori aijaanakinika,
tetere esurumi lukatekerika ekokote, ka aitajar da ice kakesi.
Naarai arai acakariokec ayau aipuc naka akwapin, anyoin aisukunyuniokec dimarai aijar anyoun kokatwak?
Arai araito nageet erai nakalaunan, kwape kwaŋin aluŋuret da; arai da aliasit erai nakalaunan, kwape kwaŋin atenieik da.
sirikiwolobob katenieik kaŋun. Arai kiwolobob, mere jo idakit aliasit dimarai aliasit kidakit jo:
Aso itemari atiar, “Kepakario atenieik ŋun tetere keraikinio eoŋ.”
Abeit ŋun. Epakanaritai kes kanuka amamus aiyuunikec, ido da icasi kanuka aiyuunikon. Sirikiturokin, konye koyoŋ.
Naarai arai mam Edeke itimit atenieik akulepek, mam kitimi jo da.
Aso koany ajokis ka adedeŋ naka Edeke; adedeŋ mama ejaas luibiroros, konye ajokis naka Edeke mamakon, arai kisalak ajokis ŋin; arai mere kwaŋin jo da kijepario.
Ka ŋul da, arai mam esalito toma amamus aiyuun, iraikinio, naarai epedori Edeke airaikin kes bobo.
Naarai arai kijepunitai jo katorom naka eseitun loka ais, kiraikinitai oseitun lokoriot lomam erai einono, itelekarito cama atenieik akulepek airaikinio ainyakakin oseitunikec.
kwaŋin itajario luka Isirael kere; kwape iwadikatere ebe,
“Ebuni Ekalakunan koSion,
Isiyekari amamus ayoŋit Edeke kotoma Yakob”;
Naalemaria adiakanaretakec.”
Aso kotoma Akiro Nukajokak araut lukasurup luka Edeke kanukus; konye kotoma aseunio araut lueminai kanuka lukapapaakec.
Naarai mam Edeke iitokini ainakinetake ka anyariteke da.
Naarai kwape kolo kipaliikinioto yesi Edeke, konye kwana idumut aitimio kanuka aipaliikinikec,
kwape kwaŋin epaliikinioto kesi kwape kwana tetere edumunete aitimio kanuka aitim naipotu yesi kodumut.
Naarai agoloki Edeke kere nepepe toma aipaliikin, tetere itimi kere.
Arai iŋai bo kerai ekapetan akiroke?”
Etacakinio ŋes bobo?”
Kwabo sirikiputo nuka ikar kalu, konye kanuka aisiteteunio naka aomisiokus kijulakinos, tetere igimorete nuekoto Edeke, nuejok, ka nuisiyalamikinito, ka nuedolito da.
Naarai kwape kijaar katutubeta nuipu toma akuan adiopet, kwabo mam atutubeta kere iswamaete aswam adiopet,
kwape kwaŋin oni da lukipu, kirai akuan adiopet kotoma Kristo, ka atutubeta da nuka lucewok bonik ka bonik.
Aso naarai kija kainakineta nuegelegela kwape ejaar asianut nakiinakinitai, ketwasamata kes; arai adwaranut, kwape ejaar aiyuuniwok;
arai aijaanakin, kotoma aijaanakiniwok; yenisisianakini, kotoma aisisianakinike;
yenicori, kotoma aicoroke; yenekori, kotau loliogot; yeniŋarakini, kadunyanut; yenitimi da, kaiyalama.
Kotoma amin naka einacane, kominanaros bonik ka bonik; kotoma aibuses kitopoloorite ŋinituŋanan aupake.
Kotoma adunyanut sirikalanyaka, kokokito komoyo, kijaanakis Ejakait.
Kolelakinito amun kotitiŋioto kocan, kicebokinito ailip.
Kokoranakisi lukalaunak nuipudasi, kisukunyanakisi ipejok.
Kolelata kaluelelete, komonyata kaluemonyete.
Koomito adiopekirot bonik ka bonik. Siridakara, konye koupanaros kaluitasonos. Siriraas lukacoa kakonyenekus ikulepek.
Siritacakis aronis kanuka aronis, kocoito nuejok kakonyen nuka ituŋa kere.
Arai epedoros kowaikus, kinapakina kituŋa kere.
Luminan, sirinyaŋanakinos, konye kinac anyunyura; naarai iwadikatai ebe, “Ebala Ejakait ebe, Enyaŋit ekaŋ, eoŋ atacakini.”
Konye “arai eriebi lokasurupikon eteŋei, kitanyam, arai ejakit akur, kitamat ŋes; naarai naiswamaa kwaŋin inokokini atotole akouke.”
Sirikiipiko aronis, konye kipiko aronis kanuka ajokis.
Kanuka ŋun yenitepegi apolou etepeg aicorakinet naka Edeke, ido luitepegete itudumikinos etube.
Naarai ikayaitok mere luitukurianete kotoma aswamisioit naejok, dimarai kotoma naerono. Ikoto kereka ijo kinyek akurian apolou? Kiswama do nuejok, kituri ŋesi jo.

Naarai erai ŋesi ekejaanakinan loka Edeke kamakon kanuka ajokis, Konye arai kiswama naerono, kokuriana, naarai mam edakit ekileŋ atai; erai ŋesi ekejaanakinan loka Edeke, loinyaŋi kanyunyura yeniswamai nueroko.
Kanuka ŋun ibusakinit anonokikin, mere kanuka anyunyura bon, dimarai kanuka aomisio nuilepilepete.
Naarai kanuka ŋun itacete da esolo, naarai eraas kesi ikejaanakinak luka Edeke, icebokinito ŋipeŋin.
Kotacanakisi kere nuebeito, loitelemi esolo loka ituŋa, esolo loka ituŋa; loitelemi esolo da loka iboro, esolo loka iboro; kotacanakisi ayoŋit luebeito ayoŋit, aibuses da mama ejaas lukaibuses.
Naarai na ebe, “Siridote, Siriari, Sirikokoi, Siriŋobelei,” ka aceicorakinet kere, imorikikinitai toma akirot na ebe, “Komina ikoniidunyet kwape iminar bon.”
Amin mam ikonakini iidunyet erono; kwaŋin amin ŋes aitodolikinet naka ikisila.
aeka akuar, eapie da apaaran. Aso kalacasi aswamisio nuka amuton, kanapa lujiis luka aica.
Kalosenenete kebusak kwape paaran, mere kotoma aboliasio ka emeret, mere kotoma adoteu ka abenyanut, mere kotoma aŋolopa ka ekokote,
konye konapa Ejakait Yesu Kristo, kwabo siribuakinito akuan aitodol nuimiela.
Ituŋanan yeniyuunit enyami kere, konye yenekalanyana enyami ikui.
Kinyek yenenyami aimen yenimam enyami, karaida yenimam enyami siriketuboki yenenyami; naarai isukunyikinit Edeke ŋes.
Iŋai bo jo yenitubokini ebulesit loka yenice? Ebwoi ŋesi arai ibirori kama kejakaitike elopet. Eebo, isibwoio naarai epedori Ejakait aisibwo ŋes.
Yenericit apaaran, ericit kanuka Ejakait. Yenenyami da, enyami kanuka Ejakait, naarai imalai Edeke. Yenimam enyami da, mam enyami kanuka Ejakait, imalai da Edeke.
Naarai emamei ituŋanan kotomawok yenejari kanuke bon, emamei da yenetwani kanuke bon.
Aso arai kijari, kijari kanuka Ejakait, arai kitwaki da, kitwaki kanuka Ejakait. Aso arai kijari, arai kitwaki da, kirai luka Ejakait.
Naarai abu Kristo kotwana kojaru da tetere eraun Ejakait loka lukatwak ka lukajarak da.
Naarai iwadikatai ebe,
“Ebala Ejakait ebe, Kwape ajaria, ekukokini ŋinikuŋ mamakaŋ, Elimori da ŋiniŋajep Edeke.”
Kanuka ŋun kenyeis bobo atubonokin bonik ka bonik, konye aitelekarit kitogogoŋoto na ebe sirikibwaikis ekomio karaida aitiguikinet orot loka onacekon
Ajeni eoŋ bobo da etogogoŋit noi kotoma Ejakait Yesu ebe emamei ibore yeniketal kotoma oinonoke. Konye ŋin yeneomit ibore araut yeniketal, erai yeniketal kamakeŋ.
Naarai arai ekadakinit onacekon kanuka inyamatakon, mam bobo ilosi kwape ejaar amin. Sirikimudia yenabu Kristo kotwanik kanuka inyamatakon.
Aso kinyek yenejok kamakus ainyanakinio.
Naarai ajakanut naka Edeke mere ainyam ka aimat, dimarai adolit ka ainapakin ka aiyalama da kOmoyo Lokalaunan;
naarai ŋin yenijaanakini Kristo kotoma akiro kaŋun, isiyalamikinit Edeke, ecamunito da ituŋa.
Aso do katupasi akiro nuka ainapakin ka nuka adukonor bonik ka bonik.
Sirikimuna aswam naka Edeke kanuka inyamat. Abeit elaete kere, dimarai erono ituŋanan yenenyami kitiguikinia ice;
ejok ainyein ainyam karaida aimat ebino, karaida aswam akirot kere naitiguikini onacekon,
Aiyuun naijaatar, kojaut kaŋin ijo elopet kakonyen nuka Edeke. Isirereŋitoi ŋin yenimam etubokin ilopet kotoma akirot naceamunit.
Konye yenebuonokin arai enyami etubokinio aitelekar, naarai mam enyamit kaiyuun; naarai ŋiniswamisioit namam elomuni kaiyuun erai adiakar,
Kibusakinit oni lukagogoŋok aibwok akalanyanut naka luemamei agogoŋ, kwabo mere aisiyalamikina bonik.
Kesiyalamikisi oni ŋinituŋanan ikeidunyet kodum ajokis kodukoi da.
Naarai Kristo da mam esiyalamikina elopet bon; dimarai kwape iwadikatere ebe, “Amorosito nuka lukimoromoroete jo, apotu kadoikis eoŋ.”
Naarai nuewadikatai sek, ewadikatai kanuka aisisianakinia oni, tetere kanuka atitiŋikin ka aitalakara naka nukiwadikatai kidumuni amun.
Edeke da loka atitiŋikin ka aitalakara koinak yes aomit adiopet bonik ka bonik koidicane loka Kristo Yesu,
tetere itopoloorete Edeke Papa da loka Ejakaitiwok Yesu Kristo, ketau ediopet ka eporoto da ediopet.
Kanuka ŋun, kisukunyanakinos bonik ka bonik, kwape kiisukunyikinia Kristo oni, tetere itopoloorio Edeke.
Naarai kalimokini ebe araun Kristo ebulesit loka aitutuket naka akepio kanuka abeit naka Edeke, tetere itogogoŋi aisumuneta nuka lukapapaakosi,
bobo da tetere Imo itopoloorete Edeke kanuka akeitim, Kwape iwadikatere ebe,
“Kanuka ŋun ŋes kalimonoria jo kotoma atekerin,
Ayeikinenei ekonikiror.”
“Kolelata, yes atekerin, nepepe kiketuŋa.”
“Yes atekerin kere, kituroto Ejakait,
Kituroto da ŋes Ituŋa kere.”
“Ejaun aliasit naka Yese,
Ŋes loenyouni ayait atekerin;
Emunokinos ŋol atekerin.”
Edeke da loka amun kilelebik yes aiyalama kere ka ainapakin kotoma aiyuun, kiyatanakinos noi ajaut kamun kotoma apedor naka Emoyo Lokalaunan.
Ikainacan, etogogoŋit eoŋ elopet kanukus ebe ileleba yes da ajokis, isilelebitai acoa kere, bobo da ipedorete aikwenyanar bonik ka bonik.
Konye kewadikakinit yes katitiŋ naepol katutubeta ace, aisiitun, kanuka asianut nakainakinit Edeke,
tetere araun ebulesit loka Kristo Yesu mama ejaas atekerin, keswamak Akiro Nukajokak nuka Edeke aswam naka esasedoti, tetere eraunete atekerin asubanit naecamunitai, naitalaunit Emoyo Lokalaunan,
Aso ejai akirot naaolobobotor kotoma Kristo Yesu kakonyen nuka Edeke.
Naarai mam atitiŋikini einer akirot namam Kristo iswamat kotomakaŋ, tetere erimarete atekerin, kanuka akirot arai aswamisioit,
kotoma apedor naka aanyuneta ka nukaumokin, kotoma apedor naka Emoyo Lokalaunan, kwaŋin ameun ka Yerusalem, kiton da airiamar Iliriko etodol alimonokin Akiro Nukajokak nuka Kristo,
kwabo alosikinit alimonokin Akiro Nukajokak, mere neelimoritere ekiror loka Kristo, kenyek adukokin apetetait naka icetuŋanan,
konye kwape iwadikatere ebe,
“Eanyunete ŋul lumam alimonokinitai akekiro,
Ejenunete da ŋul lumam iirarito.”
konye kwana, naarai emamei bobo eoŋ aibois katutubeta kanu, bobo da ameun ikar luipu emiela abunore mamakus,
amuno aanyun yes naetorio alosit Sipain, yes da kinyamakinete eoŋ korotoka, kadau ber aipejokin yes adaun aimue.
Konye kwana alosi Yerusalem, ejaanakini lukalaunak.
Naarai isiyalamikinito luko Makedonia ka Akaia atukonokin iboro akorakin lukican lukotoma lukalaunak luejaas Yerusalem.
Naarai isiyalamikinito kesi, ido da ejai kes apesen kamakec, naarai arai imorikikinete Imo arereŋesiokec nuka emoyo, ibusakinit da kes aijaanakin ŋul karereŋesiokec nuka akuan.
Aso kadau eoŋ ŋun, kepucak kes araito ŋin, etori mamakus alosit Sipain;
ido ajeni ebe naabunio mamakus, abuni kaileleba naka arereŋ naka Kristo.
ebe ketajari kama ejaas lukepali kotoma Yudaya, bobo da akaijaanakin nakijaar ŋina Yerusalem korau naisiyalamikinit lukalaunak;
tetere adoluni mamakus kaiyalama, kanuka akote naka Edeke, keyeŋ nepepe kayes.
Edeke loka ainapakin kojai nepepe kayes kere. Amen.
Eturit Poibe kinaciwok kamakus, naerai akejaanakinan naka ekanisa loka Kenekerea,
tetere isukunyikinete ŋes kotoma Ejakait kwape ibusakinitor lukalaunak, kisigalikis ŋes kotoma akirot kere naipuda kamakus, naarai arau ŋesi akeŋarakinan naka ituŋa luipu, ka eoŋ da elopet.
luakapakina cut ajepario akwesikec kanuka aijaraka, luemalai, kwabo mere eoŋ bon konye ikanisan kere luka Imo,
kiyogata da ekanisa loejai togokec. Kiyogata Epaineto lominataka, loerai losodit loko Asia kotoma Kristo.
Kiyogata Mariam, nakitaaritoi noi kanukus.
Kiyogata Anderoniko ka Yunia ipajenaka ka ikijoreoritono nepepe keoŋ; luejenikina kokiyakia, lukageikinete eoŋ toma Kristo.
Kiyogata Amupiliato lominataka toma Ejakait.
Kiyogata Urubano ekeswaman aupawok toma Kristo, ka Sitakus lominatakaŋ.
Kiyogata Apele, loecamunitai toma Kristo. Kiyogata lukokale loka Arisitobolo.
Kiyogata Kerodion epajenaka, Kiyogata lukokale loka Narakiso luejaas toma Ejakait.
Kiyogata Turupaina, ka Turuposa nuitaaritos toma Ejakait. Kiyogata Perisida naminat, naitaaritoi noi toma Ejakait.
Kiyogata Rupo loseuna toma Ejakait, ka totoke ka nakaŋ da.
Kiyogata Asunikirito, ka Pelegon, ka Kereme, ka Pataroba, ka Kerema, ka iinacan luejaas nenipe kakes.
Kiyogata Pilologo ka Yulia, ka Nerea ka inacike, ka Olumupa, ka lukalaunak kere luejaas kakes.
Kiyoganakinos bonik ka bonik kainu nakalaunan. Kiyogaete yes ikanisan kere luka Kristo.
Naarai luikote kwaŋin mam ijaanakinete Ejakaitiwok Kristo, dimarai akecekoikes; iŋalaarete itauon luka luemamei akirot kanuka akecekiro nuejijim nuijodijodete.
Naarai adolok akusirima ituŋa kere. Aso aleli kanukus, konye akoto yes koraas lukacoa kotoma akiro kanuejok, ka luiyapaara kotoma akiro kanueroko.
Edeke da loka ainapakin idecideci Satan atipet kwap kakejenekus.
Asianut naka Ejakaitiwok Yesu Kristo kojai kayes.
Eoŋ Teretio, ekewadikan ebalua lo, keyogai yes toma Ejakait.
Asianut naka Ejakaitiwok Yesu Kristo kojai kayes kere.]
konye kwana itakanunitai, ido kanuka aiwadikaeta nuka inabin itejenunitai mama ejaas atekerin kere kwape kicorakinitor Edeke loka ikar kere tetere erimarete aiyuun—
Mama ejai Edeke bon lokacoa kojai aibuses kotoma Yesu Kristo ikar ka ikar. Amen.
Paul, lokenyarao araut ekiyakia loka Kristo Yesu kanuka akot naka Edeke, ka Sosetene onace.
Emalaenenei Edeke tiritir kanukus, kanuka asianut naka Edeke nakiinakinio yes, kotoma Kristo Yesu.
Naarai aponi kitabari yes kaŋolipone kotomakeŋ, kotoma akiro kere ka aijen da kere
kwape kitogogoŋere aitejenunet naka Kristo kotomakus,
tetere mam itwakiarete amodioinakinet kere, idarete apukorio naka Ejakaitiwok Yesu Kristo;
loitogogoŋi yes kiton awasia, komamei aitoronio kapaaran naka Ejakaitiwok Yesu Kristo.
Erai Edeke lomunot, lokinyarauni yes alomun oidicane loka Okokuke, Yesu Kristo Ejakaitiwok.
Naarai, ikainacan, kalimokis eoŋ lukokale loka Kloe, ebe ejai aŋolopa kidiŋikus.
Aso naabala nata ebe, ebala ŋinidiopet kayesi ebe, “Arai eoŋ yenika Paul,” ice da ebe, “Konye eoŋ yenika Apolo,” ka ice da ebe, “Arai eoŋ yenika Kepa,” ka ice da ebe, “Arai eoŋ yenika Kristo.”
Okwe, etiakatiaka kereka Kristo? Ibubukinitoi kereka Paul kanukus? Arai bo iponi kibatisai kokiror loka Paul?
Emalai naarai mam ebatisat idio kayesi dimarai Keresipo ka Gaio;
kinyek idiotuŋanan atemar ebe aponi kibatisai kokirorikaŋ.
(Abu kebatis da lukokale loka Sitepan, Alemar ŋul mam ajeni arai abu kebatis ice kere.)
Naarai mam Kristo keyakit aibatis, dimarai alimonokin Akiro Nukajokak, kwabo mere kacoa naka akirot, kinyek emusalaba loka Kristo araun aamameak.
Naarai iwadikatai ebe,
“Amudiari acoa naka lukacoa,
Etapalauni da apirianut naka luepiriaka.”
Naarai kotoma acoa naka Edeke, mam akwap abu kojen Edeke kanuka acoa, abu kisiyalamik Edeke aitajar luiyuunito kotoma abaŋaanut naka akirot naelimonokinio.
Naarai ekotosi Iyudayan aanyuneta, Iyonanin da emootos acoa,
konye sio kilimonokini Kristo loebubukinitoi, loerai aitiguikinet mama ejaas Iyudayan, abaŋaanut da mama ejaas Imo,
konye mama ejaas ŋul luenyaritai, Iyudayan ka Iyonanin da, erai Kristo apedor naka Edeke, ka acoa da naka Edeke.
Naarai abaŋaanut naka Edeke erai acoa aitelekarit naka ituŋa, akalanyanut da naka Edeke egogoŋ aitelekarit naka ituŋa.
konye abu Edeke koseu lukabaŋaanut luka akwap tetere isurumi lukacoa ileic; bobo da abu Edeke koseu luekalanyaka luka akwap tetere isurumi lukagogoŋok ileic;
bobo da abu Edeke koseu imukopin, ka luemwaŋitai kotoma akwap, eebo, ka iboro da luemameete, tetere itamamauni ŋul luejaas,
kinyek idiotuŋanan aolobobot kakonyen nuka Edeke.
Konye kanukeŋ ijaut yes toma Kristo Yesu, loabu Edeke kituluo awokocoa, ka adolit, ka aitalaunio, ka alakunio da;
kanuka ŋun kwape iwadikatere ebe, “Yeneolobobot, koolobobote kotoma Ejakait.”
Naarai abu kenerunite ainyein ajenun adiokirot kokidiŋikus, dimarai Yesu Kristo loebubukinitoi.
Eoŋ da naajaar mamakus, akalanyana, kakurian ka amaran naepol;
akakirot ka akalimonokin da mam keraas akiro nukacoa nuijodoete, dimarai nuitodiarito Emoyo ka apedor,
tetere akusiiyuun mam egoŋakina acoa naka ituŋa dimarai toma apedor naka Edeke.
konye kinera acoa naka Edeke kotoma nukaiyeiyea, acoa naibwaitai, nakicorakinit Edeke eriŋa ikar ejauna, kanuka aibusesuwok.
Mam ikayaitok luka ikar kalu apotu kojenut ŋin; naarai arai kejenete timam kibubukis Ejakait lokaibuses.
Konye kwape kiwadikatere ebe,
“Numam keanyunit akoŋu, karaida akit aibiun,
Numam kelomarito da otau loka ituŋanan
Nuetia nen nukitemokinit Edeke lueminasi ŋes.”
Naarai iŋai tope kotuŋa yenejeni aomisio nuka ituŋa, dimarai emoyo loka ituŋanan loejai kotomakeŋ? Kwape kwaŋin emamei yenejeni aomisio nuka Edeke dimarai Emoyo loka Edeke.
Konye oni, mam kidumunit emoyo loka akwap, dimarai Emoyo loebuni kama ejai Edeke, tetere kijenuni ainakineta nukiinakini Edeke oni atitai.
Kinera ŋun mere kakiro nuisisianakini acoa naka etuŋanane, dimarai nuisisianakini Emoyo, kitiiriani nuka emoyo kanuka emoyo.
Konye ituŋanan yenika emoyo emisiikini kere, kwabo emamei yenemisiikini ŋes.
“Naarai iŋai kereka ejenunit aomisio nuka Ejakait, tetere ituutoori ŋes?” Konye kijaa oni kaomisio nuka Kristo.
Abu ketamata yes akile, kwabo mere inyamat; naarai mam ipedorito; eebo, kiton kwana da mam ipedorito,
naarai iriŋa iraas luka akuan. Naarai naejaar ekokote ka aŋolopa, mam kereka iraas ituŋa luka akuan, ilosenenete kwape ituŋa atai?
