Konye neemamea aiyuun mam epedor aitelel ŋes. Naarai yenikunyakini Edeke ibusakinit aiyuun ebe ejai ŋesi, ido ebe eropi ŋul luemoete ŋes.

Kanuka aiyuun abu Noa loekwenyarit Edeke kanuka akiro nukeroko etakanuna, koyoŋ ejok, kitemok ataker aitaiaria lukokaleke; kanuka gin kotubok akwapin aitelekario, koraun ekerunan loka adolit naejai toma aiyuun.
Naarai abu kidareunite ere loejaas apeteta, loapwakun Edeke loaduki da.
Kanuka aiyuun abu Sara alopet kodum apedor apotuun karaida kedepara ikaruke, naarai abu koomite ŋol loesumuni araut lomunot.
Kanuka ŋun anyoun kotuŋanan ediopet, ido loasubit bala etwanit, aponi kowuriai lueputosi bala aacer nuka akuj kaipues, ido kwape asiŋe naejai ariri naka aŋolol namam imarun.
Naarai luinerasi nuikote nen isideleleunito ebe emoete akwap naebeit kes.
Ido arai kiitunito akwap ŋin naalomuniata, tiejaas kapak aboŋor.
Konye kwana iŋobeleete akwap naitelekarit ajokis, ŋes nakotoma akuj. Ŋes mam irumiata Edeke ileic anyarao Edekekec, naarai abu kitemok kes ere.
loaponi kinerai ebe, “Kotoma Isaak ŋes enyaraere akoniwur.”
Koomite ebe epedori Edeke aitajarun, kiton kokatwak da; neadumunia kotoma aput.
Kanuka aiyuun abu Isaak kilipak Yakob ka Esau arereŋ kotoma akiro nuepote.
Kanuka aiyuun keapu Yakob atwanare, abu kilipak odwe luka Yosep kere iarei arereŋ, koma, kokukumi kakou naka ebelake.
Kanuka aiyuun keapu Yosep atwanare abu kiner nuka anyoun naka idwe luka Isirael, kicorak da nuka akojoke.
Kanuka aiyuun nakepoloor Musa, kogir anyarao okoku loka apese naka Parao,
koseu aikonakinio erono nepepe kituŋa luka Edeke itia aitalakara kotoma aronis naka apak naedit.
Koomite amorosit naka Kristo araut abar naepol itia iboro luka akais nuipu luko Misiri, naarai abu kosesen aropio.
Kanuka aiyuun abu konyou ko Misiri, komam ekuriana adedeŋ naka ekabaka; naarai abu konirik bala eanyuni lomam etakani.
Kanuka aiyuun abu koricite Aleleŋ ka aibwat aokot kinyek Ekamudiaran ikiyaik atiror kes.
Kanuka aiyuun kotiyaros arwatatin nuka Yeriko, nakedaunere airimor apaarasia akanykaarei.
Kanuka aiyuun mam Rakab naadote emudiara nepepe ka lumam erimasi, naarai abu kisukunyik ikarotak kainapakin.
lukipikorete ajakanuto kanuka aiyuun, kiswamata adolit, kodumut aisumuneta, kitubutaasi aituke nuka iŋatunyo,
kitojonata apedor naka akim, kokuata akwanis naka ekileŋ, kisipedoroi nakekalanyakatar, koraut lukagogoŋ kotoma ojie, kitekerata ajoresio nuka lukacekwapin.
Apotu aŋor kodumut lukatwakakec kotoma aitajarunio, konye ice aponi kisiriebai kaibworit, komam ecamunete ayuunio, tetere edumunete aitajarunio naejok adepar.
Aponi ice kitemoi kaisekelio ka aleio, eebo, kiton aeneta ka aidaris da.
Aponi kibiribiroi kamor, kotuboi kimusumenon, kitemoi, aponi koarai kekileŋ; apotu kirimirimoto enapito imukulen luka imerekekin ka luka akinei; apotu kilwaritos, ereitai, kikonakinitai erono,—
ituŋa lumam ebusakinit akwap, apotu kilokidaete kamodiŋo, ka oroŋan, ka abuai ka apanya da nuka akwap.
Ituŋa ŋul kere da nakedaunere aitejenun kanuka aiyuunikec, mam edumuna aisumunet,
naarai abu Edeke kojenikinite ibore yenejok aitelekarit kanuwok, tetere ŋul mam itodolikinio komam oni.
kasesenete Yesu, ekagean ka eketodolon loka aiyuuniwok, loabu kotitiŋik emusalaba, komen ileic, kanuka aiyalama naebwaikinitai kakonyeneke, iboie kakan nakoteten naka eicoloŋ loka Edeke.
Koomoomata do noi ŋol loketitiŋikini asurup naetia nen naka ikadiakanarak kanukeŋ, kinyeis aipas, kiiloros kotauonokus.
Mam ber ijiito kiton abukor aokot, iwutas kadiakar.
Bobo kimurwok aicor, nainera kayes kwape odwe ebe,
“Okokuka, sirimwaŋenenei alecor naka Ejakait, Kwabo sirikiilor nakiriemeriemaa ŋesi.
Elei da ŋinikoku yenecamunit ŋesi.”
Kanuka alecorio ititiŋikinete. Kiswamakini yes Edeke kwape odwe; naarai ikoku inyoin yenimam papake elecori?
Aso arai mam kilecorio, naimorikikinit kere, kwaŋin iraas lukiwurikinitai okal! kwabo mere odwe.
Bobo da ajaas oni lukapapawok luka akuan lukiileconorete, oni da kayoŋito kes. Mam itelekarit noi oni anonokikin Papa loka imoyon, kajara da?
Naarai apotu kesi koleconorete oni apaarasia nuikidioko, kwape kekototor, konye ŋol kilecori kanuka ajokis tetere kimori alauniteke.
Alecorio kere naka apak kana mam esubit bala nakaiyalama, dimarai nakican; konye kokau erai araito nuinapakina nuka adolit, kama kaŋul kaluituutooritai kaŋin.
kiswamakis akusikejen irotin luitenara, kinyek yeneŋwalit aitapaario, konye gwai kitaŋaleunoi.
Kotupata ainapakin nepepe kituŋa kere, ka alaunite da, neemamea ŋin emamei yeneanyuni Ejakait.
Koanyanasi ebe emamei yeneolikinit asianut naka Edeke; kinyek “Aliasit naka adwaris” alibun ka aitican yes, kosodete luipu amunaar;
kinyek idiotuŋanan araun yenidote arai yenimam eyoŋit Edeke kwape Esau, loabu kogwela apolouke naka ekiyai kanuka adutunet adiopet naka inyamat.
Naarai ijenete ebe akaulo kaŋun, naakotor airum arereŋ, aponi kogiroi, naarai mam abu kodum apak naka aitoronikin, karaida abu komoote noi kakiyo.
ka aruo naka arupepe, ka eporoto loka akiro, luapupete apotu kiŋaiŋaata sirikelimokin kes bobo acekirot.
Naarai mam apotu kopedosi atitiŋikin akirot naecorakinio ebe, “Arai ketiro itiaŋ emoru ŋol ibiribirio kamor.”
Ido kerai naetakani nasogim kwaŋin, abu Musa da kobala ebe, “Akurianari noi, amaran da.”
Konye idolokinito Emoru Sion ka ere loka Edeke lokajaran, Yerusalem lokotoma akuj, kaneejaas ajoresio nuka imalaikan lumam imarunos,
ka atukot naka ikiyaik luiwadikatai toma akuj, ka neejai Ekatubon loerai Edeke loka kere, ka neejaas imoyon luka ikadolitok luitodolikinitoi,
ka neejai Yesu, ekadiekan loka aitutuket nakitetet, ka neejaas aokot nubwatan nuinerasi nuejok aitelekarit kwa nuka Abel.
Abu eporotoke kitamaran akwap kapak kaya, konye isumuni kwana ebe, “Irwan atipet bobo ejaŋakini, mere akwap bon, konye akuj da.”
Konye akirot ŋin ebe, “Irwan atipet bobo,” itejenuni alemario naka ŋul luitamaranio, kwape luesubitai, tetere esalete lumam itamaranio.
Kanuka ŋun naarai kidumuni ajakanut namam itamaranio, kajaas kasianut, nakijaanakinia Edeke aijaanakin naitojokit ŋesi, nepepe kayoŋit ka acoit;
naarai erai Edekewok akim naenyamiari.
Sirikiimurwokis aisukuny ipejok, naarai kanuka ŋin apotu ice kisukunyikis imalaikan komam ejenete.
Kiitunito ienan, bala kienitai nepepe kakes; ka luiswamakinitai erono, naarai ijaas yesi da toma akuan.
Kitubusikis ituŋa kere adukokin, ejam da korai lomam emunaara; naarai etubokini Edeke ludotea ka lueelosi.
Kidaras kinyeis amin apesan, kodaut luijaatar; naarai abu ŋesi elopet kobala ebe, “Mam ketukurwori jo cut, karaida aijal.”
Ŋes kinerar katitiŋ ebe,
“Ejakait ŋes erai ekeŋarakinanika,
Mam akurianari,
Inyo bo epedori ituŋanan aiswamakin eoŋ?”
Erai Yesu Kristo ŋopeŋol bian ka lolo, ido kiton ikar kere.
Sirikiyananario kaisisianakin nakiponesio luipu naegelara; naarai ejok aitogogoŋ etau kasianut, kwabo mere kanuka inyamat, lumam apotu kiŋarakis ŋul lualosioto.
Ejai oni etem loemamei luijaanakinete ewema apedor ainyam iboroke.
Naarai itiaŋ lueyaŋaari esasedoti lopeti aokotokec toma aibois nakalaunan kanuka adiakar, icweio awatekec kokiŋ kiidukurun.
Kanuka ŋun Yesu da, abu korieba kokiŋ kerute, tetere italauni ituŋa kaokotoke elopet.
Aso kalomasi oni da mamakeŋ kiŋa kiidukurun, kebwokitos amorositike.
Naarai emamei oni ere loeperonori kane, konye kimoot je loekot ajaun.
Aso kainanakis Edeke asubanit naka aiturit tiritir kotomakeŋ, ŋes araito nuka aituke nuelimorete ekekiror.
Konye sirikimurwokis aswam ejok, ka aimor luijaatar, naarai itojokit Edeke asuban nuikote nen.
Ido aitelekarit noi keŋaiŋait yes aikonenen nen, tetere kenyakunio katipet mamakus.
kitodolik yes kotoma kaŋinikirot naejok, tetere iswamaete nuekot ŋesi, kiswamai ŋesi da kotomakus naitojokitai kakonyeneke, kanuka Yesu Kristo; kojai aibuses mamakeŋ ikar ka ikar. Amen.
Kojenutu ebe alacakin onacewok Timoteo. Arai kebu ŋol katipet, kaanyuni yes nepepe kaŋes.
Kiyogaete ikeŋarenikinokokus kere, ka lukalaunak da kere. Kiyogaete yes luko Italia.
Asianut kojai kayes kere, Amen.
Yoga.
kojenete ebe aitemio naka aiyuunikus eyauni atitiŋikin,
Ido kojau atitiŋikin kaswam naedoliorit, tetere iraunos luipolok, luitekoro, komam adiokirot nakiwolikinit.
Konye kilip kotoma aiyuun, komam ebuonokin, naarai yenebuonokini eputosi bala akailan naka aŋolol, naekutanari ekwam kibukanari.
Kinyek ituŋanan ŋin aomit ebe edumuni ibore kama ejai Ejakait;
ituŋanan yenika itauon iarei, yenimam icasit korotinike kere.
koolobob lokabaran da kanuka aitisilioke, naarai eraraar kwape aturot naka inya.
Naarai elomuni akoloŋ isirinyori amwanis inya, edoi aturotoke, eoliori da ajokis naka aputoke. Isokokoi lokabaran da kwape kwaŋin kotoma alositeke.
Kinyek yenecodunio einer ebe, “Edeke kacoduni eoŋ” naarai mam epedori Edeke acodunio kanukaronok, ido ŋes elopet mam ecoduni ituŋanan kere.
Konye ŋinituŋanan ecodunio kiriite ekeimiel elopet kaijodijodio,
Kosodi kepotuu eimiel euriei adiakar, adiakar ŋin da kepoloor idouni atwanare.
Ikainacan luminan, siriŋalas.
Ŋiniinakinet naejok, ka ŋiniijaikina naedolit ebuni kokuju, ijesuni kama ejai Papa loka luecaete, emamei ailoconokin kamakeŋ, karaida etoribe loka aibelonokin.
Kanuka akoteke abu kouri oni kakirot naka abeit, tetere kirauni kwape araito nusodit nuka isubanake.
naarai anyunyura naka etuŋanan mam iswamai adolit naka Edeke.
Kanuka ŋun kolacasi asilianut kere ka aronis naelitoro, kijaut kaiyapepera akirot nairaitai toma, naepedori aitajar aijarakus.
Naarai arai iirari ituŋanan akirot, komam iswamai, eputosi ŋin ituŋanan yeneanyuni akonyen nuka aurioke kotoma aroet;
naarai eanyuni, kolot, atipet imurwokini kwape eputor.
Konye yenirerei ikisila luedolito, luka aosikinio, kodunyakinite kotomakec, sirikeraun ikeiraran yenimurwokini, konye ikeswaman aswam, isirereŋitoi ituŋanan ŋin kotoma kanuiswamai.
Edini loelai, loemamei elos kakonyen nuka Edeke Papa ŋes lota: aanyanar ikokiok ka apuserun kotoma ocanikec, ka aidar bon kakwap komamei amasikinet.
Naarai arai elomuni etuŋanan atukosikus, loenapit egilut loka esabu, ka inapen luibusiak, elomuni da lokican enapit luenyilinyila,
yes da isukunyikinete loenapit luibusiak, itemarete atiar, “Kiboikin ijo ne neejok,” itemarete da lokican atiar, “Kobwo ijo kalaije,” arai bo, “Kiboikin kwap kakejeka,”
aso mam kereka itiakasi kotomakus, iraunos ikatubok luka aomisio nueroko?
Kiirasi, iinacanaka luminan, Mam kereka abu Edeke koseu lukican lukakwapin araut ikabarak luka aiyuun, ka ikerumak luka ajakanut naisumunikinit ŋul lueminasi ŋes?
Konye ipotu yesi komwaŋa lokican. Mere kereka lukabarak kiridakinito yes, kiyaŋaarete airabis?
Mere kes emoromoroete ekiror loejok lokimaikinitai yes?
Konye arai itiakito ituŋa iswamata erono, kitoronete ikisila yes kwape ikebucarak.
Naarai yenerici ikisila kere, konye kibuca kediopet, egwauni akiro nuka kere.
Naarai ŋol loabu kiner ebe, “Siridote,” abu kiner da ebe, “Siriari.” Arai mam idotei, konye iari, iraun do ijo yenibili ikisila.
Kinerasi kwaŋin, kiswamata da kwaŋin, kwape luepote atubokinio akiro kokisila luka aosikinio.
Naarai etube mam itimi ŋin yenimam iswamai nukaitim; naarai eoloboboi aitim kotube.
Arai inyilinyilitoi onac arai inac, emameete da inyamat luka ŋinipaaran,
konye ebala idiopet kayesi kes ebe, “Koloto inapakina, kodumutu aibuse, kimonikinos,” kwabo mam iinakinete kes nuipuda akuan, ajokis anyoin?
Kwaŋin aiyuun da, kemamuutu aswamisio, atwana.
Kitodikinai cani aiyuunikon komameete aswamisio, eoŋ da ketodikini jo akaiyuun kotoma aswamisio.
Iyuunit ijo ebe erai Edeke ediopet; iswamai ejok. Iyuunete ajokin da, komaranete.
Ijo etuŋanan lotai, ikoto kereka ajenun ebe aiyuun komameete aswamisio erai arakan?
Mam kereka aponi kitojokai Aburaam papaawok araun loedolit kanuka aswamisio, naainakinia okokuke Isaaka kotem?
Iany aiyuun kwape iswamaa nepepe kaswamisioke, ido etopoloor aiyuun kanuka aswamisio;
Ido kitodolikinai naiwadikatai nainera ebe, “Kiyuu Aburaam Edeke, kimarakinai araut adolit”; komaikinai epapero loka Edeke.
Ianyut kwape itojokere ituŋanan araun yenedolit kanuka aswamisio, mere kanuka aiyuun bon.
Kwape kwaŋin da mam kereka aponi kitojokai Rakab naadote araun naedolit kanuka aswamisio, nakisukunyikinia ikiyakia, kitotor kes orot ece?
Naarai kwape etwania akuan emamei emoyo, kwape kwaŋin da etwania aiyuun emameete aswamisio.
Naarai kibucari oni kere kakiro nuipu; arai mam ibucari ituŋanan kakirot, ŋol ŋes etuŋanan loepol, loepedori aitikokin kiton akuanake kere.
Konye arai kibwaiki iboro luitikokinet aituke nuka ibalasin, tetere kirimarete oni, kibelonokini awatekec kere.
Koany atakerin da, karaida kepolok kwaŋin, eyaŋaarete ikwamin luededeŋ, ibelonokin kes akiŋol naedit noi, kama itojokit ekereŋean kere kotoma akoteke,
Kwape kwaŋin da erai aŋajep atutubet naedit, ilabilabi nuepolok, Koany ikito luipu luetia nen enokete akim naedit!
Naarai epedorio aitapatan ŋolipone kere loka itiaŋ, ka akweny, ka lueliatos, ka luka aŋolol da, ido adaut ituŋa aitapatan,
konye emamei ituŋanan kere yenepedori aitapatan aŋajep, erono, iloliana, ileleba aisorit naeari.
Ŋin ŋes kituritor Ejakait ka Papa; ŋin ŋes kikenio ituŋa lukesubio kaput naka Edeke.
Elomunete aiturit ka aiken kotoma aituk ŋin adiopet. Ikainacan, mam ibus akiro ŋun ajaut kwaŋin,
Eleleunete kereka akipi nuejok ka nuedwarak da kotoma akoŋu adiopet naka atan?
Ikainacan, epedori kereka etini aira iseitunin, arai bo emusabibu aira itinin? Mam da epedorete akipi nuejai amunyu aluor nuejok.
Konye arai kijaunos kekokote loedwar ka aŋolopa toma otauonokus, siriwoloboboete, siriŋalaete da asurokin abeit.
Mam acoa ŋin erai naebuni kokuju, konye erai naka akwap, naka auruunet, naka Satan.
Naarai neejai ekokote ka aŋolopa, nepenen da ejai aitotolikin, ka ŋiniswamisioit kere da naerono.
Konye acoa naebuni kokuju nasodit erai naesegara, kosodi nakainapakin, nakaiyapepera, naenonokikinit, ileleba aitim ka araito nuejok, emamei abuonokin, emamei da esoswai.
Eyeitai araito nuka adolit toma ainapakin mama ejaas ŋul luiswamaete nukainapakin.
Iŋobeleete, ido mam idumunete; iarete, ido imielas, kwabo mam ipedorete adumun. Isurorete, ijiosi da, Mam idumunete naarai mam ilipete.
Ilipete, kwabo mam kiinakinio, naarai ilipete erono, tetere imonikinos nukisiyalamikinete yes.
Yes aŋor nudotea, mam ijenete ebe aipaperokin kakwapin ŋes asurup ka Edeke? Aso ituŋanan kere yenekot araun ipapero yenika akwapin ituluor yenikasurup yenika Edeke.
Arai bo iwomitos ebe inera atai naiwadikatai? Imiela kereka emoyo loiboie kotomawok ekolo?
Konye iyatanakini ainakin asianut. Kanuka ŋun ebala ebe, “Itepegi Edeke luiwoŋoko, konye einakini luitasonos asianut.”
Aso kononokikis Edeke. Kitepegata Satan, kikeri ŋesi da yes.
Kikunyakis neejai Edeke, ŋes da ikunyuni mama ijaas. Yes ikadiakanarak, kilota akaninikus, kitalautu itauon, yes luejaas itauon iarei.
Kitururuoto, kokuudianete, komonyata da. Koluor akienakus akuudian, ka aiyalama da ajuruŋuŋ.
Kitasonokinos kakonyen nuka Ejakait, ŋes da kitopoloori yes.

Iinacan, sirinerenenas nueroko. Yeninera nueroko nuka onac, arai bo yenetubokini onaceke, inera nueroko kokisila, ido etubokini ikisila. Konye arai kitubok ikisila, mam irai ikeswaman yenika ikisila, dimarai ikatubon.
Ejai ekesilakinan ikisila ediopet ka ekatubon, ŋol loepedori aitajar ka amudiar da. Konye iŋai bo ijo yenitubokini iidunyetekon?
kwabo mam ijenete nuka moi. Inyo bo akusiijar? Iraas elisina, loetakanuni apak naedit, kosodi ailicar.
Ti gwai ineras ebe, “Arai ekoto Ejakait, kijari kiswamai da nu ka nu.”
Konye kwana iwoloboboto kotoma apoganutukus. Erono aolobob kere naikoni nen.
Aso yenejeni aswam nuejok, komam iswamai, erai adiakar kamakeŋ.
Abos abarakus, anyama ikajekel akusinapito.
Amasiki esabukus ka epuesakus, amasikinikec da eraun ajenanut mamakus, enyami awatekus kwape kakim. Ipotu kidiata iborokus luka akais nuipu toma apaarasia nukawasia.
Koany, iworoi eropit loka ikeswamak luasakata imanikoriakus, loimikitos yesi; aloma aimony naka ikadwenyak aki nuka Ejakait loka ajoresio.
Ipotu kisiyalamikinos kakwap, kominakinito aboliasio; kitutumata ikusitauon kotoma apaaran naka aario.
Ipotu kitetelekasi akiro ekadoliton, koarata da; mam ŋes itepega yesi.
Kotitiŋonokinete yesi da, kiticata itauonokus, naarai eapie abunore naka Ejakait.
Iinacan, siriŋuurianakinos, kinyeis atubokinio; koany, ebwoi ekatubon kokek.
Iinacan, koyaŋaasi inabin araut aanyunet naka aiticanio ka atitiŋikin, luapotu kinerasi kokiror loka Ejakait.
Koany, kinyarit luetitiŋikinete luisirereŋitoi. Ipotu kiirasi nuka atitiŋikin naka Yob, ido ipotu koanyut kwape kiswamakinia Ejakait ŋes kawasia, kwape eraar Ejakait lokasianut naepol ka aitim.
Ejai kereka yenedeka kotomakus? Konyarau imakio luka ekanisa, kilipakis ŋes, kinyonyoikis akinyet kokiror loka Ejakait;
ailip da nakaiyuun itajari ikadekan, itonyouni da Ejakait ŋes; arai da kiswamat nukadiakanar, isionio ŋes.
Aso kolimonokinos akusidiakanareta bonik ka bonik, kilipanakinos da, tetere iŋaleunete. Ailip naka ikadoliton epedori noi aswam.
Kerai Eliya etuŋanan lokepone kwape kalowok, kilip noi kinye akiru aitep, ido mam abu kotepak akwap adaun ikar iuni ka ilapio ikanykape.
Kosodi kilip bobo, koinak da akuj akim, kora akwap araitoke.
kitejenut ŋes ebe yeninyakuni ikadiakanaran kotoma apaar naka erotoke, itajari akeijar kotoma atwanare, erapari da adiakanareta nukepuak.
kwape kolo esiaunia Edeke Papa ajenun, kotoma aitalaunio naka Emoyo, kiton arimanut ka abwatakinio aokot nuka Yesu Kristo:
Kiyatanakin asianut ka ainapakin mamakus.
kadumut airumet namam edaun, naemamei elos, namam erinyori naiŋadakinitai yes toma akuj;,
yes lukigalikinit apedor naka Edeke kanuka aiyuun kiton naidumuniata aitajario naitemokino apukorio kapak nakawasia.
Iyalamasi noi kotomakeŋ, karaida ibusakinit diat aitakadikinio kwana apak naedit, kanuka acodunio naka iponesio luipu,
tetere aitemio naka aiyuunikus naitelekarit noi etiai loka esabu loedaun karaida kitemio kakim, kotakanu ituritoi, itopoloorio, ka aitubusikinio da, kotoma apukorio naka Yesu Kristo.
Iminasi ŋes karaida mam ipotu koanyut ŋes; karaida mam ianyunito ŋes kwana konye iyuunito ŋes, iyalamasi noi kaiyalama namam inerio naitepolooritai.
Idumunete esaŋe loka aiyuunikus ŋes aitajario naka aijarakus.
koŋicata ani bo apak, arai ali bo epone lokikwenyaria Emoyo loka Kristo lokejai tomakec, nakegeia aitejen aiticanio naka Kristo ka aibuses naetupakin ŋin.

Aponi kes! kopukokinai ebe mere kanukec bonik, dimarai kanukus, apotu kijaanaki! ŋun nukidaun alimokin yes kwana, kama kaŋul lukilimonokinete yes Akiro Nukajokak, kanuka Emoyo Lokalaunan loejukunio kotoma akuj, akiro ŋun imielas imalaikan aireonokin.
Kwape idwe luerimaka, sirituputoro keimiel loka apak nakaolitekus nakolo,
konye kwape eraar lokinyarit yes lokalaunan, koraut yesi da lukalaunak koponesio kus kere,
naarai iwadikatai ebe, “Iraunos yesi lukalaunak, naarai arai eoŋ lokalaunan,”
Arai inyarito Papa ŋol loetubokini ŋinituŋanan kwape ejaatar aswamisioke, komam etiaki ituŋa, kolosenenete kakurian kapali nairaatar ikalotok.
Kojenete ebe mam aponi kolakun yes kiboro luedaunos, kwape epuesa arai esabu, koponesiokus lutai lukirokunete kama kalukapapaakus,
dimarai kaokot nuketiai Ioepol nuka Kristo, kwape nuka imerekek yenemamei aŋwal, karaida akemer.
Aponi kisiaunai ajenun ŋes koriŋa akwapin kesuba, konye aponi kitakanunai kawasia naka apakio kanukus.
Kotomakeŋ iraut luiyuunito Edeke, loetajaruni ŋes kokatwak, koinak da aibuses, kosodi aiyuunikus ka amunokus ajaut mama ejai Edeke.
Naarai aponi kourii yes irwan nakiareit, mere kikinyom luebosete, dimarai kalumam ebosete, kanuka akirot naka Edeke naejari naeperonori.
Naarai
“Akuan kere esubit bala anya,
Ka aibusesuke kere da kwape aturot naka anya, Erinyorete anya, aturot da eraraar.
Akirot ŋin da kes Akiro Nukajokak nuaponi kolimokin yes.
Kwape imukerun lupeurio kwape kwana kimielas akile nukemoyo nuemamei aimod, tetere kitopoloete yes adolore aitajario;
arai ipotu kiirata ajokis naka Ejakait.
ka yes da kwape amor nukajarak kidukio koraut etogo lokemoyo, esasedotene lokalaunan, ainanakin asuban nukemoyo, nuitojokit Edeke kanuka Yesu Kristo.
Naarai ejai toma nuiwadikatai ebe:
“Koany, apesikini eoŋ koSion amoru nakapolon naka agor,
Naseuna, naketiai loepol,
Ido yeniyuuni ŋes mam irumete ileic.”
“Amoru naaŋerete ikadukok,
Araun nakapolon naka agor.”
“Amoru naitiguikinet, ka atiiba nakebiroron”;
iguikinos akiro naarai mam erimarito, kwape elosikinitere kes.
Mam kolo iraas ituŋake, konye kwana iraas ituŋa luka Edeke; mam kolo kitimitoi, konye kwana idumut aitimio.
Kojaas kiponesio luejok kotoma Omo, tetere nakisiomiata yes bala ikeswamak nueroko, kitopoloosi Edeke kapaaran naka aanyanario kanuka aswamisiokus nuejokuka.
arai naka ikayaitok, luijukuni ŋesi aitican luiswamaete nueroko, ka aiturit da ŋul luiswamaete nuejok.
Naarai nuekoto Edeke kes nuta, yes aswam nuejok tetere itubutarete abaŋaanut naka ituŋa lueolito.
Luijakakaete, kwabo mere luitwasamaete aijakak ŋin bala araparet aronis; konye bala ibulesin luka Edeke.
Kitopoloorito ituŋa kere. Kominas iinacan. Koyoŋito Edeke, Kitopoloorito ekabaka.
Naarai na ŋes itojokitai, ituŋanan aŋirikin ican kanuka aiitun Edeke, isiriebio komameete akiro.
Naarai aiturio anyoin, arai kidiakasi, kibapanar ititiŋikinete? Konye arai kiswamata nuejok, kisiriebi, ititiŋikinete, itojokitai ŋun, kama ejai Edeke.
Naarai aponi konyarakin ŋin, naarai Kristo da aponi kisiriebai kanukus, kinyekinia yes naanyunet tetere ituparete ikukutuke.
Mam ŋes abu kodiaka, karaida aimod adumun kaitukuke.
Naamoromoroere ŋes, mam abu kinyaŋa aimor; naesiriebere, mam abu kitukurian; konye abu kijaikin mama ejai ŋol loetubokini kadolit.
Abu ŋesi elopet kibwok adiakanaretawok kakuanake kokitoi, tetere nakidaunia atwanare kama ejaas adiakanareta, kajarata mama ejai adolit. Imacarinike kes kitaŋaleunete yes.
Naarai ipotu kopaarito kwape amerekekin, konye kwana iboŋut mama ejai Ekecokon Ekaanyanaran da loka aijarakus.
naeanyuniata iponesiokus luesegara, ka luka ayoŋit.
Kinyek aisiritekus araut nakokuju, naka aicip itim, ka aidelonokin esabu, ka ainap inapen,
konye korai etuŋanane loibwaa lokotau, anapito namam edaun naka emoyo loiyapepera ka aiyapaara, loerai loketiai loepol kakonyen nuka Edeke.
Naarai kwape kwaŋin kolo sek kisirenenoto aŋor nukalaunak nuamunosi Edeke, kononokikinito da ikiliokokec.
Kwape kerimaritor Sara Aburaam, konyarite ŋes ejakait. Iraas yesi da idweke, arai iswamaete ejok, komam kitukuriani etasuro kere.
Sirinyaŋarete aronis kanuka aronis, karaida amorosit kanuka amorosit; konye gwai kilipakis arereŋ, naarai aponi konyarakin ŋin, tetere irumete asianut.
Naarai ebe:
“Yenimiela aijar, ka aanyun da apaarasia nuejok, Kitikok aŋajepeke kama karonis,
Aitukuke da kinyek einer nukaimod.
Konyou kotoma aronis, kiswama ajokis; Komo ainapakin, kotup da.
Naarai esesenete akonyen nuka Ejakait ikadolitok, Itoikinit da akiike apupun ailipikec.
Konye egirito akonyen nuka Ejakait ŋul luiswamaete aronis.”
Iŋai tope kiswamakini yes erono arai idunyakinito nuejok?
Konye karaida kisiriebio kanuka adolit kisirereŋitoi, Sirikikuriakaros aitukurianakec, kwabo sirikiyaloŋoŋoto,
konye kitalautu Kristo kotauonokus araut Ejakait. Kokapakina apaarasia kere aboŋokin ŋinituŋanan yenikiŋisi yes akiro nuka amun naejai tomakus, konye ca kaiyapepera ka ayoŋit.
Kojaas kaomisio nuejok, tetere kaŋun nukisiomere, irumete ileic ŋul luemoromoroete ikusiponesio luejok kotoma Kristo.
Naarai ejok aisiriebio kanuka aswam nuejok, arai ŋes naekot Edeke, itia kanuka aswam nueroko.
Naarai Kristo da aponi kisiriebai kanuka adiakanar irwan atipet, lokadolit kanuka lumam edolito, tetere kiyauni mama ejai Edeke, nakearere akuanake, konye koinakinai aijar kotoma omoyo,
loalosio da alimonokinia imoyon luejaas aidaris,
lumam kerimasi kolo, naedareunitor atitiŋikin naka Edeke, kapaarasia nuka Noa, naetemonokinere ataker, kama etajarere ituŋa idis, kotoma akipi, kes ituŋa ikanykauni.
Eputosi akiro ŋun kaibatisao, naitajari yes kwana, mere alemar elos loka akuan, dimarai einer kaomisio nuejok mama ejai Edeke, kanuka ajarun naka Yesu Kristo,
ejai akan nakoteten naka Edeke, kedau adokar toma akuj; imalaikan, ka lukapolou, ka lukapedor da kononokikis ŋes.
tetere idaunete apaarasiakus nuideuna iriŋa ijaas toma akuan, mere bobo kanuka aiŋobel naka ituŋa, konye kanuka ŋun nuekot Edeke.
Naarai apaarasia nuatuboros kidaunito aiswamaenen nuekotos Imo, alosenen toma abenyanut, aiŋobel, emeret, aboliasio, edeŋo, ka aima da aputosia nuketal.
Isiwumokinito kes naarai mam ikerete nepepe kakes kotoma oponesio ŋupeŋul luutai, komoromoroete yes;
konye inyakunete kesi akirot mama ejai ŋol loitemonokino atubokin lukajarak ka lukatwak da.
Naarai ŋin ŋes elimonokinere lukatwak da Akiro Nukajokak, tetere kes da etubokinio kwape ituŋa luejaas awat, konye kojarata kotoma omoyo kwape ka Edeke.
Aitelekarit kere kodunyakis noi aminanara, naarai erapari amin adiakanareta nukepuak.
Kisukunyanakinete ipejok bonik ka bonik, komamei aŋuurian.
Kwape kedumunia ŋinituŋanan ainakinet, kijaanakis lucekus kaŋin, kwape ikeŋadak luejok luka asianut naka Edeke naka iponesio luipu;

arai ejai yeninera, kwape yeninera akiro nuka Edeke; arai ejai yenijaanakini, kwape kanuka agogoŋ naekori Edeke; tetere itopolooritai Edeke kotoma kere kanuka Yesu Kristo. Aibuses ka ayait kojaas mamakeŋ ikar ka ikar. Amen.
Konye kiyalamasi naarai imorete aisiriebio naka Kristo, tetere naepukorere da akeibuses, iyalamas kailel naepol.
Arai kiimoromoroi kanuka ekiror loka Kristo, isirereŋitoi, naarai kidoik yes Emoyo loka aibuses, ka loka Edeke da.
Konye kinyek idio kayesi aisiriebio kanuka araut ikaaran, arai bo ikokolan, arai yeniswamai nueroko, arai kanuka araut yeniramaana;
konye arai kisiriebio kanuka araut Ikristayot, kinyeis ileic airum, konye kitopoloor Edeke kokiror kaŋol.
Naarai adol apak naegeunere atubokin lukokal loka Edeke; ido arai egeuni kaoni, anyoin bo awasia naka ŋul lumam erimasi Akiro Nukajokak nuka Edeke?
Bobo da, ebe,
“Arai etiono aitajar ikadoliton,
Ai bo do etakanunia yenikepali ka ikadiakanaran?”
kicokienenete esipan loka Edeke lokotomakus, mere kanuka aitiŋaikinio, dimarai kanuka alosikinit, mere kanuka ameda nakileic, dimarai koipud,
mere kwape lueyaito kagogoŋ nukibeito, konye koraut aanyuneta nuka esipan.
Kosodi naetakanunia Ekecokon lokapolon, idumunete aboko nakaibuses namam erinyori.
Yes da ikatumunak kwape kwaŋin, kononokikis imakio. Konapito yesi kere aitasonikino bonik ka bonik, naarai “itepegi Edeke luiwoŋoko, konye einakini luitasonos asianut.”
Kowoikis ŋes aiyalononokus kere, naarai epod ŋesi yes.
Kinyeis amer, kokwenyenenete. Lokasurupikus Satan irimirimi kwape eŋatuny loegat, emoot yenenyamari.
Kitepegata ŋes, kicasito kaiyuun, kojenete ebe itodolitoi aisiriebio ŋipeŋin koinacanakus luejaas akwapin.
Konye Edeke lokasianut kere, lokinyarakinit yes aibusesuke naka ikar kere toma Kristo, kidaut aisiriebio apak naedit, kitetemikini yes, kiticat, ka aitogogoŋ da.
Kojai ayait mamakeŋ ikar ka ikar. Amen.
Kiyogai yes ŋin naejai Babulon, naseuna aupakus, ka Marako da okokuka.
Kiyoganakinos kainu nakamin.
Ainapakin kojai mamakus kere luijaas toma Kristo.
Simon Petero ebulesit ekiyakia da loka Yesu Kristo,
Mama ejaas ŋul luadumutu aiyuun naketiai loepol naeriakas kanakosi kotoma adolit naka Edekewok, Eketajaran da Yesu Kristo:
nukiinakinia oni aisumunetake nuepolok nuketiai loepol; tetere kotoma kaŋun iraunete ikamorak luka einono loka Edeke, nuipotu kokuiata anyoun kotoma amudiario naejai toma akwapin kanuka aiŋobel.
Konye kanuka ŋupe kaŋun da kodunyakis noi aiyatakin ajokis kotoma aiyuunikus, kotoma ajokisikus da ajenun,
kotoma ajenun du aitikokina, kotoma aitikokina da atitiŋikin, kotoma atitiŋikin da ayoŋit Edeke,
kotoma ayoŋit Edeke da amin iinacan, kotoma amin iinacan da amin,
Naarai arai kijaunos kaŋun kidilas, kituluorete yes lumam iloŋwaka, ka lueraete araito kotoma ajenun cut Ejakaitiwok Yesu Kristo.
Naarai yenemameete ŋun, erai imuduki yeneturiaitoi, kimurwokinite aitesegario adiakanaretake nukolo,
Aso iinacan, kiyatanakis noi adunyakin aitogogoŋ anyarauniokus ka aseunio da, naarai arai iswamaete ŋun, mam iguikinos nepetai da;
naarai kwaŋin kiinakinio kabarara alomaret nakotoma ajakanut namam edaun naka Ejakaitiwok ido Eketajaran Yesu Kristo.
Konye aomit eoŋ ebe edolit, aroko ajai toma oidukuru lo aisinyikokin yes kaisiitun,
naarai ajeni ebe eapie apak naka alacar eidukuruka kwape ketejenunia Ejakaitiwok Yesu Kristo.
Adunyakini da aisipedor yes ŋinipak aiitun ŋun kadau atwanare.
Naarai mam kipou katupenenete awaragasia nuepwakunitai kacoa, nakitejenunia yes apedor ka abunore naka Ejakaitiwok Yesu Kristo, konye kipou kaanyutu akepolou kakonyenekosi.
Naarai naainakinere aiturio ka aibuses nuapotu kama ejai Edeke Papa, kobu da eporoto mamakeŋ kotoma aibuses nakapolou naimwekimweki ebe, “Lo ŋes Okokuka lominat, loalelakinit noi;”
kipou keirasi eporoto ŋol loabuni kotoma akuj, nakijaar kaŋes moru lokalaunan,
Ido kija kakirot naka inabin naitogogoŋitoi aitelekarit, Ido iswamaete ejok aibwaikin ŋin etau, kwape atala naecaikini aibois nakamuton, aitodol naiwalaria akwap, elomuni da etop kotoma otauonokus.
Kojenutu na nasodit ebe, emamei akirot naiwadikato inabin naepedori ituŋanan aijul kanuke bon,
naarai emamei akirot nakedwaritai kakote naka ituŋanan, konye enerenenasi ituŋa nukepote kama ejai Edeke kodoikinite Emoyo Lokalaunan.
Etuparete da luipu abenyanutukec, ido emoromoroo kanukec erot loka abeit.
Kotoma airaŋaanut da itudumunos ameda naepol kamakus kakiro nuepwakunete; atubokiniokec ageun apeŋo mam itiloro, amudiariokec da mam iluranari.
mam da abu kitim akwapin nukolo sek, konye kidar Noa ekalimonokinan loka adolit nepepe kituŋa ice ikanykaarei, naayaunia akalele akwapin nuka lumam eyoŋito Edeke;
naabu kituluoria ireria luka Sodom ka Gomora ekurwon, kotubok akiro kibiro, kibwaik naanyunet mama ejaas ŋul luepote amamus ayoŋit Edeke;
koyuu da Lot ekadoliton loeyaloŋoŋoi noi kanuka iponesio luka abenyanut naka ikaronok,
(naarai ekadoliton ŋol loeboie kotomakec, naaanyunia ka aiirar da, aponi kiticanai ekemoyo loedolit, ŋinipaaran kanuka aswamisiokec nukepali),
ejeni Ejakait ayuun lueyoŋito Edeke kotoma acodunio, ka aidar lumam edolito kiticanete kiton apaaran naka atubokinio;
konye aitelekarit ŋul luelosenenete atuparit akuan kotoma aiŋobel nakasilianut, komenito ayaio.
Iilokina, iswamaete nuekotos, mam emaranete emoromoroete lukaibuses,
kwabo imalaikan, karaida kepolok aitelekarit kagogoŋ ka apedor, mam eyaunete akiro nuka amorosit mama ejai Ejakait kamakec.
Konye kes, kwape isuban luemamei acoa, lueuritai bala itiaŋ lutai aikamunio ka amudiario da, emoromoroete kotoma akiro numam ejenete, emudiario cut kotoma amudiarikec,
ikonakinio kes erono ŋes eropit loka aronis. Eomito nukaiyalama abolia paaran. Eraas akemerin ka amasikineta, eboliaete kopucinokec luka aminanar, emorete kayes.
Ejaas kakonye nuileleba adoteu, mam inyeinete adiakar. Ijodijodoete imoyon lumam icasito. Ejaas itauon luituutoro airaŋaanut. Idwe luikenen!
Inyeinete erot loetenit, kosodete apaar atupar erot loka Balaam, okoku loka Beor, loamina eropit loka amamus adolit,
konye aponi kitoronai kanuka epalike; abu asigiria namam inera kiner koporoto loka etuŋanan, kitikok ikerep luka enabi.
Naarai inerasi nukailabilab nuepolok nutai, ijodijodoete kaiŋobel naka akuan kotoma abenyanut, ŋul luakuito apak naedit kama kaŋul kaluelosenenete kotoma apaar.
Isumunete kes aosikinio, kwabo eraas kesi ikulepek ibulesin luka amudiar; naarai ŋin yenipikori ituŋanan, eraun ŋesi ibulesit yenika ŋin.

Naarai nakedauniata aiku anyoun kotoma asilianut naka akwapin, toma ajenun cut Ejakait, ido Eketajaran Yesu Kristo, arai inyalinyalunos bobo kaŋin, kipikoroi, eraunos nukawasiakec nukaronok adepar nusodit.
Naarai tiejok kamakec arai kemam kejenunito erot loka adolit, itia aboŋor kau ainyein aicorakinet nakalaunan naaponi koinakinai kes kedaut ajenun.
Adoiki kes kwape ejaar awaragan nakabeit ebe, Eboŋori ekiŋok alekanake, ka apege da nailoŋoŋ eboŋori eipwok orit.
tetere iitununete akiro nueneritos inabin lukalaunak, aicorakinet da naka Ejakait ido Eketajaran kama kikiyakiakus.
Kojenutu na nasodit ebe epote ikesekelok kapaarasia nukawasia isekelete, etuparete aiŋobelekec bonik,
inerasi ebe, “Ejai bo ai aisumunet naka abunoreke? Naarai ageun netikolo ajotoorotor lukapapaawok, esalito iboro kwape ajaatar kageunet naka asubio.”
Naarai epeleikinito aimurwokin na ebe kejai akuj ameun apeŋo, ka akwap naalomuni kotoma akipi, ido kokidiŋ akipi, kanuka akirot naka Edeke,
ŋes ainakini akwap nakolosek amudiario kakalele naka akipi.
Konye iŋadakinitai akuj ka akwap nukatinenikwana akim, kanuka akirot kaŋin, idaritere kiton apaaran naka atubokinio ka amudiario naka ituŋa lumam eyoŋito Edeke.
Konye luminan, sirikimurwok akirot na adiopet, ebe, esubit adiopepaaran kama ka Ejakait, bala ikar elukumit, ka ikar elukumit da bala adiopepaaran.
Mam iyapia Ejakait aisumuneteke, kwape eomitotor ice aiyapia, konye etitiŋikinit mamakus, komam ekoto idio kayesi aolior, konye kodoloto kere aitoronikin.
Konye ebuni apaaran naka Ejakait kwape ekokolan, kosodi edaun akuj kagat naepol, ecalaros nugeet kamwanis kanaidopit, kosodi icweio da akwap ka aswamisio nuejaas tomake.
Aso naarai ecalaros iboro ŋul kere kwaŋin, ibusakinit yes ajaun biai kotoma oponesio lukalaunak ka ayoŋit Edeke,
komunos, kimielas da noi abunore naka apaaran naka Edeke, naecalarere akuj naitonokunio, ka nugeet da ecalaros kamwanis kanaidopit.
Konye kwape ejaar aisumunetake, kimuno akuj nakitetet ka akwap da nakitetet, neiboio adolit.
Koomito atitiŋikin naka Ejakaitiwok araut aitajario. Abu onacewok lominat Paul kiwadikak yes kwaŋin kwape ejaar acoa naainakinitai ŋes,
ido inera ŋun kotoma obaluanake kere. Ejaas kotomakec acekiro nuetioko ajenun, nuemojirete lumam esisiato ka lumam icasito, kwape iswamakiniata nuiwadikatai ace, kiton amudiariokec.
Aso luminan, yes luidaut sek ajenun ŋin, kidaras kinyeis aibiror anyoun kotoma aicasitekus, kosodete ayaŋaario kapaar naka lukaronok.
Konye kopolokis toma asianut, ka ajenun da Ejakaitiwok ido Eketajaran Yesu Kristo. Koinakinai ŋol aibuses lolo kiton apaaran naka ikar kere. Amen.
kotakan da aijar, ido kipou kaanyut, kitejenuni da, kilimonokin yes aijar ŋin naka ikar kere, nakejai neejai Papa, nakitakanikinio sio,—
nakipou kaanyut, kapuput da, kilimonokini yes da, tetere idieasi yesi da kasio. Eidicanewok da ejai nepepe ka Papa, ido nepepe ka Okokuke Yesu Kristo.
Kiwadikai nu tetere itodolikinio awokokiyalama.
Arai kinera ebe kidica kaŋes, kalosenenete da kotoma amuton, kiŋala bonik, komam kiswamai nukabeit.
Konye arai kilosenenei kotoma aica, kwape ejaar ŋesi toma aica, kidicenena bonik ka bonik, ido kitesegarete oni aokot nuka Yesu Okokuke kama kadiakar kere.
Arai kinera ebe emamei oni adiakar, kimoda bonik, emamei da abeit kotomawok.
Arai kilimori adiakanaretawok, erai ŋesi lomunot ido loedolit, isioniei oni adiakanareta, itesegari da oni kama kamamus adolit kere.
Arai kinera ebe mam kipou kadiakasi kituluori ŋes ekeŋalan, emamei da akekirot kotomawok.
Erai ŋesi alucet naka adiakanaretawok, kwabo mere kanuwok bonik, konye kanuka akwapin kere da.
Kana da ŋes kijenunia ebe kijeni ŋes, arai kiricit aicorakinetake.
Yeninera ebe, “Ajeni ŋes,” komam ericit aicorakinetake erai ikeŋalan, emamei da abeit kotomakeŋ.
Konye ŋin yenericit akekirot abeit apoloo amin naka Edeke kotomakeŋ. Kana ŋes kijenunia ebe kija tomakeŋ.
Ŋin yeninera ebe esalenenei tomakeŋ, iburao ŋin alosenen kwape alosenenoo ŋesi.
Kewadikakini yes bobo aicorakinet nakitetet, naerai nakabeit tomakeŋ, tomakus da, naarai edaun amuton, ecai da kwana aica nakabeit.
Yeninera ebe ejai toma aica, kolaite da onaceke, ejai toma amuton kiton kwana.
Yenemina onaceke esalit toma aica, emamei da aiguikinet kotomakeŋ.
Konye yenelai onaceke ejai toma amuton, elosenenei da kotoma amuton, komam ejeni neelosi, naarai etumudak amuton akekonye.
Kewadikakini yes, lukapapa, naarai ijenete ŋol loejai ameun kageunet. Kewadikakini yes, ikatumunak, naarai ipikos lokaronon. Kewadikakini yes, idwe, naarai ijenete Papa.
Kewadikakini yes, lukapapa, naarai ijenete ŋol Ioejai ameun kageunet. Kewadikakini yes, ikatumunak, naarai igogoŋ, esalit da akirot naka Edeke tomakus, ipikos da lokaronon.
Naarai ibore kere yenejai toma akwapin, aiŋobel naka akuan, aiŋobel naka akonye, ka eitur da loka aijar kana, mam elomunete kaneejai Papa, dimarai elomunete kakwapin.
Edaunos da akwapin, ka aiŋobelekec; konye yeniswamai nuekot Edeke esalenenei kiton ikar kere.
Apotu konyout kamawok, konye mam keraas luwok; naarai arai keraas luwok, tikesalata kaoni, konye konyout tetere itakanunio ebe mam keraas kere luwok.
Konye yes abu Lokalaunan kinyonyoik akinyet, ido ijenete kere.
Mam kewadikakini yes naarai mam ijenete abeit, konye naarai ijenete ŋin, ido naarai emamei aiŋal kere naelomuni kotoma abeit.
Iŋai bo erai ikeŋalan dimarai yeneŋeri ebe Yesu mere Kristo? Lo ŋes lokasurup loka Kristo, loeŋeri Papa ka Okoku da.
Ŋin kere yeneŋeri Okoku, emamei ŋin Papa. Ŋin yenelimori Okoku ejai ŋes Papa da.
Kosal tomakus naipuput ameun kageunet. Arai kesal tomakus naipuput ameun kageunet, isalete da toma Okoku ido toma Papa,
Na ŋes aisumunet naisumunit ŋesi oni, aijar naka ikar kere.
Kewadikakini yes nu nuka ŋul lukitapaarete.

Yes da, esalit tomakus ainyonyoikinio akinyet naidumut kamakeŋ, komam ipudasi ituŋanan aisisianakin yes; konye kwape kisisianakinia yes ainyonyoikinike akinyet akiro kere, erai da nakabeit, kwabo mam erai aiŋal, ido kwape kisisianakinitor yes, kosalata tomakeŋ.
Kwana da, idwe ludidik, kosalata tomakeŋ, tetere naetakanunia ŋesi kajaas katitiŋ, kinyeis ileic airum oni kakonyeneke naebunio ŋesi.
Arai ijenete ebe edolit ŋesi, kojenut ebe ŋin kere yeniswamai nukadolit ŋes eurit,
Luminan, kirai kwana idwe luka Edeke, mam ber etakani kwape kiraunor, konye kijeni ebe naetakanunia ŋesi kiputori oni ŋes, naarai kianyuni ŋes kwape ejaar.
Ŋin kere yenejai amun ŋin, italauna kwape eraar ŋol lokalaunan,
ŋin kere yeniswamai adiakar, iswamai da epali, adiakar ŋes epali.
ŋin kere yenesalit tomakeŋ mam ediakari; ŋin kere yenediakari, mam abu koany ŋes karaida ajenun
Idwe ludidik, kinyek ituŋanan aitapaar yes. Yeniswamai nukadolit erai yenedolit, kwape eraar ŋol loedolit.
Yeniswamai adiakar erai yenika Satan, naarai ediakit Satan ameun kageunet. Kanuka ŋun ŋes etakanunia Okoku loka Edeke, tetere emudiari aswamisio nuka Satan.
Ŋin kere yeneurio kama ejai Edeke mam iswamai adiakar, naarai esalit ekinyomitike tomakeŋ; ido mam epedori adiakar naarai keurio kama ejai Edeke.
Kana ŋes etakanuniata idwe luka Edeke ka idwe luka Satan; ŋin kere yenimam iswamai nukadolit mam erai yenika Edeke, karaida yenimam emin onaceke.
Mere kwape Kain, lokerai loka lokaronon, koar da onaceke: Ido kanukinyo kearia ŋes? Naarai keroko akeswamisio, kwabo kedolito nuka onaceke.
Kijeni oni ebe kipou kanyoutu katwanare alomar aijar, naarai kimina iinacan. Yenimam emin esalit toma atwanare.
Ŋin kere yenelai onaceke, erai ikaaran, ijenete da ebe emamei ikaaran kere yenesalit aijar naka ikar kere tomakeŋ.
Kana ŋes kijenunia amin, naarai abu ŋol kopal akeijar kanuwok; oni da kiburao aipal aijarawok kanuka iinacan.
Arai ejai yenejaas kiboro luka akwapin, kitei da onaceke iyarorotoi, egolokini da etauke kamakeŋ, ikwaikini ai esalakini amin naka Edeke tomakeŋ?
Idwe ludidik, kenyeis aminanara kakirot, karaida kaŋajep, dimarai kaswam ka abeit.
Kana ŋes kijenunia ebe kirai luka abeit, kesicerededata da iwokotauon kakonyeneke,
kama kitoroniata kere iwokotauon; naarai epol Edeke adepar iwokotauon, ejeni da kere.
Luminan, arai mam itauonowok kitoronete, kija katitiŋ neejai Edeke;
ŋin yenikilipi da kidumuni kamakeŋ, naarai kiricit aicorakinetake, kiswamai da nuisiyalamikinete kakonyeneke.
Na ŋes aicorakineteke, oni aiyuun ekiror loka Okokuke Yesu Kristo, kaminanaros da kwape kiinakinitor oni aicorakinet.
Ŋin yenericit aicorakinetake esalit tomakeŋ, ŋes da tomakeŋ. Kana ŋes kijenunia ebe esalit tomawok, kanuka Emoyo lokiinakinit oni.
Kana ŋes ijenuniata Emoyo loka Edeke; ŋolimoyo loelimori ebe abu Yesu Kristo toma akuan, erai loka Edeke.
Ŋolimoyo da lomam elimori Yesu, mam erai loka Edeke, ŋol erai lokasurup loka Kristo, loipuput ebe ebunit, kwana da ejai toma akwapin.
Idwe ludidik, iraas yesi luka Edeke, ipikosi kes, naarai epol ŋol loejai tomakus adepar ŋol loejai toma akwapin.
Eraas kesi luka akwapin, kanuka ŋun inerasi nuka akwapin, iirarete da akwapin kes.
Kirai oni luka Edeke. Yenejeni Edeke kiirari oni, yenimam erai yenika Edeke mam kiirari oni. Kana ŋes kijenunia emoyo loka abeit ka emoyo loka apaar.
Luminan, kaminanaros, naarai amin erai naka Edeke, ŋin da kere yenemina eurio kama ejai Edeke, ejeni da Edeke.
Yenimam emin mam ejeni Edeke, naarai erai Edeke amin.
Kana ŋes etakanunia amin naka Edeke mamawok, naarai abu Edeke kijuk Okokuke loteluna toma akwapin tetere kijari kanukeŋ.
Kana ŋes ejaar amin, mere ebe kimina oni Edeke, konye abu ŋesi komina oni, kijuk da Okokuke araun alucet naka adiakanaretawok.
Luminan, arai kimina Edeke oni kwaŋin, kiburao oni da aminanara.
Emamei cut ituŋanan yeneanyunit Edeke apaarasia kere; arai kiminanara, esalit Edeke tomawok, akemin da apoloor kotomawok.
Kianyunit, kitejenuni da ebe abu Papa kijuk Okokuke araun Eketajaran loka akwapin.
Arai elimori ituŋanan ebe Yesu ŋes Okoku loka Edeke, esali Edeke tomakeŋ, ŋes da toma Edeke,
Kijeni, kipou keyuut da, amin naejai Edeke mamawok. Edeke ŋes amin; ŋin da yenesalit toma amin, esalit toma Edeke, Edeke da esalit tomakeŋ.
Kana ŋes apolooror amin nepepe kaoni, tetere kija katitiŋ kapaaran naka aitub akiro; naarai kwape eraar ŋesi, kirai oni da kwaŋin toma akwapin nu.
Emamei akurian kotoma amin, naarai amin naapoloor ireŋeari akurian. Naarai ejai akurian aiticanio, yenekuriana da mam epolooro kotoma amin.
Kimina oni, naarai ŋes kigei amin oni.
Arai inera ituŋanan ebe, “Amin Edeke,” kolaite da onaceke, erai ikeŋalan. Naarai yenimam emina onaceke loeanyunit, mam epedori amin Edeke lomam eanyunit.
Ejai da oni aicorakinet na kamakeŋ, ebe yenemina Edeke, komina da onaceke.
Kana ŋes kijenunia ebe kimina idwe luka Edeke, nakiminar Edeke, kiswamai da aicorakinetake.
Naarai na ŋes amin naka Edeke, ebe kiricit aicorakinetake. Ido mam aicorakinetake elaŋir.
Naarai ŋin kere yeneurio kama ejai Edeke ipikori akwapin; na ŋes aipikor naipikori akwapin, aiyuuniwok.
Iŋai bo ipikori akwapin, dimarai yeniyuunit ebe Yesu ŋes Okoku loka Edeke?
Erai Emoyo ekajenan, naarai erai Emoyo abeit.
Ejaas ikajenak iuni, Emoyo, ka akipi, ka aokot da; acamanara iuni kidiopet.
Arai kicamuni aitejenunet naka ituŋa, epol aitejenunet naka Edeke adepar, naarai na ŋes aitejenunet naka Edeke naitejenunit nuka Okokuke.
Yeniyuunit Okoku loka Edeke ejai aitejenunet tomakeŋ, Yenimam iyuunit Edeke, etuluo ŋes ekeŋalan, naarai mam abu kiyuu aitejenunet naitejenunit Edeke nuka Okokuke.
Na ŋes aitejenunet ebe, abu Edeke koinak oni aijar naka ikar kere, ejai da aijar ŋin toma Okokuke.
Yenejai Okoku, ejai da aijar; yenemamei Okoku loka Edeke emamei aijar.
Na da ŋes atitiŋ nakija kaoni kamakeŋ, ebe, arai kiilip ibore kwape ejaar akoteke, kipupuni ŋesi oni.
Arai kijeni ebe kipupuni ŋesi oni, ŋin kere yenikilipi, kijeni ebe kidumu iboro lukilipit kamakeŋ.

Arai keanyu ituŋanan onaceke kediakaa adiakaret namere naka atwanare, ilipi, einakini Edeke ŋes aijar kanuka ŋul lumam ediakarito kiton atwanare. Ejai adiakar naka atwanare; mam enera ebe kilipakinai ŋin.
Amamus adolit kere ŋes adiakar, ejai da adiakar namere naka atwanare.
Konye kijeni ebe abu Okoku loka Edeke, abu koinak oni ajenun tetere kijeni ŋol loerai abeit, kija oni toma ŋol loerai abeit, toma Okokuke Yesu Kristo. Ŋol ŋes Edeke lokabeit, aijar da naka ikar kere.
Idwe ludidik, kidarasi bonik kama kaputosia.
kanuka abeit naesalit tomawok, ido ejaun nepepe kaoni ikar kere:
Asianut, ka aitim, ka ainapakin ejaunete kaoni kama ka Edeke Papa, ido kama ka Yesu Kristo Okoku loka Papa, toma abeit ka amin.
Abu keyalamikin noi naarai abu kadum ice kodwekon elosenenete kotoma abeit, kwape kidumunia aicorakinet kama ka Papa.
Ido kwana ajakait, kelipi jo, mere bala kewadikakini jo aicorakinet nakitetet, konye ŋin nakijaatar ameun kageunet, kaminanaros bonik ka bonik.
Na da ŋes amin, kalosenenete kwape ejaatar aicorakinetake; na ŋes aicorakinet, kwape ipupunitotor yesi ameun kageunet, ebe, kolosenenete kotoma amin.
Naarai alomasi ikeŋalak luipu toma akwapin, lumam elimorete abunore naka Yesu Kristo kotoma akuan; ŋol ŋes ekeŋalan ido lokasurup loka Kristo.
Kocoito kinyeis atwaniar nukiswamat, konye kijaut eropit loitekoro.
Ŋin kere yenelitori komam esalit toma aisisianakin naka Kristo, emamei ŋin Edeke; yenesalit toma aisisianakin, ejai ŋin Papa ka Okoku da.
Arai ebuni ituŋanan mamakus, komam eyaunit aisisianakin ŋin, sirikisukunyikis ŋes togo, karaida ayogan ŋes;
naarai yeniyogai ŋes emorete kaŋes akeswamisio nukaronok.
Kiyogaete jo idwe luka inacikon naseuna.
Naarai abu keyalama noi naadolunioto iinacan kitejenut da abeitekon; kwape ilosenenoo kotoma abeit.
Emamei eoŋ aiyalama naepol adepar na, apupun ebe elosenenete ikadwe kotoma abeit.
Lominat, iswamai aswam namunot naiswamakini iinacan ka ipejok da,
lukitejenut akonimin kakonyen nuka ikanisan. Iswamakini kes ejok ainyamakin kes kwape ibusakinitor Edeke.
Naarai alomasi kesi kanuka Ekiror, komam ijaunito ibore kama ka ikapirin.
Aso kiburao oni aisukunyun luikote nen, tetere kiraun ikeswamak lukaupakec kotoma abeit.
Abu kewadikak ekanisa ece; konye Dioterepes loekot aiŋarenikin mam abu kisukunyik sio.

Kanuka ŋun, arai kabu, esiituni akeswamisio nuiswamai; kidacanakini sio akiro nueroko, Komam ŋun edaunete ŋes, eŋeri ŋesi aisukunyun iinacan, itikokini da ŋul luekotosi aisukunyikin kes, ireŋeari kokanisa.
Itejenunete ituŋa kere nuka Demeterio, itejenuni da abeit alopet; isio da kitejenuni, ido ijeni ebe erai aitejenunikosi nakabeit.
konye amuno aanyun jo katipet, kenerata kaituke.
Kojai ijo ainapakin. Kiyogaete jo ipapero. Kiyoga ipapero kwape ejaatar ikiroriakec.

Naarai alomut icetuŋa kaiyeiyea, lukiwadikatai sek alomar otube lo, ituŋa lumam eyoŋito Edeke, luilocete asianut naka Edekewok araun abenyanut, eŋerete da Ekapoloniwok ediopet bon Ejakait Yesu Kristo.
Imalaikan da lumam apotu koricata ayaitekec, konye kinyeis akeceibois kikulepek, abu ŋesi kidar korikoi lumam edaunos kamuton kiton atubokinio naka apaaran nakapolon.
Kwape ka Sodom ka Gomora, ka ireria da luerimorito kes, luapotu koluŋakinos adoteanut kopone loka ŋul, kotupata acekuan, ibwaikinitai araut aanyunet, iticanio kakim naka ikar kere.
Konye nakeŋolopatar Mikael emalaika lokapolon kaSatan, epegas kanuka akuan naka Musa, mam abu koneikin aosan ŋes katubokinio nakamoromor, konye kobala ebe, “Kitoron Ejakait jo,”
Konye ituŋa lu emoromoroete ŋun kere numam ejenete, konye ŋun nuejenete kaurunet, kwape itiaŋ luemamei acoa, kaŋun emudiario kes.
Itukwi kes! Naarai elosete korot loka Kain, kokubokinos kapaar naka Balaam, kanuka eropit komudiarai kopeget loka Kora.
akailan nuededeŋ nuka aŋolol, nuekuete ekuetete, lokileieikec; aacer nuepaarete nuidarakinitai amuton nairiono cucucuc kiton ikar kere.

aiswamakin kere etube, ka aitoron da kere lumam eyoŋito Edeke kanuka aswamisiokec kere nuka amamus ayoŋit Edeke, ido kanuka akiro kere nueninik nuenerata ikadiakanarak lumam eyoŋito Edeke asurokinia ŋes.”
Eraas lu ikerurumak, ikaŋuurianak, luelosete kwape ejaar aiŋobelekec, ineras da aitukekec akiro nukasoga, emaete ituŋa adumunia ameda.
apotu kolimokis yes ebe, “Kapak nakawasia ejaunete ikesekelok, luelosete kwape ejaar aiŋobelekec nakamamus ayoŋit Edeke.”
Eraas lu lueyaunete atiakatiak, luka aijar kana, luemamei Emoyo.
Konye yes, luminan, kodukonoros kaiyuunikus nakalaunan noi, kilipenenete kOmoyo Lokalaunan,
kidaras bonik toma amin naka Edeke; kidareut aitim naka Ejakaitiwok Yesu Kristo kiton aijar naka ikar kere.
Kitimoto ice, luebuonokinos;
kitajarata ice, kouruput kotoma akim; kitimoto ice kakurian, kolaata anapito da naejai elos loka akuan.
mama ejai Edeke ediopet bon, Eketajaraniwok kanuka Yesu Kristo Ejakaitiwok, kojai aibuses, ka apedor, ka ailerit, ka apolou da, ageikin ikar kere, tinenikwana da, ido kiton ikar kere. Amen.
lokitejenuni akirot naka Edeke, ka ajenanut naka Yesu Kristo, kere nuabu koany.
Isirereŋitoi ŋin yenesiomi, ka ŋul da luepupete akiro nuka adwarasit kana, ka luericete da nuiwadikatai kotomakeŋ; naarai eapie apak.
Asianut kojai mama ijaas ka ainapakin nuepote kama ejai ŋol loejai, ido lokejai, ido loebuni, ido kama ejaas Imoyon ikanykaarei luejaas kiŋaren keicoloŋoke,
ido kama ejai Yesu Kristo, ekajenan lomunot, ekiyai loka ikatwak, ekayaiton da loka ikabakan luka akwapin.
Mama ejai ŋol lokimina oni, lokilacuni da kotoma adiakanaretawok kanuka aokotoke,
kituluo da oni ajakanut, isasedotin luka Edeke Papake, mama ejai ŋol kojai aibuses ka ailerit, kiton ikar ka ikar. Amen.
Koany ebuni nepepe kidouon, eanyuni ŋes ŋinikoŋu, kere lukicumete ŋes; ibworos atekerin kere nuka akwap kanukeŋ. Eebo, Amen.
Eoŋ Yokana, onacekus, loamori nepepe kayes aiticanio, ka ajakanut, ka atitiŋ, nuejaas toma Yesu, abu kajai apujan naenyaritai Patumo, kanuka akirot naka Edeke, ka aitejenun da nuka Yesu.
Abu kajai kotoma Omoyo kapaaran naka Ejakait, kasodi apupun eporoto loepol kokaukaŋ, bala loka arupepe,
kobala ebe, “Kiwadik nuiany toma oitabo, kijukak ikanisan ikanykaarei, mama ejai Epeso, ka Sumuruna, ka Perugamo, ka Suatira, ka Sarudio, ka Piladelupia, ka Laodikia da.”
Abu kebelokin aanyun eporoto loenera keoŋ, ido naebelokinor abu kaany ipirin lukatalai ikanykaarei luka esabu,
ido kokidiŋ kipirin lukatalai kaany loeputosi bala okoku loka etuŋanan enapit anapito naedolit akejen, koenite da amuny naka esabu atorobuke;
kokwaŋ akouke ka iketim da kwape ajul nukakwaŋak, kwape akako; akekonye da kwape aipeloret naka akim,
akekeje da aikomon nuepwatat, bala naililiauna kotoma oupa, eporotoke da kosubite bala eporoto loka akipi nuipu;
ido abu kitiŋite aacer akanykaarei kakanike nakoteten, ido kolom kaitukuke ekileŋ loekwana kowaitin iarei kere, ereeteke da kosubite bala akoloŋ naecai kakepedor.
ido Lokajaran; abu katwanite, ido koany ajari ikar ka ikar, ajai kilaceta luka Atwanare ka luka Okatwak.
Aso kiwadik nuiany, nuejaas, ka nuejaunete da akaulo kaŋun.

Aiyeiyea naka aacer akanykaarei nuiany kakanika nakoteten, ka ipirin lukatalai ikanykaarei luka esabu. Aacer ŋun akanykaarei kes imalaikan luka ikanisan ikanykaarei, ka ipirin da lukatalai ikanykaarei kes ikanisan ikanykaarei.
Iŋirikinit ka atitiŋikin kanuka ekakiror, kwabo mam ibu kopas.
Konye ejai eoŋ akirot na kajo ebe ibu kojal akonimin nasodit.
Aso kiitu nekibirunor, kitoronikin, kiswama da aswamisio nusodit. Konye arai mam iswamai kwaŋin, abuni mamakon, alemari da epirikon lokatala kaiboisike, dimikito kitoronikin.
Konye ejai jo na ebe ilait aswamisio nuka Inikolain, nualait eoŋ da.
Ŋin yenejai akit, kopup nuelimokini Emoyo ikanisan. Ŋin yenipikori ainakini ŋes ainyam araito nuka ekitoi loka aijar, loejai Paradais

Sirikiyoŋ nukidoikinete aisirieb jo, Koany, elosi Satan acakakin ice kayes aidaris, tetere kitemio, kiticanio da yes apaarasia atomon. Koraenena lomunot kiton atwanare, eoŋ da kainakini jo aboko naka aijar.
Ŋin yenejai akit, kopup nuelimokini Emoyo ikanisan. Ŋin yenipikori mam epipilikini cut atwanare nakiareit.

Konye ejai eoŋ akiro nuikidioko kajo, naarai ejaas jo ituŋa luikamunito aisisianakin naka Balaam, loesisianakini Balak acakakin aitiguikinet akonyen nuka idwe luka Isirael, ainyam nueinakinio aputosia, ka adotear da.
Ejaas jo da kwaŋin ituŋa luikamunito aisisianakin naka Inikolain,
Aso kitoronikin. Konye arai mam iswamai kwaŋin abunit atipet mamakon, ajiikini kakes kekileŋ loka aitukuka.

Ŋin yenejai akit, kopup nuelimokini Emoyo ikanisan. Ŋin yenipikori ainakini ŋes emanu loebwaitai, ainakini da ŋes amoru naekwaŋ, ido iwadikatai amoru ekiror lokitetet, lomam ituŋanan ejeni nabarai yenijauni.
“Ajeni akoniswamisio, ka amin ka aiyuun ka aijaanakin, ka aŋirikinitekon da, ka aswamisiokon nukawasia kwape itelekaritotor kwa nusodit.
Konye ejai eoŋ akirot na kajo, naarai inyeinit aberu ŋin, Yesebel, naenyara bon anabi, isisianakini iŋalaari da ikabulesin tetere edotearos, ka ainyam nueinakinio aputosia.
Abu kainak ŋes apak tetere itoronikin, kwabo mam ekoto aitoronikin kotoma adoteuke.
Koany, acakakini ŋes ojam, ka ŋul da luedoteete nepepe kaŋes acakakini toma aiticanio naepol, dimikito kitoronikinos kotoma aswamisioke.
Ido aari ikedwe katwanare. Ejenunete da ikanisan kere ebe eoŋ ŋopeŋol loererei aomisio ka itauon, eoŋ da ainakini ŋinidiopet kayesi kwape ejaatar aswamisiokus.
Konye kabala yes ice luijaas Suatira luemamei aisisianakin ŋin kere, lumam ijenete nuidulok nuka Satan, kwape ineratar, mam kebwaikini yes abwokon ace;
nabarai kikamut noi yenijaatar, kiton naabunio.
Ŋin yenipikori, ka aricit aswamisioka kiton awasia, ainakini ŋes apolou kama ejaas atekerin.
Ŋes da icokiei kes kebela loka asuat, kwape ebwaŋabwaŋatar amoti nuka ekajean, kwape kainakinia da Papaka eoŋ;
eoŋ da ainakini ŋes etop.
Ŋin yenejai akit, kopup nuelimokini Emoyo ikanisan.
“Ajeni akoniswamisio; ebe ejai jo ekiror ebe ijari, konye irai lokatwan.
Kokweny, kitogogoŋ da nuesalito nuekotosi atwakare, Naarai mam abu kadum akoniswamisio nuedolito kakonyen nuka Edekeka.
Aso kiitu kwape kijaunia, kwape kipupunio da; koric, kitoronikin da. Aso arai mam ikwenyi, abuni eoŋ kwape ekokolan, kwabo mam ijenuni esawa loabunio mamakon.
Konye ejaas jo ikiroria luikidioko koSarudio, ituŋa lumam emunaarito inapenekec; elosenenete kesi nepepe keoŋ enapito lukakwaŋak, naarai ibusakinito.
Ŋin yenipikori itanapio kwaŋin inapen lukakwaŋak, kwabo mam cut amwatari ekekiror koitabo loka aijar; eoŋ da alimori ekekiror kakonyen nuka Papaka, kakonyen da nuka imalaikanake.
Ŋin yenejai akit, kopup nuelimokini Emoyo ikanisan.
Koany, ainakini lukatukos naka Satan, luenyaras bonik Iyudayan, kwabo mam eraas, konye iŋalaete; koany, ainakini kes aponare, akukonokin kakejenekon, ejenunete da ebe kamina jo.
Naarai iricit akakirot naka aŋirikinit, eoŋ da karici jo kotoma osawa loka aitemio, loebuni kakwapin kere, aitem ŋul luiboiete kakwap.
Abuni eoŋ atipet; kikam yenijaatar, kinye ituŋanan kere ayaŋaar abokokon.

Ŋin yenipikori, etarauni ŋes epir kotoma oyekalu loka Edekeka; kwabo mam cut elomari kiŋa; eoŋ da ewadikakini ŋes ekiror loka Edekeka, ekiror da loka ere loka Edekeka, ŋes Yerusalem lokitetet loijesuni abunore kotoma akuj; kama ka Edekeka, ekirorika da lokitetet.
Ŋin yenejai akit, kopup nuelimokini Emoyo ikanisan.
Aso naarai ijalam, kwabo mam imwana karaida mam ililim, kalekari jo kaitukuka.
Naarai ibala ebe, Arai ekabaran, ido abarit, kwabo mam epuda ibore. Kwabo mam ijeni ebe irai lokican, lokitimitoi, loilwaritoi, emuduk, loimujalal da.

Aso ketetemikini jo ebe, kogwel kamakaŋ esabu loililiaunitai kakim, tetere ibari, ka inapen da lukakwaŋak tetere inapi, kinyeis ileic luka amujalalakon atakanun, ka ekiya da lokinyonyoa akonyekon tetere ikwenyi.
Etoroni eoŋ ŋul kere luamina, alecori da; aso kodunyak, kitoronikin da.
Koany, abwoi kokek ekuŋukuŋi; arai epupi ituŋanan kere ekaporoto, koŋaa da ekek, alomari mamakeŋ, amori nepepe kaŋes, ŋes da keoŋ.
Ŋin yenipikori, ainakini ŋes aiboi nepepe keoŋ oicoloŋoka, kwape abu kepikoria keboikin nepepe ka Papaka oicoloŋoke.
Ŋin yenejai akit, kopup nuelimokini Emoyo ikanisan.”
Atipet abu kajai kotoma Omoyo, ido koany, kibwaikinitete eicoloŋ toma akuj, ka loiboie koicoloŋ kaŋol!
Ŋol da lokiboie kotakani koputosi bala amoru naka ayaseper, ka naka sarudio, kirimorite etaluka eicoloŋ, kotakani koputosi bala emeralid.
Kirimorito iicoloŋo akaisaarei kaluoŋon eicoloŋ, kiboiete imakio akaisaarei kaluoŋon koicoloŋo kaŋul, konapito inapen lukakwaŋak, kojaas da abokoi nuka esabu akwesikec.
Kolomununei aimiliaunun koicoloŋ, ka iporotoi, ka agiro, konokete da atalai akanykaarei nuka akim koiŋaren keicoloŋ, kes Imoyon ikanykaarei luka Edeke;
ido kiŋaren keicoloŋ bala aŋolol naka aroet, koputosi bala agilasi.
Kokidiŋ keicoloŋ, kowaitin da kere luka eicoloŋ, kejaas lukajarak iwoŋon, lukileleba akonye kiŋaren kokau da.
Keputosi lokajaran losodit bala eŋatuny, ka lokajaran lokiareit bala itaok, kejai lokajaran lokiwuniet ereet bala loka etuŋanan, ka lokajaran lokiwoŋonet da bala emorukaalet loeporitoi.
Lukajarak ŋul luoŋon kejaas ŋolidiopet abebenoka akanykape, kileleba akonye iwaitin kere, kotoma da, kwabo mam iyeŋete paaran ka kuare da ayoore ebe,
“Lokalaunan, lokalaunan, lokalaunan, Ejakait Edeke Lokapedor kere,
Lokejai, ido loejai, ido loebuni da!”
kanen ibiroros imakio akaisaarei ka luoŋon kakonyen nuka ŋol kaloiboie koicoloŋ, emaete ŋol loejari ikar ka ikar, kocakanakinete abokoikec kiŋaren keicoloŋ, koyeete ebe,
“Ibusakinit ijo, Ejakaitikosi ka Edekekosi da, Adumun aibuses, ka ayoŋio, ka apedor, Naarai ibu ijo kosub iboro kere,
Ijo kojaut, kesubio da kanuka akotekon.”
Abu kaany da emalaika loegogoŋ elimokini keporoto loepol ebe, “Iŋai bo ibusakinit apukor eitabo, ka aibil da aipucetake?”
Kwabo emamei ituŋanan kotoma akuj, karaida kakwap, karaida kokwap kakwap, yenepedori apukor eitabo ŋol karaida asesen tomake.
Abu kamony noi, naarai mam edumuna yenibusakinit apukor eitabo, karaida asesen tomake.
Kalimok ediopet komakio ebe, “Sirikimony; koany epiko Eŋatuny loka ateker naka Yuda, Aliasit naka Daudi, tetere epedori apukor eitabo ka aipucetake akanykaarei.”
Kolot ŋesi kolem eitabo kakan nakoteten naka ŋol kalokiboie koicoloŋ.

Napelemuni eitabo ŋol, kibiroros lukajarak luoŋon ka imakio akaisaarei ka luoŋon, kakonyen nuka Imerekek, ŋolidiopet kakesi kejai adeudeu, ka atanyia nuka esabu nukileleba lukisupurununo, nueraas ailip naka lukalaunak;
koyooto ekosio lokitetet, ebe,
“Ibusakinit ijo alemun eitabo, ka apukor da aipucetake, Naarai aponi koari, kogwelak Edeke kaokotokon ŋiniteker, ka aŋajep, ka ituŋa, ka ajena.
Irumete kesi kakwap.”
ebalas keporoto loepol ebe, “Ibusakinit Imerekek yenaponi koarai, adumun apedor, ka abar, ka acoa, ka agogoŋ, ka ayoŋio, ka aibuses, ka arereŋ da!”

Keira da ŋinisubat kere yenejai toma akuj, ka akwap, kokwap da kakwap, kaŋolol, ka iboro kere luejaas tomake, kobalas ebe, “Mama ejai ŋol loiboie koicoloŋ, ido mama ejai Imerekek, kojai arereŋ, ka ayoŋio, ka aibuses, ka ailerit kiton ikar ka ikar!”
Kobalas lukajarak luoŋon ebe, “Amen!” Kibiroros da imakio komaata.
Kaany, ido koany, ebalasit lokakwaŋan, kejai ekebwaneniton da akabwa; koinakinai aboko, koloma da aipikor, ido ipikori.
Naapukoria ŋesi aipucet nakiareit, keira lokajaran lokiareit ebala ebe, “Bia!”
Kolom do ebalasit ece, loereŋ; koinakinai ekebwanenitonike alemar ainapakin kotoma akwap, tetere ituŋa earas; koinakinai da ŋes ekileŋ loepol.
Keira bala eporoto kokidiŋ lukajarak luoŋon ebala ebe, “Aitemis naka akiria naka adenari, ka aitemisio auni nuka esairi nuka adenari, kwabo mam imunaari akinyet karaida ebino!”
Naapukoria ŋesi aipucet nakiwoŋonet, keira eporoto loka lokajaran lokiwoŋonet ebala ebe, “Bia!”

Kaany, ido koany, ebalasit loekwele, ekebwanenitonike da ekekiror Atwanare, kotupa ŋes Okatwak; koinakinai kes apolou kama katutubet nakiwoŋonet naka akwap, koarete kekileŋ, ka ebeli, ka atular, ka itiaŋ luededeŋ luka akwap.
Kiworoto keporoto loepol ebe, “Ijo Ejakait, Lokalaunan, lokabeit, itodoli ai mam kitubokini, karaida ainyaŋ aokotokosi kama ejaas ŋul luiboiete kakwap?”
Koinakinai kes ŋinidiopet anapito nakakwaŋan, kolimokinai da kes aiyeŋun bobo apak naedit, kiton naitodolikinor etiai loka ibulesin lukaupakec, ka ikeceinacan, luepote aario kwape kakesi.
kibirununos aacer nuka akuj toma akwap, kwape eraraununia etini araitoke nuelidio naejanijaŋia ekwam loepol.
Kilicarai akuj bala eitabo loenunukitoi, kolemarai ŋoliroŋat ka ŋinipujan kaiboisike.
Kosodete ikabakan luka akwap, ka ikapolok, ka ikapolokitok iserikalei, ka ikabarak, ka ikagogoŋok, ka ŋinibulesit ka yenejakakai, koŋopata kotoma abuai, ka atiiban nuka iroŋan,
kobalas iroŋan ka atiiban ebe, “Kibirunos mamakosi, kitoŋopai sio kakonyen nuka ŋol kaloiboie koicoloŋ, ka anyunyura da naka Imerekek;
naarai adol apaaran naepol naka anyunyurakec, iŋai bo do epedori aibwo?”
Kaany da emalaika ece ikeun kama elomunia akoloŋ, kejai aipucet naka Edeke lokajaran, kiworo mama ejaas imalaikan lukeinakinitai apedor amunaar akwap ka aŋolol da, keporoto loepol,
ebe, “Sirikimunaasi akwap, karaida aŋolol, karaida ikito, kiton nekidaunia aipucakin aipucet oreeta luka ibulesin luka Edekewok.”
Keira da etiai loka luepucakinitai emwaasi ilukumin akwatat ka akaisaoŋon ka luoŋon luepucakinitai, lukotoma ŋiniteker naka idwe luka Isirael.
Luepucakinitai lukateker naka Yuda, ilukumin itomon ka luarei, lukateker naka Reuben, ilikumin itomon ka luarei, lukateker naka Gad, ilukumin itomon ka luarei,
lukateker naka Aser, ilukumin itomon ka luarei, lukateker naka Naputali, ilukumin itomon ka luarei, lukateker naka Manase, ilukumin itomon ka luarei,
lukateker naka Simeon, ilukumin itomon ka luarei, lukateker naka Lebi, ilukumin itomon ka luarei, lukateker naka Isakar, ilukumin itomon ka luarei,
lukateker naka Sebulun, ilukumin itomon ka luarei, lukateker naka Yosep, ilukumin itomon ka luarei, lukateker da naka Benyamin, ilukumin itomon ka luarei.
kiworoete keporoto loepol ebe, “Ebeit Edekekosi loiboie koicoloŋ, ka Imerekek da aitajar!”
Kobwoete imalaikan kere airimor eicoloŋ, ka imakio, ka lukajarak da luoŋon, kibiroros kesi ebuburia kiŋaren keicoloŋ, komaata Edeke,
kobalas ebe, “Amen! Kojai arereŋ, ka aibuses, ka acoa, ka aimal, ka ayoŋio, ka apedor, ka agogoŋ mama ejai Edekekosi ikar ka ikar! Amen.”
Koboŋok ediopet komakio, kalimok eoŋ ebe, “Lukaŋai bo lu, luitanapitai inapen lukakwaŋak, ai bo da keponiata kesi?”
Katema ŋes atiar, “Ekajakait, ijo ijeni.” Kabala ebe, “Lu kes lukepote kotoma aiticanio naepol, elota inapenekec, etwakaŋata kes kotoma aokot nuka Imerekek.
Ijaanakinete paaran ka kuare kotoma oyekaluke;
Ŋol da loiboie koicoloŋ, erapari kes kewemake.
Mam bobo akoloŋ enomonori kes, karaida amwanis apeor.
Emwatari da Edeke akiyo kere kakonyenekec.”
Kasodi kaany imalaikan ikanykaarei luebwoenenete kakonyen nuka Edeke, koinakinai kes arupepen akanykaarei.
Kopurio apuru naka lukisupurununo nepepe kailip naka lukalaunak, kakan naka emalaika, kakonyen nuka Edeke.
Kolem emalaika ŋol aisupurunet, kilelebik akim nakejai otem, kocakak akwap; kojau agiro, ka iporotoi, ka eimilia, ka amaran da naka akwap.
Kokapakinos imalaikan ikanykaarei lukejaas arupepen akanykaarei tetere ekusete.
koraun atutubet nakiwuniet naka aŋolol aokot, kotwana atutubet nakiwuniet naka isuban lukejaas toma aŋolol lukejai aijar; komudiarai atutubet nakiwuniet naka atakerin.
Ekiror loka aacerit ŋes Adwaris. Koraun atutubet nakiwuniet naka akipi adwaris, kotwaka ituŋa luipu kanuka akipi kaŋun, naarai etadwaritai.
Kolaca aipany naemamei enaŋeke, kolom apuru kaipany, kwape apuru naka eupa loepol. Kitumuton apuru naalomuni kaipany akoloŋ ka apak da.
Kolom emaase kapuru toma akwap, aponi koinakinai ŋes apolou, kwape ejaatar ikiritona luka akwap apolou.
Aponi kolimokinai ŋes ebe mam emunaari anya nuka akwap, karaida ikiot kere yenepalal, karaida ekitoi kere, dimarai ituŋa bonik luemamei aipucet naka Edeke koreetakec;
aponi koinakinai ŋes aisirieb kes noi, ilapio ikany, kwabo mere aiar kes; korai aisiriebeke kwape aisirieb naka ekiriton naekonyia ituŋanan.
Kapaarasia kaŋun da emoete ituŋa atwakare, konye mam edumunete, imielas atwakare, ekeri da atwanare kamakec.
Kejaas kes itima kwape itima luka aŋor, ikelakec da kwape ikel luka iŋatunyo,
kejaas kes iboro lukatorob, bala luka aswa, airurum da naka abebenokakec kerai kwape airurum naka agalin nuipu nuka ibalasin luekuboros ojie.
Kejaas kes ikorio lueputosi ikiritona, ka itido, toma okoriokec ŋes ejai apedorikec aisirieb ituŋa ilapio ikany.
Kejai kes ekabakakec ŋes emalaika loka aipany naemamei enaŋe, ekekiror kAburanian Abadon, ka Ayonanin da ekekiror Apoluon.
Kosodi kokut emalaika lokikanyetekape akerupepe, abu keira da eporoto loalomuni kamumwar aoŋon nuka etem loka esabu loejai akonyen nuka Edeke,
loalimokini emalaika lokikanyetekape, lokejai arupepe ebe, “Kolac imalaikan iwoŋon lueenitai kocor lokapolon Eupurate.”
Kolacakinai imalaikan iwoŋon luetemokinitoi esawa, ka apaaran, ka elap, ka ekaru da, tetere earete atutubet nakiwuniet naka ituŋa,
Etiai loka ajoresio nuka ikebwanenok emwaasi ilukumin itomon irwan ilukumin itomon irwan aarei; abu kapup etiaikec.

Ido abu kaany kotoma aitapoet kana ibalasin, ka ŋul da luebwanenito kwana ta: konapito iboro lukatorob bala luka akim, ka luka ebululu, ka luka acukuman; koputosi akwes nuka ibalasin bala akwes nuka iŋatunyo, kolom akim ka apuru ka acukuman kaitukekec.
Apotu aiticaneta nu auni nualomunete kaitukekec koarata atutubet nakiwuniet naka ituŋa, kes akim, ka apuru, ka acukuman.
Naarai ejai apedor naka ibalasin toma aitukekec, ido toma okoriokec; naarai eputosi ikoriokec bala imunwo, ejaas akwes, nuisiriebiata.
ido mam apotu kitoronikinos kotoma aiarakec, karaida kotoma ocudetekec, karai da kotoma adoteukec, karaida kotoma akokokec.
Kojai iitabo yenididi yenepukoritai akanike, Kibwaik akejuke nakoteten aŋolol, ka akejuke da nakokediany akwap,
kiworo keporoto loepol kwape loka eŋatuny loegat, Napiworoi, kinerata agirokineta akanykaarei ikeceporotoi.
Ido naadauniata agirokineta einer, abu kakoto aiwadik, konye abu keira eporoto loebuni kotoma akuj ebala ebe, “Kipucak nuenerata agirokineta akanykaarei, konye sirikiwadik ŋun.”
Emalaika da loabu kaany ebwoi kaŋolol ka akwap da, kikeu akekan nakoteten mama ejai akuj,
kiyapo kolimite ŋol loejari ikar ka ikar, lokesubi akuj; ka luejaas toma, ka akwap da, ka luejaas toma, ka aŋolol da, ka luejaas toma, ebe mam bobo ejaun apak,

konye toma apaarasia nuka eporoto loka emalaika lokikanyetekaarei, naekotor aikut akerupepe, kosodi aiyeiyea naka Edeke aitodolikinio, kwape ejaatar akiro nukajokak nuabu kolimonok ibulesinike inabin.
Kalot mama ejai emalaika, kalimok ŋes ainakin eoŋ iitabo. Kabala ŋesi eoŋ ebe, “Kolem, konyam ŋes; edwaruni kakoikikon, konye kaitukukon ewinyuni kwape esik loka ao,”
Kalem iitabo kakan naka emalaika, kanyam, kowiny kotoma aitukuka kwape esik loka ao, konye kadau ainyam, kodwaru akoikika.
Kalimokis eoŋ ebe, “Kibusakinit jo adwarakin bobo ituŋa luipu ka atekerin, ka aŋajepa ka ikabakan da luipu.”
Konye alaro naejai kiŋa keyekalu, kinyek kokiŋa, mam itemi ŋin, naarai aponi koinakinai atekerin, ido icakacakaete kesi ere lokalaunan ilapio akaisaoŋon ka luarei.
Ainakini da ikakajenak iarei edwarete apaarasia alukumit ka akwat aarei ka akaisakanykape, konapito ipukoi.”
Arai ekoto ituŋanan aikonakin kes erono, elomuni akim kaitukekec, enyamari lukasurupokec; ido arai ekoto ituŋanan aikonakin kes erono, ibusakinit ŋes aario kwaŋin.
Ejai kes apedor agolokin akuj, kinyek akiru aitep apaarasia nuka aidwarakec, ejai kes apedor toma akipi aituluor kes aokot, ido ka aitican akwap kaiticaneta kere irwan nuipu kwape ekototor.
Ido kedaut aitejenunetekec ebuni etiaŋ loedokuni kaipany naemamei enaŋe aitiji kes, ipikori kes, eari da kes.
Ejaunos awatekec orot loka ere lokapolon loenyaritai kotoma omoyo Sodom ka Misiri, neebubukinitoi Ejakaitikec,
Esesenete lukotuŋa, ka atekerin, ka aŋajepa, ka ajena awatekec apaarasia auni ka atutubet, komam ecamakinete awatekec anukio toma ailin.
Iyalamikinos luiboiete kotoma akwap kanukec, elelete, ijukanakinos bonik ainakineta, naarai apotu inabin ŋul luarei kisiriebata noi luiboiete kotoma akwap.
Konye akaulo kapaarasia kakwa auni ka atutubet, koloma emoyo lokajaran loebuni kama ejai Edeke tomakec, kobwaata kakejekec, kodoik akurian naepol ŋul luapotu koanyutu kes.
Kopuput eporoto loepol loabuni kotoma akuj, kobala kes ebe, “Kodokutu ne!” Kodokasi toma akuj; toma odou, kosesenete da lukasurupokec.

Kosawa kaŋol kojai amaran naepol naka akwap, kibiror atutubet nakitomonet naka ere; koarai ituŋa ilukumin ikanykaarei kotoma amaran ŋin naka akwap, kokuriakaros noi luasalito, kituritos do Edeke loka akuj.
Kibiroros imakio akaisaarei ka luoŋon ebuburia, luiboiete kakonyen nuka Edeke koicoloŋokec, komaata Edeke.
Kobalas ebe,
“Kimalai jo Ejakait Edeke Lokapedor kere, Loejai, ido lokejai,
Naarai ilem ijo akonipedor naepol, irumit da.
Ka apak da naka lukatwak atubokinio,
Ka naka ainakin ikonibulesin inabin, ka lukalaunak,
Ka ŋul da lueyoŋito ekonikiror, ludidik ka lukapolok, eropitikec, Ka naka amudiar da luemudiarete akwap.”
Kotakan aanyunet naepol kotoma akuj, aberu naenapit akoloŋ, kojai elap kwap kakejeke, kojai da aboko naka aacer atomon ka nuarei akouke;
kepotiei, kodelo karieboke naka aidoun, kikilianar aidoun.
Kotakan aanyunet ace toma akuj, ido koany, apiu naepol naereŋ, kojaas kakwes akanykaarei ka amumwara atomon, kojaas da amekemeken akanykaarei akwesike.
Kiria ekorike atutubet nakiwuniet naka aacer nuka akuj, kocakak kes toma akwap, Kobwo apiu kakonyen nuka aberu naekoto aidoun, tetere naedounio ikokuke konyamari.
Kidou ŋesi ikoku yenisapat, yenekoto acok atekerin kere kebela loka asuat, konye kouruporoi ikokuke mama ejai Edeke, ido mama ejai eicoloŋoke.
Koker aberu toma amodiŋ, naejai aibois naitemokinit Edeke ŋes, tetere itanete ŋes kanen apaarasia alukumit ka akwat aarei ka akaisakanykape.
komam ipikorete, kwabo mam bobo etakanuna aiboisikec kotoma akuj.
Kocakarai apiu ŋin naapol, emun ŋol lokolo sek, loenyaritai Ekejodijodon, ka Satan da, ekeŋalaaran loka akwapin kere, kocakakinai toma akwap, kocakakinai da ikemalaikan nepepe kaŋes.

Kapup eporoto loepol kotoma akuj, loabala ebe, “Adol kwana aitajar, ka apedor, ka ajakanut naka Edekewok, ka apolou naka Kristoke, naarai acakar loirupei iinacanawok, loirupei kes kakonyen nuka Edekewok, paaran ka akuare da.
Ipikorete ŋul da kanuka aokot nuka Imerekek, ido kanuka akirot naka aitejenunetekec; komam eminasi aijarakec kiton atwanare.
Kanuka ŋun, kolel, ijo akuj, ka yes da luiboiete kotomake! Itukwi akwap ka aŋolol, naarai ejesun ekejodijodon mamakus, ejai kanyunyura naepol, naarai ejeni ebe edit akepak!”
Naaanyunia apiu ebe acakar ŋes toma akwap, komeja aberu naedouni ikoku yenisapat.
Koinakinai aberu abebenoka aarei nuka emorukaalet loepol, tetere eporori adolore toma amodiŋ, toma aiboisike, naitanere apak, ka apakio, ka atutubet naka apak, kotoma akonyen nuka emun,
Kolek emun akipi kotoma aitukuke kwape ecor, kakonyen nuka aberu, tetere eyaŋaarete akip aberu.
Kiŋarak akwap aberu, kooŋ akwap akeituk, komataa ecor loalekuni apiu kotoma aitukuke.
Konyunyurik apiu aberu, kolot aitiji lukaurike luesalito, luericito aicorakineta nuka Edeke, luejai aitejenunet naka Yesu, Kobwo kotoma asiŋe naka aŋolol.
Koputosi da etiaŋ loabu kaany bala eris, ka akekeje da bala nuka edubu, akeituk da bala aituk naka eŋatuny. Abu apiu koinak ŋes akepedor, ka eicoloŋoke, ka apolou da naepol.
Kesubit adiopet kakwesike bala ebelitai aŋole naka atwanare, konye koŋaleu aŋole naka atwanare, kotupa akwap kere etiaŋ eumokinit.
Komaata ituŋa apiu, naarai abu koinak etiaŋ apolou, komaata da etiaŋ, kobalas ebe, “Iŋai bo eputosi ketiaŋ kaŋol, iŋai bo da epedori aitiji ŋes?”
Kooŋ da akeituk ainyanakin Edeke, ainyanakin ekekiror, ka ewemake, kes luiboiete kotoma akuj.
Aponi koinakinai ŋes ejie ka lukalaunak, ka aipikor kes, koinakinai da apolou kama kaŋiniteker, ka ituŋa, ka aŋajep, ka ajena da.
Emaete ŋes ituŋa kere luiboiete kakwap, ŋin yenimam iwadikatai ekirorike oitabo loka aijar loka Imerekek yenaponi koarai, eriŋa epesikina apetetait naka akwap,
Arai ejai yenejai akit, kopup:
Kitwasam apolou kere naka etiaŋ losodit kakonyeneke. Koinak akwap ka luiboiete kotoma aima etiaŋ losodit, loaŋaleuni aŋoleke naka atwanare.
Iswamai ŋesi aanyuneta nuepolok, kiton aitodoun da akim abunore kotoma akuj, kiton akwap, kakonyen nuka ituŋa.
Itapaari da luiboiete kotoma akwap, kanuka aanyuneta nukeinakinitai ŋes aswam kakonyen nuka etiaŋ, elimokini luiboiete kotoma akwap aiswamakin etiaŋ ŋol aput, loaponi kobelitete kekileŋ, kojar.
Koinakinai ŋes aiyeŋakin eiyeŋane aput naka etiaŋ, tetere inera da aput naka etiaŋ, ka ainakin da ŋul kere lumam emaete aput naka etiaŋ aario.
Koinak ŋesi kere, ludidik ka lukapolok, lukabarak ka lukican, luijakakaete, ka ibulesin da, aibwaikinio emacar akanikec nakoteten, arai bo oreetakec,
tetere emamei yenepedori agwel karaida agwelar dimikito ejai emacar, ŋes ekiror loka etiaŋ, arai bo aimwaus naka ekirorike.
Ne ŋes ejai acoa. Ŋin yenejai aijen, kimar aimwaus naka etiaŋ, naarai ŋes aimwaus naka ituŋanan. Aimwausike erai akwat akanykape ka akaisakanykape ka nukanykape.
Keira da eporoto loebuni kotoma akuj bala eporoto loka akipi nukepuak, bala da eporoto loka agiro naepol; eporoto da loabu keira kosubite bala eporoto loka ikaramak lueramete adeudeunokec.

Koyeete ekosio lokitetet koiŋaren keicoloŋ, kakonyen da nuka ikajarak luoŋon, ka imakio. Kwabo emamei ituŋanan yenepedori aisisiaun ekosio ŋol, dimarai ŋul ilukumin akwatat ka akaisaoŋon ka luoŋon, lualakunio kotoma akwap.
Ŋul kes lumam emunaara kama ejaas aŋor naarai eraas ibekon; ŋul kes luetupito Imerekek kama elosi kere; ŋul kes lualakunio kotoma otuŋa araut araito nugeet nuka Edeke, ka nuka Imerekek,
ido mam edumuna aimod kaitukekec, naarai emamei kes aitoronet.
kobala keporoto loepol ebe, “Koyoŋito Edeke, kiturito ŋes, naarai adol esawa loka aitubuke, komaata ŋol lokesubi akuj; ka akwap ka aŋolol, ka atanin da nuka akipi.”

emasi ŋin da ebino loka adedeŋ naka Edeke, loebukokinitai lomam inyalitai toma aikopo naka anyunyurake, isiriebio ŋes da kotoma akim ka acukuman kakonyen nuka imalaikan lukalaunak, kakonyen da nuka Imerekek.
Epuriori da apuru naka aisiriebiokec kuju, ikar ka ikar, kwabo mam iyeŋunete paaran ka kuare da, luemaete etiaŋ ka aputoke, ka ŋin da yenedumuni emacar loka ekirorike.”
Kolomu emalaika ece koyekalu, kiworoi keporoto loepol mama ejai ŋol loiboie kodou, ebe, “Kijuka ecilikiki, kosak, naarai adol apak naka aisak, naarai akoko noi isakan luka akwap.”
Kosodi loiboie kodou acakar ecilikikike toma akwap, kosakai do akwap.
Kolomu do emalaika ece koyekalu lokotoma akuj, kojai ŋes da ecilikiki loekwana.

Kosodi kolom emalaika ece kotem, kojai apolou kama ejai akim, kiworoi keporoto loepol mama ejai ŋol loejai ecilikiki loekwana, ebe, “Kijuka ecilikikikon loekwana, kode aibuŋeta nuka emusabibu loka akwap, naarai akoko noi imusabibunuke.”
Kocaka do emalaika ecilikikike toma akwap, kode emusabibu loka akwap, kocakak acuet naepol naka adedeŋ naka Edeke.
Kicakacakai acuet kokiŋa naka ere, koleleata aokot alomun kacuet, kiton arukanasia nuka ibalasin, kwape alosit naka amairon akwat aarei.
Koyeete da ekosio loka Musa ebulesit loka Edeke, ka ekosio da loka Imerekek, kobalas ebe,
“Epolok aswamisiokon, ido nukaumokin da, Wu Ejakait Edeke Lokapedor kere! Edolito ikonirotin ido lukabeit da,
Ijo ekabaka loka atekerin!
Naarai ijo bon lokalaunan,
Naarai epote atekerin kere, emaete da kakonyenekon,
Naarai atakanut aswamisiokon nukadolit.”
kolomut do imalaikan ikanykaarei luejaas aiticaneta akanykaarei kotoma oyekalu, konapito ebaputa loelai loimilia, koenito atorobosiokec amunyin nuka esabu.
Abu ediopet kotoma lukajarak luoŋon koinak imalaikan lukanykaarei atanyia akanykaarei nuka esabu, nuileleba adedeŋ naka Edeke loejari ikar ka ikar;
kilelebun da eyekalu apuru naebuni kotoma aibuses naka Edeke, kotoma apedorike da, komamei da yenepedori alomar oyekalu kiton neanaŋiata aiticaneta akanykaarei nuka imalaikan ikanykaarei.
Kobukok emalaika lokiareit atanyike toma aŋolol, koraun aokot bala nuka yenikatwan, kotwaka da iboro kere luejarete, lukejaas toma aŋolol.
Kobukok emalaika lokiwuniet atanyike toma ocorin ka atanin nuka akipi, koraunos aokot.
Keira emalaika loka akipi ebala ebe, “Idolit ijo, loijai, ido lokijai, Lokalaunan,
Naarai itubok kwaŋin.
Ijo iinak kes aokot aimat,
Ibusakinito kes!”
“Eebo, Ejakait Edeke Lokapedor kere,
Eraas itubesiakon lukabeit ka luedolito da.”
Kobukok emalaika lokiwoŋonet atanyike toma akoloŋ, aponi koinakinai ŋes anomor ituŋa kakim.
Konomoroi ituŋa kamwanis naepol, koinyanakis ekiror loka Edeke, loejai apolou kama ejaas aiticaneta ŋun, kwabo mam apotu kitoronikinos, karaida aitopoloor ŋes.
Koinyanakis Edeke loka akuj kanuka ariebokec, ka idolakec, kwabo mam apotu kitoronikinos kotoma aswamisiokec.
Abu kaany da imoyon iuni lueroko lueputosi kaidodokai, elomunete kaituk naka apiu, kaituk da naka etiaŋ, kaituk da naka enabi lokeŋalan.
Naarai eraas imoyon luka ajokin luiswamaete aanyuneta, luelosete mama ejaas ikabakan luka akwapin kere, atukonokin kes ojie loka apaaran nakapolon naka Edeke Lokapedor kere,
(“Koany, abuni kwape ekokolan! Isirereŋitoi yenekwenyi, koricite ikenapen, kinyek alosit imujalal, kinyeis ituŋa da aanyun ileicike!”)
Kotukonokis kes aibois naenyaritai kAburanian Arumagedon.
Kojau aimiliaunun, ka iporotoi, ka agiro, kojau da amaran naepol naka akwap, namam ejai apeŋo netikolo ajaatar ituŋa akwap, kopol amaran ŋin naetia nen.
Kotiaka ere lokapolon atutubeta auni, kibiroros da ireria luka atekerin, Kiitu Edeke Babulon lokapolon, ainakin ŋes aimat aikopo naka ebino loka adedeŋ naka anyunyurake.
Koker ŋinipujan, kwabo mam edumuna iroŋan;
kodounun akako naepol, naelaŋir kwape atalant, abunore kotoma akuj mama ejaas ituŋa, koinyanakis ituŋa Edeke kanuka aiticanet ŋin naka akako, naarai kepol noi jokan akeitieanet.
naadoteata ikabakan luka akwap, ka ŋul da luiboiete kotoma akwap amerikinos ebino loka adoteuke.”
Abu kadaka eoŋ modiŋ kotoma Omoyo; kaany da aberu iboie kotiaŋ loereŋ, loileleba ikiroria luka ainyanakin, kojaas akwes akanykaarei ka amumwara da atomon.
Konapit aberu anapito namuge ka nakareŋan kisiritete esabu ka amor nuka akais nuipu, ka ilulun, kojai aikopo naka esabu akanike, naileleba italesia, ka asilianut naka adoteuke;
iwadikatete da oreeteke ekiror loka aiyeiyea ebe: “Babulon lokapolon, toto naka nudotea, ka italesia da luka akwap.”
Abu kaany aberu ŋin emera aokot nuka lukalaunak ka aokot nuka ikajenak luka Yesu.
Nakaanyunia ŋes abu kaumok aumokin naepol.
Kabala emalaika eoŋ ebe, “Kanukinyo iwumokinitor? Kalimokini jo aiyeiyea naka aberu, ka naka etiaŋ loedakit ŋes, loejaas akwes akanykaarei, ka amumwara da atomon.

Kejai etiaŋ loibu koany, ido emamei, ido ebuni adokun kotoma aipany naemamei enaŋe, elosi da amudiario; eumokinete da ŋul luiboiete kotoma akwap, lumam iwadikatai ikiroriakec oitabo loka aijar ameun kapetetait naka akwap, naeanyuniata etiaŋ, naarai kejai, ido emamei, ido ejaun.
Ne ŋes ejai aijen naejai acoa: akwes akanykaarei kes iroŋan ikanykaarei, luiboikino aberu;
eraas da ikabakan ikanykaarei, ebiroros ikany, ejai ediopet, eriŋa ece ebuno, ido naebunio ibusakinit ŋes asalakinit apak naedit.
Etiaŋ da lokejai, ido emamei, erai ŋol lokikanyetekauni, konye erai lokokanykaarei, elosi da amudiario.
Amumwara da atomon nuibu koany eraas ikabakan itomon lueriŋa edumuna ajakanut, konye edumunete apolou kwape ikabakan adaun esawa ediopet, nepepe ketiaŋ,
Ejai kes ainerun adiopet, einakinete etiaŋ apedorikec ka apoloukec da.
Ejiosi ŋul ka Imerekek, ipikori Imerekek kes, naarai erai ŋesi Ejakait loka ijaka, ka Ekabaka da loka ikabakan, ŋul da luejaas kaŋes eraas luenyaritai, lueseunitai, ka lumunon da.”
Amumwara da atomon nuibu koany, ka etiaŋ, elaete kesi naadote; einakinete ŋes asilikinit, ka amujalal, enyamarete akuanake, icweikinete ŋes kakim,
naarai abu Edeke kibwaik otauonokec aswam naenerunit, ajaut kainerun adiopet, ka ainakin da etiaŋ ajakanutukec, aitodol naitodolere akiro nuka Edeke.
Aberu da naibu koany ŋes ere lokapolon loirumit ikabakan luka akwap.”
Kiworo keporoto loegogoŋ ebe,
“Ebiror, ebiror Babulon lokapolon!
Arau aibois naiboioto ajokin,
Ka aidaris naka imoyon lueroko,
Aidaris da naka ŋinikweny yenerono yenelaitai;
Adoteata da ikabakan luka akwap kaŋes,
Abarata da ikagwelanarak luka akwap
Kanuka agogoŋ naka eporoke.”
“Ikatuŋa, kolomutu kotomakeŋ,
Kinyeis aimorikikin kadiakanaretake,
Kinyeis ainakinio aiticanetake;
Eitu da Edeke amamus adoliteke.
Kiyatakis ŋes irwan aarei kwape ejaatar aswamisioke:
Toma aikopo naenyalia ŋesi, kinyalakis ŋes irwan aarei.
Kwape kwaŋin koinakis ŋes aisiriebio noi ka akuudian,
Naarai ebala kotauke ebe, ‘Eboie eoŋ kwape akabaka,
Mam arai apuserut, mam cut aanyuni akuudian.’
Atwanare, ka akuudian, ka ebeli,
Icweikinio cut kakim;
Naarai egogoŋ Ejakait Edeke loetubokini ŋes.”
kobwoete kama elwana, kanuka akurian naka aisiriebioke, kobalasi ebe,
“Itukwi! Itukwi! Ere lokapolon,
Babulon, ere lokapolon loegogoŋ!
Naarai adolu atubokiniokon toma osawa ediopet.”
