igwelara luka esabu, ka epuesa, ka amoru nuka akais nuipu, ka ilulun, ka ebaputa loejok, ka lomuge, ka aliri, ka lokareŋan, ka ŋolikitoi loeuru maa, ka ŋinibore kere yenika ikel luka itomei, ka ŋinibore kere yenika ekitoi loka akais nuipu noi, ka aikomon, ka asua, ka amor nuka ijesesinei,

akinomon, ka lueuru maa, ka emina, ka luesaete, ka lukisupurununo, ka ebino, ka akinyet, ka akiria nuicidie, ka eŋano, ka ibaren, ka amerekekin, ka ibalasin, ka agalin, ka ibulesin, ka aijar da naka ituŋa.
“Araito da nuimiela ekonitau anyout mamakon,
Iboro kere da luetarioko ka luimilias anyout kamakon, Komam bobo ituŋa edumunete kes!”
Loaponi kitanapai ebaputa loejok,
ka lomuge ka lokareŋan, Kisiritete kesabu,
ka amor nuka akais nuipu, ka ilulun da!
Kobwoi da ŋolikapolon loka ataker, ka yenelosi aibois kere kotoma ataker, ka ikekwaŋak, ka ŋul kere da luiswamaete toma aŋolol, kobwoete kama elwana,
ido naaanyuniata apuru naka aicweioke, kiworoto ebe,
“Inyo bo eputosi ka ere lokapolon?”
“Itukwi! Itukwi! Ere lokapolon,
Loetabari kere lukejaas atakerin toma aŋolol kanuka akaisike nuipu! Naarai amudiar kotoma osawa ediopet.
Ka yes lukalaunak, ka yes ikiyakia, ka yes da inabin,
Naarai kitubok Edeke akirokus kamakeŋ!”
“Kwaŋin ecakakinere Babulon ere lokapolon,
Kwabo mam bobo etakanuni.
ka luejaas lueruosi,
ka luekusete alamarun,
ka luekusete arupepen,
Mam epupunos bobo kotomakon.
Karaida epirioit loka aswam kere,
mam etakanuni bobo kotomakon;
Karaida eporoto loka akukuse mam epupuni bobo kotomakon;
Karaida eporoto loka eteran ka ateran mam epupuni bobo kotomakon;
Naarai keraas ikagwelanarakakon ikapolok luka akwap,
Naarai toma ocudetekon ŋes eŋalaarere atekerin kere.
Ka nuka ŋul kere luaario kotoma akwap.”
“Aleluia! Aitajar ka aibuses, ka apedor eraas nuka Edekewok.
Naarai atuboki akiro naadote nakapolon,
Naamunaari akwap kadoteuke,
Enyaŋaa kamakeŋ aokot nuka ikebulesin.”
“Aleluia! Epuriori apuruke ikar ka ikar.”
Kobu eporoto koicoloŋ kinera atiar,
“Kituroto Edekewok, yes kere ikebulesin,
Yes luiyoŋito ŋes, ludidik ka lukapolok da.”
“Aleluia! Naarai irumit Ejakait Edekewok Lokapedor kere.
Naarai adolu adukokin naka Imerekek,
Itemokino da ateranike;

Kasodi aibirokin kiŋaren kakejeke, aima ŋes, Katema ŋesi eoŋ atiar, “Koany, sirikiswama kwaŋin! Arai eoŋ ebulesit aupakon, ka lokoinacanakon, luejaas kaitejenunet naka Yesu. Koma Edeke.” Naarai aitejenunet naka Yesu ŋes emoyo loka adwaranut.
Ido akekonyen eraas aipeloret naka akim, kejaas amekemeken nuipu akouke; kojai kekiror loiwadikatai lomam ejeni idiotuŋanan dimarai ŋes bon.
Konapite anapito naebwasitai aokot; enyaritai ekekiror Akirot naka Edeke.
Kotupakis ŋes ajoresio nukotoma akuj, kibwanenito ibalasin lukakwaŋak, konapito ebaputa loejok, loekwaŋ, loelai.
Elomuni ekileŋ loekwana kaitukuke, loinomia atekerin, icokiei kes kebela loka asuat; icakacakai ŋesi acuet naka ebino loka adedeŋ naka anyunyura naka Edeke Lokapedor kere.
Ejai ekiror loiwadikatai anapitoke kamurwoke da ebe, EKABAKA LOKA IKABAKAN, IDO EJAKAIT LOKA IJAKA.

tetere inyamete akiriŋ naka ikabakan, ka akiriŋ naka ikapolokitok, ka akiriŋ naka lukagogoŋ, ka akiriŋ naka ibalasin, ka naka ŋul kaluibwanenete kes, ka akiriŋ naka luijakakaete, ka naka ibulesin, naka ludidik ka naka lukapolok da.”
Kaany etiaŋ ka ikabakan luka akwap, ka ajoresiokec, etukokinos ejie kaŋol kaloebwanenit ebalasit ka ajoreke da.

Kikamunai etiaŋ nepepe ka enabi lokeŋalan loeswamai aanyuneta kakonyeneke, nueŋalaaria ŋul luadumut emacar loka etiaŋ, ka ŋul da luamaete aputoke. Kocakakinai iarei kere ejarete toma aŋolol naka akim naenoki kacukuman.
Koarai luasalete kekileŋ loka ŋol kaloebwanenit ebalasit, loalomunit kaitukuke; kimonikinos akweny kere akiriŋikec.
Kikam apiu, emun ŋol lokolosek, loerai Ekejodijodon ido Satan, koen ŋes adaun ikar elukumit,
kocakak ŋes aipany, kogolok, kipucak aipucet kujukeŋ, kinyek bobo aiŋalaŋal atekerin, aitodol naedaunotor ikar elukumit. Akaulo kaŋun ibusakinit ŋes aosikinio apak naedit.
Luasalete luka lukatwak mam apotu kojara aitodol naedaunotor ikar elukumit. Ŋin ŋes ajarun nasodit.

Isirereŋitoi, ido erai yenikalaunan, yenejai akorakinet kotoma ajarun nasodit! Emamei atwanare nakiareit apolou kamakec, konye eraunos isasedotin luka Edeke ka luka Kristo, ido irumete nepepe kaŋes ikar elukumit.
Kosodi naedaunotor ikar ŋul elukumit, eosikinio Satan kaidarisike,
elomuni da aiŋalaŋal atekerin nuejaas agoria aoŋon nuka akwap, Gog ka Magog, atukonokin kes kojie; etiaikec bala asine naka aŋolol.
Kodokut kalalau naka akwap, kirimorito iidukurun luka lukalaunak, ka ere da lominat; konye kijesun akim kotoma akuj, konyama kes.
Kocakakinai ekejodijodon loeŋalaŋalai kes aŋolol naka akim ka acukuman, nekejaas etiaŋ ka enabi lokeŋalan, isiriebio kes noi paaran ka kuare ikar ka ikar.

Kaany da lukatwak, lukapolok ka ludidik da, ebwoete koiŋaren keicoloŋ, kopukoroi iitabon. Kopukoroi eceitabo da, loerai loka aijar. Kotubokinai lukatwak kotoma ŋun kanuewadikatai oitabon kwape kejaatar aswamisiokec.
Kijaik aŋolol lukatwak lukejaas tomakeŋ, Atwanare da ka Okatwak kijaikis lukatwak lukejaas tomakec, kotubokinai da ŋinidiopet kwape kejaatar aswamisioke.
Kosodi kocakakinai Atwanare ka Okatwak aŋolol naka akim. Ŋin ŋes atwanare nakiareit, aŋolol naka akim.
Arai kedumun idiotuŋanan yenimam iwadikatai toma oitabo loka aijar, kocakakinai aŋolol naka akim.
Kaany da ere lokalaunan, Yerusalem lokitetet, ijesun kotoma akuj, kama ka Edeke, itemokino kwape ateran naisirokinitai okilenike.
Keira da eporoto loepol loebuni kotoma oicoloŋ kobala ebe, “Koany, ejai ewema loka Edeke nepepe kituŋa, iboienenei kakes, eraunos kesi iketuŋa, Edeke da elopet ejaenena kakes.
Emwatari akiyo kere kakonyeneke, mam bobo ejaun atwanare, karaida akuudian, karaida aimony, karaida ariebo, mam bobo ejaunos; naarai atuboros nusodit.”
Kobala da ebe, “Kiwadik, naarai eraas akiro nu numunon ido nukabeit.”
Katema ŋesi eoŋ atiar, “Eswamaunos! Arai eoŋ Alupa ka Omega, ageunet ka esaŋe da, Ainakini yenejakit akure aimat atai atan naka akipi nuka aijar.
Yenipikori irumi ŋun, araun eoŋ Ekedeke, ŋes da eraun okokuka.

Konye ikuriesik, ka lumam iyuunito, ka luesiliaka, ka ikaarak, ka idotea, ka ikacudak, ka luemaete aputosia, ka ikeŋalak kere, ejaun akorakineteke toma aŋolol naenoki kakim ka acukuman; ŋes atwanare nakiareit.”
Kadaka kotoma Omoyo oroŋat loepol, loeoja, ketodik eoŋ ere lokalaunan Yerusalem, ijesun kotoma akuj kama ka Edeke,
ejaas kaibuses naka Edeke, koputosi aicake bala amoru naka akais nuipu noi, kwape amoru naka ayaseper naipiororoi noi.
Kejai arwatat naepol, naeoja, kejaas irutei itomon ka luarei, kejaas imalaikan itomon ka luarei orutei, kiwadikatai da ikiroria luka atekerin atomon ka nuarei nuka idwe luka Isirael orutei.
Kide irutei iuni, agolitomei irutei iuni, eŋalakimak irutei iuni, to da irutei iuni,
Kojaas apeteta atomon ka nuarei arwatat naka ere, kotomakec da ikiroria itomon ka luarei luka ikiyakia itomon ka luarei luka Imerekek.
Etirianitai da ere iwaitin kere, aojauke koriakasi kalalau. Kitem ŋesi ere kegada amairon alukumit ka akwat akany; koriakanara aojauke ka alalauke ka amukururuke da.
Kitem da arwatatake ikubitin
Adukio naka arwatatake korai naka ayaseper, ere da korai loka esabu loelai, kwape aroet naelai.
Kisiritete apeteta nuka arwatat naka ere kaŋinimoru kere naka akais nuipu; apetetait nasodit ayaseper, nakiareit asapiro, nakiwuniet aget, nakiwoŋonet emeralid,

nakikanyet naemelomelot; nakikanyetekape asadia; nakikanyetekaarei akurusoliso; nakikanyetekauni aberul; nakikanyetekaoŋon atopasit; nakitomonet akurusopuraso; nakitomonet ka nadiopet ayasit; nakitomonet kanuarei da ametusit,
Keraas irutei itomon ka luarei ilulun itomon ka luarei, ŋolidiopet korutei kerai elulu ediopet; erot da loka ere kerai esabu loelai bala aroet naipiororoi.
Mam abu kaany eyekalu kore, naarai eyekaluke ŋes Ejakait Edeke Lokapedor kere ka Imerekek.
Mam ere ipuda akoloŋ karaida elap acaikin ŋes; naarai inwakakinit aibuses naka Edeke, atalake da ŋes Imerekek.
Elosenenete da atekerin kaicake, eyaunete ikabakan luka akwap aibusesukec tomake;
mam cut egolokinio iruteike paaran, naarai mam ejaun akuare ŋina;
einunete ŋes aibuses ka ayoŋio nuka atekerin.
Ido mam elomari cut ibore kere tomake yenemunaara, karaida yeniswamai nukasilianut, ka aiŋalanut, dimarai ŋul bonik luiwadikatai toma oitabo loka aijar loka Imerekek.
kokidiŋ kerot loka ere, kojai ekitoi loka aijar epuai ka epuai kecor, loerai araito nukiponesio itomon kaluarei, loerai araitoke ŋolilap; keraas akui nuka ekitoi nuitaŋaleunete atekerin.
Mam ejaun bobo ekenit; ejaun eicoloŋ loka Edeke ka loka Imerekek da tomake; ijaanakinete ŋes ikebulesin;
eanyunete akekonyen, ejaun da ekekiror oreetake.
Mam ejaun bobo akuare; mam ipudasi aica naka atala, ka aica da naka akoloŋ, naarai icaikini kes Ejakait Edeke, irumete kesi ikar ka ikar.
Ido koany, abunit atipet.”
Isirereŋitoi yenerici akiro nuka adwarasit naka eitabo kalo.
Katema ŋesi eoŋ atiar, “Koany, sirikiswama kwaŋin! Arai eoŋ ebulesit aupakon lokoinacanakon inabin, ka ŋul da luericito akiro nuka eitabo kalo. Koma Edeke.”
Yeniswamai numam edolito, kiyatak aswam amamus adolit, yenesiliana da, kiyatak asilianar, yenedolit da kiyatak aswam nukadolit, yenikalaunan da kiyatak aitalaunio.”
Arai eoŋ Alupa ka Omega, losodit ka lokawasia, ageunet ka esaŋe da.”
Ejaas iŋokwo kiŋa, ka ikacudak, ka idotea, ka ikaarak, ka luemaete aputosia, ka ŋinituŋanan kere yenemin ka aswam da aiŋal.
Ebalas Emoyo ka ateran ebe, “Bia.” Yenepupuni da kobala ebe, “Bia.” Ŋin da yenejakit akure kobu; yenekoto kooko atai akipi nuka aijar.
bobo da arai elemari ituŋanan kotoma akiro nuka eitabo loka adwarasit kana, elemari Edeke akorakineteke kokitoi loka aijar, kore da lokalaunan, nuiwadikatai toma oitabo lo.
Loitejenunit nu inera ebe, “Eebo, abunit atipet.” Amen. Kobia, Ejakait Yesu!
Asianut naka Ejakait Yesu kojai ka lukalaunak; Amen.
